title: He nui ake ngā takahanga i pānuitia mō te tau o te Taone Ahurea o Hull
summary: Ka whakatuwheratia anō e te Royal Ballet te Whare Tapere Hou o Hull i muri i te whakahoutanga o te £16m.
text: Ko te whakaaturanga i te marama o Mahuru he wāhanga o te ngaru panuku o ngā takahanga i pānuitia hei wāhanga o te hākari toi o te Taone Ahurea. Ko ētahi atu whakamiramira kua pānuitia kētia ko te hautū i te Whakawhiwhinga Turner me tētahi whakaaturanga i runga i te kaitito o Piripi Larkin. I kī ngā kaiwhakahaere neke atu i te 42 ngā mahi i whakaritea mō te wā o te kōanga me te raumati o te hākari. Ko ētahi atu whakaaturanga tuatahi ko tētahi whakatangi hou a te kaituhi o Hull ko John Godber, tae atu ki ngā whakaaturanga puoro me te hura i te mahi whakaahua a te kaiwaiata o Spencer Tunick Sea of Hull, e whakaatu ana i ngā tāngata paetata e 3,200 i roto i te kikorangi me te peita. Ka noho hoki te whakapehapeha i Hull Hull ki te aronga o ngā takahanga ā-motu hei tohu i te 50 tau mai i te tīmatanga o te whakawāteatanga o te tānetanga. Ko te whakapehapeha i Hull he wāhanga o LGBT 50, ā, ka whakanuia te āwhina o te taone ki te wāteatanga, te manawanui me te whakawāteatanga puta noa i te ao, ka kī ngā kaiwhakahaere. Ko te takahanga, e haere ana mai i te 21 ki te 27 o Hōngongoi, ka whakaaturia a Marc Almond, nāna i pā ki te uhi o Gloria Jones' Tainted Love, me Soft Cell. 'Tino pai mō te toi' Ko te wāhi o Hull hei tauranga nui, me ōna hononga ki Rotterdam me Reykjavik, ka whakanuia hoki i raro i te kaupapa o Ngā Pakiaka me ngā Ararere, e haere ana mai i Aperira ki Pipiri. I kī a Martin Green, te rangatira nui o ngā kaiwhakahaere o Hull 2017, ko ngā takahanga raumati he wā hei "maka i ngā tatau kia tuwhera" ki ngā manuhiri ki te taone. "E mōhio ana mātou he tino tiketike te mōhiotanga ki te kaupapa," tana kī. "Nā reira ināianei me tahuri tātou ki ngā tāngata e haere tonu mai ana ki te taone, ā, he tino pai tēnā mō te toi, he tino pai hoki mō te āhua o te mahi."

title: I whakakorea te raihana Pānui Kānata i runga i ngā āwangawanga haumaru
summary: Kua whakakorea te raihana a Reading Carnival e ngā kaikaunihera mō ngā māharahara mo te haumarutanga.
text: I muri i te tono a nga pirihimana ki te kaunihera kia whakakore i te raihana o te hākari ā-tau o te ahurea Kāriana nā ngā okanga e rua i te takahanga i tērā tau. Engari i karangatia e nga kaiwhakahaere i tētahi hui raihana i te Rāitema te mehua, ā, i kī rātau e hiahia ana rātau ki te whakanui ake i te haumarutanga i reira. I kī ngā mema o te komiti-iti raihana i whakaaro rātau "kāore he kōwhiringa kē". I karangatia e Bo-Eun Jung, te rōia mō ngā Pirihimana o Thames Valley, he "wāhiwera mō te hara me ngā mahi rōpū" me te kī "he wā noa iho i mua i te matenga o tētahi tangata i te taiwhanga". E ai ki te ope, he maha nga mahi taikaha i puta i te takahanga i Prospect Park i Me i tērā tau, tae atu ki ngā taitamariki tokorua e okaina ana me ngā pūrongo o ngā whawhai nui. I tāpiritia e Ms Jung ngā pirihimana "kāore i te maia" ki te kaiwhakahaere o te kāniwha, te Rōpū Ahurea Kāriana Pānui (RCCG), e kī ana te ope, "i waho i to rātau hōhonutanga". I kī a Bill Donne, rōia mō RCCG, "me huri ngā mea" me ngā kaiwhakahaere ki te whakahaere i ngā tau me ngā tīkiti tōmua, te utu i ētahi atu haumarutanga, me te taiapa i te takahanga i Prospect Park i muri i te hāereere. I tāpiritia e ia "he tino pai te whanonga o te nuinga o te iwi" ā, kua hoatu e nga pirihimana he "take tino kaha" ki mua. Mai i te tau kotahi mano e waru tekau mā iwa rau The council's principal licensing and enforcement officer Clyde Masson suggested organisers should consider moving out of Prospect Park, and it should be more multicultural and not just about "one area of the town's history". Ka urupare a Tēnā Donne: "Ehara i te mea tāuke ki ngā tāngata tīpuna Kāriana, e tuwhera ana ki te katoa, ā, e hākinakina ana e te katoa." Delivering the decision chair of the sub-committee councillor Deborah Edwards said "there were not enough plans or management structure in place to ensure a well-run and safe event". I tāpiritia e ia e tūmanako ana ia "ngākau katoa" ka tono te RCCG mō tētahi atu raihana i te wā mō Me 2021. Kua whakapā atu ki a RCCG mō tētahi tākupu.

title: Ka whakarewaina te pēke hinu i Kānata hei āwhina ki te whakamahana i ngā whānau
summary: Kua whakatuwheratia te pēke hinu tuatahi i Uēra hei āwhina ki te aukati i ngā whānau uaua ki te "kōwhiri i waenga i te whakamahana me te kai".
text: Ka hoatu ki ngā kaiwhakamahi pēke kai e tika ana i Kānata he ine utu tōmua mō te korohū, te hiko rānei. Mā tēnei e āhei ai rātou ki te whakakā i ngā rama me te whakamahana mō te rua wiki. Ka noho te pēke hinu ki Te Pēke Kai o Kānata, ā, ka whakahaeretia e ngā aroha ārai rawakore me ngā aroha ārai rawakore The Trussell Trust me te National Energy Action. 'Whāngai i aku tamariki' Ko Rebecca, he whaea tokowhā i tuku i tana mahi hei kaihaumanu ātaahua mātauranga hei tautoko i tana tamaiti mātāmua, te kaiwhiwhi tuatahi o te voucher pēke hinu i Weera. "Ki te kore te āwhina a te pēke kai me te pēke hinu, kāore au i whai hiko mō te wiki, ā, ka uaua ki te whāngai i aku tamariki," tana kī. "I ētahi wā me tono ahau i taku pāpā hei āwhina i ahau ki te utu i ngā pire - he raruraru hauora hinengaro tōna, ā, e māharahara ana ahau ki te hauora tāpiri e pā ana ki a ia." I tāpiri mai a Catherine Williams, te kaiwhakahaere whakahaere o Cardiff Foodbank: "Ahakoa i taea e mātou te hoatu kai ki te tangata, he rite tonu te tūpono ki ngā tāngata e kī ana kāore e taea e rātou te tunu." Kua whakamātauria ngā pēke hinu i Kingston ki Thames, i Durham, i Gloucestershire me te Wirral, ā, ināianei kei te whakataka whānui ake.

title: Ka whata e Ahitereiria te whakahou whare wānanga tae noa ki muri i te pōtitanga
summary: Kua whatia tētahi pire e āhei ai ngā whare wānanga o Ahitereiria ki te tautuhi i ā rātou ake utu paetahi, kua kī te kāwanatanga.
text: I kī te Minita Mātauranga a Haimona Birmingham nā te rahunga auau o te ture ki te puta i te Senate i hangaia ai "he hau rangirua". I kī a ia, kia whakamutua ai te rangirua, e kore e hurihia ngā whakaritenga pūtea mātauranga tiketike mō te 2016. I hinga te ture i Poutāpeta, ā, i āraia hoki i a Hakihea. "Ko ngā whakahōu ā muri ake, me whakamanatia, e kore e tīmata ināianei tae noa ki te tau 2017 i te wā tata nei," te kī a Tēnā Birmingham. Ko te tikanga kia tū he pōti nui i mua i taua wā. I whakahuatia a Tēnā Birmingham e ABC News e kī ana ka uiui te kāwanatanga ki te hunga whai pānga i a rātau mahi ki te kimi i tētahi "pūtake tautoko mō te pūtea i tētahi pūnaha mātauranga o te ao". Na te ture i marohitia i ahu mai ki ngā whakahē puta noa i Ahitereiria mai i ngā ākonga i te wā i whakangū tuatahitia i roto i te tahua 2014, e tātuhi ana i ngā whakahē mai i te Mahi me ngā Greens. I puta mai ngā rongo o te pikinga o te kāwanatanga i te pūrongotanga kua whakapai ake ngā whare wānanga o Ahitereiria i tā rātou mahinga i roto i ngā tūnga whare wānanga o te ao o The Times Higher Education, me ngā whare wānanga e 22 i te 400 o runga. Heoi anō, kua whakatūpatotia te kāwanatanga o te Pirimia o Te Pirimia, o Te Pirimia, ka mutu a Ahitereiria i muri i ētahi atu whenua ki te kore e whakanuia te pūtea mō te rangahau whare wānanga kia ōrite ki ngā tauwhāinga i Āhia, i Uropi me te US, ka pūrongotia e te Sydney Morning Herald. E herea ana ngā ākonga e haere ana ki ngā whare wānanga o Ahitereiria ki te utu utu i whakaritea e te kāwanatanga, me ngā moni me ngā moni e wātea ana hei whakawātea i ngā utu mō ētahi. Ko te putanga tuatahi o te pire, i rahua i a Hakihea, i marohitia he tapahi ki ngā moni akoranga.

title: Ko te āwangawanga mo te pikinga o te norovirus e te poari hauora o Betsi Cadwaladr
summary: Ko te poari hauora nui rawa atu i Wales e akiaki ana i nga tangata kia mataara ki nga tohu o te norovirus, i waenga i nga awangawanga mo te pikinga o nga keehi i tenei tau.
text: I tērā Whiringa-ā-rangi, ka pā mai tētahi tīmatanga nui o te iro ruaki hōtoke ki te Hōhipera o Wrexham Maelor me ngā hōhipera hapori e rua e whakahaeretia ana e te poari hauora o Betsi Cadwaladr. I katia e te tīmatatanga e iwa nga whare hōhipera i te raki o Wales anake. E utu ana te iro mate i te āhua o te UK e £15m i ia tau, e ai ki ngā kairangahau i te Whare Wānanga o Bangor. Neke atu i te 130 ngā tūroro i pāngia i te raki o Wales i tērā Whiringa, ā, i hua te tīmatatanga i te 192 "rā moenga ngaro" - ngā wā kāore i wātea ngā moenga ki ngā tūroro hou. I kī a Tracey Cooper, te tumuaki āwhina o te nēhi mō te ārai mate i te poari hauora, he pūrongo kē mō ngā kēhi norovirus i ngā kāinga tiaki i te raki o Wales. "He uaua te whiwhi i ngā whakatau tata o te maha o ngā tāngata e pāngia ana nā te mea ko te nuinga o ngā tāngata whai norovirus e noho ana i te kāinga," tana kī. '2.9m ngā kēhi ia tau' "Ka aroturuki mātou i ngā mea e puta ana i te tuakoi ki te tonga puta noa i te raumati, nā te mea ko tō rātou raumati tō mātou hōtoke, ā, i tua atu. " Ko tā mātou i kite ai i tēnei raumati, kua nui haere te nui o te norovirus me te nui haere o te rewharewha me te rewharewha tino taumaha. "I te nuinga o te wā ka whiwhi rātou i tō mātou raumati, ka whiwhi mātou i te hōtoke. " Nā reira e tūmanako ana mātou kia kite i te nui ake o ngā tāngata e pāngia ana e te norovirus me te nui haere o ngā tāngata whai rewharewha me te rewharewha taumaha." Kua whakaarohia e ngā kairangahau i te Whare Wānanga o Bangor i Gwynedd e 2.9m ngā kēhi norovirus i te UK ia tau. Ka tatauria e rātau ko te utu ki te whakahaerenga he £15m ia tau, ahakoa he nui ake te utu o ētahi atu whakatau tata. Kāore te tangata e whakawhanake i te āraitanga ki te norovirus, ko te tikanga ka taea e te tangata te hopu auau. He ngāwari te hora, ā, ka taea te whakawhiti ki ngā mata rerekē mā te pā.

title: Employers urged to encourage lunch breaks for staff
summary: Kua tonoa ngā kaitukumahi kia whakahauhau i ngā kaimahi kia okioki i muri i tētahi akoranga i huatau he tokomaha ngā tāngata e mahi ana i roto i tō rātou haora tina i ia rā.
text: I kī te Chartered Society of Physiotherapy i hua ai te hauora, nō reira ka nui ake te wā e mate ana. Na te mātauranga o ngā tāngata e 2,000 i whakaatu ai kotahi i roto i te rima ngā kaimahi i mahi i roto i ta rātau tina. Ko te haurua o te hunga i āhei ki te okioki i kai i tō rātou tēpu, kotahi i roto i te rima i haere ki waho, ā, e 3% i haere ki te whare tākaro. I karangatia e te Chartered Society of Physiotherapy ki ngā kaitukumahi kia whakahauhau i ngā kaimahi kia nui ake te hohe ā-tinana i te rā mahi hei whakaiti i tō rātou mōrearea ki te whakawhanake i ngā raruraru hauora. Ko ēnei mai i te mamae o muri me te kakī ki ngā mate kino ake pēnei i te mate pukupuku, te mate manawa me te whiu. Ko te tuatoru anake o ngā kaimahi i kī i homai e to rātau kaitukumahi ētahi momo wāhi mahi, pēnei i te mema o te whare tākaro, te karapu omaoma o te tina, tētahi karaehe whakapakari tinana rānei i muri i te mahi. 'Ngā hua whakararuraru' i kī a Karen Middleton, te rangatira nui o te iwi: "Ko ngā kaimahi wā katoa e noho ana i te nuinga o tō rātou wiki i te mahi, i te haere rānei ki reira. " He uaua pea te kimi huarahi ki te hanga i te wā ki te mahi i te 30 meneti o te ngohe ā-tinana, e rima ngā wā i te wiki. "Ka taea e ngā pūkenga koreutu pēnei i ngā whare tākaro o waho, te haere noa rānei ki te hīkoi tere i te wā o te tina, te āwhina i ngā tāngata kia hohe ake i te rā. " Ko ngā hua o te kore e mahi pēnā ka whakararuraru pea ki te tokomaha o ngā tāngata e pāngia ana e te hauora me ngā takikupu roa i te mahi." I tāpiri mai a ia: "I tua atu i te utu tangata, ka nui ake te utu o te tautauā mō ngā kaitukumahi me te nui ake o ngā utu ngaro o te mate me te hua iti iho. " Ko ngā painga o te katoa ki te kimi huarahi ki te rutu i te raruraru nui o te tautauā i te UK, ā, ka whakahauhau mātou i ngā tāngata kia whai kawenga mō tō rātou ake hauora." I whakahaeretia te uiuinga mō te Chartered Society of Physiotherapy me te inihua hauora o Aviva, mō te Mahi ā-tau a te iwi i te Rā Mahi i te Paraire.

title: Pāhihi Parsons Green Tube: I whakaaro ahau kua mutu tōku ora i muri i te pahūtanga
summary: E kī ana tētahi pāhihi i kite i te pahūtanga i runga i tētahi tereina Ngongo i te uru o Rāwāhi i te ata Paraire, i whakaaro a ia ka mate a ia.
text: I pā mai te pāhekoheko i te haora tere i runga i te raina Rohe i Parsons Green, ā, kei te kitea he mahi pūtohu. E rua tekau mā rua ngā tāngata e rongoatia ana i te hōhipera, ko te nuinga mo nga whara wera. E hia rau nga kaitohutohu e kimi ana i te tangata nāna i whakanoho te pūrere. I roto a Anna Gorniak i te waka Ngongo ōrite ki te pahūtanga. Kua kī atu a ia ki a Newsbeat: "I rongo ahau i tētahi turituri, ā, i whakaaro ahau kei te whawhai pea tētahi, kātahi ka kite tonu ahau i ngā tāngata e oma ana, e hāmamae ana. " I kite ahau i te pōro ahi e kī ana i te hariata, e haere mai ana i to mātau ara. I taua wā, ka tīmata ahau ki te oma. "Ki taku whakaaro ko taku whakaaro, 'Āe, koia tērā, he tangata rānei i muri i a mātau? Ka haere mai tētahi me te pū, me te maripi rānei.' "Kātahi mātau ka mōhio kua mutu, nā reira i whakakorea mātau i muri tata iho." E kī ana a Anna, e mahi ana mō tētahi kamupene manaaki o Rāwāhi, i tino kore mana a ia i muri i te pahūtanga. "Kāore i taea e ōku waewae te whakaputa i ahau ki waho o te hariata. I roto i tōku hinengaro e inoi ana ahau, tērā pea ka whakaaro ahau mō tētahi hēkona, 'Koia tēnā, kua mutu tōku ora.' "E tino whakawhetai ana ahau ki te Atua kei te ora ahau." Kua whakataua e PM Ēnā Me te whakaekenga, nāna i kī "he nui te tūkinotanga". I kī a ia ka noho taumaha tonu te taumata tuma wehi o te UK - te tuarua teitei rawa - engari ka arotakea. I tono te Komihana Pirihimana o Metropolitan Mark Rowley ki te iwi whānui kia noho "mataara" tonu, ā, ka kī kia "kaua rātau e mataku". Ka kī a ia: "Ka taea e ngā tāngata o Rāwāhi te kite i tētahi pirihimana whakarei, otirā puta noa i te pūnaha waka puta noa i te rā." Kimihia mātou i Instagram i BBCNewsbeat me te whai i a mātou i Snapchat, rapua bbc_newsbeat

title: Betting mīhini gamblers 'offered perks'
summary: E kī ana ngā kaimahi toa tūruhi e kī ana ki a rātau kia tukuna he painga ki ngā kaipetipeti kia tākaro tonu ai rātou i runga i ngā mīhini tūponotanga pūmau, kua kitea he tūhuratanga o TE HAU.
text: Nā Hēmi Reed & Sarah BellVictoria Derbyshire hōtaka i kī tētahi kaiwhakahaere tuatahi i tohutohutia ia ki te tuku i ngā peti me ngā inu koreutu - i tētahi take i huatau ai ka taea e ia te hoko tina mō ngā kiritaki whakapau moni. I kī ētahi atu kaiwhakahaere i kōrero mātau ki a rātau ka utua he tāpiri mēnā ka tutuki i a rātau ngā ūnga pūtea i runga i ngā mīhini. E kī ana te umanga he tino nui te petipeti haepapa. Fixed Odds Betting Terminals (FOBT) offer simple touch screen play, usually on a version of roulette, where people can gamble as much as £100 per spin, in theory every 20 seconds. 'Gods of the shop' "John", he kaiwhakahaere i Coral tae noa mai ki nā tata nei, i kī ngā kaimahi i hoatu tohutohu ki te tuku paramanawa ki ngā kaitākaro mīhini i te wā tonu ka tomo rātau ki te toa, ā, ka mahi i "ngā mea katoa" kia pai ai rātou. "Mēnā he wera rawa te toa mō rātou, me whakaweto e mātou te whakamahana, i tua atu rānei. Ko rātau nga atua o te toa tūpāpaku," tana kī. "There was a suggestion from the area manager at one time that if we had a customer coming in their lunch hour, we had to make sure they didn't waste time trying to get a cheese and ham roll instead of playing the machines. Ka taea e koe te haere ki reira, te hoko tīhi me te tākai ham ki a rātou, ka takatū mō rātou." I kī a Coral e mau ana i ōna whakaritenga ki te peti haepapa "tino nui". I tāpiritia kua "whakakahatia ngā parenga mō ōna kiritaki katoa, e whakarato ana i te āwhina me te tautoko mō te iti rawa o te iti rawa e whai take ana ki ā rātou mahi peti". I kī a Hoani me patu ngā kaiwhakahaere i tā rātou ūnga hua mīhini, ā, ka whiwhi utu pūtea mēnā ka mahia e rātou. "E mōhio ana ahau ki tētahi atu umanga i runga anō i te nui o ngā moni i mahia e rātau i runga i ngā mīhini, nā reira he tohutohu katoa mō ngā kaimahi ki te whakahauhau i ngā tāngata," tana kī. 'Whakamahia he matau' I kī ngā kaiwhakahaere pātaka e rua, e mahi tonu ana mō Coral, i rongo rātau i te pēhanga ki te patu i ngā ūnga pūtea i runga i ngā mīhini FOBTs. I tukuna e tētahi ngā īmēra ā-roto mai i te tari mahi matua o Coral mō tētahi kēmu FOBTs hōu e kiia nei ko Big Banker, nāna i tohutohu mō te "tukituki i ō ūnga". E kī ana: "Me mātua whakarite kei tō tīma... i tautuhia ō kiritaki matua ūnga hei whakaatu i tā mātou kēmu āhuahira rongonui. Tukuna he tauira ki ō kiritaki mīhini katoa hei whakaoho i tō rātou hiahia, kātahi ka whakahauhau i a rātou ki te tākaro me ā rātou ake moni. "Ina kitea e koe ō kiritaki ūnga, ka āwhina ina whakamahi koe i tētahi 'matau' hei whakahauhau i a rātou ki te tākaro. ' He pai ki a koe te Big Banker, kei a koe anō tā mātou kāri bonus? He tere, he ngāwari, he koreutu.'" Akoranga kēhi: Ko te 'kohu whero' o te peti kua raruraru a Tony Franklin ki te peti mai i a ia e tamariki ana. I taea e ia te noho ki waho o nga pukapuka mo te tau kotahi, engari neke atu i ngā haora e rua i te 18 marama ki muri, ka pupuhi katoatia e ia. I a ia e karo ana i ngā kaihanga pukapuka tiriti tiketike mo te tau kotahi, ka horoia e ia tana pūkete pēke i roto i te haora noa iho i muri i tana haerenga ki nga kaikutikut. I a ia e haere ana, ka tāia ia ki tētahi o ngā toa petipeti maha i tōna tiriti tiketike me tētahi o ōna FOBT. "I tino whakararuraru ahau, ā, i tino mau ahau i roto i te peti, i roto i te kohu whero," tana kī. He pānga kino tōna tūkinotanga ki ōna pānga whaiaro. I whakaritea e ia tana wahine me tana tamaiti ki UK ki te whakatū i te kāinga, engari nā tōna hokinga utu nui i puritia ai ana kaupapa. Ināianei kei te pupuri a Tony i ana rīhīti toa petipeti mai i taua rā hei whakamaumahara i te tere o tana ngaro i te mana ina anga atu ki te whakamatautauranga. E whakaaro ana a ia me nui ake te mahi a te umanga hei aukati i te ngaro o te mana o ngā kahunga pēnei i a ia. I raro i te waehere whanonga o te umanga, me whakangungu ngā kaimahi katoa ki te tāutu me te āwhina i ngā kaipetipeti raruraru. Engari kotahi te wahine, e mahi ana mō tētahi atu kaihanga pukapuka kāore i whakaingoatia, i kī kāore i puta i ngā wā katoa. "Kāore anō ahau kia whakaakona. He mātārere noa iho tātau, ā, ka kīia kia hoatu mēnā kei te whakaaro mātou he raruraru tā te tangata. Engari mā te mahi i a koe anō i te pō, i te ata rānei, ka tino uaua ki te tohatoha i ngā mātārere me te kōrero ki ngā kiritaki e mārama ana te pōrearea," tana kī. I kī a Malcolm George, mai i te Association of British Bookmakers: "Ko te take ka whiwhi whakangungu te tangata e hono ana, e mahi ana i roto i tētahi toa petipeti." I kī a Coral i whakakāhoretia e ia nga whakaaro i whakaritea e te HAU. I tāpiritia i roto i tana kōrero: "E whakaatu ana ngā rangahau hauora o nā tata nei kua hinga ngā pāpātanga petipeti raruraru mai i te whakaurunga o ngā FOBT me te ngaronga o te kiritaki Coral toharite mō ia wātū i runga i tētahi FOBT e tata ana ki te £6-9. " Ko te whakaurunga o ngā tūnga whakahaere i runga ake i te £50 mai i Aperira i tērā tau, he rerekētanga hōhonu i roto i te whanonga kiritaki, ā, tata ki te 70% te whakahekenga o ngā tūnga i runga ake i taua taumata. "Kei te whakaritea ngā whakangungu, ngā utauta me ngā tukanga puta noa i te umanga kia kitea ai, kia parea hoki ngā kaipetipeti raruraru." Ka pāohotia te hōtaka o Wikitōria i ngā rā o te wiki i waenganui i te 09:00-11:00 i te BBC Two me te BBC News Channel.

title: Coronavirus: I hangaia te hōhipera i roto i ngā rā
summary: Kei te hanga te taone Hainamana o Wuhan i tētahi hōhipera i roto i ngā rā torutoru noa iho, hei tiaki i ngā tūroro e whakapaetia ana kei te pāngia e te coronavirus.
text: Ko te Hōhipera o Huoshenshan e 25,000 mita tapawhā (30,000 sq yd), ko tētahi o ngā hōhipera hou e rua e hangaia ana, kua whakaritea kia tuwhera i te Mane. I te 24 o Hānuere, i tere te whakawātea a nga kaikeri i te whenua e noho ai te hōhipera. E kii ana nga mana hauora o Haina e 304 nga tangata kua mate i te coronavirus, neke atu i te 14,000 nga keehi i te whenua me tua atu. Tata ki te 100 ngā kēhi i ētahi atu whenua e 22, tae atu ki ngā tāngata tokorua i te UK. Kua hipa atu te maha o ngā kēhi puta noa i te ao i tērā o te urutā Sars, i horapa ki ngā whenua neke atu i te rua tekau mā rua i te tau 2003. Neke atu i te 8,100 ngā kēhi o Sars - i pūrongotia i te wā o taua tīmatatanga. I tīmata te pakarutanga o te coronavirus i Wuhan, te kāinga ki te 11 miriona tāngata. E ai ki te pāpāho o te kāwanatanga, tata ki te 1,000 ngā moenga o te Hōhipera hou o Huoshenshan. Kua hautūtia e te kaipānui C KK mana o Haina ngā roma ora kia taea ai e te tangata te mātakitaki i ngā hōhipera e hangaia ana i te wā tūturu - ā, kua kitea he pānga tē mōhiotia. E kī ana te nūpepa o te Global Times, neke atu i te 40 miriona ngā tāngata e mātakitaki ana i ngā roma ora i Haina. Na te manakohanga o ngā whakaata i whiwhi ai ngā waka hanganga i te rongonui rerekē. Kua kitea e ngā kaiwhakaranu raima i a rātau anō me ngā ingoa kāinga pēnei i "The Cement King", "Big White Rabbit" me "The White Roller". Ko te Hōhipera o Huoshenshan i runga anō i te Hōhipera o Xiaotangshan, i whakatūria ki Beijing hei āwhina ki te rutu i te huaketo Sars i te tau 2003. I hangaia te Hōhipera o Xiaotangshan i roto i ngā rā e whitu, e kiia ana e whati ana i te pūkete o te ao mo te hanganga tere rawa o te hōhipera. "He pūkete tā Haina mo te whakaoti tere i ngā mahi ahakoa mō ngā kaupapa whakaharahara pēnei," te kī a Yanzhong Huang, he hoa matua mō te hauora ā-ao i te Kaunihera mo nga Whanaungatanga Tawahi. Rite tonu ki te hōhipera i Beijing, ko te Hōhipera o Huoshenshan he whare tōmua. I kī a Tēnā Huang ka mauria mai ngā kaipūkaha mai i tua o te whenua kia oti ai te hanganga i te wā tika. "Ko te mahi pūkaha te mea e pai ana a Haina. He pūkete tā rātou mo te hanga whare wharenui i te tere. He tino uaua tēnei ki ngā Uru ki te whakaaro. Ka taea te mahi," tana tāpiri mai. .

title: E ārahi ana te Aorangi Ao i te āpure me ngā whakaingoatanga Bafta Craft e iwa
summary: I te wā i rere ai a Planet Earth II ki ngā kaimātakitaki i tērā tau - ā, ināianei te āhua nei kua mīharo hoki a Bafta.
text: E iwa ngā tautapa i mua i ōna Tohu Mahi ā-tau, e whakanui ana i muri i ngā pūmanawa tirohanga i roto i te pouaka whakaata. E whitu ngā whakaingoatanga e whai ana i te whakaari Netflix The Crown, i te wā e ono ngā tautapa o te Kaiwhakahaere Pō o TE WĀ. Ka pānuitia ngā toa i te 23 o Āperira, e toru wiki i mua i ngā Tohu Pouaka Whakaata Bafta i te 14 o Me. Anei tētahi whakarāpopototanga o ēhea ngā hōtaka mō te aha. E rua ngā tautapa e whiwhi ana te rangatū hītori māori i roto i te whakatika: te pono me te oro: ngā kāwai pono, ā, kei runga hoki i te whakawhiwhinga pūoro taketake. Ko ōna whakaingoatanga e whā e toe ana kei roto katoa i te whakaahua: kāwai pono, ko te tikanga ka whakapūmautia te whakaaturanga kia mauria ki te kāinga kia kotahi neke atu rānei te whakawhiwhinga. Ko te kōrero pūkenga a Netflix o ngā tau tōmua o te kingitanga o te Kuini e kite ana i a Stephen Daldry rāua ko Pita Morgan e mōhiotia ana mō tā rāua aronga me tā rāua tuhituhi. He whakaingoatanga anō mō tōna hoahoa kākahu, hoahoa whakanao me ōna whakaahua me te tīrama, me ētahi atu hurihanga e haere ana ki ōna rākeitanga arokite me ōna taitara. Ko te urutaunga hopu a te AO o te pukapuka a John le Carre ka whiwhi i tētahi hurihanga kaiwhakahaere tino pai mō Susanne Bier, ā, e mōhiotia ana hoki mō tōna oro me te whakatika. Pēnei i te Karauna, kua whiwhi tautapa hoki mō tōna hoahoa whakanao, ngā rākeitanga arokite me ngā taitara. Me ngā topetope tītī pēnei i ngā mea i tākaro ai a Paora Dano i roto i te rangatū, ehara i te mea mīharo te urutaunga nui a te AO o te pukapuka a Tolstoy mō te hanga tino pai me te hoahoa makawe. Ko ērā atu whakaingoatanga e haere mai ana mō ōna pūoro, oro, hoahoa whakanao me ngā rākeitanga arokite. I neke atu te kōrero moepuku a Charlie Brooker mai i te Hongere 4 ki Netflix i tērā tau, he nekehanga kua tino pai te haere ki te British Academy of Film and Television Arts. Ka whiwhi a Seamus McGarvey i tētahi whakaingoatanga mō tana whakaahua i runga i te wāhanga Nosedive e whetū ana ki a Bryce Dallas Howard (i runga ake nei), ā, ko ētahi atu wāhanga e hamama ana mō tā rātou hoahoa kākahu, ā rātou rākeitanga arokite me tō rātou hoahoa makawe. Ka mōhiotia te whakaari ā-kaupapa o te Hongere 4 mō tētahi tuakiri pouaka whakaata e whakapaea ana ki ngā hara hītori mō tōna ahunga, te whakatika, te pūoro me te whakaahua. Tirohia te rārangi katoa o ngā whakaingoatanga i konei. Whāia mātou i Facebook, i Twitter @BBCNewsEnts, i Instagram rānei i bbcnewsents. Mēnā he huatau pūrākau tāu, īmēra entertainment.news@bbc.co.uk.

title: Taunga ohorere i Prestwick
summary: He hiranga te Taunga Rererangi o Prestwick ki te ōhanga o Ayrshire, koia te take e hiahia ana te kāwanatanga o Pākehā ki te mōrearea ki te tango i a ia, kaua e kite i te kati.
text: Douglas FraserĒtita Pakihi me te ōhanga, Pākehā He iti iho te hiranga ki ngā kaihaere rererangi me te umanga rererangi, koia te take i wero ai te kāwanatanga o Pākehā. Kua tutuki te wāhanga tuatahi o te wero. He uhi tōrangapū tōna. I haere atu a Nicola Sturgeon, me te kawenga mo te hanganga, ki te karo i te whakaingoatanga o te manapori i runga i te whakakotahitanga. I whakamāramatia e ia kua whakatūria kētia te rangatiratanga tūmatanui o ngā taunga rererangi, ā, kāore i te tautohetohe i ngā Highlands me ngā Moutere, ā, i ngā wāhi maha ki te tonga. Ahakoa i pōhiritia e Tories te nekehanga, mehemea ka whakahokia te taunga rererangi ki ngā ringa tūmataiti i mua i te roa rawa. I mua rā ka hari rātau ki te whakararuraru i te mākete ina tae mai ki Prestwick. I a ia e MP ana i Ayr, ka whawhai te tōmuri o George Younger ki ngā wā o Te Aotearoa mā te pare i tōna tūnga waharoa mō ngā waka rererangi o Pākehā. Mai i tērā wā kua ngaro atu taua āhuatanga me te parenga, koia tētahi o ngā take i mahue ai a Prestwick. Ko te tikanga kia taea e te kāwanatanga o Pākehā te whakawhiti i te rangatiratanga mai i te umanga hanganga o Aotearoa o Infratil. Tirohia mai i Pōneke, pērā i te āhua nei e kitea ana te Pēke o Clydesdale mai i te tari matua o Melbourne, ko tētahi o aua rawa Pākehā ehara i te wāhanga o tētahi kōpaki whārite. Te āhua nei he tō i runga i te mahinga me te nekeneke i ngā huarahi e tata ana ki te kāinga. Engari i te whakawhitinga o te rangatiratanga, te āhua nei ko te wāhi e raruraru ana i te tangohanga. Ko te take i uaua ai te hoko i a Prestwick nā te mea kei te ngaro, ā, kei te kōpeketia e ōna tauwhāinga, nā ngā huringa i te mākete me tōna kiritaki kaha. Mai i te tīmatanga o tēnei tau, ko Ryanair anake te waka rererangi pāhihi kua whakaritea e whakamahi ana i Prestwick. E kī ana kua tukua ki Prestwick. He pūtake tiaki nui tōna i roto i tētahi tautau i te papa rererangi. Engari kāore anō te waka rererangi a Michael O'Leary kia whakaatu i te taumata o te whāinga e āhei ai te taunga rererangi ki te ā-pūtea. A, ehara i te mea e mōhiotia ana a ia ehara i te mea ko ana pūkenga whakahiko anake ki ngā pāhihi, engari mō ana mahi pakari kia heke iho ngā utu i ngā taunga rererangi e whakamahia ana e Ryanair, e mōhio ana a O'Leary ināianei me mahi te kāwanatanga o Pirihitini ki a ia, i runga i ana whakaritenga, kia kore ai e kati te taunga rererangi. He taumira, i ngā wā katoa ka whai kōwhiringa katinga a Infratil. He iti ake ngā waka rererangi o Prestwick e kōpeketia ana e ngā tauwhāinga whakataetae nui ake i Etinitini me Glasgow. Kua tīmata rātau ki te whakataetae tētahi ki tētahi mai i te wā i whakahaua ai a BAA ki te whakawātea i tētahi o rātou, e kōwhiri ana ki te hanga i taua Etinitini. Ko te tikanga kei te whai rātou i ngā wāhanga katoa o te mākete, tae atu ki ngā rererere pūtea kua ngana a Prestwick ki te whakairo i tētahi wāhi. Nō reira ki te hokona e ia a Prestwick, ko te kāwanatanga o Pirihitini te whakahaere i tētahi rawa me whakataetae ki ngā taunga rererangi nui rawa e rua o te whenua. Ehara pea tēnā i te wāhi hāneanea, ina ngana hoki ki te mahi tahi me rātou ki te whakatutuki i ētahi atu whāinga. Ko tā rātou katoa e kite ai, he iti ake ngā waka rererangi hei whai. Kei te whakatōpū te umanga. Kaore i roa, tērā pea ka heke iho tātau ki ngā waka rererangi Pākehā e rima; British Airways/Iberia, Air France/KLM, Lufthansa, EasyJet me Ryanair. E hiahia ana rātou kia kaua e whakararuraru i tā rātou mahere ara ki ngā ūnga Pākehā maha, mēnā ka taea e rātou te karo. Nā reira, ahakoa ka mauria rātou e te utu ki ngā wāhi pēnei i Prestwick, ka haere hoki rātou ki ngā tāone e tino ngāwari ai te hoko ki ā rātou pāhihi. Kei te mahi a Ryanair, e whakamahi ana i Etinitini mō ētahi atu whāranu whakaroto/putahoatu, mō tēnei wā. Hub and spokes That adds up to very few options to secure Prestwick's future, while there's a big bill to bring its facilities up to scratch. He pai ki te whakahaere utanga. I mua he ariā tērā pea he taunga rererangi nui, i tawhiti atu i ngā tāone, hei pokapū tuari mō ngā utanga nui o te Atahanganui, e kohikohi ana i ngā kōrero puta noa i Uropi, me te tuku atu ki tōna haerenga ki te uru. A, i tua atu, koia anō. He pono, i whakapono i mua ka taea e ngā waka pāhihi te haere pērā, ā, i tētahi ara, engari e arotahi ana ki ngā taunga rererangi o te taone nui. Ahakoa he aha te tirohanga, kāore anō te mākete kia whanake i tētahi huarahi e āwhina ana i a Prestwick. Ā, ko tōna raruraru he whakamaumahara he tawhiti rawa atu i te tino pai te toru o ngā taunga rererangi ao whānui e whakataetae ana puta noa i te waenganui o Pākehā. Kei te whakaatu te Taunga Rererangi o Manatū (nā ngā kaunihera ā-rohe) me pēhea e taea ai e tētahi pokapū mō tētahi rohe nui te whakataetae ki Rāwāhi me te whakawhanake i ngā hononga hāngai o te ao whānui. He nui ake a Pākehā i te rohe, engari kāore i te arotahi o te ngohe.

title: E whakakāhore ana a Will Smith kua tautuhia ia ki te whakarerekē i a Jada Pinkett
summary: Kua pānuitia e Will Smith rāua ko tana wahine ko Jada Pinkett kāore rāua i te wehewehe.
text: I tukuna e te tokorua he kōrero i muri i te pūrongo a te pukapuka In Touch Weekly kua tautuhia rāua ki te whakarerekē. "Ahakoa e manawapa ana mātou ki te urupare ki ēnei momo pūrongo, he tino hē ngā rongo e rere ana mō tō mātou pātahitanga," ka kī rātau. "Kei te noho tahi tonu mātou. Kai te mau tonu to māua mārena." I mārena rāua i te tau 1997 i muri i te tūtakitanga i runga i te huinga o The Fresh Prince of Bel Air. Tokorua ā rāua tamariki. Ko ta rāua tama 13 tau, ko Jaden, i whetū ki te Karate Kid me Ake Chan i tērā tau. Ko ta rāua tamāhine ko Willow, e 10 tau te pakeke, i whiwhi i tētahi taunga tekau o runga ki tana takitahi tuatahi ko Whip My Hair.

title: Ngā whakapae pāparapara o Guildford: Ka tautuhia e te koroni te rā whakarongo tōmua
summary: Tērā pea ka puta ake te pātai nā wai i pohū a Guildford i roto i tētahi whakarongo tōmua ki ngā whakapae pāremata IRA o te taone i te tau 1974, kua kī ngā rōia.
text: Kua whakaūngia e te tari o Te Koroni o Surrey tētahi whakarongo ka tū i te Pipiri ki te matenga o ngā tāngata tokorima i roto i ngā pahūtanga. I Birmingham, e tono ana te koroni pomu pāpara, a Tā Peter Thornton QC ki tētahi whakahaere ā-ture mēnā ka taea te whakaingoa i ngā pomu whakapae i roto i tētahi uiuinga. I kī a Christopher Stanley, mai i KRW Law, tērā pea ka puta mai he take ōrite ki Guildford. I whakataua e Tā Pita e kore nga ingoa o nga pomu whakapae e noho hei wāhanga o nga uiuinga hou, engari i whakakorea e te Kōti Tiketike te whakataunga. I kī a Tēnā Kānata tērā pea ka rite tonu ngā whakarongo i Woking ki te whakarongo a te Kōti Pīra ki te whakaingoa i ngā pomu whakapae o Te Kōti. "Tērā pea ka puta mai ngā take ōrite i roto i ngā uiuinga a Guildford i tukuna ai te whakapae hē o te Whā o Guildford me tētahi whakaurunga mārama e tētahi wae ratonga hohe o IRA ā muri ake," te kī a Tēnā Kānata. Ka tū te koroni o Te Rūnanga o Te Rūnanga o Te Rūnanga o Te Rūnanga o Te Wā Kāore anō kia mutu ngā kōrero taketake i ngā tau kotahi mano e whitu tekau mā rua. I Birmingham, e 21 ngā tāngata i mate, ā, e 182 ngā tāngata i whara i te putanga o ngā pomu e rua i roto i ngā pāremata o te taone nui i te tau 1974. E rima nga whakaekenga a Guildford i mate, e 65 i whara. I muri i nga whakaekenga, ka hē te whakawhiu i te Ono o Te Ono me te Whā o Te Whā, i te wā i hereheretia hētia te Whitu o Maguire i runga i ngā whakapae pakū. I tukua katoatia te 17 ā muri ake. I te tau 1976, i whakapuakina e te wae o Balcombe Street o IRA te kawenga mo nga whakaekenga o Guildford, engari kāore i whakataua. A, i tērā tau, ka kī te kaihanga pomu IRA a Michael Hayes he wāhanga ia o te rōpū e haepapa ana ki ngā mahi pāhekoheko o Te Aotearoa. Kāore tētahi tangata i whakataua ki aua whakapae mai i te wā i whakawāteatia ai te Ono o Birmingham i te tau 1991. I tono a KRW mō tētahi whakarongo hou ki ngā whakaekenga a Guildford i muri i te whiwhinga o ngā pepa mō te kēhi mai i tētahi uiuinga tautohetohe ki te matenga o te tika a Tā John May. I rere te uiui a Tā Hoani mai i te tau 1989 ki te 1994, ā, i arotakea hoki te uiui taketake a Pirihimana o Te Pirihimana e te ope Avon me Somerset i te tau 1987. Engari i kī a Tēnā Stanley: "Kāore anō kia whakautua ngā pātai matua ahakoa he uiui pirihimana o waho me tētahi uiui tūmatanui ingoa i arahina e Tā John May." Ka kī a ia: "E mōhio ana mātou kāore he tūhuratanga pirihimana e haere tonu ana ki ngā whakapae. " Ko te uiuinga tīmata anō tētahi tikanga mō te tīmata i tētahi tūhuratanga ki ngā āhuatanga katoa e karapoti ana." I te whakarongo a tērā marama, ka tohu a KRW Law i te whānau o tētahi o te hunga i mate i roto i ngā pahūtanga o Guildford me tētahi hōia tōmua i ora. Kua tono ngā kiritaki e rua kia kaua e whakaingoatia. Of the Guildford Four - Paul Hill, Paddy Armstrong and the late Gerry Conlon and Carole Richardson - KRW are representing Mr Conlon's family and lawyers have been instructed for Mr Armstrong and the family of Ms Richardson.

title: Ka tūhura te kawanatanga o Kānata i te 'kēmu' whakahāwea i tākarotia e ngā kaimahi o te hōhipera
summary: E uiui ana tētahi kawanatanga o Kānata i ngā kerēme i tākaro ngā kaimahi rongoā i tētahi "kēmu" whakahāwea mā te tūpono i te taumata waipiro toto o ngā tūroro taketake.
text: Ko ngā kerēme, e pā ana ki ngā kaimahi i tētahi hōhipera o British Columbia, i muri i te tāpaetanga a tētahi kaiārahi hapori i tētahi amuamu i te Tāite. I karangatia e te Minita Hauora a Adrian Dix nga whakaaro he "whakarihariha" a kua utua e ia he kaitirotiro takitahi. Kaore a ia e kī ko tēhea hōhipera i whakaingoatia i roto i te amuamu. "Ko te whakapae kei te tākarotia he kēmu hei tūhura i te taumata waipiro toto o ngā tūroro i roto i ngā rūma ohorere, engari ki ngā tāngata taketake me ētahi atu pea. A, ki te pono, he whakahāwea, he whakahāwea, ā, he tino pānga ki te tiaki manawanui," te kī a Tēnā Dix ki tētahi hui pānui i te Paraire. Kaore a ia i kī mehemea ka anga atu ētahi kaimahi ki te mahi whakatinanatanga. I tapaina te kēmu ko "The Price is Right", i muri i te whakaaturanga kēmu rongonui. I ngaro ngā kaimahi mēnā i whakaaro rātau i runga ake i te tepenga waipiro toto tūturu. I tākarotia te kēmu i te wā i whakaaetia ngā tūroro taketake ki te hōhipera, engari tērā pea he ūnga ētahi atu iwi, te kī a Tēnā Dix. I whakaingoatia e te amuamu taketake tētahi hōhipera, engari i kī a ia ka tirohia e te tūhuratanga ngā whakaaro whakahāwea a ngā kaimahi puta noa i te pūnaha rongoā, ā, i tūmanako ia kia nui ake ngā take ka mārama. Mā Mary Ellen Turpel-Lafond, te Māngai o mua mō ngā Tamariki me te Taitamariki i te kawanatanga, e ārahi te tūhuratanga. I whakaputaina te amuamu e Daniel Fontaine, CEO of Métis Nation British Columbia, i muri i te kōrero a tētahi kaimahi rongoā i te kēmu i te wā o tētahi wātū whakangungu haumaru ahurea taketake o San'ya. E kī ana a ia kāore a ia i te ohorere, ā, kua mōhio te kāwanatanga ki te whakahāwea i roto i te pūnaha rongoā mō ngā tau. "Tērā tētahi mea tino hē i konei i tua atu i te Utu e Tika ana. Kotahi noa iho te kēmu o te Utu," tana kī atu ki a KOE. I kitea e tētahi pūrongo 2019 a te Canadian Partnership Against Cancer mā te whakakore i te whakahāwea ka whakapai ake i ngā hua o te mate pukupuku, i te mea ka nui ake te whakawhirinaki a ngā tūroro ki ā rātou kaiwhakarato rongoā. I kitea e tētahi pūrongo ā-motu i te tau 2015 ko First Peoples, Second-Class Treatment ko te whakahāwea ki ngā iwi taketake i roto i te pūnaha hauora i āwhina ki ō rātou putanga hauora rawakore, i whakaritea ki ngā Kānata ehara i te taketake.

title: Ko te tumuaki G20 hei arotahi ki te raruraru nama o te rohe ūropi
summary: Te āhua nei, ka taea e ngā tihi G20 te whakarerekē. Kotahi te aromatawai o te hui tuarua i pēnei ai: "He tino angitu ki te whakatū i te taka o te āhua o te ao whānui".
text: Nā Andrew WalkerBBC World Service Economics correspondent He tohunga tērā i te Brookings Institution, he kura whakaaro o Washington, e tuhituhi ana mō te tumuaki G20 o Rāwāhi o Aperira 2009 . Ināianei ehara tēnā i te tirohanga tiritiri whānui. Ko te tikanga, tērā te whakahē i te tūranga o te whakanui moni - he utu tāke me te hokohoko tūmatanui. Engari te āhua nei he kotahitanga o te whāinga me te nui o ngā mahi tōtahi mai i te tihi o Rāwāhi, i te āhua o ngā tikanga whakanui me te āwhina nui ki te kaha whawhai ahi pūtea o te Pūtea Moni Ao Whānui (HŪR). I te wā tērā o te tārewa pūtea i muri i a Lehman. E toru tau i muri mai, kua uru te raruraru ki tētahi wāhanga kino hou. Ehara i te kino i taua wā - kāore anō - engari he mōrearea nui ki te āhua o te ao whānui. Nā reira ka taea e tātau te tūmanako i tētahi mahinga ōrite mai i te tihi G20 i te tauranga o Mehiko o Los Cabos? Kāore pea. Tērā tētahi rārangi whakawehenga tino mārama i tēnei tihi - te rohe ūropi me ērā atu. Neke atu i te rua tau te mate pūtea o te rohe ūropi e whakawehi ana i te hauora mo te āhua o te ao whānui. Kua kaha ake te mōrea i ngā wiki tata nei. Ko nga mōrearea ināianei ko te uaua o te nama a te kāwanatanga Pāniora i te mākete here me te rangirua tōrangapū i Kariki. Engari he maha ētahi atu huānga mōrearea. I mua i te tumuaki, he maha ngā waea mai i ētahi atu kaiārahi G20 mō ō rātou mema rohe ūropi kia mahi i te mahi tūturu hei whakaiti i te mōrearea o te horahanga o te mate. I a ia e haere ana ki te tihi, ka karanga te Pirimia o Īnia, o Manmohan Mahi, ki nga kaiārahi o Ūropi kia mahi i te "mahi tūturu". I kī te pokapū rongokōrero Hainamana whaimana, o Pakihi, me mahi tahi nga whenua o te rohe ūropi. Ko te mahi whakariterite e kore e kore tēnei e noho hei kaupapa nui o Los Cabos, me te hanga pēhanga i runga i nga kaiārahi rohe ūropi i te taumata, otirā ko te Tumuaki Tiamana o Hēnea Tūturu. Ko ngā mahi matua kia mau tonu ngā whenua rohe ūropi i a rātau anō - ko ngā nekehanga ki te whakaurunga nui ake kāore he mutunga o ngā kaiwaiata i karangatia, ā, te āhua nei kei te hīkoi atu rātau ki a rātau anō. He rerekētanga nui ina whakaritea ki te tihi o Rāwāhi, i reira i horahia whānuitia ai te hiahiatanga o te mahi pūmau. Ehara tēnā i te kī ka taea e te toenga te noho ki muri me te tāwai. Tērā ētahi mea ka taea e rātau, e ai ki te tautohetohe a Kōnata Paraone, te pirimia o mua nāna i tūtaki te tumuaki o te G20 o Rāwāhi. Hei tauira, ka taea e Haina me ngā kaiwhakarato hinu te āwhina i Uropi ki ngā moni, tērā pea mā te HŪRK. Ā, tērā pea he tūranga mō te mahi pēke matua i whakaritea ki te whakatikatika i ngā pēke me ngā mākete moni. Ahakoa he mārama tonu a Uropi ki te mōrearea nui, he raruraru anō kei tētahi atu wāhi i roto i te G20, e tīmata ana ki ngā rangatiratanga nui rawa e rua o te motu - te Hononga o Amerika me Haina. Kaore he whakakāhore he pai ake te mahinga o mua tata nei o te whakahaerenga o te US i a Uropi. I te hauwhā tuatahi o tēnei tau, i whakaritea ki te kore tupu i te rohe ūropi, he pai ake i te whakahekenga o ngā marama e toru o mua. Engari he tino anemia te US. Kua ngaro te āwhina o te hanganga mahi, ā, he take pai ki te māharahara ki ngā āhuatanga o te ohaoha. He raruraru anō tā te neke Hainamana o Te US ki te kaupapahere tōtika me ngā moni a te kāwanatanga. Ko ngā utu whakapau moni me ngā pikinga tāke ka pā a tērā tau, i runga i te āhua e whakaaro ohorere rawa ana te nuinga o ngā kaihoko. E kīia ana e ētahi he "pari tōtika" e anga atu ana ki a Mātau ki te kore e whakaae te whakahaere me te Rōpū Nui ki te hiki, ki te whakangāwari rānei i ngā mehua. Kua whakatūpato te Tari Pūtea o te Rōpū Nui ki te kore he mahi, tērā pea ka whakahekea. Ko te hinganga o te US he mea tino māharahara mō te toenga o te G20. Kei te pōturi haere te whakahaerenga o Haina, ko tētahi wāhanga nā te hinganga o ōna mākete kaweake o Ūropi. Kua tapahia e te pēke matua ngā mokatere huamoni, engari ka nui ake ngā whakataunga hei urupare me pēhea te urupare. Ko tētahi wero tino nui, engari he wā roa ake, he mea nui mō Haina me ērā atu o te ao, ko te neke tūmanako whānui o te whakahaerenga o te whenua mai i tōna whakawhirinakitanga ki ngā kawenga ake ki ngā hokohoko kiritaki Hainamana. Ko te whakahekenga i Īnia tētahi atu wāhi hira kia māharahara ai te G20. He pātai tino nui katoa, engari ko te take nui ināianei mō te āhua o te ao whānui, kāore i te tino hiahia ki te whakariterite G20. E hiahiatia ana e ia a Uropi, engari ko te rohe ūropi, hai whakatau i ana ake whakataunga uaua. Ka kī te toenga o te G20 i Los Cabos, engari ka whakaaro koe kāore e hiahiatia kia kōrerotia te rohe ūropi. Heoi anō, tērā pea he whakamaumahara whaitake ki ngā tūnga tiketike rawa ina heke iho ngā kaiārahi o Ūropi ki te umanga i tō rātou ake tihi iti iho i te rua wiki i muri iho.

title: Pakanga o Ingarangi: Flypast mo te huritau 75 o te 'Rā Uaua Rawa'
summary: Ko ngā rererangi tae atu ki te 18 Spitfires me ngā Hurricanes e ono kua rere ki runga i te tonga-rāwhiti o Ingarangi ki te tohu i te 75 tau mai i te Pakanga o Ingarangi "Hardest Day".
text: I maharatia te takahanga i te 18 o Aotearoa 1940, i te wā i whakaekea ai te Maunga Biggin o Bromley me ētahi atu turanga hōia ki te Tonga ki te Rāwhiti i te Luftwaffe o Tiamana. Ka mōhiotia ko te "rā tino uaua" i te wā o te pakanga. I mau tonu te Pakanga o Ingarangi puta noa i te raumati o te tau 1940. Ko te whakahau nui tuatahi tērā i whawhaitia katoatia i te hau. Ko te kaipānui o TE AO o Clark Ainsworth i Biggin Hill Kātahi te kitenga. Ko te mātakitaki i aua rererangi o te Pakanga Tuarua o te Ao e haere ana ki te rangi i runga ake i Biggin Hill. Ka pupuhi nga kaimātakitaki i a rātau e porowhita ana i te papa rererangi i roto i te hanganga. He hari te haruru o ngā mīhini Merlin me te aroha noa o te Hurricane, otirā ko ngā Spitfires, e piki ana, e pēke ana, e ruku ana, e raranga ana i te hau. Ināianei kua ū katoa nga rererangi me ngā kaimātakitaki i pōhiritia kia kite tata i a rātau me te tango pikitia. Ahakoa he ātaahua rātau ki te titiro ki runga i te whenua, kei te rangi e tino tiaho ana. Ko ngā whakamaharatanga o te Rā Uaua Rawa i roto i ngā pikitia i rere ai te Luftwaffe i ngā kōmaka 850, e 2,200 ngā kaimahi, i te wā i ātete te RAF me ngā kōmaka 927, e 600 ngā kaimahi. I ngaro te RAF me te Ope Rererangi o Tiamana i te 136 rererangi i te rā kotahi. Ko te whakamaharatanga motuhake, i whakatūria mai i te papa rererangi o mua o RAF i Biggin Hill, ināianei he taunga rererangi arumoni, e whakahonore ana i ngā kaihautū, ngā kaipūkaha, ngā kaipatu, ngā kaimahi mahi me ngā kaimahi whenua i anga atu ki te whakaeke i taua rā. BBC iWonder - He aha tātau i aroha ai ki te Spitfire? Neke atu i te 3,000 ngā kaimātakitaki i haere ki Biggin Hill ki te kite i te waka rererangi, tae atu ki te kaiārahi matua o Tony Pickering i rere i te "Rā Uaua Rawa". Ka kī a ia: "Kāore au i te whakaaro i mataku ahau. Me mātua whakarite koe kāore koe e tino ngākau nui. Kāore i taea e koe te mau i te ope rererangi o Tiamana ko koe anake. "He rawe te kite i ēnei rererangi. He rererangi ātaahua i hoahoatia, ā, kāore he pōhēhētanga. Ko te iwi nāna i hanga... He pai ta rātau mahi." I kī a Will Curtis, ko te kaiwhakahaere whakahaere o Biggin Hill Airport, he mea whakamīharo te Spitfire he "hari tonu ki te rere", me te tāpiri i te "hua tūturu" ki tōna kaihoahoa o RJ Mitchell. Ka kī a ia: "He tino pai, he pai te whārite, mēnā kāore i te pai ake te whārite, i te rererangi o nāianei." I tohua te rā ki ngā hanganga rererangi e toru, i wehe atu i te taunga rererangi i te 13:00 BST: I te 10 o Hōngongoi, ka whai wāhi ngā rererangi tae atu ki ngā Huripari me ngā Āwhā i roto i tētahi rerenga rererangi i runga i te Whare o Buckingham hei wāhanga o te huritau 75.

title: Whakapae patu tangata i muri i te matenga o te karapu pō o Sunderland
summary: Kua whakataua tētahi tangata ki te patu tangata i muri i te matenga o tētahi tangata i kitea i whara i waho o tētahi karapu pō.
text: I roto a Jordan Bell, e 27, i te hōhipera mai i te wā i kitea ai ia i te pokapū o te taone o Sunderland i te 21:00 BST i te 10 o Hōngongoi. I mate a ia i te Paraire e karapoti ana i tōna whānau, ka kī nga Pirihimana o Northumbria. Ko Dominic Robson, 26, o Birchwood, Sunderland, e tika ana ki te aroaro o te Kōti Kaiwhakawa o South Tyneside i te Mane. Ka kī ngā pirihimana: "Me rongo tonu mātou i tētahi tangata i kite i te mea i tūpono kia taea ai e koe te āwhina, tēnā whakapā mai." Whāia a TE Rāwhiti ki te Raki &Cumbria i Twitter, Facebook me Instagram. Tukuna ō whakaaro pūrākau ki northeastandcumbria@bbc.co.uk. Ngā Hononga Ipurangi Pātahi Pirihimana Northumbria

title: Taupānga EU: E kī ana a Arlene Foster 'tērā pea ka whakahekea te pire mō te tapahi tāke kaporeihana'
summary: Ko te minita tuatahi me tūhura ki te Pūtea Moni mēnā ka taea e te wehe atu i te EU te utu mo te whakaheke i te tāke kaporeihana i Aiarangi ki te Raki.
text: Nā Mark DevenportBBC News NI Kaiwhakatika Tōrangapū a Arlene Foster i kī a ia e whakaaro ana tērā pea he hua tōrunga tērā o te hua o te taupānga o tērā wiki. Engari i kī te Minita Tuarua Tuatahi o Mātini McGuinness e māharahara ana a ia ki tāna e whakaahua ana ko te "pomu" o Te Wānanga o Te Aotearoa. I pōti te UK ki te wehe i te EU mā te 52% ki te 48%. Heoi anō, ko te nuinga o ngā kaipōti i Aiarangi ki te Raki (56%) i kī e hiahia ana rātau kia noho tonu te UK ki te EU. Ko ngā MLAs o Stormont nāna i pūrua ngā taha Remain and Leave i roto i te taupānga i mau i tētahi taupatupatu - i ētahi wā - he taupatupatu pārekareka mō ngā hua o te pōti o Te Pōti. I kī ngā kaiwhakahauhau Pro-EU kua toa rātau i te whakahau i roto i Aiarangi ki te Raki, engari i whakamaharatia rātau e te taha Waiho ko te pātai i runga i te pepa pōti e pā ana ki te katoa o te UK. I kī a Tēnā McGuinness e whakapono ana a ia e anga ana a Stormont ki ngā whakamātautau nui kei mua. I kī a Mrs Foster, ehara i te mātakitaki pito, e hiahia ana a ia ki te arotahi ki nga whakaritenga o mua. I kī atu a ia ki ngā MLAs e hiahia ana a ia ki te tūhura mēnā ka taea e Te Pirihitini te whakaheke i te pire ka anga atu pea a Stormont ki te tapahi tāke kaporeihana. I tautohe hoki a ia, ko te tikanga o te putanga mai i te EU, ā muri ake nei, kāore e taea e Pōroa te kōrero ki te Kaiwhakahaere o Aiarangi ki te Raki me whakauru atu e rātau he utu wai.

title: Kupu tuarua o Tērā: He aha te tikanga mō Āwherika
summary: Ko ētahi tāngata o tēnei whenua i tūmanako nui ake mai i te tama a te tangata i tipu ake ki te heri koati i tētahi kāinga i te uru o Kenya.
text: Kotahi anake te haerenga pehu a Andrew HardingAfrica correspondent@BBCAndrewHon te Perehitini o Twitter o Te Perehitini o Te Pākehā ki Āwherika ā-roto i tana wā tuatahi, ā, i taua wā ka tino mārama kāore a ia e aro atu ki te whenua. "Ko te wā heke mai o Āwherika kei runga i ngā Āwherika," tana kī i Ghana, i roto i tētahi whaikōrero e whakaae mārire ana ki ngā whāititanga o te mana o Amerika i tētahi rohe e hokohoko ana ināianei ki Haina i a Mātau. Kia pēhea te nui o te rerekētanga i te wā tuarua o Tēnā Taupānga? Tērā pea kāore i tino mōhiotia taua pātai i roto i tētahi whakahau pōti e arotahi ana ki te pēhi i ngā take kāinga me ngā whakatikanga o Arapia. I roto i tana whaikōrero wikitōria, ka tohutoro anō a Tēnā Pakihi ki "te tekau tau o te pakanga" me "ngā tāngata i ngā iwi tawhiti... e whakararuraru ana i o rātau ora i tēnei wā kia whai wāhi ai ki te tautohetohe mō ngā take e tika ana, te wā ki te maka i a rātau pōti pēnei i a mātau i tēnei rā". I muri i nga tirohanga, kaore e tino riri tonu te hiahia o te matauranga o Amerika. Kāore he 'akoranga Taupānga' I te wā tuatahi, ko te arotahi i runga i ngā papā hōkai matua i Ivory Coast, Somalia, Sudan me South Sudan, tae atu ki tētahi pōti tata i Zambia. Tērā pea ka āwangawanga te tīmatanga o te wā tuarua ki ētahi atu mea ōrite: Ko ngā mahi a te ao whānui ki te tango i ngā hunga whakakeke e honoa ana e al-Mōrea mai i te raki o Mali - mā te kaha, te whakaritenga, ngā mea e rua rānei - me ngā mahi kia kore ai a Zimbabwe me Kenya e tārua i te tutu i tukituki ai i a rātau pōti whakamutunga. Mēnā ka tangohia e Kenya tētahi pōti wātea, tika hoki, tūmanakohia he haerenga tino wawe ki Nairobi e Air Force One. Nō tēnei wā, kāore he tohu o tētahi "akoranga taupānga" nui mō Āwherika - ā, tērā pea he mea pai tēnā i te rerenga kētanga me te matatinitanga o te whenua. Kua waiho e Tēnā Tūpāpaku ki ētahi atu ki te whakatūpato mo nga whakawhara i puta mai i tētahi Haina māhorahora. Engari tērā pea ka whai wāhi tōna wā tuarua ki te neke atu i ngā māharahara whakahawea, "whawhai ki te wehi" o Mali me Somalia, me te arotahi ki ngā take whānui ake - ko te hokohoko - i whakaarahia e ia e toru tau ki mua i Ghana.

title: Coronavirus: Tama, 11, e eke pahikara ana i te 400 maero hei whakamaharatanga ki te kuia
summary: Ko tētahi taitama 11 tau te pakeke e eke paihikara ana i te 423 maero (682km) i runga i tētahi paihikara whakapakari tinana hei whakamaharatanga ki tōna kuia tupuna i mate i te coronavirus.
text: Nā Neil HeathBBC News, East Midlands Ben Hunter e hipoki ana i te tawhiti mai i tōna kāinga i Inverness ki te wāhi i noho ai a Joyce Wilmot, e 88 ōna tau, i Matlock, i Derbyshire i runga i tētahi paihikara pateko. I kī tōna whaea a Wendy Hunter kua hipa a ia i te 43 maero (70km) i ia rā i roto i te māra ahakoa te huarere. Kei te kohi moni a Pene mō Te Waka Tūroro o Te Rangi o Te Rūnanga o Te Rū I hiahia a Mrs Wilmot, i mate i te 19 o Āperira, kia haere ngā koha mai i tōna nehunga ki te aroha, engari nā te raka ka kī a Mrs Hunter "kāore e taea e tētahi te haere atu". "I tata katoa mātau ki a ia, a, ka matekiri kāore i taea e mātau te heke iho mo te nehunga," tana kī. "I pouri a Pene kāore i nui te mea e taea te whakaara." I tāpiritia e ia i muri i tana whakaaweawe i a Kāpene Tom Moore, nāna i whakaara neke atu i te £32m mō ngā aroha NHS mā te whakaoti i te 100 hurihanga o tana māra. Mai i taua wā ka meinga a Capt Moore hei kānara hōnore. "Kei te whakaaro tonu a ia ki ētahi atu," tana kī. "Ehara i te mea mīharo i puta ake i a ia te ariā." I tīmataria e Pene, e hipa ana i te 70km (43 maero) i ia rā, tana wero i te Mane, ā, kua kohia e ia te £685. I te tuatahi i tūmanako a ia ki te whakaoti i te tawhiti i roto i te marama, engari e whakapono ana a Mrs Hunter ki te tere e haere ana ia, tērā pea a tērā wiki. "Kei te hīkoi atu a ia, ahakoa i roto i te marangai," tana tāpiri mai. I whakaahuatia e Chloe Bass, mai i Te Wānanga o Te Rūnanga o Te "E hiahia ana mātou ki te mihi nui ki a Pene. E mōhio tūturu ana ahau ka tino whakahīhī tōna tipuna tupuna. "We recognise that families can't say goodbye to their loved ones in the usual way during this difficult time, and really appreciate all donations that we receive in memory of them." Whāia a BBC East Midlands i Facebook, Twitter, Instagram rānei. Tukua ō whakaaro pūrākau ki eastmidsnews@bbc.co.uk

title: I hokona hētia e te kāreti o Poihākena ngā tīwhikete ki ngā ākonga mōrearea, e kī ana te kaitiaki
summary: Kua whakapaea tētahi kāreti tūmataiti i Poihākena e te kaitiaki kiritaki o Ahitereiria ki te hoko hē i ngā akoranga tīwhikete ki ngā ākonga mōrearea, e whiwhi ana i ngā miriona tāra i roto i ngā moni a te hau.
text: E kī ana te kaitiaki i whakawāteatia e te Kāreti Ao Whānui Ahurei ngā ākonga mō ngā utunga moni tārewa me te utu o ngā akoranga, e karanga ana i tōna whanonga "kāore i te mōhiotia". E kī ana ngā pūrongo pāpāho ka tonoa e ia te kāreti kia utua te A$57m (40.6m; £26.6m) i roto i te pūtea kāwanatanga. Kāore anō te kāreti kia kōrero. Kua whakaputaina tētahi kerēme ki te kāreti ki te kōti a te hau i muri i te tūhuratanga a te Australian Competition and Consumer Commission (ACCC) me New South Wales Fair Trading. E ai ki tētahi kōrero i te paetukutuku a ACCC, neke atu i te 3,600 ngā ākonga i rēhitatia e te kāreti i roto i ngā akoranga tīwhikete i roto i te tau ā-pūtea 2014-15, nāna i whiwhi i te pūtea kāwanatanga A$57m. Engari iti iho i te 3% o ngā ākonga i puta i te haurua tuarua o tērā tau. 'Māminga, tinihanga rānei' E whakapae ana te ACCC i haere ngā māngai hoko kāreti ki te kūaha me te tuku rorohiko pona koreutu hei tohutohu ki te waitohu mō ngā akoranga tuihono. Ko te nuinga o ngā tāngata i ūkuia e ia no ngā hapori Maori i ētahi o ngā wāhi tino tūkino o New South Wales. Ko ētahi he kore tuhituhi, he hauā rānei. Ko ērā e kiia ana kua ūkuia ko tētahi tangata hauā 19 tau, i raro i te tiaki a tōna kuia, i hainatia mō tētahi moni whakatārewa ākonga ahakoa kāore i whakamōhiotia ki te akoranga, ki te kāreti rānei, ka pūrongo pāpāho a Fairfax. E ai ki ngā pepa kōti, ka tonoa ngā ākonga kia waitohu i ngā puka kāore i mārama ētahi, ā, kāore i whakamōhiotia ka āhei rātou ki te utu nama tae atu ki te A$25,000 i raro i te aronui VET FEE-HELP a te kāwanatanga ina whiwhi rātou i te A$54,000. E whakapae ana te ACCC i te kāreti ki te whakauru ki te "whanonga māminga, tinihanga, tinihanga rānei" ina hokona ngā akoranga tīwhikete. "He mea nui kia hāngai ngā kāreti ki ngā ākonga tūpono, ā, ka whakamārama mārama i te utu o ngā akoranga e tukuna ana e rātou," te kī a Te Komihana Tauhokohoko Ataahua o NSW, a Rod Stowe. "Me tino mārama ngā kiritaki ki tā rātou e whakaae ana i mua i te whakatau kia waitohu ki tētahi akoranga. Ko te moni taurewa VET FEE-HELP e pā ana ki ngā ākonga he nama mo te roanga o te wā."

title: Faith school transport review is held in Somerset
summary: Kei te whakahaeretia tētahi arotakenga e te Kaunihera o te Takiwā o Somerset ki te tapahi i te waka kura whakapono hei tiaki i te £100,000 i te tau.
text: Kua kī te kaunihera e 200 ngā whānau ka pāngia. Ka āta tapahia mai i Mahuru 2014. I kī te mema kāpata Conservative, a Frances Nicholson, ko tētahi o ngā mana ā rohe whakamutunga i te whenua e tuku tonu ana i te ratonga. E ātete ana te Pihopatanga o Clifton i ngā tapahi, engari kua kī te Pihopatanga o Bath and Wells e kore e tino pānga. I kī a Mrs Nicholson: "E mōhio ana te nuinga o ngā tāngata kei raro ngā kaunihera i te nui o te pēhanga me te whakaiti i te pūtea mai i te kāwanatanga. Me mātua whakarite tātau ko ia pauna e whiwhi ana tātau ki aua whānau e tino hiahia ana. "Where families are on low income we will continue to support them, but for other families choosing to send children a long way, often outside Somerset, then it is only fair that we should ask whether they should pay the full costs" Wells Liberal Democrat MP Tessa Munt called the move "discriminatory", and urged families affected to contact the leader of the council to "make sure their views are known". Ko ngā whānau māharahara Ko tētahi kura e ātete ana i ngā kaupapa ko te Kura Tuatahi Katorika o Hato Hohepa me Hato Teresa i Wells. Headteacher Angela Nolan said: "It's going to have a big impact on some of the families that are in my school. " I tēnei wā e utu ana tētahi whānau i te £400 hei tuku i tētahi tamaiti ki te kura tuarua - arā, ko St Gregory's i Banes [Bath and North East Somerset Council area]. "If the subsidy is cut they may have to pay around £800 per child, and that's simply unaffordable for many of our families who have three or four children who they would like to send to a Catholic secondary school." The council has said parents choosing a faith school pay on average £230 of an average annual cost of about £650 per child. E kore ngā huringa e marohitia ana e pā ki ngā here ā-ture pēnei i ērā e hiahia ana ki te mātauranga motuhake. Ka nui ake hoki te tautoko mō ngā whānau i runga i ngā moni iti hei wāhanga o ngā mahere. I kī te tumuaki o ngā kura me ngā kura mō te Pihopatanga o Clifton, a Colleen Collett: "He tino poto te kite i a rātou. " Ahakoa ka taea pea e rātou te hoatu i tētahi tau tūturu i tēnei wā ki te rohe tūmatanui o ngā mea ka tiakina e rātou, ko te mea pono kāore pea rātou e tiaki i tēnā nā te mea me tiki tonu ngā tamariki ki te kura."

title: Ngā taupānga dating: Tinder, Chappy me Bumble 'iti rawa te manakohia' ki te tūtaki i ngā tāngata
summary: Ko ngā taupānga dating te huarahi iti rawa e manakohia ana ki te tūtaki i tētahi tangata hou - ahakoa neke atu i te haurua o ngā pakeke 16-34 tau e whakamahi ana, e huatau ana tētahi uiuinga Radio 1 Newsbeat.
text: Nā Daniel Rosney & Roisin HastieNewsbeat ngā kaipānui tata ki te tuatoru o te hunga e whakamahi ana i ngā taupānga pēnei i a Tinder, Chappy me Bumble nā te mea he "whakamā rawa" rātou ki te whakatata atu ki ngā tāngata e tūtaki ana rātou ki te tangata. E tohu ana hoki e tata ana ki te haurua o te hunga e whakamahi ana i aua mahi mō te wā tuatahi i mua i te 21 o ō rātou tau. Ā, tata ki te tuatoru e tūmanako ana kia kitea he "pātahitanga wairangi, wairangi rānei" i runga i ngā taupānga. Neke atu i te hauwhā o ngā tāngata e 2,066 i pātaitia e whakamahi ana i ngā taupānga dating, kua hangaia he pātahitanga mo te wā roa, he mārena rānei. E whakapono ana te kaimātai hinengaro pātahitanga o Madeleine Mason Roantree he tokomaha atu ngā tāngata e whakamahi ana i ngā taupānga dating nā te mea e hiahia ana rātou ki tētahi whakatika inamata. "Ina ōrite mātou he rite tonu ki te patu dopamine iti - ka whakamārama i te pūoko ahuareka i roto i tō tātau roro kia tino whakawaia," tana whakamārama. Engari e kī ana a ia ka āhei hoki ki te āhua o te pouri i te wā e whakatuwhera ana te tangata i a rātau ki te ākiritanga anō. He aha te huatau a te uiuinga? I tangohia mai i tētahi uiuinga YouGov o ngā pakeke 2,066 16-34 tau i whakahaeretia mō te Reo Irirangi 1 Newsbeat i te 3 - 10 April 2018. E whakaae ana a Horano e rua tekau mā ono tau ki a Madeleine: "He maha ngā take i tīmataria e ngā taupānga mātāmua ki taku hauora hinengaro - me te rangirua me te māharahara," tana kī atu ki a Newsbeat. " I ngā pō i kitea ai e au he uaua ki te tūtaki i ngā tāngata, nā reira kua haere ahau ki tētahi taupānga i a au e tū ana i runga i te papa kanikani. "Te āhua nei he pūhara rātou e whakaaro ai te tangata ka taea e rātou te haere atu ki te kōrero i ngā mea kāore rātou e kōrero ki tō kanohi. " E whakawāteatia ana koe mō te tangata kei runga i te mata, ehara mō te tangata ko koe, ā, ki a au he tino uaua ki te mahi." Ko te kōrero ki ngā tāngata i runga i ngā taupānga he "huarahi ki te tūhono ki ngā tāngata kāore pea e taea e koe te tūtaki kē", ka whakamārama a Sam Dumas mai i Chappy. "Kua kite mātou i te ia o ngā mokowā ōkiko o ngā pae me ngā karapu e kati ana - kua iti ake rātou i roto i ngā tau." I whakaaturia e Newsbeat he pēhea te haurua o ngā karapu pō o UK i kati i o rātau tatau i roto i te 10 tau noa iho. Koia tērā te take i huri ai a Jamie rāua ko Ivana, e 32 rāua, ki ngā taupānga mātāmua e toru tau ki mua. "I kitea e au kāore i taea e koe te tūtaki i ngā tāngata i roto i ngā pae," te kī a Ivana ki a Newsbeat. I tūtaki te tokorua i Bumble, ā, kua taumau ināianei, e ono marama ki te haere i te ao. "Kua rerekē te ao ināianei - kua whakaritea ngā mea katoa ki te tuihono," ko te whakamārama a Jamie, nō Stirling, mai i Pākihi. "Me whai wāhi noa koe me te hoatu i te painga o te rangirua ki te tangata. " He nui ngā āhuatanga tōraro e haere mai ana me te dating tuihono, me ngā taupānga, engari kua kitea e mātou e mahi ana." Kāore i taea e Ivana te whakaae anō, e kī ana: "He pōrangi te whakaaro i tīmata tēnei katoa mā te miri ki te taha matau." Whāia Newsbeat i Instagram, Facebook me Twitter. Whakarongo ki Newsbeat live i te 12:45 me te 17:45 i ia rā o te wiki i te Reo Irirangi 1 me te 1Xtra - ki te hapa koe i a mātou ka taea e koe te whakarongo mai ki konei.

title: TEDGlobal: Ngā kitenga o te wā heke mai o te rere
summary: Ehara pea te rererangi me te hanganga reihi i te huarahi pai rawa atu ki te rere, engari ko tētahi o ngā ariā toitū e pā ana ki te āhua o tātau haere ā muri ake nei.
text: Nā Jane WakefieldTechnology reporter i whakaaturia tētahi tauira o te rererangi, i hoahoatia e Airbus, i te hui TEDGlobal i Etinitini. Mā te tango i te whakaaro mai i te anga tangata, he kaha, he māmā hoki te hoahoa. Ko te tikanga o tēnei, i roto i te ariā, ka tino whakaheke i ngā utu hinu o te rere. I kī te kamupene o Ūropi ko te whāinga kia tā Ahu-3 i ngā rauemi hiato e hanga ai i te hanganga. I waihangatia te rererangi ariā e tētahi tīma kaipūkaha hanganga i Airbus. Ko ētahi atu whakaaro mō te waka rererangi ā muri ake ko tētahi ānau whakarunga i runga i te hiku hei whakaata i te turituri mīhini whakarunga me te whakaiti i te pokenga turituri. I roto i te rererangi, ka whakaarohia e ngā kaipūkaha o Hītori he "rohe" hou hei whakakapi i ngā tūru tūturu, me ngā tūru "whakarerekē" e āhei ana ki te hauhake i te pūngao mai i te hunga e noho ana i roto, me te huri i te hanga kia uru ki te rahi o ngā pāhihi. I mua o te waka rererangi, ka huatau te tīma ki te noho me ngā pūoko tāpiri e āhei ana ki te aroturuki i te hauora. Tērā pea he rohe kēmu, e taea ai e ngā pāhihi te tākaro hākinakina mariko. I whakahuatia hoki, kaua e whai tatau iti ki roto i te waka rererangi, pērā i tēnei wā, ka whānui ake ngā tomokanga o ngā rererangi o te wā heke mai e taea ai e te tangata te waiho ā rātou kawenga ringa. Kātahi ka tukua aunoatia ngā pēke ki ō rātou tūru, e ārai ana i ngā raruraru o ngā ara ārai, ko te tikanga kia tere ake te ekenga. I kī te kaipūkaha o Hītori, a Bastian Schaefer: "Me noho utu tonu te rere ā muri ake nei mō ngā tāngata me tētahi tirohanga taiao." Heoi anō, i whakaae a ia e kore te hoahoa anake e whakatika i ngā raruraru katoa o tana umanga. "Kei te pau te hinu mātou, ā, me kimi rongoā anō," tana kī. "Ka taea ētahi o ēnei mā te hangarau, engari kei te kimi hoki mātou i ngā kora whirinoa." I te taha o tōna ake waka rererangi, ka werohia hoki e te kaiwhakanao rererangi ngā ākonga o te ao ki te whakawhanake i ā rātou ake whakaaro rauropi mō te rererangi, e rima ngā tīma whakamutunga i tīpakohia i tēnei wiki. Kei roto i o rātau whakaaro: E whakaaro ana a Tēnā Schaefer he ariā tino pai te whakahiko i ngā rererangi mā te kohikohi me te whakangāwari i te kau kau mehemea ka taea te mahi. "Tekau tau ki muri i tērā te huatau kia whakamahi i te hauwai wai, engari kei te tatari tonu mātou ki tētahi tangata kia tuku i ngā tikanga rokiroki pai mō tēnei," tana kī.

title: Mahamadou Issoufou o Niger - he aha i toa ai ia i tētahi whakawhiwhinga $5m
summary: Kia whiwhi ai i te tohu 2020 Ibrahim mō ngā kaiārahi o Awherika, me te whakawhiwhinga $5m (£ 3.6m) e āpiti ana ki a ia, me wehe te Perehitini o Niger a Mahamadou Issoufou i te tari.
text: Nā Lalla SyBBC News Ko tana whakatau kia hīpae i muri i ngā whakaritenga e rua, ko te tikanga ka whiwhi a Niger i te tauwhiro manapori tuatahi i waenganui i ngā kaiārahi i pōtitia mai i te wā i noho motuhake ai i Wīwī, neke atu i te 60 tau ki mua. Engari ehara tēnā i te take anake i hoatu ai ki a ia te whakawhiwhinga - ka whakamihi te komiti whakawhiwhinga ki tana ārahitanga i muri i te whiwhinga o tētahi o ngā rangatiratanga rawakore o te ao. E kī ana kua "whāngai a ia i te tupu o te ohaoha, i whakaatu i te whāinga tūturu ki te pūmautanga ā-rohe me te kaupapa ture, me te toa i te kāwanatanga ā iwi o Awherika". Mo tētahi whakawhiwhinga kāore anō kia whakawhiwhia i roto i ētahi tau nā te kore toa tika, kaua e tangohia ngā taipitopito tuakiri a Tēnā Issoufou. Mēnā e hiahia ana te pakeke e 68 tau ki te noho mana, tērā pea ka taea e ia te tārua i ētahi atu perehitini puta noa i Awherika ki te Uru, nāna i taea te whakarerekē i te kaupapa ture kia taea ai e rātau te whakaroa i to rātau wā i te tari. Engari kāore ōna whakapae i tuku i a ia kia pērā, ka kī atu a ia ki te AO i mua i te pōtitanga o tērā marama. "E manaaki ana ahau i te kaupapa ture. E whakanui ana ahau i te kī taurangi i whakaritea e au ki te iwi o Niger, nāna i homai ki a au te hōnore o te ārahi i a rātau mo nga whakaritenga e rua. E hāngai ana tēnei whakataunga ki ōku whakaponotanga me taku kitenga he aha te wā heke mai o te manapori o Niger," tana kī. Ko tōna wāhi kotahi o te ātetetanga ko Niger te iwi rawakore o te ao, e ai ki ngā tūnga whanaketanga o te UN mō ngā whenua e 189 - e raruraru ana ki ngā taurakitanga auau, te tauwhāinga me te rawakore whānui. I tēnei wā kei roto i ngā papā e rua, arā, he maringi mai i ngā whawhai toa i Burkina Faso, i Mali, i Naria, nāna i whakahau ngā rau mano kia rere i o rātau kāinga. Ko ngā rōpū e honoa ana ki al-Mōrea, ko te rōpū o te Kāwanatanga o Ingarihi me te Rūnanga o Naria kei Niger, engari i ngā tikanga o te nuinga o ngā whakaekenga, he iti iho i ōna hoa noho tata. Ko ngā toa o mua o te whakawhiwhinga o Ihu: Engari ko te tuma tinihanga o te Rūnanga tētahi wāhi ātetetanga mō Tēnā Issoufou i a ia e takatū ana ki te ringa i tērā marama i muri i te 10 tau o ngā whakaritenga e rima tau e whai ake nei i te tari. "Mēnā he whakahēnga tāku, arā, kai te pāngia tonu mātau e ngā whakaekenga pūtohu. Engari e hiahia ana ahau ki te āwhina i konei kāore he wera o te pūtōraru i te tīariari i Niger. "No nga whenua noho tata e haere mai ana nga kaiwhakataetae ki te whakaeke i a mātau. A, ki te titiro tātau ki ngā mea kua mahia ahakoa tēnei take, he mea whakamīharo," tana kī. Kua ngana hoki a Tēnā Issoufou ki te panoni i a Niger - kua kite te pūmatua o Niamey i ngā huarahi hou, ngā hōtēra me ngā pūtahi hui. Engari e kī ana ngā kaiwhakawāwā kāore anō ētahi atu wāhi o te whenua kia whai hua mai i aua pūtea penapena. He waharoa hītori i waenganui i Awherika ki te Raki me Āwherika ā-roto, kua noho a Niger hei ara whakawhiti nui mō ngā kaiheke e haere ana ki Uropi. I konei, kua whakaae ki te mahi tahi me te Uniana o Ūropi ki te whakatū i te rere. E anga ana hoki ki ngā uauatanga o te ohaoha hei kaweake matua, te konupūmā, ki ngā huaketo utu Ko te mahi o te haere tonu i ngā whāinga katoa i mahia e Tēnā Issoufou i roto i te hanganga me te haumarutanga ināianei e taka ana ki runga i tana kaiwhakakapi ā-ringa, o Whiriwhiri Bazoum, nāna i toa i te pōtitanga o Hui tanguru. Me mahi a Tēnā Bazoum ki tētahi tauwhāinga e riri ana i runga i ngā aroaro e rua, me te ātete e whakaaro ana ehara a ia i te toa tika o te pōti. Mō Tēnā Issoufou, i karangatia hei "ārahi i tōna iwi i runga i tētahi ara kauneketanga", ka maumaharatia ia ko te tangata nāna i āwhina i a Niger ki te whakataka i te tūtohu "whenua o Awherika ki te Uru", ā, he tawhito tērā ka roa ake i tana moni whakawhiwhinga $5m.

title: Coronavirus: Ko te kaiwhaiwhai hūnuku 'i haere me te kore kai' i roto i te raka
summary: E kī ana tētahi kaimahi o mua o nga Iwi o te Hononga o te Ao e rapu ana i te whakangungu i Weera, i haere a ia me te kore kai mo te wiki i te wā o te raka.
text: Nā Jordan DaviesBBC News Kāore te wahine, kāore i te hiahia kia mōhiotia nā ngā tuma i tōna whenua kāinga, kāore i kai kia taea ai e ia te whāngai i ana tamariki. Ka whiwhi ngā kaiwhaiwhai hūnuku i te £37.75 i te wiki me te £5 mō tētahi pēpi i raro i te kotahi, me te £3 mō tētahi tamaiti i waenganui i te kotahi me te toru. I kī te Tari Kāinga kua mahia e ia he "mahi whakapūmau" ki te tiaki i ngā kaiwhaiwhai i te wā o te taiepa. I kī te wahine, e hiahia ana kia kīia ko Kēdija, i whakamīharo a ia i ngā mea i whakamanawanuitia e ngā kaiwhaiwhai whakangungu - otirā ko ngā wāhine whai tamariki - i te wā o te raka, ā, i kī kua whakaaturia e te taiepa te iti o te tautoko e whiwhi ana rātau. 'Kua warewaretia' Ahakoa te rere i te tutu i tōna whenua kāinga, ka kī a Kēdija ko tōna wā i Uēra i te wā o te raka ko "te wā tino kino o tōku oranga". I kī a ia he uaua ki a ia te whakapā atu ki te NHS i a ia e pā ana ki ngā tohu coronavirus nā te kore mōhiohio mō wai hei whakapā atu, ā, i kī kua "warewaretia" ngā kaiwhaiwhai i Wales i te wā o te taiepa. "Tata tonu ki te rua marama kāore tētahi tangata i pōrearea ki te waea mai ki a mātau," tana kī. "Kāore i taea e au te waea atu ki tētahi tangata nā te mea kāore aku nama pūkoro. " I tino warewaretia ngā kaiwhaiwhai katoa e mōhio ana ahau, kāore tētahi tangata i whakapā atu ki a rātou, kāore he tangata i pātai mai mēnā e hiahia ana rātou ki tētahi mea, mēnā rānei kei a rātou ngā tohu, mēnā rānei kua kino ake ō rātou tohu. "Kāore i nui a mātau kai - i te ngana noa ahau ki te ora." I kī a ia kāore i whiwhi mōhiohio mai i te Tari Kāinga, e whai mana ana ki ngā kaiwhaiwhai. I kī a Khadija, e whiwhi ana ināianei i te tautoko e hiahiatia ana e ia, i kino tōna āhuatanga i ngā utu whakamakoha i te wā o te raka, otirā i ngā toa paetata. I kī a ia kua "whakangaromia" ia e te raka i a ia "ā-hinengaro, ā-tinana hoki" ā, ka ngaro i a ia te taumaha me te kore kai kia tino mōhio ai ka taea e ana tamariki te kai. I whakaputaina e Sisters not Strangers, he tauwhāinga aroha e tautoko ana i ngā kaiwhaiwhai, tētahi pūrongo i kitea ai kua pokanoatia ngā wāhine, kua whakahaua kia mahi i ngā mahi kāore i te utua hei whakarurutanga, kia uru rānei ki ngā whanaungatanga tūkino kia uru ki te kai me te nohoanga. I kī a Heka Baker, he āpiha whānau, he āpiha whakangungu hoki, he kaikorero mō ngā Tuahine ehara i te Tauhou, he "tino kore whakaaetia" kia hiakai te tangata i Weera, ā, i kī kua "whakarapaina" ngā kaiwhaiwhai. E karanga ana te rōpū whakahaere ki te whakahōu kia ōrite ai te āheitanga o ngā kaiwhaiwhai ki te whare, ki te rongoā, ki te mātauranga me te mahi ki ētahi atu - me te nui ake o te whakaaetanga e whiwhi ana rātau. I kī a Ms Baker: "Ki taku whakaaro kāore i te nui te nui o te moni e hoatu ana ki ia tangata, whānau rānei hei pupuri i tētahi whānau, i tēnei wā - ina katia ngā wāhi e whakawhirinaki ana ngā whānau, wāhine rānei, pēnei i ngā pēke kai, ngā toa aroha mō ngā kākahu. " When all that shuts down and your children are growing or you need food to sustain a healthy lifestyle, I think that's really difficult when those support systems were really relied on much before." Kua pūrongo kētia e BBC Wales he pēhea te tautoko mō ngā kaiwhaiwhai whakangungu i "whakahekea" i te wā o te raka. I kī te Tari Kāinga kua whakarato wāhi noho me ngā utu ora tino nui ki te hunga kāore i taea te tautoko i a rātau anō. E kī ana ka arotakea te utu moni ia wiki i ia tau, ā, inā noa nei ka nui ake te utunga o te utunga. I kī te Kāwanatanga o Welsh i te wā e noho tonu ana te nohoanga whakangungu i te kawenga o te Tari Kāinga, ka tautoko tonu i ngā kaiwhaiwhai i te wā o te taiepa. It said it provided a £10m fund for local authorities for emergency accommodation, legal advice to those refused asylum, access to emergency supplies, free school meals and translation of Covid-19 guidelines.

title: I kitea te pōma WW2 kāore anō kia pahū i Kenfig Pool, Bridgend
summary: Kua karangatia ngā tohunga pōma ki tētahi rāhui taiao o Uēra ki te tonga i muri i te kitenga o tētahi anga o te Pakanga Tuarua o te Ao kāore anō kia pahū e tētahi kaihīkoi i Bridgend.
text: I te haere a Dean Smith, e 38, o Pyle, i te taha o Kenfig Pool i te Hātarei i tana kitenga i tētahi fin e mau ana i te kirikiri. Ka toro atu a ia ki raro ki te tiki, engari i te mutunga ka hinga, ka tau me te pomu 2ft (0.6m) i runga i a ia. Kua rāhuitia te pae e nga pirihimana, ā, ka mahia e te Royal Logistics Corps tētahi pahūtanga whakahaere. I kī te kaingākau hītori a Tēnā Hāne, nāna i kite i te kitenga me tana hunaonga ko Hemi Clarke, e 20, he rite tonu tana kite i ngā taonga tawhito i taua rohe. 'I whakatio mātou' "I kite mātou i te fin e piri ana, ā, i whakaaro ahau, he pai tēnā mō taku kohinga," tana kī. "I te kaha o taku kume, a, ka tau ki runga i ahau. I whakatio mātou mō tētahi hēkona, ā, i kite ahau kei te piri tonu te fuse kia ora tonu ai." "He āhua hītori ahau, nā reira i mōhio tonu ahau he aha tērā. " Ka waea atu mātau ki nga pirihimana, a, ka whakatakotoria he rākau me ngā pēke kirihou. "He rawe rātau [nga pirihimana], e whakaaro ana ahau e haere mai ana rātau e tatari ana ki ngā mea i kitea e rātau i mua, engari i a ia [te āpiha] e titiro tata ana, ka kite ahau i ōna whatu e whānui ana." I whakaūngia e nga Pirihimana o Uēra ki te Tonga i whakatūpatotia ngā āpiha ki te aroaro o ngā taonga hītori i Kenfig Pool, ā, ka kī ka mahia taua take e te rōpū pomu o te Royal Logistics Corp.

title: Plans unveiled for new £1.3bn waterfront development in Granton
summary: Kua whakakitea ngā mahere mō tētahi whanaketanga hou e £1.3bn i Etinitini e whakaatu ana he aha tētahi taone takutai hou o te taone.
text: E 3,500 ngā kāinga hou o te whenua mahi o mua i Granton, he kura, he pokapū rongoā, he ara paihikara me ngā ara hīkoi me ngā pokapū waka tautoko. Ka whakaaturia ngā mahere ki te Komiti Kaupapahere me te Toitū o te Kaunihera o Etinitini a tērā Tūrei. I raro i ngā mahere, tērā tētahi pāka e hono ana i Granton Harbour ki Gypsy Brae. Council leader Adam McVey said: "We've made a commitment to become a net zero carbon city by 2030 and the regeneration of Granton offers the perfect opportunity to showcase how this can be delivered. " We are committed to working with the local community and partners to create vibrant new neighborhoods where people live and travel and grow the economy in an eco-friendly way." A development framework will be published by the council on Thursday and go on display at Edinburgh College until 6 March. Mēnā ka whakaaetia e te komiti te kaupapa, ka mahi tahi te mana ā-rohe me te kāwanatanga o Pākehā me ētahi atu ki te whakawhanake i tētahi rautaki pūtea kua tuku i te £196m ki te whakatupuranga anō o te rohe. The council's depute leader, Cammy Day, said: "The regeneration of Granton will create hundreds of new jobs linked to growth of new services, business, leisure and creative industries and will strengthen the retail and small businesses that already exist. " Our public sector partners Edinburgh College, National Museums Scotland and National Galleries Scotland, who all have land or buildings within Granton Waterfront, are committed to working collaboratively to maximise the impact of combining our resources. "I'd encourage everyone interested in this exciting new plan for the area to go along to Edinburgh College and have a look at the plans which will be on display for two weeks from the 20 February."

title: Me pēhea e mau pūkoro ai te tangata?
summary: Nā ngā mātauranga o nā tata nei i huatau ai kei te whakapeka te whakamahinga pūkoro i Awherika ki te Tonga, arā, ko tētahi o ngā pāpātanga HIV tiketike rawa i te ao.
text: E 2,700 ngā taitama o Āwherika ki te Tonga e pāngia ana e te HIV i ia wiki - 74 % o rātau kōtiro. E kōrero ana a Pumza Fihlani o te AO ki ētahi wāhine i Rahanaburg mō ō rātou āhuatanga ki te wahine, ki ngā tāne me te whakamahi pūkoro. Chwayita Bam, 31, māngai whenua: Kei roto ahau i tētahi pātahitanga hou ināianei, ā, ko tētahi o ngā mea tuatahi i kōrerotia e mātau ko ngā pūkoro. Ka kī hāngai atu ahau ki a ia, "Kāore au i te mōhio ki hea koe, kāore koe i te mōhio kei hea ahau. Kāore au i te mōhio ki tō tūnga nā reira me whakamahi pūkoro mātou." Kāore a ia i tino hari ki te whakataunga, engari i whakaae a ia. He āhua mārire nā te mea i ētahi wā i te wera o tēnei wā me whakamutu tātau i ā mātou mahi ki te hopu pūkoro, ā, ka haukotia te mea katoa. Kua kōrero tahi māua mō te whakamātautau mō te HIV kia mutu ai tā mātou whakamahi, engari kua whakamāramatia e au ki a ia nā te mea kāore au i runga i tētahi ārai ārai - koinei anake taku huarahi ārai i te hapu. I roto ahau i tētahi āhuatanga i mua i hiahia ai tētahi tangata ki te moepuku me te kore pūkoro, ā, he tino whawhai māua mo taua mea, ka noho ā-tinana tonu a ia. Kāore a ia i mārama he aha ahau i kore ai e moe ki a ia ki te kore. I hāngai ahau. Ka kī atu ahau ki a ia, "Ki te whakahaua koe i a au ka whakakōhuru." Ka mataku tērā i a ia, a, ka tū ia. Kāore anō ahau kia kite anō i a ia. E kī ana ngā tāngata ina noho koe me te kore pūkoro, he pai ake, e whakaae ana ahau, ā, ki taku whakaaro koia ētahi tāngata, tae atu ki ngā wāhine, kāore e pīrangi ki a rātou. Engari ko te mea pono he maha ngā mate nā reira ka whakahaua mātou ki te whakamahi kia kore ai mātou e māuiui. Ko Nomandla Mabaso, e 22, he tauira whare wānanga he pūkoro, kāore rānei he wahine mōku. Kāore ngā tāne e hiahia ana ki te whakamahi pūkoro, engari i te mutunga he pai ake ki a rātau te noho pūkoro i te kore wahine - mēnā he nui ake ngā wāhine ka nui ake te mana, ka ngāwari ake rātau ki te tohe tonu. Kāore au i te mōhio he mea kaha kē atu i te hiahia mātou ki te whakangāwari i o tātau hoa. He hoa mā tōku e 25 tau, he atamai, he mātauranga. Kei te mārena a ia ki tētahi tangata pango, ā, ka whakamōhio ia ki a ia kāore rātau i te hiahia ki te whakamahi pūkoro, ā, ka whakaae a ia. I pāngia e ia te herpes. I whakaaro ahau ka wehe a ia ki a ia, engari kei te noho tahi tonu rāua. Kua patua a ia ki a ia. Ki taku whakaaro ka puta mai te take ina aroha tātau, ka nui ake tātau ki te whakangākau, ki te whakahari i a tātau tāngata, ā, i reira ka ngaro te whawhai pūkoro. He tokomaha nga wāhine i a rātau e aroha ana, ka ngaro to rātau reo. Ka noho katoa ki te whakangāwari i tērā tangata. He tangata tino kaha ahau, nā reira e pai ana ahau ki te whakatakoto i taku take. E mōhio ana ahau kāore au e pīrangi ki te hapu, ā, kāore au e pīrangi ki te pāngia he mate, nā reira he ngāwari taku pepeha: "He pūkoro, kāore rānei he wahine." Kei te tamariki tonu ahau, ā, kei a au tōku oranga katoa hei whakarite. Kāore anō ahau kia whakatū i a au hei wahine mahi, nā reira kāore anō kia whai pēpi i tētahi wāhanga o taku kaupapa. Kei runga ahau i te mana whānau engari e hiahia ana ahau ki te tino mōhio. Mēnā e hiahia ana tētahi tangata ki te noho ki a au, me manaaki ia i tēnā. Me whakanui a ia kia whakamahia e au he pūkoro i nga wā katoa. Ngā Āwhina i Awherika ki te Tonga: Pūtake: UNAids, 2014 Kei te waiho e ngā rangatahi o Awherika ki te Tonga te karere Aids? Paulina Lapise, 39, kaimahi kāinga Ko te take he nui rawa ngā mate nā te mea kāore mātou e whakamahi pūkoro i te nuinga o te wā e tika ana. I te nuinga o te wā ka kī atu koe ki tō hoa e hiahia ana koe kia whakamahia e ia he pūkoro, ka kī mai ia ki a au e mamae ana i a ia. I te mutunga ka whakaae ahau ki te moe ki a ia me te kore nā te mea e kī ana ahau ki a au anō e hiahia ana ahau ki te whakahari i a ia. E kī ana taku hoa he uaua ki a ia te whakaheke i a ia e mau pūkoro ana. E kino tonu ana a ia. Ko ēnei momo āhuatanga te take i nui ai ngā mate e haere ana. Āe, ka taea e koe te kore e moe ki a ia, engari ka whakahaua e ia ki a koe, ā, kāore he wahine e hiahia ana ki tēnā. He kaha ake te tangata, ina hiahia rātau ki tētahi mea e hiahia ana rātau. He nui te pēhanga ki a mātau wāhine kia pai ai rātau. E mōhio ana ahau kei te rongo ahau i tēnā pēhanga i te kāinga. I ētahi wā e mōhio ana koe kei te tinihanga a ia i a koe, engari ka whakaae tonu koe ki te moe tahi me ia me te kore pūkoro, engari kāore mātou e hiahia kia ngaro i a ia. Koinei te take i tino tokomaha ai nga wāhine e pāngia ana e te HIV. Kāore mātou i te mōhio me pēhea te tū mō mātou anō. E whakaako ana te iwi i a tātau i tēnei rā, kia kitea ai koe he wahine tika, me noho koe i roto i tētahi whanaungatanga, i mārena rānei - me whai tāne koe. He wāhi nui te pūkoro i roto i o tātau whanaungatanga, ā, ko tātau, he wāhine, kāore i te whakarongohia, engari he aha tātau? Koia te āhua o ngā mea. Kutloano Buthelezi, 21, kaiwhakahaere pae wai E tino hāneanea ana e au ngā pūkoro, he rite tonu taku whakamahi i te douche i muri iho.
