Kāore hoki au e pīrangi ki te haunga, nā reira āe, ehara ahau i te pīrangi ki ngā pūkoro. Ko te take anake e whakamahia ana e au ko te aronga ārai. Mēnā i roto ahau i tētahi pātahitanga māia, ā, kei te tino pono taku hoa, ka mahi ahau ki te kore rātou. Ki taku whakaaro kei te hipi tonu nga wāhine ki te tiki i o rātau hoa ki te whakamahi i a rātau. I tētahi wā i roto ahau i tētahi āhuatanga e tata ana māua ko te tangata ki te moepuku. I pātai atu ahau ki a ia mehemea ka purua e ia he pūkoro. I kī mai a ia ki a au - kia mōhio ai ahau i muri iho kāore a ia, engari i rongo ahau i te kaha ki te whakaara. E whakaaro ana ahau he kaha tātau e whakapono ana he wahine tātau, e herea ana tātau kia ngohengohe. Ehara i te mea i roto i te wahine anake. Ka uaua ake i ngā āhuatanga e pakeke ake ana te tāne - ko ngā tāngata pakeke e karanga ana i ngā tākainga. Ka noho atu ahau i ngā tāngata pakeke nā te mea kāore au e hiahia ki te kite i a au i roto i tētahi tūnga e rongo ana ahau kāore e taea e au te kī kāo nā te mea kei te whakawhirinaki pūtea hoki ahau ki a ia - koia te mea e pā ana ki te nuinga o te wā. He mōrearea ēnei momo whanaungatanga nā te mea kāore ia i te moe noa iho me te kōtiro kotahi - ko koe, tana wahine me ētahi atu kōtiro. He raruraru tino nui, ā, tērā pea he take tonu te HIV i konei, he aha hoki e pā ana ki te rangatahi. Mēnā e tino nui ana rātau ki te whawhai ki te HIV, me titiro rātau ki te whakaiti i ngā pūkoro, ā, kāore e taea e koe te rongo, ā, ka nui ake te utu ki te katoa. Ko te tikanga hoki ka mutu te whakawhirinaki a nga wāhine ki nga tāngata ki te hoko i a rātau. Ā, me nui ake te whakaako a ngā mātua pango i a rātau tamariki. E noho ana tātau i tētahi tau e mōhio ake ai ngā mātua ki te āhua o te hohe o ā rātou tamariki, nā reira me tuwhera ake rātou ki te kōrero ki a rātou mō ngā kōwhiringa e mahia ana e rātou me te ārahi i a rātou.

title: Ka whiwhi te kaiwhakapae 'whakahāwea' o Marks & Spencer i te 'tūkinotanga anō'
summary: I kī tētahi wahine e whakapae ana i whakatārewatia a ia e tētahi kaimahi o Marks & Spencer kua tūkinotia ia mai i tana kōrerotanga.
text: E kī ana a Faryaal Hu huka e rua ngā kaimahi i whai i a ia ki tētahi pāka motokā i Basildon, i Essex, ā, kotahi i whakararuraru i a ia ki te tūkino ā-iwi. I muri i te pūrongotanga o taua mahi, ka kī a ia ka tīmata a ia ki te whiwhi waea "whakahāwea". I kī a M&S e uiui tonu ana i te whakapae taketake. I kī te whaea o te tokorua i pā mai i muri i tētahi tautohetohe i roto i te toa mō te wāhi e tūtira ai mō ngā kākano i raro i ngā tikanga tawhiti pāpori o nāianei. I kī a ia kātahi ka whakatata atu ki te papa motokā e taua kaimahi kotahi, tae atu ki tētahi hoa mahi, ā, e kī ana i oatitia ia, i tūkinotia ā-iwi. I whakaūngia e ngā Pirihimana o Essex ngā āpiha ki Mayflower Retail Park i te 7 o Aotearoa ki te mahi i tētahi amuamu. I kī a Mrs Hussain mai i te pūrongotanga i roto i te pāpāho kua whiwhi a ia i "ngā waea kore mutu" i tana waea pakihi. "He oati noa iho te iwi," tana kī. "I kī mai taku tāne kia kaua ahau e whakautu. Mēnā he kiritaki ka taea e au te waea atu ki a rātou, engari kei te pā ki taku mahi." Kua kite te AO i ngā rangatū o ngā kōrero whakahāwea i runga i tētahi wānanga tuihono, i whakapaea ai a Mīhana Hu huka ki te mahi i taua mahi, ā, he "tairongo rawa". Ka kī a ia: "Kore rawa ahau i mōhio he tino mārama te whakahāweatanga. Te āhua nei kāore he whakamā o te tangata." I kī a ia i kōrerotia e ētahi o ērā kōrero ngā tohu whenua o Basildon. "He whakamataku, he whakararuraru ēnei momo kōrero mai i ngā tāngata paetata ki a au," tana tāpiri mai. Kimihia te Rongokōrero o TE Rāwhiti o Ingarangi i Facebook, Instagram me Twitter. Mēnā he huatau pūrākau tāu, īmēra eastofenglandnews@bbc.co.uk

title: Kai te whakakāhoretia nga kaituku whero i te pēke tātea
summary: Tērā pea ka nui ake te ngahau o ngā whero, engari te āhua nei he nui rawa rātou.
text: Nā Laura BleakleyBBC News Mēnā ka haere tētahi ki te tirohanga o te pēke tātea nui rawa o te ao, o Cryos International, i Tenemaka. Kua pānuitia e ia kei te huri atu i ngā kaituku makawe whero nā te mea kāore he tono mō tā rātou "hua". Kua kī tōna kaiwhakahaere, a Ole Schou, kāo ki ngā momo Scandinavian katoa, ehara i te whero anake "nā te mea he nui rawa ā mātou kararehe." "Kua nui rawa mātou i te tātea kaituku mai i ēnei rōpū, nā reira me mutu te tono i a rātou," tana kī. Ko te āhua nei ko Airangi tonu tētahi o ngā wāhi e tono ana i ngā kaituku makawe whero tae atu ki Tenemaka me Tiamana. Heoi anō, i te nuinga o ngā kiritaki Cryos kei Paniora, Itari, Kariki, e hiahiatia ana ētahi atu Scandinavians, Māuirangi me ngā tāngata o ētahi atu iwi hei kaituku. I kī a Tēnā Schou kua whiwhi kē tana kamupene i ngā kaituku whero e 600 i runga i tētahi rārangi tatari kia nui ake te āhua o ngā tamariki o tēnei tae makawe. "E tino hari ana mātou ki ngā whero me ngā tae makawe o te tangata, engari ko tā mātou mahi ko te whakarato i ngā iwi katoa, ngā tae makawe katoa me ngā tae whatu katoa, ā, ko tō mātou raruraru kei tēnei wāhi o Uropi ki te Raki," tana kī. "E whakarato ana mātou puta noa i te ao kia nui ake ai ngā āhuatanga o Tenemāka i roto i ā mātou huawhenua." He whero whakahīhī te kaituhi toa me te comedian a Owen O'Neill. "Kua whakamahia e au taku makawe kākano puta noa i tōku oranga ki te mutunga pai," tana kī. "Mehemea ehara ahau i te kākano, me ngaro i a au te 20 meneti o ngā rawa mo taku mahi - nā reira kei te tino hari ahau ki ngā jibes - nāna ahau i meinga ko wai ahau, ā, he pai ki a au ōku makawe kākano."

title: Ka katito ngā mākete tukutuku pōuri o AlphaBay me Hansa
summary: E rua o ngā mākete tukutuku pōuri nui rawa kua whakawetohia i muri i tētahi tūhuratanga ture ā-ao whānui.
text: Nā te kaipānui Hangarau o Pirihi BaraniukTechnology i pāhonotia ngā pae AlphaBay me Hansa ki te hokohoko i ngā tuemi kore mana pēnei i ngā rongoā, ngā rākau, ngā pūmanawa kino me ngā raraunga tāhae. E ai ki a Europol, neke atu i te 250,000 ngā rārangi mō ngā rongoā ture me ngā matū tūkino i AlphaBay. I hopukina a Hansa, a, ka aroturukitia pukutia mo te marama i mua i te taupāhohetanga. I kī te kōwhiringa e whakapono ana ka puta te bust ki ngā rau o ngā tūhuratanga hou i Uropi. "Kua tino pā te āheinga o ngā kaihoko rongoā me ētahi atu hunga hara nui puta noa i te ao i tēnei rā," te kī a te kaiwhakahaere nui o Europol, a Rob Wainwright. He mahi "tohu" tērā, e ai ki te kaiwhakahaere whakahaere o te Tari Tūhura a te Haurua o Amerika (WH) ko Andrew McCabe. Kua tuimotu a AlphaBay mai i te tōmua o Hōngongoi, e whakakī ana i ngā whakapae i waenganui i ngā kaiwhakamahi kua puta he whakahāwea ture. 'Kāore e taea e koe te huna' "E mōhio ana mātou ki ētahi o ngā Kaiāwhina i patua e ngā rongoā i AlphaBay," te kī a te Rōia Matua o Amerika. "Kotahi noa iho te pakeke o tētahi tūkino i te wā o Hui tanguru, i te wā o Hui tanguru, i hokona e ia i AlphaBay." I kī hoki a ia i mate tētahi taitama 13 tau i muri i te nui o te rongoā i hokona e tētahi hoa ako o te kura tuarua mā te pae. I whakatūpato a Tēnā Wātū i te hunga hara kia kaua e whakaaro ka taea e rātau te karo i te mahi mā te whakamahi i te tukutuku pouri: "Kāore e taea e koe te huna," tana kī, "Ka kitea koe e mātou." I kī te Tari Ture o Amerika (DoJ) ko ngā rongoā ture kore mana i whakarārangitia hei hoko i AlphaBay ko te hīkini me te fentanyl. I tāpiritia i roto i tētahi kōnae kōti e $450m (£347m) i pau mā te mākete i waenganui i Me 2015 me Hēpuari 2017. I arahina ngā tūhuratanga e te WHW, te US Drug Enforcement Agency (DEA) me ngā Pirihimana o te Motu o Hōnea. I āwhina hoki ngā pirihimana i ētahi atu whenua, tae atu ki UK, Wīwī me Rituānia. I te 20 o Pipiri i muri i te hopukina o ngā tāngata tokorua i Tiamana, ā, ka hopukina ngā tūmau i Tiamana, i Hōrana me Rituānia. Nā tēnei i whakaaetia ai "te aroturuki huna o ngā ngohe hara i runga i te pūhara" tae noa ki te whakaweto i te marama i muri iho. Mai i te wā i tuimotu ai a AlphaBay i te tīmatanga o Hōngongoi, kua kōrerorerotia e ngā kaiwhakamahi o te pae ētahi atu mākete tukutuku pōuri i runga i ngā wānanga tuihono. He rite tonu te whakahuatanga o Hansa, ko te tikanga tērā pea ka taea e ngā mana te hura i ngā mahi hara hou i runga i a Hansa i te hekenga o ngā kaiwhakamahi mai i AlphaBay. "I whakapūketetia e mātou he waru ngā wā o te tokomaha o ngā kaiwhakamahi tangata i Hansa i muri tonu i te tangohanga o AlphaBay," te kī a Tēnā Wainwright. Tātaritanga: Ko Te Kaipānui Hangarau o Amerika ki te Raki, San Francisco Ka tino mōhiotia te tikanga o te pānuitanga o tēnei rā i te tau e heke mai nei, neke atu rānei i te wā e whai ana ngā mana i ngā "kaiārahi hou maha" i kī ai rātau kua kitea nā te hū me te whakaweto i ēnei whatunga tino nui e rua. Ahakoa he tino āwhina te katinga o ngā pae, ka mōhio ngāwari te DoJ me Europol ka puta noa iho ngā ratonga hōu hei whakakapi i a rātou. Heoi anō, ko te katinga o te mākete tukutuku pōuri o mua o Silk Road i te tau 2013 i muri mai i a AlphaBay - nui ake, nui ake te whai hua, ā, ki tōna āhua, he mōrearea ake. Ko te mea e tino hiahia ana ngā mana ki te mahi ko te tīmata ki te whakatakoto i te tokomaha o ngā tāngata ki muri i ngā tūru. Ko tēnei mahi nui i hua noa iho i te torutoru o ngā hopunga - ā, ko te āhua nei i mate tētahi pōhēhētanga matua i tōna ake oranga e whitu rā i muri i te kawenga mai ki te tiakitanga. E mārama ana e hiahiatia ana e aua ratonga nui tētahi whatunga nui o te hunga hara - ā, koia tērā e ūkuia ana e ngā mana. Whāia a Dave Lee i runga i te Twitter @DaveLeeBBC I hopukina tētahi kaiwhakahaere whakapae o AlphaBay, 26 tau o Kānata Alexandre Cazes, i Thailand i te 5 o Hōngongoi i muri i tētahi mahi tōtahi i waenganui i ngā mana o Amerika, Kānata me Thai. I hopukina hoki e nga pirihimana e hia miriona tāra i roto i ngā rawa, e toru ngā āhuatanga me ngā motokā e whā o Te Aotearoa. Engari i kitea a Cazes i muri iho kua mate i roto i tētahi pūtau whare herehere o Bangkok. I kī te DoJ ko te āhua nei i mate a ia anō. I whakawetohia tētahi mākete tukutuku pōuri o mua, Silk Road, e te WHK i te tau 2013, ā, i taupāhohetia tētahi whakakapi - Silk Road 2.0 - i te tau e whai ake nei. Heoi anō, i roto i tana pānuitanga pēhi i tēnei rā, ka kī te DoJ neke atu i te 350,000 ngā rārangi o AlphaBay mō ngā tuemi kore mana - e 14,000 anake te Huarahi Hiraka i te wā i hopukina i te tau 2013.

title: Forest of Dean wild boar caught on camera by artist
summary: Kua hopukina e tētahi rehetoi tētahi poaka mohoao i runga i te pikitia i te Ngahere o Dean mā te whakamahi i ngā kāmera whakahaere waea haere.
text: Ko Daniel Staincliffe, kua neke ki tētahi tēneti i te ngahere mo te kaupapa, i whakatūria e 30 ngā kāmera huna i tētahi rohe e mōhiotia ana kia toroa. I korerotia ki a ia mo te tauwāhi e te Komihana Ngahere, e hiahia ana ki te kite i nga hua o tana kaupapa. Ko tana whakaahua tuatahi e whakaatu ana i tētahi poaka e whakaweto ana i tētahi waea haere me tōna ihu. Kua tīpokapoka mohoao ngā poaka i te Ngahere o Dean mai i te tau 2004, i te wā i whakaurua anō ai rātou i muri i te ngaronga o te 700 tau. Ka noho tonu ngā kāmera mō te toru wiki, ā, ka whakaaturia ngā hua ā muri ake i te raumati. I kī a Tēnā Staincliffe, e noho ana i Manchester, kua hangaia e ia te kete kāmera mai i te paina, te aho me ngā pōhatu kia hanumi ki te taiao. I kī a ia kua whakatūria ngā kāmera ki te wāhi he whakaaturanga o ngā poaka e haere ana, e kōpikopiko ana i roto i te poharu. "We've got a path here which we know has been used, and there's some evidence of rooting as well," he said. "He pai ki a au te waihanga i ngā mahi e ngaro ai taku mana ki ngā mea e whakaputaina ana e au. Kāore au i te mōhio he aha taku hoki." Kei roto hoki i te whakaaturanga a Mr Staincliffe te whakairo ataata me te whakairo mīhini rākau. E whai ana ki te tuku i tētahi pūhara mo te whakaaro tūmatanui mo te whakaurunga anō o te poaka mohoao i te UK. I whakaurua he whiu ki te ngahere i tērā tau i muri i ngā amuamu o te tūkinotanga ki ngā māra, te mōrearea ki ngā kaihīkoi kurī me ngā kaieke me ngā aituā huarahi e pā ana ki te poaka. E tautokona ana te kaupapa e te National Lottery mā te Kaunihera Toi o Ingarangi me te Komihana Ngahere o Ingarangi.

title: I whakakāhoretia te mahere wharekai pahikara o Cwmbran i runga i te kore tūnga tūnga
summary: Kua whakakāhoretia ngā mahere mō tētahi wharekai pahikara i te kore tūnga tūranga.
text: Tērā pea ka kite te kaupapa i tētahi wharekai pahikara i Llantarnam Lakes i Cwmbran, Torfaen, engari i whakakāhoretia e te kaunihera o te rohe. I kī te tīma huarahi o te kaunihera he tawhiti rawa te hīkoi 360m (1,200ft) i waenganui i te wharekai me te papa motokā kaimahi, ā, he tokomaha ngā manuhiri e haere mā te motokā. I kī te kaitono, a Kelly Eroglu, i "tino matekiri" a ia i te whakataunga, ā, ka pīra. I kī atu a Ms Eroglu ki te Ratonga Pūrongo Kāwanatanga Paetata: "Ko te nuinga o te iwi e kore e taraiwa ki te wharekai, ka hīkoi, ka paihikara rānei. E tino matekiri ana ahau i tēnei whakataunga. "It takes three minutes to walk from the staff car park and the council says this is too far. E whitu meneti te hīkoi a ngā tāngata e mahi ana i te pokapū taone o Pontypool, kāore i te mōhiotia." I a ia e kōrero ana ki te tautoko i te whanaketanga, ka kī a Alan Slade, e tohu ana i te rohe o Llantarnam he "ariā tino nui" te whanaketanga. "Mā tēnei toa kawhe e whakarato i tētahi ūnga ātaahua, ā, ka whakarato i tētahi wāhi e hiahia ana te tangata ki te hīkoi me te paihikara," tana kī. I kī te kaiwhakahaere o te tīma huarahi o te kaunihera, a Craig Williams i mōhio ia ka haere ētahi kiritaki me te pahikara ki te wharekai, engari "he tokomaha ngā kiritaki e haere mā te motokā". Ināianei ka kī te kaikaunihera o Kiriuati Ashley mō te tauwāhi: "Ehara i te ara pahikara māori. He hāroto mo te hī ika."

title: Poet Laureate Simon Armitage elected Oxford college honorary fellow
summary: Kua pōtitia te kaituhi me te kaitito a Haimona Armitage hei hoa hōnore o te Kāreti o Te Toru Toru o Oxford, i ngā rā i muri i tana whakatūranga hei Kaitito Kaitito panuku.
text: I puritia e Armitage tētahi whakahoahoa torotoro hōnore puta noa i te whā tau hei ahorangi whiti o Oxford. I te 15 o Me ka tū te kauhau a te kaituhi o Te Hauauru. I kī te Perehitini o te Kāreti o Te Toru Tahi, a Dame Hilary Boulding, he "kaha whakaharahara te kaitito ki te whakaata i o tātau oranga me o tātau taiao ki a mātau". "He kaiwaiata whakaaweawe a Haimona e tūhono ana ōna whiti ki te hunga whānui rawa," tana tāpiri mai. Kua whakaputaina e Armitage, nō Marsden, e 28 ngā kohinga o ana whiti, ā, kua akona ana mahi i runga i te marautanga ā-motu. 'Te tūāpapa tino tika' Ka puritia hoki e te ahorangi tau 55 tau te tūranga hītori o te Kaitito Laureate mō ngā tau tekau e whai ake nei, e whakakapi ana i a Dame Carol Ann Duffy. I kī a Armitage: "Ko Trinity tōku pūtake, ā, i whakarato i te tūāpapa tino pai mō aku tau e whā hei ahorangi whiti o Oxford. " E whakahīhī ana ahau ka haere tonu te pāhonotanga ā muri ake nei." I mahi a ia hei ahorangi whiti i te Whare Wānanga o Oxford i waenganui i te 2015-2019, ā, i tēnei wā he ahorangi whiti i te Whare Wānanga o Leeds. I tērā tau, i toa a Armitage i te Mētara Koura a te Kuini mō ngā Whiti, ā, i whakawhiwhia ki a ia he CBE mō ngā ratonga ki ngā whiti i te tau 2010.

title: Ka mauria e nga taitamariki o Nōwei to rātau ake whenua ki te kōti mo te hinu
summary: Ahakoa ngā taipitopito tuakiri kākāriki o Nōwei, ko tōna rawa kāwanatanga rongonui nā ōna kawenga hinu nui. I tēnei wiki, kei te wero ngā taitama o Nōwei i tā rātou e whakaahua ana he paerewa taurua, i te kōti.
text: Nā Matilda WelinBBC Monitoring I te Moana o Barents i Hune, kei te whiti tonu te rā i te 2am. Ko ngā ngaru iti e tāhapa ana i te rā karaka ki te hau kōhukihuki. E tapahi ana te poti rere i nga wai mātao o te Tiritiri. I tua atu i a ia, i te pae, e ara ake ana tētahi tangata nui. Ko Goliat tēnei, te taputapu hinu mahi ki te raki o te ao, e wiri ana i te hinu i runga i te whata whenua o Nōwei. E paoto ana te reo irirangi o te poti. E whakatūpato ana nga kaimahi a Goliat i nga kaimahi o te kaipuke kia noho ki waho o te rohe aukati o te taputapu. "Kia pai hoki ki te rere," te tāpiri mai a te kaiwhakahaere. "Ā, ko koutou," te kī a te kāpene 21 tau, a Thor Due, "kia ngahau ki te wiri!" Ko te atawhai tūturu o Thor e takahi ana i ōna whakaaro pono. Ko te tau 2018 tēnei, ā, kei te hoki mai a Thor me ōna hoa kaimahi ki te kāinga mai i Bear Island, ki te tonga o te moutere o Svalbard, i reira rātau e tuhinga ana i ngā kararehe rangatira o te rohe. E māharahara ana rātau ka whakawehitia tēnei whenua ahurei e ngā maringi hinu. Engari he nui kē atu to rātau āwangawanga matua. He torutoru noa iho ngā marama i muri i a Thor me ētahi atu mema o te rōpū Taitamariki me te Taitamariki o Nōwei - i ngaro i te hurihanga tuatahi o te mea kua noho hei whawhai ā-ture roa ki te āhua o Nōwei i runga i te hinu. I te 4 o Whiringa ā Rangi, ka tae mai tēnei pakanga ki te māhunga ina anga atu ngā taha e rua ki a rāua mo tētahi whakarongo whakamutunga i te Kōti Matua o Nōwei. E hiahia ana a Thor me ōna hoa kaiwhaiwhai ki te tautuhi i to rātau whenua ki tētahi ara hou - ki te whakahau i tētahi o ngā kāwanatanga rangatira rawa o te ao kia whakarērea tana pūtake moni nui rawa. E kī ana rātau ko te hinu me te korohū e tangohia ana i ngā wai o Nōwei, kia hokona atu ki ērā atu o te ao, e āwhina ana ki te whakararuraru i te huringa āhuarangi. Ko Nōwei te kaiwhakanao hinu tuarua nui rawa o Uropi i muri i Rūhia. E tautohe ana nga kaiwhaiwhai, mā te tuku raihana hou mō te hōpara hinu i te Tiritiri o Me 2016, ka takahia e te kāwanatanga tōna ake here ā-ture kia noho mā ai ōna iwi me ngā whakatupuranga ā muri ake. I ngaro i te rōpū, me ngā mema o Nōwei Nōwei, te kēhi tuatahi - ko te kōti e whakatau ana kāore e taea e Nōwei te pupuri i te pokenga i tua atu i ōna rohe. I ngaro hoki i a rātau tētahi tono whai muri, me te kōti e whakatau tonu ana kāore te kāwanatanga i te takahi i tōna kaupapa ture, ahakoa i whakaae i tēnei wā kia whakaaetia a Nōwei mō ōna kohu kē. Engari i Nōwei ka taea te tono i te kēhi kōti e rua, nā reira ko te taupatupatu whakamutunga i te Kōti Matua. I pau ngā tau tōmua o Thor ki te rere tahi me tōna pāpā, e hīkoi ana puta noa i te Moana ki te Raki ki te karo i ngā rohe aukati o ngā momo taputapu - he wheako nāna ia i whakatata atu ki te umanga e mahia ana e ia ināianei. He kaupapa tairongo te hinu i Nōwei. Ko te umanga hinu hinu, ko te nuinga o te kāwanatanga, e huaina ana ki te whakarerekē i te whenua mai i tētahi iwi hī ika rawakore ki te rangatira o te pūtea rangatira nui rawa o te ao. Ki te mutu te mahi a ōna iwi katoa, ka taea e rātau te ora i te moni hinu mo te toru tau. Tata ki te 0.7% o te kohu o te ao whānui mai i ngā kora fossil, nā reira ko te whenua te pūtake o te 100 ngā wā o te kohu kohu kati kati o te ao. Heoi anō, he tohu kākāriki ātaahua a Nōwei i ētahi atu huarahi. Ko te iwi mahi tuatahi tērā hei whakarite i te whakaaetanga huringa āhuarangi o Parihi, e tautohe ana ki te whakamātau me te whakawhāiti i ngā pāmahana o te ao ki te 1.5C i runga ake i ngā wā mahi tōmua. He kaituku nui hoki ki te Pūtea Āhuarangi Kākāriki, e pūtea ana i ngā mahi taiao i ngā whenua e tipu ana, ā, kua tautohe e kore rawa e haumi ana moni hinu ki ngā kamupene e whakatau ana i te tino kino ki te taiao. Kei Norway hoki te whakamahinga teitei rawa atu o ngā motokā hiko o ngā whenua katoa o te ao - 42,4% o ngā motokā i hokona i te 2019 he hiko. "Ko te kupu taurangi o Nōwei ko tōna ārahitanga i ētahi āhuatanga o te whakatau i te ohorere āhuarangi o te ao e whakahohea ana e te rawa i hangaia e tētahi umanga hinu nui," te kī a David Boyd, te kaiwhi motuhake o nga Iwi o te Hononga o te Ao ki te taiao me ngā mana tangata, i roto i tētahi pūrongo 2019. I pau i a Thor te nuinga o tōna oranga o te whare wānanga ki te āwhina ki te whakarite mō ngā kēhi kōti tuatahi e rua. Ahakoa e rua anō ngā rōpū i tae mai ki runga i te papa, he torutoru noa iho ngā kaimahi utu - ko ērā atu mea katoa i mahia e ngā tūao. I rumakina e ia me ētahi atu mema o Nature and Youth i a rātau ki te kaupapa, ā, ka noho hei tohunga ki te hinu moana me te wiri. "E ono marama te roa i mua i te mōhiotanga o ōku mātua kāore au i te ako," tana kī. I tipu ake a Thor i te taone iti o Molde, i reira he tokomaha ngā tāngata e mahi hāngai ana, e mahi hāngai ana rānei i te hinu. "I tūmanakohia kia noho ngā tauira tino pai hei kaipūkaha hinu," tana kī mō ōna rā kura. Ko Emma Bugge Gjerdevik, he kaiārahi paetata mō te Ao me te Taitamariki, e rongo ana i tēnei pēhanga. No Stavanger a ia, he hapori hī ika uaua tae noa ki te kitenga hinu i runga i te whata whenua pātata i te tau 1969. Ināianei ko tētahi o ngā taone tino rangatira o Nōwei, me te mokatere tiketike rawa o ngā kaimahi hinu i te whenua. "E kore e taea te mōhio ki tētahi tangata e mahi ana i te hinu," te kī a te tau 17 tau mō Stavanger, me te tāpiri kei roto i tēnei tōna ake whaea. "Ko ngā pūtake mōhiohio anake kei a koe i a koe e tamariki ana ko te kura me ō mātua - e mahi ana i te umanga hinu," tana tāpiri mai. "Kaore tētahi tangata i kōrero mō ngā hua o te hinu." I tana mōhiotanga mō te huringa āhuarangi, ka mataku a Emma. Ko te mea anake i taea e ia te whakaaro ki te mahi, e kī ana a ia, ko te whakauru ki te take. "He tokomaha ngā rangatahi e kī ana: 'Kāore e taea e au te noho hei wāhanga o te Ao me te Taitamariki, nā te mea e mahi ana ōku mātua i te hinu'," te kī a Emma. " E ngana ana ahau ki te whakamārama ki ngā tāngata me tīmata tātau ki te hōpara i ētahi atu whiringa pūngao me ngā whiringa pūngao hoki." E pōrangi ana a Emma rāua ko Thor ki te urupare a ngā pakeke ki a rāua tautohetohe. Ka pōhiritia rātau ki ngā hui, e kī ana rātau, ā, ka kīia he pai ki a rātau te hiahia, engari kei te whakaaro he tohu noa iho ngā pōwhiri. "I te nuinga o te wā e whakaaro ana ngā pakeke e mōhio ana rātou [mō te take hinu] nā te mea he pakeke ake rātou," te kī a Emma. "Engari he rauemi tā mātou." E maumahara ana a ia ki tētahi kaiwhakahaere hinu i tautohetohe ai ia, nāna ia i whakapae i a ia hei "tangata kino". Engari kua tae mai a ia ki te tiro i te toa tūturu ko te āhua o Nōwei, e whakatau ana i ngā whakataunga ki te tango hinu hinu. "He tino whakamīharo te hinu," te kī a Emma. "Kāore he rauemi anō pēnei. He nui rawa te pai i āwhinatia. He kupenga haumaru. Nā reira he uaua ki nga whakatupuranga pakeke te whakaaro ki tua atu." #Proud nga kaimahi hinu Ko te ia whānui i waenganui i te iwi whānui o Nōwei, e rite tonu ana te poipoi i o rātau whakaaro mo te hinu, neke atu i te hawhe e tautoko ana i te wiri. "Ko te umanga hinu tētahi o ngā mīhini matua o te whakahaerenga o Nōwei mō neke atu i te 50 tau," te kī a te Pirimia o Erna Solberg i roto i tētahi kōrero i tēnei kōanga. "Ki te ngaro i a tātau te kaha o te tipu o tēnei umanga, ka ngaro hoki i a tātau te nuinga o te nekeneke i roto i te huringa o Nōwei." Engari i te tipu o ngā āwangawanga huringa āhuarangi i waenganui i te iwi whānui o Nōwei, kua tīmata te pāpāho o te whenua ki te tuhituhi mō te "whakamā hinu". I te tau 2019, i tīmataria e te kaihiko hinu a Idar Martin Herland te hashtag #stoltoljearbeider (kaimahi hinu #proud) ki te wero i tēnei tirohanga. "I kite ahau i te mārakerake o ōku hoa mahi," tana kī. "Engari ka whakaputaina e mātau tētahi mea e hiahiatia ana e te ao." E whakahē ana te iwi i nga kaimahi hinu, engari he tika tēnā, e kī ana a ia. "Ko ēnei tāngata anō e taraiwa ana i ngā motokā [penehīni]." Ko te pūngao kākāriki 'kāore anō kia rite' a Hilde-Marit Rysst, nāna i mahi hei kaihangarau hinu, ā, ināianei ko ia te kaiārahi o te uniana mahi e hohe ana a Idar Martin, e āwhina ana hoki ngā kaimahi hinu ki te aorangi, engari me whai tika te tangata. "Kāore anō kia rite te pūngao kākāriki [ki te whakatutuki i ō mātou hiahia katoa]," te kī a Hilde-Marit. "Mō tētahi wā roa e haere mai ana, ka haere tahi te pūngao whakahou me ngā kora fossil." "He hiahia, he manawanui te rangatahi," ko te tāpiri mai a Idar Martin. "Engari me tino mahi mātou i tēnei hipanga i ia hipanga." Ā, kei te ngana te umanga hinu o Nōwei. Mai i te tau 1991, kua herea ngā ngohe keri ki waho ki tētahi tāke waro, ā, i te tau 2018, neke atu i te 80% o te kohu kohu kati. Ko Nōwei tētahi o ngā kaiārahi o te ao i roto i te hopu waro, te whakapau me te rokiroki. "Ko te hinu nō Nōwei te hinu kākāriki rawa i te ao - ko te tino pai o te kino - ā, ka haumi mātou i ngā hua ki te taiao," te kī a Hilde-Marit. "E kore e taea e mātou te whiwhi i te flak mō tēnā!" E tautohe ana a ia, i te wā e hiahiatia ana he pūngao anō, kei te whakatutuki a Nōwei i tētahi tūranga nui. Ka hiahia hoki ngā whakatupuranga ā muri ake ki ngā motokā me ngā waea pūkoro, e kī ana a ia. Engari e whakapono ana a Thor rāua ko Emma ka taea te whakaiti i te whakapaunga. "I roto i tētahi Nōwei i muri i te hinu, kāore pea i a mātau te kauneketanga ohaoha ōrite, engari he mea nui ake ki a au kia āhei ahau ki te hā, kia whai tamariki me te hinengaro mārama, i a Nōwei te whenua tino rangatira o te ao," te kī a Emma. "Mēnā kāore e taea e te whenua rangatira rawa o te ao te tīmata ki te hanga anō, ko wai ka mahi?" Ka whakamāramatia e Thor kua tutuki i ngā hoa noho tata o Nōwei te waihanga i ngā iwi tupu me te kore painga ohaoha o te "koura pango". "Kua taea e Huitene rāua ko Hinerangi te hanga i tētahi āhua ora me te kore hinu," tana kī. "Engari, me tango e tātau ētahi o a tātau tikanga tino whai rawa, whakaharahara hoki ki te tango i te hinu; kia iti noa iho." Ahakoa kāore a Emma rāua ko Thor e toa i ta rāua kēhi i te Kōti Matua, e whakapono ana rāua he taonga nui te kawe mai i tēnei kōrero ki tētahi wāhanga kōtaha tiketike. Neke atu i te 90 ngā whenua he kaupapa ture ōrite ki a Nōwei e mōhio mārama ana ki te mana ki tētahi taiao hauora. E tūmanako ana a Thor rāua ko Emma ka whakatūria e ta rāua kēhi he tauira ao whānui. A, ki te toa rātau? "He pūhuri kēmu," te kī a Thor. "Ka whakaaturia he tika te āhua me te Taitamariki i ngā wā katoa. Me whakarongo rātau ki a mātau." Ko ngā atahanga katoa e herea ana e te manatārua

title: New Tonga island 'now home to flowers and owls'
summary: Kua kitea e ngā kaipūtaiao he tohu ora i tētahi o ngā moutere hou rawa o te ao, e whā tau noa iho i muri i te hūnga puia.
text: Unofficially known as Hunga Tonga-Hunga Ha'apai, it lies in the kingdom of Tonga, and is already nurturing pink flowering plants, sooty tern birds, and even barn owls. Neke atu i te 170 ngā moutere o Tonga i te Moana-nui-a-Kiwa, ki te rāwhiti o Ahitereiria. I haere tētahi tīma mai i te Pānga Mātauranga Moana me NASA ki te whenua iti i Whiringahora, i mua i te mātakitaki mā te atahanga aorangi. He pēhea tonu te hanganga o te motu? Hunga Tonga-Hunga Ha'apai - named after the two islands it is nestled between - was born in December 2014 after a submarine canupted erupted, sending a stream of steam, ash and rock into the air. I te mutunga ka tau te pungarehu, ka tauwhiti ki te wai moana, ka mārō. Kotahi marama i muri mai, ka hangaia te motu hou. Ehara i te mea rerekē te hūnga puia i raro i te wai ki te hanga i ngā moutere iti, engari i te nuinga o te wā he poto ake te roanga o te ora. Hunga Tonga-Hunga Ha'apai is one of just three to emerge in the last 150 years that have lasted more than a few months. "I tēnei take, te āhua nei he tauhohenga matū tā te pungarehu ki te wai moana e āhei ai kia nui ake te mārō i te nuinga o te wā," te kī a te kaimātai puia o Jess Phoenix ki te HAU. Ka whakataurite a ia i te motu ki Surtsey, he motu i Tiorangi i hangaia i runga i te āhua ōrite i ngā tau kotahi mano e ono tekau mā ono, ā, kei te noho tonu i tēnei rā. He aha i kitea e ngā kaipūtaiao i to rātau taenga atu ki reira? Ko te kairangahau NASA ko Dan Slayback i waenganui i te hunga i haere ki te motu i Whiringahora, a, i kī rātau "he rite katoa ki ngā tamariki kura". I kitea e ia he paru uku kōmā, piripiri i runga i te puia - he mea i mahue i a ia te pōhēhē. "Kāore mātou i tino mōhio he aha tērā, ā, kei te pōauau tonu ahau i te wāhi e haere mai ana," te kī a Tēnā Slayback i roto i tētahi pou rangitaki NASA inā noa nei. E ai ki a Ms Phoenix, he ngāwari kē atu te whakamārama i te oranga kararehe me te tipu. "Ehara i te mea mīharo kei te tipu tonu te otaota," tana kī. "Tērā pea i kawea e ngā kararehe - tērā pea mā te paru manu - ā, he tino mōmona te whenua puia". Tērā pea i haere mai nga kararehe i nga moutere karapoti, ka tāpiri mai a ia. Pēhea te roa o te motu? I matapaetia e NASA i te tau 2017 ka roa pea te motu i waenganui i te ono me te 30 tau. Engari kāore a Tēnā Slayback i tino tūmanako i muri i te toronga, e kī ana he tere ake te whakakino o te motu i te mea i matapaetia. "We've really got a limited time with Hunga Tonga-Hunga Ha'apai," said volcanologist Ms Phoenix. "Te āhua nei kei te pā te marangai ki te horo, nā reira mēnā kei te haere tonu te marangai taumaha, tērā pea ka noho noa iho pea mō te tekau tau, neke atu rānei. Engari he uaua ki te kōrero; Mēnā he waimarie mātou, tērā pea ka roa ake pea te noho i reira." Ahakoa tēnei, ko te mea kei te tīari te motu he "mea nui", e kī ana a ia. "Kotahi noa iho te wā i kite ai mātou i tētahi motu pēnei mai i te mea he atahanga aorangi hōu tā mātou. He puia ātaahua." .

title: E whakaaro ana ngā Hauti ki te hanga i te taone nui me te rohe pakihi e $500bn
summary: Kua whakakitea e Arapia ngā mahere hei hanga i tētahi taone hou me te rohe pakihi - he kaupapa ka pūruatia e neke atu i te $500bn (£381bn) i roto i te pūtea penapena.
text: E kī ana te Piriniha Karauna o Moameta bin Ararere ka hangaia te rohe NEOM e 26,500 km māra (10,232 māra māra) ki te raki-uru, e toro atu ana ki Ihipa me Horano. Ka arotahi ki ngā wāhanga e iwa tae atu ki te hangarau kai, te pūngao me te wai. Kua ārahi te rangatira karauna i tētahi puku ki te neke atu i a Arapia i tōna whakawhirinakitanga ki ngā moni hinu. I Aotearoa, ka whakarewaina e te kingitanga o te Kōwhiti tētahi kaupapa whanaketanga tāpoi nui hei huri i ngā moutere e 50 me ētahi atu pae i te Moana Whero hei taunga rangatira. Heoi anō, ko te āhua tino hao o te kitenga a Moameta bin Ararere e tino pātai ana mō tōna tūturu, e kī ana te korero ohaoha o te HAU, a Andrew Walker. I kī ngā kaiwhakahaere 'ūnga kātoretore' ka pūteatia a NEOM "i ngā tau e heke mai nei" e te kāwanatanga me ngā kaihoko paetata, ao whānui hoki. "Ko te koha a NEOM ki te GDP o te kingitanga e whakaritea ana kia tae ki te $100bn neke atu rānei i te tau 2030, tāpiri atu ki tōna GDP per capita - e whakaritea ana kia noho ko te teitei rawa o te ao," te kī a tētahi kōrero. "Kua tautuhia kia noho hei ūnga kākano hou" i te takutai o te Moana Whero me te Kōwhiti o Aqaba, e hono ana i Āhia, Āwherika me Uropi. I puta mai te pānuitanga i tētahi hui pakihi ao whānui i te pūmatua o Hauti Arapia, o Riyadh. Kāore anō a Ihipa rāua ko Horano kia kōrero mō te kaupapa hou. E takatū ana mō te mākete pūngao ā-ao tino rerekē, ko Andrew Walker, ko TE Rongokōrero o Hauti Arapia, me te rangatira karauna, he mahere tā rātou e kiia nei ko Vision 2030. Ko tōna ngākau ko te whakahōutanga me te pāngatanga o te whakahaerenga o Hauri. E hiahiatia ana e te whenua. Ko ngā pūkete hinu mō ngā hauwhā e toru o ngā kawenga ake o Hauri, ā, tata tonu ki te nui o ngā moni hua a te kāwanatanga. Ko te utu o te hinu māori ināianei e tata ana ki te haurua o te toru tau ki mua, ā, mo te wā roa kei reira te kapua o te huringa āhuarangi. Ko te tikanga o ngā mahi a te ao whānui ki te mahi i taua mea, he iti iho te mākete mō ngā kaiwhakarato hinu. E kore tēnā e puta mai i tērā tau, e rua rānei, engari ko te takatū mō tētahi mākete pūngao huri noa he tino rerekē, he mea e hiahiatia ana he nui te wā me te moni. I ngā marama tata nei kua whakarewaina e Arapia he rangatū o ngā whakahōu e hāngai ana ki te whakahōu i te kingitanga tūturu. I tērā marama, ka tukuna e Kīngi Ararere he ture e āhei ai nga wāhine ki te taraiwa mo te wā tuatahi - he nekehanga e pōhiritia ana e nga kaiwhaiwhai.

title: E hiahia ana a TE Hākinakina ki te pana hua
summary: Kua pānuitia e TE Hākinakina ngā hua hāwhe tau i a ia e whai hua tonu ana i te hiahia kaha mō ngā huatau hākinakina.
text: Ko ngā hua tāke tōmua mō ngā marama e ono ki te 30 o Hōngongoi i peke 73% mai i te tau i mua atu ki te £77.4m. I kī atu te manukura nui o Pita Cowgill ki te BBC: "Ko to mātau tau tuatoru tēnei o te tipu, ā, kua whakatūria mātau hei wāhi haere mō ngā hua whakangahau tākaro." I pānuitia hoki e te kamupene he mahere hei whakatuwhera toa i Ahitereiria. Ko te nuinga o ngā wāhi 900 o TE Hākinakina kei te UK, ahakoa kei te whakawhānui i tētahi atu wāhi i Uropi i ngā whenua pērā i Paniora, Wīwī me Tiamana. I kī te kamupene, ahakoa ko te pōti o te UK "ko te tikanga ka puta ētahi rangirua i roto i ngā tau e rua, e toru rānei e whai ake nei, kāore mātou e pōhēhē kei a mātou te tautoko a ō mātou hoa parani kia haere tonu tā mātou whakawhānuitanga i Uropi me tua atu". I kī a JD Sports kua hākinakina tana wehenga ahua hākinakina i "tētahi hawhe tuatahi tino pai", me ngā hua whakahaere tae atu ki te 53% ki te £79.9m. Ko tōna wehenga o waho - kei roto ko ngā mekameka Pango me ngā Mekameka Millets - i taea te whakawhāiti i ngā hinganga ki te £2.3m mai i te £4.5m i tērā tau. I kī te kaitātari hokohoko takitahi o Nick Bubb he "tino nui" ngā hua o TE Hākinakina. "Ko ngā matekiri anake kei te ngaro tonu te moni i te wehenga o waho," tana tāpiri mai. "Engari nā te nui o te tipu i roto i te umanga huatau hākinakina uho, he torutoru noa iho ngā kaipupuri e amuamu ana mō tērā."

title: Bád Eddie: 'Whakataetae ki te wā' ki te tiaki i te kaipuke pakaru o Donegal
summary: Tata tonu ki te 50 tau e tū ana ki te tino kino o ngā mea ka taea e ngā huānga o te takutai o Aterangi.
text: Nā David WilsonBBC News NI E kore e mōhiotia, kua pau te utu o ngā tekau tau o te taraiwa i te hau me te marangai o Kīriria. Ināianei kei te mataku te pakarutanga o Bád Eddie (poti a Eddie), tētahi o ngā tohu whenua tino mōhiotia o County Donegal, e kore e ora i tētahi atu hōtoke. Nā tōna hinganga i āki ai tētahi mahere whakaora, he mahi whakaora hei tiaki i a ia mō ngā whakatupuranga ā muri ake. "Kei te whawhai te wā ki a mātau," te kī a Sonia Nic Giolla Easbuig, he mema o te komiti o Bád Eddie kātahi anō ka hangaia. "Kei te wāhi mātou ināianei ki te kore tētahi mea e mahia, ka ngaro katoa i a ia". E takoto ana a Bád Eddie i te one o Magheraclogher o Bunbeg, i Gaoth Dobhair (Gweedore), he wāhi kōrero Airani o te Whenua o Airani. I hangaia tuatahitia i Wīwī, i hokona te poti e te kaihīika o te rohe o Eddie Gillespie, engari i horoia ki uta i ngā tau kotahi mano e whitu tekau mā rua. Mai i taua wā ko te one tōna kāinga. I ngā tau e whai ake nei, kua noho ko tētahi o ngā tohu whenua tino whakaahua o Airangi ki te raki, ā, he ōrite ki te rohe - me te whakaaweawe mō ngā kaitito me ngā kaipeita, ngā kaituhi me ngā kaiwhakatangitangi. I te tau 1985 ka whakaaturia te pakaru i roto i te ataata mō In a Lifetime, he ngātahitanga i waenganui i te rōpū tūturu o Airani o Clannad me te frontman U2 o Bono. Pērā ki te tokomaha o ngā tāngata i tēnei wāhi o te ao, he pūmau tonu a Eddie i roto i te oranga o Sonia Nic Giolla Easbuig. I a ia e tamariki ana, he papa tākaro mōna me ētahi atu tamariki o te rohe. "I tākaro katoa mātau ki a ia, he rūma tā mātou, ā, ka taea e mātau te tārere mai i a ia ki te moana". Ināianei kei waenganui a ia i ngā tangata whenua kua whakatū i tētahi komiti kua whakaritea kia "whakarite he tawhito tika tōna, e hākinakina ana ia mō ngā tau me ngā whakatupuranga e haere ake nei". E whakaaro ana rātau ki te kōpikopiko i te pakaru ki te tīra poapoa, e mahi ana hei ārai parenga, engari e mahi ana hei mahi toi i tōna ake tika. Māna e tuku ngā whakatupuranga ā muri ake nei "kia tirotiro i roto i te whakamaharatanga tīra poapoa ki roto i ngā toenga o te poti tawhito". "Ki te tutuki i a tātau ngā mea e hiahia ana mātou ki te whakatutuki, ā, kāore au i te pōhēhē, ka noho ko te whakairo moana pūmau tuatahi o Airangi." E tino mōhio ana a Sonia he tino nui te wā. I te takanga o te kopere i ngā marama tata nei, ka mahia e ia me ōna hoa noho tata ā rātou ake whakatika DIY i runga i te poti, ka hama i ngā pae tīra me ngā pere ki roto i te anga. "Kua mau tonu i roto i ngā tekau tau, engari he nui rawa te tūkinotanga ki a ia ināianei. Ki te ngoikore anō a ia ka haere ngā rara - ina pā mai tērā ka mate ia," tana kī. Ko te wāhanga tuatahi o te mahere whakaora ka kite i tētahi tīma mai i te Whare Wānanga o Kuini i te hopu i tētahi karapa Ahu-3 o te pakaru. E arahina ana e Colm Higgins, te upoko o Northern Ireland Technology Central i Kuini. Ka hopu ā-mamati rātou i ngā ahu tūturu o Bád Eddie, e whakarato ana i tētahi pūkete o tōna āhuatanga o nāianei. Ka taea tēnā te whakamahi hei aroturuki, hei pare rānei i te horo ā muri ake - me te whakatau me pēhea te haere tonu ki te tiaki i te pakaru. "Ka whakamōhio mai ki a mātau i te tauira tuatahi me pēhea te tiaki i a ia i tēnei hōtoke," te kī a Sonia. I te wā poto ka tiakina te taparenga hanganga o te poti, ā, ka hoatu ki te komiti te wā e hiahiatia ana kia haere whakamua ki te rongoā mo te wā roa. "Mā ngā karapa e homai he atahanga rahi katoa o te poti tūturu, ōna nati katoa me ōna papa me ngā bolts, ā, mai i tērā ka taea e mātou te whakarite me pēhea te hanga anō," te tāpiri mai a Sonia. Tērā pea ka roa te wā o te kaupapa, ā, kei te utua i te tauira tuatahi me tētahi whakahau kohi moni - i whakarewaina i te tīmatanga o tēnei raumati me tētahi konohete i te pakaru, ā, e whakaatu ana i a Moya Brennan o Clannad me Mairéad Ní Mhaonaigh o Altan. Ahakoa i tūpono ngā whakamātau o mua ki te whakaora i te pakaru, i tēnei wā ka kitea te kaupapa, ka kī a Sonia. He "pae tawhito" tēnei, tana kī, tētahi e "tino hari ana ki te tokomaha". "He mea nui kia tiakina e tātau te poti ināianei nā te mea e tohu ana i te rohe - he wāhi i pā kaha ki ngā tekau tau kua taha nei e te whakahekenga me te hekenga. " Tērā te wehi i te rohe ki te haere te poti, ka haere tahi te tātaritanga."

title: Whakataetae Poti 2021: Ka hoki mai te duel rongonui ki te tuarā mārire
summary: Ākuanei ka whakaakona ngā whatu o te ao ki tētahi kokonga papatahi, hau hoki o Cambridgeshire mō te 166th Boat Race. He aha i mutu ai ki konei, kaua ko tōna kāinga noa iho i Rānana?
text: Nā Orla MooreBBC News Kua roa te Whakataetae Poti i waenganui i Cambridge me Oxford i te maramataka tākaro ā-tau. Engari i tēnei tau ka whakakapia ngā tohu whenua o Putney, Mortlake me te Thames kaha, mō te tau kotahi anake, e te kāinga o Kuini Adelaide, te kāinga o Littleport me tētahi toronga tōtika o te Great Ouse. Ka hiko ngā kaimahi o Oxford me Cambridge i te taha o tēnei awa i hangaia e te tangata e whakawhiti ana i ngā pēke nui, papatahi kāpeti, e pūreireirei ana e ngā pēke 6ft (1.8m) i ngā taha e rua. Heoi anō, ka matekiri te tangata e whakaaro ana ki te whakatū i runga i te Pēke Padnal mō tētahi tirohanga matua. The 2021 Boat Race will be a closed event whose polite, but firm, message from the organisers is "stay away". Ko te tikanga ka kawea e te rēhi ā-tau neke atu i te 250,000 ngā tāngata ki ngā tahataha o te Thames, me ētahi atu whitu miriona e whakarite ana i runga i te pouaka whakaata. Koinei te whakataetae pouaka whakaata tuatahi i whakakorea i te tau 2020 i te wā i mau ai te raka tuatahi. Na te pahekotanga o te tawhiti pāpori pākaha me te mahi whakatikatika ki Hammersmith Bridge i whakahau i ngā kaiwhakahaere takahanga ki te titiro ki tētahi atu wāhi mō te tau 2021. "We had a long-list of 11 beautiful locations, from Devon to Newcastle, including lakes, but we came back to Ely," says Siobhan Cassidy, Cambridge director for the Boat Race Company. "Kāore mātou i pīrangi ki te pupuri i tētahi atu taone nui engari kāore hoki [i tētahi tauwāhi] mamao rawa kāore i taea te whai i ngā kaimahi kāmera," tana kī. Tērā pea ka hiahia koe ki: I te nuinga o te wā e 4.2 maero (6.8km) te roa, ka neke atu i te 3 maero (4.89km) te roa o te akoranga o tēnei tau. Ka tīmata i te Arawhiti o Kuini Atetā, ā, ka mutu i te Arawhiti Sandhill i Littleport. Ka katia ngā ara hīkoi, ngā tahataha hau, me ngā arawhata tīmatanga me te whakamutunga ki ngā kaimātakitaki. East Cambridgeshire District Council is leading a safety advisory group for the event, including councils, the emergency services and public health, to ensure people can't gather on the banks. "You couldn't ask for a better viewing gallery for a race like this, so it's incredibly frustrating that we have to close it all off," says council leader Anna Bailey. "We're also aware that it coincides with the return of the rule of six and outdoor meetings, and if the weather's good people will want to get out and about. " Tēnā noho ki te rohe me te noho ki te kāinga." Ehara tēnei i te wā tuatahi i taurimatia ai e ngā ara wai o Fenland te Whakataetae Poti rongonui o te ao whānui. I te tau 1944, ka haere nga kaimahi ki te Adelaide Straight, ahakoa kāore i te mana, i te ahunga tauaro, i te wā e riri ana te Pakanga Tuarua o te Ao puta noa i te ao. I taua wā, ka huihui te huihuinga i nga tahataha, a, ka oma i te taha o te rēhi ki te haki whakamutunga i te Arawhiti o Kuini Atetā. Ko tōna hokinga mai ki ēnei wai ka whakahokia mai hoki te hītori o te rēhi ki ōna tīmatanga. Cambridge fellow Charles Merivale is co-credited with inspiring the annual race after challenging his Harrow School and Oxford pal Charles Wordsworth to an inter-varsity rowing competition in 1829. Ka noho a Merivale hei Dean of Ely. I whakaritea anōtia te rēhi o te tau 1944 i te 60 tau i muri mai i te tau 2004 e tētahi rōpū e kiia nei ko te Taimana 44, me tētahi kupenga i whakatakotoria ki te urupa o Merivale i te Whare Karakia o Ely. "We see the Boat Race coming again as a bit of a gift," says Diamond 44's Jack Waterfall. "It gives us a chance to raise the profile and maintain the legacy of community rowing here." Ko Littleport, i te wāhi e mutu ai te rēhi 2021, te tirohanga o ngā whakararuraru ingoa o te tau 1816, i reira ka tū ngā tangata whenua rawakore ki o rātau hoa noho rangatira i roto i te rawakore i mahue i ngā pakanga a Napoleonic. Kei te kāinga hoki he whakamaharatanga ki a William Harley, i whānau mai i te rohe, nāna tana tama i whakatū tahi i te Kamupene Mīhini o Harley Davidson. Ko te whakatū i tētahi takahanga ao whānui pēnei i te Whakataetae Poti, ko te tikanga ka nui te moni whiwhinga ki tōna kaihautū. I whakaarohia e tētahi pūrongo 2017 ki te "pānga o tētahi takahanga nui kotahi rā ki tētahi taone" e te Kamupene Whakataetae Poti me te umanga pūkaha Arup, i whakaarohia te "painga ohaoha kupenga katoa" ki te rohe paetata huri noa i te rēhi anake i waenganui i te £2.8m me te £3.7m ia tau. Engari ko tēnei te moni whiwhinga e kore a Ely rāua ko Littleport e kite i te 4 o Āperira. Engari, ko te tūmanako a ngā kaiārahi hapori ka waiho e te takahanga he toenga o te whakapehapeha, ngā pūmahara pai me te whakaaweawe i tōna oho. "Ely Cathedral, the Ship of the Fens, provides an incredible backdrop this year, there's Wicken Fen near, the open countryside and wonderful wildlife really does make this place the jewel in the Fens," says Ms Bailey. "E tūmanako ana mātou ka kite ngā tāngata e mātakitaki ana i tēnei whenua whakamīharo, ā, ka noho ki roto i o rātau hinengaro mō te wā heke. " I te taenga mai o te rēhi ki konei i mua, ka kī a Pirihitini ka whakaarahia te ngākau whakangākau ā iwi. "He ōrite tā mātou whakaaro. Me haere tonu te whakaaturanga." Ka whakamahia hoki te hongere e te 120-mema o Te Motu o Ely Rowing Club, i ahu mai i ngā hākari huritau 60 o te rēhi o te tau 1944 i te tau 2004. Club chairman Richard Maxey says the river here is "not tidal - but it can get rough, and if the wind is coming down towards you it's hard to hoe against it". "I te nuinga o te wā he wāhi atawhai ki te hoe, he āhua whakaruru i ngā pēke tiketike, engari he tino ātaahua," tana tāpiri mai. Ahakoa he takahanga kati, e tūmanako ana a Tēnā Maxey ka whakarewaina e te Whakataetae Poti te kōtaha o ngā karapu hoe iti ake, whānui pēnei i te Motu o Ely, e kaha ana ki te tukituki i te rongo o te tākaro. "Ko to mātau whare poti e rua ngā ipu kaipuke me tētahi Portakabin, i whakaritea ki te Whare Wānanga o Cambridge," tana kī. "Engari ko te whakaaro ka huihuia ēnei kaitākaro tino pai ki konei, ka titiro ake o mātau tamariki ki a rātau, ā, ko te tūmanako ka ūkuia te pūkenga me te āhua o te whakataetae - ahakoa kāore e taea e rātau te mātakitaki tata i te rēhi." E kī ana a Ms Cassidy, nāna i mau ki te tūru hahau mō Cambridge i te takahanga wāhine toa i te tau 1995, ka tukuna e te akoranga o tēnei tau te whakataetae kaha. "Ehara i te whānui i konei pērā i te Thames, engari he nui te wāhi o ngā tīma ki te whakataetae taha, ā, kāore he arawhata whāiti, ngā kopere, ngā piko rānei hei whakatere," tana kī. "Ka kaha ake i te mea ka tata atu nga kaimahi, pēnei i a Henley." E mōhio ana ngā kaihoe o Cambridge ki ngā wai i konei nā te mea kua whakangungu rātou i runga i te Great Ouse mō ngā tekau tau ki te karo i te paheketanga i runga i te Cam. I whakatuwheratia te whare poti o te karapu e £5m i te tapa o Ely i te tau 2016. "Tērā te pēhanga ki a Cambridge ki te tiaki i to rātau taitara - me te papa kāinga," te kī a Ms Cassidy. "He tauwhāinga hītori tēnei kāore i rite ki tētahi atu. Kāore koe e hiahia ki te āpitihanga ki ngā whare wānanga - kōwhiria noa iho he tae ka whai i muri i a rātou." Kimihia te Rongokōrero o TE Rāwhiti o Ingarangi i Facebook, Instagram me Twitter. Mēnā he huatau pūrākau tāu īmēra eastofenglandnews@bbc.co.uk Ngā Hononga Ipurangi Pātahi The Boat Race Company Ely rowing club Cambridge University Boat Club Oxford University Boat Club

title: I whakawhiwhia e Aldeburgh Music he pūtea £1m
summary: Kua whakaaria mai ki tētahi rōpū pūoro o Te Wānanga e whakarite ana i ngā konohete me te whakawhanake pūmanawa i te £1m, i te wā e taea ana e ia te kohi i te moni ōrite.
text: Ko Aldeburgh Music tētahi o ngā whakahaere e 34 i te motu kia whiwhi i tētahi wāhanga o te £56m mai i tētahi mahi hou. E tūmanako ana te kāwanatanga, te Kaunihera Toi o Ingarangi me te Pūtea Tārewa Tuku iho ka kawea mai e te moni ētahi atu pūtea penapena mai i te wāhanga tūmataiti. E toru tau a Aldeburgh Music ki te kohi i te £1m i roto i te pūtea ōrite. Chief executive Jonathan Reekie said the £2m would be invested in an endowment fund, with the interest used to support its work. "Ka whakakaha i te rōpū whakahaere, ā, ka taea e mātou te māia mō te whakarite ā muri ake," tana kī. Ko Aldeburgh Music, e noho ana i Snape Maltings, e whakahaere ana i te Hākari Aldeburgh ā-tau. Kua huihuia hoki e ia e 124 ngā kaiwhakatangitangi mai i te ao katoa ki te hanga i te Aldeburgh World Orchestra hei wāhanga o te Orimipia Ahurea. I kī a Tēnā Reekie e tūmanako ana a ia mā te mārakerake mai i tēnei e āwhina ki te whakapiki i te mārakerake e hiahiatia ana hei kawe mai i ngā kaituku rangatira. "He uaua te mahi engari kei te whakatau mātou," tana kī. "A tērā tau ko te huritau 100 o te whānautanga o Pineamine Britten i Lowestoft, nā reira e tūmanako ana mātou he tino akiaki tērā pea mō ngā kaitautoko hou."

title: E pūrongo ana te Tūmatanui o Haina i te 19% peke i roto i ngā hoko
summary: Kua pūrongotia e te kaihanga taputapu pūkoro Hainamana a Tūmatanui he pekenga 19% i roto i ngā hokonga ki te 135.8bn yuan ($21.9bn; £12.8bn) mō ngā marama tuatahi e ono o te tau.
text: E kī ana e tūmanako ana kia mahi i tētahi tawhē hua mahi o te 18.3% mō taua wā. Kua arotahi tūturu a Tūmatanui ki te hanga taputapu whatunga pūkoro, engari kua whai hua mā te whakaputa ki ngā wāhanga tipu tere pēnei i te whakanao waea atamai. Ināianei ko tētahi o ngā kaihanga waea atamai nui rawa o te ao. I kī a Cathy Meng, te āpiha pūtea matua o te umanga, "i tutuki i te umanga te kounga me te tupu pūmau i roto i tā mātou umanga kiritaki, he mihi ki te nui o te mōhiotanga me ngā hokonga pūrere atamai puta noa i te ao". E ai ki te umanga rangahau IDC, i tukuna e Tūmatanui e 13,7 miriona ngā kaitiaki rorohiko i roto i ngā marama tuatahi e toru o tēnei tau - nā reira ko te kaihoko waea atamai nui rawa atu i te ao. Kaore a Tūmatanui i hoatu he wehenga o ana tau hokohoko hou rawa. Kua kimi haere tonu hoki a Tūmatanui ki te pato ki te mākete mō te hangarau mauranga, ā, ka whakamōhiotia tana pūrere atamai Talkband hinu i te tīmatanga o tēnei tau. Tērā anō, nā te pūtea penapena a Haina i roto i te hangarau whatunga pūkoro whakatupuranga tuawhā i puta ai te roma moni pūmau mō te umanga. "Nā te whakanui ake i ngā pūtea penapena i roto i ngā whatunga LTE puta noa i te ao, kua whakapakari kē atu a Tūmatanui i tōna tūnga ārahi i roto i te aunui pūkoro," te kī a Ms Meng i roto i te kōrero. I roto i ngā tau tata nei, ka puta mai te tupunga o te umanga ahakoa kei raro i te tirotiro i ngā mākete matua. I te tau 2012, i kī ngā kaipōrangapū o Amerika he tuma haumarutanga te kamupene nā ōna hononga whakapae ki te kāwanatanga me te hōia o Haina. Ko ngā māharahara mo tōna pāhonotanga ki ngā mana Hainamana i āia i tētahi wāhanga, nā te mea ko te kaiwhakarewa o te kamupene, ko Ren Zhengfei, he mema o mua o te Ope Whakaora a te Iwi. Heoi anō, kua auau te whakakāhore a Tūmatanui i aua kerēme, ā, kua whakapuakina he 100% nā ōna kaimahi me te kaiwhakarewa. I te tīmatanga o tēnei tau, i whakapae tētahi pūrongo i te New York Times kua hū mai te US National Security Agency (NSA) ki ngā tūmau a Tūmatanui. Hei urupare, kua tonoa e Haina he whakamāramatanga mārama mai i te kāwanatanga o Amerika.

title: You Me At Six: He aha ngā whetū toka e kore ai e hiahia ki te inu
summary: "Ka haere koe ki roto i tētahi rūma whakakākahu, ā, he pia i runga i te hukapapa me ngā pia i roto i te pouaka whakamātao. Kei reira koe ki te whakangahau i ngā tāngata, ā, he āhuatanga hākari - nā reira ka mutu koe ki te inu i ia rā."
text: Nā te kaipānui Will ChalkNewsbeat Mēnā kua moemoeā koe hei whetū toka, tērā pea he tino whakamīharo te whakaahuatanga a Dan Flint mo te oranga haereere. Engari i muri i te neke atu i te tekau tau o te pahū mō You Me At Six, kua nui tana mahi. O te waipiro, arā. "I tīmata ahau ki te inu nui i te wā o te raka tuatahi o Poutāpeta," te kī a Dan ki Radio 1 Newsbeat. "Engari i te wā i haere tonu te raka me ngā hākari me ā mātou whakaaturanga katoa, he mea whakamataku tērā. " Ka tīmata taku hauora hinengaro ki te huri iti, ā, ka mōhio ahau ehara te inu i te rongoā, i te tāpiri ki te raruraru." Mai i taua wā (hāunga te "rā neke atu rānei" i te Kirihimete) kua teetotal a Dan. He tino whakatutukitanga - i te nuinga o te tau i te mutunga o te tokomaha o tātau ki te mahi i te tauaro. E kī ana a Dan he neke nui tēnei. "Ko te mea katoa e pā ana ki te huri i tō pātahitanga ki te waipiro," tana whakamārama. "Ahakoa kei te tū katoa koe, kei te ngana noa rānei koe ki te tapahi, ko te huri i tō tāpare hinengaro, ehara i te whakaaro noa iho, 'kei te hē ngā mea katoa kia haurangi ai ahau.'" Kua tae mai tōna ngākau mārire i te taha o tētahi puku whakapakari nui, ā, e kī ana a ia e whakahīhī ana ia ki te whakawhiti i "tētahi tūkinotanga tōraro mō tētahi mea tōrunga". I hangaia a You Me At Six i Surrey i te tau 2004, ā, kātahi anō ka tukua e rātau ta rātau pukaemi studio tuawhitu, SUCKAPUNCH. E ai ki tāu e tūmanako ana, he nui tonu ta rātau haereere. "I haere tuatahi mātau ki te huarahi i te 17 o māua, ā, kua tata ahau ki te 32 - ka inu mātou i ia rā," te kī a Dan. "Mō te nuinga o ngā tāngata tērā pea ka inu rātou i te Paraire, mō mātou me kōwhiri mātou i te rā kotahi kāore mātou e inu." E kī ana ngā tohutohu mō te tapahi i a Mark Chandler, mai i te aroha o Drinkaware, me kī atu koe ki tō whānau me ō hoa he aha tāu e ngana ana ki te mahi. Mā tēnā e māmā ake ina tukuna he inu ki a koe me te whakaheke, engari ka hoatu hoki ki a koe tētahi tangata hei tahuri ki a koe mēnā ka kite koe kei te uaua noa iho ngā mea. He tino hira hoki kia whakamihi te tangata ki a rātau anō mō tētahi whakahekenga e mahia ana e rātou, e kī ana a ia. Ko te tapahi i te inu kotahi i ia rā, he hipanga ki te ahunga tika. Nā reira hoatu ki a koe he pakipaki ki muri. Mēnā e hiahia ana koe ki te whakaaweawe, he maha ngā kairangitaki me ngā kaiwhakaawe i reira. He wāhi tino pai te Sober Girl Society, Club Soda, me te One Year No Beer hei tīmata. Ko ngā tohutohu inu "mōrea iti" e tohutohu ana kia mau ki ngā wae 14 i te wiki. E ono ngā pints, e ono rānei ngā karaehe waina waenganui. Ko te tino māharahara o Rana ko te haere anō ki te haereere: "Koia tēnā te whakamātautau tūturu, e whakaaro ana ahau", tana kī. "Engari e pā ana ki te waihanga i ngā mahi hou - te maranga wawe me te hīkoi i tētahi taone, te kimi rānei i tētahi whare tākaro paetata." E whakaaro ana hoki a ia he mea hei kōrero mō te waiho i te āhuatanga o te noho i roto i tētahi pēne, ko te tikanga kei te hākari koe. "Mēnā kei te haereere koe puta noa i Amerika, i Uropi rānei, tērā pea kei te tākaro koe i tō whakaaturanga 30, 40 rānei - engari mō ngā tāngata i roto i te huihuinga, koia anake tā rātou kotahi, ā, kei te utu moni pai rātou. " He whakaaturanga tāku i roto i te hawhe haora i mua i tō whakaaro 'e kore tēnei hangover e pahemo, me pēhea taku mahi?' "Ki taku whakaaro i a koe e pakeke ana, ka mōhio koe ehara tēnā i te oranga e hiahia ana koe ki te ora. " E hiahia ana ahau ki te haere ki reira me te hākinakina i ēnei ahiahi me te tino whakaaturanga mō te huihuinga me te whakarite kia tino pai te wā o te katoa i roto i te rūma." Kua puta ināianei te pukaemi hou a You Me At Six 'SUCKAPUNCH' mā Underdog Records/AWAL Follow Newsbeat i Instagram, Facebook, Twitter me YouTube. Whakarongo ki Newsbeat live i te 12:45 me te 17:45 i ngā rā o te wiki - whakarongo anō rānei ki konei.

title: I whakatārewatia a Nadine Dorries hei MP Tory i roto i te haupae Rongonui ahau
summary: Kua whakatārewatia a Nadine Dorries e te Rōpū Rangatira i runga i tana whakatau kia puta ki ITV1's I'm a Celebrity... Tangohia ahau i konei.
text: Kua unuhia te wepu e te MP o Mid-Bedfordshire, ka kī tētahi pūtake rōpū. Ko Ms Dorries te MP tuatahi e noho ana i runga i te whakaaturanga, tērā pea ka kite i a ia e wehe atu ana i tana mahi i te Kotahitanga tae atu ki te marama. Ka tūtaki te wepu nui ki a ia ina hoki mai ia i Ahitereiria, ina tūmanakohia ia kia whakamārama i a ia anō. E āwangawanga ana te Rōpū Rangatira mo te kore e taea e Ms Dorries te mahi i ngā umanga paremata me te wāhanga i a ia e whai wāhi ana ki te kaupapa. I kī a Ms Dorries e hiahia ana a ia ki te whakamahi i tōna āhua i runga i te whakaaturanga ao rangirua kia mōhio ai ia ki ngā take e hiahia ana ia, pēnei i te whakaiti i te tepe wā o te whakatahe mai i te 24 wiki ki te 20 wiki. 'Ngā tautohetohe wera' "Kei te mahi ahau i te whakaaturanga nā te mea e 16 miriona ngā tāngata e mātakitaki ana. Ehara i te kōrero a ngā MP ki ētahi atu MP mō ngā take i te Pāremata, e whakaaro ana ahau me haere ngā MP ki te wāhi e haere ai te tangata," tana kī atu ki te Mēra o ia Rā. "Kāore au e haere ki reira ki te whakararuraru i te tangata, engari he whakaaro ōku. Tērā ētahi take e hiahia ana ahau, ko tētahi o ēnei ko '20 Wiki'. "Ka kōrero ahau mō tēnei take huri noa i te ahi puni. E tūmanako ana ahau ka puta mai ētahi tautohetohe ora, wera." Engari kua haere mai a ia ki te whakahē i tana whakatau kia tomo ki te ngahere rongonui, me te Hēkeretari Kāinga o Ēnā Me e kī ana: "He pono, e whakaaro ana ahau kei roto te mahi a te MP i tō rātou wātūtanga, i te Whare o Ngātahi." I kī te MP Conservative Sarah Wollaston me whakarere a Ms Dorries, e kī ana ki te BBC: "I wehi ahau, he pono. Ki taku whakaaro he āhua wawao noa iho a ia, ā, ka kawea mai e ia ngā tōrangapū ki te tautohetohe." I kī a Paul Duckett, te manukura o te pāhonotanga Rangatira o Mid-Bedforshire, tērā pea ka whakaaro ngā mema ki te peke i a Ms Dorries i runga i tōna āhua i runga i te whakaaturanga, kātahi anō ka mōhio ia mō te āhua o Ms Dorries i te taenga mai o te pāpāho ki te wāhanga o te Tūtira i te ata Tūrei. I kī a Tēnā Duckett he MP pukumahi a Ms Dorries, engari tērā pea ka "tangohia e te āhua te tō-ā-papa" o tana tūranga. Ko te Pirimia o Rawiri, a Rawiri, nāna i tū tūmatanui ki a Ms Dorries i mua - kāore i whakaae kia tāia ki roto i te haupae, e kī ana: "Ka taea e Nadine Dorries te kōrero mōna ake mo tēnei take." Ko te whanaungatanga o te tangata rongonui 'Z-list' i waenganui i te No 10 me Ms Dorries, he nēhi o mua, kua uaua mai i te wā i whakangahau ai te pirimia i a ia i roto i te Kotahitanga, e whakaahua ana i a ia he "pōrearea". I muri iho ka whakapāha a ia. I hopukina e Ms Dorries ngā kupu matua mā te whakaahua i a Tēnā Karauna rāua ko Te Tumuaki o George Osborne he "taitama whakahīhī tokorua" kāore i te whakapā atu ki te ao tūturu. I muri i te ngaronga o tōna tūru, ka kī atu a Lib Dem MP Lembit Opik, nāna i uru ki te Tangata Rongonui ahau i te tau 2010 i muri i te ngaronga o tōna tūru, ki te AO ko te kaiārahi Tūturu "kāore i te whakapā atu ki te āhua o te iwi". I tāpiri mai a ia: "E whakapouri ana ahau i te mea e whakaaro ana kua hē a ia ki te mahi i tētahi mea e whakapā atu ai ki te iwi whānui." Engari ko te MP o Tory o Mua, o Louise Mensch, nāna i whakarere i te Commons mō ngā take whānau, ā, he tino whakawhānui tōna kōrero ki a Ms Dorries i runga i tana whakataunga, ka tūtohu: "Kāore he mea pouri ake i te pāremata, i te pāremata rānei, i tētahi o aua whakaaturanga." I kī a Labour MP Steve McCabe: "He ngoikore rawa a David Cameron ki te aukati i te putanga mai o Nadine Dorries i runga i tētahi whakaaturanga pouaka whakaata pono. " Engari ahakoa i muri i te whakatārewa i a ia ka tere ake tana mahi i runga i tētahi MP nāna ia i karanga he 'tama whakahīhī' i tana mahi i runga i te wepu nui i oati ki tētahi pirihimana." I te wā o Hui tanguru 2010, i whai wāhi a Ms Dorries ki te rangatū pakipūmeka o te Hongere 4 Tower Block of Commons, i reira i neke atu ai ngā MP me ngā kaikerēme takuhe i runga i tētahi pānga kaunihera kua tangohia. I te tau 2006, ka anga atu a Hōri Galloway, te MP anake e noho ana i roto i tētahi whakaaturanga kēmu pono i tangohia ai ia i te Kotahitanga, i a ia e toru wiki i runga i te Tuakana Nui o Te Tangata Rongonui i te tau 2006, i anga atu hoki ki te whakahē i a ia e aro ana ki ōna wahanga.

title: I mahue i te wehi o Grenfell te wahine 'mataku ki te noho' i Salford flat
summary: Kua kī tētahi tangata o tētahi paraka pourewa e kākahu ana i ngā rawa ōrite ki tērā i te Pourewa o Grenfell, e tatari ana ki tōna tangohanga, kua mahue i a ia te mataku, i te pōhara.
text: I kī a Elizabeth Okpo, e noho ana i te Kōti Spruce o Salford, kua "mataku ia ki te noho" i tōna whare noho mai i te kōrero a te kaunihera ki a ia i te take i a Hōngongoi 2017. I whakatārewatia e te Kaunihera Taone o Salford te tangohanga o te kākahu i te marama kotahi i muri i ngā papa e toru ki te kimi i tētahi "rongoā pūmau". I kī tētahi kaikōrero kaunihera kua "tīmata anō" te mahi i ngā papa e 18 e toe ana. E whitu tekau mā rua ngā tāngata i mate i te ahi o Grenfell Tower i Rāwāhi i Pipiri 2017. Na tētahi pūrongo ki te tūkinotanga i huatau i hē te tāutatanga o te kākahu, ā, ko te take matua o te horahanga "kino" o te ahi. 'Moe me te Paipera' i kī a Ms Okpo i tono a ia me ētahi atu tangata kia nekehia i muri i te mōhiotanga mō te take kākahu, engari i whakakāhoretia e te pāhonotanga whare e whakahaere ana i te paraka mō te kaunihera, Pendleton Together. Ko ngā whika i whakaputaina i Poutāpeta i whakaatu i ngā arotakenga o ngā whare noho tiketike i Greater Manchester i kitea neke atu i te 75%, tae atu ki te iwa e whakahaeretia ana e Pendleton Together, i rahua ki te whakatutuki i ngā paerewa haumaru ahi. I kī te tau e 39 tau, e noho ana i te papa 13, he take tērā o te "mataku ki te noho i tō kāinga". "Ka haere ahau ki te moe me te Paipera, ka oho ake me te whakaaro 'whakawhetai ki te Atua kei te ora ahau'." I kī a ia i tino māharahara a ia mō ngā hoa noho hauā me ngā whānau whai tamariki i runga i ngā papa tiketike. I kī te pāhonotanga whare kāore e taea te kōrero mō ngā tono takitahi kia neke, engari i tāpiritia "kei te whakaritea ngā hātepe mārama mēnā e tono ana ngā kairīhi kia neke, i runga anō i te maha o ngā take matatini". Director of neighborhoods Amanda Garrard said tenant safety was "a top priority" and the association was "working... hei tango i te kākahu, tāutatia ngā tauhiuhi me ētahi atu pūoho". "I tīmata mātou ki te tango i ngā kākahu i raro noa iho i te tau ki mua, ā, ka tīmata ki te whakatinana i tētahi mahere katoa hei tango i ngā kākahu katoa e toe ana i te tīmatanga o tēnei marama." I tāpiritia e tētahi kaikōrero kaunihera kua "okioki te mahi nā te mea kei te mahi mātou ki te kimi i taua rongoā pūmau, ā, i hiahia mātou ki te whakaiti i te raruraru ki ngā tangata". I te wā o Me, ka oati te kāwanatanga ki te pūtea i te tangohanga me te whakakapinga o ngā kākahu haumaru kore mō ngā kaunihera me ngā pāhonotanga whare.

title: Te Whare Taonga Waka o Coventry: Kei te ara ngā mahere toronga
summary: Kua whakaaetia ngā mahere hei tono mō te tata ki te £5m hei huri i tētahi kura o mua o te rau tau 14 i Coventry hei pūranga mō te Whare Taonga Waka.
text: Kua kī te Pūtea Tārewa Tuku iho (HLF) ka taea e ngā kaiwhakahauhau te tono mō te £4.9m hei whakahou i te Kura Wetereo Tawhito. I kī a Gary Hall mai i te Whare Taonga Waka o Coventry: "Ka noho hei toronga ki te whare taonga, kotahi miriona ngā tuemi kei roto i tā mātou pūranga." Ki te angitu, ka kī a ia ka noho te whare ki ngā whakaaturanga hou e ono. Ka kī a Tēnā Hōro: "Ko te ariā kia whakaatuhia ētahi o ngā ahanoa, kia āhei ake ai te iwi whānui me ngā kura." I kī te Kaiwhakahaere o te Rōpū o Coventry, a Keith Draper, he "āwangawanga" te whare Kōeke 1 i te kokonga o te tiriti o Pīhopa me te whare tiriti o Hales he "āwangawanga" mō ngā tau maha. "We welcome any firm proposal to reuse the Old Grammar School, it's been at risk for many years and it's an important heritage building," he said.

title: Norwich Tesco cat ban after year-long welcome
summary: E kī ana te rangatira o tētahi poti kua rāhuitia i tētahi pātaka Tesco i muri i te hīkoi i ōna ara mo te tau kotahi, he "iti noa iho te pōraru" i te whakataunga.
text: I kī a Jo Harding i haere tana tāne kākano, ko Paukena te ingoa, ki te peka o Thorpe Marriott i Norfolk "i te nuinga o ngā rā" i te mea e tata ana ki to rātau kāinga. Engari i te pūrongo tuatahi a te Eastern Daily Press kua rāhuitia te mōkai ono tau i te toa. I kī a Tesco ko tētahi toa kai "ehara i te wāhi tino pai mō te ngeru". Ka kī a Ms Harding: "I ētahi wā ka puta mai ahau i muri i te mahi, ka kite i a ia e noho ana, ka kī atu 'haere mai ki te Paukena, hoki mai ki te kāinga mō tō tī' ā, ka hīkoi ia i muri i ahau." I kī a ia i whakatūria e ia he whārangi Facebook mō te poti i ngā marama maha ki mua "i te whakairinga tonu a te tangata i ngā pikitia ki ngā rōpū hapori e pātai ana ko wai te ngeru, ā, i whāngaia ahau ki te kī nāku a ia". Neke atu i te 500 ngā tāngata ināianei he mema o te rōpū kati. I kī a Ms Harding i "iti noa iho te pōraru" i te rāhuitanga. "Kāore au i te mōhio he aha i tonoa ai a Paukena kia haere ināianei," tana kī, ka tāpiri: "E kī ana rātau kua rāhuitia a ia, engari kāore au i te tino mōhio me pēhea rātau e ārai ai i a ia ki waho." I roto i tētahi kōrero, ka kī a Tesco: "Ahakoa e aroha ana mātou ki te poti kākano iti e toro ana... Ehara te toa kai i te wāhi tino pai mō te ngeru, nā reira ka āta whakahauhau o mātau hoa mahi i a ia kia haere ki waho ina ngana ia ki te haere mai."

title: Ka nui te koha a Mini-Me ki te aroha o Ballymoney
summary: Kua hoatu e te whetū o Austin Powers, a Verne Troyer, he koha ki tētahi aroha tamariki hauā o County Antrim kātahi anō ka ūkuia e ngā tāhae.
text: I tāhaetia e nga tāhae te £1,000 mai i te Compass Advocacy Network (CAN) i Ballymoney i Hānuere. Engari ināianei, kua homai e te whetū o Holywood, nāna i tūtaki ki te rōpū i Belfast, he "moni nui" hei āwhina i te aroha. Ka mahi a CAN me ngā tamariki i waenganui i te 12 me te 18 tau me ngā uauatanga akoranga. I whakaarahia te moni i tāhaetia mai i ngā wāhi o te aroha o Seymour Street i te wā o te whakahau a Ngā Tamariki e Hiahiatia ana. I kī te kaiwhakahaere o te aroha, a Linda McKendry, i "tino pāngia" rātau e te ohaoha o Troyer. I roto i tētahi reta ki a CAN ka kī a ia: "I rongo ahau i te mea i tūpono, ā, i hiahia noa ahau ki te āwhina i a koe me ngā tamariki. " Tēnā kōrero mai kia ora mai i a au. Me maumahara hoki ka taea e koe te mahi i ngā mea katoa e tautuhia ana e koe, kia tūmanako i ngā wā katoa." CAN is a registered charity that employs eight people and uses about 25 volunteers. Neke atu i te 240 ngā tāngata e whakamahi ana i ngā ratonga e whakaratohia ana e te aroha.

title: He ariā reka i hangaia he pakihi $40m
summary: Ko ngā kōtaha wiki o te rangatū The Boss o TE AO e kōtaha ana i ngā kaiārahi pakihi rerekē mai i te ao. I tēnei wiki ka kōrero mātou ki a Tara Bosch, te kaiwhakarewa me te rangatira nui o te umanga reka huka iti Smart Sweets.
text: Nā Kathryn KyteBusiness kaipānui Tara Bosch e whakaahua ana i a ia he "kahunga huka" o mua. "Ko au te tangata i te 7-11 i ia rā, e hoko ana i te mīharo pene," te kī a te tau 25 tau. "Engari i a au e pakeke ana, ka mōhio ahau ki te nui o te huka e pā ana ki taku ahua tinana, tōku whakaaro whaiaro, me taku whakaaro ki a au anō." Heoi, e whā tau ki muri, ka whāngaia e ia te pouri me te hauora o tōna whakaaro, ka mutu te kai huka a Tara. E kī ana a ia i tere tonu tana pai ake, engari i te ngaro i ana reka ka whakatau ia ki te mahi i ōna ake whiringa huka kore tāpiri i tōna kīhini i Vancouver, Kānata. I te whakamātautau i ngā tohutohu i te raumati o te tau 2015, ka whakaahuatia e ia he "haere ki te rapu". I te mutunga ka tino pai a ia ki ana hua, ka whakaaro ia tērā pea he wāhi pakihi. I taua ngahuru ka whakatau ia ki te peke i te whakapono, a, ka whakamātauria tēnei. I taka a Tara i te toru o nga tau o tētahi tohu toi i te Whare Wānanga o British Columbia, kia taea ai e ia te tiki i te hua i te whenua. E 21 noa iho i taua wā, he iti noa iho tōna hītori nama, ā, ko tana rawa anake he motokā iti e ono tau. Engari i mau i ngā tauira me te maia, i taea e ia te whakaū i te pūtea 105,000 tāra Kānata. I tēnei rā, kei te ara tonu tana kamupene ā-Vancouver, Smart Sweets, ki te kite i ōna moni 2019 neke atu i te CA$50m ($40m; £30m). Ko ōna awhe hua he kaiārahi mākete i te wāhanga o ngā rare huka iti e tipu tere ana i Kānata me te US. "I tēnei tau e āwhina ana mātou i ngā tāngata ki te whana i ngā tāngata neke atu i te kotahi miriona karamu huka," tana kī. Hei whakaū i te pūtea penapena tuatahi me tuhi e Tara tētahi mahere pakihi nui, me te matapae tipu e rua tau. A, he āhua whakararuraru, me tango e ia he inihua ora. "Ko tētahi o ngā whakaritenga o ngā rōpū e pā ana ko te inihua ora, ā, ko rātau te kaiwhiwhi," tana kī. Kore huka, kāore rānei? Mēnā kei te kimi koe ki te tapahi i tō kai huka, engari he niho reka tōu, ka pai ake pea ngā reka kore huka i ngā reka auau, e kī ana ngā tohunga kai. Engari kei roto tonu pea i a rātou ngā warowaihā, ā, ko ētahi he pūngoi nui, he nui hoki te waiwai o te ngako, te ngako trans rānei. "Kia maumahara nā te mea he 'huka kore' tētahi hua, ehara i te mea he hauora i ngā wā katoa," te kī a te American Heart Association. E hua ana hoki ētahi mātauranga ka whakaoho pea ētahi kaireka pūngoi kore, e kore ai e whai hua mō te hunga e ngana ana ki te whakawhāiti i tō rātou kai pūngoi. Na te haumaru o te pūtea, ka rapu a Tara i runga i te ipurangi mō ngā kaiwhakarato me ngā kaiwhakanao, ā, ka mahi ki te whakaoti i ana tohutohu. "Kātahi anō ka noho hei whakamātautau me te hapa o te tango i ia whitiauau kāore i mahi, me te hoatu i tētahi whakaaro hōu, kātahi ka whakamātau anō." tana kī. I whakatau a Tara ki te whakamahi i ngā weu tipu, me te stevia reka māori, hei tāwhai i te reka me te kanokano o ngā reka huka tūturu. Kātahi ka whakamahia e ia he ranunga īmēra, waea, whakaatu ā-tangata, ā, e kī ana ia, "Linkedin-ing". Ko te kaihoko tuatahi i waitohu ko Vancouver-based Choices Market, ā, e maumahara ana a Tara i tino āmaimai a ia i mua i te hui tuatahi. "I waea atu ahau, i īmēra atu i runga i te manawanui, tae noa ki te mutunga ka kī mai rātau kia tū," tana kī. "A, no taku taenga atu ki mua, i tino āmaimai ahau ka taraiwa atu ahau. " Kātahi ahau ka hoki whakamuri, ka hui, ā, ka noho ko rātau te kaihoko tuatahi ki te whai wāhi ki Smart Sweets." I muri tata iho ka whai mai ētahi atu mekameka iti o Kānata. "E ai ki taku kōrero, e pā ana ki te manawanui," tana kī. "Ka īmēra ahau me te whakaatu kia kī āe rā anō tētahi pakihi ki tētahi kōrerorero, ā, mai i reira ka angitu ahau." I whiwhi a Tara i ana kiritaki Amerika tuatahi i te tau 2018, ā, ināianei ko te US e pūkete ana mō te 80% o ngā hokonga a Smart Sweets. Ka tū hoki te hanganga o ngā rare i roto i a Mātau mā ngā kaiwhakarato kirimana. Ētahi atu āhuahira o te Pāhi: E kī ana te kaipakihi kai me te kaitohutohu o Amerika, a Scott Semel, e mīharo ana a ia ki te "hiahia" o Tara. "He tino angitu te moni ā-tau o CA$50m," te kī a Tēnā Semel, nāna i te tau 2016 i hoko tana toa tino pai o Bark Thins ki a Hershey. "Ehara i te mea ngāwari noa iho te tae ki te $5m, ā, he torutoru noa iho ngā kaitākaro nunui e whakanuia ana e ētahi kaitākaro nunui. Ki taku whakaaro he aha te mea tino mīharo mō te mahi CA$50m i te tau 2019 ko te tāpare wā i tutuki ai i a ia. "He tino pai te whakaaro o Tara mo te mākete... e whakaaro ana a ia ki mua." Ināianei me ngā kaimahi e 47, ka whakarite a Tara ki te tīmata ki te kaweake i ngā Smart Sweets ki waho o Amerika ki te Raki. E kī ana a ia kua puta mai te angitu o te kamupene i te mahi uaua me te manawanui. "Ki a au e tipu ana, ehara ahau i te atamai, i te tākaro rānei," tana kī. "Kāore au i tino whai pūmanawa, engari i ngā wā katoa i whai wāhi ahau ki te ohorere, te rauemi, me te kaha ki te mahi i tētahi mea mēnā i whakatau ahau e hiahia ana ahau ki te whakaputa. " Ko Smart Sweets te wā tuatahi i mōhio ai ahau ki te mana o aua mea e toru i whakakotahitia."

title: Haupae whakarite a Sunderland i runga i te pakitara kaukau kurī 'whatu'
summary: Kua whakahaua tētahi kaitiaki kurī o Sunderland nāna i whakarite he pakitara o tētahi kurī i roto i te kaukau i te taha o tōna whare whakangahau kia whiwhi whakaaetanga whakarite i muri i te whakaingoatanga he "karu" me tētahi pānuitanga.
text: I kī a Marcia Robson Dillon e "whakamārama" ana te pakitara i te wāhi tata ki tōna whare makawe o te Kurī. I whakaaro a ia kāore e hiahiatia e te peita te whakaaetanga whakarite i roto i te raka nā te mea kāore i te āhua o te ingoa o te salon. Engari i kī te Kaunihera o Sunderland me whiwhi whakaaetanga, me peita rānei. I kī a Ms Robson Dillon, nāna i whakahaere te salon i Te Huarahi o Te Ara mo te 12 tau, i piki ake te peita a te kaiwaiata paetata o Frank Styles i te wā o Me, engari kāore a ia i rongo mai i te kaunihera tae noa ki a Hōngongoi. Ka kī a ia: "I kī te kaunihera he amuamu, ā, me tono whakaaetanga whakarite ahau. " Mā tētahi atu pūtake i korerotia mai ki a mātau he karu tērā, ā, kei te whakahekea te āhua o te rohe e whakapono ana ahau he hē, e whakaaro ana ahau ka tīaho i te wāhi." I raro i ngā Ture Whakarite Taone me te Whenua, me iti iho i te 0.75 mita (2.4ft) te teitei o tētahi hoahoa e rite ana ki tētahi pānuitanga, me whai whakaaetanga whakarite rānei. He teitei ake te peita i te teitei o te ture. I kī tētahi kōrero mō te kaunihera i whakaarotia he pānuitanga te pikitia i te mea kei roto te kurī i te kaukau, ko tētahi o ngā ratonga i tukuna e te salon. I tāpiri mai a ia: "Mā te tono whakaaetanga whakarite e āhei ai ngā mema o te iwi whānui ki te whai kōrero mēnā e whakaae ana rātou ki te rahi me te āhua o ngā mea e tāutatia ana." Tae noa ki te 3 o Mahuru ka hoatu a Miss Robson Dillon.

title: I kitea te tinana i te wā e rapu ana a Paratira i te karere Kariki ngaro
summary: Kua kitea e nga pirihimana i Rio de Janeiro tētahi tinana i roto i tētahi motokā tahuna i rēhia e te karere Kariki ki Parīhi, o Kyriakos Amiridis.
text: I ngaro a Tēnā Amiridis, e 59, e toru rā ki muri i tana haerenga ki Awatea mai i Paratira mō ngā hākari tūturu o te Tau Hōu i te one o Copacabana. I kitea whakamutunga a ia i te Mane i te taone o Nova Iguacu i te pātiki o Awatea, i kitea ai te motokā. Kai te mahi nga tohunga ā ture i nga whakamātautau hai whakatū i te tuakiri o te tinana. I kitea te motokā o te karere i raro i te flyover i tētahi o ngā huarahi uru matua ki Awatea. I waea atu a ia ki tana wahine mai i tētahi whare noho i Nova Iguacu i te Mane e kī ana kei te haere a ia ki waho. Kāore anō a ia kia rangona mai i taua wā. E kī ana ngā pirihimana kāore e taea te kahakina a ia, notemea kāore he utu i rapuhia. He nui te pāpātanga hara o Awatea, ā, ehara i te mea rerekē ngā mahi taikaha, i te wā arokē i waenganui i te Kirihimete me te Tau Hōu, i te wā e haere ana ngā rau mano tūruhi ki te taone.

title: Ko ngā kitenga 'meteor' o te takutai o Cumbrian e tīmata ana i te rapunga poti whakaora
summary: Na te 'kōkiri' i pōhēhētia he mura āwangawanga i whakaoho i tētahi mahi rapu poti whakaora i te takutai o Ingarihi.
text: I kī te Tīma Whakaora o Maryport Coastguard i whiwhi pūrongo maha o tētahi ahanoa whero neke i runga i te moana i waenganui i Workington, Cumbria, me te Motu o Whithorn i te pō Rātapu. I whakatūpato rātau i a RNLI Workington, nāna i whakarewa he poti whakaora, engari kāore i kitea he mea i muri i te "rapunga mataiti" o taua rohe. I muri i ētahi atu uiui ka whakatauria he kōrere pea te kitenga. I kī tētahi kōrero mo te kaitiaki moana kua whiwhi pūrongo mai i ētahi atu wāhi o te whenua e pūrongo ana i ngā rama i te rangi. I whakaahuatia te matarere i whakapono nā rātou i whakaoho ngā waea i runga i Loch Ness i Pākehā.

title: E kī ana te whaea o Milly Main me 'hura te pono' i te uiui tūmatanui
summary: Kua kī te whaea o tētahi kōtiro 10 tau i mate i te hōhipera matua o Glasgow me "hura te pono" mō tōna matenga.
text: I mate a Milly Main i muri i te whakapokenga i te whare wānanga o te Whare Wānanga o Kuini Elizabeth i te tau 2017. Ka tirohia e te uiui tūmatanui, nā te tīmata i te Mane, ngā take i reira, i te Hōhipera Ariki hou mō ngā Tamariki me ngā Taitamariki i Etinitini. I tēnei wā kei te tūhuratia te matenga o Milly e nga kaiwhakawa. I tukuna e NHS Greater Glasgow rāua ko Clyde ngā taipitopito o tana tūhuratanga ki tōna matenga ki te rōia tōtika i te wā o Hui tanguru. "E pōhiritia ana e mātou te uiui tūmatanui e whai ake nei, ā, e tino whai wāhi ana mātou ki taua tukanga," te kī a te poari hauora i roto i tētahi kōrero. I te rongoatia a Milly i te Hōhipera Ariki mō ngā Tamariki i Glasgow, he wāhanga o te whare wānanga o te Hōhipera o te Whare Wānanga o Kuini Elizabeth (QEUH). E whakapono ana a Kimberly Darroch ko te matenga o tana tamāhine nā te wai tāhae i te hōhipera, engari e kī ana kei te "pouri" tonu te whānau. Mai i te rima o ona tau, i mate a Milly i te kano toto, engari i murunga i mua i te whakapokenga i te QEUH. I mate a ia i Aotearoa 2017, me tana tiwhikete mate e whakarārangi ana i tētahi mate stenotrophomonas o te raina Hickman - he catheter i whakamahia hei whakahaere rongoā - hei take o te mate. E kī ana te whānau kāore rātau i kōrerotia mō te hononga ki ngā raruraru wai tāhae i te hōhipera. I kī a Ms Darroch, e 36, mai i Lanark: "Tata ki te toru tau mai i te matenga o Milly, ka rongo mātou i te ngaromanga o ta māua tamāhine i ia rā, ā, kei te pouri tonu mātou mō tōna matenga. " Having been let down by the health board, we hope the public inquiry will uncover the truth about what happened at the hospital - not only for us but for all the families affected and to ensure no other family ever has to go through what we went through." I kī a Labour MSP mō Glasgow Anas Sarwar me noho ngā whānau i te ngākau o te tūhuratanga. 'Tūkinotanga ā-motu' Ka kī a ia: "He nui te pēhanga i runga i tēnei uiui tūmatanui, me tuku whakautu mō ngā mātua, ngā tūroro me te iwi whānui. " Ko ngā rahunga kino i te QEUH, me ngā raruraru e pā ana ki ngā Tamariki Mate i Etinitini, he tūkinotanga ā-motu." I kī a Tēnā Sarwar kua ngaro te whakawhirinaki tūmatanui ki ngā take me te "angitu, rahunga rānei" o te uiui i runga i te "whiwhi whakautu mō ngā mātua o Milly me ngā whānau katoa e pāngia ana". I kī a NHS Greater Glasgow rāua ko Clyde: "E tino pouri ana mātou kāore i taea e mātou te whakarato urupare pai ki te whānau o Milly ki ngā pātai kāore anō kia whakautua mō rātou, ā, ka mōhio ki te āwangawanga tāpiri i hua mai i tēnei." I whakaūngia e tētahi arotakenga takitahi a Health Protection Scotland ki te puna wai te tāhaetanga o te pūnaha i te tau 2018.

title: Ka hangaia e nga rōpū rongoā te 'āwhā tino tika' i Ipswich
summary: Na te tutu rōpū e pā ana ki te rongoā i tētahi taone o Te Taone o Te Taone i hangaia he "āwhā tino tika" e pā ana ki ngā tamariki e 12 tau, e kī ana tētahi pūrongo.
text: I kitea e te mātauranga a te Whare Wānanga o Te Whare Wānanga o Te Whare Wānanga o "I whakamahia auautia e ēnei rōpū te tukino, ngā tuma me te whakahauhau ki te whakahaere i ngā tamariki mōrearea me ngā taitamariki," te kī a te pūrongo. I kī ngā Pirihimana o Te Pirihimana e mahi ana ngā tamariki hei "kaiomaoma" ki te tuku rongoā. I kī hoki te pūrongo, i whakaritea e te kaunihera o te rohe, kua kitea ngā tamariki me ngā rangatahi i pūrongotia e ngaro ana i Rāwāhi i ngā wāhitau o Te Wānanga A e mōhiotia ana kia whakamahia mō te mahi rongoā o te Tauaha A. E kī ana ko Jubilee Park, he wāhi tango o Ipswich, kua whakaritea e nga rōpū me ngā kāinga o nga kahunga e tangohia ana hei turanga mo nga kaihoko rongoā. Na te mōhiotanga a nga pirihimana i huatau hoki e rokiroki ana nga rōpū i ngā rākau ki ngā tauwāhi mahi me te whakarākei i ngā kaioma ki ngā maripi. "I kitea tēnei momo tutu i ētahi atu wāhi o Te Wānanga i reira i waiwai ai te mākete rongoā kore mana, ā, he mura te whakataetae i waenganui i ngā kaihoko," te kī a te pūrongo. I kī tētahi o ngā kaituhi o te pūrongo, a Paora Andell, ko te pikinga o te tukinotanga o te rōpū rongoā, tērā pea nā te hekenga o ngā tau pirihimana me te tapahi ki ngā ratonga tūmatanui. Te haumi i roto i ngā rangatahi "Tērā tētahi whakaaro e kore rātau (hunga hara) e mahi pakari (e ngā pirihimana paetata)," tana kī. "Ka waihangatia e ēnei take katoa he āwhā tino tika." I kī a Junior Smart, tētahi mema rōpū o Ipswich o mua, he kaimahi taitamariki ināianei ki te St Giles Trust, me pai ake te whakawhitiwhiti kōrero a ngā umanga katoa e pā ana ki te ārai i te hara me te rangatahi. "Kāore ngā umanga i te kōrero tētahi ki tētahi - i ētahi take he rohe kē atu ngā umanga i ngā rōpū," tana kī. I kī te Kaiāwhina Rangatira Kāhui o Te Rūnanga "Kei te haumi mātou ki te rangatahi mō tō rātou wā heke mai ki te kimi huarahi kia ora ai rātou i ō rātou oranga, kaua e uru ki te ao rongoā."

title: E whā ngā Mārena me tētahi rangatū pouaka whakaata Funeral e hangaia ana
summary: Mēnā e hiahia ana mātou ki ētahi atu take kia aroha ai mātou ki a Mindy Kaling, kātahi anō ka pūrongotia kei te mahi a ia i tētahi putanga pouaka whakaata hōu o te whitiāhua Whā Mārena me te Nehunga.
text: Mā te whetū o Te Kaupapa Mindy e tuhi, e whakaputa ana i te rangatū. Ko te rom-com o te tau 1994 e whetū ana ki a Hugh Grant hei Charles pārekareka. Ināianei kei te hangaia hei rangatū me Rārangi Curtis, nāna i tuhi te pikitia, i runga anō i te papa. Ka whai i tētahi rōpū hoa puta noa i ngā takahanga e rima o te taitara, e ai ki te Rā Kati Karaihe. Kei te mahi tahi a Kaling, nāna hoki i whetū me te tuhi tahi i te sitcom US The Office, me te kaiwhakanao nui o te Kaupapa Mindy, o Mātā Warburton. Kei te hangaia te hōputu hōu e te pae roma o Amerika o Hulu me Curtis hei kaiwhakanao nui. E pūrongotia ana ka taea te whai i tētahi huinga pūāhua rerekē i tētahi tauwāhi rerekē i ia tau, ā, ka noho ōrite tonu te ārahi. Kāore anō kia mōhiotia mēnā ka hoki mai anō ngā huatau o te 90, mēnā rānei ka tautuhia ki te US, ki te UK rānei. Ko te pikitia, nāna i hanga he whetū o Grant, e kōrero ana i te pūrākau o tōna pūāhua ko Charles, e noho ana i Rānana, ā, e aroha ana ki tētahi Amerika ko Carrie, i tākarotia e Andie MacDowell. E whakaatu ana i a Charles me tana rōpū hoa e whakatere ana i ngā mārena e whā me tētahi poroporoaki pouri.
