I haere tonu a Curtis ki te tuhi i tētahi aho o ngā taunga tae atu ki Notting Hill me Love Actually, e hāngai ana hoki ki a Grant. Whāia mātou i Facebook, i Twitter @BBCNewsEnts, i Instagram rānei i bbcnewsents. Mēnā he huatau pūrākau tāu, īmēra entertainment.news@bbc.co.uk.

title: I whakaūngia e te rangatira pirihimana o Te Raki o Wales, a Carl Foulkes
summary: Ko te pare i ngā tāngata mōrearea, pēnei i ngā tūkinotanga o te tūkinotanga i te kāinga, he manakē matua mō te kātipa pirihimana hou o Te Raki o Wales.
text: Ko Carl Foulkes, he tuarua i Ngā Pirihimana o Merseyside, ka mahi i te tūranga i Whiringa ā Rangi. I kī a ia i te kōhurutanga o tētahi wahine me ana tamāhine tokorua i te West Midlands i te tau 2003 i arotahi ai ana mahi ki te whiu i te tūkino i te kāinga. I muri i tana mahi i roto i te Royal Navy, ka mahi ia mō ngā Pirihimana Waka o Ingarangi i mua i tana uru atu ki te ope West Midlands. I whakaūngia tana wāhui i te Mane e te Pae Pirihimana me te Hara o Te Raki o Wales. Ko Tēnā Foulkes, e 47, nō Caergwrle, tata ki Wrexham, engari i neke atu tōna whānau i a ia e tamariki ana. I uru a Tēnā Foulkes ki tētahi tūhuratanga kōhuru i muri i te matenga o te wahine 25 tau me ana tamāhine tamariki. I muri iho ka kitea te tangata i whakapaea ki te patu i a rātau e taronatia ana i roto i te whare herehere. "Ina kite koe i tētahi mea pēnei i roto i tētahi whānau taitamariki e haere ana ngā mea katoa mō rātou, ka mōhio koe me mahi mātou i tētahi mea rerekē mō te wā heke," tana kī. "Ko te tikanga kia kaua tātau e whai i aua mahi." Kua oati hoki a ia ki te rutu i te hara nui, i whakaritea hoki, otirā ko ngā kēhi o ngā Raina Rohe e rapu ai ngā rōpū mai i ngā tāone pērā i Īwīwī me Manatū "e rapu ana i ngā rohe hou mō ā rātou whatunga mahi rongoā". I tū te kātipa matua o Te Raki o Te Raki, a Mark Polin, i a Hōngongoi.

title: Extinction Rebellion: E hīkoi ana a Glastonbury e ngā kaiwhakahaere āhuarangi
summary: E hia mano nga kaihaere hākari kua whai wāhi ki tētahi hīkoi whakahē huringa āhuarangi i te Hākari o Glastonbury.
text: The event, a collaboration between Extinction Rebellion and Greenpeace, started at the Park Stage and ended at the Stone Circle. I te mutunga o te hīkoi, ka hangaia e te huihuinga he whakairo tangata nui o te karaehe haora hei tohu i te ngaro. I kī a Ruairi Brogan, he tauira nō Belfast: "E whakaaro ana ahau ka maumaharatia hei tīmatanga o tētahi mea, o te huringa." E whakaahua ana a Extinction Rebellion i a ia anō he "nekehanga ao whānui" e whakamahi ana i te "tūkinotanga ā-iwi" hei kawe mai i ngā take pēnei i te huringa āhuarangi ki mua. I Aperira, ka kitea e ngā whakahē a ngā kaiwhaiwhai o te rōpū puta noa i Rāwāhi e 1,130 ngā tāngata i hopukina mō ngā hara maha. I kī a Ashleigh Hodges, e 28, mai i Rāwāhi, i hapa a ia i te whakahē i Aperira nā te mea e mahi ana a ia. "I werohia ahau nā reira i taku rongonga e puta ana i konei i hiahia ahau ki te haere mai [ki Glastonbury]," tana kī. "E hiahia ana te katoa ki te whakaora i te ao - he mea tino ātaahua." I kī a Daryl Haines, e 21, mā te haere ki tētahi hākari ka mōhio te tangata kāore rātau e hiahia ki ngā pounamu kirihou, ki te kaukau rānei i ia rā. I tāpiri mai a ia: "Me whakaako te tangata ka taea e tātau te huri. Ki taku whakaaro i tino whakarongo te tangata i tēnei rā." Ka tīmata tika te pūoro i te hākari i te Paraire, me ngā whakaaturanga matua a Stormzy, The Streets me The Cure i te mutunga wiki. I roto i ngā whakahēnga o Rāwāhi i Aperira, ka āraia e ngā kaiwhakahaere ngā huarahi i Marble Arch, i mua i te neke atu ki Oxford Circus, Waterloo Bridge, Piccadilly Circus me Parliament Square. Neke atu i te £6,000 te tūkinotanga i te tari matua o Shell i Belvedere Road. Neke atu i te 10 rā ka whakapiria e ngā kaiwhakahaere i a rātau ki runga i ngā tereina i runga i te rerewhenua māmā o Rāwāhi, ka haere ki te Taunga Rererangi o Heathrow, ka whakapiri i a rātau ki te tomokanga o te Whakawhiti Hea o Rāwāhi, ā, ka mekameka i a rātau ki te kāinga o te kaiārahi Mahi, a Jeremy Corbyn.

title: Kāore pea e tautohetohetia te rautaki waka huarahi a Guernsey
summary: Kua pānuitia e te tari kāwanatanga nāna i tuhi te pūrongo waka huarahi hou a Guernsey e hiahia ana ki te unu.
text: I whakaputaina e te Tari Taiao tana pūrongo i Whiringahora hei wāhanga o te rārangi take mo te hui o Whiringa ā Rangi. Minister Peter Sirett said the move was due to Island Coachways' withdrawal from talks over a new contract. I kī a ia e tautohetohe ana i tētahi rautaki ā muri ake "i te wā o te ratonga pahi o nāianei... kua pātaitia, ka tino uaua, ā, tērā pea he koretake". I muri i te tango tohutohu mai i te tari o te Bailiff, ināianei ka tono te tari ki ngā mema o Kāwanatanga kia whakaae ki te takaware. Kua whakahētia te waea tuku iho i te rīpoata e ētahi kawana mo te whānui rawa. Kua whakaahuatia e ngā kawana o Mātā Fallaize rāua ko Tom Le Pelley te pūrongo hei tuhinga matapakinga e taka poto ana i te mahi a te tari ki te whakarato rautaki. I te wā o te whakawhitiwhitinga, ka tautāwhi a Tuarua Sirett, e kī ana kua iti rawa te aronga o tana tari e ngā mema o Amerika i te wā o te whakaritenga. I tēnei wā ka karangatia e Tuarua Jan Kuttelwascher i te Wenerei kia whakarerea nga mema tōrangapū o te poari, e whakaahua ana i te āhuatanga o nāianei he "āhua pouri o nga take". Island Coachways announced on Monday it had pulled out of negotiations with the Environment Department for a new contract. Ka pau te mahi o nāianei i te 31 o Hakihe, ahakoa kua tukuna e te kamupene kia whakaroa atu mā te toru marama i te wā e ngana ana ngā Kāwanatanga ki te kimi i tētahi kaikirimana hou.

title: Hurricane Irma: Ka whakatuwhera anō a Pārera i ngā Pātuhi i tūkinotia e te āwhā
summary: Kua whakatuwhera anō ētahi wāhanga o ngā Pātuhi o Pāremata, ngā moutere pāpaku i pā ki te tāwhara o te Āwhā o Te Rātapu.
text: Kei te rāhuitia te tomokanga ki ngā tangata whenua me ngā rangatira pakihi i te wā e haere tonu ana te mahi ki te whakawātea i ngā huarahi me te tirotiro i te āhua o ngā arawhata e hono ana i ngā moutere. Tata ki te 6.9 miriona ngā kāinga kāore he hiko i Pārera, Georgia, North Carolina, South Carolina me Alabama. Mai i tērā wā, kua tere te ngoikore, kei te honoa ki ngā mate 11 i te US. He aha i tohungia ai a Florida i te kino rawa atu o Irma? E whitu ngā tāngata i mate i Pāremata, e toru i Hōria, kotahi i South Carolina, e ai ki te pāpāho o Amerika. I mahue hoki i te āwhā he huarahi whakangaromanga i te Kāriana, e tata ana ki te 40 ngā tāngata i mate. Kua tae mai te Perehitini Wīwī o Emanuera Macron ki te rohe, ā, ka haere ki ngā moutere Wīwī kua tūkinotia, i te wā e haere ana te Hēkeretari Ā-Rohe o UK, a Te Hēkeretari Ā-Rohe o UK, o Te Hēkeretari Ā-Rohe o Ingarangi, o Te Whenua o Ingarangi. Kua whakahētia a Wīwī rāua ko Ingarangi mo te kore e nui te mahi hei āwhina i o rātau iwi i ngā rohe o rāwāhi e pāngia ana e te āwhā. I noho a Kingi Willem-Alexander i te pō Mane i te taha o Hōrana o Hato Mātini, he motu i waenganui i Wīwī me Hōrana. I kī atu a ia ki te kaipānui tūmatanui NOS: "Kua kite ahau i te pakanga tika me ngā tūkinotanga māori i mua, engari kāore anō ahau kia kite i tētahi mea pēnei." I whakamahia e te Kāwana o Pārera a Rick Scott te kupu ōrite - "whakangaromanga" - i muri i te rere i runga i ngā Pātuhi i te Mane. "E tūmanako ana ahau kia ora te katoa," tana kī. "He weriweri tā mātou i kite ai." "I kite mātou i te nui o ngā poti i horoia ki uta, ā, i kite mātou i tētahi, i tētahi pāka tauranga i reira." E whakaaro ana te Federal Emergency Management Agency kotahi i roto i ngā kāinga e whā i ngā Kī kua ngaro, ā, e 60% i pakaru. E hia mano ngā tāngata i waiho ngā waea kia whakanuku i tērā wiki, a, ka piri ki ngā moutere mōrearea i te wā o te āwhā. Heoi anō, i tāpiri mai a Kāwana Scott: "Kāore au i kite i te tūkinotanga i whakaaro ahau ka kite ahau." Ko te āwhā i puta "ehara i te kino ki tā mātou i whakaaro ai", tana kī. Kei te mahi tonu ngā tīma ki te whakawātea i te Huarahi 1, te huarahi e tūhono ana i te nuinga o ngā moutere nohoia, ā, kei te haere tonu ngā arotakenga piriti. I whakaaetia ētahi tangata ki ngā taone o Key Largo, Tavernier me Islamorada i te ata Tūrei, ka kī ngā mana i te Whenua o Monroe. I whakatūpatotia rātau he iti noa iho ngā ratonga i runga i ngā moutere: ko te nuinga o ngā wāhi kāore tonu he hiko me te wai, he pārekareka ngā tohu waea pūkoro, ā, kei te kati tonu te nuinga o ngā teihana penehīni. Kua tae mai te kaikawe rererangi o Amerika a Aperahama Lincoln i Awherika me ētahi atu kaipuke moana i taua rohe i te Tūrei ki te āwhina ki te tohatoha kai ki ngā Pātuhi me te whakanuku i ngā tangata. I Jacksonville, i kī te Koromatua o Lenny Curry e 356 ngā tāngata i whakaorangia i waenganui i ngā āwhā nui me te waipuke, i pūrongotia e te Florida Times-Union. I muri i te whakawehi a te kaiwhakahaere ki te whiu i ngā kaimahi i whakanuku wawe rawa mō Irma. "Kāore e taea e koe te whakanuku i te Paraire mō tētahi takahanga āwhā o te Tūrei!" te kī a te kaiwhakahaere o te wharekai ki ngā kaimahi i roto i tētahi pānui, i tiria tuihonotia. I tīmata ngā kaiwhakahaere o Jacksonville ki te whakahau i tētahi whakawhitiwhiti whakahau mō ētahi wāhi o te taone i te Paraire. I roto i tētahi kōrero, ka kī a Pizza Hut kāore te kaiwhakahaere nāna i whakairi te pānui i whai i ngā tohutohu a te kamupene. Ko ētahi atu wāhi o te kāwanatanga i mawhiti māmā i te āwhā i whakaritea ki ngā moutere o Kāriana. "Ko te waipuke āwhā i Miami he hautanga noa iho o te mea i tūpono mēnā i te rāwhiti kē atu te uho o te āwhā," te kī a Rick Knabb, te kaiwhakahaere o mua o te National Hurricane Center, i roto i tētahi tweet. I whakahekea te āwhā i a ia e neke ana ki te raki ki Atarangi, Hōria, me te mōrahi o ngā hau tautoko o te 35mph (56km/h), te kī a te National Hurricane Center (NHC) i roto i tētahi kōrero. Ko tētahi atu āwhā, ko Jose, kua ngoikore i runga i te uru o Te Moananui-a-Kiwa, me te pupuhi nā te pānga ki ētahi wāhi o Hispaniola (i wehe te motu ki Haiti me te Dominican Republic), te Bahamas, me ngā Moutere Turks me Caicos, ā muri ake i tēnei wiki.

title: E tiaki ana ngā tūao RSPB i te taiwhenua manu o Kessingland
summary: E mātakitaki ana ngā tūao me ngā kaitiaki manu i tētahi taiwhenua o ngā terns iti i Suffolk kia angitu ai te whakatipu i a rātou.
text: The RSPB is staffing Kessingland's shingle beach to record detailed data about the colony for the first time and ensure the birds are not disturbed. E toru tekau mā toru ngā kōhanga, e 50 ngā manu me ngā pīpī e ono kei runga i te pae i tēnei wā. E parea ana rātau e tētahi taiapa hiko huri noa i te whenua tāuri 7,500 mita māra. Ahakoa e 100 ngā takirua tāuri o ngā kōhanga iti i te one i te tau 2013, kāore he pīpī i ora ki te rere i ngā kōhanga, engari kāore e taea e ngā katipa te mōhio he aha te mea i tūpono. "Kāore i rawaka ngā rauemi hei aroturuki taipitopito i te pae, ā, ka taea anake te taki i ia wiki, neke atu rānei," te kī a te katipa RSPB, a Jesse Timberlake. "Tērā pea he whāranu o te tūkinotanga a ngā kestrels me ētahi atu kararehe, ngā tai tiketike me ngā tāngata e whakararuraru ana i te koroni - kāore mātou i te mōhio. " That's why we're trying to record some really good baseline data this year, help educate visitors to the beach and learn what we can do to better protect them in the coming year." He pā te Rāwhiti o Te Rāwhiti mō te momo, ko ōna tau iti he "āwangawanga atawhai" mō te RSPB. Neke atu i te 30% o te taupori tāuri o UK i te rohe i ngā marama raumati. I tāpiri mai a Tēnā Timberlake: "E anga ana ngā terns iti ki te maha o ngā tuma mai i ngā kurī, te whakararuraru tangata me ngā kaiwhaiwhai. " Ahakoa ko ngā manu tākaro, ka puta mai he manu pārurenga nui, ka puta ēnei manu rere ki te wehe i tō rātou kōhanga me te whakarere i tō rātou koroni. "He wā tino nui tēnei mō rātou, nā reira kei te kaha mātou ki te whakarite kia whai wāhi whawhai ēnei manu i te tau 2014, ā, kei te pai te āhua o ngā tohu." I kī te aroha he iti iho te iwi whānui ā iwi me te 1,900 ngā takirua tāuri, ko te tikanga he momo "whakanui ake i te āwangawanga atawhai ā-motu". I kī te RSPB e toru nga kōhanga mowhiti i kitea i Kessingland, ā, ka tūmanakohia kia paopao wawe.

title: William rāua ko Kate i Airani: Ka haere te tokorua ariki ki Galway
summary: I whakamātauria e te Ariki me te Ariki o Kemipia ngā hākinakina Gaelic i Galway i te rā whakamutunga o ta rāua haerenga mana tuatahi ki te Whenua o Airani.
text: I haere a Prince William rāua ko Catherine ki tētahi karapu Gaelic Athletic Association (GAA) i ta rāua tautohetohe whakamutunga i te haerenga. I whakamōhiotia rātau i mua mo te wāhuitanga o Galway hei Pūmatua Ahurea o Ūropi 2020. Neke atu i te 300 ngā kaingākau pai i huihui ki te pokapū o te taone ki te mihi ki te tokorua i to rāua taenga mai i te Tāite. I Salthill i taea ai e te ariki me te ariki te whakaatu i o rāua pūkenga tākaro, i te whakamātau i te whutupōro Gaelic me te maka. Hundreds of volunteers spent the weeks leading up to the visit painting and refurbishing the club. I uru atu ngā mema o te tīma i raro i te 10 ki te tokorua o te Ariki ki te whakatata i ta rāua haerenga hanga piriti ki Airangi. I haere hoki a William rāua ko Kate ki te pātaka o Tig Cóilí ki te tūtaki i ngā mema o te hapori tūao o Galway. I whakapāha te ariki ki tana wahine i muri i te kitenga i tētahi hoa o Aston Villa i roto i te pae, ā, ka tāia ki te kōrero mō te whutupōro. I hīkoi hoki rātau i te pokapū o te taone, i tūtaki ai rātau ki ētahi o ngā rau tāngata i huihui ki te mihi ki a rātau. I ta rātau haerenga ki Galway i whakaatu i tētahi whakaaturanga o te hōtaka Pūmatua Ahurea o Ūropi 2020 o te taone. I whakamōhiotia rātau ki ngā kaupapa pēnei i Livefeed, e tautoko ana i ngā rangatahi i te tirohanga pūoro o Galway, me te Galway Community Circus. I te Wenerei, ka pau te wā o te ariki me te ariki i ngā whakaritenga whai mana ki te haere i tētahi ara pari takutai tata ki Howth i County Dublin, ka tūtuki ki ētahi tāngata paetata i te huarahi. I tīmata te haerenga o te tokorua ki te Whenua o Aiarangi i te Tūtira i a rāua e tūtaki ana ki te Perehitini o te whenua, a Michael D Higgins me tana wahine i to rāua kāinga whai mana o Áras an Uachtaráin. I muri i ngā tapuwae o Kuini Irihāpeti i te tau 2011, ka haere te tokorua ki te Kāri Whakamaharatanga o Dublin i Dublin. I reira ka whakatakotoria e rātau he kupenga me te karere tuhituhi-ā-ringa: "Kia kaua e wareware ki a tātau ngā akoranga o te hītori i a tātau e haere tonu ana ki te hanga tahi i tētahi wā mārama ake." I haere rātau ki tētahi pōhiri i te Whare Pātaka o Guinness i Dublin, ā, pērā i tōna kuia, ka kōrero a William i ētahi kupu o Airani, e kōrero ana ki ngā manuhiri mā te kī: "E nga tuakana, e nga tāne, he dhaoine uaisle [iwi rangatira]." Engari kāore i rite ki tōna kuia, i tangohia e ia te tono kia whakamātau i te Guinness i te wā i ringihia mōna, ka whakapuaki i te toast Airani "sláinte" [hauora] i a ia e whakaara ana i tana pint. Ko to rātau rā tuarua he haerenga ki Jigsaw, te National Centre of Youth Mental Health. Nō muri ka tūtaki rātau ki ngā kaimahi o te aroha tika pāpori Extern i mua i te haerenga ki te Whare Wānanga o Howth Marine ki te ako mō te toitūtanga o te moana. I roto hoki i te haerenga o te Wenerei he haerenga ki te Mana Whanaketanga Ahuwhenua me te Whanaketanga Kai o Airani, e mōhiotia ana ko Teagasc, me te Museum of Literature Ireland.

title: Ko te kaihanga inu ngohengohe AG Barr e whakapoke ana i te hinganga
summary: Kua whakanuia e te kaihanga o Irn Bru me ētahi atu inu ngohengohe ngā hokonga i tēnei tau.
text: I kī a AG Barr i piki ake ngā hoko i te 4.3% i roto i ngā marama e toru mai i Hui tanguru ki te mutunga o Aperira i whakaritea ki te 2011. Ahakoa te huarere kino o Aperira, te ngoikore o te hokohoko kaihoko me "te mākete inu ngohengohe uaua i te ahuwhānui". I kī te rōpū ā-Cumbernauld e tūmanako ana kia piki tonu ngā utu i tēnei tau. Heoi anō, i roto i tana kōrero hou rawa ka kī te kamupene "kei te haere tonu ngā mahi whakahaere hei whakamauru i te pānga ki ngā tawhē me ngā huringa utu kua oti me ngā mahere tōtika tāpiri hei tautoko i ā mātou mahi mana utu mo te wā roa ake". I kī a AG Barr kua haumi ki te mākete puta noa i ōna toa uho, tae atu ki tana whakahau pānuitanga pouaka whakaata tuatahi mō te pūkenga Rubicon i hokona e ia i te tau 2008.

title: Ka tutuki ngā urupare waka tūroro ki te ūnga wā matua
summary: Kua tutuki i ngā waka tūroro i Uēra tētahi ūnga wā matua mō te urupare ki ngā ohotata tino mōrearea i muri i te huringa o te āhua o te whakaakoranga o ngā waea.
text: Tata ki te 69% o ngā waea whero waehere i urupare i roto i te waru meneti i Whiringahora, he nui ake i te ūnga 65%. Neke atu i te 5% o ngā waea 999 katoa i raro i te ūnga i taua marama, i whakaritea ki te 40% i mua i te tīmatanga o te whakamātautau tau. I kī te Minita Hauora Tuarua o Vaughan Gething e mahi ana te pūnaha hou, engari e tautohetohe ana ngā rōpū ātete i te kerēme. "E mōhio ana mātou he uaua pea te huringa i roto i te ratonga hauora - mō ngā kaimahi me te iwi whānui," te kī a Tēnā Gething. "Heoi anō, ko ngā whika tuatahi mai i tēnei kaihautū e huatau ana ko te tauira urupare rongoā hōu e whakarite ana kei te whiwhi ngā tūroro i te tiaki tika, i te wāhi tika, i te wā tika." I kī a Tracey Myhill, te rangatira nui o te Ratonga Waka Tūroro o Welsh: "Kua tino mārō tā mātou tīmatanga i runga i tēnei kaihautū hou pakaru whenua, ā, ko ngā whika o tēnei rā he kawenata o tērā." 'I roto i te pouri' i kī ai te kaiārahi Welsh Lib Dem o Kirsty Williams e māharahara ana a ia kua kore te "nuinga" o ngā waea ohorere i raro i ngā ūnga e pā ana ki te wā, kua whakaputaina rānei ētahi raraunga mahinga. Ka kī a ia: "Mā tēnei kāwanatanga whakarite hou e ngāwari ake ai te ora mō ngā minita Mahi, mā te hoatu i tētahi panekōrero tōraro iti iho i ia marama, engari ko te mea pono kei te mahue te tangata i roto i te pouri ki te pai o te mahi a tā rātou ratonga waka tūroro." I whakamāramatia e te kaikorero hauora o Plaid Cymru, a Elin Jones rāua ko Ms Williams, ko ngā waka tūroro i roto i ngā wāhi poari hauora e toru - Hywel Dda, Cwm Taf me Powys - kāore tonu i tutuki i te paepae 65% mō ngā waea whero waehere i urupare i roto i te waru meneti. "Kei te raruraru tonu te kāwanatanga o Labour ki te whakatutuki i ōna ūnga whakamākū," te tāpiri mai a Ms Jones. "He hē ki te kāwanatanga te karanga i tana mahinga he angitu." I whakakāhore te kāwanatanga o Welsh i te kerēme a Ms Williams mō te kore raraunga i runga i ngā waea whero-kore, e tohu ana kua whakaputaina hoki ngā raraunga urupare mō ngā waea amipere. 'Pūtea penapena tāpiri' Te minita hauora o te kōruru o Te Aotearoa, ka whakamihi ki te ratonga waka tūroro i runga i nga whika. "Ahakoa he iti iho ngā ūnga i ērā atu wāhi i te UK, he whakatutukitanga nui tēnei, ā, me whakamihi ngā kaimahi pukumahi," tana kī. Engari i tāpiri mai a Tēnā Millar: "Ko te whakautu ki te whakapai ake i te mahinga kāore e takoto ana i roto i te huarahi Mahi o te tango ūnga me te pūkete i ngā utu pūtea NHS; Engari, me kite mātou i te pūtea penapena tāpiri i roto i te ratonga waka tūroro me tā mātou pūnaha tiaki kāore i whakahōtakatia."

title: I whakapaea e te kaitiaki taone nui he 'whakahē whakaharahara' i runga i te uiui ki ngā kaupapahere 30m
summary: Te āhua nei kua mahia e te kaiwhakarite o te Taone tētahi "whakatakotoranga whakaharahara" mā te whakaae kia tūmatanui wawe ngā taipitopito o tētahi tūhuratanga umanga inihua, kua kī tētahi MP matua.
text: I kī te manukura o te komiti o te Pūtea Moni o Te Kotahitanga, a Andrew Tyrie, tērā pea kua "tūkinotia te maia kiritaki". I kī te Mana Whanonga Pūtea (FCA) i te Paraire ka tirohia te hokonga o ngā kaupapahere 30 miriona e wātea ana ki te £150bn. Ka tirohia he pēhea te māturu o te rongo, ka tuki ki ngā hea i roto i ngā kamupene inihua. Ka titiro te uiui ki ngā hekenga, ngā whakawhiwhinga, ngā here pūtea penapena me ngā kaupapahere whakaū ora i hokona i te UK i waenganui i ngā tau kotahi mano e waru tekau mā rua me te 2000. I whakaritea e te WHK te whakapuaki i te rūpahu i roto i tana mahere pakihi ā-tau i te Mane, engari i whakaaturia mai ngā taipitopito i mua i te hōtaka e te The Daily Telegraph. I kī a Otto Thoreson, ko te tumuaki o te Association of British Insurers, na te pūrākau i puta ai te "mōrearea tūturu i roto i ngā mākete pūtea penapena". Ka kī a Tēnā Tyrie: "I te aroaro o taua mea, he whakahē whakaharahara tēnei. " He tino nui kia whai whakamāramatanga katoa, pūataata hoki tātau mo te āhua o tētahi hē tino nui i mahia e a tātau kaitiaki ratonga pūtea - te tinana i whakaritea e te Pāremata hei whakaū i ngā tikanga whanonga tiketike. "Te āhua nei kua pakaru te tikanga e tukua tika ana ngā mōhiohio tairongo mākete ki ngā kaiuru katoa i te wā kotahi." 'Rangirua' i kī atu a Tēnā Thoreson ki te HAU: "Ko te mea i tūpono he kōrero tōmua o tētahi mahere pakihi ka whakaputaina i te Mane." "Engari nā te mea ki tētahi nūpepa, ā, i tuhia hei pūrākau me te kore e taea e mātau e uru ana ki te umanga ki te whakaū i ngā take, ko tāu i kite ai ko te rangirua i waihangatia i roto i ngā mākete pūtea penapena." Ā muri ake i te Paraire, ka tukuna e te WHK tētahi kōrero hei urupare ki ngā māharahara me pēhea tana whakahaere i te putanga o ngā rongo mō tana tūhuratanga. "Ka whakahaeretia e te Poari tētahi tūhuratanga ki te whakahaere a te WHK i te take e pā ana ki tētahi umanga ture o waho, ā, ka tiritiri i te hua o tēnei mahi i te wā e tika ana," tana kī. Ture & Ahuwhānui, Aviva me te Taumira - nāna ngā Hoa Āwhina - i waenganui i ngā hinganga nui rawa i te FTSE 100, i ngā rā tata nei i muri i te pānga o ngā utu tiritiri e ngā mahere a George Osborne mō te whakatikatika i te pūnaha penihana o UK me tētahi pū mō ngā utu whakahaere penihana. Ko ngā pūtea 'Zombie' e pānui tika ana i te uiui ki ngā kaupapahere tawhito i te Paraire, ka kī te WHK kāore ētahi kamupene i te hoatu i te manakē ōrite ki ngā kaupapahere i hokona i ngā tau kua taha ki mua. Ko te nuinga o ngā kaupapahere i hokona ki ngā kiritaki i roto i ngā tau e 30 ki te 2000, kei roto ko ngā whakaritenga e whiu ana i te hunga e ngana ana ki te whakawhiti ki tētahi kaiwhakarato māmā ake. Ka ngaro ētahi penapena ki te haurua o ā rātou penapena mēnā ka neke rātou ki tētahi atu kamupene. I kī hoki te WHK e wehi ana i ngā moni "zombie", e katia ana ki ngā kiritaki hōu, e whakamahia ana e ngā kaiwhakarato hei utu pire mai i ētahi atu wāhanga o ā rātou umanga. Ka whakaputaina tikatia ngā taipitopito o te uiui i te Mane. Engari ko ngā māharahara ka hipokina ko: Kua tūkinotia te umanga ratonga pūtea e ngā heitara kōtaha tiketike maha i roto i ngā tekau tau kua taha nei e pā ana ki te hoko hē o ngā kaupapahere pēnei i ngā whakawhiwhinga mōkete, ngā penihana whaiaro me te inihua parenga utu. E hia miriona ngā kaupapa here whakawhiwhinga i hokona i ngā tau kotahi mano e waru tekau mā iwa rau, i te nuinga o te wā hei tikanga utu mōkete, i te nuinga o te wā me ngā kerēme kāore i te mōhiotia kua whakapūmautia ki te utu i te moni tārewa kāinga a ngā kiritaki. E hia miriona pauna i utua hei utu.

title: Coronavirus: Kua whakaūngia e Jersey te kēhi o Covid-19
summary: Ko te keehi coronavirus tuatahi i Jersey kua panuitia e te tari hauora o te motu.
text: Ko te tuarua tēnei o ngā kēhi i whakaūngia i ngā Moutere o Channel i muri i te whakaūnga o tētahi i Guernsey i te Mane. I kī ngā Ratonga Hauora me ngā Ratonga Hapori (HCS) i whakamātauria te tangata i tērā wiki, ā, kua noho taratahi mai i tō rātou hokinga mai i te raki o Itari. I kī tētahi kōrero mō HCS i te whakapā waea o ia rā ki te tūroro. Ko te tohutohu a Jersey Coronavirus a Dr Ivan Muscat, te āpiha hauora tuarua o Jersey, i kī: "Kei te mahi tahi mātou me te tangata e āwangawanga ana ki te whakataki i ngā hoapā tata e hāngai ana, nō reira ka tika te whakahaere." I kī a ia e whakapā ana ngā āpiha hauora taiao ki ētahi pāhihi i haere i runga i aua rerenga ōrite mai i Itari ki Gatwick, ki Jersey hoki e tono ana kia wehe i a rātau anō. I kī a Dr Muscat kāore e pā ki ngā tāngata katoa i runga i te rererangi, ā, "ki te kore te tīma e whakapā atu ki a koe, kāore he take o te māharahara, ā, kāore koe e hiahia ki te whakapā atu ki te tari, ki te raina āwhina rānei". I te Mane, ka tīmata tētahi rōpū ākonga 19 me ngā kaiako tokorua mai i te Kāreti o Jersey mō ngā Kōtiro i hoki mai i tētahi haerenga kura ki Itari i te Rāhoroi i muri i te rerekētanga o ngā tohutohu nā te horahanga o te huaketo puta noa i Itari. I kī a HCS kāore i te hāngai te kēhi.

title: E tū ana a Heke rāua ko Paraone i runga i 'ngā pōti Ingarihi mō ngā ture Ingarihi'
summary: Kua tū a William Hague rāua ko Kōnata Paraone i roto i te Kotahitanga i runga i ngā karanga mō "ngā pōti Ingarihi mō ngā ture Ingarihi".
text: I roto i tētahi taupatupatu mo te mana whakahaere, ka kī a Tēnā Heke me mōhiotia ngā "tūmanako tika" a te iwi Ingarihi ina hoatu ētahi atu mana ki Pākehā. Engari i kī te PM o Te Hunga Mahi i ngā mahere Tory "mōrearea" e whakararuraru ana i te UK i te oho o te taupānga o Pākehā. Kua kī a Labour ka whakahōrite i tētahi tinana i whakatūria e nga Tohutohu ki te tirotiro i te tūranga o ngā MP Ingarihi i te Pāremata. I te kōrerorero te Commons i te taupānga o Pirihitini i tērā marama, i kite ai i te 55% pōti 'Kāo' ki te rangatiratanga, me te tautohe a Rawiri, a Ed Miliband me Nick Clegg i te wiki whakamutunga o te whakahau kia tuku mana hou nui - tae atu ki te tāke me te oranga ora - ki Pākehā mēnā he pōti 'Kāo'. I muri i te taupānga, ka kī taurangi a Tēnā Karauna kia hoatu ngā mana kohi tāke ki te Pāremata o Pirihitini, engari i tohutohu hoki i ngā nekehanga "ngātahi" ki te rāhui i ngā MP o Pirihitini kia kaua e pōti i ngā take Ingarihi. E ātete ana a Labour ki tēnei, engari e manako ana kia nui ake te mana whakahaere i roto i Ingarangi. E kī ana hoki me takaware aua whakataunga taketake tae noa ki muri i te pōtitanga 2015 hei whakaaro hei wāhanga o tētahi arotakenga ā-kaupapa whānui. Kei te whakahōrite i tētahi kōmihana e tūtakina ana e Tēnā Heke, te kaiārahi o te Whare o Ngātahi, e titiro ana mēnā me tū ngā MP o Pākehā, Welsh me Aiarangi ki te Raki kia kaua e pōti i ngā take e pā ana ki Ingarangi, mēnā rānei me hoatu ki ngā MP Ingarihi he tūranga whakarei i roto i te tukanga ture. I a ia e kōrero ana i roto i te Kotahitanga, ka kī a Tēnā Paraone he "whenua ngātahi" i waenganui i ngā rōpū uniana i runga i te nui o ngā mana e whakawhiti ana ki Pākehā me te tere e puta ai. Engari i kī a ia kua "whakahaua" te ariā o ngā pōti Ingarihi mō ngā ture Ingarihi e Rawiri Karauna i muri i te hua o te taupānga, ā, me noho ngā MP o Pirihitini ki te Pāremata o UK i runga i "ngā whakaritenga ōrite". Mā te whakatūpato "ka taea e ngā iwi te tiango i te aituā", ka kī a Tēnā Paraone, ko tōna wāhanga o Kirkcaldy i Pākehā, mā te hāunga i ngā MP mai i ngā taiwhanga Ingarihi i ētahi pōti ka whakakino i te "pūmautanga me te hāngaitanga o te kaupapa ture o Ingarangi". "Kāore e taea e koe te UK kotahi mēnā e rua ō akomanga MP motuhake," tana kī. "Kāore e taea e koe te pōti i ngā māngai e te iwi e haurua ana, i waho hoki i te tukanga hanga ture." Engari i kī a Tēnā Heke e rapu ana ngā kaipōrangapū i tētahi whakautu ki te Pātai Lothian ki te Uru mō te tata ki te 20 tau, ā, ka ākiritia e ia ngā kerēme "he whakararuraru, he mōrearea rānei te tōtika mō Ingarangi ki te UK". I muri i te "whakataunga mārama" a te iwi whānui o Pirihitini, ka tautohetohe a ia, tērā tētahi "hiahia whakahou" o ngā whakaritenga ā-ture o UK me te kore "whakawātea, takaware rānei". Ahakoa he tino hira te "whakamahere" i a Pākehā i roto i te UK, i kī a ia he "whakatau whārite e tika ana, e pai ake ana ki te katoa o te UK". "He nui ake te mōrearea o Te Hononga o Ingarangi ki te kore e urupare ki ngā tohenga tika me ngā tūmanako o te whakataunga Ingarihi, mō ngā whakataunga e pā ana ki Ingarangi anake," tana kī. 'Kāore he maia' E takatū ana ngā Tohutohu ki te whakatū i tētahi pōti Ngātahi mo te take i mua i te mutunga o te tau. Kua huatau mai a Backbencher John Redwood i tana tono kia hoatu i ngā MP Ingarihi - ko te nuinga o ēnei he Conservative i tēnei wā - ko te kōrero whakamutunga mō ngā utu tāke moni whiwhi i Ingarangi, e whakarara ana ki te tuku i te mana o Holyrood mō te tāke moni whiwhi i Pākehā, ka taea te puta me te kore tautoko a te kaiārahi Labour, Lib Dem rānei. Kua kī te Lib Dems ka whai wāhi rātau ki ngā kōrero, engari me "whakaata te hiahia o ngā kaipōti" me kaua e "whakahauhau tōrangapū". I kī te kaituhituhi kōrero ā-ture, a Ahorangi Bogdanor, tērā tētahi "raruraru Ingarihi e hiahia ana ki te whakautu" engari i uaua nā te mea he tōpana "kaha" a Ingarangi me ngā whakataunga mō ngā take Ingarihi anake, he pānga patoto mō Pākehā, Weera, Aiarangi ki te Raki. 'Kāore he whakawāteatanga' Kāore he whakaaetanga i Te Wānanga mō taua take, kua whakatūpato te SNP kāore pea e tutuki te whakaaetanga ki te whakaae, i runga i te tikanga, kāore pea e tutuki ngā tawhā o te mana whakahaere o Pirihitini i mua i tērā Me. I whakaputaina e te kāwanatanga tētahi pepa mana whakahaere o Pirihitini i te Mane, he mahi ka mauria whakamua e tētahi kōmihana e whakahaeretia ana e Te Ariki Smith o Kelvin. I kī a Angus Robertson, te kaiārahi o te SNP i Westminster, ināianei kei te "whakarerekētia" tēnei tukanga i te wā e kī ana tōna hoa mahi ko Pete Wishart ka "whakawehi" ngā kaipōti Āe me te Kāo i roto i te taupānga i te mea e tū ana. "I whakaaro mātau ka aro atu mātau ki te taupānga, te kupu taurangi nui, te kupu taurangi, te whakapūmautanga o ngā mana hou nui ake, whānui hoki mō Pākehā," tana kī. Heoi anō, i kī te Hēkeretari o Te Kāwanatanga o Aotearoa, a Alistair Carmichael, kei te tuku kē te kāwanatanga i te kupu taurangi a nga kaiārahi o Aotearoa, me te Komihana a Hāne, ā, he pepa i whakaputaina neke atu i te rua wiki i mua i te hōtaka. I te katinga o te taupatupatu a Te Kotahitanga, ka kī a Tēnā Carmichael: "E tika ana kia maumahara e whā wiki poto ki mua, i te tūnga te wā heke mai o to mātau Hononga o Ingarangi. I tino toa te taupānga, a, he putanga tōrunga. "Neke whakamua, e hiahiatia ana e tātau he whakataunga ā-ture tautoko e tutuki ana i ngā hiahia o te iwi o o tātau iwi me ngā whakaritenga mārama kua hoatu e mātau."

title: West Suffolk Hospital gynaecology and pregnancy services move
summary: Kei te nekehia te wae gynaecology i te Hōhipera o West Suffolk i Bury St Edmunds hei wāhanga o ngā whakahoutanga o te rūnanga e £190,000.
text: The ward will have a new waiting area and the early pregnancy assessment unit will also be relocating to it. I kī ngā kaiwhakahaere hōhipera e rua ngā rūma moenga kotahi o te rōpū whanaungatanga, e whakapai ake ai i te tūmataitinga. Ka tīmata te mahi i te wā o Mahuru, ā, ka oti i a Hakihea. I kī a Patricia Davis, te upoko o te whakawhanau: "Mā te whakawhiti i te wae hapu tōmua ka nui te rerekētanga, nā te mea ka pēnei i tētahi toa tū kotahi e taea ai te aromatawai i te wahine [e pā ana ki ngā raruraru] me te whai ultrasound me te kore hiahia ki te haere ki te aituā me te ohorere. " He tino whakararuraru pea ki ngā wāhine te pā ki ngā raruraru ā-wahine, nā reira he tino hira kia rongoatia rātou i runga i te tairongotanga, ā, ka taea te whiwhi i tō rātou tiaki i roto i te taiao tino pai e taea ana." Ka piki ake te maha o ngā moenga o te wae ā-wahine mai i te whitu ki te waru. I kī a Gwen Nuttal, te āpiha whakahaere matua i te hōhipera: "Neke atu i te 2,700 ngā wāhine e whānau ana i ia tau i roto i ā mātou pūkenga, ā, he rau anō ka whakamahia e mātau i runga i tā mātou wāhi whakawhanaunga, nā reira he tino tere te hokinga mai o te pūtea penapena ki ngā whakapainga ka mahia e mātau ki ngā tūroro."

title: I kitea he tangata noho kore kāinga i te taha o Bullring i Birmingham
summary: Kua mate tētahi tangata noho kore kāinga i runga i te tiriti i te pokapū o te taone o Birmingham, kua kī tētahi rōpū whakahaere.
text: I kitea taua tangata e nga paramedics i te hopunga manawa i Pershore Street, tata ki te pokapū hokohoko o Bullring, tata ki te 15:30 GMT i te Rātapu. Nā te āwhina i te hunga noho kore i Birmingham i tapaina taua tangata ko Kane Walker, ā, i kī kua āwhina i a ia i mua. I kī ngā pirihimana ko te matenga, kāore i te whakatūpatotia, kua tonoa ki te tari o te koroni. Helping the Homeless founder Peter Caine said: "Every time we did outreach sessions in Birmingham we crashed into him, and we got to know him. " He taitamariki noa iho a ia. "Ina mōhio koe ki ēnei tāngata me ō rātou āhuatanga, kātahi ka mōhio kāore koe e āwhina i taua tangata i runga i te tiriti, he ohorere." I kī a Tēnā Caine e māharahara ana a ia ki te pānga o te rangi mātao ki te hunga noho kore. "E 400 ngā pēke moe e hoatu ana e mātou i ia hōtoke, me te 100 ngā kai wera i ia wā e haere ana mātou ki waho." Whāia a BBC West Midlands i Facebook, i Twitter, me te waitohu mō ngā whakahōutanga rongokōrero paetata hāngai tonu ki tō waea.

title: E kī ana te pāhi o Nordea ko ngā whakahē āhuarangi ko 'te tīmatanga noa iho'
summary: Ka nui ake te ngākau noa iho o ngā whakahēnga huringa āhuarangi, e ai ki te upoko o tētahi o ngā pūtea penapena nui rawa o Uropi.
text: Nā Alexia O'Connor & Mark SyredBBC Radio 5 Live Ko te whakatūpato e rite ana ki te hopunga o ngā tāngata e tata ana ki te 300 tāngata i Rāwāhi i tēnei wiki i waenganui i ngā whakahē nui ki te huringa āhuarangi. I kī atu a Sasja Beslik o Nordea Bank ki te AO ko ngā whakahē "ko te tīmatanga noa iho". Kāore ngā tāngata e māharahara ana ki te huringa āhuarangi i whakaaro he maha ētahi atu "utauta" e wātea ana ki a rātou, ka kī a ia. Ko Tēnā Beslik e whakahaere ana i te pūtea tautoko i Nordea, ko tētahi o ngā pēke nui rawa i Uropi, me te kaporeihana nui rawa atu i te rohe o Nōrewa o Tenemaka, Hinerangi, Nōwei me Huitene. I muri i te heitara kohukohu, ka mutu te haumi a te pūtea e whakahaeretia ana e Tēnā Beslik, ā, kua kore e whakamana i te hokonga o ngā hea Facebook nā ngā māharahara ki te kōrero a te kamupene i ōna take tūmataitinga raraunga. I a ia e kōrero ana ki te 5 Live's Wake up to Money, ka kī a ia: "Ki taku whakaaro ko tēnei [te ngaru whakahē o tēnei wiki] ko te tīmatanga noa iho. Mēnā e kōrero ana mātou mō te maha o ngā mano tau i Uropi me ngā whenua puta noa i te ao, kei te tino māharahara rātau ki taua āhuatanga, ā, kāore au i te whakaaro he maha rawa ētahi atu utauta kei o rātau ringa hei whakatata atu ki tēnei." I kī a ia ko te kī ki te whakahau i ngā kamupene kia huri, ehara i te mea ko te whakahē pāpāho anake, engari i roto i te rūma poari, nā te mea ko te wāhanga pūtea o te ao "te utauta nui rawa o te ao i te tēpu". "Ki taku whakaaro he tino mārama kāore i te nui ngā mahi i mahia e ngā kaipōrangapū me ngā umanga puta noa i te ao," tana kī, ka tāpiri: "87% o ngā pūmatua katoa o te ao kāore i te whakahaeretia i runga i ngā take āhuarangi... Mēnā e hiahia ana mātou ki te whakamahi i ngā uaua nunui o te ao ina huri i ngā umanga... Me hora koe i te pūmatua pūtea." I te tīmatanga o tēnei wiki, i kī te 'Tauākī Tūmatanui' i te tīmatanga o tēnei wiki, te Pūtea Penapena Ture & Ahuwhānui, e whakahaere ana i te wāriu o ngā pūtea penapena penihana UK, e whakatakoto ana i te huringa āhuarangi ki runga i tana rārangi āwangawanga ina titiro ki te whakahaere i ngā kamupene. I kī a Sonja Laud, ko te tuarua o te āpiha pūtea penapena matua i te Whakahaeretanga Pūtea Penapena Ture & Ahuwhānui, he mea nui kia pana ngā kaiwhakangao ki te huringa. "Kua kite mātou i te nui ake o te whakaurunga i te tīmatanga o tēnei tauākī tūmatanui ka whakaingoatia e mātou te hunga e whakaaro ana mātou kāore i te nui te kauneketanga i runga i tētahi taumata rangatōpū," tana tāpiri mai. "Kāore he wāhanga takitahi e kī hāngai ana mātou ka wehe mātou nā te mea ki a mātou e pā ana ki te whakauru me te whakarite kia hāngai te kamupene ki ngā mea e hiahia ana mātou ki te whakatutuki."

title: Ka whakamahia e Leeds ngā ipu mirumiru i te pana tukurua o te pokapū o te taone
summary: Kei te whakamātauria ngā ipu e pupuhi mirumiru ana me ngā mīhini e tuku utu ana mō te tukurua i Te Tūrei.
text: E kiia ana ko te kaupapa #LeedsByExample te pana nui rawa atu o te UK ki te whakapai ake i te tukurua i waho o ngā kāinga o te iwi. Ka noho ngā pūkenga tukurua hou mō te kirihou, ngā kēne me ngā kapu pepa i ngā tiriti, i ngā tari, i ngā pokapū hokohoko, i ngā whare wānanga me ngā pokapū waka. E whai ana ngā kaiwhakahaere ki te whakataka i ngā huānga angitu o te kaupapa puta noa i te motu. Ko te aroha taiao o Hubbub me te aronui whakatikatika tukurua Ecosurety kei muri i te whakamātautau e ono marama. Ahakoa kua pai ake te tukurua i te kāinga me ngā kohinga tahataha i roto i ngā tau, ka kī ngā kaiwhakahaere, he iti tonu te tere o te tukurua i te haere. Kua tāutatia ngā mīhini utu tukurua e hoatu ana i ngā tīkiti whakahekenga utu mō te tukurua i ngā pounamu kirihou me ngā kapu kawhe ki te Whare Wānanga o Leeds Beckett me te mākete o Kirkgate. Tata ki te 13 miriona ngā pounamu kirihou, e 9 miriona ngā ipu inu me ngā kapu kawhe e 2,5 miriona e whakamahia ana i te UK i ia tau, ka kī ngā kaiwhakahauhau. I kī a Gavin Ellis, o Hubbub: "Mā te nui o ngā ipu tukurua me ngā whakawhitiwhitinga hopu whatu puta noa i te pokapū o te taone o Leeds ka tino ngāwari ki ngā kainoho, ngā kaimahi me ngā manuhiri ki te kite i tō rātou wāhi tukurua tata rawa." "Kei te whakarite hoki mātou ka tukatukatia ngā tukurua katoa e kohia ana e mātau ki te UK i te paetata e taea ana," tana tāpiri mai.

title: Ngā utu a ngā MP: Haupae i runga i 'ngā rangatira huna'
summary: Neke atu i te 50 o rātou i whakaaetia kia huna te ingoa o tō rātou rangatira mō ngā take haumarutanga.
text: Kua whakaputaina e te kaitiaki utu tētahi rārangi o ngā rangatira e utua ana e ngā MP i muri i te tono Wāteatanga o te Mōhiohio. I whakaaturia hoki e te pānuitanga ētahi MP e rēti ana i ō rātou āhuatanga ki ētahi atu MP, hoa rānei. I kī te MP Labour a John Mann e whai mana ana te iwi whānui ki te mōhio ki a wai ngā MP e utu ana i ngā moni utu. "Kāore he take pai kia tūmatanuitia te wāhitau o tētahi tangata, engari kāore au e kite i tētahi take me puritia te ingoa o te rangatira, o te wahine whenua rānei," tana kī atu ki te Reo Irirangi 5 ora. I kī a ia "kāore he hē" ki ngā MP e rēti ana i ngā āhuatanga ki ētahi atu MP, mēnā he pūataata, ā, ka taea e rātou te tiaki ki ō rātou wahanga. "E whai mana ana te iwi whānui ki te mōhio - ā, ahakoa he aha tā mātou mahi, me whakarite mātou ki te tiaki. ki te kore e taea e koe te tiaki, kaua e mahia." 'Ngā take haumarutanga' I kī tētahi kōrero mō te Mana Paerewa Paremata Motuhake (Ipsa) e 85% o ngā MP e 320 e tono ana i ngā utu rēti i whakaingoatia ō rātou rangatira. Engari i tāpiri mai a ia: "Me whakaaro tātau i ia take mēnā he take haumarutanga. E tino nui ana tā mātou e āhei ana." I huraina ngā whakakitenga utu hōu rawa i roto i tētahi tūhuratanga a te hōtaka Dispatches o Channel 4, nāna i pāoho tētahi pikitia e kiia nei ko ngā MP: Kei Reira tonu rātou? i te 20:00 GMT i te Mane. I kī te Daily Telegraph i a Labour MP Luciana Berger - ko tētahi o ngā MP i whakaaetia kia huna te tuakiri o to rātau rangatira - e hiahia ana ki te huna i te mea e rēti ana a ia i tētahi kamupene i ngā Moutere Puhi o Ingarangi, he rāhui tāke ā-rohe. Engari i kī tētahi kōrero mō te MP o Liverpool Wavertree, i te tau 2010 i pūrongotia e tētahi kaiwhaiwhai, kua tonoa e ia kia puritia ngā taipitopito mō ngā take haumarutanga. Ka kī atu te MP ki te nūpepa: "I uru ahau ki taku whakaaetanga rīhi i runga i te whakapono pai, mā te whakamahi i te māngai tuku i taunakitia e te Pāremata." I kī a ia "kāore anō a ia kia mahi hāngai ki ngā rangatira o te rawa, ā, i whakamōhiotia anake i tēnei rā kei waho rātou". "E whakapono ana ahau he hē ki ngā kamupene te karo i te utu i tā rātou wāhanga tāke tika, ā, ehara i te mea e tautokona ana e au," tana tāpiri mai. "Ināianei kua aro mai tēnei take ki a au, ka āta tirohia e au ēnei pūrongo." E kī ana a Lampard Ko ngā taipitopito hou i whakaputaina e whakaatu ana hoki kei te rēti a Labour MP Jessica Morden i tētahi āhuatanga mai i te hoa mahi o Madeleine Moon, i te mea ko te rangatira o Iain McKenzie he mema Labour o Linda Riordan. Ko te mahi a ngā MP e tuku ana i ngā āhuatanga ki ngā hoa mahi, ā, ka whakahoki i te rēti mō ngā utu, kāore i te hē ki ngā ture - e ārai anake ana i ngā MP kia kaua e rēti mai i ngā mema o te whānau me te hunga e whai "painga pakihi" ana. Engari kua whakahētia he whakahē ki te wairua o ngā ture hou, ā, i kī a Tēnā McKenzie i tērā marama, kāore pea ia i uru ki tētahi whakaritenga pēnei mehemea i mōhio ia ki te tuakiri o tōna rangatira i mua. I whakapuakina hoki e te nūpepa o te Rā ko Pita Luff, e tohu ana i Mid Worcestershire, e rēti ana i tētahi whare noho o Rāwāhi mai i te kaiwhutupōro o Chelsea, o Frank Lampard mā te whakamahi i ngā moni a ngā kaihautū, i a ia e tuku ana i tōna ake kāinga o Rāwāhi, i muri i te whakarārangitanga o "Frank Lampard" hei rangatira o te MP. Kaore a Lampard i mohio ko wai te kamupene whakahaere i tuku i te rawa, ka korerotia e te kaiwhutupaoro ki te nūpepa. I kī tētahi māngai mō Tēnā Luff kāore te MP i mōhio mēnā kei te rēti a ia i Lampard, kāore rānei. Ko ētahi atu MP i whakaaetia kia puritia te ingoa o to rātau rangatira ko Tuarua Pirimia Nick Clegg, te Minita Mahi o mua ko John Denham me Nadine Dorries, te backbencher Tory kōrero i tēnei wā e whai wāhi ana ki te whakaaturanga pouaka whakaata rangirua I'm A Celebrity... He whakapapa hītori ētahi o ngā rangatira whenua i whakaingoatia i roto i te tuhinga. E rēti ana te Minita Whakarite Tūturu o Nick Boles i tētahi āhuatanga he wāhanga o te pānga o te Whare o Burghley i Lincolnshire, i whakaahuatia e te Daily Telegraph hei "tētahi o ngā kāinga rangatira nui o Ingarangi", i te wā e rēti ana a Michael Fabricant i tētahi kāinga wāhanga mai i te Whare Karakia o Lichfield. I te Mane, ka tautāwhi te Minita Ōritetanga a Helen Grant ki te tono i ngā utu mōrahi mō tētahi kāinga tuarua i Rāwāhi ahakoa e noho ana i te 19 maire mai i te Kotahitanga. Ko Mrs Grant, he MP Conservative i tomo ki te Pāremata i te tau 2010, e noho ana i tētahi whare £1.8m i Reigate, Surrey, ā, he whare tāke tāke tōna i Rāwāhi. As a Maidstone MP and non-London MP, she is entitled to a second-home allowance. Engari mēnā e tohu ana a ia i te takiwā o Surrey e noho ana ia, kāore e taea e ia te tono i te whakaaetanga. I kī tētahi kaikōrero mō Mrs Grant kua mahi a ia i roto i te wairua me te reta o ngā ture.

title: E whakaae ana a Asheville o North Carolina ki ngā utu mo te kahungatanga
summary: Kua pōti ngātahi te kaunihera taone o Asheville, North Carolina, ki te hoatu utu pūtea ki ngā tāngata pango i waenganui i te taupatupatu mo taua take.
text: Ko ngā utu - he utu pūtea ki ngā uri o te iwi kahunga - kua roa te whakataetae. Ka noho a Asheville ko tētahi o ngā tāone tuatahi o Amerika ki te whakaae ki ngā utu, ka uru ki te taone nui o Evanston, Illinois, nāna i whakaae ki tētahi mehua utu i te tau 2019. Kei te tāke a Evanston i te umanga tarukino ā-ture hei āwhina i te hapori pango. I puta te pōti 7-0 i te pō o te Tūrei, i ngā rā noa iho i muri i te whakapuakitanga a te poari hauora o te rohe he mate hauora tūmatanui. I Asheville, e kore te moni e puta mai i te āhua o ngā utu hāngai, engari hei pūtea penapena i ngā wāhi e anga tonu ana ki te whakahāweatanga me te rerekētanga o te wā. "Hundreds of years of black blood spilled that basically fills the cup we drink from today," said Councilman Keith Young, one of two black council members and a sponsor of the bill. "Kāore i te nui te tango i ngā whakapakoko. Kei te mahi ngā tāngata pango i tēnei whenua ki ngā take pūnaha," tana kī i muri i te putanga o te pire. Ka whakapōhēhē hoki te taumira mō te mahi hītori a te kāwanatanga o te taone i roto i te kahungatanga, tae atu ki tōna mahi i roto i te whakahāweatanga me te tukinotanga o ngā Āwherika-Amerika. E ai ki te pire, ka haere te moni ki ngā whare utu ōrau, te rangatiratanga pakihi me te kāinga, ngā wāhi mahi, "ngā rautaki hei whakatipu i te tika me te rawa whakatipuranga, te kati i ngā āputa i roto i te tiaki hauora, te mātauranga, te mahi me te utu, te haumarutanga paetata me te tika i roto i te ture taihara". I kī atu a Rob Thomas, tētahi kaiwhaiwhai hapori nāna i taunaki te pire, ki a NPR ko te taumira e "tono ana ki a koe kia titiro ki ngā take, me te kī, āe, i pā mai tēnei". "He tokomaha tēnei tāngata i mate. I tangohia tēnei moni nui i te iwi pango, ā, ka ōrite ki tēnei nui i tēnei rā," ka haere tonu a ia. "E inoi ana mātou kia mahi te tangata i te mea tika." E tono ana hoki te taumira ki tētahi pae tohunga kia hui ki te whakatau me pēhea te haumi i te pūtea tūmatanui i te tau e heke mai nei. I puta te pire i ngā wiki i muri i te huihuinga a ngā mano o ngā kaiwhakahaere i Asheville kia whakawāteatia ngā pirihimana i waenganui i ngā whakahēnga ā-motu i te matenga o Hōri Pirihi. Ehara a Asheville i te taone tuatahi ki te whakaoti i tētahi pire utu, engari ko tētahi o ngā mea tuatahi, e ai ki ngā tohunga. I tērā Whiringahora, ka noho te taone o Evanston i Illinois hei tāone tuatahi ki te tuku pūtea tūmatanui ki ngā utu, e ai ki te Pukapuka o Haikaika. I kii te taone nui ka whakamahia e raatau nga moni tāke mo te umanga tarukino - i whakamanahia i Illinois i te Hanuere 2020 - hei koha i te $10m ki te kaupapa. E tautoko ana ngā Kaiāwhina i ngā utu? I kitea e tētahi poipoi Gallup 2019 e 67% o ngā Kaiāwhina i ātete ki ngā utu, ahakoa 73% o ngā Āwherika-Amerika i kī e tautoko ana rātou i a rātou. I kitea e tētahi poipoi Kōrero/Ipsos i tērā marama, e 20% anake o ngā Kaiāwhina i whakaae ki te ariā o te whakamahi i "ngā moni kaihautū hei utu tūkino ki ngā uri o ngā tāngata kahunga i Te Hononga o Amerika". I kitea e te poipoi e pā ana ki te kotahi i roto i te toru o ngā Pāremata i kī e tautoko ana rātau i te ariā. Tata ki te 80% o ngā Pākehā i kī e whakahē ana rātau ki ngā utu. Ko ngā kaiwhakawāwā pēnei i te Kaiārahi o Te Whenua o Te Whenua o Aotearoa, ko Mitch McConnell, e mōhio ana i whakakorea te kahungatanga i te tau 1865. I tērā tau ka karangatia e ia ko te kahungatanga ko te "hara taketake" o Amerika, e kī ana "kāore tētahi o tātau e noho ana i tēnei wā" mo te kahungatanga. I te tau 2016, i kī te perehitini pango tuatahi o Amerika, o Te Pākehā, i ātete a ia ki ngā utu nā te mea he kore mahi tōrangapū. Engari i te tipu o ngā karanga mō ētahi atu haepapa ā-iwi i te oho o te matenga o Hōri Wairangi, kua kī taurangi ngā kaitōrangapū Manapori i ngā kāwanatanga, ngā rohe me ngā tāone ki te whai i te take, e whakaatu ana i te huringa moana kua puta i ngā marama tata nei. Kua tautokona e te kaitono perehitini Manapori a Joe Biden ngā ture kāwanatanga hei ako i te take me te waihanga i tētahi kōmihana hei tirotiro me pēhea te whakarato moni ki te iwi pango.

title: Northamptonshire Council: Government to oversee children's services
summary: Me whakahaere e te kāwanatanga te tari ratonga tamariki a te kaunihera moni i muri i tētahi pūrongo i kitea ai he "mōrearea tūpono" ngā tāngata i roto i tōna tiakitanga.
text: I te tīmatanga o tēnei marama, i kī tētahi reta mai i Ofsted ki te rangatira nui o te Kaunihera o te Takiwā o Northamptonshire i "āwangawanga" ana kaimahi pāpori. E kī ana te kāwanatanga e kore ngā ratonga tamariki a te kaunihera e mahi "ki tētahi paerewa tika". E rua ngā wā i whakakorea ai e te mana kia kaua e whakapau moni i te tau 2018 i waenganui i ngā take moni. Kua whakatūria he komihana ratonga tamariki ki te mahi "kia whiwhi i te whakapai ake wawe i te tukunga a te mana o ngā ratonga tiaki pāpori tamariki". Ka hono atu a Malcolm Newsam, māna e mahi i te tūranga, ki ētahi atu komihana e rua i whakatūria e te kāwanatanga i te kaunihera o te rohe. Kei roto i ngā wāhui tōmua a Tēnā Newsam tētahi wā hei komihana mo te tiaki pāpori tamariki i Rotherham. The Conservative-run council - which has committed to make £65m of cuts - will be scrapped in 2020, along with seven other Northamptonshire borough and district councils, to make way for two new unitary authorities. I te Rāitema, i pānuitia kua hikitia te pōti a tērā Me mō Northamptonshire i te wā e tangohia ana he whakaaro mō te wā heke mai o te hanganga kāwanatanga ā-rohe o te rohe. Tērā pea ka hiahia koe ki: Ināianei, kua whakaaetia e te kāwanatanga te kaunihera o te rohe ki te whakapau i te £70m o ngā rīhīti pūtea - hei tauira mai i te hokonga o ngā rawa pēnei i te Hōro o te Takiwā - hei āwhina ki te whakataurite i ana pukapuka. I roto i tētahi kōrero, ka kī ngā Komihana o Northamptonshire i te whakataunga "ka taea e Northamptonshire te utu i te tāpaetanga i kawea mai i tērā tau, me te whakaora i tētahi taumata rāhui tika, mai i roto i ngā rauemi pūtea a te Kaunihera". Heoi anō, kāore e whakaaetia e te tīmatanga kia whakamahia ngā moni hei whakawhāiti i te tahua o tērā tau. I kī a Mātā Golby, te kaiārahi o te kaunihera, ināianei kei te haere te mana ki te pūmautanga pūtea nui ake.

title: Ko te whakatārewatanga o ngā tereina o Lakes Line e whakahē ana
summary: E ārahi ana tētahi MP Cumbrian i tētahi hīkoi whakahē i runga i ngā pou i te Raina Roto kua katia rangitahitia.
text: E whai ana i te whakataunga a Northern Rail ki te whakatārewa i ngā ratonga i waenganui i Windermere me Oxenholme tae noa ki te 2 o Hōngongoi. I tūtaki a Tim Farron, e karanga ana kia tangohia te kaiwhakahaere i tōna manaakitanga, he tini nga kaiwhakahaere i te teihana o Windermere. Kua haere rātau ki te hīkoi i te 12 maero ki Oxenholme, ka karanga ki ia teihana i te huarahi. I kī te kaiārahi Liberal Democrat o mua: "E kore mātou e takoto me te takahuri i te wā e patua ana te Raina Roto e te whakamoho." Kua whakahaeretia tētahi ratonga pahi whakakapi i waenganui i ngā teihana katoa i runga i te ara, engari he amuamu mō ngā takaware me te pōauau. I kī a Northern Rail kua whakaurua e ia ngā wātaka rangitahi i runga i ngā ara maha i te Uru ki te Raki "kia nui ake ai te mōhiotanga ki ngā kiritaki mō ngā ratonga ka whakahaeretia e mātou". I tāpiritia i roto i tētahi kōrero: "Mai i te Mane 11 o Hune, ka whakanuia e mātou te auautanga o ngā kaiako e mahi ana i waenganui i ngā teihana i te Raina Roto kia nui ake ai te ngāwari ake o ā mātou kiritaki me te āwhina i a rātou ki te whakarite i ngā haerenga whakamua me te maia. " Ka haere tonu mātou ki te whakahaere i ngā kaiako mō tētahi atu wiki e rua tae noa ki te Mane 2 o Hōngongoi, ā, kei te tino kaha te mahi i runga i te whakaputunga o te whakangungu atekōkiri i takea mai i te whakaputanga tōmuri o te wātaka Network Rail, ā, ka whakapuaki i ngā taipitopito o ā mātou mahere i tua atu i te 2 o Hōngongoi i te wā tata nei." Kua whakahē hoki a Tēnā Farron, te MP mō Westmorland me Lonsdale, i te whakataunga kia whakatūria hei CBE te rangatira nui o Network Rail. I whakaahuatia e ia he "pakipaki i te kanohi" me te kī me whakakāhore a Mark Carne i te hōnore.

title: Ko te rautaki pūtaiao ā-ture e hārangirangi, e kī ana ngā MP
summary: He hārangirangi, he mārama hoki te mahere a te kāwanatanga mō te wā heke mai o te pūtaiao ā ture i Ingarangi me Weera, kua kī ngā MP.
text: Ko te Rautaki Pūtaiao Ā-Ture, e whai ana ki te whakatatū i tētahi pūnaha hōu hei tirotiro i te mahi a te pūnaha ture hara ki ngā tauira mai i ngā tirohanga hara, ngā tūpāpaku me ngā pōhēhētanga, i whakaputaina i muri i te hekenga o ngā paerewa kerēme. Engari e kī ana te Komiti Pūtaiao me te Hangarau me whakatakoto anō. I tohe tētahi kaikōrero o te Tari Kāinga i homai e te rautaki he "kitenga mārama". 'Kāore i te tika' I katia te Ratonga Pūtaiao Ā-Ture a te kāwanatanga i te tau 2012, ā, ko te nuinga o ana mahi i mahia e ngā kamupene tūmataiti me tono kirimana. I te tau 2015 ka whakatūpato te Tari Arotaupū ā-Motu i ngā paerewa e heke ana, ā, i ia Poutāpeta ka whakaputaina e te Tari Kāinga tana Rautaki Pūtaiao Ā-Ture. Heoi anō, e kī ana te Komiti Pūtaiao me te Hangarau te āhua nei he rite kē atu te tuhinga ki "tētahi mahere hei whakaputa rautaki", mā te tāpiri i te kāwanatanga me whakaae te tuhinga "he maha rawa ngā take i raro i te whanaketanga" ā, ka kore e whakamārama tika i tana kaupapahere me tana aronga. I kī te manukura o te komiti whakahaere o Te MP Conservative o Tania Mathias, ahakoa i whakaputaina te rautaki a te kāwanatanga e rua tau tōmuri, "he pai ake te takaware anō ki tēnei tuhinga kāore i te rawaka". I kī a Dr Mathias: "Ko ngā ngoikoretanga o tēnei tuhinga e whakaara ake ana i te pātai mēnā e tū ana te Rautaki Ā-Ture hei rautaki. Kei te ngaro tētahi kitenga whai mārama mō ngā ratonga ā-ture me tētahi mahere ararere hei tuku." Ko ētahi atu whakahēnga i mahia e ngā MP o te rautaki ko: I whakamutua e te komiti me whakaputa e te kāwanatanga tētahi rautaki whakatakoto anō i muri i te tukunga o te Rautaki Biometrics me te whakaotinga o te mahi whakawhitiwhiti pirihimana. 'Whakaaro whānui' I tautohetohe te kaikōrero o te Tari Kāinga ki nga kitenga a te komiti. "E mōhio ana mātou ko te Rautaki Ā-Ture, i whakaritea i muri i te whakaaro whānui ki ngā tohunga, e tohu ana i te huarahi pai rawa mō te mahi pirihimana ki te whakawhanake i tētahi huarahi pai ki te tiki," tana kī. "Ka whakaritea e te rautaki he kitenga mārama mō te wā heke mai o te whakarato ratonga ā-ture, engari he rite tonu te mārama me hoahoa, me tuku hoki e te pirihimana. " Kua hoahoatia motuhake kia noho ai i te taha me te tāpiri i te rautaki koiora, ā, i hangaia whakarara ngā mea e rua."

title: Ko te kaiwhaiwhai pāhau a Sean Conway e rere ana i te roa o UK
summary: Kua oti i tētahi mātātoa tino māia te tangata tuatahi ki te oma, ki te kauhoe me te pahikara i te roanga o te UK te haerenga mo te whā o nga wā - mā te poti.
text: I oti i a Sean Conway, mai i Cheltenham, te "triathlon whakamutunga" i waenganui i Land's End me John O'Groats i Me. A, i mua tonu i te 21:00 GMT i te Mane, ka whakawhiti anō a ia i te raina whakamutunga - i roto i tētahi waka whakataetae. E whakaarohia ana ko Tēnā Conway te tangata tuatahi ki te whakaoti i te haerenga mā te whakamahi i ngā tikanga rerekē e whā. He wāhanga a ia no tētahi kaimahi tokotoru, me te kāpene o Phil Sharp mai i Jersey me te rangatira poti o Alex Alley. I oti i a rātau te haerenga i raro noa iho i te toru me te hāwhe rā. I mahue i te tokotoru te Mutunga o Whenua i roto i to rātau tīwai whakataetae Tauaha 40 i te 08:55 GMT i te Paraire, ā, ka tae ki te raki o Pākehā - e 620 ngā māra moana (1,150 km) ara - 83 hāora me te 53 meneti i muri iho. I kī a Tēnā Conway he "whakamīharo" te whakaoti i te wero. "He tino rerekē tēnei wheako ki aku mahi o mua nā te mea he wiki me ngā marama ki te mahi. "Kāore au i nui te moe, ā, i patua mātau i te moana. He uaua kē atu i taku i whakaaro ai. "Ki taku whakaaro koinei ināianei. Ki taku whakaaro kua oti i a au te Mutunga o te Whenua ki a John O'Groats. "Kāore e kore ka hoe ahau, ka mahia rānei i runga i te rākau pogo i tētahi wā, engari mō tēnei wā kei te hari ahau ki aku pūkete e whā." Ka kī a Tēnā Sharp: "Kei te ngenge mātou, engari kei te tino harikoa mātou kua oti. " He āhua huruhuru ki te mutunga... me ngā tai kaha me ngā hinganga nui i roto i te pouri. "I te nuinga o te mahi, e whakaaro ana ahau he akoranga pai tēnei, ā, kua tautuhia e mātou ināianei he tohu e whakaaro ana mātou ka haere ētahi atu ki te whakamatautau."

title: Te pukapuka pararutiki roro a te tamaiti hei āwhina i ētahi atu kia mārama ki tōna oranga
summary: I a ia e rima tau noa iho te pakeke, i hiahia a Elan ki te āwhina i ōna hoa me ōna kaiako kia mārama ki tōna pararutiki roro.
text: Nā Liam EvansBBC Radio Cymru Nā reira ka tuhia e te kōtiro iti tētahi pukapuka, e whakamārama ana he pēhea tōna oranga me ngā whakamātautau i tūpono ki a ia. "I pātai mai te katoa ki a au... engari ināianei kua tino waia ahau ki taua mea," te kī a Elan, e iwa nei ōna tau, ā, he tohunga pāngarau hiahia. Ināianei kei te hiahia tōna whaea, a Ceris Williams, ki te kite i te pukapuka e whakamahia ana i ngā kura puta noa i Wales hei āwhina i ētahi atu tamariki hauā. "I a au e tamariki ana i raruraru ahau nā te mea kāore au i whakaaetia kia haere i roto i tētahi tūru hiko i taua wā, nā reira i whawhai te katoa ko wai ka pana i ahau," te kī a Elan, e noho ana i Cynwyd, tata ki Corwen i Denbighshire. Nā reira i whakatau ia e hiahia ana ia ki te hanga pukapuka hei āwhina i ētahi atu tamariki kia mārama he rite tonu a ia ki a rātou, me te whakamōhio atu ki ngā kaiako he pai te kōrero mō taua mea. Ināianei e hiahia ana a ia ki te āwhina i ngā tamariki hauā katoa kia āhei ki te whakamārama i ō rātou āhuatanga i runga i te āhua ōrite. "He mea pēnei i ngā pikitia mō ngā hauā rerekē, ngā mōhiohio e pā ana ki te pānga o ōku waewae, me te rerekē o te mahi a te hinengaro o te hunga pūkenga," te kī a Elan, nāna i kī atu ki a BBC Radio Cymru e hiahia ana ia ki te whakataetae i roto i ngā Paralympics. "I kitea e rātau he tino whakamere, ā, he ruarua ngā pātai mō ngā mea ā-tinana." Ahakoa he wheako pai a Elan i tana kura matua, a Ysgol Bro Dyfrdwy, ka kī tōna whaea ehara tēnei i te take mō ngā tauira hauā katoa i Weera. "He tino māhorahora ngā mea mō Elan i te kura, ā, e hiahia ana mātou kia pēnei ia kura i Wales i te āhua o tā rātou tautoko i a mātau," tana kī. "Ināianei ehara tēnā i te take i ngā wāhi katoa i Weera, ā, i te nuinga o ngā hauā huna, he uaua kē atu." I karangatia e Ms Williams he matapakinga tuwhera ake, pono hoki ina tae mai ki te hauātanga, ā, e hiahia ana ki te kite i te pukapuka e whakamahia ana hei wāhi tīmatanga hei āwhina i te tangata kia mārama pai ake. "He tino āwhina a Elan mō tōna hauātanga, ā, ka kōrero tonu ki ngā tāngata i mua i tā rātou pātai," tana tāpiri mai. "I ngā wāhi pēnei i Amerika me ētahi atu wāhi pea i te UK, ka haere mai rātou me tētahi pukapuka mō rātou anō e whakamārama ana i ngā whakamātautau e pā ana ki a rātou i te rā me te pēhea e taea ai e rātou te whakaoti i tērā. " Ki taku whakaaro he mea nui kia kōrero ngā mātua ki a rātau tamariki mō ētahi atu tamariki hauā."

title: He aha te mea e kore rawa koe e pātai atu ki a Kit Harington - aka Jon Snow mai i Game of Thrones
summary: Ahakoa he aha tāu e mahi ai, kaua e pātai atu ki a Jon Snow mō ōna makawe. Mēnā kei te hiahia koe ki te noho tonu ki tōna taha pai o Kit Harington ahakoa.
text: Nā Laura WignallNewsbeat reporter Kua kī atu a ia ki te Radio 1 Breakfast Show me Nick Grimshaw ko ngā pātai auau e "pōrangi" ana i a ia. I kōrero te whetū o te Kēmu o ngā Torona ki a Grimmy mō tana mahi e tū mai nei i roto i te putanga pikitia o Spooks, e puta mai ana i Me. I whakaahuatia e te tau e 28 tau he "momo Bourne Peretania". "He māngere tūtei pai... he nui ake te octane, ā, he nui ake tā mātou pūtea i te whakaaturanga pouaka whakaata," te kī a Kit. "He nui ngā mahi, he nui ngā pahūtanga. He tapa o tō tūru. "I mahia e au ngā mahi katoa i ētahi wā, he āhua huruhuru i ētahi wā." I kī te kaitapere he whakamataku te mau i tētahi pikitia Spooks nā te mea i tino paingia te rangatū pouaka whakaata, e 10 tau e haere ana. "Ina tomo koe ki tētahi māngai aroha, he pūtake pīrangi tērā, ina whakatapua kētia e te tangata ki taua mea, he āhua whakamataku." I whakatauritea e Kete ki te Kēmu o ngā Torona, e kī ana he uaua ki te tangata ina whai tūmanako te hunga whakarongo ki tā rātou tūranga. "Nā te mea he tino aroha, ka kite mātou i ngā kaitapere hou e haere mai ana e pēhi ana i o rātau pakihiwi ki te kawe i runga i te mantel... he uaua." Ka pātai atu tētahi kaiwhakarongo ki a Kete ko tēhea tana kiriata makau hei whetū, ā, ka whakaingoatia e ia he tauhira tawhito. "E hiahia ana ahau ki te noho hei wāhi o Jack Lemmon i roto i Some Like it Hot... kākahu pea hei wahine." Ko tētahi atu pātai he aha tana tirohanga makau ki te pikitia, me te kore hoatu i ētahi kaipahua. "He maha aku tirohanga makau i whakaahuatia e mātau i te tau tuarua, mō tētahi i runga ake i tētahi awaawa i Tiorangi... He mea whakamīharo." I kī a Kit "kāore e taea e ia te amuamu" mō ngā aronga katoa e whiwhi ana ia i ngā wāhi katoa e haere ana ia. "E aroha ana ahau ki te whakaaturanga, he pai ki ahau te noho i roto, ā, kua whakatuwheratia he waharoa kia uru ki ētahi atu mea. " Ahakoa te kaha o ngā kaihautū, e aroha ana ahau... He tino geek ahau mo taua mea." I runga i a Maisie Williams rāua ko Sophie Turner, ka kī a ia: "He tino mīharo aua kōtiro... Kia hoatu ki a koe taua mārakerake i taua pakeketanga, ka huri koe ki te pakaru, ā, ka whakangaro i tō oranga, ka noho tūturu rānei koe... koia tā rātou i mahi ai." Whāia @BBCNewsbeat i Twitter, BBCNewsbeat i Instagram, Radio1Newsbeat i YouTube, ā, ka taea e koe ināianei te whai i BBC_Newsbeat i Snapchat

title: I tūhuratia e ngā Pirihimana o Lincolnshire te tūkinotanga o te tēpu WWI
summary: Kua kōrero ngā āpiha ki tētahi wahine i runga i ngā whakaahua e whakaatu ana i tētahi tēpu whakamaharatanga o te Pakanga Tuatahi o te Ao.
text: I tuhituhia ngā ingoa "Shell" me "Jane" ki te raima mākū i raro i te tēpu i Horncastle, i Lincolnshire, i muri i te tāutatanga i te 18 o Hui tanguru, e ai ki te The Lincolnshire Reporter. Te āhua nei e whakaatu ana ngā whakaahua i ngā wāhine e whakawhirinaki ana ki runga i tētahi wāhi rāhuitia huri noa i te pūtake o te tēpu, i te wā e titiro ana ngā tamariki. I "uiuia noatia" tētahi wahine mo taua mahi, ka kī pirihimana. I kī ngā Pirihimana o Lincolnshire "kotahi te wahine nāna i tūkino" me ngā āpiha "kāore i te kimi i tētahi atu". Kāore anō kia hopukina, kua tāpiritia. Ko te tēpu konganuku pango, e anga atu ana ki Stanhope Hall, e whakaatu ana i tētahi ataata o ngā hōia me tētahi hoiho taua i te taha o ngā poppies, me ngā kupu "Kei Wareware Mātau" me "Ka Maumahara Mātou ki a Rātau". I kī tētahi tangata whenua, a Dawn Amos, i "riri" a ia ki te tokorua nāna i whakaatu i tētahi "whakahāwea katoa ki a mātau toa hinga". "Kāore e taea e koe te iti iho i tērā," tana kī.

title: Ka whakatuwheratia e te kaiārahi o te Kaunihera Taone o Aberdeen te Whakawhiti Hea o Rāwāhi
summary: Kua mahia e te kaiārahi o te Kaunihera Taone o Aberdeen te whakatuwheratanga mana o te mākete i te London Stock Exchange.
text: I kī te kaunihera i hangaia te tono i muri i te nohonga o te mana hei tuatahi i Pākehā ki te tuku here i runga i te whakawhitinga hea, e wātea ana ki te £370m. I muri mai i te whakatauranga whakatauranga nama a Moody's e tautapa ana i tētahi whakatauranga Aa2. Council leader Jenny Laing travelled to the event with finance convenor Willie Young and six officials. 'I tangohia te ārahi' I kī te kaunihera ka haere te moni ki ngā aronui hanganga hei wāhanga o tana mahere pūmatua. Kei a ia te tautoko a te kāwanatanga o Pākehā, e whakapono ana ka taea e ētahi atu kaunihera te haere ki raro i tētahi ara ōrite. I kī a Kihil Rathi, te āpiha nui o London Stock Exchange plc: "I te rironga ko te kaunihera tuatahi o Pirihitini hei whakarārangi i tētahi here, kua ārahi te Kaunihera Taone o Aberdeen ki te uru ki ngā mākete pūtea hei tautoko i te tupunga me te whanaketanga o Aberdeen. " E hari ana mātou ki te pōhiri i te Kaunihera Taone o Aberdeen ki te whakatuwhera i te tauhokohoko i tēnei rā ki te whakanui i te rārangi here tohu."

title: RW Andrew Harper: He mate i whakaoho i te ringihanga o te aroha
summary: He patunga tērā i whakaoho i ngā takoha puta noa i te ao, me te "ringihanga aroha" mō tētahi pirihimana i patua i te raina mahi.
text: Nā Michael RaceBBC News PC Andrew Harper i "kore e nui ake i tana mahi" i te tōnga atu i te maero ki tōna matenga i muri i te maunga o ōna waewae i roto i tētahi here e whai ana i muri i te motokā rere a te kaipōhēhē. I te pakarutanga o te rongo o te matenga o te tau 28 tau, ka horapa te ngaru o te pouri me te aroha puta noa i te whenua mo te āpiha, kātahi anō ka mārena i tana hoa aroha o te tamarikitanga, o Lissie. E tatari ana nga mārena hou ki to rāua mārena i Maratīni. I te pō o te 15 o Aotearoa 2019, ka urupare a PC Harper me tētahi hoa mahi ki tētahi waea 999 mō tētahi tāhae paihikara tapawhā, ahakoa e whā haora i muri i te mutunga o ā rātou nekeneke. I te hoki mai nga tāngata ki te kāinga - kāore rātau i urupare - engari i whakatau rātau kia haere ki tua atu i te karanga o te mahi. He whakataunga tērā ka mate a PC Harper. Tata tonu ki te kotahi tau mai i tōna matenga, tokotoru ngā taitamariki - ko Henry Long, Albert Bowers me Jessie Cole - kua whakawāteatia ki te parekura o PC Harper. I whakawāteatia rātau i tana kōhuru. I te wā o te patunga i tērā tau, ka kī te Pirimia o Poihāne, ko te matenga o te āpiha ko "te whakamaumahara tino kaha rawa atu i whakararurarutia ai e ngā pirihimana i ia rā kia haumaru ai mātau". Kotahi meneti te mūmū o ngā ope ki runga, ki raro hoki i te whenua mō "Harps", i whakaahuatia he "hoa aroha, manaakitia hoki", he "toa". I whakangū ngā tīma whutupōro i mua i te tīmatanga me te taone tupu o te āpiha o Wallingford i Oxfordshire i rākaitia ngā matapihi toa ki ngā rīpene e tohu ana i te "raina kikorangi angiangi". "Kāore he hōtuhi i hoatu ki tētahi tangata... te āhua nei kua mau tonu," te kī a te hoa o PC Harper, a Andy Ledbury, nāna i whakatakoto he rīpene kikorangi i waho o tana whare kōhanga tipu. "He tino ngākau whakaaro mō ngā tāngata i mōhio ki a ia, engari kāore mātou i mōhio i te nui o te pouri o ētahi atu tāngata," tana kī atu ki te HAU. I ngā wiki e whai ake nei, ka ārahi te pouaru me ngā mema o te whānau o PC Harper i tētahi "Ride of Respect" e pā ana ki ngā mano o ngā kaieke motopaika, i te wā e 20,000 ngā epaulettes me ngā tohu mai i te ao katoa i whakamahia hei waihanga i tētahi pakitara 55ft (17m) te roa. I kī a Mrs Harper "he "tino nui ngā karere, te tautoko me ngā kupu atawhai". I whakatakotoria e ia tana potae pirihimana ki runga i tana kāwhena i te wā o te nehunga i te Whare Karakia o te Hāhi Karaiti i Oxford, i muri i te whakarārangi a ngā hoa mahi me te huihuinga i nga tiriti o te taone ki te whakanui i a rātau. Engari i te tangihanga o ōna hoa mahi i te matenga o tētahi o rātau ake, ka hiahiatia e nga kaitohutohu kia pana i ngā āhuatanga mo te tūhuratanga kōhuru. I kī a Det Supt Kiriuati Kōkā, te āpiha rangahau matua o te kēhi, kāore i "tino nui te haere o tana tīma i ngā wāhanga o mua". I kī te kaitirotiro ko te "wero i ngā wā katoa e tohu ana ko wai i roto i te motokā i taua wā", nā te mea he tokomaha ngā tāngata i whakamahia. I te wā o te tūhuratanga, e 1,250 ngā kōrero i tangohia e ngā pirihimana me ngā kaimahi, neke atu i te 1,000 ngā kāinga, ā, ka whai i ngā rārangi uiui e 1,122. I te tīmatanga e 10 ngā tāne, i waenganui i te 13 me te 30, i hopukina i te wāhi wīra o Four Houses Corner, i mua i te whakawātanga o Long, ka whakawāteatia a Bowers rāua ko Cole i whakapaea ki te kōhuru i te Old Bailey i Poutāpeta. I whakaae te tokotoru ki te tāhae i tētahi paihikara tapawhā me Tōma Kingi, e 21, mai i Basingstoke. Mo te wā tuatahi, ka rongo nga kaiwhakawā i nga taipitopito o te patunga kino o PC Harper - he nui rawa te whakairoiro hei tānga. Heoi anō, i hinga te whakamātautau nā te raka coronavirus. I te tīmatanga o te whakawā anō i Hune, ka whakanohoia ngā kaiwhakawā hou kia 2m (6ft 6in) te wehenga, i te wā i whai ngā mema o te pēhi me te iwi whānui i ngā kaupane i ngā rūma noho tata. I rongo tēnei hūri hou i te āhua o Long, 19, a Bowers rāua ko Cole, e 18 rāua, i tētahi paihikara tapawhā ki muri o tētahi Seat Toledo i tētahi kāinga tata ki Stanford Dingley, Berkshire, ā, ka haere atu ki te pouri i te waea a te rangatira o te waka i te 999. Kaore i roa ka anga atu nga taitamariki ki a RW Harper rāua ko RW Andrew Shaw, i roto i tētahi pirihimana pirihimana kāore i tohua. I a Long e taraiwa ana i te motokā pirihimana kia mawhiti, ka puta atu a PC Harper i tana waka, ka ngana ki te hopu i a Cole, nāna i wetewete te paihikara, a, e oma ana i muri i te Tūru i aia e Long. "Tē mōhiotia" te hīkoi me ngā waewae e rua ki roto i te here tāhae, ka "whakahekea" te āpiha ki te waka i a ia e tere ana, ka tōia ia neke atu i te maero i mua i tana wehenga atu i te waka, a, ka mate i te huarahi. I mōhio anake ngā hoa mahi ko tētahi o rātau anō i patua nā tōna kākahu pirihimana, ka kī te rōia a Honatana Laidlaw QC. Ko te take o te ture he "mārama" ki ngā whakapae e tōia ana e rātau a PC Harper ki muri, engari i whakatau rātau kia kaua e tū. Ko te taraiwa i aua tere me te "rapu ki te maka i te āpiha" he "tohu mārama tērā tētahi whakaaro i roto i ngā mea katoa e toru ki te whakamate i a ia", ka kī atu a Tēnā Laidlaw ki te hūri. I muri i te hopukina i te wā o ngā poho i ngā haora tōmua o te 16 o Aotearoa, ka whakakāhore nga taitamariki tokotoru i te whakauru, i mua i te whakarerekētanga o a rātau pūrākau ina anga atu ki ngā whakaaturanga māia. Long, mai i Mortimer, i Pānui, i tautohe he hara ki te patu tangata, engari i whakakāhore i te kōhuru, ā, i kī kāore a ia i mōhio kua āpitihia a PC Harper ki te waka. I whakaūngia e Bowers, o Moat Close, Bramley, me Cole, o Paices Hill tata ki Reading, he pāhihi rātau i te Tūru, engari i whakakāhore i te kitenga i te pirihimana. I kī a Det Supt Blaik i mahia e nga whakapae he "whakataunga mōhio" "kaua e āwhina i nga pirihimana" me te kī kua ngana o rātau whānau me ō rātau hoa ki te "whakararuraru" i te tūhuratanga. I muri i te huratanga a ngā pirihimana i tētahi mahi a "ngā hoa mahi o ngā whakapae ki te whakamataku i te hūri". I whakatūria ngā kōrero ki te kōrerorero i ngā tikanga hei tiaki i ngā kaiwhakawā i muri i te kitenga o tētahi tangata i te taiwhanga tūmatanui e tohu ana ki a rātou. I whakataua e te Kaiwhakawā a Te Kaiwhakawā o Te Ture Edis e tika ana kia whakaritea he mehua kia kore ai te hūri e whakamataku, ahakoa he "iti" te mōrea. I whakaaetia e ia ngā tikanga hei whakarato i tētahi rūma tūmataiti hei whakamahi mā ngā kaiwhakawā puta noa i te whakawā, ā, i whakahaua kia homai e te tangata e whakamahi ana i te taiwhanga tūmatanui he tāutunga whakaahua. I muri iho i te whā wiki o ngā whakaaturanga me te 12 haora, e 22 meneti o ngā whakawāteatanga, ka wetekina e nga kaiwhakawā ngā whakapae tokotoru o te kōhuru. I kitea e te hūri he hara a Bowers rāua ko Cole ki te patu tangata. I whakaae a Long i taua hara anō i mua. I kī a Det Supt Blaik i a PC Harper "i utua te utu whakamutunga" mo te haere ki tua atu i te karanga mahi, engari i tāpiritia "koia tērā e mahia ana e ngā pirihimana ki runga, ki raro hoki i te whenua, i ia rā, i ia rā". "E haere ana mātau ki te raruraru, kaore mātau e oma atu i reira," tana kī. I kī a Mrs Harper ko tana tāne te "tangata tino atawhai, tino ātaahua, tino kaingākau ka tūtaki koe". "E hiahia ana ahau ki te riri i tangohia koe e tō mahi i a mātou, engari e mōhio ana ahau i aroha koe ki a koe, ā, i hiahia tonu koe ki te tiaki i te katoa, otirā ko ahau," tana kī. "Ko to mātau kaitiaki, to mātau kaitiaki, to mātau mārama i roto i te pouri. E toku Atua, ka mihi mātou ki a koe."

title: M5 Oldbury roadworks hit by further delays
summary: Ko te mahi ki te whakatika i tētahi whārōrō o te M5 i te West Midlands kua pā ki ētahi atu takaware.
text: Ko ngā whakatikatika ki Oldbury Viaduct i te taha o te M5 e rua maero o te M5 ka oti i te ngahuru o te tau 2018. Engari i kī a Highways England i takaware i muri i te maha o ngā tapi e hiahiatia ana mai i te 3,000 ki te 12,000. Ināianei e tūmanakohia ana kia oti te mahi ā muri ake i tēnei tau. Ko tētahi o ngā huarahi tino pākaha o te UK, e mahi ana i ngā mano o ngā atekōkiri e haere ana ki te tonga ki te hauauru. Nō tēnei wā, e 8,000 ngā tapi kua mahia ki te raima i runga i te huarahi ki te tonga anake. I tīmata te mahi i te whārōrō i waenganui i te komititanga rua me te kotahi mō Oldbury me West Bromwich i te tau 2017, ā, ko te tikanga kia oti i Whiringahora i tērā tau. Kātahi ka tūtaki a Highways Ingarangi ki tōna takaware tuatahi, ā, i kī e tūmanako ana ka oti katoa ngā tapi i te kōanga o tēnei tau. Heoi anō, kua kitea e ngā kaimahi ētahi atu take e hiahiatia ana kia tapia i te whakaaro tuatahi, me tētahi kaikōrero o Highways England e whakataurite ana i te mahi ki te "whakahoki i te kāpeti ki te tiro i ngā papa i raro". I tēnei wā, kei te whakaritea he tepenga tere 30mph i waenganui i te komititanga rua me te kotahi, engari e tūmanakohia ana kia tangohia tēnei i te raumati ina tūmanakohia kia mahi ngā ara e rua ki ia ahunga. E toru ngā ara i ia ahunga e kore e rere tae noa ki te ngahuru.

title: E pupuri ana ngā kākano i ngā taonga huna mō ngā kai ā muri ake
summary: Neke atu i te 70,000 o ngā kākano tino utu nui o te ao kua tukuna mai i te Pēke Kākano o UK ki te Rāwhiti o Waenganui, i tōna kawenga nui rawa atu ki tēnei wā.
text: Nā Helen BriggsBBC News kei roto i te tukunga neke atu i te 50 ngā whanaunga mohoao o ngā hua whenua, pēnei i te witi, te parei me te lentils. Ka whakamahia ngā kākano mō te rangahau haumarutanga kai i tētahi pēke kākano i Repanona, e waihanga anō ana i ngā kohinga e mau ana i Hiria. Ko te Millennium Seed Bank i Kew te pēke kākano tipu mohoao nui rawa o te ao. Kei te kohia ngā kākano mai i ngā whanaunga mohoao o ngā hua kai o nāianei, e rokirokitia ana i roto i tētahi mahi ao whānui. Ko te whāinga ko te whakaputa i ngā momo hua hou e āhei ana ki te ātete i ngā tuma pēnei i te huringa āhuarangi, te taurakitanga, ngā kirearea me ngā mate. ''Ko te tino hiranga o ēnei whanaunga mohoao poro, kia ora ai i te ao, me urutau rātau ki ngā huringa taiao whakarihariha,'' te kī a Oriole Wagstaff o te kaupapa Crop Wild Relatives i te māra otaota o Kew i Wakehurst i Sussex. ''Mā te nui haere o ngā pēhanga pēnei i ngā kirearea, ngā mate me te huringa āhuarangi, me huri tātau ki ēnei whanaunga mohoao, he nui ake te rerenga kētanga iranga.'' Kua tangohia ngā kākano i ngā pātaka i te Pēke Kākano o te Arikiwi, ā, kua tukuna ki te Pokapū Rangahau Ahuwhenua o te Ao Whānui i ngā Wāhi Maroke (Icarda), i Repanona. Kei roto i a rātou he witi mohoao mai i Itari, he tipu lentil mohoao mai i Kaiperu, tae atu ki ngā whanaunga mohoao o te pī pātītī me te pīni faba. I Icarda, ka whakamahia ngā kākano mō te rangahau ki te whakapai ake i ō rātou whanaunga kāinga ki ngā tuma o nāianei me ngā tuma ā muri ake pēnei i te huringa āhuarangi. Kei te hanga anō ngā taonga huna i ngā kaipūtaiao i Icarda i te kohinga kākano nui rawa atu o te rohe, tae atu ki ngā mano o ngā momo witi, parei, lentil me te fava (broadbean). I puritia ēnei ki to rātau tari matua o mua i Aropo, i reira rātau e kore ai e tae atu i tēnei wā. Nā ngā tauira pūrua i puritia i te Svalbard Global Seed Vault, i roto i tētahi maunga i Nōwei, i āwhina ki te waihanga anō i te pēke kākano. Mā ngā kākano o Kew e āhei ai ngā kairangahau ki ngā rawa utu nui mai i ngā hua mohoao, e taea ai te whakataurite i ngā tīra o ngā hua ora ki ō rātou 'whanaunga'. ''Kei roto i ēnei mea mohoao ngā taonga huna tērā pea ka whakatikaina ngā tuma e anga atu ana ki ngā hua whenua i tēnei wā,'' ko te tāpiri mai a Oriole Wagstaff. Ko te kaupapa Crop Wild Relatives he kaupapa huri noa e whai ana ki te kohikohi, ki te tiaki me te whakapau i te rerenga kētanga iranga i roto i ngā whanaunga mohoao o ā mātou hua whenua hei whakamaru me te whakapai ake i ngā hua kai mō te wā heke. I kī a Marie Haga, te rangatira nui o te Crop Trust, ko te tiaki i te rerenga kētanga o a tātau kai kai i te mutunga ka tiakina te wā heke mai o te kai mō te katoa. ''He tūranga matua tā ngā pēke whakapapa ki te tākaro i tēnei tukanga,'' tana kī. ''Ka tiakina e rātou te rerenga kētanga o te hua, ā, ka whakawāteatia ki ngā kaiahuwhenua me ngā kaiwhakatipu puta noa i te ao, mā te whakarato i ngā rauemi e hiahiatia ana e rātou hei whakarite kia nui a tātau kai, he utu, he whai hua, he rerekē hoki." E whai ana ki: Ko ngā kākano i kawea ake i kohia mai i ngā hoa i Itari, Hōria, Kaiperu, Potukara, Azerbaijan me Aramenia. The work is managed by the Global Crop Diversity Trust with the Millennium Seed Bank Partnership of the Royal Botanic Gardens, Kew, and implemented in partnership with national and international gene banks and plant breeding institutes around the world. E wātea ana ngā rauemi katoa i kohia i roto i te kaupapa i raro i ngā ture o te Whakaaetanga Whakawhiti Rauemi Paerewa (SMTA) i roto i te anga o te pūnaha ā-taha, e ai ki te Tiriti Ao Whānui mō ngā Rauemi Iranga Whakatō mō te Kai me te Ahuwhenua (ITPGRFA). Whāia a Helen i Twitter.

title: Kai Kirihimete 'i raro i te tuma'
summary: Tērā pea he poto noa iho ngā poaka i roto i ngā paraikete me ētahi atu kai hākari i tēnei Kirihimete, kua whakatūpato te Pānga Pūtukatuka Mīti o Ingarangi.
text: E kī ana ko te 60% o te ope mahi i roto i ngā tipu mīti UK i ahu mai i ētahi atu whenua, ā, kāore te umanga i te kawe mai i te nui o ngā kaimahi EU tau. I kī atu tōna rangatira nui, a Nick Allen, ki te BBC ko te tākai tōtiti waipiro ki te pēkana i mahia e te ringa. I kī a ia he "mārire, he uaua ki te mīhini". I taua wā, ka whakatūpato te Kaunihera Pīkaokao o Ingarangi "ko te kimi i te mahi tika he uaua nui mō te wāhanga mīti kararehe i te mea ko te rangirua huri noa i a Brexit e akiaki ana i te tokomaha o a mātau kaimahi ki te rapu mahi i ētahi atu whenua". E kī ana mēnā ka haere tonu te iti o ngā kaimahi i muri i te Pakihi, ka "mōrearea ki te utu o te kai o Ingarangi". I kī ngā wāhi tawhiti o te Pānga Pūtukatuka Mīti o Ingarangi he uaua ki te kawe mai i ngā tangata whenua o UK ki te mahi i ngā tipu mīti, nā te mea kei ngā wāhi tawhiti rātau i reira he iti te kore mahi. "Mai i te wā i pā mai ai a Pakihi, kua uaua ki te pupuri i te mahi o Ūropi," te kī a Tēnā Arāna. Ko te hinganga koi o te uara o te pauna i whakahekea ai ngā utu mō rātou, ka tāpiritia e ia, i a ia e "kore te karere e puta mai ana i te UK i te tino pōhiri". Engari i tāpiri mai a ia: "Ehara i te take Pakihi." Ko ngā āhuatanga mahi i roto i ngā tipu mīti, tae atu ki ngā pāmahana iti e hiahiatia ana hei tiaki i te mīti, he uaua ki te kawe mai i ngā kaimahi, i te wā he nui ake hoki te tono mō ngā mahi tau i ētahi atu wāhanga, i te nuinga o te tuku kāri Kirihimete me ngā mōkihi. Ko te matua ohaoha o te Pānga Pūtukatuka Mīti o Ingarangi e tohu ana i te nuinga o ngā kamupene e mahi ana i te umanga mīti o Ingarangi, e whakahaere ana i ngā hua mīti kau, reme me ngā hua poaka. Ko ōna mema te kawenga mō te whakarato mīti hou me ngā hua mīti ki ngā kaihoko, wharekai me ngā kamupene ratonga kai puta noa i te UK. Tata ki te 75,000 ngā tāngata e whakamahia ana e te umanga, ā, neke atu i te £7bn i te tau ki te whakahaerenga o Ingarangi. Ināianei, neke atu i te 37,000 ngā tāngata e whakamahia ana e te umanga kararehe o UK, ā, neke atu i te £3bn i te tau ki te āhua o te mahi. I kī tētahi kaikōrero mō te Kaunihera Manu o Ingarangi kua tipu te umanga "i tua atu i te wātea o te mahi UK i ngā wāhi e mahi ana mātau". Ko te tikanga o tēnei me kimi e 7,200 ngā kaimahi ehara i te UK i ia tau ki te whakakī i ōna wāteatanga. I tāpiritia e te kaikōrero: "Ki te kore e taea te whakakī i ēnei tūranga i muri i te Brexit, kāore mātou e āhei ki te mahi e hiahiatia ana hei whāngai i tēnei iwi, ā, ka whai pānga nui ki te whakanaotanga, nō reira ko te utu kai. " Mā tēnei e mōrearea ai te utu o te kai o Ingarangi."

title: Pakihi: Ka whiwhi a Labour i muri i te tono kia mutu te 'kore-mahi'
summary: Kei te pūruatia e Labour tētahi tono whakawhiti-rōpū kia kore ai e taea e te UK te wehe i te EU me te kore mahi.
text: I kī te hēkeretari o te kōruru o Te Kōruru o Te Kōruru, a Tā Keir Starmer, ko te whakarākeitanga o te pōti o te 11 o Hakihea i runga i te mahi a te PM, ko tana "tautoko katoa". Ki te whakahokia e ngā MP te menemana e kore e herea, engari ka uaua ki a Ēnā Me te waiho. Ā, ka taea e ia te puru te Pāremata ki te tūru taraiwa mēnā, e ai ki ngā tūmanako, ka pōti ngā MP i te mahi a te PM. Kua auau te whakatūpato a Mrs May ki ngā MP ko te whiringa anake ki tana mahi a Te Pākehā ko te puta atu i te EU me te kore mahi i te 29 o Poutāpeta. Ko te nuinga o ngā MP Labour e tūmanakohia ana kia pōti ki te take i te 11 o Hakihe. Heoi anō, kua kī atu tētahi pūtake ki te AO he "whakaaro whakaaro nui" i waenganui i ngā MP katoa ki tētahi "kore-mahi" Pakihi. I kī atu te kaiārahi Mahi a Jeremy Corbyn ki a ITV's This Morning i te Rāitema "kāore he tangata e whakaae ki tētahi mahi". Ko te whakarākeitanga, i tāpaetia e te kaiāwhina o Labour me te manukura o te komiti tīpako o Te Mahi, o Hilary Benn, e mōhiotia ana he tautoko mai i te Conservative, Labour, SNP, Liberal Democrat, Plaid Cymru me ngā kaipōrangapū Kākāriki.
