E tautohe ana a Tēnā Benn e āhei ana te pāremata ki te "whakahoki i te mana". "Mō te rua tau, i kī a ia [Mrs May] kāore he mahi pai ake i te mahi kino," tana kī atu ki te Ao o Radio 4 i te Kotahi. "Engari kāore he take i ngā wā katoa ko te putanga kino rawa, ā, he tino hira kia katia e tātau tēnā. Nā te mea kāore e taea e mātou te hinga ki te tapa o te pari i te mutunga o Poutāpeta." I kī te MP Mahi o Yvette Kupa mā te menemana e āhei ai ngā MP ki te "taupatupatu tika me te pōti i ngā hipanga panuku, kaua e waiho katoa" ki te pirimia. E kī ana a Laura Kuenssberg o TE AO e tautoko ana i ngā mea "e whakapae ana ētahi i te Tau 10 - arā, ka hinga te pōti, ko te Pāremata e whakawhiti ana i te kaiwhakahaere". I whakaahuatia e te hēkeretari ā-rohe o Mua o Labour a Jack Straw te whakarākeitanga hei "pou tūranga" i te huarahi ki tētahi atu taupānga. E kī ana a Tēnā Kakau witi, ko ia tētahi o ngā reo Pākehā nui ake, e whakapono ana a ia tērā pea he "hiahia nui" mo te pōti tūmatanui. He matawaenga mo te Pōti a te Iwi e te korero tōrangapū o TE WĀ, a Pirihi Mason, Tāurutia nga tākuta e whā. He tokowhā whakawhiti, e whakaaro ana ki te rautaki, e kōrero ana i ngā tohutohu. E hiahia ana rātau ki tētahi atu taupānga - ko tā ngā kaiwhakahauhau e kīia nei he Pōti a te Iwi. Ko wai rātou? Ko Dr Paul Williams o Labour, ko ngā GP Conservative i huri i ngā MP o Piripi Lee rāua ko Sarah Wollaston, me te Dr Philippa Whitford o te SNP. Kei te kōtui ngā karere i waenganui i a rātou, e ngana ana ki te mahi mēnā e tika ana kia whakatakoto i tētahi whakarākeitanga ki te pōti nui o Te Pāremata, kia taea ai e ngā MP te whakapuaki i tā rātou tautoko mō tētahi atu taupānga. E kī mai ana ki a au kei roto rātau i tētahi "matawaenga pono" i waenganui i te hiahia ki te whakapuaki i ngā whakaaro o aua rau mano i haere ki Rāwāhi e karanga ana ki tētahi "Pōti a te Iwi" i Whiringahora, engari kāore i te hiahia ki te "whakararuraru i te tukanga katoa" mā te kore e whiwhi i ngā tau me te whakaae i ngā hoariri ki te kī kāore ngā MP e whakahoki i tētahi atu taupānga. Ko ngā whika matua i roto i te whakahau a te Pōti a te Iwi e whakataukī ana me tuki rātau ina tino nui rawa to rātau kaha: i muri i te hinganga o te kāwanatanga i te 11 o Hakihe, ina tūmanako rātau ka whiwhi a Labour, i muri i te korenga e whakaū i tētahi pōti nui, ka tapa ki te tautoko i tētahi atu taupānga. Pānuitia ētahi atu mea mai i a Pirihi Tae atu ki ngā menemana e ono ka pōtitia ina whakawāteatia e ngā MP te mahi a te pirimia i te 11 o Hakihe. Kua whakaraupapatia e te tēpu o mua o Labour tētahi whakarākeitanga e kī ana kāore e taea e te rōpū te tautoko i te whakaaetanga, nā te mea kāore e taea te whakarato i tētahi uniana tikanga me te "mākete kotahi kaha". E kī ana hoki e whakahē ana i tētahi putanga kāore he mahi, ā, "ka whakatau ki te whai i ia kōwhiringa" e ārai ana i tētahi tauari pērā. Tērā anō pea he whakarākeitanga tēpu o mua mai i te SNP. E whakaaro ana ētahi i te Pāremata kāore rātau e puta, engari e tūmanako ana rātau ka kitea he iti iho te tautohetohe, ā, ka nui ake te wā e taea ai te nuinga. Ka tīpakohia ngā menemana e te Kaikōrero o Ngātahi, a John Bercow, i te 11 o Hakihea - te whakamutunga o ngā rā e rima o te taupatupatu mo te whakaaetanga o Te Pakihi.

title: I pānuitia te rārangi o ngā tohu kōrero kōrero a Foster
summary: Kua whakakitea ngā tautapa mō ngā Tohu Kōrero o Etinitini o tēnei tau.
text: Ko ngā mahi i rārangihia ko Bridget Christie, ko Carl Donnelly me James Acaster, i hapa i te paraihe i tērā tau. Kua whakaingoatia hoki a Max rāua ko Ivan, ko Maika Wozniak, ko Nick Helm me Seann Walsh mō te whakawhiwhinga, ināianei i tōna tau 33. Ka pānuitia te toa i te Hātarei. Ko te toa o tērā tau ko Tākuta Paraone. Tērā anō tētahi whakawhiwhinga tauhou tino pai, arā, ko ngā tautapa ko: Aisling Bea, John Kearns, Liam Williams, Matt Okine me Romesh Ranganathan. Ko ngā tohu, e whakahaere ana mai i te tau 1981, i mōhiotia i mua ko te Perriers me te If.Comeddies. Ko ngā toa o mua ko Russell Kane, Tim Key, Al Murray, te Rōpū o ngā Tāne, ko Te Rōpū o ngā Tāne, ko Te Wānanga o Aotearoa, ko Steve Coogan, ko Lee Evans me Frank Skinner. Ko ngā ingoa "Whetū", kua whai rangatū pouaka whakaata kē, ka taea rānei te mahi i tētahi wāhi tūru 500 i raro i tō rātou ake ingoa, kāore e āhei ana ki te whakawhiwhinga. Heoi anō, i kitea e te pae whakawā e 578 ngā whakaaturanga rerekē i roto i ngā wiki e toru o te Fringe. Ko te whakawhiwhinga Whakaaturanga Kōrero Tino Pai ko te £10,000, ā, ko te tauhou tino pai e toa ana i te £5,000. Tērā anō tētahi whakawhiwhinga paewhiri e whakawhiwhia ana ki tētahi mahi e tika ana kia āhukahukatia motuhake. Ko ngā tautapa katoa mō te Whakaaturanga Kōrero Tino Pai ko: Ko ngā tautapa mō te Tauhou Tino Pai ko: I kī a Nica Burns, te kaiwhakanao o ngā tohu: "I muri i te taupatupatu rārangi rārangi whakaaturanga Kōrero Tino Pai rawa atu i roto i te hītori o ngā tohu, e haere ana ki tētahi pōti tuarua kāore anō kia mōhiotia, ko te rārangi, ko te wā tuatahi mai i toa ai a Lee Evans i te tau 1993, e whitu te kaha. " He tino taumira ki tērā tau, ka maumaharatia te 2013 hei tau o te tūnga me te tatau kata tino pai."

title: Nick Clegg: Kua tae ki te wā tōtiti
summary: Kua tae ki te wā ka kite te tangata i te hanganga o ngā tōtiti a te tauwhāinga. Koia tēnā, whakapono rānei, kāore rānei, koia te whakaahuatanga a Nick Clegg i tana rautaki hou rawa.
text: E whakapono ana te pirimia tuarua kua tae ki te wā e mārama ana te iwi whānui ko te hanga kaupapa here i roto i te kāwanatanga he rite ki tētahi kītini e huatau ana i ngā momo tohutohu katoa, engari ko ētahi anake e uru ana ki te tahua. E hiahia ana a ia kia mōhio ngā kaipōti ko ēhea ngā mea i tāpiritia e te Lib Dems, ā, he mea nui rawa, i tohe rātau kia mahue. Nō reira i tēnei rā, i te ahiahi o te rima o nga huritau o tana pōtitanga hei kaiārahi Lib Dem, ka tukua e Clegg tētahi whaikōrero e tono ana ia i te hua mō te whakatū i ngā tapahi ora hōhonu ake i marohitia e te Tories - engari, ko ngā tono kia tangohia te takuhe whare mai i raro i te 25 me te takuhe tamariki mai i ngā whānau neke atu i te tokorua. E tautohe ana hoki a ia ko ngā painga o ngā kaitiaki - ko te pahi koreutu, te raihana pouaka whakaata me te whakaaetanga hinu hōtoke - me whakamātauria te tikanga mō te hunga tino rangatira. Ka whakahē hoki te whaikōrero i "te moemoeā" o te matau o Tory ka taea te wehe atu i Uropi me te whāwhā i ngā nekeneke, ā, kāore he pānga ki te tupu o te ohaoha. Ko ēnei mea katoa i muri i ngā wiki tata nei kua pānuitia e te DPM ōna rerekētanga i runga i ngā ture pēhi, te mea e kiia nei ko te "tāke a te kaitirotiro" me Uropi. Kātahi ka wehe tētahi tauwhāinga hou? Kāo, pērā i te tūponotanga. I te nuinga o te wā ka warewaretia ko te tangata e hiahia ana ki te whakaoranga anō o Lib Dem e tata ana ki a Clegg e haere ana i runga i te ingoa o Cameron. Ko te nuinga o te ārahi poipoi a Labour e hāngai ana ki ngā whakahekenga mai i te Lib Dems. E kōrero ana ngā kaitohutohu o Tory mō te hiahia kia noho te Lib Dems i runga i te 15% o te pōti - ehara i te mea ināianei, i raro iho i te 10% - ki te whakakāhore i ētahi tūru o Labour, ā, ko te hua, kia noho mana ai te Tories anake, i te tauwhāinga rānei. Kotahi noa iho te raruraru, ahakoa. Ka aha mēnā ka angitu te rautaki hanga tōtiti ki te takitahi whakamutunga a Clegg "Aroha mai"? Ka aha mēnā ka ngaro tonu tana rōpū i te whawhai mo te wāhi tuatoru me te UKIP i roto i te panekōrero? Ko te moepuku kīhini tēnā a Nick, ā, kāore koe e hiahia ki te tango i taku kupu. Pānuitia noa iho ngā kupu a tana urunga tata me te kaiwhakahaere rautaki o mua, a Rārangi Reeves, i te Kaitiaki o tēnei ata: "Ko te tikanga kia nui ake te tautoko me te nui ake o ngā pōti. Ki te kore, tērā pea ka taka te ārai ki runga i te tauwhāinga i mua i te tau 2015."

title: Ko te MP pango tuatahi o Hakari e whai ana ki te 'whakangaro i te whakaaro nui'
summary: He rongonui a Hakari mo ngā tōrangapū ārai manene, engari e hiahia ana tētahi MP pango pango ki te whakahou i te whakaahua o te whenua.
text: Nā Tom MulliganBBC Monitoring Olivio Kocsis-Cake, o te rōpū ātete Parbeszed (Kōrero), e oatitia ana hei MP i te Mane, e mau ana i tētahi tūru e wātea ana e tētahi hoa mahi e whakararo ana. Kua noho a Tēnā Kocsis-Keke (e kīia ana ko "kochish-tsocker") hei wāhi kōrero i Hakari nā te kaha o te kōrero ārai kaiheke - otirā ki ngā tāngata kāore i te mā - i whakawāteatia e ngā mema o te rōpū whakahaere o Te Rūnanga, ōna pāpāho ā-motu pono me ngā rōpū matau tawhiti pēnei i a Jobbik. "I ngā tau kotahi rau e waru tekau mā iwa rau, he maha ngā wā i mōrearea ai ahau i te wā e tūtaki ana ahau ki ngā kirikiri i runga i te tiriti. Engari ināianei he tino rerekē tēnei. Ko te nuinga o taku āhua whakatūpato noa iho," te kī a Tēnā Kocsis-Keke ki te paetukutuku rongokōrero takitahi Index.hu. E rima noa iho ngā tūru i toa ai a Parbeszed i te pōtitanga o te tau 2018, i whiwhi ai te parirau matau o te Pirimia o Te Pirimia, a, e 26 ngā tūru i whiwhi ai te Pirimia. E noho ana ngā MP Parbeszed i runga i te toatanga ki te Rōpū Manapori, ā, ka hangaia tahitia e rātau he kōwae e 20 tūru. Ko tētahi tohu o te kingitanga tōrangapū o te Pirimia Orban ko te ārai i ngā kaiheke ehara i te EU kia kaua e noho ki Hakari, me te tohu i te rerenga kētanga ā-iwi hei tuma ki te hītori ā-iwi me te ahurea o Hakaria. Ko ngā ture e kiia nei ko "Kāti Soros" - e pā ana ki a George Soros, te kaiwhaiwhai o Hakaria-Amerika - e haere ana i te pāremata ka whakawāteatia ngā mahi a ngā rōpū ā iwi tūmatanui hei āwhina i ngā kaiwhaiwhai. I tērā marama ka kī a Tēnā Orban ko tana manakē ko te "tiaki i te haumarutanga me te ahurea Karaitiana o Hakari". Ka whakakāhore a Hakari i tētahi aronui EU mō te whakatau anō i ngā hunga whakaruru EU-whānui, ā, kua hangaia he taiapa whakaharahara ki tōna rohe ki te tonga hei ārai i ngā kaiheke. "I ngā wā katoa ka kitea e Fidesz he hoariri o te rā me kinongia. Pōroa, Soros, hunga whakaruru, te hunga noho kore, te Roma (Gypsies) rānei," te kī a Tēnā Kocsis-Keke ki te nūpepa o Nepszava. I kī a ia me arotahi ake a Fidesz ki te āwhina i te rawakore me te whakapai ake i te rongoā me te mātauranga. "I roto i ngā tau tata nei, e whai ana a Fidesz i tētahi whakahau kino. E hiahia ana ahau ki te whakangaro i ngā whakaaro whakaaro me ngā āhuatanga kua whakatōkia e Fidesz i roto i te iwi o Hakaria mō ngā tauiwi," tana kī atu ki a Index.hu. "Me wehi tātau i ngā tauiwi; kāore e taea e rātau te whakauru - e mārama ana he ariā wawao ēnei. He tohu ora ahau kāore koe e mataku i te tae kiri o tētahi atu." E rua ngā whakatupuranga rerekē i whānau mai a Olivio Kocsis-Cake i te tau 1980. Ko tōna whaea he Hungaria, ā, ko tōna pāpā, mai i Guinea-Bissau, i haere mai ki Hakari mā Senegal i te tau 1976, 18 ona tau. Pēnei i te tokomaha o ngā ākonga i pōhiritia ki Uropi ki te Rāwhiti mai i ngā whenua e tipu ana, i ako a Marcelo Cake-Baly me te whiwhi i te Whare Wānanga o Karl Marx. I noho a ia, a, i kitea he mahi hei atekōkiri taraiwa o Putapeta, a, he kaitapere kiriata kotahi tonu ia. I te tipu ake i Putapeta, ka haere tana tama a Olivio Kocsis-Cake ki te kura i tētahi Hakari tino rerekē. He maha ngā āhuatanga o te whakakotahitanga i tupu i raro i te kāwanatanga ā iwi maha, ā, ko te ao whānui o te āhua o te rōpū kotahi i pōhiritia tōna pāpā i whakaritea ki te hītori. I puta ia i roto i te hītori me te mātauranga pāpori mai i te Whare Wānanga Katorika o Péter Pázmány o te taone. I whakamutua e ia tētahi tūranga i roto i te rōpū Tōrangapū Ka Rerekē (LMP) i Hui tanguru 2013, ā, ka noho hei mema mātāmua o Parbeszed, i reira ia i mahi ai hei kaiārahi whakahau, kātahi hei kaiwhakahaere rōpū mō te whā tau. Ināianei kua tata a ia ki te noho hei MP e noho ana. I roto i tētahi uiuinga inā noa nei, ka whakatūpato te nūpepa mauī o Nepszava ki a Tēnā Kocsis-Keke e whakaūngia ana a Pirihitini ki a ia, ehara nā tōna kara kiri, engari nā tētahi hononga ki tō rātou whika kino tuatahi o te ao whānui, a Tēnā Soros. "Ko tēnei tauhohenga Fidesz e tūmanakohia ana," tana kī. "Ko te tangata kāore e whakaae ana ki a rātau tōrangapū, ka karangatia wawetia he māngai Soros. " I whai wāhi ahau ki tētahi hōtaka tautoko, i rangahau ai mātau i ngā hōtaka mātauranga mō te tūāpapa o Soros. E whakahētia ana nga kaipōrangapū ātete mo nga mea katoa, ki taku take ka mārama tonu te kara o tōku kiri. Kua waia ahau ki taua mea." Ka pūrongo me te tātari i ngā rongo mai i te pouaka whakaata, reo irirangi, tukutuku me ngā pāpāho tā puta noa i te ao. Ka taea e koe te whai i te Aroturuki o TE AO i Twitter me Facebook.

title: Pūtea 2018: He aha i uaua ai te whakapau moni ki nga huarahi me te rēra?
summary: Ehara i te mea ngāwari te whakaoti i ngā kaupapa hanganga nunui, i te tīmatanga rānei.
text: Nā te tīma Reality CheckBBC News He maha nga tau e kōrero ana mō ngā mahi mō te rōrahi o ngā waka i runga i te A303 e hipa atu ana i Stonehenge i Wiltshire. I hangaia ngā tono mō tētahi kauhanga i raro i te Pae Tuku iho o te Ao i te waenganui o ngā tau 90, me ngā mahere mō tētahi kauhanga i whakaaetia e te kāwanatanga i te tau 2002. I muri iho i ngā tau whakahē, he uiui tūmatanui me ngā utu tōrino, ka tangohia nga kaupapa e te hēkeretari waka i taua wā i te tau 2007. I roto i te Tauākī Ngahuru i te tau 2013, ka whakaarahia e te tumuaki o George Osborne ngā mahere ki tētahi akoranga whaimana, ā, i te tau 2017 tērā pea he kauhanga. Tērā pea ka tīmata te mahi i te kauhanga i te tau 2021. E toru tekau tau ehara i te mea nui i whakaritea ki ngā tau e 5,000 neke atu rānei i reira ngā kōhatu, engari e whakaatu ana i te uaua o te mahi i tēnei momo mahi. I kī atu a Paora Hōnea, te upoko o te Whare Wānanga mō ngā Akoranga Moni (IFS), ki tētahi komiti o ngā MP i tērā tau: "I roto ahau i te Pūtea Moni i te tīmatanga o ngā tau 2000 i te pikinga o te whakapau moni penapena. Ko te tikanga, he maha nga piriona i ia tau, nā te mea kāore i taea te puta atu i te tatau, ā, ko te nuinga o ngā mea i puta mai i te tatau kāore i tino pai te whakapau." I kī atu a Tā John Armitt, te kaiwhakahaere o te Komihana Hanganga o te Motu, ki te pukapuka o te Whare i tērā wiki ko te kī ki te whakatere ake i ngā kaupapa hanganga nui i te UK ko te whakahōu i te āhua o te utu ki te hunga e pāngia ana e rātou. E whakaaro ana te katoa he ariā pai te whakapau hanganga. I te pōtitanga o te tau 2017, i whakaurua e te whakahau Rangatira te hanganga i roto i te tuatahi o ōna "whakamātautau nui e rima" me te whakahua i ngā hanganga 26 ngā wā, i te wā i tautohe a Labour kia whakapau i tētahi atu £250bn neke atu i te 10 tau ki te hanganga. Engari kāore anō kia tino pai ngā kāwanatanga whai muri ki te whakauru i te moni ki roto i ngā pūtea penapena pūtea e kī ana rātau e haere ana. Ka whakatata atu a Reality Check ki te Pūtea Moni ki te pātai he aha, engari kāore i whiwhi urupare. Ko te āhua o te whakapau moni a te kāwanatanga kei roto ko te hanganga e kiia ana ko te Public Sector Net Investment (PSNI). Kei roto ko ngā kaupapa hanganga pēnei i ngā huarahi me ngā raina tereina, te rangahau me te whanaketanga, ngā taputapu IT me ngā āhuatanga. Ināianei kei te matapae te Office for Budget Responsibility, e aromatawai ana i ngā mahere Pūtea a te kāwanatanga, i roto i ngā tau e rima e whai ake nei ka haumi te kāwanatanga i te £17.5bn iti iho i roto i ngā kaupapa pūtea i tāna i kī ai (tirohia te ripanga 2.19 o tēnei ripakaute). I kitea e tētahi pūrongo a te IFS i waenganui i te 2010 me te 2016, he 8% iti iho te PSNI i te kī a te kāwanatanga. Ka whakataurite tēnei ki te toharite o te 13% i waenganui i te 1998 me te 2010. Ahakoa rā, i te tau 2008-10, i taea e te kāwanatanga o Labour te whakapau moni nui ake i tāna i kī ai. Nā te mea i kawea mai te pūtea penapena mai i te tau e whai ake nei i te wā e ngana ana te kāwanatanga ki te mahi i te pānga o te raruraru pūtea. He maha ngā take i iti iho ai te whakapau moni a ngā kāwanatanga i tā rātou i whakarite ai ki ngā pūtea penapena pūtea. Ko te tuatahi ko te mea mārama - ko te whiwhi kaupapa i te whenua, ko te tikanga kia whai tīma hei whakatinana, te whiwhi whakaaetanga whakarite me ngā momo takaware katoa pēnei i ngā whakahēnga whaiwhenua, pērā ki te A303. Ko tētahi atu mea hei maumahara ko te PSNI he whika kupenga - ko te moni i pau i runga i te pūtea penapena pūtea me ngā rawa kua hokona. Hei tauira, mēnā ka hokona e te kāwanatanga ētahi whenua, āhuatanga rānei, ka whakahekea te PSNI mō taua tau. I ngā tau tata nei, tērā ētahi tauira o ngā ratonga tūmatanui e tango ana i ngā moni e tika ana kia whakapaua e rātou ki te pūtea penapena, ā, ka whakamahia kētia mō te whakapau moni o ia rā. I tēnei tau, hei tauira, i whakawhiti te Tari Hauora me te Tiaki Pāpori i te £1bn mai i te moni e tika ana kia whakapaua ki te pūtea penapena pūtea, ā, ka whakamahia mō ngā utu o ia rā "hei whakatutuki i ngā pēhanga whakapau". Kua whakaaetia hoki ngā mana ā rohe ki te whakamahi "ngāwari" i ngā moni kua tohua mō te whakapau moni. Kātahi anō, i ētahi wā he huringa i roto i ngā mea e kiia ana hei whakapau pūtea penapena wāhanga tūmatanui. Hei tauira, mai i te taunahatanga anō o ngā pāhonotanga whare hei wāhanga o te wāhanga tūmataiti (hāunga i Aiarangi ki te Raki), kua kore te moni i pau ki ngā whare utu ōrau e tatau hei wāhanga o PSNI. Whakahōutanga 23 o Whiringa ā-rangi: I kī tēnei tuhipānui i mua ka whakahekea te PSNI e te hokonga o ngā hea kāwanatanga. Kua whakatikaina tēnei kia kitea ai ka pā anake te whakaiti i te PSNI ki te hoko rawa ōkiko (hei tauira, whenua me te rawa). He aha tāu e hiahia ana kia tūhuratia e BBC Reality Check? Whakapā mai Pānuitia ētahi atu mea mai i Reality Check Whāia mātou i Twitter

title: Mate whakaoho a Westcliff: Ko te tuarima o nga tangata i whakataua ki te kōhuru o Asqeri Spaho
summary: Kua whakataua tētahi tangata tuarima ki te kōhuru i muri i te okanga o tētahi tangata ki te mate i Essex.
text: I mate a Asqeri Spaho, e 25, mai i Westcliff-on-Sea, i tētahi pānga i Tintern Avenue, i te taone, i te 12 o Hakihea. I whara tētahi tangata tuarua. Kua whakataua a Leon Wright, 31, o Highbury New Park, ki te raki o Rānana, ki te kōhuru, ki te kōhuru, ki te tāhaetanga kino me te pupuri i te tarukino. Ka puta a ia ki te aroaro o nga kaiwhakawā i Chelmsford ā muri ake. Tokowhā anō ētahi atu tāngata i whakataua e pā ana ki taua mahi. Kua whakataua a Durald Sokoli, e 27, o Ayley Croft i Enfield, ki te raki o Rāwāhi, ki te kōhuru, ki te kōhuru me te pupuri i te tarukino. Ko Scott Heaney, e 22, mai i Highbury i Rānana, ko Kōrero Kincloch, 31, mai i Upper Holloway, me Wesley Hendrickson, 31, o Ashcroft Crescent, Enfield, i whakapaea hoki ki te kōhuru, te ngana ki te kōhuru me te tāhaetanga kino. Kua tukua tētahi tangata 31 tau mai i Tottenham i runga i te whakapae i te kōhuru, i ngana ki te kōhuru, me te pupuri rongoā. I kī ngā Pirihimana o Essex e kimi tonu ana ngā āpiha ki te kimi i a Doketa Hāhi, e 28, e pā ana ki tētahi whakararuraru i Tintern Avenue i te 12 o Hakihe. title: I riro mai te Rōpū BSW e te umanga tūmataiti tūmataiti o Leeds
summary: Kua riro mai te kamupene rākau o Pirihitini BSW Group e te umanga tūmataiti tūmataiti o Endless LLP.
text: Ko BSW ā-whānau, ko tōna tari matua i Earlston i Berwickshire, tētahi o ngā umanga ngahere nui rawa o UK. I rangirua te wā heke mai o te mira kani a te kamupene i Boat of Garten i Cairngorms i tērā tau nā te hekenga o ngā mahi hokohoko. I whakatūria te Rōpū BSW i te tau 1848, ā, ināianei e mahi ana i ngā tāngata neke atu i te 1,200. E whitu nga mira kani o te rōpū i te UK - i Newbridge-on-Wye, Southampton, Carlisle, Dalbeattie, Petersmuir, Fort William me Boat of Garten - me tētahi i Riga, Rāwhia. Ko te pae o Fort William te mira nui rawa o BSW, ā, e 193 ngā tāngata e mahi ana. Kei te whakaaro a Endless LLP ki te whakatipu i te umanga. I kī a Toni Hackney, o te Rōpū BSW: "He rongo tino pai tēnei mō BSW. " While it is business as usual, we are excited by the opportunities new ownership will bring us and we look forward to entering a new era of rapid growth and development under Endless' ownership."

title: Kei te hokona e Air France-KLM te 31% o Virgin Atlantic
summary: Kei te hokona e Air France-KLM te tata ki te tuatoru o Virgin Atlantic, ka waiho te kamupene matua o Tā Richard Branson, Virgin Group, me tētahi tūnga iti i roto i te waka rererangi i whakatūria e ia.
text: Kei te tango a Air France-KLM i tētahi tūnga 31%, e wātea ana ki te £220m, i Virgin Atlantic hei wāhanga o tētahi mahi ngātahi e whā me te hoa o Amerika Delta. Ka hinga te tiri a Virgin Group mai i te 51% ki te 20%, i te wā ka pupuri a Delta i te 49%. I kī a Tā Rākei ka noho tonu a ia "tino whakauru" i muri i te mahi. I kī a ia i roto i tētahi reta tūwhera ka "tino whai hua" te mahi ngātahi hou ki te waka rererangi, ki ngā kiritaki me te parani, ā, ka mahara ki ngā wā matua i roto i te hītori o Virgin Atlantic. I kī a Jean-Marc Janaillac, te rangatira nui o Air France-KLM, ka hoatu e te whakaritenga ki ngā kiritaki "he kōwhiringa anō i waenganui i Uropi, UK me Te Hononga o Amerika mā ngā pokapū tekau mā rua i ngā taha e rua o te Atahanganui". Kua tata ki te rima tau te pakanga atahanga o Virgin me Delta e whakahaere ana i tētahi mahi ngātahi, e mahi ana i ngā ara arokē i waenganui i Uropi me Te Hononga o Amerika. Kua kaha ake te whakataetae i roto i ngā tau tata nei, me ngā tauhou tae atu ki te ratonga Taumata utu iti o Norwegian me British Airways e tuku ana i ngā rerenga tawhiti kore. Ko te mahi hou, arā ko te kaikawe Itari raruraru o Alitalia, ka whakahaere i ngā rerenga atahanga 300 i ia rā. I roto i tētahi pānuitanga pēhi tōtahi, ka kī a Virgin me ōna hoa ka tukuna e te mahi "ngā hōtaka rererangi ngāwari me ngā utu whakataetae me ngā painga rererere auau, tae atu ki te kaha ki te whiwhi me te hoko i ngā maero puta noa i ngā kaikawe katoa". Ko ngā paraka hanga o Virgin Atlantic, i whakatūria i te tau 1984, tētahi o ngā kamupene tuatahi i roto i te kōpaki parani Virgin a Richard Branson. I roto i tana reta tūwhera, ka maharatia e Tā Rākei tōna tauwhāinga nui ki British Airways, te pānga o ngā whakaekenga pūtohu 9/11 me te raruraru pūtea. I tuhituhi a Tā Richard i a ia e pakeke ana, i hiahia ia ki te whakarite "kei te noho ngā paraka hanga katoa e hiahiatia ana kia noho rangatira tonu ai a Virgin Atlantic me te tipu mō ngā tau e 50 e whai ake nei". Ahakoa ko ngā ara atahanga i waenganui i ngā mea tino whai hua, he taonga whāranu a Puhi i roto i ngā tau tata nei. I te tau 2016 i pūrongotia ai ōna hua tino pai mo te rima tau, engari i whakatūpato te kamupene i te tīmatanga o tēnei tau tērā pea ka haere anō ki te whero i te tau 2017 i te wā i pana ake ai te pauna ngoikore i ngā utu me te whakaweto i ngā kaihanga hararei.

title: Te hinganga o Carillion: 'Kua maukatia e rātau te kēti'
summary: Kua hinga te kamupene hanganga me ngā ratonga o Carillion, e noho mōrearea ana ngā mahi me ngā hekenga.
text: Nā Paul Harrison, Tom Gerken &Sherie RyderBBC UGC & Social News Kei roto te umanga i ngā kaupapa tūmatanui nui pēnei i te raina tere-tere HS2, ā, ka whakahaere i ngā kirimana ratonga tūmatanui tae atu ki ngā kura me ngā whare herehere. Kua urupare ngā kaimahi me ngā kaikirimana iti ki ngā rongo, e māharahara ana ki a rātau utu, hekenga me ngā rau mano pauna e namatia ana i roto i ngā kirimana. Phillip, Birmingham "E mahi ana ahau i tētahi kaupapa i Birmingham i te Hōhipera Metropolitan o Midland, he mahi i whakawhiwhia mai i Carillion. " I huri mātau i tēnei ata, a, ka korerotia mai kua haere rātau ki te whakawāteatanga, a, koia anō. I katia te pae. "E 20 o mātau e mahi ana mō taku kamupene, ā, i te pae katoa e 520 ngā tāngata mō ngā kamupene rerekē. " I korerotia ki ngā tāngata katoa i runga i te pae: 'Koia tēnā, hoki ki te kāinga.' Ka kī taku kamupene, 'Kua whakawāteatia koe.' "I te hopu noa iho te tangata i a rātau taonga me te haere, kāore i te mōhio he aha ā rātou mahi āpōpō. " Kua maukatia e rātau te kēti. Kua kī mai rātou ka taea e mātou te tiki i ā mātou utauta whaiaro i te pae mēnā he iti, engari koia anō. "There were kids on there doing their apprenticeships with college, they're gone too. " Kāore au i te mōhio me aha ahau anō. Kua rēhita ahau ki ētahi umanga ruarua mai i tēnei ata engari kāore au i te mōhio he aha taku mahi mō te reti. "E tika ana ahau ki te utu mai i taku kamupene, kāore au i te mōhio mēnā ka whiwhi ahau. I taku pātai atu ki taku pāhi, ka kī mai a ia he nama moni te kamupene mo te utu. Āe, ki te kore rātou e whiwhi, kāore mātou i te whiwhi." Mātini, Manatū "Ko te penihana tētahi o ngā mea e hiahia ana ahau ki te unu. " I whakaarohia ki te £43,000, he iti pea ki ētahi tāngata, engari he nui ki a au. "Kāore anō mātou kia whakapā atu ki a Carillion e pā ana ki te unu. Ki taku whakaaro ka waimarie ahau ki te kōrero ki tētahi tangata, he kino rawa i a au e whiwhi ana i aku whakatau tata. "He aituā nui. I rongo ahau inā noa nei kei te raruraru rātou, engari kāore au i mōhio he tino kino. Kāore au i te mōhio ki tō rātou kaha ki te utu i te moni me ngā mea i mahia ki te uara tiritiri. "I whakawhitia hoki aku moni mai i tētahi atu kamupene ki te pūtea penihana Carillion. Te āhua nei he whakataunga tino kino tērā. Kaore he huarahi i taea ai e au te mōhio. "Ko tēnei penihana anake i whakahokia e au, ināianei kei te rangirua. Kāore au i te mōhio he aha taku mahi ki te kore e tae mai." Mike, South England "He kaiwhakarato mātou e mahi ana mō Carillion. Ka whakarato mātou i ngā ratonga tautoko i roto i te pūtea arumoni. "Kua namatia e mātou mō te £240,000, e hoki ana ki Mahuru i tērā tau. Ki taku whakaaro kāore mātou e whakahoki mai i tēnei moni. "Ki a mātau, he rā kino tēnei, ka pā ki a mātau mo te tau. He kamupene nui mātou, nō reira ka ora mātou. Engari he ora noa iho. Tērā ētahi kaikirimana iti ka kino ake te pānga. "Ki taku whakaaro ka parea ngā kirimana kāwanatanga, engari tērā pea ka haere hāngai mātou ki ngā kiritaki whakamutunga ki te ngana ki te tango i aua kirimana kia ora ai mātou. " E mārama ana, e kore e taea e mātou te whakaora i ngā mea kua ngaro. Ki te titiro ki te rahi o te nama kei a rātou, kāore au i te kite i te nui o te tūmanako kia whakahokia mai e tētahi tangata. "I ngā wā katoa e raruraru ana mātou ki te ahurea Carillion. Ko rātau te whakamutunga o ngā dinosaur kaikirimana nui. Kāore i pai a rātau tāngata tiki, ā, kāore mātau i pīrangi ki te mahi mā rātou." title: He ohorere ngā tapahi Rolls-Royce i Ansty ?
summary: Ko te pānuitanga a Rolls-Royce me kati ana mahi waea UK i Ansty, tata ki Coventry, i ohorere ki te tokomaha.
text: Nā Martin WinchBBC News Online I kī te MP Labour mō Coventry North West, i kī a Kiriata i "ohorere" a ia nā te mea "kāore he whakatūpato o mua, he tohu rānei o ngā hinganga mahi" e tata ana ki te 400. Engari he tino ohorere te rongo e whakaheke ana tētahi atu kaiwhakanao nui e tata ana ki te taone? I roto i ngā tau e 10 kua taha ake nei, e hia mano ngā mahi kua haere tahi me ngā āhuatanga o Massey, Ferguson, Ericsson me Peugeot e kati ana i ngā wheketere i roto i te taone, huri noa i te taone. Tāpirihia ki ngā kamupene pēnei i a Alvis me Daimler, ā, i te wāhi i puta ai te pūkenga, kua pakaru hoki. Mai i taua wā kua kitea e ēnei me ētahi atu pae he oranga hou hei pānga whare, pāka hokohoko me ētahi atu whakamahinga arumoni. He pikitia rerekē tērā i te mutunga o te rau tau 19 i te kitenga o Coventry i te whānautanga o te hanga motokā. I te tīmatanga o te WWI, kua makaia katoatia te hanganga o ngā rererangi, ngā rākau me ngā waea ki roto i te kōhua rewa. I āwhina ngā mahi hou ki te whakatipu i te iwi whānui mai i te 70,000 i te tau 1901 ki neke atu i te 330,000 i te tau 1970, e ai ki te Kaunihera Taone o Coventry. 'Huringa whakaharahara' i neke tuatahi a Keni Taylor, te kaiārahi Rangatira o mua o te kaunihera o te taone, ki Coventry i te tīmatanga o nga tau kotahi rau e waru tekau mā rua, ā, ka mahara i mārama i taua wā kei te whakapeka te whakanao nui. Ahakoa kei te whiwhi tonu ētahi kaimahi i ngā utu pai, arā, he maha ngā "pātaka tino kounga" i te pokapū o te taone, "i tino rerekē ngā mea," tana kī. "E kore rawa mātou e hoki mai ki taua ao whakanao nui." Engari he iti ake ētahi pūrākau angitu. Ko Penso tētahi o aua kamupene e tipu ana, e hanga ana i ngā wāhanga mō BAE me Meheke-Benz i waenganui i ētahi atu. Ko te umanga kēmu he wāhanga kua tipu me Codemasters i Southam, tētahi o ngā toa o nā noa nei. E whakapono ana tētahi tohunga mai i te Kura Pakihi o Warwick ko ngā ngaronga mahi e 378 i Rolls Royce i Ansty e "pā ana ki ngā tapahi wawao" i mahia e te kāwanatanga. I kī a Dr Christian Slater, he ahorangi pāhono o te whakahaere rautaki, e kore e taea te matapae i te wāhi e hinga ai ngā tapahi, engari i rongo "i tūmanakohia". "I te kēhi o Ansty, ko te nuinga o ngā pūkaha whakauru, ratonga hoki, tata ki te 60% o te pūtea." I kī a Dr Slater he tirohanga rerekē tērā mo te umanga ā-iwi o te kamupene, e noho ana hoki i Ansty. "Kei te tūmanako ahau," ka haere tonu a ia. "He kaha ō rātou tauwhāinga engari he hua tino pai a Rolls Royce. " I te tau 2011 he wāriu te hanganga o ngā mīhini ki te kamupene, me te ratonga i te £600bn." I kī a Dr Slater he take mō te tūmanako paetata i roto i te umanga motokā, e miramira ana i a Jaguar Land Rover (JLR), i Gaydon, i Warwickshire. Nō nā tata nei i pānuitia ai te hanganga o ngā mahi e 800 i tōna tipu pātata o Solihull, ā, kei te kimi hoki ki te tiki i ngā tauira hou e 150. "Kua hari a JLR ki a mātau ki te rongo pai kei te tipu tonu. " I te raruraru rātau, engari i haere mai a Tata, a, he huarahi mātauranga ki te whakatū i a rātau hua mutunga tiketike i roto i nga rangatiratanga puta noa. "Ka taea e ngā mea te huri."

title: He nui ake ngā kēhi o te rewharewha hoiho i whakaūngia i te raki o Wales
summary: He nui ake ngā kēhi rewharewha hoiho kua whakaūngia i te raki o Wales.
text: I kī te Mahi Kararehe o Bodrwnsiwn e rua ngā kāinga hou kua whakamātauria he pai mō te rewharewha hoiho i Gwynedd me Anglesey i muri i te rima o ngā kararehe mai i Bwlchgwyn, tata ki Wrexham i whakaūngia hoki he mate i te mutunga o Pipiri. I kī te mahi e whakapono ana tērā anō tētahi atu take i te takiwā o Dolgellau. I te tīmatanga o te wiki, ka whakakorea e ngā kaiwhakahaere o te Caernarfon Show tana takahanga mutunga wiki i muri i te mataku o te tīmatatanga. I kī tētahi kōrero i runga i Facebook mai i te mahi kararehe: "Kua whiwhi mātou i te puka whakaū i te Animal Health Trust e whakaūngia ana ngā tauira katoa i tukuna mai i ngā wāhi pāngia e rua mō te Rewharewha Equine. " Ko tētahi āhuatanga noa iho i roto i ngā kāinga e rua kua tūhuratia e mātau ko te haere ki te whakaaturanga o Llanrwst i tērā mutunga wiki. "E tohutohu ana mātou kia puritia e ngā rangatira o rātau hoiho ki te kāinga mō tēnei wā kia pai ake rā anō te aromatawai i te whānuitanga o te horahanga huaketo." Na te rewharewha hoiho i whakaweto ai te whakataetae hoiho e ono rā, e 174 ngā whare i whakanohoia ki te raka.

title: E ngana ana a Kenton Cool ki te piki i ngā tihi o Te Pākehā e toru
summary: E ngana ana tētahi maunga o Ingarangi ki te piki i Maunga Everest me ngā tihi pātata e rua i roto i te pikitanga motukore kotahi.
text: Ko ngā tihi o Everest (8,848m), Lhotse (8,516m) me Nuptse (7,861m) e hanga ana i te Cwm ki te Uru, he taiepa toka me te hukapapa he wāhanga o te ara ki Everest. Kua tīmata a Kenton Cool, e noho ana i Gloucestershire, ā, e 10 ngā wā i piki ai i Everest, i roto i tētahi tono kia noho ko ia te tuatahi ki te tono i te tokotoru. I kī a ia ka hiahiatia e ia he "pākete waimarie" hei piki i ngā mea katoa e toru. "Kāore au i te tino mōhio mēnā ka taea te piki i ēnei taniwha e toru i te wā kotahi," tana kī mai i Everest Base Camp. "Engari koia tērā te take tino pai o te katoa ki te whakamātau. " Ko te Western Cwm tētahi o ngā wāhi tino mīharo kua tae atu ahau. "E tūmanako ana ahau ka taea e au te piki i ngā maunga e toru me te kore hoki ki te puni tūāpapa, engari mō tēnā ka hiahiatia e au he pākete waimarie me te puranga huarere pai." E tohu ana ngā hau iti rawa ki Everest mō ngā rā e whā e whai ake nei, e āhei ai a Tēnā Mātao ki te tae ki tētahi o ngā taumata. Kātahi ia ka whakaaro ki te noho i tētahi āpure huarere kino i roto i tētahi puni teitei i mua i tana haerenga ki ngā taumata whakamutunga e rua. "Ki te pai ngā mea katoa, ka wehe atu ahau i te puni pūtake mō te 10 rā," te kī a Tēnā Cool. "He iti, kāore rānei he whakahōutanga mai i a au i taua wā. Ka uaua rawa te pikitanga. Ka arotahi ahau ki nga maunga." I tīmata a Tēnā Cool i tana whakamātau i te Tāite. Kei te mahi a ia me te hoa piki roa o Sherpa Dorje Gylgen, nāna i tiritiri e ono o ana pikitanga 10 o Everest.

title: Ka whiwhi te whakahoutanga o te hōtēra o Coal Exchange i te moni tārewa kaunihera o Kānata e £2m
summary: Ko te whakahoutanga tautohetohe o tētahi whare kua rārangitia hei hōtēra rangatira kua whiwhi pūtea kaunihera.
text: Nā Te Rūnanga o Te Taone, kua whakaaetia e te kaunihera o Te Rongokōrero o Te Taone, he moni whakatārewa - e whakapono ana kia tata ki te £2m - ki ngā rangatira o te Whakawhiti Waro o te taone. Ko te wāhanga tuatahi o te Hōtēra Exchange 173-moenga, i Cardiff Bay, i whakatuwheratia i te tau 2017 i muri i te whakahoutanga £15m. I tohe te MP o Te Tonga o Te Tonga o Stephen Doughty ki te kaunihera kia whakakāhore i te tono mai i te kamupene tautohetohe o Liverpool Signature Living. I whakaarahia e Tēnā Doughty ngā māharahara mo te papamuri pūtea, pakihi hoki o te rangatira o te kamupene, o Lawrence Kenwright. I kī a Tēnā Kenwright i "rekareka" a ia kua whiwhi pūtea mō te "taonga i roto i te karauna" o te taonga tuku iho o Kānata, ā, ko te tūmanako ka oti te mahi i Aperira. I kī te kaunihera ko te moni whakatārewa, e taupoki ana i te hawhe o ngā utu e toe ana hei whakaoti i te mahi i tētahi o ngā whare tino nui o te taone, e herea ana ki "ngā here pākaha" hei tiaki i te pūtea penapena. I hangaia i te tau 1883, ko te Coal Exchange te wāhi i tautuhia ai te utu waro o te ao, ā, i hainatia te haki tuatahi e £1m. I whakatuwheratia te hōtēra boutique me te wāhi mārena i te tau 2017 me ngā rūma moe e 56 me tētahi hōro nui kua whakahoutia. Ko tētahi wāhanga o te whakahoutanga i pūteatia e te pūtea penapena tūmataiti, me ngā kaiwhakangao e hoko ana i ia rūma mō te tekau mano pauna. Kātahi ka rīhitia ngā rūma ki ngā rangatira hōtēra hei utu mō tētahi moni hua ā-tau mō te 8% me te whai wāhi ki te hoko i ngā rūma ki te hōtēra kia whai hua. Heoi anō, i kī ngā kaiwhakangao i ētahi atu hōtēra Waitohu kua puta rātau i "tētahi moepuku" e ngana ana ki te tiki moni mai i te kamupene. I kī a Tēnā Doughty kua whakaarahia e ngā kaiwhakangao i te Whakawhiti Waro ngā amuamu ōrite. "He tino māharahara ōku mō te pātahitanga haere tonu o [te kaunihera] ki a Tēnā Kenwright me te kore ētahi parenga tino nui," tana kī. "Kāore anō ia kia whai i ngā kī taurangi mō te whanaketanga me tōna kaha ki te whakaoti. " Kei roto mātou i te āhuatanga kāore anō kia utua ngā kaiwhakangao, ā, kāore anō kia oti te whare, tae atu ki ētahi atu amuamu e whakaarahia ana e ngā tangata whenua." Kua whakapuakina hoki e ngā kaiwhakahauhau tuku iho te māharahara mō tētahi whare "tino hiranga" ki Weera. "Ko te mea tino nui ko te pare i te whare," te kī a Dr Elaine Davey o te Rōpū Tūmatanui o Kānata. "He tino nui te tikanga o te Whakawhiti Waro nā tōna mahi ki te whakatū i te taone o Wikitōria, ināianei ko te taone nui. " Me whakahonore te Waitohu Ora i a rātau kī taurangi me ā rātou whakaritenga ki te taone me te Whakawhitinga." I hangaia te tono moni tārewa mā te Aronui Moni Taurewa Pokapū Taone o te Kāwanatanga o Welsh, kua whakamahia hei manakē i ngā aronui whakatupu anō i ngā wāhi tūkino. The council said the Welsh Government had agreed in principle, subject to the council's own due diligence and the loan being appropriately secured. Ka tāpiritia e te mahi whakahou anō e 117 ngā rūma moe, ā, ka oti ngā whakatika ki waho o te whare. Ko ngā here mō te moni whakatārewa e whakarite ana ka utua i ngā wāhanga, ā, ka manatokona takitahitia kei te pau te moni ki te Whakawhiti Waro. I kī tētahi tauākī kaunihera: "Me te tiaki, mō te pai, tētahi o ngā whare tino hira i roto i te hītori o Kārepa, mā te whakaoti i te whakawhanaketanga anō e whakarato āwhina nui ki ngā tangata e noho ana i te Whakawhiti Waro, kua pā ki te raruraru me te mahi hanga mō ngā tau e rima kua hipa." I kī a Tēnā Kenwright ka kite ngā kaiwhakangao i te hokinga katoa o ta rātau pūtea penapena ina mutu te mahi. "We're incredibly excited to see the finish line in our project to restore this historic building to its rightful place as a jewel in the crown of Cardiff's heritage," he said. "Ina oti te hanganga, ka whakawāteatia anō e mātou te hōtēra hei hōtēra tauhokohoko kua oti katoa, e taea ai e mātou te pūtea anō, te hoko rānei i te āhuatanga me te hoko i ngā kaihoko takitahi e toe ana, e tuku ana i te whakahoki katoa o te pūtea penapena." Ka taea te whakapā atu ki te tīma Arotahi Rongokōrero o TE Rongokōrero o TE Rongokōrero o TE Aotearoa mā te īmēra: news.focus.team@bbc.co.uk

title: Duxford: Mai i ngā whawhai kurī māia ki ngā whakaaturanga rererangi acrobatic
summary: Ko te wā i mate ai te whawhai kurī o te Pakanga Tuarua o te Ao, ko tētahi o ngā pūrākau e 100 e tiria ana hei tohu i te rau tau o tētahi teihana RAF.
text: I tīmata te mahi i te taunga rererangi o Duxford i te tau 1917 i te Pakanga Tuatahi o te Ao, ā, i te Pakanga Tuarua o te Ao ka rongonui mō ōna hononga o te Pakanga o Ingarangi me te USAF. I muri i te katinga o te RAF i te tau 1961, i mua i te whakatuwheratanga anō hei peka o te Whare Taonga Pakanga o te Emepaea i te tau 1976. I te tau 1918 ka tīmata te mahi a te Royal Flying Corps - i te tau 1917. I honoa te RAF e te Ope Rererangi Ariki o nga Wāhine i te tau 1918. Ināianei kua waihangatia e te kaiwaiata o Nick Ryan te DX17, te tāutanga toi tuatahi o te whare taonga o Cambridgeshire, hei kōrero i te pūrākau o te papa rererangi. I kī te tumuaki o ngā Whare Taonga Pakanga o Te Emepaea, a Diane Lees, ko te "whakairo oro futuristic" e kōrero ana i ngā "pūrākau whaiaro o Duxford's past and present". Kei roto ko tētahi whawhai kurī o te Pakanga Tuarua o te Ao i kitea e WAAF Jean Mills, nāna i mātakitaki i te tūtukitanga o tētahi waka rererangi i tōna rā tuatahi i RAF Duxford i te tau 1941. He kaitirotiro rererangi a ia, nāna i kī i muri iho ko te whawhai kurī te wā i mōhio ai ia ko tana mahi "ehara i te mahi nui, he umanga tino nui". I mua i taua wā ko Duxford tētahi o ngā teihana rererangi whakahaere tuatahi a te RAF i ngā tau kotahi mano e rua tekau mā rua. E hia mano nga kaimātakitaki i haere ki te Rā Rererangi o te Emepaea o te tau 1937 I Aperira 1943, ka tae mai te Rōpū Rererangi 78 o te Ope Taua o Amerika - i rere tēnei rererangi e te āpiha rangatira o te 78 o Col John D Landers i te tau 1945. Ko George "Grumpy" Unwin me tana Alsatian Flash he kaihautū Pakanga o Ingarangi i Duxford. E toru nga wā i whakarākaitia ai te tama a te kaikari mo te toa, ka haere hei Rangatira Parirau, a, i mate i te tau 2006 e 93 tau te pakeke. I muri iho ka whakaarotia a Duxford kāore e tika ana mō te whakatupuranga panuku o ngā waka rererangi o te Pakanga Makariri, ā, kotahi tekau tau i muri i te whakarerenga i te tau 1961, ka mahue te pae. Engari i whai whakamahinga tonu te pūtake. I whakaahuatia te whitiāhua Pakanga o Ingarangi i reira. I pau te wā o ngā kaitapere o Robert Shaw (tuarua mauī) me Christopher Plummer (tuarua matau) i te tākaro ki te kōrero ki ngā kaihautū Kāpene Rōpū o Tā Douglas Bader (mauī) me te Kāpene Rōpū o Pita Townsend (matau) i Me 1968. I te tau 1977, kotahi tau i muri i te whakatuwheratanga o te Whare Taonga Pakanga Emepaea i Duxford, ka tū he whakaaturanga rererangi. Mai i taua wā ka toro mai ētahi tāngata rongonui. I haere mai te Ariki o Cambridge i te tau 2015 ki te kite i tētahi Supermarine Spitfire Mark I N3200 kātahi anō ka whakaoratia. I tēnei rā, e kawe ana ngā whakaaturanga rererangi raumati i ngā mano manuhiri. Ko te tāutanga toi o nāianei e tohu ana i te huritau 100 o te taunga rererangi e kiia ana ko DX17, i tapaina ki te waehere tāutunga o te papa rererangi o te Pakanga Tuarua o te Ao. Ngā pikitia mai i te Whare Taonga Pakanga Emepaea (IWM) me Ngā Atahanga o Te Hoapā.

title: Kāore te Hēkeretari o te Kāwanatanga i 'mārama' i ngā tauira pōti NI
summary: Kua kī te Hēkeretari o te Kāwanatanga i te tuatahi kāore a ia i mārama kāore ngā tāngata i pōti mō ngā rōpū uniana i te wā o te pōti.
text: I kī a Karen Bradley kāore a ia i te mārama ko ngā whakahau e whawhaitia ana i roto i ia wāhanga o te hapori. I kī atu a ia ki te pukapuka o te Whare he "ao tino rerekē i te ao i haere mai ai ahau". I whakatūria a Mrs Bradley i te Hānuere hei whakakapi i a James Brokenshire. I whakararo a Tāne Brokenshire mō ngā take rongoā. "Kāore au i mārama ki ngā mea pēnei i te wā e whawhaitia ana te pōti hei tauira i Aiarangi ki te Raki - kāore ngā tāngata tōpū e pōti mō ngā rōpū uniana me te tuarua," te kī a Mrs Bradley ki te pukapuka o te Whare, he tānga ā-wiki mō ngā Whare Pāremata. "Nā reira, e whawhai ana ngā rōpū mo te pōti i roto i tō rātou ake hapori. " Ko te tikanga, ko nga rōpū kaiwawao e whawhai ana ki a rātau anō i roto i ngā hapori kaiwawao me ngā tāngata tōpū i roto i ngā hapori tāngata," tana tāpiri mai. 'He ao tino rerekē' Kāore he kaiwhakahaere o Aiarangi ki te Raki mai i Hānuere 2017 i muri i tētahi haupae kawa i waenganui i ngā rōpū whakahaere, te DUP me Sinn Féin. I te Rāitema ka pānuitia e Mrs Bradley e hiahia ana a ia ki te tapahi i te utu a ngā mema o te Whakaminenga o Stormont. Kua whakataua hoki e Karen Bradley te karanga i tētahi pōti Whakaminenga hou, ā, me kawe mai e ia he ture whakamua kia āhei ai ngā pononga tūmatanui ki te whakatau whakataunga i te korenga o te whakahaeretanga. Ka hinga te utu MLA i Whiringa ā Rangi mai i te £49,500 ki te £35,888. I roto i tana uiuinga ki te Pukapuka Whare ka kī a ia: "Kāore au i mōhio he pēhea te ātaahua o Aiarangi ki te Raki. I āhua mataku ahau ki Aiarangi ki te Raki nā taku whakaaro me aku whakaahua mai i te 20 tau ki muri. Ehara tēnā i te wāhi i tēnei rā." "E whakaae noa ana ahau i taku tīmatanga i tēnei mahi, kāore au i mārama ki ētahi o ngā take hōhonu, hōhonu hoki kei Aiarangi ki te Raki."

title: Ngā mokatere huamoni: Kua whakautua ō pātai
summary: Kua whakarewaina e te Pēke o Ingarangi ngā mokatere huamoni mai i te 0.5% ki te 0.75% - e waihanga ana i tētahi kawenga tāpiri mō ētahi kairewa, engari he utu mō ētahi kaitiaki.
text: Nā Kevin PeacheyKaipānui pūtea whaiaro i muri i te whakataunga, ka tukuna e ngā kaipānui paetukutuku Rongokōrero o TE Rongokōrero ngā pātai mō te pānga o te pikinga o te mokatere o te Pēke ki a rātou. I konei, kua tīpakohia e mātau e waru hai whakautu. Ka pātai a Steven Redpath: I tēnei mokatere āhea ka tūmanako ngā kaitiaki kia kite i te hokinga mai o ā rātou pūtea penapena i runga ake i te mokatere o te utunga moni? I muri i te pikinga mokatere whakamutunga o Whiringa ā Rangi, kāore i rerekē te hawhe o ngā pūkete penapena. O te hunga i kite i te pikinga, ehara i te 0.25% katoa i ngā wā katoa. Tērā pea ka pono tēnei wā, me ngā pēke me ngā rōpū hanga e tino whiriwhiri ana ko ēhea pūkete me te taumata penapena ka whiwhi i te whakahoki pai ake. Kāore he pūkete penapena uru ngāwari e utu nui ake i te mokatere o te utunga moni, ā, ko ērā e noho ana i runga i ngā tēpu hoko tino pai rawa atu. Mēnā he nui ake te utu i te utunga moni, ka huri ki te pōro tioata. E pātai ana a Dapo: Tērā pea ka piki ake tētahi atu mokatere huamoni i mua i te mutunga o te 2018? Kāore e tino mōhiotia, ā, kāore ngā kaiwhakangao e tūmanako kia piki anō mō te tau kotahi. Ko te pūoro wairua mai i te Pēke o Ingarangi, ka āta piki ake, ka whāiti hoki. Kua mauria tēnei e ngā mākete pūtea ki runga i te papa, ā, kei te tohu i tētahi, e rua pea, he rite tonu te pikinga o te hauwhā o te ira ōrau i mua i te tau 2020. Te āhua nei kāore hoki e hoki te UK ki ngā mokatere huamoni o te 5% me runga ake i ngā wā tata nei. Ka pātai a Alex Day: Ka pā tēnei ki te mokatere huamoni o ngā moni ākonga? Ko ngā utu moni tārewa ākonga (mō ngā moni i muri i te 2012, me ngā moni tārewa paetahi) e ai ki te taumata o te utunga moni, e inetia ana e te RPI, te taupū utu hokohoko. Ka tātaitia tēnei mā te whakamahi i te utunga o te utunga o Poutāpeta, me ngā huringa i te wā o Mahuru. Mō ēnei moni whakatārewa, kāore he hononga hāngai ki te mokatere o te Pēke. Heoi anō, ka whakamahia e te Pēke ngā mokatere huamoni hei pupuri i te utu o te oranga, e inetia ana e te utunga moni, i raro i te mana. Ko te ariā, kāore pea he pikinga huamoni i pana ake ai te utunga moni, ā, tērā pea ka whāngaia ki ngā utu moni tārewa ākonga. Mo nga moni whakatārewa o mua, me tatari tātau kia kite. Ka pātai a Max: E noho ana ahau i te rohe ūropi me te penihana mai i te UK. He aha ngā tohu mō ngā utu whakawhiti pauna/ūropi? He uaua tēnei ki te whakautu, ehara i te iti rawa nā te mea he maha ngā take e pā ana ki te uara o te pauna. He iti noa iho te hinga o Sterling ki te tāra me te ūropi i muri i te pānuitanga a te Pēke i tana whakataunga, ā, i te kōrero a te kāwana o te Pēke, a Mark Carney i tētahi hui pānui i muri iho. Te āhua nei ko te take o tēnei ko te tauhohenga a ngā kaiwhakangao ki ngā kōrero a Tēnā Kānata mō ngā mōrea o tētahi pari pari, ā, ka pōturi noa iho te piki o ngā mokatere ā muri ake nei. "Ka taea te tūmanako kia āta piki ngā utu. Me haere te kaupapahere, kaua e oma, kia tū tonu," tana kī. Ka pātai a Luis: He aha te take mo te whakanui i ngā mokatere huamoni ina pōturi te āhua o te whakahaerenga? E kī ana te Pēke o Ingarangi, tērā tonu tētahi piki ake i roto i te āhua o te whakahaerenga, kua tautokona e te pikinga o te hokohoko o te kāinga. E kī ana te kaiwhakatika pakihi o te HAU, a Haimona Jack, ko te wā o te pikinga e pā ana ki ngā taumata utu. "I muri i te rima tau o te utu e tipu ana i te toharite iti rawa o te 1.75%, kei te haere ngā utu i te toharite o te 2.75%, ā, e tūmanakohia ana kia teitei ake," tana kī. Ka taea e koe te pānui i ētahi atu kōrero mō te take o tēnei take i konei. Ka pātai a Sam Southby: I tēnei wā he mōkete tāku ki te pēke. Ka whakahonoretia e rātau te mokatere 0.5%, ka whakahōutia rānei? I te nuinga o te wā, e kore te whakaaetanga i runga i te tikanga e whakaū i tētahi mokatere, ki te kore e kīia ā-tuhituhi. Andrew Montlake, director at mortgage brokers Coreco, says that usually it is only when an application is made - the point at which sometimes a fee is paid - that a rate is locked in. E kī ana, ki te whakaaro he mokatere pūmau te mahi, tērā pea ka kore pea te kaituku moni e whakatakoto i te utu. E pātai ana a Chwee Ange: Ka pēhea te pānga o te mokatere huamoni ki ngā utu ā-tau penihana? He whakamaumahara: ko te moni ā-tau he moni whakatānga pūmau mō te toenga o tō oranga ka taea te hoko kotahi mā te kōhua penapena penihana. Ko te ohaoha o taua moni whiwhinga e whakawhirinaki ana ki te mokatere ā-tau, ā, ko te nuinga o te wā e pai ake ana ngā hua o te kōura i te wā e piki ana ngā mokatere huamoni. E kī ana a William Burrows, o Better Retirement: "Kua noho ngā utu ā-tau mai i te taupānga EU i te tau 2016, i te wā i tino nui ai te hinga o ngā hua o te kōura. Ko te tikanga kia nui ake te hua o te mokatere o te Pēke, ā, ka nui ake ngā moni ā-tau. "Heoi anō, kaua e pupuri i tō manawa e tatari ana kia piki ake ngā utu ā-tau, nā te mea he tukanga pōturi noa iho." Ka pātai a Mark: Kei runga ahau i tētahi mōkete utu. E rua tau e mau ana te mōkete. Ka pā tēnā ki aku utu ā-marama? Kāore. Kāore tētahi o ēnei mahi mokatere pūmau e kite i te pikinga wawe. Heoi anō, tērā pea ka tae mai ki te whakahōu i taua mōkete, kua iti ake pea te utu o ngā mahi pūmau hōu e tāpaetia ana - te mokatere taurangi taunoa rānei e hoki ana tō mahi ki tō mahi - tērā pea ka nui ake te utu.

title: I whakakorea te kāniwha tiriti o Hato Paora i Bristol
summary: Kua whakakorea te taiwhanga tiriti o St Pauls o Bristol, nā ngā "whakamātautau haere tonu" e anga ana ki ngā kaiwhakahaere.
text: I kī tētahi kaikōrero tērā tētahi takahanga iti i roto i te whare o Mahuru, engari kāore he takahanga tiriti nui. Ko te kāniwha ā-tau, he hākari i te ahurea Afro-Karipiana o te taone, i ngā tau 1960, ā, ko te tikanga ka tū i a Hōngongoi. Ko tētahi o ngā mea nui rawa atu i Uropi, me te tekau mano o ngā tāngata e haere ana i tērā tau. 'He nui ake te utu' i te tīmatanga o tēnei tau i pānuitia kua whakaroatia tae noa ki Mahuru, nā "ngā uauatanga haere tonu". I kī te kaiwhakahaere o te hākari o Cleo Lake "ngā whakamātautau me ngā tūponotanga tē mōhiotia" i whakatau ai ki te whakakore i te taiwhanga tiriti i tēnei tau. I whakakāhore a ia nā te kore moni, engari i kī ia kua "nui te tipu" o te takahanga, ā, "ka nui ake te utu i ia tau" ki te atamira. I kī tētahi kaikōrero kāniwha: "E mihi ana mātou ki ngā tāngata katoa kua tautoko i a mātau i roto i te tata ki te 50 tau o te nohoanga. " We ask for your continued support as we realign the organisation and build towards a carnival event that has participation, engagement, talent development, opportunities and the best arts and culture at its centre." This year's lower-key event will take place at the Malcolm X Centre on 5 September, and will include arts workshops, music, dance and a variety show. E pūteatia ana te kāniwha e te Kaunihera Toi o Ingarangi me te Kaunihera Taone o Bristol.

title: Rārangi rārangi rārangi o ngā kamupene hanganga: 'Te Komiti o te Take Pākehā'
summary: Te āhua nei kei te karo tonu ngā kamupene hanganga nui e whakatū ana i tētahi "rārangi pango nahanaha" o ngā kaimahi ki te karo i te kawenga katoa mō ā rātou mahi, e ai ki tētahi pūrongo a ngā MP.
text: I kī te Komiti o te Take o Pirihitini he "whakawehi" ki te kite i ngā mano o ngā kaimahi i purua ki runga i te rārangi. I tāpiritia he maha ngā take i whakaurua ai ngā tāngata mō te whakaara i ngā māharahara tika mō ngā take hauora me te haumarutanga. I tāruatia te rārangi e te Te Pānga Tohutohu (TCA). I katia te rōpū whakahaere i te tau 2009 i muri i te whakaekenga a te Tari Komihana Mōhiohio. E rapu ana ngā uniana i te utu, e kī ana kua whakakorea te mahi a te hunga i runga i te rārangi rārangi. I kī ngā MP i ētahi o ngā ingoa nui rawa i roto i te hanganga, tae atu ki te maha o ngā whare iti kua whakaurua. I roto i tētahi pūrongo takiwā, ka kī te komiti: "I whakatūria e te rōpū whakahaere ki te waihanga, ki te pupuri me te whakahaere i te rārangi rārangi - The Consulting Association (TCA) - te āhua nei kua whakatūria nuitia e Tā Robert McAlpine Ltd, nāna hoki i whakarato ngā manukura o TCA mō te waru o ōna tau e 16 e mahi ana. " Ko ētahi atu kaiohauru matua ko Skanska me Balfour Beatty." I urupare a Tā Robert McAlpine Ltd, nāna te tumuaki o Cullum McAlpine i mua i te komiti, ki te pūrongo mā te whakakāhore i tētahi rārangi rārangi. I kī ngā MP ahakoa kāore i te mana kore mana te rārangi rārangi i te tuatahi, i ngā wā katoa "kāore e taea te whakawātea", ā, ka whakamahia tonutia e ngā kamupene i muri i te kore mana. I kitea e ngā MP he kamupene i whakatū i tētahi hanganga mā TCA e āhei ai rātou ki te tuku ingoa me ngā mōhiohio mō ngā kaimahi e whakaaro ana rātou kāore e tika ana ki tētahi rārangi matua me te taki i ngā kaimahi tūpono ki taua rārangi. "Ko te arotahi puta noa i runga i te huna, me te urunga waea ki ngā mōhiohio tairongo e rāhuitia ana ki te torutoru noa iho, me ngā rārangi ingoa i tukuna i te mutunga o ia rā mahi, ā, kāore he whakaaetanga kei te tīari tētahi pūnaha pērā," te kī a ngā MP. I kī te komiti, nāna i uru ki te pātengi raraunga kōnae kāri i puritia e TCA, ngā tuhipoka mō ngā tangata i runga i te rārangi rārangi: "Ko te kaupapa he tuari toa me te mema o te TGWU. He kaiwhakararuraru. Mēnā ehara a ia i te mema o te CP (Rōpū Ā iwi) ko tana tāne." 'Organized conspiracy' Labour MP Ian Davidson, who chairs the committee, said: "We are appalled by what we have discovered during our committee hearings. " Ko te Pānga Tohutohu he whakatupu i whakaritea e nga whare hanga nunui, hei whakawātea i nga kaimahi i whakaara i ngā amuamu tika mo te hauora me te haumarutanga me ētahi atu take mahi. "He mahi tēnei mo te whiwhinga moni o ngā kamupene e pā ana, ā, me noho haepapa te hunga whai hua." I tāpiri mai a ia: "Ko ētahi o ngā tāurunga tūturu i runga i te whakapono kaiwawao rārangi pango: ko ngā katinga o ngā kōrero kino mō ngā kaimahi me ō rātou whānau e whakaahua ana hei 'mōhiohio', ngā kōrero ngāwari rānei o te mema uniana tika i whakapuakina me te mea he hinganga whaiaro." Kua tono te komiti ki ētahi atu whakaaturanga i a ia e tomo ana ki te wāhanga panuku o te uiui i mua i te tūtohutanga ki te kāwanatanga. I a ia e urupare ana ki te pūrongo, ka kī a Tā Robert McAlpine Ltd: "I roto i ana whakaaturanga ki te Komiti o te Take o Pirihitini, i whakamāramatia e Tēnā Cullum McAlpine kāore a ia, a Tā Robert McAlpine Ltd anake te kawenga mō te whakatū, te pūtea rānei i te Pānga Kōrero." I tāpiritia: "Kāore anō a Tā Robert McAlpine Ltd kia whakahaere i tētahi 'rārangi pango'. " We are, and have always been, fully committed to keeping good relationships with our workforce and to responsible trade unionism." 'Te ātetetanga pono' I kī tētahi atu umanga i kōrerotia i roto i te pūrongo, a Balfour Beatty, kua whakaae kē ki te whakamahi i te TCA tae noa ki te tau 2009 ki te mahi i ngā taki tohutoro ki ngā kaimahi i roto i te umanga hanganga. Ka kī tētahi kaikōrero: "Kua whakapuakina e mātau to mātau pouri tūturu mo tēnei. Ko te tikanga kia kaua e puta, ā, kua whakapārewa mātou ki ngā kaimahi me ngā whānau tērā pea i pāngia kinotia i roto i ngā tau e tēnei." I kī te kaiwhakaatu kua mahia e te umanga ngā hipanga hei "whakatau i ngā hē" i whakaaturia i roto i ana mahi parenga raraunga, tae atu ki tētahi waehere whanonga matatika kua whakahōutia i whakaurua i te tau 2009. I kī a Skanska i pōhiritia te tānga o te pūrongo takiwā, ā, ka noho māia tonu ki te mahi tahi me te komiti me te whakatau i ngā take i whakaarahia. I roto i tētahi kōrero, ka kī te umanga: "I te whakarongo a te komiti, ka kōrero a Skanska ki ngā wāhi āwangawanga i whakaarahia e ngā mema o te komiti, ā, ka whakapārewa mō ana mahi o mua, e kī ana he 'tino pouri mō tōna whakaurutanga'. " Ko te whakamahinga o ngā rārangi pango e hāngai ana ki ngā uara me ngā whanonga o tā mātou kamupene. "E mōhio ana, e tautoko ana mātou i ngā mana o ngā kaimahi ki te hanga, ki te hono rānei ki ngā whakakotahitanga mahi, ā, ka whai huarahi āwhina mātou ki te hanga pātahitanga pai ki ngā uniana." I tāpiritia: "Ka taea e mātou te whakaū kāore a Skanska i te uru ki tētahi tirotiro whakaruru, rārangi rārangi rānei, ā, kāore i te mōhio ki tēnei e haere tonu ana i roto i te umanga hanganga o UK." I pōhiritia e ngā uniana te pūrongo i ngā 'mahi neke' I kī te hēkeretari ahuwhānui o GMB, a Paul Kenny: "Ko ngā mea e kitea ana e tātau i konei i te mārama o te rā, ko ngā kamupene hanganga nui e pā ana ki ngā mahi nekeneke, kāore i te tika, i te tinihanga, ā, kāore e taea e rātou te whakapōhēhē me te whai kawenga." I kī te uniana Unite kua "tīmata te komiti ki te whakamārama i te taha pouri o te umanga hanga". I tāpiri mai te hēkeretari ahuwhānui o Len McCluskey: "E whakapono ana te Unite ki te haere tonu te rārangihita, ā, ko te huarahi anake ki te haepapa i tēnei mahi tūturu ko te whakakaha i ngā ture ki te rārangi rārangi hei hoatu i ngā niho tūturu ki te ture." I kī te Hēkeretari Pakihi Kōruru o Chuka Umunna MP i te pūrongo "e tāraro ana i te hiahia mō tētahi tūhuratanga katoa, kia titiro anō te kāwanatanga ki ngā whakaaetanga, ā, mēnā ka taea te whakamau i te ture hei ārai i te tāruatanga o tēnei heitara". I kōrero te Hēkeretari Pakihi a Vince Cable: "Ka āta titiro mātou ki ngā tūtohutanga whakamutunga a te komiti ina whakaputaina ēnei, ā, mēnā he whakaaturanga hōu kei te haere tonu te rārangi rārangi i tēnei rā, ka inoi atu ahau ki ngā mana tika kia mahi i tētahi tūhuratanga katoa, hōhonu hoki." I kī tētahi kaikōrero kāwanatanga o Pirihitini: "E tino ātete ana mātau ki te rārangi rārangi. Kāore mātou i te mōhio ki ētahi whakaaturanga e huatau ana kua whakamahia te rārangi rārangi e pā ana ki ngā kirimana i whakawhiwhia e te kāwanatanga o Pākehā, e ōna umanga rānei. "E tūmanako ana mātou ko ngā kamupene e whakawhiwhia ana ki ngā kirimana tūmatanui kia mau tonu ngā paerewa tiketike o te pakihi me te whanonga ngaio." I tāpiritia e ia ka whakaarohia e rātau te pūrongo me te mahi tahi me ngā whakakotahitanga mō ngā tukanga tiki ā muri ake me ngā kirimana tūmatanui.

title: I tāhaetia ngā tāhae i Newport
summary: Tekau mā rua ngā kurī kua tāhaetia i o rātau kāinga i roto i te toru rā.
text: E toru nga spaniels springer me te jack russell i tangohia mai i tētahi wharau i Markham i te pō o te Rātapu, ka kī nga Pirihimana o Gwent. E rua atu spaniels i tāhaetia i tētahi wharau i Pwll Y Pant i Caerphilly i ngā haora tōmua o te Tūrei. A, e ono anō ngā spaniels springer i tāhaetia i ngā kennels i Broad Street Common i Newport i te ata Tūrei. I kī tētahi kōrero pirihimana: "E whakapono ana i ūkuia tauwhāititia ngā spaniels." Kua whakatūpato te tōpana i ngā rangatira kurī kia tūpato i muri i ngā tāhaetanga, kia "mahi i ētahi atu tikanga haumarutanga hei whakaū i te haumarutanga" o a rātau kararehe. "Ki te puritia e koe ki waho, me mātua whakarite kei te haumaru ō rawa me ō kennel," te tāpiri mai a te ope.

title: Te huaketo rorohiko e tāhaehae ana i a koe
summary: Ko te pūmanawakino te momo pūmanawa kino rorohiko tino tere e tipu ana, e whakatūpato ana ngā tohunga.
text: Nā Zoe Kleinman Kaipānui Hangarau, BBC News He huaketo kino tērā e maukati ana i te kaiwhakamahi ki waho o tā rātou rorohiko me te tono utu hei whakahoki i ā rātou kōnae. E kī ana tētahi pūrongo i whakaputaina e te kāwanatanga o Ahitereiria e 72% o ngā umanga i uiuia i pā ki ngā mahi pūmanawakino i te tau 2015. I te tau 2013 he 17% noa iho te whika. He tuma nui hoki tēnei mō ngā pūrere pūkoro i te mea ka taea te huna i roto i tētahi taupānga, e kī ana a Gert-Jan Schenk, te tuakana perehitini i te kamupene haumarutanga ipurangi Lookout. "Mō te nuinga o te wā, kua kite mātou i te pūmanawakino i tukuna mā ngā tikiake puku - e whakatakune ana he taupānga kaingākautia, e whakanui ana i ngā wā ka pāwhiri koe," tana whakamārama. "Hei karo i ēnei tuma, me tino tūpato ngā kaiwhakamahi ki ngā taupānga ka tāutatia e rātou, me te wāhi i haere mai ai rātou - pānuitia ngā arotakenga i Google Play, me te karo i te utanga taha mai i ngā pūtake kāore i te whirinaki." He pēhea te mahi? Pēnei i te nuinga o ngā huaketo rorohiko, ka tae mai te pūmanawakino ki te āhua o tētahi īmēra hītinihanga, spam, whakahōutanga pūmanawa kōrero rānei - ā, ka pāwhiri te kaiwhiwhi i tētahi hononga, ka whakatuwhera rānei i tētahi āpitihanga. Kātahi ka tīmata te huaketo ki te mahi whakamuna i ngā kōnae a te kaiwhakamahi. Ina maukati tika te rorohiko, ka tonoa he utu - i te nuinga o te wā i roto i ngā bitcoins nā te mea he iti iho te ngāwari ki te whakataki - mō te hokinga mai o ngā kōnae. Ko te utu ko te nuinga o te wā kotahi, e rua rānei ngā bitcoins - e ōrite ana ki te $500 (£330). He iti iho te pūnoa ināianei, engari i ngā rā tōmua o te pūmanawa kino - tata ki te rima tau ki muri - ka taea e te tuhipoka utu te āhua o tētahi pānui whakahau ture. I tonoa te kaiwhakamahi ki tētahi whārangi tukutuku e āhua nei nō te WHW, hei tauira, e kī hē ana kua kitea ngā atahanga ture o ngā tamariki i runga i te mīhini, ā, ka utua he whaina. I te nuinga o te wā, he tepe wā hei whakaū, i muri iho ka nui ake te utu. He huarahi anō hei huri noa? I ētahi wā he tuma noa iho, engari ko te nuinga o te huaketo e tino whakamuna ana i ngā kōnae. Ko te huarahi anake ki te tiki i ō kōnae me te kore utu utu ko te haere ki tētahi putanga pūrua. Kātahi anō ka āwhina a Neil Douglas, mai i te kamupene IT o Edinburgh Network Roi, i tētahi kiritaki pakihi iti i pā ki tōna tūmau e te pūmanawakino. "I whakaora mātou i ngā mea katoa mai i te pūrua. E rua meneti i mua i te whakapokenga, nā reira kāore i pai ake te wā - engari i hua mai he iti noa iho te wā," tana kī. "Ka mōrearea pea koe ki te utu i a rātou - engari he āhua rite ki te utu i te kaitākaro. Ka tūtohu anake mātou hei parepare whakamutunga. "Kāore koe i te mōhio mēnā ka hoki mai rātou mō ētahi atu mea, kāore koe i te mōhio ka ūkuia e rātou te mate." E kī ana te tohunga haumarutanga o Prof Alan Woodward mā te utu ka mōrearea hoki koe ki ētahi atu mahi ā-ipurangi. "Ina utu koe, ka eke koe ki runga i te rārangi ngote, ā, tērā pea ka whakapā atu anō koe," tana kī. "He hua iti tēnei mō te hunga hara." He tokomaha ngā tāngata e utu ana? Ahakoa ko ngā tohutohu tohunga katoa, ehara i te utu, he tokomaha ngā tāngata e mahi ana - ahakoa ko ērā e kore e tūmanakohia e koe. I whakaae ngā Pirihimana o Tewksbury, i te US, kua utua e rātau i te wā i whakaekea, i maukatia hoki to rātau tūmau matua i te mutunga o tērā tau. "Kaore he tangata e hiahia ana ki te whakarite ki nga kaiwhakataetae. Kaore tētahi tangata e hiahia ana ki te utu i nga kaiwhakataetae," te kī a te Rangatira Pirihimana o Timoti Sheehan ki te pepa paetata o te taone. "I mahia e mātau ngā mea katoa e taea ana e mātau. " He wheako whakatuwhera whatu, ka taea e au te kōrero ki a koe i tēnei wā. Nāna koe i whakaaro kua ngaro i a koe te mana o ngā mea katoa. "Ko te utu i te utu bitcoin te parepare whakamutunga." He whai hua te pūmanawakino mō te hunga hara nā te mea he tokomaha rawa ngā tūpāpaku e utu ana, kaua e anga atu ki te whakamā o ngā whakapae teka - pēnei rānei i te tari pirihimana, e tino hiahia ana rātou ki ā rātou kōnae. "Kua tatūria e ētahi kamupene ngā pūkete bitcoin ki te pā ki a rātou," te kī a Prof Woodward. "E tūtohu ana ahau kia kaua tētahi tangata e utu. " Ko te huarahi anake ki te mahi ko te whakarite kei a koe he kaitaki huaketo me te pūrua." Ko wai kei muri? "He hara whakaritea," te kī a Prof Woodward. "E mahi ana rātau i ngā miriona. He ohorere... ka whakamātauria e rātau ki te katoa. Ka puritia e koe ngā rōpū tuatoru - kāore te pēke i te whakauru." Nā te rangahau o nā tata nei e Palo Alto Networks me ngā hoa mahi i huatau tētahi whānau pūmanawakino e mōhiotia ana ko Crypto Wall mō te $325m (£215m) mō te rōpū i muri i a ia. "I roto i te mokowā rōrahi cybercrime, ko te pūmanawakino tētahi o ngā raruraru tino whai hua e anga atu ana ki a tātau," te kī a Greg Day, te āpiha haumarutanga matua mō Uropi i Palo Alto Networks, ki te AO i tērā marama. "Kei te tae te tāhae kāri nama ki te wāhi e tino iti ana te uara o ia kāri. Ko te hua, kua uru atu te pūmanawakino ki roto i taua āputa, ā, ka nui ake te uara mō ia tūkinotanga."

title: Taki Rangirua: He pēhea te tika o te taupānga EU tuarua?
summary: Tērā tētahi mea e mōhiotia ana: I te 23 o Pipiri ka whakatau ngā kaipōti i te UK mēnā ka noho tonu ki te Uniana o Ūropi, ka wehe rānei.
text: Nā Ben WrightPolitical correspondent, BBC News Koia tērā te kōwhiringa taupānga. Engari, ki te hora i te kīanga rongonui a te hēkeretari waea o Amerika o Donald Rumsfeld mō ngā whakaaturanga ngaro mō ngā rākau whakangaromanga maha a Iraki, e mōhiotia ana: Mēnā ka pōti a Ingarangi ki te wehe i te EU he aha ngā ture putanga ka whiwhi a Ingarangi? Ka pēhea te urupare a ngā kaiārahi EU? E inoi ana rātau kia noho a Ingarangi, kia tukuna he whakaritenga hou, ā, ka tūmanako kia noho ngā pōti UK i roto i tētahi taupānga tuarua? Koia tērā te tauari e hiahia ana ngā kaiwhakahauhau waiho ki te peita. Ko ngā kaipōti āmaimai, ko Mikaera Hauati te mea hou rawa - me te tino taumaha tōrangapū - "waiho" ki te tono i tētahi mahi tuarua me te taupānga. I kī a Tēnā Hauati kāore he pōti e "rūrū i ngā kaiārahi EU i to rātau ngākau mārire". I roto i te mauri pōkākā e whai ana i te pōti kia haere, ka haere tana tautohetohe, me tino pai ake ngā kaiārahi EU i roto i to rātau hiahia ki te pupuri i te UK i roto i te karapu. Heoi anō, kua pau i nga kaiārahi o Ūropi ngā marama whakamutunga e kī ana i te wehi o tētahi o ōna rangatiratanga tino rangatira, nui rawa hoki ki te tirotiro. Ko te kōrero i ngā wā o tētahi taupānga tuarua he tikanga matua o ngā whakahau waiho mō ngā marama. I te Hānuere ka kī atu te kaiwhakahaere o Vote Leave, a Dominic Cummings, ki te pukapuka Economist kāore e hiahiatia e te UK te whakaoho i te Tuhipānui 50 o te Tiriti Lisbon i muri tonu i te pōti wehenga (te tukanga e tīmata ana i te putanga o tētahi kāwanatanga mema e rua tau mai i te EU) me ngā whakaritenga whakamutunga o Te Kāwanatanga ka taea te hoatu ki ngā kaipōti i roto i tētahi taupānga tuarua. He mārama te tikanga o te kōrero i tētahi taupānga tuarua: Whakaū i ngā kaipōti āmaimai he pōhatu hīkoi te taupānga, ehara i te pekenga ki te mea tē mōhiotia. Nā reira, he tika tēnei? 'Kāore he wā tuarua' Me titiro tātou ki ngā kōrero a ngā tāngata i Pōroa. Hei tīmatanga, kua kī a David Cameron ko te ariā kia mahi anō i tēnei katoa "mō ngā manu". Kua kī te kāwanatanga o UK ko te tikanga o te pōti Waiho ko te haere ki Pōroa me te whakatara i te Tuhipānui 50 ināianei tonu. Me hoki tātou ki te pepa pōti. Kaore he mea e hoatu ana ki te pirimia he tono kia ngana ki te whakarite anō. Ahakoa i ngana a ia ki te mahi i tēnā, me whakaae ērā atu kaiārahi EU e 27 ki te tīmata anō i ngā whakaritenga anō ki Ingarangi. Ināianei ehara tēnā i te mea e kore e taea. Engari mai i ngā kōrero a ngā pūpāpāho EU matua mai i te wā i oti ai te whakaritenga anō, te āhua nei he tino kore pea. Hei tauira, i tērā wiki ka kī te Pirimia o Peretiama, a Charles Michel, "kāore he wā tuarua" mo tēnei. I ngā rā i muri iho, i roto i tētahi taupatupatu Pāremata o Ūropi e kōrerorero ana i te whakaaetanga UK, ka tūtira ngā kaipōrangapū ki te tuku i taua karere ōrite. Ka whakahaere anō te taupānga i te Perehitini o te Kaunihera o Ūropi a Donald Tusk mēnā ka pōti te nuinga o Ingarangi ki te haere, "koia tērā ka puta". I tātakina e Manfred Weber MEP, te kaiārahi o te rōpū nui rawa i te Pāremata (te EPP waenganui-matau): "Mēnā kei te kīia ngā tāngata i Te Hononga o Ingarangi ki te kī kāo rātau ka whiwhi i tētahi mahi pai ake, me tino mārama tātau ki a rātau ko te whakaaetanga i runga i te tēpu ko te whakaaetanga. Kaore he whakaritenga whai ake." He ōrite te kōrero a te kaiārahi rōpū Liberal, a Guy Verhostadt: "Kaua e whakaaro i muri i te pōti kāo ka taea e koe te hoki mai ki te tēpu whakaritenga," tana kī. " Kei roto, kei waho rānei. Ko tētahi, ko tētahi rānei." He whakaritenga anō tuarua? "Kāore, nein, nee" te karere mai i Pōroa. A, ko te take i whakaaetia e ngā kaiārahi EU i tērā wiki e kī mārama ana koia tēnei. "E mōhiotia ana, me puta te hua o te taupānga i Te Hononga o Ingarangi ki te wehe atu i te Uniana o Ūropi, ka mutu te tīariari o ngā whakaritenga e pā ana ki te kōwae 2 i runga ake nei," ka pānuitia te kuputuhi. Engari tatari mō tētahi meneti - me pēhea ērā taupānga Pākehā katoa e whakahaere anō ana kia whiwhi ai i tētahi hua rerekē? I muri i te whakakāhoretanga o te Tiriti o Maastrist e nga kaipōti i Tenemaka, ka mahia he rōpu mana whakahaere, ka puritia he pōti tuarua, a, ka puta te Tiriti. Ko te whakawāwātanga tuatahi a Airangi i te Tiriti Lisbon i whaia hoki e tētahi taupānga tuarua me tētahi hua rerekē. Heoi anō, ko ēnei taupānga i runga i te huringa tiriti EU taketake. Nā te mea e hiahiatia ana e te EU te whakaaetanga auau kia hurihia tana ture tuatahi, ka tūponotia ēnei whakakāhoretanga i te mīhini EU katoa, ā, me kitea he whakatika. He rerekē te āhuatanga o UK ināianei. He tukanga tēnei i kōwhiria e te kāwanatanga o Ingarangi kia tīmata. Mā te putanga o UK e tino mamae i te EU, engari e kore e aukati i te neke whakamua o te kaupapa. Tērā anō tētahi āwangawanga tūturu i Pōroa tērā pea ka pāngia ētahi atu mahinga motuhake mō te UK, he rama kākāriki ki ētahi atu kāwanatanga mema kia whakamātau i taua mea. Ko te tikanga, ina mōhiotia anake te hua ka tino mārama tētahi o tēnei. Mēnā he pōti ki te wehe i te EU, ka huri pea te hinengaro i te pono o te raruraru tōrangapū e whai ake nei i Pōroa. Engari mō tēnei wā, ko te huatau ka whakaaetia te UK kia hoki ki te tēpu whakarite, kei te tūtakina i konei i Pōroa me te whakahāwea. PĀNUI ANŌ: Ko te pono i muri i ngā kerēme i roto i ngā taupatupatu EU

title: Ko Sherman Cymru facelift he £800,000 i runga i te tahua
summary: I tonoa tētahi whare tapere o Kānata kia whakamāramatia e te Kaunihera Toi o Uēra he aha i kore ai he kaupapa hei rutu i te whakapau moni e £800,000, kua puta.
text: Nā Huw ThomasBBC Wales arts and media correspondent Concerns about Sherman Cymru's ability to pay for a £5.4m re-development were raised after it reopened last year. Last week it received a £500,000 donation to attract a wider range of audiences and in 2012 it was borrowed £500,000 towards the redevelopment. I kī te whare tapere kua pai ake ngā pūtea, ā, kua pā ki ngā take utu. I pā ki a Sherman Cymru i Kānata tētahi kaupapa hanga anō nui, e rua tau te roa ki te whakaoti, ā, i whakaritea kia utu i te £5.4m. Ko te nuinga o te utu i hipokina e te Kaunihera Toi o Wales (ACW), nāna i āwhina te £3.9m o ngā moni tūmatanui, ka waiho a Sherman Cymru ki te kohi i te moni tārewa. Engari kua mōhio a BBC Wales kua haere te kaupapa ki te £800,000 i runga i te pūtea. Waihoki, i ngā marama i muri mai i te whakatuwheratanga anō, ka tuhituhi a ACW ki te kaiwhakahaere o Sherman Cymru, a Chris Ricketts, e kī ana he "tino māharahara" kāore he kaupapa hei mahi i ōna hē pūtea. I kī te reta whai tikanga kua tonoa e Sherman Cymru te utu tōmua o tana pūtea moni mai i ACW i ngā wā e rua, ko te tikanga i te koata tuatahi o te tau ā-pūtea 2012/2013, kua whiwhi kē i te 39% o tana pūtea ā-tau katoa. I whakamāramatia e te reta he pēhea te tatau hē a Sherman Cymru i ngā utu ki ngā kaituku moni i roto i tana mahere moni taketake, me tētahi putanga kua whakahōutia e whakaatu ana i te pikinga £200,000 (31%) i roto i ēnei utunga i whakaritea ki ōna whakatau tata taketake. I roto i tana pūrongo arotakenga ā-tau ki a Sherman Cymru mō te 2011/2012, ka kī a ACW ko te "manahau pūtea o te mahere pakihi a [Sherman Cymru] e noho nui ana i runga i te ūnga hoko tīkiti 60,000". Engari kua mōhio a TE WHK Wales he iti iho i te 40,000 ngā tīkiti i hokona i roto i ngā marama e 12 ki Aperira 2013. E kī ana a Sherman Cymru rāua ko ACW kua pai ake te āhuatanga pūtea o te whare tapere mai i te wā i whakaarahia aua māharahara. I tāpiritia e rātau ko te āhua o te āhua o te ohaoha me te āhua matapae o te mahi whare nui i āwhina ki ngā raruraru rere moni a Sherman. I hoatu he moni whakatārewa ki te whare tapere e te Pēke Aroha mō te £500,000 i te tau 2012 hei āwhina ki te utu o te whakawhanaketanga anō. 'I tino whakakinotia' I tērā wiki i hoatu he koha £500,000 e te Paul Hamlyn Foundation hei kawe mai i te whānuitanga o te hunga whakarongo. I kī a Tēnā Ricketts: "He aroha takitahi mātau. Kāore he tangata e tū ana i muri i a mātau e āhei ana ki te whakangāwari i te rere moni ina hiahia whakaiti te moni. "So we've dealt with cash flow issues over the past year, we've dealt with cost control issues. " I think we've learned over the last year that it's going to take a longer period of time to get some of our previous audience back into the building. "Engari kei te puta tēnā ināianei, nā reira kei te hanga mātou i taua pātengi raraunga o ngā manuhiri ki te whare." E whakaatu ana ngā pūkete a Sherman Cymru mō te tau 2012 e nama ana ki te £1.3m ki ōna kaituku moni. I kī rātau "kua tino whakakinotia te tūnga moni a te kamupene e te utu o te kaupapa pūmatua". Ka kī tonu "he take tāhapa tonu te rere moni hei whakahaere mā te kamupene ki ngā tau e heke mai nei". I whakaarahia e ACW ngā māharahara mō te āhuatanga rerenga moni a Sherman Cymru i tērā tau, e ai ki ngā meneti o ana hui. I kī atu te rangatira nui o ACW, a Nick Capaldi, ki a WHK Wales: "Me ngā kaupapa pūmatua katoa he tukanga tauwhiti i waenganui i a mātau me te rōpū whakahaere, nā reira i te wā o tētahi kaupapa ka rerekē ngā mea, ā, ka whakawhanake." "Ki taku whakaaro he uaua tonu ina katia koe mō tētahi wā kia mōhio ai koe ki te tere me te tere e hoki mai ai te hunga whakarongo, ā, he uaua ka anga atu ki ngā kaupapa katoa o tēnei momo. " Me maumahara hoki kua anga atu tātau ki tēnei wā o te whakawhāititanga o te ohaoha, ā, e whakaaro ana ahau kua tāpiritia he pēhanga tāpiri." 'E hiahia ana ki te tūhura' i kī te Minita Ahurea a John Griffiths AM i whakapono hoki ia kua pai ake te āhuatanga pūtea o te Sherman. Mr Griffiths said: "I think these matters are back on track now and I think that's very important for the local arts scene." Kua pānuitia e Tēnā Ricketts tōna whakaaro kia tū hei tumuaki o Sherman Cymru i te raumati, kia whai ai i ētahi atu painga i te wāhanga toi. I kī atu a ia ki a WHK Wales kei te mahue te Sherman i roto i tētahi tūnga pūtea pai ake. "Kei te mōhio ahau kua puta i a mātau ētahi āwhā, ā, kei te haere mātou ki te wā heke mai me tērā i muri i a mātau ināianei, ā, me te tino hiahia ki te tūhura he aha te wā heke," tana kī.

title: Ka tuki te tau tuatahi o Adele Someone Like You
summary: Ko Adele, ko tana waiata Someone Like You te tau tuatahi, me ngā mahi tae atu ki te Mahere B me Tinie Tempah kua hākinakina ki tētahi āwhina o Brits i te tūtohi o tēnei wiki.
text: Ko tētahi Tangata Pēnei i a Koe, i waiatatia e Adele i ngā Brits o te Tūrei, e 46 ngā wāhi i te wā i piki ake te pukaemi toa a Mumford and Sons Sigh No More mai i te 15 ki te rua. I piki te kōpae-Overy e te toa o Tinie Tempah i te 19 ki te tau ono. A, ko te pukaemi a te kaiwaiata takitahi o Ingarangi tino pai rawa atu o Mahere B, The Defamation of Strickland Banks, i peke mai i te 24 ki te whitu. E mau ana te 21 o Adele ki te tūnga pukaemi tau tuatahi i tana kohinga tīmata, 19, e rua ngā wāhi ki te tau whā. Kei a ia hoki te tau whā takitahi, Rolling in the Deep. I kī te Kamupene Tūtohi Whaimana ko ia te rehetoi ora tuatahi i whiwhi i ngā tūtohi e rima o runga i ngā tūtohi takitahi me ngā pukaemi o UK mai i te The Beatles. I te Hānuere 1964, ko ngā takitahi o te pēne I Want To Hold Your Hand and She Loves You i te tau rua me te rima i te wā kotahi me te rua ngā pukaemi With The Beatles and Please Please Me i te kotahi. Ināianei, e rima o ngā takitahi e 40 o runga, ko te tiketike rawa ko tana ngātahitanga ki a JLS, Eyes Wide Shut, i te tau waru. I roto hoki i te tūtohi takitahi, he tāurunga hōu i te 14 mō te Nekehanga o te Rāwhiti Tawhiti e whakaatu ana i a Ryan Tedder, me Rocketeer, i te 21, You Me at Six e whakaatu ana i a Chiddy Bang i tāuru i te tūtohi me Rescue Me. I patua hoki e te maka o E4's Glee te tūtohi i te 36 me te Teenage Dream me te tau 39 me tā rātou Start Me Up/Livin' on a Prayer "mash-up". Tērā ētahi tāurunga hou i roto i te tūtohi pukaemi mō PJ Harvey's Let England Shake, i te tau waru, me te Hardcore Will Never Die But You Will, i te 25.

title: Te solstice o te hōtoke: Ko Pareārau rāua ko Pareārau 'hanumi' i roto i te takahanga tiretiera āhua kore nei
summary: Ka tiaho mārama tētahi takahanga tiretiera i te rangi i te ahiahi o te Mane - e whakaae ana te huarere.
text: Nā Barra BestBBC News NI Weather Presenter Ka puta mai o tātau aorangi nui rawa e rua - Pareārau me Pareheke - ki te hanumi i roto i te mea e kiia nei he hononga i runga i tēnei, te solstice o te hōtoke. Koinei te tino tata o nga aorangi mai i te tau 1623. Engari i taua wā i tino tata rātau ki te rā, he tino uaua te kite i te hononga. "Me hoki tātau ki te 1226 mō tētahi wā i tata atu ai rātau i tēnei, ā, e kitea ana mai i Airangi," e ai ki te Pānga Arorangi o Airani (IAA). Mēnā he waimarie koe ki te whai rangi mārama, ka taea e koe te kite i te takahanga ki te whatu tahanga i te 17:00 GMT. "Mēnā he pai ō karurua ka taea pea e koe te kite i ētahi o ngā marama kanapa nui e whā o Pareārau," te tāpiri mai a te pāhonotanga. "Mā te karu whakaata ka taea e koe te kite i a Titan, te marama nui rawa o Parehe." E ai ki a Astronomy Ireland, he mea nui te kimi i tētahi wāhi kāore i te mārama rawa, ā, he mārama te tirohanga o te pae. "I muri noa iho i te tōnga o te rā, ka tīmata te titiro ki te tonga-māuru, ki te wāhi kātahi anō ka tō te rā," te tohutohu a David Moore mai i Astronomy Ireland. "Kāore tonu ngā aorangi e rua e tīaho ake, engari ko ngā aorangi e rua e haere tahi ana ka āhua mārama ake i te rangi." Ka tata anō a Pareārau me Pareārau ki tēnei i te tau 2080, engari e ai ki te IAA ka "tino uaua ki te kite i a rāua e pāpaku ana i te pōuritanga o te ata". Hei tērā wā ka whiwhi tātau i tētahi atu wā pēnei i te 24 o Aotearoa 2414. Kia kite i a koe!

title: Mārena tāne: E hiahia ana ngā pīhopa o te Hāhi i Uēra ki te waihotanga
summary: Kua whakatūpato te Hāhi i Weera, me pā hoki ki a ia ngā waihotanga e āhei ai te Hāhi o Ingarangi kia kaua e whakahaere i ngā mārena tāne.
text: E kōrero ana te kāwanatanga o UK mēnā ka hurihia te ture kia āhei ai ngā mārena ōrite ki te mārena i te tau 2015. I whakatūpato te Hāhi o Ingarangi e kore pea e ora i tētahi wero ā-ture ngā tautohe a te kāwanatanga kia whakawāteatia ngā rōpū whakapono i te huringa. E kī ana ngā pīhopa i Uēra kei roto rātau i tētahi tūnga ture "tata ōrite". 'He mōrearea nui' I roto i ta rātau urupare, ka kī nga pīhopa o te Hāhi i Uēra e māharahara ana rātau kāore te tuhinga whakaaro o te Tari Kāinga mo te mārena tāne e pā ana ki a rātau. Engari i kī rātau he rite tonu o rātau māharahara ki ērā i Ingarangi, ā, me whakauru motuhake a Uēra ki ngā whakaritenga mō te Hāhi o Ingarangi i raro i te ture kua marohitia. I kī nga pīhopa o Welsh he nui ngā ture o nāianei e pā ana ki ngā hoa mahi tūmatanui mō ngā mārena tāne, ā, kāore e tāpiri atu ki ēnei, engari ka mōrearea ngā mōrearea o te mōrearea me te taupatupatu. "Kāore i te mārama he aha ngā āhuatanga e rerekē ai te mārena o te tangata kotahi i ngā whakaritenga tīariari mō ngā hoa mahi ā iwi," ka kī rātau. "Te āhua nei he ōrite kē rātau, i roto i ngā mana me ngā kawenga i whakawhiwhia ki ngā rōpū; me ngā rerekētanga iti noa iho i roto i ngā tikanga rēhitatanga, i ngā take rānei mō te memeha i te pātahitanga. "Kāore hoki i te mārama he aha te take o te pupuri i te kāwai o te mahi ā-iwi i te taha o te mārena tangata kotahi, engari i te mea kāore i te tonoa kia whakaaetia ngā mārena wahine wahine kia uru ki tētahi mahi ā iwi. " I roto i te horopaki o te ōritetanga o te āheitanga ki ngā pātahitanga kua rēhitatia, te āhua nei ka waihanga tēnei i tētahi ōritetanga hōu." I whakaurua ngā hoa mahi tūmatanui i te tau 2005 kia ōrite ai ngā mana ā-ture ki ngā mārena mārena, engari kāore e whakaaetia e te ture kia kīia aua whakakotahitanga hei mārenatanga. Kua whakakāhoretia e te kāwanatanga o UK te whakapae a te Hāhi o Ingarangi ko te mahi whakaritenga, e kati ana i te Rāitema, he "hē, ā-ariā, ā-ture". I whakaūngia e te kaihautū a te pirimia e hiahia tonu ana te kāwanatanga ki te whakawa i te mārena tāne i te mutunga o tēnei pāremata, ā, kua whiwhi tohutohu ā-ture mō te tūponotanga o tētahi wero ki te kōti o Ūropi i mua i te tānga i ngā marohi. I kī a Andrew White, ko te tumuaki o te rōpū motika tāne o Stonewall Cymru, e tūmanako ana ia ka whakaarohia anō e te Hāhi i Uēra tōna āhuatanga, engari i kitea e kore ngā tono e whakahau i ngā minita ki te whakahaere i ngā mārena tangata kotahi. "He take nui tēnei o te wāteatanga whakapono kia wātea tētahi hāhi ki te whakapeka ki te whakanui i ngā hoa mahi tangata kotahi," tana kī. "I tua atu, ko te tikanga kia kaua te hāhi e āhei ki te ārai i ētahi atu rōpū, i te kāwanatanga rānei kia kaua e mōhio ki a rātou. " E whakawhirinaki ana mātou ka whakarongo te Hāhi i Uēra ki te mārena tangata kotahi, ā, kia mōhio mātou ki ngā kōrero a te Pīhopa Pīhopa o Uēra e hua ana kia pōhiritia ake e tana Hāhi ngā mārena tāne. "Ko te urupare a te hāhi e whakamārama ana ko te noho i roto i te whanaungatanga o te wahine kotahi i tēnei wā e aukati ana i ngā tāngata i te rōpū mārena. " E tino hari ana mātou kei te rapu te kāwanatanga ki te whakatau i tēnei tino tika mā te whakaroanga o te mārena tūmatanui ki ngā mārena ōrite."

title: Coronavirus: Te inoi hauora hinengaro a te tuakana e pouri ana
summary: Kua tono te tuakana o tētahi taitama taitamariki i mate i a ia anō kia rapu āwhina te tangata mehemea kei te raruraru rātau i ngā pānga ā-hinengaro o te raka.
