text: I kitea te tuakana o Pirihi Mackell, 17 tau, a Mātiu kua mate i Dunorlan Park i Tunbridge Wells i te 7 o Me. I kī a Tēnā Mackell i māharahara te tauira A-Level ka pāngia ōna kōeke e te katinga o tana kura. Ka karanga a ia ki "te tangata e rongo ana i tētahi momo pouri, ā, kei te mahi i tētahi mea" kia kōrero. I kī a ia i mataku tōna tuakana ki tōna wā heke, "tērā pea nā te raka, i reira, e mārama ana kāore ia i te mahi i ana mahi ki te kounga ōrite, tērā pea, i whakaaro rānei ia kāore ia i roto i te whakaaro tika ki te mahi i te kāinga me te kura. " E mārama ana kāore a ia i kite i tētahi huarahi ki waho." I kī a Ben West, nāna i whakatū he whakahau hauora hinengaro i muri i te matenga o tōna tuakana 15 tau, a Sam, kia kaua e whakahāweatia ngā pānga wehe o te raka ki te rangatahi. "Kāore rawa au i te pōhēhē i roto i tōku hinengaro kei te raruraru kē atu ngā tāngata e raruraru kē ana nā te raka," tana kī. "Ko ngā tāngata e whakawhirinaki ana ki ngā tāngata i roto i ō rātou oranga, pēnei i ngā hoa e hari ana i a rātou, kia kaua e whakaaetia kia kite i a rātou, kia kore ai e tūhono pāpori, ka tino pā ki te hauora hinengaro o te tangata." Kua karangatia e ngā tohunga hinengaro me ngā hinengaro hinengaro he rangahau kōhukihuki ki te pānga "hōhonu" o te taiepa coronavirus ki te hauora hinengaro o te tangata. Mēnā kua pāngia koe e ngā take i whakaarahia i tēnei tuhinga, e wātea ana te āwhina mai i te Raina Hohenga o TE HAU.

title: Ko ngā hunga whakaruru i te 'nui ake o te mōrearea' i te huarere tino nui
summary: Ko te hunga whakaruru me ngā tāngata i rewa i roto i ngā whenua nā te papā, ka nui haere te mōrearea ki ngā pānga o te rangi tino nui, e kī ana ngā tohunga.
text: Na Navin Mahi KēkaTaiao, i kī atu ngā kaupapa Ratonga Atawhai o te Ao o TE Ao ki te AO he uaua nui tēnei mō ā rātou mahi i ngā wāhi rerekē o te ao. Kua pāngia nga puni rangitahi mo te hunga rewa i Āwherika me Āhia. Nā te huarere tino nui i puta ai ngā nekehanga tuarua mō ngā iwi whānui kua neke kē. E kī ana ngā kaipūtaiao ko ngā takahanga huarere tino nui te pūnoa hou mēnā ka haere tonu te whakamahana i tōna mokatere o nāianei. Engari i kī ngā tohunga kāore e taea te hono hāngai te huringa āhuarangi ki aua tūkinotanga e pā ana ki te huarere. Heoi anō, e tautohe ana rātau, he tokomaha o rātau e whakaae ana ki ngā matapae pūtaiao ka tipu te kaha me te auautanga o te huarere tino nui i roto i te ao mahana. "Kua noho tēnei hei wero nui mō mātou," te kī a Shabia Mantoo, tētahi kaikōrero ki te WHK (United Nations refugee agency), ki te HAU. "Kei te nui haere te maha o ngā puni mō ngā hunga whakaruru me ngā tāngata rerenga ā-roto e pā ana ki ngā takahanga huarere tino nui, ā, kei te uaua haere te whakahaere i aua āhuatanga." Ko te whakararuraru taurua I te nuinga o te wā, ko te waipuke te wero nui. I te tūtukitanga o te huripari o Idai ki Awherika ki te Tonga, neke atu i te 1,000 ngā tāngata i Mati i tēnei tau, ka pāngia hoki tētahi puni rerenga i Zimbabwe, e ai ki ngā kaiwhakahaere o TE WHK. I kī rātau he tokomaha i whara i te puni rerenga o Tongogara e taurima ana i ētahi hunga whakaruru e 13,000 i te takiwā o Chipinge. "Neke atu i te 2,000 ngā whare rerenga, i hangaia nuitia mā te pereki paru, i pakaru katoa, i tētahi wāhanga rānei," te kī a te UNHCR i taua wā. "Neke atu i te 600 ngā whare horoi kua hinga, ā, e wehi ana te wai poka kia tāhaetia nā te wai waipuke. Tērā tētahi mōrearea tūturu o te tīmatatanga o ngā mate ā-wai." I kī te pokapū rerenga o te UN i tētahi āhuatanga ōrite i Hūtane ki te Tonga, i tērā o Whiringahora i te wā i pā mai ai tētahi puni rerenga i te takiwā o Maban, e 15,000 ngā tāngata rerenga mai i te hoa noho o te whenua, o Hūtane, i te waipuke tawhito rawa. E ngāwari ana te rohe ki te waipuke i taua wā o te tau nā te marangai o te tau. Engari ehara tēnā i te take anake i taua take. "Ko ngā awa waipuke i Hūtane ki te Tonga e haere mai ana i ngā whenua tiketike i Etiopia e noho tata ana, i reira kei te kaha ake, kei te whakairo hoki i tōna ara i roto i ngā rohe i roto i ngā awa whānui, tere," te kī a te kaikawe kōrero o TE WHK o Aotearoa. I Naria, ko ngā puni rangitahi i Maiduguri e whakaruru ana i ngā tāngata i rere i ngā whawhai o Te Whenua i ngā wāhi ki te raki o te whenua, i pā hoki ki ngā waipuke i muri i te marangai taumaha o Aotearoa i tēnei tau, e ai ki te Pokapū Aroturuki Whakawhitiwhiti ā-Roto (IDCM). Tata tonu ki te 2,4 miriona ngā tāngata i te Peihana o Te Roto o Chad, e ai ki ngā whika UN. "A, ko te nuinga o tēnei iwi rewa e pā ana ki tētahi takahanga huarere tino nui i muri i tētahi," te kī a Mamadou Sow, te upoko o te Komiti Ao Whānui o te Rīpeka Whero (ICRC) i Awherika ki te tonga. "E kīia ana e mātou he whakararuraru taurua, ā, kei te nui haere tēnei i tō mātou rohe." I Āhia, tērā anō tētahi atu tauira e pā ana ki te puni o Cox's Bazar i Bangladesh, e whakarurutia ana ngā hunga whakaruru o Rūhia. I te wā o te timatanga o tērā tau, kāore i waipuketia noa iho nga puni i reira, engari i pā hoki ētahi ki te horo whenua. E kī ana ngā kaiwhakahaere o te Rōpū Hekenga Ao Whānui (IOM) i te whakamōhiotanga o ngā tāngata i roto i te puni, te āhua o te whakamahinga o te whenua i reira, ā, kua mōrearea kē te pae. "I runga i tērā, he kaha rawa te marangai i puta ai ngā waipuke me ngā horo whenua," te kī a Lorenzo Guadango o te IOM. E kī ana ngā kaipūtaiao āhuarangi kua nui haere te marangai timatanga i Āhia ki te Tonga. I te Rāwhiti o Waenganui, e rua ngā āwhā taumaha i roto i te wiki i mauria mai ai te marangai, te hau me te hukarere ki ngā kāinga ōpaki o ngā hunga whakaruru o Hiriani i Arsal, Repanona, i Hānuere o tēnei tau. "I haehaea, i pakaru rānei o rātau teneti i ētahi tāngata. I waipuketia o rātau teneti i ētahi atu tāngata. I mahue ētahi tāngata... ka neke ki nga teneti o o rātau whanaunga. Kaore he pōhēhētanga he tino uaua taua āhuatanga,'' i whakamāramatia e Hiba Fares, tētahi mana o TE WHK i runga i te whenua. I runga i te nekehanga ehara i te hunga whakaruru anake me ngā tāngata rewa kua whakaruru kētia i roto i nga puni kua pāngia. Ka whakahuatia e nga kaupapa atawhai te tauira o te huripari o Kenneth i tūtuki ki te taha ki te raki o Mozambique i Aperira nei. I kī ngā āpiha o te ICRC i ngā tāngata i rere i te tutu i te takiwā o Cabo Delgado i te taha ki te raki o te whenua i te tau 2017 i pā ki te huripari. "I te neke ētahi o ngā tāngata i te wā i noho rangitahi ētahi ki ngā kāinga, ā, i pā ki a rātau e te huripari," te kī a Tēnā Sow o te ICRC. "I tēnei rā, e 60,000 ngā tāngata rerenga i rere i te tutu i te wāhi ki te raki o te whenua, ā, e wehi ana rātau katoa tērā pea ka pā ki a rātau e ngā takahanga huarere tino nui." Kua kitea hoki e tētahi mātauranga a te UNHCR kua rewa kē ngā tāngata mō ngā take atu i ngā tūkinotanga māori - tae atu ki ngā hunga whakaruru, ngā tāngata kāore he kāwanatanga, me te hunga rewa ā-roto - i te nuinga o te wā e noho ana i ngā "wāhiwera" huringa āhuarangi, ā, ka tūpono pea ki te nekeneke tuarua. O ngā tāngata rerenga ā-roto hou e 28 miriona puta noa i te ao i tērā tau, e 17,2 miriona i neke nā ngā tūkinotanga. Ko ētahi 90% o ēnei e pā ana ki te huarere. Neke atu i te 70 miriona te whika katoa o ngā tāngata i rewa ā-taikaha puta noa i te ao. Kāore anō te tinana o te ao kia mōhio ki ngā tāngata i rewa i ngā tūkinotanga māori, ā-rangi hoki hei hunga whakaruru. Kāore he hoki whakamuri i ētahi puni rangitahi, kua kitea kāore ngā tāngata rewa e hiahia ana ki te hoki ahakoa i muri i te mutunga o te papā me te tutu nā te mea kua pāngia ō rātou kāinga taketake ināianei e te huarere tino nui. "I roto i te puni rerenga o Darfur o Hūtane, hei tauira, i te kitenga o te iwi rerenga kua kore e taea te noho i te rohe i haere mai ai rātau nā ngā āhuatanga taurakitanga, kāore rātau i whakaae ki te hoki mai," te kī a Rofaida Elzubair me Practical Action, he rōpū kāwanatanga ao whānui e āwhina ana i ngā hapori i Hūtane ki te urutau ki te huringa āhuarangi. "Kāore rātau e pīrangi ki te hoki whakamuri ahakoa kua mutu te papā, ā, ko te hua me whakaroa e te UN te katinga o te puni."

title: Stephon Clark: E whakaatu ana te ataata pirihimana i te tākarotanga kino o te tangata kore patu
summary: Kua tukua e nga pirihimana o California he whakaaturanga e whakaatu ana i te tākarotanga kino o tētahi tangata kāore i te rāhuitia, ko tana waea i pōhēhētia e ngā āpiha mō tētahi pū.
text: I kī nga mana i whakaaro rātau he rākau tā Stephon Clark, e 22, i to rātau pūtiro ki a ia i te pō Rātapu. I kī nga pirihimana o Sacramento i kitea he tangata e pakaru ana ki roto i ngā waka e toru neke atu rānei me te kāinga o tētahi hoa noho tata. Kāore i te mārama te whakaatu i ngā mahi a Tēnā Clark i mua i tana pūhia i tōna ake tuarā. He pouri i roto i te topenga, engari e kitea ana he whika e peke ana i runga i te taiapa, a, ka oma ki te tuarā. E whakaatu ana ngā kāmera tinana a ngā pirihimana i a rātau e oma ana i te taha o te whare ki te tūtaki i te hunga pōhēhē. Tokorua ngā āpiha i pūhia a Tēnā Clark e rangona ana e tono ana ki a ia kia whakaatu i ōna ringa me te karanga, "pū, pū, pū", i mua i te whakatuwheratanga o te ahi. I kī ngā pirihimana ka whakatata atu te kaipōhēhē ki ngā āpiha me tētahi ahanoa i mua i a ia, i whakaaro rātau he pū ā-ringa. E whakaatu ana ngā whakakitenga mai i te hepaopao i a Tēnā Clark e ngahoro ana i te tīmatanga o ngā āpiha ki te ahi, e ai ki te Pī o Sacramento. Na tētahi āpiha i huatau kia tupeke i a ia ki tētahi rākau whakamate, engari i mutu tōna whakaaro i waenganui i te rerenga, e ai ki te whakaaturanga. "Me patu tātou i a ia kia rua ngā wā i mua i a tātau uh...," e kiia ana ka rangona a ia e kī ana. "He aha tāna i runga i a ia?" te pātai a tētahi o nga āpiha. "He mea i roto i ōna ringa, te āhua nei he pū mai i to mātau tirohanga," te urupare a tētahi āpiha. Ka whakatata atu ngā pirihimana ki a Tēnā Clark, ā, ka kitea he waea pūkoro e takoto tata ana ki tōna māhunga. E herea ana a ia e nga āpiha. I a ia e kōrerorero ana mēnā ka mahia te CPR, ka kī tētahi āpiha: "E, whakangū". E rua meneti te ngū o te ororongo. I kōrerotia a Tēnā Clark kua mate i taua wāhi. Kāore tōna ingoa i tukua tikatia, engari i kitea ia e tana hoa wahine, a Salena Manni. Tokorua ana tama, kotahi me te toru te pakeke. Na te tākaro i tīmata anō te taupatupatu mo nga tauwhitinga i waenganui i te ture me ngā Amerikana o Awherika. I tukuna e te rōpū Black Lives Matter Sacramento tētahi kōrero tūmatanui e karanga ana i te tākaro he "kōhuru" e ngā pirihimana i muri i te arotakenga o te ataata. I whakatūria e rātau he takahanga tūmatanui hei whakahonore i a ia i te Tāite. "I hē a ia i te wā hē i tōna ake tuawhenua?" I pātai atu te kuia o Tāne Clark, a Sequita Thompson, ki te nūpepa o Sacramento Bee. I whakaaturia tuatahitia ngā ataata ki te whānau i mua i te tukunga atu ki te iwi whānui. I kī atu te tohunga whakangungu pirihimana o Ed Obayashi ki te nūpepa he "tika" nga mahi a nga āpiha. "He kino te āhua, engari kei te kite tonu (ngā āpiha) i tētahi tuma... kaore a ia i te whakarongo," te kī a Tēnā Obayashi. "Ko te raruraru, he ahanoa tōna i tōna ringa, ahakoa i te awatea, he ngāwari noa iho te whakaaro he pū." I kī a Ms Thompson, nāna i rongo i te pū, kāore a ia i rongo i ngā pirihimana e pātai ana ki tana mokopuna he aha tāna e pupuri ana. I kī te Koromatua o Sacramento, a Darrell Steinberg, me whakaoti te tūhuratanga i mua i tana whakatauranga. "I runga anō i ngā ataata anake, kāore e taea e au te whakaaro tuarua i ngā whakataunga ritua tuarua a o mātau āpiha, ā, kāore au e mahi i tēnā," te kī a te taone nui i roto i tētahi kōrero ki te pāpāho o Amerika.

title: Ngā hōhipera tino pai 'ināianei e uaua ana ki te kite i ngā tūroro'
summary: He nui rawa ngā pēhanga i roto i te NHS, ahakoa ko ngā hōhipera tino pai i Ingarangi e kite ana i ngā tūroro e tatari roa ana mō ngā ratonga matua, e whakaatu ana tētahi tātaritanga.
text: Nā Nick TriggleHealth i titiro te pūrongo Nuffield Trust ki te mahinga i tēnei Pāremata ki ngā ūnga e ono, e kapi ana i te A&E, ngā mahi, te mate pukupuku me ngā whakamātautau tātaritanga. I kitea ko te nuinga o ngā tūroro e kitea tonutia ana i roto i ngā wā ūnga i ngā whakawhirinaki hōhipera e 156. Engari i kī ahakoa ko ngā pae o runga e kite ana i te hekenga o tā rātou mahinga. I puta mai te pūrongo i te rā whakamutunga o te kaupapa NHS Winter a BBC, e aroturuki ana i te mahinga o ngā whakawhirinaki hōhipera paetata puta noa i te UK. I roto i ngā rā e whitu tae atu ki tērā Rātapu o te mahinga o A&Es i Ingarangi ki te ūnga whā haora i piki ki te 92.8%. Kei raro tonu tērā i te ūnga 95% me te tikanga mai i te tīmatanga o te kaupapa a TE AO i te tīmatanga o Whiringa ā Rangi, kua hapa te ūnga i ia wiki. Kei te ngaro hoki te toenga o te UK i te tohu whā haora. 'Kei te kino ake' Ko ngā ūnga e ono i tātaritia e te Nuffield Trust ko: I kī te arotakenga kua kino haere ngā hōhipera mahi rawakore i te nuinga o ngā mehua mō tētahi wā. Engari i kī inā noa nei kua tīmata hoki te mahinga ki te whakapeka i te 10% o runga o ngā hōhipera, otirā i ngā tikanga o te A&E, ngā mahi hōhipera, ā, he iti iho te whānuitanga, ngā wāhui hōhipera. E kī ana tēnei i huatau he "pūnaha" ngā raruraru, ehara i te mea nā ngā hinganga paetata, whakahaere rānei. NHS performance in numbers The report acknowledged demand for services had increased significantly - the number of hospital diagnostic tests and urgent cancer referrals have both rise by more than 10% . Engari i kī kāore tēnei i te tino honoa ki ngā pata ōrite o te mahinga. Hei tauira, he iti noa iho te heke o ngā mahi hōhipera e mahia ana - engari ko te ūnga wā tatari kei waenganui i ērā kua tino heke te mahinga. I kī te kaituhi tahi o te Pūrongo rama whakatūpato, a Holly Dorning: "Kua mōhio mātou kua uaua ngā hōhipera ki te whakatutuki i te ūnga A&E e whā haora mō tētahi wā. " Engari ko te mea kei te tīmata tātau ki te kite i ngā raruraru i ētahi atu wāhi, pēnei i te āheitanga ki te rongoā kua whakaritea, he tino āwangawanga. "E mārama ana tēnei akoranga, kua tīmata ngā rama whakatūpato ki te kōhiko puta noa i te pūnaha hōhipera whānui ake." I kī tētahi kaikōrero mō te Tari Hauora: "He pākaha ake te NHS i tētahi atu wā, nā te mea ko te tikanga o ngā rongoā auaha me ngā rongoā e noho roa ana te tangata me ngā āhuatanga matatini pēnei i te mate manawa, i te mate huka rānei. " Kua whakanuia e mātou te pūtea NHS i tēnei Pāremata, engari i te mutunga e hiahia ana mātou ki te whakaiti i te pēhanga o ngā ratonga mā ā mātou mahere kia nui ake te urunga ki te tiaki tuatahi me te tiaki i ngā tāngata pai ake i roto i te hapori." I kī te hēkeretari hauora kōruru o Andy Burnham: "Kua makaia te NHS e te whakaraupapa anō a [Pirimia] a Rawiri, ā, ināianei kua kore e taea te tuku - ka waiho ngā mano tāngata me te kore e tika ana kia tiakina e rātou."

title: Pakihi: EU 'e kore e pai ki te whakarite', e kī ana a Gove
summary: E kī ana te minita kāpata a Michael Gove "te āhua nei kāore te EU e whakaae ana ki te whakarite ki te UK" mō tētahi mahi hou o Te Wānanga.
text: I kī a Tēnā Gove, e haepapa ana ki te whakarite kore, i "tino pouri" a Pōroa, i ana kupu, e kī ana "kāo, kāore mātou e hiahia ki te kōrero". I muri i te kīanga a te EU e tono ana a UK kia tangohia te tauwhāinga o Kīriria i te mahi a Ēnā Me. Kua tāruatia e te PM o Kīriria Leo Varadkar kāore e taea te whakarite anō i te mahi putanga, tae atu ki te tautohetohe. I kī te Kōmihana o Ūropi e hiahia ana ki te pupuri i ētahi atu kōrero, "me hiahia te UK ki te whakamārama i tōna tūnga". Ināianei, kua tīmataria e tētahi rōpū kaipōrangapū tētahi mahi ā-ture e hāngai ana ki te ārai i te whakaweto a Poihāne i te Pāremata ki te whakahau i tētahi Pakihi. E toru ngā wā i whakakāhoretia ai te mahi a Ēnā Me e ngā MP, ā, e tū ana ngā mea, ka wehe atu te UK i te EU i te 31 o Whiringa ā-rangi, ahakoa kua whakaae ki tētahi mea hou, kāore rānei. I te Mane, ka kī atu ngā kaiwhakarite EU ki ngā kaiwhakahaere o Ūropi kāore he take mō "ngā kōrero whai tikanga" me ngā kōrero i hoki mai ki te wāhi e toru tau ki mua. I kī tētahi takawaenga matua o EU ko te "tauari matua" a te kāwanatanga o UK. I te kōrero i aua huatau, ka kī a Tēnā Gove: "I tēnei wā, ko te EU e kī ana kāore rātou i te hiahiatia, kei te kī noa iho rātou 'kāo, kāore mātou e hiahia ki te kōrero'. " Ki taku whakaaro he hē, he pouri tēnā, ehara i te painga o Uropi", tana tāpiri mai. I whakakāhore te Hēkeretari ā-Rohe a Dominic Raab i ngā minita ināianei e whai ana ki tētahi putanga kore, e tohe ana kia "uaua ia uaua kia whiwhi ai i ngā huringa e hiahiatia ana e tātau". I a ia e kōrero ana ki te AO i te wā o tētahi haerenga ki Kānata i te Tūtira, ka kī a ia kua whakaaturia e te EU "kāore he nekehanga, kāore he whakararuraru, kāore he ngāwari" i runga i te huri i te whakaaetanga i whakakāhoretia e te Pāremata. "Ko te tikanga, ki te kore te EU e neke, mēnā he whakakeke, ka waiho e mātou ki ngā ture WTO [World Trade Organization]," tana tāpiri mai. I whai te hui EU o te Mane i te kōrero i tērā wiki i waenganui i te EU me te karere Pākehā a te PM, a David Frost, i reira i tāruatia ai e ia te tūnga o Tēnā Hōnea me tango te mahere taurua i te mahi a Mrs May. I whakaarahia hoki e ia ngā māharahara mō te "pire whakarerekētanga" o te UK me te tūranga i marohitia e te Kōti o Ūropi o te Ture, te kōti matua o EU, i muri i a Pakihi. He tokomaha nga hoariri o te mahi a Mrs May e whakahua ana i ngā māharahara mo te tauwhāinga - he kaupapahere inihua hei ārai i te hokinga mai o tētahi taitapa mārō ki te motu o Aiarangi - mēnā ka whakatinanatia, ka kite i Aiarangi ki te Raki e noho hāngai ana ki ētahi ture o te mākete kotahi EU. Ka pā hoki ki tētahi rohe tikanga rangitahi kotahi, e pupuri tika ana i te katoa o te UK i roto i te uniana o nga tikanga EU. Ka pā ēnei whakaritenga ki te kore e whakaae te EU me te UK kua kore e hiahiatia. I a ia e kōrero ana i te Tūtira i Perehi, ka kī atu a Tēnā Varadkar ki ngā kaipānui kāore a ia i whakaae kāore e taea te karo i tētahi Tūtira kāore i te mahi, kātahi anō ka taea te karo. I kī a ia i roto i ēnei kōwhiringa ko te whakamana i te mahi a Mrs May, te whakaroa atu anō i te mematanga EU o UK, te whakakore rānei a te UK i te Brexit mā te whakakore i te Tuhipānui 50. I kī a Tēnā Varadkar kua pōhiritia e ia a Tēnā Hōnea ki Dublin mō ngā kōrero mō Pakihi, me ētahi atu take, "kāore he whakatakotoranga". I kī te kaipānui o Te Aotearoa, a Arama, e kākari ana te EU me pēhea te mahi ki tētahi pirimia i Poihāne, e whakahau ana i ngā mea kāore i rite ki te hoatu. I kī a ia kāore anō kia tukua e te EU, ā, ka noho ngā whatu katoa ki te tihi G7 i Wīwī i te mutunga o Aotearoa, e whakapono ana te tokomaha ko te wā o te pono - te wā e kore ai e taea te mahi i te Pakihi. I mua ake, ka tūtaki a Tēnā Hōnea ki tana kaiārahi kē tuatahi mai i te tomokanga ki Te Tiriti o Te Tiriti - te Pirimia o Estonia o Juri Ratas. I kī te Minita Ā-Rohe o te whenua, a Urmas Reinsalu, i mua, ahakoa ko te "pono" te whakaaetanga putanga - tae atu ki te tauwhāinga - kua whakaaetia tahitia e ngā kāwanatanga mema EU, kei te hiahia tonu te kōrero haere tonu i ngā wiki e heke mai nei kia kore ai e mahi. I kī atu a ia ki ngā whiringa hōtaka o Te Reo Irirangi 4 o Tēnei Rā ka taea te kōrerorero i muri i te whakamanatanga o te mahi putanga. I tērā wiki ka pānuitia e te kāwanatanga he pūtea tāpiri e £2.1bn hei whakarite mō tētahi Brexit kāore he mahi - e whakarua ana i te nui o ngā moni kua waiho e ia i tēnei tau. Kei roto i ngā mahere ētahi atu āpiha o te Ope Taitapa me ngā whakamohoa ki te kawe i ngā hanganga i ngā tauranga, tae atu ki ētahi atu moni hei rutu i ngā tūtira i Kent i waihangatia e ngā takaware i te Hongere. I kī a Tēnā Gove kua whakarewaina ngā whakaritenga a te kāwanatanga mo te kore mahi, ā, "kua mutu ngā rā o te mānuku i a mātau i mua". I kī a ia ko te kaupapa ki te tango i te UK ki waho o te EU i te 31 o Whiringa ā-rangi, he "rā kati pūmau", ā, "ka rite mātou ki te wehe i ngā mea e haere mai ana". Ko te tātaritanga a Honatana Blake, ko te korero tōrangapū o TE AO ehara i te wā tuatahi te āhua nei kua komukua te tukanga o Te Wānanga. E kī ana ngā taha e rua e hiahia ana rātau ki te kōrero, ā, e hiahia ana ngā taha e rua ki te karo i te haere me te kore mahi. Engari kāore te UK me te EU i te whakarite nā te mea he tūnga tā rāua e kī ana kāore e taea e tētahi te whakaae. Mo tēnei wā e tūmanako ana kia nui ake ngā kōrero uaua mai i nga minita kāwanatanga me ētahi atu mea ōrite mai i te EU. Engari ākuanei, ā taihoa ake rānei, mēnā e tino hiahia ana ngā taha e rua ki te karo i te haere me te kore whakaaetanga, me hoatu e tētahi, tētahi mea rānei. Haere mai o Mahuru ina hoki mai ngā MP i tō rātou wehenga raumati, tērā pea ka nui ake ngā ngana ki te ārai i te kore mahi, he nekehanga ki te whakahau i tētahi pōti nui - tērā pea he neke māheahea i te tūnga o te kāwanatanga. Kaore he mea pēnei i te rā kati hei arotahi i ngā hinengaro, ā, ki te mau tonu tēnei, ka tīmata tere pea ngā mea. He roa noa iho te roa o tēnei tūnga raumati.

title: Eric Pickles gives councils 50 money saving tips
summary: Me mutu te whakamāori i ngā tuhinga, me whakatakoto pānuitanga ki ngā pire tāke kaunihera me te rēti i ā rātou mahi toi, kua kī a Eric Pickles.
text: I whakaputaina e te hēkeretari hapori tētahi rārangi o ngā whakaaro penapena moni e 50, i muri i te pānuitanga o ētahi atu tapahi pūtea. Ko ētahi atu huatau ko te whakatuwhera i ngā toa kawhe i roto i ngā whare pukapuka me te whakakore i te wai kohuke i ngā hui kaunihera. I kī a Hilary Benn o Labour i whakaaturia e te ariā toi a Tēnā Pickles e "noho ana i tētahi aorangi kē". Kei roto hoki i ngā whakaaro he huarahi hei whakaiti i te whakapau moni me te whakapai ake i te kohinga moni. Tērā ētahi tohutohu mai i te katinga o ngā wharekai kaunihera āwhina ki te whakakore i "ngā rā tawhiti i roto i ngā hōtēra ātaahua me ngā hākari whakawhiwhinga". E kī ana me whakamutu te whakamāori tuhinga ki ngā reo kē, e mōhio ana ko te mahi pēnā "e tukituki ana i te hononga hapori mā te whakahauhau i te whakawehenga". E kī ana te Tari mō ngā Hapori me te Kāwanatanga Paetata (DCLG) e ārahi ana mā te tauira, e tapahi ana i te neke atu i te £400,000 mai i tana whakapau moni mō ngā paramanawa mā te whakamutu i te whakarato kai me te inu koreutu i ngā hui, me te whakaiti i te haerenga o te karaehe tuatahi mai i te £200,000 ki te £17,500 i te tau. E tohutohu ana i te whakamahinga o te papamahi wera hei tapahi i te mokowā tari e hiahiatia ana, ā, e huatau ana kia whai ngā kaunihera i te tauira DCLG o te whakaae kia tuwhera ngā "toa pahū" ki ō rātou kāinga. Ko tētahi atu huatau ko te hoko ratonga, pēnei i te whakatuwhera i ngā pūtahi MoT e whakahaeretia ana e te kaunihera, e rāhuitia ana ki ngā waka kaunihera, ki te iwi whānui. 'Raruraru tūturu' i kī a Tēnā Pickles: "Me mahi ia wāhanga tūmatanui ki te utu i te tāpaetanga pūtea i tuku iho i te whakahaeretanga whakamutunga, tae atu ki te kāwanatanga ā-rohe e pūkete ana mō te hauwhā o ngā hokohoko tūmatanui katoa. " Me arotahi ngā kaunihera ki te tapahi moumou me te penapena tika hei pare i ngā ratonga o mua me te pupuri i te tāke kaunihera." "Mā ēnei penapena hoki e āwhina i ngā kaunihera ki te whakatio tāke kaunihera a tērā tau, e tuku ana i tētahi tau anō o te āwhina ā-ringa ki te utu o te oranga ki ngā whānau me ngā kaitiaki puta noa i te whenua." Shadow communities secretary Hilary Benn said the latest funding announcement meant many councils were facing a 28% cut over four years and was creating a "real crisis". Hei urupare ki te rārangi o ngā aki penapena moni, ka kī a ia kua mahi ngā kaunihera i ngā penapena tōtika, ā, kua whakahekea kētia e 230,00 ngā kaimahi, engari me tapahi tonu ngā ratonga. I kī a ia ko te ariā a Tēnā Pickles mō ngā kaunihera e rēti ana i ā rātou mahi toi mō te moni "e whakaatu ana kei te noho a ia i tētahi aorangi kē ki ngā tāngata e mahi uaua ana i roto i ngā kaunihera e ngana ana ki te whakarato ratonga".

title: Ka hainatia e te kaiwhakahaere o Transformers a Michael Bay mō te kiriata tuawhā
summary: Kua hainatia e Michael Bay ki te whakahaere i tētahi kiriata Transformers tuawhā, kua whakaūngia.
text: I kī te kaipūkino, nāna i whakahaere ngā wāhanga tuatahi e toru o te māngai, e mahi ana a ia i "tētahi whakaaro hou katoa o ngā Transformers". I tāpiritia e ia e mahi ana a ia i tētahi ariā me te kaiwhakanao nui o Hīnī Spielberg mō ngā marama tata nei. I kī tētahi kōrero whaimana mai i ngā Pikitia Paramount ka tukua te pikitia hou i te 29 o Pipiri 2014. Ko te wāhanga tuatoru me te wāhanga hōu rawa o te māngai, Transformers: Dark of the Moon, i whakaputaina i tērā tau, ā, i kite i te kaitapere o Amerika ko Shia LaBeouf e whakahoki ana i tana mahi hei Sam Witwicky. I kī a Paramount ko te tuawhā o ngā kiriata nui rawa o te ao katoa e mau ana i te $1.12bn (£713m) i te tari pouaka. Heoi anō, e whakaarotia ana e kore te nuinga o te maka, tae atu ki a LaBeouf, e hoki mai mō tētahi pikitia tuawhā. Ko te kaupapa hou he wāhanga o tētahi kiriata e rua kua hainatia e Bay ki Paramount, ā, ka kite i a ia i te tuatahi e whakahaere ana i tētahi kōrero pango e huaina ana ko Pain and Gain. E hāngai ana ki a Mark Wahlberg rāua ko D maia "The Rock" Johnson, ka tīmata te whakaahuatanga i te mutunga o Poutāpeta. I whakamōhiotia hoki e te kaiwhakahaere ka taea e ia te whakahaere i tētahi rangatū pouaka whakaata, e kī ana: "Tērā pea ka peke ahau ki tētahi whakaaturanga pouaka whakaata tino mātao e hokona ana e taku kamupene Platinum Dunes ki tētahi whatunga taura nui. " Tērā pea ko taku kaihautū tuatahi tērā pea ka whakahaeretia e au. Kei te mahi tonu mātou i ngā taipitopito o te mahi." Kei roto i ngā mahi o mua a Bay ko te kiriata pakanga o Pearl Harbour me Armageddon, e hāngai ana ki a Ben Affleck.

title: Te keri a Holme Fen Spitfire: I kitea te wheua tangata e whakapaetia ana
summary: Kua whakatārewatia tētahi keri hei keri i tētahi Spitfire i tūtuki nā te mea kua kitea he wheua i whakaarotia nā te kaihautū.
text: E tūmanako ana ngā kaimātai whenua e mahi ana i Holme Fen, Cambridgeshire, ki te hura i te waka rererangi, i tūtuki i te ihu i te 300mph i te wā o te mahi whakangungu o te Pakanga Tuarua o te Ao i te tau 1940. Engari i kī a Oxford Archaeology East kua mutu te keri nā te mea i kitea "he kongakonga o ngā toenga kōiwi tangata". Me haere tonu te keri i te Paraire. Kua whakamōhio atu nga kaimātai whenua e mahi ana i te pae ki te koroni, e kiia ana e hari ana kia haere tonu te keri. Kāore anō kia tino whakatūria te take o te tūtukitanga o te waka rererangi o te Rhodesian Squadron Royal Air Force, ahakoa i whakamutua e tētahi tūhuratanga te pūnaha hāora a te Āpiha Kaihautū o Harold Penketh, he rahunga ōkiko rānei o te waka rererangi. I muri noa iho i te tūtukitanga o te pakanga, ka whakaorangia te tinana o te kaihautū, a Pilot Officer Harold Penketh. I tere te kī o te "māra tino nui" i hangaia e te Spitfire i te wai i te tiketike o te tēpu wai i taua rohe, ka kī te kaiwhakaatu a John Bliss, he tamariki i taua wā. Nō tēnei wā kua keria e ngā kaimātai whenua e rua mita ki raro, ā, kua kitea te wāhi keri taketake mō te whakaoranga o te tinana o te kaihautū e RAF Wittering, e whitu rā i taua wā. Kua whakaorangia hoki e rātau te mīhini tīmata, ngā paepae mana mai i te paihirangi, tētahi wāhanga o te pūnaha hāora me ngā toenga katoa o tētahi o ngā kura hinu o te Mk 1A Spitfire X4583. E tūmanako ana hoki rātau ki te whakaora i te mīhini.

title: Ka hangaia e Haina te rorohiko tino kaha o te ao
summary: Kua tīmataria e tētahi rorohiko hōu mai i Haina te rārangi hōu rawa o ngā mīhini tino kaha o te ao.
text: Kua tāutatia te 93 petaflop Sunway TaihuLight ki te National Supercomputing Centre i Wuxi. I tōna taumata, ka taea e te rorohiko te mahi i ngā tatauranga 93,000 trillion ia hēkona. E rua ngā wā te tere, e toru ngā wā e pai ake ana ki te kaiārahi o mua o Tianhe-2, mai i Haina hoki, i kī a Top500 nāna i tuku te rārangi hou i te Mane. Ko ōna taupānga matua ko te whakanao arā atu anō, te matapae huarere me ngā tātaritanga raraunga nui, i tuhituhi a Jack Dongarra i roto i tētahi pepa mō te mīhini hōu. Neke atu i te 10.5 miriona ngā uho tukatuka ā-rohe me ngā kōpuku 40,960, ā, ka haere i runga i tētahi pūnaha whakahaere ā-Linux. Ko te wā tuatahi mai i te tīmatanga o te rārangi, kua mau a Haina i a Mātau me ngā rorohiko e 167 i roto i te 500 o runga, i te wā e 165 ana te US. "Mehemea i te 10 tau noa iho nei, i kī a Haina i ngā pūnaha e 28 noa iho i runga i te rārangi, ā, kāore he mea i runga i te 30 o runga, kua tere kē atu te iwi i tētahi atu whenua i roto i te hītori o te rorohiko nui," te kī a Top500. E whā ngā rorohiko matua o te US i roto i te 10 o runga o te rārangi Top500, i te wā e rua o Haina e noho ana i ngā wāhi e rua o runga. Ko ērā atu tūnga i te 10 o runga, e rua ngā wā i whakaputaina i te tau, e nohoia ana e ngā mīhini mai i Hapanihi, Huiterangi, Tiamana me Arapia. "Hei kaipūtaiao rorohiko, he uaua te tuhi pūmanawa e āhei ana ki te whakamahi me te whakahaere i te maha o ngā uho rorohiko," te kī a Ahorangi Les Carr mai i te Whare Wānanga o Southampton. "Koinei te take i rāhuitia ai ngā rorohiko matua ki ngā taupānga motuhake - me tino whai wāhi koe ki te rorohiko motuhake. " He rite rātau ki ngā motokā whakataetae Grand Prix tino tiketike - he tino pai mō te whakataetae i runga i ngā ara iahiko, engari ehara i te tino pai mō te haere mai i Rāwāhi ki Etinitini."

title: Ka whakawhiwhia e Brit te hunga pouaka whakaata 'te nui rawa mai i te tau 2005'
summary: He tokomaha ake ngā tāngata i āta tirotiro ki te pānuitanga a ITV o ngā Tohu Brit o tēnei tau i ngā tau e whitu kua hipa.
text: Ko te toharite o te hunga i mātakitaki i te hui i ITV1 me te hongere hopu ITV1+1 ko te 6.2 miriona - te hunga teitei rawa o te takahanga mai i te tau 2005. Ki te aukatia ngā whika hopu, ko te toharite o te hunga whakarongo ko te 5.9 miriona. I kī a ITV kua whiwhi amuamu 170 mō te kīanga ki te aorangi o te Tūrei, i kite ai i tētahi whaikōrero whakaae a Adele i tapahia e te kaihautū a Hemi Corden. Kua tukuna e te hongere he whakapae tūmatanui ki te kaiwaiata, nāna i urupare ki te iti i kitea mā te whāinga i tētahi tohu ā-ringa kino ki ngā kaiwhakahaere o Brit. "Mō ngā hūtu tērā i ngā Tohu Brit, ehara i aku kaihautū," tana kī atu ki ngā kaipānui i muri iho. "Aroha mai ki te whakararuraru ahau i tētahi tangata, engari i whakararuraru ahau i nga hūtu." "Ka nui rawa te whakahaere o te hōtaka, ā, me neke tonu mātau," te kī a ITV. "E hiahia ana mātou ki te whakapōhēhē ki a Adele mo te pōreareatanga." I tāpiritia e tētahi kaikōrero o Pirihitini: "E pouri ana mātou i tēnei tūponotanga, ā, ka tukuna atu e mātau a mātau whakapae tino hōhonu ki a Adele kua poto tōna wā nui." I kī a Corden kei raro a ia i ngā whakahau kia whakangū i a Adele kia taea ai e Blur - ngā kaiwhiwhi o te whakawhiwhinga koha tino pai - te mahi i tētahi whakawhiwhinga o a rātau patu. "I muri noa iho i te mihi a Adele, ka kī te iwi: 'Me haere koe ināianei'," tana kī atu ki a 5 Live's Richard Bacon i te Wenerei. " Ka kī ahau: 'Kāore e taea e au' - ka kī rātau: 'Me mātua koe'. Ka kī atu ahau: 'Me pēhea e taea ai e mātou te tapahi i a ia?' I runga katoa te rūma i ōna waewae. "He wā tino rangirua, i te mea ko ngā mea katoa e rongo ana koe i roto i tō taringa, e rima ngā tāngata e tautohetohe ana." I kī te whetū o Gavin rāua ko Stacey he "whakararuraru, he whakararuraru" engari he "kotahi noa iho o aua mea". Ko te hui o te tau 2005 - i taurimatia e DJ Chris Evans, ā, e whakaatu ana i ngā whakaaturanga mai i te Rā Kākāriki me ngā Tuahine Scissor - i tāia he hunga toharite e 6.3 miriona. Ko te takahanga 2008 - i taurimatia e Ozzy Osborne me tōna whānau - i mātakina e te hunga toharite e 6.1 miriona. I tōna taumata, ko te hui o tēnei tau i te papa tākaro O2 o Rāwāhi i mātakina e te 7.4 miriona tāngata - neke atu i te rua te hunga whakarongo mo te whakaaturanga o tērā tau, e ai ki a Corden. E rua nga paraihe i toa ai a Adele i te hui. Ko tana tuatahi, mō te wahine Peretania tino pai, i haere mai i mua i te ahiahi, i te tuarua, mō te pukaemi Peretania tino pai, ko te mea whakamutunga i whakaaturia. I toa hoki te kaiwaiata-kaiwaiata a Ed Sheeran i ngā tohu e rua, mō te tāne tino pai o Ingarangi me te hua o Ingarangi. I karaunatia a Coldplay hei rōpū Peretania tino pai mō tētahi pūkete tuatoru, i te wā i toa te pēne taitama X Factor o mua One Direction i te takitahi o Ingarangi tino pai.

title: Ka hoatu e te Kōti o te Wātū te whakawā a Te Kōti o Te Wātū a tērā wiki
summary: Ka whakawāteatia e te kōti tūmatanui tiketike o Pākehā tana whakawā a tērā wiki i runga i te wero ki te whakatārewatanga o te Pāremata o UK.
text: Engari i whakakāhore ngā kaiwhakawā o Lord Carloway, Lord Brodie me Lord Drummond Young i tētahi āraitanga e tū wawe ai te tukanga. I kī a Ariki Kānata me whakaaro te kōti ki ētahi take tino matatini, ā, ka roa te wā o te whakataunga. I rongo te kōti i te whakakorenga o te Pāremata ka tīmata i te Mane. I Rāwāhi i mua, i whakakāhoretia he wero ture mo te whakataunga kia whakatārewatia te Pāremata i te Kōti Tiketike. I mauria mai te kēhi e te wahine pākihi o Gina Miller, nāna i tautohe ko te nekehanga he "tūkino mana ture". Kai te tonoa taua whakataunga ki te Kōti Matua. E whakaaro ana nga kaiwhakawā i Etinitini ki tētahi tono ki tētahi whakahaere a Ariki Doherty ko te take mō ngā kaipōrangapū me ngā kaipōti hei whakawā, ehara i te kōti. I tonoa e Aiden O'Neill QC, e tohu ana i ngā mema pāremata e 70 i arahina e SNP MP Joanna Cherry QC e whakatūpato ana i te kāwanatanga o UK, ki ngā kaiwhakawā i te Kōti Wātū i Etinitini kia "pupuri i te rīngi" tae noa ki tērā wiki, hei ārai i te whakatārewatanga o te Pāremata i mua i ta rātau whakahaere. 'Whakaekea te kāwanatanga ā iwi' I mua, i tautohe a ia he ture te whakatārewatanga. "Ka whakaweto te whakataunga ki te whakakore i te Pāremata," tana kī. "I roto i aua āhuatanga he whakaekenga ki te kāwanatanga ā iwi. " He whakaekenga ki te toenga o te kaupapa ture, nō reira he ture ture." Engari i kī a Rawiri Johnston QC, e tohu ana i te kāwanatanga o UK, ehara i te mea kia uru nga kōti ki tētahi whakataunga tōrangapū. I pātai mai a Ariki Brodie mēnā ka kitea e tētahi tangata he "tōrangapū tiketike" e tētahi atu he "māminga iti". I kī a Tēnā Johnston e "kore e tika te tohutohu i hoatu mō tētahi kaupapa tōrangapū". Kua kī atu te kāwanatanga QC ki te kōti ehara te whakakorenga i te take mo te pūnaha ture. Ka kī a ia: "He mana whai mana tēnei. Ehara i te mea e tika ana kia uru atu nga kōti. He whakataunga tōrangapū tēnei. Ehara i te mea tika mo te mana whakawā. "He tauira hītori - i te tau 1948, kotahi noa iho te rā i whakawāteatia ai te Pāremata kia puta ai te Ture Pāremata o te tau 1949. "Ehara tēnei i te take tika." I kī atu hoki a Tēnā Johnston ki te kōti, nā te Pāremata e whakawhiti ana i te pire a Benn - e whai ana ki te ārai i tētahi Pirihitini kāore e pā tonu - kua kore te whakahau a te Kaunihera Tūmataiti kia whakakore. I tāpiri mai a ia: "Ka hinga te Raupapa i roto i te Kaunihera." I whakaae te kōti i te Rāitema ki tētahi tono a te HAU, te Times me te Rā ki te tuku i ngā tuhinga kāwanatanga e pā ana ki te kēhi. Kei roto i a rātou tētahi tuhipoka i tukuna ki te PM i te 15 o Aotearoa e pātai ana mehemea e hiahia ana a ia ki te whakakore i te pāremata mai i te waenganui o Mahuru. Ka kitea tētahi tohu tuhi ā-ringa me te kupu "āe" i runga i te tuhinga. I waho o te kōti, ka kī a Jolyon Maugham QC e whakapono ana ia ka taea tonutia e nga kaiwhakawā te hiki i te whakawāteatanga i te Wenerei. I kī a Tēnā Maugham, ko ia tētahi o ērā e tautoko ana i te kēhi, tērā pea ko te Kōti Matua te ūnga whakamutunga mo te kēhi. Engari i whakaaro a ia ka taea e te whakawā o Pirihitini te whakaawe i te whakaaro o nga kaiwhakawā o te Kōti Matua. I tāpiri mai a ia: "Ki te whiwhi whakataunga tātau i te Wenerei, ka whakatārewatia e tātau te whakawāteatanga."

title: West Yorkshire court system in 'crisis' over lockdown backlog
summary: Kei te "raruraru" te pūnaha kōti o West Yorkshire me te whakaputunga o ngā mano kēhi nā te kati coronavirus, kua kī tētahi rangatira pirihimana.
text: Ko te tikanga o ngā ture tawhiti pāpori kua hikitia ngā whakamātautau, ā, kua whakahekea ngā kēhi. I kī a Mark Burns-Williamson, pirihimana me te komihana hara (PCC), tērā te pōrearea i te "kore kauneketanga mai i te ratonga kōti ā iwi". Kua kī te kāwanatanga i mua he "nui rawa te mahi" e puta ana hei pupuri i te pūnaha tika. I whakaarahia nga āwangawanga i tētahi hui a te Pae Pirihimana me te Pae Hara o Te Hauauru, i pūrongotia e te Ratonga Kāwanatanga ā Rohe. I kī a Roger Grasby, he mema takitahi o te pae me tētahi kaiwhakawā, i tētahi whakarongo mana whakahaere o mua tata nei i te Kōti Kaiwhakawa o Leeds, e whā anake ngā kēhi i te rā kotahi i whakaritea ki te 20 i raro i ngā āhuatanga pūnoa. I kī a Tēnā Burns-Williamson e "mahi ana rātau ki te whakarite i tētahi mahere paetata" ā, ka taea te titiro ki "ngā kōti Nightingale" hei āwhina ki te whakangāwari i te kawenga. I tāpiri mai a ia: "Ka mahia e mātou ngā mea katoa e taea e mātou i te paetata hei whakamauru, engari kāore he raruraru tēnei." Read more Yorkshire news and coronavirus updates Chief Constable John Robins, of West Yorkshire Police, said more should have been done to make courts safer during the pandemic, rather than shut them fully. Hei urupare, ka kī tētahi kaikōrero mō HM Courts and Tribunals Service: "Kāore mātou e whakapāha mō te neke tere kia haumaru ai ngā kaiwhakamahi kōti, ā, mai i te tīmatanga o te mate urutā, kua mahi ngātahi me te whakawāwā me ngā hoa, tae atu ki ngā pirihimana, kia whakahaere tonu te pūnaha tika e taea ana. " Kei roto i tēnei ko te rongo mamao i ngā mano kēhi, te pupuri i te Kōti Paheko o Leeds kia tuwhera puta noa, ā, kātahi anō ka tīmata anō i ngā whakamātautau hūri i ngā wāhi maha tae atu ki Te Kōti Paheko."

title: Drakes Drum pōturi te koroni kutukutu ki te neke ki tētahi kāinga hou
summary: Me nekehia tētahi taiwhenua e tata ana ki te 200 ngā kutukutu pōturi mai i te wāhi o tētahi pātaka o mua i Worcestershire.
text: I huraina e Te Whare Hapori o Worcester te koroni i te wāhi o te pāparapara o Drakes Drum o mua i Worcester, e whakaaro ana ki te hanga whare hou. I kī te tumuaki o Bill Tebay: "I mōhio mātou he pōturi ngā kutukutu i runga i te pae, ā, kua whakaae kē mātou ki te whakanoho anō, engari kāore mātou i mōhio ki te tauine." Ka nekehia nga kutukutu ki ngā rerenga motuhake e rua. Ko te kutukutu pōturi he mokomoko e kitea ana i te pātītī roa me ētahi atu taiao haukū. Kua parea e rātau te tūnga i te UK, i raro hoki i te Ture Kararehe me te Taiwhenua 1981, he kore mana te whakamate, te whara rānei i a rātou. Worcester Community Housing is a not-for-profit company set up in 2004 to take over the ownership and management of Worcester City Council's rented homes.

title: E karanga ana a Hoani Kerry kia tukua nga tāngata o Amerika i te whare herehere
summary: Kua karangatia e te Hēkeretari o te Kāwanatanga o Amerika a John Kerry ki a Irana kia tukua e rua ngā tangata whenua o Amerika i hereheretia, ā, ka āwhina ki te kimi i tētahi tuatoru i whakapono ngaro i reira mai i te tau 2007.
text: "Ko ēnei tāngata kei te kāinga me te hunga e aroha ana ki a rātau," te kī a Tēnā Kerry. I hereheretia a Saeed Abedini mo te whakapae i te karanga Karaitiana, a, i runga i nga whakapae matawhenua e kī ana a Mātau he hē. He tangata whenua takirua rāua tahi. I ngaro atu te māngai o mua o TE WĀ, a Robert Levinson i te Motu o Kish, i te takutai o Irana, i te tau 2007. I a ia e uiui ana i te tinihanga hikareti i a ia e ngaro ana. Kua whakapaea e te kāwanatanga o Ārepa he tūtei a Tēnā Hekmati, he whakapae i kī a Tēnā Kerry he hē. I hopukina ia i te tau 2011 i tana haerenga ki Irana ki te toro i ōna kuia, e kī ana tōna whānau, e noho ana i te āhua o Amerika o Te Wānanga. I hurihia tētahi whiu whiu mate mō Tēnā Hekmati i tērā tau, engari kei te whare herehere tonu a ia e tatari ana ki te whakawā anō. Ko te tūmanako i roto i a Rouhani Saeed Abedini, he tangata whenua o Amerika i whānau mai i Ārāna, i noho tata nei i te āhua o Amerika o Idaho, i hereheretia i tērā tau i muri i te whakapaetanga ki te whakatatū i tētahi whatunga inoi Karaitiana i ngā kāinga tūmataiti. E waru tau a ia e anga ana ki te whiu e waru tau. Kua whakahē te wahine a Tāne Abedini, a Naghmeh, i a Perehitini Pakihi mo te kore kōrero mō tana tāne. Kua puta mai a Tēnā Levinson i roto i ngā atahanga me ngā ataata hei whakarau, engari e kī ana a Irana kāore i te mōhio ki tōna wāhi, ā, kāore he whakaaturanga kei te whenua a ia. E kī ana ngā kaitirotiro i te US ka tuwhera pea te perehitini hou o Irana, o Te Rūnanga ki te whakapai ake i te pānga ki a Mātau. I te tau kotahi mano, i I kī a Tēnā Kerry i "tino māharahara" a Mātau mo nga tāngata. "Kua tiria e Perehitini Rūhia i roto i ana whaikōrero me ana uiuinga i ngā marama tata nei tōna tūmanako me tana kitenga ki te whakapai ake i te pātahitanga o te Kāwanatanga o te Whenua Āmāri o Irana ki te ao," te kī a Tēnā Kerry i roto i tana kōrero.

title: Ko te tūpāpaku 'kōhuru' o Totton he pāpā tūpono
summary: Ko tētahi tangata i mate i muri i tētahi tūkinotanga i pūrongotia, "e tūmanako ana ki te noho hei pāpā", kua kī tōna whānau.
text: I kōrerotia a Courtney Jones, e 26, kua mate i te hōhipera i muri i tana kitenga i tētahi kāinga i Totton, i Hēmihi, i te ahiahi o te Hātarei. Kua puta mai tētahi tangata 19 tau ki te aroaro o nga kaiwhakawā o Tarapēke i whakataua ki te kōhurutanga o Tēnā Jones. I whakahokia a Charlie Cooper, o Ashby Road, Totton, kia puta ki te Kōti Karauna o Winchester i te Paraire. I whakaekea a Tēnā Jones, nō Wolverhampton, engari e noho ana i Sheffield, tata ki te 19:45 BST i te wāhitau i Te Huarahi o Salisbury. I roto i tētahi takoha, ka kī tōna whānau he "aroha, pono, wairua wātea", tae atu ki tētahi "pāpā hipanga tino pai me te hoa ki tana kōtiro". E noho tonu ana tētahi kaipōhēhē kōhuru tau 26 tau i te hōhipera i muri i tana pāngia e ia tētahi wāhanga rongoā i a ia e pupuri ana, ka kī te Kāhui Pirihimana. Kua kōrerotia e te tōpana ki te Tari Motuhake mō te Whanonga Pirihimana. Kua tukua tētahi tangata 42 tau me tētahi taitama 15 tau, i hopukina i runga i te whakapae ki te āwhina i te hunga hara, i te wā e haere tonu ana ngā uiui. Ngā Hononga Ipurangi Pātahi HM Courts & Tribunals Service

title: Ko te tikanga kia 'tuwhera' a Jeremy Corbyn i runga i ngā kerēme a te tūtei, e kī ana a Ēnā Me
summary: Ko te tikanga kia "tuwhera, kia pūataata" a Jeremy Corbyn mō ana hoapā whakapae ki tētahi tūtei ā Iwi i roto i ngā tau kotahi mano e waru tekau mā rua.
text: I pātai mai mō ngā kerēme i tūtaki ai tētahi āpiha mōhiohio o Taikarowākia, ā, ka ngana ki te tiki i a Tēnā Kōpia i te wā o te Pakanga Makariri, ka kī a ia me "pūkete" ngā MP mō ngā mahi o mua. Kua kī te Rōpū Mahi e kī ana he māngai a ia he "whakarihariha". E kī ana ngā kaiwhakahaere o Taikarowākia he "tangata whai hua" a ia, engari ehara i te hoa mahi huna, i te kaiwhakamōhio rānei. Ko ngā kōnae i puritia e te Pūranga Ratonga Haumarutanga o Taikarowākia, i pūrongotia tuatahitia e te Rā, ko ngā hoapā taipitopito e kiia ana ki tētahi takawaenga takawaenga me te māngai o Taikarowākia i Rāwāhi i te tau 1986 me te 1987. He maha nga wā i tūtaki ai a ia ki a Tēnā Kōpihi, tae atu ki te Whare o Ngātahi, i a ia e mahi huna ana i te Kāwanatanga o Rāwāhi i raro i te ingoa o Jan Dymic. I tētahi takahanga i Derby, ka pātaitia te pirimia mēnā i whakaae a ia ki tana hēkeretari wawao, a Gavin Williamson, ko te kōnae a Tēnā Kōpia - nāna i whakarite he mōhiotanga ki tōna āhuatanga me ōna tirohanga mō ngā take kaupapahere kē mai i taua wā - me tuku ināianei kia taea ai e te tangata te whakaaro mō ngā kerēme. "Kia haepapa ngā mema pāremata takitahi mō ā rātou mahi i mua," tana whakautu. "Ki te wāhi he whakaaro pēnei, me whakarite ngā MP kia tuwhera, kia pūataata hoki." 'Ka taea te hoapā' I kī atu te kaiwhakahaere o te Pūranga Ratonga Haumarutanga o Taikarowākia ki te AO e huatau ana ā rātou kōnae i kitea a Tēnā Kōpia hei "hoapā" pea, engari kāore i tua atu i tērā. "Ehara a Tēnā Kōpia i te hoa mahi huna e mahi ana mō te ratonga mōhiohio o Taikarowākia," te kī a Svetlana Ptacnikova. "Ko ngā kōnae kei runga i a ia e puritia ana ki tētahi kōpaki e tīmata ana ki te tau tāutunga tuatahi. " I tohaina ngā kōpaki ki ngā hoa mahi huna e tīmata ana ki te tau whā. Mēnā i tutuki pai tana tono hei kaiwhakamōhio, kua katia tana kōnae tangata whai hua, ā, kua whakatuwheratia tētahi mea hou, ā, ka tīmata ki te tau whā." I tāpiri mai a ia: "I noho a ia i roto i taua kāwai taketake - ā, kei te whakaahuatia tonutia ia pērā, he tangata whai hua, i roto i te pūrongo whakamutunga i tukuna e te māngai StB i mua noa iho i tana peia [te māngai] i te UK." Kua whakaae a Labour ki a Tēnā Kōpia i tūtaki ki Taikarowākia me ētahi atu kaiwhakahaere "mō tētahi kapu tī" engari i kī ngā kōrero a Tēnā Wānanga o ana hui ki a ia "kāore he whakawhirinakitanga". I roto i tētahi kōrero i whakaputaina i te wā i whakaputaina ai te pūrongo tuatahi a te Rā, ka kī a Labour "ko te kerēme he māngai, he rawa, he kaiwhakamōhio rānei a Jeremy Corbyn mō tētahi kōwhiringa mōhiohio, he tino hē, he whakarihariha hoki". "Kāore anō a Jeremy kia tuku mōhiohio whai painga ki tēnei, ki tētahi atu takawaenga rānei," ka tāpiritia. I tēnei wā, ka kī tētahi kōrero mō Tēnā Kōpia kua tohutohu te kaiārahi i ngā rōia kia whakapā atu ki te MP Conservative o Ben Bradley i runga i tētahi tweet i kī ai ia he tinihanga. "Kua tohutohu a Jeremy i ngā rōia kia whakapā atu ki a Ben Bradley ki te muku i tana tweet whakarihariha, ki te anga rānei ki te mahi ā-ture," te kī a te kaiwhakaatu. Kua mukua ināianei te tweet, nāna i kī te kaiārahi Mahi "i hokona ngā muna o Ingarangi ki ngā tūtei ā Ihupuku".

title: Ko ngā mahere pāmu hau o Shetland nā Viking Energy i whakaaetia e te kāwanatanga o Pākehā
summary: Kua whakaaetia ngā mahere tautohetohe ki te hanga i tētahi pāmu hau 103-turbine i runga i te whenua moorland i waenganui o Shetland.
text: Ko te pāmu hau, ko ia te tuatoru nui rawa atu i Pākehā, ka whakahaeretia e te kamupene hapori o Viking Energy. I kī ngā kaiwhakahaere he nui rawa te whanaketanga, ā, ka tūkinotia te whenua. I kī ngā kaitautoko ka kohi moni mō ngā moutere, ka waihanga mahi me te āwhina ki te whakatutuki i ngā ūnga pūngao whakahou. Kua whakaaetia e te Minita Pūngao o Fergus Ewing te kaupapa mō te kaupapa. He mahi ngātahi ōrite a Viking Energy i waenganui i tētahi kamupene i whakatūria hei tohu i ngā painga o te hapori Shetland me te hiko hiko o Scottish and Southern Energy (SSE). Ko te pāmu hau 370MW e whai ana ki te whakahiko i ngā kāinga neke atu i te 175,000 ahakoa tata ki te 22,000 te iwi whānui o Shetland. E whakaarohia ana ka taea e te pāmu hau te kawe mai i te moni whiwhinga ā-tau e £30m mō te hapori paetata. I tērā o Mahuru i whakahekea ai e Viking Energy ana marohi, ka whakaheke i te maha o ngā mīhini mai i te 150 ki te 127 me te tapahi i te rohe whenua ka hipokina. I kī te umanga kua whakarongo ki te hapori me te whakarerekē hei whakatau i ngā māharahara. I te wā o Hui tanguru, neke atu i te 300 ngā tāngata i hīkoi i te pokapū o Lerwick ki te whakahē i nga kaupapa. Ināianei kua puritia e nga minita te whakaaetanga mō ngā turbines e 24. I kī te Minita Pūngao o Fergus Ewing: "Mā tēnei pāmu hau e kawe mai ngā painga nui ki te iwi o Shetland." I kī a Bill Manson, te kaiwhakahaere o Viking Energy Partnership: "Na te nui o ngā mahi me te whakaaro whānui i hua ai mātou ki te waihanga i tētahi kaupapa whānui, hōhonu, i hoahoatia ki te taiao ahurei o Shetland i roto i te hinengaro. " He rongo pai tēnei mō Shetland, he rongo pai mō Pākehā me ngā rongo pai mō te whawhai ki te huringa āhuarangi." I kī te pānga 'tē mōhiotia' a David Gardner, te kaiwhakahaere o ngā whakahou ā-uta o SSE: "He rauemi hau tino pai tā Shetland, ko te tikanga ko te pāmu hau o Viking Energy tētahi o ngā pae tino whai hua i te ao." Heoi anō, i whakapuakina e RSPB Pākehā te matekiri kāore i whakahekea anōtia te tauine o te whanaketanga. A, i kī a Kiriuati Brooks, te rangatira nui o te aroha atawhai o te John Muir Trust: "Koinei pea te whanaketanga mahi nui rawa atu i roto i te hītori o Shetland. " E kore e taea te tauine pānga ki te whenua māori rongonui o te ao o ēnei moutere."

title: E anga ana ngā tikiake Wīwī ki te tunu a te kāwanatanga
summary: Kua karangatia e te tinana e whakahaere ana i te ture ārai tāpaetanga "e toru" o Wīwī tētahi rōpū kaiwhakamahi tukutuku ki te whakamārama i ā rātou tikanga tiritiri kōnae.
text: Ka tangohia e Hadopi tōna ingoa mai i te ture 2009 e whakaae ana i ngā mana ki te whakamana i ngā takahi manatārua, ki te tapahi rānei i tō rātou tūhononga ipurangi. Ko te nekehanga te mahi whakaū tino nui mai i te wā i puta ai te ture i nga kaipōrangapū Wīwī. Heoi anō, kāore ngā tangata e 10 i whakaingoatia i roto i te mahi e herea ana kia puta. Ko te ture "e toru ngā tuki me waho" a Wīwī e whakamana ana i a Hadopi ki te tāutu i ngā kaitiri kōnae kore mana me te tuhituhi ki a rātou, e tono ana kia mutu rātou. Ko te hunga kāore e ū ki muri i ngā reta maha ka taea te momotu mai i tō rātou kaituku ratonga ipurangi me te rārangi rārangi mai i te whiwhi ratonga mai i tētahi atu ISP. I te UK, ka whakaritea e te Ture Whakahaere Mamati ētahi whakaritenga ōrite, ahakoa kāore anō kia tino whakamāramatia te āhua o ngā whakamanatanga ka taea. Ka whakamahia te kupu paraikete "ngā tikanga hangarau" hei taupoki i ngā hua tūpono mai i te whakaūnga o ngā tūhononga ipurangi ki te momotu. I kī te mahi ā-ture a Hadopi i roto i ngā marama e iwa kua aroturuki i ngā wāhitau IP Wīwī e 18 miriona. Kua tukuna e ia te tapeke o ngā whakatūpato tuatahi e 470,000 mā te īmēra, me ngā kaiwhakamahi e 20,000 e whiwhi ana i tētahi whakatūpato tuarua mā te mēra. Tata ki te 10 ngā tāngata i āhua waiho i ngā whakatūpato e rua i tonoa kia haere mai ki te whakamārama i a rātau mahi ki te kōwhiringa. I muri i te hui, ka whakatau a Hadopi mēnā ka whai i te mahi ā-ture. Kātahi ka whakatauria e te kaiwhakawā mēnā kua takahia e te kaiwhakamahi te ture. "Ka taea e te tiati te whakamana i te mōrahi 1,500 hōro (£1,326) me te momotu hoki i te kaiwhakamahi mai i te ipurangi mō te mōrahi kotahi marama," te kī a tētahi kaikorero Hadopi. "Tērā anō, ka whakatau pea ia ki te whaina i te kaiwhakamahi me te kore whiu momotu - ka tuku noa rānei i te kaiwhakamahi kia haere." Engari e whakaaro ana a Jeremie Zimmermann mai i te rōpū taunaki tangata whenua Wīwī La Quadrature du Net (Squaring the Net) kāore e taea te utu i tētahi tangata. "E tūmanako ana a Hadopi ka haere mai te tangata ki te whāki, ka kī rātau kua tikiake rawa rātou i ngā rauemi manatārua," tana kī atu ki a Rongokōrero o TE Rongokōrero. Ki te kore te tangata e whāki, kāore rānei e puta mai, ko te whakaaturanga anake ka taea e te kōwhiringa te whakaatu i mua i te tiati he rangatū tau - te wāhitau IP o tētahi rorohiko, ka kī a ia. He maha nga raruraru e puta mai ana i tēnei, e whakapono ana a Tēnā Zimmermann. Tuatahi, ka ngāwari noa iho te pakaru ki te wāhiwera ahokore o tētahi kaiwhakamahi me te roma ihirangi kore mana ki tētahi wāhitau IP mā te whakamahi i tētahi rorohiko kē. "Kāore mātou i te mōhio me pēhea te whiwhinga o tēnei raraunga," te kī a Jeremie Zimmermann. E tūmanako ana a ia he uaua te whakaū i tētahi whakapae, mēnā kāore e taea. E whakahē ana a Hadopi. "Ehara i te mea mō te wāhitau IP anake," te kī a tōna kaikōrero. "Ko tā mātou e whakaatu ana, kua whakatūpatotia te tangata kei te hē tētahi mea e haere ana ki tana whakamahinga ipurangi - he tiritiri kōnae kore mana - ā, kāore anō ia kia mahi i tētahi mea hei pare i a ia i muri i te whakatūpato tuatahi. " Nā reira ko te whakaaturanga te whakatūpato tuarua i whiwhia e te tangata." Kua whakapuakina kētia e te tangata tuatahi ki te urupare ki te "tono" a Hadopi, tōna harakore. Ka whakaaturia e Robert Tollot, he kaiako kura tuarua e 54 tau mai i te rohe o Loire, ki nga kaiwhakahaere o Hadopi i Parihi i te marama o Mahuru. I kī atu a ia ki te pāpāho Wīwī kāore anō ia kia tikiake i ētahi rauemi manatārua, ā, kua kōhuatia tana tūhononga wi-fi. "Kei te tino riri a ia, ā, ka tino kino pea mō Hadopi i te mea ka rongo ētahi atu mō tōna kēhi, ā, ka whakarite pēnei," te kī a Tēnā Zimmermann. "He tino koretake tēnei ture," tana tāpiri mai. "Mō Hadopi ināianei e pā ana ki tēnei rautaki whakamataku - kei te tuku whakatūpato rātou kia whakapono ai te tangata he kino te tiritiri kōnae, engari koia tēnā e taea ana e rātou."

title: Te whakaekenga o Salisbury: Ko te kaipūtaiao o Tūroro Uglev 'i āwhina ki te waihanga i a Novichok'
summary: Kei te whakakāhore tonu a Mohihi i te putanga o tētahi hōtaka rākau matū e kiia nei ko Novichok. Engari he pātai tēnei mo te semantics.
text: Nā Steven RosenbergBBC News I te takutai o te Moana Pango o Rūhia ka tūtaki ahau ki a Tūroro Uglev, he kaipūtaiao nāna i āwhina ki te whakawhanake i ngā māngai io mō te Uniana o Rōpū. "Ko te whāinga o te hōtaka ko te whakaputa i tētahi taonga kaha ake i te māngai io VX - 10 ngā wā kaha ake," tana kī mai ki a au. "Koia hoki tā mātou." E kī ana a Tēnā Uglev, e 71, nāna i waihanga te paitini i whakamahia i roto i te whakaekenga ki a Sergei rāua ko Yulia Skripal i Salisbury i te 4 o Poutāpeta. Kua tāutua i Rūhia e te waehere A-234. "Ka taea e au te kōrero mā ngā pānuitanga tūāwhiotanga maha, te aroaro o te kōauau, mā tōna taumahatanga rāpoi ngota, mai i ngā raraunga tūāwhiorangi katoa i tukuna mai ki a au inā noa nei." Engari mehemea he kaha rawa te māngai io, i pēhea te ora o nga Skripals? E whakapono ana a Tūroro i whiwhi rātau i tētahi "rongoā iti... e tata ana ki te taumata paepae." I te tīmatanga o tēnei wiki ka whakaaturia e te UK te paitini i tukuna "i roto i te āhua wai". Ka pātai atu ahau ki a Vladimir: mēnā ko te māngai io i whakamahia i Salisbury te mea i whakahiatotia e ia, ka pāngia e te paitini tōna hinengaro? "Ehara ēnei i ngā tūpāpaku tuatahi i runga i tōku hinengaro," tana kī mai ki a au. "Mēnā i whakaaro ahau, tērā pea ka taea e au te tatau i te kotahi tekau tāngata kua paitini i a tātau rawa, i roto i ngā āhuatanga rerekē, hei tauira, i te papa whakangungu hōia. Kātahi anō ka pā mai te kēhi o te kaipūtaiao o Aotearoa Zheleznyakov i whakapokea i roto i te taiwhanga." I mahi a Tūroro Uglev i tētahi taiwhanga kāwanatanga i Shikhany, i te rohe o Saratov o Rūhia. I tētahi rā i uru a ia ki tētahi aituā ki te novichok. "I te 'novichok' A-240. Ka kōhuatia te wairewa, a, ka tārewa ki taku ringa matau. I purua e au taku ringa ki roto i te waikawa waikawa, kātahi ka horoia ki tētahi wairewa waikura alkaline, ka purua ki raro i te paipa." "Ka taea e koe te kī atu kua iriiria māua ko ngā Skripals e te novichok kotahi, hāunga i taku take he A-240, ehara i te A-234. Engari ko taku taonga tērā. A, ki te whakatau i te mā o tā rātou tauira whakamātautau, tērā pea i ahu mai tēnei i tētahi rōpu i hangaia e ōku ringa ake. He roa tōna oranga, ā, tata tonu kāore he rā mōnehu." Kei te tohe tonu te kāwanatanga o Rūhia he harakore; ko ngā whakapae ki a ia i runga i te paitini o Salisbury he wāhanga o tētahi kaupapa "Russophobic" me tētahi "whakatoinga" a Ingarangi me Amerika. I te tīmatanga o tēnei marama, i tukuna atu a Yulia Skripal, e 33, i te hōhipera i Salisbury, ā, kua kore tōna pāpā 66 tau i roto i tētahi āhuatanga nui. E kī ana ngā āpiha i kitea te whakamōhiotanga tiketike o te māngai Novichok i to rātau whare. E pupuri ana a Mohihi kāore he whakaaturanga i ūkuia e ia nga Skripals. "He tino tika," te kī mai a Vladimir Uglev ki a au. "E kore rawa koe e whakamatau i te hara o Rūhia. Ki te kore koe e kite i te ngongo whakamātau tūturu kei roto te paitini tūturu." "Engari ko te arorau o ngā takahanga e hua ana ko Rūhia tērā, pērā ki te āhua o te urupare a o tātau kaiārahi. I tere rawa rātau ki te kī 'Ehara i a mātau!' He rite ki te tāhae i tētahi mea i te mākete: ko ia te tuatahi ki te hamama 'Kāore te tāhae i konei, kei reira ia! Hopukina ia!'" E mīharo ana a Tūroro Uglev i te whakapaetanga o tōna whenua ki te mahi i tētahi whakaekenga matū i te UK? "Kāore rawa," tana kī mai ki a au. "Ehara hoki i a Hapa te whakapae. Kai te hē tātau katoa i Rūhia. Mēnā koinei te āhua o tō tātau whenua, he aha te pānga o Hapa ki a ia? Whakakapia a Hapa ki a Margaret Thatcher, ā, ki tōu whakaaro ka rerekē tētahi mea? Kaore e pai. Ko te raruraru, kāore to tātau iwi e hiahia ana ki te huri."

title: Homai he hua hauora koreutu i ngā hōhipera katoa, e kī ana te uniana o ngā tākuta
summary: E rua i roto i ngā whakawhirinaki hōhipera e rima me ngā papa hauora i te UK kāore e hoatu i ngā hua hauora ki ngā tūroro e hiahia ana, i ngā ohorere anake rānei, kua kitea he tūhuratanga a te BMA.
text: E kī ana te uniana o ngā tākuta he hiahia taketake ngā pūpato me ngā tampons, ā, me wātea koreutu ki ngā tūroro. Engari i ētahi whakawhirinaki, i tukuna koreutu ngā heu me te huka heu, ā, kāore ngā hua hauora. Kua tuhituhi te BMA ki NHS Ingarangi e tono ana kia mahia he mahi. Mō tōna tūhuratanga, i pātai atu te BMA ki te tapeke o ngā whakawhirinaki me ngā papa hauora e 223 puta noa i te UK mō te kaupapahere ki te whakarato i ngā hua hauora. I roto i te 187 i urupare, 104 i kī i homai e rātau. Engari e 25 i kī kāore rātau i homai i a rātou, ā, e 54 i kī rātou, engari i roto i ngā ohotata anake, i te iti rānei. Kāore tētahi o ngā whakawhirinaki me ngā poari hauora i urupare i kī he kaupapa here tā rātou i te wā i tohaina ai ngā hua hauora. A, i te 27 ngā whakawhirinaki, kāore he wāhi hei hoko i ngā hua hauora ki hea i runga i te pae. Ko te tūhuratanga a te BMA he wāhanga o tētahi whakahau whānui ake ki te whakamutu i te rawakore o te wā, e arotahi ana ki te whakarite kia nui ake te utu o ngā tūemi hauora. I kī a Eleanor Wilson, he mema o te komiti ākonga tākuta BMA: "Ina noho ngā tūroro i raro i tā mātou tiaki i te NHS, me mātua whakarite mātou kia pōhiritia rātou, kia tiakina hoki. " Mā te kore e whakarato i tētahi mea tino kī ki tō rātou hauora me te oranga, he pānga nui ki tō rātou āhua o te wāriu whaiaro - kei te pupuri mātou i taua rangatiratanga i a rātou. "Ahakoa he pai te whakarato a ētahi hōhipera, i ētahi atu, me anga ngā tūroro ki te whakamā me te tūmanako ka taea e ngā whanaunga te kawe mai i a rātou. " Ki ētahi ehara tēnā i te kōwhiringa, ā, i te nuinga o te wā ka uaua ake mō ngā tūroro tamariki taitamariki me ngā taiohi." I kī a ia ko ngā hua hauora he wāhanga o tētahi mōkī taketake tae atu ki te pepa wharepaku, te kai, te heu me te huka heu, ka whakawāteatia ki ngā tūroro ina haere rātau ki te hōhipera. E kī ana hoki te BMA i te pānga ki te oranga o te tūroro i te utu iti rawa ki te NHS. I kī a Prof Dame Parveen Kumar, te tūru o te poari pūtaiao BMA, me homai e ngā hōhipera he mōhiohio mārama me pēhea e āhei ai ngā tūroro ki te uru ki ngā hua hauora i a rātau e noho ana i te hōhipera. "E whai wāhi ana ngā hōhipera ki te ārahi i te huarahi ki te whiu i te rawakore o te wā, ā, me noho hei tauira mārama o te kauneketanga ka taea i runga i tēnei take hira."

title: Ka whakarewaina e te NHS o Bristol te whakahau ārai taihemahema wahine
summary: Ko te whakahau hou rawa ki te Female Genital Mutilation (FGM) i Bristol kua whakarewaina e te poari tiaki tamariki o te taone.
text: E 2,000 ngā kōtiro i te taone e whakaarotia ana kei te mōrearea te FGM, ā, ka mate pea te toto mate, te mate mimi me te mamae pūmau. He mana kore mana mō ngā tangata whenua o Ingarangi, ngā tangata tūturu rānei kia mauria ki tētahi atu whenua mo te hātepe. Heoi anō, ka rite tonu te mauria o ngā kōtiro ki rāwāhi ki te whai i te FGM i te raumati. Neke atu i te 28 ngā whenua e mahia ana te FGM, tae atu ki ērā i Āhia, i te Rāwhiti o Waenganui, me ētahi wāhi o Āwherika, tae atu ki Somalia me Hūtane. E ai ki te kaunihera o te taone, e whakaarotia ana ko Bristol te tuatoru o te iwi whānui o Hūmārie o UK, i waho o Rāwāhi me Birmingham. Mā te āwhina me te whakahauhau i te hara ka 14 tau i roto i te whare herehere, engari kāore anō kia mahia he mahi i te UK. 'Kāore anō kia hurihia' i whakamahia e Dave McCallum ki te ārahi i te wae parenga tūmatanui o ngā Pirihimana o Avon me Ngā Pirihimana o Te Aotearoa, ā, he kaitiaki ia o Integrate Bristol, he aroha e āwhina ana i ngā rangatahi mai i ētahi atu whenua ki te whakakotahi me te urutau. Ka kī a ia: "Me mahi te tukanga katoa kia whiwhi ai ngā pirihimana i ngā mōhiohio e hiahiatia ana e rātou. " Kāore anō ngā mema o te hapori kia puta i tēnei e tika ana." I whakaae a Nimco Ali, te kaiwhakarewa tahi o te rōpū whakahau Daughters of Eve, kāore ngā hapori i te pūrongo i te FGM. I kī a ia i mahi te rōpū whakahaere ki te whakamātau i ngā whika matua i te wāhanga tūmatanui kia tino nui te raruraru. "Ka taka te onus ki te wāhanga tūmatanui, ehara i te tatari ki te hunga e mau tonu ana i te hara ki te pūrongo i te hara," tana kī. "Kāore anō te hapori kia huri i to rātau tūnga i runga i te FGM, e kī ana rātau he mea ka haere tonu rātau ki te mahi."

title: Coronavirus: Derbyshire siblings complete month-long garden camp
summary: Kua oti i tētahi taitama taitamariki me tōna tuahine e whitu tau te roa o te puni i roto i ta rāua māra hei āwhina i te hōpu.
text: I whakaarohia e Treetops Hospice Care, i Derbyshire, ka pau te utu o te raka coronavirus i te £1.4m i roto i te kohi moni ngaro. I whakatau a William rāua ko Sophie Lacey mai i Borrowash ki te āwhina, ā, neke atu i te £2,200 mā te moe i waho mō te katoa o Aperira. Ahakoa te rangi makariri me te ua e uru ana ki roto i te tēneti, ka oti i a rāua te mahi. I "hari" a William ki te whakaoti i te marama i te tuatahi ka puta ake te ariā i tana rongonga mo te raruraru o te hospice. "I ētahi wā he makariri, ā, i ētahi wā ka uru mai te wai i ngā taha, engari he pai kē atu," tana kī. I honoa ia e tōna tuahine e whitu tau, e whakaaro ana ki te moe i ngā pō maha e taea ana e ia, engari i oti i a ia te marama katoa. I kī to rātau whaea, a Elizabeth Lacey, he āwangawanga tōna i te rerekētanga o te huarere i tērā wiki. "He āhua mātao ake, he mākū, nā reira i āhua māharahara ahau mēnā ka āhua mātao a Sophie i te pō. " I tērā ata ka haere mai a ia, ā, i te whakatio ōna waewae me ōna ringa, engari i te menemene tonu a ia manaaki i a ia," tana kī. Julie Heath, chief executive of Treetops Hospice Care in Risley, said: "We are so grateful to William and Sophie for their incredible camp-out challenge and raising so much money for Treetops. " I waenganui i a rātou, kua nui te kohi mō te hospice ki te whakarato i ngā wiki e toru anō o te tiaki nēhi pō mō ētahi o ā mātou tūroro tino kino i roto i te hapori." Whāia a BBC East Midlands i Facebook, Twitter, Instagram rānei. Tukua ō whakaaro pūrākau ki eastmidsnews@bbc.co.uk.

title: Covid-19: Crowdfunding appeal for Cheltenham theatre
summary: Kua whakatūria tētahi tono huihuinga £100,000 i muri i te korenga o tētahi whare tapere ki te whiwhi i tētahi wāhanga o tētahi tohanga kāwanatanga e £1.57bn.
text: The Cheltenham Playhouse Theatre had applied for £50,000 in funding to help it through the coronavirus pandemic but said it "didn't get anything at all". I kī te kaiwhakaahua a Hemi Wehi, nāna i whakatū te GoFundMe, i whakatau ia ki te "kopere mō ngā whetū" me tana ūnga £100,000, engari he "pupuhi hinengaro" te urupare. I kī te whare tapere "he tino pai ngā moni whiwhinga e haere mai ana, ā, e whakawhetai ana mātou". I kī a Tēnā Wehi, he kaiwhakaahua mārena paetata, e māharahara ana ngā tāngata katoa i roto i ngā toi, ā, "tino mamae". "He mea nui te whare tapere mō to mātau taone, ā, kāore rātau i whiwhi i te moni - i whakarapaina rātau - nā reira i whakatau ahau ki te kopere mō ngā whetū me te tārua i te moni me te kohi i te £100,000," tana kī. "E tūmanako ana ahau ka pōro hukarere." I roto i ngā rā e rua kua hipa, kua kohia e te whārangi GoFundMe te £5,815. I kī a Rob Gill, mai i te whare tapere, ko te pūtea mai i te Pūtea Whakaora Ahurea kia "haere tonu i ngā marama tata nei". "He tino whana i roto i ngā niho i to mātau rongonga kāore i whiwhi i tētahi mea," tana kī. "E mārama ana mātou me whakaweto i te ono marama ki mua, ā, kāore he roma moni whiwhinga kua tīmata kē mātou ki te kai ki roto i ā mātou rāhui." I kī a ia kua "tino āwangawanga" rātau i te tautoko a te iwi whānui, engari me kaua te whare tapere e "whakawhirinaki ki te atawhai me te ohaoha o te iwi i runga i te pāpāho pāpori". "E whakaaro ana mātou e tika ana kia tika te tautoko," tana kī. "E tūmanako ana mātou ka taea e mātou te whai i ētahi hongere whai mana me te mōhio he aha i tūpono, i te wāhi i hē ai mātou, me pēhea hoki mātou e whiwhi ai i taua taumata tautoko me te pūtea kia haere tonu ai mātou."

title: 'Ngā toka o Berlin,' te kī a Elon Musk i a ia e kōwhiri ana i te wheketere Pākehā
summary: Kua kī te rangatira nui o Tesla, a Elon Musk, ko Berlin te wāhi o tana wheketere nui tuatahi o Ūropi i te kaha o ngā mahere whakawhānui a te kaihanga motokā.
text: "Ngā toka o Berlin," te kī a Tēnā Musk, mā te tāpiri i a Tesla e hanga i tētahi pūkaha pūkaha me te pokapū hoahoa i te pūmatua o Tiamana. I kī a Tesla i mua kia tīmata te whakanao i Uropi i te tau 2021. Ka puta mai ngā nekehanga i te umanga, kua nui hoki te haumi ki tētahi wheketere Hainamana, e anga ana ki te whakataetae nui ake i roto i te umanga waka hiko. I pānuitia e Tēnā Musk te pānui i tētahi hui tohu i Tiamana i te Tūrei. He wāhi whakaminenga kē tā te kamupene i Hōrana, engari he nui kē atu ngā mahere mō Tiamana. "E mōhio ana te katoa he tino mīharo te pūkaha Tiamana, ā, koia tērā tētahi wāhanga o te take e kimi ana mātou i tā mātou Gigafactory Europe i Tiamana," tana kī. I kōrerotia hoki e Tēnā Musk ngā mōrea e karapoti ana i te putanga o te UK i te EU mō tana whakataunga, e ai ki a AutoExpress. "Na te rangirua i mōrearea rawa ai te whakanoho i tētahi Gigafactory ki te UK," tana kī atu ki te pukapuka hokohoko. I kī a Tēnā Musk ka noho tata te pānga ki te taunga rererangi hou o Perewa, ā, ā muri ake ka hoatu ētahi atu taipitopito mō ngā mea ka whakaputaina e te wheketere i Twitter. Ko te arotahi ki Tiamana e puta mai ana i waenganui i te pikinga o te hiahia ki ngā motokā hiko i Uropi. I ngā tau e heke mai nei, ko ngā tipu whakanao motokā hiko nui rawa kei Tiamana, Wīwī, Paniora me Itari, e whakaatu ana te tātaritanga umanga. E 16 ngā tipu pūtau pūhiko lithium-ion nui kua whakaūngia, ka tīmata rānei ki ngā mahi i Uropi i te tau 2023. Kua roa a Elon Musk e whakaaro ana ki hea whakanohoia ai tana whare Pākehā e mōhiotia ana he "gigafactory". I puta mai te pānuitanga a Tēnā Musk i te pō Tūtira i mua i te whaikōrero pōti a te Pirimia mai i tētahi wheketere motokā hiko. Kua roa te whāinga o te kaupapahere kāwanatanga ki te kawe mai i tētahi gigafactory pēnei ki te UK, engari kāore anō kia ngau ngā kaiwhakangao ao whānui. Na te raruraru o tētahi Tūpāpaku kāore pea i whakararuraru i te pūtea penapena umanga. Engari ahakoa ko te mahi o nāianei i whakahaua e te kāwanatanga, ka pā ki ngā taki mō ngā tikanga me te take o ngā wāhanga, he uaua ki te umanga motokā me te mahi motokā hiko. Ahakoa i whakapuakina e Tēnā Musk i te tau 2014 tētahi hiahia roa ki te whakatuwhera i tētahi wheketere UK, kāore i tūmanakohia ākuanei. Heoi anō, he nui ake te tūmanako o ngā pūtake umanga ka kōwhiria e Tēnā Musk te UK mō tana rangahau me tana whanaketanga i te UK. Ka noho hoki tēnā ki Tiamana. Ka tae mai te mahere Pākehā a Tesla i te wā e neke whakamua ana te kaihanga motokā me tētahi wheketere $2bn (£1.6bn) i Shanghai. E kimi ana te umanga ki te whakarewa i te whakanaotanga i Haina, te mākete motokā nui rawa o te ao, i reira i whara ai ngā hoko i ngā utu i whakaohotia e te pakanga hokohoko a US-Haina. Ka hangaia e te pānga o Shanghai ngā motokā Tauira 3 me te Tauira Y. I whakaritea e te kaihanga aunoa ana waka hou i hangaia e Haina ki te pāpāho paetata i tēnei wiki. Heoi anō, kua pākaha a Tesla ki ngā tau o ngā hinganga, e whakakī ana i ngā rangirua kaiwhakangao me te maka i tētahi kōruru ki runga i ōna hea i roto i ngā tau tata nei. Kāore anō te umanga kia huri i tētahi hua ā-tau, ahakoa i whakapūketetia ngā hua tōrunga i ngā hauwhā whakamutunga e rua o te 2018. I tērā tau, ka mahi a Tesla i ngā hipanga whakatuki ki te rītaha i ngā utu, ki te tapahi i ngā mahi e hia mano me te whakahaere i ētahi atu whakapau moni.

title: Tekau i whiua mo te maunu rongoā ki roto i nga whare herehere e te rīpene
summary: E whitu tau me te rua marama i hereheretia ai te kaiārahi o tētahi rōpū i mau rongoā me ngā waea ki roto i ngā whare herehere mā te whakamahi i te rīpene.
text: I whakaritea e te tāhae patu o mua, a Kuki Hickinbottom, e 35, nga rerenga mai i muri i nga tūru, ka korerotia ki te Kōti Karauna o Birmingham. I purua e tana rōpū ngā tūemi rāhuitia e wātea ana ki roto i ngā whare herehere ki te West Midlands me Scotland. I whakapiria ngā mōkī ki ngā aho hī ika, ā, ka rere ki runga i ngā pakitara o te whare herehere. E iwa ētahi atu i whiua. I whakawāteatia te rōpū ki te whakarite i ngā rerenga taiapa e 49, ahakoa e whakapono ana ngā pirihimana he teitei ake pea te tau tūturu. I kitea hoki he hara rātau ki ngā "maka" e whā - me tētahi o te rōpū, te tuakana o Kuki Hickinbottom i kitea i runga i te CCTV me tētahi matau whakapaipai, kua rite ki te kohikohi i ngā taonga mai i roto i te whare herehere. Ko ngā rākau me tētahi pouaka Freeview i mau noa iho te rōpū, e ngā kāmera i whakatūria ki te whakaahua i ngā kararehe i waho o HMP Hewell i Worcestershire. E whakaatu ana ngā whakaahua i ngā tāngata tokorua i roto i tētahi parae, e whakarite ana i tētahi taiapa mo te rere, i mua i te tukunga atu ki runga i te taiepa ki te taunga o te whare herehere. I roto, ko ngā mōkī - ko ētahi o ēnei i tonoa motuhake - i tīkina e ngā herehere. I whakaaturia e te CCTV o te whare herehere ētahi atu e haere ana ki o rātau pūtau me te haere atu me ngā pōkai. Tae atu ki ngā rongoā me ngā waea, ka tukua e te rōpū ngā rākau, ngā tīwiri, ngā kāri sim, me tētahi pouaka Freeview me te mana mamao. I hereheretia te kaihautū taiapa o Mervyn Foster, e 36, o Tipton, West Midlands, mo te ono tau me te waru marama mo tana wāhi i roto i te kaupapa. I kīia ko ia te kaiwhakahaere matua o te rōpū i waho. I te mahi a Hickinbotton i tētahi whiu i HMP Featherstone i Staffordshire, ā, i muri iho ko Hewell, i a ia e whakarite ana i ngā whakarato. Tērā pea ka pīrangi koe: Ko ngā hara, i mahia i waenganui i a Hōngongoi 2015 me Me i tēnei tau, i tū hoki i ngā whare herehere i Birmingham, Yorkshire, Cheshire, Liverpool, me Perth. I tautohe rāua ko Hickinbottom rāua ko Foster ki te whakatupu i ngā tūemi rāhuitia ki te whare herehere, me te whakatupu ki te whakarato i ngā taonga psychoactive. I hereheretia te tuakana o Kuki Hickinbottom, e 50 tau, a Hoani, mo te whā tau me te waru marama, i te wā i whiua tōna "ringa matau" ko John Quinn, e 35, kia whā tau me te waru marama. I whakaae rātau ki aua whakapae ōrite, me te whakatupu ki te maka i tētahi tuhipānui ki te whare herehere. Ko tana hoa 32 tau, ko Lisa Hodgetts, mai i Tividale, West Midlands, i whakaae ki te horoi moni, ā, i hoatu ki a ia he wā whare herehere 16 marama i whakatārewatia. 'Gamechanger' Passing sentence, Judge Roderick Henderson said: "Prisons are difficult enough places to run - they contain people who are dangerous and vulnerable. " Mā te whakarato i ngā mea ki roto i te whare herehere kāore e tika ana kia noho i reira - ngā rongoā, ngā waea, ngā utauta me ērā atu mea - e whakawehi ana i te whakahaere tika... ā, ka waihanga i ngā mōrea tūturu o te tutu me te ngaronga o te mana me te whakatinanatanga". I kī a Gareth Sands, kāwana i HMP Hewell, he "kaihuri kēmu" nga rīpene "i haere mai i te wāhi kore". I taea e te rōpū te takahi i ngā paenga "tata ngāwari", ka kī a ia, kātahi anō ka whakamaheretia ngā hātepe i te oho o te kēhi. Tokowhā ētahi atu tāngata i whiua i muri i te tautohetohe hara: ko Yvonne Hay, 41, o Walsall, i hereheretia mo te rua tau me te whā marama i muri i te whakawāteatanga ki te kawe mai i ngā tūemi rāhuitia ki te whare herehere, me te whakatupu ki te whakarato i ngā taonga hinengaro.

title: Haere huaketo: Ina huri whakamate ngā mahi YouTube
summary: I hiahia a Monalisa Perez, 19, me tana hoa tāne ko Pedro Ruiz, 22, kia rongonui i runga i te YouTube.
text: Engari tae noa ki tētahi mahi whakaharahara i te 26 o Pipiri e pā ana ki tētahi pū me tētahi pukapuka mārō i mate ai a Pedro, he iti noa iho te tohu i roto i a rātau ataata i te tawhiti o te haere kia whiwhi ai rātau ki te rongonui tuihono. He iti iho i te rua marama te tukuatu ataata a te tokorua mai i te āhua o Amerika o Minnesota e tuhinga ana i o rāua oranga ia rā. Ahakoa i whakaahuatia e rātau ētahi māminga iti - e puehu ana a Monalisa i tētahi donut ki te paura pēpi i mua i te whāngai ki a Pedro, hei tauira - he āhua kino noa iho. I roto i tētahi ataata i whakaahuatia i te hōhipera, ka mōhio rātau he tama ta rāua pēpi hou. "Whakaarohia ina 300,000 ngā kaiohauru," te whakaaro a Monalisa i roto i tētahi ataata i tukuatu i tētahi ataahua ngahau i te rā i patua ai a Pedro. "Ka pēnei te tangata 'aue, e toku atua, kia ora!'" Ināianei ka anga atu a ia ki tētahi whakapae patu tangata tuarua i runga i tētahi mahi pōhēhē i kīia ko te ariā o tana hoa tāne ki te whakarewa i to rātau kōtaha. I pūhia e ia tētahi pū Desert Eagle mai i te tawhiti tata, i a ia e pupuri ana i tētahi encyclopaedia i mua i tōna poho. I whakamātauria e ia i mua, a, i whakaaro ia ka parea ia e te pukapuka mātotoru, engari ka mātakitaki te tamaiti e toru tau a te tokorua me ngā kaimātakitaki e tata ana ki te 30 i a ia e pūhia ana he matā mate. Mai i te whakarewatanga o YouTube i te tau 2005, kua kawea e ia ngā tāngata e hiahia ana ki te mahi i ngā mea i runga i te kāmera mō tētahi wāhanga rongonui tuihono iti. Engari i te tau 2012, i ngāwari kē atu te whiwhi a ngā kaitāpae i tētahi wāhanga o ngā moni pānuitanga e whakaputaina ana e rātou mai i ngā ataata. I waihangatia ngā studios, ā, i tukuna he moni hei whakarite i tētahi whare whetū e hiahia ana ki te hanga ihirangi hou, māia hoki kia mau tonu ai ngā pāwhiri - me ngā tāra pānuitanga - e takahuri ana. I te nuinga o te wā he tuakiri pāpāho rātau i tō rātou ake tika, me ngā māngai me ngā ataata i hangaia mārire. E hia rau mano ētahi atu, pēnei i te tokorua o Minnesota, e noho ana i raro i a rāua, ā, e ngana ana ki te kohikohi i ngā whai ake. He iti noa iho te angitu o te tokomaha. Engari ko ngā utu o te rironga ko tētahi o ngā torutoru e whakanui ana, he tino whakahauhau ki te ngana tonu. (E ai ki te Wānanga, ko ngā whetū YouTube 12 tino whiwhinga tiketike i mahia he $70.5m mai i June 2015 - June 2016.) Ahakoa he tūmomo noa iho ngā mahi o tētahi whenua tino rerekē o ngā ataata i hangaia e YouTubers - mai i te tunu kai ki te kōrero me te pūoro ki te ātaahua - e whiwhi ana rātou i ngā tirohanga miriona. 'Tino wehi kua kitea e au' E kī ana a Dr Arthur Cassidy, tētahi hinengaro hinengaro o Ingarangi e tohunga ana ki te pāpāho pāpori, ka taea e ngā ataata o ngā mahi mōrearea te whakaawe i ngā tāruatanga taitamariki "kāore anō kia whiwhi i te taumahi hinengaro kia tino mate ai tēnei". "E mōhiotia ana he 'ngahau', he 'mīharo', he 'mōrearea tiketike' rānei. Ko ngā mea katoa e tino mōrearea ana, ka haere te adrenaline, ā, ka whakatū i ngā kēmu tino whakataetae e tākaro ana i roto i te autahitanga o te taiohitanga." Engari ko te mea i whakamātauria e te tokorua o Minnesota ki te whakaahua ko "tētahi o ngā take tino wehi" kua puta mai i a ia. Ko ngā mataku ka taea e te rangatahi e mātakitaki ana mai i te kāinga te whakamātautau, engari he rākau iti iho te kaha kia kite mēnā ka mahi, he "tino hōhonu", e kī ana a Dr Cassidy. Ehara i te mea hou te mahi i ngā mea mōrearea mō te aro tuihono. I te tau 2011, ka hinga a Acton Beale o Ahitereiria ki tōna matenga i muri i te ngana ki te "papa" i runga i te paepae o tētahi papa tuawhitu i Brisbane. Ko te auau papa - e pā ana ki ngā tāngata e takoto ana i ngā wāhi rerekē, engari ko te nuinga o te wā haumaru - i whakawhāititia ki ngā atahanga tonu i tukuatu ki Facebook. Engari i tohu te kēhi o Ahitereiria me pēhea te nui o te ahurea "mahi" ipurangi mō te aro atu ki te tūkinotanga, ā, mai i taua wā he maha ngā āhuatanga tuihono kua mate puta noa i te ao. Ko te tikanga, kāore he taitapa o YouTube, ā, ka taea e ngā ataata mahi mai i ngā wāhi katoa te haere huaketo i te ao whānui. Nō nā tata nei i whakarewaina e te Manatu Roto o Rūhia tētahi whakahau "kiriāhua haumaru" hei urupare ki tētahi ahurea paetata e tipu haere ana i a rātau mahi. I roto i tētahi ataata i mātakina e ngā tāngata e hia miriona, ka whakamāramatia e Alexander Chernikov tōna tarau ki te ahi, a, ka peke atu i tētahi whare papa e iwa ki te hukarere. Mā ēnei momo mahi e āhua mārire ai ngā māminga o ngā māminga pouaka whakaata mai i tētahi wā tōmua-YouTube, pēnei i ērā o te whakaaturanga ao rangirua o TE WĀ. E kī ana ngā kaiwhakawāwā me nui ake te mahi a YouTube, nā Google, hei tango i ngā ataata o ngā mahi tino mōrearea. I kī te kamupene i "wehi ki te mōhio ki te tūkinotanga i Minnesota" ā, kei te whānau ōna whakaaro. Kāore he ataata o taua mahi e whakapono ana kua tukuatu. I kī atu tētahi kaikawe kōrero ki te AO ka tangohia ngā ihirangi i tohua e ngā kaiwhakamahi e whati ana ture. E kī ana tana kaupapahere mō ngā ihirangi tūkino, mōrearea hoki, ka tātuhia te raina ki ngā ihirangi "e hiahia ana ki te whakaoho i te tutu, ki te whakahauhau rānei i ngā ngohe mōrearea, ture rānei e mōrearea ana ki te tūkino ā-tinana, ki te mate rānei". Ko ngā tauira o ngā mea ka rāhuitia ko ngā ataata e whakaatu ana i "te hanga poma, ngā kēmu kōaro, te whakamahi rongoā mārō, ētahi atu mahi rānei e pā mai ai he whara nui".

title: E pātai ana ngā mātua o Hertfordshire i te kaupapa here waka kura
summary: E kī ana ngā mātua whakahauhau ka whakawāteatia e tētahi kaupapa here waka kura hou kua marohitia ki ngā tamariki e noho tata ana ki ngā taitapa o Hertfordshire.
text: I tēnei wā, ka tukuna e te kaunihera he waka kura koreutu ki te kura tuarua o Hertfordshire tata rawa. I tua atu i te 2012, e hiahia ana ki te tuku waka ki te kura tata rawa, ahakoa kei tua atu i te rohe o te rohe. I kī te Kaunihera o te Takiwā o Hertfordshire me huri te pūnaha nā ngā herenga pūtea. He matua a Jacinthe Betts e noho ana i Lilley i Hertfordshire, e tata ana ki te rohe o Bedfordshire. Wāhi manakē i tēnei wā, ka taea e ngā tamariki o tēnei kāinga te tiki pahi koreutu ki tō rātou kura tuarua tata rawa atu i Hitchin. I raro i te pūnaha hou ka taea tonu e rātau te whiwhi wāhi ki te kura o Hitchin, engari ka whiwhi waka koreutu anake ki tō rātou kura tata rawa, arā i Luton. I kī a Ms Betts mō ngā kāinga e 17 i Hertfordshire, kāore tō rātou kura tuarua tata rawa i roto i te takiwā. "I tēnei wā he ratonga tino pai tā mātou e whakarato ana i te waka ki tō mātou kura manakē tata rawa [Hertfordshire]," tana kī. "Our children will have grown up through the school system already having six years education within a Hertfordshire school. " Ka whakawhanakehia e rātau to rātau pūtake whakahoahoa, ā, i te mutunga o te rā, ka utua e mātau he tāke ki Hertfordshire. We are Hertfordshire residents and we feel that we have entitlement to Hertfordshire schools." The county council has carried out consultations and has tried to put together a wider spread of provision but Councillor Richard Thake, the Conservative councillor in charge of education at Hertfordshire County Council, said that the system had to change because of financial constraints. 'Ngā āhuatanga whakamāmā' "He tino mārama te tūnga ā-ture," tana kī. "Tērā tētahi whakawā e kiia nei ko te Whakawā o Kākāriki e tohe ana mō ngā take whakauru, e kore e kitea ngā rohenga o te rohe. Ko te kura tata rawa te kura tata rawa. "Mō te maha, he maha nga tau i whai whakaaro ai a Hertfordshire e te kaiwhakahaere o te mātauranga, ā, kua whakahaeretia e mātou taua ngākau pai ki te kī ko te kura tata rawa ko tētahi i roto i Hertfordshire, " tana kī. " Kāore e taea e mātou tēnei ināianei. Kāore anō mātou kia whiwhi i te £4.9m ki te £5m e whakapau ana mātou i tēnei wā ki te waka ngāwari." The new policy will not affect those children who are already receiving discretionary transport as they will continue to get free transport to their nearest Hertfordshire school.
