I kī a Tēnā Thake ka whakaarohia e te kaunihera ia kēhi. "If there are extenuating circumstances, then a parent can make an application and the director can make a decision. Ehara tēnei i te rarau noa iho i te tatau. E mōhio ana mātou he huringa nui tēnei nā te mea kua whakamahia e ngā mātua." Kua puta kē te kaupapa here i ngā huarahi me ngā pae mātauranga o te kaunihera, ā, ka haere tētahi tūtohutanga ki te kāpata, koia te tinana whakatau. Kia oti rā anō taua tukanga, e kore te kaupapahere e kaha.

title: I kī ngā tākuta he pūkei te mate pukupuku whekau o te wahine Herefordshire
summary: I kōrerotia e tētahi wahine 35 tau "tino tika" e tana GP ko te toto i roto i ōna tūru i takea mai i ngā pūkei i kitea he mate pukupuku whekau tōna.
text: I muri i te waru marama "hoki mai" ki te pokanga, ka tonoa a Beth Hewitt ki tētahi kaitohutohu, nāna i kite he puku. I kī a Mrs Hewitt ka kī atu ngā GP ki a ia: "He tamariki rawa koe mō tētahi mea pēnei i te mate pukupuku." Ko te whaea o te tokorua, mai i Hereford, i pokaina hei tango i te puku i Aperira, ā, kei te whakahau i ngā tāngata kia tirohia ngā āhuatanga. Neke atu i te 2,500 ngā tāngata i raro iho i te 50 e kitea ana he mate pukupuku whekau i te UK i ia tau, e ai ki te aroha Bowel Cancer UK. I muri i te kitenga i te toto i roto i ōna tūru i te raumati o te tau 2018, i whakaritea tuatahitia e Mrs Hewitt he kirīmi mō te hemorrhoids. "I tohetohe, ka mutu mō te wiki, ā, i muri i te wiki ka haere anō," tana kī. Ahakoa kāore he tohu anō e pā ana ki te mate pukupuku whekau, i te roanga o te wā, ka māharahara te kaihaumanu mahi he tohu te toto o tētahi mea nui ake. "Ki taku whakaaro i hoki ahau ki (taku GP) tata ki te rima, e ono rānei ngā wā... i te kī noa iho rātau, 'kāo he tamariki rawa koe mō tētahi mea pēnei i te mate pukupuku'," te kī a Mrs Hewitt. "E whakaaro ana ahau 'ka whakaaro rātau he āhua pōrangi ahau nā te mea kei te māharahara ahau ki tētahi mea'," tana tāpiri mai. I muri i te whiwhinga o tētahi tohutohu tūmataiti, he kopikopiko me ngā karapa a Mrs Hewitt hei whakaū i te tātaritanga, he mea i whakaahuatia e ia he "whakamāmā". Tata ki te 18cm (7in) o tōna whekau i tangohia i te wā o te mahinga, ā, kāore anō kia hiahiatia he rongoā anō, ka kī a ia. Tērā pea ka hiahia koe ki: Ko tētahi pēke stoma rangitahi, e tangohia ana i te Paraire, kāore anō kia aukati i tana hokinga ki te whare tākaro i ia rā mō ngā "peke me ngā peke pouaka". "Ka tohe atu ahau ki tētahi tangata mēnā kei te whai tohu rātou kia haere ki tō GP me te kore e whakaae ki te kāo," te kī a Mrs Hewitt. I kī te Rōpū Rongoā o Hereford, e whakahaere ana i ngā pokanga e rua i toroa e Mrs Hewitt, kāore i taea te kōrero mō ia take e pā ana ki ngā tūroro, engari i tūmanako ka "whakanuia te mōhiotanga" i te pūrākau. "Mēnā he māharahara tētahi tūroro mō tētahi tātaritanga tuatahi, mēnā rānei ka haere tonu ngā āhuatanga, ka hoki mai i muri i te rongoā, i te huringa rānei, ka tohe mātou ki a rātou kia whakapā atu ki tō rātou GP ki te whakarite i tētahi wāhui anō," te tāpiri mai a te kaikōrero. I tohutohu hoki a Bowel Cancer UK i ngā tāngata whai tohu kia haere wawe ki tō rātou GP. "Ka kite tō tākuta i ngā tāngata whai āwangawanga whekau i ia rā, nā reira kāore he mea hei whakamā. Ka taea e ia te whakaora i to ora," te kī a te kaikōrero. Whāia a BBC West Midlands i Facebook, i Twitter, me te waitohu mō ngā whakahōutanga rongokōrero paetata hāngai tonu ki tō waea.

title: I kitea he hara te tino hoa tāne o te whakaeke waikawa o Lowestoft
summary: Kua kitea he hara te tino hoa tāne hae o te tangata ātaahua me tētahi tangata tuarua ki te whakatakoto me te mahi i tētahi whakaekenga waikawa ki a ia.
text: I whakawāteatia a Anthony Riley, 26, o Raglan Street, Lowestoft, me tana hoa whakapae, a Leon Thompson, 39, o Alma Road, Lowestoft, i te Kōti Karauna o Ipswich. I ngaro tētahi taringa o Adele Bellis, e 22 i taua wā, kua pakira tētahi wāhanga, ā, kua mahue i a ia te māuiui pūmau "huri ora". Ka whiua a Riley rāua ko Thompson i te 5 o Whiringa ā-rangi. I roto i tētahi kōrero, ka pōhiritia e Ms Bellis nga whakataunga, e kī ana kua herea ia ki te whanonga "taikaha, whakanao, hae" a Riley mai i te 16 o ona tau. Ka kī a ia: "He uaua ki a au te whakapuaki i te mamae i pāngia e au, he iti noa iho ōku roimata e toe ana... engari e tino whakaaro ana ahau ki te ora i tōku oranga, ā, ka ora ahau i tēnei whakamatautau." I rongo te kōti ko te whakaekenga waikawa te whakamutunga o tētahi whakahau e ono marama te roa a Riley. I kī te rōia a Andrew Jackson i a ia "i pau i te hae i te āhua o tana whakauru ki tētahi atu tangata" i te mutunga o to rāua whanaungatanga e whitu tau. I Aperira o tērā tau, ka whakaritea e Riley kia okaina e te hoa whakapae a Thompson ki te kanohi o Ms Bellis, ka mahue i te ātaahua ki te riu. E toru me te hāwhe marama i muri iho, i te 14 o Aotearoa, ka whakaritea e ia te whakaekenga waikawa pūngāwhā i tētahi tūnga pahi i Lowestoft. E toru wiki i te hōhipera a Ms Bellis, ā, mai i tērā wā ka pā ki ngā hononga kiri me te hanga anō i te kanohi. Tērā pea ka haere tonu te pokanga puta noa i tōna oranga, ka rongo te Kōti Karauna o Ipswich. I kawea te whakaekenga waikawa e Jason Harrison, 27, o Princes Road, Lowestoft, kua whakaae kē ki te whakatupu i tētahi wai waikura me te whāinga. I kitea he hara a Riley ki te hereheretanga teka, ki te whakatupu i tētahi wai whakakino me te whakatupu hei whakararuraru i te tinana. I kitea he hara a Thompson ki te whara e pā ana ki te whakaekenga maripi i te 29 o Āperira 2014, he whakatupu hei hoatu i tētahi wai whakakino me te whakatupu kino i te tinana. Ko tētahi tangata tuawhā, ko Daniel Marshall, e 39, o Rose Court, Lowestoft, i whakaae i mua i te whakatupu i te tūkinotanga kino o te tinana, ki te mahi i ngā mahi i runga i te whāinga, ki te whakataka hoki ki te ara o te tika.

title: Ka toa te kaiwaiata o Prague i te whakawhiwhinga whakaahua whaiaro ā-motu e £20,000
summary: Kua whiwhi tētahi rehetoi mai i te Whenua o Taikarowākia i te £20,000 mo te toa i tētahi whakataetae whakaahua whaiaro.
text: Ko Jan Mikulka, e mahi ana i Prague, e toa ana i te Royal Society of Portrait Painters' Self Prize tuatahi. I huaina ko Self Portrait, i rārangihia te wāhanga mai i ngā mahi e 946 i tukuna e ngā kaiwaiata e 635. "Mā tēnei whakaahua whaiaro koe e kawe mai mā tōna pūkenga hangarau me tōna mana whakapuaki," te kōrero a te kaiwhakawā o Charlotte Mullins o Art Quarterly. "Kei te mōhio koe kei te tū koe i mua i te rehetoi, e mātakitaki ana i a ia e arotahi ana ki tōna āhua - ko ōna whatu e kōhukihuki ana, ka pēhi tahi ōna ngutu i roto i te ārohi," tana tāpiri mai. E whakahau ana te whakawhiwhinga i ngā kaiwaiata kia "pana i ngā rohenga me te whakamātautau" ki te waenga me te āhua o te peita, tātuhi rānei. I toa a Mikulka i te whakawhiwhinga manuhiri i te Whakawhiwhinga Poutū o te Taiwhanga Poutū o te National Portrait i te tau 2011 mō tana whakaahua whakaahua o tōna hoa roa, o Jakub. Ko tana mahi hou rawa, ko Self Portrait, e whakaaturia ana i te whakaaturanga ā-tau a te Royal Society i ngā Taiwhanga Mall o Rāwāhi mai i te 9-24 o Me, ko ētahi atu kaiwhiwhi whakawhiwhinga Royal Society ko Mark Roscoe, i whiwhi i te £10,000 mō tana whakaahua o Olivia Roberts, i peitatia e ia i muri i tana whiwhinga i te Royal Society's Changing Faces Prize i tērā tau. This year's Changing Faces Prize went to Andrew James VPRP for his portrait of his father. I whakatūria te paraihe mō ngā tāngata me ngā whānau e noho ana me ngā āhuatanga, ngā tohu, ngā riu rānei e pā ana ki tō rātou āhua.

title: Poor white pupils 'need best teachers and long days'
summary: E hiahiatia ana e ngā tamariki mahi mā ngā kura whai tohutohu hei kawe mai i ngā kaiako kounga tiketike me ngā rā roa ake kia āhei ai ngā tauira ki te mahi i ā rātou mahi kāinga, e kī ana tētahi komiti whakawhiti-rōpū o ngā MP.
text: Nā Sean CoughlanBBC News te korero mātauranga o te Komiti Tīpako Mātauranga e tirotiro ana i te whakahekenga o ngā tamariki mā rawakore i Ingarangi. He kino kē atu ā rātou hua whakamātautau i ngā tauira pango, Āhia rānei. E whakaahua ana te pūrongo a te MP i ngā tamariki mā rawakore hei "rōpū mahi iti rawa i te whenua". Ko te pūrongo - Underachievement in Education by White Working Class Children - e tohu ana he raruraru "tūturu, tohetohe hoki". Āputa whiwhinga Kei te takamuri kē ngā tamariki mā rawakore ina tīmata rātau ki te kura tuatahi, ā, ka whānui ake te āputa i a rātau e pakeke ana. I ia tau kura, ka kite tēnei āputa whiwhinga i a rātau e taka kē atu ana i muri i ngā tauira mā rangatira me ngā tamariki rawakore mai i te iwi iti. Ko te pikinga o ngā hua i waenganui i ngā tauira pango me Āhia rawakore e whakaatu ana "ka taea te whakapai ake", e kī ana ngā MP. Ko tēnei pūrongo "e pupuri ana i tētahi whakaata ki te āhuatanga - kāore e ngana ana ki te whakatika i te raruraru", engari ka tūtohutia ētahi tūtohutanga hei whakaiti i tēnei whakahekenga. He pai ake te mahi a ngā tauira rawakore o ngā papamuri iwi katoa i roto i ngā kura tino pai. E whakaatu ana te pūrongo e 50% o ngā tauira e āhei ana ki ngā kai kura koreutu ka eke ki tētahi tohu o ngā GCSE pai e rima mēnā ka haere rātou ki tētahi kura i whakatauria e Ofsted hei tino pai. Ka whakataurite tēnei ki te 25% anake i roto i tētahi kura i whakatauria he koretake. E tautohe ana te rīpoata he rōpū tino iti, ko ngā tamariki mā rawakore te tino whiwhi i te urunga ki ngā kura tino pai me ngā kaiako tino pai. E whakataetae ana mō ngā kaiako Me whai tohutohu ki te tiki i ngā kaiako tino kounga ki ngā kura e āwhina ana i ēnei tauira, e tautohe ana te pūrongo. "E anga ana ngā kura ki tētahi pakanga mō ngā rauemi me ngā pūmanawa, ā, me pai ake te wā e toa ai te hunga e mahi ana i ngā hapori mā rawakore," e kī ana. There are practical forms of help, says the report, such as allowing time and space for children to do their homework at school, which could mean extending the school day. I pōhiritia te utu ākonga, e ūkui ana i ngā moni ki ngā tamariki rawakore, tērā pea ka rerekē. I rongo te komiti i nga whakaaturanga mo nga take o tēnei whakahekenga. I miramiratia e te rangatira o Ofsted a Tā Michael Wilshaw te hiranga o ngā mātua tautoko, ahakoa te moni whiwhinga. "He uaua ake te rawakore o te tūmanako ki te whakatutukitanga mātauranga i te rawakore rawakore, ahakoa he uaua tērā. Ā, ka tīmata ēnei tūmanako i te kāinga." I kī atu ngā māngai o te Kaunihera o Te Taone o Te Taone ki ngā MP tērā ētahi wāhanga o te taone e "whakaahuatia ana te ahurea o te karaehe mahi mā e ngā wawata iti me ngā āhuatanga tōraro ki te mātauranga". Engari i whakakāhoretia e te Tūāpapa o Hohepa Rowntree, nāna i rangahau te rawakore, te ariā o ngā hiahia mātua iti, engari i whakapae kē i te kore whakapono i waenganui i ngā whānau mahi mā. I hiahia rātau kia tino whiwhi a rātau tamariki, engari he iti iho te tūmanako i ngā whānau o waenganui ka taea e rātau te "whakatutuki i ā rātou whāinga". I miramiratia e Prof Alison Wolf, mai i King's College London, te hononga i waenganui i ngā whakamōhiotanga o te whakatutukitanga i te kura me te wāhi i ngaro ai ngā mahi mahi tūturu. "He maha ngā mahi me ngā mahi i noho ai te papa o te oranga whānau mahi mā mō ngā tekau tau me ngā whakatupuranga maha kua ngaro, ā, kāore anō kia tino whakakapia," tana kī. I kī te manukura o te komiti o Kiriuati kāore pea ngā mātua mahi e mōhio ki te nui o te rerekētanga o te mākete mahi - ā, ka anga atu a rātau tamariki ki tētahi wā uaua ki te kore rātau e tutuki i te kura. "Tērā pea i kino rātau ki te kura, i mahue wawe - engari i pai tonu te mahi mō rātau anō, ā, ka hē rātau ki te whakaaro ka taea e a rātau tamariki te mahi anō," tana kī. I kī te Kotahitanga o ngā Kaiako o te Motu e honoa ana te whakatutukitanga ki te rawakore, "E kore ngā tamariki mai i ngā papamuri tūkino e rite ki ētahi atu mō te take māmā mēnā kāore anō koe kia kai i te ahiahi, i moe i tō ake moenga, i parakuihi rānei, ka pā tērā ki tō kaha ki te ako," te kī a te hēkeretari ahuwhānui o Te Wānanga o Aotearoa. I kī te hēkeretari mātauranga kōruru o Labour, a Tristram Hunt: "E tika ana te pūrongo ki te tohu ko te mea tino nui mō te whakapiki paerewa ko te whakarite i tētahi kaiako tino whakahauhau, tino pūkenga hoki i ia akomanga." Engari i whakatūpato a ia ko te tikanga o tēnei "kia tika te mātauranga o ngā kaiako katoa, ā, ka haere tonu ki te hanga i ō rātou pūkenga". "Koinei te tikanga e whakawhāiti ai tātau i te āputa whiwhinga i waenganui i ngā tamariki kua tangohia me ērā atu." I kī tētahi kaikōrero o te Tari Mātauranga e whakarato ana te utu ākonga i te £2.5bn ia tau hei tautoko i ngā tauira tūkino, ā, ko ngā aronui pēnei i te Whakaako Tuatahi e tono ana i ngā kaiako pai mō ngā wāhi uaua. "Ko te whāinga nui rawa o a mātau whakahōu ko te whakapai ake i te whiwhinga o ngā tamariki rawakore i roto i te iwi - ā, kei te kite kē mātou i ngā whakapainga tūturu," tana kī. "Kua ngāwari kē atu mātou mō ngā kura katoa, ehara i ngā kura me ngā kura koreutu anake, ki te whakaroa i te roanga o te rā kura."

title: Mahere tāpoi mō te hoko o Te Pātītī i Lincoln
summary: Kei te tāruatia ngā mahere hei hoko i tētahi whare whakangungu o mua i Lincoln me te whakawhanake mō te whakamahi hapori me te tāpoi.
text: E ngana ana te Kaunihera o Te Taone o Lincoln ki te hoko i te Pātītī mō te wā tuarua, me te utu ārahi e £1m. I whakamahia mō ngā takahanga me ngā hui i muri i te hokonga a te kaunihera i te tau 1986, engari i kī te kaunihera kāore e taea te haumi ki te whare wātea ināianei. E whakaaro ana te Rōpū Pēke a Tā Hohepa me ētahi rōpū whakahaere ki te mahi tahi ki te hoko me te whakahaere. E kī ana he nui te āronga mai i nga rōpū maha, tae atu ki nga whare wānanga o te taone. I kī a Paul Scott, te hēkeretari hōnore o te iwi: "He rawa nui tēnei mō te taone, ā, e hiahia ana hoki mātou ki te kite i a ia hei wāhanga tuatoru i roto i te jigsaw o Lincoln me ngā tāpoi tāpoi katoa e puta ana i taua rohe." Kei roto i ngā taunga te Whare Wānanga o Tā Hohepa Pēke, koia te take i uru ai te Rōpū Pēke o Tā Hohepa. Kei te titiro me pēhea e taea ai te whakawhanake i te Pātītī mō te hapori nui ake, te tāpoi me te whakamahi arumoni, tae atu ki te waihanga pea i tētahi whare whakaminenga tuwhera. I whakamātau te kaunihera ki te hoko i a ia e rua tau ki muri ki te penapena moni, engari i whakakāhoretia te tono anake i whiwhia. I kī a Andrew Taylor, te rangatira nui o te kaunihera, he "kore whakakotahitanga" i waenganui i te kaihoko me te kitenga a te kaunihera mō te pae. Kua whakatūria he petihana hei whakamutu i te hokonga o Te Pātītī mō te wā tuarua, e karanga ana ki te kaunihera kia whakawhanake i te āhuatanga hei wāhi tūruhi anō. I kī te kaiwhakarewa petihana a Phil Gresham i tēnei wā. "He wāhi tuku iho pai tēnei ka taea te whakawhanake, ā, tērā pea ka whiwhi moni mō Lincoln," tana kī. I kī tētahi kaikōrero kaunihera ka taupatupatutia te petihana e te kaunihera katoa mēnā ka tae ki te 900 ngā waitohu i mua i te katinga i te 5 o Mahuru. "Mēnā ka tae ki te 450 ngā waitohu, ka taea te tono kia hoatu e tētahi āpiha matua hāngai he whakaaturanga i tētahi hui a te Komiti Tirotiro Kaupapahere," te kī a te kaiwhakaatu.

title: Ka tere te hinga o te huaputa wheketere o Tiapanī mai i te rū o te tau 2011
summary: I hinga te huaputa wheketere o Tiapanī i te 3.3% mai i Me ki Pipiri, ko te tohu hou hei miramira kei te pā te pikinga tāke hoko o mua tata nei ki te tono kiritaki.
text: Ko te whakapeka nui rawa tēnei o te huaputa mai i te rū me te tsunami o te tau 2011. I whakarewaina e Tiapanī tana tāke hoko, e mōhiotia ana hoki ko te tāke whakapaunga, mai i te 5% ki te 8% i Aperira i tēnei tau. Tērā ētahi āwangawanga nā te nekehanga - e nui ake ai te utu o ngā taonga - tērā pea ka kite i ngā kiritaki e whakahoki ana i te whakapau moni me te whara i te whakapaunga o te kāinga. Ko ngā tau huaputa ngoikore e whai ana i ngā raraunga i whakaputaina i te Tūtira e whakaatu ana i ngā hokonga hokohoko i te Pipiri i whakapeka neke atu i te matapae, heke iho i te 0.6% mai i te tau ki mua. I tēnei wā, kua hinga hoki ngā hokohoko kāinga i te whenua i ngā marama tata nei. I kī ngā kaitirotiro ko te tono ngoikore nā te mea kua rere ngā kiritaki me ngā umanga ki te hoko i mua i te pikinga tāke. "He nui ake te tono tāke i mua i te pikinga tāke hoko i te mea i tūmanakohia, nā reira he tino poupou te hinganga o te huaputa, koia pea te take i tino nui ai te huaputa i Hune," te kī a Junko Nishioka, te rangatira o te ohanga o Tiapanī i TE SECURITIES. "Kāore mātou e tūmanako kia hinga tonu te huaputa i te koata o nāianei i te mea kei te ngaro te pānga pikinga tāke," tana kī. E tūmanako ana ngā kaiwhakanao i tirohia e te manatu whakahaere, te hokohoko me te umanga o Tiapanī kia piki ake te huaputa i ngā marama e heke mai nei.

title: Ka taea te hoatu ki te 7% o ngā taumata-A te kōeke A* hōu
summary: Ko tētahi kōeke A* hōu e whakawhiwhia ana ki ngā taumata-A i tēnei tau ka haere pea ki te 7% o ngā tāurunga, e huatau ana te rangahau.
text: Ko ngā ākonga e mau ana i te pāngarau, i ngā reo rānei te tino whiwhi i ngā tohu matua. Tata ki te kotahi i roto i te whā ngā tauira e mau ana i ētahi atu pāngarau ka whiwhi i tētahi A*, ā, kotahi i roto i te 10 ngā ākonga tuhinga Ingarihi, e ai ki te rangahau mai i te kaiwhakahaere whakamātautau o Ofqual. I mauria mai te kōeke tiketike hei āwhina i ngā whare wānanga ki te whakarerekē i ngā tauira tino mārama. Engari kāore ētahi whare wānanga e whakaaro ki ngā kōeke A* kia pai ake rā anō te whakaū. I tērā tau, kotahi i roto i ngā tāurunga taumata-A e whā i Ingarangi, i Wēra me Aiarangi ki te Raki i whakawhiwhia ki tētahi kōeke A. I tirohia e ngā tohunga pāngarau mō tana akoranga, a Ofqual, ngā hua o ngā taumata-A o tērā tau ki te pūnaha māka i hangaia mō ngā whakaritenga hou. I titiro ki te tokomaha o ngā ākonga o tērā tau i whiwhi i te A* i raro i te pūnaha hōu. I kitea i te wawaenga, puta noa i ngā kaupapa katoa, 7% o ngā tāurunga o tērā tau ka whiwhi i tētahi A* mēnā i tohua i raro i te aronui hōu. Heoi anō, kāore he tohatoha mō ētahi kōeke, nō reira kāore e 7% i tēnei kāwai ina whakaputaina ngā hua taumata-A i a Aotearoa. I kitea e ngā kairangahau ko te hunga i mau pāngarau he nui ake te tae ki te taumata o runga i te hunga e mau ana i te nuinga o ētahi atu kaupapa. Neke atu i te 72,000 i mau pāngarau i te tau 2009, ā, 13% o ērā ka whiwhi i te A* i raro i ngā tohutohu tohu hōu, te kī a Ofqual. Neke atu i te 10,000 i mau i ētahi atu pāngarau, ā, o ērā, 23% ka whiwhi i te A*. I tētahi atu kaupapa kaingākautia - ngā tuhinga Ingarihi - 9% o ngā ākonga ka whiwhi i te A*. I te reo Wīwī - neke atu i te 14,000 ngā ākonga - 7% o ngā ākonga i whakawhiwhia ki tētahi A* me te Pāniora 8%. He nui ake te tūponotanga ki te whiwhi A* i ētahi atu reo, tae atu ki te Arapi (13%), Bengali (10%), Hapanihi (45%) me te Pahia (29%), ahakoa he iti ake ēnei ākonga. Ko te nuinga o ēnei ākonga e kōrero kē ana i te reo i te kāinga, e whakaarohia ana. I roto i te reo Rātini, e 1,400 ngā ākonga, tata ki te kotahi i roto i te whā ka whiwhi i te A*. I kī a Kathleen Tattersall, te tūru o Ofqual, te kaiwhakahaere mō Ingarangi me Weera, ko ngā rerekētanga o ngā kōeke matua i waenganui i ngā kaupapa e tūmanakohia ana, ā, i raro tēnei i ngā ākonga e mau ana. "Ehara i te mea he ngāwari, he uaua ake rānei ētahi kaupapa i ētahi atu; engari e miramira ana i ngā rerekētanga i roto i ngā rōpū e mau ana i aua kaupapa," tana kī. I tāpiri mai a ia: "He wā tēnei o te huringa nui ki ngā taumata-A. " E whā tau e mahi ana a Ofqual me ōna hoa kaiwhakahaere me ngā tinana whakawhiwhinga kia ōrite ai, kia tika hoki ngā kōeke i whakawhiwhia i tēnei raumati, tae atu ki te kōeke A* hōu. "During the summer we will be monitoring the awarding process and the results in order to ensure that the grades candidates achieve are fair to them and are in line with those awarded in previous years." Kia whiwhi ai i te kōeke matua, me tino pai te mahi a ngā ākonga puta noa i ā rātou pepa katoa, kia whiwhi i tētahi kōeke A neke atu rānei, engari he tino nui hoki te tapeke i runga i ā rātou whakamātautau A2, i te nuinga o te tau tuarua o te akoranga. Ko nga whakamātautau ēnei kua uaua ake ki te whārōrō i nga tauira tino mārama.

title: E karanga ana te Uniana o nga Kaiahuwhenua ki nga kaiahuwhenua kia pūrongotia te patete pāteri
summary: Kua karangatia e te Kotahitanga o nga Kaiahuwhenua o Ulster (UFU) ētahi o ōna mema e mōhio ana ki te pahū pātītī i runga i a rātau pāmu kia pūrongotia ki nga pirihimana.
text: I kī a Perehitini John Thompson kāore a ia i te mōhio ki ētahi kaiahuwhenua i roto i te mahi. I te Tūtira, ka kī te USPCA i ohorere i te tauine o te whakatoinga pāteri i huraina. I kī a Mr Thompson e 99.9% o ngā mema UFU kāore e hiahia ki te kite i te ngohe e whakamahia ana i runga i a rātau pāmu. I kī a ia kua whakamōhiotia ia e mahi ana tētahi huānga hara i te paterika i Aiarangi ki te Raki. "He mea tino whakahē mātau. He hara, he pārekareka, he whakarihariha," tana kī. "Kāore au i te mōhio ki tētahi kaiahuwhenua, ā, ko tētahi kaiahuwhenua e mōhio ana ki tētahi pāmu pātītī e haere ana i runga i tā rātou pāmu, i tētahi pāmu noho tata rānei, ka inoi atu ahau ki a rātou kia pūrongotia ki te PSNI, ingoamuna rānei ki Crimestoppers. " Kaore tēnei e pai ki te mahi pāmu, ki te taiwhenua rānei. Me tū ināianei tonu." Whakatūpato: E whakapono ana te USPCA kua huri matapo ētahi kaiahuwhenua me ngā kaipupuri whenua ki ngā rōpū pātītī e keri ana i o rātau whenua. He tokomaha nga kaiahuwhenua e whakapono ana ki ngā pātītī e horapa ana ki te kau, he kerēme e tautohetohetia tonutia ana e ngā kaipūtaiao. I whakatūpato a Stephen Philpott o te USPCA i nga kaiahuwhenua kia kaua e uru ki te pana pārekareka. "Ka kī atu te USPCA ki tētahi rangatira whenua i reira, he maha nga tau i whakawhirinaki ai mātou ki a koe hei kaitiaki o te taiwhenua," tana kī. "Most of our best information comes from the farming community because they do actually love their animals and respect them. " Ko te tikanga kia tino whakamā te mema o te iwi ahuwhenua e uru ana ki tēnei mahi. Kāore rātau i te tika ki te karanga i a rātau anō he kaiahuwhenua, ā, kāore rātau i te tika hei kaitiaki o te taiwhenua." I kī a Īna Hutchison, tētahi pirihimana o mua e ārahi ana i tētahi mahi ārai hara whānui o UK e arotahi ana ki te pārekareka, i whakamataku ētahi kaiahuwhenua. "E mōhio ana mātou i ētahi wā e tino whakamataku ana ngā kaiahuwhenua i ēnei momo tāngata e kī ana 'kei te haere mātou ki tō whenua, ā, ki te kore koe e pīrangi ka hoki mai mātou ki te tahu i tō pāti'," tana kī. Hei wāhanga o tētahi mahi e rua tau, ka aroturukitia e te USPCA tētahi rōpū ā-Pēkete mō tētahi wā. Ko te rōpū - ko tētahi o ngā tata ki te 20 kua kitea e te aroha - i haere ki waho kia toru ngā wā i te wiki, mā te whakamahi kurī hei ūnga i ngā huinga maha i ia wā. He ture te tūkino i te pātītī, te tūkino rānei i te pātītī. I whiwhi te USPCA i ngā whakarākeitanga huna e whakaatu ana i te rōpū e kari ana i ngā huinga e rua. I whakamahia e ngā kaimahi e mahi ana mō te USPCA he awhe taputapu hangarau-kia ora, tae atu ki tētahi taiapa ā-rangi me tētahi kāmera i runga i te papa hei whakaahua i te rōpū e whakaeke ana i ngā huinga pāteri hohe - ko tētahi o ngā wā tuatahi i mau ai taua ngohe i runga i te kāmera i ngā wāhi katoa i UK, i Aiarangi rānei. Ka pāohotia ngā pūrongo tāuke a Kōnata Adair mō te mahi USPCA i te 18:30 GMT i tēnei wiki katoa.

title: Morrisons to be sued by 2,000 staff
summary: Neke atu i te 2,000 ngā kaimahi i Morrisons e tono ana i te mekameka hokomaha i muri i te whakairinga tuihono o ētahi o ā rātou taipitopito whaiaro, pūtea hoki.
text: I pā mai te māturu i te tukuatu a tētahi kaihautū kamupene i ngā taipitopito o ngā kaimahi e tata ana ki te 100,000 ki ngā paetukutuku tiritiri kōnae maha i te tau 2013. I whiua te kaihautū, a Andrew Skelton, kia waru tau i roto i te whare herehere mo te māturu i ngā taipitopito. Ināianei kei te tautohe ngā kaimahi me nui ake te mahi a Morrisons hei pare i ā rātou raraunga. "Ko te tūnga o aku kiritaki, i rahua a Morrisons ki te ārai i tētahi māturu raraunga e whakaatu ana i te tekau mano o ana kaimahi ki te mōrea tūturu o te tāhae tuakiri me te ngaromanga tūpono," te kī a Nick McAleenan, he rōia tūmataitinga raraunga e tohu ana i te kaimahi. "Ko te tikanga, kei te māharahara rātau ki te tango moni mai i ā rātou pūkete pēke, ā, - ki te take o ngā kiritaki taitamariki - he hua tōraro mō tā rātou whakatauranga nama." Kāore anō kia whakatauria te rahi o te kerēme. E whakakāhore ana a Morrisons he kawenga, ā, e kī ana he tino hē te mahi ā-ture.

title: Ngā whakararuraru o Los Angeles: I tū te nehunga o Kīngi
summary: Kua tū te nehunga i Los Angeles o Kīngi Kīngi, nāna i patua e nga pirihimana mā i ahu mai ki ngā whakararuraru whakamate i te taone nui o Amerika i te 20 tau ki mua.
text: I te ratonga, i whakamihitia a Kīngi mo te kore e whakaatu i te kawa ki nga āpiha i patu i a ia i te tau 1991. I whakawāteatia nga āpiha i roto i te patupatu i te tau e whai ake nei, e tīmata ana i ngā matapaki i mate ai te 50. I kitea a Kīngi kua mate i te takere o te puna kaukau i tērā marama i te 47 o ona tau. Kaore he tohu o te tākaro hara. 'Tohu o te murunga hara' I tū te ratonga nehunga i Los Angeles' Forest Lawn, Hollywood Hills i te Hātarei. "Kaua te tangata e whakawāteatia e ngā hē e mahia ana e rātou, engari mā te āhua o tō rātou pikinga ki runga ake i a rātou," te kī a Rev Al Sharpton. "Kua piki ake a Rodney i runga ake i ana hē. Kore rawa a ia i tawai i tētahi tangata - ehara i te pirihimana, ehara i te pūnaha tika, ehara i te tangata." Ko ngā kupu rongonui a Tāne Kīngi i te wā o ngā whakararuraru "Ka taea e tātau katoa?" i tuituia ki te taupoki o te kāwhena, i te taha o tana whakaahua. "I noho ia hei tohu o te murunga hara," te kī a Rev Sharpton. He tokomaha nga kaituku i āwhina ki te utu mo te nehunga. I whakaahuatia e tētahi kaimātakitaki, ā, ka whakaaturia e ngā pāpāho puta noa i te ao. I tū a ia mo te tere i runga i tētahi tiriti pōuri i te 3 o Poutāpeta 1991. Neke atu i te 50 ngā wā i patua ai ia e nga pirihimana tokowhā o LA ki a rātau rākau, ka whana i a ia, ka pūhia ia ki ngā pū whakaoho. He tino nui te pānga o ngā whakaahua tawhito o tana patupatu i taua wā ki tētahi Los Angeles kē te uaua. I te mutunga, he tino pānga te mekameka katoa o ngā takahanga ki te āhua o te whakataetae i roto i a Mātau. Nō nā tata nei i kī atu a Kīngi ki te Los Angeles Times, ahakoa kua whakaritea e ia tōna tawhito whānui ake, ehara i te mea ngāwari te mahi ki ngā mea o mua. "E whakaaro ana ētahi tāngata he toa ahau," tana kī. "E kino ana ētahi ki a au. E kī ana rātau e tika ana kia tika ki a au. Ko ētahi atu tāngata, ka rongo ahau i a rātau e tawai ana i a au i taku karangatanga kia mutu te whakangaromanga, pēnei i te wairangi ahau mo te whakapono ki te rangimārie." Na te whakawātanga o muri ake ka hereheretia e rua o nga āpiha tokowhā. I whakahaua e Kīngi te Taone o Los Angeles, a, i toa i te utu $3.8m (£2.5m). I haere tonu te whakararuraru i pā ki a LA i te oho o te whakataunga taketake kāore i hara, e 50 ngā tāngata i mate, ā, ka tūkinotia te taone nui e $1bn. I whakaaturia te Tari Pirihimana o Los Angeles he raruraru nui ki te whakahāwea, a, ka whakatūria he whakatikatika. I whakauru a Kīngi ki tētahi o ngā kaiwhakawā mai i tōna whakawātanga, ā, i whakaputaina he pukapuka i te tau 2012 e huaina ana ko The Riot Within: My Journey From Rebellion to Redemption. Engari i pākaha hoki a ia ki te tūkino i te rongoā me te waipiro, he maha nga paraihe ki te ture i roto i ngā tau, ā, i te mutunga ka ngaro katoa ana moni.

title: Ka pakaru a Brighton Holiday Homes me ngā tāpuitanga kua whakakorea
summary: E kī ana ngā hararei kua mahue i a rātau e hia mano pauna i roto i te pēke i muri i te mutunga o te mahi a te kamupene tuku me te kore pānui.
text: I roto i tētahi īmēra, ka kī atu a Brighton Holiday Homes ki ngā kiritaki kua whakakorea ā rātou tāpuitanga, ā, ka tohutohu i a rātou kia whakahokia ā rātou moni mā ō rātou pēke. I utua e Te Wānanga Nash te £3,000 ki te umanga i tērā wiki, ā, i kī "kāore he kōrero mō ētahi raruraru tūpono". I purua e te kamupene he tohu ki tōna tatau o mua e whakapuaki ana i te "pouri nui". E pānui ana: "He tino pouri nā ngā āhuatanga ohaoha uaua kua mutu te tauhokohoko a Brighton Holiday Homes i tēnei wā." Kāore anō te umanga, i whakatūria i te tau 2008 e te tīma tāne me te wahine o Neil rāua ko Mīharo Stonehill, kia urupare ki ētahi atu pātai a te HAU. I whakaritea e Miss Nash he whare nui mōna anō, ōna hoa me tōna whānau ki te whakanui i tōna huritau 30 me te heihei mahi. I tērā wiki i tohutohutia ia kia utua te toenga e toe ana, a, ka kī rātau e "hari ana ki te whakaae ki aku moni". Ka kī a ia: "Kua pouri ahau ināianei. " Kua tāpuia e ngā hoa he haerenga mai i Newcastle me Yorkshire, ā, kua pau kē i ngā rau. Ki a au te kī atu ki a rātau kua ngaro pea i a au a rātau moni, he tino wehi. "Ko tētahi mea e tika ana ko tētahi o ngā takahanga tino mīharo, motuhake hoki o tōku oranga, ka huri hei tētahi o ngā mea tino hauora me te māharahara." I utua e tētahi atu wahine te £4,500 mō te nohoanga o tana tamāhine me te mutunga wiki o ngā ngohe, tae atu ki te kaitao tūmataiti me te karaehe hanga waipiro, kia whakakorea anake "me te kore whakatūpato, whakapāha rānei". I kī ngā Pirihimana o Sussex e kore e tūhuratia, he take tūmatanui hoki. I kī te Kaunihera o Te Taone o Brighton me Hove "kāore he mahere" hei tūhura.

title: Ka pōti ngā MP ki te tango i te kōtiro o Tā Piripi Kākāriki
summary: Kua tautuhia ngā MP ki te pōti mēnā me tango a Tā Piripi Kākāriki i tōna kōtiro, kua mōhio a TE Pō Rongokōrero.
text: Nā Arama ParsonsBBC Newsnight Ka kōrerorerotia te tiango o te kaihoko BHS i roto i te wiki, i muri i tētahi pūrongo tino nui a ngā Komiti Pakihi me te Penihana. Ināianei kua tāpiritia he menemana ki taua taupatupatu, e karanga ana kia whakakorea te hōnore o Tā Piripi. E whakapono ana ko te wā tuatahi i tautohetohe ai ngā MP i tētahi mōtini mēnā ka whakakore i tētahi hōnore. Kua whakamua te mōtini e te MP Conservative o Rārangi Fuller me te MP takitahi o Mīharo Thomson, ā, he iti iho i te rua marama i muri i te katinga o te pātaka BHS whakamutunga i ōna tatau. No te 20 o Whiringa ā-rangi te pōti. Kāore te mahi o te whakakore i ngā kōtiro i roto i te koha a te Whare o Ngātahi, engari kei tētahi komiti ad hoc, e mōhiotia ana ko te Komiti Whakakore Hōnore, e whakahaeretia ana e te upoko o te ratonga tūmatanui. Ko te mōtini paremata "e karanga ana ki te Komiti Whakakore Whakahonore kia whakakore me te whakakore i te [kōtiro a Tā Piripi Kākāriki]". I tukuna he hōnore ki a Tā Piripi, ko tōna rangatiratanga hokohoko ko Top Shop, Top Man, Burton me Dorothy Perkins neke atu i te tekau tau ki mua, i June 2006. I hoatu "mō ngā ratonga ki te hokohoko", engari kua tino pakaru tōna rongo hei kaihoko i te tau kua taha. I raro i te pēhanga kua tae mai a Tā Piripi i raro i te tirotiro pōturi mai i te hokonga o te BHS mō te £1 ki tētahi kaimahi iti e mōhiotia ana, a Dominic Chappell, i Mati 2015. Kaore i tino mōhio a Tāne Kānata ki te mahi hokohoko, ā, e rua neke atu rānei ngā wā i whakapuakina ai kua pōraru. Ko te mea i muri mai he tau whakapeka me te tiango, me te mekameka e whakahaere ana i te tau i muri i tana hokonga, i mua i te katinga o ōna tatau mō te pai i ētahi marama i muri iho. Na te rahunga o BHS i kore ai e 11,000 ngā tāngata i te mahi, ā, i mahue hoki i muri i tētahi kaupapa penihana e tata ana ki te £570m. E kī ana a Tā Piripi kei te kōrero a ia me pēhea te kati i taua āputa, engari kua anga atu ia ki te whakahē mo tana whakahaere i te kamupene, me tōna rahunga ki te kōmaka i tana kaupapa penihana raruraru. "Ko ana mahi i BHS he āhua whakarihariha ki a ia kia haere tonu ki te whakamana i tētahi whakawhiwhinga mō ngā ratonga ki te hokohoko," te kī a Tēnā Fuller ki a TE Pō Rongokōrero. "Kei te whakamua ahau i tēnei whakarākeitanga mō te take ngāwari e whakamana ana ia ki te ngaro i tōna kōtiro. " Ko tēnei e pā ana ki te whakapuaki i tētahi whakaaro tika mō te āhua o te whanonga o tētahi tangata - ehara i te hākere pūkenga, ehara i te mahi i muri i ngā tatau kati." I whakaarahia tuatahitia e Frank Field, te tūru o te Komiti Penihana, te āhua o te ngaronga o Tā Piripi tōna kōtiro. I taua wā, ka kī a Tā Piripi he ngana "ki te whakangaro i tōku rongonui". He taonga tā Tā Piripi e whakaarohia ana neke atu i te £3bn. I te wā o tana rangatiratanga o BHS, neke atu i te £400m ngā moni hua i utua e ia. E kī ana te hunga e tata ana ki a ia he pūtake whakapehapeha nui ki a ia me tōna whānau.

title: Widow's war grave flowers plea answered 100 years on
summary: "Mehemea i taea e au te whakaara ake i tōna māhunga e mate ana, a, ka rongo i tana poroporoaki whakamutunga".
text: Koinei te tīmatanga o tētahi oriori i tuhia e tētahi pouaru pouri hei takoha rā whānau ki tana tāne, i mate i Wīwī i te tau 1918. Engari ehara te oriori a Hannah Evans i te whakamaharatanga noa iho, he inoi ki ētahi atu kia whakatakotoria he putiputi ki runga i te urupa o Pte Frank Evans. Ināianei e 100 tau i muri i tōna matenga, kua mahia e tētahi rōpū hītori mai i Wrexham, ki te raki o Weera, ōna hiahia i te haerenga ki ngā urupa pakanga. Ko Pte Frank Evans, nō Moss, Wrexham, i mahi i Wīwī me ngā Fusiliers o Welsh. I mate a ia i ngā motu i tētahi hōhipera hōia i Camiers, Normandy i te 28 o Oketopa 1918, e 23 ona tau. Kotahi tau tēnei i muri i tana mārenatanga ki a Hana, ā, i muri i tōna matenga, ka whakatakotoria e ia he pānui whakamaharatanga rā whānau ki te Wrexham Advertiser i te 8 o Pēpuere 1919. I whakamutua tana oriori: "E Frank, kei te moe koe i tō moe roa whakamutunga; " E kore hoki e kitea e au tō urupa; Kia āta whakatakotoria e tētahi ringa aroha i taua whenua tawhiti he putiputi mōku." Tērā pea he whakaaturanga kaitito noa iho te tono a Whaea Evans o tōna ngaromanga, engari i te taenga mai o tētahi kape o tana oriori ki te aroaro o te Rōpū Hītori o te Takiwā o Broughton, ka whakatau ngā mema kia āta whakaarohia. I whakapā atu te rōpū ki te Whare Taonga Pakanga Emepaea i Rāwāhi e ngana ana ki te kimi mōhiohio mō ngā hōia mai i tō rātou rohe i te whakahaerenga ki te rau tau o te Armistice. "I tonoa e mātau ētahi tono ki te Whare Taonga Pakanga o te Emepaea mō ētahi o ngā hōia," te kī a te mema o te rōpū, a Jim Nuttall. "He iti rawa tā mātou, ka miharo mātou mehemea he mea tā rātou i reira, ā, ka puta mai te oriori." E ono o te rōpū i haere ki te Urupā Hōia o Etaples, i reira tanumia ai a Frank. I kī tētahi atu mema, a Phil Coops: "I tino pā mai ki a au. " I te whakarite mātau i tētahi haerenga ki Wīwī me Peretiama, ā, i whakatau ahau me takoha mātau ki a Frank nā te oriori. "I tangohia e mātau ētahi putiputi mai i Weera, a, ka haere mātau ki taua urupā i te rā tuatahi i reira mātau." I whakatakotoria e Tēnā Coops nga putiputi ki runga i te urupa o Frank mō Hana, 100 tau ki muri. Ka kī a ia: "He tino ngākau. Tino pouri. But we felt that we had contributed to Hannah's wishes and the fact that she'd wanted someone to place those flowers on her husband's grave and we did it, coming from her home community."

title: Ko te utu tinihanga motokā e utu ana i ngā pūmanawa me ngā kaitaraiwa e hia miriona
summary: E mahi ana ngā rōpū hara i ngā miriona pauna i roto i tētahi tinihanga inihua motokā hou, kua whakaaturia mai e tētahi tūhuratanga o TE HAU.
text: Nā Adrian GoldbergPresenter, e 5 ngā Tūhura ora e pā ana ki ngā kerēme hē mō ngā motokā whakakapi i hoatu ki ngā motokā i te wā e whakatikaina ana tō rātou ake motokā. E kī ana ngā insiders o te umanga kia nui ake ngā mea e hiahiatia ana hei whakamutu i te tinihanga, e tūtuki ana i ngā utu me te utu i ngā kaiwhakarato i te £60m i te tau. I kī te Association of British Insurers ko te whakaiti me te whakakaha i taua tinihanga he "tino manakē". I kī atu ngā kaihoko tinihanga ki te Investigatesprogramme ora o TE 5 o TE AO e whakatatū ana ngā rōpū hara i te whakahaere kerēme tinihanga me te utu i ngā kamupene kia moni ai i runga i te mākete e tipu ana i te whakarato motokā whakakapi. Ko nga rōpū, e kite ana i te hara he whai hua, he iti hoki te mōrearea, ka whakamahi i ngā tikanga rerekē hei ngana ki te tinihanga i ngā kamupene inihua. I ētahi wā ka utua e rātou ngā inihua mō tētahi motokā kāore anō kia homai e rātou - e mōhiotia ana ko te "whiu kēhua". I ētahi atu take ka "utua" e ngā rōpū te motokā ōrite ki ngā tāngata rerekē i te wā kotahi, e tono motuhake ana mō ia utu kāore i te tīariari. Ka taea hoki e ngā kamupene utu tinihanga te utu mō te whakarato i tētahi tauira matua ina kua tukua he waka taketake. Hei tauira, i tētahi take i kī ai tētahi kamupene motokā rēti kua homai e ia he kiritaki ki tētahi Maserati, i te mea kua hoatu ki te atekōkiri he Korowha. I tētahi atu, i tonoa he Mēneti E-karaehe i te wā i tukuna he Ford Fiesta te waka tūturu - he £200 i ia rā he māmā ake ki te utu. I utua te motokā mo te 55 rā, e kupenga ana i ngā tinihanga e £11,000 ($17,400). E mōhiotia ana te hara ko te "tinihanga utu nama" nā te āhua o te pūtea a te umanga inihua i ngā waka whakakapi. I kī atu te rōia taihara o Judy Dawson ki a 5 Live Investigates e whakapono ana ngā tinihanga i roto i tētahi āhuatanga win-win nā te mea he iti noa iho te wā e mau ana, e whiua ana. I ētahi take, ka kī a Ms Dawson, ko ngā mea katoa i pā mai mēnā ka kitea he kerēme tinihanga, ka kore nga kaipupuri e pai ki te utu i te nama. I kī atu te manukura o te komiti tīpako waka a Louise Ellman MP ki te BBC: "He mīharo tēnei. Koia tētahi o ngā take e piki ake ai ngā utu inihua. "Ko te tikanga kia whakatauria tēnei take e te tari whakaū tinihanga inihua pirihimana hou hei take tino wawe." Kātahi anō ka puta mai ngā Pirihimana o Bedfordshire i tētahi tinihanga motokā utu nama nui i a rātau e uiui ana i te hara hinga-mō te moni - e honoa ana ki te tinihanga utu nama. I uiuia e te ope e 60 ngā aituā huarahi, ā, i kitea ko te nuinga o te nuinga he kirimana utu nama e āpiti ana ki a rātou, i te nuinga o te wā e pā ana ki ngā waka "kēhua". I kitea e ngā kaiwhaiwhai i roto i ngā take e toru ngā kerēme e tata ana ki te £40,000 mō te utu i ngā motokā Jaguar kāore i te tīariari, engari i whakatārewatia mō te ono marama. E whakapono ana a Craig Dickson, te upoko o te utu nama i te umanga rōia DAC Beachcroft, kei te piki haere tēnei momo tinihanga nā te mea kei te pai ake ngā kamupene inihua ki te kite i ētahi atu momo tinihanga - pēnei i ngā kerēme whara whaiaro tinihanga. I whakaarohia e tētahi tātaritanga o te tinihanga i whakahaeretia e DAC Beachcroft e utu ana i ngā inihua mō te £60m i te tau - arā, ko te 10% o te katoa o te mākete utu nama. I kī a Tēnā Tiki kua kite tana umanga i te 400% e piki ana i te maha o ngā aituā kāore i pā ki ngā kerēme whara whaiaro i waenganui i Aperira 2010 me Me 2011. "Tērā tētahi āputa i roto i ngā ture i roto i ngā rōpū whakahaere e whakahaere ana i ngā kerēme whara whaiaro me whakarite e te Manatu Ture," te whakamārama a Tēnā Dickson. "Engari ki te kore he whara whaiaro, kaore rātau. " Ki tētahi wā, ka taea e te tangata te whakatatū i a rātau anō hei kamupene utu nama nā te mea kāore he whara whaiaro." I kī tētahi kaikōrero o te Manatu Ture he take taua take mō te Office of Fair Trading (OFT). I roto i tētahi kōrero, ka kī atu te OFT ki te HAU: "Ko ngā waka whakakapi utu nama mō ngā kaikerēme he arotahi o te akoranga mākete haere tonu a te OFT mō ngā utu inihua motokā. Ko ngā kitenga o te akoranga i te wā o Me 2012." E kī ana te Association of British Insurers (ABI) neke atu i te £2bn i roto i te tinihanga inihua e kore e kitea i ia tau, e tāpiri ana, i te wawaenga, he £50 anō i te tau ki te pire inihua i utua e ia kaipupuri kaupapahere UK. I kī tētahi kaikōrero ABI: "I te nuinga o te wā e haere tahi ana ngā aituā waka tinihanga me ngā kerēme tinihanga mō te utu nama, tae atu ki te rokiroki, te whakaora me te tapi i ngā waka. " Ko te whakaiti me te whakakaha i te tinihanga inihua he manakē mō te umanga inihua. Ā muri ake i tēnei tau, ka whakarewaina e mātou te Rēhita Tinihanga Inihua - te pātengi raraunga whānui tuatahi o ngā tinihanga inihua katoa e mōhiotia ana." Ka taea e koe te whakarongo ki te pūrongo katoa i runga i te 5 ora Investigateson Rātapu, 4 Poutāpeta i te 21:00 GMT onBBC 5 live. Whakarongo anō mā te paetukutuku ora 5, mā te tikiake rānei i te podcast Investigates ora e 5.

title: E rapu ana a Bulmers i te whakaaetanga ki te turaki i te mira hītori o te 50
summary: Kua tono whakaaetanga whakarite a Bulmers ki te turaki i ngā pūkenga tawhito i tētahi o ōna pae i Hereford.
text: I whakamahia tuatahitia te pae o Plough Lane e te umanga i te mutunga o nga tau 1930, engari i nekehia ōna pūkenga mira me te tukatuka ki tētahi pūtake hou i Ledbury i te tau 2008. I muri mai ka whakataua te whare mira i te mea he nui rawa ngā tikanga mahi o nāianei mō te whare tawhito. E hiahia ana te umanga ki te turaki i tana mira, te tipu whakaeto me te whare whakamaroke. 'Tapa tapa i ngā wā katoa' E hiahia ana hoki ki te tango i te arawhiti pauna, te tari me te awa āporo. I kī te kaikōrero o Gabe Crook: "He nui ake te mahi i te rau tau 20. " Tata ki te 28 ki te 30 tāna i tāpaetia ki roto i te hōpua mēnā e hiahia ana koe, ā, ka kawea ngā hua rākau mā te wai, ka horoia i te huarahi ki te mira, kātahi ka pēhia - ehara i te awa ināianei. "Ahakoa he aha te hangarau kei a mātou, kei te tapa tonu i ngā wā katoa, ahakoa i ngā tau ki mua, i mua mātau." I takea mai te kamupene i a H P (Percy) Bulmer, te tama pōtiki a te Tumuaki o Credenhill, i te tau 1887 e pēhi ana i ngā āporo mō te māra rākau a tōna pāpā. I te tau i muri mai, ka rēti a Percy i tētahi whare putunga i te tiriti o Maylord, Hereford, ka whakarite kia hokona he āporo mai i ngā kaiahuwhenua o te rohe, ā, e 4,000 kārani cider. I te tau 1889 ka whakawhānuitia te umanga, ā, ka neke ki Ryelands Street, i reira i honoa ai a Percy e tōna tuakana ko Fred, nāna i whakahaere ngā hoko. I te tau 1911, ka whakawhiwhia ki a ia he Pūtāhui Ariki i te tau 1911. I ngā tau 1930, i hangaia ngā pūkenga ki te pae o Plough Lane, kātahi ka nekehia e te kamupene tana mira me ngā pūkenga pēhi ki Ledbury i Hereford i te tau 2008. Ināianei kei te umanga te mira pēhi nui rawa atu i Uropi. Kua kite te umanga i te aranga nui o te rongonui i ngā tau tata nei, ā, mai i te tīmatanga māhaki o te umanga i te mutunga o te rau tau 1800, ināianei he wāhanga tau tōpu o tētahi mākete pauna miriona. "Kua whakahētia te whare mira (i Plough Lane) ināianei," te kī a Tēnā Crook. "Neke atu i te rua, e toru rānei ngā papa me te kawenga i runga i ngā kurupae i haumaru ai, ā, ko o mātau whakaaro mō te umanga me te tipu ā muri ake, he pai ki te neke. " Engari kāore anō kia rerekē ngā tikanga i roto i te 20 ki te 30 tau kua taha. "I hangaia te whare mira i ngā tau 1950, ā, i tae mai te hangarau pēhi aunoa tuatahi i ngā tau 1960 me te 70. "I whakahōutia anō tērā i ngā tau tōmuri o te 80 - i te tīmatanga o te 90, nā reira he ranunga o te tawhito me te hou i reira. " A, ināianei i muri i te aranga ake i te tau 2006 - he raumati wera, kua kā te Kapu o te Ao, ā, he tino nui te whakahau mākete a Magners i runga i te inu i runga i te hukapapa - i whakaurua he whakatupuranga hou ki te cider. "E 50% te tipu o te mākete." Neke atu i te 400 ngā tāngata e whakamahia ana i ngā pae e rua, e 200 anō e kirimana ana, ā, e 200-300 e whakamahia ana i te ad hoc, te kī a Tēnā Crook. "E whakamahi ana mātou i te 10,000 eka i Hereford me ngā takiwā e karapoti ana, e ōrite ana ki te tuatoru o ngā āporo katoa e tipu ana i Ingarangi, ahakoa he aha te momo. " Ka hoatu ki ngā kaiahuwhenua ngā kirimana 25 ki te 30 tau, ā, ka kawea e rātou ngā utu ki mua, ka whai hua, ka pakaru rānei, i te tau-whitu, kātahi ka whai hua katoa mō rātou. "E kī taurangi ana mātou ki te hoko i ia āporo e whakaputaina ana e rātau i te utu kua whakaaetia kētia, nā reira he pūtea penapena mo te wā roa mō rātou. " Ko te nui o ngā hokonga cider i nui ai te take ki a Bulmers ki te whakatō i tētahi atu 1,200 eka hei kawe i a mātau ki te 10,000. "That's 400 new trees over three years - 2008/9/10 so we're just seeing the benefit of that now." I te tirohanga a te umanga ki te wā heke mai i te puawai tonu o te umanga, tērā pea ka whakawāteatia tētahi wāhanga o tōna mahi cider i roto i ngā marama e toru e whai ake nei mēnā ka tukuna he whakaaetanga. Kei Plough Lane te ringa pōkai me te tohatoha o te kamupene, ā, he wāhanga matua te pae o tōna hītori. "Ko to mātau ngākau me to mātau kāinga," ko te tāpiri mai a Tēnā Crook. Kāore i te mārama he aha te mahi a te kamupene ki te whenua i muri i te whakawāteatanga.

title: Obituary: Nicholas Winton
summary: Ko Tā Nicholas Winton, kua mate nei i te 106 o ona tau, kua karangatia hei toa o te Holocaust.
text: I roto i ngā marama tuatahi e iwa o te tau 1938, ka whakahaeretia e ia te Czech Kindertransport, nāna i kawe mai ngā tamariki Hurai mai i Taikarowākia i nohoia e Tiamana ki te haumaru i te UK. I mahi ngāwari a ia ki te whakarite kia kohia he moni, ā, ka kitea he kāinga mō te hunga whakaruru. Heoi anō, he mea whakamīharo, ko tōna āhua whakawātea, e 50 tau i mua i te mōhiotanga o te pūrākau katoa o ana mahi toa. I whānau a Nicholas George Winton i te 19 o Mei 1909 i te takiwā o Hampstead i te raki o Rānana. I neke ōna mātua Hurai mai i Tiamana ki Rānana i te tau 1907, ā, i hurihia te ingoa whānau mai i Wertheim ki Winton. I tahuri hoki rātau ki te Karaitiana, ā, i roto i taua whakapono i iriiria ai ta rāua tama. I te tau 1923, ka noho a Winton ko tētahi o ngā tauira tuatahi i te Kura o Stowe kātahi anō ka whakatuwheratia i Buckinghamshire. Ahakoa i haere atu a ia me te kore e whiwhi i ngā tohu, kua mau ia ki te aroha ki te pāngarau. I haere tonu a ia i ana akoranga i ngā karaehe ahiahi i mua i tana neke ki Tiamana, i reira ia i mahi ai i ngā pēke i Hamburg me Berlin. I te tau 1931, e rua tau noa iho i mua i te rironga o Hītara hei tumuaki Tiamana, ka neke a ia ki te mahi i Parihi i mua i tana hokinga ki Rānana. I noho tonu te whānau o tōna whaea ki Tiamana, ā, me ngā kōrero o ngā hunga whakaruru Hurai e rere ana ki Rānana, i tino mōhio ai ia ki te whakatoinga o nga Hurai e nga Hūra. I whakapaea i a Hakihea 1938, ka haere a Winton ki tētahi hararei retihuka ki Huiterangi, i tana whakatau ohorere ki te haere kē ki Prague, i reira tētahi hoa e ngana ana ki te āwhina i ngā tūruru Hurai. I haere a ia ki ngā puni mō ngā hunga whakaruru mai i Sudetenland, he wāhi kōrero Tiamana o Taikarowākia, i tukua ki Tiamana i te marama o Mahuru 1938 i muri i te pēhanga i te kāwanatanga o Taikarowākia mai i Ingarangi me Wīwī. I te mahi kē ngā kaiwhaiwhai o Ingarangi i Taikarowākia e ngana ana ki te āwhina i te hunga whakaruru, engari ko te whakaaro nui a Winton ko te whakaora i ngā tamariki mā te kimi whānau i UK hei hoatu kāinga ki a rātou. I āwhinatia ia e tētahi Ture Pāremata o te tau 1938 e whakaae ana ki te tomokanga o ngā tamariki rerenga i raro iho i te 17 tau, i te wā e whakatakotoria ana he moni hei utu i to rātau hokinga ki te kāinga. I whakatūria e Winton tētahi tari i tētahi hōtēra i Prague, i reira i whakapaea wawe ai ia e ngā whānau e hiahia ana ki te whakaputa i a rātau tamariki i mua i te whakaekenga a Tiamana i Taikarowākia. I tōna hokinga ki Rānana, ka mahi tahi a ia me ngā rōpū āwhina ki te whakatatū i te Czech Kindertransport, tētahi noa iho o ngā mahi e ngana ana ki te whakaora i ngā tamariki Hurai mai i Tiamana me ngā rohe i nohoia e te Nazi. I whakatakotoria e Winton he tini pānuitanga nūpepa e inoi ana kia haere mai te tangata ki te tuku kāinga ki ngā tamariki. Ehara i te mea ngāwari i ngā wā katoa. I ngaro "Ko te raruraru ko te whiwhi i ngā tāngata e whakaae ana ki ngā tamariki, ā, i te wā tēnei i te wā e tū tonu ana te whakawhititanga o ngā tamariki mai i te tonga [o Ingarangi]," tana kī. "He mea whakamīharo te tokomaha o ngā tāngata i haere mai ki mua. Ko te mea whakararuraru, kāore tētahi atu whenua e haere mai ki te āwhina. "I whakamātauria e au a Amerika engari kāore i tangohia e rātau. Tērā pea ka nui te rerekētanga mehemea i pērā rātau." I ngā marama tuatahi e waru o te tau 1939, e waru ngā tereina i wehe atu i Prague e mau ana i ngā tamariki e 669 ki te haumaru. E 15 anō i rere atu mā Huitene. I whakaritea te iwa o nga tereina kia wehe atu i Prague i te 1 o Mahuru 1939, te rā i whakaekea ai e Tiamana a Pōrana, a, ka whakaoho i te tīmatanga o te Pakanga Tuarua o te Ao. "I roto i ngā haora o te pānuitanga, ka ngaro atu te tereina," ka mahara a Winton ā muri ake. "Kāore tētahi o ngā tamariki e 250 i runga i te papa i kitea anō. " He whānau mātau e tatari ana i Liverpool Street i taua rā. Mehemea i te rā i mua atu te tereina, tērā pea ka puta mai." I rēhita a Winton hei kaiwhakahē hinengaro, ā, i mahi mō tētahi wā hei atekōkiri waka tūroro, i mua i tana uru atu ki te RAF i reira ia i whakaritea ai. Ka whakakotahitia anōtia e ia tētahi tangata mō ana mahi i mua i te pakanga, ā, tae noa ki te tau 1988 ka kitea e tana wahine he pukapuka tuhituhi i roto i te whare e pupuri ana i ngā tuhinga maha, tae atu ki ngā ingoa o ngā tamariki i whakaorangia. I a Hōngongoi o taua tau, ka puta a Winton i runga i tētahi putanga o te hōtaka o TE AO That's Life, ā, i pōhiritia ētahi o ngā tāngata i whakaorangia e ia kia haere mai. Tae noa ki te whare mahi, kaore rātau i mōhio ko Winton te tangata nāna rātau i whakaora. Winton was awarded an MBE in 1983 for his work in establishing the Abbeyfield care homes and, in 2003, was knighted in recognition of his efforts on the Kindertransport. I te tau 2007, i whiwhi a ia i te whakapaipai hōia teitei rawa o te Whenua o Taikarowākia, te Rīpeka o te Karaehe 1, ā, i whakaingoatia e te kāwanatanga o Taikarowākia mō te Whakawhiwhinga Rangimārie o te tau 2008. I mahue i tētahi tereina e kīa nei ko "The Winton Train" te teihana o Prague i te 1 o Mahuru 2009, e 70 tau tonu i muri i te haerenga atu o te Kindertransport whakamutunga i te pūmatua o Taikarowākia. I Whiringahora 2014, i te 105 o ona tau, ka haere ia ki Prague ki te whiwhi i te hōnore teitei rawa o te Whenua o Taikarowākia, te Order of the White Lion. 'Pouri i ngā wāhi katoa' I roto i tana whaikōrero whakaaetanga, he ngāwari noa iho a ia: "I tētahi ara, kaua ahau e noho roa rawa ki te hoatu i te katoa te wā ki te whakanui ake i ngā mea e mahi ana i tēnei rā." Ko tētahi atu kaiwhiwhi Whakawhiwhinga Rangimārie o Aotearoa, ko Elie Wiesel, nāna i whakarāpopoto te tūranga nui o te hunga pēnei i a Winton, i whakamātau ki te whakaora i ngā tamariki Hurai o Uropi i ngā Whāriki: "I aua wā he pouri i ngā wāhi katoa. I te Rangi, i te Whenua, te āhua nei kua katia ngā kuwaha katoa o te aroha. "I patua e te kaipatu, a, ka mate nga Hurai, ā, ka whāngaia e te ao o waho he āhuatanga tautohetohe, he tautohetohe rānei. He torutoru noa iho i kaha ki te tiaki."

title: E whakatūpato ana te Minita Hauora a Mark Drakeford i ngā poari mō te whakapau moni
summary: Kāore anō kia whakatauria e te Minita Hauora a Mark Drakeford te tūponotanga ka kore pea ētahi poari Welsh e whakataurite i ngā pukapuka i te mutunga o te tau ā-pūtea.
text: Engari i kī a Mark Drakeford, nāna i mahi i te tūranga i te tīmatanga o tēnei marama, e mōhio ana ia ka "noho i roto i ōna tikanga". Mēnā ka nui rawa te whakapau moni a ngā poari, ka kī a ia ka tūmanako ia ki ngā whakamāramatanga taipitopito. E hiahia ana a ia ki te mōhio he aha i hapa ai rātau i ngā ūnga tapahi utu, ā, ka rapu i tētahi "huinga take māia" mai i a rātou. I whakaaturia e tōna tuatahi, a Lesley Griffiths, ka hiahia a ia ki te peke i ngā kaiwhakahaere ki te kore e tutuki i a rātau pukapuka i te mutunga o te tau ā-pūtea. Engari i kī a Tēnā Drakeford, i whakatūria i roto i tētahi whakararuraru ohorere i tēnei marama, e kore a ia e whakaaro ki "ngā tauhohenga turi". Kua whakatūria a Mr Drakeford i te wā o te huringa nui me te pēhanga pūtea ki te NHS, i te mea kei te whakatakoto mahere ngā poari hauora paetata ki te whakarite anō i ngā ratonga hōhipera. Heoi anō, i whakatūpato a ia i ngā poari hauora tērā pea he hua. Ka kī a ia: "Kāore au e tīmata mai i te tirohanga ko te whakakore i ngā tāngata me ngā papa me ērā atu mea, ko te tauhohenga wawe ki ngā mea ka tūpono - nā te mea e whakaaro ana ahau me titiro koe ki aua whakamārama. " Engari e hiahia ana ahau ki te mārama ki ngā poari hauora i Uēra - mēnā ka mōhio ahau ko ngā take kāore i tutuki i a rātou, kua rahua rātou ki te mahi i ngā mahi i taea e rātou, ā, kua mahia e ētahi atu poari hauora - kātahi ka tūmanako ahau kia noho te tangata ki aua kawenga." 'Ngā tiaki tika' I whakaūngia hoki e Tēnā Drakeford e kimi ana te kāwanatanga o Welsh ki te whakauru i ngā huringa ki te āhua o te pūtea o te NHS kia taea ai te tautuhi i ngā tahua i roto i te wā e toru tau, kaua i ia tau pērā ki tēnei wā. Engari i kī a ia e hiahia ana ia ki ngā parenga kia tino mōhio ai kāore te ratonga hauora i whakamahi i te kāwanatanga hou hei tāpae i ngā tāpaetanga nui i roto i te toru tau. "Ka kite ahau i tētahi take whakapakari kia āhei ai te ratonga hauora ki te tahua i roto i te huringa e toru tau. Engari ki taku whakaaro he mōrearea kei roto. "Me tino mārama ahau ki te NHS i Wales ehara tēnei i te "kāri puta atu i te whare herehere", i te takunga rānei kia kaua e noho i roto i ā rātou tikanga ki te raruraru i te toru o nga tau. " Me mātua mōhio mātou he tika ngā parenga kia kore ai e puta."

title: Ka pahū a Riddick ki te tari pouaka o Amerika
summary: Kua pūhia e te kaitapere o Vin Diesel ki te tihi o te tari pouaka o Amerika me Riddick, tana haerenga tuatoru i te wā i huri ai te herehere i te toa ārai.
text: I mahia e te whitiāhua te $18.7m (£11.9m) i tōna mutunga wiki tūwheratanga, e whakamana ana i te whetū, nāna i whakararuraru te mana o te pūāhua mai i te taiwhanga whitiāhua o Universal. Ko te Butler, e whakaatu ana i a Forest Whitaker hei kaimahi o te Whare Mā, e waru nga perehitini, i riro i a ia te wāhi tuarua. I taka te pakipūmeka a One Direction This Is Us ki te tau ono. I kite te pikitia Ahu-3 a te rōpū pahū i ōna whiwhinga mai i te $15.8m ki te $4.1m i tōna wiki tuarua o te putanga - engari he maha ngā wā kua whakahokia kētia tana pūtea $10m. I whakaarotia tuatahitia kua tīmataria te tari pouaka o Amerika i tērā mutunga wiki - engari i hurihia e ngā whika whakamutunga ngā whakatau tata o mua, ka whakahokia te Butler ki te tau tuatahi. Ko te tikanga ko te whakaari motika tūmatanui te pikitia tuatahi o te tau 2013 kia toru wiki i runga i te tūtohi. Ko Riddick anake te putanga hou i tērā wiki, engari i āwhina ki tētahi tari pouaka pōturi o Mahuru. "I te nuinga o te wā, ko te mutunga wiki i muri i te Rā Mahi tētahi o ngā mutunga wiki pōturi rawa o te tau," te kī a Paul Dergarabedian, he kaitātari mō Hollywood.com. "Na te tuku a Universal i tētahi whitiāhua pūtaiao hōu me tētahi o ngā whetū nui rawa o te ao, ka whai painga rātau i tērā, a, ka puta mai ki runga. I tino pai te āwhina i te mutunga wiki." Ko ētahi atu kiriata i roto i te rima o runga ko te kōrero kōrero reo Pāniora Kāore i Whakaurua, e hāngai ana, e whakahaeretia ana e te whetū pouaka whakaata o Mehiko, o Eugenio Derbez, i te tau toru. Ko te kōrero kōrero a Te Wānanga o Te Wānanga o Te Wānanga o Te Wānanga o Te Wā I te tuatahi ka tākaro a Vin Diesel i a Riddick, he kaihoko tauiwi me ngā whatu mura, i roto i te māngere pūtea iti o te tau 2000, o Pitch Black. I kitea ko tana mahi pakaru, i muri i ngā wāhanga moka i roto i ngā pikitia pēnei i te Tiaki Tūmataiti o Te Wānanga Tūmataiti. I hangaia e ia tētahi whainga hohenga ora, The Chronicles Of Riddick, i te tau 2004. I whakaeto ngā mahere mō ētahi atu wāhanga i te wā i tangohia e te pikitia te $116m anake, ki te tahua $100m. Engari i whai wāhi tuarua te pūāhua i te tononga a Universal ki a Vin Diesel kia hanga i tētahi cameo i roto i te The Fast and the Furious: Tokyo Drift i te tau 2006. I whakaae a ia, engari ehara i te utu, ka tonoa e ia ngā mana ki te pūāhua o Riddick. Kātahi ia ka parau i ana moni ki te pūtea i te pikitia tuatoru, i tino whara ai te pūāhua, ā, e ngana ana ki te tae ki tōna whenua tupu. He āhua whakarihariha, i hoki mai a Universal ki runga i te papa i te mutunga o te tākaro, ā, ko ia te kaiwhakarato o te pikitia i te nuinga o ngā rohe. E kī ana a Vin Diesel kei te whakarite kē a ia i tētahi wāhanga tuawhā. "E tino māia ana ahau ki tēnei ao, e tuku ana ki te pūāhua, e tuku ana ki te māngai, ā, e tino hiahia ana ahau ki ngā upoko e whai ake nei me ngā wāhi ka haere tēnei pūāhua," tana kī atu ki te Time Magazine.

title: Travis and The Wombats to headline music festival Belladrum
summary: Ko te pēne Pākehā ko Travis me ngā rockers o Liverpool The Wombats te upoko o te hākari pūoro Belladrum o tēnei raumati.
text: Ka tū te takahanga tata ki Beauly mai i te 3 ki te 4 o Aotearoa. Ko ngā hākari e toru whakamutunga kua hokona atu. Ka mahia hoki e te kaiwaiata wairua o Beverley Knight, te pēne indie o Glasgow Frightened Rabbit me te pēne US We Are Scientists Kua tohe ngā kaiwhakahaere ki ngā kaihaere hākari kia mōhio ki ngā tinihanga tīkiti i mua i te takahanga o tēnei tau. Na te kaiwhakahaere o te hākari a Joe Gibbs i tohutohu i ngā kaihoko me ngā kaihoko tīkiti tē hiahiatia kia whakamahi i "ngā tikanga haumaru, tika hoki o te whakawhiti i ā rātou tīkiti". Ka kī a ia: "I muri i te hokona atu o te takahanga i roto i ngā tau e toru kua taha, ka pouri kua rongo mātou i te nuinga o ā mātou kiritaki e tinihangatia ana e ngā kaihoko. " Kei tā mātou paetukutuku ngā taipitopito me pēhea te whakawhiti haumaru i ngā tīkiti ī-mēra me ngā tīkiti tāngia."

title: Nasa 2020 robot rover to target Jezero 'lake' crater
summary: E kī ana te pokapū mokowā o Amerika (NASA) ka tukuna tana takawaenga Mars 2020 ki tētahi tauwāhi e mōhiotia ana ko Jezero Crater.
text: E whakapono ana a Honatana AmosBBC Science Correspondent NASA ka taea e ngā toka i roto i tēnei peihana tata ki te 50km te whānui te pupuri i tētahi pūkete o te ora tahito i runga i te aorangi. Ko ngā atahanga aorangi o Jezero e tohu ana ki te wai awa, i tētahi wā ka tapahia i tōna tapa, ā, ka rere mā tētahi pūnaha delta ki tētahi roto nui. Ko te momo taiao tērā pea i tautoko i ngā moroiti i ētahi 3.5-3.9 miriona tau ki mua. He wā tēnei i mahana ake, i mākū ake ai a Mars i tēnei rā. He aha te mea motuhake o Jezero? Ko ngā whakaaturanga mō te aroaro o mua o tētahi roto, engari i kī a Ken Farley, te kaipūtaiao kaupapa NASA i runga i te mahi, he tino ātaahua hoki ngā whakataki delta. "He tino pai te delta ki te tiaki i ngā waitohu koiora - he whakaaturanga ora tērā pea i tīari i roto i te wai o te roto, i te atanga rānei o te parataiao me te wai o te roto, i ngā mea rānei i noho i te rohe mātāmua i tāhaetia e te awa, ā, i whakatakotoria ki roto i te delta," tana kī atu ki ngā kaipānui. Ko ngā momo toka maha o Jezero, tae atu ki ngā uku me ngā pākawa, he tino kaha ki te tiaki i ngā rāpoi ngota waro e tīwhiri ana ki te oranga o mua. I kōwhiria te māra hōhonu e 500m i muri i tētahi tukanga whakaaro e whā tau ki ngā kaipūtaiao o Mars. I roto i tētahi poipoi kakau witi i tangohia i te mutunga o te toamahi tīpakonga pae hōu rawa, ka puta mai te makau mārama. Ināianei kua tautokona e te whakahaeretanga a NASA te kōwhiringa. Kei te raki tonu a Jezero i te paenga o Mars. I tapaina ki tētahi taone i Pōngia-Herekowina. I ētahi reo Slavic ko te kupu "jezero" ko te tikanga hoki o te "roto". He pēhea te hononga o te 2020 ki ngā mahi ā muri ake? Ko tētahi atu o ngā whāinga matua o te karetao ko te tīpako me te "keteroki" i roto i ngā kēne iti ētahi tauira toka ka taea, ā muri ake nei, te kohikohi, ka whakahokia ki ngā taiwhanga Ao mō te tātaritanga. Kei te mahi tahi a NASA me te European Space Agency (Esa) i tēnei mahi, engari kāore i te mōhiotia te wā e hoki mai ai ngā ngongo tauira ki te kāinga. Ko te whakarite me Esa i te wāhanga tōmua, e kī ana a Thomas Zurbuchen, te rangatira pūtaiao o NASA. "E ai ki te putanga mai o ngā taipitopito, tērā pea i te tōmua o ngā tau 2030," tana whakamārama. He kape te takawaenga 2020 o Curiosity? I takea te takawaenga 2020 i runga anō i te karetao Curiosity kotahi tan i tau ai te kōwhiringa ki Gale Crater i te tau 2012. He tino angitu te whakamatemate, ā, e hiahia ana a NASA ki te tārua. Mā te whakamahi i te "tātauira" ōrite ka penapena moni hoki; I mahue ētahi tohunga taputapu mai i te tau 2012. E kī ana, he āhua rerekē te waka hou. Āe, ka āhuahira anō i ngā kāmera, he ringa karetao, he wiri me te taiaho - engari he huinga pūoko me ngā utauta tātari hōu, ā, he whakamātautau anō hei whakaatu me pēhea e mahi ai ngā kaiāwhina ā muri ake i te hāora i te Aorangi Whero. Ka whakamahia e te karetao hōu te hangarau "Skycrane" ōrite nāna i whakaheke te Curiosity i runga i te tino tika i te ono tau ki muri - engari me tētahi tāpiri-atu. Kua hangaia e ngā kaipūkaha tētahi pūnaha whakamahere ā-rere e kiia nei ko te Whakaterenga Pātahi Whenua, ā, ko te tikanga kia nui ake te tika ki te tukanga taunga. He aha atu anō ka taea e tātau te titiro whakamua ki Mars? Ka taea anake e ngā mahi ki Mars te whakarewa i roto i tētahi matapihi wā iti nā te tīaroaro o ngā aorangi. Ka wehe atu te mahi 2020 i te Ao i te Hōngongoi/Akuhata o taua tau, ā, me tau i te 18 o Huitanguru 2021. "He roa, he angitu hoki te pūkete aroturuki a NASA i Mars. Mai i te rere a Mariner 4 i te taha o Mars i te tau 1965, kua āwhiowhio mātau, kua ū mātou, ā, kua haereere mātou puta noa i te mata o te Aorangi Whero," te kī a Lori Glaze, te kaiwhakahaere whakahaere o te wehenga pūtaiao aorangi o NASA. "Ā, ka whai wāhi anō mātou ki te whakapai ake i tā mātou pūkete aroturuki i te wiki mai i tēnei rā ina taunga mātou i a InSight ki runga i te mata. Kei te titiro whakamua katoa mātou ki tēnā." Kāore i rite ki te 2020 me te Curiosity, he taunga pateko te Insight. Ko te whāinga tuatahi tēnei i whakatapua ki te "titiro ki roto" i te aorangi. Ka whakamahia e ia ngā ine rū hei whakarongo ki ngā "Marsquakes", hei āwhina ki te hanga i tētahi pikitia o te hanganga ā-roto o Mars. Kei te tukuna hoki e Esa he takawaenga ki Mars i te tau 2020. Nō nā tata nei i tīpakohia e ngā kaipūtaiao Pākehā a Oxia Planum hei ūnga mōna. E hua ana ngā atahanga aorangi, pērā ki a Jezero rāua ko Gale, ka roa te whakapā atu o tēnei whenua tahito ki te wai. Jonathan.Amos-INTERNET@bbc.co.uk me te whai i ahau i runga i Twitter: @BBCAmos

title: Ka peia e ngā Iwi Taketake o Koropia te taua i te pūtake i Cauca
summary: E kī ana ngā mema o tētahi rōpū taketake i Koromopia, tata ki te 100 ngā hōia i te pūtake hōia e tiakina ana e rātau i te takiwā o Cauca ki te tonga-māuru.
text: I hoatu e te iwi o NASA he rā kati pō ki nga ope haumarutanga kia haere. E kī ana rātau kua ngenge rātau i te mau i waenganui i ngā tautohetohe i waenganui i te taua me ngā mema o te rōpū whakakeke nui rawa o Koropia, te Farc. I kī te taua kua nekehia rangitahitia ōna tāngata kia kore ai e matapaki anō. I kī te rangatira o te ope taua a Tianara Ahuwhānui Navas i runga tonu nga hōia i te maunga i noho ai rātau, engari kua neke atu ki raro i tōna pākihi. I whakaahuatia e te pāpāho paetata he pēhea te karapoti a ētahi 1,000 NASA i te pou taua, ka mau i tētahi o ngā hōia, a, ka mauria ia kia 10m (35 waewae) ki raro i te maunga. Ka pūhia e tētahi hōia ki te hau ki te whakamararatanga i te NASA, nāna i maka oneone ki nga ope taua. E kī ana te NASA e 250 o rātau ka noho ki te tihi o te maunga kia kore ai e hoki mai nga hōia. Kua tipu haere te renarena i waenganui i ngā ope haumarutanga me ngā rōpū taketake huri noa i Toribio, i te takiwā o Cauca, mō te wiki kua taha. I muri iho i ngā rā o ngā whakaekenga a te hunga whakakeke Farc i runga i te teihana pirihimana i Toribio, ka tonoa e te NASA nga ope haumarutanga me te hunga whakakeke kia whawhai ki tētahi atu wāhi. I wetewetehia e rātau nga poka i whakatūria e nga ope haumarutanga. I haere hoki rātau ki runga i tētahi puni whakakeke i nga maunga, a, ka kī atu ki te Farc kia haere. I kī te Minita Whakangungu pānui matua, a Te Minita Whakangungu o Hōne Pinzon, ka noho tonu nga ope haumarutanga ki taua rohe, a, ka whawhai tonu ki te Farc. I kī a Tēnā Pinzon ka haere tonu te kāwanatanga ki te mahi ki te iwi taketake mā te "kōrero me te manaaki", engari i whakatūpato i a rātau kia kaua e whati i te ture. Ko te wāhi maunga poupou he pā o Farc, a, he pānui matua mo te hokohoko kokaini. E kī ana ngā rōpū taketake kai te mau rātau i te taumaha o te whawhai i waenganui i nga ope kāwanatanga me te hunga whakakeke. E kī ana rātau ko te aroaro o nga ope haumarutanga e kawe ana i te hunga whakakeke, ā, ko ōna moata e hapa ana i a rātau ūnga tika, a, ka patua e rātau ngā tangata whenua. E hiahia ana rātau ki te whakahaere i te rohe me te tiaki i a rātau anō.

title: Ko ngā kaiwhakahaere pae Gypsy i Newport ki te whawhai
summary: E kī ana ngā kaiwhakahauhau ki ngā mahere ki te hanga i ngā pae tūroro me ngā wāhi haere i Newport ka haere tonu rātau ki ta rātau whawhai ahakoa e toru ngā whenua e tohua ana.
text: Councillors voted to include the potential sites in the authority's development blueprint which sets out planning guidance until 2026. Neke atu i te 14,000 ngā tāngata i whakahē ki ngā pae i whakaritea i Ringland me Duffryn. Ināianei me whakaae ngā tono e te kāwanatanga o Welsh. I tēnei wā kāore he pae whai mana o Newport mō ngā gypsies me ngā kaihaere. Newport council wants to create a residential gypsy and traveller site, with up to 43 pitches, on land at Hartridge Farm Road. Engari e kī ana ngā kaiwhakahē he iti rawa te urunga, he nui rawa, ā, he tata rawa ki te Kura Tuarua o Llanwern. I ātete hoki rātau ki tētahi wāhi ohorere iti ake i ngā whakarato o Ringland nā te māharahara ki te rongonui arokite me ngā pou o runga. I kī a Frank Weston, te kaiwhakahaere o te rōpū ātete o Ringland Matters, ka whawhai tonu nga kaiwhakahauhau i nga kaupapa. I kī a ia e tūmanako ana ia ki te tūtaki i ngā kaitirotiro whakarite e tirotiro ana i te mahere whanaketanga paetata (LDP) a tērā tau ki te whakapuaki i ōna māharahara. "Kaore o mātau papā ki nga tangata haere, ko to mātau papā kei te mana," tana kī. "E whakapono ana mātou he pae pai ake, ā, ko te whai wāhi kotahi mō rātou katoa he tohutohu mo te aituā." Ngā kāinga hōu Ko te pae tūpono tuatoru kei Celtic Way i Imperial Park, Duffryn. I a Aotearoa, ka uru atu te minita pakihi o Wales i taua wā, a Edwina Hart, ki ngā umanga i te takiwā o Duffryn ki te whakahē i ngā tono mō tētahi wāhi ā-waka me te wāhi haere. I amuamu rātau ka whakaweto ngā kamupene hou ki reira, ā, ka mōrearea ngā mahi. All councils have a duty to provide facilities for gypsies and travellers under the Housing Act 2004. I whiwhi ngā mahere i te tautoko a te kaunihera katoa i tētahi hui i te Tāite, ā, ināianei ka tukuna atu ki te kāwanatanga o Welsh mō te whakaaetanga whakamutunga. Kei roto hoki i te LDP o Newport ngā tono tae atu ki te 11,622 ngā kāinga hou me ngā kaupapa huarahi nui e rima, tae atu ki ngā whakapainga i te komititanga 28 o te M4. E whakaaro ana te kaunihera e 7,400 ngā mahi hou ka waihangatia i roto i te oranga o te mahere ki te tau 2026.

title: Ka puritia e te Whāngai te mokatere ā muri ake nei hei tautohe manawanui
summary: Kua whakaaturia e te Federal Reserve e kore e whakarewaina ngā mokatere huamoni ākuanei, e tohu ana i tētahi whakarerekētanga ohorere mai i ngā kōrero tōmua i huatau ka āta whakanuia ngā utu.
text: I tautohe te pēke matua o Amerika kia "manawanui" e kī ana i te utunga o te utunga o te ohanga me ngā "au whakawhiti" o te ohaoha o nā noa nei. I puta tana kōrero i muri i te hui a te Whāngai o Hānuere, i reira kāore i hurihia ngā mokatere huamoni, e ai ki ngā mea e tūmanakohia ana. Ko ngā mākete, kua māharahara ki ngā mokatere tiketike, ka peke ki runga i te rongo. I whakamutua e te Dow Jones Industrial Average te rā neke atu i te 1.75% teitei ake, i whiwhi te S&P 500 i te 1.56% me te Nasdaq i piki ake te 2.2%. Mai i te tau 2015, kua pōturi te pikinga o te Whāngai i ngā mokatere mai i te tau 2015, e kī ana kua kore e hiahiatia ngā mokatere iti rawa i whakaritea i te wā o te raruraru pūtea. Engari i kī te Tūru Rāhui Hau, a Jerome "Piki" Powell i ngā huringa i ngā marama tata nei i whakamana i tētahi huarahi tūpato ake. "E kite ana mātou i ēnei rangirua," tana kī i tētahi hui pānui i Washington, e tohu ana ki tētahi whakahekenga o te ohaoha i Uropi me Haina, te whakaweto kāwanatanga o mua tata nei i te US me te tūponotanga o tētahi Pakihi. "Ka taea e mātou te tatari." Tātaritanga nā Andrew Walker, te korero ohaoha o te Ratonga Ao o TE AO: Kāore he huringa i roto i te kaupapahere mai i te Whanga, engari he huringa whakaatu ki te kōrero i whakaritea ki ā rātou kōrero i a Tīma. Kua rite te huatau kia ōrite anō ngā mokatere huamoni ki te whakatutuki i ā rātou whāinga ohaoha, pērā ki te tirohanga e whārite ana ngā mōrea ki te tirohanga o te ohaoha. Ināianei kua kitea ngā pēhanga utunga moni hei whakangū, ā, e kī ana te Whāngai ka manawanui ki te whakatau whakataunga mō ngā mokatere huamoni. Ko ngā huringa katoa e tohu ana ki te ahunga kotahi: he pēke matua e tūpato ake ana ki te tirohanga ohaoha mō te tupu, ā, he iti iho te māharahara ki ngā mōrea o te utunga nui ake. Ehara tēnā i te kī kei te tata tonu te Whāngai ki te huatau he mōrearea te whakahekenga. E kite tonu ana i te tupu tautokona hei ara tino pai mo te āhua o te whakahaerenga. Engari tērā te mea i karangatia e te Manukura Whāngai o Jerome Powell he au whakawhiti, pēnei i te tanuku o te hokohoko ki Haina, e hua ana he nui ake ngā mōrea o tētahi putanga iti iho. Heoi anō, ka whakahē a Tēnā Powell i te pātaitanga mehemea i tohua e tēnei he mutunga ki te piki o te mokatere. "Ka whakawhirinaki katoa te roanga o tēnei wā tūroro ki ngā raraunga taumai me ōna pānga ki te tirohanga," tana kī. He tokomaha nga kaitirotiro i kī ka whakaaro rātau ka whakarewaina anō e te Whāngai ngā mokatere i tēnei tau, ki te whakaaro kei te ora tonu te āhua o te whakahaerenga o Amerika. "He nui ake tēnei pēnei i te okioki i te tohu kaha e whakapono ana rātau ko rātau te mutunga o te huringa hīkoi," te kī a te rangatira o te ohanga o Fitch Ratings, a Kōrero Coulton. "Mā te ārai i tētahi hinganga tino nui o te ao, ka kite tonu mātou i ētahi atu pikinga mokatere ā muri ake i tēnei tau." I homai hoki e te pēke matua o Amerika ētahi atu taipitopito mō ana mahere hei whakaiti i tana kōpaki here me ngā haumarutanga pūrua mōkete. I kī te Whāngai ka pupuri i tētahi putanga "rawaka" o ngā rāhui, ā, ka taea te whakarite i te tere o te hoko mēnā ka heke te āhua o te whakahaerenga. I whai te kōrero i te tono a te kaiwhakangao kia nui ake te māramatanga.

title: Pet Shop Boys bring a pop masterclass to Hyde Park
summary: "I menemene a ia!" te karanga a tētahi mema o te hunga whakarongo i runga i te mīharo, i te wā e kōrero ana te Pet Shop Boys i te Papa o Hyde Park o Rāwāhi.
text: Nā Mark SavageBBC kaipānui pūoro A, i tika a ia: Ko Pirihi Lowe, te kaitākaro papapātuhi o te pēne, i te tākaro i tētahi pana tawhito nui i a ia e whiu ana i te raina pango ki West End Girls. Ko te āhua nei i ohorere a ia i te whiwhinga a te huihuinga ki ta rātau huinga, he wāhanga o tētahi takahanga rā roa i puritia e te Reo Irirangi 2. "He tino pai tēnei," te kōrero a Neil Tennant mai i te atamira. "He tino pai te noho ki konei". Ko te āhua nei he tino hiranga te pūrehurehu synthpop, nāna i tuhi anō ngā ture o te pahū i ngā tau 80 me te 90, ki tēnei mahi, ahakoa te whakarerekē i tā rātou rārangi huinga paerewa kia "nui ake ngā taunga", ka kī atu a Tennant ki te Reo Irirangi 2 i mua. "He tino mīharo te mahi i tētahi huinga haora roa me ētahi atu taunga - engari ki taku whakaaro he huinga e hiahia ana koe kia rongo te hunga whakarongo ki te whakakaha." I whakahokia e te huihuinga kaha e 40,000 te ohaoha mā te hono atu ki ngā tauhira pēnei i Suburbia, It's A Sin and Left To My Own Devices. Kore rawa he kaiwhakaatu māori, ka homai e te pūhopa he tirohanga arokite mā tētahi rōpū kaikanikani nui, nāna i whakakaha a Vocal ki tētahi mahi pana-kume tino nui, ā, i homai he pīhono tae i roto i o rātau kākahu pūangi pupuhi i te wā o te encore. He torutoru noa iho ngā manuhiri ohorere mō te mehua pai - ko Olly Alexander o ngā Tau & Tau e takirua ana i runga i te Dreamland hou o te pēne, ā, ko Beverley Knight e waihanga anō ana i ngā kupu a Dusty Springfield i runga i te What Have I Done To Deserve This. "Āe, ka mahia e mātou tētahi atu waiata tawhito," te pānui a Tenant ki te mutunga o te huinga. "Engari ko tēhea waiata tawhito? He nui rawa ngā mea hei kōwhiri." I tāhaetia e ia te hunga whakarongo ki ngā kongakonga o Ngā Wāhi me te Rēti i mua i te riff synth tē mōhiotia mō Go West - e akiaki ana i tētahi atu waiata maha, me ētahi kaihautū e mau ana i ngā pōtae koeko e kore e warewaretia o te ataata. I whakamutua te huinga ki te hopu i te 2016's The Pop Kids, he waiata e mahi ana hei hītori kōhua o te pēne: "I tamariki mātou engari i whakaaro mātou he tino mātauranga mātou / E kī ana ki ngā tāngata katoa i mōhio mātou kua nui rawa te toka." Mā te toka katoa engari i tapa atu i ngā tūtohi, me ngā rehetoi pēnei i a Charli XCX, Billie Eilish, me Years & Years e hanga ana i runga i te tātauira pakū o Pet Shop Boys, ehara i te mea mīharo i te menemene a Pirihi Lowe: I pēnei te mahi i te hīkoi hōnore me te karaehe pakū i hurihia ki roto i te kotahi. I tae mai te huinga o te pēne i te mutunga o te Hākari o te Reo Irirangi 2 i Tētahi Rā, i reira hoki i roto i te pire ko Simply Red, Clean Bandit me Status Quo - nāna i mahi me tētahi hopuoro wātea e tū ana i runga i te atamira, hei whakahonore i te kaiwaiata o Rick Parfitt, i mate i te tau 2016. I te purei i te kāniwha tautoko, ka tāia e Westlife te huihuinga nui rawa o te rā mō tētahi huinga waiata rama, tae atu ki You Lift Me Up me Flying Without Wings. Heoi anō, me wehe atu te whetū wairua o Emeli Sande, i te takahanga, e kī ana: "I oho ake ahau i tēnei ata, ā, kāore tōku reo i reira." Anei ētahi o ētahi atu wā e tika ana kia mōhiotia: Ko te whakamatenga o te tina o Pananarama i tētahi whakaaro tūturu, neke atu i te 2,500 ngā pikiniki i takahia ki te whenua i te pekenga o ngā kaihautū ki ngā pahū mōhinuhinu o te 80 o Panana: Kōpū, I Rongo Ahau i Tētahi Rongo, Aroha I Te Waeine Tuatahi... Ka haere tonu te rārangi. I a ia e kōrero ana i muri i te atamira, ka whakaaturia e Sarah rāua ko Keren ko te wā whakamutunga i noho ai rāua i Hyde Park hei kaihautū, e mātakitaki ana i te whakaaturanga o te hokinga mai o Barbra Streisand i te tīmatanga o tēnei raumati. "Ko te waiata tuatahi i hopukina e mātau ko Evergreen nā Barbara Streisand, i runga i tētahi pūpāpāho rīpene i a mātau i te kura," te mahara a Keren. Ka pouri, kua ngaro tēnei wā kaurori i roto i te hītori pahū i roto i te kohu o te wā. "He maha aku rīpene tawhito, engari i ahu taku tuakana ki te hopu i te nuinga o aua rīpene. Ko Bruno Brookes e mahi ana i te Top 40 me tēnā momo mea," te kī a Keren. Me pēhea te waihanga anō i te uhi mō tā rātou pukaemi panuku? "He putanga disco?" te pātai a te kaiwaiata. "Kātahi anō ahau ka ngana ki te whakaaro i roto i tōku māhunga, ā... kāore pea." He whakangungu whakangungu uaua a Francis Rossi Ko Status Quo tētahi o ngā taunga nui rawa o te rā - me ngā rau o ngā kaihautū e waihanga anō ana i te kanikani hurihuri ringa mō Down Down; whai muri i te waiata whakaongaonga ki Rockin' All Over The World. Te āhua nei he tekau tau te tamariki ake o Frontman Francis Rossi i ōna tau e 70 i a ia e hīkoi ana i te atamira - engari kāore i te ngāwari noa iho tēnā momo tākaro. "He pai ki a au te ōrite ki te tika, nā reira i kauhoe rua ahau i tēnei ata ki te ngana ki te takatū i a au," tana kī i roto i tōna rūma whakakākahu, i a ia e whakawhāiti ana i ōna maihao i runga i tētahi whakakaha pupuri kōanga. "I kai ahau i te 11:30 i te ata nei nā te mea e hiahia ana ahau ki te waiho i te ono haora i waenganui i te kai me te whakaaturanga; ā, ka mahi ahau i ētahi karihi ruarua, nā te mea ka āwhina tēnā ki te pahū i te poho me te diaphragm, mō tētahi take." Ko wai i kī he ngāwari noa iho te oranga o ngā whetū toka? I whakamāramatia e Kelsea Ballerini tētahi waiata hou a te whetū whenua o Amerika, a Kelsea Ballerini, i waenganui i te tāhopu i tana pukaemi tuatoru, ka puta puta mai i te Atarangi ki te whakatangi i tana takitahi hou, Homecoming Queen, mō te wā tuarua anake. Nā reira i āmaimai a ia ki te whakatangi i ngā rauemi kāore anō kia whakamātauria ki ngā tāngata e 40,000? Kāore i te tino pai. "Ki taku whakaaro tērā pea he hunga whakarongo tēnei me whakamōhio atu ahau ki a au," tana kī mārire i mua i te whakaaturanga. "Kua rite ahau kia kore tētahi o rātou e mōhio ki tētahi o aku waiata - nā reira ka tangohia te pēhanga o te waiata hōu tūturu ina āhua hou katoa." Kua mahi a Clean Bandit i Haina Hou mai i te angitu o te tito i a Shawn Mendes me Camila Cabello's Senorita, kua haere atu a Clean Bandit ki Haina, i reira rātau e tuhi ana me ngā whetū e rua o Henry Lau, me Tia Ray. He āhua whakatuwhera whatu te haere ki Shanghai mo te pēne. "I tino ohorere mātau i ngā studios i mauria ai mātau ki reira," te kī a Jack Patterson. "He whakamīharo rātau, kāore koe e kite i ngā studios hou e hangaia ana pēnei i tētahi atu wāhi o te ao. He rerekē te taumata pūtea penapena i roto i te umanga pūoro." Ahakoa rā, i tūpono te pēne ki ētahi uauatanga, me ngā ratonga karere pēnei i a WhatsApp i rāhuitia i Haina. "I pēnei mātou, 'He aha te take kāore he tangata e whakautu ana? E kino ana rātau ki a mātau?'" te kī a te kaiwaiata o Grace Chatto. "I te mutunga, me whakamahi mātou i tētahi taupānga motuhake." I tēnei wā, ka whakaaturia e te pēne kua tīmata te mahi i runga i ta rātau pukaemi tuatoru, e āhei ana ki te pānui i tētahi huringa ahunga. "He torutoru noa iho ngā waiata e mahi ana mātou ki te whakaoti ināianei he nui ake ki te tere me te kāhua hip-hop," te kī a Grace. "He momo whakapakari tēnā hei mahere i roto i ngā wiki e rua kua taha." Whāia mātou i runga i Facebook, i Twitter @BBCNewsEnts rānei. Mēnā he huatau pūrākau tāu, īmēra entertainment.news@bbc.co.uk.

title: Ka tū a Prof Michael Scott o te Whare Wānanga o Glyndwr
summary: Kua pānuitia e te pāhi i te Whare Wānanga o Wrexham me tū a ia a tērā tau.
text: I puta mai te pānuitanga a Prof Michael Scott i te wiki kotahi i whai mana ai te whare wānanga ki te tautoko i ngā tauira ao whānui i whakahokia mai e te Tari Kāinga. I whakatūria i te tono ākonga o rāwāhi i te wā o June i muri i te tūhuratanga ki te tinihanga visa e kiia ana. I kī a ia na te hikinga o te whakatārewatanga i āhei ai ia ki te whakaaro anō ki tōna ake tūnga. I roto i tētahi kōrero, ka kī a ia: "Ka taea te whakangāwari i ngā rongo e āhei ai mātou ki te mahi hanga anō me te tiaki i te whare wānanga mō te painga o ngā ākonga, ngā kaiāwhina me ngā hapori e mahi ana mātou. " Ahakoa kāore au i roto i tētahi tūnga i tēnei wā ki te hoatu pānui tika i raro i ngā ture o taku kirimana mahi, ka taea e au te tohutohu ko tōku whakaaro o nāianei e hiahia ana ahau ki te tuku i taku tūranga hei tumuaki tumuaki i tētahi wā i roto i te tau maramataka e whai ake nei." I kī te tumuaki o te Whare Wānanga o Tā Jon Shortridge: "Ka mahi ngātahi tonu te poari kawana ki a Ahorangi Scott kia tukua rā anō e ia te rākau rākau ki tētahi kaiwhakawhiwhi e hanga ana i runga i ana whakatutukitanga tino pai."

title: I kī atu a Tā Tom Jones 'e kore ia e tutuki i ngā makawe mingimingi'
summary: Kua kī te kaiwaiata Welsh me te ata o Tā Tom Jones i whakatūpatotia ia i te tōmua o tana mahi e kore ia e tutuki nā te mea he "macho rawa" a ia, ā, he makawe mingimingi tōna.
text: Ka noho te kaiwaiata Sex Bomb ko tētahi o ngā whetū nui rawa o te ao, e whiwhi ana i ngā mihi mai i a Elvis Presley rāua ko Frank Sinatra. Engari i kī atu te pakeke 80 tau ki te Whakaaturanga Parakuihi Pōro Zoe i runga i te Reo Irirangi 2 kia tīmata i a ia e "tukituki ana i ngā wā katoa". "I te kōrero tētahi pēnei, 'kāore e mahi anō ngā makawe mingimingi... ā, he āhua macho rawa koe'," tana kī. "I kī ahau, 'aroha mai mō tēnā engari koia tēnā ahau'." I kī a Tā Tom i "pana tonu ia" mai i tana haerenga mai i Uēra ki Rānana.
