"E ngana ana rātau ki te huri i a koe me te hanga i a koe, ā, ka mahi koe i ngā mea e haere ana i taua wā," tana kī atu ki te whakaaturanga. "I kī rātau kua 'ngaro te kāhua o Elvis Presley'. I kī atu ahau, 'kaua i roto i tōku hinengaro, kāore i roto i tōku ngākau!'." I tāpiri mai a Tā Tom i a ia e "whakahē ana" i tōna āhua, tae atu ki te ihu whati. I kī a ia i kī atu a ia ki ngā rangatira pūoro: "I te tino pai taku mahi i Wales nā reira kāore au e kite i tētahi rerekētanga nui i waenganui i Wales me Ingarangi. " E kōrero Ingarihi ana tātau katoa, he aha te mea nui?" I tīmata a Tā Tom, mai i Pontypridd, i tana mahi waiata ki te tākaro i ngā hōro kanikani me ngā karapu tāngata mahi huri noa i te tonga o Wales, i mua i tana neke ki Rānana. Ko tana takitahi tuatahi - Chills And Fever i te mutunga o te tau 1964 - kāore i mahia ngā tūtohi engari ko tana whai ake, It's Not Unusual, he taunga inamata. I kī te kaiako Reo i tana takitahi hou No Hole In My Head i pā ki tōna wheako. "E kī ana tēnei waiata ki a koe - 'Kaua e ngana ki te puru i ngā mea ki roto i tōku māhunga, kāore he puare i roto i tōku māhunga, kaua e ngana ki te whakakī i ngā mea e hiahia ana koe kia mahia e au'," tana kī. I kōrero a Tā Tom i mua i te pāohotanga Hootenanny ā-Tau a Jools i te Pō o te Tau Hou kua whiwhi ia i te kano ārai mate coronavirus, i whakaahuatia e ia he "pai - he rite ki te whiwhi i te wero rewharewha". "He mea pai tēnā mo te 80 - ko koe te tuatahi mo te jab," tana kī atu ki te kaiwhakaatu o Jools Holland.

title: Tara Whelan: I kitea te taiohi ngaro i muri i te tono pirihimana
summary: Kua kitea he taitamariki ngaro he haumaru, he pai hoki, kua whakaūngia e nga pirihimana e rapu ana i a ia.
text: I kitea whakamutunga a Tara Whelan, 18, i Market Street i Halifax i te ata o te 15 o Hakihea e tīmata ana i tētahi kimi pirihimana me te tono tuihono kia kimi i a ia. I kī nga Pirihimana o Te Uru o Aotearoa i tētahi tangata 39 tau i hopukina e pā ana ki tōna ngaronga kua tukua mai i te tiakitanga. Ka mihi te ope ki te iwi whānui mo ta rātau āwhina. Whāia a BBC Yorkshire i Facebook, Twitter me Instagram. Tukua ō whakaaro pūrākau ki te yorkslincs.news@bbc.co.uk, tukua rānei he ataata ki konei. Ngā Hononga Ipurangi Pātahi Pirihimana o Te Hauauru

title: E panga ana a Paniora i te wāhi o Kīngi o Kīngi Juan Carlos
summary: Tērā te taurangi kaha i roto i te pāpāho Pāniora mō te wāhi o te Kīngi o Kīngi Juan Carlos, i muri i tana pānuitanga ohorere i te Mane e wehe ana a ia i te whenua.
text: I pānuitia e te pakeke e 82 tau, ko ia te kaupapa o tētahi rūpahu hāmate, te nekehanga i roto i tētahi reta i runga i te paetukutuku ariki. Kāore i hoatu he taipitopito mō tōna ūnga, engari ko ētahi pūrongo e hua ana kua haere a ia ki te Whenua o Tominika. Heoi anō, ka kī ngā kaiwhakahaere i reira kāore ō rātou mōhiohio e haere mai ana a ia. I kī tētahi kaiwhakaatu mo te ratonga manene o te iwi o Kāriana kāore a ia i tomo ki te whenua, ahakoa ngā pūrongo kua tae mai a ia i te Tūrei. Engari i kī a ia i reira mō ētahi rā mai i te mutunga o Hui tanguru ki te tōmua o Poutāpeta. E kī ana te Pirimia o Pedro Sánchez kāore a ia i te mōhio kei hea te kīngi o mua. I roto i tana reta, ka kī a Hoani Kānata ka wātea a ia mehemea e hiahia ana ngā rōia ki te kōrero ki a ia. I Hune, ka whakatuwheratia e te Kōti Matua o Paniora tētahi tūhuratanga ki tōna whakauru ki tētahi kirimana tere rawa i Hauti Arapia. E kī ana te korero kōrero o Aotearoa, a Nick Beake, he putanga whakamā tēnei mō tētahi kīngi i mua i te hītori hei kaiārahi nāna i ārahi pūkenga a Paniora ki te kāwanatanga ā iwi i muri i te matenga o Tianara Wānanga i te tau 1975. I te tau 2014, ka whakataka a Juan Carlos, a, ka hoatu ki tana tama a Felipe. He aha te kōrero a te pāpāho Pāniora? He maha nga kōrero e hoatu ana e nga nūpepa mo nga haerenga a te kīngi o mua. E kī ana a La Vanguardia i haere ia ki Potukara i te atatū o te Mane, ā, e whakaaro ana ia ki te rere ki te Dominican Republic ki te noho tahi me ōna hoa. I kī a ABC, tētahi atu ia rā, kei te Whenua Tominika kē a ia. Engari i kī a El Confidencial tērā pea kei Potukara, Wīwī, Itari rānei. I tēnei wā, kua kore a El Pais e taurangi i te tautohetohe mo te wāhi o Juan Carlos. I Potukara, i kī te pāpāho i ngā taone tauranga o Estoril, o Cascais rānei. Kaore he pūrongo mai i te Dominican Republic kei te whenua Karipiana a ia. He aha te kōrero a te reta? I roto i te reta, ka tuhituhi te ariki o mua e haere ana ia "i mua i ngā rara tūmatanui e puta ana i ētahi mahi o mua i roto i tōku oranga tūmataiti" me te tūmanako kia whakaaetia tana tama ki te mahi i ana mahi hei kīngi i runga i te "rangimārie". I kī te kōrero mai i te whare o Zarzuela kua tukuna e Kingi Felipe VI "tōna manaaki me tōna whakamoemiti" ki tōna pāpā mo tēnei whakataunga. I Poutāpeta, ka whakarerea e Kīngi Felipe VI te taonga tuku iho o tōna pāpā. I kī hoki te whare kingi i taua wā ka mutu te whiwhi moni ā-tau o te €194,000 ($228,000; £174,520). He aha nga kōrero a nga kaipōrangapū ārahi? I kōrero te Pirimia o Sanchez ki te pāpāho i muri i tētahi hui kāpata, ā, ka whakapuakina te "manaaki pūmau" a te kāwanatanga mo te whakatau a Juan Carlos kia neke ki rāwāhi. I Paniora e tika ana kia whakawāteatia ngā tāngata, ehara i ngā rōpū, tana kī. I ngā wā katoa e hiahiatia ana e te whenua "ngā rōpū pūmautanga me ngā rōpū pakari" i haere mai me te "pūataata me te whakatupuranga anō". Engari na te nekehanga i whakararuraru ai te hoa tauwhāinga parirau mauī o te pirimia, o Podemos. I kī a Irene Montero, te minita ōritetanga o Paniora, kāore a Podemos i mōhio ki ngā whakaritenga i waenganui i te whare ariki me te kāwanatanga. I kī a ia na te wehenga atu o Hoani Kānata i mahue ai te whānau ariki Pāniora i roto i tētahi "tūnga tino whakararuraru, mārire hoki" ā, kāore te iwi o Paniora "e whakaae ki te hāmate anō, ki te whiu rānei ake". He aha te tūhuratanga hāmate? Kua kī te Kōti Matua o Paniora e whai ana ki te whakatū i te hononga o Juan Carlos ki te kirimana o Arapia i muri i tana whakarerenga. I toa ngā kamupene Pāniora i tētahi mahi €6.7bn (£6bn) ki te hanga i tētahi hononga rēra Mekaha-Medina. Kei roto hoki i te rūpahu nga pēke o Huiterangi. E whakapae ana ngā kaiwhakahaere ārai hāmate Pāniora i puritia e te kīngi o mua ētahi moni kāore anō kia mōhiotia i Huiterangi, ā, kei te haere tētahi tūhuratanga o Huiterangi. Kua kī te kāwanatanga Pāniora "he ōrite te tika mō te katoa" ā, e "kore e whakararuraru" i te uiuinga. Kingi Juan Carlos

title: Tumuaki G8: I whakatikaina te haumarutanga o te taunga rererangi i mua i te hui
summary: Kua whakatūpato te Ratonga Pirihimana o Aiarangi ki te Raki mō te raruraru tūpono i roto i te Taunga Rererangi Ao o Belfast nā te tihi o G8.
text: Ka rere nga kaiarahi o te ao ki te taunga rererangi, ka haere ki ta raatau hui i te Lough Erne Resort i Enniskillen, County Fermanagh, i te 17 me te 18 o Hune. E waru nga upoko o te kāwanatanga e haere mai ana. Kua tuhituhi nga pirihimana ki nga tāngata e noho tata ana ki te taunga rererangi ki te whakamōhio atu ki a rātau mo te mahi haumarutanga nui. Kua whakaritea te tihi e te Tari Whenua me te Kotahitanga, ā, ka haere mai nga upoko o Kānata, Wīwī, Tiamana, Itari, Hapanihi, Rūhia, Te Hononga o Ingarangi me Te Hononga o Amerika. I roto i tētahi reta ki ngā tangata i te taha o te taunga rererangi, ka kī te Kaiwhakahaere Matua o Henry Irvine ka haere tahi ngā kaiārahi me ngā tonotono nui. "Ko te tikanga, ko te pikinga o ngā tau manuhiri ka puta he raruraru ki te whatunga waka," tana kī. "Ka tohutohutia ngā tāngata e haere ana i te 16, 17 me te 18 o Pipiri 2013 kia waiho he wā anō mō tō rātou haerenga. " Kua kawea hoki e ngā hui G8 o mua he maha ngā rōpū whakahē. Ka whakarite ngā pirihimana mō tēnei tūponotanga, ā, ka puta anō pea tēnei i ētahi raruraru ki te whatunga waka. "Ko te hua, ka tino kitea e ngā pirihimana puta noa i ngā wāhanga o te Rohe o Antrim puta noa i te roanga o te hui G8." I kī nga pirihimana tērā pea he nui te haumarutanga i runga i nga ara katoa huri noa i te taunga rererangi. Tērā anō tētahi "pirihimana nui ake i te pirihimana pūnoa me te aroaro haumarutanga" i roto i te Taunga Rererangi Ao o Belfast i ngā rā e tae atu ana ki te taenga mai o ngā kaitautapa. I roto i tētahi kōrero, ka tāpiritia e te PSNI: "He mea tika tēnei, ā, e kore e taea. Heoi anō, ka taea e ngā tangata whenua te whakaū ka whakaritea e ngā pirihimana he whakaritenga mō te uru ki ngā kāinga me ngā whenua ahuwhenua mō te hunga e pāngia hāngai ana. "Ka whakapā hāngai atu ēnei tāngata i te wā e tika ana." Ka pā hoki ngā tikanga haumarutanga nui ake ki ngā waka huri noa i Antrim, Crumlin, Templepatrick me Killead. Ka mahia ngā taki waka, ā, ko te tangata e noho ana, e toro ana, e mahi ana rānei i taua rohe. Kua whakarewaina hoki e te PSNI ngā pae Facebook me Twitter G8 hei whakarato i ngā mōhiohio hōu rawa. He maha ngā hui tūmatanui ka tū i ngā wiki me ngā marama e heke mai nei kia mōhio ai te tangata ki te āhuatanga. Kua whakanuia hoki te haumarutanga i tētahi wāhi whānui e karapoti ana i te hōtēra e puritia ana te tihi i ngā wiki tata nei me ngā tautiaki pirihimana, ngā wāhitaki waka me ngā ārai haumarutanga. I tērā marama, i kitea tētahi pūrere e pupuri ana i te 60 kiroki o ngā pakū e 16 maire te mamao atu i te tauranga korowha o Lough Erne. I muri iho ka whakakorea.

title: Coombe Abbey Park tango i te pōhatu urupa me te ingoa whakahāwea
summary: Kua pōhiritia te tangohanga o tētahi pōhatu urupa mōkai e mau ana i te reo whakahāwea e te tangata nāna i pūrongo tuatahi.
text: I pūrongotia e te tangata, e hiahia ana kia mōhiotia ko Nathan, te "kupu tino whakahāwea" i runga i te pōhatu urupa mai i te tau 1902 i Coombe Abbey Park, i Coventry, i tērā o Hōngongoi. I kī a ia i pūrongotia e ia ki te kaunihera, ki ngā pirihimana me te pāka, engari kāore he mea i mahia i taua wā. "Ka taea e mātou te whakaū i te pōhatu hītori hei whakamaharatanga ki tētahi mōkai aroha," te kī a te Kaunihera Taone o Coventry. I pūrongotia tuatahitia te tangohanga e Coventry Live. I a ia e kōrero ana ki te BBC, ka kī a Nathan: "He hipanga tōrunga, e hiahia ana ahau ki te mōhio nā wai i whakatau kia kaua e tango i taku pātai tuatahi, he aha hoki i hoki whakamuri ai rātou ināianei. " Ki taku whakaaro ka whakahuatia ēnei mea, ā, he nui rawa te whakangungu, e whakaaro ana rātau mēnā ka kōrero rātau i tētahi mea, e tohu ana kei te whakaae rātau ki te whakahāwea. He roa te huarahi o Ingarangi ki te haere." I kī a ia i tana tuhituhi tuatahi i te pikitia o te pōhatu urupa, he tokomaha ngā tāngata i "tino riri" me te kī me waiho tētahi mea hītori anake. 'He mārama te tūnga o te whakahāweatanga' Engari i kī a Natana ehara te pāka, "kei reira ngā tamariki e tākaro ana" i te tautuhinga, ka tāpiri, "me noho i roto i tētahi whare taonga ki tētahi wāhi". "E tino pouri ana hoki ahau kāore tētahi o ngā tāngata i amuamu ahau ki te urupare mai ki a au," tana whakamārama. "Ki taku whakaaro kāore i te nui te manaakitanga o ngā tangata pango noa kia whiwhi whakautu kia uru rā anō te pāpāho." I tāpiritia e tētahi kaikawe kōrero o te kaunihera o te taone: "He mārama to mātau tūnga mo te whakahāwea, ahakoa nō tētahi atu wā te pōhatu urupa, kāore i te tika i tēnei rā." Whāia a BBC West Midlands i Facebook, Twitter me Instagram. Tukua ō whakaaro pūrākau ki: newsonline.westmidlands@bbc.co.uk

title: Ngā Kararehe Mīharo: Kāore a Dumbledore i te 'mārama' i roto i te pikitia hou
summary: E kore a Dumbledore e whakaahuatia hei tāne "mārama" i roto i te whitiāhua Fantastic Beasts e whai ake nei, ā, ka matekiri ngā kaihautū.
text: I te tau 2007, i whakaaturia mai te pūāhua, i tākarotia e Hura Ture i roto i te whitiāhua, he tāne e JK Rowling i te tau 2007. Engari e kī ana te kaiwhakahaere o Ngā Kararehe Mīharo: Ko ngā Hara o Grindelwald, a Rawiri Yates, e kore tōna tōkaitanga e whakahuatia. "Kāore i te mārama," te kī a Rawiri, i te pātaitanga i roto i tētahi uiuinga ki Entertainment Weekly. "Engari ki taku whakaaro e mōhio ana ngā kaihautū katoa ki tēnā. He tino kaha tōna pātahitanga ki a Grindelwald i a rāua e taitamariki ana." "I aroha rātau ki ngā whakaaro o tētahi, me ngā ariā me tētahi," tana tāpiri mai. E whakapono ana ētahi kaihautū ko te tōkaitanga o Dumbledore te kī ki te pūrākau o Ngā Kararehe Mīharo, i te mea e arotahi ana te pūrākau ki te pātahitanga i waenganui i ngā pūāhua tāne e rua. A, he pātai anō mō te karere e whakaiti ana i te tōkaitanga o Dumbledore mō ngā kaimātakitaki taitamariki LGBT. Kua urupare a JK Rowling ki te whakahē, e tīwhiri ana ka taea te hōpara i te pātahitanga i waenganui i a Dumbledore me Gellert Grindelwald i roto i ngā pikitia ā muri ake. E kī ana a ia kua tukuna tuihonotia e ngā kaihautū tana tūkino i runga i te whakaaturanga i tuhia e ia mō te whainga o ngā Kararehe Mīharo. E tākarotia ana a Grindelwald e Hōnea i roto i te whitiāhua hou, Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald - he mea kua kitea hoki he tautohetohe mō ngā kaipūkino. I riri nga kaipāngai i a ia e purei ana i a Grindelwald i muri i nga whakapae tūkino i te kāinga ki te wahine o mua o Amber Heard. Ngā Kararehe Mīharo: Ko ngā Hara o Grindelwald ka tukua i te 16 o Whiringa 2018, ā, ko ngā whetū hoki ko Eddie Redmayne, Katherine Waterson, Ezra Miller me Zoe Kravitz. Whakarongo ki Newsbeat live i te 12:45 me te 17:45 i ia rā o te wiki i te Reo Irirangi 1 me te 1Xtra - ki te hapa koe i a mātau ka taea e koe te whakarongo mai ki konei

title: Kua pana kē atu a Wales me Ingarangi i te mate urutā?
summary: He rerekē te whakahaere a ngā iwi o UK i a Covid, e akiaki ana i ētahi whakaaro hōhonu me pēhea te mahi o ngā whanaungatanga ā muri ake.
text: Na Alex ForsythPolitical correspondent, BBC News I te ata waenganui o Poutāpeta, i te taha o te pēne i Bellevue Park, ko ngā whaea o Carly Griffith rāua ko Becca Butler - he pēpi i roto i ngā ringa, e tū ana i tētahi tawhiti haumaru Covid - i whakaarohia i te tau kua hipa. E noho ana rātau i Wrexham, i te raki o Weera, kāore i tawhiti atu i te rohe ki Ingarangi. Mai i konei, kua kitea ake ngā ture rerekē me ngā rāhuitanga e pā ana ki ia whenua i te wā o te mate urutā. "Kua tino mōhio mātou he taone taitapa mātou," te kī a Carly. "A, he iti noa iho ngā rerekētanga. Engari ki taku whakaaro kāore i tino mārama ināianei. "Kei te mahi katoa mātou i tā mātou ake mea ināianei, ā, kāore au i te whakaaro i mōhio te katoa kei a mātou te mana ki te mahi." He rerekē te whakahaere a ngā iwi e whā o Te Hononga o Ingarangi i te taiepa, e whakarato ana i tētahi tauira o te mana whakahaere i roto i te mahi. Ki a Becca, he mea pai kua neke te kāwanatanga o Welsh i tōna ake tere. "Ki taku whakaaro kua tino pai ta rātau whakahaere," tana kī. "E rua ngā mea rerekē ngā tau i Ingarangi i whakaritea ki Weera, nā reira mēnā he pai ake ngā tau i Weera, āe, me tere ake ngā mea." "He huānga pai," ko te tāpiri mai a Carly. "Me mahi mātou i ā mātou ake whakataunga, engari kei te whakaaro ahau me mahi ngātahi tētahi ki tētahi." I te takutai ki te raki o Wales, e hākinakina ana ngā mārena me ngā whānau i te rā o te kōanga i te taone o Rhos-on-Sea. Engari, i waho noa iho o te hāereere, ka noho wātea te Peacock Lounge, he pae me te wharekai. Pēnei i ngā wāhi manaaki katoa, kāore e taea te whakatuwhera. Kua pōrearea te rangatira o Phillip Ashe i ngā rāhuitanga rerekē i Ingarangi me Weera, nāna i kī kua pōraru ngā kiritaki me te pānga ki tana umanga. "E 185 maire te tawhiti atu o Kānata i a mātau," tana kī. "E 30 meneti mātou i Te Aotearoa. I haere mai ngā tūruhi katoa o Chester ki konei me te whakaaro he ōrite ngā ture, ina kāore." I kī a Piripi nā te mate urutā i pātai ai ia ki te hiahia mō tētahi Pāremata o Welsh. "He tōrangapū tēnei mai i te rā tuatahi," tana tāpiri mai. "Ko te tikanga kia kotahi te tangata e ārahi ana mai i te tīmatanga. " Kāore tēnei mea i te mahi." Ko te taupatupatu e pā ana ki te mana whakahaere e whakahoki ana i ngā tekau tau, ā, he tawhiti rawa atu i te whakatau. Ki ētahi, kua kawea mai e te mate urutā ngā pātai mō wai e tino pai ana ki te whakatau whakatau mō rātou. I te ngākau o te Riu o Rhymney, e whakapono ana a Evan Powell, 17 tau, kua whakaaturia e te taiepa te kaha o Wales ki te mahi i ētahi atu whakataunga, hei whenua motuhake. "Kua whakaaturia me te kore whakararuraru o Westminster ka taea e mātau te tupu," tana kī. Ka āhei a Evan ki te pōti mō te wā tuatahi i Me, ina taea e ngā pakeke 16 me te 17 tau te kōrero i te pōti ki te Pāremata o Welsh. "Kua tae te whakatupuranga taitamariki, mā te pāpāho pāpori, ngā rongo whirinoa rānei, ki ā rātou ake whakatauranga," tana kī, "ā, e whakaaro ana ahau kua āwhina tērā i te tautoko mo te rangatiratanga ki te piki nui." Ahakoa tērā pea i whiwhi āwhina te ariā o te rangatiratanga, he iti tonu te tirohanga. I Newport, e noho ana a Kiriuati Curtis i te taumarumarutanga o te M4 - he ara matua e tūhono ana i Uēra me Ingarangi. E whakapono ana a ia he nui rawa te wehewehenga i waenganui i nga iwi o te UK. "E hari ana ahau kia noho he kāwanatanga Welsh ki te tiaki i ngā wāhi tuku iho o Weera," tana kī. "Ki taku whakaaro he mea pai tēnā. Engari he tawhiti rawa. He wāhanga mātau no Te Hononga o Ingarangi, ā, koia tēnā e tika ana." Kāore tēnei huaketo i aukatia e ngā whenua, i whakawhāititia rānei e ngā raina i runga i tētahi mahere, engari mō ētahi he whakamaumahara ki ngā taitapa e tīari ana i te UK i te mea kua rerekē te tere o ngā iwi rerekē. Ko te pātai mēnā ka puta mai tēnā me tētahi hua tōrangapū, kāore rānei.

title: I hainatia e Papa a Harley Davidson e tiki ana i te £42,000 i Stafford
summary: Kua whiwhi tētahi motopaika Harley Davidson kōura i hainatia e Pope Francis e £42,000 i te hokonga.
text: Ko te paihikara - e kīia ana ko "Holy Davidson" e ngā kaihoko Bonhams - i waihangatia i Würzburg, Tiamana, mō te rōpū Jesus Bikers i Ateria. Kātahi ka tukua atu ki nga Rōpū Mihinare Pontifical. Ka whakamahia ngā hua o te hoko hei hanga i tētahi whare pani me tētahi kura i Uganda, hei whakarato whakaruru mō ngā tamariki kua mahue, kua tangohia. Ko te paihikara, e mōhiotia ana ko te "White Unique" - i tūmanakohia kia hokona i waenganui i te £50,000 me te £100,000 i te hokonga i te Rātapu i Stafford. I te tau 2014, i whakaarahia e tētahi paihikara ōrite te £208,399. I kī a Bonhams kua oti te paihikara 1,570cc ki te mā peara, me ngā taipitopito kāhua o Mehiko Amerika, ngā wae kōura, he rīpeka totohu me te waitohu papal i runga i te kura. I waihangatia te mīhini i runga i te huatau a Dr Thomas Draxler, te kaiwhakarewa o te rōpū Ihu Bikers, kia homai ki ngā Rōpū Mihinare Pontifical, te tautoko whai mana mō ngā mahi Katorika o rāwāhi. I muri i te whakaritenga a Würzburg Village, ka mauria ki te Vatican i roto i tētahi hōkona e te Ihu Bikers kia hainatia e Tōna Tapu i tētahi hui i St Peter's Square i a Hōngongoi. I karangatia e Hemi Stensel, te upoko o Bonhams Collectors' Motorcycles UK, he "mīhini whakamīharo", ka tāpiritia: "E tino whakahīhī ana mātou ki te whakawhirinaki ki te hoko i tēnei motopaika ahurei, kia whai hua ai tētahi take hira." Whāia a BBC West Midlands i Facebook, i Twitter, me te waitohu mō ngā whakahōutanga rongokōrero paetata hāngai tonu ki tō waea.

title: Kei te huri a Sinn Féin i tana kaupapa here i runga i tētahi poipoi taitapa?
summary: Te āhua nei ko Mary Lou McDonald o Sinn Féin e tohu ana i tētahi whakangāwari i roto i te kaupapa here a te rōpū i te Mane i tana kīnga kia kaua e puritia he poipoi taitapa i te wā e noho tonu ana te rangirua o Te Rangirua.
text: Mark DevenportKaiwhakatika tōrangapū, Te Raki Ireland@markdevenporton Twitter Ko ngā kōrero a te kaiārahi rōpū e taumira ana ki ngā whakapuakitanga o Sinn Féin o mua e kore e taea te haere wawe mai he taupānga ki tētahi Hononga o Aiarangi. I te tau 2016, i muri tonu mai i te taupānga o te UK-wide Brexit, ka tautohe a Martin McGuinness kua whakakahatia te take mo te poipoi taitapa. I Me i tēnei tau, i te pūrongotanga o te Pirimia o Ēnā Me e rangirua ana mō ngā wā e toa ana ngā kaiwawao i tētahi poipoi taitapa, ka whakahē a Mīharo O'Neill i te pirimia mō te "whakapuaki kua tutuki te paepae o te Whakaaetanga Paraire Pai mō te whakaoho i tētahi poipoi kotahitanga" engari kāore i te rite "kia whakaaetia te iwi o Airangi, ki te raki me te tonga,  ki te whakamahi i to rātau mana manapori". I te tīmatanga o tēnei marama, ka mauria e te perehitini o Sinn Féin o Mua, a Gerry Adams te pirimia o Kīriria ki te mahi mō te huatau i tētahi poipoi taitapa tōmua, he ariā kino. "Cherry pick" E kōrero ana i tētahi whakamaharatanga ā iwi i te Takiwā o Armagh, ka kī a Tēnā Arama i whakakāhoretia e ia te huatau a Taoiseach Leo Varadkar kāore e hiahiatia ana tētahi taupānga mo te kotahitanga o Kīriria i tēnei wā. "He mahi tāna ki te tautoko i te Whakaaetanga Paraire Pai," tana kī. "Kāore e taea e ia te whiriwhiri. Nā reira ka haere tonu mātou ki te kimi i tētahi taupānga, ā, ka mahi mātou i tō mātou kaha ki te toa i tēnā." I te aroaro o taua mea, ka tata atu ngā kōrero hou a Ms McDonald ki te whakataetae a Tēnā Varadkar i a Tēnā Arama. I kī atu a ia ki te Press Association (PA) me waiho te pātai poipoi taitapa ki tētahi taha kia whakamāmātia rā anō ngā "whakawhara" i puta mai i a Pakihi, kātahi anō ka whakamāmātia tōna "manakohanga kaha, kei a mātou te raupapatanga i te tuatahi ka tuku i tētahi taumata o te mōhiotanga o te ohaoha me te pāpori, i ngā mea katoa e taea ana e tātau te mōhiotanga, me te pūmautanga, ā, mai i taua pūtake ka haere tonu te kōrerorero mō te kotahitanga o Kīriria". Ko te SDLP, nāna i tautohe i mua mō tētahi huarahi āta haere ki tētahi poipoi taitapa, i kite i tēnei hei nekehanga, me tō rātou kaiārahi o Colum Eastwood e pōhiri ana i te nekehanga hei "huringa tika - kua kī tonu mātou mō te rua tau". Poipoi i roto i te rima tau? Engari kia pēhea te roa e hiahia ana a Ms McDonald ki te tatari ki tētahi poipoi taitapa? I roto i tana uiuinga PA, ka tāruatia e ia kei te manakohia tonutia e Sinn Féin tētahi poipoi taitapa i roto i ngā tau e rima e whai ake nei. I hiahia a ia ki te tāraro i tēnei wā i te pātaitanga i runga i te reo irirangi RTÉ, e kī ana a ia ki te whakatakoto i tētahi pūoro wairua pōrearea "ehara i te pūoro wairua tino pai mō tētahi poipoi taitapa". Hei tāpiri i tēnei huringa taputapu, kātahi ka whakaputaina e Sinn Féin tētahi kōrero i runga i te ingoa o Ms McDonald e kīia nei "E kore a Tory Brexit e whakaroa i te Taupānga Kotahitanga o Airana". Ahakoa he aha ngā kōrero a Sinn Féin i te wā o tētahi poipoi taitapa, me maumahara ko te tangata e tino kaha ana ki te whakatau i tōna wā ko te hēkeretari o Aiarangi ki te Raki. Ahakoa te rangirua i pūrongotia i te wāhi o te pirimia i te wā o Me, he maha nga wā i tohe ai a Karen Bradley kāore a ia i te whakapono kua tutuki te paepae mo te whakaoho i tētahi poipoi taitapa. Maunga whakaaturanga Nā te whakawhirinakitanga a te Conservatives ki te DUP i Westminster, tērā pea ka hiahiatia e rātou he maunga whakaaturanga (tērā pea mō ngā panekōrero whakaaro, ngā hua pōti rānei) i mua i te mōhiotanga he tika te wā. Ko tētahi o ngā haehae o ngā kōrero hou a Mary Lou McDonald, ko ētahi e whakapono ana ko te "Brexit pōrearea" kāore ia i te whakaaro he āhua hauora mō tētahi poipoi taitapa ka whakanuia pea te wā o te wikitōria o te wairuatanga. Ko te arotahi ki ngā kōrero a Ms McDonald's ka puta hāngai mai i muri i tētahi tautohetohe ā-roto i waenganui i a Pita Pirihitini rāua ko Te Wānanga o Aotearoa. Ko te pono, kua whāngaia e nga momo kaipōrangapū paetata katoa, me kī tātau, he rārangi maiorooro kē i roto i nga tau mo nga mana me nga hē o te pupuri i tētahi poipoi taitapa. Nā reira me whakaoti tātou ki tētahi pātaitai. Ko wai i kōrero? Panuku whakararo kia kite i ngā whakautu Whakautu:

title: Ka hainatia e Haina rāua ko Taiwana te pūrākau parenga pūtea penapena matua
summary: Kua hainatia e Haina rāua ko Taiwana tētahi mahi parenga pūtea penapena, ko te mea hou rawa i roto i ngā rangatū o ngā mahi a te tokorua ki te whāngai i ngā here hokohoko tata atu.
text: Ka whakarato te pūrākau i ngā kaihoko mai i ngā taha e rua ki ngā hongere tika hei whakatau i ngā tautohetohe. Ka whakamāramatia hoki ngā mana o ngā kaiwhakangao Taiwana mēnā ka herea rātau e ngā mana Hainamana, ā, ko tērā anō. Ko Haina te hoa tauhokohoko nui rawa o Taiwana me te hokohoko takirua e wātea ana ki te $110bn (£70bn) i te tau. "Mā te whakaaetanga e whakahauhau kia nui ake te pūtea penapena tuawhenua ki Taiwana, ā, ka nui ake te wāhi ki ngā kaihoko o Taiwana ki te tipu i runga i te tuawhenua," te kī a te kaiwhakarite Hainamana o Zheng Lizhong. "He hipanga hira tēnei ki te whakaiti i te mahi tahi o te ohaoha." Na te nui o te pōhēhētanga o te Perehitini o Taiwana, o Ma Ying-jeou, i toa i tētahi wā tuarua i te tari i te tīmatanga o tēnei tau, kua pana kia tata atu ngā here ohaoha ki Haina. I hainatia e te tokorua tētahi mahi hokohoko tohu i te tau 2010, e whakaiti ana i ngā utu i runga i ngā hua rau. Heoi anō, kua whakahē ētahi i Taiwana ki nga mahi ki te whāngai i te whanaungatanga tata atu ki Haina. Kua tautohe ngā kaiwhakawāwā mā aua nekehanga ka nui ake te mana o te ohaoha o Hainamana i Taiwana, ā, tērā pea ka tautuhia te wāhanga mō tētahi whakahaeretanga tōrangapū Hainamana o te motu. Kaore a Haina e mōhio ki Taiwana, e pā ana ki te motu hei kawanatanga wehewehe, ā, e hiahia ana ki te whakakotahitanga. "E whakahē ana ahau i ngā mahi nā te mea kei te ngana a Haina ki te whakahaere i te whakahaerenga o Taiwana kia taea ai e ia te whakahaere i Taiwana," i whakahuatia e Chen Che, he kaiwhakahē e whakaatu ana ki te hainatanga o te pūrākau hou rawa. "He take tōrangapū nga mahi, ā, he hipanga rātau ki te haumitanga. Kei te māharahara ahau mo te wā heke mai o Taiwana mēnā ka hokona atu e te kāwanatanga ki Haina pēnei. "Ki te kore he kāwanatanga ā iwi."

title: Ko nga kaipupuri korohū o Birmingham i peitatia ki nga kara o Aston Villa kia tangohia
summary: Me ngaro atu ngā kaipupuri korohū whakamutunga o Birmingham i te pae o te taone.
text: Ko ngā hanganga e toru, e kitea ana e ngā mano o ngā kaitaraiwa i ia rā i runga i te A38(M) Aston Expressway, i whakamahia hei penapena korohū hei whakamārama i ngā tiriti o Birmingham. Ko te Windsor Street Gasworks, i tīmata te whakanao i ngā tau 1840, i tētahi wā ka noho ki ngā kaipupuri korohū 11 e pupuri ana i te korohū o te taone i hangaia mai i te waro tahuna. E hiahia ana te Mātiti ā-Motu ki te whakaoti i tētahi mea ngaro he aha i peitatia ai ngā pourewa ki ngā tae o Aston Villa o te mārama, o te kikorangi me te kikorangi. I kī a Sarah Rea, te Kaiwhakahaere Whakahou Whenua i National Grid: "E whakapono ana mātou i peitatia ngā kaipupuri korohū ki ngā kara o Aston Villa i ngā tau kotahi mano e waru tekau mā rua, ā, he maha ngā ariā e pā ana ki te āhua o tēnei, engari he tino pai mēnā ka taea e mātou te whakaoti i te mea ngaro i te wā kotahi, mō te katoa. " E whakapono ana i kōwhiria e te kaipūkaha i mua te tiaki i ngā kara nā te mea he kaitautoko a ia i te karapu, engari kāore mātou i te mōhio ki tēnei." She added: "We recognise that these gas holders have been a part of the skyline in the area for many years, as well as trying to solve the painting mystery, we'll be making sure we undertake detailed heritage recording at the site as the work progresses. " Kua whakatūria e mātou tētahi paetukutuku mō te kaupapa e taea ai e ngā tāngata te kite i ētahi atu kōrero mō te hītori o Windsor Street me te tikiake hoki i tētahi pukapuka mō te hītori o te umanga korohū i Birmingham." Whāia a BBC West Midlands i Facebook, Twitter me Instagram. Tukua ō whakaaro pūrākau ki: newsonline.westmidlands@bbc.co.uk Mātiti ā-Motu o Ngā Hononga Ipurangi Pātahi

title: Covid: Ngā kēhi rerekētanga Īnia i ngā wāhi kaunihera e 86 - Hancock
summary: Ināianei e 86 ngā mana ā-rohe me ngā kēhi e rima, neke atu rānei o te momo Covid Īnia, kua kī te Hēkeretari Hauora a Matt Hancock.
text: Nā Francesca GillettBBC News "Ehara tēnei i te mea mō Bolton me Blackburn anake," tana kī, e pā ana ki ngā wāhi e kite ana i te taraiwa o ngā kēhi. Ka tae mai i te wā e hia miriona ngā tāngata e āhei ana ki te ngahau i ngā wāteatanga hou i te whakangāwari o te raka i Ingarangi, Wales me te nuinga o Pākehā. Engari kua whakatūpato te kāwanatanga ka takaware pea tana arotakenga panuku o ngā ture tawhiti pāpori. Kāore he 10 i kī te taupēnga Īnia "ka taea te whakararuraru" ki te tukanga whakatau mēnā ka taea te whakangāwari i ngā rāhuitanga raka katoa e toe ana i te 21 o Hune. I kī atu a Tēnā Hancock ki te Whare o Ngātahi, ināianei e 2,323 ngā kēhi kua whakaūngia o te momo Īnia i te UK. Ko te tikanga o tenei kua 77% te pikinga o nga keehi kua whakapumautia o te momo i roto i nga ra e rima kua hipa. "Ināianei e 86 ngā mana ā rohe e rima, neke atu rānei ngā kēhi kua whakaūngia," tana kī. E 343 nga mana ā rohe i Ingarangi. I kī a Tēnā Hancock ko te momo Īnia ināianei te momo kaha o te huaketo i Bolton me Blackburn me Darwen, ā, kei te piki ake i ngā rōpū pakeke katoa. I kī a ia ko te nuinga o ngā tāngata i te hōhipera i aua wāhi i āhei ki te kano ārai mate, engari i kōwhiria kia kaua e whiwhi - ā, ka tohe ki tētahi tangata kāore i te tino mōhio mēnā ka werohia kia "titiro ki ngā mea e puta ana i Bolton". I tere hoki te noho o Bedford hei wāhiwera mō te rerekētanga, ka kī a Tēnā Hancock, ā, ka tīmata te whakamātautau pātōtō i reira. E whakapono ana ngā kaipūtaiao he ngāwari ake te hora o te momo Īnia, engari ko ngā raraunga o mua e hua ana kei te mahi tonu ngā kano ārai mate. Kāore anō kia whakaūngia te pānga tūturu ki te mahinga o te kano ārai mate - mēnā he - kāore anō kia whakaūngia. Ka taea e ngā tāngata 37 neke atu rānei i Ingarangi te whiwhi i te kano ārai mate mai i te Tūrei, ka kī a ia - ā, ka haere tonu te whakawhānui i te wiki. Ka whakangāwari te raka puta noa i UK: Ko ngā huringa raka i te Mane - he rerekē i Ingarangi, Wales me Scotland - kua kite i ngā mano o ngā tāngata e haere ana i ngā hararei kē, e rere ana ki ngā hōro bingo me te inu anō i roto i ngā pāpara. Kua whai wāhi hoki te tangata ki te awhi i te hunga e arohaina ana i te hurihanga o te tohutohu mo te hoapā tata. I tangi te kaiwhakahaere o te whare hōhipera o Viv Hudson, e 58, i te hari i tana awhi i tana tamāhine, a Teresa Fox, mo te wā tuatahi i roto i te neke atu i te tau. "He āhua rerekē - engari he momo rerekē pai. Kua tino hapa ahau i tēnei," te kī a Theresa, e 38, e mahi ana hoki mō te NHS. "Ahakoa ka taea e tātau tēnei hipanga i tēnei rā, me ngākau māhaki tātau i mua i tēnei huaketo," te kī a Tēnā Hancock. I whakamāramatia e ia he iti iho i te 1,000 ngā tāngata ināianei i te hōhipera me te huaketo - ko te wā tuatahi i pā mai ai tēnei mai i tērā o Mahuru. Ko nga whika hou e whakaatu ana i etahi atu keehi 1,976 kua tuhia puta noa i te UK, a, e rima ano nga tangata kua mate. I tēnei wā, ko te maha o ngā tāngata kua whiwhi i tā rātou kano ārai mate tuatahi kua eke ki te 36.7 miriona, ā, neke atu i te 20.2 miriona ngā wero tuarua kua hoatu. Me whakanui rānei tātau i te whakaiti i ngā rāhuitanga, i te māharahara rānei i te horahanga haere tonu o tētahi momo hou? Ko te pikitia nui kei roto tātau i tētahi wāhi pai ake i te tīmatanga o te tau - i te wā e 1.25 miriona ngā tāngata i whakaarohia he huaketo, ā, kei te rongo te NHS i te pēhanga. Ināianei he iti iho i te 1,000 ngā tāngata i te hōhipera me Covid - 97% iti iho i te taumata. Heoi anō, kei roto tātau i tētahi wāhanga tauwhiro i te mea kei te neke te pānga o te pēhi i te huaketo mai i ngā raka ki te kano ārai mate. Kāore anō kia oti taua tukanga. Ko te tikanga kei reira tonu te kaha o tētahi momo whakawhiti kē atu hei whakanui i ngā kēhi me ngā tāngata e hiahia ana ki te rongoā hōhipera. Kei te rangirua tonu te āhua o te whakawhitinga o te B1617.2, ā, he pēhea te nui o te tuma. Heoi anō, kei te rangirua kē te whakaiti i whakaritea i te waenganui o Pipiri. Ko te kaupapa a te kāwanatanga ko te whakamutu i ngā tepe katoa e toe ana i runga i te hoapā pāpori mai i te 21 o Pipiri - arā, ko te tikanga o te maha o ngā manuhiri i ngā mārena me ngā karapu pō e whakaaetia ana kia whakatuwhera anō. I mua i tēnei mahinga, ka tautuhia he arotakenga i te mutunga o Mei. Engari i mua ake, ka kī te kaiwhakahaere mana o te pirimia: "Tērā pea ka tuma te taupēnga Īnia ki tēnei tukanga - ka hangaia ta mātau whakataunga i runga anō i ngā raraunga hōu rawa. Ka whakaritea e mātou he mahere ina whakaaetia e te raraunga." I pātai mai mēnā ka whakaarohia e ngā minita he hokinga ki tētahi pūnaha ture kōpae, ka kī te kaiwhakaatu kāore rātau i te hiahia ki te kōrero mō ngā āhuatanga whakaaro, engari "kāore mātou e hiahia ki te whakahaere i tētahi mea".

title: Ngā huringa taraiwa: He aha te tikanga?
summary: E whakaaro ana te kāwanatanga Rangatira ki te mahi i "ngā huringa nui" ki te āhua e taea ai e ngā uniana te karanga i tētahi tuki. He aha tā mātou e mōhio ana mō ngā huringa kua whakaritea i tēnei wā.
text: Nā John Moylan & Howard MustoeBBC News He aha te mea e marohitia ana? E ai ki te Tari Pakihi ko ngā huringa ki ngā ture pōti taraiwa kei roto: Pēhea te uaua o te tuki? E kī ana te TUC mā ngā paepae hou e kore e taea te tuki ā-ture. "Ka mahue ngā kaiwhakarite uniana me te kore mana nui ake i a Oliver Twist ina tono ia i ētahi atu mea," te kī a te kaikōrero. He raruraru tērā i te wāhanga tūmatanui e kore ai e taea e ngā pōti poutāpeta o ngā kaimahi nunui te nui o te whiriwhiringa. Ahakoa ka tutuki i ngā uniana te 50% neke atu, ka hiahiatia e rātou te 40% o te hunga e āhei ana ki te pōti ki te whakahoki i te mahi. Ko tērā te nui o te pōti 80% e manakohia ana e ngā tuki - he teitei ake i tērā e hiahiatia ana kia toa i te pōti nui. I te wā o te pāremata whakamutunga, kāore e taea te wāhanga nui o te iwi whānui i runga anō i te utu me te whakahou penihana i te wā o te pāremata whakamutunga. Ko te Uniana PCS, e auau ana te karanga i waenganui i ōna mema i roto i te ratonga tūmatanui, kāore anō kia tutuki i te 50% neke atu i runga i tētahi pōti ā-motu. Engari i kī te Hēkeretari Pakihi o Stuad Javid: "He Kāwanatanga Kotahi tēnei e mahi ana mō ngā painga o te whenua katoa, ā, mā ēnei whakahōu e whakamutu te tuma 'mutunga kore' o te mahi taraiwa e tautau ana i runga i ngā tāngata pukumahi." "He mahi hira te mahi a te hunga mahi, ā, e tika ana kia manaakitia e tātau. Engari ki te whakararurarutia ngā oranga o te hunga mahi e te mahi taraiwa, he pai noa iho tēnei nā tētahi tono o nāianei e tautokona ana e te nuinga o ngā mema uniana." He pēhea te whakataurite ki ētahi atu whenua? E kī ana ngā whakakotahitanga mahi kei te UK kē ētahi o ngā ture taraiwa tino uaua i te ao. Kāore ētahi whenua o Ūropi e hiahia ana kia puritia e ētahi whenua o Ūropi he pōti taraiwa hei karanga i te mahi mahi. O ērā e mahi ana, he torutoru noa iho e whakapūtā ana i tētahi paepae whiriwhiri. Ko te nuinga e hiahiatia ana he nuinga ngāwari hei whakahoki i te mahi taraiwa. I Tiamana, me noho te nuinga i runga ake i te 75%, e kī ana a Guglielmo Meardi, ahorangi o ngā pānga mahi i te Kura Pakihi o Warwick. Engari, he rite tonu ki ētahi atu iwi o Ūropi, ka puritia ngā pōti ki ngā wāhi mahi, kaua mā te poutāpeta, arā, ko te tikanga he nui ake te whiriwhiringa. Ahakoa he aha, he nui ake ngā "hongere whakawhitiwhitinga" e taea ai te whakarite i tētahi whakaaetanga i mua i te whakaaro e hiahiatia ana he tuki. I ngā whenua pērā i Wīwī me Tiamana, he nui ake te whakauru o ngā whakakotahitanga ki ngā whakataunga. Ko te whakamahinga o ngā kaunihera mahi, e whakaaturia ana ngā uniana me ngā kaitukumahi, ko te tikanga kia nui ake te kōrero a ngā kaimahi ki te whakarite utu me ngā here mahi. Ko te tikanga o tēnei, he iti iho te tautohetohe o te āhua o te whanaungatanga mahi. Engari ehara i te mea rerekē ngā tuki nui - pēnei i te tautohetohe o nāianei a ngā kaihautū Tiamana. Ko ngā whenua pērā i Wīwī me Itari, kua rapu i mua ki te whakapakari i ngā ture mo te tuki, kua nui ake te hapara ki te hoatu i ngā ture hōu ki ngā wāhi e tino whakararuraru ana ki te iwi whānui - pēnei i te mātauranga me te waka, e kī ana a Prof Meardi. A, i aua whenua, he nui ake ngā hui uniana me ngā minita. "Mēnā ka whakaurua ngā ture hōu i runga i te āhua kotahi, ka taea e koe te whakararuraru i ngā whakakotahitanga," ka tāpiri mai a ia, e ahu ana ki ētahi atu raruraru ōpaki pēnei i te whakakore ki te mahi i ngā wā whakaroa. He aha atu anō kei roto i te pire? He aha te kōrero a nga whakakotahitanga mahi? E whakaaro ana ngā uniana ki te nekehanga a te kāwanatanga o UK hei whakaeke i te mana tangata taketake o nga kaimahi ki te unu i a rātau mahi. E kī ana rātau kāore ngā paepae e pā ana ki ētahi atu pōti, pēnei i ērā mō ngā Komihana Pirihimana me te Koromatua o Rāwāhi. Ā, e whakaaro ana rātau mēnā he tino nui te kāwanatanga ki te whakanui i te whai wāhitanga ki te pōti, ka whakaaetia te pōti hiko, te pōti huna rānei i te wāhi mahi. E whakatūpato ana te TUC mā ngā paepae whiriwhiri ka pai ake te whakahē i te tuki i te pōti kāore. E kī ana rātau e kore e tika te whakahauhau i te tangata kia kaua e whai wāhi ki te pōti. "E whakawehi ana tēnei pire i te mana taketake ki te tuki. Ka whakaaetia ngā kaitukumahi ki te pahi i roto i ngā wā o te kōwhiringa ki te whati i ngā tuki, ā, ka kawea mai he rāhuitanga hou nui i runga i te piki me ngā whakahē i te wā o te tuki - tae atu ki ngā uniana me kōrero ki ngā pirihimana me ngā kaitukumahi i ngā mea ka whakairihia e rātou ki Facebook, Twitter rānei e rua wiki i mua," te kī a te Hēkeretari Ahuwhānui o TUC, a Frances O'Grady. Ko te āheitanga i marohitia ki te whakamahi i ngā kaimahi rangitahi pea te mea e tino uaua ana ki ngā whakakotahitanga, e kī ana a Steve Coulter, e whakaako ana i te mahi tōrangapū i te Kura Ohaoha o Rāwāhi. Ahakoa ka kaha ake ngā mahi pūkenga, ka uaua pea ngā kaimahi horoi pūkenga iti, hei tauira, ki te whai pānga ki raro i ngā ture hōu, e kī ana a ia. "E tino whakaiti ana tēnā i te kaha o te tuki," tana tāpiri mai. Pūtake: TUC

title: I panaia te rorohiko i runga i te whāwhā poitūkohu hākinakina Hāngai
summary: I whakamātau tētahi pirihimana ki te tono i tētahi poitūkohu kāore i hokona i Sports Direct - kātahi ka whakawehi ki te mau i tētahi kaiāwhina toa ki te teihana pirihimana i tana wero i a ia.
text: I tohe te RW, nāna te ingoa i whakatikaina e tētahi pae hē, nāna te pōro, e kī ana i "ngā mana o te kaikite". I muri iho ka whakaputaina e ia he whakapae hara ki te kaiwhakahaere toa i roto i tētahi tono kia whakawātea i tōna ake whanonga. I kitea he hara te āpiha ki te hē nui, a, ka panaia e te paepae. I korerotia ki te rongo a nga Pirihimana o Avon rāua ko Pirihimana i kitea e te tama a te āpiha te pōro i roto i te toa i a Aotearoa 2018. I te kīanga a tētahi kaiāwhina toa kua ngaro te rawa, ā, kāore i te hoko, ka kī te āpiha i "ngā mana kaikite", ka whakaaturia ki a ia tana kāri whakamana, ka mea, "Ko koe, ahau, ki raro ki te teihana pirihimana", ka mahue i a ia te riri me te whakamataku. 'He wawau' I te rā e whai ake nei, ka mauria e te kaiwhakahaere toa te pōro ki te Teihana Pirihimana o Poka, a, ka amuamu mo te whanonga o te āpiha. Hei urupare, ka whakapaea ia e te RW ki te tāhae, a, ka whakaputaina he whakapae hara ki a ia. I kitea e te pae tōna whanonga he hē tōna whanonga, ā, ko tana pūrongo tinihanga o muri mai i ngā hara a te kaiwhakahaere e tohu ana i te hē nui. I kī te Manukura o Te Manukura o Te Rūnanga o Te Wānanga he "whakaweti, he whakahāwea, he hē rawa, he hē hoki tōna tūnga mana hei pirihimana". I kī a ia ko te whakapae "i whakamātau tinihanga te āpiha ki te whakahē i ngā tāngata mō ngā hara i mōhio ai ia kāore i mahia kia taea ai te whakawātea i tōna ake whanonga" ko "te mea tino nui rawa ka taea te whakapae i tētahi āpiha ture". I ākiritia te RW, nāna i mahi tahi me ngā Pirihimana o Avon me Ngā Pirihimana mai i te tau 1993, ā, i mahi i te takiwā o Mendip, me te kore pānui.

title: I rāhuitia e te minita a Jeremy Davies i muri i te mārena tāne
summary: Kua rāhuitia tētahi minita matua kia kaua e mahi ratonga i te pihopatanga o Winchester nā te mea i mārena ia i tana hoa tāne.
text: Ko te Reverend Canon Jeremy Davies i mahi hei rangatira canon i te Whare Karakia o Salisbury mo te 25 tau, ā, kua mahi i te Whare Karakia o Winchester. I muri i tana mārenatanga i tana hoa e 30 tau i te tau 2014, kua korerotia ināianei kua kore e taea e ia te kauwhau i roto i te pihopatanga. I kī te Hāhi o Ingarangi e hāngai ana te uniana ki tana tohutohu whakaheke mo te mārena tangata kotahi. Kua tata ki te 30 tau te pātahitanga o Canon Davies, kua whakatāngia e ia te kaiwaiata opera a Haimona McEnery, ā, i mārena te tokorua i te tau ki mua. I muri i tana tononga kia whakahaere i te maha o ngā ratonga i Winchester, ka tono ia ki te whakahaere i te pihopatanga. I kī atu te Pīhopa o Winchester, te Reverend Matau o Timoti Dakin, ki a Canon Davies kāore i taea e ia te tuku whakaaetanga ki a ia. I kī a Canon Davies i te 'homophobia ā-iwi' Canon Davies: "Kua huna rātau i muri i te ārai o te ture canon, e kī ana kāore mātou e pīrangi ki tēnei nā te mea ko te [mārena] e pā ana ki te tāne me te wahine kia kore ai koe e mārena. " Ki te kore te hāhi e whakaaro kua mārena ahau, he aha e kore ai e whakaaetia e au te whakahaere." Ka kī a Tēnā McEnery: "Me tirotiro te hāhi i a ia anō mō te hōnore ā-iwi. Ki taku whakaaro me kite rātau i te nui o te tūkino me te tūkino e mahia ana e rātau ki te hunga tāne." I kī tētahi kaikōrero mō te Pihopatanga o Winchester: "I tono a Canon Jeremy Davies i te tīmatanga o tēnei tau mō te whakaaetanga ki te whakahaere i te Pihopatanga o Winchester. " Nā te tūnga o te Hāhi o Ingarangi i runga i te mārena tangata kotahi, e ai ki te tohutohu a te Whare o ngā Pihopa, kua whakamōhiotia a Canon Jeremy Davies kāore i tutuki tana tono." Te na ô ra te aratairaa a te Ekalesia no Ingarangi no nia i te faaipoiporaa i te tane e te vahine: "Aita te Fare i te hinaaro ia faatoroahia te feia i roto i te faaipoiporaa hoê â tane i roto i te hoê o na faaueraa e toru o te taviniraa. " Anō hoki, e whakaaro ana ehara i te whanonga tika mō tētahi tangata i roto i ngā tikanga tapu kia uru ki tētahi mārena tangata kotahi, nā te hiahia o ngā minita ki te whakatauira i te whakaakoranga a te hāhi i roto i o rātau oranga."

title: Ka whakawhiti a Jennifer Lawrence i te mahi mo te whakatūpato
summary: He toa a Oscar a ia, ā, ko tētahi o ngā kaiwhakaari tino utu o te ao, engari ināianei kei te huri tuarā a Wānanga Lawrence ki Karaihe - mō te tau kotahi.
text: E 12 marama te mahi a te whetū o ngā Kēmu Hiakai kia nui ake ai te "rangatahi e whakauru ana ki te tōrangapū". Kei runga kē a Lawrence i te poari o Represent.Us. i te taha o te hoa mahi auau, ko te tumuaki o David O Russell. E whakahau ana te rōpū kore hua ki te whakamutu i te utu whakapati tōrangapū me te whakaoti i ngā ture ārai hāmate. I te kōrero a Lawrence ki a ET mō tana kiriata e tū mai nei Red Sparrow - tōna whakamutunga i mua i tana hapati. "Ka tangohia e au te tau e whai ake nei," te kī a Lawrence ki a ET. "I'm going to be working with this organisation as a part of Represent. Mātau ... e ngana ana ki te whakauru i te rangatahi ki te tōrangapū i runga i te taumata paetata. Kāore he pānga ki te rōpū (tōrangapū). "He ārai hāmate noa iho me ngā mea e ngana ana ki te whakaoti i ngā ture ā-rohe e āwhina ana ki te ārai i te hāmate, ki te whakatika i to tātau kāwanatanga ā iwi." Tērā pea ka hiahia koe ki: Ko te kiriata tūtei Red Sparrow hoki e whetū ana ki a Joel Edgerton, Charlotte Rampling, Jeremy Irons me Joely Richardson. Kua mōhiotia kētia a Lawrence mo tana mahi tōrangapū. Ko ia tētahi o ngā kaiwhakaari matua tuatahi ki te kōrerorero i te āputa utu o Karaihe i te tau 2015. I honoa hoki e ia ngā tōpana ki a Cameron Diaz rāua ko Adele i tērā marama i te 2018 Women's March i Los Angeles, nāna i karanga ki ngā mana me te ōritetanga o te wahine. Tīkina ngā rongo mai i te BBC i tō pouakaroto, i ia ata o te wiki Whāia mātou i Facebook, i Twitter @BBCNewsEnts, i Instagram rānei i bbcnewsents. Mēnā he huatau pūrākau tāu, īmēra entertainment.news@bbc.co.uk.

title: Coronavirus further threatening media freedom, says Reporters Without Borders
summary: Kei te whakawehi anō te taiepa coronavirus i te wāteatanga pāpāho puta noa i te ao, e ai ki te Taupū Wāteatanga Pēhi Ao ā-tau.
text: I whakahiatotia e Reporters Without Borders, e kī ana te taupū whenua 180 i tētahi whanaungatanga i waenga i te tūnga o tētahi whenua me tana urupare ki te taiepa. Ko Haina i te 177 me Irana, e toru nga wāhi i taka ki te 173, i whakatau i a raatau pakarutanga coronavirus. I tīmataria anō e Nōwei te taupū i te wā i haere mai a Kōria ki te Raki i te mutunga. I Iraki, i heke iho i te ono ki te 162, ka tangohia e te kāwanatanga te raihana rongokōrero o Kōrero mō te toru marama i muri i tana whakaputa i tētahi pūrākau e pātai ana ki ngā whika coronavirus whaimana. I Uropi, e rua nga wahi i heke a Hungary ki te 89 i muri i te ture "coronavirus" a te Pirimia o Viktor Orban me nga whiu tae atu ki te rima tau i roto i te whare herehere mo nga korero teka. "Ko te mate hauora tūmatanui e whakarato ana i ngā kāwanatanga whakamana ki te whakatinana i te 'akoranga ohorere,'" te kī a Reporters Without Borders. Ka taea e ngā kaiārahi te "whai painga i te mea kei te puritia ngā tōrangapū, kei te mīharo te iwi whānui, ā, kua pau ngā whakahē, kia taea ai te whakamau i ngā mehua e kore e taea i ngā wā pūnoa," tana kī. "He aha te āhua o te wāteatanga o ngā mōhiohio, te pluralism me te whaikikotanga i te tau 2030? Kai te whakatauria te whakautu ki taua pātai i tēnei rā," tana tāpiri mai. E rua ngā wāhi i taka e te UK ki te 35. E whakaae ana te pūrongo ki te mahi a te kāwanatanga o UK ki te whakatoko i te wāteatanga pāpāho i te ao whānui, engari i kī i whakararurarutia ōna mahi e te patunga o te kaipānui o Lyra McKee, ngā tuma ki te haumarutanga o ngā kaipānui i Aiarangi ki te Raki, me te tautāwhi o te kaiwhakarewa o Te Wānanga o Aotearoa, e anga ana ki te rangahau ki a Mātau.

title: Petihana mō ngā tukunga iho o JSC
summary: Kua tohe nga rōia matua i Sri Lanka ki tētahi rūpahu paremata mo nga tukunga iho o ngā mema tokorua o te Komihana Ratonga Whakawā (JSC).
text: Kua whakaputaina e te Tohutohu Matua o Elmo Perera tētahi petihana Mōtika Tūturu ki te Kōti Matua e tono ana kia whakakīa e ngā mana ngā wāteatanga i roto i te JSC i hangaia e ngā tukunga iho a ngā kaiwhakawā matua tokorua. Ko te rōpū whakahaere te kawenga ki te titiro ki ngā kerēme i mahia e ngā kaiwhakawā matua e rua o te whenua, ka kī atu a ia ki a TE AO Sandeshaya. "Mēnā e rua ngā mema i roto i te tokotoru i JSC, te mana whakawā teitei rawa o te whenua, e kī ana kāore e taea e rātau te mahi i runga i te hinengaro, tērā tētahi mea tino hē," tana tāpiri mai. I muri i te tukunga iho o nga kaiwhakatika o Shirani Kotaanaike me TB Weerasooriya, kua mahia te JSC mema tokotoru. Kua tukuna e nga kaiwhakawā matua tokorua he reta tuku iho ki a Perehitini Mahinda Kāripaka e kī ana kāore e taea e rātau te mahi mahi ki o rātau hinengaro. Ko te Ariki o te Ture ko Sarath Nanda Silva te manukura me te mema e toe ana o te JSC. I maharatia e te tohutohu a Elmo Fernando e rua nga wā i whakatūria ai te tika o Bandaranaike hei rangatira o te ture i te tau 2004, engari kāore he tangata i whakatūria ki te pou i te wā i wehe atu ai a CJ Silva i te whenua e rua i tērā tau. "Engari i tēnei tau ko tētahi atu, ko te tuarima o nga kaiwhakawā matua rawa i te Kōti Matua, i whakatūria ohorere hei CJ whakarite," tana kī atu ki a bbcsinhala.com. E pātai ana a ia mēnā e tika ana kia rapu rongoā ā-ture mēnā ka mahi te whakawāwā, i te nuinga o te wā e whakatata ana te iwi whānui ki te whakatika i ngā take e pā ana ki ngā wāhui hē, ka mahi i aua tūkinotanga ōrite.

title: I whakarewaina te tono mō te whakapakoko o Mary Anning i Lyme Regis
summary: Kua whakarewaina tētahi whakahau huihuinga ki te whakatū i tētahi whakapakoko o te kaimātai o Dorset ko Mary Anning i tōna taone kāinga o Lyme Regis.
text: I āwhina ngā kitenga a Anning i te tīmatanga o te rau tau 19 ki te hanga i te mātauranga pūtaiao o te oranga o mua, engari kāore anō kia mōhiotia tikatia tana mahi. E hiahia ana te whakahau a Mary Anning Rocks, e arahina ana e Evie Swire, 13 tau, ki tētahi whakamaharatanga pūmau i te taone. Tata ki te hauwhā o te ūnga £100,000 kua whakaarahia kētia. Ko Anning, nāna te kiriata āhuahira i whakaaweawe i a Ammonite, kāore anō kia tino huaina mō ana kitenga nā tōna ira tangata me tōna tūnga pāpori. Kei te pūruatia te whakahau e Prof Alice Roberts, nāna i puta mai i roto i tētahi ataata hei whakarewa i te tono huihuinga. Ka kī a ia: "Ki taku whakaaro he tino hira kia mōhio mātou ki ngā tāngata pēnei i a Mary Anning me te whakanui i a rātou, e pā ana ki te whakaora i a ia ki tōna wāhi tika i roto i te hītori o te pūtaiao. " E mōhio ana te tangata e haere ana ki Lyme Regis i reira tēnei wahine tino hira e mahi ana i taua mahi i ngā rā o mua o te paleontology." Kua whakaritea te kaiwaiata o Denise Sutton - kaihanga o te whakamaharatanga o ngā Kōtiro Whenua i te National Arboretum - ki te waihanga i tētahi whakairo i te taha moana, e tata ana ki te wāhi whānau o Anning. I whānau a Mary Anning i te tau 1799 ki tētahi whānau rawakore, karaehe mahi, engari i kitea e ia ngā kitenga tūpāpaku i hanga i te mātauranga pūtaiao mō te oranga o mua. I te tau 1811, i te 12 o ona tau, ka kitea e ia he anga 5.2m (17ft), e mōhiotia ana ināianei he ichthyosaur. Tekau mā rua tau i muri iho, ka kitea e ia te anga katoa tuatahi o te plesiosaur, he ngārara moana tino rerekē i whakaaro ai ngā kaipūtaiao i te tuatahi he mea tinihanga. I whakarewaina e te kōtiro kura o Dorchester a Evie tana whakahau, me te āwhina a tōna whaea a Anya Pearson, e rua tau ki muri i tana mōhiotanga mō Anning i te wā o tētahi haerenga whakangau fossil. "Kua mahia e ia ēnei mea whakamīharo katoa, ā, kua ngaro i roto i te hītori," te kī a Evie.

title: I mate te hoa herehere o Te Whare Herehere o Nottingham, a Shalane Blackwood i muri i te 'waihotanga'
summary: E kī ana tētahi whaea i mate tana tama mate i roto i te whare herehere i muri i te waihotanga a te kaimahi, kaua ia e waiho kia mate.
text: I amuamu a Shalane Blackwood i te mamae o te puku, a, ka kī atu ki tōna whaea, a Linda Blackwood e mate ana ia i tana kōrero whakamutunga ki a ia i te 21 o Hōngongoi. I kitea a ia kua mate i roto i tōna pūtau i te 5 o Aotearoa, i pāngia e ia te toto ā-roto nā te keha. I whakataua e tētahi hūri uiui "ko ngā hinganga nahanaha e nui ana ki te waiho" i tino āwhina ki tōna matenga. 'I hē tētahi mea' I hereheretia te tau e 29 tau, mai i Derby, mo te pupuri i tētahi pūrākau, ā, i runga i te auporo raihana i tana matenga i roto i te rōpū whakawehe i te Whare Herehere o Rātata. I kī tōna whaea o Linda Blackwood: "I mōhio ahau he hē tētahi mea i a ia i HMP Nottingham - e hiahia ana ahau kia whakarongohia aku māharahara i te wā i whakaarahia ai e au. " Ki taku whakaaro ka taea te ārai i te matenga o Shalane." 'Ko te tikanga kia kitea, kia mahia' I kī te whakamutunga kōrero i tukuna e te hūri: "I mate a Shalane Blackwood i te toto ā-roto i takea mai i te keke duodenal - he āhuatanga i kitea me te rongoā. " Ko ngā hinganga pūhohe e nui ana ki te waihotanga a te whare herehere me ngā kaimahi rongoā i HMP Nottingham i tino āwhina ki te matenga o Shalane." I kī te Ratonga Whare Herehere i roto i tētahi kōrero: "Ka kaha mātou ki te ako mai i ia mate i roto i te tiakitanga, ā, kei te whānau o Tēnā Blackwood o mātau whakaaro. " Ka whakaarohia, ka urupare mātou ki ngā kitenga o te uiuinga a te koroni, ā, ka kite he aha ngā akoranga ka taea te ako." I kitea he toto i roto i te pūtau o Tāne Blackwood i te rā i mua i tana matenga, engari kāore ia i mauria ki te hōhipera. I kī a Rebecca Treece, he rōia e tohu ana i tōna whānau: "He tino māharahara i kitea a Shalane me te toto i roto i tōna pūtau, ahakoa kāore i kitea te pūtake, kāore i rapua ētahi atu tūhuratanga. " I tino ohorere te whānau o Shalane i tēnei." 'Kaimahi āwangawanga' I tāpiritia e ia e hiahiatia ana he "mahi whawhai" hei whakatau i ngā take i huraina e te uiuinga. I uiuia takitahitia te matenga e te Ombudsman Whare Herehere me te Porotiti (PPO), ā, me whakaputa tētahi pūrongo. I kī te pūrongo arotakenga hōu rawa a HM Inspectorate of Prisons, i whakaputaina i te Hui 2015, kāore i te haumaru te Whare Herehere o Rātata, ā, he rawakore ngā herenga. I kī a Andrew Neilson, te kaiwhakahaere whakahau mō te Rōpū Hauati mō te Whakahōu Penal, i taua wā: "Kei te āwangawanga ngā kaimahi i te nui o te mahi... me te pēhanga i runga i a rātau nā te whakahekenga."

title: E ono tau te tapearaa a Rusia i te Ite no Iehova 'extremist'
summary: Ua faautuahia te hoê taata huiraatira no Tenemaka e ora ra i Rusia e ono matahiti i roto i te fare auri no te mea ua riro oia ei Ite no Iehova.
text: I whakapuakina te rōpū whakapono he rōpū "whakahāwea" e nga kōti o Rūhia i te tau 2017, ā, i whakakorea. I hopukina a Dennis Christensen i te taone o Oryol tata ki te rua tau ki muri i te āwhā a nga pirihimana i tētahi karakia inoi. I kī te Minita Ā-Rohe o Tenemaka, a Anders Samuelsen, he "tino māharahara" a ia, ā, ka karanga ki Rūhia "kia manaaki i te wāteatanga o te whakapono". I kī a ia kua rite a Tenemaka ki te āwhina i te tono a Christensen. Ko te mahi tuatahi tēnei o tōna momo mai i te wā i rāhuitia ai te rōpū whakapono. I kī tētahi kaiwhakawā i te kōti rohe ko ngā tau e ono i roto i tētahi taiwhenua pene he "rerenga mōkito", i pūrongotia e te pae rongokōrero paetata o Oryol Novosti. Ka puta mai te whiu a Christensen ahakoa he raweke mārama a te Perehitini o Rūhia o Tūroro i Tīma, nāna i karanga nga whakaaro o te whakararuraru "kutukutu" me te kī taurangi kia titiro ki te mahinga o ngā mema. I a ia e kōrero ana ki te HAU, ka tautohe te kaikōrero a Tēnā Hapa tērā pea he "take" mō te whiu i a Christensen i tua atu i te mahi noa iho i tōna whakapono. Heoi anō, i te kōti, ka tautohe nga rōia kei te uru tika a ia hei kaiwhakahaere o ngā mahi whakapono mō te rōpū kua rāhuitia. Na te mahinga a Christensen i kawe mai te tautoko a ngā rōpū motika tangata tae atu ki te Amnesty International, nāna i kī kua hereheretia ia "mō te whakamahi noa iho i ōna mana tangata tae atu ki tōna mana ki te wāteatanga o te whakapono". I karangatia e ia tōna tukunga wawe, tōtika hoki. E rave rahi atu Ite no Iehova o te faaruru nei i te mau faahaparaa hara i Rusia, e 170 000 melo to te pǔpǔ. Ko te nekeneke he rōpū whakapono Karaitiana i whakatūria i Te Hononga o Amerika i te mutunga o te rau tau 1800. It is best known by non-member for its door-to-door evangelical work in an attempt to recruit new members. Ko te nuinga o te rōpū e whakamārama ana i te Paipera, ā, ka whakakāhore i te maha o ngā whakaakoranga a ētahi atu hāhi Karaitiana nui. Heoi anō, kāore rātau e kitea e ngā hāhi tūturu hei hāhi matua. I te Kotahitanga o Soviet i raro a'e i a Stalin, ua hamani-ino-hia te mau Ite no Iehova no to ratou faaroo. E whakapūmautia ana te wāteatanga o te whakapono i raro i te kaupapa ture o Rūhia - engari e tīari ana ngā okotahi i raro i ngā ture whakararuraru. "E tino pouri ana mātau ki te whakapae a Dennis Christensen- he tangata harakore kāore i mahi i tētahi hara tūturu," te kōrero a te Kaiwhakaatu o Iehova i Rūhia ki te kōrero rongokōrero a TE WĀ. "He pouri te pānui i te Paipera, te kauwhau, me te noho i tētahi āhua ora morare he hara hara anō i Rūhia."

title: I rāhuitia e te kaiwhiu o Ārepa a Karimachiani mo te maka ōrite
summary: Kua rāhuitia e te tinana tākaro ā-ao o te kōhukihuki tētahi kaitākaro Ārepa mo te ono marama mo te maka tika i tētahi ōrite kia kore ai e hoariri a Iharaira.
text: I toa a Alireza Karimachiani i tētahi whakataetae ki tōna hoariri Rūhia i ngā whakataetae o te ao i raro i te 23 o Whiringa ā-Rangi i te whakahau a tana kaiako kia hinga ia. Mehemea i toa a ia, kua anga atu a ia ki tētahi kaitākaro o Iharaira i te hurihanga panuku. Kaore a Irana e mōhio ki te āhua o Iharaira, ā, ka whakakore i ana kaitākaro kia kaua e whakataetae ki a Iharaira. Kua kī te tōpūtanga kōhukihuki o Irana ka werohia te rāhuitanga, i pānuitia e te United World Wrestling Disciplinary Chamber i te Paraire. "I runga i te tohutohu a tana kaiako o Jamshidi, i ngaro noa iho tana 1/8 whakamutunga ki a Alikhan Zhabrilov," te kī a te ruma, e pā ana ki te hoariri o Rūhia i te taurite. "I kitea te kaiwhaiwhai me te kaiako i mahi hāngai ki ngā Ture Wrestling Ao Whānui... me ngā Ture Whakaraupapa UWW," ka tāpirihia. I tautuhia te āraitanga a Karimachiani kia oma mo te rua tau mai i te rā o te mahi - ka āhei ai ia ki te whakataetae i te mutunga o Me 2018. I rāhuitia hoki tana kaiako, a Hamidreza Jamshidi, i te tākaro tae noa ki te mutunga o Whiringa 2019. I te wā o te tauritenga o Whiringa 2017 i Pōrana, i ārahi a Karimachiani i te 3-2 i te whā meneti o te taurite. Na te toa i whakatū i a ia ki a Uri Kalashnikov o Iharaira i te whawhai panuku. Te āhua nei kei roto i ngā whakakitenga o te ōrite te reo o te tangata e hamama ana i ngā tohutohu kia ngaro, i mua i te okioki poto o te ōrite mō tētahi whakawhitinga i waenganui i te kaitākaro me te kaiako. I te 45 hēkona whakamutunga, ka whiua a Karimachiani ki te whenua i mua i tana takahuri, nā reira i toa ai tana hoariri i te 14-3. He tokomaha nga Ārepa i mau ki te pāpāho pāpori ki te whakapuaki i te whakapouri i te kitenga. Neke atu i te 5,000 ngā tuhituhi i tukuna i muri i te ōritenga me ngā hashtags e whakamāoritia ana hei #lose_alireza, #I_am_telling_you_to_lose, me #you_must_lose.

title: Ka mate te tohorā 'tūponotanga tiketike' i te wahapū o Dee
summary: Ko te tohorā moana i paea i roto i te wahapū kotahi e rua i roto i te maha o ngā rā, he "tino tūponotanga" ki te mate, kua whakatūpato nga kaiwhakaora.
text: I tūmanakohia, kua hoki mai te whāngote moana 30ft (10m) ki ngā wai tuwhera i te kitenga i te kauhoe ki te moana i te Paraire. Engari i kitea anō i te ata Hātarei i te taha kotahi o te takutai o Flintshire. Ko te tohorā - ko te tuarua o ngā momo tohorā nui rawa o te ao - e ono anake, e whitu marama noa iho te pakeke. Kei te aromatawai tētahi tohunga mai i te British Divers Marine Life Rescue (BDMLR) i te kararehe 14 tan. I te tuhituhi i tōna whārangi Facebook i te ahiahi o te Hātarei, ka kī te rōpū kua mahue tana tīma ki te haumaru i muri i te tai mai. "Kei te ora tonu te tohorā, ā, ka aroturukitia mai i te poti me te ākau," tana kī. I kī tētahi kōrero kāore e taea e ngā tohorā te tautoko i tō rātou ake taumahatanga i runga i te whenua, nā reira kei te mōrearea te "tūkino nui ki a rātau anō" ina paea. I muri i te maha o nga haora i waho o te wai, he mataku kei kore pea te tohorā e ora. "Ahakoa e hiahia ana mātou ki te tūmanako, me tino tūturu tātau mō ngā wā e ora ai te kararehe i tēnei wā," te tāpiri mai a BDMLR. "He maha ngā haora i waho o te wai e kuru ana i raro i tōna ake taumahatanga i roto i ngā rā e rua kua taha, ā, he tino nui pea te nui o te tūkinotanga ā-roto i tēnei wā. " Ahakoa ka kauhoe anō i tēnei ahiahi, he nui tonu te tūponotanga ka tāpae anō, ā, ka pahemo rānei."

title: Afan Lido: £ 13.4m hoahoa whakakapinga lido kua whakaaetia
summary: Kua whakaaetia ngā mahere me ngā hoahoa mō tētahi matatini hākinakina £13.4m i Port Talbot hei whakakapi i tētahi lido i whakangaromia e te ahi e whā tau ki mua.
text: Neath Port Talbot council will build the replacement Afan Lido on the neighbour Hollywood Park site. I pīrangi ngā kaiwhakahauhau ki te whare hou i te pae tawhito, engari i toa i ta rātau pakanga kia whai puna e waru ara. Councillors approved the plans on Wednesday with work due to start by the end of the year, taking 15 months. He "tuanui ngaru" te āhua o te hoahoa hei whakaata i tōna tauwāhi i te taha moana. He puna wai e waru ara me te papa nekeneke; Te puna ākonga, te taiwhanga kaimātakitaki 100 tūru me te hōro hākinakina e whā kōti me ngā tūru ka taea te whakahoki mō ngā kaimātakitaki 100. There will also be a fitness suite, dance studio, children's soft play area, a youth club, community meeting rooms and a cafe. I kī a Ali Thomas, te kaiārahi o te kaunihera o Neath Port Talbot: "E whakahīhī ana ahau ki ngā tāngata katoa kua whai wāhi ki tēnei tukanga katoa mai i ngā mema i pōtitia ki ngā āpiha me te iwi whānui. " Ināianei ka kite tātou i te āhua o te āhua, e mōhio tūturu ana ahau ka hiahia te katoa ki a au ki te kite i ēnei pūkenga whakamīharo o te Rau tau 21 hei hākinakina e ngā tāngata paetata me ngā manuhiri. "It will certainly be a focal point to enhance our strategy and vision for regenerating the whole area." I whakatuwheratia te Afan Lido taketake i te tau 1965 e te Kuini me Kiriata Jenkins, te tuakana o te whetū o Karaihe, ko Te Kaiwhakahaere tuatahi. I taurimatia e te wāhi ngā konohete nui mai i a Spencer Davies ki Pink Floyd i ōna rā o mua ki Coldplay me McFly i ngā tau tata nei. I Hakihea 2009 ka werohia te whare e te ahi, ā, kātahi anō ka whakawāteatia i te mutunga o te tau 2011. E 2,628 ngā tāngata i whai wāhi ki tētahi whakaaro kaunihera o Neath Port Talbot mō te whakakapi i te Afan Lido. Ahakoa he tokomaha ngā tāngata i kī e hiahia ana rātau ki te kite i tētahi hanga anō ōrite, ka kī te kaunihera e utu ana i te £700,000 i te tau ki te pupuri i te lido tawhito.

title: Te mōrearea o Catalonia i roto i ngā kupu 300
summary: Na te puku a Catalonia mo te rangatiratanga i tūpou ai a Paniora ki tōna raruraru tōrangapū nui rawa mo te 40 tau.
text: I whakatārewatia e Madrid tōna mana motuhake mo te tata ki te whitu marama i muri i tētahi tono rahua kia wehe atu i te tau 2017. I Whiringahora 2019, i whiua e te Kōti Matua o Paniora e iwa nga kaitōrangapū Catalan me nga kaiwhaiwhai ki te whare herehere i waenganui i te iwa me te 13 tau mo taua tono rangatiratanga. Tokotoru ētahi atu i whainatia. Nga whare herehere o Paniora i nga kaiarahi rangatiratanga o Catalan He aha a Catalonia? He rohe motuhake a Catalonia i te raki-rāwhiti o Paniora, ā, he hītori motuhake e tata ana ki te 1,000 tau ki muri. Tata ki te 7.5 miriona ngā tāngata o te rohe rangatira, me tō rātou ake reo, pāremata, haki me te waiata. Kei Catalonia anō tōna ake ope pirihimana, ā, kei te whakahaere i ētahi o ana ratonga tūmatanui. He aha te tautohetohe? Kua roa te amuamu a nga tāwhara o Catalan he nui rawa te moni e tukuna ana e to rātau rohe ki ngā wāhi rawakore o Paniora, i te mea e whakahaeretia ana ngā tāke e Madrid. E kī ana hoki rātau ko ngā huringa a Paniora ki tō rātou tūnga motuhake i te tau 2010 i whakararuraru i te tuakiri Catalan. I roto i tētahi taupānga i te 1 o Whiringahora 2017, i whakapuakina e te Kōti Kawanatanga o Paniora, tata ki te 90% o ngā kaipōti Catalan i pūruatia te rangatiratanga. Engari ko te neke atu i te 43% anake. Tērā ētahi matapaki i te wā i whakamātau ai nga pirihimana ā iwi Pāniora ki te ārai i te pōti a te tangata. Kātahi ka whakapuakina e nga kaihīhī whakahaere i te pāremata o Catalan te rangatiratanga i te 27 o Whiringa ā-rangi. Na te riri i tērā, ka whakahaua e Madrid he ture hāngai mā te whakatara i te Tuhipānui 155 o te kaupapa ture - he tuatahi mō Paniora. I panaia e te kāwanatanga Pāniora nga kaiārahi o Catalan, ka memeha i te pāremata, a, ka karangatia he pōti ā rohe i te 21 o Hakihea 2017, i toa ai nga rōpū tāngata. I rere a Carles Puigdemont, te perehitini o Catalan o mua, engari e hiahiatia ana i Paniora e whakapaea ana ki te tutukitanga, pērā ki te tokowhā i rere tahi me ia. I June 2018, ka whiwhi anō ngā tāngata o Catalan i te mana o te rohe mai i te ture hāngai o Madrid i muri i te oatititanga o tētahi kāwanatanga hou. Ko Quim Torra, he urunga tata o Tēnā Puigdemont, ināianei e ārahi ana i te kāwanatanga ā rohe. E hiahia ana koe ki te mōhio anō?

title: E kite ana te tari o te kaitono perehitini o Pūkeirangi i te whakaekenga whakamate
summary: Neke atu i te 20 ngā tāngata kua mate i roto i tētahi whakaekenga e hāngai ana ki te tari o Kabul o te kaitono pōti perehitini o Amrullah Saleh.
text: E rima tekau ētahi atu tāngata i whara i te whakaekenga o te tari Ia Kākāriki i te pūmatua i te Rātapu. I puta mai te tutu i te rā tuatahi o te whakahauhau mo te pōti perehitini o Awhekenetāna e tū mai nei. Ko Tēnā Saleh, he iti nei te whara, ko te hoa whakahaere o Perehitini Wānanga o Aotearoa. I kite te whakaeke i tētahi kaiwhakatūtū tūruhi whai i a ia e whakapakū ana i tētahi motokā i kōpikopiko i te pakū e tata ana ki te whare tari, ka kī tētahi kōrero mo te mahi o roto. Kātahi anō ka tomo mai ētahi kaiwhakawhanake ki te tari, a, tata tonu ki te ono haora i mua i te matenga o nga ope haumarutanga. Tata ki te 150 ngā tāngata i whakaorangia mai i roto i te whare i reira te Ia Kākāriki - he rōpū pāpori, pāpāho, ārai hāmate hoki i arahina e Tēnā Saleh - kei reira. I mua o te Rātapu ka kī a Perehitini Wānanga e "haere mai ana te rangimārie" ki te iwi. Kāore he rōpū tinihanga i whakapuaki i te kawenga mo te whakaeke. E tūmanakohia ana kia tū te pōti a Awhekenetāna i te wā o Mahuru, engari e rua kē ngā wā i hikitia ai.

title: Ka toa a Dame Vera Lynn i te pakanga moko gin
summary: Kua whakahaua tētahi kamupene gin kia utua a Dame Vera Lynn £1,800 hei utu ā-ture i muri i te ngaronga o tētahi kēhi hei moko i te ingoa o te kaiwaiata mō tana inu.
text: I tono a Halewood International ki te rēhita i te moko "Vera Lynn" i June i tērā tau, nā tōna whakamahinga i roto i te kōrero whakarērea cockney mō te kupu gin. I ātete te pakeke 102 tau i runga i te take ka kitea te whakamahi i tōna ingoa hei tautoko i te hua. I tautohe te umanga ko 'Vera Lynn' e mōhiotia ana he kōrero kōrero, i te kaiwaiata. Heoi anō, kāore i whakaae te āpiha whakarongo moko o Al Skilton. Ka kī a ia: "Ko te kaitono... kāore i taea te whakarato i tētahi whakaaturanga o te taumata o te māramatanga o te kōrero waiata cockney i te UK, tētahi mea rānei hei whakaahua i te taumata mōhiotanga o te kupu Vera Lynn e pā ana ki te gin. "He roa te whakaaturanga e whakaatu ana ko te iwi whānui e hāngai ana ki ngā inu waipiro, i te tūtakitanga ki a 'Vera Lynn', ka kitea hei tohutoro kōrero mō te gin, kaua e mau mai ki te hinengaro i te kaiwhakangahau o Vera Lynn, kua 84 tau i roto i te umanga whakangahau." Mai i te Pakanga Tuarua o te Ao, kua paingia te kaiwaiata We'll Meet Again mai i Ditchling, East Sussex, ā, kua whakamahia tōna ingoa hei moko kāore i rēhitatia mō ana pūoro mai i te tau 1939. I kī te tīma ā-ture a Dame Vera i "tino mōhiotia hoki te Whaiāipo o ngā Ope Taua mō ana mahi aroha, tae atu ki ngā hōia o mua, ngā tamariki hauā me te mate pukupuku." Whāia a BBC South East i Facebook, i Twitter, i Instagram hoki. Tukua ō whakaaro pūrākau ki southeasttoday@bbc.co.uk.

title: Teihana Tiriti Hōu: Ka tīmata te mahi i te pātaka matua
summary: Kua tīmata te mahi i tētahi pātaka matua hei wāhanga o tētahi whakawhanaketanga anō e £598m i waenganui o Birmingham.
text: Kei roto i te whakatupuranga huri noa i te Teihana o New Street tētahi pātaka tari a John Lewis, e whakatuwheratia ana i te ngahuru o te tau 2014. Ko te toa 250,000 waewae tapawhā, ko tētahi o ngā mea nui rawa atu i waho o Rāwāhi, e tūmanakohia ana kia hangaia e 650 ngā mahi. Ko te wāhanga tuatahi o te huihuinga hou ka whakatuwheratia i Aperira 2013, kia taea ai te whakawhanaketanga anō o te huihuinga o nāianei. Ka kitea e te aronui, e whai ana ki te tārua i te kaha o te pāhihi, e waru ngā tomokanga hou me te pai ake o te urunga pāhihi. I kī te Kaiārahi Kaunihera o Te Taone o Birmingham, a Tā Albert Bore: "Ka tino pai te āhua. Ka rongo te tangata i tētahi wāhi hāneanea, kaua ko te sardine i roto i te kēne." Kei te hangaia te pātaka a John Lewis i runga tonu i te wāhi o te Pourewa o Stevenson, i whakawāteatia i tērā tau. E tūmanakohia ana hoki kia whakatuwheratia tētahi pokapū hokohoko o Pallasades i te tau 2014, ā, kua oti te kaupapa katoa i te tau 2015.

title: He tāhei para i mahue i Walsham-le-Willows
summary: E 40 tāhei ururua mahi kua mahue ki runga i tētahi huarahi i Te Taiwhenua.
text: I mahue nga otaota, i whakaahuatia he rawa hanga whare me te ururua o te whare, i te taha o Finningham Road, i Walsham-le-Willows tata ki Bury St Edmunds i te pō o te Rāite. I kī ngā Pirihimana o Te Wānanga he "mōrearea tērā ki ngā kaitaraiwa me ētahi atu mema o te iwi whānui". Kei te mahi ngā āpiha me te Taiao Taiao ki te tango i te para. I kī ngā pirihimana te āhua nei kua utaina mā te tarakihana me te tauranga. I kī a PC Mark Bryant: "He nui te wā e tangohia ana e ngā umanga e pā ana. " Mā ngā mahi pēnei ka tino tūkino ki te taiao paetata, ā, ka tohe atu ahau ki te tangata e mōhio ana ko wai te kawenga kia whakapā wawe mai ki a mātau."

title: Memorial bell for repatriation route cast
summary: Kua makaia he pere whakamaharatanga ka tangi i runga i tētahi ara mō ngā hōia hinga i Oxfordshire.
text: I hangaia i te Whitechapel Bell Foundry, i Rānana, i muri i te kohikohi a te Royal British Legion me ngā kaunihera ā-rohe me ngā aroha e £26,000. I kī a Maika Henderson, te tuakana perehitini o Oxfordshire Royal British Legion, he "harikoa" a ia ināianei. I ngaro i a Lee Mackie, i muri i te whakahau, tana tama ko Jason, i patua i Awhekenetāna i te tau 2009. "Me tino whakahīhī a Oxfordshire ki ngā mea kua tutuki i tērā tau e hautū ana i ngā tukunga atu mō te iwi, ā, e hiahia ana ahau ki te mihi whaiaro ki ngā tāngata katoa kua tautoko i ngā whānau pouri," tana kī. Ka tautuhia te pere tenor nui ki tētahi tāpare oki, ā, ka tangi hei tohu i ngā rōpū whakahoki e tata ana ki Norton Way, Carterton. E 31in (78.7cm) te whānui, e 25in (63.5cm) te teitei. Ka mauria ngā tinana o ngā kaimahi ratonga mai i RAF Brize Norton ki te Hōhipera o John Radcliffe i Oxford.

title: Ka whakahē te perehitini o Potukara i te ture huringa ira tangata hou
summary: Kua whakahē te Perehitini o Potukara, o Marcelo Rebelo de Sousa, i tētahi ture e ngāwari ake ai te huri a te tangata i tō rātou ira tangata me tō rātou ingoa i roto i ngā tuhinga.
text: Na te ture, i whakaaetia e te pāremata i tērā marama, ka whakaaetia e ngā tangata whenua te mahi i ngā huringa ā-ture mai i te 16 o ona tau, me te kore hiahia whakamātautau rongoā. I tēnei wā, me 18 tau te pakeke o te tangata, ā, me whakaatu pūrongo rongoā. Ka kī atu te perehitini ki ngā MP kia whakaarohia te hiahiatanga o tētahi whakamātautau rongoā mō te hunga i raro iho i te 18 tau. I raro i te ture kua marohitia, me whiwhi te hunga pakeke i waenganui i te 16 me te 18 te huringa o te ira tangata e whakaaetia ana e o rātau mātua, māngai ā-ture rānei. Me hainatia te ture e te perehitini kia mana ai. He aha ināianei? Ka taea e te Pāremata te whakatika i te ture e hāngai ana ki ngā huatau a te perehitini, te whakaū rānei i te ture o nāianei me te whakaaetanga a te nuinga o ngā MP. I tēnei take, ka herea te perehitini ki te haina hei ture. I karangatia e Tēnā Rebelo de Sousa "te whakarato i te arotakenga rongoā o mua mō ngā tangata i raro iho i te 18 tau" i roto i tētahi kōrero i tukuna ki te paetukutuku perehitini (i te reo Potukara). Mā te whakamārama i tana whakataunga, ka kī a ia mēnā tērā pea ka mahi te tangata i te mahi whakawhitiwhiti ira tangata ā muri ake nei, ka "tika" te rapu whakaaro rongoā i te wāhanga o mua. He aha te tauhohenga? I whakanuia e nga kaipānui me te oati tū i te whakaaetanga o te ture i te 13 o Āperira e 109 ngā pōti i te pāremata tūru 230 o te whenua. I pōhiritia e nga kaiwhaiwhai te ture "pakaru", e kī ana e manaaki ana i te mana o te whakatau i a ia anō. Engari i ātete ngā kaiwhakawāwā ki te whakaae ki ngā huringa me te kore pūrongo rongoā me te whakaheke i te pakeke mōkito. E kī ana a Tēnā Rebelo de Sousa i ngā huringa e whakaurua ana he "tawhiti rawa atu i te whakaaetanga" i waenganui i ngā kaipōrangapū me te iwi. Tērā te tauhohenga whāranu ki te whakahē: I whakakorea hoki e te ture hou te pokanga koretake ki ngā tamariki intersex. He aha te ture puta noa i Uropi? E rima anake ērā atu whenua o Ūropi he tauira i runga anō i te manawa whaiaro, e ai ki te ILGA-Uropi: Malta, Norway, Denmark, Ireland me Belgium. I te UK, me 18 tau te pakeke o te tangata kia hiahiatia he huringa ā-ture o tō rātou ira tangata, he tukanga ka tae atu ki te rima tau, ā, e hiahiatia ana he tātaritanga o te ira tangata mai i te hinengaro hinengaro.

title: Ka toro atu te mahi pāhihi o te tereina utanga o Coleshill tae noa ki te mutunga wiki
summary: Kei te haere tonu te raruraru haere tereina i muri i te takahanga o te tereina utanga.
text: Ināianei kāore e tīmata anō te ratonga pūnoa i waenganui i Birmingham New Street me Nuneaton tae noa ki te Mane, te kī a National Rail. Ko te tūmanako ka tuwhera te raina i tēnei ahiahi. I kite te pāhihi i te maha o ngā kaata e tahuri ana, e ārai ana i te raina i waenganui i Coleshill Parkway me Nuneaton, te kī a ngā Pirihimana Waka o Ingarangi (BTP). Kua tohutohutia ngā pāhihi kia tirohia ngā hōtaka tereina i mua i to rātau haerenga. I kī a BTP i tū te pāhihi i te Wenerei tata ki te 15:00 BST. Kua mahi ngā āpiha ki te tiki i ngā kaata takahia, ā, i kī kua "haere whakamua" rātau. I roto i tētahi kōrero i whakaputaina i te Paraire, ka kī a National Rail: "Kei te mahi ngā kaipūkaha Network Rail huri noa i te karaka ki te whakaora i te tereina me te whakatika i ngā tūkinotanga ki te hanganga. " E tūmanakohia ana kia kati tonu te rerewhenua puta noa i te mutunga wiki, i te wā e whakatika ana i te ara me ngā taputapu tohu. "E tūmanako ana mātou ka haere tonu te raruraru tae noa ki te mutunga o te ratonga i te Rātapu 16 o Mahuru." Nā te pāhihi, kāore e taea e ngā tereina te whakahaere i waenganui i Birmingham New Street me Nuneaton, ā, ka haere ngā tereina i waenganui i Te Tiriti Hōu me Te Tiriti Hōu o Te Tiriti Hōu mā Loughborough. Hei rutu i te raruraru, kua whakatūria ngā pahi whakakapi rēra kia oma i waenganui i Te Ao Whānui me Nuneaton, ā, ka karanga ki Coleshill Parkway, ka tāpiritia e National Rail.

title: Kotahi i roto i ngā kāmera C KK Taitapa e whā kāore i te mahi
summary: Neke atu i te kotahi i roto i ngā kāmera CCTV e whakahaeretia ana e te kaunihera e whā i ngā Taitapa o Pākehā kāore i te tino whakahaere.
text: I kī tētahi pūrongo ki te mana ā rohe kāore i te tūnga i tēnei wā ki te pūtea i te tāutanga me te tautiakitanga o te pūnaha i roto i ngā taone rerekē e waru. E kī ana e 19 mai i te 70 kāore i te mahi tika, ā, ka nui ake pea i runga anō i ngā āhuatanga o te rangi. I tāpiritia me tautoko e te kaunihera ngā pirihimana me ngā hapori e hiahia ana ki ngā kāmera me te āwhina i a rātou ki te kimi pūtea. I puta mai te akoranga i muri i te putanga mai o ngā pātai mō te kaha o te kaunihera e haere tonu ana ki te whakarato me te pūtea i te CCTV mokowā tūmatanui. I tēnei wā e whakahaere ana i ngā kāmera e 70 puta noa i Duns, Hawick, Galashiels, Kelso, Peebles, Eyemouth, Selkirk me Melrose. E whakahaeretia ana rātau e Pirihimana Pākehā, engari ka tutuki ngā utu whakatikatika e te kaunihera. 'Kua tawhito' Ko te kaupapahere a te mana ā rohe i tēnei wā ko te haere tonu i to rātau tiaki kia kore rā anō rātau e whakatika i te ohaoha. I kī tētahi pūrongo kaunihera kāore i taunakitia te whakakapi i ngā pūnaha tairitenga o nāianei pēnei i te mea he tawhito te hangarau, ā, "kua tawhito". "Mā te whakakapi i ngā pūnaha o nāianei ki te hangarau whakamāramatanga tiketike hōu rawa e hiahiatia he pūtea penapena nui rawa," ka tāpirihia. E kī ana i tautokona e ngā pirihimana te whakamahinga o te C KKK hei "utauta pai mō ā rātou mahi" engari kāore anō kia pūtea i a rātou. The council is being asked to note that its systems are no longer fit for purpose and agree to shut them down once they are beyond economic repair. Heoi anō, e kī ana ka āwhina i ngā hapori e hiahia ana ki te tāuta, ki te whakaroa, ki te whakakapi rānei i te C KK me te "āwhina i a rātou ki te kimi rongoā e tino pūteatia ana e aua hapori".

title: E tohutohu ana ngā pānuitanga Facebook i ana kaimahi kia māturu i ngā muna
summary: Kua hurihia e tētahi rōpū whakahau e tautohe ana i te wehenga o Facebook ngā utauta pānuitanga a te whatunga pāpori hei whakamatautau i ana kaimahi ki te māturu mōhiohio.
text: E kī ana te wāteatanga mai i Facebook i ūkuia ngā pānuitanga ki ngā kaimahi o te kamupene hangarau, e whakatoko ana i tētahi paetukutuku "mokowā haumaru" e taea ai e rātou te tuku ingoamuna i "ngā aki kaipupuri". I whakapeka a Facebook ki te tākupu. Engari e mārama ana te AO kāore i te ārai i ngā pānuitanga, kāore rānei i te pupuri i tētahi rangitaki motuhake o wai kua tirotiro. I puta mai te mahi i te wiki i muri i te whakaaturanga a te New York Times kua horahia e tētahi kamupene whanaungatanga tūmatanui i whakamahia e Facebook ngā kerēme ko te kaiwawao tautohetohe ko George Soros te kaitautoko huna o te whakahau Wāteatanga mai i Facebook. I muri iho ka whakapaea e ngā Tūāpapa Rōpū Tuwhera a Tēnā Soros a Facebook ki te whakahaere i tētahi "whakahau whakahāwea". Mai i tērā wā, kua kī te rangatira nui o Facebook, a Mark Zuckerberg, me te āpiha whakahaere matua, a Sheryl Sandberg, kāore rātau i te mōhio ki te mahi, ā, kua whakamutua ta rātau kirimana ki a Definers, te kamupene PR e pā ana. Heoi anō, kua whakaae tētahi manatu ā-roto māturu mai i te rangatira whakawhitiwhiti kōrero a Facebook, a Elliot Schrage, ko ia te kawenga. "I te putanga mai o te whakahau 'Wāteatanga mai i Facebook' hei tauwhāinga pāpāho, ka tono te tīma [ā mātou whakawhitiwhitinga] ki a Definers kia āwhina ki te mārama ki ngā rōpū i muri i a rātou," te manatu - i whakaputaina e te pae rongokōrero Techcrunch - e kī ana. "I mōhio rātau kei te pūtea a George Soros i ētahi o ngā mema tauwhāinga. I whakaritea e rātau he tuhinga, a, ka tuaritia ēnei ki te pēhi hei whakaatu ehara tēnei i te nekehanga pāpāho noa iho. "Ko te kawenga mō ēnei whakataunga kei te ārahi i te tīma whakawhitiwhiti. Ko au tēnā." Kei te mahia ngā mahi a Tēnā Schrage e te Tuarua Pirimia o UK, o Nick Clegg, kua whakahaua ki te mahi i tētahi arotakenga whānui ake o ngā mahi rorohiko a Facebook. I te Tūtira, ka hoatu e Tēnā Zuckerberg tētahi uiuinga ki a TNW i kī ai kāore a ia i kite i te hiahia kia heke iho i te manukura, ā, i tūmanako ia ka mahi tahi ia me Ms Sandberg mō "ngā tekau tau e haere ake nei". I whakamahia e Facebook he rongonui mō te ruarua o ngā mōrearea, engari kua rerekē tērā i ngā marama tata nei i muri i te take o Cambridge Analytica me ētahi atu heitara. Kotahi te māturu - kātahi anō ka pūrongotia e te Wall Street Journal - i whakaaturia mai he uiuinga ā-roto a te tīma rauemi tangata a Facebook i te ōrautanga o ngā kaimahi i kī e tūmanako ana rātau mō tōna wā heke. Ahakoa kāore anō kia whakaaturia e te Wāteatanga mai i Facebook he pēhea te whakarite i ngā kaimahi, he kōwhiringa kei roto i te utauta pānui a te kamupene hei whakahaere i tētahi whakahau ki te hunga e whakarārangi ana i tō rātou kaitukumahi hei Facebook HQ. E kī ana e tata ana ki te 89,000 ngā tāngata kua pērā. Ko tētahi atu whiringa ko te whakamahi i tētahi rārangi wāhitau īmēra e mōhiotia ana nā ngā kaimahi Facebook. Ka tāpiri te neke ki te pēhanga i te kamupene i te wā e pā ana ki te nui o ngā tautohetohe. I ngā rā tata nei anake:

title: Ko te haumanu pukupuku kurupae proton 'he iti ake ngā pānga taha'
summary: Ko te mate pukupuku i waenganui i tētahi tautohetohe NHS i te tau 2014 ka iti ake ngā pānga taha o ngā tamariki i te radiotherapy taketake, e ai ki te rangahau hōu.
text: Nā Dominic HowellBBC News Ko te akoranga, i whakaputaina i roto i te The Lancet Oncology, e hua ana he pai te haumanu kurupae proton ki ētahi atu rongoā. I tirohia e ngā kairangahau e 59 ngā tūroro i waenganui i te toru me te 21 mai i te 2003 ki te 2009. I te tau 2014 ka mauria ia e nga mātua o Ashya King i te hōhipera i Hēmihia ki te tiki i te rongoā ki rāwāhi. Na a rātau mahi i ahu mai ki te mahi pirihimana ki te kimi i a rātau. Ko Ashya, e rima tau i te wā o tana rongoā, ināianei kua wātea te mate pukupuku, ka kī tōna whānau i tērā tau. 'Tūkinotanga whakaaetia' Ko ngā tūroro katoa i whai wāhi ki te akoranga, i arahina e Dr Torunn Yock mai i te Hōhipera Ahuwhānui o Massachusetts i te US, ko te momo puku roro kino rawa atu i roto i ngā tamariki, e mōhiotia ana ko te medulloblastoma. I muri iho i te rima tau, he rite tonu to rātau mokatere ora ki tērā o ngā tūroro i whakamahia ki te radiotherapy X-ray taketake, engari he iti ake ngā pānga taha ki te manawa me ngā pūkahukahu, i kitea e te akoranga.
