I kī atu a Dr Yock ki te Reo Irirangi 5 ora: "Ko te kitenga nui ko te haumanu proton he pai ki te whakaora i ēnei tūroro, ā, he aha hoki te tino mīharo, kei te pupuri i ēnei mokatere tiketike o te rongoā, engari he iti iho te tōmuri o te tūkinotanga, ā, he tino pai te kounga o te ora." I kī te pepa: "I hua te rongoā iraruke proton i te tūkinotanga e whakaaetia ana, ā, he rite tonu ngā putanga ora ki ērā i kitea ki te radiotherapy taketake, e hua ana ko te whakamahinga o te rongoā he whirinoa pea ki ngā rongoā ā-whakaahua." He aha te haumanu kurupae proton? Ka whakamahia e ia ngā korakora whakahiko, kaua ko ngā hihi-X hei tuku i te radiotherapy mō ngā tūroro mate pukupuku. Mā te rongoā e āhei ai ngā proton pūngao tiketike ki te ūkui hāngai ki te puku, e whakaiti ana i te inenga ki ngā kikokiko me ngā okana e karapoti ana. I te nuinga o te wā, he iti ake ngā pānga taha i whakaritea ki ngā mahinga X-ray pūngao tiketike. Ka taea te whakamahi hei whakamahi i ngā puku taura tuaiwi, ngā sarcoma tata ki te tuaiwi, roro rānei, te mate pukupuku prostate, te mate pukupuku pūkahukahu, te mate pukupuku ate me ētahi mate pukupuku tamariki. Pūtake: NHS Ingarangi, Cancer Research UK Independent expert Prof Gillies McKenna, ko ia te upoko o te tari oncology i te Whare Wānanga o Oxford, i kī te rangahau e "tino whakahekea ana ngā pānga taha" ki te haumanu kurupae proton. "Kāore he pānga taha i kitea i roto i te manawa me ngā pūkahukahu me te ara gastrointestinal, e tata ana te kitea i ngā wā katoa ki ngā hihi-X, ā, kāore he mate pukupuku tuarua i kitea i tētahi wā e tūmanako ana mātou kia kite i a rātou i roto i ngā tūroro X-ray," tana tāpiri mai. Engari i kī a Dr Kieran Breen, mai i te Brain Tumour Research, he nui ake te rangahau e hiahiatia ana ki te rongoā. "I te wā roa ake, me ngana tātau ki te mārama he aha ngā pānga ki ngā tāngata, ā, he maha ētahi atu momo puku i roto i te roro me ētahi atu wāhi o te tinana," tana kī. I tēnei wā, kei te wātea anake te haumanu kurupae proton i te UK hei rongoā i ngā mate pukupuku whatu, engari ka taea e ngā tūroro me ētahi atu momo mate pukupuku te tono mō te pūtea NHS mō te haumanu ki rāwāhi. Ko te pānga kurupae proton tuatahi i te UK ka whakawāteatia ki Newport i te mutunga o te tau 2016, he "hua o te pūtea penapena hāngai a te kāwanatanga o Welsh," e ai ki tētahi kōrero Whakaminenga o Welsh. Kua kī te Tari Hauora, mai i Aperira 2018 ka tukuna te rongoā ki ngā tūroro mate pukupuku tae atu ki te 1,500 i ngā hōhipera i Rāwāhi me Manatāne, i muri i te pūtea penapena e wātea ana ki te £250m. E rua tau ki muri nei na te tautohetohe mo te whakamahinga o te rongoā, i akiaki a Brett rāua ko Naghemeh Kingi, o Southsea, Hampshire, ki te tango i ta rāua tama ko Ashya mai i tētahi hōhipera i Southampton ki ngā tohutohu a ana tākuta. I pīrangi nga mātua kia whai haumanu kurupae proton i Prague, kāore anō kia taunakitia e tana tīma tiaki i Southampton. Na a rāua mahi i whakaoho he whaiwhai pirihimana o te ao whānui, ā, i muri iho ka hopukina te tokorua, a, ka puritia ki tētahi whare herehere i Madrid. I te mutunga ka tukua rātau, ā, ka tū te haumanu a Ashya, ā, ka whakaae te NHS ā muri ake ki te utu. I kī tētahi kōrero mō te Hōhipera o te Whare Wānanga o Te Whare Wānanga o Te Whare "Heoi anō, ka pōhiritia e mātou ngā whakahōutanga ki ngā whakaaturanga rongoā tīariari mō ngā rongoā pukupuku, ā, ka whai i ngā whakawhānuitanga o ngā paearu ā-motu o nāianei," te tāpiri mai a te kaikōrero. Ngā takahanga matua mō te manaakitanga o Ashya

title: Ka whānau a Jessica Ennis-Hill i te tamaiti tuatahi, a Reggie
summary: Kua whānau mai he tama te toa heptathlon o te Orimipia 2012, a Jessica Ennis-Hill.
text: I tana pānuitanga i te whānautanga i runga i tana pūkete Twitter, ka kī a ia: "I whānau mai ta māua tamaiti ātaahua a Reggie Ennis-Hill inanahi. Kāore i taea e mātau te hari ake." E whakaaro ana a Ennis-Hill, e 28, mai i Sheffield, ki te tiaki i tōna taitara Orangirangi i ngā Kēmu o Te Aorangi 2016. Ko te kaitākaro, nāna i mārena a Andy Hill i Me 2013, te kōtiro pānui o Rāwāhi 2012. I whakaaturia e Ennis-Hill i te Hānuere e hapu ana a ia i tana tamaiti tuatahi, e whakahaere ana i a ia i ngā Tākaro Kotahitanga i Glasgow, e tīmata ana i te Wenerei. I kī a ia i taua wā i "100% tautuhia ia ki te hoki ki ngā tākaro wā katoa" i muri i te whānautanga. Ko ngā hoa kaitākaro, tae atu ki a Katarina Johnson-Thompson, e 21 tau te paari, ko ia te makau mo te taitara heptathlon i Hampden Park i te ngarotanga o Ennis-Hill, i tere ki te whakairi takoha ki Twitter. Kua kōrero a Hōnea-Thompson, mai i Liverpool, mō tōna ngahau ki te haere ki te upoko ki a Ennis-Hill ina hoki mai tana tauwhāinga ki te tākaro. I tuhituhi hoki ngā whetū kauhoe o Ōrirangi o Rebecca Adlington rāua ko Keri-anne Payne i a rāua mihi mo te whānautanga, pērā ki te UK Sport me ngā Tākaro Pākehā. I whakamihi hoki te toa koura o te Orangirangi taurua o Adlington ki tōna hoa kaitākaro i te kōwhiringa o te ingoa o te pēpi hou. Ko te heptathlon whakamutunga o Ennis-Hill i te Taiwhanga Orimipia e rua raumati ki mua. I hapa a ia i ngā Whakataetae Ao o tērā tau i te whara o Achilles.

title: FGM: I pānuitia ngā mahi taihemahema wahine tuatahi o UK
summary: Kua pānuitia e te Ratonga Ture Karauna ngā mahinga tuatahi o UK mō te taihemahema wahine.
text: Ka whiua a Dr Dhanuson Dharmasena, e 31, o Ilford, ki te rāwhiti o Rāwāhi, mo tētahi hara whakapae i a ia e mahi ana i te Hōhipera o Whittington i Rāwāhi. E anga ana a Rāwāna, e 40, o Holloway, ki te raki o Rāwāhi, ki te whakahauhau i te taihemahema wahine. I te 15 o Āperira, ka puta mai a Dr Dharmasena rāua ko Tēnā Whiriwhiri ki te Kōti o nga Kaiwhakawa o Aotearoa. 'He whakaaturanga rawaka' I roto i tētahi kōrero, ka kī te tumuaki o ngā ture tūmatanui a Alison Saunders i tonoa te CPS e ngā Pirihimana o Metropolitan kia whakaarohia he whakaaturanga e pā ana ki tētahi whakapae o te taihemahema wahine (FGM). I whakapaetia i muri i te whānautanga o te tūroro i Whiringa 2012, ka tapia e tētahi tākuta i te Hōhipera o Whittington te taihemahema wahine i mahia i mua i te wahine. I kī a Ms Saunders: "I a au e āta whakaaro ana i ngā whakaaturanga katoa e wātea ana, kua whakatauria e au he nui ngā whakaaturanga, ā, he painga tūmatanui ki te whakatau i a Dr Dhanuson Dharmasena mō tētahi hara e hāngai ana ki te S1 (1) o te Ture Mutilation Wahine (2003). " Kua whakatauria hoki e au kia anga atu a Rāwāna ki tētahi whakapae whakahauhau i tētahi hara o te FGM, e hāngai ana ki te wāhanga 44(1) o te Ture Hara Nui (2007), me tētahi utu tuarua o te āwhina, te whakahauhau, te tohutohu, te tiki rānei i a Dr Dharmasena ki te mahi i tētahi hara e hāngai ana ki te S1 (1) o te Ture Wahine Genital Mutilation (2003). "I tangohia ēnei whakataunga e ai ki te waehere mō ngā rōia karauna." NHS trust Whittington Health, which runs the Whittington Hospital, said it had contacted police and started its own investigation when staff raised concerns following a birth in November 2012. Kua whakataua e te pōhēhētanga o te CPS kia kaua e mahi i ētahi atu mahi i roto i ētahi atu take e whā o te whakapae FGM. I tētahi o aua take i whakapaetia kua whakaritea e ngā mātua tokorua kia whakararurarutia e ta rāua tamāhine te taihemahema wahine i a rātau ki rāwāhi. I tētahi atu, ka whakapā atu tētahi kaipōhēhē ki tētahi raina āwhina FGM ki te tono i te hātepe mō ana tamāhine tokorua i muri i te pōhēhētanga ki te take o te ratonga mō ngā tūpāpaku. I tēnei wā kei te whakaaro te CPS mēnā ka haere tonu me ētahi atu kēhi e whā. Kua kōrerorero hoki nga rōia ki nga pirihimana mo nga tūhuratanga ki ētahi atu kēhi e rua, kei te wāhanga tōmua. 'Kāore e taea te muru' Kua whakaritea te UK i mua ki ētahi atu whenua i runga i te take, pēnei i Wīwī i reira neke atu i te 100 ngā mahinga angitu. Kua kī ngā MP he "kāore e taea te muru" kāore he mahinga UK mai i te wā i whakaurua ai ngā ture ki te FGM tata ki te 30 tau ki mua. Ahakoa neke atu i te 140 ngā tohutohu ki ngā pirihimana i roto i ngā tau e whā kua taha. I whakakapia e te Ture Mutilation Taihemahema Wahine 2003 tētahi Ture 1985, i Ingarangi, i Weera, i Aiarangi ki te Raki, i whakaarahia ai te whiu mōrahi mai i te rima ki te 14 tau i roto i te whare herehere. I hara hoki ki ngā tangata whenua o UK, ki ngā tangata pūmau rānei o UK ki te mahi i te FGM ki rāwāhi ahakoa i ngā whenua e ture ana. I kī te minita o te Tari Kāinga, a Hemi Brokenshire, kua "whakarewaina e te kāwanatanga tana urupare" ki te "tango i tēnei hara i roto i ngā kōruru" me te hoatu i ngā tūpāpaku te maia kia haere mai ki mua. I kī a ia ko te "karere matua" ko te kāwanatanga i "tino nui" te FGM. E tuhituhi ana te Hēkeretari Mātauranga a Michael Gove ki ia kura i Ingarangi ki te tono i a rātau kia āwhina ki te pare i ngā kōtiro i te FGM.

title: Whakamāramatanga mō ngā wāhi tīaho ngaro o Ceres
summary: Ko te mea ngaro nui o te Pūnaha Kōmaru o te tau 2015 - he aha ngā wāhi tīaho i Ceres, te ahanoa nui rawa i roto i te tātua aorangi i waenganui i a Mars me Pareārau?
text: Nā Honatana Amos, e whakaaro ana ngā kaipūtaiao pūtaiao he whakautu tā rātou ināianei. He wāhi rātau i keria ai e ngā pānga he apa hukapapa wai i raro i te mata o te aorangi whito, ka kī atu nga kairangahau ki te tuhitaka Āhua. Ā, ko ngā āhuahira tino tīaho ko ngā mārakerake pōtiki, hou rawa. Kua whakarārangitia e te kāmera tāpare i runga i te rūpahu ātea o Amerika ētahi wāhi e 130 i te ao whānui e 950km. Engari ko te kohinga tino mīharo e kitea ana i roto i tētahi mārua e kīa nei ko Occator i te tuakoi ki te raki o Ceres. I te taenga atu o te rūpahu ki te whito, ka whakahōtakatia ngā tautuhinga kāmera hei pūkete i te nuinga o te mata pōuri - he pango pēnei i te asphalt. Engari ko te tikanga o tēnei, ko ngā pōrearea tino kanapa i roto i Occator i tino whakararuraru i te pūoko o te taputapu. "I kī mātou, 'Wow! He aha tēnā? Kāore mātou i tūmanako i tēnei,'" e mahara ana a Andreas Nathues, te kaihautū matua o te kāmera. "Ko te whakaata kei roto i te raupapa o te 0.25, ko te tikanga tata ki te 25% o te mārama e whakaatatia ana; ā, i te pokapū uho o roto [o te kohinga wāhi Occator] he nui ake - tae atu ki te 50-60% o te mārama e whakaatatia ana; ahakoa he āhua pouri te mata e toe ana - tata ki te 9% te wawaenga," te kī a te kaipūtaiao mai i te Whare Wānanga o Max Planck mō te Rangahau Pūnaha Kōmaru i Goettingen, Tiamana. Ināianei e tohu ana te tūhuratanga o muri mai tērā pea he apa hukapapa me te tote huri noa i raro i ngā otaota pōhatu e koti ana i a Ceres. Ina keri te kaipatu mokowā ki roto i tēnei apa me te whakaraerae, ka tīmata te hukapapa ki te whakahirahira (kia huri hāngai mai i te mārō ki te korohū). Kātahi ka mawhiti atu te kohu i whakaputaina i te mata, ka hiki i te hukapapa me ngā korakora puehu i roto i te tukanga, hei whakaputa i tētahi momo kohukohu. Kua kitea e Dawn tēnei kohu i roto i "ngā wā o te rā", i a ia e titiro ana puta noa i Occator i ngā koki tītaha. Ko te whakawā, ka ngaro atu ngā wāhi o Occator i te wā e peia ana te nuinga o te hukapapa, ka mahue noa iho ngā tote. Ka kite a Dawn i tētahi waitohu mō te konupora pūngāwhā waihā - ko tā mātou e kīia nei ko "ngā tote Epsom" - e tohu ana i ētahi atu tauwāhi. Kāore ngā tote i te tino whakaata pērā i te hukapapa hou i Occator. Ko te kohu wai - e tangi ana ināianei me ētahi kitenga o Ceres i mahia e te whātata mokowā Herschel i te tau 2013 - e whakamahara ana ki ngā kōhuru, e uru ana ki tēnei whanonga whakawhāiti i ngā wā katoa e tata ana ki te rā. "He āhua rite ki te kōhuru, engari me mārama koe he tinana rerekē a Ceres. Nā reira, he hanganga anga tōna," te kī mai a Dr Nathues ki a au i roto i tētahi uiuinga mō te hōtaka Science In Action o tēnei wiki i te Ratonga Ao o TE AO. "Tērā pea he anga hukapapa i raro iho i te kirinuku. Ā, he tino rerekē tēnei i ngā kōhuru. He ahanoa taketake ngā kōhuru, he iti noa iho te rerekētanga o ngā rauemi taketake." I roto i tētahi pūrongo motuhake ki Nature, ka whakaarahia e Maria Cristina De Sanctis te tūponotanga kāore a Ceres i hanga ki te tūnga e kitea ana ināianei (tata ki te 415 miriona km mai i te Rā), engari i tua atu i te Pūnaha Kōmaru. Kua titiro a ia ki ngā hua mai i te Spectrometer Whakamahere Pōkākā Ari-Pōkākā a Dawn. Ka kite i ngā mea e whakamāramatia ana hei phyllosilicates ammoniated puta noa i ngā wāhi nui o te mata o te whito. Ko te phyllosilicates he kohuke uku, ka hangaia ina whakarerekētia ētahi atu rauemi toka e te wai i roto i te wā roa. Heoi anō, ko te tohu amonia e tino whakamere ana i tēnei tauira. "He phyllosilicates ēnei he amonia kei roto i tō rātou hanganga. Engari ki te whai i tēnei momo hanganga, ko te tikanga kia wātea te amonia i tētahi wā. A, ko te huarahi anake e kitea ai tēnei e taea ana, ko te whai take mātao ake mō te rauemi," te kī a Dr De Sanctis mai i te National Institute for Astrophysics i Roma, Itari. E whai ake ana tēnei whakaaro i te mōhiotanga e kore ngā hukapapa amonia e mau tonu i te āwhiotanga o Ceres o nāianei huri noa i te Rā. Ka tere te ngaro o aua hukapapa i runga ake i te 100 kelvin (-173C). Nā reira, kia mau tonu ai a Ceres i te nui o te amonia, i ngā hukapapa hauota rānei, kia roa rawa te whakauru ki roto i ngā uku, tērā pea me noho ki tētahi tauwāhi mātao ake i mua, e tautohe ana te kairangahau o Dawn. "He huatau whakamīharo tēnei, engari he tauira hihiri mō te kunenga o te Pūnaha Kōmaru e kite ana i ngā tinana e heke whakaroto ana," tana kī atu ki a BBC News. Jonathan.Amos-INTERNET@bbc.co.uk me te whai i ahau i Twitter: @BBCAmos

title: I hereheretia te māminga YouTube mo te tākaro i te mate o te hoa tāne
summary: Kua whiua tētahi wahine o Amerika kia ono marama te hereheretanga mo te tākaro i tana hoa tāne i roto i tētahi mahi pōhēhē i tūmanako ai rātau ka huaketo i runga i te YouTube.
text: I tonoa a Monalisa Perez, e 20 ināianei, e Pedro Ruiz, e 22, kia pūhia he pū mai i tētahi waewae (30cm) te mamao, e whakapono ana he pukapuka mātotoru i puritia e ia i mua i tōna poho ka whakangungu i a ia. Na te matā i wero te pukapuka 1.5in, i tino whara ai a Ruiz i tērā Pipiri. I muri iho ka tautohe a Perez, he whaea tokorua, he hara ki te patu tangata tuarua. He aha ngā whakaritenga whiu a Perez? I whakaritea e te Kaiwhakawā o Te Wānanga o Te Wānanga o Te Wenerei nga whakaritenga i whakaaetia i raro i te tautohetohe inoi. Ka pēnei a Perez: Kei raro iho te whiu i ngā tohutohu o te kāwanatanga, engari i kī te Rōia o te Takiwā o Norman, a Hemi Brue "ko te mea pono i moemoeātia, i whakaritea, i kawea hoki tēnei mahi wairangi e Pedro Ruiz, ā, i whakawhirinaki hē, kino hoki te whakapae ki ana whakaūnga he haumaru te mahi". He aha te mea i hiahia ai te tokorua ki te whakatutuki? I te tuhinga a Perez rāua ko Ruiz i o rāua oranga ia rā i Halstad, i Minnesota, mā te whakairi ataata o a rāua māminga ki tētahi hongere YouTube i te rapu rongonui ipurangi. I whakaahuatia e rātau ētahi māminga iti, ā, he āhua kore kino. A, he iti noa iho te tohu o te tawhiti i whakaritea ai rātau ki te haere kia noho ai hei rangatira tuihono tae noa ki te mahi kino i te 26 o Pipiri 2017. I taua rā ka pūhia e Perez tētahi pū kaha o te Desert Eagle mai i te tawhiti, i a Ruiz e pupuri ana i tētahi encyclopaedia i mua i tōna poho. I whakamātauria e ia i mua, a, i whakaaro ia ka parea ia e te pukapuka mātotoru, engari ka mātakitaki te tamaiti e toru tau a te tokorua me ngā kaimātakitaki e tata ana ki te 30 i a ia e pūhia ana he matā mate. I waea a Perez ki te 911 ki te pūrongo kua pūhia noatia e ia tana hoa tāne. I kōrerotia a Ruiz kua mate i te tirohanga i to rātau kāinga. I hapu a Perez i ta rāua tamaiti tuarua i te wā o te tākaro.

title: Ka noho te 'Rākau Nui' o Orkney hei Rākau o te Tau o Pākehā
summary: He iti te roa, he nui te ingoa, e whakaahua ana i te Rākau o te Tau o Pākehā.
text: He sycamore 200 tau te paari, e karangatia ana e ngā tangata whenua i Kirkwall ko te "Big Tree", kua piki i tētahi Spruce i Perthshire me tētahi Sycamore i Beauly ki te hōnore o runga. Ko te whakataetae - e whakahaeretia ana e te Woodland Trust - e whakanui ana i ngā rākau tino aroha o te whenua mai i ngā tāngata hītori ki te hunga whai pūrākau paetata motuhake hei kōrero. I whakaingoatia te Rākau Nui e tino arohaina ana e ngā mema o te iwi whānui. He rohe rongonui, e tino arohaina ana i Kirkwall, e whakamahia ana hei wāhi hui e ngā whakatupuranga o Orcadians. Tērā pea ka tautohe ētahi ki a Napoleon tōna nohoanga. I te wā o ngā pakanga a Napoleonic ka hinga te hokohoko ao whānui, ā, ka tipu te mahi kelp i Orkney, ka puta mai te pungarehu hei hopi me te karaehe. He tokomaha nga Orcadians i tino whai rawa, a, i hanga whare nunui i Kirkwall. Ko tētahi o ēnei whare he māra taiepa i whakatōkia ai e toru ngā rākau sycamore. I ngā tau 1870, ka tuaina e tētahi rangatira hou e rua o ngā rākau i puta ai te riri tūmatanui i whakaora i te tuatoru. I te tipu o Kirkwall ka kitea e te Rākau Nui i tētahi tiriti, ehara i te māra. I te mutunga o te rau tau 20 ka tiakina anō e te iwi whānui i te wā i whakaaro ai te mana ā rohe ki te tango. Kua homai e te People's Postcode Lottery te whakawhiwhinga, he mōkī tiaki £1,000 mō te rākau toa. The award can be used to arrange an expert health check, provide interpretation or educational materials, or hold a celebratory event in honour of the tree. E rua ngā rākau kaiomaoma - ka whiwhi hoki a McCabe's Spruce i Perthshire me te Beauly Sycamore i ngā mōkī tiaki e £500. The Big Tree was nominated separate by Kirkwall and St Ola Community Council and local taxi driver Andrew Richards. Woodland Trust Scotland Director Carol Evans said: "The competition celebrates grand trees, old trees, historic trees and trees with a story. " Tērā pea he tauira tōtika te Rākau Nui, engari he wāhi nui tōna i roto i te ngākau o Kirkwall. He toa tika!" Ko te mea pai rawa atu: Ko ērā atu whakamutunga o David McCabe's Spruce, Crieff. He tarawai i kumea mai i te paru o te whenua kore tangata i Passchendaele e Lt David McCabe, a, ka tukuna ki te kāinga ki tōna pāpā i Perthshire. Te Sycamore Beauly, Beauly. He rākau nui e tū ana mō ngā rau tau maha, e tohu ana i ngā toenga ātaahua o Beauly Priory, he wāhi i toroa e Meri Kuini o Pākehā i te tau 1564 i a ia e haere ana ki Dingwall, e kōrero ana mō te whare rangatira me te ātaahua o tōna huarākau. Te Carnegie Oak, Pittencrieff Park, Dunfermline. I whakatōia i te tau 1904 e te kaimahi rongonui me te kaiwhaiwhai a Andrew Carnegie, i noho i a ia e tamariki ana i roto i te maka pōhatu o te pāka, e mōhiotia ana ko Te Kiri. Te oki tapahi kākāriki. E hia mano ngā tāngata e whakaoti ana i te Greenock Cut Trail i ia tau, e tū ana i roto i ngā pūkohukohu, pūkohukohu me ngā lichens. He karere tēnei mō Shielhill Glen Site of Special Scientific Interest me tētahi akomanga o waho. Te Ngahere Holly Tawhito, Castle Fraser. E whakapono ana ko tētahi o ngā rākau hōhonu tawhito rawa i Pākehā, e 3.17m (10ft 5in), ā, e tū ana i runga i te mea e whakapono ana ko te tapa o tētahi māra rāhui o te rau tau 17

title: Ka whakapuakina e te kaitapere o Te Rūnanga o Aotearoa te tono pōti a te taone nui o Rāwāhi
summary: Kua pānuitia e te kaitapere o Laurence Fox ka tū a ia mo te pōti hei Koromatua panuku o Rāwāhi.
text: Mr Fox - who is leader of the Reclaim Party - said if elected he would lift lockdown the day after the elections are held on 6 May He said he wanted to get people back to work as soon as possible. "E whakataetae ana nga rōpū matua e rua i roto i tēnei rēhi pouri kia noho ko te whakamutunga ki te whakawātea i te whenua," tana kī. E kī ana te Ture Coronavirus ko te pirimia anake e āhei ana ki te whakamutu i te raka. I roto i tētahi kōrero e pānui ana i tana taunga, ka kī a Tēnā Fox i whakatau ia kia tū mō te pōti i muri i te pānuitanga a te Tumuaki Rishi Sunak i roto i te tahua kua tono te kāwanatanga i te £407bn hei mahi i te taiepa coronavirus. I tāpiritia e ia he "tata ki te £1,600 mō ia whānau i te whenua". "Ia wiki e haere ana me te kore hiki i te raka, ko te tikanga he nui ake ngā mahi ngaro, he nui ake ngā umanga ngaro me ētahi atu tāke ā muri ake nei. " Kua kī te kāwanatanga kei te mahi ngā kano ārai mate, kei te taka ngā hōhipera me ngā mate, engari kei te kīia tonutia mātou kāore e taea e mātou te tīmata anō i te oranga pūnoa tae noa ki te waenganui o te raumati i te wā tata nei. "Kua tino hē tēnei i a Tory rāua ko Labour. E hiahia ana ahau ki a Rātana - me ērā atu whenua - kia whakaaetia kia hoki ki te mahi me te tākaro ināianei tonu, kaua i te mutunga o Pipiri." 'Kāore e taea te mōrearea' I te pātaitanga mehemea ka whati a Tēnā Fox i te ture hei whakamutu i te raka me pōtitia ia, ka kī tana kaikōrero: "Mēnā ka haere mai a Te Pirihitini i tētahi wāhi ki te toa i te pōti a te Koromatua o Rāwāhi i runga i tētahi pūhara 'whakamutua ināianei', me whakarongo te pirimia me te mahi i te pōti 6 o Me." I kii tetahi kaikorero mo te Koromatua o Ratana o naianei, a Sadiq Kani: "Kei te teitei tonu te maha o nga keehi COVID-19 i Rānana, a, kei raro tonu a maatau kaimahi NHS toa i te pehanga tūturu. " Ko te mana ki te whakauru i te raka e takoto ana ki te kāwanatanga, ā, e tika ana kia tūpato ngā minita ki te whakaiti i ngā rāhuitanga raka. "I te wā e tū ana te takahanga kano ārai mate, ā, ka noho teitei ake ngā tau kēhi i Rānana i te wā i hikitia ai ngā rāhuitanga i tērā raumati, kāore e taea e mātou te mōrearea anō i ngā kēhi e mōrearea ai te ora, te mahere huarahi i waho o te raka, me tā mātou whakaoranga ohaoha." I kī te Rōpū Whakahoki i tētahi uiuinga i mahia mōna e Savanta ComRes i kitea neke atu i te haurua o ngā tāngata katoa o Rāwāhi e hiahia ana kia hikitia te raka ā-motu i te mutunga o Me, me ngā rangatahi i te pūmatua kia tere ake te putanga mai i te raka i te whakatupuranga tawhito ake. I kī rātau i kitea e te poipoi e 1,002 ngā pakeke o Rāwāhi, 18 neke atu rānei, i uiuia tuihonotia mai i te 18-22 o Hui tanguru. I anga atu a Tēnā Fox ki tētahi whakahoki tuihono i Whiringa ā Rangi mō tētahi tweet i kī ai ia he tāngata mō te hapa, ā, i te āhua nei ka whakahē i te NHS. "He rōpū nui noa iho ki te tina, ā, ka awhi mātou, ka kai, ka kōrero, ka whakamana i te ao," tana kī. "Ki te kore e taea e te NHS te whakatikatika, kāore te NHS i te tika mō te whāinga." Ngā Hononga Ipurangi Pātahi Te Rōpū Whakahoki

title: Ko te tipu o Ellesmere Port Vauxhall hei tīmata anō i te whakanao
summary: Neke atu i te 100 ngā tikanga haumaru kua whakaritea e te kaiwhakanao motokā o Groupe PSA kia tīmata anō ai te whakanaotanga i tētahi o ōna pae i a Aotearoa.
text: The Vauxhall plant at Ellesmere Port, which employs about 1,500, shut down due to the Covid-19 pandemic in March. Kei roto i ngā tikanga haumaru ko ngā taki pāmahana me ngā huringa o ngā tauira neke. I kī te tuakana perehitini o Yann Vincent mā te "whakakaha i ngā hātepe hauora" e hoatu ki ngā kaimahi "he taumata parenga tiketike". I tāpiritia e ia mai i te tīmatanga o te taiepa, ko te manakē o te umanga ko te "tiaki i ana kaimahi me te tiaki i te wā roa o te kamupene". I kitea e ngā tikanga raka te rōpū i te katinga o ōna tipu whakanao Pākehā i Poutāpeta. I tīmata anō tōna tipu o Luton i te whakanaotanga i Me me ētahi kaimahi e whakawhiti rangitahi ana mai i te pae o Merseyside. Ko te tipu o Ellesmere Port, ka whakatuwhera anō i te 17 o Aotearoa, e 62,000 ngā motokā Astra i te tau 2019. He aha e kore ai e whai i a BBC North West i Facebook, Twitter me Instagram? Ka taea hoki e koe te tuku whakaaro pūrākau ki northwest.newsonline@bbc.co.uk

title: Ronan Hughes: School principal says teen 'was being blackmailed'
summary: E uiui ana ngā pirihimana mehemea i whakapono tētahi tamaiti kura kua mate i a ia anō i muri i te tinihanga ki te whakairi pikitia tuihono.
text: E hia rau ngā tāngata i haere ki te nehunga o Ronan Hughes, 17 tau, mai i Coalisland, i te ata Tūrei. Kai te uiui nga pirihimana i nga āhuatanga o tōna matenga. I kī a Geraldine Donnelly, te tumuaki i te kura o Hato Hohepa i reira a Ronan he ākonga, he nui ake i te take o te whakaweti tuihono. "He mea rerekē tēnei, ā, he kino kē atu i te whakaweti tuihono, ā-ipurangi rānei, ā, e whakaaro ana ahau he mea nui kia puta te karere ki te rangatahi, ka puta ki ngā mātua, ka puta ki ngā kaiako," tana kī. "Ko tā mātou pea e titiro ana ko ētahi huānga aowhānui, o Ronan kua ūkuia mai i rāwāhi ki te whakahawea me te kōkuhu i a ia mō te moni." Kua kī ngā pirihimana ko te kōkuhu he "rārangi uiui tūturu". I mate a Ronan i te Paraire, 5 o Hune. I tōna nehunga i te Hāhi o Hato Patrick i Clonoe, i reira rāua ko tōna tuakana ko Cathal he tama aata, ka kī atu te tohunga pārihi o Fr Benny Fee ki ngā tangihanga he "hōnore kawa, kawa te pōhiri i a Ronan i konei ki Hato Patrick i reira ehara ia i te tauhou". "Kāore a Ronan i tango i tōna ake ora, engari i tangohia tōna ora i a ia, ā, i tētahi wāhi o te ao, tērā pea i tawhiti, i tawhiti atu i Clonoe, he tangata, he wahine, he rōpū rānei e hara ana ki tētahi hara kino," te kī a Fr Fee. "I whai painga te iwi i tōna taitamarikitanga me tōna ātaahua. I pokanoatia ia e rātau, a, ka whati i a ia. A, mehemea ka taea e rātau te mahi ki a ia, ka taea e rātau te mahi ki te tangata. Kia murua rātau e te Atua." Ko ngā tauira o te kura o Ronan, o St Joseph's Grammar i Donaghmore, County Tyrone, i whakatū i tētahi tautiaki hōnore i te whare karakia. Kua kī ngā Pirihimana āwangawanga kāore he hara i te whakapaetia, ā, kei te haere tonu ngā uiui. Kua tukuna e rātau he tohutohu ki te rangatahi mo te hiahia kia tūpato ina whakamahi i ngā pae whatunga pāpori. I whakaahuatia e te rangatira o te rohe o Mid-Ulster, a Supt Maika Baird, te matenga o te tama he "kino". E mōhiotia ana kua kōrero a Ronan ki ōna mātua me ngā pirihimana i ōna māharahara mō ngā atahanga tuihono i tērā wiki. I whakaputaina e te kaiako matua o St Joseph's Grammar, a Geraldine Donnelly, tētahi kōrero i runga i te paetukutuku o te kura e whakapuaki ana i te pouri i te "matenga wawe o to mātau tauira aroha". He kaitākaro pūkenga hoki a ia i te Gaelic Athletic Association (GAA), ā, he mema o te karapu GAA a Clonoe O'Rahilly i County Tyrone. I roto i tētahi kōrero, ka kī te karapu i "ohorere, i pouri" rātau i tōna matenga. I whakaahuatia ia e rātau he "taitama mārire, mārire hoki, e paingia ana e ngā kaitākaro me ngā kaiako katoa". "Kua mahue i tōna matenga he kōruru pōuri e iri ana i runga i to mātau karapu," ka kī rātau. I kī atu te kaikaunihera SDLP o Malachy Quinn ki a Te Ata Pai o Te Reo Irirangi o Ulster e "whai ana i ngā mea katoa hei ora". "Kia kawea mai e ēnei tāngata tētahi tangata pēnei ki te wāhi e whakaaro ana rātau kāore ō rātou ara ki waho - kāore e taea e koe te whakaaro he aha te mea e puta ana i te hinengaro o te taitamariki kia puta tērā," tana kī. I kī te tohunga haumaru Tuihono o te Ao Whānui, a Wayne Denner, i whakaaturia e te kēhi te pānga o te hangarau ki ngā oranga o te rangatahi me ngā whakamātautau ka taea te kawe. "Ka mahia ngā hē, engari me whakaako tātau i [te rangatahi] me pēhea te whakahaere i tō rātou rongo tuihono, me pēhea te whakamahi i te pāpāho pāpori me te ipurangi hei painga mō rātou, ehara i te mate," te kī a Tēnā Denner. "Kaua e tūhono ki ngā tāngata kāore koe i te mōhio, e mōhio ana me pēhea te tatū i ō tautuhinga tūmataitinga, ā, ko te taketake, kaua e whakairi i tētahi mea tuihono kāore koe i te hari ki te haere ki tētahi papa pānui huri noa. " Ko te tikanga, ina tuihono, he tino uaua ki te tango." Kua mahi tahi a ChildLine, te ratonga tohutohu mō ngā tamariki e whakaratohia ana e te NSPCC, me te Internet Watch Foundation, ā, ka taea te āwhina i ngā rangatahi i raro iho i te 18 ki te tango i ngā atahanga tuihono. I kī tētahi kaikōrero mō Childline: "He tino āwangawanga te whakaweti ā-ipurangi, ā, ko te tikanga o te āhua 24 haora o te ipurangi, ka rongo rātou kāore he mawhititanga. " Me mātua whakarite tātau kia whai whakaaro te rangatahi ki te kōrero ki tēnei tūkinotanga, kia kore ai rātau e noho taratahi, ā, kāore he wāhi hei huri." Mēnā kei te pouri, kei te pouri rānei koe, tētahi rānei e mōhio ana koe, ka taea e koe te whakapā atu ki Lifeline i 0808 808 8000, haere rānei ki tā rātou paetukutuku, ki Childline rānei i 0800 1111, ki te toro rānei i tā rātou paetukutuku.

title: Kua kōrero a Banksy mō ngā mahi toi tautohetohe a Mobile Lovers
summary: Kua kī te kaiwaiata tiriti rongonui o Banksy me pupuri tana mahi tautohetohe ki ngā Whaiāipo Pūkoro e tētahi karapu tamariki o Bristol.
text: Ko tana wāhanga, i puta mai i tētahi tatau i Clement Street i te taone, i tangohia e te kaiārahi o te Karapu Tamariki Whānui pātata ki te kohi moni. Engari i tautohe te Kaunihera Taone o Bristol i runga i tōna whenua te mahi, ā, ka mauria ki tētahi whare taonga hei tiaki. I kī tētahi tuhipoka ki te karapu i tuhia e Banksy ka taea e rātau te mahi i tā rātou "e whakaaro ana he tika" ki te wāhanga. 'Taumira tika' I kī a Dennis Stinchcombe mai i te karapu tamariki, nāna i kite i te tuhipoka: "Kei te tino harikoa ahau - kāore ngā kupu e whakaatu i taku hari. " I taku pānuitanga, i taku kitenga i te waitohu, ka mōhio ahau he aha tērā." Ka tīmata te reta: "E Dennis, e tūmanako ana ahau ka pai koe i tēnei. E mōhio ana koe, kātahi anō ahau ka peita i runga i tētahi tatau e tata ana ki te karapu." Ka kī tonu te kaiwaiata tiriti kāore ia i te whakaae ki te "mahi tūkino hara" engari he "kaiwaiata nui ki te mahi i mahia i te karapu" ka "whakamīharo ia mēnā ka āwhina tēnei i tētahi ara". Ka mutu te tuhipoka: "E whakaaro ana ahau kei te mōhio koe ki te kīanga i takea mai ki a Aperahama Lincoln - 'Tērā pea ka tae mai ngā mea ki te hunga e tatari ana, engari ko ngā mea anake i mahue i te hunga e whakararuraru ana'." Kua kī a Tēnā Stinchcombe kua korerotia ki a ia ka taea e te mahi toi tautohetohe te tiki i te £4m. I kī a ia e whakapono ana a ia he kaitautoko a Banksy i te karapu tamariki nā ōna wheako tamarikitanga. "Ki taku whakaaro i a au e taitamariki ana (Banksy) i haere ki te karapu taitamariki o Barton Hill, a, he maha pea nga wa i haere mai ai ki taku karapu i The Dings i St Phillips. " Kua mā mai a ia ki a mātau, ā, he ātaahua," ko te tāpiri mai a Tēnā Stinchcombe. I kī te Koromatua o Bristol George Ferguson kua whakapā atu ia ki te māngai o Banksy nāna i whakaū te tuhipoka mai i te rehetoi māhorahora. "He taumira tika tēnei - kua mahia e mātou tā mātou mahi mā te tiaki, ā, i tēnei wā kua kohia e mātou ētahi atu mea mō te karapu tamariki, ā, e hia mano ngā tāngata i Bristol me tawhiti atu kua kitea," te kī a te koromatua. "Ehara tēnei i te take o Dennis, ā, kāore au i kite kanohi ki te kanohi. " Kua kī a Dennis mēnā ka whiwhi i te nui o te hokonga, ehara i te mea ka haere te moni ki te karapu tamariki anake, engari ki ngā kaupapa taitamariki hoki i Bristol."

title: Ka piki ake ngā utu kaimahi o Guernsey States i te £14m
summary: Ko te utu katoa ki ngā Kāwanatanga o Guernsey o te whakamahi i ana kaimahi i piki ake i te £14m i te tau 2009.
text: Ko te whika i whakaaturia i roto i te tahua 2011 i whakaatu i te 8.8% te pikinga o ngā utu kaimahi, me ngā tau kaimahi e 124. I kī te Minita Pūtea me ngā Rauemi a Charles Parkinson e "māharahara" ana a ia mo te tupunga o ngā kaimahi me ngā utu. Heoi anō, i kī a ia he "moata" te titiro ki te whakamōhio i ngā mana i runga anō i ngā raraunga o te tau kotahi. I kī te Tari Pūtea me ngā Rauemi ko ngā take matua ko te whakakī i ngā pou wātea me te waihangatanga o ngā pou wā katoa hōu e 80 puta noa i ngā tari.

title: Ka ākiritia e Liz Kendall ngā waea whakamutu me ngā kī taurangi kia whawhai kia mutu
summary: Kua ākiritia e te kaitauwhāinga ārahi o Labour a Liz Kendall ngā karanga kia unuhia ia i te whakataetae me te whakahoki i tētahi atu kaitono ki te hinga i a Jeremy Corbyn.
text: E whai ana i tētahi poipoi YouGov mō te Times e whakanoho ana i te parirau mauī o Tēnā Kōpia ki mua i te rēhi me Ms Kendall tuawhā. Engari ka kī a ia: "Ka whawhai ahau mo tāku e whakapono ana tae noa ki te mutunga." I whai te minita o Aotearoa Milburn i a Taraiwa i te whakatūpato ki tētahi wikitōria mō Tēnā Kōpia - i te wā i kī atu te tino tuarua o te PM a Ariki Prescott ki te rōpū kia "marino". I kī atu a Tēnā Milburn ki te AO ka toa anake te rōpū i te pōti panuku mēnā ka nohoia te whenua waenganui. I tāpiri mai a ia: "Ko te whirinoa ko te mahi e rere ana ki te taha mauī. Ki te pērā, he pono, he hiahia mate tōna." 'Kaua e waiho ki nga taitama' i kī a Norman Smith, kaiāwhina kaiwhakatika tōrangapū o TE WĀ, kua whakatū te pēhanga ki a Ms Kendall kia wehe atu i te rēhi. Engari i whakakāhoretia e te MP o Te Uru o Aotearoa taua ariā i roto i tētahi uiuinga o TE AO - i muri i te whakapaetanga a ana kaiawhina i ngā puni a Andy Burnham rāua ko Yvette Kupa ki te "whakakī" i te ariā. I kī tētahi pūtake: "Kua kite a Andy rāua ko Yvette i o rāua tau e hinga ana i tēnei wiki i muri i te takahuri i runga i te oranga ora, ā, koia tērā e ngana ana ēnei whakahau ki te whakararuraru i a rāua ake take." I kī te pūtake, i raro i te pūnaha pōti manakohanga e kore e rerekē, ahakoa i tangohia e Ms Kendall. I kī a Ms Kendall he tauhou tonu a ia i roto i te rēhi, engari i kī e 51 rā e toe ana ki te tiki tautoko a te iwi. I kī a ia he "aituā" te wikitōria mō Tēnā Kōpihi, e kī ana ko te hoki whakamuri ki ngā tōrangapū o ngā tau kotahi mano e waru tekau mā waru me te ngaro i te pōti "kāore he mea hei āwhina i te iwi" e hiahia ana te rōpū ki te āwhina. I tāpiritia e Ms Kendall ko ia anake te kaitono e tuku ana i tētahi whirinoa ki ngā tōrangapū i ngaro ai te rōpū i ngā pōti e rua whakamutunga, e kī ana kaupapa here ka āwhina i a Labour kia toa i te hiko "kia taea ai e mātou te huri i te whenua kia pai ake". Ka kī a Ms Kupa kia "kaua rawa" a Ms Kendall e wehe atu i te whakataetae me te "waiho ki ngā taitama, nā te poipoi kotahi noa iho". Ko te whakataetae ārahi Mahi te kaupapa o te taupatupatu whānui i muri i tētahi poipoi YouGov i tēnei wiki i huatau ai i te hurihanga whakamutunga o te pōti, ka taea e Tēnā Kōpia te whakaoti i ngā piro e ono i mua i te makau o ngā kaihanga pukapuka, a Tēnā Burnham. Na te poipoi i huatau ka taea e Tēnā Kōpia te whiwhi i te 43% o ngā pōti manakohanga tuatahi, i mua i a Tēnā Burnham i te 26%, Ms Kupa i te 20% me Ms Kendall i te 11%. Mā te pūkete i ngā manakohanga tuarua, ko te poipoi - o ngā tāngata e 1,054 e āhei ana ki te pōti i roto i te whakataetae, ā, i mahia i waenganui i te Paraire me te Tūtira - i tohu atu ki tētahi wikitōria 6% mō Tēnā Kōpihi. I kī a Labour MP Frank Field, tētahi o ngā MP nāna i "tuku mai" i a Tēnā Kōpia tana whakaingoatanga, i kī te taupatupatu "kāore anō kia whakawhānuitia" e tōna taupatupatu, ā, e hiahiatia ana e ērā atu kaitono ta rātau kēmu kia hinga i a ia. "E tūmanako ana ahau i roto i tēnei tukanga katoa, ko tētahi o ngā kaitono e kī ana e whakahē ana rātau ki a Jeremy, kua whiwhi tonu i te toa ā-tinana me te kōaro hinengaro ki te tīmata i taua taupatupatu. " Ki te kore te pai e mōhio he aha te tūnga ka noho tātau i muri i te tatautanga o ngā pōti," tana kī atu ki te Ao o Te Reo Irirangi 4 o TE Ao i te Kotahi. 'He tawhito wehi' I a ia e kōrero ana ki te Times, ka whakatūpato a Ariki Mandelson i te nohonga o te Rōpū Mahi hei "tōpana pōti". "Ko mātau i noho me te whawhai ki te tiaki i te Rōpū Mahi i nga tau kotahi mano e waru tekau mā rua, ka pā ki te āhua o te déjà vu," tana kī atu ki te Times. "I ngā tau e rima kua mahue i a mātau he tawhito wehi ki te rongoā i te nohonga o te Rōpū Mahi hei tōpana pōti tōtika ināianei." I te Tūtira, ka whakatūpato te pirimia o Mua, a Tēnā Kōkā, e kore a Labour e toa anō mai i tētahi "pūhara mauī tūturu". A, ko te kaitohutohu o mua ki a Tēnā Kōkā, a Hoani McTernan, i kī atu ki a TE Pō Rongokōrero e rua o ngā kaitono e manakohia ana e tētahi kaitono "ahakoa ko Kōpihi". I kī atu te kaiārahi tuarua o Mua o Te Ariki Prescott ki te hōtaka o Te Reo Irirangi 4 o Tēnei Rā, kua hē a Tēnā Kōkā ki te "tūkino" i ngā kaitautoko o Tēnā Kōpia me tana kōrero "whakawhiti". I kī hoki a ia kua takahi te kaiārahi whakahaere a Harriet Hēmi i tōna mana ki te whakatakoto i te tautoko a Labour mō ētahi o ngā tapahi ora a te kāwanatanga. I tāpiritia e Te Ariki Prescott, te tuarua PM o Tēnā Kōkā mo te tekau tau: "Ko wai te reinga ko Hoani McTernan?" I kī a ia ehara i te aituā mēnā i toa a Jeremy Corbyn, engari i kī kāore a ia e pōti mōna, ka tāpiri: "Ko te whakataunga a te rōpū ehara i te MP'." Ko te tikanga kia pānuitia e Labour tōna kaiārahi hou i tētahi hui motuhake i te 12 o Mahuru.

title: Coronavirus: Wills 'being signed on car bonnets' amid lockdown
summary: Kua puritia ngā tuhinga e ngā wiper mata, ā, kua hainatia ki runga i tētahi potae motokā i runga i tētahi huarahi hou kia kitea ai ngā wira i te wā o te tawhiti pāpori.
text: Nā Kevin PeacheyKaipānui pūtea whaiaro Kei te mātakina hoki ngā waitohu mā ngā matapihi me ngā tatau patio i te mea he uaua ki te tautoko i ngā ture tuhituhi 200 tau te pakeke. E kī ana ngā minita kāore he kaupapa hei whakangāwari i ngā ture pākaha. Kei te ripoata nga roia i te "pikinga nui" o te hiahia mo nga wira mai i nga tangata e awangawanga ana mo te coronavirus. Ki te kore e waitohu tika i tētahi wira i mua i ngā kaiwhakaatu takitahi tokorua, e noho ā-tinana ana, i Ingarangi me Weera, tērā pea ka muhu te kaiwhakawā e whakahaere ana i te tuhinga, me ngā tawhito i roto. I Pākehā, he iti iho te ōkawa o ngā ture, ā, kotahi anake te kaiwhakaatu e hiahiatia ana. Karangatia kia whakangāwari te ture He pākaha te ture ki te tuhi wira me te whakarite kia whaimana i Ingarangi me Weera. Kei roto i tēnei ko te hainatanga i mua i ngā kaiwhakaatu takitahi e rua, me te waitohu i ngā tāngata tokorua i tō aroaro. Nō te tau 1837 te ture tīariari, te tīmatanga o te kingitanga o Kuini Wikitōria, hei pare i ngā tangata i te wā e iti iho ana te pupuri pūkete, te iti iho o ngā taumata pānui pukapuka, me te hangarau iti iho. Kua whakamātauria ngā ture whakaaturanga e ngā whakaritenga raka, taratahi, me te tawhiti pāpori i te wā o te pakarutanga o te coronavirus - i te wā e hiahia ana te tokomaha o ngā tāngata ki te whakaoti i tētahi wira i te wā poto. Nā tēnei i kite ai ngā tāngata i ngā waitohu i runga i ngā taiapa māra me te tū i ngā ara, ā, he rite tonu te tirotiro a ngā rōia mai i tētahi tawhiti haumaru. Kua karangatia e te Rōpū Ture, te tinana hokohoko a te rōia, ki te Manatu Ture kia whakarerekē i te ture, pēnei i te whakaae ki te whakamahi tūpato i te hui ataata i roto i te tukanga. I karangatia hoki e Īna Bond, e tūtaki ana i te komiti wira me te komiti tika o te iwi, ki te kāwanatanga kia whai i te tauira o Ahitereiria, e ōrite ana te ture, engari e tūhura ana ngā kaiwhakawā me te whakaatu i ētahi ngāwari ake ki te whakaae kia tū ngā wira. I kī a ia he tūtohutanga mai i te Komihana Ture i te tau 2017 mo te whakahōu i te ture ka taea te whakamahi hei tātauira. Engari i kī te Manatu Ture kāore he kaupapa hei huri i ngā ture i tēnei wā. "He wāhi mārire tēnei o te ture, ā, me haere tonu tātau ki te pare i ngā pakeke me te mōrearea ki te tinihanga tūpono," te kī a te kaikōrero. "Ka whakaarohia e mātou ngā kōwhiringa katoa me te arotake i tēnei i te wā o te taiepa Covid-19." Kei te pūrongo ngā rōia i te nui o te hiahia mō ngā ratonga tuhituhi wira, i te mea ka nui ake te mōhiotanga ki te mate mate i waenganui i te taiepa, ā, e hiahia ana te hunga whai nama, tawhito rānei ki te whakaraupapa i ngā pepa. I kī a Tēnā Bond, e mahi ana mō te Ture o Talbots i te West Midlands, kua tata te rua o a rātau kēhi. Ko Farewill, he kamupene e mau ana i ngā tohutohu mō ngā wira tuihono, ahakoa me mahi tonu te mātakitaki, kua kite i te pikinga 12 kōpaki o ngā pātai mai i ngā kaimahi NHS. Kua kite hoki ngā rōia ā-waea i tētahi tara nui. Ko te tangata e whakaaro ana ki te tuhi wira e akiaki ana kia rapu tohutohu ngaio, nā te mea ka mōrearea pea ngā wira mahi mai i ngā tātauira tuihono. Ko tētahi wāhi āwangawanga ko ngā tāngata e ngana ana ki te hanga wira i mua noa iho i to rātau matenga. I roto i ngā kāinga whānau, kāore e whakaaetia ngā hoa aroha e whakaingoatia ana i roto i te wira kia kite i tētahi wira, ki te kore tēnei e whakakore i tō rātou mana, ā, me whakakore tō rātou kainga. Ko te tikanga e hiahiatia ana ngā kaiwhakaatu takitahi, he uaua ina herea tētahi ki te moenga, ā, kaua ngā manuhiri e karanga i waenganui i ngā rāhuitanga o nāianei i runga i te nekeneke. I te hōhipera, kāore e whakaaetia ngā manuhiri i tēnei wā, kāore e whakaaetia ngā tākuta me ngā nēhi ki te kawe mai i ngā tuhinga poke ki te taha o te moenga, ā, kei te arotahi tonu ēnei tohunga ki te rongoā rongoā, Ko te tikanga kāore e taea e tētahi tangata i te hōhipera, ā, tērā pea ka mate, te tuhi i tētahi wira meneti whakamutunga. Ko tēnā, e ai ki a Tēnā Bond, e whakahauhau ana i ngā tāngata hauora o nāianei kia huri haere ki te mahi tuhituhi i tētahi wira e whakaweto ana ki te mahi i ngā mea pēhi ake i te kāinga, i te mahi rānei. He ture mō wai e whiwhi ana i tētahi pānga ina mate tētahi tangata me te kore wira. E kiia ana ēnei ko ngā ture o te māiatanga, a, ko te tikanga ka whiwhi te tāne, te wahine, te hoa tūmatanui rānei, ngā tamariki rānei. Heoi anō, i raro i ēnei ture, kāore he mea e whiwhi ai te hoa kāore i te mārena, i roto rānei i tētahi mahi ā-iwi ki te tangata kua mate.

title: Rū whenua o Alaska: I tūtuki a Anchorage i ngā rū
summary: Kua tūtuki tētahi rū nui 7.0 ki Alaska, nā te tangata i oma mai i ngā whare, ā, ka akiaki poto i tētahi matohi tsunami mō ngā wāhi moana.
text: Tata ki te whitu maire (11km) ki te raki o Anchorage, te taone nui rawa o te kāwanatanga, e ai ki te US Geological Survey (USGS). I whakapūketetia he rangatū o ngā rū i muri i te tumeke tuatahi, he hōhonutanga o te 40.9km, te kī a te USGS. Neke atu i te 300,000 ngā tāngata e noho ana i Anchorage me te 100,000 i te rohe karapoti. I pūrongotia te rū i te 08.29 wā paetata (17.29 GMT), i tāpiritia e te USGS. Ko tētahi o ngā rū kaha ake i muri mai i ngā meneti i muri mai, he 5.7 te nui. Nō tēnei wā, kua rēhitatia e ngā āpiha e 40 ngā rū: 10 me ngā nui i runga ake i te 4.0 me te toru me ngā nui i runga ake i te 5.0, i pūrongotia e te Pokapū Rū o Alaska. "He uaua nga rū, engari e hiahia ana mātou ki te āwhina ko rātou te mea e tūmanakohia ana e mātau mō tētahi rū pēnei," te kī a te pokapū i roto i tētahi tweet. I tīkina te rū e ngā ine rū puta noa i te whenua i Boston, e hia mano maero te mamao. I whakakorea tētahi whakatūpato tsunami mō ngā rohe o Cook Inlet me te tonga o Kenai Peninsula. Kua tukuna e te Kāwana o Alaska a Bill Walker tētahi whakapuakitanga o te aituā. Ka tūtohu a Perehitini Donald Trump kua "pā kaha ki tētahi 'mea nui'". Ka taea e te rū nui 7.0 me te teitei ake te whakararuraru, i te iti rawa, he tūkino nui i roto i ngā hanganga pūnoa, ā, ka taea te whakangaro i ngā hanganga kāore i te hangaia, e ai ki te USGS. E whakahauhau ana ngā āpiha i ngā tāngata kia whakamahi i ngā pāpāho pāpori me ngā karere kuputuhi ki te whakapā atu ki ngā mea e arohaina ana i te mea ka āwangawanga pea ngā aho waea. "Noho atu i ngā raina waea mēnā ka taea e koe, me tuwhera ngā raina waea," te kī a te Rangatira o te Tari Ahi o Anchorage, a Jodie Hettrick. "Kia titiro tētahi ki tētahi, tirohia ō hoa noho - engari mēnā he pakeke, he hauā rānei." I tēnei wā, kāore he pūrongo o ngā tūpāpaku. E whakarite ana ngā pirihimana me ngā tīma ahi ki ngā Hōia Kāwanatanga o Alaska me te National Guard, e ai ki te rangatira pirihimana o Pirihitini. Neke atu i te 10,000 ngā tangata kāore he hiko i tēnei wā, ā, kua puta ētahi pūrongo o te whare me te piriti. "He mārama ake ētahi o ngā tūkinotanga; kua ngaro katoa ētahi wāhanga o te huarahi," te kī a Chief Doll. "Kei te aromatawai mātou i tēnā - he tūkinotanga nui tērā pea ka roa te wā ki te whakatika." Ko ngā whakakitenga me ngā atahanga i tukuna ki te pāpāho pāpori i whakaatu i ngā hua e marara ana puta noa i ngā papa o ngā hokomaha me ngā whata kua hinga, ā, kua pakaru te tīrama. Na te rū hoki i pakaru ai nga huarahi, ā, ka tiango ētahi atu hanganga. Kua tiria hoki e ngā tangata whenua ngā whakaahua o ngā whare i te ahi i muri mai. I kī atu a Te Senator o Alaska, a Lisa Murkowski ki ngā kaipānui, tērā pea ka pā te tūkinotanga i Anchorage puta noa i te kāwanatanga. I kī a ia e māharahara ana a ia mo taua āhuatanga. "I noho tēnei i te ngākau o te pokapū iwi whānui," te kī a te senator, e kōrero ana i Washington DC. "Ko Anchorage te pokapū ā-rohe mō te nuinga o ngā taonga e tae mai ana ki te āhua o Alaska - 85% o ngā taonga - ahakoa ko tō parāoa, tō miraka, tō rētihi, ō taonga whare rānei." Kua whakararurarutia hoki te haere o te hau me te rēra e te rū. Kua whakatārewatia e tētahi o ngā ratonga rererangi ā-roto nui rawa o te kāwanatanga ngā mahi tae noa ki te poutumarotanga, engari kei te tuwhera tonu te Taunga Rererangi o Anchorage. I kī atu a Travis Starling ki te AO kāore he hiko, he wai rānei, ā, ko te nuinga o ngā teihana reo irirangi kei te hau i te wā e haere tonu ana ngā rū. I kī a Tēnā Starling i tēnei wā o te tau, e ono haora noa iho te awatea e kite ana te kāwanatanga - "He waimarie mātou i te wā... I pā mai tēnei i te whitinga o te rā." "He kino kē atu ngā rū o tēnei rā i tētahi rū i mua," tana kī. I tūtohu te Kāwana o Mua o Alaska, a Sarah Palin, kua pakaru tōna kāinga i te rū. Ko te rū nui rawa i roto i te hītori o Amerika i pā ki Anchorage i te tau 1964. Ko te rū nui 9.2 te tuarua nui rawa atu i inetia, puta noa i te ao, a, i tukitukia te rohe. He ngātahi ngā rū i Alaska, he wāhanga o te rohe o Ring of Fire - he aho puia, ngā pae rū me ngā pereti tectonic huri noa i te Moana-nui-a-Kiwa e toro atu ana mai i Amerika ki te Tonga ki Aotearoa. Ko te nuinga o ngā rū o Alaska e tū ana i raro i te whenua, i tawhiti rānei i te moana, ā, kāore e puta he take nui.

title: Mate ahi o Derby: Ko ngā hoa noho tata ki te hanga i te mekameka tangata
summary: Tae atu ki te 1,600 ngā tāngata me hanga i tētahi mekameka tangata i Derby hei takoha ki ngā tamariki tokoono i mate i muri i te ahi o te whare.
text: I te 5 o Hune, ka kitea e te takahanga kohi moni te huihui ki te whare i Victory Road i Allenton me te hanga i tētahi raina ki tētahi pāka pātata. Ko Jade Philpott, 10, me ngā tuakana ko Hoani, iwa, ko Jack, e waru, ko Jessie, ono, me Piki, e rima, i mate katoa i roto i te ahi. I mate a Duwayne, 13, i te hōhipera. Kua whakatuwheratia, kua hikitia tētahi uiuinga i te Kōti o Te Koroni o Derby. I kī a Anthony Slater, tētahi tangata whenua nāna i āwhina ki te whakatatū i tētahi pūtea mō te whānau, mā te moni i kohia e āwhina ki te utu i ngā nehunga o ngā tamariki me te whakakapi i ngā taonga i ngaro i te ahi o te 11 o Me. I kī a ia na te tautoko a te iwi paetata i whakarato whakamarie mō ngā mātua pouri o Mick rāua ko Mairead Philpott. Ka kī a ia: "Kua tino āwangawanga rātau i te katoa. I kī rātau e āwhina ana te iwi ki te tango i ētahi o te mamae." Other fundraising events planned include a car wash, an auction and a family fun day. Mā te hiki i tētahi uiuinga ki ngā mate ki tētahi rā kāore anō kia tautuhia, ka tukuna e te koroni o Derby, a Robert Hunter, ōna aroha ki te whānau, ā, i kī kua "ohorere te iwi" i te tūkinotanga. Ngā tākupu pouaka whakaata Ināianei kua whakapārewa a ITV mō ngā kōrero i whakaputaina e te kōwae nūpepa o Carole Malone mō te ahi i te wā o tēnei Ata i te Mane. I huatau a Ms Malone tērā pea i kawea e te whānau nui te hīkaka me te whakaahua i te ahi he "aituā e tatari ana kia puta". I kī tētahi kaikōrero ITV: "Ko ngā tirohanga i whakapuakina i roto i te arotakenga nūpepa o Tēnei Ata i te Mane ko ērā o Carol Malone, ā, kāore i tiria e ITV, i Tēnei Ata rānei. " Kai te whānau o mātau whakaaro me te hunga katoa e pāngia ana e tēnei tūkinotanga i tēnei wā uaua." Kei te haere tonu te tūhuratanga ki te mura i muri i te whakaūnga a nga pirihimana kua tīmataria te tūpāpaku whakapae ki te penehīni i raro i te pouaka reta i roto i te whare. I kī te Kaiāwhina Kāhui Matua o Te Kāhui o Te Rūnanga o Aotearoa, "Hei urupare ki a mātau tono o nā noa nei, he tokomaha ngā tāngata mai i Allenton kua haere mai ki te kōrero mai ki a mātau he kāmera C KKK tā rātou kāore i te mōhiotia, nā reira ka titiro mātou ki ngā whakaata kia mōhio ai mēnā kua hopukina tētahi mea. " Kua kite hoki mātau i te pikinga o ngā waea mai i te hui pānui, i tū a Tāne rāua ko Mrs Philpott i te Wenerei. Mā ēnei waea mātou e āwhina ki te tāpiri ki te pikitia nui ake o ngā mea i tūpono i mua i te ahi." I muri iho ka tukua tētahi wahine 28 tau me tētahi tangata 38 tau i hopukina i runga i te whakapae i te kōhuru e pā ana ki te ahi.

title: I whakawhiwhia e BAE Systems he kirimana £70m mō te Papa Moana o Portsmouth
summary: Kua whakawhiwhia ki a BAE Systems tētahi kirimana £70m mō te tiakitanga o ngā Kaipuke Moana Ariki i Portsmouth Naval Base.
text: Ka parea e te kirimana o te Manatu Arotahi e 100 ngā tūranga pūkaha i BAE Systems i Portsmouth, ā, ka haere mai i Hōngongoi tae noa ki Whiringa 2016. Kei roto i te whakahaere i te tautoko, te tautiakitanga me te whakamohoa o ngā Momo 45 Destroyers i te pūtake me ngā mahi i te UK me te ao whānui. I tēnei wā e mahi ana a BAE Systems i ngā Oko Karaehe Awa e whā o te Royal Navy. Minister for Defence Equipment, Support and Technology Philip Dunne MP said: "This £70m contract is good news for Portsmouth. Māna e pare ngā pūkenga o ngā kaipūkaha tohunga e 100, ā, ka whakamārama he mārama te wā heke mai o te umanga tautoko kaipuke o te taone. "Ko ā mātou kaipatu Momo 45 ngā kaipuke nui rawa, kaha rawa atu hoki o te Moana moana, e whakaatu ana i ngā taputapu toi me ngā pūnaha rākau. He mea nui kia whiwhi ngā kaipuke i te tautoko o te karaehe matua, ā, kei Portsmouth ngā pūkenga e hiahiatia ana hei mahi i tēnei. "He whakaaturanga anō tēnei o te whāinga a te Royal Navy ki te whāngai kaipuke, ā, ka tākaro tonu i tētahi tūranga hira i te wā heke mai o te taone." Ka ratonga a BAE Systems i ngā kaipuke Momo 23 katoa i Portsmouth i tua atu i te whakahaere i te HM Portsmouth Naval Base mō te Royal Navy. Ko ngā kaipuke Momo 45 o te karaehe Toa e ono – HMS Daring, HMS Dauntless, HMS Diamond, HMS Dragon, HMS Defender me HMS Duncan – ko ngā Kaiwawao Ārai Hau nui rawa, kaha rawa atu hoki e whakahaeretia ana e te Royal Navy. Neke atu i te 900 ngā mahi ka ngaro i te whārangi o BAE Systems i muri i te whakatau a te kamupene kia whakamutua tana hanga kaipuke i reira.

title: Hinkley Point B 'ka kati pea i te rua tau i mua atu', e kī ana a EDF Energy
summary: Tērā pea ka kati tētahi teihana hiko karihi i te rua tau i mua i te mea i whakaritea nā ngā take pakeke, kua kī tētahi umanga pūngao.
text: I te tau 2023, ka tīmata te EDF Energy ki te whakakore i Hinkley Point B i Somerset. Kua kitea e ngā arotakenga he whāwhā i roto i ngā pereki kauwhata o te uho rea, ā, kua tae mai ngā paera i roto i ngā pūrere ki te mutunga o to rātau oranga. Kei te arotake te kamupene i ngā hua, ā, ka whakatau i te mutunga o te tau. I tīmata te mahi a Hinkley Point B, he tipu kotahi gigawatt (GW), i te tau 1976. Kua kī a EDF Energy kei raro iho te maha o ngā pereki pakaru i te taumata manawanui, engari nā tēnei i whakaaro anō ai te umanga ina tīmata te tukanga whakakore. I te nuinga o te wā, he maha nga tau hei kati katoa i te rea. Tērā pea ka whakakorea wawe a Hunterston B i Pākehā nā aua take ōrite. I kī tētahi kaikōrero EDF: "Ka mutu te hanga a Hinkley Point B i te tōmua o te tau 2023, ahakoa tērā pea me neke mātou ki te whakaheke i roto i ngā tau e rua e whai ake nei." Tata tonu ki te katoa o ngā rererangi karihi 9 GW o Ingarangi e hangaia ana te uho rea mā te pereki kauwhata. "I runga anō i ngā matapae o nāianei, e whā o ngā teihana hiko karihi e waru o te UK e mahi ana ka neke ki te whakakore i a Mati 2024. " He maha nga tau i pēnei ai," te tāpiri mai a te kaiwhakaatu. Ināianei kei te hanga a EDF Energy i tētahi tipu hou, Hinkley Point C, e whakahaere ana i te tau 2025. E tatari ana hoki te umanga pūngao ki tētahi whakataunga kāwanatanga mō te pūtea mō tana kaupapa Sizewell C.

title: Covid: Ka whakaaetia, ka whakataka hoki a Brazil i nga kano kano a AstraZeneca me Sinovac
summary: Kua whiwhi tētahi nēhi i te rongoā kano ārai mate Covid-19 tuatahi o Parīhi i muri i te whakaaetanga ohorere a ngā kaiwhakahaere ki ngā wero e rua.
text: I hoatu e te kaiwhakarite Anvisa te rama kākāriki ki ngā kano ārai mate mai i Oxford-AstraZeneca me Sinovac o Haina, ka tohaina ngā rongoā ki ngā kāwanatanga e 27 katoa. Kei Parīhi te tuarua o ngā mate teitei rawa o te ao mai i Covid-19, ā, kei te piki anō ngā kēhi puta noa i te whenua. Kua tino whakahētia a Perehitini Jair Bolsonaro mo tana whakahaere i te mate urutā. Kua whakatangihia e te kaiārahi matau tawhiti te mate urutā mai i te tīmatanga, i whakatairanga i tētahi rongoā kāore anō kia kitea mō te mate, ā, ka whawhai ki ngā tikanga tae atu ki te mau hīpoki me te tawhiti pāpori. Kua kī te perehitini, nāna i mau a Covid-19 i tērā tau, ā, kua ora, e kore ia e werohia. I pūrongotia e ngā mana e 551 ngā tūpāpaku hou i te Rātapu, ko te wā tuatahi i roto i ngā rā e ono i taka poto noa iho i te 1,000 ahakoa ka kitea pea e tēnei te takaware i te pūrongo o ngā tau i te mutunga wiki. I te katoa, neke atu i te 209,000 ngā mate e pā ana ki te Covid kua tuhia ki Paratira, he whika katoa taketake i hipa noa atu i te US. Neke atu i te 8.4 miriona ngā mate kua whakaūngia mai i te tīmatanga o te mate urutā - te tatau tuatoru teitei rawa o te ao. I kī atu te Minita Hauora a Eduardo Pazuello ki ngā kaipānui ka tīmata te hōtaka werohanga ā-motu i te whenua e 211 miriona tāngata i ngā rā e heke mai nei. E rua ngā pokapū rongoā o Pārihia kua whakaaetia ki te whakaputa i ngā werohanga ka tino whakaurua. Tata ki te ono miriona ngā rongoā o te CoronaVac i hangaia e Sinovac kua hangaia kētia i Paratira, i te wā e tatari ana te kāwanatanga ki ngā tukunga o te kano ārai mate AstraZeneca mai i tētahi taiwhanga i Īnia. I muri noa iho i te whakaaetanga ohorere a te poari o Anvisa, ka noho a Monica Calazans, he nēhi 54 tau i São Paulo, te tangata tuatahi i werohia ki a CoronaVac. I whakaritea tana werohanga e te kāwanatanga o te kāwanatanga o São Paulo, e arahina ana e te tauwhāinga tōrangapū matua o Tāne Bolsonaro, a João Doria. He rongo pai ātaahua tēnei i tēnei rā mō ngā Pārihia e kākari ana ki tētahi ngaru tuarua whakararuraru. Mai i te wāhi e noho nei ahau, te taone o Manaus, kāore te kano ārai mate i te tūturu. E ngana ana ngā tāngata i konei ki te whakaora i tētahi pūnaha hauora kua hinga, ā, kei te mahi i ngā mea e taea e rātou kia ora ai ō rātou whanaunga māuiui. Kua tino tōrangapū te taiepa i Paratira. Kei te whakaatu tonu a Perehitini Bolsonaro i a ia hei kaipōhēhē rongoā, ā, i ngaro a ia i te whakaaetanga o ngā kano ārai mate. Engari, kāore e kore e pakipakia e ngā nūpepa o te Mane te Kāwana o São Paulo, o Doria, i runga i o rātau whārangi o mua. E tūmanakohia ana kia oma a ia i te pōti perehitini o tērā tau, ā, kua pūruatia e ia te kano ārai mate Sinovac mai i te tīmatanga tonu. I mua he urunga Bolsonaro a ia, ā, ināianei ko ia tōna hoariri - engari kāore e kore ko wai e ārahi ana i te huarahi ki te ngana ki te werohanga i te iwi whānui. I te tīmatanga o tēnei wiki ka kī ngā kairangahau kua kitea he 50.4% te pai o te rongoā Hainamana i roto i ngā whakamātautau rongoā o Pārihia. I whakaaturia tēnei, he iti iho te pai o tēnei i ngā raraunga o mua - kāore i neke atu i te 50% e hiahiatia ana mō te whakaaetanga ture. Kei te whakamahia hoki a CoronaVac i Haina, Indonesia me Turkey. I puta mai te rongo i muri i ngā whakakitenga kua puta mai tētahi momo coronavirus hou i Paratira. He maha ngā kēhi i whakatakina ki te āhua o Amazonas, kei reira tētahi āhua ohorere. Kua tino pāngia a Manaus, te pūmatua o te kāwanatanga, me te ngoikore o ngā moenga me te hāora whakaora. Kua kawea mai hoki ngā ipu whakamātao ki ngā hōhipera hei āwhina ki te penapena tinana. I kī a Venezuela e noho tata ana kua tukuna e ia he rōpū taraka me ngā rawa hāora hei āwhina i a Amazonas. Kua anga atu a Perehitini Bolsonaro ki te whakahē nui mo tana whakahaere i te tīmatatanga o Parīhi, ā, he maha nga whakahēnga ārai kāwanatanga i tū i tērā wiki. He hoariri o ngā raka, kua whakapaea e ia ngā kāwana kāwanatanga me ngā rangatira mō te mate Covid, e kī ana kua homai e te kāwanatanga o te kāwanatanga ngā rauemi katoa e hiahiatia ana hei rutu i te huaketo.

title: He rerenga mo te Roma i Berlin
summary: Te āhua nei kāore e taea e Perewa, te taone tonu i whakaritea ai te patu i ngā tāngata Roma (Gypsy) i te 70 tau ki mua, kua noho hei taone e kitea ai e rātau ināianei he rerenga.
text: Nā Stephen EvansBBC News, Berlin I te tapa taone o Neukoelln, kei te mahia tētahi matatini nui o ngā whare noho hei kāinga ātaahua mō ngā whānau neke atu i te 100 mai i tētahi kāinga oneone e tata ana ki Bucharest i Romania. I te wāhi i whakaritea ai e ngā Nazi te kōhurutanga maha o Roma, ka whakaritea e ngā Tiamana o nāianei te whakamarie me te whakaaetanga. Kaore he pōhēhētanga kei te noho tonu a Uropi ki tētahi whenua e anga tonu ana a Roma ki te whakahāweatanga whānui. Nō nā tata nei i whakahaeretia e tētahi pukapuka Huitene te kupu matua Haere Mai Rātau. Ka tāhae rātau. Ka haere rātau i te taha o tētahi pikitia o tētahi taitama Roma e mau pū ana (ā, i muri iho ehara i te mea tūturu). A, i pūrongotia e nga kaiwhakahauhau motika tangata a Amnesty International: "Ko Roma i waenganui i ngā hapori tino kore i Uropi. " E pāngia ana e rātau te whakahāweatanga nui, ā, e whakahētia ana o rātau mana ki te whare, ki te mahi, ki te tiaki hauora me te mātauranga. I te nuinga o te wā e herea ana ngā hapori Roma ki ngā whakapūtātanga, ngā whakaekenga whakahāwea me ngā pirihimana." E whai ana te kaupapa Tiamana ki te whakakāhore i taua ia. Ko te 'tino pūnoa' Ko tētahi rangatū o ngā paraka whare noho, ko te tikanga, kei te panonitia hei kāinga iti mō ngā whānau Roma. Ehara i te whakamarara i a rātou i roto i ngā kaupapa iti, kei te noho rātou ki tētahi matatini nui i te tapa taone o Neukoelln. Ko te kaiwhakahaere kaupapa ko Pineamine Marx, he tangata ātaahua i tōna rima tekau mā rima tekau e whakapuaki ana i te atawhai me te mana. I kī atu a ia ki te HAU: "Ko te ariā he whakarato kāinga mō ngā tāngata kua aukatia, kua whakawāteatia. " E hiahia ana mātou ki te whakaatu i ngā Perewa he tino pūnoa ēnei tāngata, ā, ka taea te whakakotahi." E mahi ana a ia mō tētahi aroha Katorika nāna i whakatau kia tangohia te paraka whare noho nā te mea he kino rawa te āhua. I mutu a Roma ki reira i roto i nga tau hekenga, ko te nuinga mai i te kainga o Fantanele tata ki Bucharest. He rongonui to rātau kāinga hou i Berlin i waenganui i te iwi o te rohe he paruparu. Engari i te kitenga o tētahi aroha whare Katorika i ngā mea e haere ana, ka whakatau kia panoni i te wāhi me te whakahaere i a Tēnā Marx. Ināianei, he āhua hanganga te matatini whare. Kei te peitatia ngā pakitara ki ngā pakitara o waho. Ko nga whare noho kei roto i tētahi paraka tauhira o Berlin, huri noa i tētahi marae, he tirohanga o te paepae me ngā pāmu e kawe ana i te para. Kei te kōarotia, kei te whakahoutia ngā rūma. Kei te hangaia he whare tapere iti, tae atu ki nga toamahi me nga rūma tākaro. I te Kirihimete, ka whiwhi ngā tangata Roma hou katoa i ngā koha ārani. E manaaki nui ana rātau ki a Tēnā Marx me te whakamoemiti mārama i a ia e haere ana i te kaupapa. E whakamanamana ana hoki rātau ki Tiamana. Ka haere a rātau tamariki ki te kura o te rohe, ā, e kī ana rātau e hiahia ana rātau ki te mahi me te hanga oranga hou. Ko Olimpia Nitu, i haere mai i Bucharest me tana tāne me ana tamariki, i kī atu ki te BBC: "E noho ana ahau i konei ināianei me aku tamariki me taku tāne, ā, e hiahia ana ahau ki te ako i te ora i konei i ia hipanga. " E hiahia ana ahau ki tētahi mea hou i roto i tōku oranga." E kī ana a Pineamine Marx ka whiwhi a Roma i tētahi whakaahua tūmatanui kino nā te hunga e kitea ana i ngā pūtahi o te taone - engari ko te hunga e whakakotahi ana, mā te whakamahukitanga, kāore e kitea. Ko tana whāinga ko te āwhina i te hunga e neke ana ki Berlin ki te whakauru. E ai ki te kaupapa i runga i te ngākau māia, engari he kanohi whetū, he ngākau māia? Tērā pea he rangatira, engari he whakaaro nui te whakawhāiti i te tokomaha o ngā tāngata mai i tētahi rōpū e mōhiotia ana e anga ana ki te riri i te wāhi kotahi? Ko te mea tika te mahi, e ai ki a Christine Lueders, te upoko o te mahi ārai whakahāwea o Tiamana. "Me whai kaupapa pēnei koe hei whakaatu e hiahia ana te iwi ki te whakauru i ngā tāngata, ā, kaua e wehe i ngā tāngata," tana kī. "A, ki te ngana ngā kaikiri ki te whawhai ki aua kaupapa, me tū koe i mua i a rātou me te mahi i tētahi mea ki te whakahāwea me te whakahāwea." Neke atu i te 200,000 ngā Roma i patua i roto i te Holocaust. I ētahi wā e whakaaro ana o rātau whanaunga mōrehu ko rātau te hunga i warewaretia, he rōpū e kino tonu ana ahakoa ngā wā o mua. I te haerenga o te kaiārahi o Roma o tēnei rā i te kaupapa, ka kitea e ia te nekehanga, he roimata e kohu ana ōna kanohi. "Ko tāku i kite ai i konei e tūmanako ana," te kī a Romani Rose, te tumuaki o te Kaunihera Matua o Tiamana Sinti me Roma, ā, e 13 ngā mema o te whānau i ngaro i te Holocaust. "E whakaatu ana tērā tētahi atu huarahi ina manaaki te tangata i te iti rawa o te iti rawa, ā, ka hoatu ki a rātau he wāhi i roto i te āhua o te whakahaerenga." Tērā te tūmanako kanapa, i roto i te taone o ngā wā pōuri rawa o mua - ā, he whakamana tēnā i roto i a ia anō.

title: Ko ngā ahi i Pantanal, ngā whenua pātata nui rawa atu o te ao, 'takitoru' i te tau 2020
summary: Kua takitoru te maha o ngā ahi ngahere i te Pantanal, ngā whenua ā-rohe nui rawa o te ao, i te tau 2020 i whakaritea ki tērā tau, e ai ki te pokapū ātea ā-motu o Parīhi, o Inpe.
text: I kitea e Inpe e 3,682 ngā ahi mai i te 1 o Hānuere ki te 23 o Hōngongoi i te rohe, he pikinga o te 201% i whakaritea ki te 2019. E hia mano ngā momo tae atu ki ngā jaguars, ngā manu heke me ngā manu heke e noho ana i te rohe 140,000-160,000 km māra. I tērā marama ko Pipiri tino kino mō ngā ahi i Amazon noho tata i roto i te 13 tau. Kei Parīhi, Parakuai me Poriwia ngā whenua repo, ā, ko tētahi o ngā wāhi tino rauropi o te ao. Ko Piranha, ko ngā makimaki capuchin, ko ngā anaconda kākāriki me ngā mano o ngā momo tipu e noho ana i roto i te peihana e tupu ana i te waipuke ā-tau i muri i te marangai kōrere. Ko tētahi mahere aorangi i whakaputaina e Inpe e whakaatu ana i ngā ahi e wera ana ināianei i te Pantanal, i kohia mā te whakamahi i ngā aorangi e ine ana i ngā mura nui ake i te 30m te roa mā te 1m te whānui. Ko ngā ahi e 3,682 i kitea i te rohe i tēnei tau ko te tau tiketike rawa mai i te tīmatanga o ngā pūkete i te tau 1998. I taua wā anō i te tau 2018 e 277 te katoa o te rohe. I karangatia e ngā mema o te whatunga taiao te Pantanal Observatory nga ahi "he mōrearea pāpori mai i te mea, i tua atu i te tūkinotanga o te ohaoha me te ngaronga o te tipua tipua, ka puta i te ahi ngā raruraru romahā, te riri whatu me te mate," e ai ki te nūpepa Pārihia O Globo. I kī te rōpū whakahaere, i roto i ngā rā e rua, neke atu i te 7,000 heketea i tahuna nā te hua o te "mahi hara" me ngā "take kōaro". I te nuinga o te wā maroke i Parīhi, engari ka tīmataria hoki i roto i ngā mahi ki te whakakore i te whenua mō te pāmu kau. I te Pantanal Bolivian, he uaua te whawhai i nga ahi e te mate uruta coronavirus e whakawhāiti ana i te maha o nga tangata e āhei ana ki te rutu haumaru i nga mura, i whakamāramatia e Carlos Pinto o te rōpū Friends of Nature Foundation. E kī ana te Taiwhanga Pantanal e tuku ana i ngā pāohotanga reo irirangi me te ataata hei whakamōhio atu ki ngā tangata whenua mō te mōrea o te ahi. I te tīmatanga o tēnei marama ka whakamōhiotia e Perehitini Jair Bolsonaro he ārai ahi i te rohe o Amazon, ki te raki o te Pantanal, mō ngā marama e whā e whai ake nei. E whakapae auau ana ngā kaitiaki taiao i a Tēnā Bolsonaro, he pōhēhē huringa āhuarangi, i te korenga e pare i ngā rauemi māori nui me te utu nui o te whenua. I tērā tau ka whakapaea e ia ngā NGO ki te tīmata ahi i Amazon. Neke atu i te 50,000 heketea i whakangaromia e te ahi i te Pantanal o Pārihia i tērā tau.

title: Ko te tono a Jurgen Klopp Anfield mo te kaiwhaiwhai 104 tau o Liverpool
summary: Ko tētahi o ngā kaipāngai tino roa o Liverpool FC e mātakitaki ana i ana Whero aroha mo tōna huritau 104.
text: I whakawhiwhia ki a Bernard Sheridan tētahi tuhipoka whaiaro i hainatia e te kaiwhakahaere o Jurgen Klopp me tētahi tono ki te whakataetae Premier League o tēnei Hātarei i Anfield ki Crystal Palace. E 96 tau e whai pono ana a Mr Sheridan i te karapu. Ka kī a ia: "Ko te huka i runga i te keke ina patua e mātau a Crystal Palace." I haere ohorere ngā māngai o te karapu ki a Tēnā Sheridan i te kāinga tiaki o The Tithebarn i Great Crosby, Sefton, Merseyside, i tēnei wiki ki te whakaatu i ana koha rā whānau ki a ia. I whakaurua e rātau he hāte me te tau "104" i tāngia ki muri, he keke me te reta mai i a Klopp e mihi ana ki a ia mo tana tautoko mai i te tau 1923. Ka haere a Tēnā Sheridan, e whitu ōna mokopuna me ngā mokopuna tekau mā whā, ki te ōrite me te whānau, tae atu ki tētahi tama e haere ana ki Liverpool mai i Kānata. I tīmata a ia ki te mātakitaki i a Liverpool me ngā tauwhāinga paetata o Everton i te tau 1923 i te tīmatanga o tētahi matua kēkē ki te mau i a ia ki ngā kēmu i runga i te tereina mai i to rātau kāinga i Wavertree i ia wiki, ā, kāore i roa ka puta he take aroha ki te Whero. I tāpiri mai a Tēnā Sheridan: "He kaitautoko whakahīhī ahau i a Liverpool mai i taku tamarikitanga, ā, kua tautokona e au te karapu mā te mātotoru me te angiangi, nā reira kei te tino hari ahau ki te haere ki te ōrite i te Hātarei."

title: Ka mātakitaki ngā kaimahi ahi i te ahi o Glenshane i te pō
summary: Ka mau tonu ngā kaipatu ahi i tētahi mātakitaki poto i te pō i te tirohanga o te ahi gorse i te Glenshane Pass i County Londonderry.
text: Kei tētahi wāhi mamao o Sperrins tata ki Dungiven te ahi. I kī a Mark Smyth mai i te NI Fire & Rescue Service (NIFRS) kua mahia he "kauneketanga nui" puta noa i te Tāite. I kī a ia tērā pea ka wera te ahi i te pō, engari ki te kore ka tīmata anō te mahi i te Paraire. I pūrongotia tuatahitia te ahi i te 04:57 BST i te ata o te Wenerei. Na te wera i ārai nga kaimahi ahi ki te tirohanga mo te nuinga o te rā, ā, ka mauria rātau ki te tirohanga ma te hepa i te ahiahi o te Wenerei. He pai ake ngā here i te Rāitema, ā, e whā ngā pūrere ahi me tētahi wae tautoko tono i haere ki te tirohanga. Kotahi te taputapu ka noho ki te tirohanga i te pō o te Tāite. I kī a Commander Smyth i āwhinatia rātau e te huarere. "Ko te rongo pai, kāore i te nui te hau, ā, kei te pupuhi te hau ki te ahi me te āwhina ki te pupuri. " Kua aurara te ahi ki tētahi wāhi o te ngahere, engari ko te tūmanako ka wera ina tuki ki ngā rākau pakeke ake e pōturi ake ana te tahuna," tana kī. I te Wenerei ka kī te Rangatira Smyth i takea mai te ahi i tētahi momo hapa tangata. "Kia tino tūpato kia kaua e wera ki te whenua maroke me te whakamārama i ngā tunu kai. " Koinei tētahi o ā mātou mahi tino uaua nā te urunga. He whenua tino mōrearea." E hora ana te ahi puta noa i tētahi wāhi e 800-1000 heketea me ngā tūru ahi e toru.

title: Ka whakakorea e Michael Buble ngā āhuatanga kia ora mai i te pokanga reo
summary: Kua whakakorea e Michael Buble ngā āhuatanga i ngā takahanga e rua e tū mai nei kia taea ai e ia te whakaora i te pokanga i runga i ōna aho reo.
text: Ināianei kāore te kaiwaiata e mahi i tētahi konohete takoha a Marvin Gaye, e haere rānei ki tētahi hui tohu Kānata. I tana tuhituhi i runga i Twitter, ka kī a ia "kāore he kōrero, he waiata rānei mō tētahi wā" ina mahia e ia. Ka whakaū a Buble i ana "tākuta e tūmanako ana kia tino ora" me te mihi ki ngā kaihautū mo a rātau inoi me a rātau hiahia pai. I urupare ngā kaipānui ki te tweet a Buble me ngā karere tautoko, i te wā e kī ana te kaiwaiata a Josh Groban: "E tuku ana i te nui o te aroha me ngā whakaaro hauora ki ō paipa atawhai, kia ora wawe e taku hoa." Ko Buble te mea hou rawa o ētahi kaiwaiata kōtaha tiketike kia pau te wā i te mahi i muri i te pokanga reo. I roto i ngā tau tata nei, kua oti i a Adele rāua ko Sam Smith te pokanga aho reo, ā, ka haere tonu ki te whakaora katoa.

title: Ka puta tuihono te ngātahitanga a Amy Winehouse Tony Bennett
summary: Kua puta tuihono tētahi topenga poto o te takirua a Amy Winehouse me te poutohu jazz o Tony Bennett.
text: Ka tukua te waiata, e kiia nei ko Body And Soul, i te 20 o Mahuru me ngā hua e haere ana ki tētahi tūāpapa i whakatūria e te pāpā o Amy o Mitch. Ka āhuahira hoki i runga i te pukaemi Duets a Tony Bennett e tū mai nei. I hopukina ki Abbey Road Studios o Rāwāhi i Poutāpeta, ko tētahi o ngā hopukanga whakamutunga a te kaiwaiata i mua i tōna matenga i te 23 o Hōngongoi. Takoha 'tika' i te pānuitanga o ngā taipitopito o te pānuitanga, ka kī a Mitch Winehouse i roto i tētahi kōrero "kāore i taea e ia te hari ake". I tāpiri mai a ia: "I tino hiahia a Amy ki te mahi tahi me Toni Bennett, ā, e tino tūmanako ana ki ana kaihautū e rongo ana i tēnei hopukanga hou. " Ko te mea kei te tangi te reo o Amy i te whakamīharo, i te ātaahua hoki, ā, kei te waiata ia me te tino pai o Tony Bennett i tēnei wā tino uaua." I tērā wiki ka kī atu a Mitch Winehouse ki a Newsbeat kei te uaua ia ki te whakatatū i te The Amy Winehouse Foundation i te mea kua rēhitatia e tētahi atu te ingoa. Ka kī a ia: "I kinitia e tētahi atu i a mātau i mua i te rēhitatanga." Heoi anō, i tana tuhituhi i runga i Twitter inanahi (22 o Aotearoa), ka whakairihia e ia he whakahōutanga: "Te āhua nei kua whakahokia mai e mātau to mātau tūāpapa. Māku koe katoa e whakahōu āpōpō. Tino pai."

title: E kī ana a Mark Drakeford me tino tātuhi anō a UK kia ora ai
summary: Kua karangatia e te minita tuatahi o Uēra kia "tāruatia anōtia" te Hononga o Ingarangi kia ora ai.
text: I kōrero a Mark Drakeford i te whakarewatanga o tētahi pūrongo a ngā mema o te rōpū Mahi e karanga ana kia hoatu ki ngā iwi kua whakaritea he mana nui ake. I kī a ia ko te wehenga o te UK he "mōrearea tūturu, o nāianei". I kī tētahi Tory matua i te hiahia a Labour ki ngā mana, i te kī a Plaid Cymru he "whakaaro inanahi". I a ia e kōrero ana i tētahi whakarewatanga tuihono o ngā tono i te ata Tūrei, ka tohe a Tēnā Drakeford ki tētahi kōmihana Mahi UK i runga i te kaupapa ture kia whakaae ki te "radicalism" o ngā whakaaro. E kī ana te pukapuka, i waihangatia e te mema o Pontypridd Senedd, o Mick Antoniw, me whakahaere anake e Te Wānanga ētahi manakē "rautaki", pēnei i te wawao me ngā whakataunga nui i runga i te āhua o te whakahaerenga. E karanga ana ki te Rōpū Mahi a Keir Starmer ki te tuku i tētahi whirinoa ki te rangatiratanga, ki te tūnga kōrero rānei. Ko te tikanga kia whai a Labour ki tētahi "uniana tūturu o ngā iwi", e kī ana te pūrongo, e whiwhi ai ia wāhi o te whenua i tētahi "tiri tika" o ngā rauemi. E kī ana i te angitu o te Rōpū ā Iwi o Pirihitini, me te kī ko te "kume tō-ā-papa" mō ngā tāngata i Aiarangi ki te Raki e huri ana "whaka te tonga, puta noa i te motu o Airangi", ka whakatūpato a Tēnā Drakeford: "He mōrearea tūturu, he mōrearea tēnei wā te wehenga o Te Hononga o Ingarangi." I kī a ia me ārahi te Rōpū Mahi i te tautohetohe mo te kaupapa ture. "E kore e taea te tuku iho ki ngā āhuatanga o te whakakotahitanga, o te wairua rānei. Me noho kē hei tātuhi anō i te Hononga o Ingarangi." He rerekē ngā taumata o Weera, Pākehā me Aiarangi ki te Raki ki te whakahaere i ā rātou ake take, engari i kī te minita tuatahi "kāore he take" i te whakahā i te ora ki tētahi whakataunga ā-kaupapa "kua whai rā". "Engari, ko te mea me waihanga e tātau he uniana hou." I tautohe a Tēnā Drakeford, e kōrero ana mai i ngā tari Kāwanatanga o Welsh i Kārepa, ko ngā whakataunga e pā ana ki te oranga o ia rā o te tangata me tino tata ki a rātou. "Engari ki te kōwhiri ngā iwi wae o Te Hononga o Ingarangi ki te huihui, ki te whakarōpū rauemi, ki te tiritiri utu, kātahi ka whakapono hoki ahau he wāhi kaha tērā o te mahi whānui." I kī a Mick Antoniw i te 'uniana tūroro': "Tae noa mai ki tēnei wā, kua whakanuia te taupatupatu mo te whakahōu e te kōwhiringa o tētahi tauira takitahi, whakaaro kino rānei o te rangatiratanga, o te uniana mārō rānei. " E whakapono ana mātau he huarahi pai ake. He whakahou mārō e whakanoho ana i ngā tāngata me ngā hapori ki te tuatahi, i runga anō i te kotahitanga o ngā iwi e haere tahi ana me ngā tikanga ngātahi, he pūteatanga hākinakina." I kī te minita tuatahi he "tino pai, he tino nui hoki te koha" ki "tētahi o ngā take kaupapahere tūmatanui tino hira, ā, kua waihotia o tō tātau wā". Ka tūtohu a Andrew RT Davies, te kaikorero hauora o Welsh Conservative: "Pouri ki te kite anō i a Labour e hiahia ana ki ngā mana - mēnā i arotahi kē rātou ki ngā mea kua riro kē i a rātou!" I tāpiri mai a Delyth Jewell o Plaid Cymru, e tautoko ana i te rangatiratanga: "Ko ngā whakaaro ēnei o inanahi mai i te rōpū inanahi. Tekau mā toru tau te mana o Labour i Te Wānanga ki te tuku i te mana whakahaere mō Weera, a, i rahua." Ko te tātaritanga a David Deans, te kaipānui tōrangapū o TE AO Wales Ahakoa e whakahaeretia ana te hauora, te mātauranga me te kāwanatanga ā rohe mai i Kānata, he nui tonu ngā mea e toe ana ki ngā ringa o Westminster, pēnei i ngā kōti me ngā pirihimana. He whāiti ngā taipitopito, engari ko te ariā i marohitia i te Rāite, ko te nui ake o ngā mea e taea ana i te paetata, ko te iti ake o ngā kaipōti i ngā iwi o UK e hiahia ana ki te haere i ō rātou ara motuhake. E karanga ana te pukapuka mō te "pūteatanga tohetohe": Kāore a Tēnā Drakeford i whakamahi i te kupu i roto i tana kupu whakataki, engari ko te pūrongo i tautokona e ia he "tino pai" kei roto i te taitara. E tohu ana ko ngā iwi o UK (me ngā rohe i Ingarangi) e tata motuhake ana ki te whakahaere i te nuinga o ā rātou ake take, engari e whakaae ana ki te whakapiri ngātahi. Tērā pea he āhua ōrite tēnei mai i te Mahi Welsh - kua tautokona e Mark Drakeford te neke i ētahi atu mana mai i Rāwāhi ki Kānata mō tētahi wā - engari he wāhanga tēnei o te kaupapa ture; taupatupatu i roto i te rōpū UK whānui ake. Ko te tūmanako tūturu anake kia puta mai ēnei whakaaro, mēnā ka hoatu e Tā Keir Starmer ki roto i tētahi whakahau, ā, ka toa i te mana i Westminster. Ehara i te mea mō Pākehā me Aiarangi ki te Raki - kei te noho te rangatiratanga ināianei i roto i ngā tōrangapū o Welsh kāore anō kia pērā i mua. Engari ko te rerekētanga i Uēra - me te raruraru tūpono mō te hunga e moemoeā ana ki tētahi UK a te hau - ko ētahi i te taha matau e whakaaro ana ka taea te toa pōti ki te tautohe kia iti iho te mana whakahaere, kaua ko ētahi atu mea.

title: Karima Baloch: I kitea kua mate te kaiwhaiwhai motika o Hōia i Torōna
summary: Kua kitea te tinana o Karima Baloch, tētahi kaiwhaiwhai motika tangata o Hōia, i Torōna, Kānata, i reira a ia e noho manene ana mo te rima tau.
text: Ko Ms Baloch, e 37, he kaiwhakangahau mai i te rohe whakangāwari o Balochistan i te uru o Pakitāne, he kaiwhakawāwā kōrero ki te hōia me te kāwanatanga o Hōia. I tukuna e nga pirihimana o Toronto he tono i muri i tana ngarotanga i te Rātapu, ā, i muri iho ka whakaūngia kua kitea tōna tinana. I kī ngā pirihimana "kāore i whakapono he āhuatanga whakatūpato". I te tau 2016, i whakaingoatia a Ms Baloch ki te rārangi ā-tau o te 100 o ngā wāhine whai mana, whai mana hoki mō tana mahi hei kaiwhakahauhau. I mahue i a ia a Pakitāne i te tau 2015, i muri i te whakatauanga o nga utu pūtohu ki a ia. I haere tonu a ia ki te whakahau manene mo nga mana o te iwi i Balochistan, i runga i te pāpāho pāpori, i te tangata hoki. A, ka whai mai nga tuma i a ia, e ai ki a Lateef Johar Baloch, he hoa tata me tētahi hoa kaiwhaiwhai e noho ana hoki i Torōna. I kī atu a ia ki te AO kātahi anō ka whiwhi tuma ingoamuna a Ms Baloch e whakatūpato ana ka tukuna e tētahi tētahi "koha Kirihimete" ki a ia, ā, "whakaakona he akoranga ki a ia". I kī atu te tuahine o Ms Baloch ki te ratonga Urdu o TE Tūtira ko tōna matenga "ehara i te mea he tūkinotanga anake mō te whānau, engari mō te nekeneke ā iwi o Baloch". "Kāore a ia i haere ki rāwāhi nā te mea i hiahia ia, engari nā te mea... kua kore e taea te whakatuwhera i Pakitāne," te kī a Mahganj Baloch. Kua taurimatia e te kawanatanga o Balochistan tētahi tauwhāinga hīkoi roa. He kaiwhaiwhai rongonui a Ms Baloch i te rohe; ko ia te upoko wahine tuatahi o te Rōpū Ākonga Baloch (BSO) - he rōpū kaiwhaiwhai kua rāhuitia. I te tau 2005, i te takiwā o Turbat o Balochistan, i reira a ia i haere ai ki tētahi whakahē mo ngā tangata ngaro e mau ana i te pikitia o tētahi o ōna whanaunga ngaro. E kī ana ngā kaiwhaiwhai i Balochistan e hia mano nga kaiwhakahauhau kua ngaro i roto i ngā tau tata nei. E whakakāhore ana te hōia o Hōia i ngā whakapae e pēhi ana i ngā hiahiatanga o te rohe mo te mana motuhake. He tokomaha nga mema o te whānau whānui o Ms Baloch i honoa ki te nekeneke ātete o Baloch i roto i ngā tau, ā, tokorua o ōna matua kēkē - he tuakana o tōna whaea me tētahi tuakana o tōna pāpā - kua ngaro. I kitea o rātau tūpāpaku ā muri ake. I uru ia ki te BSO i te tau 2006, e mahi ana i ngā tūnga rerekē i ngā tau e whai ake nei. I rāhuitia te rōpū e te kāwanatanga i te tau 2013, engari i haere tonu tōna nohoanga, ā, ka noho a Ms Baloch hei manukura i te tau 2015. I ētahi marama noa iho i muri iho, ka haere a ia ki te manene i muri i te tāpaetanga o ngā whakapae pūtohu ki a ia. I Torōna, i mārena a ia ki tētahi hoa kaiwhaiwhai, a Hamal Baloch, ā, ka noho hohe tonu i runga i te pāpāho pāpori me ngā ngohe motika tangata i Kānata me Uropi. I a ia e urupare ana ki ngā rongo o te matenga o Ms Baloch, ka pānuitia e te Nekehanga ā Iwi o Balochistan (MN) tētahi wā tangi 40 rā. I te tīmatanga o tēnei tau, ka ngaro tētahi atu tangata o Baloch o mua e noho manene ana, ko te kairīpoata o Stuad Hu huka Baloch, a, i kitea kua mate. E noho ana a Tāne Baloka, e whanaunga ana ki a Ms Baloch, i Huitene. I whakataua e nga pirihimana o Huitene tētahi "hē kitea" me te take o te mate i whakataua kia toromi. Tērā pea ka hiahia koe ki

title: Ko ngā mahere tauranga ātea i takaware e Te Wānanga
summary: Kua takawaretia ngā mahere mō ngā ture hei whakahohe i te whanaketanga o ngā tauranga ātea arumoni tuatahi o UK e Te Wānanga o Aotearoa.
text: I pānuitia e te kāwanatanga o UK i roto i te Whaikōrero a te Kuini i Me i tērā tau ka kawea mai he pire. E rua ngā pae Pākehā kua pānuitia he mahere hei tono mō ngā raihana tauranga ātea - te taunga rererangi o Prestwick me Machrihanish. Heoi anō, i kī te kāwanatanga kāore he wātaka mo te whakaurunga o te pire. Tērā tētahi mākete e tipu haere ana mō te whakarewa i ngā aorangi iti, nano rānei ka taea te whakamahi mō ngā whakawhitiwhitinga pēnei i te aunui. E hiahia ana ngā pae o Pākehā ki te pato ki tēnei mākete, ā, ka whakatakoto hoki i ngā hanganga mō ngā whanaketanga ā muri ake pēnei i te tāpoi ātea. Kua rāhuitia ngā ture e pā ana ki te mokowā ki Westminster. Ko te Tari Waka a te kāwanatanga o UK (DfT) te kawenga mō te Pire Waka Hōu, e tautuhi ana i ngā ture mō ngā motokā kore atekōkiri, ā, ka whakaaetia hoki ngā taunga rererangi o UK kia uru ki te mokowā. I kī atu ki a KOE Pākehā kua kaha te mahi i runga i te pire, engari i whakawhāititia te wā paremata e ngā takahanga pēnei i a Pakihitini me ngā kōrero mō te whakaoho i te Tuhipānui 50. I kī tētahi kaikōrero mō te DfT: "Ka pānuitia te rā whakamutunga mō te whakaurunga o te Pire Waka Hōu i te wā e tika ana. " Kei te hangaia e mātau te anga ture, ture hoki kia taea ai te whanaketanga o ngā tauranga ātea i te UK. Mā te mākete e whakatau te wāhi e whakatūria ai te tauranga ātea tuatahi." I kī te kaiwhakahaere o te whanaketanga o te taunga rererangi o Prestwick, a Rākei Jenner, he nui ngā mahi i mahia hei whakarite mō te tono raihana tauranga ātea. I kī a ia ināianei e tatari ana te taunga rererangi ki ngā ture kia "whakamārama" i ngā mea e hiahiatia ana hei tauranga ātea. I kī atu a ia ki a BBC Scotland: "Mēnā he poto noa iho te takaware, ki taku whakaaro ehara i te raruraru nui. " E mōhio ana ahau, kei te tino ū tonu te kāwanatanga o UK ki te whakarewa i te tākirirangi tuatahi i te tau 2020, ā, kei te tino hiahia rātou kia haere whakamua mātou nā reira kāore au i te whakaaro he rerekētanga i roto i tō rātou whāinga. "Ki taku whakaaro he takaware noa iho nā te tukanga paremata."
