I whakaritea e Prestwick tētahi pūrongo i te tau 2015 e kī ana ka utu i waenganui i te £1m me te £3.5m kia whiwhi ai te taunga rererangi ki te paerewa kia tutuki ai ngā ture tauranga ātea o Amerika. I kī a Tēnā Jenner me mahi te taunga rererangi i ētahi whakarerekētanga, engari i mōhio kē kei a ia te nuinga o ngā tikanga haumaru. I runga anō i te taunga rererangi o South Ayrshire tētahi kamupene e kiia nei ko Orbital Access, e whakawhanake ana i tētahi waka rererangi hinu me te pūnaha tākirirangi. Ko te waka rererangi roa e whakaaro ana ki te whakamahi i tētahi waka rererangi kaikawe tinana whānui, me ngā whakarerekētanga motuhake hei kawe i tētahi tākirirangi i raro i tōna tinana. Ka tukua te tākirirangi whakarewa i te teitei, ā, ka pūhia ki te mokowā ki te tuku i te utanga. Ka taea te whakamahi i tēnei pūnaha ki tētahi o ngā tauranga ātea e whiwhi raihana ana. Kua pānuitia hoki e te taunga rererangi o Campbeltown i Machrihanish i te koiora o Kintyre tētahi mahi hangarau e titiro ana me pēhea te whakawhanake i tētahi tauranga ātea. Kei te huihuia te mahere Machrihanish e DiscoverSpace UK, kua hainatia e ia tētahi whakaaturanga mātauranga ki ngā kamupene hangarau QinetiQ me TelespazoVEGA. I kī atu te kaiwhakahaere whakahaere o DiscoverSpace UK, a Tom Millar, ki a BBC Scotland ka titiro ki te whakawhanake i ana mahere i roto i ngā marama e ono e whai ake nei. He tino roa te waka rererangi o Machrihanish, ā, kāore i te tata ki ngā kāinga nunui, e tutuki ana i ngā paearu kāwanatanga taketake. I kī hoki a Tēnā Millar, he torutoru noa iho ngā rerenga arumoni o te wāhi rererangi i runga ake i te waka rererangi, e tango ana i te āwangawanga mo te whakararuraru i te rererangi pāhihi.

title: Ka tautāwhi a Ariki Patten i te utu a TE AO ki a George Entwistle
summary: Kua kī atu te manukura o te Whirinaki o TE AO, a Ariki Patten, ki ngā MP kāore he kōwhiringa engari kia whakaae ki tētahi utu £450,000 ki te tumuaki o George Entwistle.
text: I te 10 o Whiringa ā Rangi, i muri i te haupae i te pō o News, ka whakarerea e Tēnā Entwistle, e 54 rā noa iho i roto i te mahi. Na tētahi pūrongo Newsnight i whakapae hē ai a Te Ariki McAlpine ki te tūkino tamariki. I mua rā ka whāia e te hōtaka tētahi tūhuratanga tūkino ki te kaiwhakaatu o te pouaka whakaata o TE AO me te DJ Jimmy Savile. I kī a Ariki Patten, i te putanga mai i mua i te Komiti Ahurea, Pāpāho me te Hākinakina, kua pātai atu a Tēnā Entwistle ki a ia mehemea ko te Whirinaki o TE AO - te tinana whakahaere o te kaporeihana - e "whakahau ana i a ia kia haere". I korerotia ki a ia: "Kāore mātou i te whakahau i a koe kia haere. Engari kāore mātou i te whakahau i a koe kia noho." I kī a Ariki Patten i tohe a Tēnā Entwistle me ana rōia kia kaua ia e haere me te utu e ono marama, ā, i kī ia kua tonoa e te tumuaki nui ake i te utu 12 marama i whiwhi ai ia. "I hiahia a ia ki te haere i runga i te 12 marama me ētahi atu mea," tana kī atu ki te komiti. I pātaitia e ia te nui o te tono a Tēnā Entwistle, ka kī a ia: "Kāore a ia i tono mo te rua tau, engari i tono anō ia." I kī a Ariki Patten tērā te whakaritenga kirikā i te 11 o Whiringa ā Rangi, ā, ka tohutohu ia i nga rōia o te HAU. I kī a ia ka kī atu rātau ki a ia mēnā ka whakakāhoretia te utu utu, ka taea e Tēnā Entwistle te haere ki tētahi rūnanga mahi, ā, ka tū ki te toa i tētahi atu £80,000 i runga i te £450,000. Ka kī a Ariki Patten: "Kāore i a mātau he take mo te pana. Ka taea e mātou te whakaae ki tētahi mahi whakaaetanga mō te 12 marama, ka neke atu rānei te āhuatanga, ā, ka kite mātou i a mātau ki tētahi pana whaitake (kerēme) me tētahi pana tika hoki." I kī hoki a ia mēnā i kitea kua mahia e Tēnā Entwistle tētahi mea e takahi ana i tana kirimana, "ka taea e tātau te whakahoki i ētahi o ngā utu kua utua". 'Tangata tika' E pā ana ki a Tēnā Entwistle, ka kī a Ariki Patten kāore a ia i whakaae ki te "parakore i tētahi tangata tika" i "āwangawanga" i ngā takahanga. I tāpiri mai a ia "i miharo i te mutunga o tōna ngākau i roto. Ki taku whakaaro i kitea e ia he wheako whakarihariha te mea katoa". I mua ake, ka kī atu a Ariki Patten ki ngā MP kia kaua e "whakarerea, whakarerea rānei i te pukapuka tuhituhi" nā ngā hē i mahia e Newsnight. I kī a ia e hiahiatia ana he huarahi "tātua me ngā whīti" kia kore ai e tāruatia taua "pukapuka pukapuka hākinakina". Engari i tāpiri mai a ia: "Me kaua te AO e whakarere, e whakarere rānei i te tuhitaka whakamātautau. He mea nui kia teitei ake ō paerewa tuhituhi mō te pukapuka tuhituhi." Ko ētahi o ētahi atu whakawhitinga matua i roto i te tautohetohe mai i Whiringa ā-Rangi - i te 2 o Whiringa ā-rangi, i rangitaki ai te kaiwhakatika Newsnight a Pita Rippon mō te take i whāia ai tētahi tūhuratanga ki ngā whakaaro tūkino e pā ana ki te kaiwhakaatu pouaka whakaata o Mua o TE AO me te kaiwhakaatu pouaka whakaata o Savile i a Hōnea 2011. I te rā e whai ake nei ka whakarewaina e ITV tētahi pakipūmeka i roto i ngā whakaaro nui mō te kaiwhakaatu, i mate i Whiringahora 2011. Nā tēnei i puta ai te roma o ngā whakaaro mō te whanonga o Savile i ngā tau kotahi mano e waru tekau mā rua, 80 me te 90, i a ia e ingoa kāinga ana i Ingarangi hei kaiwhakaatu o te Jim'll Fix It. I te 2 o Whiringa Whiringa, ka whakapāhotia e Newsnight tētahi hōtaka i kī ai a Steve Messham, tētahi tangata o mua o te kāinga tamariki o Bryn Estyn i Wrexham, kua tūkinotia ia e tētahi pāremata matua kāore i whakaingoatia o te wā o Te Wānanga i te kāinga. I muri iho ka puta mai kua hē tana tohu ki a Newsnight te kaitiaki moni o te Rōpū Rangatira o mua, a Ariki McAlpine, ko tētahi o ana kaikino. Ahakoa kāore i whakaingoatia a Ariki McAlpine i roto i te hōtaka, ka puta tōna ingoa i runga i te ipurangi, ā, ka puta mai ia i te wāhi tūmatanui ki te whakakāhore riri i a ia e whakauru ana. I kī tētahi uiui a TE AO ā muri ake kāore anō kia oti ētahi o ngā taki tuhituhi taketake; kāore i whakaūngia te tāutunga e te whakaahua ki a Tēnā Messham, ā, kāore he mana whakautu i tukuna ki a Ariki McAlpine. A, i utua e te AO te £185,000 i roto i ngā tūkinotanga tinihanga ki te hoa. I tērā wiki i whakaae ai a Toni Hall, tētahi kaiwhakahaere rongokōrero o TE AO o mua, i pau i te tekau tau ki te whakahaere i te Royal Opera House, kia noho ko te tumuaki panuku i te tōmua o tērā tau. I kī a Lord Patten e "tino tūmanako ana" ia ki te mahi tahi me Lord Hall. Ka kī a ia: "Ko te mahi nui rawa e anga atu ana mātau ko te whakaora i te whakawhirinaki. Kua patoto te whakawhirinaki ki te BBC. "Kei te whakawhirinaki tonu te AO i tētahi rōpū rongokōrero, engari ehara tēnā i te kōrero whakangāwari nā te mea kua pūhia mātau ki te waewae. Me hanga anō e tātau taua whakawhirinaki." Mō tōna wāhanga, i kī a Tēnā Davie me pūataata ake te AO me te "iti ake te māhaki".

title: Rare snow rollers spotted in field near Marlborough
summary: Kua hopukina ki ngā whakaahua tētahi tītohunga māori āhua nei kua hurihia ngā wīra hukarere.
text: E ono ngā "takahuri hukarere" i kitea e Kōrero Bayliss i Wiltshire. I kī a ia i kite ia i a rātau i roto i tētahi āpure nāna, ā, i te tuatahi i whakaaro ia he mea hanga tangata rātou, engari kāore he tapuwae. E whakaarohia ana ka hangaia ngā pēre i te wā e tino pai ana te hau ki te pupuhi i ngā wāhanga hukarere, kia nui ake ai te hukarere i te huarahi. I kī te kaimahi ngahere a Tēnā Bayliss, e 51, "kāore anō ia kia kite i tētahi mea pēnei i mua" ā, i tana whakatata atu ka "kite i te rā i waenganui, ā, kāore rātau i mōhiotia". I hopukina e ia nga atahanga i muri noa iho i te whitinga o te rā i te Hātarei. I kī te kairangi o TE WĀ, a Īna Fergusson, he "tino ātaahua" te tino tika o ngā here kia taea ai te hanga i ngā takahuri hukarere. Tērā pea ka pīrangi koe: "He whakaahua tino ātaahua ēnei o tētahi tītohunga huarere tino ātaahua - e kiia nei ko ngā takahuri hukarere, ko ngā pēre hukarere rānei. He tino waimarie a Kōrero ki te kite i ēnei," te kī a Tēnā Fergusson. "Me tika tonu ngā here kia puta ai ngā takahuri hukarere: he maunga māeneene, kāore i te maheretia, pērā i tēnei take e tata ana ki Marlborough, ka whakarei ake i te wā e hangaia ana. " He apa hukarere angiangi, i noho ki runga i te hukapapa tīariari, ā, kāore e piri ana, he tino nui ki te hanganga o ēnei rerekētanga māori." Mēnā he kaha rawa te hau, he ngoikore rawa rānei, he kikī rawa rānei te hukarere, kāore he takahuri hukarere. Ko te āhua o ngā pōro hukarere e puta mai ana he pēre heihei, he tōnati, he tākai Huitene rānei, ā, ka taea te hākoha ki roto. .

title: David Bowie: Ko te hopukanga studio tuatahi 'i kitea i roto i te kete parāoa'
summary: I muri i te kitenga i roto i tētahi kete parāoa tawhito, ka tautuhia te hopukanga studio tuatahi o Rawiri Bowie ki te hokonga i muri i te kitenga i roto i tētahi kete parāoa tahito.
text: Ko te rīpene tauira o te tau 1963, i whakakāhoretia e Decca, e whakaatu ana i tētahi Bowie 16 tau - e mōhiotia ana ko David Jones - e waiata ana i a Au Kore Rawa i Moemoeā me te pēne tuatahi o The Konrads. Ko te rīpene, e tūmanakohia ana kia tiki i te £10,000, e hokona ana e te kaipatu pahū o te pēne, a Rawiri Hadfield, nāna i hura i roto i tōna tiketike. I whakaahuatia e Auctioneer Paul Fairweather te rīpene hei "hopukanga nui, tino ahurei". I kī a ia e tuku ana i ngā mōhiotanga hou ki a Bowie hei "kaiwhakatangitangi hou e haere ana ki te whetū tino pai." Ka hopukina e te hopukanga a Bowie, e mōhiotia ana ā muri ake ko tētahi o ngā whakamātautau nui o te pūoro, i te wā e noho mōhio ana a ia ki tana aronga pūoro. Ko Bowie te kaiwaiata o The Konrads, engari i whakatauria me waiata e ia ngā waiata ārahi mō te rīpene. I kī a Hadfield: "Kāore a Rawiri i hiahia kia noho hei kaiwaiata i tēnei wā, i arotahi tōna ngākau me tōna hinengaro ki te noho hei kaitākaro saxophone karaehe o te ao. " I tono mai to mātau māngai, a Erika Easton, nāna hoki i whakahaere ngā Rolling Stones, kia mahi i tētahi whakaaturanga kia taea ai e ia te whakamātau i tētahi whakamātautau i Decca. "I whakatau mātou ka mahia e mātou ētahi taonga kita me tētahi waiata taketake. " I te tuatahi ka whakakāhoretia mātau e Decca, engari i te mutunga ka homai e rātau he whakamātautau ki a mātau i muri mai i taua tau, ko te kaiwaiata o Roger Ferris te reo ārahi, ā, ka waiata a Rawiri i ngā hākoritanga pūrua." I muri tata mai i te whakamātautau, ka mahue i a Bowie te pēne, ā, kāore i hainatia te pēne. I te mutunga ka hoki mai a ia hei kaiwaiata takitahi e ono tau i muri mai - ka huri i tōna ingoa i te tau 1966 i te wā i whiwhi ai a Davy Jones o The Monkees' ki te whetū. I hainatia ki Mercury Records, ka tukua e ia te Space Oddity - he mea tūturu i runga i tana pukaemi tuarua i tapaina e ia anō - i te tau 1969. I puta mai tōna hua huri noa i te tau 1972 The Rise and Fall of Ziggy Stardust and the Spiders From Mars. I muri i tēnei angitu, i whakaputaina anōtia a Space Oddity i raro i ngā pūkete RCA i te tau 1975, ā, ka noho ko te tau tuatahi o te UK o Bowie. Ko tōna āhuatanga toi huri tonu ka hanga anō i ngā āhuatanga ki te ahua, te ira tangata, te pūoro me te ahurea. I mate te whetū whānau o Brixton i te mate pukupuku i te Hānuere 2016, e rua rā i muri i te putanga i tōna rā whānau 69 o tana pukaemi studio 25, Blackstar. Ko te hopukanga hou a Hatfield he wāhanga o ngā whakamaharatanga, tae atu ki ngā reta, ngā pire, ngā puka tāpui, ngā whakaahua me ngā tātuhi whakatairanga mai i te mahi tōmua o Bowie. Kua tautuhia te kohinga kia haere ki raro i te hama i Omega Auctions, i Newton-le-Willows, i te marama o Mahuru. Whāia mātou i Facebook, i Twitter @BBCNewsEnts, i Instagram rānei i bbcnewsents. Mēnā he huatau pūrākau tāu, īmēra entertainment.news@bbc.co.uk.

title: Coronavirus: Ko te hinganga tuawhā o ia wiki i roto i nga mate o Scottish
summary: Kua hinga te maha o ngā tāngata e mate ana i te coronavirus i Pākehā mō te whā wiki whai muri.
text: Ko ngā whika i whakaputaina e National Records of Scotland (NRS) i whakaatu e 230 ngā mate i te wiki e mutu ana i te 24 o Me. He 105 iti iho tēnei i te wiki o mua, ā, ka kawea mai te tapeke o ngā mate mai i te tīmatanga o te tīmatanga ki te 3,779. Ko te Minita Tuatahi a Nicola Sturgeon e tūmanakohia ana kia iti ake te whakangāwari i ngā rāhuitanga raka o te whenua i te Tāite. I whakaaturia e ngā whika NRS ko te 46% o ngā mate 3,779 i pā mai ki ngā kāinga tiaki, i te 47% i ngā hōhipera me te 7% i te kāinga. Care homes continued to account for the majority of deaths recorded last week - 54% - but the percentage has been falling in recent weeks from a high of 60% four weeks ago. A, ko te maha o ngā mate i roto i ngā kāinga tiaki i haurua i tērā wiki, mai i te 124 ki te 62. Ko te katoa, e toru hauwhā o te hunga kua mate i te coronavirus kua 75 neke atu rānei te pakeke. I uru te Coronavirus ki te 19% o nga mate katoa i Scotland i tera wiki, kua eke ki te taumata o te 36% i te mutunga o Aperira. He iti ake hoki ngā mate i ngā mate romahā (-39), ngā āhuatanga rere (-31) me te mate mate me te Alzheimer (-11) i whakaritea ki te wawaenga mō tēnei wā o te tau. I kii te minita tuatahi ko nga ahuatanga tatauranga i hoatu he "taunga mo te tumanako" i mua i te whakaiti i te raka coronavirus o Scotland. I tāpiri mai a ia: "Ko tā mātou katoa i mahi ai i tēnei wā, kua rerekē. Kua whai wāhi te katoa ki te whakapōturi i te horahanga o te huaketo, ki te pare i te NHS me te whakaora ora. "I a tātau e tīmata ana ki te puta mai i te raka ka hira ake te mahi tahi." Kua whakahētia te kāwanatanga o Pākehā e ngā rōpū ātete i ngā rā tata nei i muri i te putanga mai neke atu i te 900 ngā tūroro "tuku takaware" i nekehia mai i ngā hōhipera ki ngā kāinga tiaki i ngā rā o mua o te raruraru me te kore whakamātauria mō te huaketo. I kī te Hēkeretari Hauora a Jeane Freeman i te mutunga wiki e whakapono ana ia me arotake me pēhea te whakahaere i te tiaki pāpori i Pākehā i muri i te tūkinotanga i puta mai i te pakarutanga o te coronavirus. I kī atu a Ms Sturgeon ki te Pāremata o Pirihitini e "tino hiahia ana ia kia arotakea, uiui, karangatia tāu e hiahia ana, ki ngā āhuatanga katoa o tēnei raruraru." I tāpiritia e te minita tuatahi: "He tino hira tēnā mō te haepapatanga, engari mō te ako i ngā akoranga mō te wā heke mai - ā, ka whakaurua te āhuatanga i roto i ngā kāinga tiaki. " Engari i tēnei wā ko taku arotahi ki te mahi tonu i ngā mea katoa e hiahiatia ana e tātau mō te toenga o tēnei raruraru. "Kāore anō mātou kia puta i tēnei raruraru - kāore anō mātou kia puta i tēnei wāhanga o tēnei raruraru - nā reira ko taku kawenga hei minita tuatahi kia arotahi mātou ki ngā whakataunga e taka tonu ana kia tangohia." 'Uiui tūmatanui katoa' I kī te kaiārahi Rangatira o Pākehā o Jackson Carlaw he "tāwai ā-motu" te āhuatanga i ngā kāinga tiaki o Pākehā. I tāpiri mai a ia: "E mōhio ana mātou i whakahokia auautia ngā tūroro pakeke ki ngā kāinga tiaki mai i te hōhipera me te kore whakamātautau coronavirus, ā, tērā pea ka āwhina ki ngā rau mate. " Mā te uiui tūmatanui katoa anake e tuku aua whakautu me te whakahau i tēnei kāwanatanga SNP kia mā mō tana mahi ki te tuku i ngā tūroro urutā ki te whakaranu ki ngā tāngata mōrearea rawa i roto i tō tātau iwi." I whakakitea e Ms Sturgeon tētahi "mahere huarahi" e whā wāhanga i tērā wiki e whai ana ki te tīmata anō i te iwi i a ia e pēhi ana i te horahanga o te huaketo. Ko te wāhanga tuatahi e tūmanakohia ana kia whakaurua i te Tāite, ā, ka kite i ngā tāngata e whakaaetia ana kia tūtaki ki waho me ngā tangata o tētahi atu whare, kia rua mita te wehe. Ka taea hoki te hoatu i ētahi ngohe o waho pēnei i te korowha, te hī ika, te tēnehi me ngā peihana te rama kākāriki kia tīmata anō, tae atu ki ngā mahi o waho pēnei i te ahuwhenua me te ngahere. Ā, ka taea hoki e te tangata te noho, te rā rānei i ngā pāka me ētahi atu wāhi tuwhera, ā, tērā pea ka whakatuwhera anō ngā pūtahi māra me ngā pūkenga tukurua. Ka haere tahi te whakangāwari me te whakarewatanga o te kaupapa aroturuki hoapā hou a Pākehā, arā, ko te tikanga ko te tangata kua whakapā tata ki tētahi tangata e whakamātau pai ana mō te huaketo, me wehe i a ia anō mō te 14 rā.

title: Coronavirus: Ka whakatārewatia e US te haerenga mai i Paratira mō ngā manene
summary: Kua whakaritea e te US he rāhuitanga haere ki ngā tangata whenua kē kua tae ki Paratira i ngā rā 14 kua hipa.
text: Kātahi anō ka noho te iwi o Amerika ki te Tonga hei wāhiwera nui tuarua o te ao mō ngā kēhi coronavirus. Kua tuhia e Brazil neke atu i te 360,000 nga keehi, i panuitia e te minita hauora o te whenua i te Rātapu, neke atu i te 22,000 nga tangata kua mate i te huaketo. I kī tētahi kaikawe kōrero o te Whare Mā ka āwhina ngā rāhuitanga ki te whakarite kia kaua ngā kēhi hou e kawea mai ki te US. "Mā te mahi o tēnei rā e āwhina ki te whakarite kia kaua ngā tangata whenua kē i Paratira e noho hei pūtake o ētahi atu mate i tō mātou whenua," te kī a Te Hēkeretari Pēhi o te Whare Mā, a Kayleigh McEnany i roto i tētahi kōrero. Ka whakahētia taua tāurunga ki ngā tāngata kāore i Amerika i Paratira i roto i ngā wiki e rua i mua i tā rātou tono tomokanga ki a Mātau. Kaore te rāhuitanga e pā ki te hokohoko i waenganui i nga whenua e rua. Ka pā te whakatārewatanga i te 28 Me i te 23:59 EDT (03:59 GMT). Kāore te ārai haere e pā ki ngā tangata whenua o Amerika, ki te hoa rānei, ki te matua, ki te kaitiaki ā-ture, ki te tamaiti rānei a tētahi tangata whenua o Amerika, tangata noho tūturu rānei, me te nuinga o ngā tuakana i raro iho i te 21 tau. "Ko te kaha o te tarenga o te huaketo kāore i kitea e ngā tangata kua whakapokea e rapu ana ki te tomo ki Te Hononga o Amerika mai i [Paratira] e whakawehi ana i te haumarutanga o tā mātou pūnaha waka me ngā hanganga me te haumarutanga ā-motu," te kī a te raupapa whakatārewatanga i whakaputaina e te Whare Mā i te Rātapu. I mua o te Rātapu, ka kī atu te kaitohutohu haumarutanga ā-Motu o te Whare Mā, a Robert O'Brien, ki a KOE "Anga atu ki te Iwi" ka tūmanakohia he rāhuitanga haere mō Paratira. "E tūmanako ana mātou he rangitahi tēnā, engari nā te āhuatanga i Parīhi, ka mahi mātou i ngā hipanga katoa e hiahiatia ana hei pare i te iwi o Amerika," te kī a Tēnā O'Pirihi. I tāpiri mai a ia "ka titiro mātou ki ērā atu whenua i runga i te whenua-ki-te-whenua". I te tīmatanga o tēnei wiki i huatau ai te Perehitini o Amerika o Donald Trump e whakaaro ana a ia ki te whakahau i tētahi ārai haere mai i Parīhi. I tēnei wā ko te US e ārahi ana i te ao i roto i ngā kēhi coronavirus. Neke atu i te 1.6 miriona ngā kēhi e mōhiotia ana, ā, kua tata ki te 100,000 ngā mate e honoa ana ki te huaketo. Ko te pānuitanga o te Rātapu te rāhuitanga haere hou i whakaritea e te US ki te whawhai i te horahanga o te huaketo. Ko ngā tangata whenua kē kātahi anō ka haere ki Haina, Irana, te rohe o Rōpū Pākehā, te Hononga o Ingarangi me te Whenua o Aiarangi kua āraia kētia kia kaua e uru ki a Mātau. Kātahi anō ka whakaae a Kānata me te US ki te whakaroa atu i te katinga o to rāua rohe tiritiri ki ngā haerenga kāore i te tino nui. He aha te āhuatanga puta noa i Parīhi? Kātahi anō ka mau a Parīhi i a Rūhia e pā ana ki ngā kēhi o te huaketo e mōhiotia ana. Kua auau te ākiri a Perehitini Jair Bolsonaro i ngā mōrea i puta mai i te huaketo. Kua tāruatia te maha o ngā mate i Paratira ia rua wiki, i whakaritea ki ia rua marama i UK, e whā marama i Wīwī, e rima marama i Itari. Kua whakatūpato ngā tohunga he teitei ake pea te whika tūturu nā te kore whakamātautau. Ko te pikinga o te mate me ngā mate i Paratira e mārama ana te māharahara ki ērā atu o te ao, engari kāore a Perehitini Jair Bolsonaro e whakaatu ana i ngā tohu o te tino nui. I te Rātapu, ka puta anō a ia, e whakaranu ana ki ngā rau rau kaitautoko i Paratira - ā, kāore anō ia i te mau hīpoki. Te āhua nei he nui ake te mau o Perehitini Bolsonaro ki te whawhai i ngā whawhai tōrangapū - kei te anga atu a ia ki ngā whakapae whakararuraru tōrangapū hei pare i tōna whānau - i te titiro me pēhea te whakahaere i te mate hauora tōrino o te whenua. I ēnei rā torutoru kua whakaaturia mai ētahi pono weriweri i konei. Ehara i te mea kua noho a Paratira hei tētahi o ngā pūkenga o te mate coronavirus, engari e mārama ana kāore e taea e te perehitini me tana tīma - te hiahia rānei - ki te ārahi i te whenua ki waho. Kaore e kore tēnei whakataunga a Perehitini Pu, he tangata e mīharo ana a Perehitini Bolsonaro i ngā wā katoa, ka wero - engari ko te pātai, ka mahia e ia tētahi mea hei huri i te huarahi a te kaiārahi o Pārihia?

title: Giant's Causeway: 71-year-old family shop set to close
summary: Kua hokona e te whānau McConaghy ngā taonga whakamahara i te Giant's Causeway i County Antrim mō ngā tekau tau.
text: Nā Sara GirvinBBC News NI kaipānui ki te raki o te rāwhiti Engari, i muri i te 71 tau, ākuanei ka mutu taua umanga. Kua whakapeka te National Trust, nāna te pae whakamaharatanga a McConaghy, ki te whakahōu i te rīhi o te toa i muri i te paunga o Whiringa 2017. E hiahia ana te rōpū whakahaere ki te hanga i ētahi atu whare taonga ki reira. I kī te rangatira o te toa, a Tommy McConaghy, he tino ohorere te whakataunga ki tōna whānau. "I waho i te kikorangi," tana kī. "I whakaarahia ahau i konei. I te wā e toa ana tōku whaea i raro iho i te huarahi, i mahi tahi ahau i roto i te toa i a ia e 10 tau te pakeke. "I mahi tahi taku tamāhine me au i a ia e tata ana ki te 10 tau, nā reira he ngaromanga nui noa iho i muri i ngā tau maha." Kua tīmataria e Tēnā McConaghy he petihana ki te whakataunga kia kaua e whakahōu i tana rīhi, ā, kua tīmata hoki ia ki te whakamatautau i roto i ngā kōti, engari he nui rawa te utu o taua tukanga ki a ia ki te haere tonu. "Tērā pea i toa mātau, engari he nui rawa te mōrea ki te tango," tana kī. "Tērā pea ka ngaro i a mātau te nui o te moni, ā, kāore e taea e mātou tēnā. " Ko te mea whakamutunga e hiahia ana mātau ki te mahi ko te kati, ā, ina puta tērā, kia tino pono, he rā pouri, he rā pouri. "I whakaaro ahau ka haere aunoa tēnei ki taku tamāhine, i muri i te haerenga o taku wahine me māua, engari e kore e puta. " He pai ki a au te tūtaki i ngā tāngata mai i te ao katoa, engari ko te mutunga o tētahi wā, kātahi anō ka oti mō mātau." I kī atu tētahi kaikawe kōrero o te National Trust ki te AO he whāiti te rōpū ki te wāhi e taea ai te hanga whare taonga hou, nā te tūnga Tuku iho o te Ao o Giantway. I roto i tētahi kōrero, ka kī te kaikōrero: "I tukuna e te National Trust tētahi tono whakarite mō te huringa o te whakamahinga o te mokowā e pātata ana ki te Hōtēra Causeway, kia taea ai te whakarato i ngā pūkenga huri pēpi me ētahi atu tāne, wahine, āheitanga hoki. "He urupare tēnei ki te nui o ngā tau manuhiri me ngā tono kia wātea ngā pūkenga i waho o ngā haora tūwhera o te pokapū manuhiri. " Mai i te tau 2011, kua piki ake ngā tau manuhiri i te Pae Tuku iho o te Ao mai i te 533,000 manuhiri ki te 1,000,000 manuhiri i te tau 2017. "The National Trust acknowledges the contribution that the McConaghy family has made at the site and confirms the decision to submit the planning application was not taken lightly, but with good intention to address increasing visitor pressures." E whakaaro ana a Tommy McConaghy ki te whakapau i ngā wiki tata nei ki te hoko i ngā kararehe ka taea e ia i te toa. Ka katia e ia ngā tatau o tana toa, me te whitu tekau tau o te hītori whānau, i te mutunga o tēnei marama.

title: UK 'kāore i te pupuri i te tautohe ki te tango i ngā tamariki hunga whakaruru' - Lord Dubs
summary: Kei te mōrearea tonu o rātau ora i roto i ngā taraka, kua whakatūpato tētahi hoa Mahi i mawhiti i a Nazi Tiamana.
text: I kī a Ariki Dubs, i haere mai ki Ingarangi i runga i te hōtaka Kindertransport mō ngā tamariki Hurai, kāore tētahi tangata i tae mai ki UK i raro i tētahi kaupapa i taurangitia i Me. E kī ana ko ngā hunga whakaruru tamariki takitahi i rēhitatia ki Wīwī, Itari, Kariki rānei i mua i te 20 o Poutāpeta ka taea te noho anō ki te UK. I kī te Tari Kāinga e haere ana te mahi i runga i te kaupapa. Engari i kī a Ariki Dubs, ki tāna i mōhio ai, kāore he tamariki i mauria mai ki UK i raro i ngā whakaritenga i kīa mai. "Ināianei kua mutu te taupānga, kua tae ki te wā ka haere tonu rātau," tana kī. 'Tamariki e mōrearea ana' "Kāore anō tētahi tangata kia puta mai i runga i tēnei kaupapa. Ko ngā tāngata anake kua puta mai i a au e mōhio ana ko ngā rangatahi i tūtaki ahau i Calais kātahi ka tae ki Ingarangi i muri i tētahi taraka," tana kī. "Kei te mōrearea ēnei tamariki. Ko ngā whakaaturanga katoa kei te mōrearea ētahi o rātau ki te hara me te kairautanga." I whakatūpato hoki a Ariki Dubs e haere mai ana ngā tamariki rerenga ki Ingarangi e "iti iho te manawanui" i ngā marama tata nei: "He tino mīharo. He tino pōrearea, kua totohu mātau ki te āhua o ta mātau mahi ki ētahi atu tāngata." I muri i te whakatū i te pēhanga tōrangapū, tae atu ki ngā tuarā o Tory. I whakaae te kāwanatanga i te Hānuere ki te mau i ētahi tamaiti mokemoke i Awherika ki te Raki me te Rāwhiti o Waenganui. Engari i whakakāhoretia e ia ngā waea kia whakaae ki ngā tamariki e 3,000 i tae ki Uropi nā te mea kāore i pīrangi ki te whakahauhau i ētahi atu kia haere i te haerenga "whakamate". 'Kāore he mahi' e te Ariki Dubs, me ngā aroha o Citizens UK me Hēpa UK, e tautoko ana i tētahi whakarākeitanga ki te Pire Tamariki me te Mahi Pāpori, e tautohetohetia ana i te Pāremata i te Mane, ki te pēhi i ngā minita mō ngā whakaūnga nui ake. Kua whakatūpato ngā aroha kāore ngā kaunihera e hoatu ana i tētahi kāinga ki ngā tamariki rerenga i ngā whakaūtanga o te pūtea kāwanatanga mo te wā roa e hiahiatia ana e rātou. I kī te Pīhopa o Durham Paul Butler, he kaikorero mō Citizens UK: "Ahakoa i hari mātau i te whakaaetanga a te kāwanatanga ki te hīkoi me te whakanoho anō i ngā tamariki tūruru mai i Uropi, e pouri ana mātau kāore a rātau kupu i te mahi. "Me kaua tēnei tono wāhi tapu ki ngā tamariki tautahi e whakaaetia kia hinga nā ngā tikanga here me ngā tapahi." I kī a Lily Caprani, o Hēpa UK, ka haere tonu te hunga whakaruru tamariki ki te "noho mau tonu mō ngā marama i roto i ngā puni kino mai i Kariki ki Wīwī". Ka karanga a ia ki te kāwanatanga kia "mahi wawe hei whakatere ake i ēnei hātepe". I kī te Tari Kāinga kua tukua ki te kawe mai i ngā tamariki rerenga mōrearea mai i Uropi ki te UK, e ai ki te Ture Nekeneke 2016. I kī tētahi kōrero e kōrero ana te kāwanatanga ki ngā mana ā rohe ki te whakaū i te kaha e wātea ana, kia tino mōhio ai kei te noho "ngā pūnaha tautoko tika". I te kōrero hoki ngā kaiwhakahaere o UK ki te pokapū rerenga o te UN, te UNHCR, me ngā kāwanatanga Itari, Kariki, Wīwī hoki hei whakatere ake i te tukanga.

title: Ngā aronui MLM i te UK: Ko ngā umanga ātaahua 'ā-karakia' i roto i ō DM
summary: E 21 tau a Faye Aranga, a, e tiaki ana i tana tama e toru marama te pakeke i tana whiwhinga i te karere Instagram.
text: Nā Kirsty GrantNewsbeat reporter "E, kua titiro ahau ki tō whāngai, ā, ki taku whakaaro ka tino pai koe mō tēnei wāhi pakihi hou kei a au!" I te pēpi, kāore a Faye i te moe nui. "Kāore i tino mārama tōku māhunga. I whakaaro noa ahau ka taea e au te mahi moni." I hainatia e ia ki te hoko i ngā hua ātaahua me ngā hua e pā ana ki te hauora mō te kamupene mākete taumata-maha (MLM) Arbonne, ā, ka uru hoki tōna tuahine. E kī ana a Faye i pau moni i a ia ki te hoko hua mai i te kamupene, engari kāore i hokona e ia. "There was almost any training on the products, it was all about how to recruit people and how to get people to join your team," she says. A, na te waitohu i tōna tuahine i pēnei ai ia i "he kaiwhaiwhai e tāwhai ana i tana pārurenga". "I muri iho ka wehi ahau nā te mea i whakapaua e au tēnei moni ki te kore rawa." I te pātaitanga a Faye ki te tangata nāna ia i tono mehemea ka taea e ia te arotahi ki te hoko, kaua ki te tono, ka kī a ia kua whakaweto a ia. "I pēnei a ia, 'kāo, kei te hoko hua mātou, engari me whakatika tō tīma kia taea ai te hoko tahi me te whakatairanga'." E kī ana a Faye ko te "wā anake i kīia ai koe kia whakararuraru i ngā hua tūturu" mēnā me hoko e ngā tāngata teitei ake i roto i te umanga ētahi atu hua kia whiwhi whakatairanga. Ki tēhea, i tonoa ngā tāngata pēnei i a Faye kia hokona rātou. E kī ana a Faye i tangohia e ia he moni whakatārewa huamoni tiketike hai mahi pēnā. I tere tana nama, ā, e kī ana i pau i a ia te £600 i tōna wā i te kamupene, ā, e £12 noa iho tana whakahoki. I muri iho, ka rongo a ia i "pāngia", ā, ka tāia ki tāna e whakapono ana he "aronui tara". I kī atu a Arbonne ki te AO e "tautoko ana i ngā paerewa tiketike o te taparenga" ā, kāore e whakaae ana ki "ngā mahi tinihanga, kāore i te tika, i te ture rānei o tētahi momo". I whakapā atu hoki tētahi o a rātau kaihoko ki a Charlotte Dickerson, e 22 tau te pakeke. He hoa tawhito tērā mōna, nāna i kī e kimi ana ia i ngā tāngata kia hono ki tana tīma me te hoko i "ngā hua whakapaipai vegan me te whakawiri". I kite a Charlotte he aha ia i whakaarotia ai he pai ki te tūranga. He vegan a ia, kātahi anō ka puta ia, ā, e kimi mahi ana. Kāore a ia i tino mōhio ki te utu i te utu waitohu £30 me te hoko hua e £200 hei tīmata i a ia. Na te moni i haumitia, i hiahia a Charlotte ki te ako anō mō te whakapaipai, me te whakangungu me pēhea te hoko. Engari e kī ana a ia i ngaro i a ia te £800 i roto i te whā marama. I kiia a Faye rāua ko Charlotte kia haere ki tētahi hui whakangungu. I to rātau taenga atu, ehara i te mea i tūmanakohia e rātau. "Ko te huarahi pai rawa atu e taea ai e au te whakaahua i taua rā he hui karakia," te kī a Charlotte ki a Newsbeat. E maumahara ana a ia he rangatū o ngā kaikōrero e tuku kōrero ana, me te nui o ngā "kīanga whakahauhau me ngā kīanga whakahauhau". "Kāore ō rātou pānga ki ngā hua. E pā ana rātau ki te karere mātao i ngā tāngata me pēhea te tono." E kī ana a Charlotte i tētahi wā ka kīa te katoa kia whakatika ki te mahi i tētahi ngaru Mehiko. I tētahi atu wā ka kīa rātau kia tū ki runga me te hamama: "Ka whiwhi ahau i tētahi Mēneti mā," tana kī. " Ko ngā whakapūmautanga tōrunga katoa me te whakaaturanga e whakahauhautia ana e rātau he huarahi ki te whakapae i a koe," tana kī mai ki a mātau. "Ki te tīmata koe ki te kite kāore koe i te mahi moni, e kī ana rātau nāu te hē. E kī ana rātau kei te hoatu koe i aua whakaaro ki te ao nui, ā, ka whakahokia e te ao nui tāu e whakaaro nei. "Ka nekehia e ia te tangata i te mea kei te ngaro i a rātau ngā rau pauna." He aha te MLM? He mea nui kia mōhio koe ki te rerekētanga i waenga i ngā aronui tara me ngā aronui mākete taumata-maha. Ko ngā aronui tara he umanga e tono ana i ngā tāngata ko tā rātou mahi he whakauru i ētahi atu ki roto i te aronui, kaua e hoko i tētahi hua, ratonga rānei. Ko te tikanga o te tauira pakihi he torutoru noa iho ngā tāngata i runga e whiwhi moni ana, ā, ko te nuinga nui i te "raro o te tara" ka iti noa iho te mahi. He ture kore mana rātau i te UK. He hanganga ōrite te mākete taumata-maha, engari he hua kei roto. Ka taea e te hua te aha. Mō Arbonne, ko te nuinga o ngā taonga tiaki kiri me ngā taonga ātaahua. I muri i te rā whakangungu, ka mātao nga waewae o Charlotte. I tawhiti atu te Mēneti mā i tōna pono, ā, i hokona noa iho e ia ngā hua ki ētahi tāngata, tae atu ki ngā mema o te whānau. I tētahi wā, ka kī atu a ia ki te tangata nāna ia i tono kia arotahi ia ki te hoko i ngā hua i te whakairi karere ki te tiki hoa. E kī ana a ia i kī atu ōna rangatira ki a ia ko te mea tino nui ko "te wā pakihi" ki te utu i ētahi atu tāngata. "I tino rerekē ahau ki te tono i tētahi tangata nā te mea kāore anō ahau kia whai hua. He tino hē, he kino hoki te kōrero ki tētahi atu he aha te wāhi pakihi whakamīharo, i te mea kāore anō mōku." Na te nui o ngā moni e puta mai ana i a rāua pūkete, ā, kāore he mea e haere ana, he uaua ki te kite he aha a Charlotte rāua ko Faye i noho ai ki a ia mō te roanga o a rāua. "He nui rawa ngā kōrero ngāwari, whakahauhau," te kī a Charlotte. "Ka whakamahi rātou i te reo tino rāwekeweke, e mōhio ana koe, ko te whakapau moni ki tō pāhi he mea e whai hua ana hoki ki a koe." Faye says she's concerned people struggling in the pandemic might have been tempted to sign up to schemes like this. He aha te kōrero a Arbonne? I kī atu te kamupene ki te AO me haina e ōna kaitohutohu tētahi "whakaaetanga pakihi whānui" me te piri ki tētahi "waehere matatika ā-roto pākaha". I tāpiritia: "Ka whakahaere tā mātou Tīma Paerewa Tikanga Pakihi i ngā wātū whakangungu auau me ngā kaitohutohu takitahi o Arbonne, ka aroturuki tonu i ā rātou mahi pakihi kia ū ki ā mātou kaupapahere, ā, ka mahi wawe mēnā ka puta mai ngā ngohe pātai. " E tono ana mātou i te tangata e whakaaro ana he wheako tōraro tā rātou kia toro hāngai mai ki a mātou kia tūhura anō ai mātou me te urupare ki te hiahiatia, tae atu ki te tuku whakahoki moni ki ngā tangata i tohutorotia e koe, mēnā e hiahiatia ana." E mahi ana a Jessica Mellor i FM World, he MLM e hoko ana i ngā kakara. E kī ana a ia kia kaua a Faye rāua ko Charlotte e "whakapoke i ngā umanga katoa ki te paraihe kotahi". The 27-year-old tells Newsbeat that since lockdown, the number of people joining her team "has risen by 200%" but says recruiting isn't FM World's focus. "Kāore koe e ūkui i ngā tāngata kua ngaro ā rātou mahi - ka hoatu noa iho e koe te wā ki reira," tana kī. "Ka hoatu noa e koe ki a rātau te wā ki te mahi moni." E kī ana a ia he torutoru marama noa iho tana hoko i ngā kakara i mua i tana tīmatanga ki te tono, ā, e tohe ana ehara i te mea mō te tono tāngata i raro i a koe. He rite tonu ngā whakairinga o tana whārangi Instagram e kī ana ki ngā kaiārahi ka taea e rātau te whiwhi i ngā mano pauna, hei rangatira mō rātou ake me te "huri i [tō rātou] oranga" mēnā ka waitohu rātou mā a ia. E kī ana te paetukutuku a Jessica he tīma tāna e 45,000 tāngata, ā, ko ētahi e whiwhi ana ki te £70,000 i te marama. Ka whiwhi ngā tāngata i roto i tana tīma i ngā "piro" ina hokona e rātou, e haere ana ki tētahi hua rōpū - i tiria ki a ia. "Mēnā i whakaaturia e au taku waea ki a koe, he karere kua tukuna mai e te tangata ki a au pēnei, 'Jess kua hurihia e koe tōku oranga'." He hapori 'anti-MLM' Mēnā i nui ake te rangahau a Faye, a Charlotte rānei i mua i te hononga, ka tere te kite i tētahi hapori "anti-MLM" e tipu ana i runga i te ipurangi. E kī ana a Faye: "I kī mai rātau kia kaua ahau e titiro ki te whakahē i ēnei aronui i runga i te ipurangi, nā te mea nā ngā tāngata kawa i whakamātau i te umanga, ā, kāore i pai mō rātou." Ko Charlotte tētahi o ērā ināianei i roto i te hapori tuihono anti-MLM. He maha ngā kaihanga ihirangi ārai-MLM e hanga ataata ana e kōrero ana mō te ahurea "pai paitini" i roto i ngā kamupene MLM. E kī ana a Charlotte koia te mea i pana atu ai ia i te umanga. I tana haerenga, ka koa a ia ki te wātea i ngā karere auau i roto i ngā rōpū WhatsApp o te kamupene. "Kāore e whakaaetia he tūkinotanga i roto i aua kōrerorero rōpū. " Kāore rātau e hiahia kia kōrero tētahi tangata i tētahi mea e whakatō ana i tētahi kākano rangirua, e mōhio ai ētahi atu tāngata ehara rātou i te mea uaua ki te mahi moni." He tino rerekē te wheako o Jessica. "Kāore he tangata e hāngai ana ki a koe, e kōrero ana rānei ki a koe me aha tāu e mahi ai," tana kī. Ka whakamāramatia e ia kāore ōna kirimana i tana hainatanga ki FM World. "He wātea te hono, ki te kore au e pīrangi, he wātea ki te haere." E kī ana a ia kua whakaaetia e tana mahi ki te hoko i tōna whare moemoeā, ā, he maha nga tau ka taea e ia te manaaki i tana tama ki ngā hararei. I whakapā atu mātou ki FM World, engari kāore rātou i urupare mai ki a mātou. He kaitohutohu pūtea whaiaro a Kia Commodore. She says joining an MLM is a very risky financial decision, and usually only pay off for those few who make it to the top. Kia says recruitment messages will often be "very vague in their wording". "Ina karere ēnei tāngata ki a koe, he maha ngā wā e kore rātau e kōrero ki a koe he aha te wā. " Mēnā kua haere mai tētahi ki a koe, ā, kāore koe i te mōhio mēnā he tika, hoatu he Google ngāwari. Ka puta ake ngā MLM matua, ā, ka kite koe i ngā arotakenga, ā, ka taea e koe tō whakatau mai i reira." Ko tana tohutohu matua ko te "tū me te manawanui". "Ki te kī tētahi 'waitohu ināianei', kī atu ki a rātou me mahi koe i tō rangahau i te tuatahi. Tērā pea ko taua takaware iti te rerekētanga i waenganui i a koe e nama ana me te tiaki i a koe i te ngaronga moni." Whāia Newsbeat i Instagram, Facebook, Twitter me YouTube. Whakarongo ki Newsbeat live i te 12:45 me te 17:45 i ngā rā o te wiki - whakarongo anō rānei ki konei.

title: I katia e ngā kaihoko e 2,870 ngā pātaka i te haurua tuatahi o te 2019
summary: Tata ki te 16 ngā toa e kati ana i ia rā i te hanganga anō o ngā kaihoko i ā rātou umanga me ētahi atu hokohoko hokohoko tuihono.
text: I katia e tētahi pātaka kupenga 1,234 i runga i ngā tiriti tiketike e 500 o Ingarangi i te hawhe tuatahi o te tau, e ai ki te rangahau a Te Kamupene Raraunga Paetata. Kua piki ake tērā mai i te 1,123 i te wā kotahi i tērā tau, ā, ko te teitei rawa mai i te tīmatanga o te uiuinga i te tau 2010. I kite ngā kaihoko ahua i ngā whakapeka nui rawa atu i taua wā, whai muri i ngā wharekai, ngā māngai pānga me ngā pāpara. Heoi anō, he nui ake ngā whakatuwheratanga o ngā kaihoko me ngā karapu hākinakina me te hauora. I kī a Lisa Hooker, te kaiārahi mākete kiritaki i Te Wānanga: "Ko te whakapeka o ngā tau pātaka i te hawhe tuatahi o te 2019 e whakaatu ana kāore anō kia tukua ngā huarahi huri e hoko ana te tangata me ngā pēhanga utu e pā ana ki ngā tohutūmahi o te Tiriti Tiketike." I kī a ia me nui ake te haumi a ngā kaihoko ki te hanga pātaka "e hāngai ana ki ngā kiritaki o tēnei rā", engari i tāpiritia e hiahiatia ana e "ngā momo tohutūmahi hōu, rerekē hoki" hei whakakī i te mokowā wātea. E ai ki a PwC, e 1,634 ngā pātaka i whakatuwheratia i roto i ngā marama e ono ki te mutunga o Pipiri - he 4% te pikinga i te wā kotahi i tērā tau - i te wā e 2,868 ngā pātaka i kati. Ka titiro te raraunga ki ngā mekameka hokohoko neke atu i te rima. Kei te anga tonu ngā whakahaere kōtaha tiketike ki ngā kaihoko o High Street ki te whakataetae nui mai i ngā tohutūmahi tuihono pēnei i a Amazon, ka uaua ake te utu i ā rātou rēti me ētahi atu utu, pēnei i te pikinga o te utu mōkito me ngā utu pakihi. Nā tēnei i puta ai ngā ingoa nunui pēnei i a Toys R Us ki te whakahaere, ā, ko ētahi atu pēnei i te rangatira o Topshop, ko Arcadia, ko Debenhams me New Look kua pānuitia ngā katinga tauine nui. E ai ki a PwC, ka noho tonu te hokohoko ahua hei wāhanga tino uaua i roto i ngā marama e ono ki Pipiri, e 10 ngā pātaka i te wiki e kati ana, ko te nuinga o ngā whakahaeretanga kōtaha tiketike me ngā whakarākeitanga anō, he 103 ngā wharekai, 100 ngā māngai pānga me ngā pāparapara 96. I kite a Greater London i te nuinga o ngā katinga kupenga o tētahi rohe,  Ahakoa i te whakaaro ki te nui ake o ngā toa, i hāngai tōna mokatere katinga ki te wawaenga ā-motu. Ko te East Midlands, North East, South East me Yorkshire me te Humber anake ngā rohe i kite i te iti ake o ngā katinga i tērā tau.

title: Ko te rangatira o Meheke-Benz o Daimler hei tapahi i ngā mahi e 10,000 puta noa i te ao
summary: Kua kī a Daimler, te kaihanga motokā Tiamana nāna a Meheke-Benz, ka whakahekea e ia ngā mahi 10,000 neke atu rānei puta noa i te ao i a ia e rapu ana ki te pūtea i te whakawhiti ki ngā motokā hiko.
text: I kī atu te rangatira kaimahi o Daimler, a Wilfried Porth, ki ngā kaipūrongo ko te maha o ngā mahi i ngaro "i roto i ngā whika e rima". Ka puta mai te neke i ngā rā i muri i te kīanga a Audi ka tapahia e ia te 9,500 o ana mahi e 61,000 i Tiamana mō ngā take ōrite. I kī a Daimler e haere ana te umanga motokā i "te huringa nui rawa i roto i tōna hītori". "E hiahiatia ana e te whanaketanga ki te nekeneke kūpapa CO2 ngā pūtea penapena nui, koia te take i pānuitia ai e Daimler i waenganui o Whiringa ā Rangi ka whakarewaina he hōtaka hei whakanui ake i te whakataetaetanga, te mahi hou me te kaha pūtea penapena," te kī a te umanga. "Ko tētahi wāhanga o tēnei hōtaka ko te whakaiti i ngā utu kaimahi mā te €1.4bn i te mutunga o te 2022, ā, i waenganui i ētahi atu mea, ki te whakaiti i te maha o ngā tūnga whakahaere puta noa i te ao mā te 10%." I kī ngā motokā hiko o Daimler, e tata ana ki te 300,000 ngā kaimahi huri noa me ngā wheketere i ngā whenua e 17, ka whakahekea ngā utu me te mahi "i runga i te āhua haepapa pāpori", tae atu ki te whakamahinga o te "tārere māori". "Anō hoki, ka whakawhānuitia ngā āheinga mō te whakatānga wā, ā, ka tukuna he hōtaka wehenga ki Tiamana kia whakaiti ai i ngā mahi i roto i te whakahaere," ka tāpirihia. I kī a Daimler kua whakaaetia ana mahere ki te kaunihera mahi a te umanga, arā ko te whakaaturanga uniana. He pōturi nga kaihanga motokā Tiamana ki te urutau ki ngā āhuatanga hangarau hou, tae atu ki ngā motokā taraiwa whaiaro me ngā waka hiko. I taua wā, kua pāngia e rātau te hinganga o te tono i Haina, i te wā i whakararurarutia hoki e te pakanga hokohoko i waenganui i Washington me Bejing te tupu.

title: Ka huri mana te Rōpū o Te Wānanga i tōna ingoa
summary: Kua hurihia e te Rōpū Pākehā tōna ingoa ki Reform UK, i muri i te whiwhinga whakaaetanga mai i te kaitiaki pōti o UK.
text: I kī te Kaiārahi o Nigel Farage ka whakahau mō ngā huringa ki te pūnaha pōti, te Whare o Ariki, te AO me ētahi atu rōpū. I whakaaetia e te Kōmihana Pōti te huringa ingoa ahakoa ngā whakahēnga a te kura whakaaro o Reform. I whakaahuatia e te kura whakaaro te whakataunga he "tino whakakino". I whakatūria te Rōpū Pākehā ki te whakahau mō tētahi "Brexit mā" i mua i te pōtitanga o Ūropi 2019, i toa ai i ngā tūru e 29 - neke atu i tētahi atu rōpū UK. I te tīmatanga o te whakahau pōti nui o te tau 2019, ka tautuhia ngā kaitono o te Rōpū Pākehā kia tū ki ngā tūru e tata ana ki te 600. Heoi anō, i muri i te pēhanga kia kaua e wehe i te pōti Waiho, ka hoki whakamuri mai i ngā tūru e 317 i toa i te Tories i te tau 2017. Kua roa te karangatanga a Tēnā Wairangi - he kaiārahi o te Rōpū Rangatiratanga o UK mō te putanga o Ingarangi i te EU - kua roa te karanga kia mutu te pūnaha pōti "tuatahi-mua-te-poutāpeta" me te whakakorenga o te Whare o Ariki. I tana kōrero mō te huringa ingoa, ka kī a ia: "He rongo tino pai tēnei, ā, ko te wā tino pai i te Tau Hou. " He nui ake te hiahia whakahou i a tātau e ngana ana ki te whakaora i a Covid. "He tino nui tā mātou wā hei iwi i muri i te Pakihi, engari he maha ngā wāhi o te UK e hiahia ana ki te whakahōu tūturu, taekaha: to tātau whakahaerenga, te Whare o Ariki, te HAU, te ratonga tūmatanui, te pūnaha pōti hei kōrero i ētahi torutoru." Engari i kī a Charlotte Pickles, ko te tumuaki o te kura whakaaro Whakahōu, he aroha kāore i te mōhiotia: "He tino whakakino te whakataunga a te Komihana Pōti o tēnei rā, ā, ka mōrearea te manaaki roa i runga i to mātau ingoa, i hangaia neke atu i te rua tekau tau o te whakahauhau takitahi mō te whakahōutanga ratonga tūmatanui. " Kua whakararuraru kē te tono a te Rōpū Pākehā mō ngā kaipōti kua whakapā mai ki a mātau e kimi ana ki te tū, ki te whakahau rānei i ngā pōti paetata, ki te tuku koha rānei. "E pouri ana kua kore te Kōmihana Pōti e mōhio ki tēnei, ahakoa kua whakamōhiotia."

title: E anga ana te ratonga tīkiti Hekerangi ki ngā whakahēnga o Parihi i te āraitanga o ngā huarahi
summary: Kei te āraia e ngā atekōkiri tīkiti ētahi huarahi huri noa i Parihi, i ngā taunga rererangi hoki hei whakahē i te ratonga tāpui tīkiti o Hekerangi.
text: I puta mai te whakaaturanga i te kīanga a te Manatu Roto o Wīwī ka whakakore i a Kirikiri, te ratonga tākai waka a te kamupene, mai i te 1 o Hānuere. Ka taea e ngā kiritaki Hekerangi te karanga i ngā eke tīkiti mai i tētahi taupānga waea atamai, engari kua anga atu te kamupene ki ngā whakahē puta noa i te ao. E kī ana ngā kaiwhakawāwā he ratonga tīkiti paerewa a UberPop, ā, e hiahia ana kia rāhuitia te mahi katoa a te kamupene. I kī atu te kaikorero o te Manatu o Roto, a Pierre-Henry Brandet ki te pouaka whakaata Wīwī ka whakakore ngā ture hou i ngā ratonga pēnei i a HekePop. "He kore mana te tuku i tēnei ratonga, engari he tino mōrearea anō mō te kaihoko," te kī a Tēnā Brandet ki a iTELE, e ai ki tētahi pūrongo a Kōrero. I kōrerotia e ia ngā māharahara mēnā kua tino inihua ētahi tohutūmahi waka. 'Wā hira' I roto i tētahi kōrero, ka karangatia e te perehitini o te uniana o Taxi de France ki ngā atekōkiri tīkiti kia urupare i runga i te "kaha me te kaha ki tēnei tūkinotanga". "Haere mai ki waho ki te tiaki i a mātau mahi, he wā hira tēnei," te kī a te perehitini o Ihu Sylla. I te Mane hoki, ka kī tētahi mana waka ā-rohe i Peretiama ka tautokona e ia tētahi umanga tīkiti kua whakatū i tētahi wero ā-ture ki a Hekerangi e whakapae ana i te whakataetae tika. I whakatūria i te tau 2009 i California, kua noho a Hekerangi hei whiringa waka pai ki ngā tīkiti tūturu i ngā tāone puta noa i te ao. Ka utua e Hekerangi he kōmihana mō ia ekenga, engari he iti iho ngā utu e utua ana e ngā atekōkiri o te ratonga i ngā tīkiti pūnoa.

title: Ngā Pepa Pararaiha: Na te kāwanatanga i tohutohu kia rutu i te karo tāke i roto i te Pūtea
summary: Me whakamahi e te kāwanatanga te Pūtea o tērā wiki ki te whāwhā i ngā take o te karo tāke i whakaarahia e te putanga o ngā Pepa Pararaiha, e kī ana tētahi tino minita.
text: I kī a Labour MP Dame Margaret Hodge, nāna i ārahi he taupatupatu ohorere i runga i ngā tuhinga mārire, ko te karo tāke he "tāwai ā-motu, ao whānui hoki". I karangatia e ia he ture hou hei whakahau i nga whare nunui kia nui ake te pūrongo hua. I kī te Minita Pūtea a Mel Stride he "pūkete aroturuki tino kaha" tā te kāwanatanga ki te whiu i te karo tāke. I roto i te mārire, e kīia nei ko ngā Pepa Pararaiha, e 13.4m ngā tuhinga, ko te nuinga mai i tētahi umanga pūtea ā-waho. I whakaarahia e nga pepa ngā pātai me pēhea te whakamahi a ngā kaipōrero, ngā kamupene whānui, ngā tāngata rangatira me ētahi atu tangata whai wāriu tiketike ki te pare i a rātau moni i ngā tāke teitei ake. I a ia e kōrero ana i roto i te Kotahitanga, i kī a Dame Margaret - i roto i te kāpata i raro i a Taraiwa Kōkā rāua ko Kōnata Paraone, ā, he manukura tōmua hoki o te Komiti Pūkete Tūmatanui o Ngātahi - i kī ko te karo tāke ināianei he "whanonga e whakaaetia whānuitia ana e te tokomaha rawa o te hunga whai rawa, whai mana hoki". Kei te tū te mahi i runga i tētahi "tauine mahi", ka kī atu a ia ki ngā MP. I kī a ia kāore te pūkete o te kāwanatanga o Labour whakamutunga i "pai ki taku hiahia", engari i tāpiritia he "koretake, he āhua tinihanga hoki ngā mahi a te kāwanatanga o nāianei". E whakaatu ana ngā Pepa Pararaiha i ngā kamupene me ngā tangata e whakamahi ana i ētahi mana pūtea - e tirohia ana hei rāhui tāke e ētahi, ngā pūtahi pūtea ā-waho e ētahi atu - hei whakaheke i ā rātou tāke mō ngā hua, rawa rānei. Kei roto i a rātou ētahi o ngā Whakawhirinaki Karauna o UK, ngā Rohe o Rāwāhi rānei, pērā i te Motu o Tangata me Jersey. I karangatia e Dame Margaret he ture hei whakahau i ngā kamupene tauwhānui ki te pūrongo i ā rātou hua "i runga i te whenua, kia taea ai te tāke i ngā kamupene ki te wāhi e whai hua ai rātou". A, ka karanga a ia ki te Whare Taonga kia whakaurua he rēhita tūmatanui hou o te rangatiratanga āhuatanga me te āwhina i ngā rāhui tāke o Ingarangi "ki te whakarerekē i o rātau rangatiratanga". "Me mōhio te kāwanatanga ki tēnei wā hai mahi. They have an opportunity to do so in next week's Budget," she said. "E kore rawa a Ingarangi e whai taonga i runga i te moni paruparu, ā, kāore e taea e a tātau ratonga tūmatanui te mahi mēnā ka karo ngā tangata rangatira rawa me ngā kamupene tino kaha ki te utu i tā rātou tiri tika." I kī a Tēnā Stride kua whakarewaina e te kāwanatanga te £160bn nā te whiu i te karo tāke mai i te tau 2010. I kī atu a ia ki ngā MP: "Ko tētahi o ngā raruraru ko tā mātou tino hohe ki te mau mai i ngā mehua maha, kāore anō kia kitea katoatia." Heoi anō, i karangatia e te hēkeretari matua o te kōruru o Labour ki te Whare Taonga o Te Kāwanatanga, a Pita Dowd, kia whakaurua e te kāwanatanga he rēhita tūmatanui o ngā whakawhirinaki ki waho. "Me whakamutu hoki te tapahi ki te HMRC [HM Revenue and Customs] me te whakarite kei a HMRC ngā kaimahi me ngā rauemi e hiahiatia ana kia taea ai te rutu i te karo i tōna uho," tana tāpiri mai. I kī a 'Vampires' Tory MP Andrew Mitchell, tētahi wepu matua kāwanatanga o mua, "kua tae mai te wā" ki te tohe ki ngā taumata pūataata ōrite mō ngā rohe o Ingarangi ki rāwāhi pērā ki te UK. I pāorotia e ia te karanga kia whai rēhita pūtea penapena tūmatanui ngā rāhui tāke, ka tāpiritia: "Me tuwhera ngā rēhita ki te pāpāho, ki ngā kaipūrongo, ki ngā NGO me aua tāngata e āhei ana ki te hono i ngā ira." I tautohetohetia hoki nga pepa māturu i te Pāremata o Ūropi, i Straehe, i te Tūtira i kī ai te komihana tāke o te EU ko ngā tohunga pūtea e āhei ana ki te karo tāke whakatuki he "vampires" e "wehi ana i te mārama". I kī a Pierre Moscovici he pūataata nui ake anake ka mahi hei whakararuraru. Ka karanga a ia ki ngā mema EU kia whakaae "i ngā marama e ono e whai ake nei" mō ngā tono kia whakahaua ngā kaitohutohu tāke ki te pūrongo i ngā aronui ārai i hangaia mō ngā kiritaki. I tohe hoki a Tēnā Moscovici ki ngā whenua kia whakaae ki tētahi rārangi rārangi tāke i te mutunga o te tau. Ko ngā pepa he rōpu nui o ngā tuhinga māturu i te nuinga o te umanga ture o waho o Appleby, tae atu ki ngā rēhita rangatōpū i roto i ngā mana tāke e 19, e whakaatu ana i ngā mahi pūtea a ngā kaitōrangapū, ngā tangata rongonui, ngā rangatira rangatōpū me ngā kaiārahi pakihi. I tukuna ngā pūkete e 13.4 miriona ki te nūpepa Tiamana o Süddeutsche Zeitung, kātahi ka tiria ki te International Consortium of Investigative Journalists (ICIJ). Kua ārahi rangahau a Panorama mō te AO hei wāhanga o tētahi tūhuratanga huri noa e tata ana ki te 100 ētahi atu rōpū pāpāho, tae atu ki te Kaitiaki, i ngā whenua e 67. Kāore te BBC i te mōhio ki te tuakiri o te pūtake. Ngā Pepa Pararaiha: Pānuitanga katoa; whāia te tauhohenga i Twitter mā te whakamahi i #ParadisePapers; i roto i te taupānga BBC News, whāia te tūtohu "Paradise Papers" Mātakitaki Panorama i te BBC iPlayer (ngā kaimātakitaki UK anake)

title: Rārangi wā: Renewable Heat Incentive scandale
summary: Ko te aronui Renewable heat Incentive (RHI) he mahi pūngao i whakatūria hei whakahauhau i ngā umanga i Aiarangi ki te Raki kia whakawhiti mai i ngā kora fossil ki ngā pūtake whakahou.
text: Engari ko ngā hē nui i roto i tōna tatūnga me tōna whakatinanatanga, ko te tikanga ka mōrearea te kaupapa ki runga i te pūtea, me te mataku ka tae te whakapau moni ki te £700m i roto i te 20 tau. I katia te aronui i te tau 2016, ā, i kawea mai e te 2017 me te 2019 ki roto i te pūtea. Mai i tērā wā ka kī atu tētahi kaimahi tūmatanui ki ngā MP kua neke atu i te £33m te whika whakapau moni i mua i te whakaurunga o ngā mehua hei whāwhā i te whakapau moni. Ka whakahuahuatia e TE Rongokōrero o NI te hītori o te kaupapa me te āhua o te tiango o te mana whakahaere i Aiarangi ki te Raki. title: Te whakaekenga o te hōtēra o Mali: Ko ngā pātai kāore anō kia whakautua
summary: E rua rā i muri mai i te whakaekenga whakamate i te Hōtēra Radisson Blu i te pūmatua o Mali, o Bamako, he nui tonu tātau kāore i te mōhio.
text: Na wai i kawe te whakaeke? Kua kī tahi a Al-Mōrea i te Maghreb Āmāri (AQIM) me tōna wahanga o al-Murabitoun kei muri rātou, engari kei te noho tonu ētahi rangirua. E kī ana te nuinga o ngā kaitirotiro i uru mai te toa toa o Aratiria o Mokhtar Belmokhtar, engari tae noa mai ki tēnei wā, i whakaarotia kua wehe te kaiārahi al-Murabitoun i AQIM. Heoi anō, kei te huri tonu ngā toa o ngā rōpū patu e mahi ana i ngā koraha ture kore ture o Mali ki te raki me Niger, me Aratiria ki te tonga me Ripia. Ko ētahi o ēnei rōpū he ariā toa ā-ao. Ko ētahi he kaihīhī Tuareg, ko ētahi e mahi moni ana mā te hokohoko rongoā, ngā tāngata me ngā rākau puta noa i te koraha o Sahara, ā, ko ētahi e tuku ana i a rātau ratonga ki te kaihoko tiketike. E huatau ana ētahi nā te nui ake o te pēhanga mai i ngā ope motuhake Wīwī i horaina ki Mali mai i te tau 2013 tērā pea i whakahokia a Belmokhtar ki te mahi tahi me al-Mōrea. I te tāpiritanga ki te mārō, kua kī te Macina Liberation Front (MLF) kei muri i te whakaekenga. Ko te MLF he rōpū Māori hōu rawa i hangaia e ngā Fulanis iwi, i runga anō i Mali waenganui. E hia ngā kaihōia i reira? Kāore i te mārama. E kī ana ngā āpiha e rua nga pūtā kua patua. Engari i te wā e kī ana ētahi e rua anake ngā kaihōia i tomo ki te hōtēra o Radisson Blu, kua whakahuatia ngā kaiwhakaatu e kī ana tae atu ki te 13. E kī ana ngā kaiwhakahaere o Mali e kimi ana rātau i ngā pōhēhētanga "neke atu rānei" e toru, ahakoa kāore anō kia whakapūtātia mēnā e whakapono ana rātau kua whai wāhi rātau ki te whakaeke, i āwhina rānei ki te whakarite. Te āhua nei kua tino whakaritea te whakaeke, me ngā tautīaki i whakahuatia me te kī kua whakaritea i te mutunga o ta rātau neke pō, ā, kua whakatakotoria e rātau a rātau rākau. I taraiwa nga kaihōia i tētahi waka me ngā pereti tau whakawhanaunga, he whakaaturanga hoki o te whakaritenga tūpato - me ngā whakaaturanga tērā pea neke atu i te tokorua noa iho ngā tāngata i horaina ki te whakatū i tētahi ūnga kōtaha tiketike, i whakaarotia he tino haumaru. Ko wai nga kaihōia? Kei te mahi ngā kaihautū Wīwī i ngā whakamātautau ā ture i runga i nga tinana o nga pūtā, engari nō tēnei wā, kāore he mōhiohio i tukua. E kī ana ngā āpiha ko tēnei hei karo i te whakararuraru i te tūhuratanga. I whakaahuatia e ngā kaiwhakaatu tētahi kaihōia he kiri pouri, he kiri kōmā tētahi atu - i te nuinga o te wā ko te take me ērā e honoa ana ki ngā rōpū toa o Sahara. I kī atu tētahi pūtake haumarutanga i Mali ki te AO e kōrero Ingarihi ana ngā pūtā tūpāpaku e rua i te wā o te whakaekenga, engari kāore anō kia whakatūria ō rāua tuakiri, ngā iwi rānei. I kī atu tētahi atu pūtake ki a WHO, e whakapono ana rātau he manene nga kaihōia, me te kore hoatu i ētahi atu taipitopito. E kī ana te kaiwaiata Guinea rongonui o Sekouba "Bambino" Diabate, e noho ana i te hōtēra, i rongo ia i ngā kaihōia e kōrero ana i te reo Ingarihi "me te nako o Rīria". Mā tēnei e whakaara ake te tūmomo o te rōpū tinihanga o Naria e mahi tahi ana me ētahi atu toa o Awherika ki te Uru. Heoi anō, he wāhanga a Te Kāwanatanga o Ingarihi, nā reira ka mīharo mēnā kei te mahi tahi me ngā toa e honoa ana e al-Mōrea, i te mea he tauwhāinga ngā rōpū e rua. He hononga anō ki ngā whakaekenga o Parihi? Ka taea tēnei, engari kāore he whakaaturanga. I kawea nga whakaekenga o Parihi e nga kaiwhakawhanake e honoa ana ki te Kāwanatanga o Ingarihi. Engari e 1,000 ngā hōia o Wīwī e noho ana i Mali, ā, ka pupuri i ngā hononga pakihi whānui ki tōna koroni o mua. Kua whakawehi ētahi kaiārahi toa o Mali ki te whakaeke i ngā painga o Wīwī. Heoi anō, ko te whakaekenga tuatoru tēnei i Mali i tēnei tau i kīia e al-Murabitoun. I te taha o ētahi atu rōpū Māori, kua mahi i te whenua mai i te tau 2011, nā reira tērā pea he mea noa iho te wā. I roto i ngā tau tata nei, kua ngaro ētahi atu kaimahi i te mahi ārai ārai a te UN i te whenua. Ko wai ngā tūpāpaku? Kua tukuna ki te BBC tēnei rārangi o ngā tūpāpaku e tētahi pūtake haumarutanga i Mali: He tokomaha nga manuhiri kē e noho ana i tēnei hōtēra rangatira, e paingia ana e ngā tāngata pakihi me ngā kaimahi rererangi o te ao whānui. Ko ētahi o ērā i patua kua pūhia kua mate i a rātau e ngana ana ki te mawhiti i nga kaihōia i roto i te hiki.

title: Ko Roman Kemp ki mua i te hauora hinengaro o te taitamariki me te pakipūmeka whakamomori
summary: Ko te kaiwhakaatu reo irirangi o Roman Kemp ki mua i tētahi pakipūmeka e hōpara ana i ngā take hauora hinengaro me te whakamomori i roto i ngā taitama.
text: "Tērā te nui o te mate hauora hinengaro e haere ana i tēnei wā, ā, ki te kore te tautoko tika, ka kino pea ngā hua," te kī a Kemp. Roman Kemp: Ka pāohotia tā mātou Ohorere Ngū (taitara mahi) i runga i te BBC Three. Ka tūhura i ngā mea ka taea hei whakahauhau i ngā tāngata ki te rapu āwhina, me ngā mahi ārai ka taea te mahi. The programme will also look at the lasting impact that mental health issues and suicide can have on the friends and families of those involved. I tāpiri mai a Kemp e hiahia ana a ia ki te "aro atu ki tētahi kaupapa e pā ana ki ngā mano o ngā taitama puta noa i te whenua, me te whakaatu he huarahi hei toro atu ki te hunga e mamae ana, e hiahia ana ki tā mātou āwhina." E whakapono ana te pūmana o TE Toru o Aotearoa, ko Fiona Campbell ināianei ko te "mahi" o te teihana ki te hanga i aua kiriata hei whakarato i ngā "rongoā" me te "āwhina mō ngā tāngata e raruraru ana". "He pikitia tino uaua tēnei ki a Romana ki te hanga, ā, e nama ana mātou ki a ia me ētahi atu tāngata katoa e pā ana ki a koe mō te whakawhirinaki ki a mātau ki te kōrero i ā rātou pūrākau," tana kī. Mēnā kei te pōrearea koe, ā, kei te hiahia koe ki te tono āwhina, he tohutohu mō wai hei whakapā atu ki te Tohutohu o TE HAU. Otiia, waea atu ki a Samaritans i 116123, i Childline rānei i 0800 1111. E wātea ana hoki ngā rauemi hauora hinengaro i te Rūma Matua o TE HAU. Whāia mātou i runga i Facebook, i Twitter @BBCNewsEnts rānei. Mēnā he huatau pūrākau tāu, īmēra entertainment.news@bbc.co.uk.

title: Eurovision 2016: I rahua a Nicky Byrne o Aiarangi ki te whakamutunga
summary: Kua tukitukia a Airangi i te Whakataetae Waiata Eurovision i muri i te korenga o te kaiwaiata o Westlife o Nicky Byrne ki te whakamutunga o te Hātarei.
text: Kāore i tutuki te whetū pahū, e 37, i te āhua whakamutunga i Stockholm, Huitene, i te Rāitema, i reira ko ia tētahi o ngā mahi e 18 e whakataetae ana mō ngā wāhi e 10 whakamutunga. Ko Airangi te whenua tino angitu i roto i te hītori 61 tau o te whakataetae, e whitu nga toa. Ka whiwhi aunoa te UK, me te mahi a Joe rāua ko Jake i tēnei tau. E whakapūmautia ana he wāhi i te whakamutunga hei tētahi o ngā whenua "nui e rima" tae atu ki Wīwī, Tiamana, Itari me Paniora. Hei toa rangatira, ka haere aunoa hoki a Huitene ki te whakamutunga matua. Eurovision 2016: Te rātaka a te kaipānui He aha ngā kaipānui e aroha ana ki a Eurovision? Ko te 'pūrākau whānau' a te kaiwaiata o Ākarana ko Michael Ball: 'Ko taku tohutohu mō Joe rāua ko Jake' Ko ngā whenua e 10 i whiwhi i te Rāitema ko Rāwhia, Hōria, Purukāria, Ahitereiria, Ukraine, Hēpia, Pōrana, Iharaira, Rituānia me Peretiama. Ka hono rātau ki Ahaparangi, Rūhia, Hōrana, Hakari, Koroātia, Malta, Ateria, Aramenia, Te Whenua o Taikarowākia me Kaiperu, nāna katoa i puta i te āhua whakamutunga tuatahi i te Tūrei. Ko ngā renarena tōrangapū Ko te tāurunga o Ukraine, ko te kaiwaiata jazz o Jamala, nāna i puta i te wera o te Tāite, kua whakaoho i ngā raruraru tōrangapū ki Rūhia. Ko Jamala te tuatahi o Crimean Tatar ki te mahi i te whakataetae, ā, ko tana waiata 1944 e pā ana ki te kaiārahi o Te Kotahitanga o Rōpū, a Hohepa Kāri, Crimea me ngā kerēme o te horoi iwi. I tāpiritia e Rūhia a Crimea mai i Ukraine i te tau 2014, i te nui o te papā i waenganui i ngā whenua e rua. I muri i te haurua whakamutunga o te pō o te Rāitene, ka mihi a Byrne ki ana kaihautū, a, ka whakapārewa i te korenga e tae ki te whakamutunga. Ka tūtohu a ia: "He wā whakamīharo te tautoko whakamīharo, i hoatu e au aku mea katoa, e pouri ana ahau kāore i tae mai ki reira. Ka tukuna atu e au te rama ki tētahi atu ināianei a tērā tau." I ngā tau tata nei, mai i te whakaurunga o ngā whakatata whakamutunga o te pō wiki, kua heke haere ngā taonga o Airangi. Ko ngā toa me ngā hinganga i te tau 2007, ko Airangi te whakamutunga mo te wā tuatahi, e rima noa iho ngā piro mō Dervish's They Can't Stop The Spring. Ko te wā whakamutunga i toa ai a Airangi i te whakataetae i te tau 1996, i te wā i wikitōria ai a Eimear Quinn me tana waiata The Voice. He tau kino tēnei mō ngā tāurunga Scandinavian. I tukitukia a Tenemaka rāua ko Nōwei i te haurua whakamutunga, i whakatauria i runga anō i te pahekotanga o te pōti tūmatanui me te hūri. I rahua hoki a Tiorangi rāua ko Hinerangi ki te whakaoti. Ko te toa o Ahitereiria X Factor ko Dami Im, i tohutohutia e te whetū pahū, o Dannii Minogue, i pōtitia ki te whakamutunga me tana waiata Sound Of Silence. Ahakoa i tērā taha o te ao mai i Uropi, i pōhiritia a Ahitereiria kia uru ki Eurovision mō tōna huritau 60 i te tau 2015, i te mutunga o te tauwhāinga o Guy Sebastian i te wāhi tuarima.

title: Whakatūpato mō ngā mahi Paraire Pango 'māminga'
summary: Kua whakatūpato te kaiwhakahaere pānuitanga ki ngā kiritaki tērā pea ka māminga ētahi o ngā mahi Paraire Pango.
text: Nā Rebecca WearnBusiness, i kī a Guy Parker, te rangatira nui o te Mana Paerewa Pānuitanga, ko te tere o te huringa tuihono e "whakakī ana i ngā māharahara o te tangata mēnā he pono ngā mea katoa e kitea ana, e pānui ana rātou". "Ka uaua ake te whakatau mēnā he utu pai te utu e tukuna ana ki a koe," tana tāpiri mai. E kī ana a Dr Gareth Harvey, he kaimātai hinengaro kiritaki e ako ana me pēhea te whakamātau a ngā kaihoko ki te whakaawe i ngā kiritaki, e kī ana ko ngā mahi Paraire Pango e pā ana ki te aro atu ki ngā tohu me ngā tau nunui. "He tino rerekē te hinengaro o te hokohoko i roto i ngā hokohoko. Ka rerekē te āhua o tētahi paetukutuku, toa rānei. I te nuinga o te wā ka hunaia e te kaihoko te utu, nā reira ko te mea whakamutunga e kitea ana e tātau," tana kī. "E hiahia ana rātau kia hoko koe ki roto i te hua me te whakaaro he pai te moni. Engari i te Paraire Pango, i ngā hoko rānei, ko te utu, te whakahekenga nui rānei te mea e kitea ana e koe i te tuatahi. Engari kāore koe i te arotahi ki te hua, ahakoa koia tāu e hiahia ana." Ko ngā kaihoko i Wrexham i kōrero ki te BBC i whakapuaki i o rātau wheako o te rongoā hokohoko tuihono. I kī a Emma Uira, e whakahaere ana i ngā Keke Emz i te tiriti tiketike o te taone, kua pēhia a ia ki tētahi hoko nā te tatau karaka i runga i ngā kākahu whakahekenga: "I tāpiritia e au ētahi atu mea ki taku kete kāore au i mahi kē - kei te tinihanga koe." Tokorua ngā tamariki nohinohi a Claire Nicholas, ā, ināianei kei te hokohoko tuihono te nuinga o ngā mahi. "He ngote ahau mo tētahi mahi - i runga anō i ngā kākahu tamariki - ā, māku e tāpiri taonga ki taku kete kia whiwhi ai i te tukunga koreutu," tana kī. Tokorua ngā tama taitamariki a tōna hoa mahi, a, ka kī he nui te utu o te hoko i ngā toa e hiahia ana rātau: "E ngana ana ahau ki te kimi i ngā mahi, engari i ētahi wā ka hokona e au tētahi mea ki te ngaro i a au te tāpaetanga." Ka eke hoki a Emz Cakes ki runga i te tāheke o te Paraire Pango, e tuku ana i ngā tī o te ahiahi utu tapahi. Ka "tino pono" ōna whakahekenga utu, e kī ana a Ms Wilson. E kī ana a Dr Harvey i ngā tohutohu pēnei i ngā tatauranga karaka, i te miramira rānei i ngā kararehe whāiti, i te tokomaha rānei o ngā tāngata e titiro ana ki tētahi tūemi, e whakaputu ana i te pēhanga kia tere te hoko i roto i tētahi tono kia pupuri i tētahi kaihoko i taua paetukutuku, taupānga rānei. "Kua purua e mātou ngā tāngata ki roto i tētahi matawai roro, ā, ka whiwhi rātou ki te hoko tuihono," tana kī. "I muri i te 12 meneti ka ngenge rātau i te hinengaro. Ka mutu ta rātau whakataunga pai, te tātari rānei i ā rātou kōwhiringa me te mahi pokatata, me te whakaaro 'Ka whiwhi noa ahau i tētahi o ērā'." Nō reira e kore e mōhiotia kei te arotahi te nuinga o ngā mahi a te Mana Paerewa Pānuitanga ki ngā whakatairanga tuihono. I kī a Tēnā Parker me maumahara ngā kiritaki e pā ana aua ture ōrite ki ngā whakahekenga utu me ngā mahi ahakoa kei runga i te pouaka whakaata, i tētahi papa pānui, i tētahi īmēra rānei. Ko te kaha o tētahi pakihi ki te huri i te utu o tētahi hua i ngā wā maha i te tau, he uaua pea ki te kaiwhakarite me ngā kiritaki te pupuri. I kī te kaitiaki he mahi tā ngā umanga ki te whakarite kei te mārama ngā mahi, ā, e tūmanako ana rātou ki te tono mō tētahi hua kia wātea ai ngā tūemi. Na Tēnā Parker i tohutohu i ngā kiritaki kia whakapā atu ki te ASA mēnā ka tūtaki rātau ki tētahi mahi e whakaaro ana rātau mēnā he māminga, he pono rānei.

title: He tata rawa te rere o te taiapa o Norwich ki te whare o te taone
summary: Kua "hoatu he kupu tohutohu" e ngā pirihimana ki tētahi kaiwhakahaere taiapa mātāmua nāna i tiritiri i ngā whakakitenga o tētahi rere pokapū taone kore mana i runga i te pāpāho pāpori.
text: I whakaaturia e te ataata e rere tata rawa ana te drone ki Norwich Castle - e whati ana i ngā tohutohu a te Mana Rererangi Tūmatanui. I tiria ngā rauemi ki tētahi rōpū Facebook neke atu i te 30,000 ngā mema. I kī ngā Pirihimana o Norfolk koia te wā tuatahi i pūrongotia ai te māharahara ki tētahi rererangi taiapa ki a rātau i muri i te kitenga i runga i te pāpāho pāpori. "I muri i te mōhiotanga ki tēnei rere ture i Norwich, ka uiui ngā āpiha, ka kitea te kaiwhakahaere kua kōrerotia mai i taua wā," te kī a PC Thomas Munday. "Nā ngā āhuatanga, i whakataua e mātau kāore he mahi tika i hiahiatia." Ka hiahiatia e ngā ture hōu kia whakaurua i te 30 o Whiringa ā-Rangi kia rēhita ngā tohutūmahi mēnā he nui ake i te 250g (9oz) me te 20kg (44lbs). Me puta e ngā kaihautū taiapa, e hiahia ana ki te rere ki waho, tētahi whakamātautau pūkenga tuihono - kia whakahōutia ia toru tau. "Ko te tangata e whakahaere ana i tētahi taiapa me mahi ā-haepapa me te mātaki i ngā ture hāngai katoa." te kī a te kaikōrero CAA. "Ko te Dronecode a te CAA e whakarato tohutohu ana me pēhea te rere haumaru." E whitu tau e tohutohu ana a Elliott Corke, mai i te Drone Training Ltd o Norwich, me pēhea te rere haumaru me te arumoni. "Ko te tikanga kia kaua ngā tāngata kāore he whakaaetanga CAA e rere tata ki ngā wāhi arumoni, kāinga rānei," tana kī. "Kei reira ngā ture hei pare i te iwi whānui me ētahi atu kaiwhakamahi hau, nā reira he mea hira te whakaū i te taha o te mātauranga. " Ka taea anake e mātou te tūmanako ka pūrongotia e ngā tāngata ngā rerenga e whakaaro ana rātou he hē, ā, ka mahi tonu ngā pirihimana i aua māharahara." E hē ana ki te ture te rere i tētahi drone i runga ake i te 400ft (120m), tata rānei ki tētahi rohenga taunga rererangi. Mēnā ka mōrearea tētahi rererangi, he hara hara, ā, ka taea e te kaiwhakahaere te haere ki te whare herehere tae atu ki te rima tau. Kimihia te Rongokōrero o TE Rāwhiti o Ingarangi i Facebook, Instagram me Twitter. Mēnā he huatau pūrākau tāu, īmēra eastofenglandnews@bbc.co.uk

title: Coronavirus: Ka whakarewaina e Boris Johnson te kōwhiringa karihi i oati ai ia ki te karo
summary: Te rākau karihi. Te Pouri. Te aituā. Koia tērā i karangatia e ia. Heoi anō, koia tāna i mahi ai.
text: Kaore rawa a Laura KuenssbergPolitical editor@bbclaurakon Twitter i whakararuraru i tōna manawanui ki te tohutohu i a Ingarangi kia kati anō ōna tatau i ngā wiki tata nei. I te ahiahi o te Hātarei, i mamae a ia ki te kī e kore te raka 2.0 i Ingarangi e tata ki te whakawhāiti i te wā tuatahi. Engari anō, ka tū te pirimia i te poutāpeta, ka kī mai ki a mātau kia "noho ki te kāinga, tiaki i te NHS, whakaora ora". Ka whakatūpato anō a ia ki te iwi whānui ki te kore te kāwanatanga e mahi i te mahi taikaha, me huri atu e te ratonga hauora ngā tūroro e hiahia ana ki te tiaki. I whakaaturia anō e ia me ana kaipūtaiao matua he whakaaturanga ka taea e te whenua te tūpono ki te maha o ngā mate i te ngaru o te mate urutā kua huri kōaro i o tātau oranga i roto i ngā marama e waru kua hipa. Ko te wawao a te pirimia ki te whenua, i te kōpeke noa iho i tētahi kōrero tūmatanui ki roto i ngā hōtaka pouaka whakaata tuatahi o Halloween i muri i ētahi haora takaware, he tūtatari tōrangapū tino pai - ina rerekē ngā take, ko te mea tika te huri i te ara. He pono ko ngā raraunga i tiria e te kāwanatanga i te Hātarei e tohu ana ki tētahi matapae kua kino ake. Ehara te UK anake i te whenua kua kite i te haere hē o te mate, me Wīwī me Tiamana e mahi ana i ngā rā tata nei. Engari he pono hoki kāore e taea e Tēnā Hōnea te kōrero mō tētahi hēkona kāore ia i whakatūpatotia. Neke atu i te ono wiki ki muri, ehara i te mea ko te ātete anake, engari ko ētahi o ngā minita a Tēnā Hōnea, me ētahi o ana kaitohutohu ake e akiaki ana i tētahi atu raka whāiti hei whakamātau ki te whakapōturi i te horahanga o te mate. I hohe ngā kōrerorero i roto i te kāwanatanga i te wiki tuatoru o Mahuru mō te mahi ā-motu i te wā e tipu ana te ngaru tuarua, tērā pea i te tauine o te mate urutā i te kōanga. I whakataua e te PM i taua wā kia paramu kē mō tētahi pūnaha raka paetata, i runga i te tūmanako ki te whakahaere i te horahanga me te kore hama ki te katoa o te ōhanga ngoikore e tīmata ana ki te hoki ki te ora. I kōwhiria e ia ki te taha o te Pūtea Moni me te tokomaha o ngā kaitautoko o Tory hou. I te tīmatanga o taua pūnaha taumata ki te ora, me ngā matapaki ki ngā kaiārahi paetata puta noa i te whenua, ka haere tonu ngā kōrerorero mō te tūponotanga o tētahi raka poto, koi, whāiti, "whati ara iahiko" rānei. Heoi anō, i te wāhi tūmatanui, i te haere tonu o aua kōrero, i ia rā ka tohe ngā minita i ia rā ka taea te mahere taumata. Ehara i te mea ngāwari nga whakataunga. Tērā tētahi arorau ki te ātete i te mahi nui ake pēnei ki te ngana ki te whakawhāiti i te tūkinotanga ki te āhua o te whakahaerenga, ērā atu pānga kino o te raka. Engari te āhua nei he aituā tōrangapū te whakawā taketake a Tēnā Hōnea ināianei e tatari ana kia puta. Ehara te Lockdown 2.0 i te tārua tūturu o te wā tuatahi. He rerekētanga mōhio - me ngā kura, ngā kura me ngā whare wānanga e noho tuwhera ana, he tepe wā pūmau o te marama, ā, ko te mea tino nui pea, ko te tūmanako kia tere te whakaterenga o te whakamātautau maha kia ora ake ai te huaketo. He rerekē hoki te pikitia i ngā kokonga rerekē o te UK. Kei te mau tonu a Pākehā ki tōna huarahi taumata hou mō tēnei wā, i reira he rāhuitanga ā-rohe iti ake mō tētahi wā. Kei roto kē a Aiarangi ki te Raki me Wales i tētahi raka tuarua, me ngā mahere kē mō tō rātou putanga. Engari he tino mōhio tētahi mea. I a ia e tatari ana tae noa ki tēnei wā, kua waiho anō e te PM, pērā i te kōanga, kia tuwhera tonu ki te whakapae nāna i whakaroa te mea tē mōhiotia, ā, he utu nui te wā o ana whakataunga, tērā pea ki te ora, ā, tērā pea ko te rongo o te kāwanatanga.

title: Ka taea e te utu o te whakatikatika o te waka rererangi o Cairngorm te haere ki te £15m
summary: Ka taea te utu ki te £15m te utu o te whakatika i te waka rererangi o Cairngorm, e ai ki tētahi pūrongo.
text: Kua katia te rerewhenua teitei rawa o UK mai i Mahuru 2018 nā ngā raruraru hanganga. Nā Highlands and Islands Enterprise (HIE) me whakaae te kāwanatanga o Pākehā ki ngā tapi tae atu ki te utu whakamutunga. I kī a Arotaupū Pākehā i anga atu a HIE me te kāwanatanga ki te mahi i "ngā whakataunga uaua" i runga i te rerewhenua me te taunga reti whānui ake o Cairngorm. Ka tūhono te waka i tētahi teihana tūāpapa ki tētahi wharekai me te wāhi reti 1,097m (3,599ft) ki runga i te maunga o Cairn Gorm tata ki Aviemore. Ko tētahi utu whakatikatika o mua, arā ko te whakakaha i ngā pou o te rerewhenua, ngā kurupae me ngā tūāpapa, i whakatakotoria ki te £10m. I titiro hoki te pūrongo a te kaitirotiro tianara ki te whakahaere a HIE i ngā kamupene i kirimana ki te whakahaere i te rohe hākinakina hukarere o Cairngorm Mountain. I whakawhiwhia e HIE, he tinana tūmatanui, he rīhi 25 tau ki te whakahaere i te taunga me te waka rererangi i te tau 2014. Engari i roto i ngā tau e whā, kua hinga te anake o Natural Retreats, o Cairngorm Mountain Ltd (CML). I uru mai a HIE me te whakatū i tētahi kamupene hou, ko Cairngorm Mountain (Scotland) Ltd, hei whakahaere i te umanga. Ka pēnei tonu. I kī te pūrongo hōu i mahia e HIE "te uauatanga tika, ā, i whakamahia ngā pūmautanga pūtea hei pare i tōna tūnga" i te tau 2014. I whakaritea hoki e te kamupene hinonga te aroturuki i te mahinga a CML. Engari i kī te pūrongo he painga ki a HIE kia haere tonu te arotake i ngā moni a Natural Retreat i tua atu i te wāhanga tiki, "i tukuna ngā mōrea i kitea i taua wā huri noa i te tūnga pūtea o Natural Assets Investments Limited". Kua huaina a HIE ki te mahi tere i te haerenga o CML ki te whakahaere. 'Ka whakanuia e te taiepa te rangirua' I kī a Caroline Gardner, te Kaiwhakahaere Tianara mō Pākehā: "Ināianei kei te anga atu a HIE me te kāwanatanga o Pākehā ki ngā whakataunga uaua me pēhea te whakaū i tētahi mahi tautoko i Cairngorm Mountain. " Ka whakanuia e te mate urutā Covid-19 te rangirua o ngā utu me te tauira pakihi e hiahiatia ana mō te maunga i te wā roa. "Me whakamōhio atu ngā whakataunga whakapau moni ā muri ake e te whānui o ngā rōpū e hiahia ana ki te maunga. " He mea nui hoki kia whakaarohia e rātau te pānga pāpori me te taiao o te taunga i te taha o ōna painga ohaoha." I kī a HIE kua tūhuratia ana mahi ki ngā Retreats Māori e te kāwanatanga o Pākehā me te Arotaupū Pākehā. I kī tētahi kaikōrero: "E tautoko ana a rātau whakatauranga i te tirohanga i tika te mahi a HIE puta noa i tēnei wā. " Ka tūtohutia hoki e ngā pūrongo ngā tūtohutanga hira, tae atu ki ngā mehua hei aromatawai me te whakahaere i ngā mōrea matua. Kua tangohia kētia e mātou ēnei piro ki runga i te papa, ā, kua whakaritea he tukanga hōu hei whakarato i ētahi atu tiakitanga, me te mōhio he mahi nui te mahi mōrearea i roto i te whanaketanga ohaoha." I kī a HIE ināianei kua arotahi ki te whakaoti i tētahi kēhi pakihi katoa hei whakatau i ngā hipanga panuku hei mahi i te waka rererangi, "me te whakauru ki ngā kaiāwhina ki te waihanga i tētahi mahere matua o Cairngorm mo te wā roa". Scottish Greens Highlands and Islands MSP John Finnie said it was vital the local community was involved in any decisions on the future of the funicular and ski centre. Highlands and Islands Labour MSP Rhoda Grant said plans for the centre had to be progressed to help secure the survival of the local economy.

title: Ka hoatu e JK Rowling te £10m mō te pokapū MS o Etinitini
summary: Kua homai e te kaituhi o JK Rowling te £10m ki te Whare Wānanga o Etinitini ki te whakatatū i tētahi whare hauora rangahau sclerosis maha.
text: I kī te kaituhi o Harry Potter, i mate tōna whaea o Anne, a, i mate i te 45 o ona tau, ko nga moni hei āwhina ki te kawe mai i ngā kaiwhaiwhai matua ki te rapu rongoā mō MS. Ka whai te Anne Rowling Regenerative Neurology Clinic ki te whakanoho i ngā tūroro ki te ngākau o te tukanga rangahau. I tū a Rowling hei kairangi o te MS Society Scotland i tērā tau e kī ana i wehea te aroha e ngā haupae ā-roto. Ka arotahi hoki te mahi i te whare hauora hou ki ētahi atu āhuatanga neurological degenerative, tae atu ki a Alzheimer, Parkinson's disease, Huntington's disease and Motor Neurone Disease. Tata ki te 100,000 ngā tāngata i te UK, ā, kei Pākehā tētahi o ngā mokatere teitei rawa o MS i te ao, ā, e 10,500 ngā tāngata e pā ana ki taua āhuatanga. I kī a Ms Rowling: "Kāore e taea e au te whakaaro ki tētahi mea hira ake, ki te uara mau ake rānei, i te āwhina i te whare wānanga ki te kawe mai i ngā hinengaro karaehe o te ao i roto i te āpure o te whakatupuranga rongoā, ki te hanga i runga i tōna hītori roa me te rongonui o te rangahau rongoā, ā, i te mutunga, ki te rapu rongoā mō tētahi mate tino Pākehā." I tāpiri mai a ia: "Kātahi anō ahau ka huri i te 45, te pakeke i mate ai taku whaea, a Anne, i ngā raruraru e pā ana ki tōna MS. "E mōhio ana ahau he pai ake ki a ia tōna ingoa i runga i tēnei whare hauora i runga i tētahi whakapakoko, kāri putiputi, tohu whakamaharatanga rānei, nā reira ko tēnei koha mōna hoki; me te whakamoemiti ki ngā mea katoa i homai e ia ki a au i roto i tōna oranga poto rawa." The clinic will be based in a purpose-built facility at the university. Ka mahi ngātahi ngā mātauranga me ngā kairangahau e ako ana i ngā mate neurodegenerative kē i te whare wānanga, tae atu ki te whakangungu i tētahi whakatupuranga hou o ngā kairangahau. I whakatūria e te whare wānanga tētahi Pokapū mō te Rangahau Sclerosis Maha i te tau 2007, kua whiwhi tautoko hoki mai i a Rowling. I kī a Ahorangi Charles ffrench-Constant, te kaiwhakahaere tahi o te pokapū: "Ka taea anake e mātou te kite i ngā rongoā pai ake mēnā ka mārama tūturu mātou ki ngā mate me ngā tukanga koiora i muri i a rātou. " Mā te Anne Rowling Regenerative Neurology Clinic e āhei ai mātou ki te mahi i ngā akoranga e āhei ana ki te whakamōhio atu ki te rangahau taiwhanga, ā, ka taea tēnei mōhiotanga te whakahoki ki ngā rongoā mō ngā tūroro." Ngā Hononga Ipurangi Pātahi Te Whare Wānanga o Edinburgh MS Resource Centre

title: He pēhea te maunga o Pontypridd paedophile Owain Thomas
summary: I mau noa iho tētahi mātauranga ture nāna i akiaki i ngā tamariki e tata ana ki te 150 ki te mahi i ngā mahi tōkai i runga i te kāmera, i a ia e whakatata ana ki tētahi rōpū taitama i roto i tētahi papa tākaro.
text: I whiua a Owain Thomas, e 29, kia 10 tau i roto i te whare herehere, e rima tau i runga i te raihana whānui i te Kōti Karauna o Merthyr Tydfil i te Paraire i muri i tana tautohe i te hara ki ngā hara tuihono e 158 ki ngā tamariki. E 146 ana tūpāpaku i noho puta noa i te UK, tae atu ki Amerika. Ko te maha o ngā hara i mahia e Tamati kua whakaahuatia e ngā pirihimana - ko rātou te mea teitei rawa atu i tūhuratia e te tīma whakamatau tuihono pirihimana i te tonga o Weera. I uiuia tuatahitia a Tamati, tētahi tauira ture o te Whare Wānanga o Aberystwyth, mō ngā kōrero a ngā Pirihimana o South Wales, i te āhua nei he mahi tūhāhā i tētahi taone iti i Rhondda Cynon Taff, i Whiringa ā Rangi. I whakatūria e ia tana motokā e tata ana ki tētahi rōpū taitama, i waenganui i te whitu me te 14 tau, i te papa tākaro, ā, ka auau te tono ki a rātau kia whakawātea i a rātau anō. Ka kī atu nga tamariki ki o rātau mātua, nāna i whakapā atu ki nga pirihimana. I mahia e te tōpana ngā uiui C KK, ā, i taea e ia te tiki i tētahi tau rēhita wāhanga. E rua rā i muri mai ka hopukina a Tamati i tōna kāinga o Pontypridd. Kātahi anō ka whakaaturia te whānuitanga pono o ana hara. I ako te tōpana me pēhea tana waihanga i ngā kōtaha kōrero kōrero i runga i ngā kēmu tuihono rongonui pēnei i a Roblox, he kēmu kaitākaro tuihono, e 90 miriona ngā kaiwhakamahi puta noa i te ao, ā, e hokona ana ki ngā tamariki. Kātahi ia ka whakatakune he tamaiti, ā, ka whakapati i ana tūpāpaku ki ngā hua kēmu hei whakawhiti i ngā painga tōkai kia mahia i runga i te kāmera, ka tāhoputia e ia. I whakamahia e ia ngā whakaahua o aua tūpāpaku, e whakatakune ana ko ia, hei waihanga i te pēhanga hoa i roto i ngā āhuatanga kōrerorero rōpū, i te nuinga o te wā e toru ngā tāngata i te wā kotahi, i roto i ngā kōrerorero rōpū tuihono maha. Kua whakaahuatia a Tamati he "hunga hara tātai, māminga hoki" nāna i huna i muri i "ngā tangata tinihanga i hangaia e te tohunga" ki te mahi i ana hara. I hopukina e nga pirihimana ngā rorohiko pona me ngā pūrere i tōna kāinga, ā, ka kī atu ia ki tētahi āpiha: "Koia tērā kāore au i pīrangi kia kitea e koe," i a ia e mau ana ki te tiakitanga. I whakarewaina te Mahi Bramble, ā, i whakakitea e te tūhuratanga ā-ture tuihono te 110 hāora o te tūkinotanga. I tātaritia e ngā āpiha kātahi anō ka kitea e 146 ngā tūpāpaku i waenganui i te iwa me te 16. I kitea ngā tūpāpaku a Tamati mai i Uēra ki te tonga, ki te uru o Aotearoa, ki te tonga, ki Aiarangi ki te Raki, i Te Hononga o Amerika. I kite te "tukanga māuiui" i ngā āpiha e haere ana ki ngā kura ki runga, ki raro hoki i te whenua me ngā whakaahua o ngā kanohi o te tūkino. I tāutua rātau, a, ka korerotia o rātau mātua. I kī a Det Insp Lianne Rees: "Ehara i te mea ngāwari te kōrero ki tētahi mātua kua pāngia ta rātau tamaiti e tētahi kaiwhaiwhai. " Ko te mea tino whakamataku ko te ōrautanga tiketike o ngā mātua kāore i mōhio ki ngā mahi a ā rātou tamariki i runga i te ipurangi, ā, ko te tikanga he whakatūpato tērā mō ētahi atu. "Tērā ētahi kaiwhaiwhai i reira e tino pai ana ki te rāwekeweke - he mōrearea ngā tamariki, ā, ko te tikanga kia tiakina tika, ā, he nui te mahi a ngā mātua ki tērā." I tāpiritia e Det Insp Rees e hiahia ana a ia ki te hoatu hua ki ngā tamariki i te taone o Rhondda nāna i pūrongo tuatahi a Tamati. "E mōhio ana ahau nā te hopunga tere a Tamati i āwhina ki te ārai i te tokomaha o ētahi atu tūpāpaku, ā, i haere mai i tētahi wā e whakaaro ana ahau kei te whakaatu te hara a Owain Thomas i ngā tohu mōrearea o te whakarerekētanga," tana tāpiri mai.

title: Kapu o te Ao 2018: Ko te tikanga kia mōhio ngā kaihautū o Ingarangi e haere ana ki Rūhia
summary: E hia mano nga kaihautū o Ingarangi e tūmanakohia ana kia haere ki Rūhia mo te Kapu o te Ao 2018 e tīmata ana i te 14 o Hune. Anei ētahi pātai matua e hiahia ana pea rātou ki te mōhio ki te whakautu.
