text: Ka hiahiatia e rātau he visa? I te nuinga o te wā, ka hiahiatia e ngā manuhiri UK ki Rūhia he visa e whā wiki te roa ki te tukatuka. Engari kāore e hiahiatia e ngā kaihautū whutupōro whai tīkiti whai mana mō te ōrite. Ka tukuna kētia ki a rātou tētahi ID Fan e 72 haora te roa ki te tukatuka, ā, me kawe i ngā wā katoa. Ka pau te Fan ID i te 25 o Hōngongoi. Kāore e taea e ngā manuhiri te wehe atu i Rūhia mēnā kua pau tō rātou ID Fan, visa rānei, ā, ka taea te utu whaina, te haere ki te kōti, ā, ka rāhuitia kia kaua e hoki ki te whenua. He aha atu anō ka hiahiatia e rātou? He tino hiahiatia te uruwhenua kua hainatia, ā, neke atu i te ono marama hei whakahaere. Ka hiahiatia hoki tēnei kia uru ki ngā ōritenga. He mea nui hoki te inihua hauora, i te mea kāore te Kāri Inihua Hauora o Ūropi e pā ana ki Rūhia. Me whakakī hoki e ngā kaihaere tētahi kāri hekenga i te taenga atu, ko te hawhe e puritia ana e ngā mana me tērā atu hawhe kia puritia e te manuhiri, ā, ka whakahokia ki ngā kaiwhakahaere tikanga ina wehe atu i Rūhia. He pēhea te haumaru? Kua nui ake ngā renarena tōrangapū ki Rūhia i ngā marama tata nei me te paitini o Te Kāwanatanga o UK ki ngā mana o Rūhia. I kī te Tari Tawahi "me mōhio ngā manuhiri ki te āhua o te whakaaro ārai o Ingarangi, te whakatoi rānei" ā, e tohutohu ana i a rātau kia mataara, kia karo i ngā whakahē, i ngā whakaaturanga rānei, ā, kaua e kōrero tūmatanui mō ngā whanaketanga tōrangapū. Me tirotiro hoki ngā kaihaere i te paetukutuku a te Tari Tawahi mō ngā tohutohu hou rawa. Ina tae ki te whutupōro, e hiahia ana nga mana ki te karo i ngā tāruatanga o ngā tirohanga i Marseille i Ūropi 2016, i te wā i whakaekea ai ngā kaihautū Ingarihi e o rātau hoa Rūhia i te papa tākaro me ngā tiriti. Ka noho nga pirihimana o Ingarangi ki Rūhia puta noa i te whakataetae, ā, ka noho hoki te kāwanatanga o Ingarangi i nga rā ōrite i nga tāone kaihautū. I kī te Tari Tawahi e rima ngā tīma o Ingarangi kua tākaro i ngā ōritenga Pākehā i Rūhia mai i te tau 2016 me te "kāore he take nui i pūrongotia", ā, e "whakahauhautia ana ngā kaihautū o Ingarangi kia noho hei manuhiri pai". Kua tukuna he whakatūpato tāpiri ki ngā kaihaere LGBT. E kī ana te tohutohu: "Ahakoa kua whakawāteatia ngā mahi tōkai ōrite i Rūhia mai i te tau 1993, e tino mārama ana, e tohutohu ana kia kaua koe e whakaatu i tō tōkaitanga, engari kei te tangata tēnei." E whakatūpato ana hoki ki ngā tīkiti whatu i te tiriti, ā, e kī ana me tāpui kē ngā manuhiri mā ngā hōtēra, mā ngā taupānga whai mana rānei. Ko te tikanga kia whakaarohia hoki te hara iti, me nga taonga e hunaia ana, i te mea me tūpato hoki nga manuhiri ki nga rōpū wāhine me nga tamariki e inoi ana. He aha te haumarutanga i nga papa tākaro? Ka kaha te haumarutanga whakarei i nga taiwhanga, ā, ka whakahaua ngā kaihautū kia nui te wā kia puta ai i ngā taki. I te nuinga o te wā ka tuwhera ngā taunga tae atu ki te toru haora i mua i te tīmatanga, ā, ka tukua ngā kaihautū i ngā wāhanga i muri i te taurite, tērā pea ka pau ki te haora. Ka hiahiatia e ngā kaipāngai tā rātou tīkiti ōrite, ID Fan me te uruwhenua kia uru ai. Kaore e whakaaetia nga pāhi ki te whenua, ka tangohia, ka whakahokia i te mutunga. Ko ngā tūemi kua rāhuitia ko te waipiro, ngā rākau me ngā haki nui, ngā kara rānei kāore anō kia whakaaetia i mua. E hia te nui o te haerenga? Ka taea e ngā kaihautū o Ingarangi te whai i to rātau tīma puta noa i Rūhia te karaka i ngā maero. Ka kite te wāhanga rōpū i a Ingarangi e rutu ana i Tunihia i Volgograd i te 18 o Hune, ka tākaro i Panama i Nizhny Novgorod i te 24 o Hune, ā, ka whawhai ki Peretiama i Kaliningrad i te 28 o Hune. Ko Volgograd, e mōhiotia ana i mua ko Stalingrad, kei te tonga ki te hauauru o Rūhia, tata ki te 600 maero (970km) mai i Moscow, e rua haora te rerenga, tae atu rānei ki te 20 haora i runga i te tereina. Ko Nizhny Novgorod, te taone nui tuarima o Rūhia, tata ki te 260 maire (420km) mai i Mohiku, me te wā haere tata ki te 60 meneti mā te rererangi, tae atu rānei ki te rima haora mā te tereina. Tata ki te 770 maire (1,235km) mai i Mohihi a Kailinigrad, ā, ko te haere mā te huarahi me te rēra e hiahia ana ki te whakawhiti i Pērara me Rituānia, ā, ka takawaretia pea te taitapa. Ka taea e ngā kaipupuri tīkiti ōrite whaimana me ngā kaipupuri ID Fan te tono mō te haere koreutu i runga i ngā tereina kua tīpakohia, ā, me rēhita ngā kaihautū i tō rātou taenga mai i roto i te 24 haora i ia taone, ka taea i te hōtēra. Ka taea hoki e ngā kaipupuri ID Fan te haere koreutu i roto i ngā waka tūmatanui i ngā rā ōrite i ngā tāone kaihautū. Me whiwhi a Ingarangi i ta rātau rōpū, ka taea e rātau te tākaro i Mohiku, i Hato Pāhekoheko, i Kazan, i Rostov-on-Don, i Samara rānei. E hia pea te utu? E ai ki a Numbeo, e whakahiato ana i ngā whika i runga anō i ngā raraunga i tukuna e ngā tangata whenua, tata ki te 45% te utu o te noho i Rūhia i te UK. Nō reira ka tae koe ki reira, ā, kua utua e koe ngā rererangi, ngā hōtēra me ngā tīkiti ōrite, kāore e hiahiatia kia nui rawa te utu o te haerenga. Tata ki te £3.60 te utu o te kai kai tere noa, ā, he iti iho te utu o te pia kāinga ki te 84p mō te 0.5l, ahakoa e rua pea te utu o te mea kawemai, ā, mā te cappuccino auau koe e whakahoki mō te £1.50. Ko te tikanga kia utu te kai e toru akoranga mō te tokorua i roto i tētahi wharekai waenganui, ā, ko te utu o te pounamu waina waenganui mō te £4 i ngā mākete. Tērā pea he tino māmā te kawenga me tētahi ID Fan i te mea he waka tūmatanui koreutu i ngā rā ōrite me ngā tereina koreutu i waenganui i ngā tāone kaihautū. I tēnei wā, ka hokona e te £1 te 80 Rubles.

title: Hapa reta TSB 'tērā pea i whati te ture'
summary: Kua tukuna hoki ētahi atu kiritaki TSB e whiwhi ana i ngā reta e whakaae ana ki tētahi amuamu mō te whakarewatanga IT o nā noa nei.
text: Nā Clare MathesonBusiness reporter, i whakaaturia e ngā Reta 5live mai i te pēke te ingoa, te wāhitau me te tau tohutoro o tētahi atu. Kua whakapārewa te pēke mō ngā hapa, engari kua huatau tētahi MP ka takahi pea te hapa i ngā ture parenga raraunga hōu. I kī te mema o te Komiti Pūtea a John Mann: "Tērā pea he mahi mōrearea ki te pēke." 'Kāore he maia' TSB e whawhai ana ki te whakatika i ngā take me ngā ratonga maha mai i tētahi whakawhitinga IT i te mutunga o Aperira. He tīma "e mahi ana i te karaka" ki te whakatika i ngā take, i tīmata i muri i te hekenga o ngā raraunga i runga i ngā kiritaki e rima miriona o TSB mai i te pūnaha IT o te rangatira o Mua o Raiti ki tētahi mea hōu e whakahaeretia ana e te rangatira o nāianei o Sabadell. Ka noho tonu ngā raruraru mō ētahi - otirā ko ngā kaipupuri pūkete pakihi - e ngana ana ki te utu, ki te uru rānei ki ngā mōhiohio tuihono. Ka puta te rangatira nui o te pēke, a Paul Pester, ki te aroaro o ngā MP i runga i te Komiti Pūtea mō te wā tuarua i te Wenerei. Kua tukuna atu ngā reta e whakaae ana ki ngā amuamu mō te whakarewatanga hangarau i te pēke ki ngā kiritaki, engari i roto i te nuinga o aua mēra kua whakaurua he reta anō. I whiwhi a Isabella Morrison-Shand, o Inverness, i tētahi, ā, ka kī atu ki te hōtaka Wake Up To Money o TE 5 ora: "I taku titiro ki te whārangi tuarua ka kitea e au he tau tohutoro, he ingoa me te wāhitau o tētahi tangata ehara i a au. " Mēnā he tāuriuri ahau, ka taea e au te whakapā atu ki a rātou me te kī atu nō TSB ahau, ā, tērā pea ka tinihanga i a rātou ki te kōrerorero i ngā mea. Kāore au i te whirinaki ki a TSB ki te whakahaere i tā rātou whakamahinga o aku raraunga me te pupuri kia haumaru, kia haumaru hoki." I kī tētahi kaikawe kōrero mō te pēke: "E mōhio ana mātou kua puta he take ki tētahi mēra whakaaetanga o nā noa nei. Kei te mahi tahi mātou me tā mātou kaiwhakarato hunga tuatoru kia mārama ki te take taketake o te hapa, ā, e hiahia ana mātou ki te whakapōhēhē ki tētahi tangata ka pāngia." I kī te Tari Komihana Mōhiohio, e pirihimana ana i ngā ture parenga raraunga, e "haere tonu ana ki te uiui e pā ana ki TSB, ā, kei te mōhio mātou ki ngā take haere tonu. Ka taea e ngā kiritaki e māharahara ana ki ā rātou raraunga whaiaro te whakapā mai ki a mātou". I kī atu a Tēnā Mann, he mema o te Komiti Pūtea Moni, e uiui ana i te kōrero TSB, ki te 5 ora: "Kua whati i a rātau te ture. Ahakoa he iti, he iti rānei te takahi i te ture ina tae mai ki te parenga raraunga, he tino hira." I tāpiritia e ia ngā pēke e hiahia ana ki te piri ki ngā paerewa tiketike rawa i runga i te GDPR (General Data Protection Regulation). "E kore te Komihana Mōhiohio e mīharo, ā, e hiahia ana ki te mōhio ki ngā mea e haere ana. Tērā tētahi mahi mōrearea ka taea te mahi ki te pēke," tana kī. I kī te tohunga parenga raraunga o Ardi Kolah e māharahara ana kāore te pēke i te rite mō te ture hou. I tāpiritia e Tēnā Kolah, te kaiwhakahaere o te Hōtaka GDPR i te Kura Pakihi o Henley me te kaituhi o te Pukapuka GDPR, he "whakamere" kāore te kaitiaki pūtea i kōrero mō taua āhuatanga. "Ko tētahi o ngā mea i mahia e te WHK ko te tangi porowhita me te tirotiro me te whakarite kia mahi te mākete. Ehara tēnei i te āhua o te mahi". I tāpiritia hoki e Tēnā Kolah nga raruraru o te pēke ka nui pea te tūkinotanga. "Mēnā ka kitea he āhua kōpikopiko te pēke, ka haere ngā tangata hara katoa i reira 'he wā tēnei ki te haere ki reira ki te tāhae i ngā raraunga a te iwi'." Ināianei, te āhua nei kei te whai painga ngā tinihanga i te raruraru i TSB. Kua tukuna ngā whakatūpato mō ngā tinihanga hītinihanga i whakapā atu ai ngā kiritaki mā te kuputuhi ki te whakamōhio i ā rātou taipitopito pūkete. I tētahi atu wāhi, kua whakamahia te "whakawhiti sim" - e tango ai ngā tinihanga i te waea pūkoro a tētahi tangata kia whiwhi ai rātou i tētahi waehere whakamanatanga mai i tētahi pēke - kua whakamahia. I kī atu a Ronnie, he kaumoana kaihokohoko mai i Pākehā, ki te hōtaka Pouaka Moni a TE Reo Irirangi 4 i tangohia e ia te £13,000 i tana pūkete i tēnei ara.

title: E ngana ana ngā MP SNP ki te ārai i te pire o Te Pire
summary: E ngana ana te SNP ki te ārai i te tono a te kāwanatanga o UK kia tīmata tika i te tukanga o te wehe atu i te Uniana o Ūropi.
text: Kei te tautohetohe te Whare o Ngātahi i te ture e whakaoho ana i te Tuhipānui 50. Ko te SNP - kua whakaraupapatia he mōtini e whakaroa ana i te pire - ā, e ātete ana ngā Pāremata Liberal, engari kua whakahaua e te kaiārahi Mahi a Jeremy Corbyn ana MP kia pōti ki te kāwanatanga. Heoi anō, e tūmanakohia ana ētahi o ngā MP Labour kia whakahē i a Tēnā Kōpihi. Ka whakatau tonu te kāwanatanga ki te whakaoho i ngā whakaritenga mo te putanga mai o te UK i te Uniana o Ūropi i te mutunga o Poutāpeta. Engari ko te whakarākeitanga a te SNP ki te Uniana o Ūropi (Whakamōhiotanga o te Tangohanga) Pire e whakahē ana i te kāwanatanga mo te kore e kōrero tika ki ngā whakahaere i runga i ngā mahere mō Te Kāwanatanga. E kī ana hoki kāore anō te kāwanatanga kia whakaputa i tētahi Pepa Mā e whakamārama ana i ana tono kaupapahere, kāore anō kia hoatu he taurangi ki te tūnga o ngā tangata whenua EU i te UK, ā, kāore anō kia whakaūngia he pōti paremata ā muri ake nei i te koretake. Ko ngā mahere taipitopito e kōrero ana i a ia e whakahuahua ana i te whakarākeitanga, ka kī te MP SNP Stephen Gethins ka whai pānga nui ki te Tuhipānui 50 ki Pākehā. I tautohe a ia ko ngā mahere taipitopito anake mō Te Kāwanatanga i whakaputaina e ngā kāwanatanga o Pirihitini me Welsh. A, i kī a ia kua pōti a Pākehā ki te Noho, ā, ināianei kei te tangohia atu i te EU e tētahi Rōpū Rangatira kātahi anō ka whakairihia tana hua pōti nui kino mai i te tau 1865 i Pākehā. Ka kī a Tēnā Gethins: "Mā te whakawhiti i tēnei pire me te huri tuarā ki tā mātou whakarākeitanga ka huri whakamuri i te kauneketanga i mahia, ā, ka whakahāwea i te whakataunga whakahaere. " E tohutohu ana ahau i ngā mema kia pōti mō tā mātou whakarākeitanga, ki te kore he hipanga whakamuri, whakakino tēnei, ā, he mahi whakararuraru ā-kaupapa, ā-ohaoha hoki." I kitea e Tēnā Gethins tētahi urunga kāore i te mōhiotia i roto i te Tumuaki o Tory o Mua o Ken Clarke, nāna i kī ka "pōti mā tōna hinengaro" me te tautoko i te whakarākeitanga SNP. I whakaahuatia e Tēnā Clarke ngā kitenga o tētahi wā heke mai i muri i te Brexit hei moemoeā "whenua whakamīharo". I tawai hoki a ia i nga tūmanako a te kāwanatanga mo te hokohoko koreutu i muri i tana wehenga atu i te mākete kotahi, a, i kī mai "kāore he whenua whai tikanga he taupānga". I ātete te kāwanatanga ki te pōti i te Kotahitanga, engari i whakahaua kia rapu i te whakaaetanga a te Pāremata mō ana kaupapa e te Kōti Matua i tērā wiki. I kī atu tōna hēkeretari o Te Wānanga, a Rawiri Davis, ki te taupatupatu kāore e taea e ngā MP te pōti ki te ārai i a Pakihi, e kī ana ki a rātau kua hipa kē te "wāhi kāore e hoki mai". I tāpiri mai a ia: "Ehara tēnei i te pire mēnā me wehe atu te UK i te EU, me pēhea rānei e mahi ai. " E pā ana ki te pāremata e whakamana ana i te kāwanatanga ki te whakatinana i tētahi whakataunga kua oti kētia, he wāhi kāore anō kia hoki mai. "I pātai atu mātau ki ngā tāngata o UK mehemea e hiahia ana rātau ki te wehe i te EU. I whakatau rātau i mahia e rātau. Nā reira ko te uho o tēnei Pire e takoto ana i tētahi pātai tino ngāwari. E whakawhirinaki ana tātau ki te iwi, kāore rānei? "Ka whakanuia e mātau te hiahia o te iwi me te whakatinana i to rātau hiahia i te 31 o Poutāpeta." 'Whakataunga uaua' Ko te taupatupatu nā ngā rā e rua kua taha, me te kāwanatanga e tūmanako ana kia toa i te pōti whakamutunga - ahakoa kāore anō kia mārama te rahi o te tutukitanga a ngā MP Mahi ki a rātau tohutohu kia pōti ki te kāwanatanga. I kī te kaikorero o Te Mahi, a Tā Keir Starmer, e rua ngā tuatoru o ngā MP Labour e tohu ana i ngā taiwhanga i pōti ki te wehe i te EU, ā, kotahi tuatoru i pōti ai te tangata kia noho ki roto. "E mārama ana he whakataunga uaua tēnei," tana kī. "E hiahia ana ahau kia haere kē te hua. I whakahauhau ahau mo tēnā. Engari me whakaae to mātau rōpū ki taua hua, ā, e whai ake nei kia kaua te pirimia e āraia i te tīmatanga o ngā whakaritenga o te Tuhipānui 50."

title: E whakapae ana a Kapotia i ngā manene ki te hanga pono i muri i te whakatakotoranga kōrero kōrero
summary: Kua whakahaua e nga rōia i Kapotia e 10 nga manene, tae atu ki ngā Pirihitini e rima, ki te whakaputa i ngā atahanga āhuaatua.
text: I hopukina rātau i te Rāitema i muri i te putanga mai o ngā whakaahua o ngā tāngata e puta ana ki te pakoire i ngā mahi wahine i tētahi hākari i tētahi whare i Siem Reap i te raki-uru. Ki te whakawāteatia, ka taea e rātau te anga atu ki te kotahi tau i roto i te whare herehere. I waenganui hoki i te hunga i hopukina ko ngā tangata whenua o Kānata, o Aotearoa, o Hōrana me Nōwei, e kī ana ngā pūrongo. Whakatūpato: Tērā pea ka kitea e koe tētahi pikitia i raro iho i tēnei whārangi whakahāwea, engari he tokomaha ngā tāngata i roto i ngā pikitia mai i te rōpū kāore e puta mai i waenganui i ērā i puritia, e kī ana ngā pūrongo. I kī te Tari Ā-Rohe o Ingarangi e whakarato āwhina ana ki ngā taurewa o UK. I kī ngā pirihimana he tūnga te whare tūmataiti i runga i tētahi pāparapara kua whakaritea, ka pūrongotia e te Press Association. Ko ngā atahanga i whakairihia ki tētahi paetukutuku whakahaere i whakaaturia ai ētahi mārena kākahu i runga i te papa o te villa, ko te āhua nei e whakatau ana i ngā tūnga tōnā. I kī atu tētahi mema o te rōpū ki a PA mai i te whare herehere, tata ki te 30 ngā pirihimana kua tomo ki te whare i roto i tētahi poho "pōraru". "I whakaekea e rātau, ka whakatata i a mātau, tata ki te 80 ki te 100 ngā tāngata i tēnei rōpū, ko ētahi o rātau he tūruhi." Ka kī atu te whaea o tētahi mema o te rōpū ki a PA me haina e nga taurewa ngā pepa i tuhia ki Khmer "kāore i te mōhio he aha rātou". E paingia ana a Siem Reap e ngā tūruhi nā te mea e tata ana ki ngā toenga tahito rongonui o Angkor Wat, te wāhi tūruhi nui rawa o Kapotia. Kua tere te tipu o tōna tirohanga pō i ngā tau tata nei, i te mea kua nui ake te āheitanga ki ngā kaieke me ngā kaihaere pūtea. I ētahi wā ka tūpono tēnei i ngā tūruhi ki te ahurea tūturu pāpori o Kapotia. I kī atu a Duong Thavry, te rangatira o te Tari Ārai Tangata me te Tari Parenga Pūhouhou i Siem Reap, ki te wāhi rongokōrero o TE WHK kua hopukina te rōpū "nā te mea i mahia e rātau ngā ngohe e hāngai ana ki to mātau ahurea".

title: Covid: Man punched for taking off face mask on Blackpool tram
summary: I whakaekea tētahi pāhihi tereina i tana tangohanga i tana hīpoki kanohi ki te kōrero ki tōna whaea pakeke, kua kī pirihimana.
text: I te ngana te tama ki te kōrero ki tōna whaea, e 90 ōna tau, i runga i te ratonga i Blackpool i te tono a tērā tangata kia hipokina e ia tōna kanohi. Kātahi ia ka kōwhao i te tūkinotanga, nāna i pāngia he ururua. Kāore he hopunga i mahia mai i te whakaekenga i te 4 o Mahuru, ā, kua tukua e ngā Pirihimana o Te Pirihimana ngā atahanga C KKK o te hunga pōhēhē. I pā mai te "whakaekenga mōrearea" ki te Huarahi o Balmoral me Bond Street i te 20:30 BST, ka kī te ope. I whakaahuatia e RW Laura Alves te pakeke o te 30 tau, tata ki te 5ft 6in (168cm) te roa, ā, he nui te hanga. I te mau pango katoa a ia me te hīpoki kanohi kiwikiwi, a, he māhunga heu me ngā makawe pouri, ka kī a ia. "He whakaekenga mōrearea tēnei ki tētahi tangata e ngana ana ki te kōrero ki tōna whaea e uaua ana te whakarongo," te tāpiri mai a PC Alves. He aha e kore ai e whai i a BBC North West i Facebook, Twitter me Instagram? Ka taea hoki e koe te tuku whakaaro pūrākau ki northwest.newsonline@bbc.co.uk

title: Tayside is home to about 150 beavers, report says
summary: Kua whakaarohia e tētahi pūrongo ki ngā ngohe a ngā beavers i Tayside, tata ki te 150 o ngā kararehe i taua rohe.
text: Scottish Natural Heritage (SNH) had commissioned the study to examine the status of the beaver in the Tay region. E whakaaro ana te tinana e 38, e 39 rānei ngā rōpū beaver i te takiwā o Tay, e ōrite ana ki te 146 kararehe. Kua tūtohutia e SNH te whakaurunga o ngā aronui whakamaurutanga beaver, hei whakaiti i te pānga o ngā kararehe ki te taiao paetata. I te rau tau 18 ka ngaro te beaver Pākehā, te muka Castor, i Pākehā i te rau tau 18 nā te nui o te whaiwhai. He maha ngā rangahau E whakapono ana ko ngā iwi whānui pia mohoao o nāianei i Tayside ko ngā uri o ngā mawhiti mai i ngā kohinga tūmataiti i Angus me Perthshire i roto i ngā tekau tau kua taha. I whakakotahitia e te akoranga SNH ngā hua o ngā rangahau āpure maha i mahia i waenganui i te 28 Me me te 6 o Hōngongoi i tēnei tau, me ētahi atu kitenga beaver mo te wā roa. E hua ana ngā kitenga he 0.14 - 0.15 ngā rōpū beaver mō ia km o te ara wai i te wāhi hopu o te Awa o Tay. I kī a SNH kua kitea e ta rātau uiuinga e toru anake ngā rōpū beaver i hanga matatara i taua rohe. I kī rātau e whitu ngā matatara e pupuritia ana e ngā kararehe i tēnei wā, ā, nā ngā ngohe hanga matatara a ngā whānau beaver e rua i puta ai ngā take paetata, nā reira ka tangohia e ngā kaipupuri whenua ngā matatara. Heoi anō, i kitea hoki e SNH kāore he raruraru o nga kaihīika me ngā hī ika o te rohe, i uiuia i roto i te akoranga, ā, i kī hoki i te aroaro o ngā whāngote whāngote i whakanuia te wheako hī ika. I kī te Taonga Tuku iho Māori o Pirihitini i whakaaturia e te akoranga te hiahia kia aroturuki anō i ngā ngohe a ngā beavers, ā, ka karangatia mō ngā rangahau tukurua ā-tau hei ine i te manawanui, te tupu me te horahanga o te iwi whānui o nāianei. I tūtohutia hoki e SNH te whakaurunga o ngā aronui whakamaurutanga whakamātautau kia noho tahi ai te tangata me ngā beavers. Ko ngā tikanga whakamaurutanga i huatau ko te tāuta i ngā pūrere whakahaere rerenga ki ngā matatara beaver raruraru, te pare i ngā rākau nui, taonga rānei i te taha o ngā awa e tukituki ana ngā beaver me te pare i ngā whare beaver kia kore ai e horoia kia whakaiti ai i ngā mahi hanganga beaver. Te whakahaere i ngā beavers Whai muri i te pūrongo, ka karanga a David Bale, te kaiwhakahaere o te Rōpū Ako o Tayside Beaver, ki ngā rangatira whenua e pāngia ana e ngā beaver kia whakapā atu ki a rātou. Ka kī a ia: "Mo te wā tuatahi, he pikitia mārama tā mātou e hia ngā beaver me te tawhiti o te horahanga. I te mea kei tētahi wāhi pāmu me te hī ika ngā beavers, he wā pai tēnei ki te kite i te pānga o te beavers ki te whakamahi whenua. "We encourage land managers to contact the Tayside Beaver Study Group if they have any issues with the beavers on their land. " E hiahia ana te rōpū ki te tohutohu i ngā huarahi whakamate kore o te whakahaere i ngā raruraru e puta mai ana i ngā matatara me te keri i ngā pēke, me te āwhina ki te pare i ngā rākau whai tikanga." I tāpiritia e Īna Mackintosh, mai i te National Union of Farmers in Scotland: "Me whakamahi ngā tau e rua e whai ake nei hei whakarato i te rōpū ako ki ngā whakaaturanga ki te āhua noho me ngā tikanga o ngā beavers me tō rātou pānga ki ētahi atu whakamahinga whenua i taua rohe. " He mea nui hoki te kohikohi i ngā taipitopito mō te tūnga hauora o ngā kararehe kia mōhio ai mēnā kei te whanga rātou i ētahi mate e uaua ana pea ki te whakahaere. "E noho hāngai ana ngā kaiahuwhenua ki ngā momo maha, engari mēnā ka puta mai he take papā, me āhei tātau ki te whakamauru i te wā, me te kore kawenga takawaenga."

title: Te ahi o te papa waka o Derby Assembly Rooms: Ka kati te wāhi mo te waru wiki
summary: Ka katia tētahi wāhi o Derby mō te waru wiki neke atu rānei i muri i te ahi nui i tōna papa motokā papa maha, kua kī te kaunihera o te taone.
text: Me whakawāteatia te rūma tipu i tīmata ai te mura, e kī ana te kaunihera. Neke atu i te toru haora te roa o te ahi ki te whakahaere i te ahiahi o te Paraire. Kei te uiui tonu te take i tīmata ai te ahi i roto i ngā wae hauora. I kī te Kaunihera Taone o Derby he "kore hanganga" te pae, nā reira ko te aromatawai i te whānuitanga katoa o te tūkinotanga he "mōrea nui, nō reira ka pau te wā". Ko te rūma tipu i te papa o runga o te papa motokā i whakarato i ngā ratonga whakamahana, wai wera me ngā ratonga hauora ki te wāhi. Ko tētahi o ngā whakakitenga i whakakorea nā te comedian Sarah Millican. Ka tūtohu a ia: "E pouri ana ki te kī atu kāore aku whakaaturanga e 3 @derbylive tēnei wiki e haere whakamua nā te ahi. Ka whakaritea anōtia rātau. Ākuanei ētahi atu mōhiohio. Aroha mai." Ka tohutohu te kaunihera i ngā tāngata whai tīkiti kia haere ki te paetukutuku o te wāhi mō ngā taipitopito mō ngā whakaaturanga kua whakakorea. Ka haere tonu ngā takahanga Derby Live kua whakaritea i te Whare Tapere o Guildhall i Te Wāhi Mākete o Derby me ētahi atu wāhi o te taone, ka rite ki te whakaritenga, ka kī te kaunihera. I te tiketike o te ahi, ka pūrongotia e ngā kaititiro te kite i "ngā paowa nui, mātotoru, pango hoki". Na nga kaipatu ahi i ārai te mura kia kore ai e horapa ki nga Rūma Whakaminenga.

title: Ka kakara te whare wānanga i te kaupapa hei waihanga anō i ngā kakara mahi hītori me ngā kakara kakara
summary: Ko ngā kakara "kino me te kakara" o tō tātau wā o mua mai i te umanga ki te kakara o Marie Antoinette me waihanga anō i roto i tētahi kaupapa Pākehā e £2.5m.
text: E āwhina ana te Whare Wānanga o Anglia Ruskin ki te hanga i tētahi pūranga kakara mai i te rau tau 16 ki te tīmatanga o te rau tau 20. I kī a Dr William Tullet, te kaituhituhi hītori kakara o Cambridge, i a rātau e pūtahi ana ki ngā oranga o ia rā, "e tika ana kia whai hītori". Ka tiria tuihonotia ngā kitenga, i ngā whare taonga puta noa i Uropi a tērā tau. Ka huihuia e te kaupapa Odeuropa ngā kōrero hītori, ngā tohunga mōhiohio horihori (AI), ngā kēmu me ngā kaikakara mai i Hōrana, Tiamana, Itari, Wīwī, Horowinia me te UK. E tūmanako ana ka waihangatia anō e rātau ngā kakara e tāwhai ana i ngā tukanga matū me ngā tukanga whakanao e pā ana ki te Hurihanga Mahi. I kī a Dr Tullett: "E whakaaro ana mātou he wāhi tino haunga te wā o mua. " E noho ana tātau i roto i tētahi ao māmā ake, pai ake i tēnei rā, engari ko tētahi o ngā take o te kaupapa ko te whakawehe i a tātau i te hiahia noa iho ki te piro o mua, me te ngana ki te whakahauhau i te tangata kia whakaaro ki te hara me te kakara. "Kua whakaahuatia e Covid-19 ngā pānga kino hōhonu o te ngaromanga o te kakara - he tohu me te pānga taha o te mate - ki tō tātau oranga hinengaro me te tinana. " Kua miramiratia e te taiepa te ngoikoretanga o o tātau taiao pūoko me te hiahia ki te pupuri i ngā kakara e whai tikanga ana ki ngā hapori." Ka whakamahia e te kaupapa ngā rorohiko AI hei kimi tohutoro ki ngā kakara pēnei i ngā kakara whawhai mate me te tupeka i roto i ngā tuhinga hītori me ngā peita. Kātahi ka ngana ki te waihanga anō i a rātou mā te āwhina a ngā kēmu me ngā kaikakara, ka kī te whare wānanga o Cambridgeshire me Essex. I kī a Pita Bell, ahorangi o ngā tikanga tangata mamati i Friedrich-Alexander Universität i Erlangen, Tiamana: "E hiahia ana mātou ki te whakaako i te rorohiko kia kite i te haunga. " Ko tā mātou whāinga ko te whakawhanake i tētahi 'ihu rorohiko' e āhei ana ki te whakataki i ngā kakara me ngā wheako kakara i roto i ngā kuputuhi mamati i roto i ngā rau tau e whā me ngā reo e whitu." Kimihia te Rongokōrero o TE Rāwhiti o Ingarangi i Facebook, Instagram me Twitter. Mēnā he huatau pūrākau tāu, īmēra eastofenglandnews@bbc.co.uk

title: E karanga ana te whānau o Ihu Halawa ki te mahi ture ki Ihipa
summary: Kua karangatia e te whānau o tētahi Kīriria kua hereheretia me te kore whakawā i Ihipa mai i te tau 2013 ki te kāwanatanga o Kīriria kia mahi i ngā mahi ā-ture o te ao whānui.
text: E 17 tau a Ihu Halawa, e 21 ināianei, i te wā i hopukina ai ia me ōna tuahine tokotoru i te whakapaenga i tētahi wharenui o Kairo. Kua taraiwa hiakai a ia, ā, kua ngoikore rawa nā te kaimahi o te whare herehere i whakamahi i tētahi tūru tūru hei kawe i a ia kia kite i ōna whanaunga i tērā wiki, ka kī tana rōia. I te Wenerei, ka hikitia tana whakawātanga mo te wā 20 i roto i te tata ki te whā tau. I roto i tētahi kōrero i muri i te whakarongo o te Wenerei, ka kī tōna tuahine, a Somaia Halawa: "Ko te mea pouri kei te mate taku tuakana i roto i tētahi whare herehere o Ihipiana, e anga ana ki tētahi whakamātautau maha, ā, i tēnei mokatere ka neke atu i te 10 tau. " Nā te āhua hinengaro me te āhua ā-tinana o Ihu o nāianei, kāore mātau e whakapono ka kaha rawa a ia ki te ora i taua takaware." I tāpiri mai a ia: "Kua kore e taea te whakaae ki te tukanga whakamātautau hē me ngā here i herea ai a Ihu." 'Whakararuraru' Kua karangatia e te whānau te kāwanatanga o Kīriria kia tīmata i ngā takahanga ture ki te āhua o Ihipiana i te Kōti o te Ture o te Ao Whānui. Ko Tēnā Halawa, i whānau, i whakaarahia i Dublin, te tama a te minita Mohimana matua rawa i te Whenua o Airangi. I mua i te whakarongo hou rawa, ka kī a Taoiseach (Pirimia o Airana) Enda Kenny i "whakararurarutia" a ia e ngā pūrongo kei roto a Tēnā Halawa i tētahi tūru tūruhi, ā, e hiahia ana kia aromatawaia tōna hauora "mai i tētahi tirohanga rongoā o Kīriria". I te Rātapu, ka kī a Sinn Féin MEP Lynn Boylan, i muri iho i te toru tau i roto i te tiakitanga, kātahi anō ka "pakaru" te wairua o te herehere. I a ia e kōrero ana ki te kaipānui o Airana, RTÉ, i kī a ia kei te "ora tonu" a ia ki ngā werohanga huka. I kī te rōia o Tāne Halawa, a Darragh Mackin, i te Rā te Wenerei: "E mārama ana kāore te tukanga whakamātautau o nāianei e tutuki i ngā paerewa e hiahiatia ana e te ture o te ao whānui." Ko tana umanga, ko Kevin Winters Law, e hiahia ana ki te tuku whakaaro ā-ture ki te kāwanatanga o Airana i roto i ngā rā me pēhea te tāpae i te kerēme. 'Whakararuraru' Kua hikitia te whakawā tae noa ki te 5 o Āperira. Mo nga tau maha, ka anga atu a Tēnā Halawa ki te whiu mate mehemea i kitea he hara ia, engari i te Hānuere, ka kī atu a Perehitini Sisi ki tētahi tonotono o nga kaipōrangapū o Kīriria ka tukuna e ia he murunga ki a Tēnā Halawa ina mutu tana whakawā. Kua whakahē te pāremata o Ihipiana ki ngā waea mai i te pāremata o Kīriria ki te tuku i te tangata o Dublin, e kī ana ka whakararuraru te tono i nga take a te whakawāwā o Ihipiana. I puta a ia i tētahi "wheako whakamataku", e kī ana a Amnesty International, e 1,313 ngā pō "i hereheretia hētia". "Kei te tino māharahara tonu a Amnesty International mo tōna oranga hinengaro, ā-tinana hoki," te kī a te aroha i roto i tētahi kōrero. "Ka tāruatia e mātau ta mātau karanga ki nga mana o Ihipiana kia whakataka i ngā whakapae katoa ki a Ihu me te whakahau i tana tuku wawe, tōtika hoki. E tohutohu ana hoki mātou i te kāwanatanga o Kīriria kia haere tonu te mahi mōna, kia whakamahi hoki i ngā tikanga katoa e wātea ana ki a rātau hei whakaū i tōna tukunga" . I hopukina te whānau i te wā o to rātau hopunga, i te hararei whānau nga Halawa i Ihipa. I rite tonu ta rātau haere ki ngā whakahēnga ārai kāwanatanga i Kairo, i whakatūria hei tautoko i te Perehitini o Moameta Morsi. I hopukina te whānau, tae atu ki ētahi atu, i te wā i whakaekea e nga ope haumarutanga o Ihipiana te wharenui o Al-Fath i Aotearoa 2013. I muri i te toru marama, ka tukua nga tuahine tokotoru o Tāne Halawa, ā, i whakaaetia kia hoki ki te kāinga ki Dublin, engari i noho tonu ia i te whare herehere.

title: Ka rongoatia a Hōri Alagiah mo te mate pukupuku whekau mo te tuarua o nga wā
summary: Ko te kaipānui rongokōrero o TE AO ko George Alagiah me whakararuraru rongoā mo te mate pukupuku whekau mo te tuarua o nga wā.
text: I whakaūngia te rongo e te māngai o te 62 tau, nāna i tāpiri mai: "Kei te kōrero a ia ki tana tīma rongoā mō ngā kōwhiringa rongoā me te huarahi whakamua." I mua rā i whakamahia a Alagiah i Aperira 2014, ka hoki mai ki te mata 18 marama i muri iho. I roto i tētahi kōrero, ka kī te HAU: "Ka tukuna e te katoa a Hōri me tōna whānau i a rātau hiahia tino pai i a ia e pā ana ki te rongoā." Ka kī a Lagiah: "E tino whakaaro ana aku tākuta mātauranga ki te whakahoki i ahau ki tētahi āhua kore mate, ā, e mōhio ana ahau kei a rātau te pūkenga ki te mahi i tēnā. " I learned last time around how important the support of whānau and friends is and I am blessed in that department. E tino pai ana ahau i a au e takatū ana mō tēnei wero hou." I kitea e Alagiah he mate pukupuku whekau tōna wāhanga whā i te tau 2014 i muri i tana amuamu i te toto i roto i ōna tūru. E toru nga pokanga i mahia e ia hei tango i ngā puku e waru i roto i tōna ate, tae atu ki te kōmihi. I muri iho ka whakawāteatia a Alagiah i te mate, ka hoki ki te whakaatu i ngā hōtaka rongokōrero i te BBC i Whiringa 2015. He aha te mate pukupuku whekau? Pūtake: Bowel Cancer UK, Cancer Research UK me NHS Choices. Whāia mātou i Facebook, i Twitter @BBCNewsEnts, i Instagram rānei i bbcnewsents. Mēnā he huatau pūrākau tāu, īmēra entertainment.news@bbc.co.uk.

title: He pūkenga hinu maha hōu i Ferrybridge hei waihanga mahi
summary: E hia rau ngā mahi me waihanga ki tētahi pūkenga hinu maha hōu e £300m i tētahi teihana hiko o West Yorkshire.
text: Work on the 68MW combined heat and power facility is due to start at Ferrybridge later this year and be completed by early 2015. I kī te kamupene hiko SSE e hia rau ngā mahi ka waihangatia i te wā o te hanganga, me te 50 ngā mahi wā katoa hōu e hiahiatia ana ina whakahaeretia te tipu. Ka whakamahia e te pānga he awhe pūtake hinu mai i te rohe o Aotearoa. Ko te pānga, Multifuel Energy Ltd, he mahi ngātahi i waenganui i te SSE me te kamupene whakahaere moumou o Wheelabrator Technologies. Ina mahia, ka hokona te hiko i hangaia ki SSE. Ko ngā pūtake hinu e whakamahia ana hei whakaputa hiko ko ngā biomass, ngā kora parakore me ngā wahie parakore. Ka taea e te tipu te whakahaere i ētahi 740,000 tāhei hinu whāranu i ia tau. I kī a Gary Aguinaga, te kaiwhakahaere whakahaere o Wheelabrator Technologies i te UK: "Kei te haere te mahi whakaritenga i runga i te pae, ā, ka tīmata te hanganga katoa i te raumati. " Mā tēnei e whakarato mahi mō ngā rau kaimahi i roto i te wāhanga hanga e toru tau, ā, e tūmanako ana mātou ki te whakahaere katoa o te pūkenga hinu maha o Ferrybridge i te raumati 2015." Ngā Hononga Ipurangi Pātahi SSE Ferrybridge Wheelabrator Technologies

title: Peterborough dog Ziggy in one-minute crossbow bolt removal operation
summary: Kotahi meneti noa iho te mahi mārire ki te tango i tētahi pere kopere e mau ana ki te māhunga o te kurī, ka kī te RSPCA.
text: I kitea a Ziggy i te ngahere mamao tata ki Wansford i Peterborough i te ata o te Wenerei. I whakaaturia e ngā hihi X kātahi anō ka hapa te patu i tōna angaanga me ōna whēkau nui. I āwhina a RSPCA Insp Justin Stubbs i tētahi kararehe "pōturi, āta kumea te bolt ki waho" o te kurī whakangāwari. "He manawa i roto i te waha, engari kei te tino pai te whakaora a Ziggy," tana kī. I āta pūhia te kurī e rua tau. He "tino āta tirotiro i te tawhiti tino tata", te kī a te RSPCA. 'Mapu māmā' E whakaarotia ana i ora anake a Ziggy mā te neke i tōna māhunga "i te wā tika". Na te whakamātautau i ōna whara i whakaatu ai i a Ziggy e tīpokapoka ana i te ngahere mō ētahi rā, "wehi, i te mamae katoa", i mua i te kitenga e ngā kaihīkoi tokorua. Ahakoa he 50cm (20ins) te poro waro e mau ana mai i tētahi taha o tōna māhunga ki tētahi, kei te piupiu tonu a Ziggy i tōna waero, ā, e hiahia ana kia utiuti te tangata i a ia, ka kī a Tēnā Stubbs. Heoi anō, i anga atu te kararehe ki te mahi tango i te patu. "I hapa i te roro o Ziggy, ngā taringa, ngā whatu me te wheua angaanga mā te mirimita, engari kāore ngā hihi X e whakaatu i ngā oko toto nui," te kī a Tēnā Stubbs. "He tino ngākau i roto i te waha me te tūmanako ki te tino pai, engari i a mātau ngā mea katoa ki te pā mai tētahi mea." I te pōturi o te pōhēhētanga, ka mōhio a Tēnā Stubbs, te kararehe me te nēhi kāore anō kia pā ki ētahi oko toto. "Ki taku whakaaro kāore tētahi tangata i whai manawa mō te meneti kotahi. Kātahi anō ka mapu whakamāmā," te kī a Tēnā Stubbs. "Kātahi anō ka puta i roto i te kikokiko ngohengohe, ā, kāore anō kia pā ki te uaua." Ināianei kei te tiakina a Ziggy i ngā whare pātata e kīa ana kei te mahi ia i "tētahi whakaoranga merekara". "Kei te herea a ia me te mea kāore he mea i puta," te kī a Tēnā Stubbs. "Mēnā he anahera kaitiaki tā te kurī, he anahera kaitiaki tā Ziggy i taua rā." Kei te tūhura tonu te RSPCA, ā, kua tono mōhiohio mō te whakaekenga.

title: Ko te pūngāwerewere-Man tāuke a Te Pūngāwerewere o Te Pūngāwerewere o Te Pūngāwerewere o Te Pūngāwerewere o Te Pūngāwerewere
summary: Kua whakaohotia e te kēmu Marvel Avengers e tū mai nei he whakahoki i muri i te whakaaturanga ka noho anake a Spider-Man ki te putanga PlayStation.
text: I kī tōna kaiwhakawhanake ka wātea te tukutuku-slinger hei ihirangi tikiake (DLC) a tērā tau i runga i te pūhara kotahi anake. Ka tukua te kēmu i te 4 o Mahuru puta noa i ngā pūhara maha tae atu ki PS4, Xbox One me te RW. Kua huatau ngā kaipāngai ka kite te neke i te tokomaha o ngā kaitākaro e ngaro ana i te wheako katoa o te kēmu. Mai i te tau 1999, kua riro i a Kapa ngā mana whitiāhua ki Spider-Man, ā, ko tētahi kēmu ataata e kīia ana e te pūngāwerewere tukutuku - Marvel's Spider-Man - he PlayStation 4 tāuke i te tau 2018. Heoi anō, kua puta mai te tama tangata i ētahi atu kēmu i runga i ngā papatohu maha me te rorohiko i roto i ngā tau, tae atu ki ngā taitara i runga anō i te pikitia The Amazing Spider-Man me tōna whainga 2014. He tokomaha nga kaipāngai i tiritiri i to rātau whakapouri i runga i te pāpāho pāpori i muri i te pānuitanga ohorere i te Mane. "Hei kaitākaro PS me te RW, ka tīpoka noa ahau i ngā Avengers ināianei. He mea wahangu tēnei ki te mahi," te amuamu a tētahi kaitākaro. "He tangata PlayStation ahau, ā, kei te pouri tonu ahau, ka pōrangi tonu ina maukatia tētahi mea pēnei i te Pūngāwerewere-Man, i ngā mea rānei ki te PS anake. Ko te tikanga kia tino ngahau hoki ngā kaitākaro Xbox," te kī a tētahi atu. Ka whakawāteatia te Pūngāwerewere-Man ki ngā kaitākaro PlayStation kāore he utu tāpiri, ā, ka tohua te putanga e tētahi takahanga kēmu. I kī atu a Ludo Medina, te kaiwhakarewa tahi o te pūhara kēmu o te Kaunihera N-Erd, ki te AO mā te neke e whakahau te tokomaha o ngā kēmu ki te "kōwhiri taha". "Ehara ngā tāuke i te mea hōu ina tae mai ki ngā kēmu, engari ko ngā pūāhua tāuke mō ngā papatohu tauwhāiti? He rohe hou katoa tēnei. "He tino tika ki a rātou, ā, ka waiho te RW me te Xbox e iri ana ki te maroke. E kī ana ngā kaitākaro e whakahau ana i a rātou kia kōwhiri noa iho i waenga i tētahi, i tētahi rānei." I whakaūngia hoki e Crystal Dynamics ko te tāpiritanga pūāhua tuatahi o te kēmu ko Hawkeye, ā, ka wātea puta noa i ngā pūhara katoa.

title: Ngā Pepa Pararaiha: I karohia e Blackstone ngā tāke UK i St Enoka Centre
summary: I karohia e te umanga tūmataiti Blackstone te tekau miriona pauna i roto i ngā tāke UK i runga i ngā mahi āhuatanga i Glasgow me London, e whakaatu ana ngā Pepa Pararaiha.
text: E whakaatu ana ngā tuhinga i whakamahia e ia ngā kamupene o waho hei hoko me te whakahaere i te Pokapū Hokohoko o Hato Enoka i Glasgow me Chiswick Business Park i Rāwāhi. E whakaatu ana ngā pepa he pēhea te whakamahere a ngā kamupene kaute i ngā rautaki hei whakaiti, hei karo rānei i ia tāke nui. I kī a Blackstone ko ana pūtea penapena he "tino tautuku ki ngā ture tāke UK". Ngā Pepa Pararaiha - Ko ngā mea ngaro tāke o ngā mahi Āhuatanga tino rangatira Ko Blackstone tētahi o ngā rōpū tūmataiti nui rawa o te ao, ā, ko tōna kaiwhakarewa me te rangatira nui o Stephen Schwarzman he tino pono ki a Perehitini Trump. Ko ngā tuhinga māturu mai i te umanga ture o waho o Appleby, i kitea e TE Pākehā, e whakaatu ana i te wā tuatahi he pēhea te hanganga a te rōpū i ngā mahi āhuatanga nui e rua o UK. I tukuna e ngā kamupene kaute matua ngā tuhinga roa ki Blackstone e whakahuahua ana me pēhea e taea ai te whakamahi i ngā whakawhirinaki i te rāhui tāke o Jersey me tētahi hanganga matatini o ngā kamupene i Rakapuō mō te hokonga o Chiswick Park me te Pokapū o Hato Enoka. Kāore he huatau he mana kore mana ngā kaupapa, engari i whakaahuatia e ngā kaiwhakahauhau te Whatunga Ture Tāke ngā hanganga i whakamahia e Blackstone hei "pakiwaitara ohaoha". I kī atu rātau ki te AO e mārama ana mai i ngā raraunga i roto i ngā pepa ko te take matua o ngā hanganga, e tata ana ki te ōrite, ko te karo tāke. I kī te tohunga tāke o Amerika, o Reuven Avi-Yonah, mai i te kura ture o Te Whare Wānanga o Te Whare T "Mēnā ka mōhio a HMRC ki te mea he momo whakaraupapa noa iho tēnei, tērā pea ka werohia e rātou nā te mea ka mōhio rātou kei te ngaro te nui o ngā moni," tana kī. I hokona e Chiswick Park Blackstone a Chiswick Park, he whanaketanga tari 33 eka i te uru o Rānana, i te tau 2011 mō te £480m. Ko te nuinga o te pae, e taurima ana i te tari matua o UK o ngā kamupene pēnei i Pokemon, Avon me te hongere hokohoko QVC, i hokona ki te kāwanatanga Hainamana mō te £780m i te tau 2014. E hua ana ngā raraunga i whakaaetia e ngā hanganga tāke a Blackstone kia karo i te £19m i roto i te mahi pane kuini i runga i te hokonga. Ko te tikanga hoki o te hanganga tāke ka taea te karo i te tāke tae atu ki te £30m moni rēti ā-tau me te tāke whiwhinga pūtea i runga i te hokonga o te pāka pakihi, tērā pea he tekau miriona pauna. I te tau 2013, i hokona hoki e te matua tūmataiti te Pokapū o Hato Enoka i Glasgow, he matatini hokohoko nui o te taone nui e tata ana ki te 100 ngā pātaka, mō te £190m. E whakaatu ana ngā tuhinga tērā pea ka karohia e ia te mahi pane kuini o te £7.6m me te tāke rangatōpū tae atu ki te £10m moni rēti ā-tau. Tuhinga pūtake Tata tonu te ōrite o te Pokapū o Hato Enoka, e noho tonu ana a Blackstone, me Chiswick Park i roto i ngā whakawhirinaki āhuatanga e mōhiotia ana ko JPUTs, i te rāhui tāke o Jersey, i te wā i hokona ai. Nā tēnei i āhei ai te umanga ki te hoko i ngā āhuatanga me te kore utu i ngā miriona pauna i roto i te mahi pane kuini o UK. I kī atu a George Turner, mai i te Tax Justice Network, ki te BBC: "Ko tā rātou mahi ko te hoko ki roto i te whakawhirinaki kia hokona ai e ngā rangatira taketake te rawa ki Blackstone, kāore rātau i te hoko i te āhuatanga anō. " I te hokona e rātau he painga ki te whakawhirinaki nāna te rawa, ā, nā te mea kei waho taua whakawhirinaki, ka taea e rātau te karo i te mahi pane kuini." I raro i te hanganga tāke i whakaaturia i roto i ngā tuhinga mārire, nā ngā whakawhirinaki o Jersey i pupuri, i pūteatia hoki e ngā kamupene i rēhitatia e Blackstone i Rakapuō. I tātaritia ngā moni mō te hokonga o ngā āhuatanga mā ngā kamupene Rakapurangi mai i ngā moni Blackstone matua i te āhua o ngā moni a te kamupene. Ko ngā utu huamoni o ēnei moni, i tukuna tika mai i tētahi kamupene Blackstone ki tētahi atu, ka taea te tuhi ki ngā hua o te moni rēti, ko te tikanga he iti rawa te tāke i utua ki Rakapuō. I te kēhi o Chiswick Park, i whakaratoa he tuhinga whārangi 33 e te umanga kaute o PwC e whakahuahua ana i te hanganga hei whakamahi. I tukuna e tētahi atu o ngā umanga kaute "Big Four", a Deloitte, tētahi tuhinga whārangi 67 mō tētahi hanganga tāke ōrite mō te Pokapū o Hato Enoka. Ko te mahi a te umanga ture a Appleby, nāna i pupuri ngā tuhinga i kitea e te BBC, ko te whakatinana i ngā hanganga i whakahuahuatia e nga kaikaute. Ko te take matua ko te karo: I kī a George Turner, mai i te Whatunga Ture Tāke: "He tino mīharo te reo i ngā wāhi nā te mea he tino mārama, he mārama hoki he aha te whakaaro. " Ko tāu i konei he tini kamupene e whakatūria ana, ko te nuinga o Rakapuō, engari kei a koe hoki tēnei hanganga whakawhirinaki i Jersey, ā, te āhua nei he pakiwaitara ohaoha ki ngā whāinga katoa." Ko ngā moni tārewa a te kamupene Ko te hua mai i te moni rēti i te Pokapū o Hato Enoka, tata tonu ki te £10m i te tau. Na te hanganga i tohutohutia e Deloitte i whakaae ai a Blackstone ki te huri i tēnā hei moni whiwhinga kore tāke, mā te tuhi atu ki ngā utu huamoni i hangaia mai i ngā moni i mahia e ōna kamupene ki a rāua anō. I ētahi tau, te āhua nei he torutoru mano pauna noa iho i utua e ngā kamupene Blackstone Luxembourg nā Hato Enoka me Chiswick. Mr Turner said: "What seems to be happening is that the rental income which is coming in, the companies receiving that are then borrowing huge amounts of money from other companies which are part of the Blackstone Group. " Ināianei ina tono rātou i taua moni, me utu huamoni rātou, ā, ka whakangaromia e aua utu huamoni te hua o aua kamupene. "Kei te tono moni rātau i a rātau anō, ā, ka taea e rātau te tono i tētahi whakatauranga tāke mo tērā." I kī a Blackstone: "E tino hāngai ana ngā pūtea penapena a Blackstone ki ngā ture me ngā ture tāke o UK me te ao whānui. " I riro mai ngā hanganga pūtea penapena āhuatanga i ngā kaiwhakangao ā-iwi, ā, he momo e whakamahia nuitia ana mō ngā pūtea penapena i ngā pānga whenua o UK, tae atu ki ngā kamupene kua rārangitia me ngā momo kaiwhakarato ā-iwi, ā, i whakaaetia i muri i te tangohanga o ngā tohutohu tika mai i ngā kaitohutohu tāke me ngā kaitohutohu ā-ture." I whakapeka a Deloitte, nāna i tohutohu i te hokonga o Hato Enoka, ki te kōrero. I kī a PwC, nāna i tohutohu i Chiswick Park, "Ko ngā tohutohu e hoatu ana e mātou e ai ki ngā ture katoa, ngā ture me ngā ture e hāngai ana, tae atu ki te whakaaturanga tika ki ngā mana tāke." Tīma pūrongo: Mark Daly, Calum McKay, Ian Bendalow me Rachael Miller. Kāore tō pūtirotiro e tautoko i tēnei Tirohia tō kaiārahi ki ngā kupu pūtea Ko ngā pepa he rōpu nui o ngā tuhinga māturu i te nuinga o te umanga ture o waho o Appleby, tae atu ki ngā rēhita rangatōpū i roto i ngā mana tāke e 19, e whakaatu ana i ngā mahi pūtea a ngā kaitōrangapū, ngā tangata rongonui, ngā rangatira rangatōpū me ngā kaiārahi pakihi. I tukuna ngā pūkete e 13.4 miriona ki te nūpepa Tiamana o Süddeutsche Zeitung, kātahi ka tiria ki te International Consortium of Investigative Journalists (ICIJ). Kua ārahi rangahau a Panorama mō te AO hei wāhanga o tētahi tūhuratanga huri noa e tata ana ki te 100 ētahi atu rōpū pāpāho, tae atu ki te Kaitiaki, i ngā whenua e 67. Kāore te BBC i te mōhio ki te tuakiri o te pūtake. Ngā Pepa Pararaiha: Pānuitanga katoa; whāia te tauhohenga i Twitter mā te whakamahi i #ParadisePapers; i roto i te taupānga Rongokōrero o TE KŌRERO, whāia te tūtohu "Paradise Papers" Mātakitaki Panorama i te BBC iPlayer (ngā kaimātakitaki UK anake) Mātakitaki i ngā Pepa Pararaiha o Pākehā i te Tūtira i te 19:00 i TE 19:00 i TE Kotahi o Pākehā.

title: Ka mate ngā kurī kātahi anō ka mahue ki runga i te ipu o Essex i te hukapapa
summary: E toru ngā kurī kotahi rā te pakeke kua mate i te hukapapa i muri i te mahue ki runga i te ipu i te pāmahana whakatio.
text: I kitea rātau i roto i tētahi kaikawe poti i runga i te ipu i muri i ētahi toa i Whitmore Way, i Basildon, i te Mane. I whakaarotia kua mate kē nga kurī mate i te taenga mai o te RSPCA, engari ka tīmata te hā i to rātau taenga atu ki te pokanga kararehe. Ahakoa te 24 haora o te tiakitanga, ka mate nga Staffies, e mau tonu ana i nga taura pito, i nga pānga o te hukapapa. Ko te tangata i kite i nga kurī i mahue i hipokina te kaikawe poti ki te ipu paepae, e whakapono ana kua mate kē rātau, kia kore ai ētahi atu tāngata e kite i a rātau - kātahi ka karangatia te aroha kararehe. "I taku whakatuwheratanga i te pēke, e toru ngā kurī iti i roto," te kī a Insp Rebecca Benson mai i te peka o RSPCA o Essex. 'Te whakawiri whakarihariha' "He tino mātao katoa rātau ki te whakapā, ā, he mārō o rātau tinana. Ka pouri, kaore he tohu o te ora." Ka whakahekea e ia nga wahine tokorua me te tāne kotahi ki tētahi kararehe pātata i reira "ka tīmata rātau ki te hā, ā... neke i o rātau waewae iti". "I pau i a mātau ngā haora e ngana ana ki te whakamahana i o rātau tinana iti," te kī a Ms Benson. "Kāore au i whakapono kei te ora tonu rātou. He hukapapa nga pito o o rātau hiku, ā, he mātao anō he hukapapa." I te tangi nga kurī me te ngana ki te ngote, engari ahakoa te whakangote tonu i te pō, ka mate katoa. "He nui rawa te nui o to rātau hukapapa ki a rātau, ā, he tamariki rawa rātau ki te whawhai," te kī a Ms Benson. "Kāore rātau i tū i tētahi wā." I tono a ia ki ngā mōhiohio mō te whaea me te rangatira o nga kurī, kātahi anō ka "whakawiri me te mamae" i pāngia e nga kurī he "ngākau".

title: Ka noho a Oregon hei kāwanatanga tuatahi o Amerika ki te whakawātea i ngā rongoā mārō
summary: Kua noho a Oregon hei kāwanatanga tuatahi o Amerika ki te whakawātea i te pupuri i ngā rongoā mārō, tae atu ki te hīkaine me te hīkini.
text: Ko ngā tāngata e mau ana i ngā rongoā iti mō te whakamahinga whaiaro ināianei me utu he whaina $100 (£77), me tirotiro hauora rānei i tētahi pokapū whakaora tūkinotanga. Ka noho hoki a Oregon hei kāwanatanga tuatahi hei whakamana i te whakamahinga rongoā o ngā harore hallucinogenic. I whakaaetia nga tikanga hou e te pōti tūmatanui hei wāhanga o tētahi pana ā-motu ki te whakangāwari i ngā ture rongoā. I tētahi atu wāhi, i puta i ngā kaipōti i Arāna, New Jersey, Montana me South Dakota he pōti hei whakamana i te mariuana. Ka hono rātau ki ētahi atu kāwanatanga e 11, me te Takiwā o Columbia, kua hoatu kētia te rama kākāriki ki te whakamahinga pakeke whakangahau o te tarukino - he rongoā e rāhuitia tonutia ana i runga i te taumata o te hau. Ko te tūkinotanga o te ture o te kāwanatanga o Oregon o nāianei ki te pupuri rongoā, he whiu mōrahi o te whaina $6,250, tae atu ki te kotahi tau i roto i te whare herehere. Engari ahakoa te huringa o te kaupapahere, ka anga tonu ngā tāngata i Oregon e hanga ana, e tohatoha ana rānei i ngā rongoā mārō ki te whiu hara. Mā te pupuri i ngā rahinga nui ake ka puta pea he utu hē, ka piki ki ngā utu hara mēnā ka whakaarotia he nui rawa te rahinga hei arumoni. Ko te ture hou i Oregon, e kiia nei ko Measure 110, ka mana mai i te 1 o Huitanguru 2021, a e tautokona ana e te Oregon Nurses' Association, te upoko Oregon o te American College of Physicians, me te Oregon Academy of Family Physicians. Under its terms, funding will be provided for addiction treatment, health assessments and other services for people with addiction issues. Ka pūteatia tētahi wāhanga o ngā hōtaka e ngā penapena mai i ngā whare herehere o te kāwanatanga, me ngā moni tāke mai i te hokonga o te mariuana, i whakamanatia i te tau 2014. Ko te Pūtahitanga Kaupapahere Rongoā, he rōpū taunaki ā-New York, he kaitautoko nui o te Ine 110, ā, neke atu i te $4m te whakapau i te whakahauhau. E tautokona ana e te kaiwhakarewa Facebook o Mark Zuckerberg me te kaiwhakangao o George Soros, he mema ia no tōna poari. I kī atu a Kassandra Frederique, te kaiwhakahaere o te rōpū, ki te kaipānui OPB ko te toa he "hama nui ki te kokonga o te whawhai ki ngā rongoā". "E mōhio ana ngā Oregonians me whakamahi tātau i te whakamahi rongoā hei take hauora," tana tāpiri mai. Kua tautohe ngā kaitautoko kua kōpikopiko ngā whare herehere o nāianei ki ngā hunga hara kāore i te pākaha, ā, ka pā kē ki ngā hapori kāore i te mā. Engari e tautohe ana te hunga ātete ka tukitukia te tūranga o ngā kōti ki te āwhina i te tangata ki te whiwhi rongoā rongoā. Kua kī hoki ngā kaiwhakawāwā kāore i te mārama me pēhea te whiu i ngā tamariki, ā, mēnā ka whakamōhiotia o rātau mātua. I kī atu a Hēmi O'Rourke, tētahi hoariri tōmua, ki te nūpepa o Oregonian i pouri a ia i te "whakapōhēhētanga o ngā kaipōti." "Me huihui ngā taha e rua me te kāwana me te rōpū ture, me te hoatu ki ngā kaipōti te mea e tino hiahiatia ana e rātau - te whakaora ora me ētahi atu moenga rongoā," tana tāpiri mai. Kua mahi kē ngā whenua tae atu ki Huiterangi, Potukara me Hōrana i ngā tikanga ōrite ki te whakawātea i te pupuri i ngā rongoā mārō iti me te haumi i roto i "ngā hōtaka whakaiti kino", e ai ki nga Iwi o te Hononga o te Ao.

title: 'Ka taea te ārai' i te mate pēpi o te Hōhipera o Royal Derby
summary: A review into the deaths of hundreds of babies at the Royal Derby Hospital between 2013 and 2016 has found many of them might have been preventable.
text: I tirohia e te Whare Wānanga o Perinatal, i whakatūria hei whakarei ake i te haumarutanga me te kounga o te tiaki kohanga, e 41 ngā mate kōhungahunga me ngā whānautanga mate. Tekau mā iwa o aua mate tērā pea i takea mai i ngā rahunga tiaki, ka kī te rōpū i roto i tana pūrongo. Kua whakapārewa te whakawhirinaki a te hōhipera, ā, kua kī kua hurihia ōna tikanga. I kitea e te arotakenga takitahi ki te maha o ngā pēpi i whānau mate, i mate rānei i muri tata mai i te whānautanga, i waenganui i te 2013 me te 2016, e 19 o ngā mate i te Royal Derby "pea", "tika" rānei. I kī te Whare Wānanga o Perinatal i hapa ngā huarahi, kāore i mahia ngā karapa i te wā i kī ai te tohutohu NHS, ā, kāore i kitea ngā āhuatanga māharahara i te wā i roto te pēpi i roto i te kōpū. I kī hoki te whare wānanga i tāruatia ngā hapa nā te mea i "hapa" ngā arotakenga matua a te whakawhirinaki. Heoi anō, i kitea hoki ētahi tauira pai o te tiaki hei wāhanga o te arotakenga. I kī a Derby Teaching Hospitals NHS Foundation Trust: "Kua whakaaturia e te pūrongo i ētahi wā kua taka poto te tiaki i tukuna e mātau ki te paerewa e tūmanakohia ana, ā, mō tēnei e tino pouri ana mātou. " Many of the learning points highlighted in this report have already been identified as part of our Maternity Safety Improvement Plan and have, or are in the process of being, implemented ." I kī a Jayne Stringfellow, mai i te Rōpū Komihana Rongoā o NHS Southern Derbyshire, kua tukuna te tautoko ki ngā whānau e pāngia ana. I miramiratia hoki e ia e kī ana te pūrongo "kua mahia ngā whakapainga nui" ā, ko te pāpātanga o te whānautanga i te whakawhirinaki ināianei kei raro iho i te wawaenga ā-motu.

title: Sound of 2017: Unsigned soul singer Ray BLK wins
summary: Kua tīmataria e te kaiwaiata wairua o Ray BLK te rārangi Oro o te 2017, e whai ana ki te matapae i ngā pūoro hōu tino mīharo mō te tau ki mua.
text: Nā Mark SavageBBC Music reporter Ko te wā tuatahi tēnei i toa ai tētahi rehetoi kāore i hainatia te hōnore - kua haere i mua ki a Adele rāua ko Sam Smith. "Kāore au e whakapono kei te puta tēnei," te kī a te tau 23 tau, mai i te tonga o Rāwāhi. "He tino wawao katoa!" E whā o ngā mahi Oro e rima o runga o te tau 2017 he wāhine Peretania pango, e whakaata ana i te pikinga o te pūmanawa wahine i roto i te paru me te R&B. I kī a Ray e hiahia ana a ia ki tana pūoro kia "whakamana i ngā wāhine kia ora i a rātau e hiahia ana". "He nui rawa ngā pēhanga pāpori ki ngā wāhine, me pēhea tātau e whanonga ai, ā, i runga anō i te hōnore tāne." I kōwhiria te rārangi Oro o te 2017 e tētahi pae e 170 ngā DJ, ngā kaiwhakawāwā me ngā kaitāpui hākari. I waenganui i a rātou ko Ēnā, nāna te hongere YouTube SB:TV i āwhina ki te whakarewa i ngā mahi a Dizzee Rascal, Stormzy me Ed Sheeran. I kī a ia i "pupuhi" a ia i tana kitenga i a Ray BLK e mahi ana i tētahi o ana pō karapu i tērā tau. "Ko ia te mōkī katoa," tana kī. "E mōhio ana ahau he tau whakamīharo tōna tau." "Kei ētahi kaiwaiata tēnā manawa mō rātou," te kī a Huw Stephens o Irirangi 1. "He pūmanawa tūturu, he pūmanawa taketake tōna, e tino kaha ana te tapahi. Ko ia te tino mahi." BBC Sound of 2017 - The Top Five 5) NADIA ROSE 4) JORJA SMITH 3) RAYE 2) RAG 'N' BONE MAN 1) RAY BLK I whānau mai i Nigeria, ā, i whakaarahia i Rānana, i tukua e Ray ana hopukanga tuatahi i a ia e ako ana mō tētahi tohu Ingarihi. I mahi a ia i tētahi umanga pānuitanga hei tautoko i tana mahi i ōna rā o mua. Mā te paheko i tōna aroha ki te hip-hop me te R&B, ka tukua e ia ngā kupu waiata ā-tiriti, me te reo wairua kōhukihuki. Ko tana ara tūturu, My Hood, he reta aroha kawa ki tōna taone kāinga, o Catford. "Ko te tonga ki te rāwhiti tētahi o ngā wāhi tino uaua i Rānana, engari ka whakaarahia e ia ngā tāngata tino kaha, ā, koia tērā e motuhake ai mātau," tana kī. Kua karohia e te kaiwaiata te waitohu i tētahi kirimana pūkete kia pupuri ai i ngā mana ki ana pūoro, e tukua ana e ia ki tōna ake tapanga. Pēnei i te tokomaha o ngā kaiwaiata, mai i a Paul McCartney ki ngā Pet Shop Boys, ka mahi tahi ia me tētahi kamupene e kiia nei ko Kobalt Music Services - e whakarato ana i te tautoko "rūma whakamuri" pēnei i te whakaputa me te tuari, me te kore here i ngā kaiwhakatangitangi ki ngā kirimana whāiti. "Kei te hiahia ahau ki te whai mana motuhake mō tēnei wā," te kī a Ray ki te BBC. "He nui rawa ngā kaiwaiata i te tau 2016 i puta mai, nāna i mahi takitahi, ā, he nui te angitu. Ki taku whakaaro he ngaru hou o ngā tāngata e mahi ana i tēnā. Kei te huri te umanga." I patua e te kaiwaiata wairua toa, ko tōna ingoa tūturu ko Rita Ekwere, te kaiwaiata blues o Rag N Bone Man ki runga i te rārangi Oro o te 2017, i te wā i haere te wāhi tuatoru ki te whetū pahū e tatari ana ki a Raye. Ray said: "I'm particularly proud to be a part of this year's list as it's full of so much talent, some of whom are independent artists like myself which I really hope inspires the next generation." Te Tangi o... rārangi i whakarewaina i te tau 2003, ā, he pūkete aroturuki tōna ki te toa i ngā mahi hou, auaha hoki, tae atu ki 50 Cent, Haim, Frank Ocean, Ellie Goulding me Florence + The Machine. E ai ki ngā ture, kia kaua e mōhiotia ngā mahi i runga i te rārangi roa - nā reira ka aukatia ngā tauwhāinga whakaaturanga pūmanawa me ngā mema o ngā pēne rongonui e whakarewa ana i tētahi mahi takitahi. Me kaua ngā rehetoi e whai takitahi, pukaemi rānei o UK 20 i mua i te 30 o Whiringahora 2016 - ahakoa kei te āhei tonu ngā kaiwaiata manuhiri. Ko te toa o tērā tau ko Jack Garratt, ko tana pukaemi tuatahi ko Phase i uru ki ngā tūtohi i te tau toru. I whakamihi a ia ki te awhe "tino rerekē" o ngā mahi i runga i te rārangi roa o te tau 2017, arā ko te pēne toka pārekareka o Cabbage me te pūkenga pahū ā-iwi o Te Wānanga o Te Aotearoa. "E whakaatu ana tēnei rārangi ka taea te whai taringa nui mō te rangi, kaua e tuhi noa i ngā tangi e whā ki ngā kī rerekē. " He tau whakamīharo te 2017 mō te toi, engari i te wehi o te 2016 mō ngā tōrangapū. "He nui ngā mea hei tuhituhi mō mātou katoa, ā, e whakaaro ana ahau ka tuhi mātou i ētahi mea whakamīharo." title: E hiahia ana te pāpā o te kaieke pahikara coma a Mary Bowers ki te ārai pūrere kore-ringa
summary: Kua kī te pāpā o tētahi kaieke paihikara i mahue i roto i te pōhēhētanga i muri i tana tukituki i tana paihikara, me rāhuitia te whakamahi i ngā pūrere kore-ringa i a ia e taraiwa ana.
text: I te paihikara te kairīpoata o Times a Mary Bowers ki te mahi i Rāwāhi i te tūtukitanga o tētahi taraka i Whiringa 2011. I te whakamahi te atekōkiri i tētahi waea pūkoro kore-ringa, ā, kāore i kite i a Miss Bowers i mua i tana taraka. I kī tōna pāpā ko Pita Bowers, mai i East Malling i Keni, i ngā pūrere kore-ringa i nekehia ai ngā atekōkiri. Kāore e taea e Miss Bowers, he kaiwhakatangitangi pūkenga, te neke, te kōrero rānei, ā, ka anga atu ki te whakapau i te toenga o tōna oranga i roto i tētahi kāinga nēhi. 'He iti noa iho te rerekētanga' I a Hakihea, kāore i kitea he hara te atekōkiri taraka o Petre Beiu, e 40, engari i whakawāteatia ki te taraiwa pōhēhē i te Kōti Karauna o Snaresbrook. I whainatia ia e £2,700, a, ka rāhuitia ia kia kaua e taraiwa mo te waru marama. He ture kore mana i te UK te eke motopaika, te taraiwa rānei mā te whakamahi i tētahi waea puritia ā-ringa me te hunga hara e anga ana ki te whakakorenga, ki te whaina rānei tae atu ki te £2,500. He ture te whakamahi i ngā waea kore-ringa, ngā reo irirangi takirua i a rātou e taraiwa ana, e eke ana rānei, engari kei ngā pirihimana te mana ki te whakatū me te whiu i ngā kaiwhakamahi e whakaaro ana rātou kua nekehia, ā, kāore i te whakahaere i te waka. I kī a Tēnā Bowers i whakaaro a ia ko te utu iti iho o te taraiwa pōhēhē i runga i te tūtukitanga i whara ai tana tamāhine i tuku i te karere hē. "Ahakoa he ture te whakamahi i tētahi huinga kore-ringa i tēnei wā, e whakaatu ana te rangahau, he iti rawa te rerekētanga i waenganui i te waea pūkoro puritia ā-ringa me te mea kore-ringa," tana kī. I whakarewaina e te nūpepa Times tētahi whakahau haumaru huringa i muri i te mahinga. I kī tētahi kaikōrero mō te Tari Waka: "E hiahiatia ana e te taraiwa te ārohi, ā, me tika te whakahaere i tō rātou waka i ngā wā katoa. " Ki te kore, ka mōrearea rātau ki te whakararuraru, ā, ka anga atu ki te mahi. "Kātahi anō ka whakamōhiotia e te kāwanatanga tētahi hara hou e pā ana ki te whara nui i te taraiwa mōrearea - e mau ana i te whiu mōrahi e rima tau i roto i te whare herehere."

title: Coronavirus: Graduate 'heartbroken' after losing job due to Aberdeen lockdown
summary: E kī ana tētahi tauira o Aberdeen kua "pouri" a ia i muri i te ngaronga o tētahi mahi tuarua mai i te tīmatanga o te taiepa coronavirus.
text: Kate Smith recently graduate in tourism management from Robert Gordon University. I tukuna ki a ia tana "mahi moemoeā" i roto i te umanga haere i Poutāpeta, engari i whakakorea i roto i te wiki. I muri i ngā tono "tatau", ka tīmata ia i tētahi mahi hoko hou i te rā i tīmata ai te raka paetata o Aberdeen, engari i unuhia te tono mahi. Ko te maha o ngā kēhi kua whakaūngia i roto i tētahi kāhui Covid-19 i ahu mai ki te raka paetata i Aberdeen kua piki ki te 101. I kī a Ms Smith he uaua te "tū anō" i muri i te whiwhinga me te ngaro i tētahi mahi hou i roto i te 24 haora. Ka kī a ia: "He nui te mamae. Ehara i te mea ko te taha moni anake. "Kei a koe te taha ā-hinengaro, ā, ka hoki anō koe ki te noho i roto i te whare noho i ngā wā katoa, e tono ana mō ngā mahi." I kī a Ms Smith i muri i te ngaronga o te mahi tuatahi, ka oti i a ia tōna tohu me te tīmata ki te tono mō ngā tūranga hōu, kātahi anō ka whiwhi mahi i tēnei marama. Ka kī a ia: "I tīmata ahau i te rā tuatahi i hoki ai a Aberdeen ki te raka, ā, ka kite i a au e kore mahi ana i muri i te rā kotahi, nā reira ka hoki ki te papa tātuhi." I kī a Ms Smith i muri i tana kitenga i ngā tāngata i Aberdeen i tērā mutunga wiki, "kāore a ia i ohorere" i te kāhui hou. Ka kī a ia: "Heoi anō, kāore au i kite i a au e ngaro ana i tētahi mahi nā te hoki ki te raka, engari ka pā mai ngā mea." Kua tīmata anō a ia ki te tono mahi, ā, kei te hiahia tonu ia ki te mahi i roto i te umanga haere. "I completed my degree in tourism management this summer so it's something I'm very passionate about," she said. "Heoi anō, e whakaaro ana ahau ka roa te wā e piki ake ai te umanga."

title: He aha te āhua o te whare herehere i tō taone?
summary: Kei te haere ngā mahere hei kati i ngā whare herehere o Wikitōria o UK me te hoko atu mō te whare. Engari he aha te āhua o te noho tata ki te whare herehere, ā, ka aha ina katia e te tangata ōna tatau mō te wā whakamutunga?
text: Nā Camila Ruz & Liz JacksonBBC News Magazine I mahue i ngā hoa whakamutunga o HMP Reading e rua tau ki muri i tēnei Whiringa ā Rangi. He whare herehere tērā i mau ai e 320 nga herehere. I hangaia i te tau 1844, i rongonuitia te whare herehere e Oscar Wilde. "E mōhio ana hoki ahau ki tēnei - me te whakaaro nui mehemea ka mōhio ia tangata ki te ōrite - ko ia whare herehere e hangaia ana e te tangata e hangaia ana ki ngā pereki whakamā," ko tana tuhituhi i roto i tana oriori The Ballad of Reading Gaol. Kātahi anō ka katia te whare herehere i te tau 2013, ā, kei runga i te mākete ināianei. Kua pānuitia e te kāwanatanga he mahere hei kati i ētahi atu "relics mai i ngā wā o Wikitōria" me te neke atu i ngā herehere e 10,000 ki ngā whare hou. E kī ana rātau mā tēnei e whakatika mō ngā whare hou neke atu i te 3,000 i ngā wāhi o te pānga tūturu. Engari ko te kati i te whare herehere ko te tikanga o te ngaro i tētahi whare e whakahaere ana i tētahi hapori paetata mō ngā tau. "He mamae i ētahi wāhi ina kati te whare herehere," te kī a Peter Dawson, te tumuaki tuarua o te Prison Reform Trust. Ka noho ngā whare herehere hei pūtake nui o te mahi mō te rohe e karapoti ana i a rātou. Ko te "whare herehere tino nui" hou e hangaia ana i Wrexham e tūmanakohia ana kia kawea mai te £23m i te tau ki te whakahaerenga o te rohe me ngā mahi 1,000. 'Herehere 633' Ka kati te whare herehere i waenganui i ngā whakatūpato kino mō te pānga ki ngā umanga paetata. I te katinga o te Whare Herehere o Bullwood Hall i Essex i te tau 2013, ka pūrongotia he "pānga nui rawa" mō te rohe paetata. Ka taea hoki e nga whare herehere te pānga ki te tāpoi. Tērā pea he ātaahua te whare herehere o Napoleonic, engari ko te Whare Herehere o Dartmoor i Devon, me tōna whare taonga pātata, kua whakaingoatia hei wāhi toro. E kī ana te whare taonga, neke atu i te 35,000 ngā tāngata i te tau e haere ana ki Dartmoor ki te whakarongo ki ngā kōrero o ōna hoa rongonui me a rātau ngana mawhiti puta noa i te moor. "He whakatuwhera whatu," ko te tuhituhi a tētahi manuhiri i runga i te paetukutuku. "Ka whakaweto i a koe ki te mahi i ngā mea hē." I te Mane, kua whakaūngia e te Manatu Ture e kore e whakahōutia te rīhi i te whare herehere o Dartmoor. "E kore rawa koe e hiahia ki te kī ka taea e mātou te whakahaere tonu i ngā whare herehere hei wāhi mahi," te kī a Dawson. Ka tāpiri mai a ia, kāore ngā whare herehere tawhito katoa i ngā wāhi e tika ana. I hangaia ngā whare herehere o Wikitōria i te wāhi e hiahiatia ana i te 100 tau ki mua, ka whakamāramatia e ia. Ko ētahi ināianei e noho ana i ngā turanga hōia tawhito mai i te Pakanga Tuarua o te Ao. Ko ētahi whare herehere pērā i a Haverigg i Cumbria kei ngā wāhi mamao rawa, ā, ko te hoa tata rawa he kahui hipi i tētahi hapori pakihi iti e tipu ana. "Ki te titiro koe ki tētahi mahere o Cumbria, i reira ka purua e mātou te teihana hiko karihi, kātahi ka haere mō te 10 maire ki te tonga ki tētahi wāhi mamao ake, ka kitea e koe te whare herehere o Hadrigg," te kī a Dawson. "Ehara i te mea nō tētahi hapori paetata. " Mēnā e hiahia ana mātou kia huri ngā whare herehere i ngā oranga, e hiahia ana mātou kia whai mana ngā hapori me te kī he kawenga tā rātou ki ngā mea e pā ana ki ngā tāngata," tana tāpiri mai. Tērā ētahi hapori e āhei ana ki te whakauru ki ngā whare herehere i waenganui i a rātou. E tuwhera ana a Cafe Britannia i Norwich e whitu rā i te wiki, ā, he kaimahi tūao mai i te whare herehere pātata. E kī ana te kaiwhakarewa tahi o Davina Tanner kua "whakanuia" e te iwi whānui te kaupapa. "They have picked it up as their own and want to do their bit for the community and to help reduce reoffending," she says, adding that demand is so great that on any given day they might prepare 225 meals for breakfast. He rite tonu ngā kaupapa whakaoranga puta noa i te UK. He whare herehere a Blantyre House e arotahi ana ki te whakaurunga anō. I mahi paetata ngā kaimahi, ā, ka haere ngā herehere ki te mahi i roto i te hapori, e whakamārama ana a Mark Icke mai i te Prison Governors' Association. Engari i katia rangitahitia i te Hānuere. I kī te Manatu Ture inanahi kāore anō kia whakatauria tōna wā heke. "I riri te iwi i te katinga o te whare herehere," ko te tāpiri mai a Icke. "He pai ki a rātau te whai i runga i to rātau kūaha, ā, he pai ki a rātau te mōhio kei te haere ēnei tāngata ki waho me te mahi i tētahi mea whai tikanga." I whakaarahia ngā māharahara ki te wāhi e nekehia ai ngā herehere, mēnā ka taea te noho tata ki ō rātou whānau me ngā whatunga tautoko. Engari ko te ariā o te noho tata ki te whare herehere me te whakauru ki ōna hoa herehere kaore e pai ki te katoa. I whakatuwheratia a HMP Peterborough i te tau 2005 ahakoa te kaha o te ātete paetata. He rite tonu te whakahē i ngā tono ki te hanga i tētahi whare hou. Kua wehewehea e Wrexham i Wales te whakaaro o ōna hoa noho tata. E māharahara ana ētahi tangata ki te pānga o te whare herehere nui rawa i UK ki ngā utu whare. Kua kī ētahi kai te māharahara rātau mo te haumarutanga. Ka noho tonu ngā tangata e mapu ana i te wā e katia ana te whare herehere. Engari e kī ana a Icke he rite tonu te waia o te tangata ki to rātau aroaro. "He roa te wā e noho ana ngā whare herehere," tana whakamārama. "I te nuinga o te wā ka neke te tangata kia tata ki tētahi, kaua e whakatata atu ki a koe." Ko te mea e pā ana ki te whare herehere i muri i tōna katinga, ka whakawhirinaki ki tōna uara hoahoa. I te katinga o te whare herehere o Dorchester i ōna tatau i te tau 2013, he tokomaha ngā tāngata i māharahara ki tōna whakawhanaketanga anō. "He tino wāhi te whare herehere o Dorchester, i ngā tikanga mahi me ngā herehere whare e tata ana ki tō rātou rohe," te kī a Alan Rowley mai i te Dorchester Civic Society. Ināianei kei te mahi tahi ngā kaiwhakawhanake me ngā kaiwhaiwhai me ngā kaitiakitanga ki te pupuri i ngā āhuahira hira pēnei i te whare kēti o te rau tau 18. Ākuanei ka tāpaetia tētahi tono whakarite, ā, e tūmanakohia ana kia whakaurua he whare taonga. "I te katinga o te whare herehere e whakaaro ana ahau he pouri," te kī a Rowley. "Engari he wā anō tērā." He maha atu nga whare herehere kua tutuki te tahuritanga. I te tau 2005 ka noho a HMP Oxford hei hōtēra, ā, i puritia ētahi o ōna āhuahira tawhito, mai i ngā tatau pūtau ki ngā arawhata konganuku. E tika ana kia whakawāteatia ētahi whare herehere kia taea ai tētahi mea tika ake ki te mokowā, e whakamārama ana a Dawson. Prison reform could be a chance to look beyond building design and work out where jails are needed and the types of communities they serve, he says. Kāore ngā hononga ki te rohe paetata i te kaha i ngā wā katoa. Ko te tikanga kia mōhio te tangata ki ngā mea e haere ana i tua atu i te pakitara. Te Pukapuka i runga i te whare herehere Ohauru ki te pānui īmēra a te Pukapuka Rongokōrero o TE Rongokōrero o TE Pukapuka Rongokōrero ki te tiki tuhinga ki tō pouakaroto.

title: Local elections 2021: A simple guide to English council elections
summary: I te 6 o Me, ka whai wāhi ngā kaipōti i ngā wāhi maha o Ingarangi ki te kōwhiri i o rātau kaikaunihera paetata i te 6 o Me.
text: Mā te pōti e whakatau ko wai e whakahaere ana i ngā ratonga paetata - pēnei i ngā kura, ngā puna me ngā kohinga ipu - i roto i ngā kaunihera e 143. Kei hea rātou e tū ana? Kei Ingarangi te pōti kaunihera paetata, engari kāore i ngā wāhi katoa. Tata ki te 28 miriona ngā tāngata ka āhei ki te pōti mō ngā tūnga hiko e 4,650. Last year's vote was delayed because of Covid, so this year we will see a bigger-than-usual number of positions up for election. E hiahiatia ana tētahi pūtirotiro hōu me te JavaScript me tētahi tūhononga ipurangi pūmau hei tiro i tēnei tauwhitinga. Ētahi atu mōhiohio mō ēnei pōti Ko wai ka taea e au te pōti i tōku rohe? Tāurua tō waehere poutāpeta, te ingoa rānei o tō kaunihera Ingarihi, o Pākehā, o Welsh rānei kia mōhiotia. Hei tauira 'W1A 1AA', 'Westminster' rānei He aha ēnei pōti? Mā rātou e whakatau ko wai e whakahaere ana i ngā ratonga tūmatanui paetata - me pēhea hoki e whakahaeretia ai. I roto i tētahi uiuinga o ngā tāngata e 3,000, i whakahaeretia e te Whare Wānanga o Essex, 59% i kī ko te coronavirus te take tino nui i roto i ngā pōti ā-rohe e haere mai nei. Ahakoa ko te nuinga o ngā whakataunga taiepa nui kua tangohia e te kāwanatanga matua, kua whai wāhi ngā kaunihera ki te whakahaere i te huaketo - hei tauira, mā te tautoko i ngā mahi whakamātautau. The pandemic has hit councils hard, with reduced income from business rates, car parks and leisure centres. I puta mai tēnei i muri i ngā tapahi wā roa ki te kāwanatanga paetata e hoki ana ki te tau 2010, i muri i te raruraru pūtea o te ao. Mai i tēnei marama, ka taea e ngā kaunihera ā-rohe te whakapiki i te tāke kaunihera mā te 5%, i te wā e piki ana te utu o te oranga i te iti iho i te 1%. Ko te whakataunga kia whakanuia ngā tāke kei runga i ia kaunihera - ā, ka puta ake pea te take i te wā o te whakahau pōti. Ko ētahi atu take pēnei i ngā whanaketanga whare paetata, ngā huringa rānei i ngā ara pahi ka taea hoki te take i roto i ngā pōti paetata. Ka hoatu hoki e ngā hua he tohu i te pai o ngā rōpū i te motu. Ko te whakamātautau tōrangapū tūturu tuatahi tēnei mō te kaiārahi Mahi o Tā Keir Starmer me te kaiārahi Liberal Democrat o Tā Ed Davey. He aha ngā mahi a ngā kaunihera ā-rohe? Ko ngā kaunihera ā-rohe te kawenga mō te whakarato i te nuinga o ā mātou ratonga tūmatanui. Hei tauira: Ko ngā kaunihera ā-rohe e pūteatia ana e te kāwanatanga matua, engari ka taea hoki e rātou te kohi moni mā te: Ko ētahi wāhi o Ingarangi e hipokina ana e ngā kaunihera takiwā, e kapi ana i tētahi rohe katoa, me ngā kaunihera rohe, e kapi ana i tētahi wāhi iti iho i roto i te takiwā. I ētahi atu wāhi, kotahi te tinana kotahi - i ētahi wā e mōhiotia ana he mana whakakotahi - ka mahia ngā mahi katoa a te kāwanatanga ā rohe. I ētahi wāhi, ka mahi ngā kaunihera pāriha, taone rānei i raro i ngā kaunihera rohe, i ngā mana kotahi rānei - ka taea e rātou te kawenga mō ngā take paetata pēnei i ngā whakarato me ngā karaka tūmatanui. On 6 May there will be around 2,000 parish or town council elections with approximately 20,000 seats available. E 143 ngā kaunihera e tū ana i ngā pōti puta noa i Ingarangi 47 e puritia ana e ngā Conservatives 54 e puritia ana e Labour 6 e puritia ana e ngā Pāremata Liberal, 33 i raro i te "kore mana whānui" ko te tikanga kāore he rōpū i toa i te nuinga o ngā kaunihera hou ka tū hoki i te pōti, ā, me pēhea? Me 18 neke atu rānei ngā kaipōti i te pōti i te rā o te pōti. Me noho ngā kaipōti katoa: E toru ngā huarahi pōti: Ko te rā kati ki te rēhita ki te pōti ko te Mane 19 o Āperira. Ko te rā kati ki te rēhita mō tētahi pōti poutāpeta ko te 17:00 BST i te 20 o Āperira. Ko te rā kati hei tono pōti takawaenga ko te 27 o Āperira, ahakoa ka wātea ngā pōti takawaenga ohorere tae noa ki te 17:00 i te rā pōti mēnā me wehe ngā kaipōti i a ia anō. Ka taea e koe te haere tuihono ki te rēhita ki te pōti. Ka pēhea te pānga o te coronavirus ki te pōti? Me mātua haumaru te pōti i te pōti. Ka whakaritea te tawhiti pāpori. E whakahaua ana ngā kaipōti kia mauria mai ā rātou ake pene, pene rākau rānei - me te hunga kua whakangungu ki te pōti mā te poutāpeta. Engari he uaua rawa te whakahaere i te pōti poutāpeta katoa. Nā te tawhiti pāpori, ka roa ake te tatau pōti i te mea noa, ā, ka haere pea ki te mutunga wiki. Me pēhea te kōwhiri i ngā toa? E whā tau te pōtitanga o nga kaikaunihera katoa. Kāore ngā tūru kaunihera katoa e pōti ana i tēnei tau, i te mea ka pōti ētahi kaunihera mō ngā tūru kotahi ia rua tau, e toru tau rānei i roto i te whā.

title: Tereina ngongo: Whakatuwheratia ngā tatau i takea mai i te 'whakangungu kino me te ngenge'
summary: Tērā pea nā te whakangungu rawakore me te ngenge o te atekōkiri i āwhina ki tētahi tereina o Rāwāhi Underground e haere ana me ētahi o ōna tatau e tuwhera ana, i kitea he pūrongo.
text: Tata ki te 30 ngā pāhihi o te ratonga Raina Hīupiri i runga i te papa i a ia e neke ana i te 39.5mph (62kmh) i waenganui i te Huarahi o Finchley me West Hampstead i te 1 o Mahuru. I kī te Peka Tūhura Aituā Rēra (RAIB) kāore te atekōkiri i kite i ētahi tatau kāore anō kia katia i muri i te hē. Transport for London (TfL) said safety was "always our top priority". I tūtohutia ngā whakakitenga mai i tētahi tereina e 10 ngā tatau e tuwhera ana i a ia e haere ana mō te 56 hēkona i te tere katoa i waenganui i ngā pou e rua tata ki te 09:00 BST. Kaore tētahi tangata i whara. I kitea e te pūrongo RAIB ki ngā takahanga i te tūnga o te tereina i Finchley Road ētahi tatau "i whakatuwheratia me te kore whakahau e te kaiwhakahaere tereina". 'Ohorere te nui o te kawenga mahi' Kāore i taea e ia te whakatuwhera, te kati rānei i ētahi tatau, nā reira i whakahaeretia he whakakā hei karo i te ara iahiko maukati tatau hei ārai i te tereina e haere ana me ngā tatau tuwhera, engari i mahue i te teihana me ētahi e tuwhera tonu ana. I kitea e te tūhuratanga he "whakaaweawe pea" ana mahi i te pikinga ohorere o tana kawenga mahi mai i te taumata iti e pā ana ki te mahi tereina aunoa, te ngenge i tana tauira moe, me ngā taumata huka toto iti rānei mai i tētahi wā roa kāore he kai. I tāpiritia tētahi take tērā pea ko te whakangungu kāore i "tika te whakarite" i ngā atekōkiri ki te whakahaere i te pikinga ohorere o ngā kawenga mahi i takea mai i ngā hē. E whā ngā tūtohutanga a te RAIB ki London Underground, tae atu ki ngā whakapainga ki ngā tereina raina Tiupiri, he whakangungu pai ake mō ngā atekōkiri me te whakaara i te mōhiotanga ki te "haumarutanga i te moe iti me ngā tauira kai tika". Mai i taua wā ka hoatu e London Underground ētahi atu tohutohu ki ngā atekōkiri tereina katoa me pēhea te whakahaere tereina i te wā o ngā hē rerekē. I kī a Jill Collis, te kaiwhakahaere o te Hauora, te Haumaru me te Taiao o TfL, kua tīmata a TfL ki te mahi i ētahi o ngā tūtohutanga a te RAIB i muri i tētahi pūrongo ā-roto. "Ka arotake tonu mātou i ā mātou hātepe kia mōhio ai mātou ki ngā tūtohutanga katoa i whakaritea i roto i te pūrongo RAIB, me te mahi tonu kia haumaru ai te whatunga Ngongo," tana tāpiri mai.

title: I kōhuatia ngā kaiwhakamahi taupānga kaunihera o York: Tata ki te 6,000 i pāngia
summary: Tata ki te 6,000 ngā tāngata tērā pea i pakaru ō rātou raraunga whaiaro i muri i te kōhuatanga o tētahi taupānga kaunihera.
text: I kōhuatia te taupānga One Planet York e tētahi tangata nāna i kite he huarahi uru ki ngā tau waea, ngā kupuhipa whakamuna me ngā wāhitau o te hunga e whakamahi ana. I whakaaetia e te taupānga ngā kaiwhakamahi ki te taki i ngā rā kohinga ipu me ngā tohutohu tukurua. Kua tuhituhi te Kaunihera o te Taone o York ki ngā kaiwhakamahi ki te kī "tino pouri" i te pakarutanga, ā, kua pūrongotia te take ki ngā Pirihimana o Te Raki. E kī ana i whakapā atu ki tētahi mūrere nāna i kī kua kitea e rātau he huarahi hei uru ki ngā raraunga o ngā tāngata e whakamahi ana i te taupānga. I kī te kaunihera kāore i taea te kōrero he aha te mahi a te tangata haepapa ki te mōhiohio. E pānui ana ētahi atu pūrākau mai i te kaunihera ki ngā kaiwhakamahi taupānga: "E whakamana ana mātou i tō tūmataitinga, ā, ka tino pouri mātou i tēnei mahi. " Kua whakahaeretia e mātou tētahi arotakenga mataiti o te taupānga One Planet York, kua mukua e mātou ngā hononga katoa ki te taupānga, ā, ko te hua, kua kore e tautoko whakamua. "Kua mukua e mātou mai i tā mātou paetukutuku, ā, kua tonoa kia tangohia mai i ngā pātaka taupānga, ā, ka tono kia mukua e koe ināianei mai i tō pūrere. " Kāore e taea e mātou te kōrero tūturu he aha te mahi a te hunga tuatoru ki te raraunga." I kī tētahi kaikōrero kaunihera e 5,994 ngā pūkete i roto i te taupānga, ā, tērā pea i pakaru. I te 1 o Whiringa 2018, ka whakapā atu tētahi rōpū tuatoru ki te kaunihera, ā, ka kī mai kua kitea e rātou he huarahi hei uru ki ngā raraunga whaiaro o aua tāngata e whakamahi ana i te taupānga One Planet York. "I roto i ngā raraunga i uru atu ki ngā mōhiohio whaiaro pēnei i ngā ingoa, wāhitau, waeherepoutāpeta, wāhitau īmēra me ngā tau waea me ngā kupuhipa whakamuna. " Ki tō mātou mōhiotanga, kāore i roto i ngā raraunga i uru atu ētahi atu mōhiohio tairongo. "Anō hoki, kua wehewehea te One Planet York i ētahi atu pūnaha kaunihera, nō reira kāore e taea te uru ki ētahi atu raraunga whaiaro." E tohutohutia ana te hunga pāngia kia muku i te taupānga me te huri i ā rātou kupuhipa.

title: I oatitia te kāwanatanga hou o Iharaira
summary: Kua oatitia te kāwanatanga tauwhāinga hou a Iharaira, i arahina e Pineamine, i muri i te tata ki te rua marama o nga whakaritenga i waenganui i nga rōpū tōrangapū.
text: Ka hoki mai a Tēnā Hoahoa hei pirimia, e pane ana i tētahi tauwhāinga kei roto ko ngā rōpū e tautoko ana i ngā kāinga Hurai i runga i te whenua o Pārihia. Kua haumarutia e nga kaitautoko kāinga nga mahi wawao me nga mahi whare. Engari ko ngā wehenga Hurai ultra-Orthodox kua aukatia i te kāwanatanga mo te wā tuatahi i roto i te tekau tau. I tīmata te oati i muri i te pōti a te pāremata o Iharaira ki te whakaae ki te kāwanatanga hou, i muri i te pōtitanga ā iwi i te Hānuere, kāore he rōpū mārama. I a ia e kōrero ana ki te pāremata, ka tāruatia e Tēnā Hoahoa tētahi tautohe kia mahia "he whakararuraru hītori" kia mau ai te rongo ki ngā Pārihia. "Mā tētahi hoa Pārihia e hiahia ana ki te whakahaere i ngā whakaritenga i runga i te whakapono pai, ka whakaritea a Iharaira mō tētahi whakararuraru hītori ka whakamutua te papā ki ngā Pārihia mo ake tonu atu," tana kī. Kei roto i nga minita kāinga o te tauwhāinga ko te rōpū o Te Rūnanga o Te Kei roto i te rārangi hou he whakaaturanga kaha o nga minita whakatau. Kua haere ngā pānui wawao me ngā pānui whare, e whakaae ana ki te hanganga i ngā rohe i nohoia, ki ngā kaiwhaiwhai kāinga. E whakahē ana te minita wawao hou, a Moshe Yaalon, he mema o te rōpū o Te Rūnanga o Te Rūnanga o Te T Ko te minita whare hou, ko Uri Ariel, he tangata noho Hurai, he mema hoki no te Kāinga Hurai. I kī a ia i te Rātapu ka haere tonu te kāpata hou ki te whakawhānui i ngā kāinga "neke atu, iti iho rānei i tāna i mahi ai i mua". Tērā pea ka whakakāhoretia e tēnei ngā mahi ki te whakaora i ngā kōrero rangimārie ki ngā Pārihia, ā, kāore i taea te haere whakamua i roto i te wā e whā tau whakamutunga o Tēnā Hoahoa. E whakahau ana nga Pārihia kia mutu te hanganga o te kāinga hei whakatakotoranga tōmua kia hoki ki nga whakaritenga. E kī ana ngā Pārihia ka whakakāhore ngā kāinga, he mana kore mana i raro i te ture o te ao whānui, i a rātau he āhua whai hua. E tūmanakohia ana kia tiketike te take kāinga i runga i te rārangi take ina haere te Perehitini o Amerika ki a Iharaira i roto i te rua rā, tae atu ki ngā māharahara o Iharaira i te hōtaka karihi haere tonu a Irana. E tohe ana a Irana he rangimarie tana hōtaka karihi i te wā e whakapae ana a Iharaira me te Uru ki te ngana ki te hanga rākau karihi.

title: Ka tīmata te whakawātanga o ngā rangatira o mua o Barclays
summary: I tīmata te whakawā hara tuatahi o ngā kaiwhakahaere pūtea matua o UK i te oho o te raruraru pūtea i te Wenerei.
text: Ko te kēhi ki ngā kaiwhakahaere e whā o mua kua whakaputaina e te Tari Tinihanga Nui i runga i te whakaora £11.8bn a Barclays. I karohia e te pēke tētahi tārewa UK i te tau 2008 mā te kohi moni mai i ngā kaihoko o te Rāwhiti o Waenganui. E whakataua ana nga kaiwhakahaere ki te whakatupu tinihanga. Kua tautohe katoa te tokowhā kia kaua e hara. Ko ngā whakapae ko John Varley, te rangatira o mua o te pēke; kaiwhakahaere pūtea penapena a Roger Jenkins; Ko Thomas Kalaris, te upoko o te umanga whakahaere rawa o te pēke; me Rārangi Boath, te Upoko o Ūropi o mua o te Rōpū Umanga Pūtea i te pēke pūtea penapena a te kaituku moni. E tūmanakohia ana kia whā ki te ono marama te roa o te whakawā. I tukuna katoatia he utu ki nga whakapae tokowhā. I te wā i whakamātauria ētahi atu, he nui ake ngā kaihoko iti, ā, kua hereheretia i roto i ngā take kāore i te hāngai mō ā rātou wāhanga i roto i te raruraru pūtea o te 2007-8, ko te wā tuatahi tēnei i kawea mai ai ngā takahanga hara ki ngā kaiwhakahaere matua.
