Ko tēnei kēhi, pēnei i te tokomaha i mua, e kitea ana hei whakamātautau mō te tari, ā, i te nuinga o te wā ka kawea mai ngā take tino matatini o te hara kara mā e kiia ana. Tātaritanga: Andy Verity, kaipānui ohaoha o TE whakawātanga o ngā kaiwhakahaere o mua e whā o Te Wānanga o Aotearoa e tīmata ana i te Hānuere 2019 he tohu ā-ture ahurei. Kua whiua ngā rangatira nui o te pēke i mua, i Tiorangi me Aiarangi, engari kāore anō kia Te Hononga o Amerika, i Te Hononga o Ingarangi rānei. Koinei anake te wā i roto i te pūmahara ora kua whiua tētahi rangatira nui o tētahi pēke ā-ao, ā-UK. Ko te mea nui ake, koia anake te wā i te UK i whiua ai tētahi kaiwhakahaere pēke matua nā te mea i tūpono i te wā o te raruraru pūtea o te tau 2008. I a Hakihea, i ākiritia tētahi kēhi tinihanga ki ngā rangatira Tesco e rua o mua, i te mea he ngoikore rawa te kēhi. A, i te Wenerei ka wetekina hoki tētahi kaiwhakahaere tuatoru o mua o te hokomaha. I te tau 2014, i whakaae te SFO ki te utu i te £6m o te whakatau me ngā utu ki te kaiwhakangao āhuatanga o Vincent Tchenguiz i muri i tana hopukina hē, ā, i rapua tōna kāinga i te tau 2011. I tino whakahē te Kōti Tiketike i te whanonga a te SFO, a, ka whakakorea nga whakamana rapu. Kua mauria mai hoki e te SFO he moni mo ana mahi. I te tau 2017, i kī a Rolls-Royce ka utua e ia te £671m hei whakatau i ngā kēhi hāmate ki ngā mana UK me US tae atu ki te £497m me ngā utu ki te SFO, nāna i whakahaere tana tūhuratanga nui rawa atu ki te umanga. I whakapārewa te umanga "kāore i te mōhiotia" mō ngā kēhi e tata ana ki te 25 tau.

title: Ngā whakahē a Hong Kong: He aha te kōrero a LegCo graffiti ki a mātau
summary: I te pō o te Mane, ka pakaru nga kaiwhakahaere i Hong Kong ki roto i te whare paremata, ka tukitukia nga arai konganuku me te whati karaehe.
text: I rapua e rātau te ruma matua o te Kaunihera Ture - e mōhiotia ana i Hong Kong ko LegCo - i te mea i kīia e te Rangatira Nui o Carrie Lam he "tino nui te whakamahinga o te tutu". He peka iti te rōpū o tētahi nekeneke whakahē kore kaiārahi i whakaohotia e tētahi pire tautohetohe, kua whakatārewatia ināianei. I panaia nga kaiwhakahaere i muri i ētahi haora, engari ko te tuhituhi i mahue i a rātau e kōrero ana ki a mātau mo te āhua o ēnei whakahē. Ko te wetewete o te tohu o Hong Kong he wāhi motuhake o Haina, ā, ko LegCo te wāhi e noho ana tōna kāwanatanga me ngā pire e taupatupatutia ana, e pahemo ana. Ko waenganui i te pakitara matua o te ruma te tohu o te rohe. I te reo Ingarihi, e kī ana a Hong Kong, engari i te reo Hainamana e pānui ana: "The Regional Emblem of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region of the People's Republic of China". I whakakāhoretia e nga kaiwhakahaere tētahi wāhanga o te tohu e mau ana i te kupu "Haina", ka mahue i te wāhanga o Hong Kong o te tohu kāore i pāngia. I raro i te Ture Taketake, mai i te wā i whakahokia ai a Hong Kong ki Haina e te UK i te tau 1997, ka whakapūmautia a Hong Kong i tētahi taumata mana motuhake, ā, kāore ōna wāteatanga i te tuawhenua o Haina. E pupuri ana i tōna ake rangatiratanga whakawā, tōna ake rōpū ture me tōna pūnaha ohaoha. Engari e kī ana ngā kaiwhakawāwā kei raro tēnei i te tuma mai i tētahi Haina nui haere. Ko te pire rangahau, tērā pea ka taea te tuku i ngā pōhēhētanga i Hong Kong ki Haina, i whakahuatia hei tohu o tēnei, e tīmata ana i ngā whakahē nui. Kua whakatārewatia te pire - ā, kāore e taea te puta. Engari ko te wetewete o te pire e whakaatu ana i te riri o te tokomaha o Hong Kong ki Haina. Ko te haki kawanatanga i tāpaetia hoki e nga kaiwhakahaere he haki o Hong Kong i runga i te paepae i roto i LegCo. He tohu tēnei o te hītori o Hong Kong hei taiwhenua o Ingarangi, ā, kei te kitea he karere ki ngā tangata whenua o mua, e karanga ana ki te UK kia pupuri i a Haina. I kī tētahi kaipānui o Hong Kong ehara te haki i te tohu, e ai ki ētahi i huatau ai, e hiahia ana nga kaiwhakahaere ki te hoki ki te ture o Ingarangi. "Ahakoa he aha te tikanga o te haki o Ingarangi o Hong Kong i tēnei rā, kaore a Beijing e pai ki te kite. A, tērā pea ko te take o te puru ki mua i ngā kāmera o te ao," te kī a te kaiwhakatika o Inkstone, a Alan Wong i Twitter. Ko te kara whakatoi Ko tēnei kara pango i tāutatia ki runga i te paepae e pānui ana: "Kāore he kaiwhakararuraru, he whakatoi anake." I whakaahuatia e te kāwanatanga o Hong Kong ngā matapaki taikaha i te 12 o Pipiri i waenganui i ngā kaiwhakahaere me ngā pirihimana he whakararuraru - he mea kē nāna i riri nga kaiwhakatūtū. He tino nui te kupu whakararuraru, he hara tērā e whiua ana tae atu ki te 10 tau i roto i te whare herehere. E hiahia ana ngā kaiwhakahaere kia whakatakatia e te kāwanatanga tēnei wā. Ka kitea hoki te nekehanga putiputi o te rā i runga i nga pakitara. He tohutoro tēnei ki ngā whakahēnga o te Nekehanga Putiputi i tū i Taiwana i te tau 2014 i te wā i ārahi ai tētahi whakaaetanga hokohoko tautohetohe i ngā ākonga me ngā kaiwhaiwhai ki te noho i te pāremata o Taiwana. E whakahē ana rātau ki tā rātau i kī ai he tohu o te nui o te mana o Beijing ki Taiwana - ko te mea ōrite e kī ana rātau kei Hong Kong i tēnei wā. Ko ngā tohutoro ki ngā pirihimana he "kurī" i rehu auau ki ēnei tatau karaehe me ētahi atu wāhi. He rite tonu te whakaahuatanga a nga kaiwhakahaere i te ope pirihimana o te taone hei "kurī" o te kāwanatanga, i ētahi wā hoki o Pēhi. Ko te 12 o Pipiri tērā i kitea he wāhi huri i roto i te whanaungatanga i waenganui i nga pirihimana me te iwi. I tīmata tuatahi hei whakahē anō, engari kaore i roa ka tū nga kaiwhakahaere me nga pirihimana i nga tiriti. I kitea nga kaiwhakahaere e maka ana i ngā tūemi ki nga pirihimana, nāna i urupare mā te rehu korohū roimata me te whakairi matā inarapa Kua huri haere ngā whakaata e whakaatu ana i ētahi āpiha e tō ana i ngā kaiwhakahaere me te patu i a rātau ki te rākau. I karangatia e Human Rights Watch he "whakamahinga nui rawa atu ki ngā kaiwhakahaere hūmārie". Kua whakahaua e nga kaiwhakahaere he uiui takitahi mo te whakatoi pirihimana e kiia ana. Engari he nui hoki nga whakaaturanga hei tautoko i nga pirihimana o Hong Kong. Kua whakakāhoretia e te komihana pirihimana nga rangatiratanga o te tōpana nui rawa, e kī ana he tokomaha nga pirihimana i whara i roto i te pōrearea. 'Nāu ahau i whakaako' He peha i rehu ki tētahi o ngā tīwae i roto i te Kaunihera Ture e pānui ana: "Nāu ahau i ako i ngā hīkoi hūmārie kāore i mahi." Te āhua nei e hāngai ana ki te kaiārahi o Hong Kong, o Kara Lam, ahakoa ngā whakahēnga tae atu ki te miriona tāngata i mua i te 12 o Hune, i noho pūmau tonu kāore e whakatārewatia te pire rangahau. I muri iho ka tāruatia e te kāwanatanga, a, ka whakatārewatia te pire, ā, ka whakaaturia e Ms Lam kāore pea e puta. Heoi anō, kua mōhiotia te pire he wāhanga o tētahi rārangi take whānui ake e whai ana ki te neke atu i a Hong Kong ki raro i tētahi ara kia noho hei "taone Hainamana", me te kore ōna wāteatanga ahurei. 'Wāteatanga' Ko ngā pūāhua Hainamana mō te "wāteatanga" - i rehu ki tēnei mata i LegCo - ka whakarāpopototia te take i kī ai ngā tāngata i Hong Kong e whakahē ana rātau. I raro i tētahi mahi i pā ki Ingarangi i kite i te hokinga mai o Hong Kong ki Haina i te tau 1997, i whakapūmautia te taone kia ngahau ki "tētahi waeine tiketike o te mana motuhake, hāunga i ngā take ā-whenua, i ngā take wawao" mō te 50 tau. Ka mutu te Ture Taketake i te tau 2047, ā, he aha te mea e pā ana ki te mana motuhake o Hong Kong i muri i tērā, e whakakī ana i te āhua o te ohorere o te hunga whakahē.

title: 'Wā māharahara' mō Fishguard i runga i te tapahi pūtea o te Raina Stena
summary: Tērā pea kei raro i te tuma te kāpeka waka waka o Fishguard i muri i te tāpaetanga o te pūtea penapena £5m mai i te kaiwhakahaere waka waka o Stena Line, kua kī tētahi tohunga.
text: I kī a Dr Andrew Potter mai i te Whare Wānanga o Kānata ka uaua pea te tauranga ki te ora me te kore pūtea. I miramiratia e ia te nui ake o te whakataetae mai i Uropi me te pānga tūpono o Te Pākehā hei āwangawanga mo te tauranga. Kua kī ngā kaikaunihera paetata he "wā māharahara" tēnei mō te taone. Kua tonoa he kōrero ki a Stena Line. I kī a Dr Potter: "Tērā pea he whakataetae mai i Aiarangi ki te Tonga me ngā ara hāngai ki Wīwī me Paniora. He whakataetae anō mai i Pembroke Dock. "Ka whakataetae anō ngā ara e rua ki a rāua, ā, me titiro te Raina Stena ki te ara o Holyhead, koia te ara moana matua o Airani. " Tērā pea kei te rāhuitia e rātau a rātau moni mō Holyhead i te utu o Fishguard." Councillor Pat Davies added: "I know a lot of young families who are employed there. " He mema whānau tā mātou e mahi ana i reira, ā, he wā tino māharahara. "Kāore he mahi whirinoa i tō mātou rohe hei tiki i taua mōkito."

title: E karanga ana te kaikōrero ki te whakaaro anō i ngā pire a ngā mema tūmataiti
summary: Kua huatau mai te Kaikōrero o Ngātahi, a Hoani Bercow, i te pūnaha e kawea mai ai e ngā MP o muri te ture.
text: Nā Esther WebberBBC News I tēnei wā, he iti noa iho ngā taupatupatu a ngā mema tūmataiti i ngā Paraire, ā, he iti noa iho te wā hei ture me te kore tautoko a te kāwanatanga. He mea noa iho ki ngā MP e ātete ana i tētahi pire pēnei te kōrero roa kia pau rā anō te wā. I kī a Tēnā Bercow i tēnei āhuatanga "kāore anō kia whakarei ake i te rongo o te Whare". Kōrero ana: Me pēhea te ārai a ngā MP i ngā pire Waea wā i runga i ngā pire a ngā mema tūmataiti? I a ia e kōrero ana i tētahi takahanga a te Rōpū Hansard, ka karangatia e ia ngā MP kia taupatupatu i tētahi tukanga whirinoa. He aha kē pea ka tūpono? I miramiratia e te Kaikōrero ngā tūtohutanga i whakaritea i mua e te Komiti Tīpako Hātepe, tae atu ki: I whakaae te Kaikōrero ki te tautohe i whakamahia e te hunga e kōrero ana i ngā pire, kia kaua e puta te ture ki te kore e taea e tōna kaitautoko te tautoko a ngā MP e 100 kia huri i te Paraire me te pōti ki a rātou. E pā ana tēnei ki tētahi mōtini katinga, ka taea te whakamahi hei aukati i te kōrero i tētahi pire - engari mēnā anake e 100 ngā MP ki reira ki te pōti. Engari i kī tonu a ia kia kaua tēnei e ārai i ngā MP kia kaua e kōrerorero me pēhea te whakahou i te mahi. Ka kī a ia: "Ko te pono kino, i tēnei rā i a mātau e whakatakoto ana i ngā Paraire e noho ana e 13 mō te 20 o aua pire, he iti noa iho te wā ka noho hei ture. " Ko te kōrero i ngā pire, ahakoa i mahia i roto i a tātau ture, i te nuinga o te wā i runga i te pūkenga whakangaro, kāore anō kia whakarei ake i te rongo o te Whare." He aha te whakaaro o ngā MP? I kī atu a Piripi Davies, kua whakahētia mō te kōrero i ngā pire, ki te HAU: "Mēnā i a au taku ara ka whakakorea e au ngā pire katoa a ngā mema tūmataiti, engari he tino pai te whakaritenga. " Kaore he tangata i tua atu i a au me ētahi atu e kaha ana ki te kōrero ki a rātau. "Engari mēnā ka whiwhi mātou i a rātou, e whakaaro ana ahau he tino pai te mahi a te pūnaha o nāianei - ko te tikanga tika o ngā ture e kore e taea e te iti te ārai, te whakahau rānei i tētahi pire." E whakahē ana a Nick Thomas-Symonds o Labour, nāna te pire mo nga rongoā ārai i kōrerotia i te tau 2015, e kī ana: "Ko te tirohanga o te pāremata e whakaiti ana i te Pāremata i te aroaro o te iwi whānui, ā, e whakaaro ana ahau me huri." I whakaaetia ētahi wāhanga o tana pire i roto i te ture, engari e kī ana a ia he "tino uaua" te tae atu ki reira, ka mōhio ia "he tino kaha te rangatira, ā, me pare ngā tikanga whāiti mō ngā MP kia pāngia". I roto i tana whaikōrero, ka whakaarahia hoki e te Kaikōrero te hiahia ki te whakaaro i ngā tikanga hou mō te whakatau i te wātaka katoa o te Pāremata me te auporo i te Pāremata i te wā o te whakatā. I whakaae a ia ko te wā e kitea ana mō ēnei pātai ki te āhua o Te Wānanga ko te "rima tekau mā rima" engari i kī tonu a ia he "tūmanako".

title: Kua 'arahina kētia e te whakaraupapa pirihimana ki ngā penapena £72m'
summary: Kua hua kē te whakaraupapa pirihimana i ngā penapena neke atu i te £72m, kua whakaaturia mai ngā whika whaimana.
text: Nā Reevel AldersonHome affairs correspondent, BBC Scotland I roto i tētahi pūrongo ki te Mana Pirihimana o Pirihitini (SPA) i kī a Pirihimana Pākehā ināianei ka tutuki i tana ūnga o te penapena i te £1.1bn e rua tau tōmua. I kitea e te whakaraupapa anō i Aperira 2013, e waru ngā ope ā rohe e hanumi ana ki Pirihimana Pākehā. Kua noho pūmau tonu ngā tau pirihimana, engari e kī ana ngā uniana kua whakahekea ngā kaimahi ā-iwi i tēnei wā, tata ki te 800. E kī ana kotahi i roto i te whitu o te tapeke o mua. Ko te tikanga o te whakaraupapatanga anō, e waru nga kātipa matua i noho kotahi, ā, e waru ngā tari HR me ngā tari pūtea me ōrite te kuti. Ko ngā māiatanga i tautuhia e te kāwanatanga o Pirihitini he ūnga kia penapena i te £1.1bn i te tau 2026 - me whakatutuki me te kore whakaiti i te maha o ngā pirihimana. Ko te tikanga o tēnei ko te whakawhāiti i ngā tapahi ki ngā māiatanga, me te whakaiti i te maha o ngā kaimahi ā-iwi, me te pupuri i te taumata o te mahi whakahaere. Kei te tapahia te maha o ngā rūma whakahaere mai i te 11 ki te rima, me te kati a Dumfries i Aperira. Tae atu ki te 300 ngā kaimahi o te rūma mana ā-iwi ka ngaro pea a rātau mahi. Ka rongo te SPA i tana hui i te 26 o Poutāpeta i tēnei tau ā-pūtea kua whakahekea katoatia e 340 ngā kaimahi wā katoa. Engari e kī ana hoki tana Pūrongo Whakahaeretanga Pūtea e 667 ngā taupānga mō te whakahōutanga tūturu kua whakaaetia, e 86% kua whakaaetia. Ko te nuinga ka mahue i te mutunga o te tau ā-pūtea 2013/14. I kī te Tuarua Rangatira Kātipa o Neil Richardson he uaua te whakaraupapa anō. I kī a ia: "Ko te whakakotahi i ngā whakahaere e 10 i roto i tētahi horopaki pūtea uaua tētahi o ngā huringa nui rawa ki ngā pirihimana o Pākehā. " Ko tā mātou whāinga ko te whakaiti i te pānga o te tauwhiro ki tētahi ratonga pirihimana kotahi i runga i ngā mahi pirihimana, ā, i tutuki i a mātou, tae atu ki te tuku i ngā painga o mua o te whakahou. "He nui ngā mea kua tutuki i tēnei tau tuatahi me te pai ake o te āheitanga ki te tautoko pirihimana tohunga me ngā pirihimana paetata kua whakakahatia anōtia. I kī a ia kua tonoa ngā penapena e £64m mō te tau ā-pūtea 2014/15 - engari kua tāutua kētia te nuinga o ngā tapahi. I kī te pūwāhi tīpoka o Vic Emery, te manukura o SPA: "Kua urupare tonu ngā ratonga pirihimana ki ngā hiahia paetata, kua haere tonu te hara i Pākehā i tōna ia whakararo mo te wā roa, ā, he tekau miriona pauna te utu o te pirihimana ki te whakahaere i tērā tau ki mua." I kī a ia ko te rautaki pūtea e kōrerorerotia ana i te 26 o Me e tohu ana i "tētahi wāhi tīpoka mārama" i runga i te haerenga mai i te whakakotahitanga ki te whakahōu roa, tawhiti hoki. Kua karangatia e Unison Scotland, e tohu ana i te tokomaha o nga kaimahi pirihimana ā-iwi, he pōti taraiwa i muri i ngā māharahara mō ngā katinga o te rūma whakahaere me ngā huringa ki ngā whakaritenga whakahōutanga. I kī a George McIrvine, te hēkeretari o te kaimahi pirihimana o Unison i te peka o Pākehā, kua pakaru te whakawhirinaki i waenganui i te uniana mahi me ngā Pirihimana o Pākehā. "Kei te kōrero mai o mātau mema puta noa i Pākehā ki a mātau kia nui, kia mārama hoki, kua rawaka," tana kī. "Kei te āwangawanga ngā kaimahi, kei te mahi nui, kei raro hoki i te pēhanga. " Ka pōtitia rātau e mātau ki te ine i to rātau kaha o te whakaaro mo te mahi tuki tūpono. Kaore he kōwhiringa a te kaitukumahi i homai ki a mātau."

title: Pakihi: Ko te tauhohenga o Aiarangi ki te Raki ki te mahi hokohoko
summary: Kua urupare ngā kaipōrangapū me ngā māngai pakihi i Aiarangi ki te Raki ki te pānuitanga kua tae te EU me te UK ki tētahi mahi hokohoko i muri i te Pakihi.
text: E whai ana i ngā marama o ngā whakahēnga mo ngā mana hī ika me ngā ture pakihi ā muri ake. Ko te Minita Tuatahi me te kaiārahi DUP a Arlene Foster "Kua tohe tonu mātou ki ngā taha e rua kia tutuki i tētahi mahi. " Ko te tikanga, mā mātou e tirotiro ngā taipitopito o te mahi hokohoko me ētahi atu take pēnei i te haumarutanga e tino hira ai te whakaaetanga mai i te tirohanga o Aiarangi ki te Raki. "Nā te Kawa o Aiarangi ki te Raki o te kāwanatanga, ko tētahi mahi hokohoko tika i waenganui i Te Hononga o Ingarangi me te Uniana o Ūropi te putanga tino pai mō Aiarangi ki te Raki. " Neke whakamua, ka mahi tonu mātou ki te hopu i ngā huarahi me te whakatau i ngā whakamātautau e puta mai ana i te putanga o Te Hononga o Ingarangi i te Uniana o Ūropi." Ko te Minita Tuatahi tuarua me te tuakana o Sinn Féin, ko Mīharo O'Neill "Ahakoa he rerekē ō mātau tūnga tōrangapū i te wehenga atu i te EU, e whakaae ana mātou katoa kāore he painga o te tangata ki te haere me te kore mahi, nō reira he rongo pai tēnei pānui ka pōhiritia puta noa i te motu katoa. " Hei kaiwhakahaere ināianei me whakaaro mātou ki ngā taipitopito o te whakaaetanga nā te mea he maha ngā pātai he aha te tikanga o te whakaaetanga mō ngā umanga me ngā tangata whenua, ā, he mea nui kia whiwhi rātou i taua māramatanga." Taoiseach (pirimia o Airana) Micheál Martin "E pōhiri ana ahau ki te whakamutunga o ngā whakaritenga i waenganui i te EU me te UK i tēnei rā. " E tūmanako ana ahau ka whakaaetia tēnei putanga e ngā taha e rua, ā, ka ngāwari te haere o ngā hātepe e hiahiatia ana kia uru ai te whakaaetanga i te 1 o Hānuere. "Ināianei ka āta whakaarohia e te kāwanatanga ngā taipitopito o te kuputuhi. " Mai i ngā mea i rongo ai tātau i tēnei rā, e whakapono ana ahau e tohu ana i tētahi whakararuraru pai me te putanga whārite." Ko te kaiārahi SDLP ko Colum Eastwood "Ahakoa e rapu ana te take ki te whakamauru i te tūkinotanga o te putanga o te Uniana o Ūropi ki ngā tāngata, ngā umanga me ngā hapori i Aiarangi ki te Raki, e kore e wete i te tūkinotanga o Te Kotahitanga. " Ko tēnei moemoeā katoa o Te Pākehā he wā heke mai kāore e hiahiatia ana e te iwi i konei, ā, kāore i pōtitia. "He pai ake te mahi i te kore mahi, engari ka noho tonu te mahi tino pai i te ngākau o te Uniana o Ūropi. " Koia tērā i pōti ai to tātau iwi i te tau 2016. E tika ana kia whai wāhi tātau katoa ki tētahi wā heke mai kua kore e whāiti ki te kōwhiringa kino rawa. "Kua kōwhiria e ngā tāngata i konei he wā heke mai i runga anō i te mahi ngātahi me te mahi tahi. " Ko ngā rōpū o tā mātou tukanga rangimārie e whakatūria ana i runga i te tūmanako me te kī taurangi o tētahi iwi pai ake i hangaia mā te mahi tahi me ō tātau hoa noho tata, te titiro whakawaho me te hanga ki tētahi wā e heke mai ana." Ko te kaiārahi o te Rōpū Kotahitanga o Ulster, a Steve Aiken: "Ko te pānuitanga a te pirimia me te perehitini o te Komihana o Ūropi o tētahi whakaaetanga hokohoko, tērā pea ka mauria mai he mōhiotanga ki ngā umanga i Ingarangi. " Heoi anō, mō Aiarangi ki te Raki, he iti noa iho ngā painga hei whakanui i a tātau e noho ana i raro i te Kawa taurite, tino takahuri hoki, me te kawenga o tētahi rohe o te Moana o Airana i ngā rā tata nei. "Kāore he nui o te āmio mai i a Boris Johnson, i te hunga rānei i whakangāwari, i whakawātea i te ara mōna, e taea te huna i taua mea. " Neke atu i te 2,000 ngā whārangi kuputuhi hei āta tirotiro, ka roa te wā kia mārama katoa mēnā he pānga whānui ake mō Aiarangi ki te Raki, engari ahakoa he aha, kaua tēnei mahi i te haora 11 e angitu - i te maha o ngā āhuatanga ko te kōwhiringa iti rawa, ā, ko te tino kino pea o ngā ao e rua mō Aiarangi ki te Raki." Ko te kaiārahi tuarua o te toa, a Stephen Farry "Kaore he mea pēnei i te pai, i te tika rānei o te Brexit. " Ka waiho e ngā putanga katoa o Te Raki a Aiarangi ki te Raki i roto i tētahi āhuatanga kino ake i mua, ā, ka kite i te ngaronga o ngā huarahi me ngā painga whānui. "Kei roto i ēnei ko te ngaronga o te wāteatanga o te nekeneke me te pānga ki te whakahaerenga ratonga. " E hiahiatia ana tētahi whakaaetanga pātahitanga UK-EU ā muri ake hei karo i tētahi putanga kino kāore he mahi. "Ahakoa he parenga tā Aiarangi ki te Raki, ahakoa ētahi painga whakatairite nā te kawa, ka taea anake te mahi i roto i te horopaki o tētahi mahi whānui ake. " Ka ako te Pūtahitanga i tēnei mahi i ngā rā e heke mai nei. "Ko ngā whakaaro matua mō mātou ko ngā take i tua atu i te hokohoko anake, pēnei i te āhukahuka tika raraunga, te tika, te whakahau me te haumarutanga, me te urunga ki te tūāwhiotanga katoa o ngā Hōtaka EU. " Te Hēkeretari o Aiarangi ki te Raki o Brandon Lewis "He rongo tino pai tēnei mahi mō Aiarangi ki te Raki me te katoa o Te Hononga o Ingarangi. " E hanga ana i runga i te whakaaetanga i tae atu ki te EU i runga i te whakatinanatanga o te Kawa o Aiarangi/Aiarangi ki te Raki. "Ko ēnei whakataunga e tuku ana i a mātau whakaritenga ki Aiarangi ki te Raki, me te whakarite ka tiakina ngā hononga ohaoha me ngā hononga pāpori tīariari ki Ingarangi me Aiarangi, me te pare i te Whakaaetanga o Belfast (Paraire Pai) me ngā whiwhinga uaua o te tukanga rangimārie. " He ahurei te wāhi o Aiarangi ki te Raki kia whai hua me te rangatira i tēnei mahi, nā reira he wāhi ātaahua ake ki te haumi, ki te hokohoko me te mahi pakihi." Aodhán Connolly, NI Retail Consortium "E pōhiritia ana e te umanga hokohoko me ngā kāinga puta noa i Aiarangi ki te Raki te pānuitanga o tētahi whakaaetanga hokohoko koreutu i waenganui i te UK me te EU. " E tūmanako ana mātou mā tēnei e pare ngā kiritaki puta noa i te UK mai i te nuinga o ngā utu kawemai i ia rā. "Mō Aiarangi ki te Raki, ko te tikanga hoki o te whakaiti i ngā āhuatanga hou i waenganui i te GB me te NI. " There is still much hard work needed on Northern Ireland issues if we are not to face another cliff edge in three or six months and retailers are to continue to give NI families the choice and affordability that they so desperately need." Ko Glyn Roberts, te rangatira matua o Retail NI "He whanaketanga tino maioha tēnei, ā, kāore e kore e kore he mapu whakamāmātanga ki tō mātou hapori pakihi whānui ake, e māharahara ana ki te āhua o te raruraru nui o te kore mahi. " He uaua te wā tauwhiro mō ngā kaihoko me ngā umanga maha, ā, he nui hoki ngā taipitopito hei tirotiro i tēnei mahi. "Mā tēnei mātou e tūmanako ka hoatu e te tau 2021 ki Aiarangi ki te Raki me te UK katoa he wā ki te tīmata anō ki ā mātou pātahitanga ki te EU me te tīmata i te tukanga roa o te whakatika i ngā tūkinotanga ohaoha i takea mai i te mate urutā." Nick Whelan, Te Pānga Kai me te Inu o Aiarangi ki te Raki "Pērā i te wā i whakaaetia ai te Whakaaetanga Putunga, ka pōhiritia tēnei mahi i te wā e mau ana i a mātau i te tapa pari - engari he tawhiti rawa atu i te tino tika, ā, kei te hiahia tonu mātou ki te mārama ki ngā wāhi matua maha. " Mēnā me mau tonu te kawa o Aiarangi ki te Raki, me mātua whakatau te UK me te EU i ngā whakamātautau ki ngā kiritaki paetata o te kōwhiringa iti me te nui ake o te utu nā ngā kawenga whakahaere hōu i runga i te hokohoko GB-NI. "Tērā anō, e hiahiatia ana e mātou he pūnaha arotake tika kia noho mai i te rā tuatahi i te mea ka puta he hapa me ngā raruraru niho i a mātou e whakarite ana ki ngā hātepe hōu, ā, e hiahia ana mātou ki te whakaiti i te moumou." Ian Henry, perehitini o te Northern Ireland Chamber of Commerce and Industry "Ināianei me kite ō mātou mema i ngā taipitopito me te kūnatu i te kirimana, me te whakaaro he aha te tikanga o ōna whakaritenga taipitopito mō ngā kamupene e neke ana i ngā taonga, ngā tāngata me ngā raraunga puta noa i ngā rohe. " Ināianei me kite tātau i ngā hipanga hātepe hei whakaene i te whakaurunga o ngā whakaritenga hou mai i Hānuere, tae atu ki ngā whakangāwari mō ngā hapa whakahaere pono, ngā hātepe ūkui i ngā tauranga, me te āwhina tere mai i ngā mana tikanga. "Kāore he wāhi e nui ake ai tēnei, kōhukihuki hoki i ngā umanga e tauhokohoko ana i waenganui i Ingarangi me Aiarangi ki te Raki." Dawn McLaughlin, te perehitini o te Ruma o Londonderry "Ko te mahi hokohoko i whakaaetia i nga wa katoa he mea nui mo nga umanga i Aiarangi ki te Raki, a, i te wa whakamutunga, ka whakamarie nga kamupene puta noa i te whenua ki te whai pono me te maarama ki te 2021. " I te 31 o Hakihea, kāore i taea e ngā umanga i te raki ki te hauauru, ā, tērā pea ka tūkinotia tō mātou whakahaerenga ā-rohe, nā reira he whakamāmātanga ka karohia tēnei. "Ināianei me whakamārama e te kāwanatanga ki ngā umanga he aha tā rātou mahi hei whakarite mō ngā huringa taumai. " Kaore te mahi e mutu i konei." Maura Quinn, Institute of Directors in Ireland "Ko tēnei whakaaetanga i muri i te Brexit, mēnā ka hainatia e ngā pāremata e rua, ka mauria mai ētahi taumata tūturu ki te tuma e tīari ana mai i te taupānga UK i June 2016. " I ngā tikanga ā-ringa, ka tino nui tonu ngā whakamātautau mō ngā umanga o Kīriria ki te whakarite ki te ao hou o te wā o muri i te Pakihi. "Ahakoa ka whakangāwari pea tēnei whakaaetanga i tēnei rā i ētahi o taua āwangawanga, kāore he pōhēhētanga ka tino nui ngā take ā-ringa me ngā take rautaki i ngā marama e heke mai nei."

title: He uaua ake ngā whakaritenga pae pāpori i a Dickens
summary: Tērā pea kei te waitohu ngā tamariki ki ngā taupānga me ngā ture me ngā tikanga e mārama ana ngā ākonga o te whare wānanga anake, e whakaatu ana te rangahau o TE HAU.
text: Nā Tom Calver rāua ko Joe MillerBBC News Ko te pakeke mōkito hei whakamahi i ngā taupānga pēnei i te YouTube me te Facebook ko te 13. Tae atu ki te whakamahi i te reo matatini, i kitea e te AO ko te pānui i ngā whakaritenga o ngā pae kaingākau e 15 ka tata ki te iwa haora te katoa. Tērā pea kei te takahi ngā kamupene i ngā ture raraunga o Ūropi, e hiahia ana kia mārama te tātaki me pēhea te whakamahi i ngā raraunga whaiaro. Hei urupare ki ngā kitenga, i whakapaea e MP Damien Collins ngā kamupene hangarau ki te whakamahi i ngā ture me ngā tikanga hei "pokanoa" i ngā raraunga a ngā kaiwhakamahi. Engari he maha ngā kamupene i urupare mā te kī kei te mahi rātou ki te whakapai ake i te pānuitanga o ā rātou tuhinga ā-ture mā te whakamōhio i ngā whakarāpopototanga ngāwari ki te pānui. Ngā rorohiko hangarau me ō raraunga: E iwa ngā mea kāore koe i mōhio He pēhea te uaua ki te pānui? Ina whakamahi paetukutuku, taupānga rānei pēnei i Facebook, YouTube me Instagram, me waitohu ngā kaiwhakamahi ki ngā ture me ngā tikanga a te kamupene, arā ko te whakaae kia herea e tētahi kaupapahere tūmataitinga. E ai ki a Ofcom, neke atu i te waru i roto i te 10 ngā tamariki i waenganui i te rima me te 15 te pakeke i whakamahi i te YouTube i tērā tau. I mahia e te AO tētahi whakamātautau pānuitanga hei mahi i te taumata mātauranga e hiahiatia ana kia mārama ai ki ēnei kaupapahere. Ko ngā pae katoa e 15 he kaupapa here i tuhia ki te taumata pānui o te whare wānanga, ā, he uaua ake i a Charles Dickens' A Tale of Two Cities. Ahakoa te mea ka taea e ngā tamariki 13 te pakeke te whakamahi i te YouTube, Twitter, Snapchat, Google, Instagram, Facebook, Reddit me Apple. I whakahē a Tēnā Collins, e tūtaki ana i te Komiti Ahurea o te Whare o Ngātahi, i te whakamahinga o ngā kupu matatini, roa hoki. "Kāore i te nui te tā i tētahi kawenga gobbledegook, e mōhio ana koe kāore tētahi e pānui, me te kī: 'Aha, kei a mātou te mana ki te mahi nā te mea e kī ana i konei'," tana kī. " Me mātua whakarite koe kei te tino whakamōhiotia ngā tāngata he aha ō rātou motika, he aha hoki i tukuna atu ai ō rātou raraunga. "Me whakarite e mātou he whakaritenga mō ngā kamupene hangarau kia tātaki i roto i te reo Ingarihi tōkau ngā mea ka taea e ā rātou kaiwhakamahi mēnā e hiahia ana rātou ki te pare i ētahi o ā rātou raraunga." He aha te kōrero a te ture? Ka tae mai ngā kitenga hei Tari Komihana Mōhiohio (ICO), e whakarite ana me pēhea te mahi a ngā kamupene ki ngā raraunga whaiaro, e kī ana e whakarite ana ki te whakawhanake i tētahi Waehere Hoahoa Tika Pakeke. E kī ana ko te tikanga o tēnei ko te hunga e hoahoa ana i ngā ratonga tuihono e whakamahia ana e ngā tamariki, "e mōhio ana ki tā mātou e tūmanako ana mai i a rātou". Heoi anō, tērā pea he hua anō mō ngā kamupene kāore i te whakamārama mārama me pēhea tā rātou whakamahi i ngā raraunga kaiwhakamahi. E kī ana te Ture Parenga Raraunga Ahuwhānui o te EU (GDPR), i mana i te wā o Me, me mārama ngā kamupene ki te whakamahi i ngā raraunga whaiaro. E kī ana te Tuhipānui 12 ko ngā whakawhitiwhitinga ki ngā tangata mō ā rātou raraunga me "poto, pūataata, mārama, me [i roto i] te āhua ngāwari te uru, mā te whakamahi i te reo mārama, māmā hoki, engari mō ngā mōhiohio e hāngai ana ki tētahi tamaiti". E kī ana a Ailidh Callander, te āpiha ture i Privacy International, he aroha, he kawenga ā-ture tā ngā kamupene kia mārama, kia mārama hoki ngā kaupapahere. "Ko te mea kei te uaua tonu te pānui i ngā pānui tūmataitinga e whakaara ake ana i ngā māharahara mēnā kei te ū ēnei kamupene ki te ture," tana kī. Pēhea te roa? He uaua hoki ki te mārama, tata tonu ki te haora te pānui i ētahi o ngā whakaritenga me ngā kaupapahere. Ko Spotify ngā kaupapahere paheko roa rawa atu i te 13,000 kupu, he whakamā noa iho i te tākaro poto rawa a Shakespeare Comedy of Errors. E 53 meneti te roa o te tangata ki te pānui me te kore wehenga. Ko Netflix ngā tuhinga paheko poto rawa, i a Google te kaupapahere tūmataitinga poto rawa - engari e waru meneti te roa o te kaipānui toharite ki te pānui. Ki te pānui i ngā tuhinga katoa i tirohia e mātou, e 533 meneti te roa o te kaipānui - tata rānei ki te iwa haora, kāore he wehenga. He aha te kōrero a ngā kamupene? Ko ētahi o ngā kamupene i urupare ki te AO i whakawhāiti kei te mahi tonu rātau ki te whakapai ake i te pānuitanga o ā rātou tuhinga ā-ture. Ka tohu katoa a Google, Twitter, Facebook, Amazon me Wikipedia ki ā rātou pūtahi tūmataitinga, ki ngā whakarāpopototanga ngāwari rānei ki te pānui, e taea ai e ngā kaiwhakamahi te kite i ētahi atu mea mō te whakamahinga o ā rātou raraunga. I kī a Google, Twitter me Facebook i ētahi atu mana mō te whakawhāiti i te tiritiri o ngā raraunga kaiwhakamahi i roto i ā rātou taupānga. Heoi anō, i mau tonu a Google kāore e taea te whakamahi i ētahi kupu i roto i ana tuhinga ā-ture, ā, ka kī a Netflix kua "herea ā-ture ki te whakauru i ētahi kupu me ētahi mōhiohio". Tikanga Ka riro i tā mātou tapeke pānuitanga te toharite e rima ngā mehua pānuitanga rerekē. I tātaritia e mātau nga kaupapa here i a rātau e tū ana i te 15 o Pipiri 2018. Mō te whakataurite pūrākau rongokōrero, i titiro mātou ki ngā pūrākau whārangi tuatahi e rua wiki mai i te Kaitiaki, te Mēra o ia Rā me te Rā.

title: Pokapū Pouaka Whakaata Poroporoaki
summary: Koia tēnā. Kua oti i a au taku rā whakamutunga e mahi ana i te Pokapū Pouaka Whakaata o TE AO, he wāhi hei kāinga tuarua mō te neke atu i te hauwhā rau tau.
text: Phil CoomesKaiwhakatika Pikitia Kāore, me tāpiri e au taku rā whakamutunga i te BBC, me te haurua o ōku hoa mahi e mahi ana mō te paetukutuku Rongokōrero e haere ana ahau ki W1, te kāinga hou o BBC News i te Whare Pāohotanga - ngā rama kanapa o waenganui o Rāwāhi me ērā mea katoa. I te mea e hiahia ana te BBC ki te neke i ngā kaimahi katoa ki waho o te Pokapū Pouaka Whakaata i te tau 2013, me ngā mahere ki te hoko i te pae, e rangirua ana ahau ka nui taku wā ki konei ā muri ake nei. Nā reira kua kopikopiko haere ahau i te whare ki te kimi i ngā wāhi tawhito i roto i te pae nui e hanga ana i te pae 13 eka. He maha ngā pūmahara mōku i tēnei whare, mai i ngā pō i te Karapu o TE AO - tae atu ki tētahi i mutu ai taku āwhina i a Frankie Howerd ki te tari whakangahau māmā - tae atu ki ngā kopere whakaahua, me ngā hoa mahi katoa i mahi tahi ai ahau. Engari kaua tātau e whakaaro whakaaro. Ko to mātau kāinga hou i waenganui o Rānana he wāhi tari karaehe hou, ā, he ātaahua hoki. Engari he mea hou, ā, kāore anō kia whai hītori o TVC. Nā reira kua uru ahau ki te pūranga whakaahua e titiro ana ki ngā pikitia o ngā rā tuatahi o te whare i te wā o te hanganga. Anei ētahi taonga mai i te pūranga e whakaatu ana i te pikinga o te Pokapū Pouaka Whakaata me ngā tau i muri mai.

title: Ko te tama o Ahitereiria 'e whakaatu ana i te upoko motuhake i Hiria'
summary: Kua whakapuakina e te PM o Ahitereiria, a, i muri i te putanga mai o tētahi atahanga e whakaatu ana i tētahi taitama, i whakaritea ko te tama a tētahi herehere whakamataku o Ahitereiria, e pupuri ana i te māhunga motuhake o Hiriani.
text: I whakairihia te atahanga ki te pūkete Twitter o Tīwhara Sharrouf, i pūrongotia e te nūpepa o Ahitereiria. Ināianei kua uru a Sharrouf, nāna i mahi wā mo te whakarite whakaekenga i Ahitereiria, ki ngā toa o te Kāwanatanga Ingarihi (IS) i Hiria. I kī a Tēnā Wānanga i whakaaturia e te atahanga "te āhua o te pārekareka" o nga kaiwhakawhanake IS. E whakaatu ana te atahanga i tētahi taitama - te āhua nei he pakeke tōmua o te kura tuatahi - e mau ana i tētahi pōtae peisipōro me te hāte kikorangi, mā te whakamahi i ngā ringa e rua hei pupuri i te māhunga motuhake. I whakaurua he tapanga e pānui ana "Ko taku tama tēnā", te kī a Te Ahitereiria. E kī ana i mauria te whakaahua i te taone o Hiriani ki te raki o Raqa. I whakaaturia e tētahi atu pikitia a Sharrouf e mau ana i ngā rūhā riri e whakatakoto ana me ngā tamariki tokotoru i whakapono ai ngā kaiāwhina haumarutanga ko ana tama, ka pūrongotia e te nūpepa. "Ko tā mātou e whakamīharo ana ko te Kāwanatanga Ingarihi... ehara i te mea he rōpū pūtohu noa iho, he ope pūtohu, ā, ehara i te mea e rapu ana rātau i tētahi pākākā pūtohu anake, engari he āhua pūtohu," te kī a Tēnā Wānanga ki te reo irirangi o Ahitereiria mai i Hōrana, e kōrerorero ana a ia i ngā take e pā ana ki te rere MH17, te waka rererangi pāhihi i whakahekea ki Ukraine. "Ā, he raruraru whakaharahara tēnei... ehara i te mea mō ngā tāngata anake o te Rāwhiti o Waenganui, engari mō te ao whānui ake. "Ā, ka kite mātou i ētahi atu whakaaturanga o te pārekareka o tēnei hinonga." I hereheretia a Sharrouf i te tau 2009 mo te whā tau mo te noho hei wāhanga o tētahi pūtau whakarite whakaekenga i Poihākena me Melbourne. I muri i tana tukunga ka rāhuitia ia kia kaua e wehe i te whenua, engari i whakamahia te uruwhenua o tōna tuakana ki te haere ki Hiria me tōna whānau. I tukuna e Ahitereiria he whakamana mo tana hopunga i a Hōngongoi i muri i te putanga mai o ngā atahanga i runga i te mea e whakaarotia ana ko tana whāngai Twitter o tētahi atu Ahitereiria, o Whiriwhiri Elomar, e pupuri ana i ngā upoko motuhake o ngā hōia kāwanatanga o Hiriani. 'Āwhina pūrua' I tērā wiki, ka pānuitia e Ahitereiria ngā ture e rāhui ana i ōna iwi kia kaua e haere ki ētahi whenua, i roto i tētahi tono kia āraia ngā tangata whenua e whawhai ana ki ngā rōpū pūhāhā ki rāwāhi. I waenganui i te 150 me te 160 ngā Ahitereiria e whakapono ana e whawhai ana ki ngā kaiwhakawhanake i te Rāwhiti o Waenganui, e ai ki ngā pūrongo. Ināianei, e kī ana a Ahitereiria e tuku ana i ngā rererangi hei āwhina ki te whakataka rawa ki ngā mano o ngā mema o te iti o Te Wānanga i mau i ngā kairiri IS i Maunga Sinjar i Raki. Kua whakataka kētia e ngā rererangi o Amerika me Ingarangi he taonga hei āwhina i te iwi e paea ana, e kore ana e kai me te wai, ā, ka anga atu ki te mate i te ringa o nga kaiwhakawhanake. Kua whakahaeretia hoki e te US he rangatū o ngā tuki hau ki nga kairiri IS. I te Mane ka whakaaturia e te Minita Whakangungu a David Johnston kāore pea te āwhina o Ahitereiria e whakawhāititia ki ngā maturuturu āwhina. "Kāore mātou i te whakahaere i te whakarato āwhina pūrua ki ngā Kaiāwhina i a rātau e haere ana ki te mahi ki tēnei rōpū pūtohu," tana kī. "Kua rite mātou ki te āwhina i ngā āhuatanga katoa e taea ana e mātou kia tonoa mātau kia āwhina e ngā Kaiāwhina me te kāwanatanga o Te Kāwanatanga."

title: Ka kōrerorerotia e Jeremy Corbyn ngā tuki hau o Hiriani me te kāpata kōruru
summary: E tūtaki ana te kaiārahi mahi a Jeremy Corbyn ki tana kāpata kōruru i waenganui i ngā wehewehenga mēnā ka whakahokia ngā tuki hau i Hiria.
text: E pūrongotia ana a Tēnā Kōpia e tuku ana i ana MP he pōti koreutu mēnā ka whakahoki i ngā tuki, e ātete ana a ia. I tohe te tumuaki kōruru o John McDonnell ki a ia kia tuku pōti koreutu, engari i kī tana urunga ko Diane Abbott me tohutohu ngā MP kia pōti me te kaiārahi. I mua i te hui kāpata kōruru, ka kī a Labour e 75% o ngā mema o te rōpū i whakapuakina e ia te whakapae. I kī te rangatira o te kōrero tōrangapū o TE WĀ, a Te Wānanga o Te Aotearoa, kāore ngā tono a Tēnā Kōpia i te āhua nei he "māmā" noa iho ki te tuku pōti koreutu ki ngā MP. Te āhua nei e kī ana a Tēnā Kōpia ko te tūnga mana o Labour ko te whakahē i ngā tuki hau, ahakoa te pōti koreutu, ka tāpiritia e ia. I mahia e te rōpū tētahi "whakaaro" mo te take i te mutunga wiki, ā, i kī kua whiwhi urupare 107,875 e 64,771 i whakaūngia hei mema Mahi katoa. Engari i pātai ētahi tāngata ki te pōti. I kī atu a Labour MP Angela Smith ki te Reo Irirangi 4 o Te Ao i Te Kotahi he "whakaaro hārangirangi" tērā, ā, i mōhio ia ki tētahi mema e hiahia ana ki te amuamu nā te mea kāore anō ia kia whiwhi īmēra. E ngana ana te kāwanatanga ki te whakapati i ngā MP kia hoki whakaroa i ngā tuki hau o UK e hāngai ana ki te Kāwanatanga Ingarihi ki Hiria. E kī ana a Rawiri Karauna ka pōti anake a ia ki ngā tuki hau mēnā kei a ia te tautoko mārama a te Kotahitanga, e kī ana ka ngaro te pōti ka hoatu e ia he wikitōria whakatūpato ki te rōpū o te Kāwanatanga o Ingarihi. Kua tuhituhi a Tēnā Kōpia ki a Tēnā Karauna e tono ana kia tū he taupatupatu e rua rā i mua i te pōti. I te rā kotahi, ka kī te kaiārahi Mahi, "ka haukotia ngā koha hira". Ahakoa he nui te nuinga o te paremata o Tēnā Karauna, he nui tonu ngā MP Tūturu e ātete ana ki te UK e hono ana ki te whakapae i ngā ūnga IS i Hiria kia rangirua ai te hua. Ko te rōpū nui rawa atu i te Kotahitanga, ko te SNP, e ātete ana ki te whakapae, nā reira ko te tūnga o ngā MP Labour he kī mēnā ka toa a Tēnā Karauna i tētahi pōti pērā, kāore rānei. Tātaritanga: 'He wiki tino nui' Nā Ben Wright, te korero tōrangapū o TE AO E pā ana ki ngā tau. Ahakoa e 12 te nuinga o te kāwanatanga, he tokomaha pea ngā MP Conservative - tērā pea kotahi tekau - he kaha te rangirua mo te whakaroa atu i ngā tuki hau ki Hiria. E kore hoki te kāwanatanga e mōrearea i te hinganga i roto i te Whare o Ngātahi. Ko te mea, e hiahia ana ki tētahi toa māia. E kore te kāwanatanga e whiwhi i te tautoko a ngā MP SNP, te rōpū nui rawa atu i te Pāremata, nā reira e hiahiatia ana he wāhanga o ngā MP Mahi. I tēnei mutunga wiki ka whai kōrero ētahi MP Labour ki te MoD, ā, kei te kōwhai ki ngā tautohetohe, e whakarongo ana ki ngā wahanga. Koia te take i tino hira ai te whakataunga a Jeremy Corbyn. Ki te whakaaetia e ia he pōti koreutu, tērā pea ka pōti te hawhe o tana kāpata kōruru, ā, neke atu i te 60 ngā MP Mahi mō ngā tuki hau. Ki te tohe tonu a ia ki te ātete ā-rōpū, tērā tētahi haupae kaha rawa i roto i te Rōpū Mahi Paremata e āhei ana ki te whakararuraru i ngā kaupapa a te kāwanatanga. Kua kī mai tētahi minita kāpata kōruru ki a au tērā pea kāore a Labour e whakaae ki tētahi tūnga i te Mane, ā, ka tatari ki te kupu o te mōtini a te kāwanatanga i mua i te whakatau me pēhea te pōti. He wiki tino nui tēnei. E kī ana a Tēnā Kōpia kāore anō a ia kia whakatau mēnā ka whakaaetia ōna MP kia whai i tō rātou hinengaro i roto i tētahi pōti wātea, ka tohe rānei kia whakahē katoa rātau ki te mahi hōia - engari i mārama a ia i roto i tētahi uiuinga o te Rātapu Marr Show māna anō e whakatau. I kī atu a Ms Abbott, te hēkeretari whanaketanga o te ao whānui, ki te hōtaka o Te Reo Irirangi 4 o Tēnei Rā, e whakapono ana a ia e "neke ana ki a mātau". "Ki taku whakaaro kua mārama ināianei kei te wetewete te kēhi o Cameron [mo te pakanga]. E hiahia ana ngā mema o te rōpū me te nui haere o te whenua ki te kite i a mātau e whakahē ana i ēnei tuki hau." I kī a ia e hiahia ana ngā mema o Labour kia whakahē te rōpū i ngā tuki hau "me ngā uaua katoa o tō tātau oranga" ko te tikanga o te whakapakari i tētahi wepu rārangi toru ki runga i te pōti. "Ko te raruraru mo te pōti koreutu, ko te wikitōria ki a Cameron i runga i ēnei tuki hau... i runga i te pereti," tana tāpiri mai. "Kāore au i te whakaaro koia tērā e hiahia ana ngā mema o te rōpū ki te kite." E tohe ana a Tēnā Kōpia e tohu ana a ia i ngā whakaaro o ngā mema Mahi, he whakaaro i pāorotia e Len McCluskey, te kaiārahi o te uniana mahi nui rawa o Ingarangi. I roto i tētahi rangitaki o Huffington Post, ka whakapaea e te hēkeretari ahuwhānui o Unite ngā MP Labour ki tētahi mahi "māuiui" ki te whakakore i a Tēnā Kōpia mā te pokanoa i te haupae i runga i Hiria. I kī te Hēkeretari Whakangungu a Michael Fallon e "haere tonu ana te kāwanatanga ki te hanga i te kēhi" mō ngā tuki. I kī atu a ia ki te HAU: "Ehara tēnei i te mea mō Jeremy Corbyn anake - mō te Pāremata katoa ki te urupare... me te whakatau kia nui ake te mahi i roto i to tātau whakangungu i a tātau anō kia noho haumaru ai tō tātau whenua."

title: BT European head to resign
summary: Ko te upoko o BT Europe, ko Corrado Sciolla te upoko matua rawa atu ki te huri i te heitara kaute i BT. Ka tūmanakohia tana tukunga iho ā muri ake nei i tēnei ahiahi.
text: Kua whakatārewatia kētia te kaiwhakahaere nui me te āpiha whakahaere matua o BT Itari, ā, ka tirohia e te kamupene mēnā me whakahoki anō ētahi tāpiri i whiwhi i roto i te wā e rua ki te toru tau i kitea ai ngā tūtohutanga kaute nui. Ko te puare £530m i roto i ngā pūkete he hua o ngā hapa kaute nui e pā ana ki ngā kaimahi me ngā kaihautū ā-roto i hapa i ngā kaihautū o waho. Kei te arotake te kamupene i tōna pātahitanga ki tōna kaitirotiro o waho i Itari, i PWC. E kī mai ana ki a au kāore te tūnga o te rangatira nui o te Rōpū BT, a Gavin Patterson, i raro i tētahi tuma wawe, ā, ka kī mai ngā pūtake i te kamupene ki a au e whakaaro ana rātou he tauhohenga te kiriata utu tiri 20% o tēnei rā. Ko Itari e tohu ana i te 1% anake o ngā moni hua a BT. Ko te hinganga o te utu tiritiri e whakamāramatia nuitia ana e tētahi tirohanga tōkeke mō ngā umanga wāhanga tūmatanui o BT me te āmaimai mākete huri noa i te pānga o Te Wānanga me te rangirua i te wehenga o BT Openreach - i tēnei wā he take tautohetohe i waenganui i a BT me te kaiwhakarite UK Ofcom. I tēnei wā kei raro ngā hea BT i te 19%.

title: Ka ako a Haimona Weston i te hītori o te tipuna i roto i ngā pakanga e rua
summary: Kua kitea e te toa o Falklands, a Haimona Weston, he mahi tā tōna tipuna i roto i ngā pakanga e rua o te ao - e āwhina ana ki te pupuri i ngā kairiri i te hau.
text: I rangahautia te pūkete ratonga a Carpenter Walter Weston mō te rangatū The People Remember a BBC. I huraina hoki ngā whakaahua kāore anō kia kitea e Tēnā Weston i mua - tae atu ki tētahi i roto i tētahi kilt e whakaatu ana i te tīpuna o Pirihitini o Walter. "Kei te harikoa ahau," tana kī. "He tino pai te kimi i tēnei mō taku tipuna tāne." He kaihanga pūoko a Walter Weston, ā, ko tana mokopuna katoa i mōhio mōna ko tōna ingoa, ā, tērā pea i whawhai ia i roto i te hōia i te Pakanga Tuarua o te Ao. Engari i kitea e te Whare Taonga Pakanga o Te Emepaea o Rāwāhi kua uru ia ki te Royal Flying Corps - te tīmatanga o te RAF - hei kāmura i te tau 1918 ki te mutunga o te Pakanga Tuatahi o te Ao. Kātahi i te WW2, i mahi a ia hei kaihono me ngā kaimahi whenua kia noho tonu ai ngā kairiri Spitfire me Hurricane i te hau. I te WWI, i hangaia ngā rererangi tuatahi ki te rākau, nā reira he wā pukumahi ngā kāmura ki te whakatikatika. "He mahi tino nui - ka kite koe i te tikanga o ōna pūkenga hei kupa ki te puru i ngā ānau ki roto i te rākau, kia tere ai te mahi," te kī a Tēnā Weston. "I tino tere te huri i ngā oko i aua rā." "Kore rawa ahau i mōhio he aha tōna āhua i a ia e taitamariki ana. He mahara ahau ki te haere ki te kite i a ia i a au e tamariki ana, a, i noho ia i Edinburgh. "He tino rerekē tana āhua i taua wā. E hari ana ahau ki te kite i a ia i roto i te kilt hoki. Kia mōhio ai he tīpuna Pākehā tōku - i whakaaro ahau he Welsh parakore ahau! Ehara i te mea hei tangi ahakoa, e mōhio tūturu ana ahau." I uru atu a Tāne Weston, nō Nelson, Caerphilly County, ki ngā Pare Welsh i te 16 o ona tau. E 46% ngā wera ki tōna tinana me tōna kanohi i te wā i ahi ai a Tā Galahad i te Pakanga o Falklands i te tonga o Te Moana-nui-a-Kiwa i te tau 1982. I kōrero a ia ki te hōtaka he pēhea tonu tana mahi, engari i āwhina ngā pūkenga o nāianei ki te whakamāmā i tōna māuiui.

title: Te tango i te pakanga i te whakamahana o te ao
summary: I tētahi wā i moemoeā ahau (he dram rānei?) i kōarotia ai ngā mea i whakaaro mātou e mōhio tūturu ana mō te ao.
text: Matt McItihiTaiao correspondent@mattmcgrathbbcon Twitter I tēnei ao rerekē, te āhua nei ka hoki ohorere mai te pakanga makariri, ka tīmata a Airangi ki te mahi ōrite i te whutupōro, ā, ka tīmata ngā pūkenga āhuarangi ki te whakapono ki ngā taumata mōrearea o te whakamahana o te ao. Whakaarohia tōku ohorere i te pānuitanga o tēnei pūrongo hou mai i te Global Warming Policy Foundation (GWPF). Anei tētahi o ngā takahanga tuatahi o te ao ina tae mai ki te huringa āhuarangi i hangaia e te tangata, e whakaae ana kei te piki tonu te pāmahana hei urupare ki te kohu tangata o ngā korohū kati kati. A, e ai ki te akoranga, ka whakawhiti te paepae 2C o te whakamahana mōrearea ā muri ake nei i tēnei rau tau. "I runga i te tauari kohu tiketike, ko tā mātou matapae ko te 2.9C i runga i te mahi tōmua," te kī a Nic Lewis, tētahi o ngā kaituhi, e whakamārama ana he tino teitei ake te whika o te Paewhiri Tāpiripiri i runga i te Huringa Āhuarangi (IPCC). Huh? He aha ērā mea katoa i rongo ai mātou i mua mai i te hunga kāore i whakaae ki te pūtaiao? He whakatupu whakamahana te mea katoa, i aia e ngā ā iwi ā iwi o waho o te mahi? He mea rerekē, kāore te GWPF i te miramira i tēnei whakaaetanga kei te tere te huringa o te kohu i hangaia e te tangata i tō tātau āhuarangi, i whakaritea ki te wheako hītori. Ngā pātai tairongo Ko te pūrongo, i tuhia e te kairangahau takitahi, ko Te kaituhi pūtaiao o Hōnea, ko Marcel Crok, e arotahi ana ki te pātai o te tairongotanga o te āhuarangi - ka pēhea te urupare a te pāmahana ki te pikinga o te waro taikura i te hau takiwā? E rua ngā tau tino nui e whakaurua ana ki te pūrongo IPCC o nā noa nei, e mōhiotia ana ko AR5, i kitea ai he "mārama" te whakamahana o te ao, ā, ko te tangata te take kaha. E pā ana ēnei whika ki te pāmahana e piki ana mēnā ka taurua ngā taumata waro taikura i te hau takiwā. Ko te tuatahi e kiia ana ko te Transient Climate Response (TCR) ā, e kīia ana ko te pāmahana ka kitea e tātau i tēnei wā ka whakawhiti te CO2 i taua raina, e tūmanakohia ana kia noho i tētahi wā i te wāhanga whakamutunga o tēnei rau tau. Ko te tuarua e kiia ana ko te Tairongotanga Āhuarangi Taurite (ECS) ā, koinei te pāmahana e tūmanakohia ana e tātau i muri i te whakaritenga o te ao ki te whakaruatanga o te CO2, e āhei ai ngā urupare pēnei i te whakarewatanga o te hukapapa pākākā me te kohu wai nui ake i te hau takiwā. I tērā o Mahuru, ka kī te IPCC "tērā pea kei roto te urupare āhuarangi rangitahi i te awhe o te 1.0C ki te 2.5C (maia tiketike) ā, kāore e tino nui ake i te 3C". E whakahē ana a Lewis rāua ko Crok. Ko te kī kāore ngā tauira i whakawhirinaki ki te IPCC e hoatu i te taumahatanga nui ki ngā hopukanga pāmahana o te ao tūturu. I a rātau e mahi ana i te tatauranga, ka kitea e rātau he TCR o te 1-2C me te whakatau tata tino pai o te 1.35C. Ina tae mai ki te ECS, ka tae anō a Lewis rāua ko Crok ki tētahi whakatauranga rerekē i ngā pahau whakaaro nui o te IPCC, nāna i hoatu he awhe 1.5 ki te 4.5C, ā, kāore he whakaaro tino pai mō te tairongotanga o te āhuarangi. E huatau ana nga rangatira o te GWPF i te awhe o te 1.25-3.0 me te whakatau tata tino pai o te 1.75C. Ka whakatūria e rātau ta rātau tautohe mō tētahi awhe iti iho i runga i te mea kua nui ake te pānga o te rangahau o mua i te pānga whakamātao o ngā aerosols i te hau takiwā. I te mea kāore anō kia nui ake ngā pāmahana i kitea i roto i ngā tau e 17 kua hipa, ahakoa kei te CO2, e kī ana rātau ka huri i ngā tatauranga katoa. "Ko te tikanga ko te take," te kī a Nic Lewis. "Ko te whakatau tata tino pai rawa atu i AR5 ko te 43% teitei ake i te AR4, engari kāore he pāmahana i roto i ngā tau e 15 kua hipa atu, ā, ko tērā e tohu ana he iti iho te tairongo o te āhuarangi i tā mātou i whakaaro ai." "I hangaia ngā tauira (tīariari) i te wā i whakaarotia ai he teitei ake tēnei whakamātaotanga aerosol kia nui ake ai te tairongotanga āhuarangi o ngā tauira, kua whiua rānei kāore i te ōrite ki te whakamahana hītori." Nō reira he pēhea te urupare a te pūtaiao matua ki tētahi pepa rangahau kāore anō kia arotakea e te hoa, i tuhia e ngā tāngata kāore i te mahi i ngā whare pūtaiao matua, e rangirua ana i tētahi kaupapa matua o a rātau mahi? Ahakoa kāore anō kia whakaaetia te koha, he pōhiri tērā, ahakoa he māmā. "Ko tā rātou matapae o te 1.35C, ahakoa e tika ana, e 25% anake te iti iho i te toharite o ngā tauira rere whānui e whakamahia ana i te IPCC AR5," te kī a Prof Myles Allen mai i te Whare Wānanga o Oxford. "Ko te tikanga o te whakahekenga 25% i roto i te TCR, ko te whakamahanatanga tērā pea i tūmanakohia e tātau i te tau 2050 tae noa ki ngā tau tōmua o te tau 2060." E tautohe ana ētahi atu kairangahau kei te whiriwhiri a Lewis rāua ko Crok i ngā raraunga, ā, kei te whakatū rāua i a rāua whakatauranga i runga i ngā aho ruarua o ngā whakaaturanga i whakaritea ki te pūrongo IPCC whānui ake. E whakatau ana a Lewis kua tino hē tētahi mea ki ngā tatauranga o te IPCC. Ko tana tātaritanga e pā ana ki te pūtaiao, engari e mōhio ana ia ka hiahiatia he huringa ki te āhua o te whakamahi a te ao i ngā kora fossil. "Kāore au i te whakakāhore he uaua kaupapahere nui tēnei, kāore au i te kī me tanu o tātau mahunga ki te kirikiri, e ngana ana tēnei ki te whakaatu i te pūtaiao," tana kī. E kī ana hoki a Lewis he tokomaha o ngā kaipūtaiao matua he "tāngata tino mātauranga, whai tikanga hoki". Ehara pea i te wā "rangimārie i tō tātau wā", engari tērā pea ka tohu kua tika te wā mō tētahi taupatupatu hōu, whānui ake mō te huringa āhuarangi. I whakahauhautia e Dr Ed Hawkins, mai i te Whare Wānanga o Reading, i te mea i whakaae te GWPF me te IPCC he nui tonu te whakamahana i tēnei rau tau. "Mēnā e whakaae whānui ana tātau ki tēnei, ka tino nui te neke atu o te taupatupatu ki ngā mahi e hiahiatia ana hei mahi i tētahi aorangi whakamahana," tana kī. He mārama pea, i waenganui i te wera katoa. Whāia a Mātā i Twitter.

title: Mate sepsis: Ko te tikanga kia whakatūpatotia a A&E ki te tūroro
summary: Ko te tikanga kia whakatūpato ngā kaimahi A&E e haere ana tētahi wahine tino mate, i mate i muri iho i te hīhipera, kua rongo tētahi uiuinga.
text: I mate a Samantha Brousas, 49, mai i Gresford, tata ki Wrexham, i te 23 o Hēpuari 2018, e rua rā i muri i tana maunga ki te Hōhipera o Wrexham Maelor. E toru haora tana tatari i roto i te waka tūroro i mua i tana whakaurunga. Consultant paramedic Duncan Robertson said the ward should have been informed under existing guidelines. I rongo hoki te uiuinga mai i a Dr Kate Clark, te kaitohutohu i roto i te rongoā ohorere, nāna i whakaatu kua tukuna e ngā koroni te tapeke o ngā pūrongo "ture 28" e ono e hāngai ana ki te ārai i ngā mate ā muri ake e pā ana ki ngā waka tūroro me tūtira i waho o ngā hōhipera i te raki o Weera. Mr Robertson, the regional clinical lead for the Welsh Ambulance Service Trust, referred to guidance from the Joint Royal Colleges Ambulance Liaison Committee. "Ko te tikanga kia whakatūpatotia kētia a Sam ki te tari ohorere," tana kī atu ki te uiuinga i Ruthin. I rongo te kōti i mua i nga kaiāwhina e pātai ana, nāna i pātai mō te mahinga o te tukanga whakatūpato tōmua. I kī atu a Paramedic Steffan Jarvis ki te kaimahi waka tūroro o te kōti i mōhio te hōhipera he "mōrearea, he haumaru" hoki, ā, kāore anō kia whakatūpato i te hōhipera, ahakoa kua aromatawai a Ms Brousas he "tino mōrearea, tino mate". I kōrero anō a Tēnā Robertson ki te rongo i te maha o ngā haora i ngaro i ngā waka tūroro e tatari ana ki ngā whakaurunga ohorere i Wrexham Maelor kua kite i te hinganga pūmau mai i te matenga o Ms Brousas. I taua wā, e 450-500 hāora i ngaro i ia wiki nā te takaware i A&E, engari i te tīmatanga o Whiringa ā-Rangi, iti iho i te 40 hāora ia wiki i ngaro. I karangatia e te rōia ko Stephen Jones, e tohu ana i te whānau o Ms Brousas, he whakaotinga kōrero mai i te kaiāwhina o te koroni o Joanne Lees. "Ko te tūkinotanga i tēnei take, i mōhiotia te āhua o Sam, engari kāore he mea i mahia, ā, ko te tikanga he hinganga i roto i te pūnaha," te kī a Tēnā Jones. Engari i whakapuakina e te tohutohu mō te Poari Hauora o te Whare Wānanga o Betsi Cadwaladr me te Ambulance Trust, a Dan Rogers, te hiranga o ngā whakaaturanga i hoatu e te kaiwhakaatu tohunga takitahi o Prof Solomon Almond. I kī a Prof Almond i mua ka "ora pea" a Ms Brousas mehemea i mauria ia ki te hōhipera i te ata o te 21 o Hui tanguru. Engari kāore anō kia karangatia te waka tūroro tae noa ki taua ahiahi. 'Kāore i te mārama te take hāngai' "Kāore i te mārama te take o tōna matenga," te kī a Tēnā Toro. I te hikitanga o ngā takahanga tae noa ki te 20 o Hakihe, ka kī a Ms Lees e hiahia ana ia ki te whakaaro i ngā whakaaturanga i mua i te whakaotinga. I rongo te uiuinga i mua i te tatari a Ms Brousas i roto i tētahi waka tūroro mo te toru haora i waho o te hōhipera me te kore hoatu rongoā paturopi, i te mea kāore i taea e ngā paramedics te hoatu rongoā ki a ia. I rewharewha a ia i te wā o te Tau Hou, engari kua kino kē atu ōna āhuatanga, ka rongo te uiuinga. I korerotia hoki kua "whakapaea te hōhipera", kāore he moenga wātea, ahakoa e 46 ngā moenga tāpiri e whakatuwheratia ana. I kī nga paramedics nāna i kawe mai a Ms Brousas ki te hōhipera me te pōhēhētanga o te hīkoi, i ohorere rātau kāore a ia i whakaaetia wawe.

title: I mate a Cilla Black i muri i te whiu, e kī ana te koroni
summary: I mate a Cilla Black i te whiu i muri i te takanga i tōna kāinga Pāniora i te Hātarei, kua whakaūngia e te koroni.
text: I te rā te pakeke e 72 tau i tōna whare i Estepona i a ia e tū ana, ka ngaro tōna whārite, a, ka hinga ki tōna māhunga, nāna ia i ngaro. I muri iho ka mate ia i te whiu, a, kaore ia i mamae. I muri i te whiwhinga i ngā hua "tūturu" o te whakamātautau tirotiro tōmuri mai i ngā mana i Paniora, ka tukua e nga tama tokotoru a te whetū te mōhiohio. Ināianei kua whakaaetia rātau kia whakahokia tōna tinana ki UK i ngā wā tata nei mo tōna nehunga. "E whakararuraru ana mātau i te ngaromanga pouri o to mātau whaea, engari kua tino pā atu ki ngā karere tautoko katoa mai i ōna hoa, ngā kaihautū, te iwi whānui me te pāpāho," te kī a Robert, Ben me Jack Willis i roto i tētahi kōrero. "E hiahia ana mātou ki te mihi ki te katoa, otirā ki te iwi o Liverpool. Nā ngā takoha me ngā aroha i tino āwhina i a mātau i roto i ēnei wā uaua. "Kua kī mai ngā mana Pāniora ki a mātau ka taea e mātou te kawe mai i a Māmā ki te kāinga, e tūmanako ana mātou kia tere te mahi. " E hiahia ana hoki mātau ki te mihi atu ki te hunga katoa e pā ana ki a rātau āwhina mo tēnei take. E tono ana mātou kia pouri tonu tō mātou tūmataitinga." Ka whakaputaina ngā taipitopito o te nehunga i te wā e tika ana. I whānau mai a Priscilla Maria Veronica White, i kitea tuatahitia e te Liverpudlian te rongonui hei kaiwaiata i ngā tau kotahi mano e ono tekau mā rua, me te aho o ngā taunga 10 o runga tae atu ki Anyone Who Had a Heart me You're My World. I neke tana arotahi mahi ki te pouaka whakaata i te tau 1968, i te wā i hoatu ki a ia tōna ake rangatū tuatahi o TE KOTAHI, ā, ka haere tonu ia ki te taurima i te Rā Matapo me te Ohorere Ohorere mō ITV. I muri i te pānuitanga o te rongo o tōna matenga i te Rātapu, ka ringihia mai he takoha ki te whetū i te ao whakangahau. I karangatia ia e Tā Paora McCartney "he kōtiro ātaahua nāna i whakapoke te katoa ki tōna wairua nui" i te wā i kī a Tā Bruce Forsyth ka "pouri a ia". I kī a Tā Cliff Richard kua haere a ia ki tōna whare i Paniora a tērā wiki. "He tino ohorere tōna matenga nā te mea ahakoa ngā mamae me ngā mamae e mamae ana tātau katoa, i tino ngāwari tonu a ia," tana kī. E hia rau ngā kaihautū i tūtira ki te haina i tētahi pukapuka aroha i te hōro taone o Liverpool i te Mane. I kī ngā hoa kua hinga te hauora o Black i ngā marama tata nei. I pāngia a ia e te kaikōiwi, ā, i ngoikore tōna rongo me tōna kitenga. I kī atu te whetū o EastEnders o Mua o Pārera Windsor ki te HAU: "E rua ngā wā i kite ai ahau i a ia i ngā wiki tata nei, ā, i ngā wā katoa ka āhua mārire a ia. Koia tērā te mea mo Cilla, i ngā wā katoa e āhua tika ana a ia. "Engari i mōhio ahau kāore a ia i tino pai, kāore a ia i te pai." I roto i tētahi o ana uiuinga whakamutunga, i whakahaeretia i Hune, ka kī a Black: "Kāore au e waiata i roto i te kaukau i ēnei rā, kaua rawa e mōhio ki te haereere." "He pakeke rawa ahau. Kāore e taea e au te mahi pēnei i taku mahi," tana kī atu ki a Kānata DJ Robbie Lane i te Whakaaturanga Whakaekenga Peretania o Zoomeradio. "E mōhio ana ahau kei te mahi tonu a Paul McCartney, engari he hama koroua a ia! Kua utua e au aku utu. Ki taku whakaaro e tika ana kia iti noa iho taku okiokinga." "Kei te pai ahau ki ngā mea kua mahia e au me ngā mea kua tutuki i a au." I whakapuakina hoki e Pango te mīharo i te whakamōhiotanga a Lane ki a ia ko Anyone Who Had A Heart te takitahi hokohoko nui rawa atu o te UK e tētahi rehetoi wahine i nga tau kotahi rau e ono tekau mā rua. "E 72 tau tōku pakeke, ā, mō taua wā katoa kāore au i mōhio," tana kī. "Āe, kore rawa ahau. Ka taea e au te mate hari ināianei," tana tāpiri mai me te kata.

title: Covid: He aha te āhua o te ngaru tuatoru?
summary: Ko te raka, i ia taahiraa, ka tīmata ki te whakangāwari puta noa i te UK. A tērā wiki, ka hikitia te raupapa noho i te kāinga ki Ingarangi, ā, ka taea e te tangata te tīmata ki te whakaranu i roto i ngā rōpū iti i waho.
text: Nick TriggleHealth correspondent@nicktriggleon Twitter Engari i te pikinga o ngā pāpātanga whakapokenga i Uropi, kei te whakatūpatotia hoki te iwi whānui o Ingarangi ki te mōrea o te ngaru tuatoru. E kī ana te pirimia he wā noa iho i mua i te horoinga o te ngaru o Uropi ki o tātau taha. Engari neke atu i te haurua o ngā pakeke kua werohia, he aha tēnā āhua? Kei runga kē te tuma i ēnei taha i te wā e whakaahuatia ana ngā tīmatatanga i Uropi hei tuma, kaua e wareware ki a tātau kei te piri tonu te huaketo i konei. Kua tino heke ngā pāpātanga whakapokenga mai i te huringa o te tau - kua pūrongotia he 12 kōpaki i roto i ngā kēhi o ia rā. Engari ka nui ake te mate e rere haere ana e ngāwari noa iho te tango. E whakaaro ana te Office for National Statistics, tae atu ki ngā kēhi asymptomatic, neke atu i te 100,000 ngā tāngata urutā i reira. He tohu kē he iti noa iho te pikinga o ngā kēhi i waenganui i ngā tamariki i muri i te hokinga ki ngā kura i Ingarangi. E kī ana a Prof Christina Pagel, mai i te Whare Wānanga o Te Whare Wānanga o Rāwāhi, ko ētahi o ngā pikinga nā te nui ake o ngā whakamātautau - kua tukuna ngā tauira kura tuarua ki ngā whakamātautau tere auau mai i to rātau hokinga ki te kura ki te tiki i ngā kēhi asymptomatic. Engari e kī ana a ia, kāore e taea te kōrero mō te katoa. E āwangawanga ana a ia koinei te tīmatanga o tētahi ia whakarunga, e tohu ana he tokomaha ngā mātua kāore anō kia whiwhi i tā rātou rongoā tuatahi - kua whakawhāititia te whakataka ki ngā pakeke neke atu i te 50 me ngā pakeke taitamariki whai mate hauora. Ka āwhina te wehenga mo te Aranga ki te whakapōturi i te horahanga, engari he rangitahi noa iho, e wehi ana a ia. He aha te take e hiahiatia ai te tiaki ahakoa te whakawhitiwhiti kano ārai mate Engari ki te piki haere tonu ngā kēhi, he mea nui tēnei? Heoi anō, 99% o ngā mate Covid kei roto i ngā rōpū kua werohia ināianei. Ko te hononga i waenganui i ngā mate me te mate nui, te mate rānei kua "tino ngoikore", e kī ana te tohunga mate o Prof Mark Woolhouse, o te Whare Wānanga o Etinitini. Engari ki te piki ake ngā taumata whakapokenga ka "kitea e te huaketo ērā" kāore anō kia werohia, ā, kāore anō kia mahi te rongoā, e kī ana a ia. Ahakoa he pai ngā kano ārai mate - ka tino whakaheke i te mōrea o te mate, ā, mō te hunga e whakawhanake ana i ngā tohumate, he kaha te tūponotanga he mare māmā, he kirikā, he wā poto rānei o te manawa - kāore i te 100% tika. Nā reira ka whakatūpato a Prof Woolhouse tērā pea ka nui tonu te maha o ngā mate, ahakoa kua tino heke te tuma ki te NHS. Ko te mea e kore e taea e te tangata te tino mōhio ko te tere me te nui o ngā taumata whakapokenga ka piki ake i ngā marama e heke mai nei. Ko te mokatere R māori - e hia ngā tāngata e whakawhiti ana te tangata toharite e whakawhiti ana i te huaketo - i waenganui i te toru me te whā mō tēnei coronavirus, engari me te kaha o te momo urutā hou, tērā pea ka tata ki te rima, e whakapono ana ētahi. E whakapono ana a Dr Duncan Robertson, he tauira mate i te Whare Wānanga o Loughborough, kei roto tātau i "tētahi urutā hou". "Koinei te wā tuatahi e hiki ana mātou i ngā rāhuitanga me te momo hou - ka taea te tango, ā, ka mōrearea aua wāhi me ngā reiti werohanga iti rawa." Ko ngā take ka whakatau i te ngaru tuatoru He maha ngā take e tino nui ana ki te whakatau i ngā mea e tūpono ana mai i konei. Me te pare hoki i te hunga kua werohia, ka āwhina hoki te hōtaka kano ārai mate ki te whakapōturi i te tarenga. Ko ngā whakaaturanga o mua e tohu ana ka taea e te jab AstraZeneca te aukati i te rua hautoru o ngā tāngata kua werohia kia kaua e tuku. I runga ake i tērā, ko te hunga kua whakapokea kētia - e whakaarohia ana he hauwhā o te iwi whānui - ka whai āraitanga. Tuarua, ka āwhina pea te tau. Ka tipu ake ngā huaketo romahā i te hōtoke, engari he iti iho te horapa i te kōanga me te raumati. Nā te mea he huaketo hōu tēnei, tērā pea ka roa te wā ki te noho ki tētahi tauira tau, engari tērā pea ka pā mai ngā wā hurihuri. UK chief medical adviser Prof Chris Whitty says it is likely a significant rise may not actually come until the winter, giving more time for the vaccination programme to rollout. I a ia e kōrero ana i tēnei wiki, ka kī a ia me mōhio te UK ki te "pai ake te āhua o te ara mai i konei", engari me tūmanako tonu tātau ki "ngā tūtuki me ngā hurihanga" i te huarahi. Ko te raruraru tino wawe, i kī a ia, tērā pea he tīmatanga paetata - ā, ko te rerekētanga o te tangohanga i waenganui i ngā wāhi rerekē ka tino mōrearea ētahi wāhi. Ināianei, i te wā roa ake, ka ngāwari ake te hora o ngā taupēnga nā te mea ka taea e rātou te karo i ētahi o ngā urupare ārai ka taea te tākaro, te kī a Prof Whitty. Ko te mea tē mōhiotia panuku ko te whanonga o te iwi whānui. Ko te take mōrearea nui rawa mō te hora i te huaketo ko te whāranu i roto i ngā kāinga, e kī ana a Prof Woolhouse. "We know most outdoor activities are very safe, we know there has never been a surge in cases following school opening and the risks in retail and hospitality can be mitigated. " Engari kāore e taea e mātou te pirihimana i ngā mea e tūpono ana i ngā kāinga o te tangata - koia tērā te taiao tino pai kia horapa ai te huaketo." He pēhea te kino? Ko te "tauhohenga ngākau" o te nuinga o te iwi ko te whakaaro ka pai ngā mea katoa, e kī ana a Prof Tā David Spiegelhalter, he tohunga o te Whare Wānanga o Cambridge ki te mōhio ki te mōrearea, ā, ka taea e tātau te "tīmata anō ki te hākinakina anō". Engari kaua tātau e "whakawhirinaki ki tō tātau whakaaro ki tēnei", e kī ana a ia. Ko te tikanga kia tino tūpato ia hipanga. "E whakatau ana te kāwanatanga kia kaua e hoki whakamuri kia roa ake ai te mahi whakamua." Ko te whāinga, ko te whakataurite i te hiahia ki te whakatuwhera i te iwi i a koe e ngana ana ki te whakahaere i te huaketo. Ahakoa kua karangatia e ētahi tāngata he huarahi "Zero Covid", e mārama ana te kāwanatanga me ōna kaitohutohu kāore e taea tēnei i runga i te āhua o te huaketo, ka taea te horapa me te kore mōhio te tangata kua whakapokea rātou. I tēnei wiki, i kī te kaitohutohu pūtaiao matua a Tā Patrick Vallance he "kore tūponotanga" o te kore Covid. Ka pēhea te kino o te ngaru tuatoru? Nā te tauira i mahia mō te kāwanatanga kua huatau kia 30,000 ngā tāngata ka mate i te raumati o te tau 2022, ahakoa te whakatuwhera anō me te whakatuwhera anō me te whakawhitiwhiti kano ārai mate. E whā ngā wā iti iho i te maha o ngā mate kua kitea e mātau i te tau kua hipa. Ahakoa he tiketike, e tika ana kia mōhio koe i te hōtoke kino, e 25,000 ngā tāngata ka mate i te rewharewha. Engari tērā pea ka nui ake te utu - neke atu i te taurua - ki te kore ngā mea e pai ki te whakaaro, ka huatau te tauira. Ko te tikanga, he whakatūpato i ngā wā katoa e karapoti ana i ēnei tauira. Engari me mahi rātau hei whakatūpato - ahakoa kei roto pea te UK i tētahi tūnga kaha, kaua he mea e tangohia ki tēnei huaketo. Whāia a Nick i Twitter Pānuitia ētahi atu mea mai i a Nick

title: Ngā utu akoranga o te whare wānanga: Kua whakaaetia ngā huringa meneti whakamutunga
summary: Tata ki te rima o ngā whare wānanga o Ingarangi kua whakaaetia ā rātou mahere ki te huri i ā rātou mōkī utu i ngā wiki i mua i te rā kati taupānga.
text: Nā Hannah RichardsonBBC News education reporter The Office for Fair Access (Offa) i kī e 25 ngā whare wānanga i whakaaetia ki te huri i ā rātou mōkī utu hei whakamahi i ngā ture hōu e āhei ai rātou ki te whakaroha. I te nuinga o te wā, i whakahekea ngā utu i roto i ngā whare wānanga e 11, i te wā e £37.4m ngā utu utu, whakahekenga utu motuhake rānei. Engari kua heke iho ngā moni me ngā karahipi i te £13.8m, te kī a Offa. I whakaaetia ngā whare wānanga ki te rapu whakarerekētanga nā te pānuitanga tōmuri o ngā ture whakawhānui hou a te kāwanatanga. I tērā marama i kī ai a Offa kua whiwhi taupānga mai i ngā whare wānanga e 27. E 25 o ēnei i hiahia ki te whakaiti i a rātau utu toharite ki te £7,500, ki raro iho rānei kia taea ai te tono mō ngā wāhi e 20,000 i whakaritea mō tēnei take. Tokorua e rapu ana i ngā huringa mō ētahi atu take. Engari i whakapuakina e nga minita nga huringa kia kaua e whakararuraru i tētahi ākonga. Heoi anō, kua kī te National Unions of Students e tekau mano ngā ākonga ka anga atu ki ngā wiki o te rangirua nā ngā huringa tōmuri. Ko te rā kati matua mō ngā tono whare wānanga mā te ratonga whakauru whare wānanga, Ucas, ko te waenganui o Hānuere. I kī te perehitini o NUS, a Liam Burns: "Ko ngā utu utu he tinihanga e whai hua ana ki ngā tauira e whiwhi ana i te nui hei utu i ā rātou moni ākonga i roto i te 30 tau. " Ka āwhina rātau i te Whare Taonga Moni, he iti iho te whakapau moni ki ngā moni tārewa, engari kāore he painga ki ngā ākonga." I kī te Tumuaki o te Āheitanga Tika, a Tā Mātini Hāhi, e ai ki ngā tūmanako, kua kōwhiria e ētahi whare wānanga kia neke moni atu i ngā moni ki waho o ngā moni me ngā utu utu - he whakahekenga utu motuhake mō ngā ākonga rawakore - e taea ai e rātou te whakaiti i tā rātou utu wawaenga kupenga. Ka kī a ia: "Ko tā mātou i kite ai, i tua atu i te whakaiti i ā rātou utu matua mā te £16.3m, kua tino nui ake hoki ngā utu utu a ngā rōpū. " In short, money is not just being moved from pot to another, there's also additional investment, particularly in fee-waivers, so reducing the net costs for some students." I tapahia ngā moni moni, ā, i kī a ia kāore anō kia whakahekea katoatia te tautoko pūtea mō ngā ākonga, ahakoa te mea kei te tapahia katoatia ngā moni me ngā mōhiotanga e tata ana ki te £14m. Engari i tāpiri mai a ia: "Heoi anō, ehara i te mea ōrite ngā moni me ngā utu utu. He moni i roto i te pēke o te ākonga ināianei, ā, ka whakahekea e ētahi ākonga he moni taurewa kāore pea e hiahiatia e ētahi ākonga te utu katoa. "Kāore anō mātou kia mōhio ko tēhea ka pai ake te tautoko me te pare i te urunga me te pupuri." I kī a Mātini Lewis, te upoko o te ope tūmahi takitahi mō ngā mōhiohio pūtea ākonga: "Ahakoa he rongo pai pea te whakaheke i ngā utu, ki te mahi i ētahi o ngā whare wānanga e whakawhiti moni ana i ngā moni moni. " Ina puta tēnei, ka tangohia e ia te moni i roto i ngā pēke o ngā tauira iti ki te waenganui. "Nā te mea ko ā rātou utunga anake i runga anō i ngā moni whiwhinga (9% o ngā mea katoa i runga ake i te £21,000) - ahakoa i te taumata utu iti iho kāore rātou e tata ki te utu katoa i a rātou moni i roto i te 30 tau ina ūkuia te nama." I kī te 'Mārō' I kī te Uniana o te Whare Wānanga me te Kāreti i tāpiritia e ngā huringa ētahi atu mōrearea mō ngā ākonga i te wā i hinga ai ngā taupānga i te 13%. I kī tōna hēkeretari ahuwhānui o Sally Hunt, i te nuinga, kua tapahia hoki e ngā whare wānanga i tapahia a rātau utu i ngā moni i tukuna e rātau ki ngā ākonga tūpono. "Nō reira, ahakoa ka kawea ngā ākonga ki tētahi akoranga māmā ake, tērā pea ka iti iho te tautoko pūtea ina noho rātou i te whare wānanga. " Ko te mea kotahi marama noa iho ngā ākonga kua tono kē ki te mahi i aua whakataunga hira e whakaatu ana i ngā whakararuraru o te kaupapa mātauranga tiketike a te kāwanatanga." Ka piki te mōrahi o ngā utu whakaakoranga ki te £9,000 i te tau a tērā ngahuru. E hiahiatia ana ngā whare wānanga kia tāpae i ā rātou mahere mō ngā utu teitei ake, ngā moni me ngā utu utu mō ētahi rōpū ākonga i Aperira. Kātahi ka aromatawaia ēnei e te kaiwhakahaere uru tika, o Offa. Engari i mua i te whakaputanga a te kāwanatanga i ana tono i roto i te Pepa Mā o te Mātauranga Tiketike, i takawaretia, ā, i whakaurua ngā tikanga mō te whakawhānui mō ngā whare wānanga e utu ana i te iti iho i te £7,500 i te tau. I kitea whānuitia tēnei hei mehua meneti whakamutunga hei whakaheke i te utu katoa o ngā utu teitei ake i muri i te māramatanga he nui ake ngā whare wānanga i te mea e tūmanako ana ki te utu i ngā utu mōrahi.

title: I pōhiritia te Hēkeretari Kāinga ki Glasgow ki te tiro i ngā mahere 'rūma whakatika'
summary: Me pōhiri te Hēkeretari Kāinga ki te haere ki Glasgow ki te ako anō mō ngā tono mō ngā "rūma whakatika" tuatahi o UK mō ngā kahunga rongoā.
text: E kī ana ngā kaikaunihera ka whawha te mahi hou i te pikinga o te wero tiriti me ngā mate HIV i waenganui i ngā kaiwhakamahi. Kua whakaahuatia e nga minita o Pirihitini nga tono he "hao, he auaha hoki". Engari i kī te Ariki Kaitaunaki e hiahiatia ana e te Kāwanatanga o UK te Kāwanatanga o UK ki te whakatika i te Ture Whakamahi Rongoā. A, ka hoatu e nga kaiwhakahaere hauora te utu ki NHS Greater Glasgow me Clyde neke atu i te £29m. The city's Health and Social Care Partnership developed and agreed proposals for the facility. I hoahoatia hei tapahi i te wero tūmatanui, hei whakaiti i te tūkino mō ngā kaiwhakamahi me ngā hapori, me te ārai i te pikinga o ngā mate e pā ana ki te rongoā. Cross party support The motion was proposed by city convener for health and social care integration, councillor Mhairi Hunter and seconded by her fellow board member, councillor Archie Graham. I pōhiritia e Ms Hunter te tautoko mo te mōtini mai i tua atu i te tūāwhiotanga tōrangapū. Ka kī a ia: "Ehara tēnei i te take tōrangapū - he take hauora tūmatanui. " These proposals have been developed by clinical and social work professionals, who are confident they are the most effective response to a public health crisis that is ongoing in our city." I tērā raumati ka puta mai te utu o te kaupapa e £2.3m i te tau. I Whiringa ā Rangi, kāore a Hemi Wolffe QC i whakaae ki te whakahoki i te kaupapa i te mea ka whakaaetia te pupuri i te hīkini i hokona e te tiriti i roto i te pānga.

title: Te 'ohorere' a te pēne Welsh Boy Azooga i te mahi pouaka whakaata me te Manics
summary: E kī ana tētahi pēne taitama o Welsh kei te whakaponokore rātau i muri i te kōwhiringatanga ki te tākaro i ta rātau mahi pouaka whakaata tuatahi me ngā Kaikauwhau Tiriti o Manic.
text: Ka tākaro a Boy Azooga i runga i te hōtaka pūoro pō ā muri ake me Jools Holland i TE Rua i te Tūrei. I te āhua tuatahi o te pouaka whakaata o te rōpū o Kānata, ka tākaro hoki rātau i te taha o te kaiwaiata reo Welsh o Gwenno Saunders. I kī te kaiwhakarewa me te kaiwaiata matua o Davey Newington he "heahea". I kitea te pēne pahū/toka psychedelic, i hangaia i te tau me te hāwhe ki mua, i a ia e tākaro ana i tētahi mahi i Rāwāhi, ā, i pōhiritia kia haere ki te whakaaturanga. I kī a Tēnā Newington, e 26: "I te mahi mātau i tētahi mahi i Rānana, ā, ko te mea katoa i korerotia mai ki a mātau ka heke mai tētahi tangata ki te mātakitaki i a mātau e tākaro ana. " Ka puta mai, no Jools Holland a ia, ā, i te wiki i muri mai ka korerotia mai he wāhi tā mātau i runga i te whakaaturanga. "Ehara i te mea tūturu, he pōrangi." Ināianei kei te takatū a Tēnā Newington, tae atu ki ngā hoa pēne o Sam Barnes, a Dafydd Davies me Dylan Morgan mō te whakaaturanga ka whakarewaina i te Tūtira i te 22:00 BST.

title: National Trust chooses Caryl Hughes to run Snowdonia £1m farm
summary: Kua hoatu ki tētahi kaiahuwhenua taitamariki 23 tau ngā kī ki tētahi pāmu £1m i Snowdonia hei wāhanga o tētahi karahipi kotahi tau.
text: I kōwhiria a Caryl Hughes, o Dyffryn Ceiriog, tata ki Llangollen, ki te whakahaere i a Llyndy Isaf e 600 eka i Gwynedd me te āwhina a te National Trust (NT). I kī a ia tērā pea ka whakahauhau tōna angitu i ētahi atu wāhine kia hoatu a tērā tau. I hokona e National Trust te pāmu i muri i tētahi whakahau kohi moni i pūruatia e Matthew Rhys rāua ko Catherine Zeta Jones. Ko te whakahau ki te hoko i te āhuatanga i te riu o Nant Gwynant, arā ko te roto o Llyn Dinas, te tono taiwhenua nui rawa atu o te whakawhirinaki mai i tana puku ki te tiaki i a Snowdon neke atu i te tekau tau ki muri. Tata ki te 20,000 ngā tāngata i āwhina ki te kohi i te £1m hei tiaki i te pāmu i raro iho i te waru marama i muri i te whakatakotoranga ki te mākete e te rangatira o mua. Ko te tamāhine a te kaiahuwhenua 'Passionate' a Ms Hughes, nāna i ako ahuwhenua me te pūtaiao kararehe i te Whare Wānanga o Aberystwyth, i whakakitea hei kaiwhakahaere pāmu i te Royal Welsh Show i Llanelwedd, Powys. "I puta ahau i Aberystwyth i tērā tau, ā, kua mahi ahau i tētahi hōtēra. Engari ehara i te mea e hiahia ana ahau ki te mahi - ehara i te mea e hiahia ana ahau," tana kī. Mā tōna tau e whakahaere ana i te pāmu o Snowdonia ia e āwhina ki te whakatau mēnā e hiahia ana ia ki te noho hei kaiahuwhenua wā katoa. "He tino hiahia ahau ki te ahuwhenua, ā, kāore au i te mataku i tētahi uauatanga, koia te mea matua," tana tāpiri mai. I kī a ia e tūmanako ana a ia kia nui ake ngā wāhine e tono ana mō te karahipi a tērā tau. 'Te wā roa' Engari i whāki a ia he "iti noa iho te māharahara ki te tīmata" i tana tūranga hou. "He wā kotahi tēnei i roto i te oranga e hiahia ana ahau ki te whai painga katoa," tana kī. "It's not every day you get the chance to farm a 614-acre farm, especially not at the age of 23 and especially if you are female." Ka tīmata a Ms Hughes i tana mahi hou i te wā o Mahuru. Kia āhei ai ki te Mātauranga o Llyndy Isaf, me noho ngā kaitono hei mema o ngā Karapu Kaiahuwhenua o Wales (YFC) me te pakeke i waenganui i te 18-26. I kī te manukura o ngā take ā-taiwhenua o Wales YFC, a Honatana Williams: "I a au e noho ana i runga i te pae uiui ka taea e au te kī haumaru he tino tiketike te paerewa o te kaitono mō te mōhiotanga, ā, kei te tino mōhio ahau ko te tohunga o Llyndy o tēnei tau tētahi taitama tino kaha e tīmata ana i tana mahi i roto i te umanga ahuwhenua o Welsh."

title: Ka katia te Hōhipera o West Lane i Middlesbrough
summary: Ko te rōpū hauora hinengaro i mate ai ngā kōtiro tokorua i roto i te rua marama, ka kī tētahi kaitiaki.
text: I whakatauria e te Komihana Kounga Tiaki (CQC) te Hōhipera o Middlesbrough's West Lane he koretake, ā, i kī ngā tūroro e tino mōrearea ana ki te "tūkino e taea te karo". I muri mai i te matenga o Pirihitini Harnett, 17 tau, i Hune, me Natia Ngaha, 17 hoki, i mate i te 9 o Aotearoa. I kī te whakawhirinaki e mahi ana hei whakaiti i te pānga o te katinga ki ngā tūroro me ō rātou whānau. I kī tētahi kaikawe kōrero CQC kua mahia e ia he "mahi whawhai" hei kati. I tāpiri mai rātou: "Kei te mahi ngātahi ngā kaitirotiro i tēnei wā me te whakawhirinaki me NHS Ingarangi e whakarite ana i te tiaki me te tautoko whirinoa tika mō ngā rangatahi e pāngia ana, i runga i te haumaru, i te wā tika. " Ko te manakē o CQC ko te haumarutanga me te oranga o ngā tāngata e whakamahi ana i ngā ratonga, ā, kua mahia tēnei mahi kia parea ai rātou, kia haumaru hoki i te tūkinotanga e taea te karo. "Ka whakaputaina te pūrongo mai i te arotakenga hou rawa o Aotearoa i te wā e tika ana. Ko ngā mahi katoa i mahia e te CQC e tuwhera ana ki te tono a te kaiwhakarato." I kī te CQC ko te Wae Holly i te Hōhipera o West Park me te Wae Baysdale i Roseberry Park, e whakahaeretia ana e te whakawhirinaki ōrite me te tuku ratonga ōrite, i "kāore i pāngia". I kī te pānui katinga i whai i "ngā āwangawanga haere tonu i kitea i ngā arotakenga tōmua" o West Lane. I kī te CQC e 11 nga rangatahi i roto i te wae i te wā i tirohia i te Wenerei. E whakaarotia ana koinei te wā tuatahi i katia ai e te CQC tētahi hōhipera hauora hinengaro tamariki NHS nā ngā rahunga. I whakaarahia tuatahitia ngā āwangawanga i Whiringa ā Rangi mō te Westwood Centre o West Lane Hospital, e tuku ana i ngā wāhi tūroro taitamariki haumaru. I whakawaengatia e rātau ngā kaimahi kerēme i whakamahia e ngā kaimahi ngā pūkenga mō te neke i ngā tūroro "kāore i whakaakona, ā, kāore i te hāngai ki te kaupapahere whirinaki". I whakatārewatia rangitahitia ngā whakaurunga ki te hōhipera i muri i te matenga o Christie. I te Rāitema, i whakaaturia mai e 13 ngā kaimahi i whakatārewatia i runga i te whakapae kino o ngā tūroro e mahi tonu ana mō te whakawhirinaki. I karangatia e nga whānau o nga kōtiro tokorua kia mahia he mahi hai ārai i ētahi atu mate. E rua tau a Christie i roto i ngā whare tiaki, ā, he maha ngā take hauora hinengaro, tae atu ki te rongo i ngā reo, nāna ia i tūkino i a ia anō, ā, he maha ngā whakamātau ki te whakamate i a ia anō. I kitea kua mate a ia i muri i tana kōrero ki ngā kaimahi i te hōhipera e hiahia ana a ia ki te kaukau. I muri i tōna matenga, ka whakapae tōna matua matua ko Michael Harnett i a ia i tōna wā i reira ka tautāwhi ngā kaimahi i a ia me te kore whakatūpato, ka rapua ia e te ture, ā, ka whakaaetia tētahi kaimahi tāne kia noho tahanga a ia. I tāpiritia e Tēnā Harnett i ngā marama i mua i tōna matenga, ko tana tamāhine "me whakarongo" kaua e auau te tuku i ngā pūkenga tiaki rerekē. He autism me ngā take hauora hinengaro a Natia, ā, e whā tau e tiakina ana. I muri i tōna matenga, ka kī tōna pāpā o Hakeel Ngaha: "Ki taku whakaaro kāore i reira te tiakitanga, ko te tikanga kia 24 haora te āhua o tana mahi." I kī a Tēnā Ngaha me "tino tere" ngā whakapainga, ā, "kāore i te haumaru mō ngā tamariki i reira". "Me tino tere te kōmaka i a rātou, kāore mātou e pīrangi ki te ngaro i ētahi atu oranga," tana tāpiri mai. I kī a Middlesbrough Labour MP Andy McDonald he "rahunga kino tērā e te whakawhirinaki" ā, i āwangawanga ia ki hea haere ai te hunga e hiahia āwhina ana ināianei. "But the decision has been made and presumably the CQC and the trust have decided that West Lane just cannot be made safe, so this is a huge issue, it is a systemic failure, and of course there's going to be a number of inquiries now," he said. I kī tētahi kaikawe kōrero o te Tari Hauora he "tino nui" te haumarutanga tūroro, ā, ko ngā kaiwhakarato katoa o ngā ratonga hauora hinengaro NHS "me tutuki i ngā paerewa kounga tiketike me te haumarutanga, me te āta tirotiro a te Komihana Kounga Tiaki." I kī a Colin Martin, te rangatira nui o Tees, Esk and Wear Valleys NHS Foundation Trust: "E mōhio ana mātou he tino uaua tēnei mō ngā rangatahi i te Hōhipera o West Lane me ō rātou whānau. " E tika ana kia tiakina rātou i roto i tētahi taiao haumaru, tino kounga, ā, e pouri ana mātou kāore i tutuki i ngā paerewa e tūmanakohia ana e mātou. "Ko tā mātou arotahi ināianei ko te whakaiti i te pānga o te katinga ki ā mātou tūroro me ō rātou whānau. " E tino ū ana mātou ki te mahi ngātahi me ngā tūroro, ngā whānau, ngā kaimahi me NHS Ingarangi ki te mahi mā ngā tauine wā, kia tino mōhio ai mātou ki te whakarato i tētahi tauwhiro māeneene me te haumaru mō ngā tūroro ki ētahi atu ratonga." Whāia a TE Rāwhiti ki te Raki &Cumbria i Twitter, Facebook me Instagram. Tukua ō whakaaro pūrākau ki northeastandcumbria@bbc.co.uk

title: I pūhia e Emanuera de Merode Peretiana i roto i te pehipehi o DR Kongo
summary: Ko te kaiwhakahaere Peretiana o te pāka ā-motu tawhito rawa o Āwherika - ko Virunga i te Whenua Manapori o Kongo - kua pūhia, kua whara i roto i te pehipehi.
text: I puta mai te waka o Emmanuel de Merode i raro i te ahi i a ia e haere ana mai i te taone ki te rāwhiti o Goma ki te taone o Rumangabo, e ai ki tētahi kōrero i tukuna e te pāka.
