Ko ētahi o ngā rōpū patu maha o DR Kongo ki te rāwhiti e noho ana i te pāka. Neke atu i te 130 ngā kaitiaki pāka kua patua i Virunga mai i te tau 1996. I pūhia a Tēnā De Merode i roto i te puku me ngā waewae me ngā matā e whā, ka kī atu a Cosma Wilungula, te hēkeretari tianara o te Whare Wānanga o Kongo mō te Atawhai me te Āhua. I kī te pāka i runga i tana pūkete Twitter ko Tēnā De Merode "i roto i tētahi āhuatanga pūmau, engari he tino nui". He nui ngā hoariri i kawea e te mahi a Tāne De Merode ki a ia, te kī a Tēnā Wilungula. "I te pare a ia i ngā rauemi o te pāka me te ārai i ngā tāngata kia kore ai e uru ki aua rauemi," te kī a Tēnā Wilungula. I te taraiwa a Tēnā De Merode mai i Goma ki Rumangabo i te pehipehi a nga pūtā i tana waka i te Tūtira, ka tāpiritia e ia. Tata ki te 50km (30 maero) mai i Rumangabo, te tari matua o Virunga National Park. He maha nga pūtake whakawhanaunga i kī ai a Tēnā De Merode i haere ki tētahi hui me tētahi rōia kāwanatanga i Goma i mua i tana pūhia, ka pūrongotia e Maud Jullien o TE AO mai i te pūmatua o Kinshasa. Ko te āhua nei i hoatu e ia ki te rōia he mōhiohio tairongo mō te hōpara hinu i Virunga, e kī ana a ia. Kei te hōpara te umanga hinu ā-UK o Soco International mō te hinu i Virunga, ahakoa te kaha o te whakahē a ngā rōpū taiao, ka tāpiri mai to mātau korero. I whakataua e te umanga te whakaekenga ki a Tēnā De Merode. "Kāore a Soco e whakaae ki te tutu ahakoa te aha, ā, ka whakamārama, ko ngā huatau e hono ana i a Soco ki tēnei hara, he tino tūtaratara, he tino tika," tana kī i roto i tētahi kōrero. I tērā o Aotearoa, ka whakakāhore a Soco i te whakawehi o ana ngohe i te taiao o te pāka. I kī te kamupene kei te arotake anake i ngā rauemi i reira. Ko te pāka te kāinga ki te 200 o ngā gorilla maunga e 790 e toe ana o te ao. Ko tētahi o ngā wāhi tino rauropi i runga i te Ao, ā, kei runga i te rārangi UN o ngā pae Tuku iho o te Ao e mōrearea ana. Ko te rāwhiti o te Whenua Manapori o Kongo he rohe ture kore ture, i pā ki te papā i waenganui i te kāwanatanga me ētahi atu rōpū patu. Huri noa i te BBC Africa Today podcasts Related Internet Links Virunga National Park

title: Coronavirus: Ka aroturuki a Apple i ngā huringa o te whanonga haere
summary: Kua whakarewaina e Āporo tētahi utauta e whakaatu ana i ngā huringa i roto i te whanonga haere o ngā tāngata e whakamahi ana i tana taupānga Mahere.
text: Nā Leo KelionTechnology desk editor The Mobility Trends Report e toru ngā whika ōrau o ia rā, e whakaatu ana i te maha o ngā tāngata e taraiwa ana, e hīkoi ana, e whakamahi ana i ngā waka tūmatanui i whakaritea ki te 13 o Hānuere, i mua i te mana o ngā raka coronavirus. E kapi ana i ngā tāone nui me ngā whika ā-motu mō ngā whenua e 63. Kei roto a Hong Kong, engari ehara i te tuawhenua o Haina. E whai ana i tētahi mahi ōrite a Google. He taipitopito ake ngā pūrongo Nekeneke Hapori Covid-19 a Google - e kapi ana i ngā whenua 130, ā, ka pūrongo hoki i te arokē o ngā momo tauwāhi - engari, kua homai anake e te umanga rapu aua raraunga mō ngā rā e rua mai i tōna whakarewatanga i te 3 o Āperira. Ka whakarato hoki a Apple i tētahi huarahi hei kaweake i ōna pūkete hei ripakaute, kia ngāwari ai te whakamahi a ngā kairangahau me te pāpāho i ngā raraunga i roto i ā rātou ake tauira. Ko ngā tāone o UK e hipa ana ko Rānana, Leeds, Manchester me Birmingham. Kāore te kaihanga iPhone i te whakapono ko te tiritiri i ngā mōhiohio e whakararuraru ana i te tūmataitinga o ōna kaiwhakamahi. "Ka hangaia ngā mōhiohio mā te tatau i te maha o ngā tono i tonoa ki Apple Maps mō ngā tohutohu," ka rangitaki. "Kāore ngā mahere e pāhono ana i ngā raraunga nekeneke ki te ID Apple o tētahi kaiwhakamahi, ā, kāore a Apple e pupuri i tētahi hītori o te wāhi i noho ai tētahi kaiwhakamahi." Ahakoa rā, kua kitea e ētahi tohunga tūmataitinga ko ngā mahi a Google me Apple e miramira ana i ngā kitenga ka taea e rātou te kohikohi, engari kāore i te nuinga o te wā, mai i ngā tāngata e whakamahi ana i ā rātou hua. "E mōhio ana ahau ka rerekē te 'raraunga nekeneke' e whakamahia ana, e whakaputaina ana e ngā whatunga pūkoro, a Google me Āporo ināianei, ki te āhua o te tirohanga a te tangata ki ēnei kamupene me tō rātou pono?" te kōrero a Pat Teina, he kaiwhakahaere tūmataitinga i mua i te tinana mahi pūkoro te WHK. E rua wiki i muri i a Google i te whakaputa i tēnei raraunga, ā, i te tirohanga tuatahi he iti iho te pikitia granular. E toru noa iho ngā kāwai ngohe - hīkoi, taraiwa me te haerenga - ehara i te inenga a Google o ngā toronga ki ngā toa, ngā pātaka, ngā pāka, ngā tari me ētahi atu tauwāhi. Engari kāore i te rite ki a Google, ka whakaae a Āporo i a koe ki te kaweake i ngā raraunga taketake, ā, kaua e hoatu i tētahi hopuāhua noa iho, ka tukua e ia ngā pānui ia rā mai i te tōmua o Hānuere tae noa ki tērā Rātapu. He ōrite te pūrākau o ngā huinga whika e rua - he nui ake te hekenga o Wīwī me Itari i te UK, e whakaata ana i ā rātou raka kikī ake, ā, he iti kē atu te US ki muri. Ahakoa he iti noa iho te nui o ngā ngohe i te UK i te Paraire Pai, me te taraiwa tae atu ki te 65% o ngā taumata pūnoa, i te Rātapu kua totohu anō. Me tuwhera te pai o te pikitia o tēnei rangitaki o ngā tono Mahere Apple ki te pātai, otirā ina haere - e hia o tātau e tono tohutohu ana mō ā mātou hīkoi poto mai i te kāinga? Ā, he iti iho ngā raraunga a Apple i a Google, e whakamahi ana i ngā mōhiohio mai i ia kaiwhakamahi Android kua whakaae ki te whakakā i te aroturuki tauwāhi me ngā iPhones kua tāutatia ngā Mahere Google. Engari i te nuinga o te wā ka nui ake te whakaū i te kāwanatanga kei te ū te tangata ki ngā rāhuitanga raka.

title: Ka whakanuia e te tarukino kaha te mōrearea o te mate hinengaro nui, e kī ana te akoranga
summary: Ko te kai paipa kaha 'pēnei i te skunk' ka whakanui ake i tō mōrea o te mate hinengaro nui, e kī ana ngā kairangahau.
text: Nā Michelle RobertsHealth editor, BBC News online E whakaaro ana rātau kotahi i roto i te 10 ngā kēhi hou o te psychosis e pāhono ana ki te tarukino kaha, i runga anō i tā rātou akoranga i ngā tāone me ngā taone o Ūropi. I Rānana me Tūtukupu, i reira he tino kaha te nuinga o te tarukino e hokona ana, ka nui ake pea te mōrea, e kī ana rātau i roto i te The Lancet Psychiatry. Ko te whakamahinga o ia rā o tētahi tarukino ka nui ake hoki te āhua o te hinengaro, i kitea e rātau. E kī ana ngā tohunga me mōhio te tangata ki ngā mōrea tūpono ki te hauora, ahakoa ehara te akoranga i te tohu tūturu o te tūkino. I kī te kairangahau matua me te hinengaro hinengaro o Dr Marta Di Forti: "Ki te whakatau koe ki te whakamahi i te tarukino kaha tiketike, me maumahara tērā pea ka mōrearea." I kī a Dr Adrian James mai i te Kāreti Ariki o ngā Hinengaro Hinengaro: "He akoranga kounga pai tēnei, ā, me tino nui ngā hua." Ka ngaro te pānga o te hinengaro hinengaro ki te pono, ā, ka rongo pea i ngā reo, ka kite i ngā mea kāore i reira, he whakaaro pōhēhē rānei. He āhuatanga rongoā e mōhiotia ana, ā, he rerekē ki te tiketike i te rongoā. He tautohetohe he aha te nui o te tarukino ka whakararuraru, ka whakakino rānei i ngā raruraru hauora hinengaro, ā, he maha ngā whenua kua haere ki mua, kua whakamanatia, kua whakawāteatia rānei te whakamahinga o te tarukino. E āwangawanga ana ngā tākuta mō te nui o te whakamahinga o te tarukino kaha tiketike kei roto te nui o te THC - te mea e hoatu ana i te tiketike. Ko te tarukino pēnei i te skunk me te ihirangi THC o te 14% ināianei ka 94% o te rongoā i hokona i ngā tiriti o Rānana, e ai ki ngā tohunga. 'I pāngia tōku ora' Kua pāngia e Ad Gridley, e toru ngā ārai hinengaro rerekē i tēnei wā, ā, kua ngana ki te whakaora i a ia anō. E whakapono ana a ia kei raro tōna hinengaro i te whakamahinga o te tarukino. Kua kore a ia e kai paipa. "I te nui rawa taku kai paipa, he wāhi noa iho ki a au te pōhatu, ā, i tīmata hoki ahau ki te mahi i a au anō. I muri i ngā whakamātau whai i a au - kāore au i tino whakaae - ka kite taku whaea i a au i te kāinga i roto i taku whare noho e awhi ana i aku turi, e toka ana, ā, i mōhio wawe ia kei te hē tētahi mea," tana kī atu ki te hōtaka o Wikitōria. "I roto i te 24 haora he GP i waho, ā, i te hōhipera ahau a tērā rā. Tata ki te tekau tau i muri mai i tērā, ka pāngia tōku oranga. Kāore i taea e au te mahi, ā, tekau ngā wā i roto, i waho hoki i te hōhipera. Kāore au i te mahi i tētahi mea whai tikanga ki tōku oranga. "I taku tūnga, ka mutu te hinengaro. I runga ahau i ngā rongoā me ngā mea, engari ko tēnā hei whakatika i ngā mea i tūpono i mua, kia whiwhi ai taku matū roro i tētahi momo taurite. I taku whakamutu i te kai paipa, ka ngaro atu ngā tohu. "Mehemea i mōhio ahau ki ngā mōrea, e rangirua ana ahau kua tangohia e au." Ko te mātauranga I titiro ngā kairangahau, mai i King's College London, ki te whakamahinga tarukino e ngā tāngata i ngā taone me ngā tāone EU e 11, tae atu ki Rānana, tae atu ki tētahi rohe o Parīhi. I whakataurite rātau i tētahi tauira o ngā tāngata e 901 i pā ki te 1,237 (mai i te iwi whānui) kāore i pāngia. I whakakāwaitia e rātau te momo tarukino e whakamahia ana e ngā kaiuru e ai ki te kaha, ahakoa kāore i mahia e rātau ētahi whakamātautau taiwhanga hei ine hāngai i te kaha. Ko te tarukino kaha iti he hua kore mana e whakaarohia ana he iti iho i te 10% te whakamōhiotanga o te THC. Ko te kaha tiketike he mea nui ake i te 10% THC. Ko ngā kitenga i kitea e ngā kairangahau: E whakaaro ana ngā kaituhi kotahi i roto i ngā kēhi hou e rima (20.4%) o te hinengaro hinengaro puta noa i ngā pae 11 ka honoa pea ki te whakamahinga tarukino o ia rā, ā, kotahi i roto i te tekau (12.2%) e hono ana ki te whakamahi i te tarukino kaha tiketike. I Rānana, ko te tuarima (21%) o ngā kēhi hou o te psychosis ka honoa pea ki te whakamahinga tarukino o ia rā, ā, tata ki te tuatoru (30%) ki te tarukino kaha tiketike. Mā te tango i te tarukino kaha mai i te mākete ka whakahekea te pāpātanga o te hinengaro o Rāwāhi mai i te 45.7 ki te 31.9 kēhi mō ia 100,000 tāngata i ia tau. Mō te rohe o Rāwāhi ki te Tonga i tirohia e rātau, ko te tikanga e 60 iti iho ngā kēhi o te hinengaro hinengaro i ia tau. He pai te kōhua māmā me te whakamahi i ētahi wā? I kī a Nick Hickmott mai i te aroha rongoā me te waipiro o Addaction: "He raruraru tā mātou ki te kaha. Ko ngā tāngata e mau tonu ana i te nui o te tarukino kaha ka mōrearea pea te tūkinotanga. Tērā pea ka tino kino mō ngā roro tamariki ake. "Ko taku tohutohu ko te karo i te whakamahi i te tarukino kaha i ia rā, me te aro atu ki tōu whakaaro. Mēnā ka mutu tō māharahara, ka pōrearea noa iho rānei, tērā pea he pai ake te hapa. Ehara hoki i te mea pai te whakaranu ki te waipiro, ki ētahi atu rongoā rānei. "He mea nui hoki kia kaua e urupare nui. He maha ngā tāngata e whakamātau ana i te tarukino, kātahi ka neke atu me te kore raruraru. Mō ngā tāngata e hiahia ana ki ngā tohutohu, āwhina rānei, e tūtohu ana ahau kia toro atu ki tētahi GP, ki tētahi ratonga rongoā paetata rānei." Ka rerekē te kaha me te momo o te tarukino. He nui ake ngā taumata THC kei roto i te skunk i te tarutaru.

title: Covid i Scotland: Ko te riri i a Glasgow me Moray e noho ana i te taumata toru
summary: Kāore anō kia tae atu te hākoa i te hokinga mai o te manaakitanga o roto me te awhi ki ngā wāhi katoa o Pākehā.
text: Ahakoa i haere te nuinga o te whenua ki te taumata tuarua, ā, ko te nuinga o ngā moutere i peke ki te taumata tuatahi, ka noho tonu a Glasgow me Moray i raro i ngā rāhuitanga kikī ake. Kua whakapuakina e nga umanga manaaki te riri i te huringa o te ngakau o te haora 11. And concern mounts in East Renfrewshire which now exceed Moray's Covid case rate but has been allowed to ease restrictions. I tērā Tūrei, ka kī te Minita Tuatahi o Nicola Sturgeon ko ngā wāhi tuawhenua katoa me te okotahi o Moray e tūmanakohia ana kia neke ki ngā ture taumata rua i tēnei wiki. Engari i te Paraire ka pānuitia e ia ka takaware te neke ki te taumata rua mō Moray rāua ko Glasgow i muri i te tere o te pikinga o ngā kēhi, otirā i te tonga o te taone. Ko te tikanga kāore e taea e ngā pae me ngā wharekai i Glasgow me Moray te mahi waipiro i rō whare, ā, me kati ō rātou tatau ki ngā kai o roto i te 20:00. E whakapono ana a Donald Macleod, te kaiwhakahaere o te Wānanga Raihana o Glasgow, kei te "whakahawea" te manaakitanga. Ka kī a ia: "E hari ana ahau mō te hunga e āhei ana ki te whakatuwhera, engari kei te tino pouri ahau, ka pouri hoki ki te hunga katoa i Glasgow i te Mane hari, kua noho hei Mane tino kikorangi, haurangi, pouri. " He āhuatanga wehi te noho i roto i tētahi pire pae £1m-a-rā e whakahaua ana ki runga i te taone nui nā te moumou rawa, ngā kaimahi e haere mai ana i te wāteatanga, te whakaritenga - he tāwai katoa. "Ka piki ake ngā kēhi engari kāore ngā pāpātanga mate, kāore ngā whakaurunga hōhipera, engari kua maukatia mātou. Kaore he whakahaere i runga i te NHS. Ko te tikanga kia kaua tātau e whakaweto i te āhua o te whakahaerenga, i te taone katoa. "He tokomaha e haere ana ki waho o te umanga." I kī a Mario Gizzi, te rangatira o te rōpū DRG, nāna te pae me ngā wharekai i Glasgow me ētahi atu wāhi o Pākehā, ko te whakataunga o te Paraire kia pupuri i te taone ki te taumata 3 kua pau kē tana umanga e hia mano pauna. Ka kī a ia: "Kāore i hoatu he wā ki a mātau hei whakarite mo tēnei. " I tērā wiki, i tētahi pae noa iho i Glasgow - te Citizen - i pau i a mātau te £6,000 i roto i ngā utu kaimahi e takatū ana mō te whakatuwhera anō me tētahi atu £6,000 i roto i ngā hua hou kāore e taea e mātou te whakamahi ināianei. "I've also had to pay for extra staff in our call centre to cancel all this week's bookings. " He tino tāwai." I tenei wa kua tuhi te Scottish Tourism Alliance (STA) me te UK Hospitality ki te minita tuatahi e tono ana ki a ia ki te whakatau i nga wero e anga ana ki nga umanga tuuruhi me nga umanga manaaki i Glasgow me tua atu na te taone e noho ana i te taumata toru o nga herenga, me te aukati haere tapiri. E kī ana ngā rōpū kua tūpou tētahi wāhi nui o te umanga me tōna mekameka whakarato ki te raruraru. E karanga ana rātau ki ētahi atu tautoko pūtea me te miramira i ngā take kōhukihuki pēnei i ngā utu e pā ana ki te whakarite ki te whakatuwhera anō, te moumou kararehe me te hauora hinengaro o ngā kaitukumahi me ngā kaimahi. I Moray, kua whakapuakina e Sarah Holmes, nāna i whakahaere te Pencil Me In a Elgin mō te rima tau, tōna āwangawanga i te noho tonu i te taumata toru. "He whakapōrearea ina kite koe i ngā pūrākau wāteatanga hari katoa i tēnei rā", tana kī. "Kāore au i te whakahē (ki taua whakataunga), engari ko ngā rāhuitanga haere e tino pā ana ki te tāpoi i Moray. " Ki taku whakaaro me eke tātau i tēnei wiki. Tata ki te 30% anake o tā mātou hurihanga tuihono, ko te nuinga kei te penapena - ko te take he toa tāku he pai ki a au te tūhononga kiritaki". I kī a ia i "mārire mārire" kua hinga te pāpātanga whakapokenga o Moray i te mutunga o te wiki hei whakatika i tētahi nekehanga e tūtata ana ki te taumata tuarua. 'Mā te pupuri i a Glasgow i te taumata toru i haumaru ake ai mātou' He pai ki a Cousins Johanna rāua ko Sean ngā inu i waho i te taha tonga o Glasgow - ahakoa ko te nuinga o te tuawhenua e āhei ana ki te tono waipiro i rō whare. E whakaae ana te tokorua he uaua ake te whakarite hopu me ngā hoa me te whānau nā ngā rāhuitanga haere tonu i te taone - ā, i te nuinga o te wā e herea ana ki ngā huānga. Ka kī a Johanna: "Ina ātaahua te Papa o Kuini, ā, kei te rongo koe he āhuatanga i roto i te hapori i taua wā - engari he ruarua noa iho tēnā." "He tino kino te huarere nā reira i tūmanako ahau kia kaua e whakatio," ko te tāpiri mai a Sean. "But I feel like people have been friendlier - what I've noticed is everyone working in hospitality has been really professional in making us feel very safe but I actually think people in general are a bit kindling to each other." I te taha o ngā matekiritanga, ka kī a Hōne kua noho ko te noho me ngā rāhuitanga hei "pūnoa hou" ā, e whakapono ana ia ko te whakataunga kia mau tonu a Glasgow ki te taumata toru ko te mea tika. I tāpiri mai a Johanna: "He tino tere te urupare. Kei te whiwhi ahau i taku kano ārai mate i mua nā tērā, ā, e whakaatu ana he kawenga kei reira. Ka haumaru ake koe i te mōhio kua whakatauria e rātou." Kua whakaahuatia e te Minita Tuarua Tuatahi a John Swinney rāua ko Jason Leitch, te kaiwhakahaere rongoā ā-motu, te āhuatanga Covid he "ngohengohe". I kī atu a Tēnā Swinney ki a Te Reo Irirangi o Te Reo Irirangi Pai o Aotearoa e aroturukitia ana ia mana ā-rohe, ā, ka hoatu he rāhuitanga hei pupuri i ngā tīmatatanga, mēnā e hiahiatia ana. Engari i tāpiri mai a ia: "Ko te mea whakamutunga e hiahia ana mātou ki te mahi ko te whai wāhi mana ā-rohe e haere ana, e puta ana i ngā rāhuitanga pēnei i te yo-yo, koia te tino kino o ngā tauira katoa e taea ana mō te hapori pakihi me te hapori whānui ake." I tēnei wā ka whakatūpato a Prof Leitch i te Rātapu me noho tonu pea a Glasgow i raro i ngā rāhuitanga taumata toru mō te roa ake mēnā ko te pikinga - e aia ana e te taupēnga Īnia - kāore he tohu o te whakaiti. Ko te toharite hou e whitu rā mō ia 100,000 taupori i te taone nui ko te 94.5 kēhi, i runga ake i te taumata rua o ngā kēhi e 50. Kei te Rāwhiti hoki ngā whatu, kua kite i tōna pāpātanga kēhi e mau ana i a Moray. I puta mai i te Mane kei te pōhiritia ngā tāngata i Glasgow i waenganui i te 18 me te 39 tau kia whiwhi i ā rātou werohanga i mua i te mea i whakaritea i mua. I kī a NHS Greater Glasgow me Clyde ka ūkuia ngā wāhi taone o Battlefield, Gorbals me Hutchesontown, Govanhill, Aikenhead, Kingston West me Dumbreck, Maxwell Park, Mosspark, Pollokshields me Strathbungo. I kī hoki te poari hauora kei te whakaotia ngā mahere kia whakamua i ngā werohanga tuarua mō ngā tau neke atu i te 50. E pouri ana hoki ngā tangata o Gigha, i waenganui i aua moutere o Pākehā kāore anō kia neke ki raro ki te taumata kotahi. The island's heritage trust welcomed the further relaxation of Covid rules, but said islanders had worked for more than a year to suppress the virus and had tūmanako to move down to level one. I kī tētahi whakawhirinaki i waimarie te motu kāore he kēhi Covid, ā, ahakoa he āmaimai i te hokinga mai o ngā manuhiri i tērā raumati, he umanga i Gigha e tino whakawhirinaki ana ki te tāpoi. I kii tetahi kaikorero mo te kawanatanga o Scottish: "Ko nga moutere e ngawari ana te toro atu i te tuawhenua, tae atu ki Bute, Skye me Cumbrae me Gigha, ka noho tonu ki te taumata rua hei aukati i te tarenga o te huaketo. " I ngā wā katoa e kī ana mātou ka arotakea ngā mahere me te whakatere i te hiki i ngā rāhuitanga ina haumaru te mahi pērā."

title: Neke atu i te 4,000 ngā tīkiti i raro i Aiarangi ki te Raki i roto i te rima tau
summary: Kua heke te maha o ngā tīkiti rēhita i Aiarangi ki te Raki i te 27% i roto i ngā tau e rima kua taha.
text: Nā Declan HarveyBBC News NI Ināianei e 4,100 iti iho i te tau 2013. Ko te whakaurunga o te ariā atekōkiri uaua ake me ngā whakamātautau ā-ringa i te tau 2014 e whakapaetia ana mō te ārai i ngā atekōkiri hou kia kaua e uru ki te umanga. I kī tētahi kaikōrero mō te Tari Hanganga e hāngai ana ngā whakamātautau hōu ki te whakapai ake i te haumarutanga, engari kei waenganui anake i te 20%-25% ngā mokatere hipanga i whakaaetia. I te tau 2013, e 15,430 ngā raihana tīkiti i tukuna i Aiarangi ki te Raki. Kua heke haere tonu taua tau kia tae ki te 11,328 i te tau 2018. Ko ngā whika e kapi ana i ngā atekōkiri rēhita ā-ture, tae atu ki te hunga e taraiwa ana mō ngā kamupene tuihono pēnei i a Hekerangi. Ko te tikanga me nui haere te whawhai a te hunga haere ki te rōpū Kirihimete kia hoki ki te kāinga i te mutunga o te pō. 'Stranded' E hākinakina ana i ngā harakoa i Belfast i tēnei wiki ko ngā hoa ko Sarah, Katie, Abby, Cara me Ellen. He ākonga katoa rātau e hākinakina ana i te wehenga Kirihimete, engari he uaua ki te kimi i tētahi kāinga taxi "e whakangaro ana i te pō," te kī a Cara. "There's been times when it's been three o'clock in the morning and I've had to call my dad [to collect me]," Katie admits. "I rongo ahau i te kino, engari i tino rongo ahau i te pae." I tāpiri mai a Sarah: "Me hīkoi ahau i te 45 meneti i mua i taku tiki waka. " He moepuku tino moepuku." I kī a Ellen me tatari ia i te taone mo te toru haora i waenganui pō ki te kimi i tētahi tīkiti e wātea ana. Ka kī a Abby: "He kōtiro koe, kaua koe e mōrearea, engari e mahi ana koe," 'Tino uaua' a William McCausland e whakahaere ana i tētahi o ngā kamupene tīkiti nui rawa o Aiarangi ki te Raki, o Fonacab. I kī a ia kāore i te nui ngā atekōkiri taitamariki e hono ana ki te umanga hei whakakapi i ngā pakeke e haere ana. "He tino nui te take e kitea ana e tātau ko te whakaurunga anō o te ariā atekōkiri me te whakamātautau ā-ringa, i whakaurua i runga i ngā whakaaro pai, engari he tino uaua," tana kī. I kī a ia he maha ngā pātai e "kore e hāngai", e kī ana i tētahi e pātai ana mō te pānga o te hauora ki te whakapaunga hinu. "Mēnā he wera i waho, ka purua e koe te haurangi hei whakamarie i ō pāhihi. Ki taku whakaaro kāore e tika ana kia mōhio te atekōkiri ki te pānga ki ngā maero mō ia kārani mō tēnā momo mea. "Ka taea e au te whakaaro mō ngā mea maha e tika ana kia mōhio te atekōkiri, engari kāore tētahi o aua kaupapa e pā ana ki te whakamātautau." 'Inihua rāhui' i kī a Tēnā McCausland kei te raruraru te umanga ki te whakatutuki i te tono. "Kei te arokē i ngā wā katoa. Kei a mātau ngā tāngata whai mātauranga taumata tuatoru kua rahua i te whakamātautau e toru, e whā rānei ngā wā." He atekōkiri cab pango a Dill Firth mo nga tau maha i Belfast. I kī a ia he wāhanga noa iho te whakamātautau hou o te raruraru. "He rāhui te utu o te inihua," tana kī. "Ko te nuinga o ngā utu katoa he tino tiketike. Kua tino uaua ki te whai oranga." I kī atu tētahi kaikōrero mō te Tari Hanganga ki te HAU: "Kua whakapeka te maha o ngā atekōkiri tīkiti raihana mai i te wā i whakaputaina ai ngā whika i te 2013-14, i mua i te whakaurunga o te whakamātautau ariā waka. " Kua haere tonu tēnei whakapeka i roto i ngā tau e whā kua taha, ā, tērā pea he maha ngā take e āwhina ana ki tēnei whakapeka." I tāpiritia e rātau kua whakaurua anōtia te Whakamātautau Ariā Atekōkiri Tīkiti i Whiringahora 2014 mō ngā atekōkiri hōu katoa ki te umanga hei "āwhina ki te whakapai ake i ngā paerewa i roto i te umanga, te whakanui ake i te haumarutanga huarahi, te whakarato i ētahi atu whakaūnga ki ngā pāhihi me te whakaara i te rongo o te umanga hei kaiwhakarato ratonga kounga". I runga i te mokatere hipanga 20%, ka kī te tari e "arotake ana i ngā rauemi whakangungu katoa kia māmā ake ai te mārama me te āheitanga".

title: Kua whakaaetia te whakawāteatanga me te mahere whakakapinga o te whare pikitia Redcar
summary: Kua whakaaetia ngā mahere hei turaki i tētahi whare pikitia i te taha moana me te hanga i tētahi whare pikitia mata toru ki tōna wāhi.
text: I hangaia te Regent Cinema i Redcar i ngā tau kotahi mano e waru tekau mā rua, engari i katia i te tau 2018 ki tōna āhua whakaheke. The Tees Valley Combined Authority has pledged to fund the £9.6m replacement which Redcar and Cleveland Council said could be open by the spring of 2022. Tokowhā ngā tāngata i whakahē ki te whakawāteatanga a te Regent, e kī ana he "whakamaumahara ki ngā rā kororia o Redcar". I kī tētahi kaiwhakahē: "He tohu whenua te whare, ā, me tiakina." I kī atu a Claire Griffiths, te kaiwhakahaere ratonga whanaketanga o te kaunihera, ki ngā kaikaunihera ko te whakawāteatanga anake me te hanga anō he kōwhiringa whai hua, ā, he rangitahi ngā mahi tapi, ā, he nui te utu. Neil Baldwin, who represents the Coatham ward, said: "There is a perception from some that the current building is listed or historically significant, but this is not right. I kī a ia mō te 700 ngā tāngata i āwhina ki tētahi whakaaro tūmatanui, ā, e 72% i whakaaetia te hoahoa me ngā mahere, ka tāpiritia: "Kua whāngaia ngā tāngata kāore he mea i reira, ā, kei te hiahia noa rātou ki tētahi whare pikitia ki te taone." Ko te whare tīariari he wāhanga o te taiapa moana kia tāutatia ai ngā parenga taiepa moana rangitahi i te wā e tū ana te hanganga, e ai ki te Ratonga Pūrongo Kāwanatanga Paetata. Whāia a TE Rāwhiti ki te Raki &Cumbria i Twitter, Facebook me Instagram. Tukuna ō whakaaro pūrākau ki northeastandcumbria@bbc.co.uk.

title: I whakaūngia e Pirihi Haward hei rangatira Pirihimana hou o Lincolnshire
summary: Kua kōwhiria he kātipa matua hou mo te ope pirihimana o Lincolnshire.
text: Ka tangohia e Pirihi Haward te pou £160,000-a-tau ā muri ake i tēnei marama i muri i te whakaūnga a tētahi pirihimana me te pae hara i mua. I kī a Tēnā Haward i "tino hari" a ia ki te tīpako, ā, e tūmanako ana ki "ētahi whakamātautau mīharo". Ka tangohia e ia te mahi matua o te ope mai i a Bill Skelly, nāna i pānui tōna whakatānga i Hune. I kī a Tēnā Haward, nāna i noho tōna tamarikitanga i Zambia me Botswana, he tino hira ki a ia te "rerenga kētanga, te tōtika me te ōritetanga". He rongo anō mai i Te Aotearoa, i kī a ia e hiahia ana hoki ia ki te whakamahi i ngā rauemi tino pai hei whakaiti i te hara me te āwhina i te hunga e hiahia ana ki te "hīpae atu i te hara". "Ko te mea nui, ko ta mātau mahi e pā ana ki te āwhina i aua tāngata e tino matea ana," tana tāpiri mai. Ko Tēnā Haward, ko ia nei te rangatira tuarua o te Kāhui Mahi Motuhake o East Midlands, te kaitono pai o te Komihana Pirihimana me te Komihana Hara o Lincolnshire, a Marc Jones. I kī a Tēnā Jones i rekareka a ia ki te "kawe mai i tētahi āpiha matua o te wheako me te whāinga o Pirihi ki Te Aotearoa". Ka puta mai te wāhui i muri i te tukanga ki te whakatū i tētahi rangatira hou i tīmataria anō i Whiringahora i muri i ngā mea i whakaahuatia he "raruraru ā-mahi". Heoi anō, kāore i te mōhiotia mēnā i hoatu anō e te kaitono manako o Tēnā Jones, a Paul Gibson, te kī a te Ratonga Pūrongo Kāwanatanga ā Rohe. Whāia a BBC East Yorkshire me Lincolnshire i Facebook, Twitter, me Instagram. Tukuna ō whakaaro pūrākau ki yorkslincs.news@bbc.co.uk.

title: E whakatoi ana te huihuinga o Tākehi i ngā pōhēhētanga kupenga i te whakawā maha e tata ana ki Ankara
summary: Kua hīkoi a Tākehi i te tini o ngā pōhēhētanga kupenga i mua i tētahi huihuinga whakarihariha i te tīmatanga o to rātau whakawātanga tata ki Ankara.
text: Ko te nuinga o ngā pōhēhētanga e 221 he āpiha hōia tiketike, e whakapaea ana ki te ngana ki te pana i a Perehitini Recep Tayyip Erdogan i tērā o Hōngongoi. Ko te rangatira o te ope rererangi o Akin Ozturk te tuatahi i roto i te rārangi roa o ngā whakapae. Tērā ētahi karanga mo nga rerenga mate, ahakoa kaore e whakaaetia tēnā e te ture Tākehi. I roto i te whakahāweatanga, tokorua nga kaiako i hopukina e nga pirihimana e taraiwa ana i te hiakai. I pūrongotia e Nuriye Gulmen rāua ko Semih Ozakca ta rāua ake hopunga i te pō i roto i te tuhituhi. Kai waenganui rātau i ngā pononga tūmatanui neke atu i te 100,000 i panaia i muri i te kukitanga hōia o Hōngongoi 2016. "E ngana ana nga pirihimana peka tōrangapū ki te tomo ki te whare, kei te whati rātau i te tatau i tēnei wā," te tuhituhi a Ms Gulmen. Pānuitia ētahi atu kōrero mō tēnei pūrākau: E 75 rā te taraiwa hiakai o te tokorua. I kī to rātau rōia, ahakoa te poho pirihimana i te Rātapu, i kī taurangi rāua kia "kaua rawa e tuku". "E hiahia ana mātou kia hoki mai ā mātou mahi! Kāore anō mātou kia tuku, ā, e kore e tuku!" Ka tūtohu a Ms Gulmen. Ko te tikanga o te tahitanga a Perehitini Erdogan i nga rōpū kāwanatanga, ko te tikanga o nga pana maha i roto i te whakawāwā, i nga pirihimana, i nga whare wānanga me nga kura. Ko te whakawātanga maha i te whare herehere o Sincan e tata ana ki Ankara te mahinga kōtaha tiketike rawa o nga kaitā whakapae i tēnei wā. I whakawāteatia nga whakapae e te huihuinga i waho o te kōti i hangaia e te kōti, i hoahoatia mo nga whakamātautau maha. Ko te tau tuatahi o te pōhēhētanga - ko te kaitohutohu Mohimana o Fethullah Gulen - e noho tonu ana i Te Hononga o Amerika, ā, ka whakakāhore i te whakaurutanga. Kei roto i ngā whakapae ko te kōhuru i ngā tāngata e 250 i te wā o te whakawhitiwhiti i te 15 o Hōngongoi, i muri iho i te wā i whakaritea ai e Tēnā Erdogan he āhua ohorere. Tērā te haumarutanga kikī, me ngā kaipupuhi i horaina ki runga i te tuanui o te whare herehere i te Mane. Ko te weriweri me ngā karanga mō te kawenga - ka tuhituhi te Selin Girit o TE AO i Tūhāhā: I haukotia pototia e te whaea o tētahi tūkinotanga o te whakawā tuatahi nga takahanga. "Whakamatea nga kaikohuru o taku tama! Whakahokia mai taku tama!" Ka karanga a Saliha Arikan. Kaore i roa ka arahina atu a ia ki waho o te rūma kōti. I whakaaturia e ngā pikitia pouaka whakaata he tini ngā tāngata e tārere ana i ngā haki Tākehi i mua i te whare kōti i te taenga mai o ngā whakapae - ko ētahi e whakakakahu ana i ngā kākahu hei whakamaumahara i te karanga kia whakahokia mai te whiu matua. I pānuitia tētahi pānui: "Mō ngā māharahara me ngā hōia o te 15 o Hōngongoi, e hiahia ana mātau ki te whiu mate." He tokomaha nga kaitautoko a Perehitini Erdogan e kite ana i te whiu mate hei whiu tika mō te hunga i roto i te mahi kukitanga, ki a Fethullah Gulen, e whakapaea ana e Ankara he whakahaere i a ia. I whakakorea e Tāke te whiu mate hai wāhanga o tana puku ki te hono ki te Uniana o Ūropi. Engari kua auau tonu te tīwhiri a Perehitini Erdogan ka taea te whakamana anō ki te mahi ki nga kaitā kukitanga. I kī a ia ka hainatia e ia he ture hai whakauru anō i te wā e manakohia ana e te pāremata. I kī atu a Mehmet Yaman, tētahi o ngā kaimātakitaki riri, ki te kōrero rongokōrero o Kōrero: "Kei konei ahau ki te whakatau i te tapeke ki ngā kaiwhakataetae, kei konei ahau ki te whakaatu e tū ana ahau i te taha o taku iwi, taku haki me taku hāhi. " Kai konei ahau ki te whakaatu i nga kaiwhakataetae ka mau tonu tātau. E hiahia ana ahau kia whiua rātau ki te mate i roto i te whakawā tika, e hiahia ana ahau kia whiua nga kaikaiwaiū o tēnei whenua." I roto i tētahi pūrongo hōu, ka whakataua e Amnesty International te tahitanga o ngā rōpū kāwanatanga o Tākehi, e kī ana he tokomaha ngā tāngata kua panaia noatia, ā, ināianei kei te tūpono ki te uauatanga nui. I whakatūria e Tēnā Erdogan te Rōpū AK i te tau 2001, ā, i te Rātapu ka pōtitia ia hei kaiārahi AKP, e whakaū ana anō i tōna mana tōrangapū tākehi. Kaore he kaitono tauwhāinga i te rōpū AKP. I tērā marama, i whakaaetia e Tākihi ngā huringa kaupapa ture e hoatu ana i ngā mana tawhiti ki te perehitini, tae atu ki te mana ki te ārahi i tētahi rōpū tōrangapū.

title: Ka tuki te ngongo: E tono ana a TT i ngā kōrero i te wā e toa ana te atekōkiri i te rūnanga
summary: Kua toa tētahi atekōkiri Ngongo i waenganui i tētahi tuma tuki i tana kerēme mo te pana tika, e tīmata ana i ngā karanga mō ngā kōrero hei ārai i te mahi mahi i whakaritea.
text: E ono ngā tuki i karangatia e te uniana o te Moana me te Waka i muri i te pananga o Eamonn Lynch mo te whati i ngā ture haumaru. I kī te uniana e hiahia ana ki ngā kōrero wawe ki Transport for London (TfL). Engari i kī a TfL kāore e taea te whakahaere i ngā kōrero i te wā e haere tonu ana te tukanga rūnanga i roto i te kēhi o Tēnā Lynch, ā, ko tētahi atekōkiri tuarua e kī ana i te pana tika. 'Hoki ki te mahi' Tae atu ki te 1,500 ngā atekōkiri ka taea te haere atu i ngā wiki tata nei i runga i te pananga o Tēnā Lynch rāua ko Arwyn Thomas. E whakaritea ana kia mutu ngā hīkoi i waenganui i te iwa me te 24 hāora mai i te 16 - 20 Me, ā, mai i te 13 - 17 o Hune. I kī te TT i ākiritia tikatia te tokorua nā a rāua mahi uniana. I te pōhiritanga i te hua o te rūnanga mahi a Tēnā Lynch, ka kī a Bob Crow o te TT e karanga ana rātau ki tētahi "hui wawe ki a LU". "Mā te whakarara mārama ki te kēhi o Arywn Thomas, ināianei he hiahia kōhukihuki kia tūtaki a London Underground ki te TT ki te tautuhi i tētahi mahere mō te hokinga ki te mahi e kore ai e tūpou i a Rāwāhi ki roto i ngā paraka mahi taraiwa e rua e mōhio ana te katoa ka nui te raruraru," tana kī. "Kua kitea e te rūnanga whakawā te manakohanga o te RMT, kua oti te tika, ā, ināianei me mātua ... whakaotia ngā whakaritenga e āhei ai mātou ki te neke whakamua i runga i te tere e taea ana." 'Whanonga kāore e whakaaetia' I kī a Transport for London ka ako i te hua o te whakawā o te rūnanga mahi me te whakaaro i ōna hipanga panuku. I kī tētahi kōrero: "Ahakoa kua kitea e te rūnanga whakawā he pana tika, i kitea hoki... I takahia e Tēnā Lynch tētahi ture haumaru tūturu, nui hoki, ā, he wāhi hara, he whakapae rānei mō ana mahi." E kī ana kāore anō kia whakamutua te tukanga rūnanga i roto i ngā take e rua, ā, "kāore rawa he take mō te TT kia rapu tonu ki te whakararuraru i a Rāwāhi mā ngā tuki". E kī ana me waea wawe te tuma o te tuhi. I kī a TfL i ākiritia a Tēnā Tōma mō te whanonga tūkino ki ngā hoa mahi. I tēnei wā ka kī te TUWHA e whakaaro ana ki te pōti i ngā atekōkiri o te Raina Hīupiri mō te mahi mahi, he poto noa iho te tuki, i runga i ngā huringa ki ngā hātepe haumaru. I kī a TfL: "I mahia e LU te whakaaro katoa ki ngā whakakotahitanga mahi katoa, ā, ka hoatu he kōrero ki ngā atekōkiri i mua i te whakatinanatanga o te huringa i tērā wiki."

title: Ka kati te teihana hiko karihi o Sizewell B mo te whakahinuhinu
summary: He maha nga wiki e whakaweto ana tētahi teihana hiko karihi i te takutai o Te Takutai mo te whakahinuhinu me te tiakitanga.
text: Kei te whakaweto a Sizewell B i te Paraire mō te rima, e ono wiki rānei hei wāhanga o tētahi "whakaweto hinu" i whakaritea ia 18 marama. E 1,000 anō ngā kaimahi e kawea ana ki te pae ki te mahi i te wā e whakaweto ana te tipu. I whakatuwheratia a Sizewell B, e whakahaeretia ana e EDF Energy, i te tau 1995, ā, ka nui te hiko mō ngā kāinga neke atu i te rua miriona. I kī te kaiwhakahaere o te teihana, a Jim Crawford: "Ka whakaweto te rea, kātahi ka tangohia e mātau te hinu katoa. " Ka whakakapia e mātau tētahi nui o te hinu ki te hinu hou kia nui ai te pūngao kia haere tonu. "Nā te mea me mahi mātou i te whakahinuhinu i ia marama ruarua, ka whai wāhi mātou ki te pupuri me te whakapai ake i te tipu kia puta ai ētahi mahi kaupapa." I kī a ia e 14,000 ngā tūmahi ka mahia i te wā o te whakaweto. Kua mauria mai ngā kaimahi mai i Wīwī me Te Hononga o Amerika, engari ko te nuinga o ngā mahi ka mahia e ngā kaikirimana paetata. Ko te nuinga o te wā e 500 ngā kaimahi me ngā kaikirimana e 250 te mahi a te tipu. Kei te haere tonu ngā kōrero mēnā ka puta he Sizewell C. Kāore anō kia tae te EDF Energy me te kāwanatanga ki te whakaaetanga me pēhea te pūtea i te whakatupuranga hou o ngā teihana hiko karihi.

title: Rāwhia: Mai i te Uniana o Rōpū ki te Uniana o Ūropi
summary: He kakara pata mahana, whai kiko hoki e rere mai ana i tētahi wheketere e noho ana i te tapa o tētahi pānga whare i te taha o Riga.
text: Nā te kaipānui a Danielle CoddBusiness, BBC News Inside, ko ngā kaimahi i roto i ō rātou kākahu kōwhai me te kākāriki e pokepoke ana i te paraoa pokepoke, ka whakahaere i ngā raina whakanao me te takai pihikete ki roto i ngā pouaka hei hoko. I whakatūria a Baltas Naktis i te tau 1995 e Elena rāua ko Andrey Magomedov. I te tau kotahi mano, i I te tīmatanga mai i ngā pakiaka māhaki, tokowhā noa iho ngā kaimahi o te umanga reka. Heoi anō, kua whakawhānuitia ināianei ki te whakamahi i ngā tāngata neke atu i te 80, e tunu ana i ngā pihikete 10,000 me ngā parāoa i ia rā. "He whenua tino tamariki a Rāwhia, ā, kei te tipu noa iho te tikanga o te umanga," te kī a ta rāua tamāhine ko Ksenija Magomedova, te kaiwhakahaere hoko o te kamupene. "Ko tā mātou umanga tētahi o ngā momo nā te mea kāore i te nui rawa ngā umanga whānau i Rāwhia," tana tāpiri mai. "He tokomaha ngā tāngata kua mahue i te whenua, ā, kua hokona ngā umanga nā te mea he tino pōturi te āhua o te mahi i roto i ngā tau e 20 kua taha." 'He nui ake ngā huarahi' Engari e whakapono ana te whānau pūkenga o Magomedov kua piki ake ngā taonga o Rāwhia mai i tōna urunga ki te Uniana o Ūropi i te 10 tau ki mua. "He nui ake ā mātou wāhi kaweake, kua nui ake tā mātou whakataetae, he nui ake ngā hua e mahia ana e mātou i mua," e kī ana a Ksenija. Kua piki ake te huinga 80% mai i te 10 tau ki mua, engari ehara i te mea ko ngā āhuatanga pūtea anake o te noho i roto i tētahi kōwae ohaoha ki te uru e uara ana a Baltas Naktis. "Ko te tikanga kei te haumaru ake mātou ki te mahi tahi me ngā hoa EU. E mōhio ana mātou ki ngā kamupene, ka taea e mātou te aroturuki me te aroturuki i a rātou i ngā wā katoa. Kei te haumaru ake mātou ki te tuku i a mātau taonga ki reira me te whiwhi utu," te kī a Ksenija. Ahakoa i pūruatia e te iwi pakihi te uru ki te EU, ko te nuinga o te tuatoru o te iwi whānui i pōti i roto i te taupānga ā-motu i te tau 2003. Ko tētahi o rātau ko te kaiahuwhenua ko Janis Dzenis. Kotahi rau kiromita ki te tonga-rāwhiti o te pūmatua o Riga, i te taiwhenua o Rāwhia, ka whakaaturia mai e ia ki a au te whenua i riro i a ia i muri i te hinganga o te tōpūtanga. I whakahokia te pāmu ki a ia i muri i tana whakamahinga i ngā tuhinga hei whakamatau nā tōna whānau te whenua i mua i te hopukina e te Kotahitanga o Rōpūria hei wāhanga o te kaupapa here rangatira noa. Na te wheako o tōna whenua he wāhanga o te Uniana o Rōpū, e pōhēhē ana a Janis mo te mema o Rāwhia o tētahi atu uniana, te EU. "E whakapono ana ahau he hira ake te wāteatanga me te rangatiratanga katoa i te uru ki te Uniana o Ūropi," tana kī. "[Mēnā he takitahi koe] ko koe te tangata e whakatau ana i ngā mea katoa e tūpono ana i te whenua - ohaoha, tōrangapū, whakanao me te ahuwhenua." Kotahi tekau tau, ā, ka ātete tonu a Janis ki ngā mematanga Rāwhia, ahakoa te £300,000 kua whiwhi ia i roto i ngā rawa EU i roto i ngā tau hei āwhina ki te hoko tarakihana hou, mīhini me ngā silo rokiroki nui e toru. "He wāhanga o te Uniana o Ūropi, me whakaae tātau ki te kaupapa ahuwhenua EU. " Kua āta tātaritia e au ēnei ture, ā, kua mōhio ahau ehara i te rite ki ngā mea i a mātau i te wā o to mātau rangatiratanga tuatahi i te tau kotahi mano e waru tekau mā rua. Kātahi mātau ka āta whakawhanake i te kaupapa ahuwhenua o Rāwhia, a, tērā ētahi hua tūturu. "I tēnei wā kei te ngaro mātau nā te kaupapa ahuwhenua o te Uniana o Ūropi, ā, kei te tino ngaro mātau." Mai i te urunga ki te Uniana o Ūropi, he painga pūtea anō te 'iwi parihi' Mai i te urunga ki te Uniana o Ūropi. Hei tauira, kua whiwhi a Rāwhia i te £3.5bn i roto i ngā rawa, ā, kua tata te toru te rahi o te āhua o te ao. Ko te hua, ka hinga te hua nui o te kāinga, ka puta mai he hōhonutanga hōhonu, ā, ka nui haere te manakohanga o te hekenga mō ngā mano mano o Rāwhia i whai painga i tētahi o ngā whāinga mātāmua o te EU - te wāteatanga o te nekeneke i waenganui i ngā āhuatanga mema. Nā reira mō te iwi whānui e whakaparo ana i te tohu 2 miriona - heke iho i te tata ki te 2,7 miriona i te hauwhā rau tau ki mua - kua hurihia e te mema EU ngā Rāwhia? Te āhua nei ko tētahi kaipānui Rāwhia rongonui, nāna i whakaahua i tētahi wā ko Rāwhia ko "te iwi pari" nā te mea he maha ngā wā i puta mai, i ngaro atu i te mahere, te āhua nei ko te tangata tino pai ki te pātai. "Ki taku whakaaro me titiro koe ki ngā whakatupuranga," te kī a Pauls Raudseps. "Ko te whakatupuranga pakeke ake i tipu ake i te Uniana o Rōpū, he iti noa iho te tawhiti i [te EU] nā te mea kāore ō rātou wheako whaiaro hāngai ki tērā, ko ō rātou pūmahara tamarikitanga kei ngā wā o Rōpūria, "Engari ki te titiro koe ki aku tamariki, ko Uropi te kāinga mō rātou - e ako ana rātou i reira, e noho ana ō rātou hoa i reira, ka haere tonu rātou ki reira, ā, ka tata atu rātou ki tērā i tā rātou mahi ki tētahi mea, ahakoa he rau ruarua maero ki te rāwhiti o konei."

title: Ka rahua te wehenga o te hāhi i runga i te tānetanga - Welby
summary: Ko te wehenga i roto i te Whakakotahitanga o te Pākehā i runga i te tānetanga "ehara i te aituā, engari he rahunga", te kī a te Pīhopa Pīhopa o Canterbury.
text: I a ia e kōrero ana i mua i tētahi hui a ngā kaiārahi Pākehā o te ao, ka kī a Pirihitini Welby e hiahia ana ia ki te "whakatairite", engari ko te tikanga o tēnā "kimi huarahi kia pai ai te whakahē". Ko ngā tirohanga mai i ngā Hāhi i te US me ētahi atu wāhi e whakaae ana ki ngā minita tāne ki te hunga e whakahē ana i ngā mahi tāne. Tērā te mataku ki tētahi wehewehenga pūmau i roto i te Whakakotahitanga kaha e 80m. Neke atu i te 160 ngā whenua e kapi ana i te Whakakotahitanga, he tokomaha o rātou e titiro ana ki a Pīhopa Welby mō te ārahitanga. E whakaahua ana te paetukutuku Anglican Communion i a ia he "tuatahi i waenganui i ngā ōrite". Mai i te wā i whakatapua ai e te Hāhi Pihopatanga ohaoha i Amerika a Canon Gene Robinson - he tangata i whakarerea i roto i tētahi pātahitanga tāne - hei pīhopa o New Hampshire i Whiringa 2003, kua kaha ake te sniping i roto i te Whakakotahitanga. 'Whakahē hōhonu' I ngā whenua maha o Āwherika me ētahi atu wāhi, ka noho hara tonu te tānetanga hohe. He tokomaha nga tohutohu i roto i te Hāhi e kī ana kei te kaha hoki rātau ki te whakaae ki te tānetanga i runga i ngā take Paipera, ā, e hiahia ana rātau ki te whakapae me te ripeneta mai i nga rangatira mo te whakatū i ngā tohunga tāne me ngā pīhopa. He iti noa iho te wāhi ngātahi i waenganui i ngā wehenga e rua i waenganui i ngā Primates o ngā hāhi Anglican, ā, he mataku tērā pea ka puta atu ētahi o ngā kaiārahi o Awherika i te hui. I kī atu a Pīhopa Welby ki te hōtaka o Te Reo Irirangi 4 o Tēnei Rā: "E kore te wehewehenga e aituā... He nui ake te Atua i o tatou rahunga, engari he rahunga. "Ehara i te mea pai mēnā kāore e taea e te Hāhi te whakatakoto tauira ki te ao e whakaatu ana me pēhea tātau e aroha ai tētahi ki tētahi, me te whakahē hōhonu, nā te mea kua huihuia tātau e Ihu Karaiti, ehara i tā tātou ake kōwhiringa." Ka haere tonu a ia: "E tino hiahia ana ahau ki te whakatairite, engari ehara te whakatairitenga i te whakaaetanga i ngā wā katoa - ko te mea, he uaua rawa. Ko te tikanga o te kimi huarahi kia pai ai te whakahē, ā, koia tā mātou mahi i tēnei wiki. "Kāore he mea e taea e au mēnā ka whakatau te tangata e hiahia ana rātau ki te wehe i te rūma. E kore e wehe i te whakakotahitanga." I tāpiri mai a ia: "He whānau te Hāhi, ā, ka noho tonu koe hei whānau ahakoa ka haere koe i ō ara motuhake." Tātaritanga nā Caroline Wyatt, te korero kōrero o ngā take whakapono o TE AO Nā ngā hui a ngā Primates o mua, kua pai te mahi a te Pīhopa Pīhopa o Canterbury ki te whakapati i te katoa o te 38 kia tūtaki huri noa i te tēpu kotahi, mā te whakamahi i te nuinga o te pūmatua whaiaro i hangaia e ia i a ia haerenga ki ia kawanatanga Pākehā huri noa i te ao. Ahakoa he aha te tūponotanga, kua mahia e ia ngā mea katoa e taea e ia kia mahi ai te pātahitanga, ahakoa kua nui haere te mārama kua kore te whakaritenga ā-iwi o nāianei e tika mō tētahi take taketake. Ko ngā kawanatanga ohaoha ake e tuwhera ana ki te huri i te akoranga a te Hāhi mō te mārena kia taea ai te whakakotahitanga o te tangata kotahi, ko Parīhi, Kānata, Aotearoa, Pākehā, Īnia ki te Tonga, Awherika ki te Tonga, te US me Weera. Heoi anō, ko Ingarangi tētahi o ngā whenua kei te ngākau kē taua wehenga kawa i runga i te āhua o te kōrero mamae me te taupatupatu. Nā te mārena tangata kotahi ināianei he wāhanga o te ture tūmatanui i Ingarangi, ko te tohe a te Hāhi kia kaua e noho hei wāhanga o te ture Canon, ka nui haere te whakataetae a ētahi o ōna ake minita me ngā mema o tōna whakaminenga. Pānuitia ētahi atu mea mō te 'wehewehenga kawa' o te Hāhi Pākehā i tāpiritia e tētahi kōrero mō te pīhopa nui te hui hei wā mō ngā Hāhi ā iwi ki te whakatau i tā rātou whakatata ki te Hui Lambeth panuku - te huihuinga kotahi i roto i te tekau tau o ngā pīhopa Pākehā o te ao. E tūmanakohia ana hoki kia whakaurua e te rārangi take o te hui ngā take o te tutu ā-whakapono, te parenga o ngā tamariki me ngā pakeke mōrearea, me te taiao. Ka kōrerorerotia hoki tētahi reta i tukuna inā noa nei e neke atu i te 100 ngā Pākehā matua ki ngā Pīhopa o Canterbury me York e whakahau ana i a rātau kia tino mōhio ka ripeneta te Hāhi mō te "whakahāwea" ki ngā Karaitiana moe wahine me ngā Karaitiana tāne. I karangatia e te Hāhi kia mōhio kua whakamahia ētahi mema huri noa i te ao hei "tangata whenua tuarua".

title: Kua whakaritea he huarahi e ono ara puta noa i te porowhita o Bristol
summary: Kei te whakaritea e ngā kaikaunihera tētahi huarahi e ono ara mā tētahi porowhita "pounamu" i te Huarahi Mowhiti o Bristol.
text: I kī ngā rangatira waka ka utu te kaupapa mō te komititanga o Wraxall Road i te £6.9m, ā, kua whakaaetia te £1.5m hei whakawhanake i te kaupapa. I kī te Mana Paheko o Ingarangi (Weca), māna e utu te kaupapa, e tūmanako ana ka tapahia e te kaupapa te paheketanga me ngā aituā. Ināianei kei te tonoa ngā kainoho me ngā atekōkiri mō ō rātou whakaaro mō ngā mahere. Ka whakaurua hoki ngā rama waka ki te komititanga i Kingswood, koia anake te komititanga i runga i te huarahi mowhiti kāore he rama. I kī te Ratonga Pūrongo Kāwanatanga Paetata ka whakawhānuitia ngā huarahi whakatata kia toru ngā ara ki ngā ahunga e rua mō ngā waka i runga i te huarahi mowhiti e haere hāngai ana ki mua. 'Significant bottleneck' South Gloucestershire Council's consultation document says: "Drivers on each approach will be given priority to enter the roundabout, with the timing of traffic signal phases responding to changes in the use of the junction throughout the day." I kī atu te kaiārahi kaunihera o Toby Savage ki ngā mema o te komiti o Weca: "He pounamu nui te porowhita o te Huarahi A4174 Wraxall, ā, he pūtake amuamu mō ngā tau maha." The council's consultation paper adds: "The roundabout currently experiences congestion during the busiest hours on weekdays, with queuing on the ring road as well as Tower Lane and Wraxall Road approaches to the roundabout. Kei roto i tēnei ko ngā ratonga pahi paetata." I kī tētahi pūrongo ki te komiti Weca o tērā wiki, i runga ake i te utu e £200,000 o te akoranga whaimana me te £1.5m kua whakaaetia ināianei hei whakaputa i tētahi kēhi pakihi katoa, ka hiahiatia e te whakatinana i te kaupapa tētahi atu £5.2m.

title: Kīngi Ashya: Ko ngā kaimahi o te hōhipera o Southampton 'whiwhi tūkinotanga'
summary: Kua waipuketia ngā kaimahi i te hōhipera o UK i reira i whakamahia ai te tūroro puku roro o Ashya King ki ngā waea me ngā īmēra tūkino, kua whakakitea.
text: I tangohia te pakeke e rima tau i te Hōhipera Whānui o Southampton e ōna mātua, ki ngā tohutohu rongoā, ka tīmata i tētahi kimi ao whānui. I hopukina ōna mātua i Paniora, e akiaki ana i te tangi tūmatanui. I roto i tana rangitaki, i kī te rangatira nui o te whakawhirinaki hōhipera, a Fiona Dalton, kua ūkuia ngā kaimahi oncology tamariki. Ka kī a ia: "I te kī tonu o ā rātou pouakaroto īmēra i te tūkinotanga whaiaro mai i ngā tauhou, ā, he kaipūrongo e noho ana i runga i tō rātou tatau o mua, kei te māharahara tonu rātou me pēhea e taea ai e mātou te mahi i te mea tino pai mō tētahi tama iti i Paniora... "I āwangawanga ā mātou papa whakawhiti me ngā ratonga tautoko tūroro i ngā waea mai i ngā mema riri o te iwi whānui... ā, he tokomaha ētahi atu tāngata e mahi ana i konei e pātaitia ana e ngā tūroro, e te iwi whānui rānei mō tēnei āhuatanga, i ētahi wā i runga i te huarahi tino whakatuki." I te 28 o Aotearoa, i muri i te whakahē ki ngā tākuta mō tōna manaakitanga, ka whakaohotia e ngā mātua 'kaikaha' a Brett rāua ko Naghemeh Kingi he kimi pirihimana i to rāua tangohanga i a Ashya i te hōhipera i te 28 o Aotearoa. I hiahia rātau kia whiwhi ia i te haumanu kurupae proton, kāore i te wātea ki a rātau i runga i te NHS. I hopukina te tokorua i Paniora, a, he maha nga rā i wehe atu ai i ta rāua tama i mua i te unutanga a te Ratonga Ture Karauna i te whakamana hopu Pākehā, a, ka tukua rāua. I tae atu a Ashya ki te Pokapū Hauora Proton i Prague i te Mane ma te waka rererangi tūmataiti mai i Paniora. I muri i te taenga mai o te whānau ki Prague, ka kī a Tēnā Kingi: "Kua tapaina mātau he momo mea katoa, mai i ngā kaikahaki ki ngā kaingākau whakapono, kua whai pirihimana i a mātau, kua hopukina mātau, e rua rā i roto i te whare herehere Pāniora, he maha rawa ngā kēhi kōti. " Ko taku tama te mea katoa ki a mātou, nā reira kāore aku amuamu. E mōhio ana koe, ki te whakataurite, he kore noa iho ngā mea i puta mai i a mātou. "Kei konei noa iho mātou, kua oti i a mātou, me te mea kua puta mātou i te āwhā, ā, kua puta mai mātou i tērā pito."

title: E anga ana a Apple, Samsung me Te Kaihoko ki ngā kerēme mahi tamariki
summary: Kua whakapaea e te rōpū motika tangata a Amnesty a Apple, Samsung me Hona, i waenganui i ētahi atu, i te kore e mahi i ngā taki taketake kia kore ai ngā kohuke e whakamahia ana i roto i ā rātou hua e maina e ngā tamariki.
text: Nā Jane WakefieldTechnology kaipānui I roto i tētahi pūrongo ki te kari kobalt i te Whenua Manapori o Kongo, i kitea he tamariki e whitu tau e mahi ana i roto i ngā āhuatanga mōrearea. He wae tino nui te kobalt o ngā pāteri lithium-ion. I kī nga kamupene he kaupapa here manawanui kore ta rātau ki te mahi tamariki. Ko te DRC e whakaputa ana i te 50% neke atu rānei o te kobalt o te ao. E anga ana ngā kaikari kari e mahi ana i taua rohe ki ngā raruraru hauora mo te wā roa me te mōrea o ngā aituā mate, e ai ki te Whakawāteatanga. I kīia e 80 neke atu rānei ngā kaikari kari i mate i raro i te tonga o DRC i waenganui o Mahuru 2014 me Hakihea 2015. I kohia hoki e ia nga whakaaturanga a nga tamariki e mahi ana i roto i nga pahū. I tīmata a Paora, he pani 14 tau, ki te kari kari i a ia e 12 tau, a, ka kī atu ki ngā kairangahau: "Ka pau i a au te 24 haora i roto i nga kauhanga. I tae atu ahau i te ata, ka haere ahau i te ata e whai ake nei ... I anga ahau ki te whakangāwari i a au i roto i nga kauhanga ... I whakaaro taku whaea whāngai ki te tuku i ahau ki te kura, engari i whakahē taku pāpā whāngai, nāna ahau i pokanoa mā te mahi i roto i te maina." E whakaaro ana a HĒPA e tata ana ki te 40,000 ngā tamariki e mahi ana i ngā pahū puta noa i te tonga o DRC. Hei urupare ki te pūrongo, ka kī a Āporoiti: "E kore rawa e whakaaetia te mahi pakeke i roto i tā mātou mekameka putanga, ā, e whakahīhī ana mātou ki te ārahi i te umanga ki ngā parenga hou." E kī ana e whakahaere ana i ngā arotaupū uaua i runga i tōna mekameka putanga, ā, ko ngā kaiwhakarato i kitea e tono ana i ngā kaimahi pakeke e whakahaua ana: I runga i te kobalt i tāpiritia ai: "Kei te arotake mātou i ngā rauemi rerekē i tēnei wā, tae atu ki te kobalt, kia kitea ai ngā mōrea mahi me ngā mōrea taiao, tae atu ki ngā wāhi mō Āporo ki te kawe mai i te huringa tōtika, tauine, pūmau hoki." I kī a Samsung he "kaupapahere manawanui kore" tāna ki te mahi tamariki, ā, i whakahaeretia hoki e ia ngā arotaupū auau, uaua hoki o tana mekameka putanga. "Ki te kitea he tūkinotanga o te mahi tamariki, ka whakamutua wawetia ngā kirimana me ngā kaiwhakarato e whakamahi ana i te mahi tamariki," tana kī. I kōrero a Hona: "Kei te mahi tahi mātou me ngā kaiwhakarato ki te whakatau i ngā take e pā ana ki ngā mana tangata me ngā here mahi i ngā pae whakanao, tae atu ki te tiki kohuke me ētahi atu rawa taketake." He kupu taurangi? I whakatakina e te pūrongo Amnesty, i rangahau tahitia me African Resources Watch (Afrewatch), he pēhea te hoko kobalt mai i ngā wāhi e nui ana te mahi tamariki, e hokona ana ki te umanga Kongo Dongfang Mining (CDM), he anake katoa o te rangatira kohuke Hainamana o Zhejiang Huayou Cobalt Ltd. I whakapā atu a Amnesty ki ngā tauwāhi maha e 16 i whakarārangitia hei kiritaki o ngā kaiwhakanao pūhiko,  ko wai hoki e pūtake ana i ngā kohuke mai i Huayou Cobalt. I whakaae tētahi kamupene ki te tūhononga, ā, kāore i taea e ētahi atu tokowhā te kōrero tūturu i te pūtake o te kobalt i whakamahia e rātau. E rima i whakakāhore i te pūtake o te kohuke mai i te umanga, ahakoa kua whakarārangitia hei kiritaki i roto i ngā tuhinga kamupene, ā, tokorua ētahi atu i kī kāore rātau i pūtake i te kobalt mai i DRC. E ono nga kamupene i kī e uiui ana rātau i nga kerēme. "He kupu taurangi nui tēnei o te wā mamati ka taea e ētahi o ngā kamupene tino rangatira o te ao, te nuinga o ngā kamupene auaha te mākete i ngā pūrere tino mātauranga me te kore e hiahiatia kia whakaatu i te wāhi e pūtake ai rātou i ngā rauemi mata mō ā rātou mōtete," te kī a te kaiwhakahaere nui o Afrewatch (Africa Resources Watch) Emmanuel Umpula. "Ka noho ngaro tonu ngā tūkinotanga i roto i ngā pahū i te kitenga, i te hinengaro hoki nā te mea i te mākete huri noa o tēnei rā, kāore ngā kiritaki i te mōhio ki ngā here i tōku, wheketere me te raina whakaminenga. I kitea e mātou kei te hoko kobalt ngā kaihokohoko me te kore pātai mō te pēhea me te wāhi i maina ai." I kī a Mark Dummett, kairangahau pakihi me ngā motika tangata i Amnesty ko te kari kari "tētahi o ngā momo mahi tamariki kino rawa". "Ko ngā whakaaturanga toa ātaahua me te mākete o ngā hangarau toi, he tino taumira ki ngā tamariki e mau ana i ngā pēke toka me ngā kaikari i roto i ngā poka whāiti i hangaia e te tangata e mōrearea ana ki te tūkino pūkahukahu pūmau," tana kī. "E hia miriona ngā tāngata e ngahau ana ki ngā painga o ngā hangarau hou, engari āhua kore nei e pātai me pēhea te hanga. Kua roa te wā ka tangohia e nga toa nunui ētahi kawenga mo te kari i nga rawa mata e mahi ana i a rātau hua whai hua. "Kāore e taea e ngā kamupene te tapeke o ōna hua huri noa i te $125bn (£86.7bn) te kī tika kāore e taea e rātou te tirotiro i te wāhi i puta mai ai ngā kohuke matua i roto i ā rātou whakanaotanga," tana kī. Kia mōhiotia, ko te nuinga o ngā tamariki e mahi ana i te mahi kari kari i DRC kāore e tomo ki ngā pahū o raro, engari ka mahia ngā mahi maha i runga i te mata, tae atu ki te hamu i te toa me te kōmaka i ngā kohuke kua maina ki raro.

title: He waimarie te mawhiti mō Ed Sheeran i muri i te ngaronga o te waea i Brits
summary: He waimarie te mawhiti o Ed Sheeran i ngā Tohu Brit i muri i te ngaronga o te waea i roto i tana pukaemi hou kāore anō kia whakaputaina.
text: Nā Natalie JamiesonNewsbeat kaipānui whakangahau i te Brits Kōrero i mua tonu i te tīmatanga o te hui, ka whakaae a Ed Sheeran i a ia e "whakamataku ana" i muri i tana ngaro i tana pūkoro. I whakaaturia hoki e te kaiwaiata tau 22 tau ehara i te wā tuatahi i ngaro ai ngā rauemi hou. "I ngaro i a au te MP3 e kā ana ngā mea katoa i Ibiza," tana whāki. "Engari kāore anō kia puta mai te pukaemi nā reira he pai tēnā." I te mutunga ka kitea te waea ngaro i roto i te motokā i whakataka ai a Ed Sheeran i te kāpeti whero o Ingarangi i te papa tākaro O2 o Rāwāhi. Ka hoatu e te atekōkiri ki a Ed Sheeran māhorahora, tino harikoa hoki. I kī te kaiwaiata he rite tonu tana hopu i ngā rauemi hōu ki tana pūkoro. I mua i te wehi i te kino, kua tukua te kaiwaiata/kaitito waiata ki te mea kua mutu pea te māturu tuihono o ngā riu kāore anō kia whakaputaina, e whakaae ana "nāku te hē i ngaro". Whāia @BBCNewsbeat i Twitter

title: I whakaaturia te āputa utu ira tangata 9% o TE AO
summary: Ko ngā tāngata e mahi ana mō te BBC e whiwhi ana i te toharite o te 9.3% neke atu i ngā wāhine, kua kitea he pūrongo ki te utu kaimahi o te kaporeihana.
text: Ko te whika e kapi ana i ngā kaimahi katoa, i runga, i waho rānei o te hau, ā, kua whakahekea ki te mea he tokomaha ake ngā tāngata i roto i ngā mahi pakeke. E whakataurite ana ki te wawaenga UK o te 18% me te tumuaki o TE AO o Te Aotearoa, i kī a Tony Hall e whakaatu ana i te AO "i tētahi wāhi pai ake i te maha o ngā whakahaere". E whai ana i tētahi haupae mo nga utu whetū, i whakaaturia ai he tāne te nuinga o nga kaiwhakaatu tino whiwhinga. Kua oati a Lord Hall ki te kati i te āputa utu i te tau 2020, ā, i kī ko te kaporeihana hei "tauira o ngā mea e taea ana ina tae mai ki te utu, te tōtika, te ira tangata me te whakaaturanga". Kua whakaputaina te pūrongo utu ira tangata i te taha o tētahi arotaupū utu ōrite, kua whakahaeretia e te umanga tohutohu o Te Kōti Pīra o Tā Patrick Iraia. I kī a Tā Patrick ko te take i muri i te whika 9.3% ko "tētahi whakaaturanga i raro i ngā wāhine i roto i ngā mahi pakeke ake". E kī ana te pūrongo e 59% o ngā kaimahi i ngā kōeke e whā iti rawa he wāhine, ā, ko te 59% o ērā i roto i ngā kōeke e rua o runga, i waenganui hoki i ngā kaiwhakahaere matua he tāne. 'Ngā hinganga' i roto i ngā hātepe Engari i kī a Tā Patrick kāore he whakaaturanga o te "whakahāweatanga pūhohe ki ngā wāhine" i te HAU. Heoi anō, kāore e taea e te arotaupū "te whakatau kāore he whakahāweatanga e pā ana ki ngā rōpū, ki ngā tangata rānei", engari, ka tāpiritia e ia. He maha hoki ngā "hinganga" i roto i ngā hātepe e hiahia ana kia whakapai ake, i kitea e te arotaupū. Engari i tāpiri mai a Tā Patrick: "Ka pā ēnei hinganga puta noa i te poari, e pā ana ki ngā tāne me ngā wāhine." 'He raruraru o te utu taurite' I kī a Gerry Morrissey, te upoko o Bectu, he uniana mahi e tohu ana i ētahi o ngā kaimahi o te BBC: "Me kaua te BBC e okioki i runga i ōna tāra e pā ana ki te āputa utu ira tangata katoa. " Ka kitea e te pūrongo he iti iho te āputa i te wawaenga ā-motu, engari kaua e whakapouri i te mea he take te ōritetanga mō ētahi kaimahi i ia rā, i ia rā." I kī a Mīharo Stanistreet, te hēkeretari ahuwhānui o te National Union of Journalists, tērā "he raruraru o te utu taurite". I kī a ia e mōhio ana a ia ki "te nui o ngā kēhi" e kī ana ngā wāhine kei te iti iho te utu mō te mahi ōrite, ōrite rānei. Ka oti tētahi arotakenga motuhake ki ngā whakaritenga a te AO me ngā kaiwhakaatu ā-hau, ngā kaiwhakatika me ngā korero kōrero i te mutunga o te tau. I karangatia te 'huringa tūturu' i te wā i whakaputaina ai ngā utu whetū i a Hōngongoi, ka whakaaturia mai ko te 35% o te hunga e whiwhi ana i te £150,000 i te tau he wāhine. Ko Pirihi Evans te tihi o te rārangi i runga i te £2.2m, whai muri i ētahi atu tāngata tokoono. Ko Claudia Winkleman o Strictly Come Dancing te kaiwhakaatu wahine tino utu - tuawaru katoa - e whiwhi ana i waenganui i te £450,000 me te £500,000. I tērā marama, i tonoa e ngā kaiwhakaatu wahine he "huringa tūturu" i mua i te mutunga o te tau. Kua whakahaua e te kāwanatanga ngā aroha katoa, ngā kaitukumahi tūmataiti, tūmatanui hoki me ngā kaimahi e 250, neke atu rānei ki te whakaputa i ā rātou taipitopito utu ira tangata i te wā o Aperira 2018. I titiro hoki te pūrongo a te AO ki ngā āputa utu i ētahi atu wāhi. Ko te āputa utu hauātanga ko te 3.3%, i kitea, i te āputa e pā ana ki ngā kaimahi pango, Āhia me te iwi iti (BAME) ko te 0.4%. Whāia mātou i Facebook, i Twitter @BBCNewsEnts, i Instagram rānei i bbcnewsents. Mēnā he huatau pūrākau tāu, īmēra entertainment.news@bbc.co.uk.

title: Ka rongo ngā MSP i ngā tirohanga whāranu mō ngā huringa ki te pūnaha koha okana o Pākehā
summary: Kua korerotia ki ngā MSP kua wehewehea ētahi wāhanga o te mahi rongoā i runga i ngā huringa tērā pea ki te koha okana.
text: I kī te Kāreti Ariki o Ngā Tākuta o Etinitini (RCPE) kua whakapuakina e ōna hoa ngā whakaaro whāranu mō te Pire Whakawhiti. Ka whakaaetia e te tangata te whakaingoa i tētahi takawaenga hei whakaū i tō rātou hiahia ki te koha, ā, tērā pea ka whakakore i te whānau ātete. I kī te RCPE i roto i taua āhuatanga ka taea te whakanoho i ngā rongoā ki tētahi tūnga uaua. Heoi anō, kua kaha te manako o te pire i te Tūranga Manawa o Ingarangi (BHF), te British Medical Association (BMA) Scotland me te Pāremata Taitama o Pirihitini (SYP). Kua pātai hoki te BMA he aha te take e whakaaetia ai ngā mema o te whānau ki te whakahē i ngā koha o te okana i waenganui i te rangahau e whakaatu ana i te tata o te haurua i whakakāhore i te wā kāore i mōhiotia ngā hiahia o te tūpāpaku. I kī a SYP he tino hira te takawaenga mō ngā rangatahi e tiakina ana, engari ka whakahē pea ki ngā whanaunga toto e whakatau ana mō rātou. I kī a BHF: "Kāore te pūnaha koha okana o nāianei e mahi. " Ahakoa ngā tekau tau e whakahauhau ana ki te whakahauhau i ngā tāngata kia hono, ā, ko te mea e 90% o te iwi whānui e kī ana e tautoko ana rātou i te koha okana, ka noho tonu te tokomaha o ngā tāngata i runga i te rēhita i te 32% anake puta noa i te UK." I roto i tana tukunga tuhituhi ki te komiti hauora o Holyrood, ka kī te RCPE: "E whakapono ana ētahi ko te tikanga o te ture 'kōwhiri-atu' ko te tikanga o te whiwhinga e te āhua o ngā okana. " Ko te tangohanga o te aronga atawhai o te koha he tino āwangawanga ki ētahi o o tātau hoa, e whakaaro ana ka tino whakamarie ngā whānau pouri i tētahi mahi hohe o te hoatu."

title: Kāore he tangata i hereheretia mō te maunu hinu 'i roto i te tekau tau'
summary: Kaore tētahi tangata i haere ki te whare herehere mo te maunu hinu i Aiarangi ki te Raki i roto i te tekau tau kua taha, kua kī tētahi āpiha tikanga matua.
text: I te kōrero a John Whiting, te tumuaki kaiāwhina o te tūhuratanga hara mō HMRC, i muri i te kitenga o tētahi tipu horoi diesel i County Armagh. I kī a ia ko te wā i muri i ngā tūru he "whakararuraru" ki ngā kaiwhaiwhai hinu. "He take tērā i whakaarahia e mātau ki te Komiti o te Take o Aiarangi ki te Raki hei take āwangawanga," tana kī. "He maha ngā kōrero e tū ana, e mōhio ana mātou kua whakaritea e te Ariki Rangatira o te Ture ētahi tohutohu whiu, kei te whakauru hoki mātou ki te Tari Ture i roto i te arotakenga o te whiu whakatairite ki Ingarangi me Uēra i whakaritea ki Aiarangi ki te Raki. " Ko tētahi o ngā mea i māharahara ai mātau - kāore ō mātau mana tono e pā ana ki ngā rerenga mārire rawa - kei te kōrero te Tari Ture mō tētahi wāhanga ture hou mo taua take. "Kei te whiua rātau, engari he rerenga whakatārewa. Kai te hereheretia rātau, engari kua whakatārewatia. "I Ingarangi me Uēra he kaitiaki tonu te whiu, e haere ana te tangata ki te whare herehere, e mārama ana he whakararuraru ki te hara mēnā ka tangohia tō wāteatanga, ā, kāore anō kia tīariari taua whakararuraru i Aiarangi ki te Raki." I roto i tētahi poho i te Wenerei, ka tangohia e ngā āpiha e 14 tāhei para paitini mai i tētahi wharau tūhāhā e tata ana ki te kāinga o Jonesborough i te tonga o Armagh. I kitea e rātau he kura nui i raro i te whenua e whakamahia ana hei horoi i te diesel kākāriki. I kī a Tēnā Whiting ko tētahi o ngā tipu tino mātauranga i kitea i Aiarangi ki te Raki, ā, kua wetewetehia ināianei. I kī a ia ka taea e te tipu te whakaputa i te 25m rīta hinu kore mana, e karo ana i te £18m i roto i ngā tāke me te mahi i te tau. "He whakamīharo te taumata o te mātauranga," tana kī. "Te āhua nei ki a mātau i hangaia ngā kāinga mō ngā take o te horoi hinu anake. " E whakapono ana mātau i tāutatia nga kura o raro i te wā i hangaia ai."

title: I kitea kua mate te honu oriwa ridley i Mehiko
summary: Kua kitea e nga kaihīika i te tūnga o Mehiko ki te tonga o Oaxaca e 300 ngā honu moana mate e tāwea ana i roto i ngā kupenga hī ika.
text: I muri noa iho i te kitenga o tētahi atu honu oriwa e 102 i kitea kua mate i te āhua o Chiapas. Ko ngā honu oriwa, e whakatakoto ana i a rātau hēki ki ngā one o ētahi o ngā kāwanatanga o Mehiko i waenganui o Me me Mahuru, e whakaarotia ana kei te anga atu ki te mōrea nui o te ngaro i te mohoao. Kai te tūhuratia tonutia te take o to rātau matenga. Kāore i te mārama mēnā i mau rātau i roto i ngā kupenga i a rātau e ora ana, kua mate kē rānei i a rātau e tāwea ana. E kī ana ngā tohunga tērā pea i patua rātau e ngā algae kino, ngā matau ika, tērā rānei i whakapokea i a rātau e mau ana i roto i nga kupenga. I te tau kotahi mano, i Kai te uiui tētahi rōia motuhake a te rangatira i te kēhi.

title: Te rēra ki te tonga: I whakatārewatia te tuki i te tono a te Legion o Ingarangi
summary: Kua whakatārewatia e te uniana o TE WHT tētahi rā taraiwa i roto i tētahi tautohetohe ki te rēra ki te Tonga i muri i te tono a te Legion o Ingarangi.
text: Ko te taraiwa i te 3 o Whiringa o Whiringa te tuatahi o tōna hīkoi e toru rā e whai ake nei i roto i te tautohetohe mo te tūranga o nga kaitātaki. I kī te uniana ka haere tonu te toenga o ana mahi kua whakaritea, ā, ka noho komutu tonu ngā kōrero, ahakoa i pōhiritia e te umanga tēnei nekehanga hou. I te 3 o Whiringa ā-Rangi, ka kitea e te Rā Poppy o Rānōna, ngā kaimahi ōrite e kohikohi moni ana i ngā teihana Ngongo me ngā teihana rerewhenua. I kī te RMT e "tū mau" ana ngā mema i te wā o tōna tūnga e toru rā o nāianei e mutu ana i waenganui pō. I kī te hēkeretari ahuwhānui o Mick Cash i mōhio te uniana ki te hiranga o te 3 o Whiringa ā-Rangi ki te Legion o Ingarangi, e tohu ana i te Rā Armistice i te 11 o Whiringa ā Rangi. Ināianei, kua pānuitia e te Tonga ka whakaora e 63 anō ngā ratonga ki tōna wātaka mai i te Mane, me ētahi atu ratonga 46 i te 31 o Whiringahora. Ngā whakahōutanga ora mō te taraiwa me ētahi atu pūrākau Ka hoki mai ngā ratonga i waenganui i Brighton me Southampton me Hastings me Ashford i te wiki e whai ake nei. Heoi anō, e 33 ngā ratonga Gatwick Express e kore e hoki tae noa ki te 12 o Hakihea hei wāhanga o "ngā whakaritenga rau ngahuru", te kī a te whatunga. Services were removed as part of a revised timetable introduced earlier this year. I kī tētahi kaikōrero ki te Tonga: "E koa ana mātou kua karangatia e te TT tana taraiwa i te Rā o Te Rā o Rāwāhi, engari i te matekiri kei te whakaaro tonu rātau ki te pana whakamua me te mahi taraiwa i whakaritea mō te 4 me te 5 o Whiringa ā-Rangi, ā, ka whakararuraru i ngā mano o ngā tāngata me ngā whānau e ngana ana ki te hākinakina i te Pō Ahi Ahi." Kua tāpiritia e te mahi mahi ki ngā marama takaware me ngā whakakorenga mō ngā pāhihi, me te Hēkeretari Waka a Chris Grayling e whakahau ana i ngā taha e rua kia whakamutua te raruraru. E hiahia ana te uniana ki te pupuri i tētahi kaitātaki, tāpiri atu ki te atekōkiri, kia noho i runga i ngā tereina i ngā wā katoa. Kua pēhi whakamua te Rerewhenua o Govia Thameslink (GTR), nāna te Tonga, me tōna whakaaro ki te whakaroa atu i te mahi atekōkiri anake ki ana ratonga katoa. Kei te pōtitia hoki ngā atekōkiri tereina ki te tonga e to rātau uniana Aslef i runga i ngā tereina atekōkiri anake, e whakaara ana i te tūponotanga o ngā tuki hono. I te Mane, ka whakakāhoretia e te uniana o TE WHT tētahi tono mai i te kamupene o tētahi tāpiri £2,000 ki ngā kaimahi mēnā ka whakamutua e rātau te tautohetohe. Kua tonoa e te TT kia "whakaurua te haumarutanga pāhihi i mua i te hua tūmataiti", engari kei te pupuri tonu a GTR i te whakahōutanga o te ratonga ka "haumaru". I kī te rangatira nui o Charles Horton tērā tonu tētahi tangata tuarua i runga i ngā tereina. "Mā te whakahōu i te ratonga tereina kia whai mana anake ai ngā atekōkiri, ka pai ake te ratonga kiritaki o ngā pāhihi me te iti ake o ngā tereina takaware," tana kī. Ko ngā rā taraiwa i pānuitia e te TU: Nā te hīkoi hōu rawa e toru rā o te TU, i whakakorea ai ngā rau tereina, me ngā komutere e mau ana ki te pāpāho pāpori ki te amuamu i te raruraru. Ka tūtohu a Stephanie Fuller: "Ahakoa ō paerewa mōrearea @SouthernRailUK taku tereina mai i carshalton B. Kāore au i te rongo i te haumaru #southernstrike". Ka kī a Rob Shirley: "@SouthernRailUK he tuki engari kei te huri tonu to mātau tereina me ngā kaiako e 4? Me tino purua ngā tereina nui rawa kei a koe ki runga i te ara." Ka pātai atu a Maika Webb: "@SouthernRailUK Pēhea te roa e haere tonu ai koe ki te whakangaro i ngā ahiahi o te iwi? #delays #frustrating #southernfail."

title: Ngā kerēme tūkino a Winterbrook Nursing Home
summary: Kua whakapaea ngā kaimahi i tētahi kāinga tiaki o Oxfordshire ki te tūkino i ngā tangata.
text: Thames Valley Police said it has received reports of assaults and ill treatment by staff at Winterbrook Nursing Home in Wallingford. I haere ngā āpiha ki te pae i te 23 o Hune, engari kāore anō kia hopukina. The Care Quality Commission (CQC) put the home into special measures after concerns about abuse were raised with the local authority safeguarding team. I kī tētahi kaikōrero Pirihimana o Thames Valley: "Ināianei kei te uiui ngā āpiha i ngā hara tūkino noa iho me te tūkinotanga a te kaiwhakarato tiaki me te tūkinotanga a ngā kaimahi tiaki." I toro atu ngā kaitirotiro CQC 'kāore i parea' i te 20 o Hōngongoi, ā, i kitea "ngā āwangawanga tūpono mō te haumarutanga o te iwi" i te kāinga, ka taea te noho tae atu ki te 41 tāngata. I kī te CQC i roto i tana pūrongo: "Kua tupu tētahi ahurea kāore i te manaaki i te tangata i runga i te rangatiratanga me te manaaki, ā, kāore i whakamahia ngā tāngata i ngā wā katoa. " Kāore te tangata i parea i ngā wā katoa i te tūkinotanga me te mahinga hē, ā, kāore i te māia ki te whakaara i ngā māharahara." I tāpiritia kāore i haumaru te whakahaere rongoā i ngā wā katoa, ā, kāore te tangata i parea i te mōrea o te whakapokenga. I kī a Paul Kelly, ko te kaiwhakahaere mahi i te kāinga nēhi, "ka whakapāha tūturu rātau ki ngā tāngata katoa e tūhono ana ki Winterbrook, i ētahi tangata me ō rātou whānau". I tāpiri mai a ia: "I whakapouri, i pouri mātau i ngā tauira tūkino i aro mai ki a mātau. " All members of staff associated in any way with this behaviour towards residents were either dismissed or resigned as soon as we were notified of the behaviour. "Kua tāruatia e mātou tētahi mahere mahi taipitopito, whānui, pakari hoki hei whakatika i ngā hēnga katoa, ā, kei te whakahōu mātou i te CQC ia wiki." Ngā Hononga Ipurangi Pātahi Winterbrook Nursing Home Thames Valley Police

title: I whakawāteatia e nga Pirihimana o Staffordshire te tūtukitanga kino i muri i te whainga motokā
summary: Ko ngā pirihimana i whai i tētahi waka i haere ki te taraiwa hē ki raro i tētahi huarahi takirua "i tika te mahi", i kitea he arotakenga.
text: I mate a Joshua Sanna, 19, i te tūtukitanga i te A50 tata ki Longton i Staffordshire i muri i te whainga i te 15 o April 2018. I muri i te taraiwa hē i te huarahi, ka kī te Tari Motuhake mō te Whanonga Pirihimana (IOPC). I kī ngā Pirihimana o Staffordshire i ōna aroha ki te hunga e pāngia ana. I kī te IOPC i whaia te Toyota e ngā āpiha i muri i te korenga o te tū, ā, ka whakapā atu tētahi waka pirihimana ki te ārai i te taraiwa hē ki raro i te huarahi mania. I haukotia te whainga i te wetewete o te Tūroro, a, ka haere tonu ki te huarahi takirua, ka kī te kaitiaki. I kōrerotia a Tēnā Sanna kua mate i te tirohanga i muri i te tūtukitanga o tana motokā e ngā waka e rua e haere mai ana. I pāngia e tētahi kainoho tuarua o te motokā he whara nui. I kōrerotia e ngā Pirihimana o Staffordshire mō te tūhuratanga, engari i kitea e te IOPC "kāore he tohu kua hē ētahi āpiha". "E tohu ana te whakaaturanga i tika te mahi a ngā āpiha me ngā kaimahi pirihimana, e ai ki te kaupapahere me te hātepe," te kī a te pūrongo. I kōrero ngā kaihoko me te ope pirihimana ki tētahi uiuinga ki te matenga o Tāne Sanna i Stoke-on-Trent i te 19 o Poutūterangi 2020 nāna i whakapūketetia tētahi whakataunga kōrero e kī ana "i whakatau ia ki te taraiwa i te A50, nā reira i mate ai ia". Whāia a BBC West Midlands i Facebook, Twitter me Instagram. title: Rūhia i Hiria: Ka aha ā muri ake?
summary: I tēnei wiki kua tino pārekareka te papa kīngi rautaki o te Rāwhiti o Waenganui i te tomokanga ohorere o ngā waka rererangi o Rūhia ki ngā kauhanga riri matatini kē o Hiria.
text: Nā Frank GardnerBBC korero haumarutanga mō Washington me ōna pirihitini, tae atu ki te iti o te toenga o te mea e kiia nei ko te "ātete Hiriani ngāwari", he tino kore noa iho tēnei, engari mēnā ka huri ngā ūnga ki te whakauru i ngā hunga whakakeke i pūruatia e US. E kitea ana e rātau he whakaroa i tētahi pakanga kāore e taea te toa, ā, ka whakaroa i te haerenga atu o tētahi perehitini Hiriani e kore nei e whakaaetia e tētahi wāhi nui o tōna iwi whānui. Engari mō te kāwanatanga o Hiria me ōna pirihi o Ārepa, ko te taenga mai o te mana ahi o Rūhia he tauaro - he aho ora tērā e āhei ana ki te whakawhāiti i te ope Hiriani kua ngenge, ka hoki anō ki te rohe i ngaro i tēnei tau, ā, ka kuru i ngā ātete whakakeke katoa hāunga ngā toa mārō o te Kāwanatanga Ingarihi (IS) me te Nusra Front. He aha hoki ngā hua pea? E rua ngā whakahau rerekē Ko te āwangawanga tino wawe mō Washington, ko te tūtukitanga o tōna ope hau, ki a Rūhia i te rangi i runga i Hiria. Ko te karo i tēnei e kīia ana ko te "deconfliction", ā, ko te tikanga he tukanga āta whakaritea, he tukanga whakariterite hoki. E kī ana te US kotahi haora noa iho te pānui i te Wenerei ki te "ūkui i te rangi" i mua i te haerenga o nga waka rererangi a Rūhia i runga i ta rātau oma whakapae tuatahi, ka tuki ki ngā tūnga whakakeke o Hiriani i te uru o te whenua. E kī ana a Rūhia i ūkuia te IS, i te wā e kī ana a Senator John McCain i patua te hunga whakakeke i pūruatia e te Rūhia. Ka whakahaere te US i ana mahi hau i waho o Al-Udaid Airbase i Qatar, e tohatoha ana, e manakē ana i ngā ūnga IS puta noa i Hiria me Iraki, ā, ka tiritiri i waenganui i te tauwhāinga tauwhāinga maha kei roto ko ngā whenua Arāpia maha. Engari i tēnei wiki kua pānuitia he pokapū tono hou, i Baghdad, e whakaritea ai ngā mahi e Rūhia, Irana, Hiria, Iraki. Ko te tuaka pro-Assad tēnei e hiahia ana ki te kite i te Perehitini o Hiria, o Te Perehitini o Hiria, o Te Perehitini o Hiria, e noho mana tonu ana. E kore e mōhiotia te āhua o IS i runga i tā rātou rārangi ūnga, engari e whakaaro ana hoki aua whenua e whā ki ngā rōpū whakakeke katoa e ātete ana ki a Hahara hei hoariri. Kāore tēnei tirohanga e uru ki tērā o te tauwhāinga ā-US, ā, ka whakararuraru, ka tukitukia hoki te mahi a te ao whānui ki te hinga i te IS. Ina whakatika te pokapū tono hou o Baghdad, tērā pea e rua ngā pūtahi tono rerekē i te Rāwhiti o Waenganui, e whakahaere ana i ngā whakahau rerekē e rua ki ngā hoariri rerekē e rua. Utauta tono Ahakoa te mana tāpiri o te ope rererangi o Rūhia kātahi anō ka tae mai, tērā pea ka pōhiritia tēnei whanaketanga e te kaiārahi o IS. Kia mau tonu ai tōna charisma huri noa, me auaha tonu, te tango i ngā rohe hou, te mau i ngā hoariri hou, te waihanga rānei i ngā huarahi hōu, nui ake rānei o te patu i ōna whakarau. Ko te tomokanga o Rūhia ki te papā o Hiriani, ahakoa kāore i runga i te whenua, ka tino pai te haihana tono mō IS. E kore e kore e whakaritea kētia ngā ataata whakatūpato. Ko ngā Rūhia, ko te hoariri hītori ōrite i whawhaitia e te Wānanga i Awhekenetāna puta noa i ngā tau kotahi mano e waru tekau mā rua, ā, i te mutunga ka hinga (me te āwhina a US, Hauri me Hōia). Ka whakamā te āhua o ngā kaihautū Rūhia e whakaeke ana i ngā kairiri Mohimana i runga i te whenua, ki ngā kāwanatanga Arāpia e kore e hiahia kia kitea o rātau ope hau i te taha kotahi. Tērā pea he nui ake ngā tauwhiti e hono ana ki ngā kaiwhakahāwea o IS me Al-Nusra, mai i roto i Hiria, i waho rānei o te rohe. Ko te whakakore i ngā rōpū e Hanawiti ana i waenganui i ngā ope whawhai nui e rua o te ope a Hahara me IS, he ope katoa o ngā rōpū whakakeke iti me ngā ingoa ngaro, pēnei i a Tajammu al-Izza, e kī ana i patua rātau e ngā tuki hau o Rūhia i te Wenerei. Ko ētahi o ēnei rōpū e mōhiotia ana e te Uru he "ngāwari" engari ko te nuinga kua ngoikore, kua pāngia e ngā whakahekenga, ngā hinganga me te hopu. Na te taenga mai o ngā hōia o Ārepa i pūrongotia ki Hiria, ko te hanganga i reira o ngā ope Rūhia me tētahi tūnga Rūhia hou e hohe ana, ko ngā tohu e haere ana a Hahara me ana pirihi i muri i te kuru i ngā rōpū whakakeke iti, ka waiho anake ngā kaiwhakahāwea o IS me al-Nusra. Kātahi ka taea e rātau te kī: "Titiro, kāore pea koe e pīrangi ki a ia, engari ko Hahara anake te whirinoa ki ngā kaitapa upoko o te IS". E whakarewa ana ngā ringa i a Arapia, ā, tērā pea e kore a Tāke e mau i tēnei whanaketanga e takoto ana. Tae atu ki ētahi atu whenua o te rohe, kua roa rātau e tohe ana ko te rongoā mau tonu ki te mōrearea o Hiriani ko te haere a Perehitini Hahara. I te mea kei te pare ngā Rūhia me ngā Ārepa i a ia, i te ā-whawhai, i te ā-whawhai, i te pūtea mārire a Arapia rāua ko Qatar i ngā rōpū whakakeke i roto i Hiria, e āki ana i ētahi ki te whakapae i a rātau ki te tautoko i a IS, i a al-Mōrea rānei. I te tau 2013 ka rite katoa nga Hīhi ki te hono ki ngā whakaekenga a Mātau ki ngā ope a Hahara hei whiu mo te whakaekenga korohū paitini maha ki ngā tangata whenua o Hiriani. No te korenga o tēnā i puta, ka whakarewaina e rātau ta rātau ake tautoko mō ngā rōpū whakakeke o Hiria. Ināianei ka nui ake anō taua taumata tautoko, kia ōrite ki te kaha hou o nga ope a Hahara. I whakaroatia te rangimārie Ko te hua o te kupenga o ēnei mea katoa, tērā pea he whakaroa anō i te tumu i Hiria. Ki te whakaaro tētahi taha ka taea e ia te toa, kāore rānei e ngaro, kātahi ka manawapa ki te haere mai ki te tēpu whakarite me te mahi i ngā mana nui. He maha ngā wā mai i te tau 2011 i te wā i whakapuakina ai e "ngā tohunga o te Rāwhiti o Waenganui" kua whakatakatia a Perehitini Hahara, ā, kāore e mutu te tau. Kua whakapokea katoatia e ia. Ināianei, mā te werohanga o tēnei tonic Rūhia, ka nui ake tana whakamatautau ki te whakapakari. Nō reira ka haere tonu te whawhai, kia kōhua rā anō ki a Hahara me ana pirihitini v IS me al-Mōrea, ā, kāore e taea e Washington te whakaawe i te hua. Ki te kore tētahi mea e tino rerekē, kāore te rangimārie i Hiria i te pae.

title: Rārangi tiritiri ataata pakeke i māturu mai i te umanga ture
summary: Kua māturu ngā taipitopito whaiaro o ngā mano o ngā kiritaki aunui Sky ki te ipurangi, i te taha o tētahi rārangi whitiāhua āhuaatua e kiia ana kua tiria tuihonotia e rātou.
text: Nā te kaipānui a Daniel EmeryTechnology, Rongokōrero o TE rārangi, i kitea e TE Rongokōrero, e whakamārama ana i ngā ingoa katoa me ngā wāhitau o ngā tāngata neke atu i te 5,300 i whakaarotia e te umanga ture ACS:Law hei tiritiri i ngā whitiāhua pakeke. I puta tuihono i muri i tētahi whakaekenga i te paetukutuku ACS:Law. I kī te Komihana Mōhiohio o UK ka tūhura i te mārire. Kua karangatia e te tohunga tūmataitinga a Haimona Davis "tētahi o ngā pakaru kino rawa" o te Ture Parenga Raraunga i kitea e ia. I puta tuihonotia ngā tuhinga i muri i te whakaekenga a ngā kaiwhakamahi o te papa karere 4chan i te pae o ACS:Law hei utu mō ana mahi ārai tāpaetanga. Kua mahia e te umanga he umanga mā te tuku i ngā mano o ngā reta ki ngā kaitiaki kupenga e kiia ana, e tono ana kia utua e rātau he utu mō te £500 mō ia takahitanga, ki te kōti anga atu rānei. Ka whakamahia e ia ngā kamupene hunga-tuatoru ki te tirotiro i te kupenga e kimi ana i ngā takahitanga o te manatārua pūoro me te kiriata. Mā te rāhuitia ki ngā wāhitau IP (kawa ipurangi) - ka taea te tāutu i te tūhononga ipurangi e whakamahia ana i roto i tētahi takahitanga manatārua - ka taea e ōna rōia te tono mō tētahi whakahau kōti kia whiwhi i te wāhitau ōkiko o te rorohiko mai i te kaituku ratonga kua whakamahia tōna whatunga mō te tiritiri kōnae. I kitea e tētahi tūhuratanga o TE AO i a Aotearoa he tokomaha ngā tāngata e kī ana i whakapaea hētia rātau e ACS:Ture o te tiritiri kōnae kore mana. Rōpū kiritaki UK Ko tēhea? says it has also received a number of complaints. He maha ngā tautohetohe ka taea te tinihanga i ngā wāhitau IP. ACS:Kei te tūhuratia te ture e te Mana Ture Rōia mō tana mahi ki te tuku reta ki ngā kaitiaki whakapae. Kei roto i te māturu e 1,000 ngā ī-mēra muna, tae atu ki te rārangi, he āpitihanga ki tētahi o ngā karere. Kātahi ka tukuatu te kohinga ki te paetukutuku tiritiri kōnae, The Pirate Bay, e tiria ana e ngā rau o ngā kaiwhakamahi. Kei roto i ngā ī-mēra muna ko ngā tuhinga whaiaro i waenganui i a Andrew Crossley - e whakahaere ana i te ACS:Law - me ngā hoa mahi, tae atu ki ngā rārangi o ngā kaitiri kōnae tūpono me ngā mōhiohio mō te nui o ngā mahi tiritiri kōnae a te umanga. Ahakoa he whakamā pea ētahi o ngā ī-mēra, e whakamārama ana i ngā mahi ā-roto o te kamupene, ko te māturu o tētahi tuhinga kāore i whakamunatia - e whakarārangi ana i ngā taipitopito whaiaro o ngā kaiohauru BSkyB Broadband neke atu i te 5,300 i te taha o tētahi rārangi ataata pakeke kua tikiake pea rātou me te tiritiri tuihono - tērā pea he takahi i te Ture Parenga Raraunga. E kōrero ana ki TE Rongokōrero,  I kī a Tēnā Crossley he "take ture" e karapoti ana i te mārire. "Ko mātau te kaupapa o te whakaekenga hara ki a mātau pūnaha. Kei te mau tonu te umanga, ā, kei te haere tonu ki te hokohoko," tana tāpiri mai. I kī a Tēnā Crossley e kore a ia e kōrero hāngai ki ngā ihirangi o ia ī-mēra. "Ko ā mātou whakaaturanga katoa ko te tohu i tētahi tūhononga ipurangi kua whakapaua hei tiritiri i ngā mahi manatārua," tana kī atu ki a BBC News i te pēhitanga mō te pātengi raraunga BSkyB. "E pā ana ki ia ingoa, ko ēnei anake ngā ingoa me ngā wāhitau o te rangatira pūkete, ā, kāore mātou e kerēme kei te tiritiri rātou i ngā kōnae," tana tāpiri mai.
