I kī a Tēnā Crossley kāore ōna kōrero anō i te pātaitanga he aha te take i kore ai te tuhinga Excel i whakamunatia, engari i kī ia kua whakamōhio atu ia ki ngā pirihimana, te ICO, ā, kei te whakawhitiwhiti kōrero ki te SRA. I kī atu tētahi kaikōrero mō Sky ki a TE Rongokōrero o TE Rongokōrero e "tino māharahara ana rātau ki te pakaru haumarutanga e pā ana ki ngā raraunga e puritia ana e ACS:Law". "I tēnei wāhanga o tā mātou tūhuratanga, e whakapono ana mātou kei roto i ngā raraunga ngā ingoa me ngā wāhitau o ngā kiritaki Aunui Rangi e 4,000," ka kī rātau. "Pēnei i ētahi atu kaituku aunui, ka taea te tono i te Rangi e te Whakahau Kōti kia whakaatu mōhiohio mō ngā kiritaki e kiia ana kua whakamahia ōna pūkete mō te tikiake ture. Ka homai anake e mātou aua raraunga i roto i te puka whakamuna." I kī te mahi hāngai a Haimona Davis, mai i te kaitiaki Tūmataitinga Ao Whānui, ka tono a ia ki te Komihana Mōhiohio kia "whakahaere i tētahi tūhuratanga katoa" me te tūmanako he "take whakamātautau o ngā mana hou o te Komihana Mōhiohio". "Āhua kore nei koe e kite i tētahi aronga e tata ana ki ngā āhuatanga katoa o te Ture Parenga Raraunga (DPA) kua pakaru, engari ko tēnei tētahi o rātou," te kī a Tēnā Davies. "E tika ana mō te kupu 'whakamahinga kino' o ngā raraunga whaiaro," tana tāpiri mai. I kī atu tētahi kaikōrero mō te Tari Komihana Mōhiohio (ICO) ki a TE Rongokōrero o TE Rongokōrero e "tino nui ana ngā pakaru katoa o te DPA". "Me mātua whakarite ngā whakahaere e tukatuka ana i ngā raraunga whaiaro kia haumaru, kia haumaru hoki. " Ka whakapā atu te ICO ki ACS:Ture hei whakatū i ētahi atu take o te kēhi me te tāutu he aha te mahi, mēnā he aha, me mahi." Ko te whakaekenga o ACS:Law te mea hou rawa i roto i te maha o ngā whakaekenga kōtaha tiketike a ngā kaiwhaiwhai tāpaetanga. I tērā wiki, i tukitukia rangitahitia e ngā mūrere ngā paetukutuku o te Motion Picture Association of America (MPAA) me te Recording Industry Association of America (RIAA). I whakapuakina ngā whakaekenga i runga i te papa karere rongonui 4chan, ā, i whakaritea hei utu mō ngā mahi ārai tāpaetanga ki ngā paetukutuku tiritiri kōnae. E rongonuitia ana ngā kaiwhakamahi o 4chan mō te mahi tuihono me te mahi hāngai. Ko te "Operation Payback", e mōhiotia ana, i whakaritea he utu mō te mahi a te MPAA me te RIAA ki te The Pirate Bay. Kua whakapuakina e te rōpū ka ūnga tonu i ētahi atu pae e pā ana ki ngā ngohe tāpaetanga tuihono.

title: Whakatahe: NIO hei whakarewa i te whakahau mo te ture whakatahe
summary: E whakaaro ana te Tari o Aiarangi ki te Raki (NIO) ki te whakarewa i tētahi whakahau mōhiotanga e pā ana ki te huringa o te ture mo te whakatahe.
text: Nā Mark DevenportBBC News Ka rerekē te ture NI Political Editor NI ki te kore e whakaoratia te kaiwhakahaere tiritiri hiko i Stormont i te 21 o Whiringahora. E tūmanakohia ana kia whakarewa te whakahau mōhiotanga i te tōmua o tērā marama. I whakaūngia hoki e tētahi kōrero mō te NIO ngā whakahau mōhiotanga mō ngā ture e pā ana ki te mārena tangata kotahi me ngā tūkinotanga hītori. E tūmanakotia ana kia tohu te whakahau mōhiotanga whakatahe ki ngā wāhine me ngā tohunga rongoā i Aiarangi ki te Raki ki te wāhi e whiwhi ai rātou i ngā take tika mō ngā huringa e whai ake nei. Ko te Ture Whakatahe o te tau 1967 - nāna i whakamana ngā whakamutunga - kāore anō kia whakaroa atu ki Aiarangi ki te Raki. Ka whakaaetia anake te whakatahe i Aiarangi ki te Raki i ngā āhuatanga e haere tonu ai te hapu, ko te tikanga he mōrea nui, pūmau hoki ki te hauora o te wahine. I raro i te Ture Whakatū Nui o Aiarangi ki te Raki, ko te rahunga ki te whakaora i te mana whakahaere i te 21 o Whiringa ā-rangi, ka hua te whakawāteatanga wawe o te whakatahe. Kātahi ka tūmanakohia kia whakarewaina e ngā āpiha he whakaaro mō ngā momo ture me whai te ratonga hauora e pā ana ki ngā whakamutunga. Ko te tikanga kia kawea mai e nga ture a Aiarangi ki te Raki ki tētahi hui aowhānui mo te whakakore i te whakahāweatanga ki nga wāhine. E whakahaua ana te Hēkeretari o Aiarangi ki te Raki a Julian Smith kia whakaritea he ture i te 31 o Poutūterangi 2020. 'He rongoā o Aiarangi ki te Raki' Kua karangatia e nga kaiārahi o ngā Hāhi matua e whā ki a Julian Smith kia huihui anō i te whakaminenga i mua i te rā kati o te 21 o Whiringahora. E kī ana rātau mā tēnei e āhei ai ngā rōpū Stormont ki te kimi i tā rātou e kīia nei ko "tētahi rongoā o Aiarangi ki te Raki" mō ngā take uaua i puta mai i te whakatahe. I whakapuakina e nga minita te māharahara nui ki tā rātau i whakaahua ai ko te āhua o tētahi "kāwanatanga whakatahe kāore i te whakaritea" e whakaritea ana ki Aiarangi ki te Raki mai i Aotearoa. I te Kotahitanga i te Mane, ka whakaarahia e te MP o Te Raki o Te Raki o Īna Paisley ōna māharahara mō te huringa tārewa o te ture whakatahe, ā, ka werohia te hēkeretari o te kāwanatanga kia karangatia he hui a te whakaminenga "āpōpō ata". I kī a Tēnā Paisley ko te rōpū anake e kore e puta ko Sinn Féin. I whakautua e Tēnā Smith "me mahi tātau katoa i ngā mea katoa e taea ana e tātau kia ara ake ai ngā mea i ngā wiki e heke mai nei". I kī a ia he mea hira, ehara i te mea mo te take o te whakatahe, e whakapono ana a ia, e tino pai ana te mahi a te iwi o Aiarangi ki te Raki, engari he tino painga hoki ki ngā tangata katoa. I kī atu hoki a ia ki ngā MP e tūmanako ana ia ki te kawe mai i ngā ture whakamua e taea ai te utu ki ngā tūkinotanga ā-iwi hītori "i ngā wiki e heke mai nei". I tāruatia e ia tana tautohe kia whakaurua he pire mo te utu tūkino i roto i tētahi Whaikōrero a te Kuini e whai ake nei. Heoi anō, i werohia e te MP o Te Raki o Te Raki o Lady Sylvia Hermon ki te whakaū ka whakaturetia te mehua i te mutunga o Whiringahora, ka kī a Tēnā Smith e kore ia e whakarite i tētahi whakaaetanga kāore e taea e ia te pupuri.

title: Ka whakamahia e ngā pirihimana ngā rīpene i roto i te mahi hīkoi o Lincolnshire
summary: Tokowhā nga tāngata e whakapae ana ki te whakatū kurī ki runga i te hares kua hopukina e nga pirihimana e whakamahi ana i te rīpene.
text: Ko te Mahi a Pirihimana o Lincolnshire Galileo he ngana ki te tāpae i te rere o te hare i pūrongotia he "kore mana" i te takiwā. I kī te tōpana i whakamōhiotia e ia ngā mehua hei rutu i tāna i whakaahua ai ko te "whiu o te taiwhenua Ingarihi". E kī ana ko te wā meke tēnei i whakamahia ai e ia nga rīpene i roto i tētahi mahi ora. Tokowhā nga tāngata o Darlington i hopukina tata ki South Kyme i te Rātapu mo te hara i te whai kēmu. Ko tētahi o ngā mahi maha i pūrongotia i te mutunga wiki. Ko Lincolnshire tētahi o ngā wāhi e tino ūkuia ana e ngā kaiako - e 2,000 ngā waea i te wā o te 2015-16. I kī te Rangatira Kātipa o Bill Skelly ka whai take te whakaurunga o te rīpene ki te kohikohi whakaaturanga hei hoatu ki mua i nga kōti. Kua kī anō ētahi kaiahuwhenua i mua i ngā wāhi o te rohe e rite ana ki te "Uru Mohoao" i muri i te whakanuitanga o te taumata tutu i whakamahia e ngā kaiakoranga. I tērā wiki, i tapahia tōna waewae i muri i te waihotanga o tētahi kurī momo lurcher i muri i te waihotanga mo te tūpāpaku i raro i tētahi ara whenua, ka kī te RSPCA. I kī a Tēnā Skelly ka āwhina ngā whakaaturanga i kohia e te drones "kia pai ake te hua mō ō mātou hapori ā-taiwhenua... me ngā whakapae tika mō te hunga hara kino rawa". Ka tīmata ngā hara tūturu ki te piki ake i te ngahuru i muri i te hauhaketanga o ngā huawhenua, ā, ka haere tonu tae noa ki te mutunga o te tau i te kōanga. Hare coursing Source: Pirihimana o Lincolnshire

title: Ka tukuna e Neville rāua ko Giggs ngā kainoho hōtēra kia noho mō te hōtoke
summary: Tata ki te 30 ngā tāngata noho kore kāinga kua whakatūria he puni ki tētahi whare wātea nā ngā kaitākaro o Mua o Manatū United, kua kīia ka taea e rātau te noho mo te hōtoke.
text: Kei te whakahou a Gary Neville rāua ko Ryan Giggs i te whare o mua o Stock Exchange i te pokapū o te taone nui o Manatū hei hōtēra whai rawa. I kī a Wesley Hall, he kaiwhaiwhai motika tangata, i kōrero ia ki a Neville i runga i te waea, ā, ka kī atu ka taea e rātau te noho tae noa ki Hui tanguru ka tīmata te mahi hanga. I panaia te rōpū noho noho i tētahi paraka tari wātea i tērā wiki. I kī a Tēnā Hall i a ia e kōrero ana ki tētahi kaiwhakawhanake e mahi ana i te pae i te Paraire, ka hoatu ki a ia te waea kia kōrero hāngai ki a Gary Neville. 'Whare ātaahua' "I kōrero mai a ia ki a au, 'Titiro, kāore au i te raruraru ki a koe e noho ana i konei, tiaki i te whare me te manaaki i te whare tūturu," tana kī. I tāpiritia e ia ko te hoatu i te hunga noho kore kāinga he "aho ora". "Kāore ēnei tāngata i te whiwhi kai kai, he iti ō rātou pūnaha ārai, ā, kei te mate rātou. " Ko te mea e hiahiatia ana ko tētahi tangata hei puru tuanui ki runga i to rātau māhunga me te hoatu tautoko ki a rātau," tana kī. Wesley Dove, who has been homeless for the last 12 months and living in a tent, said: "It's a beautiful building, now we know we can stay we can start doing work. He iti noa iho te haumarutanga mo te hōtoke." I tukuna te whakaaetanga whakarite kia huri i te Stock Exchange i Norfolk Street hei hōtēra rangatira 35 rūma moenga i te tīmatanga o tēnei tau, ā, ko ngā hoa o mua o te tīma o United, ko Neville rāua ko Giggs e pūtea ana i te kaupapa. Ko te whare rārangi Kōeke II, i hokona e rātau mō te £1.5m, ka noho he whare tākaro, spa, tuanui mō ngā mema me tētahi wharekai papa whenua, e ai ki ngā kaihoahoa AEW.

title: Ko te whaina o te heitara Libor e āwhina ana i te Whakaora Maunga o Pirihitini
summary: Ko ngā whaina i utua e ngā pēke e pā ana ki te heitara whakatika mokatere o Libor i hua ai he koha £60,000 ki te Whakaora Maunga o Pirihitini.
text: Kua whiwhi te rōpū hāmarara mō ngā tīma e 27 o Pākehā i te pūtea mai i Pirihimana Pākehā. I whiwhi pirihimana i te moni mai i te kāwanatanga o UK, ā, i tua atu i te pūtea ā-tau kua hoatu kētia e te tōpana ki ngā tīma whakaora maunga. I kī a Scottish Mountain Rescue kua uaua ake te kohi moni. Ko ngā tīma e 27 ko Hebrides, Braemar, Lomond, Moffat, Tayside, me te Scottish Cave Rescue and Search and Rescue Dog Association. I kī te Manukura o Haimona Steer: "Ko ā mātou tīma whakaora maunga tūroro e whakarato ana i tētahi ratonga karaehe o te ao, e wātea ana i ngā rā katoa, ahakoa te wā, ahakoa te rangi." "Heoi anō, kei te nui haere te whārōrō o ā mātou tīma i te nui o ngā mahi e urupare ana mātau, i te wā e uaua ake ana te kohi moni. " Nō reira e tino mōhiotia ana te tautoko a Pirihimana Pākehā i a mātau e mahi ana i tētahi atu tau arokē o ngā whakaora." 'Tūmahi nui' I Whiringahora i tērā tau, ka pānuitia e te Pūtea Moni e tata ana ki te £10m te kāwanatanga o UK hei āwhina ki te tautoko i ngā kaimahi ratonga ohorere, i takea mai i ngā whaina Libor. I whakaaetia kia whakawāteatia tētahi wāhanga mai i te wāhanga o Pākehā o ēnei moni ki te Mana Pirihimana o Pirihitini. I kī te Kaiāwhina Rangatira Kātipa o Pirihimana Higgins, o Pirihimana Pākehā: "Ka mahia e ngā tīma whakaora maunga tētahi mahi nui ki te āwhina i te tiaki i ngā tāngata i roto i te taiao o waho o Pākehā. " Mā te tohatoha o te pūtea Libor, e koa ana mātou ki te whakarato tautoko pūtea anō. "Ka tāruatia tā mātou whāinga ā-pūtea i te tau 2014/2015 ki ngā tīma whakaora maunga, ko ōna mema e tono ana ki te haere ki te āwhina i ētahi atu ina raruraru rātou i ngā maunga me ngā maunga o Pākehā."

title: HimToo: He pēhea te rongonui a te whaea o Pieter Hanson i a ia i runga ipurangi
summary: Mēnā kua kite koe i ētahi whakairinga rerekē mō ngā tama i runga i te pāpāho pāpori me te hashtag #HimToo, tērā pea ka tika koe ki te pōraru.
text: Nā Tom GerkenBBC News "Ko TAKU tama tēnei", tīmataria te nuinga o ngā tuhituhi, i mua i te whakarārangi i ngā whakatutukitanga a te katoa mai i te toa whakamataku o Norman Bates ki te Back to the Future's Marty McFly. I tīmata katoa ki tētahi pou mai i tētahi whaea āwangawanga o Amerika i Twitter. I a ia e kōrero ana ki te AO mō tōna rongonui ipurangi hou, ka whakautua e te tangata whenua o Pārera te pātai i runga i te hinengaro o te katoa. "Kāore au i te mataku ki te haere ki ngā rā!" tana whakakatakata. "He iti noa iho te heahea o taku whaea, kaore au e whakaaro nui rawa ki roto." He "heahea iti" pea, engari kaore i roa ka puta mai nga parodies, me te whetū pahū/ata meme makau a te katoa, ko Rick Astley tētahi o ngā hākinakina tino rongonui. Kātahi anō ka whai mai ētahi atu, me te pūhohe o te comedian o Nathan Fielder e whakaatu ana i tētahi miramira motuhake - engari me haere te mihi ki te kaituhi kōrero a Emlyn Crenshaw mo tana mahi auaha. Ko te "āhua o nāianei o ngā whakapae tōkai hē" i roto i te tweet taketake tērā pea e pā ana ki te tautohetohe e karapoti ana i te wāhuitanga o te Kōti Matua hou o Te Kōti Matua o Te Kōti Matua o Te Hononga o Amerika. Mai i tērā wā ka tapaina e te Perehitini o Amerika ko Donald Trump ngā kerēme whakaekenga ā-waha ki a Kavanaugh he "tinihanga", me te kaiwaiata tūturu o Candace Owens e whakawhānui ana i te #HimToo tohutohu hei tiaki i te kaiwhakawā. Kua tino whakawehewehea te take, tērā pea kāore i te mīharo i te anga atu o 'BlueStarMom3' ki tētahi whakahoki i runga i te Twitter. Engari he torutoru noa iho i runga i te pāpāho pāpori i whakaaro nui ki te tangata i roto i te whakaahua e tere ana te noho hei kanohi o #HimToo. Nā reira i whakatūria e ia tētahi pūkete Twitter hei whakatikatika i te pūkete, kua oti i a ia te whakatakotoranga e mōhiotia ana. I kī a Pita mo te tweet a tōna whaea: "I pōhēhē ahau i taku kitenga, engari i te mutunga o te rā he mātua pōrangi tātau katoa. Tērā pea ka pīrangi koe: "E aroha tonu ana ahau ki a ia. Ko ia tōku whaea. He tino whakakakā tana kōrero, engari e hiahia ana ahau ki te whakarite kāore e hoki mai ki a ia. "Nā reira i whakaaro mātou ka ngahau mātou. He reo whakaaro whakamīharo taku tuakana ko Jon." A, ka kī a Pieter e whakamahi ana ia i te wheako ki te "huri i te tōraro ki te tōrunga". "He maha nga tau e mahi ana ahau ki te tautoko i te Leukemia & Lymphoma Society," tana kī. "He mōrehu mate pukupuku taku teina. " He iti noa iho taku toro atu, engari ināianei he wā pai tēnei ki te tautoko i tētahi take e tino whakapono ana ahau. "I'm trying to use this as an avenue to raise awareness for my little brother. He tangata whakamīharo a ia, ā, ko ia tōku toa whaiaro."

title: Vulcan XH558: Flypast whakamutunga i runga i te East Midlands
summary: Kua rere te Vulcan rererangi whakamutunga o UK i runga i te East Midlands mō tētahi rerenga whakamutunga hei wāhanga o tana haerenga poroporoaki.
text: I puta mai te pomu XH558 i runga i te RAF Waddington, Lincolnshire, me Rutland Water i muri i te wehenga atu i te Taunga Rererangi o Robin Hood tata ki Doncaster. Ka mahia tētahi rerenga whakamutunga ā muri ake i tēnei marama i mua i te taunga mō ngā whakaaturanga. Ko te tikanga kia whakatūria te pomu i muri i te tautoko a ngā kaitautoko pūkaha, tae atu ki a Rolls-Royce. I rere hoki te waka rererangi i runga i Bruntingthorpe Airfield me East Midlands Airport, i Leicestershire, me Newark i Nottinghamshire. Ko Bruntingthorpe te kāinga tuatahi o te Vulcan i muri i tana mahi RAF, ā, i whakaoratia ai te rererangi i roto i te 14 tau. I kī a Paora Hōnea, i uru ki ngā mahi i te papa rererangi mo te rererangi: "Ko te kaiwhakatūpato o Victor, te tuahine o Vulcan, i runga i te waka rererangi - nā reira i te rerenga o te Vulcan ki runga, he pai te wā whakaahua mō te iwi." I kite a Vulcans, i mahi mai i RAF Waddington i Lincolnshire, i te wā o te Pakanga o Falklands o te tau 1982. I kī te aroha o Vulcan ki te Sky Trust, e āwhina ana ki te pupuri me te whakahaere i te rererangi, i te tau 1993. Kōnae tūturu Vulcan

title: Ka taea te whakahau i te pirihimana tūtaki mo te tukia o te moped
summary: Ko tētahi āpiha Pirihimana Tūtaki nāna i tukituki tētahi taitamariki i te moped i a ia e whakamahi ana i tētahi mahi tukituki hou, ka anga atu pea ki ngā utu hara.
text: I mahia e te āpiha te hoapā takahanga hei aukati i te pakeke 17 tau kia kaua e eke mōrearea. I tukuna te tama, kāore i te mau potae, ki te hōhipera me ngā whara nui o te māhunga, engari i muri iho ka tukua. Me whakatau mēnā me tuku ngā whakaaturanga i kohia e te kaitiaki pirihimana ki ngā rōia. Ki te whiua ia, ka taea te whakatau i te āpiha ki te tūkino tinana, ki te tūkino tinana rānei. Ka taea hoki e te Tūtaki te whakatau mehemea he take hei whakautu mo te hē, tērā pea ka panaia. Kāore i te taurangitia te 'whiu' I whakarewaina tētahi tūhuratanga a te Tari Motuhake mō te Whanonga Pirihimana (IOPC) i muri i te tūtukitanga i te Ara ki te Rāwhiti, i Erith, tata ki te 02:15 GMT i te 7 o Whiringa o Whiringa i tērā tau. I muri iho ka tautohe te tama ki ngā hara e rima i te kōti taitamariki, tae atu ki te tāhaetanga, te taraiwa mōrearea, me te taraiwa me te kore raihana. I kī tētahi kaikōrero IOPC: "I te mutunga kāore e taea te whakamahi i te mahi pirihimana i tētahi whenua e whakaaetia ana e mātau he pirihimana - ko te whakapā takahanga, te whakamahinga o ngā patu, te whakamahinga rānei o te tautāwhi. " I ngā wā katoa he take mēnā he tika, he ōrite hoki i roto i ngā āhuatanga. "Engari he hē te tuku pūmautanga i ia take. Ko te tirotiro takitahi he wāhanga nui o te whakaaro tūmatanui ki te āhua o te mahi pirihimana." I whakaūngia hoki e te kaitiaki e uiui ana i tētahi kēhi hoapā takahanga tuarua e pā ana ki tētahi atu āpiha Tūtaki i tangohia ai tētahi pakeke i tana moped i Ealing, ki te uru o Rāwāhi, i tērā Poutāpeta. E 60 ngā wā i whakamahia ai te mahi mai i Hānuere e te Tūtaki i tana whawhai ki te hara moped. I kī te tōpana e toru nga whara i muri i ngā whainga a ngā āpiha, engari kāore te katoa i takea mai i te hoapā takahanga. I kī te Tūtaki kua tohua e ia anō ngā tauira katoa ki te IOPC. Kua tautāwhi ngā āpiha matua i te whakamahinga o te hoapā takahanga, e kī ana e hiahiatia ana hei whakamutu i ngā whainga mōrearea, ā, kua āwhina ki te whakaiti i te hara moped i Rāwāhi neke atu i te tuatoru. Kua pūruatia hoki te nekeneke e te Pirimia o Ēnā Me, nāna i kī he urupare "pakari" e hiahiatia ana mai i ngā pirihimana ki tāna i whakaahua ai he raruraru nui o ngā tāngata e whakamahi ana i ngā mopeds hei mahi i ngā hara pēnei i te pēke me te hopu waea. Engari kua whakaarahia e Labour ngā māharahara mo te huarahi, e kī ana te hēkeretari kāinga kōruru o Diane Abbott he "tino mōrearea".

title: E whakaae ana a TSB ki ngā kiritaki e anga ana ki 'ngā take kōaro'
summary: Kua whakapārewa a TSB ki ngā kiritaki i tūpono ki te raruraru ki ā rātou pēke tuihono, pūkoro hoki i te mutunga wiki.
text: Kāore te pēke i kī e hia ngā kiritaki i pāngia, engari e 1.9 miriona e whakamahi ana i ana ratonga pūtea mamati. Kei te whakaora tonu a TSB i tētahi fiasco IT i Aperira, i te wā i mahue ai ngā kiritaki me te kore uru ki ngā ratonga pūtea tuihono mō ngā wiki maha. I kī te pēke kua hoki ōna pūnaha ki te pūnoa i te waenganui o te ata i te Mane. I tāpiritia e tētahi kaikōrero: "Kei te aroturuki tonu mātou i te āhuatanga, ā, ka whakahōu tonu mātou i ā mātou kiritaki." I muri i te tautiakitanga i whakaritea i te Paraire me te Hātarei, ka pūrongo ngā kaiwhakamahi TSB kei te raruraru rātou ki te uru ki ā rātou ratonga pēke i te Rātapu. Ka tūtohu te pēke i te ata Mane e anga ana ētahi kiritaki ki ngā raruraru. Tinana kiritaki Ko tēhea? i kī tēnei he "moto tūturu" ki ngā kiritaki i mau ki te pēke mai i te hinganga o Aperira. I takea mai te raruraru IT i Aperira i te hekenga o ngā raraunga kiritaki mai i tētahi pūnaha IT e whakahaeretia ana e Lloyds Banking Group, nāna te pēke, ki tētahi mea hōu e whakahaeretia ana e tōna rangatira Pāniora hou, o Sabadell. Ko Gareth Shaw, ko tēhea? Ka kī te tohunga moni: "Ka taea e ngā kiritaki te whai whaina, ngā whiu me ngā utu ina kore e taea e rātou te uru ki ā rātou pūtea, nā reira me tuku utu te pēke ki te hunga katoa e pāngia ana. " Mō ngā kiritaki TSB i te mutunga o ō rātou atamai ki te pēke - kāore anō kia ngāwari ake te wā ki te whakawhiti, ā, mā te Ratonga whakawhiti pūkete o nāianei ka kore e mamae te tukanga," tana tāpiri mai. I a Hōngongoi ka kī a TSB kua pau te utu o te whakarewatanga IT i te £176.4m, ā, ka panaia ki te ngaromanga hāwhe tau. I taua wā e kī ana mō te 26,000 ngā kiritaki i kati i tā rātou pūkete TSB i te koata tuarua o te tau, engari neke atu i te 20,000 ngā kiritaki i whakatuwhera i tētahi pūkete pēke hōu, i whakawhiti rānei i tā rātou pūkete ki TSB i taua wā kotahi. Tata ki te rima miriona ngā kiritaki o te pēke.

title: Ko te māngere a Steve McQueen ko Ngā Pouaru hei whakatuwhera i te Hākari Kiriata o Rāwāhi
summary: Ka whakatuwheratia e ngā pouaru, te urutaunga a Steve McQueen o ngā rangatū pouaka whakaata o te tau 1980 mō ngā wāhine pouri e huri ana ki te hara, te Hākari Kiriata BFI London o tēnei tau.
text: Nā te kaipānui o Neil SmithEntertainment, ko Viola Davis, ko Cynthia Erivo, ko Mīharo Rodriguez rāua ko Elizabeth Debicki e tākaro ana i ngā pouaru titular i roto i tētahi pikitia e whetū ana hoki ki a Liam Neeson rāua ko Daniel Kaluuya. Ko te rangatū pouaka whakaata taketake o UK, i tuhia e Lynda La Plante, i rere i runga i te ITV i te tau 1983. I kī a McQueen, ko te kaiwhakahaere o 12 Years a Slave, i "tino hari" a ia ki te whakatuwhera i te hākari i te 10 o Whiringahora. "He tino pānga ki a au te mātakitaki i te putanga pouaka whakaata UK o te māngere taketake a Lynda La Plante i a ia e taitamariki ana i ngā tau 80, nā reira he tino motuhake te tiritiri i tēnei pikitia ki tētahi hunga UK." I kī atu te tangata o Rānōna, e 50 tau, ki te AO e mātakitaki ana i te rangatū pouaka whakaata taketake i te 13 o ona tau, kua mahue i a ia "tētahi ariā nui". "I tētahi wāhi tīpoka ahau i roto i tōku oranga, ā, he tino whakahauhau, he whakaawe hoki te kite i ēnei pūāhua," tana kī mo nga tuawahine mahi o te whakaaturanga. "I whakaarotia ehara rātau i te tāngata e taea ana tētahi mea, a, i mahia e rātau. He tino pānga ki a au." I kī a McQueen kua puta ake i a ia te ariā e rima tau ki mua, engari i whakaaro ia he "tino noa iho" kia tae mai i tētahi wā e wera ana te whakaaturanga wahine me te ōritetanga o te ira tangata i Karaihe. Ka tae mai hoki ngā pouaru i te oho o te 8 o te Moana, he whakaara anō ā-wahine o te māngai 11 o te Moana e mōhiotia ana mō tōna huānga hopu whatu o ngā kaiwhakaari A-rārangi. "E kore rawa he wā kino mō ēnei momo pūrākau, i te wā e whakamere ana, e pupuri ana i te aro atu o te tangata," tana kī atu ki te HAU. "I tērā wā, he tino hira te hanga pikitia mō ngā wāhine kaha e haere mai ana ki mua." I kī te kaiwhakahaere he pai ki a ia te adrenaline i haere mai me te mahi i roto i te tūmomo kiriata hara, me ngā mahi me ngā pahūtanga katoa e pā ana. "Kei te pēnei koe i te tamaiti nui, e pupuhi ana i ngā mea," ka whakaae a ia i a ia e āwhina ana he kī taua huānga mahi i "honoa ki te pūrākau". 'I pīrangi noa ahau ki ngā kaitapere nunui' i kī hoki a McQueen he "tino pai te whārite" i waenganui i ngā pūmanawa e piki ake ana pēnei i a Erivo - i toa i tētahi whakawhiwhinga Tony i te tau 2016 mō te The Color Purple - me tētahi toa mata 87 tau pēnei i a Robert Duvall. "Kāore au i te māharahara mehemea i whakatūria rātou, kāore rānei - i hiahia noa ahau ki ngā kaitapere nunui," tana kī. "It's an ensemble, and they've all got to deliver." I tākaro a Ann Mitchell, Fiona Hendley, Maureen O'Farrell me Eva Mottley i ngā tūranga ārahi i roto i te rangatū pouaka whakaata, i kite ai i o rātau kiripuaki i tētahi tāhaetanga i whakaritea e a rātau tāne tōmuri. Ko te putanga hōu, i tuhia e McQueen me te kaituhi o Gone Girl me Sharp Objects o Gillian Flynn, ka nekehia te mahi mai i ngā tau kotahi mano e waru tekau mā iwa rau e waru tekau mā rua ki Haikaika o nāianei. Ka puta hoki a Hōnea Farrell, Robert Duvall me Jacki Weaver i roto i te pikitia, i whakaahuatia e te kaiwhakahaere toi o te hākari, a Tricia Tuttle, hei "āhuahira hei reka i runga i ngā mata whare pikitia nui rawa". "He pūrākau tino taunaki tēnei mai i tētahi kaihanga kiriata ātaahua, e tirotiro ana i ngā take huri noa i te iwi, te karaehe me te ira tangata, i a ia e tuku ana i ngā kāhua tino nui me ngā whakaongaonga koi," ka haere tonu a ia. Ko ngā pouaru te āhuahira tuawhā mai i McQueen, i toa i te whakawhiwhinga toi o Turner i te tau 1999. I whakahaeretia hoki e ia te Hiakai, mō te kaipatu hiakai o Bobby Sands, me te whakaari tūkino wahine Whakamā. I whai a ia i a rātau me te 12 Tau he Pononga, he whakaahuatanga mārō o te rota o tētahi kahunga o Amerika i toa i ngā Oscars e toru, tae atu ki te pikitia tino pai, i te tau 2014. Ka whakaatuhia tana kiriata hou i te 62nd London Film Festival, e haere ana mai i te 10 ki te 21 o Whiringahora. Whāia mātou i Facebook, i Twitter @BBCNewsEnts, i Instagram rānei i bbcnewsents. Mēnā he huatau pūrākau tāu, īmēra entertainment.news@bbc.co.uk.

title: He nui ake te tautoko a te kāwanatanga o UK mō te pūngao whakahou
summary: Ko te hurihanga tuatahi o ngā moni hou e hokona ana ki ngā kaiwhakarato pūngao whakahou, kua whakarewaina e te kāwanatanga o UK mā te £95m ki te £300m.
text: Ko te nuinga o ērā e hāngai ana ki ngā hangarau e tawhiti atu ana i te arumoni, tae atu ki te hau o waho, te hau me te hiko ngaru. Ka whakataetae ngā mīhini hau me te hiko kōmaru mō te £65m o tērā, ahakoa kei te whakahoki te Tari mō te Pūngao me te Huringa Āhuarangi i tana tautoko mō te kōmaru nui. Ka hokona te toenga o te £235m i roto i ngā 'kirimana mō te rerekētanga' - he utu mōkito mō ia hangarau. Kāore ngā pāmu hau i ngā moutere o Pākehā i whakaurua ki te hurihanga tuatahi o ngā hokonga, engari tērā pea kei ngā mea ā muri ake. E kitea ana ēnei he hē nā te utu o te tāuta i ngā taura ā-roto ki te mātiti tuawhenua. Kai te tatari tonu te pārekareka mo tēnā ki te whakaaetanga Āwhina Kāwanatanga mai i te Kōmihana o Ūropi. I kī te tinana umanga o Renewables Scotland me whakaroha anō e te kāwanatanga o UK ōna mahi kia whiwhi ai ngā taura motu i mua i te tohatoha tuarua a tērā tau. Ko te pūtea tāpiri hei tautoko i te pūnaha hōu o te whakawhāiti i te pūngao whakahou mā ngā pire kiritaki kua taea mā te pūnaha tawhito o te Herenga Whakahou e iti iho ana te utu i te mea e tūmanakohia ana. I kōrero a Ed Davey, te Hēkeretari Pūngao: "Kua tāruatia te toharite o te pūtea penapena ā-tau i roto i ngā whakahou mai i te 2010 - me tētahi pūkete e whati ana i te wāriu £8bn i te 2013. Mā te whakarite i ngā kaupapa e whakataetae ana mō te tautoko, kei te whakarite mātou ka whiwhi ngā kiritaki i te mahi tino pai rawa atu, tae atu ki tētahi wāhanga hiko haumaru, mā hoki." I waenganui i ngā huringa e whakaurua ana, he neke kaupapahere hei whakahauhau i ētahi atu umanga ki te tāuta pūtau kōmaru ki ngā tuanui o ngā whare, i muri i te pōturi o taua kōwhiringa. E hiahia ana te kāwanatanga kia ngāwari ake te neke i ngā pūtau kōmaru me ā rātou moni ina nekehia e aua umanga ngā kāinga.

title: Ko te māngai o Harry Potter kia whiwhi i te whakawhiwhinga Bafta tino pai
summary: Ka whiwhi ngā kiriata Harry Potter i tētahi koha Peretania tino pai ki te whakawhiwhinga whare pikitia i ngā tohu Bafta o tēnei tau, kua pānuitia e ngā kaiwhakahaere.
text: Ka whiwhi te kaituhi Potter i te whakawhiwhinga mō te māngai. Kua "miramiratia e nga pikitia te tohunga i roto i nga mahi mahi a Ingarangi me nga mahi hangarau", te kī a Bafta. Ka tū ngā Tohu Kiriata Bafta 2011 ki te Whare Opera Ariki o Rāwāhi i te 13 o Hui tanguru. I te tīmatanga o te tau 2001 me Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone, ko ngā kiriata e whitu i whakaputaina i tēnei wā, neke atu i te $5.4 billion puta noa i te ao. Ko tētahi wāhanga tuawaru me te whakamutunga, ko Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Wāhanga 2, ka tukua i a Hōngongoi. I kī te whetū o Potter, a Daniel Radcliffe, e 21, i "aroha ia ki ia meneti o te hanga i ēnei pikitia". "Ki a au ko ngā toa tūturu ko ngā kaimahi me te tīma nui o ngā kaimahi i taea ai te waru o rātou," ka haere tonu a ia. "He kawenata tēnei whakawhiwhinga ki a rātau mahi whakamīharo." I pāorotia ngā whakaaro o Radcliffe e te hoa whetū o Emma Watson, nāna i kī he "hōnore tino nui". "Kia nui te mihi ki a koe mō tēnei whakawhiwhinga whakamīharo," ko te tāpiri mai a Rupert Grint, e purei ana i a Ron Weasley e anga atu ana ki a Harry rāua ko Watson's Hermione Granger. I tēnei wā, e whitu ngā tautapa Oscar me ngā tautapa Bafta e 28 ngā whitiāhua Potter. Ka taurimatia e Honatana Rara ngā Tohu Kiriata Bafta o tēnei tau, kia pāohotia i runga i te BBC One.

title: 'E hiahia ana ahau ki te whakangungu i ētahi atu toa wai'
summary: Tērā pea ko te wai te 70% o te ao, engari mō te 783 miriona tāngata, ko te urunga ki te wai mā tētahi mea kāore i a rātou.
text: Ka mate pea te inu me te kaukau i roto i te wai paruparu, engari tērā ētahi kua whakatau ināianei ko te wā ki te whakamahi i ngā rongoā ngāwari hei huri i te āhuatanga. I Īnia, i toro atu a Matthew Wheeler rāua ko Priti Wāwāhi ki te "Tākuta Wai" rongonui o te whenua, i te kitenga o Zoe Flood he pēhea te āwhina a ngā kaimahi i Awherika ki te Rāwhiti ki te uru ki te wai mā. He karere ngāwari tā te Tākuta Wai, a Andhra Ppakikākā, Īnia Ayyappa Masagi: "E hiahia ana koe ki te wai? Karangatia ahau!" E hia mano. A, he maha nga wā e tangi ana tana waea i ia rā. Te āhua nei he putunga tūroro mutunga kore mo te tangata e karangatia ana ko te "Tākuta Wai" o Īnia. "I tūtaki ahau ki te nui o ngā raruraru wai i tōku tamarikitanga," tana kī. "I haere ahau i te 3am ki te tiki wai i te awa. Nā reira ka oati ahau kia tipu ake ahau ka kitea e au he rongoā. Nā reira i waiho e au taku mahi hei kaipūkaha pūkaha i te tau 2002 ki te whakatika i te raruraru wai o Īnia." Kai te mau tonu a Īnia i te mate wai kino. Tata ki te 330 miriona ngā tāngata e pāngia ana e te iti o te wai i muri i te rahunga o ngā timatanga e rua whakamutunga. He maroke nga puna. Kua mate nga kaiahuwhenua. E hia mano nga kōinga i pāngia e te tauraki kua huihui ki nga taone, e hiahia ana ki te wai, e inoi ana mo te marangai. E ai ki ngā tatauranga a Tēnā Masagi, mēnā e 30% noa iho o te wai marangai o Īnia i hopukina, i penapenatia hoki, "kotahi tau te marangai e tautoko ana i te iwi mo te toru tau." I te tau 2014 ka hokona e ia e ia e 84 eka whenua pakoko tata ki Chilamathur, he rohe tauraki rongonui o Andhra Ppakikākā, e 110km ki te raki o Bangalore. "He rite te hau i konei ki te hau ahi. I kī atu ahau ki ōku hoa, 'I roto i te kotahi tau ka meinga e au tēnei whenua hei peihana wai.'" I tēnei rā, e 25,000 ngā rua kirikiri me ngā roto hou e whā e hopu ana, e rokiroki ana i ngā wai marangai e taka ana ki konei. Kaore he pata e whakaaetia kia mawhiti ki roto i nga awa, a, ka rere atu ki te moana. Ka noho ki runga, ki te whenua, ka whakakīa te oneone ki te wai, ina hiahiatia, ka tāia mai i ngā poka pāpaku e rima. Na te oneone o te keri i nga roto i āwhina ki te whakataumata i te whenua, kua whakatōkia ki ngā rākau me ngā huawhenua. Tata ki te 60% o ngā rākau ka hanga ngahere kōpaka, ā, ko te 40% he rākau hua rākau hei whakaputa moni whiwhi. Kua whakatōkia hoki ngā kākano me ngā huawhenua, ā, a tērā tau ka whai miraka kau hoki i konei. Ko te kaupapa kia noho tēnei hei pāmu waro tautoko, e tino tika ana mō ōna hiahia wai katoa. Mā tōna Water Literacy Foundation, kei te whakangungu a Tēnā Masagi i ngā "toa wai" ki te hora i tana karere. Kua tuhia kētia e ia ngā pukapuka e whitu, ā, neke atu i te 100 ngā tauira mai i Īnia, i rāwāhi, tae atu ki Tiamana, Hapanihi, me te US. "Ki te kōrero noa iho koe, kāore he mea e puta. Me mahi koe i tētahi mea me te whakamātautau. Kai te haere mai nga kāwanatanga ki te tango i taku ratonga, ki te tārua i taku tauira. Ina huri te āhua o te hapori, ka rerekē o tātau āhuatanga tōrangapū, ka taea e tātau te tārua i tēnei ariā puta noa i te ao." Te Huri i ngā Ture Me pēhea te mahi a ngā kaimahi pāpori i ngā raruraru o te ao Pūrongo Motuhake: Te Huri i ngā Ture Jibu, Nansana, Uganda Ka tū ngā kaiwawao pākiki i tētahi tēneti i waho o te māngai o Belinda Nagawa i Nansana, i Kampala ki te inu kapu wai o Jibu, i tātaritia ki tētahi tipu rongoā wai iti arā atu anō i tāutatia ki te pae. "I te mahi tahi ahau me tētahi atu māngai hei kaiwhakahaere," te kī a te tau 21 tau. "Me nui ake taku whakauru kia noho ai ahau hei rangatira māngai." E whakamārama ana a Galen Welsch, te Tumuaki Whakahaere o te rōpū: "Ka haere mai ngā māngai ki a mātau, ā, ka haumi tahi rātou i tētahi utu raihana. " Kātahi mātou ka haumi ki te hanganga katoa o te māngai, arā, he rūma whakanao me tētahi wāhi hokohoko kitenga. I a rātau e hoko ana i te wai, ka utua e mātau ki a rātau mō ia rīta e hokona ana e rātau, ā, koia tērā e whakaora ai mātou i ngā whakapaunga pūtea i haumi ai mātau ki te whakarewatanga māngai." Ka ūkuia e te umanga ngā tāngata i kōhuatia i mua i a rātau wai inu, mā te tuku i tētahi whiringa utu, haumaru hoki e hangaia ana i te tauwāhi. He maha ngā rahi pounamu e rārangi ana i ngā whata o te toa hou o Belinda Nagawa - ka tohaina e Jibu he wai i roto i ngā pounamu ka taea te whakamahi anō e whakatakotoria ai e ngā kiritaki he moni iti iti. "Ko te nuinga o ngā tāngata e tango wai ana i te paipa, kātahi ka kōhuatia," te kī a Tēnā Welsch. "He tino tiketike te utu o te kōhua ina utu koe mō te waro, te korohū, te hiko rānei, ā, kāore te kōhua e tango i ētahi momo tāhae i roto i te wai." I whakamātauria e Jibu tōna tauira i Uganda, Rwanda me te Whenua Manapori o Kongo, engari mai i tērā wā ka mahi ki te whakarewa i Kenya i muri i te rahua o te kaihautū DR Kongo. "Kua haere mātou mai i ngā māngai e rua i tino taumahinga i te tīmatanga o te 2015 ki te 22 i tēnei rā, ā, tata ki te 15 ngā mātāmua me ngā mātāmua. He paipa ēnei mō ngā māngai hou," te kī a Tēnā Welsch. "Kei te hokona e ā mātou māngai tino pai neke atu i te 5,000 rīta i ia rā, ā, e whakaputa ana i ngā moni e $120,000-$140,000 (£83,000-£97,000) i te tau - ko te tawhē e mahi ana rātou ko te 20-30%." Ka mahi ngā mātāmua moroiti hei kaihoko, hei wāhi hoko rānei mō ngā māngai matua, ā, ka hoatu hoki ki ngā kaimahi me Jibu te wā ki te whakamātau i a rāua anō. "Ko te tangata e hiahia ana ki te mahi tahi me mātau me mātua whai wāhi e hoko wai ai te tauira mai i tētahi māngai tīariari, kātahi ka hokona anō i roto i tō rātou hapori," ko te whakamārama a Daphne Tashobya, te kaiwhakahaere matua o Jibu Uganda. "Kāore koe e mahi i te tātari wai i tēnei wā tonu - ka whakamātauria e koe mēnā kei te tino hiahia koe ki te umanga, ā, ka tīmata hoki koe ki te ako i ētahi mea ruarua pēnei i te pupuri i ō pukapuka."

title: Ka piki ake te utu o ngā kapua o Te Karapu mā te kati i ngā pātaka o Sam Club
summary: Kua whakaaturia e Te Wānanga ngā mahere hei kati i te 10% o ōna pātaka whānui o Sam's Club me te whakatakoto i ngā mano o ngā kaimahi.
text: I whakaaturia ngā katinga i te rā kotahi ka kī te kaihoko nui rawa o te ao ka tīmata ki te utu i ana kaimahi o Amerika i te $11 neke atu rānei i te haora, ā, ka hoatu ki ētahi o rātou he tāpiri moni kotahi. I kī a Wānanga ko te pikinga o te utu nā te whakatikatika tāke o Amerika, nāna i tapahi te mokatere rangatōpū mai i te 35% ki te 21% papatahi. Ka whiwhi ngā kaimahi utu haora i te utu teitei ake mai i tērā marama. Kei te kati a Walmart i te 63 o ōna pātaka 660 Sam's Club. I kī te Hēkeretari o te Pūtea o Amerika, a Whīni Mnuchin, ko te utu a Te Wānanga he tohu anō kei te whakahoki moni te pire tāke hōu o Amerika ki ngā kaimahi e ai ki te kī taurangi a te whakahaere. Heoi anō, i tētahi hui pānui i te Rāitema, ka ākiritia e Tēnā Mnuchin ngā pātai mo nga whakawāteatanga. "He maha ngā mea e haere ana i roto i te āhua o te whakahaerenga," tana kī. "E whakamanamana ana mātou ki ngā mahi a Walmart." I kī ngā Pāremata o Te Aotearoa, nāna i ātete i ngā huringa tāke, he whakamaumahara ngā katinga pātaka ka whai hua ngā pire tāke rangatōpū iti iho i "ngā kaipupuri rangatira, e waiho ana e ngā mano kaimahi e tū ana i roto i te mātao me te kore mahi." 'Arotakenga kōpaki' Pēnei i te moni-me-kawe i te UK, ko Sam's Club, e tapaina ana ki te kaiwhakarewa o Te Wānanga o Sam Walton, he kaihoko mematanga anake e hoko ana i ngā taonga nui ki ngā umanga iti me ngā kaihoko takitahi. Ka tae mai ngā katinga i ētahi marama i muri i te kīanga a ngā kaiwhakahaere e arotahi ana rātau ki te whakarewa i te pūteatanga i te parani. I kī rātau ka arotahi anō rātau i te umanga ki te ūnga i ngā whānau whai moni whiwhi i waenganui i te $75,000 me te $125,000. I te nuinga o te wā, neke atu i te 150 ngā tāngata e whakamahia ana e ia pātaka. I Illinois anake, e whitu ngā toa e katia ana, neke atu i te 1,000 ngā tāngata e anga ana ki ngā whakawāteatanga, e ai ki ngā whakamōhiotanga i whakaputaina e te kamupene ki te kāwanatanga. I kī te kamupene e 12 o ngā karapu pāngia ka tahuri ki ngā pokapū whakatutukitanga eCommerce. Sam's Club said that following "a thorough review of our existing portfolio, we've decided to close a series of clubs and better align our locations with our strategy". "Closing clubs is never easy and we're committed to working with impacted members and associates through this transition." I kī te utu a Doug McMillon, te rangatira nui o Te Wānanga, kei te aromatawai tonu te kaihoko i te pānga katoa o te tāke kaporeihana o raro. Heoi anō, ko te mea hou rawa i roto i tētahi rārangi o ngā kamupene nunui o Amerika kua kī taurangi kia tukuna atu ētahi o ngā painga o te tāke rangatōpū ki ngā kaimahi. Ko ētahi atu, tae atu ki Wells Fargo me AT&T, kua oati hoki i ngā utu utu, tāpiri rānei. I te Rāitema, ka pānuitia e Fiat Chrysler ka utua e ia tētahi tāpiri motuhake o te $2,000 ki ngā kaimahi e 60,000 i te US. I kī hoki ka nekehia te whakanaotanga o ana taraka tiki Ram mai i Mehiko ki Michigan i te tau 2020 e kī ana i whakahohetia "e te whakawhitinga o te ture whakahōu tāke a te U.S". I kī te kaihanga motokā ka tāpiritia e te neke e 2,500 ngā mahi hou o Amerika. Kua whakarewaina kētia e Te Wānanga tana utu mōkito ki te $9 i te haora i te tau 2015, ā, i te tau e whai ake nei ka tukuna he $1 ki te hunga i whakaoti i tētahi kaupapa whakangungu ā-roto. Mā te pikinga hou, ka utua ngā kaimahi ia haora i waenganui i te $11 me te $24.70 i te haora tīmata mai i tērā marama. Mā te pikinga e whakarewa te utu toharite ia haora i Te Wānanga mō ngā kaimahi wā katoa mai i te $13.85 ki te $14.50. Ka whiwhi ētahi kaimahi wā katoa, wā-wā hoki i Walmart i tētahi bonus tae atu ki te $1,000 i runga anō i te roanga o te ratonga. Those with 20 years of service will get the full $1,000. Ka pau te utu o ngā utu tāpiri ki te kamupene, he uara mākete tōna e $295bn, ā, he hua tau katoa e $13.6bn, he $400m te tapeke.

title: Ka tautohe a Rawiri Karauna kia tere ake mō te whakamohoa A14
summary: Kua oati te pirimia ki te āwhina ki te whakatere ake i ngā whakamohoa ki te A14, ā, "kāore i te tere te haere".
text: I kī atu a Rawiri Karauna ki te AO e mārama ana a ia ki ngā "pōhēhētanga" a te iwi mō te huarahi, e hono ana i te Tairāwhiti ki te M1 me te M6. I kī a ia kua waiho he moni hei whakapai ake i te huarahi, ā, i "tukua ki te kōmaka i ā mātou hiahia hanganga". Heoi anō, i kī a John Bridge i Cambridgeshire Chambers of Commerce i ana "kupu me pūrua ki te rawa". I whakakitea e te kāwanatanga i te tīmatanga o tēnei tau ngā mahere hei hanga i tētahi hipa tawhiti i waenganui i Kemipia me Huntingdon me te whakawhānui ake i ētahi atu wāhanga o te A14. Ko te bypass, kāore e taea te tīmata ki te hanga i mua i te 2018, e tūmanakohia ana kia utu i te £1.5bn, ka kī te Tari Waka, me tētahi atu £8m e tohaina ana hei whakawhānui ake i te huarahi i waenganui i Histon me Girton. 'Kāore he mōhiotanga' te kī a Tēnā Karauna: "He maha ngā wā i haere ai ahau i runga i te A14 i roto i tōku oranga. E mōhio ana ahau ki te āhua o te pōrearea o te tangata mo tēnei take. "Kua whakaritea he moni tā mātou ki te mahi i te A14 - ko te pōrearea kāore i te tere te haere, ā, ka mahia e mātou ngā mea katoa e taea ana e mātou ki te ngana ki te whakatere ake i ēnei mea. " Kei roto tātau i tēnei tauomaoma huri noa ki ētahi atu whenua - me whai hanganga karaehe tuatahi tātau." I kī a Tēnā Arawhiti, te rangatira nui o Cambridgeshire Chambers of Commerce: "Ko te take matua kāore he mōhiotanga. Kaore he tangata e tuku ana ki te whakaoti i te mahi. "It is always said the A14 is a number one priority, but it is the last road that gets any commitment or funding." I kī a Tēnā Arawhiti i "matekiri" nga ruma tauhokohoko kāore i whakahuatia ētahi atu taipitopito mō ngā whakamohoatanga ki te huarahi i roto i te Tauākī Ngahuru a te tumuaki. I tāpiri mai a ia: "Me pūrua ana kupu [a te pirimia] ki te rawa."

title: Ka rutu te uniana nama o Bradford i te raruraru nama me ngā moni 0%
summary: Kei te tukuna ngā moni huamoni kore huamoni ki ngā tāngata e pāngia ana e te mate coronavirus, i roto i tētahi kaupapa i hangaia hei pare i ngā tāngata ki ngā mangō taurewa.
text: Kua mahi tahi te Kotahitanga Nama o te Rohe o Bradford me te Kaunihera o Bradford ki te tuku i ngā tāngata kua whakawāteatia, e tatari ana rānei ki ngā painga he moni tārewa me te mōkī āwhina e £500. Ko te hunga e tika ana ka whiwhi i te £50 hei penapena ki te uniana nama, me te £450 hei whakapau moni me te 0% huamoni. Ka puta mai i waenganui i ngā whakatūpato mō ngā mōrea o te nui ake o te whakatārewa ture. Ētahi atu pūrākau mai i Aotearoa He uiui nō nā tata nei mai i tētahi Rōpū Paremata Rōpū Katoa (APPG) ki te whakatārewa me te nama i muri i te Covid i kitea e whakamahi ana ngā kairewa ture i ngā tikanga hōu hei ūnga i ngā tāngata, tae atu ki te whakamahi i te Snapchat me WhatsApp ki te whakapā atu ki ngā tāngata mōrearea. Catherine Williams from the England Illegal Money Lending Team, said: "One of the issues we have with loan sharks is that people think they are their friend, or a friend of a friend, or someone they think is helping them out. Kaore rātau i te mōhio he tangata hara tērā. "Nā te mea ka mahia mā te pāpāho pāpori, nā te āhua o te whakaaro o te tangata he rata, kāore te tangata e mōhio me whakamana koe ki te tuku moni pēnei." I kī a Ian Brewer, mai i te Kotahitanga Nama o te Rohe o Bradford: "E mōhio ana mātou kei te raruraru te tangata i te pūtea, ā, e hiahia ana rātou ki tētahi waewae iti. " E hiahiatia ana e rātau he iti noa iho te moni kia hoki mai ai rātau ki runga i o rātau waewae i a rātau e tatari ana kia puta mai ā rātou painga, kia tīmata rānei tā rātou mahi. Koia tērā te āputa tū e ngana ana mātou ki te whakatutuki." E ngana ana te uniana nama ki te ūnga i te hunga tino mōrearea i roto i te hapori mā te tuku mōhiohio mō ā rātou ratonga i roto i ngā pōkai ngohe whānau, e whakaratohia ana e te rōpū Artworks. Whāia a BBC Yorkshire i Facebook, Twitter me Instagram. Tukua ō whakaaro pūrākau ki te yorkslincs.news@bbc.co.uk, tukua rānei he ataata ki konei.

title: Ka mate a Donald Henderson i te 87 o ona tau
summary: I te 87 o ona tau, kua mate te tākuta me te tahumaero o Amerika, a Donald Henderson, nāna i ārahi i tētahi whakahau angitu ki te ūkui i te korokoro puta noa i te ao.
text: I karangatia hei "tino nui" i te papa hauora tūmatanui mo ana mahi i nga tau kotahi mano e ono tekau mā iwa rau e 70, ka mate a Henderson i te raruraru i muri i te whatinga o te hope. Ko tētahi o ngā mate tino mate o te ao, i mate ai te korokoro i ngā rau miriona tāngata i tērā rau tau anake. I tua atu i te mamae nui, i te nuinga o te wā ka pā mai he whara i runga i te kanohi me te tinana. A, kotahi i roto i te toru o ērā i whakapokea. I whakapuakina tikatia kua haepapatia i te tau 1980 - te mate urutā tuatahi i whawhaitia i runga i te tauine o te ao. 'I hurihia te ao kia pai ake' I whakatūria e te Whakahaere Hauora o te Ao a Henderson, e mōhiotia ana ko D.A, hei ārahi i tana puku ki te whakakore i te mate i te tau 1966. I taua wā he toitū tonu i Āwherika me Āhia. He torutoru noa iho i whai wāhi angitu ki a ia. Engari i arotahi a Henderson ki te wehe i ngā tīmatanga o te mate me te werohanga ā-pūnaha i ngā tāngata, ehara i te hōtaka werohanga maha. I muri i tana mahi mō te WHO, ka haere tonu a Henderson ki te mahi hei kaitohutohu pūtaiao me te kaitohutohu pūkoro ki ngā perehitini e toru o Amerika, me ētahi atu tūranga mātauranga, rongoā hoki. WHO global drive against smallpox 1966-1980 Source: World Health Organization Henderson "truly changed the world for the better," a tribute from Tom Inglesby, Director of the University of Pittsburgh Medical Center for Health Security said. " Nāna i ārahi te mahi ki te whakakore i te ao i te koropu. Ka tohutohu a ia ki nga perehitini. I whakahonoretia a ia e ngā whenua huri noa i te aorangi. I hurihia e ia te āhua o te whakaako a ngā kura hauora tūmatanui i te whakatupuranga e whai ake nei. "With all of that, he still took the time to be a mentor to tini young people, and was a great friend. He tino kore e taea te whakakapi i a ia, ā, ka mihi ahau ki a ia."

title: E ārahi ana a Perehitini Pakihi i ngā takoha a Donna Summer
summary: Kua uru atu a Perehitini Pakihi ki te tini o ngā māramatanga whakaaturanga ki te takoha ki a Donna Summer, i muri i te matenga o te whetū kōpae i te 63 o ona tau.
text: "He kore e warewaretia tōna reo," te kī a te kaiārahi o Amerika. "Kua ngaro wawe rawa te poutohu o te umanga pūoro." I kī te kaiwaiata o Barbra Streisand, nāna i takirua ki te Raumati i te tau 1979 No More Tears (Enough Is Enough), i kī a ia i "ohorere" ki te rongo i tōna pahemotanga. Kua whakanuia hoki e Dolly Parton, Dionne Warwick me Tā Elton John. Ko te raumati, ko ōna pūkete taunga ko I Feel Love, Love To Love You Baby me State of Independence, e mōhiotia ana kua whawhai ki te mate pukupuku pūkahukahu. I roto i tētahi kōrero i whakaputaina i te Rāitema, ka kī tōna whānau e "rangimārie ana rātau ki te whakanui i tōna oranga whakaharahara me tōna tawhito haere tonu". I te Hollywood Walk of Fame i Los Angeles, ka huihui ngā kaihautū ki te whakatakoto putiputi hei takoha ki tōna oranga me tōna mahi. I whānau a LaDonna Adrian Gaines i Boston i te tau 1948, ka tīmata a Summer ki te waiata i roto i te whare karakia, i mua i te aroaro o ngā pēne me te puta i roto i ngā pūoro atamira, i te kāinga, i rāwāhi rānei. "Kaore he pātai ka waiata ahau, i mōhio tonu ahau," tana kī i te tau 1989. "I whai hua ahau i tōku takiwā. Ka tukuna mai e te tangata he moni ki a au, ka kī mai kia whakahokia mai ina rongonuitia ahau." Nā te mahi hei kaiwaiata wātū i whakapā atu ai ia ki ngā kaiwhakanao o Giorgio Moroder rāua ko Pete Bellotte, nāna ia i whakatū hei tētahi o ngā mahi nui rawa o ngā tau kotahi mano e whitu tekau mā rua. I kī atu a Moroder ki a BBC Radio 5 live ka maumaharatia ia "mō tōna reo me tōna pūmanawa whakamīharo" ā, ko tana waiata I Feel Love "ko te tīmatanga o te kanikani hiko". "Kāore au e whakapono kua ngaro i a mātau tētahi atu kaiwaiata tino pai," ko te tuhituhi a Parton i runga i tana paetukutuku, e whakarite ana i te putanga o Raumati ki te matenga o te kaiwaiata o Whitney Houston. "Ko ia te kuini disco, a, ka noho tonu. I mōhio ahau ki a ia, a, i kitea ko ia tētahi o ngā tāngata tino pai, ngahau hoki." I runga i te Twitter, ka kī te kaiwaiata R&B a Mary J Blige ko Raumati he "tino pūhuri kēmu". I tēnei wā, ka kī te kaiwhakanao o Quincy Jones ko tōna reo "ko te manawa me te whakaaturanga o te tekau tau". I mihi atu te whetū pahū o Kiriata Minogue ki a ia hei "tētahi o aku whakaaro puoro tuatahi", i te kī a Tā Elton John "he pai te tangi o ana pūkete i tēnei rā". "RIP Donna Summer, Queen of Disco!" ki te kaiwaiata tūtohi, ko Rihanna, ko ngā whakaaro i pāorotia e Mīharo Williams rāua ko Kelly Rowland o Destiny's Child. "Ata! Poutohu! Tōna reo! Ko tōna wairua!" ko te tuhituhi a Rowland. "Kia okioki i runga i te rangimārie, i tino whakaaweawe koe i ahau." I roto i tana ake kōrero, ka kī a Dionne Warwick i pouri a ia ki te ngaro i tētahi "hoa aroha". "E haere ana tōku ngākau ki tana tāne me ana tamariki," ka haere tonu a ia. I noho a Summer i Naples, Florida me tana tāne ko Bruce Sudano. E ora ana a ia e a rāua tamāhine ko Brooklyn rāua ko Amanda, ā, ko Mimi, tana tamāhine mai i tana mārena tuatahi.

title: Ka pōti ngā kaiārahi kaunihera o Barnsley me Doncaster ki te mana whakahaere o South Yorkshire
summary: Te āhua nei kua mate te mahi mana whakahaere a South Yorkshire i roto i te wai i muri i te pōti a te rua o ngā kaunihera e whā ki te kaupapa.
text: E kī ana ngā kaiārahi o ngā kaunihera o Barnsley me Doncaster "kua kore e taea" te mahi, ā, e hiahia ana rātau ki te whai i tētahi mahi whānui o Aotearoa. I hainatia tētahi whakaaetanga ā-ture ki te tuku hiko ki Te Tonga o Aotearoa i te tau 2015. E kī ana te kāwanatanga e kore e whakaaro ki tētahi mahi e "tapahi atu, e wetewete rānei" i taua whakaaetanga Ētahi atu pūrākau mai i tua atu i Aotearoa i raro i te whakaritenga kua marohitia, ka whakahaere tētahi rangatira o Te Tonga o Aotearoa ki te whakahaere i ngā tahua waka me te whakarite rautaki, ā, ka uru ki te £30m i te tau mō te 30 tau. I whakatangihia te knell mate i tētahi hui i waenganui i ngā mana whakahaere e whā o Labour me ētahi atu mema o te Mana Paheko o te Rohe o Te Taone o Te Taone i Rotherham. I tautohe te kaiārahi o te Kaunihera Taone o Sheffield, a Julie Dore, ko te tikanga o tētahi mahi atu i te mahi a South Yorkshire, ko te tikanga ka "waimeha" ngā mana mō te rohe. I kī a Pirihi Pānui, te kaiārahi o te Kaunihera o Rotherham, he "kawenga" tā ngā mana e whā kia kite i te mahi i hainatia i te tau 2015. Heoi anō, i kī a Tā Steve Houghton, te kaiārahi o te Kaunihera o Barnsley, "kua kore e taea te mahi rohe o te taone" ā, ināianei ko tana whāinga ki te whakatūpato i te Hēkeretari Hapori o Stuad Javid ki ngā painga o tētahi mahi whānui ake. I kī a ia he iti rawa te mahi a Te Tonga o Aotearoa, ā, kāore e ōrite te pūtea me te pānga tōrangapū ki tētahi mahi whānui ake. I a ia e kōrero ana i muri i te hui, ka kī a Ros Jones, te Koromatua o Doncaster: "Kei konei ahau ki te tiki i te mahi tino pai mō Doncaster, ā, ka pai ake te tapuwae whānui rawa atu i ngā mana e whā o Te Tonga o Aotearoa." Ahakoa te whakawhāititanga, kua whakaritea he pōti rangatira kia tū i Me 2018 me te kāwanatanga e kī ana "kāore he whakaaro ki te wete i te ture" mō. Tātaritanga nā Hemi Wēneti, te kaiwhakatika tōrangapū o TE Titiro ki te Raki E hiahia ana tētahi tangata ki te kōwhiri i tētahi rangatira kāore he mana? Kāore? Ka aha mēnā ka kī atu ahau ki a koe ka nui ake i te £1m te utu? Kāore tonu? Koia tātau i South Yorkshire i tēnei wā. Ko te hui o tēnei rā he mutunga tere ki te ariā roa tērā pea ka whakaae a Sheffield, Doncaster, Barnsley me Rotherham ki a rāua anō. Kaore he moni, he mana rānei e mahue ana i a mātau, ā, tērā pea he rangatira i pōtitia ka noho hei hūtu anō i roto i te rūma. E kī ana a Doncaster rāua ko Barnsley i ta rāua whakatau kia whakamutua tētahi mahi mana whakahaere ki te Tonga me te rapu i tētahi mea whānui ake o Aotearoa, ehara i te tūpono. Engari ki te kī te kāwanatanga e kore noa iho e puta, ka āhua tāpae te tūponotanga ki a rātau. I a Aotearoa, e 17 nga kaunihera, tae atu ki a Barnsley me Doncaster, i kī e hiahia ana rātau ki te whai i te mahi paraihe. I te Paraire, ka tukuna e Tēnā Javid he reta ki ngā kaiārahi o ngā kaunihera katoa i Aotearoa, e kī ana: "Kāore mātou i te rite i tēnei wā ki te whakaaro i tētahi atu tono mahi e tapahi ana, e wetewete rānei i taua mahi a te Rohe o Sheffield City. " Kua whakamanatia kētia e te Pāremata, me te whakaaetanga a ngā kaunihera e whā, ki te whakatinana i ngā huānga matua o te mahi a te Rohe Taone o Sheffield, engari mō tētahi pōti rangatira i Me 2018. "Kāore he whakaaro o te kāwanatanga ki te rapu i ētahi atu ture hei wete i ngā mea kua whakaritea kētia i runga i te mahi." I muri i te hui, ka tāruatia e tētahi Tari Hapori me te Kāwanatanga Paetata ngā kōrero a Tēnā Javid, kātahi anō ka "tino whakakino i te mea kua wehe atu ngā kaunihera o Aotearoa ki te Tonga i ta rātau mahi whakahaere".

title: E rapu ana ngā pirihimana i te tuakiri o te tangata ngaro i patua e whakawhiti ana i te M1
summary: Kua tukua tētahi ī-whakauru o tētahi tangata i mate i muri i tana patua e ngā waka maha i a ia e ngana ana ki te whakawhiti i te M1 ki te whakamātau ki te tāutu i a ia.
text: I patua taua tangata i a ia e ngana ana ki te whakawhiti i te huarahi i Crick, Northamptonshire, i Whiringa ā Rangi. Ahakoa he maha ngā uiui, tae atu ki te whakawhitiwhiti i tōna DNA me ōna tapukara i te ao whānui, kāore anō ia kia kitea. E tūmanako ana ngā Pirihimana o Northamptonshire ka ārahi te e-fit ki te mōhio ki a ia. I hangaia i te Whare Wānanga o Liverpool John Moores. I pā mai te tūtukitanga i te 29 o Whiringa 2019 i te wā e ngana ana te tangata ki te whakawhiti i te huarahi M1 ki te raki i te komititanga 18. I mate a ia i te tirohanga i muri i te tūtukitanga o nga waka maha. E whakaahuatia ana te tangata i tōna taiohitanga, i te 20 tau rānei, tata ki te 5ft 1in, he makawe pango me ngā whatu parauri. He iti noa iho ōna makawe kanohi, ā, te āhua nei he wero tawhito i tōna pukupuku taringa mauī. E rua hoki ōna riu ngoikore, tata ki te 1.5cm me te 3cm te roa, i muri o tōna ringa mauī o raro. I te wā o tōna matenga, e mau ana taua tangata i tētahi tihi pango, ringa roa kua tohua ki ngā kupu "The Urban Club, Bronx", he peke pango me te kiwikiwi me te tarau pango. I a ia e mau ana i tētahi pūwhakahiko waea mono Ūropi, ētahi hōro me tētahi waea pūkoro Samsung me tētahi kāri sim Orange France i roto.

title: Ka rāhuitia ngā waka diesel me ngā waka penehīni hōu mai i te 2040 i UK
summary: Ka rāhuitia ngā motokā diesel me ngā waka penehīni hōu i te UK mai i te tau 2040 i roto i tētahi tono kia rutu i te pokenga o te hau, kua pānuitia e te kāwanatanga.
text: Kua whakakitea hoki e ngā minita tētahi pūtea £255m hei āwhina i ngā kaunihera ki te rutu i te kohukohu, tae atu ki te kaha ki te whakahiko i ngā rohe whakahiko mō ngā waka paruparu. Engari kāore i roto i te rautaki hau mā e £3bn tētahi aronui maka, e karanga ana i ngā mea o mua he "uara rawakore" mō te moni. I pōhiritia e ngā kaiārahi kāwanatanga ā rohe te pūtea, engari i karangatia ētahi atu taipitopito. Ka hoatu ki ngā mana ā-rohe te tautoko pūtea hāngai mai i te kāwanatanga, me te £40m o te pūtea e mahia ana ināianei tonu. Ka taea e rātou te whakamahi i ngā moni mō ngā mehua maha, pēnei i te huri i ngā tahora huarahi, te whakatinana i ngā hangarau hōu, te whakahauhau rānei i ngā tangata ki runga i ngā waka tūmatanui. Ki te kore aua ine e tapahi i te kohukohu, ko ngā rohe whakahiko pea te hipanga panuku - engari e kī ana te kāwanatanga me whakamahi anake ēnei mō "ngā wā whāiti". Kua tapahia te wātaka mō ngā kaunihera ki ngā mahere tuatahi mai i te 18 marama ki te waru, me te Tari Taiao, Ahuwhenua me ngā Take Ā-Taiwhenua (Defra) e hiahia ana ki te "wero i ētahi atu ohorere" ki roto i te tukanga. E whai ana i te kāwanatanga e hoatu ana ki tōna ake rā kati o te 31 o Hōngongoi i muri i te kīanga a ngā kaiwhakawā o te Kōti Tiketike kāore i tutuki i ngā tepe poke EU. Other points include: Local Government Association environment spokesman Martin Tett said the plans to allow councils to switch their focus from monitoring air quality to improving air quality was the right move and welcomed the additional funding. Heoi anō, i ātete a ia ki te tirohanga a te kāwanatanga kia puritia i runga i tētahi aronui maka, e kī ana "mā tēnei raweke wawe e āwhina ki te whakanui ake i te tangohanga o ngā waka harakoa o raro iho". Kua tūpato ngā Minita mahi ki te kitea ki te "whiu" i ngā atekōkiri o ngā motokā diesel, ā, e tautohe ana rātau, i hokona ngā waka i muri i te whakahauhau a te kāwanatanga Mahi whakamutunga nā te mea he iti iho te kohu waro. I kī te tinana hokohoko umanga, te Rōpū Kaiwhakanao Mīhini me ngā Kaihokohoko, he mea nui te karo i ngā rāhuitanga hāngai i runga i ngā tīni, e whara ai te wāhanga. I kī te rangatira nui o SMMT, a Maika Hawes, kei te tipu haere te tono mō ngā waka hinu kē, engari kei te tino iti tonu te taumata. "E hiahia kē ana te umanga ki tētahi huarahi tōrunga e tuku tohutohu ai i ngā kiritaki ki te hoko i ēnei motokā. Ka taea e mātou te tukituki i te wāhanga waka angitu o UK ki te kore e whakaaetia e mātou te wā nui kia whakaritea e te umanga." I kī te AA e hiahiatia ana he pūtea penapena nui hei tāuta i ngā pūwāhi whakahiko puta noa i te whenua, ā, ka whakatūpato i te Mātiti ā-Motu ka puta mai i raro i te pēhanga me te whakakā maha o te whakahiko anō i muri i te haora ohorere. Ka puta mai te pānuitanga o UK i waenganui i ngā tohu o tētahi neke whakatere ki ngā motokā hiko, kaua ki ngā mea penehīni me ngā diesel, i te kāinga, i rāwāhi rānei: Tātaritanga nā Roger Harrabin, kaitātari taiao o TE AO Me pēhea te horoi i te hau? Kua whakakāhoretia e te Pūtea Moni ngā mahere mō tētahi aronui maka diesel mō ngā waka tawhito. Tērā pea ka whakaarohia anōtia i te ngahuru. Kua kī atu te kāwanatanga ki ngā kaunihera kia whakatika i te pokenga i runga i o rātau ake tiriti mā te whakapai ake i ngā waka tūmatanui me te whakaaro i ngā rāhuitanga i runga i ngā waka diesel paruparu i ngā wā tihi. Ki te kore tēnā e mahi, ka kīia ngā kaunihera kia whakahaua ngā atekōkiri diesel kia haere mai ki ngā taone. Kāore ngā kaunihera i te hari ki te tango i te rap mo te kaupapa tautohetohe i te wā i whakahauhautia e te kāwanatanga te hokonga o ngā waka diesel i te wāhi tuatahi. Kāore te mahere kāwanatanga o tēnei rā i te whānui - kāore e kōrero ana i te pokenga o te hanganga, te pāmu me ngā paera korohū. E kī ana hoki ngā kaiwhakahauhau hau mā e whakamahi ana te kāwanatanga i te pānuitanga o ngā motokā hiko 2040 hei nekeneke i ngā hinganga i roto i tana kaupapahere poke mo te wā poto. Pānuitia ētahi atu tātaritanga mai i te pokenga o Roger Air e whakaarotia ana e honoa ana ki te 40,000 mate moata i te tau i te UK, ā, ka āwhina hoki te kawenga ki te kohu kohu kati kati. I kī tētahi kōrero kāwanatanga ko te kounga o te hau kino ko "te mōrea taiao nui rawa" ki te hauora tūmatanui i te UK. 2020s whakawhiti Ko ngā mehua he "pai" i te wā roa, engari "kāore i te tino pai" i te poto, te kī a te tohunga umanga a David Bailey. Tērā pea ka tae mai he whakawhiti ki ngā motokā hiko i te waenganui o ngā tau 2020, i matapaetia e ia, ina whakataetae ngā motokā hiko i ngā mea penehīni me ngā mea diesel i runga i ngā take pēnei i te utu. "Mā tēnei e tautuhi he aronga tino mārama o te haere, engari kāore e tīariari ngā motokā penehīni me ngā motokā diesel i te tau 2040," tana kī. I kī a ia he nui ake ngā tohutohu e hiahiatia ana ināianei, ki te kore e pai ake te kounga o te hau taone. I pōhiritia e te umanga ture taiao o ClientEarth ngā ine, engari i kī e hiahia ana ki te kite i ētahi atu taipitopito. I kī te rangatira nui o Hemi Thornton i kitea e te ture me whakaheke e ngā minita ngā taumata pokenga o te hau i te wā tata nei. I pōhiritia e te Rōpū Kākāriki MP o Caroline Lucas tētahi āraitanga, engari i kī kāore i haere "tata rawa, tere rānei". I kī ngā Hoa o te Ao he nekehanga "pōhēhē" te kaupapa, nāna i tuku te moni whakaora ki ngā mana ā rohe. I kī a Labour e mahi ana te kāwanatanga i muri noa iho i te maunga ki te kōti. I kī te kaikōrero Taiao, Kai me ngā Take Ā-Taiwhenua, a Sue Hayman MP he āhuatanga "mārire" tā te kāwanatanga ki te whakawātea i ngā rohe hau, ā, i te whakararuraru i te raruraru ki ngā mana ā rohe. "E tata ana ki te 40 miriona ngā tāngata e noho ana i ngā wāhi whai taumata pokenga hau kore mana, e hiahiatia ana he mahi ināianei, kaua i roto i te 23 tau," tana kī.

title: Ko te tupunga o UK 'kia pōturi i te whakataurite anō o te whakahaerenga'
summary: Ka kitea e te whakahaerenga o UK e toru tau o te "tupu pōturi" i te mea ka nui ake te whakawhirinaki ki te hokohoko, ā, he iti iho te hokohoko kaihoko, e kī ana tētahi kura whakaaro.
text: I kī te Karapu Tūemi EY whai mana i te nui ake o te utunga o te utunga i takea mai i te pauna ngoikore ka hua te tupunga GDP o te 1.3% i te 2017 me te 1% noa iho a tērā tau. Engari i kī te pikinga o te tono kaweake ka āhua wāhikē tēnei. Kua kitea e tētahi uiuinga motuhake te tūmanako i te wāhanga o ngā ratonga pūtea ki tōna taumata iti rawa mai i te tūtukitanga o te tau 2008. Kua hinga a Sterling i te 17% ki te tāra mai i te wā i pōti ai te UK ki te waiho i te Uniana o Ūropi i tērā Pipiri, e whakanui ana i ngā utu kawemai me te pana i ngā utu toa. I roto i tana tohu hou rawa, ka kī te EY Item Club e tūmanako ana kia piki te utunga ki te 3.1% i te hauwhā whakamutunga o te 2017 i mua i te whakaiti anō ki te 2% i te mutunga o te 2018. I runga ake i tēnei, e kī ana tērā pea ka piki te kore mahi mai i te 4.8% i te hauwhā whakamutunga o tērā tau ki neke atu i te 6% i te mutunga o te 2018. "[E tūmanakohia ana ēnei take] kia whai pānga patoto ki te hokohoko kaihoko, i te mea kua whakakinotia te tupunga o ngā moni whiwhinga ka taea te wātea," te kī a te kura whakaaro. Engari i kī hoki te kōwhiringa he "pauna ngoikore me te mākete kāinga ngohengohe ake" tērā pea ka whakahauhau i ngā taumata teitei ake o ngā kawenga ake o UK, i te wā e rapu ana ngā umanga i ngā wāhi moni ki rāwāhi. E tūmanako ana kia nui ake ngā kawenga ake mā te 3.3% i tēnei tau me te 5.2% i te 2018. I kī a Pita Spencer, te kaitohutohu ohaoha matua ki te EY Item Club, ko te hinganga o te sterling i muri i te pōti o Te Pākehā i tohu "he neke pūmau" i roto i te uara taketake o te moni. "E mōhio ana mātou ka kuru i te hokohoko kaihoko, ka kite mātou i tētahi whakahekenga mārō i roto i ngā hokohoko hokohoko me ngā tohu pēnei i tēnei tau," tana kī atu ki te HAU. Heoi anō, i kī hoki a ia ka tukuna he "tohutohu pūmau ki ngā kaiwhakangao kia haere ki waho, kia toa i ngā kiritaki hōu [ki rāwāhi], me te hanga i te kaha me te tohungatanga". "Ko te āhua uaua e puta mai ana i te whiwhi kaweake ki te tiki ake i te tārewa i mahue i te hinganga o te hokohoko kaihoko," tana kī. I kī a ia me whakarewa e te pauna ngoikore ngā kawenga ake i te wā tata nei, engari ko te "hokohoko me te tupu i te 2019 me tua atu" ka whakatauria e ngā ture o te putanga o Ingarangi ki te EU. Ki te kore ngā kawenga ake i piki ake, ka taea e te UK te "mau i roto i tētahi mahi tupu pōturi", ka tāpiritia e ia. I kitea e tētahi uiuinga PwC te tūmanako i waenganui i ngā whare ratonga pūtea o Ingarangi mo te whā o nga koata whai muri i a Hakihe. I kitea e te tohutohu, nāna i tirotiro e 103 ngā kamupene ratonga pūtea mō te Confederation of British Industry (CD), ko te 2016 te tau "tino pouri" mō te wāhanga mai i te tau 2008. I tino kino ngā pēke, me te 90% e kī ana ko te whakarite mō te pānga o Te Pākehā ko tā rātou uaua nui rawa. He tokomaha kua tohu kei te mahi rātau i ngā mahere hei mahi i tētahi putanga "uaua" i te EU, i muri i te kīanga a te Pirimia o Ēnā Me ka wehe atu a Ingarangi i te mākete kotahi. E rua o ngā pēke nui rawa e mahi ana i Rāwāhi - HSBC me UBS - i kī i tērā wiki e whakaaro ana rātau ki te neke i ngā mahi e hia mano ki rāwāhi.

title: Ka kumea e Chester Zoo te pūkete 2m manuhiri i te tau i muri i te mura
summary: Kotahi tau i muri mai i te pānga o te mura nui, he maha nga manuhiri o Chester Zoo.
text: Ko te kararehe - kē te tino pai o te UK - i tāia e rua miriona ngā manuhiri i roto i te tau mo te wā tuatahi, ka kī tētahi kaikōrero. Ko te wāhanga o te Ngahere Timatanga, e noho ana i ngā kararehe o Āhia ki te Tonga-Rāwhiti, ka whakatuwhera anō i te tau 2020 i muri i te mura o Hakihea 2018. I kī te rangatira nui o Mark Pilgrim he "tino nui ngā manuhiri ki a mātau mahi ki te pare i te ngaro o ngā kararehe i te ao whānui". "He tino nui kia nui ake ngā tāngata e noho ana me te pānui wawe i ngā tuma e anga ana ki ngā kararehe me te awhi katoa i ngā huarahi rerekē e taea ai e rātou te āwhina ki te whakarerekē," tana whakamārama. I tērā Hakihea, ka mate ētahi kararehe i roto i te ahi, nā te hapa hiko. Neke atu i te 20,000 ngā kararehe o te kararehe mai i ngā momo rerekē e 500, ā, ko ia te wāhi utu tino toroa o te whenua i waho o Rāwāhi. I te marama o Mahuru, i whakaaetia e te Kaunihera o Cheshire West me Chester te mahere a te kararehe mo tana whanaketanga o Grasslands, e whakatuwhera ana me nga whare noho "tupato" e 28, 14 "teneti mārō" me te wharekai i te tau 2022.

title: E rima ngā huarahi i rerekē ai te whenua o Ingarangi i roto i te 10 tau
summary: He nui ake te hanganga o Ingarangi i tētahi atu wā, e 44,8 miriona ngā whare i te mutunga o te tekau tau, mai i te 40,6 miriona i te tau 2010.
text: Nā Daniel DunfordBBC Data Journalist Engari ko tēnei tapeke e 1.4% noa iho o te whenua o Ingarangi, i whakaritea ki te 40% e hipa ana i te ngahere, te taiao māori, ngā awa me ngā roto, me tētahi atu 45% e te whenua ahuwhenua. I puta mai ngā raraunga i te tirohanga whenua nui rawa o tōna momo e te Ordnance Survey (OS), kāore e kapi ana i Aiarangi ki te Raki. Kua huihuia e mātou ētahi pikitia i mua, i muri hoki e whakaatu ana i ētahi o ngā nekehanga nui i roto i ngā tekau tau kua taha, e mōhiotia ana e ngā kaitirotiro OS. 1. Hiko whakahou Ki te kore koe e kite i te rēreti, pāwhiri ki konei. Na te tupunga o te umanga pūngao whakahou i nui ake ai te hanganga. Ināianei ko te hiko hau e pūkete ana mō te kotahi-rima o te katoa o te whakamahinga hiko i te UK, i whakaritea ki te 2% noa iho i te 2009, e ai ki te Tari Pakihi, Pūngao me te Rautaki Mahi. I pūketetia te pūngao kōmaru mō te 3.9% i te 2018, mai i te 0.01% i te 2010. Ko tētahi wāhanga o tēnā he mihi ki ngā paepae kōmaru e 160,000 i whakatakotoria i te tau 2015 ki runga i ngā taunga o RAF Lyneham i Wiltshire. Ināianei ko te pāmu kōmaru nui rawa atu i te UK, me te kaha ki te whakahiko i ngā kāinga paetata e 10,000 me tētahi kāreti whakangungu hōia i runga i te pae. 2. Ngā āhuatanga ā-ao I te tīmatanga o te tekau tau, kātahi anō ka tīmata te Papa Orimipia ki te hanga i Stratford, ki te rāwhiti o Rānana, i mua i ngā Kēmu 2012. Tekau tau i muri mai, ko te Taiwhanga Orimipia ināianei te whenua kāinga o West Ham FC, ko te Pokapū Aquatics he puna tūmatanui, ā, ko te pae katoa ināianei ko te Papa Orimipia o Kuini Irihapeti. Ko tētahi atu āhuatanga huri noa mai i ngā tau 2010 ko te wāhanga Harry Potter o te Warner Bros Studio Tour i Watford. I whakatuwheratia tuatahitia i te tau 2012 engari mai i tērā wā ka whakawhānuitia. Ko te taipitopito e whakaaturia ana i runga i te mahere OS ko te nuinga o te wā ki a Tom Watts, he kairuri whenua e kapi ana i te rohe. I whakapati a ia i te haumarutanga o Te Wānanga kia tukua ia ki roto ki te ine i ia whare hou, ā, i te mutunga ka utua ia ki tētahi haereere. I ia wā ka kitea e ngā tīma rangahau whenua me ngā tīma rangahau ā-rangi tētahi ahanoa ōkiko hōu, ka kite i tētahi kua huri, kua kore rānei i reira, ka hurihia e rātou te mahere. Neke atu i te 360 miriona ngā huringa mai i te tau 2010. Ka taea tēnei te māheahea pēnei i te ara e mauria ana, i tētahi kāri o mua rānei e paheke ana, he mea nui kia tuhia mō ngā mea pēnei i te whakamahere waipuke. I whakaahuatia e te upoko pāpāho o OS a Robert Andrews ngā kaitirotiro whenua pēnei i a Tēnā Watts hei "titiro ki te ao pēnei i a Keanu Reeves i roto i te Matrix - ka kite rātou i ngā raina me ngā ānau e kite ai mātou i ngā huarahi, ngā whare me ngā whenua". Ka pahekotia tēnei aro atu ki ngā taipitopito ki te mōhiotanga paetata me te whakapā atu ki ngā mana whakarite, engari ka āwhinatia hoki ngā tīma whenua - ina whakaaetia e te huarere - e ngā drones me ngā rererangi OS e rua. Ka tahitahi whakamuri rātau pēnei i te mīhini pātītī puta noa i ngā wāhi ūnga, kia ora e mau ana i ngā whakaahua hi-res. Kātahi ka tuituia ēnei, ka tātaritia e te mōhiohio horihori kia ngana ki te kite i ngā mea kua rerekē mai i te uiuinga o mua. E kitea ana hoki ngā nekehanga hangarau i roto i ngā mea e whakamahia ana ngā raraunga OS. I te tau 1791 ka whakatūria rātau ki tētahi mahi tuatahi o te whakamahere i te takutai ki te tonga ki te whakaekea e Wīwī. Neke atu i te rua rau tau i muri iho, ka whakamahia ō rātou raraunga i ngā taupānga katoa i tō waea atamai, ā, kei te mahi rātou ki te whakamahere i ngā tauwāhi pū o ngā pou rama kia taea ai e rātou te taurima pūoko mō ngā motokā taraiwa whaiaro. 3. Ngā huarahi hōu Ahakoa kāore anō kia rite mō ngā motokā taraiwa whaiaro, ināianei e 4,000 km māra o te huarahi i Ingarangi, he pikinga tata ki te 10% mai i te tau 2010. He nui ake ngā huarahi i hangaia i ia wāhi o Ingarangi. Mr Andrews said the mapping of new roads and buildings was "like painting the Forth Bridge - as soon as you've finished surveying an area you need to start it again". Ko te whakaahua ātaahua i tōna take ko tētahi o ngā huarahi hou tino mīharo i roto i ngā tekau tau kua taha: ko te Queensferry Crossing i whakatūria i te tau 2017, i te taha o ngā Arawhiti rongonui o Forth e hono ana i Etinitini ki te raki-rāwhiti o Pākehā. 4. Ko ngā taone hou Ko te Whare tētahi o ngā wāhi kōrero tōrangapū tino nui o ngā tau e 10 kua taha, ā, i whakamutua e Gordon Brown te tekau tau kua hipa e kī ana e rima ngā "taone rauropi" hou hei whakamātau ki te ātete i te iti o ngā kāinga e wātea ana. Ahakoa kāore i tino pai te mahi a ngā mahi tōrangapū mai i te tau 2010 i te āhua o te whakarite a Tēnā Paraone, kua kitea e Northstowe, he taone hou i hangaia tautokotia i Cambridgeshire, mai i te rangi. It's still a work-in-progress but eventually 10,000 homes will replace what was farmland, a golf course and a former airfield. 5. Ngā āhuahira wai Ko tētahi atu āhuatanga i kitea e ngā kaitirotiro ko te pikinga o ngā hāroto me ngā ara wai kua puta noa mai i te hanganga o ngā āhuatanga hou, hei wāhanga rānei o ngā mahi waihanga kia kore ai e waipuke i ngā wāhi noho. Hei tauira, ko te whanaketanga whare tata ki Romsey i Hampshire, e whakaaturia ana i runga ake nei, e rua ngā hāroto hou. Engari i ētahi atu take, pēnei i tēnei whanaketanga e tata ana ki te taone hou tino rongonui, o Milton Keynes, kua nekehia ngā hāroto tīariari hei whakawātea i ngā kāinga. Ngā atahanga aorangi katoa mai i Google Earth. I tīpakohia mai i ngā rā rerekē nā te kounga o ngā atahanga e wātea ana - i ia wā i tīpakohia te atahanga kounga pai tata ki te 2010, ki te 2020 rānei.

title: Te kore mahi a te taiohi: Ngā whakamātautau me ngā rongoā tūpono
summary: Ko ngā kaupapa a te kāwanatanga o Pākehā hei āwhina ki te tapahi i te kore mahi taitamariki i takea mai i tētahi kōmihana mo te whakawhanake i ngā kaimahi rangatahi o Pākehā i tūtakina e te kaipakihi o Tā Īna Wood.
text: Nā Jamie McIvorBBC Scotland education correspondent Many of the commission's recommendations are built on examples of good practice up and down the country - for example, efforts to encourage schools, colleges and employers to work more closely together. Ko te kore mahi i waenganui i te 16 ki te 19 tau kē kei tōna taumata iti rawa mō ngā tau maha. He kī taurangi tā te kāwanatanga mo tētahi wāhi i roto i te mātauranga, i te whakangungu rānei ki ngā tāngata katoa o taua rōpū pakeke kāore he mahi. Kua whakapeka te maha o ngā Neets taitamariki - ngā rangatahi kāore i roto i te mātauranga, i te mahi, i te whakangungu rānei - kua whakapeka. Ko ngā mahi pai i te nuinga o te wā he tino tauwhāiti, he uaua hoki, he take hei whakamārama i te āhuatanga o ngā taitamariki kore mahi. Engari kei te noho tonu ētahi āwangawanga. Ka tohu tonu ngā kura ki ngā tauira o te whakatutukitanga: ko ngā rangatahi e ārahi ana i a rātau akoranga ki tētahi mahi pai, ki tētahi tohu mātauranga rānei o te whare wānanga. Heoi anō, ko te pātai ko te whānuitanga o tēnei pūmautanga o tētahi wāhi i roto i te mātauranga i ētahi wā ka "whakatū" noa iho i te raruraru kore mahi a te taitamariki kia 20 rā anō te tangata. Ki tētahi atu kupu, kei kitea e ētahi rangatahi he wāhi i runga i ngā akoranga kāore rātou i te tino hiahia ki te mahi nā te mea kāore rātou i te mahi? Ki te pērā, tērā pea ka kitea e ēnei ākonga manawanui he kore mahi - kāore rānei i te whakamahia - ina pau rātou i te mātauranga (he rite tonu te pono o tētahi kōhungahunga o waenganui kua haere anake ki te whare wānanga nā te pēhanga mātua). He momo whakamātautau katoa me ngā rongoā tūpāpaku i konei. Ko tētahi e āwhina ana ki te whakarite kia whiwhi te rangatahi i te tohutohu mahi tino pai rawa atu me te mātauranga mahi. Mā tēnā ka nui ake te mahi a ngā rangatahi i ngā akoranga e hiahia ana rātou ki te mahi me te whai hua mai i a rātou. Ko tētahi atu ko te āwhina ki te whakanui ake i te maha o ngā akoranga hōu e wātea ana - i te nuinga o te wā ka whakarato rātou i tētahi whiringa pai ki te whare wānanga, ki tētahi akoranga kāreti wā katoa rānei. Engari ko tētahi atu wero e pā ana ki te kore mahi. I te mutunga, me hiahia ngā kaitukumahi ki te tono, ā, me wātea ngā mahi. Ko te whakaiti i te kore mahi a te taitamariki, tērā pea he rite tonu ki te kaupapa o te ohaoha me te mātauranga. Engari ko te nui ake o ngā pūkenga o te rangatahi, ko te iti ake o te tūponotanga ka noho hei tatauranga kore mahi.

title: Ka hīkoi ake ngā hokomaha i ngā hua rākau me ngā huawhenua
summary: Kei te nui ake te mokowā o ngā hokomaha o UK mō te whakanui ake i te nui o ngā hua iti iho.
text: Kua tīmataria e Sainsbury tētahi whakahau hei whakahauhau i te whakamahinga o ngā panana koha, ā, he awhe "wonky" hōu tā Morrisons kei roto ko ngā avocado mō te 39p. Ko ētahi atu, tae atu ki Waitrose, Tesco me Asda, kua peka hoki ki te hoko i ngā tūemi hou hē. Kua whakahētia ngā toa mo te pārekareka rawa, nā reira ka makaia e nga kaiahuwhenua ngā hua rākau me ngā huawhenua tino kai. Engari mēnā ka whakaae anake ngā kiritaki ki ngā hua kohakore, he iti noa iho te take o te hokomaha ki runga i te whata kia makaia atu ā muri ake. Koia tērā tētahi take e hoatu ana e ngā kaihoko aua taonga ki te tapanga mārama me ētahi atu pana whakatairanga. Bruised Sainsbury says it is trying to half the amount of food the average family throws away each year from its current £700. I tēnei wiki kei te huri tōna aro atu ki te panana, me ngā teihana "whakaora panana" pakū-ake i roto i ngā pātaka e 500 hei whakahauhau i ngā kiritaki ki te whakamahi i ngā hua rākau kua māoa, kua hipa rānei i tōna tino pai. I kitea e te ratonga mōhiotanga moumou kai a te Kāwanatanga, a Tākai, e 1.4 miriona ngā panana e makaia ana i ia rā mō te whai ururua iti, ngā tohu pango rānei i runga i tō rātou kiri, e kī ana ka tāpiri atu ki te £80m i te tau. Ko ngā huatau a Sainsbury ko te whakamahi hei hanga parāoa panana, muffin rānei. Mō te hunga kāore he wā ki te tunu, ka whakamahara mai a Sainsbury ki a mātau ka taea te whakaranu panana ki roto i ngā mīhini, ā, ka tapatapahia kia tāpiritia ki roto i ngā huamata huarākau. I kī a Paul Crewe, te upoko o te toitūtanga me te taiao o Sainsbury: "E ono tekau mā tahi ngā hēneti o ngā Pirihitini e whakaae ana e kore rawa rātau e whakamahi i ngā panana i makaia kētia i roto i te tunu, nā reira e hiahia ana mātou ki te whakaawe i ngā kiritaki ki te whakamahi i ā rātou hua rākau i ngā huarahi rerekē. Kaore he take o te ipu i nga mea pakaru." He rautaki tā Tesco, he awhe Tino Kore Tika, kāore he kai haumaru mō te whakapaunga tangata e moumou mai i ōna wāhi UK i te mutunga o te tau 2017.

title: Coronavirus: Ko ngā ture Tier 3 mō Nottingham 'me haere mai me te tautoko'
summary: Ko ngā rāhuitanga coronavirus kikī ake i Nottingham me haere tahi me te tautoko mō ngā umanga, kua kī te kaiārahi kaunihera.
text: I kī a David Mellen kua korerotia ki a ia te taone nui - kei a ia te pāpātanga whakapokenga teitei rawa atu i Ingarangi - ka taea te haere ki te taumata toru ki te kore e hinga ngā kēhi. Ko te tikanga o tēnei kāore ngā pāparapara me ngā pae e kati ana i ngā kai me ngā tohutohu kia kaua e haere. I kī a Tēnā Mellen kāore he kōrero i tīmata, engari he tino nui te tautoko. I te pānuitanga o te pūnaha matohi hou i tērā wiki, i whakanohoia a Nottingham ki te taumata tuarua, i tētahi wāhanga nā te mea ko te nuinga o ngā mate i roto i te rangatahi. I taua wāhanga ka tuhituhi a Tēnā Mellen ki te Tumuaki o te Haurangi, a Rishi Sunak, e tono ana i te tautoko pūtea. I kī hoki a Tēnā Mellen kua "tino mārama" te taumata matohi o Rāhui ki te kore e hinga ngā utu. Tae noa ki te Paraire, ko te tere whakapokenga o Nottingham te teitei rawa atu i Ingarangi mo te iwa rā e haere ana - engari kua heke te pāpātanga, mai i te 892.2 mō ia 100,000 tāngata ki te 807.4. I kī a Tēnā Mellen kāore he rā i tautuhia mō ngā kōrero, engari i tautuhia ōna tūmanako e ngā mea e puta ana i Liverpool me Manchester. I kī a ia: "He tino mōrearea a Covid, engari ko te hinganga pakihi me te kore mahi. " Me whai pūtea penapena tātau i tō tātau taone mai i te kāwanatanga kia kore ai e puta mēnā kei te haere mātou ki tētahi taumata rāhuitanga teitei ake." I whakaae a ia kei te heke iho te mokatere, engari he māharahara ētahi atu tohu. Ka kī a ia: "Kei te pōturi haere ngā whika i waenganui i ngā tāngata neke atu i te 65 e māharahara ana nā te kaha o aua tāngata ki te mate. " E mōhio ana hoki mātou kei te piki haere ngā tau i roto i o tātau hōhipera. "I te tīmatanga o te wiki, e kī ana ngā kaiwhakahaere o te tari hauora ka kōrero wawe rātau ki a mātau mō te taumata toru, ā, i te Paraire ka aro mai ki a mātau ko te āhua o ngā hōhipera he momo tīmatanga ki ngā kōrero i te wiki e heke mai nei mō te taumata toru." I kī a Nottingham University Hospitals NHS Trust, e whakahaere ana i te Pokapū Rongoā o te Kuini me te Hōhipera o Nottingham City, i te pikinga o ngā kēhi coronavirus i whakakorea ai te pokanga kōhukihuki. E ai ki ngā whika hōu rawa o NHS Ingarangi, e 62 ngā whakaurunga Covid-19 o ngā hōhipera i te wiki ki te 11 o Oketopa, mai i te 28 i te wiki o mua. Heoi anō, kāore e pāngia ngā mahi mate pukupuku me ētahi atu hātepe kōhukihuki. I tohe tētahi kaikōrero mai i te Tari Hauora me te Tiaki Pāpori kāore e taea te whakawātea i ētahi whakataunga. "Ko ngā Taumata Matohi Covid e whakangāwari ana, e whakakaha ana i ngā ture hei āwhina ki te pare i ngā oranga me te whakaiti i te tarenga o te huaketo, me te whakaiti i te pānga ki ngā oranga me te ōhanga," te kī a te kaikōrero. "Ka whakaritea ngā whakataunga i runga i te whakaaro tata ki ngā kaiārahi paetata me ngā tohunga hauora tūmatanui, e whakamōhiotia ana e ngā whakaaturanga hou rawa." Whāia a BBC East Midlands i Facebook, Twitter, Instagram rānei. Tukua ō whakaaro pūrākau ki eastmidsnews@bbc.co.uk.

title: I whakatūria e Nia Griffith te hēkeretari o Te Kōruru o Te Hunga Mahi
summary: Kua whakaingoatia a Haina Griffith ko te hēkeretari Welsh o Labour.
text: Ko te MP o Llanelli tētahi o ngā MP Mahi Welsh e toru i roto i te kāpata kōruru hou a te kaiārahi o Keir Starmer, i muri i tana pōtitanga i te Hātarei. I mahi a ia hei hēkeretari whakangungu kōruru, ā, i roto i te kōruru o Welsh poto e whā tau ki mua, i raro i a Jeremy Corbyn. Ināianei kua whakatūria a Jo Stevens o Kānata Central hei hēkeretari mamati, ahurea, pāpāho me te hākinakina o te rōpū. I whakaritea a Torfaen MP Nick Thomas-Symonds hei hēkeretari kāinga kōruru i te Rātapu. I pānuitia e Christina Rees, te MP mō Neath, i mua e kore a ia e hoki ki tana mahi hei kaiwhakahaere matua o Labour mō ngā take Welsh i Westminster. Ko ia te Hēkeretari Welsh kōruru o te rōpū mai i Hui tanguru 2017, i muri i te whakarerenga o tōna tuatahi o Ms Stevens ki te whakahē i te tūnga o Labour i Te Wānanga. I kī a Ms Rees i a ia e pouri ana kia kaua e noho hei wāhanga o te kāpata kōruru, "E mārama ana ahau ki te whakataunga a Keir." I whakaingoatia a John Healey hei hēkeretari wawao kōruru, i te mahi i puritia e Ms Griffith tae noa ki te Mane. I kī a Ms Griffith, nāna i mahi i mua hei kaikawe kōrero o Welsh i waenganui i te 2015 me te 2016, he "hōnore nui" tana wāhui. "At this difficult time, my priority is supporting my colleagues in Welsh Government as they respond to the huge challenge of the coronavirus pandemic," she added. I roto i tētahi tweet ka mihi a Ms Stevens ki te kaiārahi Labour mō te wā hei hēkeretari kōruru o te kāwanatanga mō te mamati, ahurea, pāpāho me te tākaro, "ngā wāhanga e tino māharahara ana ahau." I kī a ia ko te mate coronavirus "ka nui ake te uara o tātau ki ngā ahuareka o ia rā e kawea mai ana e rātau".

title: Utu o TE HAU: Ko Claudia Winkleman, ko Zoe Ball me Vanessa Feltz i waenganui i ngā tino kaiwhiwhi
summary: Kua neke katoa a Claudia Winkleman, Zoe Ball me Vanessa Feltz i te rārangi utu whetū o TE AO i muri i ngā mahi a te kaporeihana ki te rutu i tētahi raruraru utu ōrite.
text: Ko ngā kaimahi 12 o runga he tāne katoa i tērā tau, engari ko Winkleman ināianei te tuawaru, ko Ball te iwa, ā, ko Feltz te 10. Kei runga tonu i te rārangi te Ōrite o te Rā, i runga i te £1.75m i ia tau.
