Kua piki ake te pire pūmanawa katoa i te £11m ki te £159m, me te maha o ngā whetū e whiwhi ana i te £150,000 mai i te 64 ki te 75. O aua kaiwhakaatu me ngā korero kōrero e 75, 60% he tāne, heke iho i te 65% i te wā i whakaputaina tuatahitia ai te rārangi i te tau 2017. Ka whakaputaina ngā utu o ngā whetū hei wāhanga o te Pūrongo Ā-Tau a te BBC, ā, ka kapi i te wā mai i Aperira 2018 ki Mati 2019. Heoi anō, ehara te rārangi i te whakaata tika, i te katoa rānei o ngā mea e whiwhi ana ngā tāngata katoa i te HAU. Kāore i whakaurua ngā kaitapere me ētahi kaiwhakaatu whakangahau e mahi ana mō te ringa arumoni o te kaporeihana, o TE WHK Studios. Ko te hua, ko ngā whetū o ētahi o ngā hōtaka nui rawa o te AO - pēnei i te Top Gear me Doctor Who - kei te ngaro i te rārangi. I ngā marama e 12 kua hipa, kua haere a Pirihi Evans ki Virgin Radio, i whakakapia e Zoe Ball. Ko te hua, e whakaata ana tōna whika i te iwa marama o te mahi i te whakaaturanga parakuihi o te Reo Irirangi 2 i mua i tana haerenga atu i a Hakihea, ehara i tana utu ā-tau katoa. Waihoki, ko te whika o Zoe Ball anake e kapi ana i ngā mea i riro i a ia mō te hautū i te whakaaturanga parakuihi i ngā marama tuatahi e toru o tēnei tau, me ana moni whiwhinga mō te whakaaturanga Reo Irirangi 2 anake i taurimatia e ia i roto i ngā marama e iwa i mua i tērā. I kī te tumuaki o TE Aotearoa, ko te pūtea mō te utu pūmanawa ināianei he iti iho te wāhanga o te katoa o ngā utu papatono i tērā tau. I a ia e kōrero ana mō te utu a Lineker, ka kī a Ariki Hall ko te angitu o te Hākinakina o TE Hākinakina, e tae ana ki te 40% o te iwi whānui o UK, he "nui te pānga ki a Kei", kātahi anō ka "mahi tino pai rawa atu tāna". I kī te manukura o TE WĀ, a Tā David Clementi, "kāore i kitea e ia he whakaaturanga e utu ana mātou i tētahi tangata i runga ake i te mokatere mākete", ka tāpiri: "Ko ngā mea kua kitea e au e tohu ana i te tauaro." E whakaatu ana ngā whika kua nui te utu o ētahi whetū tāne tae atu ki a Jeremy Vine, John Humphrys me Steve Wright. I whiwhi a Vine i te £290,000 i te 2018/19 - tata ki te £150,000 i te tau tōmua. Ināianei kei runga a Humphrys i te taumata kotahi, he tapahi tata ki te £110,000. Kua ngaro i a Wright te āhua o te £85,000; Kua heke iho a Stephen Nolan i te £75,000; ā, tata ki te £70,000 te whakahekenga o Nicky Campbell. I taurimatia e Nolan te maha o ngā hōtaka mō te BBC - neke atu i te 350 ngā putanga tae atu ki ngā whakaaturanga mō Radio Ulster me 5 Live. Neke atu i te 400 ngā putanga o ana whakaaturanga i whakaaturia e Vanessa Feltz puta noa i te Radio 2 me te BBC London. O ngā whakaaturanga nui rawa atu, he tāurunga hou a Zoe Ball rāua ko Sara Cox i runga i te rārangi i muri i te tauranga o te parakuihi me ngā whakaaturanga taraiwa o te Reo Irirangi 2. Ko ētahi atu tāurunga hōu ko te kaitākaro whutupōro o mua ko Jermaine Jenas i runga i te £210,000, ko Louise Minchin o BBC Breakfast i runga i te £205,000 me te kaiwhakaatu rongokōrero o Clive Myrie i runga i te £200,000. O ērā i runga anō i te rārangi i tērā tau, ko ngā pikinga nui rawa atu kua haere ki a Jo Whiley (tata ki te £100,000), Jason Mohammad (tata ki te £95,000), Justin Webb (tata ki te £85,000) me Sarah Montague (tata ki te £80,000). I kite tahi a Lauren Laverne rāua ko Fiona Bruce i te pikinga o o rāua utu e tata ana ki te £75,000, i te wā i piki ake a Sophie Raworth i te £60,000. E toru nga whika nui kua mahue mo te wāhanga arumoni i te wā o te tau - ko Pirihi Evans, ko Haimona Mayo me Eddie Mair. Kua hinga te āputa utu ira tangata katoa o te kaporeihana mai i te 7.6% i tērā tau ki te 6.7% i tēnei wā, ka kī te kaiwhakatika pāpāho o TE AO o Amol Kārina. Ko te kaiwhakaatu o te Woman's Hour ko Jane Garvey, e ārahi ana i tētahi rōpū whakahau e kiia nei ko ngā Wāhine o TE Aotearoa, i kī atu ki te hōtaka o Te Reo Irirangi 4 o Tēnei Rā: "E hiahia ana ahau ki te whakamihi ki ngā wāhine tokotoru kua tae ki te 10 o runga. " Ko te 30% tēnā o te 10 o runga. He pai mēnā he 50, neke atu rānei i tērā. Ko wai e mōhio ana, tērā pea ka tae tātau ki tērā āhua o te nirvana i tētahi wā i roto i tōku oranga." I kī a ia he aroha tōna ki ngā kaimātakitaki me ngā kaiwhakarongo i whakaaro he tiketike rawa ngā utu. "Tērā pea he pai ake te tapahi i ētahi utu tāne, kaua ki te piki ake i ētahi utu wahine," tana kī. I roto i tētahi kōrero, ka kī ngā Wāhine o TE WĀ: "Tērā ētahi kauneketanga i roto i ngā tau e rua kua taha, engari he tokomaha ngā wāhine i ngā taumata katoa o te AO e maukati ana ki ngā tukanga ā-roto pōturi, haumaru, whakaheke hoki. " Kei te puta tonu mai ngā kēhi utu ōrite hōu, ā, kāore anō ngā kaimahi kia maia kei mua te ōritetanga o te utu." I kī te Ariki Hall i tautokona e te iwi whānui te AO ki te hoatu utu tiketike ki "ngā whetū nunui" nā te mea he "pūkenga, he whakangahau". I roto i tētahi tuhipānui mō te The Huffington Post, ka tuhituhi a ia: "I tika te whakahē i te AO mō te kore whakaaturanga wahine i te wā i whakaputaina tuatahitia ai e mātau ngā taipitopito o ā mātou whetū tino whiwhinga e rua tau ki mua. " Engari ko te mea pono, i runga i te utu kua roa tātau ki te noho hei rōpū tika ake mai i taua wā." I kī a Damian Collins, te tūru o te komiti tīpako Mamati, Ahurea, Pāpāho me te Hākinakina: "E pōhiritia ana te kite i ētahi atu wāhine e whakaingoatia ana i runga i te rārangi kaimahi tiketike. Heoi anō, ka hīpoki tēnei i te take whānui ake o te utu ōrite puta noa i ngā taumata katoa o ngā kaimahi o TE HAU. "Ko te pikinga o te pire pūmanawa e pā ana ki ngā mahere hei tango i ngā raihana pouaka whakaata koreutu mai i te katoa, engari ko te rawakore o te hunga neke atu i te 75. Ka whakaarahia tēnei e mātou ki ngā kaiwhakahaere o TE AO ina puta mai rātau ki te aroaro o te komiti ā muri ake i tēnei marama." Ko te utu mo te whakarato utu raihana koreutu ki ngā neke atu i te 75 ko te £745 miriona. I utua tēnei e te kāwanatanga, engari i te tau 2015 ka pānuitia ka ngongo te utu i te tau 2020 hei wāhanga o tētahi whakataunga utu raihana. I tērā marama, ka pānuitia e te AO ko ngā kāinga moni iti anake e whiwhi ana tētahi tangata i te takuhe nama penihana, ka whiwhi tonu i ngā raihana pouaka whakaata koreutu. Ko ērā atu kaitiaki katoa, tata ki te 3.7 miriona, me utu he raihana pouaka whakaata mai i Pipiri 2020. Whāia mātou i Facebook, i Twitter @BBCNewsEnts, i Instagram rānei i bbcnewsents. Mēnā he huatau pūrākau tāu, īmēra entertainment.news@bbc.co.uk.

title: Ka tuki ngā kaimahi o te Poutāpeta ki ngā tari Karauna
summary: Neke atu i te 2,000 ngā kaimahi i ngā tari Karauna o te Poutāpeta kua tuki i runga i ngā mahi, te utu me ngā katinga.
text: Kua haere atu ngā mema o te Uniana o ngā Kaimahi Whakawhitiwhiti i ngā pae e 370 i roto i tētahi tautohetohe mō ngā tono kia kati, kia manaaki rānei i te 70 o ngā peka. I kī te uniana ka pā ngā mahere ki ngā rau mahi, ā, he moto anō mō ngā Tiriti Tiketike kē e raruraru ana. I kī te Poutāpeta he maha ōna tari Karauna kua whakatuwheratia mō te umanga, ā, e 11,500 ngā tari peka kāore i pāngia. I kī tētahi kaikōrero o te Poutāpeta kua whakapā atu rātau ki o rātau tari karauna i te rā, ā, e 101 o rātau e tuwhera ana. I tāpiritia e ia e waiho ana e te uniana "ngā tūturu pākaha", me te ngaro i ngā tari te £40m i te tau. I kī te Uniana o nga Kaimahi Whakawhitiwhiti (CWU) kāore anō kia piki te utu o ngā kaimahi mo te rua tau. I kī atu tētahi kaikōrero CWU ki te AO i "tautokona mārōtia" e ōna mema. I tāpiri mai a ia: "E mōhio ana mātou kei te tuwhera tonu ngā tari nui ake me te kaiwhakahaere anake i konei i te mea ehara rātou i te mema o to mātau uniana, engari kei te tuki o mātau mema. " Ko tā mātou e hiahia ana he hui e taea ai e mātou te whakarite ki te Poutāpeta i a mātou e whakapono pono ana ka taea e mātou te kōmaka i tēnei. Ki te kore, kua rite mātau ki ētahi atu mahi taraiwa." Ko ngā tari Karauna 'whakarerekē whatunga' he peka Poutāpeta e whakahaeretia ana e te kamupene - ehara i te mea e whakahaeretia ana e ngā poutāpeta iti - i runga anō i ngā Tiriti Tiketike nui. I kī atu te hēkeretari kaiāwhina o CWU a Andy Furey ki a BBC News: "Kāore e taea e mātou te tuku i te Poutāpeta kia haere katoa ki runga i a mātau, me tū mātou mō mātou anō kia noho ai tēnei hei tuatahi o ngā tuki maha. " E tūmanako ana kāore e pērā. E tūmanako ana ka tae mai te Poutāpeta ki te tēpu whakawhitiwhiti." I kī te hēkeretari tuarua a CWU, a Dave Ward: "He poto noa iho ngā mahere a te Poutāpeta, ā, ka whānako i te whatunga o ngā tari tino whai hua, i te wā kotahi e mōrearea ana ngā mahi rau me te tūkino pea i ngā mahi paetata." 'Pouri i te raruraru' I kī te uniana ko ngā tari Karauna o te Poutāpeta e pūkete ana mō te kotahi-rima o te katoa o ngā mahi a te umanga. I kī hoki tētahi hui i te ratonga whakaraupapatanga a Acas i rahua ki te whati i te kokotitanga, me te tāpiri "e mau tonu ana o mātau mema ki tō rātou whakapono he taonga nui te whatunga Karauna mō ngā hapori paetata". I kī te kaiwhakahaere o te whatunga o te Poutāpeta me te kaiwhakahaere hokohoko, a Kevin Gilliland: "E pouri ana mātou ki ngā ratonga ka puta pea ki ngā kiritaki te karanga a te CWU mō te mahi taraiwa. " I tēnei wā kei te ngaro ngā peka karauna i te £40m ia tau, ā, kei te āwhinatia tēnei e ngā moni tūmatanui. Kāore e taea tēnei te haere tonu. "E whakaū ana mātou ki te Poutāpeta e noho ana hei wāhi matua o ngā tiriti tiketike o UK, ā, ko ā mātou mahere e whakarite ana ka puta tēnei." I kī tonu a ia ko te tikanga o ōna whakahōu e 70 o ngā peka Karauna e kimi ana ki te "hoa mahi ki tētahi kaihoko tika", i te wā kotahi ka haumi te Poutāpeta i te £70 miriona i roto i ngā peka Karauna e toe ana ki te "whakahōu me te whakatipu ratonga hei whakarite i tō rātou kaha mo te wā roa".

title: Uiui a Stephen Muncaster: I patua e te tāne tana wahine kātahi ko ia anō
summary: Ka pūhia e tētahi tangata kua mate i tana kāri i mua i tana wahine ki te māhunga, kātahi ka huri i te pū ki a ia anō, ka rangona he uiuinga.
text: I patua e Stephen Muncaster, e 47, tana wahine ko Allison, e 48, i a ia e ngana ana ki te mawhiti i to rātau kāinga i Makarini tata ki King's Lynn, Norfolk, i te 12 o Hōngongoi 2016. I kitea tōna tinana i te taha o te pū, i ngā haora i muri i tana kōrero ki tana GP kua pakaru tana mārena, ā, i pouri a ia. Ko ia te matua kēkē o "Lotto lout" Michael Carroll, nāna i pā ki ngā kupu matua i te tau 2002, ā, i muri iho ka pupuhi i tōna taonga. I whakamutua e tētahi whakarongo tōmua i patua ā-ture a Mrs Muncaster, ā, i whakataua e te koroni o Norwich he mate a Tāne Muncaster. 'Upoko i roto i ōna ringa' I kī tana GP a Chris Holmes i roto i tētahi kōrero tuhituhi: "I haere mai ia ki te kite i ahau e amuamu ana i te pōharatanga. " I kī atu tana wahine ki a ia e mahue ana i a ia, ā, i whakapae ia kei te kite ia i tētahi atu." Engari i tāpiri mai a Dr Holmes i mōhio a ia kāore a ia i whai whakaaro ki te tūkino i a ia anō, i ētahi atu rānei nā te mea i aroha ia ki ana mokopuna. I hopukina te tākarotanga a Mrs Muncaster i runga i ngā kāmera C KKK i roto i te whare. I kī a Det Con Jeremy Pitt mai i ngā Pirihimana o Norfolk i whakaaturia e te whakaahua a Tēnā Muncaster e āhua ana "tino riri ki tōna māhunga i ōna ringa". Kāore anō kia pūrongotia ki ngā pirihimana, ā, he rangatira pū raihana a Tēnā Muncaster. I whakamutua e te whakamātautau tirotiro tōmuri i mate a ia i te motu pū kotahi ki te māhunga. I puta te kaihanga i runga i te pouaka whakaata ā-motu i te taha o tana irāmutu, a Michael Carroll, i te wā i toa ai te tau 19 tau i te £9.7m i te National Lottery i te tau 2002. I mōhiotia te kaihoko o mua ko te "Lotto lout" i tana kohikohinga i ana toa e mau ana i tētahi tūtohu hiko. I haere tonu a ia ki te whakapau i tana taonga katoa i mua i tana mahi i roto i te wheketere pihikete. Ngā Hononga Ipurangi Pātahi HM Courts Service

title: Ko nga manuhiri turuhi ki Aiarangi ki te Raki e piki ana i te 13%
summary: I piki ake te maha o ngā haerenga tūruhi ki Aiarangi ki te Raki i te 13% i ngā marama tuatahi e toru o te 2013, i whakaritea ki te wā kotahi i te tau 2012.
text: Nā John CampbellBBC NI ohaoha me te kaiwhakatika pakihi i puta mai te pikinga ahakoa te tutu e honoa ana ki ngā whakahēnga haki i whiwhi i te pānuitanga pāpāho o te ao whānui. I kī te Tari Hinonga (Deti) ko te nuinga o te pikinga o ngā tau manuhiri - 75% - nā ngā tāngata e haere ana ki te kite i ngā hoa me ngā whanaunga. Heoi anō, i whakaaturia hoki e ngā whika te nui ake o ngā toronga hararei. I whakaritea hoki ngā toronga mō ngā take pakihi ki te hauwhā tuatahi o te tau 2012. Neke atu i te 25% te maha o nga manuhiri mai i Ingarangi i piki ake i te 3%. Heoi anō, he 7% te hekenga o te maha o ētahi atu manuhiri o rāwāhi. I kī a Deti, ko ngā take e whakahaere ana i ngā tau nui ake, ko te tīmatanga o te tau o te Taone Ahurea o UK i Londonderry me te whakahau "Backing Belfast" i whakarewaina hei urupare ki te raruraru i takea mai i ngā whakahēnga pūmau i runga i tētahi whakataunga kia whakawhāiti i te maha o ngā rā ka rere te haki uniana i te Hōro Taone o Belfast. I kī te tari ko te wāteatanga o ētahi atu ara hau ki Ingarangi tērā pea i āwhina ki te tipu o ngā manuhiri mai i tēnei mākete. I whakaaturia hoki e ngā whika ko ngā whakapaunga a ngā manuhiri i piki ake i te 6% ki te £84m i te hauwhā tuatahi.

title: I tangohia e ngā whakawhirinaki hou ngā whare wānanga o Perry Beeches
summary: E rima ngā kura i karangatia e David Cameron hei "pūrākau angitu tūturu", i mua i te tāruatanga ki ngā pūrongo o te whakahaere pūtea, me tuku atu ki ngā whakawhirinaki hou e rua.
text: I Whiringahora 2016, i whakaaturia he tāpaetanga o te £2.1m i te Perry Beeches Academy Trust i Birmingham nā te "mana pūtea rawakore". I ahu mai ki te tukunga iho o te rangatira nui. E rua nga kura i roto i te rōpū i whakanohoia i roto i nga tikanga motuhake. Midlands Live: E toru i hereheretia mo te taikaha tōkai o te taitamariki o Coventry; Ināianei kua whakawāteatia e Te Tari Mātauranga te Arena Academy, City Academy, City Academy Birmingham me Jewellery Quarter Academy kia uru tika ki te whakawhirinaki CORE i te 1 o Poutāpeta. Ark said it had started a consultation to amalgamate Perry Beeches V with its neighbor school, Ark Chamberlain Primary Academy, and if approved these would come together on 1 September under the name Ark Victoria Academy. I kī a Perry Beeches trust ka noho tonu ngā whare wānanga ki "ngā kura kāore i te tīpako, kāore i te whakapono, i ngā kura whāranu". I tētahi wā, i whakamihitia ngā kura i roto i te whakawhirinaki e te Tari Mātauranga mō te tautuhi i "te pae mō ngā kura puta noa i te whenua". Engari mai i te tau 2016, i whakapeka te mahinga o te whakawhirinaki, ā, i whakarerea e te manukura o mua o Te Wānanga o Te Mātauranga (EFA). E rua marama i mua i tana tukunga iho, ka whakahē te EFA i te whakawhirinaki o Birmingham mō te "ngoikoretanga nui i roto i te whakahaere pūtea". I kitea e tana tūhuratanga he utu tāpiri e £160,000 i utua ki a Tēnā Nolan i roto i te rua tau mā tētahi whakaaetanga a te hunga tuatoru - i runga ake i tana utu £120,000 i te tau. Ko te tāpaetanga £2.1m i whakaaturia i te Perry Beeches Academy Trust i Birmingham he hua o te "mana pūtea rawakore", te kī a te whakawhirinaki.

title: Mate whaiwhai poaka: E hiahia ana ngā hoa o Marc Sutton ki te mahi
summary: E hiahia ana ngā hoa o tētahi tangata i patua e tētahi kaiwhakangau Wīwī nāna ia i pōhēhē ki te poaka mohoao kia whakatūpatotia ētahi atu o Ingarangi ki ngā mōrearea.
text: I pūhia a Marc Sutton, e 34, i a ia e paihikara maunga ana i roto i te ngahere i Montriod i Haute-Savoie, i te tau 2018. I taketake mai a ia i Caerphilly i te tonga o Wales, ā, he wharekai tōna i te taunga retihuka o Les Gets. I te Paraire ka whiua a Lucas Clerc kia whā tau mo te patu tangata, i pūrongotia e te kaipānui Wīwī 3. I rāhuitia hoki te tau e 24 tau kia kaua e whai rākau me te whai rākau. E hiahia ana te rōpū whakahau Union des Victimes de la Chasse [Union of Hunting Victims], i whakatūria e ngā hoa o Tēnā Sutton, kia whakatūpato te Tari Tawahi i ngā tūruhi o Ingarangi mō ngā mōrearea o ngā kaiwhakangau i te ngahere o Wīwī. Kua tonoa te Tari Tawahi kia kōrero. E hiahia ana hoki te kāwanatanga Wīwī kia whakaritea e ia mema o tētahi rōpū whaiwhai te kawenga tahi mō ngā aituā, e kī ana ka whakahauhau i a rātau kia pirihimana i te whanonga o tētahi, me te inu me te whaiwhai kia hara hara. I kī te kaiwhakahauhau o Keiti Downs, tētahi kaipānui o MUA, e noho ana i Morzine: "Ko te iwi o Ingarangi, ahakoa e noho ana rātau i Wīwī, kāore i te tino mōhio ki ngā mōrearea i puta mai i ngā kaiwhakangau i te wā o te wā - i haere mai i te UK kāore he mōrearea o te whaiwhai, he uaua ki te mōhio ki te mōrearea i konei i Wīwī." E whai ana i ngā pūrongo i mate tētahi atu tangata whenua o Ingarangi i te Wenerei tata ki te kāinga o Calvignac, Rota, i muri i te pūhia e nga kaiwhakangau poaka mohoao. I tāpiri mai a Steve Downs: "He whakararuraru te rongo kua patua tētahi atu tangata harakore e te whai, ā, kei tōna whānau me ōna hoa o mātau whakaaro. " Kua karanga mātou ki te whakahou i ngā ture haumaru mai i te matenga o Marc, engari kāore he mea i mahia... Kāore he mea e taea te whakahoki mai i a Marc, ā, ko tā mātou mahi ināianei ko te ngana ki te tiaki i ētahi atu me te aukati i tēnei e puta anō ana, i roto i tōna pūmahara. "Kāore mātou i te ngana ki te whakamutu i te whaiwhai, kei te ngana mātou ki te aukati i te mate."

title: I whakarerekētia e te matenga o Alan Kurdi tētahi mea?
summary: Ko te pikitia tērā i whakakorikori i ngā ngākau e hia miriona. Engari kotahi tau i muri mai, i puta mai i te whakaahua o te tinana toromi o Hiriani a Alan Kurdi tētahi huringa tūturu?
text: Nā Mupiri DevichandBBC Trending Tonu i te 12 marama ki mua i tēnei rā, i kite mātau i te āhua o tētahi 12 hāora hītori i runga i te pāpāho pāpori. I roto i taua wā, ka kitea e te 20 miriona ngā tāngata puta noa i te ao i runga i ngā whatunga pāpori tētahi whakaahua o tētahi taitama Hiriani e toru tau mai i Kobane, i kitea tōna tūpāpaku i runga i tētahi one tākehi. Kotahi tekau mā tahi atu Hiriani i mate i runga i te haerenga poti kotahi - tae atu ki te tuakana e whā tau o Arana, o Ghalib me to rātau whaea ko Rehanna. Engari kotahi anake te tinana iti i whakaahuatia, i whakairia, i tiria tuihonotia. Na te ia huaketo i akiaki ngā nūpepa me ngā kaipānui ki te whakaputa i te atahanga whakamataku (kāore anō mātou kia whakaputa anō i konei, i tua atu i ngā whakaaturanga toi). I roto i ngā hīkaka me ngā taupatupatu katoa i muri mai, tērā te āhua kua rerekē tētahi mea i te take o te hunga whakaruru o Hiriani. Koia tērā te whakaaro o te whaea o te tamaiti mate o Tima - e noho tawhiti ana i Kānata - i taua wā. "He mea mō taua pikitia," tana kī mai ki a au i muri iho. "I hoatu e te Atua te mārama ki runga i taua pikitia hei whakaoho i te ao." Engari ka tino kitea he wāhi huri te matenga o Alan Kurdi? Me pērā? 1. Ngā Hunga Whakaruru vs Ngā Kaiheke - he neke i te reo tuihono i runga i te pāpāho pāpori, i kitea te "rākeitanga o Ahana Kurdi" i taua wā - ā, kua noho tonu, i ngā haora i mua i tōna matenga, engari i kaha kē atu te atahanga. Kei te whakamahia tonutia ngā mano wā i ia rā, ā, neke atu i te 20 miriona ngā wā i te tau kua hipa. I kitea hoki e tētahi akoranga mai i te Whare Wānanga o Te Whare Wānanga o Te Whare Wānanga tētahi huringa i roto i te reo e whakamahia ana mō ngā Hiriani e tomo ana ki Uropi. Te āhua nei kua neke te taupatupatu whakararuraru, tae atu ki te HAU, mēnā me hoatu te kupu "heke"' rānei ki ngā Hiriani, te āhua nei kua neke i runga i te pāpāho pāpori - me te kupu "rerenga" e pā ana ki mua i te whakamahinga noa iho. "Tērā tētahi neke i roto i te reo e tohu ana i tētahi neke i roto i te āhua o te kawenga a te iwi," e tautohe ana a Frank Duvell o te Pokapū o te Whare Wānanga o Oxford mō te Hekenga, te Kaupapahere me te Iwi. "Ko te tikanga o te kōrero mō ngā hunga whakaruru, ko te whakaae ki ētahi kawenga mō te parenga aowhānui kāore e pā ana ki te kupu 'kaiheke'". Na te rerekētanga o te reo i puta mai ai te nekeneketanga o te iwi noa - i kite i te whakaahua o Alan Kurdi, ā, ka tono ki te āwhina. "I kite mātou, nā te pikinga o te aronga, he pikinga hoki i roto i te nekeneketanga o ngā tāngata i tīmata ki te rere ki ngā one tākehi, ki ngā moutere Kariki ki te ara Balkan," te kī a Duvell. "I mua ka tae mai ngā tāngata ki ngā one mahue, ka haere rātau mō ngā haora, i te ao, i te pō, i te wai ki ngā kāinga tata rawa, ā, ohorere ana he tūroro i te one e āwhina ana i a rātau ki waho o ngā poti e āwhina ana i a rātau ki ngā kākahu maroke." 2. Engari i haere tonu ngā Hiriani ki runga poti - ā, ka nui haere te mate ahakoa te āhua o te māharahara tūmatanui i te tau kua taha, ka kōrerotia e ētahi atu tatauranga tētahi pūrākau pōuri ake. I tēnei wiki i miramiratia e Oxfam ngā raraunga e whakaatu ana i te katoa o ngā hunga whakaruru me ngā kaiheke kua mate i a rātou e ngana ana ki te tae ki tētahi atu whenua, neke atu i te rima i tērā tau - mai i te 4664 mate i te tau i mua i te matenga o Ahana Kurdi ki te 5700 mai i taua wā. Ko te nuinga o nga mate i runga i te Māuirangi. Ahakoa he whakahekenga tohu i roto i ngā haerenga poti mai i Tākehi ki Kariki - i whakaohotia e te mahi a te EU ki Tākehi i runga i te nohoanga o Hiriani - kua haere tonu ētahi atu haerenga poti i te Māuirangi. I raro i te whakaaetanga, ināianei ka whakahokia te hunga e tae ana ki Kariki ki Tāke ki te kore rātau e tono whakangungu, ka ākiritia rānei ta rātau kerēme. I tino mōhio ngā Hiriani ki te matenga o Ahana Kurdi - engari i eke tonu ki ngā poti. "Kāore au i te mōhio me pēhea te kauhoe, nā reira i mataku ahau," te kī a Haira Arar, he rongoā 27 tau i whānau, i tipu ake i Hiria. "Engari he pai ake tēnei mōku i te noho i roto i te whare herehere." I kī mai a Arar ki a mātau i rere a ia i te whawhai i tōna whenua me te āwhina a nga kaihokohoko. I haere a ia ki Repanona, kātahi ko Tākehi me Kariki i mua i tana taunga ki Tiamana, i reira ia i noho ai mai i Whiringahora kua hipa. I roto i taua haerenga e ono haora i roto i tētahi poti i reira tokorua ngā tamariki i whakamahara ki a ia ki te toremi o Alan Kurdi i taua wā. "I te whakaaro ahau, ka aha mēnā ka mate te matua, ā, ka ora te tamaiti," tana kī atu ki a BBC Trending. "Me pēhea ia e haere tonu ai i tōna oranga?" 3. Ka nekehia e ngā iwi ki te uru te kaupapahere mō ngā hunga whakaruru o Hiriani - engari he maha ngā taitapa kua katia i ngā wiki i muri i te huaketo o te atahanga o Ahana Kurdi, he maha ngā pānuitanga o tētahi neke kaupapahere i ngā iwi ki te Uru. I te UK, i reira i pānuitia ai e 20,000 ngā Hiriani ināianei ka nohoia, ka tohutorotia, ka whakahuatia e ngā kaipōrangapū te pikitia a Ahana Kurdi. Engari kotahi tau i muri mai, kāore anō kia whakakīa te tohatoha, e ai ki a Frank Duvell o te Whare Wānanga o Oxford. Ko te take o te hunga whakaruru o Hiriani, me te hekenga i te nuinga o te wā, kei te tautohetohe tonu - hei tauira, ko te taupatupatu mo tētahi atahanga e whakaatu ana i ngā kaiheke e tomo ana ki te EU e whakamahia ana i roto i te taupatupatu taupānga o Te UK, e kī ana a Duvell kāore anō kia tino nui ake te whakanuitanga o ngā Hiriani, ahakoa kāore anō a Perehitini Pakihi me te UN kia mau i ngā tūnga motuhake i runga i te pātai. He tokomaha nga iwi o Ūropi ki te tonga, ki te rāwhiti hoki i kati i o rātau rohe ki ngā Hiriani i tēnei tau. Neke atu i te 25,000 ngā Hiriani kua tangohia e Kānata, engari ko te neke nui rawa atu i Tiamana - kua wetewete kē i ōna taitapa i te haerenga o te whakaahua o Arana, ā, kei reira tonu te whakangungu i ngā Hiriani. E tūmanakohia ana te hawhe miriona tāngata i tēnei tau - ahakoa kei te heke hoki ngā tau katoa ki reira. 4. Te whakataunga - i whakarerekētia e te pikitia a Alan Kurdi te ao? I taku pātai atu ki ngā kaimahi mātauranga me ngā kaimahi NGO kia karangatia, ka kī rātau āe - ko te whakaahua huaketo o Ahana Kurdi i whakapakari i te hiahia, te tūao me te whakahauhau. Ki tētahi atu kōrero, he pānga ki te take rerenga o Hiriani te katoa o te whakatūpato me te taupatupatu. Engari kāore a Tima Kurdi, te whaea o Arana, i te tino mōhio ināianei. Kotahi tau i muri iho, he tokomaha i runga i te ipurangi e tiritiri ana i ana kōrero - engari ko tōna tūmanako mō te tūkinotanga o tōna whānau e āhei ana ki te neke i te taupatupatu kua tata te ngaro. "Ko te wāhi pouri, ko ngā marama tuatahi noa iho, kātahi ka hoki te katoa ki te umanga," tana kī atu ki a BBC Trending i tēnei wiki. "Mai i tērā tau, ki te kī mai koe ki a au he nui ngā huringa, ka kī atu ahau ki a koe kua kino kē atu, kāore i te pai ake. E pā ana ki ētahi atu tāngata e rere ana i te pakanga, ā, kei te mate tonu ngā tāngata e whakawhiti tonu ana i taua haerenga i roto i te wai". "Ko te karere anake e tika ana kia puta i tēnei wā ko te tohe i o tātau kaiārahi o te ao kia noho ki runga i te tēpu me te kōrero - me pēhea e whakamutua ai e tātau te whawhai i Hiria?" Kei te haere tonu ngā pikitia o ngā tamariki e pāngia ana e te pakanga o Hiria. Ko te mea hou rawa ko Omran Daqneesh e rua tau te pakeke - i ora i tētahi pōma Rūhia i Aropo i tērā marama. A, i roto i te meme i raro iho nei, i whakakotahitia tana whakaahua otaota ki te whakaahua tawhito o Ahana Kurdi hei miramira i te raruraru o tētahi whakatupuranga katoa o ngā tamariki Hiriani kāore anō kia mōhio ki tētahi mea engari ko te pakanga. Ināianei kei te rongo a Tima Kurdi i ēnei atahanga takitahi, me te ngākau e whakaaetia ana e rātau, ka tata te nekeneke i te ao kia kaua e rapu i tētahi kaupapa whakaaro nui hei whakamutu i te papā o Hiriani. "Ko te whakaahua o Omran... he atahanga kaha, he atahanga pouri," tana kī. "Ko taua tama te wahangū o Hiriani". "Engari ka tāpiri mai a ia "he karere hē nā te mea me whakamutu te karere i te pakanga i Hiria". " I ia rā, e hia mano ngā tamariki e mate ana," tana kī. "Engari kotahi anake te pikitia ka taea e te pāpāho". He pūrongo tāpiri nā Anisa Subedar NEXT STORY: He moni mō ngā pākihi? Ka taea e koe te whai i te BBC Trending i Twitter @BBCtrending, me te kimi i a mātou i Facebook. Kei te bbc.com/trending katoa a mātau pūrākau.

title: Ka whakarewaina e te uniana whakamātautau te wero ture mo nga whakahōu kāwanatanga
summary: Kua whakarewaina tētahi wero ā-ture ki ngā mahere kāwanatanga ki te whakawātea i ētahi ratonga whakamātautau i Ingarangi me Uēra e te uniana o ngā āpiha whakamātautau o Napo.
text: E kī ana ko te whakatau a te kāwanatanga ki te wehe i ngā ratonga kua mōrearea ngā kaimahi whakamātautau me te iwi whānui. I muri i te pānuitanga a te kāwanatanga i tētahi rārangi o ngā kaihoko e manakohia ana hei hoko me te whakahaere i ngā kamupene tūmataiti hei whakahaere i ngā hunga hara mōrearea iti, waenga hoki. I kī te Hēkeretari o te Ture, a Chris Grayling, ka āwhina ngā huringa ki te whakaiti i te hara anō. "Ko ēnei whakahōu e pā ana ki te huri i ngā oranga. Kāore e taea e mātou te haere tonu me tētahi āhuatanga e tukua ai ngā mano o ngā herehere ki ngā tiriti i ia tau, kāore he tohutohu, he tautoko rānei, ā, ka waiho noa iho ki te hara anō," te kī a Tēnā Grayling. "Mā ēnei whakahōu e panoni te huarahi e rutu ai tātau i te hara anō." Hītori hara i raro i ngā huringa, ka haere tonu te ratonga whakamātautau - i wehea kia rua i te tīmatanga o tēnei tau hei whakarite mō te pūnaha hōu - ka whakahaere tonu i ngā tino hunga hara mōrearea. Ka whakahaere, ka whakaora hoki te National Probation Service (NPS) i ngā hunga hara mōrearea e 31,000. Ka whakahaeretia e ngā Kamupene Whakaora Hapori Hōu (CRC) e 200,000 ngā hunga hara mōrearea iti, waenga hoki, tae atu ki te 45,000 ngā herehere rerenga poto kāore i te whiwhi i tētahi aroturuki whakamātautau. Tata tonu ki te £450m te wāriu o ngā kirimana i te tau i roto i te whitu tau. Ko te tātaritanga o Clive Coleman, BBC Legal Correspondent Reoffending te nati kāore anō kia tino pakaru te pūnaha ture taihara. Ka noho whakakeketia tonu ngā utu i konei. O ngā hunga hara e 45,000 i tukua mai i te whare herehere i ia tau i te whiu o te tau, iti iho rānei, tata ki te 60% te hara anō i roto i te tau kotahi o te tukunga. Kāore anō ēnei hunga hara kia whakahaeretia e te whakamātautau. Nā reira kei te whakamātau te kāwanatanga i tētahi mea tino hōu, whai rawa hoki mā te whakatuwhera i te mākete ki ngā kaiwhakarato whakaora mai i ngā wāhanga tūmataiti, tūroro, pāpori hoki. E kī ana ngā kaiwhakawāwā kāore anō tēnei kia whakamātauria, he pekenga ki te mea tē mōhiotia e mōrearea ai te iwi whānui. Ka whakamāramatia e rātau ko ngā whakawhirinaki whakamātautau e 35 i Ingarangi me Uēra kua māka katoatia he pai, he tino pai rānei e te Kaitirotiro Whakamātautau a Tōna Nui. A, ki te kore e pakaru.... Ko te take o Napo kei te whati te ratonga mō te whakawāteatanga me te whakawhitiwhiti kōrero me te tiritiri mōhiohio e tino nui ana ki te aromatawai i te mōrea, ka uaua ake. E kī ana te kāwanatanga ko ana whakahōu e pā ana ki te whakakotahi i ngā wāhanga tūmatanui, tūmataiti, tūroro hoki ki te whawhai i te hara anō, ā, me whakamātau tētahi mea hou. I te Wenerei, ka whakaingoatia e nga minita nga whare tūmataiti e tūmanako ana rātau ki te whakahaere i nga CRCs e 21. Heoi anō, e kī ana a Napo kua raruraru kē te huarahi mahi hou. E kī ana ko ngā ture parenga e aukati ana i ngā kamupene tūmataiti e uru ana ki ngā raraunga whaiaro, ko te tikanga kāore e taea e ngā āpiha whakamātautau e mahi ana mō ngā CRC te titiro ki te hītori hara katoa o te hunga hara. Napo says it means staff cannot assess individuals safely or make a rational judgment as to their risk to the community. Ināianei e hiahia ana te uniana ki ngā kōti kia whakatau mēnā he tika te whakatau a te kāwanatanga ki te whakawātea i tētahi wāhanga o te ratonga. I kī a Īna Lawrence, te hēkeretari ahuwhānui o Napo, kua "kore te Manatu Ture e whakarongo ki o mātau māharahara". I roto i tētahi reta ki te MoJ - kua kitea e te AO - e kī ana ngā rōia o te uniana, a Slater & Gordon, he maha ngā mōrea "tūturu, ināianei tonu" kua whakaritea ki ngā kaimahi whakamātautau, tae atu ki te iwi whānui. E karanga ana ki te kāwanatanga kia puta ngā hua tūmatanui o ngā whakamātautau haumaru kia taea ai e ngā CRC te whakahaere i te ratonga. I tohutoro hoki te reta i ngā tauira o te wā i mōrearea ai ngā kaimahi nā te raruraru āheitanga mōhiohio, me te kore mōhiotanga mō te papamuri o te hunga hara. He taipitopito: I kī tētahi āpiha whakamātautau, nāna i kōrero ingoamuna ki a TE Rongokōrero o TE Rongokōrero, i te whakahaere i tētahi hunga hara "kāpō". "Kāore e taea e au te uru ki ana kōnae kēhi. He hītori tōna o ngā hara tōnā, taikaha, engari kāore aku tikanga ki te tiki i te taipitopito." "Kei te kimi mahi hou ahau i tēnei wā. Ehara tēnei i te mahi e hiahia ana ahau ki te mahi ināianei, kāore mātou i te pare i te iwi whānui," te tāpiri mai a te āpiha. Heoi anō, i kī a Tēnā Grayling ka huihuia e ngā whakahōu "ngā wāhanga tino pai o ngā wāhanga tūmatanui, tūmataiti, tūroro hoki ki te whawhai ki te hara anō". "E tino pai ana ahau ka horaina e mātau ngā pūkenga o ētahi o ngā aroha whakaora tino pai o Ingarangi hei āwhina i ēnei hunga hara ki te huri i o rātau oranga," tana tāpiri mai.

title: I 'whakaekea' te kaiwaiata o Shakira e te raiona moana
summary: Kua whakaahuatia e te whetū pahū o Shakira te āhua o te raiona moana "i ngana ki te ngau" i a ia i a ia e tango pikitia ana i tana waea pūkoro.
text: I te wā o tētahi hararei i Cape Town ka tuhituhi te kaiwaiata mō te āhua o te kararehe "kotahi waewae i a au, ka titiro mai ki te kanohi, ka haruru i te riri". Ka kī a ia: "I peke taku tuakana 'Super Tony' ki runga i a au, a, ka whakaorangia tōku ora, ka tango i ahau i te kararehe." I pāngia e Shakira rāua ko tōna tuakana he "raru" i ngā toka "i a rāua e ngana ana ki te tiaki i a māua". I roto i tētahi pou rangitaki i tōna whārangi Facebook e huaina ana ko "Pūrongo motuhake: I whakaekea e te raiona moana", i whakaurua e te kaiwaiata Kōpia tētahi whakaahua o tētahi motu iti e tautokona ana i tōna ringa. "I karanga ngā tāngata katoa i reira, tae atu ki a au. I pararaiha ahau i te mataku, a, kaore i taea te neke." I whakamāramatia e Shakira, e haere ana ki Awherika ki te Tonga, i whakaaro a ia kua pōraru te kararehe. "E whakapono ana ahau he aha te mea i tūpono ai, i pōraru te whakaata mōhinuhinu o te BlackBerry i tangohia e au ēnei whakaahua [mana], me ētahi momo ika," ka tuhituhi a ia. "Tērā pea i whakaaro ahau e whakatoi ana ahau ki te kai, kātahi ka tangohia atu i reira." E tino mōhiotia ana te whetū tau 35 tau mō te whai takitahi o te ao whānui pēnei i Anywhere Whenever, She Wolf and Underneath Your Clothes. I whakaputaina tana Sale el Sol hou rawa i Whiringahora 2011.

title: Ko nga manuhiri Covid kia kaua e anga atu ki etahi atu mahi i muri i te tirotiro pakaru Covid
summary: Ko ngā manuhiri mai i Jersey i kitea he kai i te wā e tika ana kia wehe rātou, kāore e anga atu ki ētahi atu mahi.
text: I hoatu he tiwhikete waihotanga ki te rōpū o ngā kaiwhakahaere kāinga tiaki tokowhā kia tomo ki te motu i te 17 o Hune. Engari i whakarewaina he tūhuratanga i muri i te kitenga i a rātau kai wharekai. I kī a Hauati Quayle i tangohia te whakataunga kia kaua e whiua i runga i ngā take huamoni tūmatanui me ētahi atu take. I kī atu a ia ki te Whare o Ngā Pātuhi kua whakatauria e te ratonga ture kāore i te tino mārama te kupu o ngā tohutohu i hoatu ki te rōpū kia mārama katoa ai rātau me pēhea te whanonga. Mai i tērā wā ka whakahōutia nga tohutohu, ka tāpiritia e ia. I raro i ngā ture Covid-19 o te motu, ko ngā kaimahi matua i whakaaetia kia haere ki te motu me wehe i a rātou anō i te wā kāore i te mahi. I kī a Tēnā Quayle: "Ko te whakataunga kia whiua e whakamōhiotia ana i ngā wā katoa e tētahi whakamātautau huamoni tūmatanui me ētahi atu take hāngai," tana kī. " I te arotakenga, i whakaaro te wehenga o te ture o nga Ruma o te Rōia Tianara kāore i te kaha te pānui aronga i tukuna i taua wā kia pai ai te mahinga. "I whakahōutia te pānui tohutohu hei whakatau i ēnei take." He aha e kore ai e whai i te Motu o Tangata i runga i Facebook me Twitter? Ka taea hoki e koe te tuku whakaaro pūrākau ki northwest.newsonline@bbc.co.uk

title: Papā o Hiria: Ka tuki te tauwhāinga 'e 20 ngā tāngata e tata ana ki Raqqa'
summary: Neke atu i te 20 ngā tāngata i patua e tētahi kāinga ki te raki o te pā o Hiriani o te Kāwanatanga o Īmāri o Raqqa, e kī ana ngā kaiwhaiwhai.
text: I pūrongotia e te Taiwhanga Hiriani o UK mō ngā Motika Tangata e ono nga wāhine me te tamaiti i waenganui i te hunga i mate i roto i nga poho i al-Heisha i te pō. Ko te kāinga i puritia e IS te ūnga o tētahi toa pūrua a Mātau o ngā kairiri a Kurīhi me ngā Arāpia e rapu ana ki te hopu i a Raqqa. I whakaūngia e te kaikōrero tauwhāinga kua whakahaeretia e ia he tuki i taua rohe. Engari i kī atu a Col John Dorrian ki te wāhi rongokōrero o TE WHK "e hiahiatia ana ētahi atu mōhiohio tauwhāiti hei whakatau tūturu i te kawenga" mō ngā tūpāpaku ā-iwi. I kī tētahi tauākī tauwhāinga e whitu ngā tuki tata ki te taone o Ain Issa, tata ki te 14km (9 km) ki te hauauru o al-Heisha, i te Tūtira e ono ngā wae takahanga IS, ā, e toru ngā tūnga whawhai, he waka, me tētahi pānga pomu motokā. I ākiritia e tētahi kaiwhakaatu mō te toa o Kurīhi-Arapia, ngā Ope Manapori o Hiria (SDF), ngā pūrongo o ngā tūpāpaku ā iwi hei "rongo IS". I te Rātapu, ka pānuitia e te SDF kua tīmataria he whakahau kia wehewehe, ā, i te mutunga ka whakahaere i a Raqqa, e tata ana ki te toru tau e whakahaeretia ana e IS. Ko te pūrongo tuatahi o te tuki hau i al-Heisha, tata ki te 40km (25 km) ki te raki o Raqqa, i puta mai i te rōpū kaiwhaiwhai ārai-IS, kei te patua mārire a Raqqa. E kī ana e 23 ngā tāngata i patua, a, i kitea katoatia engari tokowhā o rātau. I te Wenerei, ka kī te Taiwhanga Hiriani e 20 kua mate, ā, tata ki te 30 ētahi atu i whara i te whakaeke. I kī te SDF e 200 ngā whānau kua rere i a al-Heisha. Ko tētahi o ngā tangata i mawhiti, ko Saada al-Aboud, i kī atu ki a WHO: "I mauria mai e nga kairiri [IS] he rākau taumaha ki to mātau kāinga, a, ka noho i waenganui i a mātau kia patua ai mātau mehemea he tuki." "Kaore rātau e tuku i a mātau kia haere. I mawhiti mātau mā te oma ki ngā pārae, me a mātau tamariki me a mātau kaumātua. He aha atu anō tā mātou mahi? I mahue i a mātau ngā mea katoa." E kī ana te Taiwhanga Hiriani neke atu i te 680 ngā tāngata, tae atu ki ngā tamariki e 169, kua mate mai i te tīmatanga o te hau tauwhāinga i Hiria i te rua tau ki mua. Heoi anō, kua whakaae te tauwhāinga ki te kawenga mō ngā mate ā-iwi e 55 anake i Hiria me Iraki noho tata i waenganui o Aotearoa 2014 me Hōngongoi 2016. I tērā marama, ka kī a Amnesty International e 100 ngā tāngata i patua i roto i ngā tānga hau tauwhāinga e toru i June me Hōngongoi 2016 huri noa i Manbij, ki te raki o Raqqa, i te wā o tētahi mahi SDF hei whakahaere i ngā toa IS ki waho o te taone.

title: Te kai paipa hōhipera: E tautiaki ana ngā kaimahi o Cwm Taf ki te whakaū i te ārai
summary: Ko ngā kaiwhakahaere matua i ngā hōhipera puta noa i te nuinga o ngā awaawa o Wales ki te tonga e whakahaere ana i ngā taunga i roto i tētahi tono ngana ki te whakaū i tētahi ārai kai paipa.
text: Kua whakaurua te kaupapa here e te Poari Hauora o Cwm Taf, e kapi ana i a Merthyr Tydfil me Rhondda Cynon Taf. Kāore he tangata e whakaaetia ana kia paowa i runga i tētahi o ōna pae, tae atu ki ngā hōhipera, ngā pāka motokā, ngā whare hauora me ngā pūtahi hauora. E pāngia ana te Hōhipera o Prince Charles, te Hōhipera o Royal Glamorgan, Ysbyty Cwm Cynon me Ysbyty Cwm Rhondda. I kī atu a Nicola John, te kaiwhakahaere o te hauora tūmatanui i Cwm Taf, ki a BBC Wales: "Kei te tino koa mātou, kua tino pai te haere. " Since our launch we've had senior staff walk around the sites at various times." I kī a Ms John he "atawhai" me te "tautohetohe" ngā kaimahi. Kua whakaakona hoki te haumarutanga o te poari hauora ki te tautiaki i te rāhuitanga. "So far we've had no staff breaches, we've had a few a few members of the public who've been really apologetic and they've put them out," te kī a Ms John. Kua whakatūria hoki he raina hotline mō ngā tūroro me ngā kaimahi ki te pūrongo i ngā tāngata kai paipa i runga i ngā kāinga. Ka puta mai te āraitanga i muri i te Mahere Hohenga Tupeka a te kāwanatanga o Welsh kia whakaheke i te kai paipa ki te 16% i te tau 2020. Ko te tikanga o tēnei, hei tauira, e 26,000 ngā kaipaipa i te takiwā o Cwm Taf me whakamutu i roto i ngā tau e waru e whai ake nei. 'E ora roa ana' Ka kī a ia: "Ko te kai paipa te take nui rawa atu o te mate moata me te hauora kino i Weera, ā, e hiahia ana mātou ki te āwhina ki te whakaiti i ngā pāpātanga kai paipa mā te whakaurunga o tā mātou kaupapahere auahi hou. " He tokomaha ngā tāngata kua whakapuaki i ngā māharahara ki a mātau mō te hāhā i roto i te auahi ringa tuarua i a rātau e haere ana i ngā tomokanga ki ngā hōhipera e kai paipa ana te tangata, nā reira ka āwhina tā mātou kaupapahere ki te whakarite ehara tēnei i te take. "As a health board, we have a responsibility to promote healthy lifestyles and the single most important thing people can do to improve their health is to stop smoking. I kī a ia ka āwhina te kaupapahere i ngā kaipaipa ki te tuku me te whakatere i ngā tāngata kia "noho roa ake me te hākinakina i tētahi āhua noho hauora ake". I Me i tērā tau, ka rāhuitia te kai paipa i waho o ngā tomokanga hōhipera i Kānata me te Awaawa o Glamorgan.

title: Ka whiwhi te whakatūpato tōrangapū a Haina i tētahi whakarerekētanga mamati
summary: He maha nga tau e ngana ana, e hinga ana a Haina ki te tiki i tōna iwi, otirā ko ōna rangatahi, ki te māharahara ki tana pūnaha tōrangapū. Ka tata pea ināianei ki te mahi me pēhea te mahi i tēnei?
text: Nā te tari o PēhiRongokōrero Rongokōrero i ia Poutāpeta, ko te National People Congress (NPC), te takahanga tōrangapū ā-tau nui rawa o Haina, e tata ana ki te mōhiotia e te nuinga o te iwi Hainamana. Engari mēnā kua tae koe ki Haina, ka kite koe kua tāutatia ngā whakatūpato a te kāwanatanga i ngā wāhi katoa, mai i Chang'an Avenue i te taone nui o Beijing ki ngā ara taiwhenua iti. Ko ngā pānui whero me te tuhituhi waituhi mā, ngā whaikōrero roa, maroke hoki a ngā kaipōrangapū me ngā peha mārire mutunga kore, kua rite tonu te tuku a te Rōpū Ā iwi o Haina ki te hora i ngā mea e kitea ana e ētahi he karere tōrangapū me ngā akoranga tōrangapū. Engari i te nekehanga o te pūhara whakatūpato mai i te pepa raihi ki ngā mata LED, kua hangaia e te kāwanatanga he māminga hou. Ko tētahi o ōna angitu nui tuatahi ko te ataata pūoro o "Shisanwu", te Mahere Rima Tau 13, i puta mai i te tau 2015. Me pēhea koe e hoko ai i te ariā o te rautaki whanaketanga pāpori me te ohaoha 13 e rima tau ki te rangatahi? He ataata puoro hākoritanga me tētahi pēne kē e waiata ana i te reo Ingarihi. I puta inamata i runga i te pāpāho pāpori me te rangatahi e kōrero ana mō taua mea, te tiritiri, me te ako ki te waiata. He nui ake ēnei tikanga e whakaaetia ana i tēnei tau. Ko tētahi waiata rap e kiia nei ko "My Two Sessions, My Say", i hangaia e te People's Daily, e whakaahua ana tētahi mangai o te Rōpū Ā iwi i te tirohanga nui i te taenga mai o ngā kaitautapa o te Rōpū ā Iwi me te Hui Tauwhitiwhiti Tōrangapū me ngā rārangi take a to rātau iwi. Kei a ia ngā kupu kōrero katoa, e kōrerorero ana i ngā raruraru pāpori pēnei i ngā kaiwawao o Haina, e māngere ana ngā mana kāwanatanga i te mahi, engari e huatau ana hoki ka kōrerorerotia ngā amuamu katoa, ā, ka whiwhi te iwi i ā rātou whakautu. Ka ākiritia e ia te ariā he tinana tōrangapū inarapa noa iho te rōpū nui. "Wow, ahakoa ka tīmata te kura tawhito o te Rā o te Rā o te Iwi ki te rap," ko tētahi urupare e pāorotia nuitia ana i roto i te pāpāho pāpori. Engari kāore ētahi i mīharo. "Ehara i aku kaitautapa, ehara i taku rōpū. Kore rawa ahau i whai kōrero."; " Ko wai ēnei kaitautapa? Kāore au i pōti mō rātou." I whakaputaina hoki e te Kaunihera Kāwanatanga o Hainamana he rangatū o ngā ataata mamati rongokōrero e whakaatu ana i ngā hiahia o te iwi i te whakahaerenga ki te rōpū nui. I uiuia hoki e rātau ngā tāngata rongonui i whiriwhiria āta kōwhiria, pēnei i a Hu Weiwei, te kaipakihi me te kaiwhakarewa o ngā paihikara hiko tino angitu o Haina me tētahi rongo huaketo i Haina. I kī a Ms Hu he rerekē, he tawhiti hoki te pūrongo NPC a te kāwanatanga. I tētahi atu uiuinga, ka kī te kaitapere rongonui o Ge You e hiahia ana a ia ki te whakarongo ki ngā rongoā ki te pokenga o te hau. Ko ēnei katoa e whakaata ana i nga māharahara tūturu me nga whakaaro o te iwi noa iho. "Ka hoatu e au ngā piro katoa ki te tīma PR i muri i a ia," te kī a tētahi kaiwhakamahi tukutuku: "Mēnā i pēnei te kōrero a te kāwanatanga ki a au, kua whakarongo ahau." Kua whārōrō tonu te mahi whakatūpato ki tētahi rōpū i WeChat, te taupānga pāpāho pāpori tino pai o Haina. Ina uru koe ki te tono kōrerorero NPC ka ohorere koe "i roto i tētahi rōpū" me te Pirimia Li Keqiang, ngā minita kāwanatanga me ngā kaitautapa. E mārama ana te whakataruna, engari i te mutunga ka mauria koe e te tauwhitinga he whārangi e kite ai koe i tētahi kōrerorero whakataruna i waenganui i a koe, ētahi atu tāngata Hainamana noa me ngā mana rangatira. "Kōrerorero rōpū ki ngā kaiārahi kāwanatanga. He ariā tino mātao.", "He tino tūturu. He pai ki a au," he tokomaha kua kōrero i runga i te pāpāho pāpori. "He rūpahu katoa. He whakamaumahara tērā e kore e taea e mātau te whakawhiti kōrero ki ngā kaiārahi o te kāwanatanga, ki ngā kaitautapa rānei o te rōpū nui pēnei," te kī a te hunga pōhēhē. Engari kāore he pōhatu i mahue i roto i tēnei whakahau tawhito rawa kia tae atu ki te nuinga mamati. Nā reira kua tauria ngā manene ki te āwhina, tērā pea i runga i te tūmanako ka āwhina hoki ngā kanohi kē ki te whakauru atu ki te hunga kē. I roto i tētahi whakamāramatanga ataata o China Daily, ka huri tētahi tangata Peretania ko Greg hei pepeha iti i runga i te tēpu tari. E haere ana a ia i roto i tētahi maramataka, te pukapuka a Xi Jinping The Governance of China, i a ia e whakamārama ana i te rōpū nui. E kī ana ngā kaiwhakawāwā he ōrite tonu te pānuitanga tawhito, i runga noa iho i ngā pūhara hōu. Engari e whakaatu ana rātau i te hiahia ki te whakahou i te wāhi o te kāwanatanga me te pāpāho whakahaere kāwanatanga, me te whakauru i te iwi whānui i runga i ngā pūhara e mōhio ana rātau e whakawhiwhia ana e te tangata taua mahi hou. Ka taea e rātau te angitu i roto i tētahi take: i te iti rawa kei te whiwhi rātau i te rangatahi ki te kōrero mō te rōpū nui. E rima tau ki muri kāore tēnei i puta.

title: Ka whakawhiti te umanga o Ayr i te mahere rimurapa mai i Uist ki te Tonga ki Oban
summary: Kua tangohia te kaupapa a tētahi umanga ā-Ayr ki te whakatuwhera i tētahi tipu tukatuka rimurapa e £20m i Uist ki te Tonga.
text: I tonoa e Marine Biopolymers Ltd kia hangaia te wheketere i Lochboisdale e tukatukatia ai te rimurapa hei whakamahi i ngā hua kai me ngā whakanao. Tērā pea ka waihangatia e te kaupapa tae atu ki te 60 ngā mahi. Heoi anō, kua nekehia e te kamupene tōna aro ki te whakatatū i te wheketere ki tētahi tipu tīariari, engari i katia e ia, i Barcaldine tata ki Oban. I kōrero a Storas Uibhist, e whakahaere ana i te South Uist Estate nā te hapori, ki ngā Biopolymers Moana. South Uist councillor Ronnie MacKinnon said it was hopeed that another seaweed processing business could be attracted to the island.

title: I whakahaua a Toshiba ki te hoko i te 40% o te NuGen o UK
summary: Kua whakahaua a Toshiba ki te hoko i te 40% o te kamupene pūngao karihi o UK NuGen kāore anō kia noho kē.
text: Kei a NuGen te kirimana ki te hanga i tētahi hiko hiko karihi hou i Cumbria. I kī te kamupene taputapu Wīwī o Engie e whakamahi ana i ōna "mana kirimana" ki te hoko i ōna hea nā te mea kei te "anga atu a NuGen ki ētahi whakamātautau nui". I tērā wiki, i rapu parenga pokapū te Westinghouse o Toshiba i te US, arā, hei hanga i ngā pūrere o te tipu. I kī te matua Tiapanī raruraru ka pāngia ngā mahi a Westinghouse anake i te pokapū. Heoi anō, i taua wā i huatau ai ngā pūrongo pāpāho ka taea e te pokapū te whakaroa i te kaupapa i Moorside i West Cumbria, ka whakararuraru rānei i tōna wā heke. 'Hohenga' E whakaarohia ana ka homai e te tipu Moorside te 7% o ngā hiahia pūngao o te UK. I roto i te kōrero o te Tūrei, ka kī a Toshiba ko te kōnae pokapū he "mahi e tutuki ana i te whakamāramatanga o tētahi 'takahanga taunoa' i raro i ngā ture o te kirimana" ki a Engie. "Nā reira kua whakamahia e Engie ōna mana ki te tono kia hokona e Toshiba tōna pupuritanga." Kei te utu a Toshiba mō te 15.3bn iene ($138.5m; £111.2m) mō te tūnga. I tāpiritia e ia ka "kimi tonu i ngā kaihoko e hiahia ana ki te haumi i NuGen, me te rapu ki te hoko atu i tōna pupuri i roto i te kamupene". Tautohetohe Kua tōia ngā raruraru i Westinghouse ki a Toshiba. I te wā o Hakihea ka puta mai ka anga atu ki tētahi ngaromanga taumaha kotahi e honoa ana ki tētahi mahi i mahia e Westinghouse, nāna i hoko mai he umanga hanganga karihi me ngā ratonga mai i te Arawhiti o Haikaika & Rino (CB&I) i te tau 2015. Engari ko ngā rawa i tangohia e ia, tērā pea he iti iho te wāriu i te whakaaro tuatahi, ā, he tautohetohe anō mō ngā utu e tika ana. I te wā o Hui tanguru ka puta mai ko te ngaromanga e tata ana ki te $6.3bn (£5.05bn). I whakarerea e te manukura o Toshiba, ka takaware te umanga ki te tuku i ōna whika pūtea katoa - i te tuatahi mō te marama - kātahi ka roa ake. Hei mono i te āputa, kua tautuhia a Toshiba ki te hoko i tētahi tūnga nui i roto i tana umanga pūmahara kōhiko NAND kia puta ai i tōna raruraru pūtea haere tonu. I puta katoa mai ēnei mea katoa i runga i ngā uauatanga a Toshiba ki te huri i te kokonga i muri i tētahi heitara whai hua. I roto i tētahi kōrero, ka kī te Tari mō te Pūngao Pakihi me te Rautaki Mahi: "Kua whakaritea tonutia e te whakawhāiti NuGen ki te kawe mai i ētahi atu hoa ki te tuku i te kaupapa, ā, ka rite tonu tā mātou whakauru ki ngā kaiwhakawhanake me ngā kaiwhakangao. " I tēnei wā kei Kōrea ki te Tonga te Hēkeretari o te Kāwanatanga mō ngā kōrero mō te ngātahitanga ā muri ake i waenganui i o mātau whenua e rua, tae atu ki ngā kaupapa karihi karihi ā iwi."

title: E rangirua ana ngā upoko i ngā kerēme a Ofqual i runga i te GCSE Ingarihi
summary: E wero ana ngā kaiako mātāmua i te whakawhirinakitanga o te putanga a Ofqual o te tautohetohe whakamātautau Ingarihi GCSE - e kī ana ko ngā pūrongo o te poari whakamātautau e whakaū ana i te whaikikotanga o te tohu a ngā kaiako.
text: Nā Sean CoughlanBBC News education correspondent E kī ana rātau ko aua pūrongo whakaōrite e whakaatu ana i te tika o te tohu a ngā kaiako. I whakamutua e te pūrongo a Ofqual he "tohu nui rawa". Engari i whakaūngia e te poari whakamātautau AQA he iti iho i te 5% o ngā aromatawai a ngā kaiako mō te GCSE Ingarihi me whakarite. Ko te upoko o Rāwhiti o Rāwhiti, ko Kenny Frederick, e tautokona ana e ngā rōpū kaiako matua, e wero ana i te kaiwhakahaere whakamātautau ki te whakaputa whakaaturanga ki te whakahoki i ngā kerēme kua nui rawa te māhorahora o ngā kura ki te tohu. I kī te kaiārahi o ngā kaiako matua, a Kōrero Lightman, he maha ngā kura e kī ana ināianei i whakawāteatia ta rātau aromatawai hei "tauira" mā te whakangāwari - engari kātahi ka whakahekea. "Mēnā kāore e taea e ngā kura te whakawhirinaki ki ngā urupare mai i ngā kaiwhakaōrite, he aha tā rātou e whakawhirinaki ai?" te kī a Tēnā Lightman. Ko te pūrongo o tērā wiki a Ofqual ki te tautohetohe Ingarihi GCSE, i tautāwhi i tana whakatau kia huri i ngā rohenga kōeke me te whakapae i te tohu nui rawa i roto i ngā aromatawai a ngā kaiako. I kī tētahi kaikōrero Ofqual i te Tūtira "he nui rawa te tohu nui kia uaua ai te whakawhiwhinga". He wero whakaaturanga Engari e karanga ana ngā upoko ki a Ofqual ki te whakaatu i ngā whakaaturanga o te wāhi i pā mai ai tēnei. I whakaritea e Ofqual he rangahau mō te pūrongo ki ngā kura i pāngia kinotia. I kawea tēnei e tētahi tohutohu rangahau i kōrero ki ngā kaiako i ngā kura me ngā kura e 100 - engari te āhua nei kāore tēnei i titiro ki ētahi pepa whakamātautau tūturu. Te āhua nei ko te kerēme a Ofqual he nui rawa te tohu i puta mai i ngā papa whakamātautau - he pūnaha whakaōrite hoki hei ārai i tēnei. I kitea e ngā whakaaturanga a AQA te "tohu rautaki" e ngā kaiako i "ētahi pūtahi". Engari kua pātai mai ngā kaiako he aha, mēnā he whakaaturanga o te tohu nui i ētahi pokapū whakamātautau, kāore tēnei i whiua i ēnei wāhi tauwhāiti - kaua e whakaiti i ngā kōeke puta noa i ngā kura katoa. "E kī ana koe kua pēnei te whanonga o ngā kura katoa? Ki te kore, he aha tātau katoa i ōrite ai?" te pātai a tētahi tumuaki tuarua o Bolton. E karanga ana a Ms Frederick, e tautokona ana e te National Association of Head Teachers, ki ētahi atu kaiako matua kia whakaputa i ā rātou pūrongo whakaōrite - ā, e kī ana kei te ngaro te whakaaro o ngā kura i te ārahitanga o Ofqual. She wants schools to produce evidence to their local communities which they say would challenge Ofqual's account of the changes in grades. Kua tukua e Ms Frederick te urupare whakaōrite mai i tōna ake kura, te Kura o George Green i Tower Hamlets. Ka tirohia e ngā kaiwhakaōrite o te poari whakamātautau tētahi tauira matapōkere o ngā kaitono kia tino mōhio ai kei te mau tonu ngā aromatawai ki ngā paerewa e tūmanakohia ana. "Me whakamihi te pokapū mō te āhua o ngā urupare taipitopito mai i ngā ākonga ki ngā kuputuhi nui," ko te tuhituhi a te kaiwhakaōrite o te poari whakamātautau. Nā ngā tuhipoka a ngā kaiako i "mārama ai te kaiwhakaōrite me pēhea, he aha hoki i whakawhiwhia ai e te pokapū he tohu" - ā, i kī mai he "tino mīharo" ētahi o ngā mahi. Engari i te pānuitanga o ngā hua - i whakaaturia e 19 ngā tauira i hapa i tētahi kōeke C i te reo Ingarihi. I roto tēnei i tētahi kura e piki ana ngā kōeke whakamātautau. E kī ana ngā upoko kua pāngia aua tauira takitahi e tētahi māminga tika o ngā kōeke o tēnei raumati. Ms Frederick says the moderation report shows that teachers' assessments had been checked and verified by the exam board - in this case AQA - and called on Ofqual to provide evidence to show why such moderated assessments should then be downgraded. I kitea e te pūrongo a Ofqual i tērā wiki: "Ko te nuinga o ngā pūtahi i uiuia e mātau kāore i hurihia ō rātou tohu mō te aromatawai whakahaere mā te whakaōrite. " Ko te nuinga o nga pokapū i whakaaro he tika ta rātau tohu. I te katoa, kua whiwhi ngā kaiako i ngā reta mai i ngā Rōpū Whakawhiwhinga e kī ana kua whakaaetia ā rātou tohu me te kore whakaritenga." Nā taua urupare - nāna i whakaaro ki ngā kura kei te whakaūngia ngā kōeke - kua "waihanga raruraru", ka whakamutua te pūrongo a Ofqual. E tohu ana tēnei i ngā kura whai huarere nui i ngā hua e tūmanakohia ana, he ōrite ngā whakawā a ngā kaiako me ngā kaiwhakaōrite o te poari whakamātautau, ā, i tūpono ki ngā huringa o muri mai o Ofqual ki ngā rohenga kōeke. E kī ana te pūrongo ka hoatu te whakaōritenga ki te taumata o ia wae whakamātautau - engari ka puta mai te hiahia huringa ā muri ake, i te taumata o te tohu katoa. Kua tohu hoki tētahi kaikōrero AQA ki te "manawanui" e whakaaetia ana ki te tohu - ā, ahakoa i panaia e ngā kaiako tā rātou tohu ki te tepe o runga o tēnei awhe, kāore e hiahiatia he huringa e hiahiatia ana e ngā kaiwhakaōrite. Mēnā ka panaia e ngā kaiako puta noa i te pūnaha ā rātou tohu ki tēnei tepenga o runga e whakaaetia ana, ka kite i te pikinga o ngā tohu kāore e kitea e te tukanga whakaōrite. Kua tuhituhi a Ms Frederick ki te rangatira o Ofqual, a Glenys Stacey, e tono ana i ngā whakaaturanga e tautoko ana i te hiahia mō te huringa rohenga kōeke. "He whakaaturanga tāu mo te tohu nui a nga kaiako? Ka kitea e tātau? Ko ēhea kura, ko ēhea ngā ākonga e kōrero ana koe i roto i te pūrongo?," ko te tuhituhi a Ms Frederick. Kua makaia hoki e ia te karapu ki te kaiwhakarite - e kī ana he "kino te ārahi, ā, kāore e hiahia ana ki te whakaae ki te kawenga". E kī ana a Brian Lightman, te kaiārahi o te Association of School and College Leaders: "Kua rongo mātou i ngā kura maha i korerotia ki a rātou he tauira tā rātou tohu aromatawai whakahaere, kātahi anō ka kitea ā muri ake kua whakahekea. " Mēnā he take ki te tohu nui o te kaiako, me mahi a Ofqual me ngā papa whakamātautau mā te whakapai ake i te tukanga whakaōrite, kaua mā te huri i ngā rohenga kōeke i te haora 11. E tino whakahauhau ana a ASCL i ngā kura ki te whakaputa i ā rātou pūrongo whakaōrite, kia kite ai te iwi whānui i ngā mōhiohio e whakaū ana ngā kura i ā rātou matapae." Tērā anō tētahi wero ā-ture e whakatūria ana i runga i ngā hua GCSE, mai i tētahi toa o ngā kura me ngā mana ā-rohe. I Weera, i māka anō ngā pepa whakamātautau, engari kua haere tonu te tautohetohe i Ingarangi. I kī tētahi kaikōrero o Ofqual: "E mōhio ana tā mātou pūrongo ki ngā pēhanga kei raro i ngā kura me ngā kaiako. I te whakaputatanga i kōrero muna ai mātau - ki ngā tāngata i roto i ngā kura neke atu i te 100, ā, ka tātaritia te nui o ngā raraunga. Kāore he wāhi e kī ana te pūrongo, ā, kāore hoki mātou e hiahia ki te huatau, he nui rawa te tohu o ngā kura katoa. "Kāore anō mātou kia kī e tinihanga ana ngā kaiako, e ai ki ētahi pūrongo pāpāho. Engari he nui rawa te tohu nui kia uaua ai te whakawhiwhinga, me te āwhina ki ngā hua ohorere i kitea e mātau." Hei urupare ki te tānga a ngā kaiako matua o ngā pūrongo whakaōrite, ka kī tētahi kaikōrero mō te poari whakamātautau AQA: "I kitea e Ofqual i te wā i tohua tika e ia kura ā rātou mahi aromatawai whakahaere e ai ki ngā paearu tohu, i whakaaturia e te pikitia ā-motu he tūmanako ētahi tohu. " We are acutely aware that the results this summer had a big impact on some schools and have left many students and teachers feeling very let down. E mōhio ana mātou me mātua whakarite mātou he pai, he pūataata hoki ā mātou tukanga whakaōrite me ngā whakawhitiwhitinga ki ngā kura."

title: Whakaaturanga Rangi o Aotearoa: He maha ngā rererangi, engari he nui te wāhi rererangi?
summary: Ko ngā taunga rererangi hou, e hia rau miriona tāra te wāriu o ngā rererangi hou: te āhua nei he rauemi mutunga kore me te hiahia o ētahi o ngā tūnga nui o te Kōwhiti me ā rātou waka rererangi.
text: Nā Russell HottenDubai Air Show Engari kāore i taea e ngā whenua te whakatika i tētahi raruraru e whakawehi ana i tō rātou tupunga rererangi. Ka hiahiatia he mokowā hei rere i aua rererangi hou katoa i tonoa i te Whakaaturanga Rererangi o Aotearoa. Ko te raruraru, kei te māharahara kē te wāhi ātea i runga ake i te Kōwhiu. E mōhio ana nga mana me nga waka rererangi he raruraru. Kāore i te mārama mēnā ka taea tētahi mea mō taua mea. "Kei te noho noa iho ngā takaware. Ā, ka tipu noa iho ngā takaware i te tipu o ngā mahi," te whakatūpato a Hussein Dabbas, te kaiwhakahaere ā-rohe o te International Air Transport Association. "Ki te kore tātau e whakamutu i te tōnuitanga o ngā takaware, ka āta pakaru te pūnaha - ka whakahekea te tōtika o ngā waka rererangi." Neke atu i te 741,000 te maha o ngā nekehanga rererangi i roto i te takiwā o Ngā Ariki Arāpia o Te Hononga o Ngā Ariki Arāpia i tērā tau, e ai ki ngā whika whai mana. E tohu ana kia tae ki te 895,500 i te tau 2015, me te 1,13 miriona i te tau 2020. Ko te haerenga rererangi ki Qatar, Bahrain, Omana, me ētahi atu wāhi, e tohu ana hoki ka tere te piki ake. Ko te raruraru, i whakaritea motuhake te whakahaere waka rererangi i ēnei whenua. He pakiaka hītori, he pakiaka ā-whenua hoki tō te wāhi ātea kongakonga me te kore whakaritenga. Ko te hua he kōpikopiko o ngā rohenga me ngā pānuitanga ātea, me te mahi tahi whāiti. "Kāore he tinana ā-rohe tūturu e āhei ana ki te hopu i te take me te mahi," te kī a John Swift, tētahi kaiwhakahaere o mua o te mana waka rererangi i te Taunga Rererangi o Aotearoa. He maha ngā kōmihana me ngā rōpū mahi kua titiro ki ngā raruraru whakahaere waka. "He maha ngā whakahaere me ngā waka rererangi e hiahia ana ki te mahi i tētahi mea, engari he pōturi te kauneketanga," tana kī. "Kāore e kore ko te paheketanga te wero nui rawa e anga ana ki te umanga rererangi i te Rāwhiti o Waenganui," te kī a Tēnā Swift, ināianei ko te kaiwhakahaere o te Rāwhiti o Waenganui i NATS, e whakahaere ana i ngā ratonga waka rererangi o UK. Ko tētahi wāhanga o te raruraru, kei te weto ngā rererangi tūmatanui ki ngā wāhi nui o te wāhi ātea e whakamahia ana e te hōia. I roto i te UAE hira rautaki, hei tauira, ko te 50% o te wāhi rererangi e whakahaeretia ana e te tari wawao, ka waiho he ara whāiti ki te rere. I Uropi, he ngāwari noa iho te āhua o nga whenua ki te wāhi rererangi. Ka whakamahia e ngā rererangi tūmatanui me ngā rererangi hōia te wāhi ātea e ai ki te hiahiatia, e kī ana a Tēnā Swift. "Ka taea e ngā taha e rua te mahi i a rātau umanga me ngā mahi wawao ā-motu me te kore raruraru. " Ko ngā kaiwhakahaere rererangi o te Rāwhiti o Waenganui e haere ana ki NATS i te UK e mīharo ana ki te kite i ngā pūmana tūmatanui me ngā hōia e noho tahi ana," tana kī. "Engari he huarahi tērā e tino whai hua ai te rohe." E kī ana a Tēnā Swift, nāna i tohutohu i ngā mana UAE mō ngā take ātea mō te hanganga o te taunga rererangi hou o Aotearoa, ehara te hangarau i te take. He maha nga whenua o te Kōwhiti he pūnaha whakahaere waka rererangi tōtika. I whakatuwheratia te Pokapū Whakaterenga Rererangi o te UAE i te tau 2009, ā, ko tētahi o ngā tino mātauranga o te ao. Nā reira, ehara i te raruraru hangarau te wetemaukati i ētahi atu wāhi ā-hōia mō te whakamahinga tūmatanui, e kī ana a Tēnā Swift. He pātai kē atu ki te hiahia me te manawanui. Te ngaro nei te whakapono e whakaae ana ngā rōpū katoa he kī te mahi tahi me te whakariterite. Engari he ngāwari kē atu te kōrero i te mahi. He kaiwhakahaere rererangi tūmatanui whānui tā te UAE, engari he mana takitahi anō tā ngā Emirates. Ka rite tonu ta rātau tūtaki, tae atu ki te hōia. Tauinetia tēnei tikanga here ki tētahi taumata ā-rohe, ā, he rīrapa tāu e tauwhāinga ana. E mārama ana te āwangawanga i waenganui i te hunga e whakahaere ana i ngā taunga rererangi me ngā waka rererangi. Ko ngā māharahara koretake mo te rangatiratanga, te wairua me ngā tōrangapū "kei te whakararuraru i te arorau", te kī a te rangatira nui o Ngā Taunga Rererangi o Aotearoa, a Paul Griffiths i roto i tētahi whaikōrero i pūrongotia whānuitia inā noa nei. Ināianei kua whakawehitia te pūtea penapena nui i runga i te whenua i te rahunga ki te whakatau i ngā take ātea, ka whakatūpato a ia. He tino hira mō te UAE, i reira te rererangi e hanga ana i tētahi wāhanga nui o te āhua o te whakahaerenga. I Aotearoa, ko te rererangi e tata ana ki te 25% o te GDP me te kaitukumahi nui. A tērā tau e tūmanakohia ana kia mau te Taunga Rererangi o Aotearoa i a Heathrow hei mea nui rawa atu i te ao. Ka nui ake te $32bn hou (£19.8bn) Al Maktoum International. Ehara te UAE i te ūnga tūruhi noa iho. Ko Apu Tapi, Aorangi, tae atu ki Qatar, he pokapū tūhononga tino nui mō ngā tāngata e whakawhiti ana i te ao. Kei te tipu haere ngā pūrongo o ngā rerenga hapa i takea mai i te takaware i runga i te whenua me te porowhita i runga. He maha ngā whiringa a te hunga haere haere, pērā i Hingapoa. Kei te nui te haumi a Tākehi ki te whakarite kia pokanoatia e Istanbul tōna tūnga matawhenua. "Ki te tīmata te tangata ki te ngaro i te whakapono ki te tauira pakihi, he raruraru nui tēnā," te kī a Tēnā Swift. "I te mutunga, me tīmata te tangata ki te whakaaro mō te pare i tā rātou pūtea penapena. Kaore he rererangi i runga i te whenua e mahi moni." 'Ngā kōwhiringa uaua' e whakaahua ana a Tēnā Swift i te wāhi ātea hei "hanganga ariari" e tika ana kia mahia, kia whakahaeretia hoki pēnei i tētahi rawa ohaoha. "Mēnā kei te whakaiti tētahi rawa, ka tukitukia te tauira pakihi. Whakaaturia te raruraru i runga i ngā tikanga pūtea, ā, tērā pea ka akiaki i te mahi." I tērā marama, i oti i a Airbus ProSky, te wehenga whakahaere waka rererangi o Airbus, tētahi pūrongo whaimana me pēhea te whakahaere pai ake i te wāhi rererangi UAE. E 53 ngā tūtohutanga. E kī ana a Wānanga Al Jallaf, te kaiwhakahaere o te Komiti Tohutohu Rererangi ā-Motu o UAE, ko te tikanga o ngā tūtohutanga he "kōwhiringa uaua" tā ngā mana. "Ka uaua ake ngā wā i a mātou e tīmata ana ki te mahi i te whakatinanatanga o te akoranga [Airbus ProSky]," tana kī. Heoi anō, kāore tētahi o ngā tūtohutanga i whakawhānuitia. He tokomaha ngā tāngata e mōhio ana ki te rautaki ā muri ake. Heoi anō, ahakoa ka whakaraupapatia e te UAE tōna wāhi ā-rangi, kāore pea ētahi atu kāwanatanga ehara te rererangi i te painga ohaoha taketake. I Uropi, ka whakaritea ngā Paraka Mokowā Taumahinga i runga i ngā hiahia whakahaere tino tika, ahakoa ngā rohenga whenua. Kai te neke a Uropi ki tētahi Rangi Pākehā Kotahi. Ki te tokomaha o ngā tāngata, ko te tauira ōrite anake te whakautu mō te Kōwhiu. Engari he maha nga tau e tawhiti ana, ā, he torutoru noa iho ngā tāngata e whakahē ana e hiahiatia ana tēnei e te rohe ināianei.

title: Ka wehe atu te āpiha Pirihimana o Thames Valley 'i kitea e mahi ana i te karate'
summary: Kua whakapaea tētahi pirihimana o mua ki te mahi karate i a ia e whakaiti ana i ngā haora i te mahi me te whara o muri.
text: Ka puta mai a Toni Alderman i tētahi whakarongo hē i te tari matua o ngā Pirihimana o Thames Valley i Kidlington e whakapaea ana he hē nui. E kiia ana i kitea a ia e mahi karate ana i a ia e mahi ana i nga mahi whāiti. I kī atu a ia ki te tōpana e kore e taea e ia te whawhai, te pupuri rānei i tētahi tangata i roto i tēnei wā, e kiia ana. I noho a Tēnā Alderman i te teihana pirihimana o Banbury, a, i haere atu i te ope i Whiringa ā Rangi. Ka tirohia e te whakarongo mēnā i takahia e ia ngā paerewa o te whanonga ngaio e pā ana ki te pono me te tapatahi, me ngā mahi me ngā kawenga i a ia e pirihimana ana i tērā tau. E ai ki ngā taipitopito i tukuna e ngā Pirihimana o Thames Valley mō te whakarongo e tū mai nei, i te wā o Me i pūrongotia e ia kua mate a ia nā te whara o muri. I hoki a ia ki te mahi i a Hōngongoi, engari i kī "kāore i taea e ia te whawhai, te tautāwhi rānei, kāore e taea e ia te mahi whakaora mēnā e hiahiatia ana, ā, kāore ia i te haere ki te whare tākaro". Engari i kitea a ia e whai wāhi ana ki ngā wātū karate i taua marama kotahi, ā, i te wā o tētahi tūhuratanga o muri mai ka kitea e hiki ana i ngā taonga taumaha. Ka tū te rongo i te 21 me te 22 o Poutāpeta.

title: Ka whakapuaki a Nicki Minaj i te haerenga 10 rā o UK mō Whiringahora
summary: Kua pānuitia e Nicki Minaj tētahi haereere UK e tīmata ana i Rāhui i te 21 o Whiringa ā-rangi.
text: Ka tū hoki te whakaterenga 10 rā o te Paraire Māwhero Reloaded i Manchester, Liverpool, Newcastle, Birmingham, London, Sheffield me Cardiff. I tukua e te tau 29 tau tana pukaemi tuarua Paraire Māwhero: Roman Reloaded i Aperira me Starships e tae ana ki te tau tuatahi i te tūtohi takitahi. I mahia e te whetū rap o Amerika i mua i a Piki-Z rāua ko Kasabian i runga i te atamira matua i te Mutunga Wiki o Hackney o Radio 1. E 10 ngā riu i whakatangihia e Minaj, tae atu ki te kotahi hou, Pound, The Alarm me Superbass. Ka puta a ia i Ahokore i te 7 o Hōngongoi me te Hākari V i Aotearoa. Kua whakaingoatia a Nicki Minaj mō ngā Grammys e toru mō te rehetoi hōu tino pai, te mahinga rap me te pukaemi rap, ā, ko ia te rehetoi tuatahi e whitu ngā takitahi i runga i te tūtohi Billboard Hot 100 o Amerika i te wā kotahi. Kua pānuitia a Young Money's Tyga hei manuhiri motuhake i ngā rā katoa o Ūropi. Ko ngā rā e whai ake nei: Nottingham Arena -21 October Manchester Arena - 22 Liverpool Echo Arena - 24 Newcastle Arena - 25 Birmingham LG Arena - 27 Newcastle Arena - 28 London 02 Arena - 30 Manchester Arena - 2 November Sheffield Arena - 3 Cardiff Arena - 7

title: Tirohia e te pāpāho te putanga o Khodorkovsky hei mahi PR o Te Rūnanga
summary: Ka whakamāramatia e te pāpāho Rūhia te murunga ohorere o Mīharo Khodorkovsky hei whakamātau a Te Rūhia ki te paraihe i tōna whakaahua i mua i te Omirangi o Sochi 2014.
text: E whakapono ana a Kommersant whai mana i ia rā, i whakahaua te hoariri tōrangapū a Perehitini Tūroro ki te tono mārire, me ētahi atu pepa e tohu ana kua kore te kaiwhaiwhai hinu o mua e whakararuraru ki te kāwanatanga. Heoi anō, ka whatu te pepa kāwanatanga o Izvestiya i te nekehanga hei "wāhi huri" i roto i ngā tōrangapū o Rūhia. 'Iti noa iho' "E whakaatu ana a Hapa i te mārire i mua i te Omirangi," ka kī atu te kaitātari tōrangapū o Leonid Davydov ki a Vedomosti i ia rā. I te kōrero ki te pepa kotahi, e kī ana tētahi atu tohutohu, e kī ana a Yevgeny Minchenko ko te whakataunga kia whakawātea i a Tūroro "ehara i te mōrea mō ngā mana". "Kua whakawaia te ātete paremata, ā, kāore he ātete i waho o te pāremata," tana whakamārama. E whakahuatia ana taua whakaaro i roto i ngā Moskovsky Komsomolets o ia rā. Ko te whakataunga a Hapa "ka tino whakapai ake i te āhua o te pāpāho ao whānui mō te Omirangi o Sochi", ko te tuhituhi a Stanislav Belkovsky. Ka whakamāramatia e ia kua "mutu te tuma ki te perehitini o Rūhia me te kāwanatanga", i te wā ka tukua a ia "tērā pea ka arotahi ki te whakatika i ngā tūkinotanga i mahia ki tōna hauora mā te hereheretanga me te whakauru ki ngā mahi tūmatanui o tētahi āhuatanga kāore i te hākinakina". Ko te tūponotanga o Mikhail Khodorkovsky "i ngā wā katoa e hiahia ana ki tētahi iti noa iho o ngā tangata whenua o Rūhia", e tautohe ana a Lev Gudkov i Kommersant, "te 25-30%... ko te hunga e akona ana e whai ana i ngā rongo mā ngā pūtake takitahi, nō reira e mōhio ana ki te horopaki tōrangapū". I whakahaua ki te inoi? "E tuku ana a Mikhail Khodorkovsky mo te muru," e kī ana tētahi panekōrero i Kommersant, te pūtea tino pai i ia rā i te whenua. Ka whakahuatia e te pepa ngā pūtake e kī ana, inā noa nei he "kōrerorero ki ngā kaiwhakahaere haumarutanga" nāna i kī atu ki a ia "kua kino haere tōna whaea, he mate pukupuku, ā, ākuanei ka whakarewaina he take hara hou ki a ia". "Ko taua kōrerorero, i tū me te kore rōia i konei, nāna i āki a Tūroro ki te tono ki te perehitini [mo te māuiui]," te kī a ia rā. Ka puta mai tētahi whakaaro ōrite i roto i te pepa whānui o te taumaha o Nezavisimaya Gazeta. E kī ana i tētahi "tohunga mōhiotia" e kī ana ko Tūroro "i whakatata mai ki te whakahaeretanga o te whare herehere, nāna i whakaū ki a ia mehemea ka tuhia e ia he tono murunga, ka tukuna wawe". E kite ana a Izvestiya i ia rā i te whakataunga kia tukua a Tūroro hei "wāhi huri" i roto i te hītori o Rūhia. E matapae ana te pepa ka ōrite te tikanga o te wā mō te whenua ki te mutunga o ngā pakanga tūmatanui, e mōhiotia ana ko Fronde, mō Wīwī i te rau tau 17. "Kua mutu to mātau Fronde," e kī ana te kaiwhakatika tuarua o te pepa, a Boris Mezhuyev. E tautohe ana a ia ko te mutunga "tohu" o te tautohetohe i roto i te iwi i "tohua e te whakawāteatanga i hoatu ki ngā kaiuru i roto i ngā whakahēnga [ārai kāwanatanga] 2011 me te 2012" me te "mea nui rawa" e te murunga i tukuna ki "te kaiārahi tuatahi me te kaiārahi matua o to mātau rohe o Fronde, te kaipāngai o Mikhail Khodorkovsky". Heoi anō, kāore ētahi atu kaiwaiata i te tino tūmanako. "Kaua tētahi e tūmanako ka whai pānga nui te whakataunga a Hapa ki te whakahaerenga o Rūhia," te kōrero a te kaitātari o Igor Nikolayev ki a TT Daily. "He uaua ki te whakaaro mā te pānga PR o te muru i a Khodorkovsky e whakaora i ngā motu i pā ki te whakahaerenga me te iwi i te tekau tau ki mua. " E kore te pūtea penapena e tīmata ki te hoki mai, ka kati, ā, kāore anō kia tīmata ngā hinonga e whānau anō, ā, e kore te hunga kua heke e hoki mai," te kī a tētahi ētita i tētahi atu pepa pakihi, Vedomosti. E tautohe ana te ia rā "ka mahi tonu te pūnaha i whakatūria i roto i ngā tekau tau kua taha", ahakoa "kua kore te pūnaha e wehi i a Tūroro anō", ka tāpiritia. Ka pūrongo me te tātari i ngā rongo mai i te pouaka whakaata, reo irirangi, tukutuku me ngā pāpāho tā puta noa i te ao. Mō ētahi atu pūrongo mai i te Aroturuki o TE HAU, pāwhiri ki konei. Ka taea e koe te whai i te Aroturuki o TE AO i Twitter me Facebook.

title: Ka kōwhiria e ngā Greens o Pirihitini a Patrick Harvie rāua ko Lorna Slater hei kaiārahi tahi
summary: Kua pōtitia a Patrick Harvie rāua ko Lorna Slater hei kaiārahi hou o te Rōpū Kākāriki o Pirihitini.
text: I pānuitia e te rōpū i te tīmatanga o tēnei tau ka kōwhiria e ia he kaiārahi mo te wā tuatahi hei whakakapi i tōna tūnga kaiwhakahaere o mua. I puritia e Tēnā Harvie te hui tahi i te taha o Maggie Chapman, i ngaro i te whakataetae pōti ārahi. Ko Ms Slater kātahi anō ka pōtitia he kaitono pōti o mua o te Kaunihera o Ūropi me te Taone o Etinitini. Ko Tēnā Harvie anake tētahi o ngā MSP e ono o te rōpū e tū ana i roto i te whakataetae ārahi, me ngā ture rōpū e kī ana ko tētahi o ngā toa e rua me wahine. I kī a ia i "tino hari" a ia ki te pōtitia i te taha o Ms Slater, ka tāpiri: "Kāore anō kia hira ake ngā reo kākāriki i a tātau e anga atu ana ki te ohorere o te āhuarangi. " He mārama te pūtaiao - neke atu i te tekau tau tātau ki te panoni i to tātau mahi mō te pai ake me te ārai i tētahi raruraru tūturu, engari e hari ana ērā atu rōpū ki te whakahaere i ngā mahi pūnoa." I tēnei wā, i kī a Ms Slater ko tana whāinga kia toa te rōpū i ētahi atu tūru i mua i te pōtitanga o Holyrood i te tau 2021, ā, kia nui ake ngā wāhine me ngā tāngata ā-rua i pōtitia. I tāpiri mai a ia: "E tūmanako ana ahau ki te hāpai i tōku tohunga i roto i te pūngao whakahou moana me te whakanao i Pākehā ki tā mātou marohi mō tētahi Kākāriki Kākāriki Hou o Pākehā, me te whakarite kia whai painga mātou i ngā huarahi pāpori me te ohaoha katoa e haere tahi ana me te whiu i te ohorere āhuarangi". I kī a Ms Slater i te wā o te whakahau pōti marama ka tiria e ia tana kāniwha kōrero ā-hoa i te hui a te rōpū i ia tau me tētahi atu wahine Kākāriki o Pirihitini "hei āwhina i a ia ki te hanga i tōna kitenga". Ka noho tonu a Tēnā Harvie me tōna hoa MSP Alison Johnstone hei kaiārahi tahi o te rōpū i te Pāremata o Pirihitini.

title: Mate kāwanatanga o Itari: E karanga ana a Salvini ki te pōti hopu
summary: Kua karangatia e Mātiti Salvini, te kaiārahi o te rōpū Rōpū o Itari, he pōti hopu, e kī ana kāore e taea te whakatika i ngā rerekētanga ki ngā hoa tauwhāinga.
text: I rahua te ngana a te Nekehanga Whetū e Rima ki te whakakeke i ngā mahere mō tētahi hononga kaupae tere rawa, ka whakaaturia e te tauwhāinga kua kore e taea e te tauwhāinga te whakahaere, tana kī. I kī te kaiārahi Whetū e rima, a Luigi Di Maio, kaore tana rōpū i wehi i tētahi atu pōti. Kai mua tonu te rōpū parirau matau o Tēnā Salvini i roto i te panekōrero whakaaro, nā tōna tūnga ki ngā nekeneke ture kore. Kua whakaraupapatia e te rōpū Rōpū tētahi mōtini whirinaki kore i te Senate ki te whakaheke i tana tauwhāinga ki te Nekehanga Whetū e Rima. Ka tautuhia e nga kaiārahi rōpū te rā mo te taupatupatu i te Mane. Kei te whakatā te Pāremata i tōna wā raumati, engari i kī atu a Tēnā Salvini ki ngā kaiwhakatika kia "puta atu i o rātau puku" ki te taupatupatu i te mōtini i roto i ngā rā e 10 ā-ture. He tino hohe hoki a Tēnā Salvini i runga i te pāpāho pāpori, ā, kua hangaia he atahanga "tangata o te iwi", e pana ana i ngā utu tāke ahakoa te maunga nama o Itari €2.3tn (£2.1tn), he tuarua anake ki Kariki i te EU. I te pōtitanga o tērā tau, e rua ngā pōti i toa ai a Five Star i te Rōpū Rōpū, engari e hua ana ngā panekōrero kua whakahokia ngā wāhanga. I te pōtitanga o Ūropi i tū i te wā o Me, ka tae mai te Rōpū ki runga me te 34% o ngā pōti i Itari, ā, tata ki te 17% te 17%. Kua kī a Giuseppe Conte, te ahorangi ture kore rōpū e mahi ana hei pirimia o te tauwhāinga, me "whakatika" ki te pāremata tana karanga mo te pōti. He tuarua nga minita matua a Tēnā Salvini rāua ko Tāne Di Maio. Ko te mana ki te memeha i te pāremata e noho ana ki a Perehitini Sergio Mattarella, engari tērā pea ka manawapa a ia ki te mahi pēnā, i te mea ko ngā MP o tērā marama - e hararei ana i tēnei wā - me whakaaro ki te tahua 2020. He aha te tautohetohe? Na nga matapaki tōrangapū i runga i te kaupapa mo tētahi rerewhenua i waenganui i te taone Itari o Turin me te taone Wīwī o Rao i ārahi ai te Pirimia o Giuseppe Conte ki te pupuri i ngā whakangāwari i a Poutāpeta. Ko te hononga TAV (Treno Alta Velocità) e pā ana ki te kari i tētahi kauhanga 58km (36 maero) puta noa i te Aorangi. E tino ātetetia ana e Rima Whetū i runga i ngā taunga taiao me te utu. E tautohe ana te Rōpū ka waihangatia he mahi me te whakaoho i te tupu o te ohaoha, ā, ko te neke utanga mai i te huarahi ki te rēra he rata taiao. E kī ana ngā kaitautoko o te kaupapa ka haurua te wā haere i waenganui i ngā tāone e rua ki te rua haora noa iho. Ka taea hoki e te kauhanga te haere mai i Parihi ki Milana i roto i te whā haora, i raro iho i te tata ki te whitu. I whakarewaina te kaupapa i te 20 tau ki mua, ā, kua keria kētia tētahi wāhanga. Kua whakaritea kia oti i te tau 2025. I te tuatahi ka whakaritea ngā utu kia eke ki te €8.6bn ($9.7bn; £7.4bn), engari ko te Minita Waka o Itari, o Danilo Toninelli - he mema Whetū Rima - i hoatu te tūtohu utu ki neke atu i te €20bn. I tautohe te EU ki te pūtea tae atu ki te 40% o te utu. He aha ināianei? "Me haere hāngai tātou ki te pāremata ki te kī kua kore te nuinga... me te hoki tere ki nga kaipōti," te kī a Tēnā Salvini i te Tāite. Ka whakatauria e Tēnā Di Maio mā te kōrero i roto i tētahi kōrero: "Kua rite mātou, kāore mātou e māharahara ki te noho i ngā pou kāwanatanga, ā, kāore anō mātou." Kua noho te Rōpū i roto i tētahi tauwhāinga ngāwari ki a Five Star, i haere mai ki te mana i runga i tētahi tīkiti ārai whakatūnga. Ehara i te mea ko te tono a Tēnā Salvini mo tētahi pōti, ehara i te mea ka karangatia he poipoi ā muri ake nei. Kāore anō a Itari kia pōti ngahuru i te wā katoa o te pakanga, ka pūrongo te kōrero rongokōrero o Kōrero. Ka taea e Perehitini Sergio Mattarella te whakatū i tētahi kāwanatanga hangarau me te hiki i tētahi pōti hou tae noa ki tērā tau. He kāwanatanga hangarau tā Itari i mua, engari ko Tēnā Salvini, e eke ana i te ngaru manakohanga, ka tūmanakohia kia ātete i tēnei nekehanga.

title: 'I whakamahia e te tangata patu he heihei harrier' i runga i te whenua o te National Trust
summary: Ko te āhua nei kua puta mai tētahi ataata e whakaatu ana i tētahi tangata patu e whakamahi ana i tētahi manu tinihanga hei kawe mai i tētahi heihei ātaahua i runga i te whenua nā te National Trust.
text: I pūhia te pikitia i runga i te whenua i rīhitia mo te tākaro kōaro i te Takiwā o Te Taumata o Te Takiwā o Te Takiwā o Te Wānanga o Hui tanguru. Kua karangatia e te rōpū atawhai o Raptor Persecution, nāna i whakaputa te whakaata i te Tūrei, kia mahia he mahi. I uiuia e nga Pirihimana o Derbyshire nga whakaaturanga, engari kua whakatau kia kaua e mahi i ētahi atu mahi. Heoi anō, i kī te National Trust e "tino nui" ana te mahi, ā, kua tīmataria he tūhuratanga. I hopukina te whakaata e nga kaitiaki manu me te digiscope tata ki te kiromita te mamao, a, ka tukua i muri i te uiuitanga a nga pirihimana. I kī tētahi kaiwhakaatu mō te Whakatoinga Raptor, ahakoa kāore he ture i puta, te āhua nei kua hangaia te manu tinihanga kia rite ki te pīkaokao tāne, tērā pea kia kawea mai ai tētahi atu manu. Ka kī a ia: "He tino rohe te heihei tāne, ā, ka whakaekea e rātau he maoho. " Ahakoa e nekehia ana te manu ki te māuiui i te tinihanga, ka whai te kaitiaki kēmu i tōna wāhi huna e pātata ana." I kī te RSPB i te wā ka taea te whakamahi i ngā kāhu tinihanga me ngā ruru mō te mana tika o ngā koroua, tērā pea i "māharahara" tērā pea i whakaaturia e te whakaata tētahi "ngana kore mana ki te ūnga i ngā [heihei heihei], i ētahi atu manu pārurenga rānei". I whakaahuatia e te rangatira nui o te Papa Whenua o Te Rohe o Peak, a Sarah Fowler, te ataata he "whakamataku, he whakatūpato" me te kī ka tautokona e ia te tūhuratanga. E whakatau ana te Pānga Moorland i ngā mahi hara katoa o te kararehe, engari i kī kāore he hara i mahia i tēnei tauira. I kī tētahi kaiwhakaatu: "Ko te whakawā i runga anō i ngā whakaaro o te ihirangi o tēnei topenga, ko ngā whakaaro rānei a te hunga nāna i whakaputa, he whakaaro mārire, ehara i te mea ka uru atu mātou." I kī te Komihana Pirihimana me te Komihana Hara o Derbyshire, a Alan Charles: "Ko te kitenga o tētahi tangata whai pū me tētahi tauira kirihou o tētahi manu heihei i runga i tētahi moor grouse o Peak District, he whakamaumahara koi ki ngā mahi haere tonu e hiahiatia ana hei pare i a tātau kararehe. " Ahakoa i mau taua tangata i runga i te kāmera e ngā kaimātakitaki tokorua, he tawhiti rawa rātau ki te tiki i ngā whakaaturanga pikitia e tika ana te kounga hei whakahohe i te mahinga." E ai ki te RSPB, ko ngā manu pāpaku tino "tino whakatoi" i te UK, ā, ko tōna pāngia he pūtake o te papā i runga i ngā moors e whakamahia ana mō te tākaro. I te tau 2015, e rima ngā heihei tāne i ngaro atu i ngā pae puta noa i Ingarangi e ahu ana ki te tiango o ngā kōhanga. Kāore tonu i te mārama he aha i pā ki nga manu.

title: E karanga ana te komihana tamariki o Tam Baillie ki te whakakore i te patu
summary: Kua whakahōutia e te komihana tamariki putaatu o Pākehā tana karanga kia whakakorea ngā tamariki pakipaki.
text: I kī atu a Tam Baillie ki te Herald ko te UK tētahi o ngā whenua Pākehā e rima anake kāore i te tino pare i ngā tamariki i te whiu ā-tinana. A, i kī a ia, he pai ake te tiaki i ngā tamariki i Zimbabwe i ērā i Pākehā. I kī tētahi kōrero mō te kāwanatanga o Pirihitini kāore i te whakapono he "tika, he pai rānei" te ārai pakipaki. I raro i ngā ture i Pākehā, ka taea e ngā mātua te tono i te "whakaekenga tika" ina whiua ta rātau tamaiti. Engari ko te wāhanga 51 o te Ture Ture Hara (Pākehā) 2003 e whakakore ana i te whakamahinga o tētahi "taputapu" i roto i te whiu. Ko te 'tikanga o te whiu ā-tinana' Ka whakakore hoki i ngā mātua kia kaua e rūrū i ta rātau tamaiti, i te tūtuki rānei i a rātau ki runga i o rātau māhunga. I kī atu a Tēnā Baillie ki te nūpepa ko tōna rahunga ki te kite i te huringa o te ture te tino ātetetanga o ōna tau e waru hei komihana tamariki. I te 17 o Me, ka mutu tana wā tuarua me te whakamutunga o te tari. I tāpiritia e ia kua whakakorea e Zimbabwe te pakipaki tamariki i to rātau kāinga i tērā marama. "He kāwanatanga tukino a Zimbabwe, e kitea ana e te nuinga o te ao ki te Uru he āhua paria - engari he pai ake te parenga o ngā tamariki i Zimbabwe i a rātau i Pākehā," tana kī. "E hiahia ana te kāwanatanga o Pākehā kia noho a Pākehā hei whenua tino pai i te ao ki te whakatipu tamariki.
