Me pēhea e taea ai e tātau te kī i tēnā wā e mau tonu ana tātau i tēnei tikanga whiu ā-tinana?" I kī a Tēnā Baillie i tautoko tūmataiti ētahi kaipōrangapū i a ia mo taua take, engari i mataku rātau ki te whakapae i te whakararuraru i te oranga whānau. I whakakāhoretia e ia te tautohe ka āhei te ture hou ki te whakatinanatanga o nga mātua. "I whakarerekētia e Airangi te ture, ā, kāore anō kia whakawāteatia ngā mātua, kāore rānei e taea te whakahaere i a rātau tamariki," tana kī. "Tērā ētahi whakaaturanga o te pikinga o ngā tāngata e rapu āwhina ana i a rātau e uaua ana. Tērā anō ētahi atu huarahi e āhei ai koe ki te mātua i tō tamaiti." E rua tau i muri i te kīanga a nga Iwi o te Hononga o te Ao, me whakauru e te UK ngā ture hei whakakore i te pakipaki i te kāinga. Nō muri mai i taua tau, ka karangatia e tētahi rōpū mātauranga he ārai i Pākehā i muri i te kitenga i ngā whakaaturanga "whakahauhau" e waihanga ana te mahi i tētahi huringa tutu e haere tonu ana ki te pakeketanga. I kī a Tēnā Baillie i te whakaaturanga "kāore i taea te mārama ake". "Ki te whakaurua e koe he parenga ōrite [ki te whakaeke] he whakaiti ōrite ki te tūkino ā-tinana o ngā tamariki," tana kī. Huringa ahurea I tāpiri mai a ia: "E kī ana te tangata ka taea e te pakipaki te pare i te tamaiti mai i te mōrearea, engari mēnā he pakeke tāu e mate ana i te mōrearea, nā te mea kāore rātau i mōhio pai ake, ko te mea tuatahi e whakaaro ana koe ko te patu i a rātou, kia whakawhiti ai i tēnā? " Kore rawa. E kore noa iho tēnā e whakaaetia." I tāpiri mai a ia e whakapono ana a ia ka puta he ture hou ki te huringa ahurea - e rite ana ki tērā i pā ki muri i te whakakorenga o te kai paipa i ngā wāhi tūmatanui. "Ki taku whakaaro ka whakamutua e tātau ki ngā mātua e kī ana 'he aha i whakaae ai mātou ki tēnei mō te wā roa?'," tana kī. I kī tētahi kaikōrero kāwanatanga o Pākehā: "Mā tā mātou hōtaka whakapai ake i te parenga tamariki e whakarite kia whiwhi ia tamaiti i Pākehā i te tūkinotanga, i te tūkino rānei i te tautoko me te parenga tino pai. " Kaore mātau e tautoko i te whiu ā-tinana, a, kaore mātau e whakaaro he pai. "Heoi anō, kāore mātou e tautoko i tētahi āraitanga i te mea kāore mātou i te whakaaro he tika, he pai hoki." I miramiratia e ia he arotakenga takitahi o te pūnaha parenga tamariki inā noa nei i kitea he pai te mahi ki te pare i ngā tamariki, i ngā rangatahi rānei e mōrearea ana ki te tūkino, i tūkinotia rānei, ā, i whakaae te kāwanatanga ki ngā tūtohutanga katoa o te arotakenga.

title: He tino poapoa Kānata Goose i Haina?
summary: Te āhua nei kua mau te kaihanga koti rangatira o Kānata Goose i roto i tētahi tautohetohe tōrangapū i waenganui i Haina me Kānata.
text: I te Mane, ka kī te pāpāho kāwanatanga o Hainamana kua tīmata ngā kiritaki paetata ki te whakahōrite i ngā toa Kānata, otirā, ko Kānata Goose. I whakaritea te nekehanga hei urupare ki te tautāwhi a Kānata i tētahi kaiwhakahaere mai i te kamupene hangarau Hainamana o Tūmatanui. Engari he tino whakaharahara te whakahoki ki a Kānata Goose i Haina? 'Kāore e taea e au te utu' I puta mai ngā rongo o tētahi poapoa mārama i muri i te hopukina o Meng Wanzhou - te āpiha pūtea matua o Tūmatanui me te tamāhine a te kaiwhakarewa o te umanga - i Kānata i tērā wiki. Ka taea te whakahoki atu i a Ms Meng ki a Mātau kia anga atu ki ngā utu tinihanga e honoa ana ki te tūkinotanga whakapae o ngā whakaaetanga ki a Irana. I tukuna he utu ki a ia i te Tūrei e te kōti Kānata. I te Mane, ka whakaputaina e te Global Times tētahi tuhipānui e kī ana ko tōna tautāwhi "te āhua nei kua tīmata i te whakapōhēhētanga o ngā taonga Kānata... me Kānata Goose i te tuatahi." He nui te whai o te parani i Haina. I te tīmatanga o tēnei tau ka pānuitia e te kamupene tētahi mahere whakawhānui mō Haina, tae atu ki te whakatū i tētahi tari matua ā-rohe i Shanghai. I whakatuwheratia hoki e ia tētahi toa hokohoko i Hong Kong me tētahi pātaka pakū-ake i Beijing - ākuanei ka haere mai tētahi pātaka pūmau. Ehara i te mea rerekē ki ngā kiritaki Hainamana te whakahōrite i ngā toa kaingākautia. Nō nā tata nei, i tutuki pai ta rātau whakauru ki te tapanga rangatira o Dolce me Gabbana i muri i te whakapaetanga ki te whakaiti i te ahurea Hainamana i roto i tētahi whakahau mākete. He tino nui te whakahoki i runga i te pae pāpāho pāpori o Te Aotearoa, ā, i te mutunga ka tangohia ngā hua o te parani mai i ngā pae e-commerce i Haina. Ki te whakataurite ki a Dolce rāua ko Gabbana, he āhua mārire te riri ki a Kānata Goose. Ahakoa i kitea ētahi tautohetohe ki a Kānata Goose i runga i te Tūpāpaku, ko te nuinga o ngā kōrero i arotahi ki te mea kāore e taea e te kiritaki Hainamana toharite te utu i te parani parka rangatira hei tīmata. Ka taea e ngā koti Kānata Goose te utu tata ki te £1,400 ($1,750). "Māku e whakahōrite te Kuihi Kānata... nā te mea kāore e taea e au te utu," te kī a tētahi kaiwhakamahi i Tūpāpaku. "Aue... I tūpou ngā rawa, engari kāore anō kia tūpou ngā utu... Ka tatari tonu ahau," te kī a tētahi atu. I whakamāramatia e ētahi he pai ake ki a rātau te hoko taonga mai i Bosideng - he kaihanga koti Hainamana - me tētahi toa utu nui ake. He ūnga kitea a Kānata Goose i te nuinga o tōna ingoa, e ai ki tētahi kaiwaiata. "Poor Canada Goose, it has Canada in its name... kāore anō ētahi atu toa Kānata kia whakahuatia." Ka pā ngā hea i te wā e tū ana te whakarongo taurangi a Ms Meng i tēnei wiki i Vancouver, i nui te hinga o ngā hea o Kānata Goose. I hinga te kararehe tata ki te 20% i roto i ngā rā e whā. He nekehanga nui tēnā, engari kāore i te mārama mēnā e herea ana tēnei ki te poapoa mārama. I te haere nga hea o te kamupene ki te tonga i mua i te whakaaturanga o te tautāwhi o Ms Meng. I tua atu, i kite a Bosideng i ōna utu tiritiri i ngā rā torutoru kua taha. Ko te nuinga o te wā ka neke ngā hea - ki runga, ki raro rānei - i runga i ngā tirohanga e kitea ana e tētahi kamupene. Nō reira ki te rongo ngā kaiwhakangao mō te tupu ā muri ake, ka hokona e rātou he hea, ā, mā tēnā e pana ngā utu ki runga ake.

title: Mark Rylance to star as Pope in Spielberg film
summary: Ko te kaitapere hākari ko Mark Rylance me tīma anō me te tumuaki o Hīnī Spielberg ki te whetū i tana whitiāhua panuku The Kidnapping of Edgardo Mortara.
text: Ko Rylance, nāna i toa i tētahi kaitapere tautoko tino pai o Oscar mō te Arawhiti o ngā Tūtei a Spielberg, ka whetū hei Papa Pius IX. Ka kōrerotia e te pikitia te pūrākau pono o tētahi tama Hurai i Itari i te tau 1858 i tangohia mai i ōna mātua, i whakaarahia hei Katorika, ā, i muri iho ka noho hei tohunga. Ka tīmata te whakaahuatanga ina mutu te mahi a Spielberg i te Ready Player One. Ka tīmata taua whitiāhua pūtaiao ki te whakaahua i tēnei raumati, nā reira ka tūmanakohia kia haere te Kākātanga o Edgardo Mortara ki te whakanao i te tīmatanga o te tau 2017. Me whakaoti anō e Rylance te mahi i roto i te pikitia o te Pakanga Tuarua o te Ao o Christopher Nolan, o Dunkirk, e haere ana ki te whakanaotanga a tērā marama. Ka tuhia te Kākātanga o Edgardo Mortara e te kaituhituhi o Toni Kushner, e mōhiotia ana mō tana mahi i runga i te Lincoln toa o Oscar. Ko te pūrākau pono o Mortara e ono tau te pakeke ka noho hei heitara ao whānui, ā, i te mutunga ka whakaarotia kia pakaru te hanganga o te Papacy, pērā i taua wā, kātahi ki te whakakotahitanga o Itari. I tangohia te tama i te kāinga o tōna whānau i Bologna nā te mea i kī tētahi pononga i tōna whare kua iriiria ia e ia hei mehua ohorere i a ia e tino mate ana. I tipu ake a Mortara hei Katorika i raro i te parenga a Pope Pius IX, nāna i whakaae ki te whakahoki i a ia ki ōna mātua ahakoa a rāua inoi. I muri iho ka noho a Mortara hei tohunga i roto i te rōpū Augustinian. I tino mōhiotia a Rylance i mua mō tana mahi i te whare tapere o Rāwāhi, tae atu ki tana tūranga hei kaiwhakahaere toi o te whare tapere o te Ao. Kei te hohe tonu a ia i runga i te atamira o West End, i whakaingoatia mō tētahi whakawhiwhinga Olivier mō te whetū hei Kīngi Piripi V o Paniora i Farinelli me te Kīngi. I whakaingoatia ia i ngā haora noa iho i muri i tana whiwhinga i tana Oscar tuatahi. Engari kua tuwhera ake a Rylance ki ngā tūranga pikitia i roto i ngā tau tata nei, ā, ka tohua e te Kākātanga o Edgardo Mortara tana whitiāhua tuatoru ki a Spielberg. Tae atu ki te māngere o te Pakanga Makariri o Bridge of Spies, kei te tākaro hoki a Rylance i te pūāhua taitara i roto i te BFG a Spielberg, i runga anō i te pukapuka tamariki tino pai rawa atu a Roald Dahl. Kua tautuhia te BFG mo te tuku i tēnei Hōngongoi.

title: Ngā kāri e whakaatu ana i te hītori o Sheffield kia hokona i te hokonga
summary: Neke atu i te 10,000 ngā kāri e whakaatu ana i a Sheffield mai i ngā wā o Wikitōria ki ngā tau kotahi mano e waru tekau mā waru e hokona ana i te hokonga.
text: Ko te kohinga, i whakaahuatia hei hītori whakaahua o te taone, i huihuia e Tim Hale i roto i te 50 tau. Kei roto ko ngā whakaahua pēnei i te toa o te Kapu FA o Sheffield United i te tau 1915 me te Ahi Nui o Heeley i te tau 1921. Ko ngā kāri, neke atu i te £10,000, ā, ka hokona ki te Taiwhanga Hoko o Sheffield i te 12 o Mahuru. Kua whakarārangitia kia hokona ai, kia wehea ki te 250 rota. I kī ngā kaihoko i hipokina e rātau ngā āhuatanga o te hītori pāpori o Sheffield, tae atu ki te waka, te tākaro, te tōrangapū, te umanga, te whakangahau me te pānuitanga. Ko te kāri e whakaatu ana i te ahi i Heeley - i te 23 o Āperira 1921 - he whakaahua o te mutunga o te mura i te Sheafbank Works, i reira ka whakakāngia te tuanui e te kora mai i tētahi mīhini rerewē. I kī a John Morgan, mai i te whare hokohoko: "[Koinei] te kohinga kāri nui rawa atu o te taone nui rawa atu kua tonoa mātau kia kawea mai ki te mākete, ā, he tino pai te tika kua kohia, ā, ka hokona ki Sheffield. " Although we expect a great deal of local interest, the depth and insight of the collection will draw enquiries from many quarters in maybe what will be a once in a lifetime opportunity to acquire postcards from this outstanding collection." Whāia a BBC Yorkshire i Facebook, Twitter me Instagram. Tukuna ō whakaaro pūrākau ki yorkslincs.news@bbc.co.uk.

title: Ko te whakatuwhera anō i taku tuwhera tata ki Ystradgynlais 'ka taea te tiaki i ngā mahi 100'
summary: Ka taea te whakatuwhera anō i tētahi maina waro i te tonga o Powys, e tiaki ana i ngā mahi e 100, e kī ana ōna tohutūmahi.
text: I whakaaetia a Nant Helen tata ki Ystradgynlais ki te mahi tae noa ki te mutunga o te tau 2018, engari i te tau 2016. I muri mai i te whakataka o te tono waro anthracite mai i te teihana hiko o Aberthaw i te Awaawa o Glamorgan. I kī a Celtic Energy me tīmata anō te kari kari i Nant Helen mō tētahi atu toru tau hei whakakapi i ngā rawa e pau ana i te Poka Rāwhiti pātata, e kati ana. Whakaoratanga pae I raro i te whakaaetanga o nāianei mai i te tau 2012, ko te tikanga kia mutu te kari i Nant Helen i te 31 o Hakihea 2018. Ko te mahi whakaora i te pae ka mutu i te mutunga o Pipiri 2021, e ai ki te Local Democracy Reporting Service. Ināianei kei te hiahia te kamupene ki te whakaroa i tana mahi kari tae noa ki te mutunga o te tau 2021, me te whakaoratanga kia oti i te mutunga o Pipiri 2023. A report to Powys county councillors by regional mineral and waste planning manager Hugh Towns says restarting production at Nant Helen would help to support the local economy. "Tērā anō ētahi mahi tōtika i roto i ngā mahi tautoko," tana tāpiri mai. 'Ngā āwangawanga kaha' "Kaua e whakanuia te hiranga o ēnei mahi i tēnei rohe i roto i te 10 hēneti o runga o ngā wāhi tino tango i Weera." Kua kōrerorerotia e te Kaunihera Taone o Ystradgynlais te tono, ā, e whakaae ana me tīmata anō te mahi, engari he "āwangawanga kaha" mō te mahi whakaora. E whakapono ana te kaunihera o te taone ka "kore e whakaaetia" tētahi hāpua hōhonu e 30 mita, e kī ana ka mōrearea a Caerbont e tata ana ki te taone. Ko ngā kaikaunihera o Powys e whakaaro ana ki te tono kia tīmata anō te kari kari i te Tāite.

title: 'E 40 ngā wā e oho ana aku tamariki i te pō'
summary: Kua āwhina tētahi kaupapa "pūkenga" i Sheffield ki te whakarewa i te moe o ngā tamariki mā te 2.4 hāora i te pō, e kī ana a NHS Ingarangi. He pēhea te āhua o te whare hauora moe ki te whakapai ake i te oranga o ngā whānau?
text: Nā Louis Lee RayBBC Victoria Derbyshire hōtaka "I te whakaoho rātau i tētahi mea mai i te 10 ki te 40 ngā wā i te pō - ā, ehara tēnā i te whakanuia," te kī a Jacqui Wolstenholme, e maumahara ana ki ōna pō pō pōrearea e ngana ana ki te whakangote i ana tamāhine māhanga, a Heka rāua ko Jasmine, ki te moe. I ngā wā katoa he uaua ki te moe ngā tamariki e whā tau ināianei, engari ko ngā ahiahi me ngā pō he mea whakamataku. "I te toru marama te pakeke, i te tīmatanga o te nui o ngā pēpi ki te whakatau, ka kino noa iho ngā mea, ka kino ake, ka kino ake. Kaore rawa rātau i moe," te kī a Jacqui ki te hōtaka o Wikitōria o Te Rua o Wikitōria. "Ka noho tētahi i roto i te moenga me ahau, ko tētahi atu ki a Julian [to rātau pāpā] i tētahi atu rūma moe. I te ngana a ia ki te whakatau i tētahi, i te ngana ahau ki te whakatau i tētahi." Ka tīmata ki te pā ki ngā mātua e rua, nā rāua anō i kore moe. I whakaaro a Jacqui kia hoki ki tana mahi i roto i te hoahoa whakairoiro i muri i te 12 marama - engari i mārama "kāore rawa he huarahi" ka puta tēnei. "I te raruraru taku tāne ki te pupuri i tana mahi," tana kī, "i te tino ngenge." He tawhiti rawa atu nga Wolstenholmes i te mokemoke. E kī ana a Prof Heather Elphick ko te UK "kei waenganui i tētahi mate hauora tūmatanui huna ina moe". "There are more children who can't sleep than we realize and I think it's something parents are not happy to talk about," she says. "E mōhio ana rātou kei te whakawā te tangata i ō rātou pūkenga mātua mēnā kāore e taea e tā rātou tamaiti te moe, nā reira kaua e haere ki te kimi āwhina." I āwhina a Prof Elphick ki te whakarewa i tētahi kaupapa whakahaurangi e 40 ngā whānau i te whare moe o te Hōhipera Tamariki o Sheffield - i roto i te pahekotanga ki NHS Ingarangi me te kaunihera paetata - e whai ana ki te whakapai ake i ngā tauira moe o ngā tamariki. Ināianei kua whakawhānuitia puta noa i te taone, e āwhina ana i ngā tamariki e 800 i te tau. He rite tonu te manaakitanga o nga tamāhine a Jacqui - ahakoa he taumaha ake o rātau āhuatanga. I te whare hauora, ka tīmata te tukanga ki tētahi hītori rongoā roa, taipitopito - e hoki tonu ana ki te whānautanga - me te titiro ki te taiao moe o te tamaiti. Mō ngā māhanga, he take hira tēnei ki te mōhio ki te wāhi e puta mai ai ngā take. "Kua pāngia rātau e ngā mate auau me ngā whakaurunga hōhipera auau," te kī a Jacqui, "nā reira he tino uaua o rātau tau tuatahi." I āwhina ngā nēhi i te whare hauora moe i te whānau ki te whakawhanake i tētahi mahi moe pākaha mō ngā kōtiro. "I te haora i mua i te moenga, ka hina mātau i ngā rama ki raro. Ka weto te pouaka whakaata, te reo irirangi me ngā mata - ā, ka mahi mātou i te tae, te tātuhi, te hanga kēmu, ngā mea katoa e pā ana ki te hononga whatu-ringa," te kī a Jacqui. "Kātahi, ka haere rātau ki runga ki te kaukau, ā, ka hāngai tonu ki te rūma moe. " E mau tonu ana mātou ki te mahi ōrite - ahakoa ki te kupu ōrite e whakamahia ana e mātou ina pō pō mātou ki a rātou i ia pō. E pā ana ki te ōritetanga." He pai ake te pātahitanga E ai ki te NHS Ingarangi, nā te aronui i Sheffield i whiwhi ai ngā tamariki i tētahi atu 2.4 hāora moe i ia pō, ā, ko te wā e moe ana e taka ana mai i te rua haora ki te 30 meneti noa iho. Kua pūrongotia hoki e ngā mātua me ngā kaitiaki kua pai ake tō rātou kounga o te ora, e kī ana, tae atu ki a rātou he pai ake te whanaungatanga ki tā rātou tamaiti. Ka taea e ngā raruraru moe te raruraru mō ngā tamariki whai mate pēnei i te attention deficit hyperactivity disorder (ADHD), te hunga kua whāngai, me te hunga kua pā ki te waihotanga, ki te mate rānei. He raruraru anō a Jenny Lowis me tana tama "tino hihiri, turituri", a Noa, i te wā moe. I waenganui pō, e kī ana a ia, "ka paoa e ia te tatau kia oho ake ai ahau, ā, ki te kore tērā e mahi ka haere mai ia ki te taha o taku moenga me te hākere noa iho". "Ka ara ake koe [i te ata] ka whakaaro, 'Kāore au i te mōhio he aha te wā, kāore au i te mōhio he aha te rā, kāore au i te mōhio kei hea ahau,'" te kī a Jenny. I a Noa hoki, he take hauora i a Noa. "I a ia e whānau ana, he tino kino tōna kōaro, nā reira i te māuiui a ia i te pō," te kī a Jenny. "He roa rawa ngā pō, nā reira, he roa rawa." Ināianei he mahi moe hou anō tā Noa, ā, he wāhanga o te hōtaka, kua pā ki tētahi akoranga moe - i reira ia i aroturukitia ai e ngā tākuta. I kitea a ia i te parasomnia - he mate moe whakararuraru e āhei ana ki te whakamataku i te pō, te hīkoi moe me te kōrero moe. Ki a Noa, ko te tikanga "e kōrero ana, e hamama ana, e karanga ana, e tangi ana, e kata ana i a ia e moe ana". E kī ana a Jenny he tino whakamarie te mōhio he take rongoā i muri i tōna moe. Kei te whiwhi āwhina tonu rātau i te whare hauora, engari kei te pai ake ngā mea. "I te tino kino o ngā mea, kāore i taea e ia te pupuri i tana arotahi ki tētahi ngohe kotahi mō te roa ake i te rima meneti," tana kī. "Ināianei, kei te tīmata tonu a ia ki te moe i tōna ake moenga, ā, he pai ake tōna ārotahi i te kura." Kua hoatu ki nga māhanga a Jacqui te mārama katoa mai i te whare hauora. "Kāore au e pīrangi ki te kōrero mō ngā rā i mua i te moe," tana kī. "It's still not something that comes naturally to them - we have to stick to routine - but on a good night we can walk out [of their bedroom] and then 12 hours later they will wake up." Whāia te hōtaka o Wikitōria o TE AO i Facebook me Twitter - ka kite i ētahi atu o ā mātou pūrākau i konei.

title: He maha rawa ngā tamariki 'kāore i te rongoatia mō ngā raruraru hauora hinengaro'
summary: Ko te tuatoru anake o ngā tamariki me ngā taitamariki whai mate hauora hinengaro e whiwhi ana i te manaakitanga e hiahiatia ana e rātau mai i te NHS, e kī ana tētahi komiti o ngā MP.
text: He tokomaha e tahuri atu ana nā te mea kāore i te tino mate, ko ētahi e anga ana ki ngā tatari roa, ā, he maha pea ngā tau i mua i taua huringa, ka kitea tana pūrongo. He manakē te whiwhi i ngā kaimahi tika i te wāhi tika, e kī ana. A, ka tāpiritia ka āta titiro tonu te rōpū mēnā kei te whakatinanatia te mahere hou 10 tau a te kāwanatanga. I whakakitea te kaupapa e Ēnā Me me ngā rangatira o NHS Ingarangi i tēnei wiki, e tautuhi ana i tētahi kitenga mō te ratonga hauora e arotahi ana ki te ārai i te hauora. Hei wāhanga o te mahere, ko te hauora hinengaro, ngā GP me te tiaki hapori i whiwhi i ngā pikinga pūtea nui rawa. Engari i kī te pūrongo a te Komiti Pūkete Tūmatanui ki ngā ratonga hauora hinengaro mō ngā tamariki me ngā rangatahi he nui tonu te kauneketanga e hiahiatia ana i ngā wāhi maha. Kotahi i roto i te waru ngā tamariki i roto i te rōpū pakeke e rima ki te 19 tau te pakeke e mate ana i te hauora hinengaro, ā, ko te nuinga o ngā tamariki e rima ki te 15 tau e mate ana i tētahi mate ā-hinengaro, i tēnei wā e 5.8% e pā ana ngā take hauora hinengaro ki ngā wā ora o te rangatahi, ka kī te pūrongo. Heoi anō, he "tatari roa e kore e whakaaetia mō te rongoā" me te rua hautoru o ngā rangatahi e hiahia ana ki te rongoā. I roto i ngā tau e toru e whai ake nei, i taunakitia e te komiti kia homai e NHS Ingarangi ngā whakahōutanga ā-tau ki: Meg Hillier MP, te manukura o te komiti, i kī ngā tamariki me ngā taitamariki i tēnei wā kei te "rahua e te NHS". "Kei raro rawa te whakarato i ngā taumata e hiahiatia ana, ā, he tokomaha ngā tāngata e whiwhi āwhina ana ki te tatari roa mō te rongoā. " Ka whakararuraru pea tēnei ki ngā tūponotanga oranga o te tangata; to rātau hauora tinana, mātauranga me ngā tirohanga mahi," tana kī. A, ka tohe a ia ki te NHS kia whakatere i ngā mahi kia tino mōhio ai kei a ia "ngā kaimahi tika me ngā pūkenga tika i ngā wāhi tika". "Effective action on prevention and early intervention can help young people more faster, as well as relieve pressures on health services. " Ka āta titiro mātou ki te pānga tūturu o ngā mehua i marohitia i roto i te mahere 10 tau a te kāwanatanga mō te NHS," te kī a Ms Hillier. 'Rutu wawe i ngā raruraru' i kī a Anne Longfield, te Komihana Tamariki mō Ingarangi, me nui ake te hao o te kāwanatanga mō ngā whakahōu e hiahiatia ana kia whiwhi ai ngā tamariki katoa i te tautoko e hiahiatia ana e rātou. "Ka whakapai ake te mahere NHS 10 tau i te urunga ki te CAMHS (ngā tamariki me ngā ratonga hauora hinengaro taiohi) mō ētahi atu tamariki, engari kia taea rā anō e te kāwanatanga te whakaū ka whiwhi ngā tamariki katoa i te āwhina tohunga e hiahiatia ana e rātou, ia tau e hia mano ngā tamariki ka hapa tonu i te rongoā. " E hiahiatia ana e tēnā ngā kaupapa here pēnei i tētahi kaitohutohu pūtea NHS i ia kura ki te tāutu me te rutu wawe i ngā raruraru, me te ōritetanga tata atu i waenganui i ngā mea e pau ana i ngā ratonga hauora hinengaro pakeke me te tamaiti."

title: Kāore te kaihoahoa o Grenfell i taki i ngā tohutohu haumaru ahi mō ngā whare teitei
summary: Kua whakaae te kaihoahoa mo te whakahoutanga o te Pourewa o Grenfell kāore a ia i tirotiro i ngā tohutohu whai mana mō te haumarutanga ahi i ngā whare tiketike, i te wā o te mahi.
text: I kī atu a Bruce Sounes, mai i Studio E, ki te uiui kāore a ia i te mōhio ki ngā māharahara mo te haumarutanga o ngā paepae mura e whakamahia ana i runga i ngā paraka whare. I kī a ia ko ngā taipitopito haumaru ahi mō ngā kaitohutohu tohunga, ā, kāore anō ia kia hoahoa i te kākahu i whakamahia. E 72 ngā tāngata i mate i te ahi i te pourewa papa 24 i te uru o Rāwāhi 2017. Ko te uiui - ināianei i tōna wāhanga tuarua - kei te titiro ki te pēhea i hipokina ai te whare i roto i taua kākahu i te wā o tōna whakahoutanga i waenganui i te 2012 me te 2016. Ko Tēnā Sounes te whakahaere i ia rā o te kaupapa whakahou mo te pourewa. I te rā tuarua o ngā whakarongo, i te tirohia a Tēnā Sounes mō tōna mōhiotanga ki ngā ture whare me ngā tohutohu pāhono. Kāore i taea e ia te whakamārama ki te uiui he pēhea te tūtakitanga o te pūnaha kākahu hou i kōwhiria mō Grenfell ki ngā tohutohu a te kāwanatanga mō te haumarutanga ahi i roto i ngā whare tiketike, ahakoa te whakaae ko te haumarutanga ahi he "tino nui ki te mahi a te kaihoahoa". I kī a Tēnā Sounes e mōhio ana a ia ki te ture whānui kia kaua e taea e te whare te hora ahi ki waho. Engari "kāore a ia i mahara ki te rongo" i te tohutohu tauwhāiti me "iti noa iho te wera" ina whakamahia i runga ake i te 18m (59ft). I pātai atu te rōia uiui a Kate Grange ki a ia: "Kāore koe i hoatu i tō hinengaro i te wā o te kaupapa Grenfell ki te pānga o tēnei whiti ki ngā rauemi i tīpakohia e koe?" Ka urupare a ia: "I te mea kāore au i te whakarite i ngā tuhinga - kāore au, kāo." Ā muri ake ka whakaaturia te uiui i te whakapūtātanga mō te kaupapa - i tāruatia e Tēnā Sounes - ā, i pātaitia he aha i kore ai ia e taki i ngā hua i kōwhiria e ia ki ngā ture. "I tono tohutohu mātou," tana kī, "engari ehara mātou... whakaae ki a mātau anō nā te mea kāore au i te whakaaro i roto i tō mātou kaha." Kua rongo kē te uiui kāore he wheako o Studio E ki te mahi i ngā whare teitei. A, i roto i te whakaaturanga o te Tūrei, i rongo ai kua ngana nga kaihoahoa ki te pupuri i te tahua mo te kaupapa i raro iho i tētahi tepenga e hiahiatia ana kia whakangāwari te kaupapa. I kī a Tēnā Sounes i takaware ngā utu kia mau tonu te utu a te kaihoahoa i raro iho i te tepenga £174,000. Tērā pea i hoahoatia e Studio E te pourewa kua whakahoutia, engari, i kī a Tēnā Sounes, ko te mana whare o te kaunihera te kawenga mō te whakarite kei roto i ngā ture whare. Kua whakaae te kaunihera o te Royal Borough o Kensington me Chelsea, e whakahaere ana i te mana whare o te wāhanga tūmatanui, kāore i tika te tirotiro i te Pourewa o Grenfell, nā te rangatū o ngā rahunga Kua whakatau kētia e te uiui kua takahia e te Pourewa o Grenfell nga ture. Ināianei, kua tuhituhi ngā kaiwhakahauhau ki te Tumuaki Rishi Sunak ki te tono moni tāpiri hei tango i te kākahu i tua atu i te momo i whakamahia i Grenfell. I roto i tētahi reta, e whā ngā rōpū ārai ārai puta noa i te UK, i kī hoki he pūtea mō te wāhanga tūmataiti kua "tino uaua te uru atu".

title: Hongere pouaka whakaata hōu mō TE AO i Pākehā
summary: Ka tīmata te pāohotanga o tētahi hongere pouaka whakaata hōu mō te AO i Pākehā i te ngahuru o te tau 2018, kua pānuitia e te tumuaki o Te Rūnanga o Aotearoa.
text: Ka whai tahua te hongere e £30m, e ōrite ana ki te moni i pau i te BBC4. Kei roto i ngā mahere mō te hongere tētahi haora rongokōrero o Pākehā i te 9pm ka pāoho i ngā pūrākau mai i Pākehā, te UK me te ao. I pānuitia hoki e te tumuaki tianara he pikinga mō te £20m i te tau mō Pākehā ki te hanga i ngā hōtaka whānui o UK. Ko te kaiwhakatika o Pākehā o Aotearoa, a Sarah Smith i runga i te "Iwa Pākehā" hou, a Kōrero Taylor: He 'āe' ki te hongere pouaka whakaata hōu o TE Pākehā i kī a ia ka arotahi tēnei ki te whakaari me ngā papatono pono. Ko ngā pūwāhi matua o te hongere hōu - ka karangatia ko TE AO Pākehā - ko: I whakaahuatia e te Ariki Hall ko te pūtea penapena kotahi nui rawa i roto i ngā ihirangi pāohotanga i Pākehā mō ngā tau neke atu i te 20. Me whiwhi a Pākehā mō te £40m i roto i te pūtea hōu ia tau - £19m mō te hongere hou me ngā whanaketanga mamati, me te £20m mō te hanga hōtaka whatunga. E tūmanako ana ka piki ake te whakapau moni i ngā hōtaka whatunga i hangaia i Pākehā mō tētahi hunga whakarongo whānui o UK mai i te £65m i tēnei tau kia tata atu ki te £90m i roto i ngā tau e toru e whai ake nei. I kī a Lord Hall: "E mōhio ana mātou e aroha ana ngā kaimātakitaki i Pākehā ki te pouaka whakaata o TE WĀ, engari e mōhio ana hoki mātou e hiahia ana rātou kia pai ake te whakaata i ō rātou oranga, kia pai ake ai te whakaata i a Pākehā o nāianei. " Ko te huarahi pai rawa atu ki te whakaoti i tēnei he hongere whakaihi mō Pākehā. "He hongere e maia ana, e auaha ana, e whai hao ana, me tētahi hōtaka rongokōrero aowhānui hou i whakatikaina e Pākehā i tōna ngākau." Ka pāohotia te hongere hōu o te pouaka whakaata o TE AO mō Pākehā i ia ahiahi, ā, ka whakaatu i ngā hōtaka whakaari, pono, kōrero me ngā hōtaka rongokōrero i hangaia i Pākehā. Ko te tikanga o te whanaketanga o tētahi haora rongokōrero i te pō i te 9pm, ka noho tonu te huaputa rongokōrero i TE AO One i Pākehā ki tōna āhua o nāianei. Tērā ētahi karanga mō tētahi "Ono Pākehā", e whakakotahi ana i te Rongokōrero matua o TE AO i Ono mai i Rāwāhi me te Pūrongo Pākehā i roto i tētahi haora rongokōrero. Ka homai e ia ngā pūrākau UK, Pākehā, ao whānui hoki mai i tētahi tirohanga Pākehā. Ko ngā tono mō tētahi Ono o Pirihitini he urupare ki ngā whakahēnga i whakaaturia e te Rongo i te Ono ngā pūrākau - hei tauira mō te mātauranga me te hauora - he iti noa iho te hāngai ki ngā kaimātakitaki o Pākehā. I tautohe te kāwanatanga o Pirihitini me "hopu" e te kāwanatanga o Pirihitini te mana nui ake o ngā pūtea, ngā kaimahi me te whakataunga. I a ia e urupare ana ki te pānuitanga hou rawa, ka kī a SNP MP John Nicolson i pōhiritia e ia te hongere hou me te pūtea penapena tāpiri mō Pākehā. Heoi anō, i kī a ia i "matekiri" i "patua" e te AO te ariā o ngā rongo motuhake o Te Ono o Pirihitini i TE Kotahi. Ka kī a ia: ""Me mātakitaki noa koe i te raupapa whakahaere o te rongokōrero matua o TE HAU. " I te nuinga o te wā ka ārahi rātou i tētahi pūrākau hauora Ingarihi, kātahi ka puta he pūrākau waka Ingarihi. I te nuinga o te wā e toru ngā pūrākau Ingarihi i roto i tōna raupapa whakahaere. "He tino pai tēnā mō te iwi o Ingarangi, engari e mārama ana ehara i te pai mō te iwi o Pākehā i runga i tō rātou hongere matua." Ka pōhiritia e Sturgeon ngā mahi a te Minita Tuatahi o Nicola Sturgeon i whakamahi i te pāpāho pāpori hei urupare ki ngā rongo. Ka tūtohu a ia: "He nui te pōhiri i roto i te pānuitanga o tēnei rā. Kua roa te tautohetohe a @scotgov mō te hongere hou o TE AO Pākehā. He tino nui kia pai te pūtea. "Ko ngā whakaritenga ki te pūtea penapena hou me ngā mahi tāpiri e 80 mō ngā kaipūrongo kua roa te tōmuri, ā, he tino pai." Engari i tāpiri mai a ia: "Kāore e tukuna ngā mea katoa e hiahiatia ana e te katoa - hei tauira, kāore he Pākehā 6 e whakakino ana - engari ko te kauneketanga me te tohu tūmanako o te whakaaro hou." I kī te kaikōrero ahurea o Pirihitini, a Jackson Carlaw, he "pai te nekehanga mō ngā mahi, te pukapuka pukapuka, te tirotiro me te papatono". Ka kī a ia: "Ka whakarite hoki i te hunga e hiahia tonu ana ki ngā rongokōrero o te UK whānui i te 6pm, me ētahi atu papatono i BBC1, me pupuri hoki i tēnā." I pōhiritia hoki e Te Hunga Mahi o Pirihitini te nekehanga, ā, ka whakahē i ngā kaipōrangapū Tōpū mō tō rātou "whakararuraru i te tōkeketanga o te HAU". I kī a Paora Holleran, te kaiwhakahaere o Pirihitini mō te uniana o ngā kaipūrongo o te NUJ, he "pūhia i roto i te ringa" mō te pukapuka pukapuka o Pirihitini. Heoi anō, i kī a ia ko te nui o te pūtea penapena "e taka poto ana" i ngā mea e kimi ana te whakahaeretanga me ngā whakakotahitanga o TE AO i Pākehā. Mā te whakamārama i te whakataunga kia pupuri i te huaputa rongokōrero o nāianei, ka kī tētahi kaikōrero o TE AO kua kaha te mahi a te News at Six i Pākehā i ngā tau tata nei. Ka kī atu a ia mā te kāniwha rongokōrero 9pm i runga i te hongere hōu e tuku i te kōwhiringa me te kounga o te hunga whakarongo, ā, ka homai he pūrongo whānui o ngā rongo mai i tētahi tirohanga Pākehā. E ai ki te whakaaetanga, ka kī a Lord Hall kua hangaia kētia e Pākehā ngā hōtaka whatunga pēnei i a Shetland, Two Doors Down me Still Game, engari me nui ake te mahi. I kī a ia ko te tāpiri £20m mō te hanga hōtaka whānui o UK he "āwhina nui mō TE AO Pākehā me ngā mahi auaha i Pākehā". I pānuitia hoki e te tumuaki ahuwhānui te £1.2m mō te hongere Gaelic o TE ALBA, ka mau i tana tahua ki te £20m. Ka whakaaetia ngā tono e te poari whakakotahi hou o te BBC, ā, tērā pea e Ofcom. I whai te pānuitanga mo te pūtea Pākehā i muri i te kī a TE AO he £8.5m anō i te tau ka pau ki ngā hōtaka i hangaia i Weera. Ākuanei ka pānuitia ngā mahere mō Aiarangi ki te Raki. I a ia e mahi ana hei kaiwhakahaere hou o TE Pākehā i a Hakihea, ka oati a Donalda MacKinnon kia whakapau moni utu raihana anō i kohia ki te raki o te rohe i runga i ngā papatono i hangaia i Pākehā. I te 2015/16, 55% o ngā moni utu raihana i kohia i Pākehā i pau i runga i ngā ihirangi whatunga paetata, ā-Pākehā hoki. I whakaaturia e ngā pūkete 2015/16 a te AO te £320m i whakaarahia mai i te utu raihana i Pākehā. O tērā, e £176.5m i pau i runga i ngā ihirangi paetata me ngā huaputa whatunga o TE AO i hangaia e Pākehā. He nui tēnei hekenga mai i te £203m i pau i te tau tōmua, arā, ko te 63% o te £323m i kohia. Ko ngā moni kāore i pau i te paetata ka haere ki ngā hōtaka o TE AO i hangaia ki tētahi atu wāhi, ā, ka rere puta noa i te UK. Ka tangohia e te pūtea hōu te ōrautanga o ngā moni utu raihana i kohia i Pākehā, ā, i pau i Pākehā ki te 68% - 79% rānei mēnā ka whakaurua te £35m i pau ki ngā utu tuari, te tiki i ngā hōtaka ki te hunga whakarongo. Hei whakataurite, 95% o ngā moni utu raihana i whakaarahia i Uēra i te tau 2015/16 i pau i Uēra - tae atu ki ngā hōtaka whānui-whatunga pēnei i a Doctor Who, Sherlock, Casualty and Crimewatch - me te whika mō Aiarangi ki te Raki e tū ana i te 74%.

title: Nicky Verstappen: Ko te whakapae i tapaina i roto i te matenga o te tama Tatimana i te tau 1998
summary: Kua pānuitia e ngā pirihimana i Hōrana tētahi hua i roto i te ngaronga me te matenga o te tamaiti kura o Nicky Verstappen, e 20 tau te pakeke.
text: Ko Nicky, e 11 tau te pakeke, i tētahi puni raumati i Aotearoa 1998 i tana ngaro atu i tōna tēneti. A te rā e whai ake nei ka kitea tōna tinana i te ngahere. E kī ana ngā pirihimana ināianei he pōhēhē tā rātou ko Jos Brech te ingoa, e noho pātata ana - ā, i ngaro atu i te tīmatanga o tēnei tau. E whai ana i te kaupapa whakamātautau DNA nui rawa i roto i te hītori o te whenua. Ko tētahi o ngā whakaaturanga anake i roto i te kēhi ko te DNA kē i kitea i runga i ngā kākahu o Nicky. Neke atu i te 14,000 ngā tāngata i hoatu noa iho he tauira DNA ki te tūhuratanga - kāore tētahi o rātou i pōhēhētia. Engari mā te whakataurite i ngā tauira, ka taea te whakatau mēnā he ōrite tētahi whanaunga o te kaituku, e whakawhāiti ana i te rapunga. I tētahi hui pānui i te Wenerei, ka pānuitia e nga pirihimana ko te hunga pōhēhē ko Hohepa Terea Brech, e 55 tau te pakeke. I noho a Tēnā Brech i te wāhi i mate ai a Nicky Verstappen i te tau 1998, engari kāore i whai wāhi ki te karanga mō ngā tauira DNA tūturu, ka pūrongo te kaipānui Hōnea NOS. I whakapūketetia a ia kua hipa i te tirohanga o te hara i te tau 1998, ka kī a NOS, e haere ana i ētahi rā i muri noa iho i waenganui pō. I whakatūria a ia e nga pirihimana, a, i muri iho ka uiuitia, engari i whakaarotia he tangata harakore. I kī ngā pirihimana i mahue i a ia a Hōrana i tērā tau. I te wā o Hui tanguru, ka kī atu a ia ki tōna whānau i Wīwī a ia i runga i tētahi haerenga hīkoi, engari kua ngaro atu. I muri i tana pūrongo ngaro i Aperira, ka kitea e ngā pirihimana e tirotiro ana i tōna kāinga he ōrite 100% a ia ki te DNA i kitea i runga i te tinana o Nicky. E whakapono ana nga pirihimana o Hōnea kei te huna a ia ināianei. E kiia ana he kaimahi rākau pūkenga a ia e ora ana i ngā wāhi mamao mō te wā roa. He kēhi mātao kāore i te tino mātao a Anna Holligan, BBC News i Te Heke He kēhi mātao tēnei kāore i tino ngaro atu i te mōhiotanga o Hōnea. He tamaiti kura he iti noa iho ngā pārekareka puta noa i tōna ihu, he menemene pārekareka me te whakakai koura i tōna taringa mauī. Pēnei i te tokomaha o ngā taitama e whakatata ana ki te taiohitanga, i pōkaitia ia ki te hākinakina i tētahi puni raumati. Ko te rerekētanga anake: Kore rawa a Nicky Verstappen i hoki mai ki te kāinga. Mai i taua wā ka noho tōna ingoa hei kupu mō te whakatūpato ināianei ki tētahi whainga e tino paingia ana e te Tatimana ohaoha. Kua puta nga hurihanga o tēnei kēhi i roto i te ngākau o tētahi iwi kua whai tata i te whainga a te whānau o Verstappen ki te kawe mai i te kaipatu o ta rātau tama ki te tika. "I muri i te rapunga mo te 20 tau he ingoa me te kanohi tātau," te kī a te whaea o Nicky, a Berthie Verstappen. I takoha a ia ki te kairīpoata a Pita De Vries, nāna i uiui te matenga o tana tama, a, i mahi hei kaikorero o te whānau i muri i te hui pānui. "I kōrerotia e Pita ngā tāngata katoa i mahi i te kēhi i ēnei tau katoa. Engari i wareware i a ia te tangata tino nui ki a mātau... ko koe tēnā. Mehemea kāore mōu, kāore te tūhuratanga i neke whakamua mō te 19 tau," tana kī. "I ēnei tau katoa i reira tonu koe mō mātau, i te ao, i te pō rānei," tana tāpiri mai.

title: Ka whakatere a Stagecoach i te hangarau aroturuki
summary: Kua tautuhia ngā pāhihi pahi kia whai hua mai i te hangarau kairapu hōu e whakaurua ana ki ngā pahi Stagecoach.
text: Mā ngā pūaroturuki, i runga i ngā waka e 7,000, ka taea te whakataki i te haerenga o ngā pahi i te wā tūturu mai i ngā taupānga i runga i ngā waea ā-rorohiko me te ipurangi. I kī te umanga waka ā-Pēhi ka whakamātauria te pūnaha i te raumati a tērā tau, ā, me hora katoa i te mutunga o te tau 2015. I kī te umanga e hiahia ana ngā pāhihi ki te mōhio āhea tae mai ai te pahi. I kī a Robert Montgomery, te kaiwhakahaere whakahaere o Stagecoach UK Bus: "Mā te pūtea penapena i tēnei pūnaha hōu e āwhina ki te tuku i tētahi pūhara hei whakarato i ngā haerenga pai ake mō ā mātou kiritaki, he nui ake te utu o ngā mōhiohio e ngā mana ā-rohe, me te whakapai ake i te tōtika o tā mātou ake mahi."

title: E rapu ana a Jimmy Choo i te kaihoko rekereke
summary: Ko te kaihanga hū rangatira o Jimmy Choo te haere mō ngā tāngata rongonui e kimi ana ki te mau rekereke kaipatu i runga i te whāriki whero.
text: Nā Dan MacadamBusiness kaipānui Ināianei kei te haere te umanga o Ingarangi i tōna ake wā, i te mea ka hokona e tana poari te umanga. Tata ki te £700m, e whakapono ana ngā kaitirotiro ka taea e Jimmy Choo te aro atu ki ngā whare rangatira tauwhāinga, tae atu ki ngā kaihoko Hainamana, Rāwhiti Waenganui, Rūhia hoki. Tae atu ki ngā hū, ka puta mai i a Jimmy Choo he maha ngā taonga whai rawa, engari kua kite i te pōturi o ngā hoko i roto i ngā tau tata nei. I whiwhi pūrua te nekehanga mai i te kaipupuri matua o Jimmy Choo, o JAB Holdings, nāna i kī i te Mane kua rite hoki ki te tango i a Bally, te kaihanga hū tuku iho me te pēke ā-ringa o Huitene. Ko te hoko te hurihanga hou rawa mō Jimmy Choo, i tīmata hei kaihanga hū i te rāwhiti o Rāwāhi. Ko wai a Jimmy Choo? I whakatūria tahitia te umanga e te kaihanga hū o Te Whenua o Aotearoa, nāna i whakangungu i te Kāreti Hangarau o Cordwainers rongonui i Rāwāhi, me te kaipānui Vogue o mua o Tamara Mellon i te tau 1996. I tere te hanga i tētahi rārangi kiritaki whakatapua o ngā kaiwhakatangitangi, kaiwhakaari me te ariki. He kaingākau te Ariki o Kemihana ki te kaihoahoa hū o Ingarangi, pērā ki te kaiwaiata o Beyonce me te kaiwhakaari toa o Hoka, ko Emma Stone. Engari kua puta i te maha o ngā rangatira rerekē i roto i ngā tau. I hokona e Ms Mellon me te tuatahi o ētahi o ngā kaiwhaiwhai tūmataiti rerekē a Tēnā Choo i te tau 2001. Tekau tau i muri mai ka wehe a Ms Mellon i te umanga ki te whakarewa i tana ake raina kākahu. I te tau 2014, i whakarārangitia a Jimmy Choo ki te London Stock Exchange, i taua wā ko JAB, nā te whānau piriona Tiamana o Reimann, te kaipupuri matua. Ko ngā hea 'Tautoko' a Jimmy Choo i pā ki tētahi pūkete tiketike i runga i ngā rongo o te hoko pea, ka kati i te 10.68% i Rānana. I kī te umanga i roto i tētahi kōrero: "E whakapuaki ana te poari o Jimmy Choo i tēnei rā kua whakatau kia whakahaere i tētahi arotakenga o ngā kōwhiringa rautaki e tuwhera ana ki te kamupene hei whakamōrahi i te uara mō ōna kaipupuri, ā, kei te rapu tono mō te kamupene. " Kua kōrerorerotia e Jimmy Choo te tukanga arotake rautaki me tōna kaipupuri nui, JAB Luxury GmbH, ā, kua whakaūngia e JAB Luxury e tautoko ana i te tukanga." I kī te whare ahua kāore anō kia whiwhi tono, ā, kei te paunatia hoki ētahi atu kōwhiringa. I kī a JAB Luxury, nāna te 68% o Jimmy Choo, i te Mane i tāruatia te nekehanga. Engari i tāpiritia e JAB, he kaiwhakangao hoki i roto i ngā tōnati o Kiriata me ngā taonga kāinga o Reckitt Benckiser, "kāore he mōhiotanga ka tū he hoko". I roto i ngā tau, kua neke atu a Jimmy Choo, neke atu i te 150 ngā pātaka puta noa i te ao, ki ngā hū tāne, ā, kua whakarewaina he maha ngā taonga whai rawa, mai i ngā pēke ki ngā mōhiti rā. Engari i pōturi te tipu o tana hokohoko ki te 2% i te 2016 i whakaritea ki te 7% i te 2015 me te 12% i te 2014, i kitea e ngā kaitirotiro i HSBC i tērā marama. Tātaritanga: 'He nui ake te kawhe i te rekereke kaipatu' Nā Emma Simpson, te kaipānui pakihi o TE WĀ, te āhua nei he nui ake te hiahia o te rangatira o Jimmy Choo ki te kawhe i te rekereke kaipatu. Ko JAB, te umanga pūtea penapena i pūruatia e te whānau piriona o Reimann, i roto i ngā tau tata nei. I ngā wiki tata nei, ka pā ki te hoko i te umanga parāoa o Amerika, Panera Bread, mō te $7.5bn (£6bn). I tua atu i ngā tūnga whakahaere kua riro kētia i roto i ngā toa pēnei i Keurig Green Mountain, Douwe Egberts, me te kaihanga tōnati o Krispy Kreme. Ka tāpiri katoa ki tētahi emepaea kai me te inu e tipu tere ana. Nā reira kua kore pea e pai te whai kamupene taonga whai rawa. E toru tau noa iho mai i te mātāmua o te mākete hea a Jimmy Choo. Mai i te tau 2014, he tūtuki te eke o tōna utu tiritiri. Engari kātahi anō ka nui ake a Jimmy Choo i te wāhanga whai rawa, ā, kua tāwhana anō ngā hea. Ehara pea i te wā kino ki te hoko i te umanga.

title: I whakawhiwhia te rangatira o te National Opera o Welsh mō te whakatairanga i Pōrana
summary: Kua hoatu ki te rangatira nui o Welsh National Opera tētahi o ngā hōnore tiketike o Pōrana mō te whakatairanga i te ahurea Pōrana.
text: I whakawhiwhia ki a David Pountney, ko ia hoki te kaiwhakahaere toi o te kamupene, te Order of Merit i tētahi hui i Whiria. E mōhio ana ki ngā koha tino nui ki te mahi tahi i waenganui i Pōrana me ētahi atu iwi. I whakahonoretia a ia mo te whakatū i te opera Pōrana i tana tūranga hei kaiwhakahaere o te hākari Bregenz i Ateria mai i te tau 2003. E āhei ana ngā manene me ngā tangata whenua Pōngia e noho ana ki rāwāhi ki te whakawhiwhinga. Kua mahi a Tēnā Pountney, nāna i uru ki WNO i te tau 2011, i ngā opera a ngā kaiwaiata Pōngia tae atu ki a Karol Szymanowski's King Roger, Mieczyslaw Weinberg's The Passenger me te whakaaturanga tuatahi o Andre Tchaikowsky's The Merchant of Venice. "He kaha ā-hinengaro tō te opera Pōrana, he resonance", te kī a Tēnā Pountney, nāna i tohu atu ki te hītori uaua i pāngia e Pōrana i raro i ngā wā roa o te whakahaeretanga kē. "Kua puta ēnei tāngata i te mamae, ā, ka rongo koe i roto i te pūoro. " Koia tēnā e mahi ai te opera. Ka kawea mai e ia ngā whakaaro. E whakaahua ana te puoro i tētahi mea i tua atu i ngā kupu." Hei urupare ki te hōnore, ka kī a Tēnā Pountney: "E rongo ana ahau i te tino whakamoemiti me te hōnore ki te whiwhi i tēnei whakawhiwhinga. E rekareka ana ahau ka taea e te Hākari Bregenz te āwhina ki te whakaputa i te ahurea o Pōrana. "I mōhio ahau i tēnei take, he nui tonu ta mātau mahi mō te ahurea Pōngia i te hākari. Kua huraina e mātau e rua ngā kaitito Pōrana kua warewaretia e Pōrana." Ko te mahi a Karol Szymanowski i whakaaturanga tuatahi i te ao i te Hākari Bregenz i muri i te rāhuitanga i raro i te ture ā Ihupuku. Mai i te whakaaturanga i Bregenz, kua mahia ngā opera a Szymanowski e te English National Opera i Rānana, e ngā kamupene i Houston, New York, Chicago, France, Poland me Tiamana. I tāpiri mai a Tēnā Pountney: "He rerekē ngā toi ki ngā tōrangapū, he mana ngohengohe tō ngā toi. Mā te whakaae kia mahia ēnei opera, kei te huri mātou i te hītori o te pūoro me te whare tapere."

title: Ka haere a Newman ko ia anake
summary: Ka tukua e te kaiwaiata wairua o Ingarangi a John Newman tana pukaemi takitahi e tino tūmanakohia ana, Tribute, i tēnei wiki.
text: Nā Sabrina SweeneyEntertainment reporter, BBC News E whai ake ana i tōna angitu hei rehetoi whakaaturanga i runga i te tau tuatahi o Rudimental, Feel The Love, i tērā tau. Ko tana takitahi tuatahi, Love Me Again, i haere hāngai tonu ki te tihi o ngā tūtohi UK i te wā i tukua ai i a Hōngongoi. I kōrero a Newman ki te AO mō te tata o te noho hei mīhini, he puku huri ora me te pūoro hei pēke kōwhao. Ka whakaputaina tō pukaemi tuatahi Takoha i tēnei wiki - he aha te urupare ki tōu whakaaro ka whiwhi? Kāore au i te mōhio. Ina mahi pūoro ahau, e māharahara ana ahau ki te urupare nā te mea e hiahia ana ahau ki te haere tonu i tāku e mahi nei, ā, koia te kī - he nui te angitu ki a au ki te hoki ki tētahi studio me te mahi anō i taua mea. Kua hokona e tō Love Me Again neke atu i te miriona kape puta noa i te ao - he ohorere tērā? Tino nui. I te wā e noho ana koe i roto i tētahi taiwhanga iti, e tito waiata ana. Ahakoa ka pā ki te reo irirangi, he mea whakamīharo. Kāore au i tūmanako ki tētahi o ngā riu - nāku ake, ki te riu Rudimental rānei - nā reira he tino pōrangi. He tokomaha ngā tāngata e mōhio ana ki a koe ko te tangata i whakaaturia i runga i te takitahi a Rudimental. He pēhea te hira o taua ngātahitanga? He rerekē i ngā wā katoa ina pātai mai ngā tāngata ki a au hei ngātahitanga nā te mea i tīmata tūturu hei torutoru noa iho ngā tāngata i roto i tētahi studio e kata ana kia tīmata rā anō te tangata ki te hanga. He hoa noa iho māua e mahi pūoro ana. E ai ki te mea he pūhara mōku, he mea whakamīharo mō tāku mahi ināianei, he whakataki tino pai ki te umanga pūoro. He nui ngā mea i ako ahau mō taku whakaaturanga ora, mōku anō, mō te haereere. I tipu ake koe i Settle, he taone iti i te awa o Te Raki o Aotearoa. He aha te āhua o te oranga i te tipu ake? Tino hōhā! Ko te mea anake hei mahi ko te haurangi me te whawhai i ngā mutunga wiki. Kāore ā mātou whare pikitia, ara peihana, ā, he weriweri te puna kaukau. Kāore he mea hei mahi. E ai ki tētahi oranga ngaio, ka noho koe hei paramu, hei mīhini, hei kaipani rānei, kātahi ka whiwhi wahine, he tamaiti, he whare, ā, kāore au i tino pīrangi ki tēnā. He tino whakapōrearea ki a au. Anō he paraikete i runga i ōku kanohi. I tīmata koe ki te whakangungu kia noho hei mīhini - he rerekē i te mahi pūoro. I tinihangatia ahau ki te whakaaro e hiahia ana ahau kia noho hei mīhini mīhini e te taone e noho ana ahau. I taku neke ki Leeds i te 16 o aku tau, ka mōhio ahau e hiahia ana ahau ki te mahi puoro. Nahea koe i mōhio tuatahi ai ka taea e koe te waiata? Ki taku whakaaro kāore tonu e taea e au te waiata pai. Ki taku whakaaro kāore au i te tino mātauranga, ā, kāore au i te tino whakangungu, engari koia pea ahau i rerekē ai ki ētahi atu. Ko te wāhi o te whanaketanga mōku i a au e noho ana i Leeds, ā, i ngaro i a au e rua ōku hoa tino pai i roto i tētahi tūtukitanga motokā, ā, i te waiata ahau, i te tito waiata, i te tākaro kita i ia rā. Nā wai koe i whakaawe i a koe e tipu ana? I te DJing ahau i ngā pūoro whare me te whakaputa i ngā moka o te ngahere me te hip hop, ā, i tino uru ahau ki ngā mea 90 me te disco tōmuri i taua wā. I taku nekehanga ki Leeds ka tīmata ahau ki te wairua me te whakarongo ki te tini o ngā tāngata pēnei i a James Brown me Wilson Pickett. I a au e tipu ake ana i whakatangihia e taku whaea he maha ngā whakahiatotanga Motown, engari ināianei i muri i te ako i te wairua me te titiro ki te whakanaotanga, he nui ngā mea i akona e au, ā, ināianei kei te iti noa iho tana whakahāwea i taku mōhiotanga! I tautokona e te tangata i tō whakatau ki te whai pūoro? Kāo - he tino tautoko taku whānau, engari i whakaaro ngā tāngata o te taone i tipu ake ai ahau he wawau ahau, ā, ka kata mai ki a au i a au e tākaro ana i ngā gigs. Tūtaki ki a Rudimental - i pēhea tēnā i puta ai? I mahi ahau i tētahi pae, ā, i whakamōhiotia ahau e taku kaiwhakahaere i taua wā ki a Kesi, ā, ka tukua ahau e rātau kia neke ki tō rātou whare ki te mahi i aku pūoro. I muri iho i tēnā ka tūtaki ahau ki ngā tāne ki te mahi pūoro ki a rātou. Koia tērā te āhua o te waro - kātahi anō mātou ka tūtaki, ka mahi pūoro, ka mātao tahi. I te wā tonu e pai ana ngā mea - ā, ka puta mai a Feel The Love - ka mutu koe ki te hōhipera. I ahatia? He puku roro tōku, he mīharo, ā, kei te kāpō ahau. He tino whakamataku, ā, kāore au e hiahia ki tētahi tangata, engari he manaaki huna tērā mōku nā te mea i pakeke ahau, ā, i taku putanga atu i waho ka hiahia noa ahau ki te tukituki i taku mahi me ngā tamariki Rudimental. Kua mīharo tēnā ki te pukaemi? Tino - kua piki ake te taumata o te pukaemi me te nui o taku hiahia ki te kume i tētahi pūkete whakamīharo. He nui tonu ngā riu pūoro i tēnei wā e ngā āhuatanga o Rudimental, Naughty Boy me London Grammar. He aha i ohorere ai tēnā nekeneke? Kātahi anō mātau ka puta mai i te wā kotahi i te raumati. Ki taku whakaaro ko te take i whakapiki ai he rata ki te reo irirangi. Engari he pūkete tino nui te pukaemi me ngā whakaaro mokemoke. I tuhia e koe ngā riu katoa mai i ngā wheako whaiaro? Āe. E ai ki te whakapakari i te whakanaotanga, ka mahia e au aku whakaaturanga i te tuatahi i mua i taku tuhi kupu, ā, ka ngahau ahau ki a rātou. Kātahi ka tuhi ahau mō ngā whārangi 10 o ngā kupu waiata tae noa ki taku whakaaro 'āe, ināianei me hanga tēnei ki tētahi mea'. I puta ahau i tētahi wehenga, ā, i tērā wā ka tīmata te pukaemi ki te huihui nā te mea i hiahia ahau ki te whakapuaki i a au me te pūoro he tino haumanu mōku. E whakaaro ana ahau pēnei i taku pēke kōwhao, ā, i hiahia ahau ki te whakaputa atu. He ngāwari noa iho ki a koe te tuhi mō ō wheako? Āe, engari kāo! He uaua tonu te whakapuaki i a koe pērā, engari e koa ana ahau he pūoro tāku kia taea ai te mahi. He maha ngā kaiwaiata whai taunga nui hei kaiwaiata whakaaturanga e ngaro noa ana. He pēhea tō whakangāwari i te haerenga o tō takitahi tuatahi ki te tau tuatahi? Ehara i te whakamāmā, he hari noa iho nā te mea i hiahia noa ahau ki te hanga pukaemi - ko te take anake e hiahia ana ahau ki te angitu kia taea ai e au te mahi tonu i tēnei. Ehara i te mea ka taea e au te hīkoi me ngā mekameka miriona tāra i taku kakī me te taraiwa i roto i ngā Ferraris. Kia taea ai e au te tuhi i ngā pūoro e pai ana ki a au te hanga i roto i ngā studio whakamīharo. Ki taku whakaaro kāore au e mutu te hākinakina ki te mahi pūoro, ahakoa he uaua ki te kōrero i tēnei wā nā te mea kei te tino pai ahau. Ki te mutu taku hākinakina ā muri ake nei, ka mutu ahau nā te mea ehara i te pūoro ināianei - he tangata rongonui, ā, kāore tēnā e pai ki a au. Ko wai e tino hiahia ana koe ki te mahi tahi? Kua tukuna mai ki a au ngā wāhi ngātahitanga mauī, matau me waenganui, engari kāore au i pīrangi ki te mahi. Mēnā he pai te hoko o tēnei pukaemi e hiahia ana ahau ki te whakahīhī nā te mea kua hokona mai e ngā tāngata e mōhio ana ahau ki a au hei rehetoi, ki te pūoro, ehara i te ingoa nui kei runga i te pukaemi. Ka hoki anō koe ki te studio? Kua tīmata kē ahau ki te haere mai me ngā whakaaro, ā, kua rite ahau ki te haere ināianei, engari e hiahia ana aku kaiwhakahaere kia nui ake ngā whakatairanga, nā reira me tatari mō tētahi wā. Ka tukua te takoha i te 14 o Whiringa ā-rangi.

title: I whakaaturia he wahine te gorilla tāne o Bristol Zoo
summary: Ka ohorere nga kaitiaki kararehe i to rātau mōhiotanga he wahine tonu tētahi gorilla tāne e ono tau.
text: I whānau a Kukena i Bristol Zoo i te 27 o Mahuru 2011 ki te whaea o Salome me te silverback o te hōia. Engari nō nā tata nei ka kite te hunga e tiaki ana i te gorilla pāpaku ki te uru i ngā huringa whakamīharo ki ōna whēkau me ōna whanonga. I kī te kaitiaki matua o ngā kararehe i te kararehe, a John Partridge, e mōhiotia ana ngā gorilla he uaua ki te wahine. "He kaupapa here pākaha tā mātau ki a mātau kararehe," tana tāpiri mai. "I te mea he uaua ki te wahine a ngā gorilla, i whakaarotia he tāne a Kukena. " He tamariki hauora a ia, ā, kāore he take hei mahi i ētahi atu tirotiro hauora ki a ia i tōna oranga i roto i te kararehe." I kī te kararehe ko Kukena, e karangatia ana ko Kuki, kātahi anō ka nui ake tana oestrus tuatahi, ā, ka nui ake te kōrero o tōna taihemahema, nāna rātau i whakatūpato ki tōna ira tangata pono. Ko te kitenga whakamīharo he rongo pai mō te wā heke mai o te momo, e tino mōrearea ana, nā te mea he iti ake ngā gorilla wahine i ngā tāne i roto i ngā kararehe o te ao. Ko te tikanga he tino rerekē te āhua o te wā heke mai o Kukena i a ia ināianei ka nekehia ia ki tētahi atu kararehe ki te haere tonu i te hōtaka tāuri. Tērā pea ka pīrangi koe: Ko te wā heke mai o te gorilla me kōrerorerotia ki te kaiwhakarite gorilla i te Hōtaka Momo Mōrearea o Ūropi. I tāpiri mai a Tēnā Partridge: "E kore tēnei kitenga e huri i te āhua o tā mātou whakahaere i tā mātou ope e whitu gorillas i Ngā Māra Kararehe o Bristol." Ko Kukena te whaea o Afia, i mahue i a ia te whawhai mo tōna ora i muri i tana whānautanga i te tau 2016.

title: Nazanin Zaghari-Ratcliffe: Gove under fire for comments
summary: Kua tae mai a Michael Gove i raro i te ahi mo tana kī kāore a ia i mōhio ki ngā mahi a Nazanin Zaghari-Ratcliffe i Irana i te wā i hopukina ai ia i te tau 2016.
text: Ka kī atu a Tēnā Gove ki a Andrew Marr ka "tangohia e ia te whakaūnga a tana tāne" kei te hararei te tangata whenua o Ingarangi-Ārepa. I te tiaki a ia i te hēkeretari kē, nā ōna ake kōrero i āwangawanga ai ka taea te whakaroa atu tana whiu. I kī a Labour "he nui ake tana hiahia ki te pare i te mahi a (Boris) Hōnea" i te wāteatanga o Mrs Zaghari-Ratcliffe. I kī te minita o te Tari Kāpata Kōruru o Jon Trickett kua "pūhuitia" e Tēnā Gove te "whakatata ki te matauranga o te ao whānui". I hopukina a Mīharo Zaghari-Ratcliffe i te taunga rererangi o Tehran me tana tamāhine 18 marama i Aperira 2016, ko tētahi o ngā Ārepa maha e herea ana i roto i ngā marama. I whakapaea a ia ki te ngana ki te turaki i te kāwanatanga o Ārepa - he whakapae i whakakāhoretia e ia i ngā wā katoa - a, ka whiua kia rima tau te hereheretanga. E kī ana a ia i te hararei a ia i Irana kia tūtaki ai ngā whanaunga ki tana tamāhine tamariki. I kitea nga hopunga he wāhanga o te whakamātau a nga Pare Tōkeke o Irana ki te tukituki i a Perehitini Wānanga me te tukanga o te whakangāwari i te whanaungatanga ki te Uru. I tērā wiki i whakahētia ai te Hēkeretari ā-Rohe o UK, a Poihāne, mō te huatau kua whakaakona e ia ngā kaipūrongo i te haerenga - nā te māharahara ka roa ake tana whiu. Mai i tērā wā ka kī a Tēnā Hōnea e "kore e pōhēhētia" te kāwanatanga i a ia i te hararei "ā, koia anake te take o tana haerenga". 'Hē nui' I pātaitia i te Rātapu e Tēnā Marr he aha tana mahi i Irana, ka whakautua e Tēnā Gove: "Kāore au i te mōhio" kātahi anō ka tāpiritia "kāore he take me noho a Nazanin Zaghari-Ratcliffe ki te whare herehere i Irana ki te mōhio tētahi o tātau". Ka kī atu a ia ko tana tāne te tangata e mōhio ana, ā, ka whakaūngia e ia kei te hararei a ia. Ka kī a ia: "He hē nui tā mātou ki te whakaaro mātou ko te mea tika hei whakapae i ngā kaipōrangapū i roto i te kāwanatanga ā iwi e ngana ana ki te mahi i te mea tika mo te raruraru o tētahi wahine e hereheretia ana e tētahi kāwanatanga he kaikino rangatū i ngā mana tangata." "Ko wai kei te tauranga i konei? Irāna. Ko te tikanga ko nga mahi a to rātau whakawāwā me nga tautīaki hurihuri." I tāpiritia e ia kia kaua te UK e "tākaro i ta rātau kēmu". 'E whakararuraru ana i to mātau whenua' Ināianei, kua karangatia e te kaiārahi Mahi a Jeremy Corbyn rāua ko te Koromatua o Rānōna, o Te Koromatua o Rāwāhi, o Te Koromatua o Rāwāhi, kia whakarerea a Tēnā Hōnea mō te whakamōrearea i a Mrs Zaghari-Ratcliffe. I kī atu a Tēnā Kōpia ki te Kaitirotiro me panaia a Tēnā Hōnea hei hēkeretari ā-rohe mō te "whakararuraru i to mātau whenua" me te "whakamōrearea i o tātau iwi". A, ko Tulip Siddiq o Labour, ko ia te MP o Mrs Zaghari-Ratcliffe, i kī atu ki te BBC kua auau tana whakaara i ngā taipitopito o te kēhi i te Pāremata "Kia haere a Michael Gove ki runga i te pouaka whakaata i tēnei rā, me te kī kāore ia i te tino mōhio ... me mōhio ia kei te hararei a Nazanin, ā, i te whakakotahi i te teka i kōrerotia mō te whakangungu i ngā kaipūrongo, ka kino kē atu tana ora mō taku wahanga." E mōhiotia ana i kōrero te tāne a Mrs Zaghari-Ratcliffe, a Rākei ki te hēkeretari ā-rohe i te Rātapu. I kī atu a Tēnā Ratcliffe ki te AO e tūmanako ana ia ka taea e ia te haere ki Irana me Tēnā Hōnea ki te tūtaki i tana wahine me te kite i tana tamāhine, kāore anō ia kia kite i te tangata mai i te hopunga.

title: Kua tiakina e ngā kano ārai mate Covid te 11,700 oranga me te 33,000 ngā whakaurunga hōhipera
summary: Kua tiakina e ngā kano ārai mate 11,700 ngā oranga, ā, ka aukati i te 33,000 tāngata e tino mate ana i te Covid-19 i Ingarangi, e hua ana te rangahau.
text: I kitea e te tātaritanga Hauora Tūmatanui o Ingarangi, tae noa ki te mutunga o Aperira, ko ngā tāngata i roto i o rātau tau 70 me te 80 tau i kite i te hinganga nui rawa o ngā mate me ngā whakaurunga hōhipera. I kī te Hēkeretari Hauora a Matt Hancock he "whakamīharo" nga whika. Ko te whiwhi kano ārai mate "tētahi o ngā mea tino hira ka tonoa koe kia mahia i roto i tō oranga", ka tāpiri mai a ia. Kei te whakatūria ētahi atu whare hauora werohanga ki ētahi wāhi o Lancashire hei tuku i ētahi atu werohanga ki ngā tāngata 38 neke atu rānei, me te tangata whai mate hauora e neke atu ana i te 18. Ko tēnei tētahi wāhanga, hei āwhina ki te whakaiti i te horahanga o te momo Īnia, e āwangawanga ana nā te mea e whakapono ana ngā kaipūtaiao ka taea te whakawhiti i te taupēnga o Kent. E iwa mai i te 10 ngā tāngata e 40 neke atu rānei te pakeke kua whiwhi i te kano ārai mate tuatahi i Ingarangi. Tērā pea ka ōrite te pānga o ngā kano ārai mate puta noa i te UK, neke atu i te 53 miriona ngā rongoā e whakahaeretia ana. Public Health England (PHE) used data on how well the vaccines are working and the number of people being vaccinated in different age groups, to calculate deaths and illness blocked from Covid. E whakaarohia ana, he mihi ki ngā kano ārai mate: me: Ko ngā raraunga kāwanatanga hōu rawa - i runga anō i ngā whakaaturanga mai i te whakawhitiwhiti UK - e tohu ana i tētahi rongoā o te kano ārai mate Pfizer-BioNTech, Oxford-AstraZeneca rānei e tapahi ana i te mōrea o te whakapokenga ki te 70%, me te mate kino me te mate nui ake. Mēnā he iti iho te tūponotanga o tētahi tangata ki te whakapoke, ā, he iti iho te horahanga o te huaketo i waenganui i te tangata. Dr Mary Ramsay, head of immunisation at PHE, said: "The vaccine has already saved so many lives and we can now see the huge impact it has had on preventing people becoming serious illness and therefore also protecting our hospitals. " E ai ki ēnei whika, mā te whiwhi i tō kano ārai mate ka whakaora i tō ora, ka aukati rānei i tō mate nui i te Covid-19. "Ka tino whakaheke hoki i ō tūponotanga ki te whakapoke me te whakapoke i ētahi atu. " He mea nui kia whiwhi i ngā rongoā e rua o tō kano ārai mate ina tukuna atu ki a koe."

title: Scots race protests 'must follow lockdown rules'
summary: Kua tohe a Police Scotland ki te tangata e whakamahere ana i ngā whakahē a Black Lives Matters kia ū ki ngā ture raka coronavirus.
text: He maha ngā whakahē e whakaritea ana i Pākehā i waenganui i te riri nui ake i te matenga o George Floyd i roto i te tiakitanga pirihimana i Te Hononga o Amerika. I kī te Rangatira Kātipa o Iain Livingstone i "ohorere, i pouri" a ia i ngā mahi i roto i a Mātau, kātahi anō ka "whakarihariha te whakahāwea i ōna āhua katoa". Engari i whakahauhautia e ia te tangata e whakahē ana kia whai i ngā tohutohu mō ngā huihuinga o waho. E kī ana ngā tūtohutanga a te kāwanatanga kia kaua e neke atu i te rua ngā kāinga e hui ana i waho, ā, ko te mōrahi o te waru tāngata. I kī te Minita Tuatahi o Nicola Sturgeon i rongo a ia i "te kotahitanga katoa ki te nekeneke Black Lives Matter" me te kī e whai mana ana te tangata ki te whakarongo i o rātau reo i roto i ngā whakahē hūmārie. Engari i kī a ia me mahi anake tēnei i runga i te tikanga "haumaru, kaua hoki e mōrearea te tangata", e tono ana ki te hunga whakarite takahanga ki te kōrerorero ki ngā mana ā rohe. Kua tipu haere te pōrearea i roto i a Mātau mai i te matenga o Tēnā Pirihitini i a ia e hopukina ana e ngā pirihimana i Minneapolis i te 25 o Me. E whakaatu ana tētahi ataata i tētahi pirihimana mā e tūturi ana i runga i te kakī o te tau 46 tau mō ngā meneti maha, i te wā e kī ana a Tēnā Pirihitini kāore e taea e ia te hā. Kua whakataua te pirihimana o mua o Derek Chauvin ki te kōhuru waeine tuatoru. He tini nga tāngata i whara i te whakamahinga a nga mana i te korohū roimata me te kaha ki te whakatūpato i ngā whakahēnga kua tāhaetia neke atu i te 75 ngā tāone, me te ārai ā iwi i karangatia me ngā hōta i whakaritea ki ngā kāwanatanga maha. I roto i tētahi kōrero i tukuna ki Twitter, ka kī a Tēnā Livingstone ko ngā takahanga i roto i a Mātau "kāore e whakaata ana i to mātau kāhua pirihimana i Pākehā". I kī a ia i "tukua a ia ki te whakapai ake i te āhua o tātau whakaata, te tohu me te whakauru ki o tātau hapori", me te whakarite kia "tautokona e ngā kaimahi o te ope ā mātou uara o te mana tangata, te tika, te taparenga me te manaaki". I tāpiritia e te kātipa matua e "mōhio ana a ia ki te maha o ngā takahanga i whakaritea i Pākehā i ngā rā e heke mai nei", e kī ana: "Ka whakahauhau mātou i te katoa kia haere tonu ki te whai i ngā ture me ngā tohutohu a te kāwanatanga o Pākehā ki te hui i waho, ā, ka whakauru atu ki ngā kaiwhakahaere ki te whakaiti i ngā mōrea ki te haumarutanga tūmatanui, ki te hauora rānei". E hia mano ngā tāngata i uru ki ngā whakahē i Rāwāhi, i Manatāne, i Kānata i te mutunga wiki, e waiata ana i te "take o te ora pango" me te "tika mō Hōri Wairangi". Te āhua nei ko ētahi kaiwhakahē e rere ana i ngā aratohu tawhiti pāpori, ā, i kī ngā pirihimana he tokomaha ngā tāngata i hopukina mō te takahi i ngā ture Covid-19. I tana kōrero coronavirus ia rā, i kī a Ms Sturgeon i tāruatia e ia te nekehanga Black Lives Matter, ā, he "kaitautoko māia, he kaiuru auau" i roto i te whakahē rangimārie. Heoi anō, i kī a ia "i tēnei wā, ko te take, ka pōhēhētia, ka mōrearea pea te hauora, ā, ka mōrearea pea te hauora, ki te ora hoki". I tāpiri mai a ia: "Ko tāku e kī atu ai ki te hunga e hiahia ana ki te whakahē, ā, e kī ana ahau i tēnei hei urunga me te kaitautoko, me kimi huarahi e āhei ai ngā tāngata ki te whakarongo i ō rātou reo me te whakarite i ngā piro e hiahia ana te tokomaha o tātau ki te mahi i tēnei wā, engari kia mahi i runga i tētahi huarahi haumaru, ā, kāore i te mōrearea ngā tāngata me ngā hapori whānui ake."

title: Mai i Tbilisi ki tētahi tēneti: He aha te mea e whai ake nei mō te kararehe o Saakashvili?
summary: I te nuinga o te wā e kīia ana he kararehe e karapoti ana i te perehitini o mua o Hōria.
text: Nā Hona FisherBBC Kiev korero i ākiritia ia e ētahi hei clown. Engari pēnei i a ia, e whakarihariha ana rānei ki a ia, ā, he torutoru noa iho ngā Ākarana i waenganui, tērā tētahi mea o te tohunga mō Mikheil Saakashvili. Ko te kaha o te tau 49 tau mo te hanga anō, me te mea tūpono, kua hangaia he tangata tōrangapū e kore e taea e te tangata whenua o Ukrainian te ōrite. I tēnei wiki e kore e mōhiotia ka tautuhia te ūpoko panuku o te pūrākau o Saakashvili ki te whare herehere. I hopukina a ia i tōna kāinga o Kiev e ngā kaiwhakahaere haumarutanga, a, ka paiheretia ki roto i tētahi vani pirihimana. I whakapaea ia e nga rōia ki te whiwhi pūtea mai i tētahi urunga o te Perehitini o Ukraine, a, he roa te wā i roto i te whare herehere, tērā pea ka whakahokia ki Hōria. I roto i te tikanga Saakashvili tino pai, ko te whakaoranga i te kokonga noa iho. He rau rau o ana kaitautoko i taea te ārai i te vani pirihimana e mau ana i a ia. Kaore i roa ka tae mai ngā pirihimana whakararuraru, ā, i te nuinga o ngā whenua e tūmanako ana koe kia puta mai rātau ki runga. Engari ko Ukraine tēnei, ā, kei te hou tonu ngā pūmahara ki te āwhina o ngā matapaki taikaha me te whakatoi i te āhua o te āhua ki te huri i tētahi whakahē iti rawa ki te hurihanga o Maidan 2014. Kua mārama ināianei te karere a ngā kaiārahi o Ukraine i ēnei āhuatanga: karo i ngā utu katoa o te tutu e pā ana ki ngā tūpāpaku me ngā māharahara. Heoi, he maha nga haora i kōwhaitia ai e nga kaitautoko a Tēnā Saakashvili nga pirihimana. I whakamahia te rehu pepa, engari kāore i nui ake, ā, ka āta kume te huihuinga, ka pana atu ki te waka pirihimana a Tāne Saakashvili. I muri iho i te toru haora o te kākari ka puta mai te mea tē mōhiotia, ā, ka puta mai a Tēnā Saakashvili pēnei i a Houdini, e whakakakahu ana i te ringa i runga i te ringa kotahi. "Ka haere mātau ki te pāremata ki te karanga ki te whakapae i a (Perehitini Petro) Poroshenko, he tāhae, he hāmate nui, ā, kei te pāhuahua i te katoa o Ukraine," tana kī mai ki a au i mua tonu i tana tāhaetanga i waenganui o Kiev e ana kaitautoko hākinakina. E rua tau ki mua, he hoa a Tēnā Saakashvili rāua ko Perehitini Poroshenko. I mīharo te kaiārahi o Ukraine i te āhua o te whakahaere a Tēnā Saakashvili i Hōria i waenganui i te 2004 me te 2013, ā, ka tono i a ia kia uru ki te oranga tōrangapū o Ukraine. I whakawhiwhia a Tēnā Saakashvili ki te tangata whenua o Ukraine, a, ka meinga hei kāwana mo te taone tauranga o Odessa. Tērā pea, i runga i ngā pūkenga e pā ana, ka tere te kawa o ngā mea. Tekau mā waru marama i muri iho ka tukua e Tēnā Saakashvili, e whakapae ana i te perehitini i te korenga e tautoko i a ia i roto i te whawhai ki te hāmate. Kua whakakāhore a Tēnā Poroshenko i nga whakaaro. Pānuitia ētahi atu kōrero mō Tēnā Saakashvili Tawhiti atu i te hokinga ki roto i ngā kōruru, i te hokinga rānei ki tōna whenua tupu Hōriana, ka waihanga anō a Tēnā Saakashvili i a ia anō, ka noho hei pāremata ātete i Ukraine, ā, ko tētahi o ngā kaiwhakawāwā tino kōrero a Perehitini Poroshenko. I te tīmatanga o tēnei tau, ka whakatau a Tēnā Poroshenko kua rawaka a ia, a, ka whakatau kia whakamutua te mahinga o Ukrainian a Tāne Saakashvili. I a Tēnā Saakashvili i rāwāhi, ka pānuitia kua tangohia tōna kirirarau o Ukraine. Kua tukua kētia e ia tōna uruwhenua Hōriana ināianei kua kore e taea e Tēnā Saakashvili, nā reira ka maia tana pānui ka hoki a ia ki Ukraine mā Pōrana i te 10 o Mahuru. Ka kata te karaehe tōrangapū o Kiev, e mōhio ana ka tū a ia. Engari i te 10 o Mahuru, i mahi tonu a Tēnā Saakashvili i tāna i kī taurangi ai, ā, i tāhaetia e ia te whakawhitinga taitapa o Shehyni e karapoti ana i ngā kaitautoko me ngā hoa pūkenga ātete. Mai i te kōpikopiko ki te pōuritanga, ka noho anō a Tēnā Saakashvili, kia ora ki a Perehitini Poroshenko. I te taenga whakamana ki Kiev, ka āwhina a Tēnā Saakashvili ki te whakatū i tētahi puni tēneti i waho o te pāremata o Ukraine. Ko te nuinga o ērā i roto i a ia he hōia o te papā haere tonu me te hunga whakakeke i pūruatia e Rūhia i te rāwhiti o Ukraine. I kīia e nga puni ko te pana i ngā whakahōu ārai hāmate puta noa i te pāremata, engari ki a Tēnā Saakashvili he mārama ake te whāinga i ngā wā katoa. Hei whāngai i te hurihanga o te iwi e rite ana ki te Maidan e ahu atu ana ki te tangohanga i te tari a Perehitini Poroshenko. E kī ana nga kaiwhakawāwā a Tēnā Poroshenko kua rahua a ia ki te tuku i ana kī taurangi i muri i a Maidan. Ko Ukraine tētahi o ngā whenua tino hāmate o Uropi, ā, kua whakapaea a Tēnā Poroshenko ki te whakaroa i ngā mahi ki te whakatatū i tētahi kōti ārai hāmate motuhake, i a ia e whakararuraru ana i te rangatiratanga o te kōwhiringa e whakatau ana i ngā mana hāmate. Ko te 'pārekareka tōrangapū' Mō ngā whakaari katoa, me te whakangākau ki a Perehitini Poroshenko, ko te raruraru nui rawa o Tēnā Saakashvili ko te tauhohenga a te toenga o Ukraine ki a ia. Nō tēnei wā, he iti noa iho te tohu o tētahi nekehanga nui tūturu e hanga ana. He tokomaha e kite ana i a ia he pārekareka tōrangapū, he whakaaturanga ā-pūkenga. E rua rau noa iho ngā kainoho o te puni tēneti puehu hukarere, ā, he torutoru mano noa iho ana huihuinga. Ehara i te mea e whakararuraru ana nga tau i a Tēnā Saakashvili. I taku kōrero ki a ia i tēnei wiki, ka tohe a ia he tino pai ki a Perehitini Poroshenko, ā, ko ana huihuinga te mea nui rawa mai i te Maidan. Ahakoa kāore e taea e ia te noho hei perehitini, ka kī mai a ia ki a au kei runga ōna kanohi i tētahi tūranga i roto i tētahi kāwanatanga ā muri ake, ko te pirimia tino pai. Mo tēnei wā kei te wehi tonu te hopu. I te Tūtira, i a Tēnā Saakashvili i roto tonu i tētahi vani pirihimana, ka tū te Rōia Matua o Ukraine, a Yuriy Lutsenko, he hui pānui e whakahuahua ana i ngā whakapae ki a ia. I kī a ia ko te tino Hōriana te tangata tuatahi mo tētahi "kōanga Rūhia", he whakahau i pūruatia e Te Rūhia ki te hopu i te mana i Ukraine. I whakatangihia he pato waea, e kiia ana he waea i waenganui i a Tēnā Saakashvili me tētahi kaipāngai ko Sergei Kurchenko, e mōhiotia ana e tata ana ki te Perehitini o Rūhia. "He tino tinihanga," te kī mai a Tēnā Saakashvili ki a au i waho o tōna tēneti. "Kāore au i te mōhio ki a Tēnā Kurchenko, kāore au i te mōhio he pēhea tōna āhua, kāore au i te mōhio he pēhea tōna tangi." He tino whakamīharo mehemea kua noho a Tēnā Saakashvili hei māngai tautohetohe i pūruatia e Rūhia. I a ia e hiahia ana ki te whakamahara auau i te iwi, kua pau i a ia tana mahi tōrangapū katoa i Hōria, ā, ināianei i Ukraine e ātete ana ki Mohihi me Perehitini Hapa. Engari ko Mikheil Saakashvili tēnei. A, i runga i tōna hītori me ōna mana waihanga anō, he torutoru noa iho te māia ki te whakahaere katoa.

title: Omirangi o Rāwāhi 2012: Ko te kawenga 'mōrea nui rawa'
summary: Ka noho tonu ngā raruraru waka "tētahi o ngā mōrea nui rawa" ki ngā Kēmu Orangirangi 2012, kua kī tētahi pūrongo Whakaminenga o Rāwāhi.
text: I kitea e te pūrongo a te komiti waka o te whakaminenga, kei te tata tonu te kaha o te whatunga waka o te taone. I te wā o ngā kēmu, neke atu i te miriona ngā haerenga tāpiri e tūmanakohia ana puta noa i ngā rā e iwa tino pāhekoheko. I kī a Transport for London kāore i te māhorahora mo te mahi. Engari i miramiratia e ngā kaituhi o te pūrongo e 22 "wāhiwera haere" tērā pea ka pā ki te nui o te tono. I roto i ēnei ko King's Cross me Victoria Stations tae atu ki te Embankment me te Blackwall Tunnel. I kī te manukura o te komiti o Val Shawcross ka anga atu a Rāwāhi ki "te tono tino nui i runga i tētahi whatunga kua kōpikopiko kē i ngā maunga". I kī te pūrongo: "Ahakoa i te rā pai ka herea pea te tono teitei ake ki ētahi 'wāhiwera haere', ki te pā mai he tereina pakaru, he mahi haumarutanga rānei, ka whānui ake te pānga. " Ka taea hoki te tono ratonga waka ki tētahi atu wāhi i te wā e rapu ana te tangata i ētahi atu huarahi hei haere. "Tērā pea ka kite ngā kaiwhakamahi auau katoa o te pūnaha waka i ngā rerekētanga i te tau 2012." E tūmanakohia ana ētahi manuhiri e 5.3m ki Rāwāhi i te wā o ngā Kēmu. I kī tētahi kaihautū TfL: "E mārama ana te pūrongo, kei te ara katoa ngā whakapainga waka 2012 kia tukua i mua i ngā Kēmu. " Kei te whai hua kē ngā tāngata o Rāwāhi i tētahi tawhito waka tōmua o te tau 2012. "E mōhio ana mātou ka whiwhi mātou i ngā kaitākaro katoa, ngā kaimātakitaki me ngā kaiwhakahaere ki ā rātou takahanga i te wā tika, ā, ka neke tonu a Rānana."

title: Ka mau te reparo i te wheketere o Īnia
summary: Tata tonu ki te 36 haora i muri i te kitenga tuatahi i roto i tētahi wheketere motokā, kua mau i nga kaiwhakahaere kararehe o Īnia he reparo i muri i te kitenga tuatahi i roto i tētahi wheketere motokā.
text: Na nga kaiwhakaora i whakangāwari te kararehe i muri i tētahi mahi rapu nui i te tipu whakanao a Maruti, i te taone o Manesar, kāore i tawhiti atu i te pūmatua, o Delhi. I kitea tuatahitia te poti nui i te ata o te Rāitema i runga i te CCTV, ā, he maha atu anō ētahi atu āhuatanga i muri i tērā. I whakakorea e nga kaimahi pō te whare, ā, ka katia tētahi wāhanga o te wheketere whānui. Ko te tipu motokā te nui rawa atu i Īnia, e tata ana ki te miriona waka i te tau. No te taenga mai o nga mano o nga kaimahi o te ata, ka whakahaua rātau kia tū ki waho me te tatari i te wā e 12 nga kaimahi o te tari ngahere me ngā pirihimana e 50 i horaina i roto i te rapu. I kitea te kararehe i runga i te C KKK i te tari mīhini, e ono eka e kapi ana. I kī atu tētahi kaipānui paetata i taua tirohanga ki te AO kua mauria mai e nga kaiwhakaora e rua nga koati ora me te mīti mata hei whakawai i te reparo ki waho o te huna. I whakamātau hoki ētahi tāngata ki te maka mumura i roto i tētahi tono kia whakanuku i te poti nui, ka kī atu te kaitiaki kararehe o Vinod Kumar ki te Press Trust of India. Engari i muri i te aroturuki o te reparo me te whakangāwari i tōna haumarutanga, ka whakapūmautia e nga mana te HAU. "Kua mauria te reparo ki te hōhipera mo te whakamātautau rongoā, ā, ka tukua ā muri ake nei ki te mohoao," te kī a R Anand, Tuarua Kaitiaki o ngā Ngahere i te tapa taone o Delhi o Gurgaon, ki te AO i te ahiahi o te Paraire. Kua nui haere ngā tauira o te papā tangata-kararehe i Īnia, i reira e taraiwa ana ngā wāhi kararehe tīngongo i ngā arewhana, te tāwha me ngā reparo ki ngā wāhi noho. Tata ki te 12,000-14,000 ngā reparo i te whenua, ā, kotahi e mate ana i ia rā i te wawaenga. I tērā tau, ka tomo he reparo ki tētahi kura i te taone o Īnia o Bangalore, a, tokoono nga tāngata i whara e ngana ana ki te hopu. E 10 haora te roa ki te hopu me te whakangāwari i te kararehe. Heoi anō, i mawhiti atu i tōna pātaka i te wiki i muri iho.

title: Ko ngā pae pono o runga 'ka nui haere te mōrea pūmanawa kino' ki ngā kaiwhakamahi
summary: Kua kitea e te rangahau te tirotiro i ētahi o ngā paetukutuku āhuaahua rongonui o te ipurangi.
text: Nā te kaipānui o Te Hangarau o Te Aotearoa, i whakaaturia e ngā pae, e toroa ana e ngā miriona i ia rā, i kitea kei te tāuta i ngā kōnae kino me te kore mōhiotanga o ngā kaiwhakamahi. I kitea e te kairangahau o Conrad Longmore e rua ngā pae kaingākau - xhamster me te pornhub - i tino mōrea. I whakataetae a Pornhub i ngā kitenga, e kī ana ka "tino whakanuia" rātau i te mōrea. I kī a Tēnā Longmore ko te nuinga o ngā kaiwhakamahi Windows e mōrearea ana, engari kei te nui haere te aro atu o te hunga hara ki ngā pūrere pūkoro. Ahakoa kāore tētahi o ngā pae pono i kitea he pūmanawa kino, ko ngā pānuitanga tāmau i roto i ā rātou whārangi i waihanga raruraru mō ngā kaiwhakamahi. "E kīia ana e mātou ēnei pānuitanga kino ko te 'malvertising'," te whakamārama a Tēnā Longmore. "He tino matatini te āhua o te hoko me te hoko i ngā pānuitanga puta noa i ngā paetukutuku katoa. " I te nuinga o te wā ka taea te pōkai anō me te hoko anō i ngā pānuitanga kia uaua ai te mōhio i takea mai rātou, ā, ka tino roa te hunga hara i muri i a rātou ki te huna i ā rātou mahi." I whakahiatotia e Tēnā Longmore ōna whika mā te whakamahi i te ratonga tohutohu tātaritanga a Google, e tātari auau ana i ngā paetukutuku mō ngā ihirangi kino. I whakaaturia e te raraunga ko te xhamster - i whakarārangitia e te umanga aroturuki o Alexa hei pae 46 tino pai i runga i te ipurangi - i te 1,067 i roto i ngā whārangi 20,986 (5%) i mātakina i roto i ngā rā e 90 kua hipa. E ai ki ngā tatauranga a Alexa, ka titiro te kaiwhakamahi toharite o xhamster ki ngā whārangi takitahi 10.3 - ko te tikanga he 42% te mōrea o te tutukitanga puta noa i ngā pānuitanga kino i ia wātū tirohanga. I kitea tētahi atu pae, pornhub, he pānuitanga mōrearea i runga i te 12.7% o ngā whārangi 14016 i karapahia i roto i te wā 90 rā. I roto i tētahi kōrero, ka kī te rangatira o te pornhub Manwin i ōna whika he ōrautanga iti, 0.003% o ngā pānuitanga i tukuna e ia i roto i te wā 90 rā ka taea te kawe pūmanawa kino. "Ka mau wawe tonu ngā mahi tūhāhā o te pūmanawa kino, me te meneti ina whakaarohia te nui o ngā waka e whiwhi ana i tō mātou pae," te kī a Manwin. I tāpiritia ka tātaritia ngā pānuitanga i mua i to rātau haerenga ora, i a rātou hoki i runga i te pae kia noho wātea ai rātou i ngā pūmanawa kino. I kī te akoranga pae a Tēnā Longmore: "Te āhua nei he tarai ohorere i roto i ngā pūmanawa kino i ngā pae kaingākautia, i te wiki kua hipa atu rānei. " I tāpiritia e ia i roto i tētahi akoranga ōrite i te 12 marama ki mua, ko te pae pono tino pai o te tukutuku, ko xvideos, e whakarato ana i ngā pūmanawa kino mā te pānuitanga kara. Heoi anō, i roto i ngā rangahau o nā tata nei, kāore i kitea he pānuitanga kino tā te pae i te wā i tātauiratia e te pūnaha a Google - he tohu kua "tahitahitia" te pae. E whakapono ana a Tēnā Longmore ki tētahi ahurea o ngā kaiwhakamahi e mataku ana ki te "whana i te utiuti "ko te tikanga he maha ngā tauira o te malvertising kāore i pūrongotia. "Ko tētahi wāhanga o te raruraru he kaupapa ārai te pono," tana kī. "Engari ko te mea pono he pae tino pai ēnei me te nuinga o rātou i roto i ngā pae 100 tino pai i te ao whānui. Ko ētahi o rātou e kumea ana he nui ake ngā waka i te BBC, nā reira he take tino nui tēnei. "Ka taea e ngā tohutūmahi pae te hoatu i tētahi tikanga pūrongo tere ki ō rātou pae hei kara i ngā pānuitanga kino me ētahi atu māharahara, ā, me whai kawenga hoki ngā whatunga pānui i konei. " Kāore au i te kite i tēnā e puta ana ākuanei, ā, tērā pea ko te mea tino pai ka taea e ngā kaiwhakamahi o ēnei pae ko te whakarite kei te hōu tonu ā rātou mīhini." Kua whakatata atu te BBC ki te rangatira o xhamster engari kāore anō kia whiwhi kōrero.

title: E hiahiatia ana e te Tumuaki 'he arotakenga whakapau kōhukihuki', e kī ana a IFS
summary: E hiahiatia ana e Ingarangi tētahi arotakenga whakapau moni "kōhukihuki" hei whakatau i ngā take ohaoha matua o te motu, e kī ana tētahi o ngā tohunga ohaoha o UK.
text: I kī a Paul Johnson, te upoko o te rōpū rangahau ohaoha o te Institute for Fiscal Studies, kia kaua e roa ake te whakaroa i ngā take pūtea e pā ana ki ngā painga, te mātauranga me te tiaki pāpori. Ko ana kōrero e whai ana i te Tauākī Kōanga a te tumuaki i te Wenerei. Ahakoa he mea nui a Pakihi, ehara i te mea anake e tika ana, tana kī. I kī te tātaritanga a Tēnā Hōnea, ahakoa kāore i tūmanakohia he takahanga nui te Tauākī Kōanga a Piripi Hammond, "mā te whakapeka anō ki te tautuhi i ngā tapeke mō te arotakenga whakapau moni e whai ake nei, ka hikitia e [Tēnā Hammond] te mahi i ētahi o ngā whakataunga nui rawa o te pāremata". E kī ana a Tēnā Hōnea kei te nekehia e ngā take o Te Pākehā ētahi atu āwangawanga ohaoha matua e anga ana ki te UK: ko ngā painga, te pūtea mātauranga, me te pepa kākāriki tiaki pāpori. Ko te "Tatari mo te pepa kākāriki" kua rite ki te Tatari mo Godot... Kāore anō kia whakahuatia. I whakaaetia te arotakenga a Augar o te pūtea anō me te mātauranga tiketike, ahakoa e tatari tonu ana mātou ki ōna whakatauranga," te kī a Tēnā Hōnea. I tāpiri mai a ia: "He nui ngā mea e hiahiatia ana kia whakatikaina, ā, he huarahi anō hei kohi moni anō, engari me āta whakaaro, me whakatinana mēnā e tika ana, e tika ana hoki." I te Wenerei, ka oati a Tēnā Hammond ki te whakapau i tētahi pouaka whawhai e £26.6bn ki te whakarewa i te āhua o te whakahaerenga, mēnā ka pōti ngā MP ki te wehe i te Uniana o Ūropi me tētahi mahi. I kī taurangi a Piripi Hammond kia whakawātea i ētahi atu moni hei āwhina ki te whakamutu i te whakawhāititanga i roto i tētahi "moni hua mahi". Heoi anō, i kī a ia ko te utu tāke me te whakapau moni e whakawhirinaki ana ki te māeneene o te Pakihi. I whakamahia e Tēnā Hammond tana Tauākī Kōanga hei whakatūpato ka pā te mahi "nui" ki ngā mahi ohaoha i te wā poto. I kī a Tēnā Hōnea he whakaaro whakaaro i waenganui i ngā kaitohutohu e tata ana ki te 2% te nui ake o te āhua o te UK mehemea kāore i puta te taupānga o Te Aotearoa. "I aua āhuatanga ka iti iho te tāpaetanga, ā, he nui ake te rūma moni mo te nekeneke. Ko te mutunga o te whakawhāititanga tērā pea i tino kaha ake ki a mātau," tana kī.

title: Koinei te mea e pā ana ki Newsbeat tuihono
summary: Kua pānuitia e te AO tētahi rūrū o ana ratonga tuihono, ā, kua rongo pea koe kei te huri hoki a Newsbeat tuihono.
text: Nā Anna DobleNewsbeat kaiwhakatika mamati kua kore e whai pae me te taupānga motuhake. Ka kite kē koe i ētahi atu pūrākau Newsbeat i te paetukutuku Rongokōrero o TE AO - ka noho hei wāhanga matua o te Rongokōrero o TE Rongokōrero tuihono. Nā te mea e whakaatu ana ngā raraunga i ngā miriona o koutou e whakauru hāngai ana ki te Rongokōrero o TE Rongokōrero i ia rā. Nā reira ko te kaupapa he whakatakoto pūrākau e hāngai ana ki ngā kaimātakitaki taitamariki ki te wāhi e kimi kē ana aua tāngata. E whai katoa ana i ngā mahere kāwanatanga o tērā wiki mō te wā heke mai o te BBC. I te wā i whakaputaina, ko te Hēkeretari Ahurea ko John Whittingdale i tapaina ko Radio 1 Newsbeat hei ratonga BBC e whakahaere ana kia "motuhake, kia pai hoki". Nō reira he aha te nekehanga? Kua neke atu i te 40% te tipu o te hunga tuihono a Newsbeat i roto i te tau. Tae atu ki te miriona o koutou e pāwhiri ana i ngā tuhinga Newsbeat i ia rā. Engari e whakaatu ana te rangahau a te hunga whakarongo o TE AO e 16 ki te 25 tau te pakeke e kite ana i ngā pūrākau Newsbeat mā te paetukutuku matua o TE Rongokōrero, te taupānga Rongokōrero o TE AO me ngā tiri i runga i te pāpāho pāpori. E kī ana te pūrongo o tēnei rā "e kī mai ana ki a mātau, i runga i te ipurangi, ko te Rongokōrero o TE RONGOKŌRERO te parani". E kī ana te AO ko te tikanga o ngā huringa ka kitea e ngā kaipānui te pukapuka pukapuka a Newsbeat i a rātou e tirotiro ana i te whārangi kāinga matua me te taupānga o TE Rongokōrero. Ki te kore koe e kite i te Newsbeat Newsbeat kāore he pae motuhake - engari ka āhuahira i roto i tētahi aho pūrākau i te paetukutuku matua o TE Rongokōrero. Ā, ka whakakorea te taupānga Newsbeat i te arotahi o te tīma Newsbeat ki te whakauru i tana pukapuka pukapuka ki roto i te taupānga Rongokōrero matua o TE RONGOKŌRERO. Te wāhi e kitea ai e koe te Newsbeat Ina puta ngā huringa ka kite koe i te Newsbeat i waenganui i te whārangi kāinga o te BBC News. Tērā anō tētahi taupū mēnā e hiahia ana koe ki te hōhonu ake i ngā pūrākau hou. Kei iPlayer te Newsbeat e mātakitaki ana i ngā pakipūmeka Newsbeat i ia marama. Ka taea e koe te mātakitaki i ngā ataata hōu rawa mā te hongere YouTube Newsbeat - me te whai i a mātou i Snapchat, Facebook, Instagram me Twitter. Ka kite tonu koe i ngā pūrākau Newsbeat e puta ake ana i roto i Facebook - i te āhua o ngā Tuhipānui Inamata Facebook. Ā, ka noho a Newsbeat i Birmingham i te 14 o Pipiri e hautū ana i tētahi taupatupatu mo te Taupānga EU. Ka taea e koe te whai wāhi.
