Ā, ko te tikanga, kei runga a Newsbeat i te Reo Irirangi 1 me te 1Xtra me tā mātou hōtaka rongokōrero i te 12.45pm me te 5.45pm ia rā. E whai ana te AO ki te kawe mai i ngā huringa tuihono katoa i pānuitia i roto i te tau kotahi. He aha tāu e kōrero nei... Tērā ētahi tāpae tuhituhi mō Newsbeat. @firstplacelast tūtohu a ia: Ko te @bbcthree tuatahi & ināianei @BBCNewsbeat Te āhua nei he iti iho te whakarato i a TE AO ināianei mō te rangatahi. He huarahi anō ki te wehe atu ki te taitamariki o tēnei rā. @catherinegee tuhituhi a : @BBCNewsbeat tika tonu ngā mea o te BBC (whakamōhio, whakaako, whakangahau) kāore koe e whiwhi ki tētahi atu wāhi mō ngā taiohi. Waiho anake. Ka tūtohu a Miles Evans: Whakaae. He tauira ātaahua o te huarahi rongokōrero whakamere, rerekē, ora hoki a te BBC. Kimihia mātou i Instagram i BBCNewsbeat me te whai i a mātou i Snapchat, rapua bbc_newsbeat

title: Te Whaikōrero a te Kuini: He aha te tikanga - me ngā mea kua mahue
summary: Ko te Whaikōrero Kuini tuarua tēnei a Rawiri Karauna hei pirimia, me te 57 o Tōna Nui.
text: Nā Pirihi MasonTe korero kōrero tōrangapū Pērā i te tikanga, tērā te whakahīhī me te hākari. Ko nga tūruhi e whakarārangi ana i nga tiriti e ngana ana ki te hopu i tētahi whakaahua o te Kuini. Members of the Household Cavalry lining the Norman Staircase in Parliament. Ko te Karauna tonu e kawea ana i te pāremata i runga i ngā urunga maha, i mua i te whakamaua e Tōna Nui. Koinei te whakaahua mārire ka noho i runga i ngā pānui pouaka whakaata i tēnei ahiahi. Engari tērā pea he whakaahua tōrangapū whaitake ake mō tēnei rā: Ko tā tātau e whiwhi ana ko te mea i karangatia e te minita kāpata o Mua o Te Ariki Mandelson "he raina horoi" o ngā kaupapa. Neke atu i te kotahi tekau ngā titi kei runga, e tautuhi ana i te horoi ture a te kāwanatanga e hiahia ana ki te kōmaka i mua i te pōtitanga nui e whai ake nei. Tūmanako kia nui ngā kupu matua me ngā kōrero mō ngā huringa kua marohitia ki te Whare o Ariki, ko te tikanga ka pōtitia te nuinga o ōna mema ehara i te mea kua whakaritea. Engari he tino mārama mai i te rerenga tuarua a te Kuini e hiahia ana ngā minita kia kitea e arotahi ana ki te āhua o te whakahaerenga, me te tupu - te kore rānei o nāianei. "Ko te manakē tuatahi o aku minita ko te whakaiti i te tātaritanga me te whakaora i te pūmautanga o te ohaoha," te kī a Tōna Nui. E kī taurangi ana te Pire Whakahōu o te Whare Ariki "ko te nuinga o ngā mema o te Whare Ariki ka pōtitia e te iwi". E tautohe ana ngā Minita mahere 'hārangirangi' he mea nui te kawe mai i tā rātou e kīia nei ko te "tikanga manapori" ki te Whare o Ariki, ā, ka tino tapahia te maha o ngā mema. Ka whakamāramatia e rātau, neke atu i te 800 ngā hoa i tēnei wā, ko te Ariki tētahi o ngā ruma ture nui rawa o te ao. I raro i ngā mahere i whakaritea i tēnei rā, ka pōtitia ngā mema pōti o ngā Ariki mā te whakamahi i tētahi pūnaha pōti ōrite, mō ngā whakaritenga 15 tau kāore e taea te whakahou, e tohu ana i ngā rohe nui ake i ngā taiwhanga o te Whare o Ngātahi. Engari he tino mīharo te āhua o te reo, e ai rānei ki ngā pūtake Conservatives, "hārangirangi". Kāore he wātaka i roto i te kōrero papamuri o te pire hei whakaputa. E tohe ana ngā pūtake o te Pāremata Liberali, ahakoa kāore anō kia whakamākūkūtia te whakaaetanga ki te rūrū i nga Ariki. He mahi whakataurite māminga tēnei mō te pirimia me te tuarua pirimia. Kaore he iti o ōna ake tuarā e kī ana ko te nuinga o ngā tāngata noa iho e kite ana i te kōrero mo te whakahou ā-kaupapa i ngā wā tino pai, ā, he tawhiti rawa ēnei i ngā wā tino pai. 'Waihotanga mātua' Engari mō ngā Pāremata Liberal, kua ngaro kē te taupānga i te tau ki mua i te rūrū i te pūnaha pōti mō te pōti ki te Kotahitanga, he mea hira te whiwhi i tētahi tawhito o te huringa ā-ture pūmau. Ko te tapeke, e 15 ngā pire i roto i tēnei Whaikōrero a te Kuini, e whā ngā pire hukihuki. He iti iho tēnei i te maha o ngā wāhitau o nā noa nei. Tūmanako ngā minita e haere ana ki ngā pouaka whakaata me ngā whare reo irirangi i tēnei rā ki te kōrero i te Pire Tamariki me ngā Whānau. Ko tētahi ariā matua i roto i a ia ka hoatu ki "ngā mātua te āheitanga ki te waihotanga mātua ngāwari". E kī mai ana ki a mātau mā tēnei e āhei ai ngā whaea me ngā matua ki te tiritiri i ngā kawenga "i runga i te huarahi e tino hāngai ana ki ō rātou hiahia". Ko te mea e kōrerotia ana i konei ko te waihotanga kohanga. Ko te ariā, ka taea tēnei te tiritiri i waenganui i te māmā me te pāpā, hei tauira, ka whakaae kia hoki mai tētahi whaea utu pai ake ki te mahi i te wā e whakatā ana te pāpā iti rawa. Engari ko te mea kāore i puta i roto i te Whaikōrero a te Kuini, kua kitea he tautohetohe i roto i te tauwhāinga, ko te mana mō ngā mātua ki te tono mahi ngāwari, pēnei i te iti ake o ngā haora me te tiritiri mahi, puta noa i ō rātou oranga mahi. Kua mahue? Ko ētahi atu kaupapa, kua pouri kē te kāwanatanga, kua tae ki te wāhitau o Tōna Nui. Tangohia te Pire Raraunga Whakawhitiwhiti Hukihuki. Tērā pea ka maumahara koe ki ngā kupu matua mai i ngā wiki tata nei mō ngā mahere hei whakanui ake i te aroturuki i ngā īmēra me te whakamahinga tukutuku. I kī tōna Nui ka kawea mai e te kāwanatanga ngā mehua whakamua "kia mau tonu ai te kaha o te ture me ngā puna mōhiohio ki te uru ki ngā raraunga whakawhitiwhiti kōrero nui i raro i ngā tiaki pākaha". Ko te kōrero kua kitea e mātou e whakawhāiti ana i te "raraunga whakawhitiwhiti" he mōhiohio mō te whakawhitiwhitinga, ehara i te whakawhitiwhitinga anō. A, i muri i aua kupu matua tōraro katoa i muri i te Tahua mō te whakanui i ngā tāke i runga i ngā koha aroha mai i te hunga tino taonga, tērā tētahi Pire Koha Iti. Ko te kaupapa he whakarato i tētahi utu whakarunga e ōrite ana ki te Āwhina Koha ki ngā aroha e whiwhi ana i ngā koha moni iti o te £20 iti iho rānei, e taea ai e rātou te tono 25p mō ia £1 i kohia i te UK, tae atu ki te £5,000 o ngā koha iti. Ka mutu, he aha te mea kāore i roto i te Whaikōrero a te Kuini? He aha te mea kāore i te raina horoi o ngā mahere mō ngā ture hou? Kaore he pire hei whakatapu i roto i te ture i te whakaaetanga a te kāwanatanga ki te hoatu i te 0.7% o te moni whiwhinga ā-motu i roto i te āwhina o rāwāhi. E tūmanako ana te kāwanatanga kia tutuki tēnei ūnga a tērā tau, engari me te kore whakahau i a ia anō kia mahia i ia tau. Ā, kāore hoki he mea i runga i te mārenatanga, ahakoa he moe wahine, he tane rānei. Pēnei i te whakahou a te Ariki, he take tēnei e kitea ana e ētahi o ngā kaiāwhina Tūturu he whakapōrearea i te haere anō o te āhua o te whakahaerenga. Kātahi anō ka tīmata te tukanga tātari i ngā ihirangi o te raina horoi a te kāwanatanga. Tūmanako kia nui ake ngā mea e haere mai ana.

title: I whakapaea a Avon rāua ko Somerset PCC i runga i te 'whakawāteatanga'
summary: Kua whakapaea te PCC o Avon rāua ko Somerset, e ngā kaitono PCC tauwhāinga o mua, e whakaae ana kia whakawāteatia ētahi ratonga pirihimana.
text: Kua whakataua e John Savage o Labour me te Lib Dem's Pete Levy tētahi "hīkoi pūmau ki te whakawāteatanga". I kī te Rangatira Kātipa o Nick Gargan i roto i ngā huinga tiaki o Aotearoa, ka whakahaeretia pea e tētahi umanga tūmataiti te waka herehere me ngā ratonga tāutunga ā muri ake nei. I kī a PCC Sue Mountstevens kāore e whakatauria he whakataunga mō ngā ratonga tae noa ki te tau 2014. I roto i tētahi kōrero tōtahi, ka kī a Tēnā Savage rāua ko Tēnā Levy i te kaupapa a te rangatira kātipa ki te whakawātea i ngā huinga tiaki pirihimana "kāore anō kia tirohia, kia werohia rānei e te pirihimana o nāianei me te komihana hara". I kī a Tēnā Levy: "Kua whakaahuatia e te rangatira kātipa ngā huinga pupuri hei ratonga 'tautoko'. I tā mātou tirohanga, kāore he mea e tawhiti atu i te pono. "He ratonga frontline tēnei e tino mōrearea ana te ratonga pirihimana, ā, kei raro i te tino tirotiro mēnā ka hē tētahi mea." I kī hoki te kōrero he āwangawanga mo "te tata tōrangapū" o Nick Gargan rāua ko Sue Mountstevens. "He mea nui te mahi tata kia mahi ai ngā mahi e rua, engari me kaua rawa e wareware ko te mahi a te pirihimana me te komihana hara ko te whakamahi i tana tono manapori me te whakapuaki i ngā māharahara a te iwi whānui ki ngā whakataunga pirihimana me ngā whakataunga tōrangapū i roto i te ratonga," te kī a Tēnā Savage. "Ko te mahi a te rangatira kātipa te whakatau i ngā whakataunga whakahaere, ā, ko te mahi a te komihana pirihimana te whakamōhio atu ki a rātau i te tōrangapū me te tirotiro i te ratonga. " Ehara i tētahi atu huarahi." Hei urupare, ka kī a Ms Mountstevens "Kua mārama ahau kāore au e hiahia ki te kite i ngā tūranga pirihimana uho kua whakawāteatia. " I te Hānuere ka whakatau ahau i tētahi kōwhiringa ā-whare, i tētahi tauira mahi pakihi rānei." I kī a ia ka hangaia te whakataunga i runga anō i "ngā whakaaturanga o ngā take pakihi e whakaaro ana ki te kounga o te ratonga me te uara mō te moni", ā, ka whakaurua hoki ngā whakaaro o te iwi whānui me ngā pirihimana. I kī a ia kua toro atu a ia ki te rua o ērā atu ope e waru e whakamahi kē ana i te wāhanga tūmataiti ki te "tuku ratonga tautoko pirihimana". "Kāore e taea e au te wareware i ngā penapena e hiahiatia ana e te kāwanatanga matua, ā, mēnā ka kitea e te kāhui pirihimana he huarahi hei tiaki i ngā ratonga tautoko, e mārama ana ka whakaheke i te pānga ki te raina o mua," tana kī. I kī a Gargan ko te kōrero tōtahi he "whakapōrearea whakakino i te umanga o te whakahaere i tētahi ope pirihimana nui, matatini hoki". "E hiahia ana ahau kia whakaarahia e rātau o rātau māharahara ki a au i te tuatahi," tana kī. "E tino hari ana ahau ki te whakaatu ko ngā kirimana wāhanga tūmataiti e pā ana ki ngā paraikete, moenga me ngā parakuihi mō ngā tāngata herehere, ehara i ngā whakataunga whakahaere nui mō te whakahiko me te tautāwhi e noho tonu ana ki ngā pirihimana." I tāpiritia e Tēnā Gargan he "whakakake" a ia ki te whai pātahitanga mahi pai ki te PCC. "Ka whāinga ahau ki te mahi ngātahi me tētahi PCC e kōwhiria ana e o tātau hapori nā te mea kia pai ai te mahi pirihimana, me mahi ngātahi ngā rangatira kātipa me ngā pirihimana me ngā komihana hara," tana kī. I muri i te whiwhinga i te pōti tūmatanui, ka noho te kaitono takitahi o Sue Mountstevens hei PCC mō Avon me Somerset i Whiringa 2012.

title: John Major: Ka taea e te nama whānui te tārua i ngā raruraru tāke poipoi
summary: Ko ngā huringa takuhe e mana ana a tērā tau kua whakaritea ki te tāke poipoi - te kaupapa here i āwhina ki te whakamutu i te wā o Margaret Thatcher hei pirimia.
text: I kī te kaiwhakakapi o Mrs Thatcher hei PM, a Tā John Major, kei te whakahekea te hua whānui me te kore rawaka te pūtea. Tata ki te 3.2 miriona ngā kāinga ka kino ake i te toharite o te £50 i te wiki, e ai ki te kura whakaaro o te Resolution Foundation. Kua kī taurangi te Pirimia o Ēnā Me i te āwhina pūtea mō te hunga e pāngia ana. Engari kāore anō kia whakaritea te pūnaha utu - ā, i kī te Tūāpapa Taumira he iti iho i te 20% o ngā whānau pāngia e tūmanakohia ana kia whiwhi tautoko mai i a ia. E kore e parea ngā tāngata e rerekē ana ōna āhuatanga, e mahi ana i tētahi kerēme hōu, e puta mai ana rānei i ngā painga, kātahi ka hoki anō ki a rātou. Mā te whakawhiti ki te nama whānui hoki e waihanga toa, e kī ana te Tūāpapa Taumira, me te 1.1 miriona ngā kāinga he toharite e £53 i te wiki pai ake. Engari, i te nuinga o te wā, ka kino kē atu ngā whānau mahi i raro i te pūnaha takuhe o nāianei, ā, ko ngā tāngata whai tamariki e whiwhi ana i ngā hua tāke i tēnei wā, e kī ana ngā kaitirotiro. I kī te kaiwhakahauhau ārai rawakore o Frank Field e whakahaua ana ngā whānau i tōna wāhanga o Birkenhead ki te "rawakore" i te whakaurunga o te nama whānui. Ka tohe a ia ki te kāwanatanga kia tatari i te whakawhitiwhiti hei whakatika i ngā raruraru me te whakarite kia mahia he moni tāpiri ki roto i te pūnaha kia "kore ai te tangata e anga atu ki te £2,000 i te tau e ūkui ana i o rātau paerewa ora iti". I kī te tūru o te komiti mahi me te hekenga o Te Wāna Ko te tāke poipoi - ko tōna ingoa whaimana ko te Utu Hapori - ko te tikanga kia tika ake te pūtea o te kaunihera ā-rohe, ā, kia nui ake te haepapa mā te whiwhi i ngā pakeke katoa ki te utu, kaua e utu tāke mō ia āhuatanga. Heoi anō, he tokomaha i kore e pai ki te utu, he whakararuraru i Rāwāhi me te tutukitanga i roto i te Rōpū Rangatira i āwhina ki te hinganga o Margaret Thatcher hei pirimia. Ko te nama whānui he takuhe hōu mō ngā tāngata pakeke mahi e whakatōpū ana ki te utu ā-marama kotahi e ono ngā painga motuhake: Pānuitia ētahi atu mea: He aha te nama whānui? I tēnei wā kei te whakawāteatia mō ngā momo kaikerēme rerekē puta noa i te UK, e whai ana kia māmā ake, kia ngāwari ake hoki te pūnaha kia utua ai ngā tāngata e āhei ana ki te mahi mō te mahi pērā. Ko te kaupapa ko te neke i ngā kaikerēme tīariari katoa ki te nama whānui a tērā tau. E mōhio ana ngā Tohutohu kua nui haere te tokomaha o ngā tāngata e mahi ana, engari kua whakahētia te nama whānui mō te whakahaere i runga i te tahua, ā, ka takaware i ngā utu a te iwi. I te Wenerei, ka whakaekea hoki e tētahi atu pirimia o mua, a Kōnata Paraone o Labour, te kaupapa, e karanga ana kia puritia. Kua haere kē atu te kaiārahi Mahi o nāianei, a, ka tautohe kia makaia. I a ia e kōrero ana i runga i te podcast Whakaaro Tōrangapū o TE HAU, ko Tā John - ko ia te PM mai i te 1990 ki te 1997 - i kī te ariā i muri i te whakahōutanga he "tino pai" me te "arorau katoa" - engari i whakatūpato ia kia kaua e whakaurua "wawe rawa, i roto hoki i ngā āhuatanga hē". I kī a ia me pare ngā tāngata i anga atu ki te ngaro i te wā poto, "ka tūpono rānei koe ki ngā raruraru i tūpono ai te Rōpū Rangatira ki te tāke poipoi i te mutunga o nga tau kotahi mano e waru tekau mā rua". I kī a Tā Hoani, nāna i tango te tāke poipoi i tana whakakapinga i a Mrs Thatcher i Te Tiriti o Te Tiriti, kāore a ia i te matapae i ngā whakararuraru nā te hua o te hua o te ao whānui. Engari, e pā ana ki ngā pūrongo e hia miriona ngā kāinga e ngaro ana i te £2,400 i te tau, ka kī a ia: "E kī ana ahau mēnā he tāngata tāu e ngaro ana, ehara tēnā i te mea e whakaaro ana te nuinga o te iwi whānui o Ingarangi he tika. " A, ki te whakaaro te tangata me tango koe i a koe i te tōtika, kei roto koe i te raruraru tōrangapū hōhonu." Kua kī a Downing Street kāore he tangata e neke atu ana ki te nama whānui e ngaro, ā, ka āta haere te whakawhitiwhiti ā-motu a tērā tau, kia kitea ai ngā uauatanga. Engari ko te tangata nāna i hoahoa te nama whānui, ko Iain Duncan Smith, e karanga ana ki a Piripi Hammond kia maka i ngā utu tāke moni i kīa mai mō ngā kaimahi utu iti, ā, ka hoatu kē te moni ki te nama whānui. Ko te tikanga o te nama whānui kia utua te mahi mā te tango i ngā painga i te wā e nui ake ana ngā haora i te mahi, kaua e whai wāhi tapahi i tua atu i te nui o ngā haora mahi kāore i te whai painga nā te ngaronga ohorere o ngā painga. Engari i tino iti iho te māhorahora e te Tumuaki o Mua o George Osborne i roto i tana Pūtea 2015, nāna i whakaekea hei utu i te nui o te whakaaetanga whaiaro, te wā e tīmata ai te tangata ki te utu tāke moni whiwhinga. Ko ēnei huringa e pā ana ki te tīmatanga o tērā tau mō ngā miriona tāngata i runga i ngā painga pakeke mahi. I te waihotanga o Tēnā Duncan Smith hei hēkeretari mahi me te penihana, ka kōrerotia e ia te whakataunga a Tēnā Osborne, nāna i kī i whānako i te nama whānui o tōna take taketake. I kī taurangi nga Tohutohu kia whakarewaina te whakaaetanga whaiaro ki te £12,500 i te pōti nui o tērā tau. I kī atu a Tēnā Pirihitini Smith ki te hōtaka o Te Reo Irirangi 4 o Tēnei Rā i te Rāitema me waiho e te kāwanatanga taua kī taurangi, ā, "ka whakahokia te moni ki te nama whānui kia rite tonu ki te mea i whakaritea tuatahitia kia whakatakahia". I pātai mai e hia anō ngā mea e hiahiatia ana kia haere ki roto i te pūnaha, ka whakautua e ia: "Ko te mea pono ko te £2bn i tangohia."

title: Harry Kane fiver: He ture te tā moni?
summary: Ko te rima me te whakairo o te kaiwhutupaoro a Harry Kane kua uaratia ki te £50,000 - engari kaua e whakamatautauria ki te waihanga i tō ake toi i runga i tētahi tuhipoka pēke nā te mea ka pau pea ki a koe te £200.
text: E ono ngā tuhipoka £5 me te whakaahua o te kaitākaro o Ingarangi kua waihangatia, ā, kua tukua ki te rere e te kaiwhakairo moroiti o Kiriata Poto. I pau tētahi i roto i tētahi toa Merthyr Tydfil. Engari kia whakatūpatotia ngā kaiwaiata, ki te kore koe e whiwhi i ngā whakaaetanga tika, ka anga atu koe ki te whaina mō te whakakino i tētahi moni pēke. He ture te whakakore i ngā tuhipoka mā te tā, te tuhi, te tāpiri rānei i ngā kupu, ngā reta, ngā whika rānei. Kei nga pirihimana me nga kōti mēnā ka whiua, kāore rānei. Ka pā anō aua ture ki ngā moni; e kī ana te Ture Moni o te tau 1971 kāore e taea e te tangata kāore he mana te rewa, te whati rānei i tētahi moni konganuku. Engari, ehara i te ture te whakangaro moni mā te haehae, mā te tahu rānei. I whakamōhio atu a Tēnā Short, nāna i whakairo i mua i a Jane Austen i runga i ngā tuhipoka hou e £5 i te wā i horahia tuatahitia, ki te Pēke o Ingarangi tāna e whakarite ana i mua i tana haerenga ki mua. "Mā ngā tuhipoka a Jane Austen, ka whakapā atu ahau ki te Pēke o Ingarangi me te kōrero ki a rātau he aha taku mahi, ā, i kī tonu mai i te Ture Pēke o te tau 1928, kāore e taea e koe te whakakore moni," tana kī. "I whakaaro ahau ki tēnā, ā, i whakatau ahau e tino hiahia ana ahau ki te mahi, nā reira ka waea atu ahau ki a rātou, ā, ka kōrero ahau ki tētahi tangata kē. " Ka kī mai rātau 'kua kōrero mātou mōu i konei.' "I whakahauhau mai [rātou] i a au kia mahia, ā, i tino māhorahora mō taua mea." I te tau 2016, ka whakamahia e Tēnā Short, nāna hoki i waihanga tētahi whakaahua o te Kuini i runga i te pinhead i te tau 2016, he ngira tino pai hei rakuraku i ngā atahanga ki ngā wāhanga mārama o ngā tuhipoka. Ka noho whakangāwari ā-ture tonu rātou, nā reira kei runga i ngā kiritaki kanohi koi, ki ngā kaihoko rānei te kite mēnā kei a rātou tētahi.

title: Ko te kōrero a Keith Brown e tūmanakohia ana i te wā heke mai o te poari HIE
summary: E tūmanakohia ana kia whakapuakina e te Hēkeretari Whakahaere a Keith Brown tētahi kōrero mō te wā heke mai o te poari o Highlands and Islands Enterprise ā muri ake nei i te Tāite.
text: Ko HIE, tae atu ki ētahi atu umanga hinonga me ngā pūkenga, he kaupapa arotake. Na te tukanga i whakaoho tētahi haupae tōrangapū me ngā rōpū ātete e āwangawanga ana ka ngaro i te poari o HIE tōna rangatiratanga, ka motu katoa rānei. E tautoko ana a HIE i ngā pakihi i ngā moutere, Highlands, Argyll me Moray. I tīmata hei Poari Whanaketanga Highlands and Islands 50 tau ki muri, ka noho ko HIE i te tau 1990. I whakaputaina te wāhanga tuatahi o te Arotakenga Hinonga me ngā Pūkenga i Whiringahora i tērā tau, ā, i tūtohutia kia whakaritea e tētahi poari ā-motu hōu ngā ngohe a HIE, Scottish Enterprise me ētahi atu tinana. I te Hānuere, i pōti ngā MSP ki te tono i te kāwanatanga o Pākehā kia whakaae a HIE kia pupuri i tōna ake poari. I roto i tana urupare, ka kī a Tēnā Paraone ka "noho tonu a HIE i runga i te paetata, i te whakahaere, i te whakahaere" i raro i ana kaupapa. He aha te HIE? Kātahi anō ka whakaputaina tētahi pūrongo mō te whānuitanga, ngā hanganga me ngā taumahi mō tētahi poari hōu. Na te tānga a Prof Lorne Crerar i tūtohu kia pupuri a HIE me ētahi atu i ā rātou papa takitahi. Ka whakahaeretia e tētahi poari rautaki ā-motu hou ngā ngohe a te rōpū, i huatautia. I mua i te kōrero a Tēnā Paraone i te Pāremata o Pirihitini, kua whakatakotoria e te MSP o Mua o Labour Maureen Macmillan he petihana ki te komiti petihana tūmatanui o Holyrood. E tono ana te petihana ki te kāwanatanga o Pirihitini "ki te whakahoki i tana whakataunga kia neke te hiko mai i te rohe ki tētahi tinana matua". I mua i te kōrero, ka kī a Tēnā Paraone he wāhanga ngā tono o tētahi hōtaka whānui hei whakapai ake i ngā ratonga mō ngā umanga me ngā tangata. Ka kī a ia: "He mea nui kia kaua e ngaro i a tātau whāinga ki te whakarei ake i ā mātou ratonga hinonga me ngā pūkenga hei whakarewa i te āhua o te whakahaerenga o Pākehā, e āwhina ana ki te tuku i tō mātou hiahia ki te whakatau i waenganui i ngā hauwhā o runga o ngā whenua UTI mō te hua, te ōritetanga, te oranga me te toitūtanga. " Kia taea ai tēnei, me tiaro ā mātou umanga i muri i tētahi whāinga ngātahi, ā, ka ārahitia e ngā kaiārahi kaha. "I tawhiti atu i te whakaiti i te tūranga o ngā umanga, ka whakakaha te arotakenga i tō rātou āheinga me te whakatipu i tō rātou kaha ki te hīpae tahi i ngā ratonga me te tautoko e hoatu ana e rātou ki ngā umanga me ngā tangata puta noa i Pākehā." 'Booming Inverness' HIE's work in recent years has included providing funding to upgrade a fabrication yard at Arnish, near Stornoway on Lewis, and helping to secure the future of jobs at a call centre in Forres. Kei roto i te takahanga o te aunui tino tere ki ngā wāhi tawhiti me ngā tohutohu hei whakahauhau i te rangatahi kia noho me te mahi i ngā Whenua Teitei me ngā Moutere. Kua tohua hoki e HIE te hiahia kia pai ake te rutu i te hāngaitanga ira tangata i te wāhi mahi. In 2015, it officially opened its Inverness Campus, a large area of land at Beechwood in Inverness which HIE has made available for businesses and research organisations. I hangaia e Te Kāreti o Inverness UHI tētahi kāreti hou ki tētahi wāhanga o te kāinga. Heoi anō, i ngā wāhanga tuatahi o te whakarite i te kāinga, i whakahētia a HIE e te Kaunihera o ngā Moutere ki te Uru - Comhairle nan Eilean Siar. E kī ana ko te tikanga kia haumi te kōwhiringa ki ngā wāhi ngohengohe o te rohe, ā, kaua e "pakeke" i Inverness.

title: Ka pūkorotia e Tiwhione te $6.5bn i te hokonga Pūkoro o Haina
summary: Kua pūkorotia e Tiwhione te $6.5bn (£4.2bn) moni i muri i te hokonga o tōna tūnga 3.2% i roto i te kaiwhakahaere ahokore nui rawa o Haina, o Haina Pūkoro.
text: Ko te hokonga nui rawa tēnei a te kamupene waea ā-UK o ana pūtea penapena kāore i te rautaki. Kāore anō kia mōhiotia ngā kaihoko o te tūnga, he tokomaha pea. Ko ngā hea 643m, i whakarārangitia ki te whakawhitinga hea o Hong Kong, i tukuna i te hekenga 3.4% ki te utu mākete. Na te putanga hou ohorere i paunatia i runga i te utu tiri a te kamupene Hainamana, i whakamutua ai te rā ki raro i te 3.8%. Ko te huinga pūnoa o ia rā mō ngā hea o Haina Pūkoro ko te 21m, engari i kitea e te whika a Tiwhione taua whika ki te 740m. E kī ana te kamupene e hiahia ana ki te whakahoki i ētahi 70% o ngā hua kupenga ki ngā kaipupuri mā te hoko hea. Ka whakamahia te toenga o ngā hua hei whakaiti i te nama kupenga a te rōpū. I te tau 2000, i te tau 2000, i haumi tuatahitia e Tiwhione i Haina Pūkoro i te tau 2000, ā, e kī ana ka mahi tahi tonu ngā kamupene e rua i ngā wāhi pēnei i te tīpokapoka, te whanaketanga mahere whatunga, ngā kiritaki tauwhānui me te hangarau kākāriki. "Ko te tauwhitinga o tēnei rā e tata ana ki te whakarua i te pūtea penapena taketake a Tiwhione i Haina Pūkoro, ā, ka paheko i tā mātou rautaki kōpaki i kīa me te mahi tahi me te kamupene torotoro waea tōmua o Haina," te kī a te rangatira nui o Tiwhikete, o Vittorio Colao.

title: E tohutohu ana te Kimi a Labour i te 'oati Hippocratic' mō ngā kaiako
summary: Ko te tikanga kia oati ngā kaiako i a rātau ki ngā uara o ta rātau mahi, e huatau ana a Tristram Hunt a Labour.
text: E kī ana te hēkeretari mātauranga kōruru e kī ana te hēkeretari mātauranga kōruru e rite ana ki te oati Hippocratic i tangohia e ētahi tākuta. E kī ana a ia, mā tēnei tauākī tohu i te wā e tika ana ngā kaiako ki te "whakarewa" i te tūnga o te mahi. Ka whakawhāititia e te tautohe te "karanga tūturu me te mahi rangatira o te whakaako". Kua hoki mai a Tēnā Hunt i te haere ki Hōroa, kei a ia tētahi o ngā pūnaha mātauranga tino pai rawa o te ao, i reira ia e kimi whakaaro ana hei kawe mai ki Ingarangi. I te tīmatanga o Labour ki te whakatakoto i tōna tūnga mo te pōti, ka noho te whakapai ake i te kounga o te whakaako hei kaupapa matua. Ko te kaha o Hōroa i roto i te mātauranga, e kī ana a Tēnā Hunt, ko tōna "manakē katoa i te kounga o te kaiako". 'Ariā hira' I roto i tēnei ko tētahi tauākī tūmatanui o te whāinga a ngā kaiako ki tā rātou mahi me te koha tohu o te kāpehu, e tohutohu ana i a rātou ki tā rātou kawenga "ki te whakarato i te āhua o te whāinga tūturu me te mārire ki te rangatahi". "He oati a te kaiako mo te haere tonu ki te ako me te tuku i te aroha ki te ako. " E tino hiahia ana ahau ki tēnei ariā e tata ana ki te oati Hippocratic mō te tikanga me te whāinga o te whakaakoranga," tana kī. "It's bolstering the moment of qualification and the meaning of qualification - what it means to become a teacher. " Te āhua nei he ariā hira tēnā e hiahia ana mātou ki te tūhura. "Ehara i te mea he māminga noa iho - me noho hei wāhanga o tētahi whāinga ki te whanaketanga ngaio me ngā ara mahi." Ehara te whakapai ake i ngā paerewa mātauranga i Hōroa i te aituā, engari he hua o ngā whakataunga tōrangapū mo te wā roa. Ehara ngā kaiako i ngā hanganga i te wā e arotahi ana te pūnaha mātauranga o Ingarangi ki te "huringa hanganga pōauau", ka kī a Hōroa me ētahi atu whenua mahi tiketike pērā i Hinerangi ki te whakangungu me te whakapai ake i te kounga o ngā kaiako. Ko te tohu hei kaiako anake te wāhi tīmatanga, ka kī a ia, me te pūnaha kaha o te whakangungu me te whanaketanga mahi. "Tērā tētahi ahurea tūmanako kia pai ake i ia tau." "It's very exciting to talk about a bright, new, shiny type of school, but policies to turn the dial on professional development for teachers is harder work - but it is much more substantive in the long run." Ko te arotahi a Labour ki te kounga o te kaiako e hāngai ana ki te whāinga tūturu kia whakahaua e ngā kaiako katoa i ngā kura pūtea ā-kāwanatanga kia tika - ā, ka whakahokia te whakatau a te kāwanatanga tauwhāinga kia whakaaetia ngā kura koreutu me ngā wānanga ki te tiki i ngā kaiako kāore i te mōhiotia. A, mai i te tirohanga a Labour, ka nekehia atu hoki te taupatupatu mātauranga i ngā huringa kāwanatanga kāore e taea te wetewete. Ko ngā huringa ki te marautanga, ko te whakawhiti ki ngā GCSEs me ngā whakamātautau i te mutunga, kaua ko ngā kōwae, ko te whakarerekētanga o ngā ihirangi o GCSEs, ka noho tonu mēnā ka tae mai a Labour ki te mana. Ko te whakawhitiwhiti nui anake ko te whakamutu i te "wetewete" o ngā taumata-A me ngā taumata-AS ki ngā tohu motuhake. "E kore mātou e maka i ngā mea katoa ki te hau," te kī a Tēnā Hunt. E whakatau ana hoki a ia kia kaua a Labour e makaia kia hiahia ki tētahi kāhua kura tawhito, kotahi-rahi-katoa, me te iti iho te kōwhiringa mō ngā mātua. "We're very much in favour, and I'm very passionate about, parents and charities setting up schools, providing choice for people in areas where we need new school places. " E hiahia ana mātou ki te kite i te maha o ngā whakarato - ngā mekameka wānanga, ngā wānanga takitahi, ngā kura hapori, ngā wānanga ā-mātua." Kua kī a Labour ka mutu te whakatuwheratanga o ngā kura koreutu hou, ā, ka kawea mai ngā kura tīariari ki roto i te pūnaha wānanga. Engari ka taea tonu e ngā mātua te whakatuwhera i ngā whare wānanga ā-mātua. Nā tēnei i āki te Hēkeretari Mātauranga o mua, a Michael Gove ki te tuku i te riposte e "tino whakamamaetia ana e rātau ki te UN ki te whakamutu i te mamae". Engari e kī ana a Tēnā Hunt mō ngā kura koreutu me ngā whakawhirinaki wānanga, he tino kore whakahaere. "Ki te whakaae koe i ngā tāngata kāore e tika ana kia whakatatū i ngā wāhi whelk ki te whakatatū i ngā kura, me te kore kaiako mātauranga, me ngā pūnaha pūataata pūtea me te haepapatanga, ka whai tirohanga te iwi whānui ki taua mea." E kī ana hoki a ia kua āwhina te pūnaha tirotiro o nāianei ki ngā raruraru i ētahi kura i Birmingham me te whakatupu Hoiho Torotiana, i reira he kerēme o ngā rōpū Mohimana mārō e ngana ana ki te tango i ngā kura i te taone. Ko te pūtake o tēnei, e tautohe ana a ia, he "hē pūnaha" i te kore pūataata me te haepapa i te āhua o te whakahaere, te pūtea hoki o ngā whakawhirinaki o te wānanga. Kua pānuitia e Tēnā Hunt ngā mahere mō ngā komihana kura paetata e whakahaere ana i ngā momo kura katoa e pūteatia ana e te kāwanatanga, ā, e tautohe ana mō te whakataurite i te mana motuhake me te mahi tahi, e kī ana he iti iho te tutuki o ngā kura hei "moutere". E kī ana a ia i tana mahi kimi tūturu ki Hōroa i mōhio ai ia ki te nui o te hiahia o Ingarangi ki te hopu i ngā kaiwhakarite Āhia e whārahi ana ināianei i ngā tūnga Pisa ao whānui. E kī ana a ia he "stereotype māngere" te whakaaro ki ngā pūnaha kura Āhia, pērā i Hingapoa, he werawera whakamātautau. "Kei te tinihanga mātou ki a mātou anō mēnā e whakaaro ana mātou kei te pai mātou nā te mea kei a mātou ngā auahatanga katoa, ā, tērā pea ka pai rātou ki te pāngarau me te pūtaiao. " He nui ō rātou auahatanga me ngā mahi hou, ā, kei te tino ū rātou ki te hiranga o te pūāhua me te kaha. "E mōhio ana rātau e hiahiatia ana e te whakahaerenga o āpōpō he nui ake te mahi hou, te auahatanga me te mahi ā-rōpū." Engari i ākiritia e tētahi kaikōrero o te rōpū Rangatira te kaupapa o tētahi oati mō ngā kaiako hei "māminga whakahāwea". I kī a ia ko ngā kaiako "e whakaatu ana i to rātau whāinga ki te mahi i ia rā, ā, he mārama ngā hua kia kitea e te katoa, ā, ka nui haere te āhei o te pūnaha kura o Ingarangi ki te whakataetae tika ki ērā atu o te ao i muri i ngā tau o te whakarākeitanga i raro i te kāwanatanga Mahi whakamutunga". I kī te kaiārahi o ngā kaiako matua o Kōrero Lightman ko te whakarite i te whakaako hei "ara mahi ātaahua" me te utu pai me ngā here me te kawenga mahi ka taea te whakahaere, he "kōhukihuki ake" i te oati Hippocratic.

title: Ka whakapuakina e ngā whetū K-pop BTS ngā rā whakatere o UK
summary: Kua pānuitia e te pēne taitama Kōria ki te Tonga, o BTS tētahi whakaterenga nui o te ao, e rua ngā rā o UK.
text: Ka mahi te rōpū mema tokowhitu i te O2 Arena i Rāwāhi i te 9 me te 10 o Whiringa ā-rangi. Ka tīmata te haereere, e kiia nei ko Love Yourself, i tō rātou kāinga tupu o Kōrea ki te Tonga i mua i te haerenga ki Kānata, Hōrana me Tiamana. Kua noho a BTS hei whetū huri noa, ā, ko tētahi o ngā mahi tino tūturu o te tūmomo. Mai i te hanganga i te tau 2013, he rongo nga whetū K-pop puta noa i te ao, ā, ka whakaemi i tētahi ao whānui. I kī ngā kaiwhakahaere haereere, i kī a Big Hit Entertainment: "Ka whakarewaina e BTS tētahi whakaterenga hōu i tēnei tau, e huaina ana ko Love Yourself, i muri i te angitu o tērā tau o te Trilogy Episode i tīmata i te tau 2014." Nō tēnei wā, ko ngā wāhi me ngā rā kua whakaūngia anake kua pānuitia, engari ka whai ake ētahi atu. Ka tukua e te pēne ta rātau pukaemi studio tuatoru i te 18 o Me, ā, ka tīmata i te takitahi hou i ngā Tohu Pūoro Billboard i Las Vegas i Me. Nō nā tata nei ko to rātau angitu te kaupapa o te pakipūmeka iPlayer o te Reo Irirangi 1. I pānuitia e te rōpū to rātau taenga mai ki te tirohanga pūoro ao whānui i a rātau e noho ana ko te rōpū K-pop tuatahi hei toa i tētahi Whakawhiwhinga Pūoro Billboard. I te tau 2017 i patua e rātau a Pirihitini, a Selena Gomez, a Ariana Grande me Shawn Mendes i roto i te Top Social Artist, i pōtitia e ngā kaihautū. I tohua e te toa he hua mō te tūmomo K-pop, kua roa nei te ngana ki te whāwhā i ngā mākete ki te Uru. I a ia e kōrero ana i taua wā ka kī te pēne: "Kāore tonu mātou e whakapono kei te tū mātou i konei i tēnei atamira i ngā Tohu Pūoro Billboard. " He tino rawe te kite i ngā kaiwaiata katoa e mīharo ana mātau. To be in this category with such great artists, we are just really honoured." Ko te pēne - i hangaia e ngā mema o Jin, Suga, J-Hope, RM, Jimin, V me Jungkook - i muri iho ka tūtohu he "moemoeā pono" te toa. Ka whakamahia e te rōpū ngā kāhua hip hop me te R&B ki te waiata mō ngā take tae atu ki te whakaweti me te hauora hinengaro. Kua tukua e rātau he pukaemi i te reo Koreana me te Hapanihi, ā, neke atu i te 10 miriona ngā kaiārahi i runga i te pāpāho pāpori. Whāia Newsbeat i Instagram, Facebook me Twitter. Whakarongo ki Newsbeat live i te 12:45 me te 17:45 i ia rā o te wiki i te Reo Irirangi 1 me te 1Xtra - ki te hapa koe i a mātou ka taea e koe te whakarongo mai ki konei.

title: Waipuke o Weera: E titiro ana te Tumuaki ki te whakapai ake i te manawanui
summary: E whakaaro ana tētahi tihi me pēhea e urupare ai a Uēra ki te nui o te tuma i puta mai i te waipuke.
text: I tērā tau ka pā mai ngā waipuke nui ki te raki me te waenganui o Weera, a, kotahi te wahine i mate. I pānuitia e te Minita Taiao a John Griffiths e whakarite ana te kāwanatanga o Welsh ki te whakapau i te £47m i te 2013/14 ki ngā aronui hei pare i ngā kāinga e 1,000. Heoi anō, tērā pea he iti iho i te nui i pau i runga i ngā parenga waipuke me te mahi i te horo moana i roto i ngā tau e rua kua hipa. "E mōhio ana mātou kei te huri tō mātou āhuarangi, ā, kua kitea kētia, he nui ake te marangai me ngā āwhā," te kī a Tēnā Griffiths. Mā te mahi tahi me te tiritiri mātauranga "ka taea e mātou te whakapai ake i tō mātou manawanui ki te waipuke i Weera", tana kī. Mā te whakahuahua i ana kaupapa, ka kī a Tēnā Griffiths: "Ko te pūtea penapena haere tonu i roto i te whakahaeretanga mōrearea o te waipuke me te horo moana he wāhanga nui o tā mātou mahi ki te whakahaere i te mōrea waipuke, ahakoa te whakaiti i tā mātou tahua katoa mai i te kāwanatanga o UK, kua mau tonu te kāwanatanga o Welsh i tōna taumata pūtea penapena i tēnei rohe. ' Prioritising investment' "In 2013/14 I am investing £47m in flood and coastal erosion risk management which will pay for major flood defence schemes in some of our most vulnerable communities including Swansea vale, Fairbourne, Corwen and Coldbrook, Barry. Mā tēnei e pare ngā kāinga me ngā umanga e 1,000 e mōrearea ana ki te waipuke. Ahakoa he iti noa iho te tipu o te whakapau moni "tauanga" a te kāwanatanga o Welsh ki ngā parenga waipuke, kua tapahia ētahi atu pūtake pūtea. Ko te £47.2m i tohua mō tērā tau ā-pūtea e whakataurite ana ki te £52.7m i tēnei tau me te £51.9m i tērā tau. I ngā wā o mua kua wātea mai he pūtea tāpiri i roto i te tau, ko te tikanga ka piki pea te moni ka pau mēnā ka pā mai anō. I tāpiri mai a Tēnā Griffiths: "He tino hira kia ūkuia e mātou tā mātou pūtea mō te parenga waipuke.. " Koia tērā te take kei roto i taku rautaki ā-motu he whāinga ki te whakawhanake i tētahi kaupapahere pūtea ā-motu, me tētahi tikanga mō te manakē i te pūtea penapena. "Kua whakatūria tētahi rōpū ki te whakaneke i tēnei mahi, ā, ina oti te hōtaka pūtea penapena ā-motu ka taea te whakatau i ngā wāhi o Uēra e ai ki te mōrea mai i ngā pūtake katoa o te waipuke me te horo ākau." He kino te horo whenua i tērā tau mo te waipuke i Weera. I Hune, kotahi marama te marangai i taka i roto i te 24 haora i Ceredigion, ka tuki ki Aberystwyth me ngā kāinga karapoti, ka tāwhiti i ngā tāngata i roto i o rātau kāinga me te waipuke i ngā pāka wīra. I Whiringa ā Rangi, ka mate tētahi wahine 91 tau, ā, neke atu i te 1,000 ngā tāngata i wehe i o rātau kāinga i muri i te pakarutanga o te Awa o Elwy i ōna tahataha i Hato Asaph, i Denbighshire. I te wā o Hakihea, ka pā te waipuke taumaha ki te Awaawa o Glamorgan i te wā i whakakorea ngā kāinga i Ystalyfera i te Awaawa o Swansea i muri i te horo whenua i kawea mai e ngā mano tāhei oneone ki runga i tētahi huarahi. Ko te tihi o te Mane i Kānata e whakakotahi ana i te kāwanatanga o Welsh, ngā mana ā-rohe, te Met Office, Environment Agency Wales, Welsh Water, me ētahi atu whakahaere. E hāngai ana ki te whakahau huringa āhuarangi Wiki Āhuarangi. I kī a Emyr Roberts o Ngā Rauemi Māori o Weera, he kōwhiringa hou e whakahaere ana i te kawenga mō te Taiao Agency Wales, te Kaunihera Taiwhenua mō Uēra me te Komihana Ngahere a tērā marama, i whakaaro ia he tika te huarahi a Uēra ki te waipuke i mua. 'Protect properties' "Obviously in many areas the answer is to raise flood defences, but increasingly we're putting more emphasis on communities - raising awareness about what the flooding risks are and what individuals can do about it," he said. "E mārama ana, kei te mahi ngātahi mātou me ngā ratonga ohorere, engari ki taku whakaaro ko te tihi... ka titiro ki ngā take wā roa ake me ngā huarahi e whakamahia ai e tātau te taiao māori hei whakamāmā i ngā raruraru o te waipuke." I kī te Minita Kāwanatanga Paetata a Carl Sargeant he mea hira hoki te mahi a te iwi paetata ki te whiu i ngā whakamātautau i takea mai i te huarere nui. Ka taea e ngā hapori e whakawhanake ana i tētahi mahere waipuke te mahi tere ake, kia pai ake hoki te mahi ina puta te waipuke. "He tino nui kia huihui ngā ratonga me te mahi uaua ki te whakaora ora, ki te tiaki i ngā āhuatanga me te āwhina i ngā hapori ki te whakaora," te kī a Tēnā Sargeant. "I whakaaturia tēnei i roto i ngā mahi waipuke nui i tērā tau, ā, e nama ana mātou ki a mātau ratonga ohorere he nama whakamoemiti mō tō rātou ngaiotanga, tukutahi me te ngākau nui."

title: Ka tūhura a Mehiko i te ataata e whakaatu ana i te hōia 'whakamate' i te tangata
summary: Kua whakarewaina e Mehiko tētahi tūhuratanga i muri i te whakaaturanga o tētahi ataata ki te whakaatu i tētahi o ana hōia e tākaro ana i tētahi tangata kua mate i te wāhi pātea.
text: I mau te patunga ā-ture i runga i ngā kāmera haumarutanga i te āhua o Puebla. I puta mai nga whakakitenga i roto i te pāpāho paetata, i te wiki i muri i te tūnga nui i waenganui i ngā ope haumarutanga me ngā tāhae hinu i taua taone kotahi, o Palmarito. Tokowhā nga hōia, tokoono nga tangata hara whakapae i mate i taua mahi. E whakaatu ana te ataata hōu i ngā hōia e whakatuwhera ana i te ahi i runga i tētahi motokā e mau ana i ngā tāhae hinu whakapae, i mua i te kumea o tētahi o rātau i te waka, ā, i te āhua nei i pūhia i a rātau e takoto ana i runga i te whenua. I kī te pāpāho o Mehikihi i pā mai ngā mahi e rua i te pō kotahi, i te 3 o Me. I kī te minita wawao i roto i tētahi kōrero me "tino ūkui" e nga rōia a te hau. I kī hoki te minita kua puta mai nga hōia i raro i te ahi i te waka. Kua whakaurua te ope taua o Mehiko i roto i ngā heitara maha i roto i ngā tau tata nei, ā, ko ana mahi i roto i ngā hapori - e mahi ana ki ngā rōpū hara - e wera ana te tautohetohe. I te tīmatanga o tēnei wiki, ka tukua e tētahi kura whakaaro ao whānui tētahi pūrongo e whakatau ana i a Mehiko hei tuarua o ngā tino mate o te ao i muri i a Hiria. Ko te Rangahau Papā Patu ā-tau, nā te Te Whare Wānanga o te Ao Whānui mō ngā Akoranga Tātai (IISS), i runga anō i te maha o ngā kōhuru i tērā tau. I kī te pūrongo IISS e 23,000 ngā oranga i te tau 2016, neke atu i ngā mate taikaha i Iraki, i Awhekenetāna rānei i taua wā. I whakakāhoretia e te kāwanatanga o Mehiko nga kitenga. I whakahē tētahi kōrero tōtahi a ngā minita ā-whenua, ā-roto hoki o Mehiko i ngā "tikanga rangirua" a te IISS. E kī ana ko te putanga o ngā rōpū hara me te whakamahinga o te taua mo te haumarutanga o te kāinga, ehara i te mea kei roto te whenua i te papā patu. I kī hoki ehara i te mea ko ia kōhuru i te whenua e pā ana ki te whawhai ki nga rōpū hara. E kī ana a Mehiko he iti iho te pāpātanga kōhuru o te whenua i tērā o ētahi atu whenua o te rohe, tae atu ki Honduras me Venezuela.

title: Michael Buble: Kei te 'pai te haere o te mate pukupuku' a Tama Noa
summary: Kua kī te kaiwaiata a Michael Buble kei te "pai te haere" o te mate pukupuku a tana tama ko Noa, e toru marama i muri i te tātaritanga o te toru tau.
text: I tukuna e te whetū Kānata me tana tauira Āhiana me tana wahine kaiwhakaari a Luisana Lopilato tētahi whakahōutanga hīkoi i te Paraire. "E tino whakamihi ana mātou ki te pūrongo kua pai te haere o ta māua tama ko Noa i te wā o tana rongoā," ka kī rātau. I tāpiritia e rātau "he tino tūmanako nga tākuta mo te wā heke mai mo ta māua tamaiti iti". Ko te kōrero whai mana tuatahi tēnei mai i te wā i whati ai a Buble rāua ko Lopilato i te rongo o te tātaritanga o Noa i Whiringa ā Rangi. "He toa a ia puta noa, ā, kei te whakaaetia tonu mātau e tōna toa," te kī a te tokorua i roto i te kōrero i Facebook. "E whakawhetai ana mātau ki te Atua mo te kaha i homai e ia ki a mātau katoa. E kore e taea te whakapuaki i to tātau whakamoemiti ki ana tākuta me ana kaitiaki. "E hiahia ana mātou ki te mihi ki ngā mano o ngā tāngata kua tuku i a rātau inoi me ngā hiahia pai ki a mātau. I a mātou e haere tonu ana i tēnei haerenga, e tino whakamarietia ana mātou e tō tautoko me tō aroha." I muri i te tātaritanga tuatahi, ka kī te tokorua i "whakararuraru" rāua, ā, kei te tuku rāua i ngā whakaritenga mahi kia arotahi ki te "āwhina i a Noa kia ora". I whakakorea e Buble ngā āhuatanga tae atu ki ngā Tohu Pūoro o TE AO me ngā Tohu Brit, nāna i taurima ā muri ake i tēnei marama. He tama anō tā Buble rāua ko Lopilato, ko Iraia kotahi tau. Whāia mātou i Facebook, i Twitter @BBCNewsEnts, i Instagram rānei i bbcnewsents. Mēnā he huatau pūrākau tāu, īmēra entertainment.news@bbc.co.uk. Ngā Hononga Ipurangi Pātahi Michael Buble Luisana Lopilato - e rima o ngā wā tino pai o Noa i mua i tana taunga e toru

title: Te kaitahu Javelin Park: Neke atu i te 100 ngā tāngata e hono ana ki te whakahē
summary: Neke atu i te 100 ngā tāngata e ātete ana ki ngā mahere mō tētahi kaitahu para i Gloucestershire kua huihui ki te wāhi e hiahia ana te kaunihera ki te whakanoho.
text: The £500m scheme at Javelin Park near Haresfield is recommended for approval and councillors will vote on whether it can be built on 21 March. Campaigners picketed the site entrance as councillors made their final visit ahead of next week's planning meeting. Ka hiahiatia hoki e te kaitahu he whakaaetanga taiao katoa. Kua hainatia kētia e te Kaunihera o te Takiwā o Te Rohe o Te Rūnanga o Te Rūnanga o Te Rohe o Te Rūnanga o Te Rūnanga o Te Rohe o Te Rohe o Te Rūnanga o Te I tukuna e te Taiao Agency he whakaaetanga hukihuki ki te pānga i marohitia i te wā o Hui tanguru, ā, i kī he "whakaaro ki te tuku" i tētahi whakaaetanga katoa. Tata ki te 5,000 ngā tāngata kua hainatia ngā petihana e karanga ana kia tangohia te kaupapa. Kei roto i ngā whakahē tōna rahi, tauwāhi, utu, pānga taiao me ngā pānga hauora pea. I kī te kaiwhakahauhau o Laura Jerham, mai i Nailsworth: "E mīharo ana ahau kāore te kaunihera o te rohe i te whakarongo ki te pūtaiao. " Kāore i te whakarongo ki ngā tāngata o Gloucestershire, ā, kāore i te whakarongo ki ngā kaunihera pārihi katoa me ngā kaunihera taone kua ātete ki te kaitahu." E kī ana te hunga e manakohia ana e te whanaketanga e hiahiatia ana kia mahi i ngā mano tāhei para kāinga i hangaia i te takiwā i ia tau. Kua whakaputaina tuihonotia ngā pepa rārangi take i mua i te hui whakarite a tērā wiki.

title: Scout Association bids to boost young volunteers
summary: I te nuinga o te wā kāore te rangatahi i te whai wāhi ki te āwhina i roto i ō rātou hapori paetata hei tūao, e tohu ana i te rangahau mō te Scout Association.
text: Neke atu i te whā rima (82%) o te 1,000 12 ki te 24 tau te pakeke i pātaitia, i kī he mea nui kia āwhina te rangatahi ki te rutu i ngā take pāpori. Engari ko te tuatoru anake (35%) i whakapono e tuwhera ana tēnei wā ki a rātou i te paetata. Na te Rangatira Scout Bear Grylls i tohutohu kia nui ake ngā rangatahi kia hono ki ngā Scouts ki te tautoko i tētahi whakahau tūao hou. Mā te tuku ringa i te katoa, ko ngā whika mai i te tauira māngai e huatau ana ka ngaro pea te UK i te 15.4 miriona hāora o te wā tūao taitamariki i ia marama, e kī ana ngā Scouts. Some 37% of the young people polled by ComRes said they currently took part in some form of social action every week. This is defined as volunteering their free time to help others in activities such as improving local open spaces or mentoring. Waihoki, i uiuia hoki e ComRes neke atu i te 1,000 ngā Scouts i te rōpū pakeke kotahi, ā, i kitea e tata ana ki te toru hauwhā (73%) i mahi tūroro i te iti rawa i te kotahi i te wiki. The Scouting Association carried the research to mark the launch of a programme to enlist half a million scouts to volunteer for a range of charities. A Million Hands aims to encourage scouts to improve the lives of people affected by disability and dementia, improving the mental wellbeing and resilience of families and ensuring global access to clean water and sanitation. The six charities nominated by young scouts are: Bear Grylls said he was excited to be launching the campaign. "The Scout Association is today pledging one million hands to supporting four of the biggest social issues currently facing the UK and the wider world, but we can't do it on our own. " We want all young people to come and give scouting a try and to get involved. Koinei te tikanga e āhei ai tātau katoa ki te tākaro i tētahi tūranga nui ki te whakaahua i te ao āpōpō kia pai ake ai." I karangatia e te kaiārahi whakahau a Jack Abrey "he wā hei tango i te whakaaro tōraro o te rangatahi". "It's a way to demonstrate that scouts can create meaningful and impactful change in their communities in a way that also develops the young people taking part, giving them the confidence, resilience and belief that change is possible," he said.

title: Pakihi: Kēhi mō ngā pōti koreutu mō ngā MP, e kī ana te minita kāpata o Gauke
summary: Kua noho te Hēkeretari o te Ture, a Rawiri Gauke hei minita kāpata tuarua hei huatau kia hoatu he pōti koreutu ki te Pāremata mō ētahi take e pā ana ki a Pakihi.
text: I kī atu a ia ki ngā MP o TE AO kia āhei ki te pōti e ai ki ō rātou whakaaro whaiaro ina taupatupatutia te mōtini panuku o Te Tūtira, "ki te whakatika i ngā mea". I tāruatia hoki e Tēnā Gauke ka whakaarohia e ia tōna tūnga mēnā ka kōwhiria e te kāwanatanga tētahi putanga EU kāore he mahi. Kua whāngaia e te Hēkeretari Mahi me te Hēkeretari Penihana a Amber Rudd tētahi āhuatanga ōrite. I kī atu a ia ki te AO i tēnei wiki e "tino ū ana a ia ki te karo i a mātou" i tētahi mahi kāore he mahi, ā, kāore e whakahaere i te whakarerenga i runga i taua mea. Engari i kī a ia mā te whakaae i tētahi pōti koreutu ka āwhina ki te whakatū i te rongoā o Te Aotearoa ka taea te whakahau i te nuinga o ngā MP. I a ia e kōrero ana i runga i ngā Pātai o te Reo Irirangi 4, ka whakatūpato a Tēnā Gauke - e pēnei ana i a Ms Rudd i te Noho tonu i roto i te taupānga - ka whakatūpato kia kaua te āhua o te UK e waiho ai te EU kia kaua e "whakarerekētia" me te kore whakaaetanga a te Pāremata. I pātai mai mēnā i tāruatia e ia he pōti koreutu ki ngā MP - ahakoa tērā pea ka puta ki tētahi toronga o te Tuhipānui 50 - ka kī a Tēnā Gauke: "E whakaaro ana ahau he take mō ngā pōti koreutu i tēnei rohe hei whakatika i ngā mea. " Ki te Tūrei... me kite tātau he aha ngā menemana katoa, kia kite ai mēnā he wāhi karihi te Tūrei, kāore rānei." I te Tūtira, ka kite te Whare o Ngātahi i ngā MP e pōti ana i ngā hipanga panuku a Mrs May mō Te Tūtira. Kua whakaraupapatia hoki e ētahi rōpū MP ngā menemana ki tana mōtini kia ngana ki te huri i te ara o Te Pākehā - tae atu ki ngā ngana ki te whakamutu i tētahi Tūpāpaku kāore he mahi me te whakaroa i te rā kati mō te wehe atu i te EU. Ināianei, kua kī te minita o Aiarangi mō ngā take Pākehā a Helen McEntee kāore a Airangi i te "ngana ki te māmā" i roto i te haupae i runga i te tautohetohe tautohetohe i roto i te mahi a Pakihi. Ko te backstop he mehua whakamutunga hei whakarite i tētahi rohe tuwhera i waenganui i te Whenua o Aiarangi me Aiarangi ki te Raki. Ka whakamahia anake mēnā kāore e taea e te UK me te EU te whakaae ki tētahi mahi hokohoko pūmau i te mutunga o te tau 2020. I a ia e kōrero ana ki te hōtaka o Te Reo Irirangi 4 o Tēnei Rā, ka kī a Ms McEntee kua hangaia e ngā raina whero a Mīhana Me i runga i a Pirihitini tētahi tauwhāinga "tino tika". I whakamāramatia e ia: "Kua kī te UK kei te wehe mātou i te mākete kotahi, kei te mahue i a mātou te uniana tikanga, ā, ki a mātau ka uaua ake te karo i tētahi rohe." I tāpiritia e te minita: "Kua nekehia te onus a te UK ki Airangi me whakararuraru tātau, ko mātau te hunga e ngana ana ki te māmā, ki te uaua rānei. " Kaore mātau i pōti mo Pakihi. Kaore mātau e whakapono ki taua mea. "Engari kai te pare mātau i tētahi tukanga rangimārie. He here kei te UK kia parea te Whakaaetanga Paraire Pai." Me wehe atu te UK i te EU i te 23:00 GMT i te 29 o Poutāpeta, ā, kua anga atu te pirimia ki ngā waea auau ki te whakahaere i te āhua o te haere me te kore mahi mēnā kāore e taea te whakaaetanga. Whakapai ake koa i tō pūtirotiro E rapu tonu ana tō kaiārahi ki ngā kupu a Te Tūtira o Te Tūtira. I te 15 o Hānuere, i whakakāhoretia e ngā MP te mahi whakahekenga i whakaritea e ia ki te EU mā tētahi tawhē hītori - e 432 ngā pōti ki te 202. Ka kitea e te pōti o te Tūrei te taupatupatu a ngā MP me te pōti i ōna hipanga panuku mō Pakihi. Kua whakarārangitia e ngā MP ātete me ngā MP o muri ngā menemana ki tana mōtini i roto i tētahi tono kia whakahaua te kāwanatanga kia huri i te ahunga. Kei roto i ēnei ko ngā ngana ki te whakamutu i tētahi Brexit kāore he mahi me te whakaroa i te rā kati mō te wehe atu i te EU. I te Paraire, ka kī te Kaiārahi o Ngātahi, a Aotearoa Leadsom, me whakahoki e nga minita kāpata te tūnga o te pirimia ki te waiho i te kōwhiringa kāore he mahi i runga i te tēpu. I huatau hoki a ia kia rite pea te EU ki te tuku i te UK he "rua wiki anō" i tua atu i te rā kati 29 o Mati ki te whakaoti i ngā whakaritenga mō Te Mahi. Heoi anō, i kī a Ms Leadsom he "āwangawanga nui" tōna mō tētahi pire, i tonoa e Labour MP Yvette Kupa, e āhei ana ki te whakaroa atu i te Tuhipānui 50 - e whakaoho ana i te putanga o te UK i te EU - mā te iwa marama. I whakaae a Tēnā Gauke ki tētahi huatau ka "tino kino" pea te haere atu me te kore mahi mō te UK, e kī ana ka whai "pānga nui" ki ngā mahi. Ka kī a ia: "Mēnā he kōwhiringa mōhio, 'Tika, koia tēnā, kāore mātou e mahi', he mea tino uaua tērā ki a au."

title: I kī atu te mema o Senedd ki a Neil McEvoy kia whakapōhēhē mo te whakahē a te ruma
summary: Kua korerotia ki tētahi mema Senedd me whakapōhēhē ia ki te āpiha whakahaere mo te whakahē i roto i te ruma i mua i tana karangatanga ki te kōrero anō.
text: Kua tono a Elin Jones ki a Neil McEvoy kia unuhia "ngā kōrero tūtaratara" me te muku i ngā whakairinga pāpāho pāpori i mahia i te wā o te taupatupatu mo te whakahāwea i te ahiahi o te Tūrei. I mau rīpene a ia ki runga i tōna mangai, a, ka mau i tētahi kāri pānui i runga i tana whakatau kia whakakāhore i ana menemana ki te mōtini o te taupatupatu. I kī a ia ko tana whakataunga he "whakahāwea i roto i te mahi" me te kī e tū ana a ia i tēnei. I a ia e kōrero ana i te tīmatanga o ngā kōrero i te ahiahi o te Wenerei, ka kī a Ms Jones he tokomaha ngā mema o Senedd i kōrero ki a ia mō tō rātou "pōrearea me te matekiri i te āhua i whakararurarutia ai e te whanonga o tētahi mema ngā whakahaere, ā, ka kawea mai to mātau Senedd ki te tautohetohe". I whakaaetia a Tēnā McEvoy ki te kōrero i te wā o te taupatupatu o te Tūrei, engari i kī kua "tangohia" tōna reo, ā, ka whakapaea a Ms Jones ki te whakakāhore i a ia tōna "mana manapori" mā te kore e whakaae kia pōtitia ana menemana. "Mēnā e hiahia ana koe ki tōku whakaaro whaiaro, te whakaaro o te tokomaha o ngā tāngata, he whakahāwea tērā e mahi ana," tana kī. I tāpiri mai a ia: "E tū ana ināianei, kāore e pōhiritia e te tokomaha rawa o ngā tāngata i tēnei whare tētahi tangata parauri me te reo." I te Tūtira, ka whakamārama te āpiha whakahaere i tana whakataunga, ka kī a ia e kimi ana ki te "tīpako, kāore rānei e tīpako i ngā menemana" mō te "whanonga tika" o ngā takahanga hinu e whakamahia ana e te Pāremata o Welsh i tēnei wā. Kei te hono ngā mema o te Senedd ki ngā tautohetohe i Te Moana, mā te hui ataata Topa hoki. I korerotia ki a TE AO Uēra kua whakaae ngā rōpū tōrangapū i te Senedd ki te tēpu i ngā menemana iti ake ki ngā nekeneke taupatupatu. Kaore a Tēnā McEvoy, i pōtitia mā tētahi rārangi Plaid Cymru, ā, kua tīmataria tōna ake rōpū, e noho tahi me tētahi rōpū tōrangapū. I roto i tētahi reta ki ngā mema katoa o Senedd i te Wenerei, ka whakakāhore a Ms Jones i ngā kerēme a Tēnā McEvoy e kī ana: "He tino whakahāwea, he whakahāwea hoki ngā kōrero a te mema, ā, kāore e whakaaetia e tētahi mema. " Kua tuhituhi atu ahau ki te mema ki te tono kia whakapāha mai ia ki a au me te muku i ngā whakairinga pāpāho pāpori e pātai ana. "Kia whiwhi rā anō ahau i tētahi whakapae me te whakaūnga kua mahia e ia ngā mahi i tonoa e pā ana ki ngā whakairinga pāpāho pāpori, e kore te mema e karangatia ki te kōrero i roto i ngā whakahaere." He aha te kōrero a Neil McEvoy? I a ia e urupare ana, ka kī a Tēnā McEvoy he tītaha ki a ia. I kī a ia ko Elin Jones "me whakamārama te take i whakaaro ai ia e tika ana kia tangohia ngā menemana katoa i tukuna e tētahi tangata tae ki tētahi taupatupatu mo te whakahāwea". "E kore ahau e whakapāha ki a Elin Jones, ā, e tū ana ahau i aku kupu me aku mahi," tana kī. I tāpiri mai a ia: "He toronga noa iho te ārai paraikete o ngā mea kua puta kētia."

title: Te patunga o Victor Jara: E anga ana te āpiha o te ope taua o Hiri ki te whakawā i a Mātau
summary: Kua whakahaua e te kaiwhakawā o Amerika tētahi āpiha taua o Hihi kia tū whakawāteatia i Pārera e pā ana ki te patunga o te kaiwaiata ā-iwi o Victor Jara i te tau 1973.
text: Ka whakautua e Pedro Barrientos, he tangata whenua o Amerika, e noho ana i Pārera, he whakapae mo te whakamamaetanga me te patu ā-ture. Ko Jara tētahi o ngā mano tāngata i whakatata ki tētahi papa tākaro i te pūmatua o Santiago i muri i te kukitanga i kawea mai ai a Ahuwhānui Aotearoa Pinochet ki te mana. I whakamamaetia a ia, a, ka pūhia mate. Ko te hūtu ture ki a Tēnā Barrientos i mauria mai e te pouaru a Jara, o Hoana rāua ko tana tamāhine ko Amanda. "Ko mātou... e koa ana kua tata atu te whānau o Jara ki te whai i to rātau rā i te kōti," te kī a Almudena Bernabeu, he rōia e tohu ana i te whānau. Engari i kī a Ms Bernabeu he "whakakino" i ākiritia e te kaiwhakawā o Amerika tētahi tono a te whānau kia whiua a Tēnā Barrientos mō ngā hara ki te tangata. He tangata rongonui a Jara i Chile i nga tau 60 me te 70. I tuhia e ia he waiata whakahē mō te rangatira whakahaere o Hiri, ā, he kaitautoko ia i a Perehitini Salvador Allende, i mate i te wā o te whakatikanga hōia. I te tau 2009 ka hunaia te tinana o te kaiwaiata, ā, i muri iho ka whakahokia anōtia, me ngā mano o ngā Hihi e manaakitia ana. He tokomaha ētahi atu āpiha taua o mua kua anga atu ki te whakawā mo tana patunga i Hiri.

title: Wehi tuihono: Ngā kaipōrangapū v ngā kaiwhaiwhai hangarau
summary: Tērā tētahi hītori roa o ngā kāwanatanga me ngā kamupene hangarau e taka ana i runga i ngā ihirangi pūhāhā. Ko te nuinga o te wā kua pēnei te haere.
text: Rory Cellan-JonesTechnology correspondent@BBCRoryCJon te minita Twitter Impatient: "Kei a koe ētahi o ngā pūkenga tino mārama i runga i te aorangi - mēnā ka taea e rātou te tiki i tētahi AI ki te kī mai mēnā me mau ahau i tētahi hāmarara āpōpō, he aha e kore ai e taea e rātou te kōmaka i te pūtōraru?" Te taiwhanga hangarau whakahīhī: "Ināianei, whakarongo, he tino matatini tēnei, nā reira kāore e tika ana kia whakamāramatia katoatia e au ki tētahi pūkenga hītori pēnei i a koe. Me kī noa iho tēnei, ko te ipurangi, kei tua atu i te mana o ngā kaipōrangapū paetata, he tino nui, ā, kāore mātou e whakatau me pēhea te whakamahi a te tangata - kāore hoki mātou e pīrangi." He pakiwaituhi tawhito tēnā. Kua neke haere ngā mea - kua pai ake te mōhiotanga o ngā kaipōrangapū ki ngā whakamātautau i puta mai i te ipurangi, ā, kua oho ake ngā rorohiko hangarau ki te ao tōrangapū, ā, kua whakaae ki ētahi kawenga mō ngā mea e whakairihia ana ki ō rātou pūhara. Tirohanga ngāwari Nā reira, ina tono a Ēnā Me - tētahi atu pāremata ārahi rānei - ki te mahi, ināianei ka huri aroha rātau, ka mea, 'Ka mahi mātou i te pai ki te āwhina.' I te kitenga i tētahi pēhanga iti e hua ana i te nekeneke i ngā take mai i ngā atahanga tūkino tamariki ki te tāpaetanga pūoro, e mōhio ana ngā kaipōrangapū ka taea e rātou te nekeneke i runga i ngā ihirangi pūhāhā. Engari e whakaaro tonu ana ngā kamupene hangarau he tirohanga ngāwari tā ngā kaipōrangapū ki te ao. Ka whakamāramatia e rātau te uauatanga o te whakatau he aha te ihirangi pūhāhā - mēnā ka whakakore koe i ngā kauhau mai i ngā kaikauwhau mumura, kei roto rānei ērā o ngā hāhi katoa? Ka pātai mai rātau mēnā e tino hiahia ana mātou kia whai mana ngā āhuatanga o Mark Zuckerberg rāua ko Te Whārangi ki te whakatau i ngā mea e whakaaetia ana - me pēhea hoki tērā e tākaro ai i ngā whenua pērā i te United Sates e whai kōrero koreutu ana i te ngākau o o rātau kaupapa ture. Ā, ka whakamāramatia e rātou, ahakoa ka taea e ngā kaipōrangapū ki te Uru te pēhi i ngā kamupene pēnei i a Facebook me Google, kāore e tapahia he hukapapa ki ētahi o ngā pūhara e manakohia ana e ngā kaiāwhina pūtohu - pēnei i te Telegram, i whakatūria e tētahi kaimahi Rūhia. Ko taku matapae, i roto i te marama kotahi ka whakaae ngā kaipōrangapū me ngā kaiwhaiwhai hangarau kua haere whakamua rātou - ā, ka taea e te mōhiohio horihori (AI) te āwhina ki te whakatika i tēnei raruraru - engari he nui ake ngā mahi. Kātahi ka puta te whakapouri pūtohu panuku, ka tīmata anō te kēmu whakapae. I tēnei wā, tūmanakohia te raina o te Wenerei mai i Downing Street "kei ēnei kamupene ētahi o ngā roro tino pai o te ao" ā, me āhei ki te whakatika i ngā raruraru o te ao kia puta i ngā wā auau.

title: Neke atu i te 2,000 ngā rākau i hopukina i ngā kura
summary: Ko ngā hoari samurai, ngā toki me ngā pū hau i waenganui i ngā rākau e 2,579 i hopukina i ngā kura i Ingarangi me Weera, kua whakaaturia ngā tono Wāteatanga o te Mōhiohio.
text: I kī te tātaritanga o ngā raraunga mai i te 32 o ngā ope pirihimana e 43 i Ingarangi me Uēra kua kitea ngā rākau i roto i te rua tau ki Mati 2017. I kī nga rangatira pirihimana tērā te pikinga "māharahara" o te rangatahi e mau maripi ana. Tata ki te 25,850 ngā kura i Ingarangi me Weera. I kī ngā upoko ko te haumarutanga o ngā tamariki tō rātou tino manakē, ā, i mahi ngātahi ngā kura me ngā pirihimana ki te pare i ngā tauira. I te tau 2016-17 anake, e 1,369 ngā rākau i kitea - e tata ana ki te 20% i tērā tau. Ko te rima o ngā mahi katoa e pā ana ki ngā maripi, hoari rānei. Ko ētahi atu rākau i murua ko ētahi atu pū e 26 neke atu rānei, tae atu ki ngā pū hau me tētahi pū whakawai. Ko ētahi atu tītī rerekē ko te rākau pirihimana, he pine takahuri, he kēne pia me tētahi tokotoko konganuku 15in (38cm). Neke atu i te 47 ngā tamariki i raro iho i te 10 tau - te pakeke e whiua ai tētahi tangata - i kitea me ngā rākau. I roto i tēnei e toru ngā pakeke e rima tau, ko tētahi o rātou i mau ki te naihi, i kitea tētahi atu ki te "tawhā" - ko te tikanga he pereki, he toka rānei. Ko nga Pirihimana o Metropolitan me nga Pirihimana o Greater Manchester i waenganui i nga ope ki te urupare ki te uiuinga. Ka āwhina ngā pirihimana i te Rangatira Kātipa o Alf Hitchcock, te Rūnanga Pirihimana o te Motu mō te hara maripi: "Ehara te mau rākau i ngā kura i te take mō te kura anake; Ka hiahia tonu ngā pirihimana me ngā hoa ki te mahi tahi me rātau me te mahi tika. "Kātahi anō mātou ka kite i te pikinga o te rangatahi e mau maripi ana, ā, kei te māharahara tēnei. " Kei te urupare mātou ki tēnei ia mā te whakarite i te hunga e mau ana i a rātou me te mahi tahi me ngā kaihoko ki te whakaiti i te hokonga o ngā maripi ki ngā tāngata pakeke iho, mā ngā mahi ā-motu. "Ko te whakauru pirihimana ki ngā kura, ahakoa he āpiha e tuku kōrero ana me ngā wātū tauwhitiwhiti, i runga rānei i ngā kura anō hei wāhanga o te Mahi Ngātahi Kura Haumaru, ka āwhina i a mātau ki te whakaako i te rangatahi me te whakamārama he aha e kore ai e whakaaetia te mau rākau." I kī a Geoff Barton, te hēkeretari ahuwhānui o te Association of School and College Leaders: "E mahi ngātahi ana ngā kura me ngā pirihimana ki te tiaki me te whakaako i ā rātou tauira, ā, i ētahi wā e noho ana ngā pirihimana ki ngā kura. " Ki te tika, ka whakahaere ngā kura i ngā rapunga me te whakamahi i ngā pūoko konganuku, ā, ka whakatinanatia e rātou ngā hātepe whakatinanatanga pakari ki te tangata e kitea ana he rākau." Ka puta mai nga whika i waenganui i te whakahāwea i te hara maripi i nga kura e ētahi ope. I te tīmatanga o tēnei marama, ka pānuitia e nga Pirihimana o Metropolitan ka mahi tahi ngā āpiha me ngā kura ki te miramira i ngā hua tūpono o te mau maripi. E whai ana i te kēhi o Ann Maguire, i okaina ki te mate i te Kāreti Katorika o Corpus Christi i Leeds i Aperira 2014 e tētahi tauira 15 tau. I te tau i muri mai, i tino whara te kaiako o Vincent Uzomah i te okanga i a ia i te Whare Wānanga o Dixons Kings i Bradford e tētahi tauira whakahāwea.

title: E karanga ana te rangatira o UKIP, a Gerard Batten ki te poipoi whakakore whakaminenga
summary: Kua karangatia e te kaiārahi UK o UKIP he taupānga mēnā me whakakore te Whakaminenga o Welsh.
text: Nā David DeansBBC News E tautoko ana ngā kōrero a Gerard Batten i te tūnga o Gareth Bennett, te kaiārahi whakaminenga o UKP i pōtitia i te raumati. Kāore te kī taurangi a Tēnā Pēneti ki te whakahau mo te katinga o te whakaminenga i tiria e te katoa o tana rōpū. I a ia e kōrero ana i Kānata i muri i te tūtakinga ki ngā mema whakaminenga e whā e toe ana o UKIP, ka whakakāhore a Tēnā Batten i a ia e mau ana i te rōpū UK ki tētahi ahunga tino hōhā. Kua kitea e ngā uauatanga i waenganui i ngā AM o te rōpū o rātau tau e hinga ana mai i te whitu o Me 2016 ki te whā noa iho, me te kaiārahi o mua o Caroline Jones e puta ana i te rōpū inā noa nei. E hiahia ana a Tēnā Pēneti ki tētahi taupānga mo te wā heke mai o te whakaminenga, engari kua ātetetia e Rawiri Rowlands rāua ko Mīharo Paraone, ko te mea whakamutunga i whakaputaina i te mutunga wiki e kī ana ka tūkinotia te rōpū e whakahauhau ana ki te whakakore i te tinana. I roto i tētahi uiuinga ki a TE WĀ, ka kī te MEP o Rāwāhi ko ngā whakaaro o Tēnā Pēneti ki te whakaminenga "ko tōna whakaaro. Ehara i te kaupapa here a te rōpū i tēnei wā". Engari i kī a ia: "Ko tētahi o ngā mea ka mahia e mātou ko te hui o Weera, Pākehā me Aiarangi ki te Raki, me o mātau mema o te Whakaminenga o Rānana, ki te whakatau he aha te huarahi whakamua. " Me whai kaupapa here ā-motu tātau, me rerekē ngā kaupapa here i aua wāhi rerekē o Te Hononga o Ingarangi." "Ko tētahi o ngā whakaaro e haere mai ana, ka taea e mātou te whakahau mō tētahi taupānga, kia taea ai e te tangata te whakatau mēnā e hiahia ana rātou ki te pupuri i ngā huihuinga, i ngā pāremata rānei, kāore rānei. "Mēnā i pērā mātou, ka wātea ngā mema o te Whakaminenga o Rāwāhi, ka wātea ngā mema o te Whakaminenga o Welsh ki te whakahau i ia taha o te tautohetohe. " E hari ana ahau ki ngā mea katoa e whakatauria ana e te iwi o Welsh. Mēnā i whakatau rātau mēnā e hiahia ana rātau kia haere tonu, kia whakakore rānei, ka hari ahau ki tēnā nā te mea he whakataunga manapori tēnei. "Ki taku whakaaro ko te taupānga te huarahi pai rawa atu ki te haere whakamua," tana tāpiri mai. 'Ki te kore te tangata e whai take ka karangatia e rātau he ingoa tāngata' Ka tāruatia e Tēnā Batten ngā karanga kia whakarerea a Ms Jones, ā, ka kī a Mandy Jones - he mema UKIP engari kāore i roto i te rōpū rōpū - me waiho hoki mēnā kāore ia e uru ki te rōpū. Kua kōrero tautohetohe a Tēnā Batten mō te Islam, ā, kua karangatia e ia te kaiwhaiwhai matau rawa me te kaiārahi o te Rōpū Waea Ingarihi o Mua, ko Stephen Yaxley Lennon, e mōhiotia ana hoki ko Tommy Robinson, kia whakaaetia kia noho hei mema o te rōpū. Kua mahue i a Caroline Jones te rōpū e kī ana kei te neke tawhiti rawa ki te taha matau mōna, e whakaara ana i ngā māharahara mō ngā take e rua. "Ki te kore te tangata e whai take ka karangatia e rātau he ingoa tāngata," te kī a Tēnā Batten. "Nā te ao pōrangi anake e noho nei tātau ināianei, ka taea te whakaahua he tangata e pupuri ana i ngā whakaaro e mahia ana e au he tino matau", tana kī, e kī ana kāore a Tēnā Yaxley-Lennon i te taha matau. I te wā o te whakatau a Ms Jones kia waiho te UKIP, ka kī tētahi pūtake matua i roto i te rōpū e tūmanako ana rātau kia haere anō a Mīharo Paraone. I kī a Tēnā Batten me pupuri a Tēnā Pēneti i a Ms Brown i roto i te rōpū: "E hiahia ana ahau kia noho tahi te rōpū." I kī a ia kāore a ia i kite i tētahi mea i roto i ngā hui o te Tūrei me ngā AM e huatau ana kāore tēnei e puta. Kaore he mahere mo te taupānga tuatoru mo te mana whakahaere o Welsh.

title: I mate a Kimi Wall i te aituā i runga i te waka ruku, e kī ana a Pita Madsen
summary: Kua kī tētahi kaihanga Tenemāka i whakahaua i te matenga o te kaipānui o Huitene o Kimi Wall i mate a ia i roto i tētahi aituā i runga i tana waka ruku, ā, ka "tanumia" ia ki te moana, e kī ana nga pirihimana o Koupākena.
text: Kei te rangona te kēhi kōti i muri i ngā tatau kati, engari i whakaputaina te whakamāramatanga a Pita Madsen mo te mea i tūpono i muri i te tono a te wawao me te ture. I kitea whakamutunga a Ms Wall i runga i te waka ruku a Tāne Madsen i te pō o te 10 o Aotearoa. Ka haere tonu te rapunga i tōna tinana. I roto i tētahi kōrero, ka kī hoki nga pirihimana o Koupākena kua whakatauria e nga mana moana te ara i haere ai te waka ruku i Koge Bay me te moana o Oresund i mua i te totohutanga. E kī ana a Tēnā Madsen, e 46, i mahue i a ia tōna tinana ki tētahi wāhi i Koge Bay, ki te tonga o Koupākena, ka kī nga pirihimana. Kua haere tētahi mahi rapu e pā ana ki ngā kairuku, ngā hepa me ngā kaipuke i runga i te ara i kitea mai i te Paraire. Kua whakataua te kaihanga o Tenemāka ki te patu tangata. E kī ana nga pirihimana kāore e taea e rātau te tuku mōhiohio anō i tēnei wā. I kī te rōia o Pita Madsen, a Betina Hald Engmark, kāore tana kiritaki i whakaae ki tētahi hara. I kī a ia kua hoatu e ia he whakaaturanga ki nga pirihimana i te wā o te pātai tuatahi, ā, kua puta mai ināianei "ngā mōhiohio mai i tēnei". "Kāore anō taku kiritaki kia whāki ki tētahi mea, e tautohe tonu ana taku kiritaki kia kaua e hara ki ngā whakapae ki a ia," tana kī. I pūrongotia tuatahitia e tana hoa tāne i muri i tana korenga e hoki mai i te mea ko te tikanga he haere poto i runga i te waka ruku UC3 Nautilus. I te rangahau a ia i tētahi āhuahira mō Tēnā Madsen me tana waka ruku 40 tan, arā, i tētahi wā, ko te oko tūmataiti nui rawa atu o tōna momo. E whakapono ana nga pirihimana i āta totohu te waka ruku e Tēnā Madsen, i whakaorangia i mua i te hopukina. I te tuatahi ka kī a Tēnā Madsen i whakatakatia e ia a Ms Wall i muri i te pouri i te 10 o Aotearoa, e tata ana ki te wāhi i tūtaki ai rātau i mua. Engari i kī ngā pirihimana ā muri ake kua hoatu e ia ki a rātau he kōrero hou o ngā takahanga, kāore i whakawāteatia i taua wā.

title: Ilfracombe disco 'mate rongoā' taitamariki i tapaina
summary: Kua whakaingoatia e pirihimana tētahi taitama 16 tau i mate i roto i tētahi mahi e pā ana ki te rongoā.
text: E whakapono ana ngā pirihimana tērā pea i mau a Luke Campbell-Tapson i te MDMA i tētahi kōpae taitamariki i tū i te hōpua o Vivid i Ilfracombe. I mauria te taitamariki ki te Hōhipera o te Takiwā o Te Raki o Devon, i mate ai ia i nga haora tōmua o te Hātarei. I kī a Supt Toby Davies ko Luke, mai i South Molton, he "taitamariki kaingākautia". Kua whakarewaina he tūhuratanga mo tōna matenga. Ētahi atu kōrero mō te tūhuratanga me ētahi atu rongokōrero o Devon me Cornwall "I tēnei wā kāore i te mōhiotia te take o te mate, ā, kei te whai ake ngā āpiha i ngā rārangi uiui maha," te kī a Supt Davies. "Ko tētahi o aua rārangi uiui e pā ana ki te whakapaunga pea o tētahi taonga whakahaere, e whakapono ana he pire MDMA." I kī tētahi kōrero tōtahi mai i te hōpua o Vivid nightclub me ngā kaihautū takahanga 2Filthy "e hiahia ana rātau ki te whakapuaki i o rātau aroha tino hōhonu me te aroha ki te whānau o Luke Campbell-Tapson i mate kino". I tāpiri mai rātau: "E hiahia ana a Vivid ki te whakamārama kia kore tātau e manawanui ki ngā rongoā i a mātau takahanga katoa." Tokorua nga taitamariki pakeke i whakaaetia ki te Hōhipera o Derriford i Plymouth i muri i te tango i tētahi rongoā whakangahau, i whakapono hoki he MDMA, i tētahi hākari whare i taua pō kotahi. E noho ana rāua i te hōhipera, kotahi i roto i te āhua nui. E kī ana ngā pirihimana kāore he whakaaturanga hei hono i ngā mahi a Plymouth me Ilfracombe.

title: Alex Salmond document revised over Crown Office concern
summary: Kua whakaputaina e te Pāremata o Pirihitini tētahi putanga hou o ngā tukunga mai i a Alex Salmond i muri i te whakaaranga a te Tari Karauna i "ngā āwangawanga nui" mōna.
text: Ko ngā pepa a Tāne Salmond i whakaingoatia ai ngā tāngata e whakapae ana ia he wāhanga o tētahi ngana "kino" ki te tango i a ia i te oranga tūmatanui. I muri iho ka tangohia e te pāremata tētahi o ngā tuhinga, ā, ka whakaputaina anō ki tētahi atu puka. I puta mai i muri i te tūtakitanga o ngā MSP o te rōpū rangatōpū o te pāremata ki te kōrerorero i tētahi reta i tukuna e te Tari Karauna. I kī tētahi kaikōrero mō te Tari Karauna: "I ngā take katoa e mōhio ai te Karauna ki ngā take whakahawea, ka āta whakaarohia ēnei, ā, ka mahia he mahi mēnā e tika ana." I whakaputaina ngā tuhinga i mua i te āhua o Tēnā Salmond i mua i te uiuinga e uiui ana i te whakahaere a te kāwanatanga o Pirihitini i ngā amuamu whakatūtū ki a ia. I roto i te tukunga a Tēnā Salmond ko ngā kerēme mai i te minita tuatahi o mua, tērā tētahi "pakarutanga katoa o ngā ārai e tika ana kia tīari i waenganui i te kāwanatanga, te rōpū tōrangapū me ngā mana ture". A, i whakapae a ia tērā "he mahi tika, roa, kino, kōnohete hoki i waenganui i ngā tāngata i roto i te kāwanatanga o Pirihitini me te SNP ki te tūkino i tōku rongonui, ahakoa te nui o te hereheretanga i ahau." Ko ngā tāngata i whakaingoatia e Tēnā Salmond i roto i ana tukunga ko te tāne a Nicola Sturgeon, ko Pita Murrell, ko ia te rangatira nui o te SNP, me te rangatira kaimahi o Ms Sturgeon, ko Liz Raiti. Kua whakapaea hoki e Tēnā Salmond a Ms Sturgeon, nāna i whakakapi i a ia hei minita tuatahi me te kaiārahi SNP, ki te pāremata māminga me te takahi i te waehere o te minita. Kua whakakāhore a Ms Sturgeon i ngā whakaaro, ā, ka kī atu ki a KOE Pākehā "kāore he haehae whakaaturanga" hei tārua i ana kerēme mo tētahi whakatupuranga. I kī nga rōia a Tāne Salmond ko te whakatau a te pāremata kia unu, kātahi ka whakaputa anō i tētahi putanga hou o tana tukunga he "ohorere nui me te āwangawanga" ā, tērā pea ka whai "rawa mēnā ka taea e ia te haere mai" te wātū whakaaturanga i te Wenerei. I tāpiri mai rātau: "E tū ana ngā take, kua tohutohu mātou ki a ia ko te raweke mārama a te Karauna e tohu ana me mōrearea rawa ki a ia i te kōrero ki tana tukunga. Kāore e taea te whakanoho i a ia ki te mōrearea ā-ture." I karangatia e te kaiārahi takiwā o Te Hunga Mahi o Pirihitini, a Ake Baillie ki te Ariki Kaitaunaki - ko ia te upoko o te Tari Karauna me tētahi mema o te kāwanatanga o Pirihitini - kia whakatakoto kōrero i te pāremata. I tāpiri mai a ia: "Nā te nui o te painga tūmatanui, kua tonoa e au te āpiha whakahaere kia whakaputa i te reta mai i te Tari Karauna ki te pāremata, kia mārama ake ai mātou ki ngā rāhuitanga i whakatakotoria ki te tinana rangatōpū. " He nui rawa te wā me te moni kua pau i runga i tēnei pūrākau whakarihariha. Me āhei te komiti ki te haere tonu ki ana mahi, kāore i te āraia, ā, kāore he mōhiohio e puritia tikatia." Kua tirohia e te komiti uiui he aha te hē o te tūhuratanga ā-roto a te kāwanatanga ki ngā amuamu whakatoi tōkai ki a Tēnā Salmond, i mahia e ngā pononga tūmatanui wahine tokorua. Me utu e te kāwanatanga ngā utu ā-ture, neke atu i te £500,000 ki a Tēnā Salmond i muri i tana whakaaetanga kua mahi ture i te wā o te tūhuratanga. I muri iho ka whakawāteatia a Tēnā Salmond i ngā whakapae e 13 o te whakaekenga ā-waha ki te katoa o ngā wāhine e iwa i muri i te whakawātanga o te Kōti Tiketike i tērā tau. Ko ngā tukunga a Alex Salmond ki te uiui a Holyrood e whakatakoto ana i tana putanga o ngā takahanga. I te whakatū rātau i te ara kia puta mai a ia i mua i te komiti me te hoatu whakaaturanga ā-tangata - he mea i kī a Tēnā Salmond e kore ia e mahi i tēnā ki te kore e whakaputaina tana whakaaturanga. E hiahia ana a ia kia purua tōna taha o te pūrākau ki runga i te pūkete, ā, e āwangawanga ana nā te mea ki te kore e whakaputaina ngā kōrero kāore e taea e te komiti te kōrero ki a rātou kitenga. Kua whakaputaina e te komiti tētahi putanga kua whakahōutia. Ināianei kei te whakaaro a Tēnā Salmond mehemea he nui ki a ia te hoatu whakaaturanga āpōpō. E kī ana hoki a Tēnā Salmond i roto i tana tukunga tuhituhi ko te Tari Karauna - te ratonga ture a Pākehā - e "kore e tika mō te whāinga" i raro i tōna ārahitanga o nāianei. A, i kī a ia tērā tētahi "wehenga katoa o ngā ārai tika e tīari ana i waenganui i te kāwanatanga, te rōpū tōrangapū, me ngā mana ture i tētahi whenua e mau ana ki te ture." I tāpiri mai a ia: "Ko te utu tūturu ki te iwi o Pirihitini e rere ana ki te maha miriona pauna, engari kāore tētahi tangata i roto i tēnei tukanga katoa i kōrero i ngā kupu ngāwari e hiahiatia ana i ētahi wā hei whakahōu me te tāmata i ngā rōpū manapori - 'Ka Tukua e au'. " Ināianei kei te komiti te wā hei whakatau i taua tūnga." I pōti ngā MSP i runga i te komiti uiui i mua ki te whakaputa i te tukunga a Tēnā Salmond, i mua i te whakamutunga a te rōpū rangatōpū o te pāremata ā muri ake nei ka taea te whakaputa i te tuhinga. I a ia e urupare ana ki te tānga o ngā tuhinga i te pō o te Mane, ka kī tētahi kaikōrero o te Tari Karauna me te Ratonga Pūtea Pūtea (COPFS) e tino nui ana tana kawenga ki te tautoko i te ture me te pare i te rangatiratanga me ngā mana o "te hunga katoa e whakapā atu ana ki COPFS". I tāpiritia e ia kua mahi nga rōia o Pākehā "takitahi, i te painga tūmatanui i ngā wā katoa" e pā ana ki te kēhi. I kī tētahi tukunga tuhituhi tāpiri ki te uiui a Ms Raiti i whakakāhoretia e ia te whakapae whakatupu i "tōna katoa" ā, kāore i "whakapūtātia e tētahi whakaaturanga, ā, i runga anō i te maha o ngā kerēme, he hē". I kī tētahi kaikōrero SNP: "He nui ake tēnei whakapuakitanga me te kore whakaaturanga whai tikanga. " Kua whakamāramatia kētia e ētahi o nga wāhine te tino pōrangi ki te huatau he wāhanga rātau o te whakatupu i a ia. Heoi anō, kei te mahi tonu a Alex Salmond i ēnei kerēme whakarihariha, kāore i te pūtake, ā, kei te whiu i ngā mea katoa."

title: Rare Slavonian grebe spotted in Welsh nature reserve
summary: Kua kitea tētahi manu mōrearea e haere ana ki Weera.
text: I kitea te grebe Slavonian i tētahi rāhui taiao i te taone takutai o Rhyl, Denbighshire. Kua "rārangi-whero" te manu e te RSPB - te manakē atawhai tiketike, ko te tikanga e hiahiatia ana he mahi kōhukihuki nā te whakapeka o te iwi whānui. E 30 anake ngā takirua tāuri o te momo grebe e toe ana i te UK, ā, ka kitea katoatia i Pākehā. He āhua kore nei ngā kitenga i te raki o Wales. I kī a Toni Thomas, te taiao mema matua i te kaunihera o Denbighshire: "He tino pai te kite i tētahi manu ātaahua pēnei i te grebe Slavonian e noho kāinga ana i konei i Denbighshire." The Brickfield Pond location chosen by the bird has been transformed from a derelict site by the council over the last two years, turning it into an oasis for wildlife with reed beds attracting insects that make the perfect food for the grebe. I kī te kaunihera e aroturuki ana i te grebe, me te whakapā atu ki ngā kaitiaki manu auau o te hāroto. I te raumati he kōwhai ngā taringa o te grebe Slavonian, engari i te hōtoke he tino pango me te mā te manu. I waenganui i Whiringahora me Poutāpeta ka kitea rātou huri noa i te takutai o UK, i Pākehā me Sussex.

title: E mahi ana ngā tohunga whakawātea pomu ki ngā pahū WWII o Guernsey
summary: E rua ngā pahū o te Pakanga Tuarua o te Ao kāore anō kia pahū i kitea i ngā wai i ngā Moutere o Channel.
text: I karangatia nga tohunga whakawātea pomu i muri i te kitenga o te taonga i te Hātarei. Ko te tuatahi - he maina parachute whenua o Ingarangi - i kitea e tata ana ki Castle Cornet i St Peter Port, a, i tangohia. E mahi ana ngā pirihimana me ngā tīma o te Moana Ariki ki te tuarua i Little Russell - te hongere e rere ana i waenganui i Guernsey me Herm. I kī ngā Pirihimana o Guernsey: "Ko te tūemi i kitea i wairuatia, ā, kāore i roto i te katoa o te 870 lbs o te pakū tiketike. " I whakaorangia, i whakangaromia ki te pahūtanga whakahaere." Kua tohutohutia ngā kaumoana kia whakarongo ki te hongere VHF 16 mō ngā whakatūpato haumaru i te wā o te mahinga. He nui ngā pahū i taka ki taua rohe i waenganui i Pipiri me Aotearoa o te tau 1944 i te ngana ki te ārai i te whanga kia kore ai e wehe atu ngā waka Tiamana i Guernsey me te whakararuraru i te Whakaekenga Haumi i Normandy. I Pipiri 1940, e 34 ngā tāngata i mate, e 33 i whara i te pohūtanga a te Luftwaffe i St Peter Port Harbour i ngā rā i mua i te whakaekenga a ngā hōia Tiamana i te motu.

title: I pātai atu ngā tūroro ki te nēhi pango o Derby mehemea he mātauranga a ia
summary: Kua kōrero tētahi nēhi mō te tūkinotanga whakahāwea i whiwhi ai ia i te mahi hei wāhanga o tētahi whakahau whakawhirinaki kia nui ake ngā kaimahi ki te kōrero i ā rātou pūrākau.
text: I kī a Elita, e mahi ana i te Hōhipera o Kingi Derby, kua pātai mai ētahi tūroro mehemea e tika ana a ia "e mārama ana nā [tōna] tae kiri". I tāpiri mai a ia: "I waenganui i ēnei mea katoa, kei te mahi tonu ahau i taku mahi i runga i te aroha." I kī ngā Hōhipera o te Whare Wānanga o Te Whare Wānanga o Te Whare 'Very proud' Elita, a registered nurse for almost 23 years whose full name has not been released by the trust, said: "I've had patients who have come to me and said, 'Is there someone else who could care after me? E tino mōhio ana koe kei te tika koe ki te mahi i tēnei mahi?', e mārama ana nā taku tae kiri." I kī a ia kua pātai hoki ētahi tūroro i tōna kaha ki te kōrero Ingarihi. "Kua kī ahau, 'Kei te whakawhitiwhiti kōrero ahau ki a koe mā tētahi huarahi e mārama katoa ai koe'," tana kī. Ka whakarārangitia hoki e Elita ētahi atu kōrero tūroro whakahāwea i roto i te ataata, i whakaputaina hei wāhanga o tētahi whakahau kia nui ake ngā kaimahi ki te tiritiri pūrākau me te kōrero ki te whakahāwea. "He uaua," tana kī. "Heoi anō i roto i ngā uauatanga, i waenganui i ēnei mea katoa, kei te mahi tonu ahau i tāku mahi i runga i te aroha me te manaaki me te tiaki, ā, e kore au e mutu te mahi, nā te mea koia tāku e aroha ana ki te mahi. "E tino whakahīhī ana ahau ki te noho hei nēhi i tēnei rā." Cathy Winfield, executive chief nurse at the trust, said: "I give my full support to Elita and all our other employees. " Ka mahi mātou i ngā mea katoa e taea ana e mātou ki te anga atu ki tēnei upoko, ki te whakaako me te tautoko i ā mātou kaimahi me ō mātou hapori paetata kia mārama ai kāore e whakaaetia, e whakaaetia rānei te whakahāwea." I tērā marama, ka tūtohu tētahi nēhi o Piripīni mō te tūkinotanga whakahāwea i a ia e tētahi tūroro i te Hōhipera o Kingi Derby. I kī te rangatira nui o Gavin Boyle i taua wā i "tino riri" a ia, mā te tāpiri i te whakawhirinaki e whakarewa he whakahau ki te rutu i te take. Whāia a BBC East Midlands i Facebook, Twitter, Instagram rānei. Tukua ō whakaaro pūrākau ki eastmidsnews@bbc.co.uk. Ngā Hononga Ipurangi Pātahi Ngā Hōhipera Whare Wānanga o Derby me Burton NHS Foundation Trust

title: Ka hokona e Facebook te umanga taupānga whakapakari tinana
summary: Kua tāpirihia e Facebook tētahi umanga Hinerangi e hanga ana i tētahi taupānga aroturuki kaha ki tana kōpaki hokonga nui haere tonu.
text: I waihangatia e ProtoGeo ā-Hekerangi te taupānga Moves e whakamahi ana i ngā pūoko hanga-roto o tētahi waea atamai hei aroturuki i ngā ngohe me ngā pūngoi kua tahuna. Ka tukuna e te whiwhinga he tāurunga ki te whatunga pāpori ki te mākete hangarau hauora e tipu ana. Ko ētahi atu hokonga o nā noa nei ko te umanga karere pūkoro WhatsApp me te kaihanga maupane mariko Oculus. Kāore a Facebook i whakaatu i te nui o tana utu mō ProtoGeo, he iti iho i te 10 ngā kaimahi, engari e whakapono ana he hautanga o te utu kua utua e ia mō ētahi atu kamupene kōtaha tiketike inā noa nei. I utua e ia te $2bn (£1.1bn) mō Oculus VR, ā, i pau te $19bn (£11.3bn) i WhatsApp. I roto i tētahi pou rangitaki, ka neke te umanga kaha ki te whakaū i ōna kaiwhakamahi mō te hokonga. "Mō ērā o koutou e whakamahi ana i te taupānga Moves - ka mahi tonu te wheako Moves hei taupānga tūtaki, ā, kāore he mahere hei huri i tērā, hei whakaranu rānei i ngā raraunga ki Facebook."
