Ināianei ka kī a Facebook mō te hokonga: "Kua hangaia e te tīma Moves tētahi utauta whakamīharo mō ngā miriona tāngata e hiahia ana kia mārama ake ki ā rātou ngohe whakapakari i ia rā, ā, kei te tūmanako mātou ki te haere tonu te taupānga ki te whiwhi āwhina." Ka haere te taupānga i te papamuri o ngā waea a ngā kaiwhakamahi, mā te whakamahi i ngā raraunga tauwāhi hei aroturuki i ngā ngohe puta noa i te rā. Neke atu i te whā miriona ngā wā i tikiake ai te taupānga koreutu mō ngā waea iPhone me ngā waea Android, e ai ki te umanga. He maha nga kamupene hangarau nunui e kite ana i te moni e mahia ana i te hangarau hauora. He awhe here whakapakari tinana me ngā tāwhitiwhiti kei runga kē i te mākete. E rongo ana a Āporo kei te tata tonu ki te whakarewa i tōna ake tāwhitiwhiti me ngā āhuahira kaha, ā, i whakarewaina e Google i tērā marama ngā pūmanawa mō ngā mauranga. Engari mō Facebook, tērā pea ko te hokonga o tētahi taupānga whakapakari tinana e pā ana ki ngā raraunga hōu e āhei ai ki te ūnga pai ake i ngā pānuitanga, e whakaaro ana a Alys Woodward, he kaitātari me te umanga rangahau IDC. "E hiahia ana rātau ki te mōhio ki ētahi atu mea mō ngā mahi a te tangata, kei hea rātou. He mōhiohio whaitake tēnei ahakoa kāore rātou e here ki te tangata," tana kī.

title: Ko te tangata o Luton i te kōti i runga i ngā whakairinga pāpāho pāpori o te Kāwanatanga Āmāri
summary: Kua puta mai tētahi tangata i te kōti e whakapaea ana ki te whakairi i ngā kiriata taikaha i hangaia e te rōpū Kāwanatanga Ingarihi i runga i te pāpāho pāpori.
text: Kua whakataua a Ihu Etaka, e 43, mai i Luton, ki ngā tatau e 10 o te whakaputa i ngā tānga pūtohu. E anga ana hoki a ia ki tētahi whakapae mo te kore e ū ki tētahi raupapa whakamōhiotanga pūtohu mā te kore kōrero ki ngā pirihimana mō tētahi wāhitau īmēra i whakamahia e ia. I whakaaturia e Tēnā Etaka ehara i te inoi hara ki ngā whakapae katoa i te Kōti Kaiwhakawa o Westminster. E kiia ana i whakamahia e ia tētahi pūkete Facebook i raro i tētahi ingoa kōrero hei whakairi i ngā ataata IS e rua, ā, ka tukuna atu ētahi atu whitiāhua e waru ki tētahi atu tangata mā te whakamahi i tētahi taupānga karere whakamuna i a Hōngongoi i tēnei tau. Ka puta anō a ia i te Bailey Tawhito mo tētahi whakarongo tuatahi i te 6 o Whiringa ā Rangi.

title: Te uira o Blackpool: I homai ngā okana o Jordan Banks
summary: Kua kī te pāpā o tētahi taitama e iwa tau i mate i muri i te tūtukitanga o te uira, kua hoatu ngā okana o tana tama ki ngā tamariki tokotoru.
text: I te tākaro whutupōro a Jordan Banks i runga i tētahi papa tākaro i Blackpool i te tūtukitanga o te āwhā i te ahiahi o te Tūrei. I roto i tētahi pou Facebook, ka kī tōna pāpā o Mātā Banks i tana tama "ko te tikanga o te atawhai ka taea pea e ētahi atu tamariki tokotoru te ora". I kī a ia he "tangata iti whakamīharo" a Horano me "te ngākau nui rawa". I mauria a Horano ki te hōhipera me ngā whara nui i muri i te pānga o te uira i te 17:00 BST, engari i mate i tētahi wā poto i muri iho, ka kī ngā Pirihimana o Te Pirihimana. E rua ngā whārangi huihuinga kua whakatūria ki te pūmahara o te kaitākaro whutupōro kua neke atu i te £82,000. I kī tōna whānau ko ia "te whetū tino kanapa" me "ka mutu o mātau ao" i te "ngaronga o ta mātau tama ātaahua". I roto i tētahi pou Facebook mā tētahi hoa whānau, ka kī te pāpā o Horano i tana tama "i ngā wā katoa e hiahia ana ia ki te āwhina i ētahi atu tāngata mēnā ka taea e ia". "Ehara i te mea kua ngaro noa iho taku tamaiti iti, kua ngaro i a au taku hoa tino pai," tana kī. I kī a ia ko Horano he "tangata iti noa iho" ā, "kāore i taea e ia te whakahīhī ake ki a ia". Kua mahue ngā putiputi, ngā whutupōro, ngā hāte whutupōro me ngā karere aroha ki te papa tākaro i Common Edge Road. Kua whakairihia hoki e ngā tāngata e iwa ngā whutupōro i runga i te pāpāho pāpori hei whakahonore i te kaingākau o Liverpool FC, mā te whakamahi i te hashtag #RIPLittleMan. I te ahiahi o te Rāite, ka takoha nga kaitākaro o Liverpool FC ki a Horano mā te mau hāte me tōna ingoa i a rātau e whakamahana ana mo ta rātau whakataetae ki a Manchester United. E whakaaro ana hoki ngā karapu rōpū Rātapu o Te Rātapu o Te Rātapu ki te pupuri i tētahi meneti mārire mōna i tēnei mutunga wiki. I whakamihitia a Horano mo ana mahi kohi moni i te tīmatanga o tēnei tau i muri i te kohikohi £3,000 mō tētahi aroha hauora hinengaro hei whakamaharatanga ki tōna matua kēkē mā te oma 30 maero i roto i te 10 rā. I tākaro a ia mō te Karapu Whutupōro Tamariki o Clifton Rangers, nāna ia i whakaahua he "taitama whakaharahara". I rere te haki i te hōro taone o Blackpool i te haurua pou hei takoha ki Horano me te Pourewa o Blackpool, ā, ka mura ngā kopere Illuminations ki te whero hei whakanui i tana aroha ki a Liverpool. He aha e kore ai e whai i a BBC North West i Facebook, Twitter me Instagram? Ka taea hoki e koe te tuku whakaaro pūrākau ki northwest.newsonline@bbc.co.uk Ngā Hononga Ipurangi Pātahi Pirihimana o Te Rūnanga

title: E whakaae ana a Wīwī ki te pire nekeneke tautohetohe
summary: Kua puta i te Whakaminenga ā Iwi o Wīwī tētahi ture nekeneke hou uaua e whakamau ana i ngā ture huri noa i te whakangungu.
text: Ka whakapototia e te pire ngā rā kati taupānga whakangungu, ka tāruatia te wā e taea ai te pupuri i ngā kaiheke ture kore, ā, ka whakamōhiotia he whiu whare herehere kotahi tau mō te tomo ki Wīwī i runga i te ture. E kī ana te rōpū whakahaere a Perehitini Emmanuel Macron ka tere ake te pire i te tukanga tono whakangungu. Engari e kī ana ngā whika ātete me ngā rōpū motika tangata he tawhiti rawa nga whanganga. E 228 ngā pōti ki te 139, e 24 ngā whakawāteatanga, i muri i te 60 hāora taupatupatu i te mutunga wiki me ngā rau o ngā menemana. I pōti tētahi mema o te rōpū La République en Marche (LREM) a Tēnā Macron, a Ia-Mīharo Clément, ki te ture, ā, e 14 ngā mema i papare i te ture. "Kāore au i te tino mōhio kei te tukuna atu e mātou ki ngā tangata whenua o te ao te karere whānui i a mātau i ngā wā katoa," te kī a Tēnā Clément, tētahi Hāpori o mua, i roto i tētahi kōrero i muri i te pōti. I muri iho ka pānuitia e ia e wehe ana a ia i te rōpū paremata. Ko te whāinga matua o te ture ko te tapahi i te roanga o ngā taupānga whakangungu me te whakarite kia pai ake te pūnaha tuku mō te hunga i panaia. Ka nui ake te āwhina ki ngā hunga whakaruru ki te whakaurunga me te ako i te reo Wīwī. He aha te tautohetohe mo taua mea? Ko tētahi o ngā huringa tino nui ko te pupuri i ngā kaiwhaiwhai hūnuku e tatari ana ki te tuku atu tae atu ki te 90 rā, e rua te wā tīariari o te 45 rā. I te tuatahi ka whai te kāwanatanga mo te wā 135 rā. I amuamu nga hoariri i te pāremata e whakamahia ana nga kaiheke pēnei i te hunga hara. Ka taea hoki te pupuri i ngā tamariki ki o rātau whānau, ahakoa i whakaae ngā mana ki te whakatatū i tētahi rōpū mahi hei tirotiro i te take. I te tau 2017, e 275 ngā tamariki e puritia ana i roto i ngā pūtahi tautāwhi whakahaere. I whakataua e te kaiārahi mauī o Ia-Luc Mélenchon te mahi he "pārekareka". Ko ngā rā kati mō te whakakōnae i ngā tono whakangungu, te tono rānei ki tētahi ākiritanga, kua whakaarahia hoki ngā māharahara. E 90 rā te wā o ngā kaikerēme ki te kōnae i tētahi taupānga, heke iho i te 120 rā, me te rua wiki ki te tono ki te ākiritanga. E kī ana te Mātaki Motika Tangata mā te whakapoto i ngā rā kati tono whakangungu ka pā kino pea ki ngā "kaiwhaiwhai mōrearea rawa, ko rātou te hunga e tino hapa ana i te rā kati". "I raro i te whakaaro o te whakarato i tētahi pūnaha whakangungu pai ake, kei roto i te pire ētahi rangatū o ngā mehua e whakaiti ana i te āheitanga ki te parenga," te kī a te kaiwhakahaere o Wīwī o te rōpū, o Bénédicte Jeannerod i roto i tētahi kōrero. I tino ātete nga rōpū parirau mauī ki ngā huringa, ā, ka uru atu te Pākehā parirau ki a rātau. I tāruatia e te National Front ētahi o ngā mehua. Ināianei ka whakaarohia te pire i te whare o runga, te Senate, i Hune. He tuhipoka mō ngā kupu: Ka whakamahia e te AO te kupu kaiheke hei tohutoro ki ngā tāngata katoa e neke ana kāore anō kia whakaoti i te tukanga ā-ture o te tono whakangungu. Kei roto i tēnei rōpū ko ngā tāngata e rere ana i ngā whenua i haea e te pakanga pērā i a Hiria, tērā pea ka tukuna ki a rātou te tūnga rerenga, tae atu ki ngā tāngata e rapu ana i ngā mahi me ngā oranga pai ake, ko wai pea ngā kāwanatanga e whakahaere ana he kaiheke ohaoha.

title: Ngā whakahōutanga waro o UK i ngā kākahu o Thoresby me Kellingley
summary: Neke atu i te 300 ngā kaimahi i ngā pahū waro hōhonu whakamutunga o Ingarangi kua tukuna he reta whakahōutanga i mua i te katinga o ngā rua, kua kī tētahi uniana.
text: E hiahia ana a UK Coal ki te kati i a Kellingley Colliery i Te Raki o Aotearoa me Thoresby Colliery i Rātata. I kī te National Union of Mineworkers (NUM) e whakairihia ana ngā reta whakahōutanga ki ngā kaimahi 57 o Kellingley, ā, tata ki te 270 ngā kaimahi Thoresby. Kāore anō a UK Waro kia kōrero mō ngā kerēme. I kī a Pirihi Kitchen, te hēkeretari ahuwhānui o te NUM: "Kāore au e kite i ngā painga o tētahi tangata ki te tuku whakamōhiotanga whakahōutanga ki tētahi tangata i tēnei rā, nā te mea kāore te kamupene i te mōhio mēnā kua whiwhi rātou i te moni mō tā rātou mahere katinga 18 marama." Kua tono te kāwanatanga ki te whakatārewa i te Waro UK £10m hei kawe i tētahi "katinga whakahaere" 18 marama o ngā pahū e rua. Engari kei te whakaaro te NUM ki te hoko kaimahi o Kellingley Colliery. I tāpiri mai a Tēnā Kitchen: "Nā te mea he pai ake te mahi a ngā rua i te mea e tūmanakohia ana, ka taea te pupuri i ēnei whakahōutanga, e pai ake ai te wā o tētahi mōkī whakaora - ahakoa he hoko kaimahi, he āwhina kāwanatanga rānei." Kua whakapaea e UK Waro ōna raruraru pūtea i runga i te mākete o te ao whānui, me te hinganga o ngā utu waro, i runga i te ahi i ngaro, ā, kātahi anō ka kati, tōna Daw Mill Colliery i Warwickshire. I kī a Alan Spencer, te hēkeretari ahuwhānui o te NUM mō Nottinghamshire: "Kei te tatari noa rātau [ngā kaimahi] kia haere mai te poutāpeta me ēnei reta kia taka ki tō rātou tatau. " He āhuatanga wehi ki te kore koe e mōhio mēnā ka mutu koe āpōpō, engari ina he waro i raro i te whenua, ā, ka whai hua pea."

title: Pōti whakaminenga i runga i te huarahi āwhina M4 i te tōmua o Hakihea
summary: Kua korerotia ki ngā AM ka whai "pōti here" mēnā ka hangaia he huarahi āwhina M4 i mua i te tūnga o te Minita Tuatahi o Carwyn Jones i a Hakihea.
text: I whakaūngia hoki kua whiwhi nga pononga tūmatanui i nga kitenga o te uiui tūmatanui ki te kaupapa. I titiro te uiui ki ngā tono a te Kāwanatanga o Welsh kia hanga i te 15 maero o te huanui ki te tonga o Newport. Kāore i te mārama mēnā ka tautokona e te nuinga o ngā AM te kaupapa, ā, ko ētahi i Labour e ātete ana ki te kaupapa. Kua whiwhi ngā āpiha i tētahi kape o te pūrongo a te kaitirotiro uiui tūmatanui, ā, kei te whakarite tohutohu mō ngā minita, te kī a Julie James, te kaiārahi o te whare. I te wā pātai, ka pātaitia te minita kāpata a Ms James mēnā ka whiwhi ngā AM i tētahi pōti here i roto i te Senedd i runga i te kaupapa - he pōti e hiahiatia ana e te kāwanatanga kia whai i ngā tohutohu a te whakaminenga. Ka kī a ia: "Āe kia mārama ai te tangata, kua kī ahau ka pūketetia te taupatupatu me te pōti i roto i ngā whakataunga pūtea penapena whakamutunga, ā, kei te wā kāwanatanga. " Nā reira he pōti here i te wā o te kāwanatanga, i runga i te kāwanatanga. "Kua mārama aku ake backbenchers e hiahia ana rātau ki tētahi pōti pērā," tana tāpiri mai. Ki te haere whakamua, ka tīmata pea te mahi hanga a tērā tau, ka tāpiri mai a ia. I kī te kaiārahi Plaid Cymru, a Arama Price, mēnā ka whakakāhoretia e AMs te huarahi āwhina, ka pōti rānei i te tahua nāna i tohatoha moni mōna, "tērā pea me whakarongo te kāwanatanga ki te reo o te whakaminenga i whakapuakina e pā ana ki tēnei kaupapa". I tēnei wā ka tū te pōti i te wiki o te 4 o Hakihe, ka kī a Ms James. A new Welsh Labour leader will be elected on 6 December. I te wiki e whai ake nei, ka tū a Carwyn Jones hei minita tuatahi, ā, ka hoatu mana ngā whatumanawa ki tōna kaiwhakawhiwhi. Kua tautohe ngā kaiārahi pakihi e hiahiatia ana te huarahi āwhina nā te mea kei te tūkino te paheketanga i ngā kauhanga o Brynglas i Newport i te āhua o te whakahaerenga. Kua karangatia e nga minita o Welsh nga takaware waka he "raruraru pēhi e tono ana i tētahi rongoā". Engari kua whakaarahia e ngā kaiwhaiwhai ngā māharahara mō te pānga o te huarahi ki ngā Taumata Gwent tairongo taiao, e hangaia ai te huanui.

title: Ka tohuāki te tīmatanga o Mers i te Pāka o Kōrea ki te Tonga kia whakaroa i te haerenga mai ki a Mātau
summary: Kua hikitia e te Perehitini o Kōrea ki te Tonga o Park Geun-hye te haerenga o tēnei mutunga wiki ki a Mātau ki te whakahaere i te whawhai a tōna whenua ki te tīmatatanga o te Middle East Respiratory Syndrome (Mers).
text: I puta mai te pānuitanga mai i tōna tari i te whakaūnga a Kōria ki te Tonga e rua anō ngā mate me te 13 anō ngā mate. Mā tēnei e kawe mai te mate ki te iwa, me te 108 i pāngia e te huaketo. Ko te tīmatatanga te mea nui rawa atu i waho o te Rāwhiti o Waenganui, i kitea tuatahitia ai a Mers, ā, kāore he rongoā e mōhiotia ana. I tīmata te hora i Kōrea ki te Tonga i tērā marama i te wā i whakapokea ai tētahi o ōna iwi i te wā o tētahi haerenga pakihi ki Hauti Arapia, a, ka mauria mai ki te kāinga. Kua whakahētia ngā mana mō tā rātou whakahaere i te tīmatatanga, me ētahi e kī ana kāore i nui te mahi hei aukati i te horahanga o te huaketo, nāna i whakaoho tūmatanui. Middle East Respiratory Syndrome (Mers) He pēhea te mōrearea o Mers? I roto i ngā pikitia: He pēhea te mahi a Seoul ki te tīmatatanga o te pokapū rongokōrero o Yonhap i pūrongotia e 3,439 ngā tāngata kua whakapā atu pea ki te huaketo kua noho motuhake, he pekenga koi mai i te whika o te Mane e 2,500. Tata ki te 2,500 ngā kura me ngā whare wānanga, ko te nuinga o Seoul me tōna takiwā o Gyeonggi, kua katia. 'Mutunga tere' I kī atu tētahi kōrero mō te tari o Ms Park ki ngā kaipānui i te Wenerei ka hikitia e ia te haere kia taea ai e ia te "tiaki i te haumarutanga tūmatanui, tae atu ki te whakamutu tere ki te MERS". I tāpiritia e ia ka whakaritea anōtia te haere mō "te wā pai rawa atu". I te tuatahi ka haere a Ms Park ki Washington i te Hātarei, i pūrongotia e Yonhap. Ko te tikanga kia tūtaki a ia ki te Perehitini o Amerika, o Te Pākehā i te 16 o Pipiri ki te kōrerorero i ngā take haumarutanga me ngā take ohaoha, tae atu ki Kōrea ki te Raki, e ai ki tētahi kōrero tōmua mai i te Whare Mā. Kua horapa hoki te huaketo ki Haina, kotahi te whakapokenga kua whakaūngia. I te Wenerei, i kī te pokapū rongokōrero o te kāwanatanga o Hainamana i te āhua pūmau o taua tangata, ā, e 75 ngā tāngata i roto i te taratahi kua whakamātauria tōraro mō Mers.

title: E anga ana ngā tauira uni o Gloucestershire ki te whiwhinga 'anti-climax'
summary: Students facing further delays to their graduation ceremonies say they worry it might not feel "special" anymore.
text: Due to lockdown restrictions, people attending university have struggled with changes to their education. Hei wāhanga o aua huringa, me whakaroa e te Whare Wānanga o Te Whare Wānanga o Te Whare Wānanga ngā whiwhinga whiwhinga e tūmanakohia ana kia puta i te tau 2020 tae noa ki te mutunga o te tau 2021. I kī te tauira pukapuka pukapuka a Megu Jones, e 22, he "ārai tōtika" tētahi rōpū topa whakamutunga. I kī tētahi kaiwhakaatu mō te whare wānanga mā te huringa o te rā e āhei ai ngā hākari haumaru ake i Whiringa ā Rangi. Ka kī a ia: "I a mātau ākonga, ahakoa matekiri, e mārama ana ki ngā uauatanga. " E hiahia ana mātou he takahanga ā-tinana tēnei i Cheltenham Racecourse, e ai ki ngā rāhuitanga kāwanatanga e hāngai ana i taua wā." Product design student Sylvia May said: "It might not feel so special because we're celebrating it so long after I have already completed my course. " He tino aroha taku whānau, ā, he matekiri hoki ki a au nā te mea e mōhio ana ahau kei te tatari katoa rātau ki taua mea." I kī te tauira pukapuka pukapuka a Megu Jones, e 22: "He rōpū whakamutunga tā mātou i runga i te topa, ā, i whiwhi mātou i ā mātou tīwhikete i roto i te mēra, ā, nā tēnei i āhua ārai ai tā mātou whakaotinga i te waeine. " Kua kī ētahi o ōku hoa kāore pea rātau e māharahara ki te haere ki te hui whakawhiwhinga tika, kāore rānei rātau i te tino māharahara ki a rātou, e whakaaro ana ahau he whakamā." I kī te tauira pukapuka pukapuka a Joe Kennett: "E mārama ana kei te kōkuhu i te wā e āhua nei kei te panaia atu ngā mea katoa i roto i te oranga ki te wā heke mai nā te mate urutā. " Āe, he mea anō hei tatari, engari i te mutunga o te rā he pai ake ki a au tētahi hui e kite ai au i ōku hoa katoa, ā, kaua e māharahara." I kī te perehitini o te Kotahitanga o ngā Ākonga o te whare wānanga, a Luc Brown, e 22: "Mō te nuinga o ngā ākonga e hari ana mātou ki te whakahoki i te wā e whiwhi ana mātou i taua wā hei whakanui i te mutunga. " E tino hiahia ana ngā ākonga ki te mahi tika me ō rātou whānau me ō rātou hoa i te huarahi e tika ana." Whāia a BBC West i Facebook, Twitter me Instagram. Tukuna ō whakaaro pūrākau ki: bristol@bbc.co.uk Ngā Hononga Ipurangi Pātahi Te Whare Wānanga o Te Whare Wānanga o Te Whare Wānanga o Te Whare Wānanga

title: Ko te tangata i te hōhipera i muri i te whakaekenga o te tiriti o Frankley
summary: Kei te hōhipera tētahi tangata 21 tau me ngā whara nui i muri i te okanga.
text: I whakatūria a ia ki New Street i te takiwā o Frankley o Birmingham tata ki te 20:00 BST i te Tūtira, ka kī ngā Pirihimana o West Midlands. I kī ngā āpiha i whaia ia e ētahi atu tāngata tokotoru, tae atu ki tētahi i runga paihikara, i mua i te okanga. Kai roto te tūkino i te hōhipera, ā, kei te mahi pirihimana ki te whakatū i ngā mahi i mua i te whakaekenga. Kua tono ngā āpiha ki tētahi tangata whai whakarākeitanga C KKK o te rohe kia haere mai ki mua. Whāia a BBC West Midlands i Facebook, i Twitter, me te waitohu mō ngā whakahōutanga rongokōrero paetata hāngai tonu ki tō waea.

title: Zamfara: Kei te kino haere te tūkinotanga o te tūkinotanga i Naria?
summary: Tērā te nui o te āwangawanga i te raki o Naria mo te taumata o te tāhaetanga me te kākā i te āhua o Zamfara.
text: Nā te tīma Reality CheckBBC News I roto i tētahi ataata o nā noa nei, kua puta atu te kaipānui paetata o Kadaria, ki te kāwanatanga mō tāna e kī ana he pātōtō i te tūpāpaku i reira. "I ia rā ka tanumia e mātau i waenganui i te 30, 40 me te 50 tāngata," tana kī i roto i te ataata, i pāohotia tuatahitia i runga i te pouaka whakaata, kātahi ka tiria whānuitia i runga i te pāpāho pāpori. I kī a ia he nui ake ngā tūpāpaku i tū i Borno, i ngā kāwanatanga o Aramaawa me Yobe, i ngā wāhi i te raki ki te rāwhiti o Naria e pāngia ana e ngā toa o te Māori o Te Rūnanga o Te Rū He aha hoki ngā mea e haere ana i Zamfara, ā, kei te piki haere ngā taumata tutu? Kua roa a Zamfara e anga ana ki ngā raruraru ki ngā rōpū patu e tāhae ana i ngā kararehe, te kākā hei utu me te whakaeke i ngā hapori, nāna i āki ētahi tāngata paetata ki te whakatū i ngā rōpū whakatūpato. Nō nā tata nei, kua tupu te tipu o ngā mahi kari ōpaki i tēnei rohe rangatira kohuke, nāna i kawe mai ngā tāngata mai i waho o te kāwanatanga, e whakakī ana anō i te tāpepe. I te tīmatanga o Aperira, ka urupare te kāwanatanga ki ngā māharahara mo te nui haere o ngā taumata tutu, ka whakatārewatia ngā mahi kari kari katoa i te kāwanatanga, me te hora i ētahi atu hōia ki taua rohe. Ko te Pūaroturuki Haumarutanga o Nigeria, i hangaia e te Kaunihera o Washington mō ngā Whanaungatanga Tawahi (CFR), e aroturuki ana i ngā taumata tutu mā te whakahiato i ngā pūrongo pāpāho paetata. E whakamiramira ana tēnei i te nui o te tūpāpaku i roto i ngā marama tata nei. E ai ki ēnei whika, mai i te tīmatanga o te tau 2019, e 262 ngā mate ā-iwi. I te katoa o te 2018 e 288, ā, mō te 2017, ko te whika ko te 52. E tohu ana hoki te raraunga CFR i te pikinga koi o te patunga o ngā mema o ngā rōpū patu - arā ko ngā tāhae, ngā kaitiaki me ētahi atu e pā ana ki ngā mahi hara. Heoi anō, kāore te maha o ngā mate i ia rā i te tiketike ki te 30 ki te 50 i kīia e Kadaria, o Te Wānanga. Me te 262 nga mate a-iwi i roto i nga ra tuatahi 100 neke atu ranei o tenei tau, kei waenga i te rua me te toru nga mate i ia ra - ahakoa ko nga raraunga CFR e tohu ana kei te piki haere tenei tau. Mā te whakataurite i a Zamfara ki ētahi atu kāwanatanga i te raki i roto i tana ataata, i kī hoki a Ms Anganui kua nui ake te taikaha o Zamfara i ngā tūnga o te raki-rāwhiti i hohe ai a Te Rūnanga o Te Raki. I te tīmatanga o Poutāpeta ki te 6 o Āperira, e 169 ngā mate i Zamfara e ai ki te CFR - kua whakaritea ki te 28 i te Kāwanatanga o Borno me te 14 i Adamawa. Kāore he āhuatanga pērā i tuhia mai i Yobe. Nā reira e tika ana a Ms Anganui he tino teitei ake ngā mate o mua tata nei i Zamfara i ērā atu kōrero. Ko te whakapeka o te maha o ngā tūpāpaku i Borno, i Adamawa me Yobe, ko te nuinga o te wā i ngaro ai te nuinga o to rātau rohe i te rohe mai i te tau 2015. Ētahi atu kōrero mō Zamfara: Pūtake: Tomokanga Raraunga o Nigeria, me ētahi atu He aha tāu e hiahia ana kia tūhuratia e te Taki Ao Rangirua? Whakapā mai Pānuitia ētahi atu mea mai i Reality Check Whāia mātou i Twitter

title: Ngā whare herehere o Kōrea ki te Raki: He pēhea te kaha o ngā herenga?
summary: Kaore e kore e pōhēhētia e Kōria ki te Raki ōna herehere.
text: Nā Stephen EvansSeoul Correspondent, BBC News Ina hopukina ngā tauhou, ka whiua rātou ki te mahi uaua, ā, koia tonu tērā - i pūhuitia e te tukinotanga nui o te taratahitanga me te kore āwhina. E mōhio ana te AO ki tētahi herehere o mua i pakaru ā-hinengaro i tana manaakitanga. He maha nga tau i muri mai, ka noho māuiui rawa a ia ki te kōrero ngāwari noa iho. Engari ko ētahi kua whakaahua taipitopito i o rātau wheako. I Tīma 2012, i whakahaua e Kōria ki te Raki te mihinare o Kenneth Bae ki ngā mahi "whakahē ki te whenua". He maha ngā wā i haere ai ia ki te whenua, engari i tū i tēnei wā, ā, ka kitea he puku mārō me ngā taonga Karaitiana. Mō tēnei "hara", i whiua ia kia 15 tau te mahi uaua, ā, i tukua anake i te wā i tino kino ai tōna hauora - pērā tonu ki te āhua nei i pā mai ki te kēhi o Otto Warmbier o nāianei. I muri i tana tukunga, ka tuhituhi a Tēnā Bae i tētahi pukapuka, "Kāore i Warewaretia: Te Pūrākau Pono o Taku Hereheretanga i Kōrea ki te Raki" i kī ai ia i uiuia ia mai i te 08:00 i te ata tae noa ki te 22:00, 23:00 rānei i te pō i ia rā mō ngā wiki tuatahi e whā o tōna hereheretanga. I raro i tēnei pēhanga, ka tuhia e ia ngā whārangi whākinga rau i tonoa e ana kaiuiui. I kī a Tēnā Bae ka mahi a ia i ngā rā e ono i te wiki i runga i tētahi pāmu, "e mau ana i te toka, e hāpara ana i te waro". Ko tana mahi o ia rā, ko te oho i te 06:00, te kai parakuihi, te inoi, kātahi ka mauria ki te mahi uaua mai i te 08:00 ki te 18:00. I raro i tēnei kāwanatanga, he nui te taumaha i ngaro i a ia - e 60lbs (27kg) i roto i ngā rā e 735 o tōna whakarautanga. I te hekenga o tōna taumahatanga, ka nui haere tōna hauora, ā, ka auau te mau i a ia mō te rongoā rongoā. I tua atu i te mate ā-tinana, tērā te mamae ā-hinengaro, te āhua o te mokemoke. I kī a ia ka kī tonu tētahi kaiuiui ki a ia: "Kaore tētahi tangata e maumahara ana ki a koe. Kua warewaretia koe e te iwi, e to kāwanatanga. Kāore koe e hoki ki te kāinga ākuanei. Ka noho koe ki konei mo te 15 tau. Ka 60 tau koe i mua i tō hokinga ki te kāinga". Ka kī a ia: "I pēnei ahau i te ngārara, e tāwhiti ana i roto i te tukutuku pūngāwerewere. I ia wā ka neke ahau ka pōrearea, kāore he huarahi ki waho." E kī ana a ia, ā muri ake, i muri i te mutunga o te marama o te uiuitanga, ka whakaaetia ia kia kite i ngā īmēra me ngā karere mai i ngā tāngata i te kāinga (ahakoa he whakamarietanga, he whakamamae pea tēnei). Te āhua nei kua whakaaetia he paipera ki a ia. I a ia e tino mate ana, te āhua nei ka māharahara nga mana o Kōria ki te Raki tērā pea ka mate a ia, me ngā uauatanga whakawhanaunga katoa ka puta mai. Na reira i whakaritea ai e rātau tana tukunga - e ai ki te āhua nei i pā mai pea ki te kēhi o Otto Warmbier. Keria o rātau ake urupa he tangata whenua Amerika a Kenneth Bae nō Kōrea ki te Tonga, ā, ko te kōrero Koreana. I kī a ia i whakaaro a ia i tana mahinga hei herehere me tōna ake pūtau, tae atu ki te moenga me te whare paku, ehara i te uaua ki tērā mō ngā Kōria ki te Raki i puritia i roto i te huānga nui o ngā puni mō te hara noa, mō te whakahē rānei. Tērā pea kei te tika a ia ki tēnei. Kua whakaahuatia e Amnesty International nga puni herehere he pākaha i tua atu i te manawanui. "E hia rau mano tāngata - tae atu ki ngā tamariki - e herea ana i roto i ngā puni whare herehere tōrangapū me ētahi atu whare herehere i Kōrea ki te Raki," e kī ana. "He tokomaha o ērā kāore anō kia mahi i tētahi hara, engari he mema whānau noa iho nō te hunga e whakaaro ana he hara tōrangapū nui". Ka tātaritia e te Whakawāteatanga ngā pikitia ā-rangi o ngā puni, ā, e kī ana e toru ngā wā o te rahi o Washington DC, e 20,000 ngā herehere. E ai ki tētahi mana o mua i kōrerotia e ia, ka whakahaua ngā taurewa ki te keri i o rātau ake urupa, ā, ka whakamahia te hīkaka hei whiu, kātahi ka ngaro atu ngā tūpāpaku. Kāore a Kenneth Bae e kī ana i whakamamaetia ā-tinana, i patua rānei. Ko tōna hekenga o te hauora nā te kaha o te kāwanatanga o te whare herehere i whakararuraru i tōna mate huka, te pēhanga toto tiketike me te mate tākihi. Tērā pea, kāore rānei te take o Otto Warmbier. Engari he pātai e tino pātai ana ngā mana o Te Hononga o Amerika: I pēhea a ia i mutu ai i roto i te piko? He aha hoki i pau ai te tau ki te kōrero a Kōria ki te Raki ki tētahi whenua o waho? Mehemea nā tētahi momo whakaekenga ā-tinana, tērā pea he pēhanga tōrangapū ki a Perehitini Donald Trump kia kaha ake ki te kāwanatanga i Ūngia. Tērā anō tētahi pātai whakamīharo: e whakaawe ana ngā herehere i o rātau herehere? Ko te Stockholm Syndrome ina tae mai te taumaha ki te tāutu ki te iwi e pupuri ana i a ia, engari he Stockholm Syndrome whakamuri? I kitea e Kenneth Bae e hiahia ana kaihopu ki te ora i te Uru. I hiahia rātau ki te mōhio e hia te utu o te whare, ā, mehemea he tokomaha tonu ngā tāngata e whai ana i tō rātou ake kāinga me tō rātou motokā. "I te tīmatanga, he uaua, engari nā te mea e kōrero ana ahau i te reo i taea ai e au te whakawhitiwhiti," tana kī ā muri ake, i muri i tana whakawāteatanga. I korerotia ki ngā Kōria ki te Raki he oranga kino i Amerika i noho ai te 99% o ngā tāngata i roto i te rawakore. "I kī atu ahau ki a rātau ko te nuinga o ngā tāngata he whare me tētahi motokā, a, ka mea rātau: 'E kore e tika tēnā'."

title: Coronavirus: Morning update as £1bn pledged to help pupils catch up
summary: Anei ngā mea e rima e hiahia ana koe ki te mōhio mō te pakarutanga o te coronavirus i tēnei ata Paraire. Ka whai whakahōu anō mātou māu i te 18:00 BST.
text: 1. £1bn fund to help pupils catch up The prime minister has pledged £1bn to help schoolchildren in England affected by the coronavirus lockdown. Kua katia ngā kura ki ngā tauira katoa mai i mua i te wehenga o te Aranga - ā, e whakaarotia ana kāore e hoki mai te nuinga tae noa ki muri i ngā hararei raumati. Ko te tikanga o te pūtea ka taea e ngā tauira tino tūkino te uru ki ngā kaiako, ā, kua tohaina he moni ki ngā kura tuatahi me ngā kura tuarua hei utu i te akoranga takitahi, rōpū rānei. 2. Ko ngā tāngata Āhia ki te Tonga 'tērā pea ka mate i te Covid-19 i te hōhipera' Kua kitea e tētahi rangahau e pā ana ki ngā whare wānanga me ngā tinana hauora puta noa i te UK ko ngā tāngata whai papamuri Āhia ki te Tonga te tino mate i te Covid-19 i muri i te whakaaetanga ki te hōhipera. I tirohia e te rangahau e tata ana ki te 35,000 ngā tūroro i ngā hōhipera e 260 i Ingarangi, ā, i kitea ko ngā tāngata o te iwi o Āhia ki te Tonga, e 20% kē atu te mate i te tāngata mā. E huatau ana te mātauranga ko tētahi o ngā take mō tēnei ko te taumata tiketike o te mate huka i waenganui i ngā tāngata o taua rōpū iwi. 3. Ka āwhina ngā taonga DIY ki te whakarewa i ngā hokohoko hokohoko UK He whakaoranga wāhanga mō ngā hokonga hokohoko UK i Mei, ahakoa kei te whakaritea ngā tikanga raka. I whakarewaina ngā hoko e te 42% te pikinga i ngā toa taonga kāinga i te wā i whakaaetia kia whakatuwhera anō ngā toa DIY me ngā pokapū māra. E 12% te pikinga o te nui o ngā taonga i hokona i Mei, i whakaritea ki ngā hinganga pūkete i kitea i Aperira, te kī a te Office for National Statistics. I heke tonu nga hoko i te 13.1% i te Hui-tanguru, i mua i te marama o te tauine o te pānga o te mate coronavirus. Motuhake, i kī te Tari mō ngā Tatauranga ā-Motu i pā te nama kāwanatanga ki tētahi pūkete ā-marama o te £55.2bn i Me. 4. Hoki ki 'te Wuhan o te Uru' Kua hoki mai te kaipānui o Roma o TE HAU, a Mark Lowen, ki Lombardy, te rohe Itari i mau i te taumaha o te pakarutanga o te coronavirus o te whenua. Kua tapaina te rohe ko "te Wuhan o te Uru" i muri i te taone Hainamana i takea mai ai te huaketo. 5. Ka tūao te tamāhine i te kāinga tiaki kia kite i tōna pāpā o Nina Ambrose, mai i Writtle i Essex, i te nuinga o te wā e mahi ana i tētahi kamupene whakanao, engari i muri i tana whakawāteatanga i tana mahi, ka tīmata ia ki te tūao i te kāinga tiaki e noho ana tōna pāpā. She was unable to see her dad Roger, 76, for the first five weeks of lockdown after moved into a care home in January. Mai i tērā wā e haere ana a ia ki te kāinga e toru, e whā rānei ngā wā i te wiki ki te whakarite ngohe. Tīkina he kōrero coronavirus roa ake mai i te BBC i tō pouakaroto, ia ata o te wiki, mā te waitohu ki konei. Kaua hoki e wareware... ... Ka taea e koe te kite e hia ngā kēhi coronavirus kei tō rohe mā te pāwhiri i konei. He mōhiohio anō, he tohutohu me ngā kaiārahi kei tā mātou whārangi coronavirus, ā, ka taea e koe te tiki i ngā whakahōutanga hōu rawa i tā mātou whārangi ora. He aha ō pātai mō te coronavirus? I ētahi wā, ka whakaputaina tō pātai, e whakaatu ana i tō ingoa, pakeke me tō tauwāhi i a koe e whakarato ana, ki te kore koe e kōrero kē. E kore rawa ō taipitopito hoapā e whakaputaina. Me mātua whakarite kua pānui koe i ā mātou ture me ngā tikanga me te kaupapahere tūmataitinga. Whakamahia tēnei puka hei pātai i tō pātai: Ō mōhiohio whakapā Kua neke atu i te 16 tau te pakeke E whakaae ana ahau ki ngā Ture Ratonga Kei te pupuri te BBC i te mana ki te tīpako mai i ēnei koha i runga anō i ngā whakaritenga ētita, ā, e herea ana ki ngā ture me ngā tikanga tuihono me ngā tohutohu ētita o TE HAU. Mō ētahi atu mōhiohio e pā ana ki te whakahaere a te BBC i ō raraunga whaiaro, tirohia i konei. Mēnā kei te pānui koe i tēnei whārangi, ā, kāore koe e kite i te puka, me toro koe ki te putanga pūkoro o te paetukutuku BBC ki te tuku i tō pātai, ki te tuku rānei mā te īmēra ki YourQuestions@bbc.co.uk. Tēnā whakaurua tō ingoa, pakeke me tō tauwāhi ki ngā pātai ka tukuna e koe.

title: E whakahē ana a Kōria ki te Tonga e whakahau ana kia haere tonu te whakarerenga o te perehitini
summary: Tekau mano nga kaiwhakahaere kua huihui ki Seoul mo te whā wiki i roto i te haupae i a rātau e tono tonu ana kia tū a Perehitini Park Geun-hye.
text: Ka waiatatia e nga kaiwhakahaere "Park Geun-Hye resign" i a rātau e poipoi ana i ngā kānara me ngā kāri i runga ake i o rātau mahunga. E whakapaea ana a Ms Park ki te whakaae i tōna hoa, a Choi Soon-sil, ki te rāweke i te hiko mai i muri i ngā tirohanga. E rua nga wā i whakapārewa ai te perehitini i runga i te pouaka whakaata ā-motu, engari i tēnei wā ka ātete i ngā karanga kia whakarerea. Ahakoa tēnei e mātakitaki ana a Kōria ki te Tonga i ngā whakahēnga nui rawa mai i ngā whakaaturanga ā-kāwanatanga o nga tau kotahi mano e waru tekau mā rua. I kī ngā kaiwhakahaere e 500,000 ngā tāngata i haere ki te huihuinga kānara i te pūmatua i tēnei mutunga wiki, nāna i whakatū nga tiriti mo te whā o nga Hātarei. Na nga pirihimana i whakaheke rawa te whika. I kī atu a Lee Won-cheol, tētahi tohunga IT 48 tau, ki a Agence France-Presse: "He tangata hara a ia. Me pēhea tātau e whai ai i te tangata hara hei perehitini mo tātau? Me hīkoi a ia ki raro." I whakapārewa a Ms Park, nāna te whakatauranga whakaaetanga i heke ki te 5%, i te tīmatanga o tēnei marama mō te whakatakoto "i te whakapono nui rawa ki tētahi pātahitanga whaiaro", ā, kua tautohe kia mahi tahi i roto i tētahi tūhuratanga whai mana ki te heitara. E tūmanakotia ana kia kawea mai e nga rōia he utu ki a Ms Choi, tae atu ki ngā kaiawhina perehitini tokorua o mua, i te Rātapu. I hopukina a ia i te tīmatanga o tēnei marama. E whakapaea ana a Ms Choi ki te ngana ki te whakaputa moni nui mai i ngā kamupene Kōria ki te Tonga, ā, e whakapae ana ki te whakamahi i tōna whakahoahoa ki a Ms Park ki te tono i ngā koha pakihi mō tētahi pūtea kore hua i whakahaeretia e ia.

title: I puta te rangatira pirihimana o Nazir Afzal ki te puta i te Wā Pātai
summary: I whakarerea e te upoko o te tinana ā iwi mō ngā komihana pirihimana kia puta ai i te Wā Pātai a TE AO i muri i te whakaekenga o Manatāneta.
text: I tohutohutia te rangatira nui o te Rōpū Pirihimana me ngā Komihana Hara (APCC) o Nazir Afzal kia kaua e mahi pēnā e te poari o te rōpū whakahaere. Nā ngā take tautohetohe tērā pea ka whakaarahia i runga i te whakaaturanga. Engari i whakararo a Tēnā Afzal, a, ka puta mai i runga i te kaupapa i te 25 o Me. I kī te APCC: "I kī atu a Nazir ki te poari e hiahia ana ia ki te haere ki te Wā Pātai ki te kōrerorero i ngā mahi o mua tata nei i Manchester. " Na te poari, i hangaia e nga rōpū katoa, i tohutohu kia kore e tika kia pēnā ia, i tukuna te maha o ngā take tautohetohe e pā ana ki te mahi pirihimana e taea te whakaara ake i roto i te kōrero ki ngā kaipōrangapū e puta ana, i te wā hoki o te purdah. "I whakarerea e ia tana tūranga kia puta ai tēnei āhua. E mihi ana mātau ki a ia mo tana ratonga i tōna tau i te APCC." I uru a Tēnā Afzal ki te APCC i tērā tau. I kī te pāhonotanga i hainatia e Tēnā Afzal tētahi kirimana e whakaū ana kāore a ia e mahi pāpāho me te kore whakaaetanga a te poari. He mea nui tēnei nā te mea he tōrangapū te APCC, ā, i rāhuitia te tūranga o te rangatira nui, e kī ana. Ka tūtohu a Tēnā Afzal: "Nā ngā waea pāpāho e whakaū ana ahau kua tukua ahau hei Rangatira Nui o nga pirihimana o te whenua me nga komihana hara. Kāore au i te kōrero i tētahi mea tūmatanui." Ko ngā Komihana Pirihimana me ngā Komihana Hara i Whakaurua ki Ingarangi me Uēra i te tau 2012, me mātua whakauru: Pūtake: Te Pānga o ngā Komihana Pirihimana me ngā Komihana Hara, ko Tēnā Afzal tētahi rōia matua o te Karauna mō te raki o Ingarangi. I pānuitia ka hīpae a ia i Mati 2015. He maha nga mahi kōtaha tiketike i ārahitia e ia, tae atu ki te whakamātautau whakapaipai o Rochdale. I whakawhiwhia ki a ia he OBE i te tau 2004 mō ngā ratonga ki te ture me te hapori paetata, Tikina ngā rongo mai i te BBC i tō pouakaroto, ia ata o te wiki

title: Nazanin Zaghari-Ratcliffe: E karanga ana te PM ki tōna tukunga
summary: Kua karangatia e te pirimia te tuku i te kaimahi aroha i hereheretia, o Nazanin Zaghari-Ratcliffe, e kī ana a Downing Street.
text: I tūtaki a Ēnā Me ki te perehitini o Ārepa mō ngā kōrero i nga Iwi o te Hononga o te Ao i Niu Ioka, i te Tūtira. Ka kī atu a Mrs Me ki a Mīharo Rūhia he "āwangawanga nui" tōna mo te hereheretanga o Mrs Zaghari-Ratcliffe. I hereheretia te Ingarangi-Ārepa mo te rima tau i te tau 2016 i muri i tana whakawāteatanga ki te tūtei, e whakakāhore ana a ia. I hui kanohi tuatahi hoki te Hēkeretari ā-Rohe o Jeremy Hunt ki te minita ā-rohe o Irana, o Javad Zarif. "I pēhi anō ahau mo te tuku tere o Nazanin - e tika ana kia hoki mai a ia ki te kāinga me tōna whānau," te kī a Tēnā Hunt i roto i tētahi kōrero. I kī a ia "e kore e whakaaetia kia tautāwhi noa iho i te hunga harakore i te utu o te mamae tino nui o te tangata". I hopukina a Ms Zaghari-Ratcliffe i te taunga rererangi o Tehran i Aperira 2016 i muri i tana haerenga ki tōna whānau i te hararei. I nga wā katoa e mau tonu ana a ia ko te haerenga ki te whakamōhio atu i tana tamāhine ko Gabriella ki ōna whanaunga. Kātahi anō ka huihuia anō te whaea o te kotahi mai i Hampstead, ki te raki o Rāwāhi, ki tana tamāhine e whā tau i te wā o te tukunga rangitahi e toru rā. Engari mai i tana hokinga ki te whare herehere, i muri i te whakakāhoretanga o tana tono mo tētahi tuku roa, he maha nga whakaekenga ohorere i pāngia e ia. I a ia e kōrero ana ki te Reo Irirangi 4 i te Wenerei, ka kī te tāne a Mrs Zaghari-Ratcliffe, a Rārangi, ehara i te kōwhiringa. "He marino ake a ia i a ia i mua," tana kī atu ki te hōtaka o Tēnei Rā. I whakaahuatia e ia "te ohorere o te tuku ki waho, engari ka whakahokia mai ki roto, he tino uaua mo te wiki, neke atu rānei". Engari i tāpiri mai a ia: "Kua tino marino ngā mea, ā, ko te tūmanako noa iho ka taea e te kāwanatanga te wetemaukati i tētahi mea." I pōhiritia e Labour MP Tulip Siddiq te raweke a te pirimia, e kī ana kua "puta tōna wahanga i te reinga, i muri hoki".

title: Stowaway Brazilian gecko hitches eke i roto i te pouaka merengi
summary: Kua tau mai tētahi mokomoko mai i Paratira ki te kāinga o Aiarangi ki te Raki o Aghadowey i muri i te ekenga i roto i tētahi pouaka merengi.
text: I kitea e ngā kaimahi i te kaihoko hua rākau o Poihākena B Scott te moko Moorish, e karangatia ana ko Ernie, i a ia e horoi ana i te Mane. I kī te kaiwhakahaere pakihi a Pita Scott i tae mai a Ernie i roto i tētahi pouaka merengi Pārihi. Ināianei kua noho te gecko inihi roa ki tētahi whare kararehe i Portrush pātata. I kī atu a Tēnā Scott ki a Mark Patterson Show o Te Reo Irirangi o Te T 'Kai ngārara' "Kotahi te ariā i whakatakotoria tana hēki ki roto i te pouaka merengi, ā, ka paopao ia i tētahi wā i runga i te Moana Atarangi," tana kī. I kī a ia i muri i tētahi haerenga atahanga 5,500 maero, kua "haere a Ernie ki tētahi kāinga pai." "Kei te noho a ia i roto i tētahi kura wee, e kai ana i ngā iro, e noho ana i tōna oranga tino pai," te tāpiri mai a Tēnā Scott. Ko ngā geckos Moorish, e mōhiotia ana hoki ko te crocodile, ko te geckos pakitara rānei, he taketake nō te rohe Māuirangi ki te uru o Uropi me Āwherika ki te Raki, engari kua whakaurua whānuitia ki Amerika me Āhia. Ka taea e ngā pakeke pakeke te tae atu ki te 15cm (6in) te roa.

title: Arthur Wharton: Tohu mō te whutupōro pango tuatahi
summary: Kua whakakitea he tohu kikorangi i Greater Manchester hei whakahonore i te kaiwhutupōro ngaio pango tuatahi.
text: Ko ngā whakamiramira mahi a Arthur Wharton hei kaitiaki tauwhāinga i tae ki te haurua whakamutunga o te Kapu FA me Preston North End. I tākaro hoki a ia mō ngā Stalybridge Rovers me Ashton North End kua kore ināianei. Ko te tohu, i te whenua o Curzon Ashton FC, e mōhio ana ki te pānga o Arthur ki te tākaro i taua rohe. I whānau ia i Gold Coast, e mōhiotia ana ināianei ko Ghana, i te tau 1865, ka neke ia ki te raki-rāwhiti o Ingarangi i te tau 1884, e 19 ona tau. I te tau 1886 ka noho ia hei toa 100 mita ā-motu o te Amateur Athletics Association, ā, kotahi tau i muri mai ka whakatūria e ia he wā pūkete mō te paihikara i waenganui i Preston me Blackburn. Ko te toa tupeka i tiimata tana mahi whutupaoro i Darlington FC, me nga takikupu i nga karapu tae atu ki Preston North End, Sheffield United, Rotherham Town me Stockport County. I tōna wā i Greater Manchester, i whakahaere hoki ia i tētahi toa tupeka i Old Street i Ashton-under-Lyne. I haere a ia i te whutupōro i te tau 1902, a, ka mate i te tau 1930. I kī te Kaikaunihera o Dawson Lane, mai i te Kaunihera o Tameside: "He maha nga tau i noho ai ngā kaitākaro pango i te ngākau o te whutupōro, mai i ngā tāngata pēnei i a Pele rāua ko Eusebio ki ngā whetū o nāianei pērā i a Rio Ferdinand me Mario Balotelli. " He mea whakamīharo te whakaaro i tīmata katoa ki a Arthur Wharton, nāna i tākaro i Tameside. "He tangata tino hītori a Arthur i roto i te kēmu, ā, e koa ana ahau kei te whakamaumahara te kaunihera i tana mahi ki tētahi tohu kikorangi." I te tau 2003, i whakaurua a Arthur ki te Hall of Fame o te Whutupaoro Ingarihi. I te wā o Hune, ka whakaaturia tētahi whakapakoko o Arthur, i whakaaturia ki te perehitini o TE WHK, a Sepp Blatter, i te tari matua o te rōpū whakahaere.

title: Te tāhae whare taonga koura o Blenheim Palace: £100k utu i tukuna
summary: E tukuna ana he utu £100,000 mo te hokinga haumaru o tētahi whare taonga koura mārō i tāhaetia i te Whare o Blenheim.
text: Kei te kimi tonu ngā kaitohutohu i te mahi toi, e $6m (£4.8m), i tāhaetia i roto i tētahi poho i te kāinga rangatira i Oxfordshire i te 14 o Mahuru. I kī te kamupene inihua o te whare kōti o Fine Art Specie Adjusters (FASA) ka taea te utu tae atu ki te £100,000 hei utu. Tokorua nga tāngata i hopukina i runga i te whakapae i te tāhaetanga. I kī a Piripi Austin mai i FANA: "Ko te utu tae atu ki te £100,000, ā, ko ngā whakaritenga nā te whakaaetanga a te kamupene inihua, kei roto ko te hokinga haumaru e ahu ana ki te hopu." I whakapeka te Whare o Blenheim ki te kōrero mo te utu. Kua tukua hoki e nga Pirihimana o Thames Valley ngā atahanga C KKK o tētahi o ngā motokā e rua i whakaarotia kua uru ki te tāhaetanga. I kī te tōpana kua tāruatia e te Volkswagen Golf R kikorangi o te moana, ā, "kei te tino mīharo tonu". E māhorahora ana ki ngā kaihīkoi, i te takiwā o Woodstock i te pō o te tāhaetanga, ki te arotake i ā rātou whakarākeitanga pīhono-kāmera. I kī a Det Insp Steven Jones: "Kua whakamōhiotia mātou he utu nui e tukuna ana e ngā inihua mō te hokinga haumaru o te āhuatanga e herea ana e ngā here tauwhāiti."

title: Tapahi tapawhā: 'Mau hīpoki hei pare i ngā tāngata pēnei i a au'
summary: Kua tohe tētahi wahine i ngaro ōna waewae me ōna ringa i muri i te kirimana i te Covid-19 me te sepsis i ngā tāngata kia tawhiti me te mau hīpoki hei "tiaki i ngā tāngata pēnei i a au".
text: I te whakaora a Caroline Coster, 58, mai i Bedford, i te coronavirus i te wā i whakawhanakehia e ia te sepsis, ā, i tapahia e ia te tapahi tapawhā. Ka kī a ia: "Kua whakahekea e au te āraitanga nā te sepsis, kāore aku ārai mate ki a Covid, ka taea e au te tiki anō." Ka tono te kaiako ki ngā tāngata kia "āta whakaaro koa ki te coronavirus". I a ia e whakaora ana i te Covid-19 ka whakawhanake te whaea o te tokorua i te sepsis, he tauhohenga tino nui ki te whakapokenga e whakaweto ai nga okana nui. E rua ngā wā i mate ai a ia i roto i te pōhēhētanga ā-rongoā i te Hōhipera o Bedford. I ora a ia, engari kua tangohia ōna ringa me ōna waewae i te toto, a, me tapahia. I kī a Mrs Coster i mua i tana pāngia e te coronavirus e "haere ana ia i ia rā". "Please wear a mask, please keep your distance, please take Covid-19 seriously," she said "It's an awful illness.. tērā pea ka whati i a au, engari kāore." I hoatu takoha a Mrs Coster ki tana GP me ngā kaimahi i ngā hōhipera i whakamahia ai ia, ā, i tāpiri mai ka whakaritea e ia "kia tino ora". "Kāore anō ahau kia rerekē i te ngaronga o ōku ringa me ōku waewae," tana kī. Ka haere tonu a ia ki te kohi moni mō tētahi aroha o Kēnia, ā, e hiahia ana ia ki te rēhita i tana kurī hei kurī haumanu kia taea ai e ia te whakahoki i a ia ki tōna kura o mua ki te hoatu i ngā tauira "he tirohanga rerekē ki ngā rerekētanga". Kimihia te Rongokōrero o TE Rāwhiti o Ingarangi i Facebook, Instagram me Twitter. Mēnā he huatau pūrākau tāu, īmēra eastofenglandnews@bbc.co.uk

title: Ko te tangata nāna i rītaha te peita o te Taiwhanga ā-Motu 'i rongo i ngā reo'
summary: I tūkinotia e tētahi tangata tētahi peita £24m i te Taiwhanga o te Motu nā te mea i kī atu tētahi reo i roto i tōna māhunga ki a ia, kua rongo te kōti.
text: I rītahatia e Keith Gregory, e 63, tētahi hanga X ki roto i te mahi toi a Thomas Gainsborough, The Morning Walk, mā te whakamahi i te moka wiri. I whakarerea e Tēnā Gregory, kāore he wāhitau pūmau, i tētahi hōhipera hinengaro i ngā marama i mua i te whakaekenga i te 18 o Poutāpeta, ka rongo te hūri o te Kōti Karauna o Southwark. I tautohe a ia kia kaua e hara i runga i te pōrangi ki te whakapae i te tūkinotanga hara e £10,000. E kī ana ngā rōia e hara ana a Tēnā Gregory, mai i Kettering i Northamptonshire, nā te mea i mōhio ia he hē tana mahi. I rongo te kōti i te tōnga atu o nga tautīaki haumarutanga i a Tēnā Gregory i te pikitia, ka hamama a ia kātahi anō ka tukua mai i te whare herehere, a, ka whakaoho i te pōma. I whakamanamana hoki a ia mo te aro atu ki a ia i nga kaiwhakaatu i te whare taonga, kei Trafalgar Square, ka rongo te hūri. I korerotia ki te kōti ka taea e ia te utu te tūkinotanga nā te mea ko tōna pāpā te karapu whutupōro o Queens Park Rangers. 'Ka kitea koe e te whānau' i kī atu a Nicholas Dunham ki te Kōti Karauna o Southwark: "Mai i te mahi i raro a Mr Gregory i te tiaki hinengaro, ā, kua kitea he mate hinengaro, tērā pea he schizophrenia paranoid. " I kī a ia i a ia e tū ana i te Taiwhanga o te Motu, ka rongo ia i tētahi reo e kī ana ki a ia 'hoatu he tohu ki runga i te peita, ā, ka kitea koe e tō whānau'. "Ko tāna i kōrero ai i taua wā me āna kōrero i muri iho, ka whakamāramatia e ia he hē tana mahi." E whakapono ana a Tēnā Gregory ka patua ia e tētahi tangata, ā, ka rongo te kōti. I whakaaetia a ia ki tētahi hōhipera hinengaro i Whiringahora 2016, engari i whakawāteatia, a, he maha nga marama i mua i te whakaekenga, ka rongo te hūri. I kī a Larry Keith, mai i te Taiwhanga o te Motu, neke atu i te 80 haora te roa o ngā tohunga whakaora ki te whakatika i te peita, e hoki ana ki te tau 1785. I tāpiritia e ia e kore e taea te huna katoa i ngā tohu rītaha, ā, kua hinga te uara o te pikitia. Ka haere tonu te whakamātautau.

title: Ka haere a Kanye West ki Oxford: Ko ana kīanga tino pai
summary: Kua kī atu a Kanye West ki ngā ākonga o te Whare Wānanga o Oxford e karanga ana te Perehitini o Amerika i tana waea kāinga - i roto i tētahi whaikōrero roa, pōhēhē hoki.
text: I haere te kaiwaiata o Amerika ki te Whare Taonga o te Hītori Māori o te taone i runga i te tono a tētahi rōpū ākonga. Ahakoa i mihia e te oati tū, kāore a ia i te mīharo, e ai ki te nūpepa ākonga takitahi o Versa, ko tōna kaiwhakatika ko Ruth McLean, 21, tētahi o ngā ākonga e 300 i roto i te hōro. "He mea whakamīharo tana kore kōrero mō te pūoro," tana kī. "Ko te nuinga o te kōrero i takahuri i waenganui i te toi, te whakaaro me te tōrangapū, ā, e whakaaro ana ahau kāore ia e kite i te wehenga i waenganui i aua ao. " Ko ētahi o ngā mea i kōrerotia e ia he pēhea anake te āheitanga o te hunga taonga ki te ātaahua i roto i te āhua o te rangatiratanga, i huatau mai he rārangi take tōrangapū tino pakū - e huatau mai ana ki a au ētahi kaupapa i tua atu i te pūoro e haere mai ana ā muri ake nei. "E hiahia ana ahau ki te kite i te wāhi e mau ai ia i ēnei whakaaro." Hei hoatu ki a koe he tāwara o te whaikōrero a te whetū, anei ngā whakamiramira e rima a Ruth: I whakaahuatia e Aled Jones, he tauira ture 22 tau i te whare wānanga, te kōrero he "tino rangirua, mātauranga hoki". "He 45 meneti te roa o te māharahara, he whaikōrero mō te rerehua, te iwi me te ōritetanga. Kāore i taea a ia te tū. Ahakoa i te weto o te waea a tētahi tangata, ā, ka tīmata te tākaro a OneRepublic," tana kī. I kī ētahi atu ākonga he "rerekē", "māhaki ake i taku i tūmanako ai", me te "āhua hiahia". Whāia @BBCNewsbeat i Twitter, BBCNewsbeat i Instagram me Radio1Newsbeat i YouTube

title: Ka whakarewaina te āhuahira Rongokōrero Facebook i UK
summary: Kei te whakarewa te Facebook News, te wāhanga whakaihi o te whatunga pāpori mō ngā ihirangi rongokōrero, i te UK.
text: Ko te UK te mākete tuarua hei tiki i te Rongokōrero Facebook, i whakarewaina i Te Hononga o Amerika i tērā tau. He maha ngā kaiwhakaputa rongokōrero nui, tae atu ki te Hongere 4, Sky News, me te Guardian kua hainatia he mahi ki Facebook hei whakarato ihirangi. I te wā e nui ake ana te tirotiro i te pātahitanga o te umanga hangarau ki te pāpāho. I tērā wiki ka whakawehi a Google ki te tango atu i Ahitereiria mēnā i whakahaua e te ture kia uru ki ngā whakaaetanga arumoni ki ngā kaiwhakaputa rongokōrero - he mea kua whakapuakina hoki e Facebook te māharahara. Ā, kātahi anō ka whakaae ngā kaiwhakaputa Wīwī ki tētahi mahi ki a Google me pēhea te hoatu i tētahi ture manatārua EU hōu mō ngā wāhanga rongokōrero. Ko te Facebook News te ngana a te whatunga pāpori ki te whakatau i te raruraru roa i waenganui i a ia me ngā kaiwhakaputa rongokōrero, i te mea kua neke haere te whakapau pānuitanga ki ngā whare hangarau nui, kaua ki ia wāhi rongokōrero. Kua tautuhia te āhuahira hōu kia ora i te ahiahi o te Tūrei, ka kī a Facebook. Ko ngā rongokōrero 'whakawhaiaro' Ko te āhuahira hōu he ripa whakaihi i roto i te taupānga pūkoro Facebook, ka taea te uru mā te pato i te ata raina-toru mō ētahi atu kōwhiringa. He whāranu o ngā pūrākau rongokōrero nui o ia rā me ngā rongokōrero "whakawhaiaro" kua tīpakohia mō ia kaipānui i runga anō i ā rātou painga, e ai ki te whakatau a te hātepe papatono a Facebook. E kī ana a Facebook e utu ana i ngā kaiwhakaputa "mō ngā ihirangi kāore anō kia noho i runga i te pūhara", ā, e kī ana ka homai hoki e te āhuahira ki ngā kaiwhakaputa ngā pānuitanga hōu me ngā "huarahi" ohaurunga. Tērā pea i runga anō i ngā raraunga mai i Te Hononga o Amerika, e kī ana a Facebook e whakaatu ana neke atu i te 95% o ngā whakawhitinga i Facebook News mai i ngā tāngata kāore anō kia pānui i aua tānga i mua. E kī ana te whatunga pāpori ko te hua hōu he "pūtea penapena tau maha e whakanoho ana i te pukapuka pukapuka taketake ki mua i ngā kaimātakitaki hōu". Ā, kei te waitohu ngā rōpū rongokōrero, ā, he poto noa iho ngā kaipānui hou. I Whiringa ā Rangi, i te pānuitanga tuatahi o te hua e haere ana ki te UK, ko ngā ingoa matua pēnei i te The Economist, The Independent, me Cosmopolitan i runga kē i te papa. I mua i te whakarewatanga o te Tūrei, i pānuitia hoki te Mēra o ia Rā, Ngā Wā Pūtea me te Telegraph, i waenganui i ētahi atu. Kāore anō kia hainatia e TE Rongokōrero o TE Rongokōrero tētahi mahi arumoni ki Facebook News, engari ka puta tonu pea ki te ripa mā ngā whakairinga tūmatanui ka mahia e ia i runga i te pūhara Facebook. E kī ana hoki te whakawhānuitanga i mua i a Facebook ko tēnei hua hōu he hua hāngai tonu o ngā kōrero ki te umanga rongokōrero, ā, he rite tonu te noho ki ngā kairangi. Ko te matua hangarau te kawenga mō te taraiwa i te nui o ngā waka huri noa i te ipurangi, ā, ko tētahi pūrākau e pai ana te mahi i runga i te Facebook ka nui ake ngā kaipānui i te mea kāore. Engari kua auau hoki te whakarerekētanga a Facebook ki ōna hātepe hātepe i roto i ngā tau kua pā ki ngā rōpū rongokōrero, i ētahi wā he iti noa iho te pānui. Kua whakahauhautia hoki e ia ngā whakahaere kia whakamahi i ōna āhuahira pēnei i ngā tuhipānui inamata, ki te hanga ihirangi ataata rānei mō Facebook. Heoi anō, e whakaaro ana ia ki te Facebook News hei rongoā pai ake i ngā whakamātau tōmua, ā, ko tētahi e whakaaro ana ki te huri atu ki ētahi atu whenua - tae atu ki Wīwī me Tiamana - ā muri ake nei. "Ko tā mātou whāinga i ngā wā katoa ko te mahi i ngā huarahi tino pai e taea ai e mātou te tautoko i te umanga ki te hanga tauira pakihi tautoko," te kī a Facebook i roto i tana pou rangitaki mō te whakarewatanga o UK. "I a mātou e haumi ana i ētahi atu rongokōrero, me te utu i ngā kaiwhakaputa mō ētahi atu ihirangi i ētahi atu whenua, ka mahi tahi mātou me rātou ki te tautoko i te kaha o ngā rūma rongokōrero."

title: I tukuna te kaipuke o Alderney ki Wīwī
summary: Kua whakahokia tētahi kaumoana ki Wīwī i muri i te maunga o tana tīwai i runga i ngā toka i Alderney i te mutunga wiki.
text: I te wā o te tai iti i te Hātarei, ka mau te tīwai o taua tangata i te Raz i Longis Bay i runga i tētahi kōawa pōhatu i te wā o te tai iti i te Hātarei. I whakarewaina e te Tari Taitapa me te Tari Whanganga tētahi mahi tōtahi hei whakaora i a ia, ā, i kitea he haumaru, he pai hoki a ia. I whakaritea he waihotanga haere ohorere kia hoki ai te kaumoana Tatimana ki Wīwī. I kī tētahi kōrero a ngā Kāwanatanga o Alderney kua ū te kaumoana ki ngā ture haumaru paetata, ā, ka noho tonu ki runga i te papa i te wā o te whakaora i te Hātarei. I kawea tana kaipuke ki Braye Harbour i te tai nui e whai ake nei, ā, ka mauria ki ngā taunga taratahi i te whanga mō ngā tirotiro. I hoatu ki te kaumoana he tirotiro hauora me te haumaru i mua i te maunga o tētahi poti tūtohinga i a ia ki Wīwī. Ka penapenatia te oko e te Tari Whanga e tārewa ana i ētahi atu whakaritenga. I kī te kōrero a te kāwanatanga kua whaia ngā hātepe Covid-19 katoa, ā, ka mihi ki te hunga katoa i roto i te mahinga. "Kua mahi tonu te rōpū whakahaere ā-umanga maha mai i te tīmatanga o te mate urutā, ā, ka mahi tonu ki te tiaki i to mātau motu me ōna tangata," e kī ana. Alderney has so far recorded no cases of Covid-19.

title: Blaenavon: E wero ana te taone tuku iho o te ao i te tawai a Paxman
summary: Kei te werohia te kaiwhakaatu o TE Pō o TE Pō, a Jeremy Paxman ki te haere ki tētahi taone o ngā awaawa o Uēra ki te tonga i tawaia e ia he iti iho te mōhiotia i te Takiwā o te Roto.
text: I kī te kaunihera o Torfaen i whakaritea he ataata poto mō Blaenavon, he pae Tuku iho o te Ao, kaua e amuamu ki te AO mō ngā kōrero a Paxman. Ko te ataata e whakaatu ana i Big Pit, te whare taonga waro o te motu, e tono ana ki te kaiwhakaatu kia haere ki te taone. I kī a Newsnight kāore i te pōhēhē ko Blaenavon "he wāhi ātaahua ki te toro". Ka peke te mana ā rohe ki te wawao i tōna taonga tuku iho i muri i te kaiwhakaatu, e rongonui ana mō tana tunu i ngā kaipōrero, i kōrerotia ki a Blaenavon i te wā o tētahi uiuinga i te 3 o Mahuru. Ko te rino me te waro i waenganui i tētahi kōrero mō te tono a te Takiwā o te Roto mō te tūnga Tuku iho o te Ao i tana kīnga: "Ko Blaenavon tētahi o ēnei pae tuku iho." Ka kī tonu a ia "kua rongo ngā tāngata i ētahi atu mea mō te Takiwā o te Roto i a rātau i a Blaenavon". I toa te taone rino o mua i Torfaen i te tūnga tuku iho o te ao i te tau 2000. I tohua e Unesco te taone me te rohe karapoti hei pae tuku iho o te ao nā te hiranga o Uēra ki te tonga hei "kaiwhakanao rino me te waro nui o te ao i te rau tau 19". Ko te Horanuku o Blaenavon e kapi ana i tētahi wāhi e 33 kiromita tapawhā (12 maero tapawhā) me te wāhi o tētahi mahi rino o te rau tau 18. Ka tīmata te ataata, me tētahi papamuri pūoro kita mārire, mā te pātai "kāore anō kia rongo i a Blaenavon, Jeremy? Me whakaatu mātou ki a koe i tō mātou taone tuku iho o te Ao". 'Urupare ngākau māmā' E whakaatu ana i ngā atahanga o te Whare Taonga Poka Nui, te taone i muri i ngā miriona pauna kua pau ki te whakaora anō i te rohe me tētahi hopuāhua o te Rama Orangirangi 2012 e haere ana i tērā raumati. Ā, he keri mārire tōna i te huringa whakaahua o te kaiwhakaatu i roto i ngā tau, tae atu ki tētahi whakataunga o mua tata nei ki te tākaro pahau. I tērā marama, ka noho te kupu "pahau Paxman" hei kaupapa auau i runga i te Twitter i tērā marama, meneti i muri i tana tīmatatanga o Newsnight. E kī ana te ataata: "Engari pēnei i ngā pae tuku iho nunui katoa, i te taha o ngā tau, e whakaaro ana mātou ka pai ake, ka pai ake hoki tōna āhua." "Nō reira he aha e kore ai e haere mai ki te toro i a Jeremy? Whakautua noa te pātai, āe, kāo rānei?" I kī tētahi kaikōrero mō te kaunihera o Torfaen: "Kua tapahia te nui me te pai o ngā tōrangapū o te ao ki te rahi e te wero koi a Tēnā Paxman, engari nā tōna mōhiotanga ki te whakahāwea i a Blaenavon i tino whakaoho i runga i tā mātou pāpāho pāpori. " Nā reira i rongo mātou i tētahi ataata ngākau māmā e whakaatu ana i ngā kitenga o ngā āhuatanga maha o te taone me te tono kia toro atu te urupare tino pai. "We know that many Torfaen residents are passionate and proud of Blaenavon, and we would be only too pleased to offer Jeremy a warm Welsh welcome and show him around our wonderful World Heritage town." I kī tētahi kōrero mō Newsnight: "I roto i tētahi kōrero mō ngā pae Tuku iho o te Ao, i whakamātauria e Jeremy he tokomaha ake ngā tāngata e rongo ana i te Takiwā o te Roto i a Blaenavon, engari kāore ia i whakapuaki i tētahi whakaaro mō tētahi wāhi. " Kāore a Newsnight e pōhēhē he wāhi ātaahua a Blaenavon hei toro."

title: Ka whakamahia e ngā tāngata i te US ngā wāhi tūnga motokā mō ngā tari
summary: Kei te noho ngā tāngata i te US i ngā wāhi tūnga hei whakaatu i ētahi atu huarahi whakamahi.
text: Nā Sophie WilliamsBBC News Kua whakairihia e ngā tāngata ngā atahanga o rātau anō mā te whakamahi i te hashtag #WePark te whakaatu i a rātau e mahi ana i ngā wāhi tūnga motokā i San Francisco. Ka utua e te rōpū te mokowā me te waihanga i ngā tari whakarerekē, mā te whakamahi i te Wi-Fi mai i ngā rohe ipurangi koreutu, mā te whakamahi rānei i ā rātou waea pūkoro hei wāhiwera. Mai i tērā wā kua horapa atu te nekeneke ki Wīwī. I tīmataria a WePark e Victor Pontis i muri i tana whakatatū i tētahi tēpu i tētahi wāhi tūnga i tērā wiki. I kī atu te kaipakihi ki te AO i ahu mai te ariā mō WePark i Twitter. "I whakairihia e tētahi tētahi whakaahua o tētahi taraka i whakatūria e tētahi me te tūnga paihikara ki runga, ā, ka kī tētahi 'Ka aha mēnā ka taea e koe te mahi i tētahi wāhi tūranga?' I whakaaro ahau he ariā tino rekareka tērā, ā, i whakatau ahau ki te mahi i tērā Tāite," tana kī. I muri i tana whakamātautau angitu, ka whakatau ia ki te tono i ētahi atu kia hono mai ki a ia i tētahi wāhi tata ki te Hōro Taone o San Francisco. Neke atu i te 30 ngā tāngata i puta puta noa i te rā. He said: "I think it's saying that we have prime real estate in our city and some of the nicest areas with the most sun and really close to transit or close to a park or close to a lot of shops and right now we're using that for street parking and charging either $3 or $2 a hour and there are a lot of other uses for that. " Ko nga tiriti he wāhi e noho ana te tangata, ehara i te whakatakoto motokā noa iho." E rongo ana te hapori i a Jean Walsh i waenganui i te hunga i uru ki te WePark mana tuatahi. I kī atu a ia ki te AO e āwhina ana ki te miramira i ngā huarahi e taea ai te whakapau i ngā wāhi tūnga motokā i te taone. "E noho ana mātau i roto i tētahi mākete pānga tino utu nui. He tino heahea te whakaaro kāore te āhua o tā mātou whakamahi i tō mātou tiriti i te whakaata i tērā, nā reira he paru noa iho aua wāhi tūnga i whakaritea ki ērā atu rawa rawa i San Francisco. "So it's fun to shine a spotlight on that and look at why we would allow this to be used for a giant metal box all day when we could have people playing here, it could be a park, it could be a bike lane or a pick-up drop-off area." E ai ki a Cushman & Wakefield, he kamupene whenua arumoni o Amerika, kua tākiritia te rēti i te CBD o San Francisco ki tētahi pūkete $84.16 mō ia waewae tapawhā - tae atu ki te 9.7% i ia tau. Ms Walsh said the working space had a community feel. Ka kī a ia: "He tino pai. I uru te katoa, ā, e noho ana i reira e mahi ana. He ātaahua. I mauria mai e tētahi he tōnati, he ipu, he putiputi me te kākahu tēpu. Ki taku whakaaro ka nui ake te ngahau, te hōhonu hoki a tērā wā. E 12 ngā tāngata e mahi ana i tētahi mokowā, kaua ko te waka e noho ana i reira e kore e mahi i tētahi mea puta noa i te rā. He tino pai te whakamahi i te mokowā." Te huri i ngā whakaaro kua horapa kē te nekeneke ki Wīwī i reira i whakatūria ai e Valentin Décarpentrie, e 21 tau, tōna ake tari ki tētahi wāhi tūnga tūnga o Toulouse. I muri i tana mōhiotanga mō WePark i Twitter, ka kī a ia "i whakatau kia whai i te nekeneke" me te tārua. I kī a ia e hiahia ana tētahi tangata ki te whakatū i te mokowā, engari i mahue i muri i tana kitenga i te tīkiti tūnga tūnga a Tāne Décarpentrie. E kī ana te kaipakihi e whakaaro ana a ia ka haere tonu te ariā "nā te mea kua haere kē ki te ao whānui, ā, kei te huri ngā whakaaro mō te whakamahana o te ao." Ka kī a ia: "Kei te tīmata te tangata ki te mahi, ā, he huarahi māmā tēnei ki te mahi." "He nui te utu o ngā mokowā tari, ā, i konei i Wīwī mēnā he iti iho i te kotahi tau te pakeke o tō kamupene, kāore he tangata e hiahia ana ki te rēti i tētahi mea ki a koe, ahakoa he pūtāhui. Engari ehara tēnā i te tino raruraru, nā te mea he whiringa tino pai te mahi mamao. Ko tērā atu raruraru tūturu ko ngā tāone kāore e mahi i tētahi mea hei whakaiti i ngā mahi a ngā motokā whakapoke." Ehara tēnei i te wā tuatahi i ngana ai ngā kaiwhakahauhau ki te whakahaere i ngā wāhi tūnga tūnga i tō rātou rohe. I whakakīa e Brenda Puech tētahi wāhi tūnga motokā i Rānana ki ngā tipu me ngā tūru hei whakarite wāhi mō te hapori. I panaia a ia i tana pāka iti, e ai ki te Hackney Gazette. Heoi anō, nā tōna rongonui, i taea e ngā tāngata i Hackney te tono whakaaetanga ki te whakatuwhera i tō rātou ake pāka iti i raro i tētahi kaupapa whakamātautau.

title: Ko te kī o te 'whakatipuranga Instagram' ki te angitu o ngā toa o Bedford
summary: E tūmanako ana tētahi rōpū toi me ngā mahi toi i te whakatupuranga Instagram, e "pai ana ki te whakaatu", ka āwhina i tōna pātaka pokapū taone hou kia angitu.
text: I hangaia i Bedford, e whakaatu ana i ngā "kaihanga" e 80, e whakatuwhera ana i tētahi wharekai me te toa i tētahi taone e ngaro ana i ōna Marks & Spencer nui i Me. I kī a Kikita Palmer, e 25, e mahi ana i ngā taonga mai i ngā pallets tawhito, ināianei ko te hokohoko e pā ana ki te tuku i tētahi "wheako". I kī a Rahera Atkinson, tōna kaiwhakarewa, e whai ana rātau kia "pai ake i a Hoani Lewis". Ko te mahi hou, e kiia nei ko Made in Bedford i te Tau 13, kei St Paul's Square, i te taha o Bedford Corn Exchange, ā, ka tuwhera i te Hātarei. Artist Talia Giles, 34, sees the shop as a stepping stone to bigger things and hopes that as it gets more well known they will be able to expand and run workshops, create an artist studio and offer performance arts. I kī a ia kua nui ake te manako o nga hokohoko tawhito, ā, kei te whakararuraru i te ia ki ngā tūemi i hangaia e te maha. "Mēnā e hoko ana koe i tētahi mug, kaua e hoko i ngā mea māmā e whā, engari hokona he mea ātaahua mai i tētahi kaihanga rihi paetata ka noho hei wāhi kōrero." I kī a Ms Palmer: "Ko te whakatupuranga Instagram, e hiahia ana rātau ki te whakaatu, me te tautoko i ngā pakihi paetata. E hiahia ana rātau ki te mōhio ki te pūrākau, i hea mai ai, i pēhea te hanganga. "E hiahia ana rātou ki te tūhono ki te kaimahi, kia whai mea whaiaro me te ahurei - e hiahia ana rātou ki tētahi wheako." I kī a Ms Atkinson, e 57, nāna i tīmata te rōpū i te tau 2016, mēnā e hiahia ana ngā kaiwaiata ki te hoko i ā rātou taonga, ka taea e rātou te mahi koreutu, hei whakawhiti mō te mahi i tētahi rā i roto i te wharekai kaimanga me te wharekai vegan. "He ahurei tā mātou e tuku nei, ehara i te mea i hangaia nuitia, engari paetata, pūmau hoki," tana kī. "E hiahia ana mātou ki te whakataetae i a John Lewis i runga i te kounga, ko te mea ka pai ake mātou i a John Lewis."

title: 'E hiahia ana te hawhe o te kāpata ki te whiu' HS2, e kī ana a Stone MP
summary: Kua kī tētahi MP ko te hōtaka rēra HS2 he "arewhana mā e mate ana" e "hiahia ana te hawhe o te kāpata ki te whiu".
text: I kī a Tā Bill Cash, MP mō Stone e whakapono ana ia he take mō te arotakenga kāwanatanga katoa ki roto i te kaupapa i karangatia e ia ki a Tumuaki Piripi Hammond kia "purua ngā pereki ki tēnei kaupapa horihori i mua i te wehenga atu i te teihana". I kī te minita waka o Nusrat Ghani kua tukua te kāwanatanga ki HS2 me ētahi atu kaitautoko he kaupapa hiranga ā iwi tērā. Ko HS2 te whatunga tere-tere kua whakaritea e £55.7bn i te tuatahi e whakahaere ana i waenganui i Rāwāhi me te West Midlands i mua i te whakawhānuitanga o tētahi wāhanga tuarua ki Manatū me Te Uru. E kī ana ngā kaiwhakawāwā ka tūkinotia e te kaupapa te taiao, ā, he nui rawa te utu. Ko tētahi wāhanga o te ara o te wāhanga tuarua ka haere puta noa i te wāhanga o Tā Bill. I a ia e kōrero ana i roto i tētahi taupatupatu o te Hōro o Aotearoa, ka kī a Tā Pire he "āwhina kohikohi" ki te maka i te kaupapa kua "whakahaua kētia te kaihautū o Ingarangi neke atu i te £4 billion i mua i te tīmatanga o te hanganga". I pāorotia ana kōrero e te hoariri HS2 me te minita kāpata o Tory o mua, o Dame Cheryl Gillan, nāna hoki i karanga kia taihoatia. Engari i whakapuakina e Te Hunga Mahi a Te Hunga Mahi, te MP mō Blackley me Broughton me te MP Poole Conservative, a Tā Robert Syms, te tautoko mo te kaupapa. I kī a Ms Ghani i noho tonu ngā mahere HS2 "i runga i te ara", me te mahi e tīmata ana i te wāhanga tuatahi hei hono i Rāwāhi ki Birmingham i te tau 2026 me te Kāwanatanga e whakamana ana mō te wāhanga rua A e tūhono ana i Birmingham me Crewe mai i te 2027.

title: He nui rawa te whakatauranga o Magna Carta?
summary: I pātaitia te Pirimia o Rawiri, a Rawiri, mō Magna Carta i te Whakaaturanga a David Letterman. E whakaarotia ana e te tokomaha te tuhinga hei tohu i te tūāpapa o te kāwanatanga ā iwi, engari kua whakanuia tōna hiranga?
text: Nā Keith MooreBBC News Magna Carta - Rātini mō te Tāke Nui - i whakaaetia i Runnymede i te tau 1215, ā, i hiritia e Kīngi Hoani i muri i te whakakeke a ngā rangatira kaha me te hopu i Rānana. I puritia hei whakatinanatanga o te wāteatanga me te ōritetanga, e whakamōhiotia ana i roto i a Mātau, ā, e huaina ana ki te whakatikatika i te ātete ki te ture a Hōri III me te whakaawe i te Whakapuakitanga o te Rangatiratanga. I roto i tana whaikōrero tuatahi i te tau 1941, ka kī a Perehitini Franklin D Roosevelt: "Ehara te wawata manapori i te wāhanga noa iho i roto i te hītori tangata... I tuhia ki Magna Carta." Engari kāore te tūnga o Magna Carta i whakaaetia e te katoa. I roto i tana pukapuka, A History of Britain, ka tuhituhi te kaituhituhi hītori a Haimona Schama ehara a Magna Carta i te tiwhikete whānautanga o te wāteatanga, engari ko te tiwhikete mate o te whakawāteatanga. Ā, ko Mark Juddery, te kaituhi o Overrated: The 50 Most Overhyped Things in History, e tautohe ana ehara te whakamāramatanga o te tāke i roto i ngā rau tau hei karanga mō te wāteatanga i te pono o te tuhinga taketake. "He tino pai te tikanga o Magna Carta ināianei, engari kāore i pērā ngā tikanga tiketike," tana kī. "He tino pai mēnā he rangatira koe nā te mea i hoatu ki a koe te mana ki te whenua. Kāore rawa rātau i pīrangi ki te utu reti. "Koia tērā te take matua i tātaitia ai e rātau a Magna Carta. Ehara i te mea ko tēnei whakaaro kia nui ake te wāteatanga, ā, me ōrite te katoa. "Kaore he mea mo nga mahi whakawiri me te kōhuru maha a Kīngi Hoani." He pono, ko te nuinga o ngā whiti i roto i te tuhinga taketake i arotahi ki ngā mana e pā ana ki nga rangatira. A, o ngā whiti e 63, e toru anake kāore anō kia whakakorea, kia tawhito rānei. Ko te mea tino rongonui o ēnei ko: "E kore te tangata rangatira e hopukina, e mauheretia rānei, e tangohia rānei ōna mana, ōna taonga rānei, e whakakorea rānei, e peia rānei. E kore hoki tātau e haere i runga i te kaha ki a ia. Hāunga ia i runga i te whakawā tika a ōna ōrite, i te ture rānei o te whenua. Ki tētahi tangata e hokona e mātou, ki tētahi tangata e whakahē, e whakaroa rānei i te tika, i te tika rānei." Ahakoa ko taua whiti te pōhatu pā mō ngā take maha e pā ana ki te wāteatanga, kāore i tino mōhiotia, ā, i tanumia hōhonu ki roto i te tuhinga. "He ātaahua te kī e kī ana 'kaua e hopukina, e hereheretia rānei te tangata wātea' ehara i te mea mō te katoa," te kī a Dr Claire Breay, ko ia te kaitiaki matua o ngā tuhinga o Te Whare Pukapuka o Ingarangi. "He nui ake ngā tāngata rangatira i ngā rangatira, engari ko te nuinga o te iwi whānui ko ngā kaiahuwhenua koreutu, nā reira kāore te nuinga i pāngia hāngai e Magna Carta i te tau 1215." A, e kī ana a Dr George Garnett, he kaiako hītori i te Whare Wānanga o Oxford, e tohunga ana ki te hītori Ingarihi i ngā rau tau 10-13, ahakoa kua tino whai mana a Magna Carta, ehara tēnā i tōna whakaaro taketake. "I hoahoatia hei whakatika tere i roto i tētahi āhuatanga kāore e taea, kāore anō kia kitea," tana kī. "I tino mōrearea te kīngi, ā, i roto i te ono marama ka whakapati ia i te pāpā kia whakakorea. " Engari nā te mea i mate a ia i muri tata iho, ā, i te mea he iti tana tama, ā, he iti tonu tana noho mō te 10 tau, kātahi ka whakahaeretia te whenua e tētahi kaunihera o ngā rangatira, ā, i whakarite rātau kia whakaputaina anōtia te Magna Carta kua whakatikatikatia." He maha ngā wā i whakaputaina anō i te rau tau 13, me te huri i te kupu mai i te taketake o te tau 1215. Ko te putanga i noho hei wāhanga o te tikanga Ingarihi tuatahi i te tau 1297 ko te mea i hainatia e Kingi Henry III i te tau 1225. E kī ana a Breay ahakoa kua rerekē te tikanga o Magna Carta i roto i ngā rau tau i tōna whāinga taketake, e tohu tonu ana i tētahi wā kaurori i roto i te hītori o Ingarangi. "Ahakoa ērā atu whiti katoa i tangohia hei katoa - ahakoa ko te nuinga o rātou e pā ana ki te mana feudal me ngā painga me ngā painga ināianei - i te whakaū katoa rātou kāore te kīngi i runga ake i te ture, ā, me whakahaere ia i roto i te ture. He tino hira tēnā." Kei te whakaritea kētia ngā whakaritenga hei whakanui i te huritau 800 o te tāke i te tau 2015. Ko tōna whakamāramatanga anō i roto i ngā rau tau hei rama mo te wāteatanga, te kāwanatanga ā iwi me te ture i āwhina ki te pupuri i tōna hiranga, e kī ana a Garnett. "Ahakoa i tirohia i roto i te horopaki o te tau 1215, he mahi rōia tino mātauranga nā te mea i te tau 1212, ko te mea tino mātauranga i whakaarohia e te ātete ko te whakarere i a Hoani i runga i tētahi whakahau ki te Welsh i runga i te tūmanako ka patua ia e te Welsh. " He taputapu māheahea kē atu a Magna Carta hei whakahaere i tētahi kīngi raruraru. He tino whakamīharo i roto i te horopaki o te tau 1215, engari he pēhea te whakamahinga, te whakamārama i muri iho ka tino hira i roto i te pūrākau o ngā rangatiratanga Ingarihi me te wāteatanga o Amerika."

title: Covid bereavement: Call for greater support for those left behind
summary: "I waea mai rātau ki a au i waenganui pō, ā, i mōhio ahau e haere ana ahau ki te poroporoaki noa iho."
text: Nā Nelli BirdBBC News I te taenga atu o Aotearoa Williams ki te taha o te moenga o te hōhipera o tana tāne, ka whakatangihia e ia ta rāua waiata mārena, a, ka kī atu ki a ia kua tae ki te wā ki te okioki. E 58 tau te pakeke o Mark i tana matenga i Aperira, i nga wiki noa iho i muri i te kirimana i te Covid-19. Andrea shared her story as families called for greater access to bereavement support for those who have lost loved ones in the pandemic. I tēnei wā, neke atu i te 2,000 ngā tāngata e mōhiotia ana kua mate i te coronavirus i Wales, e ai ki ngā whika o Public Health Wales. He tokomaha kua ngaro i a rātau e aroha ana e kī ana kāore i taea e rātau te poroporoaki nā ngā rāhuitanga raka, i te wā e kōrero ana ngā tākuta ki te whakamarie i ngā tūroro kāore i taea e ō rātou whanaunga te noho i o rātau moenga i to rātau matenga. Ināianei, kua whakatūria he rōpū mariko mō te hunga e pouri ana ki te tautoko i a rātou anō. The Covid-19 Families Wales' Group is calling for greater access to bereavement counselling during the pandemic. I kī te Kāwanatanga o Welsh kua hoatu e ia te £900,000 ki ngā hōhipera me ngā ratonga hei āwhina i te hunga i ngaro i a rātou i aroha ai i tēnei wā. 'E mōhio ana rātau ki tāku e haere ana' "He ngāwari kē atu ki a au mēnā kei te kōrero ahau ki tētahi tangata i ngaro hoki ta rātau tāne," te kī a Andrea. E rua tau noa iho te mārenatanga o te tokorua i te matenga o Mark, he kaikauhau, mai i Sully i te Raorao o Glamorgan, i te 25 o Āperira, i muri i te noho i runga i te hāora i te Hōhipera o te Whare Wānanga o Weera, i Kānata. "I whakatangihia e au ta mātau pūoro mārena, a, kātahi anō ka poroporoaki. I kī atu ahau ki a ia kua tae ki te wā ki te okioki," tana kī, e maumahara ana ki te wā i mate ai ia. I kī a Andrea e mōhio ana ia e kore ia e whakawāteatia i runga i te rōpū ina kōrerorerotia e ia ngā mea pēnei i te mau i te pungarehu o tana tāne ki te moenga ki a ia ina kore e taea e ia te moe. "E mōhio ana rātau ki tāku e haere ana." 'Kāore mātou i reira mōna' I te matenga o Terry Andrews, he nēhi hinengaro hinengaro, i Ysbyty Glan Clwyd, Denbighshire, i Aperira, kāore i taea e tōna whānau te noho i tōna moenga. Kua mate te 75-tau te pakeke mo tētahi wā, ā, i runga i te hemodialysis i te hōhipera, engari i mate i muri i te whakamātautau pai mō te coronavirus. "Ka puta noa iho i tōku māhunga kāore mātau i reira mōna," te kī a tana tamāhine ko Samantha Andrews-Pierce. I kī a Samantha, mai i Denbigh, kua kitea e ia he whakamarie i roto i te rōpū, ā, i uaua ki te kore e taea te poroporoaki tika ki tōna pāpā nā ngā rāhuitanga. "Kāore i taea e mātou te tanu i a ia," tana kī. "Kāore anō mātou kia oho, e whakaaro ana ahau he mea tino nui ina pouri koe. E 10 mātau i te nehunga [engari] kāore mātau i whakaaetia kia noho tahi me to mātau whaea." 'E ngana ana ahau ki te whakatakoto kanohi toa' i kī a Mandy Howells, mai i Pentre i Rhondda Cynon Taf, i te matenga o tōna pāpā, e 79 tau te pakeke o Dennis Kierle, i Aperira tonu "kāore i te āhua tūturu". "E ngana ana ahau ki te whakamau kanohi toa i a au e noho ana me taku whaea," tana kī. "Kei te rongo ahau, i runga i tēnei rōpū... E mōhio ana rātou ki tāu e rongo ana, e whakaaro ana nā te mea kei te haere rātou anō. "Kua āwhina i ahau - ā-hinengaro." 'He mea hira te tohutohu' Ināianei kei te ngana te rōpū ki te uru atu ngā mema ki te tohutohu, engari i kī a Nicola Thomas mai i Swansea he rārangi tatari mō te tautoko. I mate tōna pāpā, a John Bennett, he kaiwhakahaere kaupapa mō Tata Steel, i te 69 o ona tau i muri i te pānga ki te huaketo i Aperira. "E pā ana ki te tangihanga, tērā tētahi whakaaro ka tukuna e ngā GP ki a koe ngā ārai pōrearea, te diazepam rānei hei āwhina i a koe ki te moe, engari he mea hira hoki te tohutohu," tana kī. "Kāore e tino kōrerotia ngā pānga ki te hunga pouri i runga i ngā rongo. " Ina taea e mātou, e hiahia ana mātou ki te huihui hei rōpū - ahakoa he kawhe noa iho me te tiritiri pūrākau. Ka taea e tātau te whiwhi i tētahi mea mai i tēnā momo whakahoahoatanga. "He whāinga noa iho tā mātou e hiahia ana kia maumaharatia o mātau whanaunga." The Welsh Government said it had provided £900,000 of support to hospices and bereavement providers to increase the level of support. I muri i tētahi pānuitanga i te tīmatanga o tēnei tau o tētahi atu £1m mō ngā ratonga tangihanga mai i Aperira a tērā tau. "Ka tukuna atu e mātau o mātau aroha ki ngā tāngata katoa kua ngaro tētahi tangata i arohaina ki tēnei huaketo nanakia," te kī a te kaikōrero. "Kei te whakawhanake hoki mātou i tētahi anga tangihanga ā-motu hei tautoko i te whakatūnga o ngā ara tohutohu mārama, ngā paerewa tangihanga me tētahi whaiaronga o te whakarato tangihanga e wātea ana."

title: I whakarewaina te rangahau ngutu māuiui i UK
summary: Kei te tatūria te pēke raraunga rangahau nui rawa o te ao mō te ngutu me te ngutu ki te UK ki te whakatau he aha te take o ēnei āhuatanga noa iho.
text: Nā te kaipānui Hauora o Mīharo RobertsHealth, BBC News Ka pā ēnei āhuatanga whanau ki ngā pēpi 1,200 i whānau mai i UK i ia tau, engari kāore i te mōhiotia te take i puta ai. E whakahaua ana ngā mātua o ngā pēpi me ēnei here kia rēhita ki te hōtaka e rima tau e £11m. Ka kohikohi me te tātari i te DNA o ēnei tamariki kia kite mēnā ka taea e rātou te pine i tētahi take. A, mā te whai i ēnei tamariki e 3,000, neke atu rānei puta noa i to rātau tamarikitanga, e tūmanako ana ngā kairangahau ki te mōhio he aha te akoranga tino pai o te rongoā, tae atu ki tēhea pokanga e tuku ana i ngā hua whakanao tino pai me te taumahinga. Ka puta te kōpikopiko ina kore e hono tika ngā wāhi motuhake o te kanohi i te wā e tipu ana te pēpi i roto i te kōpū. Ka whakahaeretia te Cleft Collective i ngā whare wānanga e rua o Bristol, te Whare Wānanga o Liverpool me tētahi pokapū whakamātautau rongoā i te Whare Wānanga o Manatāne, ā, ko tētahi wāhanga e pūteatia ana e te aroha o UK te Healing Foundation, me te toenga o te pūtea penapena e haere mai ana i ngā whare wānanga me ngā hoa NHS. I kī a Prof Jonathan Sandy, te kairangahau matua mō te pēke ira o Bristol: "Ko ngā tamariki i whānau mai i te tīwae e anga ana ki ngā whakamātautau ahurei. Kei roto i ēnei ko ngā take kōrero me te reo, ngā uauatanga mātauranga me ngā āwangawanga hauora whānui ake. "Kāore mātou i te mōhio mēnā nā ēnei raruraru i takea mai i ngā tīra tērā pea e haepapa ana ki te kōpae, ki ētahi atu take rānei, pēnei i te āhua noho, i ngā take 'taiao' rānei. Mā tēnei akoranga e āwhina ki te whakautu i ēnei pātai hira, ā, ka taea hoki te whakaoti i te mea ngaro whakamutunga o ngā take i te wāhi tuatahi." Ka titiro hoki ngā tohunga he aha te tautoko ā-ringa, ā-hinengaro hoki e hiahiatia ana e ēnei whānau. I kī a Prof Nichola Rumsey o te Whare Wānanga o Te Uru o Ingarangi: "Ina whai pēpi ngā mātua, ko te tikanga ko tētahi o a rātau pātai tuatahi ko te 'He aha tēnei i pā mai ai ki a mātau?' E hiahia ana hoki rātau ki te mōhio mēnā ka pai ta rātau pēpi i a rātau e tipu ana. "Ko tā mātou arotahi ko te kohikohi i ngā raraunga ā-hinengaro mai i ngā mātua i runga i tō rātou wheako tātaritanga me ngā take tōmua o te mātua i tētahi tamaiti whai kōpikopiko me ō rātou hiahia tautoko."

title: Covid-19: Ka whati nga pirihimana o Tatimana i te whakahē ārai raka
summary: Kua whakamahia e nga pirihimana i Hōrana he pū repo wai hei whakawātea i nga kaiwhakatūtū ārai kāwanatanga i tētahi pāka i Te Heke.
text: E 2,000 ngā kaiwhakatūtū i huihui ki waenganui o te taone ki te whakahē i ngā rāhuitanga Covid-19 me ētahi atu kaupapa here kāwanatanga. I muri i te whakakāhoretanga a ētahi o nga kaiwhakahaere ki te haere i te mutunga o te whakaaturanga, ka neke mai ngā āpiha whakararuraru me ngā pirihimana whakararuraru me ngā rākau me ngā kurī. Ka tae mai nga whakahē i te rā i mua i te tīmatanga o te pōti i te pōti nui. E toru rā te pōti ki te karo i te paheketanga e mōrearea ana ki te hora i te coronavirus i ngā wāhi pōti. Kua tautuhia e nga mana he tepenga e 200 tāngata mo te whakahē i te takiwā o Malieveld e tata ana ki te teihana matua o te taone, ā, kāore i tawhiti atu i te pāremata o Hōnea, engari i kī ngā pirihimana kua hipa atu taua tau. I whakatūria ngā ratonga tereina ki te taone mō tētahi wā hai ārai i ētahi atu tāngata kia kore ai e uru ki te whakaaturanga. He tokomaha nga tāngata i hopukina e nga pirihimana, e ai ki te pāpāho paetata. Kotahi te ataata, i tiria whānuitia i runga i te pāpāho pāpori, e whakaatu ana i ngā āpiha e tuki ana i tētahi tangata i runga i te whenua me a rātau rākau. I kī ngā pirihimana kua whakaekea rātau e ia ki te rākau, e kī ana a Anna Holligan o TE AO i Te Heke. I muri iho ka kī nga pirihimana o Hōnea kua pūhia he pūtiro whakatūpato i te wā i whakawāteatia e nga āpiha nga kaiwhakatūtū. I kī tētahi kōrero e tūhuratia ana taua mahi. "Tērā pea he huaketo, engari kāore te whakaweto o te iwi katoa i te ōrite," te kōrero a te kaiwhakahaere o Mīharo Koot, e 68, ki te pokapū rongokōrero o TE WĀ. "E kite ana ahau he ngāwari noa iho te tango i te nui o o tātau motika, ā, kāore te nuinga o te iwi e mōhio, engari he nui tonu te haere. Nā reira kei te māharahara ahau mo aku mokopuna." He rāhui pō - mai i te 21:00 (20:00 GMT) ki te 04:30 - i whakaritea i te Hānuere ka whakararuraru i ngā tāone maha o Hōnea. Kāore anō a Hōrana kia kite i tētahi rāhui rāhui mai i te mahi a te Whāriki i te Pakanga Tuarua o te Ao. E tūmanakohia ana kia noho tonu tae noa ki te mutunga o Poutāpeta. Ka kati tonu ngā pae me ngā wharekai, tae atu ki ngā toa kāore i te tino nui. Neke atu i te rua ngā tāngata e rāhuitia ana. Neke atu i te 1.1 miriona ngā kēhi Covid kua whakaūngia e Hōrana mai i te tīmatanga o te tīmatanga, neke atu i te 16,000 ngā mate, e ai ki ngā raraunga i whakahiatohia e te Whare Wānanga o Johns Hopkins i te US.

title: Ko te Hanga i tētahi rōia Kōhuru ko Kathleen Zellner te whetū hou o te hara pono
summary: Kua hoki mai te Making a Murderer ki te piki ake i ngā pūrākau o ngā herehere o Amerika, a Steven Avery rāua ko Brendan Dassey.
text: Ko te pakipūmeka wāhanga 10 tētahi o ngā taunga nui rawa o Netflix o te tau 2015. I muri mai i te kēhi o Whīni Avery rāua ko tana irāmutu ko Brendan Dassey, i whakawāteatia rāua ki te kōhuru i a Teresa Halbach i te tau 2005. E kī ana ngā tāngata e rua he harakore rāua, ā, he whakahau ki te muru i a rāua i ngā rau mano o ngā kaitautoko. I roto i tēnei rangatū ka whai mātou i te tokorua i a rāua e ngana tonu ana ki te tahuri i o rāua whakaponotanga, ā, kotahi tonu te pūāhua hou e whakaaro ana mātou ka arohaina e koe.
