Kua mau a Kathleen Zellner ki te kēhi a Steven Avery, he rōia tino mātauranga, ā-tikanga hoki a ia e kī ana "e ora ana mō ngā take e kore e taea." He tino mīharo tana pūkete aroturuki, kei a Zellner tētahi o ngā mokatere angitu tiketike mō te tahuri i ngā whakapae hē i Te Hononga o Amerika. Ko wai tēnei wahine e hiahia ana ki te whakamatau he harakore a Steven Avery? E 61 tau a Kathleen Zellner, ā, e mahi ana i Haikaika, i reira i whakatūria ai e ia tana umanga ture i te tau 1991. Mai i taua wā kua hurihia e ia ngā whakapae a ngā tāngata toko 19, tae atu ki tētahi tangata ko Hohepa Burrows i whiua ki te mate. I toa a Kathleen Zellner i te kēhi i muri i te whakatūpato i te kaipatu tūturu kia whāki. Ko ia anake te rōia whakawā i Te Hononga o Amerika kua toa i ngā whakataunga pūkete miriona miriona tāra i roto i te roanga o te 11 marama noa iho. E kore a ia e tohu i tētahi tangata e whakapono ana ia he hara. Ko tētahi o ngā mea tuatahi e kī ana a ia ki ana kiritaki ko: "Mēnā kei te hara koe, ka mahi ahau i tētahi mahi pai ake ki te mōhio he hara koe i tētahi rōia. " Me pōrangi koe ki te utu i ahau, ā, ka kitea he hara." Ko te nuinga o ngā kiritaki a Zellner he pro bono, ko te tikanga kāore rātou e utu utu ā-ture nā te mea kāore ō rātou moni whiwhinga, iti rawa rānei. I muri i tana mātakitaki i te rangatū tuatahi o Making A Murderer, ka whakatau a ia e hiahia ana ia ki te tohu i a Whīni Avery. Ko tāu e kite nei i runga i te mata he rōia tino ringa. Ka waihangatia anō e ia ngā tirohanga hara, e mahi ana i ngā whakamātautau maha hei whakamātau, hei whakakāhore rānei i ngā kitenga o ngā whakamātautau o mua. Ko te tikanga ka mahia ēnei e ngā kaimahi iti o tana umanga ture. He moemoeā tēnei mō ngā kaihanga pakipūmeka o Laura Ricciardi me Moira Demos. "Ehara a Kathleen i te rōia e mahi ana i muri i te tēpu," te kī a Moira. "Ka haere a ia ki te tirohanga hara, ka whiwhi ia i ōna ringa ki runga i ngā whakaaturanga, ka whakamātauria e ia ngā tohunga pūtaiao rongonui o te ao. " He aha te mea ātaahua mō tōna tukanga, he tino rerekē, engari he tino pūtaiao." Ko tētahi o ngā mea tuatahi e mahia ana e ia ko te hoko i te motokā ōrite nā Teresa Halbach ki te tirotiro mehemea i tika te ture i roto i a rātau kitenga. I kitea whakamutunga a Teresa i te pānga o Avery, ā, i kitea tana motokā i reira me ngā poapoa toto e ōrite ana ki tōna DNA. He whakaaturanga matua tērā i roto i te whakawāteatanga o Whīhī Avery. Nā reira ka mahia e ia ētahi whakamātautau i runga i te motokā me tana tīma, kaua e tuku i tētahi o ana tamariki me te tatari ki ngā hua. E whakapono ana a Zellner e mōhio ana a ia nā wai i patu a Teresa Halbach, ā, ehara i a Whīni Avery, e mōhio tūturu ana a ia he harakore a ia. "Kotahi tonu taku whāinga, arā, ko te tahuri i te whakapae a Whīni Avery," tana kī i runga i te whakaaturanga. "Ehara i te mea pēhea te roa, he aha te utu, he aha rānei ngā taunahua e taea ana e tātau - e kore rawa e mutu a tātau mahi ki te toa i te wāteatanga o Tēnā Avery." Kaore e kore e kore e whakarau a Zellner ki te mātakitaki i runga i te mata, rite tonu ki te mātakitaki i tētahi tangata kei runga i ta rātau papa tākaro. "He tino atawhai a Kathleen," te whakamārama a Laura. "He aha te mea whakamere mō tōna pūrākau tuarā me Steven, he maha nga tau e whai ana a Steven i a Kathleen, i mōhio rāua ki tana pūkete aroturuki whakamīharo. " He tino kātoretore tōna mahi, i tino arokē a ia ki ētahi atu take, i ngā tau i muri mai ka aro mai tētahi o ana kiritaki nāna i whakawātea ki te whakaaturanga. "I kī a ia, i tana kitenga i te tauhohenga a Whīni Avery ki te whakataunga i tana whakawā, i tino toa i a ia, a, ka whakatau ia kia tangohia te kēhi." I hereheretia hētia a Hīnī Avery mo te 18 tau mo te tūkinotanga. He tokomaha e whakaaro ana i whakatūria ia e ngā kaiwhakahaere ture i Manitowoc County, i Wisconsin, nāna i wehi i te whiu pūtea nui i runga i tōna tukunga. Engari i ngā wā katoa ka ākiritia e aua kaiwhakahaere nga kerēme hei ariā whakatupu. Kei te roma ināianei te Making A Murderer Part 2 i Netflix. Whāia Newsbeat i Instagram, Facebook me Twitter. Whakarongo ki Newsbeat live i te 12:45 me te 17:45 i ia rā o te wiki i te Reo Irirangi 1 me te 1Xtra - ki te hapa koe i a mātou ka taea e koe te whakarongo mai ki konei.

title: Ka tūhuratia te mahi o te kura tuatahi o Rolf Harris
summary: Kua whakarewaina e te Manatu Ture tētahi tūhuratanga i muri i te tomokanga o te paepae, a Rolf Harris ki te taunga o tētahi kura tuatahi o Berkshire.
text: Ka tūtaki te kaiako matua o te kura ki te whetū pouaka whakaata o mua, e kōrerorero ana ki tētahi kaiwhakairo paetata, a, ka tono ki a ia kia wehe i te pae. I kī te MoJ e "titiro ana ki ēnei pūrongo, ā, ka mahia he mahi tika". I hereheretia a Hāhi mo te rima tau i te tau 2014, engari i tukua i runga raihana i te tau 2017. I tāpiritia e tētahi kaiwhakaatu mō te MoJ: "Ina tukua ngā hunga hara wahine, ka herea rātou ki ngā here raihana pākaha, ā, ka āhei rātou ki te whakahoki ki te tiakitanga mō te takahi i a rātou." I kī te kaiako matua o Richard Jarrett: "E hāngai ana ki ā mātou hātepe paerewa, i tonoa tētahi tangata kāore i pōhiritia kia wehe atu i te paenga o waho o te pae kura inanahi, ā, kāore i takaware. " Kāore anō tētahi o ā mātou tauira kia whakapā atu ki te tangata, kāore hoki te tangata i pōhiritia e mātau ki te taunga o te kura." 'Wā rerekē' i kitea a Hāhi e poipoi ana ki ngā tamariki i a rātau e tatari ana i te hōro o te kura mo ta rātau tina i te Tūrei. I te kōrero a ia ki te kaiwhakairo o Nick Garnett, e mahi ana i te wāhi "Kiss and Drop" o te kura. I kī atu a Tēnā Garnett ki te BBC: "I huri ahau, a, i reira a Rolf Harris, he wā rerekē. " Ka tono a ia mo tētahi poro rākau. Ko te āhua nei e hiahia ana a ia ki te hanga i ētahi whakairo, nā reira i hoatu e au ki a ia ētahi wāhanga e rua." Ka kī a ia: "Kaore a ia i tata ki ētahi tamariki. I tino mārire te mahi a te tumuaki." I a ia e kōrero ana ki te Press Association, ka kī te matua o tētahi tauira i te kura: "He aha tana mahi i reira? " Ki taku whakaaro he waea whakawā tino kino tērā, ā, kāore au i te whakaaro he pai rawa tana takunga." I kī ngā Pirihimana o Thames Valley: "I pūrongotia he tangata i te pae o te kura. " I haere tētahi āpiha ki te tirohanga, engari kāore he hara i mahia. Kāore he hopunga i mahia, ā, kua hoatu he tohutohu ki te tangata e pā ana." I hereheretia te kaiwhakaatu pouaka whakaata whānau o Ahitereiria i te tau 2014 mō ngā tūkinotanga 12, e pā ana ki ngā kōtiro tokowhā i waenganui i te 1968 me te 1986. I Me 2017 i whakawāteatia ia i ngā hara hītori hītori e whā kāore i te tūhonotia, nāna i whakakāhore. I Whiringa o Whiringa 2017 i hurihia tētahi o ngā whakapae whakaekenga whakarihariha e 12 e te Kōti Pīra.

title: Ka mana te huringa ture inihua motokā whakahau
summary: Ināianei me inihua e ngā atekōkiri ō rātou motokā ahakoa kāore rātou i te whakamahi, e ai ki ngā ture hōu e mana ana i tēnei rā (20 o Hune).
text: Ka anga atu ngā rangatira ki te whaina £100, ā, tērā pea ka hopukina, ka whakangaromia tō rātou motokā, ki te kore e whakamanatia te waka i waho o te huarahi. Ko te hunga i tohua he motokā kāore i te inihuatia, i te tuatahi ka tukuna he reta e whakatūpato ana i a rātou ki ngā hua ki te kore rātou e mahi. E whakaarohia ana e 1.4 miriona ngā kairuku kāore he inihua engari kei te whakamahi tonu i ā rātou motokā. E tūmanako ana te kāwanatanga ka whakahauhau i ētahi atu tāngata kia whiwhi inihua. E 28 tau a Kei, a, ka kī atu ki a Newsbeat he aha i kore ai e taea e ia te inihua tana motokā. 'Utu utu' Ka kī a ia: "[Koia] te utu o te noho i tēnei rā, ko te pupuri i tētahi tuanui i runga i tō māhunga, me te utu kai me ētahi atu mea, kua tāpiritia ki te mea kua puta te inihua i te tuanui." Kua whakamanatia tana motokā kei waho i te huarahi, nā reira kāore ngā ture hou e pā ki a ia. I tuhituhi a Divyesh Lad i te whārangi Facebook o Newsbeat: "I whakahuatia taku tuakana e £2,000 hei inihua i tētahi motokā e wātea ana i te £700. " Me tuhi e ia kia 3 ngā wā kia ōrite ai ki tana utu utu. Kāore i te mōhiotia. "E hiahia ana ahau ki tēnei ture, mēnā anake ka heke iho ngā utu, nā te mea kua kore e taea e ngā kamupene inihua te kī he nui ngā utu hei utu i ngā utu o tētahi atekōkiri kāore i te inihuatia!!" I tāpiri mai a Andy Baker: "E whakarihariha ana ahau ki te kōrero, ka taea e TATA te kite he aha ētahi e kore ai e whakararuraru i te inihua. " Ko te tikanga o ngā utu inihua arorangi, he māmā ake pea te utu i te whaina/whiu mēnā ka mau me te kore inihua. "Kāore au e whakaae ki taua whanonga, engari ko te mea e kore rawa koe e whakahauhau i ngā tāngata kia mahi i te mea tika ina māmā ake tō mahi i te mea hē." Nō te Association Of British Insurers a Malcolm Tarling, ā, ka mea: "Neke atu i te 4% o ngā kaitaraiwa e taraiwa ana i te inihua. " Ehara i te mea he nui ake te aituā engari ka pana ake rātau i te utu inihua e utua ana e te nuinga o ngā kaitaraiwa ture."

title: Ka tohu a A350 i te wāhanga hou i roto i ngā pūkaha rererangi
summary: I kī tētahi mīhini rererangi UK ko ia te tino māia o te ao i anga atu ki tana whakamātautau tino uaua i te Paraire.
text: I whakaurua a David ShukmanScience editor A Trent XWB, i hangaia e Rolls Royce, ki te Airbus A350 hou, nāna i rere tuatahi mai i Toulouse, Wīwī. Kei roto i te mīhini hōu ko ngā hangarau hou i hoahoatia hei heu i te taumaha me te whakaiti i te whakapaunga hinu. Ko te hurihanga hou rawa i roto i te whakataetae mura i waenganui i a Hītori me Hēneti, nāna i whakarewa i tana Dreamliner. A, ki taua kauhanga riri, ka taea hoki e koe te tāpiri i a Rolls-Royce me tōna tauwhāinga o Amerika ko General Electric. He piriona te wāriu o ngā whakahau mō ngā pūkaha aero, nā reira he kaha te whakataetae ki te toa i ngā kiritaki. I hoahoatia ritenga te Trent XWB mō te A350, ā, neke atu i te 1,200 o ngā mīhini kua tonoa i tēnei wā. I hoatu he urunga āhua kore nei ki te wheketere Rolls-Royce i Derby ki te mātakitaki i te tukanga whakanao. Ko te āhuahira whakamīharo tuatahi ko te tauine tino nui o te mīhini - ko te diameter o te huinga rau pīataata i mua o te mīhini ko te 118 inihi (299cm), te nui rawa i hangaia e te kamupene o Ingarangi, ā, he nui rawa te mokowā hei whakanoho i te waka o te Concorde. Ko ngā rau, i hangaia ki te titanium, he hāngai, he whakakahatia ki roto e tētahi hanganga mātiti iti moroiti. Kua kōwhiria e GE ngā mata pīrangi i hangaia ki ngā rauemi hiato. Mā te rahi o te pīataata e āhei ai te mīhini ki te ngongo i te hau nui hei whakakī i tētahi kōti pātītī i ia hēkona, kātahi ka kōpeketia ki te rahi o te pouaka whakamātao - ko te mea e mōhiotia ana ko te "ōwehenga kōpeketanga" o te 50 ki te 1, ko te pēhanga teitei rawa kua tae ki a Rolls-Royce. Ko te nui ake o te rere o te hau ki roto i te mīhini, ā, ko te nui ake o te kōpeketanga, ko te pai ake o te tukanga katoa. Ina whakakāngia te whāranu hinu me te hau, ka tae te korohū hua ki tētahi pāmahana whakaharahara o te 2,200C - he taumata teitei ake i te mea kua tutuki i mua - ko te tikanga hei whakamōrahi i te huaputa o ia pata hinu. Ko te wera wera o te 2,200C he 700C wera ake i te pūwāhi whakarewa o ngā wae i roto i te ruma whakawera - tae atu ki ngā rau turbine e aia ana e tēnei korohū whakawhānui tere. Nā reira ka wiria ia mata ki tētahi whatunga e 300 ngā puare iti e rite ana ki te rahi o te makawe tangata. Mā tēnei e rere ai te hau mātao i roto i tētahi kiriata angiangi i runga i te mata o ngā turbines, ā, ka mahi hei momo ārai. Hei ātete i tēnei wera tino nui - me ngā pēhanga nui e pā ana - ko ngā mata turbine e 68 i hangaia ki tētahi koranu ā-konumohe, ā, ka tipu ki roto i te tioata kotahi kia kore ai e mōrearea ngā whāwhā ā-roto hei pūtake ngoikoretanga. Ko te hua, ko ia rau, e aia ana e ngā korohū whakawhānui, e whakaputa ana i te kaha nui o te motokā Tātai Kotahi, e takahuri ana i tētahi kakau ā-roto e whakahaere ana i ngā rau pīataata nui i mua o te mīhini. E ai ki a Pirihi Young, ko te kaiwhakahaere o te kaupapa XWB, ko te mīhini te hua o ngā tau maha o te mahi a ngā kaipūtaiao me ngā kaipūkaha e rapu ana i ngā rangatū o ngā whakapainga nuku. "He nui tonu ngā hangarau takitahi i reira, ko ngā hoahoa pūnaha takitahi e hāpai ana i tētahi hēneti i konei, he hawhe-ōrau i reira, he whakatekau ruarua i reira. " Kua taea e mātou te hora i ngā hangarau hōu katoa i runga i te mīhini - koia te mea hou i hangaia, ā, mā te whakakotahi i ērā mea katoa ko te tino māia o te ao." I te wawaenga, kua tata ki te 1% ngā pūkaha rererangi kia pai ake te hinu i ia tau mō ngā tau e rua kua hipa. Ko ngā kerēme a Rolls Royce ka whai i ngā whakapuakitanga ōrite a GE ina whakakitea ōna pūkaha panuku. Ko ngā waka rererangi e anga ana ki te pikinga o ngā utu hinu e hiahia ana ki te whakaiti i ngā utu, ā, kei raro hoki te umanga rererangi katoa i te pēhanga ki te whakaiti i ōna kohu waro. Engari i te māia ake o ngā whakatupuranga hou o ngā mīhini, ka nui ake ngā whakahekenga o ngā korohū kati kati i te tupunga o ngā waka hau, i Āhia hoki. I kī a Dr Peter Hollingsworth, kaiako pūkaha ātea i te Whare Wānanga o Manatāne, ko te tikanga o te ahupūngao taketake, tērā pea he tepe ki te nui ake o te tōtika e taea te tango mai i ngā hoahoa tīariari. "He tino wero. Na te tipu haere o te rererangi i te tere o te tipu, kaore he nui rawa ka taea e koe. Ka taea e koe te mahi i te toharite 1-2% kia whiwhi koe i te 20% engari he tino wero tēnā. "Ināianei he pai ake ngā mīhini, kāore te whakapai ake i te 20% i te wāriu, nā reira kei te mahi tonu koe me te whakaheke i ngā whakahokinga, ā, i te wā kotahi, kei te tipu haere te rererangi." Kua tautuhia e te umanga rererangi he ūnga o te 50% whakaiti i te kohu waro i te tau 2050 i whakaritea ki ngā taumata 2005 - ā, he āhukahuka ka taea anake tērā mā tētahi neke hurihuri i roto i ngā hoahoa. I waenganui i ngā ariā e whakaarohia ana ko ngā mīhini e mau ana i roto i ngā parirau me ngā propellers tītaka. I kī a Alan Newby, te kaipūkaha matua mō ngā kaupapa arā atu anō i Rolls-Royce: "I te mutunga, mēnā ka mahia e mātou ēnei huringa taketake, me tīmata te rererangi ki te āhua rerekē. " Kāore pea i roto i ngā tau 2020 engari i tua atu i te 2030 mēnā ka tutuki i a mātou ngā ūnga e hiahiatia ana e mātou mō ā mātou kiritaki me te taiao."

title: E whakahē ana a Harry Redknapp i a FA mō ngā kerēme a te kaiako
summary: Kua kī te kaiwhakahaere o te Rōpū Matua o Mua, a Harry Redknapp, tērā pea ka nui ake te mahi a te Pānga Whutupōro ki te aroturuki i tētahi kaiako o Tarapēke e whakapaea ana ki te tūkino hītori.
text: I kī atu a ia ki te BBC "ngā rongo" tērā pea i tūkinotia e Bob Higgins ngā kaitākaro rangatahi i ngā tau kotahi mano e waru tekau mā rua. Kua whakatūria e te FA a Clive Sheldon QC hei ārahi i tana arotakenga ki te tūkinotanga. Kua whakakāhore a Tēnā Higgins i ngā whakaaro katoa, ā, i whakawāteatia i ngā whakapae tūkino i te tau 1992. E mārama ana te AO ki a Tēnā Higgins i mahue i a Tēnā Higgins i muri i te whakaaranga o ngā māharahara mō tōna whanonga, ā, ka pāohotia e tētahi pakipūmeka pouaka whakaata te whakaaturanga a ngā tūpāpaku e waru. I kī a Mr Redknapp, ko ia te kaiwhakahaere o Southampton mai i te 2004 ki te 2005, ā, nāna hoki i whakahaere a Portsmouth me Bournemouth i te takutai ki te tonga: "Kua roa ahau e mōhio ana ki a ia, ko ia pea te tangata whanaketanga taitamariki i te whenua. " Engari kātahi anō ka huri haere ngā rongo i taua wā, ā, tērā tētahi hōtaka i mātakitaki ai ahau i kōrero ai tēnei taitama mō Bob Higgins me ngā momo mea e mahia ana e ia me ngā tamariki i Southampton, ā, i whakaaro ahau ko te mutunga tērā o ia. "E mīharo ana ahau kua uru a ia ki te whutupōro mai i taua rā." I kī a Tēnā Redknapp "tērā pea he tāngata" i Tarapēke i rongo i ngā rongo kua tūkinotia e Tēnā Higgins ngā tamariki. "He karapu whutupōro tino pai a Southampton, ā, kei te whakahaeretia e ngā tāngata tino pai i reira ināianei. " He kaiwhakahaere tino pai tā rātou, ko Lawrie McMenemy. Mehemea i whakapae a Lawrie i tētahi mea, e mōhio tūturu ana ahau ka tino whakaara a Lawrie i a ia. "Engari kia taea rā anō e koe te whakamatau i tētahi mea, he iti noa iho rānei ngā whakaaturanga, he tino uaua." Engari "E tino whakaaro ana ahau ka taea e te FA te mahi nui ake hei aroturuki i a ia me te whakarite kāore ia i whakaaetia kia hoki mai ki te whutupōro," tana kī. I kī a ia kāore i tonoa e ia tana tama ko Jamie ki Southampton hei kaitākaro taitamariki - engari ehara nā ngā rongo mō Tēnā Higgins. 'Kāore he wāhi tata' I te tau 1997, ka tukuna e ngā pirihimana me ngā ratonga pāpori he reta tōtahi ki ngā kura me ngā rōpū taitamariki e whakatūpato ana i a rātau "He mōrearea ki ngā tamariki a Tēnā Higgins". I kī a Tēnā Redknapp mehemea i whiwhi ia i tētahi reta pērā, kua "kore ia e tata ki tētahi wāhi tata" ki tētahi karapu whutupōro i whakahaeretia e ia. I muri i a Southampton, i utua a Mr Higgins e Winchester City FC engari he torutoru noa iho ngā marama i reira. I tētahi hui me te Kaunihera o te Takiwā o Hampshire me te FA paetata, ka whakaaturia ki ngā māngai o Winchester te pakipūmeka pouaka whakaata i rere i ngā tau tata nei, ā, i whakamāramatia e kore e tika kia noho a Tēnā Higgins ki te karapu. Ko Ray Barnes, ko te rangatira o Hampshire FA mo te 25 tau i te hui, ka whakawāteatia ā muri ake nei mo te whakaeke i ngā taitama tokotoru i roto i tētahi mahi kāore i te hāngai. I muri i tēnei ka haere a Tēnā Higgins ki te mahi mō ētahi atu karapu e rua, inā noa nei ko Fleet Town tae noa ki te toru wiki ki mua, e mārama ana te HAU. I whakatūpato te Rōpū Whutupōro i ōna karapu mō Tēnā Higgins i te tau 1989. I tohutohu tētahi reta i a rātau kia kaua e mahi tahi me tana wānanga whutupōro taitamariki, engari kāore i homai he take. I kī te reta i te Rōpū Whutupōro, te Pānga Whutupōro me te Pānga Whutupōro Kura Ingarihi i "ātete ki ngā ngohe a tēnei rōpū". 'Mōrea ki ngā tamariki' Kāore a ia i tirohia e ngā pirihimana mō te mahi whakaako whutupōro o muri mai i Fleet Town FC i te tau 2012 i te mea kāore tana mahi i mahi tahi me ngā tamariki. Tokoono nga kaitākaro taitamariki o Mua o Southampton kua haere mai me nga whakaaro mo Mr Higgins. Kua whakaūngia e nga pirihimana o Hemihana e uiui ana. Kua tohe a Tēnā Redknapp ki ētahi atu kaitākaro kia haere mai ki mua me ngā mea e mōhio ana rātau. Kāore anō te FA kia urupare ki ngā tākupu, engari kua whakarewaina he arotakenga ā-roto ki ngā whakapae tūkino hītori. I roto i tētahi kōrero, e kī ana: "Kua whakaputaina e te FA i tēnei rā ngā ture tohutoro katoa mō te arotakenga ki ngā take e puta mai ana i ngā pūrongo pēhi o nā noa nei e pā ana ki ngā whakaaro o te tūkino tamariki kāore i te whutupōro. Ko te arotakenga e hāngai ana i ngā mea i mōhiotia me ngā mahi i mahia e te FA mai i ngā tau kotahi mano e waru tekau mā rua. I kī te FA kāore anō kia mōhiotia te maha o ngā kaitākaro, ngā kaikino whakapae me ngā karapu ka tūhuratia. Kua whakatūria e ia a Clive Sheldon QC hei ārahi i te arotakenga, e whakakapi ana i a Kate Gallafent QC, i whakatūria tuatahitia. Kua kī a Southampton FC kei te mahi tahi me ngā pirihimana me te uiui me pēhea tana whakahaere i ēnei take i mua. He maha nga whakamātau a te AO ki te kōrero ki a Tēnā Higgins, kaore i angitu. I kī motuhake tētahi rōia e tohu ana i tētahi tinana hou e tautoko ana i ngā tūpāpaku "kei te haere mai ngā waea me ngā īmēra i ngā wā katoa" mai i ngā kaitākaro e kī ana kua whakahaua kia waitohu i ngā whakaaetanga kāore i te whakawāteatia ki ngā karapu hei utu mo te utu. "He pono, kua whakaritea ngā whakaaro e ngā tūpāpaku kua whakamahia ngā whiti matatapu e pā ana ki ētahi atu karapu, engari kāore au i roto i tētahi tūnga hei manatoko takitahi i tēnei," te kī a Edward Smethurst, e tūtaki ana hoki i te Pūtea Madeleine McCann. "Kei te puta i a tātau e kōrero ana. He tau. He maha (engari) iti iho i te rima." I puta mai ngā kerēme i muri i te whakapārewa a Chelsea FC ki te kaitākaro o mua o Gary Johnson mō te tūkinotanga i pāngia e ia hei tauira i ngā tau kotahi mano e waru tekau mā rua, i te whakarerenga i te whiti matatapu i roto i tētahi kirimana £50,000 i mahia e rātau ki a ia i tērā tau.

title: Ngā Hōnore o te Tau Hōu 2018: I whakatūria e te kohi pūtea mate pukupuku ko MBE
summary: Kua mōhiotia te manukura o tētahi aroha mate pukupuku o Te Motu o Tangata i roto i te rārangi Hōnore o te Tau Hou o te Kuini.
text: Kua whakatūria a Angie Aire, mai i Onchan, hei MBE mō ngā ratonga ki te aroha o Breast Cancer Now. For the past 10 years, Mrs Aire has led a team of volunteers raising more than £1.8m to support cancer patients on the island. I kī a ia i te whakahonoretitanga i mahue i a ia te "korero". I tāpiri mai a ia: "Kei te tino rekareka ahau, kei te kata mai i te taringa ki te taringa. " This is a wonderful award which I proudly accept, and in doing so thank our amazing group of volunteers at Breast Cancer Now Isle of Man". Ko ngā takahanga kohi moni a te aroha ko ngā Bra Dashes ā-tau, Snaefell Sleepover, me Douglas Bay New Year Day Dips. Ko ētahi atu tāngata Manx e mōhiotia ana i roto i ngā Hōnore o te Tau Hōu ko:

title: Rapunga a Leah Croucher: Ko te taitamariki 'i kitea 'e tangi ana i te roto'
summary: Tērā pea i "riri, riri, e tangi ana" pea tētahi taitamariki kua ngaro mō te rua marama i te rā whakamutunga i kitea ai ia.
text: I ngaro atu a Leah Croucher, 19, i a ia e haere ana ki te mahi i Buzzacott Lane, Furzton, Milton Keynes, tata ki te 08:15 GMT i te 15 o Hui tanguru. I kī ngā Pirihimana o Thames Valley e toru ngā tāngata i pūrongotia ngā kitenga o Ms Croucher tata ki Furzton Lake i waenganui i te 09:30 me te 11:15 i taua rā. I kī katoa te tokotoru e whakapono ana rātau i kite rātau i te wahine i runga i tana waea. I pūrongotia e te kaiwhakaatu tuatahi te kitenga i tētahi wahine e patopato ana i tana pūkoro i te taha o te roto i waenganui i te 09:30 me te 10:00. Tokorua atu kaiwhakaatu, e haere tahi ana, i whakaahua i te kitenga i tētahi wahine e tino riri, e riri ana, e tangi ana i waenganui i te 10:00 me te 10:15. Tata ki te 20 meneti i muri iho ka kite anō rātau i te wahine, a, ka kī mai kei roto a ia i te āhua marino, ā, tērā pea ka kōrero ki tētahi tangata i runga i tana waea pūkoro. I kī a Ch Insp Neil Kentish: "E tino hiahia ana mātou ki te whakatū i te tuakiri o te tangata i whakaahuatia mai ki a mātau e nga kaiwhakaatu tokotoru. " Ahakoa ehara tēnei tangata i a Rea, e hiahia tonu ana mātou ki te kōrero ki a rātou kia taea ai e mātou te whakakore i ngā kitenga i a mātau uiui." I whakaahuatia e Tēnā Keni te tūhuratanga ki te ngaronga o Rea he "whānui", me ngā āpiha e haere ana ki ngā kāinga e 4,000 me te kōrero ki ngā kaiwhakaatu tūpāpaku e 100. Kua mahi tahi te ope me te rōpū hara nui, ngā āpiha takawaenga whānau, ngā tīma rapu, te wāhanga maunga, ngā kurī pirihimana, ngā tohunga moana, me te ratonga hau pirihimana ā-motu. I kī ngā mātua o Leah, a Claire rāua ko John Croucher, i roto i tētahi kōrero: "Kua 62 ngā rā roa me te ngākau mai i te ngaronga atu o ta māua tamāhine ātaahua, whakamīharo hoki a Leah ki te hau angiangi. " I te wā tuatahi i pūrongotia ai a Leah e ngaro ana, i whakapono pono mātou ka tae wawe mai a ia ki te kāinga. "Engari kāore anō tēnā kia puta, ā, i te tīmatanga o ia rā e whai ake nei, ka kī tonu mātou i te pouri kua tae mai tētahi atu pō, ā, kāore anō mātou kia whiwhi waea, toronga rānei, ko te tikanga kei te ngaro tonu a Leah."

title: Ko te mahi rangimārie a Iharaira-UAE 'nui' mo te hokohoko i te Rāwhiti o Waenganui
summary: Ko ngā mahi rangimārie a Iharaira ki te UAE me Pāreina e "tino nui" ana mō ngā umanga me te hokohoko i te rohe, kua kī atu tētahi o ngā kaipakihi tino whai mana i te Rāwhiti o Waenganui ki te HAU.
text: E kī ana te kaipānui Pakihi a Honatana Hohepa, te manukura me te Tumuaki Whakahaere o DP World o Aotearoa, ka tangohia e rātou ngā ārai ki ngā hononga pakihi i mua "kāore i whakaaetia", mā te whakapoto i ngā ara hokohoko me te whakangāwari ake i te mahi ki Uropi. E huatau ana ngā whakatau tata a Iharaira i te hokohoko ki te UAE ka taea te tapeke i te $4bn i te tau, e waihanga ana i ngā mahi e 15,000. E whakaae ana a Tēnā bin Sulayem ka whai hua tahi: "E hiahiatia ana e tātau tētahi mea mai i a Iharaira, e hiahiatia ana e rātau tētahi mea mai i a mātau". He maha ngā kawenga ake e hāngai ana ki te hangarau, tae atu ki te haumarutanga ā-ipurangi, tae atu ki ngā mahi hou i roto i te rongoā me te ahuwhenua. Tērā pea ka tipu te hokohoko ki te whakauru i ētahi atu taonga ōkiko me te maha o ngā kawenga ake Āhia e rere ana i Aotearoa. I tēnei wiki, ka noho te MSC Parihi ko tētahi o ngā kaipuke utanga tuatahi hei haere i waenganui i ngā whenua e rua, ā, i whakaaetia tikatia e te pāremata o Iharaira te tiriti ki Ngā Ariki Arāpia. I karangatia e te Pirimia o Iharaira ko Pineamine Hoahoa te tukunga o ngā mea hiko, ngā taonga horoi, te rino me ngā taputapu patu ahi ko te "tīmatanga o tētahi mea tino nui". Ko DP World te kaiwhakahaere tauranga nui rawa o te ao, ā, kei te mahi tahi me te DoverTower o Iharaira ki te whakawhānui i tōna aroaro i te whenua. E kimi ana a Iharaira ki te whakapai ake i ngā pūkenga tauranga i Ashdod me Haifa e tino nui ana ki tōna whakahaerenga. Ko tēnei hiahia ki te whakawhānui i tōna aroaro e kī ana a Tēnā bin Sulayem kua āwhina i tana kamupene ki te mahi i te toenga o te umanga utanga i te wā o te taiepa Covid-19. I mua i te mate urutā, i whakahaeretia e DP World te 10% o ngā ipu kaipuke katoa e whakamahia ana hei neke i ngā mea katoa mai i ngā hiko ki ngā kākahu me ngā wāhanga motokā puta noa i te ao. Kua tautuhia te maha o aua ipu kia hinga i tēnei tau me te matapae a te WHK ka tīngongo te āhua o te ao whānui i te 4.4%. "He tino uaua ki te katoa," te kī a Tēnā bin Sulayem. "I ohorere katoa ngā kamupene kaipuke, ngā kaiwhakahaere tauranga, ngā tohutūmahi rārangi nā te raka me te maha o ngā hātepe me mahi e rātou [ināianei]." I ngā marama tuatahi e ono o te tau 2020, i whakahaeretia e DP World te 33.9m TEU (rua tekau waewae ōrite). He 3.9% tērā e hinga ana i te maha o ngā ipu kaipuke i whakaritea ki te wā kotahi i te tau 2019, me te hinganga nui rawa atu i Amerika me Ahitereiria. Engari he pai ake tēnā i te hinganga 5.6% o te ao whānui i whakaarohia e te umanga rangahau moana o Drewry. "He tino manahau te hokohoko", e kī ana te tohunga rangahau ipu o te umanga, a Haimona Heaney, e kī ana ko te hiki i ngā rāhuitanga, ko te tikanga pea mō te tau katoa ka heke iho te hokohoko huri noa i te 3.3% - me Amerika ki te Raki me Uropi e ārahi ana i te whakaora. E kī ana a Tēnā bin Sulayem ko te mahinga tino kaha o tana kamupene nā te mea "he tauwāhi tā mātou puta noa i te ao kia kore ai mātou e pāngia i te wāhi kotahi". Ka whakamārama a ia: "Kāore mātou i te pāngia noa iho e tētahi wāhi o te ao, kua tata tonu mātou ki te hora ōrite puta noa i te ao i waenganui i te Rāwhiti Tawhiti me Uropi ki Amerika Rātini, Ahitereiria me Āwherika. E whakapono ana mātou i te mutunga o te tau ka pāngia mātou e te iti iho i te 6%." Nā te taiepa i whakatere te whakarewatanga o te hangarau hou puta noa i te kamupene, ā, e kī ana a ia kua nui ake te aunoatanga me te "hua pai ake". Ko tētahi atu mahi nui mō te matua tauranga e ngana ana ki te aukati i ngā tīmatanga Covid-19 i ana mahi 127 puta noa i te ao. He maha nga tīmatatanga i runga i ngā oko utanga, ā, e kī ana a Tēnā bin Sulayem he tino uaua tēnei mo te umanga. Ko te nuinga o ngā whenua kua whakaritea he rāhuitanga pākaha huri noa i ngā huringa kaimahi, he uaua ki te hunga e mahi ana i runga i ngā kaipuke utanga te haere mai ki uta me te tauwhiti ki ngā kaimahi tauranga. Ko te tawhiti ā-tinana me te kāwanatanga horoi pākaha i te ngākau o ngā mahi a DP World, e kī ana a Tēnā bin Sulayem: "E whakawehe ana mātou. Kāore mātou e whakaaetia kia whāranu ki a rātou, ka horoi mātou, ka whakakorea e mātou ngā mea katoa e pā ana ki a mātou." E kī ana a DP World, e tūpato ana ki te "tino piri" ki ngā ture i ia whenua e mahi ana, ā, ko te manakē e pare ana i ōna kaimahi neke atu i te 56,000. Ka taea e koe te mātakitaki i te uiuinga katoa a Kāhui Wānanga bin Sulayem i runga i te Kōrero Pakihi me Arona Heslehurst, i te Rongokōrero o te Ao i te Hātarei 2330 GMT, Rātapu 1630 GMT, Mane 0630 GMT me 1330 GMT, Tūtira 0530 GMT me 1130 GMT

title: Ka waitohu ngā kaimahi NHS ki te whakamātautau kurī hongi Covid-19
summary: Kei te whai wāhi ngā kaimahi NHS ki tētahi whakamātautau kia kite mēnā ka taea e ngā kurī te hongi i te Covid-19 - ahakoa i roto i ngā tāngata asymptomatic.
text: Kotahi tekau mā tahi ngā hōhipera puta noa i te UK e whai wāhi ana ki te akoranga, ā, ko ngā kaipūtaiao e tūmanako ana kia 3,500 neke atu rānei ngā kaimahi ka homai he "tauira kakara". Kua tīmata te whakamātautau kia kite mēnā ka taea te whakangungu i ngā kurī rapunga rongoā ki te hongi i te mate. Mēnā ka angitu te whakamātautau, ka taea te whakamahi i ngā kurī i ngā taunga rererangi o UK ki te tirotiro i ngā tāngata e tae mai ana i rāwāhi. Ko te whakamātautau e arahina ana e te Kura Hauora me te Rongoā Ā-Rohe o Rāwāhi, i runga i te ngātahitanga ki te Whare Wānanga o Te Whare Wānanga o T Kua kitea kētia e nga ihu o nga kurī ngā momo mate pukupuku, Parkinson me te malaria, te kī a te upoko aroha o Claire Guest. E iwa tekau mā rua ngā kaimahi i te Hōhipera Whānui o Kettering i Northamptonshire kua waitohu ki te āwhina. Ka homai e ngā tūao he tauira o te manawa me te haunga tinana mā te mau hīpoki mō te toru haora - me ngā tōkena me te hāte mō te 12 haora. I kī te kaiārahi kaupapa, a Prof James Logan, ko te whakamātautau "ka taea te huri i te āhua o tātau tātari i te huaketo, e āwhina ana ki te whakahoki i o tātau oranga ki tētahi momo pūnoa". E whakaaro ana ngā kairangahau ka taea e ngā kararehe te mata tae atu ki te 250 tāngata i te haora. Kettering General Hospital's lead nurse for research, Joanne Walsh, said: "Our contribution includes recruiting staff volunteers from colleagues who are about to have a Covid-19 swab test. " Ka tukuna e mātou ngā tauira, tae atu ki te tīma e mahi rangahau ana me ngā kurī i Milton Keynes. "Kātahi ka taea tēnei te whakataurite ki ngā hua whakamātautau tūturu o te tangata kia kite ai mēnā he tika te kurī." Ko ngā tūroro whai tohu Covid-19 māmā, ā, kua whakamātauria rānei i roto i ngā haora 24 kua hipa, kei te tauria e ngā kairangahau. I whakaahuatia e Prof Steve Lindsay, mai i te Tari Biosciences i te Whare Wānanga o Te Whare "Kātahi ka taea e mātou te tauine i te whakamahinga o ngā kurī i ngā tauranga tomokanga hei tāutu i ngā kaihaere e tomo ana ki te whenua me te huaketo," tana kī. Kimihia te Rongokōrero o TE Rāwhiti o Ingarangi i Facebook, Instagram me Twitter. Mēnā he huatau pūrākau tāu, īmēra eastofenglandnews@bbc.co.uk

title: Te rangatiratanga o Welsh: He tokomaha atu ngā tāngata e manakohia ana, e kī ana a Plaid
summary: He rite tonu te taumata tautoko mo te rangatiratanga i Uēra ki tērā i Pākehā i te tekau tau ki mua, kua kī te kaiārahi o Plaid Cymru.
text: I kī atu a Arama Price ki te Whakaaturanga a Andrew Marr o TE AO "nui ake" e tautoko ana ngā tāngata i te ariā nā te āhua o te āhua o te whakahaerenga me te taumata ōritetanga i roto i te iwi o Welsh. I kī a Tēnā Utu mā te rangatiratanga e whakanoho a Uēra "ki tētahi ara pai ake". Engari i kī a Ariki Dafydd Elis-Thomas e kore tētahi taupānga ināianei e "whakaaro nui". I kī a Tēnā Price: "Kāore e taea e mātou te whakanoho i a Wales ki tētahi ara pai ake, i runga i tētahi ara pai ake, me te kore rangatiratanga. " Ko te taumata tautoko mo te rangatiratanga ināianei i Uēra i te wāhi i Pākehā i te 10 tau ki mua. "I ētahi tau poto i muri mai i tērā, ka tae mai a Pākehā ki te tawhiti o te pōti āe i roto i te taupānga rangatiratanga." Ko te matapakinga mo te mana whakahaere me te whakaaro o Pākehā e pupuri ana i tētahi atu taupānga rangatiratanga "ā muri ake nei" me "Aiarangi ki te Raki e mahi tahi ana me te Whenua", ka kī te Minita Tuarua o Uēra mō te Ahurea, te Hākinakina me te Ariki Tāpoi, a Elis-Thomas kāore a ia i whakaaro he "whakaaro nui" ki te pupuri i tētahi taupānga i Uēra "i tēnei wā". Engari i tāpiritia e ia he "hiahia nui" ki te "whakakaha" i te mana whakahaere i Weera. I a ia e kōrero ana i runga i a Dewi Llwyd ar Fore Sul o BBC Radio Cymru, i kī a Ariki Elis-Thomas kua mārama te taiepa "he whenua e whā nga iwi o Te Hononga o Ingarangi" ā, me "whakanuia" aua whakaritenga. "Kāore au i te mōhio mēnā he whakaaro nui te pupuri i tētahi taupānga mo te rangatiratanga i konei i Uēra i tēnei wā, engari e mārama ana kāore e ngoikore te kōrero mo te mana whakahaere mō Weera," tana kī. "Ko te whakawhirinakitanga tahi, te mahi tahi me te whakahaere i a ia anō, ko ērā ngā mea hira ki a au".

title: Ko te whitiāhua o te hokinga mai o Sofia Coppola e whakataetae ana i Venice
summary: Ko te taenga mai o te tumuaki o Amerika, ko Sofia Coppola, i waenganui i ngā whitiāhua e 22 e whakataetae ana mō ngā hōnore i te Hākari Kiriata o Venice.
text: Ko te kaihanga kiriata, nāna i kohikohi tētahi whakaaturanga tino pai o Oscar mō Lost In Translation i te tau 2003, ka whakataetae mo te whakawhiwhinga matua o te takahanga ki Somewhere. Ko ētahi atu whakaurunga ko Julian Schnabel, nāna i whiwhi angitu i ngā Tohu Wānanga me te The Diving Bell me te Butterfly. Ko te 67th annual film gala ka tū ki te taone Itari mai i te 1-11 o Mahuru. Ko te urutaunga a Shakespeare e 79 ngā whitiāhua e tūmanakohia ana kia whakaaturia mō te wā tuatahi. Ko te kaiwhakahaere kiriata o Quentin Tarantino e whakahaere ana i te hūri ka whakawhiwhia ki ngā whakawhiwhinga maha, tae atu ki te hōnore nui o te hākari, te Raiona Koura. Ko te whakaara ārai o te gala ko te kiriata o Amerika Black Swan na te tumuaki o Darren Aronofsky, i toa i te whakawhiwhinga matua me te The Wrestler i te tau 2008. Ka kati i te 10 rā i muri mai me tētahi urutaunga o te Tupuhi a Shakespeare, e whakaatu ana i a Helen Mirren hei wahine Prospero, i te taha o Russell Brand. Ka whakarārangitia ngā whitiāhua mai i ngā whenua e 11 mo te whakataetae matua i te takahanga, tae atu ki Tiamana, Kariki, Itari, me Rūhia. Kāore he kaiwhakahaere o Ingarangi i tīpako mō te takahanga o tēnei tau. Ko te whitiāhua a Coppola - ko tana tuatahi mai i a Marie Antoinette e whā tau ki mua - e whetū ana ki a Stephen Dorff me te toa o Hoka, o Benicio Del Toro. Ka noho tahi a Pene rāua ko Casey Affleck i te hākari, engari hei tautoko i ngā kaupapa motuhake. Ka whakaaturia te tuarua o te haerenga tuarua o Ben hei kaiwhakahaere i waho o te whakataetae, i te wā e whakaatu ana a Casey i tana pakipūmeka mō te wā o te kaitapere o Joaquin Phoenix i te mata nui ki te arotahi ki te pūoro.

title: Oranga-ki-te-mahi: E whakaatu ana ngā whika whaimana i te ūnga mahi i hapa
summary: Kua rahua te hōtaka oranga-ki-te-mahi a te kāwanatanga ki te tuki i tana ūnga matua, e whakaatu ana ngā whika whai mana.
text: I raro i te aronui, ka utua ngā whare me ngā aroha hei āwhina ki te kimi mahi mō te hunga kore mahi mo te wā roa. Engari ko te 3.53% anake o ngā tāngata i kite mahi mō te ono marama, neke atu rānei - e ngaro ana te ūnga 5.5% o te tauwhāinga. I kī te tauwhāinga e "pai ake" ana te kaupapa ki te mahi i te tangata, engari i karangatia e Labour tōna pānga "kino atu i te mahi i tētahi mea". Ko ngā whika, e taupoki ana i ngā marama e 13 mai i June 2011 ki Hōngongoi 2012, i whakaaturia e 878,000 ngā tāngata i uru ki te hōtaka, e 31,000 anake i kitea he mahi mō te ono marama, neke atu rānei. I kī atu te Tari Mahi me te Penihana ki ngā kaiwhakarato me whiwhi rātau i te 5.5% o ngā tāngata i runga i te hōtaka ki te mahi tautoko. 'He wawau' E kī ana, neke atu i te hawhe o ngā kaiwhaiwhai mahi i tīmata i runga i te hōtaka i June me Hōngongoi 2011 kua pau tētahi wā i ngā painga. I tautāwhi te Hēkeretari Mahi me te Hēkeretari Penihana, a Iain Duncan Smith i te aronui, e kī ana ki te HAU: "Neke atu i te 50% o te hunga kua tonoa ki reira [i runga i ngā aronui] kua tangohia ngā painga. O te 800,000 kua haere, neke atu i te 200,000 kei roto i te mahi." I tāpiri mai a ia: "Ki taku whakaaro kei runga tātau i te ara. Ko te utunga mā ngā hua e pā ana ki te kī kāore e hiahiatia e ngā kaihautū te mōrea." I kī te minita mahi a Mark Hoban: "He rā tōmua tonu, engari e hia mano kē ngā oranga e panonitia ana." I tāpiri mai a ia: "He tino wawao te huatau kāore te hōtaka mahi i te āwhina i ngā tāngata ki te mahi. Kua tata kē ki te 10% o ngā tīmatanga tuatahi i runga i te hōtaka mahi kua mahi, ā, ka noho ki reira mo te ono marama. "E whakaatu ana hoki ngā whika ko te 40% o ngā putanga 31,000 i whakaputaina i tēnei rā i tae mai i Pipiri me Hōngongoi - ko ngā marama e rua whakamutunga e wātea ana ngā raraunga - e whakaatu mārama ana kei te pai kē te mahinga." Kua hoatu ngā rōpū mahi kino i roto i te hōtaka tae noa ki Aperira ki te whakapai ake i a rātau mahinga. Kaore anō rātau kia whakaaturia e te kāwanatanga. I kī te Pānga Ratonga Pātahi Mahi, te tinana hokohoko mō te umanga ora-ki-te-mahi, e 20,000 ngā kaiwhaiwhai mahi e āwhinatia ana i ia marama. Neke atu i te 200,000 i kitea he mahi mai i te whakarewatanga o te aronui, ka tāpirihia. 'I kōwaotia' Mō te Mahi, te mahi kōruru me te hēkeretari hekenga o Te Wānanga o Te Wānanga o Aotearoa, i kī atu ngā whika i whakaaturia e ngā whika he "kino kē atu i te mahi i tētahi mea". "I te wā o tēnei pāremata, ināianei ka nui ake te pire ora i te £20bn i te mea i whakaritea. " Nā te mea kua kōwaotia e te tumuaki te whakaora, ā, nā te mea kua rahua te DWP ki te whakarite i tētahi hōtaka hoki-ki-te-mahi e mahi tonu ana," tana kī. I kī a Dave Prentis, te hēkeretari ahuwhānui o te uniana Unison: "Kāore te hōtaka mahi a te kāwanatanga i te mahi - he rahunga kino. I tawhiti atu i te 'rā o mua', neke atu i te kotahi tau e haere ana." I raro i te aronui - e whakakapi ana i te New Deal, Ngā Rohe Mahi me ngā Ara ki te Mahi - ngā kaiwhakarato kua whakaaetia i Ingarangi, Pākehā me Weera, ko te nuinga o ngā kamupene tūmataiti, e ngana ana ki te kimi mahi mō ngā kaikerēme i runga i te utu-ā-hua. Ka taea e ngā kaiwhakarato te whiwhi i waenganui i te £3,700 me te £13,700 mō ia tangata i āwhinatia ki te mahi, i runga anō i te uaua o te hoatu tautoko ki tētahi tangata, me te utu tuatahi i waenganui i te £400 me te £600. Kua kī te kāwanatanga e tūmanako ana te kaupapa kia āwhina te kaupapa i ngā tāngata e 2,4 miriona kia hoki mai ki te mahi i roto i te rima tau. He mea whakahau te hono ki te hōtaka mahi mō ngā tāngata neke atu i te 25 tau ina kore mahi mō te tau, mō raro iho i te 25 i muri i te iwa marama. Ko ngā tāngata i ētahi āhuatanga, pēnei i te hunga hara rangatahi, me hono i muri i tētahi wā poto ake. Ka taea e ērā i runga i ētahi painga, pēnei i te tautoko moni whiwhinga me te whakaaetanga tautoko mahi, te hono noa ki te kaupapa mēnā ka tutuki i a rātou ētahi paearu. Ina kōrerotia tētahi tangata ki te hōtaka mahi, ka noho tonu rātau ki runga i te kaupapa tae atu ki te rua tau.

title: Kimberley tram plan study gets council backing
summary: A much-discussed feasibility study into a new tramline beyond the M1 has finally got council backing.
text: Ko te raina whā he ara £180m mai i Rātata ki Ripley i Derbyshire, mā Eastwood, Kimberley me Langley Mill. I tētahi taupatupatu tuatoru, ka whakaae te Kaunihera o Broxtowe Borough ki te hoatu i te £20,000 ki te akoranga e £70,000. I kī ngā kaikaunihera o Lib Dem ka "taipitopito" te uiuinga, engari i kī te MP Conservative paetata o Anna Soubry he "iti noa iho te uara". I whakatuwheratia te raina kotahi o te tram o Rātata i te tau 2004 me tētahi toronga £570m - ngā raina rua me te toru - ka whakatuwheratia i te 2015, e ono marama tōmuri, i muri hoki i ngā amuamu mō te raruraru. Kua toa te rōpū Mahi i te kaunihera o Broxtowe i te ariā o tētahi raina tereina hou mō tētahi wā, engari i pōti te Lib Dems ki te akoranga i a Hakihea. I kī a Īna Taina, mai i te rōpū, i whakaaro rātau me nui ake te arotahi o tana utu. "Ināianei kei te rongo mātou i ngā akoranga mai i ngā mahi tereina o nāianei i Beeston, i reira he raruraru tino nui, kua whakaurua. " He akoranga nui ake, taipitopito hoki ināianei. "I ētahi wā i te Kirihimete, ā, me mahi tētahi mea - ā, me mōhio mātou mēnā ko te tram te whakautu." Broxtowe MP Anna Soubry said: "Broxtowe Borough Council is not the transport authority so any report is of little value. " Na te hanganga o te raina tereina o Nottingham ki Toton i whakararuraru ai i Beeston, Chilwell me Toton. "Mēnā he £20,000 tā Broxtowe ka taea e rātau te whakapau i tētahi hautanga o tērā ki tētahi uiui ki ngā mea kua tino hē me te ako i ngā akoranga."

title: Coronavirus: Te inoi moenga hōhipera a te wahine o Londonderry i runga i te huaketo
summary: Kua inoi tētahi wahine o Londonderry mai i tōna moenga hōhipera kia tino nui te whakaaro o te iwi whānui ki a Covid-19.
text: Nā Marie-Louise Connolly & Lesley Anne McKeownBBC News NI Health Team Sandra Kelly, 58, i kī atu ki a BBC News NI i wehi ia ka mate a ia, ā, e kore rawa ia e kite anō i tōna whaea 85 tau. Ka tae mai i te wā kua heke iho ngā kēhi o Covid-19 i te 49% i te rohe o te Kaunihera Takiwā o Derry me Strabane. E whakaatu ana ngā whika i te hekenga o ngā whakamātautau tōrunga mai i te wā i whakaurua ai ngā rāhuitanga paetata e toru wiki ki muri. I pōhiritia a BBC News NI ki te Hōhipera o Altnagelvin i Derry i te Mane ki te miramira i ngā pēhanga haere tonu o te taiepa i runga i ngā āhuatanga katoa o te tiakitanga. I pūrongotia e te Tari Hauora i Aiarangi ki te Raki e iwa anō ngā mate e pā ana ki te Covid-19 i te Wenerei, ka tae mai tōna tapeke ki te 680. E 840 anō ngā kēhi tōrunga, me te tapeke o ngā kēhi ināianei e 36,394. I kī atu a Mrs Kelly ki te BBC i whakaaetia ia ki te rohe 21 - he wae whakaora Covid tohunga i whakatūria i ngā wiki tata nei - ā, ka tūhono ki tētahi mīhini CPAP (pēhanga rererangi tōrunga tonu) hei āwhina i a ia ki te hā. "E mōhio ana koe he pakanga nui tā ngā tākuta me ngā nēhi e whawhai ana ki te whakaora i tō ora, ā, kāore koe i te mōhio mēnā ka ora, ka mate rānei," tana kī. I te tuatahi he mārire ōna tohu, engari, i te waru o nga rā, ka kino kē atu a ia. "I mau tētahi mea i tōku tinana, ā, kāore he mana," tana kī. "I mōhio noa koe he kino tēnei. I whakaaro koe kāore pea koe e mahi. "He mōrearea. I te whakaaro ahau mo taku whānau, taku tāne, aku tamariki, taku mokopuna. "E 86 tau tōku whaea, ā, he uaua te waiho i taku whaea. " Ko au anake te kōtiro me tana kaitiaki, i māharahara ahau ko wai e tiaki i a ia. "Ngā mihi ki ngā kaimahi nēhi - he tino nui rātau. Ko rātau te take i noho ai ahau i konei i tēnei rā." I tukuna e Mrs Kelly he whakatūpato tino nui mō ngā tāngata e haere tonu ana ki te takahi i ngā rāhuitanga coronavirus. "He tūturu a Covid. Ka tae mai, ka whiwhi i a koe," tana kī. "Me noho koe i runga i ngā tohutohu me te whakarongo ki ngā ture, ā, e tūmanako ana kāore koe e mutu ki te wāhi i mutu ai ahau." I whakatakotoria te tauine o ngā uauatanga i te hōhipera i tētahi hui whakahaere parahi i te Mane. I kī a Dr Mark Gillespie, te tumuaki āwhina o ngā ratonga tāhapa, ko tētahi o ngā raruraru tino pēhi ko te ngaro o ngā kaimahi, e 514 ngā tāngata i mate i taua rā. E 68 ngā tūroro Covid-pai e rongoatia ana i Altnagelvin, tae atu ki te whitu i te ICU. "He iti noa iho ngā rauemi. Tērā tonu te āhua o te pēhanga," te kī atu ki te hui. I tua atu i te whakatikatika i ngā kēhi Covid, i korerotia ki te hui, i taua wāhanga, e 27 ngā kēhi mate pukupuku haki whero e haere tonu ana. Ward 21, which until recently had been an elective orthopaedic facility, was operating at full capacity with 20 patients seriously sick with coronavirus - up from 15 last week. E toru nga mate i te wiki kua hipa - ka pā katoa ki ngā kaimahi e mahi ana i ngā neke 12 haora. I kī te nēhi o Laura Hegarty, e 29, i rongo a ia i te "ngenge, i te whakapau ā-tinana, i te ngākau ā-hinengaro". "He moepuku ora," tana kī. "E ngana ana ki te tiaki i ngā kaimahi, e ngana ana ki te tiaki i ngā tūroro me te tiaki i a koe anō, engari e ngana ana kia kaua e mau ki te kāinga, engari e ngana ana kia kaua e pā ki tō mahi hoki. " Kāore e taea e au te tatari kia mutu." Ko te whaea o te tokorua, e rangirua ana ana mahere marena mo Pipiri na te mate uruta, i kii ia e wehi ana ki te whakahoki mai i te huaketo ki te kainga, engari kei te whakatau ia kia haere tonu i te raina o mua. "I tono ahau ki te haere mai ki konei. I tūao ahau i Poutāpeta, ā, i tūao anō ahau," tana kī. "Kāore anō taku whāinga hei nēhi kia rerekē - ehara i te mea mō ngā take whakaharahara, ko te tiaki i ngā tāngata i te wā e tino mate ana rātou pēnei. " I roto i ngā tau e whā i noho ai ahau hei nēhi, koinei te wiki tino uaua o tōku oranga." Mō tētahi rā i mātakitaki mātou i te whawhai a te Hōhipera o Altnagelvin ki te huaketo - kotahi noa iho te matapihi 12 haora ki tētahi taiepa kua tae ki tōna iwa marama. Tērā te kōrero mo te wera o ngā kaimahi, te mate hauora me te raruraru i te pouri. Tata tonu ki te Taua e hoki mai ana i te pakanga, kei te rongo ēnei kaimahi hōhipera i te pānga o Covid. A, kāore anō kia mutu te pakanga. Pānuitia ētahi atu mea i konei. I tāpiri mai a ia: "He tūroro mātau mai i te 20 tau tae atu ki te 90. Ko ngā tūroro i roto i te 20 tau - ko ētahi o rātau e rite ana ki te māuiui me te pakeke. Ehara i te mea e pā ana ki ngā pakeke anake, pērā i te whakaaro o te iwi whānui. "He rite ki tētahi mea kāore anō ahau kia kite i mua. " Kua waimarie ahau kāore i pāngia te huaketo mai i Poutāpeta, engari e mōhio ana ahau ka pā wawe, ā taihoa ake rānei. "I just have to hope that following the hospital policy and the government guidelines that I'll keep myself, my patients and my family safe." I tēnei wā, e tū ana i waho o te rūnanga, ka whakaahuatia e Jim Kelly, i ngaro tōna whaea a Chrissie Kelly i tana pakanga ki te huaketo i tērā wiki, he pēhea tana "pau" i a ia. "I tere rawa te mahi," tana kī. "E ngana ana mātou ki te whakawhiti i te ohorere. " He tino uaua ki te tango." Ko Hēmi anake o ngā tamariki 11 a Whaea Kelly i kite i a ia i a ia e mate ana. "Ki te kore koe e pā ki a koe anō, kāore koe e aro nui ki taua mea, engari ina tuki ki te kāinga i runga i tētahi taumata whaiaro he tino uaua ki te tango." I hiahia a Tēnā Kelly ki te takoha ki ngā kaimahi - i whakaahuatia e ia he "anahera" - e mahi ana i te rohe 21. I tukuna hoki ki a BBC News NI te urunga motuhake ki te rōpū tiaki hauora e whitu nga tūroro Covid e whawhai ana mo o rātau oranga. I waenganui i ērā e mahi ana i te karaka ko te kaitohutohu ko Dr Manav Haina, nāna i whakamihi ki te iwi whānui mo a rātau mahi i ngā wiki tata nei. "Ko te tuatahi, ko te tuatahi e hiahia ana ahau ki te mihi atu ki a koe," tana kī. "Kei roto katoa tātau i tēnei. Ki te kore tātau e noho tahi i roto i tēnei, he oranga ka ngaro. "Ka kite koe i te wā tonu i puta ai te raka ka heke iho ngā whakaurunga hōhipera. Ehara i te mea kua puta tātau i te ngahere. "He rite tonu ta tatou korero, engari he mea nui kia mau tonu te tawhiti pāpori, ka mau tatou i to tatou hipoki, me tino mahara tatou ki te horoi i o tatou ringa. " Ki taku whakaaro kāore i a mātou te kōwhiringa, ki te kore ka takahi te pūnaha. "E hiahia ana mātou katoa ki te tūmanako - me tango tātou i ia rā, i ia wiki i te wā kotahi."

title: He mahere hou hei turaki i te hōtēra 'Conan Doyle' o Lyndhurst
summary: Kua tāpaetia he mahere hou hei turaki i tētahi hōtēra tawhito e kī ana ngā kōrero hītori i hangaia e te kaituhi o Sherlock Holmes, a Tā Arthur Conan Doyle.
text: I kī te Rōpū o Wikitōria e tautoko ana i tētahi mahi ki te whakarārangi i te Hōtēra o Lyndhurst Park o mua i Hēmihana i muri i te huratanga o te hononga o Conan Doyle. Kua tono anō te kaiwhakawhanake o PegasusLife ki te hanga i ngā whare whakatānga neke atu i te 70 i runga i te pae. E kī ana he "tikanga iti" noa iho te whare ki ngā taonga tuku iho o te rohe. Kua tāpiritia e te umanga e 15 "ngā kāinga utu ōrau" ki ngā mahere i whakakāhoretia e te New Forest National Park Authority (NPA) i te wā o Hui tanguru. Neke atu i te 240 ngā whakahē i whiwhia i te wā o te whakaaro tuatahi, he tokomaha e karanga ana ki ngā whare utu ōrau. I hangaia tuatahitia te whare hōtēra hei whare rangatira tūmataiti - Glasshayes House - i te tīmatanga o te rau tau 19. I kī te kaituhituhi hītori o New Forest, a Brice Stratford, ko Conan Doyle, ahakoa kāore anō kia mahi i roto i te hoahoanga, he ringa ki te hoahoa i ngā huānga o ngā whare maha, i tātuhia he mahere mō tētahi mata hou me tētahi toronga papa tuatoru ki te hōtēra i te tau 1912. E whakaarotia ana ko ēnei ngā tauira whakamutunga o ana mahi hoahoanga. Kua tāruatia e te rōpū atawhai o te Rōpū Wikitōria tana tono ki Ingarangi Hītori ki te whakarārangi i te whare kia kore ai e huri hei "paraka raorao". I kī a Dr Caroline Wilkins, o te rōpū Hoa o te Whare o Glasshayes, he "tino nui" te hononga mārama ki a Conan Doyle. "He tino kino, he hē hoki te hoahoa [whanaketanga kāinga], ā, ka whai pānga pāpori ki ngā pakeke e 150 e whakamahi ana i ngā pūkenga rongoā i te kāinga. Kaore he mea pai mo taua mea," tana tāpiri mai. I muri i te whakataunga whakarite tuatahi, ka whakairihia e te rōpū ngā pikitia e whakaatu ana i te tūkinotanga i roto i te whare, tae atu ki tētahi matapihi karaehe poapoa o Wikitōria. I kī te taupānga whakarite hou a PegasusLife ko te whanaketanga he "aronui tairongo e whakarei ake ana i te pūāhua" o te rohe. I kī te NPA ka tono i te kaiwhakawhanake kia whakahōu i te aromatawai tuku iho i roto i tana taupānga whakarite hou. Ngā Hononga Ipurangi Pātahi Te Mana Tūmatanui o te Ngahere Hou PegasusLife Te Rōpū Wikitōria

title: I hereheretia a Devon anthrax hoaxer mo te whakarite i ngā MP wahine
summary: Kua hereheretia tētahi tinihanga me te "mauahara ki nga wāhine" mo te rima tau mo te tuku pōkai paura mā ki ngā MP wahine, he MP Ūropi me ngā kaikaunihera paetata.
text: I tukuna e Rārangi Hayes, e 40, mai i Brixham, Devon, ētahi i tohua hei "anthrax" ki ngā tūpāpaku e 16, ko te nuinga o nga wāhine, i waenganui i Me 2011 me Aperira 2014. I kī atu te Kaiwhakawā o Mrs Justice Me i te Kōti Karauna o Exeter ki a Hayes nāna i "whakararuraru". E 16 nga whakapae i whakaaetia e ia mo te mahi tinihanga mā te tuku i tētahi taonga kino i raro i te ture ārai whakamataku. He maha nga wā i kī ai te tiati i mahue te wehi o ngā mātua nā te mea i a rātau tamariki i te whakatuwheratanga o ngā pōkai, ā, ka maringi atu te paura mā. I horaina ngā pirihimana i whakaakona ki ngā whakaekenga matū me ngā koiora ki te mahi i ngā pōkai, ā, i kitea he parāoa, he waipiro rānei. I mau a Hayes i muri i te tangohanga o tana DNA i muri i te whakatūpato mo te whakatīwheta i tētahi hoa o mua i te tau 2018. I muri iho ka whakaritea tōna tuhi ā-ringa ki ngā kupu i runga i ngā pūhera maha, nā reira i hopukina ai ia e ngā pirihimana pūtohu i te Wae Mahi Motuhake o te Rohe ki te Rāwhiti (ERSOU). I kī a Emily Cook, mo te wawao, i whati a Hayes ki tētahi hoa wahine i te tau 2011, ā, i kī tana pūrongo whakamātautau he "mauahara ki ngā wāhine i taua wā". I tukuna ngā mōkī ki ngā tari o: I muri i te whiu, ka kī te MP Mahi o mua mō Te Rāwhiti o Te Rāwhiti o Heidi Alexander he "kino mō ngā tāngata katoa e pā ana" te mahi, ā, i te mutunga ka rāhuitia tōna tari wāhanga mō ngā haora maha. I kī te MP Labour o Mua o Wolverhampton North East Emma Reynolds: "I tēnei take ka puta te paura i te tūkino, engari he whakamataku, he whakararuraru hoki taua mahi mōku me aku kaimahi." I kī ngā pirihimana i tētahi wā, i katia tētahi Poutāpeta mō tētahi wā nui, ā, i tētahi atu, i whakakorea he aituā me te tari ohorere. I kī a Det Ch Insp Īna Butler, mai i te wae Pirihimana Pūrarau o ERSOU, i "whakaoho i te mauri mārama me te āwangawanga ā-hinengaro ki te hunga e pā ana me ō rātou whānau". "E koa ana ahau kua kawea a Hayes ki te tika mo ana mahi māuiui me ana mahi pōhēhē," tana kī.

title: Me 'whai tikanga' te Moana moana e kī ana a Admiral Sir George Zambellas
summary: Ka mōrearea te UK ki te taka atu i te "wehenga tuatahi" o ngā mana hōia o te ao whānui ki te kore he pūtea penapena tāpiri, kua whakatūpato te upoko o te Moana o te Ariki.
text: Na te Ariki Moana Tuatahi nga kōrero, a Admiral Sir George Zambellas. Ka tohe a ia ki te kāwanatanga kia tuku ki te kawe mai ki te ratonga e rua ngā kaikawe rererangi e hangaia ana ināianei, ki te whakahōu hoki i te ārai karihi o Ingarangi. I kī tētahi kaiwhakaatu i tukua te hēkeretari waea ki te ārai karihi, ā, e hiahia ana ki ngā kaikawe e rua ki te ratonga. I pūrongotia ngā kōrero a Admiral Zambellas i roto i te Times, ā, ka haere mai i mua i te arotakenga waea a te kāwanatanga a tērā tau. E rua ngā kaikawe rererangi e hangaia ana i Pākehā, me te tuatahi, ko HMS Queen Elizabeth, ka whakarewaina i a Hōngongoi, ahakoa kāore e tino mahi hōia tae noa ki te tau 2020. Kua piki te utu o ngā kaikawe rererangi hou e rua e hangaia ana mō te Royal Navy ki te £6.2bn. I inoi a Admiral Zambellas mo tētahi taua moana "whai tikanga", a, ka karanga ki tētahi whakaaetanga kāwanatanga ki te whakahaere i ngā kaikawe rererangi e rua. He aha ka pā ki te kaikawe tuarua - HMS Prince of Wales - e tūmanakohia ana kia utu mō te £3bn, ka whakatauria i te wā o te arotakenga wawao i muri i te pōti nui e whai ake nei. I kī a ia me whāranu ngā manuao, ngā waka ruku me ngā waka rererangi, me te "tuku i tā mātou ārai [karihi] me te tuku i ngā kaikawe tika". 'Kua tautuhia anōtia' Ka kī a ia: "Whakaritea te Royal Navy 'kāore i te whai tikanga', ā, ka mutu mātou hei kaitākaro wehenga tuatahi. " Ko tā mātou kawenga ki te taua moana e whakahaua ana, e ārahi ana, ko tā mātou kawenga ki te wawao, me tā mātou kawenga ki te iwi e mahi ana mātou, ko te whawhai ki te tuku i tētahi taua moana whai tikanga. "Ka tautuhia anōtia to mātau aronga rautaki i te putanga mai o to tātau iwi i te whakahekenga, e kimokimo ana ki te rā o te wā o te ao. " Me tautohe pōturi tātau mēnā e hiahia ana tātau kia noho hei iwi whai tikanga, me whai tikanga tātau ki tētahi taua moana whai tikanga." E whakaū ana te Rōpū Rangatira ki tētahi whakakapinga ōrite mō ngā waka waka karihi e whā poti tīariari e hiahiatia ana hei pupuri i ngā tautiaki huri noa i te karaka - i te utu whakaaro o te £20bn - mēnā ka toa i te pōti nui e whai ake nei. I kī tētahi kaikōrero o te Manatu Arotahi: "Kua whakamāramatia e te hēkeretari waea e tiro ana ia ki te ārai karihi hei tiaki whakamutunga o te haumarutanga ā-motu o UK, ā, ka haere te kāwanatanga ki tētahi whakakapinga ōrite. " Ka whakatauria he whakataunga mō te wā heke mai o te kaikawe rererangi tuarua o Kuini Irihāpeti hei wāhanga o te arotakenga haumarutanga me te haumarutanga e whai ake nei, engari kua whakamāramatia kētia e te hēkeretari waea e tautoko ana ia i te ariā kia uru ki te ratonga ki te Moana o te Ariki."

title: I karangatia te hokinga mai o Coniston 2019 a Bluebird
summary: E kore te Bluebird a Donald Campbell e hoki ki te Takiwā o te Roto i tēnei raumati, kua pānuitia.
text: I tūtuki te waka ki Coniston Water i te tau 1967, ka mate te kaihautū o Campbell. I whakaritea e te Rōpū Mahi Takahanga Bluebird kia rere te waka rererangi i hangaia anō i runga i te roto i waenganui i te 19 me te 28 o Hōngongoi. Heoi anō, kua kī te rōpū ināianei e kore e haere whakamua me ngā rā kua marohitia "nā ngā āhuatanga tē mōhiotia". Kua whakapeka ki te kōrero anō. I kī te Tīma Kaupapa Bluebird motuhake, i whakatūria hei whakaora i te mahi, ā, i ngana te Lake District National Park Authority (LDNPA) ki te rapu whakamāramatanga mai i te rōpū, engari i "tūtaki ki te kore he urupare". "He maha ngā nganatanga" i mahia ki te kōrero ki te rōpū engari "kāore he hua", te kī a te tīma kaupapa. I hiahiatia te rōpū mahi kia tuku i tētahi mahere takahanga tūmatanui ki te LDNPA. Engari i kī tētahi kaikōrero LDNPA: "I a mātou e kōrero haere tonu ana, ā, ka haere tonu mātou ki te tuku tautoko, ka taea e mātou te whakaū kāore anō mātou kia whiwhi i tētahi taupānga katoa." I kī te mana "i noho pono tonu ki te tautoko i te hokinga mai o Bluebird i tētahi wā ā muri ake nei". I hoki mai a Bluebird ki te wai i Aotearoa i tērā o Aotearoa i Loch Fad, i te Motu o Bute o Pākehā, i muri i te whakakotahitanga e tētahi tīma tūao i te Rāwhiti ki te Raki o Ingarangi. I kī a Bill Smith, te kaipūkaha nāna i ārahi te mahi hanga anō hei wāhanga o te Kaupapa Bluebird, kāore i taea e ia te tiki taipitopito anō mō te take i whakatakatia ai te kaupapa. I tāpiri mai a ia: "E mōhio ana ahau he tokomaha ngā tāngata ka matekiri, ā, e pouri ana ahau kei te matekiri rātou. " I ngā wā katoa he ruarua ngā kōwhiringa mō te tauwāhi [o te oma panuku a Bluebird] ā, me whakaoti e mātou tētahi mea." Ko te hokinga ki Loch Fad i waenganui i ngā tūponotanga, te kī a Tēnā Hāne. I te 4 o Hānuere 1967 i te wā o te ngana a Campbell ki te whati i tana ake pūkete tere wai. I mate a ia i te tūtukitanga o te waka ki te roto.

title: Ko ngā wā tatari o Wales NHS teitei rawa atu i roto i te rua tau, e whakaatu ana ngā whika
summary: Ko te maha o ngā tāngata e tatari ana kia roa ake i te iwa marama mō te rongoā hōhipera i Wales kua eke ki tōna taumata tiketike i roto i te rua tau.
text: I piki ngā tau ki te 13,269 tāngata i te mutunga o Whiringa ā Rangi - he pikinga tata ki te 1,000 i te marama tōmua, ā, tata ki te 8,000 mai i Mati 2013. Ko te ūnga a te kāwanatanga o Welsh ko te tiaki i ngā tūroro katoa i roto i te iwa marama. I kī te Minita Hauora a Mark Drakeford i "raro i te pēhanga" te NHS o Welsh, engari i whakapuakina kāore i "raruraru". I kī atu a ia ki a BBC Wales: "He iti ake ngā tāngata e tatari ana i te NHS o Welsh i mua. " Kua heke iho te tokomaha o ngā tāngata e tatari ana neke atu i te 26 wiki, engari e pouri ana ahau ki te kite i te pikinga o ngā tāngata e tatari ana neke atu i te 36 wiki. "Kua whakamāramatia e au ki ngā poari hauora o te rohe, ahakoa i te wā uaua i te hōtoke, e tūmanako ana ahau kia arotahi rātou ki aua kaihoko roa ake, ā, e tūmanako ana ahau kia kite i aua whika e heke iho ana." E whakaatu ana hoki ngā whika whaimana i te 88% o ngā tāngata i tatari kia iti iho i te 26 wiki ki te tīmata i te rongoā. Ko te ūnga ko te 95%. I kī a Tēnā Drakeford ki ngā poari hauora paetata ki te whakahaere i te āhuatanga me te whakatere i ngā wā tatari "me noho hei manakē" mō te NHS o Welsh. Engari i whakaahuatia e te kaikorero hauora Conservative, a Darren Millar te āhuatanga he "raruraru nui haere". "Ko te whakautu anake a te minita ko te arotake i ana ake ūnga. He ngoikore tēnā kāore e kōrero ana i ngā wā tatari a Labour," tana kī. "He tokomaha atu ngā tāngata e tatari ana ki tētahi wā roa e kore e whakaaetia mō te rongoā, ā, e tohutohu ana ahau i a Carwyn Jones kia whakapōhēhē i te iwi whānui." I karangatia e te kaiārahi Democrat Liberal Welsh ko Kirsty Williams nga whika he "whakarihariha". "He wā tino uaua te tatari ki te tīmatanga o to rātau rongoā," tana tāpiri mai. "Ko te whakaiti i ēnei wā tatari roa me noho hei manakē mō tēnei kāwanatanga Mahi Welsh. " Ahakoa he iti rawa te tiaki i te mate pukupuku, he iti rawa ngā wā urupare waka tūroro, he roa rānei ngā wā tatari, kāore te kāwanatanga o Welsh Labour i te tuku i te ratonga hauora e hiahiatia ana e ngā tūroro i Weera." I kī te kaikorero hauora o Plaid Cymru, a Elin Jones: "Koinei te hua matapae o ngā poari hauora kāore i te whakarite i te pokanga i ngā marama o te hōtoke. " Kua whārōrō kē to mātau NHS ki te kaha, nā reira e mārama ana ko te hua anake o te hiki i te pokanga he roa ake ngā wā tatari."

title: E whakamahi ana ngā pirihimana i te rīpene hei pare i ngā manu pārurenga
summary: Kei te whakamahi ngā pirihimana i Aiarangi ki te Raki i ngā rīpene hei tautiaki i ngā wāhi kōhanga o ngā manu pārurenga.
text: Nā Conor MacauleyBBC NI Agriculture & Taiao Correspondent Kua whakamahia rātau ki te aroturuki i ngā wāhi e whakatoia ana ngā manu. E whakaarotia ana ko te wā tuatahi i whakamahia ai te hangarau pēnei i Te Hononga o Ingarangi. E whai ana i te tini o ngā kēhi paitini puta noa i Aiarangi ki te Raki i ngā tau tata nei. E ai ki te PSNI, e 44 ngā pūrongo o ngā manu pārurenga e patua ana i waenganui i te 2009 me te 2014. He maha nga peregrines e ngaro ana i ia tau ki te paitini ture, te tākaro, te tāwhiti rānei, e kī ana te Rōpū Ako Raptor o Aiarangi ki te Raki, e āwhina ana ki te mahi rangahau. Kei te whakahaere te Pokapū Taiao o Aiarangi ki te Raki i te mahi, he wāhanga tēnei o tētahi mahi whānui ake hei pare i ngā kōhanga o ngā kākahu peregrine. I te nuinga o te wā ka whakaarahia e te momo ōna tamariki i roto i ngā keri, i runga rānei i ngā pari pari. 'Kaipatu noa iho' Tata ki te 80 ngā takirua tāuri o ngā peregrines i Aiarangi ki te Raki, engari tata tonu ki te hawhe o rātau e rere tamariki ana i ia tau. Ahakoa kua nui haere te tokomaha o ngā peregrine i roto i ngā tau tata nei, kei te whakatoia tonutia rātau, e kī ana te āpiha kararehe o Jon Lees. "Ka taea hoki te whakararuraru i a rātou ki te wāhi o te whakarerenga kōhanga e ngā tāngata e hiahia ana ki te titiro tata atu, ki tētahi whakaahua rānei," tana kī. I kī te āpiha takawaenga o PSNI, a Emma Meredith, i homai e nga rīpene te kaha ki te tirotiro i ngā wāhi uaua ki te toro atu. I tāpiritia e ia te tikanga o te hangarau hou, "kāore he wāhi huna mō te hunga e whai ana ki te whakatoi i ngā manu mohoao". I kī a Ms Meredith e tino nui ana te PSNI i "ngā momo hara katoa, ā, kei roto i tēnei ko te hara kararehe pēnei i te tākaro, te paitini, te tāwhiti rānei i ngā manu pārurenga". "I ētahi wā, kua whakatakotoria ngā maunu (pēnei i te tinana rāpeti, tōtiti rānei) ki te paitini i te rohe tūmatanui," tana kī. I tāpiritia e ia ko ētahi o ngā kai i mahue ki te paitini i ngā manu i kitea kei roto te taonga rāhuitia, "tino mōrearea", ko Carbofuran. "Kaua e pōhēhētia, ko tēnei momo paitini he kaipatu noa iho, ā, ka mate hoki ki te tangata, ehara i te mea e mamae ana te kararehe anake, engari ka kitea hoki e tētahi tamaiti, pakeke, mōkai rānei, ā, i te mutunga ka pau ēnei maunu paitini."

title: I tangohia te pānuitanga o Center Parcs 'koretake' i te hau
summary: Kua rāhuitia tētahi pānuitanga pouaka whakaata mō ngā taunga hararei o Center Parcs mō te whakahauhau i ngā mātua kia tangohia a rātau tamariki ki waho o te kura.
text: Mā te whakatairanga i ngā wehenga waenganui wiki mō te £279, ka whakaaturia e te pānui ngā mātua me ngā tamariki pakeke kura, me te tānga iti e kī ana ko te tāpae "aukati i ngā hararei kura". I whakataua e te Mana Paerewa Pānuitanga (ASA) kia whakakore i a ia i muri i ngā amuamu e rua mai i ngā kaimātakitaki. I kī tētahi kaikawe kōrero o Centre Parcs he "tino pākaha" te whakahaere. I whakaurua e te kāwanatanga ngā ture uaua ake i te wā o Mahuru ki te whāwhā i te wā e ngaro ana mō ngā hararei. He kawenga ā-ture tā ngā mātua i Ingarangi me Uēra ki te whakarite kia haere tā rātou tamaiti ki te kura, ki te kore rātou e kōwhiri ki te whakaako i a rātou ki te kāinga. I ia Poutāpeta, i huatau mai tētahi akoranga a te hōtaka Parakuihi a TE KOTAHI i te maha o ngā whaina i tukuna ki ngā mātua e ngā mana ā rohe, neke atu i te 70%. I kī a Clearcast, te ratonga whakawātea pānuitanga nāna i whakaae te pānuitanga, ko te take o te hararei i te wā o te wā ko te kawenga a ngā mātua. Engari i whakataua e te ASA kua whakawhiti te pānuitanga o Center Parcs i tētahi raina mā te whakaatu i ngā tamariki e hākinakina ana i ngā ngohe maha i a rātou e whakatairanga ana i tētahi hararei e wātea ana i te wā e tika ana kia noho rātou i te kura. E kī ana "I whakaarohia e mātou ko te whakakaha o te pānui i runga i tētahi wehenga whānau, ā, ko te whakaaro whānui ka taea e ngā whānau te whakamahi i te tono pānui, kāore i te wātea i ngā mutunga wiki, i ngā hararei kura rānei. " I kitea hoki e mātou te kuputuhi whakamutunga i runga i te mata e kī ana 'Tō whānau. Tō wā', i whakaarohia e mātau he whakahauhau ki ngā mātua kia tango i te tāpaetanga. "Nā te mea i arotahi te pānui ki tētahi wehenga whānau hei whakatoko i tētahi tono e wātea ana i te wā wā anake, i whakamutua e mātou he whakahauhau i ngā mātua kia tangohia a rātau tamariki ki waho o te kura." Ko te 'tinihanga i te iwi whānui' Center Parcs, e rima ōna taunga i te UK, he pānui mō tētahi wehenga whā pō e £249 i rāhuitia i te tau 2012 e te ASA mō ngā take ōrite. Ko tētahi o ngā kaimātakitaki e whakahē ana ki te whakatairanga hou rawa ko Theresa Greenwood, he whaea tokowhā mai i Manchester. I whakatau a ia ki te whakapā atu ki te ASA i muri i tana kōrerorero i te pānuitanga o Center Parcs ki tētahi rōpū Facebook e kiia nei ko "Holiday Price Increase", e 17,000 ngā mema. "Kei te tinihanga rātau i te iwi whānui," te kī a Greenwood ki a BBC News. "E mārama ana te whakaahua o te pānui i ngā tamariki pakeke o te kura, nā reira i muri i te kōrerorero ki taua rōpū ka kī ahau ka amuamu tika ahau mō te katoa. " He nui rawa atu ngā utu i ngā hararei o te kura, ā, kei te pūtea mātou i ngā hararei mō ngā tāngata kāore he tamariki, tae atu ki ngā hua nui mō Center Parcs. "He pai ki a au ngā Parcs Pokapū engari kāore e taea e au te whakaaro ki te tango anō i aua utu. Tērā pea me tīmata rātou ki te whakarongo ki ngā kiritaki kia iti ake te whakarongo." I kī a Center Parcs 'tino pākaha' ki ngā mātua ki te whakamahi i te whakawā e pā ana ki a rātau tamariki. I kī tētahi kaikōrero: "I ngā wā katoa e piri ana a Center Parcs ki ngā tukanga me ngā tohutohu ASA, ā, kāore i rerekē te huarahi ki tēnei arumoni pouaka whakaata. " E whakaatu ana tā mātou pānui i te maha o ngā whānau, me ngā tamariki o ngā pakeke rerekē, e hākinakina ana i ētahi o ngā ngohe e wātea ana i Center Parcs. "Kāore mātou e whakapono e whakahau ana te pānui i ngā mātua kia tangohia a rātau tamariki ki waho o te kura, ā, e tino mārama ana ko te utu e whakaaturia ana e aukati ana i ngā hararei kura. I tangohia tēnei huarahi i runga anō i ngā tohutohu i hoatu mai ki a mātau e te ASA. "I tō mātou whakaaro, ko tēnei whakahaere ASA e tohu ana i tētahi whakamāramatanga hou o ngā tohutohu. " Heoi anō, i a mātau e whakapono ana he tino pākaha tēnei whakahaere, ka mau tonu mātau ki runga i ngā kōrero a te ASA, ā, ka mahi tonu mātou i roto i ā rātou tohutohu."

title: E tautohe ana a Tim Farron kia tauruatia te tau o ngā MP Lib Dem
summary: Kua oati a Tim Farron kia tāruatia te tokomaha o ngā MP Liberal Democrat i te pōti nui i muri i te mahinga a tana rōpū i roto i te panekōrero kaunihera.
text: I kī a Tēnā Farron kua whakanuia e te rōpū tana tiri o te pōti mā te 7% - engari i ngaro neke atu i te 40 ngā tūru. I kī a ia e haere ana nga Tohutohu mo tētahi horo pōti, ā, ka whakatūpato i te Lib Dems anake e tū ana i te ara o tētahi "āhua rōpū kotahi". I te tau 2015, i whakamutua e te Lib Dems me ngā MP e waru, heke iho i te 57 i te 2010. I te pōtitanga paetata o UK, kua nui te whiwhinga o ngā Tohutohu i te utunga o Labour me te UKIP, me te rōpū e toa ana i te mana o ngā kaunihera hou e 11 i Ingarangi me Weera. I a ia e kōrero ana i te wā o tētahi haerenga whakahau ki Hato Albans, i Hertfordshire, ka kī a Tēnā Farron kua "tino pahū" a Labour, i te wā e haere ana ngā Tohutohu mō te nuinga o te pōti nui o te 8 o Pipiri. "Whakaarohia tēnei, i te iwa o Pipiri me te nuinga nui ake i a Margaret Thatcher, whakaarohia he aha te tikanga mō tō whānau, he aha te tikanga mōu, he aha te tikanga mō tō haumarutanga mahi, he aha te tikanga mō tō hōhipera, mō tō kura," tana kī. I kī a Tēnā Farron kua tipu ake a ia i raro i tētahi kāwanatanga me te nuinga nui i tangohia te whenua. "E hiahia ana ahau ki te ārahi i tētahi whenua e kī ana kāore e whakaaetia," tana kī. I kī te perehitini o te rōpū, a Wheua Brinton, ināianei kei te "whakahā i ngā kakī o Labour" me tētahi pōti ā-motu i whakaritea e 18% ki te 27% mō te rōpū a Jeremy Corbyn. "Me te rima wiki o te whakahau pōti nui ki te haere, e 9% noa iho mātau i muri i a Labour me te hāhā i o rātau kakī," te kī a Lady Brinton. "Kua hauruatia e mātau te āputa i runga i a Labour i roto i te pō kotahi noa iho, ā, i whiwhi mātau i to mātau hua pōti ā iwi tino pai i roto i te whitu tau. " Kei te ngahoro a Labour, ā, ka tū mātau ki te iwi ki te whakarato i te ātete kaha e hiahiatia ana e tēnei whenua." I ngaro te whenua o Labour i Lincolnshire, i Cumbria me Warwickshire, ā, i ngaro i a Phil Johnson, te kaitono pōti nui o te rōpū i Nuneaton, tōna tūru i runga i te kaunihera o Warwickshire ki ngā Conservatives. I kī a Ex-MP Stephen Kinnock, e tū ana anō i Aberavon, he "tino kino" te mahinga a te rōpū. Engari i kī te tumuaki kōruru o John McDonnell ehara tēnei i te "ūkui e matapae ana te tokomaha o ngā kaiwaiata" ā, kei te hanga a Labour i tētahi "pūtake mārō" mō te pōti nui. I kī atu te tohunga pōti a John Curtice ki te AO "kua haere whakamua" te Lib Dems, engari kāore i te pai te mahi i mua i te tauwhāinga. Ko te tiri pōti ā-motu a te AO mō te Tories ko te 38% ki te 27% o Labour, te 18% o te Lib Dems me te 5% o UKIP. I rapu te kaiārahi Rangatira o Ēnā Me ki te whawhai i tētahi mārire i roto i te rārangi o tana rōpū mā te kī "kāore a ia i te tango noa iho" i te pōti nui.

title: Te mōrearea o Hapanihi: E whakaae ana a Tepco ki ngā here mo te āwhina o te kāwanatanga
summary: Kua whakaae te kaiwhakahaere o te tipu karihi o Tiapanī ki te whakarākeitanga anō i te āwhina a te kāwanatanga ki te utu i tētahi pire utu nui.
text: Ko ngā here i whakaaetia e Tepco ko te tapahi utu nui, kāore he tepe o runga mō ngā utu utu me te whakaae ki tētahi tūhuratanga o tana whakahaeretanga. E rua marama tonu te putanga mai o te nekehanga i muri i te rū whakararuraru me te tsunami. I mua o te kī a Tepco kua kitea tētahi atu māturu wai tino tāhae ki te moana, engari i taea e ia te whakatū i te rerenga. I kī tētahi kaikōrero o Tepco i whakatūria e nga kaimahi he māturu ki roto i tētahi rua rokiroki, e takoto ana i waho o te pūrere No 3, i roto hoki i ngā mita o te moana. I hiritia tētahi māturu ōrite i te pūrere o te tipu o Te Wānanga o Te Wānanga o Aperira ki tētahi matū motuhake e mōhiotia ana ko te karaehe wai. Kua māturu te tipu mai i te rū o te 11 o Poutāpeta me te tsunami i muri mai i ngā pūnaha whakamātao i te tipu rea ono. Neke atu i te 80,000 ngā tangata whenua e noho ana i roto i te 20km (12 km) o te tipu kua whakakorea i o rātau kāinga. Kua pā ki ngā ahuwhenua me ngā umanga, ā, kāore anō kia hoki mai ngā tangata whenua - kua kī a Tepco ka pau pea ki te iwa marama kia taea ai te whakaweto mātao i te tipu. Kei te rapu a Tepco i tētahi moni tārewa 2 trillion yen ($24.8bn) kia kitea puta noa i te ohorere tuatahi. E tūmanako ana hoki kia utua e ia te 50 billion iene ($620m) hei utu tuatahi ki te hunga i whakakorea huri noa i te tipu. Kāore i te mōhiotia ngā tūkinotanga katoa, engari e tūmanakohia ana kia teitei ake. E whakaaro ana te kāwanatanga ki te whakatū i tētahi tinana hou hei mahi i ngā utu ki te nui ake i te kaha o Tepco ki te utu. I roto i tētahi kōrero i te Tūtira, ka kī te kamupene e anga ana ki "tētahi āhuatanga tino taumaha" mō te kohi moni, ā, e hiahiatia ana he āwhina kāwanatanga kia taea ai te utu "tika me te tohuāki" ki ngā tangata whenua. E rua marama mai i te mōrearea māhanga, ka noho mārire ngā tāngata puta noa i te rohe pāngia mō ngā tūpāpaku. Tata ki te 15,000 ngā tāngata kua whakaūngia kua mate, ā, neke atu i te 9,800 kāore anō kia kitea, e ai ki ngā whika pirihimana hou rawa. Tata ki te 115,000 te tokomaha o ngā tāngata e noho tonu ana i ngā pūtahi whakawhitiwhiti - ko te nuinga o ngā rohe o Miyagi, Iwate me Fukushima. I mua o te Wenerei, ka toro atu a Emepara Akihito rāua ko tana wahine ki ngā whakawhitiwhiti e noho ana i tētahi whare tākaro i Te Taone o Te Taone. I kī te Koromatua o Fukushima, a Takanori Seto, kua whakarewaina e te haerenga o te emepaea nga wairua. "Ko te mea pono, kei te tino mamae nga whakawhiti. E hiahia ana rātau ki te hoki ki te kāinga. Engari i mua i o rātau rangatiratanga, ka kī rātau 'Āe, kei te pai mātau.' I whakakorikori ahau i tēnā," te kī a te koromatua ki nga kaipānui. "I ngā whare whakawhiti, kei te māharahara te tangata nā te mea kāore rātau i te mōhio he aha ka pā ki a rātou ā muri ake nei," tana kī. "Me whakatikatika te tipu karihi i ngā wā tata nei."

title: I kumea e Neil Young gig i roto i a Iharaira i waenganui i ngā āwangawanga haumarutanga
summary: Kua whakakorea e te kaiwaiata toka tōkeke, a Neil Young, tētahi konohete i roto i a Iharaira i waenganui i ngā āwangawanga ka ūkuia e ngā toa o Pārihia.
text: E hia rau ngā pūroro kua pūhia ki roto i a Iharaira mai i Kaha noho tata i tērā wiki me Iharaira e mahi ana i te maha o ngā tuki hau. I kī nga pirihimana o Tel Aviv ko te whakakorenga nā ngā mōrea haumarutanga. I kī tētahi kōrero mō te kaiwaiata Kānata i kumea te whakaaturanga "i runga i te ngākau taumaha me te pouri hōhonu". He haumarukore te takahanga i roto i tētahi kōrero i runga i te paetukutuku pūoro o Pitchfork, ka kī te kaikōrero a Young kāore e taea te haere whakamua "nā ngā renarena kua kore e haumaru te takahanga i tēnei wā". I tāpiritia ka hapa a Young i te wā hei tākaro mō ana kaihautū, ā, ka titiro whakamua "ki te tākaro i roto i a Iharaira me Pirihitia i runga i te rangimārie." Tata ki te 30,000 ngā tīkiti i hokona mō te konohete, i whakaritea kia haere tonu i te 17 o Hōngongoi i tētahi pāka o Tel Aviv. Ko te wā tuatahi tērā i mahia ai e Neil Young, me tana pēne, ko Crazy Horse, i roto i a Iharaira mai i nga tau kotahi rau e waru tekau mā rua. E kī ana ngā kaiwhakahaere o Pārihia e 172 ngā tāngata i Kaha kua mate mai i te wā i whakarewaina ai e Iharaira te Mahi Tapa Parenga ki ngā toa o Pārihia i tērā Tūrei. E kī ana a Iharaira e tata ana ki te 1,000 ngā pūroro kua pūhia mai i Kaha i taua wā. I tukuna e Young tētahi kōrero e kī ana ka "hoatu koha ki te Pokapū Pūoro Taitamariki o Iharaira, me Heartbeat, e rua ngā whakahaere e whakaako pūoro ana ki ngā taitama Pārihia me Iharaira i te wā kotahi mā te whakaahei i a rātau ki te purei pūoro tahi".

title: Ko te manukura uiui BHS 'me whakarere'
summary: Kua karangatia e te rangatira o mua o BHS, a Tā Piripi Kākāriki, ki te manukura o tētahi komiti Ngātahi e tirotiro ana i te tiango o te mekameka UK kia whakarerea.
text: I kī a Frank Field, o te Komiti Mahi me te Penihana, me tango te kōtiro o Tā Piripi ki te kore ia e utu i te £571m ki te pūtea penihana a BHS. I kī a Tā Piripi me tū a Tēnā Āpure "i a ia e mārama ana te whakaaro nui". Motuhake, kua whakatūria te manukura o Mark rāua ko Spencer ki te tohutohu i ngā MP mo te tiango o BHS. I runga a Ariki Myners i te poari M&S i te wā i whawhai ai ki tētahi tono mai i a Tā Piripi i te tau 2004. E pā ana ki te kōrero a Tēnā Āpure, ka kī a Tā Piripi he "pahūtanga mōrihariha", kātahi anō ka "wehi" a ia i te MP "kua rite ki te kōrero pēnei i te wāhi tangata". I roto i ana kōrero tūmatanui tuatahi mo te tiango o BHS, ka kī a Tā Piripi: "E mārama ana kua whakatau kē ia ki tāna e whakaaro ana ko te whiu me te kore rongo i tētahi whakaaturanga mai i tētahi tangata mō BHS, i ngā āhuatanga rānei o ngā tau e 15 kua taha." I whakapuakina e tētahi pūtake komiti ko ngā kōrero a Tēnā Āpure ōna ake whakaaro whaiaro. I hokona e Tā Piripi te BHS i te tau 2000 mō te £200m, engari i hokona ki Retail Acquisitions i tērā tau mō te £1. Kua anga atu a ia ki te whakahē mo tana mahi i muri i te haerenga o BHS ki te whakahaere i tērā marama, e whakawehi ana i ngā mahi e hia mano. I 'tūtuki te BHS ki roto i te pari' 'He aha tā mātou e hapa mēnā ka kati a BHS' Ngā kī taurangi pakaru i BHS? Kua whakaae a Tā Piripi ki te putanga mai i mua i te Komiti Mahi me te Komiti Mahi me te Komiti Pūkenga Pakihi, e tūtakina ana e Iain Wright, ki te whakautu pātai mō te tiango. Kua tuhituhi a Tā Piripi ki ngā manukura o te komiti e rua o Te Rūnanga e tono ana kia mutu tana "whakawātanga mā te pāpāho". I kī a Tā Piripi e hiahia ana ia ki te hopu i ōna māharahara mō ngā kōrero maha i mahia e rātau ki te pēhi "hei tauira, e karanga ana kia ngaro taku kōtiro, e huatau ana rānei kua tangohia e au te BHS me te kore whakaaro ki ngā penihana me ngā kaimahi. " E hua ana ēnei kōrero kei te peke koe ki ngā whakatauranga i mua i te rangona o ngā whakaaturanga mai i tētahi kaiwhakaatu. "E huatau ana rātou kāore he ngana tūturu ki te whakahaere i ō uiui i runga i te huarahi tika, ā, kua whakaritea kētia te putanga." I tāpiritia e ia ka iti iho te hiahia o nga kaiwhakaatu ki te homai āwhina tūturu ki te kore nga manukura o te komiti e mahi i runga i te tikanga haepapa. I kī a Tā Piripi i pōhiritia e ia te wā hei āwhina i ngā komiti e "tino hiahia ana kia tae ki te pono i runga i te huarahi tika, whārite hoki, i runga anō i ngā take tūturu." I hangaia ngā kōrero a Tēnā Āpure i runga i te kaha whaiaro ki te Financial Times, ā, kāore anō kia kōrerorerotia e ngā komiti e rua e pā ana. I whakaūngia e ia ki te AO kua whiwhi ia i te reta, ā, ka tāpiri mai: "E kore te Pāremata e whakaweti." Kāore i taea e te AO te tae atu ki a Tēnā Wright mō tētahi kōrero. I te Wenerei, ka tonoa e te Hēkeretari Pakihi o Stuad Javid te Ratonga Kōrero Kōrero kia tūhura ināianei tonu i te tiango o BHS. I kī a Tēnā Javid i roto i tētahi kōrero: "Ka titiro tēnei tūhuratanga ki te whanonga o nga kaiwhakahaere i te wā o te kōrero kōrero me ētahi tangata he kaiwhakahaere i mua. Ka tino nui te take o te hē." I te wā o te hokonga o BHS i tērā tau, he pātai mō te kore wheako hokohoko o Dominic Chappell me tana tīma i Retail Acquisitions, i noho ko te kaipupuri nui o te mekameka pātaka tari. I te rua wiki ki mua, ka taka te umanga ki te whakahaere me ngā nama o te £1.3bn - tae atu ki te tāpaetanga penihana o te £571m - e 11,000 ngā mahi e mōrearea ana puta noa i ngā pātaka 164 puta noa i te motu. E whakapono ana a Tā Piripi kua tono kia homai mō te £80m hei āwhina ki te mono i te tāpaetanga penihana, engari kua anga kē atu ia ki ngā whakapae a Tēnā Wright nāna i tūtuki a BHS "ki roto i te pari". Ngā pātai penihana i mua i te āhua o Tā Piripi, ka rongo te Komiti Mahi me te Penihana mai i te Kaiwhakahaere Penihana me te Pūtea Parenga Penihana, ngā Kaitiaki Penihana BHS, me Tēnā Kānata. Kaore he huatau i mahi a Tā Piripi i tētahi mea kore mana. Heoi anō, i tērā wiki ka kī atu a Ariki Myners ki a Tā Piripi he pātai nui hei whakautu mo tana kaitiakitanga o BHS. I kī a Ariki Myners: "Ko te pātai nui mēnā i te wā i hokona ai e Piripi Kākāriki te BHS ki tētahi rōpū tangata kāore he wheako hokohoko, i arahina e tētahi atekōkiri motokā rēhi iti o mua, ā, e rua ngā wā o te tangata pōraru... he rawaka ngā rawa o te aronui penihana hei whakatutuki i ōna taunaha." I te Paraire, ka whakatūria e te Komiti Mahi me te Penihana a Ariki Myers, nāna hoki i mahi hei minita Taone i raro i a Kōnata Paraone, hei ārahi i tētahi tīma tohunga pūtea hei āwhina i ngā MP ki te tūhura i te tiango o BHS. Kua tauria hoki a Tā David Norgrove, te kaiwhakahaere o te Komihana Utu Iti me te manukura o mua o te pūtea penihana a M&S, hei kaitohutohu tohunga ki te komiti.

title: Ka whakaekea e te kaimahi ohorere te ture e pūruatia ana e ngā AM
summary: Kua kī tētahi pirihimana e karapoti ana i tētahi rōpū, ā, ka patua e ia ngā huringa ki te ture kia nui ake ai te parenga o nga kaimahi ohorere.
text: He āpiha ōrite a Hemi Dowler mō ngā Pirihimana o South Wales i tana whakamātau ki te whakatū i tētahi atekōkiri whakatūpato. I werohia ōna whatu e tētahi pāhihi wahine, i mua i te kōwhao i te kanohi. Tokotoru o nga kainoho motokā i hereheretia mo te whakaeke. I hoatu e ngā AM ta rātau tautoko i te Tūrei ki tētahi ture hou mō ngā kaimahi 999. E hiahia ana a Labour MP Chris Bryant ki te tārua i te rerenga mōrahi mo te whakaekenga noa ki tētahi kaimahi ohorere ki te tau. I kī te MP o Rhondda e 20 ngā whakaekenga pērā i Uēra i ia rā. I whakaae ngātahi ngā AM i te Tūtira ka taea e te ture Paremata, kua tautokona e ngā kāwanatanga o UK me Welsh, te hoatu ki ngā whakaekenga ki ngā kaimahi i te NHS o Welsh me ngā ratonga ahi. I kī a Det Sgt Dowler me pōhiritia ētahi atu parenga mō ngā kaimahi 999, i a ia e whakaahua ana i te whakaekenga ki a ia. I tū tōmuri a ia i te pō i muri i tana kitenga i tētahi motokā i whakatūria me te paowa e puta mai ana i nga wīra. Engari i a ia e whakatata ana ki te waka, ka oma atu te atekōkiri, a, ka whaia ia e te āpiha - ka mutu ki runga i te papa me taua tangata.
