"I a au e pupuri ana i te atekōkiri i runga i te papa, ka peke tētahi o ngā kainoho wahine o te motokā ki runga i taku tuarā, a, ka tīmata ki te kōpikopiko i taku whatu," tana kī atu ki te hōtaka Good Morning Wales i te Reo Irirangi o TE Reo Irirangi o Wales. "I mōhio ahau i taua wā kei roto ahau i te raruraru nui ki te tokomaha o ngā tāngata e karapoti ana i a au, ā, ko au anake." I taea e ia te whakahohe i tana pūoho reo irirangi ohorere, engari kātahi ka whiua atu e nga kaihōia tana reo irirangi. "I tino mōrearea ahau, a, ko au anake i taua wā." I tupu anō tētahi kōaro ki tētahi atu pāhihi, i mua i tana patunga. "I te kākari mātau mō tētahi wā poto, ā, i taua wā ka kōwhao ia i ahau ki te kanohi, a, ka hinga ahau ki te papa i roto i tētahi āhua o te mōhiotanga." I kī a ia i whakaahuatia e te kaiwhakawā ōna whara kanohi ko ētahi o ngā mea kino rawa i kitea e ia, i te maunga o nga kaihōia tokotoru, a, ka haere ki te kōti. E ono marama te whiu i hoatu ki te atekōkiri, a, e rua tau te wā i whiwhi ai ērā atu kaihōia tokorua. He aha te ture kua whakaritea? Kua peke kē te Pire Assaults on Emergency Workers (Offences) i ētahi taiapa paremata nui i muri i te toa a Chris Bryant i te pōti i tērā Pipiri ki te kawe mai i tana tono mo tētahi ture hou. Ahakoa i pūruatia e ngā AM te ture i te Tūrei, ko ngā MP i Aotearoa ka whakaturetia. Kua whakatakina te pire me te pānui tuarua nui i te Whare o Ngātahi, ā, kua whakaarohia i te wāhanga o te komiti. Ināianei ka hoki mai ki mua i ngā MP i Aperira, i mua i te whakaarotanga a ngā hoa i te Whare o Ariki. Ki te toa tonu i te tautoko a te rōpū, ka tū tētahi wā pai ki te whakarite i a ia hei pukapuka tikanga. E tono ana te ture kia whakanuia te wā whare herehere mōrahi mo te hara o te tūkinotanga noa iho mai i te ono marama ki te 12 mēnā he kaimahi ohorere te tūkino. Mēnā he nui ake te hara i te tūkinotanga noa iho - he hara e pā ana ki te whara ā-tinana - ka whakaakona te mea he kaimahi ohorere te tūkino ina whiu i te hunga hara. Tērā pea he iti ake ngā rerenga whakatārewa ā muri ake nei, me ngā whiu mārō ake a ngā kaiwhakawā. Ka taea hoki te tango i ngā tauira toto mai i te hunga e whakapaetia ana ki te whakaeke, i te wāhi e mōrearea ana te hora i tētahi mate urutā mā ā rātou mahi, pēnei i te tuwha, te ngau rānei i tētahi tangata. "Ko te whakaekenga o tētahi kaimahi ohorere, he whakaeke ki a tātau katoa nā te mea kei te ngana noa rātou ki te whakaora i ngā oranga o ētahi atu tāngata," te kī a Tēnā. "E whakaaro ana ahau me kī nui, kia mārama hoki mēnā ka whakaekea e koe tētahi kaimahi ohorere, e kore mātou e whakaae." Ko ngā tikanga i muri i te pire a Tēnā Bryant kua pūruatia e ngā minita kāwanatanga o UK, ā, i tautokona e ō rātou hoa mahi Welsh Conservative i roto i te whakaminenga te mōtini whakaaetanga mō te pire. I kī te hēkeretari hauora o Welsh, a Vaughan Gething: "He mīharo te rongo i ngā pūrongo haere tonu o ngā kaimahi ohorere e whakaekea ana i te tinana, i te ā-waha hoki i a rātau mahi, e ngana ana ki te tiaki i a tātau katoa. He wāhanga tēnei pire mo te mahi i tēnei. "E hiahia ana mātou kia ōrite te parenga o ngā kaimahi ratonga ohorere i Uēra ki ērā i Ingarangi me ngā tauine wā ōrite." I raro i ngā ture tīariari, me whakaae ngā AM ki ngā ture mai i te Pāremata e pā ana ki ngā mana e tukua ana ki te Whakaminenga o Welsh me te Kāwanatanga o Welsh. I tēnei take, i whakatakotoria e te Kāwanatanga o Welsh te mōtini nā te mea ka pā te ture ki te NHS me ngā ratonga ahi me ngā ratonga whakaora, e whakawāteatia ana. Whakatika 28 Mahuru 2018: I whakahōutia tēnei pūrākau kia mārama ai kāore ngā tāngata e āwhina ana i ngā kaimahi ohotata e hipokina ana e te ture.

title: E £30k te whakahou o te whare noho o Downing Street
summary: I pau i te pirimia te katoa o te £30,000 o ngā moni a ngā kaihautū e wātea ana ki a ia ki te whakahou i tōna whare noho whai mana i tērā tau ā-pūtea, kua whakaūngia e Downing Street.
text: E kī ana ngā Kaiwhakahaere Rongokōrero o TE AO kāore he moni tūmatanui i pau ki ngā taonga, ngā taputapu, ngā apatoko rānei. I haere kē ki ngā mahi hiko me ngā paipa, ngā whakarerekētanga hanganga, me te peita me te whakapaipai. I kī te MP Labour a Tom Watson ko te koha £30,000 he "bonus huna mō te PM" mō tētahi whare noho kore rēti e noho ana ia. I kī a Downing Street ko ngā utu whakahoutanga i runga ake i te tahua £30,000 i utua e te Camerons anō. I te tīmatanga o tēnei wiki ka tukua e te Whare Mā tētahi pikitia o Arāna rāua ko Mīharo i roto i te whare noho kātahi anō ka whakahoutia i runga ake i te Tau 11 o Downing Street, e noho ana te PM me tōna whānau. Ko te pikitia i whakaatu, mo te wā tuatahi, te kīhini hou i tāutatia. I kī atu a Labour MP Mr Watson ki te BBC: "Ko nga Pirimia pai e ārahi ana i runga i te tauira. E kī ana a Rawiri Karauna me whakamau te wāhanga tūmatanui i ngā tātua, ā, ka mā i te wāhi e pau ai ngā moni a ngā kaihautū. Heoi anō, ina tae mai ki te whare noho o Downing Street, ka kite tātau i te whakakore ki te whakautu i ngā pātai taketake mō ngā utu. Ināianei kua whakahaua ia ki te whakaae he utu neke atu i te £30,000 hei whakahou i tōna aroha noa me te manako ki te kāinga - neke atu i te utu pirihimana. Kei roto tonu tātau katoa i tēnei?" I kī ngā pūtake o Te Tiriti o Te Tiriti i pau i waenganui i te £28,150 me te £29,389 o te tahua ā-tau mō te whakahou i te whare o te PM i tōna wā e mahi ana. Figures from the Cabinet Office show a total of £683,102 has been spent refurbishing and renovating Number 10 since the general election. I kī tētahi kaiwhakaatu i whakarewaina tētahi hōtaka whakahōu i te tau 2006 i raro i te kāwanatanga whakamutunga ki te whakatau i ngā tapi hanganga i Te Tiriti o Downing. Ko ngā whika mō ngā tau o mua e whakaatu ana i te tata ki te £1.5m i pau i te 1996/1997, £1.3m i te 2007/08 me te £802,658 i te 2001/02 e pupuri ana i te pānga o Downing Street, ahakoa kei roto pea i ēnei whika te mahi i ngā Nama 10, 11 me te 12. Ngā Hononga Ipurangi Pātahi Downing Street

title: Ko te hōtēra tīmatanga o Ludlow Legionnaires hei hoko
summary: Kua haere tētahi hōtēra i te pokapū o te tīmatanga o te Legionnaires i mate ai tētahi wahine.
text: I katia te Hōtēra Feathers i Ludlow, Shropshire, i te marama o Mahuru i tērā tau i muri i te pāngia e Elaine Brown, e 69, te mate i muri i te nohonga o Hōngongoi. I whakatuwheratia anō i Whiringa ā Rangi, i te wā i kī ai te Kaunihera o Shropshire me te Hauora Tūmatanui o Ingarangi he hari rātau kua mahia. Ināianei kua hokona mō te £2.65m mā Christie & Co. I hangaia te hōtēra i te tīmatanga o te rau tau 17, ā, e kī ana ngā māngai pānga e kimi ana ōna rangatira o nāianei ki te whakatā. Kei roto i te hoko ko te hōtēra 40 rūma moe, e whā ngā wae hokohoko, e rēti ana i tēnei wā, me tētahi whare moenga e whā. I kī a Charles Jones, mai i Christie & Co: "E tūmanako ana mātou kia kite i te huamoni nui mai i ngā tohutūmahi paetata, ā-motu, ao whānui hoki." Kua kawea mai e te hōtēra ngā arotakenga pai mai i ngā āhuatanga o Nikolaus Pevsner me te New York Times, engari i puta te rongo mō tētahi take tino rerekē i tērā tau. I mate a Elaine Brown, mai i Liverpool, i te waenganui o Aotearoa, i muri noa iho i te maunga o tētahi atu manuhiri i te mate. I katia noatia te hōtēra i te raumati i te kitenga o te Hauora Tūmatanui o Ingarangi i tētahi hononga ki ngā huakita i roto i ōna tauira wai. Kei te haere tonu te tūhuratanga ki te matenga o Mrs Brown.

title: E whakaatu ana te uiuinga i ngā mātua e hoko waipiro ana mō ā rātou taiohi
summary: Tata ki te 40% o ngā mātua e hoatu waipiro ana ki a rātau 16 me te 17 tau ki te haere hararei me ngā hoa ki te whakanui i te mutunga o ngā whakamātautau, kua whakaaturia mai e tētahi uiuinga.
text: O ngā mātua e 1,000 i pātaitia e Drinkaware, neke atu i te haurua i kī ka homai e rātau e rima, neke atu rānei ngā pounamu waina, wairua rānei mō te wiki. The charity is tackling alcohol misuse in the Cornish resort of Newquay this summer with local council and police. Tokorua nga tauira i mate i te taone i tērā tau i muri i te takanga mai i nga pari. Hei wāhanga o te mahi Haumaru o Newquay, kei te tūtakina ngā taiohi e tae ana ki te taone ki ngā pirihimana me ngā kurī hongi. Ka murua ngā waipiro katoa e kitea ana i raro iho i te 18 tau. E whakahau ana te whakahau 'Got Your Back' i ngā hoa kia tiaki tētahi ki tētahi, kia whakaaro hoki ki ngā mōrea mo te wā poto o te inu waipiro nui. I roto i te uiuinga, 36% o ngā mātua i kī e hiahia ana rātau ki te tiki waipiro i a rātau i a rātou, kaua ki tētahi pūtake tē mōhiotia, ā, e 22% i whakaae ka hokona e rātau he waipiro taitamariki hei aroturuki i te nui o ta rātau inu. I kī a Pirihi Sorek, te rangatira nui o Drinkaware, ko te hoko waipiro ka mōrearea pea a rātau tamariki. "He maha ngā pakeke 16 me te 17 tau e hiahia ana ki te tohu i te mutunga o ngā whakamātautau mā te whakanui me ngā hoa i tētahi haerenga atu," tana kī. "Tērā pea ka whakaaro ngā mātua kei te mahi rātou i te mea tika mā te whakarite kia puta mai te waipiro i a rātou, kaua ki tētahi atu wāhi, engari ina inu nui rawa te rangatahi ka whakararuraru i tō rātou haumarutanga whaiaro." I kī te wāhi kore waipiro, a Tēnā Sorek, ka taea hoki te whakanui ake i ngā wā o ngā taitamariki e noho ana i te wahine kāore i te parea, i te aituā rānei. I tāpiri mai a ia: "Hei āwhina i a rātau tamariki kia noho haumaru, me karo ngā mātua i te hoatu waipiro ki a rātau mō ngā hararei kāore i te mātakitaki, me te kōrero ki a rātau mō ngā mōrea ka taea." Me ngā mano o ngā taitamariki kua whakaritea kia tae ki Newquay i muri i te mutunga o a rātau whakamātautau, kei te tango a Drinkaware i tētahi wharekai i Fistral Beach ki te waihanga i tētahi wāhi waipiro kore waipiro e taea ai e ngā hoa te tūtaki me te kai i ngā kai whakahekenga motuhake i a rātou e āhei ana ki ngā take me ngā mōhiohio mō te waipiro. I te Mane, i whakapūketetia e Te Koroni o Cornwall a Emma Carlyon tētahi whakataunga tūwhera i te uiuinga a Paddy Higgins. I hinga te tau 16 tau, mai i Winnersh, i Berkshire, i nga pari i Newquay i te 6 o Hōngongoi i tērā tau. I korerotia ki te uiuinga i Truro e toru nga wā i runga i te tepenga puku inu ā-ture te taiohi. Ka kī a Tēnā Sorek: "E hiahia ana mātou ki te whakamahara i te rangatahi kāore koe e hiahia ki te waipiro hei whakanui, ā, he mōrearea te inu nui."

title: E whawhai ana a Ed Sheeran i te kēhi mo te whare tūnga i te kāinga o Te Wānanga
summary: Kua tono te kaiwaiata o Ed Sheeran ki tētahi whakataunga kia whakakāhore i ngā mahere tūnga "hāngai" i tōna kāinga taiwhenua.
text: I whakakāhoretia e te Kaunihera Takiwā o Te Tairāwhiti o Te Taiwhenua o Te Tairāwhiti ngā mahere mō tētahi "whare kāta" papa 1.5 mō ngā waka whare i te whare o te whetū pahū e tata ana ki Framlingham i a Hōngongoi. E kī ana kāore te whare i marohitia i "mōhio ki te āhua me te ātaahua o te taiwhenua". Sheeran is appealing against the decision on the grounds an original cart lodge on the site was demolished. Mō ētahi atu kōrero mō tēnei pūrākau me ētahi atu rongokōrero o Te Wānanga i roto i te tuhinga pīra, i pūrongotia tuatahitia i roto i te East Anglian Daily Times, ka kī te māngai o Sheeran, a Laurie McGee: "I te ngaronga o te moe kāta taketake hei whakawātea i te toronga o te puna kaukau, e hiahiatia ana e te kaipupuri kāinga he moe kāta hei whakakapi." I kī a ia ko te whare kāta mātāmua kiwikiwi i whakaritea kei te mutunga o tētahi huarahi tūmataiti, ā, ka kore e kitea mai i te huarahi me ngā whare karapoti. I whakakāhoretia tuatahitia e te kaunihera o te rohe, nāna i kī he "āhuahira hākinakina i te taiwhenua". Kua tohutohu te mana whakarite i te kaitirotiro whakarite kia ākiritia te pīra. I mau tonu ka puta he "tūkino nui" me te "whakaatu i tētahi kāinga ngokingoki" ki te rohe karapoti.

title: E hiahia ana a Northamptonshire PCC Adam Simmonds kia 17 ngā kaimahi hei whakahaere i te tōpana
summary: Ko ngā mahere hei waihanga i ngā pou hou e 17 hei whakahaere i ngā pirihimana i Northamptonshire kua whakaaturia e te komihana pirihimana me te komihana hara hou o te rohe (PCC).
text: I roto i tētahi pūrongo, i whakahuahuatia e Conservative PCC Adam Simmonds ngā marohi, arā ko te whakamahi i tētahi rangatira kaimahi me ngā komihana kaiāwhina tokowhā. I raro i te mana pirihimana tawhito, tokowhitu nga kaimahi - engari e 10 anō ngā pou o te kōmihana hou. E kī ana te pūrongo e hiahia ana te PCC ki te "tū ake" mō ngā painga hapori paetata. E toru ngā tari hou, mō te haepapatanga rongoā, ngā mahi ā-whakapono me ngā mahi paetata, me te parenga me te haumarutanga o te takiwā, ka waihangatia hoki. Ka mahia e te kōmihana te mahi i mahia e te mana pirihimana o mua ki te tirotiro i ngā ūnga me te tautuhi tahua. Engari he kawenga hou anō tā te tari mo te ārai me te tiaki i ngā tūkinotanga o te hara. 'He uaua te tangi' Mō te 2012-13, ko te tahua mō ngā Pirihimana o Northamptonshire ko te £120.55m - £2m iti iho i te 2011-12. Me mahi ngā penapena o te £20m i roto i te whā tau. Kāore a Tēnā Simmonds i te wātea mō te kōrero mō ngā mahere i te Tāite. I kī a Paora Varnsverry, nāna i tū mō ngā Pāremata Liberali i te pōti: "Ka mātakitaki ahau i runga i te hiahia kia kite me pēhea te whakapai ake i ngā whakaaro." I kī a Hēmi MacArthur, nāna i tohu i te UKIP: "Ko ōku whakaaro tuatahi he uaua te tangi." I kī a John Norrie, tētahi kaitono Takitahi i te pōtitanga PCC: "Ka tūpato ake ahau ki ngā moni a ngā kaihautū. I whakaaro ahau ko tēnei mahi mō te tangata kotahi me ētahi kaimahi ruarua." Kāore te tari ā rohe o te Rōpū Mahi i wātea mō te kōrero. I kī tētahi kōrero mō te komihana ka uiuia ngā kaimahi mō ngā mahere i ngā marama tuatahi e whā o tērā tau.

title: Ka mahia e TT te £630m mai i te hokonga o te 20% o te Raina Hāngai
summary: Kua whakarewaina e TT te £630m mai i te hoko i te 20% o te umanga inihua Direct Line.
text: Ka tapahia e te take te pupuri a te pēke i te Raina Tōtika, e tohunga ana ki te inihua kāinga me te motokā, mai i te 48.5% ki te 28.5%. I tonoa e ngā kaiwhakahaere whakataetae o Ūropi kia hokona e ia te Raina Hāngai i muri i tana tārewa £45bn i te tau 2008. I hokona tuatahitia e TĀPI ngā hea i te Raina Hāngai i Whiringahora i tērā o Whiringahora, ā, i raro i te whakahaere EU me hoko tōna pupuri katoa i te mutunga o tērā tau. "Mā tēnei hokonga angitu e pupuri katoa ai a TT ki te whakatutuki i tōna here ki te whakawātea i tōna tūnga i DLG i te mutunga o te 2014," te kī a te kaiwhakahaere pūtea o TĀPI Bruce Van Saun. I roto i tētahi kōrero, i kī a TT kua hokona e ia ngā hea Raina Hāngai e 300 miriona i te utu e £2.10 mō ia tiritiri. Kei ngā kaihautū o Ingarangi tonu te 81% o te TT.

title: Tynwald pass plan to purchase Steam Packet Company for £124m
summary: Ka haere tonu te hoko a te kāwanatanga o te kamupene waka waka Manx kotahi, i muri i te pōti a Tynwald ki te manakohanga o te ariā.
text: I puta ngā mahere hei hoko i te Isle of Man Steam Packet Company (IoMSPC) mō te £124m i te Tūtira, kotahi anake te mema e pōti ana ki te kaupapa. I kī te Minita Pūtea a Alfred Cannan ka kawea mai e ia "ngā mahi ki te rangatiratanga tūmatanui" engari i kī te kāwanatanga "e kore e whakahaere i te whakahaere o ia rā". "Ehara tēnei i te kaupapa kia whakakotahitia te kamupene," tana tāpiri mai. I a ia e kōrero ana i te taupatupatu, ka kī te kaitautoko mahere o Jane Poole-Uira MLC he mea nui kia noho "wātea ngā mahi i te whakararuraru tōrangapū." "Kāore e taea e tētahi tangata i tēnei kōti te whakahaere i tētahi kamupene kaipuke angitu, engari he nui te tohunga o ngā kaimahi paetata, ā, me waiho ki te whakahaere i te umanga," tana tāpiri mai. Ka whakarato te IoMSPC i ngā ratonga utanga, pāhihi me ngā ratonga waka i waenganui i Douglas me ngā tauranga e rima i UK me Airani. I a Hōngongoi 2017, i whakakāhoretia e te pāremata o Manx te "tono tino pai me te whakamutunga" a te kaiwhakahaere kia haere tonu ngā ratonga i tua atu i te 2026. I kī a Tēnā Cannan ahakoa he tokomaha ngā tāngata e tūmanako ana ka puta te take ki "ngā utu pāhihi me ngā utu utanga māmā ake... me whakahaere e tātau ngā tūmanako". "Ka kitea ngā painga i te wā roa i a tātau e whakawhanake ana i te mana pai ake ki a tātau ratonga moana, ā, i te wā, ka hoki mai te moni ki te Motu o Tangata."

title: CES 2019: Preparing for take-off
summary: Ka kitea e koe he tangi aue iti e haere mai ana i Nevada? Āe, koia anō tērā wā o te tau.
text: Kua heke iho ngā kaipūrongo o Rory Cellan-JonesTechnology correspondent@BBCRoryCJon Twitter Technology ki Las Vegas mō CES, ā, kei te amuamu kawa mō te utu o ngā hōtēra, ngā tūtira mō ngā tīkiti, me te rōrahi o ngā hua hou heahea - ngā mea katoa mai i tētahi whare poti ipurangi-o-ngā mea ki tētahi pēke poaka kari crypto-moni. Heoi anō, mō ngā auē katoa - ā, he kaiuru ngākau nui ahau - e mōhio ana mātou ka homai e CES he kaiārahi tino nui ki ngā mea wera me ngā mea kāore i roto i te hangarau. Mēnā ko aku haora tuatahi i konei he mea hei haere, ka whakahaeretia te whakaaturanga o tēnei tau e ngā pūrere kāinga atamai, AI, motokā motuhake, tūhono hoki - me te pātai he pēhea te nui o te tūranga e whakaaetia ana a Haina ki te whakaahua i tō tātau hangarau ā muri ake. Ko taku hui pānui tuatahi i whakaatu i aua kaupapa katoa. A, ko Byton, te kaihanga motokā hiko i pūruatia e ngā kaiwhakangao Hainamana me ngā pūkoro hōhonu, te āhua nei kua whakaritea ki te tākaro i te Buzzword Bingo. Mā te whakaatu i te M-Byte, he motokā me tētahi paparorohiko matapā e mau ana ki te wīra urungi, ka kī mai ngā kaiwhakahaere o Byton ki a mātau ko tēnei te pūrere tino hira i roto i o mātau oranga, ka whakamahia e ia AI hei panoni i ia haerenga, ka whakamana i tētahi "hoahoa ngāwari tuwhera" ā, ka hangaia te mana motuhake taumata 3. He āhua whakamāoritia, ko te tikanga o tēnei kei te hanga rātou i tētahi waka me ētahi āhuahira ātaahua e āhei ana ki te taraiwa i a ia anō i te nuinga o te wā, me te pupuri i ōna kainoho kia mōhiotia, kia whakangahau hoki i roto i ngā tāmi waka. E miharo ana te pōhēhē i roto i a au he aha i kore ai e taea e rātau te kōrero i tēnā i roto i te reo Ingarihi tōtika - he aha hoki rātau e whakamanamana ana mō te mana motuhake taumata 3 ina whakaaro te nuinga o te ao waka ināianei he whenua waenganui mōrearea tērā kāore te motokā, te atekōkiri rānei i te mana katoa. Engari kātahi ahau ka mīharo ki tētahi kamupene i whānau mai i ngā tau e rua noa iho nei e whai ana i te hiahia - me te moni - ki te whakapono ka taea e ia te tuku i tētahi motokā hiko patu ao i te mutunga o te tau 2019. Ka nui ake ngā kaiwhakaatu Hainamana o tēnei whakaaturanga i tētahi atu wā, ahakoa ka makaia e ngā tautohetohe hokohoko ki a Mātau he kōruru, ā, ko tētahi o ngā kaitākaro nui rawa atu a Tūmatanui e whakaaro ana kia pupuri i tētahi kōtaha hahaka. I te tirohanga a te kamupene i runga i te whakapae hōhonu a te US, i hiahia ōna kaiwhakahaere ki te whakatoko i tētahi rorohiko pukatuhipoka hōu i to mātau tūtakitanga ki a rātou, he iti iho te hiahia ki te kōrero mō ngā tōrangapū o te mākete i tētahi pūkenga kua kīia kia kaua e whakawhirinaki. Ko te tūnga panuku ko CES Unveiled, he whawhai moka e whakataetae ana te tini o ngā kamupene hangarau kia aro atu ki ngā kaipūrongo e rua rā i mua i te whakatuwheratanga o te whakaaturanga. Tērā ētahi mīhini Hapanihi kāore he take ā-ringa hāunga te mahi hei mōkai mārire, tērā tētahi whakaata kaukau Wīwī ka kitea ina puta mai koe i mua i a ia e āhua taratara ana, ā, ka kōrero mārō ki a koe, tērā tētahi wheketere parāoa iti o Amerika i mau i te parāoa, te rewena me te wai, ā, ka puta he taro kua oti i te 90 meneti i muri iho. Engari ko te mea i mau i taku kanohi he rākau ngāwari, he mea i te tuatahi me te mea kua kopikopiko mai i Ikea. Heoi anō, e tūhono ana te papa tauwhiti Mui ki te ipurangi, ā, ka mahi hei atanga mō ō pūrere tūhono, e āhei ai koe ki te whakahaere i ngā pūoro me ngā rama, te kimi rānei i te tohu huarere. Ko te ariā, he pūrere "marino" tērā e āhei ai te hangarau ki te hanumi ki te papamuri i te nuinga o te wā - ahakoa ka whiwhi pea tētahi tūtohu utu $679 (£533) i tētahi urupare iti iho i te nuinga o ngā whare. Ko to mātau tūnga whakamutunga i tētahi whare i te taha o Las Vegas, i tētahi wā i nohoia e te kaimekemeke o Maika Tyson. I runga i te puku tētahi Rolls Royce me tētahi Lamborghini kōwhai i a ia i roto, he huihuinga rerekē i whakangahautia e ngā pūoro ora me ētahi atu wheako ao mariko. Koinei te CoinAgenda Showcase, ko te āhua nei i hoahoatia hei whakatairanga i ngā crypto-moni me te blockchain. I whakamātauria e au taku tinihanga noa iho ki te tono i ngā tāngata ki te whakamārama i te blockchain, engari i tua atu i te korerotia ka huri i te ao i roto i ngā huarahi kāore i tautuhia, kāore au i te mōhio ake. Heoi anō, i kī mai tētahi o rātou ki a au nāna te Lamborghini, ngā hua o tētahi pūtea tōmua i Bitcoin. Whakahōu 8 Hānuere 2019: Kua whakapā atu a Tūmatanui ki te kī atu kei te "kore te kamupene e ngana ana ki te karo i ngā kōrerorero uaua". He pono ka kōrero tētahi kaiwhakahaere Tūmatanui i Niu Ioka ki te AO ā muri ake nei mō ngā take tōrangapū, engari kāore ngā māngai i CES i tika ki te kōrero mō tētahi mea i waho o ā rātou wāhi hua. Engari me te uara o ngā crypto-moni e tūpou ana me ngā kaupapa blockchain e kore e taea te tuku i te pānuitanga, ka uaua pea ō rātou kaiwhakahaere ki te whakarongo i ō rātou reo i runga ake i te ngangau o CES.

title: Coronavirus: Ka hoki ngā tauira i Wales ki te kura i muri i te toru marama
summary: Kua tīmata ētahi tauira ki te hoki ki te kura i Wales mō te wā tuatahi mai i Poutāpeta.
text: E tūmanako ana ka taea e ngā tauira katoa te "taki mai, te hopu me te whakarite" i roto i ngā wiki e toru ki te whā e whai ake nei i mua i te wā o Mahuru. Mā ngā tikanga tawhiti pāpori pākaha me ngā tau whāiti i te wā kotahi, ka tino rerekē te āhua o ngā akomanga. I kī tētahi tumuaki i "manawawera" ngā kaiako, engari he "māharahara me te māharahara" i te hokinga mai o ngā tauira. Kua tuwhera ngā kura puta noa i te raka, engari mō ngā tauira anake i whakaakona hei mōrearea, mō ngā tamariki hoki a ngā kaimahi matua. Parents who choose not to send their children to school will not be fined and pupils who fall into the shielding category will carry on with home learning. Kāore ngā kura katoa e whakatuwhera anō ki ngā tauira katoa e rite ana ki te whakarite i tēnei rā, me ngā kura i Anglesey e kati tonu ana mō tēnei wā i muri i te pakarutanga o te coronavirus i tētahi wheketere tukatuka mīti, ā, e rima ngā kura i Blaenau Gwent e kati tonu ana i muri i ngā take wai. 'He āhua āmaimai, engari he manawawera' i te Kura Tuatahi o Marlborough te kaipānui o Te Kura Tuatahi o Marlborough e kōrero ana ki ngā mātua, ngā tauira me ngā kaiako i a rātau e hoki mai ana. Ka kitea e ngā tauira e tomo ana ki te kura he tino rerekē ō rātou taiao akomanga i mua i te mea kua whakaahuatia he "pūnoa hou" ina tīmata te tau kura hou i te marama o Mahuru. Schools of all sizes have had to reorganise to reduce the infection risk. Of the 530 pupils at the Roath school, just 95 will come through the gates today, after 90% of parents and carers took up the offer for children to return to school. He tino rerekē te āhua o te kura, ka wehea ki ngā rohe e toru - ngā rohe aniwaniwa, moemoeā me te manawa - e āhei ai ngā tauira ki te haere ki te ahunga kotahi. He teihana horoi ringa kei ngā tomokanga katoa o te whare me ngā whakapiripiri e ārahi ana i ngā tamariki huri noa i te kura. Headteacher Geraldine Foley has taken around two "wellbeing dogs", Rolly and Maisy, to see parents and children to make them feel comfortable about returning to school. I kī a Martha, e whitu, i hoki ki te kura: "I āhua āmaimai ahau, engari i manawawera. E hiahia ana ahau ki te kite i ōku hoa me Ms Sherlock." He aha ngā huringa ka taea e tātau te tūmanako? Ka tino rerekē te āhua o ngā akomanga nā te mate urutā coronavirus. Here are some of the changes you can expect as children return over the next few weeks: Welsh Government guidance says there is "no need" for staff or pupils to wear personal protective equipment" (PPE) unless providing "intimate care" to a child, such as helping them wash, eat or go to the toilet. The Welsh Government said it expects that most pupils will have the chance to go to school at least three times before the summer break, but this depends on the individual school. He aha te whakaaro o ngā tauira? At Ysgol Caereinion, in Powys, Year 12 students are taking in the changes in their school before they leave for the summer. I kī a Ross ahakoa he "tino rerekē" i hari a ia ki te hoki mai, ki te "whakaoti i ētahi mahi, kia kite i aku hoa". I kī a Rawiri i whakaaro ia kia kaua rātau e hoki mai tae noa ki Mahuru, ki te hoatu wā anō mō te "huaketo kia haere", engari i kī ia kua whakapūmautia e ngā kaiako he haumaru. Their classmate, Sarah, said: "It's a bit strange but I think it's about getting back into a routine that a lot of kids now need. " Mēnā kei te haere mai mātou i ngā papamuri uaua ake, he tino pai te hoki ki te kura. She added: "I don't think staying at home any longer would be really necessary for a lot of kids from disadvantaged backgrounds we really need our education." He aha te whakaaro o ngā mātua? Ahakoa he tokomaha e hoki ana ki te kura mai i tēnei rā, kei ngā mātua te whakatau mēnā ka whakahokia ā rātou tamariki i te wā o te mate urutā. I kī a Rahera Meredith, mai i Blaenau Gwent, he "mōrearea rawa" tonu, ā, kāore anō ia e whakahoki i tana tama me tana tamāhine. Ko tana tamāhine ko Isabelle, e rima, he niumonia i tērā tau, ā, ka kī a ia "Kāore e taea e au te whakararuraru anō i a ia". I Porthcawl, i kī a Julie James ahakoa he mea nui kia hoki tana tamāhine i a ia e mahi ana i ana GCSEs, i "māharahara" a ia mo tana hokinga ki te kura. "Kei te māharahara a ia, engari e manawawera ana," te kī a Ms James, nāna i kī i haere tana tamāhine ki tētahi kura waenga o Welsh, engari i te mea kāore e taea e te whānau te kōrero, kāore a ia i kōrero mō te toru marama. "Ko te roa ake o te raka, ko te nui ake o tana whakaheke," tana kī atu ki a Radio Wales Breakfast. "We are all a bit anxious for her to go back, but the school say they are social distancing and they have focused on cleanliness". 'Whakamahana mō Mahuru' Kua whakatūria e Ysgol Gynradd Cerrigydrudion, i Conwy, tētahi akomanga i te hōro o te kura, ā, ko ētahi atu ka mōrahi e ono ngā tauira i ia akomanga. Ka haere tonu ngā akoranga tuihono, ā, kei te titiro whakamua rātou ki te tūponotanga o te wheako kura hei "ako whakaranu" mō te wā e heke mai nei, i tua atu o Mahuru. Ko te tikanga e 80 ngā tamariki o te kura tuatahi o te kāinga, engari ināianei ka taea te whakaae ki te mōrahi o ngā tauira e 26 i te wā kotahi, arā ko ngā tamariki a ngā kaimahi matua. "Our plan will hopefully allow a connection with each child that wishes to come back to school," said head teacher Eirlys Edwards, who said they hoped to keep in contact with pupils whose parents did not send them in as a "warm-up" to September. I kī te tumuaki o Stephen Garthwaite, o Ysgol y Grango i Wrexham, kua mahia e ngā kaiako ngā mea katoa e taea ana e rātou kia haumaru ai ngā akomanga. Engari i kī a ia mō te 25% o ngā tauira kāore anō kia hoki mai, ā, tērā te āhua o te "hopohopo" i waenganui i te whakaongaonga i tēnei rā. "He tino rerekē ngā mea, ehara i te kura i mahue i a mātau, nā reira he nui te māharahara me te hopohopo, engari i te nuinga o te wā e tino hiahia ana mātou ki te kite anō i ngā tauira," tana kī atu ki a BBC Radio Wales Breakfast. He aha ka tūpono i te wā o Mahuru? He maha tonu ngā pātai he aha te āhua o te akoranga i tērā tau mātauranga, ā, ka titiro te hunga mātauranga ki te minita mātauranga mō ngā mea e tūpono ana. I kī a Kirsty Williams i tērā wiki e whakapae ana ia ka haere tonu te ako whakaranu "mō tētahi wā" ahakoa kāore ia i whakahaere i te hokinga katoa ki te kura i te wā o Mahuru. Me pēhea te toenga o te UK? Ko Wales anake te wāhi o te UK ki te whakatuwhera anō i ngā kura tuatahi me ngā kura tuarua ki ngā tauira katoa mai i tēnei rā. Kua whakaaetia ngā kura tuarua i Ingarangi kia whakatuwhera anō mō ngā Tau 10 me te 12 mai i te 15 o Hune, engari kāore ngā tauira i ngā rōpū tau katoa e hoki ki te kura i te wā katoa o Mahuru. I Scotland ko te whāinga kia whakatuwhera anō i te wā katoa me te kore tawhiti ā-tinana i Aotearoa mēnā ka pēhia tonutia te coronavirus. I Aiarangi ki te Raki, ko te kaupapa kia whakatuwhera katoa ngā kura i te 24 o Aotearoa me te tawhiti pāpori i whakahekea mai i te 2m ki te 1m.

title: Ko nga pirihimana avocado e pare ana i te koura kākāriki o Mehiko
summary: Te āhua me te āhua o Tancítaro he taone Mehikihi noa iho: He tapawhā matua me tētahi whare karakia iti.
text: Nā Katy WatsonBBC News, Tancítaro, Michoacán Kei te purei tētahi pēne mariachi i a au e tae atu ana. He wāhanga te pūoro o tētahi hāereere nehunga me ngā tangata o Tancítaro e mātakitaki ana. Engari tērā tētahi mea e rerekē ai tēnei taone iti. He kanapa ake, he hou ake hoki ngā taraka tiki i Mehiko i konei. He mea whakahiko a Tancítaro i runga i te avocados, he taonga tōna iwi i te koura kākāriki o Mehiko. E mōhiotia ana tēnei taone ko te pūmatua avocado o Mehiko. Tata ki te 30,000 ngā tāngata e whakaputa ana i te nui o ngā avocado hei whakatutuki i te hiahia o California katoa. Tata ki te 45% o ngā avocado o te ao e whakaputa ana a Mehiko, ā, ko Michoacán te āhua nui rawa atu o Mehiko. Mai i konei anake, tata ki te rua miriona avocados e tukuna ana ki te US i ia tau. A, no te mea he whai hua te umanga, koia te ūnga o te hara whakaritea. I a koe e tomo ana ki Tancítaro, he rārangi wāhitaki. E mōhiotia ana rātou ko ngā filtros, he tātari rānei, e ngā tāngata i konei. He ōpaki ake ētahi i ētahi atu. He torutoru noa iho ngā pēke kirikiri o tētahi, ā, ko ētahi pakeke e noho ana i runga i tētahi tūru motokā pakaru i waho o te mahau. Ka hipa atu mātau i tētahi atu me ētahi taraka tiki e tū ana i waho. Ka kite ahau i tētahi tangata me te raiwhara i tōna tuarā. He taone whai rākau tēnei. Ko Michoacán te wāhi i tīmata ai te "pakanga ki ngā rongoā" i te tau 2006. I whakarewaina te rautaki e te perehitini o taua wā, a Felipe Calderón, ā, ko tōna whāinga ko te whāwhā i ngā kaihoko rongoā mā te tuku hōia. Engari i tawhiti atu i te whakaoti i te raruraru o te tūkinotanga e pā ana ki te rongoā, ka nui ake te wehenga me te tukino i te whawhai a ngā wehenga tauwhāinga ki a rāua anō mo te whakahaere i te hokohoko rongoā. "Mai i te tau 2007, ka tīmata te haere mai o ngā tāngata patu," te kī a te rangatira o Tancítaro, a Arturo Olivera Gutiérrez. "I tīmata rātau ki te pēhi i nga mana ā rohe, ki te whakahaere i nga pirihimana o te rohe me te tango i te iwi whānui i runga i te wehi. He tokomaha nga tāngata i ngaro, ka tīmata rātau ki te patu, ki te whakamataku, ki te tango whenua." I te korenga o tētahi ope pirihimana tōtika, ka rāhuitia e ngā hapori rātau ki te whakaū i te haumarutanga o o rātau taone, i ahu mai ki te putanga mai i te tau 2013 o "ngā rōpū whakangungu whaiaro" i Michoacán. I pērā anō i Tancítaro. Engari i ētahi atu wāhi o Michoacán i tangohia ngā rōpū ārai i a ia anō e te hara whakaritea, i wetewetehia rānei e ngā ope kāwanatanga, ka rerekē te mahi a ngā tangata o Tancitaro. Ko nga pirihimana Avocado Kei tetahi taha o te tapawha matua o te taone ko te tari matua o te tinana haumarutanga tūmatanui o Tancítaro (CUSEPT). E iwa, 10 rānei ngā tāngata e tū ana i waho e mau ana i ngā patu tinana me te mau pū. "I whakawāteatia e ngā rōpū ārai i a ia anō te rohe i te hara whakaritea, ā, i te hononga ki te kāwanatanga, ka mahi tahi mātau me ngā kaiwhakarato avocado ki te tiki pirihimana," te whakamārama a José Hugo Sánchez Mendoza, te upoko o CUSEPT. "Ko te tōmua tuatahi ko te tōpana kia hangaia e ngā tāngata o tēnei rohe." Ko te ope pirihimana e utua ana e ngā kaiwhakanao avocado, e utu ana i te ōrau o a rātau moni whiwhinga i runga anō i te maha o ngā heketea kei a rātou. Ka āwhina hoki te kāwanatanga taone ki te tōpana me ōna mema ki te whakangungu mai i ngā ope a te hau. E tūhono ana ngā tāngata katoa i CUSEPT ki te hokohoko avocado i tētahi āhua, e whakaaro ana te koromatua o Tancítaro ko tōna tohutohu mo te angitu. He nui ngā mea e ngaro ana i te tangata, ā, e hiahia ana ki te pare, ka whakamārama a ia. He moni anō tā rātou. He mīharo a rātau taputapu. E mau ringa ana rātau katoa, e mau patu tinana ana, a, he piki whakatika matā. I tētahi o a rātau tautiaki, e noho ana ahau i te taha o Lorena Flores, he pāmu tōna ake. E kī mai ana a ia ki a au i hainatia e ia nā te mea i whāngaia ia ki te utu taikaha ki te hunga hara. Ka mahi tahi a ia me te ope mai i te Mane ki te Paraire, e waru ki te whā. Ka pau te wā whakatā i tana pāmu. E kī ana a ia he haumaru ake te ora i konei ināianei. Ngā kaitiaki hapori I tētahi wā ka tū mātau ki tētahi komititanga kei reira tētahi wāhitaki, he whare papa rua i peitatia ki ngā kara huna. Kei te anga atu ki te wāhitaki he rōpū tāngata, e kōrerorero ana i te taha o o rātau motokā. Ko rātau tētahi o ngā rōpū hapori rerekē e 16 e mahi tahi ana me ngā pirihimana i konei, e whakamōhio ana i a rātau mō tētahi mea whakatūpato. I kī mai ngā tāngata he rākau tā rātou, engari kāore i pīrangi ki te whakaatu mai ki a au. E kī ana nga pirihimana kaore nga rōpū hapori e mau pū tūwhera, engari kei reira rātau ki te āwhina i nga pirihimana me te whakamōhio atu ki a rātau. He wāhi kiwikiwi tēnei, engari te āhua nei e mahi ana mō te taone. He pai ake te haumaru i te pouri Ā muri ake ka tūtaki ahau ki a Chema Flores, he kaiahuwhenua rangatira i roto i te umanga avocado mai i te tau 1982. E kī ana a ia kāore a ia i whakaaro ka tangohia te hiahiatanga o ngā avocado. Kua hurihia tōna oranga mo te pai, mo te kino. I raro i te taha o te tūru o te atekōkiri ka kite ahau i tētahi pū nui. Ka pātai atu ahau ki a ia he aha i whiwhi ai ia. "I tēnei wā, i konei he haumaru, he nui te haumarutanga engari i ētahi atu wāhi he weriweri, kāore au e pīrangi ki te teka," tana kī mai ki a au. "I kahakina e rātau taku tama i te 16 o ona tau. I tono rātau mō te $1m [£760,000] engari he $500,000 anake tāku hei hoatu ki a rātou. E rua hoki ngā wā i kahakina ai ahau." E kī mai ana a ia ki a au he whakaaetanga tāna ki te mau pū, ā, e whā ngā kaitiaki patu hei tiaki i a ia me tana tama huri noa i te karaka. He tino taumaha te hiahiatanga o taua haumarutanga ki te kaiahuwhenua, engari ka kite koe me pēhea te kino o te whirinoa. E kī mai ana ngā tāngata katoa o te taone ki a au kāore he kākā, kāore he taikaha ināianei. Ka taea e ngā kaiwhakanao pēnei i a Lorena rāua ko Kema te moe oro i te pō. He wāhi kanapa i roto i tētahi wā pouri mō Mehiko nga pirihimana avocado a Tancítaro. Ko tēnei tau te tino mate rawa mō te whenua i roto i te rua tekau tau.

title: E 28 ngā pātītī i pūhia e te tangata, a, ka puritia ki roto i te pākatio tata ki Bodmin
summary: E 28 nga pāteri i pūhia e tētahi tangata, a, ka puritia o rātau tinana ki roto i ngā pākatio i tōna kāinga, i runga hoki i tētahi wae mahi.
text: I whakaaro a Scott Milne kia utua mō ngā kararehe mā te kī he wāhanga rātau o tētahi patu pātītī kua whakamanatia. I whakaae a Milne, e 42, mai i Helland tata ki Bodmin i Cornwall, ki te patu i ngā pāteri e 28, ā, e 37 ana. I whakaae hoki a ia ki te kore e rokiroki haumaru i ngā rākau. I hoatu ki a ia he whiu whakatārewa 18 wiki i te Kōti Kaiwhakawa o Bodmin. I whakaekea e nga pirihimana te kāinga me ngā wāhitau pakihi o Milne i a Hōngongoi. I tōna kāinga ka kitea e rātau he pouaka whakamātao i roto i tētahi whare o waho e waru ngā tinana pātītī. Te whakamātautau a te kararehe i kitea e rātau he maha nga pū me ngā raiwhara, tae atu ki ngā otira i roto i ngā motokā e rua. I tētahi wae i tētahi pānga mahi i Roche i kitea e rātau he maha o ngā wae pākatio e 29 ngā pātītī. I tirohia e te kararehe kararehe ngā kararehe mate katoa, ā, i kitea e 28 ngā whara e ōrite ana ki te pūhia. He raihana tā Milne mō te patu pāteri i tukuna e Natural England, engari i patua ēnei kararehe i waho o te wā whakamate. Ka kī atu a ia ki nga pirihimana e hiahia ana ia ki te tuku i a rātau hei utu ina whakatuwhera anō te wā whakawātea. Mai i tērā wā ka whakatārewatia tana raihana. Ko te 'whakataunga kino' i whakaurua e Natural England ngā wāhi whakakore Badger hei wāhanga o ngā mahi a te kāwanatanga ki te whakahaere i te mate kohi i roto i ngā kararehe. I kī a Mikaera Kākāriki, e whakangungu ana, he "take rerekē" tēnei, ā, ko tana kiritaki "i te whai wāhi, ā, i mārama tonu te whakatau kino". I mahi a Milne i mua hei kaipūkaha, engari i tukuna tērā ki te whakatū i tētahi kamupene tākaro āpure i te tau 2009, i whiwhi ai ia i ngā tiwhikete patu. I rongo te kōti i te tokomaha o nga kaiahuwhenua i homai he tohutoro tōrunga e pā ana ki tōna āhuatanga me te ratonga whakahaere kino i homai e ia. I whakahaua hoki ia kia 150 hāora mahi kore utu, ā, ka tukuna he whakahau tango mō ngā pū, ngā otira me ngā tinana.

title: Radlett rail depot: Plans move step forward
summary: Kua neke tata atu ngā mahere pauna maha mō tētahi kāpeka utanga rēra i Hertfordshire i muri i te whakaaetanga o ngā koha kia utua e te kaiwhakawhanake.
text: E hiahia ana a HelioSlough ki te hanga i te kāpeka ki te pae o te Kaunihera o Radlett Aerodrome o Hertfordshire County. Kua hikitia e te kaunihera tētahi whakataunga kia hokona te pae tata ki Hato Albans kia mahi rā anō te kāwanatanga i tana whakahaere whakamutunga. Kua kī te Hēkeretari Hapori a Eric Pickles e "whakaaro ana ia ki te whakaae" i te kaupapa. I te tau 2009, i whakakāhoretia tuatahitia te whakaaetanga whakarite mō te Strategic Rail Freight Interchange (SRFI) e te kaunihera o Hato Albans i te tau 2009. I kī te kaiwhakawhanake o HelioSlough Ltd i whai ana mahere i ngā kaupapahere kāwanatanga ki te kawe taonga mā te rēra, ā, ka tautohe e hiahiatia ana te kāpeka hei mahi ki te tonga-rāwhiti o Ingarangi. I te wā o Mahuru 2012 - i muri i ngā tono e rua - ka kī a Tēnā Pickles e whakaaro ana ia ki te titiro ki ngā mahere mō te whanaketanga o Radlett i te taha o tētahi uiui ki tētahi kaupapa ōrite i Colnbrook, tata ki Slough, Berkshire. Engari i Hakihea 2012 ka whakatau ia ka taea e ia te whakatau i te kaupapa Radlett i a ia anō, ā, i kī ia e "whakaaro ana ki te whakaae" i te whakaaetanga whakarite, e ai ki ngā whakaaetanga mō ngā moni ka hoatu e te kaiwhakawhanake ki te kaunihera o te rohe - he whakaaetanga Wāhanga 106. 'Putanga whakamutunga' I muri i tētahi hui kāpata i te Mane, ka kī tētahi kaikōrero kaunihera kua hikitia tētahi whakataunga "e tārewa ana i tētahi whakataunga tūturu a te hēkeretari o te kāwanatanga me te putanga whakamutunga o tētahi wero ā-ture ki tēnei whakataunga". I kī te kaunihera kāore i whakaae ki te whakamutunga a Tēnā Pickles, engari i whakaae he here nō reira i whakaae ki te uru ki tētahi whakaaetanga here whakarite Wāhanga 106. Heoi anō, kua tohe hoki ki a Tēnā Pickles kia arotake i tana whakataunga, me te whakaaro ki ngā huringa o ngā āhuatanga mai i tērā Tīma, me te titiro ki ngā painga pātahi o ngā pae whirinoa. I kī tētahi kaikōrero HelioSlough i "koa" kua whakaae te kaunihera ki te uru ki te whakaaetanga here whakarite i te mea he "hipanga hira" ki te tuku i te SRFI. I kī tētahi kōrero: "E tūmanako ana a HelioSlough ka haere te hēkeretari o te kāwanatanga mō ngā hapori me te kāwanatanga ā-rohe ināianei mai i te whakaaetanga whakatakoto whakahuahua 'hinengaro ki te tuku'."

title: E whā ngā Tūpāpaku me te Whakarerekētanga: He aha te hiahia o ngā MP?
summary: Ki te mutunga o te kiriata o te tau 1994 E Whā Mārena me te Nehunga, he meneti whakarewa tā Charles (i tākarotia e Hugh Grant) i mua i tana mārenatanga.
text: Na Ben WrightPolitical correspondent, BBC News E wehi ana i roto i te whare karakia, kāore a ia e whakapono i muri i ngā tau e inu ana i te haramono me te champagne i ngā mārena o ētahi atu tāngata, kei te whakaaro tonu a ia, ā, kei te rangirua tonu a ia i te tapa o tōna ake. I te mutunga, ka āwhina tētahi takawaenga whakahauhau i a ia ki te ata. I roto i tētahi motuhake o te Rā Ihu Whero i TE Paraire ka kitea e tātau he aha i pā ki ngā pūāhua i te 25 tau ki muri. Engari ka whakamaharatia ahau ki a Charles i ia wā e kōrero ana ahau ki tētahi MP mamae (ā, ko te nuinga o rātou) e māharahara ana ki ngā kōwhiringa i mua i a rātou. I tēnei wā e rima meneti ki waenganui pō, kei te whakaaro tonu te Whare o Ngātahi. Kua mārama mō te rua tau kāore e hiahiatia ana e ngā MP. Ināianei kua rua ngā wā i whakakāhoretia ai te mahi a Ēnā Me, i te wā kāore anō kia whiwhi te nuinga o te kaupapa a Labour ki te uru ki tētahi uniana tikanga. Kāore te nuinga o ngā MP i pīrangi ki te wehe i te EU, engari i tua atu i tētahi iti e tohe ana kia hiahiatia tētahi atu taupānga hei whati i te tumu, ka whakarongo rātau ki te haere. Ko te pātai me pēhea? Ā, he mea whakamīharo i te paunga o te tukanga Tuhipānui 50 e rua tau, kei te whana tonu rātou i ngā mahere whirinoa mō te pātahitanga ā muri ake o te UK ki te EU. I roto i tētahi pārekareka e taea te kiia e Whā Ngā Tūpāpaku me te Whakarerekētanga, he maha ngā rōpū whakawhiti-rōpū o ngā MP o muri kua pau ngā marama e mahi ana i ō rātou ake whakaaro me pēhea e wehe ai te UK i te EU. Hei tauira, i roto i te Rūnanga Malthouse, kua whakatakotoria e tētahi rōpū MP Tory tētahi marohi e hoko ana te UK i tētahi wā tauwhiro e rua tau mai i te EU, engari kāore he whakaaetanga putanga tika. I kī mai tētahi o ōna kaitautoko, ko te minita kāpata o mua, a Damian Green, ka whakamahia e te UK me te EU te wā ki te whakarite i tētahi mahi hokohoko, ā, kāore e hiahiatia te tautohetohe o Kīriria. Kāore anō kia whakahekea ōna kaitautoko e te whakakore a te EU o nāianei ki te whakaae ki tētahi kaupapa pēnei. Kua honoa e ētahi atu Tohutohu ki ētahi atu MP Mahi ki te taunaki i ngā mema UK o te mākete kotahi me tētahi whakaritenga tikanga hōu - he mahere e kīa nei ko "Common Market 2.02, "Norway plus" rānei. Kātahi anō ka whakaaturia e te kaiārahi Mahi a Jeremy Corbyn tētahi āro atu ki tēnei ariā. E whakapono ana te tumuaki Rangatira o Mua o Keni Clarke ki tētahi Tūpāpaku e whakatata ana i te UK ki te EU ā-taumaha, ko te kōwhiringa tērā pea ka kitea he nuinga i roto i te Kotahitanga. "Kāore anō ahau kia kite i tēnei ngangau i roto i tōku oranga katoa," te kī ngenge a te MP toa. E whakaaro ana a Tēnā Clarke ko te mea tika kia whakakorea noatia e te Pāremata te Tuhipānui 50, te tikanga e tango ana i te UK i te EU, engari e kī ana kāore he wā ka mahia e te Pāremata tēnā. E tohe ana te MP Rōpū Motuhake o Mua, ā, ināianei ko Anna Soubry tētahi atu taupānga "ko te huarahi anake ki waho o tēnei pārekareka" - engari te āhua nei kāore anō kia nui te nuinga o te Kotahitanga mō taua hipanga. Ināianei, i tērā pito o te whakaaro Paremata, kāore he wehi o te MP Conservative o Te Pākehā o Te UK ki te wehe atu i te EU me te kore whakaaetanga putanga. "Ehara i te putanga tino pai, ā, e hiahia ana ahau ki tētahi mahi, engari kei hea mātou e noho nei," te kī a Tēnā Evans. He rite tonu te kōwhiringa taketake e anga ana ki ngā MP: Ki te kore rātou e hiahia kia haere te UK me te kore mahi i roto i te rua wiki, me puta he whakaaetanga putanga, whakakore i te Tuhipānui 50, tono rānei ki te EU mō tētahi toronga. Engari e tino mārama ana ka hiahia te EU ki te mārama mō te aha te toronga. I te tata o te wā, ā, he tono UK kia whakaroa atu i a Pakihi, ināianei he hiahia kōhukihuki mō ngā MP ki te whakamatau i ngā mea ka taea e rātou te tautoko. Te āhua nei e kore e taea te tātari me te kōmaka i ēnei whakaaro. Engari ki te kore tētahi mahere whirinoa o Te Kāwanatanga e puta mai i ngā rā torutoru nei, ka anga anō ngā MP ki tētahi kōwhiringa i waenganui i te mahi a te kāwanatanga, kāore rānei he mahi.

title: Me arotahi te iwi ki te hauora hinengaro - PM
summary: Kua karangatia e Rawiri Karauna kia arotahi te iwi ki te hauora hinengaro i muri i te arotakenga i kitea ai te tiaki kore, kāore i te rawaka, e ahu ana ki "ngā mano o ngā mate kino, koretake hoki".
text: Nā Nick TriggleHealth te pūrongo - nā tētahi tūmahi i whakatūria e NHS Ingarangi - i kī neke atu i te toru hauwhā o ngā tāngata whai raruraru hauora hinengaro kāore i whiwhi āwhina. I whakaae ngā minita kia nui ake ngā mea e hiahiatia ana, e tuku ana i te £1bn anō i te tau ki te tau 2020. E kī ana te kāwanatanga mā tēnei e āwhina ki te tiaki i te miriona anō tāngata i te tau. Me puta mai ngā moni i te £8.4bn kua kīa e te kāwanatanga ki te ratonga hauora i te wā o tēnei Pāremata, ā, ka puta mai i runga i ngā moni tāpiri kua pānuitia kētia mō ngā ratonga tamariki. I kī te Pirimia o Rawiri: "Ko te tikanga kia pono tātau. Kāore anō mātou kia nui te mahi hei whakamutu i te tauhae o te hauora hinengaro. "Kua arotahi mātou ki te hauora ā-tinana, ā, kāore anō mātou kia nui te arotahi ki te hauora hinengaro." Hauora hinengaro 1 i roto i te 4 tāngata e pā ana ki ngā raruraru ia tau 75% kāore he āwhina £ 105bn utu ki te ōhanga £ 9.2bn i pau i te NHS i te tau 15-20 tau poto ake te tūmanako ora mō te hunga whai raruraru taumaha Tātaritanga: Ka mahi te mahere? I ētahi wā ka kīia te tiaki hauora hinengaro ko te ratonga Cinderella o te NHS. I roto i ngā tau kua waihotia, kua whakawāteatia, kua whakawāteatia, kua iti iho te pūtea. E whakaae ana te pūrongo a te tūmahi ki tēnei. Nō reira ka whai pānga tika ngā tūtohutanga? Kua kī katoa ngā minita me ngā rangatira NHS kua tino tukua rātau ki taua mea. Engari he rite tonu ngā mea i kōrerotia i te tau 2011 i te wā i whakarewaina ai e te tauwhāinga tana rautaki hauora hinengaro. Ā, i pūrongotia e te AO i te Rātapu, kāore tērā i mutu te tapahi o te pūtea penapena. Na te iti rawa o te moni i roto i te NHS, ko te wehi whakarihariha, ahakoa ngā kī taurangi e mahia ana e te hītori ka taea tonu te tārua i a ia anō. Pānuitia ētahi atu mea mai i Nick Whāia a Nick i Twitter I tēnei wā e pau ana te £9.2bn i te tau ki te here - iti iho i te whakatekau o te tahua NHS - ahakoa kotahi i roto i te whā tāngata e pā ana ki tētahi raruraru hauora hinengaro ia tau. Ko te hua, e toru hauwhā o ngā tāngata e haere ana me te kore āwhina, me te pūrongo a te rōpū tūmahi e whakaae ana he kino rawa ngā ratonga, kua "puritia, kua pakaru rānei" me "ngā mano o ngā mate kino, koretake hoki". I kī hoki te arotakenga me nui ake te aro atu ki te pikinga o ngā pāpātanga o te whai i a ia. E whakapono ana a NHS Ingarangi ka āwhina te rautaki ki te whakarite kia whiwhi tautoko tētahi atu miriona tāngata - engari i tēnei wā he iti iho i te rua miriona ngā tāngata e mahi ana. E kī ana mā te pūtea penapena i kīa mai ka āwhina ki te utu: E kī ana mā ēnei ine e āwhina ki te whakaiti i te hiahiatanga o ngā wāhi tūroro tohunga i ngā hōhipera, nō reira ka āwhina ki te rutu i te mahi whakahē nui o te tuku i ngā tāngata tawhiti mō te rongoā. I kī a Paul Farmer, te rangatira nui o te aroha hauora hinengaro o Mind, nāna i ārahi te tūmahi, me noho te rautaki hei "wā tohu" mō te tiaki hauora hinengaro, ā, i tēnei wā he "tino pārekareka". "E kī ana mātou ki te NHS, ki te kāwanatanga, ki te umanga, ki ngā kaiārahi paetata me te iwi whānui me noho te hauora hinengaro hei manakē mō te katoa," tana kī. Ahakoa he tino nui te pūtea tāpiri, ka tāpiritia e ia ko ētahi tauhae huri noa i te mate hinengaro "kei te kaha tonu, i roto i te ratonga hauora, pērā i roto i te iwi", ā, me huri tēnei. I kī te rangatira o NHS Ingarangi, a Haimona Stevens, kua "tino tukua" a ia ki te whakatinana i ngā tūtohutanga. Engari i whakatūpato te perehitini o te Kāreti Ariki o ngā Hinengaro Hinengaro, a Prof Tā Haimona Wessely, ka hiahiatia he "mahi tautoko" hei whakamutu i ngā "tekau tau o te ōritetanga". A, i whakamāramatia e Prof Sheila Hollins, o te Pānga Rongoā o Ingarangi, kua whakaritea aua kī taurangi i mua. "Me kite te hunga e mate ana i te mate hinengaro i ēnei taurangi." I tēnei wā ka kī te kāwanatanga o Welsh kua taiapatia te whakapau moni mo te hauora hinengaro mai i te tau 2008, me te pūtea penapena i runga i te £600m i tēnei tau. Ko te tohatoha ā-tau o nāianei ki te hauora hinengaro i Aiarangi ki te Raki ko te £247m. I kī te kāwanatanga o Pirihitini kua whakaritea e ia tētahi atu £150 miriona i roto i te wā e rima tau ki te whakapai ake i te urunga ki ngā ratonga hauora hinengaro. Kua whakamāramatia: He aha te hauora hinengaro, ā, ki hea au e haere ai ki te āwhina? Aromatawai wairua: Ka taea e au te pōhara? In The Mind: BBC News special report (or follow "Mental health" tag in the BBC News app)

title: BTS: Ka whiwhi te pēne i te whakaingoatanga tuatahi o te Grammy mō K-pop
summary: Kua noho te rongo o te ao ko BTS te rōpū K-pop tuatahi kia whiwhi i tētahi whakaingoatanga Whakawhiwhinga Grammy.
text: I whakaingoatia ta rātau waiata hou "Dynamite" mō te kāwai Mahinga Pop Duo/Rōpū Tino Pai, i te taha o ngā whetū pēnei i a Lady Gaga me Taylor Swift. I whakairihia e te rōpū tētahi ataata tauhohenga ki Twitter, e whakaatu ana i a rātau e umere ana i te pānuitanga o to rātau whakaingoatanga. Ka tūtohu te tohunga K-pop o Te Wānanga o Pineamine ko te whakaingoatanga o te Grammy he "wā tino tatari i roto i a rātau mahi". I tāpiritia e ia he wā nui mō te rerenga kētanga mō te "pō nui rawa o te pūoro" - ka tū i te 31 o Hānuere. Ko Dynamite, te takitahi Ingarihi tuatahi o te pēne, i runga i ngā Billboards mō ngā wiki i te wā i tukua ai i mua o Aotearoa. I waipuketia e te rongo o te whakaingoatanga te pāpāho pāpori, me te tokomaha e whakapuaki ana i te whakamihi me te tautoko mō te pēne taitama, i tēnei wā ko tētahi o ngā pēne nui rawa o te ao. "E tino hari ana ahau ki a koe me te ope katoa!" te kī a te kaihautū whakaaturanga kōrero a Hemi Corden, e pā ana ki ngā kaihautū tamariki e karanga ana i a rātau ko te Taua. A, he nui hoki ta rātau kōrero. "E whakahīhī ana ahau ki nga tama. kei te whakatutuki rātau i a rātau moemoeā i Amerika me ngā pūoro me ngā kaupapa e whakaawe ana i te rangatahi," te kī a tētahi kaihautū. "I te mutunga ka pono tō moemoeā, tirohia te tawhiti o tō taenga mai," ka tāpiri mai tētahi atu. I tukuatu a BTS i tētahi ataata e whakaatu ana i ngā mema tokowhā o te pēne e peke ana i te sofa i te pānuitanga o to rātau whakaingoatanga. Kāore anō a BTS kia huna mō tō rātou hiahia kia toa i tētahi Grammy, me te mema RM e kī ana i roto i tētahi uiuinga tōmua ki Esquire ko te "Grammys are... te wāhanga whakamutunga o te haerenga katoa o Amerika". Kua tāhaetia kētia e te pēne ngā Tohu Pūoro o Amerika me ngā Tohu Pūoro Billboard. E ai ki a Yonhap, ka noho rātau ko te rōpū Kōria ki te Tonga tuatahi kia toa i ngā tohu pūoro nui e toru o Amerika ki te toa rātau i tētahi Grammy. Ko te kaiwhakahaere toi mō tā rātou Love Yourself: Tear album i whakaingoatia mō te mōkī hopukanga tino pai, i ngā Tohu Grammy o tērā tau. I roto i ngā tau tata nei, kua tāhaetia e BTS-mania te ao, me te manakohanga o te pēne taitama ki rāwāhi.

title: Ka mate te wahine Īnia i muri i te maunga o nga makawe i roto i te wīra kāta
summary: Kua mate tētahi wahine Īnia i roto i tētahi pāka whakangahau i te tūnga ki te raki o Haryana, i muri i te tāwhititanga o ōna makawe i roto i nga wīra o te kāta haere.
text: I te wā o te aituā, i te hararei te wahine 28 tau, a Puneet Kaur, me tōna whānau. I mauria a ia ki tētahi hōhipera pātata, engari i whakapuakina kua mate i te taenga atu. Ka kī atu ngā pirihimana ki a KOE Punjabi ka uiui rātau i taua mahi, i te wā kua katia e te pāka i Pinjore tana ara kāta. I roto a Ms Kaur rāua ko tana tāne i te kāta i te maunga o ōna makawe ki roto i te wīra. I te haerenga tonu o te kāta haere, ka tāhaetia tōna tumuaki i tōna māhunga, ka kī pirihimana. "Kāore i te mārama te take tūturu o te mate, engari ka mōhio mātou i muri i to mātau whiwhinga i ngā taipitopito o te pūrongo tirotiro tōmuri," te kī a tētahi pirihimana ki a Arvind Chhabra o TE HAU. Kāore anō kia hopukina. I te mau potae a Ms Kaur, a, i roto i te moka, e ai ki nga pūrongo paetata. I kī mai tētahi kaiwhakahaere o te teihana kāta kua whai rātau i ngā tikanga haumarutanga katoa, arā ko te whakamahinga o ngā taputapu māhunga tika. "I hoatu e mātau he pēne inarapa me te potae ki te wahine," te kī a Kumar ki te nūpepa Indian Express, kātahi anō he "aituā". E ai ki te nūpepa, ka kī atu te tāne a Ms Kaur ki nga pirihimana: "I te hākinakina māua ko taku wahine i te haere i runga i te kāta. Ohorere, ka wewete ngā makawe o taku wahine, ā, ka rongo ahau i a ia e karanga ana... Kāore au i te mōhio ki te kounga o te pēne inarapa me te potae i hoatu ki taku wahine." He āhua kore nei nga aituā kāta i Īnia, ā, he tokomaha nga tangata o te whenua i ohorere i tēnei mahi.

title: Kua whakaaturia te hoahoa mō te whakamaharatanga whakaeke o te papa tākaro o Manatū
summary: He wāhi māra tētahi whakamaharatanga pūmau ki ngā tūpāpaku e 22 o te whakapae o Te Papa Tākaro o Manatāne, kua pānuitia e te kaunihera.
text: Kei roto i ngā mahere tētahi pokapū pōhatu 'halo' e mau ana i ngā ingoa o ngā tūpāpaku, i muri i te tāurunga mai i ngā whānau. He wāhanga tēnei o tētahi kaupapa a te kaunihera o te taone ki te whakapai ake i te Hauwhā o Te Wā Waenganui, e tata ana ki te Whare Karakia o Manatāne. Council leader Sir Richard Leese said the garden would be a "tranquil space" used all year round. I tonoa hoki e te kaunihera kia noho ki te kāinga ki te utu takoha, i mua i te huritau tuatoru o te whakaekenga i te 22 o Me. Ka roma oratia ngā inoi me ngā pānui mā te whārangi Facebook o te Whare Karakia o Manatāne. I kī te kaiārahi o te Kaunihera Taone o Manatāne, a Tā Rārangi Leese: "E kore rawa a Manatū e wareware ki ngā mahi whakamataku o te 22 Me 2017. " We will be thinking of them on 22 May and importantly plans for a permanent memorial, a tranquil space for contemplation which can be used year-round, are progressing well." I ngā huritau o mua, kua whakatangihia ngā pere i te Whare Karakia o Hato Ana, i te Hōro Taone o Manatū me te Hāhi Katorika o Hato Meri i te 22:31 BST i te 22 o Me hei tohu i te wā tonu o te pahūtanga o te tau 2017. Nā ngā rāhuitanga raka, ka whakatangi a BBC Radio Manchester i tētahi hopukanga o ngā pere o te whare karakia e 22 ngā wā i te ahiahi o te Paraire hei whakamaumahara ki ngā tāngata e 22 i ngaro i a rātou.

title: E whai ana a Los Angeles i a Seattle i roto i te utu mōkito $15 ia haora
summary: Kua noho a Los Angeles hei taone nui rawa atu i te US ki te whakaae ki te utu mōkito e $15 (£9.67).
text: Nā Howard MustoeBusiness reporter, New York I pōti te Kaunihera Taone 14-1 ki te whakaoti i te ture i roto i te wikitōria mo te whakahau ā-motu ki te whakapiki utu mō ngā kaimahi utu iti. Kua whakaae kē a Tūtira rāua ko San Francisco ki te whakanui i te utu mōkito ki te $15 mā te 2017 me te 2018. Ka whakataurite tērā ki te utu mōkito a te hau e $7.25 ka taea e ia kāwanatanga te kōwhiri ki te patu, ki te whakaiti rānei. "I tēnei rā, ka noho a Los Angeles hei taone hou rawa, nui rawa hoki ki te maka i tana tautoko ki muri i ngā kaimahi e tono ana kia kaua e iti iho i te utu i tētahi utu tika, tika hoki," te kī a Christine Owens, te kaiwhakahaere nui o te National Employment Law Project, he rōpū rorohiko mō ngā motika kaimahi. Ka whakaritea te mōkito $15 i a Hōngongoi 2020, e ai ki te ture kua marohitia. Kia tae atu ki reira, mai i Hōngongoi 2016, ka piki te utu i ia tau tīmata i te $10.50. Ka roa ake ngā rōpū kore hua me ngā kaimahi e 25, iti iho rānei ki te whakapiki utu. "There's still work to be done, but you will not see this council shy away from its responsibility," council President Herb Wesson said on his Twitter account. I pānuitia e te kaihoko hokohoko o Amerika - te kaitukumahi tūmataiti nui rawa o te iwi - i te wā o Hui tanguru e whakaaro ana ki te whakarewa utu mō ngā kaimahi i ōna pātaka o Amerika. Tae noa ki te 1 o Hēpuari 2016, ka whiwhi ngā kaimahi katoa o nāianei i te $10 neke atu rānei i ia haora, e kī ana.

title: A14 Cambridge ki Huntingdon roadworks items for auction
summary: Kei te hokona tētahi drone, ngā pāruru paihikara, ngā koeko waka, ngā tohu huarahi me ngā maero o ngā paipa wai i muri i te whakaotinga o tētahi kaupapa huarahi £1.5bn.
text: Ko ngā tūemi, i whakamahia i te wā o te tīaroarotanga anō o te A14 i waenganui i Huntingdon me Cambridge, e haere ana i raro i te hama i tētahi hokonga tuihono a tērā wiki. I kī ngā Huarahi o Ingarangi kua nekehia ētahi taputapu ki ētahi atu kaupapa, engari kei te hokona atu te toenga. Ka wāhikētia te moni ki te utu katoa o te kaupapa huarahi. Ahakoa kāore pea koe i te tino whakamahi mō tētahi ipu rokiroki nui, he maha ngā huinga rama waka, he whakaruru kai paipa tū, he tohu huarahi mamati ā-kōmaru ā-kōmaru ā-kawe rānei, he maha ngā taputapu e tukuna ana mō te kāinga, te tari rānei. Ko ngā kāmera mamati, ngā pouaka whakaata, ngā tēpu, ngā tūru tari me ngā whatanga koti kei waenganui hoki i ngā tūemi 1,000 neke atu rānei e hokona ana e Peaker Pattinson (Auctioneers) Ltd o Stamford, Lincolnshire, i te 15 me te 16 o Whiringa ā-rangi. Kua tuwhera kē te tono, engari kāore e tīmata te hoko tae noa ki tērā wiki. I kī a Julian Lamb, te kaiwhakahaere hanganga o Highways England mō te kaupapa A14, ko ngā rota hoko he "nuinga o ngā rauemi rangitahi e hiahiatia ana e mātau hei hanga i te mahi". "Ka hoki mai te moni ki roto i te kaupapa, ā, ka whakaheke tika i te utu katoa o [ia], nā reira... ko te painga pai rawa atu o te kaiutu tāke nāna i pūtea te kaupapa A14, ā, ka whakahekea te pire whakamutunga mō te aronui." I tīmata te mahi i te ara 21 maero (34km) i waenganui i te M11 i Cambridge me te A1 i Huntingdon i Whiringa 2016, ā, i mutu i Me i tēnei tau. Kimihia te Rongokōrero o TE Rāwhiti o Ingarangi i Facebook, Instagram me Twitter. Mēnā he huatau pūrākau tāu, īmēra eastofenglandnews@bbc.co.uk

title: Ka tīmata te 'Retweet' me te 'woot' i te papakupu Oxford
summary: Aue! Ko ngā kupu ā-hangarau kei waenganui i ngā 400 i tāpiritia ki te Concise Oxford English Dictionary hōu rawa.
text: Kei roto ko te retweet - ki te tuku i tētahi karere i Twitter, me te kuputuhi - he reo e whakamahia ana e te rangatahi ki te kōrero pēnei i te dis. Ko ētahi atu kupu pēnei i te whakaweti ā-ipurangi me te sexting ka tīmata anō hoki. "Ko ēnei tāpiritanga e whakahaere ana i te tikanga o tētahi papakupu e rapu ana i ngā wā katoa kia haere whakamua," te kī a te kaiwhakatika OED, a Angus Stevenson. "Kua waihangatia e ngā pae whatunga pāpori tētahi reo tūturu o te kupenga," tana whakamārama i roto i tētahi pou rangitaki. "Kua kite mātou he tere ake te haere mai o ngā kupu hōu ki te moni nā te ipurangi, i te kitenga o ngā hoa, i ngā hoa rānei o ngā hoa e whakamahi ana i ngā kupu hōu me te tārua." I kī a ia ko ngā kupu pēnei i te wūru, i te w00t rānei - he whakaoho o te whakamana me te angitu - ka taea te takea mai ki rāwāhi, engari ka tere te whiwhi i te whakamahinga maha puta noa i te toenga o te ao kōrero Ingarihi. "I tīmata te kīanga 'woot' i Amerika, engari i tere rawa te tīkina e ngā tāngata i Ingarangi, nā te ipurangi e pakaru ana i ngā rohe aowhānui," te kī a Tēnā Tīnihi. New speak I whakarewaina i te tau 1911, ko te Concise Oxford English Dictionary i whakaritea hei whakarārangi kupu hou. Ko tōna putanga tuatahi, e 100 tau te pakeke i tēnei marama, i roto i ngā kupu kōrero rongonui pēnei i te hāte, te pāka me te piffle. I ngā wā katoa he atekōkiri nui te hangarau puta noa mō ngā kupu hōu. I roto i te putanga o te tau 1911 ko te waka rererangi - he waka rererangi e rua ngā parirau, me te marconigram - he karere i tukuna mā te reo irirangi. Ko ētahi atu kupu tīariari kua hangaia e te ahurea hangarau rongonui. I roto i te putanga hou rawa, kua whakatikaina te kaiwhaiwhai ki te tikanga hoki "tētahi tangata e aroturuki ana i tētahi tangata, rōpū, ērā atu mea i runga i tētahi pae whatunga pāpori". Ināianei, kua tautuhia anōtia te hoa e te whakatupuranga Facebook ki te tikanga noa iho o tētahi tangata e tauwhiti auau ana koe ki te tuihono. I kī te kaiwhakatika matua o te papakupu, a Fiona McPherson he mea nui kia uru ngā kupu hōu ki te whakamahinga noa. "Ko te tuatahi, ko te tuatahi e pā ana ki te whakaaturanga. Nā reira i te wā e whakamahia ana e te tangata, ā, ka kitea e mātou he tauira takitahi." I whakamāramatia e ia ko te tikanga o te takitahi ko te āhua i roto i ngā nūpepa me ngā pukapuka. "He kōhiko ētahi kupu i roto i te parai, engari ka taea e koe te ine mā te whakamahi i tō ake whakawā mēnā ka ora tētahi mea, kāore rānei," ko te tāpiri mai a Ms McPherson. Ahakoa te awhi i ngā kupu me ngā kīanga hōu, e whakaae ana ngā ētita o te papakupu ehara rātou i te kaiwhakamahi ngākau nui o te rārangi kupu hōu. "Kāore au i te mōhio he aha e kore ai e taea e te tangata te kōrero noa iho, engari tērā pea kei te tawhito ahau," te kī a Tēnā Stevenson.

title: He 'āta whakaaro' ngā taupānga pāpāho pāpori ki ngā kaiwhakamahi
summary: Kei te āta whakawaia e ngā kamupene pāpāho pāpori ngā kaiwhakamahi ki ā rātou hua mō te whiwhinga pūtea, kua kī atu ngā insiders o Silicon Valley ki te hōtaka Panorama o TE HAU.
text: Nā Hilary AnderssonBBC Panorama "Me te mea kei te mau rātou i te kokaine whanonga, ā, kei te tauhiuhi noa iho i tō atanga, ā, koia tērā te mea e hiahia ana koe ki te hoki mai, ki muri, ki muri", te kī a te kaimahi o Mozilla me Jawbone o Aza Raskin. "I muri i ia mata i tō waea, ko te nuinga o te wā he mano ngā kaipūkaha kua mahi i tēnei mea kia ngana ki te whakawai," tana tāpiri mai. I te tau 2006 i hoahoatia e Tēnā Raskin, tētahi kaipūkaha hangarau tōmua, he panuku mutunga kore, tētahi o ngā āhuahira o ngā taupānga maha e kitea ana ināianei he tino tikanga. I taua wā, e mahi ana a ia mō Humanized - he tohutohu atanga kaiwhakamahi rorohiko. Mā te panuku mutunga kore e taea ai e ngā kaiwhakamahi te miri whakararo mutunga kore i roto i ngā ihirangi me te kore pāwhiri. "Ki te kore koe e tuku wā ki tō roro ki te hopu i ō hiahia," te kī a Tēnā Raskin, "ka panuku tonu koe." I kī a ia ka roa kē atu te titiro a ngā kaiwhakamahi ki ā rātou waea i te mea e hiahiatia ana. I kī a Tēnā Raskin kāore a ia i whakarite ki te whakawaia i te iwi, ā, ināianei kei te hara ia. Engari, i kī a ia, he tokomaha ngā kaihoahoa i āia ki te waihanga i ngā āhuahira taupānga whakawairangi e ngā tauira pakihi o ngā kamupene nunui i whakamahi i a rātou. "Kia whiwhi ai i te hurihanga pūtea panuku, kia piki ake ai tō utu hea, me piki ake te nui o te wā e pau ana i te tangata ki tō taupānga," tana kī. "Nā reira, ina pēhi koe i taua tau kotahi, ka tīmata koe ki te ngana ki te waihanga i ngā huarahi hou kia noho māwhiti ai te tangata." I ngaro te wā i mahia e tētahi kaimahi Facebook o mua tētahi wāhi pātahi. "He tino ōrite te pāpāho pāpori ki tētahi mīhini kāniwha," te kī a Sandy Parakilas, nāna i whakamātau ki te whakamutu i te whakamahi i te ratonga i muri i tana wehenga atu i te kamupene i te tau 2012. "I pēnei tonu ahau i te whakamutu i te hikareti." I roto i tōna tau me te rima marama i Facebook, ka kī a ia, kua mōhio hoki ētahi ki tēnei mōrea. "Tērā tonu te mōhiotanga ki te mea he tikanga te hua, he whakawai," tana kī. "He tauira pakihi tāu i hoahoatia hei whakauru i a koe me te whakangote i a koe i te wā e taea ana, kātahi ka hoko atu i taua aro atu ki ngā kaipānui." I kī atu a Facebook ki te AO i hoahoatia ana hua "hei whakatata mai i ngā tāngata ki ō rātou hoa, whānau, me ngā mea e māharahara ana rātou". E kī ana "kāore he wāhanga e hiahia ana ki tētahi mea hei āhuatanga whakawairangi ki roto i taua tukanga". Ko te tawhito o Like Ko tētahi o ngā āhuatanga tino ātaahua o te pāpāho pāpori mō ngā kaiwhakamahi ko te "pai", ka puta mai i te āhua o te tohu kōnui, ngākau, retweets rānei. I kī a Leah Pearlman, te kaihanga tahi o te pātene Pēnei a Facebook, kua māwhiti a ia ki Facebook nā te mea kua tīmata a ia ki te whakatū i tōna āhua o te wāriu whaiaro i runga i te maha o ngā "pai" i a ia. "Ina hiahia ahau ki te whakamanatanga - ka haere ahau ki te tirotiro i Facebook," tana kī. "Kei te mokemoke ahau, 'Me tirotiro ahau i taku waea.' Kei te haumaru ahau, 'Me tirotiro ahau i taku waea.'" I kī a Ms Pearlman kua ngana a ia ki te whakamutu i te whakamahi i te Facebook i muri i tana wehenga atu i te kamupene. "I kite ahau ka whakairihia e au tētahi mea i whakamahia e au ki te whakairi, ā, ka iti iho te tatau 'pēnei' i tērā i mua. " Ohorere, i whakaaro ahau he momo whakawaia hoki ahau ki te urupare." E tohu ana ngā rangahau taitamariki mōrearea he hononga i waenganui i te whakamahi i te pāpāho pāpori me te pouri, te mokemoke me te tini o ētahi atu raruraru hinengaro. I Ingarangi, ināianei ka pau i ngā taitamariki te toharite o te 18 hāora i te wiki i runga i ā rātou waea, ko te nuinga o ngā taitamariki e whakamahi ana i te pāpāho pāpori. E whakapono ana a Ms Pearlman ki ngā rangatahi e mōhio ana he raruraru te pāpāho pāpori ki a rātou, me whakaaro hoki ki te whakawātea i aua taupānga. "Ko ngā mea tuatahi e kī ana ahau kia hīpae aua taitamariki ki tētahi huarahi rerekē nā te mea he torutoru noa iho ngā kaiārahi, ka taea e ia te āwhina i ētahi atu ki te whai atu," tana kī. I tērā tau ka kī tūmatanui te perehitini mātāmua o Facebook, a Hōne Parker, ka whakaritea e te kamupene kia pau te wā kaiwhakamahi e taea ana. I kī a ia e "pokanoa ana i tētahi whakararuraru i roto i te hinengaro tangata". "I mārama ngā kaihanga", tana kī, "i mārama ki tēnei, ā, i mahia tonutia e mātau." Engari i kī a Ms Pearlman kāore a ia i whakaaro kia whakawaia te pātene Like. E whakapono ana hoki a ia he maha ngā painga o te whakamahi pāpāho pāpori mō te tini o ngā tāngata. I te tūtakitanga ki te whakapae a Tēnā Parker kua rapu tika te kamupene ki te matau i ngā tāngata mai i te tīmatanga, ka kī atu te mana matua o Facebook Ime Archibong ki te AO kei te titiro tonu ki te take. "Kei te mahi tahi mātou me ngā tāngata hunga tuatoru e titiro ana ki ngā whanonga hanga tikanga - ahakoa kei runga i tā mātou pūhara, i te ipurangi rānei - me te ngana ki te mōhio mēnā he huānga e whakapono ana mātou kei te tūkino ki ngā tāngata," tana kī, "kia taea ai e mātou te whakatakoto i aua mea, ā, ka taea e mātou te haumi ki te whakarite kei te haumaru aua tāngata i roto i te wā." E tohu ana ngā pūrongo o nā tata nei kei te mahi a Facebook i ngā āhuahira kia kite ai ngā kaiwhakamahi i te nui o te wā i pau i runga i tōna taupānga i roto i ngā rā e whitu kua hipa, me te tautuhi i ngā tepe wā o ia rā. Ka tūhura hoki te hōtaka Panorama i te whakamahinga o te tae, ngā oro me ngā utu ohorere hei whakahaere i te whanonga pākaha. I whakapeka a Twitter ki te kōrero. I kī a Snap e hari ana ki te tautoko i te whakamahinga auaha auau o tana taupānga, Snapchat. Engari i whakakāhore i te whakamahi i ngā māminga arokite hei whakaoti i tēnei, ā, kāore i te hiahia ki te whakanui ake i te whakauru wātea o te hua. Panorama - Ngā Rorohiko: Te Taha Pouri - ka whakaaturia ki TE Kotahi i te 19:00 BST i te 4 o Hōngongoi me te Rongokōrero o te Ao o TE Ao ā muri ake nei.

title: Ka tohuāki te heitara o te Ratonga Huna o Koropia i ngā ture hōu
summary: Kua whakamaheretia e te Ratonga Huna o Amerika ngā tohutohu kaimahi i te ngana ki te aukati i te tāruatanga o te heitara wahine o Koropia.
text: Ka rāhuitia ngā māngai e haere ana ki rāwāhi kia kaua e inu i runga i te mahi, te toro atu ki "ngā whare whakarihariha" me te kawe mai i ngā manene ki roto i ngā rūma hōtēra. "Whakaarohia tō whanonga mā te arotahi o ngā wiki maha kua taha," te kī a te Tumuaki o Mark Sullivan ki ngā kaimahi. Ka tū hoki te kōwhiringa i ngā wātū matatika mō ngā kaimahi i a ia e ngana ana ki te neke atu i te wāhanga o Cartagena. Kotahi tekau mā rua ngā māngai o te Ratonga Huna me ētahi o ngā āpiha hōia o Amerika i whakapāngia i roto i tētahi pō o te wahine me te inu i te taone tauranga o Kōpia i mua i te haerenga mai o Perehitini Pakihi mō tētahi tūnga ā-rohe i te tīmatanga o tēnei marama. Ināianei kua whakarerea ngā kaimahi 12 o te umanga, kei te anga atu rānei ki te mahi whakatinanatanga. Kua kī hoki te Ratonga Huna e uiui ana i tētahi pūrongo e haere ana ngā mema o tētahi atu tīma tōmua ki ngā karapu tīhore me te utu i ngā kairau i El Salvador i te tau 2011. I kī tētahi kōrero i te Rāitema kāore he whakaaturanga "whai tikanga" i kitea hei tārua i te pūrongo. I whakaahuatia e te kōwhiringa ngā huringa hei "whakareitanga pūnoa" o ngā ture tīariari - "ngā whakapainga o ngā ture tīariari" e whakahaere ana i ngā kawenga me te whanonga kaimahi. Ā muri ake nei ka whiwhi ngā māngai i runga i ngā whakaritenga kē i ngā kōrero i te taenga atu, arā ko "ngā rohe whakaweto me ngā wāhi whakaweto". Ka rāhuitia te inu i roto i te 10 haora o te mahi, pērā ki te whakaae i ngā manene ki roto i ngā rūma hōtēra, hāunga ngā kaimahi hōtēra me ngā hoa whai mana. I ētahi wā ka whakaaetia te whakapaunga waipiro "ngāwari" anake. E 12 ngā māngai o te Ratonga Huna e honoa ana ki te heitara o Cartagena i hākinakina i tētahi pō i tētahi pae tīhore rongonui i te takiwā tauranga o te taone, i pūrongotia he nui te nui o te vodka. I muri iho ka hoki rātau ki te Hōtēra Karibe whetū e rima me te kōpikopiko o ngā wāhine Koropia. I te ata a muri ake ka kitea e tētahi haupae mo te utunga tētahi wahine e rere ana ki te riri, ā, ka kitea te tokomaha o ngā wāhine e 20 i roto i ngā rūma o Amerika. I tangohia e te Ratonga Huna nga tāngata i te mahi hohe, a, ka whakakapia i mua i te taenga mai o Perehitini Pakihi ki te Tihi o Amerika, e tohe ana kia kore rawa te haumarutanga o te perehitini i whakararurarutia. I kī atu te Hēkeretari Haumarutanga Whenua o Janet Napolitano ki te Kāwanatanga i te tīmatanga o tēnei wiki he take tūhāhā te mahi i Koromopia, e kī ana ka mīharo a ia mehemea he raruraru ahurea whānui ake.

title: I whakawāteatia te utu nekeneke UK a ngā kaiwhakamāori o Pūkeirangi
summary: Ka taea e ngā kaiwhakamāori Pūkeirangi i mahi tahi me ngā hōia o Ingarangi e whawhai ana ki te Huinga te noho koreutu i te UK, kua kī te hēkeretari kāinga.
text: Neke atu i te 150 ngā Hūnihi i tukuna he whakaaetanga noho e rima tau i kī ka anga atu rātau ki te whakahokia ki Awhekenetāna ina pau, ki te kore rātau e utu i te £2,389 hei tono mō te waihotanga noa iho. I kī a Stuad Javid kua whakawāteatia nga utu. I kī tētahi kaikōrero mō ngā kaiwhakamāori i "rekareka" rātau ki te rongo. Engari i tono te rōpū kia whakaaetia o rātau whānau kia hono ki a rātau. I tēnei wā, kāore e whakaaetia ngā wahine me ngā tamariki a ngā kaiwhakamāori kia noho ki UK ki te kore rātau e haere i te wā kotahi ki ērā i tukuna he whakaaetanga. I karangatia tēnei e te rōpū he "tūkinotanga kino" nā te mea kāore i taea e te maha o ngā whānau te whiwhi i ngā tuhinga e hiahiatia ana hei haere i taua wā. I kī hoki te rōpū me utu rātau neke atu i te £1,000 kia whiwhi tuhinga tika mō ngā tamariki i whānau mai i te UK. I kī te hēkeretari kāinga mō te 400 ngā kaiwhakamāori Pūkeirangi o mua kua neke ki UK hei wāhanga o te kaupapa kāwanatanga. I kī a Tēnā Javid: "I mahi ngā kaiwhakamāori Pūkeirangi paetata i roto i ngā āhuatanga mōrearea, uaua hoki, i rite tonu te whakamōrearea i o rātau oranga. " I ngā wā katoa e mārama ana mātou ka taea e rātou te noho ki te UK me ō rātou whānau, ā, i tēnei rā kua pānuitia e au ka taea e rātou tēnei mō te kore utu." I tāpiritia e ia e "titiro anō ana te Tari Kāinga ki ngā mea e taea ana" kia ngāwari ake ai te kawe mai a nga kaiwhakamāori i a rātau wahine me a rātau tamariki ki te whenua. I kī te hēkeretari whakangungu a Gavin Williamson i "hari" a ia i te pānuitanga a Tēnā Javid, ā, he "mea nui kia tukua e mātau" mō ngā kaiwhakamāori. I kī te kaiwhakamāori o Haira Walizada, nāna i mahi mō te hōia o Ingarangi i waenganui i te 2009 me te 2015, ā, i neke ki UK i te tau 2016, i kī te āhuatanga "kaua rawa e pā mai i te wāhi tuatahi". I kī te tau e 27 tau, e noho ana ināianei i Manchester, ko te whakahau kia hoki ki Awhekenetāna he rite ki te "tatari kia tae mai tō matenga". Ko te wā tuarua tēnei i roto i ngā marama maha kua whakarerea e te kāwanatanga te waihotanga noa iho kia noho utu tonu mō tētahi rōpū tāngata motuhake. I Aperira, ka kī te hēkeretari kāinga o Amber Rudd ka kapakina aua utu katoa mō te whakatupuranga Windrush me o rātau whānau.

title: Ka patua e Rātana te tepenga kounga o te hau ā-tau i roto i te marama kotahi
summary: Kua tae ki ngā tepe pokenga ā-ture ā-tau i Rāwāhi i roto i te kotahi marama, kua whakaaturia mai ngā whika.
text: Kua hipa atu i te 18 ngā wā i tēnei tau - ko te mōrahi e whakaaetia ana i raro i ngā ture o te Uniana o Ūropi. I kī te Koromatua o Rāwāhi, a Sadiq Kani, ko te kounga o te hau i te pūmatua i te Hānuere tonu te tino pai i roto i te 18 tau. I kī ngā kaiwhakahauhau i te tīmatanga hau o te tau, tērā pea ka whakahekea ngā tara pokenga. I kitea e tētahi mātauranga NO2 o nā tata nei ko Marylebone Road me Hyde Park Corner ngā waehere poutāpeta tino poke i Ingarangi. I raro i te ture EU, ko te toharite o te taumata haora o NO2, ko te nuinga o ngā waka diesel, me kaua e nui ake i te 200 ngā moroiti mō ia mita pūtoru, neke atu i te 18 ngā wā i te tau. I takahia e te pūmatua aua tepe i te 6 o Hānuere ia tau mō te tekau tau tae atu ki te 2017. Kua whakatūria e Tēnā Kani te Kāreti o Kingi o Rāwāhi ki te aroturuki tonu i te pokenga o te hau i Rāwāhi. Ka whakamahia e ngā kaipūtaiao te hangarau hōu hei tuku i ngā matohi kounga o te hau ki te hunga e tino mōrearea ana ki ngā pānga o te hau rawakore, pēnei i ngā tamariki kura. E tūmanako ana te koromatua ka āwhina te aroturuki i ngā tāngata "ako anō mō te hau e hā ana rātou me ngā mea e taea e rātou hei whakapai ake". I pōhiritia e nga kaiwhakangahau te mahi a Tēnā Kani, engari i kī me nui ake te mahi a te kāwanatanga matua hei whakapai ake i te kounga o te hau. I kī a Oliver Hayes mai i Ngā Hoa o te Ao: "Me haere tahi tētahi aronui tango tika hei utu i ngā atekōkiri diesel me tētahi whatunga o ngā rohe hau mā tūturu puta noa i te whenua." I kī a ia i te waenganui o Hānuere ko te tīmatanga hau o te tau "tērā pea he nui te pānga ki te iti iho o ngā tara poke ki tētahi atu mea". I a ia e kōrero ana mō te kaupapa a te kāwanatanga ki te rutu i te kounga o te hau, ka kī te Minita Taiao a Thérèse Coffey i te Tūtira: "Ko te kounga o te hau kino e pā ana ki te hauora tūmatanui, te āhua o te hauora, me te taiao, koia mātou i whakatau ai kia nui ake te mahi."

title: E whakaae ana te kaiārahi Liberal o Kānata ki te whakamahi i te mariuana hei MP
summary: Kua whakaae te kaiārahi o te Rōpū Liberali o Kānata ki te kai mariuana i a ia e noho ana i te pāremata.
text: I kī atu a Pirihitini Trudeau, e 41, nāna i karanga ki te whakamanatanga o te rongoā i Hune, ki te Huffington Post i paowa mariuana whakamutunga ia i te toru tau ki mua. I pōtitia hei MP mō Papineau, Quebec, i te tau 2008, ko ia te tama mātāmua a te Pirimia o mua o Pierre Trudeau. I tēnei wā, ka kī atu te Pirimia o Hīnī Harper ki te paetukutuku kua āraia ia e te huangō ki te whakamātau i te rongoā. I puta mai te whakaaturanga a Tēnā Trudeau i roto i tētahi uiuinga a te paetukutuku rongokōrero o te whakamahinga rongoā a ngā kaiārahi o Kānata. I kī atu te kaiārahi o te Rōpū Manapori Hou, a Thomas Mulcair ki te Huffington Post kua paowa hoki ia i te mariuana, engari i whakapeka ki te kōrero āhea. 'He pupuhi' i kī a Tēnā Trudeau i paowa mariuana whakamutunga i tētahi hākari hapa i a ia e noho ana tamariki i te pō me to rātau kuia. "I tahuna e tētahi o o mātau hoa he pona, a, ka whakawhitia," tana kī. "I pupuhi ahau." I kī a ia e rima, e ono rānei ngā wā i whakamahia e ia te mariuana i roto i tōna oranga, engari kāore anō kia hokona te rongoā. I kī a ia kaore a ia e inu kawhe, a, kaore anō kia whakamahia he rongoā uaua. Na tana whakaurunga i tere te whakahēnga mai i te nuinga o te Rōpū Rangatira. "Mā te takahi i ngā ture o Kānata i a ia e pupuri ana i te tari pōti, e whakaatu ana a [Trudeau] he tauira kino a ia mō ngā Kānata katoa, otirā ko ngā rangatahi," te kī a te Minita Ture a Pita MacKay ki te kaipānui o TE WĀ.

title: Ka kati a Foo Fighters me Taylor Swift i te Mutunga Wiki Nui o te Reo Irirangi 1 i Norwich
summary: I te rā whakamutunga o te Mutunga Wiki Nui o te Reo Irirangi 1, ka kitea ngā kaihautū ki tētahi haora te roa o Foo Fighters i a rātau e kati ana i te takahanga i Earlham Park i Norwich.
text: Nā Chi Chi IzunduNewsbeat kaipānui whakangahau i Earlham Park, i whakatapua e Norwich Frontman Dave Grohl te Whakaminenga mai i ta rātau pukaemi hou ki a Taylor Swift, i tuhia e rātau i tōna taone tupu o Nashville. Ka kī atu a ia ki te huihuinga: "Kei te hiahia tika ahau, tērā pea ka hiahia a ia ki te tiki i tētahi whakahau tautāwhi. " Ki taku pēne whakatuwhera, a Taylor Swift. Taylor me nga Swifts." I whakatapua e Foo Fighters tētahi o a rātau ara ki a Taylor Swift I kī atu hoki a ia ki ngā kaihautū "ka patua ahau e aku tamariki mō te kōrero i tēnei, engari kua whakatapua tēnei ki a Taylor Swift" i a ia e kati ana i te Mutunga Wiki Nui me te Tino Pai o Koe. Ahakoa te rā ua, e 25,000 ngā kaihautū i haere ki te takahanga i roto tonu i te wairua tiketike. I tākaro a Taylor Swift i runga i te atamira matua mō te 45 meneti i mua i te Foo Fighters me tana huinga i whakakorea nuitia mai i tana pukaemi hou i te tau 1989. I puta te rā i te kōrero a Taylor Swift ki ngā kaihautū: "Kāore anō ahau kia mahi i tētahi Wiki Nui o te Reo Irirangi 1 i mua tae noa mai ki tēnei wā. Ā, kāore anō ahau kia tākaro i Norwich i mua i tēnei wā." I mua i te tākaro i Shake It Off, i tae ki te tau rua i roto i te Tūtohi Takitahi Whaimana, ka hoatu takoha te kaiwaiata tau 25 tau ki te Reo Irirangi 1 me te huihuinga. "E hiahia ana ahau ki te mihi nui ki a koe ki te Reo Irirangi 1 mō te whakanoho i ahau ki mua i tēnei huihuinga i te pō nei. He moemoeā koutou, he waiata me te kanikani. "Āpōpō me hoki tātau katoa ki te oranga pūnoa. E hiahia ana ahau kia whakaaro koe ki te mea kei tētahi hākari koe me ngā mano tini o ētahi atu tāngata e aroha ana ki te pūoro, ā, kei te anga whakamua katoa. "Kāore he tangata e titiro ana ki a koe, kāore he tangata e whakawā ana i a koe. Nā reira e tūmanako ana ahau mō ngā meneti e toru me te hāwhe e whai ake nei ka tino rūrū koe." I tākaro a Taylor Swift i mua i a Foo Fighters i runga i te atamira matua i Big Weekend "He ātaahua a ia, he ātaahua," te kī a Dave Aston tau 29 tau mai i Essex. "He ātaahua tōna aroaro atamira. " I whakaaro ahau he whakamīharo tēnā, he tino pai. Ehara tēnei i te momo pūoro e haere noa ana ahau, engari ki taku whakaaro he wāhi tēnei e uru ai te katoa ki te pūoro. "Ā, he tino kaiwhakaari a ia, ā, ki taku whakaaro i tino whakaaturanga a ia mō te katoa. He tino mātauranga," te kī a Suzanne Ives, 30, mai i Norwich. I tūtei a Newsbeat i te kaiwaiata a Soak me te nuinga o Catfish me ngā Bottlemen "e rūrū ana" ki te huinga a Taylor. I nekehia a Catfish me The Bottlemen ki te atamira matua i muri i te whakahau a Sam Smith kia wehe atu i te tākaro i Norwich. Me pokanga te kaiwaiata i tōna korokoro. I mau mātau ki tētahi Van McCann tino manawawera, he frontman me Catfish. "I aroha ahau ki a ia, he hōnore ehara i te mea. I runga mātau i te atamira Whakataki i tērā tau. Kia neke atu ki tēnei i tēnei tau, kei te hiahia ahau, titiro kei te haere tonu ōku waewae." I whakapārewa hoki a ia mo te tango i te tūnga o Sam Smith. "I kino ahau," tana kī. "Ko tana hunga whakarongo, e mōhio ana koe, nā te mea he ao wehe mātou." I a ia e kōrero ana mō Sam Smith, ka whakakīa e Lethal Bizzle te āputa mō Catfish me ngā Bottlemen i runga i te atamira In New Music We Trust, tae atu ki te whiwhi i te tēneti pōkai ki te whakapōrearea i te skank, tana nekehanga kanikani hou. "Nui a Sam Smith, e mōhio ana koe me pēhea te haere, i ētahi wā ko te aituā o te tangata ko te wā o tētahi atu tangata. " Nā reira ko te tūmanako nui a Sam Smith ka ora wawe koe." I haere a Clean Bandit ki te atamira matua i te wā o tētahi o ngā ua nui maha. "Norwich, he mea whakamīharo, he tino motuhake," te kī a Grace Chatto mai i te pēne ki a Newsbeat i a rātau e haere mai ana i te atamira. "I te marangai, engari he tokomaha rawa ngā tāngata, ā, he tino ngahau. " I konei tonu mātau i te tau kotahi ki muri e tākaro ana i tērā atamira, kātahi ka hoki mai ki te mahi i tēnei. Te āhua nei he tino nui te huihuinga, he tino ātaahua." I kī atu a Sigma ki a Newsbeat i pouri rātau i te hapa i tētahi huinga mai i a George Ezra, nāna i mahi i runga i te atamira matua i te wā kotahi i te teneti In New Music We Trust.
