I whakaae a Hōri e toru wiki tana wehenga i te mahinga. "He mahi tā mātou inapō kia tino mōhio ai mātou ka taea tonu e mātou te tākaro, ā, i mīharo ahau i mōhio tonu ahau ki ngā kupu katoa he pai. Engari āe, i aroha ahau ki a ia." I taea e nga Longordas te tiki tīkiti mō te mutunga wiki katoa, ahakoa te tūtuki ki Foo Fighters, ka kī a Servirianna, e 22 tau, ko tana miramira tonu ko Snoop Dogg, nāna i mahi i te Hātarei. "He tino whakamīharo a ia, kore rawa ahau i whakaaro ka haere mai a ia ki Norwich. He tino pai. Kāore anō a Taylor Swift kia tīmataria a Snoop." Ahakoa ko te upoko o te pō Hātarei te tino mahara mō Tom, e 21 tau te pakeke. "Muse, he tino mātauranga rātau i te ora." Engari mō te hunga kāore i waimarie ki te tiki tīkiti mō ngā rā e rua, he wheako tonu te whakarongo ki te Mutunga Wiki Nui. "He nui, he tino nui," te kata a Clementine Baldwin, 19 tau, mai i Norwich. "Engari he whakamīharo rātau. Tino whakamīharo." "Ko te nuinga. He mea whakamīharo. Mutunga wiki. Ake ake. I rongo ahau i taku whare inanahi, ā, e noho ana ahau i te 12 maero te tawhiti. "I tēnei rā, ko aku mahi makau ko Taylor Swift me Imagine Dragons. He mea whakamīharo. He mea whakamīharo noa iho," te kī a Alice Wright, 19 tau, nāna i whakamutu ta mātau kōrerorero mā te uru ki te waiata hoki ki te kāinga; he whakatapunga motuhake ki Norwich. Ko te pānuitanga ora o te Mutunga Wiki Nui o te Reo Irirangi 1 i Norwich kei runga i te Reo Irirangi 1 me te 1Xtra puta noa i te mutunga wiki. Mō ngā whakaahua hōu rawa, ngā ataata me ngā tauhohenga pāpāho pāpori mai i te Mutunga Wiki Nui o te Reo Irirangi 1 haere ki bbc.co.uk/bigweekend Follow @BBCNewsbeat on Twitter, BBCNewsbeat on Instagram, Radio1Newsbeat on YouTube and you can now follow BBC_Newsbeat on Snapchat

title: Kiribati ferry disaster: Islands mourn 81 presumed victims
summary: E tangi ana te iwi o Kiribati i te ngaromanga nui rawa atu o te ora ki te moutere.
text: Neke atu i te rua wiki ki mua, e whakaarotia ana kua mate te totohu o te MS Butiraoi, neke atu i te 81 ngā oranga, i waenganui i a rātou he tokomaha ngā tamariki me ngā taiohi. I karangatia tētahi mahi rapu aowhānui i tērā wiki e whitu ngā mōrehu i te Paraire. Ka haere tonu te rapunga a ngā poti paetata, engari ināianei kei te kimi tinana pea rātou, ehara i ngā mōrehu. Kua huri te wairua i waenganui i ngā moutere tata ki te 115,000 mai i te tūmanako ki te riri me te pōrearea. E pātai ana te iwi me pēhea te pā mai o tētahi tūkinotanga pēnei. 'Incompetence at every level' I eke te waka waka i te 18 o Hānuere mō tētahi haerenga auau e rua rā, e hipa ana i te 260km (160 maero) o ngā wai o Te Moana-nui-a-Kiwa. E 88 neke atu rānei ngā pāhihi i kawea e te Butiraoi mai i te motu o Nonouti ki te taone o Betio i te motu matua o te moutere o Tarawa - engari kāore i tae mai. "Te āhua nei i ia taumata, i tūtaki ngā mea katoa ki te māiatanga," te kī a Reese Masita, te perehitini o te Melbourne Kiribati Association ki te HAU. I muri i ngā rā kāore i rongo i tētahi mea mai i te oko 17.5m (57ft), ka tīmata tētahi mahi rapu aowhānui me ngā rererangi mai i Aotearoa, Ahitereiria me te US e karapa ana i te moana mō ngā pakaru, otaota me ngā mōrehu. I te 27 o Hānuere, ka kitea e tētahi waka rererangi hōia o Aotearoa tētahi waka e rima mita e mau ana i ngā mōrehu e whitu, i waenganui i a rātou he kōtiro 14 tau. Ināianei kua whakaarotia kua mate katoa ngā pāhihi e toe ana. E whakarārangi ana tētahi tuhinga pāhihi tuatahi e 14 ngā tamariki, 16 ngā ākonga me ngā pakeke e 58. Ko te wā o te tau e hoki ai ngā ākonga ki te kura, ā, he nui kē atu te pūkenga o te kaipuke i te mea noa. I hoahoatia mō ngā pāhihi e 25 anake. Ahakoa e 33 ōna motu ākau me ngā moutere ākau e horapa ana puta noa i ngā miriona kiromita tapawhā o te moana, he hapori iti a Kiribati - tata tonu te katoa e mōhio ana mā ētahi tūhononga ruarua mō tētahi, neke atu rānei o ngā tūpāpaku. I noho a Ms Masita i ngā tau tata nei i Ahitereiria, engari ko tētahi o ngā tamāhine a ōna hoa i runga i te waka waka. Ehara i te wā tuatahi i pāngia ai e Kiribati tētahi aituā waka waka. I te tau 2013, e 35 nga tāngata i mate ai tētahi mahi ōrite. Heoi anō, he iti noa iho te āhua o ngā raruraru i kitea i taua wā. "Kua totohu ināianei mō te katoa kāore he mea i rerekē," te kī a Ms Masita. I whakaaetia tētahi oko kāore i te moana, ā, i te tūkino i ngā paerewa haumaru, kia eke ki tētahi haerenga roa. Kāore i rawaka ngā koti ora me ngā waka whakaora, kāore he rama, he mura rānei. Ahakoa i hāngai te riri tuatahi ki te rangatira o te waka waka, e anga ana ināianei ki ngā whakapae, kei te pātai hōhonu ake te iwi ināianei. He ōrite te āhua o ngā waka waka katoa e mahi ana hei aho ora i waenganui i ngā moutere iti o Kiribati, e whakamārama ana a Ms Masita. "There's also a cultural issue at play, the people running the boats are taking risks because they feel they would be letting people down," she said. E rere ana ngā rererangi iti o te rohe i waenganui i ngā moutere, engari mō te nuinga o ngā tangata, ko ngā waka waka pēnei i te Butiraoi anake te huarahi e tae atu ai ki te wāhi e noho ana. Nā reira kua tere te neke o te whakapae ki ngā mana mo te kore e whakaū i ngā paerewa haumaru mōkito. Ko te tūmanako mō te wā heke mai kāore pea te Butiraoi e rite ki tētahi waka ka kōwhiria e koe mō tētahi haerenga e rua rā i Te Moana-nui-a-Kiwa, engari he māngai mō ngā poti katoa e tūhono ana i ngā motu 33 o Kiribati. "He raruraru te haumarutanga ki a rātou katoa, ka taea e koe te kī tēnā. Ko te tautiakitanga me ngā hātepe haumaru me ērā mea katoa kāore i te tīariari," te kī a Ms Masita. E toru ana pātai matua mō ngā mana: Engari e kī ana a Ms Masita ināianei he tūmanako tērā pea ka tohuāki te tauine o tēnei aituā hou i te huringa. Tērā tētahi whakaaro mēnā kāore e taea te whakawhirinaki ki te kāwanatanga ki te mahi, me tīmata te tangata mā te pana i te huringa i a rātau anō. Kua whakarewaina tētahi whārangi Gofundme hei whakaraupapa i ngā waka katoa ki tētahi rama kairapu ohorere. I a rātau e tangi ana i a rātau i aroha ai, tērā anō te manawa e kore taua ngaromanga o te ora e puta anō.

title: E whakaatu ana a Lego i ngā whika hauā hou i muri i tētahi whakahau tuihono
summary: Kua whakaaturia e Lego tana whika iti hauā tuatahi, i muri i te whakarewatanga o tētahi whakahau i tērā tau.
text: Nā te rōpū #ToyLikeMe i huatau ko te kamupene e "whakararuraru ana i ngā āhuatanga hauā" nā te mea he pakeke anake tōna pūāhua ki te whakamahi i tētahi tūru tūruhi. Ko te pūāhua hou tētahi o ngā tokomaha e whakamōhiotia ana. Ināianei kei te tonoa ētahi atu kaiwhakanao taonga tākaro nui kia whai i ngā āhiki o te umanga o Tenemāka. I whakarewaina te whakahau #ToyLikeMe ki te waihanga i ētahi atu taonga tākaro hei tohu i ngā tamariki hauā e 770,000 i te UK. Neke atu i te 20,000 ngā waitohu i whiwhi ai te petihana a te rōpū ki te waihanga i ngā taonga tākaro e whakaatu ana i ngā hauātanga i waenganui i ngā tamariki. "E hiahia ana mātou kia tangohia ngā hauātanga i te hōhipera ki tētahi wāhi ngahau ake," te kī a Rebecca Atkinson, nāna i tīmata te whakahau. He turi tētahi wāhanga o te whaea o te tokorua, ā, he kitenga kauhanga tōna. Ngā taonga tākaro hauā Ko te pūāhua hou he taitamariki pōtae pīpī e mau ana i te tūru tūruhi. Kei a ia anō tana ake kurī āwhina. I kitea tuatahitia i te whakaaturanga tākaro o Nuremberg. Ko te pūāhua hauā he wāhanga o te awhe Taone o te kamupene tākaro, ka hokona i Pipiri. "Kei te tino hari mātou i tēnei wā," te kī a Rebecca. "Kātahi anō ka tūtuki a Lego i to mātau ao i hangaia e te pereki, ā, e 150 miriona ngā tamariki hauā, ko ō rātou whaea, pāpā, kurī mōkai me ngā hamsters tino hari. " Kei te kōpikopiko katoa mātau i te tiriti e whiu ana i ngā pereki tae pēnei i te confetti. "Engari i runga i tētahi tuhipoka nui, he tino nui tēnei nekehanga a Lego ki te whakamutu i te whakawāteatanga ahurea, ka kōrero rōrahi ki ngā tamariki, hauā, ki tētahi atu rānei, i te ao." Mō ētahi atu pūrākau pēnei ka taea e koe ināianei te tikiake i te taupānga BBC Newsbeat hāngai tonu ki tō pūrere. Mō te iPhone haere ki konei. Mō te Android haere ki konei.

title: Pakanga ā iwi o Ripia: E whakapae ana a Macron i a Erdogan ki te raweke i te papā
summary: Kua whakapaea e te Perehitini Wīwī o Emanuera Macron tōna hoa tākehi o Recep Tayyip Erdogan i te whati i tana kī taurangi kia noho atu i Ripia.
text: I kī a Tēnā Macron kua kitea ngā manuao tākehi e haere tahi ana me ngā kaihoko o Hiriani ki Ūrai. Kaore anō a Tēnā Erdogan kia urupare ki nga whakaaro. I te tīmatanga o tēnei marama, ka tautohe nga kaiārahi o te ao kia kaua e whakararuraru i te papā ā iwi o Ripia, a, ka tautohe kia tautāwhi i tētahi aukati ringa UN. E tautoko ana a Tākehi i te Kāwanatanga o te National Accord (GNA) i Tripoli i te wā e whāngai ana a Wīwī i ngā here ki te tauwhāinga o te kāwanatanga, te hunga whakakeke o Te Kāwanatanga o Te Kāwanatanga. Mai i Aperira 2019, kua whawhai te GNA ki tētahi whakahāwea i whakarewaina e ngā kairiri pono ki a Gen Haftar. I kī a Tēnā Macron ko te aroaro o ngā manuao tākehi he "tūkinotanga mārama" o ngā mea i tautohe ai a Perehitini Erdogan i Berlin i te 19 o Hānuere i te wā o tētahi hui ki Ripia me ētahi atu kaiārahi o te ao. I karangatia e Tēnā Macron ngā mahi a Tākehi "whakararuraru ki te haumarutanga o ngā Pākehā me ngā Pākehā katoa". Ko te rohe o Sahel, he whenua āhua maroke ki te tonga o te Koraha o Sahara, he rārangi tuatahi i roto i te whawhai ki te tinihanga a te Māori mo te tata o te tekau tau. Tērā te mataku ka waipuke pea ngā ringa o Ripia ki te rohe o Sahel, e 4,500 ngā hōia Wīwī me ngā rangatira rangatira UN neke atu i te 14,000. He aha i pā mai i Berlin? Ko ngā kaiārahi o te EU, o Rūhia me Tāke i waenganui i te hunga i tuku ki te whakamutu i te raweke kē i te pakanga a Ripia, me te tautoko i tētahi aukati ringa UN. I muri i te hui, ka whakapuakina e te kaiārahi Tiamana, a Angela Tūturu, kāore he huarahi hōia hei whakamutu i te papā, "he rongoā tōrangapū anake". I tēnei wā, i kī te Hēkeretari Tianara o UN António Wānanga i tiritiri ngā mana nui katoa i reira "he whāinga kaha ki te whakamutu" i ētahi atu whakarerekētanga i te rohe. Heoi anō, i tāpiri mai a ia, i "tino māharahara" a ia mō ngā pūrongo kua katia e ngā ope pono ki a Ken Haftar ētahi tauranga matua me tētahi ararere hinu nui i te whenua. I whakapuakina hoki e te Minita Ā-Rohe o Rūhia, a Te Minita Ā-Rohe o Rūhia, o Te Minita Ā-Rohe o Rūhia, o I kī a ia i muri iho ko nga mana nunui "kāore anō kia tutuki i te whakarewa i tētahi kōrero nui, pūmau hoki" i waenganui i nga rōpū whawhai. He aha te mea e puta ana i Ripia? Mai i te whakatikanga o te tau 2011, kua haehae a Ripia i te papā mai i te whakatikanga o te tau 2011, nāna i whiu te tangata kaha o Te Wānanga o Aotearoa. Ko te Ope ā Iwi o Rūhia (LNA) e whakahaere ana i te nuinga o Ripia ki te rāwhiti, ā, i tērā o Āperira ka whakarewaina e ia he whakahāwea ki te GNA i runga anō i te pūmatua, o Tripoli. Kāore i taea e ōna ope te tango i te taone, engari i te tīmatanga o tēnei marama ka hopukina e te LNA te taone nui rawa o te whenua, o Sirte. E ai ki te UN, kua mate te whawhai i ngā rau tāngata, a, e hia mano anō i o rātau kāinga. I pānuitia he rangahau i te tīmatanga o tēnei marama i waenganui i a Gen Haftar me te GNA, i arahina e te Pirimia o Fayez al-Serren. Engari e whakapae ana ngā taha e rua i a rāua anō mō ngā pakarutanga pūrongo o te whakaaetanga, ā, ka ngana ki te whakarite i tētahi whakaruruhau mau tonu i tērā wiki i tētahi tihi i Mohihi. He aha te mahi a nga mana kē? Kua arotahi te tūranga o ngā kāwanatanga kē i roto i te papā i ngā marama tata nei, ā, ka puta i a Tāke tētahi ture tautohetohe hei hora i ngā hōia hei āwhina i ngā ope GNA i Tripoli. Kei te LNA a Gen Haftar te tautoko a Rūhia, Ihipa, Hauti Arapia, Ngā Ariki Arāpia o Te Hononga o Ngā Ariki Arāpia (UAE) me Horano. Nō nā tata nei, i kī atu te Karere Motuhake o UN ki Ripia Ghassan Salamé ki te Hōtaka Reo Irirangi 4 o Tēnei Rā he tino pai rawa atu tētahi rongoā tōrangapū ki te papā mō ngā rōpū katoa e pā ana nā te mea ko Ripia - me tōna papawhenua nui, ngā tuakiri paetata kaha, te iwi whānui nui me ngā hanganga kāwanatanga ngoikore - he whenua uaua ki te whakahaere i tētahi rōpū.

title: Royal Television Society Journalism Award for BBC NI Spotlight Troubles series
summary: Kua riro i tētahi rangatū pakipūmeka o Aiarangi ki te Raki, nāna i whakatakoto te hītori o ngā Raruraru, tētahi whakawhiwhinga pouaka whakaata tūturu.
text: I toa te hōtaka Rama The Troubles: A Secret History i te "Home - Current Affairs" Royal Television Society (RTS) Journalism Award. I whakaaturia e te rangatū ngā uiuinga kaha me ngā whakarākeitanga pūranga kāore anō kia kitea i mua. I whakaahuatia e nga kaiwhakawā he whakaaturanga tino pai o te "hanga kiriata whakaharahara". Ko te wāhanga toa whakawhiwhinga, i uiuia ai e te kaipānui o Mandy McAuley me te kaiwhakanao o Tamanna Pūhara ngā kōhuru pūmau i Mid-Ulster, he wāhanga o te rangatū whakamatau e waru hōtaka. I roto i te rangatū Rama ko ngā whakarākeitanga āhua kore nei o ngā mema IRA e whakarite ana, e mahi ana i tētahi whakaekenga pōma i te Whare Wānanga o Kuini, me ngā whakarākeitanga o te minita tuatahi o Sinn Féin o Aiarangi ki te Raki, o Mātini McGuinness i te aroaro o te hunga whenua e whakaminenga ana i tētahi pomu motokā i whakamahia i waenganui o Londonderry i te tau 1972. I hōparatia hoki e ia te pikinga o Īna Paisley, nāna i noho ko te kaiārahi o te Rōpū Kotahitanga Manapori (DUP) me te minita tuatahi tae atu ki tētahi uiuinga ki tētahi āpiha matua o te Ope Taua o mua, nāna i kī a Tēnā Paisley "i pūtea" i tētahi whakapae a te Ope Tūroro o Ulster (UVF) i County Down i te tau 1969. I whakaahuatia e Pita Johnston, te Tumuaki o TE NI, te rangatū pakipūmeka hei tētahi o "ngā mea tino nui" i hangaia e TE Aiarangi ki te Raki. I kī a ia ko ngā whakakitenga i roto i te hōtaka he kawenata ki te manawanui me te manawanui o ngā kaiwhakaatu o Darragh MacIntyre, o Te O'Leary me Mandy McAuley. Ko te whakawhiwhinga mō Spotlight tētahi o ngā tohu 10 i toa i te BBC i ngā tohu RTS o tēnei tau.

title: He maha rawa ngā herehere 'i hereheretia noatia', e kī ana te rangatira arotake
summary: He tokomaha rawa ngā tāngata e hereheretia ana, kua kī te upoko o te arotakenga ki te whare herehere.
text: Nā Sima KotechaBBC Radio 4's Today programme Lord Harris claimed resources were weakened, leaving vulnerable inmates unsupervised. I puta mai i te wā i whakahē ai nga mātua o tētahi tangata i whakamate i a ia i tētahi whare wānanga taitamariki hunga hara. I kī te National Offender Management Service he tino manakē te whakaiti i te maha o ngā patu i te whare herehere. 'Take takenui' i tonoa e te kāwanatanga e te kāwanatanga kia whakahaere i tētahi arotakenga me pēhea te whakaiti i ngā mate i roto i te tiakitanga, ā, e tūmanakohia ana kia whakaaturia ana kitenga a tērā raumati. E whakapono ana a ia ko te hereheretanga koretake o ētahi tangata, tae atu ki te hunga whai raruraru hauora hinengaro, e ārai ana i ētahi atu kia whiwhi i te tautoko e hiahiatia ana e rātau. I kī a Ariki Hāhi: "Ko te take nui he aha ētahi herehere [i roto i te whare herehere] i te wāhi tuatahi. " He raweke tērā pea ka mahia, tērā pea ka tiakina te moni a te kāwanatanga mā te whakatū i a rātou ki te whakamutu i roto i te pūnaha ture hara i te wāhi tuatahi, kāore rānei i te mutu ki te whare herehere? "E mārama ana ka noho tonu he uho o ngā herehere e hiahia ana ki te whare herehere. Engari, mēnā kāore ētahi o ētahi atu i reira, ka nui ake ngā rauemi hei whakarite kia tautokona aua tangata, ā, ka tutuki i te whare herehere ōna whāinga mō te whakaoratanga." I puta mai ngā kōrero a Ariki Hāhi i te wā i pātai ai ngā mātua o Hīnī Davison, he tangata 21 tau nāna i whakamate i a ia i te whare herehere i te tau 2013, he aha i kore ai e nui ake te mahi a nga mana herehere hei tiaki i a ia. 'Mōrea iti' i hereheretia a Davison, mai i Loughborough i Aotearoa, mo te pupuri i tētahi naihi, nāna i whakawehi ki te tūkino i a ia anō. I korerotia ki a ia ka nekehia ia ki tētahi hōhipera hauora hinengaro ina wātea he moenga, engari i mate ia i roto i tōna pūtau i te wā o Mahuru 2013. I whakataua e tētahi uiuinga kāore i tika te aroturuki i a ia, ā, kāore i tino whakangungu ki te āwhina i te hunga mōrearea. I whakamāramatia e tōna whaea ko Lynda: "He rite tonu ki 'he tamaiti anō ia kua tonoa ki te whare herehere'." I tāpiri mai a ia: "Ehara i te titiro ki te take i tonoa ai ia ki te whare herehere me ngā mea e hiahiatia ana e ia, pēnei i [te kī a ngā mana] 'Ki reira ka haere koe ki a Hīnī - kei reira tō pūtau - haere tonu'." I māka a Davison he "mōrea iti" o te tūkino i a ia anō me te whai i a ia i te whare herehere, ā, kāore i nekehia ki tētahi pūtau haumaru - kāore i taea e ia te whakairi i a ia - ka rongo te uiuinga. I kī tōna whaea i "tukua" a ia e nga mana herehere, ahakoa i "karanga āwhina". I kī te pāpā o Davison, a Jeffrey, ko ngā tāngata i aromatawai i tana tama he āpiha whare herehere, ā, "kāore i whakaakona ki te hauora hinengaro". I whakahē hoki a ia i te kore whakawhitiwhiti kōrero i ahu mai i Kete Parva. "Kāore tonu mātau i mōhio kei te tūkino a ia i a ia i roto i te whare herehere," tana kī. 'Kāore e taea e mātou te noho i ngā wāhi katoa' I kī tētahi āpiha whare herehere i Kete Parva, e hiahia ana kia noho ingoamuna, he takanga ia rā "mai i ngā raruraru iti ki ngā tāngata e tango ana i ngā wāhanga i o rātau ringa". "He tino uaua ki te aroturuki i ngā tamariki nā te iti o ngā kaimahi - kāore i a mātou te mana tangata hei tiaki i te hunga mōrearea, e hiahia ana rānei ki te aro atu motuhake," tana whakamārama. "Mēnā kei te mātakitaki tonu tētahi, i ētahi wā me karanga mātou ki ngā kaimahi mai i ētahi atu parirau, ko te tikanga ka mamae taua parirau. Ehara i a mātau te hē, nā te mea kāore e taea e tātau te noho i ngā wāhi katoa i ngā wā katoa," tana tāpiri mai. I tērā marama, ka kī te kaitirotiro matua o ngā whare herehere o Nick Hardwick kua puta he "tere te hinganga" i roto i te haumarutanga o te whare herehere i Ingarangi me Weera. I tētahi whakarongo a te Komiti Tīpako Ture o nā noa nei, i whakaaetia hoki e ngā mana i whakahāwea e rātau te pikinga o te iwi whānui o te whare herehere i tūtuki ki te pūnaha i tērā ngahuru. I mua i tērā, e hia rau ngā kaimahi i whakakorea, ā, e 16 ngā whare herehere kua katia. 'Ngā hē ōrite' Kua piki ake te 52% mai i te 2011-12, e ai ki ngā tatauranga o te Manatu Ture. E whakaatu ana rātau e 87 ngā herehere i mate i roto i ngā marama e 12 ki Mahuru 2014, i whakaritea ki te 57 i te tau ki Mahuru 2012. I ētahi take, ko te whakamomori te hua o te whakaweti me te tutu. E whakaatu ana ngā whika o te Manatu Ture i te maha o ngā whakaekenga i tuhia i roto i ngā whare herehere Ingarihi me Welsh kua neke atu i te mano i tērā tau, mai i te 14,045 i te 2012-13 ki te 15,441 i te 2013-14. I kī a Deborah Coles, ko te kaiwhakahaere tahi o Inquest, he aroha e āwhina ana i ngā whānau o ngā tāngata e mate ana i roto i te tiakitanga, he nui ake te āwhina e hiahiatia ana mō ngā herehere mōrearea, otirā ko te hunga whai take hauora hinengaro. I kī atu a ia i tēnei rā: "He tokomaha rawa ngā tāngata e tukuna ana e mātou ki ngā whare herehere kāore i te whai rawa, ā, kāore i te whai rauemi ki te mahi i ō rātou hiahia." I kī a ia he maha ngā tūpāpaku i roto i te whare herehere e "āraia" ana, ā, ka tāpiri mai: "Ko aua tāngata katoa e whakahaua ana ki te tirotiro me te aroturuki i ngā whare herehere e whakatūpato ana i ngā minita he raruraru, ā, e whakaaro ana ahau he tino māharahara te āwangawanga o nga minita ki tēnei take. " Ki te kore tātau e whakaiti i te hunga e haere ana ki te whare herehere, ka kite tātau i te matenga haere tonu o ngā tāne, wāhine me ngā tamariki." I kī a Steve Gillan, te hēkeretari ahuwhānui o te Rōpū Āpiha Whare Herehere, kāore i whiwhi ngā āpiha i te whakangungu hauora hinengaro rawaka. "Kua tino nui ināianei, ā, kāore e taea e koe te whakakāhore kāore i te tika te whakangungu mō te āpiha whare herehere o nāianei," tana kī atu ki te Reo Irirangi 5 ora. 'Kāore he whakamāramatanga ngāwari' i kī a Michael Spurr, te rangatira nui o te National Offender Management Service, he tino manakē te whakaiti i te maha o ngā mate i roto i ngā whare herehere. Ka kī a ia: "Ko te pikinga i te wāhanga whakamutunga o te 2013 me ngā marama tōmua o tēnei tau he tino māharahara, ā, kua kaha mātou ki te mārama ki ngā take o tēnei. " Pērā ki te take i roto i te iwi whānui, kāore he whakamāramatanga ngāwari me ngā take matatini, takitahi hoki i muri i tētahi whakamomori." A, ka tāpiri mai a ia: "Ko ia mate he whakararuraru mo te tangata me o rātau whānau, ā, ka mahi tonu mātau ki te ārai i te mate i roto i o mātau whare herehere." I kī a Nigel Newcomen, te poungaio whare herehere me te poungaio whakamātautau, he maha ngā whare herehere e mahi ana i ngā hē ōrite: "Ko ētahi o ngā āwangawanga kei a mātau e pā ana ki ngā ngoikoretanga i roto i te aromatawai mōrearea, ngā ngoikoretanga i... ngā tukanga ārai whakamomori me te tūkino i a ia anō. "He ngoikoretanga ēnei kua kitea e mātau mō ngā tau maha," tana whakamārama. I tēnei wā, kei te riri tonu a Jeffrey Davison i te matenga o tana tama a Steven, me te āhua o te whakahaere a te Manatu Ture i ōna whare herehere. "Ki taku mōhiotanga kāore te whare herehere i tiaki i a ia," tana kī. "Kāore mātau i pīrangi kia aroha rātau ki a ia. I hiahia mātou kia tiakina ia e rātou... kātahi ka taea e ia te hoki mai ki te kāinga ki a mātau." Whakarongo ki te hōtaka o Te Reo Irirangi 4 o Tēnei Rā i ia rā o te wiki mai i te 6:00 GMT - 9:00 GMT, me ngā Hātarei mai i te 7:00 GMT-9.00 GMT.

title: Ka hoki mai te waka ruku 'Boaty McBoatface' ki te kāinga
summary: Kua hoki mai a Boaty McBoatface, te waka ruku kōwhai makau o UK, i tana haerenga pūtaiao nui tuatahi.
text: Nā Honatana AmosBBC Science Correspondent I whakamahia te waka i te Tiri o te Moana ki te Moana ki te Tonga hei whakamahere i te nekehanga o te wai hōhonu, mātao i a ia e neke atu ana i te Whenua Mā ki te Moana Atarangi. E kī ana ngā kaipūtaiao he mahi nui tēnei rere wai ki te āwhina ki te whakarite i te pūnaha āhuarangi o te Ao. E toru ngā ruku i mahia e Boaty, tae atu ki te 4,000m i raro iho i te mata. A, i ngā pūkete katoa, i whiwhi i tētahi huinga raraunga hōu whakamīharo. "I tino pai mātou ki te mahinga a Boaty," te kī a Prof Alberto Naveira-Garabato mai i te Whare Wānanga o Southampton, te kaipūtaiao matua mō ngā tūhuratanga i whakahaeretia mai i te tēka o te Kaipuke Rangahau Ariki o James Clark Ross. "Neke atu i te toru rā te ruku roa rawa a Boaty, e hipa ana i te 180km. I rere a Boaty i roto i ētahi au tino kaha, e tata ana ki te takere o te moana, ā, ka tūtaki ki ētahi whenua tino poupou. A, i mahia tēnei i a ia e whakahaere ana i tētahi tauira tātauira tino matatini." E mau ana a Boaty i te ingoa i huatau mai e tētahi poipoi tūmatanui kia hoatu ki te oko rangahau pākākā o UK e £200m ā muri ake. I whakaaro te kāwanatanga e kore tēnei e tika, ā, i whakahaua kētia te moniker rekareka kia haere kē ki runga i te ruku (ka karangatia te kaipuke ko RSS Tā David Attenborough). Ko te National Oceanography Centre (NOC) o Southampton - te kāinga o Boaty - ka whakamahia tonutia te parani i runga i ngā mīhini e toru i roto i tana karaehe Autosub Long Range hou. Kua whakamātauria e ēnei subs ō rātou kaha i roto i ngā whakamātautau moana maha, engari ko te mahi a te Tiri o te Moana ki te Moana ki te I whakahōtakatia a Boaty ki te kauhoe i roto i tētahi āputa whāiti i te papa moana e toro atu ana ki te raki-rāwhiti o te Takiwā o te Moana ki te Tonga. E mōhiotia ana ko te Orkney Passage, ko tēnei whakatuwheratanga he "kōrere" tino nui i roto i te mea e kiia nei ko te "kaikawe moana nui" - te pūnaha pōturi o te rere hōhonu e āwhina ana ki te tohatoha anō i te pūngao wera katoa kua hangaia i roto i te pūnaha āhuarangi. He whakaaturanga kei te mahana tēnei rere o te wai o raro, tērā pea nā te kaha o te hau i runga i te Moana ki te Tonga. I kī atu a Prof Naveira-Garabato ki a Rongokōrero o TE Rongokōrero: "Ina huri te tere o te hau, ka taea e rātou te whakaterenga, te whakapōturi rānei o ngā au e mau ana i te wai o raro i te Tiri o te Moana ki te Tonga. A, no te huri i te tere o ēnei au, ka nui ake, iti iho rānei te hūkere i runga anō i te tere ake, i te pōturi rānei, ā, ka taea te huri i te nui o te wera e whāranu ana ki ngā au mai i runga, nā te mea he mahana ake ngā wai o runga." Tērā pea he maha ngā take hira, kāore i te iti rawa mō te pikinga o te taumata moana, nā te mea mēnā kei te whakamahana te wai o raro ka whakawhānui, ka pana ake i te mata o te moana. I tangohia e Boaty ngā inenga pāmahana, tote (tote), au, me te hūkere i runga i ōna ruku hōhonu. "I runga i te tere, he maha hoki ngā inenga i tangohia e mātau mai i te kaipuke mā te whakamahi i ngā taputapu kōtaha, e hōhonu ana i te taumira tino hōhonu, engari i tētahi wāhi pūmau i te wā me te mokowā," te whakamārama a Dr Povl Abrahamsen mai i te British Antarctic Survey. "And we recovered instruments that had been moored in the area over the last two years, giving us good coverage in time, but again at a fixed point and depth. Ko ngā raraunga mai i Boaty e whakakī ana i ngā āputa i waenganui i ēnei inenga, e hua ana i ngā raraunga kāore e taea e mātou te tiki i tētahi atu huarahi." Heoi anō, kāore ngā pokanoa a te roto i te raruraru katoa. I te tīmatanga o tētahi ruku, ka tūtaki a Boaty ki tētahi pokai krill tino kōpaka i whakaaro ai ōna pūoro pāoro e whakatata ana ki te papa moana ahakoa he 80m noa iho te hōhonutanga. Ko te hua ka hoki mai te roto ki te mata. "He hangarau tapahi a Boaty, ā, kei raro tonu i te whanaketanga. Pērā tonu ki te pana i ngā rohenga, he ruarua noa iho ngā pānga iti i puta," te kī a Dr Aperahama. "Engari e ako ana mātou i ēnei raruraru, whakatikaina, ā, ka nui ake te pono o Boaty ā muri ake nei, e āhei ai ia ki te mahi i ngā mahi matatini ake, tawhiti atu i te tautoko kaipuke." Jonathan.Amos-INTERNET@bbc.co.uk me te whai i ahau i Twitter: @BBCAmos

title: Ko te tūmanako rongoā ārai a Alzheimer
summary: Kua kitea e ngā kaipūtaiao he maha ngā rongoā e āwhina ana ki te pare i te mate o Pūrehurehu, e mahi ana pēnei i ngā statins mō te roro.
text: I roto i ngā whakamātautau i runga i ngā kutukutu, i kitea e ngā kairangahau o te Whare Wānanga o Cambridge ngā rongoā e ārai ana i te hipanga tuatahi ki te mate pūtau roro. Ināianei e hiahia ana rātau ki te whakaōrite i ngā rongoā ki ngā wāhanga tauwhāiti o te mate. I kī ngā tohunga he mea nui kia mōhio mēnā ka mahi haumaru ēnei rongoā i roto i te tangata. Ka mauria e te tangata ngā statins hei whakaiti i te mōrea o te mate manawa, ā, e kī ana te tīma rangahau o Cambridge kua houhia pea e tana mahi tētahi "neurostatin" hei ārai i te mate o Pūrehurehu. Ehara i te whakamahi i ngā āhuatanga o te mate, ka taea te whakamahi i te neurostatin hei mehua ārai hei aukati i te putanga o te āhuatanga i te wāhi tuatahi. Hei tauira, i kitea te rongoā mate pukupuku bexarotene, hei whakatū i te hipanga tuatahi e ahu ana ki te matenga o ngā pūtau roro i roto i ngā kutukutu kua whakahōtakatia ā-ira hei whakawhanake i te mate o Pūrehurehu. I ngā whakamātautau tōmua i roto i te tangata, ka whakamātauria e ngā kairangahau te rongoā i tētahi wāhanga o muri ake o te mate kia kite ai mēnā ka ūkuia ngā tohu amyloid mai i te roro, engari kāore i tutuki ngā whakamātautau. I kī a Dr Rosa Sancho, te upoko rangahau i Alzheimer's Research UK, me mōhio ngā kaipūtaiao me pēhea te mahi a te rongoā i mua i ngā whakamātautau rongoā. "Ināianei me kite mātou mēnā ka taea e tēnei huarahi ārai hōu te whakatū i ngā takahanga koiora tuatahi i roto i te pūkoro me te pupuri i te tūkinotanga i roto i ētahi atu akoranga kararehe me te tangata. " Ko tēnei rangahau tōmua i roto i ngā kutukutu e hua ana ka taea e te bexarotene te mahi i mua i te tukanga hei whakararuraru i te hanganga amyloid." I kī te tīma rangahau e hiahia ana te tīma rangahau ki te mōhio anō mō ngā mīhini o ia wāhanga o te whanaketanga o te mate. "He maha ngā parenga māori o te tinana hei pare i a ia anō ki te neurodegeneration, engari i a tātau e pakeke ana, ka pōhēhē ēnei parenga, ā, ka āwangawanga. " Mā te mōhio he pēhea te mahi o ēnei parenga māori, tērā pea ka taea e tātau te tautoko mā te hoahoa i ngā rongoā e whanonga ana i ngā huarahi ōrite." I kī a Dr Doug Brown, ko te kaiwhakahaere rangahau me te whanaketanga i te Rōpū o Pūrehurehu, he rā tōmua tonu. "He maha ngā pānga taha o te Bexarotene ina whakamahia ki te rongoā i te lymphoma, pēnei i ngā amuamu kiri, ānini, me te mate, ā, me mātua mōhio hoki mātou he haumaru mō ngā tāngata whai Alzheimer ki te tango. " Kāore anō mātou kia kite i ētahi rongoā hōu mō te matewaretanga i roto i te neke atu i te 10 tau, ā, mā te whakamahi anō i ngā rongoā e mahi kē ana mō ētahi atu herenga, ka taea e mātou te whakarato i tētahi pokatata ki ngā rongoā mate hinengaro hōu."

title: E kī ana te Kōti o Ūropi ki Paniora kia whakawātea i te toa o Eta Del Rio
summary: Kua kī atu te Kōti Motika Tangata o Ūropi ki Paniora kia tukua tētahi toa Eta i hereheretia i te tau 1989 mō ngā hara pūtohu, e whakatau ana kua tūkinotia ōna mana.
text: I whakahaua hoki a Paniora kia utua te herehere, a Ines del Rio Prada, he tūkinotanga e 30,000 hōro (£24,000; £37,000). I hereheretia a Del Rio mo te 30 tau, engari i tukua i a Hōngongoi 2008, kua tukuna he murunga hara. Heoi anō, i hurihia ngā ture murunga i te tau 2006, ā, ka whakatau a Paniora kia hikitia tōna tukunga tae noa ki te tau 2017. I kī te kōti o Straehe me "whakarite e Paniora te tukunga o te kaitono i te rā tata nei". E kī ana te Minita o Roto o Paniora, a Jorge Fernandez Diaz, ka tono a Madrid ki te whakahaere kōti o te Tūrei. E toru marama te tono a Madrid kia whakawhitia te kēhi ki te Ruma Matua o te Kōti o Ūropi. I kī te kōti, e herea ana ōna whakaritenga ruma matua, kua tūkinotia e Paniora e rua ngā tuhinga o te Whakaritenga o Ūropi mō ngā Motika Tangata i te kēhi o Del Rio: Tuhipānui Whitu (te mana kia kaua he whiu me te kore ture) me te Tuhipānui Rima (te mana ki te wāteatanga me te haumarutanga). I hopukina a Del Rio i Zaragoza i a Hōngongoi 1988 i a ia e taraiwa ana i tētahi motokā kī tonu i ngā pakū i whakaritea mō tētahi whakaekenga Eta i Costa del Sol. I whiua a ia kia neke atu i te 3,000 tau i roto i te whare herehere, ko te nuinga o ēnei mo tana mahi i roto i te whakaekenga i nga pirihimana o Guardia Civil i Madrid, e 14 ngā tūpāpaku me te 40 i whara, ka pūrongotia e te pokapū rongokōrero Pāniora o Efe. Ko taua tapeke, mo nga hara maha, i tahuritia ki te whiu ora mōrahi o te 30 tau. E whā tekau tau te rōpū hīkoi Pakihi, a Eta, e whakahau ana i tētahi whakahau taikaha ki te āhua Pāniora, ā, e whakapaetia ana mō ngā mate neke atu i te 800. E kī ana e hiahia ana ki te kōrero ki Madrid, engari e tohe ana nga mana kia tupeke i te tuatahi.

title: Ko ngā tiriti 'tino poke' o Pākehā i tapaina
summary: Kua whakaingoatia ngā tiriti tino poke o Pākehā e ngā kaiwhakahauhau taiao, ā, ko te Huarahi o Hato Hoani o Etinitini i whakaingoatia te tino kino.
text: Nā Andrew BlackBBC Scotland News Hope Street i Glasgow i tuarua i runga i te rārangi, i whakahiatotia e Ngā Hoa o te Ao Pākehā mai i ngā raraunga whaimana. I kī te rōpū taiao i honoa te pokenga o te hau ki ngā mate e hia mano i Pākehā i ia tau. I kī te kāwanatanga o Pirihitini kei te tapahia te pokenga o te hau, engari i whakaaetia kia nui ake te mahi. Kai te nui tātau mahi ki te rutu i te pokenga o te hau? Ko te tepenga ā-ture ā-tau o Ūropi mō te hauota taikura, e honoa ana ki te huango me ētahi atu raruraru romahā, kua tautuhia ki te 40 ngā moroiti mō ia mita pūtoru. Engari ko te rangahau hou mai i ngā Hoa o te Ao Pākehā, i kohia mai i ngā teihana aroturuki whaimana, e kī ana i pakaru i ngā tiriti puta noa i te whenua i te tau 2015. I whakarārangitia ngā taumata wawaenga ā-tau hei: I kohia hoki e ngā Hoa o te Ao Pākehā ngā raraunga mō ngā take korakora - ngā korakora iti e mahia ana ki te hau e ngā waka diesel. E kī ana ko ngā tiriti i Etinitini, Aberdeen, Pehi, Glasgow, Dundee, Falkirk me Rutherglen i rahua ki te whakatutuki i ngā paerewa kounga hau o Pākehā. I kī ngā Hoa o te Ao Pākehā, a Emilia Hanna: "E 2,000 ngā mate tōmua i Pākehā i ia tau - he mate hauora tūmatanui nui, ā, ko te tikanga kia tino manakē mō te kāwanatanga o Pākehā." I kī te kaiwhakahaere waka me te taiao o te Kaunihera Taone o Etinitini, a Lesley Hinds, e 97% o ngā tiriti i te pūmatua o Pākehā i puta i ngā whakamātautau kounga o te hau. I kī a ia e whakahaere ana hoki te taone i ētahi aronui waka kākāriki, engari i waenganui i te āhua o ngā tapahi nui, ka tāpiritia: "Kāore he huarahi e taea ai e mātou te whakauru atu i tētahi rautaki kohu iti i te taone me te kāwanatanga o Pirihitini ki te kore e taea e mātou te tiki rauemi tāpiri." I kī tētahi kaikōrero mō te kāwanatanga o Pākehā - e anga ana ki te mahi ā-ture i runga i te rahunga ki te rutu i te pokenga o te hau: "E whakaatu ana ngā raraunga kua tutuki ngā whakahekenga nui o ngā parakino hau mai i te tau 1990, ā, ka matapaetia ētahi atu hekenga ā muri ake nei, nā tō mātou mōhiotanga ki ngā pānga pea o te pūtea penapena kua whakaritea. " Ahakoa he tino pai rawa atu te kauneketanga, e mōhio ana mātou he nui ake ngā painga hei tuku i ētahi atu painga mō te hauora tangata me te taiao e noho tonu ana ngā wāhi o te kounga hau rawakore." I Whiringa ā Rangi, ka whakaputaina e nga minita tētahi rautaki hau mā me te whāinga kia tino pai rawa atu te hau o Pākehā i Uropi. I tāpiritia e te kaiwhakaatu kāwanatanga kua tohaina te £3m ki ngā mana ā rohe hei āwhina i a rātau ki te whakapai ake i te kounga o te hau.

title: Rare black foxing sighting in Somerset brings traffic to a standstill
summary: I kī tētahi tangata i kite i tētahi pokiha pango ātaahua i runga i tētahi ara whenua, i te tuatahi "kāore a ia i te mōhio" ki tāna e titiro ana.
text: I muri i tana haerenga i te one i Brean i Taraiwa, i tana kitenga i te kararehe i te taha o te huarahi, e haere ana a Karm Mahi ki te kāinga. I kī a Tēnā Mahi ka tū nga waka i te tūnga o te tangata ki te kite i te tirohanga ātaahua. Ko ngā kararehe he momo pokiha whero o Amerika ki te Raki, he āhuatanga e pango ai tō rātou huruhuru. "Ka tū te motokā i mua i a au, kātahi ka kite ahau i taku whakaaro he kurī taka noa i te tuatahi, engari i te whakatata atu ka mōhio ahau he pokiha tērā," te kī a Tēnā Mahi. "I hiahia ahau ki te Google i te mea kāore au i te mōhio he pokiha tērā tae. " E piki ana nga waka i muri i a au. He pōrangi." I te tūnga o to rāua motokā, ka taea e ia me tana hoa te tango whakaahua maha. I pūrongotia e Tēnā Mahi te kitenga ki te rōpū whakahau Black Foxes UK, e kī ana i ētahi wā he kararehe i mawhiti i ngā kararehe e hiahia ana kia hoki ki te kāinga. E ai ki te rōpū, tata ki te 0.1% o ngā pokiha i te UK he melanistic (pango) ā, e kīia ana he 'pokiha hiriwa'. Ngā Hononga Ipurangi Pātahi Black Foxes UK

title: Ko Jack Durand, 14, ka noho hei Toa Scrabble Taitamariki o te Ao
summary: Kua noho tētahi taitama 14 tau te kaitākaro tuatahi o Ingarangi ki te toa i te Whakataetae Scrabble Taitamariki o te Ao.
text: I toa a Jack Durand, mai i Highgate, ki te raki o Rāwāhi, i te 20 o ana kēmu e 24 i te whakataetae Under 16 i tū i Sri Lanka. I kī te Association of British Scrabble Players he "tino kaha i roto i te whakataetae i whakaarotia ai ko ia te toa me ngā kēmu e rua e toe ana ki te tākaro". Ko Yong Jian Rong o Hōroa te tuarua me te tuatoru o Mariam Arif o Pakitāne. Ko ngā kupu toa a Jack ko Neinei, he rākau rākau o Aotearoa, ko Wourali he tangohanga tipu paitini me te takikupu 'kohu' puta noa i ngā tapeke kupu takitoru e rua kia whiwhi ai i te 122 piro i te hurihanga kotahi. I muri i te whakataetae, ko te iwa o nga whakataetae taitamariki i puritia, ka kī a ia he "tino hari" engari kaore i mōhio me pēhea te whakapau i te whakawhiwhinga moni $1,000. I te Hakihea i toa a ia i te Whakataetae Peretania i raro i te 18 tau. I te wā o te whakataetae, i tū i Colombo mai i te 29-31 o Aotearoa, e 24 ngā kēmu i tākaro ai ngā tauwhāinga tamariki e 120 i roto i te tepe wā pākaha o te 25 meneti mō ia kaitākaro.

title: Ka puta ngā whetū mo te nehunga o David Gest
summary: Kua haere ngā hoa o Rawiri Gest ki tōna nehunga i Golders Green crematorium i te raki o Rānana.
text: I mate te kaiwhakangahau me te tāne o mua o Liza Minelli i te tīmatanga o tēnei marama e 62 te pakeke. Ko Cleo Rocos, Kerry Katona, Denise Welch, Christopher Maloney, Vanessa Feltz me Kym Marsh i waenganui i te hunga e manaakitia ana. I tū te nehunga i te wā i whakaūngia he haerenga i pānuitia e Gest i mua i tōna matenga ka haere ki mua i a Hōngongoi. I kitea ngā kupu o te Unforgettable a Nat King Cole hei wāhanga o tētahi whakaaturanga putiputi mā i runga i tana kāwhena me te tuhipoka puoro me te pepe. Ko Dean Gaffney, ko Kristina Rihanoff me Danniella Westbrook hoki i roto i te hunga i haere ki te nehunga. I kī ngā kaiwhakahaere o te haereere a Gest, i huaina nei ehara a David Gest i te Mate engari Ora Me te Wairua, ka pupuritia tōna taitara kia mau tonu ki te "āhua ngahau nanakia" a Rawiri. Ko ngā kaiwhakatū manuhiri i ngā rā ora ko Dina Carroll, Melba Moore, Russell Thompkins Jr me Peabo Bryson. I tapaina te haereere ki te whakaranu i te Celebrity Big Brother o tēnei tau, i reira a Gest he tauwhāinga. I whakamōhio atu a Angie Bowie ki tōna hoa noho ko Tiffany Pollard kua mate a Rawiri - e pā ana ki tana tāne tōmua, a Rawiri Bowie. Ka roimata a Pōti i te whakapono kua mate a Gest, e mate ana i te moenga i taua wā. 'Remember David' The Alive With Soul tour includes nine dates, starting on 1 July at York's Barbican Centre and wrapping up in Nottingham on 13 July. I kī te hoa o Gest, a Imad Handi, nāna i whakaputa tahi i ngā whakaterenga a Gest mō ngā tau maha: "Tērā pea ka ngaro a ia, engari kei te ora tōna wairua i roto i ngā pūoro i arohaina e ia." Ka utua hoki ngā takoha i runga i te haereere ki te kaiwaiata o Billy Paul, i te tuatahi o te mahi i runga i te pire, engari i mate i te tīmatanga o tēnei wiki. Ka whakakotahitia e te kaiwaiata Band of Gold a Freda Payne nga konohete, e kī ana a Tēnā Handi he wā mō ngā kaihautū e whakanui ana i o rātau manaakitanga me te whakanui i te oranga o Gest. "Pērā anō ki a au, i whakararuraru katoa ngā rehetoi i to rātau mōhiotanga kua mate a Rawiri," tana kī. "I roto i ngā tau kua rite rātau ki tētahi whānau nā tō rāua whanaungatanga mahi tata, ā, i whakatau ngā kaiwhakatangitangi kia haere tonu ki te whakatere ki te maumahara ki a Rawiri me a rātau pūoro." I mate a Gest i te hōtēra Four Seasons i Canary Wharf, London, i te tīmatanga o tēnei marama e 62 tau te pakeke.

title: Ngā reka me te whutupōro: He pēhea te whakanui a te UK ki te uru ki Uropi
summary: Ko tētahi whakaaturanga mārama i Downing Street me tētahi moni 50p hou i waenganui i ngā takahanga whai mana e tohu ana i a Brexit i te Paraire.
text: Nā Paul SeddonBBC News Ahakoa ētahi whakapae whakamanamana, ka tohu te oro i tētahi taumira ngū ake ki te tāurunga o Ingarangi ki te Hapori Ohaoha o Ūropi (EEC) i taua wā i te tau 1973. I waihangatia hoki tētahi 50p hou i taua wā - e iwa ngā ringa hei whakaata i ngā mema hou o te karapu. Engari i haere kē atu te Pirimia Rangatira o Edward Heath, a, e 11 rā o ngā takahanga ahurea ā-kāwanatanga. I te tīmatanga o ngā rā e toru i muri mai i te tomokanga i te 1 o Hānuere, ka whakaaturia e te "Fanfare for Europe" ngā rau o ngā takahanga puoro, toi, me ngā hākinakina. Pērā ki a Brexit i te tau 2020, kāore te wā i āraia i ngā tautohetohe tōrangapū. Ko Tēnā Heath, he Ūropi kua roa nei e moemoeā ana ki te mātakitaki i te tomokanga o Ingarangi ki te EEC, e mōhiotia ana ko te Mākete Noa, i mahi hohe i ētahi mahi. I haere a ia ki tētahi gala motuhake i te Royal Opera House, ā, i hoatu e ia he paraihe ki ngā tamariki o Ingarangi me EEC i toa i ngā hararei koreutu i roto i tētahi whakataetae tuhinga. I whakahekea hoki e ia te haki tīmata i runga i tētahi huihuinga o ngā motokā tawhito tini mai i Rāwāhi ki Pōroa. Heoi anō, kāore i puta mai te whakataunga kia whakanoho i a ia ki te pokapū o ngā takahanga, engari i kitea e ētahi mahi ngā whakahē a ngā kaiwhakahaere ārai mākete. Ko te mea, i piro te pirimia i a ia e tae ana ki te gala i Covent Garden i te taha o te Kuini. Ko te tapeke, e whitu nga tari kāwanatanga me ngā komiti rangitahi e rua i hangaia motuhake i uru ki te whakatakoto i te kaupapa mo te Fanfare. I ārahi te hoa o Crossbench me te manukura o te Kaunihera Toi, a Ariki Goodman, i tētahi komiti e haepapa ana ki ngā takahanga ahurea - i te wā i ārahi tētahi komiti tuarua, i whakahaeretia e te hoa Conservative, a Lord Mancroft, i ārahi i ētahi atu āpure. Ko ngā takahanga ahurea i whakanuia te hōtaka, e 25 ngā whakaaturanga toi i runga i ngā tāhuhu Pākehā i whakaritea, tae atu ki ngā konohete maha. I mauria mai te Berlin Philharmonic mō te konohete motuhake, i te wā he mahi katoa ngā rōpū pēnei i te Kinks, Steeleye Span me Slade. I whakakāhoretia e Mona Lisa I te Whare Taonga o Wikitōria me Albert, i whakaritea he whakaaturanga e whakaatu ana i ngā mahi toi i whakatārewatia e ia mema e ono o te EEC tīariari. I tukuna e Tenemaka e rua ngā taonga hau o te Tau Parahi, i te wā i whakaahuatia te koha Itari, he bust o Brutus nā Mīharo, i whakaahuatia i roto i te hōtaka he "takoha tino whakapuaki ki te whawhai ki te whakatoi". I tēnei wā, i tukuna e Wīwī, e rua ngā wā i whakahē i te tomokanga o Ingarangi ki te EEC i ngā tau kotahi mano e ono tekau mā rua, he whakaahuatanga o te rau tau 17 o te tinihanga kāri a te kaipeita o Georges de la Tour. Heoi anō, i rahua te ngana ki te kawe mai i te Mona Lisa ki Rānana i te wā i whakakāhoretia ai te tono kia tukuna te Kohatu Rosetta ki te Louvre hei whakawhiti. I waenganui i ngā takahanga matua ko tētahi whakataetae whutupōro motuhake i Wembley, nāna i whakatūpato ngā kaitākaro mai i ngā whenua e ono o te EEC ki tētahi tīma i titoa e ngā kaitākaro mai i UK, Aiarangi me Tenemaka, i uru tahi i te tau 1973. Ko te 'Toru', i tīpakohia e te kaiwhakahaere toa o te Kapu o te Ao o Ingarangi, o Tā Alf Ramsey, i pau i a ia ngā toa 2-0 me ngā whāinga mai i te ao whānui o Tenemāka o Henning Jensen me te kaitākaro o Coventry City, o Te Taone o Te Taone, o Te Ao, o Te Ao o Te Ao, o Te Ao o Te T I waenganui i ngā whetū o Ingarangi i whakaaturia ko Bobby Moore rāua ko Bobby Charlton o Ingarangi, me te ao whānui o Pirihitini ko Pita Lorimer. I whai wāhi anō hoki a Tiamana ao whānui o Franz Beckenbauer, ahakoa i tangohia ia i te hawhe wā. Ahakoa te āhua o te whetū, he pōturi ngā hokonga tīkiti, ā, e 36,500 anake ngā kaihautū i puta ake, kāore i neke atu i te tuatoru o te kaha o Wembley i taua wā. Kāore i mutu te kore ngākau nui i reira, me te whakaae a Ariki Mancroft ki te Times e toru marama i mua i te tīmatanga o ngā takahanga kāore ētahi kaunihera i whakaae ki te whai wāhi. "Engari i kitea e mātau he tokomaha nui ake, ahakoa kāore i te tino ngākau nui, kua whakaae ka puta te tāurunga o Ingarangi, ā, kua rite ki te hono mai ki a mātau me te mahi i te pai rawa atu, " ka tāpiri mai a ia. Ko te tautoko kaihautū o te £350,000 - huri noa i te £4.2m i roto i ngā whakaritenga o tēnei rā - i kitea hoki he tautohetohe, ahakoa ngā whakahē a Lord Goodman ki ngā MP e tirotiro ana i ngā whakapaunga he "moni noa iho mō tēnei hākari". Ko te kaiārahi Mahi a Harold Uira - nāna i ātete i te mahi a te Rangatira i te UK ki roto i te EEC - i karangatia ngā moni kāwanatanga "he whakapouri". I huatau mai a ia, ehara i te hararei, he pai ake te hoatu i ngā kaimahi katoa o Ingarangi he hararei pēke. I tua atu i Pākehā, ko te UK anake te whenua EEC kia kaua e tuku wā whakatā i ana kaimahi i te Rā o te Tau Hōu i te wā i uru ai - engari ko te rā tuatahi o te tau kua tohua e te ngaro whānui i ētahi wāhanga. Tērā pea i te mōhiotanga ki te mea tē mōhiotia, ko Ford rāua ko British Leyland i waenganui i ngā kamupene i tuku kaimahi noa iho i taua rā i te tau 1973. I te tau kotahi mano, i I āraia hoki e Edward Heath ngā whakapae he mahi whakatūpato te Fanfare, e whakanuia ana e ngā takahanga tiketike i whakawhāititia i Rānana. Kāore i tino āwhinatia ngā mea e te wā o te tāurunga EEC o Ingarangi, i tū i waenganui i te whakatio utu a te kāwanatanga hei whakahaere i te utunga moni. I hangaia e Hēmi Callaghan, tētahi PM Labour ā muri ake nei hei hēkeretari ā-rohe o te rōpū, te hononga i te wā i taupatupatutia te take i te Kotahitanga. "Tērā pea ka whakaarohia nā te mea kāore e taea e te kāwanatanga te hoatu taro ki te iwi, kei te hoatu e rātau he kararehe ki a rātau," tana kōrero. Ahakoa ngā rerekētanga ki ngā āhuatanga o tēnei rā, kua whakawhitiwhitia e Brexit ngā tekau tau ki te Fanfare i roto i tētahi āhuatanga - me te whakaoranga anō o tētahi huānga o ngā harakoa EEC i āhua pōhēhē i te tau 1973. I te tau 1973 i te Taiwhanga o Whitechapel i te rāwhiti o Rāwāhi, i huaina ko "Sweets", i whakamutua ohorere i tōna rā whakamutunga i te wā i kainga ai te whakaaturanga o te mīhini Pākehā e ngā tamariki kura i whakararuraru i tētahi tautiaki. I waihangatia anōtia te whakaaturanga kia rite tonu ki te rā tūmanakohia o te putanga o te UK i Mati i tērā tau, i te taha o tētahi pikitia i whakaritea motuhake mai i te kaiwaiata Tiamana o Ulla von Brandenburg. I mua i tōna whakatuwheratanga, ka kī atu a ia ki te taiwhanga i tukuna e te whakaaturanga te wā ki te whakaata i ngā tāwara tōrangapū me ngā kai o ngā wā e rua. "He aha te rekareka, kāore i rerekē te nui o ngā reka," tana kī i taua wā. "He nui te rerekētanga o te ao mai i te tau 1973, engari ehara i te reka."

title: I whiua te tokotoru mate o Horano Watson
summary: Kua hereheretia tētahi tangata mārire nāna i patu tētahi taitama 14 tau, nāna tana hoa wahine i whakawaia e ia, tae atu ki tana hoa mahi.
text: I whakawāteatia a George Thomson rāua ko Brahnn Finley, 19, i te kōhurutanga o Jordan Watson i te Paraire. I kitea te tinana o te taitamariki, i pāngia ki tētahi whakaekenga "kino, tautokona", i te Urupa o Upperby i Kānata i te 15 o Hune. Ko te tangata tuatoru, ko Daniel Johnston, i kitea he hara mo te patu tangata i te Mane. I hereheretia a ia mo te 10 tau, i te wā i hoatu ki a Thomson rāua ko Finley ngā whakaritenga mōkito o te 27 me te 14 tau. I to rātau whakawātanga i te Kōti Karauna o Carlisle, e whā wiki te roa, ka whakakāhore katoa ngā tāngata tokotoru i te kōhuru. I whakawāteatia a Johnston i te kōhuru, engari i whakawāteatia ki te utu iti iho. 'Te pūtia kino' I rongo te hūri i a Thomson i te kōtiro o Horano i taua wā, 14 tau, ā, ka "patua e ia tētahi tangata mōna". I pākaha a ia ki ngā maripi, ā, e tata ana ki te 70 ngā rākau i kitea i tōna kāinga, tae atu ki tētahi maripi Gurka toto. I rongo te kōti i a Thomson i tētahi akoranga taraiwa i te rā i muri i tana okanga i a Horano ki te mate, ā, ka mau te tokotoru i tētahi kiriāhua i roto i te rūma moe o Thomson i mua noa iho i te kōhurutanga. Ka kī atu a Tēnā Kaiwhakatika Kākāriki ki a Thomson: "Ehara tēnei i te mea nui ake, ā, kāore i iti iho i te pūtia kino, tautokona hoki. " Kaore he kupu atu hei whakaahua i tāu i mahi ai i te 'kino'. "I muri i to mahi i te kōhuru, kaore koe i hara, i te pouri rānei. " I te aonga ake ka maranga koe ki te ako taraiwa. Kātahi koe ka haere ki te mahi pūnoa. Tērā ētahi whakaaturanga i ngaru koe i te ipurangi e kimi ana i ngā pūrākau mō te kōhuru, ā, he tino pai ki a koe te pānuitanga." I reira a Finley rāua ko Johnston i te wā o te kōhuru, ā, i reira ki te "tuku tautoko" ki a Thomson, ka rongo te whakawā. I rongo te whakawā kua pāngia e Horano e iwa neke atu rānei ngā motu hōhonu ki tōna māhunga me tōna kakī, tērā pea i takea mai i tētahi taputapu mata koi. I korerotia hoki ki a rātau he "hiahia nui" a Thomson ki te kōtiro a Horano, ā, i hiahia kia "puta atu i te pikitia". I muri i te whiu, ka kī ngā mātua o Horano ko Maika rāua ko Lisa Watson ko ngā marama e whitu kua hipa he "moepuku ora". I tāpiri mai rātau: "Kī tonu a Horano i te ngahau, ā, i arohaina e tōna whānau, otirā ko tōna taina i tino āraia e ia. Kei a mātau ake pūmahara motuhake o Horano e kore e taea e tētahi te tango atu i a mātau. "Mō ngā marama e whitu kua hipa kua nui rawa ngā pātai kāore anō kia whakautua. I ia rā ka pātai mātou he aha i tangohia ai te ora o ta māua tamaiti 14 tau i runga i te āhua nanakia, taikaha hoki. E kore rawa tātau e kite i ta māua tamaiti e tipu ana, e ora ana i tētahi oranga tūturu. "Kāore he rerenga kōrero e tino whakaata i te ngaromanga hōhonu e rongo ana mātau mo te ngaronga o ta māua tamaiti o Horano." I tāpiritia e Det Supt Andrew Slattery o ngā Pirihimana o Cumbria: "He whakarihariha te mate o te tangata i roto i ēnei āhuatanga, engari i kawea tēnei kōhuru whakaaro tōmua ki tētahi taitama iti 14 tau. " I a ia e mahi ana i ngā taiohi, ka titiro atu a ia ki ngā pakeke hei tauira, ā, ko tētahi o ērā ko George Thomson nāna i whakahoa ki a ia. I whakahauhau a Thomson i a Horano kia toro atu ki a ia i te kāinga, a, ka whakaatu i tana kohinga rākau. "I kōrerotia e ia ki a ia ngā pūrākau mīharo mō ana kaupapa mahi moni, a, ka kī taurangi moni ki a ia hei utu mo te āwhina i a ia ki tana umanga kore mana. Tērā pea ka hiahia a Horano ki te whiwhi moni nui ki a ia." I kī a Tēnā Slattery ko te whakahoahoa a Thomson ki Horano he "māminga" ā, ka "tū i tētahi mea" kia whai hoa wahine a te tama mōna ake. I tukua e nga Pirihimana o Cumbria tētahi whakaahua o te tokotoru i tangohia i roto i te rūma moe o Thomson i te pō i patua ai a Horano. I kī a Tēnā Slattery i mōhio a Finley ki a Thomson, ā, i nama moni ki a ia i muri i te "tāhaetanga i a ia" i roto i tētahi mahi rongoā. I tāpiri mai a Tēnā Slattery: "I whakaae a Finley ki te utu i tana nama mā te āwhina i a Thomson ki tētahi mahi e hiahiatia ana, nā reira i mauria hoki e ia tana hoa rangatira ko Daniel Johnston. " Ko taua mahi, i whakaritea e Thomson mo nga wiki, ko te kōhurutanga o Jordan Watson i te urupa i Upperby. "I mahue i a Horano tōna kāinga i taua pō i runga i te wairua pai, kāore e kore e tūmanako ana ki te whakapau i ana moni, engari kore rawa ia i hoki mai. I patua a ia i roto i tētahi whakaekenga kino, kino hoki i ohorere ai te iwi katoa." Ngā Hononga Ipurangi Pātahi HM Courts & Tribunals Service

title: Ka whakakāhore te kaiwhakawā i te tono taiwhanga tākaro o Oxford greyhound
summary: Ka noho tonu tētahi taiwhanga kurī o mua e hiahia ana ngā kaiwhakawhanake ki te huri hei whare, kua whakatauria e tētahi kaiwhakawā o te Kōti Tiketike.
text: I werohia e ngā rangatira o Oxford Stadium Greyhound Racing Association (GRA) te whakatau a te Kaunihera Taone o Oxford ki te tohu i te pae i tērā tau. E hiahia ana rātau ki te whakawhanake i te pae i Blackbird Leys, kāore anō kia whakamahia mō te whakataetae kurī mai i te tau 2012. E hiahia ana ngā kaiwhakahauhau ki te tiaki i te papa tākaro mai i te whanaketanga me te whakamahi mō te tākaro. 'He tino pai' i kī te kaiārahi kaunihera o te Taone o Bob Price i "tino pai" a ia ki te whakataunga a te Kōti Tiketike. "I kitea e te kōti kua mahia te tukanga ingoa i runga i te āhua hāngai, tauira hoki i tutuki ai ngā whakaritenga ā-ture katoa," tana kī. Kua whakapā atu te AO ki a GRA mō te kōrero. I kī te MP o Oxford East Andrew Smith he "tino āwhina" te whakataunga mo te whakahau ki te tiaki i te papa tākaro. "I think the developers now really have to face facts and listen to local people and allow the stadium to be used for recreation, get back greyhound racing, speedway and invest in what should be a first rate facility for our whole community," he said. I katia te ara, he kāinga hoki ki te waka tere, i muri i te kīanga a te GRA kua kore e taea ināianei. I te Hānuere o tērā tau, ka whakakāhore ngā mahere kaunihera o te taone nui i ngā tono mai i te kaiwhakawhanake o Galliard ki te turaki i te papa tākaro me te hanga i ngā kāinga e 220 ki te pae. I whakahekea e te kaiwhakawhanake tana tono ki te whakataunga i Me i muri i te whakarārangitanga o te pae hei wāhi atawhai. Ngā Hononga Ipurangi Pātahi Galliard Homes Oxford City Council

title: Kua rāhuitia te upoko Torotiana kia kaua e whakaako
summary: Ko tētahi kaiako matua i whakapaea ki te hē i roto i te heitara o te Hoiho Torotiana i Birmingham, kua "rāhuitia kia kaua e whakaako mō ake tonu atu".
text: Nā Hōne CoughlanEducation: Engari ko te tikanga o te whakahaere a te pae whanonga, ka taea e Jahangir Hākinakina te hoatu i muri i te rima tau kia waiho ai tēnei āraitanga. I whakapaea a Tēnā Hākinakina ki te ngana ki te "whakakore" i te hākaritanga o te Kirihimete i te kura me te "whakararuraru i te manawanui" o ētahi atu whakapono. I kī te rūnanga whakawā ko te whanonga o Tēnā Hākinakina he "hē o te āhua nui". Ko Tēnā Hākinakina te upoko o te Whare Wānanga o Oldknow i Small Heath, ko tētahi o ngā kura o Te Hoiho Torotiana i mau i roto i ngā kerēme a te Hoiho Torotiana e ngā rōpū e whakatoko ana i tētahi rārangi take mārō a te Mohimana. I tīmataria e te 'whakawhirinaki tūmatanui' Te Kāreti o te Motu mō te Whakaakoranga me te Ārahitanga he rangatū o ngā whakarongo hē i te ngahuru - ā, i kitea he hara a Tēnā Hākinakina i a Hakihea. Na te pānuitanga o te whakahau rāhuitanga, ka noho ko ia te tuatahi e anga atu ana ki ngā whakaaetanga. I whakamutua e te pae whanonga ngaio, e whakatau ana mō te hēkeretari mātauranga, kua "rahua te tautoko i te whakawhirinaki tūmatanui ki te umanga me te pupuri i ngā paerewa tiketike o ngā tikanga me ngā whanonga". I kitea kua whakawhāititia e Tēnā Hākinakina te awhe o te mātauranga whakapono me ngā "takahanga ahurea", pēnei i te whakaiti i te hākaritanga o te Kirihimete me te whakakore i ngā takahanga "ehara i te Ingarihi". I whakamutua e te pae ko tēnei "ka tukitukia te manawanui" me te "manaaki i te whakapono me ngā whakapono o ētahi atu". I te werohanga a tētahi matua i a Tēnā Hākinakina mō te mātauranga o tana tamāhine, ka kitea kua hamama a ia ki te matua, ā, "kāore i tika te urupare". Engari he maha nga kerēme ki a Tēnā Hākinakina i ākiritia. Kāore te pae i whakaae ki ngā whakapae i ngana ia ki te "aukati i te whakaakoranga tika o te mātauranga wahine me te whanaungatanga" i ngana rānei ia ki te whakaiti i te nui o te pūoro me te toi. Kāore i kitea e te pae he whakaaturanga o te whakawehenga ira tangata, kei te "whakahou rānei i te marautanga o te kura kia nui ake ai te arotahi ki te whakapono". A, ka kī te pae hē kāore i kitea e "whakatokona ana e Tēnā Hākinakina te whakararuraru whakapono". Engari i whakamutua e te pae ko tana "whanonga e hotokore ana ki te kaiako". Ko te tikanga o te whakahaere, kua rāhuitia a Tēnā Hākinakina kia kaua e whakaako i tētahi kura, i tētahi tautuhinga akoranga rānei, engari ka taea e ia te tono kia hikitia tēnei i roto i te rima tau. "Mā tēnei e āhei ai a Tēnā Hākinakina ki te whakaatu i tōna mōhiotanga, me tōna kaha ki te whakatinana, i tētahi marautanga whārite, whānui hoki e whakatoko ana i te whanaketanga wairua, whanonga, ahurea, hinengaro hoki o ngā tauira." Oldknow School has further been renamed as Ark Chamberlain Primary Academy.

title: Ka tīmata a Dr Martens i te mahere kia uru ki te mākete hea
summary: E whakaaro ana a Dr Martens ki te hoko hea i roto i te umanga ki ngā kaihoko mākete hea.
text: E hokona ana e te kaihanga hū e 11 miriona ngā kākahu hū i te tau i ngā whenua neke atu i te 60, me ngā hokonga ā-tau e £672m. Ko tana hua tino rongonui ko te 1460 e waru, i hangaia tuatahitia hei whakaara mahi i Northampton i te tau 1960. Ko ngā whika hōu rawa a Dr Martens e whakaatu ana i te pikinga o ngā hoko, ahakoa ngā rāhuitanga e pā ana ki te Covid i ōna pātaka, i te mea ka neke atu ngā hoko hāngai ki ngā kaihoko. E whakahaere ana te kamupene i ngā pātaka 130 puta noa i te ao, engari ko tōna pana ki ngā hokohoko tuihono, ko te tikanga o ēnei ināianei mō te rima o ana moni hua. Ko nga moni a te roopu mo nga marama e ono ki Mahuru 2020 ko te £ 318.2m, piki ake i te 18% i te tau kua hipa, ahakoa te paanga o te mate uruta. Ka hokona hoki e ia tētahi wāhanga nui o ana hua mā ētahi atu kaihoko, engari e kī ana e hiahia ana ki te haere tonu i te whakawhānuitanga o ana ake mahi hokohoko. I hangaia te kotahi ā-hau o te kamupene e Dr Maertens me Dr Funck, ā, i hokona ngā mana ārai UK ki te Rōpū R Griggs. I hokona tuatahitia ngā kākahu i puta mai i ta rāua mahi ngātahi hei pūtu mahi, engari i tangohia e te nekehanga taitamariki o mua o ngā tau kotahi mano e ono tekau mā rua. I ngā tau kotahi mano e waru tekau mā iwa rau, ka ara ake anō ngā pūtu i te putanga mai o Britpop i ngā tau kotahi mano e waru tekau mā rua. Mai i te tau 2014, nā IngreLux o Rakapuō te kamupene, e honoa ana ki te matua tūmataiti o Permira. I kī te rangatira nui o Dr Martens, a Kenny Uira, he "nui te kaha o te tipu o te ao", kātahi anō ka haumi te kamupene i te "tino nui" o te mahere a Dr Martens ki te hono ki te mākete hea i roto i te umanga, tuihono, i te pātaka hoki. E whakapono ana te kamupene kua kitea e ia tētahi atu kiritaki tūpono e 154 miriona i ōna mākete matua, i runga ake i te 16 miriona kua hokona mai i ngā hua mai i te kamupene i roto i ngā tau e rua kua hipa. .

title: Me whakahou e te Hāhi Katorika te whākinga, e kī ana te mōrehu tūkino
summary: Kua karangatia e tētahi mōrehu tūkino tamariki o Ahitereiria ki te Hāhi Katorika kia whakahou i ōna ture mo te whākinga kia pūrongotia ai ngā hara ki ngā pirihimana.
text: Na Hywel GriffithBBC News, i kī a Poihākena Pita Gogarty e mōhio ana ngā whakapae e mōhio ana ki ngā mana e kore e whakaaturia ki ngā mana. I kī atu a ia ki te AO he "kāri wātea ki waho o te whare herehere". E whai ana i ngā whakarongo tūmatanui whakamutunga i roto i tētahi uiuinga o Ahitereiria, kua rongo i ngā whakaaturanga o ngā kaikino e whāki ana i te mōhiotanga e kore a rātau mahi e whakapuakina. Kua wehea e te take o te pūrongo whakahau te Hāhi Katorika o Ahitereiria, ā, he rerekē ngā pīhopa mēnā me tuku atu ngā mōhiohio i tukuna e tētahi tamaiti i te wā o te whākinga ki ngā pirihimana. "Ko tā rātou mahi e kī ana kua rite kē atu mātau ki te pare i te hunga hara i a mātau ki te tiaki i tēnei tamaiti," te kī a Tēnā Gogarty, e 12 tau i te wā i tūkinotia ai ia e tētahi tohunga i New South Wales. "Mēnā kua whakaaturia mai e te kōmihana kīngi [uiui] tētahi mea ki a mātau, arā, kāore te paepaea e mutu kia mate rā anō rātou, kāore rānei e taea te whakahāwea." Ko te whakahē i te urupare Ko te uiui, i whakatūria i te tau 2013, i kohia he whakaaturanga mai i ngā tāngata e 4,440 i kī he tūkino rātau i ngā rōpū Katorika i Ahitereiria. I kī a Tēnā Gogarty he pōturi te urupare a te hāhi ki ngā kerēme. "Kua whakamahia tēnei e te hāhi i Ahitereiria pēnei i tētahi mōrearea whanaungatanga tūmatanui," tana kī atu ki te HAU. "Kāore au i te whakaaro e mārama ana rātau ki te hōhonutanga o te aituā i hangaia e rātau me te mahi e hiahiatia ana e rātau hei whakatika." I kī a Francis Sullivan, te upoko o te Kaunihera Pono, Tika me te Whakaora o te hāhi, kua mōhio te rōpū ki tōna mahi "hakaha" ki te whakahohe me te hīpoki i te tūkinotanga i mua. I whakaae a ia kua "whakararuraru te whakawhirinakitanga o te hāhi", ā, i kī kē kua utua kētia e ia ngā rau miriona tāra hei utu ki ngā tūpāpaku. Heoi anō, ka kī a Tēnā Sullivan kia kaua e whakarerekētia te whākinga kia pūrongotia ai e nga tohunga te tūkino ki nga pirihimana. "E whakaaro ana ahau he whakararuraru mēnā ka whakakoretia te whakawhitiwhitinga manaaki i roto i te whānako," tana kī. "E kī ana te Hāhi Katorika, ina pā ki te hiri o te whākinga, he tapu taua mōhiohio - e herea ana te tohunga e tērā." I kī a Tēnā Sullivan e manakohia ana e ia tētahi pūnaha i tohutohutia ai tētahi whakapae e whāki ana i te tūkino kia pūrongotia te hara. "Ki taku whakaaro ko te tikanga o te tohunga ki te kī atu ki te tangata - mēnā he pono koe mo tēnei, mēnā e hiahia ana koe ki te whakawātea - kātahi ka haere ki nga mana he wāhanga o te mahi," tana kī. Ko te pūrongo whakahau o te tūkinotanga tētahi o ngā take matua e whakaarohia ana e te kōmihana ariki, kua rongo i ngā whakaaro tūkino i ngā rōpū tūmatanui neke atu i te 4,000 i Ahitereiria. Ko te tikanga kia tukuna e nga komihana ta rātau rīpoata whakamutunga me nga tūtohutanga i a Hakihea.

title: Ahi hīkoi: Ko ngā tāngata 'i patua te whaea me ngā tamariki i roto i te whakaekenga tūpāpaku'
summary: Tokorua nga tāngata i patua tētahi wahine i mate i te 20 marama i muri i te whara i te whakaekenga pōma penehīni i runga i tōna whare i mate ai ana tamariki tokowhā, kua rongo te kōti.
text: Ko Mīharo Pearson, e 37, i "piri ki te ora" engari i mate tata ki te rua tau i muri i te ahi i tōna kāinga i Walkden, Greater Manchester, i Hakihea 2017. Ko Zak Bolland, 26, me David Worrall, 28, e whakakāhore ana i te kōhuru i a Mrs Pearson. I rongo nga kaiwhakawā i te Kōti Karauna o Manatāneta kua whakawāteatia te tokorua ki te kōhuru i ana tamariki tokowhā. I mate a Demi Pearson, 15, e waru tau te pakeke o Brandon rāua ko Lacie, e whitu, i roto i te mura i te wā i whakaorangia a Mrs Pearson me tana tamāhine e toru tau o Lia, i mate i te hōhipera e rua rā i muri iho. I taea e tana tama mātāmua, a Kyle, 16, te mawhiti i te mura i roto i te matapihi. I pāngia e Mrs Pearson te 68% o ngā wera ki tōna tinana, a, i mate i te 25 o Aotearoa i tērā tau, ka rongo te kōti. I kī te rōia a Paul Reid QC: "Rite tonu ki ta rātau whakakāhore i to rātau hara i te tau 2018, ināianei ka whakakāhore ēnei whakapae i to rātau hara i te kōhurutanga o Mīharo Pearson. " E kī ana te ture mehemea i mate a Mīharo Pearson i mua i taua whakawā, tērā pea ka whakawāteatia e te hūri a Bolland rāua ko Worrall mo te kōhurutanga o Mīharo Pearson." I rongo te kōti i te ahi i te 11 o Hakihea 2017 te whakamutunga o te maha o ngā whakaekenga ki te kāinga o te whānau o Pearson. I whakarewaina e Bolland rāua ko Worrall te whakaekenga kino, te whakamutunga o ngā rangatū o ngā whakaekenga tit-for-tat, i a ia e tohetohe ana ki a Kyle Pearson, ka korerotia ki nga kaiwhakawā. I kī a Tēnā Reid i ngā wiki i mua i te pakarutanga o te motokā o Bolland, ā, ka whakapaea e ia a Tēnā Pearson, e tono ana i te £500 me te tuku karere kuputuhi whakawehi ki te tau waea a Mrs Pearson. Tata ki te whā haora i mua i te mura, i rongo te kōti i te kūaha e whakawehi ana i a Mrs Pearson e "mahi ana i tō whare". I kī a Tēnā Reid i hoki mai a Bolland rāua ko Worrall i te 05:00 GMT, ka tangohia he paepae taiapa i muri o te whare, ka tukitukia he matapihi kītini, a, ka makaia e rua ngā pomu penehīni ki roto, ka mau i te whānau ki runga. I kī a Tēnā Reid i whakakāhore a Bolland i te kōhuru, ā, e kī ana he hara anake a ia ki te patu tangata i muri i tana whakawāteatanga hē i ngā kōhuru i te tau 2018. E kī ana a ia ko te whakaaro o tana hoa whakapae ki te pomu penehīni i te whare, ā, i whakaaro ia kāore he tangata i te kāinga i taua wā. I rongo te kōti i a Worrall e whakakāhore ana i te kōhuru, ā, e kī ana i hē hoki ia i te tau 2018. Ko tana take i whakapono ia kei te nohoia te whare, engari i whakaaro ia ko ngā ipu wīra o te whānau ka tahuna. Ko te kōtiro a Bolland i taua wā, ko Courtney Brierley, e 23, nāna i "whakahauhau, i āwhina rānei i a rātau", i whakawāteatia ki ngā tatau e whā o te patu tangata i te whakawā tuatahi. Kua whakaae a ia ki te parekura o Mrs Pearson, ā, e tatari ana ki te whiu. Ka haere tonu te whakamātautau. He aha e kore ai e whai i a BBC North West i Facebook, Twitter me Instagram? Ka taea hoki e koe te tuku whakaaro pūrākau ki northwest.newsonline@bbc.co.uk Ngā Hononga Ipurangi Pātahi HM Courts & Tribunals Service

title: Paul Kennedy: New standards commissioner set to be appointed
summary: I te 21 o Hōngongoi, kua puta mai he Komihana Paerewa hou mō ngā mema whakaminenga o NI.
text: Nā Piki McCormackBBC News NI Political Reporter NI Kua kite i tētahi reta mai i te kaikōrero ki ngā MLAs katoa e kī ana e hiahia ana te kōmihana whakaminenga ki te whakaingoa i a Paul Kennedy mō te tūranga. Kua wātea te tūnga mai i te mutunga o te wā o te tari a Douglas Bain i te tau 2017. E 37 tau te rōia a Tēnā Kennedy, ā, e kīia ana he "wheako whakamatau whānui". E kī ana te reta, i tukuna ki ngā MLAs katoa i te Tūtira, kua tonoa e te kōmihana whakaminenga ki te komiti pakihi kia whakahōtaka i tētahi mōtini mō te taupatupatu i te 21 o Hōngongoi, ā, ka hiahiatia e ngā MLAs kia whakaae ki te wāhui tika. Mēnā e tautoko ana ngā MLAs i te mōtini, ka "mana ināianei tonu" te wāhui a Tēnā Kennedy, ka tāpiri mai te reta. Ko te mahi a te komihana ko te mahi takitahi ki te tūhura i ngā amuamu tika ki ngā MLAs mō ngā tūkinotanga whakapae o te waehere whanonga. Engari kua wātea te pou mai i te tūnga o Douglas Bain i te tūranga i te tau 2017 i muri i te mutunga o tana wā e rima tau. Kāore i taea te whakakī i te tūnga i taua wā nā te mea kua hinga te kaiwhakahaere tiritiri hiko, ā, mai i taua wā, ka haere tonu ngā amuamu, engari kāore he tangata hei tūhura i a rātou. Kua hoki mai te tūranga ki te rama i muri i ngā amuamu a ētahi MLAs mō te haerenga mai o te Minita Tuatahi o Mīharo O'Neill ki te nehunga o te tangata matua o IRA, o Bobby Storey. I tērā wiki, ka kī a Tēnā Bain he "tino wawau" ka taea e te iwi whānui te amuamu mō Ms O'Neill, tētahi atu MLA rānei, engari kāore he mea e pā mai i te wā kāore anō kia whakakīa te pou. E mōhiotia ana ka taea e te komihana paerewa te tūhura i ngā amuamu i mahia ki ngā MLAs i mua i te tīmatanga o tana wā, i te wā i tukuna i roto i te ono marama o te tūkinotanga o te waehere. Ko wai a Paul Kennedy? He rōia mātauranga a Tāne Kennedy mo te 37 tau, e mahi tūmataiti ana mō te 32 o aua tau, ā, e 28 hei tumuaki o tōna ake umanga. E kī ana te reta mai i te kōmihana whakaminenga ki ngā MLAs he "wheako whakamatau whānui a Tēnā Kennedy i roto i ngā tūranga, i ngā wāhanga maha". E "māia" ana te kōmihana ka waiho ia e tōna wheako kia tino whai rawa ki te mahi i te tūranga, ka tāpiritia e te reta. Mai i te haerenga mai i te mahi ahuwhānui, kua mahi a Tēnā Kennedy i ētahi atu tūranga, tae atu ki te mema o te Komiti Tohutohu Toa me te Komiti Penihana mō Aiarangi ki te Raki.

title: Ka tere ake te whakawhititanga o te mahere ratonga o Te Aotearoa, e kī ana te rangatira o Raiti
summary: E kī ana te rangatira o Raiti o Rāwāhi i te kaupapa a te kāwanatanga mō te pānga ki te EU i muri i te Brexit ka tere ake te wehenga atu o ngā kamupene mai i te UK.
text: Nā Rebecca MarstonBusiness reporter, i kī atu a BBC News Inga Beale ki te AO ka kite te Pepa Mā i te mākete inihua 300 tau e haere ana "tino tere ki mua" ki te whakatatū i tōna anake ki Pōroa - me te akiaki hoki i ētahi atu. E kī ana ngā rōpū wāhanga ratonga ka pā te mahere ki te mahi, ā, he "moto tūturu". Heoi anō, he pai ake ngā rōpū ratonga-kore. Ko ngā ratonga, tae atu ki ngā pēke, ngā kamupene inihua me ngā kamupene pūtea penapena, e 80% o te whakahaerenga o te UK, ā, ko tētahi o ōna kawenga ake tino angitu ki te EU. E hiahia ana te kāwanatanga ki ngā ratonga pūtea UK ā muri ake nei kia whāngai i tētahi putanga whakapai ake o tētahi pūnaha kua whakamahia kētia e ētahi whenua ehara i te EU, tae atu ki a Mātau, Hapanihi, Haina, e whakaae ai rātou ki te whakatutuki i ētahi ture EU kia uru tonu ki te kōti. E ōrite ana ēnei ture ki a rāua anō i ētahi wāhi. I kī a Ms Beale, te rangatira nui o Raiti: "Kāore rawa ngā ratonga ngaio me ngā ratonga pūtea i te katoa, ā, he tino whakararuraru. Ko te tikanga e 80% o te whakahaerenga o te UK. "Ko Raiti te whakatuwhera i tētahi anake i Pōroa kia tino kaha ai mātou ki mua, ā, he maha ētahi atu pēke, ngā pūkenga me ētahi atu kamupene ratonga pūtea ka neke haere ināianei." I kī a ia ka tino pā ngā mahere: "Kua kore mātou e raihanatia ki te tuhi pakihi, ki te tuku inihua rānei i roto i te EU 27, ā, ka taea tēnei te whakaheke tika ki te parenga whaiaro. " Mēnā he inihua tāu mō tō mōkai, ā, e hiahia ana koe ki te haere ki te whenua mō tētahi hararei, tērā tētahi pātai mēnā ka taupokina koe e tō kaupapahere - nā reira he mea tino nui tēnei." I kī a Huw Evans, te tumuaki o te Association of British Insurers: "Ahakoa he aha te putanga whakamutunga, he hira rawa te umanga inihua hei kaitango ture. " Ko te whakaū i ngā ture pūtea kāore ā mātou kōrero ko te tauari kino rawa mō tō mātou wāhanga inihua ārahi o te ao, nā reira ka titiro mātou ki te kāwanatanga kia whakaritea he putanga pai ake i tēnei." I kī te Kaporeihana o te Taone o Rāwāhi, e whakahaere ana i te rohe pūtea o Rāwāhi, i te whakataka i te pana mō te āhukahuka tahi mō te mea e kiia nei ko te "ōritetanga" ka whāwhā i ngā wāhi pakihi me ngā hoa o Ūropi, ā, he "moto tūturu". Tātaritanga: Te āhua nei kua tātaitia e te kāwanatanga. Mēnā kāore he whakaaetanga mo te tīaroaro ture i runga i ngā taonga, ka puta mai pea te ngangau i ngā tauranga - me te tūkino o te ohaoha. Ka whakararurarutia ngā mekameka putanga tino nui - pērā ki ērā e whakamahia ana hei whakaputa i ngā motokā e hia miriona - ka whakararurarutia. Ā, kāore he rongoā ki te "kāore he rohe uaua" i te motu o Airani. Me haere tēnā. I runga i ngā ratonga, he iti iho te mārama o ngā mōrea. I ngā wāhanga pēnei i te pūtea, te ture me te ture - he kaiārahi ao whānui a Ingarangi, e kī ana te kāwanatanga. Nā reira, he pai ki ana ratonga ngā taumata tiketike o te tono ā-ao, ā, e whakapono ana te kāwanatanga ka taea e Ingarangi te haere whakamua i ngā mahi hokohoko ratonga i waho o te EU, Pānuitia ētahi atu mea mai i Kapa i konei. 'Hīpae whakamua' TheCityUK, te rōpū rorohiko ratonga ngaio, i karangatia ngā tono mō ngā ratonga "whakapōhēhē, whakapōrearea hoki". I kī te pāhonotanga mahi UK Finance, ko te whakawhirinaki noa ki ngā whakaritenga ōrite tīariari e kore e whakarato i ngā umanga pūtea me te urunga mākete tōtika, engari e kī ana e tika ana te kāwanatanga ki te rapu ki te whakakaha me te whakawhānui i ngā ture ōrite. I karangatia e ētahi atu rōpū umanga te pepa hei kauneketanga. Ko te EEF, e tohu ana i ngā kaiwhakanao matua, i karangatia he "hipanga tino pai, whaitake hoki ki mua" engari i kī he nui ake ngā mahi e hiahiatia ana. I pōhiritia e teNGARA ngā kaupapa, ā, ka kī "ko te pare i ngā mahi me te pūtea penapena ināianei, ā muri ake nei, ko te whetū ārahi mō ngā huinga kaiwhakarite e rua". I karangatia e nga Ruma Tauhokohoko o Ingarangi he "wāhi tīmatanga maioha" mō ngā umanga. He aha te rerekētanga i waenga i te ōritetanga me te āhukahuka tahi? Ko tētahi take mō Te Pākehā ka taea e te UK te whakamahi i ōna ake paerewa me ōna ture. Engari hei whakarite i te hokohoko kore, e hiahia ana hoki kia mōhiotia aunoatia ēnei paerewa e te EU. E kiia ana tēnā ko te "āhukahuka tahi" ā, ki te EU kei a koe tō keke me te kai hoki - nō reira kāore e whakaaetia. Mā te ōritetanga, ka whakatau te EU kia tutuki i ngā ture UK i tētahi wāhi tauwhāiti ngā whāinga ture ōrite ahakoa kāore rātou e whai i ngā ture EU ōrite. Heoi anō, ka aromatawai te EU mēnā ka tutuki i taua whenua tuatoru ōna mahi paerewa mā te umanga, ā, ka taea te unu atu i te whakaaetanga i te pānui poto rawa. Nō reira ka kore e manakohia e te maha o ngā kamupene e tūmanako ana kia whawhai te Pūtea Moni, e kaha ana ki te āhukahuka tahi, ki tō rātou kokonga.

title: I whainatia e te Pēke o Tokyo-Mitsubishi te $315m
summary: Kua whainatia te Pēke o Tokyo-Mitsubishi (BTMU) e ngā mana o Amerika e ngā mana o Amerika mō te whakamākū i tētahi pūrongo mō ngā tauwhitinga e pā ana ki a Irana me ētahi atu whenua kua whakamanatia.
text: I tangohia ngā whakatūpato matua mai i te pūrongo e PricewaterhouseCoopers (PwC), nā te pēhanga a ngā kaimahi BTMU, i kitea e ngā kaiwhakarite o te Kāwanatanga o New York. I whakarerea tētahi kaimahi BTMU i muri i te tūhuratanga. Tokorua ētahi atu i rāhuitia kia kaua e mahi tahi me ētahi pēke o New York. "E mārama ana mātou - hei hapori mana - me mahi whakatuki ki te whakahou i te pātahitanga ātaahua i waenganui i ngā pēke me ngā kaitohutohu, ā, i te nuinga o te wā i hua ai te mahi hākinakina e tahitahi ana i te hē i raro i te whāriki," te kī a Pineamine Lawsky, te kaiwhakahaere o ngā ratonga pūtea o Niu Ioka. I kitea e PricewaterhouseCoopers, nāna i whakarite te pūrongo, kua kī atu a BTMU ki ngā kaimahi kia tango mōhiohio mai i ngā karere e whakaoho ana i ngā matohi whakatikatika. I roto i tētahi hukihuki tōmua o tana pūrongo, i miramiratia e Te Wānanga te tikanga o taua kitenga. Engari ā muri ake, i te tono a te pēke, ka whakakapia e Te Pēke taua wāhanga, e ai ki te tūhuratanga. I kitea hoki e te tūhuratanga o te Kāwanatanga o New York kua tangohia ētahi atu mōhiohio hira mai i te pūrongo a Te Kāwanatanga o New York, i runga i te tono a BTMU. I roto i tērā: Ko te whaina hōu rawa i tua atu i tētahi $250m pai i whakaaetia e BTMU i June 2013, mō te whakahaere i ngā tauwhitinga miriona tāra mō ngā kāwanatanga me ngā tinana tūmataiti i Irana, i Hūtane me Myanmar. I a ia e urupare ana ki te tino pai o BTMU, ka kī a BTMU e "tukua ana ki te whakahaere umanga me ngā taumata teitei rawa o te taparenga me te whakatikatika ture, me te whakapai tonu i ana kaupapahere me ōna hātepe."

title: E rima i whakahaua i runga i ngā whakahēnga o te Extinction Rebellion Tube
summary: Tokorima ngā tāngata kua whakataua i muri i ngā whakahēnga huringa āhuarangi i ngā teihana Ngongo o Rāwāhi e toru.
text: I tōia ētahi o ngā kaiwhaiwhai mai i te tuanui o ngā tereina e ngā kaihoko i Stratford, Canning Town me Shadwell i te wā o te Tāite. Tokorua ngā tāne me ngā wāhine tokorua kua whakataua ki te ārai i tētahi tereina i Shadwell. Kua whakataua tētahi tangata ki te takahi i ngā here taurangi i runga i te whakahē a Canning Town. I puta katoa te tokorima ki te Kōti Kaiwhakawa o Highbury Corner i te Paraire. Ko Margreit Bos, 32, o Parish Road, Chartham, Kent, Martin Newell, 52, o Ivor Road, Birmingham, Philip Kingston, 83, o Blakeney Road, Patchway, South Gloucestershire, me Sue Parfitt, 77, o Rectory Gardens, Bristol, kua whakapaea ki te ārai i tētahi mīhini, i tētahi waka rānei i runga i te rerewhenua e hāngai ana ki te Wāhanga 36 o te Ture Tūkino Kino. Mark Ovland,  36, o High Street, Keinton Mandeville, Somerset, kua whakataua ki te takahi i ngā here pēre. Ko tētahi tangata tuarua, e 35, mai i Filton, South Gloucestershire, i hopukina i Canning Town i runga i te whakapae ki te ārai i te rerewhenua, kua utua i te wā e haere tonu ana ngā uiui. Tokorua ētahi atu tāngata, e 32 tau te pakeke, mai i Lewisham rāua ko Kingston Upon Hull, i hopukina i te teihana o Stratford mo te ārai i te rerewhenua. Kua utua hoki rātau i te wā e haere tonu ana nga uiui. Kua "kaha" te whakatau a te taone nui o Rāwāhi, a Sadiq Kani, i nga whakahēnga o te Tāite. Kua tohe ngā Pirihimana Waka o Ingarangi ki tētahi tangata whai mōhiohio, whakarākeitanga ataata rānei o ngā raruraru kia haere mai ki mua. Kua whakaritea he ārai whakahau tūmatanui ki ngā ngohe Extinction Rebellion i Rāwāhi mai i te Mane. I te Kōti Tiketike kua whakakāhore tētahi kaiwhakawā i te tono kia rongo wawe i te tono a Extinction Rebellion ki te āraitanga. I pīrangi te rōpū ki te whakarongo i mua i te mutunga o te whakahē i te Hātarei.

title: E whitu noa iho te pakeke o te taihemahema wahine
summary: Ko tētahi kōtiro e whitu tau te pōtiki o te taihemahema wahine (FGM) i whakamahia e te NHS i roto i ngā tau e rua kua taha, e ai ki ngā raraunga hōu.
text: Nā Judith BurnsBBC News: Ko ētahi wāhine me ngā kōtiro e 1,700 i whakamahia e ngā whare hauora FGM tohunga, engari he raruraru nui ake tēnei hīpoki, e kī ana te NSPCC. I te Mane, ka ora tētahi raina āwhina whānui o UK hei pare i ngā kōtiro e mōrearea ana ki te tapahi tikanga, e whakamahia ana e ētahi hapori o Āwherika, o Waenganui, o Āhia. Ko ngā tūpāpaku "e hunaia ana i muri i te taiepa ngū", te kī a Lisa Harker o NSPCC. E whakahaeretia ana te raina āwhina e ngā tohunga parenga tamariki NSPCC, kua whai whakangungu me ngā tohutohu mai i ngā tohunga e mahi tahi ana me ngā wāhine me ngā kōtiro kua pā ki tēnei momo whakararurarutanga. Ko te mamae tino nui e whakaahuatia ana e te aroha te mahi he "kore mana, he whakawehi i te ora" me te kī ka puta mai te mamae tino nui, tae atu ki ngā raruraru ā-tinana, ā-hinengaro hoki ka haere tonu ki te pakeketanga. Mai i te tau 1985, he mana kore mana te kotinga taihemahema wahine, i ētahi wā e mōhiotia ana ko te kotinga wahine, i te UK mai i te tau 1985 - engari kei te haere tonu i roto i te huna, i te nuinga o te wā ka mahia me te kore rongoā. E whakapono ana ētahi hapori mai i ētahi wāhi o Āwherika me te Rāwhiti o Waenganui, mai i ngā tikanga Karaitiana me ngā Karaitiana, he wāhanga tika tēnei o te noho wahine, e whakaiti ana i te puku wahine wahine, nō reira ko te wā o te wahine i waho o te mārenatanga. I ētahi wā ka tonoa ngā kōtiro ki rāwāhi kia mahia. I ētahi wā ka mahia i te UK. Kei roto i te tangohanga wāhanga, te katoa rānei o ngā whēkau taihemahema wahine, i ētahi wā ka waiho he puare iti noa iho mō te mimi, mō te menstruation rānei. E kī ana te NSPCC ko te nuinga o te wā e pakeke ana ngā tūpāpaku i waenganui i te whā me te 10, engari he tamariki ake ētahi. I whakahiatohia e Comfort Momoh, he kaiwhakawhanau i te Hōhipera o Guys me St Thomas i Rāwāhi, nga whika mai i nga whare hauora tohunga. I kī atu a ia ki ngā rongokōrero o TE AO he tokomaha nga wāhine kāore i te mōhiotia kia hapu rā anō rātau, ā, ka tirohia e ngā kaimahi rongoā. Ko ētahi e pāngia ana e ngā mate mimi auau me te mamae o te puku. "He tokomaha ngā tāngata kāore i te mōhio kua mahia e rātau i a rātau e pēpi ana." 'Ingoamuna' E kī ana te NSPCC ko te raina āwhina koreutu 24 haora e hāngai ana ki te tangata e māharahara ana kei te mōrearea te oranga o te tamaiti nā te taihemahema wahine, otirā ko ngā kaiako me ngā kaimahi rongoā, engari e tūmanako ana hoki rātou ka haere mai ngā whanaunga. E whakamōhio ana rātau ka noho ingoamuna tonu ngā kaiwaea, engari ka tukuna atu ngā mōhiohio mō ngā tamariki mōrearea ki ngā pirihimana me ngā ratonga pāpori. I kī a Ms Harker: "Tērā anō tētahi pēhanga nui i roto i ēnei hapori kia noho mārire mō te taihemahema wahine, ā, ko ētahi tāngata e whakawehi ana i te tutu ki te kōrero rātau. " E hiahia ana mātou kia noho tēnei raina āwhina hei wāhi haumaru mō ngā whānau e whakahē ana i tā rātou tamāhine e whai taihemahema wahine ana, engari kāore e taea te whakamutu. Ka taea e tētahi tangata o ēnei hapori te kōrero mai ki a mātau ki te tiki tohutohu me te āwhina mō te taihemahema wahine me te kore wehi ki te whakautu." E 20,000 ngā kōtiro i Ingarangi me Uēra e whakaarotia ana kei te mōrearea, e ai ki ngā whakatau tata a te kāwanatanga, engari kāore he whika tika. E tūmanako ana a Ms Momoh ko tētahi atu painga o te raina āwhina ko te "whakaputa i ngā mōhiohio pakari ake me ngā raraunga". I whakaahuatia e te minita ārai hara a Jeremy Browne te raina āwhina hei "hipanga nui ki te haepapa i tēnei hara nui". "Ka hanga i runga i ngā mahi kua mahia kētia e mātau mā tā mātou mahere mahi tukino ki ngā wāhine me ngā kōtiro ki te whakaara i te mōhiotanga, te tāutu i ngā tūpāpaku tūpāpaku me te ārai i tēnei momo tūkino tamariki." I tāpiritia e Det Ch Supt Keith Niven o te Ratonga Pirihimana o Metropolitan: "Kāore e taea te huna i tēnei mahi hei wāhanga o tētahi ahurea, he tūkino tamariki, ā, ka whaia tonutia te hunga hara."

title: Coronavirus: Caerphilly pub get-togethers warning
summary: Me tirotiro ngā pātaka me ngā wharekai i tētahi wāhi raka paetata mēnā ka haere mai ngā kiritaki i tētahi kāinga kotahi, e ai ki te minita hauora.
text: Kua whakaaetia te wāhanga manaakitanga kia noho tuwhera tonu i Caerphilly ahakoa ngā ture hou e kore e taea e ngā tāngata e noho wehe ana te tūtaki ki rō whare. I kī a Vaughan Gething he take nui mo te pikinga o ngā kēhi Covid-19 nā ngā tāngata e whakaranu ana i roto i ngā kāinga o tētahi. I kī hoki a ia kāore e taea e ngā tangata i tāpui i ngā hararei te haere. Ko te takiwā o Caerphilly te rohe tuatahi o Wales ki te haere ki tētahi raka paetata i te 18:00 BST i te Tūrei, me ngā tāngata 151 i whakamātauria he pai mō te coronavirus i te wiki kua hipa. Ko te tātaritanga hou o te BBC ka waiho a Caerphilly hei wāhi tuarua tino uaua i te UK - i muri i a Bolton - mō ngā pāpātanga kēhi Covid-19 i tērā wiki. E kī ana ko te pāpātanga kēhi i te taone Ingarihi e 128 ngā kēhi mō ia 100,000 o te iwi whānui, i te wā e 80 ia 100,000 a Caerphilly.
