E ai ki ngā raraunga hou, i whakaputaina i te Wenerei e Public Health Wales, ko te whika hou mō Caerphilly ko te 83.4 kēhi mō ia 100,000 tāngata. E kapi ana tērā i ngā rā e whitu kua hipa. I kī te Hauora Tūmatanui o Ingarangi kāore i whakaputaina ngā whika takahuri ōrite. Hei wāhanga o te raka i Caerphilly, kāore e taea e ngā tāngata te tomo, te wehe rānei i te rohe me te kore take pai hei wāhanga o ngā tikanga raka e tūmanakohia ana kia noho tae noa ki Oketopa. "All pubs and restaurants need to look at their customers coming in and ask themselves, well [is that] really a group of people from a single household," said Mr Gething. "If people are taking bookings from a dozen people sitting at the same table, I think people really need to be asking themselves whether those are people following the rules." I kī a ia kāore anō kia kitea te tarenga o te huaketo i roto i ngā pāpara. Engari ka kimi te kaunihera o Caerphilly ki te whakarite kia whaia ngā ture hou, ka kī a Tēnā Gething, ā, kāore ia i whakahaere i te kati i te wāhanga paetata mēnā e hiahiatia ana. He aha te kōrero a ngā pāpara? E whakahaere ana a Glyn Davies i te Smith Arms i Pengam, e kī ana a ia he kiritaki pakeke ake. I kī a ia he "āhuatanga tino whāranu" i waenganui i ngā kiritaki, me ngā pakeke kāore i te hiahia ki te haere mai ki te pae nā te huaketo. "Ko te tikanga kia nui ake te whakamātautau," tana kī. "Tērā pea i te haere haere te tangata me te huaketo me te kore mōhio." I whakaaro a ia kei te waiho ngā pāparapara hei koati haere noa, engari i tāpiri mai: "Ko ētahi pāparapara e rere ana i ngā ture. E ngana ana mātou ki te pupuri i tētahi mea tawhiti i roto i te pāpara, engari he tino uaua ki te pirihimana i ngā mea katoa ina mahi koe." I pātai mai mēnā me mātua whakarite ngā pātaka i ngā kiritaki i roto i ngā rōpū i te whare kotahi, ka kī a ia: "Me pēhea e taea ai e koe tēnā? Kaore e taea e koe te karanga i te tangata he teka. Me whiwhi koe i ngā tāngata ki te kawe mai i ngā tiwhikete whānautanga." I Aberbargoed, ka noho te āpiha moana o mua o Mikaela Rees-Swindon hei rangatira o Te Hōri i Poutāpeta - i ētahi wiki noa iho i mua i te katinga. I tīmata anō te pāparapara ki te mahi i waho i a Hōngongoi, kātahi ki roto i te whakangāwari o ngā rāhuitanga. "Kāore rātou i te kati i a mātau - engari kei te kore e taea e mātau te whakahaere i te wāhi hei umanga," tana kī. "We are being told we have to check tables are being booked for single household groups - well that's my Saturday cancelled." I kī a ia kua whakamāramatia e ngā kaiwhakahaere hauora taiao te kawenga kei runga i a ia me ana kaimahi ki te whakaū i te tawhiti pāpori me te tirotiro i ngā mōhiohio aroturuki me te aroturuki e tika ana. "Kua tika tā mātou mahi i ngā mea katoa - i tino pai te haere. Engari ināianei kua kurua mātau e rātau i te pō." Ka aha nga pirihimana? Neke atu i te 60 ngā waka i tū i roto i te iti iho i te toru haora o te ahiahi tuatahi o te kati i te Tūrei, ahakoa kāore he mahi whakaū i mahia. Heoi anō, i kī te Rangatira Pirihimana o Gwent, a Pam Kelly, kāore ia i te hiahia kia noho ōna āpiha hei "pirihimana Covid" me te kī e kore te ope e whakamahi i ngā paraka huarahi puta noa i te rohe. "Ko tā mātou kōwhiringa pai ko te mahi tahi me ngā hapori i ngā wā katoa," tana kī. "E kore mātou e whai ārai huarahi e tū ai ngā pirihimana i ngā tāngata me te whakatū motokā. " Engari ka noho mātou ki waho e whakauru ana ki o tātau hapori, ā, ki te rere te tangata i te ture, ka tae mai tētahi wā me mutu tātau ki te whakauru me te whakamārama - ā, ki te kore rātou e rite ki te piri ki te ture, me hīpae te pirihimana." Ka taea e au te haere ki te hararei? I te wā o tētahi wātū pātai me te whakautu ora Facebook whānui i te ahiahi o te Tūrei, ka kī hoki a Tēnā Gething kāore e taea e ngā tāngata i te takiwā o Caerphilly te haere ki te hararei. I kī a ia mēnā kua tāpuia e ngā tangata whenua ngā hararei me kōrero rātau ki ā rātou kaiwhakarato, whakamāramatia he takahi i te ture kia haere rātou, me te rapu whakahokinga moni. Ka whakapā atu ngā āpiha ki ngā kaiwhakarato hararei mōkī me ngā inihua ki te whakamārama i te "tino nui o te tūnga me te mōrea ki a rātou me ā rātou umanga" mēnā ka haere ngā tāngata o Caerphilly ki te hararei," tana kī. He aha te take i hira ai te whai i ngā ture ki te tangata? I muri i ngā marama whakangungu, kei te rongo a Yvonne Davies i te "tino riri" i te āhuatanga i tōna taone kāinga o Caerphilly. "Ka kite tonu koe i ngā mea ka tūpono mai i te rā tuatahi," tana kī. "Kotahi noa iho taku haere ki te rohe, ā, kāore he tangata i whai hīpoki. Kāore rātau i te mātaki i tētahi tawhiti pāpori, ā, mai i taua wā ka kino kē atu." I kī a ia kua whakatakahia e tētahi hokomaha ngā tikanga tawhiti, me ngā kaimahi e kī ana kua "hoki ki te pūnoa". E whakaaro ana a ia kua māhorahora rawa te tangata mō te coronavirus: "Kāore rātau i te mōhio ki te nui o te tīmatanga."

title: Ko ngā MP AfD Tiamana i raro i te ahi mō ngā karere o te Pō o te Tau Hōu o te Tau Hōu
summary: Tokorua nga kaipōrangapū Tiamana e tūhuratia ana e nga pirihimana mo nga karere anō a te Mohimana i te Pō o te Tau Hōu.
text: I whakatārewatia rangitahitia e Beatrix von Storch, te kaiārahi tuarua o te rōpū AfD, tana pūkete Twitter i te Mane i muri i te whakairinga i tētahi karere whakakakā. I whakapaea e ia nga pirihimana o Pakihi ki te whakangāwari i "ngā ope tāngata Mohimana pārekareka, i muri i to rātau tuhituhi i tētahi karere tau hou i roto i te reo Arapi. Kai te tūhuratia tētahi atu pāremata i muri i tana tautoko i a ia. I tuhituhi a Alice Weidel, tētahi o ngā kaiārahi o te rōpū, i runga i te Facebook e tuku ana ngā mana ki te "kawemai, te whāwhā, te whāwhā, te tūkino, te whakaoho i ngā māpu kaiheke". E kī ana nga pirihimana tērā pea ka hara nga wāhine e rua ki te whakatoi i te mauahara. Ki te pērā, ka anga atu rātau ki te whaina, ki te whiu whare herehere rānei. Kua mukua e Twitter me Facebook nga whakairinga. I karangatia e ngā kaiārahi AfD ngā mahi whakatau, e kī ana e mahi ana ngā mana Tiamana pēnei i te Stasi i Tiamana ki te Rāwhiti. Ko te tikanga o tētahi ture Tiamana hou, i tino mana i te 1 o Hānuere, ko te tikanga me mahi ngā kamupene pāpāho pāpori ki te kōrero kino. Ki te kore e pērā, ka taea te whaina tae atu ki te €5m ($6m; £4.4m) Ināianei me whakatau e ngā rōia o Cologne mēnā ka whakarewaina he uiui whaimana. I puta mai ngā kōrero a Ms Storch i muri i te tuhituhi a te ope pirihimana o te taone i ngā mihi o te Tau Hōu i roto i ngā reo maha, tae atu ki te Ingarihi me te Wīwī, tae atu ki te Tiamana me te Arapi. I whakatārewatia e Twitter te pūkete a Ms Storch mō te 12 haora hei urupare ki tana pou, e kī ana kua takahia ngā ture o te pae. Kātahi ka whakairihia anō e ia te karere ōrite ki Facebook, i reira hoki i āraia ai mō ngā take whakatoi. Mai i te rua tau ki mua, i te wā e rua tau ki mua, i te nui o ngā whakaekenga ki ngā wāhine - e kiia ana e ngā tāngata mai i ngā papamuri kaiheke - i tūkinotia nga harakoakoa. I te tau i muri mai, ka whakahētia nga pirihimana o te taone mo te pātai i ngā rau tāngata o Awherika ki te Raki. I te Pō o te Tau Hōu 2017, ko tētahi "rohe haumaru" motuhake mō ngā wāhine i whakatūria ki Berlin mō te wā tuatahi.

title: Te pahūtanga o te whare o Birstall: Ka mate te wahine i te hōhipera
summary: Kua mate tētahi wahine i muri i te pahūtanga korohū i tētahi whare i Aotearoa.
text: I mauria a Janet Jasper ki te hōhipera i muri i te pahūtanga, i pā mai ki Allington Drive, i Birstall, tata ki te 07:30 GMT i te Mane. Tokorua hoki nga tāngata i whara - kotahi kai roto i te āhua pūmau i te hōhipera, a, kua tukua tētahi. I ngaro tētahi whare, i haehae tētahi atu, ā, e 50 ētahi atu i pakaru. He "ringa" whānau i noho i te pō Mane i roto i te nohoanga rangitahi. Kei te haere tētahi tūhuratanga. Ko ngā whakahōutanga mō tēnei pūrākau me ētahi atu mea mai i tua atu i te Rāwhiti Midlands Kua whakaūngia e te kamupene tiaki korohū o Cadent, nāna i whakarato te whare horo i Birstall, i haere ki tētahi karanga i Allington Drive i te Rātapu. I kī a Chris Rison, mai i Cadent: "I karangatia mātau, ā, i haere mātau ki tētahi mahi i tēnei tiriti. " Kāore e taea e au te haere i ngā taipitopito o taua taenga mai nā te mea he wāhanga katoa tēnā o te tūhuratanga, engari he pono i haere mātou." Kāore e taea e te whānau Hēhara, e noho ana i te taha o te whare i whakawāteatia, te hoki ki te kāinga nā te mea kāore i te haumaru. Kua tukuna e te iwi o te rohe he whakarurutanga, he kai me nga inu wera ki a rātau. Ka kī a Tina Shah: "He maha a mātau waea me ngā karere. He tino rawe te iwi katoa." I tana kōrero mo te pahūtanga, ka kī a ia: "I te moenga taku tama me ahau, a, ka tomo mai to mātau tuanui. Kāore au i mōhio he aha i pā ki taku tamāhine nā te mea i roto a ia i tētahi atu rūma. "E tino whakamanamana ana ahau kua taea e au te haere atu i taku whare me aku tamariki tokorua." Charnwood Borough Council said it was too early to tell if those left temporary homeless would be able to return home before Christmas. Kua ngaro i a Rārangi Smith, e toru ngā tatau i raro i te wāhi pōkākā, engari i noho i te kāinga i te pō Mane i te pāmahana whakatio. "He āhua kino tēnei, engari he waimarie mātau. He tokomaha tonu ngā tāngata e kino kē atu," tana kī. "Kaore e taea e au te whakaaro he pēhea te whakaaro o aua tāngata rawakore. Mehemea i ngaro to mātau whare pēnei i a rātou, kāore au i te mōhio he aha tā mātou i mahi ai. "Kei te wehi noa iho ahau ki a rātau. E tūmanako ana, e inoi ana ahau kei te pai rātou."

title: Whakamātautau a Jack McLaren: I mate a Pēpi i te mate o te māhunga
summary: I mate tētahi pēpi whā me te hāwhe marama nā te "rūrū kaha", kua rongo te hūri.
text: I toto a Jack McLaren i runga i tōna roro i muri i tana pāngia e ia tētahi "whara māhunga o te momo pānga rūrū", te kī a te rōia ture o Sally Howes QC. I mate a ia i te hōhipera i te 4 o Pipiri 2017 i te whakawetotanga o tana mīhini tautoko ora, ka korerotia ki te Kōti Karauna Pānui ki tōna pāpā, a Daniel McLaren, 30, o Newbury, e whakakāhore ana i te kōhuru i tana tama, engari kua whakaae ki te patu tangata. I kī a Ms Howes i whakapono nga tohunga ā ture i te toto i runga i te roro o Jack i takea mai i te "mate" ki te māhunga. I rongo te kōti i a Tēnā McLaren, he kaipereki, i karangatia e 999, ā, ka kī atu ki tētahi kaiwhakahaere kua "kōwaoa tana tama i runga i tana pounamu, ā, kua rekareka katoa", i a ia e tiaki ana i muri noa iho i te 19:30 i te 2 o Pipiri 2017. I kī a Ms Howes he "kōtea, he pīngore, he wai mā e puta mai ana i ōna pongaponga me tōna mangai" i te taenga atu o ngā paramedics ki te kāinga o Tāne McLaren. 'I huri kikorangi te arero' i karangatia e ia te wahine a Tāne McLaren, o Crystin Bartholomew, i waho mō te kai, a, ka kī atu ki a Jack kua pāngia e ia tētahi "whakauru, he tītī rānei", ka tāpiritia e Ms Howes. I mauria a Jack ki te Hōhipera o Royal Berkshire i mua i tana whakawhitinga ki tētahi wāhi tohunga i te Hōhipera Whānui o Southampton i mate ai ia. I rongo te hūri i a Miss Bartholomew e kī ana "i pai a ia i te 30 meneti i mua i taku wehenga atu i te whare", i tana taenga atu ki te hōhipera. E whakapae ana hoki ngā rōia i a Tēnā McLaren ki te tūkino i tana tama i tētahi wā i Me 2017 "i te mutunga o te hā, ā, ka huri kikorangi tōna arero". I kī a Ms Howes i whakaaturia e te waea a Tēnā McLaren kua rapua e ia "ngā āhuatanga nui i roto i ngā pēpi kia kaua rawa e waiho" me "he aha te arero o taku pēpi e kikorangi ana". I tāpiri mai a ia: "Ko tēnei mahi, neke atu i te toru wiki ki te 2 o Pipiri, he mahi rūrū tōmua i taea e Jack te whakaora." E whakakāhore ana hoki a Tēnā McLaren i tētahi whakapae a GBH me te whāinga ki tētahi atu tamaiti i te 2 o Pipiri 2017.

title: Uiui IPCC mō ngā kerēme i tūtei e ngā pirihimana ki te whānau Alder
summary: Ko ngā kerēme i mahia e nga pirihimana te "matatū hē" o te tuahine o tētahi hōia o mua i mate i roto i te tiakitanga, e tirohia ana e te kaitiaki pirihimana.
text: E mōhiotia ana ko ngā āwangawanga uiui e kī ana i whakatakotoria e ngā Pirihimana o Humberside te tuahine o Christopher Alder, a Janet ki raro i te mātakitaki i te wā o tana uiuinga. I mate a Tāne Alder, e 37, i roto i te tiakitanga pirihimana i Hull i te tau 1998. I kī te tōpana kua kōrerotia e ia ki te Komihana Amuamu Pirihimana Motuhake (IPCC). I kī te IPCC e uiui ana i te "mātakitaki hē" o Ms Alder me tētahi atu tangata. I kī tētahi kaiwhakaatu: "Kua whakapā atu te IPCC ki a Ms Alder me tērā rōpū ki te tuku hui ki te kōrerorero i te tūhuratanga, ka whakahaeretia e te komihana o te IPCC mō Humberside, a Cindy Butts." I kī ngā Pirihimana o Humberside i muri i te tono a te kāwanatanga ki ngā ope pirihimana katoa kia tirohia ā rātou pūkete mō ngā whakaaturanga ki te kōhurutanga o Stephen Lawrence me te uiuinga o muri mai ki tōna matenga. I patua ā-ture te ope: "I muri i tētahi arotakenga ā-roto, i whakahaeretia i runga i te mārama o te hiahia ki ngā mahi pirihimana whakaruru, kua kōwhiria e ngā Pirihimana o Humberside kia tohutoro ki te IPCC he mahi i whakahaeretia i ngā tau maha ki mua. " Ko te tikanga o tēnei kāore e taea e ngā Pirihimana o Humberside te kōrero anō kia whakamutua rā anō e te IPCC tētahi tūhuratanga. " I muri i tana hopukina i te tau 1998, ka mate a Tēnā Alder i te teihana pirihimana o Hull's Queen's Gardens. I kitea e te hūri uiui kua patua ia i te ture, ā, i muri iho ka kawea mai ngā utu hē me te patu tangata ki ngā āpiha Pirihimana e rima o Humberside. I whakawāteatia rātau i nga whakapae hara katoa i te tau 2002. I muri iho ka kitea te tinana o Tēnā Alder i roto i tētahi whare mate o Hull i te tau 2011, e tohu ana kua tanumia kētia e tōna whānau tētahi atu. I tanumia hētia a Grace Kamara, e 77, mai i Naria, ki tōna urupa, ā, i hunaia tōna tinana i te wā o Hui tanguru i tērā tau.

title: Tērā pea ka hurihia e Brexit ngā mahere Metro o South Wales, ka whakatūpato a Jones
summary: Tērā pea me huri ngā mahere hei whakapai ake i ngā waka tūmatanui i te tonga o Uēra i muri i a Pakihi, kua kī te minita tuatahi.
text: I kī atu a Carwyn Jones ki ngā minita AM ka pēhi whakamua i te kaupapa Metro £600m, engari i whakatūpato ka roa ake pea te tuku. Engari i kī a ia kāore he kī taurangi ka parea e te kāwanatanga o UK te pūtea EU, e hiahiatia ana mō te kaupapa. I whakapaea e te kaiārahi Rangatira o Welsh a Andrew RT Davies a Tēnā Jones ki te whakamahi i a Tēnā Jones hei "paowa". Ā muri ake ka kī atu te Hēkeretari Whakahaere a Ken Skates ki a AMs ka tū te hanganga i runga i te metro mai i te tau 2019. Ko te tikanga o te Metro kia homai he tereina pai ake, he pahi tere ake me ngā ratonga rerewhenua māmā, waka rānei i Kānata me ngā awaawa. I pānuitia i tērā tau ka pau te £600m ki te wāhanga o nāianei o te metro. I roto i tērā te £125m mai i te kāwanatanga o UK me te £150m i roto i te pūtea whanaketanga ā-rohe o Ūropi. 'Tuwhera mō ngā umanga' I roto i tētahi kōrero mō ana manakē mō te kāwanatanga, ka kī atu te minita tuatahi ki a AMs i te Tūtira, ahakoa te rangirua i runga i te huānga nui o te pūtea EU mō te kaupapa Metro, ka "pēhi whakamua" tōna kāwanatanga ki tōna whanaketanga. "Kāore pea i te āhua ōrite ki mua, me titiro mātou ki ētahi atu tauira pūtea, ā, ka roa ake pea te tae ki te wāhi e hiahia ana mātou, engari e whakapono ana ahau he tohu hira tēnei ki ngā kaitukumahi kei te tuwhera tonu a Uēra mō ngā umanga", tana kī. I kī a Tēnā Jones e tūmanako ana a ia ki te whakaputa i tētahi hōtaka taipitopito mō te wā e rima tau o te kāwanatanga i mua i te tīmatanga o te wā raumati a tērā wiki, engari i whakawāteatia e ia tae noa ki Mahuru nā te Pakihi. I whakahuatia anō e te minita tuatahi tana karanga ki te kāwanatanga o UK kia whakaū i te whakakapi i te pūtea EU e hākinakina ana e Weera, e tata ana ki te £600m i te tau. "Ki te kore tēnei whakaūtanga ka anga atu tātau ki tētahi puare tino nui i roto i a tātau tahua ā muri ake," tana kī. 'He iti noa iho te kōrero' Engari i kī te kaiārahi Rangatira o Welsh, a Andrew RT Davies: "Ehara i te whakararuraru, me te whakamahi i te pōti o Te Kāwanatanga hei takunga mo te kore whakaaro, me haere tonu te Minita Tuatahi ki te whakatakoto i tana Hōtaka mō te Kāwanatanga. " Nō reira, ko te mea pono, kei te mōrearea te Minita Tuatahi ki te puta mai me te mea kei te whakamahi ia i te taupānga EU hei paowa hei huna i te mea he iti noa iho te kōrero a tana kāwanatanga mō ngā take tūturu e anga ana ki ngā hapori o Welsh i ia rā; pēnei i te NHS o Welsh, te whakapeka i ngā paerewa mātauranga, me te hiahia ki te tīmata i te ōhanga o Welsh." I tāpiritia e ia kāore i taea e te kōrero a Tēnā Jones te kōrero i te raruraru tīra i waenganui i ngā manakē a te kāwanatanga. Ā muri ake i te Hēkeretari o te Whakahaerenga o Senedd, ka kī a Tēnā Skates i te hanganga i runga i te Metro "ka tū mai i te 2019, me ngā ratonga e mahi ana i ngā wā tata nei, ā, ka whakawhirinaki tēnei ki te rongoā e tukua ana". I mua o te Tūtira, ka kī te Hēkeretari o Welsh a Alun Cairns ka pai ake te whiu i ngā "take pakiaka" o ngā raruraru ohaoha i ngā wāhi rawakore o Uēra i te whakakapi i ngā rawa EU ki ngā moni o Te Wānanga.

title: I whiua te rōia o Upskirting mō ngā whakaahua o London Underground
summary: Kua whiua tētahi rōia kāwanatanga o mua nāna i whakaahua te panekoti o tētahi wahine i runga i te Rāwāhi o Rāwāhi.
text: I kitea e tētahi pirihimana a Daren Timson-Hunt, e 54, me tana waea "i waenganui i ōna waewae" e tata ana ki tētahi pāhihi e mau ana i tētahi kākahu "raumati", ka rongo te kōti. I te tūtakitanga ki te teihana o Embankment, ka whakaae te pāpā o tētahi ki tāna i mahi ai. Ko Timson-Hunt, i hoatu ki a ia he whakahau hapori 24 marama, te tuawhā o nga tangata e whiua ana i raro i tētahi ture hou. I kī atu te Rōia o Katie Bryan ki te Kōti Kaiwhakawa o Westminster kua haere te tūkino ki tētahi uiuinga mahi mā te Porohita me te Raina Rohe i te 1 o Hōngongoi. I kī a ia i kite a Insp Pete Scottow, i roto i te waka Ngongo i taua wā, i a Timson-Hunt e tata ana ki te wahine me tana waea i waenganui i ōna waewae. I whakapae a ia e tango whakaahua ana a ia i tana kitenga i a ia e pēhi ana i tētahi pātene taha "e whā ki te rima ngā wā", ka rongo te kōti. I te hekenga atu o te tokotoru ki te teihana o Embankment, ka rongo te kōti, ka whai a Insp Scottow, a, ka kite i te tangata whakapae e tū tata ana ki te wahine i runga i te arawhata. Kātahi ia ka whakatata atu ki a ia, ka mea, "Ki taku whakaaro kua mau pikitia tēnei tangata i a koe". I te tūtakitanga, ka whakapōhēhē a Timson-Hunt "ohorere", e kī ana "kāore anō ia kia mahi i tētahi mea pēnei i mua", ka korerotia ki te kōti. E rua ngā ataata i kitea i runga i tana waea. Tētahi, i hopukina i runga i te Ngongo, i whakaatu i te "kākahu o te wahine me ngā kākahu tahanga i raro i te kākahu", te kī a Ms Bryan. I roto i tētahi kōrero i pānuitia i te kōti, ka kī te wahine i "tino tūkinotia" a ia i te wheako. Ko tōna wehi ki te ūkuia anō, ko te tikanga kāore a ia i mau kākahu, panekoti rānei mai i taua wā, ka rongo te kōti. I kī a Nicholas Ornstin kua "tino ngaro" te oranga o Timson-Hunt, i a ia e uaua ana ināianei ki te kimi mahi, ā, ko tana mārena "i runga i nga toka". I kī te tūru o te tēpu o Anne Boda, i te whiu, ka whai "pānga roa" te hara "tino kino" ki te tūkinotanga. Ko ngā ture o te raupapa hapori a Timson-Hunt ko te 30 rā o te mahi whakaora me te 60 hāora mahi kore utu. Ngā pūrākau e hiahia ana pea koe: I whakahaua hoki ia kia haina i te rēhita o te hunga hara wahine mō te rima tau, ā, me utu hoki e £175 ngā utu kōti me te utu tāpiri a te hunga i aituā. I whakaae te tangata whakapae, o Stanford-le-Hope, o Essex, ki te whakahaere taputapu i raro i nga kākahu o tētahi atu, kaore he whakaaetanga i tētahi whakarongo tōmua.

title: E whakaata ana a John Carpenter i te Halloween 35 tau i muri mai
summary: I te tau 1978, he pikitia pūtea iti e pā ana ki tētahi kaipatu hīpoki e tāwhai ana i tētahi kaitiaki tamariki i tētahi tapa taone mārire o Illinois.
text: Nā te kaipānui o Kev GeogheganEntertainment, i whakaahuatia mō te $300,000 (tata ki te $1m i tēnei rā), kua neke atu i te $47m te Halloween a John Carpenter. I wehi, i rekareka hoki ngā kaimātakitaki whare pikitia ki te nui ōrite, ā, i noho a Michael Myers, me tana hīpoki kanohi mā hei ata ahurea pahū, i mua i ngā āhuatanga o Jason Voorhees, te kararehe hīpoki hoki mai i ngā kiriata Paraire te 13 me Freddie Krueger o te Nightmare on Elm Street franchise. "Ka taea e au te whakapono," te kī a te kaiwhakahaere āhua 65 tau ināianei, mō te roanga o te wā mai i tana waihangatanga i tētahi o ngā taniwha whitiāhua tino nui. "Kua pakeke ahau ināianei, e 35 tau ki muri he tamaiti tamariki ahau, kātahi anō ka ngana ki te hanga whitiāhua engari kei te pēnei tonu ētahi wāhanga o ahau ki taua tamaiti taitamariki." I mua i te Halloween, kua mōhio kē a Carpenter ki ētahi angitu ki te kiriata apo Assault on Precinct 13, ahakoa he hinganga i te US, i muri i te whakaaturanga i te Hākari Kiriata o Rāwāhi i te tau 1977. I karangatia ia ki tētahi hui i Rāwāhi me te kaiwhakanao o Te Rūnanga o Hiriani me te kaihoko moni o Hiriani, o Moustapha Akkad, e hiahia ana ki tētahi pikitia, e kī ana a Carpenter, "i te tuatahi kia kiia ko The Babysitter Murders". "Ko te whakaaro ka taea e ia kōtiro Amerika te pāhono ki tērā." I muri i te whakapati i a Akkad ki te wehe i te moni me te tuku i te mana auaha katoa ki a Carpenter me tana hoa tuhituhi ko Debra Hill, ka tīmata te mahi i te hōtuhi mō Halloween. I titoa hoki e Carpenter te pūoro mo te pikitia, ko tōna piana tangi me ngā tangi whakararuraru e whakahiko ana kia noho ko tētahi o ngā tāhuhu kiriata tino mōhiotia, pūmau hoki. "Ko te pūmahara nui rawa kei a au ko te ngāwari," te kī a te kaiwhakahaere. "He ruarua ōku āhuahira i raro i taku tātua, nā reira i tino takahuri ahau ki ngā raruraru ōkiko o te tākaro whitiāhua, me pēhea te puta atu. A, i kitea e au te whitiāhua, ā, he tino ngahau." Tūmomo Slasher Ahakoa ehara i te mea hou te ariā o te kaipatu tāhae, kua kitea i roto i ngā pikitia pēnei i a Michael Powell's voyeuristic Peeping Tom; Ko te tumuaki o te Atua o Francis Ford Coppola's Dementia 13, tae atu ki te hanganga a Tobe Hooper Leatherface mai i Texas Chainsaw Massacre, he kararehe rerekē a Halloween's Myers. "I a mātau tēnei whakaaro ehara a Michael Myers i te tino tangata, engari tata tonu ki te tōpana atua," te kī a Carpenter. "Ko te kino hei kaha o te āhua i roto i te whakatinana o tēnei tangata. "Nā reira i purua ia e mātau ki roto i te hīpoki kia kore ai ōna āhuahira tangata." Ko te hīpoki inarapa e rua tāra he āhua o te kaitapere Star Trek a William Shatner, i rehu i tētahi mā kikorangi - ā, ka wehi i te iwi. "Ko te whakamihi tino pai i whiwhi ahau ko te tū i waho o te whare tapere me te rongo i te hunga whakarongo e karanga ana, he tino ātaahua tēnā." I tīmataria e Halloween te wā o ngā whitiāhua slasher o ngā tau kotahi mano e waru tekau mā rua. Ahakoa ehara rātau i te tuatahi, - tae atu ki te Paraire 13 - i kawea mai te tūmomo wehi o mua ki roto i te whakahirahira. Heoi anō, ka whakatangihia e Carpenter tōna rongo hei matua o te tūmomo: "Ki taku whakaaro ko te take matua i whakaaweawe ai a Halloween i ētahi atu whitiāhua he tino mōhio ngā kaiwhakarato e titiro ana, e kī ana, 'I mahia tēnei e tēnei pōrangi mō te $300,000, ka taea e mātou te mahi me te mahi moni'. " E pā ana ki te mahi moni i Hollywood. Ehara i te mea mo te toi." Ināianei he āhua whakamā te tūmomo slasher ina whakaritea ki te pahūtanga i roto i te mea i mōhiotia ko te "porn whakamamae" o ngā tau 2000. Ko ngā kiriata tino taikaha pēnei i te Hostel me te māngai Saw i hangaia i runga i te āhua kino o ngā kiriata pēnei i te Halloween me te Paraire te 13. Mai i taua wā, kua hoki mai ngā kaipūkino ki ngā mea taketake me ngā kiriata wairua pēnei i te The Conjuring me te The Woman In Black, kua kitea he tino nui te tānga i te tari pouaka. Engari ko Carpenter - nāna i mahi i ngā pūrākau wairua pēnei i te Kohu me Te Kohu - ka tohe anō: "Kua huri noa ngā kiriata wehi mai i te tīmatanga o te whare pikitia, ā, ka ahu atu ia ki tētahi atu kia haere tonu ai rātou ki te huri me te huri i runga anō i te iwi. " Kāore tētahi o ēnei i te mea hou, he pūrākau kēhua i ngā wā katoa. He huarahi hou noa iho mo te kōrero pūrākau." Ahakoa ko te wehi te tinana matua o te mahi a Carpenter, kua peka atu te kaiwhakahaere ki ētahi atu tūmomo pēnei i te mahi kōhua o Big Trouble in Little China me te aroha o Starman - nāna i whiwhi ai a Pirihitini i tētahi whakaingoatanga o Oscar. Ka kitea tōna awe ki tētahi whakatupuranga tamariki o ngā kaipūkino, engari i roto i te mahi a te kaiwhakahaere o Tenemāka o Nicholas Winding Refn o te rongonui o Drive. I roto i tētahi uiuinga o TE AO o nā noa nei, ka whakapuakina e ia tōna aroha ki te kiriata 1981 a Carpenter Escape from New York - e hāngai ana ki a Kurt Russell hei toa ārai toa o Cyclops Snake Plissken, ko tana whāinga he whakaora i te perehitini o Amerika mai i te Āporo Nui - ināianei he whare herehere haumarutanga mōrahi. "E te Atua, i aroha ahau ki taua whitiāhua," te kī a Refn. "He tino pai te whare pikitia, he whakaaturanga tino tika. Tērā patu mokowhiti." Ko Carpenter, e haruru ana i te kata, e mārama ana te rekareka ki te whakamihi: "Ae," ka kōauau a ia. " Ko wai e kore e pēnei?" Mēnā ko te tāwhai te āhua tino pono o te patipati, ka manaakitia a Carpenter, i te taha o ngā whainga e whitu ki Halloween, kāore i iti iho i te whā o ana pikitia kua hangaia anōtia i roto i ngā tau tata nei, me te urutaunga o Escape from New York kua rongo roa. E whakapono ana ngā kaitapere o Ingarangi ko Jason Statham rāua ko Tom Hardy he kaioma tuatahi ki te mahi i te tūranga o Plissken. "I'm mostly excited, especially when they have to pay me money," says Carpenter. "I hangaia e au aku kiriata me ngā mahi hou ko ngā mahi hou, nā reira he pai ki a au." I muri i te 43 tau i roto i te umanga pikitia, kua āhua haere a Carpenter ināianei, engari ka tuku tohutohu ki ngā kaipūkino rangatahi. "Ko te wero nui rawa ko te ora i te umanga whitiāhua me te hanga kiriata ahakoa ngā taunahua katoa i tō ara," tana kī. "Kaore he tangata e kōrero ki a koe me pēhea te ora. " Kāore au i te mōhio mehemea kei te hiakai ahau pērā i a au. Kāore au i te tino ārahi i a au, ko te whāinga o tōku oranga katoa kia noho hei kaiwhakahaere ngaio, ā, i mahia e au tēnā, kāore he mea e toe ana ki a au anō." I te 21 o Whiringa ā-rangi, ka puta tētahi putanga huritau 35 o Halloween.

title: Hurricane Irma: Ko ēhea ngā wāhi e mōrearea ana?
summary: I te wā e waiho ana e te Huripari o Te Huripari tētahi huarahi whakangaromanga whakamate puta noa i te Kāriana, e whakatūpato ana ngā matapae i te ara o te āwhā kaha ki ētahi atu tūkinotanga.
text: Ahakoa kua whakahekea a Irma ki tētahi kāwai whā āwhā - mai i te kāwai tūnga tiketike e rima - ka whakatūpato ngā mana kei te noho "tino mōrearea" tonu, ā, he maha tonu ngā wāhi e mōrearea ana. Kua whakapuakina e te kāwanatanga o Amerika o Pārera tētahi āhua ohorere i mua i te tūnga whenua i te Rātapu. Me ētahi wāhi, pērā i a Barbuda, i mahue i te āwhā "kāore e taea te noho" e te āwhā, ko ēhea ngā wāhi e whakapakari ana ināianei mo te taikaha o Irma? Cuba, Bahamas, Florida, Georgia, South Carolina, North Carolina: Ko ēhea ngā wāhi kua pā kētia? He āwhā anō kei te haere mai? Ko tētahi atu āwhā, ko Jose, i tua atu i te Atarangi i muri i a Irma, i whakamohoatia ki tētahi āwhā kāwai whā i te Paraire. Ka taea te whakakaha anō i a Jose a tērā rā, neke atu rānei, e ai ki te NHC. I kaha hoki te āwhā o Katia, i te Kōwhiti o Mehiko, ā, i whakamohoatia i te Paraire ki tētahi āwhā kāwai rua, me ngā hau tae atu ki te 160km/h (100mph). Kei te pā tētahi whakatūpato mō te takutai o te āhua o Mehiko o Veracruz, ā, e tūmanakohia ana kia ū te āwhā i te Hātarei.

title: He rīpeka rākau i hangaia mai i te oki Titanic hei hoko
summary: Ko tētahi rīpeka rākau i hangaia mai i te oki i tangohia mai i te pakaru o te Titanic, me hoko i te hokonga.
text: I hangaia te wāhanga e Samuel Smith i runga i te S.S. Minia i whai wāhi ki te mahi whakaora tinana i Aperira 1912. Mai i taua wā ka noho tonu ki tōna whānau. Kei te hokona te rīpeka me ētahi atu tuemi Titanic i te whare hoko a Henry Aldridge me Tama i Wiltshire, ā, e tūmanakohia ana kia tiki i te £18,000. I hangaia e Tēnā Smith te rīpeka hei whakahonore i ngā pāhihi me ngā kaimahi neke atu i te 1,500 i mate i te tūtukitanga o te Titanic ki tētahi hukapapa i ngā haora tōmua o te 15 o Āperira, 1912. I kī a Auctioneer Andrew Aldridge he taonga whakamaharatanga "kaha, ngākau nui" te tūemi. Ko ērā atu tuemi Titanic hei hoko i te taha o te rīpeka, ko tētahi reta taketake kua hainatia, ko ngā whakaahua, ko ngā tuhinga me ngā utauta mahi rākau a Tāne Smith, tae atu ki tētahi tiwhikete tuku e tuhinga ana i tana mahi moana. Ka hokona ngā tūemi mā tētahi uri hāngai o Tāne Smith i te 19 o Whiringahora.

title: Ka whakaaturia e ngā rongo e iwa o TE Pākehā te 'ao mā ngā whatu o Pākehā'
summary: Ko te hōtaka rongokōrero hōu rawa o TE Iwa - Te Iwa - ka whakaatu i "te ao mā ngā whatu o Pākehā", e ai ki te tīma i muri i a ia.
text: Ka whakarewaina te whakaaturanga i runga i te hongere pouaka whakaata hōu o TE AO o Pākehā i te wā o Hui tanguru. The hour-long week night programme will be presented by Rebecca Curran and Martin Geissler. Ka pāohotia mai i tētahi mokowā studio mahere tuwhera pūmau i te papa tuatoru i te Wāhi Nui o Te Moana-nui-a-Kiwa o Aotearoa i Glasgow. Ka mau i ngā rongo mai i te ao, i te toenga o UK me Pākehā. He iti iho te tikanga o te Kaiwhakatika o Hayley Valentine i whakapono ka whakaaturia "te ao mā ngā kanohi o Pākehā". I kī a Ms Valentine, ko ia te kaiwhakatika nui o te Wā Pātai a TE WĀ, i mua hoki i taua upoko rongokōrero mō te Reo Irirangi 5Live, ka whakataetae ki ngā hōtaka rongokōrero tino pai i hangaia i Rāwāhi me ērā atu o te ao. I kī a ia he "iti iho te tikanga" i te huaputa rongokōrero o TE AO tīariari me te "whai rawa" o te haora te roa, ko te tikanga ka taea e ia te whakahaere uiuinga roa ake me te tuku i ngā pikitia kia "hā". I tūmanako a Ms Valentine ka whiwhi rongonui mō te "pukapuka pukapuka taketake" me ngā uiuinga manuhiri ora hei tautuhi rārangi take. Ka pāohotia te hōtaka rongokōrero i te Mane ki te Paraire i waenganui i te 21:00 me te 22:00, i muri i te whakarewatanga o te hongere i te 24 o Hui tanguru. I ngā Hātarei, he pānui 15 meneti whai muri i tētahi hōtaka arotake 45 meneti. Tērā anō tētahi pānui Rātapu 15 meneti. Ko wai ngā kaiwhakaatu o te Iwa? Ka whakaatu tahi a Ms Curran rāua ko Tāne Geissler i te Mane ki te Rāite, ā, ka whakaaturia e Laura Miller rāua ko John Beattie te haora rongokōrero i ia Paraire. E rua tau a Ms Curran, e mahi ana i te BBC i Aberdeen, i tīmata i tana mahi i te Reo Irirangi o Northsound, a, e toru tau i STV. Ka kī a ia: "Mēnā i kōrero tētahi i te rua tau ki mua, ka whakamutua e au te whakaatu i tētahi hōtaka rongokōrero ā-motu i runga i te HAU, kāore au i whakapono ki a rātou." Engari i kī a ia kāore i taea e ia te ātete i te wā, ā, e tūmanako ana ki te tīmatanga o te kaupapa. Rebecca Curran - 'I am thrilled to be part of this' She and Mr Geissler have known each other for a couple of years having meet when they were both covering stories in Aberdeen. I kī a Ms Curran: "E hari ana ahau ki te noho hei wāhanga o tēnei hōtaka. He wā whakamīharo tēnei mōku anō, ā-ngaio hoki." Ko Tēnā Geissler, i whakatupuria mai i Etinitini, he korero kōrero ki a ITN mō te 17 tau, ā, i mahi puta noa i te ao i runga i ngā pūrākau tae atu ki te pakanga o Iraki, te papā o Pūkeirangi, te Āwhā o Katari me te tsunami o te Rā Mekemeke. I mahi hoki a ia hei kaipānui me te kaiwhakaatu mō STV, hei korero kōrero mō Sky Sports. E kī ana a ia he "hack" a ia mo te 27 tau, ā, ko te whakaatu i tētahi hōtaka he "huringa nui". "Kāore au i whakaaro ka tāia ahau ki tētahi mea pēnei tae noa ki te putanga mai," tana kī. E ai ki a Tēnā Geissler, i aroha a ia ki tana mahi i ITN, engari i whakaaro ia kua rite ia ki tētahi wero hou. Martin Geissler - 'Kāore e taea te tatari ki te tīmata' Whai muri i ngā whakaharatau hangarau i tēnei wiki, ka whakaahuatia e ia he "rongopai koretake" mō te hōtaka hou. E kī ana a ia ka "hākinakina ake tōna āhua i ētahi atu hōtaka rongokōrero pouaka whakaata i Ingarangi i tēnei rā". I tāpiritia e te kairīpoata "kāore i taea e ia te tatari kia tīmata". E whā ngā wāhi motuhake o te huinga, e tuwhera ana i ngā taha katoa, mō ngā momo whakaaturanga rerekē. Tērā tētahi wāhi matua mō te pānui rongokōrero, e kīia ana e Tēnā Geissler ko te "wāhi pae" e taea ai te whakahaere i ngā uiuinga me ngā kaipānui, he wāhi mata nui me tētahi sofa roa mō ngā tūtakinga noho. I runga i te mata ka "tīhore whakamuri" te āhua, ā, kāore e kī i te rīpene ticker me ngā whakairoiro. Ka rerekē te āhua o te huinga puta noa i te tau i te putanga mai o te mārama māori i roto i ngā rama o te tuanui. "I ētahi wiki o te tau ka pouri i a mātau e rangi ana," te kī a Tēnā Geissler. E whakaae ana a ia ka tīmata te whakaaturanga hou mai i te kore, ā, e tūmanako ana ki te hanga i tētahi hunga whakarongo. Ka kī a ia: "Me whai wāhi mātou ki te hunga whakarongo, ā, me whiwhi mātou." "Ki te rongo koe i tētahi hōtaka e kōrero ana ki a koe, ka tāia koe ki reira. " Ka taea e koe te kōrero ki te hunga taitamariki me te kore whakarerekē i te hunga pakeke. Me whai pūāhua tōna." I kī a Tēnā Geissler rāua ko Ms Curran he "tino hira" te matu ā-mata ki te whakangāwari i te tangata ki te hōtaka. I kī a Tēnā Geissler i roto a ia i ngā rūma rongokōrero i hinga ai ngā kaiwhakaatu i te rārangi tuatahi o tētahi pānui, ā, i whakaritea kia pai ake te pātahitanga i tērā. "I ngā wā katoa e pōhēhē ana ahau i tēnā huarahi," tana kī. Arotahi ki te whakawhānuitanga o te upoko rongokōrero o TE Wānanga o Aotearoa, i kī a Te Iwa he wāhanga o tētahi pūtea penapena £7m i roto i ngā rongokōrero o TE Aotearoa, arā ko te whakamahi i ngā kaipūrongo e 80. I kī a ia ka mahi ngā kaimahi hou puta noa i ētahi atu huaputa o TE AO Pākehā me te hōtaka hou. E ai ki a Tēnā Hāne, kāore a ia e titiro ki ngā whakatauranga hei whakatau i te angitu o te hōtaka, ā, e hiahia ana ki te arotahi ki te "whakamihi". Ka pāohotia te Iwa i runga i te BBC Scotland, he hongere hōu mō Pākehā me te pūtea tuatahi e £32m i te tau. Ka whai tūnga tūturu i runga i te kaiārahi hōtaka hiko (EPG), ā, ka wātea i runga i te iPlayer. Ko ngā haora pāohotanga uho o te hongere mai i te 19:00 tae noa ki waenganui pō, engari ka taea te tuku i ētahi atu wā. Ko te whāinga o te hongere hou ko te whakaata i te oranga o Pākehā, tae atu ki te wā hei whakaaturanga i ētahi kōrero kōrero me te whakaari hou. Tata ki te 50% o ngā whakaaturanga i runga i te hongere ka tukuruatia.

title: Te kaihoroi o Pembroke Chevron: Pūkete haumaru 'tino pai'
summary: Kua tiakina te pūkete haumaru o tētahi kaihoko hinu ki te uru o Wales i mate ai ngā kaikirimana e whā i roto i te pahūtanga me te ahi.
text: Kei te haere tētahi tūhuratanga i muri i te pahūtanga i te Rāitema i roto i tētahi kura rokiroki i te tipu o Chevron i Pembroke. Ahakoa te maha o ngā mahi i te tipu i roto i ngā tau e rua tekau tau kua taha, ka kī te kaunihera o Pembrokeshire he "pūkete haumaru tino pai". I kī te koromatua o Pembroke Dock, a Andrew McNaughton, me whakaae ētahi mōrea. He maha nga mahi i te kaihoko mai i te whakatuwheratanga i te tau 1964. Ko te tino kino i mua i te ahiahi o te Rāitema i puta i a Hōngongoi 1996 i te wā e 26 nga kaimahi i whara i te pahūtanga me te ahi. I June 2001 i takea mai he ahi i te turuturu hauwai, me te paowa i kitea e ngā kaitirotiro e piki ana i ngā rau waewae ki te hau, engari kāore he tangata i whara. I tohe a Ch Supt Gwyn Thomas o ngā Pirihimana o Dyfed-Powys kāore he mōrea haere tonu ki te iwi whānui i muri i te mahi hou rawa. I kī atu a John Davies, te kaiārahi kaunihera o Pembrokeshire, ki a BBC Wales i roto i ngā tau e 46 mai i te Regent tuatahi, kātahi ko Texaco, ā, ināianei kua whakahaeretia e Chevron te tipu, he "pūkete haumarutanga, tino whakamīharo". "Kāore au i te mōhio ki ētahi oranga e ngaro ana i roto i ngā āhuatanga ōrite e pā ana ki te ahi me te pahūtanga," te kī a Tēnā Davies. "Ki taku whakaaro koinei te tuatahi o tōna momo. " Nā te mea ka whakamahine rātau i te wāhi tino pai o te 220,000 pāro māori i ia rā ki te hua mārire, ki taku whakaaro he pūkete tino ātaahua tēnei. Engari inapō i utua te utu whakamutunga. "Ka pā kino ēnei mea. Engari kua rite mātau mo ēnei mahi i tētahi wā." I tāpiritia e ia kua tautokona e te kaunihera tana kawenga ki te whakaū i te haumarutanga tūmatanui i muri i te mahinga. Kua whakarewaina e Chevron tōna ake tūhuratanga kia whakahaere tahi me te uiui a te Kaiwhakahaere Hauora me te Haumaru ki te mahi o te pō o te Rāite. I pā mai i te wā o te mahi auau, i whakaritea. I kī a Julian Lee, te kaitātari pūngao matua i te Pokapū mō ngā Akoranga Pūngao Huri noa, he wāhanga nui te tipu o te hanganga hinu o UK me te kaha ki te tukatuka i te 14% o te whakapaunga hinu ā-tau o UK. "Ka pā mai ngā aituā mahi," te kī a Tēnā Lee. "Waimarie, nā te tauine o te umanga hinu me te maha o ngā kaipūnuku me te nui o te hinu e tukatukatia ana e rātou, he āhua āhua kore noa iho. Engari e kore e taea te karo katoa i a rātou." I kī a Andrew McNaughton, te rangatira o Pembroke Dock, kāore anō kia puta he aituā nui i te kaihoko i roto i te tata ki te 20 tau. "Me whakaae koe ki ētahi mōrea," tana kī. "E whakaaro ana koe kua tangohia ngā whakatūpatotanga aituā katoa. Kāore e taea e koe te taupoki i ngā mōrea katoa mō ngā mea katoa... engari ka taea e koe te whakarite kia āraia ngā mōrea kāore e taea te karo." I whakamihi hoki a Haimona Hart, te MP Conservative mō Carmarthen West me South Pembrokeshire, i te pūkete haumaru o te tipu. "He umanga tino hira tēnei, engari he mōrearea, ā, he tino pai te pūkete haumaru," tana kī. "Credit where credit's due, it's had a long and good record." I tāpiri mai a ia: "Kāore au i te whakaaro me haere tātau ki te whakapae kia mutu rā anō te tūhuratanga." I kī a Angela Burns, Conservative AM mō Carmarthen West me South Pembrokeshire, he maha ngā kamupene tino nui e mahi ana i te whakangāwari hinu me te whakanao korohū, ā, kei reira ētahi whakatūpatotanga tino pākaha. "He kamupene tino hira tēnei i roto i to mātau hapori," tana kī. "Ka āwhina rātau i ngā miriona me ngā miriona ki tō mātou ōhanga i ia tau. " Me tū pakihiwi ki te pakihiwi me rātou, tautoko i ngā whānau me te akiaki tonu me te poka, me te whakarite kei a Chevron me ētahi atu kamupene pēnei i a rātou te tino pai o ngā paerewa haumaru tino pai e taea ana."

title: Ko te Pokapū Pouaka Whakaata o TE AO hei whakauru i te hōtēra, ngā whare noho me ngā tari
summary: Me hanga te Pokapū Pouaka Whakaata o Rāwāhi hei hōtēra, he whare noho me ngā tari, engari ka kite hoki i te kaipānui e mahi hōtaka ana i roto i ōna studios e toru.
text: Kua whakaaturia e ngā mahere whanaketanga e £200m mō te wāhi hītori ka whakatuwheratia te marae o te whare ki te iwi whānui. Ko te whare porohita matua, e mōhiotia ana e ngā kaimahi o TE AO ko "te tōnati", ka noho hei hōtēra me ngā whare noho. Ka whakaurua anō ngā Studios 1, 2 me te 3. Ka panonitia ētahi atu whare hei tari me ngā whare, ā, ka noho hoki te pae 14 eka ki te ringa arumoni o te AO, o TE Ao Whānui. I kī a David Camp, te rangatira nui o ngā kaiwhakawhanake o Stanhope: "Ka noho tonu te AO i te Pokapū Pouaka Whakaata, ā, ka kawea mai e mātou he oranga hou ki te pae me ngā ara tūmatanui hōu, ngā mokowā me ngā whakamahinga." I kī tētahi kōrero i te paetukutuku a Stanhope ka "whāia ētahi tari ki ngā kainoho i te wāhanga auaha e whakarato ana i ngā wāhi mahi hōu", me te tāpiri ka "maha ngā whakamahinga tūmatanui, tae atu ki tētahi whare pikitia, karapu hauora, wharekai me ngā wharekai, e whai painga ana ki te iwi paetata". E kī ana ka pupuritia ngā "whare rārangi tino arohaina i te Pokapū Pouaka Whakaata", ā, kei roto i ēnei ko te whare porohita matua me te taha o mua o Studio 1, kua whakarārangitia te Kōeke II. I kī te AO i te ono tau ki muri e hiahia ana ki te hoko i te whare rongonui o Rānōna, i whakatuwheratia i te tau 1960, ā, i tākaro i tētahi tūranga matua i roto i tōna hītori. Ko ngā hōtaka i hopukina i reira ko Fawlty Towers, Monty Python's Flying Circus, Blue Peter me Strictly Come Dancing, tae atu ki ngā rangatū tōmua o Doctor Who. Ko ētahi atu whanaketanga mō te pae ko te whakakapi i te paraka whakaari, te paraka wharekai me te papa motokā papa maha ki ngā whare noho hou me ngā whare taone. Ka whakakapia te Pourewa ki te Rāwhiti ki tētahi whare noho pūhihi ake, rerekē hoki. Ka āhua hoki te tonga o te pae i tētahi "kākāriki kāinga" o ngā whare taone mō ngā whānau whai māra tūmataiti o muri. I hangaia te Pokapū Pouaka Whakaata ki te wāhi o mua o te Whakaaturanga o Te Wānanga o te tau 1908, ā, i hoahoatia e ngā kaihoahoa o Norman rāua ko Dawbarn, e āhua ana he tohu pātai i te hanga. Pokapū Pouaka Whakaata Hononga Ipurangi Pātahi

title: O Te Tairāwhiti o Ivory Coast: Mai i te kaiwhakapori ki te rangatira
summary: Ko te arawhiti tōrangapū o Laurent Gbagbo tērā o tētahi kaiwhakahou manapori i noho hei kaiwhakahauhau.
text: Nā Phil ClarkLecturer, School of Oriental and African Studies He kaiako hītori i runga i te mahi, me te tākuta mai i tētahi whare wānanga o Parihi, he tino nui a Tēnā Gbagbo i roto i te tauwhiro o Ivory Coast ki te kāwanatanga ā iwi maha i ngā tau kotahi mano e waru tekau mā iwa rau. Heoi anō, i muri i tana rironga ko te perehitini i te tau 2000, ka whāngaia e ia ngā tikanga whakahē tōrangapū me te rāwekeweke i ngā take o te iwi me te whakapono kia mau tonu ai te mana. I tōna oho, ka mahue i a ia tētahi whenua wehe e whakawehi ana i te mauritanga o te rohe katoa. Mō te 33 tau, i whakahaeretia a Ivory Coast e tōna Perehitini mātāmua, a Felix Houphouet-Boigny, nāna te ngākau tōrangapū me ngā here tata ki te Uru i te tuatahi i mau mai ai te pūmautanga me te rangatiratanga ohaoha o te whenua. I te roanga o te wā, ka nui haere te manaakitanga o Tēnā Houphouet-Boigny, te hāmate, me te kore manakohia. Na te hekenga o nga utu koko i te mutunga o nga tau kotahi rau e waru rau e waru rau e waru tekau mā iwa rau, i puta ai te kore mahi nui me te whakangākau tōrangapū. I tēnei wā, ka tīmata a Tēnā Houphouet-Boigny ki te raweke i ngā take o ngā kāwanatanga noho tata, tae atu ki te tautoko i te kukitanga o te tau 1987 ki a Tōma Sankara, te perehitini o Burkina Faso. I hereheretia hei urupare, ka noho a Tēnā Gbagbo ko tētahi o ngā hoariri tino kaha o Tēnā Houphouet-Boigny, e karanga ana kia nui ake te whakatōpūtanga me te whakaraupapatanga o te rawa. I waenganui i te tau 1971 me te 1973, i hereheretia a Tēnā Gbagbo mō te "whakaakoranga hurihuri" me te "whakararuraru haumarutanga". I muri i tana ārahi i tētahi tuki kaiako ā iwi i te tau 1982, ka whakatūria e ia te ātete o Front Populaire Ivoirien (FPI) me te tono kia neke ki te pōti rōpū maha. I whakatārewatia e nga ope haumarutanga a Tēnā Houphouet-Boigny, ka haere manene a Tēnā Gbagbo ki Wīwī i taua tau kotahi, ka hoki mai i te tau 1988 ki te hīpae i te pēhanga mo te whakahou manapori. I te tau 1990, i tutuki i a Tēnā Gbagbo me te FPI te pana i a Tēnā Houphouet-Boigny ki te pōti ā iwi tuatahi o Ivory Coast mai i te rangatiratanga. Ahakoa i ngaro a Tēnā Gbagbo - te hoariri perehitini anake - i ngaro i te horo whenua i roto i te pōti nui, i toa a ia i tētahi tūru i roto i te Whakaminenga o te Motu, ā, ka haere tonu te pārekareka ki te huringa tōrangapū. Nā tēnei i kawe mai he takikupu tuarua ki a ia i te whare herehere i te tau 1992 - i tēnei wā i te ringa o te pirimia, o Alassane Ouattara, nāna i whakahaere tika te whenua i te hekenga o te hauora o Tēnā Houphouet-Boigny. Ko te hīkaka wera a Tēnā Gbagbo ki a Tēnā Ouattara mo ēnei tau o te hereheretanga e tāraro ana i te nuinga o te papā o nāianei i waenganui i nga kaiārahi e rua. Ko ngā mahi a Tēnā Ouattara i roto i taua wā e pātai ana hoki ki ōna taipitopito tuakiri manapori me tōna kaha ki te whakarite i te whakahaere pūmau i muri i te pōtitanga o te tau 2010. Ko nga tāwhiti o te hiko I te utu whaiaro nui, he kaitākaro tino nui a Tēnā Gbagbo i te whakatuwheratanga o te mokowā manapori o Ivory Coast. Heoi anō, ko te whakataetae tōrangapū i whakahauhautia e Tēnā Gbagbo, ka nui haere te whakawhanaunga me te taikaha i muri i te matenga o Tēnā Houphouet-Boigny i te tau 1993. Na nga huarahi tōrangapū hou me nga tāwhiti o te mana i puta mai he neke whakaharahara i roto i te ariā o Tēnā Gbagbo. I te tau 1999, i hopukina e Robert Guei te perehitini mā tētahi kukitanga, ā, i tere te pana i tētahi ture ā iwi e hiahia ana kia whānau ngā mātua o ngā kaitono perehitini i roto i Ivory Coast. I aukatia e tēnei ngā hoariri tōrangapū nui i te whakataetae i te pōti perehitini i te tau 2000, tae atu ki a Tēnā Ouattara, i whānau tōna pāpā i Burkina Faso, ā, he tino nui te tautoko tōrangapū i te raki o Ivory Coast. Na tēnei i mahue ai a Tēnā Gbagbo hei kaitono ātete whai hua anake. I runga i ngā whakarara tata ki te pōti tāhae o te tau 2010, i mōhiotia a Tēnā Gbagbo hei toa i te tau 2000, engari i whakamātau a Tēnā Guei ki te whakamahi i te ope taua ki te pupuri i te mana. Na te tautoko a ngā huānga i roto i te taua me ngā whakaaturanga tiriti nui, ka takahuria e Tēnā Gbagbo a Tēnā Guei, a, ka tāutatia hei perehitini. Pēnei i a Tēnā Guei i mua i a ia, mō te tekau tau e whai ake nei, ka rāwekeweke a Tēnā Gbagbo i ngā renarena i te iwi, i te tangata whenua me ngā mana whenua ki te whakawhāiti i tōna mana tōrangapū me te whakangāwari i ngā hoariri pērā i a Tēnā Ouattara. I te tau 2002, i te wā i hopukina ai e nga hōia whakakeke nga taone ki te raki o Korhogo me Bouake. I whakamahia e te kupu whakapuaki paitini a Tēnā Gbagbo te kaha nui ki te whakaheke i te tutukitanga, i ahu mai ki tētahi pakanga ā iwi kino i wehe ai a Ivory Coast kia rua, i waenganui i te raki me te tonga. I whakapae a Tēnā Gbagbo i "ngā tauhou", otirā ko Burkina Faso, mō te whakararuraru i te tutukitanga, ā, i whakamahia he kōrero paitini mō "Ivorians" me "manene". Mō ngā tau e waru e whai ake nei, ka pokanoatia e Tēnā Gbagbo ngā renarena i waenganui i ngā rōpū iwi paetata me ngā kaimahi kaiheke i roto i te umanga kōkō, e whakawātea ana i ngā kaiheke mai i Burkina Faso. E ono nga wā i whakaroatia ai te pōti perehitini i whakaritea mō te tau 2005 tae noa ki te wā ka whakaae a Tēnā Gbagbo ki a rātau i te tau 2010. I roto i te hanganga ki te pōti, ka whakaoho anō a Tēnā Gbagbo i ngā renarena huri noa i te iwi, a, ka whakapaea a Tēnā Ouattara ehara i te Ivorian, nō reira kāore e taea te oma hei perehitini. I runga i ēnei tūponotanga, i toa a Tēnā Ouattara i te pōti i mōhiotia i te ao whānui he wātea, he tika hoki. Kāore a Tēnā Gbagbo i whakaae ki te hua, e kī ana i te tinihanga kaipōti whānui i ngā taiwhanga ki te raki. I whakahaua e ia ana hōia kia pupuri i te mana o te whare kōti perehitini, te teihana pouaka whakaata kāwanatanga me te puni taua. Na ngā marama o ngā whakaritenga tūpāpaku i whakahaua ai a Tēnā Ouattara ki te rapu rongoā hōia, e ahu ana ki ngā whawhai i waenganui i ngā hōia a Tāne Ouattara me Tāne Gbagbo i nga tiriti o Abidjan. I te mutunga ka hopukina e Tēnā Gbagbo e ōna hoariri i muri i te whakapae roa i tōna pānga kāinga, mō te nuinga o ngā Ivoriana, kua warewaretia tana mahi hītori ki te whawhai ki te kāwanatanga ā iwi me te tuari tika o te rawa. He kaiako a Dr Phil Clark i roto i ngā tōrangapū whakatairite, ao whānui hoki i te Kura o Te Mātauranga o Te Rāwhiti me Awherika, Te Whare Wānanga o Rāwāhi, me te kaiwhakahaere o te Rangahau Tika Tauwhiro o Oxford

title: Ruben Bousquet: I mate te tama i muri i te tauhohenga mate ki te kānga pahū o Odeon
summary: I mate tētahi taitama 14 tau i muri i te pāngia o tētahi tauhohenga pāwera ki te kānga pahū i kainga e ia i tētahi whare pikitia, kua whakahaeretia e te koroni.
text: I te 18 o Āperira 2019, i te 18 o Āperira 2019, i te wā i mate ai a Ruben Bousquet i ōna mātua i Greenwich, ki te tonga ki te rāwhiti o Rānana. I "tino tairongo a ia ki ngā mate kai" tae atu ki te miraka kau, te hēki mata me te heka, ka rongo te uiuinga. I kī a Coroner Andrew Harris kua tāhaetia te kānga pahū ki te miraka, e whakaoho ana i te tauhohenga kino a Ruben. I te ahiahi ka mate a Ruben ka rere tōna whānau ki te kāinga ki te tiki i tana EpiPen, i mahue i a ia, engari kua tōmuri rawa rātou, ka rongo te uiuinga. I korerotia ki te Kōti o Southwark Coroner kua rite tonu te haere a Ruben ki te whare pikitia IMAX kotahi, ā, kua kai i te kānga pahū reka ōrite i mua. I kī a Tēnā Hāhi i rahua te kaiwhakarato kai o te whare pikitia, a Thomas Tucker Ltd, ki te mahi i ngā aromatawai mōrearea ina huri i ngā tauwāhi wheketere. I te marama o Mahuru 2019 ka haere te kamupene ki te whakahaere i muri i te whakarewatanga a te Food Standards Agency i tētahi matohi mate i te whakaaturanga i roto pea i ngā hua kānga pahū a te umanga. I "whakamutua" e Odeon tana kirimana ki a Thomas Tucker Ltd i taua marama kotahi, ka rongo te kōti. I roto i tana whakahaere, ka kī a Tēnā Hāhi kāore i taea e ia te mōhio mēnā i pā mai te tāhaetanga whakawhiti i roto i te tukanga whakanao, i te wharau hoko rānei i hokona ai. I kī te whaea o Ruben, a Judith Bousquet, i "matekiri" te whānau kāore i taea e te koroni te whakatau i te wā i tāhaetia ai te kānga pahū. 'Tūkino roro kāore e taea te whakaora' te kī a Tēnā Hāhi: "I kai a ia i ētahi kānga pahū reka i hokona mai i tētahi whare pikitia i Greenwich, ā, ka tīmata ki te rongoā. " I āia ia ki te kāinga kia uru ki tana rongoā ohorere mō te anaphylaxis, ā, ka pouri i te 15 meneti i muri i te whakapaunga, tata ki te toru meneti mai i te kāinga. "Kātahi ka hinga a Ruben, ā, e rua ngā werohanga adrenaline me te CPR tōtika." I mauria a Ruben ki te Hōhipera Tamariki o Evelina, ā, i kitea he "tūkino roro kāore e taea te whakaora". I hoatu e Tēnā Hāhi te take o te matenga o Ruben hei "anaphylaxis tāhapa ki te miraka kau i te tāhaetanga whakawhiti o te kānga pahū". I tāpiri mai a ia: "I hangaia te kānga pahū, ā, i wātea i te pūmua miraka, engari kua tāhaetia i tētahi wāhanga. " I raro a Ruben i te whakaaro kāore i te wātea i ngā pārekareka, ā, mehemea i pātai atu ia ki ngā kaimahi, koia hoki tā rātou i whakapono ai." I kī a Tēnā Hāhi ka whakatau mēnā ka whakaritea he pūrongo hei ārai i ngā mate ā muri ake i tēnei marama. I a ia e kōrero ana i muri i te whakahaere, ka kī a Mrs Bousquet: "Ki te kore e hoatu i ngā tapanga kai hei tohutohu mō te iwi whānui kia kōwhiria, te āhua nei ka whai hua ki mua i ngā kaihoko. " I roto a Ruben i taua taiapa 1% e pāngia ana - e tatari ana rātau ki tētahi atu mate hei whakarerekē?" I kī a Odeon: "Ko te kānga pahū i tonoa mai i to mātau kaiwhakarato, a Thomas Tucker Ltd, i whakapūtātia hei 'allergen-free'. " I te whakamōhiotanga mai ki a mātau i te Pipiri 2019 kua whakamātauria e ētahi tauira kānga pahū i takea mai i tēnei kaiwhakarato he pai mō ngā pūmua miraka, ka whakatuwheratia wawetia e mātou he tūhuratanga, ā, ka whakaurua ētahi atu tohutohu allergen ki ā mātou whare pikitia katoa. "E maia ana mātou ki ngā hātepe pakari kei a mātau e pā ana ki te haumarutanga kai me te whakaputa hua, ā, ka whakamahi ā mātou tīma i ngā tukanga tūpato hei pare i te kānga pahū me ērā atu hua katoa mai i te tāhaetanga whakawhiti i roto i ā mātou whare pikitia." Mō ētahi atu rongokōrero o Rānōna, whāia i Facebook, i Twitter, i Instagram me te ohauru ki tā mātou hongere YouTube.

title: Ka rere anō ngā waka tūroro rererangi me ngā waka pirihimana
summary: I muri i ngā māharahara mō ngā whāwhā i roto i ngā rau rotor kua whakaaetia kia rere anō.
text: I whakatārewatia ngā rerenga o ngā hepaoro Eurocopter EC 135 e 22 i te UK hei whakatūpatotanga e te kaiwhakahaere Bond Air Services. I whakaaetia rātau kia rere anō mai i te ata o te Wenerei. I kī te Waka Tūroro o Wales, i pāngia ōna kaimahi o Gwynedd me Swansea, kua hoatu te mārama katoa i te Tūrei. I whakatūria hoki tētahi tauira i tiria e ngā ope pirihimana o Gwent me South Wales. I kī nga Pirihimana o South Wales kua hoki mai te hepa ki te hau. I whakatārewatia ngā Eurocopter EC 135 e 22, tae atu ki ngā waka tūroro hau e 16 puta noa i te UK, hei whakatūpatotanga e te kaiwhakahaere Bond Air Services i muri i te kitenga o tētahi hē i roto i tētahi waka tūroro hau i Pākehā i tērā marama. I kitea he whāwhā i runga i te pokapū rotor matua, e akiaki ana i tētahi whakatūpato haumaru a te European Aviation Safety Agency (Easa). Heoi anō, i te Tūrei, i muri i ngā kōrero me te kaiwhakanao Eurocopter, ka kī a Bond ka taea te tīmata anō i te ata o te Wenerei. I kī te pānui haumaru a Bond i mua kua mahia he mahi i muri i te tukunga a Eurocopter i tētahi pānui haumaru i te ata Rātapu e whakahau ana i ngā tohutūmahi kia whakanui ake i te auautanga o ngā taki i te EC 135. Kaore a Eurocopter i whakahau i te taunga o te rererangi, engari i kī a Bond i whakahaua kia whakatauria taua whakataunga. I kī te Waka Tūroro o Uēra (WAA) i pāngia ōna kaimahi o Gwynedd me Swansea, ahakoa kāore i kitea he hēnga i roto i ōna EC 135 e rua i rīhitia. I kī tētahi kaikawe kōrero WAA: "Kua tīmata anō te ratonga pūnoa a Wales Air Ambulance mai i te 7am i tēnei ata i muri i te tohutohu mai i te kaiwhakahaere Bond Air Services. " Ko te whakataunga kia tīmata anō i tana ratonga katoa i tērā pō i muri i tētahi tūhuratanga mataiti ki tētahi take haumaru nāna i ārahi a Bond ki te whenua i ōna hepaoro EC135 katoa puta noa i te UK hei mehua whakatūpato." Ko te waka rererangi tuatoru o te aroha, he mīhini 20 tau te pakeke i Welshpool, Powys, i whakaroa i tōna rohe mahi ki te taupoki i te katoa o Weera, i te wā e taunga ana ētahi atu mahi. I kī a WAA kua rīhitia e ia e rua ngā waka tūroro hau EC 135 mai i Bond mai i te tau 2009, ā, he pūkete haumaru tauira tā te tauira. Neke atu i te 16,000 ngā mahi i mahia e te ratonga mai i tōna whakarewatanga i te Rā o Hato Rawiri 2001, ā, tata ki te £1,500 te utu o ia mahi. E kī ana he utu te ratonga e £6m ia tau hei whakahaere.

title: Ka hopukina e ngā Kōpia te waka ruku rongoā Farc e $2m
summary: Kua hopukina e nga pirihimana ārai rongoā o Kōpia tētahi waka ruku i hangaia hei maunu i te kokaine - ko te tuarua o aua kitenga i roto i ngā rā e rua.
text: I kī ngā pirihimana ka noho te waka ruku, tata ki te $2m (£1.2m), ka noho i raro i te wai tae atu ki te 10 rā. I kī rātau ka taea e tētahi kaimahi tae atu ki te rima tāngata te haere mai i Koropia ki Amerika Waenganui, ā, ka hoki mai me te kore kitea. I kitea te oko i tētahi wāhi ngahere i te takiwā o Choco ki te uru i muri i te whiwhinga o nga pirihimana i tētahi aki mai i tētahi kaiwhakamōhio. Me haere ngā āpiha mā runga hepa ki te wāhi ngahere kōpaka e tata ana ki te takutai o Te Moana-nui-a-Kiwa. I kī atu te Tuarua Upoko Tuarua o ngā Pirihimana Ārai Rongoā, a Kānata Enrique Rodriguez Gonzalez ki te AO he nui ake te hōhonu o ngā mea i kitea e ana tāngata i reira. "Ka taea e te waka ruku te haere tae atu ki te 5m (16.5ft) i raro iho i te wai, ā, ka noho ki raro i te wai tae atu ki te 10 rā, kia taea ai te kawe i ngā rongoā ki Amerika Waenganui, ā, ka hoki whakamuri me te kore kitea," tana kī. I kī a ia ahakoa kāore i te nui te utu o te waka ruku ki te hanga, ko ngā whakawhitiwhitinga mātauranga me ngā taputapu whakaterenga me ngā hihiani i runga i te papa, ka wāriu huri noa i te $2m. Ko te oko, i hunaia ki roto i tētahi whare rākau, e 12.2m te roa, e 3.4m te whānui, e 5m te roa, ā, he mea hanga ki te tīra whakapakari, ā, ka hipokina ki te muka karaihe. I peitatia te ingoa Perla Negra (Peara Pango) i tōna taha. I kī a Col Rodriguez nā te rōpū whakakeke parirau mauī nui rawa o Koropia, te Farc, e pūtea ana i a rātau anō mā te hokohoko rongoā. I kī a ia kua whakaaturia e ngā tūhuratanga pirihimana i hangaia i runga i ngā whakahau a Jorge Neftali Umenza Velasco, e mōhiotia ana hoki ko Mincho, e whakapaea ana ki te ārahi i te 30 o mua o te Farc. Ko te tuki tuarua tērā a nga pirihimana ārai rongoā ki nga hanganga hokohoko rongoā a Farc i roto i nga rā maha. I te Hātarei, ka hopukina e rātau tētahi oko haurua e āhei ana ki te kawe tae atu ki te 10 tāhei hīka. I kī a Col Rodriguez he iti iho te waka ruku i kitea i Choco, ā, e whā anake ngā tāna rongoā. Engari nā tōna pūnaha whakaora hōhonu i taea ai e tētahi kaimahi tae atu ki te rima tāngata te noho i raro i te wai mō te neke atu i te wiki, he tino uaua ki te kite.

title: Ko ngā pūtau roro o te mate Parkinson iranga i hangaia i roto i te taiwhanga
summary: Kua tutuki pai te hanga a ngā kaipūtaiao i te US i ngā pūtau roro tangata i roto i te taiwhanga, he tārua tūturu o te mate o Parkinson.
text: Nā te kaipānui o Mīharo RobertsHealth, Ko te tikanga o te hua ka taea e rātou ināianei te kite i te āhua o ngā irakētanga i roto i te ira parkin i te mate i roto i te kotahi i roto i te 10 ngā tūroro o Parkinson. Ā, ka tukuna e ia he tauira tūturu hei whakamātau i ngā rongoā hōu - he taiapa kua tūkinotia ngā mahi rangahau tae noa mai ki tēnei wā. I kī atu te tīma ki a Nature Communications he "pūhuri kēmu" ta rātau mahi. "Ko te wā tuatahi tēnei i hangaia ai ngā neurons dopamine tangata mai i ngā tūroro mate o Parkinson me ngā irakētanga parkin," te kī a Dr Jian Feng nāna i ārahi ngā tūhuratanga. "I mua i tēnei, kāore mātou i whakaaro ki te ako i te mate i roto i ngā neurons tangata. " Kua tino whakaurua te roro. E kore e taea te tiki i ngā neurons tangata ora hei ako." He tino nui te ako i ngā neurons tangata i roto i te mate Parkinson i te mea kāore ngā tauira kararehe kāore i te ira parkin e whakawhanake ana i te āhuatanga, e kore ai e whai take mō tēnei take rangahau. Hei hanga i ngā neurons tangata, ka whakamahia e ngā kaipūtaiao tētahi tikanga kua whakamātauria kētia e ētahi atu, e āhei ana ki te huri i ngā pūtau kiri i homai hei kikokiko roro. I whakamahia e rātau he tauira kiri mai i ngā tūroro tokowhā - e rua ngā tāngata hauora, tokorua me te mate Parkinson i takea mai i te irakētanga ira parkin. Nā tēnei i āhei ai rātau ki te mātakitaki i te ira parkin i te mahi. Ko te tikanga, ka whakahaere te parkin i te whakanaotanga o tētahi whākōkī e kiia nei ko MAO (monamine oxidase) ā, ka taki tonu i te dopamine matū tohu roro. Ina whakangūtia te parkin, ka ngaro taua ture, ā, ka nui ake ngā taumata MAO, tērā pea ka paitini ki ngā pūtau roro e whakaputa ana i te dopamine. Ināianei e hiahia ana ngā kaipūtaiao ki te whakamātau i ngā rongoā hou e ārai ai i tēnei tūkinotanga me te aukati i tēnei momo Parkinson. Kua whakaaturia kētia e rātau ka taea e rātau te whakahoki i te hēnga mā te hoatu i tētahi ira parkin pūnoa ki roto i ngā neurons mate. I kī a Dr Mīharo Gardner, te kaiwhakahaere whanaketanga rangahau i Parkinson's UK, he tino mīharo te akoranga nā te mea i homai he huarahi hōu ki te tūhura i tēnei momo iranga o Parkinson. "Kua whakaaturia kētia e te rangahau pūtea a Parkinson UK he mahi matua tā parkin i te āhua o te tipu o Parkinson i roto i ngā pūtau io roro e mate ana."

title: £700m whakarei hanganga mō ngā mahi tāone me te pūtea Inclusive Future
summary: Kua pānuitia he £700m anō o te pūtea hou mō ngā kaupapa hanganga, whakatupuranga anō, me ngā kaupapa tāpoi
text: Me whakaōrite e te kaiwhakahaere te pūtea £562m mō ngā mahi taone nui me te tupu puta noa i Aiarangi ki te Raki me te £55m mō te Pūtea Whānui ā muri ake. Me whakarato hoki ki tētahi atu £100m mō ngā kaupapa whakahāngai. "He mea nui tēnei, ā, he pānui tino pai tēnei mō te katoa o Aiarangi ki te Raki," te kī a te Minita Tuatahi a Arlene Foster. I kī a ia ka "whakaaetia e te pūtea te awhe o ngā tono kia haere tonu ki te raki ki te hauauru kua mahia, e ai ki ngā whakaaetanga kēhi pakihi". Ko te pūtea ōrite mō te taone me ngā mahi tupu e haere tahi ana me te pūtea a te Kāwanatanga o UK i pānuitia i Me 2019, ā, ka kawea mai te pūtea penapena katoa ki te £1.2bn. He aha te mahi a te taone? City deal status gives local areas specific powers to help support economic growth and job creation. He whakaaetanga i waenganui i te kāwanatanga me te taone. Ka hoatu e ia ki te taone me tōna rohe karapoti ētahi mana me te wāteatanga ki: Ko te mōkī e whakarato ana i te £700m neke atu rānei mō te rohe o Belfast (tae atu ki Antrim me Newtownabbey, Ards me North Down, Lisburn me Castlereagh, Mid and East Antrim me Newry, Mourne and Down council areas), £252m mō te waenganui, ki te tonga me te uru, £210m mō Derry City me Strabane me te £72m mō Causeway Coast me Glens. I kii te Minita Moni a Conor Murphy ahakoa te mate uruta coroanvirus, me whakarite te kaiwhakahaere mo te wa roa. Ka kī a ia: "Ko tēnei pūtea penapena neke atu i te £700m e whakarato ana i te pūtea penapena i ngā wāhi paetata me ngā mahi e hiahiatia ana, ā, ka tuku tūmanako mō te wā heke." I kī a Glyn Roberts o Retail NI ko te pūtea "he pānui tino maioha e mahi ana i tētahi hipanga nui ki tētahi mahere whakaora ohaoha o muri i te Covid-19 mō tā mātou ōhanga ā-rohe". I tāpiri mai a ia: "Me whārite ā-rohe ngā mahere whakaora mō Aiarangi ki te Raki kia tino manakē ai te pūtea penapena i roto i ngā hanganga o o tātau taone me ngā kāinga ā-taiwhenua i te taha o te whakatupuranga anō o Perehi me Derry."

title: Whakatūpato a New York mo te pōti fracking o te Kaunihera o Te Takiwā o Te Takiwā o Te Rohe
summary: Kua tuhituhi tētahi rōpū taiao o Amerika ki te Kaunihera o te Takiwā o Te Rohe o Te Rūnanga o Te Rohe o Te Rohe o Te Rūna
text: Ko te reta, mō ngā mana pōti e 850 i te Kāwanatanga o New York, ka tae mai i ngā rā i mua i te whakatau a te kaunihera mēnā ka whakaaetia te keri whakamātautau i ngā tauwāhi e rua. I whakakorea e nga kaipānui o te kāwanatanga o New York te tukanga i a Hakihea. I kī a Cuadrilla, te umanga pūngao i muri i te wiri kua marohitia, kāore he mōhiotanga o te rōpū US ki taua kēhi. I roto i tētahi kōrero, ka kī tētahi kōrero mō te umanga pūngao: "Kāore ēnei mana o te Kāwanatanga o Niu Ioka e mōhio ana ki ngā taupānga a Cuadrilla, ki ngā mana ture rānei i te UK, ā, kaua e whakararuraru i te tukanga manapori me ngā whakataunga ka mahia e ngā māngai pōti o te iwi o Nekehire." Ka puta mai te reta i muri i te āpiha whakarite matua o Te Rāhina i tūtohu kia tukuna he raihana mō te keri i tētahi o ngā pae e rua. Ka tīmata te kaunihera o te rohe i ngā rā e whā o te taupatupatu i te Tūrei ki te kōrerorero i tētahi tono a Cuadrilla ki te tango i te korohū kōhatu i Little Plumpton me Roseacre Wood. E tūtohu ana ngā āpiha whakarite i te whakaaetanga mō te tono mō te whakamātautau i Little Plumpton, engari he whakakore mō Roseacre Wood. Kua tuhituhi ngā Mana Pōti 'paruparu me te mōrearea' ki te Tiaki i Niu Ioka - i hangaia e ngā kaipōrangapū o nāianei, o mua hoki - ki ngā kaikaunihera o Te Kāwanatanga o Te Kāwanatanga o New York. I kī a Martha Robertson, te Kaiwhakatika o te Takiwā o Tompkins: "I muri i te ako i ngā pānga hauora tūmatanui o te fracking mō ngā tau, ka mārama te Komihana Hauora o te Kāwanatanga o New York, a Dr Zucker, e kore ia e tuku i tōna whānau kia noho i roto i tētahi hapori me te fracking. " Ka taea te tū atu ki tēnei umanga paruparu, mōrearea hoki me te whakarite i te haumarutanga o ngā tangata." I whakakāhoretia e te reta te kēhi o te umanga fracking ka mauria mai he mahi me te rangatiratanga. I tāpiritia: "E tohutohu ana mātou i a koe kia mahi i ēnei kerēme i runga i te pōhēhētanga hōhonu. Ko te wheako i roto i a Mātau he hē, he tino nui rawa ēnei kerēme." Ko te fracking - te whati wai rānei - he tikanga e mahia ai te wai me ngā matū ki roto i te toka kōhatu i te pēhanga tiketike hei tango korohū.

title: Coronavirus: Cornwall locals 'too scared' to go shopping
summary: Kua kī ngā kainoho i ngā taunga rongonui he "mataku rawa" rātau ki te haere ki te hoko kai nā ngā manuhiri e ringihia ana i ngā tiriti whāiti me te waiho i te tawhiti pāpori.
text: Nā Amy GladwellBBC News I runga i te pāpāho pāpori kua whakaahuatia e ngā tangata whenua ētahi o ngā taunga o Cornish he "pōrangi pūmau," me te "Benidorm i runga i ngā steroids". Street marshals have been patrolling hotspots giving social distancing tips. Ka tohutohu a Visit Cornwall i ngā tāngata kia whakamahere i mua me te huri i ngā mahere mēnā kei te arokē ngā taunga. I kī te tangata o Hato Ives, a Claire Harris, e 37, he "mataku rawa tōna whānau ki te haere ki te hokohoko kai". I kī atu a ia ki te AO kua rāhuitia e ia ana tamariki i te tiriti hokohoko matua me te whanga i mua nā te huihuinga, a, i kī ko tēnei "te whakaaro whānui i waenganui i ngā hoa". I kī a Jonathan Pitts, pēnei i a Ms Harris e whakahaere ana i ngā hararei: "Pouri ki taku whakaaro he maha [ngā tūruhi] he ōrite te āhua - kua haere mai rātou ki te mawhiti [Covid-19]." I kī a Taketake Mā, mai i Newyln: "Ka tino māharahara ahau ki te haere tahi me aku tamariki tamariki tokorua. Kua pōturi nga papa kohatu. "He pouri ki ngā tangata whenua te kore e āhei ki te hākinakina ki te wāhi e noho ana rātau." He tokomaha nga tangata o Perranporth i kī i peia rātau i nga toa māmā o te taone, ko ētahi o ēnei i āwangawanga i ngā rōpū kaihoko. Kotahi te wahine i roto i tōna 60 tau e hiahia ana kia mōhiotia ko Linda anake, i kī atu ki te BBC kua amuamu a ia ki te tari matua o tētahi o ngā pātaka. I kī ngā kaimahi i runga i te rōpū Hapori Perranzabuloe o Facebook ka anga atu rātau ki te nui o te tūkinotanga mai i ngā kiritaki mō te ngana ki te ū ki ngā mehua e penapenatia ana. I kī a Royden Paynter, te rangatira whanga i Mousehole: "Ohorere ana kua pā mai mātau ki te rara. " He āhua āwangawanga kē atu te katoa i tēnei tau - kaore rātau e neke atu i tō ara". Engari i kī a Adrienne Munday, he rangatira pakihi iti i reira, kua "whakaari" ngā āwangawanga Covid-19 i roto i te pāpāho, ā, ko te nuinga o ngā tāngata i hari ki te pōhiri mai i te "buzz raumati". An extra £500,000 was given to Devon and Cornwall Police by the local Police and Crime Commissioner Alison Hernandez in July to help communities manage the pandemic this summer, enabling the introduction of street marshals. E 20 ngā kēhi coronavirus i whakaūngia i Cornwall i te wiki tae atu ki te 26 o Hōngongoi, he pikinga 14 mai i te wiki o mua. I kī tētahi kaikawe kōrero o te Kaunihera o Cornwall: "Hei āwhina ki te ārahi i ngā tāngata i ngā pūtahi o te taone me te taone kua tohua e mātou ngā ara hīkoi 'kia tika tonu' me te whakatakoto waitohu, ā, he kaitiaki tiriti kei te ringa ki te tuku tohutohu. " Ka haere tonu te Kaunihera o Cornwall ki te aroturuki i ngā pae paheke me te whakarato tohu me ngā marshals e āwhina ai rātou, engari e tono ana mātou ki te katoa kia whakaaro ki ētahi atu me te whai i ngā tohutohu hauora tūmatanui hei āwhina ki te whakaiti i te mōrea o te tarenga." I kī a Malcolm Bell mai i Visit Cornwall: "Te āhua nei he pākaha ake i tētahi atu wā, engari kei raro tonu mātou i ngā taumata taumata pūnoa". I tohutohu a ia i ngā tāngata kia "whakamahere i mua, kia rite hoki ki te huri i ō mahere ina uaua te tawhiti pāpori i te rōrahi o te tangata".

title: Inverclyde Council praised for young people's care services
summary: Kua noho tētahi mana ā-rohe hei tuatahi i Pākehā ki te whiwhi whakatauranga "tino pai" mō ana tamariki me ngā ratonga rangatahi.
text: I kī te Kaitirotiro Tiaki i a Inverclyde e "ārahi ana i te huarahi" i tōna whakauru atu ki ngā tamariki me ngā whānau i roto i te hoahoa ratonga me te tukunga. I tirohia te mana i Me me Pipiri 2017. I kī ngā kaitirotiro i titiro rātau ki te pai o te mahi tahi a ngā ratonga kia "pai ai te rerekētanga". I whiwhi hoki a Inverclyde i ngā whakatauranga o te "tino pai" me te "pai" i muri i te arotakenga tōtahi i kawea ki Education Scotland, Healthcare Improvement Scotland me Her Majesty's Inspectorate of Constabulary for Scotland. Ko te āhua o te aromatawai me te urupare a ngā kaimahi ki ngā mōrearea me ngā hiahia o te rangatahi i kitea he "tika", me ētahi tūtohutanga i mahia. The inspection focused on work carried out by the Inverclyde Alliance, the community planning partnership chaired by Inverclyde Council leader Stephen McCabe. Best start Mr McCabe said: "Children and young people in Inverclyde get a voice and are listened to. Our approach recognises this and values the input they have in shaping and improving service delivery. "E whakapono ana mātou ko tēnei huarahi e ārahi ana i te wāhanga, ā, kua miramiratia tēnā e te whakatauranga 'tino pai' mai i ngā kaitirotiro." I kī a Karen Reid, te rangatira nui o te Kaitirotiro Tiaki, i "tauira" a Inverclyde i tētahi huarahi i hangaia hei hoatu i ngā tamariki te tīmatanga tino pai i roto i te ora. "Ahakoa kua kitea e mātou ētahi wāhi ka pai ake, otirā i te ōritetanga o te aromatawai mōrearea tuatahi hei urupare ki ngā tamariki e pā ana ki te waihotanga, e mōhio ana mātou kua mahia kētia he mahi hei whakatau i tēnei," tana kī. "We have a high level of confidence that the current momentum in delivering improvement and change in the lives of children, young people and their families will be sustained."

title: Kua tautuhia ngā kaipupuri o Āporo ki te pōti i ngā kaupapahere motika tangata
summary: Kua tautuhia ngā kaipupuri o Āporo ki te pōti mēnā me huri e Āporo ana kaupapahere motika tangata.
text: Na Sam SheadTechnology reporter Ka pātaitia rātau mēnā e hiahia ana rātau kia tukua e Āporo kia manaaki i te wāteatanga o te kōrero. I tangohia e Āporo tētahi taupānga whakamahere i te wā o ngā whakahēnga o Hong Kong, i ahu mai ki te whakahē i a ia ki Beijing. I karangatia e te rōpū whakahau SumofUs ki a Apple kia whakaatu i ētahi kaupapahere motika tangata i roto i tētahi taumira i kōnaetia i te 9 o Mahuru. I whakakāhoretia e te US Securities and Exchange Commission te tono a Apple ki te ārai i te taumira i tēnei marama. Mēnā ka pōti ngā kaipupuri i te mōtini, tērā pea me whakamārama e Āporo ana urupare ki ngā tono ā muri ake mai i ngā kāwanatanga e whakawhāiti ana i te kōrero koreutu. Me whakaatu hoki e Āporo he pēhea te hanga kaupapahere mō ēnei take. "Ko te tikanga o te mōtini me whai kaupapahere a Āporo i te kīanga koreutu, ā, ka wātea ēnei ki ngā kaipupuri," te kī a Sondhya Pakā, tētahi kaiwhakahaere whakahau i SumOfUs, ki te HAU. "Me pūrongo te kamupene mō ngā kaupapahere me ngā whakataunga kua mahia e ia e taka ana ki raro i a rātou. " Hei whakaharatau, ko te tikanga me neke a Āporo ki tētahi tūnga whakaaro mēnā ka taea e tētahi whakataunga, he mahi rānei te whakawhāiti i te kīanga koreutu me te whakamārama i aua whakataunga, kaua e whakatau me te mātaki i ōna pānga i muri i te mea." Kāore anō a Āporo kia kōrero. He raruraru te ānini HKmap a Apple Hong Kong mō Apple, me te kaihanga iPhone e uaua ana ki te whakangāwari i a Beijing me te rohe whakahaere motuhake i roto i Haina. I Whiringahora, ka wehe atu a Āporo i te Pātaka Taupānga i tētahi taupānga pūtake huihuinga e kiia nei ko HKmap Live e aroturuki ana i te tauwāhi o ngā kaiwhakahaere kāwanatanga me ngā pirihimana. I tirohia e ētahi te taupānga tauwāhi hei huarahi kia noho haumaru ai ngā kaiwhakahaere, ā, ko ētahi i kite he huarahi ki te karo i ngā pirihimana. I kī a Āporo i te taupānga "i whakangāwari, i whakahohea, i whakahauhau rānei" i ngā ngohe kāore i te ture. Heoi anō, kei te wātea tonu te taupānga i te pātaka taupānga a Google. Kore rawa a Āporo i whakaatu mēnā i puta mai te ārai i muri i te tono a nga mana Hainamana. E tautohe ana a SumofUs nā ngā mahi a Apple i hua ai te whakatoi i ētahi iwi. "Mā te whakaū i te kāwanatanga o te kāwanatanga o Haina, kei te āwhina a Āporo i te tāmitanga kino o ngā Uighurs, ngā Tīpetiana me ētahi atu kaiwhaiwhai motika," te kī a Ms Pakā. "Mā tā mātou mōtini e whakahau a Āporo kia tū haepapa mō te pānga o ana whakataunga ki te oranga o te hunga harakore." I kī ngā kaitirotiro mai i te kaihoko hea tuihono o AJ Bell: "Kāore ngā kaipupuri moni e pōti ki ngā nekeneke pēnei, i te nuinga o te wā nā te nuinga o ngā pōti mai i ngā kaiwhakangao ā-iwi e nui ake ana te āheitanga ki te whakahaere, nō reira ka nui ake te mahi ki aua pātai i muri i ngā tatau kati." I te wā o Me, ka pōti ngā kaipupuri o Amazon i ngā tono hei tapahi i ngā hokonga o te utauta āhukahuka kanohi tautohetohe a te kamupene me te whakaiti i tana huaputa waro.

title: Ka haere te haupae ariki pūoro o TE AO Welsh me EOS ki te rūnanga
summary: Kua tautohetohe ngā kaiwhakatangitangi reo Welsh me te AO mō te taumata utu ariki i tētahi rūnanga manatārua.
text: I tapahia e Radio Cymru ōna haora, ā, ka whakakapia te pahū ki ngā waiata me ngā pūoro puāwaitanga i muri i te ngaronga o te mana ki te whakatangi i ngā waiata neke atu i te 30,000 mai i te Rā o te Tau Hōu. I whakaaetia e te rōpū kaiwhakatangitangi EOS he whakatārewatanga rangitahi i te wā o Hui tanguru, engari e hiahia ana kia tata te takitoru o ngā utu takiwā. Ka whakatauria e te whakarongo te utu raihana takiwā e utua ana e te AO ki EOS kia oti rā anō te whakatau i te kēhi. E tohu ana a EOS i ngā kaiwhakatangitangi 300 i wehe atu i te Performing Right Society (PRS) i runga i ngā utunga, e kī ana he iti iho te utu o ngā kaiwhakatangitangi reo Welsh i ō rātou hoa reo Ingarihi. I unuhia e rātau te whakaaetanga mai i te AO ki te whakatangi i a rātau pūoro i te Rā o te Tau Hōu, engari e ono wiki i muri iho ka whakaritea he whakaaetanga takiwā e āhei ai a Radio Cymru ki te tīmata anō i tana hōtaka pūnoa. 'Te nui o te nui' I kī atu te AO ki te rūnanga i te Rāhina e utu ana i tētahi raihana wā poto o te £120,000 ia tau ki te pāoho i ngā waiata e whakahaeretia ana e te kōwhiringa kohinga, £10,000 rānei ia marama. I kī te rōia o Te Rūnanga o Aotearoa, e tohu ana i te HAU, he "tino mārama te nui o te nuinga" ā, neke atu i te whiwhinga o ngā mema EOS i raro i te whakaaetanga PRS. I tāpiritia e ia e whakapono ana te AO ki tētahi raihana nui kia uru ki te repertoire EOS kia "kaua e neke atu i te £100,000". I kī a Ms Lane kua korerotia ki te AO e hiahia ana a EOS kia nui ake te utu wā ki te £325,000 ia tau, ā, ko te whakataunga whakamutunga kia £1.5m ia tau. I whakaūngia e Tom Weisselberg, te rōia e tohu ana i a EOS, e hiahia ana te rōpū kia piki ake te utu takiwā ki te £325,000 ia tau. Ko te rima o te tapeke - tata ki te £70,000 - ka utua nga utu mo te haere ki te rūnanga me te whakahaere i te kōwhiringa kohinga. I kī a ia kāore i te nui te £50,000 kua hoatu kētia e te HAU. "Ehara i te mea whakanuia te kī kei te raruraru te umanga pūoro reo Welsh," te kī a Tēnā Weisselberg. I kī a ia e whakaputa ana ngā mema EOS i tētahi hua ā-rohe, ā, e tika ana kia utua e te AO mō te whakamahi i taua hua. I mutu te whakarongo i te ahiahi o te Mane me te whakahaere i tētahi utu raihana takiwā e tūmanakohia ana i ngā rā torutoru nei.

title: Ka nui ake te takaware o te tereina i ngā raruraru tohu o Birmingham New Street
summary: He maha ngā ratonga tereina kua pāngia mō te rā tuarua mā te tohu i ngā raruraru i Birmingham New Street.
text: I pūrongotia e London Midland kua whakatārewatia ētahi ratonga paetata, ā, ko ētahi e anga ana ki ngā takaware tae atu ki te 30 meneti. I mua rā ka whakaurua ngā pahi whakakapi i waenganui i Longbridge me Redditch me Four Oaks me Lichfield Trent Valley. Ināianei kei te rere anō ngā tereina. I kī a Network Rail kua whakatikaina e ngā kaipūkaha ngā raruraru kia rere noa ai ngā tereina puta noa i taua rohe. I kī a London Midland kua āraia e ngā raruraru tohu tōmua tōna urunga tereina ki neke atu i te 50% o te teihana o New Street nā rātou i whakakore ai i ngā ratonga ki Hereford me Worcester. I tonoa kētia e ia ngā pāhihi kia whakamahi kē i ngā raina Maunga Hukarere. Ko ngā tereina e rere ana i runga i ngā ara maha i roto, huri noa i te takiwā o Birmingham i takawaretia tae atu ki te haora i te Wenerei nā ngā raruraru tohu.

title: Ka kōrerorerotia e Rawiri Beckham te mahere hiakai ā-ao ki te PM
summary: Kua tūtaki a Rawiri Beckham ki te Pirimia o Rawiri, ki te tohe i te UK kia noho tonu te hiakai tamariki hei manakē ā-ao.
text: Ka hoatu e te kaiwhutupōro o Ingarangi me te karere o Hēpa he reta ki a Tēnā, e karanga ana ki a ia kia ārahi i te huarahi. Me taurima te UK i tētahi "tihi hiakai" i te rā whakamutunga o te Omirangi, e tūmanako ana ki te whakamahi i te takahanga tākaro huri noa hei whakakōkī mo te kauneketanga o te take. E karanga ana te reta ki te UK kia "piki ake i te tere" ina riro i a ia te ārahitanga o te rōpū iwi G8 i te tau 2013. I kī a Tēnā Karauna he "tūranga tino pai ki te tākaro" a Ingarangi. E hiahia ana te UK ki tētahi whāinga hou ki te whakapai ake i te kai me te āwhina i ngā tamariki i ngā whenua e tipu ana ki te whakatutuki i tō rātou kaha hei tētahi o ngā tawhito tūturu o ngā Kēmu 2012. E 170 miriona ngā tamariki i ētahi o ngā whenua rawakore o te ao e pāngia ana e te hiakai mo te wā roa. I te wā o ta rātau hui i Te Tiriti o Te Tiriti, ka hoatu e Tēnā Beckham ki te pirimia he reta i hainatia e ngā whetū hākinakina me ngā whetū pikitia e 50, e whakahau ana i a ia kia "piki ake i te tere" i runga i te take me te pupuri i te hiakai tamariki i runga i te rārangi take o te ao whānui. Kāore he 10 i kī he "manawa tiritiri" tā ngā tāngata tokorua ki te mahi i ngā mea katoa e taea ana e rāua ki te arotahi i te aro atu me ngā rauemi a te iwi ao whānui ki taua take. E hiahia ana a Tēnā Karauna ki te whakamahi i te wā o te Omirangi ki te arotahi i ngā hinengaro ki te raruraru me te hiahia kia pai ake te tīmatanga o ngā tamariki e hia miriona i roto i te ora. E pāngia ana te oranga o ngā tamariki e hia miriona i te pakeketanga o te mate kai, he āhuatanga e mōhiotia ana ko te pōauau e aukati ana i tō rātou tupunga, ngā kaha ā-tinana me te kaha ki te ako. Kāore te hunga pāngia e pai te mahi i te kura, ā, ka iti iho te whiwhinga. E kī ana ngā kaiwhakahauhau mā te uru atu i ngā rā tuatahi e 1,000 mai i te tīmatanga o te hapu ki te rongoā me te ārai i te hapa huaora ka āraia te tūkino pūmau. Ka huihuia e te huihuinga o tērā marama ngā kaiārahi o te ao, ngā whika umanga, ngā rōpū kāwanatanga-kore me ngā kaiwhakahauhau whanaketanga ki te whakaputa i te āwhina whakahōu me te hiahia tōrangapū i muri i te whiu i te mate kai i Āwherika me ētahi atu rōpū o te ao. Kāore he 10 i kī ka whakaarohia ngā whakaaro hōu hei āwhina i ngā tāngata me ngā whenua ki te āwhina i a rātou anō, mā ngā mahi hou hangarau me ngā nekehanga pūtaiao, mā te pūataata me te haepapa pai ake. Engari e kī ana a Hēpa me tautuhi e ngā kaiārahi tētahi ūnga nui o te ao hei whakaiti i te tūponotanga, ā, me whakawātea whānui ake ngā umanga i ngā kai whai kiko ki te hunga mōrearea rawa.

title: Ko te whakamaharatanga o te Holocaust o Westminster he 'pae tohu' mō ngā kaiwhakataetae
summary: Mā ngā mahere mō tētahi whakamaharatanga Whakamaharatanga i te taha o te Pāremata e waihanga i tētahi "pae tohu" mō ngā kaiwhakataetae, kua whakatūpato te kaiarotake takitahi o mua o ngā ture whakamataku.
text: Kua marohitia te whakamaharatanga mō Ngā Māra Pourewa o Wikitōria i Millbank. Engari kua korerotia e Te Ariki Kāriki he uiui whakarite he "mōrea pūtōraru mārama". The Ministry for Housing, Communities and Local Government (MHCLG) said it was confident the site would be secure. I whakakāhoretia te kaupapa e te Kaunihera Taone o Westminster, engari ko te whakataunga whakamutunga ka mahia e te kāwanatanga i muri i te uiuinga tūmatanui. However, the plans have significant support from more than 170 MPs and peers, including Housing and Communities Secretary Robert Jenrick. A, i tērā wiki, ka kī atu te kaiārahi Mahi a Tā Keir Starmer ki te Hurai Chronicle he "tino nui" te whakamaharatanga kia taea ai te whakaako i ngā whakatupuranga ā muri ake mō te Whakanui. I tīmata tētahi uiui whakarite tuihono ki ngā mahere i te Tūrei. I roto i ana whakaaturanga tuhituhi ki te uiui, ka kī a Ariki Kāri: "Mai i taku wheako whānui ki te mātakitaki, ki te tātari me te kōrerorero i ngā take pūtōraru ki ngā tohunga o mua, kāore au i te pōhēhē ka whakaarahia e te pae kua marohitia he mōrea mōrearea - tino mārama. " Ka hoatu e au tēnei whakatūpato i runga i te pouri, engari i runga i te tino pono. He tuma tēnei ki te iwi whānui, ā, he tuma tūpono hoki ki te Pāremata." E 23 ngā hanganga taratara parahi nui me tētahi pokapū ako i raro i te kaupapa. I pānuitia i te tau 2016 e te Pirimia o Rawiri, nāna i kī ka whakatapua ki ngā tāngata Hurai e ono miriona, ngā wāhine me ngā tamariki me ētahi atu tūpāpaku i patua e ngā Hūra.
