Heoi anō, he tokomaha nga whika Hurai matua kua whakapuaki i to rātau ātete ki te tauwāhi o te whakamaharatanga, i te mea ka kī ngā Pāka Ariki ka whai "pānga kino nui" ki taua rohe. I kī a Ariki Kānata QC he whaiaro te take ki a ia. "He tino hiahia ahau ki tēnei," tana kī atu ki te HAU. "He tokomaha ōku whanaunga tata i whakangaromia i roto i te Holocaust. I patua te whaea o taku tuahine hawhe i Auschwitz. "E tino whakaaro ana ahau kia maumaharatia tikatia tēnei. E mōhio ana ahau ehara tēnei i te wāhi tika mōna." I tāpiri mai a ia: "E mōhio ana ahau - e whakapono ana ahau e mōhio ana te katoa - he ūnga pūkoro ngā Whare Pāremata mō ngā pūtūtū. " He paparinga tēnei pae ki nga Whare Pāremata. "Ko tēnei pae hoki, tērā pea, he ūnga mō ngā pūhāhā parirau matau. Te āhua nei he wairangi te noho o ēnei wāhi tawhito e rua i runga i te pae whānui kotahi." I tāpiri mai a ia: "Ko te nuinga o te wā e hiahia ana ngā kaiwhakataetae o te ao whānui ki te tārewa. Te āhua nei kei te inoi raruraru ahau i tētahi pae e whakakotahi ana i ngā Whare Pāremata me te whakamaharatanga hou o te Holocaust o Ingarangi." I kī tētahi kaikōrero mō te MHCLG: "Kei te mōhio katoa mātou ki ngā take haumarutanga e pā ana ki tēnei pae, ā, kua tohutohutia mātou mō ngā mehua hei whakamauru i ngā mōrea. " Ka tū te whakamaharatanga hei whakamaumahara ki te katoa i te pāremata, me te iwi katoa, ki ta tātau kawenga kia mataara tonu ki te tohetohe me te whakahāwea." I tua atu i ngā āwangawanga haumarutanga a Ariki Kānata, ka whakaarahia e tētahi rōpū mātauranga Holocaust e 42 ngā māharahara ka whakaahuatia e te pokapū a Ingarangi hei "kaiwhakaora whakamutunga o ngā Hurai". I roto i tētahi reta tōtahi ki te uiui i arahina e Dr Hannah Holtschneider o te Whare Wānanga o Etinitini, ka kī rātau: "Mā te whakatakoto i te whakamaharatanga o te UK Holocaust i te taha o ngā Whare Pāremata, tērā pea ka waihangatia he kōrero whakanui o ngā urupare a te kāwanatanga o Ingarangi ki te pākihi Hurai i te wā o te Whāriki, i tua atu rānei." Ko te 'tautoko ngākau katoa' Kei te kaupapa te tautoko a te kāwanatanga me te tautoko mai i nga tūru ātete. I kī atu a Tā Keir ki te Jewish Chronicle: "Ka haere tonu te whawhai ki te inoi me te whakaaro kino i roto i to mātau iwi, me te poapoa o te anati-Semitisme. " Nā reira ka tukuna e au taku tautoko ngākau katoa ki te Pokapū Whakamaharatanga me te Akoranga o Holocaust me tōna whakanohonga i te taha o te ngākau o to tātau kāwanatanga ā iwi." I kī te Hēkeretari Hapori a Tēnā Jenrick i te wā o Hui tanguru ka noho tonu te kāwanatanga ki te hanganga o te whakamaharatanga. I kī a ia ka "kore rawa e wareware ngā whakatupuranga ā muri ake". I kī a Karen Pollock, te rangatira nui o te Holocaust Educational Trust, he mea hira te kaupapa ki te tiaki i ngā pūrākau o ngā mōrehu o te Holocaust me ngā pūrākau o te ono miriona "e kore rawa tātau e rongo". Kai te ārahina nga mahi e te UK Holocaust Memorial Foundation.

title: I whakararurarutia ngā ratonga tuatahi o te Uru Nui i roto i te taraiwa 24 haora
summary: I whakararurarutia ngā ratonga rēra i te wā i whakatūria e ngā kaimahi i First Great Western (FGW) tētahi tuki 24 haora.
text: I waenganui pō i te Rātapu hei wāhanga o te tautohetohe mo te whakaurunga o ngā tereina hou. I kī te kaiārahi o Te Wānanga o Mick Cash e "tautokona mārōtia" ana e ngā mema te mahi taraiwa. I whakarārangitia e FGW ngā huringa ki ana ratonga kua whakaritea, e kī ana e whakahaere ana i te 70% o tōna wātaka Rātapu auau. I kī tētahi kōrero kamupene: "Tērā pea kei te arokē ngā tereina, ā, he iti noa iho ngā ratonga kai me te inu i runga i te papa. Tērā pea ka wehe atu ngā tereina whakamutunga o te rā i mua i te pūnoa." Ko ngā pūtahi tautohetohe i runga i ngā kaimahi me ngā pūkenga kai i runga i ngā rerewhenua hou o FGW o Hitachi Inter City Express, me te uniana e wehi ana i ngā tautīaki me ngā motokā kōauau ka whakawāteatia. I kī a Tēnā Moni: "E oha ana te uniana ki te kotahitanga me te manawa o o mātau mema i roto i tēnei tautohetohe roa. " Ahakoa he maha ngā haora kōrero i puritia e mātau ki te Uru Nui Tuatahi, kāore i taea e mātau te nui te haere whakamua i runga i ngā take uho i te ngākau o te tautohetohe." I tū ngā mema o te uniana i tētahi tuki 48 haora i runga i te tautohetohe ōrite i a Hōngongoi, ā, ka tuki hoki i te mutunga wiki o te Hararei Pēke. I kī te uniana me te kamupene e wātea ana rātau mō ngā kōrero i mua i te tuki i whakaritea e whai ake nei. 'Nui ake, kāore i te iti iho' kua kī a FGW ka tukua e ngā Tereina Super Express hōu "ētahi atu tūru, ngā wā haere tere ake, me ngā haerenga auau ake mō ā mātou pāhihi". "Ko te tikanga o a mātau mahere he nui ake ngā kaiwhakahaere tereina me ngā kaihautū kiritaki i runga i a mātau tereina, ehara i te mea iti iho," ka tāpiritia. I whakakorea e te wātaka whakahōu a te kamupene mō te taraiwa te haurua o ngā ratonga o te taone me te tereina kotahi i te haora i waenganui i Paddington me Bristol, South Wales me te tonga ki te hauauru o Ingarangi. Ko ngā tereina i te raina o Portsmouth ki Cardiff anake i rere i waenganui i Salisbury me Swindon, ā, kāore he tereina FGW ki, mai i Weymouth rānei. I te Riu o Thames, tata tonu ki ngā ratonga taone katoa i whakaritea kia rite ki te pūnoa. Ka whakahaere te kaiwhakahaere i ngā ratonga tereina i waenganui i London Paddington, South Wales, te Cotswolds, te rohe o Thames Valley me te Uru o Ingarangi. Ka whakahaere ngā tereina tuatahi o Hitachi i runga i te raina matua o te Uru Nui mai i te 2017 me te raina matua o Te Tairāwhiti mai i te 2018.

title: E whakapae ana a Hamburg i a Itari neke atu i te 300 ngā hunga whakaruru o Awherika noho kore kāinga
summary: Tata ki te 300 ngā Āwherika i rere i te papā o te tau 2011 i Ripia ināianei kua paea ki te taone o Tiamana ki te raki o Hamburg, i reira te tokomaha o rātau e moe ana i te pārekareka.
text: E whakapae ana ngā kaiwhakahaere Tiamana riri ko Itari - i te wāhi i tae tuatahi mai ai ngā Āwherika - i hoatu he moni me ngā visa ki a rātau kia neke atu ai rātau ki Tiamana. E kī ana nga mana o Hamburg e uaua ana rātau ki te kimi whakarurutanga mō ngā tāne me ngā wāhine o Ripia, Ghana me Togo. He tokomaha nga hunga whakaruru o Awherika i rere ki Itari i roto i ngā poti iti, kōpikopiko i te tau 2011. I kī te senator o Hamburg mō ngā take ora pāpori me te whānau, a Detlef Scheele, "kei te ngana mātou ki te whakatū i tēnei wā me pēhea e taea ai te whakahoki i ngā mea kua pau ōna visa ki Itari", i pūrongotia e te pāpāho Tiamana. I kī a Tēnā Scheele, tētahi pāremata Pāpori Pāpori (SPD), "he tūkino te whakaoho i ngā tūmanako hē; ko te haerenga whakahoki anake te kōwhiringa". I kī a ia kaore he mana o nga Āwherika ki te rapu mahi, ki te oranga pāpori rānei i Tiamana. I tērā wiki ka whakatūria e te hunga whakaruru he whakaaturanga i waho o te hōro taone o Hamburg me tētahi kara e pānui ana: "Kāore mātau i ora i te pakanga NATO i Ripia kia mate i nga tiriti o Hamburg". E pūrongo ana te nūpepa Hamburger Abendblatt e mahi tahi ana ngā mana ora me ngā rōpū hāhi ki te āwhina i ngā Āwherika, he tokomaha o rātou e moe ana i ngā tiriti o te taone tauranga, i runga i ngā tūru pāka, i raro rānei i ngā rākau. Engari kua kī tonu nga whare noho kore o te taone, ā, kāore a Tēnā Scheele i whakaae ki te whakatū i ngā teneti rangitahi mō ngā Āwherika, ka pūrongo te nūpepa. E ai ki tētahi karere minita ā-roto o Tiamana, i whakahuatia e te pāpāho Tiamana, i hoatu ki a rātau tae atu ki te 500 hōro (£428; $647) ia i Itari ki te whakapati i a rātau kia wehe i te whenua, tae atu ki ngā visa rohe o Rōpū e āhei ai rātau ki te haere ki ētahi atu whenua EU. I whakaahuatia e tētahi MP o te whare o raro o Tiamana (Bundestag), a Johannes Kahrs o te SPD, ngā mahi a Itari he "kāore i te mōhiotia". "Kāore au i te mōhio he aha te take ā-ture e whakamahia ana e ngā Itari mō te mahi i tēnei," tana kī. I raro i ngā ture EU, ko te whenua i tae tuatahi mai ai te hunga whakaruru ki te EU, ko te tikanga kia tiaki i a rātou me te tukatuka i ā rātou taupānga whakangungu.

title: Tā Terry Wogan: Ka mate te kaipānui toa, e 77 tau te pakeke
summary: Kua mate te kaipānui o TE AO o Tā Terry Wogan i te 77 o ona tau, i muri i tētahi mate poto, kua whakaūngia e tōna whānau.
text: I roto i tētahi kōrero, ka kī rātau: "I mate a Tā Terry Wogan i tēnei rā i muri i tētahi pakanga poto engari toa ki te mate pukupuku. " I mate a ia e karapotia ana e tōna whānau. Ahakoa e mōhio ana mātou ka mahue i a ia e te tokomaha, ka tono te whānau kia manaakitia tō rātou tūmataitinga i tēnei wā." I kī te tumuaki o TE Aotearoa, a Tony Hall: "He taonga ā-motu tūturu a Terry." Ka mahue i a Tā Terry te wahine a Helen me a rāua tamariki tokotoru. He tamāhine anō tā rāua tokorua i mate i te kōhungahunga. Obituary: I utua e Tā Terry Wogan Ngā Takoha ki a Tā Terry Wogan He oranga i roto i ngā pikitia Ō pūmahara i whānau mai a Tā Terry i runga i te reo irirangi me te pouaka whakaata, tae atu ki te whakaatu i te Whakaoho ki Wogan i runga i te Reo Irirangi 2 me te whakaaturanga kōrerorero Wogan i BBC1. He maha nga tau i uru ai a ia ki te tono a Ngā Tamariki e Matea ana mai i te tīmatanga o te tau 1980. I kī te pūmana o te Reo Irirangi 2 o TE Reo Irirangi 2, a Bob Shennan ko ia "tētahi o ngā kaihautū reo irirangi tino nui, tino pai hoki kua rongo tēnei whenua", ka tāpiri: "I aroha ana miriona kaiwhakarongo ki a ia, pērā ki tōna whānau Irirangi 2 katoa. Ka tino mihi mātau ki a ia, ā, ko o mātau whakaaro i tēnei wā tino pouri kei a Helen me te whānau katoa." Ka kī a Lord Hall: "He taonga ā-motu a Terry. I tēnei rā kua ngaro i a mātau tētahi hoa tino pai. "He tangata ātaahua a ia, he tangata ātaahua, ā, ko o mātau whakaaro kei tana wahine me tana whānau. Mō te 50 tau i aroha ai a Tā Terry ki o mātau mata me ngā ngaru rererangi. Ko tōna mahana, tōna atamai me tōna ngākau mārire, he wāhanga ia o te whānau mō ngā miriona." I te tuatahi ka haere a Tā Terry ki te pēke i muri i te kāreti i mua i te whakawhiti mahi ki te hono ki te Reo Irirangi ā-motu o Airangi hei kaipānui rongokōrero me te kaipānui. I neke a ia ki te whakangahau māmā, hei DJ me te kaihautū pātaitai pouaka whakaata me ngā whakaaturanga momo i Airangi, i mua i tana uru atu ki te BBC, e noho ai ia mo te toenga o tana mahi. I whakaaturia e ia te whakaaturanga parakuihi mai i te 1972 ki te 1984, hei The Terry Wogan Show, kātahi mai i te 1993 ki te 2009 hei Wake Up To Wogan. I roto i āna ake kupu i te Reo Irirangi 4 - Kōpae Motu Koraha a Tā Terry Wogan Tā Terry 'i hanga reo irirangi i te tau o te pouaka whakaata' I te tūtakitanga o Tā Terry ki a Pōkai, i hangaia e ia he pūkenga pūmau, e karanga ana i tana hunga whakarongo ki ngā TOGs, i ngā Geezers me ngā Gals rānei a Terry. I tana pāohotanga i te parakuihi mo te wā whakamutunga, ka kī atu a ia ki te hunga whakarongo: "Ehara i te mea he pai noa iho ngā tau ki a koe, engari he hōnore. Kua whakaaetia ahau e koe kia tiritiri i o oranga ki a koe. "Ina kōrero mai koe ki a au i te hira o tōku oranga i roto i ō oranga, he tino nekeneke. He rite tonu tō hira ki tōku." Kua hoatu takoha ki a ia ngā hoa mahi o Tā Terry mai i te Reo Irirangi 2 o TE Reo Irirangi. I whakaahuatia ia e Haimona Mayo he "tipua reo irirangi", e kī ana: "Ko te tēpara o te reo irirangi nui katoa ko te hoa i muri i te hopuoro - ā, ko ia te hoa tino pai i muri i te hopuoro." Ka kī a Ken Bruce: "Kua kore te reo i noho ki a mātau i o mātau oranga katoa, i te nuinga o ngā take, kua kore i reira... He wāhanga ia o te kākahu o o mātau oranga i roto i ngā huarahi maha." I kī a Jeremy Vine ko Tā Terry "tērā pea te kaipānui tino nui rawa mai i te hanganga o te uruoro". "I noho a ia mo te rama whero me te whakaaro he kaiwhakarongo i te mutunga o te hopuoro. Kotahi anake tana kōrero ki te tangata kotahi, nā te mea he takatāpui te reo irirangi tino nui." He koha mō te tangi māori Nā David Sillito, te kaipānui pāpāho me ngā toi Tērā tētahi hopukanga pūranga tino pai o te rā i haere ai a Perehitini Kennedy ki Aiarangi i te tau 1963. Ko te tangata e hopu ana i te tirohanga mō RTE - o ngā tāngata e pana ana i te rāhui pirihimana - he taitamariki a Terry Wogan. He iti ake te kaha o tōna nako, engari ko ia tonu te Terry Wogan e pāoho tonu ana i te 50 tau i muri mai. Ko te tangata i tūtaki koe i waho o te kāmera, he tino nui te tangata i rongo ai koe i runga i te hau, ā, he koha tērā - he koha mō te tangi māori, tūturu. E kī ana te hoa kaiwhakaatu Reo Irirangi 2, a Paul O'Grady, kāore he teka mōna, ā, ka tino hopukina - ka taea e te tangata te hongi i te pono i roto i te hēkona, ā, ahakoa pai koe ki a ia, kāore rānei, kāore he mea tinihanga mōna. Heoi anō, ko te mea i whakamīharo ai, ka taea e ia te uru atu ki taua kōrero atamai me te kōrero tika, i ia tau, i ia tau, i mua i te hunga nui i runga i ngā Tamariki e Mate ana me te Whakataetae Waiata Eurovision. He whakamataku te pāohotanga ora - kei te hē tonu ngā mea, ā, he kupu kāore i te kōwhiria, he kōrero rānei e hapa ana i te tohu ka whakararuraru i a koe mō ngā tau. Heoi anō ki a Tā Terry, kāore e taea e au te whakaaro ki tētahi. He tangata mātauranga tērā e āhei ana ki te whakangāwari i tēnā āhua. I kī a Kiriata Norton, nāna i tango hei kaiwaiata Eurovision mai i a Tā Terry, i runga i te Twitter: "I āhua ngāwari noa iho tana āhua, ā, mō tētahi taitama i Aiarangi ka taea e ia. RIP Tā Terry Wogan." I tuhituhi te kaihautū whakaaturanga parakuihi o nāianei, a Chris Evans: "Kei te tino pouri mātou katoa i te rongonga o te putanga o Terry. Kāore e taea e au te kōrero he pēhea te rongo o te whānau Irirangi 2 katoa." I kī a Toni Blackburn: "He wāhanga ia o o mātau oranga, he poutohu reo irirangi tūturu. I aroha a ia ki tāna e mahi ana, ā, he tino nui tana ahuareka." I kī a Dermot O'Leary, i te tipu ake i roto i tētahi whānau o Airana, ko Tā Terry "he tohu o te kāinga". I whakaahuatia e ia a Tā Terry hei "tētahi o ngā tūāpapa o te pāohotanga i tēnei whenua", ka tāpiri: "Kei te rongo koe i tōna aroaro huri noa i te Reo Irirangi 2... Ko ia te papa o te wāhi." I whakamihi te whetū o Bond a Tā Roger Moore ki te mahi aroha a Tā Terry, e tweet ana: "Ko Terry te kohi moni tino mātauranga. Ko taku pūmahara tino pai i te wā i tono tētahi i te 75k mō CIN [Children in Need] kia tina tahi māua tokorua. He hōnore." Ka tūtohu a Dara O Briain: "He rongo tino pouri mo te matenga o Terry Wogan. He uaua ki te ine i ngā mea i tutuki i a ia, ehara i te pāohotanga anake, engari mō te Kīriria i Ingarangi. "He uaua ki te wehe i ngā mea i tutuki i a ia me te nako i mahia e ia, mai i ngā wā i mahia ai e ia. Ka whakatuwheratia ki te tatau ki te hunga katoa i whai mai." I kī a Tess Daly, nāna i whakaatu Ngā Tamariki e Mate ana i te taha o Tā Terry: "Nā reira, i te tino pouri i te rongo kua mate a Tā Terry. Ko ia te tangata tino rekareka, tino atawhai, he tino hōnore te mahi tahi me ia me te hari ki te mōhio ki a ia." I tuhituhi te Pirimia o Rawiri, a Rawiri, i runga i te Twitter: "Kei te whānau o Terry Wogan ōku whakaaro. Kua ngaro i Ingarangi tētahi pūmanawa nui - he miriona tāngata i rongo ko tō rātou ake hoa motuhake." I kī te Perehitini o Airani a Michael D Higgins: "I ngā wā katoa e whakahīhī ana i ōna takenga mai i Limerick, he maha ngā hokinga mai ki tōna whenua tupu mō ngā kaupapa pouaka whakaata me te reo irirangi. " Ko tōna pikinga ki te tihi o te hunga whakarongo reo irirangi i Te Hononga o Ingarangi he takoha nui ki tōna whānuitanga o te mātauranga, ā, ko tōna āhua ahurei, tino whaiaro o te ngahau." I kī te kaiwhakahaere o te Reo Irirangi o TE Reo Irirangi, a Helen Boaden: "He kaipānui whakaharahara a ia, engari he tino ngahau hoki, ā, ka tino mahue." I tīmata a Tā Terry i tana tīmatanga i runga i te Hōtaka Mārama, ināianei ko te Reo Irirangi 2, ā, i te tau 1969 ka tonoa kia tū mō Jimmy Young i te whakaaturanga waenganui o te ata, nāna i ahu mai ki tētahi kāniwha ahiahi auau. I tangohia e ia te whakaaturanga parakuihi i runga i te Reo Irirangi 2 i te tau 1972, a, i wawe tonu tana tau. I te tau 1973, mai i te tau 1980 ki te 2008, i homai e ia te kōrero i ia tau mō te HAU. Ko tana whakaaturanga kōrerorero, ko Wogan, i oma mai i te 1982 ki te 1992, kātahi anō ka pāohotia e toru ngā wā i te wiki. I taua wā, i taurimatia hoki e ia te whakaaturanga pātaitai Blankety Blank. I taunga a Tā Terry i te tono Children in Need mai i te wā i pāohotia tuatahitia, ka haere tonu ki te taurima i muri i te whakatānga i te pāohotanga auau. I kī a Stevie Spring, te manukura o Ngā Tamariki Mate: "Ko te nuinga o ngā tāngata e mōhio ana ki a ia ko te kanohi o Ngā Tamariki Mate, engari ko ia te ngākau o te aroha, ā, kua 35 tau." I te tau 1992 ka hoki a ia ki te whakaaturanga parakuihi Radio 2, i muri i te wehenga o te iwa tau. I pānuitia e ia tōna whakatānga i te marama o Mahuru 2009, e toru marama i muri iho. Mai i Hui tanguru 2010, i taurimatia e ia tētahi whakaaturanga ora i ngā ata Rātapu mō te teihana reo irirangi. I te 8 o Whiringa ā-Rangi 2015 i te rangi whakamutunga o Tā Terry i runga i te Reo Irirangi 2. Mō te pānuitanga haere tonu, mātakitaki i te Hongere Rongokōrero o TE AO me te whakarongo ki te Reo Irirangi 2. The One Show: A Tribute to Sir Terry will be broadcast at 19:00 GMT on Monday 1 February. I tūtaki, i mahi rānei koe ki a Tā Terry Wogan? Tiria ō whakaahua me ō pūmahara o te kaipānui toa. Īmēra haveyoursay@bbc.co.uk ō pūrākau. Tēnā whakaurua he tau hoapā mēnā e hiahia ana koe ki te kōrero ki tētahi kaipānui o TE HAU. Ka taea hoki e koe te whakapā mai ki a mātou mā ngā huarahi e whai ake nei:

title: I whakatūria e Lib Dem David Alston te manukura o NHS Highland
summary: Kua whakatūria te kaikaunihera matua o Highland Liberal Democrat a David Alston hei manukura hou o NHS Highland.
text: Ka tangohia e ia a Garry Coutts, e tū ana hei manukura o te poari hauora i Mati 2016. Kua mahi a Tēnā Coutts i roto i te pou mo te mōrahi ā-ture o ngā whakaritenga e whā tau e toru e whai ake nei. Ko ia te manukura tino roa o tētahi poari hauora i Pākehā. I uru tuatahi a ia ki te poari i te tau 2002, a, i riro i a ia te tūnga manukura i Aperira 2004. Kua pānuitia anō e te kāwanatanga o Pirihitini te tūranga i te wā o Mahuru. Ka kapi te poari hauora i tētahi wāhi nui, tae atu ki ngā Highlands, Skye me ētahi wāhanga o Argyll. Ko ōna hōhipera ko Raigmore i Inverness, Caithness General i Wick me Belford i Fort William.

title: Jack Grealish: I hereheretia te kaihautū o Birmingham City mo te whakaeke pitch
summary: Kua hereheretia tētahi kaihautū o Birmingham City mo te 14 wiki mo te whakaeke i te kāpene o Aston Villa, a Jack Grealish i te wā o te derby tuarua o te taone.
text: I oma atu a Paora Doketa, o Rubery, o Worcestershire, ki te rōnaki, a, ka patua a Grealish mai i muri tata ki te 10 meneti ki te kēmu o te Rātapu. I whakaae a Doketa, e 27, ki te whakaekenga me te auraratanga ki te papa i te Kōti Kaiwhakawa o Birmingham i mua. "Kāore e taea e ia te whakamārama i te mea i puta mai i a ia inanahi", te kī a tana rōia. "Ko tana whakaaro wairangi tuatahi ko te haere noa ki te papa me te wepu i te huihuinga," te kī a Vaughn Whistance, e whakangungu ana. I whakahaua hoki a Doketa, o Cock Hill Lane, kia utu i te £350 i roto i te whaina me ngā utu, ā, kua rāhuitia kia kaua e haere ki ngā whakataetae whutupōro i UK mō te 10 tau. Kei roto i te £350 te £100 hei utu mo te "mamae, te hōhā me te ohorere" o Grealish. I taea e te kaiwaenga o Villa te haere tonu ki te kēmu i St Andrew's, ā, ka haere tonu ki te piro i te whāinga toa i te meneti 67. I kī a Doketa, he kaimahi pāpara, kāore a ia i haurangi i tana whakaekenga i te rōnaki, a, ka kōwhao i a Grealish i te kauae. "Kāore e taea e au te rongo i taku waimarie i tēnei mahi," te kī a te kaitākaro. "Tērā pea i tino kino kē atu mehemea he momo rākau tā te kaitautoko." I muri tonu i te kēmu, ka whakapārewa a Birmingham City ki a Grealish rāua ko Villa i muri tonu i te kēmu, ā, i kī kua rāhuitia a Doketa i Hato Anaru mo te ora. Kua rāhuitia hoki a ia i ngā kēmu tawhiti. I kī te karapu "kāore he takunga" mo tōna whanonga, "kāore he wāhi i roto i te whutupōro". I kī ngā Pirihimana o West Midlands e uiui ana hoki i "ngā whakairinga pāpāho pāpori whakahāwea" i puta mai i muri i te whāinga e tohutoro ana i te taina o Grealish, i mate i te whā o nga tau o te kaiwaenganui. I kī a Birmingham City kua whakakorea e ia tētahi atu kaitautoko mo te ora i runga i te tuhituhi "kino me te kino". I kīia a Doketa, he kaipupuri tīkiti wā mo te 20 tau, he "tino pouri" i muri i tana mōhiotanga kua "whakamā" a ia ki tana karapu. I tono tana wawao ki te ratonga hapori, ki tētahi whiu whare herehere rānei i whakatārewatia, engari i whakataua e nga kaiwhakawā me tuku he "karere ki ngā kaihautū". Ko te whiu whare herehere a te pāpā o te tangata "ko te tikanga kia whakararuraru", ka tāpiritia e nga kaiwhakawa. I te wā o te whakarongo ki te kōti, ka kī a Tēnā Whistance kua mahia he tuma tuihono ki a Doketa. I kī a Tēnā Whistance kua mahue i tōna whānau te rohe "i runga i te wehi ka pā ki a rātau he tūkino nui, he mate rānei". 'Haumaru o ngā kaitākaro' I kī tētahi kaikawe kōrero FA "kua rīpeka tētahi raina" me te tino whakatau i te whakaekenga, tae atu ki tētahi atu whakaekenga i te wā o te whakataetae o Te Hononga o Te Hononga o Te Hononga o Te Hononga o Te Wānanga o Te T Kua tuhituhi ki Birmingham City ki te tirotiro i ngā tikanga haumarutanga o te karapu. I kī te karapu kua tīmata ki te arotake i ōna hātepe kaitiaki, haumaru me te haumarutanga "he take tino hiranga". "Ka whakaritea e mātou ētahi atu tikanga i to mātau papa tākaro i hoahoatia hei āwhina ki te whakaū i te haumarutanga o ngā kaitākaro, me ngā kaitautoko," te kī a te kaikōrero. I whakaūngia hoki e te karapu e uiui ana i tētahi mahi e pā ana ki tētahi tuari "i muri i te whakanuitanga a ngā kaitākaro o Aston Villa i ta rātau whāinga i te Rātapu i mua i a rātau kaitautoko i te Gil Merrick Stand". I tēnei wā, i kī te kaitākaro o Ingarangi o Mua o Phil Neville e hiahiatia ana he mahi nui hei whakaū i te haumarutanga o ngā kaitākaro. "Mā ngā whakatauranga piro, mā te whakawātea rānei i ngā taiwhanga tākaro me te whakarite i ngā karapu e tākaro ana i muri i ngā tatau kati," tana kī. I te tau 2002, i hereheretia tētahi kaihautū o Birmingham City i oma ki te papa o Hato Anaru, a, ka tūtaki ki te kaitiaki o Aston Villa, a Pita Enckelman, mo te whā marama mo te aurara i te wāhi tākaro me te whakamahi i te whanonga whakawehi. Whāia a BBC West Midlands i Facebook, i Twitter, me te waitohu mō ngā whakahōutanga rongokōrero paetata hāngai tonu ki tō waea.

title: Vine: E ono ngā mea kua akona e te tangata mō te ataata ono hēkona i roto i te wiki
summary: Ko te taupānga ataata a Twitter ko Vine, e āhei ai ngā kaiwhakamahi ki te hopu me te tiritiri i ngā topenga ono hēkona, kua hangaia te nuinga o ngā pānui me te pānuitanga pāpāho i tōna wiki tuatahi o te mahi. He aha?
text: Nā Finlo RohrerBBC News Magazine Kua namatia kētia hei "Instagram mō te ataata", e pā ana ki te taupānga tiritiri whakaahua i hokona e Facebook mō te $1bn i tērā tau. Ehara tēnei i te ratonga tiritiri ataata-iti tuatahi. Tout, e āhei ai ngā kaiwhakamahi ki te whakairi ataata 15 hēkona, i whakarewaina i te tau 2010. Tērā anō te Cinemagram, e waihanga ana i ngā gif hākoritanga mai i ngā whakaahua. Engari kua tata tonu te pānga o Vine, me te pūrua kaha o Twitter. He tokomaha e kore e mīharo ki te tiritiri ataata ono hēkona, e kite ana i te taupānga pāpāho pāpori hei takahanga anō o te ao noa. Engari kua tautuhia te tangata ki te rongo i ētahi atu mea mōna. 1. Kei te ora te hākoritanga nekeneke tū Whakapau wā poto ki Vine, ā, ka kite koe kāore anō kia ngaro atu te hākoritanga nekeneke tū. Ko te tikanga, e hoki tata ana ki te tīmatanga o te whare pikitia, ko te hopu i tētahi tāpare, e rua rānei, te neke i tētahi ahanoa, kātahi ka tārua i te tukanga. Ka tute a Vine i te kaiwhakamahi kia ngana ki te tū nekeneke. E huatau ana te akoranga i te whakaahua i roto i ngā pahūtanga, kaua ko te topenga ono hēkona kotahi. Ka pā atu ngā kaiwhakamahi ki te mata hei tāhopu, tangohia tō rātou matimati, kōwhiri i tētahi pūtiro hōu, whakapā anō ki te mata. Tērā pea he hū e taraiwa ana i a rātau ki runga i te papa rākau. Ko ngā M&M rānei e whakarite ana i a rātau ki tētahi kupu. He āporo rānei e kainga ana i roto i ngā ngau iti. Ko te kai nekeneke tū e kainga ana - ko te ataata e ono hēkona e ōrite ana ki te mahi Instagram o te whakaahua i tō kai - kua tawaia kētia hei kōrero tuatahi o Vine. Tērā anō tētahi gif hākoritanga o te parody. Kei te tunu kai hoki. Te ūkui hukarere rānei i te motokā. Ā, ko ētahi o ngā nekeneke tū e āhua nei he tino roa te wā ki te huihui. 2. E ono hēkona te roa o ngā pānuitanga Pēnei i te maha o ngā pūhara pāpāho pāpori hōu, kua tere ngā kaupapa pānuitanga ki te hopu i te kaha o Vine. He āhua mātāmua tō ngā pānuitanga, ahakoa he tino ngaio te kawenga o te mātāmua. I tētahi āhuatanga, kua mahi ngā kaipānui tuihono ki tētahi tepenga ono hēkona mō tētahi wā. E ōrite ana tēnā ki ngā hēkona e rima o ngā kaipānui maha i mua i te tīpoka a te kaiwhakamahi i tētahi pānui i YouTube. "Tērā tētahi waeine pōhēhē mō te whaitake o Vine ki ngā kaipānui," te kī a Gordon MacMillan, te kaiwhakatika o Brand Republic. "I whakangahau te iwi ināianei e hiahia ana mātou ki tētahi rautaki pānui e ono hēkona. Engari i te kitenga i ētahi o ngā aka o mua ka kite koe i te auaha o rātou." Ko te ngaru o ngā pānuitanga Vine mai i ngā tāngata katoa mai i General Electric ki Gap ka hangaia e ngā puna momo mākete mamati, kaua i roto i te whare, e kī ana a MacMillan. Ka kimi rātau i te ataata tuatahi e ono hēkona kia haere huaketo. "Ko ngā mea pai ake, ahakoa i roto i te ono hēkona, ka taea te hora. He gifs hākoritanga ēnei. I te wā o te pōti perehitini i tino tiria ētahi o ngā gif hākori i Tumblr." 3. Ka āhei te tangata ki te mahi, kaua e kī He aha te āhua nei ehara i te mea ko Vine he rangatū o ngā ataata ono hēkona o ngā tāngata e kōrero ana ki te kāmera. Ahakoa e ono hēkona tonu te whakamahi a te tangata, ko ngā whakaahua o ngā tāngata e mahi ana i ngā mea. Ka kite koe i te ono hēkona o te pēpi e haere ana i runga i te kāpeti. Engari kāore anō kia ono hēkona te horirangi. He nui tonu te toi me te hanga kiriata iti e mōhio ana ki a ia anō. Engari ko te nuinga o ngā mea i tēnei wā, ko te tangata tonu e whakaahua ana i te mea tuatahi e tūpono ana ki a rātau whatu. Kua whai tohutohu kē me pēhea te whakamahi i te Vine hei whakarewa i tō mahi. 4. Ka āwhina ngā tepe waihanga ki te pānui i tētahi whakahere pāpāho pāpori Ko te tepenga o te ono hēkona he wāhanga nui o te pānui i roto i te pāpāho mō Vine. Pērā ki ngā pūāhua 140 o Twitter, he kakau pai te ārai waihanga mō te pāpāho matua ki te pūrongo i te ia me te whakamārama ki te hunga kāore anō kia tāhaetia e te pānuitanga. Ko te peha "ataata ono hēkona" te utauta mākete tino pai, kua kitea. 5. He mīharo ngā whakarōpūtanga o Vine He maha kē ngā paetukutuku e maina ana i te taupānga Vine mō ngā ataata a ngā kaiwhakamahi. Ko Vinepeek me Justvined he kaihoko waina wā tūturu. Ka waihangatia e Vineroulette tētahi pakitara aka tāhuhu. He kounga mīharo ki te mātakitaki i tētahi o ngā kaihoko. Ka hipa atu tētahi carousel pōhēkona o ngā poro ono hēkona o te oranga noa. E whakaahua ana te tangata i roto i o rātau tari, kāinga me ngā kura. Ka whakaahuatia e te tangata nga waka. Me ngā tipu. He tino hōhā mō te toru meneti, 30 hēkona rānei, i runga i te YouTube, he tino rerekē i te ono hēkona. Kua whakatika kētia e te tangata ngā whakahiatotanga pūkenga o ngā waina, ngā remixes tūturu i whakapūorotia. 6. Ko ngā ngeru/porn e rangatira ana i ia pūhara i runga i te ipurangi Pērā i te YouTube, ko te nui o te wā e pau ana i te titiro ki ngā aka ka kōpikopiko ki ngā whakaahua o ngā poti me ngā kurī. Pērā ki ngā gif hākoritanga, ko te ataata kanikani poti e ono hēkona pea te tūemi tino tiritiri o te ipurangi. Kua tino whakapūmautia hoki he tere te porn ki te whakanoho i tētahi ratonga hou. Kei te whawhai kē a Vine ki te pono, otirā i muri i tētahi wāhanga i whakaaturia ohorere ai tētahi ataata mārama hei kōwhiringa a te ētita. Kua whakaritea e te ratonga ngā tūtohu e pā ana ki te pono. Ko te mahi whakamā he whakamaumahara kāore he mea e tino rerekē. Ngā whakautu ki ngā maramara rongokōrero e ono hēkona 1. Ko te hinganga i roto i te Whare o Ngātahi o ngā mahere hei tuhi anō i ngā rohenga wāhanga i mua i te tau 2015, i pūruatia e ngā Tories, e āwangawanga ana ki te mauritanga o te tauwhāinga Conservative/Lib Dem. 2. Te mutunga o te matapihi whakawhiti whutupōro. 3. Ko te karanga mai i ngā tinana rongoā ārahi mō tētahi utu 20p-ia-rīta i runga i ngā inu ngohengohe kia whakaurua ki te Pūtea o tēnei tau. 4. Te huritau 200 o te tānga tuatahi o Pride and Prejudice na Jane Austen. 5. Ko te pānuitanga o te ara i whakaritea o te whatunga rēra tere rawa HS2. 6. Ko te kitenga o ngā tohu mīti hoiho i ētahi mīti kau, e kī ana ngā mana paerewa kai i te Whenua o Airana e whakapono ana rātau i ahu mai i Pōrana.

title: I whakahaua a Apache ki te tauranga ohorere i muri i te tūtukitanga o ngā taura
summary: Kei te haere tētahi tūhuratanga i muri i te whakahautanga o tētahi hepa Apache kia rere ohorere.
text: I runga i tētahi mahi whakangungu rere iti i te wā i mau ai i roto i ngā taura hiko i Hundon i Suffolk. I whakaūngia e tētahi kaikōrero o te Ope Taua te Apache "i whakatūpato i Hundon Grange tata ki Haverhill i muri i te tuki waea". I pā mai te mahi i te 12:40 GMT i te Tūtira me te rere o te rererangi ki tētahi parae. Ka kī te kaikōrero: "Kāore ngā kaimahi e rua i whara, ā, i runga i tētahi whakangungu auau i takea mai i te Teihana Rererangi o Wattisham. " Pērā ki ngā mahi katoa e pā ana ki ngā rererangi hōia, tērā tētahi tūhuratanga mataiti." Na te whakapā atu ki ngā taura o runga i motu ai te hiko, e 60 ngā kāinga i te kāinga kāore he hiko tae noa ki te 20:00. I te tuatahi ka pūrongotia e te Cambridge News i muri i te taunga o tētahi o ngā kaihautū ki ngā tatau o te tangata whenua ki te whakamārama i te mea i tūpono. Kua whakamahia te Apache, i runga anō i Wattisham, mō ngā kōmaka i Awhekenetāna me Ripia, i reira i whakamahia ai ki te kimi me te whakangaro i ngā reheke.

title: Ka tuhituhi te puku i Haina - me pēhea, he aha hoki te take?
summary: I muri i te taupāhohetanga poto o te pūkete Twitter a te Perehitini o Amerika Donald Trump i tērā wiki e tētahi kaimahi Twitter, he tokomaha ngā tāngata i tīmata ki te whakaaro mehemea he wā ōrite te wahangū i tēnei wiki.
text: Heoi anō, kei Haina a Tēnā Trump i tēnei wā, e mōhiotia ana mō tōna "pātūahi nui" e ārai ana i te urunga ki ngā paetukutuku kē maha, tae atu ki Twitter. Ka pērā tonu, kua mau tonu te perehitini i tana tweeting i Haina, e mihi ana ki ana mano mo to rātau manaakitanga, te whakatūpato i Kōrea ki te Raki, me te huri i tana atahanga pane Twitter ki tētahi o ia, te perehitini Hainamana Xi Jinping, me ngā wahine tuatahi e rua, e karapoti ana i te tini o ngā kaiwhakatū Hainamana. Nā, he aha te mea e haere ana? E rua ngā taha o tēnei - he aronga hangarau, he mea tōrangapū. Kua āraia te Twitter ki Haina - engari ehara mō ngā mano paetukutuku me ngā pūhara pāpāho pāpori kua āraia i te tuawhenua o Haina. Kua āraia, kua whakararurarutia rānei te Twitter, Facebook, Instagram me Whatsapp, pērā ki ngā paetukutuku e whakaarotia ana e ngā mana he tairongo. (Kua āraia te paetukutuku Rongokōrero o TE AO i mua, pērā ki te New York Times me te Economist). He tokomaha ngā tāngata e karo ana i te pātūahi o Haina mā te whakamahi i ngā whatunga tūmataiti mariko (VPNs), ahakoa kei te whāwhā te kāwanatanga i ngā kaihoko VPN. Engari kāore ngā mana Hainamana i tua atu i te whakakotahi i ngā ture. I whakaaro poto ngā āpiha ki te whakangāwari i ōna ture whakatau i tētahi Rohe Hokohoko Koreutu o Shanghai i te tau 2013. Ā, ka whakamahia e te pokapū rongokōrero whaimana, a Pakihi, te Twitter hei whakatoko i ana tuhipānui - ki te mōrearea o te tokomaha o ngā kaiwhakamahi pāpāho pāpori Hainamana kua whakapaea te kāwanatanga ki ngā paerewa taurua. I mua i te taenga mai o Tēnā Puhi, ka whakapūmautia e te Takahanga Minita Ā-Rohe o Haina, a Zheng Zeguang, ka taea e ia te tweet i ngā mea katoa e hiahia ana ia, e kī ana: "Ka whakaarohia e mātou ngā mea katoa ki te whiwhi i ngā upoko kē o te kāwanatanga, nā reira me kaua koe e whai tāpuitanga mō te kaha o te Perehitini ki te whakapā tonu ki waho." He huarahi kua whakahētia e ngā rōpū motika. I kī atu a Sophie Ruānuku, ko te kaiwhakahaere o Haina i Human Rights Watch, ki a Bloomberg: "Mēnā ka taea e Perehitini Trump te tweet mai i Haina, nā te mea he pai ki a ia ngā painga e whakakāhore ana a Perehitini Xi ki ngā tāngata puta noa i taua whenua." Nā, he pēhea te uru atu a Tēnā Trump ki Twitter? Kua kitea e ngā kaipūrongo e haere tahi ana me Tēnā Puhi ka taea e rātou te uru ki Twitter i runga i ā rātou waea pūkoro, i te wā e whakamahi ana rātou i ngā whatunga tīpokapoka 3G, 4G rānei i runga i tētahi kāri sim kē. I roto i te mahi, ka tonoa ngā mana kē e haere ana ki Haina kia whai i ngā tohutohu haumarutanga pākaha, ā, i ētahi wā ka tohutohutia kia kaua e whakamahi i ā rātou ake waea, rorohiko pona rānei i te whenua. Nā reira kāore pea a Tēnā Trump i te tweeting noa iho i tana waea pūkoro pūnoa. Mō ngā take mārama, kāore anō te US kia hoatu i ngā taipitopito katoa o ā rātou whakaritenga kia haumaru ai te haere tuihono a Tēnā Puhi. Engari, i a ia e haere ana ki Pēhi, ka whakaū tētahi mana o te Whare Mā ki ngā kaipānui ka mau tonu a Tēnā Puhi i tana tweeting mai i Haina, e kī ana "E mōhio tūturu ana ahau kei a mātau ngā taonga i runga i tēnei waka rererangi kia puta ai." I tukuna ngā tuhituhi tuatahi e toru a Tēnā Puhi mai i Haina mai i tētahi pūtirotiro tukutuku, ehara i te waea. Heoi anō, ko tana tweet tuawhā, i reira ia e whakanui ana i te huritau kotahi tau o tana toa pōti, i tukuna mai i tētahi iPhone, ko ngā raraunga mai i ngā whakaaturanga Tweetdeck. He utauta tōrangapū a Twitter Kaua e wareware he mahi tōrangapū hoki te tweeting mō Tēnā Puhi - kua whakamahia e ia hei whakapuaki i ngā kaupapahere, hei whakahē i ngā tauwhāinga tōrangapū, me te whakahē i ētahi atu whenua - tae atu ki Haina. Mēnā i whakatau a Tēnā Puhi kia noho i waho o Twitter i Haina, tērā pea ka kitea he whakangū a ia, ahakoa mariko, e te whakatau Hainamana. Mā tērā pea e whakamārama te take i whakawhāititia ai e te mana o te Whare Mā ki ngā kaipānui "ka tweet te perehitini i ngā mea katoa e hiahia ana ia [i Haina]. Koia tēnā tōna tikanga whakawhitiwhiti kōrero hāngai ki te iwi o Amerika." Heoi anō, kua piki ake hoki ngā kaimātakitaki i te taumira o te oro i waenganui i te tuhituhi a Tēnā Puhi i Beijing, me ētahi o ana whakairinga o mua. Ahakoa i arotahi te tuhituhi o te Wenerei a Tēnā Puhi ki te mihi ki ana mano mo te "pōhiri ātaahua", me te tāpiri "E kore rawa māua ko Melania e wareware!", Kua whakamahia e ia te Twitter ki te whakahē i te taumahatanga moni a Haina, me te tautohe kāore anō a Haina kia nui te mahi hei whakakaha i a Kōria ki te Raki i ōna hiahia karihi. Ināianei, kua ngākau nui te piki ake o ngā pāpāho o te kāwanatanga o Hainamana i runga i ngā tuhituhi hou o Haina a Tēnā Puhi, ā, kua hurihia e ia tana atahanga pane ki tētahi o ia ki a Tēnā Xi. "Kī tonu a Tēnā Puhi i te whakaaro i muri i tana haerenga ki te Whare Rāhui - a, ka hurihia tana whakaahua pane Twitter!" I pūrongotia e te teihana pouaka whakaata iFeng i runga i te rangitaki moroiti Hainamana, me te emohi kōnui ake. Ko te tikanga, kāore he kōrero mō te mea kāore te Twitter i te uru tika ki Haina.

title: Te whakawā tinihanga a Rangers: Ka tohe te hūri ki te whakahē i a Kuki Whyte
summary: Kua tonoa he hūri kia whakawāteatia te rangatira o mua o Rangers, a Craig Whyte ki te whiwhi i te karapu mā te tinihanga i Me 2011.
text: I kī atu te rōia a Alex Prentice QC ki te Kōti Tiketike i Glasgow i tangohia e Tēnā Whyte te karapu whutupōro mā te whakamahi i ngā moni kāore i a ia te tika. I te wā o tana whaikōrero whakamutunga, ka kī hoki a Tēnā Prentice kua ngana a Tēnā Whyte ki te huna i tana pūtake pūtea mō te hoko i te karapu. E whakakāhore ana a Tēnā Whyte i te whakapae tinihanga, me te utu tuarua i raro i te Ture Kamupene. I kī atu te QC ki te hūri e waru ngā tāngata me ngā wāhine tokowhitu, ehara te kēhi i te uiui tūmatanui ki te whakahaeretanga o Rangers i tētahi taumata rangatōpū, engari mēnā i tinihanga a Kuki Whyte, kāore rānei. 'Whakahaere hītori' I kī a ia kāore he mana o Tēnā Whyte me tana kamupene Wavetower ki te moni i whakamahia hei hoko i te karapu. E kī ana ngā rōia ko ngā tapeke i kīa kua "wātea wawe" ko te moni mai i Ticketus, te umanga pūtea penapena Merchant Turnaround me te pūtea penihana o te Rōpū Jerome. I hoatu e Tēnā Prentice ki te hūri i hokona e Tēnā Whyte a Rangers mā te whakamahi i ngā moni kāore i a ia te tika, ā, i hunaia e ia ana pūtake pūtea. I tono hoki a ia ki te hūri kia whakahekea te whakaaturanga e pā ana ki te whakahaere hītori o Rangers i mua i te rironga o Tēnā Whyte hei rangatira hou o te karapu i Me 2011. Ka kī a ia: "Kāore e hāngai ana ngā whakaaturanga e pā ana ki te whakahaere hītori o Rangers. " Kāore e pā ana mēnā i a Tēnā Whyte te moni i te otinga o te whakahaeretanga o te Rangers." E whakakāhore ana a Kuki Whyte i nga whakapae ki a ia. Ka haere tonu te whakawā, i mua i te kaiwhakawā o Lady Stacey.

title: I toa a Lionel Messi i te whawhai e iwa tau ki te tohu i tōna ingoa whānau
summary: Ka taea e te kaiwhutupōro o Lionel Messi te rēhita i tōna ingoa hei moko i muri i te pakanga ā-ture e iwa tau, kua whakatauria e te kōti matua o EU.
text: I ākiritia e te Kōti o Ūropi o te Ture tētahi tono mai i te kamupene paihikara Pāniora o Massi me te tari ā-hinengaro o te EU, EUIPO. I te tau 2011, i tono tuatahi te kaiwhutupōro o Pārera ki te tohu i tōna ingoa whānau hei toa kākahu hākinakina. Engari i tautohe a Massi ka pōraru te ōritetanga i waenganui i o rātau moko. I kī te Kōti o Ūropi o te Ture (ECJ) ka taea te pūkete i te rongo o te kaitākaro whetū ina paunatia mēnā ka taea e te iwi whānui te kōrero i te rerekētanga i waenganui i ngā toa e rua. I a ia e mahi ana, i tautokona e ia tētahi whakahaere a te Kōti Nui o EU i te tau 2018 he tino mōhiotia rawa te kaiwhutupōro kia puta mai ai te mārō. I angitu a Massi, e hoko ana i ngā kākahu pahikara me ngā taputapu, i tana wero tuatahi ki te tono a te kaitākaro o Pārera. Engari i ngaro i te wā i kawea mai e Lionel Messi he tono ki te Kōti Nui, nāna i whakatau kia manakohia e ia. Ko Messi, e 33, e mau ana i te hāte tau 10, kua karaunatia hei kaitākaro whutupōro o te ao o te tau e ono ngā pūkete, ā, ko ia te kaitākaro whutupōro tino utu o te ao, e ai ki te Wānanga. Ka whakatakotoria e ia ana whiwhinga katoa mō te 2020 ki te $126m (£97m). I Aotearoa, ka puta i a ia he kupu matua mā te tuku waeatuhi ki tana karapu e whakapuaki ana i tōna hiahia kia haere. Engari i te urupare a Pārera mā te tohe kia whakahonoretia e tētahi tīma e mau ana i a ia tētahi whiti tuku € 700m (£ 624m), ka huri tōna hinengaro, ka kī kāore a ia i pīrangi ki te anga atu ki "te karapu e arohaina ana e au" i te kōti.

title: Sean Cox: I hereheretia te tangata mo te whakaekenga a Liverpool
summary: Kua hereheretia tētahi tangata i mahue i tētahi kaihautū o Liverpool i roto i te pōhēhētanga i waho o te taiwhanga tākaro o te karapu i mua i te herenga whakamutunga o te Rōpū Toa Toa.
text: I tautohe a Haimona Mastrelli ki te whakaeke i a Hōne Cox, e 53, i mahue i te whara roro, i mua i te tākaro a Liverpool i a Roma i Aperira nei. I te Kōti Karauna o Preston, i hereheretia a Mastrelli, e 30, mai i Roma, mo te toru me te hāwhe tau. I pāngia e Tēnā Cox, o Dunboyne, County Meath, he tino mate te māhunga. I muri i te hopukina i runga i tētahi Pūtāhui Hopu Ūropi i Itari, i kōwhiria e Mastrelli, i tērā marama i muri i tana hopukina i runga i tētahi Pūtāhui Hopu Ūropi i Itari, i kōwhiria e ia a Tēnā Cox nā te kākahu o Liverpool e mau ana i a ia. Ko te Itari kākahu kākahu i mua i tētahi rōpū i waenganui i te 50 me te 60 o ngā kaihautū "Ultra" o Roma - he tokomaha e hīpoki ana i o rātau mahunga me ō rātou kanohi, ā, ko ētahi e mau ana i ngā tātua hei rākau. I rongo te kōti i a Tēnā Cox rāua ko tōna tuakana, a Mātini, i "pouri noa iho" i puta mai i te rōpū i Walton Breck Road, tata ki te pāparanga o Albert. Kotahi tonu te moto ki te kanohi i tukitukia e Mastrelli a Tēnā Cox. Kua whakararurarutia a ia i te Hōhipera Whakaora o te Motu i Dun Laoghaire mō tētahi mate roro "hōhonu" nāna i kore e taea e ia te whakawhitiwhiti i ōna hiahia, ka rongo te kōti. I kī te rōia o Keith Sutton: "Ko te mea pono, kāore a ia e noho takitahi anō." I rongo te kōti i mua i te whakaekenga, he "tāne arokē te kaiwhakahaere hokohoko, he matua o ngā tamariki tokotoru". 'Kore rawa i hoki mai ki te kāinga' I a ia e mātakitaki ana a Mastrelli mai i te tauranga, ka pānuitia e te tamāhine a Tāne Cox, a Shauna, tētahi kōrero whaiaro. "I mua i tēnei whakaekenga kino, kino hoki, he tangata tika, he tangata māia tōku pāpā, he tangata tapatahi me te tino hiahia ki te ora, e tohu ana i ngā mea katoa e pai ana. " I haere taku papa ki te mātakitaki i tana tīma aroha, i Liverpool, ā, kore rawa ia i hoki mai ki te kāinga." I kī te Kaiwhakawā o Mark Brown i tukuna e Mastrelli te pupuhi, kātahi ka "haere ki te papa tākaro ki te hākinakina i te ōrite, i tino pōhēhē i te mea kātahi anō ka tūpono". I whawhai a Mastrelli i te rangahau i roto i ngā tono maha i mua i tana kawenga mai ki UK i tērā marama. I kī a Alison Gurden, he tangata whānau a ia, ā, i "pouri" i te mamae i puta mai i a ia. I tāurutia e Mastrelli he inoi hara ki te tūkino i te tinana kino ki a Tēnā Cox. I tautohe a ia kia kaua e hara ki tētahi tatau motuhake o te mate taikaha, i korerotia ki a ia ka takoto i runga i te kōnae. I whakawāteatia tētahi atu kaihautū Roma, a Filippo Lombardi, e 21, i te wā o Whiringahora i te tūkinotanga kino ki a Tēnā Cox, ahakoa i hereheretia ia mo te toru tau mo te mate taikaha. Ko te tangata tuatoru, ko Daniele Sciusco, 29, mai i Roma, i whakaae ki te raruraru taikaha, a, i hereheretia ia i Aotearoa mo te rua me te hāwhe tau.

title: Ko te hau ki uta 'kia hoki mai ki UK'
summary: Ko te momo hiko hou tino iti rawa i te UK - ko te hau ki uta - kua tautuhia kia hoki mai, e ai ki te whakataunga a te kāwanatanga i tēnei rā.
text: Nā Roger HarrabinBBC kaitātari taiao i āraia e ngā Minita ngā kaupapa i muri i ngā amuamu a ngā kaiwhakahauhau paetata he poke i runga i te whenua. Ka urupare te kāwanatanga mā te whakakāhore i te hau ki uta i te wā hei tono utu mō te hiko e whakaputaina ana e rātau. I hoatu hoki e rātau he kōrero tūturu ki ngā kaiwhakahaere paetata i roto i te tukanga whakarite. Ko te tikanga o tēnei kāore e taea e ngā pāmu hau te whiwhi whakaaetanga. I kī ngā kaitiaki taiao he koretake te whakataunga, ā, i tēnei rā kua whakatuwheratia e te kāwanatanga te huarahi mō ngā kaiwhakawhanake pāmu hau ki uta ki te tono tautoko utu. I te wā roa, ko te tikanga kia māmā ake te hiko mō ngā kaihoko. Ka taea hoki e ngā pāmu kōmaru te tono mō ngā pūmautanga utu. Engari e hiahia tonu ana te kāwanatanga kia kaha te kōrero a te iwi paetata ki te whakataunga i hangaia ai rātau. Ko te tikanga o tēnā, he torutoru noa iho ngā tūmanakotanga e tūmanakohia ana i Ingarangi. Ahakoa rā, i Pākehā, e hari ana a Scottish Power. E 1,000MW tōna i roto i te paipa mō te hau me te kōmaru. Ko te rōpū pēhanga iti e mōhiotia ana ko Possible e pana ana ki te aranga ake o te hau ki uta. E kī ana: "I muri i ngā tau whakahauhau ka taea e tātau te whakanui i te pūtake pūngao hōu rawa o UK e mauria mai ana i te mātao." I muri i te amuamu a nga kaiwhaiwhai Conservative mo te pānga arokite me te haruru o nga pāmu hau i te taiwhenua. I ngā wāhanga o te pāpāho, ka āpitihia te kupu "kino" ki te kupu pāmu hau - ā, ko te nuinga o ngā MP i whakapono he tino kore e manakohia e te iwi whānui. Ko te mea, ko ngā rangahau a te kāwanatanga e whakaatu ana i te tautoko tūmatanui nui rawa mō te hau ki uta - ahakoa kāore i ngā wā katoa i ngā wāhi i hangaia ai. I kī a Scottish Power ā muri ake nei ka hangaia e rātau ngā pāmu kōmaru, ngā pāmu hau me ngā pāteri ki te pae kotahi hei whakamōrahi i te huaputa me te whakaiti i te whakararuraru. Whāia a Roger i Twitter.

title: E whakatau ana a Boris Johnson i ngā 'tirohanga whakarihariha' i roto i a Mātau
summary: Kua whakataua e te Pirimia o Poipoi Rōnea nga "tirohanga whakarihariha" i roto i a Mātau, i muri i te āwhā a nga kaitautoko o Perehitini Donald Trump i te Rōpū Nui, a, ka tū ki nga pirihimana.
text: I pakaru nga kaiwhakararuraru i te whare Capitol i hui ai nga kaipānui ki te whakaū i te wikitoria perehitini a Joe Biden. I kī te PM he "tino nui kia puta he whakawhitinga hiko hūmārie, tika hoki". A, ka kī te kaiārahi Mahi a Tā Keir Starmer he "whakaeke hāngai ki te kāwanatanga ā iwi". "E tū ana te Hononga o Amerika mo te kāwanatanga ā iwi puta noa i te ao, ā, ināianei he tino nui kia puta he whakawhitinga hiko hūmārie, tika hoki," te tuhituhi a Tēnā Hōnea. I tēnei wā, i karangatia e te Minita Tuatahi o Pirihitini, a Nicola Sturgeon, nga mahi "tino whakamataku". Ko te hoa o Perehitini Trump me te kaiārahi o Reform UK - i mua rā ko te Rōpū o Te Rōpū o Te Rōpū - ka tūtohu a Nigel Farage: "Kei te hē te āwhā o Capitol Hill. Me haere nga kaiwhakahaere." Ināianei kua hui anō te Rōpū Nui o Amerika i muri i te tutu - i whakahaua e ngā kerēme tinihanga pōti a Tēnā Trump - ki te whakamana i te wikitōria a Tēnā Biden i te pōtitanga o Amerika i Whiringa ā Rangi. I whakahaua nga ruma e rua o te Rōpū Nui ki te whakatā, i te tūnga o nga kaiwhakahaere ki nga pirihimana me te korohū roimata. Tokowhā ngā tāngata i mate i runga i ngā taunga o Capitol i te wā o te tutu, tae atu ki tētahi wahine i pūhia e ngā pirihimana me ētahi atu tokotoru, i mate nā "ngā ohorere rongoā", te kī a nga pirihimana o te rohe. Kua whakahē ngā MP UK mai i te tūāwhiotanga tōrangapū i ngā mahi i roto i a Mātau. I kī te Hēkeretari ā-Rohe o Dominic Raab "kāore he whakatika mo ēnei whakamātau taikaha ki te whakararuraru i te tauwhiro tika me te tika o te mana", i te wā i karangatia e te Hēkeretari Kāinga o Priti Patel ngā tirohanga "kāore e whakaaetia, kāore i te whakaaetia". I tāpiri mai a ia: "Kaore he whakatika mo tēnei tutu, ā, me whakahē e Donald Trump." Ko tōna hoa mahi Tūturu, me te Hēkeretari Ā-Rohe o mua, i kōrero hāngai atu a Jeremy Hunt ki a Perehitini Trump mō te kōrero ki te huihuinga kia hīkoi ki te Rōpū Nui, e tweet ana: "Ka whakamā a ia i te kāwanatanga ā iwi o Amerika i te pō nei, ā, ka mamae ōna hoa - engari ehara a ia i Amerika." I kī te kaiārahi tuarua o Labour, a Angela Rayner: "He whakamataku te tutu i tukua e Donald Trump, ā, he toto kei runga i o rātau ringa te Pākehā i tū i tōna taha." A, ka kī te hēkeretari ā-rohe o te kōruru, a Lisa Nandy, ko nga takahanga ko "te tawhito o tētahi tōrangapū kino e whakararuraru ana i te iwi ki a rāua anō, ā, ka whakawehi i ngā tūāpapa o te kāwanatanga ā iwi". Ināianei, kua tautāwhi te Hēkeretari Mahi me te Hēkeretari o Te Penihana, a Therese Coffey, te urupare a te pirimia ki te whakararuraru. I pātaitia i runga i te hōtaka Peston a ITV he aha i kore ai a Tēnā Hōnea e whakahē i a Tēnā Puhi, ka kī a ia: "Kua mārama te pirimia i te pō nei e hiahiatia ana e tātau he tauwhiro hūmārie, tika hoki." I tāpiritia e Ms Coffey ko ngā takahanga i roto i a Mātau he "whakamaumahara he mea utu nui te kāwanatanga ā iwi - ā, ka haere tonu te tipu i te wā e tiaki ana mātou i ngā rōpū e hira ai tēnei whenua, ā, kāore e whakaiti i a rātou anō ina ōrite ngā putanga o te nuinga o ngā mea e hiahia ana mātou ki te whakatutuki". I tēnei wā, i kī te kaiārahi o te SNP i Westminster, a Īna Blackford, ko te mutunga o te perehitini o Tēnā Puhi "e kore e taea te haere tere". Ka tūtohu a ia: "Kātahi te tawhito o ngā mahi o tēnei rā ki tōna wā i te tari. He hakaha, he whakamīharo, he whakahāwea ki te kāwanatanga ā iwi." I karangatia e te kaiārahi o ngā Pāremata Liberal, a Ed Davey, ngā tirohanga "tino wehi", i te wā e kī ana te kaikawe kōrero o tana rōpū, a Layla Moran: "Ko ngā tirohanga e puta mai ana i Washington i te pō nei he whakaekenga ki te kāwanatanga ā iwi."

title: Ka wehe atu a Glyndwr Uni i te toa o te Whare Wānanga o Wales
summary: E whakaaro ana te Whare Wānanga o Glyndwr i Wrexham ki te whakarere i te toatanga o ngā whare wānanga e hanga ana i te Whare Wānanga o Weera.
text: The decision follows recent proposals by the Higher Education Funding Council for Wales (Hefcw) to amalgamate Glyndwr with other universities. Ko ngā mahere a te whare wānanga ki te whakawhiwhi i ōna ake waeine e tohu ana i te whakaaro kia noho takitahi tonu. I kī a Hefcw kāore i te hiahia ki te kōrero mō ngā kaupapa. Kua tonoa te Kāwanatanga o Welsh kia kōrero. I kī te tumuaki tumuaki o Glyndwr, a Ahorangi Michael Scott, ko te whakataunga he mehua o te "tupu nui me te kauneketanga" o te Whare Wānanga o Glyndwr i roto i ngā tau e toru kua hipa. I te tīmatanga o tēnei marama, he tono a Hefcw e hua ana kia tīma a Glyndwr me ētahi atu kura mātauranga anō i raro i te ārahitanga o ngā whare wānanga o Aberystwyth me Bangor, i tūtaki ki te ātete mai i te tokomaha o ngā MP Labour me ngā AM i te raki o Wales. I whakaurua e rātau ko Wrexham MP Ian Lucas, nāna i kī i whakaaturia e te kaupapa he "mōhiotanga kino" o ngā hiahia paetata, ā, ka tangohia atu e ia te ārahitanga i te rohe. I hoatu ki te Minita Mātauranga a Leighton Andrews tētahi kaupapa mō te hanumi i ngā whare wānanga i te raumati, ā, ka tapahia e ngā tūtohutanga mai i Hefcw te tau mai i te 11 ki te ono. I kī a Prof Scott: "E toru tau angitu te hākinakina mai i te whiwhinga o te tūnga whare wānanga, e whakapono ana mātou kua tae ki te wā ināianei ki te whakawhiwhi i ngā mana whakawhiwhinga waeine i mahi uaua ai mātau ki te whiwhi i te tau 2008. " Kua whakatūria e te whare wānanga hei tohu manaaki, e tipu ana i te ao whānui, tae atu ki te whāngai i ngā mahi matua me te mahi ārahi i te whanaketanga ohaoha me te whanaketanga pāpori i te raki o Wales. "I te tau 2010 i whakaurua e mātau he hanganga ā-rōpū hou, he hanganga kōmihana hoki. " Nā tēnei i tino whakakaha ai te kaha o te whare wānanga ki te aroturuki i te kounga, te utu me te hāngaitanga o ngā akoranga e tukuna ana e mātou, me te whakarite kei te tutuki i ngā hiahia o te rohe, te whenua me ā mātou ākonga." 'Delivering our mission' Ko te tikanga o ngā huringa ka whakawhiwhia katoatia e Glyndwr ōna ake waeine, kaua ko ērā mai i te Whare Wānanga o Weera. Students enrolling for 2011 courses will be offered the opportunity to register for Glyndwr University degrees, but can also choose to receive a University of Wales degree. Kāore te huringa e pā ki ngā ākonga rangahau mātauranga, pērā ki ērā e ako ana mō ngā PhD. I hangaia te Whare Wānanga o Wales Alliance i te tau 2009, ā, ko ngā whare wānanga mātauranga teitei iti rawa, hōu rawa hoki o Wales, tae atu ki ētahi tau i Cardiff, Swansea, Newport me Carmarthen. I roto i ngā tau e whitu kua hipa atu i ngā whare wānanga o Kānata, Bangor, Swansea me Aberystwyth i te whare wānanga. Commenting on the future membership of the University of Wales Alliance, a spokesperson for the University of Wales, Newport said: "Newport is currently focused on securing the best future for delivering our mission in the Gwent region through developing our response to the consultation on reconfiguration of the HE sector in Wales. " I tēnei wā, ka mōhio mātou ki ngā whanaketanga i roto i te wāhanga, engari ko ngā whakataunga mō ā mātou pātahitanga ā muri ake ka tāparetia e tā mātou urupare ki te whakaaro a te Kāwanatanga o Welsh." I te tau 2008, i whakawhiwhia ki a Glyndwr, i mua ko te Whare Wānanga o Te Rāwhiti o Te Rāwhiti, te tūnga whare wānanga i te tau 2008, ā, i tapaina ki te rangatira whakakeke o Owain Glyndwr. Nō nā tata nei i pānuitia e ngā whare wānanga o Trinity Saint David me Swansea Metropolitan ngā mahere mō tētahi whakakotahitanga tika ki te Whare Wānanga o Weera. I tangohia e Uwic te "whare wānanga tino pai" hou i marohitia i a Hōngongoi, e kī ana i te "kore aro atu ki te whakahaere pai, te tukanga tika me te whakahaere."

title: Jersey freedom of information law extension delayed
summary: Kāore e puta ngā mahere hei whakaroa atu i te ture wāteatanga mōhiohio o Jersey ki ngā kamupene kāwanatanga tae noa ki te tau 2017.
text: I Whiringa o Whiringa 2014 i whakaaetia e ngā kaipōrangapū tētahi tono a Tuarua Carolyn Labey kia whakaroa atu te ture. I tēnei wā kua aukatia ngā kamupene pēnei i te JT Global, Andium Homes me te Kamupene Whanaketanga o Jersey. Kāore anō kia tīmata tētahi tono wāteatanga mōhiohio me pēhea te whakaroa i te ture nā ngā "huringa kaimahi" i te tari wāteatanga mōhiohio. I kī te tari: "Nā te kawenga mahi whakahaere, he takaware te whiwhi tohutohu mō te tono kia whakaroha i te Ture hei taupoki i ngā kamupene kāwanatanga, whakahaere rānei. " I whiwhi tohutohu i te hawhe tuarua o te 2015, engari nā te whakarākeitanga ā-roto me ngā huringa kaimahi i roto i te Tīma Wāteatanga o te Mōhiohio, kātahi anō ka tīmata anō te mahi ki te whakawhānuitanga o te Ture." Tērā tētahi whakaaro i whakarewaina ki ngā kamupene i te tōmua o tērā tau, ā, ko te ture e tūmanakohia ana kia taupokina aua kamupene i te tau 2017 nā te matatinitanga o te ture. Ina whakaurua ki te ture Wāteatanga o te Mōhiohio, me whakaputa e rātou ngā mōhiohio i tonoa i roto i te 20 rā. Ko te ture i mana i te 1 o Hānuere 2015, e kapi ana i ngā tari kāwanatanga me ngā pārihi motu e 12.

title: Dairy Crest jobs to go in Liverpool and Cambridgeshire
summary: Tae atu ki te 470 ngā tāngata ka taea te whakakore i ngā tipu o Dairy Crest i Liverpool me Cambridgeshire.
text: Kua pānuitia e te kaiwhakarato miraka ngā tono kia kati i ōna wheketere i Aintree, e 220 ngā tāngata e mahi ana, me Fenstanton e 250 ngā tāngata e mahi ana. I kī te kamupene e whawhai ana ki tētahi mākete miraka "tino uaua", ā, mā ngā huringa e āwhina ki te whakaiti i ngā utu me te tautoko i te pūteatanga. Kua tīmata tētahi whakaaro ki roto i ngā marohi, kua whakaritea mō tēnei tau. I kī te rangatira nui o Mark Allen ka parea e ngā katinga te wā heke mai o te taha miraka kau o te umanga. "Kāore anō kia māmā te whakatau kia uiui mō te katinga o ā mātou pūkenga o Aintree me Fenstanton, engari e whakapono ana mātou ko tēnei whakarākeitanga anō o ā mātou umanga miraka kau te whakataunga tika mō te wā roa." 'Moto nui' i kī a Dairy Crest kua whakangāwaritia ngā katinga kua marohitia e tētahi hōtaka pūtea penapena £75m o nā noa nei. E kī ana ko ērā atu miraka kau "pounamu maha" e toru o te rōpū, i Severnside, i Gloucestershire; Chadwell Heath, ki te raki-rāwhiti o Rānana; me Foston, Derbyshire, kua pai ake ināianei, ā, kua nui ake te kaha. I kī a Toby Brinsmead, te kaiwhakahaere whakahaere o ngā hua wai o Dairy Crest: "Ka mahia e mātou ngā mea katoa e taea ana e mātou ki te kimi i ētahi atu mahi [kaimahi] i waho, i roto rānei i Dairy Crest, mēnā ka taea e mātou... engari e mihi ana ahau ki te nuinga ka ngana mātou ki te āwhina i a rātou ki te kimi mahi kē. "He kaupapa noa iho tēnei i tēnei wā, engari me puta te whakataunga ka katia e mātau nga miraka kau ki te mutunga o te tau 2012." I kī a Cath Speight, te āpiha ā-motu i te uniana Unite, he "rongo whakararuraru" mō ngā kaimahi i ngā pae e rua. "Kua uru mātou ināianei ki te whakaaro 90 rā, ā, ka mahi a Unite i ngā mea katoa e taea ana ki te tiaki i ēnei mahi, ki te tiaki i ngā painga o ā mātou mema me te whakamōrahi i te wā mō te tukunga anō. " He tino nui te moto o ēnei katinga mō ngā kaimahi me ngā wāhi paetata e pāngia ana. "E tūmanako ana mātou ka whakaaro anō te whakahaere a Dairy Crest i tēnei whakataunga."

title: E pire ana ngā pononga tūmatanui 'he mata auahi mo te hinganga'
summary: Kua kī te Hēkeretari o Aiarangi ki te Raki a Karen Bradley he ture hou e whakarato ana i te "wā tino pai" ki te tuku tiritiri hiko.
text: Nā Enda McClaffertyBBC News E whakapono ana a ia ka homai te "wātea" me te wā hei tīmata anō i ngā kōrero tōrangapū. E whai ana te pire kia nui ake te ngāwari ake o nga pononga tūmatanui ina whakatau. Engari i ākiritia e te kaiārahi UUP o mua a Ariki Empey te pire hei "mata paowa mo te hinganga". Me tere te aroturuki i te Pire Whakatū Nui me te Whakamahi Taumahi i roto i te Whare o Ngātahi me te Whare o nga Ariki. Ka whakatārewatia hoki e ia te mahi ā-ture a te hēkeretari o te kāwanatanga ki te karanga i tētahi pōti whakaminenga hou. "Ka waihangatia e te pire tētahi wā e taea ai te whakatū i tētahi kaiwhakahaere i ngā wā katoa e kore ai he mahi ki te karanga i tētahi pōti," te kī a Mrs Bradley. "Mā tēnei e whakarato he wā me te wā me te mokowā e tika ana hei tīmata anō i ngā kōrero tōrangapū me te whāinga ki te whakaora i te kāwanatanga i ngā wā tata nei. " Ko te ngākau o te Whakaaetanga o Belfast he kāwanatanga tiritiri hiko i Aiarangi ki te Raki. "Mā tēnei pire e tino pai ai te tuku i tēnā." I kī a Mrs Bradley, ina puta te ture i te pāremata, ka āwhina i ngā rōpū tōrangapū ki te whakamahi i ngā "marama tata nei" ki te huri i te tēpu me te whakaaetanga. E whakarato ana te pire mō tētahi wā e rima marama tae atu ki te 26 o Poutāpeta e taea ai te whakatū i tētahi kaiwhakahaere me te kore ture matua, pōti whakaminenga rānei. Kua whakaritea hoki he whakarato hai whakaroa i te wā mo te rima marama anō. Engari kāore he whakaaetanga, he rā rānei i roto i te kōrero i whakaputaina e te hēkeretari o Aiarangi ki te Raki ki te tīmatanga o tētahi tukanga kōrero. E pā ana hoki te ture ki te whakatau whakataunga i Stormont, ā, ka whakarato i te māramatanga ā-ture mō ngā pononga tūmatanui e whakahaere ana i ngā tari o Stormont i te ngarotanga o ngā minita. Ka tautokona rātau ki te tohutohu a te hēkeretari o Aiarangi ki te Raki, engari ko te whakataunga whakamutunga ka noho ki nga pononga tūmatanui. Ko ngā whakataunga e pā ana ki ngā taumata tiketike o te hokohoko tūmatanui, i tētahi huringa rānei o te kaupapahere, kāore e taea e ngā kaiwhakahaere, ā, ka waiho kētia mā ngā minita. Ka hoatu hoki e te pire ki ngā minita kāwanatanga o UK te mana ki te whakarite wāhui tūmatanui. Ka pā ēnei ki te Komihana Wāhui Whakawā o Aiarangi ki te Raki, te Poari Pirihimana o Aiarangi ki te Raki, te Poari Whakamātautau me te Ombudsman Pirihimana. Ko te tikanga kia taupatupatutia te ture i Westminster a tērā Wenerei, ā, e tūmanakohia ana kia mana i te tōmua o Whiringa ā Rangi. E whakapono ana ngā kaiwhakawāwā o te ture ka kitea e ia ngā whakataunga nunui e toe ana i runga i te whata, ā, ka waiho ngā pononga tūmatanui e mōrearea ana ki ngā uauatanga ā-ture. I kī a Sinn Féin South Down MP Chris Hazzard he "āhuatanga whakarihariha". I hinga te kāwanatanga o Aiarangi ki te Raki i Stormont i te Hānuere 2017, ā, kua mahue ngā pononga tūmatanui ki te whakahaere i ngā ratonga tūmatanui o Aiarangi ki te Raki mai i taua wā. Engari i rangirua ta rātau mahi i te wā o Me i te whakatau a te kōti kāore i a tētahi mana matua te mana ki te hoatu i te haere ki mua mō tētahi tipu tahu moumou tautohetohe. I tērā marama, i a ia e pānui ana i te utu o ngā mema whakaminenga, ka kī a Mrs Bradley ka whakatakotoria e ia he ture hei whakarato i te "māramatanga nui ake me te mōhiotanga" mō ngā pononga tūmatanui me te "whakarite i te tukunga haere tonu o ngā ratonga tūmatanui".

title: Te Kaunihera Pēhi "tuma i te rongoā"
summary: E kī ana te Kaunihera Pēhi i tētahi tuma ki te pukapuka pukapuka i Sri Lanka, e kī ana ngā kaitiaki pāpāho ao whānui.
text: Na te whakapuaki i te āwangawanga mo te whakatau a te kāwanatanga o Sri Lanka ki te whakaora i te kaunihera pēhi, ka kī a Reporters without Borders (RSF) "E tohu ana te Kaunihera Pēhi i tētahi tuma nui ake i te rongoā". I whakaūngia e te Minita Pāpāho o Rikshman Yapa Abeywardena ngā mahere a te kāwanatanga ki te whakaora i te Kaunihera Pēhi, i waihangatia i te tau 1973, kātahi ka whakatārewatia i te tau 2002. Ka whai mana te Kaunihera Pēhi ki te whakaoti i ngā rerenga herehere ki ngā kaipūrongo me ngā whakaputa rongokōrero. I whakamāramatia e RSF ko Sri Lanka tētahi o ngā whenua tuatahi i Āhia ki te whakawātea i ngā hara pēhi me te tono i te kāwanatanga kia whakawātea i ngā ture i mua i te whakamōhio anō i te Kaunihera Pēhi. I kī hoki tētahi kōrero i tukuna e te Komiti hei Tiaki i ngā Kaipūrongo (CPJ) "tērā pea ka nui te āhua o te kaunihera pēhi, engari koia te momo utauta kua kitea e mātau i ngā whenua maha e hiahia ana te kāwanatanga ki te whakangū i ngā kaiwhakawāwā." I a ia e kōrero ana ki te Pēhi Pāhono, ka kī te minita pāpāho kāore te kāwanatanga i whakahohe anō i te kaunihera pēhi me te whāinga ki te whakangū i te pāpāho. I tono te CPJ ki te iwi kia kaua e hoko i ngā tohenga a te kāwanatanga hei tautoko i te Kaunihera, ā, nā te kaha o te pēhanga a te kāwanatanga, he tokomaha nga kaipūrongo 'i mutu te tuhituhi, ā, ko ētahi atu kua rere i te whenua'. E tohutohu ana hoki a RSF i nga mana whakawā kia unuhia ngā takahanga katoa ki te rōpū Kaiārahi Rātapu, me te karanga ki ngā pirihimana kia mōhio ki te hunga e whakawehi ana i ngā kaipūrongo.

title: Te whakawātanga o Antoni Imiela: Kāore i taea e te tūkino te karanga'
summary: I rongo te tūkino i tana tāne e haere ana i mua i a ia e whakaekea ana, engari kāore i taea te karanga āwhina, kua rongo te kōti.
text: Ka kī atu a Erwin Jankowitz ki te Old Bailey i kī tana wahine kua rongo ia i a ia e haere ana, engari i runga i tōna mangai tōna ringa, a, ka whakawehi ki te whakamate i a ia. E whakapaea ana a Antoni Imiela ki te hīkaka, te whakaekenga kino me te tūkinotanga nui i te tonga-rāwhiti o Rānōna, i te tau kotahi mano e waru tekau mā rua. E whakakāhore ana te pakeke e 57 tau i nga whakapae, e kī ana he whakaaetanga te wahine. Ka kī atu a Tēnā Jankowitz ki te kōti ka hoki tana wahine ki to rātau whare noho i Forest Hill i ngā haora tōmua o te Rā Kirihimete e kī ana kua werohia ia. I kī a ia kua pōraru ōna makawe, ā, i roto a ia i "te āhua o te āhua". "Ko te mea kino rawa e hiahia ana koe kia korerotia, ki te rongo i te wero o to wahine," te kī a Tēnā Jankowitz. "He tino wehi. Ki taku whakaaro kei te tino pōhēhē koe." Kēhi mātao i rongo te kōti i mauria e Mrs Jankowitz tana tāne ki te wāhi o te whakaekenga - i muri i tētahi wharau e tata ana ki to rātau whare noho o Forest Hill - a, ka kōrero ki tana tāne i te mea i tūpono. Ka kī a Tēnā Jankowitz: "I runga tōna ringa i runga i tōna mangai, a, ka kī mēnā ka hamama a ia ka tukitukia e ia tōna māhunga. " I tino riri tēnā i a au, nā te mea he tata rawa te wharau, e rua mita te mamao. Tērā pea ka taea e au te aukati i te mahi, engari i a ia e pupuri ana i tōna ringa, kāore i taea e ia te karanga." I honoa te DNA o Tāne Imiela ki te whakaekenga, neke atu i te rua tekau tau i muri mai e ngā kaitohutohu mai i tētahi rōpū kēhi mātao. Kua korerotia ki te hūri i te tau 2004 i whakawāteatia ia mo nga whakangungu wahine e whitu kaore ia i mōhio. E rua tau i muri mai i te whakaekenga whakapae, ka rapu a Mrs Jankowitz i te rongoā mo nga raruraru hauora hinengaro. I muri i tana tukunga mai i te hōhipera ka hoki ia ki Awherika ki te Tonga, a, ka mutu tana mārena. Ka haere tonu te whakamātautau. Ngā Hononga Ipurangi Pātahi Te Ratonga Kōti o Tōna Rangatiratanga

title: Kua whakaaetia ngā rongoā hōu mō te NHS o Pākehā
summary: Kua whakaaetia ngā rongoā hōu mō te rongoā i te ānini, te psoriasis me te mate pukupuku ate hei whakamahi e NHS Scotland.
text: Kua raihanatia ngā rongoā e toru e te Scottish Medicines Consortium hei whakamahi i roto i te ratonga hauora o Pākehā. Kei roto ko Erenumab, mō ngā migraine pūmau, Lenvatinib, mō ngā tūroro mate pukupuku ate, me Certolizumab, mō te psoriasis taumaha. I kī te manukura SMC o Dr Alan MacDonald e tūmanako ana te komiti ka pōhiritia ngā nekehanga e ngā tūroro. Ko ngā tūroro e pāngia ana e te migraine pūmau kua kite i ētahi atu rongoā ārai e toru neke atu rānei, ka taea ināianei te tango i te Erenumab, e mōhiotia ana hoki ko Amiovig, i muri i te kitenga he whakaiti i te roanga o ngā āhuatanga pēnei i te mamae o te māhunga me te māuiui. Ko ngā tūroro mate pukupuku ate me te mate pukupuku hepatocellular - he momo mate pukupuku i kitea i te wāhanga tōmuri, ka taea e ngā tūroro te uru ki Lenvatinib (Lenvima rānei) mēnā kāore e taea e rātou te mahi, te whakawhiti rānei. Ā, ka tukuna e Certolizumab (Cimzia rānei) tētahi atu kōwhiringa rongoā mō ngā tūroro pakeke me te psoriasis tohu taumaha, kāore anō kia urupare ki ngā rongoā paerewa.

title: Ka whakaatu a Icann i ngā kerēme ingoa rohe taumata matua ipurangi hōu
summary: Tata tonu ki te hawhe o ngā taupānga katoa mō ngā whakamutunga wāhitau kupenga hōu, e ai ki te tinana e whakahaere ana i te whakawhānuitanga.
text: I kī te Kaporeihana Ipurangi mō ngā Ingoa me ngā Tau i Tautapatia (Icann) kua whiwhi tono 884 mō ngā hiku hōu mai i a Mātau, mai i te tapeke o te 1,930. He taumira, e 40 aua taupānga mai i te UK, 303 mai i te rohe o Āhia-Kiwa, me te 17 mai i Āwherika. Ko ngā taipitopito o wai i tono mō ngā mea ka whakaaturia ki Rāwāhi ā muri ake. I mua i te hui pānui, i whakaaturia hoki e Icann e 166 o ngā kerēme mō tāna i kīia ai ko "ngā ingoa rohe ao whānui" - ngā rohe taumata-matua whānui (gTLDs) kāore i roto i te tātai reta Rātini. "Ko te tikanga mēnā he tangata koe e noho ana i Haina, i tētahi wāhi rānei i Īnia, tērā pea ka whai wāhi koe ki te whakamahi i te ipurangi i roto i tō hōtuhi māori," te kī a te perehitini me te rangatira nui o Icann, a Rod Beckstrom, ki te HAU. "Mā tēnei e whakatata ake ai te ipurangi ki ngā tāngata. Kei te kite hoki mātou i tētahi ia i runga i ngā pūrere pūkoro ki ngā tāngata e pīrangi ana ki ngā ingoa poto, ā, ka whai wāhi mō ngā ingoa poto ake i konei, nā te mea he ingoa taumata tuarua ināianei ka noho hei taumata tuatahi." Ko tētahi tauira o tēnei mēnā ka whakawhiti te wāhitau tukutuku www.canon.com/products ki www.products.canon. Ko ngā ingoa whānui Ko te kaihanga kāmera Hapanihi tētahi o ngā rōpū maha kua whakaūngia kua utua e ia te utu $185,000 (£118,800) hei whai wāhi ki te tukanga taupānga. Kua whakaaturia hoki e te kaiwhakahaere ingoa rohe .uk kore hua o Nominet kua hoatu ki te whakahaere i te .wales me te .cymru i te wā e kī ana a Google kua hoatu mō .google, .youtube me .lol. Kei te whai painga hoki ētahi atu tinana iti iho i te nekehanga. Kua pau i te umanga Top Level Domain Holdings neke atu i te $13.5m te tono mō ngā taupānga 92 ki a ia anō me ngā kiritaki. Kei roto i ēnei ko ngā kerēme mō te .hotel, .cricket, .london me te .music. I kī atu a Directi ā-Aorangi ki te AO kua hoatu hoki mō ngā gTLDs "mākete maha" e 31 tae atu ki te .law, .bank me te .baby. Ko ngā kerēme papā e anga ana ngā whakahaere ki te utu whakahōu ā-tau mōkito $25,000 hei pupuri i tō rātou hiku, engari kāore e tutuki ngā taupānga katoa. "Ngā taupānga ā-hapori" - ko ērā mai i ngā pāhonotanga hokohoko, i ētahi atu rōpū rānei e tohu ana i ngā whakarōpū nui e mōhiotia ana - ka nui ake i ngā "taupānga paerewa" - ērā mai i ngā umanga motuhake me ētahi atu. Hei tauira, mēnā kua tono katoa a PepsiCo, Coca-Cola me ngā Kaiwhakanao Kai o Amerika mō .cola, me hoatu manakē te GMA. Mēnā e rua, neke atu rānei ngā kaitono tūnga ōrite kua tono i te ingoa ōrite, ka whakaohotia tētahi tukanga taumira. "Ka whakamōhio atu mātou ki a rātou kua whakaaetia, ā, ko wai atu kua whakaaetia, ā, e kī ana he 60 rā tā rātou ki te whakaaro me pēhea rātou e whakatika ai i tēnei," te kī a Tēnā Beckstrom. "Ki te kore rātou e whakatika i tēnei i roto i te 60 rā, ka whakatakotoria e mātou mō te hokonga e taea ai e ia o rātou te tono mō te wā. Ka haere ngā hua o taua hokonga ki tētahi hinonga aroha, whai hua kore rānei." Kua kitea he tautohetohe te tukanga. E 87 ngā kamupene me ngā pāhonotanga pakihi i tuku petihana ki te Tari Tauhokohoko o Amerika i tērā tau e kī ana "he nui rawa te utu me te tūkino ki ngā rangatira parani" me te "tūponotanga o te tūkino ā-ipurangi ki ngā kaihoko". Engari ka roa te wā kia mōhio ai mēnā e pono ana aua āwangawanga. Nā te rōrahi o ngā tono, ka whakarite a Icann ki te wehe me te arotake i ngā taupānga i roto i ngā rōpu tata ki te 500. E kī ana ko te tuatahi e tūmanakohia ana kia ora i tētahi wā i waenganui i Aperira me Pipiri 2013.

title: Ki te kore e whai rawa te pirihitini hiraka
summary: Ka pēhea tō whakaaro mēnā kāore e wātea ana ngā rongoā e whakawhirinaki ana koe, tō whānau rānei i te NHS?
text: Ka nui tō moni hei utu i te utu katoa mō ngā tūemi pēnei i ngā kirīmi motuhake hei rongoā i te hakihaki, i ngā tīhore whakamātautau rānei hei whakahaere i te mate huka? Tērā pea ko te hua mēnā ka hoatu ngā huringa i marohitia e NHS Ingarangi ki mua. Ka whāwhā ngā tono i te whakahaunga o ngā tūemi pēnei i ngā kākahu hiraka mō ngā tūroro eczema, ngā hiahia mō ētahi pene insulin mō ngā mate huka, me te Amiodarone hei whakamahi i ngā rangi manawa rerekē. E toru tau te pakeke o Jasper 'Life-saver', ā, he hakihaki tōna. I tua atu i te whakamahi i ngā kirīmi motuhake, e mau ana hoki a ia i ngā kakahu hiraka, i ngā waewae me ngā karapu. Me te whakarato whakamarie mō te tamaiti iti, ka whakahaere ngā hiraka i te rakuraku e pā ana ki te toto me te mate tuarua. Ahakoa me tono ētahi o ngā tūemi mā te tākuta whānau, kei raro tonu rātou i te rārangi whakahaunga NHS 'manakē iti'. E kī ana te whaea o Jasper, a Amanda, ehara te kākahu hiraka i te mea whai rawa, he "kaiwhakaora ora" mō tana tama. He iti te moni whiwhinga o te whānau, ā, kāore e taea te utu mēnā ka tangohia te rongoā NHS. E ono tau te pakeke o te tama a Dr David Hodges, ā, he eczema anō tōna. Pēnei i a Jasper, e mau ana a ia i ngā kākahu hiraka e kī ana tōna pāpā kua tino rerekē te mahinga o te āhuatanga. He GP i Stockton-on-Tees, e kite ana a Dr Hodges i ngā taha e rua o te taupatupatu - hei tākuta me te matua. E kī ana a ia ko ngā tūtohutanga NHS Ingarangi he "whakapōrearea, he maiorooro". E kī ana a ia kei raro ngā GP i te pēhanga auau ki te whakaiti i ngā utu whakatau, engari me mahi ki ngā whakahē a ngā tūroro riri. Nā reira, me mahi ngā whakataunga ā muri ake i runga i te "take-ki-te-take". He mate huka momo 1 a Julia Mackinder mai i Wimbledon. Ko te tikanga o tēnei me wero i te insulin kia whā ngā wā i ia rā, mā te whakamahi i te ngira hou i ia wā. Pēnei i a Amanda rāua ko Rawiri, ko te āwangawanga o Julia ko te tango i ngā tūemi whakaora pēnei i ngā ngira me ngā tīhore whakamātautau he "mahi hē". "Tērā te mōrea o te whakapokenga me te tūkino mo te wā roa ka pau te NHS mo te wā roa ki te rongoā," tana kī. 'Kāore i taea e au te piki i te arawhata' He tere te fibrillation atrial a Gary Robertson mai i York, ā, ka mau i a Amiodorone kei runga hoki i te rārangi o ngā rongoā tūpono kia kore ai e whiwhi rongoā auau. Kua whakaahuatia a Amiodorone hei rongoā whakamutunga, ā, ka hoatu anake ki ngā tāngata tino taumaha, mōrearea rānei. Heoi anō, kei te whakaaro a Gary kua whakahokia e te rongoā tōna oranga, ā, kei te māharahara ki te pānga mēnā ka tangohia mai i te whakahaunga. "I tētahi wā, kāore i taea e au te piki i ngā arawhata, kāore i taea te mahi, ā, i tino whakawhirinaki ki taku hoa," te kī a Gary, he kaiwhakawhanake pūmanawa. "Ināianei kei te whakahaere ahau i taku ake umanga, ā, ka noho ahau i tētahi oranga pūnoa". Nā Bernadette McCague, UGC me te Rongokōrero Pāpori

title: I hereheretia te atekōkiri kore-ringa 'nekeneke' o Arāna Ayres mo te tūtukitanga kino
summary: Kua hereheretia tētahi atekōkiri nāna i patu tētahi kaieke motopaika i a ia e waea ana i tētahi waea kore-ringa mo te toru tau.
text: I te taha hē o te huarahi i tana tūtukitanga ki te kaieke motopaika a Rawiri Kirk. I kī a Ayres i ngaro i a ia te mana o tana Ford Fiesta i te wā i poroa e tana wīra o muri te aronga o tētahi huarahi ā-taiwhenua. Engari i whakawāteatia a ia mo te taraiwa mōrearea i muri i te tautohetohe a nga rōia i nekehia a ia. I hoatu hoki ki a ia he ārai taraiwa e whā tau. Ētahi atu kōrero mō tēnei me ētahi atu pūrākau mai i tua atu i te Kōti Karauna o Lincolnshire i rongo a Ayres i te waenganui o te kōrerorero i roto i tētahi waea roa me tētahi hoa i a ia e huri ana ki te taha hē o te huarahi, a, ka patua a Tēnā Kirk, 26, i Baumber Road, Horsington. I whakakāhore a Ayres kua nekehia a ia, a, i kī kua tūtuki a ia ki tētahi rua, ki tētahi rut rānei, ā, nā tērā i ngaro ai tōna mana. Engari kāore i kitea e ngā pirihimana he whakaaturanga hei tautoko i tēnei. I kī te Kaiwhakawā o Hoani Pini QC ahakoa he tika te whakamahinga kore-ringa, ka noho whakapōrearea tonu. "He mōrearea te whakamahi i te ringa-kore i roto i ēnei āhuatanga," tana kī. I te whiu i a Ayres, ka kī te Kaiwhakawā Piri: "Kāore he mea e taea e taku kōrero te whakahoki i te karaka. Kaore he rerenga kōrero e tīmata ki te whakatika i tōna matenga." "Ki a ia te ngaro i tōna ora i tēnei ara, he mea tika hoki." I whakakāhore a Ayres, o West Street, o Horncastle, i te whakapae i te mate i te taraiwa mōrearea nā te tūtukitanga i te 7 o Whiringa 2016. I kitea he hara a ia e te hūri i tētahi whakarongo tōmua. Te ture

title: Papa Whāwhāwhā: I arotahi hoki te Hāhi ki ngā tāne me te whakatahe
summary: Kua kī a Papa Whāwhāwhā e arotahi rawa ana te Hāhi Katorika ki te kauwhau mō te whakatahe, te hunga tāne me te āraitanga, ā, me nui ake te aroha.
text: I whakatūpato a ia ka taea e te hanganga morare o te Hāhi te "hinga pēnei i te whare kāri" ki te kore e huri. I whakamahia e te Pāpā te uiuinga nui tuatahi o tōna pāpātanga hei whakamārama i ngā kōrero i whakaputaina e ia i a Hōngongoi mō te tānetanga. I kī atu a ia ki tētahi pukapuka Jesuit me whakaatu te Hāhi i te whārite me te "whakaora i ngā motu". I whakamahia e te pontiff te uiuinga kupu 12,000 ki a La Civilta Cattolica hei whakatakoto i ana manakē hei Pāpa, e whakaae ana ki ōna ake hē, me te whakatuwhera i ōna painga ahurea. 'Te hou me te kakara' Ko tana kitenga mo te whakaheke i te whakawhirinakitanga o te Hāhi Katorika ki ngā ture e tohu ana i tētahi taumira ki ngā manakē o ōna tuatahi, a Hoani Paora II me Benedict XVI, nāna i kite i te akoranga hei kaiārahi tino nui mō ngā minita "Kāore e taea te whakararuraru i te mahi whakaheke a te hāhi ki te tarenga o te tini o ngā akoranga kia whakahaua tonutia, " Te kī a Francis. " Me kimi tātau i tētahi toenga hou; ki te kore e hinga te whare morare o te hahi pēnei i te whare kāri, ka ngaro te hou me te kakara o te Rongopai." Engari, i kī a ia, me mahi te Hāhi Katorika ki te whakaora i ngā motu o ōna pono me te rapu i te hunga kua aukatia, kua hinga rānei. "He koretake te pātai atu ki tētahi tangata tino whara mehemea he ngakowai tiketike tōna, ā, mo te taumata o ōna huka toto," tana kī. "Me whakaora e koe ōna motu. Kātahi ka taea e tātau te kōrero mō ētahi atu mea." I kī a ia kua herea te Hāhi ki "ngā ture hinengaro iti" me te mōrearea ki te ngaro i tōna whāinga pono. "Ko te mea tino nui ko te whakapuakitanga tuatahi: Kua whakaorangia koe e Ihu Karaiti. A, ko nga minita o te Hahi me noho hei minita atawhai i runga ake i nga mea katoa.'' Tērā pea ka puta mai i ana kōrero te wehi i waenganui i ngā minita i Te Hononga o Amerika, kua whakapuakina kētia te matekiri kāore anō a Francis kia pēhi i te whakaakoranga a te Hāhi mō te whakatahe, te āraitanga me te tānetanga. I tērā wiki, i tuhituhi a Pīhopa Thomas Tobin o Providence, Rhode Island, i roto i tana nūpepa diocesan i "matekiri" a Francis kāore i kōrero ki te whakatahe mai i te tīmatanga o tōna pāpātanga i te ono marama ki mua, e ai ki te AP. 'Kāinga o te katoa' Engari i kī a Francis: "Kāore e taea e mātou te tohe anake ki ngā take e pā ana ki te whakatahe, te mārena tāne me te whakamahinga o ngā tikanga ārai ārai. Kāore e taea tēnei,'' tana kī. "He mārama te whakaakoranga a te Hāhi, mō tēnā take, ā, he tama ahau na te Hāhi, engari ehara i te mea tika kia kōrero mō ēnei take i ngā wā katoa.'' E rua marama ki muri i tana kōrero mō ngā tohunga tāne i te wā o tētahi hui rongokōrero i runga i tētahi rerenga whakahoki mai i Parīhi. I kī a ia ehara i a ia te whakawā mo te takotoranga tōkai o nga minita i a rātau e rapu ana i te Atua, a, he manaaki. I roto i tana uiuinga hou rawa, ka kī a Francis e hāngai ana kōrero ki te whakaakoranga Katorika. "Ko tēnei Hāhi e tika ana kia whakaarohia e tātau ko te kāinga o te katoa, ehara i te whare karakia iti e āhei ana ki te pupuri i tētahi rōpū iti anake o ngā tāngata kua tīpakohia. Me kaua tātau e whakaiti i te uma o te Hāhi ao whānui ki tētahi kōhanga e pare ana i to tātau noa iho,'' tana kī. I whakamahia hoki e Francis te uiuinga hei whakamārama i ana kaitito makau, kaiwaiata, kaituhi me ngā pikitia, arā ko Mozart, Caravaggio, Dostoevsky me La Strada a Fellini.

title: Ko te Whakaata Pango me te kiriata a Pratchett e toa ana i te International Emmys
summary: Kua whakahonoretia rāua tahi i te International Emmys te pikitia a Tā Terry Pratchett mō te āwhina i a ia me te pūhohe C4 a Charlie Brooker Black Mirror.
text: Terry Pratchett: I toa te Kōwhiri kia Mate i te kāwai pakipūmeka, i te wā i toa a Black Mirror i te whitiāhua pouaka whakaata tino pai/rangatū iti. I whiwhi hōnore motuhake te kaituhi o Norman Lear me te kaitapere tōkeke o Alan Alda i te takahanga, e whakanui ana i te tino pai o te whakanao pouaka whakaata i waho o te US. E whitu nga whakawhiwhinga i mauria e nga whakanaotanga o Ingarangi ki te kāinga mai i te hui o tērā tau. Na te kōwhiri kia mate i kite a Tā Terry i te haere ki tētahi whare hauora o Huitene hei wāhanga o te tirohanga hōhonu ki te hātepe whakamomori āwhina. I titiro te hōtaka o TE Rua o TE AO ki te āhua o te kaituhi hokohoko tino pai, i kitea i te mate o Pūrehurehu i te tau 2008, ka kōwhiri pea ki te whakamutu i tōna ora. Ko te Whakaata Pango, i whakaahuatia e te Hongere 4 he "kupu whakarite hurihuri" mō te āhua o tātau e noho ana i tētahi ao hou, i te tau 2011. I whakaritea tētahi rangatū tuarua o te whakaaturanga, i whakaawetia e te rangatū kōrero kōrero a AMERIKA The Twilight Zone, i a Hōngongoi. Ko ngā tohu motuhake a Lear, e 90, i rongonuitia te sitcom o te tau 1970 All in the Family, e titiro ana ki ngā take o te iwi me ngā mana wahine. I a ia e kohikohi ana i tana whakawhiwhinga motuhake i te Mane, ka kī a ia "ka huihui te ao i roto i ngā toi". I whiwhi a Alda, e tino mōhiotia ana mō tana mahi i M*A*S*H hei tākuta i te raina o mua i te Pakanga Kōria, i whiwhi i taua hōnore ōrite. I hoatu takoha te pakeke e 76 tau ki nga rongoā tūturu e tiaki ana i te whara i te whawhai, e kī ana "ko ngā tāne me ngā wāhine i roto i ngā teneti hōhipera" i te nuinga o te wā kāore i whakahuatia i ngā whakaaturanga whakawhiwhinga. I te tau 1972, i te tau 1972, i te wā i whakawhiwhia ai ngā Emmy Ao Whānui tuatahi. I kitea hoki e te hui te kaiwhakaari toa o Oscar, ko Jessica Lange e whakawhiwhia ana ki a Ryan Murphy, te kaihanga o Glee, me te whakawhiwhinga International Emmy Founders. I haere ngā tohu e rua mō te mahi ki ngā Āhiana, ā, i toa a Cristina Banegas rāua ko Dario Grandinetti mō te rangatū whakaari Television por la Inclusion. Ko te wā tuatahi tēnei i hoatu ai ngā tohu e rua ki nga kaitapere i roto i te hōtaka kotahi. I taurimatia e te kaihautū whakaaturanga kōrero a Regis Philbin te hui, i tū i te New York Hilton. Six International Emmys for children's programming will be presented at a separate awards ceremony on 8 February.

title: Kēhi kōhuru a Lucy McHugh: I hereheretia a Stephen Nicholson mo te ora
summary: Kua hereheretia tētahi kainoho nāna i wero, i patua tētahi kōtiro 13 tau hei aukati i tana whakawātea i a ia hei kaikino.
text: E 27 ngā wā i okaina e Stephen Nicholson, e 25, a Lucy McHugh i te Pokapū Hākinakina o Waho o Te Wānanga o Hōngongoi i tērā o Hōngongoi. I kitea he hara a ia ki te kōhuru me ngā whakapae e toru mo te whakakōhuru i a Lucy i muri i te whakawātanga i te Kōti Karauna o Winchester, ā, i whakahaua kia noho i te 33 tau i roto i te whare herehere. I kī te Kaiwhakawā o Mrs Justice May he "kī taurangi tē mōhiotia a Lucy, i whakangaromia kinotia" me te whakaahua i a Nicholson he "whakarihariha". Ka kī atu te tiati ki a Nicholson: "He whakaekenga aroha tēnei ki tētahi tamaiti i muri i ngā marama o te taikaha. " Kua whakaahuatia e te ture he kawenga, ā, e mōhio ana ahau he tika tēnei. "Na te pahekotanga o te mātao mātao me te riri wera i whakatau ai me waiho ia ki waho o te ara, ā, ka kitea e ia kua oti tēnei."
