I rongo te whakawā i te tuatahi o te whakawātanga i te wero tuatahi a Nicholson i a Lucy, e 12 tau te pakeke, i a ia e noho ana i tōna kāinga, ā, e rua anō ngā wā i te wiki e whai ake nei. I kī a Mrs Justice May he "mōrearea, he ngāwari noa iho te pārurenga ki tētahi tangata e whakaae ana ki ōna ake hiahia". I kī a ia i "whakahauhau, i pokanoa" hoki a Nicholson i te "kuru" a Lucy ki a ia i muri i tana neke ki te whare whānau, a, ka karanga i a ia "tino kaingākau, whakarihariha". I muri iho ka whakatau a Nicholson kua "noho a Lucy hei ahanoa nui ki tōna oranga hāneanea, ā, he tino tuma ki a ia ki te whakaputa i a ia hei paepae". I kī te tiati kua "mahi ngā kaiako i te mea tika" ki te whakaara i ngā māharahara ki ngā ratonga pāpori, engari kāore he mahi i mahia. I tāpiri mai a ia: "Kua uiuia e te tīma [ratonga pāpori], ā, kāore i kitea he mea hei māharahara ki a rātou. Ko te pātai mārama, 'me pēhea e tae mai ai ngā ratonga pāpori ki taua whakatauranga, ehara i te mea kotahi engari e rua?'". I whakapeka te Kaunihera Taone o Southampton ki te kōrero nā tētahi arotakenga take nui ki ngā pūrongo i whakaritea ki tana tari ratonga pāpori. E tūmanakohia ana kia oti te arotakenga i te mutunga o te tau. I kitea hoki he hara a Nicholson ki tētahi atu kōtiro, 14 tau te pakeke, i te tau 2012. I tukuna ki te kōti ngā kōrero pānga o te whaea me te pāpā o Lucy ki te kōti. I rongo te kōti kua herea a Nicholson i te tau 2009 mō te tango i ngā kaimahi me ngā tangata o tētahi kāinga tamariki o Southampton, i a ia e 14 tau ana. I kī atu te rōia a William Mousley QC ki te kōti, i a ia e noho ana i te kāinga - i raro i te mana o ngā amphetamines - ka whakawehi a Nicholson i ngā kaimahi ki te naihi. Kātahi ka maukatia rātau me ētahi atu tamariki i roto i tētahi rūma, i mua i tana tāhae moni e £1,000 me te haere i roto i te motokā o tētahi kaimahi. I muri iho ka whakawāteatia a ia i muri i tana ārai i a ia i roto i tētahi rūma, a, ka whakawehi i ngā kaimahi i tētahi pokapū hunga hara. I hopukina e Nicholson tētahi ataata pūoro i te tau 2012 hei wāhanga o tētahi kaupapa whakaora pūoro i muri i tana tukunga mai i te whare herehere i taua tau, i reira ia i whakarerekē ai i tōna oranga, kāore i māharahara ki a wai i whara i a ia. I kī te rōia o te wawao, a Hemi Newton-Price QC, he "uaua" te whakatipu a Nicholson, kua whakanohoia ki tētahi kāinga tamariki mai i te 13 o ona tau. I rongo nga kaiwhakawā i neke atu a Nicholson ki te kāinga o te whānau i muri i te pōhiritanga a te hoa roa o Richard Elmes, te hoa o te whaea o Lucy, o Stacey White. I rongo te whakawā ka whakaahuatia e Lucy a Nicholson ki ōna hoa hei "hoa tāne". Ka kī atu a Nicholson ki nga pirihimana ka tukuna e Lucy he karere ki a ia i te pō i mua i tana kōhurutanga, e kī ana kua hapu a ia. I muri i tana whakawai i a ia ki te ngahere pātata, ka okaina ia e 27 ngā wā, tae atu ki te 11 i te kakī, i whakaahuatia e nga rōia he kōhuru "kāhua kawenga". I kitea ā muri ake kāore a Lucy i hapu. I honoa a Nicholson ki te kōhuru mā te whakaaturanga DNA i kitea i runga i ngā kākahu i makaia i te ngahere, tata ki te maero mai i te tirohanga kōhuru. I whakawāteatia hoki a ia ki tētahi kōtiro 14 tau i te tau 2012, i mauria e ia ki te ngahere kotahi i kitea ai a Lucy kua mate i ngā tau i muri iho. I whakawāteatia a Nicholson i tētahi tatau o te mahi tōkai me tētahi tamaiti e pā ana ki a Lucy i muri i tana 13 tau.

title: Te taone rawakore o Ingarangi: Te uaua ki te whakatutuki i ngā mutunga
summary: Pikitia, mēnā e hiahia ana koe, he mangō taurewa. He tāne kanohi mārō, he pūtu nui, he tāne macho pea? Ehara.
text: Nā Kōrero MilliganPersonal Finance Reporter, BBC News He ātaahua te mea e titiro ana ahau, i tōna rua tekau tau, he makawe pūkenga pakihiwi me te nui o te maia parahi ki te kōrero nui ki tōna pāhi i runga i te waea. "Ka taea anake e mātou te hoatu moni whakatārewa ki tētahi 'A', ki tētahi 'B' rānei? Ka aha mēnā he 'C' tō rātou hoa?" Kāore e taea e au te whakarongo ki a ia, nā te mea tokotoru noa iho mātau e noho ana i roto i te pāparapara, papa lino i waenganui o te pānga o Meadows i te tapa o Rātata. Ki te tokomaha, he rongonui tēnei wāhi o te whenua mō ngā paihikara Raleigh, Boots the Chemist, Robin Hood, DH Lawrence rānei. Heoi anō, he tino rangatira hoki a Rāhui mō tētahi atu take, he iti iho te kororia. Ko ngā tatauranga o nā tata nei mai i te Office for National Statistics e hua ana ko ngā tangata o tēnei taone te moni whiwhi kāinga iti rawa o ngā wāhi katoa o te UK. Ko te toharite o te moni whiwhinga mō ia tangata kāinga i muri i te tāke, engari tae atu ki ngā painga, ko te £16,034 i te tau. I Nottingham he £10,834. Kotahi anake pea te mehua o te rawakore, engari i tētahi wā i whakaekea ai ngā paerewa ora mō te katoa, he tino uaua. E kore e mōhiotia, he rohe mōmona te Meadows mō ngā kaituku moni, e hiahia ana ki te whakakāwai i ā rātou kiritaki e ai ki tō rātou kaha ki te utu. "Āe, nā reira ko te 'A, ko te 'B rānei," te kī a te wahine i roto i te pāpara, i a ia e whakamutu ana i tana waea waea, ka tiki i tana kopamārō, ka whakatere i tōna ara ki mua i ngā haurangi tina i te tatau. "Ka kite i a koe a tērā wiki," te karanga a te kaihoko harikoa. I runga i tētahi pānga pērā i te Meadows, he hoa te mangō moni tārewa ki te katoa. Ka whakamārama a Sharon Mills, o te Meadows Partnership Trust, he aha te take. "Mēnā kei te mōrearea koe, ā, kāore anō ngā tamariki kia kai mō ngā rā e toru, ki te haere mai tētahi tangata ki te tatau e tuku moni tārewa, ka rite rātou ki te Mesia," tana kī. Engari e whakaahua ana hoki ia i a rātau he "pōkai wuruhi", e āhei ana ki te whakamataku kia whakahokia mai ai a rātau moni. "E mōhio ana rātau āhea tō rā utu. Kātahi rātau ka haere mai ki te whana i te tatau ki roto. Tērā pea, ko tēnā." 'Ngā kākahu kākahu' I tōna wā kua whiwhi te Meadows i te maha o ngā tino pai, ko ēnei katoa e tohu ana ko te hara, te tutu, te rongoā me te waipiro he āhuatanga auau o te noho i konei. Engari ko te kore moni tohetohe e whakarato ana i te wero nui rawa, ā, i te nuinga o te wā e whakararuraru ana i ōna tangata. Ka tūtaki ahau ki a Mikaera, he tangata roa e rua tekau mā rua. "E noho ana ahau me te mea kei roto ahau i te whare herehere," tana kī. "Kāore au e kai i tētahi mea, engari he pīni i runga i te toast, me ngā kapu tī. Ehara i te hauora, engari he māmā." E pau ana i a ia te nuinga o ngā rā e tārewa ana i runga i te pānga. "Titiro, ko te 3.30 i te ahiahi, ā, ka kite koe i ngā tāngata i roto i o rātau kākahu kākahu. That's depression," says Rachel Oldfield, a 35-year-old single mother, who works part-time as an administrator. Ka whakaahuatia e ia te āhua o ētahi o ōna ake wairua pango i te rā utu. "Kei te tino tatari atu ahau ki taua mea. E whakaaro ana ahau ki te whakanui me ngā hoa, pēnei i te haere ki waho ki te kai. Engari me whakakore e au, nā te mea kua pau kē te moni." Ka utua a Rahera Ora i te mutunga o ia marama. I te tīmatanga o te marama e whai ake nei, kua haere kē ōna utu katoa ki runga i te rēti me ngā pire. Ka ora a ia ki te rā utu e whai ake nei i runga i te £140 o ngā tāke tāke me te takuhe tamariki £134. E nama ana a ia i te £2,500 i roto i ngā pire pūngao, engari kei te āta whakahaere ki te utu i tēnā. Ahakoa rā, kaore a Rahera e kiia he rawakore a ia. Hei whakatika, e kī ana a ia e haere ana tana tamāhine ki Brownies, ā, e tākaro whutupōro ana tana tama. E kī ana a ia he waimarie ia ki te tokomaha o ētahi atu e noho ana i Meadows. "He tamariki kei tōku tiriti kāore ō rātou mātua i te motokā, kāore e haere ki hea, ahakoa rā." Engari he uaua pea te whakatikatika i ngā utu ohorere. E whakaae ana a ia ki te taraiwa i tana motokā mo te wiki me te kore tiwhikete MoT i te kore e taea e ia te utu whakamātautau £54. "Kotahi wiki i mua i te rā utu. A, ki te kore te motokā, kāore e taea e au te mahi." Ko tētahi o ngā tohu tino mōhio o te rawakore ko te iti o ngā kai, o ngā taonga whai rawa rānei, pēnei i te mutunga wiki. I haere mai a Ahu Haq ki te noho i Meadows i te tau 1973. He kaikōiwi me te mate huka tōna, ā, e ora ana i runga i te whakaaetanga noho hauātanga. Pēnei i ngā tāngata katoa i konei, e moemoeā ana a ia ki te rere ki tētahi atu wāhi. "Kāore anō ahau kia hararei mo te ono tau," tana kī mai ki a au. "E hiahia ana ahau ki te haere ki tētahi wāhi mahana, engari kāore e taea. Me mahi ahau mā te hīkoi haere i konei." E mau ana a Rachel Oldfield ko te mea ngaro o te raruraru ko te ngāwari ki ngā mea e tino hiahiatia ana e koe. "Ki te kore e taea e koe te huri i ngā mea e hiahiatia ana e koe, mēnā me whai hikareti, waipiro rānei, koia tērā e tino whawhai ai koe ki te rawakore." Ngā Wawata He rongo pai kei roto i nga Meadows. Kua whakatuwheratia he pēke kai hou, a, ko te tikanga he iti iho te tāhaetanga. "Kua heke iho te tāhae mō ngā mea taketake - miraka me te parāoa - mai i te tīmatanga o te pēke kai," te kī a Sharon Mills. "Nā te mea ki te hiakai ō tamariki, ka haere koe ki te tāhae," tana whakahau. Engari he ruarua, he tawhiti hoki ngā tūmanako i konei. E māharahara ana a David Gretton, o te Rōpū Tohutohu o Meadows, ki te pānga o ngā huringa painga i tērā marama. "I roto i te toru, e whā marama rānei ka kite mātou i te pikinga o ngā bailiffs nā te mea kāore anō te tangata kia utu i te tāke kaunihera," tana kī. E whakapono ana a Sharon Mills ka kaha ake te ora i te kōpeke i ngā moni whiwhinga a te iwi i tēnei tau. "Kāore anō ahau kia tino mōhio, ahakoa i ngā tau kotahi mano e waru tekau mā rua," tana kī. "Tērā tētahi wāhi pakaru. Kei te panaia ngā kiritaki ki runga i te tapa. He whakamomori rātau." E kī ana a Rahera Oldfield kei te tārewa a ia mo te wā e pai ake ai ngā mea. Engari he tepe ōna hiahia. "E noho ana ahau i Meadows. Nā reira e whai tika ana ahau ko wai tātau, he aha hoki tā mātou e taea ai." Heoi anō, ko ētahi tāngata e mahi ana i konei e whai wawata ana ki te pānga. E karanga ana tētahi kara nui i te taha o te pokapū hokohoko ko te Meadows, ki ngā tūponotanga katoa, he whakamutunga i te whakataetae o Ingarangi i Bloom o tēnei tau. Mēnā he mārō ngā otaota i whakatōkia ki reira pērā ki ētahi o ōna tangata, ā, mēnā ka tupu ngā rōhi i konei, i waenganui i te raima me te pouri, ka tino toa ngā Meadows i taua wero.

title: Leo Varadkar: United Ireland 'tawhiti atu' i muri i te tautohetohe RIC
summary: Kua kī a Taoiseach (pirimia o Kīriria) a Leo Varadkar e whakapono ana a ia he tawhiti kē atu te āhua o tētahi Aiarangi kotahi i mua, i muri i te tautohetohe mo tētahi kaupapa kia maumahara ki ngā ope pirihimana o mua.
text: Ko tētahi takahanga hei whakamaumahara i te Royal Irish Constabulary me ngā Pirihimana Metropolitan o Dublin ā muri ake i tēnei marama. Kua hikitia e te minita tika o Kīriria. He tokomaha nga kaipōrangapū ātete i kī taurangi kia whakahōrite i te takahanga. I whakahē rātau i te whanonga o te RIC i te Pakanga o Rangatiratanga me ōna ope āwhina patu. E whakarite ana te Minita Ture o Airana a Charlie Flanagan i tētahi whakamaharatanga whirinoa i ngā marama e heke mai nei. E pūrongo ana te kaipānui ā iwi o Kīriria RTÉ i kī a Tēnā Varadkar i te Wenerei i whakatau tika a Tēnā Flanagan ki te whakatārewa i te takahanga, a, i kī mai i runga i tana whakaaetanga. I kī a ia kua noho hei take tautohetohe koretake, ā, i tūmanako ia ka taea te whakamaharatanga ā muri ake nei i runga i te huarahi tika ake. I kī a Tēnā Varadkar e whakapono ana a ia ki tētahi Aiarangi kotahi, ā, ka taea i roto i tōna oranga. Heoi anō, i tāpiritia e ia ko te tikanga ko Aiarangi kotahi e mōhio ana ki tētahi hītori tiritiri, ā, "kotahi miriona ngā tāngata i te motu e tohu ana he Ingarangi, he papamuri uniana". I kī hoki a Tēnā Varadkar he tūponotanga te tautohetohe mo te kotahitanga me te whakaraupapatanga. I kī a ia ka taea te ako i ngā akoranga mai i taua mea, ā, tērā pea ka rerekē te whakahaere i ngā mea. I hangaia te Royal Irish Constabulary (RIC) me Dublin Metropolitan Police (DMP) i te tīmatanga o te rau tau 19 i te wā i raro i te ture o Ingarangi te motu katoa o Airani. I te wā o te Pakanga o Te Rangatiratanga o Airana (1919-21), ka tīmata te IRA ki te whakarite i ngā pirihimana, ā, ka whakapakari te kāwanatanga o Ingarangi i ngā rārangi RIC mā te tono i ngā mano o ngā hōia, ko te nuinga o Ingarangi. 'Pūkete whakamataku' Ko te hunga i uru ki te rāhui motuhake o RIC i tapaina ko te Pango me te Tans nā ō rātou kākahu motuhake, ā, ko tētahi rōpū hōia pūkenga ake i mōhiotia ko ngā Āwhina. I whiwhi ngā ope e rua i te rongo mo te whakatoi mā te mahi i ngā tauwhiro taikaha ki ngā tangata whenua i muri i ngā whakaekenga a IRA. I a ia e kōrero ana mō tana whakatau kia whakatārewatia te takahanga, ka kī a Tēnā Flanagan: "Tērā ērā i roto i te RIC i mahi i ngā mahi whakarihariha. " E mōhiotia ana te pūkete whakamataku o te Black and Tans and Auxiliaries. "Engari e hia mano ētahi atu āpiha i whanonga i runga i te rangatiratanga me te hōnore i te mahi i o rātau hapori. Kaua hoki tātau e whai ki te paraihe i ēnei tāngata i tō tātau hītori." Ko te whakamaharatanga he wāhanga o te hōtaka tekau tau o te kāwanatanga o te rau tau. Ka tohu te hōtaka i ngā takahanga nui i roto i tētahi wā hūkere i roto i te hītori o Airani mai i te tau 1912 ki te 1923, tae atu ki te Aranga o te tau 1916 me te Pakanga Tūmatanui o Airana. Ko te whakataunga kia whakamaumaharatia te RIC me te DMP kua kitea te tino tautohetohe ki tēnei wā, me te tokomaha o ngā kaipōrangapū e whakahē ana i te whanonga o te RIC me ōna ope āwhina. I te pō o te Mane, ka pōti ngā kaikaunihera o te Taone o Dublin ki te whakahōrite i te takahanga o Dublin Castle me tētahi mōtini i tukuna e te 38 pōti ki te 10. I roto i tana kōrero i te Tūtira, ka kī te minita tika ka mōhio a ia ko tana whakatau kia whakatārewatia te takahanga he "take mamae, he riri ki te tokomaha o ngā tāngata".

title: Te tipu para o Westbury: Ka tīmata te mahi
summary: Kua tīmata te mahi hanganga i runga i te tipu para tuatahi i Wiltshire kia tuarua ai te wā o te ururua o te whare.
text: Kua hoahoatia te pūkenga rongoā koiora pūkaha (MBT) hei kōmaka i te para "pēke ipu pango" me te kimi i ngā mea ka taea te tukurua, te whakaora rānei. Ko te tipu £20m e hangaia ana i Northacre i Westbury ka whakamahia tae atu ki te 60,000 tāhei para kāinga i te tau. I kī a Hills Waste Solutions ka whakahekea te wāhanga o te para e haere ana ki te peke whenua kia iti iho i te 20%. Ko te tipu MBT, e hangaia ana e Maunga, e tūmanakohia ana kia puta mai i te 28,200 tāhei hinu i ia tau, ā, ka whakaora i te 1,800 tāhei konganuku tukurua. Ka piki ake te wāhanga o ngā para o te rohe e nekehia atu ana i te peke whenua mai i te 63% ki te neke atu i te 80%. I kī a Alan Pardoe, te manukura o te rōpū Maunga, i "koa ia kei te tīmata te hanganga i runga i te whare o Maunga". Ka kī a ia: "He tohu nui tēnei i roto i te whanaketanga o te kamupene me te āhua o te whakahaere a Wiltshire i ōna ururua whare." E tūmanakohia ana kia whakahaere te tipu ki te mutunga o te raumati 2013.

title: Kua whakaritea te whakaoratanga o te ngahere o Te Whare Karakia o Durham
summary: Me whakahaere te mahi whakaora i runga i ngā wāhi ngahere me te taha awa huri noa i te Whare Karakia o Durham.
text: Me utu te kaupapa £287,500 ki tētahi pūtea mai i te Pūtea Tārewa Tuku iho. The work will include conserving the diverse range of trees within the 18th Century woodland, stabilising the banks and resurfacing the public footpaths. Ka whakatūria hoki he rāhui taiao, ā, ka mahia he arotaupū o ngā kararehe rerekē o te rohe. I kī a Ivor Crowther, te upoko o te Pūtea Tārewa Tuku iho: "Ko te Whare Karakia o Durham tētahi o ngā whare tino whakaharahara i te Rāwhiti ki te Raki. " Ka kite tēnei kaupapa i ngā whenua e karapoti ana i te whare karakia kua whakaorangia, ka parea ngā wāhi kararehe, ā, ka whakatuwheratia te pae mō ngā tāngata o te rohe." 'Tautuhinga whakaharahara' I tāpiritia e te Tino Reverend Michael Sadgrove, Dean of Durham: "E kore e taea te wehe i tōna taiao whenua, tae atu ki ngā taha awa e karapoti ana. " Ko te koiora ngahere me te awaawa hōhonu e hoatu ana ki te whare karakia tōna wāhi ahurei, whakaharahara hoki. "We are delighted that the Heritage Lottery Fund is supporting our plans to rejuvenate and care for this much-loved landscape, which is enjoyed by residents and visitors to the cathedral as a place of peace, beauty and recreation in a busy city centre." A key part of the project will be the introduction of an interactive education programme that will include workshops and training in habitat conservation and wildlife and botany surveying. Ka taea hoki e ngā ākonga mai i ngā whare wānanga me ngā kura paetata te whakamahi i ngā pae hei akoranga kēhi taiao.

title: Supernova 'roma' i roto i ngā tirohanga a te taiwhanga neutrino
summary: Ka whai te ngātahitanga ā-ao ki te wetewete i ngā mea ngaro o ngā neutrinos - e mōhiotia ana hoki ko "ngā korakora wairua".
text: Nā Paul RinconScience, te paetukutuku Rongokōrero o TE AO I waenganui i ngā whāinga o te mahi, i hangaia i te tīmatanga o tēnei tau, ko te hopu i ngā korakora neutrino e rere mai ana ki a mātau mai i tētahi supernova - he whetū pahū. Ka puta aua takahanga i ia 30 tau, engari kāore anō kia āta tirohia ngā roma neutrino e whakaputaina ana e rātou. Ka taurimatia a Dune (Deep Underground Neutrino Experiment) ki Fermilab i Batavia, Illinois. Ka whakaurua te whanaketanga o te kurupae kaha rawa o te ao, e haere ana i te 1,300km (800mi) i raro i te whenua mai i Fermilab ki tētahi taputapu pūoko nui i runga anō i te Sanford Underground Research Facility i South Dakota. Ko te mahi te hua o te whakakotahitanga i waenganui i ngā kaupapa Pākehā me te US me ngā whāinga ōrite. I tū te ngātahitanga o te ao whānui i tana hui tuatahi i Fermilab i Aperira. "Tērā tētahi tukanga mai i tērā raumati ki te whakarite i te whenua mō tēnei ngātahitanga, i runga anō i te whakakotahi i ngā kaupapa o Amerika me Ūropi. Ināianei e 700 ngā tāngata kua waitohutia," te kī a Prof Stefan Söldner-Rembold, mai i te Whare Wānanga o Manchester. "Ko te hipanga whakamua he ngātahitanga hou me tētahi ingoa hōu e whai whakaritenga ana mai i a Mātau, Uropi, Īnia me ētahi atu rohe kia haere whakamua." Ko ngā Neutrinos tētahi o ētahi paraka hanga kōhukihuki mātāmua e 17 e hanga ana i te Ao Nui. Engari he pūtake whakamīharo hoki rātou mō ngā kaiahupūngao korakora. He korakora tino māmā ērā, kāore he hiko hiko, ā, ka puta kino i ētahi atu mea. Mā tēnei āhuatanga e tino uaua ai te mātakitaki, ā, ko ia te kawenga mō te karangatanga o rātou ko "ngā korakora wairua". Tērā anō pea ka whai wāhi ngā Neutrinos i roto i te mea ngaro he aha te take i noho ai te Ao Nui i te nuinga o te take, kaua ko te antimatter. E toru ngā āhuatanga rerekē, ngā tāwara rānei, ā, ka taea e ngā korakora te takahuri mai i tētahi tāwara ki tētahi atu. E whai ana a Dune ki te mahi i tētahi tūhuratanga taipitopito o tēnei tauira ahupūngao neutrino e toru. Ka whakamahia e te kaupapa tētahi whakatere korakora tīariari i Fermilab hei pūtake proton, kātahi ka tukitukia te kurupae ki tētahi "ūnga" i hangaia ki tētahi rauemi e whakaputa ana i te whakanaotanga o ngā korakora poto. Ka haere ēnei mō te 200m mā roto i te paipa pirau, ā, i a rātou e mahi ana, ka huri te wāhanga nui hei neutrino. Ko tētahi atu utu pūtaiao o te ngātahitanga tērā pea ko te wā hei mātaki i tētahi whetū pahū i runga i ngā taipitopito tata atu i mua. Engari ka hiahiatia e te tīma he waimarie i tō rātou taha, i te mea e whakawhirinaki ana ki tētahi takahanga tika e tū ana i te roanga o te kaupapa. He kēmu tūponotanga, engari e tūmanako ana ngā kaipūtaiao ka mau te pūoko i tētahi. "Mēnā ka pā mai he supernova i tō tātau ikarangi, ā, kotahi ia 30 tau, neke atu rānei, me kite tēnei whakamātautau - i roto i ngā hēkona - ka kite i ngā tauwhitinga neutrino e hia mano," te kī a Prof Söldner-Rembold. "Tērā tētahi supernova i te tau 1987, ā, he pūoko neutrino tuihono - i kite rātau i tētahi mea, nāna i whakaoho te nui o te hiahia i taua wā. Engari ko te supernova me te pūoko pēnei, he mea kāore anō kia kitea. Ko te "spillover" mai i te supernova ka whakawhirinaki ki te tawhiti atu i Te Ao. Engari mā tētahi takahanga hihiri pērā, e tata ana ki Te Ao, ka taea pea te tuku i te nui o ngā neutrino e roma ana i tō mātou ara - kia tīkina e ngā pūoko. Tērā pea ka whakamāramatia e tēnei ngā tikanga o ngā pahūtanga whetū, me te āhua o ēnei takahanga i roto i te wā. Ka kimi hoki a Dune i tētahi tītohunga whakaaro e mōhiotia ana ko te pirau proton. He tino pūmau ngā korakora ngota-ngota; kāore anō rātau kia kitea e huri ana hei paraka hanga kōhukihuki māmā ake. Heoi anō, i ētahi ariā o te ahupūngao korakora, pēnei i te anga kāore anō kia whakaūngia e mōhiotia ana ko te supersymmetry, me pēnei tēnei. "Ko te pirau tino āhua kore nei. He huarahi anō tēnei ki te kimi i te 'ahupūngao hou', motuhake i te LHC, e kore ai koe e hiahia ki te haere ki ngā pūngao tiketike," te kī a Prof Söldner-Rembold. Ko Cern, te rōpū whakahaere e whakahaere ana i te Large Hadron Collider, tētahi o ērā e uru ana ināianei ki Dune. Ko te utu o te kaupapa katoa kei runga i te raupapa o te $1bn, engari ko ētahi hoa ao whānui e utu ana mā ngā koha ā-atawhai. Ka whakakīa ngā pūoko ki te argon wai, me te tuatahi o ngā kōwae 10 kirokaramu e whā ka tāutatia i ngā tau 2020. Ka hangaia e ngā tūtukitanga neutrino ngā irahiko me ngā kōhiko mārama i roto i te argon wai, e waiho ai ngā tohu mātakitaki o ngā neutrino. Kua tautuhia te kaupapa kia whakahaere mo te toru tekau tau. Whāia a Paora i Twitter

title: I hangaia e Emma Thompson he wahine i roto i te Rā Whānau o te Kuini
summary: Kua meinga a Emma Thompson hei wahine i roto i te Rārangi Whakahonore Rā Whānau o te Kuini.
text: E mōhiotia ana te whetū tau 59 tau o aua pikitia pēnei i a Howards End, Love Actually and Sense and Sensibility mō ana ratonga ki te whakaari. Ka noho hoki te kaipānui hītori me te kaipānui a Mary Beard hei dame, mō ngā ratonga ki te ako i te iwi puāwaitanga. I kī te ahorangi o Cambridge he "hōnore pakaru" tērā e whakaaro ana ia he "takoha ki ngā Kariki me ngā Rōmana anō". Ka whiwhi te kaituhituhi kōrero o Kazuo Ishiguro, te kaituhituhi hītori a Haimona Schama me te kaiwhakarewa o Waterstones, o Tim Waterstone, pērā ki te rangatira nui o te Royal Academy of Arts, a Charles Saumarez Smith. I kī a Ishiguro, i whānau mai i Tiapanī, a, i neke ki Ingarangi i a ia e rima tau, i "tino pā ki a ia ki te whiwhi i tēnei hōnore mai i te iwi i pōhiri mai i a au hei taitama iti kē". I toa te kaituhi 63 tau o The Remains of the Day and Never Let Me Go i te Whakawhiwhinga Nobel mō ngā Tuhinga i tērā tau. Ko ētahi atu whika mai i te ao whakangahau e whakahonoretia ana ko ngā kaitapere ko Tom Hardy rāua ko Keira Knightley, ka noho hei CBE me tētahi OBE. Ko te kairīpoata ko Kate Adie me te kaihautū o te Wero o te Whare Wānanga o Bamber Gascoigne ka hangaia hoki hei CBE, pērā ki ngā kaituhi o Ken Follett rāua ko Jeanette Winterson. I kī a Follett, e 69, i "tino harikoa, whakahīhī hoki ki te whiwhi i tēnei hōnore mō te mahi i tētahi mea e aroha ana ahau - te hanga pukapuka me ngā pūrākau kia whakangahau, kia āhei hoki". "He wāhi tino hira te pānui i tōku oranga, ā, e koa ana ahau ki te āwhina i ētahi atu kia ngahau hoki," ka haere tonu te māngere tūtei me te kaituhi pakiwaitara hītori, e tino mōhiotia ana mō tana rangatū Century me Kingsbridge. I kī a Winterson, te kaituhi o Ngā Ārani Ehara i te Hua Anake, e tūmanako ana a ia ka āwhina tōna hōnore ki te whakarewa i "te kitenga o te koha a te wahine ki ngā toi". "E tino hari ana ahau mo te CBE, mōku anō, engari nā te mea he tino hira ngā toi i tō tātau ao," tana kī i roto i tētahi kōrero. "He tikanga tūhononga rātou, he huarahi whakaiti i te ngangau." Ko tētahi atu wahine e mōhiotia ana mō tana āwhina ki ngā pukapuka ko Liz Calder, te kaiwhakarewa tahi o Bloomsbury. I kī a Calder, nāna i noho hei CBE, i "mīharo, i rekareka hoki", ka tāpiri: "He tino pai te whiwhi i tēnei whakapūtātanga." Ka noho a Abi Morgan, te kaituhi o te whakaari o TE Wehewehe, hei OBE, pērā ki te kaiwhakahaere whare tapere o Marianne Elliott, te kaiwhakanao hākoritanga o Kōrero Cosgrove me te kaiwhakaari tōkeke o Fenella Fielding. Kua hangaia hoki te kaimāra pouaka whakaata a Monty Don hei OBE, mō ngā ratonga ki te māra, ki te pāohotanga me te aroha. Ko te kaitapere ko Gary Wilmot, ko Timoti Bentinck o The Archers me te kaiwhakaatu pouaka whakaata ko Stacey Dooley i waenganui i ērā o te ao whakangahau kia waiho hei MBE. I kī a Bentinck, e whakahua ana i a Rawiri Archer i roto i te whakaari o te Reo Irirangi 4, i "mīharo, i whakaititia", e whakaahua ana i tana MBE "ehara i te mea i tūmanakohia e au". "Ka taea anake e au te mihi nui ki aua tāngata tē mōhiotia nāna ahau i tono mai, [me] tōku whānau me ōku hoa i tautoko i a au i roto i ngā piki me ngā heke o te ora hei kaitapere," ka haere tonu a ia. Ko te Rapper Ms Dynamite - ko te ingoa tūturu o Niomi McLean-Daley - ka noho hoki hei MBE, pērā ki te kaituhi jazz o Dennis Rollins me te kaituhi Pākehā o Kate Clanchy. "Kua mahi ahau i ngā momo āpure tuhituhi katoa i roto i ngā tau - whiti, pukapuka, pakiwaitara, arotake - engari ko te miro tino ōrite ko aku mahi i ngā kura," te kī a Clanchy. "E hiahia ana ahau ki te whakaaro e whakahonore ana tēnei whakawhiwhinga i tēnā, me te hiranga o ngā tuhinga me te auahatanga i roto i te akomanga." I whānau mai a Emma Thompson i Rānana i te tau 1959, ka tīmata a Thompson i tana mahi hei mema o ngā Rama Waewae o Cambridge i te taha o ngā āhuatanga o Stephen Fry rāua ko Hugh Laurie. I haere tonu a ia ki te toa i a Oscars mō tana mahi i te tau 1992 o Howards End, ā, mō te tuhi i te hōtuhi mō te urutaunga o Jane Austen o te tau 1995 Sense and Sensibility. I puta mai a ia hei Ahorangi Sybil Trelawney i roto i ngā whitiāhua Harry Potter e toru, ā, kātahi anō ka whetū ki a Tā Anthony Hopkins - tōna hoa whetū i te tau 1993 o The Remains of the Day - i roto i tētahi putanga o Kīngi Lear. Ko te tamāhine a te kaipānui o Magic Roundabout, ko Eric Thompson me te kaiwhakaari ko Phyllida Law, i mārena ia ki a Kenneth Branagh - ināianei he tā - mai i te tau 1989 ki te 1995. He rite tonu te puta tahi o te tokorua i roto i ngā whakaari pouaka whakaata pēnei i Fortunes of War me ngā pikitia pēnei i Peter's Friends me Much Ado About Nothing. Tokorua nga tamariki a Thompson, he tamāhine ko Gaia te ingoa, me tētahi tama whāngai ko Tindy, me tana tāne tuarua, ko tana hoa kaitapere ko Greg Wise. I tua atu i tana mahi, e mōhiotia ana a ia mō tōna mahi motika tangata, mō te tuhi i ngā whainga e rua ki ngā pukapuka a Beatrix Potter's Peter Rabbit. Ākuanei ka kitea a ia i roto i ngā whare pikitia o UK e tākaro ana i tētahi kaiwhakawā me ngā raruraru mārena i roto i te Ture Tamariki, i runga anō i te pukapuka kōrero a Īna McEwan. Whāia mātou i Facebook, i Twitter @BBCNewsEnts, i Instagram rānei i bbcnewsents. Mēnā he huatau pūrākau tāu, īmēra entertainment.news@bbc.co.uk.

title: Uiui Tūkino Ā-Iwi Hītori: E tono ana te wahine ki te whakapāha mō ngā kaiheke tamariki
summary: Kua inoi tētahi wahine ki te Uiui Tūkino Ā-Iwi Hītori e rapu ana i tētahi whakapāha mō tētahi kaupapa kaiheke tamariki mai i Aiarangi ki te Raki ki Ahitereiria.
text: Neke atu i te 100 ngā tamariki i tukuna atu i te waenganui o te rau tau 1900. I whakaahuatia e te wahine he pēhea te kōrero ki ngā tamariki i te taenga mai kei reira rātau "ki te whakakī i ngā moenga wātea o Ahitereiria". I kī a ia i muri iho ka whakawiria rātau. Mā te hoatu whakaaturanga, mā te hononga ataata mai i Ahitereiria, ka kī a ia kua noho ngā tamariki hei wāhanga o tāna i whakaahua ai he "ope mahi tamariki" i tētahi kāinga e whakahaeretia ana e ngā taupoki Katorika. I te tono whakapae, ka kī te kaiheke tamariki o mua e hiahia ana a ia kia "haepapa tētahi tangata" mo nga whakamomori a ōna tuakana tokorua. "Me whai whakapāha ētahi whakaahuatanga kia noho ai tātau hei wāhanga o ngā hītori o ngā whenua e rua," tana kī. I kōrero anō a ia ki te uiui: "Kei te whakaaro tonu ahau ehara ahau i te wāhi katoa, ehara i te mea nō tētahi tangata. " Ehara mātau i te tangata, he tangata tātau." Ko te wahine i waenganui i ngā kaiwhakaatu e 50 e hoatu ana i ngā whakaaturanga mai i Ahitereiria. E tirotiro ana te uiui HIA i te whānuitanga o te tūkino tamariki i roto i ngā rōpū whakapono me ngā rōpū whakahaere kāwanatanga i Aiarangi ki te Raki mai i te tau 1922 ki te 1995. I tērā wiki, ka rongo te uiui e 131 ngā tamariki mai i Aiarangi ki te Raki, ko ētahi e rima tau, i tonoa ki Ahitereiria hei kaiheke tamariki. Ko te tikanga kia rangona a rātau whakaaturanga mā te hononga ataata, i roto rānei i ngā kōrero tuhituhi i ngā wiki tata nei.

title: Tekau mā rua i puritia i runga i te mura o te wheketere mumura o Īnia
summary: Kotahi tekau mā rua nga tāngata i puritia e pā ana ki te mura o te Wenerei i tētahi wheketere mumura i te tūnga o Īnia ki te tonga o Tamila Nadu, e kī ana pirihimana.
text: Ko te hunga i herea, arā ko te kaiwhakahaere wheketere, kua whakataua ki te kōhuru hara. Ināianei, kua piki te mate i roto i te mura ki te 38. E whā tekau mā ono ētahi atu e rongoatia ana mo o rātau whara. I tū te mura i te taone o Sivakasi, te pokapū o te umanga mumura o Īnia. E 700 nga wheketere o te taone, a, e 90% o nga mumura o Īnia. Ka pakaru te ahi i te wheketere o Om Sha pot, ko tētahi o ngā mea nui rawa o te taone, a, ka horapa i roto i ngā whare putunga pōkai. I kī atu a Najmul Hoda, te kaiwhakahaere pirihimana mō te takiwā o Virudhunagar e noho ana te taone o Sivakasi, ki te AO e 38 ngā tinana kua whakaorangia mai i te pae, ā, "kāore he tinana i roto". I kī a ia kua whakatārewatia te raihana o te wheketere i te Tūrei mō te tūkinotanga ture haumaru, ā, "kāore he mahi i puta i reira" i te Wenerei. Kua mawhiti te rangatira, e kī ana pirihimana. Tērā pea i whakakāhoretia te ahi e nga kaimahi kāore i te whakaranu i ngā matū, ka kī pirihimana. He mea noa iho ngā pahūtanga pokanoa i ngā wheketere kāmura Īnia, e whakarato ana i ngā kāmura mō ngā mārena, ngā hākari me ētahi atu hākari.

title: Me tautuhi anō te kupu 'whakahāwea'?
summary: Ko Huitanguru te Marama Hītori Pango i te US, he wā i whakaritea hei mōhio ki ngā Amerikana o Awherika me ā rātou mahi ki te whenua.
text: Nā Chelsea BaileyBBC News, Washington I whakamutua te whakamaharatanga o tēnei tau ki ngā muhani me ngā whakapae whakahāwea i runga i te papa o te Rōpū Nui, i tētahi whakarongo whakaata i pāohotia ki ngā kāinga e hia miriona. Engari ko taua whakawhitinga, i waenganui i te Democrat me te Republican, ehara i te mea motuhake. I tīmata te marama ki ngā karanga kia whakarerea te kāwana o Virginia i muri i te putanga mai o tētahi whakaahua i a ia i roto i te pango. A, ka mutu ki a Perehitini Donald Trump - kua whakapaea ki te whakahāwea - e kī ana i te toa o te Whakawhiwhinga o te Wānanga o Spike Lee i muri i te tohutohu a te kaiwhakahaere pikitia i ngā Kaiāwhina kia "mahi i te mea tika" me te kōwhiri i te aroha i runga i te kino mā te āwhina ki te whakakāhore i ngā tūmanako pōti anō a Tēnā Puhi. Na te waipuke o ngā kupu matua ā-iwi i tāraro i tētahi whakaaro i tiria e te tokomaha - e 400 tau i muri i te kawenga mai o ngā kahunga tuatahi ki a Mātau, kei te uaua tonu ngā Kaiāwhina ki te whai kōrerorero whai tikanga mō te iwi. "Kāore e taea e mātou te kōrerorero whai hua mēnā kāore te tangata i te tuwhera ki te titiro ki te whakaata," te kī a Ibram Kendi, ko te kaiwhakahaere o te Pokapū Rangahau me te Kaupapahere Ārai i te Whare Wānanga o Amerika. "Ko te whakakāhoretanga te manawa o te whakahāwea i tēnei whenua, ā, i ia wā kāore koe i te tuwhera ki ngā mea e taea ana e koe i tēnei wā, kei te ora koe, kei te hāhā koe i te whakahāwea i a koe anō." E kī ana a ia ko te hipanga tuatahi ki te wete i te whakahāwea i a Mātau e mōhio ana ka taea e tātau katoa te neke i waenganui i te whakahāwea me te ārai whakahāwea. "Ina whakataua tētahi tangata ki te mahi i tētahi mea whakahāwea, kaua e riri me te whiu, me whakaaro rātau ki ngā whakaaturanga." Ko ngā kōrerorero mō te iwi i te nuinga o te wā ka huri ki ngā tohenga nā te mea kua tae mai ngā Kaiāwhina ki te tiro i te kupu "whakahāwea" he tapanga pūmau, ehara i te whakaahuatanga o tētahi mahi, e kī ana a Tēnā Kendi. Ināianei e taunaki ana a ia mō te tautuhi anō i te kupu "whakahāwea" hei whakaata i o tātau whakapono me ō tātau whanonga, ehara i te muhani noa iho. "E tautoko ana te kaikiri, mā tā rātou mahi, mā tā rātou mahi, mā te kore mahi rānei, ngā kaupapa here e whakaputa anō ana i te ōritetanga ā-iwi. E tautoko ana te ārai whakahāwea, me a rātau mahi, ngā kaupapa here e whakaiti ana, e whakakore ana rānei i te ōritetanga ā-iwi," te kī a Tēnā Kendi. "Ko tāu e mahi ana, ā, ko tāu e kōrero nei, he whakaaturanga ko wai koe i taua wā." Ko te nuinga o tēnei kōrero i whakaohotia e te tautohetohe i runga i te papa o te Whare Māngai, i tīmata i muri i te whakapaetanga a Rashida Tlaib, tētahi tangata tuatahi o te Manapori, i whakapaea ai te tangata kōwanatanga o Te Pākehā o Mark Meadows ki te whakahāwea me te whakamahi i tētahi wahine pango hei "tautoko". I tono a Tēnā Meadows ki a Lynne Patton, he kaimahi roa o te Whakahaere o te Puhi, kia haere ki te whakarongo a Michael Cohen ki te whakakāhore i ngā whakapae he whakahāwea a Perehitini Trump. I a ia e kōrero ana mō Ms Patton, ka kī a Tēnā Meadows "he tamāhine a tētahi tangata i whānau mai i Birmingham, Alabama, kāore he tikanga e mahi ai ia mō tētahi tangata whakahāwea". I te kīanga a Ms Tlaib kāore te whai hoa, kaimahi iti rānei, e whakakore ana i tētahi tangata kia kaua e whakahāwea, ka tere te memeha o te rongo ki tētahi haupae tino wera. I kī te hinengaro hinengaro pāpori a Daniel Effron, e ako ana i te whanonga me te iwi, tērā te take i rite tonu ai te haere a te tangata ki te wawao "hoa pango" ina whakataua ki te whakahāwea. I kī a Tēnā Effron e whakaatu ana tana rangahau i ngā wā katoa e whakapaea ana tētahi tangata ki te whakahāwea, ki te whakatūpato rānei i tō rātou tuakiri tūturu, ka rapu noa iho rātou i tētahi tauira hei whakapakari i ō rātou "taipitopito tuakiri kāore i te whakahāwea", tērā pea he pae hahaka. "Ina whakahauhautia ngā tāngata ki te kimi whakaaturanga kāore rātou i te whakawātea, tērā pea ka whakaaro rātou he tino kaha te whai hoa pango," tana kī. "Ka hangaia e tātau he maunga morare i roto i te maunga mārire." Engari ahakoa ko ngā tāngata whai whakaaro pai ka anga atu ki te whakahē ina kōrerorero i te iwi i Amerika, e ai ki te kaiwhakahaere o te whitiāhua toa o Oscar Green Book i kitea. I tautuhia ki te āhua o te Tonga i whakawehea i ngā tau kotahi mano e ono tekau mā rua, ka whai te pikitia i te whakahoahoa kāore i te mōhiotia i waenganui i tētahi kaiwhakatangitangi puihi pango me te jazz me tana kaihautū mā. I whakapaea e nga kaiwhakawāwā te pikitia o te hītori whakamā me te whakanui ake i te tohu "kaiwhakaora mā" i Karaihe. Ētahi atu kōrero mō te iwi i roto i te US Kaituhi me te kaiwhaiwhai ārai whakahāwea, i kī a Tim Wise, e whakaaro ana ia me tāpare anō tātau i te āhua o tā mātou whakaako i te iwi i Amerika, me te neke atu i ngā mahi a te tangata me te titiro ki te pūnaha katoa. "Ina whakaaro mātou ki te āhua o te whakaako a ngā Kaiāwhina i te whakahāwea i te hītori, he pūrākau mō ngā tāngata i mahi, kāore rānei i whai pononga, i ngā tāngata i mahi, kāore rānei i whai pakihi whakawehe. He uaua kē atu te kite i ngā pūnaha ōritetanga," tana kī, kātahi anō ka taea e tēnei te whakawātea i ngā tāngata kia kaua e whakaata i ā rātou ake mahi. Ka tūhura a Mr Wise i ōna ake uauatanga ki te whakaraupapa i te hōnore mā me te whakahāwea i roto i tana pukapuka kōrero White Like Me, ā, kua mahia e ia he mahi i te whakatere i ngā kōrerorero uaua mō te whakahāwea. I kī a ia e whakaaro ana a ia kua herea ngā Kaiāwhina ki te whakapono ki ētahi āhuatanga ā-iwi me te wetewete i aua whakaaro whakaaro ka tīmata ki te mōhio kei te tīari rātou i te wāhi tuatahi. Tae noa ki taua wā, ka kī a ia, ka haere tonu tātau ki ngā tohenga porohita mō te iwi me te kore haere ki te wete i te whakahāwea. "He tino wawao te kī, 'Kāore aku wheua whakahāwea i roto i tōku tinana'... i tipu ake koe i Amerika," tana kī. "E pā ana ki te kī, 'Titiro, ka tino māhaki ahau ki te whakaae i ōku ngoikoretanga. Ehara nā te mea e hiahia ana ahau kia patua ahau e koe, ehara nā te mea e hiahia ana ahau ki te patu i a au, engari nā te mea e mōhio ana ahau ka taea e au te pai ake.'"

title: Ka hono a Loganair ki Dundee ki Rānana me ngā rerenga o ia rā
summary: Kua haumaru ngā hononga hau i waenganui i Dundee me Rāwāhi i muri i te whakaaetanga pūtea i waenganui i te kaunihera taone me te kāwanatanga o UK.
text: Kua whakaaetia tētahi here ratonga tūmatanui (PSO) e whakaū ana i te £2.85m mai i te pūtea Tūhonotanga Hau ā-Rohe hōu kia tuwhera tonu te ara mō te rua tau. I kī te hēkeretari o te Pūtea Moni, a Danny Alexander, he "pokapū ohaoha matua" a Dundee i roto i te whakahaerenga o Pirihitini. Ka whakahaere a Loganair i ngā rerenga e rua ia rā i runga i te ara mai i Hōngongoi. I tūtaki te taunga rererangi o Dundee ki te rangirua i muri i te whakamutu a Cityjet i ana ratonga ki te Taunga Rererangi o London City i Hānuere. Heoi anō, kua haumaru te wā heke mai o te taunga rererangi me te hononga ki Rānana ki te pūtea mai i te pūtea Tūhonotanga ā-Rohe - te tuatahi o tōna momo i te UK. 'Pokapū ohaoha' E hiahiatia ana e te ara he moni pārekareka e £3.2m, tata ki te £400,000 me hīpoki e te kaunihera paetata. E tūmanakohia ana kia whakaae ngā kaikaunihera ki te kirimana ki a Loganair, ā, ka utu i te toenga o te pārekareka i tētahi hui i te Mane. I kī a Tēnā Alexander i "hari" a ia ki te whakaū i te whakapau pūtea i pānuitia e ia i tērā tau ka whai painga ki a Dundee. Ka kī a ia: "He pokapū ohaoha matua a Dundee i roto i te ōhanga rangatira o Pākehā. " Mā tēnei e whakarite kia tūhono tonu ōna umanga matua ki te toenga o te UK." I kī te Minita Rererangi o UK a Robert Goodwill he "tūranga matua tā ngā taunga rererangi ā-rohe" i roto i te "mahere ohaoha mo te wā roa" mō te whenua. And Dundee City Council leader Ken Guild encouraged as many people as possible to make use of the link to London.

title: Ka arotakea e Gompertz a Mamma Mia: Here We Go Again ★★★ ☆☆
summary: He ratarata te wahine kākahu pai nāna i whakamōhio te pikitia, engari he mārō: "Ko te tangata kāore e pīrangi ki te spandex, ki te kākahu, ki te Abba rānei", ka kī a ia, "me haere".
text: Will GompertzArts editor@WillGompertzBBCon Twitter Kaore tētahi tangata i mahi. Kātahi anō ka nui ake te ngākau whakaongaonga o te hunga whakarongo. Ko te whakaaturanga tuatahi o te ao o Mamma Mia! Here We Go Again and the cinema was packed with worshipers of kitsch entertainment for whom spandex, glitter and Abba are the Holy Trinity. Ahakoa rā, e tū ana tohutohu. Mēnā ehara i tō pēke ngā whitiāhua raumati māmā, mawhiti, mārama, arero i roto i tō pāpāringa, ehara pea tēnei arotakenga i te mea māu. Heoi anō, mēnā ko koe tētahi o ngā miriona tāngata i hākinakina ki te kiriata 2008 Mamma Mia! me te hiahia ki te mōhio mēnā he pai te whainga, kātahi ka pānui. Ka tīmata pēnei i taku moped 50cc tawhito, arā, he kino. We're back on the idyllic Greek island of Kalokairi where Sophie (Amanda Seyfried) is once again sending out invitations to her "dads" asking them to join her for a celebration. Kātahi ia ka waiata i tētahi putanga pōrearea o Mihi ki a Koe Mō te Pūoro, he mākū ake i a Skegness i te wā o Hui tanguru, i mua i tana waea atahanga me tōna hoa ko Sky (Dominic Cooper). He nui ake aku wāhui hōhipera hākinakina. Engari i a au e toro atu ana ki taku koti, ka tae mai te whakaoranga i roto i te waiata katoa, te kanikani katoa, te hopu tirohanga, te mata o Lily James whakamīharo. Mēnā nā Meryl Streep te putanga 2008 e purei ana i te beatnik pakeke o Donna i noho ki tētahi motu Kariki, kātahi ka mahia e Lily James tēnei prequel/whainga māna hei taitama kātahi anō ka whiwhi i ngā tāngata i a Donald Trump e utu ana i ngā kaitohutohu motuhake. He tino ōrite te tā ki te mea taketake i runga i te kounga (he rite tonu ki te whare o Donna) me te pūrākau. I tēnei wā, ehara tōna arotahi i a Donna i tēnei wā, engari i tōna wā o mua. Ka tūtaki mātau ki ngā taitama tokotoru i moe tahi ai ia, e noho ana i te pūtake whakaharahara o ngā whitiāhua e rua: ko tētahi o rātau pea ko te pāpā o tana tamāhine ko Sophie. Ka mahia e Hugh Skinner tāna mahi i ngā wā katoa, ā, ka whakatangi i tētahi toff kāore i te mōhiotia, arā, i tēnei tauira ko Harry taitamariki. Ko Josh Dylan (e āhei ana ki te pupuri tuhipoka) te taitamariki o Bill, ā, ko Jeremy Irvine te tokotoru hei taitamariki o Sam. Ka tākaro katoa te tokotoru i ta rātau wāhi, arā, ko te tuku i a Lily James kia haere tonu me te whakaora i te pikitia. I te ara ka āwhinatia ia e ōna hoa pai, a Tanya rāua ko Rosie; i tākarotia hei rua tekau mā rua tekau mā rua e Jessica Keenan Wynn rāua ko Alexa Davies, ā, i muri mai - i roto i tētahi hokinga maioha tino pōhiri - e te mātauranga o Julie Walters me te vampish o Christine Baranski. Nā reira ka neke tika te pikitia ki tōna whakamutunga tē mōhiotia: he whakamutunga nui ki te motu e huihui ai te katoa mō tētahi whakamutunga pai. Ko te mōrea i konei ko te tāpiri i tētahi kini nui rawa o te saccharine, ā, he iti noa iho te māuiui o te kiritaki pukuhohe o te puni. Ka karohia tēnei e te pikitia mā te whakamōhio i tētahi pūāhua hou: ko te diva o tētahi kuia a Tōnā, i tākarotia i roto i tētahi cameo tino pai e Cher. I a ia e pakaru ana ki tētahi whakaaturanga kī tonu o Fernando, ka whakamihi noa te hunga whakarongo, kātahi ka kore e taea te pupuri i a ia anō, ā, ka whakarewaina ki tētahi rōpū waiata. He tohu tēnei o te whakahaere mātauranga a ngā kaiwhakanao i tā rātou māngai pūoro tuhituhi: e mōhio ana rātau me pēhea te patu i ngā tuhipoka tika katoa, mai i te pūhohe whaiaro ki te maka whetū. E kitea ana te hākinakina o ta rātau mahi i roto i te aronga a Ol Parker, e tika ana i runga i te Moni, Moni, Moni. Ka neke a ia i waenganui i te pūrākau me tēnei rā me ngā whakatika paraihe me te tapahi ātaahua e rite ana ki ētahi o ngā pūeru huatau o te 70 e mau ana i te whakarārangi whakamuri whakamīharo a Abba. Tērā tētahi wā tata ki te rua tuatoru o te huarahi i te tīmatanga o te pikitia ki te neke atu i te reo o Pierce Brosnan i roto i te taketake (ka puta i roto i tētahi haerenga poto i tēnei wā). Ko te mahi o te kimi i tētahi whakahauhau mō te tini o ngā pūāhua ki te whakatū i te rōpū, ka ahu atu ki ētahi pūrere tā hammy, e rongo ana i te whakahau ahakoa i roto i tētahi tūmomo e noho ana ngā pūrere tā hammy te tikanga. Engari kātahi anō ka haere a Cher ki tōna tomokanga nui, ka hoki mai a Meryl - ā, ka mahue hari te hunga whakarongo i muri iho. Whāia a Will Gompertz i Twitter

title: He aha te tūmanako i te wā o te whakawātanga a Alex Salmond
summary: Ko Alex Salmond, te minita tuatahi o Pākehā, e tū ana i runga i te aho o ngā whakapae hara tōkai - e whakakāhore katoa ana ia. Anei tētahi kaiārahi ki ngā mea e tūmanakohia ana i te wā o te whakamātautau.
text: He aha te whakapae a Tēnā Salmond? E kiia ana kua mahia e te kaiārahi SNP o mua he rangatū o ngā tūkinotanga ki nga wāhine i a ia e mahi ana hei minita tuatahi o Pākehā. I whakatakatia tētahi o ngā whakapae ki a ia i te mutunga o te kēhi ture i te Mane. Ko te hua, ināianei ka anga atu a ia ki ngā whakapae e 13, arā ko tētahi o ngā whakaekenga whakamātautau, ko tētahi o ngā tūkinotanga ā-waha, e iwa ngā tūkinotanga me ngā tūkinotanga e rua. E kiia ana kua pā mai ngā hara i ngā wāhi maha i Pākehā i waenganui o June 2008 me Whiringa 2014, tae atu ki te whare rangatira o te minita tuatahi o Bute House i Etinitini, he hōtēra me tētahi wharekai. Kua tautohe a Tēnā Salmond kia kaua e hara ki ngā whakapae katoa, ā, kua kī taurangi kia tūkaha te tiaki i a ia i te wā o te whakawā. He aha ka tūpono i te wā o te whakawā? Kei te tū te whakawā i te Kōti Tiketike i Etinitini i mua i a Lady Dorrian, ko ia te Karaka Ture o te Ariki - te kaiwhakawā matua tuarua o Pākehā. I tīpakohia tētahi hūri e 15 ngā mema o te iwi whānui i mua i te tīmatanga o te whakawā. Ka whakarongo rātau ki ngā whakaaturanga, ka whakatau mēnā kua kitea te kēhi ki a Tēnā Salmond - e mōhiotia ana ko te whakapae - "i tua atu i te rangirua tika". Kāore i te rite ki ētahi whenua, kāore he tukanga tirotiro mō ngā kaiwhakawā tūpono i roto i te ture o Pākehā kia kore ai e taea te ākiri nā ō rātou whakaaro tōrangapū, hei tauira. Kāore hoki he take kia whārite te hūri i waenganui i ngā tāne me ngā wāhine. Kāore he kōrero tūwhera mai i ngā rōia, ā, ka tīmata te whakawā ki ngā rōia Karauna e karanga ana i ngā kaiwhakaatu, tae atu ki ngā wāhine e kiia ana kua tūkinotia e Tēnā Salmond. E mōhiotia ana rātau ko te hunga amuamu. E pātaitia ana ngā kaiwhakaatu e te rōia o Alex Prentice QC me ngā rōia a Tāne Samad - ko Kōnata Jackson QC, tētahi MSP Mahi o Pirihitini o mua, me Shelagh McCall QC. Kaore te whakapae e herea ki te tuku whakaaturanga mo to rātau ake wawao. Ko tēnei nā te mea mā ngā rōia e whakamatau he hara te whakapae, kaua mā te hunga whakapae e whakamatau he harakore rātou. I whakatau a Tēnā Salmond me tana tīma ture ki te karanga i ngā kaiwhakaatu, ā, ka hoatu e te minita tuatahi o mua he whakaaturanga i te Tūrei. He aha ngā whakataunga ka taea e te hūri? Ka mutu te whakawā, ka haere te hūri i mua i te taenga atu ki tētahi o ngā whakataunga e toru: he hara, kāore i hara, kāore rānei i whakamātauria. Kāore e hiahiatia kia auau tēnei whakataunga, e waru anake o ngā kaiwhakawā e 15 e hiahia ana kia whakaaetia. Ko te whakataunga kāore i kitea he āhuatanga rerekē, he tino tautohetohe hoki o te pūnaha ture o Pirihitini, ā, he rite tonu ki te whakataunga kāore i hara. Ka whakawāteatia te tangata whakapae, a, he harakore ki te aroaro o te ture. Ki te kitea he hara a Tēnā Salmond ki tētahi o ngā whakapae ki a ia, mā te tiati e whakatau he aha te whiu e tika ana kia utaina. He aha i kore ai e whakaingoatia ngā tūpāpaku whakapae? Kāore e whakaaetia te pāpāho - tae atu ki ngā rangitaki tuihono me ngā pāpāho pāpori - ki te whakaatu i te ingoa, i ētahi atu mōhiohio rānei e mōhio ana ki ngā tūkinotanga o ngā hara ā-waha, engari rawa mēnā ka whakakore taua tangata i tō rātou mana ki te ingoamuna. Ka noho tonu tēnei ahakoa kua ūkuia te whakapae. Pērā ki ngā take hara katoa, ka rāhuitia hoki te pāpāho e te whakahawea ki ngā ture kōti, ā, ko te tangata e whakaputa ana, e pāoho ana rānei i tētahi mea e whakararuraru ana i te whakawā - hei tauira, ko te taurangi mō te hara, te harakore rānei o te tangata whakapae - ka taea te whiu, te mauhere. Ka pā anō ēnei ture whakahawea ki ngā rangitaki me ngā pūhara pāpāho pāpori pēnei i te Facebook me te Twitter. Ka taea e te iwi whānui te haere ki te whakawā? Āe, engari pērā ki ngā kēhi kōti katoa ka noho tuatahi, ko te tuatahi o te mahi. E 90 ngā tāngata e pupuri ana i te rūma kōti, engari ko te nuinga o ēnei mokowā e tangohia ana e te pāpāho. Tērā pea he wāhi mō ngā mema 30 o te iwi whānui, engari ka rerekē pea te maha o ngā mokowā i ia rā. E kiia ana ki nga mema o te iwi whānui kia puta atu i te rūma i mua i te whakaaturanga a nga kaiamuamu i roto i nga take hara tōnā. Heoi anō, ko te nuinga o te wā e whakaaetia ana nga kaipānui kia noho ki te kōti i te wā e rangona ana nga whakaaturanga.

title: Ka takaware te pāremata o Venezuela i te whakawātanga o Perehitini
summary: Kua takaware te pāremata ātete o Venezuela i te whakamātauranga tohu a Perehitini Nicolas Maduro, i tū i te Tūrei.
text: I kī te kaikōrero mo te Whakaminenga o te Motu i whakaritea te whakataunga ki te whakaiti i te raruraru tōrangapū o te whenua. Kua whakaroatia hoki tētahi hīkoi ātete i runga i te whare kōti perehitini i whakaritea mo te Tāite. E whakapaea ana a Perehitini Tūroro ki te tūkino i te kaupapa ture, engari e kī ana ngā MP e ngana ana ki tētahi "kukitanga". Ko te whakataunga kia whakaroa i te whakawā e whai ana i ngā kōrero tautokona e te Vatican i waenganui i ngā taha e rua, me te tukunga mai i te whare herehere o ngā kaiwhaiwhai ārai kāwanatanga e toru. I tērā marama i whakatārewatia ai tētahi tukanga taupānga e rapu ana ki te tango i a Tēnā Tūroro i muri i te kīanga a te kāwanatanga he kore tikanga te pōti. He aha kei muri i te raruraru i Venezuela? Kua ākiritia e Tēnā Wānanga te whakawā he muhu, ā, kua kī taurangi ki te herehere i ngā kaiuru o tētahi ngana ki te turaki i tōna kāwanatanga. Ko tētahi atekōkiri pahi o mua me te kaiārahi uniana, e whakapaetia ana e te ātete mo te āhuatanga o te ohaoha o Venezuela. Kai te anga atu te whenua rangatira hinu ki te iti kai whānui me te utunga o te utunga moni. E ngana ana te ātete ki te pupuri i tētahi taupānga auporo e āhei ai te tango i a Tēnā Tūroro i te tari.

title: Ka whakatūria e Kurz o Ateria ngā hangarau i muri i te wehenga atu o FPÖ i te kāpata
summary: Kua whakakapia e te Tumuaki o Aotearoa, a, ko Te Tumuaki o Aotearoa, ko Te Tumuaki o Aotearoa, ko nga minita matau tawhiti ki nga hangarau i muri i te ngahorotanga o tana kāwanatanga tauwhāinga i waenganui i tētahi heitara tōrangapū i takea mai i tētahi ataata muna.
text: I puta atu te Rōpū Wāteatanga (FPÖ) i te tauwhāinga i muri i te pananga a Perehitini Alexander Van der Bellen i te Minita o Roto o FPÖ, a Herbert Kickl. E anga ana a Tēnā Kurz, e 32, ki tētahi pōti whirinaki kore i te pāremata i te Mane. Ki te ora a ia ka ngana ia ki te noho tae noa ki te pōti, tērā pea i te wā o Mahuru. Heoi anō, e 62 anake ngā tūru o tana Rōpū Tāngata (ÖVP) i te pāremata tūru 183. Tokorua ngā whika matau tawhiti i mau i roto i te ataata muna, tae atu ki te kaiārahi rōpū o Heinz-Christian Strache, nāna i tuku hei tumuaki tumuaki i te Hātarei. Ko tōna tūranga i roto i te kāpata kaitiaki e whakakīa ana e te Minita Pūtea o Hartwig Löger, he wāhanga ia o te tīma mōrehu a Tāne Kurz. Ko ngā hangarau i whakatūria e Tēnā Kurz ko: "Kei a koutou katoa ināianei he kawenga nui, he kawenga tahi kia pai ai te whanaketanga o tō tātau whenua tupu o Ateria," te kī a Perehitini Van der Bellen i muri i te hui oati. Kia ora ai i tētahi pōti whirinaki, ka hiahiatia e Tēnā Kurz te tautoko a te FPÖ, te Rōpū Manapori Pāpori rānei (SPÖ). I kī te SPÖ kāore i uiuia mō te kōwhiringa hangarau a Tēnā Kurz i roto i te kāpata hou, ā, ka whakatau i te Mane me pēhea te pōti. "Me mōhio te tumuaki mēnā e tono ana ia i te maia me waihanga e ia i te tuatahi. Me kōrero a ia ki ngā rōpū katoa me te pāremata, me te whakautu ki te iwi whānui. Kāore anō ia kia mahi i tēnā," te kī a te kaikōrero pāremata tuarua o SPÖ, a Doris Bures. He aha kei roto i te ataata? Kei te tapaina whānuitia te heitara ko "Ibiza-gate", i muri i te motu Pāniora i hopukina ai te ataata. I mahia i ngā wiki noa iho i mua i te pōtitanga i kite ai i te mahi pai a te FPÖ me te Rōpū Tāngata a Tumuaki Kurz. I roto i ngā whakaaturanga, i whakaputaina i tērā Paraire e te pāpāho Tiamana, ka kitea te kaiārahi matau tawhiti o Heinz-Christian Strache e māhorahora ana, e inu ana mō ngā haora i tētahi whare me te kaiārahi rōpū pāremata FPÖ o Johann Gudenus, i a rātau e tūtaki ana ki tētahi wahine, e kiia ana ko ia te irāmutu o tētahi oligarch Rūhia. I te wā o te kōrerorero, te āhua nei e tono ana a Tēnā Strache ki te tuku i ana kirimana tūmatanui mēnā ka hokona e ia he tūnga nui i roto i te nūpepa o Ahurangi Kronen Zeitung - ā, ka tautokona te Rōpū Wāteatanga. E rangona ana a ia e huatau ana me "pana" ētahi kaipūrongo mai i te nūpepa, ā, e hiahia ana ia ki te "hanga i tētahi whenua pāpāho pēnei i a [Tōna] Orban" - e pā ana ki te kaiārahi tōpū o Hakari. He maha ngā pātai kāore anō kia whakautua mō te ataata anō: kāore i te mārama nā wai i hopu, i pēhea rānei i tukuna ai ki ngā pāpāho Tiamana. Ko te wā o tōna putanga - kotahi wiki i mua i te pōti Pāremata o Ūropi puta noa i te EU - kua pātaitia hoki. E whakaaro ana te rōia o Whiria ki tētahi uiuinga hara pea. Ka tū a Tēnā Strache i ngā haora i muri i te putanga mai o te ataata. Kāore a Tēnā Kickl i roto i te whakaaturanga, engari i te Tūtira ka panaia ia e Perehitini Van der Bellen i runga i te tono a Tēnā Kurz. Na te nekehanga i āki ētahi atu minita o te FPÖ kia whakarerea i runga i te kotahitanga.

title: Coronavirus: Me pēhea te huri i te kawenga?
summary: Ko ngā tāngata i Ingarangi kāore e taea te mahi mai i te kāinga ināianei e whakahaua ana kia hoki ki ō rātou wāhi mahi.
text: Nā Ben Butcher & Ben MilneBBC News Kua kī te kāwanatanga me pahikara, me haere rānei ngā pāhihi ki te mahi i ngā wāhi e taea ana, engari ko te hunga e mau ana i ngā waka tūmatanui me "whakarite ki te tūtira". He haumaru te haere mā runga tereina? I te nuinga o ngā tāngata e hoki ana ki te mahi, e hiahia ana te kāwanatanga kia karo i ngā waka tūmatanui ki te kore e tino hiahiatia, kia kore ai e pōkaika. I tēnei wā he ngāwari noa iho te pupuri i te tawhiti pāpori i runga i ngā tereina mō te hunga e hiahia ana ki te mahi i ngā haerenga tino nui. Tata ki te 70% o ngā ratonga tereina pūnoa i te UK e haere ana, engari kei te 10% tonu ngā taumata o mua o te mate urutā. Engari ko te wero mō ngā kaiwhakahaere rēra me pēhea te whakanui ake i te tokomaha o ngā tāngata e whakaaetia ana kia hoki mai ki runga tereina, me te pupuri i te tawhiti pāpori i runga i te papa. E kī ana te hunga e pā ana ki te whakamahere ka whakaheke pea te tawhiti pāpori i te kaha o te tereina i waenganui i te 70% me te 90%. Ko ngā tikanga whakahaere huihuinga hōu ko te ārai i ngā pāhihi kia eke ki tētahi tereina, ki te tomo rānei ki tētahi pūhara mēnā he tokomaha rawa ngā tāngata. Ā, kei te whakaarohia ētahi atu hipanga hākinakina, pēnei i ngā pāhihi e hiahiatia ana kia tāpui i ngā kāniwha wā ina tae atu rātou ki tētahi teihana. He maha ngā tereina o te taone ka tāpui anake, ā, kua kī a Avanti West Coast e kore e whakaaetia kia neke atu i te toru te kī o ngā hariata. Kua whakaritea he mahi ki te whakarite anō i ngā teihana hei whakahaere i te rere o te pāhihi. Kua whakaurua ngā wāhi takitahi, me ngā mahere mārama mō te tūtira ki te katia ngā tomokanga me ngā putanga. Network Rail says the rail industry is keen for passengers to wear face coverings while travelling. Heoi anō, ahakoa he ngāwari noa iho te whakawhāiti i te maha o ngā pāhihi i runga i tētahi tereina o te taone, ka uaua ake i runga i ngā tereina komutere e auau ana ngā tūnga, ā, he tiketike te hurihanga pāhihi. Ka pēhea te pānga o te waka tūmatanui i Rānana? Ko te wā e pau ana i te tatari ki ngā tereina me ngā pahi e tata ana ki te piki ake. Tata ki te iwa miriona te iwi whānui o Rānana, ā, neke atu i te 60% o ngā kaihaere i te taone e whakamahi ana i ngā waka tūmatanui, i whakaritea ki te 7% i te UK katoa. E kī ana tētahi pūrongo, i kitea e BBC London, mēnā me mau tonu te tawhiti pāpori i te London Underground, e 50,000 anake ngā pāhihi ka taea te eke ia 15 meneti. Ka whakataurite tērā ki te 325,000 e eke ana i ia 15 meneti i te tihi o te haora tere i mua i te raka. I ngaro i a Transport for London (TfL) te 90% o ana moni whiwhinga i muri i te hekenga o ngā tau pāhihi. Ināianei kei a ia te £1.6bn i roto i te pūtea ohorere hei whakahaere tonu i ngā ratonga Ngongo me te pahi tae noa ki Mahuru, me te tīmata anō i tētahi ratonga Raro katoa i te wā tata nei. Kua tonoa ngā kaitukumahi kia tīmataria te tīmatanga me te mutunga o tō rātou rā mahi kia kore ai e āwangawanga te pūnaha waka. TfL is to introduce one-way systems, safety signs and announcements, and hand sanitiser dispensers to help people to keep to social distancing measures. Ka rite tonu te whakahōu i ngā tohutohu i ngā teihana 20 tino pākaha hei āwhina i ngā tāngata ki te karo i aua wāhi. Ko ētahi atu tikanga e whakaarotia ana hei whakahaere i te pūnaha waka tūmatanui o Rāwāhi ko: Ko te mau pahi ka roa ake pea ngā tatari i te tūnga pahi - e whakaarotia ana ko te tikanga o te tawhiti pāpori ka taea e ngā pahi te kawe i ngā tāngata e 85 ki te 15. Me taraiwa ahau ki te mahi? Ko te nuinga o ngā haerenga i Ingarangi kua mahia kētia i roto i ngā motokā - i te tau 2018 anake, ko te tawhiti e hipa ana i te 435 miriona maero. I hinga te whakamahinga waka motokā i Ingarangi e rua hautoru mai i Poutāpeta ki Aperira, otirā i muri i te whakaurunga o te raka i te 23 o Poutāpeta. Heoi anō, kua noho tonu ngā motokā i te waka tino whakamahia, ā, kua piki haere ia wiki mai i te tīmatanga o te raka. I mua i te katinga, ko te nuinga o ngā kaihaere e taraiwa kē ana ki te mahi. Ko te okotahi kotahi ko Rāwāhi, kei reira te whakaurua anō te utu paheketanga hei karo i te hanganga o ngā waka. Puta noa i Ingarangi, e whakaaro ana te Tari Waka (DfT) e 68% o ngā tāngata e haere ana ki te mahi i roto i tētahi motokā, engari ko te tikanga tonu e hia miriona e mau ana i ngā waka tūmatanui ki tō rātou wāhi mahi. Heoi anō, e taunaki ana ngā tohutohu a te kāwanatanga kia mutu te tākai motokā, ā, neke atu i te 10% o ngā kaihaere i roto i ngā motokā i tēnei wā. He ngāwari noa iho ki a au te pahikara? E kī ana ngā kaiwhakanao pahikara kua nui te piki o ngā hokonga paihikara i te wā o te raka, nā reira te āhua nei ka pēnei pea. TfL says it's working with the Mayor of London to accommodate a tenfold increase in the number of people cycling, and a fivefold increase in the number of pedestrians. Kua pānuitia e te DfT tētahi mōkī ine £250m hei whakahauhau i te paihikara me te hīkoi i Ingarangi. Kei roto i ngā ine ko ngā ara paihikara pakū-ake me te mokowā pare mō te paihikara, ngā ara whānui ake, ngā tūtakinga haumaru ake, me ngā ara pahikara anake. Ā, kua whakakitea he aronui £5m i Greater Manchester kia haumaru ake ai te taone mō ngā kaieke paihikara me ngā kaihīkoi, i te wā kua katia tētahi huarahi nui i Brighton ki ngā waka motokā. Heoi anō, ko ngā take tae atu ki te urunga ki ngā paihikara, ki ngā whakaaro rānei o te haumarutanga huarahi ka pōturi pea te tango paihikara. Neke atu i te haurua o ngā tāngata i pātaitia e tētahi uiuinga DfT o nā noa nei i kī kāore rātau i whakaaro he haumaru nga huarahi i to rātau rohe. I te tau 2018, ko te ōrautanga o te iwi whānui o UK e eke ana ki te mahi mai i te 4% i Ingarangi, ki te 1% anake i Aiarangi ki te Raki.

title: I ākiritia e te Kōti Pīra te kēhi waipiro waipiro
summary: Kāore te tamaiti i whānau mai i te waipiro kōhungahunga e whai mana ā-ture ana ki te utu i muri i te inu nui o tōna whaea i a ia e hapu ana, kua whakataua e te Kōti Pīra.
text: I whānau mai te kōtiro e whitu tau me te tūkino roro nui, ā, kei te tiakina ināianei. I tautohe nga rōia kua paitini tōna whaea i tana kōhungahunga engari i whakataua e nga kaiwhakawā pīra kāore a ia i mahi i tētahi hara hara. I kawea mai te kēhi e tētahi kaunihera i te Raki o Ingarangi, e kore e taea te whakaingoa mō ngā take ā-ture. I tautohetohetia ka waiho e te wahine ngā whakatūpato, a, ka inu i te nui o te waipiro i a ia e hapu ana. E waru ngā kēne pia kaha me te hawhe pounamu vodka i ia rā, ka rongo te kōti. Tokotoru nga kaiwhakawā pīra i te Kōti Pīra i whakatau mēnā e whai wāhi ana te kōtiro ki te utu mai i te Aronui Utu Whara Hara i utua e te kāwanatanga hei tūkino i te hara. Engari i kī te Ariki Ture Treacy he "mea tino nui" mō tētahi hara kia mahia "ko te whakararuraru kino ki te tangata - e kore e tika te tūkino tinana kino ki te kōhungahunga ". Ko te kēhi 'tino hira' Ko te kōtiro, kāore e taea te whakaingoatia, ā, i kīia i te kōti hei CP, e pāngia ana e te akoranga, te whanaketanga, te pūmahara me ngā raruraru whanonga. I kī te korero ā-ture o TE Rongokōrero, a Clive Coleman, he mea nui te kēhi nā te mea i whakawaengatia mēnā i whakaarotia he tangata, kāore rānei he kōhungahunga i tōna whaea. Ka kī a ia: "He tino hira tēnei take, nā te mea i tautohe ngā kaiwhakahauhau mēnā i kī te Kōti Pīra ka taea e te whaea te mahi hara mā te whakakino i tana kōhungahunga ki te waipiro nui rawa, tērā pea ka pā ki te whakahē i ngā wāhine hapū e inu nui ana, e mōhio ana ki ngā mōrearea o te waipiro ki to rātau kōhungahunga." Ko te inu nui i te wā e hapu ana, ka pā pea ki te mate waipiro kōhungahunga (FAS). Ka puta te waipiro i te wāhi mai i te whaea ki te kōhungahunga e tipu ana. Engari kāore e taea e te kōhungahunga te tukatuka tika i te waipiro kia tino whanake rā anō te ate, ā, ka pā pea ngā taumata tiketike o te waipiro ki te whanaketanga o ngā okana me te roro. Children with FAS are born with a range of disabilities, are often shorter than average and some have learning and behavioural problems. Ka taea e te hunga whai mate te rerekētanga o ō rātou āhuahira kanohi pēnei i te piriti ihu papatahi, te upoko iti me te ngutu angiangi. E whakaarotia ana he tino mōrearea ngā kōhungahunga i roto i ngā marama tuatahi e toru o te hapu i te wā e hanga ana ngā whēkau - engari ka pā mai te tūkinotanga i ngā wā katoa. I kī atu a John Foy QC, e tohu ana i te kaunihera e whai mana ana mō CP, ki te kōti e inu ana tōna whaea i te ōrite o te 40-57 wae waipiro i ia rā. E huatau ana ngā tohutohu o te Whare Wānanga ā-Motu mō te Hauora me te Tiaki (Nice) kia 7.5 ngā wae ia rā ka tūkino pea i te kōhungahunga. I kī a Tēnā Foy i mōhio te whaea taitamariki, he hapu tuarua tērā, ki ngā mōrearea, ka tāpiri: "I pōhēhē a ia mehemea ka tūkinotia te kōhungahunga. " I kite a ia tērā pea ka pā mai he tūkinotanga, engari i haere tonu ki te mōrearea." I tono a Ben Collins, e puta ana mō te Mana Utu Whara Hara (CICA) ki te kōti kia whakakāhore i te wero ā-ture, e kī ana ki ngā kaiwhakawā: "Tērā tētahi papā whakaaro mō ngā mea e mōrearea ana, ehara rānei i te mea mōrearea, ehara i te mea inu anake, engari mō te kai paipa me te kai." I pātai mai a ia mēnā "ka whakapaea he hara tētahi whaea hapū e kai ana i te tīhi kāore i te whakapiria, i tētahi hēki kōhua ngohengohe rānei, e mōhio ana he mōrea tērā pea ka mōrearea te tūkino ki te kōhungahunga ". I pōhiritia te whakahaere e te Ratonga Tohutohu Hapū o Ingarangi (Bpas) me te aroha whakawhānau o Birthrights. I kī a Rebecca Schiller, te tūru tahi o Birthrights, me te rangatira nui o Bpas, a Ann Furedi, he "whakahaere tino hira mō ngā wāhine i ngā wāhi katoa". "Kua mōhio ngā kōti tiketike o UK me āhei ngā wāhine ki te whakatau i ā rātou ake whakataunga mō ā rātou hapu," ka kī rātau. "I whakararuraru ngā take o nāianei, whānui ake hoki o te kēhi. I a ia e rapu ana ki te whakatū he hara hara te tūkinotanga i pā mai ki te kōhungahunga i te inu taumaha, ka karangatia e te kēhi te tūnga ture o te wahine i a rātau e hapu ana, me te mana ki te whakatau i a rātau ake whakataunga." I kī te 'waea whakaoho' a Neil Sugarman, te rōia e whakatau ana mō CP, he "mārama te whakakino" o te whakataunga, ā, ehara te take i te mana wahine, i te "whakahē rānei i ngā wāhine". I kī a ia ko GLP Solicitors, ko ia te hoa whakahaere, e tohu ana mō ētahi atu tamariki e 80 me te FAS, ā, ināianei kei te titiro rātou ki ngā take o te whakahaere. Ko te kōwhiringa ā-ture anake e toe ana ko te rapu ki te mau i te kēhi ki te Kōti Matua. I kī atu a Julia Brown, te rangatira nui o te Foetal Alcohol Spectrum Disorders (FASD) Trust, ki te AO i whakamāramatia e te kēhi te hiahia kia hoatu tohutohu ki ngā wāhine hapū mō te inu, me te tautoko kia mutu te inu mēnā e hiahiatia ana. "Kaore he toa i roto i tētahi take pēnei," tana tāpiri mai, e kī ana a ia e tūmanako ana he "waea whakaoho" kia whakaaro ai te tangata ki ngā mōrearea o te inu ina hapu. E tūtohu ana te NHS kia kaua ngā wāhine hapū e inu - me tāpiri kia kaua e neke atu i te rua ngā wae waipiro i te wā kotahi, e rua rānei i te wiki.

title: Ngaru wera UK: E anga ana ngā pāhihi o Hato Pancras ki ngā takaware puta noa i te mutunga wiki
summary: Kua tonoa ngā pāhihi o te rēra i waenganui i London St Pancras me Nottingham me Sheffield kia kaua e haere i te toru o nga rā, ā, ka tuki ngā kaitātaki.
text: Kei te ngana tonu ngā kaipūkaha ki te whakatika i ngā taputapu raina o runga e tata ana ki West Hampstead, ki te raki o Rāwāhi. I takea te tūkinotanga i te wera i te Rāitema - i te wā i whakapūketetia e te UK tōna rā wera tuarua. I kī atu ngā kamupene tereina ki ngā kiritaki kia whakahekea te ratonga tae noa ki te Mane. I kī ngā Tereina o East Midlands e whakahaere ana i tētahi ratonga tino whakatika i runga i te ara. Ināianei, kei te tū hoki tētahi hīkoi tuarua o te Hātarei e ngā mema o te uniana o te RMT mō te utu me ngā herenga, e pā ana ki ngā haerenga paetata i ngā Tereina o East Midlands. Kua whakakapia ētahi ratonga e ngā wātaka me ngā ratonga kaiako kua whakahōutia. Ko te tikanga o te whakatika raina hiko ko ngā tīkiti i ngā Tereina o Te Rāwhiti me Thameslink - e whakahaere ana i ngā ratonga i roto, huri noa i Rāwāhi - e whakaaetia ana i runga i ētahi atu ara. I tohutohu te National Rail i te hunga e haere ana i waenganui i Rānana me Sheffield ki te whakamahi i te raina e hono ana i te Rīpeka o Kīngi o Rātana ki Doncaster. E kī ana me haere ngā pāhihi i Rāhui mā Grantham ki King's Cross, ā, me haere ngā pāhihi i Aotearoa ki Rāwāhi Euston mā Nuneaton. I kī atu a Thameslink ki ngā kiritaki kua "kore e taea e Network Rail te whakatika katoa" i ngā waea pakaru i waenganui i St Pancras me Elstree. E tūmanakohia ana kia whakahaere tētahi ratonga iti mō te toenga o te Hātarei, ā, e kī ana a Thameslink kua tonoa e ia ētahi atu pahi whakakapi rēra mō te Rātapu. Ko Eurostar - e whakahaere ana i ngā ratonga i waho o Hato Pancras International - kāore i te pūrongo i ngā raruraru i runga i tōna ara ki te Whenua. I tae te wera wera i te UK i te Rāitema ki te 38.1C (100.6F) i Cambridge. Ā, ko ngā whika tauwhāiti e huatau ana kua tae tonu te pāmahana ki te 38.7C - he pūkete UK i ngā wā katoa. I tūtaki ngā komutere ki te raruraru whānui nā ngā mahi e pā ana ki te wera i runga i te rerewhenua, i te wā i whakararurarutia hoki ngā rerenga e ngā āwhā puta noa i Uropi. I whakapāha a Jake Kelly, te kaiwhakahaere whakahaere o East Midlands Trains, ki ngā pāhihi, e kī ana ka haere tonu te raruraru ki te mutunga wiki. I kī a ia e mahi ana te kamupene "tino tata" me ngā kaipūkaha Network Rail ki te whakatika i ngā taputapu me te whakatuwhera katoa i te rerewhenua. "Ko tā mātou tohutohu mō ngā kiritaki ko te karo i te haere i tēnei ara ki ngā wāhi katoa e taea ana, me te whakarite i ētahi atu whakaritenga," tana tāpiri mai. I whakatūpato a Network Rail i ngā tereina e whakahaere ana, e tūmanakohia ana kia "tino arokē". I mihi a Sue Grenwood, e haere ana ki Hato Pancras mai i Derby, ki ngā kaimahi mo te mahi i ngā mea tino pai. Ka tūtohu a ia: "Ko ngā momo takaware me ngā uauatanga katoa e haere ana, engari i kitea e te tīma o Derby he tereina whakakapi ki St Pancras, me ngā kaimahi anga, me ngā kaimahi tino ngāwari." Kua haukotia tō haerenga? Ka taea e koe te tiri i tō wheako mā te īmēra haveyoursay@bbc.co.uk. Tēnā whakaurua he tau hoapā mēnā e hiahia ana koe ki te kōrero ki tētahi kaipānui o TE HAU. Ka taea hoki e koe te whakapā mai ki a mātou mā ngā huarahi e whai ake nei:

title: Covid: Ka hipa a UK i te 100,000 nga mate me te PM 'maia' mo nga taonga kano kano
summary: Anei ngā mea e rima e hiahia ana koe ki te mōhio mō te mate urutā coronavirus i tēnei ahiahi o te Tūrei. Āpōpō he whakahōutanga anō māu māu.
text: 1. Neke atu i te 100,000 nga tangata kua mate i te Covid-19 i te UK, i muri i te 1,631 nga mate i roto i nga ra 28 o te whakamatautau pai i tuhia ki nga whika o ia ra. Ko te tikanga e 100,162 nga mate kua tuhia ki te UK, te iwi Pakeha tuatahi ki te pahemo i te rohe. Kua kī a Boris Johnson e "tino pouri ana ia mo ia oranga kua ngaro". I muri i ia tatauranga, he tangata e arohaina ana. Pānuitia ō takoha ki te hunga kua mate i konei. 2. PM 'maia' ki nga taonga kano kano a Boris Johnson kua kii ia he "tino maia" ki te putanga o nga kano kano a te UK whai muri i nga whakatupato o te takaware o te whakaputa. Ka puta mai i te kī a te EU tērā pea ka whakamau i ngā mana kaweake rongoā. I a ia e kōrero ana i te kōrero o Downing Street i tēnei rā, ka kī te pirimia e tūmanako ana te UK ka "whakahonoretia ngā kirimana katoa" a te EU, ā, ka mahi tonu me ngā whenua o te ao i runga i ngā tukunga rongoā. I kī te Minita Tukunga Rongoā o mua a Nadhim Zahawi he "kikī" ngā rawa, engari e whakapono ana te UK ka whiwhi i te nui o ngā rongoā hei whakatutuki i ōna ūnga, 3. Ka whakakotahi ngā whetū Āhia o Ingarangi ki te whakakore i ngā pūrākau Covid Nā ngā rongo kōrero kōrero mō te kano ārai mate Covid, otirā i roto i te hapori o Āhia ki te Tonga, i āwangawanga mō te tangohanga. E ākina ana ki ngā tāngata rongonui tae atu ki ngā comedians Romesh Ranganathan me Meera Syal me te kaipāpāho o Takawaenga Ali ki te hanga i tētahi ataata e whakahau ana i ngā tāngata kia whiwhi i te jab. I whakaritea te ataata e te kaihanga o Citizen Kani, a Adil Ray, nāna i kī e hiahia ana ia ki te whakakore i ngā pūrākau werohanga mō te hunga o ngā hapori iti. "E whakaaro ana mātou katoa me mahi mātou i tētahi mea," tana kī atu ki te HAU. 4. School to withdraw places for Covid-breach pupils A school has threatened to withdraw places for pupils who have told teachers they are visiting people outside their households. I kī te Kura Hapori o Yew Tree i Oldham he tokomaha ngā tamariki i whakaae ki te toro i ngā hoa, ngā hoa noho tata me te whānau e hāngai ana ki ngā ture raka Covid-19. I kī te kaiako matua o Martine Buckley ka mahia e ia te mahi ina "whakamōrearea ngā kaimahi e ngā mātua". During the current lockdown schools are open only to pupils listed as vulnerable and the children of key workers. 5. He aha te āhua o te noho i roto i te 'Hotel Quarantine' E tūmanakohia ana te kāwanatanga o UK ki te whakapuaki i ngā mahere mō tētahi momo taratahi hōtēra mō ngā taenga mai o te ao ki te whenua. Kua whakaritea kētia ngā aronui ōrite puta noa i te ao, tae atu ki Ahitereiria me Aotearoa. Kua kōrero mai ētahi kaihaereere ki a mātau mō ō rātou wheako, tae atu ki a Keri McMenamin, e 38 tau te pakeke, nāna i tono he horoi horoi mō tōna noho i tētahi hōtēra o Ahitereiria i muri i tana kitenga i ngā whakaahua o ngā rūma paruparu mai i ngā tāngata i puta i te pūnaha taratahi o te whenua. Tīkina he kōrero rongokōrero roa ake ia rā mai i te BBC i tō pouakaroto, ia ata o te wiki, mā te waitohu ki konei. Kaua hoki e wareware... Ka taea e koe te kite i ētahi atu mōhiohio, tohutohu me ngā kaiārahi i tā mātou whārangi coronavirus me ngā tātaritanga tohunga tae atu ki tēnei whakamārama mai i te tīma hauora o te BBC he aha i tino kino ai te mate o te UK. He aha ō pātai mō te coronavirus? I ētahi wā, ka whakaputaina tō pātai, e whakaatu ana i tō ingoa, pakeke me tō tauwāhi i a koe e whakarato ana, ki te kore koe e kōrero kē. E kore rawa ō taipitopito hoapā e whakaputaina. Me mātua whakarite kua pānui koe i ā mātou ture me ngā tikanga me te kaupapahere tūmataitinga. Whakamahia tēnei puka hei pātai i tō pātai: Ō mōhiohio whakapā Kua neke atu i te 16 tau te pakeke E whakaae ana ahau ki ngā Ture Ratonga Kei te pupuri te BBC i te mana ki te tīpako mai i ēnei koha i runga anō i ngā whakaritenga ētita, ā, e herea ana ki ngā ture me ngā tikanga tuihono me ngā tohutohu ētita o TE HAU. Mō ētahi atu mōhiohio e pā ana ki te whakahaere a te BBC i ō raraunga whaiaro, tirohia i konei. Mēnā kei te pānui koe i tēnei whārangi, ā, kāore koe e kite i te puka, me toro koe ki te putanga pūkoro o te paetukutuku BBC ki te tuku i tō pātai, ki te tuku rānei mā te īmēra ki YourQuestions@bbc.co.uk. Tēnā whakaurua tō ingoa, pakeke me tō tauwāhi ki ngā pātai ka tukuna e koe.

title: E tū ana a Rawiri Karauna rāua ko Ed Miliband i runga i ngā tāruatanga
summary: Kua tū te Pirimia o Rawiri Karauna ki te kaiārahi Mahi o Ed Miliband mō ngā tono kia ngāwari ake ai te peke a ngā umanga i ngā kaimahi.
text: I kī a Adrian Beecroft i roto i tētahi pūrongo mō te whakarewa i te tupu, me āhei ngā rangatira ki te ahi i ngā kaimahi me te kore whai take. I nga pātai a te pirimia turituri, ka kī a Tēnā Miliband i whakaaturia e te rīpoata te "rōpū kino kua hoki mai". I whakapaea e Tēnā Karauna a Tēnā Miliband "i roto i te pūkoro o nga whakakotahitanga mahi". Na te pūrongo a Beecroft i huatau "ka ākiritia ētahi tāngata nā te mea kāore tō rātou kaitukumahi i te pīrangi ki a rātou" engari he "utu e tika ana kia utua", ka kī atu a Tēnā Miliband ki ngā MP. Ka pātai atu a ia ki a Tēnā Karauna: "Kei te tino kī mai koe ki a mātau, me ngā tau pūkete i te mahi, he utu te utu ki te peke i ngā tāngata kāore he take pai?" I kī a Tēnā Karauna e hinga ana te kore mahi, kei te heke iho te utunga moni, ā, kua tapahia e te kāwanatanga te tāpaetanga mā te 25%. 'E tautoko ana i ngā umanga' I kī atu a ia ki te kaiārahi Mahi: "Kei te mahi mātou i ēnei hipanga katoa i ahu mai ki te nuinga o ngā tīmatanga pakihi iti i tērā tau i roto i te hītori o te whenua. " Ko te tikanga, kāore e taea e koe te tautoko i ngā huringa ki ngā ture mahi nā te mea kei roto koe i te pūkoro o ngā whakakotahitanga mahi." I kī te pirimia he tino pai rawa atu ngā whakaaro o te pūrongo a Beecroft, engari i te kōrero te kāwanatanga ki te ariā o te pana hē anake mō "ngā umanga moroiti". I mua rā ka hoki whakamuri a Tēnā Beecroft ki te Hēkeretari Pakihi o Te Taura nāna i ākiri ana tono kia ngāwari ake ai te ahi i ngā kaimahi hei "kutukutu". I kī atu te kaituku Rangatira ki te Daily Telegraph Mr Cable ngā whakahē ki ana huatau, i whakaputaina i roto i tētahi pūrongo i tēnei wiki, he "ariā ehara i te ohaoha" ā, i whakapaea e ia he "manapori" nāna i mahi iti rawa hei tautoko i ngā umanga. No 10 said it was doing everything possible to support business. I kī a Downing Street "kei te mauria whakamua ētahi o (ngā tūtohutanga a Tēnā Beecroft), ā, kāore ētahi". I pātai mai mehemea i whakahē te pirimia ki a Tēnā Taura e whakaahuatia ana e Tēnā Beecroft he hāpori, ka kī te kaiwhakaatu: "I whakaaro ahau he Kaiwhakapori Liberal a Te Taura o Te Kaura." I tonoa te kaipāngai kia arotake i te ture mahi a Downing Street i muri i te karangatanga a Rawiri Karauna kia whakawāteatia te umanga o Ingarangi i te "rīpene whero". I tautokona whānuitia ana tūtohutanga e ngā MP Tūturu, engari i kī a Tēnā Taura ko ngā mahere mō ngā pana hē kore he "huarahi hē", ā, ehara i te mahi a te kāwanatanga ki te "whakamataku i te atamai" i te iwi. 'Haere ki te tuma karihi' I a ia e kōrero ana ki te Telegraph, ka kī a Tēnā Beecroft mō Tēnā Taura: "Ki taku whakaaro he hāpori a ia i kite i tētahi kāinga i roto i te Lib Dems, nā reira ko ia tētahi o te Mauī. " Ki taku whakaaro he tino rerekē te āhua o te tangata kei te whakahaere umanga, engari he iti noa iho te mahi hei tautoko i ngā umanga." I whakapaea e Tēnā Beecroft ngā hoa tauwhāinga o te Hunga Rangatira, te Lib Dems, mō te ārai i ana kaupapa, e whakapae ana i te kaiārahi o Nick Clegg i ngā wā katoa e "whakawehi ana ki te haere karihi me te memeha i te mea katoa ki te kore ia e whiwhi i tōna ara ki tēnei, tēnā me tētahi". I whakahē hoki a ia i te Pūtea Moni mo te korenga e "whakahaere i te tupu". I kī atu a Tēnā Beecroft ki te Telegraph mēnā ka whakaurua ana tūtohutanga katoa, ka 5% te pikinga o te tupu. I whakaūngia e ia te takaware o ngā ture rata whānau hōu, pēnei i te wehenga mātua ngāwari, ahakoa kāore taua marohi i puta i te putanga whakamutunga o tana pūrongo, ā, i huatau mai ko ngā whika matua o te Rangatira - tae atu ki te kaitohutohu No 10 o mua ko Steve Hilton - i te tuatahi i tāruatia ana tūtohutanga katoa. "Kei te kōrero ahau mō Steve Hilton, taua rōpū, ā, i whakapūmau mai rātau ki a au e hiahia ana a Rawiri Karauna ki te mahi i te mea katoa. Ahakoa e tika ana, kāore rānei au i te tino mōhio engari koia tērā te ariā kaha i whiwhi ai ahau," tana kī atu ki te nūpepa. Ko tana pūrongo, i whakaputaina i te Mane, i tono kia ngāwari ake te peke a ngā kamupene i ngā kaimahi i raro i te mahi. I huatau mai kia whakamutua tētahi wā whakawhitiwhiti whakahau 90 rā ina whakaaro tētahi kamupene ki ngā hōtaka whakahōutanga, ā, ka karangatia kētia mō tētahi wā paerewa 30 rā me tētahi wā ohorere e rima rā mēnā kei te tino pouri tētahi umanga. I kī te pūrongo e tūkino ana ngā ture tawhito i te āhua o te whakahaerenga, ā, e ārai ana i ngā kamupene kia kaua e waihanga mahi. Ko ngā huringa ki te ture mahi, kua tautohetia, ka whakapai ake i te whakarato kaimahi tika ki ngā kamupene, e iti iho ana te mataku ki te mahi utu nui, ki te anga rānei ki ngā mahi ā-ture ina whakatakoto i te hunga kāore i te hiahiatia. Ngā Hononga Ipurangi Pātahi Daily Telegraph

title: I hereheretia te atekōkiri taraka o Danny Warby i runga i te matenga o te pirihimana o Wyton
summary: E ono tau te hereheretanga o tētahi atekōkiri taraka i tūtuki ki te motokā o tētahi pirihimana mahi.
text: I mate a Det Con Sharon Garrett, e 48, i roto i tētahi tūtukitanga waka e rima i runga i te A141 tata ki Wyton, Cambridgeshire, i June 2014. I whakatuwheratia e Danny Warby, e 28, o Runcton Holme, tata ki King's Lynn, Norfolk, tētahi karere kuputuhi i mua i te tūtukitanga o tana waka 13.6 tan ki te motokā o te āpiha. I whakakāhore a Warby i te matenga o Mrs Garrett mā te taraiwa mōrearea, engari i whakawāteatia e te hūri i tērā marama. Ētahi atu kōrero mō tēnei me ētahi atu rongo mai i Cambridgeshire me Norfolk i rāhuitia hoki ia kia kaua e taraiwa mo te 10 tau. I te wā o tētahi whakawā e iwa rā, ka rongo te Kōti Karauna o Peterborough kua whakatuwheratia e Warby tētahi karere kuputuhi kotahi meneti me te ono hēkona i mua i te tūtukitanga. Ka whakawhiti tana waka i te raina mā i waenganui o te huarahi, a, ka poroa tētahi taraka e haere mai ana, e rua ngā motokā i roto i te otaota, i mua i te tūtukitanga ki te Rūnanga o Mīhana Garrett, i roto i te raina waka e haere mai ana. I te taraiwa a Warby i te 53mph (85km/h) i runga i te whārōrō o te huarahi kotahi e rāhuitia ana ki te 40mph (64km/h) mō ngā taraka i te wā o te tūtukitanga, ka kī te ture. I rongo te kōti i te atekōkiri umanga whakarato he maha ngā whakapae o mua, tae atu ki te tere me te whakamahi waea pūkoro i a ia e taraiwa ana. I te tau 2015, i rāhuitia a Warby mo te tau kotahi mo te taraiwa inu. I mārena te whaea o te tokorua o Whaea Garrett ki tētahi hoa pirihimana, ā, i a ia e hoki ana ki te kāinga mai i te mahi i te wā o te tūtukitanga i te 6 o Hune. I tūtuki tana motokā i te huarahi, a, ka mutu ki tētahi parae, a, ka kōrerotia kua mate ia i taua wāhi. I te whiu i a Warby ki te ono tau i roto i te whare herehere, ka kī atu tōna Kaiwhakawā Hōnore ki a ia e mārama ana kāore ia i ako i tētahi mea mai i ōna āhua kōti o mua. "He pōhēhē, he māia tō taraiwa, ā, i tēnei rā he whakapouri," tana kī. "Kua utua e Mrs Garrett me tōna whānau te utu whakamutunga." I uru atu a Mrs Garrett ki ngā Pirihimana o Cambridgeshire i te tau 1991, ā, i mahi i roto i ngā tūranga maha puta noa i te ope, kātahi anō ka uiui i ngā hara tinihanga matatini i te Wae Hara Ohaoha. I roto i tētahi kōrero i whakaputaina i muri i te whakapaetanga o Warby, ka kī tōna whānau i noho "whakararuraru" rātau i tōna matenga. "He whaea tino pai a Sharon kua tangohia mai i ana tamariki tokorua i roto i aua āhuatanga kino," ka kī rātau.

title: I whainatia e Audi te £700m i runga i te heitara kohu diesel
summary: Kua whainatia a Audi €800m (£700m) hei whakatau i tētahi tūhuratanga a ngā rōia Tiamana ki ngā takahi i ngā ture kohu diesel.
text: I kī te toa motokā mārō, nā Volkswagen, "e whakaae ana ki te pai me te ... e whakaae ana ki tōna kawenga". I Hune, i whakaae a VW ki tētahi whakataunga €1bn i Tiamana i runga i te heitara kohukohu, i mārama i te tau 2015. I kī a Audi, kei te tūhuratia tōna rangatira o Rupert Stadler i runga i te "dieselgate", i kī ngā motokā pāngia i te tau 2004-18. I kī a Audi i roto i tētahi kōrero i "whakatakotoria ētahi pūkaha diesel V6 me V8 ki runga i te mākete me tētahi taumahi pūmanawa kāore e taea te whakaaetia". Ko ētahi atu pūkaha e pā ana ko te EA 288 me te EA 189 e whakamahia whānuitia ana. I te tau 2015, i kitea e ngā kaihoko o Amerika kua whakaurua ētahi motokā diesel VW ki ngā mea e mōhiotia ana ko "ngā pūrere hinga" hei whakapati i ngā pānuitanga kohu i te wā o ngā whakamātautau mīhini kia whakahekea ai te huaputa pono o ngā waikura hauota. I horapa te heitara puta noa i te umanga mīhini, ehara i te mea ko te VW anake me ērā atu toa motokā, engari ki ētahi atu kaiwhakanao mīhini. I whakaae a VW i te tau 2015 ki te hoatu i ngā pūmanawa pūrere hinganga ki roto i ngā motokā e 11 miriona puta noa i te ao. Kua tae ki te €27bn te katoa o ngā utu a te kamupene i roto i ngā whaina, ngā hoko whakahoki me ngā whakahōutanga.
