Ahakoa kua katia ināianei te rūpahu ki a Audi, ko ētahi atu take ki ngā kaiwhakahaere o te rōpū o TE WHW - tae atu ki te rangatira nui o Mātini Winterkorn - ka tuwhera tonu, me ngā utu tae atu ki te tinihanga, te pānuitanga teka me te rahunga ki te whakamōhio atu ki ngā kaiwhakangao. I te tīmatanga o tēnei marama, ka whiua e TE Rangatira Nui o Audi, o Rupert Stadler. I Hune, i whakamātauria ia e nga rōia Tiamana mo te tinihanga me ngā pānuitanga teka e pā ana ki te hokonga o ngā motokā me ngā pūrere hinganga, ā, ka noho tonu ki te tiakitanga pirihimana. Ko te whaina a Audi o te €800m, ko te €5m mō te whati ture ture, me te toenga he utu mō ngā painga ohaoha i hua mai i te hokonga o ngā motokā me ngā pūrere hinganga. I kī a Audi, te pūkenga tino whai hua o te rōpū VW, ka pā te pai ki tana mahinga pūtea i tēnei tau. I te tuatahi ka hinga te utu tiri o VW i runga i te rongo, engari i muri iho ka piki neke atu i te 2% i Frankfurt. Tātaritanga nā Theo Leggett, te korero pakihi ao whānui o TE AO Pērā ki tōna kamupene matua i te tīmatanga o tēnei tau, kua "whakaae a Audi ki te kawenga" mō ngā pakaru ture. He tino nui te whaina, engari ko te tūponotanga ka koa mārire ngā kaiwhakahaere me ngā kaipupuri i a ia e tango ana i tētahi atu huarahi mōrearea ā-ture e anga ana ki te Rōpū VW. Ko te tikanga, kua whakamanatia a Audi mo te kore e kite i te pūmanawa "pūrere hinga" kua tāutatia ki ōna ake waka, ā, ka whakaaetia kia hokona rātou. E hua ana tērā i te wāhi matua o te hē - ko te whakarite me te whakatakoto i te pūmanawa hei patu i ngā whakamātautau kohukohu - e kitea ana he take mō ia tangata, ehara i te kamupene anō. Kāore anō kia mutu te take. Kei te whawhai tonu te Rōpū Wānanga i tētahi whakawā nui i mauria mai e ngā kaiwhakangao e whakapono ana i puritia rātau i roto i te pouri mō te raruraru e tipu ana i te kamupene, ā, ka ngaro te moni. Tērā anō ētahi mahi rōpū i kawea mai e ngā kaihoko motokā pākaha huri noa i Uropi - tae atu ki te UK. A, ko te rangatira nui o Audi, ko Rupert Stadler e ngoikore ana i roto i te whare herehere, e tatari ana ki te whakawā mo tana whakauru ki te heitara.

title: Ko te whitiāhua Zulu Rorke's Drift VC e toa ana i ngā pūrākau pakanga
summary: "Zulus - mano 'em." Koia pea te raina e maumaharatia ana e te nuinga o te iwi mai i te pikitia o te tau 1964, o Zulu.
text: Nā Nick DermodyBBC News E kōrero ana te pikitia i te pakanga o Rorke's Drift i te tau 1879 i te wā i puritia e ētahi hōia o Ingarangi e 150 neke atu i te 4,000 ngā iwi toa i whakaekea e rātau. He takahanga tērā i kitea ai e 11 ngā Rīpeka Wikitōria i whakawhiwhia, neke atu i tētahi pakanga kotahi i mua, mai i muri rānei. Tērā pea nā te hiahia a te Pirimia o Pineamine Disraeli ki te tā i tētahi arai i runga i te hinganga nui i Isandlwana i mua i taua rā kotahi i te wā i purua ai tētahi tīwae o ngā hōia o Ingarangi e 1,800 ki te tao. Heoi anō, mā te tātaritanga o ngā torokī e whakaatu he tika te whakawhiwhinga o ia VC. Engari, mai i te mea i hangaia tata ki te hawhe rau tau ki mua, kua noho te whitiāhua Peretania mō ngā piro e whitu, neke atu rānei o ngā tāngata i tutuki pai te patu i tētahi ope Zulu, he taonga mātāmua 139 meneti. Kua whakaohotia e ia tētahi umanga katoa mō tētahi pakanga kawanatanga kua warewaretia, ā, mō te nuinga o te iwi, tērā pea he pakipūmeka o te mea i tūpono. Koia tērā te tirohanga a Bill Cainan, te kaitiaki o te Whare Taonga o Te Ariki Welsh, e noho ana i Brecon, Powys. Koia tērā i whakaahuatia ai ngā hōia, ā, i roto i te pikitia hei ope taua Welsh, me te kaitapere whānau o Rhondda Valley, ko Stanley Baker i roto i te tūranga ārahi. Hāunga kāore rātou, e kī ana a Tēnā Cainan, nāna tonu i mahi i roto i te taua mo te 37 tau. Te whakawhanaketanga Ahakoa e ono tau te ope taua i Wēra i te pakanga o Rorke's Drift, i huaina tonutia rātau ko te 24th Regiment of Foot (2nd Warwickshire Regiment). Mō ngā whakatupuranga i tonoa e te ope taua mai i ngā kaimahi pāmu kaha e mahi ana i ngā pārae o Warwickshire me ngā takiwā noho tata. Engari i te oho o te tere o te whakawhanaketanga o Weera, me ngā awaawa o Uēra ki te tonga, kua nekehia e te Taua te pūtake o te ope taua ki Brecon ki te tiki mai i ngā kaimahi mahi pūkenga. Heoi anō, kāore i neke atu i te tuatoru o ngā tāngata i roto i te ope taua i taua wā e whakaaro ana he Welsh rātau, e kī ana a Tēnā Cainan. Ka hoatu e ia he kauhau i te Hātarei i te Whare Taonga o te Ope Taua o te Motu i Rāwāhi i te whiwhinga o te Pakanga o Anglo-Zulu i Weera. Ko te momo wā tērā e puta mai ai a ia ki ngā pūrākau maha e mau tonu ana e Zulu, e kī ana a ia. Ka kī a ia: "I hiahia noa iho a Stanley Baker ki te whakauru i ētahi Welshness ki roto. I tākaro a ia i te ope taua hei South Wales Borderers, ā, ko te 2nd Warwickshire Regiment tonu. "Kia mōhio koe, e iwa tau te roa o te Taua - e rua tau i muri i te pakanga o Zulu - ki te whakaingoa anō, hei whakaata i tōna tauwāhi matawhenua." Tērā pea ko tētahi o ngā wā whakamahuki o te pikitia ko te waiata hīkoi a Welsh, Men of Harlech. I a rātau e tatari ana nga hōia o Ingarangi e karapoti ana ki te whakaekenga whakamutunga, ka ārahi te kaiwaiata opera o Ivor Emmanuel, e hāngai ana hei Private Owen, i a rātau i roto i tētahi mahinga whakaoho ki te ātete i ngā waiata pakanga a Zulu. 'E tūmanakohia ana kia mate' Ahakoa ko tētahi o ngā wā whakamahara i roto i te pikitia, kāore pea i puta. Ka kī a Tēnā Cainan: "Ko te nuinga o te pakanga i te pō. Tata tonu ki waenganui pō ka mutu. "I tīmata nga hōia ki te 24,000 nga whakatata oti. Tae noa ki waenganui pō ka heke rātau ki tētahi pouaka 600 porowhita me ngā whakatata katoa i mahue i roto i a rātau pēke. I waenganui pō, ka tūmanako katoa rātau kia mate. "Engari i waenganui pō kua pūhia e nga Zulus ta rātau poro. I tīmata te pakanga i te 4.30pm, a, he tino taumaha nga tūpāpaku i a rātau. "Te āhua nei kāore i iti haere te ahi o Ingarangi. E 15 maero te oma o nga Zulus kia tae atu ki reira, a, ka kauhoe i te awa i roto i te waipuke, ā, he tino pakeke rātau - i roto i te ope taua uThulwana ko te tau toharite ko te 50. "He toa nui nga Zulus, engari ahakoa he tepe to rātau. Tae noa ki waenganui pō ka whakaaro rātau 'koia tēnā, kua oti'. "Mehemea i whakamātauria e rātau tētahi atu whakaekenga, tērā pea ka tutuki i a rātau. Kaore te pikitia e tuku i tēnā." Heoi anō, kua mahia e Zulu ngā mea whakamīharo mo te pūmahara o te whawhai, e kī ana a Tēnā Kaina, ahakoa kua whakapouritia hoki te pono i muri i tētahi pakanga e whakahonoretia tonutia ana e ngā uri i ngā taha e rua. Ka kī a ia: "He takirua. Ki te kore te pikitia, kāore mātau e hiahia ki te Pakanga o Aotearoa, "E kore ngā mētara i tukuna e whai painga ki te moni ināianei." Ko ngā Rīpeka Wikitōria matua e rua, i whakawhiwhia ki a Rutene John Chard [i tākarotia e Baker] me Rutene Gonville Bromhead [i tākarotia e Michael Caine] tērā pea e whā ngā wā e nui ake ana i ētahi atu VC, ka kī a ia. "Engari nā te mea he pikitia tino pai tēnei, he tokomaha ngā tāngata e whakamahi ana hei pakipūmeka. " Ina tīmata koe ki te kī 'ehara tēnā i te tika' ka tīmata ngā tukemata ki te whakarewa, ā, ka kī te tangata 'engari kua kite ahau i te pikitia!'." Ko te raina "Zulus - mano 'em" e kōrerotia ana i roto i te pikitia e Haihana Tae Bourne [i tākarotia e Nigel Green]. He pakeke a Kākāriki, engari e 24 noa iho a Bourne. Ko ia tētahi o ngā haihana tae pōtiki i roto i te Ope Taua o Ingarangi. A, ko te raina o tana - ko te iwi e hē ana - i kī tonu ia? Ko wai ka mōhio? Ka noho a Bill Cainan hei kaikōrero i te Zulus! Te Rā Kaikōrero Rongonui o te Pakanga o Anglo-Zulu i te Whare Taonga o te Ope Taua o te Motu i Rānana i te Rāhoroi 25 o Hui tanguru.

title: Rūpahu Tiaki Hauora o Sussex: Ka tūhura ngā pirihimana i te matenga 13
summary: Kua piki te maha o ngā mate e tūhuratia ana i roto i tētahi rūpahu pirihimana ki roto i ngā kāinga tiaki e iwa ki te 13, kua puta.
text: I te tīmatanga o te rūpahu ki ngā kāinga Tiaki Hauora o Sussex i Aotearoa nei, e uiui ana ngā āpiha i te kore tiaki i ngā tangata e 43, e 12 o rātou kua mate. Ināianei kua whakaaturia e ngā Pirihimana o Sussex tētahi tangata tua13 i mate i Whiringahora. Kāore anō kia whakaaturia te kāinga tiaki e pā ana. I roto i tētahi whanaketanga motuhake, kua uiuia tētahi wahine, e 39 tau te pakeke, mo te patu tangata nui. I kī ngā pirihimana kāore he hononga o tana uiuinga ki te matenga i Whiringahora. I kī ngā āpiha he uiuinga tūturu i raro i te whakatūpato. I roto i tētahi kōrero, ka kī a Sussex Health Care: "Ka mahi tahi tonu mātou me ngā pirihimana i roto i ta rātau tūhuratanga. " E kore e tika kia kōrero anō mātou i tēnei wāhanga."

title: Te pakanga ā-ture o Detroit mo te petihana pokapū
summary: Kua whakahaua e tētahi kaiwhakawā i te āhua o Te Kāwanatanga o Amerika te taone nui o Te Taone kia unuhia tana tono mō te pokapū i runga i ōna nama e $18bn (£12bn).
text: I kī te Kaiwhakawā o Rosemarie Aquilina i te petihana, i whakaputaina i te Rāitema, i tūkino i ngā ture me te kaupapa ture o te kāwanatanga nā te mea i whakawehi i ngā painga penihana. Engari i wawe tonu te tono a te rōia o te kāwanatanga ki te whakahau. I mua ake, ka kī a Kāwana Rick Snyder ka whakahokia e te neke ki te pokapū te nuinga o nga tau o te pirau. Mā te pokapū e āhei ai te kaiwhakahaere ohorere o te kāwanatanga o Tūroro, a Kevyn Orr, ki te whakakore i ngā rawa o te taone kia ngana ki te whakatutuki i ngā tono a ngā kaituku moni me ngā kaitiaki. I tonoa e Tēnā Orr he mahi i te wā o June e whakaae ai ngā kaituku moni ki te 10 hēneti mō ia tāra i namatia ai rātau. Engari e rua ngā moni penihana e tohu ana i ngā kaimahi o te taone kua ātete i te mahere pokapū, ā, - me te tekau mano o ngā kaituku moni - kei te anga kē atu te taone ki te maha o ngā whakawāteatanga. I tana whakahaere i te Paraire, ka taha te Kaiwhakawā Arawhiti o Rosemarie Aquilina ki nga kaiwhakapae penihana. I whakataua e ia ko te ture 2012 e whakaae ana kia kōnaetia te pokapū, nā te mea i taea ai e te kāwana o te kāwanatanga te whakararuraru i ngā painga penihana a ngā kaimahi tūmatanui. Engari i mārama tonu he aha te pānga o te whakahaere ki nga whakahaere. E kī ana a Jonny Dymond o TE HAU, i Tōroa, ko te wāhanga tuatahi noa iho i roto i tētahi pūnaha ture apa-maha, engari ka pātaitia te mahere whakaora matatini mō te taone raruraru. I muri tata iho, ka kī te Rōia Matua o Michigan Bill Schuette kua tono ia ki ngā whakahaere a te Kaiwhakawā Aquilina mō Kāwana Snyder. Ko te 'tino pakaru' ko Detroit te taone nui rawa atu o Amerika ki te kōnae mo te pokapū. I te tau 2012, e toru ngā tāone iti iho o California - Stockton, Mammoth Lakes me San Bernardino - i mahi i te hipanga. He maha nga tau e raruraru ana ki ngā nama tōrino - kua tata te tiango o ngā ratonga tūmatanui, ā, tata ki te 70,000 ngā āhuatanga e takoto ana. E mōhiotia ana ko Motor City mō tōna umanga motokā i mua, ka mutu ngā utunga nama ki ngā kaituku moni kāore i haumaru i tērā marama kia whakahaere tonu ai te taone. Tata ki te $9bn o te nama o Tūroro e nama ana ki ngā moni penihana me ngā painga rongoā o ngā kaimahi 10,000 o te taone me ngā kaimahi 20,000 o te taone. I mua o te Paraire, ka kī a Gov Snyder kua whakaputaina e te taone te pokapū nā te mea kua "pakaru". "Ko mātau te āhua o te whanaketanga mai i Michigan, engari kia tino nui, e hiahiatia ana e mātou a Detroit i runga i te ara kia noho anō hei taone nui," tana kī atu ki te hui rongokōrero o te Paraire. "Ināianei ko te wā hei whakamutu i te 60 tau o te whakapeka," tana tāpiri mai. "Ka puta mai mātou me tētahi Tūroro kaha ake, pai ake me tētahi hōputu hei whakatipu i tēnei taone. Ehara i te mea ko ngā tangata o tēnei taone anake, engari ko te kāwanatanga e tika ana."

title: Ngā wāhanga o tētahi whakamātautau karihi i raro i te whenua
summary: I te nuinga o te wā ka whakamātauria ngā pūrere karihi ki raro hei ārai i ngā rawa iraruke e tukua ana i roto i te pahūtanga ki te mata me te whakapoke i te taiao.
text: Mā tēnei aratuka hoki e whakarite he waeine huna. Ko te putanga o te pūwhitiwhiti mai i tētahi pahūtanga karihi o raro - he pānga e mōhiotia ana ko te "whakaputa" - ka hoatu he tohu ki te hanganga hangarau me te rahi o te pūrere o tētahi whenua, nō reira ko tōna āheinga karihi. Whakaritenga Ka āta tirohia te pae whakamātautau kia tika ai. Ko te nuinga o te wā ka puta aua whakamātautau i tawhiti atu i nga pūtahi iwi whānui. Ka purua te pūrere karihi ki roto i tētahi rua wiri, kauhanga rānei i waenganui i te 200-800m (650-2,600ft) i raro iho i te mata, me ētahi mita te whānui. Ka whakahekea tētahi ipu raina ārahi e pupuri ana i ngā taputapu aroturuki ki roto i te poka i runga ake i te ruma. Kātahi ka purua te rua ki te kirikiri, te kirikiri, te gypsum me ētahi atu rawa pai hei pupuri i te pahūtanga me te hinganga i raro i te whenua. Ko te whakamātautau Ka whakapakūtia mamaotia te pūrere mai i tētahi poka mana mata. Ka whakaeto te pahūtanga karihi i te toka i raro i te whenua, e waihanga ana i tētahi ruma i raro i te korohū iraruke tino wera. I te whakamātaotanga o tēnei, ka kohikohi he hōpua toka whakarewa i raro o te ruma. I muri i ngā Meneti, i ngā haora rānei i muri i te pahūtanga, i te takanga o te pēhanga, ka ngahoro te ruma ki runga i a ia anō ka puta mai he māra ki runga i te mata. I rēhitatia ngā ngaru rū whakamātautau a Kōria ki te Raki e ōrite ana ki tētahi rū nui e 5.1 i te taha o te pae karihi o Punggye-ri i tētahi wāhi mamao i te rāwhiti o te whenua, e pārekareka ana i ngā tāone taitapa o Hainamana. I ngā haora i muri iho, ka pānuitia e te pāpāho kāwanatanga te whakamātautau tuatahi "i tutuki pai te mahi" i runga i te pōma hauwai. Kua whakapuakina e ngā tohunga karihi ētahi pōhēhētanga, e kī ana ka tūmanako rātau kia nui ake te pahū mai i tētahi pomu H, engari tērā pea he wiki i mua i te manatoko, te ākiri rānei i te kerēme e ngā whakamātautau takitahi. Ko te whakamātautau karihi tuawhā tēnei i mahia i Punggye-ri - i mahia ngā mea o mua i te tau 2006, 2009 me te 2013.

title: Ko te haerenga o Harry Potter hei whakatuwhera i ngā studios o Leavesden i te tau 2012
summary: Ko ngā taipitopito o tētahi haerenga hou a Harry Potter i Hertfordshire kua whakaaturia e te studio o Karaihe o Te Wānanga o Aotearoa.
text: Ka whakatuwheratia te tātaritanga, i ngā studios Leavesden tata ki Watford i hangaia ai ngā kiriata Harry Potter, i te kōanga o te tau 2012. Ka whakaaturia e te haereere e toru haora ngā huinga taketake, ngā kākahu, ngā taonga me ngā rākeitanga e whakamahia ana i roto i ngā whitiāhua e waru. I waenganui i ngā whakaaturanga ko te huinga mō te Hōro Nui i te Kura o Hogwarts me te tari tumuaki o Dumbledore. Kua tautuhia a Warner Brothers Studios i Leavesden, e noho ana i te haereere, hei tētahi o ngā pūkenga whakanao studio nui rawa i Uropi ina whakatuwheratia a tērā tau. E kī ana a Josh Berger, te upoko o Mārō Brothers UK, he taiwhanga hira tēnei mō te kamupene, ā, ka nui ake i tō rātou rota i Burbank, California. "I muri i tana mahi i Leavesden mō ngā tau e 10 kua hipa atu me te mōhio ki ā mātou mahere ā muri ake, ka mōhio ki te mahi ināianei," tana kī. "I rite ngā kaihoko ki te hoko ināianei, kua rite mātou ki te hoko, ā, he pai noa iho te mahi." Ka whakatuwheratia te kiriata Harry Potter tuawaru me te whakamutunga i roto i ngā whare pikitia i a Hōngongoi 2011.

title: Ko nga kaimahi ahi i Essex e tuki ana
summary: Kua pōti ngā kaimahi ahi i Essex mō te mahi taraiwa i roto i tētahi tautohetohe mō ngā māharahara mō ngā tapahi.
text: E kī ana te Kotahitanga o ngā Rōpū Ahi (FBU) i Essex i ngā mahere o nāianei mō te tapahi ka ngaro tētahi i roto i ngā kaimahi raina tuatahi e rima i Essex mai i te tau 2008. Engari i kī te manukura o te Mana Ahi o Essex, a Anthony Hedley, kua korerotia ki nga kaipatu ahi he haumaru a rātau mahi. I kī a ia kua oati te mana kia tuwhera tonu ngā teihana ahi katoa me te pupuri i ōna mīhini ahi katoa. I kī te FBU i pōti ngā mema uniana kia rua ki te kotahi e manakohia ana e te mahi taraiwa. 'Wā hei whakarite' i kī a Mick Toroa, te hēkeretari o te rōpū FFU: "Kua whakaaturia e ngā kaimahi ahi o Essex te kaha o te ātete ki ngā tapahi raina o mua me ngā huringa e whakahaua ana me te kore whakaaetanga. " Tērā tētahi matapihi wātea ki te whakarite me te tae ki tētahi whakaaetanga e whakaaetia ana e ngā taha e rua i roto i tēnei tautohetohe mēnā e hiahia ana ngā kaikaunihera kia puta tērā. "Kāore tētahi tangata i roto i te ratonga ahi e hiahia ana ki te mahi tuki, ā, kāore he tangata e hari mēnā ka whakahaua mātou kia pērā. " He tino nui te oho o te mana ahi ināianei, ā, ka hono mai ki a mātau i roto i ngā nekehanga tūturu ki te whakatika i tēnei tautohetohe." I kī a Tēnā Hedley i tino pouri a ia i te pōti a nga kaipatu ahi o Essex ki te tuki. "Ko te 2012 tēnei ehara i ngā tau kotahi mano e waru tekau mā rua, ā, i ngā āhuatanga katoa o te oranga e anga ana te tangata ki te huringa me te rangirua pūtea kāore anō kia mōhiotia," tana kī. "Kāore ā mātou moni tōraro, ā, me whakahōu mātou i ngā mahi mahi tawhito me te whakarite kei te whakamahi mātou i ā mātou rauemi i utua e ngā kaiutu tāke kaunihera i Essex i runga i te huarahi tino māia, pai hoki. " Me mahi tahi te FBU me mātau mo tēnā."

title: Ka hinga te pauna i muri i te ngoikore ohorere o ngā raraunga whakanao
summary: Kua pā te pauna ki te toru tau i muri i te hinganga ohorere o te whakanaotanga o UK i Me.
text: I kirimana e te 0.8%, te tere tere mai i Hānuere, e whakaatu ana ngā whika whaimana. Ko te nuinga o nga kaitirotiro i matapae he pikinga. E tautohe ana ngā whika ki ngā raraunga i whakaputaina inā noa nei kua tohu i te pikinga o te āhua o te whakahaerenga. Ko te hua, i tino heke te pauna ki te tāra, e tata ana ki te 1% ki te $1.4814. Koia tērā te taumata iti rawa mai i Pipiri 2010. E tūmanako ana te tupu i ngā tau whakanao hōu rawa ki tētahi uiuinga o te wāhanga i whakaputaina i tērā wiki, e whakaatu ana i whakapūketetia tōna tupunga tino pai mō te tata ki te rua tau i June. Ko ētahi atu rangahau i whakaputaina i tērā wiki i tohu ki te kaha haere tonu i te wāhanga ratonga, me te pikinga o te maia puta noa i ngā umanga UK. Kua whakaarohia e te National Institute of Economic and Social Research (NIESR) ko te tipu kaha e kitea ana i te wāhanga ratonga, ko te tikanga o te āhua o te UK i te 0.6% i te hauwhā tuarua o te tau. Ka whakataurite tērā ki te 0.3% te tipu i roto i ngā marama tuatahi e toru o te tau. E kī ana a NIESR, ahakoa kua mutu pea te whakahekenga, ka haere tonu te wā o te pouri, e tautuhia ana hei wā e whakahekea ana te huaputa i raro iho i tōna taumata o mua. Kāore te whare wānanga e tūmanako kia puta te huaputa i te taumata i whakapūketetia i te tōmua o te tau 2008 tae noa ki te tau 2015. Āwhina 'ngoikore' e kōrero ana mō ngā whika whakanao hou o te Office for National Statistics (ONS), a Lee Hopley. o te rōpū kaiwhakanao EEF, i kī: "Kāore i rawaka ngā whiwhinga huaputa i roto i ngā taputapu hiko me ngā wāhanga kawenga hei whakawātea i ngā whakahekenga nui ake i roto i ngā rongoā me ngā konganuku. " Heoi anō, i kite mātau i ētahi tupunga o ngā kawenga ake me ngā tohu o te whakamatuatanga i Uropi e whakarato ana i tētahi hiki iti mō ngā hokonga o rāwāhi. "Ahakoa e huatau ana ngā raraunga ONS i te koha o te umanga ki te tupu i te koata tuarua, he tohu kei te hoki mai te maia, ā, me tīmata anō te tupu i a tātau e neke ana ki te hawhe tuarua o te tau." Kāore i rerekē te mehua whānui ake o te huaputa mahi. I kī a Rawiri Tinsley mai i TE Paribas: "Ko te katoa, ehara tēnei i te huinga raraunga kaha. " Kei te ngoikore tonu te āwhina i muri i te whakanaotanga, e whakararuraru ana, e hiahiatia ana e te whakahaerenga kia nui ake te mahi ki te whakataurite anō ki ngā wāhanga e tūmanako ana kia kitea te tono mō ōna kawenga ake." I whakaaturia e ngā whika motuhake kua whakawhānuitia te tāupenga hokohoko i Me - ka tāpiri hoki ki te āwangawanga o nga kaihoko. I kī te ONS i tipu te tāpaetanga o UK ki te £8.491bn i Me mai i te £8.430bn i Aperira. "He iti noa iho te tāpaetanga o te hokohoko, engari i whakahōutia te whika o Aperira, e peita ana i tētahi pikitia whāranu. Ko te māharahara, i hinga te rōrahi o ngā kawenga ake i ngā taonga i te nui o ngā kawemai," te kī a David Kern, te rangatira o te ohanga i ngā Ruma Tauhokohoko o Ingarangi. "Ko te nuinga o te wā, he nui rawa tā mātou tāupenga hokohoko, ā, kāore mātou i te tere te haere whakamua ki te whakataurite anō i to mātau whakahaerenga ki ngā kawenga ake o te kupenga," tana tāpiri mai.

title: Kei te Taunga Rererangi o Kānata te 'kaha o te rere tawhiti'
summary: Kua tukuna ngā mahere hei kawe mai i ngā ratonga tawhiti mai i te Taunga Rererangi o Kānata ki tētahi kōmihana e titiro ana ki te kaha o te hau i te UK.
text: Kei roto i ngā tono Waharoa ki te Uru ko te whakamahi pai ake i te kaha tohunga i Kānata hei whakaiti i te paheketanga i ngā taunga rererangi i te tonga ki te rāwhiti o Ingarangi. E tono ana kia whakahekea te mahi pāhihi hau mō ngā rerenga mai i Weera. Kua kite te taunga rererangi a te kāwanatanga o Welsh i ngā tau pāhihi e taka ana ki raro noa iho i te kotahi miriona ki Mati 2013. I te tau 2007, e rua miriona nga tau pāhihi i te tau 2007. Kua anga atu hoki te taunga rererangi ki te whakataetae mai i tōna hoa noho angitu ake, i te Taunga Rererangi o Bristol. Ko ngā tono hou i tukuna e tētahi rōpū mātauranga me ngā tāngata pakihi i puta mai i te hui kotahi rā i te taone. E kī ana te rōpū he mahi tā ngā taunga rererangi ā-rohe ki te whakaiti i te pēhanga i Heathrow me ērā atu taunga rererangi nui ake - me te whakahere nui ake i a Pirihitini e noho tata ana. Ko te whakahekenga i ngā taumata o te mahi pāhihi hau i ngā taunga rererangi ā-rohe kāore i te whakamahia, pērā i a Kānata, ko te huarahi ki te mahi i tēnei, e kī ana a Western Gateway. E whakaaro ana ka taea e ngā pūkenga tīariari o Te Taunga Rererangi o Kānata te whakahaere i ngā pāhihi e toru miriona i te tau. E kī ana te pūrongo a te rōpū e tūmanako ana kia pai ake ngā tūhononga o te taunga rererangi i te wā me ngā kaupapa rerewhenua tere tiketike e mau mai ana i ētahi atu o te UK i roto i te wā haere e rua haora, tae atu ki te waenganui o Rāwāhi. E kī ana ka whai painga a Kānata i whakaritea ki te Taunga Rererangi o Bristol - he waka rererangi roa ake me te mahi 24 haora - tērā pea ka uru atu ki ngā tāngata 4.5m i roto i te wā haere 90 meneti. I kī a Mātini Evans, o te Whare Wānanga o Te Whare Wānanga o South Wales: "He tino pai te whakanoho i a Kānata me ōna hanganga. He waka rererangi tōna e tika ana mō ngā rerenga tawhiti, e mahi ana mō te 24 hāora o te rā, ā, he torutoru noa iho ngā tāngata e noho ana i te rohe paetata e pāngia ana e te turituri rererangi. "Kei te whakaaro mātou ko te whakautu ki te kukume mā te Taunga Rererangi o Kānata mō te tawhiti roa, ko te tautuhi i aua mokatere o te mahi pāhihi hau ki raro iho, ki te kore rānei. " Mā tēnei e tino ātaahua ai te Taunga Rererangi o Kānata ki ngā waka rererangi me ngā pāhihi, engari me tuku aua mana ki te kāwanatanga o Welsh mēnā e hiahia ana kia rerekētia." Kua hoatu nga tono ki te Komihana a Tērā, kua whakatūria kia titiro he aha te kaha o te hau ā muri ake e hiahiatia ana i te UK. 'Tūranga nui' I te hui i te Mane, i kī te Minita Tuatahi o Carwyn Jones ko te taunga rererangi "he mahi nui" i roto i te whakahaerenga o Wales. Ka kī a ia: "Ahakoa e mōhio ana mātou ki ētahi o ngā hē o te taunga rererangi, e mōhio ana hoki mātou ki ōna kaha maha me tōna kaha, otirā tōna kaha ki te mahi i ētahi atu kaha e tuku ana i tētahi utu iti iho me te whiringa tuku ki te hanga i ngā taunga rererangi hōu, i ētahi atu waka rererangi rānei i ngā taunga rererangi tīariari kē." Ko te taunga rererangi, i hokona mai i ōna rangatira Pāniora o mua mō te £52m i Poutāpeta, kei te haere kē ki tētahi kanohi £500,000 hei whakatoko i te ahurea me te tuku iho o Welsh. Engari ko ngā whika pāhihi hou i whakaputaina i Aperira i whakaaturia ai he 15% te hinganga mō te tau ki Poutāpeta - e tohu ana ki raro noa iho i te kotahi miriona.

title: Ka mutu te 'whakawhirinaki' a Google i te kaiwhakarite kupenga Hainamana i muri i te hipanga
summary: Kua puta tētahi kaiwhakarite ipurangi Hainamana ki a Google mō te kore e whakaae ki ōna tiwhikete haumarutanga.
text: I te wā e tirotiro ana i te ipurangi, ka hoahoatia ngā tiwhikete kia haumaru ai te whakawhitiwhitinga i waenga i te rorohiko me te tūmau tukutuku. I kī a Google kua kore e whakaae ki ngā tiwhikete i tukuna e te Pokapū Mōhiohio Whatunga Ipurangi o Haina (CNNIC) i muri i tētahi hipanga haumarutanga. I kī te CNNIC he "kore whakaaetia, kāore i te mōhiotia". Ko te CNNIC te kawenga mō te whakarato tiwhikete mō ngā paetukutuku me ngā ingoa rohe .cn, tae atu ki ngā rohe reo Hainamana - tae atu ki ngā pēke me ngā pae kāwanatanga. Ko te tikanga ka kite ngā kaiwhakamahi o te pūtirotiro Chrome a Google i tētahi pānui whakatūpato ina ngana ki te uru ki ngā pae whai tiwhikete CNNIC. Ka kīia kāore pea te paetukutuku e ngana ana te kaiwhakamahi ki te uru atu. I kitea e Google mōrearea i tērā marama kua tukuna ngā tiwhikete haumarutanga kore mana ki ētahi o ōna ake rohe. I muri i tētahi tūhuratanga, i whakahaeretia mā te āwhina a te CNNIC, ka mārama tērā tētahi raruraru ki MCS Holdings, he umanga ā-Kairo i kirimana e te CNNIC hei whakarato tiwhikete. I kī a Google he mōrearea ngā rohe me ngā tiwhikete haumarutanga i tukuna e MCS Holdings ki ngā whakaekenga tangata-i-te-waenganui - he tikanga kōpeke e pā ana ki te haukoti i ngā whakawhitiwhitinga i waenganui, hei tauira, te rorohiko a te tangata me tētahi tūmau tukutuku. Kua kī a MCS Holdings he aituā te raruraru, ā, nā te hapa tangata. Ahakoa i pōhiritia e Google te āwhina a te CNIC ki te tūhuratanga, e kī ana kua "tautapatia e te kaiwhakarite tō rātou mana nui ki tētahi rōpū kāore i te tika ki te pupuri". Ko te hua, kua whakatau a Google kia kaua e whakawhirinaki ki ngā rohe me ngā tiwhikete i tukuna e, mō te CNNIC rānei. Ka whakaaturia ki ngā kaiwhakamahi tētahi mata whakatūpato i mua i te pātaitanga mēnā e hiahia ana rātou ki te haere tonu ki te pae "haumarukore". Heoi anō, tērā ētahi okotahi. Kua tukuna e Google he wā aroha noa ki ētahi pae nui kua whakaaetia e CNIC - pēnei i ngā pēke - kia whiwhi tiwhikete ai rātou mai i tētahi mana tuku kē. I kī te matua rapu i pōhiritia te CNNIC ki te hoatu anō mō te tūnga whirinaki "ina whakaritea ngā mana hangarau, ā-hātepe hoki". Engari i roto i tētahi kōrero i tukuna i te Rāitema, ka whakapuakina e te kaiwhakarite te riri, e kī ana: "Ko te whakataunga i mahia e Google e kore e whakaaetia, e kore e mōhiotia. " E tohe pono ana a CNNIC kia āta whakaarohia e Google ngā mana me ngā painga o ngā kaiwhakamahi."

title: Ko Michael Jackson te tino kaiwhiwhi rongonui tūpāpaku
summary: Kua tae mai a Michael Jackson ki runga i te rārangi pukapuka ā-tau o te pukapuka o Te Wānanga o ngā rangatira tūpāpaku.
text: I whiwhi te Kīngi o Pop i te $275m (£173m) i tērā tau, e ai ki te Wānanga - neke atu i tētahi atu tangata rongonui, kua mate, ora rānei, hāunga a Oprah Winfrey. "Ko te wāhi o Jackson i runga i tā mātou rārangi rangatira tūpāpaku tino whiwhinga, kaua e ohorere i te hua whakahōu," te kī a te kaituhi o Te Wānanga, o Lacey Rose. I haere tuarua mai a Elvis Presley, e mahi ana i te $60m (£38m), whai muri i a JRR Tolkien. Na te pānga o te kaituhi o te Ariki o nga Mowhiti i hanga te $50m (£32m), te kī a Te Wānanga. Ko te kaiwhakaahua pīnati a Charles Schulz i rakuraku i te $33m (£21m), i te wā o mua o Beatle John Lennon te tuarima i runga i te rārangi, e whiwhi ana i te $17m (£11m). Neke atu i te 12 ngā tāngata tūpāpaku i whakakotahitia, i whakaarohia e Te Wānanga. Ko ngā hokonga pukaemi me te purei reo irirangi a Jackson e $50m, i te wā e $50m te wāriu o tētahi kēmu ataata, ngā whakamaharatanga me tētahi autobiography i whakaputaina anōtia, i whakaarohia e te pukapuka. I utua tōna pānga e $60m mō This Is It, he pikitia o ngā whakaharatau mō ana konohete whanaketanga kino i te papa tākaro O2 i Rāwāhi. Kua tūtuki hoki tōna pānga ki te tuku pūoro kāore anō kia rangona i mua, tae atu ki ngā taonga, ngā taonga tākaro me ētahi atu hua. I whakaarohia ngā nama a Jackson i te $500m (£315m) i tōna matenga i te 50 o ona tau i June 2009. I kī a Ms Rose: "Ngā mihi ki tētahi putumōhio whai hua, he pikitia me ngā hokonga pukaemi, he nui ake te whiwhinga o te kīngi tōmuri o te pahū i tērā tau i a Lady Gaga, i a Madonna me Piki-Z, i whakakotahitia."

title: I muri i te hūnga o te puia, ka mate tētahi i te taunga reti o Tiapanī
summary: Kua patua tētahi hōia Tiapanī i roto i tētahi horonga i waenganui o Tiapanī, tērā pea i whakaohotia e te hūnga puia.
text: Neke atu i te 11 ngā tāngata kua whara, he tokomaha o rātau i tino nui. Na te hūnga i tukuna he toka e marangai ana i runga i te wāhi kiromita whānui tata ki Kusatsu i waenganui o Tiapanī, e kī ana te pāpāho paetata. I hū a Maunga Kusatsu-Shirane, 150km (93 km) ki te raki o Tokyo, i te Tūtira, engari kei te uiui tonu ngā mana mēnā nā reira i puta ai te horonga. Te āhua nei kua pupuhi ngā atahanga o te puia i tētahi kōhao i tōna taha, i te wā e whakaatu ana te whakaata ataata i tētahi kapua nui o te pungarehu pango me te toka e makaia ana ki raro i te maunga. Kua whakatūpato te Pokapū Tirorangi o Tiapanī i te iwi kia kaua e piki i te maunga, e kī ana kāore e taea te whakahaere i ētahi atu hūnga. E ai ki te kaipānui kāwanatanga NHK, kua kitea ētahi o ngā otaota puia, neke atu i te 1km (0.6 km) mai i te maunga. He tokomaha nga tāngata i whara i pā ki nga toka hinga. I kī atu tētahi kaikite i te taunga retihuka ki a NHK: "Tērā tēnei pūkaha nui, ā, ka ara ake he paowa pango tino pango. Kaore rawa ahau i mōhio he aha i tūpono." I whakaahuatia e tētahi atu kaititiro te kitenga i "te paowa pango i te tihi o te maunga". "I kiia mātau kia whakanuku i roto i te 30 meneti i muri iho," te kī a te kaihīrere. I waenganui i te hunga i whara, tokowhā nga tāngata e eke ana i te gondola taura i taua wā. I whakaaturia e ngā atahanga kua pakaru ngā matapihi o te gondola. Neke atu i te 78 ngā kaihīrere i mau tonu i tētahi whare okiokinga i runga i te maunga i te ahiahi o te Tūrei, e ai ki tētahi mana o te taone o te rohe. Ko te tangata i mate ko tētahi o ngā mema tokoono o te hōia e whai wāhi ana ki tētahi mahi i taua rohe, e kī ana te Minita Whakangungu Itsunori Onodera. I whakaorangia ērā atu tokorima, engari i whara ētahi o rātau, ka kī a ia. Kua whakatūpato te Kōwhiringa Whakahaere Ahi me te Mōrearea ka marangai tonu ngā toka ki te 2km mai i te tihi. Ko Tiapanī tētahi o ngā iwi tino hohe o te ao, ā, e āta tirotiro ana i ōna puia. I te wā o Mahuru 2014, e 63 ngā tāngata i mate i te hūnga ohorere o Maunga Ontake.

title: Tirohanga: He Pārihia ahau - engari no hea ahau?
summary: Te āhua nei kei te whakaū te tono a Pārihia mō ngā mema katoa o ngā Iwi o te Hononga o te Ao, e whakaata ana te kaitito Pārihia o Mourid Barghouti ki ngā painga tino māia ka mauria mai e te kāwanatanga.
text: Mō ngā tau, kua whakamaharatia ahau e te tīma Facebook me whakatika e au taku kōtaha me te tāpiri i te whenua i haere mai ai ahau. Ko te take, i āta waiho tēnei e au nā tōku whakaaro tūkino kei ngā wāhi katoa, ki te katoa hoki ngā kaituhituhi. I te whāngaitanga o taua pouaka kōrero, kātahi anō ka whakarongo ahau, ka pāwhiri i te pātene "whakatika" hei tuhi i "Pirihitia". Aue, ehara i te mea ngāwari ki taku i whakaaro ai. Kāore au e whakaaetia ki te patopato, me tīpako au mai i tētahi rārangi whenua kua whakaritea kētia ā-reta. I raro i te reta "P" i roto i taua rārangi i kitea e au ēnei e whai ake nei: Pirihitia Texas-USA, Palestine Arkansas-USA, Palestine Illinois-USA, Palestine Alabama-USA, East Palestine Ohio-USA, New Palestine, Indiana-USA, and Palestine Ecuador. Kei hea te Pirihitia taketake? Ko te mea tawhito i whānau ai ahau i te 67 tau ki muri? Kāore i tīariari. He maha ngā wā i haere ai ahau i te rārangi, ā, i kitea e au te "Iharaira" i raro i te pū "I". E whā tau tōku pakeke ake i te āhua o Iharaira. Kaore he kāwanatanga o Iharaira i te tau 1944. I pā mai taua mea i te wā i whakakīa e au he tono visa kia haere ki Amerika. Anō, kāore he Pirihitia i roto i tā rātou rārangi i tukuna. I roto i ngā nūpepa, i ngā kōrero tōrangapū, ahakoa i roto i ngā whakaritenga rangimārie mōrihariha (nāna i homai ki a mātau te tukanga engari ehara i te rangimārie) ka kitea e koe ngā tohutoro ki ngā Rohe, ngā Rohe Nohoia, Huria me Hamaria, te Whenua Tapu me te Pēke Uru. Te Pēke Hauauru o te aha? O te Awa o Horano. Engari ko te taha ki te hauauru o te Awa o Horano te taha rāwhiti o Pirihitia - nā reira he aha e kore ai e whakaingoatia? Ko te waipiro uruwhenua kia ngaro ai a Pirihitia hei whenua, me ngaro hoki hei kupu. Mēnā ko te uru o te whenua e kiia ana ināianei ko "Iharaira" me te rāwhiti e kiia ana ko "te Pēke Uru", kei hea a Pirihitia? I ia wā e rongo ana ahau i te kupu "Pēke Uru", ka whakaaro ahau ki te pokenga o te reo i ahu mai ki te kōhurutanga o te kupu "Pirihitia". I kitea tēnei e te kaitito Hainamana o Bei Dao i tana haerenga ki te Rūnanga o Iharaira i San Francisco ki te tiki visa. Ka kī atu ia ki te taitama e tū ana i mua i te whare e hiahia ana ia ki te haere ki Pirihitia, a, ka whiwhi i te whakautu: "Kāore he whenua pērā i runga i te mahere, e tā!" I ētahi tau ki muri, i whakaputaina e te PEN International Magazine i runga i tōna uhi o mua - he hōnore tūturu - he oriori katoa nāku. Heoi anō, ehara i te tuhituhi ki te rārangi ihirangi "Mourid Barghouti-Palestine", ka tuhia e te pukapuka "Mourid Barghouti-Palestinian Authority". I taku pātai atu ki a rātau kia whakamārama, ka kī rātau kāore he whenua e kiia nei ko Pirihitia. Ko taku urupare, "He whenua te Mana Pārihia?" I te waenganui o ngā tau 1980, i haere ahau ki taku tuakana i Wīwī, e tata ana ki te rohe o Huiterangi. He raumati tērā, ā, kei a mātau ētahi atu mema o te whānau. I whakatau mātau ki te haere ki Hiniwa, e rua nga motokā. Ka puta atu te kaitiaki taitapa i tana wharau iti me te tono uruwhenua. I mīharo a ia - i ōna ringa he uruwhenua mai i te ao katoa, i Horano, i Hiria, i Te Hononga o Amerika, i Aratiria, i Ingarangi, tae atu ki Belize. A ko nga ingoa i roto i aua ingoa katoa e whakaatu ana ko o ratou kaipupuri no te hapu kotahi, ko nga Barghouti katoa. I tono a ia ki tētahi whakamāramatanga o tēnei waipiro o ngā tuhinga haere. Engari i muri noa iho i te tīmatanga o taku tuakana, ka tīmata a ia ki te kata, ka haukoti - "Kua nui tēnā. Kāore au e pīrangi ki te mārama!" E hiahia ana a ia kia pai te wā ki a mātau i Hiniwa. Ka haere tonu mātou, me te mau i te mīharo o te Wīwī i tō mātou āhuatanga. "E mōhio ana koe, e te katoa," te kī a tētahi o mātau, "he heitara tonu mātau." Ngā Hononga Ipurangi Pātahi Mourid Barghouti I kite ahau i a Ramallah

title: I tino whara te wahine hapū i te tūtukitanga o Te Rūnanga
summary: Kua tino whara tētahi wahine hapū nui i roto i te tūtukitanga tuki me te oma.
text: I te paihikara te tūkino i Aylestone Road, tata ki Park Hill Drive, i te 21:30 GMT i te Mane i te wā i patua ai ia e te waka. E puritia ana tētahi tangata 40 tau mai i Aotearoa, i runga i te whakapae i te whara nui i te taraiwa mōrearea me te taraiwa i raro i te mana o te waipiro. Ka noho tonu a ia i roto i te tiakitanga pirihimana. I kī a Det Sgt Paul Hawkins: "Kei te haere tonu mātou ki te whakarato tautoko ki te wahine i whara me tōna whānau i te wā e haere tonu ana te tūhuratanga." Whāia a BBC East Midlands i Facebook, Twitter, Instagram rānei. Tukua ō whakaaro pūrākau ki eastmidsnews@bbc.co.uk. Ngā Hononga Ipurangi Pātahi Pirihimana o Leicestershire

title: Ka whakahaua e te tūkino wahine a Kimi Fawcett te kura mo te 'kore e kite i ngā tohu'
summary: Ko tētahi wahine nāna tōna pāpā matua tūkino i hapu ai ia i a ia e taitamariki ana, e tono ana i tana kura o mua i runga i ngā kerēme kāore i kitea ngā tohu o te tūkinotanga.
text: I hereheretia te kaikino o Kimi Fawcett, a Robert Kiriuati McClelland, mo te ono tau i te tau 2004. I kī te rōia motika tangata a Ms Fawcett, e 30, i rahua te Kāreti o Ellesmere i Shropshire ki te "tiaki i ahau" me te whakarite kia mauria ki te Kōti Tiketike. Engari i kī te kāreti i kitea e tētahi arotakenga "kāore he mea hei tautoko i tana kerēme". Kua whakarerea e Ms Fawcett, e noho ana ināianei i Bristol, tōna mana ki te ingoamuna, ā, i kī tōna kura he "mōhiotanga mārama" ki ngā karere kuputuhi ā-waha i whiwhi ai ia i tōna pāpā, ā, i mōhio hoki ki te tūkinotanga i mahia e ia. "Kāore tētahi o ēnei āwangawanga i pūrongotia ki ngā ratonga pāpori," tana kī. "Mehemea i pūrongotia e te kāreti a McClelland ki ngā ratonga pāpori, kua mutu te tūkinotanga i June 2002, kaua ko June 2003." I taua tau, ka kī a Ms Fawcett i werohia a ia, i pāngia e McClelland - 14 noa iho te pakeke - nāna i kī atu ki a ia kia whakatahe. I tīmata a ia i ngā takahanga ture i muri i te pakarutanga i tērā tau, nāna i kī "tino tīmata ki te miharo ki hea ngā pakeke katoa i roto i tōku oranga". 'Tino riri' "Kua haere ahau i te whakapae i a au ki te huri i taua riri ki waho ki ngā tāngata e whakaaro ana ahau me āwhina ahau," tana kī. "I tino tika kia pai ake ahau. E tino riri ana ahau ki te kōtiro iti i a au." I te tuatahi ka tuhituhi a ia ki te kura i te tau 2017 e whakahuahua ana kerēme, engari i runga i tōna whakakāhoretanga i ana whakaaro kua whakanohoia te kēhi ki runga i tētahi waewae ture tika o te matua o te kāreti, a Brendan Wignall, i kī te kura i "whakaoho" i te tūkinotanga, engari "kāore i tino mōhio ki ngā mea i pā ki a ia". "E tino pouri ana mātou ki a ia e whakaaro ana ia i te kura i tuku i a ia," tana kī. "Engari... kāore e taea e mātou te kite i tētahi mea hei tautoko i tana kerēme, nō reira kāore he kōwhiringa engari ki te ātete."

title: Ka whakapāha ngā Pirihimana o Lincolnshire mō te pereti tau paruparu o te motokā tautiaki
summary: Kua whakapārewa nga pirihimana i muri i te whakaahuatanga o tētahi motokā kua tohua me tōna pereti tau i whakapouritia e te oneone.
text: Ka tūtohu a Stephen McGowan ki ngā Pirihimana o Lincolnshire e pātai ana mehemea ka taea te whakatū i tētahi atekōkiri mō te whai pereti tau kāore e taea te pānui nā te paru. I te kīanga a te tōpana ka taea e rātau, ka urupare a ia ki tētahi pikitia o te motokā tautiaki i whakatūria i tētahi Tesco i Skegness. I whakapōhēhē a Ch Insp Phil Vickers, e kī ana i whakaaturia e te whakaahua "i hinga mātau i raro iho i ngā paerewa i whakatakotoria e mātau mō mātau anō". I kī te āpiha tērā pea he "take oro" mo te motokā i taua āhuatanga, engari "he tauira kino ki te iwi whānui". I kī a Ch Insp Vickers he tokomaha nga āpiha kāore i whai wā ki te tū mo te wehenga i roto i a rātau nekeneke, e 12 haora pea te roa, ā, ka taupokina e te tōpana ngā wāhi tawhiti nui. I mahia tana whakapae i roto i tētahi urupare Twitter e waru pou ki a Tēnā McGowan i kī ai ia: "Kei te tino tika koe, kaua mātou e whakamahi i tētahi motokā me te pereti tau e whakapouritia ana e te oneone... "Kei runga a Pic i te whenua tūmataiti, engari he pai ki te whakapae i taraiwa ki te huarahi." I tāpiritia e Ch Insp Vickers: "Ka takina/horoia ngā motokā i te tīmatanga o te neke ki te kore e tae mai he waea kōhukihuki, ōrite ki te mutunga o ngā mahi (ā, i te wā o te haereere mēnā e hiahiatia ana, pērā i konei). Tēnā whakaae mai ki taku whakapāha mō tēnei hapa." I whakautua e Tēnā McGowan: "Ngā mihi mō te wā ki te urupare ki te Kaitirotiro Matua, kia pai te mutunga wiki."

title: Ko te ara Aurigny Guernsey-Gatwick 'e hiahia ana ki te rererangi hou'
summary: Me hoko e te waka rererangi o Aurigny tētahi atu waka rererangi kia noho ko ia anake te kaiwhakahaere i te ara o Guernsey-Gatwick.
text: I tēnei wā kei te titiro te waka rererangi o Amerika ki te hoko, ki te rīhi rānei i tētahi. Kua tonoa e te Tari Pūtea me ngā Rauemi o Guernsey te whakaaetanga ki ngā Kāwanatanga ki te whakaū i tētahi moni whakatārewa, rīhi rānei mō te waka rererangi. I pānuitia e Flybe, tērā atu kaikawe i runga i te ara, ka mutu te rere i te ara mai i te 29 o Mati 2014 i muri i tana whakaaetanga ki te hoko i ōna kāniwha Gatwick ki Easyjet. Ko te haumarutanga o ngā hononga i waenganui i te motu me Rānana tētahi o ngā take matua i muri i te hokonga a te Rōpū Aurigny i te tau 2003. I te mutunga o te tau 2012 kua whakaemi te kamupene rererangi i ngā hinganga o te £12.5m. I kī te Minita Pūtea me ngā Rauemi a Gavin St Pier: "Ko Aurigny kē te kaiārahi mākete i runga i te ara o Gatwick, e mau ana i raro noa iho i te 200,000 ngā pāhihi i tērā tau. " Heoi anō, ahakoa kei a ia ētahi kaha tohunga o nāianei, kāore he huarahi māmā hei whakanoho i ngā pāhihi e 146,000 i kawea e Flybe i te tau 2012 me te kore whakawhānui i ana ake ratonga. "E mōhio ana te tari me te waka rererangi ki te hiranga rautaki o te ara o Gatwick ki te motu. " He mea nui kia mau tonu tētahi ratonga pai e taea ai te whakatutuki i ngā tono o nāianei, ā, ka kite ngā pāhihi kei te tino ū mātou ki te whakarite koinei te take." I kii tetahi kaikorero o te whare taonga ko nga hononga hau he "take nui i roto i te angitu mo te wa roa" o nga ratonga putea me nga ratonga pakihi o te motu, e nui ake ana i te 50% o nga hua nui o te motu. I kī a ia ko te wāhanga tāpoi tāpoi "e tino whakamauru ana ki ngā hononga hau ki Rānana, ā, ko te angitu o te tāpoi tāpoi e hiahiatia ana kia ora ai ngā hononga hau e whakawhirinaki ana ki te umanga". Ko ngā kōwhiringa hei whakawhānui i ngā ratonga a Aurigny ko te whakaurunga o ngā rererangi rererangi nui ake i runga i ngā hōtaka tīariari, te mahinga rānei o ngā turboprops iti ake i te nui ake o ngā auautanga, i te pahekotanga rānei o ngā mea e rua. E hiahiatia ana e ēnei kōwhiringa katoa te hokonga o ngā rererangi hou. Ahakoa e tūhura ana te waka rererangi i ngā kōwhiringa, kua tonoa e te tari ki ngā Kāwanatanga he whakaaetanga ki te whakaū i ngā moni, rīhi rānei ka tangohia e Aurigny, hei whakarato moni rānei ki te kamupene. I kī tētahi kaikōrero mā tēnei e āhei ai te waka rererangi ki te neke tere ki te tiki i ētahi waka rererangi, ā, kotahi tau pea ka tukua ki te whakawhirinaki mēnā kei roto he rererangi hōu, he rererangi rānei, ā, mēnā ka hokona hāngai, ka rīhitia rānei he rererangi. I kī a ia ka whai kōrero whakamutunga te tari mo te tuku moni i muri i te whakaaetanga ki tētahi take pakihi mai i te kamupene. I te 30 o Hōngongoi, ko nga kaupapa e whakawāteatia ana e nga Kāwanatanga.

title: I whainatia te Network Rail i muri i te whakaaetanga i ngā tereina i runga i te Viaduct o Lamington i pakaru
summary: Kua whainatia te Network Rail e £10,000 mō te whakaae i ngā tereina kia neke atu i te 100mph i runga i tētahi viaduct tūkino i te Raina Matua o Te Tairāwhiti.
text: I hoatu te whiu i te Kōti Sheriff o Lanark i te 18 o Whiringa ā Rangi, ka kī te Office of Road and Rail (ORR). I pakaru a Lamington Viaduct - e whakawhiti ana i te Awa o Clyde i South Lanarkshire - i te āwhā nui i te mutunga o te tau 2015. I whakaaetia e Network Rail ētahi tereina ki te whakamahi i te whakawhitinga i mua i te katinga mō ngā whakatika nui ki ōna tūāpapa. Ka kawea e te piriti ngā tereina e haere ana i waenganui i Carlisle me Glasgow. Ko te kamupene a te kāwanatanga, e haepapa ana ki te hanganga o te kaupae o Ingarangi, i whiua i muri i te tūhuratanga a te ORR - te kaiwhakahaere o te rēra. I whakahuahuatia e tētahi pūrongo a te Peka Tūhura Aituā o Te Kaupae i whakaputaina i Whiringa ā-Rangi 2016 ngā hē nui i roto i te hōtaka aroturuki arawhiti me te aromatawai haumaru a Network Rail. I kitea kua werohia e te waipuke te nuinga o ngā tūāpapa o te uara tuarua i te wā o te Āwhā o Frank i te Pō o te Tau Hōu 2015. I pōhiritia e HM Chief Inspector of Railways Ian Prosser te hua o te kēhi o te kōti. "I kitea e tā mātou tūhuratanga kāore i te mōhio ngā kaimahi o Network Rail kei a rātou ngā mahi nui haumaru i raro i ngā tukanga a Network Rail hei whakahaere hanganga i te wā o te huarere tino nui," tana kī. "I runga te rārangi o ngā hanganga mōrearea nui o Network Rail e mōrearea ana ki te horoi atu i te wai neke, engari ahakoa he take e mōhiotia ana tēnei, kāore i mōhiotia te tūkinotanga nui nā te mea kāore i taea e Network Rail te whakatinana i ōna ake hātepe, ā, kāore he tereina pāhihi i puta i runga i te viaduct. " Ko te tikanga kia whakamaumahara tēnei whakataunga ki te Network Rail, i a ia e haere ana i ngā mahere e arahina ana e ōna ope tūmahi hou e rua, me haere tonu ki te whakaae me te mahi hei tiaki i te pānga nui o te huarere kino ki te hanganga." I a Aotearoa, ka whakarewaina e Network Rail ngā ope tūmahi ki te whakaaro i te pānga o te marangai taumaha i runga i te rerewhenua me te whakahaeretanga o ngā tapahi me ngā pareke. I puta mai tēnei i muri i te matenga o ngā tāngata tokotoru i te tūtukitanga o te rēra o Stonehaven, i te tūtukitanga o te tereina ki tētahi pūkei toka me te kirikiri i mua i te takahuritanga. I kī tētahi kaikōrero o Network Rail: "I taka poto mātou i ngā paerewa e tūmanakohia ana e mātau i roto i tā mātou urupare i Lamington, ā, i wawe tonu mātou i mahi i ngā huringa nui ki tā mātou whakahaere i ngā mōrea mōrearea i Pākehā nā tēnei mahi. " We invest much each year in projects designed to minimize the impact of river flow on vulnerable structures and we have also deployed telemetry equipment at high-risk bridges to help improve early identification of potential issues. "E tino mōhio ana mātou ki te pānga o tō mātou huarere ki tā mātou rerewhenua, ā, kua whakarewaina e ngā tohunga takitahi, hei wāhanga o tā mātou urupare mo te wā roa ki te huringa āhuarangi."

title: He aha te tikanga o te pōti moni a te SNP?
summary: Kua whakaaetia ngā mahere moni a te SNP mō tētahi Pākehā motuhake e tana hui rōpū - ahakoa i whakahaua e ngā mema pāpāho ngā huringa ki ngā tono taketake a te kaiārahi.
text: Nā Piripi SimBBC Scotland kaipānui tōrangapū He pēhea te nui o ēnei huringa, ā, he aha te tikanga o te nekeneke rangatiratanga? He aha tēnei? Kotahi te whatu i runga i tētahi taupānga rangatiratanga ā muri ake, kua mahi te SNP i ana tohenga ohaoha - tae atu ki ērā huri noa i te moni, i noho hei take nui i mua i te taupānga tuatahi i te tau 2014. Ki tērā wā, i whakaritea a SNP MSP o mua ko Andrew Wilson ki te panekōrero i tētahi Komihana Tupu ki te whakatakoto i tētahi tirohanga o ngā tohenga ohaoha. Ko tana kaupapa - i whakawhiwhia e te kaiārahi o te rōpū - me pupuri e tētahi Pākehā motuhake te pauna i te tuatahi, i mua i te neke ki tētahi moni Pākehā hou mēnā ka tutuki ngā whakamātautau ohaoha pākaha e ono. I te tuatahi ka kī a Tēnā Uira ka tae atu ki te tekau tau mō tētahi o ēnei whakamātautau - he tāupenga pūtea ka taea te whakahaere - kia tutuki. Ko tana whāinga ko te tuku i tētahi whakaūnga waenga ki ngā tāngata mō ngā mea pēnei i ngā mōkete, ngā hekenga me ngā pūtea penapena. I muri i te tūnga o ngā mema SNP i ngā hui a te Rōpū ā Iwi, ka kī te putanga i te mutunga o te hui a te rōpū i Etinitini, me whakatau tētahi Pāremata Pākehā motuhake mēnā ka whakatū i tētahi moni hōu i te mutunga o tōna wā tuatahi. Nā reira tērā pea i mahi kē te kaiārahi rōpū i tētahi neke māheahea i reira - engari i haere mai ētahi kaitautapa ki te hui ki te kimi i ētahi atu mea. He aha i pā mai i te hui? Hei tīmatanga, ka puta te mahere moni. Ehara tēnā i te taipitopito iti noa iho; Ko te kaupapa here mana a te SNP ināianei, ko te wā tuatahi, kia neke atu i te pauna i muri i te rangatiratanga. He huringa nui tēnā mai i te tau 2014, i te wā i tonoa e te whakahau Āe e te Minita Tuatahi o Alex Salmond kia puritia te pauna i roto i tētahi uniana moni tika me ērā atu o te UK - i whakahaeretia e Westminster. Ko tērā atu pūrākau mai i te hui ko te taupatupatu, me ngā menemana i tukuna e ngā mema. I tino hiahia te kaiārahi ki te whakaoti i ēnei mahere i te hui. I kitea te āmaimai o te kaiārahi tuarua o Keith Brown ki te whakamua i a rātou, ā, i whaia ia e ngā rangatū katoa o ngā kaikōrero i haere mai ki ngā āwangawanga reo. Tērā ngā māharahara mo te waiho i te kaupapahere moni ki te ringa o te Pēke o Ingarangi i muri i te rangatiratanga, ā, he ngāwari hoki te hoko atu ki ngā kaipōti. I whakamātau ngā minita me ngā hōia o te rōpū ki te tuku whakaū, e whakahau ana i ngā kaitautapa kia pōti i ngā menemana e whā, ā, ka waiho te nekeneke taketake a te kaiārahi. I te mutunga, e toru o ēnei menemana i tino hinga. Engari i muri i te tatau roa o ngā kāri, ka puta te tuawhā i te tawhē whāiti e 52 ngā pōti. Tērā pea ko te whakarākeitanga iti rawa tēnei i marohitia. Kotahi noa iho te kōwae i hurihia, ā, ka tukua te rōpū kia whakaurua he kōwae hou o Pākehā "i te wā e taea ana" i muri i te rangatiratanga. E tohe ana te kaiārahi o te rōpū he pai tēnei, ā, kāore he mea i rerekē. Kei te hoatu noa iho rātau i tētahi kanohi toa ki runga, ka tino pā rānei? Ka huri tēnei i tētahi mea mō te mahere a te SNP? Ko Timoti Rideout, nāna i neke te whakarākeitanga angitu, i whakarerekē mo nga whakamātautau e ono. I kī a ia e ngana ana ki te whakamārama i a rātou ki ngā kaipōti i te kūaha ka "ngaro ngā pōti, kaua e whiwhi". Ā, ko ētahi e whakaae ana - ka tūtohu a MP Wānanga MacNeil e "mārama ana te pōti a ngā kaitautapa ki te whakakore i ngā whakamātautau e ono - i whakawāteatia rātau ki te tangi o te kata kōhua". Engari i te mutunga, kāore te menemana i tango i ngā whakamātautau a te Komihana Tupu mai i te mōtini, e kī tonu ana me "ārahi" e rātou te tauwhiro ki tētahi moni hōu. Ko ngā mea katoa i tangohia he whakaaetanga mō tētahi whakahōutanga ā-tau mai i tētahi pēke matua hōu o Pirihitini mō te haere whakamua ki te whakatutuki i ngā whakamātautau, i te wā i tāpiritia te whāinga kia tere ake te haere i ngā mahere. Heoi anō ka herea tētahi kāwanatanga SNP ā muri ake ki te huri i te ara i runga i tētahi huarahi nui? Ko te āhua o te urupare a te kaiārahi e tohu ana kāore rātau. A, i te mea i whakamātauria e tētahi kaikōrero, ko te mutunga he whakataunga tēnei mo tētahi kāwanatanga rangatiratanga. Mēnā ka tae tonu tātau ki tērā wā, kāore pea e tino hāngai ana ngā mekameka o tētahi taupatupatu hui i ngā tau i mua. Ka pā pea ki te whakahau indyref2? Nā reira pea ko te pātai tūturu he pēhea te pānga o tēnei ki te putanga mai o taua kāwanatanga takitahi. I tautohe te hunga i pēhi i te menemana he tono māmā ake tēnei ki te hoatu ki ngā tāngata i te kūaha. He ngāwari kē atu te hoko ki tētahi moni hōu i te whakamārama i ngā whakamātautau e ono, e kī ana rātau. Heoi anō, tērā anō te wā ka taea e tēnei te tuku karere rerekē ki te mea i whāia tuatahitia e Tēnā Uira, o te pūmautanga waenganui. I kī atu a Tēnā Paraone, te kaiārahi tuarua o SNP, ki ngā kaitautapa "ka kaha ake, ka tere ake hoki te tūkino i te kēhi, ā, ka kore e whiwhi tautoko hōu". Nā reira i tērā taha, ka kī ngā kaiwhakahauhau ā-Ūniana he tohu tēnei ka kitea e te pōti Āe te pauna "kua waihotia". Koia anō, e whakaaro ana rātau ki te kōrero pērā. He karere hōhonu ake? Ko te pātai whakamutunga he aha te karere ka tukuna e te pōti ki nga kaiārahi o te rōpū. Mai i te wā i "tautuhi anō" ai a Nicola Sturgeon i ana mahere indyref2 i muri i te pōtitanga 2017, kua haere mai ngā kaipūrongo me ngā kaiwaiata ki ngā hui SNP e kimi ana i ngā tohu o te whakaaetanga, o ngā pāpāho e hiahia ana ki te neke tere ake. Ko te nuinga o tātau i kite ai i tēnei wā - i te hōro hui - he rōpū whānui i muri i te rautaki a ōna kaiārahi. I runga i te tika, kāore anō tēnā kia tino rerekē. Kaore tētahi tangata i tino huri ki te kaiārahi. Engari ko te mea, ko tētahi rūma kī tonu i ngā kaiwhaiwhai SNP i titiro ake ki tētahi wāhanga i pōti ai a Nicola Sturgeon me ana pirihitini katoa i tētahi ara, ā, ko te nuinga o rātau i whawhai ki a ia. Tērā pea i pā mai i te rua tau ki mua? Ko te whāinga kotahi a te kaiārahi mō tēnei hui ko te whakawhitiwhiti i te kōmihana tupu ki tua atu i ngā mema, ā, he pono tō rātou āwhina ki te karo i ngā huringa nui ake. Engari nā te mea ka taea e rātau te noho me te hua, ehara tēnei i te hinganga. Ā, tērā pea ka kitea he tikanga hōhonu ake.

title: Ko ngā kāwanatanga 'kāore i roto i ngā kōrero ki ngā Pākehā whakahē'
summary: Kua tohe anō nga kāwanatanga o Ingarangi me Kīriria kāore rātau i te mau kōrero ki ngā tāngata whakahē.
text: I pātaitia te hēkeretari o te kāwanatanga me te minita tika o Kīriria mō to rātau hoapā ki ngā tautohetohe i muri i tētahi hui haumarutanga taitapa i Dundalk. I kī a Owen Paterson rāua ko Dermot Ahern e mahi tahi ana ngā mana whakahaere e rua ki te whakamutu i te tuma whakahē. I tērā marama, i kī a Mātini McGuinness o Sinn Fein kua mau kōrero ngā kāwanatanga e rua ki ngā kāwanatanga whakahē. Ka kī atu te tuarua minita tuatahi ki te AO e "mōhio ana" a ia kua kōrero te kāwanatanga o Ingarangi ki ngā tautohetohe "inā noa nei i ngā wiki tata nei" ā, he maha nga tau e mau ana te kāwanatanga o Kīriria i aua kōrero. Engari i a ia e kōrero ana ki ngā kaipūrongo i County Louth i te Mane, ka kī a Tēnā Ahern kāore he kōrero e haere ana "ki te tino pai o taku mōhiotanga". I tāpiritia e ia, kāore he rārangi take tōrangapū o te hunga i roto i te tutu, kāore he arotahi, ā, e whakakāhore ana i te hiahia o te iwi o Kīriria. Ka kī a Tēnā Paterson: "Kāore e taea e mātou te whakarite nui ki ngā tāngata e rua wiki noa iho nei, i ngana ki te patu i ngā tamariki tokorua. " Ehara tēnā i te huarahi e taea ai e tātau te whakahaere," tana kī atu ki nga kaipānui. I whakaae ngā tāngata e rua tērā pea kei te tono ngā rōpū tautohetohe, engari i kī he iti tonu te tokomaha o nga rōpū taua. I kī te hēkeretari o Aiarangi ki te Raki, ahakoa he iti noa iho o rātau tau, ka mōrearea tonu nga rōpū.

title: Rainham Orchard Village homeowners get buyback offer
summary: Kua tukuna e te pāhonotanga whare e whakahaere ana i tētahi pānga whare "kino te hanga" i te rāwhiti o Rāwāhi ki te hoko anō i te tini o ngā āhuatanga.
text: I kī ngā tangata o Orchard Village, i Rainham, kua pā rātau ki ngā raruraru maha, tae atu ki te parakaingaki mata, te kiore, me ngā turuturu korohū. Kua tono te pāhonotanga e whakahaere ana i te pānga, a Clarion Housing, ki te hoko anō i te 58 o ngā kāinga e 387. I whakaae he "kore e whakaaetia" taua āhuatanga. I tangohia e Clarion te pānga i te wā i hokona ai e ia te kaiwhakawhanake āhuatanga taketake o Circle Homes e rua marama ki mua. I whakatuwheratia te karanga ki te whakangaro i te Kāinga o Orchard, e utu ana tētahi whare moenga e rua mō te £250,000, i te tau 2014. I hangaia tētahi wāhanga mā te whakamahi i te moni tūmatanui e £31m, i whakakapia e te pānga £80m te pānga whare o Mardyke "rongonui". I kī a Hōne Nickless, nāna i neke ki te pānga i te wā o Mahuru 2015 kia tata ki tētahi kura motuhake mō tana tamāhine, he mate pukupuku tōna: "He wai parakore te rūma moe o taku tama i te paipa parakore. He turuturu o te tuanui, he turuturu i te kaukau e puta mai ana. "I muri iho ka tipu te pokepokea me te haukū." "I whiwhi taku tamāhine i tētahi mate huakita, he maha nga wiki i noho ai ia i te hōhipera. Kua tukuna hoki taku tama ki te hōhipera me te uaua o te hā. He rite ki te huringa o te mate ehara i tōku kāinga anake, engari puta noa i te pānga. "E kīia ana e mātou ko te Orchard Village Sickness, ko te Orchard Village Flu rānei". I karangatia e te kaikaunihera o Havering UKIP, a Phil Martin kia whakawāteatia te pānga katoa. "He tangata rawakore tā mātou e kopikopiko ana mō ngā rā i runga i ngā kāpeti paraka i mua i tā rātou mahi i tētahi mea," tana kī. "A, kua hinga te uara o nga whare. Kāore e taea e koe te hoko atu. "Ko te rongoā anake ko te huti i te rota katoa ki raro me te tīmata anō, nā te mea ko tēnei katoa e mahi ana ko te whakapiri ake." I kī tētahi kaikōrero mō Clarion kua "nui kē te haere whakamua o tana tīma kaupapa whakatapua ki te whiu i ngā hēnga hanga i Orchard Village". E kī ana he "tino nui", ā, kua "tohutohu te rōpū i ngā tohunga tūhura whenua kia mahi i ngā whakamātautau pūtaiao uaua". Whakatika 9 Hēpuari 2017: I roto i tētahi putanga tōmua o tēnei pūrongo he pikitia o ngā kōrero a ngā tangata he pūoho ahi hē, engari he pouaka mana whakaora auahi e mahi ana.

title: Waipuke: Extra £10m to protect communities in Wales
summary: An extra £10m has been allocated to help protect communities in Wales at risk of flooding.
text: I kī te Minita Rauemi Māori a Alun Davies i whai i tētahi o ngā tau tino mākū i runga i te pūkete i te tau 2012, nāna i pā ki ngā rau kāinga me ngā umanga. Na te waipuke taumaha i pā ki Ceredigion me Denbighshire. Kua kī te kāwanatanga o Welsh kua neke atu i te £160m ki te parenga waipuke, e whakaiti ana i te mōrea mō ngā āhuatanga e 7,000. The additional £10m is part of a £76.5m capital investment programme outlined by Finance Minister Jane Hutt last week. I tērā Rāpu, ka pā te waipuke taumaha ki Aberystwyth me ngā kāinga pātata me te marangai o te marama i roto i te 24 haora. I Whiringa ā Rangi, e hia rau ngā kāinga i Hato Ahapa me Ruthin i Denbighshire i pā hoki ki te waipuke, a, ka mate tētahi wahine pakeke. Mr Davies said there was a commitment to managing the risk of flooding across Wales. "E kore e taea e mātou te ārai katoa i ngā waipuke katoa, engari ka taea e mātou te whakahaere i ngā mōrea me te whakaiti i ngā hua. " As well as delivering protection from flooding and coastal erosion for some of our most vulnerable communities, this additional funding will also help to create and secure local jobs." I tāpiri mai a Ms Hutt: "Mā tēnei pūtea penapena tāpiri i roto i ā mātou parenga waipuke e tino rerekē ki te pare i ngā hapori puta noa i Weera." 'Hōtaka whānui' Mā te moni e āwhina ki te pūtea i ngā aronui whakahaere mōrearea waipuke me te moana, tae atu ki: I pōhiritia e ngā Rauemi Māori o Uēra te £2m i tautohetia mō ngā kaupapa waea waipuke puta noa i Weera, ā, ka kī ka tautoko i tana hōtaka mōrearea waipuke puta noa i te 2013/14. The organisation's Trefor Owen said: "Our work reduces flood risk to homes and businesses and we are undertaking an extensive programme of work to ensure communities are better protected."

title: Coronavirus: Ka tangohia e Amazon ngā taonga utu nui me ngā rongoā rūpahu
summary: Kua rāhuitia e Amazon neke atu i te kotahi miriona ngā hua e kī ana he pare i te coronavirus - he rongoā rānei.
text: I kī atu te kaihoko tuihono ki a Kōrero ki a Kōrero kua tangohia hoki e ia te "tekau mano" o ngā hua hauora utu nui rawa mai i ngā kaihoko tinihanga. I whakapuakina e te Rōpū Hauora o te Ao (WHO) te māharahara mō ētahi rārangi māminga o Amazon i te tīmatanga o tēnei marama, tae atu ki ngā rongoā kōrero. Ko te huaketo, nāna i mate a Covid-19, tata ki te 2,800 ngā tāngata puta noa i te ao. I kī te WHO ko ngā kerēme coronavirus kōrero i runga i te ipurangi i whakararuraru i te nui, ā, ka tohe i ngā rorohiko hangarau kia whawhai i te horahanga o ngā mōhiohio hē. Na te rapunga mo te "coronavirus" i Amazon i puta mai ai nga hua mo nga kanohi kanohi, nga horoi disinfectant me nga pukapuka hou i whakaputaina mo nga mate huaketo, e whakaatu ana he pehea te moni a etahi kaihoko i runga i te mate hauora. I tukuna hoki e ia ngā hua mō ngā whakarei huaora C - he rongoā kōrero mō te huaketo kua horahia whānuitia i runga i te ipurangi. Kāore anō a Amazon kia homai he rārangi o aua hua e kī ana kua tangohia, engari he rapunga BBC mō te "coronavirus" i te pae tuihono e hua ana he maha ngā hua e hokona tonutia ana i ngā utu tino nui. I tētahi tauira, he nui ake i te £170 te utu o tētahi tāpae hīpoki haparapara mai i tētahi kaihoko, ā, tata ki te £36 te utu o tētahi whiringa pai o te hua kotahi. Ahakoa tērā hua māmā ake, kua tino piki haere tonu te utu mai i te tīmatanga o Hānuere, i te wā he iti iho i te £10. Kāore ētahi o aua hua i te tika mō te whāinga, pēnei i te puehu maka, i ngā hīpoki pokanga rānei, kaua ko ngā taputapu ārai e taunakitia ana. Ko te utu o tētahi pōkai e toru o tētahi pūkenga rongonui o te gel horoi ringa i waenganui i te £10-15 tae noa ki te tōmua o Hānuere, i te wā i piki ai ki te £50. Ināianei ka hokona mō te neke atu i te £30. "Kāore he wāhi mō te utu utu i Amazon," te kī a tētahi kaiwhakaatu ki a Kōrero, e pā ana ki te mahi o te pikinga utu o ngā taonga ki ngā taumata tiketike rawa nā te nui o te tono. I kōrerotia e ia te kaupapahere kamupene e āhei ai a Amazon ki te tango i ngā hua e "whara ana i te whakawhirinaki kiritaki", tae atu ki te utu "he tino teitei ake i ngā utu o mua tata nei i tukuna ki Amazon, ki waho rānei o Amazon". Ka aroturuki tonu te kamupene i te pae mō ngā tara utu, ka tāpiritia e ia.

title: Maika Thalassitis: He takoha i utua ki te whetū o Love Island
summary: Kua whakaahuatia e tētahi tauwhāinga i runga i te whakaaturanga pouaka whakaata rangirua o ITV Love Island tōna riri me tōna pouri mo te matenga o tōna hoa ko Maika Thalassitis.
text: I kī a Montana Brown, nāna i whakahoa ki te tau 26 tau i roto i te rangatū 2017: "E tino riri ana ahau ki a koe mo te mahi i tēnei nā te mea e tino arohaina ana koe e te tini o ngā tāngata". I kitea te Thalassitis kua mate i tētahi pāka i Edmonton, ki te raki o Rāwāhi, i te Hātarei. Kāore tōna matenga i te whakatūpato. I kī ngā āpiha i karangatia rātau ki tētahi pāka tata ki Latymer Way i te 09:28 GMT ki ngā pūrongo o tētahi tangata i kitea kua taronatia. 'E pouri ana ahau' i kī a Ms Brown i mōhio a ia kua noho tōna hoa i tētahi "wāhi pouri" i ngā marama i mua i tōna matenga me te whakairi i Instagram, i whakaaturia ngā taipitopito o ta rātau waea whakamutunga. Ka haere tonu a ia: "E pouri ana ahau kāore i taea e au te mahi anō hei āwhina i a koe. He nui rawa tōku aroha ki a koe, Mike, ā, e kore rawa ahau e wareware i a koe. Moe kikī e te aroha, ā, e tino mihi kē ana ahau ki a koe 💙 " Alex Bowen rāua ko Rahera Fenton, i puta tahi rāua ki Love Island, ka tūtohu i o rāua manaakitanga. Ka tūtohu a Ms Fenton: "Kua ngaro ahau mō ngā kupu. Ka pakaru tōku ngākau mō tō whānau RIP MikeThalassitis." Na ka tuhituhi a Bowen: "Kaore e taea e au te huri haere i tēnei tuakana RIP." Ka tūtohu te kaiwhakaari o Sheridan Smith ko te matenga o Thalassitis he "waea whakaoho". 'Ohorere, pouri' Ka kī a ia: "Ko te tikanga he waea whakaoho tino nui tēnei. Kei te māuiui ahau, ka toro atu, i ētahi wā ki te hoa tino māia. Ka taea anake e tātau te ako me te ngana ki te huri." I kī tētahi kaikōrero mō ITV, e whakaputa ana i te Motu Aroha: "E ohorere ana, e pouri ana ngā tāngata katoa i ITV2 me Love Island i tēnei rongo wehi. " Ko o mātau whakaaro me o mātau aroha hōhonu kei te whānau me ngā hoa o Mike i tēnei wā tino pouri." I tēnei wā ka takoha a Stevenage FC, nāna a Thalassitis i tīmata tana mahi whutupōro, ki to rātau kaitākaro o mua. "E ohorere ana ngā tāngata katoa i Te Wānanga o Te 'Pūāhua tino pai' "E haere ana o mātau aroha pono ki tōna whānau me ōna hoa." I whānau a Thalassitis i Edmonton, ā, i tākaro whutupōro mō ngā karapu tae atu ki St Albans me Chelmsford. I te wā o tana mahi whutupōro, i puta anō ia mō te taha o te Rōpū ā-Motu o Ebbsfleet United i te tau 2014, ā, kātahi anō ka tākaro mō Margate i te wā 2016-17. I te takoha ki to rātau kaitākaro o mua, ka kī te karapu: "He pūkenga whutupōro pūkenga a Maika, ā, he pūāhua tino pai i Hartsdown Park, ka maumaharatia e te whakahaere, ngā kaimahi, ngā kaiāwhina me ngā kaitautoko i te karapu." I puta hoki a ia i runga i te whakaaturanga ao rangirua o Celebs Go Dating i te tau 2018. I wehe a ia i te whetū o The Only Way Is Essex o Megan McKenna i tērā tau. I tērā tau, i mate tētahi tauwhāinga i te rangatū 2016 o Love Island, a Sophie Gradon, i te 32 o ona tau. Kātahi anō ka whakaroatia he uiuinga mo tōna matenga. Mēnā kei te uaua koe ki te whakatikatika, whakapā atu ki ngā Hamari i te raina āwhina koreutu 116 123, pāwhiri rānei i tēnei hono kia uru ki ngā ratonga tautoko.

title: Ko te pūrongo Opal e tohu ana i te pūtaiao tangata whenua o UK
summary: Kua whakaputaina ngā kitenga takiwā o tētahi kaupapa pūtaiao tangata whenua nui e rima tau , neke atu i te 25,000 ngā uiuinga me ngā tāngata e 500,000.
text: Nā Mark KinverEnvironment reporter, BBC News I hoahoatia te kaupapa Open Air Laboratories (Opal) kia whiwhi ai ngā tāngata ki waho, kia whai wāhi ai ki te rangahau pūtaiao. I kitea hoki e te kaupapa ko ngā māra kāinga te kāinga ki te nuinga me te rerenga kētanga o ngā kutukutu. E tūmanako ana ngā kaiwhakahaere ki te whiwhi pūtea kia haere tonu ai te kaupapa. "I to mātau tīmatanga, i tino māharahara mātou ki te kore whai wāhi mō te tangata i te tiriti ki te tākaro i tētahi tūranga hohe i roto i te parenga taiao," te kī a Linda Davies, te kaiwhakahaere o Opal. "I mōhio hoki mātou kāore ngā wāhanga nunui o te iwi i whakaurua, kāore rānei i tino rongo i te hototahi ki te taiao." I tāpiritia e ia ko ngā whakaaetanga ā-ao, pēnei i te Whakaritenga mo te Rerenga Rauropi, i karangatia e ngā iwi kia tuhinga i ō rātou flora me ngā kararehe katoa. "Nā reira i whakaaro mātou he nui rawa ngā mea mō ngā tāngata e hiahia ana ki te whakauru ki te whai wāhi," te kī a Dr Davies ki a BBC News. 'Tino whai hua' Mai i tōna whakarewatanga i te tau 2007, neke atu i te 25,000 ngā pae - mai i ngā rākau tiriti me ngā taiepa, ngā whakarato me ngā ngahere, me ngā pāka me ngā papa tākaro - kua tirohia, kua tukuna ngā raraunga ki te pātengi raraunga o te kaupapa. I kī a Dr Davies ko te tīma i muri i te kaupapa e whakarite ana kia wātea tūmatanui ngā mōhiohio katoa. "He nui rawa ngā mōhiohio ka taea e [ngā kaipūtaiao] te whakamahi - he raraunga tino whai hua mo te wā roa," tana whakamārama. "Ka kitea e ētahi ngā au, ā, ka taea e mātou te tūhura anō, ā, ko ētahi e whakaatu ana i ngā mea whakamere mai i te tīmatanga o te uiuinga. " Hei tauira, kāore anō kia mahia te kohinga parataiao hāroto i mua, nā reira kāore mātou i mōhio ki te momo whakamōhiotanga konganuku ka kitea e koe i aua taiao." Ko tētahi miramira, i whakaaturia e ia, he wāhiwera koiora ngā māra tūmataiti ina tae mai ki ngā kutukutu. "Kāore mātou i tūmanako kia kite i te nuinga o ngā kutukutu whenua (i ngā tikanga rerenga kētanga) i roto i ngā māra o muri." I manawapa a Dr Davies ki te whakawhānui rawa i ngā kitenga o te kaupapa nā te mea i kī a ia ko te nuinga o ngā raraunga e tātaritia tonutia ana e ngā kaipūtaiao, engari i kī rātou ka whakaritea he pūrongo taipitopito i te kōanga me te tuku mōhiohio i te paetukutuku o te kaupapa. I tāpiritia hoki e ia ko te kohinga raraunga tētahi o ngā whāinga maha: "Ko te whāinga tuatahi ko te tiki i ngā tāngata ki waho me te hākinakina i waho." Ko tētahi atu miramira o te kaupapa, i whiwhi pūtea tārewa e £14m, ko te whanaketanga o ngā pūmanawa e whakarato ana i ngā mōhiohio e hiahiatia ana ki ngā tāngata hei whai wāhi ki ngā uiuinga, tae atu ki ngā tikanga hei tuku i ā rātou kitenga - ko te tino angitu ko te taupānga iSpot mō ngā waea atamai. "Kua kitea he pai rawa te tukuatu whakaahua mai i ngā waea pūkoro hei whakaū i te tāutunga o ngā momo maha - he maha atu anō i whakaarohia e mātou. " He maha ngā rōpū hītori māori kua āhei ki te tango i ngā whakaahua mai i iSpot hei pūkete tūturu hei tāpiri ki te huinga raraunga ā-motu o ngā kitenga puta noa i te whenua." I kōrero hoki ngā kaiwhakahaere ki te māharahara kāore ngā raraunga i kohia e ngā kaipūtaiao tangata whenua e pakari ki ngā mōhiohio i kohia e ngā kaipūkaro ngaio. "He mea nui kia hoahoatia e mātou ki ngā kaipūtaiao kia taea ai e mātou te whakamahi i ngā raraunga e puta mai ana," te whakamārama a Dr Davies, tētahi kaimātai rauropi taone mai i te Kāreti o Imperial. "[Ka pā tēnei] ki te take tino hira mō ngā kaihanga kaupapahere - ka taea e rātou te whakawhirinaki ki ngā raraunga mai i te iwi whānui ina whakatau whakatau rātou. " Ki te tono koe i ngā tāngata kia tatau i te maha o ngā kutukutu, he tiketike te taumata maia. "Ki te tono koe i ngā tāngata kia tāutu i te momo kutukutu, ka hinga taua taumata maia, engari ka taea e koe te pūkete mō tēnā i roto i te hoahoa kaupapa me te tātaritanga o ngā raraunga." Ahakoa kua mutu tika te kaupapa, ka kī a ia e tūmanako ana ngā kaiwhakahaere ka haere tonu te mahi a Opal. "E tūmanako ana mātou ka whakaawe pea tēnei i ētahi atu ki te whakaaro mō tētahi hōtaka aroturuki ā-motu ka taea e te iwi whānui te whakauru atu. " E whakaaro ana mātou he nui rawa atu te kati i te toa me te haere atu ināianei, nā reira me kimi e mātou ngā tikanga hei whakahaere tonu."

title: Ko Wayne Hemingway hei ārahi i te tono kia noho a Thetford 'te tino pai'
summary: Me ārahi a Wayne Hemingway i tētahi tono "taekaha, auaha" ki te whakatupu anō i te pūmatua o mua o East Anglia.
text: Kua whakaritea e te Kaunihera o Breckland te umanga a te kaihoahoa hei āwhina ki te "hanga i te wā heke" o Thetford, Norfolk. Kua uru a Hemingway ki ngā kaupapa whakatupu anō ōrite i Rānana, York, Crewe, me Margate i Kent. I kī te Wānanga Pakihi o Thetford e hiahia ana ki te kite i ngā huringa "ā-tinana" hei kawe mai i ngā tāngata ki te taone, ehara i te moni i pau i runga i te tohutohu anake. I kī a Valerie Watson-Brown, mai i te wānanga pakihi, kei te taone ngā mea katoa kia angitu, engari me whakauru te pūtea penapena ki roto i te "huarahi tika". Ka kī a ia: "He wāhi ātaahua, he whakamīharo te hītori i muri i te taone, ā, he tino pai ētahi tūruhi manuhiri, me ngā whare taonga me ngā hīkoi awa. " E hiahia ana mātou kia puta mai ngā tāngata i te A11 me te tū i konei, engari kia haere ki mua i te huarahi ki Norwich, ki Cambridge rānei." I kī a ia ko Bury St Edmunds te "tauira" me te moni kia kaua e whakapaua ki te tohutohu me te tohu anake, engari he "whakaaturanga ōkiko" pēnei i ngā tohu i runga i te A11 e tohu ana i a Thetford hei taone hītori. I kī te kaunihera kua haere kē tētahi tīma mai i Hemingway Design ki te pokapū o te taone, ka toro atu ki ngā pānga whare paetata me te arotake i ngā āhuatanga me ngā taonga paetata. It will next host consultations and workshops with residents, community groups, businesses, charities, and sports associations. I kī a Sam Chapman-Allen, te kaiārahi o te mana whakahaere Conservative: "Neke atu i te 1,000 tau kua waihanga anō a Thetford i a ia anō. " The town has now grown into a modern town with a diverse and strong multicultural community and a mixture of local and multinational businesses. "We want to drive the further transformation and innovation of the town and I invite all of the community and local organisations to get involved in building a Thetford where everyone can thrive and prosper." 'He wāhi rangatira' Pūtake: Haereere i te Hītori o Thetford Kua kite ētahi atu kaupapa a Hemingway i a ia e whakaora ana i te pāka tāhuhu o Dreamland i Margate, Kent, ā, ka uru ki te whakaingoa anō o Shrewsbury's Flaxmill Maltings. I hoahoa anō e ia a Hillington Square i King's Lynn, Norfolk, e kī ana te kaikaunihera o Kingi Lynn Borough Conservative a Lesley Bambridge he "tino angitu". Ko te kamupene a Hemingway, i whakarewaina i muri i te hokonga o tana tapanga ahua Whero, Mate rānei, kei roto hoki i te whakatupuranga anō o te East Point Pavilion i Lowestoft, Suffolk. I kī a Hemingway, nāna hoki i āwhina ki te whakarite i te Hākari Mārama Tuatahi: "E hiahia ana mātou katoa kia noho a Thetford hei taone tino pai rawa atu, engari kia tae atu ai ki reira me mātua whakamārama mātou he aha te āhua o te angitu. " Insights from the local community are essential in understanding this so we're asking local residents, businesses and visitors to share their views." Kimihia te Rongokōrero o TE Rāwhiti o Ingarangi i Facebook, Instagram me Twitter. Mēnā he huatau pūrākau tāu, īmēra eastofenglandnews@bbc.co.uk

title: Anger at Tonga women's rugby 'ban'
summary: Tērā te riri i roto i te whutupōro pōrangi o Tonga i runga i tētahi reta kāwanatanga e whakakore ana i ngā wāhine kia kaua e tākaro i te tākaro i ngā kura tūmatanui.
text: Nā ngā Rongo mai i Tētahi Atu Wāhi...... as found by BBC Monitoring Tonga's Ministry of Education and Training confirmed to Matangi Tonga news website that it had issued the edict, in order to "preserve the dignity of Tongan women and hold on to Tongan cultural values". The ruling appeared after a member of Tonga High School's girls tag rugby team revealed that they had been withdrawn from a competition last week because they were girls, Matangi Tonga says. Kātahi ka whakaūngia e te tumuaki o te kura kua whiwhi ia i te "tohutohu" mai i te minita e kī ana ki a ia kia aukati i ana tauira wahine kia kaua e tākaro whutupōro. I whakakorea hoki e te reta te mekemeke wahine, e pūrongo ana a Newshub. Moto ki ngā mana wahine Kāore anō kia pai te heke iho o te reta whai mana ki ngā kaiwhakahaere hākinakina me ngā kaipōrero, e kite ana he moto ki ngā mana wahine. Fehoko Tu'ivai, president of the Tonga Women's Rugby Association, told TV New Zealand "How can we teach our girls to be independent when we keep making choices for them?" I a ia e kōrero ana ki Radio New Zealand, ka kī te kaitaunaki motika a te wahine 'Ofa Guttenbeil-Likiliki ka whakapakari anō i te āhuatanga o ngā hākinakina mō ngā tamariki anake. "It is really just taking us back from all the work we have done so far in trying to achieve and bring forward gender equality in Tonga," she told the radio. Even New Zealand Prime Minister Jacinda Arden has expressed her disapproval, saying "I would encourage all the young women to engage in whatever sporting code they are interested in." Pōhēhētanga? Heoi anō, e kī ana nga mana o Tonga tērā pea i pōhēhētia te take i muri i te reta. Senior Education Ministry official Manu 'Akau'ola told Radio New Zealand that the edict was in response to February's Cyclone Gita, which was the worst storm to hit Tonga in 60 years. "I whakahaua e to mātau minita kia kaua ngā kura kāwanatanga katoa, nā te huripari, e uru ki ētahi hākinakina i roto i tēnei wā nā te mea kua ngaro kē i a mātau te wā kura," tana kī, kātahi anō ka tirohia e ia mehemea ko te reta tautohetohe tonu te mea i whakaritea e te minita. Pūrongo nā Alistair Coleman Pūrākau Panuku: Ka whakapōrearea e ngā pokiha ngā kaipānui Peretiana Whakamahia #NewsfromElsewhere kia noho hōu tonu ki ā mātou pūrongo mā Twitter.

title: Covid i Scotland: He aha te taumata o tō rohe kaunihera?
summary: Kāore anō kia pānuitia ētahi atu huringa ki te pūnaha matohi Covid taumata e rima o Pākehā i muri i te arotakenga hou o ngā rāhuitanga.
text: Kotahi tekau mā tahi ngā mana ā-rohe kei roto tonu i ngā rāhuitanga taumata whā tino uaua. He rite ngā ture ki te kati i Poutāpeta, ahakoa i tēnei wā ka tuwhera tonu ngā kura. Kua katia ngā toa kāore i te tino nui, tae atu ki ngā pāparapara me ngā wharekai, ngā whare tākaro, ngā whare pukapuka me ngā kaikawe makawe. Ka noho ngā rāhuitanga tae noa ki te 18:00 i te 11 o Hakihea. Find out more about level four restrictions Restrictions at this level see cafes, pubs and restaurants allowed to open until 18:00 to serve food and non-alcoholic drinks to groups of up to six from two households. Kāore e whakaaetia ngā hoko waipiro ki rō whare, ki waho rānei. Kua katia ngā wāhi whakangahau me ngā wāhi whakangahau katoa, tae atu ki ngā whare pikitia. Kāore he haerenga kāore e whakaaetia ana i waho o tētahi rohe taumata toru. Ko te mahi i roto i te whare, arā ko ngā whare tākaro, e rāhuitia ana ki te mahi takitahi, ehara i te mahi rōpū. I tēnei taumata kāore he whakawhanaungatanga i roto i te kāinga e whakaaetia ana, ā, tae atu ki te ono ngā tāngata mai i ngā kāinga e rua ka taea te tūtaki i waho, i ngā tautuhinga manaakitanga hoki. Ka taea anake e ngā whare whai raihana te mahi waipiro i roto i te whare me te kai matua - ā, tae noa ki te 20:00 anake. I waho, ka taea koe te mahi tae noa ki te 22:30. Ko te nuinga o ngā wāhi whakangahau me ngā wāhi whakangahau e katia ana hāunga ngā whare tākaro, ngā whare pikitia, ngā hōro bingo me ngā whare whakangahau. E ono ngā tāngata mai i ngā kāinga e rua ka taea te tūtaki ki rō whare mēnā e noho ana rātou i Shetland, i ngā Moutere ki te Uru me Orkney. Kāore tēnei e pā ki ērā atu wāhi kaunihera. Ka kite te taumata tuatahi i tētahi waeine pūnoa "tika". He rāhui 22:30 tā te manaakitanga. Ka rāhuitia ngā takahanga, pēnei i ngā mārena, ki te mōrahi 20 tāngata. Kāore e whakaaetia ngā hākinakina whakapā rō whare mō ngā pakeke. Ko te hunga anake kāore e taea te mahi mai i te kāinga me haere ki to rātau wāhi mahi. Tae atu ki te waru ngā tāngata mai i ngā kāinga e toru ka taea te tūtaki ki waho. Kāore he mana ā-rohe i whakaritea ki tēnei taumata. I te taumata kore, ka mahi te manaakitanga "tata noa iho" - e ai ki ngā ture mo te tawhiti ā-tinana, ngā tepe o ngā tau me ētahi atu ture, pēnei i te ratonga tēpu. Whakamahia te puka i raro nei hei tuku mai i ō pātai ki a mātou, ā, ka whakapā mai pea mātou. I ētahi wā ka whakaputaina tō pātai, e whakaatu ana i tō ingoa, pakeke me tō tauwāhi i a koe e whakarato ana, ki te kore koe e kōrero kē. E kore rawa ō taipitopito hoapā e whakaputaina. Me mātua whakarite kua pānui koe i ngā ture me ngā tikanga. Ō mōhiohio whakapā Kua neke atu i te 16 tau te pakeke E whakaae ana ahau ki ngā Ture Ratonga Mēnā kei te pānui koe i tēnei whārangi i te taupānga BBC News, me toro koe ki te putanga pūkoro o te paetukutuku BBC ki te tuku i tō pātai mō tēnei kaupapa.

title: He iti ake ngā ratonga o ngā Tereina o West Midlands nā te iti o ngā kaimahi
summary: He iti ake ngā tereina e haere ana nā te iti o ngā kaimahi tereina.
text: E rere ana ngā pahi i ētahi raina tae atu ki Nuneaton me Atherstone, Hednesford me Rugeley Trent Valley me Crewe me Liverpool South Parkway. I kī ngā Tereina o West Midlands he take te wehenga haurua, engari i kī hoki he maha ngā take i iti ai pea te kaimahi. Ko nga kaimahi tereina rewa nā te raruraru pēnei i te waipuke, tērā pea he take, ka kī rātau. I te rere hoki ngā pahi i waenganui i Wolverton me Milton Keynes Central. Ko ngā take noa iho mo te iti o ngā kaimahi tereina ko te tohatoha wehenga ā-tau i ngā wā hararei e paingia ana, te whakangungu kaimahi me te mate mo te wā poto, te kī a te umanga. Kāore anō te kamupene, e whakahaere ana i te Rerewhenua o West Midlands me te Rerewhenua o Rānōna, kia kī mēnā ka haere tonu te āhuatanga i tua atu i te Mane. I kī ngā Tereina o West Midlands i te wāhi i tāutua ai ngā āputa i roto i ngā tītaka, i āta titiro ki te taupoki i ēnei ki ngā kaimahi e tono ana ki te mahi i ngā wā whakaroa, i ō rātou rā okiokinga rānei. I kī tētahi kaikawe kōrero i whakapārewa ki ōna pāhihi i whakararurarutia ōna haerenga e ngā whakakorenga i te Mane, ā, ka whakahauhau i tētahi tangata i takaware mā te 15 meneti, neke atu rānei "ki te tono utu mā tā mātou aronui Utu Takaware ". I purua ngā tohutohu mō ētahi atu ratonga ki te paetukutuku National Rail Enquiries. Whāia a BBC West Midlands i Facebook, i Twitter, me te waitohu mō ngā whakahōutanga rongokōrero paetata hāngai tonu ki tō waea.

title: Ka hoki a Commodore Clipper ki te tauranga maroke
summary: E rua ngā waka o Channel Island ka nui ake te wā i waho o te wai i muri i te takaware i te whakauru i ngā taputapu tapahi kohu.
text: Ko te tikanga kia whakaurua ngā horoi whakaheke poke i te wā e tauranga maroke ana te Commodore Clipper me te Commodore Goodwill, engari kāore anō kia rite. Ka noho te Clipper ki te tauranga maroke mai i te 4 o Whiringa ki te 14 o Hakihea, engari kāore anō kia tautuhia he rā mō te Goodwill. Ka whakakapia e ētahi atu rerenga ki Poole e Condor Liberation me te tūtohinga o tētahi kaipuke utanga. I kī a Condor Ferries ka tukuna e ia he whakahokinga moni, he haerenga kē rānei ki ngā kiritaki pāngia. I kī a Kāpene Fran Collins, mai i Condor Ferries: "E tino pouri ana mātou i te mea kāore i taea te whakauru i ngā kaihoroi, e hiahiatia ana kia tutuki i ngā Ture EU hōu mō te kohu pūngāwhā, kia rite ki te mea i whakaritea i roto i ngā wā o te tauranga maroke o ā mātou waka rererangi. " He tāutanga pūkaha nui, matatini ēnei e ahurei ana ki ia kaipuke." I kī a ia ka puta te Clipper i te wai "i te wā e iti ana te maha o ngā pāhihi". Kua tukua hoki e te umanga ngā taipitopito o ana mahere ohorere mō te tautiakitanga kua whakaritea, mō te raruraru ohorere rānei, arā ko te whakahaere i te Tiakitanga, i te Condor Rapide rānei i runga i tētahi ratonga UK-Channel Islands-France.

title: Hull's Ferens Art Gallery secures £1.6m masterpiece
summary: Kua hokona e tētahi taiwhanga toi tētahi mahi nui o te rau tau 14 mō te £1.6m i roto i tētahi mahi i whakaahuatia hei "tino nui" i roto i ngā tau neke atu i te 50.
text: Kua hokona e te Taiwhanga Toi Ferens o Hull te whakaahua o mua o te Renaissance o te Karaiti i waenganui i a Paora me Pita e te kaiwaiata Itari o Pietro Lorenzetti.
