I pūteatia ngātahitia te whiwhinga e te Ferens Endowment Fund, te Heritage Lottery Fund me te Art Fund. I kī te kaitiaki o Kirsten Simister ka tāpiri i te "hōhonutanga me te kounga" ki te taiwhanga. Ko te paepae rākau whakarākai koura e whakaatu ana i a Karaiti me Hato Paora, i te taha mauī, e pupuri ana i tētahi kākahu, me Hato Pita, i te taha matau, e mau ana i tētahi kī. I peitatia i te tau 1320, i hokona te mahi toi i muri i te whakatakotoranga a te hēkeretari ahurea i tētahi pae kaweake rangitahi kia taea ai e te kaihoko te kohi moni e hiahiatia ana hei pupuri i te UK. I hokona mai i te £5m mā tētahi hoko tiriti tūmataiti mō tētahi utu tino iti iho hei pūmahara ki te kaiwhakahaere taiwhanga o mua, a John Bradshaw. Ka hono ki te kohinga pūmau o te taiwhanga i te tau 2014 i muri i te mahinga atawhai. I kī a Ms Simister: "I taku wā i te Ferens e kimi ana ahau i tētahi hokonga nui hei whakahonore i te pūmahara o John Bradshaw, engari kāore i whakaaro i roto i aku moemoeā tino mohoao ka kitea e au tētahi mea mīharo pēnei i te Lorenzetti." I kī te tohunga toi Itari o Dr Caroline Campbell, mai i te Taiwhanga o te Motu, i Rāwāhi, he "rehetoi i mua i tōna wā" me te whakaahua i tōna kaha ki te whakaahua i te "tautohetohe ā-whakaaro" i waenganui i ngā whika hei "tōtika i roto i te toi Itari o te rau tau 14". Kotahi marama i muri i te whakaingoatanga o Hull hei tētahi o ngā tāone e whā i rārangihia hei UK City of Culture 2017, i te taha o Dundee, Leicester me Swansea.

title: E karanga ana te kaiwhakawā ki ngā maripi porowhita hei aukati i te mate wero
summary: E hiahia ana te kaiwhakawā kia porotaka, kia whakawhāititia hoki ngā pūwāhi o ngā maripi kītini hei whakaiti i te maha o ngā taitama e mate ana i ngā motu i roto i ngā whakaekenga tiriti.
text: I kī te Kaiwhakawā o Nic Madge i ngā maripi kītini noa iho i te "ngaromanga o te ora", ehara i te nui ake o ngā rākau mata nui. I te kōrero a ia i te Kōti Karauna o Luton i tētahi hui hei tohu i tōna whakatānga. I piki te hara maripi i te 22% i Ingarangi me Uēra i te tau 2017, e ai ki te Office for National Statistics. "Kei roto i ngā kītini ngā maripi whakamate, he rākau kōhuru pea, ā, ko ngā pūtia me ngā kaihoko ika anake e hiahia ana ki ngā maripi kītini e waru, 10 inihi rānei me ngā piro," te kī a te tiati. E hiahia ana a ia kia hangaia e ngā kaiwhakanao ngā maripi me ngā piro porohita mō te whakamahinga i te kāinga, ā, ko ērā whai piro kia hokona i raro i ngā ture pākaha. I roto i ngā marama e rua kua hipa atu i Bedfordshire, e 77 ngā whakaekenga tiriti e pā ana ki te maripi i puta i nga kōti, e toru nga mate, e 44 nga whara. Kua kitea e ngā tāone nui puta noa i te whenua te nui o te hara maripi, kua whakarewaina e te kāwanatanga tētahi whakahau pānuitanga £1.35m i runga i te pāpāho pāpori ki te whawhai i te hara maripi mā te whakamahi i ngā pūrākau ora tūturu hei ūnga i ngā pakeke 10 ki te 21 tau. I kī te Hēkeretari Kāinga o Mua o Amber Rudd: "E tūmanako ana ahau ko tētahi taitamariki e tino whakaaro ana ki te mau maripi e whakarongo ana ki ngā take." Kua uru te Kaiwhakawā Madge ki ētahi take kōtaha tiketike e pā ana ki te tutu me te hara maripi. "E kore rawa koe e whakakore i ngā wero. I ngā wā katoa he wero, ka noho tonu he wero," tana kī. "Ko tāku katoa e ngana ana ki te mahi hei whakaiti i ngā tau i patua."

title: Venezuela: E kī ana a Perehitini Tūtei i hopukina e te tūtei o AMERIKA e tata ana ki ngā pae hinu
summary: E kī ana te Perehitini o Tūria, o Te Perehitini o Tūria, o Te Rūnanga o Aotearoa, kua hopukina tētahi "tūtei o Amerika" e tata ana ki ngā kaipūnuku hinu e rua i te tūnga ki te raki o te whenua o Falcón.
text: I roto i tētahi wāhitau pouaka whakaata, ka kī a Tēnā Tūroro i hopukina taua tangata ki ngā rākau me te nui o ngā moni e tata ana ki ngā kaipūnuku o Amuay me Cardon i te Tāite. I kī a ia e "mahi ana taua tangata hei moana i runga i ngā turanga o te Rūma i Raki". Kaore a ia i hoatu ētahi atu taipitopito. Kāore anō te US kia kōrero tūmatanui mo taua take. I kī motuhake, ka kī a Tēnā Tūroro kātahi anō ka whakakorea e nga mana o Tūria tētahi mahi hei whakararuraru i te kaihoroi o El Palito i te āhua o Carabobo ki te raki. Kaore a ia i whakamārama. I tērā marama, ka whiua e te kōti o Tūria e rua nga hōia o Amerika o mua ki te 20 tau i roto i te whare herehere mo te ngana ki te turaki i a Tēnā Tūroro. I kitea he hara a Luke Denman rāua ko Airan Berry ki te whakatupu, ki te hokohoko rākau me te pūtōraru. I waenganui i ngā tāngata e 13 i hopukina i a rāua e ngana ana ki te tomo ki Venezuela mā te moana mai i Koropia. Kua whakakāhore te Perehitini o Amerika o Donald Trump, he hoariri roa nō te Perehitini manapori, i ngā whakapae a Venezuela i muri i taua mahi. Ka hoki whakamuri a Washington i te kaiārahi whakahē, a Juan Guaidó, ā, e mōhio ana ki a ia hei kaiārahi tika o te whenua. He uaua te whanaungatanga i waenganui i a Mātau me Penehūera. Kua whakapaea e Tēnā Wānanga a Amerika ki te rāwekeweke i te ātete tōrangapū ki te tāhae i nga rawa hinu nui o te whenua. Ināianei, kua whakapaea e Amerika rāua ko Tēnā Guaidó te perehitini mo te tiango o te ohaoha o Venezuela.

title: E rua ngā hua o Netflix ki te $71m i te pikinga o ngā ohaurunga
summary: I pūrongotia e te ratonga ataata tuihono a Netflix ngā hua o te $71m (£42m) i te koata tuarua, neke atu i te rua i whakaritea ki te wā kotahi i te tau ki mua.
text: I kī te kamupene i te moni hua mai i tana ratonga ihirangi roma i tata ki te 50% ki te $1.2bn, i whakaritea ki te $837m i te tau i mua. I kī a Netflix i tāpiritia e 1,69 miriona ngā kaiwhakamahi i te wā mai i Poutāpeta ki Pipiri. Ināianei e 50 miriona ngā kaiwhakamahi o te umanga ataata roma i ngā whenua neke atu i te 40. Kua whai a Netflix ki te whakakāhore i te umanga pouaka whakaata mā te whakarite i ngā ihirangi taketake mō tōna pūhara ataata roma me te mau i ngā toa tūturu pēnei i te HBO. Kua urupare pai ngā kaimātakitaki ki ngā whakaaturanga pēnei i te Whare Kāri me te Karaka ko te Pango Hōu. I tērā tau, i whakaingoatia ngā papatono taketake a te kamupene mō ngā tohu pouaka whakaata 14, e toru ngā tohu, ā, i tēnei tau i whiwhi ai ōna papatono i tētahi pūkete 31 whakaingoatanga. Heoi anō, kātahi anō ka pāngia e te kamupene ētahi tūponotanga i roto i a Mātau, i te mea kua whawhai ki ngā kaituku ratonga ipurangi (ISPs) pērā i a Kōrero mō wai me utu mō te nui haere o te pēhanga ka utaina e te ataata roma ki ngā tere tikiake. Ko te rangatira nui o Netflix, a Reed Hastings, he hoariri kōrero ki te hokonga $45bn a Comcast o Time Mārō Cable, e wehi ana ka nui rawa te whakatōpūtanga i roto i te umanga. I roto i tētahi reta ki ngā kaipupuri e pānui ana i ngā moni whiwhinga, ka tuhituhi a Tēnā Hastings, "Ko tā mātou arotahi ki te whakatūtū kupenga kaha, tae atu ki te tūhononga, ko te ārai i ngā ISP nui kia kore ai e pupuri i ā mātou kiritaki tōtahi me te mahinga kino hei tango utu mai i a mātau." Ko ngā hea i Netflix - kua piki kē i te 22% mō te tau - i piki tata ki te 2% i te tauhokohoko i muri i te katinga o ngā mākete hea o Amerika.

title: Tukua ngā Tamila ki Īnia - UNP
summary: Kua tonoa e te rōpū ātete matua o Hiri Rānaka te hoa noho nui kia whakaaetia e te iti o ngā Tūhihi kia noho ki Īnia.
text: I kī te kaiwhakatika o te Rōpū ā Iwi o te Hononga o te Motu (UNP) o Ēkishman Kiriella, e tohutohu ana te rōpū i Īnia kia whakaaetia ngā Tūhihi kia heke rā anō kia whakaūngia rā anō to rātau haumarutanga e te iwi motu. I tonoa e te UNP te tono i muri i te pananga o ngā rau o ngā Tamila i nga whare o Colombo e nga pirihimana. Kua whakahaua e Perehitini Mahinda Kāripaka he tūhuratanga wawe ki te whakapūtātanga, ka kī tētahi kōrero a te mēkeretari perehitini. Pūrongo 'Inamata tonu' "Ka āta uiuitia ngā whakaaro i hipa atu ngā mana i tō rātou mana, ā, ka mahia he mahi whakahoki tika, tae atu ki te mahi whakatinanatanga ki ngā hē a tētahi mana Kāwanatanga," te tāpiri mai o te kōrero. Engari e kī ana te rōpū ātete matua i mahue nga Tamila o Sri Rānaka, kaore he whirinoa. "He aha te whirinoa? Kāore e taea e rātau te noho ki te raki me te rāwhiti nā ngā tuma a te LTTE," te kī a te mema pāremata UNP. I kī te māngai perehitini, neke atu i te 350 ngā Tūhihi i kawea ki te raki me te rāwhiti i te Rāitema, e ai ki ngā pūrongo.

title: Coronavirus: Ka tuwhera te kaupapa tautoko moni mō ngā atekōkiri tīkiti
summary: Kua whakatuwheratia tētahi kaupapa tautoko pūtea mō ngā atekōkiri tīkiti e pāngia ana e ngā rāhuitanga Covid-19 i Aiarangi ki te Raki mō ngā taupānga.
text: Ka hoatu ki ngā atekōkiri he utu moni kotahi e £1,500, hei āwhina ki te utu i ngā taputapu ārai whaiaro me ētahi atu utu ā-rohe. Kua whakahē ētahi atekōkiri i te nui o te tāpaetanga, e kī ana kāore e tino tawhiti ki te taupoki i a rātau moni ngaro. He maha nga atekōkiri waka kua ngaro nui te hokohoko puta noa i te mate uruta. I pānuitia e te Minita Hanganga a Nichola Mallon te mōkī tautoko £14m mō te wāhanga i tērā marama. 'Ngā wā tino uaua' E tohu ana i te whakatuwheratanga o te aronui i te Paraire, ka kī a ia ka tere te tukatuka i ngā taupānga, ā, i whakaritea kia utua ngā utu i mua i te Kirihimete. "E tūmanako ana ahau mā tēnei tautoko, tae atu ki te tautoko tāpiri o te £1.2m i whakaritea e au i mua o te tau ki te whakakore i ngā utu raihana waka, ka taea e ngā atekōkiri te mahi tonu i roto i ēnei wā tino uaua," tana kī. Ko ngā atekōkiri tīkiti whai raihana mahi whaiaro i mahi, i wātea rānei ki te mahi i waenganui i te 22 o Poutūterangi me te 30 o Mahuru i tēnei tau, e āhei ana ki te moni. Ka taea hoki e ngā atekōkiri motokā mārena te tono mō te aronui, e haere ana tae noa ki te Paraire 27 o Whiringa ā-Rangi. Na SDLP MLA Dolores Kelly, he mema o te Komiti Hanganga o Stormont, i tohutohu i ngā atekōkiri tīkiti katoa kia hoatu. "Kua pā te whakaurunga o ngā rāhuitanga ki ngā tāngata puta noa i to mātau iwi, otirā ko ērā i roto i te umanga waka," tana kī. "Kua tata ngaro atu ta rātau hokohoko, ā, he tokomaha kua uaua ki te uru ki tētahi tautoko pūtea whai tikanga."

title: Stena Impero: Ka waiho e te taraka o Ingarangi nga wai o Irana
summary: E rua marama i muri i te hopukina o tētahi taraka hinu haki o Ingarangi i a Irana mo te takahi i ngā ture moana.
text: I kī a Stena Bulk - te rangatira Huitene o Stena Impero - i te Paraire e neke ana mai i te tauranga o Bandar Harā, i reira i taumautia ai mai i te 20 o Hōngongoi. E rua wiki i muri i te puritia o tētahi taraka o Ārepa i Kāmaka me te āwhina a te Moana Ariki o UK. Kua tino whakakāhore a Tehran i tangohia te kaipuke hei mahi utu. I kī a Erik Hanell, te Tumuaki Whakahaere o Stena Bulk, ka haere te Stena Impero ki Aorangi, ki reira ka whakawāteatia ngā kaimahi, ka whiwhi i ngā taki rongoā. "Ka tukuna te tautoko katoa ki ngā kaimahi me ngā whānau i ngā wiki e heke mai nei hei āwhina i tō rātou whakaora," tana kī i roto i tētahi kōrero. I te 4 o Hōngongoi, ka hopukina e ngā ope UK te taraka o Ārepa, o Adrian Darya-1 - i karangatia i mua ko Grace One - i runga i te whakapae ki te whati i ngā mana EU ki Hiria. I muri i tōna tukunga, ka rārangihitatia e te US te oko, e tautohe ana kia whakaritea he mana ki tētahi kaihoko o ngā oko hinu māori o Ārepa e 2,1 miriona i runga i te papa. I pānuitia e Irana i te wā o Mahuru kua hokona e te kaipuke ana utanga, e akiaki ana i te Hēkeretari Ā-Rohe o UK, a Dominic Raab ki te karanga i te karere a Tehran ki te Tari Tawahi. He aha i hopukina ai te taraka? I te 19 o Hōngongoi i te wā i whakaraua ai e te Rōpū Pare Hurihanga Āmāri o Irana, i te 19 o Hōngongoi i te wā i herea e te Rōpū Pare Hurihanga Āmāri o Irana. I whakapaea e Irana te oko i tūtuki ki tētahi poti hī ika, a, kaore i urupare ki ngā waea, engari i kī nga rangatira o te kaipuke kaore he whakaaturanga. I kī te UK i horaina e ia tētahi waka o te Moana o te Ariki kia haere mai ki te āwhina i te taraka, ā, ka whakatūpato i ngā mana o Ārepa he mana kore mana a rātau mahi, engari kāore i taea e te kaipuke te tae ki te tirohanga i te wā tika. Kātahi ka kawea te Stena Impero ki te tauranga o Bandar Whare, i reira ka noho taunga tonu mai i taua wā. Tokowhitu ngā mema "kāore i te tino nui" o ōna kaimahi i whakawāteatia e Irana i runga i ngā take atawhai i te tīmatanga o tēnei marama. Kotahi tekau mā ono ngā kaimahi - 13 ngā Initia, e rua ngā Rūhia me tētahi Piripīni - e whakaarotia ana kei runga tonu i te papa. I puta anō te taraka i runga i ngā paetukutuku aroturuki kaipuke tuihono i te Paraire - i ngā rā i muri i te whakarewatanga o te raupapa tautāwhi. I kī tētahi kōrero mai i ngā Tauranga me te Rōpū Moana o Irana kua tukua te kaipuke "ahakoa he kēhi kōti tuwhera" ki a ia. Ka puta mai te pānuitanga i waenganui i ngā renarena tiketike i te rohe. Tērā ētahi rangatū o ngā tautohetohe i runga i ngā taraka taraka i te Kōwhiu, tae atu ki tētahi whakaekenga o mua tata nei ki ngā pūkenga hinu o Hauti - kua whakapaea e te US rāua ko Arapia ki Tehran. Kua whakanuia ngā renarena i waenganui i a Mātau me Irana i tēnei tau, i muri i te whakarerenga a Perehitini Donald Trump i tētahi take e hāngai ana ki te whakawhāiti i ngā ngohe karihi a Irana. Ka tangohia e te putanga o te Stena Impero tētahi tūemi mai i te rārangi take, engari kei te kaihoko tonu a Ingarangi rāua ko Irana i te kēhi o Nazanin Zaghari Ratcliffe - he wahine Peretania i hereheretia e Tehran i runga i te mea e whakapono ana te tokomaha he utu tinihanga. Kātahi anō ka iti noa iho te take o te moni tārewa e nama ana te UK ki a Irana mo tētahi raupapa kura kāore anō kia whakahonoretia. He whānui ake, i ngā rā tata nei he pārekareka o ngā tohu whakawhanaunga, he tokomaha o rātau e tūpono ana. Ko nga Pākehā - i arahina e te Wīwī - kua whai ki te tuku i tētahi raina nama ki a Irana hei whakaiti i te pēhanga o nga whakamanatanga mehemea ka whakahonoretia katoatia e rātau nga tikanga o te mahi karihi. Engari kei te kī anō rātau ināianei kāore e taea e Tehran te takahi haere i ngā whakaritenga o te whakaaetanga me te kore e kawe mai i ētahi atu whakaaetanga. Na te whakaekenga o ngā tāutanga hinu a Arapia i whakarewa anō i ngā renarena, engari i whakaahuatia anōtia, ahakoa he kōwhiringa anō a Irana ki te whakanui ake, he tino manawapa ngā Hauti me te US ki te urupare i runga i te āhua.

title: Ka aha ina kati te pēke taone?
summary: Neke atu i te 600 ngā peka pēke kua katia i te UK i te tau kua taha, e ai ki tētahi pūrongo o TE HAU.
text: Kua tino pāngia ngā tāngata i ngā wāhi mamao, engari kua kōrero ngā kaiwhakamahi paetukutuku o TE UK puta noa i te UK, he pēhea te pānga o ngā katinga o mua tata nei ki a rātou. "He tino uaua mēnā he mahi whaiaro koe" Ka puritia e Lynda Dellar ngā pukapuka mō te umanga toi a tana tāne a Roger i Surrey. I hurihia e rātau te pēke mō te urunga peka paetata. "I katia to mātau Pēke Barclays i Haslemere i tērā Whiringa ā Rangi, ā, i a au e whakamahi ana i te pēke mō te utu i ngā haki i ngā wā katoa, ka nekehia e mātau ta mātau pūkete ki Raiti. He tino uaua mēnā he mahi whaiaro koe, ā, kei a koe tonu ētahi tāngata e utu ana i a koe pēnei. "He rehetoi taku tāne. Ka haere ngā hokonga pikitia i te pēke, engari e whakaako ana ia, ā, he akomanga tā mātou - me ngā tauira me te Rōpū Toi e utu ana mā te haki. E rua ngā wā i te wiki e utu ana ahau i roto i ngā haki. Ka mahi tonu taku tāne, ā, ka puritia tonutia e au ngā pukapuka. "Kei a NatWest ahau, nāna i kati i Grayshott inā noa nei. Ināianei he tokomaha ngā tāngata i te peka o Haslemere e amuamu ana mō te haere mai ki konei." "We all cram in a post office the size of a very small front room" James Couling lives in Portsmouth and is medically retired after suffering a brain hemorrhage in 2001. Kāore ōna āheitanga ki tētahi peka pēke paetata. "Our Lloyds, the only bank in Eastney in Portsmouth, closed this month, leaving our area with no banks at all, only the ones in Portsmouth city centre miles away. " I homai e te pēke he pēke mō tētahi wāhi nui o Eastney, Milton, ētahi wāhi o Southsea me Fratton me ngā toa me ngā umanga katoa. Ināianei me kōpikopiko tātau katoa i roto i tētahi poutāpeta te rahi o tētahi rūma iti rawa o mua, he tino hangarau. He tino kino nga tūtira, a, i nga wā katoa i waho o te tatau. "I was due to go to my local bank to discuss taking out life insurance face-to-face with my local staff. Kāore au e pīrangi ki te mahi tuihono, mā te waea rānei. Ināianei kua katia te pēke, kāore e taea e au te whakararuraru ki te haere puta noa i te taone. Kaore ahau e taraiwa nā reira me hīkoi. "Me te paheketanga o ngā waka i Portsmouth e 40 meneti te roa ki te taraiwa ki te pokapū o te taone, kātahi ka haere ki raro i te Huarahi Arumoni, he waewae anake, kātahi ka tūtira, kātahi ka taraiwa ki te kāinga." "Ināianei he toa taputapu kāinga tētahi, he toa kawhe tētahi, ā, kei te wātea ērā atu tokorua" E 52 ngā tau o Wendy Mārō, ā, e pāngia ana e te kaikōiwi, te mate huka me te fibromyalgia, engari e māharahara ana me pēhea e pā ana ōna hoa ki te kore o ngā peka pēke paetata i te takutai o Keni. "Kua ngaro i a Birchington-on-Sea a Barclays, NatWest me HSBC i tērā tau. I pēke ahau ki Woolwich, i ngaro i a au i ngā tau tata nei. "Ināianei he toa taputapu kāinga tētahi, he toa kawhe tētahi, ā, kei te wātea ērā atu e rua. " He āhua taone nui a Birchington tētahi o ngā kāinga nui rawa o te whenua. Kua tino tapahia te maha o ngā piro moni. Me whakauru ngā mīhini pūwāhi moni ki roto i a Co-op me Sainsburys. "He wāhi whakatānga a Birchington kī tonu i ngā pakeke, hauā, mōnehu hoki - he nui ōku hoa mai i te hāhi paetata - kāore ō rātou rorohiko pona, rorohiko, iPad, waea pūkoro rānei, te kaha rānei ki te haere ki Margate, ki Canterbury rānei i runga i ngā pahi auau, kōpikopiko. " He pūkoro tāku me tētahi rorohiko, engari mēnā he raruraru me haere koe ki te pēke, ā, i te monokia, ehara tēnei i te tino ngāwari. "Me whakarongo ngā pēke ki te nuinga o ā rātou kiritaki i taua rohe me te whakarato i a rātou, ehara i te mea i mahia. Ko te nuinga o ngā pēke i konei i tino whakamahia, ā, me tūtira koe i ngā wā katoa. Me pēhea te pānga tiritiri pēke? E mōhio ana ahau he peka pūkoro tā NatWest, engari kāore i pānuitia i te paetata. "He iti iho te rahi o te poutāpeta i te Co-op. Ko te tikanga, kāore e taea e ngā pakeke me ngā tāngata hauā rānei te tatari roa me te kore wāhi noho i waenganui i te toa." "I tangohia te mīhini moni i te pakitara, a, i pereki i te rā i katia ai te pēke" He kaipūkaha mātāmua a Keith Dunderland i te hapori pāmu o Cerrigydrudion i Conwy, Wales. "Kua katia e HSBC to mātau peka i te kāinga e noho ana ahau i te taiwhenua o Wales. I tangohia te mīhini moni i te pakitara, a, i te rā i katia ai te pēke. "He tere aunui parakore tā mātou, 2Mbps mēnā he waimarie koe, ā, kua korerotia mā tētahi reta kiritaki kia whakamahi i te ipurangi mō te pēke. " Koia tērā, ka haere rānei ki tētahi haerenga huri noa e 25 maero ki te whakamahi i te mīhini moni i te peka tata rawa. Kāore ā mātou tohu pūkoro kei hea mātou. "He maha ngā tāngata tawhito me ngā tāngata mōnehu i konei, ko taua whakatupuranga, he āhua whakawhirinaki ki te whai pūnaha pēke i runga i tētahi rorohiko. Ā, ka whakawāteatia rātau e te utu o te whakahaere rorohiko i runga i te moni iti noa iho hei mahi i a rātau pēke. "Ināianei he mīhini moni tā mātou mai i HSBC i te pakitara o tētahi wharekai i te taha o te huarahi i tētahi wāhi mōrearea i tērā taha o tētahi huarahi matua matua. " I te nuinga o te wā ka pau te moni i te wā e whakamahia ana e ngā manuhiri me ngā tangata whenua. Ko te wā whakamutunga i pau, kotahi wiki i mua i te taenga mai o te vani haumarutanga ki te whakakī! Ehara tēnei i te takanga tūhāhā. "Pēnei i te aunui ā-taiwhenua, ko ngā ratonga katoa i ngā wāhi tawhiti puta noa i te UK ināianei kei te wāhi iti rawa kāore he pūtea penapena me te mōhiotanga ki te āhuatanga whānui e tīari ana ināianei mō ō mātou hapori."

title: E whakatūpato ana a Bevan Foundation mō te 'aukati tuihono' i Wales
summary: Kotahi i roto i te toru tāngata i Wales ka hapa pea i te wā e tuihono ana ngā ratonga tūmatanui, kua kī tētahi pūrongo.
text: Ko ngā tāngata kāore he āheitanga ipurangi kua hapa kē i ngā taonga me ngā ratonga māmā ake, ā, ka mōrearea te aukatia i ngā ratonga tūmatanui nui, e kī ana te kura whakaaro o te Bevan Foundation. I kī te tumuaki o Wikitōria Winckler: "Kaua tētahi tangata e aukatia nā te mea kāore e taea te whakamahi i te ipurangi." I kī te kāwanatanga o Welsh e "āwhina ana ki te tukituki i ngā ārai". I titiro te rangahau ki ngā ratonga tūmatanui e wātea tuihono kē ana, ā, i kitea he tokomaha kāore i te rata ki te kaiwhakamahi. I kitea hoki, ahakoa he torutoru noa iho ngā ratonga e tukuna ana i runga i te ipurangi, pēnei i te tāke aromatawai whaiaro e te Moni Hua me ngā Tikanga o Tōna Nui me te raihana taraiwa me te tāke huarahi waka e te Atekōkiri me te Raihana Waka Waka, tērā tētahi neke ki te whakamōhio atu i ētahi atu ratonga i ngā tau tata nei. 'Mamati mā te taunoa' "E kī ana te kāwanatanga o UK me 'mamati taunoa' ngā ratonga tūmatanui - kei te pēhi kē ki mua me ngā mahere kia tuihono i ngā kerēme takuhe hōu i roto i te rua tau," te kī a Ms Winckler. "Kei te hōpara hoki te kāwanatanga o Welsh me pēhea te tuihono i ngā ratonga tūmatanui. Tērā tētahi raruraru tūturu nā te mea ko ngā tāngata e tino whakawhirinaki ana ki ngā ratonga tūmatanui te iti rawa o te whakamahi i te ipurangi." I kī a Iwan Rhys Roberts, o Age Cymru: "He nui ake ngā mea e hiahiatia ana kia āhei ai ngā pakeke ki te uru me te whakamahi i te hangarau i te mea ka taea te tuku i tētahi tomokanga nui ki ngā mōhiohio me ngā tohutohu mō rātou." I kitea e ngā kairangahau e tata ana ki te 200 ngā rorohiko e wātea ana mō te kore utu i ngā whare pukapuka tūmatanui i te takiwā o Caerphilly, engari he whāititanga kei runga i te whaitake, pēnei i te āheitanga kāore i te wātea i waho o ngā hāora tūwhera whare pukapuka me te ārai i ētahi paetukutuku. I karangatia e Ms Winckler, nāna i tuhi tahi te pūrongo, he paerewa Welsh mō ngā ratonga. "Me āta whakaaro ngā ratonga tuihono me te whakamātau ki ngā kaiwhakamahi kia tino mōhio ai rātou e mahi ana, e whakamahi ana i te reo noa, ā, he ngāwari hoki te whakatere," tana kī. I whakamutua e te pūrongo me pai ake te āheitanga tūmatanui ki te ipurangi, me te tautoko me te whakangungu ki te whakamahi rorohiko. I tāpiritia e hiahiatia ana ngā kaiārahi kaha hei whakahaere i te tukunga o ngā ratonga tūmatanui tuihono i te wā kotahi me te whakarite kāore ngā tāngata e aukatia i a rātou, ā, he tino kounga ngā ratonga tuihono. "He nui ngā mea e haere ana, engari kāore i te tino pā ki te tohu i ngā wā katoa," te kī a Ms Winckler. "Ki te kore e taea e te tangata te tae ki tētahi puna, ka whakawāteatia rānei rātou e te āhua o te whakaakona, kāore rātou e mahi i te hipanga ki te whakamahi i ngā ratonga mamati". I kī tētahi kaikōrero kāwanatanga o Welsh: "E whakahuahua ana tā mātou anga whakauru mamati i tā mātou whāinga ki te āwhina ki te tukituki i ngā ārai mō te hunga e aukatia ā-mamati ana i Weera, ā, e takoto ana i te ngākau o tā mātou huarahi katoa ki te whakarite i ngā painga o te Uēra mamati e te katoa."

title: Ka tautohetohe a TE AO kia honoa te utu raihana ki te utunga moni
summary: Kua tūtohutia e tētahi pūrongo he pēhea te pūtea o te AO kia tautohetohe kia herea te utu raihana ki te utunga moni mai i te 2020, kaua ko te whakatio o nāianei.
text: I whakaritea e te AO te pūrongo "rangi kikorangi" hei tūhura i ngā kōwhiringa pūtea ā muri ake, e whakaatu ana i ngā tirohanga mai i tētahi pae o ngā kaitohutohu takitahi, ngā tohunga pāpāho me ngā mātauranga. I tūtohutia hoki kia pai ake te whakamahi i ngā moni arumoni hei whakarewa moni. I whakakāhore te AO i ngā kerēme i tāruatia e ia te whakaurunga o tētahi ratonga ohaurunga. "E tūtohu ana te pūrongo kia whai te AO i tētahi utu raihana utunga nui ake me te moni arumoni nui ake. Kāore he tauira ohaurunga e taunakitia ana," te kī a te kaporeihana. E whai ana i tētahi pūrongo i roto i te The Sunday Times e kī ana e karanga ana te AO kia tangohia te utu raihana. Kua whakatio te utu o nāianei i te £145.50 mai i te tau 2010. Kua whakaritea hei whakahōu i te mutunga o te tau 2016, ā, ka tīmata ētahi whakaritenga huatau i tēnei tau. Heoi anō, i titiro te pūrongo a te AO ki ngā whakaaro mō te pūtea mai i te tau 2020. I taunakitia hoki e tētahi putanga hukihuki kia whakaarohia e te AO te putanga mai i te rangatiratanga tūmatanui, ā, ka noho tahi, nā ōna kaiwhakamahi, mēnā ka whakatauria e te kāwanatanga te utunga moni mō te utu raihana. Nō nā tata nei i tautāwhi ai te Tumuaki Tianara o Tony Hall i te utu raihana, e hua ana me whakaroa atu ki te whakauru i ngā tāngata e mātakitaki ana i ngā hōtaka mā te ratonga iPlayer. "He wāhi mō te whakahōutanga kia pā ai te utu ki te whakapaunga o ngā hōtaka pouaka whakaata o TE AO, ahakoa e noho ana i TE KOTAHI, i te tono rānei mā te iPlayer," te kī a Lord Hall ki tētahi hui pāpāho i Oxford i tērā marama. I tērā wiki ka whakaūngia e ia ka nekehia a TE Toru ki te iPlayer i te ngahuru o te tau 2015, me tana pūtea i rītahatia mai i te £85m ki te £25m. Ka whiwhi te whakaari o TE KOTAHI i tētahi whakarewa £30m mai i te katinga, i roto i tētahi nekehanga e "tika ana, ā-pūtea hoki", te kī a te tumuaki ahuwhānui. I kī te kaiwhakahaere o te pouaka whakaata o te HAU, a Danny Cohen, kāore anō kia mōhiotia te wā heke mai o TE Whā o TE WĀ. "Kāore e taea e mātou te tuku tonu i taua mea me te iti iho o te moni. Mēnā ka puta mai te pūtea ā muri ake mō te AO i raro i te tuma, ko te tūponotanga me nui ake ngā ratonga i runga i te ara kotahi," tana kī. Ināianei kei te whakaaro nga minita ki ngā kaupapa kia kaua e utu i te raihana pouaka whakaata hei hara tūmatanui, ehara i te hara hara. I kī te Hēkeretari Ahurea a Maria Miller ko te kaupapa, i pūruatia e neke atu i te 100 ngā MP, me noho hei wāhanga o ngā kōrero e karapoti ana i te whakahōutanga o te tāke o TE AO i te tau 2016. I te tau 2012 e 180,000 ngā tāngata i whiua mo te kore utu i to rātau raihana, neke atu i te kotahi i roto i te 10 o ngā mahi hara i taua tau.

title: E 600 i hinga te inu Kirihimete me ngā whakamātautau puku rongoā
summary: Neke atu i te 500 ngā atekōkiri i rahua ngā whakamātautau inu i roto i te whakahāwea o te Kirihimete, kua whakaaturia mai e ngā ope pirihimana o Welsh.
text: I takina hoki ngā atekōkiri mō ngā rongoā i te wā o te whakahau whakangahau i muri i te huringa ki te ture i tērā kōanga - e tata ana ki te 100 anō ngā hopunga. Tata ki te 23,000 ngā kaitaraiwa i hāhā i te wā o Hakihea. I whakaaturia hoki e ngā Pirihimana o Uēra ki te Raki i whakamātauria matapōkeretia ōna ake āpiha mō te inu me ngā rongoā, ā, ka hoki tōraro ngā whakamātautau katoa. I whakaaturia e nga Pirihimana o Uēra ki te Raki ko tana atekōkiri inu pōtiki he 16 tau te pakeke i tūtuki i tētahi moped i Mochdre, i Conwy. I whakapūketetia hoki e te tōpana tētahi o ngā pānuitanga teitei rawa atu i te tepe - he tangata 44 tau mai i Para, i Gwynedd, e tata ana ki te whā ngā wā i runga i te tepenga ā-ture o te 35 moroiti waipiro mō ia 100 mirirīta manawa. I tautāwhi hoki ngā āpiha matua i te whakataunga kia whakamātauria ōna ake kaimahi. "I hiahia mātou ki te whakaatu ki te iwi whānui kei te titiro whakaroto hoki mātou i roto i tā mātou huarahi ārai, ā, he pai ki te kite i ngā whakamātautau katoa i hoki tōraro," te kī a Ch Insp Darren Wareing.

title: E huatau ana te poipoi 'Plebgate' i te tou i roto i te whakawhirinaki pirihimana
summary: Kotahi i roto i ngā tāngata e whā e kī ana he "iti iho" te whakawhirinaki ki ngā pirihimana i te oho o "Plebgate", i kitea he poipoi mō te HAU.
text: Ahakoa ngā whakapae i teka ngā āpiha ki te tukituki i te minita kāpata o Andrew Mitchell, i kitea e te uiuinga ComRes o ngā tāngata e 1,000 e 82% e whakapono tonu ana ki ngā kōrero a nga pirihimana. Kua whakakāhore a Tēnā Doketa i te karanga i ngā pirihimana "plebs" i waho o Downing Street. Kua whakapārewa nga āpiha o te uniana pirihimana i tōna wātūtanga mo te "whakawā rawakore" mo te take. I puta mai te whakapae i muri i te putanga mai o tētahi tuhinga o tētahi hui i haere tahi ai rātau me Tēnā Doketa, te wepu matua o te kāwanatanga i taua wā. Kua kī te Komihana Amuamu Pirihimana Motuhake i whakahē nga āpiha i a ia i tētahi hui pānui i muri i te hui, i karangatia e te minita ki te whakakore i te haupae ki nga pirihimana. I pātai mai te poipoi a te AO he pēhea te pānga o te take ki te "whakaaro" o te iwi ki nga pirihimana. Ahakoa e 67% i kī "kāore he rerekētanga", 26% i urupare kua "iti iho" rānei, "iti iho" rānei ki te whakawhirinaki ki ngā pirihimana. Ko te 5% anake i kī kua whakanuia e te take to rātau whakawhirinaki ki nga pirihimana. E kī ana te poipoi kei te tiketike tonu te whakawhirinaki tūmatanui, me te 82% e kī ana he "tino tūpono", he "tino tūpono" rānei ki te whakapono ki ngā āpiha e kōrero ana i runga i te pouaka whakaata, i ngā tiriti rānei i a rātou e mahi ana. Engari i kitea e 40% i whakaae ki te kōrero: "I te nuinga o te wā, te āhua nei e ngana ana nga pirihimana ki te huna i te hē a te hunga i roto i ōna rārangi." A, i te rohe o Te Hauauru o Tēnā Doketa, i Pākehā hoki, i waenganui hoki i ngā kaimahi ā-ringa pūkenga, he iti iho te whakawhirinaki katoa, ā, kotahi i roto i te rima e kī ana kāore rātau e whakapono ki ngā kōrero a ngā āpiha. 'Baying for blood' Ko ngā āpiha tokotoru i whakapaea e te IPCC i ngana ki te whakawātea i a Tēnā Doketa, ka puta ki mua i ngā MP i runga i te Komiti Tīpako o te Take Kāinga whai mana i te Rā te Wenerei. Ko te kaitirotiro nāna i uiui nga kōrero i whakaputaina e nga āpiha i muri i te hui, kua karangatia hoki kia puta. Engari ko te Komihana Pirihimana me te Komihana Hara mō tētahi o ngā ope e pā ana ki ngā hoa o te minita o mua o te "pēke toto" mo taua take. I kī a Warwickshire PCC Ron Ball me whakaae a Tēnā Doketa me ana kaitautoko ki te whakapae a te Tōpūtanga Pirihimana. Kua kī a Rawiri Davis me "anga atu ngā āpiha ki ngā hua" o tāna i whakaahua ai ko tā rātou "hē tika".

title: Ka tīmata te 'rākau Kirihimete' i te taupatupatu tuihono mura o Salisbury poppy
summary: He mahi toi i tētahi pokapū hokohoko o Salisbury e tohu ana i te rau tau o te Pakanga Tuatahi o te Ao, kua whakaoho i tētahi tauhohenga kaha i runga i te ipurangi.
text: Kua whakahētia te rākau whero i hangaia ki te poppies i roto i te tini o ngā whakairinga pāpāho pāpori he iti noa iho, ā, kua tāruatia e ētahi atu. I kī te kaiwhakahaere o te pokapū hokohoko, a Jon Osgood, kua whiwhi urupare pai te mahi. Kua pātai ētahi o ngā tākupu tuihono mēnā he ngana te mahi toi ki te whāranu i te Rātapu Whakamaharatanga ki te Kirihimete. I whakaahuatia e tētahi tweet te rākau whero he rerekē, e kī ana: "Kirihimete me te Rātapu Whakamaharatanga, i te mutunga i roto i tētahi mōkī rerekē." I whakaahuatia e tētahi atu tākupu he "kore reka", i te wā i kī tētahi atu tweet he "whakahāwea". Engari i kī te Royal British Legion e "whakamanamana ana ki ngā tangata katoa, tae atu ki ngā toa, ngā pāparapara me ētahi atu hinonga arumoni, e kōwhiri ana ki te whakaatu i tā rātou tautoko mō te Hapori Ope Taua". Mr Osgood, from the Old George Mall, said the giant poppy tree formed part of the Remembrance Day activities taking place across the city over the coming weeks. I kī a ia: "He tino pai ngā tauhohenga ki te rākau puta noa i ā mātou pūhara pāpāho pāpori me ngā urupare mai i ngā kaimahi." He pai ake ētahi atu kaiwhakamahi Twitter, e kī ana he "whakamīharo" me te "whakapataritari whakaaro" te whakaaturanga.

title: Ka takaware te whakatuwheratanga o te taiwhanga hapori o York
summary: Kua takaware te whakatuwheratanga o tētahi taiwhanga hapori hou kia tiria e ngā karapu whutupōro me te rōpū whutupōro o York.
text: I whakaritea te whakatuwheratanga mō te tau 2014, engari i kī te Kaunihera o te Taone o York kāore i te mōhio āhea rite ai te papa tākaro. I whakaaetia te taiwhanga tākaro me te whanaketanga hokohoko i te taha o York, i Monks Cross, e nga kaikaunihera o te taone i te tau 2012. Kua whakapaetia te whakatuwheratanga takaware i te kitenga o ngā newts nui i te pae me ngā takaware tiki. He maha ngā marama i takawaretia ai te mahi i tētahi whanaketanga hokohoko e £90 miriona i te pae, i muri i te kitenga o ngā newts. I tonoa te kaunihera e TE Rongokōrero o TE Rongokōrero ki te whakamārama i te takaware o te papa tākaro, engari kāore i urupare i te wā o te tānga. I kī te kaikaunihera o Īna Gillies, te kaiārahi Rangatira o York, he "hē" te mahere pakihi a te kaunihera, ā, he "iti iho i te mahi ngaio". The council had "been seeing the end product without due consideration to how it's going to be achieved", he added. I kī a Tēnā Gillies "kāore he take mō ngā newts ki te whakaroa". Kāore e taea te tīmata te mahi i te taiwhanga tākaro hōu e 6,000 tūru kia whakawāteatia rā anō te taiwhanga tākaro o Huntington, te kāinga o ngā Kōroa o York City, ā, ka ūkuia te pae. Kua kī atu te kaunihera ki te karapu whutupōro kia takatū mō tētahi atu wā e tākaro ana i tōna whenua o nāianei. Ko te kaupapa taketake kia whakawātea te tīma i te taiwhanga tākaro o Huntington i te mutunga o te wā 2013 i te wā o Mahuru. Nō reira kāore e tīmata te mahi i te papa tākaro hou tae noa ki Mahuru 2014 i te wā tata nei.

title: Te heitara o Petrobras: I hopukina ngā rangatira hanganga matua i Paratira
summary: Tokorua nga kaipāngai o Pārihia kua hopukina hei wāhanga o tētahi tūhuratanga nui ki te hāmate i te matua hinu o te kāwanatanga, o Petrobras.
text: Ko Marcelo Odebrecht te upoko o te rōpū Odebrecht - te rōpū hanganga nui rawa o Amerika Rātini. I herea hoki a Otavio Azevedo, te rangatira o Andrade Gutierrez, tētahi atu kamupene hanga matua. E whakapae ana ngā kaihoko i utua e ngā kamupene ngā mana hāmate kia whiwhi ai i ngā kirimana Petrobras whai hua. Na te heitara i tūtuki te Rōpū Kaimahi whakahaere o Parīhi, me ngā kaipōrangapū matua e whakapaea ana he utu whakapati. Engari ko Perehitini Dilma Rousseff, nāna i tūtaki a Petrobras i te nuinga o te hāmate e whakapono ana kua puta, kua whakawāteatia i te whakaurutanga. Tātaritanga: Ko Daniel Gallas, BBC South America Business Correspondent Odebrecht tētahi o ngā whare hanganga tino angitu o Parīhi - he nui te aroaro i ngā whenua pēnei i Angola me Mozambique. I waenganui i ana mahi maha ko te taiwhanga tākaro o Sao Paulo i whakamahia i te whakatuwheratanga o te Kapu o te Ao o tērā tau. I tērā marama tonu ka whakapehapeha tōna perehitini i te mea kāore tana kamupene i whakapāngia ki ngā tūhuratanga whānui ki Petrobras. Engari i tēnei rā kei raro a Marcelo Odebrecht i te tiakitanga pirihimana. Ahakoa i mua i te heitara o Petrobras, i whakapaea a Odebrecht e nga kaiwhakawāwā e whai hua ana i te whanaungatanga tata ki te kāwanatanga o Pārihia. Na te whakapae i ārahi ai te pēke pūtea penapena a Parīhi, o BNDES ki te whakaatu i ngā taipitopito o te nui o ngā moni i tukuna e ia ki a Odebrecht hei hanga kaupapa hanganga i Cuba me Angola. Ināianei kei waenganui a Odebrecht i te heitara hāmate tino utu nui o Parīhi. I whakaingoatia a Odebrecht e ngā kaiwhakahaere o Petrobras o mua hei tētahi o ngā kamupene i utu utu whakapati hei whakawhiti kirimana ki te umanga hinu, engari tae noa mai ki tēnei wā kāore anō kia ūkuia e ngā kaihopu. I kī a Odebrecht i roto i tētahi kōrero (i te reo Potukara) kua whakaekea ōna tari, ā, kua hopukina, engari i karangatia he "koretake" i a ia e mahi tahi ana me ngā mana. I kī hoki a Andrade Gutierrez e mahi tahi ana, e ai ki te kōrero rongokōrero o Kōrero, engari kāore he hononga ki te tūhuratanga ki a Petrobras. I te pānuitanga o ngā hopunga, ka kī tētahi kōrero pirihimana i tukuna e te mahi he "karere mārama" kāore tētahi tangata e mawhiti i to rātau aroaro, ahakoa te nui o rātau. Ko ngā pūtea penapena a Petrobras anake e tohu ana i te 2% o ngā hua ā-motu nui o Parīhi, ā, kua tūkinotia e tōna hinganga te āhua o te āhua o te motu nā te iti o ngā utu taonga. Neke atu i te $16bn (£10bn) te utu o te heitara hāmate, tae atu ki te $2bn (£1.2bn) i haere hāngai ki ngā kaiwhakahaere me ngā kamupene hāmate.

title: Disability sport day gives children chance to try equipment
summary: Hundreds of children attended a two-day event that gave them the chance to try 25 different disability sports.
text: Neke atu i te 600 ngā rangatahi i puta mai, tae atu ki te hunga hauātanga ā-tinana, ngā uauatanga akoranga, me ētahi kāore he hauātanga. Ka taea e ngā taputapu utu nui pēnei i ngā tūru hākinakina te utu nui o ngā mahi whakangahau ā-tinana mō ngā kaitākaro. I kī te rangatira matua o Disability Sport Wales, a Fiona Reid, ko ngā wā pēnei he wā hei whakamātau i mua i tō hoko. Ms Reid said: "Days like today, and we have 13 of these events across Wales, are prime opportunities for young people to come down and try the very different types of chairs that are available. " Mai i ngā tūru hākinakina ki ngā tūru whutupōro motuhake, ērā atu mea. "Kia taea ai e rātou te whakamātau i ngā mea e hiahia ana pea rātou ki te mahi me te kore e waewae i te utu o te hoko tūru i taua wāhanga." I te tupu te tākaro hauātanga, ka kī a ia. "I tēnei tau kua hipa e 1.95 miriona ngā wāhi whai wāhitanga, ā, kei te tipu haere ia tau," te kī a Ms Reid. "I te tau i mua i tērā e 1,75 miriona. I ia tau e tūmanako ana mātou kia kite i tētahi mānia, ia tau ka kite mātou i te tipu." E toru nga wā e makaia ana e te kaitākaro Paralympic a Nathan Stephens te tao, a, ka tākaro hoki i te hōkī. "I whiwhi pūtea ahau mōku anō," tana kī. "Ka aroha, nā te moni me te pūtea i roto i te tākaro, koia tērā me mahi e ngā kaitākaro Paralympic. "He tūru tūruhi, he tāpare maka, he tao - he nui te utu o ngā taputapu katoa, ā, me anga ia kaitākaro ki te haere kotahi." Na te pāohotanga o nga Pararaiha i āwhina, tana kī. "E tūmanako ana, mā tēnā ka puta mai he tautoko tāpiri me ētahi atu pūtea mō ngā kaitākaro."

title: E pūrongo ana a Bombardier e 57% te pikinga o ngā hua
summary: Ko Bombardier, te kaiwhakanao tereina me te waka rererangi i waenganui i te haupae hokohoko i waenganui i a Mātau, te UK me Kānata, kua kite i te 57% te pikinga o ngā hua.
text: Nā Jamie RobertsonKaipānui pakihi, i whakawehi te tari Tauhokohoko o Amerika ki te uta i ngā utu 292% ki runga i tana rererangi C-Series e whakamahi ana i ētahi kaimahi e 4,000 i Belfast. Engari i whakakāhoretia e te Komihana Tauhokohoko Ao Whānui o Amerika (ITC) te amuamu i mahia e Tākaro. Ināianei, e kī ana a Bombardier kei te neke "ki tētahi huringa tipu kaha". Ko ngā whiwhinga a Bombardier i mua i te huamoni me te tāke mō te katoa o tērā tau i piki mai i te $427m (£304m) ki te $672m, i aia e te pikinga o ngā hoko me ngā hua i tōna wehenga rēra. I hinga nga ngaronga i tana wehenga rererangi arumoni mai i te $417m ki te $377m me nga hua i tana wehenga rererangi pakihi i piki 13%. Neke atu i te rererangi... E kīia ana e Bombardier ko "te kaiwhakanao matua o te ao o ngā rererangi me ngā tereina", engari he pono anake tēnei kōrero nā tōna mana i te ao o ngā pūnaha tereina. Ka noho tonu he minnow i tua atu i a Airbus me Boeing mo nga hokonga rererangi. Ko tōna wehenga Waka te nui rawa o ngā mahi a te rōpū, e huri ana i te $8.5bn i tērā tau. Mā tērā e rua te rahi o te moni hua o tana wehenga Rererangi Pakihi, ā, tata ki te whā ngā wā te rahi o tana umanga Rererangi Arumoni, arā ko ngā rererangi C-Series. Kei roto i ōna kirimana kōtaha tiketike: I amuamu tuatahitia e te kaihanga rererangi o Amerika, kua hokona te C-Series ki te waka rererangi o Amerika Delta i "ngā utu iti rawa", nā ngā moni tika ki a Bombardier mai i ngā kāwanatanga o Ingarangi me Kānata. Ko te kamupene te kaitukumahi nui rawa o Aiarangi ki te Raki. Nā te pūtea penapena taumaha i roto i te C-Series i pana kē a Bombardier ki te tapa o te pokapū i te tau 2015, ā, ko te tuma o ngā utu tērā pea ka pana ki runga i te tapa. I muri i te amuamu taketake, ka hokona e te kaihanga rererangi o Ūropi tētahi tūnga 51% i roto i te kaupapa C-Series mō te $1 noa iho, ā, ka whakaae a Bombardier ki te whakatatū i tētahi raina whakaminenga whakamutunga ki Mobile, Alabama. Ko te whakahaere i te whakahaere ITC, i pānuitia i te Hānuere, i whakaputaina i te Tāite. E kī ana kāore ngā pūkaha C-Series a Bombardier i whakahaua e Delta i whakataetae ki tētahi o ngā waka rererangi a Hēne, ā, kāore te hoko i puta mai i te utu a Delta. "Kāore i ngaro i a Hēneti ngā hoko, i ngā moni hua rānei," te kī a te ITC i roto i tana whakahaere whārangi 194. Kei waenganui hoki a Bombardier i tētahi mahere whakarerekē e rima tau. I kī te rangatira nui o Alain Bellemare: "He tau kaurori te 2018 mō Bombardier. Kei te neke atu mātou i tā mātou huringa pūtea penapena, ki tētahi huringa tipu kaha." "Nā tēnei mahinga mārō, ka tīmata mātou i te 2018 i runga i te āwhina nui. Kei te tino nekeneke ta mātau huringa mahi."

title: Īnia rāua ko Pakitāne i te tautohetohe taitapa o Kahamiri
summary: Kua tū nga hōia Īnia me Hōia i te taha o te Raina Mana i te rohe o Kahamikia i tautohetohetia.
text: I kī a Pakitāne kua whakaekea e nga hōia Īnia tētahi pou hōia i te wāhanga o Kahamikia i whakahaeretia e Hōia, a, ka patua he hōia, a, ka whara i tētahi atu. I kī tētahi kaihautū taua Īnia kua urupare ki tētahi "tūkinotanga whakawhitiwhiti" engari kāore i whakawhiti i te Raina Mana. E kīia ana a Kahamiri e ngā iwi e rua, ā, neke atu i te 60 tau te wāhi kōhiko i waenganui i a rāua. Ehara i te mea rerekē ngā whakawhitinga, engari āhua kore nei e puta he mate. 'Ngā ringa iti' i kī te hōia o Hōia i roto i tētahi kōrero kua "whakaekea ā-tinana e ngā hōia Īnia tētahi pou taki ko Sawan Patra te ingoa". Kai te tonga tonu o te huarahi matua mai i Muzaffarabad i Kahamiri e whakahaeretia ana e Pakitāne ki Sinagar i Kahamiri e whakahaeretia ana e Īnia. "I pai te urupare a nga hōia taua o Pakitāne ki te whakaeke," te kī a te kōrero a Hōia, kātahi anō ka mahue i nga hōia Īnia nga rākau i a rātau e hoki ana. I patua tētahi hōia hōia, a, i tino whara tētahi atu, e kī ana. I kī atu te kaiwhakaatu o te ope taua o Īnia, a Kānata Dahiya ki te kōrero rongokōrero o Kōrero ki a Kōrero, kua urupare ki tētahi "tūkinotanga whakawhitiwhiti" a Pakitāne. I tāpiri mai a ia: "Kāore tētahi o a mātau hōia i whakawhiti i te Raina Mana. Kaore o mātau tūpāpaku, whara rānei." I kī atu tētahi atu kōrero o te ope taua Īnia, a Col Brijesh Pandey, ki a Associated Press kua "tīmataria e ngā hōia" me ngā anga moata me ngā rākau aunoa i ngā pou hōia o Īnia. Kotahi te kāinga tūmatanui i ngaro, tana kī. "I whakautua e mātau mā te whakamahi i ngā ringa iti anake. E whakapono ana mātau he mārama tonu te whakamātau i a rātau ki te whakangāwari i te hū mai o nga kaiwhakawhanake," te kī a Col Pandey. Mai i te mutunga o te tau 2003, tērā te whakaruruhau i Kahamiri. I whakatārewatia e Īnia tētahi tukanga rangimārie ki Pakitāne i muri i ngā whakaekenga a nga kaiwhakawhanake o Pakitāne i Pīhīhī i te tau 2008. I tīmata anō ngā whakaritenga i te wā o Hui tanguru i tērā tau. I tērā marama, i hainatia e nga iwi he whakaaetanga hei whakangāwari i ngā rāhuitanga visa mo te haere mō ētahi tangata whenua.

title: Banksy protest artwork unveiled in New York
summary: Kua whakaaturia e te kaiwaiata tautohetohe o Banksy tētahi mahi toi 20m teitei i Niu Ioka kia aro atu ai ki te hereheretanga o Zehra Dogan, he kaipeita Kurīhi mai i Tākehi.
text: Ko tana whakaahua i muri i ngā tūru e whakaatu ana i te pae whakamutunga hei penerākau, ā, i te taha o te pakitara he karanga mo tōna tukunga. I hereheretia a Dogan mo te rua tau me te iwa marama i tērā tau i Tākehi, mo tana peita i te taone o Kurīhi o Nusaybin. Ko tana pikitia, i tāruatia mai i tētahi whakaahua nūpepa, i whakaatu i te taone i whakahekea ki te ururua i te wā o te papā. I mauria te whakaahua e nga ope kāwanatanga i te wāhi i whawhai ai rātau ki nga kaiwhakawhanake a Kurīhi. He haki tākehi tākehi e tāpaetia ana i runga i nga whare i ngaro. I whakairihia e Dogan tana peita peita wai ki te pāpāho pāpori, ā, i muri iho ka hopukina, ka whiua. Ko te pakitara a Banksy, e miramira ana i tōna tau tuatahi i roto i te tiakitanga, kua peitatia ki runga i te Pātū Bowery hītori i rongonuitia e te kaiwaiata o Keith Haring i te tau 80. I waihangatia te atahanga me tētahi atu rehetoi, e mōhiotia ana ko Borf, kua noho i te whare herehere mo tana tuhituhi. Kāore anō a Dogan kia rongo mō te pakitara, e ai ki te kaipānui a Banksy. E kiia ana te rehetoi herehere e tiritiri ana i tētahi pūtau ki ngā hoa e 40, e whiwhi ana i ngā toronga auau anake. I te ahiahi o te 15 o Poutūterangi i whakaaturia ai tētahi whakaahua o tana peita ki runga ake i te mahi toi. Whāia mātou i Facebook, i Twitter @BBCNewsEnts, i Instagram rānei i bbcnewsents. Mēnā he huatau pūrākau tāu, īmēra entertainment.news@bbc.co.uk.

title: Mōrearea o Venezuela: Ka rere te Koromatua o Caracas, o Te Koromatua o Te Whenua
summary: Kua mawhiti te rangatira o Caracas i tana hopunga whare mo te wā roa i Venezuela, e rere ana i tua o te rohe ki Koropia, kātahi ki Paniora.
text: Mai i te tōmua o te tau 2015, i herea a Te Rūnanga o Te Wā He hoariri kōrero te pakeke e 62 tau ki a Perehitini Nicolás Maduro, kua tapaina e te US he kaiwhakahauhau. I whakaūngia e Kōpia a Tēnā Ledezma i tomo ki te whenua i te Paraire. I muri iho ka rere a ia ki Paniora, i reira ka tūtaki tōna whānau ki a ia. I kī atu a ia ki nga kaipūrongo ka mahi a ia i te manene ki te whakaū i te tukunga o nga herehere tōrangapū. "Kaua tātou e whakaae kia mate a Venezuela i roto i o tātau ringa," tana kī. Kāore i te mārama me pēhea a ia i mawhiti ai, a, ka tae atu ki te rohe kāore i kitea. I kī te nūpepa El Nacional o Venezuela kua mahue hoki i tōna whānau a Venezuela. Kua whakaekea e nga kaiwhakahaere haumarutanga tōna kāinga. Ka tūtohu te Perehitini o Kōpia o Mua, o Aotearoa: "Nau mai ki te wāteatanga!" hei urupare ki te rongo. Ka tawai te perehitini o Tūria ki a ia i roto i tētahi pāohotanga pouaka whakaata, e kī ana: "Kei te rere wātea te vampire i te ao." Kātahi anō ka hipa te 1,000 rā o te tautāwhi a Koromatua Ledezma. Tae atu ki te kaiārahi whakahē o Leopoldo López, e noho tonu ana i raro i te hopunga whare, ko Tēnā Ledezma tētahi o ngā hoariri tino rongonui o Perehitini Mārō. E whakapaea ana rātau ki te whakakī i te tutu i te wā o nga whakahēnga a te kāwanatanga i te tau 2014. I hopukina anōtia rāua i a Aotearoa i te oho o ētahi atu whakahē. I taua wā, ka kī te Kōti Matua o te whenua kua whiwhi pūrongo mōhiohio e kī ana rātau e whakaaro ana kia rere i te whenua. Nā tērā i āki te Perehitini o Amerika o Donald Trump ki te whakatūpato i te "mana tāke" mo te mahinga o "ngā herehere tōrangapū". I kī a ia i puritia e te US te perehitini o Tūria "e haepapa ana ki te hauora me te haumarutanga o Tēnā López, a Tēnā Ledezma me ētahi atu i hopukina".

title: Ka tuwhera te piriti Pānui Thames mō ngā kaihīkoi me ngā kaieke paihikara
summary: Kua whakatuwheratia tētahi piriti £5.9m mō ngā kaihīkoi me ngā kaieke paihikara ki te whakawhiti i te Awa o Thames.
text: I tīmata te mahi i runga i te piriti i Whiringahora ki te tuku urunga motuhake mō ngā kaiwhakamahi i waenganui i Caversham me Reading Station me te pokapū o te taone. I whakaritea tuatahitia te piriti 400ft (120m) kia oti i a Hōngongoi. I utua e te Kaunihera o Reading Borough mā te whakamahi i te £20.7m mai i tētahi Pūtea Waka Tautoko Paetata (LSTF), i whakamahia hoki mō tētahi kaupapa utu pahikara me tētahi pāka me te eke. Kua tūtaki te piriti ki tētahi tauhohenga whāranu mai i ētahi rōpū. I pōhiritia e te Pānui Pahikara Campaign, engari i whakahē ki te hoahoa, e karanga ana ki ngā ara motuhake mō ngā kaieke paihikara me ngā kaihīkoi. I kī te rōpū e tūmanako ana kia whakamahia e te tokomaha o ngā kaieke paihikara ka "whakakore i ngā kaihīkoi" me te "noho hei piriti kaieke paihikara". E tono ana hoki te mana ā rohe ki ngā tāngata kia tuku huatau ingoa mō te hanganga hou. Ko ērā i whakamua i tēnei wā, ko De Montfort Bridge, Essex Bridge, Cusden Bridge, de Bohun Bridge, Meadows Bridge, Christchurch Bridge, Fry's Bridge and Riverside Bridge.

title: Helen Mirren: He 'whakamīharo' te haere me te kore whakapaipai'
summary: Kua kī a Dame Helen Mirren he "whakamīharo" mēnā ka nui ake te huatau kia kaua e mau whakapaipai.
text: Nā Whīni McIntoshEntertainment kaipānui i puta mai ai te kaiwhakaari inā noa nei, kaore he whakapae taumaha i te taha o ngā kaiwhakaari tae atu ki a Nīnī Kidman me Lupita Nyong'o mō te Maramataka Pirelli 2017. Ka kī a Dame Helen: "Ki taku whakaaro he tino pai mēnā ka noho hei ahua. " He hurihuri tonu ngā mea, nā reira e whakapae ana ahau kua tae pea mātou ki te waiwai ki te katoa o te mea kiriāhua, ā, tērā pea kei te neke mātou ki tētahi atu ahunga." I tāpiri mai a ia: "He tino pai mēnā kei a tātau, me te kore mārire, nā te mea he pai ki a au te whakapaipai, te whakakākahu, nā reira kāore au e pīrangi ki te noho 'Aue, me haere tātau katoa me te kore whakapaipai'." I uru katoa a Julianne Moore, Rooney Mara me Robin Wright ki a Dame Helen mō ngā whakaahua au naturel i roto i te maramataka Pirelli, i te wā i pānuitia e te kaiwaiata a Alicia Keys tana whakatau kia haere koreutu. Ko te kiriata hou a Dame Helen, ko Collateral Beauty, e kite ana i a ia e purei ana i te "Mate" - e toro ana ki tētahi tangata e pouri ana mo tana tamāhine kātahi anō ka mate. Ko Will Smith, ko Naomie Harris rāua ko Edward Norton hoki e whetū ana i roto i te pikitia, e tukua ana i te wā o te umanga ki te wā whakawhiwhinga. Kotahi tau i muri mai i te tautohetohe "Oscars So White", ka noho ngā whatu katoa ki te wā tohu e tū mai nei kia kite i te nui o ngā mea kua rerekē mai i te whakapōhēhētanga i te kore tautapa iti. I kī atu a Dame Helen ki te HAU: "Ki taku whakaaro kua tino rerekē. E mārama ana kua roa a Will i te aronga o tērā. "Ki taku whakaaro ko te mea kua rerekē ko te whakaaetanga a te hunga whakarongo. Ko te pīkaokao me te hēki, kāore koe i te mōhio ko tēhea e whai ana i tēhea." I tāpiri mai a ia: "He tino uaua ki te wetewete nā te mea mēnā kāore ngā pikitia i hangaia ki ngā kaiārahi pango, ngā tāhuhu pango, ngā pūrākau pango, me pēhea e taea ai te hunga whakarongo mōna? " Engari i tērā taha, i te ao whānui, i ngā wā katoa he momo ātete, ko Will tētahi o ngā whetū torutoru i tino pakaru i tērā. "Engari kua tino rerekē ngā mea, i te ao whānui, ā, nā tēnā ka kite koe i te hurihanga o Karaihe. Ki taku whakaaro ka whakaingoatia taku hoa aroha ko Naomie [Harris] mō tētahi Oscar i tēnei tau, e tino mōhio ana ahau." I tāpiritia e te kaiwhakaari ko tērā atu kiriata hou a Hāhi Moonlight "ka tino aro atu nā te mea he whitiāhua tino pai me te mahi nui i roto". He arotakenga kino kua whiwhi arotakenga kino a Collateral Beauty mai i te tini o nga kaiwhakawāwā. Kotahi te whetū i hoatu e te Kaitiaki me te Telegraph, ā, he 14% te whakatauranga o te pikitia i runga i ngā arotakenga o Rotten Tomatoes. I a ia e kōrero ana ki te Haupae Mua o Te Reo Irirangi 4 o TE Reo Irirangi 4 mō ngā arotakenga, ka kī a Dame Helen: "I mōhio ahau ka pā mai tērā, nā te mea he pōhēhē i te ao pukapuka pukapuka e mīharo ana, ā, ehara tēnei i te pikitia e tākaro ana te pōhēhētanga. " E pā ana ki te pono mo te ora, he pono uaua rawa. I mōhio ahau ki te pānui i te hōtuhi he mahi waea tiketike tēnei, i mōhio ahau ki te mōrearea." Whāia mātou i Facebook, i Twitter @BBCNewsEnts, i Instagram rānei i bbcnewsents. Mēnā he huatau pūrākau tāu, īmēra entertainment.news@bbc.co.uk.

title: Ka whakaekea e nga kaipakihi o Guernsey te pūnaha raihana whare
summary: Kua whakaekea te pūnaha raihana whare o Guernsey e te maha o ngā whika pakihi paetata.
text: He tokomaha ngā kaikōrero i tētahi taupatupatu o te Whare Wānanga o ngā Kaiwhakahaere (IoD) i karangatia kia mutu te pūnaha, e whakahaere ana i te roanga o te wā e noho ai te tangata i Guernsey. I kī a Aotearoa Tautscher, te rangatira nui o Deutsche Bank Guernsey, e whakamōrearea ana te pūnaha i te whakahaerenga o te motu. I kī te Minita Whare Tuarua a Dave Jones e manakohia ana e ia ngā whakaaetanga mahi. I kī a ia: "Ka nui ake te aronga o te haere ki ngā whakaaetanga mahi, ā, kāore i runga anō i ngā rāhuitanga whare." I tukua e ngā Kāwanatanga o Guernsey ki tētahi kaupapa here iwi whānui hou i te Hānuere 2012, ā, kāore anō kia mahia. Ko te tikanga o ngā ture o nāianei me whiwhi raihana whare ngā tāngata kāore i te rohe e hiahia ana ki te noho me te mahi i Guernsey, me whiwhi rānei i tētahi raihana whare, me whakamahi rānei i ngā whare Mākete Tuwhera utu nui ake. I a ia e kōrero ana i te taupatupatu IoD, ka kī a Tēnā Tautscher: "Ko tāku e tino whakaaro ana me arotahi tātau ko te pūmanawa. " E pā ana ki te kawe i ngā pūmanawa ki Guernsey, ā, kāore mātou e kōrero ana mō te tokomaha o ngā tāngata, kei te kōrero mātou mō ngā tangata matua." I kī a ia mā te tono tohunga pūkenga tino pūkenga e āwhina ki te whakarite i te wā heke mai o te whakahaerenga o Guernsey, ā, me āta tirotiro te nekehanga koreutu o te iwi.

title: E whakawhirinaki ana ngā hōhipera o Hertfordshire i ngā tikanga motuhake
summary: Kua tangohia ngā hōhipera o Watford, Hemel Hempstead me St Albans i ngā tikanga motuhake, engari he mahi tonu hei mahi, kua kī tētahi pūrongo hōu.
text: I whakatauria te West Hertfordshire Hospitals NHS Trust "koretake" i te tau 2015, ā, i whakaritea ki ngā tikanga motuhake e te Komihana Kounga Tiaki (CQC). I muri i ngā arotakenga i tērā tau, ka whakatauria hei "hiahia whakapai ake" katoa. I kī te Whakapai NHS kua mahia e ia "ngā whakapainga tautoko". I haere te whakawhirinaki ki ngā tikanga motuhake i muri i te kīanga a te CQC e "māharahara ana ki te haumarutanga me te kounga o te tiakitanga" me te māharahara ki te iti o te ngākau whakangākau kaimahi. Mai i taua wā i tautokona e NHS Improvement hei āwhina i a ia ki te mahi i "ngā whakapainga nui, pūmau hoki ki ngā ratonga tūroro". I kōrero hoki ngā Kaitirotiro 'arotahi pōturi' mō te ārahitanga "kaha, tautoko, kitea hoki" me te kite i "tētahi ahurea tōrunga". I hoatu e te CQC he whakatauranga whakapai ake i Mati 2017, engari i noho tonu ki ngā tikanga motuhake. Nā ngā arotakenga CQC whai muri me tētahi tūtohutanga mai i te kaitirotiro matua o ngā hōhipera, a Ahorangi Ted Baker, i whakatau kia nekehia te whakawhirinaki ki waho o ngā tikanga motuhake. Kei te whakatauria tonutia te tari ohorere o Watford General he "koretake" engari i kī te whakawhirinaki mai i tētahi arotakenga o Aotearoa kua kite i "ngā whakapainga wiki-ki-te-wiki". I kī te rangatira nui o Trust a Katie Fisher he "tino nui te whakapai ake" i roto i te maha o ngā ratonga i whakatauria he pai. "Clearly we're not done, we're on an improvement journey... hei tīma e arotahi ana mātou ki te whakarite ka taea e mātou te tuku i te tiaki tino pai mō ia tūroro," tana kī a Dr Kathy McLean mai i NHS Improvement: "Ka taea e ia kaimahi te whakakake i ēnei huringa. " He nui tonu ngā mahi hei whakarite ko ngā ratonga tūroro te tino pai rawa atu."

title: Akoranga: Ka noho ngā tāone o UK hei wāhi rata waeroa
summary: Ko ngā huringa ki ngā wāhi taone o UK e whakarato ana i ngā wāhi noho mō ngā waeroa, tae atu ki ngā momo e mōhiotia ana ki te hora i te malaria me te huaketo o te Naera ki te Uru, e huatau ana tētahi akoranga.
text: Nā Mark KinverEnvironment, ko ngā pāmahana taiao mahana ake me ētahi atu ipu wai i roto i ngā māra e whakatata ana i ngā waeroa ki ngā tāngata, e kī ana ngā kaipūtaiao. He mate kore mate te waeroa o UK, engari e kī ana te tīma he nui ake ngā ngārara e tāuri ana i ngā wāhi taone, ka nui ake te tūponotanga o te tīmatatanga. Ka puta mai ngā kitenga i Plos One. I whakamāramatia e te kaituhi tahi o Amanda Callaghan, he ahorangi pāhono i te Kura Pūtaiao Koiora o te Whare Wānanga o Reading, ko te akoranga e whai ana ki te kohikohi raraunga kia kite ai mēnā he rerekētanga o te nui me te rerenga kētanga o ngā waeroa i ngā tauwāhi taone, taone hoki. "I mōhio mātou he pānga motu wera taone, ā, kua mōhiotia ngā huringa pāmahana hei whakarerekē i te whanonga waeroa, ā, i ētahi rohe, pērā i Uropi ki te tonga - kua ngokingoki ngā mate ki ēnei whenua nā te mea kua hurihia e te waeroa tō rātou whanonga," tana kī. I roto i ta rātau pepa, ka kitea e Dr Callaghan me te hoa mahi a Susannah Townroe: "I roto i te UK, [ngā pūkaha wai - he ipu mō te wai marangai] kua nui haere te pūnoa i roto i ngā māra noho. " Na te tauraki tino nui me te āraitanga o te ngongo i muri mai i te kōanga o te tau 2012 puta noa i te tonga, ki te rāwhiti hoki o Ingarangi, i puta ai ngā pūrongo o ngā hokonga tino nui o ngā ipu wai," ka tāpiritia e rātau. "Ka kohikohi ngā pūkaha wai i te marangai mai i te kōrere o te tuanui me ngā otaota, ngā otaota kararehe... providing both a habitat and food resource for mosquito larvae." I whakamāramatia e rātau, ahakoa he iti noa iho ngā ipu takitahi, i te whakakotahitanga o ngā ipu wai katoa o taua rohe, e tohu ana i tētahi "wāhi nui o te wāhi noho" mō te tāuri waeroa. I tāpiritia e ngā kaituhi: "Ko tēnei, i roto i te pahekotanga ki te pānga [motu wera taone]... tērā pea ka manako i te whakanao waeroa i ngā wāhi taone." Hei whakamātau i tēnei ariā, ka whakatakotoria e nga kairangahau he ipu wai ki te maha o ngā māra noho taone, ā-taiwhenua hoki. "I kitea e mātau he iti ake ngā momo waeroa i roto i ngā taiao taone i whakaritea ki ngā taiao ā-taiwhenua, engari he nui ake ngā momo i reira," te kī a Dr Callaghan ki a TE Rongokōrero. "Ko te mea tino nui e kiia ana ko Culex pipiens, ā, i ētahi atu whenua ka kawea e C. pipiens ngā mate pēnei i te Huaketo Naera ki te Uru." Ko tērā atu momo waeroa i kitea e ngā kairangahau i roto i ngā ipu wai o te akoranga ko Anopheles plumbeus, kua whakaaturia he "vector malaria tino pai". I kī a Dr Callaghan: "Ko te kitenga matua ko ēnei waeroa kei te taha tonu o ngā whare o te iwi me te waeroa Anopheles i kitea e mātau he momo ngau tangata, ā, ka taea e ia te tuku malaria. " Nō reira, ki te hoki mai tētahi i tō rātou hararei me te malaria, ā, ka ngaua rātou, ka taea te tuku atu ki tētahi atu tangata - koia hoki tō tīmatatanga. "He iti rawa te tūponotanga o te urutā malaria i tēnei whenua i tēnei wā nā te mea kāore anō kia puta he malaria tuarua i konei mai i nga tau kotahi mano e rima tekau mā rua." Ko te malaria tuarua e pā ana ki tētahi tangata e hopu ana i te malaria mai i tētahi atu tangata kua ngaua hoki e te waeroa. "Kāore au i te kī ka whiwhi mate tātau katoa nā te mea he vectors tātau i konei, engari he pai te titiro atu." Neke atu i te 30 ngā momo waeroa rerekē kua whakapūketetia ki te UK, ko te nuinga o ēnei e noho ana puta noa i te tau. "I ngā wāhi tawhiti ka whiwhi koe i ētahi atu momo waeroa - he maha ngā momo wāhi noho me ngā momo waeroa rerekē pēnei i ngā momo wāhi noho rerekē - ka manakohia e ētahi o rātou ngā poka, ko ētahi e manako ana ki ngā hāroto, ki ngā rua rākau rānei," te whakamārama a Dr Callaghan. "Engari ki te haere koe ki tētahi taiao taone, kāore i a koe te nui o aua wāhi noho kia whiwhi ai koe i tētahi pikitia rerekē o ngā momo e ora ana i tēnei taiao. " He waeroa taone rongonui te Culex pipiens, engari ko te Anopheles plumbeus e whakaarohia ana he momo noho rākau. Engari kei te huri i ōna wāhi noho mai i te tāuri i roto i ngā rua rākau ki te tāuri i roto i ngā ipu wai i hangaia e te tangata. "E pā ana tēnei ki te whakaaro he vector malaria tērā." I kī a Dr Callaghan e hia mano ngā kēhi malaria i te UK i ia tau, ko te nuinga o ngā tāngata e hoki mai ana i ngā wāhi o te ao i reira te malaria, engari i te nuinga o te wā ka tere te rongoā. "Mēnā kāore te malaria i roto i ō toto mō tētahi roanga wā, he iti rawa te wā ka ngaua koe me te tuku atu," tana kī. "Engari mēnā he tokomaha atu ngā tāngata e hoki mai ana me te malaria, ā, he nui ake ngā waeroa e āhei ana ki te tuku i te malaria e noho ana i a koe, kātahi ka nui ake taua wā."

title: E tautāwhi ana nga pirihimana o Īnia i nga tautīaki haumarutanga o te moana o Itari
summary: Kua herea e nga pirihimana Īnia e rua nga mema o tētahi tīma haumarutanga o te taua moana o Itari i runga i te tākarotanga kino o nga kaihīika tokorua mai i tētahi taraka hinu Itari.
text: I tū te mahi i te takutai o te tūnga ki te tonga o Kerala i tērā Wenerei. I kī nga kaiwhakahaere Itari kua whakatuki te whanonga o te poti hī ika o Īnia, a, ka waiho nga tākainga whakatūpato. I kī rātau ka whakatuwheratia e rātau he ahi, ka pōhēhētia nga kaihīika mo nga kaihautū. I kī a Īnia he kore rākau nga hī ika. Na te mahi i whakaoho he haupae whakawhanaunga nui i waenganui i nga whenua e rua, me nga pirihimana Īnia e whakatuwhera ana i te uiui kōhuru ki nga mate. Kua whakaahuatia e te Minita Whakangungu Īnia AK Antony te tūpāpaku he "tino nui" me tētahi "mahi whakararuraru". I karangatia te karere Itari i Delhi e te minita ā-rohe i te Rāitema mo te tākaro. Ka noho tonu ngā rerekētanga "Kua mauria e mātau e rua ngā pōhēhētanga ki te whenua. Ka mauria rātau ki te taone o Korama e te tīma whakatūpato, ā, ka hangaia ki tētahi kōti paetata i reira i muri i te whakaotinga o ngā tikanga," te kī a te Kaitirotiro Pirihimana i Kerala K Padmakumar i te ahiahi o te Rātapu. I haere tētahi tīma pirihimana ki te taraka hinu Itari o MV Enrica Lexie, tae atu ki a Giampaolo Cutillo, te consul general Itari i Pīhīhī, a, ka herea nga hōia i muri i te whiwhinga o te haere ki mua i Delhi. I kī nga pirihimana kua pātai rātau ki te kāpene o te oko me ētahi atu tokorima. Kua tohe a Itari kia kore e taea te whakatau i ana kaimahi i raro i te ture Īnia, engari kāore i taea e ngā taha e rua te whakatika i o rātau rerekētanga. Kua taunga te MV Enrica Lexie i te tauranga o Kochi i Kerala. I kī ngā āpiha e haere ana te oko mai i Hōroa ki Ihipa, e 34 nga kaimahi, tae atu ki te 19 ngā Initia. E kī ana nga kaiwhakahaere Īnia e mīharo ana rātau ki te tākaro, e mau ana kāore he mea i mahia e nga kaihīika hai whakawehi i te kaipuke Itari. E kī ana nga Itari i pūhia e nga kaimahi i runga i te wawao i a rātau anō - i muri i te whakairinga i ngā tākainga whakatūpato - nā te mea i wehi rātau kua tata te whakaekea to rātau oko. I kī tētahi mana matua i Kerala, a PG Thomas, he kore tika te whakaekenga i te mea "kāore he rākau i runga i te pukapuka". I kī nga kaiwhakahaere Īnia e iwa o nga kaihīika e 11 i roto i te pukapuka pukapuka e moe ana, a, i te urungi nga tūpāpaku tokorua i te putanga o taua mahi. I muri i te mahinga, ka tukuna e nga kaitiaki taiwhenua o Īnia e rua nga poti me tētahi rererangi ki te haukoti i te kaipuke. Kua whakamanatia e te kāwanatanga o Kerala he utunga e 500,000 rupeea ($10,125; £6,450) ia ki nga whānau o nga kaihīika kua mate. Kua puta mai te tāpaetanga hei tuma nui ki ngā kaipuke kaihokohoko i te Moana Iniani me te Moana Arapi, me ngā kaitiaki o Hūmārie e kahakina ana i ngā kaipuke me a rātau kaimahi hei utu. Engari he iti ake ngā whakaekenga inā noa nei, nā te mea he nui ake ngā tautīaki patu kua horaina ināianei ki runga i ngā kaipuke.

title: Ko Hotonic i roto i te inoi hara whakatika utu a US
summary: Kua whakaae a Hotonic me tōna anake ki te tautohe i te hara ki ngā rangatiratanga motuhake o te whakatika utu, e kī ana te tari ture o Amerika.
text: I whakaae a Panasonic o Tiapanī ki te utu i tētahi whaina hara e $45.8m (£30m) me Sanyo ki te utu i te $10.7m, e kī ana i roto i tētahi kōrero. Ko ētahi atu kamupene i whakaingoatia hoki i roto i te rūpahu haere tonu ko LG Chem o Kōrea ki te Tonga, e utu ana i te whaina $1.1m. E pā ana ngā whakaaro ki ngā wāhanga motokā me ngā pāteri rorohiko pukatuhipoka. "Tae atu ki a Panasonic, e 11 ngā kamupene me ngā kaiwhakahaere 15 kua tautohe, kua whakaae rānei ki te tautohe hara, ā, kua whakaae ki te utu i te tapeke neke atu i te $874m i roto i ngā whaina hara nā te tūhuratanga o ngā wāhanga aunoa," te kī a te tari. I whakapaea a Hotonic ki te whakatika i ngā utu o ngā whakakā mō ngā wīra urungi, ngā tohu huri me ngā wiper matapihi i waenganui i ētahi atu wāhanga motokā i hokona ki Te Mīhini. I tū te whakatika utu i te wā o Mahuru 2003 ki Hui tanguru 2010, ka kī te tari ture. I whakaae hoki a Hotonic ki te tautohe i te hara ki te whakatupu mai i a Hōngongoi 1998 ki Hēpuari 2010 ki te whakatika i ngā utu o ngā pūkenga hiko motokā, he pūrere e whakarite ana i te ngaohiko mō ngā rama motokā, i hokona ki ngā kamupene tae atu ki Te Mīhini o Te Motokā, o Te Mīhini o Te Motokā, o Te Mīhini o Te Motokā. Ko ngā whakaaro ki a Sanyo me LG Chem e pā ana ki ngā pūtau pūhiko katote lithium e whakamahia ana i roto i ngā pōkai pūhiko rorohiko pukatuhipoka.

title: Ko te utu mōkito i tautuhia hei papa riri tōmua
summary: I te whakaurunga o te utu mōkito e Labour i te tau 1999, ka ātetetia e nga Conservatives, ā, ka huatau ka taea te utu i ngā mahi.
text: Nā Iain WatsonPolitical correspondent, BBC News Their position i muri iho ka rerekē, engari ko tētahi rōpū MP Conservative - ko ētahi i te taha matau o te rōpū - e whakapono ana kāore te "tautoko whakarihariha" mō te mehua e pā ana ki te oro tika mō tētahi rōpū e kī ana kei te taha o ngā whānau mahi uaua. Ko ētahi e whakahau ana i te pirimia kia whaikōrero he aha i hē ai tana rōpū kia kaua e whakamōhio atu ki a rātau anō kia "whakamate i tētahi tōraro". E kite ana rātau i ngā whakarara ki te pūrua a Rawiri Karauna mō te NHS, tētahi atu hanganga Mahi, i mua i te pōtitanga whakamutunga. I kī te kaiārahi ātete i taua wā ka taea e ia te whakarāpopoto i ana manakē tōrangapū i roto i ngā reta e toru - N.H.S - kātahi ka ngana ki te tāhae i tētahi hīkoi ki Labour mā te tautohe kia whakanuia te tahua hauora. Ngā hapa o mua e hiahia ana ēnei backbenchers Conservative ki te kite i tētahi huarahi ōrite ki te āwhina i te utu iti - he whaikōrero "ūkui i te ara" e mōhio ana ki ngā hapa o mua, whai muri i te pikinga o te utunga mōkito. Ināianei kei te rangona o rātau reo e ētahi atu whika whai mana. Ko ngā pūtake e tata ana ki te Hēkeretari Mahi me te Hēkeretari Penihana, e huatau ana a Iain Duncan Smith e manakohia ana e ia tētahi pikinga nui - i tētahi wāhanga nā te mea, me te hiahia o te tumuaki ki te mahi penapena oranga anō, ko te nui ake o te utu mōkito, ko te iti iho o ngā whakapaunga mō ngā hua tāke hei whakakī i ngā moni whiwhinga iti. I whakaae te minita pakihi o Mātā Hancock - he kaitohutohu o mua ki a George Osborne - ki te pikinga o te mokatere tauira o raro, ā, tērā pea ka manakohia e ia tētahi pikinga puta noa i te poari ināianei. I kī atu tētahi atu minita e tata ana ki te Tumuaki, a Stuad Javid, ki te AO i te Wenerei ko te utu mōkito "tata ki te 10% te iti iho i ngā tikanga tūturu, e whakaaro ana ahau, i te wāhi i te tau 2008" ā, he "take kaha ki te titiro atu". Ā, kei te tirohia kētia. Arotakea i tērā o Mahuru, ka pātai atu te hēkeretari pakihi a Vince Cable ki te Komihana Utu Iti - e taunaki ana i ngā utu utu mōkito - kia titiro he aha ngā āhuatanga ohaoha e hiahiatia ana mō tētahi pikinga teitei ake i te pūnoa. Ka pūrongo te Kōmihana ki a ia - ki a Rawiri Karauna rāua ko Nick Clegg - i te mutunga o tērā marama. E mōhiotia ana e hiahia ana a Tēnā Taura ki te kite i te pikinga o te utu mōkito i te whakaoranga o te āhua o te whakahaerenga. Heoi anō, kei te whakamāramatia e ngā pūtake e tata ana ki te hēkeretari umanga kāore ōna whakaaro ki te whakaae ki tētahi āwhina o te utunga o te pōti, engari rawa mēnā e taunakitia ana e ngā tohunga, ehara i te mea noa iho e ngā hoa pūkenga. Tērā pea ka whakaae a ia ki ngā mea katoa e tūtohutia ana e te Kōmihana, ā, kāore e whakapono ka ngana te Tumuaki ki te whakahaere i a ia. Ehara tēnā i te kī kāore i taea e ngā Tohutohu te tautohe i tētahi pikinga nui ake i roto i tā rātou whakahau panuku. Whenua tōrangapū Engari e kite ana te Lib Dems i te taupatupatu o nāianei i waenganui i o rātau hoa tauwhāinga hei ngana ki te neke ki tō rātou whenua, kua nui ake te tautoko ngāwari i Uropi me ngā nekeneke, ā, kāore anō kia mōhio ki te āwhina i a rātou i tēnei wā. Engari e kī ana ētahi Tohutohu tērā tētahi tikanga tono ki te hunga whai moni iti me te kore whakahaere i te Komihana Utu Iti mēnā ka kōwhiri i tētahi pikinga iti i tēnei tau. Kei te pēhi ēnei MP i te Pūtea Moni kia titiro ki te kupenga - kaua ko te utu nui - o te hunga i runga i te utu mōkito. Mai i Aperira ka kore tāke te £10,000 tuatahi o te moni whiwhinga, engari ka tīmata ngā kaimahi ki te utu inihua ā-motu - ki te tokomaha, he tāke - i te moni whiwhinga iti iho o te £7,775. Mā te whakarewa i te paepae inihua ā-motu ki te £10,000 hoki i te wā o te pōtitanga, ka taea e ngā Tohutohu te kī he pai ake te hunga katoa i runga i te utu mōkito. Ko tēnā ka utu, ehara i te penapena, he moni. 'Runga-ake' Engari he waea anō mō tētahi utu mōkito "whakarunga" i ngā wāhi utu tiketike me ngā moni toharite teitei ake i utua e ngā kaitukumahi, ehara i te kāwanatanga. Kua kōrero hoki ngā kaipōrangapū mahi ki te pūrua i tētahi pikinga nui i roto i te utu mōkito, engari kāore he whika tauwhāiti, ā, he nui ake te "mōkito" i ētahi wāhanga o te whakahaerenga. Engari ko tā rātou wero matua pea kei runga i te pēhi i ngā kamupene kia utu i tētahi "utu ora" teitei ake - i tēnei wā e £7.65 i te haora, kaua ko te mokatere pakeke mōkito o te £6.31. Tērā pea ka tohe tētahi kāwanatanga Mahi ā muri ake kia utua e ngā kaitukumahi tūmataiti e whai hua ana i ngā kirimana wāhanga tūmatanui ki a rātau kaimahi tēnei whika teitei ake, ki runga ake rānei. E whakapono ana ētahi kaitohutohu Rangatira ka noho a Labour i runga i te waewae whakamuri mēnā ka tāruatia e te kāwanatanga o nāianei he nui te pikinga mo te utu iti. Mō tā rātou wāhanga, e whakapono ana ngā kaitohutohu Mahi e whakaatu ana te taupatupatu kei te whakahaua a Rawiri Karauna ki te whawhai i runga i tō rātou rohe - arā, kei te whawhai a ia ki te utu o te oranga, ehara i te pai ake o te āhua o te whakahaerenga.

title: E tiaki ana a Mahinda i ngā motika SL i Hiniwa
summary: I tono te kāwanatanga o Hiri Rānaka ki te kōrerorero i ngā take motika tangata nui e pā ana ki Hiri Rānaka.
text: I te urupare te Minita Motika Tangata o Mahinda Samarasinghe i te Tūtira ki ngā pātai i whakaarahia e Tenemaka, te Whenua o Airangi, Te Hononga o Ingarangi, Kānata me Tiamana i Hiniwa. Kua whakapaea a Sri Lanka e ngā rōpū motika tangata e pupuri ana i te kawenga mō te maha o ngā tūkinotanga motika tangata, tae atu ki ngā ngaronga me ngā kawenga ā-ture tāpiri, ā, i kōrerorerotia whānuitia i roto i te pāpāho paetata, ao whānui hoki. I kī atu a Minita Samarasinghe ki te Rōpū Mahi o te Kaunihera Motika Tangata o UN i runga i te Arotakenga Auau Ao Whānui e tukua ana a Sri Lanka ki te mahi tahi me te Kaunihera. "E tiro ana mātou ki tā mātou whai wāhitanga tūturu ki tēnei tukanga hei tohu anō o tēnei tukutahi", tana kī. He maha nga whenua e arotake ana i te pūkete o Sri Lanka i pātai ki te whāinga a te kāwanatanga ki te tautoko i ngā mana tangata. I roto i tana urupare, ka kī te minita i tonoa e te Kāwanatanga ngā rōpū ā iwi kia whakaarahia ngā take, ngā āwangawanga rānei mō te whakauru ki te Pūrongo ā-Motu, ā, ko ngā urupare me ngā whakawhitiwhitinga katoa i whiwhia, i āta whakaarohia i roto i te putanga whakamutunga. E pā ana ki ngā pātai i whakaarahia e Tenemaka, te Whenua o Irealand, Te Hononga o Ingarangi, Kānata me Tiamana e pā ana ki te whakatūnga o tētahi tari o te Komihana Tiketike mō ngā Motika Tangata, ka kī te minita kua whakaaturia kētia te tari i Sri Lanka e tētahi Kaitohutohu Motika Tangata. I kī a ia, i pōhiritia tēnei tari e te kāwanatanga e "kōrerorero ana ki te UNDP me te Kaitohutohu Motika Tangata mō te hanganga āheinga o te Manatu Whakahaeretanga Mōrearea me ngā Motika Tangata, te Komihana Motika Tangata o te Motu me ētahi atu kaipupuri tūnga ā iwi".

title: Ko Ēnā Me mō te huri i te kaupapa o Welsh Brexit?
summary: I kōwhiria e te Kāwanatanga o Welsh ki te whakarewa i tana pepa mā o Te Kāwanatanga o Te Kāwanatanga o Te Kāwanatanga
text: I taua wā, i te raki ki te hauauru o Ingarangi a Rawiri Cornock, i te whakarewatanga o ta rātau rautaki mahi, engari e kore te tuhinga Welsh e mōhiotia i Westminster. Tērā pea ka miharo koe - pērā ki a au - he aha i whakarewaina ai te pepa i te wiki i muri i te whakatau a te pirimia e noho ana i te mākete kotahi, i muri hoki i te kōrerorero i te putanga a te kāwanatanga o Pirihitini i Whitehall. I tōmuri te Kāwanatanga o Welsh ki ana mahi kāinga? I kī mai te Minita Tuatahi o Carwyn Jones ki a au: "Kia maumahara hoki kei te tautokona tēnei tuhinga e ngā rōpū e toru i roto i te whakaminenga. Ehara tēnei i te tuhinga i hangaia e tētahi rōpū, e tētahi kāwanatanga rānei, ā, e hiahia ana mātou ki te whakarite kei a mātou te hoko whānui rawa atu kia tino mōhio ai kei a mātou te tautoko e hiahiatia ana." 'Nōwei' Ko te kaiārahi o Tēnā Jones rāua ko Plaid Cymru, ko Leanne Wood, e tū ana i te taha o tētahi, i kī rāua i whakanui i te hua o te taupānga o Pipiri i tērā rāua. Engari e mau tonu ana rāua ki te hē te pirimia ki te whakamutu ko te tikanga o te putanga arorau o te pōti ko te mahue i te mākete kotahi. I tino whakaawetia te huarahi a Kānata Jones e tana haerenga o mua tata nei ki Nōwei, he wāhanga nō te mākete kotahi, engari kāore i te EU. I huatau mai a ia kia hiahiatia e ngā ture nekeneke te wāteatanga o ngā ture EU kia whai tono mahi i mua i te neke ki konei. I kī ana me whakaū ngā ture UK hei ārai i te pokanoatanga o ngā kaimahi. I pātai mai he aha te karere ka hoatu e ia ki tētahi paramu Bridgend e māharahara ana ka haere tana mahi ki tētahi Pou, māna e mahi mō te iti iho, ka kī te minita tuatahi: "He ngāwari noa iho. Me mātua whakarite koe ka whiua ngā tāngata ina takahi rātau i te ture." I kī atu a Leanne Wood ki te kōrero: "Kāore mātou e whakaae he raruraru te wāteatanga o te nekeneke." I kī a ia he iti noa iho te tokomaha o ngā kaiheke EU i Uēra - e 79,000, ka taea e rātou katoa te whakauru ki te Taiwhanga Matua. E 21 % anake o rātau kāore i te mahi, ā, ko te nuinga o ērā he ākonga. He kanohi tauhou te 'Manene' E mirimiri ana i ngā pakihiwi ki a mātau: ko Neil Hamilton. I whakaaro te kaiārahi UKIP Wales he iti noa iho te mahi a te pepa mā ki te whakahaere i ngā nekeneke. E kore taua tirohanga e mīharo ki a Carwyn Jones, ki a Leanne Wood rānei. E mōhio ana rāua tokorua e kore a Tēnā Hamilton e huri i tōna hinengaro ki a Pakihi, ki te mākete kotahi rānei. Ka whakaarohia te pepa mā i te hui panuku o te wānanga i whakatūria e Ēnā Me ki te whakaaro i nga whakaaro o nga kāhui kua whakaritea. Engari mēnā e hiahia ana te Kāwanatanga o Welsh ki te tuku i tana kaupapa mō Te Kāwanatanga, me whakapati e rātau a Ēnā Me ki te huri i ōna ake whāinga o Te Pirimia, ā, ina whakatau a ia i tōna hinengaro, kāore i te mōhiotia mō te huri.

title: Covid-19: He takoha ki te paramedic 'toa' i mate i te huaketo
summary: Kua utua he takoha ki tētahi paramedic "toa" i muri i tōna matenga i te Covid-19.
text: E 23 tau i mahi ai a Toni Chadbourne - e mōhiotia ana ko Chad - i ngā Wehenga o Rāhui me Te Wehenga o Te Wānanga o Te Wā Kua mate a ia mō tētahi wā, engari i mate i te mutunga wiki. I kī tōna whānau he "māhaki ki te uho" a Tēnā Chadbourne, ā, "kāore e kore he toa NHS nāna i whakatapua tōna ora ki tana mahi". I kī te Ratonga Waka Tūroro o East Midlands i tīmata a Tēnā Chadbourne hei kaihangarau waka tūroro i te tau 1997 me te Ratonga Waka Tūroro o Lincolnshire, ā, kua mahi i tōna ara ki te kaiwhakahaere mahi mahi. I kī tōna whānau he "toru nga aroha nui" o Tēnā Chadbourne i roto i tōna oranga - tōna whānau me ōna hoa, e mātakitaki ana i te Ngahere o Rāhui me Ingarangi e tākaro whutupōro ana me tana mahi. 'Ngākau nui' I roto i tētahi kōrero, ka kī te whānau: "Kaore a Toni i whakatapua tōna ora ki tana mahi. " I a ia e piki ake ana i roto i te rārangi, kāore he mea nui rawa ki a Tony, ko tōna ngākau nui i haere ai ia ki runga ake mō ōna tūroro, hoa mahi me ōna hoa. "I tino māharahara a ia ki ōna hoa mahi, ko ētahi hoki o ōna hoa tino pai - tōna whānau mahi. " He ngākau māhaki a Tony ki te uho; I muri noa iho i te takahanga ka rongo mātou mō ngā oranga i tiakina e ia, ngā pēpi i tukua e ia me te whāinga tūturu i hoatu e ia ki te raina o mua i roto i te 23 tau o te ratonga." I kī a Richard Henderson, te kaiwhakahaere matua o te Ratonga Waka Tūroro o East Midlands: "He tino pouri te ngaro o Chad, ā, he uaua ki te kimi i ngā kupu hei whakapuaki i te āhua o ngā hoa mahi puta noa i te ratonga i a rātau e rongo ana i tēnei rongo whakararuraru. " Ko ōku whakaaro kei te whānau o Chad, me ōna hoa tata me ōna hoa pai." Whāia a BBC East Midlands i Facebook, Twitter, Instagram rānei. Tukua ō whakaaro pūrākau ki eastmidsnews@bbc.co.uk. Ngā Hononga Ipurangi Pātahi Ratonga Waka Tūroro o East Midlands NHS Trust

title: Brexit: He aha te tikanga o te pānuitanga a Labour i runga i te pōti tuarua?
summary: Tērā pea ka whakaaro koe ki ngā kaiwhakahauhau me ngā MP e kaha ana ki tētahi atu haere i te taupānga EU.
text: He tino nui rawa editor@bbclaurakon roto i ngā porowhita Mahi, ā, e whakaae ana ki te hunga e whakahauhau ana, e whakahau ana kia nui ake te aro atu o te kaiārahi ki ngā mema maha o te rōpū e hiahia ana ki tētahi atu taupānga me te whakaari raima. Mēnā ko koe tētahi o aua tāngata e hiahia ana ki te whakamutu i a Brexit mā tētahi atu taupānga, kia tūpato. Tērā pea ka tere te haere o tō inu hākari i te pō nei. Nā te mea, ahakoa e tatau ana tēnei nekehanga i te tōrangapū, ehara te nekehanga i te tikanga ka puta mai tētahi atu taupānga. Mai i tōna hui, kua whai kōwhiringa a Labour i runga i te tēpu ki te pana i tētahi atu pōti ki te kore ētahi atu mea e puta. Ko to rātau tūnga he whakahau mō tētahi taupānga mēnā kāore e taea e rātau te whakahau i tētahi pōti nui - kāore i puta. Ko to rātau tūnga ināianei, ki te kore e taea e rātau te tiki i te putanga a Labour o Te Mahi mā te Kotahitanga a tērā wiki, ka neke rātau ki tētahi kī taurangi mō tātau katoa ā muri ake nei. Mā tēnā e whakangāwari te riri o te tokomaha o ngā MP Labour kua roa te wā, e tūmanako ana ka nui ake te ngākau nui o Jeremy Corbyn ki te haere anō. Mō te hunga pēnei i a Keir Starmer kua ngana ki te pana i a ia ki tērā ahunga, he wikitōria tēnei. Engari taihoa, ehara i te mea kua tata te puta. Kua neke te kaiārahi Mahi ki tēnei tūnga e whakapono ana, e tū ana ngā mea, kāore e whiwhi pōti e hiahiatia ana e tētahi atu taupānga i te Pāremata. I tēnei wā, e whakaaro ana rātau he kī taurangi tērā ka taea e rātau, engari e kore pea e puritia. Engari mēnā, e ai ki tēnei wā tōrangapū, he tino rewa, ka hinga te mahi a te pirimia, ā, ka tīwhiri te ngangau, ka mau tonu te nekehanga i te pō nei i ngā kōwhiringa a Labour, ā, he pai ake te hamama ki te pupuri i ngā Pākehā Mahi māharahara. I aua wā pōturi e kore e taea te puta mai te nuinga mo tētahi atu pōti. Engari tērā kē ētahi māharahara mo te nekehanga. Kāore i te tino mārama he aha te whakatau a tēnei taupānga ariā. Nō reira me tūmanako kia maha ngā pātai tinihanga, i runga i te pātai anō. Ā, he mārire ki te tokomaha o ngā MP Mahi, tae atu ki ētahi i roto i te kāpata kōruru, e whakapono ana he hē te pupuri i tētahi atu pōti. Kāore he mea māmā mō tētahi o a tātau rōpū tōrangapū ina tae mai ki a Pakihi. Ko te ātete, pērā ki te kāwanatanga, e ngana ana ki te pupuri i te maha o ngā pōro rerekē i te hau.

title: Reward for Hepworth art stolen from Dulwich Park increased
summary: Kua whakanuia e te mokopuna a Barbara Hepworth he utu ki te £5,000 ki te kimi i te mahi toi parahi a te kaiwhakairo i tāhaetia mai i tētahi pāka ki te tonga o Rāwāhi.
text: I kī a Dr Sophie Bowness e tūmanako ana ia ka āwhina te moni ki te rapu i te whakairo e rua Puka (Porohita Wehewehe). Ko te wāhanga, i inihuatia mō te £500,000, i Dulwich Park mai i te tau 1970. I kitea kua tapahia mai i tōna turanga i te Mane. I tukuna e te Kaunihera o Southwark he utu e £1,000. E whakaarotia ana i tāhaetia te mahi toi e nga tāhae konganuku. Mai i tērā wā ka tohe ngā kaikaunihera ki te kāwanatanga kia whakaoti ture hei whāwhā i te tāhae konganuku. Ko te whakairo 'tino aroha' a Dr Bowness, he kaitiaki o te pānga o Barbara Hepworth, i kī: "Hei tautoko i ngā mahi a te Kaunihera o Southwark ki te whakaora i ngā Puka e Rua a Barbara Hepworth (Porohita Wehe), kua tukuna e te Hepworth Estate kia whakanuia te utu mō ngā mōhiohio ki te £5,000. " He parahi tino arohaina tēnei, ā, ko tōna tūnga i Dulwich Park tētahi i tino mīharo ai a Pārera i tana kitenga i te tau 1970." I tāhaetia hoki tētahi whakapakoko parahi rahi o te MP o mua me te kaiwhakahou pāpori a Alfred Salter i Southwark i tētahi wā i mua.
