Kei te mahi te Kaunihera o Southwark i tētahi aromatawai mōrearea o ngā toi me ngā whakairo tūmatanui e 165 i tōna rohe, ā, kei te whakaaro hoki ki te tango rangitahi i ngā wāhanga whai tikanga, ki te tāuta rānei i te C KK hei aroturuki. Kua tuhituhi ngā kaiārahi o ngā rōpū Mahi, Conservative me Liberal Democrat i runga i te kaunihera ki te Pirimia o Rawiri, e tono ana ki a ia kia mauria mai he ture hou "uaua". I roto i tētahi kōrero, ka kī rātau: "E whakapono ana mātou me nui ake ngā ture o te umanga, tae atu ki te whakakore i ngā utu moni ki ngā kaihoko me tētahi whakaritenga kia puritia e ngā kaihoko he rangitaki o ngā taipitopito a ngā kaihoko."

title: Ūnga whero: Kōwhiri ana i tētahi pae tauranga ExoMars
summary: Kei te tīmata te rapunga i tētahi pae tika hei whakaū i te takawaenga ExoMars o Uropi i te tau 2019.
text: Jonathan AmosScience correspondent@BBCAmoson Twitter Ka puta tētahi tono i ngā wiki tata nei ki te hapori pūtaiao, e tono ana i ngā whakaaturanga hiahia kia hono ki tētahi rōpū mahi mō te kaupapa. Ina whakaritea tēnei paepae, ka pōhiritia ngā kairangahau aorangi ki tētahi hui, tērā pea i te kōanga o tērā tau. Mā tēnei e tīmata tika te tukanga tīpakonga pae, ā, e rua tau te roa hei whakaoti. Ko te takawaenga ExoMars o te European Space Agency - he waka tata ki te 350kg - kei ngā wāhanga tōmuri o tōna hoahoa. Ko tana whāinga ko te tirotiro i te mata o te Aorangi Whero mō ngā tohu o te oranga o mua, o nāianei rānei. Ka whai wiri hei huti i ngā tauira mai i te 2m ki raro, me ngā taputapu hei aromatawai i ngā matu waro tērā pea kei konei. Engari ko te kōwhiri i te wāhi tika hei haere ki Mars, he tino nui ki te whāinga katoa. "E tūmanako ana ahau i mua i te mutunga o tēnei marama ki te tuku i te karanga ki te hapori pūtaiao, e tono ana ki a rātou mō ngā reta e hiahia ana kia noho hei mema o te rōpū mahi tīpakonga pae," te kī mai a Jorge Vago, te kaipūtaiao kaupapa ExoMars a Esa. "E tūmanako ana mātou ka puta mai tēnei i ētahi āhua, ā, e tūmanako ana mātou ki te whakatū i te rōpū mahi i Whiringa ā Rangi. E 10-12 ngā kaipūtaiao o waho, ngā kaipūtaiao kaupapa me ngā tāngata o te umanga. "E tūmanako ana ahau i te waenganui o tērā tau me kore mātou i runga i ngā pae kaitono matua e whā kia tīmata ki te ako taipitopito." Ka whakatakoto me te tautohetohe te hapori pūtaiao i ngā painga o ngā ūnga kaitono maha; Ka whakaritea he atahanga aorangi hou hei whakamōhio atu ki nga kōrero. Heoi anō, ehara te "pūtaiao tino pai" i te whakaaro anake ki te whakatau i te whakataunga whakamutunga. He herenga pūkaha tino hira hoki. Kāore he pūnaha taunga i hangaia e taea te whakatakoto i te ono pene; Ko te mea pai rawa atu ka taea e koe te tūmanako ko te rohe maia. Ahakoa mō te "skycrane" mātauranga i whakamahia e te takawaenga Curiosity o Amerika, tērā tētahi porowhita o te rangirua e ine ana i te 20km mā te 7km i te whakatau tata whakamutunga. Kei te hangaia te pūnaha tauranga o ExoMars e ngā Rūhia, ā, ka whakamaharatia ngā taunga o Lunokhod Moon o ngā tau kotahi mano e waru tekau mā rua. Ka tino nui ake te porotītaha hapa e tūmanakohia ana - tata ki te 100km mā te 15km. Ko te tikanga o tēnei, ki hea e hiahia ana ngā kaipūtaiao ki te haere, me mātua whakaae ngā kaipūkaha ki a rātau anō ka taea e te takawaenga te tae ki reira me te mōrea iti. Nā reira, hei tauira, ko Gale Crater, te tauwāhi o nāianei o Curiosity, te āhua nei kei waho i te rārangi o ngā ūnga tūpono nā te mea kāore e tika ana te pūnaha Rūhia ki te puru i a ExoMars ki tēnei rua hōhonu. Ka whakaarohia te nui o ngā pākeke me ngā papa toka. A, nā te mea he takawaenga hiko kōmaru a ExoMars, ka herea hoki e tata ana ki te paenga. Nō reira ka haere a ExoMars ki hea? Ko ngā Tauwāhi Manako i ngaro i te aro atu o Curiosity ka poro anō. Mēnā ka whakaingoatia e au he kaioma tōmua i roto i te rēhi, tērā pea ko Mawrth Vallis. He tino makau tēnei i waenganui i ngā kaipūtaiao aorangi maha o Ūropi, ā, ko te tauwāhi i kitea ai e te Mars Express Orbiter a Esa ngā putunga nui o ngā kohuke uku taunaki-konupora me te rino - he tohu mārama he nui te wai i whakapā atu ki ngā toka i roto i tētahi wā roa. Kia kitea ai he whakaaturanga o te ora, me whai koe i te wai. I kī mai a Prof Dawn Sumner, ko ia te tūru tahi o te rōpū mahi o te pae tauranga o Curiosity, ki a au: "Ko Mawrth Vallis tētahi pae o te kirinuku o Mars tahito - kirinuku tērā pea he pakeke ake i ngā toka kua kitea e mātau i runga i te Ao. " E whakaatu ana ngā toka i reira i ngā waitohu tūāwhiowhio o ngā kohuke wai rerekē i roto i ngā raraunga mai i Mars Express me te Mars Reconnaissance Orbiter a NASA. "Mā ēnei waitohu tūāwhiorangi, i roto i te kirinuku tawhito rawa, ka ātaahua tēnei pae, nā te mea ka whai wāhi ki te ako i te hanganga me te whakarerekētanga o ētahi o ngā wāhi tawhito rawa o Mars. " Ko Mawrth Vallis, pēnei i te nuinga o te kirinuku o Mars tahito, e whakaatu ana i ngā whakaaturanga o ngā pānga maha; ko te nui o ngā māra pānga e tohu ana kua tawhito. "E whakaatu ana ēnei wāhi i ngā whakaaturanga o ngā takahanga whati maha nā ngā pānga, ā, ko te porowhita tauranga o Mawrth Vallis i tāutua hei kaitono Curiosity e whakaatu ana i ngā tauira whati maha e pā ana ki ngā takahanga hanga pānga. He rerekē ngā tauira whati i te rohe, ā, tērā pea he wāhanga o ngā whakaaro tīpakonga pae taunga." Ki hea haere ai a ExoMars, ka hoatu ki a ia he mahi tuatahi e 218 rā Mars, sols rānei. Ka tere te takahuri ki te mahi i te nuinga o te wā, ā, i tēnei wiki kua hipa atu nei kua mōhio ētahi o ērā e uru ana ki ngā mahi mata. Kua whakatūria he rūma whakahaere whakapakoko ki te Catapult Satellite Applications i Harwell, Oxfordshire, mai i reira ngā tīma taputapu i tuku tono ai ki tētahi takawaenga tauira i te Koraha o Atacama. He rite tonu te āhua o ngā papa toka o tēnei whenua o Hiri ki a Mars, ā, he makariri, he maroke hoki ki te whakaara. E rua ngā wā i ia rā, kua tirohia e te tīma o Harwell ngā pikitia i riro mai i te tauiratauira, e mōhiotia ana ko "Bridget", kātahi ka tohutohu ki ngā ūnga maha hei tūhura. Ka tukuna ngā tono ki te "kaiāwhiowhio tāpae" (ko te mea pono, he tīma tautoko i te koraha), e takina ai, e tukuatu ai ki roto i te takawaenga. Ka mahia e Bridget ana mahi, mā te tirotiro i ngā toka me tōna "arotahi ringa" me te atahanga i te mata-roto ki te hihiani, i mua i te whakahokinga o ngā raraunga ki Ingarangi ki te tārua i te huringa hōpara. "He tino rerekē te whakatakotoranga o ngā mahi i te hoahoa me te whakamātautau; ā, me whiwhi koe i ngā tāngata ki tētahi hinengaro rerekē," te kī a Lester Parāoa mai i Astrium, te kamupene mokowā nui o Ūropi e ārahi ana i te hanganga o te takawaenga ExoMars. "E tino whakaaro ana koe ki te mōrea, nā te mea mēnā he mōrearea tērā pea ka pakaru te takawaenga, me tino whakaaro koe i mua i te mahi i tētahi mea - nā te mea ka ngaro pea i a koe tō mahi."

title: Ka hoki mai te hōhipera o Yeovil ki te matohi pango i muri i te 'rua wiki tino pākaha'
summary: Kua whakapuakina e tētahi hōhipera o Te Hōhipera tōna "matohi pango" tuatoru o te hōtoke i te mea e kī ana ngā tākuta e mahi ana rātau ki te "rua wiki tino pākaha i roto i to mātau hītori".
text: Ko te tikanga o te "pēhanga tawhito rawa" i te Hōhipera Takiwā o Yeovil, e 80 ngā mahi kua whakakorea i roto i te rua wiki. I whakatuwheratia tētahi wāhi rangitahi me ngā moenga tāpiri e 24 i te wā o Hui tanguru ki te whakatikatika i ngā pēhanga o te hōtoke - engari kua kī hoki tērā. I kī atu te rangatira tuarua o Honatana Howes ki te HAU: "Kua whakakīa ia wāhanga o to mātau kaha." Ko te hōhipera moenga 345 e mahi ana i te iwi whānui tata ki te 185,000 - ko te nuinga o te tonga o Somerset, North and West Dorset me ētahi wāhanga o Mendip. 'Mate tāhapa' Kua noho kē i runga i te "matohi pango" - ko te tikanga kāore i te rawaka ngā moenga hei whakatikatika i ngā tau e haere mai ana ki A&E - e rua i tēnei hōtoke, i Hānuere me Hui tanguru. I kī a Dr Howes i whakamāramatia te pēhanga e te iwi whānui pakeke o te rohe, he tokomaha o rātou he "here maha". Tērā anō ētahi "āhuatanga romahā" e rere haere ana i ngā kura me ngā wāhi mahi. "Nā tērā, i honoa ki ngā pēhanga i puta i ētahi atu wāhanga o te pūnaha kia kore ai e taea e mātou te tuku i ngā tāngata i te hōhipera, nā reira i puta ai te raruraru i tēnei wā." "Kei raro tonu mātou i te pēhanga, engari kua kitea e te rua wiki whakamutunga te wā tino pākaha i roto i to mātau hītori. " He take haere tonu tēnei, ko te nuinga o ngā kaitatū i roto i tā mātou tari ohotata i runga i te pūkete, i ngā tau 170 - i te nuinga o te wā ka kite mātou i te 130. Kua tautokona tēnei i roto i te rua wiki kua taha. " Mā te "pēhanga tāpiri" o te mutunga wiki o te Aranga ki mua, e whakahau ana te hōhipera i ngā tāngata kia "āta whakaaro" i mua i te haerenga ki A&E - he "tau nui" o te hunga i mate i tētahi atu wāhi, i ngā wae whara iti, i ngā pūtahi hīkoi GP, mā te waea rānei ki te 111.

title: Ka whakawhāititia e te tauwhāinga Netflix ngā wā whakaaturanga ki te 10 meneti
summary: Kua whakaaturia mai e tētahi ratonga roma hōu pūkoro hōhonu ka whakarewaina i roto i a Mātau i te 6 o Āperira.
text: Kua whakarewaina e Quibi te $1bn (£763m) i roto i ngā pūtea, ā, kua whakaritea ētahi o ngā ingoa nui rawa o Karaihe ki te hanga ihirangi mō tana ratonga pūkoro anake. E 10 meneti, poto ake rānei ia whakaaturanga. E hiahia ana te umanga ki te utu i te $4.99 (£3.80) ia marama mō te urunga taketake me te $7.99 mō tētahi putanga kore-pānui. Engari i pātai tētahi kaitiaki umanga ki te hiahia o ngā kaihoko ki te utu. I pānuitia e te rangatira nui o Quibi, a Meg Whitman me te kaiwhakarewa o Te Wānanga o Te I mua ko ia te rangatira o eBay me Hewlett Packard Enterprise, i a ia e whakaputa ana i ētahi o ngā whitiāhua hākoritanga tino rongonui a Disney i mua i te upoko o Dreamworks Animation. Ko ngā whetū e pā ana ki te ratonga hōu ko: I tua atu i te whakangahau, ko te tikanga o te ratonga ki te whakaata i ngā pānui rongokōrero mai i NBC, BBC me Telemundo, i waenganui i ētahi atu. Ko te nuinga o te whakaaturanga i tangohia e whakaatu ana i tētahi āhuahira e kiia nei ko Turnstile, e āhei ai ngā kaimātakitaki ki te pupuri i te mata katoa o te atahanga, ahakoa puritia e rātou tā rātou waea ki te aratau horanuku, poutū rānei. Kua tāparetia e ngā kaihanga whakaaturanga ā rātou whakaahua kia hāngai ai te mahi ki tētahi ōwehenga aronga, ā, i ētahi wā kua whakamahia te pānga hei whakaatu i tētahi tirohanga rerekē. Hei tauira, ko tētahi whakaaturanga he tirohanga tūturu ina matawhānui te pikitia, engari ka whakaatu i tētahi tirohanga o te waea a te kaitapere ina puritia poutū. I muri i te pouri, ko Quibi, e tohu ana mō te "ngau tere", kei te whakarite i ngā ataata e rere ana mai i te whā ki te 10 meneti te roa. Kei roto i ngā ratonga ngā rangatū episodic, me ngā whitiāhua hoki - ka wehea ki ngā ūpoko. I pānuitia e Ms Whitman kua mahi tahi me Whīni Spielberg ki te waihanga i tētahi rangatū wehi, After Dark, ka taea anake te tiro i muri i te tōnga o te rā. Hei mahi i tēnei, ka tirohia e te taupānga te tauwāhi o te kaiwhakamahi me te wā paetata hei taki kei te pouri tonu kei hea rātou, ka whakamāramatia e Ms Whitman. I waho o te atamira, ka kī atu a Ms Whitman ki te AO kua whiwhi a Quibi neke atu i te 100 ngā piu i te wiki mai i ngā kaipūkino e hiahia ana ki te whakamahi i tana hangarau ataata tītaka Turnstile. "He hītori roa i tēnei taone o Karaihe, o te hangarau e whakahohe ana i tētahi momo pūrākau hou. Koia tonu tā mātou e ngana ana ki te mahi," tana kī. Ehara tēnei i te wā tuatahi i tukua ai e ngā ratonga roma ngā ataata tauwhiti. Kua tukuna e Netflix he rangatū o ngā hōtaka tauwhiti mai i te tau 2017, ko te nuinga o tētahi wāhanga o tana rangatū pūtaiao Black Mirror. Engari he āhua onge tonu te āhuahira i runga i tōna pūhara. I kī tētahi tohunga he kī taurangi a Turnstile, engari kāore e taea te noho hei wāhi hokohoko matua. "He tino pai te huri i te mata hei pupuri i ngā mea kei runga i te mata i roto i te tāpare, engari kāore e taea te kōrero i te pūrākau, ā, kāore i te nui te tiki i tētahi tangata ki te hoko ihirangi," te kī a Dan Rayburn, te kaitātari matua i Frost & Sullivan. "A, ko te ihirangi te kīngi." Ko te whakataetae roma Ko tētahi o ngā whakamātautau nui rawa a Quibi ko te whakapati i te iwi whānui kia utu mō tētahi ratonga roma tāpiri. I te tau 2019, he maha ngā kaitākaro hou i uru ki te mokowā roma ataata tae atu ki Apple TV Plus me Disney Plus. Ā, tērā anō ētahi e whakarite ana i ngā whakarewatanga o ā rātou ake i te US, tae atu ki te HBO Max me te Peacock o NBCUniversal. Kei te haumi hōhonu hoki a Netflix me Amazon Prime i roto i ngā ihirangi pūtea nui kia noho kaha tonu. Engari i kī atu a Quibi Mr Katzenberg ki te AO e whakapono ana ia ko te whakataetae matua a Quibi ko ētahi atu pūhara ataata poto pēnei i YouTube, Snapchat me TikTok. "Mēnā he aha, ka whakatere mātou i te wheako mātakitaki i te puka poto i tō pūrere pūkoro i tēnei rā," tana tāpiri mai. I kī a Quibi ka ūkuia ngā kaimātakitaki i waenganui i te 18 me te 44 tau. Engari ko te nuinga o taua hunga whakarongo e taunga ana ki te mātakitaki i ngā ataata poto mō te koreutu. "Ki taku whakaaro kei te ngana rawa rātau ki te huri i ngā tikanga kiritaki," te kōrero a Tēnā Rayburn. I kī a Quibi e toru haora o ngā ihirangi mārō hōu i ia rā, hāunga ngā ihirangi rongokōrero. Ko ōna kaiwhakangao tae atu ki ngā pāpāho tūturu o Fox, NBCUniversal me Disney.

title: GeeSixFive: Ko te wahine i noho hei rongo pahū i te 65
summary: I te korerotanga a Olpha Selepe ki ana tamariki e hiahia ana ia ki te tuku i tana ake waiata pahū, ka inoi ratou ki a ia kia kaua e mahi.
text: Nā Ashitha NageshBBC News Kāore rātau i pīrangi ki te whara i ōna whakaaro, engari ehara i te mea i mahia e ngā kaiako mōnehu e 65 tau. Ka whakaae ōna tuākana, ka whakahau i a ia kia whakataka i te ariā. He whakamā ki te whānau katoa, ka kī rātau. Na te hou o ngā whakaaro o ētahi atu tāngata i roto i tōna māhunga, i mōhio a ia kotahi anake te kōwhiringa e toe ana. Ki te hopu huna i te waiata. I te wā i kitea ai e tōna whānau tāna i mahi ai, he huaketo kē te ara - ā, kua rongonuitia a Selepe, ināianei e mōhiotia ana puta noa i te whenua mā tōna ingoa atamira GeeSixFive. I te tiria te waiata puta noa i te pāpāho pāpori, i runga i ngā tūtohi iTunes o Awherika ki te Tonga, ā, i puritia ia e ngā tāngata puta noa i te whenua hei tauira kāore anō kia tōmuri rawa ki te whakatutuki i ō moemoeā. Engari i te 7 o Hakihea, i ētahi wiki poto noa iho i muri i te putanga o te waiata, ka whakamātauria e Selepe he pai mō Covid-19. E rua rā i muri iho, i a ia e wehe ana i a ia anō me te whānau i Durban, ka mate a ia. I a Olpha Selepe i a ia e tamariki ana. Na te mate, kotahi anake te ringa i whakamahia e ia. I a ia e tipu ake ana i Eshowe i te takiwā o KwaZulu-Natal (KZN), ka kī atu tōna whaea ki a ia me mātua whakarite ia e tino pai ana ia i ngā wā katoa, nā te mea kāore e taea e ia te mahi ā-ringa. I maumahara ia ki tēnei tohutohu puta noa i te kura, ka kaha tana ako, ka noho hei kaiako kura tuatahi i te taone o Madadeni o Newcastle i KZN. Nō muri mai, ka whakatairangatia a ia hei tumuaki o te kura. I kī atu tana irāmutu, a Sbu Mpungose, ki te AO he "tino pākaha" a Selepe... engari he ataahua", me te aroha ki te kākahu hiko. "Ka kitea ia e koe i ngā wā katoa i roto i ngā hūtu e rua. He koi a ia, he kākahu koi, he tino pai ki a ia te āhua," tana kī. "Engari neke atu i ngā mea katoa, i hiahia a ia kia tika te mahi. He tangata tino maia a ia i ngā wā katoa." He ōrite te āhua o Selepe ki tōna kāinga, ka kī a Mpungose - i tīmata hei "whare", engari i hangaia ki roto i tētahi whare pereki me te moata i "tino ātaahua i ngā wā katoa". I a ia e whakahaere ana i tētahi kaipuke kikī i te kura, i te kāinga hoki, ko te puoro te wāhi e taea ai e ia te tuku. He Katorika Roma, he maha nga tau i waiata ai ia i roto i te waiata o te whare karakia. I whakaputaina hoki e ia tētahi pukaemi o ngā waiata kōhungahunga tamariki. "Ko ia tonu te tangata e tū ake ana me te whakahaere i te waiata," te kī a Mpungose, me te kata. "Ko ia tonu te kaiwaiata matua, te tangata rānei hei tīmata waiata. Ko te ārahitanga tōna mea... ā, kāore anō kia rerekē." E toru tau a Selepe i UK mai i te 2002 ki te 2005, e whakaako ana i tētahi kura tuatahi i Rāwhiti o Rāwāhi. Engari i muri i tana hokinga ki Awherika ki te Tonga, ka pā ki a ia te mate - ko tana tamāhine, ko tētahi o ana tamariki tokowhā, i mate i te HIV. "I muri iho i tērā ka kite ahau i a ia e ngohengohe ana," te kī a Mpungose. I te 28 o Poutūterangi 2018, kātahi anō ka tutuki i a Selepe tētahi atu whāinga wā roa - i whiwhi ia i tana tohu mātauranga. E 63 tau tōna pakeke i taua wā. I tono a ia mō tētahi PhD i roto i te mātauranga i muri tata iho. I te wā o tana uiuinga PhD, ka pātai atu te pae ki a ia: "Mēnā e kōrero ana te tangata mō Mrs Selepe, he aha tāu e hiahia ana kia whakaarohia e rātou?" Ka whakautua e ia me te kore tīpoka i tētahi patu: "Puoro." I whakaaetia a Selepe ki te PhD - engari kāore i taea e ia te tango pūoro i tōna hinengaro. I te tau 2020, i tū te ao e te mate urutā coronavirus. Ko te mea ko te "oranga noa" kāore i tino pūnoa, ā, ko ngā mea kāore i whakaarohia e mātau ka taea, ohorere ana te pono. Puta noa i te ao, ka tīmata te tangata ki te kimi wāhi hou mō tō rātou auahatanga, me te whakairo i ngā mahi hou mō rātou anō. Pēnei i ētahi atu miriona, i mau a Selepe i te kāinga me te nui ohorere o te wā wātea. Ko te wā ināianei, ka whakatau a ia. I kī atu a ia ki ana tamariki me ana tuakana e hiahia ana ia ki te hopu me te tuku i tana ake takitahi. I whakapouri rātau. Mō tētahi mea, ko te pūoro pahū mō te rangatahi, ehara mō ngā tumuaki o te kura 65 tau. Ka aha mēnā ka whakakata te tangata i a ia? Ka aha mēnā ka whakakata te tangata i a rātou? "I tino nui tana karaehe ki te kī: 'Ka whai ahau i tēnei moemoeā mōku, ā, ehara i te mea he aha tāu e whakaaro ai'," te kī a Mpungose. " I mahia e ia i muri i te tuarā o te katoa, nā te mea i tino hiahia ia ki te mahi, ā, kāore i pīrangi kia ngakaukore. Heoi, i tana tiritiri i te waiata, kua oti, kua oti. Ka mau a ia ki ana pū, ka mea: 'Ki te kore koe e pīrangi, ka pouri ahau... engari ki taku whakaaro ka aroha ngā Āwherika ki te Tonga ki tēnei waiata'." I hoatu e ia ki a ia te ingoa atamira GeeSixFive - he tohutoro ki "Gogo", ko te tikanga o te kuia, me tōna pakeke - ā, ka tukua he ataata pūoro mōna e kanikani ana, e waiata ana i a Obani Lababantu ki tētahi patu amapiano i roto i tētahi hūtu ngaio e rua. Ko te Amapiano he momo puoro whare i puta mai i nga taone o Awherika ki te Tonga i te timatanga o nga tau 2010. He tino hopu te waiata. I te putanga mai, ka ohorere te whānau katoa i te tere o te wehenga - engari i mōhio a Selepe ka aroha te tangata. Ohorere, i ngā wāhi katoa te waiata me Selepe. E kōrero ana ngā tāngata puta noa i Awherika ki te Tonga mōna, ā, i te wā i pōhēhē ētahi i te tuatahi, ka tere tonu te mīharo. Ka tūtohu ana tauira o mua "ko Mrs Selepe tēnā!" i ngā wā katoa ka kite rātau i te waiata i whakairia, ā, ka noho atahanga ōna hūtu e rua. I tuhituhia a ia i roto i ngā nūpepa katoa o Awherika ki te Tonga, ā, i pōhiritia ia kia puta i runga i te pouaka whakaata. "Kāore he kōtiro tahanga, kāore he kōhiko moni, kāore he motokā ātaahua, kāore he kai paipa, kāore he reo kaha, kāore he tangata i roto i te ataata e whakahīhī ana ki tētahi mea," ko te tuhituhi a tētahi kaihautū. I kōrero tētahi atu: "Ko te tikanga o te pūrākau: kāore anō kia tōmuri rawa." Ētahi atu kōrero mō te coronavirus i Awherika ki te Tonga: Ahakoa kāore anō a Selepe kia pā ki te rongonui pēnei, i mahia katoatia e ia. Nā tēnei, i nui ake ai te aroha ki a ia. A, kāore i roa ka huri te katoa o te whānau i o rātau hinengaro - i aroha hoki rātau ki te waiata. Ahakoa tōna manakohanga hou, kore rawa a Selepe i whakaaro ki te tuku i tētahi waiata tuarua, ka kī a Mpungose. "I tapaina e ia ko GeeSixFive nā te mea e 65 tōna tau i tēnei tau, ā, kāore ia i kite i a ia e mahi ana i tētahi atu waiata, ā, ka noho ko GeeSixSix." Engari i taea e ia te hākinakina tōna rongonui mō tētahi wā poto. I ētahi wiki noa iho i muri mai, i whakamātauria e Selepe he pai mō Covid-19, a, ka mate i roto i ngā rā. "I mahue i a koe tētahi karere taikaha hāngai Gogo," te kōrero a tētahi kaihautū i tana ataata pūoro. "Mahia tāu e hiahia ana ki te mahi i a koe e whai wā tonu ana, ka wareware ki ngā kōrero a ētahi atu mō ō moemoeā tawhiti." I hoatu takoha hoki ngā kōwae nūpepa ki a Selepe, ā, ko tētahi e whakamihi ana ki a ia mo te "kore e hoatu i te kutukutu" - ahakoa i whakamahia e rātau he kupu kaha ake i te "damn". Ko te nehunga o Selepe i te 14 o Hakihea. I "hiahia tonu a ia ki tētahi tukunga nui", te kī a Mpungose - engari me ngā rāhuitanga Covid i Awherika ki te Tonga, kāore e taea tēnei. "I kōwhiria tonutia e ia tana kāwhena i ngā marama tata nei... Ki taku whakaaro i whakaaro tonu a ia i tētahi tukunga tino ātaahua," tana kī. "Me ngā rāhuitanga Covid, kāore pea te nehunga i te mea i hiahiatia e ia. Engari he whakamīharo te tukunga e hoatu ana e ngā Āwherika ki te Tonga ki a ia - ko tēnei hākari o tōna oranga tētahi mea e menemene ana a ia." Tērā pea ka hiahia koe ki:

title: Ngā whare o āpōpō: Smarter mā te hoahoa
summary: Ko ngā whare tino mōhio o te wā heke mai ko ērā i hoahoatia ki te hinengaro o te tangata, e ai ki tētahi momo kaihoahoa hou e ngana ana ki te whakanoho i te tangata ki waenganui o te tukanga.
text: Nā Jane WakefieldTechnology reporter This can mean design that speaks directly to the function of a building - a hospital designed to help make people better or a school that aims to redefine education. Ko te tikanga rānei o te whakamahi i te hangarau kia āhei ai te tangata ki te whakauru ki te tukanga hoahoa, ki te urupare rānei ki ō rātou whakaaro mō te noho, te mahi rānei i tētahi whare. Hei wāhanga o tōna wā o ngā Whare Āpōpō, ka titiro te AO ki ngā whakaaro e whā e whai ana ki te mahi i ngā mea katoa o runga ake nei. Te ine i ngā whakaaro Ko te wā hou o ngā whare atamai e pā ana ki ngā raraunga - engari, i te nuinga o te wā, ko ngā mea e inetia ana he mea māmā pēnei i te pāmahana, te mārama, te maha o ngā tāngata i roto i tētahi whare i ngā wā katoa. Engari ka aha mēnā ka taea hoki e koe te ine i ngā whakaaro o te iwi i roto? Nō nā tata nei i whakamātauria e ngā kaipūkaha tohutohu a Arup te ariā o te ine i tēnā. I tāutatia e ia te mea i kīia he "koko whakaaro" i roto i ōna tari e whai ana ki te hopu i ngā āhuatanga o te tangata puta noa i te rā. I hoahoatia e te kaihoahoa o Moritz Behrens me te kaihoahoa rama o Konstantinos Mavromichalis, i whakahaua e te hanganga kokonati 20m (65ft) ngā kaimahi ki te hopu i ō rātou whakaaro mā ngā papatohu i tāutatia huri noa i ō rātou tari. Ka miri ngā tangata i tā rātou kāri Oyster (he kāri atamai e whakamahia ana i te London Underground), i tētahi atu kāri tāutunga auau-irirangi (RFID) rānei hei takiuru, ā, ka taea te kōwhiri mai i ngā wairua rerekē e toru: Ngā Whare o Āpōpō i whakaatahia ā-mamati ō rātou whakaaro ki tētahi āpure mārama i waihangatia e ngā LED e rere ana i roto i te tuaiwi o te kokonati. I hoahoatia tuatahitia hei tāutanga toi, engari ka taea te whakawhanake hei ine i te whakaaro o te tangata mō tētahi whare. I tētahi wā e noho ana te kohinga raraunga i ngā wāhi katoa, ko ngā tari tino mōhio ko ngā mea e mōhio ana ki te ine i te urupare a te tangata ki te whare, he mea hira ki te ine i te mahinga o te mārama me te wera, e kī ana te kaiwhakahaere hoahoa a Arup, a Nille Juul-Sorensen. "Kāore i te nui te ine i ngā mīhini o ngā whare, me kohikohi mōhiohio hoki mātou mō te urupare a te tangata ki a rātou," tana kī atu ki te HAU. "I te nuinga o te wā ka tukuna e ngā kaihoahoa ngā kī ki ngā kiritaki, ā, ka ngaro te aroturuki i te āhua o te tangata mō te whare. " Hei tauira, tērā pea ka kī mai rātou he tino pai te whare, engari he pouri, ehara i te mea pai ki te noho i tētahi kokonga." Hōhipera hauora I a ia e mahi ana ki te hanga hōhipera i Rwanda, i te tau 2011, ka whakatau te kaihoahoa a Michael Murphy e hiahia ana ia ki te hanga i "te hōhipera tino pai e taea ana e mātou" - ehara i te mea pai noa iho, engari ka āwhina ki te whakaora i te tangata. Ehara pea tēnā i te ariā taketake, engari ko te mea, he iti noa iho te māharahara o ngā kaupapa o mua i te whenua ki te taumahinga o te whare. "E kī ana ngā kaipōrangapū me ngā tākuta ko ngā mea katoa e hiahiatia ana e rātau he mea māmā, ngāwari hoki kia taea ai e rātau te mahi," tana kī atu ki te HAU. I whakaponotia rātau ki te hanga i tētahi mea pai ake i te whare moenga noa iho, ā, ko te whare whakamutunga i whakatutuki i te kitenga taketake a Tāne Murphy. I roto i ētahi whakaaro hoahoa ngāwari pēnei i te hanga rūma tatari i waho hei whakaiti i te mōrea o te hora i ngā mate ā-hau, he huarahi hou ki te whakaora i te whare me te tuku i ngā tūroro ki tētahi tirohanga mā te matapihi, e whakaarotia ana he huarahi pai ki te whakatere i te whakaora. He māmā ake hoki - ko te tūtohu utu whakamutunga e rua hautoru o te utu mō te hanga hōhipera i Rwanda. Ko tētahi wāhanga tēnei i raro i te whakamahinga o ngā rauemi paetata - pēnei i te toka puia pātata mai i ngā maunga Virunga - me te whakamahinga o ngā kaimahi paetata hei hanga. Ko te mahi hoahoa a Tēnā Murphy MASS he wāhanga o tētahi nekehanga tipu e whai ana ki te whakarato i te hoahoa ā-iwi me te hanga i ngā mea katoa i te paetata. "Ko te whare atamai he mea kua whakaritea ki tōna wāhi, ki ngā tangata me te whakamahinga," te kī a Tēnā Murphy ki te HAU. I tēnei wā kei te mahi a ia i tētahi hōhipera ā-motu hou i muri i te Tīpoka Liberia, ā, i waenganui i ētahi atu mea, ka rapu huarahi kia kore ai te mate e hoki mai. Ko te hoahoa ao mariko The Edge, te tari matua o Deloitte i Amsterdam, kua whakaahuatia hei whare tino atamai i te ao, ā, kei te whakarite kē te umanga i te mea panuku - i Rānana. Ko Ed Greig, e haere ana i te taitara kororia o te Disrupter a Deloitte, e tino uru ana ki te whakaritenga, ā, e hiahia ana kia "mōhio ake te whare o Rāwāhi i te Edge". Me te ako mai i ngā mea i pai te mahi me ngā mea kāore i Hōrana, e hiahia ana te tīma i muri i te Tari Matua hōu o Rāwāhi ki te whakamahi i te hangarau auaha hei āwhina i te tukanga whakataunga, tae atu ki ngā maupane ao mariko. "Kāore anō kia oti te anga, engari ina whiwhi mātou i ngā whitiauau tuatahi o te hoahoa mai i ngā kaihoahoa, ka whakatauira mātou i roto i te ao mariko kia titiro ai ngā tāngata ki roto i mua i te whakatuwheratanga o tētahi tīni peita," tana kī atu ki te HAU. E hia rau ngā kaimahi ka pōhiritia ki te hoatu i ō rātou whakaaro. "E mōhio ana mēnā e kī ana tētahi e hiahia ana rātou ki te kākāriki neon, kāore pea e mahi - ka kitea he huarahi hei whakanoho i ngā whakaaro o te tangata." E whakaaro ana a ia ka āwhina ki te karo i ngā hoahoa auau kāore i te mahi. "I te nuinga o te wā ka hoahoatia ngā tari kia pai te āhua i ngā ariā tuatahi, engari kāore i te whakamahia i ia rā. " Tērā pea ka whakaaro tētahi he ariā mātao te whai pikitia nui o te hipi māwhero, engari mēnā me titiro te tangata ki tēnā i ia rā, tērā pea ka mōhio rātou kei te aukati te pikitia i a rātou ki te whakaaro auaha." Kātahi anō ka toa ngā kaihoahoa o Tenemāka o CEBRA i tētahi whakataetae hoahoa ao whānui mō tō rātou matatini mātauranga i Irkutsk, Rūhia. Ehara i te mea he kura paerewa, ā, e tūmanako ana ngā kaihoahoa ka huri hoki i te āhua o te mātauranga o ngā tamariki. One of the key ideas is to build the school around a meadow - bringing nature into the classroom but also bringing the classroom more into the local community. Outdoor lessons will be a regular feature and all the classrooms look out on it. Ko te pātītī nui, ka hangaia ki runga i te whenua pakoko, ka noho hoki hei wāhi arotahi mō te taone paetata, neke atu i te 5,000 maire (8,000km) mai i Mohihi. Ka taea e ngā kaiwhakamahi ehara i te wāhanga o te kura te uru ki te pātītī engari kaua ki ngā whare. Mō te kaihoahoa matua o Carsten Primdahl, ko te kaupapa e pā ana ki "tētahi tikanga atamai o te whakaaro mō te whakarite mātauranga me te pātahitanga o te kura ki te hapori". Ko te hauwhā o ngā ākonga i te kura he pani, ka noho i runga i te pae i roto i ngā whare iti e ono ngā tamariki me ngā whānau whāngai i te ngana ki te whakarite i a rātou ki te ngākau o te hapori kura. Ehara i ngā ara kura tūturu, ka whai mokowā taumahinga-maha te whare - tae atu ki tētahi wāhi mata kākāriki me tētahi rūma "pango" e āhei ana ki te noho hei wāhi hui, hei rūma rānei hei whakawhanake whakaahua. Kei te mahi hoki te umanga i tētahi atu kura, i Rūhia hoki, e noho tata ana ki ngā umanga incubator kia āhei ai ngā tamariki ki te ako mō te pūkenga. Pānuitia ā mātou pānuitanga katoa o ngā Whare Āpōpō i konei.

title: Ka tirohia e nga pirihimana te kaupapa whakahau i muri i te whakaekenga a te tangata pōhēhē
summary: Kua whakarewaina e nga kaitohutohu he tūhuratanga i muri i te whakaekenga o tētahi tangata ki te maripi i South Lanarkshire.
text: I ūkuia te tūkino tau 30 tau ki tētahi wāhi pātītī i muri i Carrick Gardens, i Blantyre, tata ki te 18:00 i te Tūrei. I mauria taua tangata ki te Hōhipera o Hairmyres i East Kilbride, i reira ia e mau ana i tēnei wā i muri i tana rongoātanga mo te whara o tōna ringa me tōna māhunga. I kī ngā pirihimana he mā te kaipōhēhē, e 5ft 10in te roa, he hanga hākinakina, he āhua hākinakina. I te mau a ia i tētahi tihi pōtae pango me te kōhua ki runga. Na DC Andrew Fearnside i tohutohu i te tangata whai mōhiohio mō te whakaekenga kia haere mai ki mua. I tāpiri mai a ia: "He whakaekenga taikaha tēnei i mahue ai te tūkino ki ngā whara nui e hiahia ana ki te pokanga ki tōna ringa. " Kāore anō mātau kia whakatū i tētahi kaupapa whakahau mo tēnei hara."

title: Tangohia tērā 'ingoa tata huri' i muri i te urunga mai o Robbie
summary: Kua whakaaturia mai e Take That i whakaaro rātau ki te huri i to rātau ingoa mo to rātau hokinga mai ki a Robbie Williams.
text: Nā Dan CairnsNewsbeat i tākaro te rima-wāhanga hou ki te whakaingoa anō i a rātau anō mō tētahi kotahi, engari i te mutunga ka whakatau ki taua mea. Heoi anō, na te ariā i whakawātea te pēne ki te tūhura i tētahi oro hou, e ai ki a Robbie Williams. Kua kī atu a ia ki te pukapuka Q ko te keu mo te oro pahū-hiko i runga i te pukaemi hou o Progress. "E whakaaro ana ahau ko te ariā tuatahi o te kore e karangatia ko Take That i whakawāteatia a Gary," te kī a te tau e 36 tau. E kī ana hoki a Gary Barlow i roto i te uiuinga Q nā te hokinga mai o Robbie i aukati te hōhā o te kaitito waiata. "I muri i aua pūkete e rua whakamutunga, ko te whakaaro o mātau tokowhā e haere ana ki roto ki te mahi i tētahi atu... i whakaotia e ia ngā mea katoa e hoki mai ana a Rob. Nā reira i whakamere," tana kī. I te tau kotahi mano, i te tau E kī ana a Jason Orange tērā pea i takea mai te wehenga o Williams i te "whakaweti" a ētahi atu mema. "Ko ia te tamaiti i roto i te pēne, ā, tērā pea i whakaweti ahau i a ia i ētahi āhuatanga, ehara i te mea hāngai, engari i te huna. I whakawāteatia e ia, a, i tika tonu. "He nui ngā renarena e haere ana, ā, he ngāwari noa iho i roto i tētahi rōpū kia noho te tangata kotahi hei koati haere noa," te whakaae a Orange. "Ki taku whakaaro i mahi nui mātou ki a Rob." E kī ana hoki a Robbie Williams, ahakoa tōna angitu takitahi, i hiahia ia kia hoki mai ki tētahi rōpū. Ka kī a ia: "Kua hiahia ahau kia noho i roto i te kotahi (rōpū) mai i taua wā [2002 pukaemi Escapology]. " Ko te tikanga ko tēnei, engari me tatari ahau kia tīaroaro anō ngā whetū. He pēnei, 'Kua mahia e au te Come Undone and Feel and Angels - ā, ehara tēnā i taku hiahia'." Na te whakaongaonga mo te huihuinga Take That i taumarumaru hoki i tana pukaemi takitahi whakamutunga, ka whakaae a Williams. "I kōauau ahau mō taua mea [me whakatoko i te Ataata i Patua te Whetū Reo Irirangi]. A, ko te mea nui mo EMI, i kore ahau e hiahiatia. He mīharo ake, he hari ake tēnei." I te 22 o Whiringa ā-Rangi, ka tukua te pukaemi hou o Take That.

title: Hukarere: E rua ngā pokapū werohanga Covid i Essex i katia mō te rā tuatoru
summary: E rua ngā pokapū werohanga Covid-19 i Essex e katia ana mō te toru o ngā rā nā te hukarere taumaha.
text: He whakatūpato huarere kōwhai mō te hukarere puta noa i ngā wāhi o Ingarangi ki te rāwhiti. Kua katia ngā pae werohanga i te Hōhipera o Clacton me te Taiwhanga Hapori Jobserve o Colchester Utd mai i te Rātapu. I kī te Whare Wānanga o Te Whare Wāna He tini ngā kura i tuwhera mō ngā kaimahi matua me ngā tamariki mōrearea kua katia hoki nā te hukarere, i whakairihia e te kaunihera o te rohe ki tōna paetukutuku. Ko te whakatūpato kōwhai, e kapi ana i a Essex me te katoa o te taha ki te rāwhiti o Ingarangi, e tūmanakohia ana kia noho tae noa ki te 23:59 GMT i te Wenerei. I kī a Essex Highways i ngā haora tōmua puta noa i Essex. I kī a Dan Holley, mai i Weatherquest: "He hukarere tā mātou e haere mai ana i te Moana ki te Raki, e pā ana ki te Āwhā Darcy, i puta ki te 25cm [10in] o te hukarere i te Rātapu, ā, mai i taua wā ka mahi mātou ki tēnei awa auau o te hukarere e haere mai ana. " Ka kite mātou i ētahi atu ua hukarere e haere mai ana i te Moana ki te Raki, he nui tonu te māmā." Ka noho mātao tonu tae noa ki te mutunga wiki, ā, ka "roa pea te wā ki te neke i tēnei hukarere", tana kī. Kimihia te Rongokōrero o TE Rāwhiti o Ingarangi i Facebook, Instagram me Twitter. Mēnā he huatau pūrākau tāu, īmēra eastofenglandnews@bbc.co.uk

title: Riri i te tapahi a te Kāwanatanga o Welsh i te pūtea ōrite kura £700k
summary: Kua whakahētia tētahi whakataunga kia tapahia tētahi pūtea £700,000 e āwhina ana i ngā whānau rawakore e hia mano ki te hoko i ngā kākahu kura i Weera.
text: The Welsh Government's school uniform grant, available to Year 7 students eligible for free school meals, helped 5,500 learners last year. Engari kua tapahia e ia te aronui mō te 2018/19, i te mea kua "whakahekea" te utu o ngā ōrite. I kī te Tūāpapa Bevan he whakatikatika "waha mea" tērā mo tētahi tapahi e tiaki ana i tētahi moni iti. I kī a Dr Victoria Winckler, te kaiwhakahaere o te kura whakaaro, "kāore i te tino tika" te koha, engari he "ohorere" te whakatau kia whakamutua. "It's quite a big expense, especially if you've got more than one child," she said. "And that comes on top of an expensive school holiday period, where you've had to pay for extra meals, and maybe for entertainment and so on. " Mō ngā whānau e iti kē ana te moni whiwhinga, tērā pea he tino pupuhi. "Ehara i te aituā kei te tino hohe ngā kamupene pūtea taurewa rā utu i taua wā o te tau, te tīmatanga o te wā o te kura." I whakaurua te kaupapa i te tau 2005 me tōna whakatinanatanga hou e tuku ana i ngā tauira e tika ana kia £105 i mua i to rātau tīmatanga i te kura tuarua i te Tau 7. Kua whakahaeretia te pūtea e ngā kaunihera, me ngā mātua e tono ana ki tō rātou mana ā-rohe mō te moni. I karangatia hoki e Dr Winckler kia wātea ngā kākahu utu iti i roto i ngā hokomaha me ētahi atu wāhi, me te whai tohu tuitui. Kei te hoko kē ngā kaimahi i Ysgol Friars i Bangor, Gwynedd, i ngā tūemi tauira rawakore pēnei i ngā hū kāore e taea e rātau te utu, e ai ki te tumuaki o Neil Foden. "Ka tino nanakia ngā tamariki ki te hunga rerekē," te kī a te manukura o NUT Wales ki a BBC Radio Wales. "Mēnā he rerekē te rerekē, he rerekē te kākahu, ka aro atu." I kī a ia e pupuri ana te kura i ngā rā kākahu aroha, engari kua heke iho ēnei, ka tāpiritia: "Kāore e taea e ngā tamariki mai i ngā papamuri rawakore te whakataetae i roto i ngā tūnga huatau me ō rātou hoa rangatira." I whakaahuatia e Tēnā Foden te ōrite hei "whakakore i ngā rerekētanga i waenganui i ngā tauira" me te kī e whakararuraru ana i ngā wehewehenga. I tāpiri mai a ia: "Ki te mau tonu ngā tamariki ki ngā ture iti (pēnei i te ōrite), ka iti iho te takahi i ngā mea nui ake. " Ko te ōritetanga he tikanga ki te karo i te tauhae pāpori nā te mea he ōrite te āhua o te katoa." I pahūtia e ia te "ahi o ngā rawa" kua pā ki ētahi o ngā tamariki kura mōrearea rawa. I kī a Natasha Hayes, e tūao ana i tētahi pēke kākahu hapori i Kārepa, e haere ana ngā tāngata ki ngā kākahu kura i homai "i ia rā". "I te tere o te taenga mai, ka haere nā te mea he tino nui te utu ki te hoko hou," tana tāpiri mai. "We've had people crying coming through the door, saying they can't afford it." I kī a ia kāore a ia i te tino mōhio ki ngā mātua mārō kua wātea te kaupapa āwhina. I kī a Rebecca Derrick, he whaea takitahi o te tokotoru mai i Port Talbot, ko te tikanga o te whakataunga ka uaua ia ki te hoko i ngā kākahu hou mō ana tamariki. "Kua tono te kura ki te hoko tarau me ngā hū, engari kei reira taku whakapehapeha, ā, kāore au e hiahia ki tēnā," tana kī. "Ahakoa ko te £105 mō ia tamaiti Tau 7 e tika ana i whakaratoa e te koha, kāore i rawaka ki te hoko i tētahi kākahu katoa me te kete PE." I Ingarangi me Pākehā, ka tukuna ngā rawa ōrite kura e ngā mana ā-rohe, ā, ko te mea whakamutunga he mōkito ā-motu i huatautia e te kāwanatanga o Pākehā. E pūtea ana te kāwanatanga o Aiarangi ki te Raki i tētahi kaupapa £3m kua tangohia e ngā tauira e 98,000. I kī te Hunga Tohutohu o Welsh ko te nekehanga "ka tino uaua te pā ki ngā tauira rawakore". I kī te Kāwanatanga o Welsh he maha ngā kura me ngā mana ā-rohe i Wales he whakaritenga hei tautoko i ngā whānau e raruraru ana i te utu o ngā ōrite. I kī tētahi kaikōrero: "Mai i te whakaurunga o te koha... Kua tino heke iho te utu o ngā kākahu kura, ā, kua nui haere te wāteatanga. "Kua mahi tahi hoki mātou me ngā tinana whakahaere o te kura ki te whakahauhau i ngā kura kia whai i ngā tohutohu a te Kāwanatanga o Welsh ki te pupuri i ngā utu ōrite." Kua tonoa te Pānga Kāwanatanga Paetata o Welsh ki te kōrero.

title: Pakihi: E karanga ana a UK ki te EU kia whakarite anō, kia kaua rānei e anga atu ki te mahi
summary: Me hoatu e ngā kaiārahi EU ki tō rātou kaiwhakarite matua te tono kia whakahōu i te whakaaetanga putanga o te UK, ki te kore e "heke iho i ngā ara", kua kī te hēkeretari o Te Wānanga.
text: I te tuhituhi i roto i te Mēra i te Rātapu, ka kī a Stephen Barclay kua rerekē "ngā tūturu tōrangapū" i muri i te pōtitanga o Ūropi o Me. I pōtitia ngā MEP hōu i roto i te 61% o ngā tūru, ka kī a ia, e tohu ana i tētahi "neke taketake". Ka karanga a ia ki ngā kaiārahi EU kia whakaaetia a Mīharo Barnier ki te whakarite i tētahi huarahi e kitea ai te "whenua ngātahi" ki te UK. Kua rite tonu te tohe a Pōroa kia kore e taea te whakarite anō i te whakaaetanga putanga - ko tētahi o ngā huānga matua e rua o te mahi a Ēnā Me, i whakakāhoretia e ngā MP - kāore e taea te whakarite anō. I kī a Tēnā Barclay kua kī atu a Tēnā Barnier ki a ia i roto i ta rātau kōrero i tērā wiki e herea ana ia e nga tohutohu i hoatu ki a ia e te Kōmihana o Ūropi me nga kaiārahi o ngā kāwanatanga mema. Engari ko te tikanga o te huringa i te Pāremata EU, ko te tikanga kia whakarerekētia e te EU tōna huarahi, te kī a Tēnā Barclay. "Me tohe a Tēnā Barnier ki ngā kaiārahi EU kia whakaaro ki tēnei mēnā e hiahia ana hoki rātou ki tētahi whakaaetanga, kia taea ai e ia te whakarite mā tētahi huarahi e kitea ai he whenua ngātahi ki te UK. Ki te kore, kaore he take e heke mai ana i nga ara," tana kī. Waihoki, na te wāhuitanga o Boris Johnson hei pirimia i whakakaha te tono a UK kia wehe i te 31 o Whiringahora. Kua whakarewaina e te Pirimia o Poipoi Rōnea tana kupu whakapuaki i tōna hiahia ki te tango i te UK ki waho o te EU i te 31 o Whiringa ā-rangi, hei wāhanga o tana whāinga "mahi, mate rānei". Kua tū a ia ki ngā kaiārahi EU i runga i ana tono kia tango i te tuarā o Kīriria - e ārai ana i tētahi taitapa mārō ki te kore te UK me te EU e whakaae ki tētahi mahi hokohoko mo te wā roa - mai i te whakaaetanga putanga. I kī atu a Taoiseach o Airana Leo Varadkar ki a Tēnā Hōnea i tēnei wiki "e hiahiatia ana te tuarā hei hua o ngā whakataunga i tangohia i te UK". Engari i kī a Tēnā Barclay ko te tikanga o te tuarā, ko te tikanga o ngā tāngata i Aiarangi ki te Raki he ture EU "i whakahaua ki a rātou" mō ake tonu atu ki te pupuri i te rohe tuwhera. I whakakāhoretia e ia te UK e noho ana i te uniana o ngā tikanga me te mākete kotahi hei rongoā, e kī ana me whakatau te take taitapa i ngā kōrero ā muri ake i runga i te whakaaetanga tauhokohoko mo te wā roa ki te EU. "Kāore he wā e puta ana tētahi mahi kei roto ko te pūrua ārai manapori. Ko te pono tēnei e anga atu ana te EU," tana kī. I a ia e kōrero ana i tērā marama, ka kī a Tēnā Barnier he "kore whakaaetia" ngā tono kia whakakore i te tuarua, ā, he "āhua riri" te whakatata a Tēnā Hōnea ki a Pirihitini.

title: Te taiwhanga tākaro o Bristol City: Kua hikitia te uiui kākāriki o te taone o Ashton Vale
summary: Ka taea te haere tonu tētahi mahi i waenganui i a Bristol City FC me ngā kaiwhakahauhau ki ngā mahere taiwhanga hou a te karapu i muri i te hikitanga a te kaunihera i tētahi uiuinga whakarite.
text: Tērā pea ka whakawāteatia te take mehemea kāore i whakaroatia te uiui a Whiringahora, e mārama ana te HAU. I whakaaetia te karapu ki te hanga i runga i te whenua i Ashton Vale i te tau 2009, engari i āraia tēnei e ngā kaiwhakahaere nāna i tono kia tohua he kākāriki taone. Ināianei kei te whakaaro a Bristol City FC ki te whakawhanake anō i tōna whenua tīariari i Ashton Gate. I whakaae te karapu whutupōro League One, i whakaaetia ki te hanga i tētahi taiwhanga tūru 30,000 i Ashton Vale e whā tau ki mua, ki ngā kaiwhakahauhau i tērā wiki kāore e hanga i tētahi kāinga hou - i te wā e whakaaetia ana kia whakawhanake anō i tōna whenua tīariari. This would then depend on two other planning issues being agreed - the postponement of the planning inquiry into the town green proposal and the granting of planning permission, in November, to redevelop the existing Ashton Gate site. Ka wehewehea te whenua i Ashton Vale kia rua - me te haurua e hoatu ana ki te whare, ā, ko tērā hawhe i tohua hei kākāriki o te taone.

title: Ko ngā mahere awa o Lake Vyrnwy e whakaoho ana i ngā āwangawanga waipuke
summary: E wehi ana ngā tangata whenua i tētahi kaupapa hei tahuri anō i te wai mai i tētahi puna ka nui ake te mōrea o te waipuke i ngā awa e rua.
text: E hiahia ana a Natural Resources Wales kia 25% te pikinga o te rere o te wai ki ngā awa o Marchnant me Cownwy mai i te roto o Vyrnwy. E kī ana mā te rere teitei ake, pai ake hoki e whakapai ake te rauropi o nga awa. Heoi anō, ko ngā tāngata e noho tata ana ki Llanwddyn, Powys, e āwangawanga ana ki ngā awa - ā, i te nuinga o te wā ka whati kē i o rātau tahataha - ka nui ake te waipuke ki raro. I kī ngā Rauemi Māori o Uēra ko te kaupapa ko te whakahoki anō i te 25% o te "rere māori" ki ngā awa o Marchnant me Cownwy - i te rau tau 19 - hei āwhina ki te whakakī i te puna, hei whakapai ake i te kararehe me te flora. Ko te kaupapa - e arahina ana e te kamupene wai o Hafren Dyfrdwy me United Utilities - ka waihangatia he hongere hou hei wehe i te rere o te wai i waenganui i te roto me ngā awa. Engari i kī ngā rangatira kāinga kua rite kē te waipuke ki ngā āhuatanga me te whenua i te taha o ngā awa. "The Marchnant river already floods across the road and fills the gardens as it is," said Councillor Bryn Davies. "Ko te wai e tae ana ki ngā matatara e rima ngā wā e nui ake ana i ngā mea e kitea ana e tātau i ngā awa ināianei, nā reira ka tāruatia e te 25% te rere o tēnei awa, ā, ka whakapūmautia he auau ake tēnei waipuke." Lydia Johnston, who runs Cownwy Valley Produce from her home on the bank of the river near Abertridwr, urged United Utilities to halt the work, which is due to be completed before the end of March. "Kei te piki kē mai te awa ki te whenua i konei... kāore he wai tāpiri," te kī a Ms Johnston. "Mēnā he wai anō tā mātou, kāore au e pīrangi ki te whakaaro ki ngā hua. He nui ake te whenua e ngaro ana i a mātau i te wā." I kī te kamupene i ngā aromatawai rauropi me te waipuke i mahia e whakaatu ana ka "iti rawa" te pānga o te mahi ki ngā taumata wai i ngā wā o te rere tiketike. I kī tētahi kōrero mō United Utilities: "Ko ngā mahi i whakaritea ka whakanuia te ōrautanga o ngā rerenga i tukuna ki te awa i raro i ngā āhuatanga pūnoa, engari kāore te mahi i te whakararuraru ki te rohe." There will be a public drop-in event on Monday 18 November between 16:00 and 19:00 GMT at Llanwddyn Community Centre.

title: Ka neke a Rūhia ki te pare i a Hapa i te mahi
summary: Kua tāruatia e te whare pāremata o Rūhia - te Duma - tētahi pire e tuku ana i ngā perehitini Rūhia me ō rātou whānau i te āraitanga hara i muri i to rātau wehenga atu i te tari.
text: I waenganui i ngā menemana kaupapa ture i whakaaetia i roto i tētahi taupānga i a Hōngongoi. Ko nga kaitautoko o Perehitini Tūroro e tohu ana i nga whare pāremata e rua. Ka mutu te wā tuawhā o Tēnā Hapa i te tau 2024, engari ka whakaaetia ia e ngā menemana kia oma mō ētahi atu whakaritenga e rua. E 68 tōna tau, ā, kāore ōna kaiwhakawhiwhi mārama. Ka whakaorangia e te pire āraitanga te taurangi mo te wā tōrangapū o Tēnā Hapa. Mai i te tau 2000, kua kaha a ia, e whakamahi ana i te mana nui me te manaakitanga. Ka tūtohu tana kaiwhakawāwā pūkenga o Alexei Navalny: "He aha a Hapa e hiahia ana ki tētahi ture āraitanga ināianei?" Kātahi ia ka pātai: "Ka taea e ngā kaiwhakahauhau te hīkoi i runga i tō rātou ake hiahia wātea?" I puta te pire i te pānuitanga tuatahi i te Duma i te Tūtira, i reira te nuinga o ngā MP nō te rōpū o Rūhia o Te Hononga o Rūhia. E toru tekau mā whitu ngā MP ā Iwi i pōti ki a ia. E rua anō ngā pānuitanga Duma, kātahi ka haere ki te Kaunihera o te Tōpūtanga (whare o runga) me Tēnā Hapa tonu kia hainatia. I raro i ngā whakaritenga āraitanga, ka whai āraitanga tētahi perehitini o mua me tōna whānau i ngā rapunga pirihimana, pātai rānei, i te murunga rānei o ā rātou rawa. E kore rātau e whiua mō ngā hara i mahia i roto i tō rātou oranga, hāunga ngā mahi tinihanga, ētahi atu hara kino rānei i roto i ngā āhuatanga tino nui. I tēnei wā, ko te perehitini o Rūhia anake e ora ana ko te urunga a Tēnā Hapa, ko Dmitry Medvedev. Kaore a Te Perehitini o Rūhia e whiwhi i taua āraitanga, nā te mea ehara a ia i te perehitini o Rūhia. I kī te MP o Rūhia o Te Hononga o Rūhia, o Pavel Krasheninnikov, ko tētahi o ngā kaituhi o te pire, ko te whāinga kia hoatu ki tētahi perehitini "ngā pūmautanga... he mea nui mo te mauritanga o te kāwanatanga me te iwi". Pānuitia ētahi atu kōrero mō tēnei kaupapa: Ka tautuhi anō ngā whakahōu i ngā tepe wā o Tēnā Hapa ki te kore i te 2024, e āhei ai ia ki te mahi kia rua anō ngā whakaritenga ono tau. I whakakāhoretia e nga whika ātete te pōti taupānga i a Hōngongoi, e kī ana e whai ana a ia kia noho hei "perehitini mo te ora", he kerēme e whakakāhore ana a Tēnā Hapa.

title: Ka tono a Cardiff Uni ki te waihanga i te 'pūrei atamai'
summary: E tūmanako ana ngā kaipūtaiao ki te waihanga i tētahi āpure atamai e kite ai i te tīmatanga o te wheua i roto i ngā turi o ngā tūroro.
text: Ka whakamahia e te tīma o te Whare Wānanga o Te Whare Wānanga o Te Whare Wānanga o Te Whare Wānanga o T E whakapono ana rātau ka taea e tētahi pārekareka mā te whakamahi i aua mea te tiaki i te tātaritanga utu nui me te rongoā o te osteoarthritis hōhonu. Ko te utauta whakamātautau māmā ko "te karaihe tapu", ka kī rātau. I kī a Dr Davide Crivelli, o te Kura Pūkaha: "He tino kaha te ariā ki te huri i te āhua o tā mātou tātari i te osteoarthritis (OA). " Mēnā ka taea e tātau te hono i te waitohu oro o te turi hauora me te turi ki te mate, ka taea e tātau te whakaheke i ngā utu ki te iwi." I kī a ia he "tino māia" ka taea te whakamahi whānui i ngā pūreirei i roto i te tekau tau. E whakaaro ana te Rangahau Kaikōiwi UK e 8.75 miriona ngā tāngata i te UK kua rapu rongoā mō te OA. Ina whakawhanake ngā hononga tangata i te OA, ka taea e rātou te tangi kōpae, pāwhiri rānei i te wā o te nekeneke nā te tūkinotanga - e mōhiotia ana ko te crepitus. I ngā wāhanga tuatahi o te mate, ka herea ēnei turituri mirimiri ki ngā auau teitei ake, kāore e rongohia. E tūmanako ana te tīma ki te pokanoa i ngā pūoko kohu orooro, i te nuinga o te wā e whakamahia ana hei kite i ngā ngaru ohorere i hangaia e te tūkino i roto i ngā hanganga pēnei i ngā parirau rererangi, ki te tiki i ēnei oro mā te whakamahi i tētahi pūoko angiangi e mau ana i runga i te kiri. Kāore i te rite ki ngā pūrere taiwhanga pūnoa i hangaia i mua, ka kī a Dr Crivelli ka iti iho tōna mātotoru, ā, mā te whakamahi i ngā pūoko māmā - ko ētahi he iti iho i te 10p - ka taea te whakawātea katoa. Hei tauira, ka taea e tēnei te kitenga, i roto i tētahi pokanga GP, i te kāinga rānei mā te whakamahi i tētahi taupānga aroturuki whaiaro i tētahi waea pūkoro, paparorohiko rānei. I kī a Prof Cathy Holt, ko te tumuaki o te whare wānanga rangahau pūkenga o te whare wānanga, he tino painga tērā pea he tino painga te tātaritanga o mua. "Ko te mea matua ko te nuinga o ngā tāngata, ina mamae rātou i te mamae, kua tōmuri rawa - kua whiwhi kē rātou i te mate. Ahakoa, tērā pea he wāhi e taea ai e tātau te uru atu i mua," tana kī. "Nā reira, ko te grail tapu tētahi momo utauta whakamātautau." I kī a ia ka āwhina tētahi kōwhiringa māmā ki te tiaki i ngā miriona pauna i pau i te tātaritanga mā ngā karapa X-ray me te MRI, tae atu ki te whakapai ake i te oranga o ngā tūroro mā ngā rongoā kua whakaritea. I tēnei wā kāore he rongoā, he rongoā rānei mō te osteoarthritis, engari ka taea e te tangata te whakamahi i te mahi, i ngā pūrere āwhina rānei hei hopu i te āhuatanga, mēnā ka mau wawe. E whakapono ana te whare wānanga ka rite pea tētahi tauira tauira i roto i te tau kotahi, ā, ka taea te hua i roto i ngā pokanga i roto i te whitu, e waru tau rānei, mēnā ka tutuki ngā whakamātautau, ā, ka kitea he kaiwhakanao. "Mēnā ka taea e tātau te whakaatu i te whakatika ariā, he nui tonu te huamoni," te kī a Prof Holt.

title: Ka waiho e te MP o Tory te ERG Pākehā mō te 'whakamōrearea i a Pakihi'
summary: Kua puta atu tētahi MP Tory i te Rōpū Rangahau Pākehā o Ūropi, e kī ana he "huānga mārō o ngā moemoeā 'Unicorn'" e "whakamōrearea ana i a Pakihi".
text: E rua ngā wā i pōti ai a Daniel Kawczynski ki te mahi a Ēnā Me, i mua i tana whakatau ki te whakahoki i tana whakaaetanga putanga i tērā marama. I whakapaea e te MP o Shropshire te rōpū Rangatira o muri ki te ārai i te putanga o te mahi i roto i te Kotahitanga. Engari i tū te manukura tuarua o te ERG i to rātau ātete ki te mahi a te PM. I kī atu a Mark Francois ki a TE Pō Rongokōrero: "Ko te whakaaetanga putanga e pupuri ana i a mātau ki te Uniana o Ūropi, koia mātou i tino whawhai ai i ngā wā katoa." I whakatūria te ERG i te tōmua o nga tau kotahi rau e waru rau e waru tekau mā iwa rau, he ātete ki te hainatanga a PM John Major o te Tiriti o Maastris o EU. Kāore ōna tūranga whai mana i te Pāremata, i roto rānei i te Rōpū Rangatira, engari e kitea ana he whai mana. Kua ārahi te rōpū i te whakahēnga o te take i whakaritea e Mrs May ki te EU, ā, i tākaro i tētahi wāhi matua i pōtitia ai i roto i te Kotahitanga. I kī atu a Tēnā Kawczynski ki te hōtaka o Te Rā o Te Reo Irirangi 4 o Aotearoa, i whakaaro a ia ko te ERG "tētahi wāhanga o te raruraru i te whiwhi i te whakaaetanga putanga puta noa i te raina whakamutunga". I kī a ia e māharahara ana a ia ka "kore pea tēnei e āhei ki te kore e puta i a Pakihi". A, i ātete a ia i tētahi karanga mai i a Tēnā Pirihitini kia pōti ōpaki ngā MP o Tory hei whakaatu kua ngaro to rātau whakapono ki a Mrs May. I raro i ngā ture a te rōpū Tory, kāore e taea tētahi atu wero ārahi tika ki a Mrs May tae noa ki Tīma, i muri i tana toa i te pōti whirinaki i te mutunga o tērā tau. "E whakahē ana ahau ki a Mark Francois mo tēnā," tana kī. "Kāore au i te whakaaro kua tae mai te wā mo tētahi atu whakataetae ārahi. E whakaaro ana ahau me ū tātau ki ngā ture kua tautuhia e to mātau rōpū." I a ia e urupare ana ki ngā kōrero a Tēnā Kawczynski, ka kī a Tēnā Wānanga kua "karangatia ngā mea katoa i raro i te rā" e ngā hoariri i te wā o te tukanga o Te Wānanga. "Ko te karangatanga ko ngā unicorn he wai i te tuarā o te pārera", tana tāpiri mai.

title: Coronavirus: Ka akiaki te whakatūpato i te 'rongoā otaota' o Madagascar
summary: E kī ana te Whakahaere Hauora o te Ao (WHO) kāore he tohu rongoā mō Covid-19 i muri i te whakarewatanga a te perehitini o Madagascar i tētahi "rongoā" o te coronavirus otaota.
text: Kua rangirua hoki te wānanga rongoā ā-motu o te whenua (Anamem) ki te mahinga o te ārai me te rongoā a Andry Rajoelina. E kī ana ka taea e ia te tūkino i te hauora o te iwi i te mea kāore anō kia whakatūria ōna "whakaaturanga pūtaiao". Me hoatu koreutu te tonic ā-tipu ki te hunga tino mōrearea. I whakarewaina hei Covid-Organics, i hangaia mai i te tipu artemisia - te pūtake o tētahi mea e whakamahia ana i roto i te rongoā malaria - me ētahi atu tipu Malagasy. I te hokona i roto i te pounamu, hei tī otaota i muri i te whakamātautau i ngā tāngata iti iho i te 20 i roto i te toru wiki, ka kī atu te rangatira kaimahi o te perehitini o Lova Hasinirina Ranoromaro ki te HAU. "Kua mahia ngā whakamātautau - tokorua ngā tāngata kua whakaorangia ināianei e tēnei rongoā," te kī a Tēnā Rajoelina i te whakarewatanga o Covid-Organics i te Whare Wānanga o te Rangahau Hoatu (Imra), nāna i whakawhanake te tonic. "E whitu rā ka whai hua tēnei tī otaota," te kī a te perehitini 45 tau, nāna hoki i tohutohu i te iwi kia whakamahia hei mehua ārai. "Me hoatu tēnei ki ngā tamariki kura hei inu... He iti noa iho te rā," tana kī atu ki nga kaiwhakahaere me ētahi atu rangatira i huihui mo te whakarewatanga. I whakaae a Dr Charles Andrianjara, te tumuaki o Imra, me whakamahi a Covid-Organics hei ārai. He tūpato kē atu a ia mo tōna whakamahinga hei rongoā, engari i kī mai kua whakaaturia e ngā kitenga rongoā "he ia ki tōna pai hei rongoā rongoā", ka whakahuatia ia e te kōwhiringa rongokōrero o te WHK me te kōrero. Kua tuhia e te moutere o te moana Iniani 121 nga keehi o te coronavirus, a kaore he mate. 'Kāore he tapahi poto' Hei urupare ki te whakarewatanga o Covid-Organics, i kī te WHO, i roto i tētahi kōrero i tukuna ki te BBC, kāore te rōpū huri noa i tūtohu i te "rongoā whaiaro me ētahi rongoā... hei ārai, hei rongoā rānei mō Covid-19". I tāruatia e ia ngā kōrero tōmua a te upoko o WHO, a Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus, "kāore he pokapoto" ki te kimi takawaenga pai ki te whawhai i te koronihua. I te haere ngā whakamātautau aowhānui ki te kimi i tētahi rongoā tōtika, ka tāpiritia e te WHO. I kī a Ms Ranoromaro e mōhio ana a Perehitini Rajoelina me ū te WHO ki ōna kawa, engari i kī mai i heke iho ki tētahi take rangatiratanga. "He mahi tāna ki te iwi Malagasy," tana kī. I kī a Ahorangi Kōrero Klaas, he tohunga mō Madagascar i te Kāreti o Te Whare Wānanga o Rāwāhi, ka nui ake pea te kino o ngā tangata whenua o Malagasy i te pai. "He mōrearea mō ngā take e rua - ko tētahi ka tangohia e ētahi tāngata kāore e tika kia tangohia," tana kī atu ki a TE Aotearoa. "A, tērā, ka hoatu ki te tangata he āhua haumarutanga hē, kia mutu ai te mahi i ngā mea kāore i mahia e rātou, ā, ka nui ake te mōrearea i a rātau me ētahi atu." Mēnā ka tīmata te huaketo ki te hora, tērā pea ka "whakararuraru" i te ngoikore o te pūnaha hauora o te whenua, e ono noa iho ngā hāora mō te iwi whānui e 27 miriona tāngata. "Koia hoki tētahi o ngā take i noho ai te motu ko tētahi o ngā wāhi anake i runga i te aorangi e rite tonu ana te tīmatanga o te mate uruta, e ngāwari ana te rongoa ki te rongoā tika." I Poutāpeta, ka whakatūpato te National Center for Complementary and Integrative Health mō ngā rongoā coronavirus, tae atu ki ngā rongoā otaota me ngā tī - e kī ana ko te huarahi pai rawa atu ki te ārai i te whakapokenga ko te karo i te huaketo. Tērā pea ka hiahia koe ki:

title: I whakakapia e ngā tamariki te whakaaturanga poppy tāhae o Aotearoa
summary: E āwhina ana tētahi hapori ki te whakakapi i ngā poppie ā-ringa neke atu i te 100 i tāhaetia.
text: I ngaro atu te whakaaturanga, e tata ana ki te Hāhi Methodist Centenary i Moira, i Te mutunga wiki, iti iho i te wiki i muri i te whakawetotanga. I kī te hunga haere ki te whare karakia he "whakapono" me tāhae ngā poppies, engari he nui tonu te tautoko i tukuna mai i taua wā. Kua whakaritea e ngā tauira i te kura tuatahi o Donisthorpe te whakakapi i ngā putiputi i te wā mō te Rā Whakamaharatanga. I kī a Barbara Betteridge, nāna i hanga ngā poppies taketake mai i ngā pounamu kirihou: "He tino whakararuraru. " He roa te wā ki te hanga i aua mea, ā, kātahi anō ka haere. "He tino mīharo ka mauria noatia rātau e tētahi. Ko taku kōrero he tata tapu te whakaaturanga poppy." I kī a Rev Jacky Goaten, mai i te whare karakia, i Measham Road: "Ko ngā karere katoa e haere ana i te pāpāho pāpori me ngā karere tautoko katoa. " E whakaatu ana ka taea e te tangata te tino whakakotahi." I kī ngā tauira i te kura he "mīharo te āwhina i te hapori". Whāia a BBC East Midlands i Facebook, Twitter, Instagram rānei. Tukua ō whakaaro pūrākau ki eastmidsnews@bbc.co.uk.

title: Ka hoki a William Hague ki 'te whenua o ōku hungawai'
summary: He rite tonu tana kōrero ki a Wales ko "te whenua o ōku hungawai". Ināianei ka noho a William Hague ki reira.
text: Kua hokona e David CornockParliamentary correspondent, Wales Mr Hague and his wife Ffion Cyfronydd Hall, near Welshpool in Montgomeryshire, which was for sale with an asking price of £2.5m. I kī atu a Tēnā Heke ki te Montgomeryshire County Times: "Kua roa o mātau kanohi ki Cyfronydd Hall. " E tūmanako ana māua ko Ffion ki te whai kāinga i Wales mō te wā tuatahi, ki te noho i tētahi wāhi ātaahua o te whenua." Their new home has 10 bedrooms and 10 bathrooms and comes with 12.7 across of land. I tūtaki a Tēnā Heke ki tana wahine i a ia e hēkeretari ana i te kāwanatanga mō Weera, ā, i mahi ia i tōna tari tūmataiti. Mr Hague said: "Ffion is very excited that we will be living just over the hill from Meifod where the National Eisteddfod will be held later this year, we are both looking forward to that." I kī a ia ko tōna kāinga hou he "wāhi tino pai ki te tuhi pukapuka". He kaituhi whakaputaina rāua tahi o Te Heke. I muri iho ka kī atu a ia ki te Whare o Ngātahi - e urupare ana ki ngā mihi a te MP o Labour Kevin Brennan: "E tūmanako ana māua ko taku wahine ki te whakapau wā nui i Uēra i muri i te pōti nui." E tū ana a Tēnā Heke hei MP i Me, engari e tūmanakohia ana i runga i te huarahi whakahau i Weera. E whakapae ana ahau ka whakapakeketia ōna whakaaro mo te "tāke whare" i marohitia e Labour i taua wā i te mea ko ia tētahi o ngā rangatira āhuatanga torutoru i Uēra hei utu.

title: I whakakāhoretia te kaupapa whakawhiriwhiri o te rēra o Hull-Selby
summary: Kua makaia e te kāwanatanga ngā mahere hei whakawhiriwhiri i te raina rēra i waenganui i Hull me Selby, e kī ana ka nui ake ngā painga o te raruraru.
text: I te tau 2013, i tonoa tuatahitia e Ngā Tereina Hull Tuatahi he whakawhiriwhiringa aroturuki tere o te 70 maire (112km) o te ara. Tērā pea ka whakapūmautia e te kaupapa he tere ake ngā wā haere i waenganui i Hull me ētahi atu tāone i te Raki me Rānōna. I kī te MP Labour mō Hull North, a Taiana Hōnea, i "tino riri" a ia ki te whakataunga. "Mēnā he tino pono rātau mō te 'Whare Hiko ki te Raki' me whakauru a Hull ki te pūtea penapena hanganga," tana kī. Me whawhai tonu ki te Tari Waka i kī te whakaurunga o ngā tereina aratau-rua, e whakahikotia ana e te diesel, e te hiko rānei, e ngā Tereina Hull Tuatahi me ngā ratonga pai ake i runga i te Raina Matua o Te Tairāwhiti me ngā māngai o te Kaupae ki te Raki, ko te tikanga he koretake te whakawhiriwhiri. I raro i te hēkeretari o te kāwanatanga a Paul Maynard i kī i roto i tētahi reta ki ngā MP o te rohe: "Ka taea te tuku i ngā painga pāhihi me te kore raruraru nui o te whakawhiriwhiringa. " Tata tonu kāore he painga anō hei whakatika i ētahi atu pūtea pūtea tūmatanui me te whakararuraru i te whakawhiriwhiringa." I whakaarohia te utu o te kaupapa tata ki te £100m i te tau 2013. I kī a Ms Johnson kua tautokona te kaupapa e ngā MP katoa o te rohe me te iwi pakihi, ā, ka tāpiri mai ka whawhai tonu a ia mo te whakawhiriwhiri. "E mōhio ana mātou ko ngā tereina hiko e tapahi ana i ngā wā haere, he rata taiao ake, ā, he wheako pai ake mō ngā pāhihi," tana kī. Kāore anō kia kōrero ngā Tereina Hull Tuatahi.

title: Te pahūtanga o Wythenshawe: I whakahaua e te tangata i runga i te pahūtanga i te whare
summary: Kua whakataua tētahi tangata ki te pahū i tētahi whare i te wā i roto tētahi wahine me tētahi kōtiro 11 tau.
text: Na te pahūtanga, i takea mai i tētahi ipu korohū i te kāinga i Te Ara o Pewsey, i Wythenshawe, i Manchester, i pakaru ngā pakitara, a, ka pupuhi i ngā matapihi maha. I mauria te wahine, e 32, me te kōtiro ki te hōhipera, engari i tukua i tētahi wā poto i muri iho, ka kī nga Pirihimana o Greater Manchester. I whakahokia tētahi tangata 43 tau o Wythenshawe ki te pupuri kia puta ki te aroaro o nga kaiwhakawā i Manatū i te Paraire. Kua whakataua ia ki te whakararuraru i te ora, i te whara kino rānei ki te āhuatanga. He aha e kore ai e whai i a BBC North West i Facebook, Twitter me Instagram? Ka taea hoki e koe te tuku whakaaro pūrākau ki northwest.newsonline@bbc.co.uk Related Internet Links HM Courts Service

title: Qasem Soleimani: Ka whakakīa e nga tangi nga tiriti o Tehran mo te nehunga
summary: Kua whakakīa e te hunga tangi nga tiriti o te pūmatua o Ārepa mo te nehunga o te rangatira hōia o Qasem Soleimani, i patua e tētahi tānga taiapa o Amerika i tērā wiki.
text: I karangatia a Soleimani hei toa ā iwi i Irana, ā, i kitea whānuitia hei tangata tino kaha tuarua i te whenua i muri i te Kaiārahi Matua o Ayatollah Kēmenei. I patua a ia i te Paraire i roto i tētahi whakaekenga i te pūmatua o Iraki o Pekitata i whakahaua e te Perehitini o Amerika o Donald Trump. Na te patunga i whakaoho ngā māharahara o tētahi papā whānui ake, me te kī taurangi a Irana i te "utu nui". E hia rau mano tāngata i haere ki nga tiriti o Tehran mo te nehunga o Soleimani, e 62 tau, nāna i whakahaere te Ope Quds rangatira, ā, i whakaritea ki te pare me te whakarewa i te mana o Irana i te Rāwhiti o Waenganui. He tokomaha nga tangi i mau whakaahua o Soleimani, a, ko ētahi e mau kākahu ana i tōna whakaahua. I hipa atu nga kāwhena o Soleimani me te kaiārahi hōia o Te Rūnanga o Aotearoa, o Apu Mahdi al-Muhandis, i mate hoki i roto i te tuki a Mātau i Pekitata, i runga i nga upoko o te hunga tangihanga. I honoa te Kaiārahi Matua o Kēmenei e ngā whika tōrangapū me ngā hōia o Irana ki te manaaki i te rangatira. I konei, e tū ana a Tēnā Kēmenei (waenganui) i te taha o te Perehitini o Ārepa, o Te Perehitini o Ārepa (tuatoru mai i te mauī) me ētahi atu mana i te taha o te kāwhena o Soleimani. Ka tangi a Tēnā Kēmenei i a ia e pānui ana i tētahi inoi. Ko Esmail Ghaani, nāna i whakakapi a Soleimani hei rangatira o te Ope Quds, i kihi i nga kāwhena o te hunga i patua i roto i te tuki taiapa. Kī tonu nga tiriti i te paowa i te tahu whakakakara a te hunga tangi i te wā o te hāereere nehunga. Ka tahuna e ētahi tāngata ngā haki o Amerika me Iharaira. Ko ētahi i mau i ngā kāwhena tawai i rākaitia ki ngā haki o ngā whenua e rua, me ngā pikitia o te Perehitini o Amerika ko Donald Trump me te Pirimia o Iharaira, ko Pineamine. E herea ana ngā pikitia katoa ki te manatārua.

title: Tokotoru nga tāngata i hopukina i runga i te matenga o te tangata o Wolverhampton
summary: Tokotoru nga tāngata i hopukina i runga i te whakapae kōhuru i muri i te kitenga o tētahi tangata i okaina ki te mate, ka kī pirihimana.
text: I karangatia ngā pirihimana ki Raven Crescent, i Ashmore Park, i Wolverhampton, tata ki te 05:15 BST i muri i ngā pūrongo o te whakararuraru. I kōrerotia tētahi tangata i roto i tōna 30 tau kua mate i taua wāhi, ā, ka hopukina ngā tāngata tokotoru e pātata ana. I kī ngā Pirihimana o West Midlands i rangona ngā oro pū i taua rohe i whakapono nā te ahi o te motokā. E uiui ana ngā āpiha i ngā hononga tūpono o te whakararuraru ki te ahi o te motokā, ka kī te ope. I kī a Supt Matt Markham: "Kei te tino wawe tēnei tūhuratanga kōhuru, ā, kei te ngana tonu mātou ki te hanga i tētahi pikitia o te mea i tūpono. " E mōhio ana mātou he tokomaha ngā tāngata i rongo i tā rātou i whakaaro ai he pū i taua rohe, engari e whakapono ana mātou ināianei kei raro pea tēnei ki te motokā i te ahi i taua wāhi." I kī te Ratonga Waka Tūroro o West Midlands i kitea e ngā paramedics tētahi tangata he whara nui i Raven Crescent i te 05:15 BST. Ahakoa te aro atu ki te rongoā, i whakaūngia ia kua mate i taua wāhi.

title: Ka whakakāhore te minita Welsh i te karanga kia whakaheke i te kai mīti ki te rutu i te huringa āhuarangi
summary: Kua whakakāhoretia e te minita ahuwhenua o Uēra ngā karanga kia iti iho te kai mīti a te tangata ki te rutu i te huringa āhuarangi.
text: I kī tētahi pūrongo UN o nā noa nei ko te whakapaunga nui o te mīti me te miraka kau o te Uru e whakakī ana i te whakamahana o te ao. I kī a Lesley Griffiths, e whakahaere ana i ngā take ā-taiwhenua i te Kāwanatanga o Welsh, e rongo ana ngā kaiahuwhenua i te "ūnga" me te kī he "tino tautoko" te whakanao mīti o Welsh. I kī ngā hoa o te Ao he tino nui te kai mīti iti iho ki te whakaiti i te kohukohu. Engari i kī te wāhanga pāmu mīti o Welsh he "hē" te arotahi ki te mīti, ā, ko te pāmu Welsh he "kore nui". I mutu tētahi pūrongo i hangaia e te Paewhiri Tāpiripiri o te UN mō te Huringa Āhuarangi i te karanga ki te katoa kia noho vegan, kaimanga rānei. Engari e kī ana ka āwhina te whakawhiti ki tētahi kai tipu. Ko te ahuwhenua - me te ngahere - ko ngā pūkete mo te hauwhā o te kohu kohu kati kati o te ao. Ka taea hoki e te whakatipu kararehe te āwhina ki te whakamahana o te ao mā te whakawhāititanga, tae atu ki ngā kararehe mewaro. Ko te ahuwhenua i Uēra e 12% o te kohu i te tau 2016 - 62% o ēnei he mewaro, 28% hauota waikura, me te 10% waro taikura. I kī a Clare Oxborrow, he kaiwhakahauhau i Ngā Hoa o te Ao, he "wāhi tino nui o te whawhai ki te pakarutanga o te āhuarangi". "He pānga kino te whakanao kararehe nui i ngā wāhi pērā i Amazon me Cerrado i te wā e tukitukia ana ngā ngahere me ngā wāhi noho hei whakawātea i te whenua mō te kai me te whāngai kararehe. " Ko te mīti me te whāngai kararehe i hangaia i reira ka kawea mai ki te UK." I kī a Mrs Griffiths e mahi ana a ia me te wāhanga kia tino mōhio ai "ka mahia e mātou ngā mea katoa e taea e mātou" ki te whakaiti i te kohukohu, ā, i kī he nui ake ngā ūnga o te uniana ahuwhenua NFU Cymru i tōna kāwanatanga. Engari i kī te minita, i a ia e kōrero ana i te Rātapu Tōrangapū o Weera, i rongo nga kaiahuwhenua i te wā uaua. "Ki taku whakaaro ko te mea e hiahiatia ana e tātau ki te titiro ki te āhua o te mīti i Weera, hei tauira. He tino pūmau," tana kī, e kī ana ka taea e te tangata te āwhina ki te whakaiti i te kohu mā te hoko paetata. I pātai mai mehemea e hiahia ana mātou ki te kai iti iho i te mīti, ka kī a ia: "Kāore au i te whakaaro pērā. Ki taku whakaaro he toenga - ki taku whakaaro he kōwhiringa whaiaro tēnei." I te tīmatanga o tēnei tau ka whakaae te Kāwanatanga o Welsh, nāna i whakapuaki i tētahi ohorere āhuarangi, ki tētahi ūnga kia tapahia te kohu waro mā te 95% ki te 2050 - ahakoa i kī ngā minita e hiahia ana rātau ki te haere atu me te tae ki te "net-zero". I taunakitia e te Komiti UK mō te Huringa Āhuarangi te 95% mō Weera, ehara i te kore-kore, nā te hiranga o te mahi pāmu ki ngā hapori ā-taiwhenua. He iti iho te mīti e kai ana te tangata nā te huringa āhuarangi? I mutu te kai mīti a Martin Fidler Jones, 34 me tētahi kaikaunihera o Labour Rhondda Cynon Taf mō Hawthorn, tata ki Pontypridd, i te tau 2013 nā te huringa āhuarangi me ngā āwangawanga matatika. Kei te āta noho a ia hei vegan, e tuku ana i ngā hēki me te rātaka: "Ko te mea ngāwari he mīti, he āhua noho omnivorous rānei, he nui ake te pānga waro i te kaihuawhenua, i te kai vegan rānei - tūnga katoa." I tukuna e Hannah Pudner, e 38, mai i Kārepa, te mīti kau me te poaka i ngā marama tata nei. "Kua tukua e au i a rātou e mōhio ana ahau he wāhi tāku ki te tākaro i ngā mea e pau ana i a au - tōku pānga takitahi me te pēhanga ka taea e au hei kiritaki i runga i ngā umanga," tana kī. I tautokona e Paora Williams, he kaiahuwhenua mīti kau mai i Pentrefoelas tata ki Betws-y-Coed, he manukura o te rohe o Clwyd NFU. I kī a ia i rongo nga kaiahuwhenua i te koati haere noa, a, he "ūnga ngohengohe, ngāwari hoki". I kī a ia me titiro te tangata ki te katoa o te waro e whakaputaina ana e rātau. I kī te manukura o te rohe o Clwyd NFU kāore te ahuwhenua i Uēra i te whakamā atu i te uauatanga o te whakaiti i te kohu waro - engari i kī a ia ko te tikanga o te pāmu o Uēra, he nui te waro e penapenatia ana. "Ko te mīti kau o Welsh, te mīti kau o Ingarangi, e rua me te hāwhe neke atu rānei te pai ake, ā, he iti iho te whakamahinga waro, i te mīti nō Amerika ki te Tonga," tana kī. I tautohe te rōpū mākete mīti whero o Welsh Hybu Cig Cymru he "hē, he ngāwari hoki" te arotahi nui rawa ki te whakaiti i te whakapaunga mīti hei whawhai i te huringa āhuarangi. I kī tētahi kaikōrero ko te pāmu o Welsh "he tino nui, ā, kei te tino whakawhirinaki ki te marangai māori me te pātītī hei whakatipu kararehe". BBC Sunday Politics Wales, 1000 BST, Rātapu 15 o Mahuru, BBC One Wales.

title: Kua whakakorea te whakawā kāmera pirihimana i Dumfries me Annan
summary: Kua unuhia ngā kāmera whakamau tinana e mau ana i ngā pirihimana i ētahi wāhi o Dumfries me Galloway.
text: I whakamahia e ngā āpiha i Dumfries rāua ko Annan te hangarau hei wāhanga o tētahi whakamātautau i te tīmatanga o tēnei tau. I taea e rātou te whakahohe i ngā pūrere rahi kāri nama hei hopu i ngā mahi tauwhāiti. I kī tētahi kaikōrero Pirihimana o Pākehā i unuhia ngā kāmera i Whiringa ā Whiringa ā Rangi nā te mea "kāore i whakaarotia e tika ana mō te whāinga". I tūmanako ngā pirihimana ki te whakamahi i ngā kāmera hei whawhai i te tutu o te pō me te raruraru o te taitamariki. Heoi anō, i kī te kaihautū tōpana he "iti noa iho" o ngā āpiha i whakamahi i ngā taputapu mō "ētahi wiki". I tāpiritia e ia ko ngā kāmera he "taputapu tawhito" i whakamahia i mua e tētahi atu tari. "E mōhio ana ngā Pirihimana Pākehā ki ngā painga o ngā kāmera mau tinana, ā, kei te kimi i tēnei wā me pēhea ēnei e taea ai te whakauru hei wāhanga o tētahi rautaki ā-motu, e hangaia tonutia ana," tana kī.

title: Johnny Mandel: Michael Buble leads tributes to 'genius' Mash composer
summary: Kua utua he takoha ki a Hōne Mandel, te kaitito toa o Te Kōruru o Tō Menemene me te waiata tāhuhu ki Mash, i muri i te pūrongotanga o te matenga o te tau 94 tau i te US.
text: Nā Mark SavageBBC kaipānui pūoro i rongonuitia hei tētahi o ngā kaitito me ngā kaiwhakarite tino pai o te rau tau 20, i mahi tahi ia me ngā tāngata katoa mai i a Frank Sinatra me Barbra Streisand ki a Michael Buble. I tuhituhi a Buble i "tino pouri ki te mōhio kua mate tētahi toa mōku". I karangatia e te kaiwaiata he "tipua me tētahi o aku tuakiri makau". I takoha hoki a Michael Feinstein, te piana me te kaiwaiata e mōhiotia ana ko te "karere o te Pukapuka Waiata Nui o Amerika". "E kore rawa te ao e ōrite ki te kore tōna ngahau, te atamai me te tirohanga whakarihariha o te ora me te āhua o te tangata," tana tuhituhi i runga i te Facebook. "He tino kore e taea e ia te whakataurite, ā, kāore e taea e tētahi tangata te tuhi, te whakarite rānei i tana mahi. E te Ariki, ka mihi mātou ki a ia." I whānau mai i Niu Ioka i te tau 1925, he kaiwaiata opera te whaea o Mandel, nāna i kite he tino pai te rōnaki o tana tama i a ia e rima tau noa iho. I muri i tana tango i ngā akoranga piana, ka aroha ia ki te jazz i te 12 o ona tau, ā, ka whakawhiti ki ngā taonga parahi. "I hiahia ahau ki te whakatangi i tētahi taonga ka taea e koe te kihi," tana whakamārama ā muri ake. I ako a ia i te Kura Puoro o Manhattan me te Kura o Juilliard, i New York City, ā, i ora ia i ngā tau kotahi mano e whā tekau mā whā hei kaiwaiata me te tētere, e tākaro ana me ngā pēne nunui o Joe Venuti, Jimmy Dorsey, Buddy Rich me Chubby Jackson, i waenganui i ētahi atu. I taua wā, i te tuhituhi me te whakarite pūoro mō te reo irirangi me te pāpāho hou o te pouaka whakaata, ā, i muri i tētahi wā mahi ki te pēne a Count Basie, ka whakatau kia whai i tētahi mahi wā katoa i waho o te atamira. "He tino whakamīharo te wheako [o te tākaro me Basie], ā, te āhua nei kāore he mea e tata atu ki a ia," tana kī. "Heoi, i muri i taku wehenga atu i te pēne, ka mutu taku tākaro. I haere mai ahau ki California." I tana neke ki Los Angeles, ka tuhia e ia ngā whakaritenga huatau mō ngā kaiwaiata whānui tae atu ki a Frank Sinatra, Ray Charles, Peggy Lee me Anita O'Day. "Ko Hōne Mandel te tino pai. Ina rongo ahau i tētahi o ana waiata, ka rewa ahau," te kī a Toni Bennett, nāna i toa i tētahi Oscar me Mandel mō te The Shadow Of Your Smile, mai i te whitiāhua The Sandpiper, i te tau 1965. I roto hoki i te mahi whitiāhua a Mandel he pūoro mō te whitiāhua a Susan Heyward I Want To Live - i whakaarotia ko te wā tuatahi i pai ai te whakauru i te jazz ki roto i tētahi tapeke puoro - me te Americanization of Emily. I te tau 1970, i tonoa e te kaiwhakahaere o Robert Altman a Mandel ki te waihanga i "te waiata tino heahea i tuhia" mō tana kiriata e tū mai nei ko Mash, i tautuhia ki tētahi hōhipera o te Ope Taua o Amerika i te wā o te pakanga o Kōria. Ko te rangi, i tuhia kia uru ki ngā kupu waiata e te tama 15 tau a Altman, i whakaritea tuatahitia mō te tirohanga kaurori o te Hapa Whakamutunga o te whitiāhua, engari i kitea e Altman te pūoro i tino pā ki a ia i runga i ngā taitara tūwhera. Ka whakahē a Mandel, a, ka ngana ki te tohe kia tangohia te waiata. "I kī ahau, 'He porangi koutou. Kāore e tika," tana kī atu ki te kairīpoata a Marc Meyers i te tau 2008. "Kei a koe ēnei hepa rongoā taua e rere ana i tētahi rohe pakanga me tēnei rangi ngohengohe e purei ana. He rerekē." Heoi anō, i waiho e te studio pikitia tana tono, ā, ka noho te ara hei tūtohi puta noa i te ao, me te hanganga tino whiwhinga o te mahi a Mandel. Ka kōrero a ia ā muri ake: "E koa ana ahau i ngaro i a au taua pakanga." Ko ana tapeke kiriata o muri ko Caddyshack, The Sailor Who Fell From Grace With the Sea me Agatha, arā ko te waiata Close Enough for Love. I mahi tahi hoki a Mandel me Michael Jackson i runga i te waiata Will You Be There, mai i te whitiāhua Free Willy, me te whakarite pūoro mō ngā kaiwaiata tae atu ki a Nancy Wilson, Diana Krall, Michael Bolton me Barry Manilow. I te wā o tana mahi, i toa a ia i ngā Grammys e rima, ā, i whakaurua ia ki te Hōro Rongonui o ngā Kaitito Waiata i te tau 2010. He maha hoki nga tau i mahi ai ia i runga i te poari o te American Society of Composers and Publishers. I puta mai ngā takoha mai i te tokomaha o ngā kaiwhakatangitangi i mahi tahi ai ia, tae atu ki a Krall. Whāia mātou i runga i Facebook, i Twitter @BBCNewsEnts rānei. Mēnā he huatau pūrākau tāu, īmēra entertainment.news@bbc.co.uk.

title: Ko te Taunga Rererangi o Manston e pupuri ana i te whakaaro mo te katinga pea
summary: E pupuri ana tētahi taunga rererangi o Keni i tētahi whakaaro mō tōna katinga, kua mōhio te HAU.
text: I hoatu ki ngā kaimahi e 144 i te Taunga Rererangi o Manston ngā taipitopito mō te whakaaro 45 rā i te Wenerei. I hokona te taunga rererangi e Ann Gloag, nāna i whakatū tahi te Rōpū Stagecoach, mō te £1 i Whiringahora i tērā tau. I whakaahuatia e te kaiārahi o te Kaunihera Takiwā o Thanet, a Clive Hart, te rongo he "moto whakararuraru" ki te whakahaerenga o te rohe. I kī te kaipānui pakihi o TE Rāwhiti ki te Tonga, a Mark Norman: "E mōhio ana ahau kei te ngaro moni te umanga, ā, me kati pea." I tīmata te kamupene rererangi o Hōnea KLM ki te whakahaere i ngā rerenga e rua o te ata mai i Manston, ā, kotahi i te waenganui o te ata, ko tētahi i te ahiahi i te tīmatanga o Aperira 2013. 'He rongo tino whakakino' I a Hōngongoi o taua tau anō, ka whakaaturia e te taunga rererangi tētahi kitenga 40 tau hei wāhanga o tana tukunga ki te kōmihana kāwanatanga e titiro ana ki te whakawhānuitanga o te taunga rererangi i te Rāwhiti ki te Tonga. I waenganui i te 2015 me te 2025, ka kī a Manston ka taea e ia te whakahaere i ngā pāhihi e rima miriona i te tau me te 400,000 tāhei utanga. I kī a Tēnā Hart kua "mārama te kaunihera kua tautokona e ia te whanaketanga o te taunga rererangi ā muri ake". I tāpiri mai a ia: "Kua mahi tahi mātou me ngā tohutūmahi kia tino mōhio ai ka taea te whakamōrahi i ngā painga ohaoha ki te rohe tae atu ki te ratonga tāurunga hāngai a te kaunihera, nō reira he rongo tino whakakino tēnei." I kī te āpiha ā-rohe o Unite a Ian McCoulough e "rapu ana i te whakamāramatanga mai i te whakahaere" mō te wā heke mai o te taunga rererangi. I tāpiri mai a ia: "Ka mahia e Unite ngā mea katoa e taea ana hei tiaki i ngā painga o ā mātou mema i ngā rā me ngā wiki ki mua." Kotahi marama i muri i tana hokonga i te taunga rererangi, ka kī atu a Ms Gloag ki te HAU: "Ahakoa he taunga rererangi ngaro tēnei, e tūmanako ana ahau mā te mahi tahi a o mātau hoa noho tata me te iwi whānui ake o Keni, ngā hoa taunga rererangi me ngā kaimahi, ka taea e tātau te whakapūmatua i ngā huarahi e wātea ana hei hoatu i a Keni te wā tino pai e taea ai te whai taunga rererangi angitu, kātoretore hoki." Ko Keith Taylor, te MEP o te Rōpū Kākāriki mō te Tonga ki te Rāwhiti ka puta mai te katinga pea "ehara i te mea ohorere" me te tūmanako ka aukati te pānuitanga i te kaunihera kia kaua e ngana ki te whakawhanake anō i te taunga rererangi.

title: Whorlton Hall abuse: Care watchdog launches investigations
summary: The health watchdog is launching a review into how it handled a 2015 report raising concerns about Whorlton Hall hospital.
text: I kī te kaitirotiro o te Komihana Kounga Tiaki o Mua (CQC) o Barry Stanley-Wilkinson i tuhia e ia te pūrongo e whā tau i mua i te whakaaturanga a TE Panorama o TE Tirohanga i te tūkinotanga o ngā tūroro. I kī te CQC ka arotakea hoki tana ture o te hōhipera o County Durham i waenganui i te 2015 me te 2019. Tekau nga kaimahi kua hopukina. Te āhua nei ko te whakaahuatanga huna a BBC Panorama e whakaatu ana i ngā tūroro whai uauatanga ako e tawai ana, e whakamataku ana, e tautāwhi ana. Neke atu i te 100 ngā toronga a ngā kaupapa whai mana i te tau i mua i te kitenga o te tūkinotanga. I kī te CQC kua whakaritea e ia a David Noble QSO ki te mahi i tētahi arotakenga takitahi ki te mahi i ngā take i whakaarahia e Tēnā Stanley-Wilkinson. Kua kī i mua kāore tana pūrongo hukihuki i whakaara ake i ngā māharahara mō ngā mahi tūkino. Ko ngā huarahi 'hapa' Ko tētahi tūhuratanga tuarua, whānui ake, CQC "ka whakaurua ngā tūtohutanga me pēhea e pai ake ai tōna ture o ngā ratonga ōrite, i roto i te horopaki o tētahi taumata mōrearea o te tūkino me te tūkino". I a ia e urupare ana ki te pānuitanga, ka kī te Hēkeretari Hauora o Mātā Hancock kua "whakaohotia" a ia i ngā whakaaro tūkino, ā, i "whakaritea kia akona ngā akoranga kia kore ai tēnei e puta anō". Ka kī a ia: "E mārama ana kua hapa ngā wāhi hei uru atu, ā, me tuwhera, kia pūataata hoki tātau ki te tae ki te takere o te take i pā mai ai tēnei." Seven men and three women were arrested at addresses in Barnard Castle, Bishop Auckland, Darlington and Stockton last week. I te pātaitia rātau mō ngā hara e pā ana ki te tūkino me te aro atu i te wae tūmataiti o NHS, ka kī ngā Pirihimana o Durham. Kua kī a Cygnet, te umanga e whakahaere ana i te rōpū hōhipera moenga 17, i "ohorere, i tino pouri" i nga whakaaro.

title: Ko ngā hokonga Diageo i pā ki te whakahekenga o Haina
summary: Kua pā ki ngā hokonga a te matua inu a Diageo e te pōturi i Haina me ētahi atu mākete puta noa.
text: I kī ngā kaihanga o te wehikē a Johnnie Walker me te vodka Smirnoff i hinga ngā hokonga kupenga i te 9% ki te £10.3bn mō te tau ki te 30 o Hune. I hinga te rōrahi hoko i te 5% i ōna wehenga o Āhia Kiwa me Āwherika, Ūropi ki te Rāwhiti me Tākehi, he iti noa iho hoki ngā hokonga i Amerika ki te Raki me Amerika Rātini, i te wā e papatahi ana a Uropi ki te Uru. I hinga te hua nui mo te tau mai i te £6.9bn ki te £6.2bn. Ko ngā wāhi ngoikore ko Haina me Āhia ki te Tonga, i hinga ai te rōrahi i te 20% me te 25%, me Venezuela, i reira te taumahatanga moni me te utunga moni i tapahia ai ngā hokonga wehikē Pākehā mā te 47%. I kī a Diageo kua "tino pāngia" ngā tikanga ārai whakaharahara i Haina ki te hokohoko, ā, kua pā tonu ki te mahinga o ōna wairua mā Hainamana me ngā umanga Pākehā.
