I pāngia a Āhia ki te Tonga ki te Rāwhiti e te pikinga tāke me te pōrearea pāpori i Thailand. Ko Amerika ki te Raki, te rohe tino whai hua o Diageo, i tuku i te tipu o runga, e 5% te tipu o nga wairua me nga waina o Amerika. 'Ngā hua whāranu' i whakaahuatia e John Kennedy, te perehitini o Diageo Europe, ngā hua he "whāranu" engari i kī tonu te kamupene he tūmanako nui tonu mō ngā umanga i ngā mākete puta noa. Ka kī a ia: "E mōhio ana mātou ko ngā take taketake huri noa i te taupori kiritaki me te hanganga rawa, ko te tikanga ka tata ki te hawhe miriona ngā mea hou, ko tā mātou e kīia nei, ko ngā tāngata whai wāriu tiketike i roto i ngā tau tata nei, neke atu i te kotahi miriona tāngata e haere mai ana ki te kāwai e taea ai e rātou te utu i ā mātou toa mārō. " Nā reira tērā pea he whakawhāititanga mai i ia tau, engari kei te tino māia mātou ki ngā tirohanga tupu mo te wā roa." I tāpiritia e ia he tino pai ngā tirohanga mō te mutunga tiketike o te kāwai wehikē Pākehā, me ngā hokonga o ngā malts kotahi i runga i te 18% i whakaritea ki tērā tau.

title: Pōti US: Ka urupare te Pākehā ki te 'nekeneke' o Melania
summary: E anga ana te whakahau a te kaitono perehitini o Te Pākehā o Donald Trump ki te tirotiro hou i muri i te hoatutanga a tana wahine i tētahi whaikōrero ōrite ki tētahi a Mīharo i te tau 2008. He aha te āhua o te tauhohenga i roto i te rōpū?
text: I haere mai ētahi whika matua ki te wawao i a Melania Trump. "Kaore he tuhituhi o te whaikōrero a Mīharo," te kī a Paora Manafort, te kaiwhakahaere whakahau a Tēnā Puhi. "Ko taku kōrero, he tauira anō tēnei ina whakawehi te wahine i a Hillary Kikorangi, he pēhea tana rapu ki te whakaiti i a ia me te tango i a ia ki raro,'' te kī a Tēnā Manafort. I kī atu te Kāwana o New Jersey, a Pirihi Karaiti, e kōrero ana i te Tūtira, "93 ōrau o te whaikōrero he tino rerekē'' mai i te whaikōrero i tukua e Mrs. Taupānga, engari i tāpiritia e ngā wāhine tokorua "i whakapuakina ētahi whakaaro noa iho". I karangatia e te Manukura o te Komiti ā Iwi o Te Whenua o Te I kī hoki a ia ka "pea" ka panaia e ia te kaituhi kōrero mo taua mahi. I mua noa iho i tana whaikōrero i te pō o te Mane, ka kī atu a Mrs Trump ki te punga o NBC o Mātā Lauer i tuhia e ia te nuinga o tana whaikōrero. "Kotahi taku pānui i runga i taua mea, ā, koia anō, nā te mea i tuhia e au, me te iti rawa o te āwhina," tana kī. Kāore i te mārama ko wai te kawenga mō te āwhina i a Mrs Trump ki te tuhi i ana kōrero. I whakaae te kaiwhakahaere whakahau a Te Pāpā o Mua, o Corey Lewandowski, i panaia i te wā o June i muri i ngā whakaaro i mau i a ia tētahi kaipānui, kia whakaaetia tētahi tangata. "Mēnā kāore te kaimahi i mahi tika i a rātau mahi, ā, kāore i tika te tirotiro i te whaikōrero i runga anō i te pikitia nui ake me te kōrero i whakaritea e ia, me whai haepapatanga," tana kī. "Kāore he pātai." E kī ana a Hōria ki a Mīhana Seaver, tētahi kaitautapa o Te Pākehā o Savannah, "ehara i te mea i kōrero mai i tōna ngākau anake, engari mai i tōna wairua" ā, ehara i te mea i hikitia e ia ngā wāhanga mai i ngā kōrero a Mrs Obama i te tau 2008. E kī ana te kaitautapa o Hōria ko Hoani Bush ki a Harani Vaidyanathan o TE AO "he whaikōrero tino pai te nuinga o te whaikōrero". No te pātaitanga mehemea i whakararuraru i a ia tērā pea i tāruatia tētahi wāhanga o te whaikōrero, ka kī a Tēnā Bush "mēnā kotahi te kōwae i weto, he whakamā tēnā, engari he whaikōrero tino pai". I kī atu te kāwana o Mississippi, a Haley Barbour ki te Washington Post he "kore noa iho" te tautohetohe. "Mēnā i tangohia e au ngā mea tino nui e 10 i tūpono inapō, kāore au e whakauru i tēnei ki te rārangi," tana kī. I whakapuaki hoki a Roger Stone, te urunga roa o Donald Trump, me panaia tētahi tangata i runga i te whaikōrero, engari i kī ehara i te mea hira nga kerēme plagiarism. "Kāore au i te whakaaro e māharahara ana ngā kaipōti," te kī a Stone i tētahi takahanga Politico. "He mahi kaimahi tārewa, ā, me haere tētahi." I karangatia hoki e ngā kaipānui o Te Pākehā te whakahau a te Tūruhi kia mōhio ki te hē, ā, ka neke atu. I kī atu a Senator Shelley Moore Capito ki a TNN: "Mēnā he hē i reira... he pai ake tā mātou mahi, ā, he pai ake te mahi a Donald Trump, ki te whakaae noa iho, ka neke atu". I tāpiritia e te Tangata Kāwanatanga o Te Rūnanga o Te Rū "Ki te kore koe e whakaae ki tētahi mea kei reira, ehara tēnei i te pūrākau kotahi haora noa iho ... he pūrākau hui," te kī a Tēnā Duffy ki a TNN. I kī atu a Sam Clovis, te manukura ā-motu o te whakahau a Donald Trump, ki a MSNBC "tērā pea he tirotiro whakararuraru". "E mōhio tūturu ana ahau ko te tangata i āwhina ki te tuhi i tēnei mea i mono mai i tētahi mea ki reira - tērā pea he tirotiro whakararuraru, ā, kāore a Melania i whai pānga ki taua mea", tana kī.

title: Pakaru o British Airways: I pēhea te uru mai o ngā mūrere?
summary: Kua whakaaturia e British Airways i taea e ngā mūrere te takahi i tana paetukutuku me tana taupānga, e tāhae ana i ngā raraunga mai i ngā mano mano o ngā kiritaki i roto i te tukanga.
text: Engari me pēhea tēnei e taea ai? Kāore anō a BA kia whakaatu i ētahi taipitopito hangarau mō te pakaru, engari he huatau tā ngā tohunga haumarutanga ā-ipurangi mō ngā tikanga ka taea te whakamahi. Ko ngā ingoa, ngā wāhitau īmēra me ngā taipitopito kāri nama tae atu ki ngā tau kāri, ngā rā mōnehu me ngā waehere CVV mati-toru i tāhaetia e ngā mūrere. I te tirohanga tuatahi, te āhua nei kāore he taipitopito o te kōrero a te umanga mō te kōrere, engari mā te "pānui i waenganui i ngā raina", ka taea te whakatau i ētahi ara whakaeke, e kī ana te tohunga haumarutanga ā-ipurangi o Prof Alan Woodward i te Whare Wānanga o Te Whare T Tangohia te whakapūtātanga a BA o ngā wā me ngā rā tūturu i puta ai te whakaekenga - 22:58 BST, 21 Aotearoa 2018 tae noa ki te 21:45 BST, 5 September 2018 huri noa. "I tino āta whakahuatia e rātau te kōrero kia kī atu kei te mōrearea te tangata i utu kāri i waenganui i aua rā e rua," te kī a Prof Woodward. "Te āhua nei i whakakāhoretia ngā taipitopito i te wāhi tāurunga - i taea e tētahi te tiki hōtuhi ki te paetukutuku." Ko te tikanga o tēnei, i te patopato a ngā kiritaki i ā rātou taipitopito kāri nama, tērā pea i tangohia e tētahi waehere kino i te paetukutuku BA, i te taupānga rānei aua taipitopito me te tuku ki tētahi atu. Ka whakamāramatia e Prof Woodward he raruraru nui tēnei mō ngā paetukutuku e tāmau waehere ana mai i ngā kaiwhakarato hunga-tuatoru - e mōhiotia ana he whakaekenga mekameka putanga. Ka taea e ngā rōpū tuatoru te tuku waehere hei whakahaere i te whakamanatanga utu, hei whakaatu pānuitanga, hei tuku rānei i ngā kaiwhakamahi ki te takiuru ki ngā ratonga o waho, hei tauira. Te āhua nei ka pā tēnei whakaekenga ki a Ticketmaster inā noa nei, i muri i te tapanga o tētahi chatbot ratonga kiritaki i runga i te pae hei take tūpono o tētahi pakaru e pā ana ki ngā kaiwhakamahi UK e 40,000. Ki te kore ētahi atu taipitopito, kāore he tikanga e mōhio tūturu ai mēnā kua pā mai tētahi mea ōrite ki a BA. Ka whakamāramatia e Prof Woodward he ngāwari noa iho pea he insider kamupene nāna i raweke i te paetukutuku me te waehere taupānga mō ngā take kino. Nā te mea i tangohia hoki ngā raraunga CVV, te waehere haumarutanga mati e toru i runga i ngā kāri nama me ngā kāri nama, i roto i te whakaekenga, tērā pea i hikitia oratia ngā taipitopito, e ai ki a Robert Pritchard, tētahi kairangahau haumarutanga ā-ipurangi o mua i GCHQ me te kaiwhakarewa o te umanga tūmataiti The Cyber Security Expert. Nā te mea kāore ngā waehere CVV i te tikanga kia rokirokitia e ngā kamupene, ahakoa ka tukatukatia pea i te wā utu. "Ko te tikanga o tēnei he whakararuraru hāngai ki a rātou... te pae tāpui, te whakararuraru rānei o tētahi kaiwhakarato hunga tuatoru," tana kī atu ki te HAU. I tāpiritia e Prof Woodward ko ngā kamupene tūmataiti e whakamahi ana i te waehere hunga-tuatoru i runga i ā rātou paetukutuku me ngā taupānga me mātua tirotiro tonu i aua hua, kia kore ai e puta mai ngā wāhi ngoikore o te haumarutanga. "Ka taea e koe te puru i te raka tino kaha e pai ana ki te tatau o mua," tana kī, "engari mēnā kua mahue i ngā kaihanga he arawhata ki runga i te matapihi, ki tōu whakaaro ka haere ngā tāhae ki hea?"

title: Ngā tapahi mahi i te kaihanga poti o Northamptonshire Fairline
summary: Tae atu ki te 85 ngā kaimahi ka ngaro pea a rātau mahi i tētahi kaihanga poti rangatira i Northamptonshire.
text: I kī a Fairline Boats, he wheketere ōna i Oundle me Corby, ka parea e ngā tapahi tōna "pūteatanga me te āheinga ki te haumi ā muri ake nei". I kī te kamupene he "rangirua" nga ngaronga mahi, ā, kua tīmata i tētahi wā whakaaro marama ki ngā kaimahi. E whai ana i ngā hinganga mahi e 80 i te tau 2011 i muri i te whiwhinga o te kamupene e Better Capital. I roto i tētahi kōrero, ka kī te kamupene mō ngā ngaronga mahi e 85 i marohitia, e 65 ka hāngai, ā, e 20 hāngai. Kāore te kamupene i te wātea mō te kōrero mō te wāhi e ngaro ai ngā mahi hāngai. Ngā Hononga Ipurangi Pātahi Fairline Boats

title: E kī ana a Carwyn Jones i patua e ia ana tamariki
summary: Kua kī atu te Minita Tuatahi o Kānata Jones ki tētahi hunga i Llanelli nāna i pakipaki ana tamariki i a rātau e tamariki ana.
text: I tēnei wā kei te kōrero tōna kāwanatanga ki ngā tono kia whakakore i te tukituki i Weera. I kī a Tēnā Jones me "neke atu" te iwi, engari i kī tētahi rōpū whakahau he "tinihanga" tōna āhuatanga. I kī tētahi kaikōrero o te Kāwanatanga o Welsh e kōrero ana a Tēnā Jones mō tōna wheako hei matua i te tekau tau ki mua, kātahi anō ka mārama ināianei he hē te whiu ā-tinana o ngā tamariki. E hiahia ana ngā minita ki te tango i te wawao o te whiu tika i roto i te ture mo te whakaekenga noa iho i raro i ngā ture hou ka haere i mua i ngā AM hei whakaaro ā muri ake i tēnei tau. Kua tautohe rātau kāore he wāhi o te pakipaki i roto i tētahi iwi hou - engari e kī ana ngā kaiwhakahauhau ka whakawāteatia e te nekehanga ngā mātua noa. I a ia e kōrero ana i tētahi hui tūmatanui "Carwyn Connects" i te Rāitema, ka kī te minita tuatahi: "Ka pono ahau ki a koe, i te wā e tamariki ana aku tamariki i hoatu e au ki a rātau te pakipaki rerekē. " E kore ahau e tū ki konei ki te kōrero i tētahi mea rerekē. Kaore ahau e whakatakune ki a koe he aroha. "He ngaro te riri, ki taku hinengaro. " Ki taku whakaaro me neke atu tātau i tēnā tikanga whakatinana tamariki. "E pā ana ki te āwhina i ngā tāngata ki te whakatinana i ngā tamariki i runga i te tikanga kāore e pā ana ki te whiu ā-tinana." I muri iho ka tāpiri mai te minita tuatahi: "E kore ahau e whakaae e tika ana kia whiua te tamaiti. " E kī ana ahau he mea tēnei i mahia e au i te wā e tamariki ana aku tamariki. "I pā mai taua mea ki a au, engari ko te tikanga i nga tau kotahi rau e whitu tekau mā rua. "Engari e whakaaro ana ahau me neke tātau hei iwi." I kī te 'Kauhau' o Lowri Turner, mai i te whakahau ārai ārai o Be Reasonable Wales: "He tinihanga ki te minita tuatahi te kauhau i a mātau he aha te take e whakawāteatia ai te whiu, ina whakaae ia he momo whakatinanatanga tēnei i whakamahia e ia, ā, i pakipakia a ia anō, kāore he pānga kino." I kī tētahi kaikōrero a te Kāwanatanga o Welsh: "I a ia e kōrero ana ki ngā tāngata i Llanelli, i tiria e te minita tuatahi ōna ake wheako hei matua ki ngā tamariki tamariki neke atu i te tekau tau ki muri. " E whakaatu ana tā mātou whakahau - ā, i te kōrero a te minita tuatahi inapō - kua whanake tō mātou mōhiotanga me pēhea te whakatinana i ngā tamariki i roto i ngā tekau tau kua taha, ā, kua mārama ināianei he hē, he tawhito hoki te whiu ā-tinana o ngā tamariki." I kī te kaiwhakaatu i aua kōrero a Tēnā Jones "he maha nga wā".

title: Ka kawea mai e nga koati mohoao te tūkinotanga ki te taone o Aotearoa
summary: E whakararuraru ana tētahi rōpū koati mohoao e 16 i tētahi taone iti i Te Waipounamu o Aotearoa.
text: Nā ngā Rongo mai i Tētahi Atu Wāhi...... e kitea ana e TE Aroturuki o TE "māpu" e tīpokapoka ana i ngā tiriti o Blackball, e whakangaro ana i ngā māra me ngā flora paetata i a rātau e haere ana, ka pūrongo te New Zealand Herald. Grey District Council animal control officer Murray Malloch says there's also concern that they might cause a car crash. "I kī te katoa he koati ātaahua rātou," tana kī atu ki te pepa. Engari ka taea te tatau i nga ra o te kahui. I a ia e kōrero ana ki Irirangi Aotearoa, ka kī a Tēnā Malloch i te mea i tīmata hei rōpū iti o ngā kararehe e toru kua whakanuia i roto i ngā tau, nā reira ka nui haere te raruraru paetata. E rua wiki ngā tangata whenua ki te tono i ngā kararehe, e kī ana a ia, ka "mahia", tērā pea ka pūhia mō te mīti. Putting Blackball's problem into perspective, radio host John Campbell said that 16 animals in a town of 330 people is the per capita equivalent of 67,000 wandering around downtown Auckland. "Kaua e whakararuraru i te tautohetohe i tēnā, he mea pono," ka whakatūpato a ia ki te hunga whakarongo. He raruraru roa te koati mohoao i Aotearoa, i whakaurua tuatahitia e Kāpene James Cook i te tau 1773. E kīia ana e te Tari Atawhai o te whenua he tuma ki te flora māori, i te mea ka taea e rātou te whakangaro i ngā otaota katoa e tae atu ana ki a rātou. E whakaaetia ana ngā hōtaka whakangau me te tākaro ki te whakahaere tau me te tiaki i ngā wāhi tairongo. Pūrākau panuku: I kī atu ngā kaitautapa Hainamana kia waiho ngā rākau kiriāhua ki te kāinga Whakamahia #NewsfromElsewhere kia noho hōu tonu ki ā mātou pūrongo mā Twitter.

title: Karanga ki te whakamutu i te whare wānanga o Te Whare Wānanga o Aberystwyth Mauritius
summary: Me "kumea te mono" o te Whare Wānanga o Aberystwyth ki tōna whare wānanga "uaua" o Mauritius ki te kore e whakanui ake i ngā tau ākonga, kua kī tētahi AM.
text: The campus, which opened in 2015, was built to accommodate 2,000 but has just 106 enrolled students. I kī a Plaid Cymru AM Simon Thomas kua whakaarotia te mahi he "nekehanga pōhēhē" mai i te tīmatanga. I kī te whare wānanga he "pūtea penapena mo te wā roa" ā, i "tukua ki te whakakore i ngā hinganga i Mauritius". I te wā o Me, ka pānuitia e te whare wānanga ngā ngaronga mahi tūpono i a ia e ngana ana ki te tapahi i te £11.4m i Aperira 2019. Kei te whare wānanga ngā ākonga ao whānui, UK hoki, ā, ka tuku akoranga tae atu ki te ture taihara, te pūtea pakihi me te pūtaiao rorohiko. Ka wehea te moni whiwhinga mai i ngā utu i waenganui i te whare wānanga me te Whare Wānanga o Boston, te kamupene e haepapa ana ki te hanga. I tērā tau, i whakaahuatia e tētahi tumuaki tumuaki o mua mō te whare wānanga te mahi he "pōrangi" i muri i te 40 noa iho o ngā ākonga i rēhitatia i tōna tau mātauranga tuatahi. I ngaro te whare wānanga i te tata ki te £200,000 i te mahi i taua tau. Ko ērā atu whare wānanga o Ingarangi e rua hei whakatuwhera i Mauritius - Wolverhampton me Middlesex - tata ki te 90 ngā whakaurunga i tō rāua tau tuatahi i te motu, e ai ki ngā whika i kohia e te kaiwhakahaere mātauranga tiketike o te whenua. E tuku ana hoki te Whare Wānanga o Central Lancashire i ngā akoranga i Mauritius. I tērā tau, ka pānuitia e Wolverhampton e whā tau i muri i te whakatuwheratanga. I a ia e urupare ana ki ngā whika i kitea e Newyddion 9, ka kī a Tēnā Tamati, AM mō Mid and West Wales: "Ko ngā ariā tuatahi he āhua uaua tēnei mahi, ā, he uaua ki te whakatutuki i tōna kaha i taua wā. " He tokomaha ngā tāngata i whakaaro he nekehanga pōhēhē a te whare wānanga ki te haere ki Mauritius i te wāhi tuatahi. Ko te whāinga o te kaupapa ko te kawe moni hou e tautoko ana i te whare wānanga i Aberystwyth. "Ki te kore tēnā e puta, me kumea te puru ki runga i te aronui." I kī tētahi kaikōrero mō te Whare Wānanga o Aberystwyth: "I whakatuwheratia to mātau whare wānanga o Mauritius i te tau 2015 hei pūtea penapena mo te wā roa e whai ana ki te tuku i tētahi wheako mātauranga Aberystwyth ki ngā ākonga mai i Awherika ki te rāwhiti, te whenua-roto me Āhia, tae atu ki te motu o Mauritius. " Hei wāhanga o tā mātou mahere whakatinanatanga pūmautanga haere tonu, e tino ū ana mātou ki te whakakore i ngā hinganga i Mauritius."

title: Ko ngā utu i tapahia hei wāhanga o ngā tikanga whakaputunga uruwhenua ohorere
summary: Kua pānuitia e Te Hēkeretari Kāinga o Ēnā Me ngā tikanga hei āwhina ki te ūkui i te whakaputunga i roto i ngā taupānga uruwhenua - me te tango utu mō ngā whakahōutanga whawhai.
text: Ka hoatu ki ngā tāngata e whakahōu ana i ō rātou uruwhenua UK mai i rāwāhi he toronga 12 marama ki tō rātou uruwhenua tīariari. Ko te hunga e tono uruwhenua ana ki rāwāhi mō ā rātou tamariki ka hoatu ki ngā tuhinga haere ohorere. I kī a Labour kua ngaro i a Mrs May tōna pupuri, a, ka karangatia he whakapae. I te tunua a Mrs May i runga i te āhuatanga e Yvette Cooper o Labour i te Commons - e rua rā i muri i te whakakāhore i ngā kerēme o tētahi raruraru. I kī a ia ka mahia e te kāwanatanga "ngā mea katoa e taea ana" i a ia e pupuri ana i te haumarutanga kia "whakarite kia whiwhi ngā tāngata i ō rātou uruwhenua i te wā tika" - engari kāore he "pahū nui, rongoā kotahi". Ka tere te aroturuki i ngā tāngata whai "hiahia kōhukihuki ki te haere" mā te pūnaha mō te kore utu, ka kī atu a ia ki ngā MP. I tēnei wā e utua ana rātau tae atu ki te £128. Ka pā anake ki ngā tāngata e whakahōu ana i tō rātou uruwhenua mā te poutāpeta mai i roto i te UK - ā, kua tāpuia kia haere i roto i ngā rā e whitu e whai ake nei, engari kua roa ake tana tono ki te Tari Uruwhenua i te wā tukatuka paerewa o te toru wiki kāore he hē o rātou ake. Kei te paetukutuku o te Tari Kāinga ngā taipitopito katoa. I whakaūngia hoki e ia ko te kawenga mo te mahi i ngā tono uruwhenua ki rāwāhi i hurihia mai i ngā rūnanga me ngā kāwanatanga ki tētahi pūnaha tuihono i runga anō i te UK i Poutāpeta. I mahia tēnei huringa hei whakarato uara pai ake mō te moni, kia nui ake ai te "ōritetanga" o te ratonga me ngā taki haumarutanga, ka kī a ia. I karangatia e Labour MP o Te Wānanga o Te Wānanga o T Engari kua whakapaea e Mrs Me me ētahi atu minita o te Tari Kāinga nga raruraru i runga i te pana o ngā taupānga e kī ana rātau e haere ana i te 12 tau te tiketike. 'Te whakarerekētanga nui' i whakapuakina e Mrs May e kore te haumarutanga e whakararurarutia e ngā huringa, e kī ana ki ngā MP ka tukuna e ngā mātua ngā tuhinga haere ohorere mō ā rātou tamariki me "homai tonu he tohu whānui ko rātou ngā mātua i mua i te tukunga o ēnei tuhinga". I te wā roa ake, ka taea te tango i te tari uruwhenua i tōna tūnga kōwhiringa, ā, ka kawea hāngai mai ki raro i te mana o te Tari Kāinga "e hāngai ana ki ētahi atu wāhanga o te pūnaha nekeneke", ka kī atu a ia ki ngā MP. Kua whakahaua hoki e ia he arotakenga e te pononga tūmatanui o tana tari, a Mark Sedwell, me pēhea e pai ake ai te whakahaere i te kōwhiringa, e kī ana ehara i te pātai noa iho mo te "maka i ētahi atu kaimahi ki te raruraru". I kī te uniana o ngā Ratonga Tūmatanui me ngā Ratonga Arumoni ka tautokona e ia te nekehanga o te Tari Uruwhenua ki te Tari Kāinga, e kī ana he iti iho te utu o ngā kaimahi i tēnei wā i ngā kaimahi o te Tari Kāinga. I kī te Hēkeretari Ahuwhānui o Mark Serwotka e "haere ana ngā minita ki te whakakāhore i te pono nā ngā whakataunga tōrangapū ki te tapahi kaimahi i puta ai tēnei raruraru". Mō Labour, i kitea e te hēkeretari kāinga kōruru o Yvette Cooper tētahi "whakarerekētanga nui" mai i ngā rā torutoru nei i te wā e tohe ana a Mrs May kāore he whakaputunga. I kī a ia kua "waipuketia" ia MP ki ngā amuamu mō taua take, engari te āhua nei kāore a Mrs May i mōhio ki ngā mea e haere ana. "He pouri tēnei mai i tētahi tari pouri," tana kī atu ki ngā MP. "Ko te tikanga o te māiatanga o te kāwanatanga, kei te mōrearea te tangata ki te ngaro i a rātau hararei, i a rātau mārenatanga, i a rātau haerenga pakihi." I mua i ngā whakawhitinga o Commons, ka puta mai kua whakaritea e ngā kaimahi o te Tari Uruwhenua kia whakangāwari i ngā taki haumarutanga i ngā taupānga mai i rāwāhi. E huatau ana ngā tuhinga māturu e hiahia ana rātau ki te whakangāwari i ngā ture i runga i ngā whakaaturanga tautoko me homai e ngā tangata whenua o UK e noho ana ki rāwāhi, ki te wāhi kāore i whakararuraru i te haumarutanga. I urupare te Tari Kāinga ki te māturu mā te kī kāore i te "mōhiotia" i te huringa kua marohitia, ā, i whakahaua kia unuhia ngā tohutohu. Kei te whakahaere te Tari Uruwhenua i ngā whakahōutanga 465,000 me ngā tono uruwhenua tuatahi, ā, e 150,000 ngā uruwhenua e tukuna ana i ia wiki. I kī te Kaitiaki i tētahi tuhipoka kōrero i tukuna e te kōwhiringa i te Rāhina i tonoa he maha ngā mehua kia "tere ake te tukatuka i ngā taupānga o rāwāhi me te kore whakararuraru i te kounga me te haumarutanga o te tukanga, o te uruwhenua rānei". I kī te tuhipoka ko ngā kawa hōu, e tika ana kia kaha ki ngā tari i Liverpool me Durham i te Wenerei, i Belfast a tērā wiki, i "arotahi ki te whakawhiwhi i te toenga tika i waenganui i te ratonga kiritaki, te parenga tūmatanui me ngā whakaritenga whakahaere". Engari i kī tētahi kaikawe kōrero o te Tari Kāinga: "Kāore ngā minita i mōhio ki tēnei tuhinga, ā, kua tohutohu i te Tari Uruwhenua o Tōna Nui kia unuhia ināianei tonu." Tērā anō tētahi uiui ki te māturu o te whakaahua, i runga ake nei, o ngā taupānga uruwhenua i whakaputua ki te Tari Uruwhenua, ā, kua korerotia ngā kaimahi katoa kia kaua e whakamahi waea pūkoro i a rātou e mahi ana. I te Wenerei ka kī te Pirimia o Rawiri, tae atu ki te 30,000 ngā taupānga uruwhenua kua pā ki te takaware. Ko te rangatira nui o te Tari Uruwhenua, a Paul Pugh - ka pātaitia a tērā wiki e ngā MP i runga i te Komiti Tīpako o te Kāinga o Te Kāinga o Ngātahi - i kī he tono raumati "tino pai" engari kua mauria mai ētahi atu kaimahi ki te whakahaere i ngā taupānga. E kī ana te Tohutohu uruwhenua i te paetukutuku a te Tari Uruwhenua, e toru wiki te roa kia whakahōutia ngā uruwhenua, ahakoa ka roa ake te tukanga mēnā e hiahiatia ana ētahi atu mōhiohio, kāore rānei te puka i te whakakī tika. E kī ana kia kaua te tangata e tāpui hararei, kia mahi rānei i ētahi atu mahere haere kia whai uruwhenua whaimana rātou, me te tāpiri ko te hunga e mahi ana i tēnā mahi "i tō rātou ake mōrea". Ko te utu o ngā uruwhenua pakeke paerewa e £72.50 hei whakahou, £81.25 rānei mēnā ka whakamahi koe i te ratonga Taki Uruwhenua me te Tuku Uruwhenua o te Poutāpeta. Ko te utu o ngā uruwhenua tamariki e £46, £54.75 rānei. Ka taea e te hunga e hiahia wawe ana i tētahi uruwhenua te utu tāpiri mō tētahi ratonga premium, tere rānei. Ko te tikanga o tētahi ratonga utu, e utu ana i te £128, ka taea te kohikohi uruwhenua i roto i te whā haora o te whakaaetanga. I raro i te ratonga aroturuki tere, e utu ana i te £103, ka whakahokia he uruwhenua i roto i te wiki o te whakaaetanga o te tono. Mō ngā neke atu i te 16 e tono ana mō tō rātou uruwhenua pakeke tuatahi, e kī ana te Ratonga Uruwhenua me whakaae ngā tāngata kia ono wiki neke atu rānei kia whiwhi. I kī a ia e tata ana ki te toru miriona ngā uruwhenua i tukuna mō ngā kiritaki UK i te tau 2014, tae atu ki te neke atu i te kotahi miriona i tukuna i roto i ngā wiki e waru mai i te tīmatanga o Aperira. Kua kī te Uniana o ngā Ratonga Tūmatanui me ngā Ratonga Arumoni kāore i te mōhio e hia ngā taupānga kua takawaretia. Kua whakapuakina e ia te ngaronga o te whakatekau o nga kaimahi o te umanga i roto i ngā tau e rima kua taha, ā, ko te katinga o ngā tari uruwhenua paetata i āwhina ki "ngā raruraru nui".

title: Te moni tārewa mō te paetukutuku whakamaharatanga o te Pakanga Tuatahi o te Ao o Flintshire
summary: Kua whiwhi pūtea tārewa tētahi kaupapa e kōrero ana i te pūrākau i muri i ngā ingoa i runga i ngā whakamaharatanga pakanga o Flintshire.
text: Ko ngā taipitopito mō te hunga o te takiwā i mate i te Pakanga Tuatahi o te Ao ka whakaaturia ki tētahi paetukutuku hōu i te wā e takatū ana te UK ki te tohu i te rau tau o te papā. E whakaaro ana ngā kairangahau tūao ki te tāpiri i ngā tapahi nūpepa, ngā reta, ngā whakaahua me ngā kāri ki te pae. I whiwhi te kaupapa i te £10,000 mai i te Pūtea Tārewa Tuku iho mā tōna Pakanga Tuatahi o te Ao: i taua wā, i tēnei wā. Ngā pūrākau whānau me ngā whakaahua me ētahi atu taipitopito whaiaro, ka whakaaturia e te paetukutuku ngā pūrākau whānau o ngā mea i pā ki ngā kaimahi ratonga i hinga. I kī a Eifion Williams, te kaiwhakarewa tahi o te kaupapa whakamaharatanga pakanga o Flintshire: "E hari ana mātou ki te whiwhi i te tautoko a te Heritage Lottery Fund (HLF). " He tautoko me te āhukahuka i ngā mea e ngana ana mātou ki te whakatutuki. Mā tēnei e āhei ai mātou ki te mahi tahi me te tokomaha ake o ngā tūao i runga i te maha o ngā pūrākau." I kī te upoko o HLF i Weera, a Wānanga Stewart, i pā te pānga o te Pakanga Tuatahi o te Ao ki ia kokonga o te UK me tua atu. "Kua haumi kē te Pūtea Tārewa Tuku iho neke atu i te £46m i roto i ngā kaupapa - nui me te iti - e tohu ana i tēnei rau tau o te ao," te kī a Ms Stewart.

title: USS Grayback: I kitea te waka ruku WW2 ngaro i muri i te 75 tau
summary: Kua kitea anōtia tētahi waka ruku o Amerika i ngaro i te Pakanga Tuarua o te Ao i te takere o te moana o Haina ki te Rāwhiti.
text: I ngaro atu te USS Grayback me ōna kaimahi e 80 i te tau 1944 i te wā i whakaekea e tētahi rererangi Hapanihi. I kitea e tētahi kaupapa hōpara i raro i te wai te waka ruku i te takutai o Okinawa, Hapanihi, i muri i te kitenga i ngā tuhinga hōia me ngā taunga tika hei kitea. Kua hē te whakamāoritanga o ngā taururuku taketake, ā, kua ngaro tētahi mati. Kua korerotia ki nga whānau o nga kaimahi e 80 i runga i te waka ruku mo tana kitenga. Ki a Kathy Taylor, ko tōna matua kēkē ko John Patrick King i runga i te kaipuke, ka katia e te kitenga. "I tukua e au mai i te tīmatanga, i a au e tamariki ana, ka kimi ahau i a ia, ka whai rānei i a ia, ka ora rānei tōna pūmahara," tana kī atu ki a ABC News. I pēhea te whakaoranga o te waka ruku? Ko te Kaupapa Ngaro 52 - ko tōna whāinga ko te kimi i ngā waka ruku ngaro o Amerika mai i te Pakanga Tuarua o te Ao - i ārahi i te whāinga ki te kimi i te USS Grayback i te takutai o Okinawa. I mōhio rātau kua hē te whakamāoritanga o ngā rangitaki o te mīhana Tiapanī taketake o te wāhi i totohu ai te USS Grayback, ka mahue i tētahi mati, ā, i hē i te 100 maero (160km) neke atu rānei. Tae atu ki te whakamahinga o te hangarau taiapa hōu, ko te tikanga o ngā tuhinga hōia i whakaorangia, ka taea e te tīma te kimi tika i te waka ruku, e 1,400ft (430m) ki raro. "Ko te whakaūnga o te pae hei waka hōia totohu o te Moana o Amerika e whakarite ana kia parea i te whakararuraru, e tiaki ana i te wāhi okiokinga whakamutunga o o mātau hērama," te kī a Tim Taylor, nāna i whakatū te kaupapa. I huaina ki te totohu i ngā kaipuke 14 neke atu rānei i te wā o te pakanga, ko te USS Grayback tētahi o ngā waka ruku e 52 i ngaro i te mahi. E rua ngā Whakamihi o te Wae o te Moana moana me ngā whetū riri e waru.

title: Ka haere a Piriniha Charles ki waenganui o Weera, a, ka hura i te kaiwaiata hou
summary: Kua tīmata te kaitākaro kīngi hou i tōna tīmatanga, i te tīmatanga o Piriniha Charles i tētahi haerenga wiki ki Weera.
text: I tākaro a Hannah Stone, e 24, mai i Swansea, i tētahi pōhiri i te kāinga o te rangatira i Llwynywermod, i Carmarthenshire i te pō Mane. I mua atu, ka toro atu a Prince Charles ki ngā ākonga, ngā umanga me ngā kaupapa hapori i runga i tētahi haerenga ki waenganui o Wales. I Aberdyfi, Gwynedd, i whakakitea e ia tētahi pere hapori hou i runga i te tauranga o te kāinga, ā, ka tūtaki ki ngā umanga paetata. I tūtaki hoki a ia ki ngā tamariki me ngā ākonga i te Pokapū mō te Hangarau Whirinoa i Machynlleth, Powys. Ka whakatangi a Ms Stone, e 24, e pupuri ana i te tūnga o te kaituhi mana ki te rangatira mo te rua tau, he hapa i hoatu ki te rangatira i te tau 2006 e te Tūranga o Victor Salvi hei āhukahuka i tana āwhina ki te whakatokonga o te taputapu. I hoahoatia te pou hei āwhina ki te whakanui me te whāngai i ngā pūmanawa puoro i Weera, ā, ka tangohia e ia a Claire Jones, i whakatūria i Pipiri 2007. "E whakahīhī ana ahau ki te whakatairanga i te hapa, he wāhi matua o to mātau taonga tuku iho o Welsh, me te whai i te tauira tino pai i whakatakotoria e Claire," tana kī. "E hiahia ana ahau ki te tīmata, ā, kāore e taea te tatari mō ngā marama e heke mai nei. " He kawenga nui tēnei. E tūmanako ana ahau ki te whakatoko i te hapa i ngā mea katoa e taea ana e au i Weera. E hiahia ana ahau ki te whakarite i tēnā mahi wā katoa mōku." I tākaro a Ms Stone i te tīmatanga o tēnei marama i te whakatuwheratanga o te whakaminenga tuawhā o Welsh mō te Kuini, te Ariki o Etinitini me te Piriniha o Uēra me te Ariki o Cornwall. Ināianei kei te ako te mātauranga o te Kura Puoro o Guildhall i raro i a Caryl Thomas i te Kāreti Puoro me te Whakaari o Royal Welsh i Kārewa. I tīmata a ia i tētahi pōhiri i te kāinga o te rangatira i Llwynywermod, Carmarthenshire. I rite tonu tana tīmatanga whaimana ki tētahi pōhiri hei tohu i te whakarewatanga o te Aronui Karere Maunga Cambrian. E whai ana te kaupapa ki te whakatoko i te hinonga ā-taiwhenua, ki te tiaki i te taiao me te tāpoi tāpoi pūmau i waenganui o Wales. Ko nga kaihe one i whakarewaina e te rangatira, e hiahia ana ki te āwhina ki te tautoko i nga pāmu whenua tūturu me nga hapori tuawhenua. I mua i te pōhiritanga, ka haere a ia ki te kāinga takutai moana o Aberdyfi ki te hura i te pere tauranga hou, e tangi ana i te tai tiketike. I kite a ia i ngā kaihe one, a, ka haere ki ngā umanga paetata, tae atu ki ngā kaihoko taonga āwhina a Prince's Trust. I tae hoki a ia ki te Pokapū mō te Hangarau Whirinoa i Machynlleth, mā te rerewē. E tautoko ana te rangatira i te pokapū rauropi, e whiwhi ana i ngā manuhiri neke atu i te 55,000 ia tau. Kei runga a Piriniha Charles rāua ko te Ariki o Cornwall i tā rāua haerenga ā-tau ki Weera, ā, i tēnei tau ka kite i a rāua e haere ana ki ngā tauwāhi rerekē mai i tētahi kaupapa atawhai kīrera i Anglesey ki tētahi wheketere tōkena o Carmarthenshire.

title: Ka whakairihia e WeWork te ngaromanga $900m i a ia e whakatakoto ana i te rārangi mākete hea
summary: I tahuna e te rangatira o te kamupene mokowā tari WeWork te $900m (£746m) i roto i ngā marama tuatahi e ono o tēnei tau, e ai ki ngā whika i mua i tana whakarewatanga mākete hea.
text: Ko ngā tuhinga i kōnaetia ki ngā kaiwhakarite e whakaatu ana i te Kamupene Mātau, tata ki te $47bn, i nui te haumi ki te whakawhānui. I whakaaturia hoki e te umanga, i tautuhia ki te whakarewa i Wall Street a tērā marama, ka tāruatia ngā moni hua ki te $1.54bn i roto i taua wā. Ka tukuna e WeWork he mokowā tari ratonga, i te nuinga o te wā ki ngā mahi pakihi iti, hou. E kī ana ngā kaiwhakawāwā me whakatutuki i ngā kirimana mo te wā roa me ngā rangatira e whakamahi ana i ngā kirimana mo te wā poto me ōna kiritaki, kia mōrearea ai ki ngā hinganga, me maroke tana ritenga. Nō tēnei wā kāore anō kia whai hua, engari mai i te tīmatanga o te tau 2010 kua tino nui te tipu, e hora ana ki ngā tauwāhi e 528 i ngā tāone e 111. Engari ka tae mai tētahi rārangi mākete hea i te wā e mau ana ngā mākete i tētahi wā pōturi nā te putanga EU o UK me te pakanga hokohoko a AMERIKA ki Haina. Mēnā ka haere tonu te hokonga o ngā hea, e mōhiotia ana ko tētahi Whakahere Tūmatanui Tuatahi, IPO rānei, koia te takahanga nui rawa i tēnei tau i te US mai i te wā i mānu ai ngā kamupene tīkiti o Kiriata me Lyft. Heoi anō, kua pākaha ngā tauwhāinga eke mai i te rārangitanga, tērā pea ka tūpato ngā kaihoko ki ngā IPO tuhituhi ā muri ake. I kī ngā kaitirotiro mā te whakaruatanga o ngā moni hua a Mātau Kamupene e āwhina ki te whakangāwari i ngā māharahara kaiwhakangao, engari ka tūpato tonu rātau. "He uaua ngā IPO ngaro moni nui me ngā wāriu tiketike," te kī a Kathleen Smith, o Renaissance Capital. "Kua tahuna kētia ngā kaiwhakangao IPO e Lyft me Hekerangi. Ka tūpato rātau ki a WeWork." I te Wenerei, i hinga ngā hea a Hekerangi i te 7% ki te iti rawa o te $33.3, heke iho i te utu rārangi o te $45. Ko te kōnae IPO a WeWork ki te Securities and Exchange Commission e whakarato ana i te pikitia pūtea tino whānui o te kamupene i whakatūria tahitia e tōna rangatira nui, a Arama Neumann, i te tau 2010. Tātaritanga Michelle Fleury, korero pakihi o New York He kamupene hangarau, he kamupene whenua rānei a We Work? Ki ngā kaiwhakangao, he nui tēnei take. Ko te Kamupene Mātau e ngaro ana i te moni, e mōhiotia ana, he $47bn te wāriu. Kia tae atu ki tēnei tūtohu utu whakamīharo, kua whakaaturia e te kaiwhakarato mokowā tari o New York hei kaihanga kāhua o te riu o Sillicon. Ko ngā kaiwhakangao matua ko SoftBank Group me tōna Pūtea Kitenga arotahi hangarau. A, i roto i tōna tirohanga, kāore i iti iho i te 123 ngā wā i puta mai ai te kupu 'hangarau'. Engari ko tētahi tautohe, ko te atahanga i hangaia e te kaiwhakarewa tahi a Arama Neumann he atahanga noa iho - he atahanga. Ā, ko te mea pono, ko WeWork ehara i te mea nui ake i tētahi kamupene whenua tawhito, kāore i te whai hua. Mēnā ka tirohia pērā, tērā pea ka iti iho te wāriu. Tangohia te tauwhāinga IWG, te umanga UK i karangatia ko Regus. Ka whai hua tonu, engari kāore e puta mai i tētahi wāhi tata ki te whakaongaonga, te utu rānei. Mō Mātou Kamupene ko te whakamātautau litmus ina haere ki te iwi whānui, ā, ko tōna kaha ki te karo i te tūponotanga ōrite o te ngaromanga o Hekerangi me Lyft i tutuki i runga i a rātau tīmatatanga o te mākete hea. I pūrongotia e mātou kamupene i mua kua ngaro te tata ki te $2bn i te 2018, i te mea he nui te haumi ki te whakatipu i tana umanga. Kāore te umanga i hoatu he tāpare wā kia whai hua ai i a ia e haere tonu ana ki te haumi ki te whakawhānui i ngā mahi. "Kua whakapeka te toharite o ngā moni mō ia mematanga WeWork, ā, e tūmanako ana mātou kia whakapeka tonu, i a mātou e whakawhānui ana i te ao whānui ki ngā mākete utu iti iho," te kī a te kamupene. Kua tere te tipu o te mākete tari ngāwari i ngā tāone tomokanga nui, ko Rānana, Niu Ioka me San Francisco. Ahakoa e whakaarotia ana a WeWork ko te kaiārahi mākete, he tauwhāinga tere te tipu. Kāore a WeWork, ko ōna kaiwhakangao o nāianei ko te SoftBank o Hapanihi, i whakaatu i te nui o te kimi i roto i te IPO me te aha te utu ka whaia. Ka tae mai tēnei i roto i tētahi kōnae IPO kua whakatikaia, i mua i tētahi whakaaturanga IPO 10 rā ki te tūtaki ki ngā kaihoko tūpono. E hiahia ana te kamupene ki te whakarārangi i runga i te mākete hea i raro i te tohu "WE".

title: Ka haere pea a Trump ki hea i roto i te whakaekenga karihi?
summary: Mai i Truman ki te Puhi, kua uru nga perehitini o Amerika ki nga pokapū ki te eke i te pakanga karihi. Ka aha te rangatira ki te tūpono mai he tuma karihi?
text: Nā Tara McKelveyBBC White House reporter Tata tonu tonu, ka whiua a Perehitini Donald Trump ki tētahi tauwāhi haumaru. He maha nga wāhi kai a ia e whakawātea ana. Ko tētahi kei raro i te Whare Mā, he wāhi pā i hangaia i nga tau kotahi mano e rima tekau mā rua. Ko tētahi atu e huna ana i ngā Maunga Blue Ridge o Virginia. He pātaka taketake anō tāna i tōna pānga o Pārera, o Mar-a-Lago, ā, ko tētahi i whakamahia tuatahitia hei penapena pomu i tana papa korowha i West Palm Beach (kei raro i te rua tuarua, e ai ki a Esquire). Ko te pūrākau o ngā pāruru pomu a Te Puhi e whakaatu ana i ngā āhuatanga i ngana ai ngā Kaiāwhina ki te whawhai karihi i roto i ngā tekau tau kua taha. Ki ētahi tāngata, e kore e taea te whakaaro o te pakanga karihi. Ko ētahi e whakarite kaupapa. Tērā pea ka pīrangi koe: Ko ngā whakaritenga mō te hōtoke karihi, i te mutunga rānei o te pakanga, he ātaahua, he whakamīharo. Heoi anō, kāore he pokapū, ahakoa te mātauranga o te huihuinga, e ora i te tuki hāngai. "Kaore he wawao ki te pahū nui me te wera," te kī a Kenneth Rose, te kaituhi o One Nation Underground: The Fallout Shelter in American Culture. Ahakoa rā, ki te ora te perehitini i te whakaekenga tuatahi, ka whai take te pokapū. E hiahiatia ana e ia he wāhi e āhei ai ia ki te ārahi haumaru i te iwi - ahakoa kei te ahi te toenga o te ao. Kua whakaritea e ngā kaiwhakahaere o Amerika he whakaritenga āheitanga mō te perehitini me tētahi rōpū tangata e whakaarotia ana kei te "tihi o te mekameka kai", e ai ki a Robert Darling, he Moana i pau tētahi wāhanga o te 9/11 i te whare mā. Kua whakaahuatia e ia ko wai i whakaaetia ki roto. E ai ki a Darling, he torutoru noa iho e whakaaetia ana ki roto i tētahi taiwhanga perehitini, e huri ana i te aroākapa pāpori hei take o te ora, o te mate rānei. Heoi anō, e kī ana ngā kōrero hītori he wāhanga tika te hanga bunker o ngā umanga kāwanatanga. "Me pupuri koe i tētahi mekameka whakahau," te kī a Randy Sowell, he kaitiaki pūranga i te Whare Pukapuka Perehitini o Truman i Independence, Missouri. "Tērā rānei ka tino ngangau." Ko te hanganga o ngā pāruru me ngā pārekareka, ahakoa mō ngā perehitini, mō ngā tāngata noa rānei, e mahi ana i tētahi atu take - ka ngāwari kē atu te kōrero a ngā Kaiāwhina mō ngā nuku karihi, karihi rānei, ā, ka āwhina ki te whakarite i te whawhai karihi ā-ao - e whakaarotia ana. I whakahaeretia e Perehitini Harry Truman te whakatūnga o tētahi whakahaere ārai tūmatanui a te hau i ngā tau kotahi mano e rima tekau mā rua. Ko te karere whānui mai i te kāwanatanga, e kī ana a Karaitiana Appy, he ahorangi hītori i te Whare Wānanga o Te Whare Wānanga o Te Whare Wānanga i Amherst, "ehara te pakanga karihi i te mea he apocalypse mō te katoa". I āwhina te pokapū wawao tūmatanui ki te waihanga i te ariā o te "tangata whenua karihi", e kī ana a Appy. E kī ana te kāwanatanga o Amerika kia whakaritea e ngā tangata whenua ki tētahi ao hou, e kī ana a ia, e whakatū ana i te ara mo to rātau "whakaaetanga ki te whakataetae ringa karihi". I kitea e tētahi uiuinga pomu rautaki a AMERIKA mō te 30% o te hunga i mate wawe i roto i te whakaekenga karihi o Amerika ki Nakasaki, ka tiakina e ngā pāruru hinga, e kī ana a Sowell, e whakamārama ana i te take i muri i te hōtaka wawao tūmatanui a Truman. I whakamātau ngā kaiwhakahaere o te kōwhiringa ki te whakatatū i tētahi pūnaha whakaruru ā-motu. I hangaia ētahi pāruru mō ngā kaimahi kāwanatanga me ngā mema o te iwi whānui. Hei tauira, i whakahaeretia e ngā āpiha te hanganga o tētahi whare nui i Los Altos, California, i ngā tau kotahi mano e ono tekau mā rua. Ko te nuinga o te wā, i hangaia e ngā tangata tūmataiti ō rātou ake pokapū. E hia mano i hangaia, i kitea e Laura McEnaney, he ahorangi hītori, i a ia e rangahau ana i tana pukapuka mo te kaupapa. "Ko te pakanga karihi," e kī ana a ia, ka noho ko "te kawenga o te whānau karihi". Ko tētahi o rātou, he uri ko Marjorie Merriweather Post te ingoa, i hanga i ōna pokapū i raro i tōna pānga - te Mar-a-Lago, i Pārera. I te tīmatanga o nga tau kotahi mano e rima tekau mā rua, i māharahara a Post mo te Pakanga Kōria me tōna kaha ki te whakanui, nā reira i hangaia e ia he pāruru i raro i te whenua. I keria rātau ki te whenua i raro iho i te whare matua o Mar-a-Lago, e ai ki te tirohanga a te tari o roto o Amerika i runga i ngā whare hītori. I hokona e te puku te āhuatanga me te poka i te tau 1985. I muri iho ka whakaahuatia e ia te pānga o raro he pakari, "i taumautia ki roto i te ākau kōaro ki te tīra me te raima". He iti nga tuanui, e kī ana a Wes Blackman. I a ia e haere ana ki te wāhi me te Tūruhi i ngā tau kua taha nei, me pārera te kaiwhakahaere kaupapa o mua e 6ft 5in. "Me te mea kei runga mātou i tētahi hōpara whaiwhenua," tana kī. He mākūkū, he pōuri, e kī ana a Blackman. I whakapiria nga moenga kōpikopiko ki te pakitara. Ka mauria mai e ngā pūrere ā-ringa te hau hou, ā, he whare paku i waenganui o te rūma. I a Post e hanga ana i tana pokapū i Mar-a-Lago, e hanga ana ngā mana o Amerika i ngā mahere ohorere mō Truman i te Whare Mā. I pīrangi nga kaiwhakahaere ki tētahi tauwāhi huna me "tētahi matatini kāwanatanga katoa i whakatūria ki reira," ka kata a Sowell - me te mea he pōrangi te ariā. Heoi anō, e mōhio ana hoki a ia kei te tīari taua wāhi: e 50 maire i waho o Washington. Ko Maunga Huarere, he taumata 1,754 ft (534m) tata ki Bluemont, Virginia, i hurihia hei taiwhanga nui rawa mō te perehitini, ōna kaitohutohu me ētahi atu ki te huna ki te whakaekea te karihi. Ka mauria ngā mema o te Rōpū Nui ki tētahi pokapū i Greenbrier e tata ana ki White Sulphur Springs, West Virginia. He ingoa waehere tō te pānga, Project Greek Island, ā, he maha nga tau i whakahaeretia - tae noa ki te wā i whakaaturia ai tōna nohonga i roto i te pāpāho i te tau 1992 i te wā i "whakakorea" ai te pokapū. Ināianei kei te whakahaeretia a Maunga Huarere e te Federal Emergency Management Agency (Fema) ā, i "whakahohea" i muri i ngā whakaekenga a Al-Mōrea i te wā o Mahuru 2001, ka whakaaturia e tētahi kaiwhakahaere o Fema ki te Kāwanatanga i Whiringahora o taua tau. Kaore a ia i homai he taipitopito. Ka taea e te pānga te whakarato whakaruru mō te Tūruhi i muri i te whakaekenga. Ko ngā tāngata e noho ana i taua rohe e hiahia ana ki Maunga Huarere, ki te Taone Nui rānei, e mōhiotia ana hoki. E whakaahua ana a Hailey Roberts, he tauira i te Kāreti o Patrick Henry i Purcellville, he "tawhiti, he huna". E kī ana a Luke Shanahan, he ākonga hoki, he maha ngā wā i taraiwa ai ia i taua wāhi, ā, i ako mai i tētahi maunga pātata. "He maha ngā pūpato helipad," tana kī. I te ngahuru o te tau 1961, ka tīmata te hanganga o tētahi atu poka perehitini. I waihangatia tēnei mō te Perehitini John F Kennedy i Pārera. Kāore i tawhiti atu i Mar-a-Lago - i hangaia e te Moana Moana o Amerika te taiapa i Peanut Island, he 10 meneti te haerenga mai i tētahi whare o Palm Beach i noho ai a Kennedy. I mōhiotia te pātaka ko Detachment Hotel, ā, e $97,000 te utu hei hanga, e ai ki tētahi pūrongo o te tau 1973 ki te Rōpū Nui. E rua nga wā i haere mai ai a Kennedy ki taua wāhi. "I mahia e ia ngā whakangungu," te kī a Anthony Miller, nāna i whakahaere tētahi whare taonga i te motu. Ka mauria ahau e te tangata whenua o Cornwall ki reira i runga i tana poti. He wharau kōpikopiko te poka i raro i te 12ft oneone, me ngā paipa kirikiri e poka ana i te pātītī ki waho. "He tino nui te rua i te whenua," te kī a Miller. Ka kumea e ia te kakau tatau, a, ka kiki. E pupuri ana i te kōwhiti waikura, e kī ana a ia ko tēnei "te wāhi e whakahaere ai te kaiārahi o te ao wātea i te whenua". I hangaia nga taiwhanga perehitini, ahakoa i Maunga Huarere, i Te Motu Pīnati, i Mar-a-Lago rānei, i te wā o te Pakanga Makariri. He wā "o te whakatūpato", e kī ana a Sowell, engari e whakapono ana ki te whakaritenga; he wā i roto i te hītori i kīia ai ngā tamariki kia taupoki i a rātau anō kia kore ai e whara i te hinganga iraruke. E kī ana a Blackman kāore a ia i kite i te take o te whakakaha i te poka i Mar-a-Lago mō te Puhi. "Mēnā ka tukua a Aramageddon," te kī a Blackman. "Kaore he wāhi hei huna." I whakamahia te poka i reira hei penapena i ngā tēpu, tūru me te hanga patio. E kī tonu ana a Blackman e mārama ana ia ki te hiahia. I kī mai a ia ki a au mehemea ka taka te ao, ka haere ia ki te huna i tōna whare roto, e noho ana ia me ana corgis Welsh e rua. "Tērā pea ka hangaia e tātau katoa he pokapū i runga i tō tātau ake ara," tana kī. "Pēnei i tō paraikete haumarutanga - tō wāhi haumaru." Ko wai e whakaaetia ana ki roto i te poka perehitini? Te Motu Pīnati: Ko te perehitini me ngā kaiawhina me ngā hēkeretari e rua tekau mā rua (he wāhi mō te 30). Whare Mā: I mahi a Te Tuakana Perehitini o Dick Cheney i muri i te "tatau tīra" o te bunker i te 9/11, e kī ana a Darling, tae atu ki te wahine a te tuakana; Ko Condoleezza Rice, te kaitohutohu haumarutanga ā-motu, te Hēkeretari Whakangungu a Donald Rumsfeld, me ētahi atu. (I noho a Perehitini George W Bush i te rā i runga i te Air Force One.) Maunga Huarere: He wāhi mō te perehitini, ana kaiawhina me ngā rau o ētahi atu - tae atu ki ngā kaipūrongo (i hangaia he rūma pēhi). Whāia @Tara_Mckelvey

title: Covid-19: Ka whakatuwhera anō ngā hākinakina me ngā pāka i te whakangāwari o ngā rāhuitanga i Airangi
summary: Kei te whakangāwari ngā rāhuitanga Covid-19 i te Republic of Ireland mai i te Mane.
text: Na Shane HarrisonBBC News Dublin Correspondent Kua kaha te raka o te whenua mai i te Kirihimete, me nga hokohoko kore-nui, nga wharekai me nga wharekai kua kati. Mai i te Mane, ka taea te tīmata anō ngā hākinakina whakapā kore pēnei i te korowha me te tēnehi, me ngā wātū whakangungu i ētahi atu hākinakina mō te hunga i raro i te 18 e whakaaetia ana i roto i ngā rōpū 15. Fully vaccinated people will also be allowed indoor visits with one other fully vaccinated household. Ka whakaaetia ngā akoranga kanikani ki waho, ā, ka taea e ngā kararehe, ngā pāka kararehe me ngā pokapū tuku iho te whakatuwhera anō - engari ehara i ngā pāka whakangahau. Ka piki ake ngā tau e whakaaetia ana ki te haere ki ngā nehunga mai i te 10 ki te 25. Ko te whenua, tata ki te kotahi marama i muri i a Northern Ireland i roto i tana hōtaka werohanga, kua whakaahuatia ko te "raka roa rawa atu i te ao" me te pēhanga ki te whakatuwhera anō i te iwi, otirā mai i te wāhanga manaakitanga. Ka tūtaki te kāpata ā muri ake i te wiki ki te whakatau he aha ētahi atu whakangāwari ka puta, āhea. Kāore e tūmanakohia kia whakatuwhera anō ngā kākahu me ngā makawe makawe tae noa ki te waenganui o Mei i te wā tata nei, kāore i rite ki Aiarangi ki te Raki i whakatuwhera anō ai i te 23 o Āperira. Tērā pea ko Pipiri i mua i te whakatuwheratanga anō o ngā hōtēra, ngā whare manuhiri me ngā B&B. People are still being encouraged to work from home and are restricted to travel only within their own county or 20km (12.5 miles) from their home. I whakaaria e Taoiseach (Pirimia o Airani) a Mícheál Martin he nui ake te werohanga i te Paenga-whāwhā, Mei me Pipiri, me te toharite kotahi miriona tāngata e whiwhi ana i te werohanga ia marama. I kii ia i runga i te taenga mai o nga kano kano kano i whakaaria mai, neke atu i te 80% o nga pakeke me whiwhi i ta raatau wero tuatahi i te mutunga o Pipiri me te 55% o ta raatau tuarua. Heoi anō, tae mai ki tēnei wā, kāore anō te hōtaka kia tata ki aua ūnga. Ko te tumanako ka tukuna e te Komiti Kano Kano Kano a te Motu o te kawanatanga tana haere ki mua mo te whakamahi i te kano kano Janssen kotahi jab i tenei wiki e taea ai te whakatere i te whakawhitinga. Pēnei i a AstraZeneca, kua honoa te kano ārai mate Janssen ki ngā kēhi tino āhua kore nei o te toto toto. Ko te hunga pakeke i waenganui i te 65 me te 69 ka tīmata ki te whiwhi i tā rātou rongoā tuatahi o AstraZeneca i tēnei wiki. I te nui o ngā tāngata e werohia ana, ā, ka hinga ngā tau i ngā hōhipera me ngā ICU, ka whakangāwari tonu ngā rāhuitanga tino uaua. Na te kaha o te whakapōrearea o te haere ki tāwāhi, he tokomaha e tūmanako ana ka nui te whakatuwheratanga anō o te iwi kia pai ai rātau ki te noho i te raumati.

title: He rau e urupare ana ki te inoi kia tuwhera tonu te Whare Taonga o Grantham
summary: Neke atu i te 200 ngā tāngata kua urupare ki tētahi tono kia tuwhera tonu te Whare Taonga o Grantham.
text: I whakatūria he whakawhirinaki aroha hei tango i te whare taonga i muri i te pānuitanga a te Kaunihera o te Takiwā o Lincolnshire ka unuhia te pūtea i tērā Pipiri. I whakaaetia te tono e te kaunihera o te rohe i Tīhema, ā, neke atu i te 200 ngā tūao kua tuku i ā rātou ratonga hei āwhina ki te whakahaere i te whare taonga. Ka kati te whare taonga, i St Peter's Hill, i Poutāpeta, ā, ka whakatuwheratia anō e te whakawhirinaki i a Hōngongoi. 'Wā mīharo' i kī a Alistair Hawken, mai i te Grantham Museum Community Heritage Association hou: "He urupare tino pai. " Kāore i taea e mātou te tono anō. I Grantham e tino hiahia ana te iwi ki te whare taonga me ngā taonga tuku iho o te rohe, nā reira kua haere mai rātau ki te pupuri i te whare taonga. "He wā mīharo tēnei. We've got the opportunity to take the museum to a level it's never been before." I waenganui i ngā āhuatanga e whakaaturia ana i te whare taonga ko tētahi whakaaturanga a Wheua Thatcher, e whakaatu ana i tētahi hūtu kikorangi i mau i a ia, ā, ko tētahi o ngā pepeha Atahanga Tūwha taketake e whakaatu ana i a ia. I pānuitia e te kaunihera o te rohe e unu ana i te pūtea mō ngā whare taonga i Grantham, Stamford me Skegness hei wāhanga o ngā tikanga penapena utu. Kua tae ki tētahi whakaaetanga kia tangohia e te iwi te Whare Taonga Pāmu o Te Hāhi i Skegness, engari kāore i kitea e te kaunihera o te rohe he tono kia tuwhera tonu te Whare Taonga o Stamford.

title: Southsea developer avoids social housing policy with £600k offer
summary: Kua whakaaetia e te kaunihera o Portsmouth tētahi tono e £600,000 mai i tētahi kaiwhakawhanake āhuatanga kia taea ai te hanga whare rangatira engari kāore he whare utu ōrau.
text: Kua tukua ki te Whanaketanga Pierfront te whakaaetanga whakarite ki te hanga i ngā whare noho e 92 i te taha moana o Southsea. E kī ana mā te hanga i tētahi atu whare pāpori e 28 ka nui rawa te utu. I whakahētia te whakataunga e tētahi kaikaunihera nāna i kī ko te kaunihera e "whai hua ana i mua i ngā kāinga". Ka hangaia nga whare noho ki runga i te pae o te Kōti Savoy kua mahue i South Parade, i tahuna i tērā wiki, i runga hoki i te pae o ngā Whare Savoy o mua, i whakawāteatia i te tau 2009. E 2,500 ngā tāngata o te Kaunihera Taone o Portsmouth i runga i tana rārangi tatari whare pāpori, ā, he kaupapa here tāna e hiahia ana kia whakarato ngā kaiwhakawhanake i te 30% whare pāpori. Kei te utu a Pierfront Development i te kaunihera e whakahaeretia ana e Liberal Democrat £600,000 kia puta atu ai i taua herenga. 'Looks a mess' Lib Dem councillor Steven Wylie said: "It's a great disappointment to those families who we've now got to go and tell: 'You're not going to have that home because we've put profit before homes'. " Ki taku whakaaro he whakataunga kino tērā i tēnei rā." Heoi anō, i kī te kaikaunihera Conservative, a Donna Jones: "He tino nui kia hangaia, kia whakatupuria anō tēnei whare. Te āhua nei he tino pārekareka i tēnei wā. "E hiahia ana mātou ki ngā mahi i hangaia i te taha moana, e hiahiatia ana e mātou he wharekai, he wharekai, he pae - e hiahia ana mātou kia haere mai ngā tāngata ki te whakapau moni i Portsmouth, ā, koinei te hipanga tuatahi i roto i taua pikitia tino nui." Kua utua e Pierfront Development ngā whare pāpori ki tētahi atu wāhi o te taone i mua, ā, ka whakanuia tana tono tuatahi o te £400,000 ki te £600,000. It said the Savoy site project was not financially viable if social housing was included, but refused to comment further. I whakaaetia e te kaunihera te tono i runga i te tikanga ka taea te arotake i te whakataunga i roto i te toru tau mēnā kāore anō kia oti te whanaketanga.

title: Arotakenga nūpepa: Arotahi ki te whaikōrero a Te Pākehā
summary: Ka tātaritia ā-taipitopito te whaikōrero a Te Hōro o Te Rāwiki, ā, he nui hoki te aromatawai o te pānga o te haerenga o te perehitini o Amerika.
text: Ka kōwhiri te Times ki te whakaatu i tētahi tata nui o te perehitini o Amerika i tōna whārangi o mua, tae atu ki tana autocue. Ka whakahuatia e ia tētahi wāhanga matua mai i te whaikōrero i roto i tōna panekōrero: "Ko tā mātou mahi, ko tā mātou ārahitanga, he mea nui ki te take o te rangatiratanga tangata." A, ka haere tonu te pepa ki te whatu i te karere hei "mihi, whakamoemiti me te hiahia whakaharahara". Engari e kī ana a George Parker i roto i te Financial Times i te wāhitau "i rahua ki te whakarewa i te tuanui" me te whakaaro he "matekiri māmā ki ngā hoa me ngā MP i tae wawe mai ki te pēke i ngā tūru tino pai me ngā pikitia huna me ā rātou waea pūkoro". Ka tukua e te Kaitiaki te nuinga o tōna whārangi o mua ki te whaikōrero, engari ko tana pikitia e whakaatu ana i a Mīharo i te haerenga ki te Whare Wānanga o Oxford. E kī ana te pūrongo a te Kaitiaki i whakatakotoria e te perehitini a Amerika me Uropi "ki te taha o te hunga e whawhai ana ki te wāteatanga puta noa i te Rāwhiti o Waenganui". I roto i ngā kupu a te Independent, "I haere mai ia, i kōrero ia, i raupatutia e ia a Westminster". A, tae atu ki te Kaitiaki, ka kī te pepa ka mutu tana tautoko i ngā utu whakapau moni a te kāwanatanga tauwhāinga. Kāore e tika ana kia whakahuatia ngā kupu a Perehitini Pakihi i mua i te Daily Telegraph, engari e mau ana i tētahi whakaahua o Mrs Obama me Arāna Karauna i te tunu o Downing Street. Ka aromatawai te Telegraph i te haerenga o te kāwanatanga i roto i tana tuhinga e huaina ana ko "te whakatikatika i te toenga ki to mātau urunga tino tata". E kī ana he "uaua ki te whakapono ko te Pākehā kua kitea he tino ngāwari noa iho te manuhiri ki Rāwāhi i tēnei wiki, i te tīmatanga o tana perehitini, i whakakāhore i to mātau pirimia whakamutunga, ā, he iti noa iho te ngana ki te huna i tōna mātao ki tēnei whenua". He pikitia anō tā te Daily Express o te tunu kai No 10 i mua. I runga i te whaikōrero, e whakaaro ana te pepa "i whakatara i te wairua o Winston Churchill". Ko te whakataunga katoa a te Mēra o ia Rā mo te haerenga o te kāwanatanga, he whakamana PR tērā, engari he poto noa iho te rawa. E kī ana hoki ko te "ratonga ngutu a Perehitini ki te tika e hāngai" na tōna whakakore ki te uru atu ki te kēhi rangahau o te mūrere o Ingarangi, o Kerei McKinnon, he Asperger's Syndrome. I te tirohanga a te Rā, ko te haerenga anake hei whakaatu "ko wai tonu te pāhi". "Tērā pea he mea nui, he motuhake hoki, engari kāore he pōhēhētanga ko wai e mau ana i te tarau i roto i tēnei pātahitanga," ko te tuhituhi a te kaiwhakatika tōrangapū o te pepa, a Tom Newton Dunn. Ngā Hononga Ipurangi Pātahi Daily Express Daily Mail Daily Mirror Daily Star Daily Telegraph Financial Times Guardian Independent Morning Star Sun Times

title: Ō Peita: Ko te kaituhituhi waea a Titanic ko Jack Philips
summary: Ko tētahi peita e whakaaturia ana i te Whare Taonga o Godalming tētahi o ngā mano i tīpakohia hei wāhanga o tētahi kaupapa nui ā-motu e kiia nei ko Ō Peita.
text: Ko te whakaahua no Jack Philips, i whānau mai i Godalming, a, ko ia te tino kaiwaea i runga i te Titanic. I hangaia te whakaahua e Martin Ellis i te tau 1912 i muri i te matenga o Jack, ā, i tāruatia mai i tētahi whakaahua. Ka puta ki te paetukutuku Your Paintings, he mahi ngātahi i waenganui i te BBC me te Public Catalogue Foundation. He kohinga toi ā-motu tino pai tā te UK, e 200,000 ngā peita hinu, e puritia ana i roto i ngā whare wānanga tūmatanui. Engari ahakoa nā ngā rōpū pūtea tūmatanui o UK, 80% o ngā peita kāore i te whakaatuhia. Kei te huna rānei i roto i te rokiroki, kei roto rānei i ngā whare kāore e taea e te iwi whānui te uru atu. 'Tohu whakamutunga' Kei te whakarewaina e te BBC, i roto i te mahi ngātahi me te Public Catalogue Foundation me ngā kohinga puta noa i te UK, te paetukutuku Your Paintings i te raumati 2011. I muri i te tūtukitanga o te Titanic ki te motumotu, ka noho a Jack ki tōna tūranga i te hekenga o te kaipuke, ka tuku karere ki te Carpathia ki te whakaora i ngā mōrehu. I kī a John Young, he tūao i te Whare Taonga o Godalming: "I noho a ia i tōna tūranga ahakoa i muri i te whakawāteatanga a te kāpene i a ia i ana mahi. " I kitea tērā nā te mea i tīkina tana tohu whakamutunga i te 2.17, ā, e toru meneti i muri iho ka haere te Titanic ki raro i ngā ngaru." I whakaritea te pikitia e ngā tauira o tōna kura tawhito, ā, nā te Kaunihera Taone o Godalming.

title: Pire autism: E kī ana te whaea he tama 'i tapaina he kino'
summary: E ono tau te pakeke o tētahi taitama 11 tau i tapaina he nanakia i te kura nā te rahunga ki te tātari i a ia he pūkenga, e kī ana tōna whaea.
text: I te mutunga ka aromatawaia a George Evans mai i Haverfordwest, Pembrokeshire, i tērā Whiringa-ā-rangi. I whakaaria he whakataunga i roto i te marama kotahi, engari kei te tatari tonu te whānau ki te kōrero neke atu i te whitu marama i muri iho. Kua karangatia e to rātau mema whakaminenga, a Paul Davies, he ture kia whiwhi ai ngā tamariki pēnei i a Hōri i te āwhina e hiahiatia ana e rātau. E mōhio tūturu ana te whaea o Hōri ko Beth he autism tana tama, ā, e kī ana kua "tino pāngia" tana mātauranga i te rahunga ki te tātari i a ia. She says he went to four primary schools, and missed 18 months of his education before he settled in his current school. "Kāore au i tino kaha ki te whawhai ki a ia ki te kura tika," tana kī. "Ko tana kura tuatahi ko te whakaaro he tama kino a ia, ā, kāore he hē ki a ia, ā, he aukati pūmau tōna i runga i tana pūkete i whai i a ia. " Nā reira he take noa iho ki te whakamātau i ngā kura tuatahi o te rohe, ā, kāore i tae ki hea nā te mea i tapaina ia he kino." Conservative Preseli Pembrokeshire AM Mr Davies said children and adults in Wales with autism were not getting the same support as people like them in the rest of the UK. I a ia e kōrero ana i roto i te Senedd hei tohu i te whakaurunga o tana Pire Autism (Wales) i marohitia, ka karanga a Mr Davies ki te Kāwanatanga o Welsh kia "tuwhera te hinengaro" me te tautoko. I uru atu a Tory, Plaid Cymru me ngā AMs ki ngā backbenchers o Labour i June 2017 ki te pōti kia haere tonu ngā kaupapa, i te wā i papare ngā minita. Ko te pire - e hāngai ana ki te whakanoho i ngā ratonga ā-hinengaro ki runga i tētahi waewae ā-ture - ka tirohia e te komiti hauora me te tiaki pāpori o te whakaminenga i muri i te wā o te raumati. Ko Tēnā Davies - ko ia hoki te kaiārahi takiwā o te rōpū Conservative - e tūmanako ana ka noho te pire hei ture i roto i te tau kotahi. "He tino nui te tautoko mō ngā ture matua, ā, e tino tūmanako ana ahau ka tuwhera te hinengaro o te Kāwanatanga o Welsh me te tautoko i tēnei Pire," tana kī. "E tīari ana ngā ture ōrite i ētahi atu wāhi o te UK - ā, kua tae ki te wā kia whakawhānuitia aua mana ōrite ki ngā tāngata whai autism i Weera. " Mā tēnei pire e whakarite he ara mārama ki te tātaritanga me te āwhina i ngā kaimahi e mahi ana ki ngā tāngata whai autism kia whiwhi i te whakangungu e hiahiatia ana e rātou, nā reira e tūmanako ana ahau ka whakahokia e ngā mema o ngā rōpū tōrangapū katoa te Pire." Kua whakapaea e Tēnā Davies te Kāwanatanga o Welsh he "manawanui" ki te tautoko i tana pire, engari kua kī te Kāwanatanga o Welsh kei a ia kē "ngā pūkenga ture, kaupapahere hoki hei tautoko i ngā tāngata whai autism i Weera". I Poutāpeta 2017, i pānuitia e ngā minita he £7m anō mō ngā ratonga autism, ka pau te tapeke o te £13m tae atu ki te 2021. I a ia e urupare ana i te Senedd i te Wenerei, ka kī te Hēkeretari Hauora o Te Hauora, me pātai atu ngā AM ki a rātau anō "mēnā ka whakapai ake tēnei ture i tēnei wā i ngā ratonga me ngā putanga me ngā wheako mō ngā tāngata", ka mōrearea rānei ki te whakararuraru i ngā hipanga kua mahia kētia. I tūmanako a Beth Evans ka āwhina te āhua o te ture hou i tana tama. "E whakapono ana ahau kia whakaritea he ture kia whai mana ngā tāngata ā-hinengaro ki ngā aromatawai i te wā tika," tana kī. "There are so many people that are affected and are currently missing out on the quality of life that they deserve because of a disability, and I think that's extremely unfair. " E whakaaro ana ahau mā te whai i aua kupu i roto i te ture ka kaha te kōrero ki te iwi o Uēra ki te whakapiki i te mōhiotanga."

title: Ka whakakāhore te Kōti Matua i te tono a te kāwanatanga i runga i te kaupapa pūkete hara
summary: Kua whakataua e te Kōti Matua e manakohia ana e ngā tāngata tokotoru i whakapuaki i a rātau ora i nga whakapae hara iti o mua.
text: I kitea e nga kaiwhakawā te āhua o te whakaaturanga o ngā pūkete hara ki ngā kaitukumahi i takahi i ngā mana tangata. Me whakaaro te kāwanatanga ki te whakahōu o te pūnaha, e kī ana te korero kōrero o ngā take ā-ture o TE WĀ. I kī te aroha Wetewete e pā ana te whakahaere ki ngā mano o ngā tāngata whai pūkete taihara tawhito, iti hoki. I kī a Christopher Stacey, ko te kaiwhakahaere tahi o Wetemaukati, he tokomaha ngā tāngata e waiho ana e ngā taki hara "kia punga noa ki ō rātou wā o mua". E kī ana a ia, i roto i ngā tau e rima kua hipa anake, neke atu i te miriona ngā pūkete hara taitamariki i whakaaturia i runga i ngā taki paerewa, whakarei rānei i te Ratonga Whakaaturanga me te Ārai (DBS) e pā ana ki ngā hara mai i te 30 tau ki mua. I kitea e nga kaiwhakatika o te Kōti Matua he "tōtika" te kaupapa whakaaturanga pūkete hara i roto i ngā tikanga e rua. Ko ēnei me whakaatu ngā whakapae katoa o mua, ahakoa te iti, ki te nui ake i te kotahi te whakapae o te tangata, ā, ki te take hoki o ngā whakatūpato me ngā kohetetanga i tukuna ki te hunga hara rangatahi. I pānuitia e rātau ta rātau whakataunga i te Wenerei i muri i te wero a te kāwanatanga ki tētahi whakawā Kōti Pīra i te tau 2017 i runga i te mana o te kaupapa. I pūruatia e te whakahaere pīra te Kōti Tiketike o te tau 2016 e kite ana ko te kaupapa "kāore i te rite ki te ture" i roto i te tikanga o te Tuhipānui 8 o te ECHR, e pare ana i te mana ki te oranga tūmataiti. I tautohe te aroha tamariki Just for Kids Law, nāna i kawe mai tētahi o ngā take ki te kōti, kāore e rerekē te mahi a DBS i ngā tamariki ki ngā pakeke. I kī tōna Tumuaki Whakahaere a Enver Soloman ka whai painga te "whakawā tohu" ki ngā mano o ngā tamariki i tukuna ki ngā whakatūpato i ia tau, he tokomaha rawa o rātou no ngā papamuri Pango me te Iwi Iti. "Ināianei he tirohanga tino nui i tiria e ngā kōti tiketike me ngā MP kia mahi wawe te kāwanatanga kia kore ai he tamaiti e whakatūpato ana, ka mutu ki tētahi pūkete hara e tauhae ana i a rātau mo te ora." Ko te tāhae me te 'toa' Ko tētahi o ngā kēhi i pā ki tētahi wahine, e kīia ana i te kōti ko P, i whakataua ki te tāhae i tētahi pukapuka 99p i te tau 1999 i a ia e mate ana i te schizophrenia kāore i te mōhiotia. I utua a ia kia puta ki te aroaro o nga kaiwhakawā i te 18 rā i muri iho, engari i rahua ki te haere ki te kōti, ko te tikanga i whakamutua e ia e rua ngā whakapae - i whiwhi ai ia i tētahi whiu herenga. E hiahia ana a P ki te mahi hei kaiāwhina whakaako, he wheako whakaako tōmua, ā, kua rapu tūnga tūroro i ngā kura. Heoi anō, me whakaatu ia i ōna whakapae hītori, ā, ko te pānga ki te whakaaturanga o tōna hītori rongoā hei whakamārama. I tētahi atu take, i hopukina a G i te 13 o ona tau mo te whakaeke i ngā taitama taitamariki tokorua, me ngā hara e pā ana ki te whakapā ki te tōkai me te whakamātau i te moepuku. I whakaaturia e ngā pūkete pirihimana he whakaaetanga te mahi tōnā, ā, i mahia hei "toa", i te āhua o te whakamatemate me te whakamātautau i te wāhi o ngā taitama tokotoru. I whakataua e te Ratonga Ture Karauna ehara i te painga tūmatanui ki te whiu. I whiwhi a G i tētahi kohete pirihimana i te wā o Rāpōpō 2006, ā, kāore anō kia hara mai i taua wā. I te tau 2011, i a ia e mahi ana hei kaiāwhina puna i tētahi kāreti paetata, i hiahiatia ia kia tono mō tētahi taki pūkete hara whakarei nā te mea ko tana mahi he whakapā atu ki ngā tamariki. Na nga pirihimana i tono kia whakaaturia te kohete me te kōrero mo te whakamaurutanga. Ko te hua, ka unuhia e G tana tono, a, ka ngaro te mahi. Mai i tērā wā kāore e taea e ia te tono mō tētahi mahi e hiahia ana ki tētahi taki pūkete hara whakarei. I rangona a rātau kēhi i te taha o W, he tangata - neke atu i te 35 tau ki mua - i whakawāteatia te pakeke 16 o te tūkino tinana, a, e rua tau te whiwhinga herenga. Nā te whakakāwai o tēnei momo hara, i raro i ngā ture o nāianei e kore te pūkete e puta mai i tana taki DBS paerewa, whakarei rānei. Heoi anō, i whakaaetia e nga kaiwhakatika te tono a te kāwanatanga e pā ana ki a W. Kāore e taea te whakaingoa i ērā e pā ana mō ngā take ā-ture. Te pūrākau a Bob: 'Mucking about' Bob Ashford, 65, mai i Somerset, e kī ana i uaua ia ki te whiwhi mahi i muri i tana whakawāteatanga i te hara me te pupuri i tētahi rākau whakahāwea i a ia e 13 tau ana. "I te hīkoi ahau i runga i te parenga rerewhenua me tētahi rōpū taitama, ā, he pū hau tā tētahi o rātou," tana kī atu ki te HAU. "Kāore anō kia mutu rā anō taku whare wānanga me te tīmata ki te tono mahi, ka mōhio ahau ki te pānga o tēnei nā te mea me whakaatu e au ēnei hara." I kī a ia i te mutunga ka angitu tana mahi i roto i te pūnaha ture taihara, engari i te ono tau ki mua, me tū ia hei kaitono hei pirihimana me te komihana hara i muri i te whakaaturanga o ōna whakapae o mua. I pōhiritia e ia te whakahaere a te Kōti Matua hei "hipanga ki te ahunga tika" engari i kī me "arotakenga katoa" o te pūnaha DBS katoa. 'Ārai ki te whakaoratanga' I pōhiritia e te Komiti Ture, nāna i whakaputa he uiui i a Hōngongoi, te whakahaere. I kī a Bob Neill MP, te tūru o te komiti, ko te pūnaha whakaaturanga e "maiorooro ana ki ngā whāinga o te pūnaha tika taitamariki, me ngā hē i mahia hei taitamariki e āhei ana ki te whai i tētahi tangata mō ngā tekau tau, e waihanga ana i tētahi ārai ki te whakaoratanga, me te ārai i te tokomaha o ngā tāngata kia kore ai e uru ki te mahi, te mātauranga, me te whare". I kī a Corey Stoughton, te kaiwhakahaere taunaki o Liberty e tohu ana i a P: "I hē a P i mua noa atu, ā, kua whiua tika mai i taua wā. " Ko te whakamahi i ngā ture takawaenga whānui rawa e whakakāhore ana i ngā mahi whai tikanga a te tangata mā te whakahau i a rātou ki te mau i tētahi reta whero mō te ora, he nanakia, he koretake hoki." Na Tēnā Stacey mai i Wetemaukati, nāna i uru atu ki te kēhi, ka tohe ki te kāwanatanga kia mahi i te "mahi tohuāki me te whakaaro" me te mahi i tētahi arotakenga taketake o te pūnaha DBS whānui ake.

title: E kī ana a Hōnea & Hōnea 'ka taea te kōhua' te mapu taiaki huka
summary: Kua whakatūpato te umanga rongoā o Hōnea & Hōnea kei te mōrearea tētahi o ana papu taiaki huka mō ngā mate huka, nā reira he nui rawa te mate.
text: I kī te umanga e pā ana te whakararuraru ki tana papu OneTouch Ping e hokona ana i te US me Kānata anake. Heoi anō, i kī atu ki te AO kāore he whakaekenga pūrongo, ā, he "tino iti rawa" te mōrea. "E hiahiatia ana he tohunga hangarau, he taputapu mātauranga me te tatanga ki te mapu," tana kī. I puta te whakaaturanga i roto i tētahi reta ki ngā tūroro i te 27 o Mahuru, ka kī te umanga. Mā te papu Animas OneTouch Ping, i whakarewaina i te tau 2008, ka taea e ngā mate huka te rongoā i a rātau ki te taiaki mā te whakamahi i tētahi mana mamao Wi-Fi. Mā tēnei e tango te raruraru o te uru hāngai ki te pūrere, ka taea te mau i raro i ngā kākahu o te tūroro. I kī a Hōnea & Hōnea kāore te papu i tūhono ki te ipurangi, ki tētahi whatunga waho rānei. Engari i kī a Piki Radcliffe - he mate huka, he kairangahau hoki me te umanga haumarutanga ipurangi Rapid7 - kua kitea e ia ka taea tonu te kōhuatia mai i te tawhiti e 25 waewae. I kitea e ia ngā whakawhitiwhitinga i waenganui i te papu me tōna mamao auau irirangi ka taea te kahakina - i roto i te ariā e āhei ai tētahi mūrere ki te whakahaere i ngā werohanga kāore i te manakoretia. I kī te 'mōrea iti' o Hōnea & Hōnea (J&J) kua whakaūngia ngā kitenga a Tēnā Radcliffe, engari i noho "haumaru, pono hoki" te mapu. E kī ana ka taea e ngā tūroro māharahara te whakatūpato, pēnei i te kore whakamahi i te mamao o te papu me te papatono i te pūrere hei whakawhāiti i tōna inenga mōrahi. Kei te nui haere ngā māharahara mo te mōrea o ngā pūrere rongoā. I te wā o Hui tanguru, i whakaaturia e te umanga haumarutanga ā-ipurangi o Te Taiwhanga o Te Taiwhanga o Te Hōhipera kua kōhuatia ki roto i te hanganga IT o tētahi hōhipera - me tōna whakaaetanga - ā, i taea te uru ki tētahi pūrere MRI. Ā, e kīa ana te US Food & Drug Administration e whakarite ana i ngā tohutohu tika mō ngā kaiwhakanao me pēhea te urupare ki ngā pūrongo o ngā whakaekenga ā-ipurangi. Kua tohe kē te kōwhiringa ki ngā whare rongoā kia mahi tahi me ngā tohunga haumarutanga ā-ipurangi ki te whakamauru i ngā mōrea - engari e kī ana kāore e mōhio ana ki ngā take i kōhuatia ai e te hunga hara tētahi pūrere hei tūkino.

title: HMP Birmingham riot: 'Stolen keys used to free inmates'
summary: I whakamahia ngā kī tāhae hei whakawātea i ngā herehere e 500 i ngā pūtau i te wā o te whakararuraru i HMP Birmingham, kua rongo tētahi kōti.
text: I rehu ngā kaimahi ki ngā ngongo ahi i te wā o te whakararuraru 15 haora i Tīma, ā, i whakahaua kia whakakore i ngā wāhi o te whare herehere i a rātau e "ngaro ana te mana" o ngā parirau e whā. Tokowhā nga hoa e whakawāteatia ana e whakapaea ana ki te whai wāhi ki te whakakeke i te whare herehere. I whakairihia ngā pikitia o ngā herehere i roto i ngā taonga whakararuraru ki te pāpāho pāpori i te wā o te raruraru, ka kī nga rōia. I kī atu te rōia a Haimona Davis ki tētahi hūri i te Kōti Karauna o Birmingham ka tīmata ngā mahi i te ata o te 16 o Hakihea i muri i te whakatuwheratanga o ngā tatau ki ētahi pūtau e ngā āpiha whare herehere. "He tokomaha nga herehere i piki ki runga i te kupenga whai i a ia i runga i tētahi o nga parirau o te whare herehere," tana kī. "I tāhaetia ngā kī ki ngā tatau kī me ngā kēti i tētahi āpiha whare herehere - i whakatuwheratia ngā pūtau o ngā herehere neke atu pea i te 500 e ētahi atu herehere." I whakakorea e ngā kaimahi ētahi o ngā parirau me ngā wāhi nui o te whare herehere i tūkinotia ki te tūkino hara, tae atu ki te tuhituhi, te peita i makaia ki ngā pakitara, te parakete i ngā tari me te tūkino ki ngā matapihi, ngā tatau, ngā taputapu rorohiko me ngā taonga. I tahuna hoki ētahi wāhi. I a rātau e whakamātau ana ki te pupuri i tētahi kēti, ka kurua rātau ki ngā pōro hōpua, ki te peita, ki te rehu ki ngā ngongo ahi, ka rongo te kōti. I mauria mai ngā Tīma Āwhiowhio i whakaakona motuhake ki te whakaora i te raupapa. "Tērā tētahi whakakeke whare herehere, ka taea e koe tēnā te pānui," te kī a Tēnā Davis ki nga kaiwhakawā. "Ki a koe te whakatau mēnā i uru ēnei whakapae, kāore rānei." I runga i te whakawātanga ko John Burton, 39, Luke Mansell, 24, Carl Brookes, 33, me Ross Queen, 30. E whakakāhore ana hoki a Tēnā Brookes rāua ko Tāne Kuini i tētahi tatau tuarua o te kore e tuku ki te mana tika i te wā o te raruraru.

title: Ka huihui anō ngā whānau Kōria i wehea e te pakanga i te Raki
summary: E hia rau ngā Koreana ki te Tonga kua tīmata ki te tūtaki i ngā mema whānau i te Raki i roto i tētahi huihuinga ātaahua mō ngā whānau i wehea e te Pakanga Kōria.
text: Ko te huihuinga, e whai ana i ngā hui i roto i te wiki, e tū ana i tētahi tauranga Maunga Kumgang, i te rohe. E hia mano ngā whānau kua wehe, he iti, kāore rānei he hoapā mai i te mutunga o te pakanga i te tau 1953. Mai i te tau kotahi mano, mai i te tau kotahi mano, I tū te huihuinga whakamutunga i te wā o Hui tanguru 2014. I muri i tētahi whakaaetanga i a Aotearoa, ka puta mai te hui o tēnei tau i muri i tētahi whakaaetanga i whakanuia e te pahūtanga taitapa i whara ai ngā hōia Kōria ki te Tonga. E 89 tau te pakeke o Stephen Evans, BBC News, Seoul Lee Taek-gu, ā, ka tūtaki ia ki tōna tuahine e 20 tau te tamariki ake. I kite whakamutunga ia i a ia e tamariki ana, a, he taitama ia i eke ki runga poti ki te rere ki te tonga, me te whakaaro ka hoki mai ia i muri i te pakanga. Mai i taua wā, kua tuhituhi reta a ia ki ōna mātua e mōhio ana e kore rawa ia e tuku i a rātou nā te mea kāore he ratonga poutāpeta i waenganui i ngā haurua e rua o Kōria. I tuhia e ia hai rongoā mo tōna pouri. I kī atu a ia ki te AO ka mihi noa iho a ia ki tōna tuahine mo tana ora. Ka kōrero rātau mo o rātau mātua kua mate ināianei. Kua horoia e ia tana koti tino pai mo taua wā, a, ka hokona mai he pōtae hou atamai. Ko te whakaari tangata o ngā huihuinga whānau Kōria Ko ngā hui, i whakaritea e te Rīpeka Whero, e tino paingia ana e te tekau mano e waitohu ana, engari he torutoru noa iho i ia taha e kōwhiria ana, ā, he pakeke rātau. I Kōrea ki te Tonga, ka kōwhiria matapōkeretia ngā kaiuru e tētahi rorohiko e whakaaro ana ki tō rātou pakeke me tō rātou papamuri whānau. Me noho hoki rātau mō ngā uiuinga me te mahi whakamātautau rongoā kia mōhio ai mēnā e tika ana rātau ki te haere. Ko te rōpū tuatahi e tata ana ki te 400 ngā Koreana ki te Tonga, arā ko ngā kaiuru i kōwhiria me ō rātou whānau e haere tahi ana, e whai wāhi ana ki te hurihanga tuatahi o ngā hui e haere ana mai i te Tūtira ki te Tāite, i pūrongotia te kōwhiringa rongokōrero o Te Tūrei. Ka haere tētahi atu 250 ki te hurihanga tuarua o ngā hui mai i te Hātarei ki tērā Mane. E ono ngā wātū e rua haora i ia hurihanga. He tokomaha o ērā e haere mai ana i Kōrea ki te Tonga e mau mai ana i ngā koha mō ō rātou whanaunga Kōria ki te Raki pēnei i ngā kākahu, kai, niho, me te moni. E noho tonu ana ngā Kōria e rua i te pakanga i te mutunga o te Pakanga Kōria i roto i te armistice. I tīmata nga huihuinga whānau i te tau 2000, ā, mai i tērā wā ka mahia noatia. Engari e tino whakawhirinaki ana rātau ki te āhua o te whanaungatanga, ā, e mōhiotia ana kua whakakorea e te Raki ētahi i ngā wā o te tanuku. I tū te whakamutunga i te wā o Hui tanguru 2014.

title: Tokorua nga tāngata i whakahaua mo te tākaro i waho o te pae o Rāhui
summary: Tokorua nga tāngata i whakataua ki te ngana ki te kōhuru i runga i te tākaro i waho o te pae o te pokapū o te taone.
text: I patua tētahi wahine i te ringa i muri i te pūhia o ngā tākainga i Te Kuwaha o Te Kuwaha, i Rātata, ka kī pirihimana. Kāore a ia i whakaarotia ko ia te ūnga tika o te tākaro i te 22:30 GMT i te 3 o Whiringa Whiringa. I puta mai a Jordan Murray, 25, o Bestwood Park, me Tarquin James, 28, o Woodthorpe, ki te Kōti Kaiwhakawa o Rāhui i te Hātarei. I whakahokia rātau ki te tiakitanga tae noa ki to rātau rongo panuku i te Hānuere. Kua kī ngā pirihimana kua whakataua hoki a Tēnā Murray ki te ngana ki te kōhuru e pā ana ki tētahi "whiu patu" i Bassett Hill, Upper Langwith, Derbyshire, i te 2 o Whiringa ā-rangi. I kī a Det Insp Ed Cook mai i ngā Pirihimana o Rātata: "He tino nui tā mātou mahi e pā ana ki ngā pūrākau, ā, he tīma pirihimana e mahi ngāwari ana i tēnei kēhi. " Ahakoa he mārama tonu te hipanga nui o ngā whakapae, ka haere tonu te tūhuratanga, ā, kei te hiahia tonu mātou ki te whakarongo mai i tētahi tangata i kite i taua mahi, kua rongo rānei i tētahi mea e hiahia ana ki te tūhuratanga." E rua anō ētahi atu hopunga e pā ana ki te kēhi. I hopukina tētahi tangata 18 tau i runga i te whakapae ki te kōhuru, a, ka tukua i runga i te utu pirihimana, me ngā herenga, ka kī pirihimana. I hopukina tētahi tangata 20 tau i te tīmatanga o tēnei marama i runga i te whakapae i te pupuri i tētahi patu patu me te whakaaro ki te whakamōrearea i te ora, engari i tukua i runga i te utu pirihimana. I muri iho ka tukua te wahine i whara i te hōhipera. Whāia a BBC East Midlands i Facebook, i Twitter, i Instagram rānei. Tukua ō whakaaro pūrākau ki eastmidsnews@bbc.co.uk.

title: He pai te pahau mo to hauora?
summary: Mēnā kei te rapu koe i tētahi rongoā paturopi hou, ārai mate, ka tīmata koe ki hea? I roto i te repo? He motu mamao? Me pēhea te heru pahau? Ka tūhura a Michael Mosley.
text: I runga i te Trust Me I'm a Doctor ka mahia e mātau ngā whakamātautau i ētahi wā ka makaia he pūtaiao hou tūturu. I roto i tētahi rangatū o mua, hei tauira, i kitea e mātou ka taea e koe te tapahi i ngā pūngoi i roto i te paraoa mā te tunu, te whakamātao, kātahi ka whakamahana anō. He hua tino pai tēnā. Engari ko tā mātou kitenga hou rawa, ko te kimi huakita e āhua nei kei te whakaputa i tētahi momo rongoā paturopi hou, he nui ake te nui. Ko te mea tino ātaahua i kitea e tipu ana i roto i te pahau o tētahi tangata. Kua hoki mai ngā pahau, e ai ki tāu i kite ai. Ko te kauae, ko te koati, ko te pahau kakī me te Van Dyke, kei a rātau katoa a rātau kaihautū. Engari me te pihi o ngā pahau i ngā wāhi katoa, pēnei i te pātītī hou i te rā o te kōanga, tērā tonu te whakahoki. E kī ana ngā kaiwhakawāwā ehara te pahau i te pānga whakarihariha anake, engari ka taea pea te whanga i ngā iro kino. Heoi, he aha te whakaaturanga e pā ana ki te hauora te pahau? Ko ngā pogonophobes, ko ngā tāngata e wehi ana i te pahau, i whakaūngia aua mataku e tētahi mātauranga o mua tata nei i New Mexico i kitea ai e rātau he tohu o te huakita enteric, te momo e kitea nuitia ana i roto i ngā pahau, i roto i ngā pahau tauira matapōkeretia. E ai ki tētahi nūpepa: '"He nui ake te poo o ētahi pahau i te whare haumaru." Engari he mea noa iho tēnei? He tino rerekē ngā whakatauranga o tētahi akoranga o nā noa nei, ā, i kawea i tētahi hōhipera o Amerika. Kimihia ētahi atu mea Trust Me I'm A Doctor kei TE 20:00 i te Wenerei 20 o Hānuere - hopu i te BBC iPlayer I tēnei akoranga, i whakaputaina i roto i te Journal of Hospital Infection, i ūkuia e rātau ngā kanohi o ngā kaimahi hōhipera e 408, ā, kāore he makawe kanohi. He take pai ta rātau mahi pēnā. E mōhio ana mātou ko ngā mate i whiwhi i te hōhipera he take nui o te mate me te mate i ngā hōhipera, me te tokomaha o ngā tūroro e whiwhi ana i tētahi mate kāore i a rātou i te wā i haere ai rātou. Kua whakapaetia katoatia ngā ringa, ngā koti mā, ngā here me ngā taputapu, engari me pēhea ngā pahau? Na, i mīharo nga kairangahau ki te kite ko te kaimahi heu mā, ehara i te pahau, tērā pea kei te mau i tētahi mea kino i runga i o rātau kanohi. Neke atu i te toru ngā wā e whanga ana te rōpū pāhau i tētahi momo e mōhiotia ana ko te staph aureus ātete methicillin i runga i o rātau pāpāringa hou kua heu. Ko te MRSA tētahi pūtake tino pūnoa, raruraru hoki o ngā mate i whiwhi i te hōhipera nā te mea e ātete ana ki te maha o ā mātou rongoā paturopi o nāianei. Nā, he aha te mea e haere ana? Na nga kairangahau i huatau mā te heu ka puta pea he moroiti i roto i te kiri "e tautoko ana pea i te whakawāwātanga huakita me te tōnuitanga". Tērā pea. Engari tērā anō tētahi atu whakamāramatanga tika ake e titiro ana ki a rātau. E whawhai ana ngā pahau i te mate. E kore e taea? Nā te hiahia whakamatemate, kātahi anō ka ūkuia e mātau ngā pahau o tētahi momo tāngata matapōkere, ā, ka tukuna atu ki a Dr Adam Roberts, he kaimātai moroiti i te Whare Wānanga o Te Whare Wānanga o Rāwāhi, kia kite he aha, mēnā he aha, ka taea e ia te tipu. I taea e Arama te whakatipu neke atu i te 100 ngā huakita rerekē mai i o tātau pahau, tae atu ki tētahi e kitea nuitia ana i roto i te whekau iti. Engari, i a ia e whakamārama wawe ana, ehara tēnā i te mea i ahu mai i te feces. He pūnoa aua kitenga, ā, kāore he mea hei māharahara. He hītori poto o ngā pahau He mea whakamere kē atu, i roto i ētahi o ngā rīhi petri ka kitea e ia e mārama ana te patu i ērā atu huakita. Ko te whakapae tino mārama he hoa moroiti. E kite ana mātou i ngā moroiti hei hoariri mō tātou, engari kāore rātou i te kite pērā. I tō rātou taumata, ka pau te wā o te huakita me te harore ki te whakataetae tētahi ki tētahi. E whawhai ana rātau mo te kai, ngā rauemi me te mokowā. Mā te mahi pēnā, i roto i ngā mano tau, kua whakawhanake rātau i ētahi o ngā rākau tino mātauranga e mōhiotia ana e ngā momo moroiti - ngā rongoā paturopi. I tangohia tuatahitia te Penicillin mai i te Penicillium notatum, he momo harore. I kitea e Alexander Fleming ngā āhuatanga patu moroiti o tēnei harore i tana kitenga i tētahi spore harore, nāna i pupuhi pokanoa ki roto i tana taiwhanga mai i ngā kairangahau i raro ake i te pānuitanga, kua mate ētahi huakita e tipu ana i runga i tētahi rihi petri. Nō reira ka taea e ā mātou moroiti ngaro te mahi i tētahi mea ōrite? Te patu i ngā hoa huakita mā te whakaputa i tētahi momo paitini? "Āe," te kī a Arama i runga i te tūpato. "Tērā pea." I kitea e Arama nga kōhuru ngū hei wāhanga o tētahi momo e kiia nei ko Staphylococcus epidermidis. I tana whakamātautautanga i a rātau ki tētahi momo ātete rongoā o Eschercichia coli (E. coli), te momo e pā ana ki te mate mimi, ka patua e rātau me te whakarere. He nui rawa te utu o te horoi me te whakamātau tika i tētahi rongoā paturopi pukapuka, ā, he tino nui rawa te rahunga o ngā tākuta, engari he tino nui a Arama ki te kimi whakakapinga mō ā mātou rongoā paturopi o nāianei. I a ia e whakamārama ana, e 700,000 neke atu rānei ngā tāngata i te tau, e whakaarotia ana kia piki ki te 10 miriona i te tau 2050. Kāore anō kia whakaputaina he rongoā paturopi hou i roto i ngā tau e 30 kua taha. Tae atu ki ā mātou kitenga pahau, kātahi anō ka wehewehea e te tīma a Arama, mai i ngā moroiti i tukuna e te iwi whānui, ngā rāpoi ngota ārai piri e aukati ana i te here huakita ki ētahi atu mata. E whakaaro ana rātau tērā pea ka taea te tāpiri i tēnei ki te niho me te horoi waha, nā te mea ka aukati pea i ngā huakita whakaputa waikawa kia kore ai e here ki te enamel. He mea whakamīharo, ehara i te mea, he aha tāu e kite ai i roto i te pahau? Ohauru ki te pānui īmēra a te Pukapuka Rongokōrero o TE AO kia tukua ngā tuhinga ki tō pouakaroto.

title: Ka whakakāhore ngā Kāwanatanga o Jersey i te whakamātautau kirirarautanga mō ngā kaitono pōti ehara i te Ingarangi
