summary: Kua pōti te pāremata o Jersey ki tētahi whakamātautau kāhua tangata whenua e āhei ai ngā tangata whenua ehara i te Ingarangi ki te tū mo te pōti.
text: I raro i te ture o Jersey, me pupuri e ngā tangata whenua te tangata whenua o Ingarangi kia tū i roto i te Whakaminenga o Amerika. Tērā pea ka tangohia tēnei paearu e te whakamātautau "Life in Jersey" mō te hunga i whakaatu i te mōhiotanga nui ki te motu. I hinga taunoa te kaupapa i muri i te here 22-22 i roto i ngā pōti. Ko ngā waea tōmua ki te tango i te tangata whenua o Ingarangi i te paearu kaitono i whakakāhoretia e te Whakaminenga o Amerika i te wā o Mahuru. I ngana te tono hou mai i a Tuarua Inna Gardiner ki te whakarato i tētahi "kōwhiringa whirinoa" ki te hunga "kāore pea e hiahia ana ki te hoatu mō te tangata whenua o Ingarangi", ka kī tana pūrongo. I kī a Ms Gardiner he "maha ngā take" kāore pea tētahi tangata e hiahia ana ki te tono mō te kirirarautanga o Ingarangi, "kāore i te iti rawa nā te mea kāore ētahi whenua e whakaae ki te kirirarautanga takirua". 'Ātaahua' Tērā pea ka whakaahuatia te whakamātautau i marohitia ki te whakamātautau tangata whenua o UK, ā, kei roto hoki ngā pātai mō ngā tikanga, ngā tikanga me te oranga o ia rā. E hiahiatia ana hoki ngā kaiuru angitu kia oati pono ki te motu i te Kōti Kingi. I kī a Tuarua Jess Perchard ka tukuna e te whakamātautau he "wāhi tāurunga" ki ngā tōrangapū mō ngā tangata whenua, "ahakoa tō rātou iwi". I muri i ana kōrero, ka kī a Tuarua Rob Ward he "tawhiti atu i te tino tika" te kaupapa, engari i tūmanako ka whakapai ake i te "rerenga kētanga" i roto i te Whakaminenga. Heoi anō, i tautohe a Tuarua Montfort Tadier he "tino hē" te ariā, e kī ana i te wā kotahi he "māhorahora me te whakarihariha". "Ko te ariā ka whakamātauria e mātou mō ngā tāngata e noho ana i Jersey pea e 30, 40 tau - he aha te momo karere e kī ana ki a rātou?" Ko ngā tangata o Ingarangi e tū ana mō te pōti i te tau 2022 me noho i te motu mō te rima tau i muri i te whakahaeretanga a te Whakaminenga o Amerika i te wā o Mahuru. Whāia a BBC Jersey i Twitter me Facebook. Tukua ō whakaaro pūrākau ki channel.islands@bbc.co.uk Whakaminenga o Ngā Hononga Ipurangi Pātahi

title: He aha te āhua o te oma pōturi i te Marathon o Rānana?
summary: Ehara i te mea noa iho te oma omaoma. Ki te tokomaha o ngā tāngata, ko te wheako o te oranga.
text: Ahakoa ka taea e ngā kaitākaro rangatira te whakatutuki i ngā tino pai whaiaro (PBs) i waenganui i te rua me te toru haora, he tokomaha o ērā e oma ana e hari ana ki te whakaoti noa iho. Koinei te tau tuatahi i tauria ai e te Marathon o Rāwāhi he kaihoko whai mana ki te whakahaere i te akoranga i roto i te ono haora. I kī atu tētahi o ērā, a Liz Ayres, ki te hōtaka o Wikitōria o Wikitōria, ahakoa te oma i te tere i tonoa, kua tīmata te mahi whakapai i a ia - ā, ko ētahi atu kaioma pōturi i whakamahia "tino nui". He whāranu nga whakaaro o ētahi kaioma pōturi mo to rātau wheako. Raranga ki roto, ki waho hoki o te iwi whānui Koinei te tauomaoma tuatahi a Leanne Pilbeam, e 36 tau te pakeke. I tino whakahīhī a ia ki te whakaoti i roto i te whitu haora me te 16 meneti, i te nuinga o te wā i te whakaora a ia i tētahi whara. "I tīmata ahau ki te oma me te ono me te hāwhe haora, ka noho tahi me ia ki Tower Bridge. He whakamīharo taua wheako," tana kī. Engari i te mamae o ōna waewae i pōturi ai a ia, "kāore i ōrite te hauora". "I tata tonu te whakatuki," tana kī. E whitu haora noa iho i muri i te wā tīmatanga, kua takawaretia, kua taraiwa tētahi motokā i mua i a ia, e kī ana kua katia te akoranga ināianei, ka kī a Leanne. I muri iho, kua puta mai ngā kaiako me ngā taraka tahitahi i runga i te akoranga - ā, kua rehu a ia me ōna hoa omaoma e ngā matū horoi. "I kī tonu mai rātau ki a mātau kia hinengaro atu i te ara," tana kī. "I tētahi wāhanga, me haere mātau i runga i te ara nā te mea i āraia te huarahi. "Kātahi mātau ka raranga ki roto, ki waho hoki o te iwi whānui. " Ehara i te mea i tūmanakohia e au." Kua katia ngā teihana wai, ā, i kī a Leanne, me tono inu ia ki tētahi mema o te iwi whānui. A, i a ia e whakawhiti ana i te raina whakamutunga, ka kite ia kua wetewetehia kētia te hanganga. "Nāna ahau i whakahāwea," tana kī. "I whakaaro ahau he wheako tino pai. I whakaaro ahau e hiahia ana rātau ki ngā kaioma tere anake. "He aha te take o te whai i ngā pūrei tōmuri ki te kore rātau e tautoko i ngā kaioma pōturi?" He wheako tino pai ahakoa i hiahia ki te whakaoti i raro iho i te whitu haora, i hari a Del Mahi, e 56, o Peterborough, ki tōna wā whakamutunga - e whitu haora me te iwa meneti te wā. "Kua ngaro i a au te 10 pōhatu [63.5kg] i roto i te tau kotahi, nā reira i hari ahau ki te whakawhiti i taku karere mō te oranga hauora i te wā i tū ahau e te BBC i Tower Bridge," tana kī. Ko te oma omaoma o mua anake a Del ko Loch Ness Marathon, i reira, e 50 ngā kaimātakitaki i te tīmatanga, e 50 i te mutunga, ā, kāore he tangata e umere ana i te ara, nā reira he tino rerekē a Rātana mōna. "He tino mīharo te huihuinga. He wheako tino pai tērā," tana kī. "I runga i taku hāte tōku ingoa, ā, e hamama ana te hunga i tōku ingoa. He tino rawe." Tata ki te 23 maero, ka kī a Del, he kaimahi IT, kua tīmata a ia ki te pātai ki a ia anō: "He aha taku mahi? " Engari i tērā wā ka tīmata te huihuinga. Ko rātau ngā tāngata hira e mau ana i ngā tāngata ki runga i te raina." Kaore hoki he mea a Del engari he whakamihi ki nga rūnanga me ngā tūao, i kī a ia, he tino mātauranga. I kitea hoki e ia kua katia ngā teihana wai, ā, "tata ki te 23 maire i nekehia atu tētahi rōpū o mātau i te papa kohatu, engari mō te 100 mita noa iho". Engari, ka tāpiri mai a ia: "Kāore au i rongo i tētahi tangata e kōrero ana i tētahi mea whakahāwea - tērā pea nā te mea he tangata nui ahau. "He nui tonu ahau, kāore i te tino taumaha. " Ko ngā tāngata o ngā pakeke me ngā rahi katoa e oma ana i te rēhi. "I te itinga rawa i a rātau te ngākau nui ki te haere." I pouri a Del ki te rongo i ētahi atu kaioma pōturi kāore i tino hari. "E tūmanako ana ahau kāore tēnei e whakaweto i te tangata kia kaua e mahi," tana kī, "engari e whakaaro ana ahau me titiro ngā kaiwhakahaere ki ngā mea i tūpono ki ētahi o aua tāngata e pāngia ana." I te āhua nei kua warewaretia mātau mō Hemi Miller, e 35, i oti i roto i te waru haora noa iho. Ko tana tauomaoma tuarua tērā, ā, he tino rerekē te wheako i te tuatahi, i te tau 2013. "He tino whakapōrearea te kite i te akoranga e wetewetehia ana i a mātau," tana kī. "Ko te wāhi kino rawa atu i te tangohanga o ētahi o ngā karaka me ngā whāriki wā. " I pātai tonu ahau ki ngā tohutohu. I pēnei i warewaretia mātau." Kaore a Hemi i rongo i ētahi kōrero tōraro e hāngai ana ki ngā kaioma pōturi. Ahakoa e hiahia ana a ia kia whakaaro anō ngā kaiwhakahaere i te tautoko i tukuna ki te hunga e mutu tōmuri ana, ka tāpiri mai a ia: "I oti i a au i waho o ngā wā o te pūrehurehu, engari kei te tuwhera tonu te raina whakamutunga, ā, i taea e au te kohikohi i taku mētara." Ngā uiuinga a Sherie Ryder, BBC UGC me ngā rongo pāpori

title: I whakaekea e te āpiha o Thames Valley te hīpoki
summary: I whakaekea tētahi pirihimana ki tētahi whakaekenga "whakarihariha" i te tuwha a tētahi ki a ia, a, ka tāhaetia tana hīpoki kanohi.
text: I kī a Craig O'Leary, te kaiwhakahaere o te Tōpūtanga Pirihimana o Thames Valley, ko te whakaekenga tētahi o ngā "whakaekenga kino e pā ana ki te Covid-19" ki ngā āpiha. Kua karangatia e Tēnā O'Leary he "raina kaha ake mo te whiu" mō ngā tāngata e whakaeke ana i ngā kaimahi ohorere. I pūrongotia e te BBC i mua e 50 ngā whakaekenga ki ngā pirihimana i te takiwā o Thames Valley i te wā o te taiepa coronavirus. E whakaatu ana ngā whika e 198 ngā whakaekenga ki ngā āpiha i waenganui o Poutāpeta me Aperira, he pikinga o te 40 mō taua wā kotahi i te tau 2019. I kī te Rangatira Kātipa o John Campbell he "whakarihariha" ngā whakaekenga ki ana kaimahi. I kī a RW O'Leary, e ārahi ana i te peka o te tinana o Thames Valley e tohu ana i ngā āpiha kapa me te kōnae, he "tino pouri" te pikinga o ngā whakaekenga. "He hara tino whakarihariha te whakaekea i tēnei ara i ngā wā tino pai. Engari, kei roto tonu i te āhuarangi o nāianei ina māharahara te katoa ki te Covid-19," tana kī. 'Whakamihi ki ngā rerenga tiaki' I kī a ia he "tino waimarie" te ope i te "tohatoha i ngā rerenga tiaki" ki te hunga i whakataua ki ngā "whakaekenga e pā ana ki te Covid-19". "Ahakoa e kore pea e rawaka ngā rerenga kōrero mō ētahi, me whakamihi te mea kei te tukuna he rerenga tiaki," tana tāpiri mai. Kotahi te wahine i hereheretia mo te waru wiki i Aperira mo te tuwha ki tētahi pirihimana i muri i tana kīanga he Covid-19.

title: Keith Flint: Southend mural commemorates Prodigy singer
summary: Kua peitatia tētahi pakitara e takoha ana ki te kaiwaiata The Prodigy, a Keith Flint i tōna takiwā kāinga.
text: I kitea a Flint, nāna i waiata ngā waiata ārahi i runga i te tau tuatahi o te pēne Breathe me Firestarter, kua mate i te 4 o Poutāpeta. I whakaritea e te Rohe Whakapai Pakihi o Southend (BID) te mahi i raro i tētahi piriti rerewhenua i te taone o Essex hei maumahara ki te kaiwaiata makawe neon. I whakatuwheratia he uiuinga ki tōna matenga i tērā wiki, a, ka rongo i tētahi take tauwhāiti o te mate i te whakairinga. I peitatia e te kaiwaiata a John Bulley te pakitara, e whakaatu ana i a Flint e mahi ana i te taha o tētahi oriori e takoha ana ki a ia, i raro i te piriti i Southend High Street. Ka kī a Tēnā Bulley: "He atahanga pūkoro tēnei. Tērā ētahi huānga mōna e mōhio wawe ana te tangata. "Ki te peita koe i a Bob Marley, i a David Bowie rānei, ka mōhio wawe te iwi ko wai tērā, ā, he pēnei a Keith Flint." I kī te kaiwhakahaere BID a Alison Dewey: "I whakaaro ahau he takoha pai pea ki tētahi frontman mātauranga o Essex, ā, pēnei i te tokomaha o ngā tāngata o tōku whakatupuranga i pā ki te tirohanga rave o ngā tau tōmuri o ngā tau kotahi mano e waru tekau mā iwa rau e waru tekau mā iwa rau, i aroha ki te Prodigy. " He huarahi tino pai te peita a Hoani ki te maumahara ki a Keith." I whānau a Flint i Redbridge, ki te raki-rāwhiti o Rānana, ā, i muri iho ka neke ki Braintree i reira i hangaia ai te Prodigy i te tau 1990. Kua whakarewaina hoki he petihana kia whakatūria he whakapakoko o te frontman ki tōna taone kāinga o Braintree. Mēnā kei te uaua koe ki te whakatikatika, whakapā atu ki ngā Hamari i te raina āwhina koreutu 116 123, pāwhiri rānei i tēnei hono kia uru ki ngā ratonga tautoko.

title: Bus firm sorry for Bristol residential 'bus depot'
summary: Kua whakapārewa tētahi kamupene pahi ki te iwi mo te whakamahi i tētahi huarahi tūpāpaku e tata ana ki o rātau kāinga hei whare pahi kore mana.
text: I kī a Emma Chappell, e noho ana i Siddley Road i Brentry, Bristol, he tino "wehi" te turituri, nā reira i whakaoho ai tana pēpi i te wā o te moe. I kī a ia i tīmata i tērā marama me te "whakahaere i ngā mīhini, te kōrerorero nui me ngā pahi e haere ana i ia 10 meneti". I whakapārewa te Tuatahi ki te Uru o Ingarangi "mō ngā raruraru i puta mai i a mātau waka ki ngā tangata whenua". E whakaratohia ana te huarahi e te ara 2a o te umanga, i tīmata i a Aotearoa, ā, ka haere mai i te pokapū o te taone ki Charlton Road, e mutu ana. 'E toru, e whā rānei ngā pahi' ka kī a Ms Chappell: "Kei te mutunga mātou o Charlton Road. I te tīmatanga o Aotearoa, ka kite ahau i ēnei pahi e haere ana. "He tino auau, i haere ahau ki te kōrero ki tētahi o ngā atekōkiri, ā, i kī mai a ia e rua ngā ara hou kua whakatinanatia e whakamutu ana i te hauwhā o te maero ki raro i te huarahi." I kī a ia e "haere katoa mai ana ngā pahi ki te whakamahi i te mokowā i waho o to mātau tiriti kia wehea ai ō rātou wehenga", ā, ka tāpiri mai "i ētahi wā e toru, e whā rānei ngā pahi e whakatūria ana ki ngā mīhini whakahaere". I kī tētahi atu tangata whenua, e noho tata ana ki Charlton Road, i runga i te Twitter, "ehara tēnei i te wāhi mō ngā pahi hei whakatū". I kī a Chris Hanson, mai i te Uru Tuatahi o Ingarangi: "I te mea koinei te mutunga o te ara, he wā poto e tatari ai ngā pahi i tēnei tauwāhi i mua i te haerenga atu ki tā rātou haerenga panuku. " Ko te nuinga o a mātau waka e tapahi aunoa ana i te wā e tū ana. Heoi anō, mēnā he waka tā tētahi atekōkiri kāore i a rātou tēnei pūkenga, ka tohutohutia rātou kia whakaweto i te mīhini mēnā e noho ana mō te neke atu i te meneti, ā, ka whakamaharatia e mātou ā mātou atekōkiri katoa tēnei kaupapahere i runga i tēnei amuamu."

title: E 30 tau ki muri mai: He aha te rerekētanga?
summary: E toru tekau tau, kotahi te uiui me te heitara a Stephen Lawrence e wehe ana i a mātau i nga whakararuraru o Brixton. I te huritau o te mate kino rawa i kitea i Rāwāhi i roto i te rau tau, ka pātai te HAU: kei hea tātau ināianei?
text: Nā Ed DaveyBBC News, London I te wā i ūkuia te paowa i muri i ngā whakararuraru o Brixton, i whakaae te kāwanatanga me te iwi pango - me hoatu tētahi mea. I kīia kua whakatūria e ngā pirihimana he whakahau whakatūtū ki te iwi pango i te tonga o Rānōna, e kī ana tētahi āpiha o mua he "whakamamaetanga". I te 11 o Āperira 1981 ka hū te renarena ki te tutu nui, nā reira i tino kino ai te raruraru o te rau tau 20 o Rāwāhi. I te ahiahi i mua, i te Paraire, i puta mai he huihuinga riri ki nga pirihimana mo ētahi haora i mua i te pupuritanga o nga whakararuraru. Engari na te hopunga i te pō e whai ake nei i whakaoho te whakararuraru. I roto i te raruraru e toru rā, e 300 ngā pirihimana me ngā mema e 65 o te iwi whānui i whara. I pango te rangi i te paowa o nga motokā e wera ana, i te wā i tāhaetia nga papa papa kohatu, a, ka whakamahia hei tūroro. I taunakitia e te Pūrongo Scarman ki te raruraru ngā huringa whānui ki te whakangungu pirihimana me te whakahau ture. E toru tekau tau kua hipa ināianei, ā, he rite tonu te hūkere o te whanaungatanga o te iwi pirihimana - i runga anō i te tūhuratanga hē ki te patunga whakahāwea o Stephen Lawrence. A, i tērā wiki anake, i te rama anō te tūmomo o nga whakararuraru. I te wā o tētahi hui a te Mana Pirihimana o Metropolitan (MPA), ka whakararuraru ngā mema o te iwi whānui i ngā āpiha matua i te matenga o te kaiwaiata reggae Smiley Culture, i mate i te wā o te poho pirihimana i tētahi motu maripi i whakaritea e ia anō. I kitea te nekehanga o te mema MPA o Cindy Butts, he pango, a, i tipu ake i te uru o Rāwāhi, e kī ana ki te hui: "Kua 30 tau mai i te whakararuraru o Brixton, ā, he nui rawa ngā mea kua rerekē - [engari] he nui rawa tā mātou mahi." I te ahiahi o te huritau o te whakararuraru, ka kī a Ms Butts: "Kua rerekē, kua tipu, kua ako hoki te iwi pango me te ope pirihimana. " Ko te tino nui o te haerenga o te Tūtaki - ehara i te mea mai i te 30 tau ki mua, engari i te 20 tau ki mua. "He tino nui te haere whakamua." E kī ana a Ms Butts kua pai ake te haepapatanga o ngā tunu i te rihi tūmatanui ki te komihana Tūtaki i te hui ā-marama o te poari ā-marama o te MPA. A, e whakaaro ana a ia kua nui te rerekētanga o te tokomaha o ngā āpiha pango. Ka kī a ia: "Ko te tikanga kei te huri te rōpū mai i roto, mai i waho hoki." Engari he kaha nga kupu a Ms Butts mo te matenga o Smiley Culture. Ka kī a ia: "He tino whakapōrearea te āhua o te mahi. Me tūpato te Tūtaki, kāore i te okioki i runga i ōna tāra. "E mōhio ana ahau he tūhuratanga IPCC - engari kāore i rawaka te whakauru." E kī ana te Met kei te mahi i ngā mea katoa e taea ana kia whakamōhiotia ai te hapori mō te tūhuratanga. He aha te whanonga o nga pirihimana i te whakahaerenga ki nga whakararuraru? Ko Pita Bleksley, he āpiha taitama Tūtaki i taua wā, kaore e mīharo i ana kupu. I kī atu a ia ki te Huihuinga o te Reo Irirangi 4: "I whakaritea auautia, i patua, i whakamamaetia, i kino kē atu. " I hurihia ahau mai i tētahi tino pai 18 tau te pakeke ki tētahi pēke taikaha, whakahāwea." I kī a Tēnā Bleksley i te nuinga o te wā ka whara ā-tinana ngā pōhēhētanga pango i roto i te rūma uiui kia whakaae rā anō rātau ki ngā hara. 'Tino whakamataku' He huarahi tērā e maumahara ana a Clovis Reid, i noho i roto i nga whakararuraru. I kī te pakeke e 61 tau, ināianei e mahi ana hei āpiha takawaenga kura: "He tunu pēhanga a Brixton e tatari ana kia pahū. " No te tīmatanga ka tino haere nga pirihimana ki runga i te moana. "He tino whakamataku. Engari e tino whakapono ana ahau i whakapuakina e te iwi to rātau take." E toru tekau tau ki muri, e kī ana a Tēnā Reid kua tino pai ake te Tūtaki - engari he huarahi anō tōna haere. Ka kī a ia: "He pai ake te takawaenga i whakaritea ki te 30 tau ki mua. Engari me nui ake te tauwhitiwhiti a rātau. "I mua noa atu i te kino o ngā mea i Brixton, i manaakitia e mātau me ngā pirihimana tētahi ki tētahi - i mōhio ahau ki taku ingoa o te rohe. " Me nui ake tēnā." I tūtaki ki te rangatira i te tonga-rāwhiti o Rāwāhi, ko Te Rangatira o Rawiri Zinzan, e tohe ana he pono kē te mahi pirihimana hapori. Ka kī a ia: "Ko ngā tīma Haumaru Haumaru Ake te papanga. Ko rātau te taonga i roto i te karauna. "Puta noa i te katoa o te Tūtaki, kua tino nui ta mātau whakapainga. " Kāore au i te kī he tino tika mātou - engari kei te whakarongo tonu mātou ki ngā hapori e mahi ana mātou." I tāpiri mai a ia: "Kia mahara ki te kupu 'mahi' - kei reira mātou ki te mahi i ngā hapori, kaua e mahi i ngā mea ki a rātou." E whakaae ana a Commander Zinzan ka pai ake te mahi a te ope ki te hoatu urupare tūmatanui ki te mahi mahi. Ka kī a ia: "Ka pai ake mātou - he rōpū nui tēnei, ā, ka kaha ake pea te ngāwari." Engari e tohu ana a ia ki te pikinga o ngā āpiha pango hei tohu o te kauneketanga. I te takiwā o Lambeth, te kāinga o Brixton, e 114 ngā āpiha iti e mahi ana i whakaritea ki te iwa i te tau 1981. E iwa tau te pakeke o Ms Butts i te wā o te whakararuraru, ā, he maha nga tau i tae ai tōna whakaaro ki nga pirihimana. Ka kī a ia: "E tino maumahara ana ahau, e kōrero ana te iwi mo taua mea. " I mōhio kē ahau ki te āhua o te mahi a nga pirihimana ki te iwi pango. "I whakaarahia ahau kia mōhio ko taku kawenga te mātakitaki i te tauwhitinga i waenganui i ngā pirihimana me tētahi tangata pango - kia taea ai e au te noho hei whatu takirua me te kōrero i te mea i tūpono hei kaiwhakaatu." I tāpiri mai a Ms Butts: "I tino kino ahau ki nga pirihimana - kia mōhio rā anō ahau ki te nui o te rerekētanga, ā, kua rerekē ahau."

title: Dinosaur niho kore e rua noa iho ngā matimati i kitea
summary: Kua kitea tētahi momo dinosaur niho kore niho, e rua noa iho ngā matimati i ia ringa i te Koraha o Gobi i Monokōria.
text: I kitea e ngā kairangahau o te Whare Wānanga o Etinitini he maha ngā anga o te momo, ko Oksoko avarsan te ingoa. Ko te kararehe huruhuru, tata ki te kotahi rau miriona tau ki mua, he ngutu nui, niho kore hoki. I kī te tīma ka āwhina te kitenga ki te whakamārama me pēhea e ngaro ai ngā matimati me ngā matimati o ngā kararehe i roto i te kunenga. I kī rātau he iti iho te matimati o te momo i ia ringa i whakaritea ki ōna whanaunga tata, e hua ana i tētahi urutaunga e taea ai e ngā kararehe te hora i te wā o te Tōmuri o te Cretaceous. He maha ngā anga katoa o ngā kararehe huruhuru, omnivorous i huraina. Ko nga kararehe, e rua mita te roa, he nui te ngutu niho e rite ana ki te momo e kitea ana i roto i te kākā. Ko te whakaaturanga tuatahi o te ngaromanga mati i roto i te whānau dinosaur matimati e toru, e mōhiotia ana ko oviraptors. I kī te tīma i te kitenga ka taea e ngā dinosaur te whakarerekē i ngā urutaunga o mua, ka taea e rātou te whakarerekē i ā rātou kai me ngā āhua noho, ā, ka taea te whakaputa me te whakarea. I kitea hoki e te tīma ko Oksoko avarsan, pēnei i ētahi atu momo tōmua, he pūhouhou. I tiakina nga toenga fossil o ngā dinosaur taitamariki e whā e okioki tahi ana. I kī a Dr Gregory Funston, o te kura pūtaiao o te Whare Wānanga o Etinitini, i whakamāramatia e te kitenga he pēhea te tipu o tētahi rōpū kararehe pēnei i te 68 miriona tau ki mua. "He ātaahua a Oksoko avarsan nā te mea he tino oti ngā anga, ā, ko te āhua o te tiaki i a rātou e okioki tahi ana e whakaatu ana i ngā pūhouhou e tīpokapoka tahi ana i roto i ngā rōpū. " Engari ko te mea nui ake, na tōna ringa matimati e rua mātau i āki ki te titiro ki te āhua o te rerekētanga o te ringa me te waewae o mua puta noa i te kunenga o ngā oviraptors, kāore anō kia akona i mua. "I whakaaturia mai e tēnei ētahi āhuatanga ohorere he wāhanga matua i roto i te panga he aha i tino rerekē ai ngā oviraptors i mua i te ngaronga i patua ai ngā dinosaurs." Ko te akoranga, i whakaputaina i roto i te tuhitaka Royal Society Open Science, i pūteatia e te Royal Society me te Kaunihera Pūtaiao Māori me te Kaunihera Pūkaha o Kānata. I whakaurua hoki e ngā kairangahau mai i te Whare Wānanga o Alberta me te Whare Taonga Dinosaur o Piripi J Currie i Kānata, te Whare Wānanga o Hokkaido i Hapanihi, me te Whare Wānanga o Te Pūtaiao o Monokōria.

title: 'Mahi nui' i te Hōhipera o Royal Devon me Exeter
summary: Kua whakapuakina tētahi "mahi nui" i tētahi hōhipera nā te nui o ngā tūroro coronavirus me ngā kaimahi e ngaro ana.
text: Tata ki te 10% o ngā kaimahi kei te mahi i te Hōhipera o Royal Devon me Exeter, te kī a te kaiwhakahaere rongoā. I kī atu a Prof Adrian Harris ki te BBC ko te "pēhanga nui" i runga i te hōhipera he "tino take" nā te coronavirus. Kua tohe a ia ki ngā tāngata kia haere anake ki te hōhipera "ina tino hiahiatia e rātou". Kua whakanohoia te hōhipera ki te taumata matohi tiketike. I kī a Prof Harris he "neke atu i te 900 ngā kaimahi i tēnei wā" ā, kei te whakahaere te hōhipera i te mokatere ngaro o te "neke atu i te taurua" i te mea e tūmanakohia ana i tēnei wā o te tau. He maha ngā tiaki kua kati, ā, "he tino poto rawa mātou i ngā kaimahi," tana tāpiri mai. I kī te kaiwhakahaere rongoā i takea mai te uaua i te "nui" o ngā tūroro Covid kāore te hōhipera e tiaki i tēnei wā o te tau me te "pānga o ngā mate Covid me ngā mate hōtoke ki ā mātou kaimahi". "Ko to mātau tino raruraru ko te hōtoke noa ka pai ake tātau, engari kei a mātau a Covid i roto i tō mātou hapori i tēnei wā," tana kī. "Ā, kāore ngā tākuta, ngā nēhi me ētahi atu kaimahi rongoā i te ārai i taua mea, ā, me wehe rātou i a rātou anō mēnā ka whakapā atu rātou ki taua mea." I kī a Prof Harris me haere te tangata ki te hōhipera mō tētahi ohorere, mō ngā wāhui rānei, engari "mēnā kei te whakaaro koe ka taea e koe te haere atu me te kore haere mai ki te hōhipera, whakaarohia koa ētahi atu whiringa". I whakamātauria e te kaiwhakahaere ka tiakina ngā tūroro katoa i roto i tēnei wā, ā, ka kī ka homai e ngā werohanga he "mārama" i te mutunga o te kauhanga.

title: E whakaae ana ngā minita ki te pakaru poke
summary: Kua whakaae te kāwanatanga ki te takahi i ngā ture poke o Ūropi, i te wā o te pakanga a te Kōti Tiketike ki te rōpū whakahau taiao.
text: I whakaurua e ngā rōia mō te Hēkeretari Taiao a Caroline Spelman te whakaurunga i muri i te mahi a ClientEarth. Engari i kī te Kaiwhakawā o Tēnā Ture Mitting he take mō te Kōmihana o Ūropi. Kāore a ia i whakaae ki te whakapuaki i tētahi whakapuakitanga, ki te whakahau rānei i a Mrs Spelman ki te whakahuahua i ngā kaupapa mo te tapahi i ngā taumata pokenga. I amuamu a ClientEarth kua rahua a Mrs Spelman ki te uiui mō ngā tono e whakaatu ana i te whāinga a te UK ki te ū ki ngā tepe EU i runga i ngā taumata hauota taikura. I tonoa e ia te tiati kia whakapuakina ko ngā mahere i whakaritea e te Tari Taiao, Kai me ngā Take Ā-Taiwhenua (Defra) kāore i ū ki te ture EU, me te whakahau i a Mrs Spelman kia whakaputa i ngā tono kua whakahōutia. I werohia e nga rōia kāwanatanga te kerēme, a, kaore he whakahau a te Kōti Tiketike i hiahiatia. 'Kēhi tika' i kī a Tēnā Ture Mitting kua whakapuaki tētahi rōia "kei te takahi te kāwanatanga i ngā herenga" engari i kī kāore a ia e mahi i tētahi "whakahau whakahau". I kī a ia ka taea e te kāwanatanga te whakaae ki te pakaru, ā, "waiho ki te Kōmihana (Ūropi) kia mahia ngā mahi e tika ana ki te whakaū". "He whakahau whakahau pēnei... ka whakaarahia he pātai tōrangapū nui, ohaoha hoki, ehara noa iho i te kaiwhakawā," tana tāpiri mai. "Kua tūpato ngā kōti ki te tomo ki tēnei wāhi taupatupatu tōrangapū - mō te take pai." I kōrerotia e Tēnā Kaiwhakawā Mitting te mahi he "tānga" me te kī me tiritiri ngā utu. I kī tētahi kaikorero mō Defra e hari ana "kua whakataua e te tiati to mātau manakohanga". "Ko tētahi wāhanga nui o te UK e tutuki ana i ngā tepe kounga hau EU mō ngā parakino katoa, ā, kua tino pai ake te kounga o te hau i roto i ngā tekau tau tata nei. " I whakaritea e ā mātou mahere kounga hau ngā mahi hira katoa e mahia ana i te taumata ā-motu, ā-rohe, paetata hoki kia tutuki ai ngā tepe EU katoa i te wā poto rawa," te kī a te kaiwhakahaere. I kī atu a Stephen Hockman QC, mō ClientEarth, ki te kōti kua tutuki i te aroha tētahi mea, ā, ka mea: "Kei te takahi te kāwanatanga i ana here i raro i te ture o Ūropi e pā ana ki te kounga o te hau. " Ahakoa kua ngaro mātau, he take tika te haere whakamua." I kī tētahi kōrero kua mauria mai te wero ā-ture nā te mea kāore ngā mahere kounga hau mō ngā rohe me ngā tāone e 17 e ū ki ngā tepe ā-ture mō te kounga o te hau tae noa ki muri i te 2015, i te wā e taea ai ngā tepe ko te 1 o Hānuere 2010. I kī a ia e hiahia ana ia kia whakahaua e te kōti a Mrs Spelman kia tātuhia ngā mahere e tutuki ai te whakatikatika ā-ture puta noa i te UK i te tau 2015, ā, kia whakapuakina hoki e takahi ana ia i ana here ā-ture. I kī te rangatira nui o ClientEarth, a Hemi Thornton: "He tino kino ngā kaupapa a te kāwanatanga ki te rutu i te pokenga o te hau. Kāore he tikanga hōu kei roto, ā, e whakaatu ana kāore e tutuki i a rātou ngā tepe kounga hau tae noa ki te tau 2025. Ehara i te mea poto noa iho i te tāwai."

title: Ka whakakore a Uganda i te kiriata Tatimana mo te 'whakakororia i te moe tane'
summary: Kua rāhuitia e te poari whakatau a Uganda tētahi pikitia Tatimana, The Dinner Club, i muri i te whakapae i a ia ki te "whakakororia i te tānetanga" i kī ai te Kāwanatanga o Hōrana i Kampala.
text: He ture te wahine tāne i Uganda. I kī te kāwanatanga i roto i tētahi pou Facebook e "whakawātea" ana i te whakataunga kia whakakore i te pikitia. Kātahi ka whakaputaina te rārangi katoa o ngā whakahē mai i te kaunihera pāpāho, arā ko te whakamahi i te "reo whakarihariha", me te "kai paipa i te nuinga o ngā wāhine". I whakaahuatia e te Kaunihera Pāpāho o Uganda te pikitia he wāhine e hanga ana i tētahi "Karapu Hapa, arā, he momo whare pārekareka", ā, i kī i roto i te pikitia he tirohanga o "ngā tāngata tāne e haurangi ana". E kī ana "i a ia e whakakororia ana i te tānetanga, e rua nga wāhine e kī ana he mahi uaua te mārena (tērā pea ki ngā tāngata)! E hāngai ana tēnei ki ngā uara o Uganda." I whakahē hoki te kaunihera ki tētahi tangata e karanga ana i tētahi atu he "pīpī wera". He taupatupatu Uganda I roto i ngā kōrero i raro i te pou Facebook o te kāwanatanga, he tokomaha ngā tāngata e tautoko ana i te tūnga o te kaunihera pāpāho. I kī tētahi tangata: "Me mōhio ngā tāngata o te Uru he ahurea tā Uganda, ā, he tino tika ki te whakakore i ngā mea e kitea ana e rātou he kino, ka whakamamae rānei i tō tātau ahurea." Engari ka whiwhi tautoko te kāwanatanga, me tētahi atu tangata e tuhi ana: "He whakararuraru noa iho tēnei. Kāore te kaituhi i te kaunihera pāpāho e tohu ana i ngā whakaaro o te nuinga o ngā Uganda. Ko te mea kua tino whakamā a ia i te tokomaha o tātau." I whakaputaina te pikitia i te tau 2010, ā, i whakaaturia ki tētahi hākari kiriata Pākehā i Uganda. Engari i kī te Kāwanatanga o Hōrana e kore e whai wāhi ki te hākari.

title: Ka whakawhiti a Piriniha William i nga ope taua mo nga mahi ariki
summary: Ka wehe atu a Pirini William i te hōia i muri i te whitu tau o te ratonga, kua pānuitia e Te Whare o Kensington.
text: I oti i te Ariki o Cambridge tana neke whakamutunga hei kaihautū rapu me te whakaora RAF i te Tūrei. Ināianei ka arotahi a ia ki ngā mahi ariki me te mahi aroha me te Ariki o Kemipiri, ka kī tētahi kōrero o te whare kōti. E tūmanakohia ana kia neke te Ariki me te Ariki o Kemipia rāua ko Piriniha Hōri mai i to rāua kāinga o Anglesey ki Te Whare o Kensington i roto i ngā wiki tata nei. I kii te korero kingi o TE AO a Pita Hunt ka kii nga kaiwhakahaere kingi ko nga marama 12 e whai ake nei he "tauwhiro" mo Prince William. E kore a ia e noho hei "ariki wā katoa" i tēnei wāhanga, ka kī rātau. Ka tautoko tonu te ariki, me te Ariki o Kemipiri, i te mahi a te Kuini me te Whānau Ariki mā tētahi hōtaka o ngā whakaritenga whai mana - i te kāinga, i rāwāhi rānei, ka tāpiritia e te whare kōti. E whakaaro ana a ia ki te whakawhānui i ana mahi i roto i te āpure atawhai, otirā e pā ana ki ngā momo mōrearea, mā te Royal Foundation of The Duke and Duchess of Cambridge me Prince Harry. Kua mahi tahi te tūāpapa me ngā rōpū atawhai tino whai mana e whitu o te ao i raro i te United for Wildlife, he whāinga wā roa ki te tiaki i ngā rauemi māori o te ao. I kī a Pirini William: "He whānui ngā tuma ki tō tātau taonga tuku iho, engari e whakapono ana ahau mā tēnei ngātahitanga o ngā hinengaro tino pai i roto i te atawhai ka whakarato i te kaha mō tētahi whāinga me te mahi hou hei pare i ngā momo mōrearea me ngā wāhi noho mō ngā whakatupuranga e heke mai nei. " Hei tauira, ko te pūtake o te hokohoko kararehe kore mana, ko te hiahiatanga o ngā hua e hiahiatia ana kia matea te tekau mano o ēnei kararehe i ia tau, e pana ana i a rātau ki te ngaro. "Me mahi tahi tātau ki te ārai i tēnei pākihi me te tuku i a tātau tamariki kia whai wāhi ki te wheako i ngā kararehe i roto i ōna momo ātaahua, rerekē hoki." I whakapūketetia e te ariki e rua ngā karere tūmatanui i Rāwāhi i te Rāitema e arotahi ana ki te whakaiti i te tono mō te haona rhino me te rei. Ka rere huri noa rātau ā muri ake i tēnei tau. I haere te ariki rāua ko te ariki ki ngā Tohu Atawhai Tusk tuatahi i te Royal Society i Rāwāhi i te ahiahi o te Rāite. I roto i tētahi whaikōrero ki ngā manuhiri, ka tīmata a Piriniha William mā te whakakata mo te whakapau i tōna pō tuatahi i te tama pēpi a Piriniha Hōri. "E ai ki tāu i kohikohi ai, kātahi anō māua ko Catherine ka noho hei mātua whakahīhī - o tētahi pēpi whai reo e ōrite ana ki te haruru o te raiona," tana kī. "Koinei tonu to mātau ahiahi tuatahi ki waho i a ia, nā reira tēnā whakawāteatia mātou mēnā ka kite koe i a mātau e titiro āmaimai ana ki a mātau waea pūkoro ki te tirotiro kei te pai katoa ki te kāinga. Ka haere tonu te ariki: "Pēnei i ngā mātua hou, ka huri o tātau whakaaro ki te ao ka riro i ta māua tamaiti. " E kore e taea te whakaaro i tētahi ao e tipu ake ai ngā tamariki i whānau mai i roto i ngā marama e rua kua taha i te mohoao." 'He tino motuhake' I kī te whare kōti e whakaaro ana te ariki ki te maha o ngā kōwhiringa mō te ratonga tūmatanui, ā, ka pānuitia anō i te wā e tika ana. Na te neke whakamutunga o te Tūrei i whakamutu ai tētahi whakairinga e toru tau ki Anglesey mō te rangatira. I roto i tētahi uiuinga mō te pakipūmeka o TE AO Wales Helicopter Rescue, ka kī a ia: "Kāore he whakaaro nui ake i te wā i mahi pai ai koe me te whakaora i te ora o tētahi tangata. " Ki taku whakaaro kāore he karanga nui ake i roto i te ora... Kia kite i te kanohi o te tama, tamāhine rānei ina whakahokia mai e koe tō rātou whaea, pāpā rānei i te tapa o te mate - he tino kaha." I whakamihi te upoko o te RAF, a Air Chief Marshal Sir Andrew Pulford, ki te mahi a te ariki i roto i te ope rererangi. I kī a Tā Anaru he wāhanga "tōpu" a Rutene Rererangi o Uēra o te ope rapu me te whakaora a te RAF, "i te nuinga o ngā āhuatanga tino uaua, kua āwhina hāngai a ia ki te whakaora i ngā oranga i ngā maunga o Uēra ki te Raki, i ngā tūkinotanga o te Moana o Kīriria. I tāpiri mai a ia: "Kua whiwhi a ia i te manaakitanga o te hunga katoa i mahi tahi me ia hei kaihautū tino ngaio, mātauranga hoki." I roto i tētahi whaikōrero i te Whakaaturanga o Anglesey i Aotearoa, ka mihi te ariki ki te iwi o te motu mo te pōhiri ki a ia me tana wahine. "E mōhio ana ahau e kōrero ana ahau mō Catherine ina kī ahau kāore anō ahau i roto i tōku oranga kia mōhiotia ki tētahi wāhi ātaahua, pōhiri hoki pērā i a Anglesey," tana kī. "E mōhio ana ahau ka tino mahue i a māua tokorua ina mutu taku haerenga rapu me te whakaora a tērā marama, ā, me neke mātou ki tētahi atu wāhi. " Mai i te takere o tōku ngākau, tēnā koe mō te pōhiri i a māua ko taku wahine i to māua taenga mai ki konei, pērā i a koe e mahi ana i ngā mano manuhiri i ia tau." I kī a ia ko te motu to rāua kāinga tuatahi, ā, ka noho tonu hei "wāhi tino motuhake mō māua tokorua". Ahakoa ko to rāua kāinga matua ko te Whare o Kensington kātahi anō ka whakahoutia, ka tūmanakohia hoki te tokorua ariki kia mau i to rāua whenua whenua o Anmer Hall i te pānga tūmataiti o te Kuini i Norfolk ā muri ake i tēnei tau.

title: E whakakāhore ana a Tory Andrew RT Davies i te tuwha ki a Alun Cairns
summary: Kua whakakāhore te kaiārahi o te Hunga Tohutohu o Welsh kāore te Hēkeretari o Welsh i te hiahia ki te whai wāhi ki tētahi taupatupatu o TE AO he "spat".
text: I pakaru tētahi haupae i waenganui i a Andrew RT Davies me Alun Cairns i mua o te whakahau pōti i muri i te kore i uru ki te taupatupatu a TE AO o Wales. I whakapuakina e rāua he kerēme tauwhāinga he aha. Engari i tētahi hui rongokōrero i te Tūrei, ka kī a Tēnā Wānanga he hēkeretari tino pai mō Weera. I pātaitia mō tētahi pūtake Tory e huatau ana i ngā nekehanga tūpono ki a ia, ka kī a Tēnā Tērā: "E rite ana tēnei ki te kanohi o te tangata māharahara?" I riro i a Clwyd West AM, a Te Hauauru, a Te Hauauru, te urunga mō ngā Tohutohu i te Taupatupatu a ngā Kaiārahi o TE Aotearoa, i tū i tērā Tūrei. "Kāore rawa mātau i whai wāhi," te kī a Tēnā Davies. "Kua mahi ngātahi māua ko Alun i roto i ngā tau, ā, e tūmanako ana ahau ki te mahi tonu me Alun. " He hēkeretari tino pai a Alun mo Wales." I whakakāhore a Tēnā Davies i tētahi huatau tōmua a tētahi pūtake Tory i hōhā a ia ki tana mahi hei kaiārahi Rangatira o Welsh. E pā ana ki a ia anō, ka kī a ia: "He tangata tēnei e mahi ngāwari ana ki te whakarite kia tutuki ngā Tohutohu i te Tāite, e tautoko ana i a mātau kaitono. " He maha nga toa papapātuhi i reira i roto i nga rōpū tōrangapū katoa. "Ko te mea e mīharo ana ki a au ko te nui o te moni e hoatu ana e te pāpāho tōrangapū ki aua pūtake kāore i whakaingoatia." I kī a Tēnā Davies i runga i te pūkete a te pirimia hei hoatu tautoko i a ia. "Ā, kāore au i te kimi tautoko kia pono ki a koe," tana kī, "nā te mea kāore au i roto i taua tūnga." I tērā wiki ka kī atu a Tēnā Cairns ki a Te Reo Irirangi o Uēra e "heke tonu ana a Tēnā Davies ki te mahi" i te taupatupatu o TE WĀ, engari kāore i taea e Tēnā Davies te mahi mō ngā take whaiaro. Kātahi ka tukua e tētahi kōrero mō Tēnā Tērā, he kōrero e kī ana kua "kore e hiahiatia" a Tēnā Cairns ki te mahi i te taupatupatu i a ia anō. I roto i tētahi uiuinga o muri mai o te Reo Irirangi o Uēra i muri i te pakarutanga o te haupae, ka pūruatia e Tēnā Pirihitini hei kaiārahi o ngā Tohutohu o Welsh "me te kore pātai".

title: Ngā waipuke o UK: I katia te ara nui o Oxford mō te wā tuarua
summary: Ka katia tonutia tētahi o ngā ara matua o Oxford nā te waipuke mo te tuarua o te wā i roto i te marama.
text: Ka rere te Huarahi o Abingdon puta noa i te pokapū o te taone, ā, ka katia i waenganui i te Tiriti o Thames ki Redbridge Park & Ride tae noa ki te Paraire, e whakatau tata ana te kaunihera o te rohe. Ko tētahi o ngā huarahi e 40 puta noa i Oxfordshire kua katia nā te waipuke o te Awa o Thames. Kāore ngā ratonga tereina CrossCountry i te rere i waenganui i Oxford me Didcot Parkway nā te waipuke i runga i te raina. 'Ngā poka tino nui' He maha ngā matohi waipuke e noho tonu ana i te takiwā, me te nuinga o ngā whakatūpato tino nui i te tonga o Ingarangi e pā ana ki tētahi whārōrō o te Thames puta noa i Oxfordshire me Surrey. Kei te whakaritea ngā parenga waipuke rangitahi me ngā matatara pēke kirikiri i te uru o Oxford, me te mapu wai e mahia ana. I tāutatia e te Kaunihera Taone o Oxford ngā whare taonga rangitahi i Fox Crescent me Canning Crescent, i Abingdon Road, i te waipuke o ngā wai. Kua karangatia e ngā pakihi i Abingdon Road kia tāutatia ngā ārai waipuke. I kī a Haira Afzal, mai i te pātaka ahuwhānui o Nisa, kāore e taea e te tangata te tae ki tōna toa "ki te kore rātau e mau i ngā poka tino nui". "Koinei te tuarua o ngā wā i roto i te marama kua pā mai tēnei, ki taku whakaaro me waia e tātau," tana kī. "Engari, me whakarite mātou ā muri ake nei i ā mātou mahi, pēnei i te ararere anō i te wai." I kī a Rodney Rose, te kaiārahi tuarua o te Kaunihera o te Takiwā o Oxfordshire, he kino te waipuke i te tau 2007. I tētahi atu wāhi, tae atu ki te 20 ngā tāngata i whakaorangia i te Hātarei mai i tētahi pāka wīra tata ki Northmoor e ngā kaimahi ahi e whakamahi ana i ngā waka pupuhi. I tukuna hoki e ngā kainoho o Duke Street, Earl Street, Bullstake Close me Botley Road i West Oxford ngā reta e te taone nui me ngā kaunihera o te rohe i te Mane e whakatūpato ana i a rātau ka waipuke pea o rātau kāinga nā te pikinga o ngā taumata wai. Ka tohutohu nga mana ki a rātau kia neke i ngā taonga ki runga, kia whakaaro hoki ki te neke ki tētahi atu nohoanga. I kī te kaiahuwhenua a John Hook tae atu ki te haurua o tōna whenua tata ki Standlake i raro i te wai. I kī a ia he "kore e taea te tatau" te utu. "He tino wehi noa iho te nui o ngā mahi e mahia ana e tātau hei whakaora anō i te oneone," tana kī.

title: Coronavirus: Ko te hokinga mai o Bridgend Ford ki te mahi e tohu ana i te 40 tau
summary: Kei te tīmata anō te tipu mīhini a Ford i Bridgend i te whakanaotanga i muri i te whakaweto tata ki te rua marama nā te taiepa coronavirus.
text: Nā Steve DuffyBBC News E 1,200 ōna kaimahi kaha e 1,200 i runga i te whakawāteatanga mai i te 25 o Poutāpeta, engari ko tēnei hokinga whakamutunga ki te mahi - me te wheketere nā te kati mō te pai i te wā o Mahuru - e tohu ana hoki i tōna huritau 40. I te whakatuwheratanga o te tipu i Me 1980, i kitea he tohu mahi i mau ai te motokā i te waro i Weera. E 30,000 tonu ngā mahi e mahi ana i te kari, engari e 700 ngā mahi i te kākahu o Lewis Merthyr i te Rhondda i raro i te mōrearea. He whare taonga ināianei. Tata tonu ki te 30 ngā kamupene wae motokā i te tonga o Uēra i te wā i toa ai a Bridgend - he mihi ki te raweke whaiaro a te Pirimia o Hemi Callaghan - i toa i te whakawhiwhinga. I whakaahuatia te pānuitanga a Ford i te tau 1978 i roto i te South Wales Echo hei "huka i runga i tētahi keke nui kē" mō te wāhanga waka. I whakaarohia e te CD i taua wā e 25,000 i whakamahia i roto i te umanga motokā i Weera, me te huinga o te £350m. Kua whakatuwheratia kētia e Borg-Warner, nāna i mahi tarenga aunoa i Kenfig tata ki Bridgend, te wheketere 1m sq ft tuatahi o Wales, me ngā mahi mō ngā tāngata neke atu i te 1,200. Ko te nuinga o ana hua i haere ki Volvo i Huitene. Tērā anō ētahi atu, e whakarato ana i a British Leyland - e rua ōna ake kamupene i Kānata me Llanelli, e hanga ana i ngā pouaka pouaka me ngā radiator. I whakatuwheratia te wheketere i te tau 1980 me te kore pārekareka i tētahi wā pōhēhē. E rua wiki te roa o te tuki i ngā nūpepa paetata, nā reira ka puta te takahanga, kāore he kōrero, he pūkete rānei. I roto i ngā wiki torutoru o te whakatuwheratanga o te tipu o Bridgend, ka pānuitia e Ford e 1,400 anake, ehara i te 2,500 tāngata, ka whakamahia ki reira nā te hinganga o ngā hokonga motokā. I te raruraru hoki a British Leyland, me ngā hinganga £122m i pānuitia. Neke atu i te rua te whika o mua o te coronavirus o te tau 2020, ā, tata ki te 18% te utunga o te utunga. Ko te awhe hou o Ford Escorts - me Bridgend e whakaputa ana i ngā pūkaha 2,000 i te wiki mō rātou - i roto i ngā whare whakaaturanga motokā i te mutunga o Mahuru 1980. I utua e ngā kaihīkoi te £3,374 mō te tauira taketake, ā, i whakaahuatia a Pirinihi Taiana i te taraiwa kotahi i te tau i muri mai - i te mutunga o te tekau tau, tērā pea ko te motokā tino pai o te UK, neke atu i te 1.6 miriona ngā tauira i runga i ngā huarahi. Tae atu ki ngā huringa o te hiahia mō ngā motokā me te puku mō ngā māiatanga - kua kite a Bridgend i ngā mīhini mō ngā motokā Ford i hangaia ki tētahi atu wāhi i Uropi engari kāore i te UK. I runga i te pakitara te tuhituhi i te wā i tauinetia ai te pūtea penapena i tētahi mīhini penehīni hou, e kiia nei ko Tarakona, i te mutunga o te whakanaotanga mō te mīhini i hangaia e Bridgend mō Jaguar Land Rover. I whakapaea e Ford "te huri i te tono kiritaki me ngā hē utu" mo te whakataunga kia kati. I tēnei rā, tata tonu ki te hauwhā o ngā kamupene e 30 i te wāhanga waka huri noa i Ford 40 tau ki mua, engari kua whakakapia e ētahi atu - ināianei neke atu i te 70 ngā kaiwhakarato wae i te pānuitanga M4 me ngā awaawa anake. Kua iti iho ngā tau e mahi ana - engari kei te whakaarohia tonutia te wāhanga waka ki te whakamahi i ngā kaimahi 18,000 puta noa i Weera. Kei te whakatuwhera mārire anō a Ford Bridgend i tōna huritau 40 mō tētahi wā poto rawa. Engari i tētahi wā tūturu - me te wā whakaharahara - mō te umanga katoa.

title: Te tutu o Te Rūnanga o Te Aotearoa: Ko te ope taua o Paratira hei whakahaere i te haumarutanga
summary: Kua whakatūria e te kāwanatanga o Pārihia he tianara taua hei whakahaere i te haumarutanga i te āhua o Awatea, hei urupare ki te nui o te tutu o te rōpū.
text: I whakatauritea e Perehitini Mīharo Temer te tutu ki "te mate pukupuku" me te kī kua mau katoa te mana o te kāwanatanga. I tukuna e te kāwana o Awaawa he tono āwhina i muri i te tūkinotanga o nga hākari taiwhanga ā-tau. Ka whakahaeretia e te taua nga pirihimana me ētahi atu ratonga haumarutanga. Ko te whakahaere i te mahi ko Gen Walter Souza Braga Netto, te upoko o te Tono Hōia ki te Rāwhiti. I whakamihitia whānuitia a ia mo tana wāhi i te whakarite haumarutanga mō ngā Tākaro Orimipia o Te Aorangi o Te tau 2016. He aha te take o te āhuatanga? I te hainatanga o te ture, ka kī a Tēnā Termer e mahi ana a ia i "ngā tikanga tino nui" nā te mea i tonoa e ngā āhuatanga. "Ka hoatu e te kāwanatanga he whakautu uaua, mārō hoki, mā te mahi i ngā tikanga katoa e tika ana hei haepapa i te hara whakaritea," tana kī. Tērā ētahi tirohanga hūkere i te wā o te taiwhanga rongonui o Aotearoa, me ngā whawhai pū me te parakete. Tokotoru nga pirihimana i mate i roto i nga matapaki taikaha. I pāohotia hoki e ngā pānui rongokōrero o te pouaka whakaata ā-motu ngā whakarākeitanga o ngā rōpū e karapoti ana, e whānako ana i ngā tūruhi. Na te āhua nei e tōrino ana te āhuatanga haumarutanga, ka inoi te kāwana o te kāwanatanga o Luiz Fernando Pezao ki te kāwanatanga ā iwi e kī ana ko te raweke hōia anake te huarahi ki te rutu i nga rōpū patu nui. Ka whakapārewa a ia ki aua kaingākau pāngia, ka mea: "Kāore mātou i rite. Tērā ētahi hē i ngā rā tuatahi, ā, i whakapakaritia e mātau nga tautiaki." He aha i kino ai te tutu? Kua rītahatia te tahua pirihimana o Rio i roto i ngā tau tata nei nā te raruraru pūtea. Tērā ētahi whakahēnga kāore i a nga pirihimana te moni hei utu mo te penehīni i roto i o rātau motokā tautiaki. Kua tino pā ki ngā moni i te āhua o Awatea e te whakahekenga ā iwi me te hinganga o ngā utu hinu, tae atu ki ngā taumata tiketike o te hāmate. Na nga raruraru pūtea anake i whakakaha nga rōpū hara. Ko ngā whika mai i te kāwanatanga o te kāwanatanga o Awatea e whakaatu ana i te 8% te pikinga o te tūpāpaku i tērā tau i te 2016 me te peke 26% mai i te 2015. 'Kaore he mawhiti i te rangirua' Julia Carneiro, BBC News, Rio de Janeiro Ohorere, ngoikore, ohorere, whakakāhoretia rānei. Ko te noho i Awatea e mau mai ana i ēnei whakaaro whāranu i tēnei rā. Ka haere tonu te ora i te taone nui, ā, ka ngana ngā tangata whenua ki te ārahi i o rātau oranga i runga i te tikanga. "Kāore he mea e puta" - kia puta rā anō tētahi mea. A, kua nui ake te tutu i te ara, me ngā matā taka noa e patu ana i ngā tamariki i roto i ngā favelas, e kati ana i ngā huarahi nui me ngā tāhae maha e whakangaro ana i te ngahau mō ngā tangata maha me ngā tūruhi i waenganui i ngā hākari Kāniwha. Ka haere te kōrero i Paratira ka tīmata te tau ina mutu te Kāniwha, ā, ko te raweke i pānuitia e te kāwanatanga o te kāwanatanga e whakapakari ana i te whakaaro kāore he mawhiti i te pono. Mēnā kua rongo kē a Awatea, ko te mea i tukua e te kāwana o te kāwanatanga tōna mana kia karangatia e te perehitini ngā tākainga i roto i te papa haumarutanga, ka tāpiri atu ki te āhua o te kore āwhina i roto i nga ringa o ngā kaipōrangapū kāore i te manakohia. Mo tēnei wā, tērā te tūmanako kei te mahia tētahi mea. Engari kua ngenge ngā Pārihia i ngā tohu tōrangapū nui - i ngā marama e ahu mai ana ki te pōti perehitini. He aha ināianei? Ka rite tonu te tautiaki a te taua i ētahi o ngā wāhi tino mōrearea o Awatea de Janeiro e mau ana ngā rōpū rongoā, engari ināianei ka rongo te aroaro o te hōia puta noa i te rohe taone nui o te taone, e 12 miriona ngā tāngata me te āhua whānui ake. E kī ana ngā kōrero kōrero ko te wā tuatahi tēnei i tino kōtaha ai te taua mai i te hokinga mai o Parīhi ki te kāwanatanga ā iwi i te tau 1985, i muri mai i te 21 tau o te ture hōia. Me whakaae tonu te nekehanga e te Rōpū ā Iwi o Parīhi. "Kua tata te tango i te hara i whakaritea i te āhua o Rio de Janeiro, he mate pukupuku tērā e hora ana puta noa i te whenua, ā, ka whakawehi i te rangimārie o to tātau iwi, nā reira kua whakaritea e mātau ināianei te raweke a te rangatiratanga o te wāhi haumarutanga tūmatanui o Awatea," te kī a Tēnā Temer. I kī te pāpāho o Pārihia, e kī ana i ngā pūtake kāwanatanga, ka tangohia te upoko o te haumarutanga tūmatanui o nāianei, a Roberto Sá, i te tari. E mōhiotia ana ko Gen Netto e whakahaere ana i te haumarutanga o te kāwanatanga o Awatea, tae noa ki te mutunga o te tau.

title: Hākari o Rāwāhi 2012: Ka tae mai a Bolivars ki te Konohete Nui
summary: Kua tae mai te Haimona Bolivar Symphony Orchestra rongonui o te ao ki Pākehā, hei whakarite mo te konohete tūwhera o te Hākari o Rāwāhi 2012 i te Tāite.
text: Ka kawea mai e te Konohete Nui te kaiārahi o Gustavo Dudamel me tana rōpū rōpū kaha e 200 ki te kaupapa Raploch a Stirling. Ko Dudamel te kairangi o Sistema Scotland, e mahi ana i Raploch, e whakaako ana i te puoro ki ngā tamariki rau. Ka eke ngā rangatahi o te rōpū Turituri Nui o te pānga ki te atamira ki te mahi tahi me ngā kaiwhakatangitangi o Tūria. Kua whakaahuatia a Dudamel ko tētahi o ngā kaiārahi tino "mīharo" i te ao. I tīmata tana ake mātauranga puoro i El Sistema, nāna i whakaako pūoro ki ngā rau mano o ngā rangatahi rawakore o Tūria i roto i ngā tau e 37 kua hipa. He whakaaro whakaaro tōna mo te whakarerekētanga pāpori mā te mātauranga pūoro, e whai ana ki te tiaki i ngā tamariki i te oranga o te aroha me te hara. Ko te putanga UK anake o El Sistema, Sistema Scotland, i whakatūria i te tau 2008 i te pānga o Raploch. Ināianei e 450 ngā tamariki e whai wāhi ana, mai i tētahi hapori e 3,000 noa iho. I kī a Dudamel he tino pai ki te tākaro mō te hapori i Raploch. Ka kī a ia: "Kia kite i te āhua o tēnei hōtaka, arā, ki taku whakaaro ko te tuatahi i waho o Venezuela, he ātaahua. He tino hōnore te noho hei wāhanga o tēnei wā." I tae mai ngā 'Bolivars', e mōhiotia nuitia ana ngā Tūria, ki Stirling i mua i ngā rā e whā o ngā toamahi me te konohete pō waenganui raumati i mua i ngā tāngata e 8,000 i te Tāite. Ka kite i ngā rangatahi mai i te rōpū whakatangitangi o Raploch Big Noise i te taha ki te taha o ngā kaitākaro o te ao whānui mō tētahi wāhanga o te hōtaka konohete. Tae atu ki te 130 ngā tamariki o te kaupapa ka whakatangi i tētahi overture Beethoven i raro i te aronga o Dudamel - ko ia hoki te kaiwhakahaere o te Los Angeles Philharmonic. Ka whakaatuhia te konohete puta noa i te UK i runga i ngā mata nunui e 22, ā, ka mātakitaki puta noa i te ao. Ka pāohotia hoki i runga i te BBC4 me te Reo Irirangi o Aotearoa. Ko te Hākari o Rāwāhi 2012 , he wāhanga o te Orimipia Ahurea, e haere ana mai i te 21 o Pipiri ki te 9 o Mahuru, te rā whakamutunga o ngā Tākaro Paralympic o Rāwāhi 2012. E 12,000 ngā whakakitenga me ngā takahanga hei whakanui i ngā Kēmu Orimipia o Rāwāhi 2012.

title: Ko te kai paipa e waiho ana i ngā ūnga 'me here ā-ture'
summary: Ko te tikanga kia anga atu te Kāwanatanga o Welsh ki ngā ūnga here ā-ture hei whakaiti i te maha o ngā tāngata kai paipa i Weera, kua kī tētahi aroha hauora pūkahukahu.
text: E hiahia ana te British Lung Foundation kia tāpirihia ngā ūnga ā-ture ki te Pire Hauora Tūmatanui o Wales, e haere ana i tēnei wā i roto i te Senedd. E kī ana me pūrongo ngā minita ki ngā AM i ia tau mo ngā pāpātanga kai paipa. I kī tētahi rōpū rorohiko kaipaipa ka taea e te kaupapa te whakahauhau i tētahi "huarahi whakawātea, whakamana rānei" mai i ngā minita. E tūmanakohia ana kia whakaaetia e ngā mema whakaminenga te pire, e whakamōhio ana i ngā ture hou mō ngā wāhi kore auahi, ngā moko me ngā whare taonga tūmatanui, kia puta i tōna taiapa panuku i te Tūrei. He ūnga kē tā ngā minita Welsh ki te whakaheke i ngā taumata kai paipa ki te 16% o ngā pakeke i te tau 2020. Ngā tohutohu Engari i kī te aroha he "poari hauora me te ūnga ratonga tūmatanui" noa iho, ā, mā te here ā-ture, ka whai tohutohu ngā minita ki te whakatutuki, ā, ka whakawāteatia ngā rauemi hei whakaoti i tēnei. I kī a Hohepa Kata o te Tūranga Pūkahukahu o Ingarangi: "Nā ngā ūnga here ā-ture pēnei e rāhuitia ana mō ngā take nui pēnei i te huringa āhuarangi, mā te mahi i tēnei he tohu mārama he hira rawa tēnei take hei waiho, ā, ka whakarite e wātea ana ngā rauemi hei whakatutuki." I karangatia hoki e ia ngā ūnga paetata, e kī ana kei te kite tonu ētahi wāhi o Uēra i te nui o ngā kaipaipa. "Mā te tautuhi i ētahi atu ūnga paetata ka kite mātou i te kauneketanga i ngā wāhi katoa o Weera, kaua e huna i muri i ngā whika whānui o Weera," tana kī. I kī tētahi kaihautū Kāwanatanga o Welsh i te Uiuinga Hauora o Welsh o te 2015 i whakaatu i te 19% o ngā pakeke i pūrongo i te paowa rātou, heke iho i te 26% i te 2003-04. "Ko te tikanga o tēnei whakaititanga nui kua hipa kē atu mātou i tā mātou whāinga ki te whakaiti i ngā mokatere kai paipa ki te 20% mā te 2016, ā, kei te pai te ara ki te whakaoti i tā mātou ūnga nui ki te whakaiti i ngā taumata ki te 16% mā te 2020," tana kī. "Ahakoa kāore mātou i te whakaaro e tika ana, e mahi ana rānei ngā ūnga whakamutu kai paipa ā-ture, kei te mahi tonu mātou i ngā mea katoa e taea ana e mātou te whakaiti i ngā pāpātanga kai paipa." Heoi anō, i kī te 'iwi wātea' Heoi anō, i kī a Haimona Karaka, ko te kaiwhakahaere o te rōpū kaipaipa o Ngahere, kaua te kāwanatanga e "whakahau i te tangata kia whakamutua". "Mā te tautuhi i ngā ūnga here ā-ture e whakahauhau i te kāwanatanga kia nui haere te āhua o te whanonga kai paipa," tana kī. "He hua ā-ture te tupeka. Ki te kōwhiri te tangata ki te waiho i ngā mōrea hauora, kei a rātou tēnā. "E pā ana tēnei ki te wāteatanga o te kōwhiringa me te kawenga whaiaro, ngā ariā e āwhina ana ki te tautuhi i tētahi iwi wātea."

title: David Hasselhoff ki te pānui i te pūrākau moenga o CBeebies
summary: Ko te whetū o Baywatch o mua, ko David Hasselhoff, me pānui pukapuka hei wāhanga o te rangatū Bedtime Stories a CBeebies.
text: Ka pānuitia e te kaitapere Taku Hoa Nigel, nā Jo Hodgkinson, i roto i te hōtaka e pāohotia ana i te Pō o te Tau Hōu. E kōrero ana te pukapuka mō tētahi taitama ko Billy te ingoa e whakaora ana i tētahi pūpū - i whakamahia hei mea whakauru i roto i ngā takikupu mahara a ōna mātua - hei pupuri hei mōkai. Ko ētahi atu whetū e pānui ana i ngā pūrākau moe i te wā whakangahau ko Lulu, Emilia Fox me Tā Derek Jacobi. "Ki taku whakaaro he tino hira kia waia ngā tamariki ki ngā pukapuka mai i te pakeketanga," te kī a Hasselhoff. "I a au e tamariki ana, he pai ki a au te pānui i te 'Twas The Night Before Christmas and I can still recite all the words today." I ngā wiki e heke mai nei, ka āhuahira hoki a Bernard Cribbins, te whetū o Coronation Street o Sally Dynevor me te whetū o Boardwalk Empire ko Stephen Graham. Take That frontman Gary Barlow and former Doctor Who David Tennant have previously read CBeebies Bedtime Stories at Christmas.

title: 'I āwangawanga a TE AO mō te pūtea wāhanga o S4C', e kī ana te manukura
summary: I kī atu te manukura o Te Whirinaki o TE AO ki ngā MP he tāpuitanga tā te AO mō te kawenga mō te pūtea wāhanga o S4C.
text: Nā Rawiri CornockBBC Wales, te kaipānui paremata o Uēra, i kī a ia ko te huānga S4C te wāhanga o te whakatau utu raihana, he "tino tūpato" ngā kaiwhakahaere o TE WĀ. I kī a Tā Mikaera i wehi te AO tērā pea he mōrearea o te "tapahi runga" i te utu raihana, ā, ka whakaarotia kua muri te AO i te ariā. I whakaputaina e ia nga kōrero i mua i te komiti Ahurea o Westminster. Mātakitaki i te taupatupatu mā te paetukutuku Democracy Live (mai i te 1hr 32m 50s) I whakaahuatia e tētahi MP Mahi matua te hongere reo Welsh hei "kēhi kete katoa" i tukuna ki te BBC hei hōhipera mai i te Hēkeretari Ahurea, a Jeremy Hunt. I kī te minita o mua, a David Cairns, kua haere a ia ki a WHK Wales, i kitea e ia he māia, he kaha ki te kaha. 'Top-slicing' "He rerekē, ki tētahi tauhou S4C te āhua nei he kēhi kete katoa me te katoa e tuku ana, e panaia ana, e panaia ana rānei, i ngā rūnanga mahi rānei. " Ehara tēnei i te mea he hōhipera anō koe i te Hēkeretari o te Kāwanatanga, e tohu ana i tēnei kēhi kete, otirā i runga anō i te pai o te mahi a TE Kāwanatanga o Uēra?" I kī atu a Liberal Democrat MP Adrian Sanders ki a Tā Mikaera, me te tumuaki o TE AO o Mark Thompson: "Ko te nui o ngā moni ka hoatu e koe ki S4C ka nui ake i te moni e hoatu ana e koe ki tētahi atu rohe o Te Hononga o Ingarangi. Me pēhea koe e whakatika ai i tēnā - mēnā ehara tēnā i te tapahi o te utu raihana?" I whakakāhore a Tā Mikaera ko te tikanga o te mahi S4C ka tapahia te utu raihana, i tana kī ka noho tonu te AO ki te tirotiro i te whakapau moni. Ka parea e S4C tōna rangatiratanga auaha. "E mārama ana ahau ki te whāinga e mārama ana koe ki te whakataunga, engari he tino hira kāore te AO e waiho i a koe ki te whakaaro i haere mātou ki te pūtea i te S4C. Kāore mātou. 'Tino tūpato' "He wāhanga tērā o tētahi whakaaetanga, he wāhanga tērā o ngā whakaritenga tuatahi i tino tūpato ai mātau mō ngā take e rua. " Tuatahi, tērā pea he mōrearea o te tapahi runga, ā, e whakaaro ana mātou kua kitea e mātou he huarahi huri noa i tērā, engari e mōhio ana hoki mātou kei Uēra te take o te rangatiratanga o S4C, ā, kāore te AO i pīrangi ki te waiho i tētahi huatau koia te pūkenga o tēnei kaupapa. "Ina uru koe ki ngā whakaritenga i ētahi wā ka whakaae koe ki ngā mea tērā pea i kōwhiria e koe, he wāhanga tērā o ngā kōrero." I kī atu a Mark Thompson ki ngā MP he roa te tikanga o te pāohotanga reo Welsh o TE WĀ. I kī a ia kua pā ki tētahi huringa i raro i te ārahitanga o te tumuaki o Menna Harei mō ngā hōtaka kounga. "He tino kaha tā mātou hiahia ki tētahi hongere pouaka whakaata reo Welsh e wātea ana ki ngā kaiutu raihana puta noa i Weera," tana kī. I kī atu a Tory MP Philip Davies ki ngā rangatira o TE AO e kanikani ana rātau i runga i te māhunga o te pine: "Ko te take i tino tūpato ai koe, nā te mea e mōhio ana koe mēnā he rite ki te tapahi o runga, ā, he tapahi runga, he aha koe e kore ai e whakaae ki ngā mea e mōhio ana te katoa i roto i te rūma,  E mōhio ana ētahi atu o te whenua, he tapahi tino nui tēnei?" Ka kī a Tā Mikaera: "Ko te take matua, ko te moni i tangohia mai i te AO ka hoatu ki tētahi atu. Kāo, ehara i te mea."

title: Ka toa nga kaiahuwhenua o Bridgend i te mahi tūmataiti i runga i te rere
summary: I muri iho i te mahue otaota ki te whenua e kai ai a rātau hipi, ka whakataua e tētahi rōpū kaiahuwhenua kia mau i nga take ki o rātau ake ringa.
text: Nā Matthew MurrayBBC News Members of the Coity Wallia Commoners' Association had faced to clear up the mess on land in Bridgend. Engari i whakamahia e te rōpū he rōia nāna i tirotiro i roto i te otaota me te aroturuki i te kairere rere, kātahi ka utua ki te ūkui. E whakaarotia ana ko te mahi tūmataiti tuatahi o tōna momo i Weera. Ināianei kei te whakahau rātau i ētahi atu kia mahi i ngā mahi ā-ture tūmataiti, ki te utu i te utu o te whakapai, ki te whiu me te ngana ki te aukati i te tangata kia kaua e rere i runga i te whenua ngātahi. He tino kino te raruraru ki Gelligaer me Merthyr Common, he wāhiwera mō ngā tāngata ki te mahue i ā rātou pouaka whakamātao, pākatio, sofa, me ngā pēke ipu pango mō ngā tau. He hara hara te rere rere, ā, he mana tō ngā mana ā rohe me ngā Rauemi Māori o Uēra ki te tūhura i ngā mahi me te whakatau i te hunga kua kitea kua takahi i te ture. E whakaatu ana ngā tatauranga kāwanatanga whaimana i te tapeke o ngā hara rere i pūrongotia i Uēra ki te 35,076 i te 2018-19, te whika iti rawa i tuhia mai i te 2014-15. Ināianei, ko te maha o ngā mahi kaunihera mo te hara i pā ki te tiketike i te tau 2018-19 , me ngā kaunihera e whai ana i ngā kēhi e 139. Engari ahakoa kei ngā kaunihera te kawenga mō te whakawātea i te rere i te whenua tūmatanui, kāore e hiahiatia kia ūkuia te para i te whenua tūmataiti. I a rātau e whakahaere ana i te whenua ngātahi, ka anga atu rātau ki te horoi i ngā para, nā reira ka mahi tūmataiti. Ka kī a Hēkeretari Huw Griffiths: "Kāore ā mātou kōwhiringa, ā, ka tae mai tētahi wā me tā koe i tētahi raina i roto i te kirikiri me te tū ake mō tāu e whakapono ana. " I korerotia mai ki a mātau he pai te whakahoki utu mēnā ka haere ki te kōti, nā reira i hari mātau ki te whai wāhi, ā, i tino pai ki a mātau. "I te mea he nui te tuma, ā, i utua e ia i mua i te haerenga ki te kōti." I kitea te hunga hara i roto i te para i mahue i a rātau, ā, i utua e rātau te utu whakawātea me ngā utu ā-ture e £600. Tata ki te 170 ngā tāngata e whai mana kai ana i runga i te wāhi whānui e kapi ana i te 2,000 eka. He whenua āheitanga tūmatanui engari ko ngā tāngata e whakahaere ana i te whenua e whai wāhi ana ki te pupuri hipi me ētahi atu kararehe i runga i te whenua i raro i tētahi mana tawhito. I tāpiri mai a Tēnā Griffiths: "Ka mōrearea pea te moumou ki te kararehe, ā, ka taea te whakauru i ngā momo kirihou me te karaehe katoa, koia i whakatau ai mātou kia nui ake ngā mea. " Ka taea e te utu mo te mahi tūmataiti te rāhui, engari i tangohia e mātau te tūpono." I kī a Aled Owen, mai i te umanga ā-ture o Harrison Clark Rickerbys, ko te wā tuatahi i whai ai te pāhonotanga o te hunga noa iho i tētahi mahi tūmataiti mo te rere i Weera. "Ko te take katoa o te rautaki ko te tiki moni hei utu i te utu o te ūkui, kātahi ka whakahokia mai he moni hei utu mo te whakahaeretanga," tana kī. "Engari me mātua whakarite hoki kei reira te karere kia mōhio ai ngā tāngata mēnā ka mahia e rātou tēnei mahi rere, kāore rātou e ngaro, ā, ka taea te whiu mō ā rātou mahi pēnei." I kī te kaunihera o Bridgend kāore i whakaaetia ngā mana ā rohe ki te whakamahi i ngā moni tūmatanui hei whakawātea i te rere i te whenua whakahaere tūmataiti, engari ka homai e te mana te tautoko nui e taea ana hei āwhina ki te tāutu i ngā hunga hara me te whakarite ka taea ētahi atu mahi.

title: Uiuinga Pirihimana o Uēra ki te Raki: Ko te wehi o te hunga i aituā 'tuarua' o MP
summary: Tata ki te kotahi i roto i te toru o ngā āpiha Pirihimana o Uēra ki te Raki me ngā kaimahi ā-iwi e whakapono ana e tika ana kia pai ake te ratonga o ētahi atu i ētahi atu.
text: Neke atu i te kotahi i roto i te rima e whakaaro ana he iti noa iho te mahi a ētahi hapori kia whiwhi ai i te manaakitanga pirihimana, ā, kotahi i roto i te whā e whakapono ana he moumou wā te āwhina i ētahi tāngata. I karangatia e Plaid Cymru MP Elfyn Llwyd ngā kitenga e whakararuraru ana, ā, i kī he mōrearea o "ngā tangata whenua tuarua". I kī te mana pirihimana e whakahauhau ana i te pono i waenganui i nga kaimahi. Kua whakaaturia ngā kitenga mai i tētahi uiuinga kaimahi i muri i tētahi tono i raro i te Ture Wāteatanga o te Mōhiohio (FOI). Neke atu i te 1,000 ngā āpiha me ngā kaimahi e 700 i urupare ki te uiuinga, nāna i tirotiro ngā whakaaro ki te iwi whānui, te tōpana me te whakaaetanga mahi. I roto i ngā kitenga: I kī a Tēnā Llwyd, MP mō Dwyfor Meirionnydd me te tūru tuarua o te komiti tīpako tika, i kī te uiuinga i pūruatia ngā kerēme a ētahi tāngata e kī ana kua haere rātau ki ngā pirihimana me tētahi take, engari i whakapono he koretake. He "wehi" te kī a ētahi āpiha kāore ētahi hapori i manaaki i ngā pirihimana, ā, he moumou wā ki te āwhina i a rātau, ka tāpiri mai a ia. "E tūmanako ana ahau ka mauria ēnei kitenga e ngā kaiwhakahaere matua ki te whakarite i te whakangungu i ngā pirihimana i te raki o Wales e whakaatu ana ko ngā tāngata katoa e haere mai ana ki a rātou, e mārama ana kei te hiahiatia, me mahi pēnei." "E mōhio tūturu ana ahau ka whakahuatia, engari me titiro wawe atu, nā te mea ki te kore he tangata whenua tuatahi me te tuarua i te raki o Wales, ā, e kore rawa tēnā e tika," tana tāpiri mai. I kī a Nia Evans, te tūru tuarua o te Mana Pirihimana o Te Raki o Wales: "I whakahaeretia te uiuinga ahurea o tērā tau i te wā o te wero nui mō ā mātou kaimahi, ā, mai i taua wā kua whakatinanatia e mātou ngā mahi hei tautoko i ā mātou kaimahi me ā mātou āpiha. " Kua rite tonu te arotake a te mana i te kauneketanga i mahia e te ope, ā, e tūmanako ana mātou ki te kite i ngā hua o te uiuinga hou i te mutunga o tēnei tau." I kī a Rārangi Eccles, mai i te Tōpūtanga Pirihimana o Uēra ki te Raki, e tohu ana i ngā āpiha kōpae: "Mēnā kua karangatia koe hei āpiha ki tētahi kōaro haurangi i te wāhitau kotahi mō te toru o ngā wā i roto i te wiki, ka rerekē tō tirohanga ki tētahi waea tuatahi ki te tūtaki i tētahi kaumātua kātahi anō ka pakaru ō rātou rawa. ' Kāore i te whakapā' "Koia tērā i ngana ai mātou ki te whakamārama ki te mana pirihimana." I whakaaturia ētahi atu hua uiuinga: I kī a Tēnā Eccles i ngā tirohanga mō ngā take pēnei i ngā pirihimana o mua me ngā kaiārahi e whakaata ana i ngā huringa i te āhua o te whakahaeretanga o te ope. Heoi anō, i whakapuakina e ia ehara tēnei i te tōraro mō te ope, ā, i ētahi wā kāore e taea e ngā kaiwhakahaere matua o te ope te toa. I kī a ia e whakapono ana a ia e whakarongo ana ngā kaiwhakahaere matua, engari i tāpiri mai: "I ētahi wā ko te uaua te mahi i tētahi mea mōna." I kī hoki a ia i ētahi wā he "huatau" ki te "patoto i ngā āpiha matua". Deputy chief constable Ian Shannon said the survey helped the force gain "a better understanding of our workforce and our organisational culture," and the results are used to address any issues. Ka kī a ia: "He tino pai te urupare ki te uiuinga o tērā tau, ko ngā hua i roto i te rohe tūmatanui mō tētahi wā nui, ā, he maha ngā mahi i whakaritea nā ngā take i whakaarahia. " Kua neke anō te rōpū me tō mātou taiao mahi mai i taua wā, ā, he ātaahua te kite i ngā hua o te uiuinga hou rawa. "We strive to be an organisation which is as open and transparent as possible and within which all our staff support each other in providing the best service possible to the public."

title: Ngaru wera o Uropi: Ka taka ngā pūkete i Peretiama, Tiamana me Hōrana
summary: Kua whakapūketetia e Peretiama, Tiamana me Hōrana o rātau pāmahana teitei rawa, i roto i te ngaru wera e wera ana i Uropi ki te Uru.
text: I patua e te taone Peretiana o Kleine Brogel te 39.9C (102F), te wera rawa mai i te tau 1833. I patua e te taone o Hōnea ki te tonga o Eindhoven te pūkete ā-motu e 75 tau, me te teitei hou o te 39.3C. I kī te ratonga huarere o Tiamana i tētahi pūkete hōu o te 40.5C - 0.2C teitei ake - kua tautuhia ki Geilenkirchen, tata ki ngā taitapa o Peretiana me Hōnea. Me whakaū tonu te pūkete Tiamana hou, e kī ana, e whakatūpato ana ka wera kē atu i te Tāite. I waenganui i te pāmahana wera, ka pakaru tētahi tereina Eurostar, ka mau i ngā pāhihi. I tētahi atu wāhi, i huatau ngā pūrongo Wīwī e rima pea ngā mate i honoa ki te ngaru wera. Ko te pāmahana teitei rawa i whakapūketetia i Parihi - 40.4C i te tau 1947 - e tūmanakohia ana kia hipa atu i te Tāite. Kei te matohi whero a Rakapuō mō te tonga me te pūmatua - tērā pea ka piki ake te pāmahana i te 40C i te Tāite. I Potukara, e hia rau nga kaipatu ahi i tineia he ahi ngahere e whakararuraru ana i te rohe o Castelo Branco mō ngā rā - ahakoa ehara i te mea rerekē te ahi i te wā raumati. He aha i pā ki te Eurostar? Neke atu i te 600 ngā pāhihi i mau i runga i te tereina tata ki te taone Peretiana o Halle mo te rua haora, ā, ko ētahi o ngā pāhihi i mahue i roto i te pouri i roto i te kauhanga, ā, ko ētahi atu i waho i te rā. "He tiketike te pāmahana. He tino kino," te kī a Jan Willem Wiersma mai i Rotterdam ki te HAU. "E hari ana mātou ki te heke atu i te tereina, e 15 ngā waeine iti iho." I kī a Eri Hoet, e haere ana mai i Antwerp ki Rāwāhi, kua mau a ia me ētahi atu i runga i te tereina mo te rua haora i mua i te whakaaetanga kia heke. I kī a Eurostar kua heke iho te hē ki tētahi puna hiko o runga, ā, ka tohutohu i ngā tāngata kia kaua e haere mēnā ka taea i te Wenerei. I mau ētahi atu ratonga i waenganui i Pōroa me Parihi i roto i te pakarutanga. I hea te wera rawa? Kua tukuna e Tiamana ngā matohi wera mō te whenua katoa. I te tōnga o te rā, ka pānuitia e 10 neke atu rānei ngā teihana kua pūrongotia ngā pāmahana i runga ake i te 39C - tae atu ki ngā mea i Cologne me Bonn, me Saarbrücken, e takoto katoa ana i te hauauru o te whenua e tata ana ki te rohe. I te tuatahi ka whati te pūkete Tatimana ki te 38.8C i te taunga rererangi o Gilze-Rijen i te Wenerei, i mua i te whakapūketetanga o te pāmahana teitei ake i Eindhoven. Ko ngā wāhi tino wera i te kawanatanga o Tatimana o Brabant, puta noa i te rohe o Pehiahi i te kawanatanga o Flemish o Limburg. I Kleine Brogel, i whati te pūkete i te ahiahi i te 38.9C, engari ka piki tonu te pāmahana ki te 39.9C i te 17:00 (15:00 GMT). Kua tukuna e Peretiama he whakatūpato huarere whero waehere mō te whenua katoa. I te rehu tētahi piriti nui i te tauranga Tatimana o Rotterdam hei ārai i te roha o te konganuku i te wera. He wera hoki te nuinga o Wīwī. I pūrongotia e La chaîne météo kua piki ake te pāmahana i ngā wāhi maha ki runga ake i te 40C. I tae atu a Pont-la-Ville i te takiwā ki te rāwhiti o Haute-Marne ki te 41.2C i te wā i tae atu a Vassincourt ki te raki-rāwhiti ki te 40.5C. Ka kitea pea e te Rāitema te 42C i te pūmatua o Wīwī. I whakarewaina e ngā mana tētahi matohi whero i te rohe o Parihi me ētahi atu tari Wīwī e 19, e karanga ana ki te "mataara pūmau", ā, i tātuhia ngā whakataurite ki tētahi ngaru wera i a Aotearoa 2003, i reira i āwhina ai te wera ki te tata ki te 15,000 ngā mate. Kāore anō kia wera kē te raumati? Āe, he hihi wera kaha i ngā wāhi o Uropi i tērā marama, nā reira ko Pipiri tino wera i runga i te pūkete. I tautuhia e Wīwī tētahi pūkete pāmahana tiketike o te 46C, e ai ki te WMO, ā, i tautuhia ngā teitei hou o Pipiri ki te Whenua o Taikarowākia, Horokia, Ateria, Andorra, Rakapuō, Pōrana me Tiamana. Kei te whakapae te rerekētanga o te āhuarangi? He uaua te hono i tētahi takahanga kotahi ki te whakamahana o te ao. Ahakoa he āhua noa iho ngā takahanga huarere pēnei i ngā ngaru wera, e kī ana ngā tohunga ka nui ake ēnei nā te huringa āhuarangi. Ko ngā pūkete e hoki ana ki te mutunga o te rau tau 19 e whakaatu ana kua nui ake te pāmahana toharite o te mata o te Ao i te kotahi waeine mai i te whakawhanaketanga. E kī ana tētahi whare wānanga āhuarangi i Potsdam, Tiamana, ko ngā raumati tino wera e rima o Uropi mai i te rau tau 1500 i te rau tau 21. E āwangawanga ana ngā kaipūtaiao ko te tere o te whakamahana e honoa ana ki te whakamahinga o ngā kora fossil, he pānga nui ki te pūmautanga o te āhuarangi o te aorangi.

title: Kua tapaina e Harold Pinter te whare tapere o Rātana ki a ia
summary: Ka whakaingoatia anōtia te Whare Tapere Kōhua o Rāwāhi a tērā marama i muri i a Harold Pinter, te kaituhituhi, te kaiwhakahaere me te kaitapere i mate i te tau 2008.
text: I kī te Rōpū Whare Tapere Māngai (ATG) he "takoha tika ki tētahi tangata nāna i tohu pēnei i runga i te whare tapere o Ingarangi". Mai i te tau 2000, nā te kamupene te wāhi o West End. Ko te whakaaturanga tuatahi hei whakatuwhera i te Whare Tapere hou o Harold Pinter ko te Mate me te Kōtiro, nā Ariel Dorfman, i Whiringahora. E whitu ngā whakaputanga Pinter kua taurimatia e te whare tapere i roto i ngā tau e 21 kua hipa, tae atu ki te Homecoming, No Man's Land, Moonlight, The Hothouse, The Caretaker with Michael Gambon. Ko te mea hou rawa ko te whakanaotanga o te Whakawhitiwhiti e whakaatu ana i a Kristin Scott Thomas, i whakamutua ai tana oma i tērā marama. He maha ngā whakatangi i whakahaeretia e Pinter i reira, tae atu ki te Kaitiaki, Tekau mā rua Ngā Tāngata Riri me ngā whakatangi a Haimona Kiwikiwi i Otherwise Engaged me The Old Masters. "Kua noho te mahi a Pinter hei wāhanga tau tōpu o te hītori o te Whare Tapere Kōrero," te kī a Howard Panter, te rangatira nui me te kaiwhakahaere auaha o ATG. "Ko te whakaingoatanga anō o tētahi o ā mātou whare tapere tino angitu o West End he takoha tika ki tētahi tangata nāna i tohu pēnei i te whare tapere o Ingarangi, ā, i roto i tana mahi 50 tau, i mōhiotia hei tētahi o ngā kaitākaro o Ingarangi tino whai mana o nāianei." I whānau mai a Pinter i te tau 1930 i Rāwhiti o Rāwāhi, e 32 ngā whakaaturanga, e 22 ngā whakaaturanga, ā, e 36 ngā whakanaotanga whare tapere. I whiwhi a ia i te Whakawhiwhinga Nobel mō ngā Tuhinga i te tau 2005. "Tērā pea ka tino pai a Harold ki tēnei hōnore, ā, e tino whakakorikori ana ahau i te rongo," te kī a tana pouaru, a Lady Antonia Fraser. Ka tākaro a Thandie Newton i te tūranga matua i roto i te Mate me te Kōhine o Dorfman ina whakatuwheratia i te 13 o Whiringahora. I kī tōna kaituhi he "tino tika" ko tana tākaro te tuatahi kia whakatūria i roto i te whare tapere kua whakaingoatia anōtia. "Kua whakatapua taua whakatangitangi, ki a Pinter," te kī a te kaiwhakaari o Āhiana. "Ko ia tōna matua atua, ārahi hoki i te wā i whakatuwheratia tuatahitia i te 20 tau ki mua, ā, ko taku kaiako mō te nuinga o tōku oranga tuhituhi." I whakatuwheratia tuatahitia te Whare Tapere Kōhua i te tau 1881 hei Whare Tapere Kōhua Ariki. Ahakoa tōna ingoa, he maha ngā tākaro i taurimatia. Ko ngā whakanaotanga o nā tata nei ko Birdsong, i runga anō i te pukapuka a Sebastian Faulks, me The Children's Hour, e hāngai ana ki a Keira Knightley.

title: Whakatūpato tiaki kohanga o Wales e te Royal College of Midwives
summary: Ko te whakahekenga o ngā ratonga kohanga i Wales me huri me te kore takaware, kua whakatūpato ngā kaiwhakawhanau.
text: The Royal College of Midwives (RCM) says there is a shortage of midwives and a fall in students and any future cuts will risk the quality of services. I kī te kāwanatanga o Welsh ka piki anō te maha o ngā wāhi whakangungu whakawhanau i whakaritea i tēnei tau. E kī ana hoki me tutuki i ngā wae kohanga katoa ngā tūtohutanga mō te maha o ngā kaiwhakawhanau e hiahiatia ana mō ngā ratonga haumaru. Ko te tau tuarua tēnei kua kawea e te RCM tētahi pūrongo State of Maternity Services puta noa i Wales, Ingarangi, Pākehā me Aiarangi ki te Raki. "I kite a Wales i te kuti o ngā tau whakangungu i te tau 2011/12 i whakaritea ki tērā tau. Nā tēnei take, me te hinganga o ngā tau kaiwhakawhanau i reira, kei te mātakitaki te RCM i a Wales," te kī a te pūrongo. "Kāore anō mātou kia tangi i te pere whakaoho, engari kua rite mātou ki te mahi pēnā; me huri e ngā kaihanga whakataunga i Uēra tēnei āhuatanga whakaheke." Ka haere tonu ko te iti o ngā kaiwhakawhanau kua puta mai me "whakakore me te kore takaware". "Ko te tikanga kia mahi te kāwanatanga i Kānata ināianei," te kī a te pūrongo. "Ko te iti kua kitea e mātau i Wales me ngāwari te whakakore - ā, e karanga ana mātou ki te kāwanatanga i Wales kia mahi i tēnā. " Nā te iti o ngā kaiwhakawhanau i Weera, me tautoko te maha o ngā wāhi whakawhanau ākonga; mā ētahi atu tapahi ka mōrearea te kounga o ngā ratonga kohanga ā muri ake." I hinga ngā tau kaiwhakawhanau i Uēra i te uiuinga ā-tau whakamutunga i te tau 2011, i reira he 12% iti iho ngā whika i te tau 2008, ā, i kī te RCM ko te toru o nga tau i tapahia ai te maha o ngā kaiwhakawhanau e mahi ana i te NHS i Weera. "I waenganui i te 2001 me te 2011 i te wā i peke te maha o ngā pēpi i whānau mai i te 5,000, ka piki te maha o ngā kaiwhakawhanau ōrite ki te 35 noa iho. " I roto i te pūrongo o te Āhua o ngā Ratonga Kohanga o tērā tau, i pūrongotia e mātau te iti rawa o ngā kaiwhakawhanau i Weera. E whakapono ana mātou i noho tonu tēnei i te tau 2011; Ahakoa he iti noa iho te maha o ngā whānautanga, i heke hoki te tokomaha o ngā kaiwhakawhanau." Heoi anō, kua kite a Wales i te 34% te hekenga o ngā whānautanga ki ngā kōtiro i raro iho i te 16 tau. I Ingarangi, kua piki haere tonu te maha o ngā kaiwhakawhanau NHS nā te mahi pai a te kāwanatanga o UK, e ai ki te pūrongo. I kī tētahi kaikōrero kāwanatanga o Welsh: "Kua piki anō te maha o ngā wāhi whakangungu whakawhanau i whakaritea i tēnei tau mai i ngā tau o tērā tau. " Ko ngā whakataunga mō ngā wāhi whakangungu e hāngai ana ki ngā mea e hiahiatia ana e te NHS hei pupuri i ngā ratonga, te whanaketanga ratonga, ngā tau me te kōtaha pakeke o ngā kaimahi me te mokatere whakataka mai i ngā akoranga. E mārama ana, ka whakaarohia hoki e ngā mahere ngā kaiwhakawhanau ākonga kei te whakangungu kē, ā, ina tūmanakohia ēnei kia whiwhi me te tomo ki te hunga mahi. "NHS organisations are responsible for ensuring that they have the appropriate number of staff and skill mix to meet fluctuating demand. Mai i te tau 1999, kua piki ake te 12% o ngā kaimahi kohanga, tae atu ki ngā kaiwhakawhanau me ngā kaimahi tautoko whakawhanau, i Weera. "E hiahiatia ana e mātou ngā wae kohanga katoa i Wales kia ū ki te Birth Rate Plus - e ai ki te tūtohutanga a te Royal College of Midwives - i runga i te maha o ngā kaiwhakawhanau e hiahiatia ana hei tuku ratonga haumaru."

title: Oscars: Tom Hiddleston i runga i tana pikitia tino pai rawa atu
summary: He maha ngā tauira i puta mai ai tētahi kaitapere i roto i ngā pikitia e rua i runga i te rārangi poto i te tauomaoma o Hoka o tēnei tau mō te pikitia tino pai.
text: Nā Tim MastersEntertainment me te korero toi, ko ngā āhuahira o TE Rongokōrero o TE Rongokōrero o John Goodman i roto i te Rehetoi me te Tino Nui me te Tino Tata. Kei roto hoki a Viola Davis i te Tino Nui, ā, he whakaingoatanga kaiwhakaari tino pai hoki mō te Āwhina. Ko Heka Chastain te Āwhina (kei reira tētahi whakaingoatanga kaiwhakaari tautoko tino pai rawa atu) me te Rākau o te Ora, i te wā e huri ana tōna hoa whetū Rākau o Te Ko Tom Hiddleston anake i te taha o Ingarangi, e whakatangi ana i a Kāpene Nicholls i roto i te Hoiho Pakanga a Steven Spielberg me F Scott Fitzgerald i roto i te pukuhohe mātao a Woody Allen Midnight in Paris. "E tino whakahīhī ana ahau nā te mea he wāhi nui ahau o aua pikitia e rua," te kī a Hiddleston ki te AO i ngā tohu kiriata Evening Standard o nā noa nei. "He tino hōnore te mahi tahi me Woody rāua ko Steven." I kōrero a Hiddleston mō ōna pūmahara ki te mahi i ngā pikitia e rua. I roto i te Hoiho Pakanga, ko Kāpene Nicholls o Hiddleston te āpiha o Ingarangi nāna i hoko a Joey te hoiho pāmu i te tīmatanga o te Pakanga Tuatahi o te Ao, ā, ka eke i a ia ki ngā kauhanga riri o Wīwī. "Ko te mea tuatahi e whakaaro ana ahau ko tēnā whakahau hoiho. Ko taku rā tuatahi tērā i te mahi. E rima wiki ahau e whakangungu ana me te tīma mahi, te whakangungu ā-tinana tino kaha i roto i ngā mea katoa o te hoiho. "He nui rawa ngā whakahaere maroke i mahia e mātau o te whakahau hoiho nā te mea kāore he hē. Mehemea i hinga tētahi i roto i taua whakapae, tērā pea he tino mōrearea. "I tū mātau i te taha o te kaupane i te whitu karaka i te ata kanapa o Aotearoa i te tau 2010, ā, ka huri mai te ataata o Hīnī Spielberg ki a au, ka mea: 'He pai koe ki te mahi i tēnei, e Tom? Kua rite koe?'" I tāpiri mai a Hiddleston: "I ētahi wā e pāhono ana te ingoa o Hīnī Spielberg ki ētahi momo wheketere o Karaihe e whakaputa ana i ngā kiriata pēnei i ngā tūru kirihou, engari ka wareware te tangata ko Whīni Spielberg te ingoa o te tangata whai ngākau patupatu, he tino hiahia ki ētahi pūrākau. " Ko te tikanga o Hīnī ko ia tāpare o taua pikitia. He tino whakapūmau te Hoiho Pakanga ki tōna tapukara ā-hinengaro me tōna aroha noa." 'Hoki ki te āhua' I waenganui pō i Parihi, ka whakatangi a Hiddleston i te kaituhi Amerika o F Scott Fitzgerald, tētahi o ngā rōpū toa pūoro, tuhituhi hoki e tūtaki ana a Gil Pender (Owen Wilson) i a ia e whakahokia ana ki Parihi o te tau 1920. "I te haere ahau ki te huinga i te rā tuatahi. I te hīkoi ahau i te Rue de Rivoli - arā ko Oxford Street o Parihi - ā, he tānga pānui whakaahua o Marilyn Monroe me James Dean me ētahi atu ata whare pikitia. "I muri i a Hemi Dean e 10 ngā pānui whakaahua o Woody, ā, i muri i a Woody he rōpū o Ernest Hemingway. Kātahi ahau ka haere ki te huinga, a, ko Woody Allen, a, ko Corey Stoll e kākahu ana hei Hemingway. I roto ahau i taku ake moemoeā o Waenganui Pō i Parihi!" Ka tāpiri mai a Hiddleston: "He hokinga nui ki te āhua mō Woody. Kei a ia tōna mōhiotanga, tōna ngahau, tōna whakamīharo ki te hītori tuhituhi, ā, ka hopukina e ia tētahi taha o Parihi kāore anō kia hopukina i mua." Ko ētahi atu kiriata o nā tata nei a Hiddleston ko The Deep Blue Sea, Thor me Archipelago. I kī te kaitapere whānau o Rāwāhi kāore e taea e ia te haere ki te hui o Te Wānanga i te 26 o Hui tanguru i a ia e whakaahua ana i tētahi putanga o Te Wānanga o Hēnare IV, e tākaro ana i a Piriniha Hal. "Me noho ahau i roto i te mēra mekameka i runga i te hoiho i te wā e pānuitia ana te toa pikitia tino pai. Ko te mahi te tuatahi, engari he tino pai nga paraihe. Ka rīpeka ngā maihao mō rāua tokorua." Me ētahi atu rauemi uiui nā Rachel Curtis.

title: Pedro Almodovar: He aha i kore ai he wāhi mo te pukuhohe i roto i taku kiriata hou
summary: I te nuinga o te wā he whakararuraru tae me te kata nga kiriata a Pedro Almodóvar.
text: Nā te kaipānui o Te Rūnanga o Te Na te nui o tana tango i ngā kōrero kōrero i poroa i te wā o ngā whakamātautau. Ko Julieta te pūrākau o tētahi whaea, tana tamāhine rerekē me te hara e whakararuraru ana i a rāua tokorua. E ai ki ngā pūrākau poto e toru nā te kaituhi toa o Aotearoa, a Alice Munro, mai i tana kohinga 2004, Runaway. I whakaritea tuatahitia te pikitia hei kiriata reo Ingarihi tuatahi a Almodovar - me Meryl Streep i roto i ngā kōrero mō te tūranga taitara - engari i whakataua e te kaiwhakahaere me tautuhi ki tōna whenua tupu. 'Kaupapa mamae' I te wā o ta mātau uiuinga i tōna hōtēra o Rāwāhi, ka kōrero a ia i te reo Pāniora - engari i ētahi wā ka haukotia tana kaiwhakamāori kia tika ai tana whakamārama i ana kupu. E inu tī ana hoki a ia me te tuhi tuhipoka ("Māna ahau e haumaru," tana kī me te menemene), ka tātuhi i tētahi hoahoa i tētahi wā hei whakamārama i te hanganga kōrero o tētahi tirohanga tino nui. He aha i tino nui ai te whakaaro o Julieta? "Ko te oro, he tino rerekē te oro ki aku kiriata o mua, he tino whakaaweawe i ngā rauemi e mahi ana ahau," te kī a Almodovar. "I hiahia ahau ki te whakatata atu ki tētahi kaupapa mamae... I tino whakaaro ahau ki te mahi i tēnei, ā, he tino nui te utu ki a au ki te kore he ngahau e nekeneke ana i tēnei huarahi. "Nā reira, he āhuatanga kōmeke i roto i ngā whakamātautau, engari i whakatūria tonutia e au ki tētahi taha. " I hiahia ahau ki tētahi mea kaha ake; I pīrangi ahau ki tētahi mea māmā ake kia puta ai te karere." Kua whakangū hoki te kara kia ōrite ai te pikitia ki tōna ngākau ā-hinengaro - ahakoa he ruarua noa iho ngā okotahi matua. "He wheako tino hira te rerehua o tēnei pikitia, ā, e whakaaro ana ahau, hei pūtake mō ngā hōpara kiriata ā muri ake," te kī a Almodovar. "Engari he huānga baroque i roto i aku mahi - kāore e taea e au te āwhina. " Hei tauira, ko te pepapātū [tauira], he tino pai ki a au te whakaahuatanga. Engari i tino whakahaeretia ahau. Ko te tikanga, ko taku whakawhāititanga, he whero hoki te tae." 'Te āhua o te hara' I pātai mai he aha a ia i kawe ai ki te mahi a Munro, ka kī a ia: "E tino mōhio ana ahau ki ngā wāhine i roto i ngā pūrākau. He wāhine rātou, engari he pūrākau hoki mō ngā whanaungatanga mātua-tamaiti, ngā pūrākau whānau mō te mārena - ngā pūrākau e tino hiahia ana ki a au." Engari i rongo a ia i te ngaro o tētahi huānga matua i roto i te kupu taketake, e kī ana: "Kāore tēnei āhuatanga hara i roto i ngā pūrākau a Alice Munro. Kei te whakawhiti ahau i tēnā, ka mauria mai i tōku ake ahurea, te ahurea Pāniora."
