Kua kī a Almodovar i mua e whakapono ana a ia e whakapono ana a Karaihe "ka hinga i ngā wāhine pakeke", tērā pea ka whakamārama i te take i kōwhiria ai e ia kia kotahi te kaiwhakaari, a Emma Suarez, ki te tākaro i a Julieta i te 55 me tētahi atu, ko Adriana Ugarte, e whakaahua ana i a ia i tōna tamarikitanga. I roto i tētahi māminga ātaahua, ka puta mai te tauwhiro i waenganui i ngā wāhanga e rua o te oranga o te wahine ina tangohia he tauera (whero) i tōna māhunga i te whakamaroketanga o tana tamāhine a Antia i ōna makawe. E kī ana a ia: "Kāore au i te manako ki te kaiwhakaari kotahi e tākaro ana i ngā pakeke katoa o te pūāhua kotahi. " Kāore au i te whakawhirinaki ki ngā pānga o te whakapai ake mo te pakeketanga, ā, e kore e taea e tētahi taitama 25 te noho i te aroaro o tētahi tangata e 50 tau. "Ehara i te take o ngā kūrearea, he mea hōhonu ake, te paheketanga o te wā, i waho, i roto." E kī ana a Almodovar i tonoa e ia ngā mana ki ngā pūrākau nā ngā tirohanga kaurori e tū ana i runga i tētahi tereina e tūtaki ai a Julieta ki ngā tāngata tokorua ka haere tonu ki te tākaro i ngā tūranga tino rerekē i roto i tōna oranga. "Tērā tētahi mea tino hiahia ki a rātou," tana kī. "He wahine, i runga i te tereina, ā, he tino mātāmua." 'Whaea ngohengohe' Ko tētahi atu huānga matua ko te mea he pūtahi nga wāhine ki nga pūrākau o Munro. "E mīharo ana ahau ki ngā whanaungatanga whaea-tamāhine," tana kī. "Engari ko ngā whanaungatanga tuākana hoki e mīharo ana ki a au - ko te mea, ko ngā whanaungatanga whānau i te ahuwhānui. " He maha ngā pikitia i mahia e au mō te whaea me ngā kiriata e whai tūranga matua ana ngā wāhine, engari kāore he pānga o Julieta ki ēnei whaea o mua i roto i aku pikitia - hei tauira, ko ngā whaea i High Heels, The Flower of My Secret, Volver rānei. "He tino whakamere a Julieta ki a au, hei kaituhi. He whaea ngoikore a ia. Kāore i a ia te mana o ngā wāhine o mua i roto i aku pikitia - kai te mate a ia i te hara. "He mate morare te hara ki a Julieta, ā, ka whakapokea e taua mate morare tana tamāhine." He Oscar a Almodovar me ngā Baftas e whā ki tōna ingoa - neke atu i te 100 ētahi atu toa me ngā whakaingoatanga. Ināianei kei te whakatapua hoki e te BFI i Rāwāhi tētahi wā ki te kaihanga kiriata. Engari ka taea e ana kaihautū te whakaū ahakoa tana tinana mahi, kāore he kaupapa a Almodovar ki te pōturi, me ētahi kaupapa hou e haere ana i a tātau e kōrero ana. Ka whakamāramatia hoki e ia he "rau mano ngā whitiāhua mō ngā whaea me ngā tamāhine", engari ka tāpiri mai: "Ka mahi tonu ahau i ngā whitiāhua mō taua pātahitanga." Julieta is released on 26 August 2016 through Pathe Follow us on Twitter @BBCNewsEnts, on Instagram, or if you have a story suggestion email entertainment.news@bbc.co.uk.

title: Te whakawā kōhuru o Great Yarmouth: 'I patua e Rosalind Gray a Linda Rainey mā te pana i a ia ki raro i ngā arawhata'
summary: I patua e tētahi wahine whai "kaha ki te taikaha" tōna hoa mā te pana i a ia ki raro i te arawhata, ka rongo te hūri.
text: I mate a Linda Rainey, e 60, e rua rā i muri i te matenga o te māhunga i tētahi whare noho i South Market Road, Great Yarmouth, Norfolk, i te 5 o Aotearoa 2019. I roto i tana whaikōrero whakamutunga, ka kī te rōia a Andrew Jackson QC i a Rosalind Gray, e 55, "āta pana" i a Ms Rainey. E whakakāhore ana a Ms Gray, o Marlborough Square i Yarmouth, i te kōhuru i tana whakawātanga i te Kōti Karauna o Norwich. Kua tautohe te rangatira o te whare noho, a Adrian Lawrence, e 55, o South Market Road, Great Yarmouth, kia kaua e hara ki te whakatupu i te ara o te tika. Kua whakakāhore hoki a Ms Gray i te whakapae whakatupu ōrite. I kī a Tēnā Jackson he "kaha ki te taikaha me te kore whakaaro ki te oranga tangata". "I āta pana a Ms Gray i a Linda Rainey ki raro i te arawhata e mōhio ana ia i te iti rawa o tana whakaaro kia tino tūkinotia," tana kī atu ki te kōti. I kī a Tēnā Jackson i a Ms Gray "kāore i tino kitea he kōpura o te ngākau" i te rongonga o te matenga o Ms Rainey. 'Toto kino' I mua o te whakawā, ka kī te ture kua kōrerorerotia e te tokorua te haere tahi ki te hararei, ā, i whakaaturia mai e ngā kuputuhi he tautohetohe mō te £200 e nama ana ki te tūpāpaku. I te wā o tana whaikōrero whakamutunga, ka kī te rōia o Gregory Bull QC ahakoa he "hoa tino pai" tērā ētahi "toto kino me te riri". I kī a ia he "kino" te matenga, engari he "aituā". "Ehara tēnei i te take kōhuru, e pā ana ki tētahi pana whakapae i runga i te arawhata e ngā hoa tokorua," tana kī. I tāpiritia e ia he pouri i roto i te papatahi, ā, i pā mai te mahi "i roto i te kōhiko". Ka haere tonu te whakawā me ngā whaikōrero whakamutunga. Ngā Hononga Ipurangi Pātahi HM Courts & Tribunals Service

title: I whakahētia e Washington Post, a, i whakamāramatia, i runga i te panekōrero o Baghdadi
summary: I anga atu te Washington Post ki te whakahē i te Rātapu mo te karanga i a Apu Bakr al-Baghdadi, te kaiārahi o te rōpū o te Kāwanatanga Āmāri i mate i te rā i mua, he "tohunga whakapono pākaha".
text: I whakatikaina e te nūpepa tana panekōrero kia karangatia ia he "kaiārahi pūhāhā". I kī te tuakana perehitini o ngā whakawhitiwhitinga a Kristine Coratti Kelly i te panekōrero "kaua rawa e pānui pērā, ā, i tere tonu ta mātau huringa". I whakapakūtia e Baghdadi he kakahu whai i a ia i te wā o te poho a nga ope motuhake o Amerika. I pānuitia tōna matenga e Perehitini Trump i roto i tētahi wāhitau pouaka whakaata ā-motu i te Rātapu. Ko te putanga tuatahi o te upoko matua o te Washington Post i karangatia ko Baghdadi "pūtohu-pūtohu", i mua i te hurihanga ki te "tohunga whakapono pākaha i te ārahi o te Kāwanatanga o Ingarihi". I anga atu te Poutāpeta ki ngā whakahē nui i runga i te pāpāho pāpori, engari he tokomaha i whai wāhi ki te whakangahau i te panekōrero mā te whakamahi i te hashtag #WaPoDeathNotices - tweeting mock headlines for obituaries of notorious figures from history. "Ka mate a Adolf Hitler, he kaingākau toi tūturu, he kaiwhaiwhai mōtika kararehe, me te pūkōrero pūkenga, i te 56," te pānui i tētahi. "Ko Ted Bundy, he kairangahau āta whakaaro, he tangata whai mana, me te kaingākau Polaroid, kua mate i te 42", pānuitia tētahi atu, e pā ana ki te kaipatu rangatū rongonui. Kātahi anō ka whakatau te Washington Post ki "Apu Bakr al-Baghdadi, te kaiārahi pūhāhā o te Kāwanatanga o Ingarihi, ka mate i te 48."

title: Te mōrearea o Etiopia Tigray: I pūhia e te tīma UN 'i te haere ki te puni rerenga'
summary: I muri i to rātau taraiwa i roto i ngā wāhi taki i te rohe ki te raki o Tigray, kua whakaūngia e te kōrero kāwanatanga o Redwan Hu huka.
text: I waihotia e te tīma UN ngā tohutohu kia kaua e noho i taua rohe, ka tāpiritia e ia. Mai i te 4 o Whiringa ā Rangi, kua whawhai nga ope kāwanatanga ki te Aroaro o te Rangatiratanga o te Iwi o Tigray (TPLF) i te rohe. I whakaritea e te tīma UN e ngana ana ki te haere ki tētahi puni mō ngā hunga whakaruru o Eritrea i te Rātapu i te putanga o te tākaro. He nui te māharahara mo te tūponotanga o te hunga whakaruru i muri i ngā pūrongo kāore anō kia whakaūngia kua whakawhiti nga hōia Eriteria ki Tigray, a, kua whakahokia ētahi o rātau ki Eritrea. E whakakāhore ana ngā kāwanatanga e rua kei Tigray ngā hōia o Eriteria ki te āwhina ki te hinga i te TPLF. Kua tono te UN ki te kāwanatanga o Etiopia kia hoatu he "urunga atawhai kore here" ki Tigray i waenganui i te māharahara mō ngā iti kai me ngā taonga rongoā i tētahi rohe neke atu i te waru miriona te iwi whānui. "I whakaraua ētahi o ngā kaimahi UN, ā, i pūhia ētahi," i whakahuatia a Tēnā Redwan e te kōrero rongokōrero o TE WĀ. "E rua ngā wāhi taki i whati i a rātau ki te taraiwa ki ngā wāhi kāore i tika kia haere, ā, i kīa kia kaua rātau e haere. I a rātau e tata ana ki te whati i te tuatoru, ka pūhia rātau, ka herea," tana tāpiri mai. Kāore anō te UN kia kōrero mō taua take. He aha te hunga whakaruru i Etiopia? He tokomaha nga Eriteria kua rere puta noa i te rohe ki Tigray i roto i ngā tau ki te mawhiti i te mahi hōia me te whakatoinga tōrangapū. Ko Eritrea tētahi āhua rōpū kotahi tino ā-whawhai, kua whakahaeretia e Perehitini Isaias Afwerki mai i tōna rangatiratanga mai i Etiopia i te tau 1993. I toa te Pirimia o Etiopia, a Abiy, i te Whakawhiwhinga Rangimārie o Aotearoa i tērā tau mo te mahi ki a Tēnā Ihaia ki te whakamutu i te "kore pakanga; kāore he rangimārie" āhuatanga i waenganui i ngā whenua e rua mai i to rātau pakanga taitapa 1998-2000. E kī ana ngā kaiwhakawāwā kua puta te take hei "pūrākau haumarutanga" me ngā mano o ngā hōia Eritrea e tomo ana ki Etiopia ki te āwhina ki te hinga i te TPLF. I whakahuatia e te kōrero rongokōrero o Kōrero tētahi pūtake kāwanatanga o Amerika e whakaū ana kei Tigray ngā ope Eritrea, ahakoa te whakakāhoretanga a ngā kāwanatanga e rua. "Te āhua nei kāore anō kia rangiruatia," ka whakahuatia te pūtake kāore i whakaingoatia me te kōrero. I muri i te tīmatanga o te papā, ka pūhia hoki e te TPLF he pūroro pūroro ki Eritrea. Kua mutu te whawhai? I hopukina e nga hōia Etiopiana te pūmatua o Tigray, o Mekelle, mai i te TPLF i te 28 o Whiringa ā Rangi, engari kua haere tonu te whawhai i ētahi wāhi o te rohe. "He torutoru noa iho ngā toenga o te hōia, o ngā ope motuhake rānei kāore anō kia whakahaeretia," te kī a Tēnā Redwan. Mai i te tau 1991, ko te TPLF te rōpū whakahaere i Tigray mai i te tau 1991, tata ki te 250,000 ngā kairiri i raro i tōna mana. I whakahaua e Tēnā Abiy te hōia kia panaia i te mana i muri i tana whakaekenga i tētahi pūtake hōia a te hau i Tigray. I whai i ngā rerekētanga tōrangapū koi i runga i ngā whakahōu i whakaurua e Tēnā Abiy mai i te wā i mahi ai i te tau 2018. Neke atu i te 40,000 ngā tāngata kua rere puta noa i te rohe ki Hūtane, ā, he tokomaha pea ētahi atu i ākina mai i o rātau kāinga.

title: He tohu hei whakahonore i te haerenga o Malcolm X ki Smethwick i te tau 1965
summary: Kua whakahonoretia a Malcolm X ki tētahi tohu tohu i Smethwick tata ki te 50 tau i muri i tana haerenga ki te taone o West Midlands i te wā o te nui o te tautohetohe ā-iwi.
text: I te tau 1965 i Marshall Street, i reira ngā kāinga mā e whakauru ana i te kaunihera ki te hoko whare hei ārai i te neke mai o ngā whānau pango, Āhia rānei. E iwa rā i muri mai ka kōhurutia te pāpā o te tokoono i Niu Ioka. Kua whakakitea he tohu kikorangi i te taha o tētahi whare i Marshall Street. I haere ohorere a Malcolm X i te hui tuatahi o te Kaunihera o te Rōpū o Awherika i Rānana. 'Ngākau nui me te kōrero' Ko te ariā mo te tohu i huatau tuatahitia e te Nubian Jak Community Trust, e whakahaere ana i te kaupapa tohu ā-motu o Ingarangi anake o Ingarangi. I kī te whakawhirinaki kua whakamaumaharatia e ia ngā whika tae atu ki te kaiwaiata o Bob Marley me te kaituhi kahungatanga me te kaituhi a Mary Prince. I kī te kaikōrero o Jak Beula: "He hōnore te whakauru ki te whakamaumahara i a Maraka X me tētahi tohu kikorangi i Ingarangi i te huritau o tōna putanga i te 47 tau ki mua. " Hei whika ao whānui mō ngā motika tūmatanui, i puta tōna pānga ki tua atu i ngā taha o Te Hononga o Amerika me Āwherika. "He pono, ko tētahi o ana taonga tuku iho he āwhina ki te whakawehenga i ngā whare noho i Smethwick." Sandwell Council's cabinet member for leisure services, Councillor Linda Horton, said: "Malcolm X is an important historical figure whose visit to Sandwell was a landmark in race relations." I te tau 2005, i whakaputaina tētahi pikitia e tohu ana i te huritau 40 o tana haerenga ki te Whenua Pango. I a ia e kōrero ana i taua wā, ka kī te kaihanga kiriata a Steve Page he "ngākau nui, he kōrero, he tautohetohe". Neke atu i te wiki i muri iho ka pūhia a ia, i a ia e tīmata ana i tētahi whaikōrero i te Audubon Ballroom i Harlem. I tukua a Tōma Hagan, te tangata anake i whakaae ki tana mahi i roto i tana patunga, i tētahi whare herehere o New York i runga i te tuku noa i Aperira 2010. I kī a ia kāore ētahi atu tāngata tokorua i whakawāteatia ki a ia. I tukua rātau i runga i te tuku noa i nga tau kotahi mano e waru tekau mā rua.

title: Swansea Bay's £1bn's £1bn tidal lagoon hit by delay
summary: Kua takaware te hanganga o tētahi hāpua pūngao tai £1bn i Swansea Bay i te tau kotahi i te wā e haere tonu ana ngā whakaritenga mō te taumata pūtea a te kāwanatanga o UK mō te kaupapa.
text: I whiwhi tautoko a Tidal Lagoon Power (TLP) e te Tari Pūngao me te Huringa Āhuarangi (DECC) i Hune. I kī a TLP kua whakatauria e ia he whakataunga "hāngai" ki te whakaroa i te hanganga, i te mea kei te haere tonu ngā kōrero mō te nui o te moni hiko ka utua. I te tau 2016 ka tīmata te mahi. E tatari ana hoki a TLP ki tētahi raihana moana mai i Natural Resources Wales me tētahi rīhi mai i te Pānga Karauna. I kī tētahi kaikōrero mō TLP: "Kua whakahōutia e tō mātou Poari te ūnga mō te hōtaka hanganga. " Me tīmata te whare i te kōanga, engari i te tuatahi me whiwhi mātou i ngā whakaaetanga e toe ana, CfD (kirimana mō te rerekētanga) me te kati pūtea. Nā reira ko te whakataunga hāngai mō te kōanga 2016 ko te neke ki te kōanga 2017." He tino nui te mahi CfD - i te mea e tautuhi ana i te nui o te hiahia o te kāwanatanga ki te utu ki te pūngao i hangaia. 'Dithering' I whakapaea e te kāwanatanga o Welsh te kāwanatanga o UK ki te "whakararuraru i te pūtea". I kī tētahi kaikōrero: "I te tīmatanga o tēnei wiki ka kite mātou i te katinga o te Arawhiti o Mabey i Monmouthshire nā te raruraru i roto i te kaupapahere pūngao a te Kāwanatanga o UK, ā, ināianei ka anga atu mātou ki te āhua o te takaware ki tēnei kaupapa nui nā te whakararuraru i te pūtea mai i te Kāwanatanga o UK. " Ka haere tonu mātou ki te pana i te Kāwanatanga o UK kia mōhio ai tēnei kaupapa nui, ā, ka kawea mai he painga nui ki Weera." Ka whakamahia e te hāpua tai i te taha ki te rāwhiti o Swansea Bay, i waenganui i ngā tauranga me te whare wānanga hou, te rere me te heke o te tai hei whakaputa pūngao, kātahi ka tahuri hei hiko. Engari i mua i te ponotanga o te hāpua, e rua ngā wero matua e hiahiatia ana kia tutuki: E hia mano ngā mahi hanganga me ngā mahi whakanao ka taea te hanga, engari mēnā e rima ngā hāroto nui ake e hangaia ana i te wahapū o Severn, i te takutai ki te raki o Weera. Ka taea hoki te whakarewa ki te tūnga o te UK hei kaiwhakanao pūngao mā, kākāriki. E toru ngā huānga e hiahiatia ana i mua i te hanganga o te hāpua o Swansea - he raihana moana nā NRW, he kirimana rīhi ki te Karauna Estate, ā, ko te mea nui rawa he pārekareka mō te hiko i hangaia e £168 mō ia haora megawatt (pmh) o te pūngao i hangaia. Nō tēnei wā kei te pau te wā o ngā kaiwhakahaere me ngā minita o DECC. He aha? Nā te mea ko tēnei tautoko kāwanatanga kua tonoa ko te tino utu nui. Ka whiwhi te tipu karihi a Hinkley C - mēnā i hangaia - i waenganui i te £89-£92.50/pmh. Waihoki, ko te tautoko i tonoa neke atu i te 35 tau. He moni tūmatanui tēnei tautoko, i te wā kua mātotoru me te tere i roto i nga ratonga tūmatanui maha. E ai ki te DECC kāore he wātaka tauwhāiti mō ngā whakaritenga pūtea, ā, kei te whai i tētahi tukanga uaua ki te aromatawai i ngā mahere a TLP. He tino hiranga hoki te huarere - me tīmata ngā hanganga ki te moana i te wā o te kōanga kia nui ai ngā mahi i te wā e tūmanakohia ana te huarere. E whakaarohia ana he nui rawa te mōrea ki te tīmata ki te mahi i waenganui o te raumati, i te ngahuru rānei. Ko te mea e whakaongaonga ana i te kāwanatanga o UK ko te hāpua o Swansea mēnā ka kitea he angitu, ka āhei pea ki tētahi aho o ētahi atu hāpua - he nui ake ngā mea e tata ana ki Kānata, Newport me Colwyn Bay. Ka taea e rātau te hanga hiko tae atu ki te 120 tau mā te auau o te tai. Ko tētahi atu take pēhi ko te hauwhā o ngā hiko hiko o Ingarangi ka taea te whakakore i roto i ngā tau e 10 e whai ake nei, ā, ko te wehi kāore e rawaka te hiko whakakapi i roto i te mātiti hiko ā-motu. Tērā pea ka puta ki ngā ngaro pōhēhē. Ka pēhea te mahi o te hāpua? Pūtake: Tidal Lagoon Power Ltd

title: Ka huri ngā Kariki ki te pāmu i te ngau o te raruraru ohaoha
summary: Ehara a Aristotelis Loukas i te āhua o te kaiahuwhenua, ehara hoki i te mea he rite tonu ki a ia.
text: Nā Paul MossThe World Tonight Kei te mahi a ia hei kaiahuwhenua, ā, he kākahu anō ia pēnei i te kaiahuwhenua - engari kāore i te tino tika te kākahu me te pōtae: he kikī rawa, he hou rawa, ehara i te kākahu e āhua pai ai ia. Ina tūtaki mātou, i te whenua maunga ki te raki o Tessaloniki, e hiahia ana a Tēnā Loukas ki te whakaatu mai i tana hua hou - he pīpī, he kolokithi rānei e karangatia ana e rātau. I a ia e keri ana, e kohikohi ana, ka kōrero mai a ia ki a au i tana pūrākau. "He maha nga tau i mahi ai ahau hei māngai hokohoko," tana whakamārama. "He maha rawa ngā haora i roto i te tari, he maha rawa ngā haora i roto i taku motokā. He maha nga haora i ngaro i tōku oranga." Engari i aua haora, kāore i mutu aua tau mahi i te whakatānga hari me te penihana. Heoi anō, i a ia e 40 tau tonu ana, ka whakakorea a Aristotelis Loukas. Pēnei i ētahi atu i Kariki i ēnei rā, e 25% pea o te iwi whānui, i kitea e ia he kore mahi, kāore i kitea he mahi hou, me tētahi whānau hei tautoko. Engari he ariā te mea i a Tēnā Loukas. "I ngā wā katoa e miharo ana ahau me pēhea te noho hei kaiahuwhenua," tana kī. "Ahakoa he aha te raruraru o te ohaoha, ka kikorangi tonu te rangi." 'Ohorere' Ka menemene a ia ki tōna ake whakaaro nui i te kāinga, engari ahakoa tōna ngākau mārire, kāore a Aristotelis Loukas i kopikopiko noa ki tētahi parae me te tīmata ki te keri. I rēhita a ia ki te "Kura Pāmu o Amerika" i Tessaloniki, i karangatia nā te mea i whakatūria e tētahi mihinare mai i te US i te tīmatanga o te rau tau 20 - ā, i puta mai ehara a Tēnā Loukas anake i tōna hiahia. "We have had applications triple in just the past year," says Dr Panos Kanellis, the Farm School's president. He tokomaha o ērā e puta mai ana he tohu pai, tae atu ki ngā MBA, engari kāore tonu e kitea he mahi i Kariki o tēnei rā. "I ohorere ahau," te kī a Dr Kanellis. "I hiahia rātau ki te mōhio me pēhea e taea ai e rātau te whakamahi i tētahi whenua nā tō rātau tipuna tāne i tētahi kāinga. " E ngana ana rātau ki te kimi whirinoa." Ko ētahi atu e ako ana i te kura pāmu he mahi tārewa, engari kei te ako me pēhea te pāmu hei mahere pūrua. He tāngata ēnei pēnei i a Asteria Chatziargyrou, e mau ana i tētahi tūnga matua i roto i tētahi kamupene whakanao Kariki. "Kei te anga atu mātou ki ētahi raruraru i tēnei tau, ā, kāore au i te tino mōhio ka whai mahi ahau a tērā tau. Nā reira ka taea e au te mahi pāmu," tana kī. Ināianei kei te mahi manga a Ms Chatziargyrou i runga i te whenua i tonoa e ia i tētahi ahorangi i te kura pāmu. Ahakoa te mahi i ngā haora roa i te taone, ka taraiwa a ia i reira i ia mutunga wiki, ā, i ētahi wā i te wiki i muri i tana mahi. "I marangai mātau, i paru mātau, i makariri mātau. " Me ako koe me te pānui pukapuka, me te noho tonu i tō pāmu - koia te take i uaua ai." E mōhio ana a Vangelis Vergos ki te uauatanga o te mahi pāmu. Kua mahi a ia i roto i te umanga mo te nuinga o nga tau, a, i whakaako i te Kura Pāmu o Amerika mo te tata tonu o te roa. E mārama ana tana mīharo ki te āhua o ēnei kaimahi hou ki te oranga ā-taiwhenua, e hiahia ana ki te ngaki i te whenua, kaua e uru ki te rārangi mahi. Ka kōrero whakahīhī mai a ia ki a au i tērā wiki, i mauria mai e ētahi o ana tauira o mua ta rātau poro tuatahi o te courgettes me te kukama. 'Te iwi mōrearea' Engari kai te māharahara hoki a Tēnā Vergos mo nga kaiahuwhenua kātahi anō ka whakaakona e ia. "E tūmanako ana ahau mō te 1% o rātou kia mahia," ka whakatūpato a ia. "Me whai moni whiwhi rātau, ā, he raruraru tēnei i tēnei wā. " Ka tīmata rātau me te kore pūmatua - he tāngata mōrearea ēnei." Ehara hoki ōna māharahara i te ohaoha anake: "Kua whakamahia a rātau wahine, a rātau anō rānei ki tētahi āhuatanga rerekē o te ora - kua whakamahia rātau ki te haere ki ngā wharekai, ki te whakahoahoa i ngā ahiahi. " I a koe he kaiahuwhenua, me mahi koe i ngā rā 365 i te tau. "I te pō, me tino huri koe i tō oranga." He take tērā i hoatu e au ki a Aristotelis Loukas, i a ia e mau ana hua ki te pēke, kia hokona hoki. E mōhio ana a ia ki ngā huringa e hiahiatia ana e ia. Ka kata a ia i a ia e kōrero mai ana ki a au he pēhea a ia i noho ai hei kaitākaro, engari kātahi ka pakeke, ka kore e tika: "Ināianei i roto i aku whā tekau, me hanga anō e au tōku tinana." Ka titiro whakararo a ia ki tōna āhua pōrori, ka kata anō, he āhua āmaimai. Engari i roto i taua kata, he hari me te ngākau māia, me te hopohopo. "When I look back at my life in the office, I think 'that's the past, now I have better things to do,'" tana kī. "Kāore au i te whakaaro mō ngā pēke, mō ngā nama. Kei te pai ahau ki taku whānau, āe, kei te hari ahau."

title: £800,000 town hall revamp brings new jobs to Aberdare
summary: An £800,000 regeneration project to bring a valleys community's town hall back into use has created new jobs and homes in the town centre.
text: He maha nga tau i mahue ai te whare Hōriana kōeke II o Aberdare, engari ināianei he toa kawhe me ngā whare noho i runga. I kī te kaikaunihera o Rhondda Cynon Taf, a Paul Cannon, ka whai pānga pai te whakaoratanga ki te rohe. Ko te whakahoutanga he wāhanga o te kaupapa Whakahoutanga o te Pokapū Taone o Aberdare e £7.7m. I oti te mahi whakaoratanga hei whakawhāiti i te painga hoahoa me te hītori o te hōro taone o mua. I hangaia hei hōro mākete i te tau 1831, i muri mai ka whakamahia te whare hei tari kaunihera i mua i te hokonga mai e tētahi rangatira tūmataiti. He maha nga tau e noho moe ana tae noa ki te tau 2012 i te wā i hokona mai i te hokonga e te umanga hanganga WH Developments, nāna i tuhi he mahere ki te kaunihera o Rhondda Cynon Taf kia whakahokia mai ki te whakamahinga. I whakawhiwhia e te kaunihera he pūtea ki te kaupapa hei utu i te 60% o ngā utu i raro i tana kaupapa tuku iho o te taone, e whakamahia ana hei whakapai ake i ngā toa toa. The council's deputy leader Paul Cannon said the work had enhanced a landmark building and would have a positive impact on the town.

title: Ka arotakea te mahere whakawhānui rohe 20mph o Manatū
summary: Me arotake tētahi mahere hei whakawhānui i ngā rohe 20mph puta noa i Manatū i muri i te pātaitanga o tō rātou pānga ki te whakaiti i te maha o ngā aituā.
text: Neke atu i te tuatoru i waenganui i te 2012 me te 2016 - engari he iti iho te mokatere i ngā rohe 20mph, ka kī te kaunihera o te taone. I kī te kaunihera ināianei ka arotakea te pai o ngā rohe tīariari. I whakaae hoki ki te whakapau i te kōhua haumaru huarahi e £687,000 ki ētahi atu aronui. Mai i te tau 2014, kua whakaurua he tepenga 20mph ki ngā huarahi neke atu i te 1,000 me ngā kura 138 i te taone. Kua pau tēnei i te kaunihera mō te £640,000, e ai ki tētahi tono Wāteatanga o te Mōhiohio. I ahu mai ki te whakahekenga tere toharite o te 0.7mph i ēnei wāhi, engari ko te "nui o ngā aituā i pā ki ngā rohe 20mph kāore anō kia hinga tere ki te tūmanako tuatahi", te kī a te kaunihera. Hei tauira, neke atu i te 40% ngā tūpāpaku o ngā kaieke paihikara i runga i ngā huarahi o te taone nui i waenganui i te 2012 me te 2016, engari he iti iho te taka o ngā rohe 20mph - 16% i Gorton me te 12% i Miles Platting, Newton Heath, Moss Side me Fallowfield. I tērā tau, kotahi te tangata i Greater Manchester i whakawāteatia mo te nui rawa atu i te tepe tere i tētahi rohe 20mph, ka kī pirihimana. Ahakoa e whakahaeretia ana te arotakenga, ka pau te moni mo te haumarutanga huarahi ki ētahi atu tikanga whakangāwari waka me ngā whakawhitinga waewae. Councillor Rosa Battle said: "It's important that we fully understand how effective these zones have been in terms of reducing accidents so far." I pōhiritia e Rod Kingi, ko te tumuaki o te 20's Plenty for Us, te pūrongo, engari i kī he "hē te whakamahi i ngā huinga raraunga o mua, iti noa iho kāore i te whaimana ā-tatauranga, ā, ka whakataurite ki ngā tapeke o te taone katoa".

title: Dyfed-Powys Police helicopter 'to be scrapped'
summary: Ka tangohia te hepapa Pirihimana o Dyfed-Powys mēnā ka hoatu he kaupapa hei tapahi utu.
text: E tono ana te Association of Chief Police Officers (ACPO) i tētahi National Police Air Service e kī ana rātau ka penapena i te £15m i te tau. I raro i te kaupapa, ka tapahia ngā hepaoro pirihimana me ngā turanga hau e te tuatoru puta noa i Ingarangi me Weera. I kī ngā Pirihimana o Dyfed-Powys i te wāhanga tōmua o te kaupapa, ā, me whakaae e te mana pirihimana. Kāore anō kia mārama he aha, mēnā he aha, ka rerekē ki ngā Pirihimana o Uēra ki te Raki me ngā Pirihimana o Te Tonga me ngā Pirihimana o Gwent. I tēnei wā, e 30 ngā turanga rererangi pirihimana i Ingarangi me Uēra e mahi ana i ngā rererangi e 33, e utu ana i ngā ope e £66m i te tau. I raro i ngā mahere a ACPO ka tapahia tēnei ki te 20 ngā turanga e mahi ana i ngā rererangi e 23, ā, ka whakahekea te pūtea tautoko hau mā te £15m. E kī ana a ACPO, ehara i te mea kei ia tōpana tōna ake waka rererangi e whakahaere ana i tōna rohe, ka noho te ratonga ā-motu hōu mō te katoa o Ingarangi me Weera, ā, ka whakahaeretia mai i tētahi pokapū tono matua. Tērā anō tētahi "whakaritenga kaiwhakamahi" mārama kua whakatakotohia, ko te tikanga ka whakaaetia anake ngā rerenga utu nui mēnā e hiahiatia ana. Engari kua tūtaki ki te whakahē nga kaupapa ki te maka i te hepa Pirihimana o Dyfed-Powys. I kī a Plaid Cymru Carmarthen East me Dinefwr AM Rhodri Glyn Thomas: "I tētahi wāhi tawhiti pēnei i Carmarthenshire, i te nuinga o te wā kāore e taea te mahi tere ki ngā waea ohorere mā te huarahi. Koia tērā te take i tino hira ai te ratonga waka rererangi. "He mahi tino pai te mahi a ngā Pirihimana o Dyfed-Powys mō te rohe, engari he uaua ki te tūmanako kia haere tonu rātau me o rātau ringa e herea ana e ēnei tapahi nui a te tauwhāinga Conservative - Lib Dem i Westminster. " E tino māharahara ana ahau ko te ngaronga o tēnei whakarato nui ko te tīmatanga noa iho o ngā mea e haere mai ana." He taipitopito nui ake i kī ai ngā Pirihimana o Dyfed-Powys me whakaae te kaupapa e te mana pirihimana o te ope. I tāpiritia e tētahi kaiwhakaatu: "E ai ki te pānuitanga pēhi ACPO kua pānuitia he tono hei wāhanga o tētahi Ratonga Pirihimana ā-Motu ki te unu i te rererangi Pirihimana Dyfed-Powys mai i te ratonga me te whakarato haere tonu mai i ētahi atu turanga i taua rohe. " Engari kai te wāhanga tōmua tēnei kaupapa, ā, kāore anō kia kōrerorerotia hōhonu te take. "Kua mahia ētahi whakaaturanga tuatahi i tētahi taumata ā-motu e whakahuahua ana i ētahi āwangawanga e pā ana ki te kaupapa, engari me nui ake ngā taipitopito o ngā kōrero hei whakaaro i ngā take mō ngā Pirihimana o Dyfed-Powys me te rohe o Welsh." I kī a Conservative Carmarthen West me South Pembrokeshire AM Angela Burns he mea nui kia rapu ngā rōpū wāhanga tūmatanui katoa ki te "mahi ngātahi" ki te whakamōrahi i te pūtea penapena i whiwhi ai rātau i te pāhi moni tūmatanui. I tāpiri mai a ia: "Te āhua nei he oro te ariā o te Ratonga Rangi Pirihimana o te Motu, ā, e whakatakoto ana ahau i te kupu whakarato, kāore te whakapūtahitanga o te whakahaeretanga me te tukunga o te uhi hau e whakamāoritia ki te kore taupoki o mua mō te uru o Wales."

title: Pakihi: Ko te tikanga o te hokinga mai o ngā kōrero kanohi-ki-te-kanohi ko te tikanga o te kauneketanga?
summary: Nā reira ko te "taika i roto i te kura" (ngā kupu a te Pirimia o Te Pirimia) o ngā kōrero hokohoko a EU-UK i muri i te Pakihi, kua whakaritea katoatia ki te tūtuki.
text: Ka kite a Katya AdlerEurope editor@BBCkatyaadleron Twitter Mane i te tīmatanga o te marama o ngā whakaritenga nui ake i waenganui i ngā taha e rua. Kei roto i tēnei ko ngā hui ia wiki - i ētahi wā i Rāwāhi, i ētahi atu, i Pōroa. A, ko nga korero kanohi tuatahi mai i te wa i pa ai te mate uruta Covid-19 ki Uropi, ka whakapoke i te EU me nga kaiwhakarite matua o te UK. I hoatu he manaaki ki te whakahoki i te auautanga o ngā whakatata whakarite i te taumata tōrangapū tiketike rawa i ngā wiki e rua ki mua, i te wā i tū ai te pirimia i tētahi tihi mā te hononga ataata ki te Perehitini o te Kōmihana o Ūropi, o Ursula von der Leyen. Kua tārarotia e ngā taha e rua to rātau whāinga ki te whakaae me te whakarite i tētahi mahi i te mutunga o te tau. He aha tātau e tūmanako ai i muri i te tūtukitanga taika o Hōngongoi? E hiahia ana te kāwanatanga ki te kite i te whakahuahua o tētahi mahi hokohoko EU-UK i te mutunga o te raumati. Ko tēnei hei tuku wā ki ngā pākihi UK ki te whakarite i a rātau mō tētahi pātahitanga mahi hōu ki te EU, tīmata i te 1 o Hānuere - i muri i te mutunga o te wā tauwhiro. E kī ana ngā kaiwhakarite EU ka mahi rātau i te tino pai. Puta noa i tēnei marama, ka arotahi ngā rōpū iti iho o ngā kaiwhakarite ki ngā pūwāhi whakapiri matua i waenganui i ngā taha e rua- pēnei i ngā ture hī ika me te whakataetae, tae atu ki te taiao me te - o te hiranga matua ki te EU - ngā ture āwhina kāwanatanga. Ko te tūmanako ka whakangāwari ngā kōrero kanohi-ki-te-kanohi i te kōrerorero ōpaki rerekē i runga i te kawhe, i te hīkoi whakamātao rānei i te paraka, e āhei ai ngā kaiwhakarite ki te kimi rongoā, kaua ia taha e haere tonu ki te parrot i ngā raina whero rongonui kē tētahi ki tētahi mā te kōrerorero Topa, ōrite rānei. Engari ehara i te mea ngāwari: He tino hāngai tonu te whakatūpato me te parroting. Ko te whakaae ki ngā whakararuraru tōrangapū he mea noa iho. Ka taea e koe te kī, mēnā kāore rātau i te hiahia ki te whakaaetanga, kāore te EU, te UK rānei e hainatia ki te tuku i ngā tāwha ki roto i ngā reheke. Ka taea rānei e koe te mōhio mārire kāore tētahi taha e hiahia kia kitea ko ia te kawenga mō tētahi tauari tōrangapū, ā-pūtea hoki i te mutunga o tēnei tau. Kua whakaaturia e Pōroa e hiahia ana ki te ngāwari, i te wā e parea ana ngā tikanga, pēnei i te pare i te mākete kotahi. Engari he aha te tikanga o tēnā? E kī ana ngā kaiārahi EU e tino maia ana rātau ki to rātau tino kaiwhakarite, a Mīharo Barnier. Engari i to rātau tihi i te tīmatanga o tēnei marama, ka tono rātau kia tino mōhio ia ki a rātau i ia hipanga o te huarahi. Kai te tūpato nga iwi moana e waru o te EU. E hiahia ana rātau ki te pupuri i ngā mana hī ika ōrite i ngā wai o UK i hākinakina e rātau i te wā he kāwanatanga mema te UK. Kua whakaahuatia e Tēnā Barnier a rātau hei "tūnga mōrahi". Kāore ērā atu mema EU e hiahia ana kia tiango ngā kōrero hokohoko ki te UK i runga i te hī ika. Ehara ngā wehenga EU i te mea hei whakanui i te aroaro o te EU i raro i ētahi uaua i te wā e tipu ana te pēhanga ki te whakararuraru ki te UK. E whakaaro ana a Tiamana hākinakina ki te perehitini tītaka e ono marama o te EU i tēnei wiki. He mārama te Tumuaki o Te Tumuaki o Hēnea - kua auau tonu tana tohe kāore a ia i te manako ki te whai i tētahi mahi UK "ahakoa te utu". Engari kāore he utu ki ngā umanga Tiamana, ā, ka poke i tōna tawhito tōrangapū. Tērā pea ka kitea e ia me whakaaro ki a Emanuera Macron o Wīwī, nāna - i tēnei wā - kua mau i te raina tino uaua i roto i ngā whakaritenga o Te Wānanga. Ko taua "whakaari" o Franco-Tiamana, mēnā ka puta mai (ā, mēnā ka pērā, tērā pea ka whakawhāititia te rahi, ā, ka purei i muri i ngā tatau kati) he mea whakarārangi mō tērā tau. He wātaka anō tā nga Tiamana - mo to rātau perehitini EU. I tēnei raumati, e kī ana rātau, kua whakatapua ki te ngana ki te tiki i ngā mema EU katoa i muri i tētahi pūtea whakaora noa hei āwhina i ngā rangatira o Ūropi e tino pā ana ki a Covid-19. E kore te arotahi e noho ki ngā whanaungatanga i muri i te ngahuru, e kī ana a Berlin. Ahakoa te kōrero mo te whakataetae mo tētahi mahi raumati, tērā pea ka pai ake taua rārangi wā ki te pirimia. Tērā pea ka rongo a ia i te wāteatanga katoa ki te nekeneke, ki te whakaaro i tōna nuinga paremata e 80 tūru. Engari he ngāwari kē atu pea ki a ia te mahi i te ngahuru, me te karaka e tika ana ki tētahi tūponotanga kāore he take - e ātete ana te nuinga o ngā umanga UK me te tokomaha o ngā MP. Kotahi te mea kia maumaharatia e Rāwāhi: ehara te EU i wehea i runga i ngā mana uru hei whakanui. Me hoatu e ia whenua EU me te pāremata o Ūropi te hurihanga ki tētahi whakaaetanga whanaungatanga ā muri ake. Kaore rānei he mahi.

title: Ngā karanga mō ētahi atu pūwāhi whakahiko motokā hiko i Uēra
summary: Kua karangatia ngā waea mō te Kāwanatanga o Welsh hei āwhina ki te whakauru i tētahi whatunga pūwāhi whakahiko tere mō ngā motokā hiko puta noa i Wales tuawhenua.
text: Nā Steffan MessengerBBC Wales Environment Correspondent Ko ngā wāhi anake e wātea ana mō te whakamahinga tūmatanui kei te taha o te M4 i te tonga o Wales me te A55 i te raki. I kī te Hēkeretari o te Ōhanga Kōruru o Russell George me mōhio ngā minita e hiahiatia ana te āwhina pūtea. I kī te Kāwanatanga o Welsh e tino ū ana ki te āwhina i te wāhanga waka waro iti ki te tipu i Weera. Ko te pikinga o ngā whika hiko Hōu rawa e whakaatu ana i te maha o ngā motokā hiko i Uēra kua tino nui haere i roto i ngā tau tata nei. E 1,725 ngā waka hiko, mono-mai rānei i ngā huarahi o Welsh mai i Hōngongoi ki Mahuru 2016 e ai ki ngā pūkete waka whaimana, i whakaritea ki te 70 noa iho i taua wā kotahi i te tau 2012. Engari e whakapono ana ngā kaiwhakahauhau he nui ake te kauneketanga i runga i ngā waka harakoa iti e whakakāhoretia ana e te hanganga pūwāhi utu. I te tau 2015, he pūrongo nā tētahi rōpū tohunga i whakatūria e te Kāwanatanga o Welsh he aho tūtohutanga, tae atu ki te tāuta i ngā pūwāhi whakahiko ki ngā kāinga kāwanatanga katoa me te whakahauhau i ngā mana ā rohe kia mahi anō. 'Pīkaokao me te hēki' i kī a Russell George, te mema whakaminenga Conservative mō Montgomeryshire, kua tae ki te wā mō te Kāwanatanga o Welsh ki te mahi i ngā kitenga o te pūrongo. "Ko te raruraru he āhuatanga pīkaokao me te hēki - e hiahia ana te tangata ki te whakamahi i ngā waka hiko engari kāore e taea nā te mea kāore te hanganga i reira - ā, kāore e hangaia te hanganga kia tae rā anō te tono," tana kī. "I would like to see government recognising that it does need some grant and funding support for this - in order for anyone in Wales to make enough use of electric vehicles you've got to have charging points in rural areas as well." I kī a Rārangi Burrows, e whakahaere ana i tētahi umanga paipa me ngā taonga whakamahana i Newtown, Powys, i kitea e ia he "tino uaua" te haere tawhiti i roto i tana vani hiko. I hokona e ia te waka hei whakamātau ki te whakaiti i ōna utu, engari ināianei kei te pātai mēnā he whiringa whai hua ki tana tauira diesel tawhito. "Ki taku whakaaro he pōturi noa iho a Uēra ki te whāngai i ngā waka hiko, ehara i a Ingarangi me Pākehā i reira he maha ngā kaunihera paetata kua eke ki runga i te papa," tana kī. "I konei, ka hipokina te runga me te raro o te whenua ki ngā pūwāhi whakahiko, engari puta noa i waenganui he tino uaua te haere ki hea." Ināianei kua tāutatia e Tēnā Burrows tōna ake pūwhakahiko 7kW kaha waenga ki ōna kāinga, e āhei ai ia ki te whakahiko i te vani i roto i te whā haora. Ka taea e te pūwhakahiko tere te mahi ōrite i roto i te 20 meneti. "He rerekētanga nui," ko te tāpiri mai a Tēnā Burrows. I kī a Ahorangi Pita Wells o te Kura Pakihi o Kānata, ka taea e ngā pūwāhi whakahiko tere ake te whakamahi i te motokā hiko "he kōwhiringa taunoa, kāore he māharahara" mō ngā tāngata. "Kāore e taea e te kāwanatanga te mahi i ngā mea katoa - kāore i a rātou ngā rauemi noa iho engari he nui ngā hanganga me te whakanoho. Engari ki taku whakaaro me mahi te kāwanatanga i tōna pai ki te whakarato i tētahi anga, ki te whakarato i tētahi ūnga ture, ki te whakahauhau i ngā mana ā rohe me te hunga i roto i te pūnaha kāwanatanga katoa i Uēra kia tino whai i tēnei ariā me te tautoko." Ko tētahi whakahaere e ngana ana ki te whakapai ake i te whatunga o ngā pūwāhi whakahiko i te taiwhenua o Wales ko te National Trust, kua tāutatia i raro noa iho i te 40 ngā pūwhakahiko pōturi, kaha waenga hoki i ōna āhuatanga i Weera. He mahere tāna ki te tāuta i ētahi atu 30 i roto i ngā marama e 18 e whai ake nei. I kī a Keith Jones, te kaitohutohu taiao mō te National Trust, he āhua taiao me te pakihi, me ngā manuhiri e whakapau wā ana i ngā āhuatanga o te aroha i a rātau e tatari ana kia whakahiko a rātau motokā. "E whakaaro ana ahau me titiro tātau ki a tātau anō hei whenua me te pātai he aha te āhua o te tekau tau, he aha hoki e hiahiatia ana e tātau. I tēnei wā he umanga whare tonu tēnei - kāore i te taumata hanganga." "Me tū ētahi kōrerorero pakeke." I kī tētahi kaikōrero o te Kāwanatanga o Welsh: "E tino ū ana mātou ki te hōpara i ngā huarahi hei whakaiti i te kohu mai i te waka me te whakamōrahi i ngā wāhi o te waka waro iti mō te tupu me ngā mahi i Weera. " E whakaaro ana mātou ki ngā tūtohutanga a te Rōpū Urungi Waka Waro Iti i roto i te horopaki whānui ake o ā mātou mahi whakawhāititanga i raro i te Ture Taiao (Weera)."

title: Boston Tapes: Ka toa te tangata o Ex-IRA i te hipanga tuatahi i roto i te pakanga ture
summary: Kua toa tētahi tangata o IRA i te hipanga tuatahi i roto i tētahi pakanga ā-ture ki te aukati i ngā pirihimana e uru ana ki ngā uiuinga i hoatu e ia ki tētahi whare wānanga o Amerika mō ana mahi taua.
text: Kua whakaaetia a Anthony McIntyre ki te rapu i tētahi arotakenga ā-ture o te whakataunga a pirihimana kia tukuna he reta e tono ana i ngā hopukanga muna. E hiahia ana te PSNI ki ngā rauemi o te Kāreti o Boston hei wāhanga o ta rātau tūhuratanga ki ngā hara pūtohu e kiia ana. E tūmanakohia ana kia tū tētahi whakarongo katoa i Whiringa ā Rangi. Kua tukua e te PSNI me te Ratonga Ture Tūmatanui tētahi Reta Tono Ao Whānui (ILOR) e pā ana ki ngā hopukanga. E tautuhi ana i ngā hara whakapae e tūhuratia ana, tae atu ki te pahūtanga pōma i Rugby Avenue i Belfast i te tau 1976 me te mema o tētahi rōpū pūtohu. I whakataua e ngā kaiwhakawā matua i te Kōti Tiketike o Te Kōti Tiketike o Te Rāhina kāore anō rātau kia makona i ngā mōhiohio i roto i te tono kua "āta tirohia". I kī nga rōia a Tāne McIntyre ko ia te tūkino i roto i te whakapae, ā, i whakawāteatia ia i te utu mematanga. I kī a Ronan Lavery QC: "Kī tonu te reta i ngā hapa, e kī ana mātou he māminga, ā, e hiahiatia ana he whakamārama." I muri i te matenga o Tēnā McIntyre, nō Perehi, engari ināianei e noho ana i te Whenua o Aiarangi, i hereheretia mo te kōhuru i te tau 1977. Ināianei he mātauranga, ko ia tētahi o ngā kairangahau matua i runga i te kaupapa hītori ā-waha o te Kāreti o Boston i runga i ngā Raru. He tini nga tauwhāinga pūkenga me ngā tauwhāinga o te whenua i hoatu he uiuinga tika i runga i te mōhiotanga ka whakawāteatia anake ta rātau pūkete i muri i to rātau matenga. Kua mōhiotia ngā uiuinga ko ngā "Rīpene Boston". Kua toa ngā kaitohutohu i ngā pakanga ā-ture hei whakaū i ngā tuhinga me ngā rīpene o ngā uiuinga i tukuna e te wahine IRA o mua, o Dolours Price me te herehere pūmau o Winston "Winkie" Rea. Kua tukua e te kāwanatanga o Ingarangi tētahi karanga e rapu ana i ngā tārua o ngā uiuinga a Tēnā McIntyre ki te Kāreti o Boston, ā, he wāhanga tēnei te ILOR. E kī ana nga rōia a Tāne McIntyre kei roto anake i ngā rīpene ngā taipitopito o ngā hara kua mahi kē ia i tētahi whiu whare herehere. I rongo a Ariki Justices Weatherup rāua ko Weir kua tukua e te Kāreti o Boston nga rīpene ki nga mana o Amerika. I whakapuakina e rātau mēnā ka haere ngā āpiha PSNI ki Te Tiki i ngā hopukanga, me noho tonu rātou i raro i te hiri, ā, ka penapenatia ki te kōti kia whakatauria rā anō te wero.

title: Kaiārahi Mahi: Ko tēhea kaitono i toa i te pakanga rapu a Google?
summary: Kei te haere atu a Jeremy Corbyn i mua i ana tauwhāinga tokotoru mō te kaiārahi Labour ina tae mai ki ngā rapunga ipurangi, e ai ki te rangahau hou a Google News Labs mō te BBC.
text: Nā te kaipānui tōrangapū o Kōrero WheelerPolitical kua mahi a Google ko tēhea o ngā kaitono e whā i hanga i te nuinga o ngā rapunga i ia taiwhanga 650 o Ngātahi, i waenganui i te 1 o Pipiri me te 3 o Mahuru. I tae mai a Tēnā Kōpia ki runga i te 539 o rātau. Ko te nuinga o ngā kaitono ārahi Mahi i rapua e te rangahau wāhanga o Google News Labs me Alasdair Rae o te Whare Wānanga o Te Whare Wānanga o T A, e toru marama ki muri i te tīmatanga o te whakataetae, he mariko tē mōhiotia te parirau mauī tōkeke. Nā reira ko te tangata māori anake e hiahia ana ki te mōhio anō mōna. Te āhua nei kei te nui tana āronga ki ngā manawa Tūturu kikorangi pono i te Tonga o Ingarangi, pērā ki ngā pā o mua o Labour i Pākehā. Engari ko te āputa i waenganui i a Tēnā Kōpia me tōna tauwhāinga tata rawa i tēnei whakataetae, ko Andy Burnham, ko ia te kupu rapu tino pai i roto i ngā taiwhanga e 51, tērā pea, he tohu anō o te nui o te whakaaro o te iwi whānui. Ko ngā rapunga nā ngā tāngata katoa e whakamahi ana i te pūkaha rapu Google, ā, kāore anō kia herea ki ngā kaitautoko Mahi. E 37 ngā taiwhanga e haere mai ana a Yvette Kupa, ā, ko Liz Kendall i te wāhi tuawhā i te 23. Ka kitea e nga kaiwhakataetae e whā i te Hātarei kua wikitōria i te pakanga ki te whakakapi i a Ed Miliband. Kei te riri te taurangi mēnā ka whiwhi a Tēnā Kōpihi, te kaioma ohorere o mua, neke atu i te 50% o ngā pōti, e āhei ai ia ki te toa me te kore manakohanga tuarua e haere mai ana ki te tākaro - mēnā rānei ka taea e tētahi o ētahi atu kaitono te whakaputu i ngā manakohanga tuatahi me te tuarua hei patu i a ia. E tuwhera ana te nui o te pānui a ngā kaitono me ā rātou tīma ki ngā raraunga rapu a Google, engari ka makaia e ia ētahi nuggets ātaahua. I tīmataria e Tēnā Kōpia ngā tūtohi rapu a Google i tōna ake wāhanga o Islington Raki, i te raki o Rāwāhi, ahakoa ko ia te MP rongonui o te rohe i reira mai i te tau kotahi mano e waru tekau mā rua. Ko ia hoki te kaitono tino rapua i te wāhanga o Andy Burnham, i Leigh, i Greater Manchester, me te tūru o Te Hauauru o Liz Kendall. Engari ko Liz Kendall te tihi o Pontefract me Normanton - te tūru o Yvette Cooper. Ko Ms Kendall, e whakaahuatia whānuitia ana hei kaitono Pākehā, ko ia hoki te kaitono tino rapua i te tūru o Sedgefield tawhito o Tara, i te wā i hangaia e Tēnā Burnham te tino painga o ngā kaitono e whā i te wāhanga o Witney o te Pirimia o Rawiri, i Oxfordshire. Ko ngā pātai tūturu Ko ngā raraunga motuhake, i tangohia i waenganui i te 15 me te 22 o Hōngongoi, e whakaatu ana ko Tēnā Kōpia te kaitono tino rapua katoatia, me Liz Kendall, tētahi atu whanaunga tē mōhiotia, tuarua, ko Andy Burnham tuatoru me Yvette Kupa tuawhā. Kua tukua hoki e Google tētahi wehenga o ngā pātai e pātai ana ōna kaiwhakamahi mō te Rōpū Mahi me tana whakataetae ārahi, i waenganui i aua rā. I te 20 o Hōngongoi, ko tētahi o ngā wā kaurori o te whakataetae ārahi a Te Kāwanatanga, i te 20 o Hōngongoi, ko tētahi o ngā wā kaurori o te whakataetae ārahi a Te Kāwanatanga, me Tēnā Kōpia i waenganui i te 50 o ngā hunga whakakeke Mahi e pōti ana ki a ia. Nā reira kāore pea i te mīharo, ko te pātai tino pātaitia i Google ko: "He aha a Labour i papare ai i te pōti Ora?" Ko te nuinga o ērā atu pātai e pā ana ki ngā take ā-ringa pēnei i te hono ki te rōpū me te pōti, engari ko te tuarima o ngā uiui tino pai e pā ana ki te ngākau o ngā mea e kitea ana e te tokomaha he raruraru tuakiri o te rōpū: "He aha te tikanga o te Mahi?" Ka haere tonu te kaupapa tūturu i roto i te wehenga o ngā pātai tino pai i pātaitia mō te Rōpū Mahi i te US, e tohu ana he pūtake o ētahi mea ngaro ki te toharite o te kaiwhakamahi ipurangi o Amerika. Anei ngā pātai e rima e pā ana ki te Mahi i pātaitia e ngā kaiwhakamahi Google o Amerika: I hangaia e John Walton, Punit Shah me Mark Bryson.

title: Ngā Hōnore Tau Hōu 2021: I hangaia e te kaiārahi matakite o Hereford te MBE
summary: A man who has been a scout leader for more than 50 years has been made an MBE in the New Year Honours.
text: Ko te kaiwhakahaere o Mua o Barclays, a David Owen, 73, mai i Hereford, e āwhina ana ki te whakawhanake i ngā kaiārahi matakite hou, ā, e 10 ngā haerenga aowhānui, e pā ana ki waenganui i te 50 me te 250 ngā rangatahi. "He karere nui" a ia mo te matauranga UK, te kī a te Tari Kāpata. I kī a Tēnā Owen, nāna i tūtaki ki tana wahine mā te mātakitaki, i "mīharo" a ia, ā, i rongo ia i te "tino hōnore". I tāpiri mai a ia: "Ko te āhukahuka i puta mai i te (kite) i tētahi 23, 24 tau te pakeke i te tiriti. " Ka kitea e au te pai o ta rātau mahi. He āhukahuka tūturu tēnā ki a au." Ko te tūao, e noho ana i Hereford mō te 35 tau, ā, tokotoru ana tama, tokoono ngā mokopuna, i moe i te wahine a Pam, ināianei he kaiārahi matakite beaver me te komihana beaver rohe, i te tau 1976. He kaiārahi matakite a ia i Herefordshire, Shropshire, Wales me Rānana. Kua whakahonoretia a Tēnā Owen "mō ngā ratonga ki te mātakitaki", engari ko ia hoki te tuakana perehitini me te mema ora o te Rōpū Whutupōro Tamariki o Herefordshire, ā, kua tata ki te 1,000 ngā ōritenga whutupōro tamariki. Mai i te tau 1990, kua mahi a ia i roto i ngā tūranga maha hei manukura, hei manukura tuarua, hei kaitiaki moni mō te Hereford Gang Show, he whakaaturanga momo ā-rua i te Whare Tapere o Te Marae. Na ana whakatutukitanga i āwhina ki te "whakapai ake i te oranga o ngā mano o te rangatahi", te kī a te Tari Kāpata. I kī te kaiwhakahaere pūtea ahuwhenua o mua: "He nui rawa ngā rangatahi mātauranga... He mea nui hoki hei pakeke kia āwhina mātou ki te whakamōrahi i tō rātou kaha katoa. "He tino pai tēnei." Ko ētahi atu kaiwhiwhi hōnore mai i Hereford me Worcester ko: Whāia a BBC West Midlands i Facebook, Twitter me Instagram. Tukua ō whakaaro pūrākau ki: newsonline.westmidlands@bbc.co.uk

title: I whakaaturia mai ngā ingoa pēpi o Pirihitini mō te tau 2017
summary: Ko Jack te ingoa tino pai mō ngā tamariki pēpi i Pākehā mō te 10 tau i roto i te haupae, e ai ki ngā tatauranga hōu.
text: Kua whakaaturia hoki e ngā Pūkete ā-Motu mō Pākehā ko Olivia te ingoa o te kōtiro matua mo te tuarua o nga tau whai muri. Ko Oliver te tuarua o te ingoa o te tama tino rongonui, i a Emily kei te wāhi tuarua i roto i te tūtohi ingoa o te kōtiro. E whakaatu ana ngā tatauranga hou e 25,384 ngā taitama me ngā kōtiro 23,935 i whānau i mua i te 2 o Hakihea 2017. I whakaaturia hoki e te pūrongo tētahi ia mo te wā roa i roto i ngā momo ingoa e kōwhiria ana e ngā mātua mō ā rātou tamariki. I te tau 1900, 68% o ngā taitama i hoatu ki tētahi ingoa tuatahi i roto i te 10 o runga. I te 2017, ka heke taua whika ki te 12.5%. E 2,050 ngā ingoa kōtiro rerekē i tuhia ki Pākehā i te tau 1977 - e 4,221 kua whakapūketetia i te tau 2017. I kī te Hēkeretari Ahurea o Fiona Hyslop: "He whakataunga hira te whakaingoa i tō pēpi, ā, he ngahau tonu te kite i ngā ingoa e kōwhiria ana e ngā mātua huri noa i Pākehā. " E whakaatu ana ngā whika o tēnei tau i ētahi ingoa e mau tonu ana, ā, ko Jack rāua ko Olivia e whakaū ana i a rāua ko rāua te tino pai puta noa i Pākehā - ko Jack mō te tau 10 i roto i te haupae me Olivia mō te tuarua. "Kei te teitei ake tonu te ia mō ngā ingoa ahurei i ngā tekau tau ki mua, e tohu ana kei te whakaaro roa ngā mātua o tēnei rā i mua i te kōwhiri ingoa mō ā rātou pēpi." Ngā ripanga 10 o runga mō te 2017 Boys Girls Source: National Records of Scotland Girls' highlights I whakapūmautia rāua e Olivia rāua ko Emily i ngā wāhi e rua o runga i te tau 2017. I piki a Isla i tētahi wāhi ki te tau toru, ka pana a Sophie ki te wāhi tuawhā. I noho tonu a Amelia rāua ko Ella i te ono me te waru ngā wāhi, i te wā e rua ngā wāhi e piki ana a Jessica ki te tau rima, ka pana i a Ava ki te tuawhitu. I piki ake a Charlotte ki te iwa, i a Aria anake te whakauru hou i te 10 o runga, e piki ana mai i te 12 i te tau 2016. Kua tipu haere tonu te manakohanga o Harper mai i te wā i hoatu ai e Victoria Beckham taua ingoa ki tana tamāhine i te tau 2011. Ko tētahi o ngā whakaurunga hou e rua i roto i te 20 o runga o Pākehā, kua piki ake i te 12 ngā wāhi ki te 18, i te wā e rima ki te 19 a Hana. I te tau 2017 ka hinga a Hemi ki te tuatoru i te wā e piki ana a Oliver ki te wāhi tuarua. He iti noa iho te rerekētanga i te toenga o te 10 o runga, hāunga a Hāhi, e ono ngā wāhi ki te whitu. I noho tonu a Lewis, Noa, Logan, Alexander, Leo me Harry i te 10 o runga, engari i taka atu a Charlie, ka neke ki te wāhi 14. Ka puta katoa a Alfie, Aaron, Thomas, Archie me Rory i te 20 o runga, kua kite i te pikinga o to rātau rongonui. Ko ngā kaipiki nui ko Theo te ingoa taitama 27 tino rongonui i te tau 2017, i muri i te pikinga i ngā wāhi e 18. Kua tipu hoki te rongonui o Moameta, e neke ana i ngā wāhi 11 ki te 36, ā, kua piki a Hura i te 12 ki te 37. I kitea hoki e te NRS kua kite hoki a Pātata i te manakohanga, i muri i te pana o ngā wāhi e 26 ki te 46. I roto i te tūtohi kōtiro, ka piki a Poppy i ngā wāhi 13 ki te 30, i tae atu a Sienna ki te 32 - tae atu ki te 36 ngā wāhi - i te wā i piki a Willow i ngā wāhi 17 ki te 45. Ka puta hoki a Mila i te 50 o runga - i te tau 50, mai i te wāhi 70.

title: HMS Audacious: Ka whakapuaki a MoD i te kirimana waka ruku £1.2bn
summary: Kua whakawhiwhia he kirimana £1.2bn hei hanga i te waka ruku whakaeke hou a te Royal Navy, Audacious.
text: Ka whakakapia e te mahi a BAE Systems, e haumaru ana i ngā mahi e 3,000 i Barrow-in-Furness i Cumbria, te Karaehe Trafalgar e mahi ana i tēnei wā. Kua tukua tētahi atu £1.5bn ki ngā waka ruku e toru e toe ana e hangaia ana, te kī a te MoD. I kī te Hēkeretari Whakangungu a Piripi Hammond ka tukuna e ngā kirimana ki ngā ope taua o UK te "mōhiotanga nui ake". "E whakaatu ana tēnei pūtea i to mātau tukutahi, ehara i te mea ki tētahi āheinga matua o te Moana o te Ariki, engari ki te umanga waka ruku i Barrow, e tākaro ana i tētahi tūranga nui i roto i te wawao o Ingarangi mō ngā tekau tau e haere ake nei," tana kī. "He pānuitanga rongo tino pai tēnei mō ngā tāngata e 5,000 neke atu rānei i Barrow, e whakawhirinaki ana ā rātou mahi ki te hōtaka waka ruku me ngā mano anō puta noa i te UK i te mutunga hangarau tiketike o tā mātou pūkaha i tēnei whenua." Ko Audacious te tuawhā o ngā waka ruku e whitu o te Karaehe Mātauranga e hangaia ana mō te Royal Navy. Ko ngā poti tuatahi e rua, ko HMS Astute me Ambush, kei te whakamātauria te moana i tēnei wā. Ko te poti tuatoru, ko Artful, kei te tae ki ngā wāhanga whakamutunga o tana hanganga i te whāngai kaipuke o Barrow. Me noho katoa te tokotoru ki Faslane i runga i te Clyde. Kua tīmataria te mahi tōmua i runga i te oko tuarima, o Anson, i te wā kua tīmata te whakaritenga i runga i ngā waka ruku ono me te whitu kāore anō kia whakaingoatia. I puta mai i tērā marama kua tūpono a Astute ki ētahi raruraru i te wā o ana whakamātautau moana, tae atu ki ngā mōrearea me ngā papa whakawhiti hiko i kitea kua hē te whakauru. I puta mai hoki ngā māharahara i tērā tau mō te tika o ngā taputapu aroturuki pūrere karihi i te wā o te whakamātautau. I kī a Tēnā Hammond: "Ko tēnei kirimana e tohu ana i tētahi hipanga hira whakamua i te haerenga o tā mātou hōtaka waka ruku whakaeke, ā, ka whakatata atu te Taua Moana Ariki ki te tāpiri i ētahi atu o ēnei waka ruku tino hōhonu, kaha hoki ki tōna rererangi. " Ko to mātau kaha ki te tuku i tētahi atu £1.5bn mō ngā poti e rima, ono me te whitu e tāraro ana i ngā painga o tētahi pūtea whārite me te hōtaka taputapu pūtea katoa e nui ake ai te mōhiotanga o o tātau ope taua. "E whakaatu ana tēnei pūtea i to mātau tukutahi, ehara i te mea ki tētahi āheinga matua o te Moana o te Ariki, engari ki te umanga waka ruku i Barrow, e tākaro ana i tētahi tūranga nui i roto i te wawao o Ingarangi mō ngā tekau tau e haere ake nei."

title: I whakaarahia te hononga autism ki te pokenga o te hau
summary: Kua whakahuatia e ngā kaipūtaiao tētahi hononga i waenganui i te autism me te mārakerake pokenga o te hau i te wā e hapu ana.
text: Nā Hemi GallagherHealth, i kī te paetukutuku Rongokōrero o Te Kura Hauora Tūmatanui o Harvard kua honoa ngā taumata pokenga tiketike ki te whakaruatanga o te autism i roto i ta rātau akoranga i ngā tamariki e 1,767. I kī rātau ko ngā take korakora iti, tērā pea ka haere mai i ngā pūkahukahu ki te awa toto. I kī nga tohunga me whakaiti e nga wāhine hapū to rātau mārakerake, ahakoa me whakamatau tonu te hononga. He tino whakakino te pokenga o te hau. E whakaaro ana te Whakahaere Hauora o te Ao e 3.7 miriona nga mate i ia tau. Ko te akoranga, i whakaputaina i roto i ngā Tirohanga Hauora Taiao, i uiui i tētahi hononga ki te autism. I tātaritia e ia e 245 ngā tamariki whai autism me te 1,522 ki waho. Mā te titiro ki te mārakerake poke i whakaarohia i te wā e hapu ana, i runga anō i te wāhitau kāinga o te whaea, ka whakamutua e ngā kaipūtaiao he nui ake ngā taumata pokenga i roto i ngā tamariki whai autism. Ko te hononga tino kaha ko te matūriki pai - he korakora puehu kohuke, waro me ētahi atu matū - e tomo ana ki te awa toto, ā, ka tūkino puta noa i te tinana. Heoi anō, kāore e taea e te rangahau te kī tūturu nā te pokenga i puta ai te autism i te mea tērā pea ētahi atu take kāore i pūketetia i roto i te akoranga. He tauira ōrite He nui tonu te wae tuku iho ki te autism, engari i kī te kairangahau matua o Dr Marc Weisskopf he whakaaturanga whakatū tērā pea ka whai tūranga te pokenga o te hau. Ka kī a ia: "Ko te tauwhāititanga o ā mātou kitenga mō te wā hapū, me te toru o ngā hauwhā, e whakahaere ana i ētahi atu whakamāramatanga mō ēnei kitenga. " Kua tino kaha te pūtake whakaaturanga mō tētahi tūranga mō te mārakerake o te whaea ki te pokenga o te hau e whakanui ana i te mōrea o ngā tūāwhiorangi ā-hinengaro. "Ehara tēnei i te mea ka homai ki a mātau he mōhiotanga hira i a tātau e haere tonu ana ki te whai i ngā taketake o ngā mate tūāwhiorangi ā-hinengaro, engari hei mārakerake ka taea te whakarerekē, ka whakatuwhera i te tatau ki te whakaaro mō ngā tikanga ārai e taea ana." I kī atu a Prof Frank Kelly, te kaiwhakahaere o te rōpū rangahau taiao i King's College London, ki te BBC: "E whakaaro ana ahau mehemea ko tēnei akoranga anake kāore au e tino mōhio, engari ināianei ko te tuarima kua tae mai ki te whakatauranga ōrite. " He tika te koiora, kei reira te placenta hei whakarite kia tino pai rawa atu ngā matūkai o te kōhungahunga, engari mēnā kei te tomo ngā matū ki te tinana o te whaea, ka uru hoki te kōhungahunga ki ērā. "Me mōhio ngā wāhine ki ngā hononga tūpono kia kore ai rātou e nui rawa te mārakerake."

title: E kī ana a Annabella Sciorra i wero kino a Harvey Weinstein i a ia
summary: Kua whakaatu te kaiwhakaari o Amerika o Annabella Sciorra i roto i te whakawātanga o Te Wānanga o Te Wānanga o Aotearoa, i te 25 tau ki mua.
text: I kī a Ms Sciorra, e tino mōhiotia ana mō tana mahi i roto i te The Sopranos, i whakahaua ia e Tēnā Wānanga ki tōna whare noho, a, ka whakaekea ia. "I te ngana ahau ki te tango i a ia i a au," te kī a Ms Sciorra ki te hūri o New York. "I te kōwhao ahau i a ia, i te whana i a ia." E whakakāhore ana te pakeke e 67 tau i ngā whakapae katoa, arā ko te whakakōhuru me te tūkinotanga. Ki te whakawāteatia, ka taea e ia te anga atu ki te ora i muri i ngā tūru. WHAKATŪPATO: Kei roto i tēnei pūrākau ngā taipitopito ka whakararuraru pea ētahi kaipānui. Ko te mahi e whakapae ana a Ms Sciorra kua pā mai i mua noa atu kia whaia i raro i te ture o New York. Engari e hiahia ana nga kaiwhakawa ki te whakamahi i tana whakaaturanga hei tautoko i ta rātau tautohe he kaiwhaiwhai te tangata whakapae. Kia pērā ai, me whakamatau rātau i mahi a Tēnā Wānanga i tētahi hara nui ki ngā tāngata tokorua neke atu rānei. I te tau 2013, ka whakataua a Tēnā Wānanga ki te whakakōhuru i tētahi wahine, a Heka Mann, i roto i tētahi rūma hōtēra i te takiwā o New York i te tau 2013, ā, i te tau 2006, ka mahi i tētahi mahi tōtika ki tētahi wahine tuarua, a Mimi Haleyi, i te tau 2006. I kī tana tīma wawao he whakaaetanga ana mahi, tae atu ki tētahi pātahitanga "aroha". E ai ki tana whakaaturanga ā-whakaaro, i hapa a Ms Sciorra me Tēnā Weinstein i te hōtoke o te tau 1993-94. Kātahi ka tono te kaihoko o Karaihe ki te whakahoki i te kaiwhakaari ki tōna whare noho o Manhattan. I muri noa iho i te whakatakanga a Tēnā Weinstein i a ia, ka rongo te kaiwhakaari i te patoto i tōna tatau. Ka pana atu te kaiwhakanao ki tōna whare noho, ka kī a ia, a, ka mauria ia ki tētahi rūma moenga i reira ia i whakahaua ai ia ki runga i te moenga, a, ka tūkinotia ia. I waihotia e Tēnā Wānanga ana ngana ki te whawhai i a ia, ka whakaatu a Ms Sciorra i te Rāitema, e whawhai ana ki te roimata. "I eke a ia ki runga i a au, a, ka werohia ahau e ia," tana kī. "I moepuku a ia ki a au, ā, i te ngana ahau ki te whawhai ki a ia, engari kāore i taea e au te whawhai anō nā te mea kua maukatia ōku ringa." I kī a ia kātahi ka mahi ā-waha ki a ia, ka kī atu ki a ia: "Māu tēnei." "He tino whakarihariha i tīmata ai taku tinana ki te rūrū i runga i te āhua tino rerekē," tana kī. "He rite ki te tīrewa, ki tētahi mea rānei." I kī a Ms Sciorra i tūtaki a ia ki a Tēnā Wānanga i tētahi hapa i ngā wiki i muri iho. He "whakamataku" tana urupare, tana kī. Ka whakawhirinaki te kaiwhakanao ki a ia, ka mea: "Ka noho tonu tēnei i waenganui i a koe me ahau." "He whakawehi, a, i mataku ahau," te whakaatu a te kaiwhakaari. Ka whakatīwheta tonu a Tēnā Weinstein i a ia, ka kī a Ms Sciorra. I te Hākari Kiriata Cannes o te tau 1997, ka kī a Ms Sciorra ka whakatuwheratia e ia te tatau o tōna rūma hōtēra kia kitea ai a Tēnā Wānanga e tū ana i mua i a ia, e pupuri ana i tētahi pounamu hinu pēpi me tētahi rīpene whitiāhua. Ka oma atu a ia ki roto i tōna rūma, a, kātahi anō ka haere a Tēnā Weinstein. "I tino mataku ahau," tana kī. I pātaitia e te rōia o Joan Illuzzi he aha ia i kore ai e karanga ki nga pirihimana, ka kī a Ms Sciorra i "pōraru" a ia. "He tangata i mōhio ahau ki a ia," tana kī. "I rongo ahau i taua wā ko te hīkaka tētahi mea i pā mai i tētahi ara whakamuri i tētahi wāhi pouri." E kī ana a Ms Sciorra i mahue i a ia te whakaekenga. I whakaatu a ia ka tīmata a ia ki te inu me te tapahi i a ia anō, ka pania ōna toto ki runga i te pakitara. I te wā kotahi o ngā kaiwhakarato tino whakamihi o Karaihe, kua whakapaea a Tēnā Wānanga ki te hē tōnā, neke atu i te 80 ngā wāhine - ngā whakaaro i āwhina ki te whakahaere i te whakahau #MeToo ki te hē tōnā. Engari he torutoru noa iho ngā amuamu i ahu mai ki ngā utu hara. I te tīmatanga o tēnei marama, ka whakahaua e nga rōia o Los Angeles a Tēnā Wānanga ki te whakakōhuru me te whakaekenga ā-waha o ētahi atu wāhine tokorua. E tūmanakohia ana kia mutu te whakawā o New York i te tōmua o Poutāpeta.

title: Te matenga o Tom Lee: Ko te takoha a te whānau ki te taiohi 'tino aroha'
summary: Kua hoatu takoha te whānau o tētahi taitama 17 tau, e kore e whakamāramatia tōna matenga, ki tētahi "taitama tino aroha".
text: I mauria a Tom Lee ki te hōhipera mai i Berrisford Road, Market Drayton, Shropshire, tata ki te 23:25 GMT i tērā Paraire, a, i muri iho ka mate. Ka tū tētahi whakamātautau tirotiro tōmuri, ka kī nga Pirihimana o Staffordshire. Tokorima nga taitamariki i hopukina e pā ana ki te matenga o te taitamariki kua tukua i raro i te tūhuratanga. I kī tētahi kōrero whānau, i whakaputaina e nga pirihimana: "He taitama rongonui, rekareka, pukumahi, tino aroha a Tom. Ka tino mihi a ia ki tōna whānau me ngā tāngata katoa i mōhio ki a ia." I hopukina tētahi tangata 18 tau, mai i Market Drayton, ā, kua tukua i runga i te utu pirihimana i te wā e haere tonu ana ngā uiui. Tokowhā ngā taitamariki - e rua ngā kōtiro 16 tau me ngā taitama 17 tau - mai i Market Drayton, kua āwhina hoki ki ngā uiui, ā, ka tukua i raro i te tūhuratanga. Whāia a BBC West Midlands i Facebook, i Twitter, me te waitohu mō ngā whakahōutanga rongokōrero paetata hāngai tonu ki tō waea.

title: Ka tapahia e Ryanair nga rerenga i muri i nga takaware 737 Max
summary: Kua kī a Ryanair ka whakahaua kia tapahia te maha o ngā rerenga raumati e whakahaeretia ana e ia a tērā tau, e whakapae ana i ētahi atu takaware e tūmanakohia ana i mua i te whakaaetanga o te Boeing 737 Max ki te rere anō.
text: I kī te waka rererangi tērā pea ka tōmuri i a Hakihea i mua i te whakawātea a ngā kaiwhakarite i te rererangi kia hoki ki te rangi i muri i ngā tūtukitanga kino e rua. E tatari ana ki te tukunga atu o ngā rererangi e 58 i mua i te raumati a tērā raumati, engari ināianei e tūmanako ana kia whiwhi neke atu i te haurua o ērā. Ka taea hoki te kati i ngā turanga. I kī te waka rererangi e kōrero ana ki ngā taunga rererangi mō tēhea o ōna pokapū ka pā ki te tapahi. "Kei te tīmata mātou i ngā rangatū o ngā kōrero me ā mātou taunga rererangi ki te whakatau ko tēhea o ngā turanga mahi a Ryanair e pā ana ki ēnei tapahi wā poto me ngā katinga rānei mai i Whiringa 2019," te kī a te rangatira nui o te waka rererangi, a Michael O'Leary, i roto i tētahi kōrero. I tāpiritia e Ryanair ka kōrero ki ana kaimahi me ōna uniana mō ngā katinga kua whakaritea, e kī ana he "take hāngai" nā ngā takaware e tuku ana i te 737 Max. Ināianei kei te tūmanako te kamupene rererangi ki te kawe i ngā pāhihi 157 miriona i te tau ki Poutūterangi 2021, e rima miriona iti iho i tāna i whakaritea. Kua kite te BBC i tētahi reta i tukuna e Ryanair ki ngā kaihautū i tērā wiki. E kī ana ko te "āhua o te ohaoha mō ngā waka rererangi poto o Ūropi kei te tino uaua." Ko te hua o te taunga o te 737 Max, e kī ana te waka rererangi, neke atu i te 300 ngā kaihautū, ā, "tērā pea ka kino kē atu ki te pānga patoto o ngā takaware tuku mōrahi". Tātaritanga: Nā Theo Leggett , te kaipānui pakihi ao whānui o TE AO Whānui e kore e rere anō te 737 Max i mua i te mutunga o te ngahuru - ā, kāore pea i mua i tērā tau. Me ohorere hoki tātau? I roto i tētahi kupu, kāo. He tiketike rawa ngā tūnga, ā, ko tēnei tētahi whakataunga kāore e taea e ngā kaiwhakarite te hē. Kua anga kē atu te Federal Aviation Administration ki ngā whakahēnga taumaha mō te whakaae i te rererangi ki te ratonga i tōna āhua taketake, me ngā pūmanawa whakahaere rererangi kua pāngia i roto i ngā aituā motuhake e rua me te ngaromanga o ngā oranga e 346. E kore e taea te tāruatanga - ā, he whakaaro ki tōna ake rongonui, ehara i te mea me tino māhorahora te FAA, engari kia kitea he mataiti. Nā reira te āhua nei kua pai atu tana tātaritanga i te pūmanawa hou i hangaia hei whakatika i te raruraru taketake - ā, ināianei kei te whakatau i ētahi atu take tūpono. E tino hiahia ana a Hēneti ki te rere anō i te 737 Max me te tīmata anō i ngā tukunga ki ngā kiritaki - kua pau te mokowā tūnga i tōna wheketere Renton hei tīmatanga. E hiahiatia ana hoki e ngā waka rererangi te waka rererangi hou. Engari he ōrite te karere mai i te FAA: ka hikitia e ia te ārai i te rere "ina whakaaro mātou he haumaru te mahi pēnā". 'Whakawhāiti i te tupu' i kī atu te kaitātari waka rererangi a Chris Tarry ki te BBC ko te nekehanga ki te tapahi ararere he "tino mōhiotia" i muri i te taunga o te 737 Max. I kī a ia i "kore e taea, ahakoa he hau e whai ake nei, kia hoki ki te rangi i mua i te mutunga o te tau". Tērā te maha o ngā rererangi ka taea e Ryanair te whakamahi, ka kī a ia, e whakamārama ana ka whakamahia e te waka rererangi aua rererangi i runga i ngā ara tino whai hua. I kī tētahi atu tohunga rererangi, a John Strickland, tērā pea ka pā te taunga ki ngā mahere tipu o te waka rererangi. I tēnei wā e 455 ngā waka rererangi o Ryanair, engari kei te whakaaro ia ki te whakawhānui i tana rererangi ki te 600 i te tau 2025. "Ko te nuinga o tēnei e pā ana ki te whakawhāiti i te tupu, kaua ki te whakahoki," tana kī. "I te raumati ka tūmanako rātau kia kaha te tipu, me ētahi atu turanga me ētahi atu ara." Kāore he waka rererangi Max i rere mai i Poutāpeta i muri i ngā take me ōna pūmanawa i honoa ki ngā tūtukitanga i Initonīhia me Etiopia, i mate ai e 346 ngā tāngata. E 135 te tapeke o ngā tauira tautohetohe a Ryanair, ko te rima tuatahi e tika ana kia tukua i tēnei ngahuru. Kua noho ko te waka rererangi hou rawa hei whakakore i ngā rerenga nā te tūnga o te rererangi. I te Rātapu, i kī a American Airlines e whakaroa ana mō te whā o ngā whakakorenga o ngā rerenga 115 ia rā. Ināianei ka haere tonu ngā whakakorenga ki te tīmatanga o Whiringa ā-Rangi nā te tūnga haere tonu o te 737 Max. Heoi anō, i tāpiritia e te umanga: "Kei te mōhio tonu a American Airlines ko ngā whakahōutanga pūmanawa e tata ana ki te Boeing 737 Max, tae atu ki ngā huānga whakangungu hōu e hangaia ana e Hēneti i runga i te hononga ki o mātau hoa uniana, ka ahu atu ki te whakamana anō o te rererangi i tēnei tau." Engari kai te whakahau tonu nga waka rererangi mo te rererangi. I te whakaaturanga rererangi o Parihi i tērā marama, i pānuitia e te Rōpū Rererangi Ao Whānui, nāna a British Airways, he mahere hei hoko i ngā waka rererangi 200 Max i te whakahekenga utu, e kīia ana ko "rererangi B737". Kāore anō a Boeing kia whakatūpato i ngā kaiwhakarite he nui ngā whakahōutanga ki ōna pūmanawa hei whakaū i te haumarutanga o te Max. A, i tērā marama ka kitea e te US Federal Aviation Administration, me whakaae anō ki ngā waka rererangi mō te rererangi, tētahi hēnga hou e whakaarohia ana e Hēneti tae noa ki te wā o Mahuru ki te whakatika.

title: Ko te hukarere o Te Motu o Tangata e ahu ana ki ngā katinga huarahi pō
summary: He maha ngā katinga huarahi o Te Motu o Tangata, nā te hukarere me ngā āhuatanga whakatio, ka noho tonu i te pō, kua whakaūngia e nga pirihimana.
text: E ono ngā huarahi tae atu ki te Huarahi Maunga A18 i waenganui i Ramsey Hairpin me te Creg-ny-baa e kore e whakatuwhera anō tae noa ki te 08:00 GMT i te Tūrei. E wātea ana tētahi rārangi whānui o ngā katinga huarahi i te whārangi Facebook o te Motu o Man Constabulary. Ka arotakea te huarahi whakamuri o Creg-ny-baa i te 15:00 GMT. I katia a Richmond Hill i tēnei ata i muri i te maunga o tētahi taraka ki te hukarere, engari mai i tērā wā ka whakatuwhera anō. I kī tētahi kaihautū hanganga e 6cm (2.3in) o te hukarere e tūmanakohia ana kia hinga ki ngā wāhi i runga ake i te 300ft i te Mane. E inoi ana nga pirihimana ki nga kaitaraiwa kia taraiwa i runga i te "tino whakatūpato". E ai ki te Tari Tūtaki, tērā pea he hukarere anō me te hukarere i mua, engari "kāore he mea taumaha". Kei te tuwhera noa te taunga rererangi o Ronaldsway, engari kei te tohutohutia ngā pāhihi kia whakapā atu ki tō rātou waka rererangi mō ngā whakahōutanga. He maha nga rerenga i waenganui i te Motu o Man me Manchester, London me Dublin kua takaware.

title: Ka tohe ngā tūkinotanga me ngā tūkinotanga i te kāinga kia pūrongotia ngā hara
summary: E karanga ana ngā pirihimana o Wiltshire kia nui ake ngā tūkinotanga o te tūkino i te kāinga me te taikaha ki te pūrongo i ngā hara.
text: E whakaatu ana ngā whika ka pūrongotia tētahi mahi tūkino i te kāinga ki ngā pirihimana i ia meneti puta noa i Ingarangi me Weera. Engari i kī tētahi kaikōrero tōpana o Wiltshire kāore i pūrongotia he maha ngā take i te takiwā, ka uaua ake te rutu i te raruraru. I kī a Det Sgt Ake Barstow tērā pea ka whakawāteatia ngā tūpāpaku nā ngā pōhēhētanga me pēhea te mahi i a rātou. I kī a Det Sgt Barstow, ko ia te kaiwhakarite hara nui o Wiltshire: "Kua mārama mātou ki te arotake i ā mātou tukanga i roto i ngā tau, he āpiha whakangungu motuhake tā mātou ki te mahi i ngā tūpāpaku, ā, ka mahi ngātahi hoki mātou me ā mātou hoa mahi hei āwhina ki te tautoko i ngā tāngata i roto i taua tukanga. " E whakahauhau ana mātou i ngā tūpāpaku katoa o te hīkaka me te tūkino kia haere mai ki ngā pirihimana me te pūrongo ki a mātau, ki tētahi hoa pono rānei, GP, ngā ratonga hōhipera, te pokapū tohutohu tūkino rānei i Swindon e kapi ana i tētahi tangata i Wiltshire hoki."

title: Ko ngā pepa mō te tangata heitara Profumo 'me tūmatanui'
summary: Ko te whakataunga kia puritia ngā tuhinga e pā ana ki tētahi tangata i waenganui i te heitara wahine o Profumo e hunaia ana, kua kī tētahi rōia tōmua.
text: Me tono te Komihana Mōhiohio kia whakakorea tētahi whakataunga a te National Archives kia hunaia ngā tuhinga mō te whakawātanga o Stephen Ward. Kei te mahia te tukunga e te rōia o Geoffrey Robertson QC. E whakapono ana i patua e Ward a ia anō i te mutunga o tana whakawātanga mo te noho i ngā moni whakarihariha. I te tau 1961, i whakamōhiotia e Ward, he kaiwaiata, he osteopath e noho ana i Rānana, te kōtiro waea rongonui, e 21 tau, o Christine Keeler ki te Hēkeretari o te Kāwanatanga mo te Pakanga, a John Profumo. I tīmataria e te minita rāua ko Ms Keeler - e whakaarotia ana hoki he pānga ki tētahi āpiti i te kāwanatanga o Rūhia, a Yevgeny Ivanov - i tīmataria he take. I te wā i whakamātauria, i te tuatahi ka whakakāhore a Profumo i te pātahitanga - engari i muri iho ka whakahaua kia whakaae kua teka a ia i Mati 1963, i roto i tētahi heitara i whakawehi ki te turaki i te kāwanatanga Rangatira o taua wā. E mōhiotia ana a Ward, e whakapono ana te tokomaha he tūkino i a ia i te rā whakamutunga o tana whakawātanga i te Bailey Tawhito, i reira i kitea ai he hara ki te noho i ngā moni whakarihariha a Ms Keeler me tōna hoa ko Mandy Rice-Davies, i kīia nei i te wā o te kēhi kōti he kairau. I kī a Tēnā Robertson, te kaituhi o Stephen Ward he Harakore, āe, kei te tono a ia nā te mea ko te pupuri i ngā tuhinga mō te whakawātanga o Ward e huna ana "he koretake, ā, ka waiho te painga tūmatanui me ngā painga o te hītori ki te kite i te pono mō te whakapae a Ward, e kitea whānuitia ana he matenga o te tika". 'Koati haere noa' I tāpiri mai a ia: "He mea hira te tuku i te tuhinga whakawā whai mana ki te mahi he aha i whiua ai a Ward, ā, māna e āwhina te take mo te tahuri i tōna whakapae." I whakakāhore te National Archives i te urunga a Tēnā Robertson ki te nuinga o tana kōnae i Ward, e whakapono ana kei roto ko ngā kōrero pirihimana i whakamahia hei whakahau i a ia ki te noho i ngā moni whiwhinga a Ms Keeler rāua ko Ms Rice-Davies. E tautohe ana a Tēnā Robertson i roto i tana pukapuka kāore tētahi wahine i te kairau, ā, i noho rāua tahi i ngā moni whiwhinga a Ward hei kaiwaiata wheua me te kaiwaiata whakaahua. I tēnei wā kua katia te kōnae i Ward mai i te tirohanga tūmatanui tae noa ki te tau 2046, nā te mea e 100 tau tēnei i muri i te whānautanga o Ms Rice-Davies, te pōtiki o ngā kaiwhakaatu whakawā. Kua tautuhia te Komihana Mōhiohio ki te whakatau kia kite mehemea ka taea te whakatuwhera i mua. E ai ki a Tēnā Robertson, "mā tēnei e maka he mārama hou hira ki tētahi o ngā matenga kino rawa o te tika i roto i te hītori o Ingarangi o nāianei, me te āwhina ki te whakamārama i te tikanga o Stephen Ward hei koati haere noa mō te take Profumo mā te whiu i a ia mō ngā hara kāore anō kia mahia e ia, e tētahi atu rānei". I kī tētahi kōrero mō ngā Pūranga ā-Motu kāore i te hiahia ki te tuku kōrero. I kī tētahi kōrero mō te Tari Komihana Mōhiohio kāore anō kia whiwhi i te tukunga a Tēnā Robertson.

title: Whakatūpato haumarutanga mō ngā pūnaha tautuhi anō waea Android
summary: Mā te whakamahi i te kōwhiringa "tautuhi anō wheketere" hei ūkui i ngā waea Android ka waiho pea he raraunga whai tikanga, ka whakatūpato i ngā tohunga haumarutanga.
text: Ka taka poto pea te taumahi tautuhi anō ina whakamahia hei ūkui mamao i tētahi waea kua ngaro, kua tāhaetia rānei, ka pūrongotia e ngā kairangahau o te Whare Wānanga o Cambridge. Mō tā rātou tātaritanga, i hokona e ngā kairangahau ngā waea Android kua whakamahia kia kite he aha te momo raraunga e toe ana i runga i ngā ringa waea. I ētahi wā ka tīkina e rātou ngā kōnae matua e āhei ai rātou ki te uru ki te pūkete Gmail o tētahi rangatira o mua. Ko te akoranga o ngā waea e 21, e whakahaere ana i ngā putanga Android 2.3 ki te 4.3, i kawea e Prof Etaka rāua ko Te Tari Pūtaiao rorohiko o te Whare Wānanga o Kemipiri. Ko te tikanga o ngā hē i kitea e rātou, tae atu ki te 500 miriona ngā pūrere Android ka mōrearea pea te waiho i ngā raraunga e wātea ana ki ngā kaihōia i muri i te tautuhi anō, ka whakatūpato ngā kairangahau i roto i tētahi pou rangitaki. "Ko te tikanga o ēnei hinganga ka taea e ngā kaimahi i ngā kamupene e whakahaere ana i ngā waea ringa tuarua (ahakoa ngaro, tāhaetia, hokona, hoatu rānei ki te aroha) te whakarewa i ētahi whakaekenga tauine mahi pono," ka kī rātau. Ko ngā hinganga matatini i muri i te tautuhi anō i te wheketere, ka kī rātau. I te nuinga o ngā waea i whakamātauria, i mahue ngā raraunga i hangaia e ngā taupānga mō WhatsApp me Facebook. Anō hoki, ka taea hoki te whakaora i ngā atahanga, ngā ataata me ngā karere kuputuhi. I roto i te 80% o ngā ringa waea Android, ka taea e ngā kairangahau e rua te tiki i tētahi kōnae hira e mōhiotia ana ko te "maimai matua" e whakamahia ana e Android hei tuku urunga waea ki ngā ratonga Google pēnei i Gmail. He rite tonu te wātea o ngā maimai mō ētahi atu ratonga, ka kī rātau. He matatini ngā take o ngā hinganga, e kī ana te tokorua, engari i puta mai ētahi nā te āhua o te hanganga o te pūmahara waea, ā, nā te mea kāore anō kia whakahōutia ngā pūmanawa hei whakarite kua mukua ngā raraunga. I whakapeka a Google ki te kōrero mō ngā kitenga. Heoi anō, kua whakaae te umanga rapu i te raruraru i mua, ā, kua whakamōhiotia ngā huringa ki ngā putanga maha o te Android kia tino hōhonu ake ai ngā tautuhi anō. I kawea mai e Android 3.0 tētahi tikanga ūkui pai ake hei ārai i te tiki raraunga. Kua kawea mai hoki ngā whakahōutanga ki te pūnaha tautuhi anō ki te Android 5.1 i tukua i te tīmatanga o tēnei tau. He maha ngā waea Android ināianei e whakamahi ana i te whakamunatanga hei whāwhā raraunga kia kore ai e taea te pānui ahakoa kua tīkina. Heoi anō, i kitea e ngā kairangahau o Kemipiri, i ētahi waea, ka āwhina ētahi atu kōnae ka taea e rātou te tiki ki tēnei raraunga kōaro.

title: Ka toa a Louis Smith i tētahi atu taitara Strictly Come Dancing
summary: Kua toa a Louis Smith i tana taitara tuarua o Strictly Come Dancing i muri i tana wikitōria i te motuhake o te Kirihimete 2014.
text: I te pō i hoki mai ai a Tā Bruce Forsyth ki te whakaaturanga, i toa i a Strictly i te tau 2012, i te pō i hoki mai ai a Tā Bruce Forsyth ki te whakaaturanga. I whiwhi a Hāne me te hoa ngaio o Aliona Vilani i te tapeke tino pai o te 40 piro mai i nga kaiwhakawā mo to rātau hīkoi tere ki Jingle Bells. I toa rātau i muri i te whakakotahitanga o ngā tapeke a ngā kaiwhakawā me te hunga whakarongo studio. I whakataetae a Smith ki ētahi atu tauwhāinga mai i ngā rangatū o mua - ko Rahera Stevens, ko Lisa Riley, ko Sophie Ellis-Bextor, ko Pirihi Hollins me Russell Grant. I kī te tau 25 tau mo tana toa: "He koha pai, e kore ahau e teka! He tino ngahau tā mātou ahakoa he uaua te wiki tuatahi o ngā whakamātautau. "Engari mai i taua wā kātahi anō mātou ka mātao, ka kata me te kata, ka whakararuraru i runga i te papa kanikani, he tino ngahau." I whāngaia e nga tauwhāinga me nga kaiwhakawā nga tūranga o nga pūāhua whakaaturanga. I hoki mai a Tā Bruce, nāna i whakararo hei kaihautū auau o te hōtaka i tēnei tau, ki te whakaatu i te whakaaturanga ki a Tess Daly, ā, ka waiata hoki i tētahi putanga o Winter Wonderland.

title: Ka tae ngā amuamu pirihimana ki te pūkete tiketike i Ingarangi me Uēra
summary: Tērā te maha o ngā amuamu ki ngā pirihimana i Ingarangi me Uēra i tērā tau, e whakaatu ana ngā whika.
text: E 37,105 ngā kēhi amuamu i whakapūketetia i te tau 2014-15, he whika mai i te Komihana Amuamu Pirihimana Motuhake (IPCC). E whakaatu ana ngā tau i te 6% te pikinga o te nui o ngā amuamu i mahia i te 2013-14, me ngā whika e tae ana ki tētahi pūkete tiketike mō te tuarua o nga tau e haere ana. Ko te amuamu tino pūnoa i mahia ko te "waihotanga, rahunga rānei i te mahi". I kī te IPCC i tētahi uiuinga i whakahaeretia i tērā tau e whakaatu ana i te ngākau tūmatanui i muri i te whakapā atu ki ngā pirihimana, ā, he nui ake te hiahia ki te amuamu. I kitea hoki ngā whika 'matatini rawa, maiorooro hoki' I kitea hoki e ngā whika: I pānuitia e Te Hēkeretari Kāinga o Ēnā Me tētahi arotakenga takitahi o te hanganga me te whakahaere a te IPCC i a Aotearoa. I kī a Dame Anne Owers, te manukura o te IPCC, i whakaaturia e ngā whika tētahi pūnaha amuamu "he matatini, he maiorooro hoki, ā, e mārama ana te kore e whakaae ki te tokomaha o ngā kaiwhakapae". Ka kī a ia: "E pōhiritia ana e mātou te mea e tono ana te kāwanatanga kia kawea mai he ture hei whakangāwari me te whakaraupapa i tētahi pūnaha e kore e whakaae ki te hunga e hiahia ana, ki te hunga rānei e hiahia ana ki te whakahaere." I tāpiritia e te Rangatira Tuarua o Te Kāhui Matua o Alan Goodwin, ko ia te kaiārahi ā iwi mō ngā amuamu: "E pirihimana ana mātau mā te whakaaetanga tūmatanui kia whakakino ai i ngā wā katoa ina pouri tētahi ki te ratonga kua whiwhi rātau. " He matatini te pūnaha mo te whakahaere amuamu, ā, ka ahu atu ki ngā maiorooro i waenganui i ngā ope. Kei te arotakea te pūnaha me te whāinga kia whakapai ake mō te hunga whai amuamu me ngā tōpana e whakahaere ana." 'He iti rawa' Ko te maha o ngā amuamu i mahia ki te kaitiaki e tohu ana i te nuinga o ngā mea kua whiwhi mai i te tīmatanga o te kohikohi raraunga i te tau 2004-05. I whakaaturia e tētahi wehenga ā-rohe i whakapūketetia e ngā Pirihimana o Staffordshire te pekenga ā-tau nui rawa atu i ngā amuamu, me te 66% e piki ana mai i te 310 i te 2013-14 ki te 516 i te 2014-15. Ko nga Pirihimana o Metropolitan, te ope nui rawa o te UK, te nuinga o ngā amuamu me te 6,828. Heoi anō, i heke iho tēnei tau i te 4% i te tau tōmua. I kī a Alex Duncan, te kaiārahi paerewa ngaio i te Tōpūtanga Pirihimana o Ingarangi me Weera, i "āwangawanga a ia i te roanga o te wā e taea ai te whakatika i ngā amuamu". Heoi anō, i kī a ia, i te pikinga o te maha o ngā amuamu, ka noho iti tonu te tokomaha o ērā i tautokona. I kī te minita pirihimana o Maika Penning: "I tēnei wā, e whakaatu ana ēnei whika, he matatini rawa, he puatakore, he kore urupare ki ngā kaiwhakapae me ngā āpiha."

title: Īnia 'kaitiaki kau': Hopukina i muri i te tohetohe a te tangata Mohimana
summary: Kua herea e nga pirihimana i te āhua o Kārihana ki te raki o Īnia tētahi tangata mo te matenga whakapae o tētahi tangata Mohimana e whakapae ana i a Hindu "kaitiaki parenga kau".
text: I te whakaekenga o to rātau waka i te Paraire, e kawe ana te tangata mate, a Ummar Kani, me ētahi atu tāngata tokorua. Kotahi te tangata i tino whara i te rerenga o te atekōkiri o te waka. E whakaaro ana nga Hindu he tapu nga kau, a, he mana kore mana te patu i a rātau i nga kōrero maha, tae atu ki a Kārihana. I kī tētahi pūrongo Mātaki Motika Tangata o nā noa nei, neke atu i te 10 ngā Pirihitini i patua i runga i te take mai i Me 2015. E whakapae ana nga mema o te whānau o Tāne Kani kua pūhia ia e tētahi māpu hūhū, ā, ka makaia tōna tinana ki tētahi ara rerewhenua pātata ki te taupoki i te patunga. Kāore anō kia whakaūngia e nga pirihimana mehemea he take tēnei o te "whakatūpato kau", engari i kī atu rātau ki te AO kua kitea e rātau e ono nga kau, ko tētahi o ēnei kua mate, i roto i te waka i whakaekea. I kī rātau e uiui ana rātau i te kōhurutanga o Tāne Kani i te taha o te amuamu o te "maunu kau" i tāpaetia ki nga tāngata tokotoru. Na te whakaeke i whakaoho te riri i roto i te iwi Mohimana o te rohe. "He patunga tēnei e nga kaitiaki kau," te kī a Moluna Hanif, te upoko o tētahi rōpū Mohimana paetata, ki a Rayan Bareth. I kī a ia kua kōrero a ia ki te tangata i whara, a Tahir, nāna i kī atu ki a ia kua whakaekea rātau e tētahi rōpū parenga kau. "He tino whakararuraru, ā, ki te kore nga pirihimana e hopu i ēnei tāngata, ka whakarewaina e mātau he whakahē," te tāpiri mai a Tēnā Hana. I patua tētahi kaiahuwhenua miraka kau, e 55 tau, a Pehlu Kani, ki te mate i Kārihana i Aperira mo te kawe kau i te mana kore.

title: Martin Lambie-Nairn: Ka mate te kaihoahoa i muri i ngā 'idents' rongonui o TE AO me te Hongere 4
summary: Kua mate a Mātini Lambie-Nairn, te kaihoahoa rongonui nāna i waihanga ngā "idents" kaingākau mō te BBC me te Channel 4, e 75 tau te pakeke.
text: I waihangatia e tana tohutohu hoahoa te moko "paraka" hākoritanga taketake o Channel 4 i te tau 1982 me ngā pūangi pūangi o te ao i whakamahia e BBC One mai i te 1997 ki te 2001. I hangaia hoki e tana kamupene ngā idents mahara mō TE RUA o TE RUA, ko tētahi o ēnei he peita kikorangi e tārewa whakapae ana puta noa i te mata ki te tuki i tētahi konganuku 2. Kātahi anō ka kitea a ia e kōrerorero ana i ana mahi i runga i te Oro o te Pouaka Whakaata a TE Whā. I pānuitia te matenga o Lambie-Nairn i te Rā Kirihimete e ML-N, te tohutohu i whakatūria e ia. I roto i tētahi kōrero, i whakaahuatia ia hei "tētahi o ngā kaihoahoa whakairoiro me ngā kaiwhakahaere auaha o tōna whakatupuranga". "Ko tana mahi whakaharahara, te atawhai me te wairua auaha pāhekoheko i pā ki te oranga o te tini o ngā tāngata," ka haere tonu te kōrero. "Ka tino mihi a ia ki ngā tāngata katoa i whai mana ki te mahi tahi i a ia i roto i ngā tau."
