I takoha hoki te rangatira hoahoa o Āporoiti o Mua, a Tā Jony Ive, e kī ana he "waimarie" a Lambie-Nairn i "tautuhi i tētahi wāhanga o taku whenua arokite e tipu ana". "He tino mārire, he whakaaro, he ātaahua hoki tana mahi mō te HAU," tana kī. "Ko ngā tuakiri e aia ana e te ātaahua, ehara i te rārangi take mākete, he tino ātaahua, he tino whai hua." Ko ētahi atu hua a Lambie-Nairn ko te whakaaturanga pepeha whakarihariha Spitting Image, nāna i waihanga tahi me John Lloyd, Roger Law me Peter Fluck. Nā Lambie-Nairn i huatau kia hangaia e Fluck rāua ko Law he whakaaturanga i runga anō i a rāua pakiwaituhi whakairo. Nā tēnei i puta ai ngā wāhanga o te whakaaturanga taketake, kātahi anō ka whakaorangia e te ratonga roma BritBox, e mau ana i te hua "Mai i tētahi tina taketake a Martin Lambie-Nairn". Ko ētahi atu tohu parani i whai ringa ai tana kamupene ko te moko mirumiru i whakamahia e te kamupene waea pūkoro O2. I whakahaeretia hoki e ia tētahi whakataetae Pita Kikorangi hei hoahoa i te tohu whaimana mo te tiupiri taimana a te Kuini i te tau 2012. I a ia e kōrero ana ki te AO i te tau 2013, ka kī a Lambie-Nairn ko ngā kaihoahoa pēnei i a ia "i roto i te umanga o te tautuhi hongere i a rāua anō". "Ko ngā tohu katoa e pā ana ki te wehe i a koe me te ngana ki te mārama ki tō hunga whakarongo, kiritaki rānei e tū ana koe mō tēnei huinga uara," ka haere tonu a ia. Ko te Ident he kupu umanga e whakamahia ana hei whakaahua i tētahi moko nekeneke e whakaaturia ana hei tāutu i tētahi hongere pouaka whakaata i waenga i ngā hōtaka. Whāia mātou i runga i Facebook, i Twitter @BBCNewsEnts rānei. Mēnā he huatau pūrākau tāu, īmēra entertainment.news@bbc.co.uk.

title: I whakahokia a Manuela Noriega ki Panama ki te mahi i ngā wā herehere
summary: Kua whakahokia te kaiārahi o Panama, a Manuel Noriega ki tōna whenua kāinga mai i Wīwī, a, ka mauria hāngai ki te whare herehere.
text: I tau tana waka rererangi ki Panama City i te ahiahi o te Rātapu i muri i tana rere mai i Parihi mā Madrid. I whakawāteatia a ia i te ngaro o ngā hara i mahia i tōna wā i te mana i nga tau kotahi mano e waru tekau mā rua. Neke atu i te 20 tau kē te pakeke e 77 tau i roto i ngā whare herehere i Wīwī me Te Hononga o Amerika. I tērā marama, ka whakaaetia e te kōti Wīwī tētahi tono mai i Panama kia whakahokia ia ki te kāinga kia hereheretia i runga i ōna whakapae mo te kōhuru, te hāmate me te tāhaetanga. I whai mana a ia ki te pīra, engari i kī ana rōia e hiahia ana ia ki te hoki ki Panama. Kua kī te Minita Ā-Rohe o Roberto Tahiti, ko te manakē a te kāwanatanga ko te whakaū i te haumarutanga o Noriega. I haere tahi a Noriega me tētahi tīma o ngā kaiwhakahaere o Panama, tae atu ki te rōia tianara o te whenua me tētahi tākuta. I muri i tōna taenga atu, ka arahina ia ki te whare herehere o El Renace, ki te tonga ki te rāwhiti o Panama City. Te kōhurutanga o ngā hoariri Ahakoa ehara a ia i te perehitini, i noho a Tianara Manuel Noriega hei kaiārahi moe maori o Panama i waenganui i te 1983 ki te 1989. I tētahi wā he urunga o Amerika, i hopukina ia e te whakaariki i ngā hōia o Amerika i te Hānuere 1990, i waenganui i ngā whakaaro kua hurihia e ia te iwi o Amerika Waenganui hei pokapū hokohoko rongoā. E 20 tau a ia i roto i te whare herehere i te US i muri i tana whakawāteatanga i reira mo nga whakapae. I te tau 2010, i whakahokia ia mai i te US ki Wīwī, i reira i whakawāteatia ai ia i te ngaro o te horoi moni mai i ngā rōpū rongoā o Kōpia mā tētahi pēke Wīwī ki te hoko rawa i Parihi. I whiwhi a ia i tētahi whiu whare herehere e whitu tau mai i te kōti Wīwī. I Panama anō, e toru nga wā herehere e 20 tau a ia mo nga hara i mahia i roto i tana ture, tae atu ki nga kōhurutanga o nga hoariri tōrangapū. Heoi anō, kāore tonu i te mārama mēnā ka noho tonu a ia ki te whare herehere, i te mea ka whakaaetia e Panama ngā tāngata e 70 tau te pakeke, ki runga ake rānei ki te mahi i a rātau whiu i te kāinga.

title: Te nehunga o te tokorua o Dambusters: E hia rau e manaaki ana
summary: I puritia he rerenga rererangi i te wā e haere ana ngā rau ki te nehunga o tētahi kaipūkaha Dambusters me tana wahine, i mate i roto i te 10 rā o tētahi.
text: Ko Victor rāua ko Edna Barnett, nō Telford, i roto i te Royal Air Force (RAF), ā, e 68 tau rāua i mārena. Kāore ā rāua tamariki, ā, kāore ētahi atu whanaunga ora, e akiaki ana i te RAF ki te tono kia haere te tangata ki tā rātou ratonga i Telford Crematorium. Ka kawea e nga kaimahi mahi o rātau kāwhena ki roto i te whare karakia. I kī a Rev Lee Plummer, nāna i whakahaere te ratonga: "He tino rawe te kite i te tini o ngā tāngata e haere ana mai i tawhiti kāore i mōhio ki a rātou, e hiahia ana ki te whakanui i tētahi tokorua i mahi nui rawa mō tētahi ki tētahi, mō tō mātou whenua hoki." Ko ngā rongo hou me ngā whakahōutanga hou mai i te West Midlands Mr Barnett, e mōhiotia ana ko VJ, e 101 ana, a, i mate i te 21 o Hakihea, i te wā i mate a Mrs Barnett, 91 tau, i te Pō o te Tau Hōu. I uru atu a Tēnā Barnett ki te ope rererangi i te tau 1937 hei kaipūkaha hihiani, i mua i te tuaruatanga ki te matua 617 hei wāhanga o tētahi tīma pūkaha e whakarite ana i ngā pomu o Te Rūnanga mō te mahi. I mahi a Mrs Barnett i waenganui i te tau 1944 me te 1950, e mahi ana i te mana waka rererangi i te Ope Rererangi Āwhina a te Wahine. Tērā pea ka hiahia koe ki: I tūtaki tuatahi rāua i te tau 1944, i mua i te wehenga o te pakanga, ā, ka tūtaki anō i te tau 1949 i mua i to rāua mārenatanga i te tau i muri mai. I whakamōhio atu tētahi hoa o te tokorua, a Steve Payne, mai i Hadley, ki te RAF i to rāua matenga. Ka kī a ia: "I whakaaro noa ahau he maha, he tokomaha ngā hōia pakanga tawhito e noho ana i roto i ngā kāinga nēhi, ā, ko rātou anō, e kore rawa e whakahonoretia i te huarahi e tika ana kia mahia e rātau mo to rātau whenua. " I whakaaro ahau, kāo, i tēnei take, e hiahiatia ana he mea motuhake." Whāia a BBC West Midlands i Facebook, i Twitter, me te waitohu mō ngā whakahōutanga rongokōrero paetata hāngai tonu ki tō waea.

title: Ka whakawhiwhia e Princes William rāua ko Harry ngā Tohu Taiana ki te rangatahi
summary: E rua tekau ngā rangatahi kua hoatu ki tētahi tohu hou i whakatūria hei whakamaharatanga ki a Taiana, Pirinihi o Weera.
text: I whakawhiwhia e te Ariki o Cambridge rāua ko Prince Harry ngā Tohu Tawhito ki ngā tamariki me ngā taiohi mō te waihanga i te huringa pāpori pai i roto i ō rātou hapori. I haere mai ngā kaiwhiwhi mai i UK, Te Hononga o Amerika, Kānata, Īnia, Belize me Ngā Ariki Arāpia. I takoha te Ariki ki tōna whaea, e kī ana kei te whakaawe tonu a ia i "ngā mahi aroha me te toa". I te āhua tuatahi rāua ko Piriniha Harry i tētahi takahanga e whakahaeretia ana e te Whakawhiwhinga Taiana, i whakatūria hei whakatoko i te whakapono o to rāua whaea ki te mana tōrunga o te rangatahi. Ko ngā toa whakawhiwhinga ko tētahi taitamariki mai i Te Raki o Aotearoa, nāna i whakatū he karapu kaukau mō ngā rangatahi hauā. Ko Jemima Browning, 16, nāna i tīmata a Tadcaster Stingrays, i whakaaetia e tōna tuakana ko Will, 14, he Down Syndrome. I kī a ia i ētahi wā ka pā ki a ia ngā ārai ki te whakataetae i te tākaro nā ōna hauātanga me te tautoko tāpiri e hiahiatia ana e ia. "Ehara i te mea tūturu, he tino rerekē te āhua nei kāore au e tika ana ki tētahi mea whakamīharo pēnei," tana kī. "He tino hōnore noa iho te tū i mua i ngā tāngata whakamīharo e rua e mōhiotia ana puta noa i te ao, ā, kāore au e tino whakapono." Ka kī te Ariki o Kemipiri: "E tino koa ana mātou kei te whakamahia pai te ingoa o o mātau whaea mā te Whakawhiwhinga Taiana." I tīpakohia ngā toa mai i tētahi poipoi o ngā tautapa e tētahi pae whakawā takitahi e tūtakina ana e Dame Julia Cleverdon, te kaiwhakarewa o Step Up To Serve. I roto i te pae ko Julia Samuel, Patron of Child Bereavement UK me te hoa o Princess Diana, me te kaiwhakahauhau o Baroness Lawrence OBE. Ko te hunga i whiwhi tohu (tae atu ki a Jemima) ko:

title: Ngā Tirohanga: Ka aha koe ki tō Pi?
summary: Ko te Raspberry Pi, he rorohiko iti i whakarewaina i tērā wiki, kua karangatia hei pūrere e āwhina ana i ngā tamariki kura o Ingarangi ki te whakapai ake i tō rātou mōhiotanga ki te papatono me te pūtaiao rorohiko.
text: Nā Julian JoyceBBC News Engari ka kī taurangi hoki te Pi ki te tīmata i te hurihanga rorohiko tuarua. Rite tonu ki te āhua o te taupānga i taea ai e te tokomaha ngā tāngata te whakarite i ā rātou rorohiko, mā ngā hua hōu pēnei i te Pi e āhei ai ngā kaihanga me ngā kaiwhakawhanake ki te waihanga i ā rātou ake pūmārō. Ko Eben Upton rāua ko Pita Lomas ngā kaihanga tahi o te Pi, ā, ināianei kei te mahi tahi me te rōpū kore hua - te Raspberry Pi Foundation - e mākete ana. I konei ka hoatu e rātau ō rātou urupare mō ētahi o ngā whakaaro. Eben Upton says: "When we first started developing the Pi, we never imagined the range of applications that people would find for it, and how willing people would be to share their ideas and detailed designs with the community. " Ahakoa ko te Tauira B e tino aro atu ana ki ngā kaiwhakawhanake pūmanawa, he aha te mea whakamere ko te maha o ngā kaupapa pūmārō e whakaahuatia ana i konei e tino hāngai ana ki te putanga Tauira A māmā ake, hiko iti hoki." E kī ana tētahi 'carputer' o Kete Teina o Carrickfergus: "E hiahia ana ahau ki te whakamahi i taku Pi hei pūtake o tētahi kākahu (rorohiko motokā) i roto i tētahi motokā hākinakina o te tau 1980. Kua hangaia kētia e au taku ake matapā 7in e tika ana kia mahi tahi me te Pi i a au e whakamatau ana i runga i tētahi rorohiko e whakahaere ana i a Fedora. "Ko te atanga ki ngā pūoko pūkaha nāku ake hoahoa i runga anō i tētahi pūmana moroiti PIC, ā, ka whakawhiti kōrero ki te Pi mā te USB. " Kei te kimi ahau ki te tuhi i te pūmanawa ki Gambas, he reo momo Visual Basic mō Linux. Kua tuhia kētia e au ētahi o tēnei." He rite tonu te ariā o "Gerits" mai i ngā wānanga Raspberry Pi. Ka tuhituhi a ia: "E ngana ana ahau ki te waihanga i tētahi pūnaha whakangahau i roto i te motokā. Ka hangaia te Pi ki tētahi wāhi i muri i te paemana, ā, ka whakahaeretia mā tētahi waea Android mā te bluetooth, wi-fi rānei. "Kua tīmata kē ahau i te mahi papatono. Kei te waihanga ahau i tētahi pūpāpāho pūoro i mua mō te purei pūoro, ā, ka tāpiri i ētahi āhuahira hei whakawhiti pūoro mā te bluetooth/wi-fi." Eben Upton: "Ko ngā kākahu tētahi o ngā huatau tino pai i runga i ā mātou wānanga. He pai ki ahau te mahere a Glenn mō te tūhono ki tētahi pūmana moroiti; ahakoa kei a Pi ētahi āheinga whakawhitiwhiti taketake, mā tēnei e āhei ai ia ki te tūhono i te maha o ngā pūoko tairitenga me ngā pūoko mamati i te tino māmā. E hiahia ana ahau ki te mōhio me pēhea te tūhono o te matapā ki te Pi; Mēnā kua mōhio ia me pēhea te mahi i tēnei mā te māmā, ā, ka taea e ia te tiritiri i ngā taipitopito tuihono, tērā pea ka pā ki ōna ringa. Tērā pea he pai ake te whakamahi i te wi-fi hei whakawhiti kōrero ki te Pi; Ka kitea e ia tētahi rārangi o ngā whāurutau e tautokona ana i konei." Peter Lomas: "He tino whakamere te whakaaturanga matapā, ā, ko te whakaputa i ētahi atu mōhiohio mō tēnei he tāpiritanga mīharo ki ā mātou wānanga kaiwhakawhanake. He nui ake te rongo mōhiohio a Gerits, engari ka hiahiatia e ia ētahi tāpiri-ake ruarua hei whakatutuki i ana whāinga." E kī ana tētahi teihana huarere "Sharix" mai i Slovenia i ngā wānanga Raspberry Pi: "Kei te whakaaro ahau ki te hanga i tētahi teihana huarere i runga anō i te Raspberry Pi. I te tuatahi ka whai pūoko pāmahana, pūoko pēhanga hau, pūoko hauhau, pūoko tere hau me tētahi kāmera tukutuku. "Ā muri ake ka tāpirihia e au he photodiode, tētahi mea ōrite rānei mō te inenga mārama, te aronga hau, ā, tērā pea ētahi atu pūoko." Eben Upton: "Ko tētahi atu ariā tino pai, pēnei i te pūmanawa a Kete ka whai hua mai i te tūhono i tētahi pūmana moroiti hei whakahaere i ngā tāurunga mai i ngā pūoko maha. Ahakoa ka taea pea e Sharix te hanga i tētahi mea pēnei mā te whakamahi i tētahi pūmana moroiti māna anō, mā te tāpiri i tētahi Pi e whakangāwari te tukanga whanaketanga, ā, ka tuku i a ia ki te mono mai i tētahi mata mō te patuiro i runga i te wāhi mēnā ka hē ngā mea. Kāore au i te mōhio he pēhea te mātao o Horowinia i te hōtoke, engari tērā pea ka hiahia ia ki te whakaaro mō te ārai i te papa kia kore ai mātou e whakatio." Peter Lomas: "Koinei pea te whakamahinga tino 'mā' o te Pi i runga i te rārangi. He ngāwari noa iho te atanga o te nuinga o ngā pūoko ki te tairitenga tika ki ngā kaitahuri mamati i runga i tētahi pahi rangatū. Kāore a ia e kī me pēhea te whakahiko i te Pi, engari mā te pūtau kōmaru me ngā pāteri ka taea te mahi, ahakoa ka hiahiatia ētahi hoahoa tūpato o te ara iahiko hiko." Kua tīmata tētahi teihana reo irirangi tuihono o Djyorkie mai i ngā wānanga Raspberry Pi ki te hanga i tētahi teihana reo irirangi tuihono i runga i te pūtea iti, mā te whakamahi i te Pi hei pokapū pāpāho. Ka tuhituhi a ia: "Ko te kaupapa ko te hanga i te teihana mā te whakamahi i te £45 noa iho i roto i te 45 rā, arā, ko te whakauru i ngā pūmārō, pūmanawa, mokowā tukutuku, roma... ko ngā mea katoa. "Nō tēnei wā, kua taea e au te whiwhi ingoa rohe, mokowā tukutuku, he maha ngā jingles ngaio, me te āwhina mai i tētahi pae ki te hanga i tētahi taupānga android hei whakarongo hoki. " E whakaaro ana ahau ki te whakamahi i tētahi Pi hei pokapū mō te teihana, i te nuinga o te mea he iti, ā, ko tōna whakapaunga hiko iti me te turituri iti, ko te tikanga ka taea e au te whakahaere i runga i te aunoa 24/7 me te mono noa iho ki taku pouaka whakaata hei mahi i ngā whakaaturanga ora i ētahi wā." Eben Upton: "I kōrero ahau ki a Djyorkie i mua tata nei mō tana kaupapa, ā, kei te tino tūmanako ahau ki te kite i taua mea. Nā te mea he ngū te Pi, ā, he iti iho te hiko e pau ana i te wā e haere ana i te maha o ngā pouaka whakaata e tūtatari ana, he tokomaha ngā tāngata ka waiho kia kā i ngā wā katoa. Kua kaha te tīma pūmanawa ki te whakarite i te pūnaha kia tino pūmau ai te pūnaha kia taea ai te whakahaere mō ngā wiki i te whārōrō me te kore whakaara anō." Pita Lomas: "Kāore anō a Djyorkie kia nui te kōrero mō tana hiahia ki te tāhopu, ki te penapena rānei i ngā rauemi. E tika ana ka tutuki i te Pi tana tūmanako mo te hiko iti. Ka taea te hanga i tētahi tāurunga ororongo tika mō te Pi mā te tauranga tāuru/huaputa whānui. Ka taea hoki e ia te waihanga i tētahi tēpu whakaranu me te whakatika taketake. Mō te huaputa ororongo, kāore pea i te tino pai te kounga oro o te huaputa tīwharawhara i runga i te papa, engari mō te aroturuki ka taea e ia te whakamahi i te atanga HDMI, te takahuri rānei i tōna ake. Mēnā e paingia ana ihirangi, kāore au i te tino mōhio me pēhea te pupuri o te tūmau tukutuku, engari te āhua nei kei te hiahia ia ki te whakamahi i te mokowā tukutuku mō tērā." Ka tuhituhi tētahi pūmana karetao a Stefan, mai i Knivsta i Huitene ki te BBC: "E hiahia ana ahau ki te waihanga i tētahi piriti i waenganui i a Lego Mindstorm me Raspberry Pi kia nui ake ai te hiko rorohiko, mā reira ka tere ake taku tukatuka i ngā mea pēnei i ngā atahanga, ērā atu mea, me te whāngai anō ki te robot Lego Mindstorm hei mahi. " Kia whiwhi rā anō ahau i te Raspberry Pi, kāore au i te tino mōhio ko ēhea ngā wāhanga e hiahiatia ana e au. E whakapono ana ahau he kete pūoko mai i te mindsensors.com, i te hitechnic.com rānei ka nui hei waihanga i tētahi piriti i waenganui i te Raspberry Pi me te Mindstorm NXT. "E pā ana ki te pūmanawa he tino pai ahau ki te pūmanawa mārō leJOS mō te NXT. Mō te Raspberry Pi ka whakamahia e au tētahi reo papatono e āhei ai ahau ki te uru ngāwari ki te pane tāuru/huaputa. "He nui aku whakaaro me aha te Robot me te Raspberry Pi. Ko te mea tuatahi ka hangaia e au ko tētahi kaitā kuputuhi karetao NXT ka taea te tuhi pū pū mā te pene. "A, koinei te wāhi e whakamere ai. Kei te hiahia ahau ki te whakamahi i te Raspberry Pi me tētahi kāmera tukutuku USB kua mau, ā, ka tuhi i tētahi taupānga e āhei ana ki te āhukahuka kanohi. Ina mōhiotia tētahi tangata, ka whakawhitia te ingoa o tēnei tangata ki runga i te piriti ka huri te NXT hei kuputuhi." Eben Upton: "He nui te pūmanawa NXT i tuhia e tētahi hoa, nā reira kei te whakaaro kē mātou me pēhea te hono i tētahi Pi. Ki taku whakaaro me mahi ngā huatau a Stefan, ahakoa he mea uaua ki te mahi. E tūmanako ana mātou kia kite i te nui o tēnei momo mea, e whakamahia ai te Pi hei tāpiri i te āheinga tukatuka tāpiri ki ngā pūnaha rongonui, engari he iti iho te kaha pēnei i a Mindstorms me Arduino. Te āhua nei ka whai hua te mahere āhukahuka kanohi mai i tētahi papa tāpiri-ake kāmera, i te pi moroiti rānei i kōrerotia e au i mua; Me whiwhi tātau ki tēnā." Peter Lomas: "He ariā tino whakamere te hono i te kaha o te Pi ki Mindstorms. E kite ana mātou i te hangarau atahanga me te kāmera hei ariā matua. Mā te hononga whakawhiti e āhei ki te whānui o ngā wāhanga karetao me ngā pūoko. Kei te tauranga tāuru/huaputa te momo atanga tika kia ngāwari ai ngā tūhononga whakawhiti, ā, mā te hiko rorohiko 'tuwhera' me te tūhonotanga o te Pi e whakarato i ētahi huarahi mana mamao whakamere. Ka taea e Stefan te whakaaro ki te whakamahi i ngā Pis e rua me te whakawhanake i tētahi hononga ahokore kia taea ai e tana robot te pūkoro takitahi me te whakawhiti kōrero ki te ao."

title: Ka hāmenetia e nga kaimahi o Te Wānanga a Tepco mo te utu mōrearea kāore anō kia utua
summary: Kua whakahaua e ngā kaimahi e whakakore ana i te tipu karihi o Tiapanī tōna kaiwhakahaere Tokyo Electric (Tepco) mō te utu mōrearea kāore anō kia utua.
text: E tono ana nga tāngata tokowhā mo te 65m iene (£375,000; $620,000) hei utu tāpiri. E kī ana rātau kua kore rawa te utu mo te tango otaota tāhae me te whakahaere i te tipu i ngā mōrea e pā ana. Ko te wā tuatahi tēnei i anga atu ai a Tepco ki ngā mahi ā-ture mai i ngā kaimahi o Te Wānanga mō te utu me ngā here mahi. E kī ana a Rupert Wingfield-Hayes o TE AO ki te toa rātau, ka taea e ia te tautuhi he tauira mō ngā mano o ētahi atu kaimahi kia haere mai ki mua. I whakaputaina te kōti e ngā kaimahi tokorua o nāianei me ngā kaimahi o mua i Te Wānanga. Kāore he kōrero ināianei a te kamupene taputapu Hapanihi. "Tērā pea ka tūkinotia tōku hauora i tētahi rā," ka whakahuatia tētahi o nga kaimahi ki te kōrero ki te kaipānui Hapanihi NHK. "E whakapono ana ahau he tokomaha ngā tāngata kāore e taea te kōrero mō tēnei momo raruraru. " Tērā pea ka panaia ahau, kāore rānei he mahi anō. Engari e tūmanako ana ahau ka tangohia tēnei e te tangata hei wā hei kōrero me te utu." I muri i te rū nui me te tsunami i Mati 2011, ka tukitukia ngā pūnaha whakamātao rea i te tipu. Na te turuturu o muri mai i kore ai e taea te noho i ngā wāhi karapoti huri noa i te tipu. Tekau mano tāngata i wehe i o rātau kāinga me ō rātou umanga nā te tāhaetanga iraruke, ā, kāore tonu e taea e te nuinga te hoki ki te kāinga. E whakahaeretia ana te pānga e Tepco, kua pau i a ia te nuinga tāra ki te whakapai me te whakakore i te tipu. Tata ki te 6,000 ngā tāngata e mahi ana i te tipu i ia rā i roto i ngā marama e rua kua taha, ā, e tono ana te kōti kia utua hāngai rātau e Tepco, e te kāwanatanga rānei. Heoi anō, he tokomaha e whakamahia ana e ngā kaikirimana me ngā kaikirimana iti. E kī ana to mātau korero kōrero kua roa ngā amuamu kāore i te utu tika i a rātau kaimahi, me ngā whakaaro e tūhono ana ētahi ki ngā rōpū hara o Yakuza o Tiapanī. E kī ana te kōti e whai hua ana ngā kaikirimana i ngā moni i whakaritea mō te whakakorenga i te utu o ngā kaimahi. I kī te rōia e whakarite ana i te kēhi mō ngā kaimahi o Te Wānanga, e rua neke atu rānei ngā tāngata e tūmanakohia ana kia uru ki te kōti. I tērā marama ka whakahaua e tētahi atu kōti a Tepco kia utu tūkino ki te whānau o tētahi whakawhitiwhiti, a Hamako Watanabe, nāna i whakamate i a ia i muri i tana whakahau kia wehe i tōna kāinga nā te tāhaetanga iraruke.

title: E tāpae ana ngā kōrero a Pakitāne i ngā wehenga o Te Rangitahi
summary: Tērā ētahi tohu e whakararuraru ana te Pirimia hou o Nawaz Ngaha i roto i nga rārangi o te Huinga o Hōia.
text: Ko te Tehrik-e-Huinga Pakitāne (TTP) he rōpū hāmarara o ngā rōpū tinihanga e whawhai ana ki ngā ope hōia me te whakaeke i ngā ūnga i Pakitāne. I pōhiritia e tētahi whakapuakitanga tūmatanui i tērā wiki e tētahi toa matua, a Asmatullah Muawiya, te tono a Tēnā Ngaha. Ko te mea hou rawa i roto i ngā rangatū o ngā tohutohu e arotahi ana ki te mau mai i ngā whakaekenga tinihanga i Pakitāne i mua i te putanga mai o te NATO i Awhekenetāna i te tau 2014. Heoi anō, kāore e taea e ēnei whanaketanga te heke iho i ngā mahi tinihanga i Awhekenetāna - he maha ngā rōpū tinihanga i Pakitāne kua roa te ātete ki te whakaeke i ngā ūnga i te whenua, e whakawhāiti kē ana i a rātau ngohe ki Awhekenetāna. Ko te upoko o Tēnā Muawiya i te rōpū o Junood-e-Hafsa o nga toa o Te Rangitahi o te kawanatanga Punjab o Pakitāne, e kiia nuitia ana ko te Huinga Punjabi. E whai wāhi ana ki te TTP, ā, i whakaingoatia e tētahi kaikōrero TTP i te wā o June, i te mea i mahia te whakaekenga i patua ai e 10 ngā kaipiki kē i Nanga Parbat i Pakitāne ki te raki. I te 22 o Aotearoa, ka whiwhi ngā kaipānui i te taone ki te raki o Dera Wānanga Kani i tētahi kōrero i hainatia e Tēnā Wānanga i reira i whakamihi ai ia ki te "mātauranga tōrangapū" a te Pirimia o Ngaha mo te tuku kōrero rangimārie ki nga kaiwhakawhanake. Engari te āhua nei ehara te katoa o te TTP i te ngākau nui ki a ia. I roto i tētahi kōrero āta kōrero i te rā a tērā rā, ka kī te TTP ahakoa "e manaakitia ana e Tēnā Muawiya mātau", ināianei kāore ōna pātahitanga tika ki te rōpū, ā, ka "wawe" te tīpako a te kaunihera ārahi i tētahi upoko hou o tōna ūpoko Punjab. I roto i tētahi whakahoki kōrero i ngā haora noa iho i muri iho, ka kī atu a Tēnā Muawiya ki te Pēhi Pāhono "kāore he kaha" o te TTP ki te pana i a ia nā te mea he rōpū motuhake te Huinga Punjabi me tōna ake tikanga hei whakatau i te ārahi me ētahi atu take. Ko tētahi kaiwhaiwhai o mua o te rōpū toa o Jaish-e-Moamina (JM), e whakapono ana ētahi ki ētahi he hononga ki al-Mōrea. I neke a ia ki te rohe ā iwi ki te raki o Pakitāne o Waziristan i te tau 2007, ā, ka whakatūria tōna ake rōpū Junood-e-Hafsa (JH). Kua kī a ia nā te mea kāore te kaiārahi JM i whakaae ki te whakangungu i a rātau pū ki te kāwanatanga o Hōia i muri i te "whawhaitanga" i te WhareNui Whero o Iharaira i te tau 2007, i te wā neke atu i te 100 ngā tāngata - ko te nuinga o ngā kaiwhakawhanake, engari he tokomaha hoki ngā tauira tāne me ngā tauira wahine o tētahi kura whakapono - i patua i roto i te mahi hōia ki te pana i te tini o ngā kaiwhakawhanake taumaha. I ngā tau e whai ake nei, ka puta mai a Tēnā Muawiya hei kaiārahi Punjabi Huinga hira e whai mana ana ki ngā rōpū Punjabi maha pēnei i te rōpū whakawhitiwhiti o Lashkar-e-Jhangvi, me te rōpū tinihanga i arahina e Te Wānanga o Aotearoa - tētahi atu kaingākau aroha ki a al-Mōrea e whakapono ana ngā pirihimana kua uru ki te whakapae i te 2008 o te Hōtēra Marriott i Iharaira, neke atu i te 50 ngā tāngata. E kī ana ngā pūtake i roto i ngā rārangi o Te Rangitahi i roto i to rātau pā o Waziristan, ko te hiahia o Tēnā Muawiya ki te whakakore i tana karanga tōmua mo te whawhai ki Pakitāne i te wā e kohikohi ana ngā karanga mo te rangimārie i roto i Pakitāne i waenganui i te iwi toa. E kī ana ngā kōrero kōrero ko ngā rōpū matua e toru o te rohe - ko te rōpū i ārahitia e Te Rūnanga o Ko te kaunihera ārahi nui o ngā rōpū tinihanga katoa i Waziristan, e kiia nei ko te Shura-e-Maraqebat, e taunaki ana hoki i te rangimārie ki a Iharaira. E ārahina ana te kaunihera e ngā rōpū o Pūkeirangi, ā, tokorua ōna mema mai i aua rōpū hōia katoa e ohauru ana ki te ārahitanga o M. Omar, te upoko wairua o te nekeneke o te Huinga i te rohe. Tērā anō ētahi huānga i roto i te TTP e manako ana i tētahi mahi rangimārie ki a Iharaira, pēnei i te rōpū i arahina e te kaiārahi tuarua o mua o te rōpū whakahaere, o Kupenga Wānanga Pūkaha. I hangaia e Tēnā Pūkaha he rerekētanga nui ki te rangatira o Te Wānanga o Te I tere tonu te whakakore a Tēnā Mehsud i te tāpaetanga i te matenga o Tēnā Pūhara i roto i tētahi tānga taiapa i te wā o Me. Engari e kī ana ngā pūtake i waenganui i te Huinga kei te huri tonu ngā mea i Waziristan nā ngā whanaketanga nui e rua, o nā noa nei hoki. E rua ngā hui a te rōpū katoa i puritia e te Rōpū ā Iwi o Te Rōpū ā Iwi o Te Rōpū Ā Iwi o Te Rōpū ā Iwi o T I haere mai ngā hui e rua e tata ana ki ngā rōpū tōrangapū nui me ngā kaumātua hapori mai i ngā rohe ā iwi o Hōia, tae atu ki te rohe o Waziristan. E kī ana ngā pūtake kua pā nga hui ki te miramira i te "huakore" o te whawhai i Pakitāne, ā, kua whakahaua te tautoko mo te rangimārie i nga rohe ā iwi. Ko te whanaketanga tuarua e pā ana ki ngā whakaritenga muna, tōtika i waenganui i ngā māngai o te kāwanatanga me ngā kaiārahi TTP. I kī atu tētahi kaiārahi tūturu o Te Rangitahi ki te AO i runga anō i te ingoamuna kua puritia ngā kōrero tuatahi i runga i ngā take maha, tae atu ki te mutunga o ngā whakaekenga whakawhitiwhiti i Pakitāne, me te wetewete o te TTP mai i ngā rōpū toitū kē atu pērā i a al-Mōrea me Lashkar-e-Jhangvi. I whakaūngia hoki e tētahi mana matua o Hōia ki te AO e haere ana aua kōrero. E kī ana ngā kaiwhakahaere o Te Rangitahi kei te nui haere te pēhanga i runga i ngā rōpū anō o Pakitāne ki te whakawhiwhi i tētahi mahi rangimārie ki a Iharaira. E whakapono ana rātau, mā tēnei e whakaū te haumarutanga o o rātau kaiārahi me ngā kaiwhaiwhai, i a rātau e whakawātea ana i a rātau mō ngā mahi i Awhekenetāna ina wehe atu ngā hōia NATO. I roto i tēnei āhuarangi rangirua, e kore e mōhiotia kia pakaru ngā pakanga papa whenua i waenganui i ngā wehenga TTP rerekē - tae atu ki tērā i arahina e Tēnā Muawiya - i te wā e ngana ana te katoa ki te whakaū i o rātau tūnga i mua i tētahi mahi e taea ana. Engari he rautaki mōrearea - kua whakapaea kētia ia e tētahi mana o Te Rangitahi ki te whakatakoto wawe i ana kāri. E kore e kore e piri i muri i te hinengaro o Tēnā Muawiya, ko te mea kei te whakahaeretia a Pakitāne ināianei e te whānau o Nawaz Ngaha - e rite ana ki a ia tōna pūtake hiko i Punjab. Te āhua nei e hiahia ana a ia ki te whai painga nui i tētahi mahi rangimārie. Engari ka whakaū te wehewehenga o ngā rōpū anō o Pakitāne i roto i te TTP i te rangimārie i Pakitāne? Te āhua nei ko te rautaki o Hōia tonu ko te wehe i te Huinga "kino" i te hunga e taea ana te whakaaetia, te tautoko puku rānei. Kāore anō tēnei kaupapahere kia mahi i roto i ngā tau e 10 kua taha, ā, kāore i te mōhio mēnā ka mahi ināianei.

title: Ko te poari o te Rōpū Co-op he 'mahi', e kī ana a Myners
summary: Me whāngai e te Rōpū Mahi Tahi tētahi poari iti ake, ā, me arotahi ki te whai hua kia ora ai, e ai ki tētahi arotakenga nui o te rōpū 150 tau.
text: The report by former City minister Lord Myners says the group's current board is "manifestly dysfunctional". E tūtohu ana a ia kia whakakapia ki tētahi poari iti iho i hangaia e ngā tāngata whai wheako pakihi. I kī te Co-op kua tukua ki te "whakahou tawhiti me te tino taketake". 'Aitua pakihi' i kī atu a Ariki Myners ki te HAU: "Kua ngaro i te rōpū te hawhe o tōna wāriu kupenga i roto i ngā tau e whā kua hipa, tata ki te £3.5bn o te horo rawa. " Ko tētahi o ngā aitua pakihi nui a te motu, ā, kei te ārahina e tētahi poari e kore e taea - nā te kore wheako - ki te pupuri i a rātou." I roto i tana rīpoata, ka kī a Ariki Myners: "Me wawe tonu te tango i ngā whakataunga toitū mo te hanganga whakahaere - me te taumira - mēnā ka tiakina te Co-op, e ai ki taku whaea." I whakarerea e Te Ariki Myners i te poari Co-op i Aperira i muri i ana huatau mo te whakahou i te hanganga rangatōpū o te rōpū i oma ki te ātete mai i ngā kaitautoko o tōna tauira tahi. I whakaritea e te Rōpū Mahi Tahi te pūrongo mai i a Ariki Myners, engari kāore i te herea ki te mahi i runga i ngā huatau. At its annual general meeting on 17 May, eligible members will be asked to vote on a resolution which the Co-op says provides a framework for governance reform, and echoes Lord Myners' recommendations. "Ko tētahi taumira e whā ngā mātāpono matua mō te whakahōu e hoatu ana ki ngā mema i tētahi Hui Nui i Me, ā, mā mātou e hanga mai i reira kia whakaritea ai e mātou ngā huringa tika," te kī a te tūru o te Rōpū Mahi Tahi a Ursula Lidbetter. Neke atu i te 100 ngā mema e āhei ana ki te pōti, tae atu ki ōna mema o te poari ā-rohe me ngā mema o ōna Rōpū Mahi Tahi takitahi. I puta mai te pūrongo i ngā rā tata nei i muri i te Rōpū Mahi Tahi, e whakahaere ana i ngā umanga maha mai i ngā pēke, ki ngā hokomaha, ngā kāinga nehunga me ngā rongoā rongoā, i tino whakahētia i roto i tētahi arotakenga a Tā Christopher Kelly ki te tiango tata o tōna ringa pēke. I tūtaki te pēke ki te tiango tata i tērā tau i muri i te kitenga o tētahi rua £1.5bn i roto i tōna rau toenga, ā, i whakaorangia e ngā kaipupuri here i roto i tētahi nekehanga i kite ai i te tūnga o te rōpū i whakahekea mai i te 100% ki te 30%. I hopukina tōna manukura o mua, a Paora Putiputi, i tērā tau i muri i ngā whakaaro i uru a ia ki tētahi mahi rongoā. Mai i tērā wā ka whakataua a Tēnā Putiputi ki te pupuri rongoā, ā, i te Wenerei ka tautohe he hara ki te pupuri rongoā, i te Kōti Kaiwhakawa o Leeds. Poari iti iho i tērā marama, i pūrongotia e te Rōpū Co-op ngā hinganga o te £2.5bn mō te 2013, ko ngā hua kino rawa i roto i tōna hītori. I kī a Ariki Myners i "mau tonu te poari o te rōpū ki te whakakāhore i tēnei rahunga tata o te whakahaere". Kua tūtohutia e ia he poari iti iho mō te rōpū, arā, he rite tonu ngā pūkenga me ngā wheako ki ērā i ngā kamupene tauwhāinga - pēnei i a Tesco me Sainsbury's i roto i te kai me te Nationwide i te whakatārewa. Heoi anō, e whakaae ana a ia he "iti iho te māia" ka whakaae ngā kaitohutohu i te rōpū ki ngā whakataunga toitū e whakapono ana ia e tika ana hei whakatika i tana hanganga whakahaere rangatōpū. "Kai roto i nga ringa o nga kaiwhakapori i pōtitia te whakataunga. Kua mahia e au ngā mea katoa e taea e au," tana kī. Ko te whakaritenga o nāianei, e kī ana a ia, ko te tikanga he "whāinga tiritiri whāiti i waenganui i ngā kaiwhakahaere o te poari rōpū," i a rātou e pōtitia ana ki te poari me ngā tirohanga rerekē mō ngā manakē o te Co-op. I kī atu tētahi kaiwhakahaere, kāore i whakaingoatia, ki te arotakenga: "Ko ētahi e hiahia ana ki te moni hua, ko ētahi e hiahia ana ki te utu iti, ko ētahi e hiahia ana ki te mahi i te pai pāpori, ā, ko ētahi e hiahia ana ki ngā pīkaokao awhe koreutu". I rahua hoki ngā mema o te poari ki te whai i ā rātou ake ture. I te wā o te arotakenga, "te āhua nei kua whai wāhi hohe tētahi kaiwhakahaere ki tētahi whakahau ki te whakahoki i tētahi whakataunga rautaki i mahia e te poari rōpū i ngā rā noa iho nei". I pā mai tērā ahakoa tētahi ture e "tautoko ana ngā kaiwhakahaere i tētahi whakataunga a te poari, ahakoa whakaae rātou, i pōti rānei i te manakohanga" me "tū ki ngā whakataunga i mahia e te poari huihuinga". Āputa pūkenga Waihoki, ko te pūnaha apa-maha o nāianei o ngā poari rōpū, ā-rohe me ngā komiti rohe e pōturi ana i te whakatau whakatau i te mea "e kī ana ngā kaiwhakahaere me whiwhi whakaaro rātou mai i tō rātou rohe i mua i te whakaae ki tētahi mahi" ahakoa e tūmanakohia ana kia whakatau i ō rātou ake hinengaro. I tēnei wā, e 48 ngā komiti rohe o te Co-op - ngā pāpāho o te rōpū - e 10-12 ngā mema o ia mema. Ka kōwhiria e rātou ngā mema o ngā poari ā-rohe e whitu, ā, ka kōwhiria e rātou ngā mema 15 o tētahi poari e 23 ngā mema. He papa anō mō te umanga kai; te pēke, kua kore nei e tino rangatiratia e te rōpū; me ngā umanga tohunga, arā ko ngā rongoā rongoā me te tiaki nehunga. E karanga ana te Co-op i ēnei poari āpitihanga. "Kāore he kaha o te tukanga pōti whakataetae a te rōpū mō te aromatawai i ngā taumata āheinga arumoni o ngā kaitono i te mea kāore he pae tautohetohe whai tikanga. Waihoki, kāore he whānuitanga hei whakataurite i ngā āheinga me te whakakī i ngā āputa pūkenga," te kī a te pūrongo. E tono ana a Ariki Myners i tētahi poari me ngā kaiwhakahaere takitahi e ono, e whitu rānei me ngā kaiwhakahaere tokorua, me tētahi tinana motuhake hei whakahaere i ngā māharahara o ngā mema, e kiia nei ko te Kaunihera Mema o te Motu. Ka pupuri te Kaunihera Mematanga ā-Motu, tata ki te 50 ngā mema, ki te poari ki te pūkete me te āwhina ki te whakatau ko wai ka pōtitia ki te poari. Ka tohutohu hoki i te poari mo nga take matatika.

title: Te matenga o Harry Richford: I whakahē te rangatira NHS i te tipuna o te tama i roto i te reta
summary: Kua whakapārewa tētahi pāhi NHS mo te huatau kua ngana te whānau o tētahi tamaiti mate ki te whakapoke i te ingoa o te hōhipera i whānau ai ia.
text: I mate a Harry Richford e whitu rā i muri i tōna whānautanga i te Hōhipera QEQM i Margate, Kent, i Whiringa 2017. I roto i tētahi reta, ka kī te rangatira nui o Te Rāwhiti o Te Rāwhiti, a Susan Akott, kua ngana te tipuna o Harry, a Derek ki te "tukituki i te rongo o te hōhipera katoa". I kī a ia i "tino pouri" a ia mo te kōrero i mahia i Hune. I whakataua e te koroni he "tino karo" te matenga o Harry, ā, kei te uiui te Tari Hauora me te Tiaki Pāpori (DHSC) i ngā kēhi kohanga e 26 i te whakawhirinaki. I tērā wiki i kitea ai e tētahi tūhuratanga o TE AO e whitu neke atu rānei ngā mate pēpi ārai i te whakawhirinaki, e rima ngā hōhipera me ngā whare hauora hapori, ā, e tata ana ki te 7,000 ngā whānautanga i te tau. I roto i te reta i tonoa ki te MP o Thanet ki te Raki o Roger Gale, i te 7 o Pipiri 2019, i tuhituhi a Ms Acott: "E tino whakamihi ana, e aroha ana mātou katoa ki a Derek Richford. " Ko te ngana ki te tukituki i te rongo o te hōhipera katoa me te whakakāhore i ngā rauemi kāore e āwhina, e whakapai ake rānei i te āhuatanga mō ngā mātua ā muri ake me ā mātou kaimahi tīariari. "Ko te mea e hiahiatia ana e tātau ko te ako mai i ngā mea i hē i roto i te kēhi o Harry Richford, ā, e tino whakaaro ana mātou ki te mahi i tēnā." 'Pouri nui' I roto i tētahi kōrero i whakaputaina i te Wenerei, ka kī a Ms Acott kua tuhia te reta hei urupare ki tētahi wāhi motuhake i whakaarahia e te MP o te whānau. I kī a ia "e tino kaha ana te mahi a ā mātou nēhi, tākuta me ngā kaiwhakawhanau i ia rā, ā, he mea nui kia haumaru te tangata ki te whakamahi i tō rātou hōhipera paetata". I tāpiri mai a Ms Cott: "E tino whakaae ana ahau me te pouri nui i a mātau hei Whirinaki i rahua ai a Harry Richford me tōna whānau i roto i ngā huarahi maha... E pouri ana ahau kua tāpiritia e aku kupu ki to rātau MP te mamae o te whānau o Richford." I kī tētahi kaikōrero mō te Tari Hauora me te Tiaki Pāpori e tirotiro ana te Peka Tūhura Haumaru Hauora e 26 ngā kēhi kohanga takitahi i te whakawhirinaki, ā, i mahia e te Komihana Kounga Tiaki tētahi arotakenga kāore i whakaritea i tērā wiki. Ka pūrongo rāua tahi i roto i te rua wiki, i tērā wā ka aromatawaia ngā kōwhiringa mō ētahi atu mahi. Whāia a BBC South East i Facebook, i Twitter, i Instagram hoki. Tukua ō whakaaro pūrākau ki southeasttoday@bbc.co.uk.

title: I mahue i te tiaki kohanga o Guernsey te whaea 'mataku ki te whai tamaiti'
summary: Kua mahue rawa te mataku o te wahine ki te whai tamariki anō i muri i tōna wheako i te whare kohanga o Guernsey.
text: I kitea e tētahi pūrongo, nā te Kaunihera Nēhi me te Kaunihera Whakawhanau i whakaputaina i Whiringahora, e mataku ana ngā tūroro ki te amuamu mō ngā ratonga. I kī tētahi wahine, kāore i pīrangi kia whakaingoatia, i tōna wā i Loveridge Ward i te tau 2007 ka mataku rawa ia ki te whai tamaiti tuarua. Kua whakarewaina e te Tari Ratonga Hauora me ngā Ratonga Pāpori tētahi arotakenga. I kī te whaea, kāore i pīrangi kia whakaingoatia, i rongo a ia i te whakaweti a ia e nga kaiwhakawhanau i runga i te whangai u, a, i mahue ko ia anake i roto i te mamae mo nga wā roa. "I muri i taku wheako i taku tamaiti tuatahi i Loveridge Ward, ka wehi ahau ki te hoki ki tērā. " I hiahia māua ko taku tāne ki te whai tamaiti anō ā muri ake nei, ā, kei te hiahia taku tamaiti ki te whai tangata hei tākaro, engari i mataku rawa ahau ki te hoki anō ki Loveridge Ward." I kī tētahi kaikōrero mō te tari: "Ko ngā tirohanga me ngā wheako o ngā wāhine o ngā ratonga kohanga kei te ngākau o te arotakenga takitahi. " Kua whakaritea ngā ture tohutoro o te arotakenga kia taumaha ai te taumahatanga o te tīma arotake ki ngā tirohanga me ngā wheako o ngā tūroro kohanga. "Ko ngā wāhine kua whakamahi i ngā ratonga kohanga o te motu he 'tohunga mā te wheako' me te ako mai i taua tohungatanga he tino nui ki te whakarite kia whakarato mātou i ngā ratonga kohanga e tūmanakohia ana e ngā wāhine me ō rātou whānau." I kī a Anita Davies, mai i te National Childbirth Trust, he tokomaha atu ngā wāhine e haere mai ana ināianei, ā, he whāranu pūrākau mō te ratonga.

title: E whakapaea ana e te whakapae a AMERIKA te umanga Hainamana ki te tāhae i ngā muna hokohoko
summary: Kua whakapaea e te tari ture o Amerika e toru ngā tangata me ngā kamupene e rua i Haina me Taiwana mō te tāhae i ngā muna hokohoko a tētahi kamupene o Amerika.
text: Ko te tuawhā tēnei o ngā kēhi matawhai ohaoha i kawea mai e te tari ki ngā kamupene me ngā tangata Hainamana mai i Mahuru. Kua whakaputaina hoki e te tari he hūtu tūmatanui ki nga kamupene e rua. Kua hū mai ngā renarena o te hokohoko a Haina-US i roto i ngā utu tit-for-tat i waenganui i ngā rangatiratanga nui rawa e rua o te ao i tēnei tau. Kāore a Beijing i urupare wawe ki te nekehanga hou mai i Washington i te Tāite. "Kua nui haere te matawhai ohaoha o Hainamana ki Te Hononga o Amerika," te kī a te Rōia Matua o Te Rūnanga o T "Ā, kua tere te piki haere." E whakapae ana te whakapae i whakatupu ngā kamupene me ngā tangata tokotoru ki te tāhae i ngā mea ngaro hokohoko mai i Micron, he kamupene takawaenga o Amerika e wātea ana ki te $100bn (£76bn). I kīia aua mea ngaro e pā ana ki te mahi a Micron ā-Idaho me ngā pūrere rokiroki pūmahara uru matapōkere hihiri. I kitea e Tēnā Wātū i te wā o te hui rongokōrero o te Rāitema he hangarau tēnei kāore i a ngā kamupene Hainamana tae noa ki nā tata nei. I whakaahuatia e te rōia nui he "aronui kōaro" ki te tāhae me te tārua i te hangarau kia whakataetae ai ki a Mātau. "Kei konei mātou i tēnei rā ki te kī kua rawaka," te kī a Tēnā Wātū. "Kua tae ki te wā kia hono a Haina ki te hapori o nga iwi tika." Ko tētahi o ngā kamupene e pā ana, ko Fujian Jinhua Integrated Circuit Co, Ltd, he kamupene kāwanatanga Hainamana. I tērā tau, i whakahaua e Micron a Fujian Jinhua me te kamupene Taiwanese United Microelectrics Corp mō te tāhae i ngā muna hokohoko. E whakaurua ana hoki ngā kamupene e rua i roto i tētahi whakawā tūmatanui mai i te tari ture, e whai ana ki te ārai i a rātau kia kaua e kaweake i ngā taonga i hangaia mai i ēnei mea ngaro i tāhaetia. Ināianei kei te whiua e te tari ture e rima ētahi atu take o te tāhae ohaoha me te whakamātau i te tāhae "hei painga mō te kāwanatanga Hainamana", te kī a Tēnā Wātū. I tēnei wiki, e 10 ngā māngai Hainamana, tae atu ki ngā āpiha mōhiohio tokorua, i whakapaea mō te tāhae i ngā raraunga o AMERIKA i runga i ngā pūkaha turbo waka rererangi. I pakipakia e te whakahaeretanga o te Pāpāho ngā utu i runga i te $200bn o ngā kawenga mai Hainamana i te wā o Mahuru, nā reira ka whakautua e Haina ki ngā utu i runga i te $60bn o ngā taonga o Amerika. Kua whakapaea hoki e Tēnā Puhi a Haina ki te raweke i te pōti a Mātau nā ōna kaha ki te whakamatautau i a rātau i runga i te hokohoko.

title: I akiaki te rā kati PPI i ngā miriona kēhi hou, e kī ana te kaiwhakarite
summary: I hokona hētia te inihua parenga utu (PPI) ki te iwa o ngā tāngata e 10 i amuamu mō tā rātou kaupapahere i ngā marama whakamutunga i mua i te rā kati utu.
text: Nā Kevin PeacheyPersonal finance reporter PPI i hoahoatia hei utu i ngā utunga moni i te wā i mate ai ngā kaipupuri kaupapahere, i aituā, i ngaro rānei ā rātou mahi. Tae atu ki te 64 miriona ngā kaupapahere i hokona, ko te nuinga i waenganui i te 1990 me te 2010, engari i kitea ko te heitara hokohoko hē nui rawa o te UK. I kī te kaiwhakahaere o te Taone kua kawea ināianei ki tētahi "whakaotinga tika". Heoi anō, kāore anō ētahi take kia whakataua, ā, kua tautohe ngā kaiwhakahauhau he moata rawa te rā kati o tērā raumati ki te amuamu PPI. I hokona hētia ngā kaupapahere PPI ki ngā tāngata kāore i te hiahiatia, i te hiahia rānei, kāore rānei e hipokina. Kua utua e ngā pēke, ngā rōpū hanga whare me ētahi atu kaiwhakarato nama he utu whakamīharo e £38bn ki te hunga i hokona hētia te PPI, ā, ka kerēme. Ko te utu noa iho ko te £2,000. Ia wā ka tīmata a Mīharo Barker i te mīhini o tana motokā, e mōhio ana a ia nā PPI i whakakī tana hoko. He kaupapahere PPI tā te pakeke e 59 tau, mai i Gravesend, i runga i tētahi kāri nama mō te 20 tau e kore rawa e utua. I muri i tana kerēme mā te paetukutuku Resolver, ka whakawhiwhia ki a ia he utu e £22,500. "He nui te kauae," tana kī atu ki te AO i tērā tau, me te katoa i whakanuia e te huamoni e herea ana e ngā kaiwhakarato ki te tāpiri. "I hoatu e au ētahi o ngā moni ki te hoko i tētahi Vauxhall Corsa hōhā, hou, ā, ko te tikanga ka taea e taku tāne te hoko i tētahi vani hou i te mea kua tāhaetia tana tāhaetanga." Kua whakaputaina e te kaiwhakahaere o te Taone, te Mana Whanonga Pūtea (FCA), tētahi pūrongo ki tana whakahau mōhiotanga mō te rā kati kerēme PPI o te 29 o Aotearoa i tērā tau. I muri i te tere tōmuri, ka whakaroa atu tēnei rā kati ki Whiringa ā Rangi. I roto i tana pūrongo, ka kī te WHK e 6.7 miriona ngā whakataunga mō ngā amuamu i whakaotia i waenganui i a Hōngongoi 2018 me Whiringa 2019. Tata ki te 1.7 miriona o rātou (26%) he take kāore he kaupapahere PPI a te tangata. O ngā toenga e rima miriona, 87% i kitea kua hokona hētia tā rātou kaupapahere, ā, neke atu i te £5bn ngā utu utu. He moata rawa? I whakaaturia anō e te pūrongo te whānuitanga o ngā kamupene whakahaere kerēme (CMCs) i ngā amuamu nui mō ngā kiritaki. I tangohia e rātau he tapahi o tētahi utu. E tautohe ana ngā kaiwhakawāwā kāore i hiahiatia ngā CMC nā te mea ka taea e te tangata te whakatakoto i ā rātou ake kerēme, engari e kī ana ngā kamupene e kore rawa ēnei tāngata e kī. I whakaaturia e te pūrongo FCA ko te 92% o ngā pātai mēnā he kaupapahere PPI tā tētahi tangata i hangaia e ngā kamupene kerēme i ngā marama whakamutunga i mua i te rā kati, ko te nuinga o ngā ripakaute nui. Tata ki te haurua (45%) o ngā take he kerēme utu katoa i whakahaeretia mā ngā CMC. I uaua te mahi pēke ki te karanga i tētahi rā kati ki ngā kerēme PPI, i te mutunga ka whakaaetia e te kaiwhakahaere. I kī ētahi rōpū kiritaki ka ngaro pea i te tangata te moni e tika ana ki a rātau. I roto i tana pūrongo, i kī te WHK he tika tana whakatau kia tautuhi i tētahi rā kati. "E whakaaro ana mātou, ko te nuinga o te wā, kua whakaotia te take PPI ki tētahi huarahi kua whiwhi parenga tika mō ngā kiritaki me te whakarei ake i te taparenga o te pūnaha pūtea UK," tana kī. "Mā tēnei e āwhina ki te hanga anō i te whakawhirinaki tūmatanui i te wāhanga pūtea hokohoko."

title: Te matenga o Susan Nicholson: Ko te tono uiui hou mo te rūpahu kōhuru pirihimana
summary: Kua tono te whānau o tētahi wahine i patua e tētahi kaipatu taurua ki te Kōti Tiketike mō tētahi uiuinga katoa ki ngā pirihimana "hinganga" i te kēhi.
text: I patua a Susan Nicholson e Robert Trigg i te tau 2011, e rima tau i muri i tana patunga i tana hoa o mua, a Caroline Devlin, i roto i nga āhuatanga ōrite. Kāore anō kia whakaarotia he mate i te tuatahi e ngā Pirihimana o Sussex. E wero ana ngā mātua o Ms Nicholson i te koroni matua o Te Uru o Te Uru i runga i te whānuitanga o tētahi uiuinga hou. I hereheretia a Trigg, e 54, mo te ora i te tau 2017 mo te kōhurutanga o Ms Nicholson me te parekura o Ms Devlin i o rātau kāinga i Worthing, West Sussex. I muri i te whakapaetanga, ka whakakorea e te Kōti Tiketike ngā kitenga o te mate pokanoa i roto i te uiuinga taketake ki te matenga o Ms Nicholson, ā, ka tonoa he mea hou. I whakataua e te koroni matua mō Te Uru o Sussex he uiuinga poto, ā, kāore he kaiwhakaatu i pātaitia. E hiahia ana ōna mātua, a Irihapeti rāua ko Pita Skelton, kia tūhura te uiuinga hou mehemea kāore i tika te tiaki a ngā pirihimana i ta rāua tamāhine. E tautohe ana rātau me whai uiuinga katoa i raro i te Tuhipānui Rua - te mana ki te ora - o te Ture Motika Tangata, e āhei ana ki te tirotiro i te tūranga o ngā tinana tūmatanui i te matenga o te tangata. I kī a Tēnā Skelton i mua i te whakarongo: "E kite ana ahau i tēnei whakarongo hei wā hei whakarite kia tika te uiui mēnā ka taea te ārai i te matenga o Susana." I roto i tētahi tukunga tuhituhi ki te Kōti Tiketike, ka kī a Heta Williams QC he ture te whakataunga a te koroni i te mea he "mārama te tautohetohe" kua takahia e ngā Pirihimana o Sussex ana mahi hei pare i a Ms Nicholson me te tūhura tika i te matenga o Ms Devlin. E ono nga wā i karangatia ai ngā āpiha ki te whare noho o Ms Nicholson i ngā wiki i mua i tōna matenga i runga i ngā pūrongo tukino, ā, ka mauria tētahi o ōna hoa o mua ki te hōhipera i muri i tana whakaekenga i a ia. Engari kāore i kitea e te tōpana ngā ritenga i waenganui i ngā kēhi e whakatūpato ana, ā, i kitea a Trigg hei hoa pouri, ehara i te pōhēhē. Tokorua neke atu rānei ngā pirihimana i uru ki ngā tūhuratanga ki ngā matenga o ngā wāhine e rua, ā, i mōhio ki tōna tūhononga ki ngā kēhi. I te tau 2011, i whakataua e te koroni a Michael Kendall kua mate ohorere a Ms Nicholson i muri i te kīanga a Trigg i a ia e moe ana i runga i te sofa. I muri noa iho i te utunga a ngā mātua o Ms Nicholson i ngā tohunga mātauranga ki te tirotiro anō i te pūrongo a te kaimātai taketake, ka haere te kēhi ki te kōti. I kī ngā Pirihimana o Sussex me ākiritia te pīra, i te wā e noho kūpapa ana te koroni matua i runga i te wero. E toru rā te roa o te tono uiui. Whāia a BBC South East i Facebook, i Twitter, i Instagram hoki. Tukua ō whakaaro pūrākau ki southeasttoday@bbc.co.uk.

title: Mate kaieke paihikara: 'I patua taku tuakana e te karere kuputuhi hīkoi kurī'
summary: Ko tētahi atekōkiri vani nāna i patu tētahi kaieke paihikara i a ia e tuku ana i tētahi karere "koretake" mō tētahi hīkoi kurī, kua kī te tuakana o te tūkinotanga.
text: I mate a Lee Martin, e 48, mai i Basingstoke, i muri i tana patua e tētahi vani i whakahaeretia e Christopher Gard i te 12 o Aotearoa 2015. E ono neke atu rānei ngā whakapae o mua o Gard, e 30, o Alton ki te whakamahi waea i te wīra. I whakaae a ia i te mate i te taraiwa mōrearea, a, e iwa tau i te Kōti Karauna o Winchester i te Mane. 'Pōrearea' Ka kī te tuakana o te tūkinotanga, a Darrell Martin: "Tērā ētahi wā hei aukati i te tangata kia kaua e taraiwa." I a ia e kōrero ana i runga i te hōtaka o Tēnei Rā, ka kī a Tēnā Mātini: "Ko te karere kuputuhi - whakaarohia te pōrangi o tēnei - e pā ana ki te tūtaki i tana hoa ā muri ake me te mau i tana kurī ki te hīkoi. Koia tērā i mate ai taku tuakana." I kī a Tēnā Mātini e maumahara ana a ia ki te whiwhi i te waea "pōrearea" mai i tōna whaea e kī ana ki a ia kua mate tōna tuakana i roto i tētahi aituā paihikara. I kī a ia i mahara a ia ki tana whakaaro i tūmanako ia kua patua ia nā tētahi "aituā tē taea". E whakapono ana te whānau o Mātini me anga atu a Gard ki te mahi uaua ake nā ōna hara o mua o te whakamahi waea i te wīra. "E ono wiki noa iho i mua i tana whakapati i tētahi kaiwhakawā kia kaua e tango i tana raihana, ā, ka kī taurangi kia maukati tana waea i roto i te whakaara," te kī a Tēnā Mātini. I mate te pāpā o te tokorua, i whai wāhi ki tētahi takahanga paihikara whakaritea, i te hōhipera i muri i te tūtukitanga. I mua tonu i te wā o te tūtukitanga, i mua tonu i te wā o te tūtukitanga, ka kī a Te Kāhui Pirihimana. Ka kī a Tēnā Mātini: "Ki taku whakaaro kāore i te nui ka puta a ia i roto i te whā me te hāwhe tau. Ko te take ki a au, ko te tikanga kia kaua a ia e noho i runga i te huarahi i te wāhi tuatahi." I rāhuitia hoki a Gard kia kaua e taraiwa mo te 14 me te hāwhe tau. Ko te take o te mate i te taraiwa mōrearea e mau ana i te whiu mōrahi o te 14 tau i roto i te whare herehere.

title: Ko te whaea o Leicestershire 'kāore i rawaka te mate pukupuku' kia whiwhi painga
summary: I kī tētahi whaea tokotoru i kī atu ki a ia e te Tari Mahi me ngā Penihana (DWP) "kāore i rawaka te mate pukupuku" i tana tono painga.
text: I kitea a Katie Larn i te lymphoma Hodgkin i tērā tau, ā, i muri i te tīmatanga o te rongoā, ka tono ia mō ngā Utu Rangatiratanga Whaiaro (PIP). I korerotia ki te tau e 29 tau kāore a ia i whiwhi tautoko i muri i te haerenga ki te kāinga. I kī tētahi kaikōrero DWP e "tukua ana ki te whakarite kia whiwhi ngā tāngata whai mate hauora i te tautoko e hiahiatia ana e rātou". "Ka whakatauria ngā whakataunga i runga anō i ngā mōhiohio katoa e wātea ana ki a mātou i taua wā, tae atu ki ngā whakaaturanga mai i te GP o te kaikerēme, i te tohunga rongoā rānei," tana kī. I kī atu a Ms Larn - e tatari ana ki tētahi rā mō tētahi rūnanga whakawā ki te arotake i tana kēhi - ki te Ratonga Pūrongo Kāwanatanga Paetata (LDRS) e whakapono ana a ia ki te kaiaromatawai nāna i haere ki te kāinga i whakaaro he iti iho tōna mate i a ia. "Kotahi noa iho taku wātū kōpuku i taua wā, ā, i mua i te ngaronga o aku makawe, ā, kua pā mai ngā steroids nāna ahau i taumaha," tana kī. "Kāore e taea e au te whakaaro tērā pea i whakaaro rātau he pai taku āhua kia kore ai au e tino kino." I whiwhi a Ms Larn i tētahi reta e whakamōhio ana ki a ia kāore a ia e whiwhi PIP i te ono wiki i muri i te haerenga ki tōna kāinga i Braunstone, i Aotearoa, ā, i kī ia ka karangatia e ia te DWP ki te uiui i ngā hua. "He tino pai te tangata i runga i te waea, ā, i whakamārama mai i ngā mea ki a au, ka pātai atu ahau ki a ia 'Nā reira kāore anō ahau kia nui te mate pukupuku?' ka kī mai a ia āe, ā, kāore i rawaka aku piro hei whakaaro," tana kī. Kei te murunga a Ms Larn ināianei. I kī tētahi kaikōrero DWP ka whiwhi tonu a ia i ētahi atu painga i a ia e tatari ana ki te hua o tana tono. Whāia a BBC East Midlands i Facebook, Twitter, Instagram rānei. Tukua ō whakaaro pūrākau ki eastmidsnews@bbc.co.uk.

title: Coronavirus i Scotland: 11 ngā kēhi e hono ana ki ngā whare ākonga
summary: Tekau mā tahi ngā ākonga kua whakamātauria he pai mō Covid-19 whai muri i te pakarutanga i te nohoanga ākonga.
text: Kei te mahi ngātahi te Whare Wānanga o Etinitini Napier me te tīma Whakamātautau me te Parenga o NHS Lothian, e uiui ana i te kāhui i ngā whare noho o Bainfield. I kī te tumuaki o te whare wānanga kāore anō kia whakatūria ngā āhuatanga e karapoti ana i ngā kēhi. Ko te ākonga o Myles Reeve tētahi o ngā tauira e ono i roto i tētahi whare noho e waru i whakahoki mai i tētahi whakamātautau tōrunga. I mau a Mr Reeve, mai i Manchester, i te huaketo i muri i te whakahoahoa ki ngā ākonga mai i tētahi atu whare noho i te paraka kotahi. I kī atu a ia ki a TE Iwa o Pākehā: "I whakaaro rātau he āhuatanga iti noa iho ō rātou, pēnei i te ānini. Kāore rātau i te tino mōhio mēnā he rewharewha tērā, he mea pēnei rānei." Engari i te whakamātautautanga o ngā tauira ka hoki pai mai ngā hua, pērā ki ērā mō Tēnā Reeve me ōna hoa noho tokorima. I a rātau e wehe ana i a rātau anō, ka taea tonu e rātau te haere tonu ā rātou akoranga tuihono i te wā e whakataka ana ngā mōkī tiaki, tae atu ki te pizza, mō rātou. I kī a Mr Reeve e "tata ana" ka horapa te huaketo i te wā ka tauwhiti tonu te iwi whānui ākonga, ahakoa i roto i ngā hōro, i tētahi pāparaka rānei. I mua ake, ka kī atu te tumuaki o Prof Andrea Nolan ki a BBC Radio Scotland's Lunchtime Live e tūmanako ana a ia kua mau te kāhui. Ka kī a ia: "Kua kitea e mātou ngā ākonga kua whakamātauria he pai. Kua kitea e mātau o rātau hoapā tata. "Kāore anō kia oti i te tīma parenga hauora te aroturuki, engari kua tata mātou ki reira, ā, kei te taratahi katoa ā rātou hoapā tata e pā ana ki a rātou anō." E 117 ngā whare noho o Bainfield e āhei ana ki te noho i waenganui i te whā me te waru tāngata. 'Whakahaere pūnoa' I pātai mai mēnā ka arotakea e te whare wānanga mēnā ka noho tuwhera tonu mēnā ka tipu te tīmatatanga, ka kī a Prof Nolan: "He nui ake te whare wānanga i tōna nohoanga nā reira kei konei mātou ki te whakarato tautoko mō ā mātou ākonga ki te ako me te ako, ā, he tino hira tēnā i tēnei wā." I tāpiritia e ia ka ārahina tana whakataunga e NHS Lothian. I te Wenerei, ka kī te poari hauora: "Kua whakaritea kētia ngā tikanga horoi me te haumaru whakarei i te whare wānanga e hāngai ana ki ngā tohutohu ā-motu. " Mēnā kua whakapā tata tētahi ki tētahi kēhi kua whakaūngia, ka whakapā atu ki a rātou, ka hoatu tohutohu mō ngā mea e tika ana kia mahia." Ko te hunga kua whakapā atu ki ngā kēhi me wehe mō te rua wiki, ahakoa kāore rātou e whakawhanake i ētahi tohumate. Ko te hunga anake e tohu ana i te mare hou, haere tonu hoki, te kirikā, te ngaromanga, te huringa rānei o te kakara, te reka rānei, me whakamātautau. I whakamutua e te kōrero: "Ko ngā ākonga me ngā kaimahi katoa kāore anō kia tonoa kia wehe i a rātou anō, me haere tonu ki te pūnoa."

title: I tūtakina e ngā Pirihimana te whakahaere i te mate o te rā mārena ariki o te tama
summary: Me uiui te whakahaere a nga Pirihimana Tūtaki i te ngaronga o tētahi tamaiti i te hokinga mai i te mārena o Piriniha Charles rāua ko Pirinihi Taiana i te tau 1981.
text: I patua a Vishal Mehrotra, e waru tau, i a ia e hoki ana ki te kāinga ki Putney. I kī tōna pāpā kua hoatu e ia ki nga pirihimana he hopukanga o tētahi tangata nāna i kī kua kahakina a Vishal, a, kua patua e ngā paepaea "tino whakanoho". Kua kōrerotia e te tōpana ki te Komihana Amuamu Pirihimana Motuhake i waenganui i nga whakapae hāmate. I muri i tana mātakitaki i te whakatūtū mārena ariki, e haere ana a Vishal, he kaiwhakawā mōnehu tōna pāpā, i muri i tana mātakitaki i te whakatūtū mārena ariki. I kitea nga toenga o te tama i te tau e whai ake nei i te repo mamao i tētahi pāmu i Rogate, e tata ana ki te rohe o Te Hauauru. Ka kī te ope pirihimana: "I whakamōhiotia te Tūtaki ki tētahi amuamu e whakapae ana i te hāmate e pā ana ki te tūhuratanga o te tangata ngaro taketake a Pirihimana Tūtaki ki te ngaronga o Vishal Mehrotra mā te pēhi." Kua kōrerotia tēnei amuamu ki te Tohutohu Paerewa Ngaio o te Tūtaki, ā, taro ake nei ka haere ki te IPCC, e kī ana.

title: I whakakitea ngā mahere whakawhānui pūtake o MoD Donnington
summary: Kua whakakitea ngā mahere mō tētahi whakawhānuitanga nui o tētahi pūtake o te Manatu Arotahi (MoD) i Telford.
text: E whakapono ana te Kaunihera o Telford me Wrekin ka taea e ngā tono mō MoD Donnington te waihanga tae atu ki te 700 ngā mahi hōu. Ka whakarato a Donnington i te tautoko rārangi mahi mō te Taua, e whakahaere ana i ngā taputapu hōia me ngā rākau. I kī te mana ā rohe e whakatakoto ana i tētahi taupānga whakarite mō tētahi whanaketanga kotahi miriona sq ft (93,000 sq m) i te pae. I kī te kaunihera kua kōrero ki te MoD i roto i ngā marama e 18 kua hipa ki te huri i a Donnington hei tētahi o ngā kōpae tautoko matua. 'Tino tūmanako' i kī a Telford rāua ko Wrekin i te wāhanga tōmua tonu o ngā kaupapa, ā, i whakawhirinaki ki te toa pūtea penapena mai i te MoD. Councillor Bill McClements, responsible for finance and enterprise, said it was a great opportunity for both the MoD and the local economy. "Kei te pai te āhua, ā, kei te tino tūmanako mātou," tana kī. "Tērā pea ka tiakina e ia neke atu i te 1,000 ngā mahi, ā, ka taea te kawe mai i waenganui i te 500 me te 700 ngā mahi hōu, me ētahi atu mahi me te pūtea penapena i roto i te mekameka putanga. " Kei te tango mātou i ētahi ārai. We're offering incentives, we're offering to train and even help to build it." Mr McClements said the planning application was expected to be submitted before the end of the year. I roto i tētahi kōrero, ka kī te MoD he moata rawa ki te kōrero mō ngā wāhi mahi, ā, kei roto hoki i ngā kōrero ki ētahi atu kaunihera. I kī te MoD he wāhanga nga whakaritenga o tētahi kaupapa hei whakahau i tana mahi tiki me te mahi mahi.

title: Kua mutu te pūrākau tupu o Īnia?
summary: Whakaritea Mō te Kino, ka whakatūpato tētahi nūpepa i ōna kaipānui i te Paraire, i muri i ngā pūrongo kua pōturi rawa te āhua o te āhua o te mahi i roto i te iwa tau.
text: Ko te korero kōrero a Soutik BiswasDelhi Goodbye 2020, Kia ora 1991!, e kī ana tētahi atu, e pā ana ki te whakarewatanga o te tau 1991, nāna i tuku a Īnia ki te WHK mō tētahi tārewa. He tino kino rawa ngā mea ki te whakahaerenga nui rawa o Āhia? Kai te mutu te pūrākau tupu o Īnia? Kai te hīkoi haere ngā tāpaetanga tōtika me ngā tāpaetanga hokohoko, kei te iti rawa te rupeea, kua tūponotia ngā whakahōu nā ngā tōrangapū tōkeke me te kāwanatanga pōhēhē, he tiketike te utunga moni, ā, kua heke te pūtea penapena me te whakapaunga. Kua nui te heke o te tipu o te whakanao me te hanganga matua. Ko ngā ratonga, ko te nuinga o te wā he whakarei tipu mati-rua, e whakaparo ana i te 8%. Ko te tino māharahara, ko te tipu pāmu kei raro iho i te 2%, ā, kua tohua he timatanga i raro iho i te pūnoa. He mea whakarihariha kei te puta ēnei mea katoa i raro i te ārahitanga o tētahi kaitohutohu mātauranga o Oxford. Kua whakaingoatia e te kāwanatanga te hinganga ki te āhua o te ao whānui e hopu ana i te mātao. Engari he mārama kē atu i tērā. Mō ngā tīwhiri whakarongo ki a Bimal Hua, te kāwana o mua o te pēke matua o Īnia, me tētahi kaitohutohu manaaki. "Tērā tētahi mea e puta ana kāore mātou i te tino mau kia mahia ai tētahi mea," tana kī atu ki tētahi hongere pakihi. E whakapono ana a Dr Ara he raruraru hanganga hōhonu ake, pūhohe hoki e whakararuraru ana i te āhua o te whakahaerenga. "Ka taea e koe te kawemai i te nui o te hinu e hiahia ana koe, ka taea e koe te utu nā te mea he tiketike ō rāhui, ā, kei te pai te mahi o ō kawenga ake ahakoa kāore pea i tino pai te mahi i roto i te kotahi, e rua rānei ngā hauwhā. He teitei ake tō tāupenga pūkete o nāianei i tāu i tūmanako ai, engari ka taea tonutia e mātou, kāore he raruraru nui. Nō reira he aha te mea e hapa ana, ā, kāore i a mātou?" e miharo ana a ia. Ko te mea kāore i a Īnia he whakaaro tōrangapū pakeke, pakeke ki te aronga me mau te āhua o te whakahaerenga. Me pēhea e taea ai e tētahi rōpū iti o ngā kaipōrangapū i te pāremata te whakakāhore i ngā whakahōu nui? Kua taumahatia rānei ngā tōrangapū me te whakahaerenga o Īnia ki ngā painga iti, e tino āwhinatia ana e tētahi kāwanatanga e kitea ana he pākaha, he ngoikore? Ko te tōrangapū pakaru ka pakaru te āhua o te whakahaerenga. E hiahiatia ana e Īnia ngā whakahōu tōrangapū i te tuatahi i mua i te moemoeā mo te neke i runga i ngā whakahōu ohaoha nui?

title: Ka karangatia e te tīma whakaora o Welsh te rapu i a John Tossell ngaro i Zante
summary: Kua tū "manawanui" tētahi tīma whakaora maunga o Welsh i uru ki te rapu i tētahi tūruhi ngaro i te motu Kariki o Zante.
text: Kāore a John Tossell, e 73, mai i Bridgend, i hoki mai i te hīkoi i te 17 o Hune, i te toru o nga rā o tana hararei. Kotahi wiki te kimi a nga mana i Kariki i a Tēnā Tossell, engari i karangatia te rapu. I whakarewaina tētahi whārangi Go Fund e āhei ai te tīma Whakaora Maunga o Western Beacons ki te hono ki te rapu. I kohia e te tīma whakaora te tata ki te £7,000 mā te whārangi pūtea tuihono hei utu i ngā rerenga me te nohoanga. I whiwhi moni hoki rātau mai i te Tari Tawahi me te Kotahitanga mā Bridgend MP Madeleine Moon. I whakaahuatia a Tēnā Tossell he "tangata tika" e toru ngā wā i te wiki, a, e haere ana me ana kurī. Kāore tonu i te mōhiotia te wāhi i haere ai ia ki te monastery i Maunga Skopos, e tata ana ki te kāinga o Argassi, ā, kāore i hoki ki te hōtēra i noho ai ia me tōna hoa ko Gillian. I tērā Paraire, tokoono ngā mema o te tīma i rere ki Zante, me ētahi atu tīma e whai ake nei. I mahi tahi ngā tūroro me ngā mana Kariki ki te rapu tonu i a Tēnā Tossell, engari "i muri i tētahi rapunga whānui" kua "tū rātou i ngā ngohe" ā, ka hoki mai ngā tūroro e 13 ki te UK. I kī tētahi kōrero: "Kia ora ki ngā whānau me ngā kaitukumahi kua tautoko i to mātau whakaurutanga. " Our team members have been thanked by local authorities for making an invaluable contribution. Ka pouri, kāore tonu i te mōhiotia te wāhi o Hoani. "We were honoured as a charity to help support a family of our local community by assisting in the search for John, and our thoughts are with John's relatives at this difficult time". I kī te tama a Gillian, a Leigh Griffiths, 46, i mua: "Kāore au i te whakaaro he wāhi mātou ki te kite ora i a Hoani", me te whakahē i ngā pirihimana Kariki, e kī ana kāore rātau i taki tika i te C KK.

title: Taki Rangirua: Te wero o Te Aotearoa mō te hokohoko o Kīriria
summary: Ko te wā heke mai o te rohe i waenganui i Aiarangi ki te Raki me te Whenua o Aiarangi e kitea ana he uaua nui i roto i ngā whakaritenga o Te Aotearoa, ā, ko te kōrero mō te "kore mahi" e āmaimai ana te tokomaha o ngā tāngata.
text: Nā Pirihi MorrisReality Check korero, BBC News Engari ehara i te mea i te UK anake tēnei take, nā te mea kei te whakawhirinaki te Whenua o Aiarangi ki te hokohoko ki Te Hononga o Ingarangi mō tōna oranga ohaoha. He nui ngā kōrero mō te hokohoko ki te raki-tonga puta noa i te rohe ki Aiarangi ki te Raki, me te hiahia ki te karo i ngā taki taitapa. Engari i roto i ngā tikanga ohaoha tino mārire, he hira kē atu te hokohoko ki te rāwhiti-uru puta noa i te Moana o Airana i waenganui o Aiarangi me Ingarangi. Ko te nuinga o ngā waka utanga e wehe atu ana i te Whenua o Aiarangi ka kawea ake mai i Dublin, me ngā ara tino pākaha ki ngā tauranga pērā i Liverpool me Holyhead. E tatau ana i ngā ipu E hia te nui o te hokohoko e kōrero ana tātau? Ko tētahi huarahi ine ko te titiro ki ngā raraunga i runga i ngā ipu utanga takahuri, ko te nuinga o rātou e mau ana i ngā kai me ētahi atu tūemi hokohoko e whakawhirinaki ana te tangata i ia rā. Ko te Roll-on, roll-off (Ro-Ro rānei) e pā ana ki ngā ipu e kawea ana i runga i ngā taraka, i ngā wakatū rānei, ā, ko te hiki-ake (Lo-Lo rānei) e pā ana ki ngā ipu e utaina ana ki runga i ngā kaipuke e ngā waro. (Āe, kei te hangaia tonutia a Rolos ki te tiakarete.) He mea nui te kawenga Ro-Ro mō ngā hua e hiahia ana kia tere te tae ki te mākete, mō ngā tukanga whakanao wā tonu rānei e whakawhirinaki ana ki ngā tukunga wae ia haora. I whakaputaina e te Tari Tatauranga Matua o Airangi ngā whika i te 29 o Hune, e whakaatu ana i te tau 2017 e 553,630 ngā ipu utanga Ro-Ro kua utaina, i runga i ngā taraka, i ngā tauranga rānei, i tukuna mai i Aiarangi ki ērā atu o te ao. Ko te nuinga o te panekōrero mo ētahi atu tauranga i te EU. He iti noa iho te tau - 24 - i haere ki ngā tauranga ki tētahi atu wāhi. Tata ki te 85% o te katoa o te hokohoko utanga EU o Aiarangi e haere ana mā ngā tauranga o Ingarangi - e 475,925 ngā ipu i tērā tau. Ka taea e tātau te whati kē atu i taua tau. E whakaaro ana te Pānga Waka Utanga o Airani ko te ūnga whakamutunga o te 60% o ngā ipu utanga e 475,925 i tukuna ki Ingarangi ko Ingarangi tonu. Ko te tikanga o tērā atu 40% - tata ki te 190,000 ia tau - kua whakaritea mō tētahi atu wāhi i te EU, e whakawhiti ana puta noa i Ingarangi mā ngā tauranga pēnei i Dover, Hull rānei, mā te Kauhanga Hongere. Kāore tētahi tangata e mōhio ana ki te tau tūturu, ahakoa kua whakaritea e te Tari Waka o Aiarangi he rangahau hōhonu e tika ana kia tukua ākuanei. Engari kotahi te mea e mārama ana: ko ngā momo pakarutanga, raruraru rānei i puta mai i te rahunga ki te tae ki tētahi whakaaetanga Pakihi, ehara i te mea anake ki te hokohoko a Aiarangi ki te UK, engari ki te hokohoko a Aiarangi ki ērā atu o te EU. Kaua e wareware i roto i tēnei tuhinga kātahi anō mātou ka titiro ki ngā kawenga ake o Airani. He rite tonu te whakamauru o Airangi ki te hokohoko ki te UK mo ana kawemai. I tēnei wā, ka tukuna e New Ferries Ireland te nui o ana kawenga ake ki ētahi atu whenua mā Ingarangi nā te mea he tere ake i te mahi i te haerenga katoa i runga i te moana. Ka taea e Airangi te ngana ki te tapahi i te arawhiti whenua o Ingarangi me te hokohoko hāngai ake ki ērā atu o te EU? Kai te mahia kētia ētahi hipanga ki tēnā ahunga. Kātahi anō ka whakamōhiotia e tētahi kamupene kaipuke o Rakapuō, a CLdN, e rua ngā waka utanga Ro-Ro hōu i runga i te ara moana hāngai mai i Dublin ki te tauranga Tatimana o Rotterdam, ki Zeebrugge hoki i Peretiama. Ko ngā waka waka hou ngā oko Ro-Ro moana poto nui rawa atu (kāore e whakawhiti moana) i te ao, ā, ka taea te kawe i ngā wae utanga e 650 i ia haerenga. I te iriiritanga o tētahi o rātou, te MV Celine, i Dublin i Aperira, ka kī te rangatira nui o te Kamupene Tauranga o Dublin, a Eamonn O'Reilly: "Ko te tāpiritanga o ngā kaipuke hou me ngā rerenga e whakaatu ana i te manawanui me te kaha o te wāhanga kaipuke ki te urutau ki te huri i ngā hiahia kiritaki, otirā hei urupare ki a Brexit." "E tūmanako ana mātou ka tohu a MV Celine i te tīmatanga o ētahi atu ratonga ki Uropi whenua mai i te tauranga o Dublin i ngā tau e heke mai nei." Kei te whakawāteatia kētia te kaha utanga tāpiri i runga i ngā ara waka i waenganui i Dublin me Cherbourg, i Wīwī, tae atu ki waenganui o Cork me Santander, i Paniora. Engari kia mōhio ai ki te nui o te whakawhirinaki a Airangi ki te piriti whenua o Ingarangi, e whakaatu ana ngā tatauranga mai i te Tauranga o Dublin i tērā tau i tukuna ai e ia e 31,875 ngā ipu Ro-Ro ki Peretiama me Hōrana, i a ia e tuku ana i ngā ipu 188,902 ki Holyhead anake. Nā reira, ahakoa kei te hangaia kētia ētahi mahere ohorere, kāore i te tino nui hei whakakapi i te hokohoko e haere ana ki Ingarangi rānei. A, he whakamaumahara tēnā e hiahiatia ana e Airangi he mahi pai ki te UK. Pānuitia ētahi atu mea mai i Reality Check Tukuna mai ō pātai Whāia mātou i Twitter

title: Coronavirus: Ka hoatu e Geoff Thomas ngā tohutohu taratahi i muri i te whakaoranga o te mate pukupuku
summary: Kua hoatu e tētahi kaiwhutupōro o Ingarangi o mua he tohutohu me pēhea te wehe i a ia anō, i muri i tana mahi i tēnā i te kitenga i a ia e mate ana i te kano toto.
text: E toru marama te ora o te kaiwaenga o Te Wāna Engari i muri i tana kitenga i te tau 2003, ka hinga ia i te mate e rua tau i muri iho. I tautuhia e Tamati "ngā whāinga iti" me te tohutohu "ki te mahi i ngā mahi iti kua whakawāteatia e koe mō ngā tau pea". He kaha te aki, ka kī a ia. "Kua eke ahau ki runga i taku paihikara pateko. Ka hoatu ki a koe te momo wheako mariko o te haere ki waho i te huarahi. "Ka taea e koe te eke me ō hoa. Tērā pea i roto i te ono wiki ka whiwhi pea koe i taua pōkai ono e hiahia ana koe mo nga tau maha." Engari i whakatūpato a ia kia noho tawhiti koe i ētahi atu, ahakoa i waho i runga paihikara. Kei te haere tōna whaea i ngā wāhanga tōmua o te mateware, ā, kei te noho tahi me ia, nā reira he take "kia haumaru hoki a ia, he tino hira". I tāpiri mai a ia: "Ko te taratahitanga he tino pōturi noa iho te horapa o tēnei huaketo, ā, kei te whakaora ora, nā reira kia mōhio koe kei te tākaro koe i tētahi wāhi nui i roto i tērā." I tīmataria e Tamati, he kairangi o te aroha o Cure Leukemia, te Tūāpapa o Te Wānanga o Te Wānanga i te tau 2005 ki te kohi moni hei whawhai i te mate pukupuku, ā, kua kohia e ia ngā miriona pauna. I kitea a ia i te mate pukupuku myeloid pūmau i te tau i muri i tana wehenga atu i te whutupōro, engari i murunga i muri i te mahinga me te whakawhiti pūtau tātā. Whāia a BBC West Midlands i Facebook, i Twitter, me te waitohu mō ngā whakahōutanga rongokōrero paetata hāngai tonu ki tō waea.

title: Covid-19: Fareham Live theatre project paused due to pandemic
summary: Kua puritia tētahi matatini toi me ngā whakangahau e £12m nā te taiepa coronavirus.
text: I te tau 2023 ka whakatuwheratia te matatini o Fareham Live hei whakakapi i te wāhi o Ferneham Hall i te taone o Hampshire. Fareham Borough Council said it had paused work for six months to revise its business plan in light of the impact Covid-19 has had on the arts sector. E kī ana kei te "tino tuku" tonu ki te kaupapa. The new venue, to be run by private operator BH Live, was approved in May and includes a theatre, community space and a bar and cafe. I tāruatia tētahi mahere pakihi hei whakahoki i te utu pūtea e £12m mō te kaunihera i mua i te pānga o te mate urutā. Engari he maha ngā whare tapere me ngā rōpū toi e uaua ana ki te ora me ngā ture tawhiti pāpori. I kī a Sue Bell, te mema nui o te kaunihera o Fareham mō te whakangahau me te hapori, he "pōhēhē" te haere tonu me te kore whakaaro ki ngā pānga pūtea o te mate urutā. "The decision to pause the project has been taken amidst a wave of uncertainty around the arts and entertainment industry that has had an impact on theatres and their operators across the country. " That said, I would like to reassure everyone that the Council remains absolutely committed to providing a superb new venue for Fareham's residents and the wider community."

title: Coronavirus stockpiling 'will hit vulnerable', says foodbank boss
summary: Ko te whakaputu kai i runga i ngā āwangawanga coronavirus ka pā ki te "tino mōrearea", kua whakatūpato tētahi rangatira pēke kai.
text: I kī a Sarah Broughton, kaiwhakahaere kaupapa i Bedford Foodbank, he pai te whakaputu i te aroha, engari ka whakatūpato ka iti iho ngā rawa mēnā ka maroke ngā koha. "Ki te mutu te hoatu a te tangata i roto i ngā wiki e ono e whai ake nei, ka pau te kai," tana kī. He tika te whakaputu mō "tētahi ohorere tērā pea ka puta" ki ngā tāngata kē i roto i te raruraru, ka tāpiri mai a ia. "The items people stockpile are the items we hand out, and the most vulnerable people we help are not able to stockpile... E hiahiatia ana e ngā tāngata e pā ana ki te raruraru te kai ināianei." Ko ngā tūemi pēnei i te whakapiri, te pukapuka wharepaku me ngā hupa i tino hiahiatia i waenganui i ngā tāngata "kāore e taea te putu", tana kī. I tēnei wā, e 22 tāhei kai tā te whare putunga o te aroha, engari ki te kore he rārangi wharepaku e homai, e tūmanako ana kia pau i roto i te wiki. I whiwhi te pēke kai i te 13 tāhei koha i te Hānuere, he mihi nui ki te "angitu tino angitu" o tana mahi maramataka whakamuri, i hangaia hei ātete i te tou tūturu o te Kirihimete. Engari e waru tāhei kai i te wā o Hui tanguru. "Ināianei kei te tika noa iho mātou. Kāore anō mātou kia tino nui - koinei te wā mangere o te tau." te kī a Ms Broughton. "E hiahia tonu ana mātou ki ngā koha." I kī a Carly Smith, mai i Bedford, nāna i whakamahi i ngā pēke kai i mua: "He atua rātou, he aho ora ina rongo koe kei te hinga koe hei matua, ā, kei te māuiui koe nā te kore kai. " Ko ngā tūemi pēnei i te pasta - he tūemi kai māmā - ko tāku i whakawhirinaki ai i taku hiahiatanga. "Mā te whakaputu i ngā tāngata e tango ana i tēnei i ngā tāngata me ngā whānau e raruraru ana." Kimihia te Rongokōrero o TE Rāwhiti o Ingarangi i Facebook, Instagram me Twitter. Mēnā he huatau pūrākau tāu, īmēra eastofenglandnews@bbc.co.uk

title: E rua tekau ngā kiriata e tangi ai te tangata
summary: Hei urupare ki te kōrero a te Pukapuka he aha te take i tangi ai ngā tāngata i te Toy Story 3, kua whakapā atu ngā kaipānui tāne ki tō rātou taha ā-hinengaro me te whakatuwhera mō ā rātou ake roimata tūmataiti. Anei tētahi tīpakonga.
text: 1. Kotahi tonu te tirohanga mōku, ko ngā Grey Havens i te mutunga o The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King. He maha ngā wā i kite ai ahau, engari ahakoa he tangata i roto i taku 30 tau, ka taea tonu e ia te haere i ia wā! Ko te ngākau o ngā kiripuaki, i a rātau patunga tapu whaiaro (otirā ko Frodo), me te tapeke tino nekeneke a Howard Shore ka tangi ahau i ngā wā katoa ki taua pukupuku i roto i te korokoro. Andy Bishop, Bromley, Kent 2. I roimata ahau i te Whakaoranga o Shawshank nā te hari me te hari e puta mai ana i te huihuinga anō o aua hoa e rua i taua one. Ko ngā uauatanga i pāngia e rātau me te mana o to rātau whakahoahoa e whakaoho ana i te hiahia ki ngā hoa pai i roto i a au. Āe, he tangi ahau, he whakahīhī! Chris Mattley, Lincoln 3. Whakaahuatia tēnei: ko ahau, ko taku wahine, ko tōna whaea me tōna pāpā, ko taku whaea me taku pāpā, ko ngā tamariki. Ka haere tahi mātau ki tētahi whitiāhua mo te wā tuatahi. Ka haere mātou ki Up, ā, ko te tangata anake i roto i te rōpū kāore i te tangi ko tōku hungawai. Ināianei kua whiwhi ahau i te tohu he karetao a ia. Kotahi haora te tangi o taku pāpā. I whakamātau ahau ki te pupuri, engari i te kaha o te patupatu o taku korokoro, he mōrearea ki te kore e tuku. Kātahi ka tukua e au kia tāhaetia pēnei i te kōtiro iti. Steve, West Kelowna, British Columbia 4. He whakamutunga kino tō One Flew Over The Cuckoo's Nest, ā, ka tangi ahau ina kaha rawa taku whakaaro ki taua mea, engari he rerekē te kaha o te roimata i runga i te pūtiro whakamutunga toa, ki te kite i tētahi mea pai, pai hoki e puta mai ana i taua pouri me te pouri. Mike, Essex 5. Ko te pikitia kotahi e tangi ana ahau i ia wā e mātakitaki ana ahau ko Marley rāua ko māua. Ina poroporoaki a ia ki a Marley e mate ana... Kei te tīmata ahau ki te whakakī i te whakaaro noa iho. Kāore au i te mōhio mēnā nā te mea he kurī tāku, ā, i puta i te mamae o te poroporoaki i mua i taku kurī o mua i tana matenga, engari mā tēnei pikitia ahau e tangi nui ake i tētahi atu. Chris Hennessey, Manchester 6. I a au e 18 tau te pakeke i roto i te RAF, ka whakaaturia e rātau te Champ ki ētahi o mātau he kaimahi mata. Kaore i roa ka mārire te rūma kī tonu i te toa tāne, ahakoa pōuri ka kite koe i ngā whatu kanapa. Kaore tētahi tangata i kaha ki te kōrero i te wehi ki te whakaatu i te reo wiri. Ko Keith Aisthorpe, Colombo, Sri Lanka 7. I tangi nui ahau i te mutunga o Te Pukatuhipoka kāore i tino kino engari i roto ahau i te haupae waenganui i roto i tētahi 747 pōkai, ā, ki taku whakaaro kāore tētahi atu tangata e mātakitaki ana. Aue, te whakamā. Bob 8. He tangata 48 tau ahau, he kaitākaro whutupōro me te kaiwhakataetae motopaika, ā, e whakaae ana ahau nā Babe i mahi mōku. I te mutunga tonu ka kī te kaiahuwhenua "Ka mahi tēnā Poaka". Ka tīmata ahau ki te whakaaro i taua mea. Chris, Bromsgrove, UK 9. Kore rawa ahau i tangi i ngā whitiāhua tae noa ki muri i te whānautanga o taku tamāhine. Ko te wā tuatahi ko Field of Dreams. I te wā i hopu a Kevin Costner me tōna pāpā, i te tangi ahau. Ka hokona e au te pikitia i ia wā ka puta mai i runga i tētahi mea hou (ataata, DVD, putanga huritau, Blu-Ray), ā, kei te tangi tonu ahau. Ko te mea, e tangi ana ahau i mua i taua tirohanga, i runga i te tūmanako. I tētahi rā, ina tukua te putanga holographic, ka tangi ahau ki a James Earl Jones ina kī ia "he moni hoki kei a rātou me te rangimārie kāore i a rātou". Anon, Westchester, USA 10. E rua noa iho ngā wā i kite ai ahau i taku Pāpā e tangi ana, ā, ko tētahi o rātou i te wā o Ngā Hariata Ahi. Lauren McConnell, Taunton 11. Ko te mutunga o The Railway Children, me Jenny Agutter e oma ana i raro i te pūhara e karanga ana "Papa, taku papa" ka whiwhi ahau i ia wā. E 25-30 ngā wā i kitea e au i roto i ngā tau, ā, i ia wā, he pakaru ahau. Ian Dickens, Beeston, UK 12. Ko te pakipūmeka sauna o Hinerangi, ko Steam of Life, he rongonui he roimata. Kaore ahau i whakapono kia haere rā anō ahau ki te mātakitaki, ā, i roimata katoa ngā tāngata i roto i te whare pikitia. He tuhinga tino pai, i te ara. Anu, Hekerangi, Hinerangi 13. He tino whakaaro te whakamutunga o te pakiwaituhi a Tom rāua ko Jerry o te tau 1941 The Night Before Christmas. Ka kite a Tom i a Jerry e whakatio ana i roto i te hukarere kawa mātao i waho o te whare, kātahi ka kino ki a Jerry. Ka whakamahanatia ia e ia i te taha o te ahi, ka hoatu he Candy Cane ki a ia hei koha, ā, ka mau a Jerry ki tētahi tāwhiti kiore e huna ana i roto i te peihana miraka a Tom, ā, ka noho hoa a Tom rāua ko Jerry. Koinei pea te tirohanga tino whakaaro i roto i te pakiwaituhi a Tom rāua ko Jerry. Joe Ross, Shoeburyness, Ingarangi 14. Man On Fire, me Denzel. Ka kitea e te hōia ngākau mārō o te waimarie te pai tūturu o te āhua o te tangata i roto i te tamaiti, ā, ka hoatu tōna ora hei utu mōna. Kaore e taea e au te mātakitaki me te kore tangi. Christopher, Milton Keynes 15. Ko te pikitia anake i whakapōrearea ai ahau ko te Ora he Ātaahua i te mutunga tonu i te wā ka eke te tamaiti iti ki runga i te kura i muri i te toa i te huna me te rapu, kātahi ka kimi i tōna whaea. Ko te mea kino rawa atu, i waenganui ahau i te rerenga ki Aotearoa, i te haurua i te ata, i te moe te katoa, ā, i te tangi ahau pēnei i te toru tau te pakeke kua pakaru tana pūangi. Mike Riley, Hampshire 16. I roimata ahau me taku tama 12 tau i roto i te whare pikitia, i te pātai tūwhera ki a rāua he aha te kōtiro i mate ai. Kāore au i te māharahara ki te roimata i mua i aku tama; Ki taku whakaaro he pai ki te whakamōhio atu ki a rātau he pai ki te whakaatu i ō whakaaro. Terence Fisher, Crawley, Ingarangi 17. Ko te moka i roto i te Tūtira Itari i tukitukia ai e te Mafia te Aston Martin a Michael Caine me ngā E-Types e rua i tangi ai ahau pēnei i te pēpi. Ben Halstead, Leeds, UK 18. I toa a Rocky i te taitara, ā, ka taea e ia te kī "'hāunga te whānautanga o taku tamaiti, koinei te rā tino nui i roto i te hītori o tōku oranga, e hiahia ana ahau ki te kōrero i tētahi mea, ki taku wahine i te kāinga, ki a Yo Adrian... I mahia e au!" Ka whiwhi ahau i ia wā! Pene, Hartlepool 19. Ko Tōku Ora hei Kurī, he pikitia Huitene e mātaki ana i tētahi taitama 12 tau, ko Ingemar, e raruraru ana ki te ora me tētahi whaea mate mate me tētahi pāpā ngaro, tae atu ki te tūtaki i ngā whanaketanga pūnoa katoa e whakaaturia mai ana e te ora ki a tātau. Ko te roimata mōku he pēhea te whakamātau a Ingemar ki te whakarite i te pūrākau o Laika (he kaupapa e rere ana puta noa i te pikitia katoa), he kurī i tukuna ki te mokowā me te rerenga mate kua taurangitia. Ka whakamarie tonu a Ingemar i a ia ki te "kino ake pea te ora" - [Kei te roimata ahau] ināianei. Patrick, Newcastle upon Tyne 20. Mēnā e hiahia ana ahau ki tētahi tangi purgative tino pai, me tino pono, pōrangi, hōhonu. Kotahi anake te kiriata ka taea e au te mātakitaki i a au anake. Haimona, Horley, UK

title: E whakaae ana te Emir o Kano o Nigeria ki te tangohanga
summary: E kī ana tētahi o ngā kaiārahi Mohimana me ngā kaiārahi tūturu o Naria, te Emir o Kano, e whakaae ana ia ki tōna whakawāteatanga hei "hiahia o te Atua".
text: I whakawāteatia a Muhammadu Sanusi II i te Mane mo te "whakahāwea", te kī a te kāwanatanga o Kano. I arahina ia ki waho o te whare kōti e nga āpiha haumarutanga, a, ka whakakapia e te tama a tōna tuatahi, a Aminu Ado Bayero. I roto i ana kōrero tuatahi mai i tana whakawāteatanga, ka karanga a Tēnā Sanusi ki te marino, kia "whakawhiwhi" hoki te iwi ki te emiri hou. "I roto i Tōna Whakaaro Nui mutunga kore, i hiahia te Atua kia noho ahau hei emir o Kano, nā reira i whakatorona ahau i te 8 o Pipiri 2014. Tata tonu ki te ono tau ahau i runga i te torona. Engari i tenei ra kua hiahia hoki te Atua kia whakarerea e au te torona. Kua tangohia e au i runga i te whakapono pai," tana kī i roto i tētahi karere ataata. "E karanga ana mātou ki te iwi kia marino. " E tohutohu ana mātau i o mātau whānau me o mātau tamariki kia awhi i te emir hou. Ko te tikanga kia tiakina e rātau te taonga tuku iho o tēnei whare," tana tāpiri mai. Kāore i te mārama ki hea ngā āpiha haumarutanga i mau ai a Tēnā Sanusi, engari mā te tikanga ka tūmanakohia ia kia noho manene i waho o te emirate mo te toenga o tōna oranga. Ko ia te rangatira pēke matua o Nigeria i mua i tana nohonga ko te Emir o Kano i te raki o te nuinga o te Mohimana. I kī te mahi a te emir i tangohia a Tēnā Sanusi "kia tiakina ai te tapu, te ahurea, te tikanga, te whakapono me te mana o te emira o Kano", e whakapae ana i te emir o te "whakahāwea katoa" o ngā rōpū me te tari kāwana. Engari he tokomaha e kī ana i whakahauhautia tana pananga i runga i te tautohetohe roa ki te kāwana o Kano Abdullahi Parata Whakarārangi. I muri i te takanga atu ki a ia i te tau 2017, kāore a Tēnā Sanusi i haere ki ngā taumahi kāwanatanga me ngā hui whai mana, e kī ana te kāwanatanga o te kāwanatanga ki te "whakahāwea katoa". Ko te whakakore a te emiri kia puta ki mua i te pae e uiui ana i nga whakaaro hāmate ki a ia, kaore hoki i pai te haere ki te kāwanatanga. E whakapaea ana a ia ki te hoko rawa me te whakahaere moni hē, engari i whiwhi ia i tētahi whakahau kōti e tū ana i te rūpahu. Ko te matua o tōna kaiwhakakapi ko Aminu Ado Bayero te Emir o Kano neke atu i te hawhe rau tau tae noa ki tōna matenga i te tau 2014.
