I kitea a Tēnā Sanusi he kaiwhakatikatika, ā, i whakahē i ētahi kaupapa here kāwanatanga - he āhuatanga i auau ai tana whakauru ki ngā kaipōrangapū whakahaere. Tērā pea ka hiahia koe ki:

title: Tūtaki i te pūtea Pirihimana: Ka whakatūpato te taone nui o Rāwāhi ki te pikinga o te tāke kaunihera
summary: Kua kī te Koromatua o Rānōna, a, ka "pea" ka whakarewaina e ia te tāke kaunihera mā te mokatere mōrahi hei āwhina ki te utu i te mōkito o te pūtea pirihimana.
text: I kī atu a ia ki a BBC Radio London ka taea e ia te whakarite i te kaupapa a te kāwanatanga kia tāruatia e ngā mana ā rohe te whakahau pirihimana i runga i ngā pire tāke kaunihera. Kua rite tonu te karanga a te taone nui ki ētahi atu pūtea mō te ope. Tae atu ki Aperira, e 29,924 ngā pirihimana o Scotland Yard, i te wā e 31,075 i Hānuere 2017. I kī a Tēnā Kani kua anga atu nga Pirihimana Tūtaki ki te £1bn i roto i te tapahi mai i te tau 2010. I raro i te whakataunga pūtea pirihimana i pānuitia i tērā wiki, ka taea e ngā mana te whakanui ake i te huānga pirihimana o te tāke kaunihera tae atu ki te £24 mō te toharite o te āhuatanga o te Tāhei D - ahakoa me uiui ngā tangata i te tuatahi. I tērā tau, ka whakanuia e te koromatua te ture tāke kaunihera mā te 5.1%, te £14.20 rānei mō te kāinga toharite. He tapahi nui i roto i te mahi pirihimana i kī atu a ia ki te teihana reo irirangi i rongo a ia i te "tukua" e te mahi a te kāwanatanga. Ka kī a Tēnā Kani: "Ko tāku e mahi nei ko te whakarite kia whakakīa e au te rua i mahue i ngā tapahi nui i roto i te mahi pirihimana, ā, ka pānuitia e au taku tahua i tēnei wiki e pā ana ki ētahi atu moni ka taea e au te hoatu ki te pirihimana mā te kohi tāke kaunihera me ētahi atu utauta kei roto i taku kete utauta." I tāpiri mai a ia: "Ehara i te mea mīharo ka whakamahia pea e au ngā mana hei whakarewa i te tāke kaunihera ki te whakamahi i taua moni mō ētahi atu mahi pirihimana." Nō tēnei tau, e 131 ngā tāngata i kōhuru i Rāwāhi, e kī ana a Tēnā Kani kāore i te whakaaetia. "E kore au e whakatakune ka taea e tātau te hopu i to tātau ara ki waho o tēnei... ko tāku e mahi nei ko te whakakī i te rua e toe ana i te tapahi i te pirihimana," tana kī.

title: E māia ana a Paratira ki te angitu o te papa hinu o Pāroa
summary: "Tote Tōmua". He kupu kāore anō kia rangona e tētahi tangata i waho o te umanga hinu, ahakoa i rongo rātou, he ruarua noa iho ngā tīwhiri ki tōna āhuatanga.
text: Nā Wyre DaviesTe korero kōrero o Rio de Janeiro Engari ko aua kupu e rua e mau ana i te kī ki ngā tūmanako a Parīhi kia noho hei kaiwhakanao hinu nui, e whiwhi ana i te nuinga o ngā tāra moni me te āwhina ki te whakarewa i tētahi mahi ngoikore. Kāore i tawhiti atu i te takutai o te Kāwanatanga o Rio de Janeiro, ā, ki te raki ki te rāwhiti o te taone takutai rongonui te rohe e pātai ana. He putunga hinu tino nui tē mōhiotia; 1,500 sq km (579 sq miles) me te 326m (1,070ft) hōhonu. Ahakoa e takoto pai ana i raro i te moenga moana, i raro i te apa mātotoru o te toka me te tote, e kīia ana he tino mōrearea te kitenga. He rerekē ngā whakatau tata, engari ka taea te pupuri i te maha o ngā pae hinu e 12bn. Kua karangatia te kimi ko "Libra" ā, kei te hokona e Parīhi ngā mana hei whakawhanake i te pae, me ētahi aho tino kikī e āpiti ana. Ko Magda Chambriard te Tumuaki Tianara o te National Oil Agency o Brazil. Ki a ia he āhuatanga win-win. I kōrerorerotia e mātau a Pāroa me ōna pānga ki Paratira hei kaiwhakanao hinu huri noa, i tōna tari matua o Te Ao o Aotearoa. I ākiritia e ia, me te menemene whakarihariha, ngā huatau kāore i te whenua te wheako, te hanganga rānei hei whakatikatika i tētahi mahi nui pēnei i te whanaketanga o te papa Pāroa. "He tino pai te whakarite i ngā mea katoa. He pūhara hou, he arapae hou, he nui ake ngā hanganga," te kī a te wahine i whakaakona hei kaipūkaha hinu, engari ināianei ko tētahi o ngā whika tino kaha i roto i te umanga. "Kei te tika ngā mea katoa i konei i Paratira, nā reira e tino mōhio ana mātou ka pai ngā mea katoa." Ki te raki o Rio de Janeiro, ko te kāinga hī ika iti o Macae te wāhi whenua tata ki ngā mara o waho. Ehara i te mea tino El Dorado, engari ko ngā utu āhuatanga i konei kei waenganui kē i ngā mea teitei rawa o te whenua, ā, i ēnei rā, he kaha ake te haruru o ngā waka hī ika e kawe ana i ngā kaimahi ki ngā taputapu tīariari i te haruru o ngā poti hī ika huri noa i ngā mānawa. I te mōhiotanga ki te hiahia kōhukihuki mō ngā kaimahi āheinga mēnā e hiahia ana a Paratira ki te mahi i te nuinga o tōna pūkenga hinu e tū mai nei, kei te whakangungu te mana ā rohe i konei i ngā rau tāngata ki te mahi i runga i ngā taputapu. He tokomaha nga kaimahi manene mai i ētahi atu wāhi o Parīhi, pēnei i a Claudia, e 32 tau te pakeke, e ako ana ki te noho hei kaimahi pūkenga. "Nō hea ahau, i Bahia, ka pouri kāore he mahi - kei konei katoa," te kī mai a Claudia ki a au. "E toru ki te whā marama te roa o te whakangungu, ā, kei roto ahau ināianei i ngā wāhanga whakamutunga. Engari he koreutu, ā, kei te mahi tonu ahau i te kamupene e tūmanako ana ahau kia whiwhi mahi." E ai ki a Claudia, neke atu i te hawhe o te iwi i tōna kāinga ki te raki-rāwhiti kua haere roa ki te tonga, e tūmanako ana ki tētahi mahi utu pai, pēnei i a ia, i te wāhanga hinu. I te pānuitanga o te tukanga tono mō te hokonga Pāroa, he tino mīharo i te tokomaha o ngā kaiwhakarato hinu nui, tae atu ki te PĀ, te Rōpū HONONGA, te Rōpū WHK, te Wānanga me te Chevron, i whakatau kia kaua e tomo. He tino nui te whakauru ki ētahi atu wāhi o te wāhanga pūngao rerekē o Parīhi, engari he tokomaha nga kaitirotiro e kī ana ko te nui o ngā hua e hiahiatia ana e te kāwanatanga o Pārihia me ngā here pākaha o te rīhi i whakapati i ētahi kamupene kia huri tuarā ki Pārihi. Kua whakamāramatia e Parīhi e tūmanako ana kia noho ki tētahi wāhi i te rohe o te 70% o ngā hua mai i te papa Pāroa. Ko wai e toa ana i te tono, ka tino titiro ki ngā whakahoki roa, ehara i te wā poto, i te mea ka hiahiatia e te whakawhanake i te kimi te $200bn (£123bn). Aue, ā, he utu tāpiri kotahi, tōmua o te $5bn ki te kāwanatanga o Pārihia hei utu mo te toa hoki i te hokonga. Ahakoa rā, he rau rau ngā kamupene iti me te waenga e tino pai ana te mahi i muri i te pūkenga hinu o Parīhi. Ko ngā kamupene pēnei i te Rōpū Swire o Ingarangi, he nui ōna wheako ki waho i ētahi atu taiao wai hōhonu, e tohunga ana ki te whakarato ipu me ngā taura mō te umanga. Ināianei e 50 ngā tāngata e whakamahia ana e Swire i tōna tipu i Macae. Ākuanei ka neke rātau ki ngā kāinga hou, nui ake i tērā taha o te taone, ā, e tūmanako ana ki te whakanui ake i ā rātou kaimahi kia whā ngā wā i roto i ngā tau e rima e whai ake nei. "Me whakatata koe ki tēnei mai i tētahi tirohanga Pārihi," te kī a Marcelo Nacif, te kaiwhakahaere ahuwhānui o Swire. "Me whai tāngata paetata koe e mārama ana ki te ahurea me ngā tikanga here, ā, me urutau koe." Ko te raina o raro, e kī ana a Tēnā Nacif, me haere ngā kamupene tohunga pēnei i a ia ki te wāhi e noho ana te hinu, ā, mō tēnei wā, ko Parīhi tērā. "Kei te taha whakararo te Moana ki te Raki, e tika?" tana pātai whakapuaki. "I ia rā he iti iho te hinu, he iti iho te korohū i reira, nō reira ki te kore aua kamupene e titiro ki Amerika ki te Tonga me Āwherika ā muri ake nei ka tīngongo a rātau umanga." Tērā tonu tētahi āhuatanga tino parenga me te ārai ki te mahi umanga i Paratira, ā, ko ētahi i konei e whakahē ana ki te whakauru atu ki ngā umanga kē, ahakoa he aha, i roto i te tukanga tono Pāroa. Kātahi anō ka haere atu ngā kaimahi o te kamupene hinu kāwanatanga o Parīhi, o Petrobras, ki te tuki i te take me ta rātau hiahia kia nui ake ngā utu. Engari, e kī ana te tokomaha o nga kaitirotiro, he uaua te mārama ki a rātau tautohetohe. Kāore i a Paratira te kaha, te kaha rānei ki te whakawhanake i a Libra i a ia anō, kāore i te tino kaha. Heoi anō, i raro i te koti tōtika e whakahau ana a Paratira i te kaihoko toa kia mau, he whakaritenga me tiritiri e Petrobras te 30% o te mahi hou, ā, ka whakaaetia ki te whakahaere i ngā taputapu katoa i te papa hou. I nga wā katoa ka kitea he manaakitanga, he kanga te hinu. I runga i ngā paenga rawakore o Macae, ko te 10% anake o ngā tangata whai pūkenga parakaingaki taketake, kei te pākaha te hara, engari ko ētahi whakapainga e mahia ana e te mana ā rohe. Kua kī taurangi a Perehitini Dilma Rousseff kia whakahokia ngā moni hinu hinu katoa o Parīhi ki ngā ratonga pāpori me ngā mahi tūmatanui, engari ko ngā mahi a Paratira ki te hau mai i te hokonga o Pāroa, ka tino mātakina i konei.

title: E anga ana te whare karakia ki te pire £1.5m i muri i ngā tāhaetanga tukurua
summary: Nā te tūkinotanga me ngā tāhae auau i mahue ai tētahi whare karakia Pākehā e anga ana ki tētahi pire tapi e £1.5m.
text: I te tau 2014, i tangohia e Hato Hoani te Kaikauwhau, i Oulton, i Te Hauauru, i te tau 2014, nā reira he waipuke nui. Ahakoa ngā mahi ki te pare i te Kōeke II kua rite tonu te tūtuki a ngā kaiwawao whare mai i taua wā, ka kī te minita. Nō nā tata nei i tangohia ngā pōhatu haki me tētahi pūkawe uira, ka waiho ngā pārihi "ngākau pouri". Ētahi atu mea mai i Aotearoa I kī ai te Rev Sarah Hancox: "I tae mai ahau ki konei mō te waru wiki i te wā i tāhaetia katoatia ai e mātau te ārahi i to mātau tuanui, te roanga katoa, ka mahue i a ia ngā puare nunui kia ringihia noa iho ai te wai." Nā tētahi pūtea Tuku iho me te kohi moni paetata i taea ai e rātau te tīmata i ngā tapi, engari he whakapōauau ētahi atu tāhaetanga, ka kī a ia. "Kua pāngia mātau e ngā tāhae maha me te tūkinotanga, e toru ngā rota rere, tae atu ki tētahi o te tēpoko, me te tāhaetanga hoki o te pūkawe uira, ā, nō nā tata nei ko te tāhaetanga o te papa pōhatu. " He tino whakapōrearea te ūnga anō. We hope the community come together like they did when the lead on the roof was stolen." E whakapono ana a Rev Hancox ko te pire katoa hei whakaora me te whakatuwhera anō i te whare karakia e tata ana ki te £1.5m. "We do need a lot of money but I think we can see it happening, with grants and the community working together." I kī a Parishioner David Cove he nui te tautoko i te rohe mo te whakaoratanga. "Kei te kohi moni mātou, he tino mīharo, mai i ngā tāngata kāore i te tino pā ki te hāhi, engari e taonga tonu ana. " He mea nui kia tapia," tana kī. I kī a Elizabeth Tonks, te katipa o te whare karakia, he mīharo te pīpī o ngā tāhaetanga. "He ngākau pouri," tana kī. "Kāore mātou e pīrangi kia kati, engari he nui rawa ngā mahi hei mahi."

title: Fresh consultation on care homes closure plans
summary: Ka tū tētahi whakaaro hou mo te katinga marohi o ngā kāinga tiaki kāinga NHS i Aiarangi ki te Raki.
text: Nā Marie-Louise ConnollyBBC Northern Ireland health correspondent The Health and Social Care Board i whakaae he hinganga i te āhua o te whakahaeretanga o te take, engari i kī ka āta whakatata atu ngā huringa ā muri ake. I tohua ngā kāinga tiaki i ngā wāhi whirinaki ki te raki, ki te tonga, ki te uru hoki mō te katinga i Aperira. I Mei, i whakahaua e te minita hauora ngā whakawhirinaki kia whakatārewatia ngā mahere whakaritenga. I whai te nekehanga i te hīanga tūmatanui, me ngā whānau me ngā tangata whenua e riri ana ki te whakahaere i taua take. I a ia e kōrero ana i te Wenerei, ka kī a Tēnā Poots he wā tēnei kia haere mai te tangata i te tuatahi, ehara i te whare. "E maioha ana ahau ki te mea koia tēnā e mahia ai ngā mea ā muri ake nei," tana kī. "It doesn't mean that residential care homes won't close in some locations across Northern Ireland. " What it does mean is that each person will be treated as an individual, that their views will be listened to, they'll be respected and that will be core to this, that this will be about the individual not about the facility." I kī te uniana hauora, a Unison, ahakoa kāore i whakaaetia e ngā kāinga noho ngā tangata mo te wā roa, i roto i te rima tau kāore i te rawaka ngā tāngata hei whakatika i te whakatuwheratanga i a rātou. I Oketopa, me uiui te poari hauora he aha ngā paearu me whakamahi hei aromatawai i te wā heke mai o te kāinga. I kī te tumuaki o te Tiaki Pāpori me ngā Tamariki, a Fionnuala McAndrew, ka pūataata ake te tukanga. "Kaore tētahi tangata e kī ka whakahaua ngā pakeke kia wehe i tō rātou kāinga," tana kī. "Our experience is that when you work with families, you show people alternatives. " We take our time to ensure that people are satisfied and ready for the change, that that can be done successfully." Any major changes, including proposed closures, will require a second consultation. Ahakoa he nui ake te ine o te urupare a te poari i tēnei wā, e mārama ana te AO ki tōna whakaaro kia ōrite tonu tōna whakaaro - kia kati i te nuinga o ngā kāinga tiaki o Aiarangi ki te Raki. Ko te tikanga o tērā pea ka kati ētahi atu kāinga i roto i ngā tau e toru ki te rima e whai ake nei i te noho tuwhera. I Mei, ka whakahē te komihana mō ngā pakeke i te kore whakaaro ki ngā kainoho i ngā kāinga tiaki kāinga NHS e anga ana ki te katinga. I whakaahuatia e Claire Keatinge te mamae i whakapuakina i roto i te pāpāho, ki tōna tari hoki e ngā pakeke me o rātau whānau he "tino nui". "The Health and Social Care Board, I understand they did give a commitment that nobody will be forced to leave a statutory residential care home," she said. "They need to stand over that and they need to show people what the alternatives are if a home is closing, they need to show that the alternative is better. " The people in care homes need to be absolutely sure that they understand what their choices are and if their choice is to stay in the care home, they need to be able to express that clear."

title: Ka kite te mekameka ahua tuihono o Boohoo i ngā hokonga me ngā hua e pana ana
summary: Kua pūrongotia e te umanga ahua tuihono a Boohoo ngā hokonga me ngā hua kaha o te tau katoa.
text: I kite te rōpū i te 97% o te pekenga moni ki te £579.8m i te tau ki Poutāpeta, i te pikinga o te hua tāke tōmua i te 40% ki te £43.3m. I āwhinatia te tipu e te Pretty Little Thing kātahi anō ka whiwhia, i pā ki te 228% te pikinga o ngā hoko ki te £181.3m. I kī ngā rangatira o Mahmud Kamani rāua ko Carol Kane kua tutuki ngā hua ki te "āhua o te tauhokohoko uaua i te wāhanga kākahu o UK". 'Te kohikohi i te nekehanga' I tāpiritia e rātau: "I kaha tonu te tipu o te moni hua mai i Boohoo, i te wā he mahinga tino pai mai i te Mea Iti Ataahua, ā, i hipa atu a Nasty Gal i a mātau whakaaro i tōna tau tuatahi. " I whakaaturia e tā mātou umanga ao whānui ngā pāpātanga tipu tiketike ake, ā, e koa ana mātou ki tōna āwhina kohikohi." I kī te umanga e 6.4 miriona ngā kiritaki hohe o Boohoo ināianei, tae atu ki te 22% i tērā tau. I piki ake ngā hea i Boohoo i te 14.5% i te hokohoko o te ata i Rānana. Kua kite te kamupene ā-Manatū i ngā hokonga me tana utu tiritiri i roto i ngā tau tata nei, i te mea kua toa ngā kiritaki taitamariki i ōna utu iti rawa i runga i te āhua hou. Ko te tauira pakihi a Boohoo, e mōhiotia ana ko te "whakamātau me te tārua", i hangaia huri noa i te whakamātautau mākete i ngā tūemi whānui i tōna pae. Kātahi ka raupapa anōtia ngā mea e paingia ana. Mā te hanga i te hawhe o ana hua i te UK, e kī ana te umanga ka taea e ia te tuku wā whakarerekē noa mō ngā kāhua hōu mō te whā ki te ono wiki. Ehara i te whakawhirinaki ki te mākete tūturu, ka arotahi a Boohoo ki ngā kaiwhakaawe pāpāho pāpori, ngā kairangitaki, ngā haerenga ākonga me ngā takahanga pēnei i ngā pihi me ngā whetū pouaka whakaata rangirua mai i te whakaaturanga raumati o Love Island, kia toa ai i tōna mākete ūnga o ngā tau 16-30 tau.

title: Ka tīmata anō a Pirihitini i muri i te whakamataku
summary: Kua tukua te whetū pahū o Pirihitini i te hōhipera, ā, kua hoatu ki a ia te rama kākāriki hei tīmata anō i tana haereere i muri i te matenga o ngā raruraru hāora i runga i te atamira.
text: E 20 meneti te wā o te whakaaturanga o te Rāwiki i te O2 Arena i Rāwāhi i te kōrero a tana kaiwhakahaere ki te huihuinga he "mārama te manawa". I muri iho ka tirohia e ia i te hōhipera, engari e tūmanakohia ana kia mahia i te Paraire. I haere tonu tana wiki takahanga i mua i te Paraire i te wā i whakaahuatia ai ia e tū ana ki tētahi kaiwhakaahua. I puta te tautohetohe i te putanga atu o Te Papa Lane ki roto i tētahi motokā tatari. "Tukuna nga paps kia whiwhi i te tino pai ki a au," tana tuhituhi i muri i te mahinga. "I ētahi wā ina pana ngā tāngata i ngā kāmera ki tō kanohi puta noa i te rā me te hāparangi i te mea kino rawa atu ki a koe... he tangata ahau." Ko te whakaaturanga o te pō Paraire te konohete whakamutunga o tētahi oma pō whā i te O2 Arena. Ka neke atu te kaiwaiata ki Potukara me Paniora a tērā wiki, ā, e 63 ngā rā ora e toe ana i tana haereere ki te ao, tae noa ki Aotearoa. 'Gettin better' I muri i te whakaaturanga o te Tāite, ka tuhituhi te manawa i runga i te Twitter kei te "pai ake" a ia. Ka haere tonu a ia: "Ngā mihi mō ngā tāngata katoa e kukume ana i ahau i te pō nei. ngā kaipāngai tino pai o te ao. te whakaaro i te mea i tūpono. Ngā mihi mō te aroha." I tukuna hoki e ia tētahi pikitia mōna anō, mā te Instagram, e takoto ana i roto i te āhua nei he moenga hōhipera me te tapanga "kia pai ake". I kī tana kaikōrero a Melissa Victor: "I ngoikore a ia, a, ka 20 meneti, a, ka hoatu he hāora." I roto i tētahi ataata i whakairihia e tētahi pīataata i YouTube, i kitea te kaiwhakahaere o Scooter Braun i runga i te atamira e whakamārama ana i te take i tū rangitahi ai te whakaaturanga. Ka kī atu a ia ki ngā kaipāngai: "He tino mārama te manawa o Pirihi, te whakaaturanga katoa i amuamu ai ia. Kei muri a ia me ngā EMT [kaihangarau rongoā ohorere] me te tākuta. "E kī ana rātau ki a ia e hiahia ana rātau kia haere ia ki te kite i tētahi tangata me te kimi he aha te mea e pā ana ki ōna pūkahukahu, kātahi anō ka kī mai ia ki a au i roto i te rima meneti, mēnā kei te pai ki a koutou, ka puta mai ia ki waho ki te whakaoti i te whakaaturanga. " Nā reira kāore pea a ia i te peke haere me ētahi atu mea, me manawanui koutou ki a mātau, kāore mātou e ngana ana ki te whakaute, kāore mātou e ngana ana ki te tiki tōmuri i a koutou ki te kāinga, kei te tino ngana mātou ki te whakaaturanga mō ngā tāngata e aroha ana ki a ia." I hoki mai a Bieber ki te whakaoti i te whakaaturanga i mua i te tirotiro a nga kaimahi rongoā. He rua wiki āwhiowhio tā te kaiwaiata i te UK, e whakaahuatia ana i roto i ngā karapu pō maha, i waenganui i ana konohete i Manchester, Liverpool, Birmingham, Nottingham me London. I whakahētia a ia mo te pupuri i ngā kaihautū e tatari ana i muri i tana haerenga mai ki runga i te atamira mo te mahinga o te Mane i Rānana.

title: Nohoanga noho kore kainga: ētahi atu amuamu ki ngā kaunihera
summary: Tērā te nui o ngā amuamu mō ngā nohoanga i tukuna ki te hunga noho kore kāinga i Ingarangi, kua kī te Ombudsman Kāwanatanga Paetata (LGO).
text: Nā Mike SergeantLocal government correspondent, BBC News An LGO report describes a "worrying trend" of councils putting an increasing number of homeless families into bed and breakfast accommodation. Kua piki ake ngā amuamu ki te poungaio i te 14% i roto i te rua tau, e kī ana. I kī te Pānga Kāwanatanga Paetata he pai te mahi a ngā kaunihera "i roto i ngā āhuatanga uaua." I kī te LGO i whakataua kia whakaputaina he maha o ngā pūrākau takitahi kia aro atu ai ki te take. Kei roto i a rātou te kēhi o "Bruce" - he 16 tau te pakeke e ono marama e noho ana i roto i tētahi tēneti nā te mea i whakakāhore ia i te tono moenga me te parakuihi a tana kaunihera. Ko tētahi atu tauira ko "Kimi" - i noho tahi me tana tamāhine i roto i te moenga me te parakuihi "kāore i te tika" mō te 24 wiki - 18 wiki roa ake i te tepe ā-ture. Tērā anō tētahi pūrākau o tētahi whānau tokorima i whakaritea he rūma kotahi hei noho mo te rima marama. He moni tāpiri i kī te poungaio kua nui ake te tokomaha o ngā tāngata noho kore kāinga i te UK, ā, he nui ake te pēhanga o ngā ratonga noho kore kainga o te kaunihera. I te tau 2012/13, e 53,540 ngā kāinga i whakaaetia hei noho noho kore, i whakaritea ki te 44,160 i tērā tau, ka kī te pūrongo. I te 31 o Poutāpeta 2013, e 4,500 ngā kāinga i roto i te moenga me te parakuihi i whakaritea ki te 2,310 i te rā kotahi i te tau 2011. Engari i kī te kāwanatanga kua hoatu he moni tāpiri ki ngā kaunihera kia haere tonu ai rātau ki te whakahaere i "tētahi o ngā whatunga tautoko tino pai i te ao". Housing Minister Kris Hopkins said "Homelessness remains lower than in in 27 of the last 30 years. " Ko te nuinga o ngā kaunihera he whānau whare, engari me whakaara ake e te iti rawa ta rātau kēmu". I kī te kāwanatanga i ngā whika o nā tata nei i whakaatu i te rerekētanga nui o te āhua o te āwhina a ngā kaunihera i ngā tāngata noho kore, me ngā kaunihera 15 anake e kaute ana mō te tata ki te 80% o ngā whānau katoa e noho ana i te moenga me te parakuihi mō neke atu i te ono wiki. I te tīmatanga o tēnei tau, i whakarewaina he pūtea £1.9 miriona - me te āwhina mō ngā kaunihera e whitu ki te kimi huarahi pai ake ki te whakatutuki i ngā hiahia whare o ngā whānau mōrearea. I kī te LGO i te whakamahinga o te moenga me te parakuihi i te nuinga o te wā ka noho ngā whānau me ngā rangatahi i roto i ngā āhuatanga kōpikopiko me te tiritiri i ngā pānga ki ngā pakeke tērā pea he raruraru nui - hei tauira, me te waipiro me ngā rongoā. Councils have a legal duty to arrange accommodation when they have reason to believe that an applicant may be homeless and in priority need. Engari e kore e tika te nohoanga moenga me te parakuihi mō ngā whānau whai tamariki whakawhirinaki, tae atu ki ngā wāhine hapū. Councils can place whānau in bed and breakfast accommodation if there is no alternative, for a maximum of six weeks. I kī te LGO i amuamu ngā kaunihera he pānga nui ki ngā pēhanga o ngā moni a te mana ā rohe ki tō rātou kaha ki te whakarato whare tika. Cllr Mike Jones, Chairman of the LGA's Environment and Housing Board, said:"Councils are doing a good job tackling homelessness under increasingly difficult circumstances. " Since 2009 the use of temporary accommodation has fallen by 11%, despite the number of people approved for homelessness assistance rising by almost a third. "The use of Bed and Breakfast accommodation is an option of last resort but with council housing waiting lists standing at 1.8 million, local authorities often have little choice but to use temporary accommodation. " Ko te mana tawhito o ngā tepe nama a ngā kaunihera e āwhina ana ki tēnei raruraru. This report highlights why the Government must as a matter of urgency, lift the borrowing cap which is preventing councils from building up to an additional 60,000 new homes over the next five years."

title: Ka piki te tepenga utu kāri kore whakapā ki te £20
summary: Kua piki ake te tepenga utu mō ngā hokonga mā te whakamahi i te hangarau kāri ngaru-me-haere mai i te £15 ki te £20.
text: Ka utua e ngā kiritaki ngā tūemi iti mā te pupuri i tā rātou kāri nama, kāri nama rānei ki tētahi pūpānui me te kore tāuru waehere Pin. E rima tekau ngā kaihoko ā-motu ināianei e whakamahi ana i te pūnaha i roto i ā rātou pātaka, tae atu ki Greggs, Boots me McDonald's. Ka tae mai te pikinga tepe i mua i te tīmatanga o te Poutāpeta ki te tāpiri i ngā kāpeka utu kore whakapā ki ōna peka 11,500 katoa. "E hari ana mātou ki te tuku hangarau tapahi mā te whatunga Post Office," te kī a Lesley Sewell, te āpiha mōhiohio matua i Post Office Limited. "Mā te kore whakapā e kawe mai ngā painga nui ki ā mātou kiritaki mā te whakaiti i ngā wā tauwhitinga." Ngā tauwhitinga tere Ko te huringa o te uara mōrahi ka taea te whakapau i te wā kotahi ka kawea mai te UK ki te tepenga 25 hōro o te rohe ūropi. Ka pā te pikinga ki te £20 i roto i ngā pātaka i tētahi wāhanga i waenganui i te Paraire 1 o Pipiri me te mutunga o te marama. Mā te hangarau kore whakapā e āhei ai ngā kaipupuri kāri ki te pēhi i tā rātou kāri nama ki tētahi pūoko i ngā mano o ngā toa UK ki te rēhita utu. Ka tangohia aunoatia te moni mai i tā rātou pūkete pēke, ka tāpirihia rānei ki tā rātou pire kāri nama. Kua whānui ake te whakamahi i te hangarau i Āhia ki te Rāwhiti, i reira ka purua te maramara i roto i tētahi kāri kirihou ki tētahi tūemi ia rā pēnei i te waea pūkoro, i te wati rānei. I kī a Melanie Johnson, te tūru o te UK Cards Association: "Kua āta neke ngā tauwhitinga uara iti mai i te moni ki te kāri. " Ko ngā kāri kore whakapā e whakarato ana i tētahi atu tikanga māmā, tere hoki mō te utu i ngā taonga me ngā ratonga utu iti. "Ka kawea mai e rātou te taumata parenga ōrite ki ngā kāri kirihou tūturu - ko te tikanga kāore e ngaro ngā kiritaki mēnā he tūkino rātou i te tinihanga," tana tāpiri mai. Poutāpeta I tēnei wā, tata ki te 23 miriona o ngā kāri kore whakapā e takea ana, ā, ka tukuna e ngā pēke nunui katoa. I te tirohanga a te umanga pēke, mā te tepenga £20 e māhorahora ake ai ngā kāri ki ngā kaiwhakamahi nā te mea ka taea e rātou te utu i tētahi kete taonga iti i roto i tētahi hokomaha, pātaka māmā rānei, kaua mō tētahi, e rua rānei ngā tūemi iti anake. I te UK, kua pānuitia e te Poutāpeta ka noho ko ia te kaiwhakawhiwhi nui rawa o te hangarau hou i Uropi. Ka tāutatia e ia ngā kāpeka ki ngā peka e 200 huri noa i ngā pae o te Omirangi o Rāwāhi 2012 mai i te 6 o Hune. Ka whakarahia ngā peka e toe ana puta noa i tōna whatunga i te mutunga o Whiringahora, me ngā kaikaute e 30,000 e tuku ana i te tikanga utu. I kī te Poutāpeta ka whakaaetia ngā kāri Mastercard Paypass me Visa Paywave mō te nuinga o ngā hua me ngā ratonga ka taea te utu mā tētahi kāri nama, nama rānei i tēnei wā. Ko ngā okotahi anake ko ngā hokonga mō neke atu i te £20, ko ērā rānei e pā ana ki ngā tuhipoka, moni rānei, pēnei i ngā tauwhitinga huringa, ina mahi rānei i ngā putunga pēke me ngā moni tāpui. Kua whakaarahia e ētahi kaihoko ngā māharahara i te tīmatanga o te tokomaha o ngā tāngata ki te whakamahi kāri, kaua ko te moni, ka nui ake te utu ki ngā kaihoko.

title: E wero ana a Glee i te oma 30 o Rock Emmy
summary: Kei te tūnga pou te kōrero pūoro tuki a Glee ki te whakamutu i te toru tau o te 30 Rock hei kōrero tino pai i roto i ngā whakaingoatanga mō ngā Tohu Pouaka Whakaata o Amerika.
text: Ko Glee, e 19 ngā whakaingoatanga katoa, ā, e 30 Rock e haere ana ki Curb Your Enthusiasm, Modern Family, Nurse Jackie me The Office. Ko te rangatū iti o te Pakanga Tuarua o te Ao o HBO Te Moana-nui-a-Kiwa, i hangaia tahitia e Steven Spielberg, e ārahi ana i te huarahi me ngā hurihanga e 24. Ka tū te 62nd Emmy Awards i te 29 o Aotearoa i Los Angeles. I whiwhi hoki a Glee, e pāohotia ana i E4 me te Hongere 4 i te UK, i whiwhi hoki i ngā tautapa kaitapere kōrero tino pai mō Matthew Morrison, e whakatangi ana i te kaiako o Will Schuester, me Lea Michele - Rachel Berry i roto i te rangatū. Ka haere a Morrison o Glee ki ngā kaitapere tae atu ki te toa o mua ko Steve Carell o Te Tari - me tana whakaingoatanga tuarima i roto i te haupae - me Curb Your Enthusiasm 's Larry David. I roto i te kāwai kōrero tino pai, ka anga atu a Glee me 30 Rock ki te whakataetae mai i te whakaaturanga hou Modern Family, i hangaia i roto i te kāhua o tētahi pakipūmeka tawai e arotahi ana ki ngā oranga o tētahi whānau whānui. Ināianei, kua whakaingoatia te whetū ER o mua o Julianna Margulies mō te kaiwhakaari tino pai i roto i tētahi whakaari mo tana mahi hei wahine a tētahi mana tūmatanui tāwai i roto i te Wahine Pai. Ko te Moana-nui-a-Kiwa, i kōrerotia e Tom Hanks - he kaiwhakanao nui hoki - e whakaingoatia ana i roto i ngā kāwai tae atu ki ngā rangatū iti tino pai. Ko te whakaaturanga, e kōrero ana i te pūrākau o ngā Moana e toru e whawhai ana ki te pakanga a Amerika ki te Hapanihi i Te Moana-nui-a-Kiwa, e haere ana ki te Hokinga ki Cranford, e hāngai ana ki a Dame Judi Dench. Kua whakaingoatia a Dame Judi mō te kaiwhakaari tino pai i roto i tētahi rangatū iti mō Cranford, ā, ka whakatūria ki tōna hoa o Ingarangi o Dame Maggie Smith mō te Hopuhopu i a Meri. Ko te haki rere Ko te kāwai ōrite mō tētahi kaitapere, he pakanga hoki ki ngā Pirihitini me ngā tautapa tae atu ki a Tā Īna McKellen rāua ko Mikaera Sheen. Kei runga a Tā Īna mō te Herehere i te wā e whakaingoatia ana a Sheen mō tana mahi hei Taraiwa i roto i te Pātahitanga Motuhake, i tuhia e te Kuini me te kaituhituhi Frost/Nixon, a Pita Morgan, e mōhiotia ana i roto i te kāwai tuhituhi rangatū iti. Kai te oma hoki te whakaari a Morgan mo te whitiāhua pouaka whakaata tino pai. Ināianei, ko te hoa whetū o Cranford a Dame Judi, ko Honatana Pryce, he kaitapere tautoko tino pai i roto i tētahi rangatū iti. E 17 ngā tautapa o te whakaari wā o Mad Men, tae atu ki ngā rangatū whakaari tino pai, he kāwai kei roto ko te whakaaturanga vampire True Blood and Lost, i mutu i tēnei tau i muri i te ono tau. Kua whakaingoatia te whetū ngaro ko Matthew Fox mō te kaitapere tino pai i roto i tētahi whakaari ki ngā hoa tauwhāinga tae atu ki a Hugh Laurie mō te Whare. I toa te kaitapere o Ingarangi i te whakawhiwhinga Golden Globe ōrite i te tau 2006 me te 2007. Ko ētahi atu kaitapere e rere ana i te haki mō te UK ko Tā Patrick Stewart, mō Hamlet, me Tā Michael Gambon, mō te urutaunga a Te Wānanga o Aotearoa, ko Emma - ko rāua tahi mō te kaitapere tautoko tino pai i roto i tētahi rangatū iti. Tērā anō ētahi hurihanga mō te Hurihanga Kai a Jamie Oliver mō te whakawhiwhinga pono, Believe: The Eddie Izzard Story mō te motuhake kore-pakiwaitara, me te podcast pakiwaituhi The Ricky Gervais Show mō te hākoritanga tino pai.

title: I whakakorea ngā mahere utu hau mā o Coventry
summary: E kore a Coventry e whiwhi i tētahi rohe hau mā (CAZ) i muri i te kīanga a te kāwanatanga e tautoko ana i te mahere whirinoa a te kaunihera o te taone hei whakaiti i te kohukohu.
text: I raro te mana ā rohe i te pēhanga ki te tapahi i te kohu tūkino e tohu ana kia nui ake i ngā tepe ā-ture. Heoi anō, kua kī te kāwanatanga ināianei kei te ihirangi ki ngā kōwhiringa whirinoa kua marohitia, tae atu ki te whakapai ake i ngā ara waewae me ngā ara pahikara i runga i ngā huarahi. Kua hoatu e ia ki te kaunihera te £24.5m hei āwhina ki te whakaiti i te pokenga i ngā huarahi rerekē. I roto i tētahi reta ki te mana, ka kī te paremata i raro i te hēkeretari o te kāwanatanga MP Rebecca Pow: "I runga anō i ngā whakaaturanga i homai, e whakaae ana ahau me haere tonu koe ki te whakatinana i tō kōwhiringa whirinoa e manakohia ana ki tētahi CAZ whakahiko." Me tuku e te kaunihera tana take pakihi whakamutunga ki te kāwanatanga i te 19 o Hune. Kei roto i ngā tono: Ko te kaikaunihera Mahi a Jim O'Boyle, o te rohe o Hato Mikaera, i kī he "rongo tino pai" te hua "tērā pea ka kino ake te kounga o te hau i runga i ngā huarahi noho maha e rohe ana ki te rohe whakahiko i te mea ka rapu ngā atekōkiri i ētahi atu ara". Ka kitea e tētahi aronui ōrite i Birmingham ngā atekōkiri motokā me ngā atekōkiri vani e utu ana i te £8 ia rā i runga i ngā ara o te taone. Whāia a BBC West Midlands i Facebook, i Twitter, me te waitohu mō ngā whakahōutanga rongokōrero paetata hāngai tonu ki tō waea.

title: David Lloyd George: Secret 'double life' of ex-PM
summary: Kua huraina e te kaituhituhi hītori o Dan Snow te oranga rua o tōna tipuna tupuna, a David Lloyd George, mō tētahi pakipūmeka hou o TE WHK Wales.
text: E tohu ana a Hakihea i te 100 tau mai i te wā i noho ai a Raiti Hōri hei pirimia - ko ia anake te Welshman e pupuri ana i te tūnga. I karangatia a ia ko "te tangata i toa i te whawhai", engari i te noho rua a ia. Ka whakahoki anō a Tēnā Huka i tana mahi tōrangapū ki Westminster me tōna oranga hei "wahine rongonui." I a ia e noho ana i ōna hararei tamarikitanga i Criccieth, Gwynedd, ka hoki a Mr Snow ki te raki o Wales ki te hanga i te pakipūmeka. I te wā o te hōtaka, ka haere a ia ki ngā pūranga Paremata ki te pānui i ngā wāhanga mai i te rātaka a te hēkeretari a Raiti George, a Frances Stevenson, tae atu ki ngā reta i tuhituhia e ia ki a ia. I haere tonu a Lloyd George, te MP mō Carnarvon Boroughs, ki a Miss Stevenson tae noa ki to rāua mārenatanga i muri i te matenga o tana wahine ko Margaret. "He wahine rongonui hoki a ia, ko tōna whanaungatanga roa ki tana hēkeretari taitamariki, ko te tikanga e tata ana ki te tokorua ana wahine," te kī a Tēnā Hukarere. "I'm descended from one of Lloyd George's daughters, so this other side of his life has always been a bit of a family secret, something we never talked about. " I tētahi taumata, hei mema whānau, he tino whakararuraru. "E pānui ana mō ngā take aroha o tō tipuna matua me tana tamaiti aroha kua haukotia. " Engari i tētahi atu taumata ka kite koe i a koe e hiahia ana ki a ia - he whaiāipo, he tangata - ā, tata tonu koe ki te hiahia ki a ia i roto i taua pātahitanga, nā te mea i tino aroha ia ki a ia." He kaikōrero tūmatanui nui a Raiti Hōri i tūhono ki ngā tāngata noa, ahakoa i te tuatahi he ārai pakanga, i tutuki i a ia te whakapakari i tētahi iwi ki tētahi "mīhini pakanga hihiri". I whakahaeretia e ia tētahi kāpata pakanga iti, pūmau, ka mauria mai e ia ngā kaimahi rangatira ki te kāwanatanga, ā, ka pai ake te mahi patu. Ka kī a Tēnā Huka: "Ki taku whakaaro ko te aronga tino whakamīharo o te pūrākau o Raiti Hōri ko tēnei tangata kāore he moni, kāore he tūhononga, kāore he papamuri o te Ope Taua, ā, kāore i kuraina i Oxford, i Kemihana rānei, nāna i whakatika hei tētahi o ngā tāngata tino kaha o te ao. " Ki a au, ko taua mea kotahi tētahi o ngā āhuatanga tino whakamīharo o te hītori o te rau tau 20."

title: Ka whiwhi i te utunga tuarua o te kaimahi whaiaro i pāngia e te huaketo
summary: Ko ngā tāngata mahi whaiaro kua pāngia e te coronavirus ka whiwhi i tētahi pūtea "tuarua me te whakamutunga" i Aotearoa, e kī ana te kāwanatanga.
text: Nā Kevin PeacheyKaipānui pūtea whaiaro Neke atu i te rua miriona ngā tāngata kua tono mō tētahi pūtea kotahi tae atu ki te £7,500 i tēnei wā. Ka āhei rātau, me ētahi atu tāngata mahi whaiaro, ki tētahi utu tuarua i a Aotearoa, tae atu ki te £6,570, kua pānuitia e Tumuaki Rishi Sunak. I whakahuahuatia hoki ngā taipitopito o te aronui whakaroa whānui. He pēhea te mahi a te kaupapa Tae noa mai ki tēnei wā, kua whakaritea e ngā kaimahi mahi whaiaro e tika ana mō te 80% o ā rātou hua toharite, tae atu ki te £2,500 i te marama mō te toru marama. Kei te utua tēnei i roto i te wāhanga kotahi. E 2.3 miriona o ēnei kaimahi kua waitohu mō ngā moni e tapeke ana i te £6.8bn. Ko te hunga kua pāngia e te coronavirus ka āhei tonu ki te tono mō tēnei tapeke tae noa ki te 13 o Hōngongoi. I te hui pānui a te kāwanatanga i ia rā, kua pānuitia e Tēnā Sunak ngā taupānga mō tētahi pūtea tāke tuarua ka tuwhera i a Aotearoa. Ka iti iho te ohaoha o tēnei, e kapi ana i te 70% o ngā hua tauhokohoko ā-marama toharite a te kaitono. Ka mahia hoki i roto i te utu kotahi, e toru marama, ā, ka whakawhāititia ki te £2,190 i te marama, te £6,570 rānei te tapeke. Me whakaū e ngā kaitono kua pāngia ā rātou mahi e te huaketo, engari kāore e hiahiatia kia tangohia e rātou te pūtea tuatahi kia āhei ai rātou ki te tuarua. Ko tētahi o ērā e tika ana ko te kaiwhakahaere puoro a Yshani Perinpanayagam, nāna i kite i te maroke o te mahi mai i te wā i whakakorea ai tana whakaaturanga i te Royal Shakespeare Company i te tīmatanga o te raka. I māharahara a ia ki te kore he tautoko anō kāore ia e mōhio me pēhea tana whāngai i a ia anō, kua utua e ia he maha ngā pire tino nui mā te penapena, engari kei te māharahara tonu ia ki te tirohanga mo te wā roa mēnā kāore e taea, ka pōturi rānei te tangata ki te hoki ki ngā wāhi toi. "Mā tētahi atu pūtea e pai ake ai te whakahaere i ngā mea ā muri ake nei, engari e tūmanako ana ehara i te mono wā poto noa iho," tana kī. "E tūmanako ana ahau ko te tīmatanga tēnei o te titiro ki ngā raruraru nui ake mō ngā toi." Ka puta mai te pānuitanga i muri i te hainatanga o tētahi rōpū whakawhiti-rōpū e 113 ngā MP i tētahi reta i tukuna e Siobhain McDonagh o Labour ki a Tēnā Sunak e karanga ana kia nui ake te tautoko mō te hunga mahi whaiaro. I whakatūpato ki te kore e tuku toronga ka "kumea te kupenga haumaru i raro i ngā waewae o ngā kaimahi mahi whaiaro e hia miriona". I pānuitia hoki e Tēnā Sunak ētahi atu taipitopito me pēhea te utu i te kaupapa whakawhitiwhiti mō ngā kaimahi i ngā marama e heke mai nei. Kua whakaroatia taua kaupapa tae noa ki Whiringahora. E kī ana te Pūtea Moni kāore he ōritetanga hāngai i waenganui i ngā aronui e rua, engari, kāore i rite ki ngā kaimahi kua whakawāteatia, ka taea e te hunga mahi whaiaro te haere tonu ki ētahi mahi i a ia e whiwhi tautoko ana i te kāwanatanga. "Ka tino whakangāwari tō mātou hapori mahi whaiaro e rima miriona ki te mōhio kua tangohia te pari moni whiwhi e anga atu ana rātau i roto i ngā rā e rua," te kī a Maika Cherry, o te Tōpūtanga o ngā Pakihi Iti. "Ko te tūmanako kia nui ake ngā kaihokohoko takitahi ka āhei ki te hoki haumaru ki te mahi i te whakangāwaritanga o ngā rāhuitanga. Kua mōhio tika ngā kaihanga kaupapahere ko ngā rangatira pakihi mahi whaiaro e mahi ana i ngā wāhanga maha - kāore i te iti rawa ngā makawe me te ātaahua, ngā takahanga me te haere - ka tino pāngia e te hinganga o nāianei mō ngā wiki maha e haere ake nei. I tāpiritia e ia kia nui ake te mahi ināianei mō te hunga kāore i te whiwhi i ēnei utunga. He tokomaha ngā tāngata mahi whaiaro, pēnei i ngā kaiwhakahaere e utu ana i a rātau anō i roto i ngā moni hua me ngā kaimahi hou, e pouri ana i te ngaro i te mōkī tautoko mahi a te kāwanatanga.

title: Peti tuihono: He aha te hopu?
summary: Kei te mahi ngā kaiwhakarite UK i ngā mahi whakaū ki ngā whare petipeti tuihono kāore i whakaingoatia, e whakapae ana rātau ki te takahi i te ture kiritaki.
text: He wāhanga tēnei o te whāwhā a te Mana Whakataetae me ngā Mākete (CMA) mō ngā whakatairanga māminga me ngā taunahua ki te tono toa. He maha ngā kaipānui kua whakapā atu ki te BBC mō ō rātou wheako mā te whakamahi i ngā paetukutuku petipeti. Anei ētahi o ā rātou pūrākau: I kōrero mai a Matt, County Down Matt ki a mātau i a ia e tākaro ana i te roulette casino ora, ka whakatakotoria e ia te £10, kātahi ka puta mai he pahū-ake i runga i te mata e tuku ana i tētahi atu £10 hei bonus ōrite, i whakaaetia e ia. I raro i ngā ture o te kēmu ināianei he bonus £20 tāna, engari kāore he moni. I toa ia i te £ 300 engari i tana hiahia ki te whakamutu i te purei, ka puta mai tana toenga he putu. I tēnei wā, e £300 tōna pūtea tāpiri, engari kāore i whakaaetia kia unuhia tērā. Ka waea atu a ia ki te kamupene nāna i kī atu ki a ia ko te whakaae ki te bonus "maukati i taku moni tuatahi ki taku bonus £ 10". I raro i ngā whakaritenga peti a te umanga, me 50 ngā wā i tāpaetia ai ngā moni tāpiri £20 - £1,000 rānei - i mua i tana tango i ngā toa. I taua wā i toa ia i te £ 280 engari koia anake te wā i roto i te rima tau o te peti tuihono kua toa ia i tētahi mea i te wā e whakaritea ana ngā whakaritenga peti. I tuhituhi a Robert, County Durham Robert: "Kua rite tonu taku toa i te nui o te moni kia tūponotia ina ngana ki te unu. I te nuinga o te wā e kī ana te pae me whakahaere i tētahi tukanga manatokonga e pau ana ngā rā hei whakaoti, ā, e hiahiatia ana he whakaahua o te tikanga moni me te whakatika wāhitau. "Kāore ēnei e mahia i mua i te whakatakoto. Ko ētahi atu pae he rā te roa ki te whakawhiti moni, ā, ka taea e koe te whakakore i te tauwhitinga i ngā wā katoa. "I now only gamble on specific sites that can be trusted to withdraw cash faster." I kī hoki a Robert e kore ia e tango i tētahi o ngā tono pōhiri nā ngā whakaritenga peti. Heoi anō, ka whakamāramatia e ia, ka hoatu aunoatia e ētahi pae ngā whakatairanga, ā, me whakapā atu ngā kaihoko ki ngā kamupene kia tangohia ai. Raniera, i whiwhi a Raniera i te £ 20 bonus i tana bet £ 10. I toa a ia i te £790 engari kāore te pae tuihono i whakaae ki a ia ki te tango i ngā toa nā te mea i kī kāore ia i tutuki i ngā whakaritenga peti e āpiti ana ki te whakatairanga. Kātahi ka "whakakorea e te umanga taku pūkete, kāore he mea e taea e au te mahi mōna", ka tuhituhi a ia. "Kua waihangatia e ngā pae petipeti tuihono kāore i te mōhiotia he ingoa kino mō te umanga. I kī a Claire Fleming mai i Realbookies.com: "Ka akiaki mātou i ngā kiritaki petipeti tuihono kia mahi i ā rātou mahi tika i mua i te whakamahi i ngā pae - pānuitia ngā ture me ngā tikanga, tirohia ngā wāhanga 'mō mātou' kia mōhio ai he pēhea te mahi a te pakihi me te kimi i ngā taunakitanga o ētahi atu kua whakamahi i te pae. " Mā tēnei ka taea e ngā tāngata e hiahia ana ki te ngāwari o te petipeti tuihono te mōhio kei te whakamahi rātou i tētahi pae tūturu, pono hoki."

title: Primary school in Isleworth suggests shorter week
summary: Kua tonoa e tētahi kura i te uru o Rāwāhi kia whakataka te hawhe rā whakaako i ia wiki hei penapena moni.
text: I kī te Kura Tuatahi Katorika o Hato Meri i Isleworth kei te raruraru ki tana pūtea. Kua huatau te kura kia mutu ngā akomanga i te 12:45 GMT i ngā Paraire mai i Mahuru. I roto i tētahi reta i whakairihia ki te paetukutuku o te kura, i tonoa ngā mātua kia whakaaro ki te kimi i ā rātou ake whakaritenga tiaki tamariki mō ngā ahiahi o te Paraire. I kī te kura ka taea e ia te whakahaere i tētahi karapu i muri i te kura mō ngā tauira 150, engari he utu e £4 mō ia tamaiti. 'Take nui' I kī te kura kua tapahia kētia e ia ngā utu mā te kore e whakakī i ngā whakairinga wātea me te whakaiti i ngā akoranga pūoro. There have been suggestions parents could be asked to pay to fill the budget gap, but the school says this would mean payments of £400 per child. I kī tētahi kaikōrero mō Hato Meri: "I tēnei wāhanga kāore anō kia whakatauria he whakataunga, ā, kei te kōrero ngā kāwana, i muri i te whakaaro ki ngā mātua, ināianei kei te kōrero ki ngā kaimahi. " There's a lot more reflection and prayer to go until a decision is made." Ka puta mai te rongo i te whakatūpato a ngā kaiako matua mai i ngā kura e 5,500 puta noa i Ingarangi ki te Tumuaki o Piripi Hammond mō ngā iti pūtea "pūmau". I kī a Marlon Motha, tokorua ana tamāhine e haere ana ki Hato Meri: "He tino mīharo te kore whakaaro ki ngā mātua mahi. " I tēnei wā, koia te raruraru matua - ko te utu mō ētahi mātua, me ngā rārangi mahi - ko wai e tiki i te tamaiti?" Kua mau ētahi atu mātua ki te pāpāho pāpori ki te whakapuaki i o rātau māharahara. I kī a Emma White: "He pono ko te raruraru matua ka whiwhi a mātau tamariki i te 10% iti iho te mātauranga i o rātau hoa. " Kāore au i te whakapono kāore he pānga o tēnei ina tae rātau ki te kura tuarua." I kī te Kaunihera o Hounslow e mahi ngātahi ana me te kura, ā, kei te titiro whakamua ki te kite i te hua o te whakaritenga.

title: E whakatūpato tonu ana te WĀWW i te hōtaka whakanui, he huarahi tonu hei whakahaere
summary: Kua tohe tonu te Pēke Matua o Ūropi (WĀWW) he roa tonu te haere i mua i tana karangatanga ki tana hōtaka whakanui ohaoha.
text: I whiua e te perehitini o TE WĀWW, o Te Wānanga o Te Wānanga o Aotearoa, he wai mātao i runga i te taurangi ka wawe pea te hau o te pēke i te kaupapa. Kei te hoko tonu te pēke i te 60bn hōro (£53bn) o ngā here i te marama hei wāhanga o tana hōtaka whakaiti ine nui (QE). I puritia hoki e te WĀWW te mokatere huamoni matua mō ngā whenua e whakamahi ana i te moni ūropi kāore anō kia rerekē i te 0%. Ka kī a Tēnā Draghi: "I muri i tētahi wā roa ka pā mātou ki tētahi whakaoranga pakari, e tatari ana mātou ki ngā utu me ngā utu kia whai i tētahi ara ki tō mātou whāinga. " Ko te mea whakamutunga e hiahiatia ana e te kaunihera whakahaere he whakawhāititanga tē hiahiatia, ā, mō ngā here tērā pea ka pōturi i tēnei tukanga, ka mōrearea rānei." I kī a Kōkō Vistesen, te rangatira o te ohanga o te rohe ūropi i Pantheon Macroeconomics: "Ko te kōrero mo te utunga moni e mau ana i roto i to mātau māhunga ko te pānui a Tēnā Draghi ki ngā mākete: 'Kāore anō mātou i reira.'" Heoi anō, i nui te neke o te ūropi ki te 14 marama te teitei ki te tāra i tētahi wā i whakamōhiotia ai e Tēnā Draghi ka tīmata pea te kaunihera whakahaere o te WĀWW ki te kōrerorero i te whakaiti i te QE i te ngahuru. I kōrero a Neil Wilson mai i ETX Capital: "Kāore i te nui engari he tino tairongo te mākete ki tētahi mea mai i Draghi i tēnei wā." I tērā marama, i whakamāramatia te whaikōrero a Tēnā Draghi i Sintra i Potukara e te tokomaha o ngā kaiwhakahaere, ko te tikanga o te whakaoranga ohaoha o te rohe ūropi ka taea te whakamutu i te QE, ā, ka piki ake ngā mokatere huamoni. I kī a Patrick O'Donnell, te kaiwhakahaere pūtea penapena matua i Aberdeen Asset Management: "He whakamātau tino pai tēnei a Tēnā Draghi kia tino mōhio ai kāore ngā mākete pūtea e haere ki mua i a rātau anō i muri i ana kōrero hākinakina o muri nei." I hoahoatia te hōtaka hoko here QE, me ngā mokatere huamoni iti rawa, hei whakahauhau i te whakatārewa me te ārai i te tuma o te whakahekenga i te rohe ūropi. I kī a Tēnā Draghi he angitu te kaupapahere: "Kua waihangatia e mātou i roto i ngā tau e toru kua hipa atu e ono miriona ngā mahi, neke atu i tētahi wā i mua i te raruraru i te wā kotahi. " Ko ngā tohu whakaaro ohaoha katoa me ngā tohu rangahau i ngā wā katoa, kei te tata rānei ki a rātou kia angitu ai ngā kaupapahere." Heoi anō, ko te utunga o te utunga o te rohe ūropi ko te 1.3% i June, he iti iho i te 1.4% i Me, i raro iho i te ūnga o te WĀWW e tata ana, engari i raro iho i te 2%. I kī a Tēnā Draghi: "Kei te iti tonu ngā mehua o te utunga o te utu, ā, kāore anō kia whakaatu i ngā tohu tūturu o te pikinga, i te mea kei te ngoikore tonu ngā pēhanga utu o te kāinga, tae atu ki te tupunga utu. Ko te utunga o raro i te rohe ūropi e tūmanakohia ana kia piki āta piki noa iho i te wā waenganui." I kī a Tēnā O'Donnell o Aberdeen Asset Management: "Tērā pea kāore mātou e rongo i tētahi mea nui mai i te WĀWW tae noa ki Mahuru, he nui te wā mō ngā kaiwhakangao ki te kūnatu i te whakatūpato a Tēnā Draghi. " E tūmanako ana a Tēnā Draghi he nui te mahinga o tēnei rā hei hoatu i a ia he raumati mārire."

title: Na nga utu a te puku i mōrearea ai te kuihi koura a Āporo
summary: Ko te whakarewatanga iPhone te rā tino hira i roto i te maramataka a Apple. I te iti rawa, i roto i te tau pūnoa. I te tau 2019, ko te 15 o Hakihea te mea tino nui mō te kamupene tino rangatira o Amerika.
text: I te wā i whakawehi ai a Donald Trump ki te uta i tētahi hurihanga hou o ngā utu hokohoko ki ngā kawenga mai i Haina. E ai ki te tātaritanga a Kōrero, ko te tikanga ka anga atu te 92% o ngā pūmārō i hokona e Apple ki ngā riwai. Ko te tikanga e tino hiahia ana a Āporo kia kaua e tuku i tēnei, ā, kua kaha te whakauru kia tukuna he waihotanga. He āhua angitu taua mahi, ā, koia te take i tino tūkinotia ai te kamupene tae noa mai ki tēnei wā: i tēnei marama anake ka pā ngā utu ki ngā hua Apple "nui", te Apple Watch me AirPods. He mea hira aua hua, engari ehara i te kuihi koura - he iti iho i te 9% o te katoa o ngā hokonga a Apple. Heoi anō, ko te iPhone e tohu ana i te 55.6% o ngā umanga a Apple. Ahakoa kua whakapeka te hiranga o te iPhone nā te hekenga o ngā hokonga waea atamai (ahuwhānui) puta noa i te ao, koia tonu te pūrere tino hira e mahia ana e Āporoiti. E rua tau ki muri ka whakatau a Āporo i tētahi whakataunga māia (me te whakawai, i te tuatahi) ki te whakamōmona i tōna kuihi. I whakanuia te utu o te iPhone, ka whati i te ārai $1,000 mō te wā tuatahi. I haere ngā kiritaki, ā, i taea e Āporo te whakawātea i te whakapeka o ngā hokonga o te pūrere mā te mahi nui ake i ia mea. Kēmu tatari Koia hoki te mea i mōrearea ai ngā utu - aua tawhē hua hauora. Mēnā ka whakaritea ngā utu i a Hakihea, tērā pea he maha ngā putanga - kāore tētahi o ēnei e tino hiahia ana a Āporoiti, i whakamāramatia e Alberto Cavallo, he ahorangi pāhono i te Kura Pakihi o Harvard. "E whakaaro ana te nuinga o te iwi ka kite tātau i ngā utu e kitea ana i roto i ngā utu kaihoko," tana kī. "Ehara tēnā i te take. Ka taea e ngā kamupene e anga ana ki ngā utu nui ake te kōwhiri ki te ngongo i aua utu." Koia hoki tērā e tūmanako ana te nuinga o ngā kaitirotiro pūtea kia mahia e Āporoiti, me te pupuri i te poro o ngā iPhones o tēnei tau i tautuhia ki ngā utu ōrite ki tērā tau ($749, $999 me te $1,099). Me tae mai ngā utu ki te whakawehi, me ngote noa iho a Āporoiti. Kātahi ka noho hei kēmu tatari: pēhea te roa o tēnei pakanga hokohoko me ōna utu? Tērā pea ka kino ake ngā utu? I pūrongotia a Āporo i te tīmatanga o tēnei tau, kei te uiui i ngā huarahi e taea ai e ia te neke atu i te whakanaotanga ki waho o Haina, me te karo katoa i ngā utu. Ka hangaia kētia e ia ngā pūrere i ngā wāhi pēnei i Īnia me Parīhi, engari ko te tikanga hei whakahaere i ngā tono paetata i aua whenua - kāore i te hanga pūrere hei tuku ki rāwāhi. Ka roa te wā e whakapiki ana i ēnei mahi, te kī a Prof Cavallo. "Ki taku whakaaro he mea nui kia mārama ngā kiritaki ehara i te mea aunoa. Ehara i te rite ki te piu i te whakakā." Ka kī atu a Perehitini Trump ki a koe ko te huarahi ki te whakahaere i tēnei, ko te whakahoki i te whakanao ki Amerika - "Amerika Tuatahi", me ērā mea katoa. Engari ko ngā utu o te mahi i tēnā ka whakaiti i te pānga o ngā utu i te wāhi tuatahi. Ehara i te mea ko te hanga wheketere anake, engari ko te whakangungu i ngā kaimahi hou o ngā matimati pūkenga, ngā matimati e hiahiatia ana he utu nui ake me ngā here pai ake. Ko te hanganga o ngā hua Āporoiti e hāngai ana, e 3 miriona ngā mahi i Haina. Nā tēnā take, ka kī a Prof Cavallo, tērā pea ka tukuna e ngā kaiwhakarato a Āporo he whakahekenga utu i tō rātou mutunga kia mau tonu ai taua umanga. Ka haere tonu a Āporo ki te whakawhanake i te taha o tana umanga e kore e pāngia e ngā utu kawemai. Ko tēnā ngā mea ehara i te pūmārō, e kīia ana e Apple ko tōna Wehenga Ratonga. He arotahi nui ngā ratonga mō Apple i te Tūtira, i tua atu rānei - ko te nekehanga tino nui ko te whakarewatanga o tana ratonga pouaka whakaata tono, Apple TV+. "E whakapono ana mātou ko te $10 ia marama te utu ratonga whakarewa tuatahi e tukuna ana ki ngā kiritaki Āporoiti," te kī a Dan Ives, tētahi kaitātari pūtea, tērā pea ka tukuna e Āporo ngā mahi paihere mō ngā pouaka whakaata me ētahi atu ratonga, pēnei i te Pūoro. "Mēnā ka kawea e Āporo me te iti rawa o ngā tūtuki tere, ā, ka whiwhi whakatuki i ngā ihirangi i tukuna ki te pūtake tāuta nui o te kamupene me te pono pūkenga kāore i te ōrite, e whakapono ana mātou ko te tae ki te tau kaiohauru 100 miriona i te wā waenga (e toru ki te rima tau) he whāinga tūturu ka taea te whakamāori ki tētahi roma moni ā-tau e $7 billion ki te $10 billion i roto i te wā mō Apple." Heoi anō, me te tāraro i te ngoikoretanga o te Hangarau Nui i tēnei wā, ahakoa ko tēnei taha hāngai ake o te umanga a Āporoiti e anga ana ki te rangirua, i te mea ka whakanuia e ngā kaiwhakarite me te US me te EU ā rātou tūhuratanga ki te whanonga ārai whakataetae. Ko te whakapae tauwhāiti ki a Apple ko te whakamahi i tōna mana i roto i ngā pūmārō hei pana i ōna ake taupānga me ngā ratonga ki runga i ōna tauwhāinga. Hei tauira, ko te whakatauranga i te Apple Music kia teitei ake i te App Store i te ratonga roma tauwhāinga o Spotify. Mā ngā huringa ki ngā mea ka taea e Āporoiti te mahi me ōna ake pūrere ka iti iho pea te utu o tana wehenga Ratonga. Nā reira, mō te kamupene e hiahia ana ki te mana, tērā pea he wā hākinakina te wā e heke mai nei. A, ki te roa rawa, he mea whakarerekē. Rānei, ā, he tauari tēnei e kore e taea te whakaheke, ka taea e Perehitini Trump te huri ohorere i tōna hinengaro, ā, ka wareware noa iho tātau i tēnei mea katoa. _____ Whāia a Dave Lee i Twitter @DaveLeeBBC Kei a koe ētahi atu mōhiohio mō tēnei, tētahi atu pūrākau hangarau rānei? Ka taea e koe te toro hāngai, haumaru hoki mā te taupānga karere whakamuna Signal i: +1 (628) 400-7370

title: Ka mate a Hōri Mikaera: Ka takoha ngā whetū
summary: Kua urupare ngā tāngata rongonui pūoro me ngā whakangahau o te ao ki te rongo kua mate te kaiwaiata Peretania o George Michael i te 53 o ona tau.
text: Tā Elton John "Kei te tino ohorere ahau. Kua ngaro i a au tētahi hoa aroha - te wairua tino atawhai, tino māhorahora, me te kaiwaiata mātauranga. E haere ana tōku ngākau ki tōna whānau me ana kaihautū katoa. @GeorgeMichael #RIP" Wham! Te hoa pēne o Andrew Ridgeley "Ko ahau, ōna hoa aroha, ōna hoa, te ao pūoro, te ao whānui. 4 i arohaina tonu. A xx" Madonna "Ka waiho mātau e tētahi atu Rehetoi Nui." Boy George "Kei te whakaaro ahau ki te whānau, ngā hoa me ngā kaihautū o @GeorgeMichael i tēnei wā. " I tino arohaina a ia, ā, ko taku tūmanako i mōhio ia nā te mea ko te pouri i tēnei rā kei tua atu i ngā kupu. He whakararuraru. "Kātahi te ātaahua o tōna reo me tana pūoro ka ora tonu hei kawenata ki tōna pūmanawa. Kaore au e whakapono kua ngaro a ia. E tūmanako ana ahau ka pupuri te Buddha i a ia i roto i ōna ringa." Pānuitia ētahi atu mea: George Michael: He oranga i roto i ngā pikitia Obituary: George Michael I te oho ake o Haina ki Wham! He nui ake ngā tāngata rongonui i mate i te tau 2016? I kī a Robbie Williams James Corden The Late Late Show, nāna te kāniwha Carpool Karaoke auau i tīmata i tana mahi ki a George Michael mō Comic Relief i te tau 2011: "Kua aroha ahau ki a George Michael mō ngā wā katoa e maumahara ana ahau. He tino whakaaweawe a ia. I mua tonu i tōna wā." Ko Lisa Stansfield Paul Young Singer Paul Young, nāna i mahi i runga i te 1984 Band Aid hit Do They Know it's Christmas? me Mikaera, i kī atu ki a BBC Radio 5 live e "tūhono" ana te hunga whakarongo ki tōna reo. I kōrero a ia mō te wā i uru atu ai a Mikaera ki a ia i runga i te atamira mō tētahi Konohete Whirinaki a Princes ki te mahi takirua i runga i te hit a Young Every Time You Go Away. "I tino hāngai tonu a ia i te motokā, he kōrerorero tere i runga i te atamira, kāore he mahana, he aha rānei, ā, ka waiata noa iho ia pēnei i te manu. He tino whakamīharo." Matt Goss, kaiwaiata Bros Ringo Starr Liam Gallagher Duran Duran "2016 - ngaronga o tētahi atu wairua pūkenga. Ko to mātau aroha me to mātau aroha katoa ki te whānau o @GeorgeMichael." I tuhituhi a Sam Smith Brit me te kaiwaiata-kaiwaiata toa o Oscar, a Sam Smith: "@GeorgeMichael. Kāore e taea e ngā kupu te whakapuaki i te nui o te tikanga me te tikanga o tō pūoro ki a au. "Whakatangihia koa ana pūoro kia kaha rawa atu ki a koe i tēnei rā, me te whakanui i tētahi o ngā whika tino mīharo, pūkenga, toa me ngā whika hira i roto i te pūoro me te ora e mōhio ana ahau. Ka ora tonu tō pūoro me tō karere." I tāpiri mai a Hāne: "E kore ahau e noho ko au te rehetoi mehemea ehara mōu." Ko Miley Cyrus Pointless, ko te kaihautū tahi me te kaiwhakanao pouaka whakaata o mua, ko Richard Osman Chaka Kani Spandau Ballet "E tino pouri ana mātau i te putanga o to mātau hoa aroha, o George Michael. He rehetoi mātauranga me te kaitito waiata nui." I te tau 2009, ka kī a Bryan Adams Geri Horner (nee Halliwell) Ko te toa X Factor o mua, ko Joe McElderry McElderry, nāna i mahi Kaua e Tukua te Rā kia Raro ki Ahau me Mikaera i tana haerenga ki te toa i te X Factor i te tau 2009: "Tino pouri ki te rongo mō Hōri Mikaera! " I tino waimarie ahau ki te tūtaki ki a ia, ā, he waimarie kē atu ki te mahi tahi me ia he tangata ātaahua a ia!" Ko Haimona Cowell Belinda Carlisle "Tino pouri mo George Michael." Ka haere a Frankie ki te kaiwaiata o Hollywood, a Holly Johnson "Pouri ki te rongo i ngā rongo mō George Michael , me te maha o ngā kaiwaiata me ngā kaitito waiata i ngaro i a mātau i tēnei tau." Ko Te Kaiwaiata Whero Noa iho o Te Kaiwaiata Whero o Aotearoa, pērā i a Mikaera, i mahi i Live Aid i te tau 1985 o Te Koromatua o Rānōna, o Te Koromatua o Rānōna, "Tino pouri ki te rongo i ngā rongo mō Hōri Mikaera. He pūmanawa whakamīharo nāna i hari ki ngā miriona o mātau me ana pūoro." Ko te kaiārahi Mahi a Jeremy Corbyn "E pouri ana ki te rongo kua mate a Hōri Mikaera. He rehetoi tino pai a ia, he kaitautoko kaha hoki i ngā mana o ngā kaimahi." Te Minita Tuatahi o Pirihitini, a Nicola Sturgeon: "He tino kino rawa tēnei. He pūmanawa whakamīharo tērā i ngaro wawe. He wāhanga a Wham o te whakaaturanga ki ōku tau taiohitanga." LGBT equality charity Stonewall "R.I.P. George Michael. I whakaaweawe koe i te tokomaha, ā, ka ora tonu ō pūoro i roto i te ngākau o te hapori. Ka tino mahue koe i te x." Pixie Lott Pop star La Roux DJ me te kaiwhakatangitangi Mark Ronson "He rā uaua tēnei i roto i tētahi tau kino. Engari e tino whakawhetai ana ahau ki tāna i mahue ai i a mātau"

title: Ka ūkuia e te kaiwaiata graffiti a Bagsy ngā pēke hokomaha mo te oranga
summary: Kua waiho e tētahi kaiwaiata tuhituhi whai hinengaro matatika to rātau tohu ki runga i ngā pēke mo te ora i roto i ngā hokomaha.
text: E toru wiki e mahi ana te kaiwaiata ingoamuna, e whakamahi ana i te ingoa Bagsy, i te Riu o Rhondda. Kei roto i ngā atahanga pene pura ko te kaiārahi Plaid Cymru, ko Leanne Wood me te rangatira maina o te rau tau 19, ko Archibald Hood. I kī te rehetoi, kāore anō kia whakaatu i to rātau ira tangata: "E whakaaro ana a Bagsy he whakahau tāpoi kē mō te Riu o Rhondda." I kī a Bagsy, ko tōna waitohu e ōrite ana ki tērā o te kaiwaiata tiriti ingoamuna o Banksy, i "whakaaweawetia" rātau e tōna rongonui, engari i hiahia ki te tuku "i tētahi whiringa āhei". Ka kī rātau: "Ka whakataka ngā pēke mo te ora ki ngā hokomaha huri noa i te takiwā o Rhondda, ka tauwhāititia ngā pēke ki taua hokomaha, ā, ka tukuna he huna tika. " Ko te tangata e kite ana i tētahi pēke, me hoko anō pea kia whiwhi ai, engari ka kitea hoki i roto i ngā taunga hokomaha, ā, ka wātea ki te katoa." I tēnei wā, tata ki te 10 ngā pāhi e rere haere ana, e kī ana a Bagsy i "whakaahuatia ki ngā hoahoa ahurei e tātuhia ana e te ringa ki a Biro, te mahi wareware". Ka kī rātau: "He mea whakaaweawe ngā tirohanga e ngā awaawa o Rhondda, ā, ka tīpakohia mō tō rātou mōhiotanga. E hiahia ana ahau ki te whakatairanga i te rohe i te mea kaua te graffiti e waihanga i tētahi whatu. "E whakaae ana mātau ki ēnei pāhi mo te ora me nga hokomaha e whakarākai ana i nga tauwāhi o nga pahū waro o nga rā kua taha. Me whakawhaiaro ake rātou." Ka kī rātau: "Ka haere tonu a Bagsy i te wā e pai tonu ana te tangata. He wāhi mō te whakawhānui ki ētahi atu wāhi, engari, i tēnei wā, kāore he wāhi pēnei i te kāinga. "E tūmanako ana ahau ka aroha te tangata ki a rātou pērā i te pai ki a Bagsy ki te hanga i a rātou."

title: E ahanoa ana a Uropi ki te utu waipiro mōkito o Holyrood
summary: Kua whakaarahia ngā pātai mēnā e hototahi ana te kāwanatanga o Pirihitini ki te whakauru atu i tētahi utu mōkito mō ia wae waipiro ki te ture o Ūropi.
text: I tukuna te mehua e ngā MSP i te tīmatanga o tēnei tau, engari i ahu mai ki tētahi amuamu tika a te Scotch Whisky Association. Ināianei kua whakaarahia e rima ngā whenua EU ngā māharahara ka takahi pea te kaupapa i ngā ture hokohoko koreutu. I kī te kāwanatanga o Pirihitini e mau tonu ana te hototahi o te whakahōu ki te ture EU. Heoi anō, i kī te Scotch Whisky Association i takahi nga mahere i nga tiriti whakataetae o Ūropi. Ko ngā whenua i āhua whakamuri i te rōpū ko Wīwī, Itari, Paniora, Potukara, me Poaria, he kaiwhakarato waina nui katoa. Kua tāpaetia e ia "whakaaro taipitopito" ki nga kaupapa ki te Kōmihana o Ūropi. E waru anō ngā takiwā e kīia ana kua "tuku kōrero". 'Kāore i te ohorere' I roto i tētahi kōrero, ka kī te Kōmihana EU he muna te ihirangi, engari "ko tā mātou e kī atu he raruraru tā mātou ki te hototahitanga o ngā mahere utu mōkito i raro i te ture hapori". I kī te kāwanatanga o Pirihitini kāore i mīharo i te mea he whakahē. I kī te Hēkeretari Hauora a Alex Neil: "E manakohia ana e te Kōmihana o Ūropi te kōrero i te tūkino waipiro, ā, kua tono mai ki a mātau kia whakaarohia ā rātou take, ka taea e mātou. " E mōhio ana mātou ka taea e mātou te whakaatu e whakatautikatia ana te utu mōkito i runga anō i te hauora tūmatanui me ngā taunga pāpori, ā, ka pēhi tonu ahau i te kēhi mō te utu mōkito i roto i ngā whakaritenga tino kaha e taea ana. "Ka urupare mātou ki te EC i te rā kati o te 27 o Hakihe." I kī te kaikōrero hauora o Te Kāwanatanga o Pirihitini, a Jackson Carlaw, he "tino whakararuraru" te kāwanatanga o Pirihitini i te tohe tonu kia māia ā-ture te utu mōkito ina te āhua nei ehara i te take. I tāpiri mai a ia: "E hiahia ana mātou kia mahi te utu mōkito, ā, i hoatu e mātou tā mātou tautoko i runga i te āhua ka tika ā-ture, ā, ka taea te whakataka i ngā tau e heke mai nei mēnā kāore i te mahi. " E tatari ana mātau kia kite i ngā mea ka tūpono ināianei, engari ko ngā wero ā-ture i ngā kōti o Ūropi ka nui pea te utu ki Holyrood, ā, ka nui te takaware. Engari he pai ake te whakatau i ēnei take ture ināianei i ngā tau maha ki raro i te raina." I kī a Campbell Evans, o te Scotch Whisky Association: "Mō te 30 tau kua kī te Kōti o Ūropi he kore mana te utu mōkito, e pouri ana mātou kua tae ki tēnei tawhiti. " E hiahia ana mātou ki te mahi tahi me te kāwanatanga ki te rutu i te whakamahinga waipiro, ā, ko te tūmanako ka mahi tahi mātou i roto i te mahi ngātahi. "He mārama tēnei mō te hokohoko puta noa i Uropi, ā, kāore au i te mīharo i te maha o ngā whenua kua whakaarahia ngā māharahara."

title: Ka taea e te whakawhirinaki te whakahaere i te Cyfarthfa Park me te Castle a Merthyr Tydfil
summary: Ka taea e tētahi whakawhirinaki kore hua te kawenga mō ētahi o ngā ratonga whakahaere kaunihera a Merthyr Tydfil i roto i tētahi tono kia penapena i te £330,000 i te tau.
text: Ka taea te tuku atu ki te rōpū hou a Cyfarthfa Park me Castle me ngā whare pukapuka me ngā pokapū whakangahau. Merthyr Tydfil council said the trust would be able to access additional funding and could deliver financial savings. Kua whakarewaina he whakaaro tūmatanui, ā, e tuwhera ana tae noa ki te 23 o Hune. The council has organized drop-in sessions at Merthyr Tydfil Leisure Centre on 10 June and Treharris Community Centre a day later, between 16:00 and 20:00 BST, to discuss plans for Merthyr Tydfil Leisure and Culture Trust. I kī te mana he wāhanga nga tono o te wāhanga rua o tana hōtaka tōtika. He ūnga tūruhi rongonui a Cyfarthfa Park me te Cyfarthfa Castle Museum and Art Gallery. Ko te kāinga tērā o te rangatira rino o Richard Crawshay, ā, i hangaia i te tau 1824. I whakatuwheratia anō te whare taonga o te whare taonga i te tau 2011 i muri i te whakaoratanga o te £320,000. Other councils around Wales are also looking at alternative ways of running leisure services in the face of budget cuts.

title: Mā te ngaro atu o ngā matohi taupānga Covid-19 ka puta he pūoho
summary: Puta noa i te wiki he āwangawanga mai i ngā kaiwhakamahi o te taupānga NHS Covid-19 mō ngā matohi whakararuraru e tere ana te ngaro.
text: Nā Rory Cellan-JonesE kī ana te Tari Hauora kei te mahi i tētahi whakatika - engari i whakatūpato ka roa pea te wā. Ka pā te take ki te taupānga o Ingarangi me Weera, engari ehara i te taupānga o Pākehā, o Aiarangi ki te Raki rānei. Ka hangaia ngā matohi e te anga āporo me Google e hāngai ana, kaua ko te taupānga anō, engari kei te whakaoho me te mārō. Lee Stanley, who says he installed the app last Thursday as soon as it was available, saw this message flash up: "Possible Covid-19 exposure. I pūrongotia e tētahi tangata e tata ana koe he Covid-19. Kua tiakina te rā mārakerake, te roanga me te kaha tohu." Ka kī a ia: "I taku pāwhiri i tērā hei whakatuwhera i te whakamōhiotanga kia kite i te mea i tūpono, kāore i mahia tētahi mea." I a ia i Birmingham, e kī ana te taupānga ki a ia kei te taumata mōrearea rawa, i māharahara noa iho a ia. I uru atu a ia ki te paetukutuku o te taupānga mō ētahi atu tohutohu: "I roto i ngā FAQs, he 'aha te mahi mēnā ka kī atu te taupānga ki a koe kua tata koe ki tētahi tangata whai Covid-19'. Ā, e kī ana tēnā ki a koe kia wehe i a koe anō mō te 14 rā." Engari i tana haerenga ki Twitter, he tokomaha ngā tāngata i kī atu ki a ia he pūoho hē pea tēnei. "Kāore au i te mōhio mēnā koia tēnā, kāore rānei. Koia tēnā te mea pōraru." Ko te mea, kua whakahauhau te Tari Hauora puta noa i te wiki kia kaua te tangata e māharahara ki ēnei matohi, i takea mai i te pūnaha Whakamōhiotanga Mārakerake a Apple Google. Ko ngā whakamōhiotanga anake e puta ana i roto i te taupānga anō, e kī ana ki a koe kia haere taratahi me te tīmata i tētahi karaka tatauranga, ka whakatūpato rānei kua tohua he wāhiwera huaketo tētahi tauwāhi i takiuru ai koe. Ko taua karere i whiwhia e Lee - me ētahi atu - he tohu noa iho kei te mahi te aroturuki hoapā Nihokikorangi, ā, kua whakapā atu ki tētahi tangata kua pāngia e Covid-19. Engari kāore taua hoapā e tutuki i te paepae i whakaritea e ngā kaipūtaiao e tohutohu ana i te NHS, he mea nui rawa hei whakahau i tētahi tangata ki te taratahi. He aha i kore ai e whakatikaina? Engari he pātai he aha i kore ai te tīma taupānga e neke ki te mahi i tētahi take e āwangawanga tonu ana. Heoi anō, kua whakaūngia e au kāore ngā kaiwhakamahi o ngā taupānga i Pākehā me Aiarangi ki te Raki, e whakamahi ana hoki i te pūnaha Apple Google, i te whiwhi i ngā matohi ōrite. Te āhua nei nā te mea kei te whakamahi rātou i tētahi putanga hōu ake o te pūmanawa i te mea i whakarewaina e te taupānga NHS i tērā wiki. Kua whakaaturia e Āporo kia kaua tēnei e tinihanga rawa ki te whakatika. "Ehara i te hiki taumaha" ko te kōrero a tētahi pūtake. Kua uaua mātou i tēnei wiki ki te tiki whakautu mai i te tīma taupānga me te Tari Hauora me pēhea tā rātou mahi i te raruraru. I te atatū o te Paraire, ka korerotia mai ki a mātau kei te mahia he whakahōutanga hei whakatau i te take, engari ka pau pea ngā wiki. I whakahuatia hoki mā tētahi whakatika tere ka haukotia pea te rere o ngā raraunga ki te taupānga, kia iti iho ai te tika ki te whakatau he aha te hoapā tata. 'I hoahoatia kinotia' ko Luke Redpath, he kaiwhakawhanake e mōhio ana ki te Apple Google API (Application Programming Interface), he aroha ki te tīma NHS, e whakaaro ana me whiua e ngā rorohiko hangarau ētahi o ngā whakapae: "He rite tonu tēnei ki tētahi API kino i hoahoatia i te wāhi tuatahi." Ko te API, he anga e taea ai e ngā taupānga rerekē te kōrero tētahi ki tētahi. I kī hoki a Luke mā te whakamohoa i te taupānga hei whakamahi i te putanga hōu rawa o te API ka uaua pea, nā te mea ka mutu pea ka aukati i ētahi atu waea. Engari e whakaaro ana a ia he huarahi tonu hei whakaū i te iwi i te wā poto. "Ka taea e rātou te whakapai ake i te āhuatanga mā te whakapai ake i te wheako kaiwhakamahi i roto i te taupānga. Ka taea e koe te whakaatu i tētahi mea e mārama ai, āe, i whiwhi mātou i te mārakerake tūpono, engari kua manatokona e mātou, ā, kāore he mea hei māharahara." I a ia anō e whiwhi ana i tētahi o ngā matohi, ka mārama a Luke ki te whakararuraru i a rātou: "I māharahara tonu ahau - ā, he kaiwhakawhanake ahau." I te nuinga o te wā, kua angitu te whakarewatanga o te taupānga NHS Covid-19, neke atu i te 14 miriona ngā tikiake i tōna wiki tuatahi. Engari mēnā ko tētahi o ōna whāinga ko te whakatūpato i ngā tāngata ki ngā mōrea e anga ana ki a rātau me te huri i tō rātou whanonga, kātahi ka tino whakamutua ngā matohi e pōraru ana, e māharahara ana ki a rātou.

title: 'Kei te hiahiatia' te wae hauora hinengaro o Medway kia kati
summary: Kua whakaaetia ngā mahere hei kati i tētahi o ngā wae hauora hinengaro e whā i Keni me te whakawhāiti i te tiaki i ngā pūtahi e toru e toe ana.
text: Me kati te "A Block" moenga 35 i te Hōhipera Moana o Medway i Gillingham, me te whakanui ake i ngā whakarato i Canterbury, Dartford me Maidstone. I kī te NHS i mahia ngā taki uaua kia tino mōhio ai ka rawaka ngā moenga hei whakatikatika i te tono. Engari i kī te aroha hauora hinengaro o Mind he "tino māharahara". 'Tono tawhito rawa' I puta mai te whakataunga i te rā kotahi i whakaae ai te whakawhirinaki e pā ana ki tētahi "tono tawhito rawa" mō ngā ratonga. I kī te tūroro hauora hinengaro o Jane Martin kua mahue ia ki te moe i runga i te moenga i runga i te papa i te wae o Medway Moana, e whakahaeretia ana e Kent me Medway Partnership and Social Care Trust (KMPT). "I tino whai i a au - i te inoi taku whaea ki te tīma mōrearea kia whakaae mai ki a au," tana kī. "I te nuinga o te wā, kāore he moenga i hea, nā reira i whakatakotoria ahau ki runga i te moenga i runga i te papa i roto i te rūma mārire mō te toenga o taku nohoanga." 'Pēhanga i ngā ratonga' i kī a KMPT i ngā wiki e rua kua kitea ngā taumata tono mō ngā ratonga tūroro hauora hinengaro. "Nā tēnei i pēhi i a mātau ratonga i te tīmatanga o tēnei marama," e kī ana i roto i tētahi kōrero. "When no other bed is available in this situation, an additional emergency bed has been put up on some of our wards where clinically appropriate to cope with the demand." Kent County Council's NHS overview and scrutiny committee approved the closure put forward by KMPT. I korerotia ka hinga te maha o ngā moenga tūroro mai i te 180 ki te 162, ā, ko ētahi o ngā moni i tiakina ka pau ki te nui ake o ngā ratonga hapori. Councillor Theresa Murray, deputy Labour leader at Medway Council, said the closure of A Block was approved on the basis the trust must prepare a detailed business plan. I kī a ia me hoatu ngā pūmautanga mō te āhua o te whakakaha i ngā ratonga hauora hinengaro hapori hei ārai i te haere o ngā tāngata ki te tiaki tāhapa. "This decision means that we can now move forward with the provision of excellent mental health services for people in Kent and Medway who need crisis care," said KMPT medical director Dr Karen White. I kī a Pirihitini Bateman, te rangatira nui o Dartford, Gravesham me Swanley Mind he tino māharahara te whakataunga kia tapahia ngā moenga.

title: Ko nga taonga penehīni Wīwī i pā ki te ture mahi
summary: E hia rau ngā teihana penehīni Wīwī kua maroke, ā, e kī ana ngā uniana e rima ngā kaipūnuku hinu e āraia ana i te wā e whawhai ana ngā kaiwhakahaere ki ngā whakahōu mahi a te kāwanatanga.
text: I pūrongotia ngā tūtira i ngā teihana penehīni i ngā wāhi maha o Wīwī, i te raki me te uru, engari i Parihi hoki. Heoi anō, ka kī te minita waka he hē te kōrero mo te iti o te penehīni. Mō te wiki kua taha, kua tū ngā whakahē puta noa i Wīwī i muri i te whakahautanga o ngā ture mahi hou i te pāremata. I whakataratia e te Pirimia o Manuela Valls he mana motuhake i raro i te kaupapa ture hei karo i te tutukitanga a te tini o ngā MP Manapori i te tīmatanga o tēnei marama. He tino ngāwari noa iho ngā kaimahi Wīwī? Ko ngā whakahē i te wā e whakahau ana a Valls i ngā ture mahi mā te Tukino, ka whakahē ngā pirihimana o Parihi i te maka whakamutunga o te mataono o Te Pāremata, engari ko tana whakatau kia karo i te pāremata i riri ai ngā hoariri. I tērā wiki, tokorua nga pirihimana i waenganui o Parihi i mawhiti i te whara nui i te tahuna o to rātau motokā pirihimana. Tae noa ki te ata Mane, ka kī te uniana mahi CGT e rima o ngā kaipūnuku hinu e waru o Wīwī kua kore e mahi, mai i Martigues tata ki Marseille i te tonga ki Gonfreville-l'Orcher i Le Havre i te raki. I kī te kaikōrero o te uniana, a Emanuera Lepine, "ehara te whāinga i te waihanga i ngā iti, ko te whāinga kia haumaru i te putanga o te ture mahi". I neke atu ngā pirihimana ki te weteārai i te nuinga o ngā kōpae penehīni puta noa i Wīwī i āraia mō ngā rā, ā, ka kī a Tēnā Valls me mārama te katoa ka mahi te kāwanatanga i tōna nui ki te karo i ngā iti. Heoi anō, e 1,600 o ngā teihana penehīni e 12,000 o Wīwī kua maroke, kua pau rānei ngā rawa i te tōmuri o te ata Mane. I kī te rōpū mahi penehīni Wīwī UFIP he rawaka ōna rawa, engari kāore i taea te tohatoha noa. Kua whakataua e te Minita Moni a Mīharo Sapin te māra o nga kaipūnuku he mana kore. Pire whakahōu mahi Wīwī - ngā take matua e whakararuraru ana i te pūrākau o te wiki mahi 35 haora o Wīwī

title: I whainatia e te wahine o Rāhui te £10k i runga i te rōpū mākī o te rā whānau 30
summary: Kua whainatia tētahi wahine e £10,000 i muri i te whatinga a nga pirihimana i tētahi rā whānau 30, neke atu i te 50 tāngata i roto i te mākī.
text: I whiwhi pūrongo a Pirihimana o Rāhui i ngā pūrongo o te rōpū i Hato Emanuera Tirohanga, i Bestwood, i Rātata, tata ki te 20:30 BST i te pō Paraire. I kitea e ngā āpiha te mākī i whakatūria ki muri o te pānga "ā, he huihuinga nui i roto". I kī te tōpana "kāore he kōwhiringa" engari ki te hoatu i te kaiwhakahaere te pai nui. I raro i ngā tohutohu a te kāwanatanga o nāianei i Ingarangi, e rua ngā whare, rōpū rānei tae atu ki te ono tāngata e whakaaetia ana ki te whakahoahoa i ngā pāka me ngā māra tūmataiti. I kī te Kaiāwhina Rangatira Kāhui Kāhui o Gerard Milano: "Kāore mātou e hiahia ana ki te whati i te ngahau a te iwi engari he tino mārama ngā ture, ā, kei reira rātou hei pare i a mātau katoa, ā, kei reira ngā pakaru mārama, tika hoki o ngā ture, pēnei i tēnei take, kāore ā mātou kōwhiringa engari me mahi pēnei. "Ka urupare tonu mātou ki ngā pūrongo pēnei me te mahi pēnei,  ā, ka haere tonu mātou ki te whakauru, ki te whakamārama, ki te whakahauhau, ki te hiahiatia, ka mahi i a mātou e neke whakamua ana me te mahere huarahi a te kāwanatanga." Whāia a BBC East Midlands i Facebook, Twitter, Instagram rānei. Tukua ō whakaaro pūrākau ki eastmidsnews@bbc.co.uk. Ngā Hononga Ipurangi Pātahi Ngā Pirihimana o Nottinghamshire

title: Ngā Pirihitini o mua: Kua whakahāwea e tātau o tātau tīpuna?
summary: Kua whakahāwea e tātau ngā tāngata tuatahi ki te whakanoho anō i Ingarangi i muri i te Ice Age whakamutunga? Ko ngā whakaaturanga mai i ngā pūtake maha e tohu ana he mātauranga kē atu ngā Pirihitini o mua i tā mātou i whakaaro ai.
text: Nā David JacquesUniversity of Buckingham i whakaaro ai ngā kaimātai whenua kua ngaro te pūrākau o ngā kaiwhaiwhai o mua i te kohu o te wā. Tata tonu ki te kore e mahue i nga kaiwhakangau-kohikohi te tohu o to rātau oranga nomadic. Ko te hua, i whakaarohia nga tangata pōhatu o Ingarangi o neherā, he tangata ngāwari, e noho ana i te oranga kino o te ringa-ki-te-waha. Engari ināianei, kei te puta mai ngā whakaaturanga e huri kōaro ana i aua whakaaro. Ko ngā pae whaiwhenua puta noa i te UK me Uropi ki te raki e whakaputa ana i ngā whakaaturanga e peita ana i ēnei tāngata i roto i tētahi mārama tino rerekē. Ngā mihi ki tēnei pūtaiao tapatahi, kua nui haere te mārama o te hītori o mua, me ngā tāngata urutau, whai taonga ahurea, mātauranga hoki i noho i ēnei moutere. Ko tētahi pakipūmeka o TE AO Horizon, hei mata i te Wenerei, e kōrero ana i te pūrākau o tēnei whainga kia mārama ki ngā Pirihitini tuatahi. Ko ētahi o ēnei tāngata Mesolithic, Middle Stone Age rānei, i noho i Blick Mead, Wiltshire - he torutoru maero te tawhiti atu i te wāhi o Stonehenge ā muri ake. I konei, te āhua nei kua whakahaere, kua whakawāteatia e ngā rōpū ngā ngahere taunaki, i hanga hanganga, ā, ka hoki ki te wāhi kotahi mō te neke atu i te 3,000 tau, e ai ki tētahi awhe rā waro irirangi kua puta mai he raupapa roa ahurei mō tētahi pae Mesolithic i Ingarangi me Uropi - 7,596-4,246 BC. Ko ngā puna i Blick Mead pea te take tuatahi, ā-ringa hoki i noho ai te tangata i reira i mua noa atu i te hanganga o Stonehenge. Kua tiakina hoki e rātau ngā toenga o ngā kararehe i patua e rātou, ngā utauta i hangaia, i whakamahia e rātou, ā, tērā pea he hanganga i noho ai rātou. Ko te nui o ngā utauta kiripaka me ngā wheua kararehe, otirā mai i ngā kau mohoao ngaro e mōhiotia ana ko te aurochs, e tohu ana ki ngā tāngata e noho ana i konei mō ngā wā roa, ā, he pūmahara motuhake me ngā pāhonotanga ki taua wāhi. Te āhua nei e whakaata ana ngā momo me ngā momo kiripaka i ngā nekenekehanga a ngā tāngata i whai i te kēmu me ngā tau, ā, i kōwhiri kia noho ki ngā wāhi rerekē e ai ki te rerekētanga o ngā tipu mō te kai me ngā rawa, me ngā hiahia whakaruru. Ka huihuia, ko te kiripaka me ētahi atu whakaaturanga utauta pōhatu e tohu ana ko Blick Mead he wāhi hākari, he wāhi huihuinga hoki mō ngā mano tau i haere tawhiti ai te tangata kia tae atu. I tawhiti atu i te wāhi i taka ai ngā nomads i tētahi wā, ka pau te wā ki reira, ka whakawhitiwhitia ngā whakaaro, ka kōrerorerotia, ka urutau hoki ngā hangarau hou. I rangatira ngā kaiwhaiwhai i Ingarangi, engari i te 6,000 tau ki muri ka puta he huringa whakaharahara, pūmau hoki i te āhua o te oranga o o tātau tīpuna. He tino whakaharahara i te mea kua hoatu he ingoa hītori rerekē. Koinei te tīmatanga o te Tau Pōhatu hou i Ingarangi - te Neolithic. I te wā o te Neolithic ka puta mai te uku uku, te wā i hangaia ai e te tangata he whakamaharatanga pēnei i a Stonehenge - engari i runga i ngā mea katoa, koia te wā i noho ai te tangata hei kaiahuwhenua. Kua tīmata ngā kaipūtaiao me ngā kaimātai whenua ki te hura i ngā whakaaturanga i ora ai ngā huarahi kaiwhaiwhai paetata i te taenga mai o te pāmu, kaua e tineia, pērā i te nuinga o te wā. A, i Blick Mead, i reira e tino tiakina ana ngā whakaaturanga āhua kore o te oranga kaiwhaiwhai, ko ngā wheua kiore, ngā toad me ngā ika - ka taea hoki e tātau te kite i ētahi atu mea mō ngā taketake o Stonehenge. E whakaatu ana ngā keri i te pae e noho ana ngā tāngata i taua rohe mai i te wā o ngā whakamaharatanga tuatahi i hangaia ki Stonehenge. I ngā wā katoa e whakaaro ana mātau ki ngā tāngata Mesolithic, ko ngā Pirihitini tuatahi, he kaiwhaiwhai, e noho ana i tētahi oranga nomadic, mātāmua, mōrearea hoki. Engari ko te mea kātahi anō ka whakaaturia mai i Blick Mead, me ētahi atu wāhi, ko te nohonga o tētahi iwi matatini ake, hihiri hoki. Ko ngā kitenga whakaharahara i Blick Mead he mea hira noa iho nā te mea e whakarato ana i te pūrākau o muri ki te pūrākau o Stonehenge; he mea hira hoki nā te mea e whakaata ana i te nui o te hiranga o ēnei iwi ki te hītori o Ingarangi i te nuinga o te wā. Ā, ko ēnei pūrākau tuatahi o Ingarangi e whakaatu ana ko te Mesolithic tētahi wā whakamārama i roto i te hītori o ēnei moutere. HORIZON - Kei te 20:00 i te Wenerei 19 o Aotearoa te Tuatahi o Pirihitini.

title: Tokowhā e whakaae ana ki te whakahau kino a Huntingdon Life Sciences
summary: Tokowhā ngā kaiwhaiwhai motika kararehe kua whakaae ki te whakahau kino ki ngā tāngata e honoa ana ki tētahi taiwhanga whakamātau kararehe o Cambridgeshire.
text: I whakaae a Tōma Hāhi, e 27, ki te whakatupu i ngā māngai me ērā e pā ana ki ngā Pūtaiao Ora o Huntingdon (HLS) me ngā whakawhanake. I whakaae a Nicola Tapping, 29, Jason Mullen, 32, me Alfie Fitzpatrick, 20, ki ngā kamupene whakamataku me ngā kirimana HLS. I whakaae a Nicole Vosper, 22, rāua ko Sarah Whitehead, 53, ki tētahi whakapae whakatupu. Ko Hāhi rāua ko Tapping nō Gosport i Hampshire, ā, ko Jason Mullen nō Rānana me Fitzpatrick mai i Solihull i te West Midlands. Ko 'Ngā tuma o te tutu' no Newquay a Vosper, ā, no Littlehampton a Whitehead. I whakahaua e te tokoono he whakahau whakamataku aowhānui ki te tini o nga kamupene ki te ngana ki te whakahau i te katinga o HLS. I ūkuia hoki ngā kāinga o ngā kaimahi o ngā whare whakarato ki ngā waea tūkino me ngā tūkinotanga taihara me ngā tuma tukino hei whakahau i ngā kamupene kia tapahi hononga ki HLS. I hikitia e te Kaiwhakamahara o Winchester, te Kaiwhakawā o Keith Cutler, te kēhi mō ngā pūrongo tōmua. A two-day sentencing hearing will take place at Winchester Crown Court on 21 October. E rima tau te wā mōrahi o te whare herehere mo te whakatupu ki te kōkuhu, ā, e rima tau te whakatupu i raro i te Ture Hara Nui me te Pirihimana 2005.

title: Te tono a nga tangata whenua o Cardigan ki te whakanoho anō i ngā hunga whakaruru o Hiriani
summary: Ko ngā hapori puta noa i Uēra e hiahia ana ki te āwhina i ngā hunga whakaruru o Hiriani e kohi moni ana hei pūtea i te nohoanga anō o ngā whānau.
text: Kua kohia e tētahi rōpū i Cardigan, a Ceredigion, te £12,000 hei wāhanga o tana tono ki te kaupapa tautoko hapori a te Tari Kāinga. Ka whakamahia te moni hai āwhina i nga whānau ki te whakatatū i te kāinga me te kimi mahi. I kī a Taketake Moller, nāna i tīmata te rōpū, i tino hiahia ngā tangata ki te āwhina i a rātau ake ringa. Ināianei kua whakanohoia e ngā kaunihera katoa i Uēra ngā whānau Hiriani, neke atu i te 400 ngā tāngata i mauria i raro i te Aronui Whakatau Tangata Mōrearea o Hiriani a te kāwanatanga o UK. I whai i te whakahē a nga kaunihera mo te tere o te nohoanga o te tangata. Puta noa i te UK, neke atu i te 5,400 ngā tāngata kua noho anō. Tata ki te 13 ngā rōpū hapori e tautoko kē ana, e kimi ana rānei ki te tautoko i ngā whānau puta noa i Wales, tae atu ki ngā mea i Fishguard me Narberth i Pembrokeshire. Kei te whakapā atu rātau ki o rātau mana ā rohe, engari he tino takitahi, he pūtea whaiaro.
