Ms Moller said the Cardigan group were looking to buy a house to help with refugees' accommodation needs with the hope of welcoming their first families in the autumn. Ka kī a ia: "Mā ngā rōpū hoa noho tata, ko ngā hapori e whakarite ana ki te whakauru i ngā tāngata, ki te kohi moni, ki te kimi kāinga, ki te pōhiri i a rātou i te taunga rererangi, ki te whakaatu ki a rātou me pēhea te whakamahi i ngā tākuta me te pahi. "He tino hiahia ki ngā tāngata i te rohe e noho ana ahau ki te mahi i tēnei. He tino hiahia te tangata ki te āwhina." I pōhiritia e te rōpū, i roto i te hōtaka Strangers in a Strange Land a BBC Wales, ngā hunga whakaruru kua noho kē mai i Kānata ki te whakaatu i ngā mea ka taea e tō rātou hapori te tuku me te ako i ngā mea e hiahiatia ana e rātou. I waenganui i a rātau ko te tākuta tākuta o Mua o Hu huka, kua tukuna ināianei ki a ia he whakangungu i muri i tana rerenga i a Hiria i te tau 2014. I kī a ia ahakoa he maha pea ngā ārai e anga ana ki ngā hunga whakaruru e neke ana ki ngā wāhi taone, kaua ki ngā taone, ka mōhio a ia ka taea te hinga. Ka kī a ia: "Tērā pea he uaua ki te tokomaha o ngā Pirihitini kōrero Arapi, e kai ana mātau i ngā kai Halal e uaua ana ki te tiki i te taiwhenua. " And I think the people here have not had the experience with multicultural environment so this would be difficult but I think they will overcome this."

title: I whiua e te kaiako matua o Clydach a Rhian DeSouza mo nga whakaahua whakarihariha
summary: Kua hoatu ki tētahi kaiako matua o te kura tuatahi nāna i hanga whakaahua whakarihariha tētahi tamaiti, he whakahau hapori e rua tau.
text: I whakahaua a Rhian DeSouza, e 43, nāna i whakaae kia rua ngā whakapae, kia mahi i te whakangungu whakaora 25 rā me te 200 hāora mahi kore utu i te Kōti Karauna o Swansea. Me haina hoki e ia te rēhita o te hunga hara wahine mo te rima tau, ā, i tukuna ki tētahi raupapa ārai tūkino. Kua whakatārewatia a DeSouza i tana mahi i Ysgol Gymraeg Gellionnen i Clydach, tata ki Swansea. Kua tuhituhi nga kawana o te kura ki ngā mātua e whakaū ana i a rātau kāore te take i pā ki ētahi tauira o nāianei, o mua rānei, i tētahi kura rānei i whakaakona e De Souza. Ko te kaupapa o ngā whakaahua he kōtiro 16 tau, i mōhiotia e De Kauza mai i te 13 o ona tau, engari ehara i te tauira i tōna kura. I rongo te kōti i muri i te 16 o nga tau o te kōtiro, kua tīmataria e rātau he whanaungatanga whakaaetanga. Heoi anō, i te wā o Pipiri ka kitea e te whaea o te kōtiro te whanaungatanga, a, ka pūrongotia ki nga pirihimana. I rongo te kōti kua tangohia e te kōtiro e rua ngā whakaahua takatāpui mōna, a, ka tukuna atu ki a De Kaka, nāna i ūkui i tana waea. I kī te Kaiwhakawā o Paora Tōma he "whakarerekētanga o te ture" ka taea e De Kaka te whai pānga tika ki te kōtiro, ā, kāore he whakaahua takatāpui mōna, engari i tāpiritia e ia me mōhio ia he mana kore mana. I roto i tētahi kōrero tōtahi, ka kī te kura me te kaunihera o Swansea: "I te wā tonu i whakamōhiotia ai mātau ki te tūhuratanga a pirihimana ka whakatārewatia ia, ā, ka noho tonu. " An acting head teacher is in place and support is being given to ensure there is no impact on the day to day running of the school."

title: Marie Colvin: He oranga 'i tautuhia e te tangata'
summary: He ata kī tonu i ngā pūmahara mahana o tētahi wahine i whakaahuatia e tana ētita ko te "korero pakanga tino nui o tōna whakatupuranga".
text: Nā Fergal KeaneBBC News Ko te ratonga whakamaharatanga mō Marie Colvin, te kaipānui o te Rātapu Times i patua i Hiria i tērā o Hui tanguru, i tū i roto i tētahi whare karakia kōpikopiko o Hato Mātini-i-te-Āpure i waenganui o Rāwāhi. E 56 tau a Ms Colvin i te wā i patua ai ia i te taha o te kaipānui whakaahua Wīwī o Remi Ochlik, e 29 te pakeke, i te tapa taone o Homs o Papa Amr. I uru atu ngā whika ārahi o te ao pāpāho me ngā tōrangapū ki ngā hoa o Marie me tōna whānau, i arahina e tōna whaea o Rosemary, i haere mai i Niu Ioka mo te takahanga. Ko te Hēkeretari ā-Rohe, ko William Hague, me tōna tuatahi, ko David Miliband MP, i waenganui i ērā i reira. Na te Reverend Richard Carter, nāna i whakahaere te karakia, i tautuhi te oro mā te whakaahua i a Marie he tangata i "tautuhia e te tangata... tētahi tangata nāna i hoatu he reo ki te hunga kore reo." I roto i tana whakaata, ka kōrero te kaipānui ā-rohe o TE AO o Lyse Doucet mō tētahi wahine he "ngākau nui me te glamour" me te koha nui mo te whakahoahoa. I kōrero a ia mo te haere ki Papa Amr, i te wāhi i patua ai a Marie Colvin, i tērā wiki anake, engari kāore i kitea te whare i mate ai tōna hoa i raro i te taiparatanga. Heoi anō, i tētahi atu wāhi o Homs, i tūtaki ia ki tētahi taitama, ka pātai atu ki a ia mehemea kua tūtaki ia ki a Marie. "Ka menemene tōna kanohi," te mahara a Ms Doucet. Kātahi ka kī te taitama mō Marie: "He tino pai a ia, he tino toa ia." He oriori i tuhia e Alan Jenkins, te kaiwhakatika tuarua o te Times Literary Supplement me tētahi hoa tata o Marie, i whakaara ake i te pouri o te hunga i mōhio pai ki a ia. Me pēhea koe e takoto ai i reira? I roto i ngā otaota Ina hiahia mātou kia noho koe ki konei i roto i ētahi atu momo raruraru Hei kata mahana i te kaiwhakatika o te Sunday Times, a John Witherow, i te mahi o to rāua whanaungatanga hei ētita me te korerorero: "Ka kī atu ahau ki a ia me aha, ā, ka mahia e ia tāna e hiahia ana." I whakapehapeha a Marie Colvin i a ia ki te hoatu i ōna rangatira i te whakahaere, ā, ka whakaputaina tōmuri tana kape, ka whakamāramatia e ia, nā te mea kāore i whai wā ki ngā kaiwhakatika ki te "whakararuraru." Engari tērā anō tētahi taha o tēnei korero māia, e kī ana a Tēnā Witherow. Ko te tangata i haere ki tōna kāinga i pā ki te ātaahua o te toi e whakaaturia ana, ka kī a ia. He pūkenga tōna ki te whakatō i tana māra kia puawai tonu ai ia i tana hokinga mai i ngā pakanga. I muri iho i te ngaronga o tōna whatu e hīpoki ana i te papā i Sri Rānaka, kua hinga a Marie ki roto i te pouri, nāna i tata tonu te tuku i te pūrongo whawhai. Engari i whakahokia a ia e te ngahau o te Kōanga Arapia, ā, i hipokina e ia ōna raruraru mai i Ihipa ki Ripia me Hiria. "Ko ia te korero pakanga tino nui o tōna whakatupuranga," te kī a Tēnā Witherow. I roto i te ratonga ko te waiata rangimārie o te tau 1960 'Blowin in the Wind' na Bob Dylan, i waiatatia e te kaiwaiata matua o Catatonia. He waiata tika tērā mo te whakamaharatanga o tētahi wahine e tuku ana ki te whakapuaki i te mamae o te hunga kore mana. Tērā pea ko ngā kupu tino ātaahua o te ata i puta mai i roto i te oriori 'Travel' nā Edna St Vincent Millay, i pānuitia e David Miliband. E mahana ana toku ngakau ki nga hoa e mahia ana e au, Me nga hoa pai ake e kore ahau e mohio, Heoi, kahore he tereina e kore ahau e haere, Ahakoa kei hea e haere ana.

title: I tautuhia te huarahi Amazon ki te hoatu i a Paratira me Peru he ara hokohoko hou
summary: He aha te huarahi pai ake hei whakanui i te whakatuwheratanga o tētahi huarahi i te whakataetae motokā i runga?
text: Nā Dan CollynsBBC News, Puerto Maldonado Neke atu i te 30 ngā atekōkiri motokā o Peruvian me Pārihia i mahi i tēnā hei tohu i tētahi huarahi hou e tūhono ana i o rātau iwi. Ko ngā whenua e rua he tuarā whakaahua tētahi ki tētahi me tō rāua rohe tiritiri e rere ana i roto i te ngahere o Amazon, engari ināianei kei te ngana ki te hanga hononga kaha ake. I te 19 o Hānuere, ka whakawhiti nga atekōkiri i te cordillera o Andes ki Cusco, ka piki ki te 4,725m (15,500ft) i runga ake i te taumata o te moana. Kātahi rātau ka heke ki te ngahere o Amazon o Madre de Dios, te rohe rohe e rohe ana ki Paratira me Poriwia. Tauwāhi rautaki Ko te rēhi i runga i ētahi 2,200km (1,367 maero) he wā poto ki te whakawhiti i tētahi awa mā te waka waka i te mea kāore anō kia oti tētahi piriti matua. Kātahi ka haere tonu ngā tauwhāinga ki Inapari i te rohe, i tae tuatahi atu ki te atekōkiri motokā huihuinga ngaio o Peru, o Nicolas Fuchs. Ko te tikanga o ngā raruraru rēhitatanga waka, kāore i taea e te nuinga o ngā atekōkiri te whakawhiti ki Paratira ki te whakaoti i te 200km whakamutunga, neke atu rānei ki Rio Branco, te pūmatua o te kāwanatanga o Acre. Ko ngā raruraru takawaenga ki te taha, ko te ara whakaharahara te tino uauatanga. "Ehara i te mea he ānau noa iho te huarahi, he nui ōna pata nui, he wāhi ki te hē koe, ka mate koe," te kī a Luiz Facco, tētahi atekōkiri Pārihia i oma i te taha o te wahine me te atekōkiri tahi o Cristina. I tua atu i te tohu o te whakaurunga o Amerika ki te Tonga, ka whakarewaina hoki e ngā hononga huarahi - tērā pea he tino nui - hokohoko ki Āhia. Kua whakakapia kētia e Haina te US hei hoa tauhokohoko tau tuatahi o Parīhi. Mā tēnei huarahi, ka whai urunga a Paratira ki ngā tauranga Peruvian e rima e anga ana ki te Moana-nui-a-Kiwa. Mō tōna wāhanga, kei te hanawiti a Peru i waenganui i ngā rangatiratanga nui rawa o te ao - Haina ki te hauauru me Parīhi, ki te rāwhiti. "He moemoeā tēnei huarahi," te kī a Miguel Vega, te perehitini o te Chamber of Commerce o Peru-Brazil. "E kī ana mātou i te whutupōro, ko te waenganui e tohu ana i te kēmu. Mā tēnei huarahi e puru a Peru ki waenganui i Āhia me Amerika ki te Tonga." Engari kei te kitea hoki te huarahi he moepuku a te hunga taiao. "Kāore e tino tūkino te asphalting i te huarahi," te kī a Rob Williams, te kaiwhakarite rangahau o Peru mō te Frankfurt Zoological Society. "Ko ngā huarahi tuarua e puta mai ana i te huarahi matua i roto i te tauira wheua ika e tūkino ana. Ka kongakonga tonu ēnei i te Amazon tae noa ki te wā ka whakawhāititia te katoa o te huarahi Interoceanic." Ko te rere koura e kitea whānuitia ana e ngā kaipūtaiao ko te kokonga tino rauropi o te ngahere o Amazon, ko Madre de Dios e wehewehea ana e te huarahi. I te wāhi e tūtaki ai ngā Andes ki Amazon, ka haere hāngai tonu te huarahi Interoceanic i te taone o Quince Mil. Kei tōna tapawhā matua he whakapakoko o tētahi koroua e parai ana i te koura. "E mōhio ana te katoa me pēhea te parai koura i konei, engari i ēnei rā kei te haere mai ngā kaikari me ngā mīhini taumaha me te taonga kohukohu," te kī a Quince Mil e noho ana i Ozwaldo Escobar. "Kei te whakapoke rātau i a mātau wai, e patu ana i te ika, e whakangaro ana i te ngahere. " He iti noa iho tā mātou mahi nā te mea e tāwai ana rātau i ngā pirihimana me ngā mana ā rohe," tana whakapae. I kī atu tētahi taitama, e mōhiotia ana ko Renzo, ki a TE AO ka whiwhi toronga ia ia wiki mai i tana kaihoko koura o Lima, e utu ana i te 108 kapu Peruvian ($38.97) mō ia karamu mō te konganuku utu nui. I te taraiwa whaka te rāwhiti ki ngā whenua pāpaku o Amazon, ka puta ake he moana tarpaulin kikorangi i te taha o te huarahi. He taone tēneti tēnei, engari kai te pōturi i te tauhokohoko. Ka hokona ngā kai me ētahi atu taonga i muri i ngā taraka e haere ana, ā, ka mahi ngā toa motopaika i te hokohoko haruru i waenganui i te pahū auau o ngā pūhiko hinu penehīni. He tino hou rawa ētahi o ēnei kāinga kōura, e mōhiotia ana ko te kiromita 108 me te 115, e tohu ana i tō rātou tawhiti atu i Cusco. Mai i te tapa o te huarahi ka tapahia e rātau ki roto i te ngahere, ka hora atu ki te tini o ngā ara ki ngā maina koura. E kitea ana mai i te hau, ko ngā pūrei katoa o te ngahere e kōpikopiko ana i ngā hōpua poke konupūmā, ka huri rānei hei koraha. I ngā wā i te huarahi, ka whakaaturia e ngā kāri kāwanatanga ngā pikitia o te kino o te huarahi i mua, me te āhua o tēnei wā, me ngā karere pēnei: I mua: Whakangaromanga; Ināianei: Optimism. He wikitōria, he aituā rānei? Engari ehara i te mea kua tautuhia te huarahi ki te whakarewa i te hokohoko, engari ko te hekenga hoki. Neke atu i te 200 ngā tāngata i ia rā e haere mai ana i Andes ki Amazon, e pupuhi ana i ngā tāngata e 30,000 e noho ana i te kari koura kore mana, e kī ana a Juan Carlos Navarro o Caritas, he aroha Katorika Roma i Puerto Maldonado, te pūmatua ā-rohe o Madre de Dios. "He ngoikore rawa nga rōpū kāwanatanga ki te whakahaere," te kī a Tēnā Navarro. I te inoi nga mana ā rohe ki te kāwanatanga matua kia whakapuaki i tētahi āhua taiao ohorere i te rohe, ka tāpiritia e ia. "Neke atu i te whanaketanga, kua kawea mai e te huarahi he raruraru ki a mātau," te kī a Luis Aguirre, kotahi marama noa iho ki tana mahi hou hei kāwana o Madre de Dios. "Ko te tikanga kia kawea mai he kauneketanga, engari he nui ake te hara, he nui ake te tūkinotanga rongoā, he nui ake te whakawhāititanga, he nui ake te whakangaromanga rauropi me te hekenga kāore i te takina." Te āhua nei he aromatawai pōhēhē e tūpono ana ki te āhua whakamana o te Perehitini o Peru, a Ahana Kāria. Kua karangatia e ia ngā tau e rima i pau i te hanga i te huarahi e 2,589km te roa hei whakamana a te tangata i runga i te āhua me te tawhiti. I tōna waewae whakamutunga, ka tere te whakataetae motokā huihuinga i roto i te taone taitapa moe o Inapari i reira ngā tamariki hiahia me o rātau matua e rārangi ana i te huarahi, ngā kāmera waea pūkoro e rite ana ki te hopu pikitia. I mahue i a Suleyde Ochoa a Inapari i te 23 tau ki muri. Ināianei kua mārena a ia ki tētahi Ārepa, tokorua hoki ngā tamāhine, kua hoki mai a ia ki te whakatū i tētahi wharekai i te taha o te huarahi. "I mua i te kino rawa o te huarahi, kotahi wiki noa iho kia tae ki Puerto Maldonado," tana kī atu ki te HAU. Ināianei kāore i neke atu i te toru haora te roa o te haerenga. "E kite ana ahau i tētahi wā tūturu i konei ināianei, koia ahau i hoki mai ai me taku whānau".

title: Tā Derek Jacobi: 'E kore rawa koe e mahue i te wehi pirau o te haere ki runga i te atamira'
summary: I a ia e hoki ana ki te atamira i te Whare Manawa o Shaw, ka kōrero a Tā Derek Jacobi mō tōna pāhonotanga roa ki Chichester, tōna whawhai ki te mataku o te atamira, he aha hoki ia e kore ai e haere.
text: Na Tim MastersEntertainment me te korero toi, he whakararuraru rōhi te rūma whakakākahu o Tā Derek Jacobi. Ko te rā i muri mai i te whakatuwheratanga o te Whare Heartbreak i te Whare Tapere o Chichester Festival, i reira te whetū tōpū o te atamira me te mata e whakatangi ana i te kaumoana tahito o Bernard Shaw, a Kāpene Shotover. "He taitamariki mārire ahau e 24 i taku tuatahi i konei i te tau 1963," e mahara ana a Jacobi, nāna i uru ki te kamupene a Laurence Olivier mō tōna wā tuarua i Chichester. Kātahi anō ka noho a Hakopa i roto i te Hato Hoana o Shaw, ā, ināianei kua hoki mai a ia ki tētahi atu tākaro a Shaw i te wā e whakanui ana a Chichester i tōna wā huritau 50. He aituā, he hoahoa rānei? "Aituā katoa," e kī ana a Jacobi, "pērā i te nuinga o ngā mea i roto i te whare tapere. I roto i taku mahi kāore anō kia whakaritea, he tino waimarie ahau kua tono mai te tangata ki a au kia mahi i ētahi mea." Ko te Whare Pouri, i tautuhia i te tapa o te Pakanga Tuatahi o te Ao, e kite ana i ngā momo pūāhua i pōhiritia ki te kāinga o te Kāpene Shotover e tana tamāhine ko Hesione Hushabye (Emma Fielding). Ko te tākaro, i whakaputaina i muri tonu i te pakanga, ko te whakaekenga a Shaw ki te mārire o nga karaehe rangatira, kāore i mahi i tētahi mea hei ārai i a Uropi e heke ana ki te mōrearea tae noa ki te tōmuritanga. "He tangata tino wairua a ia, engari he tangata i roto i te ngangau," te kī a Jacobi o te kurī moana tawhito o Shotover. "He haerenga ātaahua tēnei. " He aha te tino pai o tēnei mahi, ka taea e koe te tīmata me te pūmanawa me te taitamariki i tō taha, kātahi ka wheako koe - ā, ko te tūmanako kia angitu - kātahi ka āta rewa koe ki ngā wāhanga o ngā kaumātua. "Kei te tākaro ahau i ngā tipuna tāne i ēnei rā, ā, he rerekē tonu nā te mea he tamariki ahau i roto." Ko te mahi tuatahi a Jacobi i muri i te whiwhinga whiwhinga i te tau 1960 i te Whare Tapere Repertory o Birmingham. I muri iho ka whakamātau a ia - a, i rahua - ki te uru ki te Royal Shakespeare Company i Stratford. "I haere ahau ki tētahi whakamātautau, ka werohia e rātau he kape o Te Āwhā ki taku ringa, ka tono mai ki a au kia pānui i a Ariel. Kāore rātau i pīrangi ki a au. I tino pouri ahau," ka mahara a ia. Engari i rerekē ngā taonga o Hakopa i te tau 1963 i te wā o Te Wānanga o Te Wānanga o Te "One Wednesday matinee I am playing Henry VIII and Sir Laurence is in the audience on a recce for young actors for the second season at Chichester. " I te tiritiri ahau i tētahi rūma whakakākahu me 'Katinara Wolsey' ā, ka haere mai a Olivier ki te kōrero i ngā mea ātaahua, a, ka tukuna mai he mahi ki a au." Mai i taua kamupene Chichester i hangaia ai e Olivier te kamupene Whare Tapere ā-Motu tuatahi i taua tau anō. Kei te mahara tonu a Jacobi i te rā i karangatia ai nga kaitapere ki te tari o Olivier kia korerotia mēnā kei roto, kei waho rānei. "He rā weriweri tērā," tana kī, e tohu ana i te matapihi o tana rūma whakakākahu. "I haere takitahi nga kaitapere ki nga tari kei reira te whare tapere o Minerva ināianei. I te ngana mātou ki te pānui i tō rātou reo tinana i a rātou e puta mai ana." I kōwhiria a Jacobi. I te 22 o Oketopa i taua tau ka tākaro ia i a Laertes i te taha o Peter O'Toole's Hamlet i te Old Vic i te whakarewatanga o te National Theatre. E kore a Hakopa e wareware ki te rā - ko tōna huritau 25 hoki. He aha te āhua o Olivier ki te mahi tahi? "He maha ōna pōtae: ko ia to mātau pāpā, ko ia to mātau pāhi, ko ia to mātau kaiwhakahaere, ko ia to mātau hoa kaitapere. He kaiako tino pai a ia mōku - e waru tau ahau i a ia." Ko te tūranga ārahi tuatahi a Jacobi i Chichester i te tau 1965 i roto i te Black Comedy's One Act a Peter Shaffer, i te taha o Albert Finney rāua ko Maggie Smith. I muri i te pō whakatuwheratanga, ka haere mai a Olivier ki tōna rūma whakakākahu me ētahi tohutohu mō te tango i ngā waea ārai. "I haere mai koe pēnei i te rāpeti mataku," tana kī atu ki te taitamariki o Hakopa. "I hoatu e koe he hurihanga iti ki te hunga whakarongo, kātahi ka pārekareka. Ehara tēnā i te āhua o tō waea ārai." E whakaae ana a Jacobi: "Kāore tonu ahau i te tino pai ki ngā waea ārai i a au anō. Kāore au i te hākinakina ki a rātou. Ina tākaro koe i a Hamlet, i a Lear rānei, kāore e taea e koe anake - nā te katoa te ahiahi." I a ia e kōrero ana ki a Hakopa, ka mārama he kaitapere a ia e pai ana ki te whakapiri ki te mahi. I te tau 1995, ka noho a ia hei kaiwhakahaere toi i Chichester, engari e whakaae ana: "I mōhio wawe ahau ehara i taku pēke." Kotahi anake tana tohutohu mo te atamira - ko Kenneth Branagh hei Hamlet. "I tino aroha ahau engari ehara anō i te wāhi i noho ai tōku ngākau - i hiahia ahau ki te noho ki runga i te atamira e mahi ana." Ina kōrero ahau i te whakatānga o Pita O'Toole - i pānuitia i ētahi rā i mua atu - ka mīharo a Hakopa. "Kāore ngā kaitapere e haere i te nuinga o te wā, ka ngaro noa iho, mēnā rānei he waimarie, ka haere tonu me ngā wāhanga hou." Ka taea e te mahi te hauā, e kī ana a ia. E rua tau a ia i karo i ngā tūranga whare tapere nā te mataku o te atamira. "Ka whara koe - ka āwangawanga koe i ia wā ka haere koe - ā, e kore rawa e pai ake, e whakaaro ana ahau ka kino ake te pakeke, te angitu rānei i a koe. " E kore rawa koe e mahue i taua wehi pirau i mua i tō haerenga ki runga i te atamira." Engari kāore e taea e Jacobi te whakaaro ki te whakatau ki te "whiu i roto i te hautai" , e ai ki a O'Toole. "E mārama ana ahau. Engari e kore rawa ahau e mahi. He tino nui rawa te mahi o tōku oranga." Kei te Whare Tapere o Chichester Festival, West Sussex, tae noa ki te 25 o Aotearoa

title: Te kōhuru o Haimona Clark: Ko te whakaoho 'i te wawao i a ia anō'
summary: I okaina tētahi tangata o te pāka wīra i te wā o te whawhai ki ōna hoa noho tata, a, ka mahue ki te "mate i te wāhi i hinga ai ia," kua rongo te kōti.
text: I kitea te tinana o Haimona Clark, e 54, i tana whare noho i Grove Caravan Park, Pendine, Carmarthenshire, i te 28 o Mahuru i tērā tau. Ko ōna hoa noho tata ko Whīni Baxter, e 52, me Te Wānanga o Ward, e 40, e whakapaea ana ki te kōhuru i mua i te oma. Ka whakakāhore rātau i te whakapae i te Kōti Karauna o Swansea. I kī te rōia a Paul Lewis kua uru nga tāngata ki "tētahi tautohetohe" i te pō i mua, ka tāpiri: "I whakaekea e rāua a Tēnā Clark. " Engari ko Whīni Baxter nāna i whakararuraru te motu kino ki a ia i te wā o te whakaekenga." I korerotia ki nga kaiwhakawā i kitea te tinana o te tūpāpaku e tētahi hoa i te tatau o tana wīra i te rā e whai ake nei i muri i tana okanga i roto i te poho ki te naihi. 'Te wawao i a ia anō' i kī a Tēnā Pirihitini e mau tonu ana a ia i tētahi pou konganuku, tērā pea ka whakamahia i roto i te whawhai i waenganui i ngā tāngata, me ia ka mahue ki te "mate i te wāhi i hinga ai ia". I rongo te kōti i a Tēnā Baxter rāua ko tōna hoa ko Linda Rowley te wīra i te taha o Tēnā Clark, i te wā e noho pātata ana hoki tērā atu whakapae, a Tēnā Ward. I kī a Tēnā Pirihitini i tētahi whakamātautau tirotiro tōmuri i huatau ai i pāngia e Tēnā Clark he whara ki tōna ringa mauī me tōna ringa "e ōrite ana ki ngā motu wawao" i mua i tōna matenga. I kī a ia ko ngā whakapae anake i uru ki taua mahi, kātahi anō ka whakaae a Tēnā Baxter ki te whakaoho i a Tēnā Clark "i runga i te wawao i a ia anō". I kī te rōia i kī atu hoki te tangata whakapae ki nga pirihimana i hopukina e ia nā te mea ko "te ahanoa tata rawa" me te tūkino "i hinga ki runga i te naihi". Ka haere tonu te whakamātautau.

title: Sclerosis maha: E whakatūpato ana te aroha ki te 'tārewa waehere poutāpeta' i roto i ngā ratonga
summary: Ko ngā ratonga mō ngā tāngata i Wales me te sclerosis maha (MS) he "tārewa waehere poutāpeta", kua whakatūpato tētahi aroha ārahi.
text: E kī ana te MS Society Cymru he iti iho i te 60% o ngā tāngata i waenganui me te uru o Uēra ka taea te uru ki tētahi kaimātai hinengaro ina hiahiatia. I pai ake te mahi a North Wales me te 90% neke atu rānei o ngā tāngata e uru ana, ā, neke atu i te 70% i te tonga ki te rāwhiti o Wales. Na te aroha i tohutohu i ngā minita kia mātua whakarite kia whiwhi ngā tāngata katoa whai MS i te tiaki me te tautoko e hiahiatia ana. I kī te kāwanatanga o Welsh kei te mahia te kauneketanga. Ko te pūrongo, e whakarewaina ana i roto i te whakaminenga o Welsh i te Tūrei, i runga anō i te uiuinga nui rawa atu o ngā tāngata whai MS i Weera. He āhuatanga neurological tērā pea ka ngenge, ngā raruraru kite me ngā uaua ki te hīkoi mō te hunga kei a ia. Tae atu ki te tauira rerekē o ngā ratonga e wātea ana, i kitea hoki e te mātauranga ko te tuatoru noa iho o ngā tāngata i kī e hiahia ana rātou ki te kimi tautoko, ki te pupuri rānei i tētahi mahi ka taea te whiwhi i te āwhina e hiahiatia ana e rātou, ā, he "roa roa" ngā rārangi tatari mō ngā tūru tūru i te raki o Wales i te tonga o Wales. Kua miramiratia e tētahi pāpā me tētahi tama mai i ngā wāhi rerekē o te whenua ngā taumata tautoko rerekē e wātea ana. I kitea a Ieuan Evans, 70, mai i Cardigan, i te MS i te 20 tau ki mua. Kotahi noa iho tana kite i tētahi kaimātai hinengaro i taua wā, ā, ko tana nēhi MS tata rawa kei te Hōhipera o Morriston, i Swansea, neke atu i te 50 maero te mamao. Ka kī a ia: "He whakapōrearea te uru ki ngā tohunga mō ngā tāngata whai MS i taku wāhi o Uēra - i te mea kāore au e taraiwa he tino uaua. " E noho ana taku tama i Kārepa, he ngāwari kē atu te uru atu ki ngā ratonga. "Ahakoa kei hea koe e noho ana i Weera, me ōrite tō manaakitanga." Tekau mā toru tau te noho a te tama a Tāne Evans, a Aled, ki a MS, ā, ka whakararuraru i te nui ake o tana tiaki i tōna pāpā. "Ka kite ahau i tētahi kaimātai rongoā ia ono marama, ka uru atu ki ngā rongoā rongoā whakakē mate me te uru ngāwari ki taku nēhi MS, e kitea ana e au i roto i te 15 meneti mēnā e hiahia ana ahau," tana kī. "E 70 taku papa, e 68 taku whaea, e tiaki ana i a ia. " Tērā pea he kōrero me neke rātau ki Kānata mō te rongoā." 'E taka ana ki muri' E whakatūpato ana hoki te pūrongo, nā te mea he tokomaha ake ngā tāngata whai MS i Uēra e kore mahi ana, ā, he nui ake ō rātou e whiwhi ana i te whakaaetanga ora hauātanga (DLA), ka "pā tōtika" a Uēra e ngā huringa kāwanatanga o UK ki ngā painga ora. I kī a Hohepa Kata, ko te kaiwhakahaere whakahaere o MS Society Cymru, ko ngā kitenga "e huatau ana ehara i te mea ko Uēra anake e taka ana i muri i te toenga o te UK i runga i ngā ratonga mō ngā tāngata whai MS, engari he tino rerekētanga i waenganui i ngā wāhi tawhiti me ngā wāhi i te pānuitanga M4". "Kei te anga atu ngā tāngata whai MS ki tētahi tārewa ina uru ki te tiaki me te tautoko e hiahiatia ana e rātou hei whakahaere i tō rātou āhuatanga, ā, me huri tēnei," tana tāpiri mai. The charity is calling for personalized treatment, care and support plans for everyone with MS including two comprehensive reviews each year. I kī tētahi kaikōrero kāwanatanga o Welsh ka whakaarohia e te Minita Hauora a Mark Drakeford te pūrongo me te urupare ki te iwi. "Kei te haere tonu te haere whakamua ki te whakapai ake i ngā ratonga i runga anō i te arotakenga Pūtaiao Pakeke," te tāpiri mai a te kaikōrero. "E mōhio ana mātou he nui ake ngā mea e taea ana, ā, kua hoatu e te minita mō ngā ratonga hauora me ngā ratonga pāpori tōna whāinga ki te whakawhanake i tētahi mahere tuku mō ngā āhuatanga neurological."

title: E kī ana a Coveney 'e kore te hangarau anake e whakatika i te take taitapa'
summary: E kore ngā rongoā hangarau anake e whakatika i te raruraru o te rohe o Kīriria i muri i a Pakihi, kua kī te minita o Kīriria mo nga take tawahi.
text: I te kōrero a Haimona Coveney i Pōroa. I whakapuakina hoki e ia te hiranga o te nekehanga koreutu o te iwi, nga taonga me nga ratonga. Kua auau te kōrero a Te Hēkeretari o Te Hēkeretari o Te Wānanga o Rawiri Davis i ngā aronui kaihokohoko pono, te āhukahuka pereti tau aunoa me ngā ipu tūtohu tōmua hei rongoā ki te raruraru taitapa o Kīriria. Kua kī katoa ngā kaiārahi tōrangapū i Rāwāhi, i Dublin, i Pōroa, i Perehi, me "kaua e hoki ki ngā taitapa o mua". Heoi anō, kāore anō kia puta he tono mārō me pēhea te whakaoti i tēnā ina noho a Aiarangi ki waho o te uniana o nga tikanga me te mākete kotahi, ā, ka noho tonu te Whenua o Aiarangi ki roto. I a ia e kōrero ana ki RTÉ, ka kī a Tēnā Coveney: "Ko te mea kāore mātou e hiahia ki te whakatakune ka taea e mātou te whakatika i ngā raruraru o te rohe i te motu o Aiarangi mā ngā rongoā hangarau pēnei i ngā kāmera me te rēhitatanga tōmua me ērā atu mea. " E kore tēnā e mahi." I tāpiritia e Tēnā Coveney e tūmanako ana a ia kia kite i tētahi whakaaetanga tōrangapū kaha ki ngā mea e taea ana i ngā whakaritenga o Te Wānanga i tēnei wiki. "Ko tētahi ārai, taitapa rānei i te motu o Aiarangi i taku tirohanga ka mōrearea te whakararuraru i tētahi tukanga rangimārie tino uaua me ngā rōpū katoa i Aiarangi ki te Raki, ahakoa he kaiwawao, he tangata whenua rānei, e mōhio ana mātou e hiahia ana mātou ki te pupuri i te nekehanga koreutu o ngā tāngata me ngā taonga me ngā ratonga me ngā oranga," tana tāpiri mai. I te Mane, ka karanga a Tēnā Davis ki ngā taha e rua i roto i ngā whakaritenga mo te wehenga atu o te UK i te Uniana o Ūropi kia "heke ki te umanga".

title: E rima tekau ngā mahere pāmu hau turbine i tukuna tata ki Sanquhar
summary: Kua tukuna tētahi tono whakarite katoa ki te kāwanatanga o Pākehā mō tētahi pāmu hau turbine 50.
text: Ko te kaupapa Sanquhar II e whakaahuatia ana e ngā kaiwhakawhanake Community Windpower hei "toronga māori" o tētahi aronui turbine e iwa e mahi kē ana i taua rohe. Ko te pāmu hau kua marohitia kei te hauauru o Sanquhar me te tonga o Kelloholm i Dumfries me Galloway. I kī te kamupene ko te nuinga o ngā mīhini e pā ana ki te 200m (650ft). I kī ka taea e te whanaketanga te "āwhina nui" ki ngā ūnga pūngao whakahou a te kāwanatanga o Pākehā. Heoi anō, neke atu i te 700 ngā kaitautoko i kohia e tētahi petihana tuihono ki ngā marohi. E kī ana ka whai "pānga horanuku me te arokite kāore e whakaaetia" ki taua rohe.

title: Ka taea e ngā taki rēti o te kaipupuri te 'whakahāwea i ia rā', ka whakatūpato a Labour
summary: Kua whakapaea e Labour te kāwanatanga ki te whakarite ture e pā ana ki te "whakahāwea i ia rā" me te "whakahāweatanga whānui" i te mākete whare.
text: Ma te Pire Manene e hara te rēti i te nohoanga ki ngā tauiwi ture. Engari i kī atu te hēkeretari kāinga kōruru o Andy Burnham ki te Independent i te Rātapu ka raruraru pea "tētahi tangata whai ingoa tāwāhi". I kī te Tari Kāinga me mahi ngā taki "i runga i te aukati-kore". I whakapuakina e te Residential Landlords Association, e tohu ana i ngā rangatira whenua i Ingarangi me Weera, te māharahara mō ngā rangatira whenua e "whakaharaharatia", ā, ka tohe i te tautoko tika ki te mahi i ngā taki. 'Taiao whakarihariha' Kei roto i te pire, e hoki ana ki te Whare o Ngātahi i te Tūtira, te aronui Tika ki te Rēti. Mā tēnei e hiahiatia ai ngā rangatira whenua ki te whakahaere i ngā taki ki ngā kairīhi tūpono, pēnei i te kite i tō rātou uruwhenua, visa rānei, kia mōhio ai ki tō rātou tūnga manene. Ki te kore e pērā, he hara hara e ahu ana ki te whaina, ki te whiu whare herehere rānei. I kī a Tēnā Burnham, e whakaahua ana i te pire he "tōtika, whakawehewehe, tinihanga": "Ko te whāinga o te Pire Manene ko te whakarite i a Ingarangi hei 'taiao whakarihariha' mō ngā kaiheke ture. " I roto i te mahi, tērā pea ka whakamutua a Ingarangi hei wāhi whakarihariha kē atu mō tētahi tangata whai ingoa kē." I kī a Tēnā Burnham kua hōhonu te iwi mai i te wā i whakamahia ai e ngā rangatira te whakaatu i ngā karere aukati i roto i ō rātou matapihi i ngā tau kotahi mano e ono tekau mā rua. "Engari ka taea e ngā taki tuhinga hōu te ōrite o ngā tohu 'kāore he kurī, kāore he pango, kāore he Airani', ā, mā te nui ake o te whakahāweatanga, ka uaua kē atu te whakamatautau," ko tana tuhituhi. I kī a ia i tūpono te kaupapa ki te whaikōrero a te Pirimia o Rawiri, a Rawiri, i tērā wiki, i whakaarahia ai e ia te raruraru o ngā kaiwhaiwhai mahi rangatahi me "ngā ingoa oro mā" i runga i ā rātou CV kia pai ake te urupare i ētahi atu. I kī a Tēnā Burnham e kore a Labour e "whakararuraru i te whakaaro nui" me te karanga ki te Hēkeretari o te Kāinga o Ēnā Me ki te whakaaro anō i ngā kaupapa. 'Te whati i te ture' I kī tētahi kaikōrero o te Tari Kāinga: "Kua whakamāramatia e te kāwanatanga ko te aronui Tika ki te Rēti e pā ana ki te whakaiti i te urunga o ngā kaiheke ture ki ngā ratonga - kāore anō kia ūkuia ki ngā tāngata whai mana tika kia noho ki te UK. " Right to Rent checks must be performed on a non-discriminatory basis - landlords are advised to check and record identity documents for all new tenants. "Ko te tangata e whakahāwea ana ka whati i te ture." I whakaurua tētahi kaihautū o te ture Right to Rent i te West Midlands i Hakihea 2014. I kī te Kaunihera Tōtahi mō te Oranga o ngā Tauiwi i tana ake rangahau i huatau ai te kaupapahere Tika ki te Rēti "e whakahau ana i te whakahāweatanga". Na te rangatira nui o te rōpū whakahaere, a Saira Grant, i tohutohu kia tika te tirotiro i te kaupapa, mā te tāpiri i te Tari Kāinga me whakawhānui i ōna ake kitenga i mua i te takahanga puta noa i te motu. I kī atu a Alan Ward, te kaiwhakahaere o te Pānga Rangatira Kāinga, e tohu ana i ngā rangatira whenua e 40,000, ki te AO e mahi tahi ana me te Tari Kāinga puta noa i te tau kua taha. "E tono ana te RLA i te tautoko tika mō ngā rangatira kia taea ai e ngā rangatira te whakatutuki i te tukanga," tana kī. "Ko tā mātou e māharahara ana ko ngā rangatira whenua e whakawāteatia ana." I kī a ia e kore e mōhiotia ka "hē ngā rangatira i te taha o te whakatūpato" ina mōrearea rātau ki te mahi.

title: Ka mate te kaiwawao kōtaha tiketike o George Gilmore i muri i te whakaekenga pū
summary: Kua tīmataria e nga pirihimana he uiui kōhuru i muri i te matenga o tētahi kaihoko kōtaha tiketike i pūhia hei wāhanga o tētahi tohetohe taua i te Takiwā o Antrim i te hōhipera.
text: I roto a Hōri Kirimore, e 44 ōna tau, i roto i tana motokā i te wā i whakaekea ai ia i Carrickfergus i te ahiahi o te Mane. He marama e haere tonu ana te tautohetohe i waenganui i ngā wehenga pūmau i te taone. Kua whakaahuatia e nga pirihimana te kōhuru he "whakaekenga kino i te awatea" me te tono āwhina ki te tautuhi i te hunga e pā ana. I kī a Det Ch Supt Raymond Murray o te Ratonga Pirihimana o Aiarangi ki te Raki: "Kei te whānau Gilmore o mātau whakaaro i tēnei wā i a rātau e whakarite ana i to rātau ngaromanga. " Kaore he whakaaro o te hunga e pā ana ki te iwi paetata i a rātau e mahi ana i ta rātau whakaekenga i tētahi tiriti noho e noho ana i ngā whānau, tamariki tamariki me ngā pakeke." Ko te 'pakanga tit-for-tat' Ko te tohetohe e rua nga wehenga o te rōpū taua o te Rōpū Ārai o Ulster (UDA), te kī a te Rōpū Kotahitanga Manapori MP o Te Rōpū Kotahitanga o Te Rōpū Manapori. "Kotahi taha, i te awatea whānui, i te hīpoki, kua whai wāhi ki te ngana ki te patu i tētahi o te whānau o Gilmore," tana tāpiri mai. Na Ulster Unionist MLA Roy Beggs i tohutohu i nga wehenga i roto i te tohetohe kia noho marino i te oho o te whakaekenga. "Waiho tēnei hei wāhi ako - whakamutua te paramilitarism, whakamutua, nā te mea kei te whakangaro i o tātau hapori," te kī a te māngai o Te Rāwhiti. "E wehi ana ahau kei hiahia ētahi atu ki te tīmata i tētahi pakanga tit-for-tat, engari ki te pā mai tēnā ka ngaro te katoa." I puta mai te tākaro i muri i te whakaekenga nui o tētahi kaitiaki tatau i tētahi pae pātata i te Rātapu. Tokotoru nga tāngata i puta ki te Kōti Kaiwhakawa o Belfast i te Mane i whakataua ki te ngana ki te kōhuru.

title: E kī ana a Netflix i te wā 'tino nui' ahakoa te pōturi o te tupu
summary: Kua pōturi ake a Netflix i tāna i tūmanakohia i roto i ngā marama tuatahi e toru o te tau, engari e tohe ana he "tino nui" te wā mo te tipu.
text: I tāpiritia e te umanga roma e 4,95 miriona ngā kaiohauru hōu i te koata, iti iho i te 5,2 miriona i tohua e ia. I te US, i tāpiritia e te umanga he toru iti iho ngā mema hōu i te wā kotahi i te tau ki mua, i te wā i hinga ngā mema o rāwāhi i te 22%. I whakapaea e Netflix te taka i tētahi wāhanga o te neke i ētahi o ana whakaaturanga kaingākau ki te hauwhā tuarua o te tau. I kī te umanga i tana rangatū Whare Kāri, i tērā tau i tīmata ai i te koata tuatahi, engari mō tēnei tau kua panaia ki te koata tuarua, ko te take matua mo te tupunga kaiohauru iti iho i te tūmanako. I kī a Netflix e tūmanako tonu ana kia tāpiri i ngā mema hōu e 8,15 miriona mō te haurua tuatahi o te tau, i raro noa iho i te 8,42 i tāpiritia i te hawhe tuatahi o tērā tau. Tae noa ki tēnei mutunga wiki, ka kī te umanga e tūmanako ana kia tae ki te 100 miriona ngā kaiohauru i te ao whānui. "He tīmatanga pai tēnei," te kī a te rangatira nui o Reed Hastings. I kī a ia ko te tupunga o te ipurangi huri noa, ko te tikanga o te umanga he "tino nui", ā, i kī te umanga kia haere tonu te haumi i roto i ngā kiriata me ngā whakaaturanga e hāngai ana ki te whakanui ake i ōna mematanga. "Kua tae mai mātou ki te kite i ēnei tāupenga ia hauwhā ko te nuinga o te turituri i roto i te ia tupu mo te wā roa me te whakatamatamatanga o te pouaka whakaata ipurangi," tana tāpiri mai. Tātaritanga nā Dave Lee, kaipānui hangarau o Amerika ki te Raki, San Francisco Pērā tonu, kei te hiahia a Wall Street ki te tupu kaiwhakamahi i runga ake i ētahi atu ngahuru ka taea e tētahi kamupene hangarau te tuku. Kāore a Netflix i tāpiri i te maha o ngā kaiwhakamahi hōu i te koata whakamutunga e tūmanakohia ana e ngā kaiwhakangao, i te US me te ao whānui. He wāhi nui tonu te mākete whakatuki o ngā whakapaunga a Netflix - $1bn e tūmanakohia ana i tēnei tau - nā reira e whakaatu ana kāore aua kaiohauru hōu i te haere ngāwari. Engari ki taku whakaaro ka pai ake pea ngā mea i tēnei tau me te takahanga o ngā wā hou o te Whare Kāri me ngā Mea Tauhou, ngā whakaaturanga tuhituhi e rua e tohu ana i te tino pai o tō rātou tohu "Taketake". I whakanuia e te umanga ngā moni whiwhinga neke atu i te tuatoru ki te $2.64bn mō te hauwhā i whakaritea ki ngā marama tuatahi e toru o tērā tau, i te wā i piki te moni whiwhinga kupenga ki te $178m mai i te $28m. I hinga ōna hea i te tauhokohoko i muri i ngā haora, ka taka te 3% me ngā kaiwhakangao i matekiri i te tipu pōturi ake i te tūmanako. I kī a Netflix ka arotahi tonu ki ngā papatono taketake, e whai ana kia "whakangāwari i ngā tāwara rerekē me te whānui o ngā ihirangi". I tīmata te kamupene ki te hanga i ōna ake whakaaturanga i te tau 2013, me te Whare Kāri tētahi o ana taunga nui tuatahi me ngā Mea Tauhou inā noa nei. Ka whakarite a Netflix ki te whakapau moni anō ki ngā ihirangi taketake i tēnei tau me te whakaiti i ngā utu mō ngā rauemi raihana pēnei i ngā whitiāhua.

title: Āwhiowhio o Mīhini: He tini nga mate o te āwhā o Joplin
summary: Neke atu i te 89 ngā tāngata kua mate, ā, e hia rau i whara i muri i te āwhiowhio i haehae i te taone o Joplin i te āhua o Mīhini.
text: I kī te mana o Joplin, a Mark Rohr, i tapahia e te āwhā he ara e ono maero (10km) te roa. I papatahitia ngā kāinga me ngā umanga, ā, me whakakore tētahi hōhipera pakaru. Kua hinga ngā aho hiko, ā, kua motuhia te nuinga o ngā tūhononga waea. Kua whakapuakina e te Kāwana o Mīhini, a Piki Nixon, he āhua ohorere, ā, ka whakatūpato he nui ake ngā āwhā e haere ana. Kua tino pāngia hoki ngā tāone i ētahi atu kāwanatanga o Midwestern e toru. Kotahi neke atu rānei te tangata i mate i Minneapolis, Minnesota. I tērā marama, i mate ngā āwhiowhio me ngā āwhā i te 350 neke atu rānei ngā tāngata i Alabama me ētahi atu kāwanatanga ki te tonga. 'Kāore he mea i mahue' I kī a Hōne Lehr, he kaipānui mō te nūpepa o Joplin Globe, i runga a ia i tōna kāinga i te tūtukitanga o te āwhā ki te taone tata ki te 50,000 i te 1730 (2230 GMT) i te Rātapu, engari i taea e ia te haere ki tōna papa. "Tērā te haruru nui, ka tīmata aku matapihi. Me heke ahau ki raro, e rere ana te karaehe. I whakatuwheratia e au he kōpae, a, ka kumea ahau ki roto," tana kī atu ki te Pēhi Pāhono. "Kātahi ka rongo koe i ngā mea katoa e haere ana. I haehaea e ia te tuanui o taku whare, te whare o te katoa. I haere mai ahau ki waho, a, kaore he mea e toe ana." I kī tētahi atu tangata, a Tom Rogers, kua ngaro tōna whare. "Kua ngaro noa iho. Mo te tuarua o nga wā i rongo ai mātau i nga whakatangi āwhiowhio. Ohorere noa iho, ka hinga nga mea katoa ki runga i a mātau. Ka kumea e mātau o mātau mahunga ki runga, a, kaore he mea. Kua ngaro," tana kī atu ki te Joplin Globe. Ko te nuinga o te taha ki te tonga o te taone e pūrongotia ana kua taumatatia, me ngā whare karakia, kura, umanga me ngā kāinga kua whakahekea ki te ururua. I hinga hoki ngā aho hiko me ngā aho waea puta noa i te taone, ā, he maha ngā waka i tahuri. Tata ki te 100 ngā tūroro i te Pokapū Rongoā ā-Rohe o Hato Hoani i Joplin i muri i te pānga hāngai o te hōhipera. I kī tētahi tangata e noho ana i te 45 maire (70km) te mamao kua tau mai ngā otaota o te hōhipera ki tōna whārangi, tae atu ki ngā taonga rongoā me ngā hihi-X. I tētahi hui rongokōrero i mua i te Mane i waho o te Pokapū Rongoā ā-Rohe o Hato Hoani, ka pānuitia e Tēnā Rohr ko te tokomaha o ngā tūpāpaku kua whakaūngia ko te 89. I kī a ia kua tapahia e te āwhiowhio tētahi ara e tata ana ki te ono maero te roa, neke atu i te hawhe maero (800m) te whānui puta noa i te pokapū o te taone, ā, kua hoatu e ngā pūrehu āwhiowhio he whakatūpato 20 meneti ki ngā tangata. I kī te rangatira ahi o Mitch Randles i te āwhiowhio "i tapahia te taone ki te haurua" me te whakaaro kua pakaru te 25 ki te 30%. Ka tīmata te rapunga kūaha o te wāhi pakaru ā muri ake i te ata Mane, engari ka pōturi te haere whakamua nā te mōrearea o ngā aho hiko hinga me ngā turuturu korohū, nāna i ahi huri noa i te taone i te pō. "Ka ora mātou, ka hoki mai kia kaha ake i a tātau i tēnei rā," te kī a Tēnā Rohr. Nō mua atu, ka whakatuwheratia e te Rīpeka Whero tētahi whakarurutanga i te Whare Wānanga o Te Kāwanatanga o Te Tonga o Te Tonga i Joplin mō ngā tūpāpaku, ka kī atu te kaikōrero a Joanne Muir ki te HAU. I tukuna hoki e ia he waka urupare ohorere me ētahi taonga pēnei i ngā paraikete, ngā moenga, te wai me te kai ki taua rohe, ka kī a ia. I te mōrea haere tonu o te Perehitini o Amerika, o Te Perehitini o Amerika - i a ia e haere ana ki te Whenua o Aiarangi - i tukuna ōna aroha ki te hunga e pāngia ana. "Ka tukuna atu e māua ko Mīharo o māua aroha tino hōhonu ki ngā whānau o te hunga katoa i ngaro i a rātau i roto i ngā āwhiowhio me ngā huarere kino i tūtuki ki Joplin, Missouri, tae atu ki ngā hapori puta noa i te Midwest i tēnei rā," te kī a te perehitini i roto i tētahi kōrero. "E whakamihi ana mātou ki ngā mahi toa a te hunga kua urupare, e mahi ana hoki ki te āwhina i ō rātou hoa me ō rātou hoa noho tata i tēnei wā tino uaua." I kī a Kāwana Nixon nā te āwhā i nui ai te tūkinotanga puta noa i Mīhini. "Kei te mōrearea tonu rātau ki ngā oranga me ngā rawa," tana kī i roto i tētahi kōrero. "Hei kāwanatanga, kei te horaina e mātou ia kōwhiringa me ngā rauemi e wātea ana hei tiaki i ngā whānau o Missouri, te rapu i te hunga ngaro, te whakarato rongoā ohorere, me te tīmata ki te whakaora." Ka whakatūpato a ia kāore anō kia mutu nga āwhā. "E tohutohu ana ahau i ngā tāngata o Missouri kia āta titiro ki ngā mōhiohio huarere hou me te whai i ngā tohutohu me ngā whakatūpato a ngā kaimahi ohorere i te wā e neke tonu ana ēnei āwhā whakamate i roto i tō mātou kāwanatanga," tana kī.

title: Waea tuku iho i runga i te tahua whakamātautau 'hē'
summary: Kua karangatia e tētahi kaitōrangapū o Guernsey kia whakarerea te minita hauora o te motu i muri i te whakapau moni mo te whakamātautau i te mate pukupuku whekau.
text: I mua ake, ka kī a Tuarua Mark Dorey kua pau te tahua. Engari, kua kī a ia ināianei he "whakapau moni nui". I kī a Tuarua Maika Hadley he "tino kore whakaaetia". I mua, i kī a Tuarua Dorey i ngā uauatanga kaute i ahu mai ai ia ki te kōrero hē. I pēhia te minita hauora ki te whakaatu i ngā whika mō ngā māharahara kāore i te nui ngā tāngata e mātakina ana. 'Kāore he maia' I te hui o Ngā Kāwanatanga o Hakihea, ka kī a Tuarua Dorey kua pau katoa te tahua mo te whakamātautau i te mate pukupuku whekau. I roto i tētahi īmēra ki ngā kawana katoa, kua kī a ia ināianei he "whakapau moni nui" i te 2012 me te 2013. I kī a Tuarua Hadley, tētahi mema o mua o te Tari Ratonga Hauora me ngā Ratonga Pāpori: "Ka ngana ahau ki te neke i tētahi pōti kāore he whakaaro ki a Tuarua Dorey. " E whakaae ana ahau kua ono tau noa iho ahau i roto i te whakaminenga, engari kāore anō ahau kia mōhio ki tētahi minita e whakapohehe ana i te whakaminenga ki tēnei whānuitanga." I roto i tana īmēra, ka kī a Tuarua Dorey i horahia te tahua mo te ratonga puta noa i ngā wāhi maha o te tari, ā, "te āhua nei he hē te mōhiohio i hoatu e au i runga i te whakapono pai". I kī a ia e kore e taea te mahi i ngā "utu pū" tae noa ki te tōmua o te tau hou. I tāpiritia e ia ka whakapārewa a ia mo te takaware, ā, ka "whakatika i te hapa rangirua" mā te whakaatu i ngā whika tika i te hui o Hānuere. Kāore anō kia kōrero te Tari Ratonga Hauora me ngā Ratonga Pāpori, a Tuarua Dorey rānei.

title: E kore e arotakea te whakataunga o ngā tereina o Bombardier
summary: Ko te whakataunga kia tīpako i ngā Siemens o Tiamana mō tētahi kirimana tereina £1.4bn, kaua ko Bombardier i te UK, e kore e arotakea, e whakangāwari anō rānei, kua kī te hēkeretari waka.
text: I kī atu a Piripi Hammond ki tētahi komiti o ngā MP e 1,400 ngā whakahōutanga i te wheketere Derby o te umanga he "rangirua". Engari i kī a ia e kore e whakaaetia te whakaroa i te kirimana o nga tereina o Thameslink. Kua whakahaua e ngā whakakotahitanga te kāwanatanga kia whakahokia tana whakataunga kia noho ko Siemens te kaihoko manakohia. I kī atu a Tēnā Hammond ki te Komiti Tīpako Waka e hiahia ana te kāwanatanga ki te kite mēnā ka taea te ako i ētahi akoranga mō ngā kirimana ā muri ake. "Me titiro tātau ki te mahi i ētahi atu whenua mema o Ūropi, me pēhea te pūkete i ngā take o te ohaoha pāpori me te kore takahi i te ture EU," te kī a Te Hēkeretari Waka a Phillip Hammond ki ngā MP. I kī te kāwanatanga i te wā o June e tono ana te Siemens ki te hanga i ngā waka tereina e 1,200 e tohu ana i te uara tino pai mō te moni, ā, e whai ana i ngā ture tiki EU, e kore e whakaaetia kia pūketetia ngā kamupene. I huatau mai ngā tohutohu ā-ture he mana kore mana te mahi paetata o tētahi kirimana, ka tāpiritia e ia. I te wā e whakatakoto ana a Bombardier i ngā kaimahi, kua kī a Siemens ka waihangatia e ia ngā mahi e 2,000 puta noa i te UK nā te whiwhinga i te kirimana mō te ara Thameslink i waenganui i Bedford me Brighton. Heoi anō, ka hangaia e Siemens ngā tereina i Tiamana, ā, e 300 anake o ngā mahi UK e waihangatia ana e ia, ka whakamahia hāngai ki ngā pou whakanao, i tētahi wheketere i Hebburn, South Tyneside. I mua i te whakatau a te tauwhāinga ki te kōwhiri i a Siemens, ka kī te Bombardier o Kānata me whakatakoto e 1,200 ngā kaimahi i Derby mai i Whiringahora i a ia e whakarite ana ki te whakaoti i ētahi atu kirimana nui. Engari i kī a Tēnā Wānanga i te kānataraki Thameslink, e tīmata ana i te tau 2014, ka whakaaetia e te kamupene te whakaiti i ngā hinganga mahi me te pupuri i ngā kaimahi pūmau katoa. "Kāore au i mārama me pēhea rātau i mahi ai i tēnā," te kī a Tēnā Hammond, e pā ana ki te āputa i waenganui i te mutunga o ngā kirimana o nāianei me te tīmatanga o te Thameslink. "Tērā pea ka mauria mai te mahi mai i tētahi atu wāhi." Nā ngā pātai pūtea i kī atu te manukura o Bombardier UK ki ngā MP i runga i te komiti tīpako e "uaua ana te umanga ki te mārama" i te whakataunga a te kāwanatanga, nāna i kī i runga anō i ngā paearu "tino whāiti". I kī a Tēnā Wānanga kāore i runga anake i te hua tino pai, engari i runga anō i ngā moni i muri i ngā tono tauwhāinga e rua ki te hanga, ki te pūtea me te pupuri i ngā waka tereina hou mō te ara Thameslink. "He tino nui te wāhi o ngā pūtea i roto i tēnei mahi, ehara i te kōwhiri i te tereina tino pai," tana kī. I kī hoki a Ahorangi Karel Williams o te Whare Wānanga o Te Whare Wānanga o Manchester, i te wā ka whakatauria te whakataunga kia pūketetia ngā pūtea, "e tata ana te kore e taea te toa i te kamupene whai whakatauranga nama teitei ake". I kī a ia he whakatauranga nama tā Siemens o A+ i whakaritea ki te B++ a Bombardier. Mā tēnei e rerekē ai te utu moni mō te kāwanatanga i te wā o te kirimana, ka kī a ia. I kī mārama a Tēnā Hammond i whai wāhi te pūtea i roto i te kirimana 30 tau, engari i kī a ia he hē te kī ko te rerekētanga o ngā whakatauranga nama a ngā kamupene e rua he kī ki te whakataunga. "He take tērā, engari kāore e taea te whakatau," tana kī atu ki ngā MP. 'Tino māharahara' i whakaarahia hoki e Tēnā Wānanga ngā māharahara mō ngā pānga patoto o te ngaromanga kirimana, ehara i te mea i Derby anake, engari puta noa i te whenua. He "mekameka whakarato whānui a Bombardier puta noa i te UK", tana kī. I te whakarongo, i kī hoki a Diane Holland, te kaiāwhina hēkeretari ahuwhānui o te uniana Unite, e 800 ngā pae katoa ka pāngia, ko te hawhe o ēnei i tapahi mahi, i whakaaro rānei kia pēnā nā te whakatau a te kāwanatanga kia haere tahi me Siemens. "E tino māharahara ana mātou ki tētahi kirimana i whakawhiwhia i runga i te whakatauranga nama, kaua ko te kaha ki te hanga tereina," tana kī. I kī a Tēnā Hammond ka titiro te kāwanatanga ki ngā huarahi e ngana ana ki te pupuri i ngā pūkenga i roto i te umanga hanga tereina i te UK. "He nui te āheinga hoahoa o te tipu o Derby, ā, ko te pupuri i taua āheinga hoahoa te kī ki te wā heke mai o Bombardier i te UK." I kī a ia e ngana ana te tari pakihi ki te whakahauhau i te Hitachi o Tiapanī, e whakatū ana i tētahi wheketere hou i Te Takiwā o Te Takiwā o Te Takiwā

title: Ka tiango te kēhi whakahāwea ki ngā pirihimana Tūtaki tokotoru
summary: Kua hinga tētahi kēhi hē ki ngā pirihimana tokotoru i whakapaea ki te whakahāwea ki tētahi kaipatu ahi pango i muri i te kore whakaaturanga a te Komihana Amuamu Pirihimana Motuhake (IPCC).
text: Ko te mahi i pā mai i te rima tau ki mua, ko te kaipatu ahi o Edric Kennedy-Macfoy. Kāore anō kia mōhio te AO kāore he whakaaturanga i tukuna ki ngā āpiha e pā ana. Kua whakapārewa te IPCC ki a Tēnā Kennedy-Macfoy mō tāna i kīa ai ko "ngā hē ā-mahi" i roto i tana tūhuratanga. I tāpiritia ka mahia e ia tētahi "arotakenga hōhonu" kia whakakahatia ai ōna hātepe. I roto i tētahi kōrero ka kī te IPCC: "E mōhio ana mātou ki te pānga o tēnei ki a Tēnā Kennedy-Macfoy me ngā āpiha e pā ana, ā, e hiahia ana mātou ki te tango i tēnei wā hei whakapōhēhē ki a rātou." I amuamu tuatahi a Tēnā Kennedy-Macfoy mo te whanonga o nga pirihimana tokoono. I kitea e te IPCC ētahi raruraru ki te tūhuratanga ki te kēhi, tae atu ki te mea kāore anō kia oti ngā uiuinga kaiwhakaatu i te wā o te amuamu a Tēnā Kennedy-Macfoy. 'I tāhaetia te ora' I tērā tau, ka whakapārewa a Scotland Yard, a, ka utua e ia he utu hei whakatau i tētahi kerēme tūmatanui i mauria mai e ia ki te ope. I te Wenerei ka kī te Tūtaki: "E mōhio katoa ana mātou ko te whakarongo hē kāore e haere whakamua ana e whakakino ana ki te kaiwhakapae, mō te iwi whānui hoki e hiahia ana ki te whakawhirinaki ki te āhua o te pupuri i ngā āpiha ki te pūkete mō ā rātou mahi". I kī a Tēnā Kennedy-Macfoy i rongo a ia i ngā tau e rima whakamutunga o tōna oranga kua "tāhaetia" i a ia. "Kua unuhia ēnei takahanga i mua i te wā i hoatu ai ahau ki te whakaaturanga i mua i te rūnanga whakawā, ā, ka rongo tonu ahau kua whakahētia ahau i te tika," tana kī. "E tino raruraru ana ahau i ngā taunahua ā-iwi kua tūpono ahau ki te whakatau me te tūtaki i te take i pā mai ai tēnei." Ko tētahi o ngā āpiha i whakaurua, ko Mark Gatland i whakatārewatia e te Met hei ārai i a ia ki te wehe i te tōpana e tārewa ana i te whakarongo hē, i whakaaetia kia mahi tuarua hei atekōkiri tereina. I kī ngā rōia mō PC Gatland i te tūkinotanga ki tōna "hauora me te oranga" nā te kēhi roa e "kore e taea te ine". Hopukina I pā mai te mahi i te wā o Mahuru 2011 - kotahi marama i muri i te whakararuraru o Rāwāhi - i te wā o te whakararuraru ki ngā pirihimana i Harrow i te raki o Rāwāhi. I kī a Tēnā Kennedy-Macfoy kua tono āwhina a ia - engari i whakahaua ia ki te ārai i ngā pirihimana me te ātete i te hopu. I whakawāteatia a ia i te Kōti Kaiwhakawa o Pēnā i te wā o Hui tanguru 2012. I haere tonu a Tēnā Kennedy-Macfoy ki te amuamu tika mo tana manaakitanga. I kī a ia kua ūkuia ia e ngā pirihimana nā te mea he pango a ia, e kiia ana i pūhia ia ki te pū whakaoho Taser, i tūkinotia, i tūkinotia ā-waha. I whakarewaina tētahi tūhuratanga ki te whanonga o ngā āpiha tokoono e te Tohutohu Paerewa Ngaio o Scotland Yard i raro i te whakahaeretanga a te IPCC. I Mati 2013 ka whakataua e te kaitiaki kia whakahaere i te kēhi me te whakahaere i tētahi tūhuratanga takitahi, ā, i kī i taua wā ka mahia "i runga i te tere e taea ana". I Hānuere 2014, ka haere tētahi o ngā pirihimana i te Tūtaki. Ko te whakaaturanga A hearing i tīmata i tērā wiki mō ētahi atu tokotoru, engari i takaware i roto i ngā tohenga ā-ture e whakapono ana e pā ana ki te kore whakawāteatanga o ngā tuhinga nui a te IPCC. I te Wenerei, ka mahue atu te IPCC i te kēhi, ā, ko ngā Pirihimana o Metropolitan, nāna i kawe tika mai ngā takahanga whakatinanatanga, kāore i tukuna he whakaaturanga e ahu ana ki ngā āpiha tokotoru e whakawātea tika ana i ngā whakapae. I kī te rōia o Tēnā Kennedy-Macfoy, a Shamik Dutta, ka rapu a ia i tētahi "whakapae tūmatanui katoa mai i te IPCC" nāna i kī kua "rahua tana mahi ki te tūhura tika i te kēhi". I kī ngā rōia mō Tēnā Gatland: "Kāore e taea te ine i tēnei wā te tūkinotanga i puta mai ki te hauora me te oranga o te āpiha, ki tōna whānau hoki. He heitara te tūkinotanga ki te whakaaro tūmatanui o te mahi pirihimana i roto i tēnei take e whakaahuatia hētia ana he takahanga whakahāwea."

title: Coronavirus: Fears over pupils missing out on online learning
summary: E hia mano ngā tauira kura i Pākehā e ngaro ana pea i te ako tuihono i te kāinga, e huatau ana ngā whika hōu.
text: Nā Andrew PickenBBC Scotland News Neke atu i te hauwhā o ngā pūkete ākonga i te tomokanga ako matua o te kura Glow kāore i whakapūketetia kua uru ki tērā marama. Kua whakaarahia e ngā rōpū mātua ngā māharahara he tokomaha ngā tamariki e tūkino ana ina tae mai ki te ako tuihono. Engari i kī a Education Scotland he nui ake pea ngā tauira e whakamahi ana i te pūnaha i ngā whika i huatautia. I kī ngā kaiwhakawāwā kāore he pūkete pūmau o wai e whakamahi ana i ngā pūnaha ako tuihono, me te auau, i te māharahara i ngā kura kua tautuhia ki tētahi tauira ako whakaranu o te mātauranga i muri i te wehenga raumati. Ko te mura tētahi papa matua o te rautaki ako mamati o Pākehā, e whakamahia ana e te 27 o ngā mana ā-rohe e 32. Ka hoatu ki ia tamaiti he ingoa kaiwhakamahi me te kupuhipa, kātahi ka tuku urunga koreutu ki ngā rauemi tuihono pēnei i Microsoft Office me Teams, Google Classroom rānei. I Poutāpeta, i te wā i whakaurua ai te raka, e 412,313 ngā kaiwhakamahi hohe, engari ko te āhua nei kua heke tēnei neke atu i te 60,000 i Me. Ko ngā whika o Education Scotland i whiwhia e BBC Scotland e whakaatu ana i tērā marama e 351,905 ngā tauira i rēhitatia kua whakamahi i te pūnaha Glow, mai i te 489,987 ngā pūkete hohe. I kī te tinana paerewa mātauranga ka teitei ake te tau tūturu o ngā kaiwhakamahi Glow nā te mea ka uru ētahi tauira ki te pūnaha mā te papamahi, ngā taupānga pūkoro rānei kāore e rēhita i ngā toronga tukurua i te āhua kotahi. Heoi anō, kāore i taea te hoatu he whika mō te maha o ngā tauira ka taka ki tēnei kāwai. I whakaahuatia e tētahi kaikōrero mō te rōpū whakahau Pai Ake i Tēnei rōpū, e pēhi ana i te pikinga o te whakaakoranga kanohi-ki-te-kanohi mai i Aotearoa, te kore māramatanga o te whakamahinga he "whakamīharo". Ka kī a ia: "Ko te pono weriweri, kāore he tangata e tino mōhio ana ki ngā mea e haere ana. " Ehara ngā takiuru ki te whatunga Glow i te whakaaturanga o ngā mahi e oti ana, e oti ana rānei. "We know that some councils have over 30 different learning platforms being used, there is no proper data available on any of them." I tāpiri mai a ia: "Kei te whakatairangatia te āhua 'whakaranu' o te ako me te kore whakaaturanga tūturu mō te pai, te whānui rānei o te akoranga tuihono." Home learning struggles A survey of 4,000 people taking part in a Zoom call organized by the National Parent Forum of Scotland on Wednesday found 62% of respondents said they had not been given any online lessons by their children's school. Eileen Prior, executive director of the Scotland-wide parents' council organisation Connect which has had more than 7,000 responses to its surveys during lockdown, said: "Parents and carers are telling us loud and clear that online learning is a problem for many families. " Kāore he urunga ipurangi whāiti rānei, kāore he pūrere tika, he pūhara tauhou rānei, kāore ngā tamariki (me ngā mātua) i te whakamahi ki te ako tuihono, ā, kei te raruraru. 'Te āhua nei e mīharo ana, nā te mātanga o te tātaritanga ipurangi me te mākete i ēnei rā, kāore e wātea ana ngā mōhiohio taipitopito me ngā tātaritanga mō Glow hei pokapū ako ā-motu." I whakapā atu a BBC Scotland ki ngā kaunihera nui rawa e toru - Fife, Glasgow me Edinburgh - engari kāore he pūkete matua o te auau o ōna tauira e whakauru ana ki ngā rauemi ako tuihono. E rima ngā kaunihera - e kapi ana i te 131,000 o ngā tauira tuatahi me ngā tauira tuarua e 697,989 - kāore i te tino whakamahi i te Glow, ā, kei a rātou ētahi atu pūnaha ako tuihono. Ka whakamahia hoki e ngā kura i ngā mana ā-rohe me Glow ētahi atu rauemi matihiko. I kī tētahi kaikōrero mō Education Scotland: "Ko Glow te taiao ako tuihono ā-motu e wātea noa ana ki ngā ākonga me ngā kaiako katoa i Pākehā. " Kei te whakamahia te mura puta noa i Pākehā me ngā kaiwhakamahi 258,000 i te rā kotahi noa iho, te wiki i katia ai ngā kura." Kua tohua e te kāwanatanga o Pirihitini te tapeke o te £30m hei "tautoko i te whakauru mamati" me te £9m ka pau ki tētahi hōtaka mō ngā tamariki tūkino hei whakarato i ngā rorohiko pona e 25,000 me te tūhononga ipurangi. Anō hoki, ka haere tonu ngā pokapū ako mō ngā tamariki mōrearea me ngā kaimahi matua i whakatuwheratia i te tīmatanga o te raka i te raumati. 'E hiahiatia ana he urupare ohorere' Ināianei, kua karangatia e te minita tuatahi o Mua o Jack McConnell ki te kāwanatanga o Pirihitini kia mahi i tētahi huri-U i runga i tana mahere mō te ako hanumi i ngā kura, ka anga atu rānei ki "tētahi heitara ka roa te wā e ora ai te whenua". I kī atu a Ariki McConnell ki te hōtaka Good Morning Scotland a te Reo Irirangi o Aotearoa, me noho he awhe kōwhiringa i runga i te tēpu mo Aotearoa. I kī hoki a ia e hiahiatia ana he urupare "ohorere" mō te mātauranga i runga anō i te āhua o Covid-19 i akiaki i te raweke nui ki te whakapakari i te NHS me te ōhanga. A, ka whakatūpato a ia me ōrite te roangaru o ngā kura tūmatanui me ngā kura tūmataiti. I kī a Ariki McConnell: "Mēnā ka puta i a Aotearoa ka whiwhi mātauranga wā katoa te hunga e āhei ana ki te utu mō ngā kura, ā, kāore e taea te haere ki te kura whānui o te rohe, ki te kura tuatahi rānei o te rohe, kāore e whiwhi mātauranga wā katoa, he heitara tērā mō te mātauranga o Pākehā."

title: Ka mutu anō te utu a Mid Yorkshire NHS Trust
summary: Kua āraia tētahi tuki a ngā kaimahi hōhipera e hia mano i muri i te whakatau i te tautohetohe mo ngā utu kua marohitia.
text: Ko ngā kaimahi whakahaere me ngā kaimahi minita i ngā hōhipera i Wakefield, Dewsbury me Pontefract kua whakaritea e iwa rā o ngā hīkoi i runga i ngā mahere ki te kōeke anō i ngā mahi. I pōti rātau ki te mahi i ētahi atu mahi i roto i tētahi pōti i tērā marama. I kī a Mid Yorkshire Hospitals NHS Trust, e hiahia ana ki te tapahi i te £25m, i whakaae ki ngā uniana ki te pare i te utu mō ngā kaimahi pāngia tae atu ki te rua tau. I kī te whakawhirinaki i mua me rutu tana "nama pūtea taketake" mā te whakaiti i te pire utu. I kī a Graham Briggs, te kaiwhakahaere o ngā rauemi tangata o te whakawhirinaki: "E koa ana ahau kua taea e ngā rōpū katoa te tae ki tētahi wāhi whakararuraru e roa ake ai te wā o te parenga utu kia taea ai e ngā kaimahi te whakarite ki te pānga o te huringa, i a ia e noho utu ana me te whakahohe i ā mātou tono hoahoa anō ratonga. " Ko te tino hiranga i roto i tēnei whakaaetanga ko te āhukahuka a te whakawhirinaki me ngā whakakotahitanga mahi e hiahiatia ana e tātau he pātahitanga mahi hou, kia mahi tahi hoki i roto i te mahi ngātahi e haere whakamua ana." I kī a Jim Bell, kaiwhakahaere ā-rohe mō te uniana Unison: "Kua riro i a mātau ngā painga te mahi mahi i mahia e o mātau mema, engari e pouri ana mātou i te mea e tika ana i te wāhi tuatahi. " E tūpato ana mātou ki te hanga i tētahi whakaritenga mahi ngātahi me te whakawhirinaki, engari me ōrite tēnei."

title: E ngana ana ki te 'ūkui i te pūtaiao' i ngā kōrero āhuarangi UN
summary: E ngana ana ngā whenua whakanao hinu ki te "ūkui i te pūtaiao" ki te pupuri i ngā pāmahana o te ao i raro iho i te 1.5C, e kī ana ētahi kaitautapa i ngā kōrero UN i Bonn.
text: Nā Mātā McItihi, ko te korero kōrero taiao, ko Bonn Ko te tūru o te Toputanga o ngā Motu Iti o Ngā Motu Iti, i kī a Arapia me ētahi atu e ngana ana ki te whakatakune kāore i te tīariari tētahi pūrongo pūtaiao matua. E whakapono ana ngā motu iti ki te pupuri i ngā pāmahana i raro iho i te 1.5C i tēnei rau tau, he tino nui ki to rātau oranga. I kī tētahi pūrongo matua i Whiringahora ka taea tēnei. Engari ka hiahiatia he tapahi kohu nui i te wā poto. I whakaritea e te UN te pūrongo o te Paewhiri Tāpiripiri mō te Huringa Āhuarangi (IPCC) i te 1.5C i te tau 2015. Engari i te whakaaturanga ki ngā kaiwhakarite āhuarangi i Pōrana, e whā ngā whenua tae atu ki a Mātau, Hauti Arapia, Rūhia me Kūweiti kāore i whakaae ki te "pōhiri" i a ia. Kua puta mai anō te pakanga kōhukihuki mo te rīpoata i konei i tēnei hui i Pono. Tērā tētahi pakanga nui i runga i tētahi kuputuhi e pā ana ki te whakamutunga a ngā kaipūtaiao me whakaiti te kohu waro ki te 45% ki te 2030. Ko Arapia i mua i te hiahia ki te whakauru kuputuhi e tāraro ana i ngā rangirua i roto i te pūrongo. Mō te rōpū e 40 ngā motu iti, kua kitea he whakakakā tēnei. "I puta mai te pūrongo i Whiringahora o Whiringahora 2018, ā, ināianei ka kite mātou i tēnei nekehanga i ngā whakaritenga kia ngana ki te ūkui i te nohoanga, e kore e taea te mahi," te kī a Lois Young, te karere mai i Belize, e whakahaere ana i te rōpū. "Tērā tēnei nekehanga ki te whakatakune me te mea kāore i reira, kia kaua e tohutoro ki a ia i roto i ngā tuhinga. Ā, kua haere tonu mai i to mātau taenga mai ki konei." Kua whiwhi tautoko nga Hauti i roto i a rātau tautohetohe mai i tētahi toa whenua kāore i te mōhiotia, tae atu ki a Mātau, Ahitereiria me Irana. "Ko ngā whenua e ngana ana ki te whakaiti i te hiranga o te tuhinga, ūkuia mai i ngā pūkete, kāore rātou katoa e whakaatu ana i o rātau kanohi," te kī a Ambassador Young. "It's unreal, it's as if they're resigning our Aosis states to collateral damage, I mean, it's like we have no importance doesn't matter." E whakapono ana ētahi atu kaimātakitaki i konei he tuhinga nui te pūrongo IPCC ki te āwhina ki te whakaara i te mōhiotanga tūmatanui ki te tuma i puta mai i te huringa āhuarangi. "He pānga panoni tā te pūrongo, ehara i te mea ko te UK anake e whakawhiti ana i tētahi ture kore kupenga, engari me ngā whakaaro tūmatanui puta noa i te ao," te kī a Alden Meyer, mai i te Uniana o ngā Kaipūtaiao Āwangawanga. "Engari he raina hē i waenganui i ētahi whenua, ko te nuinga o rātau he kaiwhakarato hinu nui i runga i te tikanga me te tūnga o te pūrongo. Engari kāore e taea e rātau te whakahoki i te puru ki roto i te pounamu me te whakatakune kāore te pūrongo i te tīariari." Kei te haere tonu ngā mahi ki te kimi i tētahi wāhi whakararuraru i konei i Bonn, me ētahi kaitautapa e whakapono ana ka taea te whakanoho i ngā whāinga mō te 2030 me ngā pātai a Hauti mō te rangirua. Ka mutu ēnei kōrero ā muri ake nei, engari ki te kore e kitea he kupu whakaae, ka maringi pea te taupatupatu nui haere ki te tuwhera i te hui whakamutunga i tēnei ahiahi. Whāia a Mātā i Twitter.

title: Na te UN i tohutohu kia parea te pēhi o Rānaka
summary: Kua tohe ngā kaitiaki pāpāho puta noa i te ao ki te Hēkeretari o nga Iwi o te Hononga o te Ao, o Ban Ki-Moon, ki te whakapati i te kāwanatanga o Sri Lanka kia unuhia ngā kōrero e whakawehi ana i te wāteatanga pāpāho.
text: Tata ki te toru tekau ngā rōpū pāpāho e tohu ana i ngā whenua e rua tekau mā rima, kua whakamōhio atu ki a Tēnā Marama mō te 'āhuatanga whakamataku' ko Sri Lanka e pā ana ki te wāteatanga o te kōrero. Ko te tauākī a te Manatu Whakangungu Ko ngā kōrero o mua tata nei a te Manatu Whakangungu me te rangatira taua o Sri Rānaka, ko Lt. Gen. Sarath Fonseka, e kī ana te reta, kua purua ngā kaipūrongo ki te 'mōrearea tūpāpaku'. Kua karangatia e te Manatu Whakangungu i roto i tētahi kōrero o mua tata nei he paetukutuku he kaipūrongo e whakahē ana i te whawhai hei 'hoariri o te kāwanatanga'. "E whai ana tēnei i ngā kōrero i tērā Hānuere e te Rangatira o te Ope Taua. Ko Sarath Fonseka nāna i tapa ētahi kaipūrongo hei kaikaiwaiū," te kī a te reta. Na te kaha o te whakahē i nga kōrero, kua tohe nga kaitiaki ki a Tēnā i rapu i te āwhina a Tēnā Marama ki te whakapati i a Sri Lanka kia manaaki i te Taumira 1738 o te Kaunihera Haumarutanga UN. Ko ngā tuma a te rangatira SLA Te Taumira 1738 e tohutohu ana i ngā rōpū katoa i roto i ngā āhuatanga o te papā patu kia manaaki i te rangatiratanga ngaio me ngā mana o ngā kaipūrongo, ngā tohunga pāpāho me ngā kaimahi pāhono. "E rapu ana mātou i tō tautoko ki te whakahau i ngā āhuatanga mema katoa o nga Iwi o te Hononga o te Ao kia manaaki i te Taumira 1738 i runga i te reta me te wairua, ā, e tono ana i tō āwhina ki te whakapati i te kāwanatanga o Sri Lanka kia unuhia ēnei kōrero, ā, ka mutu wawe ngā mahi katoa e tukituki ana i te rangatiratanga me te haumarutanga o te iwi rongokōrero," te tāpiri mai o te kōrero. Ko te reta i tukuna ki a Tēnā Marama e hainatia ana e ngā kaitiaki e tohu ana i Wīwī, Pakitāne, Venezuela, Nōwei, Ingarangi, Parakai, Somalia, Īnia, Kongo, Nigeria, Ateria, Peretiama, Ukraine, Nigeria, Repanona, Ghana, Azerbaijan, USA, Philippines, Nepal me Morotōria. Kua hainatia e te Nekehanga Pāpāho Koreutu (FMM) te reta e tohu ana i ngā kaitiaki wāteatanga pēhi o Sri Lanka.

title: Me 'whakatoko' e ngā kaiako ngā uara o Ingarangi?
summary: Haere mai ki Mahuru, ā, ka hiahiatia ia kura i Ingarangi ki te whakatoko i ngā uara o Ingarangi.
text: Mark EastonHome editor@BBCMarkEastonon Twitter Ehara te whakatairanga i tētahi mea i te ōrite ki te whakaako i tētahi mea, ki te manaaki rānei i tētahi mea. Ka taea e te tangata te whakahē i runga i te whakaute. Ka taea e te tangata te whakamōhio atu me te kore tautoko. Ko te mea e whakahaua ana e Michael Gove, ko ia kura i Ingarangi e kī ana ki ngā tauira he pai, he pai ake rānei ngā uara o Ingarangi i ngā uara o ētahi atu tāngata. He mea hira te rerekētanga. Me mātua whakarite kē ngā kura takitahi, ngā wānanga me ngā kura koreutu kia "manaaki" ngā uara o Ingarangi i ngā tauira. "Ka whakakahatia tēnei kia 'whakatoko' ai ngā kura i ngā uara o Ingarangi," te kī a te Tari Mātauranga. "E hiahia ana mātou ki te waihanga me te whakaū i tētahi tūmanako mārama, uaua hoki ki ngā kura katoa ki te whakatoko i ngā uara taketake o Ingarangi o te kāwanatanga ā iwi, te ture, te wāteatanga takitahi me te manaaki tahi me te manawanui o te hunga rerekē ngā whakapono me ngā whakapono," te whakamārama a ngā kaiwhakahaere o te tari. Koia tēnā e tika ana kia mahia e ngā kaiako? Tērā pea ka tino mau tātau ki ēnei uara. Tērā pea e whakapono ana tātau e tuku ana rātau i te wā tino pai mo te iwi pūmau, hari hoki. Ka taea e tātau te whakaaro he nui ake rātau i ētahi atu. Engari me kī atu ki ngā tamariki tēnā? Me tango tātau i te tuatahi o aua uara - te kāwanatanga ā iwi. "Ko te kāwanatanga ā iwi te āhua kino rawa atu o te kāwanatanga," te kī a Winston Churchill ki te Whare o Ngātahi i te tau 1947, "hāunga ērā atu momo katoa kua whakamātauria i ētahi wā." He whakangahau pai tērā, engari he whakamaumahara anō kua roa te taupatupatu mo nga pūnaha whakahaere tino pai. Ka takahi rānei te kaiako nāna i aro atu ngā tauira ki ngā ngoikoretanga o te kāwanatanga ā iwi i tana mahi ki te whakatoko? Ka uaua ake te whakatairanga i te ture ki ngā kura ki te whakaako i te tūkinotanga ā iwi? Ko ngā mahi a Thomas Hobbes, John Locke me John Stuart Mill e kōwhai ana ki te ariā o te wāteatanga takitahi. He aha te whakamāramatanga o tēnei ariā whakaaro tautohetohe hei pana e ngā kaiako? A, no te manaaki tahi me te manawanui ki te hunga rerekē o ngā whakapono me ngā whakapono, me pēhea te whakaute me te manawanui o te tangata? He tino whakahāwea ki te tokomaha o ngā tāngata ngā tirohanga whakapono me te ahurea tūturu mo te tānetanga, te tūranga o te wahine, o te wahine rānei i waho o te mārenatanga. Ko te kīanga "ngā uara o Ingarangi" e whakamahia ana hei tikanga o ngā mea tūpono. Ki ētahi, e pā ana ki Ingarangi, ehara i ngā uara kē, e whakaata ana i ngā āhuatanga tūturu tūturu o te iwi whānui. Ki ētahi atu, e pā ana ki ngā uara tiritiri o te manawanui me te hinengaro whānui i roto i tētahi iwi ahurea maha, he tino pai. Kaore ēnei tikanga e rua e noho ngātahi ana. Ko tētahi he tuakiri pūmau takitahi, ko tētahi he ariā matatini e tipu ana. Kāore e taea e koe ngā mea e rua i te wā kotahi. Ehara tēnei i te wā tuatahi i roto i ngā tau tata nei kua pēhia e ngā kaipōrangapū te pātene i tohua "ngā uara o Ingarangi". I te tekau tau ki muri ka whakahauhautia e Kōkōkā Paraone te iwi kia "whakaaro ki tētahi Ingarangi e kite anō ana i ngā uara tiritiri e here tahi ana i a tātau". Na Rawiri Blunkett, hei hēkeretari kāinga, i tohutohu i ngā iti o te iwi kia noho "nui ake te Ingarangi" me te oati i tētahi oati pono. I muri i te 9/11 i te tau 2001, ā, i muri anō i ngā whakapae 7/7 i Rāwāhi i te tau 2005, he nui tonu te taupatupatu me pēhea e whakararuraru ai to tātau whakangāwari i te whakararurarutanga, he whakapono ka horaina te manawanui o Ingarangi me te tākaro tika hei rākau ki a Al-Mōrea. Ināianei e tono ana a Michael Gove kia uru nga kura o Ingarangi ki te whawhai mā te whakatoko i ngā uara o Ingarangi. Engari koia tērā te tikanga o te mātauranga? Tērā pea ka tautohetia ko te tohutohu i ngā kura kia noho hei kaipānui mō ngā uara o te tangata, he mea tino kore Peretania.

title: Coronavirus: Te raka i roto i ngā pikitia o Ingarangi Hītori
summary: Ko ngā tiriti wātea, ngā tapahi makawe i hangaia e te kāinga me tētahi NHS nui rawa atu i tapahia ki tētahi parae.
text: Koinei i waenganui i ngā atahanga e 200 e tino whakaata ana i te raka o te iwi, e ai ki te Hītori o Ingarangi. Neke atu i te 3,000 ngā pikitia i tukuna e te iwi whānui i roto i te tono wiki roa, me te tīpakonga whakamutunga e tāpiritia ana ki te pūranga o Ingarangi Hītori. Tekau hoki ngā kaiwaiata o nāianei kua tāuru pikitia ki roto i te pūranga, tae atu ki te kōwhiri i ngā makau mai i ngā tukunga tūmatanui. I kī a Ingarangi Hītori ko te wā tuatahi i tonoa ai te iwi whānui ki te hopu whakaahua mō te pūranga mai i te Pakanga Tuarua o te Ao. "The fascinating response to our Picturing Lockdown call-out sheds light on our collective and individual experiences of lockdown and provide a snapshot into this unusual time that will be accessible for future generations to see and learn from," Claudia Kenyatta, director of regions, said. He manatārua ngā pikitia katoa.

title: He uaua ahurei te wā rautaki o te raruraru o te Kōwhiu mō UK
summary: Ka mau te raruraru o te Kōwhiu i te UK i tētahi wā rautaki uaua ahurei.
text: Mark UrbanDiplomatic me te kaiwhakatika waea, Newsnight@MarkUrban01on Twitter He iti rawa ōna tikanga hōia, he nui ake a Irana i te tokomaha e whakaaro ana, ā, kāore i te hāngai te kōwhiringa taunoa ki tōna mahi ngātahi pūnoa ki a Mātau nā ngā whakahēnga i runga i te whakaaro nui o te takahi i te mahi karihi. Nā tēnei take, i te Mane, i huatau mai te Hēkeretari ā-Rohe o UK, a Jeremy Hunt kia whakaurua e te urupare ki te raruraru tētahi "mahi parenga moana ā-Ūropi", he whakahāngai engari motuhake ki te mahi a te US. Ko te take, i tohe a ia, ko tētahi o te wāteatanga o te whakaterenga i te Straits of Hormuz, kaua e whakanui ake i te pēhanga ki a Irana. He tino whāiti ngā kōwhiringa a te UK mō te pare i tana kaipuke kaihokohoko i ngā ara moana o te Kōwhiu. Kua huatau mai te US ki te kōwhiri ki tētahi pūnaha hono mō ngā kaipuke hīkoi i mua i te moana o Ārepa, engari e manawapa ana ngā kaihanga whakataunga o Ingarangi ki te mahi pēnā - nā te mea e whakahē ana rātau ki te whakatau a Perehitini Trump kia puta atu i te mahi karihi o Irana i Me 2018, ā, e whakapono ana tēnei hipanga i āki i ngā renarena o nāianei. Ko tērā atu kōwhiringa mō tētahi huringa tere ki te hihiri ko te tuku i te taraka Grace I mai i te tiakitanga i Kāmaka, i reira i herea ai i runga i te whakapae ki te mau hinu o Ārepa ki Hiria. I tērā wiki i whakamanamana ai ngā kaiwhakahaere o Ingarangi ka taea te whakarite rongoā ki taua āhuatanga, kātahi ka hopukina e Irana te kaipuke haki o UK o Stena Impero i ngā wai o Omani. Tērā pea ko te tukunga o ngā oko e rua e whakarato ana i te whakarerekētanga. Engari ka noho tonu ngā pātai wā roa ake mō te whakahēnga a UK-US ki te kaupapahere o Irana, me te kore e taea te pare i te tukunga. Kotahi te mea e mārama ana: ka uaua te pēhi a te Royal Navy ki te waihanga anō i tana rongoā mai i te pakanga taraka o te Kōwhiti o te tau 1986-1988, e kiia nei ko te Armilla Patrol. I taku haerenga ki a Armilla i te tōmua o te tau 1987, i waenganui i te rua me te whā ngā kaiwawao, ngā kaipatu rānei, e rua ngā kaiāwhina me tētahi matua ine kaitatau maina kei reira tonu ngā oko whaiwhai maina, engari i ēnei rā me taupoki e tētahi kaipuke kotahi, kaiwhakangaro rānei te teihana o te Kōwhiu. I te wā o taku haerenga i te tau 1987, e 47 ngā kaiwawao me ngā waka rererangi o te Royal Navy. Ināianei e 19 ana. Ahakoa tērā pea ka taea te pana i tētahi atu, e rua rānei o ēnei kaipuke ki te rohe, he uaua ki te tautoko. A, ko nga uaua o te kaikawe rererangi hou, a Kuini Irihapeti, kua whakawhāiti i tēnei āhuatanga nā te mea kua tangohia e rātau e rua nga kaipuke kaipuke i te ratonga. Mā te titiro ki te āhua o te rerekētanga o te toenga rautaki mai i ngā tau kotahi mano e waru tekau mā rua, ka taea hoki te tautohe ko ēnei oko nui, utu nui, he pūhara £1bn te kaiwhakangaro Momo 45, kua kore e tika ahakoa he aha. I waenganui i ngā urupare i whakaritea e ngā Kaiāwhina i muri i te pakanga taraka o te tau kotahi mano e waru tekau mā rua, he iti noa iho ngā poti tautiaki tere, i pūruatia e ngā hepaopao, ngā rīpene matatū me ētahi atu rererangi. I hoahoatia ēnei ine kia kore ai e tūkinotia ngā kaipuke nui ake o Amerika, i te mea kua tino whakahōutia ngā ope a Ārepa mai i te waru tekau. Kua hangaia e Irana he waka ruku e 17 ngā oko iti rawa e tino pai ana mō te whakatakoto tōku, mō te tuki torpedo rānei. Kua whāia hoki e ia i roto i te whawhai taiapa, i ngā tawhā ārai hau, ārai kaipuke hoki. Tāpiri atu ki te nui o te āheinga hōia o Irana tōna kaha ki te "pakanga hangarite" mai i ngā mahi ā-ipurangi, mōhiohio rānei ki te whakamahi i ngā takawaenga. I te tau 2015, hei tauira, i huraina e MI5 tētahi kaupapa hei whakaputu i ngā pakū kāinga i Rāwāhi. I puritia e nga pirihimana o UK tētahi pōhēhētanga e whakapono ana he mema nō Hūrana, te nekeneke o Repanona e herea tata ana ki Irana, i mua i te tuku i a ia me te kore utu. Kaore tētahi tangata e whakaaro ana kei te whakamahi a Irana i aua "moe" i roto i tētahi tautohetohe iti i runga i ngā taraka hinu, engari i roto i te mura whānui ki ngā Kaiāwhina, ka taea e aua pūtau te whakarato kōwhiringa ki te Pare Takawaenga o Ārepa. 'Kāore he whakatika tere' Me pēhea te urupare a te UK i te wā poto ki te uauatanga o te whakapai ake i te haumarutanga o tana tukunga? I runga i te whakawhanaungatanga, te āhua nei ko te whakautu mā te pupuri i tōna tawhiti i ngā Kaiāwhina i a ia e ngana ana ki te whakatika i te take o ngā taraka e rua i herea. I roto i ngā tikanga hōia, kaore he whakatika tere. Ahakoa na te raruraru o nāianei i whakatuwhera ai te kāwanatanga i tana pukapuka haki, ka whakahoki anō te ope whakangaro me te ope rererangi, ahakoa kī atu ki te 30, tērā pea he mahi tekau tau, ehara i te iti rawa nā te hiahia ki te whakangungu i ngā mano o ētahi atu hērama. Nā reira ko te kōwhiringa tere, ā, ko te mea mōhio ake hoki i te whanaketanga o ngā ope o Ārepa, ko te whakapakari i ngā tōpana tauhohenga tere māmā i te Kōwhiu. Ka taea kētia e te hōia o UK te whakarato i tētahi wehenga o ngā hepaoro pū, ngā drones matatū, ngā tonotono, me tētahi pūhara amphibious nui, āwhina rānei hei kaipuke whaea. Me tono tētahi ope waka whakaeke iti, tere hoki hei āputa tū, i te wā e whiwhi ana i ngā oko tika. Koinei ngā momo kōwhiringa e whakaarotia ana e te hōia o Ingarangi i tēnei wā. Engari ko te tikanga e pā ana ki te whakahaere mōrearea me te whakararuraru. Ko te tāpepe o te Kōwhiu ko ngā tōpana i makaia e te whakarerenga o te mahi karihi, tae atu ki ngā tauwhāinga taikaha i waenganui i a Irana me ngā tūnga matua o te Kōwhiti Arapia. Ka taea e koe te mātakitaki i te Newsnight i ngā rā o te wiki i te 22:30, i iPlayer rānei, ohauru ki te hōtaka i YouTube me te whai i runga i Twitter

title: E rapu ana a Carpathia i te āwhina ki ngā raraunga Megaupload
summary: Kua tono te kamupene e tiaki ana i ngā raraunga o te pae tiritiri kōnae kati o Megaupload ki te āwhina ki te whakahaere i te pūkei mōhiohio nui.
text: I kī te umanga hautū o Amerika o Carpathia ko te tautiakitanga i runga i ngā 25 petabytes o ngā raraunga e utu ana i te $9,000 (£5,700) i ia rā. Kua whakaputaina e ia tētahi mōtini kōti kia mōhio ai he aha te mahi ki ngā raraunga i mahue i te katinga o Megaupload. E huatau ana kia whiwhi āwhina ki te utu i te tautiakitanga, ki te tīmata rānei i tētahi hōtaka hei whakahoki raraunga ki ngā kaiwhakamahi o mua. I whakaekea, i whakawetohia te 20 o Hānuere i roto i tētahi mahi i whakaritea e ngā mana o Amerika, nāna i whakapae e āwhina ana te pae i te tāpaetanga o ngā mahi manatārua. Ko te kaiwhakarewa o Megaupload, ko Kimi Dotcom (i mua ko Schmitz) me ngā kaiwhakahaere matua o te umanga i hopukina i roto i te poho, e whakakāhore ana i ngā whakapae. I te hohe o Megaupload, ka hainatia e ia he kirimana ki a Carpathia hei umanga hautū mō ngā mema raraunga katoa e hiahia ana ki te penapena. I te wā o te poho, e whakahaere ana a Carpathia i ngā raraunga e 25 mō Megaupload e penapena ana ki ngā tūmau e wātea ana mō te $1.25m (£780,000). Mai i te poho, kua pau i a Carpathia te $567,000 ki te pupuri i tēnei raraunga ahakoa kua kore a Megaupload e utu i ana pire. Kāore e taea te muku i te raraunga me te whakamahi i ngā tūmau mō ētahi atu kiritaki nā te mahi ā-ture e haere tonu ana. I roto i tētahi kōrero, i kī a Carpathia kua ngana huakore mō ngā wiki ki te tiki whakaaetanga kia tīmata ki te whakahoki raraunga ki ngā kiritaki o mua o Megaupload. Kaore he whakaaetanga e puta mai ana, kua whakaputaina he mahi ture hei whakahau i tētahi whakataunga. I kī a Carpathia ko tētahi rongoā ko te whakaora poto i te pae Megaupload me te tuku i ngā kaiwhakamahi ki te tiki i ā rātou raraunga. Tērā anō, e hiahia ana tētahi atu ki te whakahaere i ngā raraunga, ki te utu rānei kia mau tonu ai ngā mōhiohio. Kua kī te kāwanatanga o Amerika me te Motion Picture Association of America, nāna i āwhina ki te whakarite i te poho, e kore rātau e pupuri i ngā raraunga. "Ko te hiahia i tētahi hunga tuatoru pēnei i a Carpathia ki te amo i ngā utu o te tiaki i te 25 petabytes - he nui rawa te nui o ngā raraunga — he tino pākaha," te kī a te umanga kaihautū i roto i tana kōnae kōti. I kī a Carpathia he nui rawa te nui o tētahi petabyte (kotahi miriona kikapaita) hei penapena i te 13.3 tau te wāriu o te pouaka whakaata whakamāramatanga tiketike).

title: Ka tīmata te mahi i te pūnaha whakamahana puna wera i Bath Abbey
summary: Kua tīmata te mahi ki te tāuta pūrere hei whakamahana i a Bath Abbey mā te tā i te mahana mai i ngā puna wera o raro o te taone.
text: Ko te wai mahana e wehe ana i ngā kaukau Rōmana i te 36C (96.8f) ka rere ki tua atu i ngā radiators, ā, ka whakahikotia he papu wera me te whakamahana i raro i te papa. Kei te purua ngā radiator whakawhiti wera ki roto i te wai o Rōmana e 2,000 tau te pakeke, e rere ana ki te Awa o Avon. Kua hoahoatia motuhaketia ngā radiators hei ātete i te waikura i te wai, e 42 ngā kohuke kei roto. "Kotahi miriona kārani wai wera e rere ana i roto i tēnei wai i ia rā ki te Avon, ka hangaia e mātau e 200 kilowatts pūngao mai i tēnei," te kī a Edward Levien mai i Isoenergy. Ka taea e te wai mahana te whakarato i tēnei pūngao mō te taone, engari i kī a Tēnā Levien i uaua tēnei ki te tāuta taputapu i roto i te wai whāiti. "He kaupapa ātaahua tēnei, kia mōhio anō mō te hītori i raro i o mātau waewae," tana tāpiri mai. Ko te tāutanga o ngā radiators he wāhanga o te Kaupapa Tapuwae o Bath Abbey, ā, i waenganui i ētahi atu mea, ka āwhina ki te whakatikatika i te whare hītori. I mua i te tīmatanga o te mahi, i kīia he mōrearea te tiango o te papa o te whare wānanga, nā te mea e hia mano ngā tanumanga i raro iho i hangaia he takakau i roto i te wā. Kua kitea hoki e ngā keri tētahi papa tāpa Medieval katoa, e rua mita ki raro.

title: Ka 'kitea e Piripīni ngā pangolins' i runga i te kaipuke Hainamana
summary: E hia rau ngā pangolins pare i kitea i runga i tētahi oko hī ika Hainamana i rere i tērā wiki i runga i te ākau o Tubbataha, e kī ana ngā mana o Piripīni.
text: Neke atu i te 400 ngā pouaka o ngā kararehe mate i roto i te pupuri o te oko, e kiia ana hoki ko ngā anteaters tauine, ka kī ngā kaiwhakahaere. He tino taonga te pangolin mō tōna mīti me ōna unahi i Haina, me ōna āhuatanga rongoā. Tekau mā rua nga kaihīika Hainamana kua herea. I te Hānuere ka rere hoki tētahi oko taua moana o Amerika ki te ākau kotahi. I tūtuki te oko Hainamana ki ngā ākau o Tubbataha i te Moana o Sulu, he wāhi Tuku iho o te Ao o Te Ao, i te 8 o Āperira. "I kitea e mātau e 400 ngā pouaka e pupuri ana i ngā anteaters i runga i te oko, ā, kei te whakatau mātou ināianei i hea mai ēnei," te kōrero a te kaitiaki tairāwhiti, a Lt Cdr Armand Balilo, ki te kōrero rongokōrero o TE Rāhina. E hokona ana ngā pangolins mō ngā rau tāra mō ia kirokaramu i Haina, ā, e parea ana i ngā whenua maha o Āhia. Ka taea te whaina, te herehere rānei i ngā hī ika Hainamana e 12, e herehere ana rānei ki te kitea he hara ki te kaiwhaiwhai. E anga ana hoki rātau ki ngā utu whakapati.
