Tērā pea ka kawea mai ētahi atu whakapae i muri i te kitenga o nga pangolin. Ko te poti te whitu o nga oko hī ika Hainamana i mau i taua rohe mai i te tau 2002, e ai ki tētahi kōrero mai i Tubbataha Reefs National Park. I tūtuki hoki te USS Guardian ki te ākau ki te tonga-rāwhiti o te motu o Palawan i te 17 o Hānuere. I wetewetehia te kaipuke hei whakaiti i te tūkinotanga ki te ākau, ā, kua whakapārewa te US mo te aituā. Tokowhā nga āpiha o te taua moana i runga i te kaitahipahū i whakawāteatia i a rātau mahi. He tautohetohe rohe tā ngā Piripīni me Haina i te Moana o Haina ki te Tonga, ā, i uru ki tētahi tūnga roa i runga i te kōpae o Scarborough i tērā tau. Heoi anō, ko ngā ākau o Tubbataha e takoto ana i roto i te rohe o Piripīni, ā, kāore i te whakaarotia he wāhi tautohetohe. E ai ki a Unesco, ko te Tubbataha Reefs National Park te kāinga ki te rerenga kētanga nui o te oranga moana. Ko ngā tohorā, ngā pātītī, ngā mangō me ngā honu i waenganui i ngā momo e kitea ana i reira.

title: Pōti Welsh: Ngā utu akoranga o te whare wānanga - he aha ngā rōpū e tuku ana
summary: I te pākaha o te mate urutā ki ana akoranga, ka mau a Jamie Cross ki ōna ringa ake.
text: Nā Bethan LewisBBC Wales education and family correspondent The Penarth film student has launched a campaign with friends to secure compensation for university students. Na te uara o ngā utu akoranga e pātaitia ana, e kī ana ētahi rōpū ki te tapahi utu mō ētahi ākonga mēnā ka toa rātau i te pōti Pāremata o Welsh. Engari mā tēnei e rangirua te kaha o ngā whare wānanga, kua whakatūpato tētahi tumuaki tumuaki o mua. I whakarewaina e Jamie, 22, me ngā hoa ākonga i Bristol, te Write Off Write Now (WORN) i muri i tā rātou e kī ana he whakatau tika ki te utu i ngā utu katoa mō te hunga e ako mamao ana i te wā o te raka, ina whāiti ngā akomanga ā-tangata. "Mēnā kei te utu koe i te nui o ngā moni mō tētahi ratonga, ā, kāore e taea e rātou te tuku, ka tīmata te tangata ki te amuamu," tana kī. "Mēnā kei te utu koe mō te wi-fi, ā, he para te ratonga e whiwhi ana koe, ka waea koe ki tō kaiwhakarato me te tono moni whakahoki, kia tino whakapai ake rānei i te āhua o tā rātou mahi, ki te kore ka waiho e koe taua kaiwhakarato. He rite tonu taku kite i ngā whare wānanga." I Ingarangi, ka utua e ngā ākonga tae atu ki te £9,250 i te tau. I Wales he £9,000 ahakoa ko te nuinga o ngā ākonga e tango moni ana ka utua anake ina tae a rātau moni whiwhinga ki tētahi taumata. Kua whakakāhoretia e ngā kāwanatanga o UK me Welsh ngā karanga mō ngā utu utu paraikete. He take tōrangapū tautohetohe, kei te mārama anō ngā utu akoranga i te pōtitanga Senedd o tēnei wiki nā te taiepa. What the parties say The Welsh Conservatives would introduce a compensation scheme for students whose courses have been disrupted over the past year. I tua atu i te mate urutā, ka hauruatia hoki e rātou ngā utu mō ngā ākonga Welsh e ako ana i te pūtaiao, te hangarau, te pūkaha, te pāngarau rānei (STEM) me ngā reo kē o nāianei i ngā whare wānanga o Welsh. Ka whakahokia hoki e rātau ngā utu akoranga mō te hunga e kōwhiri ana ki te mahi mō te rima tau neke atu rānei i Uēra hei tākuta, nēhi, kaiako rānei i muri i a rātau akoranga. Plaid Cymru pledges to lower the maximum fee for students living in Wales and who study at Welsh universities to £7,500 - a step towards the long-term goal of making university education free. Kāore anō a Labour, ngā Pāremata Liberal rānei e tuku ana ki te tapahi i ngā utu whakaakoranga. However, Welsh Labour says Wales has the most generous student support system anywhere in the UK, based on evidence that up-front living costs was the biggest barrier to young people going to university. E kī ana te Lib Dems i ngā mahere hei whakaiti i ngā utu whakaakoranga e mōrearea ana ki ngā whare wānanga, ā, ko tētahi pūnaha i runga anō i te tautoko mō ngā utu ora, i whakaurua e tō rātou minita mātauranga o Kirsty Williams, kua kite i ngā tau pūkete o ngā tauira tūkino e tono ana ki te whare wānanga. WAITOHU AKE MŌ NGĀ MATOHI O WĒRA: Tīkina ētahi atu whakahōutanga mō te pānuitanga pōti o te whare wānanga o Te Whare Wānanga o Mua, a Tā Deian Hopkin, he mema o te Komihana Mātauranga Tiketike, i kī aua tāngata e karanga ana ki te tapahi utu me pēhea te pūtea o ngā whare wānanga. "Ko ngā kōrero mo te whakaiti i te moni whiwhinga o ngā whare wānanga, ka whakaarahia ngā pātai taketake mō tō rātou toitūtanga," tana kī. "Tērā te āwangawanga mō te taumata nama e pā ana ki ngā ākonga, ā, kua whakaohotia he taupatupatu mō te taumata utu ā muri ake nei." Engari i tāpiritia e ia "kāore he whakaaturanga tūturu" e aukati ana te taumata utu i ngā ākonga kia kaua e hoatu. "Nā reira me pātai koe, mēnā kei te tino pai ngā ākonga ki te whakaae ki tēnei, he aha te momo whakarato e mahia ana e koe mō rātou? He aha te momo tautoko e hoatu ana e koe ki a rātau hei whakatika i aua utu, kaua e whakaiti i ngā utu?" Ko Elain Gwynedd, mai i Anglesey, kei tōna tau tuatahi e ako ana i te reo Welsh i te Whare Wānanga o Aberystwyth - ā, ka kī te tau 18 tau ka ātaahua te whakaheke i ngā utu akoranga. "It would definitely make more students want to stay in Wales if it was cheaper, but I know I wanted to come to Aberystwyth right from the start," she said. "Mena i kii mai tetahi ki ahau, mena ka haere koe ki Liverpool he £ 7,500, kei te hiahia tonu ahau ki te haere ki Aber. " He nui te moni, engari he pai ake ki a au te hari ki tētahi wāhi e hiahia ana ahau ki te noho, kaua ki tētahi wāhi kāore au i tino hiahia ki te haere nā te mea he māmā ake." Ko Rhydian Cleaver, e 21, mai i Swansea, he tauira tōrangapū tau tuatoru i te Kura Ohaoha o Rāwāhi. I a ia e ākonga moni iti ana, i kī a ia ko ngā utu "tētahi o ngā manakē matua" mōna, i a ia e tīpako ana i tētahi akoranga me ngā huarahi mahi tino pai. Engari i whakaaro ia he tokomaha ngā ākonga i anga atu ki tētahi "hokohoko" i waenganui i ngā utu me te kounga o te akoranga. "I taea e au te tiki i te haumarutanga i a au i tētahi whare wānanga i āta whakaritea ki tāku e hiahia ana ki te mahi, tērā pea he nui ake te whakataetae me te tuku i ngā mea kāore i te wātea i Weera," tana kī. I pōhiritia e te perehitini o te National Union of Students in Wales ētahi kōrero mō ngā utu akoranga i te pōtitanga o tēnei wiki. "There is no reason why Wales can't take the lead on this, why Wales can't stand up and have a discussion around tuition fees and around the marketization of our education system," said Becky Ricketts. Engari i whakaae a ia me haere tahi te tapahi utu me ētahi atu pūtea mō ngā umanga. "Me whai kōrero mō te whakarite kia kaua ngā whare wānanga e ngaro - me mātua whakarite ka taea e rātou te tuku aua akoranga ki ngā ākonga". I kī a Jamie ka kite ia i ngā painga o ngā tohutohu kia noho ki Weera, engari i whakaaro ia kia kaua e manakohia ngā kaupapa STEM i runga i ngā ara auaha. "Me pupuri tātau i ngā rōpū e haepapa ana ki a rātau kī taurangi, ā, me mātua whakarite kāore he rōpū e waihanga i ngā tohutohu wātea e ngana ana ki te toa i te pōti ākonga, kātahi ka kaua e tukua," tana kī. Ngā Hononga Ipurangi Pātahi Tuhia Atu, Ināianei Tonu Te Komihana Mātauranga Tiketike

title: Concerns raised over New Cross Hospital parking charges rise
summary: Kua whakaarahia ngā āwangawanga e te National Pensioners Convention mō te pikinga o ngā utu tūnga motokā i tētahi hōhipera o West Midlands.
text: Kua mana te pikinga o ngā utu e £1 i te hōhipera o New Cross, i Wolverhampton, mō ngā noho tae atu ki te rua ki te rima haora. I kī te Royal Wolverhampton Hospitals NHS Trust kāore anō kia whakaarahia te utu tūmatanui mai i te tau 2005. Ko te tuarua anake tēnei o te pikinga i roto i te 15 tau, ka kī te whakawhirinaki. Kua whakaurua hoki he utu hou £1 tae atu ki te kotahi haora. 'Tino nui' I pātaitia mō te utu £1, ka kī te perehitini o te peka o te National Pensioners Convention Wolverhampton, a John Mellor: "Ina tatari koe ki ngā whakamātautau toto me ngā hihi X, āhea koe ka tomo, ka puta atu rānei i te hōhipera tae atu ki New Cross i roto i te haora? " Me kī atu ahau, kaua rawa." I kī a Tēnā Mellor he "wāhi hopu tino nui" te hōhipera. I tāpiri mai a ia: "Kua haere ngā tāngata i ngā tawhiti nui... Kei te rongo rātau i ngā utu hinu [nui ake]. "Ināianei ki te kī atu ki a rātau ka nui ake ngā utu tūnga tūnga kāore i te tino pai." 'He ngāwari ake' Ka utua e te whakawhirinaki te £3 mō te rua me te toru haora, £4 mō te whā haora me te £5 mō te rima haora. I whakaahuatia e te whakawhirinaki te utu hou £1 hei "utu tūnga motokā ngāwari ake" me ētahi atu huringa hei "pikinga iti i ētahi atu utu tūranga". Ko te Rīpeka Hōu "he ōrite i tēnei wā, he māmā ake rānei mō ōna utu tūranga" i whakaritea ki ngā whakawhirinaki noho tata, ka tāpiritia. I roto i tētahi kōrero, e kī ana: "I te mea kei raro te pae i te nui haere o te pēhanga mō te tūnga tūranga, ko te tikanga me whakahauhau te whakawhirinaki i ngā tāngata kia rerekē te whakaaro me pēhea rātou e haere ai me te whakaaro i ētahi atu tikanga kawenga, hei tauira mā te whakamahi i ngā waka tūmatanui."

title: Te tweet a ngā Pirihimana o West Midlands mai i ngā pūtau tiaki o Birmingham
summary: Kua whakamahia te pāpāho pāpori e ngā Pirihimana o West Midlands hei whakamārama i te tukanga tiaki i tētahi teihana pirihimana.
text: I whakamahia e te tōpana te Twitter hei pūrongo ora mai i ngā pūtau o te Teihana Pirihimana Matua o Birmingham. I pūrongotia e nga haihana kaitiaki mai i te paraka pupuri puta noa i te rā, a, ka whakamāramatia ta rātau tūranga. I tīmataria e Sgt Wānanga te rā e kī ana e 21 ngā tāngata e pupuri ana mo nga hara tae atu ki te whakaekenga me te tāhaetanga. Ka tūtohu a ia: "Ko taku mahi tuatahi o te rā ko te tirotiro i ngā pōhēhētanga katoa e tiakina ana kia haumaru, kia pai hoki rātau. Kāore he take, he āwangawanga rānei." Ā muri ake ka tāpiritia e Sgt Pakihi: "Ko ngā mana o te kaipōhēhē ko: Ko ngā tohutohu ā-ture koreutu, takitahi hoki, kia whakamōhiotia tētahi tangata mō tō rātou hopunga, ki te uiui i ngā waehere mahi." Ko ngā kōrero mai i ētahi atu kaiwhakamahi Twitter i arotahi ki ngā kai i tukuna ki ngā pōhēhētanga me ngā rongo e hopukina tonutia ana ngā uiuinga katoa ki ngā rīpene rīpene. "Ākuanei kei te whakamōhiotia e mātou ngā taputapu hopu mamati hōu puta noa i ngā pae pupuri katoa o West Midlands," te kii a Sgt Pakihi. Ka taea e te teihana te pupuri i ngā pōhēhētanga e 50, ā, neke atu i te kotahi tekau ngā paraka pupuri i ētahi atu teihana puta noa i te rohe tōpana. Tae atu ki ngā whakahōutanga mō te mahi ki ngā pōhēhētanga, ka tukuatu hoki rātou i ngā whakaahua o ngā taputapu tohunga. I hoatu ki te tweet-a-thon te haere whakamua i muri i ngā kaiārahi ki te pūkete Twitter Pirihimana o West Midlands i whakapuakina he hiahia ki te tukanga. I kī a Ch Insp Tracey Packham: "E kore rawa te nuinga o ngā kaiārahi Twitter e kite i tētahi taiao pupuri tūturu, engari ka tū waewae ki tētahi. " Ka tweeting ngā haihana tiakitanga i ngā ngohe whānui, tae atu ki te waitohu o tētahi kaipōhēhē i te tiakitanga me te whāngai i a rātou, tae noa ki te whakahaere i ngā taki hauora auau me tā rātou utu whakamutunga, tuku rānei." Nō nā tata nei i whakahaeretia e ngā Pirihimana o West Midlands tētahi "tweet-a-thon" ōrite e pā ana ki ngā kaihautū tirohanga ā-ture.

title: E kī ana te Minita o Keith Brown kāore he mahere i muri i te Brexit ki te tapahi i ngā utu pakihi o Pirihitini
summary: I kī atu te minita pūtea penapena o Pākehā, a Keith Brown, ki te AO kāore he kaupapa hei tapahi i ngā utu pakihi o Pirihitini i runga i te pōti o Te Pōti.
text: I puta mai tana kōrero i muri i te tohutohu a te Kāwanatanga o Pirihitini ki te whakatinana i tētahi whakatio mokatere e rima tau mō ngā umanga. I kī a Tēnā Paraone ka arotakea aua tāke i te wā e tika ana. I whakapono a Tory MSP Murdo Fraser ka taea te hoatu i tētahi "ringa āwhina" ki ngā umanga mēnā ka tapahia ngā utu. I kī a Tēnā Paraone, ko ia te hēkeretari kāpata mō ngā hanganga, te pūtea penapena me ngā tāone, ko te whakataunga a ngā kaipōti UK ki te whakamutu i ngā mema o Ingarangi o te EU, ko te tikanga o te mahi "i roto i tētahi āhuatanga hou". I kī atu a ia ki te hōtaka o te Ata Pai o Te Reo Irirangi o Pākehā kua hangaia te mahere utu pakihi a te Rangatira i mua i te taupānga. I whakamāramatia e te minita SNP: "Kei roto mātou i tētahi āhuatanga hou ināianei i muri i a Brexit - he nui tonu ngā rangirua. " Ko te huarahi tino pai ki te mahi i tētahi pānga ohaoha, hei whakarato i te mōhiotanga mō ngā mahi me ngā umanga, ko te haumi i roto i ngā hanganga, ehara i te mea ka whakamahia e ia ngā tāngata i tēnei wā tonu, engari nā te mea ka whakapai ake i te kaha whai hua o te whenua. "Ki te whakapai ake koe i te hanganga, ō huarahi, ō hōhipera, ō kura, me ērā atu mea, ka whakapai ake koe i te kaha o te whenua, koia hoki mātou e whakaaro ai e tika ana kia arotahi ki tēnei." I tāpiri mai a ia: "He arotakenga tā mātou mo te tāke pakihi, e ai ki te pānuitanga a te minita tuatahi." I te kōrero a Tēnā Paraone i te rā i muri i te pānuitanga a Nicola Sturgeon i te pūtea e £100m hei whakarewa i te whakahaerenga o Pākehā i muri i te taupānga i kite ai i te pōti a UK mā te 52% ki te 48% ki te wehe i te EU. Heoi anō, i Pākehā e 62% o ngā kaipōti e hiahia ana ki te pupuri i te mematanga. Ka kawea mai e te kāwanatanga o Pirihitini te tautoko mō ngā kaupapa waihanga mahi me ngā whakaritenga hei āwhina i ngā umanga ki te mahi i te rangirua. Ko te £100m - e puta mai ana i te whakapau moni i roto i ngā tahua o mua - ka whakawāteatia i te tau ā-pūtea o nāianei hei whakatere ake i te tukunga o ngā kaupapa hauora me ētahi atu kaupapa hanganga kei roto i te arapae, tae atu ki te £5m mō te whakawhānuitanga o ngā ratonga i te Hōhipera Hīupiri Koura. I kī a Tēnā Fraser, ahakoa e pōhiritia ana tēnei pānuitanga, e rua ngā mea matua e hiahiatia ana e te kāwanatanga o Pirihitini. Ko te tuatahi ko te whakahaere i tētahi taupānga rangatiratanga tuarua, ā, ko te tuarua ko te "whakarongo ki ngā waea mai i te iwi pakihi i Pākehā ki te whakatau i te utu o te mahi umanga". 'Kia nui ake te hao' I roto i tētahi uiuinga me Good Morning Scotland, ka kī a Tēnā Fraser: "Ko tō rātou āwangawanga matua ko ngā mokatere kua piki ake i te 42% mai i te wā i kaha ai te SNP i te tau 2007. " Ko ta mātau whakautu ko te whakaoho i te whakahaerenga o Pirihitini me te hoatu ringa āwhina ki ngā umanga mā te whakatio i ngā utu pakihi mō ngā tau e rima e whai ake nei - i roto i tā mātou whakahau mō te pōti paremata i tēnei tau, he mea e tautokona whānuitia ana i roto i te iwi pakihi, ā, ka hoatu he ringa āwhina tūturu ki ngā umanga o ngā rahinga katoa puta noa i Pākehā. "He mea tino nui tērā e hiahiatia ana kia mahia i mua i a Brexit nā te mea ko te āhua o te whakahaerenga o Pākehā, he āhua kōrero, he iti iho te mahi ki te toenga o te UK. " E hiahiatia ana ināianei, ā, he aroha ki te kāwanatanga o Pirihitini kāore i te nui ake te hao i roto i ō rātou ake whakaaro, kaua e mau mai i ngā moni whakapau moni e tika ana kia pau i tērā tau." Na nga Ruma Tauhokohoko o Pirihitini i tohutohu i nga minita i Holyrood kia mahi ināianei mo nga utu pakihi. I whakamāramatia e tōna rangatira nui o Aotearoa: "Ka whakawāteatia anōtia ngā Mokatere Pakihi o Pākehā i roto i te waru marama, engari ko ngā uara ka pā i runga anō i te āhua o te whakahaerenga i te 1 o Āperira 2015 - neke atu i te tau i mua i te taupānga EU, i mua hoki i te kitenga o ngā pānga kino o ngā utu hinu iti rawa. " Mēnā ka kōwhiri te kāwanatanga o Pirihitini kia kaua e mahi i tētahi mea mō ngā pire mokatere o tērā tau, ka pā ngā umanga ki ngā utu kāore e hāngai ana ki ngā āhuatanga ohaoha ka anga atu ki a rātau a tērā tau." I te Wenerei, ka tīmata te Hēkeretari o te kāwanatanga o Te Kāwanatanga I haere tonu a ia ki aua kōrero i te Rāitema i tana tūtakitanga ki ngā māngai o te tinana mana ā rohe o Pirihitini, o Cosla. I kī a Tēnā Mundell i kī atu a ia ki te huihuinga e mahi ana te kāwanatanga o UK i ngā mea katoa e taea ana kia tino mōhio ai te kāwanatanga o UK e "mahi uaua ana ki te whiwhi i te mahi tino pai mō ngā wāhi katoa o te UK". I tāpiri mai a ia: "Ka huihui mai ngā mana ā rohe i Cosla ki te mahi tahi, ahakoa ō rātou rerekētanga tōrangapū, mō te painga o ō rātou hapori. " Waihoki, ka mahi tahi te kāwanatanga o UK me te kāwanatanga o Pirihitini me ētahi atu hoa hei 'Tīma UK', kia tino mōhio ai mātou ka whakamōrahi i ngā huarahi mō Pākehā i a tātau e hanga ana i tētahi tūranga hou mō tō tātau whenua i te ao."

title: Eggborough Power Station bosses calmay generator fears
summary: Ko ngā āwangawanga tērā pea me whakaweto tētahi kaiwhakahiko hiko i tētahi teihana hiko i Te Raki o Aotearoa, kua whakawetohia e ngā kaiwhakahaere.
text: I te wā o Hui tanguru, ka kī ngā kaiwhakahaere i te Teihana Hiko o Eggborough ka taea e te tuatahi o ōna wae e whā te whakaweto i te wā o Mahuru. Ka ara ake te āwangawanga i muri i te āraitanga a te kāwanatanga i tētahi tono kia tahuri i tētahi generator mai i te waro ki te whakanao biomass. Ināianei e kī ana ngā kaiwhakahaere ka haere ngā tipu whakanao e whā puta noa i te hōtoke. I roto i tētahi kōrero, ka kī te teihana hiko: "Ka taea e mātou te whakaū ko ngā wae e whā i te Teihana Hiko o Eggborough kua whakaritea kia whakahaere i tēnei hōtoke. " I wehi me kati tētahi wae i muri i te korenga o Eggborough i tīpakohia hei tētahi o ngā kaupapa kia whiwhi tautoko wawe mā te tukanga whakahohe FID (whakataunga pūtea penapena whakamutunga) a te kāwanatanga i Tīma 2013. "Kei te haere tonu mātou ki te hōpara i ngā kōwhiringa hei tahuri ki ngā biomass, engari kāore he whanaketanga anō hei pūrongo i tēnei wā."

title: Coronavirus: 'Ngā tirohanga pōhēhē' i te wāhi o Dublin i whakahētia
summary: Kua whakataua e te minita hauora o Airani "ngā tirohanga pōhēhē" i tētahi wāhi i Dublin i te āhua nei e takahi ana i ngā ture tawhiti pāpori.
text: I whakaaturia e ngā whakakitenga mai i Berlin D2 i te Hātarei tētahi tangata e tū ana i runga i te pae e ringihia ana he inu ki roto i ngā waha o te iwi. E kī ana ngā tohutohu me noho ngā tāngata ki ngā tēpu i aua wāhi ki te kore rātou e utu, e haere ana, e haere ana rānei ki te whare haumaru. I kī atu a Piki Bourke, tētahi kaihoko kai e uru ana ki te wāhi, ki a RTÉ "kāore ia i te hari" ki ngā mea i tūpono Te Minita Hauora a Stephen Donnelly i kī te "nuinga o ngā tāngata o Airani kua whakahere i te nui o te nui hei āwhina ki te pēhi i tēnei huaketo". I tāpiri mai a ia: "Kua whakaaturia e rātau te pārurutanga nui. E tika ana te māuiui o te iwi i ēnei tirohanga. "Ko ngā mahi pōhēhē a ētahi torutoru ka tino rara ki ētahi atu." I kī atu te tangata nāna i mau te ataata ki a RTÉ i tana taenga atu ki te wāhi me tana wahine, kei te hoatu ētahi tikanga tawhiti pāpori. I kī a ia e puritia ana ngā tēpu kia 2m te wehe, ā, kei te whakaratoa he kai ki nga tēpu. Heoi anō, i kī a ia ka mutu te whai a te tangata i ngā mehua i tētahi wā, a, ka whakakāngia te pūoro. 'Tino mate' ka kī atu a Tēnā Bourke ki a RTÉ i "tino whakamatea". Engari i kī a ia i tana arotakenga i te C KKK mai i te wāhi, i whakapono ia kāore i tino kitea e te whakaata te mea i tūpono. I kī a Tēnā Bourke i ngā whakakitenga mai i roto i ngā kāinga e whakaatu ana mō te nuinga o te wā e ū ana te tangata ki ngā tohutohu hauora tūmatanui. I kī a ia e 51 ngā tāngata i haere ki tētahi takahanga tina, kua oti te tīkiti. I kī a ia e mahi ana a Berlin D2 i te iti iho i te 20% te kaha i taua wā, he "tino mā" ā, i whakaratoa he kai, i tangohia ngā taki pāmahana me ngā taipitopito mō te aroturuki hoapā i te taenga atu, ā, i mau tonu te tawhiti pāpori. Heoi anō, i kī a ia ka kati tonu a Berlin D2 kia oti rā anō tētahi tūhuratanga ā-roto ki taua mahi. I whakaahuatia e te Tumuaki o te Wharekai o Airani a Adrian Cummins nga tirohanga he "whakapouri, he whakarihariha" me te "pakipaki ki nga kaimahi o mua e whakaora ana i to ratau oranga i te wa o tenei mate uruta". I kī a Tēnā Cummins me mahi wawe te gardaí (pirihimana o Airana) "ki te tāpae i tēnei momo whanonga". I kī te minita hauora o Tēnā Donnelly, a Haimona Hāhi, he "whana i roto i te ngākau" me te "matimati waenganui" ki ngā tāngata katoa i pāngia i te wā o te taiepa coronavirus. "Ki ngā tāngata katoa kua ngaro tētahi i arohaina, kua mate rānei i te Covid-19, ki ia kaimahi o mua, ki ia rangatira pakihi whai mana kua tino mamae. He whakamā," ka tuhituhi a ia. I te maha o ngā kēhi i te Republic of Ireland kua piki ake i ngā rā tata nei. I te Rāhoroi, i pūrongotia e te kāwanatanga e 200 ngā kēhi hou o te coronavirus, koia te pikinga nui rawa atu o ia rā mai i Mei. I kī te Āpiha Rongoā Matua o Airani, a Dr Ronan Glynn, he "tino māharahara" te āhuatanga, ā, he "kāhui maha" puta noa i te whenua, tae atu ki te "horahanga tuarua" o te mate. I te Rātapu, ka pāorotia e Taoiseach Micheál Martin ēnei māharahara, ā, ka kī te kāwanatanga ka "āta tirotiro tonu i te āhuatanga".

title: E whakahē ana ngā pēke me pēhea te utu i ngā whakahokinga moni tinihanga
summary: Kua whakahē ngā pēke o UK me pēhea te utu i ngā whakahokinga moni ki ngā kiritaki kua tinihangatia ki te whakawhiti moni ki ngā tinihanga mātauranga.
text: Kua whakaritea tētahi whakaaetanga rangitahi mai i Me, kia ngāwari ake ai te whakahoki moni i ngā tūkinotanga o te tinihanga o te utu pana kua whakamanatia (APP). Ināianei kua whakaaturia kāore he whakaaetanga mahi mo te pūtea mo te wā roa hei whakahoki moni i ngā tūpāpaku harakore. Ki te kore he mahi hou, ka taea te waiho i ngā tūpāpaku me te kore parenga mai i Hānuere. 'Matekiri' I ngā marama tuatahi e ono o tēnei tau, ka ngaro i te tangata te £208m ki ngā kaimahi pēke, ngā kaikirimana whare, ngā rōia, ngā pirihimana rānei, me te whakapati i a rātou kia tuku moni mai i ā rātou pūkete. Ko te rima anake o tērā i whakahokia mai, i te nuinga o te wā e mārama ana he harakore te kiritaki, ā, kāore i nui te tiaki a te pēke. Mai i Me, kua whakaritea he waehere hōu, i pūruatia e tētahi whakaaetanga rangitahi i waenganui i ngā pēke e waru hei utu i ngā whakahokinga moni i roto i ngā āhuatanga kāore i hē te tūkinotanga, te pēke rānei. Tērā ētahi mahere kia whakakapia tēnei whakaaetanga i te Hānuere e tētahi whakataka hou o te 3p i te wā i runga i ngā whakawhitinga pēke ka haere ki tētahi pūtea whakahoki. Engari he maha ngā pēke kāore i whakaae ki te tautoko i te ariā whakataka, e ai ki a Pay.UK - ko te tinana e whakahaere ana i te pūnaha whakawhiti moni a UK - e kī ana "kāore he whakaaro whakaaro mahi". Ko tētahi wāhanga, nā te mea i whakaaro ētahi kaiwhakarato ko te hunga i mahi nui rawa ki te ārai i te tinihanga, ka utu tonu i te utu ōrite ki te hunga iti noa iho. Ka taea e te kore he mahi hou te whakaiti i te parenga mai i te tau hou. Rōpū kiritaki Ko tēhea? I kī te kāwanatanga panuku me whakahau te waehere me te whakahokinga moni hei ārai i ngā tūpāpaku tinihanga harakore kia kore ai e ngaro te nui o ngā moni huri ora. Ināianei kei te whakahau a Pay.UK i te umanga me ngā kaiwhakarite kia mahi tahi ki te kimi rongoā. "He tino nui kia tākaro te umanga katoa i tōna wāhi," te kī a te rangatira nui o Paul Horlock. I kī a Stephen Jones, te rangatira nui o UK Finance, e tohu ana i ngā pēke o UK: "Ko te whakarite kia whiwhi utu ngā tūkinotanga o ngā tinihanga APP ina tāhaetia a rātau moni e te hunga hara, he tino manakē mō te umanga utu. " Tērā te whakaaetanga kaha puta noa i te wāhanga me mahi tahi tātau katoa ki te waihanga i tētahi pūnaha pūtea pūtahi, mo te wā roa, tautoko. Na reira kaore anō kia whakaaetia he ara whakamua. "Ka karanga tonu te umanga ki ngā ture hou kia whakahaua ai te waehere, ā, ka whakaae ki te Komiti Pūtea me tēhea? ko ngā take o te taunaha me te whakahokinga moni me tino pai te whakatau e ngā ture hōu, kaua ko te waehere noa iho."

title: Kahungatanga o nāianei: Ko nga pirihimana o Ingarangi me Uēra e uiui ana i ngā kēhi 'torutoru rawa'
summary: Kāore ngā pirihimana i te tūhura i ngā take whakapae o te kahungatanga o nāianei nā te "ngoikoretanga pūmau" i roto i te hopukanga hara, e kī ana te komihana ārai kahungatanga o UK.
text: I roto i tana pūrongo ā-tau tuatahi, ka kī a Kevin Hyland kua whiwhi pirihimana i Ingarangi me Uēra i ngā whakapae e 3,146, engari e 884 noa iho ngā hara. I kī a ia he "nui rawa ngā āputa" kia hinga ai ngā tūpāpaku. I kī te Kaunihera Pirihimana o te Motu he "uaua ahurei" te hara. Ka puta mai te pūrongo i te wā e karanga ana te Pirimia o Ēnā Me ki te UK ki te ārahi i te whawhai huri noa ki te hokohoko tangata, e kī ana ka "mahi ngāwari" ki te whawhai i te kahungatanga o nāianei. I kī a Tēnā Hyland, i whakatūria e Ms Me i tērā tau, me whai "urupare karaehe tuatahi puta noa i te UK" kia taea ai e te UK tēnei hiahia. I whakaaturia e tana tātaritanga, ko te tino pai, 28% o ngā tohutohu i Ingarangi me Uēra i whakapūketetia hei hara i tērā tau. 'Paerewa koura' Ki te kore ngā tohutohu e whakapūketetia hei hara, kāore e whakarewaina ngā tūhuratanga, ā, kāore ngā tūpāpaku e whiwhi i te tika me te tautoko e hiahiatia ana, e tika ana, ka whakatūpato a Tēnā Hyland. He iti noa iho te pai ake o ngā pirihimana o Pākehā - o ngā tūpāpaku tūpāpaku e 154 i kitea mā te Tikanga Tohutohu ā-Motu, e 13 anake ngā hara i whakapūketetia. Engari i Aiarangi ki te Raki 100% o ngā tohutohu i whakapūketetia i raro i te hara hokohoko tangata me te taikaha. I kī a Tēnā Hyland i whakaaturia e tēnei ka taea te hopu tika i te hara kahungatanga o nāianei. I kī te pūrongo: "Ehara i te mea ko ngā āhuatanga o tēnei rohe e pā ana ki ngā tūpāpaku anake o nāianei, ā muri ake nei, engari ka taea hoki te whakaae i ngā rōpū hara kua whakaritea kia mahi i runga i te whiu, e whakararuraru ana i te haumarutanga ā-motu o UK." I kī te Kaunihera Pirihimana o te Motu ko te kahungatanga o nāianei he "hara matatini, whakawhiti-taitapa" engari ka taea e ngā āpiha te mahi nui ake. Ka kī tōna kaikōrero: "Kaore e whakawātea i te āputa i waenganui i ngā tohutohu ā-motu me te hara i tuhia i ētahi wāhi. E whakapono ana hoki mātou he tokomaha ngā tūpāpaku o te kahungatanga o nāianei kāore anō kia kitea." E whakaaro ana te Tari Kāinga kei waenganui i te 10,000 me te 13,000 ngā tūpāpaku tūpāpaku o te hokohoko tangata i Ingarangi, me te 45 miriona puta noa i te ao. 'I hokona ahau i Ruānia' E toru nga wā i hokona ai a Mihaela puta noa i Uropi mai i Ruānia ki te mahi i roto i te hokohoko wahine ki tōna hiahia. "I ngā ata me ngā ahiahi e 15 aku kiritaki," tana kī. "I ngā ahiahi, tae noa ki te ata a muri ake, ka mauria mai e rātau tētahi atu 20 ki a au." E kī ana te pakeke e 26 tau i whakawhitia atu a ia i Ruānia ki Hakari, ki Ateria, ki Huiterangi me te pū ki tōna māhunga - ko te wā tuatahi i a ia e 16 noa iho ana te pakeke. "He whaiāipo tāku, ā, he wāhanga ia o nga kaihoko mafia," tana kī. Te pūrākau a Mihaela: I hokona mai i Ruānia. Hei hēkeretari kāinga, ko Mrs May te kawenga mo te whakaoti i te Ture Kahungatanga Hōu o UK i tērā tau - ko te tuatahi o tōna momo i Uropi. I a ia e kōrero ana i tētahi ratonga i Westminster hei whakahonore i te kaiwhakahauhau ārai kahungatanga o te rau tau 18 o William Wilberforce ā muri ake, ka kī a Mrs May: "Ko tā mātou wero ko te whakarite kia haere tonu te whawhai ki te kahungatanga - ki te whakawātea i ngā tāngata i ngā here o te pononga, ki te whakawātea i te hunga i roto i ngā mekameka hinengaro, me te whakawātea i ngā tāngata i ngā kōpikopiko o ngā atekōkiri kahunga me ngā kaihokohoko. Ka kī taurangi a ia i te £33m mai i te tahua āwhina kia arotahi ki ngā whenua mōrearea tiketike, mai i reira ka hokona auautia ngā tūpāpaku ki UK - kei roto i ēnei ko Naria, Vietnam, Romania, Pōrana me Arapia. Ko wai a William Wilberforce? E kī ana te Ture Kahungatanga Hōu 2015 ka mahia he hara mēnā e pupuri ana tētahi i tētahi atu i roto i te kahungatanga, i te pononga rānei, e hiahia ana rānei kia mahia e rātou he mahi whakahau, he mahi whakahau rānei. I whakanuia e te ture te mōrahi o te wā herehere mō ngā kaihoko tāngata mai i te 14 tau ki te ora, ā, ka hoatu he mana ki ngā kōti i Ingarangi me Uēra ki te whakahau kia rāhuitia ngā ngohe a ngā kaihoko whakapae. I whakaritea ki te whakatōpū i ngā hara i whakamahia hei whiu i te hunga i whakakahunga i ētahi atu ki te mahi kotahi.

title: Kua tautuhia te Wanted ki te mahi i runga i te American Idol
summary: Ka mahi te Wanted i runga i te whakaaturanga pūmanawa o Amerika American Idol i Aperira, kua pānuitia.
text: Nā Chi Chi IzunduNewsbeat kaipānui whakangahau e haere ana te pēne taitama i Amerika. Ka mahia e te rōpū tā rātou riu Glad You Came i tae ki te tau rima i roto i ngā tūtohi o Amerika i muri i te whakaaturanga i runga i te whakaaturanga pouaka whakaata Glee. Ka noho te Wanted ko te pēne taitama tuatahi o UK ki te tomo ki te toru o runga i te tūtohi iTunes o Amerika. E 188,000 ngā wā i tikiake ai te riu i tērā wiki, ā, kua hokona ināianei neke atu i te 300,000 ngā kape. Kāore i te rite ki ngā tūtohi UK, ko ngā tūtohi US e hāngai ana ki te purei rererangi me ngā hokohoko. I te tīmatanga o Poutāpeta ka kī te kaiwaiata The Wanted a Jay McGuiness: "E whakahīhī ana mātou kei te tino pai te mahi a Glad You Come. " Kei te tukitukia e te Ingarangi i te meneti i roto i a Mātau, ā, he tino pai te rongo kei te āwhina mātou ki te whakatere i tēnā."

title: 'Kāore au i mōhio ka tūkinotia taku pēpi e te rongoā mate hukihuki'
summary: I whakaritea a Christine Coley ki te konutai valproate mo te mate hukihuki i a ia e whakamātau ana mo tana tamaiti tuawhā, engari kāore ia i mōhio ka tūkino i tana pēpi.
text: Ināianei e 22 ana tana tama ko Tristram, ā, kei a ia te mea e mōhiotia ana ko te Foetal Valproate Spectrum Disorder. Nā ngā raruraru whanaketanga i puta ai te autism me ngā uauatanga whakawhitiwhiti. "E hiahiatia ana e ia te tirotiro 24 haora i ia rā," te kī a tōna whaea. "E kore e taea e Tristram te whakawhiti i tētahi huarahi ko ia anake." I kī a Christine, e noho tata ana ki Fraserburgh i Aberdeenshire, i aroha ia ki te taitama i noho ai tana tama, engari i pouri ia mo nga whakamātautau i anga atu ki a ia. "I riri ahau i taku mōhiotanga kua mōhio rātau ki ngā raruraru o te rongoā i te wā i whakaritea mai ai ahau," tana kī. Ko ngā raruraru ki te konutai valproate, e mōhiotia whānuitia ana e ngā ingoa waitohu o Epilim, Episenta me Depakote, i kitea tuatahitia i ngā tau kotahi mano e rua tau ki mua, engari e rua tau ki muri noa iho ngā rāhuitanga i whakatakotoria ki tōna whakamahinga. I kī te kaiwhakarite rongoā, ka kī te MHRA, tae atu ki te whā i roto i te 10 ngā pēpi e mōrearea ana ki ngā raruraru whanaketanga mēnā i tangohia te konutai valproate i te wā e hapu ana, ā, kotahi i roto i te 10 i mōrearea ki ngā hēnga whānautanga. Ko te tikanga kia noho ngā wāhine katoa e 17,000 o te pakeke tamariki i whakaritea he konutai valproate i ia tau i te UK i runga i tētahi hōtaka ārai hapū kia mōhio ai rātou ki ngā mōrea, engari i kī ngā kaiwhakahauhau me ngā aroha ehara tēnei i te take. I a Hōngongoi i tēnei tau, ka pānuitia e Wheua Cumberlege ngā kitenga o tana arotakenga e rua tau ki ngā raruraru rongoā nui e toru, arā, ko te konutai valproate tētahi. I kī a ia kāore i te mōhiotia e hia ngā tamariki i pāngia e te rongoā, engari e 20,000 he "whakaaro tika". I kī a Wheua Cumberlege e whānau tonu ana ngā pēpi i tēnei rā - e huatau ana ngā whakatau tata i ngā rau rau i te tau - kua tūpono ki te konutai valproate ahakoa te mōrea e mōhiotia ana, e kore e tautohetia. I kī a ia kāore te pūnaha i mōhio me pēhea te whakarite kia aroturukitia tonutia ia wahine pakeke i runga i te rongoā, ā, ka tohutohutia ngā mōrea. I roto i tana rīpoata, ka karangatia e ia te whakatūnga o tētahi pātengi raraunga o ngā wāhine katoa o te pakeke tamariki e mau ana i te rongoā, kia taea ai te whakapā atu ki ngā wāhine me te whakamahara ki te mōrea. I kī atu a Wheua Cumberlege ki a BBC Scotland: "Mēnā kei te hapu tētahi wahine pakeke tamariki, ā, ka tangohia e ia te konutai valproate, ā, ka tūpono te pēpi ki tērā i roto i te kōpū, kotahi i roto i te rua te wā ka monokia tana pēpi. " He heitara tēnā, he whakamataku, ko tēnā tētahi mea me mahi tātau i tētahi mea. Kei te tuku te iwi i a rātau." He aha te konutai valproate? E kī ana te paetukutuku NHS e whakamahia ana te konutai valproate hei rongoā i te mate hukihuki me te mate pārekareka. I ētahi wā ka whakamahia hei ārai i te ānini ānini. E wātea ana anake te rongoā i runga i te whakahaunga. Ka tae mai hei capsules, pire me te wai ka horomia e koe. Ka tae mai hoki hei granules ka whāranu koe ki te kai, ki te inu rānei. Kāore i te taunakitia mō ngā kōtiro, wāhine rānei e hapu ana. E kī ana te paetukutuku ka purua koe e tō tākuta ki Prevent, te hōtaka ārai hapū valproate. E taka ana i roto i nga whāwhā, tata ki te 1,000 nga wāhine pakeke tamariki i Pākehā e mau tonu ana i te rongoā. I kī a Epilepsy Scotland e hiahiatia ana he pātengi raraunga ā-motu nā te mea kāore tonu ngā wāhine e mau ana i te rongoā i mōhio ki ngā mōrea. Na tētahi uiuinga o ngā wāhine e 500 i runga i te konutai valproate i huatau ko te nuinga o te kotahi i roto i te rima kāore i te mōhio ka pā pea te rongoā ki ngā raruraru whanaketanga i roto i ngā tamariki, ā, tata tonu ki te hawhe kāore anō kia kōrerorerotia te mōrea ki tō rātou tākuta i ngā marama e 12 kua hipa. I kī a Anissa Tonberg, te kaiwhakahaere take tūmatanui o te aroha: "Ahakoa ngā mahi tino pai a ngā kaihautū, kei te hinga tonu ngā wāhine i roto i ngā whāwhā i tēnei wā. " E hiahiatia ana e tātau he huarahi pūnaha kē atu ki te tāutu i ngā wāhine i Pākehā e mau ana i te konutai valproate, ā, e hiahia ana ki te tautoko me ngā mōhiohio. E mōhio ana mātou i puta mai i te rēhita epilepsy pai puta noa i te whenua." I whakatūpato a Ms Tonberg kia kaua ngā tūroro e mutu te tango i te rongoā me te kore kōrero tuatahi ki tō rātou GP. I taunakitia hoki e te arotakenga a te kaitaunaki tūroro a Wheua Cumberlege te whakatū i tētahi komihana haumaru tūroro motuhake hei pupuri i te pūnaha hauora ki te pūkete me te whakatatū i ngā aronui utu ngāwari hei whakatutuki i ngā utu tiaki mō te hunga kua pāngia kētia. Kāore anō te kāwanatanga o Westminster, nāna i whakarite te arotakenga, kia urupare ki ana tūtohutanga. I kī te kāwanatanga o Pirihitini, i roto i tana hōtaka kāwanatanga mō te tau e heke mai nei, e whakaaro ana ki ngā tūtohutanga katoa o te arotakenga Cumberlege. E kī ana kua tukua ki te waihanga i te tūranga o tētahi kaitaunaki ā iwi mō ngā tūroro, engari kāore i hoatu ētahi atu taipitopito. I kī a Wheua Cumberlege ko te kaitaunaki tūroro ko tētahi tangata i waho o te pūnaha. Ka kī a ia: "He tino hira kia pupuri rātau i te whakawhirinaki o ngā tūroro, ā, ki te whakaaro mātou kāore rātou i te takitahi i te pūnaha ka kitea rātou he pārekareka." Mō ngā whānau pēnei i a Christine Coley's kāore e taea te haere wawe mai te tautoko. Ka kī a ia: "Ehara i te mea ko ngā tamariki ā muri ake nei e whānau ana ki ngā wāhine kai runga i te konutai valproate, ko ngā tamariki katoa kua whānau, ā, kei te tipu ake ināianei, ā, he aha ka pā ki a rātou. Me mōhio tātau kei te haumaru ā-pūtea, ā-pāpori hoki rātau mo te toenga o o rātau oranga."

title: Ka whakahētia te utu tūnga hōhipera NHS
summary: Neke atu i te hauwhā o ngā whakawhirinaki hōhipera i Ingarangi i whakanuia ngā utu tūnga motokā mō ngā tūroro me ngā manuhiri i te tau ki Aperira whakamutunga, e whakaatu ana ngā whika.
text: Ahakoa i tapahia e ētahi ngā utu, ko ētahi neke atu i te tārua, e ai ki ngā raraunga mai i ngā hōhipera 197 me ngā whakawhirinaki hauora hinengaro. I whakaingoatia e tētahi rōpū tūroro ngā utu he "tāke ki te hunga mate" me te karanga kia wātea te tūnga NHS, pērā i te nuinga o Pākehā, Weera, me Aiarangi ki te Raki. Ministers say making parking free means taking £100m from the care budget. Ko ngā whika, i tātaritia e te kamupene raraunga SSentif, i tukuna ki te Pokapū Mōhiohio NHS e ngā whakawhirinaki. E whakaatu ana rātou i te 28% i whakatakoto i ā rātou utu tūnga motokā i waenganui i te 2010 me te 2011, me te 16% anake e whakaiti ana. I kī rātau ko ngā utu i ngā Hōhipera o United Lincolnshire NHS Trust i peke 112%, mai i te toharite o te 67p i te haora ki te £1.42, i te wā i utua e ngā Hōhipera o Te Raki o Rāwāhi NHS Trust te £1.58 i te haora i te wawaenga, tae atu ki te 81% mai i te 88p. Engari i kī te United Lincolnshire Hospitals NHS Trust kāore anō kia whakanuia ōna utu tūnga motokā mai i te tau 2009, ko te wā tuatahi i roto i te whā tau, ā, te āhua nei he hē ngā whika. "He tokomaha nga tūroro i nga hōhipera o Lincolnshire kaore e utu mo te tūnga tūranga, engari kāore anō ēnei tūroro kia whakaurua ki tēnei tātaritanga," e kī ana i roto i tētahi kōrero. "Ko te tangata e whakatū ana mo te toru haora ka utu i te £1 ia haora. Kāore he tangata e hiahia ana ki te utu neke atu i te £3.50 tae atu ki te 24 haora." 'Kua utua kētia' I whakaaturia e ngā whika ko ngā utu i Stockport NHS Foundation Trust me te hōhipera mate pukupuku o Royal Marsden o Rāwāhi i tāruatia ki te toharite o te £1 i te haora, i a rātau e takitoru ana ki te 75p i te haora i Northumberland, Tyne me Wear NHS Foundation Trust. I whakaahuatia e te rangatira nui o te Rōpū Tūroro a Katherine Murphy he "nui rawa" ngā utu tūnga mō te hunga e haere auau ana ki te hōhipera. "I te nuinga o te wā kāore he moni kāore i a ngā tūroro i ēnei wā pūtea raruraru, ā, he tāke ki te hunga mate ina utua kētia e te tangata tā rātou ratonga hauora," tana kī. "Me tika te tautoko i ngā hōhipera e te kāwanatanga, ā, kaua e whakawhirinaki ki te whakahiko i ngā tūroro me ngā manuhiri ki te whakatū kia tutuki ai ngā mutunga." Na nga whika i huatau nga tūroro me nga manuhiri i Rānana me te tonga-rāwhiti o Ingarangi i utua te nuinga o te utu, me nga utu tino iti rawa i te Tonga ki te Hauauru. I kitea e te tātaritanga motuhake he nui ake te utu o ētahi whakawhirinaki i te wawaenga ā-motu (77p) mō te tūnga hōhipera o te haora, i runga anō i te wawaenga mai i te noho e toru haora. Hei tauira, i te utu a Dorset County Hospital NHS Foundation Trust i te £1.60 mō te haora kotahi, £2.10 mō te rua me te £4.20 tae atu ki te whā. Ko te utu o te tūnga tūnga i Chelsea me Westminster Hospital NHS Foundation Trust e £2.50 i te haora i te wawaenga, ka tīmata i te £3.50 tae atu ki te kotahi haora. I te wā o Mahuru 2010, ka pānuitia e te kāwanatanga e kore e whakahoki i tētahi tautohe i whakaritea e Labour ki te maka i ngā utu tūnga i ngā hōhipera o Ingarangi, e kī ana kāore e taea te whakatika i te kaupapa. I kī te Minita Hauora a Haimona Burns he take paetata ngā kaupapa here tūnga tūranga, engari kaua e whakawātea i ngā tūroro e hiahia ana ki te rongoā auau, whānui rānei. "Me tino pai te whakamahi a ngā rōpū NHS i ngā moni tūmatanui, ā, kei roto i tēnei ko te tautuhi i ngā utu tūnga motokā i tētahi mokatere e tika ana mō ngā hapori e mahi ana rātou, ā, ka whakarato i ngā mana uru tika," tana kī. "Kaua tētahi tangata e utu i ngā moni taikaha hei whakatū i tētahi pāka motokā NHS, engari mā te whakamōhio i te tūnga motokā hōhipera koreutu ka nui ake i te £100m te utu o te NHS - he moni ka pau ki te tiaki tūroro."

title: Covid i Scotland: 'Ka taea e aku tauira te whakangungu engari kua kiia ahau kia mahi'
summary: Kua kīia tētahi kaiako i mua kia noho i te raina o mua i te wā o ngā rāhuitanga hou, ahakoa e whakaaetia ana ngā tauira i te tūnga ōrite ki te mahi i te kāinga.
text: Kua kite a BBC Scotland i tētahi reta mai i ana kaitukumahi e whakahau ana kia kore e taea tana mahi mai i te kāinga, ā, me hoki ia ki te akomanga. Kua huatau mai te kaiako i ngā huarahi e taea ai e ia te tautoko i ngā tauira taratahi i a ia anō. Engari i kī tana kaitukumahi e hiahiatia ana ngā kaimahi whakaako katoa kia mahi i ngā kura. I muri i te whakatau a te kāwanatanga o Pākehā kia hoki ki te ako wā katoa i Aotearoa, ka kī te mana kāore e taea te whakanoho i te mahi mai i te kāinga i roto i ngā tūranga whakaako o mua. He maha ētahi atu mana ā rohe kua whakaae ki tēnei mō ngā take tauwhāiti. He fibrosis cystic te kaiako, ā, kua tūtohutia e tana GP me tana tohunga kia mahi ia mai i te kāinga. Ka kī a ia: "Mai i to mātau haerenga ki ngā rāhuitanga whakarei huri noa i Mahuru kua tono ahau kia mahi mai i te kāinga, ā, kua whakakāhoretia tonutia e taku mana. " He aromatawai mōrearea tāku i whakaoho ai i tētahi aromatawai hauora mahi e tūtohu ana kia mahi mai i te kāinga. He reta tāku mai i ngā tohunga mō tōku āhuatanga e kī ana he mahi mai i te kāinga me tētahi tuhipoka GP, engari kua whakakāhoretia tēnei, ā, kei te mate ahau i tēnei wā nā te mea kāore te mana e whakangahau." I te wā o mua o te mate urutā, i whakangungu mana a ia, ā, i tautokona tēnā e te mana ā-rohe. Engari ināianei me wehe māuiui a ia, ko te tikanga ka wawe tana haere ki te hawhe utu, ahakoa e tonoa ana ngā kaiako kia wehe i a ia anō i te kāinga i runga i te utu katoa. She also says there is plenty of work a teacher can do from home to support those in the classroom. "I te taumata 4, kua kīia ngā tamariki i runga i te rārangi whakangungu kia kaua e haere ki te kura, nā reira he rōpū tamariki katoa e hiahia ana ki te mātauranga, e hiahia ana ki te whakapā tangata ki ngā tāngata i a rātou e wehe ana anō i ō rātou hoa," tana kī. "A contact with a teacher would be fantastic for them because class teachers will still be expected to be full time in their classes. Āhea rātau i whai wā ai ki te whakatapu ki ngā tamariki e whakangungu ana? He mahi whanaketanga, he maha ngā mea ka taea i te kāinga." Ko tētahi tangata e whai hua ana i te āwhina a te kaiako i te kāinga ko Hana, 17 tau. He hēnga manawa tōna e kiia nei ko te manawa mauī hypoplastic. I te whakangungu a ia i te wā o te raka o mua, ā, kua kīia ināianei kia whakangungu i te kāinga i te wā rāhuitanga taumata whā mai i te Paraire i te 18:00. E ngaro ana Hei tauira tau tuaono, kei te māharahara a ia mō ōna Tiketike a tērā tau. "Nā te mea kāore au i roto i ngā akomanga, he uaua rawa te mārama ki ngā mahi kua hoatu ki a au. Nā reira ka pā mai ki a au me aku whakamātautau - ka noho kē atu ahau, ā, tērā pea ka uaua ahau," tana kī. He pārekareka tōna wheako ako i te kāinga. Ka kī a ia: "Ka homai e ētahi akomanga he mahi ki a au, i ētahi wā kāore au i te mōhio me aha nā te mea kāore he mahi i hoatu. Kei te māharahara ahau nā te mea kei te ngaro ahau i tētahi wāhanga nui o te akoranga kāore i te whakaakona ki a au." Education Secretary John Swinney told the BBC: "It is very important that in all circumstances where teachers have been shielding and they are concerned about their own wellbeing, that there are appropriate discussions with their own local authority employers. " I roto i te tohutohu a te kāwanatanga, e mārama ana me whakarite ētahi momo whakamāmātanga hei pare i ngā kaiako me ngā tauira e whai take hauora ana. He mea nui kia pūketetia ngā wheako takitahi o ia tangata i roto i ngā āhuatanga katoa." Ko te uniana whakaako nui rawa o Pākehā, ko te EIS, kua karanga tonu kia whakamahia te akoranga hanumi. I te tīmatanga o tēnei wiki, i whakaaturia mai kei te tirotiro i ngā mema mō te āhua o te mahi mahi i te wā i pā ki te ngaro o Covid ki tētahi tiketike hou.

title: Ko ngā raorao i runga i ngā pou i tāutatia i runga ake i te papa motokā o Bristol
summary: Kua tāutatia ngā raorao i runga i ngā pou i runga i tētahi papa motokā i Bristol.
text: I kī tētahi kaikōrero mai i ZedPod Ltd nāna i hoahoa ngā kāinga hou ka iti rawa ngā utu whakahaere o ngā whare. Kua waihangatia ngā raorao e 11 i runga i tētahi tēka tīra whakarewa i te papa motokā o Chalks Road i Hato Hōri. The development is part of a Bristol City Council scheme to help disadvantaged people find homes and will be rented to young people. The project is one of the two being trialled under the Bristol Housing Festival banner - a five-year programme spearheaded by the council who has agreed to spend up to £1.43m on the project. Ka rēhia ngā kāinga ki ngā rangatahi e hiahia ana ki ngā whare utu ōrau me te hunga e mōrearea ana ki te raruraru whare, tae atu ki ngā kaimahi NHS. Ka mahi tahi te kaunihera me YMCA Bristol ki te kimi kairīhi. I kī te kaiwhakahaere mahi a ZedPods, a Dr Rehan Khodabuccus: "I hiahia mātou ki te whakatau i ngā take kaimahi matua me ngā whare utu ōrau me te kore whakararuraru i ā mātou uara o te toitūtanga me te kounga." Bristol's mayor, Marvin Rees, said: "It's an exciting and yet practical approach to addressing some of the housing challenges we have in the city and I hope we can see more of these kind of projects delivered in the near future." I tāpiri mai a ia: "Me whakaaro auaha mātou me pēhea tātau e whakamahi pai ai i te mokowā kei a tātau i te taone, ā, kaua e pana tonu i ngā tāngata ki waho nā te mea kāore e taea e rātou te utu utu whare o te taone."

title: Covid-19: Kua whakaūngia te putanga o Guernsey mai i te raka mō te 22 o Poutūterangi
summary: Kua tautuhia a Guernsey ki te tango i ngā rāhuitanga coronavirus katoa mai i te Mane, i te wā e uru ana te motu ki te wāhanga toru o te putanga atu i te raka.
text: Ko te tikanga o tēnei ko te whakatuwhera anō i ngā pāpara, wharekai me ngā toa me te kore hiahia ki te tawhiti pāpori, ki ngā hīpoki rānei. Ka hikitia e ngā kura ngā rāhuitanga katoa, ā, ka taea te tīmata anō te haere i roto i te pārekareka. Ko ngā rāhuitanga anake e toe ana ko ngā mana i runga i te rohe me ngā huihuinga neke atu i te 100 me whakaae ki ngā aromatawai mōrearea me te pūkete i te taenga atu. Kāore anō te motu kia kite i ngā kēhi Covid-19 hou mō te 18 rā, i muri i te raka i te 23 o Hānuere whai muri i te pakarutanga o te huaketo. Ko te whakataunga kia neke ki te wāhanga toru i tangohia e te Mana Ohorere Tūmatanui (CCA) i te Tūrei. Ko te putanga o ngā Kāwanatanga o Guernsey i te anga raka e whakaahua ana i te nekehanga hei "hoki ki tētahi taumata ngohe pūnoa i roto i te pārekareka", me te whakamahi hīpoki, te hauora me te tawhiti pāpori e tohutohutia ana engari kāore i te hiahiatia. Kei roto hoki i te nekehanga te hiki i ngā rāhuitanga haere i waenganui i Guernsey, Alderney me Sark, tae atu ki te tango i ngā rāhuitanga katoa i roto i ngā kura. Ka taea te whakatuwhera anō i ngā karapu pō, ā, ka whakaaetia te waiata tūmatanui, te whakatangi rānei i ngā taonga parahi. Ka whakaaetia ngā haerenga kāore i te tino nui mai i waho o te pārekareka, engari ka noho tonu ngā ture taratahi e rua wiki mō ngā taenga mai. 'Neke whakamua' Ko te raka Covid-19 tuatahi o Guernsey i mau mo te 88 ra i waenga i te 24 o Maehe me te 20 o Pipiri 2020, me tenei raka tuarua i tautuhia kia 57 ra i muri i te hikinga i te Mane. I whakamātauria e te Kaiwhakahaere o te CCA a Pita Ferbrache he mea "tino whakaharahara" hei ārai i te neke ki te wāhanga toru. I whakamihi a ia ki te "mataara, te whakaaro pai, te tikanga me te wairua hapori nui" o ngā moutere i te wā o te raka. Deputy Ferbrache said: "We're getting there, we're moving forward and moving back to the life we should always seek to enjoy." Ko ngā taunahatanga ā-rohe, ā-motu hoki mō Covid-19 e whakaiti ana i ngā whakaritenga taratahi-whaiaro kua tautuhia kia hoki mai i te 30 o Āperira, e ai ki te 'Bailiwick Blueprint' i tukuna e ngā Kāwanatanga. Ka rite tēnei ki te mutunga o ngā rāhuitanga rahi huihuinga katoa. Ka taea e ngā taitapa te whakatuwhera anō mai i te 1 o Hōngongoi, engari he tauwhāiti te rā me ngā taipitopito o ngā mārire katoa ā muri ake. Whāia a BBC Guernsey i Twitter me Facebook. Tukuna ō whakaaro pūrākau ki channel.islands@bbc.co.uk. Ngā Hononga Ipurangi Pātahi Ngā Kāwanatanga o Guernsey - Covid-19

title: Ngā whare herehere o Parīhi: E waru nga tūtūtanga tuarua i Rondonia
summary: Neke atu i te waru ngā herehere kua mate i tētahi whare herehere i te taone o Porto Velho i te raki o Parīhi.
text: I mate nga herehere i te paowa i muri i te tahuna e nga hoa herehere i te whare herehere o Enio dos Santos i te kāwanatanga o Rondonia. I kī te kaiwhakahaere o te whare herehere i whakatūria te tūtū e te whakawhitinga o te kaiārahi o tētahi rōpū hara ki te whare herehere, e whakahaeretia ana e tētahi rōpū tauwhāinga. I kī ngā kōtiro tērā pea he hononga ki tētahi mahi ōrite i te āhua o Roraima. I reira, toko 10 nga hoa i mate i roto i ngā matapaki i te Rātapu i waenganui i tētahi rōpū e karanga ana i a ia ko te Tono Tuatahi o te Pūmatua, i te PCC rānei, me o rātau tauwhāinga, ko Comando Vermelho (Tono Whero), ka kī nga mana o te kāwanatanga. I te tuatahi ka kī ngā pirihimana e 25 ngā hoa i patua, engari i whakahōutia te whika ā muri ake. I pā mai te mahi i Roraima i nga haora torotoro. Tata ki te 100 nga manuhiri i whakawāteatia, a, i muri iho ka whakawāteatia. I kī nga pirihimana kua whakahokia e rātau te mana o nga whare herehere e rua. Ko Parīhi te tuawhā o ngā whare herehere nui rawa o te ao, neke atu i te 620,000 ngā herehere. Ko te PCC he rōpū hara kaha i whakatūria tuatahitia ki tētahi whare herehere o São Paulo i te tau 1993. Mai i tērā wā kua whakawhānuitia kia noho hei rōpū kaha e uru ana ki te hokohoko rongoā i tua atu i nga pakitara o te whare herehere. He rite tonu te tūtukitanga o ōna mema ki ērā o te Comando Vermelho, he rōpū i whakatūria tuatahitia i Rio de Janeiro. Ko te nuinga o ngā kaiārahi rōpū tino kaha, me ngā rongo mo te tutu me te whakatoi, i te nuinga o te wā ka nekehia mai i ngā whare herehere i tawhiti atu i o rātau kāinga kāinga, engari ka taea tonutia e rātau te whakahaere i tā rātou whatunga hara mai i roto i te whare herehere, e kī ana a Wyre Davis o TE AO i Awatea.

title: He mea tūturu te 'tūkinotanga pono'?
summary: He rangatū ataata nā te kaitapere o Terry Crews e whakamārama ana i ōna uauatanga ki te āhuaāhua, kua mātakina e ngā miriona i ngā wiki tata nei - engari he tino whakawairangi te pono?
text: BBC TrendingHe aha te mea e paingia ana, he aha hoki i karangatia ai e Crews tana rangatū ataata e toru wāhanga ko Dirty Little Secrets. He kōrero pono tēnei mo tana whakamahinga i te pono, e kī ana a ia i tīmata i a ia e 12 noa iho ana tau. Neke atu i te toru miriona ngā wā i tirohia ai te wāhanga tuatahi o tana rangatū, ā, e hia mano ngā tākupu. Ko Crews, he kaitākaro whutupōro o Amerika o mua e mōhiotia ana ināianei mō ana tūranga pouaka whakaata me te pikitia, e kōrero taipitopito ana i tana whakapau haora ki te titiro pono. "He maha ngā āhuatanga i whakararuraru ai te āhuaatua i tōku oranga," tana kī. "Mēnā ka huri te ao ki ngā pō, ā, kei te mātakitaki tonu koe, tērā pea ka raruraru koe. A, ko ahau tērā." A, e whakaae ana a ia i tōna tūkinotanga i tata ai tana whanaungatanga ki tana wahine, te kaiwaiata rongopai o Rebecca King-Crews, nāna i wehe rangitahi. E hia mano i runga i Facebook i whakamihi ki a Crews mo tōna pono. Ko ētahi i urupare mā te tiritiri i ō rātou ake wheako ki te tūkinotanga. I tuhituhi tētahi kaiwhakamahi: "He maha nga tau e kōwhai ana ahau - TAU - ki te āhuaāhua. E whakamanamana ana ahau i tēnei rā ki te kī atu he rā tino tauwhāiti tōku, ā, kua noho mā ahau mō tētahi wā ināianei." Te Reo Irirangi Trending o TE AO Ētahi atu kōrero mō tēnei pūrākau mai i te Ratonga Ao o TE AO i konei. Heoi anō, he tautohetohe te ariā o te "tūkinotanga pono". Ehara i te mate kua whakarārangitia i roto i te putanga hou o te Diagnostic and Statistical Manual, te "paipera o te hinengaro hinengaro" i tukuna e te American Psychiatric Association. He tokomaha nga tohunga e kī ana kāore ngā roro o ngā tāngata e mātakitaki ana i te pono e mahi ōrite ana ki ngā roro o ngā kaiwhakamahi rongoā, ahakoa he āhua tūturu te whakaaturanga i tēnei wā. I roto i tētahi akoranga, ka mahia e ngā kairangahau o te Whare Wānanga o Cambridge ngā karapa roro i runga i ngā tāngata e 19 e mātakitaki ana i te pono, ā, i whakahohea ngā pūtahi utu ōrite o te roro ki te kitenga o ngā kahunga i a rātau rongoā kōwhiringa. E kī ana a Nicole Prause, te Tumuaki Whakahaere o te kamupene rangahau roro o Liberos, ā, he kairangahau i mua i te Whare Wānanga o California Los Angeles, kia kaua e whakakotahitia te whakamahinga pono ki te tūkinotanga rongoā me te waipiro. "I te take o ngā tūkinotanga pono, he rite tonu te āhua o te roro ki ētahi atu tūkinotanga, engari tae noa ki tētahi wāhi, kātahi ka rerekē. Ina titiro koe ki te pono, ka nui ake te ako me te utu... engari kāore koe e kite i ētahi atu tohu," tana kī atu ki te reo irirangi o Te Ao Trending. "I ētahi atu tūkinotanga pēnei i te peti, ina kite koe i tētahi tohu, mō ngā tāngata whai raruraru, ka urupare ake te roro. I te take o te pono, me ngā tāngata e kī ana he raruraru tā rātou, ka heke iho tō rātou urupare." E kī ana a Prause ko te tikanga o te pūtaiao roro ehara te pono i te whakawairangi e ai ki ngā tauira o nāianei, ā, ka whai hua pea te mahi hei tūkinotanga. Engari ehara te karanga i te pono, ehara i te whakamarie ki ngā mano e kōrero ana mō ā rātou uauatanga ki te āhuaatua i runga i te ipurangi. Ko tētahi o aua rōpū i Reddit, r/NoFap ("fap" he kōrero mō te "masturbate") neke atu i te 170,000 ngā kaiārahi, nā reira e paingia ana ki ngā papa Reddit (aka subreddits) e whakatapua ana ki te pia me te Grand Theft Auto. He tokomaha ngā kaiwhakamahi o te wānanga - e pāhono ana ki tētahi paetukutuku o taua ingoa anō - e whakamārama ana i ā rātou uauatanga kaha ki ō rātou hiahia pono, me te tautohe kia kaua e whakamahi i te āhuaāhua, i te masturbate rānei mō tētahi wā. He kaiako a Tom (ehara i tōna ingoa tūturu) i te US Midwest. I kī atu a ia ki a Trending i tīmata tōna hiahia ki te pono i tōna pakeketanga, a, ka pā ki tana mārenatanga. "Tērā pea kua rongo koe i tētahi kōrero he tino pai te pono, engari kāore i te taurite ki te mea tūturu," tana kī. "Ina whakawaia koe ki te pono, ka rongo koe i te tauaro. He rawe te wahine, engari kaore e taurite ki te pono." I tētahi wā, e kī ana a Tom, he wiki i pau ai i a ia ngā haora i ia pō e titiro ana ki te pono. "I raruraru ahau ki te whakaoho i taku wahine, nā te mea kāore i te nui anō," tana kī. Ahakoa he aha ngā kōrero a ngā kaipūtaiao, kei te whakaaro a Tom kua whakawaia ia ki te porn - pērā ki ētahi atu i te wānanga Reddit. E rua tau a ia e ngana ana ki te whakamutu i te mātakitaki, ā, e 90 rā te roa, engari e kī ana ia kei te uaua tonu ia ki te whakamutu katoa. Rangitaki nā Mike Wendling Next story: He aha te ipurangi e pā ana ki a Raniera? Ko te mea i tīmata hei whakangahau ngākau māmā i waenganui i ngā tauira kura tuarua e rua o California, kua mau te tukutuku i te āwhā. PĀNUI ANŌ Ka taea e koe te whai i a BBC Trending i Twitter @BBCtrending, me te kimi i a mātou i Facebook. Kei te bbc.com/trending katoa a mātau pūrākau.

title: Dundee to Belfast flight service to resume in 2020
summary: Ka tīmata tētahi ratonga hau hou mai i Dundee ki Belfast City i Aperira, kua pānuitia e te kaiwhakahaere o Loganair.
text: Ka mahi ngā rerenga tae atu ki te ono ngā wā ia wiki i te wā raumati, e toru ngā wā i te wiki i te hōtoke. E tohu ana i te hokinga mai o te ara, i whakahaeretia e Loganair i mua tae noa ki tōna whakakorenga i te tau 2012. I whakaūngia hoki e te kamupene ka nekehia tana ratonga Dundee ki Rāwāhi mai i Stansted ki London City mai i te 29 o Poutāpeta. I kī te rangatira nui o Loganair, a Honatana Hinkle, e whakapono ana a ia ka kaha te tono mō te ratonga o Belfast. Ka kī a ia: "I tēnei wā, neke atu i te 2,000 ngā ākonga o Aiarangi ki te Raki i te Whare Wānanga o Dundee, ā, he kaha ngā here korowha me ngā akoranga Whakataetae Tuwhera rongonui i ia pito o te ara i St Andrews me Royal Portrush." I tāpiritia e Tēnā Hinkle ko te whakamōhio anō i te Taone o Rātana hei ūnga he "tino painga" i te mea "i whakahekea te wā haere ki te ngākau o te taone."

title: Te matenga o Te Tūruhi o Te Tūruhi 'kāore i makona' ki te pūkete Hauti
summary: E kī ana te Perehitini o Amerika o Donald Trump "kāore a ia i te makona" ki te kōrero a Arapia mo te matenga o te kairīpoata o Te Kairīpoata o Te Wānanga.
text: I te Paraire, ko te wā tuatahi i whakaae ai a Arapia kua mate a Tēnā Kēhopgi, e kī ana i patua ia i roto i tētahi "whawhai meke" i tōna rūnanga o Istanbul. Engari kua tūtaki taua whakamāramatanga ki te pōhēhētanga. E whakapono ana ngā kaiwhakahaere tākehi ki a Tēnā Tītī - he kaiwhakawāwā o te kāwanatanga o Hauti - i patua, ā, i wetewete tōna tinana. "Kāore au i te pā kia kitea rā anō e mātou te whakautu," te kī a Tēnā Puhi, engari mā te whakatū i tētahi mahi ringa ka "nui ake te mamae i a mātau i te mamae i a rātou". I kī a Tēnā Puhi e "taea" kāore te Piriniha Karauna Hauri kaha o Moameta bin Ararere i mōhio ki te patunga. Tae noa ki te Paraire, kua whakakāhore a Arapia i te mōhiotanga ki tōna wāhi, a, ka tohe kua mahue ora i a ia te whare. Kua kī taurangi a Tākehi ki te whakaatu i ngā taipitopito katoa e pā ana ki te matenga o Tēnā Tīhopgi. I tēnei wā, kua mutu tonu te whakapae a Tākehi i a Arapia mo te patunga. Heoi anō, e kī ana ngā kaihoko tākehi he whakaaturanga ororongo, ataata hoki tā rātou e whakaatu ana i patua a Tēnā Kēhoggi e tētahi tīma māngai Hauti i roto i te rūnanga. Kua rapua e nga pirihimana te rūnanga, te whare o te consul, tae atu ki tētahi ngahere pātata, e whakapono ana ngā kaiwhakahaere kua whiua pea tōna tinana. He aha te putanga o ngā takahanga a Hauti Arapia? I kī te kingitanga i puta he whawhai i waenganui i a Tēnā Khashoggi, kua hinga i te manakohanga o te kāwanatanga o Hauri, me ngā tāngata i tūtaki ki a ia i roto i te rūnanga - ka mutu i tōna matenga. E kī ana kei te haere ngā whakamatautau, ā, e 18 ngā tangata whenua o Hauti kua hopukina. E kī ana ngā kaiwhakahaere kāore i whai ingoa e kōrero ana ki te wāhi rongokōrero o Kōrero me te New York Times kāore ngā Hauti i mōhio ki te wāhi o te tinana i muri i te tukunga atu ki tētahi "hoa mahi paetata" hei whakawātea. I tua atu i nga hopunga, tokorua nga kaiwhakahaere matua kua panaia mo te take - ko te rangatira tuarua o te mōhiotanga, ko Te Rangatira o te Rangatira Karauna, ko Moameta Bin Ararere. Kāore anō kia hoatu e nga mana o Hauti he whakaaturanga hei tautoko i tēnei putanga o ngā takahanga. He pēhea te urupare a ētahi atu? Ahakoa ko nga pirihitini o Arapia kua whakahē i tana pūkete. I karangatia e te Tumuaki Tiamana o Te Tumuaki o Te Rūnanga I whakaahuatia e te Tari Ā-Rohe o UK he "mahi wehi" me te kī ko ngā tāngata i muri i te patunga "me mau ki te pūkete". Kua karangatia e te EU me te UN he tūhuratanga tika. He tokomaha nga kaipānui o Amerika, tae atu ki tētahi Pākehā e tino whakahē ana i ngā Hauri, a Senator Lindsey Graham, i kī rātau i te pūrongo mo te matenga o te kaipānui. I pānuitia e Ahitereiria kei te mahue atu i tētahi tūnga pūtea penapena i Hauti Arapia ā muri ake nei i tēnei marama - ka uru ki tētahi poapoa nui kei roto ko ngā minita pūtea o Amerika, UK, Tatimana, Wīwī hoki i runga i te patunga o Te Tīmata. I pātai te hoa wahine a Tāne Khashoggi, a Hatice Cengiz, i roto i tētahi tweet he aha te mea i pā ki tōna tinana, e kī ana: "E pouri ana te ngākau, e roimata ana te whatu, ā, i tō wehenga e pouri ana mātau, e taku e aroha nei." Kua tukua e te Washington Post, he kaitāpae a Tēnā Tīhoggi i tētahi uiuinga kāore anō kia rangona i mua i hoatu e ia ki a Karen Attiah, te kaiwhakatika o ngā Whakaaro Huri noa. I roto i a ia ka kī a ia: "E kite ana o mātau kaiārahi i a rātau anō he kaiārahi e tino mōhio ana, me ngā tāngata pēnei i a au... e aukati noa ana i te tukanga mo ta rātau whakahou."

title: E whakatau ana te tuarua o Labour, a Tom Watson, i te tono kia panaia ia
summary: Kua kī a Tom Watson o Labour ko te tono kia panaia ia hei kaiārahi tuarua mā te whakakore i tōna tūranga he "whakaekenga whakawhitiwhiti" i runga i te "hāhi whānui" o te rōpū.
text: I tāpaetia tētahi mōtini e Jon Lansman, o te rōpū pāpāho o Labour Momentum, engari i taka i muri i te uru atu o te kaiārahi rōpū o Jeremy Corbyn. I kī tētahi pūtake Mahi i tono a Tēnā Kōpia kia arotakea te pōhi, kaua e whakakoretia. Kua tūpono a Tēnā Watson ki a Tēnā Kōpia i runga i te tūnga o te rōpū. I mahia tētahi nekehanga tuatahi ki te pana i a Tēnā Watson i tētahi hui a te Komiti Nui o te Rōpū ā Iwi (NEC) i te Paraire, engari i rahua te whiwhi i te nuinga e rua tuatoru e hiahiatia ana. I tautuhia tētahi atu whakamātau kia mahia i te Hātarei i te hui a te rōpū i Aotearoa. Heoi anō i mua i tērā haerenga, ka whakaae te NEC ki te tono a Tēnā Kōpia kia kaua e whakakore i te pou o Tēnā Watson ki te pōti, ā, ki te arotake kē i te pou o te kaiārahi tuarua me ētahi atu tūnga hei tautoko i te kaiārahi. I kī te pūtake o te Rōpū Mahi: "Mā tēnei e whakaaro me pēhea e taea ai te whakakaha i te haepapa manapori kia nui ake ai te kōrero a ngā mema, te whakawhānui i te maha o ngā tūnga i pōtitia, me te pēhea e pai ake ai te whakaaturanga rerekē." I a ia e kōrero ana ki te hōtaka o Te Reo Irirangi 4 o Tēnei Rā, ka kī a Tēnā Watson i kitea e ia te nekehanga i a ia e kai ana i tētahi wharekai Hainamana i Manatū i te pō Paraire. Ka kī a ia: "He whakaekenga whakawhitiwhiti hāngai ki tētahi rōpū hāhi whānui. " Kei te neke i a tātau ki tētahi momo whare wānanga kē e kore ai e whakaaetia te pluralism. Ki te wāhi me tino piri ki te mātakitaki wehenga. "Ā, e tino hāngai ana ki te momo tikanga a te Rōpū Mahi mo te 100 tau." I tāpiri mai a ia i whakaaro a ia i te kaha o te riri o te kaiwhakarewa o Momentum, a Tēnā Lansman "me tōna wehenga" ki tōna tūnga i runga i a Pakihi, ka "pai ake ki a rātau te whakakore i ahau i te taupatupatu mōna". Ka tono a ia ki ngā kaiwhaiwhai Momentum kia arotahi ki te whakaatu i ngā tāngata e tino nui ana rātau ki te huri i te āhua o te mahi tōrangapū o Ingarangi, kaua e whai "tētahi momo huringa ā-ringa ki te mahi i tētahi puku puku o tētahi tangata e whakahē ana koe". Kua tuhia e te Rōpū Mahi Paremata (PLP), e tohu ana i ngā backbenchers o Labour, he reta ki ngā mema o te Komiti Nui o te Motu - tae atu ki a Jeremy Corbyn - e kī ana he huakore te nekehanga, ā, ka tuku karere ki te whenua "he nui ake tā mātou hiahia ki ngā pakanga ā-roto" i te oranga o ngā wahanga. I kī te Pirimia o Mua o Te Hunga Mahi, o Te Pirimia o Te Mahi, o Te Pirimia 'Pukapuka ture tawhito' I pātai mai mehemea i whakaaro a ia kua mahia te nekehanga e Tēnā Kōpihi, ka kī a Tēnā Watson "Kāore au i te mōhio", engari i tāpiritia e tōna kaiārahi te mana ki te whakamutu. I tiakina e ia tana tūranga, e kī ana kua pōtitia ia e ngā mema o te rōpū, ā, ka taea e rātau te whakaoho i tētahi pōti mēnā e hiahia ana rātau ki te tango i a ia, kaua e neke huna i tētahi hui meneti whakamutunga. "Ka pā ēnei momo mea ki Venezuela, kaua e puta i Te Hononga o Ingarangi," tana kī. Kua tohe a Tēnā Watson ki a Labour kia "āta hoki mai" me te kī e hiahia ana ia ki tētahi atu pōti tūmatanui i runga i te mema o te UK o te EU i mua i te pōti nui. Engari e hiahia ana a Tēnā Kōpia ki te pupuri i tētahi atu taupānga ina toa a Labour i te mana, e whai kōwhiringa ai ngā kaipōti kia noho tonu ki te EU i te taha o tētahi kaupapa Waiho "whai tikanga". I kī atu tētahi pūtake Momentum ki te HAU: "Kāore e taea e mātou te haere ki tētahi pōti me tētahi kaiārahi tuarua i tautuhia ki te tukituki i ngā wā o Labour. " E tino hiahia ana ngā mema Labour ki tētahi pōti ārahi tuarua, engari e kore tā mātou pukapuka ture tawhito e tuku." I kī a Dawn Butler, te hēkeretari o ngā wāhine kōruru me ngā ōritetanga, kua "puta mai i te kikorangi" te nekehanga a Momentum, engari i mārama a ia ki te āhua o te kaiārahi tuarua. I pātai mai mehemea kei te pai te mahi a Tēnā Watson, ka kī a ia: "Kei a au hoki ōku pōhēhētanga ki a Tom. Kāore anō ahau kia kite i a ia i tētahi hui kāpata kōruru mō tētahi wā." E kī ana te kaiwhakatika tōrangapū o TE WĀ, a Laura Kuenssberg, ko te nekehanga a Momentum "kāore i kōrerorerotia" i waenganui i tōna tinana whakahaere - i tāpiritia he "riri" ki a Tēnā Lansman i te mea "ehara tēnei i te whakataunga whaimana". I kī a Ex-PM, nāna i ārahi a Labour mai i te tau 1994 ki te 2007, i te whakakore i te pou tūpāpaku tuarua i huatau i tētahi "taumata whakaharahara o te whakawhitiwhiti whakangaro". I kī a ia he rerekē ngā tirohanga i roto i te rōpū, ā, ko te tūnga o te kaiārahi tuarua tētahi huarahi whakanoho i aua tirohanga. "Ko te whakakore i taua mea he tohu kua mutu taua pluralism o ngā tirohanga ahakoa e whakanuia ana puta noa i te hītori o Labour," tana kī. I kī te kaiārahi rōpū o mua o Ed Miliband ko wai i puta ake te ariā kua "wehe atu i o rātau whakaaro". I karangatia e Labour MP Wes Streeting he "mōrihariha" me te "whakangaro i a ia anō", i te wā i kī tana hoa mahi a Jess Phillips he wāhanga tērā o tētahi ngana nui ki te whakahaere me te pana i tētahi tangata i roto i te rōpū e whakaaro takitahi ana.

title: Te tihi o te Puku o Kim: Ka whatu te perehitini o Amerika i muri i nga kōrero hītori
summary: E kī ana te Perehitini o Amerika, a Donald Trump, he "tino nui" ana kōrero hītori ki te kaiārahi Kōria ki te Raki, o Kimi Rangi-un, i whakamutua i roto i tētahi whakaaetanga hono.
text: Kei roto i te tuhinga i hainatia he tautohe mai i a Tēnā Kimi ki te whakakore i te koiora o Kōria i nga rākau karihi. Engari i roto i tētahi hui pāpāho whakaharahara ā muri ake, ka pānuitia e Tēnā Puhi ngā taipitopito kāore i roto i te pepa. I kī a ia ka whakatūria e ia nga mahi hōia a AMERIKA i Kōrea ki te Tonga, he mea e kitea whānuitia ana he mana whakahaere. Ko te hui te wā tuatahi i tūtaki ai te perehitini o Amerika ki te kaiārahi o Kōrea ki te Raki, ā, he whakarerekētanga whakamīharo mō te tokorua. I tērā tau ka kite te tokorua i ngā muhani maha ki a rāua anō, i te wā i whakahaeretia e Kōria ki te Raki ētahi whakamātautau tūroro whakawhitiwhiti i te iwi ao whānui. Ki ngā tāngata tokorua, he nui te whiwhinga o te hui, me te mōrea nui. E kī ana ngā kaitirotiro e kitea ana te hui e Kōria ki te Raki hei tikanga whai tikanga ki tētahi iwi kua roa e whakaarotia ana he paria. Me whakatau e Tēnā Puhi te tuma karihi o te Raki, tērā pea ka tutuki i a ia tētahi mea kāore tētahi o ōna tōmua i tata mai. He aha ta rātau i whakaae? I whakawaengatia te tihi i runga i te tutei karihi me te whakaiti i te renarena. I kī te whakaaetanga ka mahi tahi ngā whenua e rua ki "ngā pānga hou", i te wā ka homai e te US "ngā pūmautanga haumarutanga" ki Kōrea ki te Raki. I runga i ngā rākau karihi, ka "whakamātauria anō e Tēnā Kimi tana whāinga mārō me te pōhēhē ki te whakaoti i te whakawāteatanga o te koiora o Kōria". E kī ana ngā kaimātakitaki kāore he taonga o te tuhinga, engari me pēhea e tutuki ai te whakawāteatanga. Heoi anō, i a ia e kōrero ana ki ngā kaipānui i muri iho, ka kī a Tēnā Puhi: He tokomaha nga kaipānui i pātai mai mehemea kua whakaarahia e Tēnā Puhi te take o te mana tangata ki a Tēnā Kimi, e whakahaere ana i tētahi kāwanatanga tino nui me ngā puni mahi tōpana. I kī te perehitini o Amerika i a ia, ā, kāore i kounu i tana whakaahuatanga o Tēnā Kimi he "pūkenga". "Āe, he tino pūkenga a ia," te kī a Tēnā Pu. "Ko te tangata e mahi ana i tētahi āhuatanga pēnei i a ia i te 26 tau o te pakeke, ā, ka taea e ia te whakahaere me te whakahaere uaua. Kāore au i te kī he pai a ia." I roto i tētahi uiuinga i muri i te tumuaki ki a ABC News, ka kī te perehitini e mōhio ana a ia ko te tikanga o te whakaaetanga ko te tikanga o te whakawāteatanga katoa. "Āe, kei te whakakore a ia, ko taku kōrero kei te whakakore a ia i te wāhi katoa. Ka tere rawa te tīmata. Ki taku whakaaro ka tīmata a ia ināianei," tana kī. "E whakaaro ana ahau e whakawhirinaki ana a ia ki a au, ā, e whakawhirinaki ana ahau ki a ia," te tāpiri mai a Tēnā Puhi. He aha te tauhohenga? He tino pai. I te tīmatanga o tēnei tau, ka kī te Perehitini Kōria ki te Tonga o Moon Jae-in, nāna i hui ki a Tēnā Kimi i te tīmatanga o tēnei tau, "ka tuhia e ngā Kōrea e rua me Mātau he hītori hou o te rangimārie me te mahi tahi". Ahakoa rā, i kī hoki tētahi kōrero i te "tikanga me te whakaaro tūturu" o ngā kōrero a Tēnā Puhi "me aromatawai". I kī hoki a Haina, ko te urunga nui anake o Kōrea ki te Raki, i hangaia e te hui he "hītori hou". I kī te manatu ā-rohe ka taea te whakangāwari i ngā whakaaetanga ki Kōrea ki te Raki ki te mau ki ngā taumira UN. I whakamihi te Pirimia o Tiapanī o Te Pirimia o Tiapanī ki te "ārahitanga me te mahi" a Perehitini Pu, e kī ana i tautokona e ia te tautohe a Kōria ki te Raki hei "hipanga ki te taumira whānui o ngā take huri noa i Kōrea ki te Raki". Engari i whakatūpato a Rūhia "kei roto te rewera i te taipitopito" ā, ka kī a Irana kia kaua a Kōria ki te Raki e whakawhirinaki ki a Mātau. Kātahi anō ka tangohia e Tēnā Puhi te US i roto i tētahi mahi karihi ki a Irana. I hurihia ngā tōrangapū i te Tātaritanga a Anthony Zurcher, te kaipānui o Amerika ki te Raki e rua tau ki mua, ka haere a Pakihi ki Cuba - ā, i whakakāhoretia e ngā tohutohu mō te whati parāoa me ngā kaiārahi whānui, ā, ka whakamihitia e ngā rangatira mō tōna kāwanatanga. Ināianei, me te tihi o Donald Trump ki a Kimi Rangi-un, kua hurihia nga tēpu. Ko te nuinga. I runga i te Fox News tūturu me ngā kaitautoko uho a Tēnā Puhi, ka whakamihitia te perehitini mō tētahi hua whakawhanaunga hītori. I waenganui i ngā Pāremata, neke atu i te nui o te māharahara kei te whakauru te perehitini ki tētahi mahi whakaaturanga whakakororia, he iti noa iho te angitu. Kua nui ake te inenga o te Pākehā i te Rōpū Nui. He nui tonu ngā kōrero mō "ngā hipanga tuatahi hītori", i roto i ngā kupu a te Kaiārahi Nuinga o Te Aotearoa, engari he āwangawanga ki te āhua o ngā taipitopito manatokonga kāore anō kia whakaritea. I whakapuakina e ētahi atu tohutohu te wehi i te kitenga i ngā haki o Amerika me Kōria ki te Raki, ā, he nui rawa te āhua o te āhua o te Tūruhi me ngā kupu mahana a Tēnā Kimi mō Tēnā Kimi, nā te hītori o tōna iwi mo te tūkinotanga motika tangata. "E kore e kī, kua tukitukia e mātau a Tērā mo te mahi i tēnei," ki te kairangitaki tūturu o Allahpundit. Ko te Tūrei te whakamaumahara hou rawa i roto i te 16 marama noa iho, kua hurihia ngā tōrangapū o Amerika - me te ao whānui - tōrangapū. He pēhea te putanga o te rā I tīmata te tihi ki tētahi whakaahua ātaahua, kāore i te mōhiotia i ngā marama tata nei. Ka haere atu nga tāngata tokorua ki a rāua anō, a, ka mau tonu ki nga ringa o tētahi i mua i nga haki o Mātau me Kōria ki te Raki. I a rāua e noho ana i te taha o tētahi, i mua i tētahi hui takitahi, ka āhua māhorahora te tokorua ki te tūponotanga. "Ehara i te mea ngāwari te tae ki konei," te kī a Tēnā Kimi. "He taunahua engari i hinga mātau kia noho ki konei." I kōrero ngā tāngata tokorua, e ngā kaiwhakamāori anake, i raro iho i te 40 meneti. Kātahi rātau ka honoa e ngā tonotono iti o nga kaitohutohu mo te tina mahi. I te tina ka tiria e rātau he ranunga o ngā rihi ki te Uru me te Koreana, tae atu ki ngā kukama whakakī me te jorim Daegu, he rihi ika tānuku.

title: Ko te panga o te DNA tawhito o nga takenga mai o te Basque
summary: Te āhua nei kua whakaotia e te DNA mai i ngā toenga tahito te panga o tētahi o ngā tāngata tino mōhio o Uropi: ko ngā Pakihi.
text: Ko te reo motuhake me te hanganga iranga o te iwi Pakihi i te raki o Paniora me te tonga o Wīwī, he maha nga tau e pōauau ana i nga kaimātai tangata. I whakatakoto tētahi ariā he pūkoro whakangau taketake rātau. Ināianei, e hua ana tētahi akoranga i roto i te pukapuka PNAS e heke iho ana rātau i ngā kaiahuwhenua o mua i whāranu ki ngā kaiwhakangau paetata i mua i te noho taratahi mō te mano tau. He tikanga ahurei nga Pakihi me tētahi reo - Euskera - kāore e pā ana ki ētahi atu kōrero i Uropi, i te ao rānei. E noho ana i tētahi kokonga maunga o Uropi Atarangi, e whakaatu ana hoki rātau i ngā tauira iranga motuhake ki o rātau hoa noho tata i Wīwī me Paniora. Te āhua nei he arorau rātau no tētahi apa tawhito ake o te iwi whānui, engari he kaupapa taupatupatu te tawhiti o o rātau pakiaka. I tātaritia e Mattias Jakobsson mai i te Whare Wānanga o Uppsala i Huitene ngā huinga o ngā anga tangata e waru o te Wā Pōhatu mai i El Portalón i Atapuerca, ki te raki o Paniora. I noho ēnei tangata i waenganui i te 3,500 me te 5,500 tau ki mua, i muri i te tauwhiro ki te pāmu i te tonga o Uropi. E whakaatu ana ngā kitenga ko ēnei kaiahuwhenua Iberia o mua ngā tīpuna tino tata ki ngā Pākehā o nāianei. Haere ki te hauauru Ko ngā tauritenga me ētahi atu kaiahuwhenua o Ūropi tahito e whakaatu ana i mauria mai te ahuwhenua ki Iberia e aua rōpū kaiheke ōrite nāna i whakamōhio atu ki Ūropi waenganui, ki te raki hoki. I whakawhānuitia ēnei paionia mai i tētahi whenua tupu i te Rāwhiti Tata, ka tārewa puta noa i Uropi tata ki te 7,000 tau ki muri ki te tīmata i te wā e mōhiotia ana ko te Neolithic. Ka noho nga kaiahuwhenua, ka whāranu rātau ki ngā kaiwhaiwhai-kohikohi paetata - ngā uri o ngā tāngata i noho i Uropi i te wā o te Ice Age whakamutunga. He pono, he nui ake ngā tīpuna kaiwhaiwhai o El Portalón i ngā kaiahuwhenua pūkenga mai i Tiamana, Hakari, Paniora i noho i ngā mano tau i mua. Ka haere hoki te akoranga hou ki te whakamārama i ētahi o ngā rerekētanga i waenganui i ngā Pakihi me ō rātou hoa noho tata i Wīwī me Paniora. I muri i te tautuhitanga o te ranunga kaiahuwhenua tuatahi, ka wehe nga tīpuna o te Basques i ngā rōpū karapoti - tērā pea nā te pahekotanga o te papawhenua me te ahurea. "He uaua ki te taurangi, engari kua mahi tahi mātou me ngā kōrero hītori Pakihi, ā, e mārama ana mai i te pūkete hītori he tino uaua tēnei rohe ki te raupatu," te kī a Prof Jakobsson ki a TE Rongokōrero. Ko te tikanga o tēnei kāore te rohe Pakihi i pāngia e ngā hekenga o muri mai i hanga i ngā tauira iranga ki tētahi atu wāhi o Uropi. Te hekenga me te taratahitanga I puta tētahi o ēnei nekeneke i te Tau Parahi, i te wā i haere ai ngā hepara o te Steppe - i te taha rāwhiti o te whenua - ki te hauauru. Tērā pea ka horahia e tēnei hekenga ngā reo Indo-Ūropi puta noa i Uropi, e pā ana ki ngā wāhi waenganui, ki te raki hoki o te whenua ki te tonga. Ahakoa i whakaaturia e ngā huinga o Wīwī me te Pāniora he whakaaturanga o tēnei tāurunga iranga ki te rāwhiti, kāore ērā o ngā Pākehā. Ko tētahi atu hekenga i mahi hei whakarerekē anō i ngā Pakihi i o rātau hoa noho Pāniora. I te AD 711, ka whakawhiti tētahi ope Mahometa mai i Awherika ki te Raki ki Iberia, ka tīmata i tētahi mahi neke atu i te 700 tau. Anō, ahakoa he iti noa iho ngā tīpuna o Awherika ki te Raki me Roto-Sahara e kitea ana i te Pāniora, kei te ngaro te nuinga o te wā i ngā Pakihi. Kua whakaaturia e ngā mātauranga o mua ko ngā tāngata taketake o te motu Itari o Sardinia, he tino ōrite ki ngā kaiahuwhenua pūkenga o Ūropi waenganui. I muri i te tauwhiro ahuwhenua, ka noho mokemoke hoki nga Sardinians, engari kāore i a rātau te tīpuna kaiwhaiwhai-kohikohi tāpiri e whakaahua ana i nga Basques. Ko te kupu taurangi, ahakoa e whakaatu ana te mātauranga whenua ko nga kaiahuwhenua tuatahi o Uropi i karanga mai i te Rāwhiti Tata, ko te iwi whānui e noho ana i taua rohe i tēnei rā, kāore i te tino rite ki a rātou. Nā te mea i hangaia anōtia ngā tauira iranga i Tākehi me te Rāwhiti o Waenganui e ngā hekenga mai i ngā wāhi karapoti i muri i te Neolithic o mua. He rerekē te ōwehenga o ngā tīpuna kaiwhakangau-kohikohi puta noa i Uropi, tata ki te 30% i ngā Estonia me ngā Rituānia, engari kāore he Pākehā taketake "mā" e toe ana. Te āhua nei kua whakawaimehea rātau e nga kaiheke Neolithic, tērā pea he nui ake te tokomaha.

title: Papā o Hiria: Ka whakahaua e Hapa o Rūhia te 'wāhanga matua' o ngā ope ki waho
summary: I roto i tētahi nekehanga ohorere, kua whakahaua e te Perehitini o Rūhia o Tūroro tana hōia kia tīmata ki te unu i te "wāhanga matua" o ōna ope i Hiria mai i te Tūtira.
text: I kī a ia kua tutuki i te raweke a Rūhia ōna whāinga. Ka puta mai nga kōrero i waenganui i nga kōrero rangimārie hou i Hiniwa e whai ana ki te whakatau i te papā o Hiriani e rima tau. He urunga matua a Rūhia no te Perehitini o Hiriani, o Te Perehitini o Hiriani, i kī tōna tari i roto i tētahi kōrero i whakaae ai ia ki te nekehanga. Ko te kume "e ai ki te āhuatanga i runga i te whenua", te kī a te kōrero. I tīmataria e Rūhia tana whakahau i ngā tuki hau i Hiria i tērā o Mahuru, e tohu ana i te toenga e manakohia ana e te kāwanatanga o Hiriani, ā, ka whakaaetia kia hopukina anō te rohe i te hunga whakakeke. "E whakaaro ana ahau kua tutuki te mahi i whakaritea mo te mahi wawao me nga ope taua i runga i te katoa," te kī a Tēnā Hapa i roto i tētahi hui i Te Pirihitini. "Nō reira e whakahau ana ahau i te minita wawao kia tīmata i te putanga o te wāhanga matua o to mātau ope taua mai i te Whenua o Hiriani Arāpia mai i āpōpō." Tērā pea kei te ārai a Hapa i ana tūpono: ko Sarah Rainsford, ko te korero kōrero o Rūhia i te tīmatanga o te hau o Rūhia i Hiria, i te tapa o te tiango te kāwanatanga o Perehitini Hahara. He iti iho i te ono marama i muri iho, ka kī a Rūhia i whakaaetia e tana mahi ngā hōia kāwanatanga o Hiriani ki te tango anō i te 10,000 km māra (3,860 māra) o te rohe. Na te uru atu, ka whakamāramatia e Tūroro kua rite a Rūhia ki te whakapuaki i ōna painga. Ko ngā hua e whakaū ana i te kōrero nui ake a Mohihi i ngā mea e tūpono ana i ngā kōrero rangimārie. Ko te whakataunga kia whakahekea ngā mahi a Rūhia ka whakakīa pea e te utu, nā te hinganga o ngā utu hinu; tērā anō pea ka whakahaeretia e te hiahia ki te whakamutu i te taratahitanga o Rūhia me ngā mana ki te Uru. Engari i a Tūroro e whakahau ana i tana minita ā-rohe kia arotahi ki ngā mahi tōrangapū i mua i Hiria, te āhua nei kei te āraia e ia ana tūpono. Ko te āhua nei, ko ngā pūnaha arai hau mātauranga e noho ana. A, i te mea kāore anō kia korerotia mai ki a mātau e hia ngā hōia i tonoa ki Hiria, kāore mātau e mōhio e hia e toe ana. I kī a Tēnā Hapa ka mahi tonu te pūtake hau o Rūhia o Hmeimim i te kawanatanga o Latakia me tōna pūtake moana Māuirangi i Tartus. I kī a ia me pare rāua tahi "i te whenua, i te hau, i te moana hoki". I pōhiritia e te ātete a Hiria te pānuitanga a Rūhia. "Mēnā he tino nui ki te whakatinana i te putanga, māna e pana pai ngā kōrero [rangimārie]," te kī a Salim al-Muslat, te kōrero mō te rōpū hāmarara ātete, te Komiti Whakaritenga Tiketike. I hoatu hoki e te US he urupare tiaki. "Me tino kite tātau he aha ngā whakaaro o Rūhia," te kī a te kaikorero o te Whare Mā, a Josh Earnest. Kua kōrerorerotia e Perehitini Pakihi te whanaketanga ki a Tēnā Hapa i roto i tētahi waea waea, ka kī te Whare Mā me te Pirihitini, he torutoru noa iho ngā taipitopito. He aha te mea i tutuki i a Rūhia i Hiria? Pūtake: Ko te Minita Whakangungu o Rūhia, ko Te Minita Whakangungu o Rūhia, i whakahuatia motuhaketia e te pāpāho Rūhia, ka kī ngā mana o Amerika kāore a Washington i whiwhi whakatūpato tōmua i te kōrero a Tēnā Hapa. E kī ana te korero whakawhanaunga o TE WĀ, a Honatana Marcus, kua tutuki i a Rūhia ōna whāinga matua i roto i te raweke - e whakatōpū ana i te tūnga o Perehitini Hahara, e taea ai e ōna ope te tango anō i ngā wāhanga matua o te rohe rautaki me te whakarite kia noho tonu a Tēnā Hahara hei take i tētahi kāinga Hiriani ā muri ake. Kua roa te tohe a Rūhia ki tana whakahau whakapae i ngā rōpū pūtohu anake, engari kua amuamu ngā mana ki te Uru i ngā hoariri tōrangapū o Perehitini Hahara. Ināianei kua whakaahuatia e te karere a te UN ki Hiria, a Staffan de Mistura ngā kōrero rangimārie hou rawa hei "wā pono". I kī a ia kāore he "mahere B" ki te hinga nga kōrero, me te whiringa anake he hoki ki te whawhai. I tīmata te mutunga o ngā whakarihariha i whakaaetia e te nuinga o ngā kaiuru i roto i te papā i tērā marama - engari he pūrongo o ētahi tūkinotanga i ngā taha katoa. I roto i te whawhai hou rawa, ka pūrongotia kua hōhonu ngā ope kāwanatanga o Hiriani i runga i ngā tūnga o te Kāwanatanga o Ingarihi (IS) e tata ana ki te wāhi tuku iho o te ao o Palmyra.

title: Perry Beeches The Academy Trust school is 'inadequate'
summary: Ko tētahi whakawhirinaki wānanga i whakamihitia i mua e te kāwanatanga, ko tētahi atu o ōna kura i whakatauria he "koretake."
text: He pūrongo Ofsted e puta ana a tērā wiki, engari i kitea e te BBC, e kī ana a Perry Beeches The Academy, kei te "tino whakapeka". I muri i tētahi atu kura i roto i te mekameka o Perry Beeches o Birmingham - Perry Beeches III - i whakaurua ki ngā tikanga motuhake i Whiringahora 2015. I kī te āpiha nui o te whakawhirinaki, a Paul Wheeler, kei te "whakahuatia" ngā take. Ko te Perry Beeches Academy Trust, e whakahaere ana i ngā kura e rima i te taone e tiaki ana i ngā tauira e 2,400, i te tīmatanga o tēnei tau i te kitenga o tētahi tāpaetanga £2.1m i te wā i mahia e Tēnā Wheeler, te āpiha pūtea matua i taua wā, he taki hauora. I muri mai i te tukunga iho o te manukura whirinaki o Te Rūnanga o Aotearoa.
