I kitea e tētahi tūhuratanga a te Mana Pūtea Mātauranga he utu tāpiri e £160,000 i utua ki a Tēnā Nolan i roto i te rua tau mā tētahi whakaaetanga a te hunga tuatoru - i runga ake i tana utu £120,000 i te tau. I tukuna te whakawhirinaki ki tētahi pānui pūtea hei whakapai ake. I roto i tana pūrongo hou rawa, ka kī a Ofsted kua heke ngā paerewa hei hua hāngai o te "whakahaere ngoikore". Tirohia ētahi atu pūrākau mai i Te Whenua Pango me te Whenua Pango i konei Ko te kōrero a te pūrongo i kī ai a Tēnā Huka: "He take kua miramiratia e te pūrongo, ā, kei te kōrero ahau i aua take me ā mātou kaitiaki." I tirohia te kura i te 21 me te 22 o Mahuru. I whakatauria he "tino pai" i te tau 2013. The trust has been praised by the government in the past with David Cameron and then education minister Michael Gove attending the opening of Perry Beeches III in 2013.

title: Ka whakarerea e te koromatua o Luton te pakaru o te rōpū māra
summary: Kua whakarerea tētahi koromatua nāna i whati ngā ture raka Covid-19 ki te haere ki tētahi hākari.
text: I whakaahuatia te koromatua o Luton, a Tahir Hai i tētahi huihuinga i roto i tētahi māra, tae atu ki ngā kaikaunihera o te rohe o Asif Masood me Waheed Hākinakina. I muri tata mai i te tohunga o te taone hei "wāhi raweke" e te Hauora Tūmatanui o Ingarangi. Ka kī a Tēnā Hai: "Kaore he takunga mo taku mahi - me mōhio pai ake ahau, ā, e whakaae ana ahau ki te kawenga katoa mo aku mahi." I muri i te huihuinga o Hōngongoi, kua puta mai ngā pikitia o Tēnā Hai, a Tēnā Hākinakina rāua ko Tēnā Hākinakina i runga i te pāpāho pāpori i muri i te huihuinga o Hōngongoi. I roto i tētahi kōrero i runga i te paetukutuku a te Kaunihera o Te Rohe o Te Rūnanga, ka kī a Tēnā Hai i ana mahi "i raro iho i te paerewa o taku tūnga". I kī a ia ko te tū ko te "mea tino pai ka taea e au mō te taone". I tāpiritia e ia ko tana tūmanako ka noho ana mahi "hei whakamaumahara ki te iwi o Luton i te hiranga o te whai i ngā aratohu Covid-19 i te mea he tuma tūturu, tino nui hoki". I kī te kaiārahi kaunihera o Te Rohe o Hazel Simmons (Taiwhanga) kua mahia e Tēnā Hai tētahi "hē e tino pouri ana ia" ā, "kei te tino mamae a ia me tōna whānau i tēnei wā". I tāpiri mai a ia: "He whakararuraru te mea i tūpono, ā, e whakaaro ana ahau e tika ana kia hīpae a ia i tēnei wā, engari he mea nui kia mōhio ki te koha tino pai i mahia e ia ki Luton." I kī te kaiārahi Liberal Democrat a David Franks kāore anō kia mutu taua take. "Ka āwhina mēnā ka whakamāramatia e te Rōpū Mahi paetata he aha te mahi e mahia ana e ia," tana kī. "Ko tēnei wā o te mūmū e whakaara ana i ngā whakapae mo te ngana ki te taupoki." The borough council said it had received complaints about the three Labour councillors, which would be addressed through its Standards Committee. I tāpiritia he koromatua hou ka whakatūria i te 29 o Mahuru. Kimihia te Rongokōrero o TE Rāwhiti o Ingarangi i Facebook, Instagram me Twitter. Mēnā he huatau pūrākau tāu, īmēra eastofenglandnews@bbc.co.uk

title: E kī ana a Boris Johnson i te taupatupatu rangatiratanga 'koretake' ki te nuinga o ngā Pākehā
summary: Kua tohe a Boris Johnson he "koretake" te taupatupatu rangatiratanga o Scotland ki te nuinga o te iwi i a ia e akiaki ana i te whenua kia whakakotahi ki a Covid.
text: I te kōrero te PM i te wā o tētahi haerenga ki Pākehā ki te whakatakoto i te kaha o te UK e mahi tahi ana i te wā o te mate urutā. I kī te SNP i te wehi a ia i te whakapeka o te tautoko mo te uniana. I pātai hoki te Minita Tuatahi o Nicola Sturgeon mehemea he mea nui tana haerenga. I tiimata e te PM tana haerenga mo te ra ma te haere ki te Lighthouse Laboratory - e tukatuka ana i nga whakamatautau Covid - i te whare o te Whare Wananga o Queen Elizabeth i Glasgow. I muri iho ka toro atu a ia ki ngā hōia e whakatū ana i tētahi pokapū werohanga i te takiwā o Castlemilk o te taone, ā, ka haere ki te wheketere kano ārai mate o Valneva i Livingston. E tūmanakohia ana kia tukuna e te wheketere e 60 miriona ngā wero ki UK i te mutunga o te tau mēnā ka whakaaetia tana rongoā. I whakamahia e Mr Johnson te haerenga ki te tautohe ko te manakē ko te "whawhai i tēnei mate urutā me te hoki kaha ake mai" kaua e tautohetohe mō te kaupapa ture. A, ka whakamihi ia ki te "mahinga whakamīharo" a te iwi o Kotimana i roto i te "mahi ā-motu" ki te whawhai i te mate urutā. 'Kōrero taupānga mutunga kore' Ka kī te pirimia: "E whakaaro ana ahau he kōrero mutunga kore mō tētahi taupānga me te kore whakaahuatanga mārama he aha te āhuatanga ā-kaupapa i muri i taua taupānga e tino hāngai ana ināianei ki ngā māharahara o te nuinga o te iwi". I whakahē hoki a Tēnā Hōnea i te pūkete a te SNP i roto i te kāwanatanga, ā, ka tāpiri mai: "Kāore mātou i te mōhio he aha te mea ka whakaritea e te taupānga kia tutuki. " Kāore mātou i te mōhio he aha te take - he aha te mea e pā ana ki te taua, he aha e pā ana ki te Karauna, he aha te mea e pā ana ki te pauna, he aha e pā ana ki te Tari Tawahi. Kaore tētahi tangata e kōrero mai ki a mātau he aha te tikanga o te katoa." I kī atu a ia ki ngā kaipānui ko "te iwi ōrite" e hiahia ana ki te rangatiratanga "i kōrero hoki i ngā tau tata nei, i te tau 2014, he takahanga kotahi tēnei i roto i te whakatupuranga". "E hiahia ana ahau ki te whakapiri ki ā rātou kōrero i tērā wā," te kī a Tēnā Hōnea. Under the current Covid regulations, people are only able to travel between Scotland and England for essential reasons, with similar regulations also in place to stop travel across council boundaries within Scotland. I pātaitia i tana kōrero coronavirus ia rā i te Wenerei he pēhea tōna whakaaro mo te haerenga mai o te pirimia i te wā e noho ana ngā rāhuitanga haere pākaha, ka whakautua e Ms Sturgeon "kāore ia i te harikoa" mō taua mea. I tautohe a ia me ū ngā kaiārahi ki ngā ture ōrite e whakaritea ana e rātau ki te iwi whānui, ā, i whakakāhore ia i tētahi haerenga huatau ki tētahi pokapū kano ārai mate i Aberdeen mō tēnei take. Kua tohe a Downing Street he mea nui kia "kitea, kia āhei" te pirimia puta noa i te UK katoa i te wā o te taiepa. Hei urupare ki te whakahē a Ms Sturgeon, ka kī te kaikorero mana o te pirimia: "He toronga e pā ana ki a Covid ēnei. Kua kite koe i te pirimia e mahi ana i ētahi o aua mea i ngā wiki tata nei. "He mea nui kia haere tonu ia ki te tūtaki me te kite i te hunga kei mua i te hunga e whakarato ana i ngā whakamātautau, e ai ki te hunga e kaha ana ki te tuku i te mahere werohanga." Ko te haerenga o Tēnā Hōnea ki Pākehā e kitea whānuitia ana he wāhanga o tētahi "whakahāwea atahono" hei urupare ki ngā panekōrero e tohu ana i te pikinga o te tautoko mo te rangatiratanga. Heoi anō, kua huatau hoki ngā panekōrero he iti iho te manakē o te pātai rangatiratanga i tēnei wā mō te tokomaha o ngā tāngata i ētahi atu take pēnei i te taiepa, te hauora me te mātauranga. I kī te Minita o te Tari Kāpata a Michael Gove he "tika anake" te toro atu a te pirimia ki ngā tāngata i te raina o mua o te kano ārai mate kia pai ai te mahi. I kī atu a ia ki a BBC Parakuihi kua toro atu a Tēnā Hōnea ki ētahi atu tauwāhi nui i roto i te urupare taiepa o UK, pēnei i te tipu o Wrexham e hanga ana i te kano ārai mate Oxford-AstraZeneca, ka tāpiritia: "Kāore tētahi tangata e whakaaro ana he kore mana tēnā." I kī hoki te kaiārahi Mahi a Tā Keir Starmer i tāruatia e ia te haerenga. "Kei te pirimia ahau i tēnei," tana kī atu ki te Reo Irirangi o LBC. "Ko ia te pirimia o te UK. He mea nui kia haere a ia ki te kite i ngā mea e haere ana, i runga i te whenua." I te wā e tautuhi ana te kāwanatanga o Pākehā i tana tahua, e whakaahuatia ana ko te "mea nui rawa i roto i te hītori o te whakahaeretanga" i muri i te nui o te whakapau moni hei tautoko i ngā tāngata me ngā umanga i te wā o te mate urutā. He whāinga mārama tā Boris Johnson i tana haerenga ki Pākehā - ki te kōrero i tāna e kīia nei ko te mana o te mahi tahi puta noa i te UK. I kākahu ia i te koti taiwhanga mā me ngā taonga ārai, i hari ia ki te kōrero mai ki a au me pēhea te tautoko a te kāwanatanga o UK i te whawhai ki te coronavirus i Pākehā. Kei roto i tērā ko te whakapau moni nui ki te tautoko i ngā mahi me ngā umanga, te hanga i ngā pokapū whakamātautau, me te tiki i ngā taonga kano ārai mate mai i ngā kamupene pēnei i tana toronga i Livingston. Engari anei te kupu taurangi. Ahakoa he aha te mahi a te pirimia, kei te whai rānei ngā kāwanatanga o UK me Pākehā i ngā rautaki Covid ōrite - e mōhio ana te iwi whānui i Pākehā kei te pai ake te whakahaere a Nicola Sturgeon me tana tīma i te urupare taiepa. He tautohetohe tēnei haerenga nā te mea i pā mai i te wā o te raka, engari i haere tonu nā te mea e mōhio ana te kāwanatanga o UK ki te nui o ngā mahi hei whakarite i te uniana i Pākehā, me te pōti Pākehā i te wā o Me i te wā ka puta te pātai o te indyref2 ki mua. I te Rātapu, ka whakaaturia e te SNP tētahi "mahere huarahi ki tētahi taupānga" i runga i te rangatiratanga o Pākehā, e tautuhi ana me pēhea te rōpū e whakamua ana i tana kaupapa mō tētahi atu pōti mo taua take. E kī ana ka tū he "taupānga ā-ture" i muri i te taiepa mēnā he nuinga rangatiratanga i Holyrood i muri i te pōtitanga o Me. E kī ana hoki ka "tūkaha te whakahē" i tētahi wero ture mai i te kāwanatanga o UK. Kua rite tonu te kōrero a Tēnā Hōnea i tōna ātete ki tētahi taupānga, ā, kua huatau kia kaua tētahi atu e puritia mo te 40 tau. Kua whakapaea hoki e ngā rōpū ātete i Pākehā a Ms Sturgeon me te SNP ki te pana i te rangatiratanga i mua i te taiepa Covid. Engari i kī te kaiārahi tuarua o SNP, a Keith Brown, ko te haerenga a te pirimia he whakaaturanga kei roto a ia i te "mauri" mo te āhua o tētahi atu taupānga.

title: I rāhuitia te kānga GM i ruia i Tiamana
summary: Kua ruia pokanoatia tētahi momo kānga kua whakakētia ā-ira (GM) i rāhuitia i te EU puta noa i Tiamana.
text: Kua whakatōkia te momo NK603 ki ngā kāwanatanga e whitu. I karangatia e te kaiwhakarato kākano, ko Pioneer Kia ora-Bred, te taumata tāhaetanga "meneti". Kāore i te mārama he pēhea te putanga o te hē, engari ka pau pea i nga kaiahuwhenua e hia miriona hōro, i te mea me whakangaro nga kai ināianei. Ināianei kei te arotake te EU i ōna ture iti mo te mahinga o ngā hua GM. E kī ana a Pioneer Kia ora-Bred, e noho ana i Buxtehude tata ki Hamburg, kua whakatōia a NK603 ki runga i "i raro noa iho i te 2,000 heketea (4,940 eka)" o te whenua. Na te rōpū taiao o Greenpeace i whakanui te rohe ki te 3,000 heketea. Ko Bavaria, Baden-Wuerttemberg me Lower Saxony i waenganui i ngā kāwanatanga i ruia ai. E tautohe ana ngā kaitautoko o ngā hua GM e tuku ana i ngā hua nui ake me te ātete ki ngā kirearea, e hiahia ana kia iti iho te maniua me ngā pareketo. E kī ana ngā hoariri e hiahiatia ana ētahi atu raraunga pūtaiao, e kī ana ka tūkino pea tō rātou pānga iranga mo te wā roa ki te tangata me te kararehe. E kī ana hoki rātau ka taea e ngā hua GM te tomo noa ki te mekameka kai mēnā he whakawhitiwhiti noa iho ki ngā momo GM-kore. E kī ana a Greenpeace e mōhio ana ngā mana mō te tāhaetanga i te tōmua o Poutāpeta, engari nā te takaware takawaenga o ngā kaiahuwhenua ināianei kei te whakatūpatotia. "Koinei te heitara poro GM nui rawa atu i Tiamana i tēnei wā," te kī a tētahi tohunga ahuwhenua o Greenpeace, a Alexander Hissting. Ko te parau i ngā pārae pāngia, tae atu ki te 0.1% o te poro kua tāhaetia ki te NK603 - e ōrite ana ki te 100 ngā tipu tāhae mō ia heketea, e kī ana a Greenpeace. Kia ora e tautohetohe ana a Pioneer i taua whika. I kī atu te kaikorero o te kamupene o Maika Hall ki te AO ko te taumata o NK603 i kitea i roto i te "kākano taketake" ko te 0.03%. "E kore rawa e taea te whakataki GM. Ko ngā mea katoa i raro iho i te 0.1% tērā pea he tōrunga hē, e kore e taea te ine pūtaiao," tana kī. "I mua i to rātau kitenga i te nui o te rehu, ka tangohia e mātau te kākano i te mākete. I tēnei take ka kōrero mai rātau ki a mātau i muri i te whakatōnga." I kī a Stefanie Becker, te kaikorero mō te Manatu Taiao o Lower Saxony, "me parau ngā pārae i mua i te puawai kānga - ka taea tonu te whakatū i te horahanga kāore i te whakahaeretia [o te momo GM]". I kī a ia kāore tana minita i whiwhi taipitopito mō te tuaritanga o te kānga GM tae noa ki tērā Paraire. "Kei a mātau ngā ingoa o ngā kaiwhakanoa, ā, mā rātou ka whakamōhiotia ngā kaiahuwhenua," tana kī atu ki te HAU. I kī a Ms Becker i pā te tāhaetanga ki te 2,000 heketea, ā, i takea mai i ngā pēke kākano e rua. Kāore anō kia mārama he pēhea te whāranu o ngā kākano, ka kī a ia. I wehea e EU i tēnei wā, e rua anake ngā hua GM i whakaaetia e te EU kia mahia - te kānga MON 810 a Monsanto me tētahi momo rīwai i hauhaketia mō te māngaro. Engari ko Tiamana, pēnei i ētahi atu whenua EU, i whakakore i te MON 810 i tērā tau. Kua wehea ngā āhuatanga mema EU ki runga i ngā hua GM. Ka tū te whakatō GM arumoni i Paniora, Potukara me te Whenua o Taikarowākia. Engari ko Wīwī, Tiamana, Ateria me Kariki i waenganui i ngā kāwanatanga maha kua whakakore i te MON 810. Ko te kānga GM kua horapa ki Tiamana "ehara i te kino ki te hauora tangata, kararehe rānei", te kī a Ms Becker. Kei te whakatikatika te Kōmihana o Ūropi i ngā ture mō ngā hua GM, ā, ka whakaaturia he tono hōu a tērā marama e āhei ai ngā kāwanatanga mema kia nui ake te wāteatanga ki te whakaae, ki te whakakore rānei i ngā momo GM. Ka whakaaetia ngā whenua ki te tautuhi i ā rātou ake paerewa hangarau mō te pāmu GM, tae atu ki ngā rohe pūreirei hei ārai i te haehaetanga whakawhiti. Ka hiahiatia tonutia e ngā ture hōu te whakaaetanga a ngā kāwanatanga EU me te Pāremata o Ūropi.

title: Whakatūpato pepeke ki ngā ākonga o te Whare Wānanga o Cambridge
summary: Kua whakatūpatotia ngā tauira o te whare wānanga kia mātakitaki i "ngā mahi huhu rerekē" i waenganui i ngā māharahara mō tētahi "whakaekenga" o ngā kararehe rererangi.
text: Ko te nekehanga a ngā kaimahi tiaki whare i Te Kāreti o Downing kua tapaina ko "mothwatch" e ngā ākonga i Cambridge. I whakatūpato tētahi īmēra mō "te iti o ngā take e pā ana ki te pepeke" me te kī "he tohetohe te whakaekenga". Heoi anō, i tāpiritia e te īmēra te "purehurehu nui tauhira e karapoti ana i te pūrama kāore e taea te pūrongo i tēnei take". I korerotia ki ngā ākonga ka "whakamihia" to rātau "whakatūpato". Ko te īmēra, i whakairihia ki tētahi rōpū Facebook, he tini ngā tākupu me ngā meme "huhu riri". He tokomaha ngā tāngata i kōrero mō ngā huhu e whakangaro ana i ngā kāpeti me ngā kākahu o ō rātou whānau. 'Mothwatch trauma stories' I tuhituhi tētahi: "Kei te tata tonu ahau ki te puru i ngā tautau ārai ki roto i taku kākahu, ā, e huatau ana ahau kia ōrite te mahi a ngā tāngata katoa i Downing." I kī tētahi atu: "Kāore au i Kemipiri, ā, e whakaaro ana ahau kei te whakaekea ahau." I tāpiritia e tētahi atu tauira moth-phobic: "Kāore au e pūrongo ki te kāreti. E mahi ana ahau i ōku raruraru i a au anō e hāparangi ana." Na tētahi tangata māia i huatau kia hokona e ngā tāngata ā rātou "pūrākau trauma mothwatch" ki te nūpepa ākonga. I kī te aroha o Dorset, Butterfly Conservation: "Kei te raruraru ngā pepeke o UK me te maha o ngā momo pūnoa e raruraru ana i te aroaro o te ngaromanga o te wāhi noho me te huringa āhuarangi". I tāpiritia he rite tonu te "pōhēhētanga" o ngā pepeke, engari "he mahi nui tā rātou i roto i te haehaetanga... he wāhanga matua o te mekameka kai... ā, i te nuinga o te wā ka taea te patu i ngā pepe i roto i ngā tūnga ātaahua." Kāore te Whare Wānanga o Cambridge i hiahia ki te kōrero mō te "mothwatch".

title: Ka whakarite a Ikea ki te whakakore i ngā kirihou whakamahi-kotahi i te tau 2020
summary: E kī ana te toa hokohoko o Huitene o Ikea ka mutu te hoko i ngā hua kirihou whakamahi kotahi i te tau 2020.
text: E kī ana ka pā te ārai puta noa i ōna pātaka huri noa i te ao. E kī ana a Ikea ā muri ake nei, ka hoahoa i ngā hua kia taea ai te tapi, te hoko anō, te tukurua rānei. Ka kaha tōna nekehanga i runga i te rekereke o tētahi pānuitanga a te Uniana o Ūropi e whakaaro ana ki te whakakore i ngā tūemi kirihou tae atu ki ngā kakau witi, ngā pihi miro, ngā tapahi, ngā rākau pūangi me ngā whakaoho inu. Ka tino tūkino pea ngā kirihou whakamahi-kotahi ki te oranga moana. He wāhanga te nekehanga o tana mahere ki te hoahoa i ngā hua katoa o Ikea me te whāinga kia whakamahi i ngā rauemi whakahou me te tukurua anake, kia taea ai te kohu kore i te tau 2025. Ka whakanuia hoki te maha o ngā kai mīti kore me ngā kai kai i roto i ōna wharekai. I kī a Torbjorn Loof, te rangatira nui o Inter Ikea Group: "Mā tō mātou rahi me tō mātou toro atu ka whai wāhi mātou ki te whakaaweawe me te whakahohe i ngā tāngata neke atu i te kotahi miriona kia ora pai ake, i roto i ngā tepe o te aorangi. " E tino ū ana mātou ki te ārahi i te mahi tahi me te katoa - mai i ngā kaiwhakarato rauemi mata tae noa ki ā mātou kiritaki me ō mātou hoa."

title: Ko ngā tūmanako kai me te inu mō te ōhanga o Dumfries me Galloway
summary: Kua whakaahuatia te wāhanga kai me te inu i te tonga ki te uru o Pākehā hei "mīhini" o te whakahaerenga o te rohe.
text: Na Giancarlo RinaldiSouth Scotland reporter, te paetukutuku rongokōrero o TE Pākehā e whakaarotia ana kia whakamahia e tata ana ki te 14,000 ngā tāngata i Dumfries me Galloway me te huinga ā-tau o te £1.29bn. E hāngai ana ki te rautaki ā-motu Ambition 2030 ināianei e tūmanako ana kia tāruatia taua uara i roto i ngā tau e 12 e whai ake nei. Engari he aha te whakaaro o te rohe e āhei ai ia ki te kite i tētahi whakawhānuitanga nui me te āwhina ki te whakarewa i te tāpoi me te āhua o te mahi whānui ake? I kī a Andrew Wood, te kaiwhakahaere tuarua o te komiti whakahaere, taiao me te hanganga o te kaunihera, he kaitākaro nui te rohe i te wāhanga. "Ko Dumfries me Galloway kē tētahi o ngā rohe whakanao kai tino hira o Pākehā, neke atu i te 40% o te miraka kau o Pākehā, ā, neke atu i te 20% o ngā mīti whero o te iwi i hangaia i konei," tana kī. "He maha hoki ngā kaiwhakanao nunui e whakarato ana i ngā mahi whai hua i roto i ngā hapori pēnei i Kirkconnel, Stranraer, Lockerbie, Castle Douglas me Annan. " He wāhanga tohunga tino pai tā mātou, he nui haere ngā wheako tāpoi kai me ngā hākari, me tētahi whatunga rangatira o ngā wharekai me ngā wharekai takitahi e whakaata ana i te tuku iho kai paetata o ō rātou ake hapori." I te whakanui i te kai a Lorna Young, o te tinana umanga DG Kai me te Inu, i kī: "E mārama ana ka whai wāhi nui te ngātahitanga ki te whakatipu i te ōhanga o to mātau rohe. " Tērā pea neke atu i ētahi atu rohe i Pākehā, he tino piri te hononga o ngā mahi kai me te inu me ngā mahi tāpoi a Dumfries me Galloway. "So we look forward to exploring how these two industries can work together to make the most of the rapid growth in the food tourism sector, as initiatives like the Stranraer Oyster Festival and Castle Douglas Food Town are already doing." Ko ngā mākete kaiahuwhenua Ko te rangatira pakihi kai iti ko Sarah Burchell e pāmu ana i te poaka me te tītī kāinga me tana tāne ko Steve, kātahi ka hokona hāngai ki ngā mākete kaiahuwhenua tae atu ki Kirkcudbright me Edinburgh's Castle Terrace. I āwhina hoki a ia ki te whakawhitiwhiti i te mākete kaiahuwhenua o Dumfries ki te teihana rerewhenua o te taone. "E whakaatu ana a mātau mākete kaiahuwhenua i te tauine moroiti i te pānga o te ngātahitanga, te tohutohu me tētahi ahurea tautoko, whai rawa hoki ki te tupu pakihi," tana kī. "Ko te umanga kai me te inu katoa, mai i te kaiwhakanao me te kaiwhakatipu tae atu ki te kaihoko me te kaihoko, e whakawhirinaki ana ki ngā mekameka whakarato me te ngātahitanga me ētahi atu. " I'm looking forward to our industry pulling together, to address challenges and identify opportunities to help us all reap the benefit." Tūranga wharekai "Ka whai hua tō mātou rohe i te maha o ngā wharekai paetata tino pai, e whakahaeretia ana e ngā kaitao e mārama ana ki te hiranga o te kounga me te whakaata i te māori o tō mātou rohe i roto i ngā tahua," te kī a Russell Pearce, te rangatira kaitao o Brodies of Moffat. "Ko te umanga manaaki he waahanga tino nui o te waahanga kai me te inu, otira ki te mahi i nga hiahia o nga manuhiri ki to maatau rohe. " Mō te tokomaha o ngā manuhiri ka waiho e ngā tahua i roto i ngā wharekai, wharekai me ngā hōtēra he ariā mau tonu ki te kounga o te wheako tāpoi, nā reira he mea nui kia tika tātau." Follow the money Launching the growth target, Archie Dryburgh, who chairs the council's economy, environment and infrastructure committee, said: "Growing our local food and drink economy is a critically-important part of securing an ambitious and resilient economic future for our region. " Our council has committed to support our region's food and drink industry throughout the duration of this administration. "Heoi anō, mēnā e hiahia ana tātau ki te wetemaukati i te kaha ohaoha o tō tātau rohe, me tīmata tātau ki tō tātau wāhanga ohaoha tino nui."

title: Coronavirus: E rua ngā wāhi kua pāngia
summary: Ko nga waahanga tino ngaro o Ingarangi me Wales kua rua nga wa i pa ki te coronavirus i nga rohe rangatira, i kii te Office for National Statistics.
text: Nā Rahera SchraerHealth kaipānui i tino kino ake te pānga o ngā wāhi taone i ngā wāhi taone. Ā, he nui ake ngā mate o Rānana i te coronavirus mō ia 100,000 tāngata i tētahi atu rohe. Ko ngā pāpātanga mate he "teitei ake i ngā wāhi tangohia" me te āhua nei kei te "whakanui ake i tēnei pānga", te kī a tētahi tatauranga ONS. I Ingarangi, ina whakatika koe mō te pakeke o te iwi whānui, e 128 ngā mate e pā ana ki te Covid-19 mō ia 100,000 tāngata i roto i te iwi whānui i ngā wāhi tino rawakore. Ko ngā wāhi iti rawa i kitea he iti iho i te haurua o taua mokatere (60 mate mō ia 100,000) i Poutāpeta, Aperira me Mei. E hia ngā mate e pā ana ki te coronavirus i tō rohe? Tāurua tō waehere poutāpeta Ingarihi, Welsh rānei, hei tauira 'W1A 1AA' Pānui tūmataitingaKa whakamahia e te BBC te waehere poutāpeta ka tāurutia e koe ki konei hei whakarato i ngā raraunga mō ngā mate coronavirus mō tō rohe. Kāore mātou e tukatuka i ētahi atu raraunga, ā, kāore ngā mōhiohio whāiti e tukuna ana e koe e tautohu i a koe. Ko te mahere me ngā raraunga mō ngā mate e whakaratohia ana e te Office for National Statistics (ONS). Kāore te BBC, te ONS rānei e penapena i tēnei raraunga waehere poutāpeta, i ētahi atu mōhiohio whaiaro rānei mai i tēnei mahere. Kei konei te Kaupapahere Tūmataitinga ONS katoa, ahakoa kua tangohia ngā pihikete me ngā kohinga raraunga katoa mō ngā tātaritanga i whakahuatia i roto i taua kaupapahere mai i tēnei mahere. Mēnā he pātai āu e pā ana ki te tukatuka raraunga a te HAU, pānuitia koa tā mātou Kaupapahere Tūmataitinga me ngā Pihikete.Ngā tuhipoka mahere1. Ka whakatakotoria ngā ira i runga i te mahere ki waenganui o te rohe paetata e tohu ana, ā, kāore e whakaatu i te tauwāhi tūturu o ngā mate. E ōrite ana te rahi o te porohita ki te maha o ngā mate2. Hei pare i te matatapu, he iti noa iho ngā mate kua tohaina i waenganui i ngā wāhi noho tata3. Ko ngā mate i puta i waenganui i te 1 o Poutūterangi 2020 me te 31 Mei 2020, ā, i rēhitatia i te 6 o Pipiri 20204. Ko ngā whika e aukati ana i te matenga o ngā tangata kore, ā, i runga anō i ngā rohenga o Me 20205. Ko te Coronavirus (COVID-19) te take taketake, i whakahuatia rānei i runga i te tiwhikete mate hei take āwhina (waehere ICD-10 U07.1 me U07.2)6. Locally adopted MSOA names are provided by House of Commons Library. Ahakoa kāore ēnei ingoa i te tautokona tika mō ngā Tatauranga ā-Motu, ka whakaratohia ki konei hei āwhina i ngā kaiwhakamahi paetata7. He tauwhāiti ngā whika. Ki te kore koe e kite i te mahere, pāwhiri ki konei. Mō ētahi atu taipitopito mō te mahere, panuku ki raro o tēnei whārangi, tirohia rānei te putanga ONS katoa i konei. Ko te pānga taone i Wales i kitea he tauira ōrite, me te mokatere o te 110 mate coronavirus mō ia 100,000 i ngā wāhi tino rawakore - tata ki te rua o te 58 mate mō ia 100,000 i ngā wāhi tino rangatira. Tērā anō tētahi hononga mārama i waenga i te mate coronavirus me te kaha o te noho o tētahi rohe. I waenganui i Poutāpeta me Mei, ko ngā wāhi tino hanga, i whakawāteatia hei "conurbations nui taone", pēnei i Greater Manchester me te West Midlands, i pā ki te 124 mate Covid-19 mō ia 100,000 tāngata. I tua atu, puta noa i "ngā tāone taone, taone rānei", pēnei i Preston me Brighton, e 74 ngā mate Covid mō ia 100,000 tāngata. I whakahekea tēnei ki te 48 i ngā kāinga tawhiti me te 23 mō ia 100,000 i ngā wāhi takitahi o Ingarangi me Weera. I te nuinga o te wā, ko te nui ake o ngā tāngata e whakapā atu ana ki a rātou anō i tētahi wāhi, ka pai ake te horapa o te mate. Tērā anō pea ētahi īnaki ki te pānga rawakore. 'Te whakawhāiti i te āputa' I te whakaaturanga coronavirus o ia rā i te Paraire, ka kī te kaiwhakahaere rongoā ā-motu o NHS Ingarangi he maha ngā take mōrearea ka taea te whakanui ake i te mōrea o Covid-19 - pēnei i te mate huka, te momona me te mate pūkahukahu - ka kitea "auau ake i ngā wāhi tango". I tāpiri mai a Prof Stephen Powis: "He tino nui kia whakawhāititia e tātau te āputa i roto i ngā rerekētanga hauora." I kī atu te Hēkeretari Waka a Grant Shapps ki te kōrero kua "whakatapua" te kāwanatanga ki te whiu i te hauora - me ētahi atu - rerekētanga. I 'whakanuia' te pānga rawakore E iwa o ngā mana ā-rohe e 10 me te tino pāpātanga mate mai i te coronavirus, i whakaritea mō te pakeke, i Rānana. Tae noa ki Mei, kua neke atu te pakarutanga i Rānana, ā, ko te rohe me te tino pakeke o te mate Covid-19 i whakaritea ko te raki ki te rāwhiti. "Ko te nuinga o te wā he teitei ake ngā pāpātanga mate whānui i ngā wāhi rawakore, engari te āhua nei kei te whakanui ake a Covid-19 i tēnei pānga," te kī a Sarah Caul, te upoko o te tātaritanga mate o te ONS. "Ahakoa ko Rānana ētahi o ngā pāpātanga mate Covid-19 teitei rawa atu i te whenua i te wā o Poutāpeta me Aperira, ināianei kei te iti iho ngā pāpātanga mate i whakaritea ki te nuinga o ngā wāhi." Ngā tuhipoka i runga i te mahere

title: Ko te aranga ake o te karawaka, ko te wehi i waenganui i te coronavirus
summary: Tērā pea ka puta mai ngā tīmatanga karawaka, nā te mea me whakaroa ētahi hōtaka werohanga.
text: Nā te kaiwhakatika o Mīharo RobertsHealth, e kī ana a Hēpa Rongokōrero tuihono e 117 miriona ngā tamariki i ngā whenua e 37 kāore pea e werohia i te wā tika. He maha nga pakarutanga nui i nga whenua puta noa i Uropi i iti ai te tangohanga kano kano MMR. Kua ngaro kē i te UK tōna tūnga kore karawaka, nā te pikinga o ngā kēhi o te mate whakamate. Ka taea te ārai i te mate, e pā ana ki te mare, te kirikā me te kirikā, e rua ngā rongoā o te kano ārai mate, te karawaka, me te rubella (MMR), e wātea koreutu ana ki ngā tamariki tamariki katoa i te UK. I konei, 95% o ngā tamariki e rima tau te pakeke kua whiwhi i te wero tuatahi - te ūnga o te Whakahaere Hauora o te Ao (WHO) - engari ko te 87.4% anake kua whiwhi i te tuarua. A, i te mea he tino whakapoke te karawaka, ahakoa he iti noa iho te whakapeka o te tangohanga. E kī ana te WHO ka taea e ngā whenua kāore he tīmatanga hohe o te karawaka, te okioki rangitahi i ā rātou whakahau ārai mate mēnā e hiahiatia ana. Ā, e 24 ngā whenua, tae atu ki ētahi e pā kē ana ki ngā tīmatanga karawaka, kua whakatau kia takaware nā te taiepa coronavirus: • Bangladesh • Brazil • Bolivia • Cambodia • Chad • Chile • Colombia • Djibouti • the Dominican Republic • the Democratic Republic of Congo • Ethiopia • Honduras • Kazakhstan • Kyrgyzstan • Lebanon • Maldives • Mexico • Nepal • Nigeria • Paraguay • Somalia • South Sudan • Ukraine • Uzbekistan Engari e kī ana a Hēpa he nui ake pea ka tūpono ki ngā raruraru. "Mēnā ka mahia te kōwhiringa uaua ki te okioki i te werohanga nā te horahanga o te coronavirus, e tohutohu ana mātou i ngā kaiārahi kia whakarahi ake i ngā mahi ki te aroturuki i ngā tamariki kāore anō kia werohia kia taea ai te whakarato i ngā tāngata mōrearea ki ngā kano ārai mate karawaka," e kī ana a Spokeswoman Joanna Rea: "Mā ngā raruraru ki ngā ratonga kano ārai mate auau e whakanui ake i te mōrea o ngā tamariki e pā ana ki ngā mate whakamate,  whakawhāiti i ngā pēhanga o nāianei ki ngā ratonga hauora ā-motu, ā, ka mōrearea tētahi taiepa tuarua o ngā mate urutā." Kei te tuku tonu te UK i ngā tamariki MMR hei wāhanga o tana hōtaka kano ārai mate. I kī a Dr Mary Ramsay, te Upoko o ngā Kano Ārai Mate i Public Health England: "He tino angitu te hōtaka ārai mate ā-motu ki te ārai i ngā mate nui, ā, i ētahi wā e whakararuraru ana i te ora, pēnei i te niumonia, te meningitis, te mare whooping, te diphtheria me te karawaka. " I tēnei wā, he mea nui kia mau tonu te tangohanga kano ārai mate pai rawa atu hei ārai i te aranga ake o ēnei mate."

title: Te patunga o Kevin Nunes: E rima i whakawāteatia i te kōti pīra
summary: Tokorima nga tāngata i hereheretia mo te kōhuru rōpū rōpū kua whakawāteatia i runga i te pīra.
text: I hopukina a Kevin Nunes, e 20, he kaihoko rongoā, i te pū, a, i pūhia tūpāpaku i Staffordshire i te wā o Mahuru 2002. I kī te Ratonga Ture Karauna "kāore i whai ki te tautoko i ngā whakapae" o ngā tāngata, kāore rānei i pēhi i tētahi whakawā anō. I rongo te kōti kāore i whakaaturia ki te wawao ngā māharahara mo te whakawhirinakitanga o te kaiwhakaatu matua o te ture. E whā ngā pirihimana matua o te kāhua kawenga - tae atu ki te kātipa matua o Northamptonshire me te rangatira kātipa tuarua - e tūhuratia ana mō ngā kerēme hē e pā ana ki te tūhuratanga a ngā Pirihimana o Staffordshire ki te kōhuru. I korerotia ki nga kaiwhakawā i te Rāitema he take i waenganui i nga pirihimana tokorua i roto i te kēhi, tērā pea i whai pānga ki nga whakaaturanga i hoatu e te kaiwhakaatu. I kī te kaiwhakaatu matua, a Himiona Taylor, i te whakawātanga i kite ia i te mea i tūpono, engari mai i tērā wā ka kounu atu i ana whakaaturanga. E rima nga wā i pūhia ai a Tēnā Nunes, he kaiwhutupōro mātāmua i runga i nga pukapuka a Tottenham Hotspur, i roto i tētahi patunga kāhua kawenga i tētahi ara whenua i muri i te tapahi i te hokohoko whai hua a te rōpū e neke ana i te kokaine mai i Wolverhampton ki Aberdeen. Ko Riwai Walker, mai i Birmingham, ko Adam Joof, mai i Willenhall, West Midlands, ko Te Arawhiti, mai i Great Bridge, West Midlands, Michael Osbourne rāua ko Owen Crooks, mai i Wolverhampton, i kitea he hara ki tana kōhuru i te Kōti Karauna o Leicester i te tau 2008. I hoatu ki a rātau he utu mōkito i waenganui i te 25 me te 28 tau. Ākuanei ka tukua ngā tāngata tokowhā. Heoi anō, ka noho tonu a Walker ki te whare herehere i a ia e mahi ana i tētahi wā whare herehere mo tētahi atu kōhuru. I mātakitaki katoa rātau i tua atu i a Tēnā Crooks i nga kōrero kōti mā te hononga ataata mai i te whare herehere. I whakaūngia e te Komihana Amuamu Pirihimana Motuhake (IPCC) i a Hakihea e titiro ana ki ngā whakaaro hē e pā ana ki te tūhuratanga a te ope. Ka whai i nga tāngata e whakatakoto ana i ta rātau tono. Kei te tūhuratia te Rangatira Kātipa o Northamptonshire, a Adrian Lee me te Tuarua Rangatira Kātipa o Suzette Davenport, tae atu ki te Kaiāwhina Kāhui Matua o West Midlands, a Marcus Beale. I te wā o te uiuinga kōhuru rātau i te ope o Staffordshire. Kei te tūhuratia hoki te Kaiāwhina Rangatira Kāhui o Staffordshire, a Jane Sawyers. I uru atu a Tēnā Lee ki ngā Pirihimana o Northamptonshire i te tau 2009. Ko ia hoki te upoko o te kōpaki matatika a te Association of Chief Police Officers. I roto i tētahi kōrero, ka kī ngā Pirihimana o Staffordshire i kitea te whakataunga a te kōti pīra, engari kāore e kōrero anō nā te tūhuratanga IPCC e haere tonu ana. "Ināianei ka whakaarohia e te tōpana te whakawā o tēnei rā - me te take mo te whakataunga a te Ratonga Ture Karauna - i mua i te whakatau i te huarahi whakamua," te kī a te kaikōrero. "Kua whakaritea e mātou ngā āpiha takawaenga whānau ki te tuku tautoko ki te whānau o Tēnā Nunes me te whakamōhio atu ki a rātou." I a ia e kōrero ana i waho o te kōti, ka kī te whaea o Owen Crooks, a Jean, he "rongo tino pai" nga whakapae e whakakorea ana. "E whakaatu ana kua oti te tika."

title: Tokorua nga tāngata i whara i te whawhai tiriti o Bearwood
summary: Tokorua nga tāngata i whara i te whawhai tiriti e ono nga tāngata e mau rākau ana.
text: I kī ngā pirihimana i te whakaekenga i Bearwood Road, i Bearwood, tata ki te 12:50 BST, i kite hoki i tētahi waka i pakaru. Kāore anō kia mōhiotia te whānuitanga o nga whara o nga tāngata. I runga i te pāpāho pāpori ka whakaahuatia e tētahi kaiwhakaatu tētahi tangata e tōia ana i tētahi motokā, a, ka whakaekea ki te āhua nei he machete. I whiwhi ngā Pirihimana o West Midlands i ētahi waea 999 e pūrongo ana i te raruraru e pā ana ki ngā tāngata e mau rākau ana. Ka tohe ngā āpiha ki te tangata i kite i te riri, he mōhiohio rānei mō ngā tāngata e pā ana kia whakapā atu. Whāia a BBC West Midlands i Facebook, i Twitter, me te waitohu mō ngā whakahōutanga rongokōrero paetata hāngai tonu ki tō waea.

title: Ngā mate SAS: Kāore he māharahara o ngā rongoā i runga i te hīkoi 16 maero kino
summary: Kāore he māharahara o ngā rongoā pūkenga ki te whakarite i tētahi mahi tīpakonga SAS kino, kua rongo te kōti taua.
text: Tokorua ngā tāngata e whakahaere ana i te mahi i roto i ngā Rama Brecon e whakapaea ana ki te mahi whakarihariha. I mate a L/Cpl Edward Maher, 31, L/Cpl Craig Roberts, 24, me Cpl James Dunsby, 31, i muri i te haerenga 16 maero (26km) i a Hōngongoi 2013. E whakakāhore ana te āpiha mahi me te āpiha whakamana o mua. I pāngia a L/Cpl Roberts mai i Penrhyn Bay, i te takiwā o Conwy, me L/Cpl Maher, mai i Winchester, Hampshire, i te wera, a, ka mate i runga i te mahi. I mate a Cpl Dunsby, mai i Trowbridge, Wiltshire, i te hinganga o te okana maha, neke atu i te rua wiki i muri mai i te Hōhipera o Kuini Elizabeth i Birmingham. I te hīkoi nga kaipupuri tokotoru i runga i te whenua uaua me whakaoti i raro iho i te 8 haora me te 45 meneti i a rātau e mau ana ki te 27 kiroki (4) i runga i o rātau tuarā. He tokomaha ētahi atu hōia i mate i taua hīkoi kotahi, i tū i tētahi o ngā rā tino wera o te tau. I rongo te kōti taua i Bulford, Wiltshire, i ngā āpiha tokorua, e mōhiotia ana ko 1A me 1B anake, e whakahaere ana i ngā aromatawai mōrearea me te whakahaere i ngā kaimahi i runga i te whenua. I pātaitia tētahi rongoā e mahi ana i taua rā, e mōhiotia ana ko '1H', mehemea kei te māharahara a ia i tētahi wā. "I mōhio te katoa ka wera, engari koia anō," tana whakautu. I kī a 1H kāore i taea e ia te maumahara mēnā "i kitea" tētahi āpiha i te mahere rongoā mō taua rā, engari kua whakaritea e ia tētahi, ā, e wātea ana ki a rātau i roto i te waka tono. I whakaae hoki a ia ki te urupare a ngā ratonga ohorere kua 'āta whakaarohia' hei wāhanga o te mahere a 1B mō te mahi, tae atu ki te whakaaro i ngā wāhi e taea ai e ngā kaitono te unu. I kī atu tētahi atu rongoā, e mōhiotia ana ko 1N ki te kōti i "māia" a ia ki ngā kaha o 1B i muri i tana mātakitaki i te unuhanga o tētahi tūpāpaku i tētahi mahi tōmua, ā, i mōhiotia ana kōrero he 'whānui'. I korerotia ki te kōti mō tētahi Pāmahana Ao Pūrama Mākū (TT), e ine ana he pēhea te pānga o ngā āhuatanga āhuarangi pēnei i te hauhau ki ngā mahi, e ai ki ngā tohutohu MoD e mōhiotia ana ko JSP539. "Ko te tikanga ka tangohia te WBGT i te rā, ka whakamahia e mātou hei whakamutu i te whakangungu, hei whakaiti rānei i te whakangungu, i te rāwhiti rānei e kōrerorerotia ana. He pūnaha whakatūpato wawe tēnei," te kī a 1H ki te kōti. I rongo te kōti i mua kāore i a 1A me 1B te mana ki te huri i te ara o te mahi i taua rā, engari ka taea te whakamutu mēnā i whakaaro rātau kua mōrearea rawa. I huatau mai a Māti Sherratt QC, i te wā i whakamōhiotia e ngā rongoā tētahi ki ngā pānuitanga WBGT mō te mahi mā tētahi rōpū WhatsApp i runga i ā rātou waea pūkoro, kāore ngā mōhiohio i tukuna atu ki 1A, 1B rānei. "Ko te nuinga nā te mea kei te whakahaere te wae auau ārahi i te taha o mātau, nā reira mēnā he raruraru ka kī mai te rongoā ki a mātau." Ka urupare a 1H.

title: E tū ana a Rawiri Karauna i te taha o te kī taurangi utu pūngao 'iti rawa'
summary: Kua tohe a Rawiri Karauna kia whakahaua ngā whare pūngao ki te hoatu i ngā kiritaki "te utu iti rawa" i a ia e rapu ana ki te whakawātea i te mārō i runga i te kaupapahere pūngao.
text: Kāore anō kia whakatauria ngā taipitopito tūturu me pēhea tēnei e tutuki ai, i te Pire Pūngao o tērā marama. Engari e kī ana a Downing Street i ngā rōpū kiritaki me ngā kamupene pūngao SSE me Ovo e tautoko ana i te kaupapahere. E whakatūpato ana ētahi rōpū pakihi ka tūkino pea i te whakataetae, ā, ka nui ake hoki ngā utu. I muri i te 24 haora o te mārō i te wāhi e tū ana te kāwanatanga, me te whakapae a Labour i ngā minita ki te maka i te kaupapa pūngao ki te "ngangau". I te wā o ngā Pātai a te Pirimia i te Wenerei, ka pānuitia e Tēnā Karauna tētahi pānui ohorere e kī ana ki te whakamana ture "kia hoatu ai e ngā kamupene pūngao te utu iti rawa ki ā rātou kiritaki". I kī nga whare pūngao matua kāore rātau i mōhio ki te kaupapa - ki te whakaaro rānei a te kāwanatanga kia whakaurua ki roto i te ture. Te āhua nei ka tawhiti atu te Hēkeretari Pūngao o Ed Davey i a ia i te kaupapa, ā, ka kī a Downing Street ka herea anake ngā whare pūngao ki te "tuku" i ngā utu tino pai rawa. I kī te minita pūngao a John Hayes, i karangatia ki te Commons ki te whakawātea i te mārō, he maha ngā kōwhiringa e whakaarotia ana. I roto i ēnei he arotakenga mēnā me "herea" ngā whakaaetanga tūturu i mahia e ngā kamupene pūngao i Aperira mā te ture. "He wāhi uaua tēnei, ā, ka kōrerorerotia e mātou ki te umanga, ngā rōpū kiritaki me te kaiwhakarite kia taea ai te mahi i ngā taipitopito," te kī a Tēnā Hayes. Engari i te taenga atu ki tētahi tihi EU i Pōroa, ka tū a Tēnā Karauna i ana kōrero, ka kī atu ki ngā kaipānui: "E hiahia ana ahau ki te noho i te taha o ngā whānau mahi uaua e uaua ana ki te utu i ngā pire pūngao. " Koia ahau i kī ai i te Whare o Ngātahi inanahi ka whakamahia e mātou te ture e haere mai nei - te Pire Pūngao e haere mai ana i tēnei tau - kia tino mōhio ai mātou ka whiwhi ngā kiritaki i ngā utu iti rawa." I roto i tana kōrero ki ngā MP, ka kī a Tēnā Hayes e hiahiatia ana e te kāwanatanga he pātahitanga "pakari" ki ngā whare pūngao nunui e ono, ā, ka mahia e ia ngā "hipanga tika kia whiwhi ai te tangata i te mahi tino pai". I kī te hēkeretari pūngao kōruru o Caroline Flint kua makaia e Tēnā Karauna te kaupapa pūngao ki te "mōrearea", nā reira i "ngangau" ai te umanga pūngao. I kī atu a Angela Knight, te rangatira nui o te Energy UK - te pāhonotanga hokohoko mō te wāhanga pūngao - ki a BBC News kua ohorere te umanga i te pānuitanga a te PM, ā, he nui ake te māramatanga i hiahiatia ki te tūnga o te kāwanatanga. I kī a ia kua haere kē te umanga mā te whakamōhio atu i "ngā utu ngāwari e mārama ana, he iti ake ngā utu me te āwhina i ngā tāngata me pēhea e mōhio ai rātou ko tēhea e tika ana mō rātou". I whakatūpato ngā rōpū pakihi ki te whakahau i ngā kamupene kia hoatu ki ngā kiritaki ngā utu tino iti rawa ka tūkino pea i te whakataetae i te mākete. I kī te tumuaki tuarua o te CD o Neil Bentley "ngā pūrākau whakamataku" mō te tukutahi a te kāwanatanga ki te mākete pūngao ka taea te "waihanga i ētahi atu rangirua mō ngā kamupene e kimi ana ki te haumi i te UK". Engari rōpū kiritaki Ko tēhea? Ka tohe ki a Tēnā Karauna kia "whakapiri ki te kī taurangi" i mahia e ia i te Pāremata. "Kāore i te nui te hoatu mōhiohio ki ngā tāngata mō te utu iti rawa ina iti rawa te whakawhirinaki i roto i te umanga, ā, kei te hinga ngā taumata whakawhiti," Ko tēhea? ka mea. I kī a Greenpeace ināianei ko te kaupapahere pūngao a te kāwanatanga ināianei he "whakararuraru ki ngā utu Korohū o Ingarangi" ā, me nui ake te mahi a te UK hei whakaiti i tōna whakawhirinakitanga ki te korohū. I raro i tēnei whakaritenga tūturu, ka whakaae ngā kaiwhakarato pūngao matua e ono ki te whakapā atu ki ngā kiritaki kotahi i te tau ki te kōrero ki a rātou he aha te utu tino pai mō rātou, me pēhea hoki te tiki me te whakapā atu ki ngā kiritaki e haere mai ana ki te mutunga o tētahi kirimana wā pūmau me ngā tohutohu ōrite.

title: Groundhog Day musical to have world premiere at Old Vic
summary: Ko tētahi pūoro atamira hou o Groundhog Day ka whakaatuhia tōna tuatahi o te ao i te Old Vic i Rānana a tērā tau.
text: Nā Tim MastersArts me te korero whakangahau i runga anō i te pikitia kōrero kōrero o te tau 1993 me Bill Murray, ka whakahaeretia te whakaaturanga e te rangatira hou o Old Vic, a Matthew Warchus. Ko ētahi atu whakatangi i tōna wā tuatahi ko te The Master Builder a Ibsen, e hāngai ana ki a Ralph Fiennes, me te The Caretaker a Pinter, me Timoti Spall. Kei te tango a Warchus i a Kevin Spacey, te kaiwhakahaere toi o Old Vic mo te 11 tau. I kī a ia i tōna wā tuatahi - kei roto hoki tētahi urutaunga atamira o Dr Seuss's The Lorax me tētahi whakanaotanga kanikani o Jekyll me Hyde - e whakaata ana i tētahi huarahi "mō te katoa". E whai ana a ia ki te whakapiki ake i te maha o ngā whakanaotanga i ia tau mā ngā whakahaere poto ake, ā, e tūmanako ana kia toru, e whā rānei ka whakawhiti ki te West End, ka haere hāngai rānei ki Broadway mā tētahi mahi ngātahi hou me ngā kaiwhakarato ingoa nui, ko Scott Rudin rāua ko Sonia Friedman. Ka whakakotahitia e te Rā Groundhog a Warchus me te tokotoru o te tīma auaha i muri i te pūoro pūoro o Matilda - te kaitito me te kaiwaiata o Tim Minchin, te koreographer Peter Darling, me te kaihoahoa o Rob Howell - māna e mahi tahi me te kaituhi tahi o te pikitia, o Danny Rubin. E kōrero ana i te pūrākau o te kairangi pouaka whakaata pukupuku o Phil Connors e tonoa ana ki te taone iti o Punxsutawney, Pennsylvania, ā, ka mau ki tētahi koromeke wā, me noho tonu i taua rā kotahi. 'Broadway classic' I roto i tētahi uiuinga ki te BBC, i whakaahuatia e Warchus te whakaaturanga hei "tauhira Broadway mātauranga" e tino pai ana mō te Old Vic. "E hiahiatia ana he hunga nui me tētahi atamira nui, ā, i hiahia ahau ki te tīmata i tēnei whenua, nā reira ko te ōrite tino pai." I tāpiritia e ia nā te pikitia a ia i kata, i tangi hoki. "He iti rawa te wā e noho ana koe hei putanga tino pai rawa atu i a koe anō. He mea mīti mātauranga i roto i tētahi mōkī kōrero mārena." Ka tīmata i te Pipiri 2016 i mua i te haerenga ki Broadway. Ko te whakatuwheratanga o te wā hou i te wā o Mahuru ko Future Conditional, nā Tamsin Oglesby, he whakatangi hou i tautuhia i tētahi kura e whakaatu ana i a Rob Brydon hei kaiako me ngā kaiako e 23 "kaiwhakatū rangatahi" hei karaehe māna. Mā Warchus e whakahaere. Ka whaia tērā i Whiringahora e te whakaari Amerika a Eugene O'Neill The Hairy Ape, i toroa e Rārangi Jones. Ka whakahaere hoki a Warchus i te Kaihanga Matua, me Ralph Fiennes hei kaihoahoa o Halvard Solness i roto i tētahi urutaunga hou a David Hare, ā, ko Timoti Spall hoki i roto i te tauhira o Harold Pinter i te tau 1960 The Caretaker. Ko ngā mahere mō ngā wā e heke mai nei ko te whakaoranga tuatahi o Toi a Yasmina Reza, he whakanaotanga huritau 50 o Rosencrantz me Guildenstern Are Dead na Tom Stoppard, me tētahi pūoro hou i runga anō i te pikitia 2014 Pride, mō tētahi rōpū kaiwhaiwhai tāne me ngā kaiwhaiwhai wahine i tautoko i ngā kaikari i ngā tau kotahi mano e waru tekau mā rua, nā Warchus i whakahaere. Kei te whakamōhio hoki a Warchus i tētahi aronui tīkiti hōu, ā, ka wātea te hawhe o ngā tūru katoa i ngā arokite tuatahi e rima o ia whakanaotanga mō te £10. "Ehara i te mea mo te rangatahi anake," te kī a Warchus. "Ka ngana mātou ki te ārahi, ki te tute rānei i aua tīkiti ki ngā tāngata he kaihaere whare tapere hou."

title: Ka taea e ngā minita te rapu moni £245,000 mai i te umanga nūpepa
summary: Tērā pea ka rapu te Kāwanatanga o Welsh ki te whakahoki mai i tētahi moni e £245,000 ki te pokapū whakanao o tētahi umanga nūpepa e kati ana ināianei.
text: I kī atu te Minita Tuatahi o Carwyn Jones ki ngā AM ka titiro ngā minita ki te whakahoki moni mēnā kāore i tutuki ngā here e āpiti ana ki te pūtea ki Newsquest. The grant was given on condition 50 jobs were created and 15 were safeguarded, with all remaining in place by 2020. E £340,000 te tapeke o te tautoko i hoatu ki te kaupapa o Newport. I te tau 2013, i whakatuwheratia e Newsquest, ko ōna pepa ko te South Wales Argus o Newport, te pokapū whakatika-iti i te tau 2013. I tōna taumata, neke atu i te 70 ngā tāngata i whakamahia e te wae, he rauemi whakatika-iti i tuhia e ngā kaipānui mai i ngā nūpepa 100 ia rā, ia wiki hoki puta noa i te UK. After two rounds of job cuts in 2016, the hub will now close in April, with work moving to Weymouth, Dorset. I pātaitia mō te take a Tory AM, i te Senedd, ka kī a Tēnā Jones kua hipa atu te ūnga mahi. Engari i tāpiritia e ia mēnā kāore i tutuki ngā here āwhina "ka titiro mātou ki te whakahoki i te moni".

title: E kore te PM 'e patu' i te ūnga kāinga hōu kotahi miriona
summary: Ka hoatu e Ēnā Me ngā whare utu ōrau ki te ngākau o tana "tukunga" ki ngā kaipōti i a ia e noho ana hei pirimia.
text: Ko te ūnga a te kāwanatanga ko te kotahi miriona kāinga hou i te tau 2020 editor@bbckamalon te ūnga a te kāwanatanga; ko te tautohetohe ka nui ake te putanga ka whakahekea ngā utu. Engari e kī ana te upoko o tētahi o ngā kaihanga whare nui rawa o UK, o Berkeley Homes, tērā pea ka hapa te ūnga. E hiahiatia ana he huringa toitū hei whakarewa i te mokatere hanga hou o nāianei ki runga ake i te 170,000 ia tau, e kī ana a Rob Perrins. I taku pātaitanga ki a ia mehemea ka patua te ūnga, he kaha tana whakautu. "Ko te whakautu ko te kāo, ā, ka mīharo ehara te whakautu i te whakaritenga," tana kī. "Tērā ētahi whakahōu tino pai i roto i te whakarite i ngā tau tata nei. [Heoi anō] e toru ngā take e kore ai rātau e tuki ki te ūnga. "Tuatahi, kāore i te nui te whenua e rite ana mō te whanaketanga. " Tērā, kei te UK te tāke āhuatanga tiketike rawa o te ao. Ā, ka mahi hei whakararuraru ki te hanga me te neke o te tangata. "A, i te tuatoru, kāore au i te whakapono he take tōrangapū e toru o runga. Ā, kāore he mea hira ake mō te hunga i raro iho i te 30 i te whakatau i te raruraru whare," te tāpiri mai a Tēnā Perrins. I kī a ia me tino nui te take a te kāwanatanga ki te pūtea i te Ratonga Hauora o te Motu. I uiuia e au a Tēnā Perrins i te pānga o Kidbrooke i te tonga-rāwhiti o Rāwāhi, kei reira a Berkeley Homes e hanga ana i ngā kāinga hou e 4,500 - 1,500 o ēnei he kāinga "utu utu" māmā ake. Ko te pānga o Kidbrooke te raruraru whare o Ingarangi i roto i te moroiti. I ngā tau o te tau 1960, i huaina taua rohe ko te Ferrier Estate, he ngahere whakapōrearea o te raima tōmua kua hinga. In the 1990s, the local council, Greenwich - which Mr Perrins describes as one of the best when it comes to backing housing development - starting planning to redevelop the site. E 10 tau te roa ki te whakatutuki i tētahi "whakaaetanga whanaketanga" mō te rohe, i hainatia i te tau 2007. E 800 ngā "herenga" e āpiti ana ki te whakaaetanga whakarite, mai i te momo rauemi hanga e whakamahia ana, ki te momo pūngao e hiahiatia ana, ki te momo pūkenga - pēnei i tētahi kura hou me te pokapū hauora - ka whakaratohia. Tērā pea he tino hiahiatia katoa, engari ka pōturi katoa te pūnaha. Kāore e oti ngā whare whakamutunga tae noa ki te tau 2030 - neke atu i te 30 tau i muri i te tohunga tuatahi a te kaunihera i te rohe mō te whakawhanaketanga anō. He umanga pōturi te hanga whare i te UK. "Ko te take tūturu i taku tirohanga ko te whakarite whenua mō te whanaketanga," te kī a Tēnā Perrins. "E pā ana hoki ki te hanganga. E pā ana ki te hiko. E pā ana ki te korohū. E pā ana ki ngā whakaaetanga whenua pātata. It's about all the infrastructure issues around getting land ready, and there are an awful lot of those." He maha anō ētahi atu take i tukuna atu mō te iti rawa o ngā kāinga hou i te UK. Ko tētahi, ko ngā kaihanga whare e aukati ana i te putanga kia tiketike ai ngā utu - me ā rātou hua. E whakaaro ana te kāwanatanga ki te mau mai i ngā mana pūtea mō ngā kaihanga whare kāore i te tere te whakawhanake whenua. Ka taea te whakakikokiko i taua kaupapa here i roto i tētahi Pepa Mā whare kia whakaputaina i mua i te Kirihimete. I ākiritia e Tēnā Perrins tēnei whakahē ki ngā kaihanga whare, e kī ana kua rite ngā kamupene pēnei i a ia ki te hanga. "Ka tino mōrearea mātou ki te whakarite i ngā pae pēnei i tēnei [Kidbrooke] mō te whanaketanga," tana kī. "It's hugely complicated and we take those risks over a number of years. " E hiahiatia ana hoki he nui rawa te pūtea. E hiahiatia ana e ngā pae pēnei neke atu i te £200m o te pūmatua hei kawe mai i a rātou ki mua," tana whakamārama. Me pai te whakahoki mai o te 'Whakaarahia tā mātou kēmu' kia pai ai ngā kaipupuri moni - arā ko ngā moni penihana a te tokomaha o ngā tāngata - ka makona. "Kaua koe e kawe mai i ngā kaupapa here e whakararuraru ana ki te kawe mai i te whare [whare] ki mua," te kī a Tēnā Perrins mō tētahi mahi a te kāwanatanga ki ngā kamupene whaina kāore e hanga wawe i ngā kāinga hōu. "Kei te kāwanatanga te 40% o te whenua i te UK; kua rawaka ō rātou ake whenua hei whakatika i te raruraru whare," tana tāpiri mai. Mā te Tau 10 me te Pūtea Moni e kī ana he manakē te hanga whare hou, kei raro i te tirotiro te tari kāwanatanga mō te tuku i te kaupapahere whare - ngā hapori me te kāwanatanga ā-rohe. I kī mai te minita whare, a Gavin Barwell, ki a au "kāore ia i whakaae" i te ūnga kāinga hōu kotahi miriona i te tau 2020 ka tino mahue. "E tino whakaae ana ahau i te mokatere o nāianei e kore tātau e patu, nā reira me whakarewa tātau i ta tātau kēmu," tana kī. "But I think if you look in both our own past and if you look to some of our near neighbors, it is possible to build the number of homes we need in this country and it is my job, working with my boss Satud Javid [the Communities and Local Government Secretary] to make sure we do it, " Ka tāpiri mai te minita. " Me pēhea?" ko te pātai i pātaitia ki ngā kāwanatanga mō ngā tekau tau, mai i ngā tau kotahi mano e waru tekau mā iwa rau, i te tau kotahi mano, i te wā e 100,000 ngā whare kaunihera i te tau e tāpiri ana ki te tau i hangaia e ngā kaiwhakawhanake tūmataiti. "E whakaaro ana ahau mehemea he whakautu ngāwari ki taua pātai, kua oti kē i tētahi te raruraru te whakaoti," te kī a Tēnā Barwell. "Ki taku whakaaro he pahekotanga o ngā mea. I ētahi wāhi o te whenua kaore mātau i te tuku i te nui o te whenua ki roto i te pūnaha. "Then often people get planning permission, but it takes too long to turn that into a home - you can't live in a planning permission. " He pōturi rawa mātou ki te tiki kāheru ki te whenua ina whiwhi whakaaetanga whakarite. "I think we are too dependent on a small number of large housebuilders, so we need to broaden the range of the people who are doing the building. " Kātahi ka hiahia mātou ki te whakarite kua rawaka ngā tāngata i te whenua kua whiwhi i ngā pūkenga hei mahi i roto i te umanga," tana kī. Kua tūpato a Mīharo Me ki te karo i te maha rawa o ngā ūnga i tōna wā poto hei pirimia. Engari e mōhio ana a ia ko te "kotahi miriona kāinga hou i te tau 2020" ka taea e ngā kaipōti te pupuri i a ia. Tūmanakohia he kōhukihuki o ngā ngohe kāwanatanga - ki te whakangāwari i ngā ture whakarite me te whakatairanga i te whare mana ā-rohe - i te mutunga o te tau.

title: Sarah Palin: Ko taku kuru tōrangapū ki a Marion Marechal-Le Pen
summary: Kua kī te kaitono tuarua o Amerika o Mua, a Sarah Palin, he "kuru tōrangapū" tōna ki a Marion Marechal-Le Pen o te National Front (FN) o Wīwī.
text: I whakaahuatia e Ms Palin, i te tuhituhi mō te paetukutuku rongokōrero tūturu o Breitbart, te wahine Wīwī he "reo mārama o te toa me te āhua noa iho i tētahi whenua me te whenua e hiahiatia ana e rāua tahi". Ka whakamaharatia ia e te kaitono rangatahi matau ki a ia ki a Hoana o Arc, tana kī. I rahua te FN ki te toa i te mana o tētahi o ngā rohe o Wīwī i te pōtitanga o te Rātapu i haere tuarua mai a Ms Marechal-Le Pen i Provence-Alpes-Cote d'Azur. I mahue atu te kaitono Manapori hei nekeneke takahanga kia kore ai te FN e whakarunga i te poipoi. I miramiratia e Ms Palin, ko ia te hoa whakahaere a John McCain i te pōtitanga perehitini o Amerika i te tau 2008, ngā whakatutukitanga a Ms Marechal-Le Pen, 26, me tōna whaea, te kaiārahi FN o Marine Le Pen. Te pōti Wīwī - i roto i te hōhonutanga o Marion Marechal-Le Pen me te whakahāwea atahono matau o Wīwī - He kanohi hou me tētahi ingoa mōhio e whakatau ana a Le Pen i te 'whakahau teka' - Ko te kaiārahi FN o Marine Le Pen e whakahē ana i muri i te ngaronga o wai e puta mai ana i te pōti Wīwī e menemene ana? - Kāore he take o te rōpū ki te whakaoho i a Vive la rerekētanga - kua rerekē te National Front o Wīwī? - I te iti rawa, kua whakamihi ōna kaitautoko i te kaitōrangapū Wīwī taitamariki mō te "kore whakapōhēhē" me te kōrero mō "ngā rau tau 16 o Wīwī o te hītori me ngā taonga tuku iho o Hūrae-Karaitiana". Ka tuhituhi te makau o te Rōpū Tī i te tuma ki te Uru mai i te rōpū o te Kāwanatanga o Ingarihi me te whakapae a ngā mana Wīwī i haere ētahi o ngā kaihōia o Parihi - ngā tangata whenua o Ūropi - ki Uropi mai i Hiria mā te whakatakoto hei hunga whakaruru. "E hiahia ana a mātau kaitōrangapū pōrangi ki te kawemai i ētahi atu mea e kiia nei ko te 'hunga whakaruru' ... Koinei te take e hiahia ana mātou ki te hiri i ngā taitapa," ko te tuhituhi a Ms Palin. "I a Marion e anga ana ki ngā pakanga tōrangapū kei mua, kāore au e mīharo mēnā ka inoi a ia ki te hunga tapu o Wīwī [mana], he whakamaumahara hoki a Marion ki a ia - Joan of Arc." I kī a Ms Palin, tētahi kāwana o mua o Alaska me te kaiwhaiwhai tūturu, i te wā o Mahuru e hiahia ana a ia ki te mahi hei hēkeretari pūngao i raro i tētahi Perehitini tūpāpaku o Donald Trump.

title: Atahanga i tukuna o Luke Durbin o Ipswich e ngaro ana mai i te tau 2006
summary: Kua whakaputaina tētahi atahanga C KK e ngā pirihimana o te taitamariki o Luke Durbin i te pō o tōna ngaronga i Ipswich i te ono tau ki mua.
text: I kitea whakamutunga te pakeke 19 tau i taua wā, mai i Hollesley, i ngā haora tōmua o te 12 o Me 2006, i muri i tētahi pō. I roto i te atahanga, e kitea ana a Luke me tētahi hoa e whakatata ana ki tētahi tīkiti i Cardinal Park, i muri noa iho i waenganui pō. I kī nga pirihimana kua arotakea e rātau ngā whakarākeitanga i hopukina i mua, ā, ko te tūmanako ka homai he mōhiohio hou. "E mārama ana he mahi uaua te titiro mā roto i te CCTV me [te atahanga hōu] nā mātou e arotake ana, ā, kua pai ake te hangarau," te kī a Det Ch Insp John Brocklebank. "I ia wā kua tukuna e mātou ngā tono whakahōu, kua whiwhi mātou i ngā mōhiohio hōu me ia mōhiohio, ahakoa te iti, te iti rānei, ka whāia kia taea ai te whakakotahi i ngā mea i pā ki a ia." I kī a Det Ch Insp Brocklebank he tangata paetata "e mōhio ana ki ngā mea i pā ki a Luke". "Kāore au e pīrangi ki te pupuri i ngā mōhiohio nui i runga i tōku hinengaro, e mōhio ana ka āwhina ki te whakatika i tēnei tūhuratanga," tana kī. I kī nga pirihimana kua kōrero rātau ki ngā tāngata neke atu i te 100 i te wā o te uiuinga. I kitea whakamutunga a Tēnā Durbin i roto i ngā atahanga C KKK mai i Dog's Head Street i te 04:00 BST, i te rā i ngaro ai ia. I pūrongotia e tōna whaea, a Nicki Durbin, kua ngaro a ia i te rā e whai ake nei.

title: Ka neke a Codebreaking Bombe ki te whare taonga rorohiko
summary: Kua whakawhānuitia e te National Museum of Computing o UK ana whakaaturanga e whakanui ana i ngā kaiwawao waehere pakanga o UK me ngā mīhini e whakamahia ana hei whāwhā i ngā tuhi Tiamana.
text: I te Hātarei ka whakatuwheratia he taiwhanga i whakatapua ki te Bombe, nāna i āwhina ki te whakatere ake i te whāwhā o ngā karere i whāia ki te mīhini Enigma. I whakaaturia te Bombe i mua i Bletchley Park i te taha o te whare taonga. I kohia e tētahi whakahau pūtea ā-huihuinga te £60,000 i roto i te whā wiki ki te neke i te mīhini me te waihanga i tōna kāinga hou. Ko ngā mīhini hōu Ko te tāruarua o te Bombe he kape o ngā mīhini hiko-mīhini i whakamahia i te Pakanga Tuarua o te Ao i Bletchley. I hoahoatia hei kite i ngā tautuhinga e whakamahia ana e ngā mīhini Enigma Tiamana ki te whāwhā i ngā karere, me te kore e taea te pānui. I huri ngā kaiwawao waehere i Bletchley ki ngā mīhini hei huri i ngā miriona tautuhinga i taea mā te mīhini Enigma kia tere ai te kite ko ēhea e whakamahia ana. Ko te hoahoa tuatahi o te Bombe i tātuhia e Alan Turing, ā, i muri iho ka whakamāramatia e Gordon Welchman. Kei te whakatuwheratia te taiwhanga i te huritau 106 o te whānautanga o Turing. Ko te Bombe he tāruarua i hangaia e tētahi tīma i tauria e te kaipūkaha mōnehu o John Harper. I huihuia te tīma i ngā tau kotahi mano e waru tekau mā rua, ā, i oti te tāruarua i te tau 2007. Ka whakatuwheratia te taiwhanga e noho ana i te mīhini e ngā kaiwhakahaere Bombe taketake e rua. Ka hoatu he whakaaturanga me pēhea te whakamahinga ki te whāwhā i ngā waehere Tiamana. Ka noho te Bombe i te taha o ētahi atu mīhini matua e whakamahia ana e ngā kaiwawao waehere i Bletchley, tae atu ki Colossus - he mātāmua ki ngā rorohiko o nāianei - i hangaia hei rutu i ngā karere e haere ana, mai i a Hītara me tana tono tiketike. Ko te mahi i mahia e ngā mano kaimahi i Bletchley i te wā o te pakanga, e whakapono ana kua whakapototia te papā i ngā tau maha, ā, he maha nga oranga i tiakina.

title: Auschwitz: He pēhea te noho o te puni mate ki te pokapū o te Holocaust Nazi
summary: I te 27 o Hānuere 1945, ka tūpato te tomo atu o ngā hōia o Rōpūria ki Auschwitz.
text: Ko Primo Levi - ko tētahi o ngā mōrehu tino rongonui - e takoto ana i tētahi hōhipera puni me te kirikā whero i te taenga mai o nga kaiwhakaora. Ka whiua e nga tāngata "he titiro whakamā rerekē ki nga tinana whānui, ki nga mahau tūkino, ki a mātau torutoru e ora tonu ana", ka tuhituhi a ia ā muri ake. "Kāore rātau i mihi mai ki a mātau, kāore hoki rātau i menemene; Ehara i te mea i tukinotia e te aroha anake, engari e... te whakaaro hara e tīari ana tētahi hara pēnei." "I kite mātau i ngā tāngata mārire, whakamamaetia, rawakore," te kī a te hōia o Ivan Martynushkin mo te whakawātea i te puni mate. "I taea e mātau te kōrero mai i o rātau kanohi e hari ana rātau ki te whakaorangia i tēnei reinga." I roto i te whā me te hāwhe tau, ka patua ā-pūnaha e Nazi Tiamana neke atu i te 1.1 miriona ngā tāngata i Auschwitz. Tata ki te kotahi miriona he Hurai. Ko te hunga i tukua ki te puni matatini i korohūtia, i matekai, i mahi ki te mate, a, i patua i roto i nga whakamātautau rongoā. Ko te nuinga i patua i roto i te matatini o nga ruma korohū i te puni o Auschwitz II-Birkenau. E ono miriona ngā tāngata Hurai i mate i te Holocaust - te whakahau a te Whāriki ki te haepapa i te iwi whānui Hurai o Uropi. Ko Auschwitz te pokapū o taua whiu. He aha te Holocaust? I te taenga mai o nga Nazi ki te mana i te tau 1933 ka tīmata rātau ki te tango i ngā āhuatanga katoa, ngā wāteatanga me ngā mana i raro i te ture. I muri i te whakaekenga a Tiamana me te mahi i Pōrana i te tau 1939, ka tīmata te Nazi ki te tuku i ngā Hurai mai i te Toru o Reich ki ētahi wāhi o Pōrana, i reira i hangaia ai e rātau he ghettos hei wehe i a rātau i te toenga o te iwi whānui. I te tau 1941, i te wā o te whakaekenga a Tiamana ki te USSR, ka tīmata ngā Nazi i ta rātau whakahau whakangaroma. I kōrero ngā Nazi mō tō rātou whakaekenga hei pakanga iwi i waenganui i a Tiamana me ngā Hurai, tae atu ki te iwi whānui Slavic me te Roma. Ka haere atu ngā rōpū hōia Tiamana ko Einsatzgruppen puta noa i ngā whenua hou i raupatutia i Uropi ki te Rāwhiti ki te patu i ngā tangata whenua. I te mutunga o te tau 1941, e 500,000 ngā tāngata i patua e rātau, ā, i te tau 1945 kua patua e rātau e rua miriona - 1,3 miriona o rātau he Hurai. I muri i nga raina, e whakamātau ana nga rangatira o te Whāriki ki nga huarahi whakamate nui. I wehi rātau he uaua rawa te tākaro i te tangata ki a rātau hōia, nā reira i pai ake ai te kōhuru. I whakamahia ngā waka korohū whakamātautau hei patu i ngā tāngata hauā hinengaro i Pōrana i te tau 1939. I mahia ngā paowa paitini ki roto i tētahi wāhanga hiri hei whakapoke i te hunga o roto. I te hōtoke o te tau 1941, kua hangaia e nga Nazi he ruma korohū i Auschwitz. I tūtaki ngā kaiārahi Nazi i te Hānuere 1942 i te Hui o Wannsee ki te taururuku i te parekura mahi - ko tā rātou i kīia ai he "rongoā whakamutunga ki te pātai Hurai" - i patua ai te katoa o te iwi whānui Hurai o Ūropi, e 11 miriona tāngata, mā te whakangaromanga me te mahi tōpana. He aha a Auschwitz? Ko Auschwitz tētahi puni taua Pōrana i te tonga o Pōrana. I whakaekea e Nazi Tiamana a Pōrana i te marama o Mahuru 1939, ā, i Me 1940 ka huri te wāhi hei whare herehere mō ngā herehere tōrangapū. Ko tēnei rohe - me te teka rongonui a Arbeit Macht Frei i tuhia i runga ake i te tomokanga i te reo Tiamana - ko te tikanga o te mahi ka whakawātea koe - ka mōhiotia ko Auschwitz I. Engari i te haerenga o te pakanga me te Holocaust, ka tino whakawhanake te kāwanatanga o te Nazi i te pae. Ko te iwi tuatahi i korohūtia he rōpū herehere Pōngia me Rōpūria i te marama o Mahuru 1941. I tīmata te mahi i tētahi puni hou, a Auschwitz II-Birkenau, i te marama e whai ake nei. Ka noho tēnei ko te wāhi o ngā ruma korohū nunui i patua ai ngā rau mano tae noa ki Whiringa o Whiringa 1944, ā, ko te tahu tahu te wāhi i tahuna ai o rātau tinana. I hangaia, i whakahaeretia e te kamupene matū Tiamana IG Farben tētahi wheketere inarapa waihanga i Auschwitz III-Monowitz. Ko ētahi atu kamupene tūmataiti pēnei i a Krupp me Siemens-Schuckert i whakahaere wheketere pātata, hei whakamahi i ngā herehere hei mahi pononga. I ora a Primo Levi rāua ko te toa o te Whakawhiwhinga o Aotearoa, a Elie Wiesel, i te puni whakatōpū o Monowitz. I te mutunga o te whakawāteatanga o Auschwitz, neke atu i te 40 ngā puni me ngā puni iti. He pēhea te noho o Auschwitz ki te pokapū o te Holocaust Nazi i pēhea te mahi a Auschwitz? I kōpikopiko ngā tāngata o Uropi katoa ki roto i ngā kaata kararehe, kāore he matapihi, he wharepaku, he tūru, he kai rānei, a, ka kawea ki Auschwitz. I reira ka kōmakatia rātau ki te hunga e āhei ana ki te mahi, ki te hunga e mate wawe ana. I whakahaua te rōpū whakamutunga kia tīhore tahanga, a, ka tukuna ki nga ua mo te "whakaheke" - he taurangi e whakamahia ana mo nga ruma korohū. Kātahi ka whakataka e ngā tautīaki o te "Whare Wānanga Hauora" ngā pūkoro Zyklon-B kaha ki roto i ngā ruma hiri, ka tatari kia mate te tangata. Tata ki te 20 meneti. Kāore i taea e ngā pakitara mātotoru te huna i te auē a te hunga e whakapōrearea ana i roto. Kātahi ka tangohia e Sonderkommandos - ētahi atu herehere, ko te nuinga o ngā Hurai kia mahi mō ngā tautīaki, kia patua rānei - ka tangohia ngā waewae waihanga, ngā mōhiti, ngā makawe me ngā niho i mua i te tō i ngā tūpāpaku ki nga kaitahu. I tanumia, i whakamahia rānei hei maniua nga pungarehu o nga tinana. Ko ngā taonga o ērā i korohū me te hunga i tonoa ki te mahi i tangohia hei kōmaka i tētahi wāhi o te puni e mōhiotia ana ko "Kānata" - i tapaina nā te mea i kitea te whenua he whenua nui. Ko wai ngā tūpāpaku? I rapu nga tautīaki SS ki te huna i a rātau hara i te katinga o nga hōia o Rōpūria, a, ka ngana ki te whakangaro i a rātau pūkete herehere whānui - he uaua ki te ine katoa i te maha o ngā tūpāpaku. Mai i te wā e whakaae ana ngā mātauranga mātauranga e tata ana ki te 1.3 miriona ngā tāngata i tae ki Auschwitz. Tata ki te 1.1 miriona o rātau i mate i reira. Ko nga Hurai o Uropi katoa i whakahaeretia e te Nazi te nuinga o nga tūpāpaku. Tata ki te kotahi miriona ngā tāngata Hurai i patua i Auschwitz. Ko tētahi tauira tauwhāiti ko te iwi whānui Hurai o Hakari. I roto i te rua marama noa iho, i waenganui o Me me Hōngongoi 1944, ka kawea e Hakari e 420,000 o ngā tāngata Hurai e 437,000 i tonoa e ia ki Auschwitz. Tekau mano o ngā Hurai o Hanekeria i tonoa ki Auschwitz i ia rā. E toru hauwhā o rātau i mate i te taenga atu. E 75 000 taata no Polonia, 15 000 mau auri no te tama'i, e 25 000 Roma e Sinti, tae noa 'tu i te mau Ite no Iehova, te mau tane e te mau tane e te mau auri poritita tei haapohehia e te hau Tiamani i Auschwitz. He aha i pā mai i te wā i whakawāteatia ai a Auschwitz? I whakahaua e nga mana Tiamana kia whakatū te korohū me te whakangaromanga o ngā ruma korohū me ngā tahu tahu i te mutunga o te tau 1944, i te haerenga atu o ngā hōia o Rōpūria ki te hauauru. I muri tata iho ka tukuna atu te putunga taonga tāhae i te wāhanga o Kānata ki Tiamana. I whakahaua e nga Nazi kia ūkui i nga whakaaturanga o a rātau hara, e 56,000 ngā herehere e toe ana kia haere ki te uru ki ētahi atu puni whakatōpū, pērā i Bergen-Belsen, Dachau me Sachsenhausen. Ko te hunga mate rawa ki te haere, ka mahue ki muri; ko te hunga i taka ki muri i te hīkoi tonu i patua. I kitea e ngā ope o Rōpūria he torutoru mano noa iho ngā mōrehu i to rātau tomokanga ki te puni i te 27 o Hānuere 1945, tae atu ki ngā rau mano kākahu me ngā makawe tangata. I muri iho ka mahara nga hōia ki te whakatūpato i ētahi mōrehu kua tino haere nga Nazi. I kōrero a Elie Wiesel i muri iho i roto i tētahi whaikōrero hei tohu i te huritau 50 o te whakawāteatanga nā ngā hara a te Whāriki i Auschwitz "i puta mai he irakētanga i runga i te tauine kōhukihuki, e pā ana ki ngā moemoeā me ngā whāinga a te tangata". "I muri i Auschwitz, kua kore te āhua o te tangata e ōrite. I muri i Auschwitz, kāore he mea e ōrite."

title: I 'whakakāhoretia' e te wahine hapū te tūru o te tereina o Manchester Metrolink
summary: Ko tētahi wahine hapū e kī ana i mahue a ia e tū ana i runga i te Metrolink o Manatū i te korenga o ngā pāhihi ki te tuku tūru, kua amuamu kāore i taea e ngā kaimahi te āwhina.
text: E toru wiki te wā o te pēpi a Meenakshi Minnis, ā, ko te tikanga o te āhua o te hapū, kei te mamae a ia, ā, kāore e taea te tū roa. E kī ana a ia e waru nga tāngata i tonoa e ia mo to rātau tūru i muri i tana eke ki runga i te tram i te pokapū o te taone, kaore i angitu. I kī a Metrolink kāore e taea e ngā kaimahi te whakahau i ngā pāhihi kia neke. I kī a Ms Minnis, e 31, o Timperley: "I pātai atu ahau ki ngā tāngata tokowaru i reira mehemea ka tukua e tētahi to rātau tūru, ā, ka titiro katoa mai rātau ki a au, a, kāore. Haere mōrearea "Kātahi ahau ka inoi ki ngā kaimahi o Metrolink e kī ana ka taea e koe te tiki i tētahi tangata kia tū ake, ā, kāore anō ia kia mahi i tētahi mea." I kī a ia he mōrearea te tū mo te haerenga mōna me tana pēpi, ā, kua kōrero ia kia nui ake ai te whakaaro o te tangata ki ngā hoa pāhihi. Kua amuamu tika a Ms Minnis ki ngā kaiwhakahaere o Metrolink. Susan Wildman, of Transport for Greater Manchester, apologised and said: "We do designate some seats as priority seats and we do ask passengers to be aware of other passengers who are getting on the tram, and to be aware that if they are in a priority seat they should give that up for someone in greater need,  mārama tonu ki tēnei wahine."

title: Turner Prize 2015: Kei roto i te rārangi poto ko te pānga whare o Toxteth
summary: Kua rārangihia tētahi pānga whare o Liverpool i panonitia e tētahi rōpū toi me tētahi opera i whakaawetia e te tutu o ngā pakiwaituhi mō te Whakawhiwhinga Turner o tēnei tau.
text: Ko ngā tautapa e whā ko te kaiwaiata o Rānōna, ko Bonnie Camplin me Tiamana, ko Nīnī Wermers, i whakaingoatia mō tana wāhanga i runga i te "ahurea kiritaki", Infrastrucktur. Ka pānuitia te toa o te whakawhiwhinga £25,000 i Tīma i Glasgow. Kei te whakatūria te whakaaturanga 2015 i te wāhi toi o Tramway o te taone. Ko te whakawhiwhinga toi, i whakaritea e Tate Galleries, he rongonui mo te tautohetohe, me ngā toa o mua tae atu ki te rama a Martin Creed e kā ana, e weto ana me ngā kōhua a Grayson Perry, nāna i whiu ngā kaupapa pēnei i te mate me te tūkino tamariki. E kī ana te rārangi poto o tēnei tau i te rōpū ā-Rāwāhi, a Assemble, nāna i āwhina ki te panoni i ngā pānga whare pēnei i te Granby Four Streets o Toxteth. I whawhai ngā tangata whenua i ngā mahere mō te whakawāteatanga mā te tono i a Assemble hei āwhina ki te whakatupu anō i ngā mokowā "mai i te whenua ki runga" kia noho ai te pānga "he wāhi e hiahia ana te tangata ki te noho". Kua mahi tahi hoki te rōpū o ngā tāngata 16 i raro iho i te 30 ki ngā rōpū hapori i te pito rāwhiti o Glasgow. I kī a Tate e tiritiri ana te rōpū i tētahi studio i Rāwāhi, ā, ka mahi "pēnei i tētahi rōpū Modernist mai i ngā tau kotahi mano e waru tekau mā rua". "He tina rātau i ia rā huri noa i te tēpu ki te kōrerorero i ngā kaupapa, ā, kāore i taea e rātau te whakaae ki te whakaingoatanga kia whakaae rā anō te katoa," te whakaatu a te kaiwhakahaere o Tate Britain o Penelope Curtis i te whakarewatanga i Glasgow. He rangatū o ngā tūru kai tauhira hoahoa i tāpaetia ki ngā koti huruhuru i waenganui i ngā whakairo, ngā toirau me ngā tāutanga e hanga ana i te whakaaturanga a Wermers, e kiia nei ko Infrastrucktur. Ka "tūhura tahi rātau i te whakawhiwhinga o te toi me te hoahoa i roto i te ahurea kiritaki". Kei roto hoki i Infrastruktur he rangatū o ngā whakairo pakitara e rite ana ki ngā rererere roimata e kitea ana i ngā wāhi tūmatanui. I whakamahia e Camplin ngā kitenga mai i te ahupūngao, te whakaaro me te makutu hei whakaawe i tana mahi i whakaingoatia, The Military Industrial Complex. I kī a Tate e pātai ana ki ngā ariā o te whakaaetanga, ā, ko wai e whakahekea ana he mōrearea. Ko Camplin, e whakaahua ana i tana mahi ko "te Ora Waihanga", kua whakaputa, kua whakahaere, kua mahi hoki i te whare tapere me te whakahaere i ngā pō karapu whakamātautau i Soho o Rāwāhi. 'Tukinotanga huakore' Ko te mahi opera a Kerbel i whakarārangitia e Taki e iwa nga mahi kino i pāngia e te tangata kotahi. I tāia e ia te hītori o ngā pukapuka opera, ngā rautaki o te pukuhohe ā-tinana, te reo o te waiata kōrero me te tutu huakore o ngā pakiwaituhi hākoritanga hei whakaaweawe. I waihangatia e te rehetoi, i whānau mai i Kānata engari e mahi ana i Rānana, te mahi whakaari o ngā waiata e iwa mō ngā reo e ono hei mahi i te Whare Pukapuka o Doketa i Glasgow. Ko te mahi nui tuatahi a Kerbel i te tau 1999, e kiia nei ko Bank Job, he mahere nui, taipitopito hoki mo te tāhaetanga o te pēke tūmataiti tāuke o Coutts & Co. Kua hangaia e ngā kaihanga pukapuka a William Hill a Assemble i a rātau makau whāiti kia toa ai i te Whakawhiwhinga Turner 31, me Camplin te tauhou. Ko ngā toa o mua o te whakawhiwhinga tūturu - e whakawāteatia ana e te pēhi nūpepa o Ingarangi - ko Damien Hirst, Anish Ka rākau, me Kiriata rāua ko Hōri. Ko ngā kaiwaiata e tika ana ki te whakawhiwhinga o tēnei tau me mahi i Ingarangi mō tētahi whakaaturanga tino pai, tētahi atu whakaaturanga mahi rānei i roto i ngā marama e 12 i mua i te waenganui o Aperira 2015. He koreutu te whakaaturanga o ngā mahi a ngā kaiwaiata rārangi, ā, ka haere mai i Whiringahora 2015 ki Hānuere a tērā tau i Tramway, Glasgow. Ka pānuitia te toa i te 7 o Hakihea.

title: Pōroa ki te whakatuwhera i te pokapū mahi ā-ipurangi o Europol
summary: Ka tīmata tika te mahi a tētahi pokapū Ūropi i hoahoatia hei āwhina ki te whawhai i te hara ā-ipurangi i tēnei wiki.
text: Ka whakarōpū te Pokapū Cybercrime Ūropi (EC3) i ngā mōhiohio me ngā pūkenga hei āwhina i ngā pirihimana ā iwi i roto i ngā tūhuratanga ā-ipurangi taitapa. Ka arotahi te pokapū pūtea a Europol ki ngā ngohe o te hara whakaritea me ētahi atu kaihōia ā-ipurangi. Ka homai e te pokapū he āwhina hangarau, tātaritanga, ā-ture hoki i roto i ngā tūhuratanga tōtahi o Ūropi. Ko te wero pirihimana he taitapa ā-rohe, he āhuatanga e āhei ana ki te whakararuraru i ngā ope pirihimana ā iwi, e ai ki te upoko o te pokapū, a Troels Oerting. "I te whawhai i te mahi ā-ipurangi, me tōna āhua taitapa me te kaha nui ki te huna e te hunga hara, e hiahiatia ana e tātau he urupare ngāwari, tika hoki," te kī a Tēnā Oerting i roto i tētahi kōrero. "He tere te whakamahi i te whanaketanga o ngā hangarau hou hei whakatinana i a rātau hara," te kī a te Komihana o te Take Kāinga, a Cecilia Malmstrom i tētahi takahanga pēhi. Ka titiro te pokapū ki ngā whakaekenga e hāngai ana ki ngā hanganga ā-pēke me ngā hanganga takenui, me ngā hara pēnei i te taikahatanga ā-tamariki. "Ko te whāinga o te pokapū ko te whakawhitiwhiti me te tautoko i ngā tūhuratanga ā-ipurangi ā-motu, ā, hei wāhi arotahi mō ngā mana whakahau ture katoa [kāwanatanga mema]," te kī a te kaikorero o te Kōmihana o Ūropi o Mīharo Cercone. The centre has been staffed since the beginning of the year, but will officially start operations on Friday. He pūtea 7m ūropi (£5.7m) tōna mai i Europol, te pokapū ture o Ūropi, mō te tau 2013. I tērā tau, he tahua 84m hōro tā te kōwhiringa.

title: Eurovision i te raina o mua: Ka pahuatia e te ngaro o Rūhia te rōpū o Ukraine?
summary: I hīkoi ngā kaiwhakatū mai i ngā whenua e 42 i tētahi kāpeti whero roa e tata ana ki te pāremata o Ukraine i tēnei wiki, hei ārai ārai ki te Whakataetae Waiata Eurovision o tēnei tau.
text: Nā Steve RosenbergBBC News, Kiev Engari kotahi te iwi, ko Rūhia, i ngaro. Mo te wā tuatahi i roto i te hītori o Eurovision, ka āraia e te iwi kaihautū te kaiwaiata o tētahi atu whenua. Nā te mea i te tau 2015, i te tūkinotanga o ngā ture taitapa o Ukraine, i mahia e Julia Samoilova o Rūhia i Crimea, te koiora o Ākarana i tāpiritia e Rūhia i te tau ki mua. E pāngia ana a Samoilova i tētahi mate uaua neural, ā, kua whakamahia e ia he tūru tūru mai i te tamarikitanga. "I te tīmatanga o ngā rongo kāore pea au e haere, i tino pouri ahau," tana kī atu ki te AO i Mohihi. "I whakaaro ahau, me pēhea? Ko taku moemoeā tēnei. I te whakataunga whakamutunga kāore au i whakapono. Engari ko te mea pono tēnei." "Ki taku whakaaro he tauhohenga heahea," te kī mai a te MP Rūhia o Vitaly Milonov ki a au. "Kei te mataku tonu rātau ki tētahi kōtiro iti ki te tomo ki Kiev." Ahakoa i mua i te whakakorenga o Ukraine, i karangatia e Tēnā Milonov he poapoa Rūhia o Eurovision: "I noho a Eurovision hei moepuku hāpori whakarihariha mō ēnei rōpū parirau mauī katoa me ā rātou wāhine pāhau, tāne rānei, me ēnei tūnga ārai Karaitiana. " E mōhio tūturu ana ahau e kore te nuinga o ngā tohutohu o te ao e haere ki tēnei hākari. No te mea he huihuinga tenei no Horoma raua ko Komora." Ko te tikanga he hākari mo te rangimārie me te whakahoahoa, engari kaore he tohu nui o te whanaungatanga i waenganui i a Kiev me Mohihi. I te rāwhiti o Ukraine, e 10,000 ngā tāngata kua mate i roto i te toru tau o te pakanga: he pakanga e uru hāngai ana a Rūhia mā tana tautoko hōia mō te hunga whakakeke. Ka noho tonu a Crimea hei pūtake o te tanuku, ā, ko Eurovision te papa riri hou rawa. "Mai i te tau 2014, he ture tā mātou i Ukraine e whiu ana i ngā tāngata e whakawhiti ana i tō mātou rohe ina haere rātou ki Crimea," te kī a Ukrainian MP Olha Chervakova. "I mōhio a Rūhia ki tēnei? Ehara tonu. I mōhio rānei a Rūhia ka hara a Julia Samoilova i tēnei ture? Ehara tonu. Ki tētahi atu kōrero, ko te tāurunga i a ia ki te whakataetae he whakatoinga mōhio ki te waihanga i tētahi heitara tōrangapū nui." Na te āraitanga i waihanga he ānini nui mō ngā kaiwhakahaere o Eurovision, te Uniana Pāohotanga o Ūropi (EBU). I kī te Kaiwhakahaere Nui o Eurovision, a Jon Ora Sand i ia Poutāpeta ka haere te whakataunga a Ukraine "ki te wairua o te whakataetae me te ariā o te whakauru e takoto ana i te ngākau o ōna uara". I roto i tētahi nekehanga tawhito rawa, ka tukuna e te EBU ki a Rūhia te wā kia whai wāhi mā te aorangi mai i Mohihi. I whakapeka a Rūhia: i muri i nga whakaari o te Eurovision o tērā tau, kaore a Mohihi i roto i te ngākau ki te whakararuraru. I tākaro tōrangapū a Ukraine ki te Eurovision? Ko te tāurunga toa o Ukraine i te tau 2016, i te tau 1944, i waiatatia e Jamala, e pā ana ki te tukunga atu o Hohepa Kānata i te iwi whānui o Crimea. I tautohe a Rūhia i whati i te waiata a Iama nga ture whakataetae mo te āhua tōrangapū. No te toa, ka karanga hara a Mohihi, a, ka kī he tōrangapū e tākaro ana. Ināianei te āhua nei kua whakaritea e Rūhia kia kaua e kino te āhua o Ukraine anake, engari ko te katoa o te Whakataetae Waiata Eurovision. Nō nā tata nei, e rua ngā māminga Rūhia - e noho ana hei pirimia o Ukraine me tana kaiāwhina - i tukua tuihonotia tētahi kōrerorero waea i hopukina e rātau ki tētahi wahine i kīia e rātau ko te Tumuaki o EBU Ingrid Deltenre. Mēnā koinei te reo o te tino mana o te EBU, he tino whakamā ki te EBU, nā te mea he whakaurunga whakamīharo te wahine i runga i te hopukanga mō te waiata toa a Ukraine: "I tōmuri rawa ahau ki te waiata. " Mehemea i mua ahau, ā, e whakaaro ana ahau i runga i te whāinga, kāore au i whakaae kia whai wāhi te waiata, kia tino pūataata." I roto i tētahi kōrero, ka kī te EBU e "kore e kōrero mō ngā waea māminga". Engari he māminga Rūhia kōtaha tiketike ēnei, nāna i tinihanga a Elton John ki te whakaaro e kōrero ana a ia ki te Perehitini o Rūhia o Tūroro. "Ināianei kua kore to mātau iwi e whakawhirinaki ki a Eurovision," te kī mai a tētahi o ngā māminga, a Alexei, ki a au. "E mōhio ana te iwi ka taea e tētahi whenua te whakamahi i ā rātou whāinga tōrangapū kia toa, nā reira ehara tonu i te whakataetae tika." Ehara pea tēnei i te whakataetae waiata noa iho? Ko te whanaungatanga rānei o Rūhia ki Ukraine? Ko te whakataurite i te Eurovision ki Horoma me Komora me te whakamā i te EBU e puta ana he wāhanga o tētahi tauira whānui ake o Rūhia e ngana ana ki te tukituki i ngā rōpū ki te Uru me ngā ariā ohaoha ki te Uru. "Ināianei ka whakamārama a Rūhia i a ia anō i roto i tōna tauira pāpori me te pāpori ki te Uru," e whakapono ana a Jan Techau o te Wānanga o Te Wānanga o Amerika i Perewa. "E whakaahua mārama ana te Rūhia i te iwi o Rūhia hei tauira ātete ki te Uru hāmate. Te āhua nei kua tino hokona e rātau ināianei ki te ariā he pai ngā mea katoa e tūkino ana i te Uru mō Rūhia: he kēmu tapeke-kore tauhira." I te whakahaerenga o te whakataetae o tēnei tau, ka whakatūpato te kaiwaiata o Haira "me tūmanako tātau kia nui ake ngā whakatoinga [mai i Rūhia] nā te mea he nui te mamae o to mātau wikitōria i a rātau." He iti te haumarutanga i Kiev i mua i te haurua whakamutunga tuatahi. Ki a Julia Samoilova, kaua e waiata i Eurovision i tēnei wiki, ka mahi anō a ia - i Crimea. Ko tētahi atu karere tōrangapū mai i Mohihi, ki Kiev, ki Uropi hoki. Ko wai a Yulia Samoilova?

title: Wood o Hydebank: Te āwangawanga mo te pikinga o ngā herehere wahine
summary: Kua whakaarahia ngā māharahara mo te pikinga o te tokomaha o ngā wāhine e puritia ana i te whare herehere wahine anake o Aiarangi ki te Raki.
text: Nā Niall McCrackenBBC News NI Ash House i te Whare Herehere o Hydebank Wood ka taea te pupuri tae atu ki te 71 ngā wāhine. I tēnei marama ka tae te tokomaha o nga herehere wahine ki te 84, ko te teitei rawa i tuhia i roto i nga tau e rima kua hipa. I kī te Ratonga Whare Herehere o NI e whakamahi ana i ētahi atu pūkenga i te pae o Hydebank Wood hei whakahaere i ngā tau herehere teitei ake. I kī tētahi kaikōrero: "Ehara i te mea rerekē kia tārere te iwi whānui o te whare herehere, koia te take i whakaritea ai e NIPS he mahere hei whakahaere i tēnei puta noa i tōna pānga. " Ahakoa e 71 ngā rūma o te Whare Pungarehu, ehara i te mea anake mō ngā herehere wahine i Hydebank Wood. Nō reira ehara i te mea tika te 'whakarua' i ngā wā katoa, engari ka taea te whakanoho, mēnā e hiahiatia ana, i runga i te tūroro." I kī tētahi kaikawe kōrero mō te Tari Ture e mōhio ana he "take nui" te tokomaha o ngā wāhine i roto i te tiakitanga, ā, i tukua ki te "whakaiti i te hara i waenganui i ngā wāhine". Tae atu ki ngā herehere wahine, ka puritia hoki ngā taitama hara ki tētahi atu wāhi o te pae i te kāreti haumaru o Hydebank Wood. I te tau 2017/18 ko te toharite o te iwi whānui o ia rā o ngā herehere wahine i Aiarangi ki te Raki e 57. Engari i ngā wiki tata nei kua neke atu i te 80 te tokomaha o ngā herehere wahine i Hydebank Wood, e 84 i te waenganui o Hōngongoi. Mai i tērā wā ka hoki whakamuri ki te 81. Kua karangatia e ētahi rangatū o ngā pūrongo ture hara o mua kia hangaia he whare herehere wahine motuhake. E kī ana te Ratonga Whare Herehere o NI ko te whanaketanga o tētahi pānga motuhake mō ngā herehere wahine he "manakē". 'E kore e tika' I kī te tumuaki o Aiarangi ki te Raki o Amnesty International, a Patrick Corrigan, he "tika" te haere tonu ki te whare herehere wahine i te Whare Herehere o Te Whare Herehere o Te Wānanga. Ka kī a ia: "Ko te pikinga o te iwi whānui o te whare herehere wahine o Aiarangi ki te Raki, ā, ko te nui o ngā āwangawanga motika tangata tīariari mō te pānga.
