" Kua roa te mōhiotanga e hiahiatia ana he whare herehere wahine motuhake. I te tau 2016, i kitea e te Kaitirotiro Ture Hara te hē o te pupuri i ngā wāhine i roto i tētahi whare mō ngā taitama." I tāpiri mai a ia: "Ka taea te whakawā i te iwi ki tana mahi i ōna herehere. E hiahiatia ana e tēnei take he roa te tōmuri, he whawhai hoki te aro atu ki ngā tōrangapū. I te korenga o tētahi minita tika kua whakaritea, me arotahi te Hēkeretari o te Kāwanatanga ki nga tikanga tautāwhi o nga wāhine e hereheretia ana i konei." I te tau 2017/18 ka nui ake te tokomaha o ngā herehere mana wahine i Haitapa, i te wā i pūketetia e ngā hara tāhae te wāhanga nui rawa (30%) o ngā hara i tukuna ai ngā wāhine ki te whare herehere i Aiarangi ki te Raki. Ina whakahokia te tangata ki te whare herehere, ko te tikanga ka herea ia ki te whare herehere tae noa ki tētahi rā ā muri ake ka tū he whakawā, he whakarongo whiu rānei. I noho te kaiako Criminology o Gillian McNaull i te Whare Herehere o Hydebank Wood hei wāhanga o te rangahau mō te Whare Wānanga o Kuini. Ka kī a ia: "He tokomaha nga wāhine kāore i te whakahokia nā te kaha o to rātau hara, engari nā tō rātou whakararurarutanga. " I kitea e au he nui tonu ngā wāhine e hopukina ana, e whakahokia ana ki te tiakitanga mō ngā take e pā ana ki te mate hauora hinengaro, te whakaaro whakamomori, ngā take whakamahi waipiro me te noho kore." I tāpiri mai a ia: "E kite ana tēnei i te whakamahinga o te whare herehere hei wāhi 'haumaru' me te 'pupuri' mō ngā wāhine - he take i hākinakina e ngā tāpaetanga i roto i ngā rauemi hapori, pēnei i te kore o ngā wāhi noho ā-ira tangata, te tautoko hauora hinengaro hapori tika me te whakarato tiaki pāpori." I kī tētahi kaikawe kōrero o te Tari Ture: "Kei te arotake me te whakahōu te Tari i tana rautaki mō ngā wāhine i roto i te pūnaha tika me tētahi arotahi motuhake ki te ārai, te whakarerekētanga me te tautoko i roto i te hapori. " This will include the issues highlighted in relation to accommodation, mental health support, and social care provision."

title: Ka mate a Amy-Leanne Stringfellow i te whare herehere
summary: Kua mate tētahi tangata i whakapaea ki te kōhuru i tētahi wahine i Te Tonga o Aotearoa i roto i te whare herehere, kua kī te Manatu Ture.
text: I whakataua a Terence Papworth, e 45, i mua o Dryden Road, Doncaster, e nga pirihimana i te kōhurutanga o Amy-Leanne Stringfellow. I mate a Tāne Papworth i HMP Leeds i te Rātapu, ka kī tētahi kaikawe kōrero o te Ratonga Whare Herehere. Kāore i taea te whakaū i te take o tōna matenga, a, he take mo te koroni, ka kī te Manatu Ture. I kitea a Miss Stringfellow, e 26, he hōia o mua, i tino whara i tētahi whare i Dryden Road i Doncaster i te 5 o Hune, a, i mate i muri tata iho. I te Tūtira ka puta a Tāne Papworth ki te Kōti Karauna o Te Tūtira i whakapaea ki tōna kōhuru. Kua whakamōhiotia te Ombudsman Whare Herehere me te Porotiti mo tōna matenga, ka tāpiritia e te Ratonga Whare Herehere.

title: Dulwich Picture Gallery celebrates 200th anniversary
summary: Kua whakanuia e te taiwhanga toi tūmatanui tuatahi o Ingarangi tōna huritau 200.
text: I te tau 1811 ka whakatuwheratia e te Taiwhanga Pikitia o Dulwich ōna tatau i te wā i waiho ai e Tā Francis Bourgeois tana kohinga "hei tirotiro i te iwi whānui". I te Rātapu, i te whakatakoto te taiwhanga o Rāwāhi ki te tonga o Rāwāhi i ngā whakaaturanga pūoro ora, he whakaaturanga kāmura me tētahi whakaaturanga mumura. Tekau mā rua ngā peita mai i ētahi o ngā taiwhanga rongonui o te ao ka whakaaturia ki te taiwhanga puta noa i te tau 2011. 'Rā whānau tohu' Ko te mahi tuatahi e whakaaturia ana hei wāhanga o te whakaaturanga Masterpiece A Month o te taiwhanga ko te Whakaahua o Tā John Soane nā Tā Thomas Lawrence. Ko ētahi atu mahi e whakatārewatia ana ki te taiwhanga he whakaahua whaiaro nā Van Gogh, e whakaaturia ana ināianei i te Whare Taonga o Van Gogh i Tūtukupu. Ka hoatu e te kohinga Tate i Rānana te Mr and Mrs Clark and Percy a David Hockney. I kī te kaiwhakahaere taiwhanga o Ian Dejardin i "whakahīhī te whare taonga ki te tohu i tēnei rā whānau whakahirahira me te tautoko whakaharahara a ngā whare taonga me ngā kohinga nunui o te ao, ā mātou kaihoko me ngā kaiāwhina whakatapua, me te hapori e mahi ana mātou".

title: Jersey's Highlands College taking on more students
summary: Kei te takatū te Kāreti Highlands o Jersey ki te tango i ētahi atu ākonga i te wā e haere tonu ana te hinganga o te ohaoha.
text: Neke atu i te 1,100 kē ngā ākonga wā katoa, ā, e tūmanako ana te kāreti kia 100 anō i tēnei tau. Highlands College is experiencing a period of rapid expansion and last year received extra funding to cope with higher numbers of students. I karangatia e Prof Ed Sallis, te tumuaki, he hurihuri, e kī ana i te pōturi o te āhua o te whakahaerenga, ka tipu nga kura. Engari i kī hoki a ia ko te angitu o te kāreti, e tuku ana ināianei i ngā akoranga waeine, kāore i te tīpako. Ko te 'kounga o te akoranga' Kei runga ake i te wawaenga ā-motu te haere me te pupuri i ngā ākonga, ā, mēnā kei Ingarangi a Highlands, kei runga i te 5-10% o ngā kura mātauranga anō. Ko te nuinga o ana pūtea i ahu mai i te tari mātauranga o te motu, nāna i whakarato te £8.2m i tērā tau. Ko te toenga o te tahua £11.5m i ahu mai i ngā utu me ngā moni mai i Amerika. I kī a Prof Sallis ko te wero nui ko te pupuri i te kounga o te akoranga i te tipu haere tonu o ngā tau.

title: Ka whakakitea e Amazon te rere o te drone haumarutanga Ring me te ratonga kēmu Luna
summary: Kua whakakitea e te wehenga haumarutanga kāinga atamai o Amazon Ring tētahi kāmera rere e whakarewa ana mēnā ka kitea e ngā pūoko tētahi wāhi kāinga tūpono.
text: Nā Leo Kelion & Chris FoxTechnology ngā kaipānui i hoahoatia kia whakahohe anake ina noho ngā tangata ki waho, ka mahi i rō whare, ā, ka whakatepetia ki te papa kotahi o tētahi whare. I whakakitea hoki e te umanga tētahi ratonga roma kēmu tuihono me tētahi mata whakahohe-reo e hurihuri ana. Engari i whakaahuatia e tētahi rōpū whakahau te kāmera taiapa hei "hua tirotiro kāinga tino mātao" a Amazon. "He uaua ki te whakaaro he aha i whakaaro ai a Amazon e hiahia ana tētahi tangata ki ngā kāmera ipurangi rere e hono ana ki tētahi kamupene kohikohi raraunga i roto i te tūmataitinga o tō rātou ake kāinga," te kī a Silkie Carlo mai i Big Brother Watch. "He mea nui kia mōhio ki te whakaawetanga o te whanaketanga hua a Amazon ki ngā hapori me te mākete tirotiro e tipu ana." Ina whakaohotia te Kāmera Kāinga Katoa e tētahi kokoti whakapae, ka whiwhi ngā rangatira i tētahi matohi waea atamai kia kite ai rātou i ngā whakaata ora. I kī a Amazon he "tino hinengaro" te tūmataitinga i te wā i hoahoatia ai te mīhini. "Ka pūrongo anake ina nekeneke, ā, ki te kore e nekeneke, ka noho tonu ki tētahi tauranga e āraia ā-tinana ana kia kore ai e taea te pūrongo," te whakamārama a Leila Rouhi, te perehitini o Ring. "I tua atu i tērā, kua hangaia kia nui, nā reira he tino tūmataitinga ka rongo koe." Kua tautuhia te pūrere kia utu i te $250 (£192) ina hokona ana. I te whakarewatanga, ka wātea anake i te US. "He pūrere tino hao te Always Home Cam e āhua nei he mea mai i tētahi whitiāhua pakiwaitara pūtaiao mō te tokomaha o ngā kiritaki," te kōrero a Ben Wood mai i te tohutohu CCS Insight. "E tūmanako ana ahau kia nui te hua mai i ngā kaingākau hangarau, ko te nuinga o ngā tāngata e whakaae ana ki te hangarau kāinga atamai i te tuatahi. Heoi anō, tērā pea ka whakapataritari i tētahi kōrero nui mō te tūmataitinga me te tūnga hangarau ā muri ake i te kāinga." I whakakitea hoki e te wehenga Mowhiti tētahi kāmera haumarutanga hōu i hoahoatia hei whakamahi i roto i tētahi motokā, e aroturuki ana mō ngā ngohe pātata ina whakatūria te waka. Ka taea hoki te tīmata ki te hopu ataata mēnā ka kumea tētahi atekōkiri i a ia e haere ana, tērā pea ka taea e rātou te hopu i tētahi tauwhitinga ki ngā pirihimana. Kua whakahētia ngā umanga a Ring i mua nā te mea kua whakahauhautia ngā kaiwhakamahi kia tiritiri i ā rātou hopukanga ki ngā mana. Nā tēnei i āki ngā kerēme kei te whakapūnoa i ngā hangarau matatū e uru ana ki te oranga o te tangata. E kī ana te wehenga i ōna hua tīariari - tae atu ki ngā pere ataata, ngā kāmera ataata rō whare, me ngā pūnaha pūoho atamai - kua āwhina ki te whakahaumaru ake i ngā paetata. Ko te whakapau moni a te kaihoko o te ao mo nga hua o te kainga atamai e tumanakohia ana kia hinga tata ki te 15% i tenei tau ki te $ 44bn (£ 24.5bn) na te hekenga o te ohanga i puta mai i te mate uruta Covid-19, e ai ki te umanga rangahau mākete Strategy Analytics. Engari e matapae ana i te rebound i te tau 2021. Kua whakapaea kētia e ngā tauwhāinga o Amazon he whanonga ārai whakataetae mā te hoko i ana hua i te utu iti iho i te utu hei mahi, kia haumaru ai te tiri mākete. I te pātaitanga mō ngā hokonga o ngā tukuoro Echo o te umanga i a Hōngongoi, ka kī te rangatira nui o Te Umanga kāore i ngaro te moni i runga i te awhe i te wā i hokona ai i te "utu rārangi", engari i whakaae i te nuinga o te wā i runga i te whakatairanga i te utu iti iho. Ko ētahi atu pānuitanga nui a Amazon ko te whakarewatanga o tana ratonga roma kēmu ā-kapua rongo. Ka whakahaere a Luna i ngā kēmu i runga i ngā tūmau rorohiko mamao kia kore ai e hiahiatia e ngā kaitākaro te hoko papatohu, ētahi atu pūrere whakaihi rānei i tua atu i te pūmana. Ka tukuna e tōna hongere Luna+ te urunga ki tētahi tīpakonga kēmu tawhito pēnei i te Mana, Resident Evil: Biohazard, Sonic Mania me Metro: Exodus mō te $6 i te marama. He tokomaha pea ngā kaitākaro e hiahia ana ki te "hongere Ubisoft" e whai ake nei, arā ko te kēmu Assassin's Creed panuku a te kaiwhakaputa i waenganui i ētahi atu putanga tuhituhi. Kāore anō kia whakaaturia te utu ā-marama o te hongere Ubisoft. I te whakarewatanga, ka mahi tahi a Luna me ngā dongle Fire TV a Amazon, ngā rorohiko Windows me MacOS, tae atu ki ngā iPhones me ngā iPads mā te pūtirotiro tukutuku. E mōhiotia ana te tautoko mō ngā iPhones me ngā iPads i te mea kua rāhuitia e Āporo ētahi atu ratonga roma kēmu kōtaha tiketike kāore i whakarongo ki ōna ture Pātaka Taupānga. Ka whakataetae a Luna ki a Google Stadia, nāna i whakarewa i te tau ki mua, ā, kua uaua ki te whakatū i a ia anō ki tētahi mākete arokē. Ko Xbox Game Pass, PlayStation Now, Apple Arcade me EA Play kei waenganui i ētahi atu ratonga ohaurunga e whakataetae ana mō ngā moni me te aro atu o ngā kaitākaro. Heoi anō, kei a Amazon te painga o te whai i te pūhara Twitch tino rongonui, e mātakitaki ai te tangata i a rāua anō e tākaro ana. Mā tēnei pea e āwhina ki te whakatairanga i a Luna. "Kei te whakaae a Amazon i ngā hongere hunga-tuatoru i Luna, engari he utu tāpiri ki te kaiwhakamahi," te kōrero a Piers Harding-Rolls mai i Ampere Analysis. I tāpiritia e ia ko tēnei te rautaki hangai ki Microsoft, kātahi anō ka whakaaturia mai kei te paihere i te EA Play ki te putanga whakamutunga o tōna Xbox Game Pass me te kore whakapiki i tōna utu. "He nui ake te tautoko, te ngāwari hoki o te huarahi a Amazon," te whakamutunga a Tēnā Harding-Rolls. Ko ngā kaiwhakamahi i ētahi wāhi o te US anake te hunga e āhei ana ki te waitohu mō te "urunga wawe" i tēnei wā. He ngāwari noa iho te wareware i te tere o te whanaketanga o te hangarau drone. Ko Always Home Cam he hāngai tonu mai i tētahi whitiāhua pakiwaitara pūtaiao o te tau 1980. Engari ko te tau 2020 tēnei, ā, kei konei te hangarau mō te rere i ngā rīpene haumarutanga. Mō ngā tau, kua whakamahia e Amazon ngā drones hei ngana ki te whakatere ake i tana whatunga tuku. A, i mua, kua huatau ōna ārai ka taea hoki e ēnei te whakarato ratonga matatū. Engari he whanaketanga hou te whakamahi i te rīpene mō te haumarutanga i roto i te kāinga. Tērā ētahi āwangawanga whānui koinei te pito angiangi o te poro. Tērā pea kei roto i ngā hua ā muri ake ko ngā drones Ring e mahi huri noa ana i tō whare i ētahi wā atu i te tāhaetanga whakapae - tērā pea ka puta he drones ārai ā muri ake nei. Ko ētahi atu pānuitanga atamai i te wā o te takahanga mariko a Amazon he whakarerekētanga mō te Pāoro o te umanga me ngā tukuoro atamai Echo Dot iti iho, e haere mai ana ināianei i roto i ngā hoahoa porowhita. Ināianei ka taea e ngā pūrere te mōhio ina kōrero tētahi tamaiti ki a rātou me te urutau i ā rātou urupare - hei tauira, te tīpako i ngā waiata "rata tamariki" ina tonoa kia purei pūoro. I kī te umanga mā tētahi maramara rorohiko hōu i roto e āhei ai ētahi atu tūmahi e pā ana ki te mōhiohio horihori kia tukatukatia paetata, ko te tikanga ka tere ake te hoatu i ngā urupare ki ngā tono me ngā pātai. I whakarewaina hoki e Amazon tētahi putanga hōu o tōna mata atamai Echo Show 10, ā, ka taea ināianei te tītaka kia noho anga atu ki ōna kaiwhakamahi i a rātou e neke ana. Anō hoki, kua whakamohoatia te kāmera rō-tonu ki tētahi wae 13-megapixel kia taea ai te topa mamati me te aroturuki i ngā kaiwhakamahi. Mā tēnei e āwhina i te mīhini kia kite tonu i te rangatira i te wā o te kōrerorero ataata, me te whakaata i ngā āheinga o te hua Tomokanga tauwhāinga a Facebook. Ka tāpiri hoki te pūrere i te tautoko mō ngā waea ataata Topa me Netflix, tae atu ki te pupuri i ngā ratonga proprietari a Amazon me Skype. I tāpiritia e Amazon ka wawe ake te tangi o te reo o Alexa, mā te tāpiri i ngā okioki kia "manawa" ai a Alexa. Ā, e kī ana ka pai ake te kaiāwhina mariko ki te mōhio i te wā e kōrero ana ngā kiritaki ki a ia, i te wā e kōrero ana rātou ki a rātou, i muri i te whakahohenga o tētahi kupu whakaoho. Mā tēnei e āwhina ki te karo i te urupare ki ngā kōrero kāore i te hāngai ki a ia. E tohu ana a Amazon Echo kia 11.6 miriona ngā kaiwhakamahi tukuoro atamai i te UK i te mutunga o te tau 2020, e ai ki te umanga rangahau eMarketer. He taumira, e kī ana ko te tauwhāinga tata rawa o Google Home e 3.7 miriona. Ko ētahi atu hua hōu i pānuitia ko:

title: Ngā rongo kōrero kōrero i te tau 2016: He aha tērā, he aha te kore, me pēhea te āwhina
summary: I roto i tētahi tau i puta ai ngā whakaaro ki te nui ake i te pono, kua puta ētahi rongo ehara i te mea pono, engari he pono.
text: Kua whakaingoatia te "Post-truth" hei kupu o te 2016 e Oxford Dictionaries, engari me pēhea e pai ake ai te pāpāho, ko koe rānei, ki te kōrero i te pono mai i ngā whakatūpato me ngā hē? Kaore he mea pērā ki te Kaitiaki o Te Pōti o Amerika, otirā ko tōna toa ko Donald Trump, otirā ko te tautoko mōna i runga i te pāpāho pāpori, kua pana i ngā rongo kōrero kōrero ki mua, tae atu ki te miramira i te āhuatanga tūpono ka taea e ia. Hei tauira, i kī a Tēnā Puhi ka "tinihangatia" te pōti. I whakakāhoretia e te BBC te kerēme i te mutunga o Whiringahora me ngā kerēme ōrite i mua i te pōti 2008. Ko te CCTV e tautoko ana i te ariā "tinihanga" i ahu mai i te Christian Times Newspaper, he pae rongokōrero kōrero kōrero kia kaua e pōraru ki te Christian Times (he nūpepa). Waihoki, kāore he nūpepa pērā i te Kaitiaki o Denver, ahakoa tana paetukutuku e kerēme ana mō ngā īmēra māturu mai i a Hillary Kikorangi. Titiro ki ngā whakarara ki te pūrākau o te whakamihi a Denzel Washington mō Donald Trump: he paetukutuku rangirua, he pūtake kāore anō kia manatokona, me te tāruatanga me te aro atu mā te pāpāho pāpori. Kātahi ka pūrongotia e ngā rōpū rongokōrero nui ake ngā mea e puta ana i runga i te pāpāho pāpori me te tāpiri i te whakawhirinakitanga ki te pūrākau me te kore takitaki tūturu. Waihoki, i patua a Trump i mua i te pōtitanga e tētahi kerēme i tāruatia i runga i te pāpāho pāpori i kī ai ia i te tau 1998 he "wahangu". Ehara i te pono, i pūrongotia e TNW, he rōpū rongokōrero kua tino whakahētia e te Puhi. I muri i te pōtitanga ka whānau mai te rongo o te Puhi i Pakitāne. Kāo, kāore rawa ia. Kaore i aukati i ētahi umanga ao whānui kia kaua e tārua i te kerēme. Tērā pea ko te tauira tino rongonui ko te ariā whakatupu i horahia mō Comet Ping Pong, he wharekai pizza i Washington DC, nāna i mau tētahi tangata i tētahi raiwhara whakaeke ki te kāinga, i whakatau ki te tūhura mōna anō. 'Fakey McFakeface' I tawhiti atu i te pōtitanga o Amerika, ka pakaru ngā rongo kōrero kōrero ki ngā kāwai whānui ake e rua: Ko te mea i hangaia, ko te mea i whakanuia, i hē rānei. I whakaingoatia e tētahi kararehe Hainamana tētahi gorilla Harambe McHarambeface? Ehara rawa, ā, ko te Kaiārahi o Boston, pērā ki te Kaitiaki o Denver, ki te Nūpepa Karaitiana rānei, te āhua nei ko te pūtake kotahi o ngā rongo. He tino nui te pōhēhētanga o te pūrākau. Na te tuhinga a te Kaiārahi i whakakotahi e rua o ngā pūrākau tino kōrero: ko te matenga o Harambe te gorilla i Te Kararehe o Cincinnati me te pōti tūmatanui mō te British Antarctic Survey ki te karanga i tētahi oko ko Boaty McBoatface. Hei whakamātau i tētahi wāhi mō te ngāwari o te hanga pūrākau e hiahia ana te tangata ki te whakapono i runga i te pāpāho pāpori, tokorua ngā rangatahi Rūhia i moemoeā i tētahi piriona i Instagram, ā, ka hokona tōna oranga kore ki te ao. I muri iho ka whakairihia tuihonotia e tētahi o rātou: "He ngāwari noa iho te tinihanga i te tangata, me te pēhea hoki e kore ai te hunga e āta tirotiro i ngā mōhiohio." Kāore i te tino tika i te kōrero pakiwaitara, kua tāpiritia te whakanuitanga me ngā hē ki ngā rongokōrero kāore i te 2016. I moe rānei tētahi kaipatu ahi o Mareia i te nakahi? Kāo, he pūrākau tērā i āhua mohoao ake i tētahi wāhi i te mekameka tānga mōhiohio mai i te pāpāho paetata ki ngā rongokōrero o te ao whānui. Kotahi neke atu rānei te paetukutuku nūpepa kei runga tonu te pūrākau, kua tangohia e tētahi atu. Tirohia tēnei atahanga: no te whakaekenga o Pōroa i Poutāpeta? Kāo, nō tētahi whakaekenga i te Taunga Rererangi o Domodedovo, Mohihi. I tuhituhi ētahi nūpepa UK me te ao whānui i ngā atahanga maha i ngā haora tuatahi i muri i te whakaekenga ka taea te whakahoki ki te whakaekenga o te tau 2011 me tētahi atu mai i taua tau i Pērara. Ina pā mai ngā tūkinotanga i hangaia e te tangata, i ngā tūkinotanga māori rānei, ka puta anō ngā whakaahua tawhito. I roto i te tere ki te tāpiri mōhiohio, ki te aro atu rānei - mai i ngā ahi ki ngā rohe pakanga - ka hē, ka hē rānei te ataata me ngā whakaahua. E ora ana te Facebook Engari i ētahi wā kāore he pēhanga, ā, ka āta whakawāteatia ngā atahanga. Hei tauira, he maha ngā wā i rapu ai ki te whakapau i te tangohanga o te ratonga roma ataata Facebook Live i tēnei tau. I kite ngā whāngai 'Live' mai i te mokowā i te 26 o Whiringa ā-rangi, neke atu i te 43m ngā kaimātakitaki mō ngā atahanga tawhito, koromeke mai i te Teihana Mokowā Ao Whānui. I te tīmatanga, kaore te tangata i pātai. I te wiki i muri iho, ka whakairihia e Interestinate me USA Viral ngā ataata e whā haora e kī ana he pikinga ora o tētahi pourewa 1,999ft (609m). Anō, kāore i pātaitia, e hia mano ngā tiritiri me ngā tauhohenga, me ngā tirohanga miriona, ka huri ake ia i te rārangi wā o ētahi atu kaiwhakamahi Facebook. Heoi anō, ehara i te pono. He aha tāu e taea ai mēnā ka pānui, ka tārua, ka whakairi anō rānei koe i ngā rongokōrero i te 2017, anei ngā mea hei pātai ki a koe anō: Kua hangaia hoki e mātou tēnei kaiārahi ki te pūrongo i ngā rongo kōrero kōrero i runga i te pāpāho pāpori, ā, kua whakarewaina e Google News tētahi ratonga taki-tūturu. I hangaia e te tīma UGC me te Rongokōrero Pāpori

title: Ko Tā Ken Dodd me te mutunga o tētahi wā pukuhohe
summary: I ngā tau 1960 me te '70, ka tīmata te wā Raumati o Ken Dodd i Blackpool i Whitsuntide, ā, ka mutu i te Kirihimete.
text: Nā David SillitoMedia and Arts Correspondent E rua ngā wā i te rā Mane ki te Paraire, e toru ngā wā i te Hātarei, ā, ka whakakīa e ia tētahi whare tapere tūru 3,000 i ia wā, he wāhi nui ake i te London Palladium. Kātahi, i te Rātapu, ka tākaro a ia i tētahi atu wāhi i tētahi atu taone. I te nuinga o te wā ko Scarborough te tauwhāinga ki te raki o Blackpool. Neke atu i te kotahi miriona ngā kiritaki utu i te tapeke. E whā tekau tau i muri mai, kei te tukitukia tana wāhi auau o Scarborough, te Futurist. Ko ērā atu whare tapere e rua o te wā raumati, ko te Hōro Putiputi me te Whare Opera, kua roa kē atu te haere. Heoi anō, mēnā e hiahia ana koe ki te mārama ki a Ken Dodd, ka āwhina mēnā ka maumahara koe ki tētahi mea o tēnei wā i te mutunga o te momo me te hōro pūoro. Kua wehewehea te kōhua o nāianei ki te rua. Kei raro ko ngā karapu iti o te tū tūturu. Ko te nuinga o te wā he taitamariki, he pai te whakahinuhinu o te huihuinga. Kei runga ko te rōpū tīpako o ngā whetū pouaka whakaata e āhei ana ki te tākaro i ngā whakaterenga tino nui. I te wā o Ken Dodd, ko tana hunga whakarongo he whānau i te hararei o te wiki i te taha moana. Ko te ika me te rīwai, te tī, te parāoa me te pata - me ngā wāhanga nui - ko te whakaritenga noa iho o mua i te whakaaturanga. Ka tukuna e ia he wāhanga nui o te kōhua. I wehi nga atekōkiri waka o Scarborough i ana haerenga, i te mōhiotanga ka tatari rātau i te ākau ki ngā haora moata o te ata. I ētahi wā, i roto i ngā hopukanga tawhito, ka kite koe i te hunga whakarongo me te kite i te tokomaha o rātou he wāhine pakeke me ngā tamariki tamariki. Me kimi e ia he huarahi kia kata katoa ai rātau. Ko te rongoā ko te rere o ngā kōauau. Kotahi i muri i tētahi ka ringihia e rātau ki a koe. Ki te toru i hapa i to rātau tohu, ka whiwhi te tuawhā i a koe. E karapoti ana i a koe te tangi o te kata tautoko, ā, te āhua nei he āhua rekareka ake ngā mea katoa. Tērā tētahi take, i te wā kua roa te wā e haere ana ōna hoa mahi, kei te whakakī tonu ia i ngā whare tapere - he kōrero whānui tēnei, he heahea, he mātauranga hoki te whakawā. Tērā pea he iti noa iho tana hākinakina, engari i mōhio tonu ia me pēhea te tuku atu ki te hunga whakarongo ki tōna whānau. E tū ana i roto i ngā parirau ko tana hoa wahine ko Anne, e taki ana i ngā kōrero whakakata kia tino mōhio ai kei te whiwhi te tangata i tētahi mea tino hou. Kātahi, ahakoa mutu te whakaaturanga, ka kitea tonutia ia i muri i te kōti, e waitohu ana i ngā waitohu me te kōrero kōrero anō. E ai ki taku kōrero, he wāhanga nui. He pukuhohe ahumahi tēnei mō tētahi ao i mua i Benidorm me te hekenga roa o te raki mahi. I ngā tau 60, ka mauria e te kaituhituhi a John Osborne ngā kaitapere mai i te Kōti Ariki kia kite i a ia ki te whakaatu i te mahi kōhua. I kitea hoki te Pirimia o Harold Wilson i roto i te hunga whakaminenga. A, i roto i tētahi uiuinga ātaahua ki a Keni Dodd i runga i te Rārangi Pō Tōmuri o te Pō, ka pātaitia ia mō tērā atu mea nui i roto i te kōhua i taua wā, te pūkenga pūhohe. He whakarerekē a ia. Ko tana kī, ko te rerekētanga i waenganui i te atamai me te ngahau. I whakaaro a ia, he kāniwha, he mea whakarihariha. Ko te ngahau e pā ana ki te whakakotahi i te tangata. I ngā wā katoa i te taha o te ngahau a Keni Dodd. Whāia mātou i Facebook, i Twitter @BBCNewsEnts, i Instagram rānei i bbcnewsents. Mēnā he huatau pūrākau tāu, īmēra entertainment.news@bbc.co.uk.

title: Coronavirus: Tērā pea ka rerekē tā mātou mahi, e kī ana a PM
summary: Kua whakaae a Boris Johnson kāore te kāwanatanga i mārama ki te coronavirus i roto i ngā "wiki me ngā marama tuatahi" o te pakarutanga o UK.
text: I kī atu te PM ki te kaiwhakatika tōrangapū o TE AO, a Laura Kuenssberg, he "pātai tino tuwhera" mēnā kua tōmuri rawa te raka. I kōrero anō a Tēnā Hōnea mō "ngā akoranga hei ako" me te kī ka taea e ngā minita te mahi i ētahi mea "rerekē". I whakapaea e Labour te kāwanatanga o te "mahi hē" i te raruraru. Neke atu i te 45,000 nga tangata i te UK kua mate i muri i te whakamatautau pai mo te coronavirus, e whakaatu ana nga whika a te kawanatanga, me te tata ki te 300,000 nga keehi kua whakapumautia. I tērā wiki, i kī taurangi a Mr Johnson i tētahi uiuinga "takitahi" ki te mate urutā, engari kāore anō kia hoatu he taipitopito mō tōna whānuitanga, wā rānei. I mua, kua kī te pirimia i tangohia e ia nga "whakataunga tika i te wā tika", i runga anō i nga tohutohu a nga kaipūtaiao. Engari, i roto i tētahi uiuinga ki a Laura Kuenssberg hei tohu i te huritau tuatahi o tana tomokanga ki Downing Street, ka kī a ia: "Kāore mātou i mārama ki [te huaketo] i te huarahi e pai ana ki a mātou i ngā wiki me ngā marama tuatahi. " E whakaaro ana ahau, tērā pea, ko te mea kotahi kāore i kitea e mātau i te tīmatanga ko te whānuitanga o te tare asymptomatically mai i tētahi tangata ki tētahi tangata." E hiahia ana a Mr Johnson ki te whakamahi i te wheako o te kāwanatanga i te wā o te mate urutā hei whakatere ake i tana rārangi take, ki te "taurua i runga i te taumata", e ai ki tana kupu tōrangapū motuhake. Ki tētahi atu kupu, kia nui ake te manawanui, me te iti iho o te fudge i Whitehall, me ngā huringa e kī ana ia ka whakapai ake i te oranga o ngā kaipōti, otirā ko te hunga i pōti i a Tory mō te wā tuatahi i te tau 2019. I a ia e whakarite ana i te NHS mō tētahi āwhina tuarua, e mārama ana tana hiahia ki te arotahi ki ngā mea e whai ake nei, ehara i ngā mea i mua. Engari tērā pea kia tino rite rā anō te kāwanatanga ki te mōhio ki ngā mea i tūpono, ka haere tonu ngā pātai - ā, ka māharahara tonu pea te iwi whānui mēnā ka tino whakawhirinaki rātou ki ngā minita ki te whakahaere i tētahi pātōtō tuarua a tērā wā. Rite tonu ki te 366 rā ki mua, ko te tūmanako te moko a Boris Johnson. Engari mēnā kua whakaaturia e ngā marama torutoru nei tētahi mea, ko te tino wero o te ora i runga i te mana, ko ngā takahanga e whakamīharo ana. I tāpiri mai te pirimia: "E whakaaro ana ahau he pai ki te kī atu he mea me ako tātau me pēhea tātau i whakahaere ai i ngā wāhanga o mua... Ka nui ngā wā hei ako i ngā akoranga o te mea i tūpono." I te mutunga o Poutāpeta, e kī ana ngā kaiwhakawāwā kua tōmuri rawa, ā, ka pau te oranga. Ka kī a Tēnā Hōnea: "Tērā pea he mea rerekē tā mātou mahi, ā, ka whai wā ki te mārama ki ngā mea i taea e mātou, i mahi rerekē rānei." I tāpiri mai a ia he "pātai tino tuwhera tonu ēnei ki ngā [kaipūtaiao], ā, tērā tētahi wā, e mārama ana, ki te whakaaro i aua take katoa". I te Paraire, ka pānuitia e te kāwanatanga e 30 miriona ngā tāngata i Ingarangi ka tukuna he kano ārai mate rewharewha i tēnei tau, hei whakaiti i te pēhanga o te NHS ki te pā mai te mate coronavirus i te ngahuru me te hōtoke. I kī a Tēnā Hōnea he tāpiri tēnei ki te nui ake o te whakamātautau me te aroturuki me ētahi atu tikinga o ngā taputapu ārai whaiaro, ka tāpiri: "Ko te mea e tino hiahia ana te tangata ki te arotahi ināianei he aha tā mātou mahi hei whakarite mō te wāhanga panuku." Ka kī a ia: "E tangi ana mātau ki te hunga katoa i ngaro i o rātau ora, ā, kei te tino nui o mātau whakaaro ki o rātau whānau. Ā, kei a au te kawenga katoa mō ngā mea katoa i mahia e te kāwanatanga." I kī te pirimia, i whakanohoia ki te tiaki nui i Aperira i muri i te pāngia o te coronavirus, ka "wawe tonu" tana whakarite i ngā tikanga hou hei mahi i te momona, e kitea ana he take mōrearea tāpiri mō ngā tūroro. I muri i te kī taurangi kia "taumata" ngā wāhi katoa o te UK, ka tangohia e te Rōpū Rangatira o Tēnā Hōnea tētahi pōti nui tūturu i runga i te Mahi a Jeremy Corbyn, i muri i te kī taurangi kia "taumata" i ngā wāhi katoa o te UK. A, ahakoa te tūkinotanga ohaoha i puta mai i te coronavirus i roto i ngā marama e whā kua hipa, neke atu rānei, ka kī taurangi te pirimia kia nui ake ngā nēhi, ngā tākuta, ngā hōhipera me ngā pirihimana, e kī ana ko ngā manakē a tana kāwanatanga "he rite tonu ki a rātou i ngā wā katoa, hāunga ētahi atu mea. Kei te whakarua mātou." "Ko te rārangi take he aha i a au e tū ana i runga i ngā hipanga o Te Tiriti o Te Tiriti i te tau ki mua, engari e hiahia ana mātou ki te haere ki tua atu, ā, e hiahia ana mātou ki te haere tere ake." I mahara a Tēnā Hōnea ki te tāurunga tuatahi ki te No 10 hei pirimia i te 24 o Hōngongoi 2019, e kī ana "he tino mīharo, ā, te āhua nei he tino pai te wairua o te katoa" me te "hari, ngākau nui". I tāpiritia e ia he maha ngā "uauatanga" i puta mai i te coronavirus mai i taua wā. "He wā whakaharahara tēnei mō te whenua," te kī a Tēnā Hōnea. "Engari e mōhio ana hoki ahau he iwi tēnei me te manawanui māori, me te kaha me te whakaaro. E whakaaro ana ahau ka tino kaha ake tātau i mua." Mo Labour, i kii te hekeretari hauora atarangi a Jonathan Ashworth: "I te mutunga ka whakaae a Boris Johnson kua hē te urupare a te kawanatanga ki te coronavirus. " He pōturi rawa ki te whakaae ki te tuma o te huaketo, he pōturi rawa ki te uru ki te raka, he pōturi rawa ki te āta whakaaro i tēnei raruraru." Ko te tuma o te ngaru tuarua o ngā mate he "tino tūturu tonu", i tāpiri mai a ia, i a ia e "whakahau ana kia ako te kāwanatanga i ngā akoranga o ōna hē kia taea ai e mātou te āwhina ki te whakaora ora". I kī te kaiārahi Liberal Democrat a Tā Ed Davey he "mea nui" tētahi uiui coronavirus "wawe", ā, kua whakaaturia e te pirimia "kāore he pouri" mō ōna "hē kino".

title: Te pikinga o te mate huka 'hei whakanui i te mate manawa me te whiu'
summary: Kua tautuhia ngā whakaekenga manawa me ngā whiu i Ingarangi ki te pana i roto i ngā tau e 20 e whai ake nei i te pikinga o ngā kēhi mate huka e honoa ana ki te āhua noho, kua whakatūpato tētahi aroha.
text: Nā Alex TherrienHealth, BBC News E whakaarotia ana kia piki ake te maha o ngā mate huka ki te kotahi miriona i te tau 2035, i te nuinga o te wā e nui ake ana ngā kēhi o te mate huka momo 2 me te nui haere o te momona. Tērā pea ka 29% te pikinga o ngā whakaekenga manawa me ngā whiu e honoa ana ki te mate huka, te kī a te British Heart Foundation. I kī te aroha e hiahiatia ana he "mahi taekaha" hei rutu i te urutā momona. Ka pā te mate huka ki te kotahi i roto i te 11 ngā pakeke puta noa i te ao, ā, ka whakanui ake i te mōrea o te whakaeke manawa, te whiu, te kāpō me te hinganga tākihi. Ko te nuinga o ngā take - 90% - i takea mai i te mate huka momo 2, e honoa ana ki te momona me ētahi atu kōwhiringa hauora rawakore. Ko ērā atu 10% he mate huka momo 1, he mate o te pūnaha ārai kāore he pānga ki ngā kōwhiringa āhua noho, ā, kāore e taea te ārai, te whakahoki rānei. E matapae ana te Hauora Tūmatanui o Ingarangi mēnā ka haere tonu ngā āhuatanga o nāianei, e rima miriona ngā mate huka i te tau 2035. E whakaaro ana te Tūranga Manawa o Ingarangi ka ahu mai tēnei: Ko te pikinga o te maha o ngā mate huka me ngā raruraru hauora nui, tērā pea ka hoatu he "kawenga tawhito" ki te NHS, ka whakatūpato te BHF. I kī a Haimona Kirikiri, te rangatira nui o te aroha: "Ngā mihi ki te rangahau, kua tino pai mātou ki te whakapai ake i ngā pāpātanga ora mō ngā whakaekenga manawa me ngā whiu. " Heoi anō, ko nga whika o tēnei rā e tohu ana ki tētahi ia tino māharahara. "Kei te nui ake te mōrearea o ngā tāngata mate huka ki te whakawhanake i ngā mate manawa me ngā mate rere, ā, ko te pana tūmanakohia i roto i ngā kēhi mate huka momo 2 i te tau 2035 ka mōrearea pea ētahi atu tāngata ki te whakaeke manawa whakamate, ki te whiu rānei." I te 38 noa iho o ona tau, i muri noa iho i te kitenga i te mate huka momo 2. I kī a ia i tōna whakaekenga manawa, me te hopu manawa o muri mai, i whakahaua ia kia tuku i tana mahi nēhi. I kī a Sarah, e 43, mai i Somerset: "He uaua te noho me te mate huka, engari he tino ohorere te whakaeke manawa. " Na te whakaekenga i mate ai te manawa, nāna i tino whakawhāiti te kounga o tōku ora. "I've had to give up my nursing career, my social life, and my family dynamic has totally changed forever." Ko te whakatūpato a te BHF e whai ana i te putanga o ngā whika i tērā wiki e whakaatu ana i te pikinga o te tokomaha o ngā tamariki me ngā taitamariki e rongoatia ana mō te mate huka momo 2 i Ingarangi me Weera. I piki te tau mai i te 507 ki te 715 i roto i te whā tau, ka whakaaturia mai te raraunga. Neke atu i te toru hauwhā o ēnei tamariki me ēnei taitamariki he mōmona hoki, e ai ki ngā whika NHS. I kī a Tēnā Kirikiri e hiahiatia ana he "mahi taekaha" hei rutu i te momona me te tautauā, "i waenganui i te rangatahi". I tāpiri mai a ia: "Me whai whakaaro tēnei ki ētahi atu mahi ture hei whakaiti i te huka me te ihirangi ngako i roto i te kai, me te whāwhā i ngā pānuitanga kai paraurehe e hāngai ana ki ngā tamariki tamariki. " Kāore te umanga kai i te tere te mahi ki te tātai anō i ana hua, ahakoa te whakatū i ngā whakaaturanga o tō rātou pānga ki te hauora o te iwi." Whāia a Alex i Twitter.

title: Coronavirus: Isle of Wight hospice faces cost pressures
summary: Ko te tiaki i ngā tūroro mate mate i te kāinga i te wā o te taiepa coronavirus, me te hinganga o te kohi moni, ka whakawehi pea i ngā ratonga ā muri ake, kua whakatūpato te hospice o Te Motu o Wight.
text: I kī a Mountbatten Hospice ahakoa rā, kei te whakaroa tonu i ana ratonga hei āwhina ki te whakangāwari i te pēhanga o te NHS. Kei te whakangungu hoki i ngā tūao i roto i te tiaki whakamutunga o te ora, ā, kua whakatūria he raina āwhina mō ngā kaimahi NHS o te motu. I kī te rangatira nui o Nigel Hartley e anga ana ki tētahi "ngaromanga nui o te moni whiwhinga". I kii te hospice kua nui ake nga haerenga ki nga kainga o nga turoro e mahi ana i raro i nga tikanga haumaru hou hei aukati i te horapa o te coronavirus. Kei te whakangungu hoki ngā toa aroha i ngā tūao mai i te NHS me ngā mema o te iwi whānui i ngā pūkenga tiaki whakamutunga i te wā e whakahau ana te hōhipera matua o te motu ki te mahi i ngā tūroro Covid-19. Kei te tahuri ētahi wāhanga o te Hōhipera o Hato Meri i Newport hei āwhina ki te whakarato i ētahi atu moenga e 200. Kua tono te aroha ki ngā koha moni tūmatanui me ētahi atu taputapu parenga whaiaro (PPE) mō ngā kaimahi. Mr Hartley said the hospice would "help our island through this virus" but said it faced a loss of more than £1m following the cancellation of fundraising events such as the annual Walk the Wight event and the closure of its charity shops. "E mārama ana i te pikinga o te maha o ngā kēhi, me te pēhanga o te pūnaha, me whakarite tātau katoa ki te tiaki i a tātau i aroha ai i te kāinga. " He nui haere te pono me whakahoki e tātau ngā ratonga ā muri ake nei, ki te kore e taea e te hapori motu te hoatu i ngā mea e taea ana e rātou ināianei kia rerekē ai i ngā wiki me ngā marama e heke mai nei," tana kī. Hospice UK has said it is in talks with the government over funding issues faced by hospices across the country.

title: Uiuinga a Pte Cheryl James: Ka haere te Koroni ki te whakaaro i te whakataunga
summary: Kua haere te koroni i te uiuinga ki te matenga o tētahi hōia i kitea i pūhia i te whare o Deepcut i Surrey ki te whakaaro i tana whakataunga.
text: I kitea a Pte Cheryl James kua mate me te motu matā ki te māhunga i te tau 1995. I tīmata te uiuinga i te wā o Hui tanguru, ā, neke atu i te 100 ngā kaiwhakaatu. I whakaaturia ngā tukunga whakamutunga i mua. Ko te tau 18 tau mai i te raki o Wales, tētahi o ngā tauwhiti tokowhā i mate i te pūtake i roto i te whitu tau. I kī a Alison Foster QC, e tohu ana i te whānau o Pte James, "kāore he tūāpapa pono" mō tētahi kitenga i whakararurarutia te motu, ā, i kī rātau i whakarongo ki "te tūponotanga o tētahi whakamutunga tuwhera". I kī atu a Ms Foster ki te kōti "kāore e taea e mātou te mōhio ki ngā āhuatanga tūturu i tūtaki ai a Ms James ki tōna matenga." 'Toenga rehu' I kī a ia he nui tonu ngā whakaaturanga hei whakamutu i patua a Pte James e te raiwhara i tawhiti. E tuwhera ana ki te koroni, i tāpiritia e Ms Foster, ki te kite i "patua a Pte James e tētahi motu pū kore whakapā ki te māhunga e tētahi rōpū tuatoru tē mōhiotia." Ko te whakaaturanga i whakahuatia hei tautoko i tēnei ko Prof Derrick Pounder, nāna i kī ko Pte James me pūhia mai i tawhiti nā te mea kāore he toenga kōhukihuki i runga i tōna kanohi me tōna ringa. I kī atu a John Beggs QC, e tohu ana i ngā Pirihimana o Te Kōti, ki te kōti ko te whakamutunga "tika" ko te whakamate i a ia anō i runga anō i te whakaaro me te whakaaro. I kī a ia he whāititanga o ngā whakaaturanga, otirā o te āhua ā-ture, engari me kaua ēnei e ārai i te kaitirotiro kia kite i te "pikitia whakaaturanga katoa". Ā muri ake, ka tāpiritia e ia "kāore he kōhukihuki kotahi, ehara i te mea kotahi te whakaaturanga, hei tohu i te whakauru a te hunga tuatoru." I kī a Nicholas Moss, e tohu ana i te Manatu Whakangungu, he "mārama" ngā whakaaturanga e tika ana hei huatau i pūhia e Ms James a ia anō. I kī atu a ia ki te kōti he "tino mīharo" ki te huatau kia whai wā, kaha rānei tētahi ki te patu i a Pte James, kātahi ka whakatū i te tirohanga kia āhua ai he whai i a ia. I whakaahuatia e Tēnā Moss a Prof Pounder he "kaiwhakaatu kāore i te pai" nāna i whakaatu "te kore tiaki me te kore mārō". Ināianei kua tangohia ngā whakaaturanga katoa e te koroni i Woking. Kua tangohia e te uiuinga he whakaaturanga mai i ngā tāngata toko 109 tae atu ki ngā kaiwhakaatu tohunga e iwa. E tūmanakohia ana kia hoatu e te Koroni o Kōrero Barker QC ana whakatauranga i te 18 o Me. I whakapūketetia e tētahi uiuinga tuatahi ki te matenga o Pte James i Hakihea 1995 tētahi whakataunga tuwhera. I whakahaua tēnei uiuinga tuarua i Woking i muri i te whakakorenga a nga kaiwhakawā o te Kōti Tiketike i nga kitenga taketake. Ko wai te whā o Deepcut? Papamuri ki ngā mate me te rārangi wā o ngā takahanga.

title: Te mate rerenga o Hūtane ki te Tonga: Te piriti rākau i waenganui i te mate me te haumarutanga
summary: Mo te toru tau kua hōhonu ake a Hūtane ki te Tonga ki te ngangau i a ia anō, ā, ināianei kei te tapa o tētahi mea whakamataku kē atu.
text: Na Anōpia LeitheadBBC News, āhua kore nei e whakamahia e ngā kaiwhakahaere o nga Iwi o Awherika ngā kupu "whiu" me te "horoi iwi," engari ināianei e kī ana rātou ka taea e rāua te kōpikopiko i te whenua pōtiki o te ao. Mai i te mura o te tutu i Juba i a Hōngongoi, ā, ka horapa ki ngā tūnga o Equatoria ki te tonga o Hūtane ki te Tonga, e 340,000 ngā tāngata kua rere i te tutu ki Uganda e noho tata ana. He nui ake tēnā i tētahi atu whenua i tēnei tau - e kī ana te UN e 200,000 ngā tāngata kua rere i Hiria i te tau 2016. I ia rā, i te wawaenga, e 2,500 anō ngā Hūtane ki te Tonga hei hunga whakaruru, ā, ko ngā kōrero o ngā mea i mawhiti ai rātau me ngā mea i kitea e rātau i te ara, ka tāpiri ki ngā whakaaturanga o te patu, te whakakōhuru me te ūnga o ngā tangata whenua i runga i ngā rārangi iwi. E rua ngā wā i haere ai a Nelson Ladu Thomas i runga i te piriti rākau iti e wehe ana i Hūtane ki te Tonga me Uganda i tētahi whakawhitinga taitapa kore mana e mōhiotia ana ko Busia. E wehe ana te mātātā o te awa i ēnei whenua e rua, ā, he arawhata iti, he rākau hinga rānei ia rua kiromita. Ko te wā tuatahi i whakawhiti ai ia me tōna whānau tata; Ko te tuarua - i te rā i muri mai - i te wahine a tōna tuakana me ana tamariki tokorima i hoki mai ai ia ki te āwhina. 'Kāore rātau e pīrangi ki a mātau' E ono tau te pakeke o Moriswani e piki ana i te maunga ki te pou pirihimana o Uganda i reira i tirohia ai a rātau taonga i mua i te whakaaetanga ki tētahi pokapū kaiwhiwhi i tua atu i te huarahi. I pātai atu ahau ki a ia he aha ta rātau i mahue ai. "Kai te patu rātau i te tangata, e moe ana me nga wahine, e tāhae ana. Kaore rātau i te tākaro i a koe, kai te tapahi rātau i a koe ki te naihi. Ahakoa ko ngā tamariki nohinohi ka taea te patua," te kī a Tēnā Tamati ki a au. Ka horomia e nga tamariki te wai, a, ka noho ngenge i roto i te marumaru o te rā pākaha. "Kāore rātau e pīrangi ki a mātau," tana kī, a, ka whakamārama he aha tōna taone o Yei, e 80km noa iho (50 maero) mai i te rohe, i noho ai hei wāhi me wehe atu e ia. "These tribes of Dinka, they don't want Equatorians, they don't want... Nuer. Kaore rātau e pīrangi ki a rātau." Na te tutu iwi i whakanui te raruraru i Hūtane ki te Tonga. I tīmata te pakanga tūmatanui hei tautohetohe i waenganui i te Perehitini o Dinka, o Salva Kiir, me te Tuakana o Mua o Riek Machar, ko Nuer. I tīmata noa iho te ūnga o ngā Equatorians i a Hōngongoi, i te horahanga o te tutu ki tō rātou wāhi o te whenua i muri i te rerenga o ngā hōia whakakeke i te pūmatua. I muri i te raruraru o Hūtane ki te Tonga i roto i tētahi rārangi roa o ngā tāngata i tētahi pokapū kaiwhiwhi tūruru pātata, ka whakamāramatia e Otima Amos, e 21, tana whakawhiti i te rohe i muri i tana haerenga i roto i te ngahere mō ngā rā maha me ētahi atu tāngata e 16 - ko te nuinga o ngā tamariki, ā, i waenganui i a rātou he māhanga e rua tau." I haere mātau ki konei - kaore he momo waka kē," tana kī. "He tino uaua nā te mea i patua e rātau te tangata. Mehemea he tama koe ka patua koe, mēnā he kōtiro koe, he wahine rānei ka werohia koe e rātau. Ki te kore, ka patua koe." I mataku rātau kei mau rātau i a rātau e ngana ana ki te mawhiti. Ko te kāinga nui rawa o Uganda e tino pai ana ki te tomokanga nui o te hunga whakaruru. Mā te āwhina a ngā umanga āwhina, i roto i te 36 haora ka tohaina ia whānau he whenua tapawhā 30m me tētahi tarpaulin hei whakatatū i tētahi whakaruru me te tīmata ki te whakatō huawhenua. I tae mai a Faida Sarah i Aotearoa me ana tamariki, engari kua rite kē te okra ki te hauhake, tae atu ki te riki, te tōmato me ngā greens e pakaru ana i te whenua. Ko te take i mahue ai ia i a Yei, nā te mea i tētahi pō ka haere mai ngā hōia ki tōna kāinga, ka tono i ngā kī motokā mai i tana tāne, kātahi ka kōhuatia ia kia mate i waho tonu o te whare. I a Hōngongoi he kāinga a Bidi Bidi, engari ināianei ko tētahi o ngā kāinga rerenga nui rawa i te ao - ko te kāinga ki neke atu i te hauwhā miriona tāngata, ā, e 250 kiromita tapawhā. Engari ināianei ko te kāinga ki te hunga whakaruru e tata ana ki te miriona, kua tīmata a Uganda ki te uaua ki tōna huarahi ohaoha. "Kāore tēnei i te pōturi mai i a Hōngongoi," te kī a Māui Abel Fernandes, te kairuruku ohorere matua o te UNHCR i te raki o Uganda. "Me aro atu te iwi ao whānui, me te pēhi i ngā kaiārahi o Hūtane ki te Tonga kia whakamutua tēnei, he whawhaitanga tērā o ngā tangata whenua mai i ngā taha e rua." E kī ana a ia he raruraru te whakarato wai ki te hunga whakaruru, me te mea me taraka ki roto. Ko te nuinga o te hawhe o nga hunga whakaruru he tamariki, ā, kei te haere kē ngā kura - kei te tohua ngā whakamātautau, ā, kua whakaritea he whakaaturanga mo to mātau haerenga. Ka waiata, ka kanikani ngā kōtiro i roto i te porowhita, kātahi ka haere whakamua a Patricia Mercy, 16, me te maia ki te tuku i tana oriori. "Pakanga, pakanga, pakanga," ka tīmata ia, "ko wai koe, no hea mai koe?" Ko te maia me te manawanui o tana mahinga e huna ana i te mate hōhonu. "Kua patua e koe tōku whaea me tōku pāpā, tae atu ki ōku tuakana me ōku tuahine, ka waiho ahau kia kīia he pani." He nui rawa ngā pūrākau wehi i konei mo nga mahi a Hūtane ki te Tonga ki tōna ake iwi. Pānuitia ētahi atu mea: 'I pau ngā rā e huna ana ahau i roto i te repo' Peita ngā kaiwaiata mō te rangimārie Uganda: 'Ko tētahi o ngā wāhi tino pai hei rerenga'

title: Covid: Head warns of effect on early years pupils 'lasting years'
summary: Ko te raruraru i takea mai e Covid mō ngā tamariki e ako ana i ngā mea taketake o te pānui me te tatau ka raruraru pea mō ngā tau e haere ake nei, kua whakatūpato tētahi kaiako matua.
text: I kī a Matt Hood, te tumuaki o te Oak National Academy tuihono, he "mātauranga" te whakaako i ngā tau tōmua, ā, he "kore tika" te tūmanako kia mātau ngā mātua. I kī a ia ka kite pea tātau i te pānga ina noho ngā tauira i ngā GCSEs 10 tau mai i tēnei wā. I kī te kāwanatanga neke atu i te £1bn e whakapaua ana hei āwhina i ngā tauira ki te hopu. I kī a Tēnā Hood, mai i Penrith i Cumbria, e ono marama te raruraru o te kura, ka tāpiri: "Ko ngā rōpū tau e tino māharahara ana ahau ko te whiwhinga me te Tau 1. " Kāore e taea e au te āwhina i te tino nui o aua tau tōmua, i te arotahi ki te ako oro, me pēhea te pānui me te tatau, he tino nui aua mea. "They are some of the most sophisticated things to teach, it's not something you can reasonable expect any parent at home to become an expert in teaching." Mr Hood, an economics teacher who is also chair of governors at Bay Leadership Academy in Morecambe, said teachers were experts at identifying variations in an individual student's knowledge and abilities and plugging gaps. Ka kī a ia: "Ko tā mātou e kite ai he uaua ake te rerekētanga nā te mea kāore ngā kaiako i te mōhio ko te whānuitanga kua oti i ia tauira ā rātou mahi katoa i roto i te whare kura." Ko te manakē ina tīmata anō te kura katoa ko te "tāutu āputa" ki ia tamaiti, te kī a Tēnā Hood. "Ko te mōrea nui ko te waihanga i tētahi huringa mutunga kore o ngā tauira e hiahia ana ki te hopu. " Ko tētahi o ngā mea kino rawa ka taea e koe i te nuinga o te wā ko te tango i a rātou akoranga ki te hopu. We want to them to spend their time with the most expert person they can, and that is their teacher." Kua mahi tahi hoki a Mr Hood me ngā kamupene raraunga kia āhei ai ngā tauira ki te uru koreutu ki ngā paetukutuku akoranga, tae atu ki ngā puku whakatairanga kia whiwhi pūrere ipurangi ki ngā tamariki katoa kia kore ai ngā tauira "tūkino" e hapa atu. I kī tētahi kaikōrero o te Tari Mātauranga: "Ka mahi tahi te kāwanatanga me ngā mātua, ngā kaiako me ngā kura ki te whakawhanake i tētahi mahere mo te wā roa kia whai wāhi ai ngā tauira ki te whakatika i a rātau mātauranga ngaro." Whāia a TE Rāwhiti ki te Raki &Cumbria i Twitter, Facebook me Instagram. Tukuna ō whakaaro pūrākau ki northeastandcumbria@bbc.co.uk. Ngā Hononga Ipurangi Pātahi Oak National Academy Online Classroom

title: Ko te wahine o Ascot ko Joanna Brown 'te āhua o te tūtukitanga'
summary: Na te whakaekenga hama pōkākā i runga i tētahi mirionea e tana tāne rerekē i mahue i a ia te āhua o tētahi "tūtukitanga motokā", kua rongo te hūri.
text: I whakapaetia e Robert Brown te wahine a Hoana, e 46, ki te mate i to rātau kāinga mārena i Ascot, i Berkshire, i runga i tētahi whakaaetanga mārena. I rongo hoki te Kōti Karauna Pānui i ngā taipitopito whakairoiro o ngā whara e 40 i pāngia e ia ki te hama matimati. E whakaae ana a Paraone, e 47, o Winkfield, ki te patu i tana wahine, engari e whakakāhore ana i te kōhuru. E whakakāhore ana hoki a ia i te ārai i te koroni kia kaua e mau i tētahi uiuinga. I kitea te tinana o Mrs Brown i tanumia ki te Pānga o Kuini o Windsor i te 5 o Whiringa 2010, e whā rā i muri i tana pūrongo ngaro. I kī atu te 'kokonga mokemoke' ki te kōti i pā mai te whaea o te tokorua ki ōna ringa me ōna ringa i a ia e tiaki ana i a ia ki te whakaeke, ā, i pāngia e ia ngā whatinga i te nuinga o te wā e kitea ana i roto i ngā aituā huarahi. I rongo te kōti i mua i te keri a te kaihautū o British Airways, a Tēnā Paraone, i tētahi urupa i tētahi kokonga mokemoke o te pae i ngā wiki i mua i te kōhurutanga i te 31 o Whiringahora i tērā tau. I te pō o te whakaekenga, i muri i tana whakataka i a rāua tamariki tokorua ki te whare o tana kōtiro hou, ka tōia e ia te tinana ki te pae, a, ka mahue ki roto i tētahi pouaka kāri kirihou rahi i whakakētia kia waikore. Ka purua e Tēnā Paraone ōna ringa ki runga i ōna whatu i te whakaaturanga ki te kōti i te pouaka i kitea ai a Mīhana Paraone, he rangatira whare manuhiri mātāmua nō te Motu o Tangata, i takaia ki roto i tētahi pēke papa ngaru pango. I roto i te pouaka me te tinana, ka kitea e nga pirihimana e rua takirua karapu latex, rīpene kōrere toto, here taura me te māra. I kī te kaimātai ā-ture a Ahorangi John Hunter i te whakawā i te tupunga pakiaka i roto i te rua hōhonu 4ft (1.2m) me te tūpāpaku o ngā taha, tērā pea ka karia "i ētahi wiki ruarua" i mua i te mahue o te tinana o Mrs Brown. I tonoa te hūri ki te kāinga tae noa ki te Mane. Ka haere tonu te whakamātautau.

title: E matapae ana te minita tuatahi i ngā paerewa mātauranga pai ake
summary: I kī te minita tuatahi e tūmanako ana a ia kia kite i te whakapai ake i te pānui pukapuka pukapuka i ngā kura i muri i te whakahēnga o ngā paerewa e te ratonga arotake o Weera.
text: I kī a Carwyn Jones kua whakarewaina e te kāwanatanga o Welsh ngā hōtaka pānui pukapuka ā-motu me ngā hōtaka tatau. I anga atu a ia ki ngā pātai i muri i te kī a ngā kaitirotiro o Estyn he tuarima o ngā tamariki i te taenga atu ki te kura tuarua. Engari i kī a Tēnā Jones kua toa whakamihi nga whakahou mo te whitu o raro. I tana wā pātai ia wiki i te Senedd, ka kī a ia e mōhio ana ia ka whakapai ake ngā hōtaka pānui pukapuka me ngā hōtaka tatau i ngā whika i roto i te pūrongo ā-tau a Estyn. E kī ana te pūrongo e 20% o ngā tamariki e tīmata ana i te kura tuarua me te pakeke pānui i raro iho i te iwa tau me te ono marama - i te nuinga o te wā e whakaarotia ana ko te taumata o te pānui pukapuka taumahinga. I kī te kaiārahi Plaid Cymru, a Ieuan Wyn Jones, ko te tatauranga he "whakapae whakaharahara" o te kāwanatanga o Welsh. I whakamāramatia e te minita tuatahi ko te rīpoata a Estyn i kapi i tētahi wā i te wā e tauwhāinga ana a Plaid ki a Labour. Engari i kī te kaiārahi Plaid kua puritia e ngā minita Mahi Welsh te kōpaki mātauranga mō neke atu i te 12 tau. I kī te kaiārahi o Welsh Liberal Democrat, a Kirsty Williams, kua tukuruatia e Estyn ngā whakahē i tērā tau. Ka kī a ia: "Ina hinga ngā hōhipera ka kī atu koe ki tēnei ruma ko te hē o ngā poari hauora o te rohe. " Ina hinga o mātau kura ka ngana koe ki te whakapae i runga i te mana ā-rohe, ka ngana koe ki te whakapae i ngā kura, ka ngana koe ki te whakapae i te kaiako matua, i ngana noa koe ki te whakapae i a Ieuan Wyn Jones - tētahi tangata engari ko tō ake kāwanatanga." I kī a Tēnā Jones he pūtea tāpiri mō ngā tamariki mai i ngā papamuri iti iho - he wāhanga o tētahi mahi pūtea i whakaaetia i waenganui i a Labour me te Lib Dems - ka āwhina i ngā tauira kia tae ki ngā paerewa e hiahiatia ana. I whakamihi a Estyn i te wāhanga tūāpapa mō ngā tamariki i raro i te whitu, i kī he pai rawa te mahinga i te nuinga o ngā kura, ā, ka pōhiritia he whakapai ake i te oranga, ka kī a ia. "Āe, he wāhi e hiahiatia ana kia whakapai ake, engari kaua e huatau he uaua ngā mea katoa mō te mātauranga i Weera," tana kī. Kua whakatakotoria e te Minita Mātauranga a Leighton Andrew tētahi mahere 20 piro, ka kī a ia, ka tāpiri: "Nō reira āe, a tērā tau, e tūmanako ana ahau kia kite i te whakapai ake." I ngā pātai a te minita tuatahi, ka kī te kaiārahi Rangatira o Welsh, a Andrew RT Davies, kua rahua a Labour ki te whāngai i te wāhanga tūmataiti, e tohu ana ki te whakapeka o te tīmatanga pakihi. Engari i kī te minita tuatahi e whawhai ana tana whakahaere i tētahi "tai tautohetohe mai i te kāwanatanga o UK".

title: Brexit: Kāore e taea e Kirkella super trawler te hī ika mai i Te Wānanga
summary: Kua karangatia e tētahi MP ki te pirimia kia haumaru i ngā mana hī ika mō tētahi pukapuka tino pai o UK, ā, kāore i taea te mahi mai i Tīma.
text: Ko te pukapuka whakatio o Kirkella, e noho ana i Hull, e hopu ana i te kāhui me te pātiki i roto i ngā wai o te Tiritiri, engari kua mahue i a Pakihi, kāore he whakaaetanga hī ika. I kī te MP Labour mō Hull East Karl Turner ko te takaware i roto i tētahi mahi ko te "nēra whakamutunga i roto i te kāwhena" mō te umanga. I kī te kāwanatanga ka mutu ngā whakaritenga "i ngā wā tata nei". Ko te oko 81m (266ft), kua taunga ki Hull mai i Hakihea, ka mau ki te ika 2.3m i ia haerenga wiki, i ngā wai i ngā takutai o Nōwei, Kunirangi me ngā Moutere o Faroe. I kī ōna rangatira, a UK Fisheries, i homai e Kirkella i waenganui i te 8-12% o ngā ika katoa i hokona i ngā toa ika me ngā rīwai o UK, ā, ka whakatūpato i te nui ake o te whakawhirinakitanga ki ngā kawemai mai i Nōwei, Tiorangi rānei, kāore he whakaaetanga wai tawhiti. I roto i te reta ki a Boris Johnson, ka kī a Tēnā Tena: "Kāore he raihana, he tohatoha rānei o te Kirkella me ōna kaimahi ki te hī ika ki hea - ā, kāore he tohutohu ki te wā, mēnā, ki te aha rānei ka rerekē." I kī a Jane Sandell, te āpiha nui o UK Fisher: "I mua, kua whakaritea ngā wāhi hī ika me ngā whenua pēnei i Nōwei mā te EU, engari ināianei me whakarite e te UK i tōna ake tika. " Nā te mea he roa rawa te mahi a Te Pakihi, ko te tikanga kāore anō kia oti ngā whakaritenga, nā reira kei te haere mātou ināianei ki tētahi tau hī ika me te kore whai wāhi hī ika." I tāpiri mai a ia: "Ko te āwangawanga nui ko te kaimahi, e hiahia ana mātou ki te tiki i ēnei tāngata ki te moana i te wā tata nei kia whiwhi moni ai rātou me te whai mōhiotanga mō te 2021." I kī tētahi kaikawe kōrero kāwanatanga: "Hei tūnga takutai motuhake, kua whakaritea e te UK he whakaritenga hou hei whakaawe anō i te whakahaeretanga o ngā rawa ika tata, tawhiti hoki, kia tino pai ai te mahi ki ngā painga o te umanga hī ika o Ingarangi. " Negotiations for fishing opportunities in 2021 will be finished as soon as possible." Whāia a BBC East Yorkshire me Lincolnshire i Facebook, Twitter, me Instagram. Tukuna ō whakaaro pūrākau ki yorkslincs.news@bbc.co.uk. Te Tari Hononga Ipurangi Pātahi mō te Taiao, Kai me ngā Take Ā-Taiwhenua

title: Ka whakatūpato ngā kaitiaki taiwhenua i ngā pekenga toka kāore i te mātakina
summary: Kei te whakatūpatotia ngā tāngata e haere ana i runga i ngā akoranga hīkoi me te pekepeke e ngā kaitiaki moana kia kaua e tārua i te ngohe kāore i te mātakitakitia.
text: Nā Pirihi EllisBBC News Online, South West E whai ana te whakatūpato i te maha o ngā whakaora kua pā ki ngā tāngata whati ngā waewae, ā, kotahi he tuaiwi pakaru. Ko te takutai, e mōhiotia ana, he whai i waho i te raina tai o ngā rohe takutai pōhatu. I kī te British Coasteering Federation me haere anake te tangata ki ngā haerenga kua whakaritea kētia, ā, kaua e tāruatia kāore i te mātakitakitia. I kī a Mātā Pavitt, te kaiwhakahaere wāhanga o te Maritime and Coastguard Agency (MCA) North Cornwall, i tērā tau i mahi ai ngā kaimahi ki "te maha o ngā mahi" i reira ngā tāngata i whakangāwari ai, ā, kua tāruatia te ngohe e rātou anō. "I peke tētahi taitama i te pari, a, ka mutu he ringa whati. " I haere tētahi atu tangata ki te hōhipera me ngā mate tuaiwi e whakapaetia ana." I tāpiritia e ia he "raruraru nui haere". 'Ngaro tō ora' Ko te peke ki te moana mai i ngā wāhi tae atu ki ngā pari me ngā pakitara whanga e mōhiotia ana ko te pōhatu urupa. Puta noa i te UK, i roto i ngā tau e rima tae atu ki Aotearoa 2012, e 18 ngā tūpāpaku me te 57 ngā whara nui, ka kī te MCA. I te tau 2008, i peke a Sonny Wells, e 20 ōna tau i taua wā, i te 30ft (9m) mai i tētahi piere o Hampshire ki te 3ft (90cm) wai. Ahakoa kāore a Tāne Wells, mai i Waterlooville, Hampshire, i te takutai, ka pararaiha a ia i tana pekenga. "Kua hurihia tōku oranga kia pono. Kotahi noa iho te hē heahea, ā, he nui te utu ki a au. Ehara i te mea whai hua." I tērā tau, i tāutatia e te MCA ngā tohu whakatūpato e 20 ki ngā wāhiwera pōhatu i Cornwall, tae atu ki Towan Head, i Newquay, i roto i tētahi tono kia whakaiti i ngā whara nui me ngā mate. I ngā tau o mua, i hoatu ki ngā pirihimana i Plymouth, i Devon, me Folkestone, i Keni, he mana ki te ūnga i ngā rōpū rangatahi e peke ana i ngā pari me ngā pakitara whanga. I kī a Tēnā Pavitt: "Tērā pea he ngohe ngahau te āhua o te mahi ngahau, engari ka taea e koe te whakapau i te toenga o tō oranga i roto i tētahi tūru tūruhi, ka ngaro rānei tō ora. " Haere ki te [coasteering] me ngā tāngata tika me te whakamahi i te kete tika. "Ko te huri ake i roto i tētahi tarau poto me te hāte me te maka i a koe ki waho o te pari ina kāore koe i te whakaritea, ā, kāore i a koe tēnā [kaiārahi] pūrua, he mea tino whakahau mātou i ngā tāngata kia kaua e mahi." I kī a David Harriss, te kaiwhakahaere o te British Coasteering Federation, e noho ana i Newquay, kua rite tonu te kōrero a ngā kamupene ki ngā kiritaki kāore e taea e rātau te mahi i te ngohe mā rātou anō. "Ka whakamāramatia e mātou ki ngā kiritaki he nui te whakangungu a ngā kaiārahi i mua i te tango i ngā tāngata ki waho. " Kotahi tau te roa o te whakangungu. Ka ako ngā kaiārahi mō ngā tai, te pupuhi, te āwhina tuatahi, kei roto i ngā tauari rerekē me te ako me pēhea te ārai i tētahi mahi, me te whiwhi wheako i ngā wāhi rerekē. "He tino hira kia kaua te tangata e mahi i te mea kāore i te mātakitaki."

title: Covid: Isle of Man GCSE and A-levels reviewed by teachers
summary: Ka whakaarohia anō e ngā kaiako o ngā ākonga taumata-A me ngā ākonga GCSE i te Motu o Tangata i tēnei tau, kua kī te minita mātauranga.
text: Cambridge International Education (CI) has scrapped exams for students in Years 11 and 13 as a result of the coronavirus pandemic. E whakaata ana i tētahi nekehanga ōrite a ngā papa whakamātautau UK i tērā marama. Alex Allinson said the move would give students the "best possible chance to achieve the grades they deserve". Kua whakakorea kētia ngā whakamātautau e whakahaeretia ana e te Office of Qualifications and Examinations Regulation me te Komiti Mātauranga Tōtahi o Welsh. Ka whakamātauria e ngā ākonga o te motu e te ranunga o ngā papa whakamātautau, ko te nuinga o ēnei e tukuna ana e CI. Ko te tuarua o ngā tau whai muri ka aromatawaia ngā kōeke a ngā tauira e ō rātou kaiako i runga anō i ngā whakamātautau akomanga me ngā akoranga nā te mate urutā. Na te whakataunga kia whakawhiwhia ngā kōeke rerekē i ērā i matapaetia i tērā tau i whakaoho i te riri mai i ngā mātua me ngā kaiako, e ahu ana ki te huri-U e CI. Ka pā ngā huringa ki ngā tohu IGCSE, GCSE me ngā tohu taumata-A, tae atu ki ngā akoranga hangarau tae atu ki ngā Akoranga ā-Motu BTEC me OCR. Ka haere tonu ngā whakamātautau ā-ringa mō ngā akoranga mahi mahi, ka kī tētahi kōrero kāwanatanga. 'Whakamāramatia' I kī a Julia Minay, e ako ana tana tama me tana tamāhine i ngā taumata-A me ngā GCSEs, he whāranu ngā whakaaro o ana tamariki mo te nekehanga. I te mea ka mahi tana tamāhine i "te nui o ngā akoranga meneti whakamutunga me te kōpikopiko", ka pai ake tana mahi i roto i ngā whakamātautau nā reira "ehara i te rongo pai mōna", tana kī. "Waimarie i noho tonu a ia i ētahi whakamātautau uho i te tīmatanga o tēnei tau kura, nā reira he kōeke tika tāna," tana tāpiri mai. Heoi anō, kāore tana tama i "tino pōrearea" mo te whanaketanga i a ia e haere ana i te tukanga kotahi i tērā tau, ka haere tonu a Ms Minay. "Ko te māharahara ki ngā taumata-A i tēnei tau, he tamariki tāu e haere ana ki te whare wānanga kāore anō kia noho i tētahi whakamātautau taumata-A kotahi, nā reira tērā pea, kāore rānei i whakawāteatia tika." Dr Allinson said it was important to "put the needs of our young people first and provide clarity to our teachers at this challenging time". "He tino nui ēnei putanga, ā, ka mahi ngātahi mātou me ngā kura ki te tautoko i ā mātou rangatahi me ā mātou kaiako mahi uaua i roto i te tukanga," tana tāpiri mai. He aha e kore ai e whai i te Motu o Tangata i runga i Facebook me Twitter? Ka taea hoki e koe te tuku whakaaro pūrākau ki northwest.newsonline@bbc.co.uk Related Internet Links Isle of Man Government - Education, Sport and Culture Cambridge Assessment International

title: Ka hono a Wales TUC ki te whakahē ārai tapahi i Rāwāhi
summary: I uru atu ngā mema o Wales TUC ki te tekau mano tāngata ki te hīkoi puta noa i Rāwāhi ki te whakahē i ngā tikanga whakawhāiti a te kāwanatanga o UK.
text: I tāpaetia he tereina, ā, ka whakatakotoria he pahi mai i Wēra katoa ki te mau i ngā mano tāngata ki Rānana. I whai wāhi ngā mema o te uniana me ngā kaiwhakahaere ki tētahi hīkoi i te Hātarei i mua i te uru atu ki tētahi huihuinga i Hyde Park. E kī ana tētahi kaikōrero kāwanatanga o UK e mahi ana ngā minita i ngā mea katoa e taea ana e rātau kia tipu anō ai te āhua o te whakahaerenga. I kī a Rhiannydd Williams, te āpiha kaupapahere me ngā whakahau me TUC Wales: "Kua ngana mātou ki te whakaroa atu i te hīkoi ki te hunga whānui e taea ana - e kiia ana ko For a Future that Works after all. " Kotahi te waka i runga i te tereina e whakatapua ana ki nga whānau. Ko ētahi o ērā he whānau o ngā mema uniana, engari ko ētahi ērā kua pāngia e ngā tapahi, ā, ka whakapā mai ki a mātau. He rōpū hapori anō kei runga i te tereina." I tāpiri mai a ia: "Kei te tino pā nga tikanga whakawhāiti ki te iwi ināianei. Kāore anō kia tino whakaūngia. Engari kei te tino raruraru te tangata, ā, ka kite te tangata i tētahi tino tika, ā, e hiahia ana te tangata ki te kite i tētahi iwi ōrite ake." I kī te hēkeretari ahuwhānui o TUC, a Brendan Barber, kāore a ia i whakaaro he tuki whānui a ngā whakakotahitanga, ka tāpiri: "Tērā pea ka kōrero ētahi o ōku hoa mahi mō tēnā. Kāore au i te rongo i te tokomaha rawa o ngā tāngata e karanga ana ki tētahi tuki ahuwhānui." E tūmanakohia ana kia kī a Mark Serwotka, te kaiārahi o te uniana o ngā Ratonga Tūmatanui me ngā Ratonga Arumoni (PCS): "Tata tonu ki te katoa ināianei e whakaae ana kāore i te mahi te whakawhāititanga, ā, kei te kino ake ngā kaupapahere a tēnei kāwanatanga i tō tātau āhuatanga ohaoha, ehara i te pai ake." I kī tētahi kaikōrero kāwanatanga o UK: "He whakakino te tohe a ētahi uniana ki te pana i te mahi tūkino, huakore hoki e kore e whai painga ki tētahi. " E ai ki tā mātou kōrero i ētahi wā, kāore e whakatuwheratia anōtia ngā kōrero penihana, ā, kāore he mea anō e tutuki mā te mahi taraiwa."

title: I puritia e te kōhuru o Bournemouth Travelodge i raro i te Ture Hauora Hinengaro
summary: Kua herea tētahi tangata i hopukina i runga i te whakapae ki te kōhuru i tētahi kaiwhiwhi hōtēra i raro i te Ture Hauora Hinengaro.
text: I kitea te tūkinotanga, he wahine e 20 tau, kua mate i te Travelodge i Te Huarahi o Ōtautahi, i Te Ata o te Wenerei. I takea tōna matenga i te "whara tōpana maha", te kī a Pirihimana o Dorset. I puritia tētahi tangata 32 tau mai i Bournemouth i runga i te whakapae ki te kōhuru. Kua whakawhitia ia ināianei ki te tiaki i ngā ratonga hauora hinengaro mō te 28 rā tuatahi. I kī te ope e haere tonu ana tana whakamatautau, ā, ka noho rāhuitia tonu te hōtēra i te wā e haere tonu ana ngā āpiha ki te tūhura. I kī a Det Ch Insp Jez Noyce: "Ka noho tonu o mātau whakaaro ki te whānau o te tūkino me ngā tāngata katoa kua pāngia e tēnei mahi tino pouri." Whāia a BBC South i Facebook, Twitter, Instagram rānei. Tukua ō whakaaro pūrākau ki south.newsonline@bbc.co.uk.

title: Ka whakatuwhera anō te papa waka o ngā Rūma Whakaminenga o Derby i muri i te ahi
summary: E toru marama i muri i te ahi nui kua whakatuwheratia anō te papa motokā o Ngā Rūma Whakaminenga o Derby.
text: Kua whakapuakina e te kaunihera o te taone nui he haumaru te whare, engari ka katia tonutia te wāhi tae atu ki te 18 marama, ā, ka taea hoki te whakawātea. Kua kī ngā umanga o te rohe kua pā ki a rātau te taka o te hokohoko mai i te mura o Poutāpeta. I takea mai te ahi i te mīhini wera rawa i roto i tētahi wae hauora i runga i te tuanui o te papa motokā. I kī a Martin Langsdale, te tūru o te Rōpū Whakahaere o te Whare Karakia Hauwhā, i "koa" a ia. "Ko te katinga o ngā Rūma Whakaminenga me tōna papa motokā he tino āwangawanga ki ngā umanga katoa i taua rohe, ā, kua pā ki te tauhokohoko mai i ngā umanga i te wāhi tata tonu," tana kī.

title: I hereheretia te kaiahuwhenua o Portglenone, a Michael Agnew mo te whakawiri kararehe
summary: Kua hereheretia tētahi kaiahuwhenua o Te Takiwā o Antrim mo te ono marama.
text: Ko te wā tuatahi tēnei i hereheretia ai tētahi tangata i raro i te ture oranga kararehe i pā mai ki NI i te tau 2011. I whakawāteatia a Michael Agnew, e 43, o Ballynease Road tata ki Portglenone, e 16 ngā whakapae i te Kōti Kaiwhakawa o Ballymena. I kitea e nga kaitirotiro o te Tari Ahuwhenua (DARD) he kararehe e noho ana i roto i nga āhuatanga whakarihariha i to rātau haerenga ki tana pāmu i a Hakihea 2012. I kitea he tinana poaka mate me ngā kuao kau i waenganui i ngā kararehe ora, ā, ko ētahi kararehe i kōpikopiko ki roto i ngā wharau, kāore he urunga ki te kai, ki te wai rānei. Me whakaheke ētahi kia kore ai e mamae anō. He pūkete whānui i whakaahuatia e te tiati te mahinga a Agnew i nga kararehe he "take tino nui". I whakaaturia i te wā o te whakarongo e 115 ngā whakapae o mua o Agnew, ā, kua rāhuitia kētia kia kaua e pupuri kararehe i te haerenga o ngā kaitirotiro DARD ki tana pāmu. Ka kī atu te rōia wawao ki te kōti ehara i te take o te tūkinotanga, engari he kino te whakahaere. I tāpiritia e ia ka pā te kaha hinengaro o Agnew ki tōna kaha ki te mārama ki te tikanga o tētahi raupapa whakakore. I kī te tiati he āwangawanga te oranga o nga kararehe ki te iwi i kī atu a ia ki a Agnew he pūkete whānui tāna, a, kua waiho e ia nga whakahau o mua. E whā marama te whiu a te tiati mo nga whakapae whakawiri. I whakamanatia hoki e ia tētahi rerenga e rua marama o mua kua whakatārewatia. I whainatia hoki a Agnew e £2,000, ā, i whakakorea i te tiaki kararehe mo te 10 tau.

title: Kua whakaaetia te rongoā mate pukupuku waha hei whakamahi i te NHS i Pākehā
summary: Kua whakaaetia e te NHS tētahi rongoā hōu e āwhina ana i ngā wāhine whai mate pukupuku waha hōhonu kia roa ake te ora.
text: Ka taea e Avastin - e mōhiotia ana hoki ko te bevacizumab - i roto i te pahekotanga ki te kōmihi, te whakaroa i te haerenga o te mate me te whakaroa i te ora tata ki te whā marama. Kua whakaaetia tōna whakamahinga e te Scottish Medicines Consortium. Ko Pākehā te wāhanga tuatahi o te UK e whakaae ana ki a Avastin mō te whakamahi auau i te NHS. I whakaaetia i mua e te SMC hei rongoā mō ngā wāhine whai mate pukupuku ovarian auau. I kī te SMC: "Ka taea e Bevacizumab (Avastin) te hoatu i ngā tūroro he wā ora 3-4 marama anō e tino hira ana i roto i te horopaki o ō rātou marama whāiti e toe ana. " I te mea kāore he rongoā hōu mō tēnei āhuatanga i raihanatia i roto i ngā tau tekau kua taha, i whakaarotia he tohu nui te bevacizumab i roto i te rongoā." E 309 ngā wāhine i kitea he mate pukupuku waha i Pākehā i te tau 2013, e 88 i ngaro i a rātau i te tau 2014. I kī a Prof Nick Reed, te kaitohutohu rongoā rongoā i te Pokapū Oncology o Beatson i Glasgow: "Ko te mate pukupuku o te waha waha te mate pukupuku tino kitea i roto i nga wāhine taitamariki. " He rawakore te matapae mō te mate hōhonu, te mate auau rānei, ā, he hākinakina, he whakararuraru hoki ngā tohu mō ngā tūroro e noho ana i te hōhipera mō ngā wā roa. "He whakataunga tatari tēnei i Pākehā - kāore anō kia raihanatia he rongoā hōu mō te neke atu i te 10 tau, ā, ko te rongoā anake e wātea ana ko te chemotherapy. " Ka tāpiritia a Avastin ki te kōmihi, ā, ka whakaroa i te haerenga o ngā pōauautanga, ā, ka whakaroa i te ora tata ki te whā marama." I tāpiri mai a ia: "Mō tētahi whaea, tamāhine, wahine rānei, he wā hira tēnei e āhei ai rātou ki te mahi tonu, kia noho takitahi ake, kia mahere hoki mō te wā heke mai o tō rātou whānau." 'Mamae auau' I whakaaetia hoki e te SMC tētahi rongoā hōu mō ngā tūroro tino nui o te hidradenitis suppurativa (HS), he āhuatanga kiri mamae mo te wā roa e waiho ai ngā tūroro e hipoki ana i te pukupuku. Tae atu ki te 500 ngā tāngata e kitea ana i te HS i ia tau i Pākehā, ā, e 50,000 ngā tāngata e pāngia ana. Kāore anō kia whakaaetia i mua, engari kua whakaaetia e te SMC te rongoā Humira, e mōhiotia ana hoki ko adalimumab, e whakaiti ana i te 50% neke atu rānei me te whakaiti i te wheako mamae mā te tuatoru. I kī te tūroro o Jen Napier, e 33, mai i Alloa, i "hari" a ia i te whakataunga, i muri noa iho i te whakaaetanga o te rongoā ki te tonga o te rohe. Mai i a ia e taitamariki ana, engari i kitea noa iho i tērā tau me te āhuatanga i whakaahuatia e ia he "tata ki te whiu whewhe". Ko Ms Napier, e mahi ana hei kaiwhakahaere, kei te mamae tonu nā te āhuatanga, a, ka mea: "He maha aku rongoā, kāore tētahi o ēnei i pānga. " Ko tā Humira e homai ana ki a mātau he tūmanako tērā pea he rerekētanga, māna mātau e āwhina." I kī a Dr Susannah Fraser, te kaitohutohu dermatologist i te Hōhipera o Wikitōria i Kirkcaldy, Fife: "He tino mamae, he āhuatanga kino hoki te HS, ā, he tino whāiti mātou ina tae mai ki ngā kōwhiringa rongoā. " He rongo tino pai ka taea e ngā tūroro tika i Pākehā te whiwhi rongoā ki te adalimumab kua whakaaturia hei whakaiti i te maha o ngā raruraru kiri me te mamae." I kī te manukura SMC o Prof Jonathan Fox: "Tae noa mai ki tēnei wā, he torutoru noa iho ngā rongoā raihana kua wātea mō te mate pukupuku waha me te hidradenitis suppurativa, nā reira he pai ki te whakaae a te komiti ki te bevacizumab me te adalimumab hei whakamahi auau mō ēnei here."

title: Ngā motokā hiko: Ko ngā tūnga motokā o te rohe i te tuatahi mō ngā pūwāhi whakahiko tere
summary: Ko ngā pāka motokā tūmatanui i ngā taone e rua te tuatahi i Powys kia whakaurua ki ngā tauranga whakahiko motokā hiko.
text: Nā Luca WeinmannBBC news Ka taea e ngā pūwāhi whakahiko tere i Machynlleth me Llanidloes te whakahiko katoa i tētahi waka i roto i te toru ki te whā haora. Councillor Heulwen Hulme, cabinet member for the environment, said it was a "vitally important" step in the move towards a low-carbon future. I kī a Powys ka whakaurua ētahi atu tauwāhi e ono ki ngā tauranga ā muri ake nei. "Ko tā mātou kitenga ā muri ake ko te tāuta i ētahi atu pūwhakahiko hiko i Powys, ā, ko Powys te takiwā nui rawa atu i Weera," te kī a Ms Hulme. "Ināianei he kōwhiringa whakahiko whai hua o ngā waka hiko, ā, e tūmanako ana mā tēnei e whakahauhau te whakamahinga me te rangatiratanga o ngā waka hiko. E tūmanako ana hoki mātou ka haere ngā kaiwhakamahi waka hiko ki tō mātou takiwā ātaahua." Ka tāutatia ngā pūwāhi whakahiko ki Welshpool, Newtown, Presteigne, Llandrindod Wells, Builth Wells me Brecon. Tae atu ki Hui tanguru, e 990 ngā pūwāhi whakahiko i Weera, ahakoa e 60 anake ngā mea tere - ka taea te whakahiko i tētahi motokā i roto i te haora iti iho.

title: Ka tere rawa atu te tere o te tupu o te ohaoha o Amerika mai i te tau 2014
summary: I te tata ki te whā tau i te koata tuarua, ka whakawhānui i te mokatere ā-tau o te 4.1%, e whakaatu ana ngā whika whaimana.
text: I whakahaeretia nga whiwhinga e te kaha o te hokohoko kaihoko me te nui o ngā kawenga ake i te wā e rere ana ngā kamupene ki te patu i ngā utu hokohoko hou. I whakaahuatia e te Perehitini o Amerika a Donald Trump te whakaterenga he "whakamīharo", e kī ana hei tohu kei te mahi ana kaupapahere. Engari he tokomaha nga kaitirotiro i whakatūpato ka mātao pea te tupu i ngā marama e heke mai nei. "I te raina kotahi: He tino pai te āhua; e kore e mutu," ko te tuhituhi a Ian Shepherdson, te rangatira o te ohanga i Pantheon Macroeconomics. He aha te mea i whakarewa i te tipu? Ko te ripoata o te Paraire mai i te Tari Tauhokohoko i whakaatu i te 4% o te hokohoko kaihoko i te hauwhā tuarua, mai i te 0.5% mokatere i kitea i roto i nga marama e toru kua hipa. Neke atu i te 9% te tere o ngā kawenga ake mai i te koata tuawhā o te 2013. E kī ana ngā kaitohutohu i taua whika, nāna i āwhina neke atu i te 1% ki ngā whiwhinga GDP, i whakanuia e ngā kaiahuwhenua e rapu ana kia haere ki mua i ngā utu hokohoko hōu i runga i ngā tūemi pēnei i te pīni. I a Hōngongoi, i utaina e te US me Haina he utu ki te $34bn o ngā taonga o tērā whenua. I whakaritea hoki e Kānata, Mehiko me te Uniana o Ūropi he mahi hou i ngā wiki tata nei ki ētahi kawenga ake o AMERIKA hei utu mō ngā utu a AMERIKA i runga i te tīra me te konumohe. He "whakamīharo" tēnei? I whakawhānuitia te whakahaerenga o te US i te toharite o te 2.2% i waenganui i te 2012 me te 2017. Kātahi anō ka piki ake taua tere i muri i te roanga o ngā whiwhinga mahi nāna i ārahi te kore mahi ki te tata ki te pāpaku pūkete. I kī a Perehitini Trump me "mahi te Whare Mā i ngā mea maha" kia haere anō ai te āhua o te whakahaerenga. Ka tohu atu a ia ki ngā utu tāke hou, ki te whakanui i te whakapau moni a te kāwanatanga me ngā whakaritenga hokohoko haere tonu. "Kua tutuki i a mātau tētahi whakarerekētanga ohaoha o ngā wāhanga hītori," tana kī. Ahakoa i whakaaturia e te pūrongo o te Paraire te whakatere o te āhua o te whakahaerenga o Amerika, i hāngai ngā whiwhinga ki ngā tohu a te kaitātari - ā, kāore i te ōrite ki ētahi hauwhā i ngā tau o mua. I te tau 2014, hei tauira, ka piki te āhua o te āhua o te 5.1% i te koata tuarua, ā, i te 4.9% i te koata tuatoru. I whakatauritea ki te hauwhā tuarua o te 2017, ka tipu te āhua o te 2.8% i te wā o Aperira-Pipiri. He aha te tirohanga? Kua kī a Perehitini Trump e hiahia ana a ia ki te kite i te tupunga GDP e piki ana ki te 3% neke atu rānei mō te 2018. "Ehara tēnei i te pūtiro wā kotahi," tana kī i te Paraire. "E whakaaro ana ahau ka tino pai tā mātou mahi i roto i tā mātou pūrongo panuku." Kāore anō te US kia kite i te tupunga GDP tau katoa neke atu i te 3% mai i te tau 2005, engari e kī ana ngā kaitohutohu kei te tae atu te mokatere i tēnei tau, nā te nui o te whakapau moni a te kāwanatanga, me tētahi utu tāke $1.5 trillion kua nui ake ngā moni hei whakapau moni ki ngā umanga me ngā whare. E tohu ana te Pēke PNC i te tupunga o te 3.1% i te 2018 - ki te whakaaro ka ngaro atu ngā renarena hokohoko. "Mēnā ka whakatinanatia e te US me ōna hoa ngā utu nui me ētahi atu ārai hokohoko, tērā pea ka ngoikore ake te tupu o te ohaoha o AMERIKA i tēnei tohu tauanga," ko te tuhituhi a te rangatira o te ohanga o Gus Faucher. I muri i tērā tau, he tokomaha nga kaitohutohu e tūmanako ana kia heke anō ngā pāpātanga tipu, i te mea ka ngaro atu te whakarewatanga o te utu tāke me te whakapau moni a te hau. He aha atu anō te mea rongonui? I whakahōutia e te pūrongo o te Paraire te whakatau tata mō te tupunga GDP i te koata tuatahi ki te 2.2%, mai i te 2%. I whakaaturia hoki ko te utunga o te utunga, i roto i ngā tau tata nei, i piki ake i te 2% e ai ki te mehua manako a te Whanga, e herea ana ki te hokohoko kaihoko, hāunga te kai me te pūngao. Ko te koata tuarua tērā i roto i te haupae o te mehua, e mōhiotia ana ko te PCE uho, kua patua, kua hipa atu rānei i te ūnga 2% o te Whanga, ā, tērā pea ka pupuri i te pēke matua ki te ara me ana mahere kia āta piki ake ngā mokatere huamoni. Heoi anō, tērā ētahi tohu o te ngohengohe. Hei tauira, i whakapeka te pūtea penapena whare i te 1.1%, whai muri i te hinganga 3.4% i te koata tuatahi. He haki whero tērā ngoikoretanga, e kī ana a Te Māngai Piegza, te rangatira o te ohanga i Stifel. "I te nuinga o te wā, he mārama tonu te maha o ngā take e hua ana kei runga te mārō o te whakahaerenga - ahakoa tawhiti atu i te pakari - waewae, i tēnei wā," tana kī. Heoi anō, i kī a ia ko ngā āhuatanga o te mākete whare, tae atu ki te whakarewa kotahi i ngā kawenga ake i te koata o mua tata nei, e karanga ana "ki te pātai i te toitūtanga o te tupunga o runga ake nei e titiro atu ana ki te hawhe tuarua o te tau." Tātaritanga nā Rob Young, i tūtohu te kaipānui pakihi o TE AO o Donald Trump i te tīmatanga o tēnei wiki kei a Mātau "ngā tau pūtea tino pai rawa i runga i te Aorangi". Ehara tēnā i te take, ā, ko te tikanga kia kīia ko ēnei whakatau tata tuatahi o te tupu o te ohaoha i runga anō i ngā raraunga kōpikopiko. Engari he tino pai ngā raraunga ohaoha o tēnei rā, ā, ka taea e te perehitini te tango i ētahi o ngā whiwhinga. Na tana mōkī nui o te utu tāke i whakarewa te tupu. He kōaro, pērā anō te tuma o ngā haupae hokohoko. I mua tonu i te tīmatanga o ngā utu utu a Beijing ki a Mātau i te tīmatanga o Hōngongoi, ka whakarewaina ngā kawenga ake o te pīni o Amerika ki Haina. Ko te wā tuatahi tēnei mai i te pōtitanga 2016 kua pā te tupunga o AMERIKA ki te ūnga 4% i tautuhia e Perehitini Trump i a ia i te wā o te whakahau. E rua ngā wā o te tau tupu hou i te koata tuatahi. Engari e whakatūpato ana ngā kaitohutohu e kore e mutu. Tērā ngā māharahara kei te tūtuki ngā tautohetohe hokohoko maha o Amerika ki te tupu o te ohaoha. Nā reira ko te mea i āwhina i te ōhanga i te hawhe tuatahi o te tau, tērā pea ka mamae i te hawhe tuarua. Kei te mahi te ōhanga o Amerika mōu? E hiahia ana mātou ki te whakarongo ki ō kōrero mō te āhua o te āhua o te mahi i te wāhi e noho ana koe. Īmēra mai ki a mātou i AskAmerica@bbc.co.uk me te tirotiro i te taupū Ask America kia kitea ai ētahi atu pūrākau kāore anō kia mōhiotia mō te US.

title: HS2: E whatu ana a Cameron i te 'hōtaka nui' i te wā e whakaae ana ngā MP ki te pūtea
summary: Kua kī te Pirimia o Rawiri, a Rawiri, ko te kaupapa rēra HS2 he "hōtaka tino nui" i te wā i whakaaetia e ngā MP te pūtea hei whakarite mō te kaupapa.
text: I pōti ētahi MP Conservative ki te Pire o te Tere Tere Tiketike (Whakaritenga), engari he ngāwari noa iho te whakawātea i te Commons, ka neke i te raina rēra tautohetohe kia tata atu ki te pono. Ka tukua e te ture he moni hei utu i ngā uiuinga, hei hoko rawa me te utu i ngā tangata i panaia. I tāruatia e ngā MP mā te 350 ngā pōti ki te 34 noa iho. I waenganui i ērā e pōti ana ki te pire i tōna wāhanga pānui tuatoru, e 17 ngā Tohutohu me ngā MP Mahi e 11. Ināianei ka tirohia anō te ture i te Whare o nga Ariki. Tērā te taurangi i ngā wiki tata nei mēnā ka unuhia e Labour tana tautoko mo te kaupapa. I June ka whakahōutia e te kāwanatanga te utu whakaaro o te hanga i te hononga tere rawa i waenganui i Rāwāhi me te Raki o Ingarangi mai i te £32.7bn ki te £42.6bn. I kī te tumuaki kōruru o Labour o Ed Balls i tērā marama kua "hē te whakahaere" o te tauwhāinga i te kaupapa, ā, ka whakatūpato kāore he "haki pātea" mō HS2 mēnā ka noho ia hei tumuaki. 'Kia mau' Engari i kī a Tēnā Karauna e tūmanako ana a Labour ka "kite i te mōhiotanga, kāti te kōrero mō te tō i te puru i runga i [te kaupapa] me te haere ki muri". "E hiahiatia ana e mātou ētahi whakaaro ā-motu mō tēnei," tana tāpiri mai, i tētahi wātū pātai me ngā mema o te iwi whānui i Wolverhampton. "E hiahia ana mātou kia whai muri te katoa. " E tino mōhio ana ahau he mahi tino nui tēnei mō te whenua. Ehara i te mea mo nga wa haerenga anake... e pā ana ki te kaha. "Ko te mea, kua kī te Raina Matua o Te Tairāwhiti. I ia rā, e hia mano ngā tāngata e tū ana i runga i ngā tereina e hiahia ana ki te noho me te mahi i runga i ngā tereina." I whakaaturia e te hēkeretari waka kōruru a Mary Creagh ka tukuna e tana rōpū te pire i tana tautoko tika. "E tautoko ana a Labour i te HS2 nā te mea me whakatau e tātau ngā raruraru kaha, ko te tikanga e anga ana ngā mano o ngā kaihoko ki ngā haerenga kōpikopiko, ki Te Wānanga, ki Te Wānanga, ki Rāwāhi," tana kī, i waho o te Kotahitanga. "Heoi anō, kua panaia e te kāwanatanga he utu. He mārama ta mātau karere ki a David Cameron. Kia mau ki tēnei kaupapa, kia whakahaere i te tahua, ka whakahokia ki runga i te ara." Ka kitea e te kaupapa HS2 ngā raina i hangaia i waenganui i Birmingham me London, whai muri i tētahi wāhanga tuarua hanga i ngā ara motuhake mai i Birmingham ki Manchester me Leeds. I kī te kaiwhakatika tōrangapū tuarua o TE WĀ, a Hemi Landale: "Kei te pōraru ngā tōrangapū, he nui ngā utu me ngā tautohetohe e tautohetohe ana. " Engari kotahi tonu te mea e mōhio ana - he roa rawa te wā o te tiki mahere mō tētahi raina rēra tere hōu mā te Pāremata." I kī a ia ka tae mai te "wā karihi" a tērā kōanga ina tae mai tētahi pire tuarua ki te aroaro o te Pāremata, e tono ana i ngā MP kia tukuna te mana o te kāwanatanga ki te hopu whenua hei hanga i te raina. E haere ana i te tau 2026? I te Kotahitanga, i pātai te MP Conservative mō Mid Bedfordshire, a Nadine Dorries mēnā ka pai ake te whakapau moni ki ētahi atu kaupapa. "Tērā anō ētahi atu manakē tāpare pēnei i ngā whare i roto i o tātau taiwhanga e tino hiahiatia ana, i ngā wāhi whakatupu anō," tana kī. HS2 "e tango ana i te pūtea mai i aua kaupapa whai tikanga", ka tautohe a Ms Dorries. Engari i kī atu te hoa Conservative me te minita waka o mua, a Haimona Burns ki ngā MP kua kitea he hē ngā kaiwhakawāwā o HS1, te raina tere tiketike e hono ana i Rāwāhi ki te kauhanga hongere. I kī te MP mō Chelmsford: "Kotahi tonu te taone i Kent i tutuki pai ai te whakauru kia kaua e whai teihana i tōna wāhi, a, ko Maidstone tērā, ā, ka whakatūria e rātau. " I purua ki Ebbsfleet, ā, ināianei kei te inoi rātau ki tētahi teihana i Maidstone nā te mea kei te ngaro rātau i te whakatupuranga anō me ngā whakapainga ki te whakahaerenga o Ashford me Ebbsfleet." I tautohe a Lib Dem MP mō Eastleigh, a Maika Thornton, ka whai painga te HS2 ki te whenua katoa, ehara i ngā tāone anake e mahi hāngai ana ki a ia. "He pono e mārama ana ko tētahi raina e whakapai ake ana i ngā hononga ki te raki-tonga, ā, ka whakaurua e au a Pākehā ki tērā, ka whakapai ake, ka whakatipu hoki i te whakahaerenga o Te Hononga o Ingarangi katoa," tana kī. He iti noa iho te whakahekenga o tētahi pūrongo kāwanatanga i whakaputaina i te Tūtira i ngā painga matapae o HS2 i whakaritea ki ngā utu. I whakahekea te "ōwehenga utu-utu" e tūmanakohia ana mai i te £2.50 ki te £2.30 mō ia pauna i pau. Ko te nuinga o tēnei nā te pikinga o te utu katoa e tūmanakohia ana i te tīmatanga o tēnei tau. I tēnei wā e tūmanako ana te kāwanatanga ki te tīmata i te hanganga i te wāhanga tuatahi o HS2 i te 2017 me te whakatuwhera i taua wāhanga o te raina i te tau 2026.
