Kātahi ka taea te whakaoti i ngā raina tāpiri ki Leeds me Manchester i te tau 2032-33.

title: Ngā whakataunga uaua mō te Kaiwhakahaere o NI i te hinganga o te hiko whakapau moni
summary: I tētahi taumata UK, i tapahia e te kāwanatanga whakamutunga ngā whakapau moni tūmatanui i ia rā mā te 9% i roto i te rima tau.
text: Nā John CampbellBBC News NI Economics & Business Editor I ngā tikanga moni, i whakahekea ai te mana whakapau moni a Stormont neke atu i te £1bn i waenganui i te 2010 me te 2015. Ko ngā mahere a te Hunga Tohutohu he tapahi anō o te 7% i roto i ngā tau tuatahi e whā o te Pāremata e whai ake nei me te whakapau moni e piki ana i tērā tau. Nā reira ka taea e Stormont te tūmanako kia heke anō tōna kaha whakapau. Kāore e mārama te moni pū kia whakatakotoria rā anō e ngā Tohutohu ngā mahere whakapau taipitopito. Nā te mea ko te moni e pau ana i a Stormont e whakatauria ana e te Tātai Barnett. I roto i ngā tikanga mōrearea, ko te tikanga o te tātai, mēnā ka hinga, ka piki rānei te whakapau moni i runga i tētahi ratonga tūmatanui i Ingarangi, ka rerekē hoki mā te nui ōrite i Aiarangi ki te Raki. Nō reira mēnā ka whakangungu tonu te whakapau hauora me te mātauranga i ngā tapahi i Ingarangi, mā tēnā e āwhina i a Stormont i te nuinga o ngā whakapau moni a te tari i Aiarangi ki te Raki. Engari ahakoa ko te tikanga o te tātai Barnett he iti iho te whakapau moni mō Aiarangi ki te Raki, i whakaritea ki te UK katoa, ka noho tonu he rangatū o ngā whakataunga uaua mō te Kaiwhakahaere o Aiarangi ki te Raki. Kātahi anō ka tīmata te whakatinana i ngā tapahi i roto i te tahua hōu rawa a Stormont, ā, ka whai ake ētahi atu mea ināianei. E tohu ana hoki ngā mahere a te Hunga Tohutohu i ētahi tapahi toitū ki te oranga ora me te haumarutanga pāpori. E kī ana rātau ka whakatinanatia e rātau te £12bn o ngā tapahi ki te tahua ora i te tau 2018, engari i tēnei wā kua whakamāramatia e rātau mō te £2bn o aua tapahi. Kaore te rōpū e tapahi i ngā painga kaitiaki, ā, te āhua nei kua kī taurangi hoki kia kaua e tapahi i te takuhe tamariki. Ko te tikanga o tēnā, ko te nuinga o ngā tapahi me taka ki runga i te takuhe whare, ngā hua tāke, ngā painga hauātanga rānei. Manaakitanga motuhake? Ka waihangatia e tēnā kaha he raruraru nui i Stormont i te mea kāore i taea e ngā rōpū te whakaae ki te whakatinana i te hurihanga whakamutunga o ngā tapahi ora i tīmataria e Westminster. Te āhua nei kua tae ki tētahi mahi i te mutunga o te tau 2014 hei wāhanga o te Whakaaetanga o te Whare o Stormont, engari kātahi ka hinga i te meneti whakamutunga. I kī a Sinn Féin kāore ngā mahere mō te whakatinana i te mahi i whakarato i ngā taumata parenga mō ngā kaikerēme e hiahia ana rātau; i kī te DUP ehara ngā tono a Sinn Féin i te wāhanga o te mahi, ā, kāore i te utu. I te mea he take whakawhāiti te oranga ora, ka taea e ngā rōpū Stormont te pūtea i tētahi pūnaha ora nui ake, engari mā tērā e whakapau moni mō ētahi atu ratonga i raro i te pēhanga nui ake. I ngā wāhanga tōmua o te tatau pōti, te āhua nei tērā pea he ara ki te whakapau moni tāpiri mō Stormont. Te āhua nei e hiahiatia ana e ngā Tohutohu te tautoko DUP hei whakatū i tētahi kāwanatanga pūmau. Tērā pea ka whai mana te rōpū uniana ki te tiki moni tāpiri mō te Kaiwhakahaere o Aiarangi ki te Raki. I haere te rōpū o Te Rāwhiti o Te Rāwhiti o Te Rāwhiti ki te kōrero ki a Rawiri Dimbleby mō ngā "āhuatanga ohaoha motuhake" o Aiarangi ki te Raki me te hiahia whakapau hanganga. Engari, me te tohu hou e hoatu ana i te nuinga o te nuinga o ngā Conservatives, kei te heke haere te āhua o tētahi manaakitanga motuhake mō Aiarangi ki te Raki. I ngā tikanga o te ohaoha, ko te wikitōria Conservative he pōti mō te kāwanatanga iti iho me te iti iho o te whakapau moni tūmatanui - ka pā tērā ki te tahua a Stormont.

title: Ka noho tonu te utunga o te utunga o UK i te kore o Poutāpeta
summary: I noho tonu te utunga o te utunga o te UK i te 0% o Poutāpeta, e ai ki te Office for National Statistics.
text: Ko ngā kākahu me ngā kākahu māmā ake, i wāhikētia e te pikinga o ngā utu penehīni, i āwhina ki te pupuri i te mokatere i te 0% mō te marama tuarua, e whakaatu ana ngā whika whai mana. Ko te whika te mokatere iti rawa o te utunga o te Taupū Utu Kiritaki (CPI) mai i te tīmatanga o ngā whakatau tata o te mehua i te mutunga o nga tau kotahi mano e waru tekau mā rua. Ko te tikanga he ōrite te utu o te oranga ki tērā tau i mua. Heoi anō, i kī te ONS mēnā i tātaitia te mokatere o te utunga moni ki ngā wāhi ā-ira e rua, he 0.01% iti iho ngā utu i te tau i mua - ko te hinganga tuatahi i runga i te pūkete mō te mehua CPI. Ko tētahi o ngā take matua i noho rerekē ai te mokatere CPI ko te pikinga o ngā utu penehīni me ngā utu diesel i waenganui i a Hui tanguru me Poutāpeta, te kī a te ONS. Engari ko te hinganga katoa o ngā utu hinu i te tau kua taha, he kaitāpae nui ki te utunga iti o te utunga, ka tāpiritia. Ka waiho e te whika CPI te utunga o te utunga i raro iho i te ūnga 2% o te Pēke o Ingarangi. Tērā te taurangi ka hinga te mokatere CPI - e inetia ana ki te wāhi ā-ira kotahi - ki raro iho i te kore o Mati, ā, tērā pea ka hinga te mokatere i ngā marama e heke mai nei. Heoi anō, he torutoru noa iho ngā kaitohutohu e whakaaro ana kei te mōrearea te UK i te momo whakahekenga tūturu i pāngia e Tiapani. "Ko te tikanga kia tīmata te utunga o te utunga i te hawhe tuarua o te tau, i te nuinga o te pēhanga whakararo o ngā utu hinu iti iho," te kī a Rain Newton-Smith, ko te kaiwhakahaere o te ohaoha i te rōpū pakihi CD. I tāpiritia e ia kua whai painga ngā utu hinganga ki ngā kāinga, ā, he pai ngā utu hinu iti iho mō ngā umanga ahuwhānui. Heoi anō, i pā mai nga whare hinu o te Moana ki te Raki i te hinganga o te utu o te māori. I kī a Mātini Beck, te kaitohutohu ohaoha matua ki te Karapu EY ITEM, ka tūmanako tonu ia ki te Pēke o Ingarangi "kia tatari tae noa ki te tōmua o te 2016 i mua i te pikinga o ngā mokatere huamoni". I ia Poutāpeta, i hinga te utunga o te utunga e inetia ana e te Taupū Utu Hokohoko (RPI) ki te 0.9% mai i te 1.0% i te marama tōmua, ka kī te Office for National Statistics. Pēnei i te CPI, ka tātaitia te utunga o te RPI mai i tētahi tauira o ngā taonga hokohoko me ngā ratonga. Heoi anō, he rerekē te tātai o te RPI, ā, kei roto ko ngā raraunga pēnei i ngā utunga mōkete.

title: He maha rawa ngā tauira hou kāore anō kia rite ki te kura, e kī ana ngā kaiako matua
summary: He tokomaha ngā tamariki kāore anō kia rite ki te tīmata i te kura ina tomo tuatahi rātau ki tētahi akomanga, e ai ki tētahi uiuinga o ngā kaiako matua.
text: I kitea e te poipoi, mai i te National Association of Head Teachers, he tokomaha nga upoko i whakaaro kua kino ake te "takahanga kura" i roto i ngā tau tata nei. E kī ana ētahi kāore te nuinga o ngā tauira hou i te rite ki ngā akoranga. Ka tae mai ngā kitenga i te wā e tīmata ana te tau mātauranga hou, ā, he tokomaha ngā tamariki e tīmata ana i tō rātou wā tuatahi i te kura. I kī te National Association of Head Teachers (NAHT) i whakamāramatia e ngā kitenga te hiahia kia nui ake te pūtea penapena kāwanatanga i roto i te mātauranga, otirā mō ngā tau tōmua, me ētahi atu moni mō ngā ratonga whānau. Heoi anō, kua kī ngā minita kei tōna taumata tiketike rawa te pūtea kura, ā, i a Hōngongoi, ka pānuitia e te Hēkeretari Mātauranga a Justine Greening he £1.3bn anō mō ngā kura i roto i ngā tau e rua e whai ake nei. I pōhiritia ngā mema NAHT i Ingarangi, i Wēra me Aiarangi ki te Raki kia whai wāhi ki te uiuinga i Pipiri me Hōngongoi. Ko ngā āwangawanga matua o te 780 i urupare, 83% i whakaaro he take kei te takatū te kura, ā, o ēnei, 86% i whakaaro kua kino te take i roto i ngā tau e rima kua hipa. Tata ki te hauwhā (24%) i whakaaro ko te nuinga o a rātau whakaurunga kāore i rite ki te kura. Asked to rank the issues causing concern, children's speech, language and communication was found to be causing greatest concern, followed by personal, social and emotional development, including behaviour issues, and physical development. I pātaitia hoki ngā kaiārahi kura ki ngā take kāore ngā tamariki i rite ki te kura. Failure to identify and support children's additional needs was the most popular answer, followed by parents having less resources and pressure on family life, and then reductions in local services to support families. I kī te hēkeretari ahuwhānui o NAHT, a Paul Whiteman: "E hiahia ana mātou ki te kite i ētahi atu moni mō te mātauranga, tae atu ki te mātauranga tōmua i mua i te tīmatanga o ngā tamariki ki te kura, me te whakahou i te pūtea penapena i roto i ngā ratonga nui mō ngā whānau. " Ki te kore te pūtea penapena tika, ka tīmata te pōtiki me te mōrearea rawa i roto i tō tātau iwi, me ngā wā tūturu ki te hopu." I kawea te uiuinga i runga i te mahi ngātahi me te Family and Childcare Trust, nāna te rangatira nui, a Ellen Broome, i kī he rite tonu te whakaatu a te rangahau he tino nui te mātauranga o ngā tau tōmua ki te takatū o te kura, otirā i waenganui i ngā tamariki mai i ngā rōpū moni iti. "Me mātua whakarite te kāwanatanga ka taea e ia tamaiti te uru ki te mātauranga tōmua tino kounga, ā, ka taea e ngā mātua te whiwhi tautoko tika hei āwhina i a rātou ki te hoatu i a rātau tamariki te tīmatanga tino pai i roto i te ora," te kī a Ms Broome.

title: I hokona te pā hītori o Drake's Island o Plymouth
summary: Kua hokona tētahi pā motu hītori me tētahi whatunga kauhanga i raro i te whenua.
text: Ko Te Motu o Drake i Devon, e whakamanamana ana hoki i tētahi whare o te rau tau 16 me tētahi uaua, i hokona i Whiringahora. Kua hokona mō tētahi moni kāore i te mōhiotia e te kaipāngai o Plymouth, a Morgan Phillips, e uru ana tana kamupene Guardian Industrial UK ki ngā kaupapa hanga maha i te Uru ki te Tonga. I kī a ia e hiahia ana ia ki te "whakaora mō te iwi o Plymouth me ngā manuhiri". Ko te motu e ono eka, e 600m i te takutai o Plymouth, ā, i tapaina ki te kaumoana o Tā Francis Drake, he whakaaetanga whakarite mō tētahi hōtēra rangatira me te spa. I kī a Tēnā Piripi, tētahi kaipūkaha rākau o mua o te moana, e hiahia ana ia ki te pupuri i ngā āhuahira taketake me ngā hanganga i runga i te motu, me te whakarei ake i a rātou e hāngai ana ki te whakaaetanga whakarite. I kī a ia e whakaaro ana ia ki te waihanga i tētahi whare taonga ora me te pokapū tuku iho, i te wā e whakaarohia ana hoki he pokapū hākinakina wai. I kī a Tēnā Piripi e hiahia ana a ia ki te tīmata i te kaupapa i te wā tata nei. "Kāore au i raro i ngā mōhiotanga e whakaaro ana te iwi o Plymouth ki te Motu o Drake hei taonga i roto i te karauna o te taone, ā, e hiahia ana rātou ki te hākinakina i te wā tata tonu e taea ana e rātou - he pono, e hiahia ana mātou kia tuwhera te motu ki te iwi whānui i ngā wā katoa e taea ana," tana kī. I kī a Tēnā Piripi ka mahi tahi a ia me ngā aroha hauā ki te whakapai ake i te urunga ki te pae, arā, tata tonu ki te rahi o ngā papa whutupōro e whā. Ka pai hoki koe: Te Motu o Drake

title: Ka hīpae te kaitono o Thurrock Lib Dem i roto i te haupae tuhituhi
summary: Kua tū te kaitono Liberal Democrat mō Thurrock i Essex i muri i te whakapaetanga ki te whakairi i ngā pūmanawa whakahāwea, i te 10 tau ki mua.
text: Kua huri haere ngā topengamata e whakaatu ana i ngā kōrero pāpāho pāpori a Kevin McNamara, e akiaki ana i tana tukunga iho. I kī a Tēnā McNamara i "tino pouri a ia mo ngā kōrero i mahia e au". I kī tētahi kaikawe kōrero o Te Pāremata Liberal: "Kua whakakīa he tukanga whakatinanatanga." E kiia ana kua whakairihia ngā tuhituhi i te tau 2009 me te 2010, ā, e kiia ana kei roto ko te reo whakahāwea, whakahāwea hoki. I kī a Tēnā McNamara, i haere tuawhā mai i Thurrock i te pōtitanga 2017: "He tino whakahāwea ēnei kupu, ā, ka whakapōhēhē ahau ki ngā tāngata katoa kua tūkinotia e au ēnei tuhituhi. " E kore rawa ahau e pīrangi ki te tukituki i ngā reo o aua hapori ki ngā poapoa, ki te whakahekenga rānei, ā, he mea nui kia puritia ngā tāngata e hiahia ana ki te tohu i te iwi whānui ki te paerewa tino tiketike. "Kei te whakarerea ahau hei kaitono ināianei tonu mo te pōti e tū mai nei. Ka whakapāha atu ahau ki te hunga katoa kua tukua e au ki taku whanonga o mua, ā, ka kaha taku mahi ki te whakahoki anō i to rātau whakawhirinaki." Ko Tēnā McNamara he tuakana hōnore o te Whakahau Liberal Democrat mō te Ōritetanga o te Iwi, ā, i haere mai te tuarima i te pōtitanga mō ngā pirihimana me te komihana hara o Essex i te tau 2016. Whakamahia te puka i raro nei hei tuku mai i ō pātai ki a mātou, ā, ka whakapā mai pea mātou. I ētahi wā ka whakaputaina tō pātai, me te whakaatu i tō ingoa me tō tauwāhi i a koe e whakarato ana. E kore rawa ō taipitopito hoapā e whakaputaina. Ō mōhiohio whakapā Kua neke atu i te 16 tau te pakeke E whakaae ana ahau ki ngā Ture Ratonga Kei te pupuri te BBC i te mana ki te tīpako mai i ēnei koha i runga anō i ngā whakaritenga ētita, ā, e herea ana ki ngā ture me ngā tikanga tuihono me ngā tohutohu ētita o TE HAU. Mō ētahi atu mōhiohio e pā ana ki te whakahaere a te BBC i ō raraunga whaiaro, tirohia i konei. Mēnā kei te pānui koe i tēnei whārangi i te taupānga BBC News, me toro koe ki te putanga pūkoro o te paetukutuku o TE AO hei tuku i tō pātai mō tēnei kaupapa.

title: ZaraLena: Ko te tiritiri i taku alopecia tuihono he 'whakawātea'
summary: "He rite ki te ngaro i tō tuakiri. Ka titiro koe ki te whakaata, ā, he tangata rerekē."
text: Nā Kirsty GrantNewsbeat, kaipānui Reality TV, me te kaihoahoa ahua o ZaraLena Jackson e tiritiri tuihono ana i tōna oranga ki ngā rau mano o ngā kaiārahi. Heoi, i te tīmatanga o ōna makawe ki te hinga i te ono wiki noa iho nei, ka whakatau a ia. "I te tuatahi i whakaaro ahau 'Kei te haere mai ahau i te pāpāho pāpori'", ka kī atu a ia ki te Reo Irirangi 1 Newsbeat. "Ka whati ahau i te pēhanga." Engari i whakatau a ia ki te noho, ki te kōrero ki ana kaiārahi mō ngā makawe makawe e taka ana i a ia i roto i te kaukau. E rima wiki noa iho i mua i te ngaronga o te nuinga o ngā makawe o tōna māhunga, tae atu ki ōna makawe tinana katoa. "Ko te pūhara kei a au e hāngai ana ki te whai i tēnei āhua noho kei reira ngā mea katoa - he pai te āhua me te whai toronga makawe tino pai, ērā mea katoa," tana kī. Ahakoa tērā, e kī ana a ZaraLena he "whakamīharo" te urupare ki ana whakairinga i kōrero ai ia mō te whakawhanake i te alopecia. "He porangi te nui o ngā kōtiro i karere mai ki a au, ahakoa kua ngaro ō rātou makawe nā te kōmihi, i te alopecia rānei." He aha te alopecia? Hei poto, ko te alopecia ko te ngaronga o o makawe. Tērā pea nā te hau, te mate, te ngoikoretanga rānei i waenganui i ētahi atu mea, ā, ka tupu i ngā wā katoa o te oranga o tētahi tangata. E whakaarotia ana kia pā ki ngā tāngata 65,000 neke atu rānei i te UK. He maha ngā momo alopecia rerekē, ko ētahi o rātou he iti iho te ngaromanga i ētahi atu. E ai ki te momo kei a koe, ka tipu anō pea ō makawe. Kāore a ZaraLena i te mōhio he aha i whakawhanakehia ai e ia te alopecia, ā, kei te whakamātauria e ia hei whakatau ko tēhea tōna momo. Kei te "tīmata te taka" o ōna tukemata me ōna kamo, engari kāore anō kia ngaro katoatia e ia. Ahakoa kāore i uru ki te āhua o te kaiwhakaawe pūnoa, ka whakatau a ZaraLena ki te heu i tōna māhunga katoa. "Ehara te ora i te tino tika, engari ka taea e au te whakawhiwhi." E hiahia ana a ia kia pono ake ngā kaiwhakaawe mō ā rātou uauatanga tūturu. "He tūturu tēnei, koinei te mea e haere ana ngā kōtiro. I te nuinga o te wā ka haere rātau ki Instagram, ka kite i ngā oranga tino tika me ngā makawe tino tika o te tangata." Ahakoa kei te hora a ia i te pai i runga i te ipurangi, i tukitukia e te alopecia tōna maia. E kī ana a ZaraLena ko tana māharahara tuatahi mehemea ka kitea tonutia ia e tōna hoa. "Kāore au i māharahara ki tētahi atu tangata e kite ana i a ia anake. He āhuatanga tino wahine te makawe, ā, kāore au i te mōhio mehemea ka pīrangi tonu a ia ki a au." Engari e kī ana a ia he "whakamīharo". "E kīia ana ahau e ia ko tana kiwi iti nā te mea he pīngore tōku māhunga." E kī ana a ia i ētahi rā e rongo ana a ia, ā, kāore e taea te anga atu ki te whakatika i te moenga. "Engari e karapoti ana ahau i ngā tāngata tino pai, ā, kei te ngana ahau ki te pupuri i tētahi āhuatanga pai. " Kāore au e pīrangi kia titiro mai te tangata ki a au me te aroha ki a au. "He pakira ahau, he ātaahua te pakira. He poto rawa te ora ki te māharahara ki ngā makawe." Whāia Newsbeat i Instagram, Facebook, Twitter me YouTube. Whakarongo ki Newsbeat live i te 12:45 me te 17:45 i ngā rā o te wiki - whakarongo anō rānei ki konei.

title: E rua ngā mīhini ahi o Aberdeen i tū
summary: E rua o ngā pūrere ahi wā katoa e ono o Aberdeen kua tū nā "ngā āhuatanga tē mōhiotia".
text: I whakaūngia e te Ratonga Ahi me te Whakaora o Pirihitini ngā waka i runga i ngā teihana ahi hapori o Altens me Central kāore i te mahi i te Rātapu. E kī ana kua nekenekehia tētahi mīhini ahi mai i Arbroath ki Aberdeen ki te whakarato i "ētahi atu manawanui". E whai ana te nekehanga i ngā pūrere e whā e whakapuakina ana "i te whakahaere" mō tētahi wā i te mutunga o Poutāpeta. I kī a Bruce Farquharson, te āpiha matua o te Ratonga Ahi me te Whakaora o Pākehā mō Aberdeen City: "Mā te kaha i roto i tā mātou pūnaha e āhei ai mātou ki te pupuri i ngā taumata mahi haumaru, ā, ka taea e te iwi whānui te mōhio e kore rawa mātou e taka ki raro i tēnei taumata haumaru. " I Poutāpeta, neke atu i te 90 hēneti te wātea o ngā pūrere i Aberdeen City. E 100 hēneti i Aberdeenshire me Moray - me te 98 hēneti puta noa i te Horahanga Tukunga Ratonga ki te Raki. "Kei te haere tonu te Ratonga Ahi me te Whakaora o Pākehā i ia ohotata." I whakaarahia ngā āwangawanga i tērā marama i te whakaaturanga a BBC Scotland e whā o ngā pūrere ahi a Aberdeen i "weto i te oma" mō tētahi wā. E mōhiotia ana kāore i rawaka ngā āpiha hei kaimahi i ngā mīhini ahi i te tīmatanga o te neke o te rā i te 29 o Poutāpeta. I kī te Uniana o nga Rōpū Ahi e māharahara ana ki te mea i tūpono.

title: I whakaarohia anōtia a Maunga Everest mō te Royal Edinburgh Military Tattoo
summary: Ka whakaarohia anōtia ngā koraha o Arapia me ngā tihi hipoki hukarere o Everest i Etinitini hei wāhanga o te Royal Military Tattoo o tēnei tau.
text: Ka whakamaumaharatia e ia te rau tau o te Tutukitanga Nui o Arapia, te whakatikanga i pūruatia e Ingarangi ki ngā Tākihi Ottoman haumi o Tiamana e whakaahuatia ana i roto i te pikitia o Lawrence Of Arabia. Ka mahia e te Pare Ariki o Horano, te Tīma Drill me te Tīma Drill. Ka whai hākinakina te Ope Taua o Nepal i te hukarere o Maunga Everest. Ko te whakaaturanga mārama o te Moko, ināianei i tōna tau 66, ka tohu hoki i te huritau 90 o te Kuini me te rau tau o te Pakanga o Jutland, te pakanga moana nui rawa o te Pakanga Tuatahi o te Ao. Ka taurimatia e te Moko neke atu i te 220,000 ngā kaimātakitaki, e 1,200 ngā kaiwaiata, e 250 ngā paipa me ngā kaipahū, e rima ngā pēne hōia o Ingarangi, me tētahi pūwhitinga me te whakaaturanga mārama e £250,000 mai i te tīma i muri i te hui whakatuwheratanga o ngā Kēmu Orimipia 2012 a Danny Boyle. I kī a Brigadier David Allfrey, te rangatira nui me te kaiwhakanao o te Royal Edinburgh Military Tattoo: "E tino whakahīhī ana mātou ki te tāpiri i tā mātou hākari ki te tau motuhake o Tōna Nui te Kuini i a mātou e tohu ana i ētahi atu huritau hira: Jutland me te Great Arab Revolt. " Ahakoa rā, ko te pūoro te whetū. I tēnei tau kua hangaia e mātau he tapeke tino pai e paheke ana i ngā rangi whakamīharo." I kī a Donald Wilson, te rangatira o te Ariki o Etinitini me te manukura o Tattoo: "Ka hoki te tirohanga o tēnei tau ki te Tutukitanga Nui o Arapia, puta noa i ngā wā me te hukarere o Maunga Everest, ā, mā te mokowā me tētahi whakaaturanga motopaika Star Wars. " Kāore e taea e au te tatari kia hākinakina e Pākehā me te ao ngā mea e penapenatia ana e te Moko i tēnei tau."

title: 'Tekau tau ki taku kaihautū, ko te tikanga o te hīkoi £2,000'
summary: Ko te utu a Diane mo te noho ki te kaiwhakarato inihua kāinga kotahi mo te 10 tau ko te pikinga o tana utu ā-tau mai i te £1,500 ki te £3,500.
text: I kī te pakeke e 76 tau, mai i Keni: "I te mea he kaitiaki, kāore au e pīrangi ki te huri." I te mutunga ka titiro a ia ki roto i te pukapuka waea, ka karanga haere mō tētahi mahi. He tauira a ia no ngā tāngata e ono miriona e utu ana i te toharite o te £200 i runga i ngā utu. Kua kitea e te kaiwhakahaere o te Taone e utu nui ana ngā kiritaki i te £1.2bn i te tau. Kāore te whakataetae i te mākete kāinga me te inihua i te mahi, ā, kei te whiua ngā kiritaki pono, e kī ana te Mana Whanonga Pūtea (FCA). E whakaaro ana ki ngā rāhuitanga i runga i te utu aunoa, ā, ka nekehia e ngā kamupene ngā kiritaki ki ngā mahi māmā ake, engari i kī "kei te kōti o te umanga te pōro ināianei". "Kāore tēnei mākete i te pai te mahi mō ngā kiritaki katoa," te kī a Christopher Woolard, te kaiwhakahaere nui o te rautaki me te whakataetae i te FCA. "Ahakoa he tokomaha ngā tāngata e hokohoko ana, he tokomaha ngā kiritaki pono kāore i te whiwhi i te mahi pai. E whakapono ana mātau ka pā tēnei ki ngā kiritaki e ono miriona. "Kua whakaritea e mātou he mōkī rongoā tūpono kia tino whakataetae ai ēnei mākete me te whakatau i ngā raruraru kua huraina e mātau. E tūmanako ana mātou kia mahi tahi te umanga me mātau i a mātau e mahi ana." I kī a Tēnā Woolard kāore te arotakenga i whakaatu i te mahi inihua e takahi ana i ngā ture i runga i te whānuitanga. Engari i kī a ia e mārama ana me mahi ngā huringa, ā, ka whakaae ētahi o te umanga ki tēnei. He maha ngā take i kī ai a ia - pērā ki a Diane - he ngāwari kē atu ki ngā kiritaki te whakahōu i tētahi kaupapahere, i ētahi wā mā te tohu noa iho i tētahi pouaka, i te whakawhiti atu ki tētahi mahi māmā ake. I kī te WHK, neke atu i te kotahi i roto i te 10 ngā tāngata e utu ana i ngā utu tino nui mō tā rātou inihua. Kotahi i roto i te toru o rātau i mōrearea i tētahi āhuatanga, tērā pea he pakeke, he iti iho rānei te utu. I kitea e te kaiwhakarite ko ētahi o ngā kaiwhakarato i ūkuia te utu ki te hunga iti iho te whakawhiti. Kei roto i ngā rongoā FCA pea: E hiahia ana te FCA ki te whakaputa i tana pūrongo whakamutunga mō ngā rongoā ka taea i te tōmua o te tau 2020 i muri i te whakaaro anō ki ngā rōpū umanga me ngā rōpū kiritaki. Te utu i tētahi utu rawakore nā Kevin Peachey, kaipānui pūtea whaiaro Kāore anō koe kia raruraru ki tō inihua, pēke rānei, nā reira kua noho koe ki a rātou mō ngā tau. Ko tā te FCA, me ētahi atu arotakenga, kua whakaaturia he kōwhiringa utu nui tēnei - mō te kāinga me te taupoki mīhini, ngā tārewa me ētahi atu mahi. Kaore te pono e utu. Ko te hunga e kore e taea, e kore rānei e pai ki te rapu i tētahi mahi pai ake i runga i te ipurangi, ki te tautohetohe rānei, ka nui ake te utu. Tērā anō tētahi hurihanga i roto i tēnei pūrongo FCA ki te utu rawakore - ka kino ake tō mahi mēnā he iti iho te "manawanui" o ō pūtea, ka uaua rānei koe ki te whakahaere moni. He tokomaha o aua tāngata ka noho i waenganui i te waru miriona e whakaarohia ana ka mahue tētahi pūrongo takitahi mēnā ka noho te UK hei iwi kore moni. E kore e mōhiotia, ka pēnei rātau i ngā tūpāpaku pūtea o ngā nekehanga o te hangarau kua whakarerekē i te āhua o to tātau oranga. 'Ngā whakaaro taekaha' i kī a Huw Evans, ko te tumuaki o te Association of British Insurers, te tinana hokohoko o te umanga, i whakaae ōna mema kia pai ake te mahi a ngā mākete inihua kāinga me ngā mākete motokā mō ngā kiritaki kāore e hokohoko haere i te whakahōutanga. Engari i tāpiri mai a ia: "Ehara tēnei i te take ahurei ki te inihua. He mea nui kia āta whakaarohia ngā hua kāore i te mōhiotia kia tutuki ai tētahi huarahi tika, whārite hoki mō ngā kiritaki katoa." Tērā pea he utu nui ake ngā hua mō te hunga e hokohoko ana, engari i kī te WHK, ahakoa e hiahia ana ki te pupuri i tētahi taumata whakataetae, he nui rawa te rerekētanga o ngā utu hei taupoki i te taumata mōrearea ōrite. I kī a Gillian Guy, te rangatira nui o Citizens Advice, "he tino pai te kite i te FCA e whakaae ana kāore te mākete inihua i te mahi". Engari i whakatūpato a ia ko te pūrongo a te WHK anake i whakatakoto tono. "Ināianei me whai te WHK i ēnei whakaaro taekaha hei aukati i te whiu i ngā kiritaki inihua pono," tana kī. I kī te Tohutohu Tangata Whenua kia kaua e waiho ki te kiritaki ki te kimi i ngā mahi tino pai. Engari, me tatū te mākete kia tika ai te mahi a te katoa. Heoi anō, ko tana tohutohu ki ngā tāngata e rapu ana i ngā utu iti rawa ko:

title: Ka hono atu te kaiārahi o Te Wānanga
summary: Kua uru atu a Gareth Bennett, te kaiārahi o mua o UKIP i te Senedd, ki te Whakakore i te Rōpū Whakaminenga o Welsh.
text: I kī a Tēnā Bennett, nāna i whakahau kia whakakorea te mana whakahaere mō tētahi wā, ko te Pāremata o Welsh "he taumata nui rawa, he koretake noa iho o ngā kaipōrero". Kua whakamahia e te Mema takitahi o te Senedd (MS) e rua o nga āpiha o te rōpū mai i Hui tanguru. I toa a Whakakore i te Whakaminenga o Welsh i te 4.5% o te pōti ā-rohe i te tau 2016. Kua huatau te tohunga pōti o Prof Roger Scully ka taea e te rōpū te toa i ngā tūru Senedd ina tū ngā panekōrero panuku i te raumati o te tau 2018, engari i mutu tana rōpū i muri i ngā whakahekenga me te whakatūnga o te rōpū Rōpū o Te Rūnanga I pōtitia a ia ki te mahi i te rohe o South Wales Central i te tau 2016, i muri i te mōrehu o ngā waea i roto i te rōpū kia whakakorea ia nā ngā kōrero i whakaputaina e ia mō ngā tauiwi o Ūropi ki te Rāwhiti. I mahue i te MS te UKIP i Whiringa 2019. Ka kī a Tēnā Pēneti: "Kua whakaūngia e tōku wā hei mema whakaminenga ōku whakaaro he nui rawa te utu o te whakatūnga, he koretake noa iho ngā kaipōrero." E kī ana he "kino kē atu te iwi o Uēra i raro i te mana whakahaere", ka kī a ia e tūmanako ana ia ki te "mahi ngātahi me te tīma mō te pōti 2021". I kī te kaiārahi o te Rōpū Whakaminenga o Welsh, a Rārangi Suchorzewski, nāna i mahi mō Tēnā Bennett i te taha o te āpiha pēhi o te rōpū, a Haimona Rees: "E kore a Gareth e tākaro i tētahi tūranga kaurori i roto i tā mātou whakahau pōti ārai-Senedd 2021. I ngā marama tata nei ka kitea e mātau ētahi atu kaitono, ā, he ruarua pea ngā whakamīharo." I kī a Whakakore e wehe ana a Tēnā Suchorzewski i te mahi a Tēnā Pēneti, i te wā e arotakea ana te kirimana a Tāne Rees. I pānuitia hoki e te rōpū kua uru atu a Rārangi Taylor, tētahi kaitono paremata o mua o te Rōpū Pākehā i Blaenau Gwent i te pōtitanga 2019, ki te rōpū. Kua puritia e te Whakaminenga o Welsh tōna ingoa ahakoa te whakatau a te rōpū kia huri i tōna taitara ki te Pāremata o Senedd Cymru/Welsh i tērā marama. I kī te rōpū mā te huri i tōna ingoa ināianei ka pōraru pea ngā kaipōti.

title: E anga ana nga komihana EU hou ki te tunu MEP i Pōroa
summary: E anga ana ngā tautapa mō ngā whakairinga i te Kōmihana o Ūropi panuku ki ngā whakarongo whakaū i te Pāremata o Ūropi - ā, e tūmanakohia ana ētahi pātai uaua.
text: Na te rūrū o ngā kōpaki a te Perehitini Kōmihana o EU, o Te Perehitini o Te Komihana EU, o Te Perehitini o Te Komihana o EU, kua whakararuraru i te tokomaha o ngā MEP, ko ngā pūrongo a Pirihi Mohi o TE AO mai i Pōroa. Kua whakaritea te Ariki Maunga o UK ki ngā ratonga pūtea me ngā mākete pūtea. I te Wenerei tana whakarongo. Ka taea e ngā MEP te ārai i ngā wāhui Kōmihana. E anga ana ia komihana ki tētahi tunu tūmatanui e mau ana i ngā haora maha. Ko te nuinga o ngā pātai e pā ana ki ngā taipitopito hangarau o te kaupapahere, iti iho i te toru wiki i muri i te kitenga o ngā tautapa ko tēhea te mahi i hoatu ki a rātou. Ka whakaatahia nga whakarongo i runga i te paetukutuku Pāremata o Ūropi. Ngā papā o te painga? I waenganui i ērā i raro i te pēhanga a ngā MEP ko ngā tautapa Pāniora me Hakaria, tae atu ki a Ariki Maunga, e kī ana to mātau korero. He kaipānui o mua, tērā pea ka āta tirohia a ia nā te Pākehā me te māharahara ki te mana o ngā kaihoko moni i te Taone o Rāwāhi. Ka tīmata ngā whakarongo ki a Cecilia Malmstroem (Hokohoko) o Huitene, whai muri i a Karmenu Vella o Malta (Taiao, Take Moana me ngā Hīnga ika). Kua whakaritea te pāremata ki te pōti mēnā ka whakaaetia te Kōmihana hou i te 22 o Whiringa ā-rangi. Tērā tētahi āwangawanga i waenganui i ngā MEP Kākāriki me te Liberali ka hanumia te mahi āhuarangi me ngā mahi pūngao ki te pou kotahi, i te ringa o tētahi kaitohutohu Pāniora, o Miguel Arias Canete. E māharahara ana hoki ētahi MEP ki te whai i a Tibor Navracsics o Hakari e whakahaere ana i te mātauranga, te ahurea, te taitamariki me te tangata whenua. He minita tika o Hakaria, e tata ana a ia ki te Pirimia o Tōnara Orban, nāna i tū ki ngā mana EU i runga i ngā ara e kiia ana i runga i ngā wehenga tūmatanui. I mahia e te Kōmihana o Ūropi he mahi ture ki te kāwanatanga o Tēnā Orban i runga i ngā ture hou maha, tae atu ki te kaupapahere parenga raraunga me te whakawāwā. Vytenis Andriukaitis (Rituānia) Hauora me te haumarutanga kai Miguel Arias Canete (Paniora) Te mahi āhuarangi me te pūngao Dimitris Avramopoulos (Kariki) Hekenga me ngā take kāinga Elzbieta Bienkowska (Pōrana) Mākete ā-roto, umanga, pūkenga me ngā SMEs (ngā umanga iti, waenganui) Corina Cretu (Romania) Kaupapahere ā-rohe Johannes Hahn (Ateria) Kaupapahere paetata Ūropi me ngā whakaritenga whakanui Honatana Hill (UK) Pūmautanga pūtea, ngā ratonga pūtea me ngā mākete pūtea uniana Piripi Hogan (Ireland) Ahuwhenua me te whanaketanga ā-taiwhenua Vera Jourova (Czech Republic) Te tika, ngā kiritaki me te ōritetanga o te ira tangata Cecilia Malmstroem (Huitene) Trade Neven Mimica (Croatia) International co-operation and development Carlos Moedas (Portugal) Research, science and innovation Pierre Moscovici (France) Economic and financial affairs, taxation and customs Tibor Navracsics (Hungary) Education, culture, youth and citizenship Guenther Oettinger (Germany) Digital economy and society Maros Sefcovic (Horokia) Waka me te mokowā Christos Stylianides (Kaiperu) Āwhina atawhai me te whakahaere mōrearea Marianne Thyssen (Peretiama) Mahi, take pāpori, pūkenga me te nekeneke mahi Karmenu Vella (Malta) Taiao, ngā take moana me ngā hī ika Margrethe Vestager (Tenemaka) Whakataetae

title: Te hītori o te Taunga Rererangi o Cardiff mai i Spitfires ki ngā waka rererangi jumbo
summary: Kua tautuhia te Taunga Rererangi o Kānata ki te whenua ki te ringa o te wāhanga tūmatanui i te ūpoko hou o neke atu i te 80 tau o te rererangi mō te pūmatua o Welsh.
text: Kua pānuitia e te kāwanatanga o Welsh e whakaaro ana ki te hoko i te taunga rererangi mai i TBI, ināianei nā te kamupene Pāniora o Abertis. He taunga rererangi tā te taone mai i te tau 1931, ā, tae noa ki te tau 1954 ka rere mai ngā kaihaere rererangi mai i te wāhi taketake i Pengam Moors, i te taha ki te rāwhiti o te taone. Ko ngā tūāpapa o te taunga rererangi o nāianei - e 15 maire mai i te pokapū o te taone i te Vale o Glamorgan - i whakatakotoria i te Pakanga Tuarua o te Ao me te hiahia ki te whakangungu i ngā kaihautū Spitfire. I tīmata ngā waka rererangi ki te whakawātea i te pae i Rhoose i te tau 1941, ā, i tino whakahaere te papa rererangi i Aperira 1942 hei aorangi o RAF Llandow. Uara arumoni I mōhiotia tōna uara arumoni i ngā tau e whai ake nei i te whakatuwheratanga o te waka rererangi matua i te tau 1952 hei whakanoho i te ratonga Aer Lingus ki Dublin. Tae noa ki te tau 1962, kua whakanuia e te umanga hararei tūtohinga te maha o ngā pāhihi ki te 100,000 i te tau. E toru tau i muri mai, ka hoatu e te kāwanatanga nga kī ki te Kaunihera o te Takiwā o Glamorgan i taua wā. I whakatuwheratia e Pirini Piripi te whare kāpeka hou o te taunga rererangi i te tau 1972. I roto i te whanaketanga he pourewa mana, ā, i tāruatia te roa o te waka rererangi hei whakarato i ngā waka rererangi nui ake, whānui ake, pāhihi i runga i ngā whakahaere atahanga. I te tipu o te awhe o ngā rerenga tūtohi, ka hipa atu ngā tau pāhihi mō ēnei ratonga i te 250,000 i ngā tau tōmua o te tau 1980. I te tau 1986 ka tāpiritia he 750ft anō ki te waka rererangi, e āhei ai ki te whakahaere i ngā pūkaha jumbo Boeing 747. I tae atu ngā tau pāhihi mō ngā rerenga kua whakaritea mai i te taunga rererangi ki te 100,000 ia tau i te tau 1990, ā, ko te nuinga o ngā pāhihi i te taunga rererangi e tata ana ki te 750,000 i te tau i te tau 1993. I whakawāteatia te Taunga Rererangi o Kānata i Aperira 1995. I te tau 2007, ka eke ōna tau pāhihi ki te 2.7m. I tēnei wā ka whakahaere te taunga rererangi i ngā pāhihi 1.5m i te tau e haere ana, mai i ngā ūnga neke atu i te 20.

title: Ka whakaekea e Donald Trump te kaipānui 'slimeball' i roto i te haupae tūpāpaku pakanga
summary: Kua whakaahuatia e te Perehitini o Amerika ko Donald Trump he "pōro" he kairīpoata nāna ia i whakahua i a ia e kī ana he "hunga ngaro" me te "ngote" ngā hōia tūpāpaku o Amerika.
text: I whakaritea e ia te pūrongo pukapuka o Te Atarangi ki ngā whakapae kāore i kitea ki a ia ki te whakakotahi ki Rūhia kia toa ai i te pōti perehitini o te tau 2016. I whakapūtātia takitahitia nga kīanga whakahē e te Pēhi Pāhono. Ko ngā rōpū hōia i waenganui i te hunga e whakahē ana i a Tēnā Puhi, iti iho i te rua marama mai i te pōtitanga 2020. I whakairihia e te rōpū mārō o VoteVets tētahi ataata o ngā whānau i patua ā rātou tamariki i roto i te mahi. "Kāore koe i te mōhio he aha te patunga tapu," te kī a tētahi. Ka tūtohu a Paora Rieckhoff o ngā Hōia o Iraki & Awhekenetāna o Amerika: "Ko wai e tino mīharo ana i tēnei?" I poipoia e tētahi rōpū iti o ngā kaiwhakahaere ngā kāri i te motokā a te perehitini i te Hātarei tata ki te Karapu Korowha o te Motu o Te Pāpāho i Virginia. I tērā tau i kitea ai e Te Pokapū Rangahau o Te Rūnanga he tautoko nui i a ia hei rangatira, me te 57% e manakohia ana. E toru-rima o ngā hōia i kitea he Pākehā, i kitea e te rangahau. He aha te kōrero a te Puhi? E ai ki te Atahanganui, i te whakakorenga a Tēnā Puhi i tētahi haerenga ki te Urupa o Amerika o Aisne-Marne i waho o Parihi i Whiringa 2018, 100 tau i muri i te mutunga o te Pakanga Tuatahi o te Ao, ka kī a ia kua "kī i te hunga ngaro". E whā ngā pūtake i kī atu ki te pukapuka kua whakakāhoretia e ia te ariā o te toro nā te mea ka whakararuraru te marangai i ōna makawe, ā, kāore a ia i whakapono he mea hira te whakahonore i ngā tūpāpaku pakanga o Amerika. I taua haerenga anō, ka kīia hoki e te perehitini e 1,800 ngā hōia o Amerika i mate i Belleau Wood he "ngote". I āwhina te pakanga ki te ārai i te kōkiri a Tiamana ki Parihi i te Pakanga Tuatahi o te Ao, ā, e whakanuia ana e te US Marine Corps. I takea te pūrongo a te Atarangi i runga anō i ngā pūtake ingoamuna, engari i whakaūngia e tētahi "rangatira matua o te Tari Whakangungu me te mōhiotanga tuatahi ki ngā takahanga" me tētahi "āpiha matua o te Rōpū Moana o U.S. i kōrerotia mō ngā kōrero a Te Puhi" i whakaū i ngā kōrero urupa ki AP. I te tau 2018 ka kī te Whare Mā kua whakakorea te haerenga ki te urupā nā te mea kua whakatūria e te rangi kino te waka rererangi a te perehitini. I pūruatia tēnei pūkete i roto i tētahi pukapuka o mua tata nei e te kaitohutohu haumarutanga ā-motu o Perehitini Pu, a John Bolton, he kaiwhakawāwā kōrero ki a Tēnā Puhi. I kī hoki te Taua Moana o Amerika i whakakorea te haere ki te urupa nā te marangai hei urupare ki tētahi tono i raro i te Ture Wāteatanga o te Mōhiohio mai i te kaipānui o Buzzfeed, a Jason Leopold. He pēhea te urupare a te Puhi? Me te kore kōrero ki a Jeffrey Goldberg, te kaituhi o te pūrongo o te Atarangi, i runga i te ingoa, ka tūtohu a ia i te Hātarei: "E kaha ana tō mahi mō te hōia, mai i te hanga anō i tētahi pārekareka pau i mahue i a OBiden [te whakahaeretanga perehitini o mua i te wā e perehitini ana a Joe Biden ki a Te Pākehā], ki te whakatika i tētahi V.A. pakaru me te whawhai mō ngā utu hōia nui,  kātahi ka mahi tahi tētahi kaipānui pōro, tērā pea e mahi tahi ana me ngā tāngata whakararuraru, ka mahi i tētahi utu weriweri.." "Ka whakamaharatia ahau e tēnei ki te Kōrero Paruparu [te kōrero Steele e whakapae ana i te whakakotahitanga ki Rūhia], i kaha te panaia e Hoani McCain, ā, i puta he tinihanga katoa. He maha hoki ētahi atu tinihanga. He kino te Radical Far Left, ka mahia, ka kōrero rānei rātau i tētahi mea kia toa. Engari e kore rātou, ka toa mātou, e whā nga tau nunui!" Ka haere tonu a Tēnā Puhi ki te whakaeke i tētahi atu kaipānui, ko Te Wānanga o Fox News, ko tētahi o ngā kōrero rongokōrero makau a te perehitini. I pūrongotia e Griffin ngā kōrero whakahāwea mō te hōia a Tēnā Trump i ētahi atu wā, pēnei i te karanga i ngā hōia i whawhai i te Pakanga o Vietnam "ngote". "Ko te tikanga kia panaia a Wānanga mō tēnei momo pūrongo," te tuhituhi a Tēnā Puhi. "Kore rawa mātau e karanga mō te kōrero. @FoxNews ngaro!" Kua whakakāhore rānei ngā kaiwhakahaere o te Whare Mā i ngā kōrero i whakapaetia i te haerenga ki Wīwī, i whakapuakina rānei te manaaki a te perehitini ki te hōia. He aha ngā kōrero a ngā hoariri o Te Puhi? I kī a Tēnā Biden, te kaiwhakataetae Manapori i te pōtitanga o te 3 o Whiringa ā Rangi, he "kore tika" tana tauwhāinga ki te ārahi. "E te Perehitini, ki te kore koe e manaaki i o mātau hōia, kāore e taea e koe te ārahi i a rātau," tana kihi. Ki te pōtitia, ka kī a ia, ka "whakarite kia mōhio a tātau toa o Amerika ka whai tuarā ahau me te whakahonore i ta rātau patunga tapu. I ngā wā katoa." I kī a Senator Manapori o Tammy Duckworth, he toa i ngaro ngā waewae e rua i a ia e mahi ana i Raki, "he pai ki a Perehitini Trump te whakamahi i te hōia a AMERIKA mō tōna ake ngākau nui". Ko Khizr Kani, te pāpā o tētahi hōia o Amerika i patua i Iraki, nāna i whakahē i a Tēnā Puhi i te wā o te hui Manapori 2016, i uru ki a Ms Duckworth i runga i te waea. Ka kī a ia: "Ina karangatia e Donald Trump tētahi tangata e whakatakoto ana i o rātau oranga ki te mahi i ētahi atu, e mārama ana mātau ki te wairua o Te Puhi." Kei hea te tūnga o te Tūruhi me te hōia o Amerika? Tērā ētahi tautohetohe me ngā tautohetohe o mua. Na te kī a Tēnā Puhi i whakapouri i te kōrero a Senator John McCain, he herehere whawhai i Vietnam, ehara i te "toa whawhai" e kī ana: "He pai ki a au ngā tāngata kāore i hopukina." Kaore anō te perehitini kia mahi i roto i te ōrite. E rima ngā whakatārewatanga i whiwhi ai ia i tētahi hukihuki hōia i te wā o te Pakanga o Vietnam - e whā mō ngā take mātauranga, kotahi mō ngā wheua, he konupūmā i roto i te rekereke. I whiwhi a Joe Biden i ngā whakatārewatanga tauira e rima i te wā o te Pakanga o Vietnam i mua i te whakakorenga i te mahi i roto i te hōia nā te huangō i a ia e taitamariki ana.

title: Golden Globes 2014: Hui i roto i ngā korukī
summary: I whakahonoretia e nga tohu Golden Globe te nui me te pai o Karaihe me te pouaka whakaata i te Rātapu. Anei tētahi tīpakonga o ngā kīanga mai i te pō.
text: Ko te kaihautū tahi o Amy Poehler i runga i tētahi tau tino pai mō ngā kiriata me te pouaka whakaata "Mātā [Damon], i tētahi atu pō, i tētahi atu rūma, he tino nui koe. I te pō nei, kaua hoki e hē tēnei, he tangata para koe." "Ko Woody Allen te kaiwhiwhi o te whakawhiwhinga Cecil B DeMille o tēnei tau, i muri noa iho i te toatanga o Martin Scorsese. E whakaaro ana ahau ko te whakawhiwhinga mō te tangata iti rawa o te ao me ngā mōhiti nui rawa." "Mō tana mahi i roto i te Karapu Kaihoko o Tara, i ngaro i a ia te 45 pauna - ko tā ngā kaiwhakaari rānei e kīia ana, 'kei roto i tētahi whitiāhua'." "I ohorere te Wolf of Wall Street i ngā kaimātakitaki mā te whakamahi i te kupu-f 506 wā i roto i te toru haora, he pūkete hōu ki te kore koe e tatau i taku pāpā e ngana ana ki te whakairi i ētahi rākau ārai i roto i to mātau rūma noho." "E hiahia ana ahau ki te mihi ki a koe mo te kore e whakamutu i to whakaaro kua kī atu ahau ki a koe, 'Sandra, ka hoatu e au he herpes ki a koe,' i te mea e tino hiahia ana ahau ki te kōrero, 'Sandra, ka hoatu e au he taringa ki a koe.'" "E 86 ngā wā i whakakāhoretia ai te [Karapu Kaihoko o Tara]... E tino koa ana ahau i te maha o ngā wā, kāore rānei i tae mai ki a au." "Āe, i ngokingoki ake tērā. He ruarua aku vodka i raro i taku tātua, ā, anei mātou... tēnā koe Woody [Allen] mō te karanga mai i a au, ehara i tētahi o ētahi atu wāhine whakamīharo i roto i te rūma." "Ka wareware ahau ki tētahi tangata, e pouri ana ahau, kāore au i tatari ki tēnei. Patua koa ahau, patua ahau, patua ahau ki ngā ingoa." "Kāore au i te mōhio he aha i tino whakamataku ai, he mea pai tērā. Kāore au i te mōhio he aha ahau i mataku ai, e pouri ana ahau... aroha mai kei te tino rūrū ahau, kaua rawa e mahi anō i tēnei, he tino whakamataku." "I ngā wā katoa e tangi ana ahau ina kāore au i te tika, kātahi ka tono mai te kaiwhakahaere ki a au kia tangi, kāore e taea e au te tangi. He tino ngote." "Tēnā koe mō tō whakaae kia tāhaetia koe ki te hanga i tēnei whitiāhua... Tēnā koe mō te whakahauhau i ahau kia mōrearea." "Kevin [Spacey], ko koe te rā tākaro tino pai rawa atu". "Ko Mātā Damon - te kaitapere tino toa, pūkenga kua mahi tahi ahau, ā, ko te take anake kāore koe i konei nā te mea he nui ake aku sequins." "Ināianei mā tēnei [whakawhiwhinga] me te Pēhi Ā-Rohe o Karaihe, ka taea e ngā tāngata katoa o te ao te tiritiri i te hari me te hari o Breaking Bad." "He kaikōrero tūmatanui kino ahau. He kino hoki ahau ki te reo Ingarihi. Koia anake te reo e mōhio ana ahau."

title: E whakakāhore ana te wahine i te whakawehi i te MP o Te Wānanga o Naz Shah
summary: Kua whakakāhore tētahi wahine i te tuku īmēra whakawehi ki tētahi MP Mahi.
text: E toru nga whakapae e anga ana a Sundas Alam, e 30, mo te tuku whakawhitiwhitinga kino ki te MP o Te Uru o Naz Shah i te 3 o Āperira. E whakapaea ana hoki a Ms Alam, o Princeville Street, o Pirihi, ki te ngana ki te whakataka i te ara o te tika mā te whakamahi i ngā taipitopito a ētahi atu tāngata. I tautohe a ia kia kaua e hara ki ngā whakapae katoa i te wā o te whakarongo ki te kōti karauna o te taone, i reira kua whakaritea he whakawā mo te 25 o Whiringa ā-rangi. Ngā Hononga Ipurangi Pātahi HM Courts Service

title: Te matenga o te taraka o Essex: 'Ia cog' i roto i te mahere maunu tāngata 'i te mōhiotanga'
summary: Ko ia "kōwae i roto i te wīra" o te mahi maunu tāngata i whakamutua i te matenga o ngā kaiheke e 39 i roto i tētahi ipu, kua rongo te kōti.
text: Tokowhā ngā tāngata e whakapaea ana he wāhanga o tētahi mahi maunu tāngata whānui ake i muri i te kitenga o ngā kaiheke Vietnamese i roto i tētahi tauranga taraka i Essex i Whiringahora 2019. I roto i tana whaikōrero whakamutunga i muri i te iwa wiki o te whakaaturanga, ka werohia e te rōia a Bill Emlyn Jones ngā kerēme a te hunga whakapae kāore rātau i te mōhio ki ngā mea e haere ana. Tokorua hoki o nga tāngata e whakakāhore ana i te patu tangata. Kua rongo te whakawā i ngā tūpāpaku Vietnamese e 39, e 15 ki te 44 te pakeke, i roto i te tauranga hiri i te ara mai i Zeebrugge i Peretiama ki Purfleet i Essex. I kī atu a Tēnā Emlyn Jones ki te hūri: "He hara whakaritea, ā, he rōpū whakahaere me te maha o ngā wāhanga neke, ā, kia mahi ai, me mōhio te katoa ki tā rātou tūranga, kia tika te mahi i tā rātou mahi... kaua e whakararurarutia. "Na te nui rawa o te moni e tūpono ana, kāore e taea te waiho tētahi o ērā ki te tūponotanga." Kua rongo te kōti e 15 ngā tāngata e tohu ana - i te £10,000 te upoko - £150,000. I kī a Tēnā Emlyn Jones mēnā ka "hākinakina" rātau, ā, ka kōpeketia e 39 ngā kaiheke i roto i te tauranga kotahi, e £390,000 te utu hei mahi mō tētahi utanga kotahi e "tata ana ki te hua katoa". Ka haere tonu a ia: "E kī ana mātou, e kore e taea te whakauru atu ki tētahi whatunga me te kore whakaaetanga pū me pēhea te wehewehenga o te moni, me te nui o te moni i whakaurua. " Mēnā kāore tētahi kōpae i roto i te wīra e mōhio ana ki tā rātou e mahi ana - ināianei tonu, ā, e mārama ana he mōrea o te hē o te mea katoa, ā, e huatau ana ahau kāore he rōpū hara kua whakaritea e whakangahau i taua mōrea mō tētahi hēkona. "Me mōhio ngā tāngata katoa e huatau ana mātou. He pātai noa iho ki te whakaaro noa." Kua whakakāhore a Eamonn Harrison, 23, o County Down, me Gheorghe Nica, 41, o Basildon, Essex, e 39 nga tatau o te parekura. E whakakāhore ana a Tēnā Harrison, Christopher Kennedy, 24, o County Armagh, me Valentin Calota, 38, o Birmingham, he wāhanga o te mahi maunu tāngata. Kua whakaae a Tēnā Nica ki te maunu tāngata, engari e whakakāhore ana i tētahi utu e pā ana ki te haerenga mate. Ko te rangatira o te kaikawe o Airana, ko Ronan Hughes, 41, me te atekōkiri taraka o Maurice Robinson, 26, kua whakaae ki te patu tangata. Ka haere tonu te whakamātautau. Kimihia te Rongokōrero o TE Rāwhiti o Ingarangi i Facebook, Instagram me Twitter. Mēnā he huatau pūrākau tāu, īmēra eastofenglandnews@bbc.co.uk

title: E whakatūpato ana te upoko o Jersey kia kaua e whakakaha i ngā hua whakamātautau
summary: Ka taea te whakahau i ngā kura ki te whakaiti i te maha o ngā kaupapa e whakaakona ana e rātau mēnā he nui rawa te arotahi ki ngā hua o te whakamātautau, kua kī tētahi kaiako matua o Jersey.
text: Ka whakaputaina e te tari mātauranga tētahi wehenga o ngā hua GCSE mō ia kura i ngā marama e rua e whai ake nei. I kī te tumuaki o te Kura o Le Rocquier, a Richard Rolfe, ko te arotahi ki te angitu mātauranga, he iti iho te wā e pau ana i ngā hākinakina, ngā toi me ngā kaupapa mahi. I kī a ia he maha nga kaupapa o tana kura ka mutu pea kei raro i te tuma. Ka kī a Tēnā Rolfe: "Ko ngā mōrearea, ā, kei te āta whakaaro ahau mō tēnei, ka mutu ka ngana koe ki te peke i roto i ngā hoops ki te whiu i tō ara ki runga i tētahi tēpu rōpū, ā, ko ngā tūpāpaku ko ngā tamariki, ngā whānau me te marautanga nā te mea kua whāiti. " We've introduced electrical work, we've got children who can wire a whole ringmain, we've got plumbing, we've got carpentry, we've got catering and all of those would have to go." I kī ngā tamariki mōrearea a Tēnā Rolfe e tūmanakohia ana he kōeke iti iho i ngā kura tuarua kāore i te tīpako i ngā Kāwanatanga e whā nā te āhua o te mahi a te pūnaha akoranga. I kī a ia mā te pēhi i ngā kura kia whiwhi ai i ngā hua whakamātautau pai ake, ka manawapa rātau ki te whakaako i ngā tamariki mōrearea rawa, me titiro ngā mātua ki tua atu i ngā hua whakamātautau ki te katoa o te kura. I te wā o Hui tanguru, i whakaarahia ngā māharahara i whakaaturia ai ngā hua whakamātautau o mua i ngā tauira i ngā kura tuarua o Amerika i whiwhi i ngā kōeke iti iho i te nuinga o ngā taitamariki i te UK. I whakaputaina e te tari mātauranga o Jersey ngā hua matua i te Rāite, engari i kī ka tae atu ki te waru wiki ki te tuku i ia mahinga kura. I whakaaturia mai e tētahi tono Wāteatanga o te Mōhiohio i te wā o Hui tanguru, he kino ake te mahi a ngā kura tuarua o te kāwanatanga i ngā GCSE i te nuinga o ngā kura o UK. I kī a Jim Westwater mai i te tari mātauranga i te ōrautanga katoa o ngā tauira e whiwhi ana i ngā kōeke matua i Jersey i te tau 2010. I kī a ia e 73.6% o ngā tauira o Jersey i eke ki tētahi kōeke A* ki C i GCSE.

title: E 15 tau te whiwhinga o te tokotoru rōpū o Kenya 'Liz'
summary: Tokotoru nga tāngata i whakawāteatia ki te whakangungu i tētahi kōtiro taitamariki i Kēnia, a, ka mahue i a ia ki roto i te whare horoi, kua whiwhi ia i ngā whakaritenga whare herehere 15 tau.
text: Ko ngā pūrongo i whakahaua e nga pirihimana kia tapahia he pātītī hei whiu i tērā tau. E whakakāhore ana nga pirihimana o Kēnia i nga kerēme. Tata ki te rua miriona ngā tāngata i haina i tētahi petihana e tono ana i te tika mō te kōtiro, e mōhiotia ana ko "Liz". Ka kī atu tōna whaea ki te AO i hari a ia kua whakaratohia te tika. I te hoki mai te kōtiro ki te kāinga mai i te nehunga o tōna tipuna tāne i te takiwā o Busia ki te uru o Kenya i June 2013 i te wā i tū ai te whakaekenga. I pāngia e ia tētahi tuarā whati me ngā whara nui o roto. I Whiringahora 2013, e hia rau ngā tāngata i haere ki te tari pirihimana o Kēnia i Nairobi ki te tuku i te petihana. I muri iho ka kōrerotia te kēhi ki te kaitiaki ā-ture o te whenua. Tērā tonu ētahi whakamana hopu e tārewa ana mō ētahi atu pōhēhētanga e toru i roto i te kēhi, e kī ana ngā pirihimana kei te oma. He maha nga haora i te Mane i te horahanga o nga rongo o nga rerenga herehere #JusticeForLiz te hashtag i runga i te Twitter. Kua pōhiritia e nga kaiwhakahauhau nga rerenga, engari kua whakatūpato kei te whakapōturi tonu te wehi me te tauhae i te tokomaha o nga wāhine kia kaua e pūrongo i te tūkinotanga. "Kāore i pūrongotia e 19 i roto i te 20 ngā hīkaka i Kēnia, nō reira kāore i te whiua," te kī a Kimberly Brown, mai i te rōpū whakahau Ōritetanga Ināianei, i whakahuatia i roto i te pāpāho paetata.

title: Ka kitea e ngā huakita te 'kī ki te rongoā i te momona me te kore mahinga'
summary: Ko te ngaronga o te taumaha i muri i te pokanga tāhei puku tērā pea i takea mai i ngā huringa ki ngā rauropi moroiti e noho ana i roto i te ngākau, e kī ana ngā kairangahau o Amerika.
text: Kua whakaaturia e tētahi mātauranga i roto i ngā kiore mā te pokanga e whakanoho ai ngā momo huakita rerekē ki te whakanoho i te whekau. Na te whakawhiti i ngā tauira o aua huakita ki roto i ngā kiore hauora i tere ai te ngaro o te taumaha me te kore pokanga. Engari i kī nga kairangahau o te Whare Wānanga o Harvard kāore anō rātau kia whakamārama i te tikanga i muri i a rātau hua. He rerekētanga o ngā huakita i roto i ngā puku me ngā whekau o te hunga mōmona i whakaritea ki te hunga taumaha pūnoa. A, i roto i ngā tāngata kua mahi puku hei āwhina i a rātou ki te ngaro i te taumaha, ka huri ngā momo moroiti e kitea ana i roto i te ngākau. I roto i te mātauranga hou rawa, i whakataurite ngā kairangahau i ngā rōpū kiore mōmona e toru i runga i te kai pūngoi tiketike. I te wiki i muri iho, he rerekē ngā huakita o ngā kiore i pā ki te pokanga momona tūturu, me te nui o ngā momo e kitea ana i roto i ngā tāngata kikokore me te whakataka i ngā momo e pā ana ki te momona. E toru wiki i muri i te pokanga kua ngaro i a rātau te 30% o to rātau taumaha tinana, ka pūrongotia e nga kairangahau i roto i te Rongoā Whakawhitiwhiti Pūtaiao. He iti noa iho te rerekētanga o ngā rauropi moroiti i roto i ngā kiore i mahi tinihanga, ahakoa i ngaro te taumaha o te rōpū i runga i te kai pūngoi iti ki ngā kiore i whiwhi i te pokanga karo. Kātahi ka whakawhitia e ngā kairangahau ngā tauira mai i ngā ngākau o ngā rōpū kiore e toru ki ētahi atu kiore kore moroiti. Ko te hunga i whiwhi huakita i nga kiore karo, i ngaro te nui o te taumaha i roto i te rua wiki, engari kaore ētahi i kite i te rerekētanga. Kāore anō kia mārama he pēhea te whakaawe a ngā moroiti i te ngaronga taumaha, engari ko tētahi ariā he pānga ki te metabolism. "Me ako nui ake tātau mō te tikanga e whakarerekētia ai e te iwi whānui moroiti e te hipa puku ōna pānga," te kī a te kaituhi akoranga a Dr Lee Kaplan, he ahorangi pāhono o te Rongoā i te Kura Tākuta o Harvard. "Mā te kaha ki te whakatutuki i ētahi o ēnei pānga me te kore kokoti, ka hoatu ki a mātau he huarahi hōu rawa ki te whakamahi i te raruraru nui o te momona, tētahi e āwhina ana i ngā tūroro kāore e taea, kāore rānei e hiahia ana ki te mahi." I tāpiri mai te kaituhi tahi a Pita Turnbaugh: "Ehara pea i te mea ka whai pire mīharo mātou e mahi ana mō ngā tāngata katoa e iti ana te taumaha. " Engari mēnā ka taea e tātau, i te iti rawa, te whakarato i ētahi atu whiringa ki te pokanga hipa puku e hua ana i ngā pānga ōrite, he tino haere whakamua." I kī a Prof David Haslam, mai i te National Obesity Forum: "E mōhio ana mātou ehara ngā pānga o te pokanga bariatric i te mīhini noa iho, ā, kāore mātou i te mōhio ki ngā take katoa he aha i tino pai ai te mahi, i te taumira o te mate huka. " He nui ake i te mea e tūtaki ana ki te kanohi."

title: Ka whakawhitia e te pirihimana a Ceredigion mō Kāriana i roto i te 'wehenga mahi'
summary: Ko te ariā o te whakawhiti i tētahi patu i Ceredigion mō tētahi i tētahi motu Kāriana tērā pea he moemoeā mō te nuinga o ngā pirihimana.
text: Nā Ceri Coleman-PhillipsBBC News Engari ko te mea pono mō tētahi haihana waka Pirihimana o Dyfed-Powys e hākinakina ana i tētahi wā e toru tau hei rorohiko i ngā Moutere o Cayman. I kī a Matthew Thomas, e 35, i whakaaetia ia e te ope Welsh kia wehe i tētahi mahi i muri i tana kitenga i te pānuitanga mahi moemoeā. Heoi anō, i kī a ia ko te whakawhiti - e whakamahara ana ki te tānga o te whakaari kōhua o TE WĀ, ko te Mate i Pararaiha - he "nekehanga nui me te āhua o te tūpono". Mai i te tau 2008, he āpiha a Tāne Thomas, nō Haverfordwest, Pembrokeshire, i te ope Welsh mai i te tau 2008, i uru atu hei kātipa motuhake i te tau i mua. "Mai i te neke tuatahi, i mōhio ahau ko tēnei te mahi mōku," tana kī. "I a au e tamariki ana, ka kī mai taku whaea ki a au e hiahia ana ahau kia noho hei pirihimana Amerika e taraiwa ana i ngā motokā pirihimana o Amerika." I kī a ia i ngā wā katoa e hiahia ana ia ki te pirihimana ki rāwāhi me te "wheako i ngā whakamātautau rerekē e kawea mai ana e ia". I puta mai te wā i tērā tau i tana kitenga i te Royal Cayman Islands Police Service (RCIPS) e pānui ana i tētahi tūranga mō tētahi āpiha pūkenga. "He momo wā 'ki te kore au e mahi ināianei, e kore rawa ahau e mahi'," tana kī. "I whakatata atu ahau ki ngā Pirihimana o Dyfed-Powys me te pātai ka taea e au te wehe mahi, ā, he mea whakamīharo, ka kī mai rātau āe." I rere atu a Tēnā Tōma ki ngā Moutere o Cayman i Aperira, ā, e toru tau ka noho i reira hei rorohiko i mua i tana hokinga ki te kāinga ki te uru o Weera. I tōna taenga atu, e rua wiki i hoatu ki a ia ki te kōmaka i tōna nohoanga i te pūmatua o George Town i mua i te pūrongo mō te mahi. I whakaahuatia e ia ngā Moutere o Cayman he "wāhi ahurei ki te noho me te mahi", engari i kī a ia kāore te mahi i rerekē ki te kāinga. "Ko te pirihimana he pirihimana, ahakoa kei hea koe i te ao," tana kī. "E mahi ana ahau i roto i te urupare ōrite, nā reira ka mahi ahau ki ngā waea tino ōrite [ki] ka mahi ahau i te UK. Ko te rerekētanga anake ko te rā e whiti tonu ana i konei." I kī a ia he "tino iti" te pāpātanga hara i runga i ngā moutere, ā, e pā ana ia ki te maha o ngā mahi ōrite ki a ia i te uru o Wales, pēnei i ngā karanga kāinga, te whanonga ārai pāpori, ngā tāhae me te tūkino hara. "Kāore anō ahau kia waea atu ki ngā hipi i runga i te huarahi," tana kōrero. I kī a ia e tata ana ki te 55,000 te taupori o nga moutere, ā, e whā nga kaipuke tere e mau ana i ia rā, e mau ana ia ki te 4,000 ngā pāhihi. "E whakaaturia ana ki a koe ngā uauatanga o te whakarite i tō rātou haumarutanga, me te mahi hoki ki te iwi paetata," tana tāpiri mai. I kī a Tēnā Tamati i "aroha ia ki ia meneti o te wheako i tēnei wā" e whakaahua ana i ngā moutere he "wāhi ātaahua ki te mahi" me te "tata ki te ātaahua ki te uru o Wales". I whakamihi a ia ki ngā tāngata i tūtaki ai ia, ā, ka tohu atu ki ngā wheako ngaio e whakapono ana ia ka āwhina i a ia ki te UK. "E mahi tahi ana ahau me ētahi hoa mahi whakamīharo mai i ngā Moutere o Cayman, mai i Kānata, Pāpatohe me Hamika. He wā tino pai te mātakitaki me te ako me pēhea tā rātou mahi," tana tāpiri mai. "E mōhio tūturu ana ahau ka nui ngā manuhiri ao whānui ki Pembrokeshire i roto i ngā tau e rua e whai ake nei." I kī te āpiha kua riro i a ia te ingoa kāinga "Sandy" i waenganui i ōna hoa mahi i muri i tana haerenga ki te kimi motokā tāhae i roto i tāna i whakaaro ai he waka 4x4. "I tere rawa te āhua ehara i te 4x4, ā, i te mutunga ka mau katoa ahau ki te kirikiri, ā, me whakaora anō," tana whakamārama. Ki te kore e mahi, he pai ki a Tēnā Tōma te haere ki te hī ika, ki te kayaking me te hī ika - ehara i te mea rerekē i te uru o Weera. Heoi anō, ka taea te whakaaro ko ngā kararehe i Cayman he pā kē atu, me ngā iguana me ngā honu moana i waenganui i ngā kararehe o te rohe. "He tino ātaahua te oranga o te moana, ā, e whakaaro ana ahau ki te tīmata ki te ruku kia kite i ētahi atu mea," te kī a Tēnā Tamati. E hapa ana a ia i ngā hoa me te whānau mai i te kāinga, ā, i kī mai he "uaua ki te ngaro i te whānautanga o tana irāmutu tuatahi" a tērā marama. "Waimarie ka ngāwari kē atu te hangarau o nāianei," tana tāpiri mai. Ahakoa te wā, ka whakaae a Tēnā Tōma he āwangawanga mo te haere. "He nekehanga tino nui, he iti noa iho te tūponotanga, nā te mea i mahue i a au ōku hoa katoa, whānau me tētahi mahi i arohaina e au ki muri kia neke ki tērā taha o te ao. " Kāore au i tino whakaaro tae noa ki te haora 11." I pātai mai mehemea ka whakaarohia e ia he neke pūmau ki ngā Moutere o Cayman, ka kī a Tēnā Tōma kua "tukua ia ki te hoki hei āpiha Dyfed-Powys" ina mutu tana kirimana. I kī a ia he "tino tautoko" te tōpana i tana nekehanga, ā, e tūmanako ana ia ka taea e ia te "whakahoki mai i ētahi o ngā wheako pai" ina hoki mai ia.

title: Kua whakaūngia ngā rā hustings pōti Jersey
summary: Ka tū ngā hustings i ia pāremata e 12 o Jersey kia pātai ai te iwi whānui ki ngā kaitono e 82.
text: E whā ngā tūru e wātea ana mō te tūranga o te senator, e haere mai ana me tētahi tono puta noa i te motu. E 82 ngā kaitono mō tētahi o ngā tūru e 34 e wātea ana, ā, e 11 ngā kaipōrero, ko te nuinga o ngā kātipa, kua whakahokia kāore i te ātetetia. Ka haere a Jersey ki te pōti i te Wenerei, 19 o Whiringa ā-rangi ki te pōti mō ngā tūpāpaku, ngā kātipa me ngā kawanatanga. Ka tīmata ngā hui katoa i te 19:30 BST me tētahi atu hustings taiwhenua mō ngā senator i tū i te Royal Jersey Showground i Trinity. Ko te wā tuatahi tēnei i āhei ai te tangata ki te pōti mō ngā tari tōrangapū e toru i te rā kotahi. Tokoono hoki nga senator kaore i te pōtitia i a rātau e haurua ana i to rātau wā e ono tau o te tari. E 61,987 ngā tāngata kua rēhitatia ki te pōti i te pōti.

title: Ka tukuna e te Kaunihera o te Takiwā o Derbyshire te tahua hei tapahi i ngā mahi e 1,600
summary: A new council budget accepted in Derbyshire puts 1,600 jobs at risk as it aims to save £157m over five years.
text: I whakaae te Kaunihera o te Takiwā o Te Takiwā o Te Rohe o Te Rūnanga o Te Rohe o Te Rūnanga o Te Takiwā o Te Rūnanga o Te Rūnanga I pōti hoki ki te manakohanga o te pikinga utu mo tana kāpata, ahakoa he iti ake ngā mema, nā reira kaore tēnei e utu moni anō. Kāore anō te kaunihera kia tātaki i te wāhi e hinga ai ngā tapahi, ā, kei te pātai atu ki te iwi whānui me aha. I kī te ātete Conservative, nāna i tapahi te £70m, ā, e 1,200 ngā mahi i roto i ōna tau e whā i te kaha, kāore i whakatau i te wāhi hei penapena ināianei ka kino kē atu te āhuatanga. Councillor Mike Longden, shadow cabinet member for finance, said: "Our greatest concern that we see today in the report is their failure to maintain the momentum of making savings in this authority." I kī te kaiārahi mahi a Anne Western kei te uaua rātau: "Kei te kimi moni mātou i ngā momo huarahi katoa e tika ana kia mahia e te whakahaere o mua i ngā tau kua taha nei." 'Tino mōrearea te pāngia' Ahakoa kāore anō kia oti te wāhi e haere mai ai ngā penapena, e mōhio ana te kaunihera me tiaki te £157m i roto i ngā tau e rima e whai ake nei. I tēnei tau ka whakarite kia tapahia te £6.6m mai i te tiaki pakeke, £10.9m mai i ngā tamariki me ngā taitamariki me te £9.8m mai i te tari mahi, whakahaerenga me te kawenga. Kua whakakāhoretia e ngā kaikaunihera mahi tētahi pikinga 1% i roto i te whakaaetanga taketake e penapena ana mō te £7,000. Kāore anō kia whakatauria e te Tories te pikinga. Engari i whakatūpato ngā uniana ka mamae pea ngā pakeke, ā, he āwangawanga te pūtea mō te tiaki pāpori pakeke. I kī a Jeanette Raiti, mai i Unison: "Mai i ngā mea e mōhio ana mātou i tēnei wā, ko ngā tāngata tino mōrearea i Te Aotearoa [e pāngia ana]."

title: Ko te kaupapa huarahi o Arundel 'ka tūkino pea i te ngahere tawhito'
summary: Kua tonoa ngā kaihanga huarahi e whakarite ana i tētahi hipa i Sussex, UK, kia kimi i tētahi huarahi e kore ai e tūkino ki te ngahere tahito.
text: E whakapono ana te kaitātari taiao o Roger HarrabinBBC Ko te upoko o South Downs National Park, ko Margaret Paren, ka taea e ngā kaipūkaha te whakatakoto i tētahi kaupapa hei tango motokā ki waho o te pāka, kaua mā reira. E kī ana a ia ka tūkino pea te kaupapa i ngā ngahere tawhito, pērā i ngā minita e tautohe ana i ētahi atu parenga mō ngā pāka ā-motu. Highways England says the project will solve congestion around Arundel. Engari e kī ana ngā kaiwhakahauhau kua whakararurarutia te kēhi o te rōpū e ngā tatauranga hou e whakaatu ana kua whakaarohia e ngā kaitohutohu e toru ngā kōpaki o te maha o ngā waka e whakamahi ana i te A27 o nāianei i mua i Arundel. E whakaatu ana ngā Huarahi o Ingarangi i te ara hipa A27 Ko te nuinga o ngā tāngata o te rohe e kīia ana e te kaunihera paetata ki te tautoko i tētahi arawhiti. Ko ētahi e hiahia ana ki tētahi huarahi hou ahakoa te ara; Ko ētahi e tautoko ana i te hanga huarahi, engari e hiahia ana ki te tiaki i te pāka ā-motu. E tautohe ana tētahi atu rōpū kāore e hiahiatia ana he huarahi hou. I kī atu te arotakenga ā-ture a Ms Paren ki a TE Rongokōrero kāore te poari o te pāka e whakahē ana i ngā mahere hei whakapai ake i te A27, engari e tohe ana kāore e whakaaetia tētahi ara e wehe ana i te rāhui tūturu. Ka kī a ia: "E hiahia ana mātou ki te āwhina ki te whakatika i ngā raruraru waka o Arundel, engari kāore mātou i te whakaaro kua tika te whakaaro o Highways England ki ngā ara kāore e tūkino i te pāka ā-motu. " E kī ana ngā ture a te kāwanatanga me whakakāhore te whakaaetanga whakarite mō ngā whanaketanga nui i ngā pāka ā-motu, hāunga i ngā āhuatanga tino ātaahua, ā, ka taea te whakaatu kei te painga tūmatanui." Ko tēnei tautohe kei te pokapū o te arotakenga ā-ture e rapu ana te mana o te pāka ā-motu i runga i te mahere huarahi e £250m. E tino hāngai ana te take i muri i tētahi kī taurangi a te Hēkeretari Taiao a Michael Gove kia rapu parenga pai ake mō ngā pāka ā-motu, hei wāhanga o te whāinga a te kāwanatanga kia pai ake te waiho i te taiao māori o UK i tōna kitenga. Tērā pea ka pāngia te whānau o Sue Elphick e te kaupapa hipa i tētahi atu. Ko tōna whare ātaahua e noho ana i te pito o tētahi ara ngahere kāore anō kia hangaia. E whakarapa ana i tētahi wāhi o te pāka i whakamahia hei hanga i ngā taunga o tētahi kāinga rangatira. He tirohanga Ingarihi tino mātāmua. "Kī tonu i te āhua," tana kī mai ki a au. "I te kitenga i ngā ruru pātaka e huri haere ana i tēnei pāka i konei e whakangau ana... kātahi ka taka ohorere rātou. Ko te tirohanga tino whakamīharo noa iho. Ka haere hāngai mai te huarahi takirua i roto i to rātau whenua kai i konei. "Kātahi ka kite mātou i te tia. Me nga pātītī. I ētahi wā me paopao koe i tō māhunga nā te mea he nui rawa ngā pekapeka i konei – ka whakaaro noa koe ko whooo! tērā anō, i a rātau e paraihe ana i tō taringa." I taka tōna reo ki te kōhimuhimu hākinakina i a ia e kī ana: "Ahakoa he aha tā rātou mahi i konei, he tino whakararuraru. Koia anō tāu e kōrero ai." E whakapono ana a ia me whakaae ngā atekōkiri ki te takaware i a rātau haerenga hei pare i ngā taiwhenua utu nui. E kī ana ngā kaitautoko o te hipa he pouri, engari e kore e mōhiotia ka mamae ētahi o ngā kaihoko kia whai hua ai te nuinga o ngā atekōkiri. Councillor Mrs Gillian Brown, leader of Arun District Council, told BBC News: "I am delighted with the choice of route and level of support for this option (through the Park). " Ka whai painga tēnei ara ki te rohe katoa mā te whakapai ake i te rerenga waka me te tautoko i ngā umanga." I kī a Nick Field mai i te rōpū pēhanga pro-bypass One Arundel: "E mārama ana ahau ki ngā whakaaro o ngā kaiwhakahē, engari he take noa iho tēnei o te kauneketanga. Ka taea e koe te whiwhi takaware i tēnei huarahi i ngā wā katoa, ā, me pai ake te rere o ngā huarahi." Ko ngā takaware i te haora tere o te ahiahi huri noa i Arundel e kīia ana he toharite 6-10 meneti. Whāia a Roger i Twitter.

title: Ka tū te tereina e nga pirihimana i te wā i whiua ai ngā pēke i roto i te waka
summary: I whakatūria he tereina e nga pirihimana i te wā i whiua ai e nga pāhihi haurangi nga pāhihi haurangi, kātahi ka tīmata ki te whawhai.
text: Na te whakararuraru o ngā taonga tunu i tū ai te tereina i Potters Bar, Hertfordshire, i muri noa iho i te 01:00 GMT i te Rātapu. I whakaaturia e te ataata i whakairihia ki Twitter nga wāhine e whakanoho ana i ngā pēke ki runga i te māhunga o te tangata i mua i tana maka atu ki waho o te matapihi. I puritia te tereina mo te 18 meneti i te wā i mau kōrero ai nga pirihimana. I te wā o te ataata, ka rangona tētahi rōpū e waiata ana: "He pēke kei runga i tōna māhunga" ki te rangi o "He's Got the Whole World in His Hands". E whakaatu ana hoki te whakaata i ngā riri i roto i te hariata, i waho hoki i runga i te pūhara. Kāore i te mōhiotia mēnā i tūhonotia ēnei ki ngā pēke. Tokorua ngā āpiha i muri iho ka eke ki te tereina, ka tono whakamārama i ngā pāhihi. Ka tūtohu ngā Pirihimana Waka o Ingarangi (BTP) mō te mea e kiia nei ko "BagelGate", e kī ana ki ngā pāhihi: "Kia mārama tātou, kaua e tino nanakia te pēke. A, kaore tētahi tangata e pā ana ki te whanonga whakamataku." E 17,000 ngā wā i pīrangitia ai te ataata o taua mahi, ā, neke atu i te 10,000 ngā retweets. I kī tētahi kaikōrero mō Great Northern, te kaiwhakahaere o te ratonga 00:54 mai i King's Cross ki Huntingdon: "E tino nui ana tā mātou mahi whakamataku i runga i ā mātou ratonga, ā, ka whakahauhau i ngā pāhihi kia pūrongo ki te BTP." Kāore anō kia hopukina.

title: Ka whakahaua e te kaiwhakaputa InfoWars a Alex Jones a PayPal
summary: E tono ana te kaihautū reo irirangi o Amerika a Alex Jones i a PayPal, e kī ana i te tītaha ki ngā tirohanga tūturu i muri i tana whakatau ki te ārai i tana paetukutuku.
text: Kua rāhuitia te kaitohutohu whakatupu i te nuinga o ngā ratonga tukutuku nui, tae atu ki YouTube, Facebook me Twitter. E whakapae ana a Tēnā Jones ko te āraitanga a PayPal he "whakahāweatanga tirohanga", e karanga ana he "tauira mōrearea". I kī atu a PayPal ki a Courthouse News kāore he painga o te kēhi, ā, ka tūkaha te tiaki i a ia anō. I whakatau a PayPal kia mutu te tukatuka utu mō InfoWars i te wā o Mahuru, e kī ana kua tūkinotia ā rātou kaupapahere mō te whakatairanga i te mauahara me te tutu. Na te āraitanga i pā ki te moni hua i mahia e Tēnā Jones i te hoko taonga parani Infowars me ngā tuhinga parirau matau. "I tēnei wā e mōhiotia ana ko ngā kamupene hangarau nunui, i te nuinga o te wā i Silicon Valley, e whakawātea ana i ngā mea tūturu tōrangapū me ngā tangata, tae atu ki te whakakore i a rātou i ngā pūhara pāpāho pāpori pēnei i Twitter, i runga anō i ō rātou tirohanga tōrangapū, pūkenga rānei," e kī ana te kamupene a Tēnā Jones, Ngā Pūnaha Kōrero Koreutu, i roto i tētahi amuamu whārangi 15. "Nā te koko tika o te mākete, kei te whakamahi a [PayPal] i taua mana mākete hei pupuri i te hokohoko me te tauhokohoko tūturu," ka tāpiri mai. Kei te hāmenetia a Tēnā Jones i runga i te whakapae whakapae a ngā mātua o ngā tamariki tokorua i patua i te tākaro kura o Sandy Hook i te tau 2012, nāna i kī he tinihanga.

title: Ka whakarewaina e ngā MP Māori te tūmahi 'taumata ake'
summary: Kua whakarewaina e ngā MP Tūturu tētahi tūmahi hei "tohu" i ngā mahi a te kāwanatanga ki te whakaiti i te ōritetanga ā-rohe.
text: E kī ana te rōpū hou ko te whakarewa i "ngā wāhi takamuri o Ingarangi" he "tino nui" ki ngā tirohanga pōti ā muri ake o te rōpū. E kī ana tētahi pūrongo i hangaia mō te ope tūmahi ināianei he nui ake ngā tūru i ngā wāhi utu iti rawa i te Mahi. Kua kī te kaiārahi tuarua o Te Hunga Mahi, a Angela Rayner, "he kēmu pai te kōrero a te Tories... engari ko ta rātau pūkete o te huri i o rātau tuarā ki te Raki e kōrero ana mōna anō." I te pōtitanga o te tau 2019 i toa ai ngā Conservatives i te maha o ngā tūru puta noa i te Midlands me te raki o Ingarangi i whakaarotia i mua he pā o Labour, e mōhiotia ana hoki ko 'te taiepa whero'. Hei wāhanga o te rārangi take "taumata ake", e kī ana te kāwanatanga e hiahia ana ki te whakaiti i ngā rerekētanga ā-rohe i te whenua - he karere i ūkuia ki aua taiwhanga i huri i te pōti whakamutunga. Ināianei ko tēnei rōpū hōu, te "taumatanga taumahi" - kei roto ko te nuinga o ngā MP "pātū whero" hōu - e whakahau ana i te kāwanatanga kia tautuhi i a ia anō kia toru ngā whakamātautau matua hei wāhanga o tōna puku ki te whakaiti i te ōritetanga matawhenua. E kī ana ko aua wāhi kua kite i te tupunga iti rawa o ngā moni whiwhinga, me kite i ngā moni whiwhinga kia tere ake i a rātou i ngā tau tata nei; ko ngā wāhi e tino kino ana te pāpātanga o te kore mahi me ūkui ki te wawaenga ā-motu; ā, ko ngā wāhi whai mokatere mahi iti rawa me hopu hoki ki te wawaenga ā-motu. E karanga ana hoki ki te kāwanatanga kia whakaritea he tātaritanga matawhenua he pēhea te pānga o ngā huringa tāke me te whakapau moni ki ngā wāhi rerekē. Kātahi anō ka puta mai ngā pūrongo āmaimai i waenganui i ngā MP o Tory mō ngā tāke e piki ana, ā, i te Wenerei ka rapu te Tumuaki Rishi Sunak ki te whakaū i tana rōpū kāore he "whakaaturanga wehi o te tāke e piki ana, ā, kāore he mutunga i te kitenga". I kitea e te tātaritanga i hangaia e te kura whakaaro Onward mō te rōpū hou, o te hauwhā o raro o ngā tūru i Ingarangi me ngā moni iti rawa, he nui ake ināianei e puritia ana e ngā Tohutohu (77) i te Mahi (74). E kī ana hoki ko te UK "tētahi o ngā rangatiratanga whāngai kāore i te whārite" e kī ana "i Tiamana 12% o ngā tāngata e noho ana i ngā wāhi e 10% te toharite o te moni whiwhinga i raro iho i te wawaenga ā-motu, i te UK 35%." A, i te tau 2004 he ōrite te rahi o te āhua o te āhua o Rāwāhi ki te raki o Ingarangi, ināianei kua nui ake te hauwhā. I tautohetohe tētahi pūrongo o nā tata nei a te Institute for Fiscal Studies kua hinga ngā rerekētanga matawhenua i roto i ngā moni whiwhinga me ngā moni whiwhinga o te whare mai i te tōmua o ngā tau 2000. 'Hammer forward' Jo Gideon, MP for Stoke-on-Trent Central and a member of the taskforce, said: "There is a lot of unpped potential in parts of our country that have felt left behind for a long time. Ko te wā tēnei ki te hama whakamua me te rārangi take taumata." I a ia e kōrero ana i a Hōngongoi, ka whakatūpato a Ms Rayner kia kaua e "whakanui ake i te āputa" i roto i te moni whiwhinga me te rawa i waenganui i te raki me te tonga o Ingarangi. I tautohe a ia mā te kaupapahere hararei mahi a te kāwanatanga e āwhina i ngā tāngata i Rāwāhi i ērā atu wāhi.

title: Disney ki te hanga i ngā whainga o te Pukapuka Maleficent me te Jungle Book
summary: Ka hangaia tētahi Pukapuka Ngahere tuarua i whakahaeretia e Jon Favreau, ā, ka whakahokia anō e Te Wānanga tana mahi i roto i tētahi whainga Maleficent, kua pānuitia e Disney.
text: I whakaūngia hoki e te studio tētahi whainga o Mary Poppins, e hāngai ana ki a Emily Blunt, me te 101 Dalmatians spin-off, Cruella. Ka whetū hoki te pikitia a Mary Poppins ki a Lin-Manuel Miranda, nāna i tuhi, i mahi hoki i roto i te taunga o Broadway, o Hamilton. Kei te whanaketia hoki tētahi Dumbo i whakahaeretia e Tim Burton me tētahi "kaupapa Tinker Bell" e hāngai ana ki a Reese Witherspoon. I whakaūngia hoki e Disney he urutaunga hohenga ora o te pukapuka moemoea a Madeline L'Engle A Wrinkle In Time, te Jungle Cruise me te Nutcracker and the Four Realms, he pūrākau Kirihimete i runga anō i te pūrākau o te rau tau 19 a ETA Hoffman. I whakaūngia hoki e te studio ngā kaituhi mō ngā kaupapa, arā ko Kelly Marcel, nāna i tuhi ngā whakaaturanga mō Fifty Shades of Grey me Saving Mr Banks, e tuhi ana i te pikitia Cruella, me Te Wānanga o Te Wā. Ahakoa kāore i te whakaū i ngā rā tuku mō tētahi o ngā pikitia, ka pānuitia e te studio tētahi hōtaka tuku, e kite ana i ngā kiriata hohenga ora i runga anō i ngā pūrākau pakiwaitara i whakaputaina i a Hōngongoi 2017, April 2018 me Hakihea 2019, me ētahi atu kiriata kāore i te taitara i whakaputaina i Mati me Hakihea 2018. Ko te putanga hōu o te Pukapuka Ngahere, he ranunga o te hohenga ora me te hākoritanga e whakaatu ana i ngā pūmanawa reo o Idris Elba me Bill Murray, kua neke atu i te $160m (£110m) i roto i ōna wiki tuatahi e rua o te putanga i te US, i te wā i tangohia e ngā kiriata hohenga ora a Alice In Wonderland, Cinderella me Maleficent he $2.5bn (£1.7bn).

title: I whakarewaina te rūpahu kōhuru i runga i te ara o Hayes
summary: Kua whakarewaina tētahi tūhuratanga kōhuru i muri i te kitenga o tētahi tangata i te mate ki te uru o Rāwāhi.
text: I kitea e ngā ratonga ohorere te tinana o Balata Mahi, e 37, i tētahi ara i te Huarahi Teihana, i Hayes, tata ki te 22:56 BST i te Hātarei. Na te whakamātautau tirotiro tōmuri i hoatu te take o te mate hei kōpeketanga ki te kakī. E whakapono ana nga pirihimana tērā pea i uru a Tēnā Mahi ki tētahi tautohetohe i mua i tana whakaekenga. Kāore anō kia hopukina. I kī nga Pirihimana Tūtaki e hiahia ana ngā āpiha ki te whakataki i ngā tāngata tokorua i mua noa iho i tōna matenga. I kī a Det Ch Insp Helen Rance: "I whakaekea a Tēnā Mahi ki tētahi whakaekenga kino; Na te taumaha i ngaro ai tōna ora. "Kei te mahi aku āpiha i roto i ngā haora o ngā whakarākeitanga C KKK, me te kōrero ki ngā tāngata i taua rohe ki te whakatū i ngā mea kua tūpono me te tāutu i ērā e haepapa ana." E inoi ana nga pirihimana ki te tangata i te takiwā o te Ara Teihana mai i te 22:00 i te Hātarei kia haere mai ki mua. Mō ētahi atu rongokōrero o Rānōna, whāia i Facebook, i Twitter, i Instagram me te ohauru ki tā mātou hongere YouTube.

title: Ko te pauna ngoikore e whakarewa ana i te umanga tāpoi o UK
summary: Ko te maha o nga turuhi e haere ana ki te UK mai i Haina kua piki ake i te tata ki te rima i tenei raumati, ko nga whika hou e whakaatu ana.
text: Nā Katie PrescottBusiness, i kī te umanga raraunga haere o te hōtaka o Te Rā Rā ko ForwardKeys ko ngā tāpuitanga rererangi raumati mai i ngā mākete tawhiti he 6% teitei ake i te wā kotahi i tērā tau. I huaina e ia te ngoikoretanga o te pauna mo te whakarewa i te mana whakapau moni a nga tūruhi. I tēnei wiki ka pā te pāpaku 31 marama ki te tāra i waenganui i te nui o te taurangi ka taea e te UK te wehe atu i te EU me te kore mahi. "I tēnei raumati tērā pea ka kite i te nuinga o ngā tūruhi Hainamana ki te UK," te kī a te kaikorero o ForwardKeys, a David Tarsh. I tāpiritia e ia ko te tokomaha o ngā tūruhi Īnia i mua i te 20% me Tiapanī i te 10% me te USA i te 5%. I kī a Sarah Hewin, te rangatira o te ohanga mō Uropi me Amerika i Standard Chartered, ko te tikanga o te pauna iti ka whai rawa ake ngā manuhiri. "Ko te hinganga o te uara o te pauna ki te moni a Haina [te renminbi] ko te tikanga kua kite ngā tūruhi Hainamana e haere mai ana ki UK i te pikinga o te 5% i roto i ngā marama e toru kua hipa." E hāngai ana tēnei ki ngā mea e kitea ana e Patricia Yates, he kaiwhakahaere i te pokapū whakatairanga tāpoi o UK Visit Britain, i runga i te whenua. "Kei te tuku te UK i te uara nui mo nga manuhiri whakaroto i tenei wa e whai hua ana ki a maatau tae atu ki Uropi, kei reira kei te whakahaere kē matou i tetahi whakahau ki te whakatairanga i te haerenga ki te UK i te raumati." Kei te whakarewa hoki ngā staycation i te umanga. Ka kitea e te tari tūruhi ā-rohe Welcome to Yorkshire kei te tipu haere te tāpoi i taua rohe. I kī te kaiwhakahaere arumoni a Pita Dodd: "Kei te rongo mātou i te nui o ā mātou mema nohoanga, otirā ko ngā whare, ngā whare noho me ētahi atu āhuatanga kai whaiaro, kei te tipu haere te umanga me ētahi kua oti kē te tāpui tae noa ki Whiringahora." Ko tētahi o ērā ko Diane Howarth e whakahaere ana i te kamupene tuku hararei o Cottage in the Dales, ā, he tau pūkete tāna. "We're at 87% occupancy for the year already, which is much earlier than in previous years. Nā te rangirua o Te Rangirua i kōwhiri ai te tangata i ngā hararei i Ingarangi i tēnei tau, he rongo pai ki a mātau." E hinga ana te tono i Uropi? Engari ina tae mai ki ngā manuhiri Pākehā, e kī ana a Visit Britain he āwangawanga mō te pānga o te rangirua o Te Rangirua. I whakaaturia e ngā tatauranga tāpoi ONS hōu rawa he āhua papatahi ngā haerenga mai i Uropi ki te UK mai i Hānuere ki Poutāpeta i tēnei tau - 2% noa iho i whakaritea ki te wā kotahi i tērā tau. Kei te whakahaere rātau i tētahi whakahau i Uropi ki te whakapati i ngā tāngata ka noho tonu te UK hei wāhi pai ki te toro i muri i tana wehenga atu i te Uniana o Ūropi. Heoi anō, kei te kite ētahi umanga pēnei i te Whare o Mrs Howarth i ngā Dales i te pikinga o ngā manuhiri EU. "Kei te whiwhi mātou i ngā tāpuitanga tukurua mai i ngā kaihautū o te whakataetae Tour de Yorkshire, engari kei te kite hoki i ngā hiahia hou mai i ngā tāngata i Hōrana me Tiamana hei tauira, e whai painga ana i te pauna ngoikore ki te haere mai ki te toro i tēnei wāhi ātaahua o te ao"

title: E karanga ana a Elon Musk ki te 'pakaru' o Amazon
summary: Kua karangatia e Elon Musk te "wehenga" o te matua hangarau o Amazon, whai muri i te tautohetohe mo te pukapuka e-pukapuka coronavirus.
text: I haere mai te kaipakihi ki te wawao i tētahi kaituhi i muri i te whakakāhoretanga a te wehenga whakaputa Kindle a Amazon i tana pukapuka mō te taiepa coronavirus. I tohua e Tēnā Musk te rangatira nui o Amazon, a, i roto i tētahi tweet, e kī ana he "pōrangi" te whakataunga, ka tāpiritia: "Kua tae ki te wā ki te whati i a Amazon." I kī a Amazon kua hē te tango i te pukapuka, ā, ka whakahokia anōtia. Ko te kaituhi o te pukapuka, a Alex Berenson, i aro atu ki a Tēnā Musk mā te tweeting i tētahi topengamata mai i Amazon, nāna i kī atu ki a ia kāore tana pukapuka mō te taiepa i tutuki i ōna tohutohu. "I whakatauria e rātau!" ko te tuhituhi a Tēnā Berenson. "I runga anō i ngā raraunga kāwanatanga me ngā pepa pūtaiao kua whakaputaina. Ehara i te mea ehara te coronavirus i te tūturu, kāore rānei e whakamate i te tangata." He whakahē a Tēnā Musk i ngā kaupapa here a te kāwanatanga i te wā o te taiepa coronavirus. Kua whakaahuatia e ia ngā whakahau whakaweto hei "fascist" me te whakawehi ki te neke i te tari matua o Tesla ki waho o California ina kore e whakaaetia kia whakatuwhera anō tētahi pūkenga whakanao. He tauwhāinga a Tēnā Musk rāua ko Tēnā Bezos i roto i tētahi rēhi kia nui ake ai te utu o te haere ātea. I whakatūria e Tēnā Musk a SpaceX i te tau 2002, e rua tau i muri i te tīmatanga o tana umanga tākirirangi Blue Origin. I tērā tau, ka whakahē a Tēnā Bezos i te tūmanako a Tēnā Musk ki te hanga i tētahi taiwhenua o Mars. E ai ki te Business Insider, ka kī a ia: "Ko ōku hoa e hiahia ana ki te neke ki Mars? E kī ana ahau kia manakohia ahau: Haere ki te noho i runga i te tihi o Maunga Everest mō te tau kotahi i te tuatahi, ka kite mēnā he pai ki a koe nā te mea he pararaiha kāri tēnei i whakaritea ki Mars."

title: Ka whakahaua e Ahitereiria te tūhuratanga 'pakaru tūmataitinga' a Google
summary: Kua whakahaua nga pirihimana o Ahitereiria kia tūhura i a Google mō te tūkinotanga o te tūmataitinga i a rātau e tango pikitia ana mō tana ratonga Street View.
text: I kī te rōia o Ahitereiria kua tonoa e ia ki ngā pirihimana kia tirotiro i te matua ipurangi i muri i ngā amuamu kua kohia e Google ngā raraunga whaiaro mai i ētahi ratonga wi-fi kāore i whakamunatia. Kua whakaae a Google ki te mahi pēnā, engari i whakapōhēhē, e kī ana he hē. Kātahi anō ka whakahē te kamupene i te kaupapa a te kāwanatanga mō ngā tātari ipurangi. Vendetta? I kī te Rōia Matua o Robert McClelland he maha ngā amuamu mai i te iwi whānui, ā, me tūhura e ngā pirihimana ngā tūkinotanga hara o ngā ture tūmataitinga waea. E rāhuitia ana e te ture o Ahitereiria ngā tāngata kia kaua e uru ki ngā whakawhitiwhitinga hiko mō ngā take kāore i te manakoretia. Kua kī a Google ka mahi tahi me tētahi tūhuratanga pirihimana. I puta mai ngā hara i te wā i kohia e ngā waka Google, e mau ana ki ngā kāmera 360 waeine, ngā pikitia mō Street View, e kohikohi ana i ngā raraunga ahokore tūmataiti i te wā kotahi. I kī te kāwanatanga, kua mahia e Google "tērā pea ko te pakaru nui rawa i roto i te hītori tūmataitinga". E kī ana te kamupene i pōhēhētia te kohikohi i ngā raraunga, ā, mai i tērā wā ka whakapōhēhētia, ā, kua kī mai kei te whai te kāwanatanga o Ahitereiria i tētahi vendetta rangatōpū, e kī ana a Nick Bryant o TE AO i Poihākena. He kaiwhakawāwā kaha te matua ipurangi ki ngā mahere a te kāwanatanga o Ahitereiria mō tētahi tātari ipurangi e ārai ana i ngā rauemi kore mana, e kī ana ka pōturi te tere o te kaiwhakamahi me te tātari i ngā ihirangi tika.

title: I whakapaea te mātāmua o Haina mo te matenga o te wahine i roto i te escalator
summary: Ko te whakapae a te whare hokohoko Hainamana me nga kaiwhakanao o tētahi o ana escalators mo te matenga o tētahi whaea taitamariki, e kī ana nga kaihopu.
