text: Nā Yuwen WuBBC Hainamana i taea e te wahine te pana i tana tama ki te haumaru i mua i tana takanga ki roto i te escalator neke tonu i te Rātapu. I whakamutua e ngā kaihoko kāore he whakangungu a ngā kaimahi pātaka, ā, ko te tikanga kia whakaweto i te mīhini i mua. Na te mahi i Jingzhou, i te takiwā o Hubei, i whakaoho te riri whānui i te pātaka tari. I te haere a Xiang Liujuan, e 30, i runga i tētahi escalator whakarunga me tana tama, a, i a ia e hīkoi ana ki runga i tētahi paepae konganuku i runga i te escalator, ka tuku, ka mau i a ia, ka tō i a ia ki raro. I mau tonu ngā whakarākeitanga C KK i a ia e whakahaere ana ki te tiaki i tana tama i mua i te ngaro atu ki roto i te escalator takahuri tonu i te pātaka tari o Anliang. E rima meneti i mua i te aituā, ka kite ngā kaimahi kua wewete tētahi paepae, engari kāore he tohutohu tika i hoatu, ā, kāore he tangata i tū i te escalator, i kitea te pūrongo tuatahi. "Kāore i te tika te whakangungu a te kamupene ki ngā kaimahi me pēhea te mahi i ngā āhuatanga escalator ohorere, ā, kāore i te mahi, nā reira kāore i whakaweto te escalator (i mua i te aituā)," tana kī. I whakahētia te kaiwhakanao, a Shenlong Elevator Ltd, mō te hoahoa o ngā paepae konganuku o tana hua, e kī ana ngā kaihoko he ngāwari noa iho te mahi i tō rātou ara. He tūkinotanga ka taea te ārai? E whakaatu ana ngā whakarākeitanga C KKK, i te haerenga o te whaea taitamariki i runga i te escalator mai i te papa 6 ki te papa 7 me tana tama, tokorua ngā kaimahi e tū ana i runga i te escalator i te papa 7, i honoa e tētahi atu kaimahi. Kāore i te mārama mēnā i mōhio rātau he raruraru ki te escalator, kāore rānei, mēnā rānei i hoatu he whakatūpato. E ai ki te tāne o te tūkinotanga, kāore he tohu, he whakatūpato rānei i raro i te arawhata, ā, i te taenga kē atu o te whaea me te tama ki runga, ka hamama nga wāhine ki a ia mō te mōrearea, engari kua tōmuri rawa, ā, ka tōia tana wahine i mua i te whakaotinga o te rerenga. E pūrongotia ana kua kite te tama a te tūkino i te "horomia" o tōna whaea e te escalator, ā, e kī ana ki ngā whanaunga kia whakaora i a ia i te wā e haere ana te whakaora. Ko te whakapouri me ngā āwangawanga haumaru Ko te matenga o Xiang Liujuan i runga i te tikanga he haerenga hokohoko noa iho, kua whakaoho i te whakapouri, te riri me te āwangawanga i runga i te pāpāho pāpori. He tokomaha e whakapuaki ana i te whakaponokore ki tā rātou e kite nei he urupare tino māia ki te āhuatanga ohorere a te pokapū hokohoko, me tētahi tangata ipurangi e pātai ana "he aha te mea e pā ana ki Haina? He aha ngā mahi a ngā kaimahi tiaki i te toa hokohoko"? Ko ētahi e pātai ana he aha ēnei aituā e rite tonu ana te puta, me te tangi i te ngaromanga o te ora. E ai ki tētahi pūrongo o Pakihi, i a Hōngongoi anake, he maha nga mahi nui e pā ana ki ngā hīkoi me ngā hīkoi puta noa i te whenua, he maha nga mate me ngā whara nui. Ko te mea e tino mīharo ana te tokomaha, mai i te matenga i Jingzhou, e rua nga mahi nui i pūrongotia. I te 27 o Hōngongoi, i mau tōna ringa mauī i roto i te ringa o tētahi escalator i Sun Square, i Wuzhou City o Guangxi. E kī ana ngā pūrongo tērā pea ka ngaro te ringa o te tama. I taua rā anō, ka mate tētahi taitama i a ia e mau ana i te āputa i waenganui i te papa me te ararewa taonga, i te taone ki te tonga o Wuxi. Nā ēnei mahi i whakanoho anō te haumarutanga o ngā ararewa me ngā escalators i raro i te rama. E tohu ana ngā tohunga ki ngā āwangawanga maha, tae atu ki ngā taunoa whakanao, te whakamahinga, te kore tautiakitanga me ngā arotakenga kino. Ināianei kua tukuna e ngā mana mana whakahaere kounga o Hubei tētahi tohutohu kōhukihuki hei whakatārewa i te whakamahinga o ngā escalators i hangaia e Shen Long Ltd tae noa ki tētahi atu pānuitanga. Kua whakahaua hoki e rātau he tirohanga mataiti o ngā ararewa me ngā ararewa katoa e mahi ana. Mo nga whanaunga o te hunga i aituā, e kī ana rātau e kore rātau e kōrero mō te utu i mua i to rātau whiwhinga i ngā hua whakamutunga o te tūhuratanga, ā, e mōhio ana ko wai te kawenga. Kāore anō te Pātaka Tari o Anliang me Shenlong Elevator Ltd kia urupare tūmatanui ki te tūhuratanga.

title: Ka whakahuahuatia e EU ngā whāinga āhuarangi 2030
summary: Kua whakahuahuatia e te Kōmihana o Ūropi ana kaupapa mo te kaupapahere āhuarangi me te pūngao tae noa ki te tau 2030.
text: E hiahia ana ngā Komihana ki tētahi ūnga here hei whakaiti i te kohu waro mā te 40% mai i ngā taumata o te tau 1990. Me homai e ngā whakahou te 27% o te pūngao EU i te tau 2030, engari ahakoa ka herea te ūnga ki te taumata EU, kāore he ūnga whakahau mō ngā āhuatanga mema. E herea ana nga kaupapa here ki te arotake e nga upoko o te kāwanatanga. Kua kī ngā rōpū kākāriki kāore he hiahia o ngā ūnga hōu, ā, he "iti rawa te kohukohu 40%". Ka whai pānga nui tēnei Pepa Mā whānui ki te āhua o te whakaputa hiko a Uropi mai i te tau 2020 ā muri ake. E hiahia ana te Kōmihana ki te whakamārama ki ngā kaiwhakangao i roto i te pūngao whakahou, i te wā kotahi e pupuri ana i ta rātau mahi ārahi i roto i ngā whakaritenga āhuarangi o te ao. Ko tētahi wāhanga nui o tēnā ko te whika matua mo te mutunga kohukohu. Ko te ūnga i tautuhia mō te 2020 ko te 20% engari kua tata tae te EU hei rōpū ki te whāinga i te tau 2012. Na ētahi whenua tae atu ki te UK i tohutohu i te Kōmihana kia whakatakoto i tētahi ūnga nui ake o te 50% ki te 2030, ko ētahi atu i puritia mō te 35%. I kī te komihana āhuarangi o Connie Hedegaard, i te āhua o te āhua o te ohaoha, he nui te ūnga 40%. "Ko te whakaiti kohu 40% te ūnga tino utu mō te EU, ā, ka pā ki tā mātou kawenga huri noa," tana kī. "Mēnā he ōrite te hao o ērā atu rohe katoa ki te whiu i te huringa āhuarangi, ka tino pai ake te āhua o te ao." I whakamātauria e ngā āpiha me tutuki te ūnga 40% "mā ngā tikanga kāinga anake", ko te tikanga kāore e taea e ngā kāwanatanga mema te whakawātea i ā rātou whakahekenga mā te utu i te tapahi waro i ētahi atu whenua. Ko ngā ūnga here i pōhiritia te nekehanga e ngā kaiwhakangao. E ai ki te Rōpū Kaiwhakangao Ā-Iwi i runga i te Huringa Āhuarangi, ko ōna mema e whakahaere ana i te 7,5 trillion hōro, he hipanga tuatahi pai te ūnga hōu. "Ko te ūnga whakaiti kohu 40% te mōkito e hiahiatia ana hei pupuri i Uropi i runga i te ara mō tētahi whakahaerenga waro iti e whakahuahuatia ana i roto i te Mahere Huarahi 2050 o te EU," te kī a te rangatira nui o Stephanie Pfeifer. "Ko te whakatutuki i tēnei ūnga kei roto i ngā āheinga o te āhua mema, ā, he tino nui mō te mōhiotanga kaupapahere mo te wā roa." Ahakoa tēnei, he tokomaha nga kaiwhakahauhau taiao i pouri. I kī a Brook Riley mai i Ngā Hoa o te Ao mā te ūnga e uaua ai te whāinga ki te karo i te huringa āhuarangi mōrearea, kua tautuhia hei haere ki runga ake i te 2C. "E kī ana mātou he tino mōrearea te 40%. Ko te tikanga o tēnei whāinga, tata ki te rima tekau mā rima tekau te wā e neke atu ana i te 2 waeine o te whakamahana o te ao," tana kī. Tae atu ki te panekōrero i tapahia i roto i te kohukohu, ko tērā atu papa matua o te Pepa Mā ko te pūngao whakahou. I hiahiatia e ngā ūnga 2007 te 20% o ngā pūngao katoa kia puta mai i te kōmaru, i te hau, i ētahi atu pūtake whakahou rānei. Ko Tiamana, kei waenganui i tētahi tauwhiro nui ki te kōmaru me te hau, i hiahia ki te kite i ēnei ūnga here e haere tonu ana i muri i te tau 2020. Ko ētahi atu, tae atu ki Pōrana, Paniora me te UK, i hiahia ki te ngāwari ake i roto i te whāranu pūngao. I hiahia te UK ki te whakamahi i te pūngao karihi hei whakatutuki i tōna ake whāinga whakaiti kohukohu. Ko te hua he marohi mō tētahi ūnga here puta noa i te EU hei whakarato i te "27% neke atu rānei" o te pūngao mai i ngā pūtake whakahou. "Ehara i te mea noa iho, ehara i te mea pai noa iho, he ūnga here e tono ana mātou," te kī a Ms Hedegaard. Engari ko te mea nui, me kaua he ūnga here mō ia āhuatanga mema. Ko te take tairongo i kī ai te Perehitini o te Kōmihana, a Jose Manuel Barroso, kei te huri te korohū kōhatu i te whenua pūngao i runga i te āhua whakaharahara. Kaore he here EU whānui ture, tana kī. Ka tautuhia kētia e te EU ngā tikanga uho mōkito mō te fracking i runga i te haumarutanga taiao me te hauora. Tērā tētahi papa tapeke mō ia kāwanatanga mema hei whakaatu i te whakatutukitanga o ngā whakaritenga. "He whakaaturanga pai tēnei o te tūranga me tākaro e te EU, te tautuhi i ngā ture taitapa mō te hauora taiao me te haumarutanga, engari kāore i te raweke i te whāranu pūngao e kōwhiria ana e ngā āhuatanga mema," tana kī. Ka tino whiwhia tēnei wāhanga o te pōkai i te UK, i Pōrana hoki, i te mea e whakapono ana ngā whenua e rua ka whai wāhi nui te korohū kōhao ki te whakarato pūngao ā muri ake nei. Ka whakamāramatia hoki e te Pepa Mā tētahi mahere hei whakatika i te aronui tauhokohoko kohukohu EU. I roto i ngā tau tata nei, kua tino hinga te utu o te tan waro nā te nui o ngā whakaaetanga i runga i te mākete. Ināianei e tautohe ana nga Komihana mo tētahi pūnaha hou e whakatika aunoa ai i te putanga. Ko tētahi atu huānga ka whakararuraru i ngā kaiwhakahauhau kākāriki ko te kaupapa kia whakataka i te ūnga 6% mō te kohu kohu kati mai i ngā kora kawenga, mai i te tau 2020. E whakapono ana a Nusa Urbancic o te rōpū whakahauhau Transport & Environment mā tēnei nekehanga e ahu atu ki te mutunga o te Tohutohu Kounga Hinu, e kī ana a ia he tino matekiri. "Kei te whakamahi te Kōmihana i te mōkī āhuarangi me te pūngao hei takunga ki te maka mārire i te FQD - te ture EU tino pai e hāngai ana ki te whakaheke i te kohu mai i te hinu kawenga," tana kī. "He rongo pai tēnei mō ngā kamupene hinu me Alberta, me ōna kirikiri tara waro tiketike, engari he rongo kino mō Uropi i roto i tā mātou neke ki tētahi pūnaha waka pūmau ake." Ināianei ka arotakea katoatia nga tono i tukuna e te Kōmihana e te Kaunihera o Ūropi i a Poutāpeta. Kāore i te tūmanakohia kia whakaaetia ngā tono ture whai tikanga i mua i te tau 2015. Whāia a Mātā i Twitter.

title: Dementia: Thousands undiagnosed in Wales - Alzheimer's Society
summary: Tekau mano tāngata e noho ana kāore anō kia kitea i te mate hinengaro i Weera, ā, kei te ngaro i te tautoko e hiahiatia ana e rātou, e kī ana te Rōpū o Pūkoro.
text: Ko ngā whika i whakahiatotia e te aroha e tohu ana kei a Wales ngā mokatere tātaritanga iti rawa i te UK mō taua āhuatanga. Ko te mokatere tātaritanga o Wales ko te 38.5%, i whakaritea ki te whika UK katoa o te 46%. I kī te kāwanatanga o Welsh e mōhio ana ki te take, ā, kei te mahi i te mahi hei whakatau. Neke atu i te 17,000 ngā tāngata kua whakaūngia ki te matewaretanga i Weera, he pikinga o te 800 i tērā tau, engari e whakapono ana te iwi he 27,000 anō kāore anō kia tātaritia. I kī a Sue Phelps, kaiwhakahaere mō te Alzheimer's Society i Wales: "He whakahauhau te kite i te pikinga o te tokomaha o ngā tāngata e whiwhi ana i tētahi tātaritanga. " Engari iti iho i te haurua o ngā tāngata e noho ana i te matewaretanga i Wales kāore i te whiwhi i te tautoko, ngā painga me ngā rongoā rongoā e wātea ana i te nuinga o te wā. "Kua whakaritea kētia e te NHS he whakaaro ki te whakapai ake i ngā mokatere tātaritanga, engari kāore anō kia neke te mokatere i Wales. " Kua tae ki te wā kia huri taua whāinga ki te mahi, hei āwhina ki te whakarite kia pai te noho a te tangata me te āhuatanga." He rerekē ngā mokatere tātaritanga puta noa i te whenua mai i te 38.5% - mai i te 37.4% i te 2011 - i Uēra ki te 63% i Aiarangi ki te Raki me te 64.4% i Pākehā. Ko te hunga e noho ana i te tonga o Wales e kiia ana he nui ake te mate i te hunga e noho ana i te raki o Wales. I kī tētahi kaikōrero kāwanatanga o Welsh: "E mōhio ana mātou he take kei te tātaritanga mateware, ā, kua tono mātou ki te National Leadership and Innovation Agency for Health (NLIAH) kia titiro ki tēnei take. " Kua hangaia e mātou he ūnga mōhio hei whakapai ake i te tāutunga wawe, ā, kua tautuhia he ūnga hei whakapai ake i tēnei. Kua tono hoki mātou ki te Hauora Tūmatanui o Uēra me NLIAH ki te whakawhanake i tētahi kōwae whakangungu mō ngā mahi GP tae atu ki te tīma tiaki hauora tuatahi katoa mō te whakapai ake i te tātaritanga, ā, kua tīmata tēnei mahi. "We also expect that Mental Health (Wales) Measure will have an impact, supporting both diagnosis and referral on to memory clinics for those affected by dementia."

title: I tapahia te pūtea aroha o Redcar 'ka waiho ngā tūkinotanga ā-waha'
summary: Nā te whakatū i te pūtea mō tētahi ratonga tautoko tūkino ā-waha kua mahue i "ngā tūpāpaku mōrearea", kua kī tētahi pūrongo.
text: I whakakāhoretia e te Manatu Ture (MoJ) tētahi tono āwhina mai i te Āwhina Wahine o Eva i Redcar, e āwhina ana i ngā tūkinotanga me te tūkinotanga. I kī te MoJ i pūteatia e ia tētahi ratonga i Middlesbrough, ā, kua hoatu ki ngā pirihimana me te komihana hara (PCC) e £650,000 hei āwhina i ngā tūpāpaku paetata. Engari i kī a PCC Barry Coppinger he "tino poto te tirohanga" o te whakataunga MoJ. I kī tētahi pūrongo pirihimana me te pae hara o Te Rūnanga o Te Wānanga o Te Wānanga o Te "Ka aroha, kāore a Eva i angitu i tēnei tukanga whakataetae - ka waiho tā rātou ratonga tohutohu kia mōrearea te kati, ā, kāore e taea te uru ki ngā ratonga nui - otirā ko ērā i roto i ngā hapori ā-taiwhenua," e kī ana. I kī a Tēnā Coppinger he "tino koretake" te tūmanako kia haere ngā tangata o Te Rāwhiti ki tētahi atu aroha i Middlesbrough mō te tohutohu. I kitea e ia te £40,500 i Aotearoa kia haere tonu ai te ratonga tae noa ki Poutāpeta. I whiwhi moni a Eva Women's Aid mai i te Pūtea Tautoko Whakakōhuru tae noa ki ngā huringa i tērā tau, ko te tikanga me whakataetae te aroha mō ngā moni. I kī te rangatira nui o Richinda Taylor he pūtake pūtea anō tāna, engari he rangirua mēnā ka haere tonu tana ratonga tohutohu i muri i Aperira. "Kāore mātou i te kati, ā, ka nui tonu ngā ratonga e wātea ana, engari, i tēnei wā, kei te rangirua tonu e karapoti ana i te tohutohu," tana kī. "Kua tino pūmau te MoJ e kore rātau e tirotiro anō i ta rātau whakataunga." I whakapūketetia e ngā Pirihimana o Cleveland e 19,657 ngā mahi tūkino i te 2018/19, e ai ki te Ratonga Pūrongo Kāwanatanga Paetata. I whakaaturia hoki e ngā whika mai i taua tau he nui ake te pāpātanga o te hara o te wahine i Teesside i tētahi atu wāhi o te whenua.

title: Ko te pokenga o te hau 'e tūkino tonu ana i te hauora o ngā Pākehā'
summary: Kei te tūkino tonu te pokenga o te hau i te hauora o ngā tangata whenua o Ūropi me te taiao, e whakaatu ana ngā whika hou rawa.
text: Nā Mark KinverEnvironment, i whakarārangitia e te Rongokōrero Taiao o Ūropi (EEA) ngā korakora iti me te hāora hei "tuma nui". Heoi anō, i kī nga kaituhi kua tino tapahia e nga iwi te kohu o te maha o ngā parakino, tae atu ki te pūngāwhā taikura, te mata me te waro waikura. I roto i tētahi akoranga motuhake, i kitea e te rangahau he hononga i waenganui i te taumaha whānau iti me te mārakerake ki te pokenga o te hau. I kī te kaiwhakahaere nui o EEA, a Hans Bruyninckx, kua nui te haere whakamua o ngā iwi EU i roto i ngā tekau tau tata nei ki te whakaiti i ngā tohu kitea o te pokenga o te hau, ā, kua kore ngā tāone ināianei e kōruru i ngā paraikete kohukohu. Heoi anō, ka tāpiri mai a ia: "Kei te tūkino te pokenga o te hau ki te hauora tangata me ngā pūnaha pūnaha. Ko nga wāhi nui o te iwi whānui kaore e noho i roto i te taiao hauora, e ai ki nga paerewa o nāianei. "Kia eke ki tētahi ara tautoko, me whai rawa a Uropi, ā, ka haere ki tua atu i ngā ture o nāianei." I whakaaturia e te pūrongo EEA ko ngā raraunga i huatau tae atu ki te 96% o te iwi whānui taone o te EU i kitea ki ngā whakamōhiotanga matūriki pai i runga ake i ngā tohutohu o te UN World Health Organization (WHO). Ahakoa anō, 98% i herea ki ngā whakamōhiotanga hāora taumata whenua i runga ake i ngā taumata tūtohu a WHO. Anō hoki te kounga o te hau o waho o te taone, i miramiratia hoki e te pūrongo kei te mamae tonu te taiao māori. E kī ana i herea te pūnaha pūnaha ki te pēhanga o te pokenga o te hau e whakararuraru ana i te tupu o te tipu me te tūkino i te tipua tipua." I hangaia hoki e te EEA te wehenga whenua-ki-te-whenua o ngā raraunga kounga o te hau. I a ia e urupare ana ki ngā kitenga o te pūrongo, ka kī te Komihana Taiao o Janez Potocnik: "He āwangawanga matua te kounga o te hau ki te tokomaha o ngā tāngata. " E whakaatu ana ngā uiuinga e mārama ana te nuinga o ngā tangata whenua ki te pānga o te kounga o te hau ki te hauora, ā, kei te tono i ngā mana tūmatanui kia mahi i ngā taumata EU, ā-motu, paetata hoki." I tāpiri mai a ia e hiahia ana a ia ki te whakatau i aua māharahara i roto i te Arotakenga Kaupapahere Hau a te Kōmihana. Ko ngā āwangawanga kōhungahunga He akoranga motuhake, i whakaputaina hoki i te Tūtira, i whakamutua ko tētahi wāhanga nui o ngā take o te taumaha whānau iti (iti iho i te 2.5 kiroki i te 37 wiki o te hapūtanga) "ka taea te ārai i Uropi mēnā ka whakahekea te pokenga o te hau taone". I kī ngā kitenga, i whakaputaina i roto i te pukapuka The Lancet Respiratory Medicine: "Ko te iwi whānui e whakaarohia ana mō te whakaiti i te [matūriki me te diameter o te 2.5 moroiti, iti iho rānei] ki te 10 ngā moroiti mō ia mita pūtoru i te wā e hapu ana, e ōrite ana ki te hekenga o te 22% i ngā take o te taumaha whānau iti i te wā." I mahia e tētahi rōpū kairangahau Ūropi ngā mea e whakaahuatia ana e rātau ko tētahi o ngā akoranga nui rawa o tōna momo, e whakahiato ana i ngā raraunga mai i ngā whānautanga neke atu i te 74,000 i waenganui i te 1994 me te 2011 puta noa i ngā iwi 12 o Ūropi. I whakamāramatia e rātau he nui ake te mōrearea o te mate me ngā raruraru hauora i ngā kōhungahunga whai taumahatanga whānau teitei ake. "Kua pāhonotia te taumahatanga whānau iti ki te wheezing me te huango i te tamarikitanga, me te heke iho o te taumahi pūkahukahu i roto i ngā pakeke," i kitea e rātau, engari i tāpiritia he maiorooro i roto i ngā kitenga. "I tua atu i te kai paipa hohe, ngoikore hoki, ko te mārakerake poke o te hauora he take mōrearea tino pārekareka, ā, ka taea te whakahaere mō te taumaha whānau iti." I kitea e te kaituhi matua o Dr Marie Pedersen mai i te Pokapū Rangahau i te Tahumaero Taiao i Pārera, Paniora: "Ko te mārakerake whānui o ngā wāhine hapū puta noa i te ao ki te pokenga o te hau taiao taone i ngā whakamōhiotanga ōrite, teitei ake rānei i ērā i aromatawaia i roto i tā mātou akoranga, ka homai he karere mārama ki ngā kaihanga kaupapahere hei whakapai ake i te kounga o te hau e tiritiri ana tātau katoa." Kua tukua e ngā ture EU o nāianei te tepenga toharite ā-tau i runga i ngā take korakora pai i te 20 ngā moroiti mō ia mita pūtoru mō ngā korakora e ine ana i te 2.5 moroiti (PM2.5) iti iho rānei. E rua ngā wā o te whakamōhiotanga i whakahuahuatia i roto i ngā tohutohu o te Whakahaere Hauora o te Ao (WHO), e taunaki ana i tētahi tepenga toharite ā-tau mō te mārakerake PM2.5 ki te 10 moroiti mō ia mita pūtoru. Ko ēnei korakora moroiti (ko te diameter o te makawe tangata i waenganui i te 15 me te 180 moroiti) ka mutu ki te hauora mai i ngā pūtake, tae atu ki te kohu waka huarahi, ā, kua honoa ki te mate manawa me te pūkahukahu, te mate pukupuku me te mate moata. I whakaahuatia e Prof Bruyninckx ngā kitenga a te pepa Lancet he "tino māharahara", ahakoa kei te mahia te kauneketanga i ētahi wāhi, he nui ake ngā mahi e hiahiatia ana hei rutu i te pokenga o te hau. "Ko te whāinga mārama o te Kōmihana o Ūropi ki te whakawhāiti i taua āputa, ā, i te roanga o te wā, katia taua āputa nā te mea ko tātau... E māharahara ana ki te hauora o te tangata whenua," tana kī atu ki a TE Rongokōrero. Engari i whakamāramatia e ia: "I mua i tō hanga ture here, e hiahia ana koe ki te noho i runga i te whenua tino mārō i runga i te pūtaiao. " Ināianei, e mōhio ana mātou kei te whai pānga nui te [take korakora] nā reira me whakarite e mātou ā mātou ture me ā mātou ture." Nā tētahi kōrero mō ngā kitenga i whakaputaina i roto i te The Lancet, i kī te Royal College of Obstetricians and Gynaecologists spokesman Dr Patrick O'Brien he "tino āwhina te rangahau ki te whakarato i ētahi atu whakaaturanga mō ngā pānga hauora tūpono o te pokenga o te hau". Engari i tāpiri mai a ia: "E kore e taea te mārakerake ki ētahi taumata pokenga o te hau i roto i te oranga o ia rā, ā, kei te iti tonu te mōrea. " Ko ētahi atu take, pēnei i te kai paipa, te pēhanga toto tiketike, te whakapaunga waipiro nui rawa rānei, ka nui ake pea te mōrearea o te pēpi taumaha whānau."

title: Ka kitea e nga pirihimana he tangata i kitea kua mate i te pēke o Batley o mua
summary: Kua whakaūngia e nga pirihimana te tuakiri o tētahi tangata i kitea kua mate i tētahi pēke o mua i West Yorkshire.
text: I kitea a Asghar Badshah, e 39, mai i Pirihi, i te wā i whakahaua e nga pirihimana to rātau ara ki roto i te whare kāore i whakamahia i Te Tiriti Arumoni i Batley i te 29 o Hakihe. Tokorua ngā tāngata, e 27 me te 30 te pakeke, i hopukina i runga i te whakapae ki te kōhuru, kua tukua i raro i te tūhuratanga. I tukua tētahi wahine 41 tau i runga i te utu e tārewa ana i ētahi atu uiuinga. I kī a Det Ch Insp Heta Whoriskey i pūrongotia a Tēnā Badshah i te 4 o Hakihe. I tāpiri mai a ia: "E whakapono ana mātou i kitea whakamutunga a ia i ngā haora tōmua o te 30 o Whiringa ā Rangi, ā, ka tono ahau ki tētahi tangata kua kite i tētahi ngohe whakatūpato i Te Tiriti Arumoni i taua wā, mai rānei ki te whakapā atu ki taku tīma." I roto i tētahi kōrero, ka kī te whānau o ngā tūpāpaku: "E inoi ana mātou ki te tika mō Asghar me te inoi ki te iwi whānui mō ngā āwhina ka taea e rātau te hoatu ki ngā pirihimana i tēnei tūhuratanga." Ētahi atu pūrākau puta noa i Aotearoa I whakamahia kētia te whare e te Pēke o Aotearoa, engari i katia te peka i te tau 2016. Whāia a BBC Yorkshire i Facebook, Twitter me Instagram. Tukuna ō whakaaro pūrākau ki yorkslincs.news@bbc.co.uk.

title: I whakamahia ngā taraka hei whakarato wai ki Te Wairangi me Essex i te rangi wera
summary: E whakamahia ana ngā taraka hei kawe i ngā rau mano rīta wai kia tutuki ai te nui ake o te hiahia i roto i ngā kāinga i te wā o te takikupu wera o nāianei.
text: I kī a Essex me Te Wai o Te Wai me neke te wai mā te huarahi nā te mea kua rāhuitia i runga i te nui ka taea e ia te tango mai i ngā rua poka. I tērā mutunga wiki, neke atu i te 94m rīta wai i whakamahia i ia rā. I kī a Mātini Lunn, mai i te kamupene, ko ngā taumata "kāore anō kia tata ki tērā mai i te tau 2007". I kī a Tēnā Lunn e 3,000 ngā āhuatanga e homai ana e ngā pourewa wai, e tīmataria ana e nga taraka. "He tepe ia rā tā mātou ki te nui o te wai ka taea e mātou te tango mai i ngā rua poka," tana kī, "nō reira ina nui ake te tono i taua tepenga ka kawea mai e mātou ngā taraka huarahi ki te neke wai ki roto i ngā pourewa wai. " Kei te neke mātou mō ngā taraka e whitu i ia rā, tata ki te 200,000 rīta wai." I muri i te pānuitanga a Affinity Water e pā ana ki ngā raruraru whakarato mō Clacton-On-Sea i Essex i te Mane. I roto i tētahi kōrero i runga i tana paetukutuku, ka kī te kamupene he nui ake te wai e whakamahia ana nā te rangi mahana ake, ā, he nui ake te wā e noho ana ngā tāngata i te kāinga i te wā o te taiepa coronavirus. Kimihia te Rongokōrero o TE Rāwhiti o Ingarangi i Facebook, Instagram me Twitter. Mēnā he huatau pūrākau tāu, īmēra eastofenglandnews@bbc.co.uk

title: Ture kairautanga: Ka uru atu ngā kaiārahi NI ki te wero kōti a te kaimahi wahine
summary: Kua uru atu ngā minita tuatahi me ngā minita tuatahi o Aiarangi ki te Raki ki tētahi ture hou e kore ai e mana te utu i te wahine.
text: I pā mai te ture i June 2015, engari ināianei ko te kaupapa o tētahi wero a te Kōti Tiketike mai i te kaimahi wahine me te mātauranga ture, a Laura Lee. I hikitia te kēhi i te Paraire i muri i tētahi wero meneti whakamutunga mō Arlene Foster rāua ko Mātini McGuinness. I kī te tiati kaore he whakamāramatanga mārama mo te raweke tōmuri. 'Tino hē' I rongo te kōti i te Rōia Tianara o John Larkin kua tohutohutia kia whakarewa i te wero mō te Tari o te Tari Tuatahi me te Tuarua Minita Tuatahi (OFMDFM). I amuamu ngā rōia mō Ms Lee ki te tiati ko te nekehanga "tino tōmuri" he ngana "tino hē, kāore i te tika" ki te aukati i te kēhi ki te whakarongo katoa. Ko Aiarangi ki te Raki te wāhi tuatahi, anake hoki o te UK ki te whakaoti i tētahi ture i hara ai te utu i ngā ratonga tōnā, e neke ana i te kawenga hara mai i ngā kairau ki ā rātou kiritaki. I mauria mai te ture ki te aroaro o Stormont e te hoa o te Rōpū Kotahitanga Manapori, a Ariki Morrow, hei wāhanga o tana Pire Hokohoko Tangata me te Apo. Kua whakahauhau a Ms Lee, e 38, ki taua mea, e kī ana ka nui ake te mōrearea o ngā kaimahi wahine i ngā kiritaki. E kī ana ngā hoariri o te ture ka uaua haere ki ngā kairau te tirotiro i ngā kiritaki e whakamahi ana i ngā ingoa kōrero me ngā waea maka. 'Tino māharahara' Ka hikitia e te tiati te kēhi tae noa ki tērā marama, engari i tonoa e ia ngā take katoa mo te raweketanga, i mahia i te ahiahi o te whakarongo. "E whakaae ana ahau kāore tēnei tono i mahia mō te rōia nui, e whakatau ana mō te minita tuatahi me te tuarua minita tuatahi, kāore anō kia haere tahi me tētahi whakamāramatanga mārama, māia rānei ki te ara o ngā takahanga," tana kī. Ko te wero arotakenga ā-ture a Ms Lee e hāngai ana ki te Tari Ture (DOJ), i arahina e te Minita Ture a David Ford, nāna hoki i ātete te whakatinanatanga o te hunga e utu ana i te kairautanga. I whakaūngia e tētahi rōia e tohu ana i te DOJ kāore i te ātete i te tono a Ms Lee mō tētahi arotakenga ā-ture o te ture hou, i runga anō i te take kua whakatūria he take tautohetohe. Heoi anō, i whakahē te tīma ture a Ms Lee i te ngana a tētahi atu tari Stormont kia uru ki te kēhi. "E tino māharahara ana taku kiritaki ki te raweke tōmuri i marohitia, i te wāhi o te Tari Minita Tuatahi me te Tuarua Minita Tuatahi," te kī a tana rōia ki te kōti. "E kī ana mātou he tino hē, he kore noa iho, e rapu ana a OFMDFM ki te ātete i te tukunga o te wehenga ki te Tari Ture." I rongo te kōti i te wero a te OFMDFM i whakaarahia he take mana whakahaere, ā, ka whakaaetia e te kaiwhakawā he wā ki te tari ki te whakamārama i te nekehanga tōmuri.

title: E huatau ana te pūrongo i ngā whakaritenga ki te tautoko mō ngā kaihoko
summary: Kua tūtohutia e tētahi pūrongo hōu me pēhea te whakapai ake i te tautoko mō ngā kaihoko.
text: I whakaritea mō te kaiwhakarite o te umanga, te Komihana Crofting, ka kī ngā whakaritenga ki te tautoko pūtea kua tukuna kētia, ka whakahauhau i ētahi atu tāngata kia tomo, kia noho rānei ki te kōaro. Kei roto i ēnei ko ngā utu hei whakahauhau i te pupuri i ngā kahui kau iti. Me te āwhina mō te iti rawa o te tipu hua hei "whakanui ake i te rerenga kētanga" o ngā kararehe "i te rauropi, i te ā-taumaha". I kī hoki te pūrongo i te āwhina tāpiri utu ōrau, pēnei i ngā tohutohu mō ngā rawa me ngā moni whakatārewa, me whakawātea ki ngā komiti kai noa iho, ki ngā taitamariki me ngā whakaurunga hou, tae atu ki ngā kōtiro pūmau. I whakaritea e Gwyn Jones, o te Wānanga o Ūropi mō te Atawhai Āhua me te Pastoralism, te pūrongo. 'Tino pai' E ai ki te Komihana Crofting, tata ki te 20,500 ngā kōpae e tata ana ki te 14,900 e rīhi ana, ā, ko te toenga e noho ana. E ono nga taiwhanga kōmihana e whakahaere ana i te kōmihana. Ko East Highlands, Orkney me Caithness, Shetland, South West Highlands, West Highlands me Western Isles. I whakaahuatia e te Tōpūtanga o Pirihitini te rangahau he tōkeke, he pai hoki te whakaaturanga, ā, i mārama tonu te whakaatu ko ngā tikanga tautoko tīariari "kāore e mahi pai ki tā rātou e taea ana mō te crofting". I kī te Manukura o Russell Smith: "E tino pai ana mātou kua whakahaua e te Komihana Crofting kia mahia tēnei rangahau i raro i tā rātou mahi ki te 'whakatoko i ngā painga o te crofting me te arotake tonu i ngā take e pā ana ki te crofting' ā, i tīpakohia e rātou tētahi kaitohutohu tino pūkenga, hoatu hoki ki te mahi i te mahi. " E whakaatu ana i tētahi kōmihana āwhina e hiahia ana kia nui ake i te kaiwhakarite noa iho. E pōhiritia ana e mātau tēnei whanaketanga o te kāwanatanga kāwanatanga mo te kōaro."

title: Ka whakairihia e ngā kaipūtaiao wahine ngā whakaahua 'whakapōrearea'
summary: Kua tiritiri ngā kaipūtaiao wahine i ngā whakaahua "whakapōrearea" o rātau anō i muri i te whakahauhau a tētahi paetukutuku mana wahine i a rātau kia urupare ki ngā kōrero a tētahi kaiwhiwhi o Aotearoa.
text: He aha te take i whakahētia ai te toa o te Whakawhiwhinga o Aotearoa, a Tim Hunt i tana whakamāramatanga i ōna whakaaro mō te "raruraru ki ngā kōtiro" i tētahi hui a ngā kaipūrongo pūtaiao. "E toru ngā mea e pā ana i a rātau i roto i te taiwhanga," tana kī, "ka aroha koe ki a rātou, ka aroha rātau ki a koe, ā, ina whakahē koe i a rātau ka tangi rātau." I kī a ia ko ana kōrero he "ngākau māmā, he kōrero whakarihariha", engari ahakoa he aha te whakaaro, i haere pēnei i tētahi konganuku taumaha i roto i tētahi āpure me ētahi take ira tangata e mōhiotia whānuitia ana. Ināianei kua whakarerea a Hunt i tōna tūnga i te Whare Wānanga o Te Whare Wānanga o Rāwāhi. I te Rāitema ka tīmata te #DistractinglySexy o te hashtag, neke atu i te 10,000 ngā tuhituhi i roto i ngā haora. I ākina te ia e te pukapuka tuihono mana wahine Vagenda, nāna i tohutohu i ngā kaipūtaiao wahine kia tiritiri pikitia i a rātau i te mahi. WHAKATŪPATO: ehara ngā whakaahua i raro nei i te whakairoiro iti rawa. I te nuinga o ngā āwhā Twitter i runga i te wahinetanga, i te nuinga o te wā he taupatupatu, engari i tēnei take, tata tonu ki te katoa o ngā tuhituhi tino kaingākautia, tukurua hoki e kōrero ana i a Hunt e whakahē ana i ana kōrero. Rangitaki nā Maika Wendling Pūrākau panuku: Ka tīmata te pakanga i runga i ngā Kēmu Ūropi i Baku, i te pūmatua o Ahaparangi, i te Paraire. Ko te hākari tākaro kāhua Orimipia tuatahi tēnei mō te whenua - engari ko tētahi hashtag i whakamahia tuatahitia e ngā kaiwhakahaere, ā, ko te tikanga tuatahi hei whakanui i ngā kēmu, kua whakakāngia e ngā kaiwhakahauhau motika tangata. PĀNUI ANŌ Ka taea e koe te whai i a BBC Trending i Twitter @BBCtrending, me te kimi i a mātou i Facebook. Kei te bbc.com/trending katoa a mātau pūrākau.

title: I roto a Marilyn Manson i te 'mamae tino mamae' i muri i te aituā o te atamira
summary: Ko te wā tuatahi i kōrerorerotia ai e Marilyn Manson te aituā o te wāhanga "whakararuraru" i hua ai te whara o te waewae me te iwa rā whakatere.
text: I kurua te kaiwaiata i te ngahorotanga o tētahi pū nui ki runga i a ia i te wā o tētahi konohete i Niu Ioka i te 30 o Mahuru. "He whakamataku," te kī a te whetū toka, nāna i hiahia he pereti me ngā tīwiri e 10 i roto i tōna fibula i muri i te aituā. I kī atu a ia ki a Yahoo news, e hāngai ana ki ngā pūrongo pāpāho, kāore a ia i te kawenga mo te takahuritanga o te tautoko. "Kāore au i te ngana ki te piki," te kī a te tau 48 tau. "I tīmata ki te hinga, ā, i ngana ahau ki te pana whakamuri, ā, kāore au i puta i te ara i te wā. " Kāore au i te tino mōhio he aha taku tūtuki i taku māhunga, engari i taka ki runga i taku waewae, a, ka whati te fibula i ngā wāhi e rua. He tino mamae te mamae." He maha nga meneti ka whakawāteatia e te kaimahi o te atamira a Manson, i āhua ngoikore, i te mohio. Tae atu ki te whara o tōna waewae o raro, ka hiahiatia e te whetū he tīwiri mā tōna wheua raparapa. Kua pau i a ia ngā wiki e rua whakamutunga e whakaora ana i te kāinga i Los Angeles. I kī a Manson i pouri a ia i tana haereere "i tapahia tika" i a ia "e tata ana ki te puru ki te taputapu tuarua". Engari i tāpiri mai a ia, "Taro ake nei ka hoki mai ahau ki reira, ā, ka tino mīharo ki te tīmatanga." Kua whakaritea anōtia e te whetū ētahi rā whakaterenga o Amerika mō Hānuere me Hēpuari 2018. E whitu ngā rā UK a ia i te wā o Hakihea. Whāia mātou i Facebook, i Twitter @BBCNewsEnts, i Instagram rānei i bbcnewsents. Mēnā he huatau pūrākau tāu, īmēra entertainment.news@bbc.co.uk. title: Ka hoki whakamuri te Tuku Iho Ingarihi i ngā mahere whare pikitia o Brighton Hippodrome
summary: English Heritage has recommended that Brighton and Hove City Council grants listed building planning permission to proposals to redevelop the Brighton Hippodrome.
text: E hiahia ana ngā kaiwhakawhanake ki te huri i te whare tapere kua rārangitia e te Kōeke II hei whare pikitia Vue e waru-mata me ngā wharekai e whā. E hia rau ngā tāngata e hiahia ana kia noho tonu te whare hei wāhi whakaaturanga ora. Engari i kī te Tuku iho Ingarihi ko ngā tono whare pikitia tērā pea he "wā whakamutunga ki te tiaki i te Hippodrome". I roto i tētahi urupare ki te whakaaro a te kaunihera, i whakaahuatia e Samantha Johnson, te kaitirotiro o ngā whare hītori me ngā wāhi i English Heritage, te whare hei tētahi o ngā "mahi nui" a te kaihoahoa whakaari a Frank Matcham. "Kei roto te whare i tētahi āhuatanga tūpāpaku, ā, kei runga i te Rēhita Whare Mōrearea o Ingarihi Tuku iho," tana kī. "Ka tūkinotia e nga tono te tikanga o te whare. ' Takuhe tūmatanui' "Heoi anō, tērā pea ka tohu rātou i tētahi wā whakamutunga ki te tiaki i te Hippodrome, ā, ka tiakina ngā uara rerehua e pā ana ki te wāhanga mahi a Matcham." I whakamutua e ia ko te kaupapa e tohu ana i "te wā tino pai ki te tiaki i tēnei whare kōeke II* tino mōrearea, ā, ko tōna atawhai he painga tūmatanui matua". I tīmata te whare kua mahue ināianei hei papa hukapapa i te tau 1897 i mua i te rironga o te circus, i katia i te tau 1902. I whakatuwheratia anō hei whare tapere i te tau e whai ake nei. I te tau 1967 ka hurihia hei hōro bingo, ā, tae noa ki te tau 2006. Kei roto i ngā tono ko te whakauru i te whare ki te whare hokohoko pātata o Dukes Lane, me te waihanga i ngā toa hou e whā me tētahi tapawhā tūmatanui. Ka kōkuhutia hoki tētahi papa hōu ki roto i te dome hei waihanga mokowā wharekai i runga, ā, ka noho tētahi whare pikitia mata e waru ki raro me te kaha mō ngā tūru neke atu i te 1,000. 'Kei te mōrearea te whare tapere o runga' I kī ngā kaiwhakawhanake ko ngā huringa ki roto o te Hippodrome ka taea te "tango tika me te pānga mōkito" ā muri ake nei. I kī a Chris Moore, mai i Alaska Developments, kei muri i ngā marohi, ko te urupare a English Heritage e tohu ana i te 12 marama o "ngā kōrero me ngā whakaaro whakatapua". I tīmata tētahi petihana i Whiringahora kia mau tonu te Hippodrome hei whare tapere i hainatia e neke atu i te 1,000 tāngata. Ko ngā hoariri ki ngā mahere ko te Theatres Trust, nāna i whakaingoa te Hippodrome hei tētahi o ngā whare tapere matua o UK e mōrearea ana i te ngaro hei wāhi mahinga. Trustee Penelope Keith said: "Plans for the cinema conversion come close to heritage destruction of a Grade II* listed building and there will be little chance of this wonderful theatre ever being used again for live performance."

title: E kī ana a Brunei e kore e whakaū i te whiu mate mo te wahine tāne
summary: Kua hoki whakamuri a Brunei ki te whakaū i ngā ture i whakaurua i tērā marama, tērā pea ka whiua te wahine i waenganui i ngā tāngata me te puremu mā te kohatu ki te mate.
text: I te Rātapu ka whakaroa atu e Kāhui Wānanga Bolkiah i te Rātapu he takawaenga mo te whiu mate hei taupoki i te ture hou. E whai ana te whakaaro anō i te hīanga o te ao whānui i runga i ngā ture, tae atu ki ngā poapoa me ngā whakahē a te hunga rongonui. I a ia e noho tonu ana i runga i nga pukapuka tikanga mo ētahi hara, kāore he kawenga i mahia i Brunei mai i te tau 1957. I tērā marama ka whakatakahia e Brunei he whakamāramatanga hou pākaha o ngā ture ā-Rangi, o te Kāwanatanga rānei. I roto i tētahi whaikōrero, ka kī te kāhui e mōhio ana a ia he "maha ngā pātai me ngā mōhiotanga" e pā ana ki te whakatinanatanga o te ture, e kiia nei ko te Raupapa Waehere Pene o Syariah (SPCO). I a ia e kī ana ka hoatu he takawaenga mo te whiu mate ki te SPCO, ka tiakina hoki e ia ngā ture hou, e kī ana ka mārama tō rātou "painga". Ko te whaikōrero te wā tuatahi i kōrero tūmatanui ai te rangatira o te whenua mō te ture mai i to rātau whakatakinga. I kī te Hēkeretari Tianara o Kotahitanga, a Patricia Scotland, i "koa a ia kua tangohia te whiu mate, ā, ko te takawaenga moe maori kua neke atu i te rua tekau tau, ka taupokina hoki te SPCO". He mana kē te tānetanga i Brunei, ā, ka whiua tae atu ki te 10 tau i roto i te whare herehere. Tata ki te rua tuatoru o te iwi whānui o te whenua e 420,000 ngā Pirihitini. He aha ngā ture? I te tau 2014, i te tau 2014, i whakamōhiotia tuatahitia e te iwi iti o Āhia ki te Tonga-Rāwhiti te ture ā-Ture. Ko te wāhanga tuatahi i hipa i ngā hara e whiua ana e ngā rerenga whare herehere me te whaina. Ko nga ture i whakaurua i te 3 o Āperira i tohu i te wāhanga panuku o te ture, a, ka hipokina ngā hara e whiua ana e te porowhita me te kohatu. I raro i te ture: He aha te tauhohenga? Na nga ture i whakaoho te whakapouri o te ao whānui, ka makaia te iwi iti o Āhia ki te Tonga-Rāwhiti ki te rama o te ao. I mua i to rātau whakatinanatanga, ka whakatūpato te UN e takahi ana ngā ture i ngā paerewa motika tangata ao whānui i whakaritea i roto i te Whakapuakitanga Ao Whānui o ngā Motika Tangata o te tau 1948 - i whakapūtātia e Brunei i te tau 2006. I karangatia e ngā tāngata rongonui tae atu ki a George Clooney rāua ko Elton John he whakapōhēhē i ngā hōtēra rangatira me ngā hononga ki Brunei i runga i te ture. I kī a Tēnā Kānata ko ngā ture hou e nui ana ki te "tūkinotanga motika tangata". He tokomaha i roto i te iwi tāne o Brunei i whakapuaki i te ohorere me te wehi i nga whiu.

title: Ngā pōti pirihimana me te komihana hara: Te hara waipiro
summary: He āwangawanga ngā mahi e pā ana ki te waipiro ki ngā hapori i Devon me Cornwall mō tētahi wā.
text: Kua pātai atu a TE Rongokōrero ki ngā kaitono pirihimana me te komihana hara (PCC) me pēhea rātau e rutu ai i ngā mahi me ngā hara e honoa ana ki te inu. Kua whakaaturia e ngā whika o nā tata nei mai i ngā Pirihimana o Devon me Cornwall kua piki ake ngā mahi taraiwa inu. I kī ngā whika whaimana o te tōpana e 1,937 ngā mahi taraiwa inu i ngā takiwā i waenganui o Hōngongoi 2011 ki June 2012, i whakaritea ki te 1,877 i tērā tau. Heoi anō, ko te tutu me te whara i raro i te mana o te waipiro, o ngā rongoā rānei i kite i te hinganga neke atu i te 50% mai i te 9,395 ngā mahi i waenganui i a Hōngongoi 2010 me Pipiri 2011, ki te 4,235 i te tau e whai ake nei. 'Huarahi tiritahi' Ka whai mahi te PCC taumai i raro i te Ture Pirihimana me te Haepapa Pāpori 2012 ki te whakaaro ki te whakamahi i ngā Whakahau Rāhuitanga o te Ata Tōmua hei aukati i ngā pakihi e hoko waipiro ana ki ngā raruraru o tētahi rohe. Ka taea hoki e rātou te whakaaro ki te whakamōhio i tētahi whakataka pō ki ngā umanga hei āwhina ki te utu i ngā utu mō te mahi pirihimana. I a Hōngongoi 2009, i whakatūria te Newquay Safe Partnership i muri i te matenga o ngā taitamariki tokorua i te taunga. Mai i tērā wā ka mahi tahi ngā pirihimana, ngā kainoho, ngā kaunihera me ngā umanga ki te whakatoko i te haumarutanga me te whakaiti i ngā mōrea ki ngā tāngata haurangi i te taone. He maha ngā tohu i riro i te mahi ngātahi, ā, i whakamihitia e ngā kaimahi o te Tari Kāinga i haere ki te taunga i te tau 2010. I te tau e whai ake nei, neke atu i te 4,000 ngā tāngata i raro i te 18 tau i haere ki Newquay i te raumati, e ai ki te mahi ngātahi, ā, neke atu i te 6,000 ngā pounamu me ngā kēne waipiro i muruatia, i ringihia rānei e ngā pirihimana. 'Drain on resources' I kī te kaitono takitahi o Ivan Jordan i tautuhia e te kaupapa he tauira ki te toenga o te rohe tōpana. I kī a ia: "Ko Newquay Safe e ārahi ana i te huarahi ki te whakaiti i te hara e pā ana ki te waipiro me tētahi huarahi tiritiri e pā ana ki ngā pirihimana, te kaunihera me ngā umanga, e whiwhi ana i te £258,000 o ngā penapena utu hara i roto i te tau kotahi. " Ko te whakamaurutanga waipiro he take pakiaka o te hara anō, ā, me whakaroa atu e tātau te tauira o ngā kaimahi hauora hinengaro i roto i ngā pūtahi tiaki ki te rutu i ngā raruraru i ngā wā tata nei". I tāpiritia e te kaitono o Te Pāremata Liberal, ehara i te "kawenga anake a ngā pirihimana" ki te mahi i ngā raruraru e pā ana ki te waipiro, ā, "he kawenga tā ētahi atu umanga". Ka kī a ia: "E whakaaro ana ahau kei te whakamahia a mātau tāke pirihimana ki te pirihimana i ngā nui o te torutoru; E whakahohe ana i ētahi umanga i roto i te āhua o te pō kia whai hua me te whakawhiti i ngā rauemi pirihimana i ētahi atu take." I kī a Kōrero Greenslade, he kaitono takitahi: "He nui te waipiro i runga i ngā rauemi tūmatanui. " He manakē te whakahau i tēnei i ngā wāhi pēnei i Newquay me Plymouth." I kī te kaitono Conservative, a Toni Hogg, i whakaaetia e ia nga pirihimana a te kāwanatanga mo te tūkino waipiro me te hara. Engari i tāpiri mai a ia: "Ka arotahi ahau ki te ārai me te whakanoho i ngā tūpāpaku i te tuatahi ki te whakatau i ngā putanga. Ka mahi tahi ahau me ngā Hoa Mahi Haumaru Hapori mō te rautaki, tae atu ki ngā hapori manakē. "E tautoko ana ahau i ngā rongoā i roto i te hapori hei manakohanga ki te whare herehere mēnā e tika ana," tana tāpiri mai. I kī a Tam Macpherson, he kaitono takitahi, e hiahiatia ana he whakarārangi anō i ngā rauemi pirihimana. "Ko ngā āpiha e mahi ana i ngā wā tika, i ngā wāhi tika, e whakarite ana i ngā tauwāhi tika, e mahi ana i roto i ngā ture, me te mahi ngātahi me ngā rōpū hapori me ngā rōpū pakihi me whakamāmā i te pānga o te tutu e pā ana ki te waipiro." I kī a William Mohi, tētahi kaitono takitahi, he kaupapa here manawanui kore tōna mō ngā wāhi i kite ai i "te nui o te hara me te tukino e pā ana ki te waipiro". Ka kī a ia: "E kore te manawanui kore e whakararuraru i ngā kōti nā te mea ka whakaritea e ngā pirihimana he whirinoa ki te whakawā. " Māku hoki e whakatū te pokapū detox anake o Ingarangi mō raro i te 21 tau." I kī a Kiriata Calderwood, he kaitono takitahi, i whakaaro ia me whakaatu he ataata o to rātau whanonga haurangi. "Me whakauru anō e tātau tētahi pūnaha kia haere ai ngā pōhēhētanga whai raruraru inu ki tētahi kōwhiringa. " Engari i tēnei wā me tino whakauru rātau. Kotahi noa iho te taenga mai e kore e rawaka." I kī a John Smith, he kaitono takitahi, he wāhi anō tēnei mo te mahi ngātahi. "He tauira pai tā mātou o ngā mahi angitu, ā, me whakawhanake ki ētahi atu taone." I kī te kaitono Mahi a Nicky Williams ka "mahi tahi ia me ngā Aronui Pubwatch paetata me te whakatatū i ngā mea hōu, e hanga ana i runga i te tauira o te Ngātahitanga Haumaru o Newquay e pā ana ki ngā umanga maha". I kī te kaitono o te Rōpū Rangatiratanga o UK, a Bob Smith: "He raruraru tēnei e kore e ngaro, engari me mahi me whai hua hoki. " Me mahi tātau ki tēnei raruraru i runga i te wā roa, i te wā tūturu."

title: Kaore he whakararuraru i roto i te panekōrero a te rangatira taua o Pakitāne, a Katani
summary: Kua kī te Rangatira Kaimahi o te ope taua o Pakitāne, a Ken Ashfaq Perewa Kakani, kaore he whakaaro o te taua ki te whakararuraru i te pōti paremata e tū mai nei.
text: I kī a ia ko tana "moemoeā" tērā ka tū te pōti tika i te wā tika. Ko te panekōrero i whakaritea i te wā o Me ka tohu i te wā tuatahi kua oti i te kāwanatanga ā iwi tōna wā, ā, ka whakawhiti i te mana ki tētahi atu huihuinga i pōtitia. Na te motu hiko o te motu i te pō o te Rātapu i whakaoho nga rongo hou mo te whakahaere hōia i Pakitāne. "Kāore he whakaaro o te taua ki te whakakeke i te tukanga manapori," ka whakahuatia a Ken Katani me te kōrero, e ai ki te Express Rara o Pakitāne. E ai ki ngā pūtake rongokōrero paetata, i whakaputaina e ia ngā kōrero i roto i tētahi kōrero ōpaki ki ngā kaipānui i te taone o Rawalpindi i te Rātapu, engari kāore i pūrongotia ā muri ake nei. I tētahi whenua whai hītori o ngā kukitanga hōia, tērā ētahi āwangawanga toenga o te raweke a te taua, e pūrongo ana i te Orla Guerin o TE AO i Iharaira. I tērā wiki, ka tukuna e te rangatira kōrero hōia tētahi kōrero ōrite e whakahau ana kia kore te taua e whai hua i te takawaretanga o te pōti. I kī a Ken Kayani, ko ia te rangatira kaimahi o te taua mai i te tau 2007, kua tautokona tonutia e ia te tukanga manapori, ā, e hiahia ana kia tū te pōti i te wā kotahi puta noa i te whenua katoa. I kī a ia ka whakaae katoa te hōia ki nga hua o te pōti.

title: Curb 'yobbish' MPs, Speaker Bercow tells party leaders
summary: Kua tuhituhi te Kaikōrero o te Whare o Ngātahi, a John Bercow ki ngā kaiārahi rōpū, e whakahau ana i a rātau kia whiua i runga i te "yobbery me te kura tūmatanui" i ngā Pātai a te Pirimia.
text: I kī atu a ia ki a Rawiri, a Ed Miliband rāua ko Nick Clegg e whakaweto ana te āhua o te taupatupatu i te iwi whānui, ka pūrongotia e te nūpepa Independent. I te nuinga o te wā me uru atu a Tēnā Bercow ki te ārai i te pārekareka a ngā MP. Engari i kī a ia kāore a ia i pīrangi kia puta "mārire" mō taua take. I te wā o te wātū o ngā Pātai a te Pirimia (PMQs) ia wiki, ka pātaitia a Tēnā Karauna e te kaiārahi Mahi, a Tēnā Miliband mō ngā take katoa e kōwhiria ana e te kaiārahi whakahē i mua i te tango pātai mai i ngā MP o muri. I ngā wā katoa he takahanga turituri, me ngā mema kāwanatanga me ngā MP ātete e tangi ana puta noa i te ruma o Ngātahi ki a rāua anō, me te hamama i ngā muhani. 'Koretake' Ka hokona hoki e nga kaiārahi o te rōpū ngā kāniwha ka taea te tāpiri ki ngā taumata decibel, ahakoa i ētahi wā e hiahia ana rāua ki te whakangāwari i ngā wātū i te mea kāore rāua e whakaatu i tētahi whakaahua tōrunga o ngā tōrangapū ki te iwi whānui. I te pōhiritanga i te reta a Tēnā Bercow, ka kī atu a Tēnā Miliband ki te HAU: "E whakaaro ana ahau ko te take o ngā Pātai a te Pirimia tētahi e hiahiatia ana kia titirohia. " Kua kī ahau i mua ehara i te mea he pānui nui tēnei mō ngā tōrangapū, Pāremata rānei, ā, e whakaaro ana ahau ka whakaae te nuinga o te iwi ki tēnā. And I'm very happy and welcome any initiative by the Speaker or others to look at these issues." I ngā marama o mua tata nei, te āhua nei kua nui haere te manawanui o Tēnā Bercow ki te whakararuraru i ngā taha e rua, ā, kua tohua e ia te hunga e whakaaro ana ia kua hē. I tēnei marama, i korerotia ki te Hēkeretari Mātauranga a Michael Gove: "Me tuhi koe i te mano wā, 'Ka whanonga ahau i ngā Pātai a te Pirimia.' " I kī atu hoki a Tēnā Bercow ki a Labour MP Tom Blenkinsop: "Kia mārire. Whakamarie i a koe anō. Tangohia te ioka." Kua kitea e te rangahau a te Hansard Society, e whakahau ana mō te whakahōu paremata, ko ngā whakaahuatanga tino pūnoa a te iwi whānui o ngā PMQ he "turituri", "tamariki", "over-the-top" me te "koretake". I pātaitia ngā rōpū arotahi mēnā he "nui rawa te piro tōrangapū tōrangapū, kaua e whakautu i te pātai" me te rua tuatoru o ērā i whakaae. Tata ki te haurua i kī he "turituri rawa, he whakatuki rawa" ngā PMQ, ā, ko te 12% noa iho i kī i ngā takahanga ia wiki i "whakakake ai rātau ki to mātau Pāremata". I kī atu a Tēnā Bercow ki te Independent: "Tērā ētahi tāngata e whakaaro ana he tino tāne te hauora, he tino whakakī, ā, i ngā take tino kino, o te yobbery me te kura tūmatanui. " Kāore au i te whakaaro me āta whakaaro tātau mo tēnei, engari kāore au i te tino mōhio kei te tautuhi tauira pai mātou ki te whakatupuranga kaipōti e whai ake nei." I kī taurangi a Tēnā Bercow, nāna i whakaahua te ruma i te wā o ngā PMQs he kaha ake i te mahinga a te pēne toka o Deep Purple, kia whakarongo ki ngā whakaaro o ngā kaiārahi rōpū i mua i te whakaaro mēnā ka whakatūria he kōmihana kia titiro ki te whanonga i roto i te Kotahitanga. I whakahē te kaiārahi Liberal Democrat o Mua o Tā Menzies Campbell i ngā "āhuatanga tautoko whutupōro" o te tokomaha o ngā MP. I tāpiri mai a ia: "E whakaaro ana ahau he tino uaua ki te whakarerekē i tēnei momo whanonga i te wā o tēnei pāremata, engari tērā pea ka taea i te tīmatanga o tētahi pāremata hou, mēnā ka tika te whakatinanatanga o te pirimia me te kaiārahi o te ātete." I kī a Ruth Fox, ko te tumuaki me te upoko rangahau i te Rōpū Hansard: "E whakaaro ana te iwi whānui he tamariki te whanonga o ngā MP, ā, kāore e whakaaetia i ētahi atu wāhi mahi." I tāpiri mai a ia: "Kua tōmuri te whakahōu mēnā me neke ngā PMQs mai i te noho hei takahanga āta titiro whakaroto, tohutoro whaiaro hoki ki tōna tūranga tika o te tirotiro me te haepapatanga." Kua tūtohutia e te Rōpū Hansard te whakatatū i tētahi "ipu hara" mō ngā MP hē, ā, kia nekehia ngā PMQ mai i te poutumarotanga o te rā o te Wenerei ki tētahi kāniwha pouaka whakaata taumata hei whakahauhau i ētahi atu hiahia.

title: E whakaū ana ngā Pirihimana o Greater Manchester i te ngaronga o ngā mahi e 1,000
summary: Kua whakaūngia e ngā Pirihimana Nui Ake (GMP) kia tapahia neke atu i te 1,000 ngā mahi i te mutunga o tērā tau.
text: Me tiaki e te tōpana te £134m i roto i ngā tau e whā e whai ake nei. I kī te Rangatira Kātipa GMP a Pita Fahy he "tukanga mamae" tērā, engari i whakatauria e ia e kore e whai hua te hunga hara. I whakaaetia nga penapena i tētahi hui a te Mana Pirihimana o Greater Manchester (GMPA) ki te tautuhi i te tahua GMP mō te 2011/12. Ko ngā hinganga mahi i whakaūngia e te mana he wāhanga o tētahi hōtaka whakahōu whānui ake hei urupare ki te arotakenga whakapau moni a te kāwanatanga. Tae atu ki te 500 ngā pou pirihimana ka haere ki ngā wāhi o muri pēnei i te IT, ngā rauemi tangata me te kai i te mutunga o Me. Ka ngaro ētahi atu tūnga whakahaere e 500 tae atu ki ngā pūraweke waea, ngā kaimahi ā-ture me ngā pou parenga tūmatanui i mua i te mutunga o te 2012. Ko te tuatahi o ngā whakamōhiotanga whakahau e 150 neke atu rānei e tūmanakohia ana kia tukuna a tērā wiki, ā, ka rapu tonu te tōpana i ngā whakahōutanga tūturu. 'Tukanga mamae' Tae noa ki te tau ā-pūtea 2014-15, ka whakarite a GMP ki te whakaiti i ngā tau kaimahi mā te 23%, e ōrite ana ki te tapeke o ngā āpiha e tata ana ki te 1,400 me ngā whakairinga ā-iwi neke atu i te 1,500. Na te ture, kāore e taea te whakakore i ngā pirihimana o mua. Heoi anō, e whakaaro ana a GMP kia ngaro i a GMP e 94 ngā whakairinga pirihimana i te mutunga o te tau 2012 mā te whakawāteatanga māori me te whakatio tono me ētahi atu mahi ā-iwi e 404 e tapahia ana. I kī a Tēnā Fahy kua kaha te mahi a te tōpana ki te pupuri i tōna kaha ki te whawhai i te hara. "E tino whakaaro ana mātou kia kore te autahi hara e whai hua mai i tēnei āhuatanga," tana kī. "Ahakoa rā, he tukanga tino mamae tēnei mō ngā kaimahi e pā ana, ā, ka kite mātou i te tokomaha o ngā hoa mahi whai painga e waiho ana i te tōpana i roto i ngā marama e 12 e haere mai nei, i tua atu rānei." I tāpiritia e ia kua tautuhia hoki e te tōpana he ūnga hou hei whakaiti i te hara, hei pare i ngā tāngata mōrearea, hei whakaiti i te whanonga ārai pāpori, hei whakakaha i ngā mahi ā-rohe e kitea ana, me te tuku uara mō te moni. I tohe te manukura o GMPA, a Paul Murphy, e kore te tōpana e hoki mai i nga tiriti. "People have told us they want to be safe and feel safe in their communities. Koia mātou i haere tonu ai ki te whakanoho i ngā pirihimana paetata ki te ngākau o ngā whāinga kua tautuhia e mātou," tana kī.

title: Ko ēhea ngā kōwhiringa Brexit ka taea te rutu i te take taitapa?
summary: I te Mane, ka whai wāhi ngā MP ki tētahi hurihanga tuarua o ngā pōti i runga i ngā tono whirinoa o Te Aotearoa.
text: Nā John CampbellBBC News NI Economics & Business Editor Ko te whakaaro kia kite he aha te putanga, mēnā he aha, e whakahau ana i te nuinga. Ka taea e tētahi o rātau te āwhina ki te rutu i te take taitapa o Kīriria? He aha te take taitapa? I tēnei wā kei te hokona ngā taonga me ngā ratonga i waenganui i Aiarangi ki te Raki me te Whenua o Aiarangi, he ruarua noa iho ngā rāhuitanga nā te mea kei roto te UK me Aiarangi i te mākete kotahi me te uniana tikanga o te EU. Ko te tikanga kāore e hiahiatia kia tirohia ngā hua mō ngā tikanga, kia taki rānei e tutuki ana i ngā paerewa EU. Engari i muri i a Brexit ka rerekē ngā wāhanga e rua o Aiarangi i ngā tikanga me ngā whakahaere ture, arā, ko te tikanga o ngā hua e takina ana i te rohe. Kāore te kāwanatanga o UK e pīrangi kia puta tēnei. Kua kī hoki te EU kaore e pīrangi ki te whakapakeke i te rohe. Heoi anō, ko ngā raina whero o te UK o nāianei, arā ko te waiho i te uniana tikanga me te mākete kotahi, ka tino uaua. He aha ngā mea e tono ana ngā MP? E waru ngā kōwhiringa rerekē, engari ko ngā mea e tino hāngai ana ki te taitapa e māharahara ana ki te uniana o ngā tikanga me te mākete kotahi. Kotahi tonu te marohi i runga i te uniana o ngā tikanga, kotahi i runga i te mākete kotahi, ā, ko tētahi e whakakotahi tika ana i ngā mea e rua i roto i te mea e kiia nei ko te Mākete Pūnoa 2.0. Ka tukua e tēnei kōwhiringa te kāwanatanga ki te whakarite i "tētahi uniana tikanga pūmau, whānui hoki o UK ki te EU". Ko te tikanga o tēnā, pērā ki tēnei rā, kaore he utu mo nga taonga e hokona ana puta noa i te rohe o Kīriria. Nā reira kāore he take mō ngā momo whakairinga tikanga e kitea ana i ngā taitapa o te mema EU o Huitene me Nōwei ehara i te EU. Heoi anō, ka āraia hoki e ia te UK kia kore ai e tūtuki i ngā mahi hokohoko takitahi ki ētahi atu whenua. Ā, e kore e tino whakakore i te kaha o ngā taki taitapa i Airangi. Ehara ngā tikanga i ngā mea anake ka taea te whakaū i te taitapa - ko ngā taki paerewa hua, otirā mō te kai, tērā pea he take taitapa. Mā tēnei tātau e kawe mai ki tētahi atu kōwhiringa. E tono ana tēnei kōwhiringa kia noho tonu te UK ki te Horahanga Ohaoha o Ūropi (EEA) me te hono anō ki te European Free Trade Association (EFTA) i ngā wā tata nei. Ko te tikanga ka noho tonu te UK ki te mākete kotahi. Mā tēnā e whakakore te hiahiatanga o ētahi taki paerewa hua i te rohe o Kīriria. Heoi anō, kāore te nuinga o ngā hua ahuwhenua i roto i te Whakaaetanga EEA, nā reira e whakaae ana ngā kaitautoko o tēnei kōwhiringa me whakarite ētahi atu kawa e pā ana ki te kai ahuwhenua me te rohe. I a ia e kōrero ana i Pōroa i tērā marama, i whakapuakina e Taoiseach Leo Varadkar ētahi tautoko mō te kōwhiringa EEA/EFTA. Ka kī a ia: "He rongoā tūpono kei reira me hiahia te kāwanatanga o UK me te pāremata o UK ki te whiwhi i aua kōwhiringa." Mākete pūnoa 2.0 Ka huihuia mai e tēnei kōwhiringa ngā mea tuatahi e rua: E whakatakoto ana i ngā mematanga o te Pānga Hokohoko Koreutu o Ūropi, i te taha o tētahi "whakaritenga tikanga whānui" rangitahi me ngā kawa e pā ana ki te hokohoko kai māori. E mārama ana hoki i roto i te whakapono mā tēnei e whakatika te take taitapa me te tango i te hiahiatanga o te tauwhāinga. Ko te tauwhāinga te whakaritenga i roto i te mahi a te pirimia e pā ana ki te kore e taea te pupuri i te taitapa mā tētahi mahi hokohoko. Ka kitea e Aiarangi ki te Raki anake e noho hāngai ana ki ētahi ture o te mākete kotahi EU, e kore ai e whakaaetia e ngā kaiwawao o Aiarangi ki te Raki. E kī ana ngā kaitautoko o tēnei kōwhiringa, ka pā hoki ki tētahi tauākī hono here ā-ture ki te EU mā te whakatinanatanga o te Mākete Pūnoa 2.0 e "whakakapia katoatia". Ka whiwhi ētahi o ēnei i te tautoko tōrangapū? I te hurihanga tuatahi o ngā pōti, e ono noa iho ngā pōti i te nuinga o te putanga o te kaupapa uniana tikanga. He ātaahua ki ētahi MP nā te mea ka tukuna e ia te Pirihitini ngohengohe rawa me te kore whakatuwhera anō i te pātai o te wāteatanga o te nekeneke. Heoi anō, ka whakahokia mai e te mākete kotahi me te Mākete Pūnoa 2.0 te wāteatanga o te nekeneke ki te rārangi take. Ko te nuinga o te wā e hiahiatia ana ngā mema EFTA kia whai i ngā whakaritenga EU i runga i te nekehanga koreutu. He pai te whiriwhiri a Liechtenstein nā te iti o te iwi whānui. Te āhua nei kāore e taea e te UK te whiwhi i te momo kōwhiringa ōrite i tukuna ai te kaha o te EU ki te 'kore whiriwhiri cherry.' Kāore tētahi o ngā kōwhiringa e waru i marohitia e ngā MP i whiwhi i te nuinga o te huinga tuatahi o ngā pōti tohu i te 27 o Mati, engari ko te hunga i whiwhi i te nuinga he uniana tikanga ki te EU me tētahi taupānga mō tētahi mahi. Ko te nuinga o aua kōwhiringa e waru kua hoki mai mō te porowhita tuarua, engari kua whakakapia ētahi ki ngā whiringa hōu. E tūmanakohia ana kia tīmata te pōti i te 20:00 BST. Anei tētahi wehenga o ngā kōwhiringa kua whakarārangitia ki te pepa tono.

title: Shropshire inpatient coronavirus screenings 'missed'
summary: I hapa ngā whakamātautau coronavirus tūroro i tētahi whakawhirinaki hōhipera, ā, i āwhina ki te pāpātanga o ngā tīmatanga i runga i ngā tiaki, kua kī tētahi pūrongo.
text: I kī te whakawhirinaki o te Hōhipera o Shrewsbury me Telford i te rā o te whakaurunga me te rima o nga rā i muri mai, engari i "hapa i ētahi wāhi". I kī te kaiwhakahaere nēhi o Hayley Flavell i "nekehia ētahi tūroro i mua i te mōhiotanga o te hua o te whakamātautau". Kei te mana tētahi mahere mahi i muri i ngā tīmatatanga. An Infection Prevention and Control Report is due to go before the trust's board on Tuesday. I tuhituhi a Ms Flavell e 10 ngā rohe i waenganui i ngā wāhi puta noa i te Hōhipera o Te Pirinihi Ariki (PRH), Telford me te Hōhipera o Royal Shrewsbury (RSH) i kite i ngā tīmatanga o Covid-19 i Whiringahora me Whiringa-ā-rangi. 'Ngā pēhanga taumaha' I roto i te mahere hohenga he arotakenga o te whakamahinga me ngā mahi PPE, "ngā kaimahi haumaru, tauhohe hoki me te whakamātautau tūroro" me ngā tikanga "horoi whakarei", te kī a te Ratonga Pūrongo Kāwanatanga ā Rohe. I roto i tētahi pūrongo motuhake, ka kī te rangatira nui o te whakawhirinaki, a Louise Barnett, kua "pā ki ngā pēhanga tino nui" te rōpū me ōna hoa ā-rohe. I kī a ia: "(Ko ēnei) nā te tīmatanga o te hōtoke me te nui haere o ngā tūroro Covid e haere ana ki te hōhipera, i tētahi wāhanga i te ngaru tuarua, neke atu i te 80 ngā tūroro pai. " Kua heke te maha o ngā tūroro Covid-positive ināianei." Tae atu ki te 16 o Whiringa-ā-rangi, e 72 ngā tūroro Covid-pai; E 39 i te PRH me te 33 i te RSH, ka kī te pūrongo. Ko ngā tīmatanga i runga i ngā wāhi e pā ana ki ngā kēhi tūroro me ngā kaimahi me tētahi anake o ngā kaimahi e toru i kitea i takea mai i te tawhiti pāpori, ka tāpiritia e Ms Flavell. Whāia a BBC West Midlands i Facebook, Twitter me Instagram. Tukua ō whakaaro pūrākau ki: newsonline.westmidlands@bbc.co.uk

title: Ka whakapūketetia e ngā pirihimana te 3% e piki ana i te hara, e whakaatu ana ngā whika ONS
summary: Kua piki ake te hara katoa i Uēra mā te 3%, e whakaatu ana ngā whika whaimana.
text: E 177,732 ngā hara i whakapūketetia i te tau ki Mahuru 2014, e ai ki te Tari mō ngā whika Tatauranga ā-Motu i runga anō i ngā pūkete pirihimana. Kua piki ake te hara taikaha i te tata ki te tuarima, ā, kua piki ake ngā hara tōkai i te 30%, ahakoa i kī te ONS e pā ana aua pikinga ki te hopukanga pai ake. Ko te nuinga o te wā i heke iho ngā hara waka, ngā tāhaetanga me ngā tāhae i Weera. I kite ngā Pirihimana o South Wales i te pikinga teitei rawa atu o te hara i tuhia me te pikinga o te 4%. I kite a Gwent i te pikinga o te 3% me Dyfed-Powys he 1% te pikinga, i te wā i noho ōrite tonu a North Wales, e hāngai ana ki te wawaenga o UK. Puta noa i Wales e 38,000 ngā whakaekenga taikaha - tae atu ki te 18% - tae atu ki te 14 ngā kōhuru. E 4,019 hoki ngā hara tōnā. I tērā tau, ka kī te kaitiaki tatauranga ā-motu kua kore e taea te whakaae ki ngā whika i tuhia e ngā pirihimana nā te mea kāore i te pono - e akiaki ana i ngā whakahōutanga nui o te whakahaere a ia tōpana i ōna whika.

title: E āwangawanga ana ngā kaitōrangapū o Jersey ki ngā taumata kaimahi whare herehere
summary: E hiahia ana ngā kaitōrangapū i Jersey ki te mōhio mēnā ka taea e te whare herehere anake o te motu te whakatikatika i te pikinga o ngā herehere me ngā taumata kaimahi o nāianei.
text: Kei te uiui tētahi pae tirotiro kāwanatanga i ngā kaimahi i te whare herehere o La Moye i Hato Brelade. I kī a Tuarua Jeremy Macon he iti ake ngā āpiha, ko te tikanga kua rerekē te pūnaha neke. I kī a ia kei te whakatikatika rātau i tēnei wā, engari i āwangawanga a ia e kore rātau e whakahaere mehemea ka tipu te toharite o te iwi herehere o te 184. Ka pātai te pae o Tuarua Macon ki te kāwana o te whare herehere i tētahi whakarongo tūmatanui ā muri ake. Ko ngā taumata tūtohu Ko te pūrongo ā-tau o te ratonga whare herehere, i whakaputaina i Aperira, i whakaatu i ngā taumata kaimahi i La Moye i raro iho i ngā taumata tūtohu i te 2011 ki te 160 tae atu ki ngā kaimahi whakahaere me ngā kaimahi tohunga. I kī te kāwana o te whare herehere, a Bill Millar, me whakaiti e ia ngā taumata kaimahi kia tutuki ai ngā tapahi i mōhio ai ia e haere mai ana i te tau 2012. Ka kī a ia: "Ko te mea e kore mātou e mahi ko te whakamōrearea i te tangata, ahakoa he kaimahi, he herehere rānei." Ka kōrero hoki rātau ki te upoko o ngā Tikanga me ngā Nekeneke mō te tapahi pūtea ki tana ratonga.

title: Ka pōhiritia e te Ratonga Waka Tūroro o Te Raki Nui te waka rererangi tere ake
summary: Kua tīmata tētahi waka rererangi tere ake, kaha ake hoki i te pūtake hou o te Great North Air Ambulance Service (GNAAS).
text: I neke atu ngā kaimahi whakahaere o te aroha ki ngā kāinga i Eaglescliffe i tērā tau, engari i haere tonu tana rererangi ki te mahi mai i Teesside International Airport. Ināianei kua neke atu ngā kaihautū, ngā tākuta me ngā kaiāwhina ki te pokapū hou. Kia rite tonu ki te nekehanga, kua tukuna e ia tētahi hepa hou e kī ana ka āwhina ki te whakaora i ētahi atu oranga. I roto i ngā meneti o tōna whakakitenga, ka karangatia te Dauphin N3+ ki te urupare ki tētahi ohorere rongoā i Prudhoe. I kī a Kōnata Ingram, te kaiwhakahaere mahi i te GNAAS, "ko tētahi o ngā waka tūroro tere rawa i te UK". "It's got more performance, this definitely takes us to the next step", he says. "Our region goes from the east coast to the west coast, from the Scottish Border to North Yorkshire, so this gives us the performance, the reliability, the speed and the effectiveness to bring critical care to the patients of the north. I tāpiritia e te tumuaki mahi, a Andy Mawson: "Ko te tikanga o tēnei rererangi ko te rerekētanga i waenganui i te ora me te mate mō ētahi tāngata i reira." I whakatūria a GNAAS, e toru ngā hepaoro e hipa ana i te Rāwhiti ki te Raki, i Cumbria me Te Raki o Aotearoa, i te tau 2010.

title: Na te whakarewatanga o Arlene Foster i āta tirotiro ai a ia
summary: I te 45, he mea kē a Arlene Foster hei toa o Stormont Executive.
text: Nā Pirihi WhārangiBBC News NI Political Correspondent He minita a ia mai i te tau 2007, e toru ngā kōpaki - taiao, hinonga me te pūtea o nā tata nei. I Stormont, ko te tikanga o te angitu ko te tirotiro - ā, ko tōna pikinga ki runga rawa, ko te tikanga kei te āta tirohia te pūkete a Mrs Foster i mua atu. Ko te nuinga o te wā he tirohanga tōrunga tā ngā tāngata pakihi ki tana mahinga hei minita hinonga - ā, e tūmanako ana kia whakanohoia e ia te āhua o ana manakē hei minita tuatahi. I kī a Nigel Smyth mai i teNGARA: "Kua whakarongo a ia, kua urupare. " Kua mōhio hoki a ia ki te hiranga o te mahi hou me te whai rautaki kaweake nui. "Kei te takamuri tonu te whakahaerenga o Aiarangi ki te Raki i te toenga o te UK, engari ko te nuinga o te wā nā ngā herenga o ngā whakapaunga tūmatanui. Kei runga mātou i te huarahi ki te whakaora." Ko te 'tauira tūranga' ko Mrs Foster te wahine tino roa e mahi ana i roto i te kaiwhakahaere - ā, kua tautuhia hei wahine tuatahi hei minita tuatahi. E whakapono ana a Lynn Carvill, te rangatira nui o te rōpū whakangungu Women's Tec, ka whai pānga tēnei ki te iwi. Ka kī a ia: "E whakaatu ana ngā whakaaturanga katoa he tino nui ngā tauira tūranga. " Ki taku whakaaro mā te whai i a Arlene hei minita tuatahi ka whakatuwhera i ngā huarahi me ngā wawata mō ngā wāhine me ngā kōtiro puta noa i Aiarangi ki te Raki." Ko te wero tuatahi a te Fermanagh me te South Tyrone MLA ko te pupuri i te tūnga matua o te DUP i roto i te pōti whakaminenga i Me. E whakaaro ana te kaitātari tōrangapū a Henry Bell ka haere tonu a ia i roto i te uaua ōrite ki a Pita Pirihitini - e ngana ana ki te whakarite i te DUP "he hāhi whānui ake". E whakapono ana a ia i te wā roa, tērā pea he nekehanga kaupapahere māheahea. "I mārama a Arlene Foster, ā, e whakaaro ana ahau ki tētahi whānuitanga o Pita Pirihitini i mua i a ia, kei te huri a Aiarangi ki te Raki," tana kī. "Kei te noho hei iwi ohaoha ake - nā reira kāore au i te whakaaro he kōwhiringa i reira." Ahakoa he arotahi wawe te pakanga pōti i roto i te whakakotahitanga ki a Mrs Foster, ka tautuhia pea e tōna pānga ki te wairua ā muri ake nei te tiritiri hiko. E whakaaro ana a Noel Doran, te kaiwhakatika o te nūpepa ā-iwi o te Rongokōrero o Airana, tērā pea ka whakaū kē atu te mahi whakawhiti-hapori. "The general public are cynical about what's been going on at Stormont, and it's going to take some time to turn things around," he said. "Engari kei reira te wā. Kei te haere mai a Arlene Foster hei taitamariki, he wahine, mai i tētahi rohe taitapa. "E tūmanako ana ahau ka kitea e ia he huarahi tika kia haere tonu ai tana mahi." Ka nui te rerekētanga o Aiarangi ki te Raki i ngā tau tata nei ka whakawhirinaki ki te ārahitanga a Arlene Foster. Ka hoatu e ngā kaipōti he whakataunga moata mo tana mahi - ā, ka whārahi te pōti whakaminenga i a Me i ōna marama tuatahi e whakahaere ana i te DUP.

title: Ko te Reo Irirangi 1 LOL-a-thon mō te Comic Relief te 'mea tino pai kua mahia e mātou'
summary: "E tino whakaaro ana ahau koia tētahi o ngā mea tino pai kua mahia e mātou," te kī a Pirihi Stark ki a Newsbeat i a ia e whakaoti ana i tētahi pāohotanga 27 haora i te Reo Irirangi 1.
text: I te wā o ta rātau Lol-a-thon, ka kōrerotia e nga DJ he rau ngā kōrero kōrero mai i ngā kaiwhakarongo, ā, ka kohia e ia te £324,931 mō te Comic Relief. I whakaaro rātau ki te mahi i te 24 haora, engari i whakaohotia e te tautoko a te hunga whakarongo. Ka tāpiri mai a Chris: "He nui te whakawhirinaki i reira, he hononga motuhake i waenganui i a mātau me te iwi e whakarongo ana." Ko Ricky Gervais, David Beckham me Claudia Winkleman i waenganui i te "tatau hurihuri o ngā manuhiri" i puta mai i te whakaaturanga omaoma. Engari ki a Pirihi ko te wā tūturu he wā i whakaawetia e te hunga whakarongo. "Tērā tētahi kōrero patoto mai i tētahi tamaiti iti ko Edward. " I tino whakarahia e mātau mā te haere ki te patoto, ki te whakangahau i te tatau tino rongonui o te whenua. Tau 10 Downing Street." E kī ana ngā kaiwhakaatu ko te taumata o te whakaurunga a te hunga whakarongo i tua atu i ngā kōauau. "I waenganui i ngā kōrero whakakata me ngā mea heahea, he kōrerorero whakamīharo e puta ana," te whakamārama a Pirihi. "Obviously raising that amount is so special and we're so proud of everyone who did that. " Engari i ētahi wā, i waenganui i ngā mea heahea katoa i mahia e mātau, i puta ētahi kōrerorero whakamīharo." "This was about jokes but doing something for Comic Relief also provides the perfect opportunity to have more serious chat about other things." "I kite ahau i tētahi karere kuputuhi ki te mutunga o te pāohotanga i rongo ai tētahi tangata i ngā kōrero a Greg James mō te kore e tino pai i roto i ngā wiki e rua kua taha," te whakamārama a Scott. "I kī te kaiwhakarongo kāore a ia i rongo i tētahi tangata e kōrero pērā, ā, he rite tonu tana whakaaro. " Mā te rongo i te tangata mai i te reo irirangi e hoatu ana i tētahi wāhanga nui o te pono ka mōhio ia ināianei ehara rātou i te mea anake e puta ana i tēnā." Ka tāpiri mai a Scott: "He tino rerekē te mea katoa. " Ki te whakaaro koe i tīmata noa iho mātou inanahi... kāore te moni i kohia e mātau i te 1pm inanahi, ā, koia tērā te mana o te hunga whakarongo Radio 1. "He nui tēnei e pā ana ki te wāhi e tono moni ana mātou. Ka taea e koe te noho i reira i te 5am pēnei i a mātau i tēnei ata, ā, tata ki te £30,000. "Kātahi ka kohikohi i te tere... Ka tino uru te katoa me te haumi i roto i te pūrākau." Whāia Newsbeat i Instagram, Facebook me Twitter. Whakarongo ki Newsbeat live i te 12:45 me te 17:45 i ia rā o te wiki i te Reo Irirangi 1 me te 1Xtra - ki te hapa koe i a mātou ka taea e koe te whakarongo mai ki konei.

title: Kua whakarewaina te kitenga hukapapa o te waka ātea Cryosat
summary: Kua kitea e ngā kaipūtaiao Pākehā he huarahi hei whakahiko i a rātau akoranga i ngā rau hukapapa i Te Moana ki te Tonga, i Kunirangi.
text: Nā Honatana AmosBBC Science Correspondent, Prague Ko te tikanga pukapuka e whakarewa ana i ngā raraunga mō ngā huringa teitei e kohia ana e ngā taputapu hihiani i runga i ngā amiorangi. E mōhiotia ana ko te altimetry swath, ka whakaaetia e ngā kairangahau kia kite i ngā rohe whānui ake o ngā rau hukapapa i tētahi taha e hipa ana i runga, ā, i tētahi tauine pai ake. Ka taea ināianei te tūhura i ngā wāhi rewa, whakatōpū rānei me ngā mōhiohio 100 wā. I tēnei wā, kua hoatu anake te huarahi hōu ki tētahi huinga iti o ngā raraunga i riro mai i te waka ātea Cryosat. Engari ko te whakaaro ko te hoki whakamuri ki te tukatuka anō i te pūranga katoa e ono tau o ngā kitenga i mahia e tēnei mahi a te European Space Agency (Esa). Ka tino whakarerekētia e te altimetry Swath te āhua e āhei ai ngā kaipūtaiao ki te ako i ētahi tītohunga, e kī ana a Dr Noel Gourmelen mai i te Whare Wānanga o Etinitini, UK. "Ko te tikanga o ngā whakapainga ā-wā, mokowā hoki, mēnā he pātōtō tātau i roto i te awaawa, ināianei ka ngāwari kē atu te titiro ki te wāhi i tīmata ai taua takahanga. I tīmata te katoa o te hukapapa ki te neke i te wā kotahi? I tīmata rānei te huringa i te moana, ko te tikanga kei te pā te moana ki te awaawa? Tērā pea i tua atu, ko te tikanga he rerekē ngā tukanga. Ināianei, ka pai ake tā mātou whakataki i te hītori me ngā take o te pātōtō," tana kī atu ki a TE Rongokōrero. Kia mārama, kāore he mea e huri ana i te āhua o te mahi a Cryosat - i te āhua anake o te tukatuka i ōna raraunga. He hihiani motuhake kē tā te waka ātea i hoahoatia hei whakatutuki i ngā whakamātautau motuhake o te mātakitaki i ngā rau hukapapa. Mā ōna pūhihi māhanga, ka taea e te taputapu te mahi i roto i tētahi aratau interferometric, ehara i te mea ko te tawhiti ki tētahi wāhi i raro iho i te hukapapa, engari ko te koki ki taua tauwāhi. Ki te kore tēnei kaha, ka uaua ki te whakamahere tika i ngā pari poupou me ngā tuawhenua e kitea ana i ngā tapa o ngā rau hukapapa - ngā tauwāhi tonu i tino whakahuatia ai te rewa me te angiangi o nā noa nei. Paraihe whānui ake Engari ahakoa i tēnei aratau pai ake, ka arotahi te tukatuka raraunga paerewa ki te pūwāhi whakahoki pāoro hihiani tata rawa, ā, ka waiho te nuinga o te pūngao i te toenga o te tohu. I tērā taha, ka wetekina katoatia e te tukatuka swath, e whakaatu ana i tētahi raina o ētahi atu pūwāhi teitei. Ināianei ka taea te kite i ētahi atu o te āhua o te pouri, o te awaawa rānei, ehara i te tapa noa iho, i te tuawhenua rānei e karapoti ana i a ia. A, no te mea he whānui ake te "paraihe" o te kitenga, he iti iho te wā ki te "peita" i te mahere o te rau hukapapa. "Ka taea e mātou ināianei te kite i ngā taipitopito kāore i taea i mua," te kī a te kaitohutohu pūtaiao matua o Cryosat mai i te Whare Wānanga o Te Whare "Ināianei ka taea e mātou te whakamahere me te taumira mokowā 500m te huringa teitei me te whakarewatanga o te Tiri o te Moana ki te Tonga, me Greenland, me ētahi atu pūmatua hukapapa me ngā awaawa puta noa i te ao." Ko te kaha o te altimetry swath Ko ngā atahanga i raro nei o te Petermann Glacier i te raki o Greenland e whakaatu ana i te pānga o te tukatuka paerewa ki te huarahi swath hou. Ka tangohia e te whakamutunga ētahi atu mōhiohio whakarewa mai i te tohu hihiani. He wāhi kōrero nui te aratau hōu i konei i Prague i te Huihuinga Aorangi Ora o te European Space Agency, pērā ki te wā heke mai o Cryosat anō. He tino uara ōna inenga hihiani, ā, e huaina ana ki te whakarerekē i ngā akoranga o te Tiritiri, te Tiri o te Moana ki te Tonga, me Kunirangi. Engari ināianei kei te mahi te whāinga i tua atu i tōna oranga hoahoa, ā, ka mate pea i te āwhiotanga i ngā wā katoa. Kua tohe nga kairangahau ki a Esa me te Kōmihana o Ūropi kia kimi i nga tikanga hei whakarato i te whai ake. I kī a Dr Andrew Fleming mai i te British Antarctic Survey mēnā i ngaro tōna aho mōhiohio, ā, kāore he whakakapinga tika, ka tukuna e ia he tokomaha ngā kairangahau "ki te moenga i roto i te roimata". I kī te kaiwhakahaere mātakitaki o Esa Earth putaatu, a Prof Volker Liebig, kāore he mahere mō tētahi whakakapi hāngai, ā, he iti rawa te wā hei hanga i tētahi ahakoa e wātea ana te moni. Engari ināianei kei te kōrerorerotia te ariā ka taea e te kōmihana te whakarewa i tētahi aorangi ōrite i roto i tana rangatū waka ātea Sentinel i ngā tau 2020, ka tāpiritia e ia. I kī a Prof Liebig kaore he whakakāhore i te hiranga o te āheinga Cryosat, otirā i te ako i te hukapapa moana o te Tiritiri. "Ko [Cryosat] tētahi whāinga whai tikanga ā-whenua nā te mea ko te Tiritiri te wāhi e tino rerekē ana i roto i tō tātau oranga nā te huringa āhuarangi," tana kī atu ki te huihuinga. "Me te rua waeine [i te pikinga o te pāmahana] puta noa i te ao, ko te tikanga me te ono waeine, 10 waeine rānei i ngā pou. Kua kite tonu ahau i ētahi tauākī tāpiri 15 waeine. Ko te tikanga o tēnei, i te waenganui o te rau tau, i roto i te 30 tau noa iho mai i tēnei wā, ka ngaro katoa atu te hukapapa moana o te Tiritiri i te raumati." Jonathan.Amos-INTERNET@bbc.co.uk me te whai i ahau i Twitter: @BBCAmos

title: E tono ana a Brian Blessed kia noho hei tumuaki o Cambridge
summary: Kua pānuitia e te kaitapere a Brian Blessed ka tū a ia mo te tumuaki o te Whare Wānanga o Cambridge.
text: I kī a ia i "hari" a ia i muri i te whiwhinga o tētahi whakahau Facebook ākonga i a ia ki te tū atu ki te rangatira hokomaha, a Ariki Sainsbury. Kei te whakahaere hoki te kaihoko paetata o Ahu Arain mo te tūranga tūturu, e puritia ana e te Ariki o Etinitini, e haere ana. Ka kī a Tēnā Arain: "E tū ana ahau mō te iwi katoa o Kemipiri". Ināianei he whakataetae te pōti mo te tumuaki, ehara i te tukunga hāngai. Me whakaingoa anake e te whare wānanga tētahi kaitono whaimana, ā, kua whakapuakina kētia ko ia te Ariki Sainsbury. Me toa ētahi atu kaitono i ngā tautapa e 50 mai i te whare wānanga o te whare wānanga i te 17 o Hune, ka noho aunoa rānei a Ariki Sainsbury hei tumuaki. Kua whiwhi a Tēnā Manaakitia i ana whakaingoatanga e 50, ā, kua whakaūngia hei kaitono. Ko te senate he tangata whai MA, tohu teitei ake rānei mai i Cambridge. I kī a Heta Alexander Thevoz, nāna i whakatū te whakahau Facebook kia whakaingoatia ai a Tēnā Manaakitia: "Ka pai ake te mahi a Cambridge mōna anō. Ko te tangata, ko te pūrākau, ko te poutohu ko te kaitapere a Brian Blessed ka noho hei tumuaki whakamīharo. "Whakaahuatia a ia e whakahua nui ana i te reo Rātini i ngā hākari whiwhinga whiwhinga, ā, ka mōhio koe he aha te poutohu o Kōrero." I muri i te taenga atu o te rōpū ki tōna ūnga, ka whakaae te kaieke maunga ki te whakaingoatanga. Ka kī a ia: "Ki a au, ko Cambridge tonu te pokapū o te whenua, he tīahoaho me te mārama i reira e tauwhāinga ana ki tērā i Maunga Everest. He mea whakamīharo te tautuhinga katoa, ā, e whakamīharo ana i te wairua." Ko tana whakataetae, ko Tēnā Arain, e whakahaere ana i tētahi toa kai i Mill Road, Cambridge, ā, e whakahē ana i ngā mahere kia whakatuwheratia e tētahi Sainsbury's i te tiriti kotahi. I te 3 o Pipiri e 40 ana whakaingoatanga, ā, i mōhio ia ka whiwhi ia i te 50 katoa i te 17 o Pipiri ki te pōti i te pōti o Whiringahora. I kī a Tēnā Arain: "Ko te tikanga ko Cambridge he whare wānanga e whāngai ana i te hapori me ngā uara mātauranga rongonui o te ao." Ko wai ka noho hei tumuaki ka whiwhi i tētahi tūranga mo te oranga hei upoko kaupapa ture o te whare wānanga, e tohutohu ana i ngā take uaua me te whakawhiwhi tohu hōnore i tētahi hui ā-tau. Ngā Hononga Ipurangi Pātahi Te Whare Wānanga o Cambridge

title: Ka whiwhi a Pirinihi Anne i te whakatairanga hōia i a ia e whakanui ana i te huritau 70
summary: Kua whakatairangatia a Princess Anne e te Ope Taua me te Royal Air Force hei tohu i tōna huritau 70.
text: Ka riro i te Pirinihi Ariki - te tamaiti tuarua a te Kuini - te tūranga o te tianara me te rangatira o te hau, e hāngai ana ōna rārangi ki tōna tūranga i roto i te Moana o te Ariki. He tikanga kia whakamahia ngā kīngi matua hei mema hōia, ā, ka whiwhi whakatairanga i a rātau e pakeke ana. I te tīmatanga o tēnei tau, ka whakatairangatia a Piriniha Anaru, engari i hikitia. Ka huri a Pirinihi Anne i te 70 i te Hātarei, ā, kei te tohua tōna rā whānau ki te putanga o ngā whakaahua whai mana e toru i tangohia i tōna kāinga i Gatcombe Park, Gloucestershire. I tangohia ngā pikitia i te mutunga o Hui tanguru e John Swannell, nāna hoki i whakaahua ētahi atu kīngi matua, tae atu ki a Tara, a Tā Michael Caine me Tā Elton John. I a ia e kōrero ana i te tīmatanga o tēnei wiki, ka kī te hunaonga a Anne a Mike Tindall kua "whakahekea" ngā mahere hei tohu i te rā nā te taiepa coronavirus. "He mahere tā mātou - tērā pea i Pākehā - engari e mārama ana me Covid me Aberdeen e maukati ana, e whakaaro ana ahau kua iti noa iho te tauine o ngā mea katoa," te kī a te whetū whutupōro o Ingarangi o mua, kua mārena ki te tamāhine a Anne, a Zara, i te The One Show. "He whakamā. E mōhio tūturu ana ahau ka mahi mātou i tētahi mea hei whānau hei whakanui i ōna tau whakamīharo e 70, he wahine whakamīharo noa iho a ia ki te nui o ngā mahi ka taea e ia i roto i te tau. "Ka mahi mātou i tētahi mea, kāore anō ahau kia mōhio mēnā e mōhio ana ia - nā reira kua hiritia aku ngutu." I a ia e kōrero ana mō tana whakatairanga hōia, kua whakaaetia e te Kuini, ka kī te Manatu Whakangungu he "tino tautoko" a Anne ki nga ope taua. "Ko tēnei whakatairanga i tōna huritau 70 e mōhio ana ki tana koha tino nui me tana whāinga ki te hōia." Kua tohua hoki te rā whānau o Anne e tētahi pakipūmeka pouaka whakaata, neke atu i te kotahi tau i te hanganga, ā, i whakatikaina hoki e ia tētahi putanga o te pukapuka Country Life. I kōrero a ia i roto i te pukapuka mō tōna aroha ki te āhua me te hiahia ki te karo i te moumou me te penapena pūngao hei pare i te taiao. I roto i te pakipūmeka ITV, ka kōrero a ia mō te pāpāho pāpori, e hua ana kei te tāpiri ki ngā pēhanga e anga ana ki ngā kāwanatanga taitamariki. Kōtaha: I whānau a Pirinihi Anne Anne Elizabeth Alice Louise i te tau 1950, te tamaiti tuarua ki te Kuini rāua ko Pirini Piripi me ta rāua tamāhine kotahi. Ko ia te tua14 o te rārangi ki te torona. He kaingākau eke hoiho a ia i whakataetae i roto i te tīma hoiho o Ingarangi i te Omirangi o te tau 1976, ā, i pōtitia ia ko te Tuakiri Hākinakina o te Tau i te tau 1971. I te tau 1973, ka moe ia i tana tāne tuatahi ko Kāpene Mark Phillips, ā, tokorua ā rāua tamariki, ko Pita rāua ko Zara. I whakatau a Anne e kore ana tamariki e whai taitara ariki. I ora te tokorua i tētahi whakamātau kākā i te tau 1974, i a rāua e hoki ana ki Te Whare o Buckingham i roto i tētahi limousine ā-kaihautū. I muri i te 19 tau, ka mutu tana mārena tuatahi i te whakarerekētanga, ā, i moe ia i tana tāne tuarua, a Vice Admiral Sir Tim Laurence, i te tau 1992. I te tau 1990, i whakaingoatia ia mo te Whakawhiwhinga Mo te Rangimārie mo tana mahi hei perehitini o te aroha Tiaki Tamariki. I te tau 2002, ka noho a Anne hei mema matua tuatahi o te whānau ariki i whakawāteatia mo tētahi hara hara. I tautohe a ia ki tētahi whakapae i raro i te Ture Kurī Mōrearea i muri i tana mōkai a Dotty i ngau i ngā tamariki tokorua i Windsor Great Park. E noho ana a ia i te whare whenua o te rau tau 18 o Gatcombe Park, tata ki Stroud i Gloucestershire, he koha na te Kuini. E 730 eka te whenua, he whare nui me te roto tarau.

title: Kātipa matua o Leicestershire: Tū me te rapu i te nuinga o te wā
summary: Kua kī te rangatira kātipa o Ngā Pirihimana o Pirihitini e hiahia ana ia ki te whakamahi i te tū me te rapu anō.
text: I whakahētia te tōpana e te Komihana Ōritetanga me ngā Motika Tangata i te tau 2010 mo te whakamahi tōtika i te mahi ki ngā tāne pango. Engari i kī a Haimona Cole, mai i taua wā kua neke atu i te haurua te whakamahinga o te tū me te rapu. Kua tāruatia ngā hopunga i mahia mā te tikanga, e tohu ana kei te pai ake te whakamahi a te tōpana, tana kī. 'Ngā kaihoko rongoā ūnga' "Mēnā ka tū mātou me te rapu i runga i te āhua ngaio, mēnā ka whakamāramatia e mātou he aha te take e puta ana, ā, ka mahia e mātou i runga i tētahi huarahi pūataata, aroha, e whakaaro ana ahau e mōhio ana ngā tāngata he wāhi tēnei e tino mahi ana mātou nā te arotahi i kawea mai ki a mātau e te kōmihana motika tangata," te kī a Tēnā Cole. "Ka mahia e mātau mō tētahi take. Ka mahia e mātou nā te mea e hiahia ana mātou ki te ūkui i ngā tāngata e tūkino ana i te hapori paetata. E hiahia ana mātou ki te ūkui i ngā kaihoko rongoā me ngā tāngata e mau rākau ana."
