Engari i kī a ia ko te "ōritetanga 50/50" e pā ana ki te ira tangata, ki te iwi rānei o ngā tāngata e tū ana, e rapua ana, e kore e taea e ngā Pirihimana o Te Pirihitini. I kī a Chino Cabon, mai i te Pokapū Ōritetanga o Te Iwi o Aotearoa, i te mea kua tauinetia te mahi i te takiwā, e whā ngā wā e tū ana te tāne pango ki tō rātou hoa mā, kaua e whitu ngā wā i te wā o te pūrongo. I kī a ia, mai i te pūrongo a te Komihana Motika Tangata me te Komihana Ōrite, kua whakamahia e pirihimana ngā pūkenga pai ake hei ūnga i ngā tāngata ki te tū me te rapu. "E hiahia ana a Haimona Kora ki te whakanui ake i te urutomo i roto i te oranga o te tangata i te taone me te rohe - me pātai mēnā ka whai painga tērā ki tētahi tangata," tana kī. I hainatia tētahi whakaaetanga 18 marama i te Hānuere 2011 i muri i te kitenga o te Komihana Motika Tangata me te Komihana Ōritetanga kāore i taea e te tōpana te whakatikatika tika i te take i whakamahia ai te tikanga. I taua wā, ka kī te kōmihana e tata ana ki te rima ngā wā e rapua ana ngā tāngata pango i ngā tāngata mā, ā, e tata ana ki te rua ngā tāngata Āhia. Mai i tērā wā ka pūrongotia e te tōpana he 80% te taka o te tūnga me ngā rapunga - mai i te 25,000 ki te 5,000 - i roto i ngā tau e toru tae atu ki Mahuru 2013.

title: Ko te Monkeypox i kitea i UK mo te wā tuatahi
summary: Ko te wā tuatahi i kitea ai te monkeypox i te UK, e whakatūpato ana tētahi tinana hauora tūmatanui.
text: Kaore e ngāwari te hora o te mate huaketo i waenganui i te tangata, ā, ko te nuinga o te iwi e ora ana i roto i ngā wiki ruarua. I kī te Hauora Tūmatanui o Ingarangi (PHE) he tangata noho te tūroro i Naria i reira pea i pāngia ai te huaketo. I noho te tūroro i tētahi pūtake moana i Cornwall, engari ināianei kei te rongoatia i te rōpū mate urutā i te Hōhipera Koreutu o Kingi i Rāwāhi. Kei te mahi ngātahi ōna tohunga me ngā hoa mahi NHS "hei mehua whakatūpato" ā, ka whakapā atu ki ngā tāngata tērā pea i whakapā tata ki te tangata ki te whakarato mōhiohio me ngā tohutohu hauora. Kei roto i tēnei ko te whakapā atu ki ētahi pāhihi i haere tata ki te tūroro i runga i te rerenga kotahi ki te UK. I haere te tūroro ki Rānana mai i Nigeria i te 2 o Mahuru, ā, ko te tangata kāore anō kia whakapā atu ki taua rerenga e tohutohutia ana kia kaua e hiahiatia he mahi anō. He aha te monkeypox? Pūtake: Public Health England Dr Michael Jacobs, kaiwhakahaere rongoā o te whakapokenga i te Hōhipera Koreutu o Kingi, i kī te monkeypox "kāore e ngāwari te hora i waenganui i ngā tāngata me te mōrea o te tarenga ki te iwi whānui ake". "Kei te whakamahi mātou i ngā hātepe taratahi pākaha i te hōhipera hei pare i ā mātou kaimahi me ngā tūroro," tana tāpiri mai. I kī a Dr Nick Phin, te tumuaki tuarua o te National Infection Service i PHE: "He mea nui kia whakatūpato kāore e ngāwari te hora o te monkeypox i waenga i ngā tāngata me te mōrea whānui ki te iwi whānui. " Kei te whai ake te Hauora Tūmatanui o Ingarangi i te hunga kua whakapā tata ki te tūroro ki te tuku tohutohu me te aroturuki i a rātou ina hiahiatia." I kī a ia he "hātepe whakahaere whakapokenga pakari, pakari hoki a PHE me te NHS mō te mahi i ngā kēhi o te mate urutā kawemai, ā, ka tino whaia ēnei hei whakaiti i te mōrea o te tarenga".

title: Ko ngā kerēme hararei Coronavirus e pana ana i a Hiscox ki te ngaro
summary: I kī te kamupene inihua a Hiscox kua waiho e ia te $232m (£177m) hei utu i ngā kerēme e pā ana ki te coronavirus, tae atu ki ngā hararei kua whakakorea me ngā takahanga tākaro nui.
text: Nā ngā whakarato i āwhina ki te pana i te umanga ki te ngaromanga mō te haurua tuatahi o te tau 2020, i whakaritea ki te hua i tērā tau. I kī te rangatira o Hiscox, a Bronek Masojada, he "ono marama whakamātautau". "Kua pakaru ētahi o ēnei kamupene [haere], ā, kei te piki ake mātou i te ripa," tana kī. E kiia ana he wāhanga te umanga o tētahi rōpū inihua nāna i tuhi te whakakorenga o Wimbledon i tēnei tau, ahakoa kua horahia aua hinganga ki waenganui i ngā kamupene maha. Ka puta mai ētahi atu utu i ngā mārena kua whakakorea, ā, ka hikitia te tākaro mō ngā kiriata me ngā whakaaturanga pouaka whakaata. Ko Hiscox i waenganui i ngā inihua e waru e haere ana ki te kōti ki te whakatau mēnā me utu ā rātou kaupapa here ki ngā kamupene i pāngia e te coronavirus. Kua kī te kaitiaki o te Mana Whanonga Pūtea i te kēhi whakamātautau, i tīmata i a Hōngongoi, ka mārama ki ngā kaipupuri kaupapahere, ā, ka pāngia pea ētahi atu kaihautū. E whai ana i ngā amuamu mai i ngā kamupene, ko ētahi o rātou e kī ana ka taea e rātou te haere ki raro, i muri i te whakakāhoretanga a ngā inihua ki te taupoki i ō rātou hinganga. E tūmanakohia ana he putanga i te waenganui o Mahuru, te kī a Hiscox. 'Ohorere me te mīharo' i pūrongotia e Hiscox tētahi ngaronga tāke tōmua e $138.9m mō ngā marama e ono ki Pipiri, i whakaritea ki te $168m i te wā kotahi i tērā tau. "I a ia e noho ana i roto i te umanga mōrearea mo te 47 tau, tērā pea ka tūmanako te tangata kia āhua ārai i ngā ohorere, engari ko ētahi takahanga e āhei ana ki te ohorere me te mīharo. Kua kitea te Covid-19 pēnei," te kī a te manukura o Robert Childs. I hinga hoki ngā utu tuhituhi nui, heke iho i te 4.4% ki te $2.24bn. I hinga te utu tiri a Hiscox i te 5% ki te 742p i te Mane. I kī te mākete inihua o Raiti o Rānana, he mema a Hiscox, i a Me e tūmanako ana kia utua e ia ngā kerēme e pā ana ki te coronavirus i waenganui i te $3bn me te $4.3bn. Ko te tikanga o tēnā ko te nui rawa atu o te mākete i utua mai i ngā whakaekenga o te 11 o Mahuru 2001 i te US.

title: Neke atu ki ētahi atu ratonga kohanga ā-kaiwhakawhanau
summary: Ka taea e ētahi atu wāhine te whānau i te kāinga, kāore rānei he tākuta i konei hei wāhanga o te rūrū nui o te tiaki kohanga.
text: Ka tuwhera tonu ngā whare kohanga mō ngā wāhine e nui ake ana te mōrearea o ngā pōauautanga, engari ka whai tūranga ārahi ngā "pokapū hapori" ā-kaiwhakawhanau. Health Secretary Shona Robison said the new system would offer better choice and personalized care for expectant mothers. Ka whakamātauria ki ngā wāhi poari hauora e rima puta noa i Pākehā mai i tērā tau. Ka whai ngā kaihautū i tētahi arotakenga tohunga o ngā ratonga kohanga me ngā ratonga kōhungahunga i Pākehā, i whakaputaina i te Hānuere, e kī ana ko te nuinga o te tiaki me tū i roto i tētahi tautuhinga hapori. The Best Start review recommended improved continuity of care, with women having a primary midwife working as part of a multi-disciplinary team based at community hubs. He iti ake ngā whānautanga hōhipera i kī ai a Ms Robison: "E tino pā ana ki te hoatu kōwhiringa anō ki ngā wāhine mō ā rātou ratonga kohanga. It's about giving them the choice to have their birth at home or in a local community midwife unit - or if needed in a hospital obstetric unit. "It's also about continuity of care. Having the same midwife throughout their maternity service, having someone they can ask all the questions they need to ask during their maternity journey. It's also about having services closer to home." Kāore he whare mahi o ngā pokapū hapori, ā, i whakaae a Ms Robison me whakawhiti ētahi wāhine ki ngā wae hōhipera mēnā ka puta mai he raruraru. I tāpiri mai a ia: "Ka pā mai tēnā i tēnei wā, engari mā te whai i taua tiaki hononga ka taea e mātou te whakarite kei te noho ngā mahere kia tae ai te wahine ki te wāhi tika. " I tēnei wā, he tokomaha rawa ngā wāhine e whakamutu ana i te hōhipera me ngā whānautanga ā-whanau, ā, ehara tēnā i te mea e hiahiatia ana e rātau. Ā, i te nuinga o te wā ehara i te mea e hiahia ana rātou - e hiahia ana rātou ki te whānau tata atu ki te kāinga, i ētahi wā i te kāinga." Ka whakamātauria te pūnaha hōu i NHS Forth Valley, Highland, Lanarkshire, Lothian me Greater Glasgow me Clyde.

title: Brian Keenan i runga i te wairua, te whakapono, te tuhituhi me te wehi
summary: Mēnā ka taea e te wheako ora te whakarei ake i te mahi a te kaituhi, kāore he iti rawa o Kōrero Keenan.
text: I te tau 1986 ka kahakina a ia i Beirut, a, e whā me te hāwhe tau i roto i tētahi pūtau i te ringa o Te Rūnanga Ingarihi. I te tuatahi ka wehewehea a Keenan mo te rua marama i mua i te nekehanga ki tētahi pūtau tiritiri me te kaipānui, a John McKaka. Ahakoa e hiahia ana ki te karo i te noho hei mana i runga i tētahi mea, he hōhonu ake te mōhiotanga o Keenan ki te mokemoke me te mokemoke. "He rerekētanga i waenganui i te mokemoke me te mokemoke. He tino pai ki ahau te mokemoke, engari he rerekē te mokemoke. E hiahia ana tātau katoa ki tētahi tangata hei kōrero, hei whakamārama i ngā mea. Ki te kore tātau e whai i tēnā, kāore i a tātau te whakamanatanga, ā, kāore he tikanga o te ora. Ko te mokemoke me te whakawāteatanga "E whakaaro ana ahau he wāhi tō te katoa i roto i a rātau anō ka taea e koe anake te haere. E mōhio ana koe me pēhea te tae atu ki reira nā te mea he kī tāu. Ina haere koe ki reira ka tino whakanui- he āhua whakararuraru hoki nā te mea ka whakahaua koe kia titiro ki a koe anō. Koia tēnā te mokemoke ki a au. "It's about taking the time to look at what you are and make good what you are. I ētahi wā me puru e koe he pani whakapiri ki konei, ki reira. Ko te mokemoke, ina taea e koe te mahi i taua mea, e pā ana ki te whakawāteatanga." Ko tēnei hāhi ā-roto e haere ai a Brian Keenan ki te whakaata wairua. Ko nga tikanga koropiko taketake ake, kaore he kukume ki a ia i mua i tana kahakitanga, a, kaore he kukume inaianei. "Kāore au e kite i tētahi mea whāngai i roto i ngā hāhi nui, iti rānei. E kite ana ahau ko te whakapono e pā ana ki te mana, ehara i te whakawāteatanga. He nui taku haere ki te whare karakia nā te mea e mīharo ana ahau ki ngā whare me ngā mea e tika ana kia whakaatuhia, engari i roto anake i ngā wāhi ururua e kitea ai e au ngā mea katoa e mārama ana; ahakoa he aha te tapu, ahakoa he aha tēnei mea 'kē'. He pātai mo te whakapono "I roto i ngā wāhi ururua ka kitea e koe tētahi tomokanga tē kitea e taea ai e koe te haere atu. Mā tēnei e āhei ai koe ki te haere ki roto i a koe anō me te titiro ki roto i a koe anō. Ki a au he wheako whakapono tēnā. Kaore he pānga o tēnei ki nga taonga katoa o te hāhi. Ahakoa te whakakāhore i te hāhi taketake, ka puta mai a Keenan hei tangata tino wairua. He tangata ia kua ui ki a ia ano he patai mo te whakapono, a, ka puta mai me ana ake whakautu. "Mēnā he Atua kei reira, he pai ake te tūturu, ā, he pai ake te whai tikanga. He pai ake te mahi i ngā mea e whakauru ana i a au ki tētahi huarahi e rongo ai ahau, ki te kore he tinihanga noa iho. Engari anei te kupu taurangi. Ehara ahau i te whakapono engari i te maukatitanga ka inoi ahau. Ua pure au i te mau mahana atoa, e ua parau atu i te Atua e, mai te mea e tii mai oia ia'u i reira, e rave au i te mau mea atoa. Engari kaore e taea e koe te whakarite ki te Atua. "Ina tomo koe ki te whare hiko o te inoi, he pai ake kia mau koe i te hūtu tēpoko nā te mea ka tunua koe. E whakapono ana ahau ki te inoi, engari me tino mōhio koe ki tāu e mahi nei nā te mea ka pā mai ngā mea, ā, me mahi koe ki aua mea." I Aotearoa 1990 ka whakautua ngā inoi a Keenan, ā, ka tukua ia. I muri i tana whakaoranga i tōna whakamatautau, ka haere tonu ia ki te tuhi i te 'An Evil Cradling', he kōrero mo tōna whakarau i Peirut. I whakaahuatia te pukapuka e te Kaitirotiro he 'Karaipiture i roto i ōna resonances, i a ia e pā ana ki tētahi māngere taunga rererangi'. Engari e kore a Keenan e whakaae ki te tango i te hua katoa. E whakapono ana a ia ko te pukapuka pai e tuhi ana i a ia anō. Creativity in emptiness "I think stories are given to you and it's about writing the story in a way which transfers to someone else. Nā te mea ehara nāku, he waka noa iho ahau, he utauta, he pene rānei. Mā te 'An Evil Cradling' i taraiwa haere ahau mō ngā wiki me ngā wiki me ngā wiki e whakaaro ana me pēhea taku tuhi i tēnei? He roa te wā kāore he mea i puta, ā, ka pā mai ngā mea katoa. "I taraiwa ahau ki tētahi one wātea, ki tētahi urupa tahito me tētahi maunga ātaahua e titiro atu ana ki te moana. He maha nga tau e noho ana ahau ki te tuhi kupu whakarite me ētahi atu mea, ngā whakaaro mō te mure ore, te putunga me te mate- ngā mea katoa i puta mai ki roto i tōku mahunga. "Kātahi ahau ka hoki ki te kāinga, ka haehae i ngā whārangi katoa, ka whakatakotoria ki runga i te moenga, ka whakakā i te hopu rīpene. Kāore au i titiro ki ngā tuhipoka i te wā kotahi, engari ka ringihia katoatia. "I te ata a muri ake ka whakarongo ahau ki ngā rīpene, ā, ka noho ahau i reira, i roto i taku whare me ngā roimata e taka ana i tōku kanohi nā te mea ko au tērā i Repanona e kōrero ana ki a au ināianei". He tino rerekē te tangata i maukatia i roto i tētahi pūtau i Beirut, e tūtaki ana tātau i tēnei rā. Ehara a Kōrero Keenan i te tauhou ki te whakaata i a ia anō, ā, ehara i te mea i whakahaeretia e ia te mahi kāore e taea te muru i ana kaihopu, kua whakatauria hoki e ia he nui i roto i a ia anō. "I a au e maukati ana i mataku ahau ki te mataku, a, nā tērā ahau i mahi ai i ētahi mea heahea. He tino hīkaka ahau, he tino heahea- koia tērā e wehi ana ahau ināianei. I whakaaro ahau ki aku kaikaha, 'E mōhio ana ahau he pū tāu engari kāore au i te māharahara, kāore tonu au e tuku i a koe ki te pana i ahau' engari ka tautoko noa iho i a koe mō tētahi wā nā te mea ka pau katoa ō rāhui tūturu. "He rerekētanga i waenganui i te mataku me te tūtaki i ngā mea kāore he take engari he whakaaro ki tōu ake ngākau. Kua kore ahau e mahi i tēnā, ā, kāore au e uru ki ngā āhuatanga tautohetohe. Ka noho atu ahau i tēnā kutukutu ināianei. "He hauora te mataku i ngā mea, i te nuinga o te wā kua kahakina koe. E mataku ana koe i ngā mea mō tētahi take, ā, ko te tikanga ko koe. Ināianei ka whakaaro roa ahau ki te whakauru i ahau ki ngā āhuatanga e mataku ana. Kei te mataku tonu ahau i te maha o ngā mea pēnei i ētahi atu. E mataku ana ahau i ngā tiketike, e mataku ana ki te rere, ā, kāore e taea e au te kauhoe!" Ko te pukapuka hou a Brian Keenan "I'll Tell Me Ma" i whakaputaina e Jonathan Cape.

title: Ka tae te hau ki te 62mph i ētahi wāhi o UK i te wā i tukuna he whakatūpato hou
summary: I tae atu te tere o te hau ki te 62mph i muri i tētahi wāhi pēhanga iti i puta ai te hau kaha puta noa i te UK i te Mane.
text: Kua tukuna e te Tari Tūtaki tētahi whakatūpato huarere kōwhai "kia mōhio" mō te hau i ētahi wāhi o Uēra me te tonga-hauauru o Ingarangi, kua whakarewaina mai i taua wā. Ināianei kei te whakaritea ngā whakatūpato kōwhai hou mō te marangai me te hau mō ētahi wāhi mai i te ahiahi o te Tūrei ki te ata o te Wenerei. I kī te Tari Tūtaki "tērā pea ka roa ake ngā wā haere mā te huarahi, te rēra me te hau". E tūmanakohia ana he marangai taumaha i te Tūrei puta noa i Aiarangi ki te Raki me te tonga o Pākehā, tērā pea ka waipuke. Ko ngā hau kaha me ngā hau 55-65mph e āhua ana hoki "ka nui haere te tūponotanga" i te pō Tūrei ki te ata o te Wenerei, e kī ana te Tari Tūtaki. E tūmanakohia ana kia pā rātau ki te raki o Ingarangi, te Midlands, Yorkshire me Humber, tae atu ki te tonga-hauauru o Pākehā, Aiarangi ki te Raki me Weera. E whakaahuatia ana tētahi whakatūpato kōwhai hei tohu me "whakarite ki mua" te tangata mō te huarere kino me te aro atu ki ngā tauākī Tari Tūtaki.

title: Ka āraia e te Hāhi o Ingarangi te haupae mārena tāne a Jeremy Pemberton
summary: Kua kī te Hāhi o Ingarangi e kore e uru atu ki te kēhi o te minita tuatahi o Ingarangi ki te mārena.
text: I muri i te hui i Aperira, ka whakakorea e Jeremy Pemberton tana whakaaetanga ki te mahi hei tohunga i Rātata. Nā tēnei i puta ai te tukunga o tētahi karakia me te NHS - ahakoa kei te pupuri tonu ia i tētahi raihana, ā, he rite tonu tana mahi i Lincolnshire. I kī te hāhi, e kore nei e whakaae ki te mārena tāne, ko ia pihopatanga te kawenga mo ana ake whakataunga. I whakakorea e te Pīhopa Whakahaere mō Southwell me Nottingham, te Reverend Matau o Richard Inwood, te whakaaetanga a Tāne Pemberton ki te whakahaere hei tohunga i Hune. I whakaūngia i te mutunga wiki he tono hei kaiwhakahaere pouri me te kaitiaki mō ngā Hōhipera o Sherwood Forest NHS Foundation Trust. I kī a Karen Fisher, te kaiwhakahaere nui o ngā rauemi tangata mō te whakawhirinaki: "Ko te tono mahi a Jeremy Pemberton i raro i tētahi raihana kua whakaaetia mai i te Hāhi o Ingarangi me te whakamanatanga mai i te Pīhopa takiwā o Rāhui me Southwell. " Kāore i tukuna tēnei raihana, ā, kua unuhia e te whakawhirinaki te tāpaetanga mahi." I kī a Tēnā Pemberton i "tino matekiri" a ia i taua āhuatanga, ā, i whakamāramatia he "maiorooro" te āhua o te hāhi, i te mea i whakaaetia tonutia ia ki te mahi i Te Hāhi. Engari i kī tētahi kaikōrero mo te Kaunihera o te Pīhopa Pīhopa e kore e kōrero mō ia whakataunga i mahia e te pihopatanga. I tāpiri mai rātau: "Ko te Hāhi o Ingarangi e 42 ngā pihopatanga. " He motuhake ia pihopatanga me te pīhopa diocesan e whakahaere ana, e ārahi ana i tana mahi me tana mahi." I kī te Reverend Colin Coward, te kaiwhakahaere o Changing Attitude, he rōpū e whakahau ana mō ngā motika LGBT i roto i te Hāhi o Ingarangi: "He hauora, he kore e taea te whakaae ki tēnei mahinga o Jeremy. " Ko ngā huarahi rerekē e rua i whakamahia ai ia e te pihopatanga e rua e whakaatu ana i te wehenga hōhonu i roto i te kaunihera pīhopa, ā, ki te waiho tonu te hāhi i tēnei, ka whakapataritari i te riri anō, he nui kē te nui."

title: E whakanui ana a Bernardine Evaristo i ngā kaituhi pango i ngā whare pukapuka o Bristol
summary: Ko tētahi toa o te Paraihe Pukapuka nāna i kōwhiri ōna kaituhi pango pango e 20 o runga, kei roto i tētahi kaupapa e kite ai i ngā mahi a rātou e wātea ana i roto i ngā puna.
text: I whakaputaina e Bernardine Evaristo te rārangi o ngā kaituhi hei tohu i te Rā Wahine Ao Whānui, ā, ka wātea ngā pukapuka a ngā kaituhi i ngā whare pukapuka o Bristol. I whakaritea e ngā Kupu Tae te aronui i roto i tētahi tono kia whakaawe i ētahi atu tāngata BAME kia mahi tuhituhi hei mahi. Ka whakaaturia ngā pukapuka ki te Whare Pukapuka Matua o Bristol tae noa ki te 31 o Poutū. 'Hapori auaha tupu' I kī a Joy Francis, mai i ngā Kupu Tae o Bristol, e hiahia ana te rōpū kia "neke atu i tētahi arotahi ā-Rāwāhi" me te tūmanako ka whakahauhautia e te hākaritanga o ngā kaituhi wahine BAME me ngā kaituhi ā-rua i te taone nui ake ngā tāngata kia whakaaro ki te tuhituhi. Ka kī a ia: "Kāore i te pai te ariā kāore ngā tāngata tae e hoko pukapuka, pānui rānei, ā, kāore i te pai te āhua o ngā kaituhi pango. " He taonga tuku iho a Bristol me tētahi hapori auaha, toi hoki, ā, e hiahia ana mātou ki te whakahauhau i tēnā. "Ka uru ngā kainoho me ngā rangatahi o Bristol ki ngā pukapuka mō te koreutu, he tino pai." I kī a Miss Evaristo, ko ia te kaituhi wahine pango tuatahi i toa i te Whakawhiwhinga Pukapuka i tana tiritiri ki a Margaret Attwood i te tau 2019, e hiahia ana hoki ia ki te whakauru ki ngā kaipānui o te taone mā te kaupapa. "He hītori hira tā Bristol mo te whanaungatanga iwi, nā reira he taone whakamere tonu mōku," tana kī.

title: I whakahaua e te toa kawhe o Plympton kia mutu te takahi i ngā ture raka
summary: Kua whainatia te rangatira o tētahi toa kawhe i whakaae ai ngā kiritaki ki te kai i te rā tuatahi o ngā ture raka hou.
text: I hoatu ki a Finla Coffee i Plympton, tata ki Plymouth, he pānui whiu pūmau e te kaunihera paetata e £200 i muri i te kitenga o ngā tāngata i roto. Ko te tikanga o ngā rāhuitanga raka, me kati ngā wharekai i tua atu i te tuku kai me te inu, pāwhiri me te kohikohi, te taraiwa, te tuku rānei. Kua tukuna hoki e te Kaunihera Taone o Plymouth tētahi pānui rāhui ki te wāhi. E kī ana tēnei "me mutu te hoko kai, inu rānei hei whakapaunga i runga i ngā kāinga, tae atu ki te noho i waho. " He hara te rahunga ki te whakaū, ā, ka whiua e te whaina i te kōti o nga kaiwhakawa". Kua tukuna te whaina £200 hei pānui whiu pūmau ka taea te tārua me ngā pakaru whai muri tae atu ki te mōrahi o te £6,400. I kī te kaipakihi o te rohe, a Julia Gray: "E tautoko ana ahau i a rātau 100%, e whawhai ana ēnei tāngata kia ora pēnei i a tātau katoa. " He aha te hē o te noho i roto i te wharekai ina neke atu i te rua mita te tawhiti atu i te katoa? "Ki te puta rātau i te umanga, ko ā rātou kaimahi hoki." I kī tētahi atu wahine, e hiahia ana kia whakaingoatia: "Ehara rātau anake i te mea me kati, nā reira me haere tahi rātau. " Ka tautokona e mātau ngā tāngata huri noa i konei, engari kai te mau rātau i te mickey. "Ko ngā pakeke e māharahara ana ahau." Ka kī tētahi tangata paetata: "I a rātau e haumaru ana, kāore au i te tino kite i tētahi raruraru." Kāore he tangata o te wharekai i wātea mō te kōrero. He pēhea tō pānga ki te coronavirus? He aha te tikanga o te raka ki a koe? Tiria ō wheako mā te īmēra haveyoursay@bbc.co.uk. Tēnā whakaurua he tau hoapā mēnā e hiahia ana koe ki te kōrero ki tētahi kaipānui o TE HAU. Ka taea hoki e koe te whakapā atu mā ngā huarahi e whai ake nei: Mēnā kei te pānui koe i tēnei whārangi, ā, kāore koe e kite i te puka, me toro koe ki te putanga pūkoro o te paetukutuku o TE AO ki te tuku i tō pātai, tākupu rānei, ka taea rānei e koe te īmēra mai ki a mātou i HaveYourSay@bbc.co.uk. Please include your name, age and location with any submission.

title: Ka whakatū te whakakorenga o te tereina i ngā kaiomaoma hāwhe o Hastings
summary: Kua karangatia e nga kaiwhakahaere o tētahi hāwhe tauomaoma o te takutai ki te tonga he uiui i muri i te 200 o nga kaiomaoma i Rāwāhi i te wā i whakararurarutia nga tereina.
text: I whakakorea ngā tereina nā te tiki i ngā kaioma ki te takahanga o te Rātapu i Hastings mai i Charing Cross, ā, ka nekehia ngā whakaurunga ki London Bridge i hapa i ngā tūhononga. "Me pēhea e taea ai e rātau tēnei ki te iwi?" te kī a te kaiwhakahaere rēhi o Erika Hardwick. I kī te Southeastern ko te raruraru nā te mahi pūkaha ohorere i waenganui i Charing Cross me London Bridge. Neke atu i te 3,500 ngā tāngata i oma i te hāwhe tauomaoma 28 kia tū ki te taone o Te Rāwhiti o Sussex. "Ko tētahi o ngā rā tino pai rawa atu i a mātau," te kī a Tēnā Hardwick. "Ko te mea anake i whakapoke ko te iwi kāore i taea te haere i te rā. " He rīpeka ahau, engari ehara i te rīpeka pērā i nga kaiomaoma. Koinei ngā tāngata e tino whakautu ana te Rerewhenua o te Tonga-ā-Tonga. "Me tino uiui mō taua mea." 'Whakamahere i mua' I kī a Tēnā Hardwick kua mahi tahi ngā kaiwhakahaere o te hāwhe omaoma me ngā tohutūmahi tereina i roto i ngā tau maha kia tino mōhio ai ka taea e ngā kaiomaoma te tae ki Hastings i te wā mō te rēhi. "I te nuinga o te wā ka whakaritea e mātou kia kaua ngā mahi pūkaha e tū i roto i te rua tau i mua kia kore ai tēnei raruraru e puta," tana kī. I kī te Southeastern i mahia te mahi pūkaha ohorere e Network Rail. "E pouri ana mātou ... kāore ētahi kaiomaoma i tae ki te hāwhe marathon o Hastings. Ka mōhio mātau he tino whakakino ki a rātau," tana kī. "Every year we add extra carriages to our trains to accommodate the runners. " I tere tonu te mahi a Network Rail ki te whakatika i ngā riu, engari kāore anō kia tae noa ki te 10am ka homai e rātou te mārama katoa ki te whakahaere i tētahi ratonga tereina. "Ko te tangata i takaware tōna haerenga, neke atu i te hawhe haora, ka taea te tono utu takaware ki te utu."

title: He aha te mahi a nga kaiahuwhenua o Amerika mo te mahi hokohoko a Te Puhi
summary: Kua kōrerotia e Perehitini Trump tana whakaaetanga hokohoko hou a US-Haina hei painga mō ngā kaiahuwhenua o Amerika, kua pāngia nei i raro i tētahi tohutohu utu e tata ana ki te rua tau ki Pēhi. Engari he aha to rātau whakaaro?
text: Nā Holly HonderichBBC News, E kī ana tētahi whakarāpopototanga o te whakaaetanga hōu ināianei ka "tohe" a Beijing ki te hoko i tētahi atu $5bn (£3.8bn) o ngā hua ahuwhenua o Amerika i roto i ngā tau e rua e whai ake nei. "Mā tēnā e hua ai te rangatiratanga nui ake mō ngā kaiahuwhenua puta noa i te whenua," te kī a Tēnā Puhi i a ia e haina ana i te whakaaetanga. Engari ko nga kaiahuwhenua i Wisconsin - ko te āhua tārere e whakakake ana ko te Miraka Wai o Amerika - e noho rangirua tonu ana. A, i te wā e rapu ana te perehitini i te pōtitanga anō, tērā pea ka whai take. I te tau 2016, i whīwhiwhi a Tēnā Puhi i te āhua mā te tawhē 0.8%, ka noho ko ia te Pākehā tuatahi hei mahi pēnā mai i te tau 1984. I Wisconsin, he mea noa iho te wikitōria mata heu pērā. I roto i te toru o ngā pōti perehitini e rima kua hipa, he iti iho i te kotahi ōrau te wikitōria i Wisconsin. I te tau 2000, e 6,000 ngā pōti i hangaia ai tēnei tawhē, i te tau 2004 tata ki te 13,000. Tata ki te 11% o te pōti i Wisconsin, e kī ana a Charles Franklin, ko te kaiwhakahaere o te poipoi ārahi o te kāwanatanga i te Kura Ture o Marquette. "He kōwae tōtika rātau," te kī a Tēnā Franklin. Engari ahakoa he kōti tōtika "tērā pea ka āhei ki te tohu i tētahi pōti kotahi". He pēhea hoki te whakaaro o nga kaiahuwhenua mo te wā heke? 'He mate pōturi' "I ia tau ka ngaro i a koe ētahi pāmu, i ia tau ka ngaro i a koe ētahi kaiahuwhenua kāore e hiahia ana ki te mahi tonu i tēnei," te kī a Will Hsu, te perehitini o Hsu Ginseng, he pāmu ginseng i te Takiwā o Marathon o Wisconsin. He pono te rohe ki te Pākehā - i haere te Takiwā o Marathon mō te Tūruhi i runga i a Kikorangi mā tētahi tawhē ira 18 i te tau 2016 - ā, ko te kāinga ki neke atu i te 95% o te ginseng o Te Hononga o Amerika, tata tonu ki te katoa o ēnei e tukuna ana ki Haina. I ngā tau kotahi rau e waru tekau mā iwa rau, e 1,000 ngā kaiahuwhenua ginseng i Wisconsin, e kī ana a Tēnā Hsu, neke atu i te 2m lbs ginseng. "Tata tonu ki te 180 ngā kaiahuwhenua e toe ana," tana kī. "He mate mā te mano tapahi." He mahi uaua. E toru ki te rima tau te roa o te ginseng kia tae ki te pakeketanga, ā, kāore e taea te pāmu i runga i te whenua kotahi e rua ngā wā. Ā, kua uaua ake i te pakanga hokohoko, e kī ana a Tēnā Hsu, nāna i pana ngā utu mai i te 8% ki te 38%, he mea whiu mō ngā kaiahuwhenua e whakawhirinaki ana ki ngā kiritaki Hainamana kia ora ai rātou. He tokomaha nga kaiahuwhenua e mau ana i nga utu - e whakaheke ana i nga utu hai whakawātea i te tāke tāpiri. Ehara i te tino whakararuraru, e kī ana a ia, engari kei te hanga te pēhanga o nga kaiahuwhenua. "He mate pōturi," tana kī. Na te whakahē a Hsu i te pakanga hokohoko a te perehitini i whakaara tukemata mai i ētahi o tōna hapori, e kī ana a ia. "E rongo ana ahau i te tokomaha o ngā kaiahuwhenua e kī ana he iti rawa taku kōrero ki ngā kaupapa here a Te Puhi, me tautoko ahau i a ia." Engari ahakoa ka tautoko a Hsu i te ariā o te Puhi, "tērā anō te wāhi tūturu o ahau," tana kī. A, "ko te tikanga, kei te mamae te katoa me a mātau pūkoro." 'Ko ngā kaiahuwhenua ngā pawns i ngā wā katoa' I tipu ake a Hoera Greeno, e 52, i runga i tētahi pāmu miraka kau i Monroe County i te uru o Wisconsin. I "tino whakaarohia" ka haere tonu a ia i te tikanga a te whānau, e kī ana a ia. I te tau 1990, ka hokona e ia tētahi pāmu miraka kau 160 eka me ōna kau e 48 ake. Engari i muri i te rua tekau tau o te umanga, i te titiro atu ki te ngaromanga o te ohaoha, ka whakahaua ia ki te hoko. "He tino whakamamae," tana kī. Ki a Tēnā Greeno, e pāmu ana ināianei i ngā manga i tua atu i ngā pō i te wheketere cranberry Ocean Spray o Wisconsin, kua tāpiritia e te pakanga hokohoko a Tēnā Puhi te hauā ki tētahi umanga ngoikore kē. Mō ngā tau, kua ārahi a Wisconsin i a Mātau i roto i ngā pokapū pāmu. I te tau 2019, i ngaro i te kāwanatanga tētahi i roto i te 10 o ana pāmu miraka kau, e tohu ana i te hekenga nui rawa atu i runga i te pūkete. Neke atu i te 50% i te tau 2019, ā, i whakaarohia e te Kaunihera Kaweake Miraka o Amerika i tērā tau ka pau pea ngā utu utu mai i Haina ki ngā kaiahuwhenua miraka kau o Amerika e $12.2bn ki te noho tonu. "Ka mamae noa iho mātau i ngā utu," tana kī. "Kāore he tukanga whakaaro." Ka haere tonu a ia: "Kua tāhaetia a mātau mahi, kua tāhaetia o mātau oranga, kua pakaru o mātau whānau, ā, nā te mea he kaipōrangapū tātau e tino mōhio ana ki te pono o te mahi pāmu." "Ko nga kaiahuwhenua tonu te pawns." 'Ray of hope' "We've dealt with declining prices before, but it hasn't lasted this long before," Katy Schultz says as she walks through the barn at Tri-Fecta farms, the 400-cow dairy farm she owns with her two siblings just outside of Fox Lake. I tāpiritia e te pakanga hokohoko a US-Haina te "muhani ki te whara" i roto i tētahi wā uaua mō ngā kaiahuwhenua, e kī ana a ia. "Ehara kē i te wā tino pai, ehara i te utu nui." "E kore au e koti huka i tērā... I uaua mātau. I pākaha mātau ki te katoa." I ngā wiki i mua i te hainatanga o te whakaaetanga, i kōrero ngā tāngata o tōna hapori mō ngā āheinga o tētahi mahi hou. Ki ētahi, nā ngā kī taurangi a Tēnā Puhi i hoatu ki a rātau he "hihi tūmanako" kia whakairi i roto i ngā āhuatanga uaua. Kotahi noa iho te tatau i tua atu i te 2,000 eka, e whakamanamana ana tētahi hoa noho tata i tētahi pou haki pourewa i runga i te pātītī o mua, e rākaitia ana ki tētahi haki nui o te Tūruhi 2020. Ehara i te mea ohorere i Dodge County - i haere ki a Trump i te tau 2016 ma te tawhē 30 piro. Kāore a Ms Schultz e kī ko wai i pōti ai ia, e whakaatu ana i ōna tuakana i "wehewehea" i te pouaka pōti. "Kāore au i te māharahara mēnā he Democrat rātou, he Pākehā rānei. E hiahia ana ahau ki te mōhio kei te hoe rātau i te poti kotahi anō ahau," te kī a Ms Schultz. Engari tērā ētahi mea kua mahia e te perehitini "kāore e taea e koe te whakakāhore", pēnei i te pāpātanga kore mahi iti rawa. "Ko [te mahi] te whakautu ki ngā mea katoa? Kāore pea," tana kī. Engari, "Ki taku whakaaro he tūmanako ināianei."

title: Tākaro tereina o Wīwī: 'I tino rite te whakaeke'
summary: I tērā wiki, i whakaritea kētia, e ai ki tētahi rōia Wīwī, he whakaekenga a tētahi tangata patu nui i runga i tētahi tereina i Wīwī i tērā wiki.
text: E 270 ngā matā e mau ana a Ayoub El-Khazzani, e 25, mo tana raiwhara whakaeke me te pounamu penehīni, ka kī atu te rōia o Te Rūnanga Molins ki nga kaipānui i te Tūtira. I whakaaturia e te waea a te Maroko kua mātakitaki a ia i tētahi ataata toa i mua i te whakarewatanga o te whakaekenga, ka tāpiritia e Tēnā Molins. Ināianei kua whakaputaina e nga rōia he utu tika ki a ia. E whakapaea ana a Tēnā Kēzzani ki te mahi i tētahi whakaekenga toa "kua ūngaia, kua whakaritea kētia". E whakapaea ana hoki a ia ki ngā hara patu me te "whai wāhi ki tētahi pāhonotanga pūtohu me tētahi tirohanga ki te whakarite i tētahi, i ētahi rānei o ngā hara whakakino," e ai ki ngā tuhinga a nga rōia i whakahuatia e te wāhi rongokōrero o TE WĀ. I whakakahatia a ia e ngā pāhihi i runga i te tereina tere o Thalys mai i Tūtukupu ki Parihi i te Paraire. Kaore he tangata i mate. Tokotoru ngā Kaiāwhina me tētahi Pirihitini i whakawhiwhia ki a rātau he mētara mo to rātau toa. Ka hoatu hoki he tohu ki tētahi Wīwī whānau o Amerika, a Mark Magoolian, me tētahi atu Wīwī kāore i whakaingoatia ā muri ake nei mo te ngana ki te rutu i te kaipupuri. Kōtaha: Ko te tākaro tereina o Ayoub El-Khazzani Wīwī: Ko tā mātou e mōhio ana "Kua mātakitaki a Ayoub El-Khazzani i ngā kōnae ororongo YouTube i a ia e noho kē ana i runga i te tereina Thalys i karangatia ai e tētahi tangata te hunga pono ki te whawhai me te mau ringa i runga i te ingoa o te Poropiti [Muhammad]," te kī a Tēnā Molins ki tētahi hui rongokōrero. I kī a ia kua whakatuwheratia tētahi tūhuratanga pūtohu tika, kātahi anō ka tukuna e ētahi atu mana Pākehā ngā mōhiohio mō ngā haerenga me ngā hononga a te hunga pōhēhē ki te Islam tohetohe. I kī a Tēnā Molins i "mōhiotia a Tēnā Kēzzani mō tōna whakatoi" ā, kātahi anō ka haere ki Tāke - "he ara tērā pea ki Hiria". E kiia ana kua whakakāhore te kaipōhēhē i te whakatakoto i tētahi kōkiri pūtohu, e kī ana i kitea e ia he pēke rākau i te pō i mua, ā, ka whakaaro ia ki te whakamahi hei whānako i ngā pāhihi. Engari i kī te rōia kua iti iho, kua iti iho te mārama o te whakamāramatanga a Tēnā Kēzzani i te wā o te pātai, ā, kātahi anō ka mutu tana kōrero ki ngā kaihopu. Tātaritanga: Ko te mea tino nui i akona e mātau mai i te hui rongokōrero a te rōia o Parihi, ko Ayoub El-Khazzani i pūhia e ia mo tana whakaekenga ki tētahi ataata whakatūpato toa. He whakaaturanga tino nui tēnei i whakatūpato ai te tari rōia kia haere tonu ki ngā whakapae e pā ana ki te pūtohu. Kua ngana a El-Khazzani ki te tautohe he tino hara ana whakahau, engari kaore ana kaiuiui e whakapono ki tētahi kupu. Ko ērā atu whakaaturanga ko ōna hononga pūhāhā o mua i Paniora; te rahi o ana pupuhi; me ana whakamāramatanga kāore i te mōhiotia i raro i te pātai mō te kimi i ngā rākau i roto i tētahi pāka. I te rā o te whakaekenga, kua whakahohea te waea a Tēnā Kēzzani, i kitea i roto i tētahi pēke i runga i te tereina, i te rā o te whakaekenga, ka kī a Tēnā Molins. I eke a ia ki te tereina o Tūtukupu-Parihi i Pōroa, ā, ka kī ngā kaihoko tīkiti i te teihana i utua e ia tētahi tīkiti karaehe tuatahi i te moni, a, ka whakakāhoretia tētahi tereina tōmua. I kī a Tēnā Molins he tohu tēnei kua āta kōwhiria te ūnga. Tae atu ki te raiwhara whakaeke a Kalashnikov, ngā otira, me te penehīni, i mauria hoki e ia he pū Luger me tētahi kaitapahi pouaka, e ai ki te rōia. E kī ana ngā āpiha nō Tetouan i te raki o Moroko. I te tau 2007, ka noho a ia ki Paniora i te tau 2007, a, e whitu tau i noho ai ia, i Madrid me Algeciras, i mua i tana neke ki Wīwī, kātahi ko Peretiama. I Paniora, e kiia ana kua aro atu a ia ki nga mana mo te mahi kōrero e tiaki ana i nga toa toa me te haere ki tētahi wharenui toitū i Algeciras. I whakaritea hoki a ia ki te hokohoko rongoā. Ka kī atu a Tēnā Kēzani ki nga pirihimana i noho tōraro a ia i Peretiama i mua i te whakaekenga, engari e whakapono ana ngā kaihoko e noho ana a ia me tōna tuahine i Pōroa. I rapua e nga pirihimana o te taone e rua nga whare i te takiwā o Molenbeek-Saint-Jean i te Mane i noho ai pea a Tēnā Khazzani. I kī tētahi kōrero mai i te Tari Rōia a te Hautahi o Perehiana, kāore he tangata i herea, engari "ētahi ahanoa" i hopukina hei whakamātautau anō. Kāore he taipitopito anō i hoatu.

title: Te matenga o Janet Muller: Ko te wahine i patua 'i hiahia ki te wehe i te whare hauora'
summary: Ko tētahi wahine i ngaro i tētahi hōhipera hauora hinengaro i mua i tana kitenga kua mate i roto i tētahi motokā tahuna, i "tino hiahia ki te tuku", kua rongo tētahi uiuinga.
text: I kitea te motu o Tiamana o Janet Muller, e 21, i roto i te whakaara o tētahi motokā tata ki Horsham i Mati 2015 i muri i tana ngaro i te Hōhipera o Mill View, Hove. I kōrero ngā kaimahi o Sussex NHS ki te uiuinga me pēhea tana "haere AWOL" i mua i tana matenga. I tērā tau, i hereheretia a Christopher Jeffrey-Shaw, mai i Beckenham, London, mo tana parekura. I kī atu a Dr Alexandra Joy, mai i Sussex NHS Partnership Trust, ki te whakarongo i Crawley kua whakaaetia ōpakitia a Miss Muller i muri i te māharahara o tōna whānau ki a ia nā te mea i kī a ia e hiahia ana ia ki te mate. I whakaahuatia e ia te whanonga o Miss Muller he "manic and disconnected" me te kī kei te whiwhi rongoā me ngā taki auau. I kī a ia kāore a ia i mōhio kua mahue i a Miss Muller te whare hauora, ā, i muri iho ka rongo mō tōna matenga. I kī te nēhi hauora hinengaro a Piripi Lamble i "tino hiahia a Miss Muller kia tukua" i te 11 o Poutāpeta, kia taea ai e ia te tīmata anō i tana akoranga whare wānanga. I kī a ia e hīkoi ana a ia i nga pānui me tētahi pēke e kī ana e hiahia ana a ia ki te haere, ā, ki te kore ia e whakaaetia kia haere ka whakamate ia i a ia anō, i muri iho ka tono ia kia arotakea ia. I rongo te hūri uiui i tata tonu te whakawhiti a Miss Muller ki tētahi whare i Eastbourne kia tata atu ki tōna tuahine me ōna hoa, engari kāore i taea e ia, he whakataunga i mahue i a ia te "matekiri, i te pōrearea". I pānuitia e ia ngā tuhipoka mai i te 12 o Poutāpeta i te ngarotanga o Miss Muller. I rongo te uiui i kitea ia e tētahi kaiahuwhenua, a, ka whakahokia mai ki te rūma, ka hoatu he rongoā me te okiokinga, engari i taua pō ka whakaūngia e tētahi atu tūroro kua piki a ia ki runga i te pakitara. A tērā rā, ka kitea te tinana o Miss Muller i roto i te waka tata ki Ifield Golf Club. I kī a Tēnā Lamble mai i taua wā kua tātaritia e te whakawhirinaki te maha o ngā mahi whakawātea, ā, ināianei he taiapa 15ft tā te hōhipera, kaua he pakitara me tētahi pūnaha tomokanga me te putanga atu. I kī a ia e whakapono ana a ia ināianei ko tētahi o ngā wāhi tuwhera "tino haumaru". Ka haere tonu te whakarongo.

title: I 'whakahaua' te Kaunihera Taone o Newcastle ki te pāhuahua i ngā moni ora
summary: E kī ana tētahi kaunihera ki te raki o Ingarangi e whakahau ana ngā utu pūtea a te kāwanatanga ki te whakamahi i te pūtea kua tohua mō ngā tangata mōrearea.
text: Kei te whakamahi te Kaunihera Taone o Newcastle i ngā moni i mua i te taiapa mō ngā moni ora me ngā moni mōrearea i ētahi atu ratonga o mua, e kī ana. I kī te kaiārahi tuarua o te kaunihera Mahi, a Joyce McCarty, e anga ana ki "ngā kōwhiringa tino uaua". I kī te kāwanatanga ko ngā kaunihera paetata e tino pai ana ki te whakatau i ngā manakē. E tono ana kia tapahia tētahi atu £12bn mai i tana tahua ora ā-tau. I te tau 2013/14, i tukua te pūtea mō ngā pūtea ora me ngā moni mōrearea ki te mana paetata. I tangohia te taiapa mowhiti mai i te 2015/16, ā, ināianei ka haere te moni ki roto i te tahua matua o te kaunihera. I kī te mana kāore e taea te whakarite i ngā moni whakahaere i runga i ōna here ā-ture, ā, ka taea anake te tohatoha i te £120,000, i whakaritea ki te £229,000 o tērā tau, mō ngā utu ora ohorere. I whakahaua kia "mahi i ētahi kōwhiringa tino uaua i waenganui i te whakarato ratonga raina mua me te tuku i tēnei taumata tautoko" ki ngā tangata rawakore, te kī a Ms McCarty. The Tees Valley Community Foundation, a private charity which helps support those in need, said it expected more requests for help as a result. I kī te rangatira nui o Hugh McGouran e tūmanako ana ia kia kite i "te pikinga tere" o te tono. "Tekau mā rua miriona te whika whakainu whatu," tana kī. "Tērā ētahi tapahi nui, ā, e whakaaro ana ahau ka tīmata te tangata ki te huri nui ake ki ngā aroha ki te ngana ki te mono i taua āputa." I kī te kāwanatanga kua "kore e ūkuia, ā, kāore i taea te āwhina i te hunga e tino matea ana". "Local authorities now choose how best to support local welfare needs," a Department for Communities and Local Government spokesman said. Kua hoatu he moni tāpiri hei āwhina i ngā mana e mahi ana i ngā pēhanga i runga i te oranga o te rohe me te hauora me te tiaki pāpori, ka kī a ia. Ngā Hononga Ipurangi Pātahi Newcastle City Council DCLG

title: Kua whakatārewatia ngā arotakenga a Prince Andrew Pizza Express Woking
summary: Kua whakatārewatia e TripAdvisor ngā arotakenga mō te wharekai Pizza Express i tohutorotia e Pirini Anaru i te wā o tana uiuinga mō ōna hononga ki a Jeffrey Epstein.
text: I te wā o te uiuinga i te Newsnight o BBC, ka whakakāhore te Piriniha i te moe me Virginia Giuffre, 17 tau i taua wā. I kī kē a ia i pau te rā e pātai ana ki a Pirinihi Beatrice i te wharekai Pizza Express i Woking. I kī tētahi kaikōrero o TripAdvisor nā te aro atu o te pāpāho o mua tata nei i puta ai te taraiwa i roto i ngā arotakenga tinihanga. Te āhua nei kua mukua ngā arotakenga o te wharekai i muri i te uiuinga, ā, kotahi wiki ki mua. I kī tētahi kaiwhakaatu mō te paetukutuku: "Nā te aro atu o te pāpāho o nā noa nei i puta ai te taraiwa o ngā tukunga arotake tinihanga kāore i tutuki i ā mātou tohutohu... ā, kua whakatau mātou kia whakatārewatia rangitahitia te hautū i ngā arotakenga hōu i te whārangi rārangi TripAdvisor o te wharekai." I a ia e kōrero ana ki a Emily Maitlis o TE HAU, ka whakakāhore a Pirini Anaru i moe a ia ki a Ms Giuffre, tētahi o ngā tūpāpaku a Epstein, i ngā wā motuhake e toru, e kī ana kāore tētahi tūtakinga i te 10 o Mati 2001 i puta i a ia e noho ana i te rā me tana tamāhine. Ka kī a ia: "I a au i ngā tamariki, ā, i mauria e au a Beatrice ki tētahi Pizza Express i Woking mō tētahi hākari i, e whakaaro ana ahau, he 4pm, he 5pm rānei i te ahiahi." I te pātaitanga he aha ia i maumahara ai ki tētahi kai i Pizza Express 18 tau i muri iho, ka kī a ia: "Nā te mea he mea rerekē ki a au te haere ki Pizza Express i Woking, he mea tino rerekē māku e mahi." I roto i ngā meneti o tana whakamārama, ka waipuketia a TripAdvisor me Google i ngā arotakenga kōrero. Whāia a BBC South East i Facebook, i Twitter, i Instagram hoki. Tukua ō whakaaro pūrākau ki southeasttoday@bbc.co.uk.

title: Ka kati te āwangawanga o te horo whenua i te ara o te takutai o Portland ki Blacknor
summary: Kua katia rangitahitia tētahi wāhanga o te ara moana i Dorset nā te tuma o te horo whenua, i muri i te marangai taumaha o nā noa nei.
text: I kī te Kaunihera o te Takiwā o Dorset he "whakaaturanga o te nekehanga horo whenua" i runga i te ara i waenganui i Tout me Blacknor i Tauranga. I pūrongotia hoki e te mana te takanga toka i raro iho i te piriti ki te raki o Blacknor. Ka nekehia atu te ara ki te whenua mai i te Paraire. 'He marangai tino nui' E whai ana te whakataunga i te maha o ngā horo whenua me ngā horo paru i te takiwā, tae atu ki tētahi i Lyme Regis i Tīma i mahue ai tētahi chalet one e tārewa ana i te tapa o te pari. I kī tētahi kaikōrero mō te tīma rangers moana o te kaunihera: "Kua whakaaturia e te wheako he pōturi, he māia hoki ēnei horo whenua, engari he mārama tonu ka taea hoki te tiango tere, ohorere hoki, i muri iho i taua marangai tino nui." I mate a Charlotte Blackman, e 22, mai i Heanor, i Te 24 o Hōngongoi i muri i te pari teitei 160ft (49m) i runga ake i a ia i te ngahoro ki Hive Beach tata ki Te Moana o Te Aotearoa. Tokorima nga tāngata i mawhiti i muri i te horo whenua i te 8 o Aotearoa i waenganui i Charmouth me Golden Cap. I kī te kaunihera o te rohe ka katia te ara i waenganui i Tout me Blacknor mō "ngā marama tata nei", i te wā e mahia ana te aroturuki me te tapi. Kua katia hoki te ara takutai i waenganui i Burton Freshwater me Hive Beach i tēnei wā, ā, kei te nekehia ki te whenua.

title: Kia pōtitia ngā atekōkiri o Tyne me Wear Metro i runga i te taraiwa
summary: Ko ngā atekōkiri i runga i te whatunga Tyne me Wear Metro me pōti mō ngā tuki hei whakahē i tētahi pū utu 1% i whakaritea e te kāwanatanga, kua kī ngā rangatira uniana.
text: I kī te uniana o te Rail, Maritime and Transport (TT) i whakaakona ōna mema e 250 hei kaimahi kāwanatanga paetata, ā, i mau i roto i te "tāwhiti" o te pū utu. I kī te hēkeretari ahuwhānui o Mick Cash i ngā mema i te wāhi i "rite ai rātau ki te whawhai mo te tika". I kī te Kaiwhakahaere Nexus i whakaritea ngā kōrero i runga i te tūmanako kia āraia tētahi mahi. 'Mahi tika' i kī a Tēnā Moni: "Mā te utunga utu [hokohoko] e haere ana i te 4% me kaua o tātau mema e whakahaua mā ngā tikanga whakawhāiti matua kia pā ki o rātau paerewa ora. " Te āhua nei he nui te moni e wātea ana i te kāwanatanga ina tiaki i ngā hoa i roto i ngā kamupene tereina tūmataiti me tua atu. "Kei te haere nga whakaritenga mo te pōti," tana tāpiri mai. I kī tētahi kaikōrero Nexus: "Kua kaha mātou ki te whakaae ki tētahi whakataunga utu e whakarato ana i tētahi mahi tika mō ngā kaimahi i roto i ngā tepe o te tautāwhi utu o te wāhanga tūmatanui e herea ai a Nexus. " Kei te kōrero tonu mātou ki te TT kia mārama me te whakatau i ngā take o ōna mema ki tā mātou tono kia kore ai e pōti mō te mahi mahi." I whakatuwheratia te pūnaha rēra māmā i te tau 1980, ā, e 60 ngā teihana e hāngai ana i Newcastle, Gateshead, North and South Tyneside me Sunderland.

title: Ka pana a IT i te TSB ki te ngaromanga
summary: I te tīmatanga o tēnei tau, kua pau te pēke i te pēke e £176.4m, e pana ana ki te ngaromanga hāwhe tau.
text: I Aperira, tata ki te rua miriona ngā kiritaki i ngaro te urunga ki ngā ratonga pūtea tuihono i muri i te whakaurunga o tētahi pūnaha IT hōu. E kī ana a TSB ko te 37% anake o ngā amuamu neke atu i te 130,000 kua whakatauria i tēnei wā, ā, kei te haere tonu ētahi take IT. I pūrongotia he ngaronga o te £107.4m i roto i ngā marama e ono ki te 30 o Pipiri i whakaritea ki te hua o te £108.3m i tērā tau. "E mōhio ana ahau ki te pōrearea o te tokomaha o ngā kiritaki i ngā mea i tūpono," te kī a te rangatira nui o TSB, a Paul Pester. "Kāore i whakaaetia, ehara hoki i te taumata ratonga e whakapehapeha ana mātou - ehara hoki i te mea i tūmanakohia e ā mātou kiritaki mai i TSB." Ka haere tonu ngā raruraru i kī te pēke, tae atu ki te 25 o Hōngongoi, e 135,403 ngā amuamu kua whakapūketetia, ā, neke atu i te 260 ngā tāngata e titiro ana ki a rātou. Ahakoa kua whakahokia te nuinga o ngā ratonga a TSB, ka noho tonu ngā take ki te pēke tuihono. Kāore e taea e ngā kiritaki te tono mō ngā hua pēke i te paetukutuku a TSB, te whakawhiti hua rānei mēnā kei a rātou tētahi mōkete TSB. "Kei te kaha mātou ki te whakahoki anō i tēnei, ā, kāore he kiritaki e mahue i te pūkoro," te kī a te kaikōrero. I kī te pēke, tata ki te 26,000 ngā kiritaki i kati i tā rātou pūkete TSB i te hauwhā tuarua o te tau. Heoi anō, i tāpiritia neke atu i te 20,000 ngā kiritaki i whakatuwhera i tētahi pūkete pēke hōu, i whakawhiti rānei i tā rātou pūkete ki TSB i taua wā kotahi. I te wehenga o TSB i te Rōpū Pākehā o Raiti, ka whakamahi tonu i te pūnaha rorohiko a Raiti i te wā i hangaia he mea hou. I Aperira, i mahia e ia tētahi hekenga raraunga kiritaki kua whakaritea, arā, ko te neke i ngā pūkete kiritaki mai i te pūnaha tawhito ki tētahi e whakahaeretia ana e tōna rangatira Pāniora hou, o Sabadell. Heoi anō, he maha ngā kiritaki i mahue i te nekehanga ki te mahi tauwhitinga me te kite i ō rātou toenga, me ngā raruraru e haere tonu ana mō ngā wiki maha. I puta mai a TSB i raro i te whakahēnga mura mō ngā hinganga IT, ā, ka karangatia e ngā MP o te Komiti Pūtea ki a Tēnā Pester kia whakarerea. Engari kua noho tonu a Tēnā Pester ki tōna tūranga, ā, ka kī atu a ia ki te wāhi rongokōrero o Kōrero i te Paraire e whakaaro ana ia kia noho ki te pēke. "Kei te arotahi ahau ki te 100% ki te whakatika i ngā mea mō ā mātou kiritaki," tana kī. I Hune, ka whakarewaina e te Mana Whanonga Pūtea tētahi tūhuratanga tika ki te whakarewatanga. Ko tōna rangatira nui, ko Andrew Bailey, i mahi i te hipanga rerekē o te whakawhānui i te rūpahu, "i tukuna te taumata o te painga tūmatanui". He nui rawa te ngaromanga o TSB ki te tō i te kamupene matua o TSB, te rōpū pēke Pāniora o Banco Sabadell, ki te whero. I pūrongotia he ngaronga o te €138.7m (£123m) i roto i ngā marama e toru ki te 30 o Hune, nā ngā utu i takea mai i ngā raruraru IT a TSB.

title: Ka whakakitea te āhua hou o Marischal Square mō te pokapū o te taone o Aberdeen
summary: Kua whakakitea ngā atahanga o te āhua hou i whakaritea mō te wāhi o te tari matua o te Kaunihera Taone o Aberdeen.
text: I kōwhiria a Muse Developments ki te tuku i te hanga hou e £107m o te takiwā o te Whare o Hato Nikora. Kei te haere tonu te mahi whakawāteatanga, ā, ko te whāinga kia oti te kaupapa - tae atu ki te whakawāteatanga o tētahi wāhanga o Broad Street - kia oti i te tau 2017. Kei te tāpaetia ngā mahere ā muri ake i tēnei marama. Kei roto i te kitenga ko ngā tari me ngā mokowā motokā e 250, ngā mokowā tūmatanui, tētahi hōtēra whetū whā moenga 125, me ngā wharekai. Ka kitea ngā mahere me ngā atahanga katoa o Marischal Square i te Taiwhanga Toi o Aberdeen i te Paraire me te Hātarei, kātahi i te wāhi kaiwhiwhi o te Kāreti o Marischal mai i te Mane tae noa ki te 17 o Āperira. I kī te kaiwhakahaere ā-rohe o Muse mō Pākehā, a Steve Turner: "Ko te kaupapa Marischal Square e whakatutuki ana i te kitenga o te mahere matua o Bon Accord o te taone mā te whakarato i tētahi tapawhā tūmatanui hou, e waihanga ana i tētahi tautuhinga tika mō te Kāreti o Marischal, tae atu ki te tuku i tētahi whanaketanga whakaranu hōu e mau ana ki te tūnga tika o Aberdeen hei tētahi o ngā ūnga pakihi ārahi o UK. " Kei Marischal Square te kaha ki te whai pānga mo te wā roa ki te ōhanga o te rohe, ā, he mea nui kia tika te whāranu o te tari me te mokowā arumoni hei whakapūmatua i ngā huarahi ka puta mai. "Ka whakakapia e mātou te whare o mua o St Nicholas House ki ngā whare tari hou me ngā whare arumoni e manaaki ana i te hītori granite o te taone, ā, kāore i neke atu i te whitu papa te teitei, ā, ko tērā anō tētahi mea e hiahia ana te iwi whānui ki te kite i te Tapawhā o Marischal." Deputy council leader Marie Boulton said: "The project has now reached a very exciting stage and I would encourage everyone who has a view on it to go along to the exhibition at the art gallery to see the plans, including the model of the scheme, for themselves. " Tērā anō tētahi wā hei tiro i ngā mōhiohio i te Kāreti o Marischal i muri i te mutunga wiki. "Ahakoa ōu whakaaro mō ngā tono o Marischal Square, ka whakahauhau ahau i te iwi whānui o Aberdeen kia whakamōhiotia." In 2011, more than 1,000 council staff vacated the 14-storey St Nicholas House building, erected in 1968, for the newly-refurbished Marischal College building.

title: Ka whiwhi te pire Spad a Jim Allister i te whakaaetanga ariki
summary: Kua whiwhi te ture e ārai ana i te tangata whai whakapae nui kia kaua e noho hei kaitohutohu tōrangapū motuhake i Stormont.
text: Nā Stephen WalkerBBC NI kaipānui tōrangapū Ko te tikanga o te ture hou, kāore e taea te whakatū hei kaitohutohu motuhake e tino whakapae ana i te hara. I whakatakotoria te pire e te kaiārahi TUV a Jim Allister i muri i te whakatūnga a Sinn Féin i a Mary McArdle hei kaitohutohu motuhake. I whakawāteatia a ia mo tana wāhi i roto i te kōhurutanga o Meri Travers. I whakarewaina e te tuahine o Ms Travers, a Ann, tētahi whakahau i whakaawe i te pire. I muri iho ka nekehia a Ms McArdle i tōna tūranga hei kaitohutohu ki te Minita Ahurea o Carál Ni Chuilin. I raro i te ture, ka whakaaetia ngā kaitohutohu motuhake kua whiua kia neke atu i te rima tau i roto i te whare herehere ki te pīra. Mā tēnei tukanga e whai kōrero ai ngā tūpāpaku, ā, e hiahiatia ana e te herehere o mua kia whakaatu i te pouri me te āwhina i ngā pirihimana ki te whakaoti i ta rātau hara. Ko te tikanga o te ture hou kua ngaro te mahi a te kaitohutohu o Sinn Feín, a Paul Kavanagh. E 14 tau a ia i roto i te whare herehere mo te patu i ngā tāngata tokotoru i roto i tētahi whakahau pomu IRA i Ingarangi i te tau 1981, ā, ināianei e tohutohu ana i te Tuarua Minita Tuatahi o Mātini McGuinness. E toru wiki a Paora Kavanagh hei whakahohe i te tikanga tono ki tētahi pae takitahi i runga i ngā taunga kua whakaritea. Ki te kore e ngaro aunoa i a ia tōna tūnga e rua marama i muri i te Whakaaetanga Ariki. I kī a Sinn Féin MLA Daithí McKay ko te pire Spad a Jim Allister he ngana ki te whakamana i te whakahāweatanga me te ōritetanga, ā, i ngā wā katoa e ātete ana te rōpū i te ture kino, ā, ka haere tonu ki te mahi pēnā. I kī te MLA o Te Raki o Antrim: "Ko te pire Spad i arahina e te kaiwawao whakahē a Jim Allister, a, he ture kino. Mā te āwhina a te SDLP, ka whakawāteatia tēnei ture. He whakawhitiwhiti, he ārai ōrite, he Whakaaetanga anō te Paraire Pai. "Kua ātete a Sinn Féin i tēnei ture aukati mai i te tīmatanga, ā, ka ātete tonu. Kua werohia e mātau te ture kino i mua, ā, ehara tēnei i te rerekē. "Ka tautuhia e tēnei ture te tūkinotanga ki te hunga i aituā i te ngana ki te whakapakari i te aroākapa o ngā tūpāpaku e tino mōhio ana ngā tūpāpaku me ngā tāngata. He ture kino, he hē, ā, ka haere tonu mātou ki te whakamatautau." I kī te kaiārahi TUV, a Jim Allister, nāna i kawe mai te pire: "He tino māhorahora te tae ki tēnei wā, ehara i te iti rawa nā te nui o te tika i kawea mai e ia ki ngā tūpāpaku harakore, ā, i te nuinga o te wā ka warewaretia i roto i tētahi pūnaha i whakanuia, i whakatairangatia ai ngā kaihanga tūkino nā te mea he kaihanga tūkino rātau. " Engari mō te toa me te manawanui o Ann Travers e kore rawa tēnei hē nui e whakatikaina."

title: E haere ana te rūpahu hīkoi tūru o Lecht i te kōrero a nga kaiwhakaatu mo te whakamatautau
summary: E ono ngā tāngata i mahue i te hōhipera, ā, e 30 e hiahia ana ki te whakaora.
text: I puta te whakaari i te pokapū, i Corgarff i Aberdeenshire, i te ahiahi o te Tūrei. I pāngia e te tokoono i whara he whara kore whakamate. E whakapono ana i pā mai te aituā i te putanga mai o te taura tōia i runga i te hikinga tūru. I kī a NHS Grampian i te Wenerei e rua nga tamariki i mauria mai ki Aberdeen Royal Infirmary ināianei kua tukua. Tokorua atu tamariki me tētahi pakeke i roto i te āhua "pai". Tata ki te 20ft (6m) te hinga o ngā tāngata tokoono ki te whenua, ā, neke atu i te haora i mahue ētahi atu. He nui tonu ngā tamariki i runga i ngā pari retihuka nā te mea ko ngā hararei kura hāwhe tonu i ngā wāhi maha o Pākehā. I kī tētahi kaikōrero mō te Lecht: "Kāore mātou i te mōhio ki te take o te aituā, engari ka uiuia e te Kaiwhakahaere Hauora me te Haumaru me te Lecht te take." I runga i te hiki a Tūruhi Theresa Bastiman-Davies me tana tama e waru tau te pakeke i te wā i pā mai. 'He mea kino' I kī atu a ia ki a BBC Scotland: "Tērā pea ko te oma whakamutunga o te rā mō mātau. " Ka tū ohorere, ā, ka kite ahau kua pā mai tētahi mea kino. He tino rutu. Kaore mātau i mōhio he aha te mea e haere ana. "He tino makariri. Engari i marino mātau. Ehara i te mea tino pai. Me awhi noa iho mātou, ka noho ki reira me te tatari." I whakamāramatia e tana tāne, a Stephen, nāna i tuku whakaahua ki te BBC: "I mau rāua tokorua i runga i te hiki mō te neke atu i te haora me te hāwhe e tatari ana ki te whakaora a te kaimahi, kātahi ka winched rāua ki te haumaru. " I titiro atu ahau mai i raro, me ta māua tamaiti e whā tau. I te tango pikitia ahau i a ia, nā reira i whai take te kāmera." Kei te A939 te Lecht Ski Centre i waenganui i Cockbridge me Tomintoul, i te taha ki te rāwhiti o Cairngorms. E rima ngā taunga reti matua i Pākehā — Nevis Range, Glencoe, Glenshee, Cairngorms me The Lecht.

title: Ka kitea e ngā tīmatanga kē te pūmatua mahi o UK
summary: Ko te whai ariā mātauranga me te huri hei hua, he haurua noa iho te mahi mō tētahi tīmatanga hangarau. He nui ake te tinihanga - me te nui ake o te wā e pau ana - ko te whiwhi i te pūtea kia puta.
text: Nā Katia MoskvitchTechnology, BBC News Koia tētahi take i puta ai tētahi Silicon Valley. Ka pūteatia e ngā Venture Capitalists, te hangarau, tētahi mea i roto i te puku kotahi haora mai i Sand Hill Road, i reira te nuinga o ngā kamupene pūtea nui o Silicon Valley (VC) e rāhuitia ana. He nui rawa mō te ngahau, engari ko ngā whakaaturanga kōrero e hua ana mō ngā tīmatanga i waho o Te Hononga o Amerika, he uaua kē atu te kimi moni hei tiki i ta rātau mahi i te whenua. Engari mēnā he aha te hui a Iharaira Innovate o tēnei wiki , i tū i Rānana, kei te pai ake taua āhuatanga. Tangohia te tīmatanga o Iharaira Wibbitz. Kotahi pāwhiri - ā, ka huri tō kōwae kuputuhi hei ataata ora, i te mea ka whakahiato te pūmanawa a te umanga i ngā atahanga me te tuitui tahi i runga i te rere; kāore he whakatika e hiahiatia ana. Nō nā tata nei, i taea e te kamupene ā-Tel Aviv te whakaū i tana pūtea penapena nui tuatahi o te $2.3m (£1.5m), mai i tētahi peka UK o tētahi umanga pūtea nui o Hong Kong, o Horizons Ventures. "I ngā tau tata nei, ko ngā VC anake i haumi ki ngā kamupene o Iharaira ko ngā VC o Iharaira paetata, he peka rānei o ngā VC o Amerika, i runga anō i a Iharaira," te kī a Yotam Cohen, te kaiwhakarewa tahi o Wibbitz, e noho ana i roto i tētahi rūma kōpikopiko kī tonu i ngā kaimahi o Iharaira me Ingarangi me ngā pūtea. "Ināianei, kei te kite ahau i tētahi ia i roto i a Iharaira e rapu ana ngā kamupene i ētahi atu mākete, ā, he tino whakamere te UK." E kī ana ngā kaiwhakangao UK kia ora mōhio ngā kaiwhakangao UK kei te "mōhiotia a Iharaira hei moenga wera mō te mahi hou". "Ināianei ka kite mātou i ngā kamupene nui o UK e haere mai ana ki a Iharaira ki te pūtake hangarau me te mahi pūtea penapena," tana kī. Engari e whakapono ana ngā pūteatea o Ingarangi he nui ake nā te huringa o te ahurea pūtea, ture hoki i te UK anō. "Kua noho te UK hei wāhi ātaahua ake mō ngā tīmatanga i te ahuwhānui, ahakoa he tīmatanga o UK, he tīmatanga rānei o Iharaira, nā te mea kei te nui ake te hohe o te kāwanatanga [o nāianei] ki te whakahauhau i ngā tīmatanga," te kī a Toby Coppel mai i tētahi umanga pūtea nui o Ingarangi o Virgin Green Fund. "I te UK, he mātao te tīmata ināianei - ko te mahi rangatōpū te mea hei mahi, engari ināianei kei te kōrero te katoa mō ngā tīmatanga." E whakaae ana a Richard Anton, mai i Amadeus Capital Partners. "Kei te mārama te ngana a te kāwanatanga o UK ki te whakatū i te whenua hei pokapū hangarau, ā, ko te tikanga o te mahi tahi me ngā mea tino pai o te ao - ā, i ngā wāhi pēnei i a Mātau me Iharaira he tino nui te whakarato hangarau". He nui ngā mea i hangaia ki Tech City, e mōhiotia ana hoki ko "Silicon Roundabout" i te Rāwhiti o Rāwāhi. I Whiringa 2010 ka kī te kāwanatanga o UK e hiahia ana ki te huri i te rohe hei pokapū hangarau ā-ao. I tēnei wā, neke atu i te 1,000 ngā tīmatanga e huihui ana i te wāhi, ā, kua kawea hoki ngā kamupene hangarau nunui. I ia Poutāpeta, ka whakatuwheratia e Google tētahi Google Campus i reira, he whare kī tonu i te mokowā tēpu me ngā hanganga kua rite mō ngā kamupene hangarau rangatahi - kei roto i te tohutohu a Google. Ki te UK "Kei te tino nui ake te UK i runga i te mahere tīmatanga ināianei, kei te piki ake te pūnaha rauropi hou katoa i konei, tae atu ki ngā VC," te kī a Ido Yablohka mai i te Clarity Ray o Iharaira, he umanga e mahi tahi ana me ngā rangatira paetukutuku hei whakaputa i ētahi atu pānuitanga, "kāore e whakararuraru, ā-kaiwhakamahi" ki ngā kaiwhakamahi kua āraia ngā pahū-ake pānuitanga auau. "Mō ngā kaimahi o Iharaira, e whakaaro ana ahau he tino pai rawa atu a Rātana ki te mākete o Ūropi, nā ngā āhuatanga pūtea, te reo me te tauwāhi. " He mea heahea te mākete o Ūropi ki te waiho, he tino nui - ā, kei te whakarato te kāwanatanga o UK i te tautoko kaha [kia noho a Rāwāhi hei pokapū hangarau matua i Uropi]." He tīmatanga o Iharaira a TVTak i haere hāngai mai ki UK ki te kimi hoa - me te kore titiro ki tētahi atu wāhi. Ka kī taurangi te kamupene kia tauwhiti tō pouaka whakaata - mā ngā taupānga waea atamai e āhei ai ngā kaimātakitaki ki te tauwhiti ki ngā hōtaka, ki ngā arumoni rānei e mātakitaki ana rātou i runga i te mata nui. Tohua te kāmera o tō pūrere pūkoro ki te mata pouaka whakaata, ka "āhukahuka" te taupānga i te ihirangi, ā, ka ārahi i a koe ki te whārangi tukutuku tika. "I te UK, i mahi mātou i tētahi whakahau me Walkers, e tohu ai te tangata ki tētahi arumoni pouaka whakaata, ā, ka whiwhi tīwhiri tāuke mō te tāwara o ngā rīwai rīwai e whakaaturia ana i runga i te mata," te kī a te rangatira nui o TVTak, a David Amselem. Kātahi ka mauria ngā kaimātakitaki ki tētahi whārangi sweepstakes Facebook, e taea ai e whey te mōhio ki te tāwara me te toa i tētahi whakawhiwhinga. Tērā pea kei te tipu haere te hapori hangarau kia ora i te "Silicon Roundabout", ā, tērā pea kei te huihui ngā kaimahi kē ki UK ki te rapu i ngā kaihoko me ngā mahi ngātahi, engari he maha tonu ngā tīmatanga o Ingarangi e uaua tonu ana ki te whakaū i te momo pūtea tika. Me titiro rātau ki tētahi atu wāhi, ki te haere i te ara tūturu, ki Silicon Valley, ki Hiri rānei. Ko tētahi hōtaka kāwanatanga i reira, e kiia nei ko Start-Up Chile, e tuku ana i ngā kaimahi o te ao mō te ono marama ki te tīmata i tā rātou kaupapa. E kī ana a Īna Ozsvald mai i Brighton, te kaiwhakarewa tahi o tētahi umanga mōhiohio horihori o Strongsteam, i ngana ia mō ngā marama ki te whiwhi pūtea i te UK, engari i rahua. Me tana hoa wahine ko Emily Toop, e upoko ana i tōna ake tīmatanga o Tiny Ears, he umanga e tohunga ana ki te āhukahuka kōrero mō ngā tamariki, i whiwhi a ia i te pūtea tuatahi tino nui mai i te kāwanatanga o Hiria. "I'm getting married in a year's time, so I will be going back to the UK, but if the funding situation there doesn't change, I will have to look for money in other places," he says. Engari mō ngā kaimahi o Iharaira, i te itinga rawa o ērā i haere mai ki Innovate Iharaira i tēnei wiki, te āhua nei kei te noho te UK hei tētahi o ngā ūnga matua kia haere mai ki te tiki moni - me te mōhiotia.

title: E rapu ana ngā whanaunga o Mehiko i ngā ākonga i Guerrero
summary: Kua uru atu ngā whanaunga mōrearea ki ngā hōia ki te rapu i ngā tauira e 44 i ngaro i te wā o ngā whakahēnga i te taone o Mehiko o Iguala i te āhua o Guerrero.
text: Kua ngaro nga kaiako tauira mai i tērā Paraire. I kitea whakamutunga rātau e paiheretia ana ki roto i nga waka pirihimana i te wā o nga whakahē mo te whakahāweatanga mahi ki nga kaiako ā-taiwhenua. Kua whakatuwheratia e nga pirihimana he ahi i runga i a rātau pahi me nga kaiwhakahaere i mate ai e ono nga tāngata, a, e 17 nga tāngata i whara. E 22 ngā āpiha e puritia ana e pā ana ki te tākaro. I Iguala, i ngā pātiki o te taone, ka patoto ngā whanaunga i ngā tatau o ngā kāinga e tohatoha ana i ngā pikitia o ā rātou i aroha ai. I pūruatia e nga hōia me nga pirihimana o te kāwanatanga, ka titiro rātau ki roto i ngā kōawa, i runga i te whenua wātea, i ngā kāinga huri noa i Iguala i runga i te tūmanako kia kitea he tohu o nga tauira. I kī atu a Manuela Olivares, te kairuruku o te Whatunga o ngā Rōpū Motika Tangata o Guerrerense ki te pokapū rongokōrero Wīwī, a WHW: "Kei te tū te rapunga i ngā wāhi e mōhio ana te tangata he tino mōrearea nā te mea ko te hara kua whakaritea e tohu ana i ēnei wāhi. " I kī a ia i a ia e tūmanako ana ngā whānau ka ora ake a rātau i aroha ai, e kimi ana rātau i ngā wāhi e whakamahia ana e ngā rōpū ki te tanu tinana. E kī ana nga rōia o te kāwanatanga e whai ana rātau i ngā tohutohu ka uru pea ngā rōpū rongoā i taua rohe ki ngā ngaronga. I tukuna hoki e rātau he whakamana hopu mō te rangatira o Iguala, a Jose Luis Albarca me tōna rangatira haumarutanga, e whakaarotia ana he rerenga i te tika, ā, tērā pea kei roto i te tutu. Kotahi tekau mā whā ngā tauira i ngaro, ā, i rere i te tutu, i pūrongotia oratia i te Tūtira i o rātau kāinga, i te kāreti rānei, e tūmanako ana kua huna hoki ētahi atu, ka kī ngā kaiwhakahaere. E tuku ana te kāwanatanga kāwanatanga i te kotahi miriona peso ($75,000) mō ngā mōhiohio e ahu ana ki tō rātou tauwāhi. E hia rau ngā tauira me ngā whanaunga i haere i te Rāitema i te pūmatua o te kāwanatanga, o Chilpancingo, ki te whakawhānui i ngā ngaronga.

title: Ka tautuhia e te ngaru wera o Ūropi ngā pūkete pāmahana hōu o Pipiri
summary: Ko te ngaru wera e pā ana ki te nuinga o Uropi e tūmanakohia ana kia kaha ake ki ngā whenua - tae atu ki Wīwī, Paniora me Huiterangi - e tūmanako ana ki ngā pāmahana i runga ake i te 40C (104F) ā muri ake nei i te Tāite.
text: I te Wenerei, i tuhia e Tiamana, Pōrana me te Whenua o Taikarowākia o rātau pāmahana teitei rawa mō Pipiri. E kī ana ngā kaimātai huarere ko te hau wera i ahu mai i Āwherika ki te raki. E tūmanakohia ana kia piki ake te wera i ngā whenua maha i roto i ngā rā e toru e whai ake nei, ka whakatūpato ngā tohunga huarere. I te ahiahi o te ahiahi, kua tae te pāmahana ki te 37C i Turin i Itari, 39C i te taone Pāniora o Zaragoza, me te 39C i Avignon i te tonga o Wīwī. I Paniora, e 11 ngā kawanatanga i te rāwhiti me te pokapū o te whenua kua tautuhia kia pā ki ngā pāmahana i runga ake i te 40C. I ētahi wāhi o te raki-rāwhiti, ka tae pea ki te 45C i te Paraire. E hia rau nga kaipatu ahi e whawhai ana ki ngā ahi i Catalonia, e whakaahuatia ana e te kāwanatanga ā rohe ko ētahi o ngā mea kino rawa i roto i te 20 tau. Neke atu i te 4,000 heketea (10,000 eka) e pāngia ana, engari i kī ngā mana i roto i te wera kaha ka nui ake te rohe ki te 20,000ha. E toru tekau nga tāngata kua whakakorea, a, e rima nga huarahi kua katia. E tūmanakohia ana hoki ngā pāmahana ki runga i te 40C i Itari, otirā i ngā rohe waenganui, ki te raki hoki. He maha nga tāone, tae atu ki Roma, kua tukuna nga whakatūpato wera tiketike. I te ata o te Rāitema ka kitea te tinana o tētahi tangata Romaniana 72 tau e tata ana ki te teihana tereina matua o Milana. E kī ana ngā āpiha tērā pea he take te wera i tōna matenga. I kī atu a Piripi Trackfield, tētahi tūruhi o Ingarangi i Roma, ki te HAU: "I tērā pō i ngā hipanga Pāniora ko te 41C. He ngenge ina ngana koe ki te mahi i ngā tirohanga katoa." Ināianei ko te katoa o Wīwī - i whakapaetia ai he ngaru wera i te tau 2003 mō te 15,000 mate - ināianei kei runga i te matohi karaka, te taumata whakatūpato tuarua tiketike. I Parihi, kua whakatūria he puna me ngā tauhiuhi e tūhono ana ki ngā wai. Kua whakaroatia e ētahi kura nga whakamātautau hira, a, kua katia tonutia. I Toulouse, e tūmanakohia ana kia tae te pāmahana ki te 41C i te Tāite, kua tohaina e ngā aroha he wai ki ngā tāngata noho kore. Kei te pā hoki te wera ki te iwi whānui whare herehere kaha e 72,000 o Wīwī. I kī atu a François Bes, he kaupane whare herehere, ki a BFMTV he tokomaha nga taurewa i whakaahua i o rātau pūtau he "oumu". "E kore e taea te waihanga i tētahi hukihuki nā te mea kāore e taea e ngā herehere te whakatuwhera i ngā tatau," ka whakahuatia a ia me te kōrero. Kua whakataua e tētahi whare herehere nui e tata ana ki Parihi, o Fresnes, ki te whakaheke i te whārangi hei whakamātao, ka pūrongo BFMTV. He pēhea te wera o te Wenerei? Kua piki te pāmahana i ngā rā tata nei. I te Wenerei, i tīmata a Coschen i Brandenburg i te 38.6C - he pūkete Tiamana hou mō Pipiri. I whakapūketetia hoki e Radzyn i Pōrana me Doksany i te Whenua o Taikarowākia ngā teitei hou o te motu, me ngā pāmahana e pā ana ki te 38.2C me te 38.9C. Ahakoa i te Aorangi tiketike, ka eke te pāmahana ki te 30C i ētahi wāhi. I whakapūketetia e ētahi wāhanga o Ateria ō rātou pāmahana teitei rawa i te Wenerei. Ko ngā tāone o Huitene o Hiniwa, Bern, me Zurich e matapaetia ana kia tae ki te pāmahana pūkete o te 39C, 40C rānei. I te Wenerei ka katia tētahi puna kaukau i te taone Wīwī o Grenoble ahakoa te ngaru wera, i muri i te haupae i runga i te whakamahinga o tētahi kākahu kaukau ā-Rangimārie katoa, ka kī te taone nui. Ahakoa ka karohia e te UK te wera kino rawa, ko ētahi wāhanga o te whenua - tae atu ki Rāwāhi - e tūmanakohia ana kia kite i ngā pāmahana i runga i te 30C i te Hātarei. Kei te whakapae te rerekētanga o te āhuarangi? He uaua te hono i tētahi takahanga kotahi ki te whakamahana o te ao. Ahakoa he āhua noa iho ngā takahanga huarere pēnei i ngā ngaru wera, e kī ana ngā tohunga ka nui ake ēnei nā te huringa āhuarangi. Ko ngā pūkete e hoki ana ki te mutunga o te rau tau 19 e whakaatu ana kua nui ake te pāmahana toharite o te mata o te Ao i te kotahi waeine mai i te whakawhanaketanga. E kī ana tētahi whare wānanga āhuarangi i Potsdam, Tiamana, ko ngā raumati tino wera e rima o Uropi mai i te rau tau 1500 i te rau tau 21. E āwangawanga ana ngā kaipūtaiao ko te tere o te whakamahana e honoa ana ki te whakamahinga tangata o te hinu fossil, he pānga nui ki te pūmautanga o te āhuarangi o te aorangi.

title: Tautoko pahi 'tapahia mō te tau tuarua'
summary: Neke atu i te 40% o ngā mana ā rohe i Ingarangi kua tapahia te whakapau moni mō ngā ratonga pahi e tautokona ana i tēnei tau ā-pūtea, e whakaatu ana ngā whika i whiwhia e ngā kaiwhakahauhau.
text: I kī te Whakahau mō te Waka Pai Ake i whakamahia e ia ngā tono Wāteatanga o te Mōhiohio hei kimi pūtea e whakahekea ana e te £18.3m - 16% - mō aua ratonga. I te tau 2011/12 kotahi i roto i te rima, 9% rānei o ngā ratonga e tautokona ana e ngā kaunihera i tapahia, i whakahekea rānei. I kī te kāwanatanga e kimi ana ētahi kaunihera i ngā huarahi "hei whakatutuki i ngā hiahia pāhihi". He mahi ā-ture tā ngā mana ā-rohe ki te whakarato i ngā ratonga waka tika. Ki te kore aua ratonga e mahi moni - i te nuinga o te ahiahi, i ngā mutunga wiki, i ngā wāhi tawhiti hoki - e whakawhirinaki ana rātou ki te tautoko pūtea mā te pūtea waka a te kāwanatanga ā rohe me ngā tohutūmahi ratonga pahi. Ko ngā whika mai i te Whakahau mō te Waka Pai Ake e whakaatu ana i te 2011 i tapahia e te kāwanatanga matua te koha waka mā te 28% i tēnei tau ā-pūtea kua tapahia te koha a ngā tohutūmahi e te 20%. E kī ana te rōpū neke atu i te 100 ngā ratonga tautoko i te tonga-hauauru o Ingarangi i ngaro i tēnei tau, i te rāwhiti o Ingarangi i kite i te tapahi o te £4m. I kī a Stephen Joseph, te rangatira nui o Campaign for Better Transport he tino nui ngā pahi ki ngā hapori me te āhua o te whakahaerenga. "Ki te kore rātou he tokomaha ngā tāngata e noho taratahi ana, kāore e taea te uru ki ngā mahi, e whakawhirinaki ana rānei ki te motokā. " Mā te mahi i ngā tapahi tau i ia tau pēnei, ka tino mōrearea mātou ki te tīpoka i ngā ratonga ki roto i te tōrino o te whakapeka." Engari i kī te minita waka a Norman Baker i "tino tautokona" tana tari i te haere pahi. "We accept that the overall funding settlement for local authorities is challenging but some councils are responding positive to this and finding more flexible and cost-effective ways to meet passenger needs," he said. "He rite tonu ngā taumata kaitautoko pahi i ngā wāhi tawhiti ki tērā tau, ā, kāore anō kia puta te tiango i matapaetia i roto i ngā tau pāhihi. Anō hoki, neke atu i te 80% o ngā ratonga pahi i waho o Rāwāhi e whakahaeretia arumoni ana, nō reira kaua e whakawhirinaki ki te pūtea hāngai mai i ngā kaunihera."

title: 'Kāore he tinihanga pōti' i te tūru o Thanet South i whakataetaetia e Nigel Farage
summary: "Kāore he whakaaturanga" o te tinihanga pōti i kitea i te tūru o Thanet South i whakataetaetia i te pōti nui a Nigel Farage, kua kī pirihimana.
text: I rahua te toa o te kaiārahi UKIP i te tūru, ka ngaro atu ki te kaitono Conservative o Craig Mackinlay. I kī ngā Pirihimana o Keni i ākina ngā tūhuratanga tuatahi e te hoapā mai i waho o te rohe e whakapuaki ana i ngā māharahara mō ngā taurangi pāpāho pāpori. I kī te Kaunihera Takiwā o Thanet kāore i te tūhuratia mō te tinihanga. I roto i tētahi kōrero e kī ana he here tā ngā pirihimana ki te whai i te amuamu. "E mōhio ana te āpiha whakahoki o te kaunihera i whaia ngā tukanga tika, ā, i reira tētahi mema o te Komihana Pōti i te pōti i Thanet," tana kī. 'Ngā raruraru pōti poutāpeta' Kāore i whakapuakina te hua o te pōti i te tatau i Ngā Māra Hōtoke o Margate tae noa ki te 10.35 GMT i te Paraire, i ngā haora i muri mai i te mea i tūmanakohia. I korerotia e ngā kaiwhakahaere ngā kaipānui o TE AO i taua wā i takea mai ngā takaware i te rōrahi o ngā pepa pōti me ngā raruraru e manatoko ana i te pōti poutāpeta. Ko te neke atu ko te 69%, mai i te 65% i te 2010. I puta mai ngā kerēme whanonga whakatūpato i runga i te pāpāho pāpori i muri i ngā takaware. I #thanetrigged whiwhi āwhina te hashtag Twitter i te wā i wikitōria ai a UKIP i te pōti kaunihera paetata, me te rōpū e whakahaere ana i te mana. I kī ētahi kaiwhakamahi i muri noa iho i te hinganga o Tēnā Wairangi i tohu atu ki te whanonga whakatūpato i roto i te whakataetae paremata. 'Kāore he pepa ngaro, tāhaetia rānei' te kī a te kaunihera Thanet, hei urupare ki te taurangi: "He nui ake te rohenga paremata o Thanet i te rohenga o te rohe - e toro atu ana ki te takiwā o Canterbury me Dover - nā reira he māminga te whakataurite i ngā hua pōti paremata me te rohe. " Kāore he pepa pōti ngaro, tāhaetia rānei." I kī te kaitono o Te Tonga o Labour, o Will Scobie, i whiwhi pōti 11,740, i whakaaro ia he roa te wā o te tatau nā te mea i "ngana rātau ki te mahi i ngā taiwhanga e rua i te wā kotahi". I kī a Tēnā Mackinlay he "tino tika" a ia i pōtitia tika, ā, ka tāpiri mai a ia: "Me titiro tātou me pēhea tēnei e tupu ai, engari kāore au e kite he mea kei roto i tēnei." E 16,026 ngā pōti i whiwhi ai a Tēnā Wairangi, ā, e 18,838 ngā pōti i whiwhi ai a Tēnā Mackinlay. I whakataetaetia hoki te tūru o Thanet South e Īna Atekōkiri o te Rōpū Kākāriki, e 1,076 ngā pōti, me te Liberal Democrat Russell Timpson nāna i whiwhi pōti e 932. I ngaro a Tēnā Atekōkiri rāua ko Tēnā Timpson i a rāua moni i muri i te korenga e haumaru i te 5% o te pōti. Ko te comedian Al Murray, nāna i tū mo te pōti i runga i te āhua o te The Pub Landlord for the Free United Kingdom Party, i haere mai ki te wāhi tuaono me te 318 ngā pōti. I pānuitia e Tēnā Wairangi tana tukunga iho i muri i te korenga e noho hei MP, engari i whakakāhoretia tēnei e tana rōpū, ā, kei te noho tonu a ia hei kaiārahi UKIP.

title: Te kōhuru o Nicole Waterhouse: Ka ngaro i te kaipatu te tono tono whakapae
summary: Ko tētahi āpiha o mua o te Ope Taua nāna i okaina tētahi māngai pānga ki te mate i a ia e pupuri ana i a ia me tētahi hoa mahi, kua rahua i roto i tētahi tono kia hurihia tōna whakapae.
text: I whakaae a Jeremy Green ki te kōhuru i a Nikora Waterhouse me te ngana ki te kōhuru i a Karen Browne i to rātau whare noho i York i Whiringahora 2013. I kī ngā pirihimana kua neke atu i te waru haora te "whakaekenga tino kino" i nga wāhine. I whakakāhoretia e te Kōti Pīra tētahi kerēme kua pāngia e ia tētahi "āhuatanga o te hinengaro". Ko Kākāriki, e 32 ināianei, i hereheretia mo te ora me te wā mōkito o te 34 tau i Aperira 2014. I te whakarongo a te Kōti Pīra, ka tautohe ana rōia he "haumarukore" tōna whakapae i runga i ngā whakaaturanga hou e mamae ana a ia i tētahi "hinengaro hinengaro" i tana whakaekenga i nga wāhine. I kī atu a Mikaera Mansfield QC, e tohu ana i a Kākāriki, ki te kōti kua pāngia e te hōia o mua te tūkinotanga o te roro i muri i te tīmatanga o te wera i te wā o tētahi mahi whakangungu a te Ope Taua i Pākehā i a Hōngongoi 2010. I kī a Tēnā Mansfield i whakamutua e tētahi tohunga hinengaro hinengaro i roto i tētahi pūrongo o mua tata nei nā te hinengaro o Kākāriki "i take, he take nui rānei" i roto i tōna hara, ā, ko te tikanga kia whakawhirinaki ia ki tētahi wāhanga o te kawenga iti iho i te whakawā. I whakakāhoretia te tono pīra e nga kaiwhakawā matua, nāna i kī kua whakataua e nga rōia o Kākāriki i taua wā kia kaua e whakahaere i tētahi wawao pēnei i runga i te mea i mahi a ia "i runga i te mārire, i te haumaru" puta noa i nga whakaekenga. I kī te Ariki Kaiwhakawā Haddon-Cave, e noho tahi ana me ētahi atu kaiwhakawā tokorua, ko ngā taipitopito o ngā hara a Kākāriki he "wehi rawa" ki te tārua. He maha nga wā i okaina ai e Kākāriki nga wāhine e rua i roto i te wā e tata ana ki te iwa haora - ka tapahia o rāua korokoro me te tāpoi i a rāua. E 65 ngā whara rerekē o Miss Waterhouse, e mōhiotia ana ko Nicki, tae atu ki tētahi tuaiwi pakaru, i te wā i tata mate a Miss Browne nā te whakaekenga. He āpiha a Kākāriki ki te Ope Taua o Aotearoa, engari i panaia ia i te Ope Taua i muri i te kōti hōia mo te tāhae i ētahi atu āpiha. Whāia a BBC Yorkshire i Facebook, Twitter me Instagram. Tukuna ō whakaaro pūrākau ki yorkslincs.news@bbc.co.uk. Ngā Hononga Ipurangi Pātahi Kōti Pīra

title: Te whakawātanga o Nigel Evans: MP 'whāwhā' tangata i te pae o Commons
summary: I whāwhā a MP Nigel Evans i tētahi tangata i a ia e inu ana i tētahi pae o te Whare o Ngātahi, ka rongo te hūri.
text: Ka kī atu te kaiwhakapae ki te Kōti Karauna o Preston, a Tēnā Evans "i hopu i ōna taihemahema" i a ia e inu ana me tētahi rōpū tae atu ki ngā MP me tētahi atu tūkinotanga. I mua ake, ka kī tētahi MP Tory i whakaaro ia "i waho o te āhua" i tana rongonga i nga whakaaro ki a Tēnā Ēnā. E whakakāhore ana a Tēnā Ēnā, e 56, i tētahi tatau o te hīkaka, e rua ngā tatau o te whakaekenga kino, e ono ngā tatau o te tūkinotanga. Na te kaikōrero tuarua o mua i whāwhā te kaiwhakapae i te Pae Tauhou i Me 2010. "I te kōrerorero mātou, a, ka toro atu a Nigel ki te hopu i aku taihemahema," te kī a te tangata ki te kōti. "I paraihetia e au (tōna ringa) ka kī atu 'Kāo, ehara tēnā i te mātao'." 'E purei ana ki te taiwhanga' I kī atu a Lembit Opik ki te kōti o tētahi whakawhitinga "kāore i te tino reka" ki te kaiwhakapae i muri i tana hokonga inu. Ka kī a Tēnā Opik: "Ko te rangatira e pātai ana... i kōrero i tētahi mea tino whakahāwea nā te mea kua wareware ahau ki te tiki inu māna. "Ehara ahau i te tangata tautohetohe. I tikina e au he inu ki a ia, ka hoatu tana inu ki a ia, ka tū huri noa, ka uru anō ki taku rōpū." I tāpiri mai a Tēnā Opik: "I te tākaro a ia ki te taiwhanga." I kī atu a Mikaera Fabricant, te tuakana o te Rōpū Rangatira, ki te kōti i rongo tuatahi ia i te tau 2009 e kī ana tōna "hoa pai" a Tēnā Evans i tētahi taitama i a ia e moe ana i runga i te sofa i te kāinga o te MP i Pendleton, i Nekehire. I kī a Tēnā Fabricant, he wepu Tūturu matua i te tau 2009, i kōrero te kaimahi o Aotearoa ki a Plaid Cymru MP Adam Price, nāna ia i karanga. Ka kī atu a Tēnā Fabricant ki te hūri: "E tino maumahara ana ahau ki tāna i kōrero ai, i te nuinga o te mea ki a au i waho i te āhua o te āhua o Te Wānanga i mōhio ai ahau." 'Whakatūpato inu' I rongo te hūri i te kaiwhakapae i kōrero hoki ki a Iain Corby, ko te kaiwhakahaere o te Wae Rangahau Kaupapahere, he rōpū rangahau Tūturu. I kī a Tēnā Corby kāore te kaiwhakapae i hoatu i te "taipitopito mārama", e kī ana a Tēnā Evans "i ngana ki te uru ki raro i ngā hipoki" ki a ia i a ia e moe ana. I kī a ia tērā pea i tangohia e ia tētahi "tirohanga rerekē" mehemea i korerotia ki a ia kua purua e Tēnā Ēnā he ringa ki roto i ngā kākahu o taua tangata. I tāpiri mai a Tēnā Corby: "E tūmanako ana ahau ka whakapati ahau i a ia kia mauria ki nga pirihimana." I kōrerorerotia te whakapae i roto i tētahi hui ki a Patrick McLoughlin, te wepu matua i taua wā, ka kī te kaiwhakaatu. I kī a Tēnā Corby i whiwhi ia i te ariā i "hari" te kaiwhakapae i te wā i whakapūmautia ai a Evans kia whakapōhēhē, kia whakatūpato hoki mō tana inu. 'I waho i te kōpae' I rongo te hūri i kī atu a Patrick McLoughlin, ko ia nei te Hēkeretari Waka ināianei, ki te kaiwhakapae he "tono nui" kia whakarerea e Tēnā Evans i runga i tētahi "hipanga haurangi". I kī a Tēnā McLoughlin, MP mō Derbyshire Dales: "I whakaaro ahau he tono nui tēnā i te āhua o te amuamu." I kī te MP he "muna tuwhera" te tōkaitanga a Tēnā Evans i Westminster, engari kāore a ia i puta i te wāhi whānui. I kī a ia i whakapono a ia tērā pea i āwhina te "tōkaitanga pēhi" a Tēnā Evans ki taua mahi. Ka haere tonu te whakamātautau.
